Lei a sia a, a vuak kia ahi. Tui thukpi tung a mial in a mial hi. Pathian Kha in tui tungte a opkhum hi.
Pathian in, “Vak om hen” a chi a, huchi in vak a hong omta hi.
Pathian in vak a en a, hoih a sa hi. Huchi in Pathian in vak leh mial a khenta hi.
Pathian in vak, “Sun” a chi a, mial, “Zan” a chi hi. Huchi in a ni khatna ah nitaklam a om a, zinglam leng a om hi.
Pathian in, “Tuite kikal ah vansin om henla, huai in tuite leh tuite khen hen” a chi hi.
Pathian in vansin a bawl a, vansin nuai a tui omte leh vansin tung a tui omte a khenta a; huchibang a hong hita hi.
Pathian in vansin van, a chi hi. Huchi in a ni nihna ah nitaklam a om a, zinglam leng a om hi.
Pathian in, “Van nuai a tuite mun khat ah omkhawm henla, gamkeu hong dawk hen” a chi a; huchibang a hong hita hi.
Pathian in gamkeu lei a chi a; tui omkhawmte tuipite a chi hi. Pathian in huai a en a, hoih a sa hi.
Pathian in, “Lei in loupate, anteh chi neite, thei sing, lei a amau chi omdan ding bang a gah, a gah sung a chi omte omsak hen,” a chi a, huchibang a hong hita hi.
Huchi in lei in loupate, anteh amau chi omdan ding bang a chi neite, sing amau chi omdan ding bang a gah, a gah sung a chi omte a omsakta hi. Pathian in huai a en a, hoih a sa hi.
Huchi in, a ni thumna ah nitaklam a om a, zinglam leng a om hi.
Pathian in, “Sun leh zan khenna ding in vansin ah tanvakte om uhenla, huaite chiamtehnate, hunbite, nite leh kumte theihna hi uhen.
Lei tanvak ding in van a vansin ah vakte om uhen” a chi a, huchibang a hong hita.
Pathian in tanvak thupi nih a bawlta a; tanvak thupizaw pen sun a vaihawm ding in, tanvak thupi louzaw pen zan a vaihawm ding in a bawl hi. Aksite leng a bawl hi.
Pathian in huaite lei tanvak ding in van a vansin ah a koihta hi.
Sun tung leh zan tung a vaihawm ding leh vak leh mial khen ding in. Huchi in Pathian in huai a en a, hoih a sa hi.
Huchi in a ni lina ah nitaklam a om a, zinglam leng a om hi,
Pathian in, “Tuite’n thilsiam tang thei hinna neite tampi pawtsak uhenla, vasate leng leitung a van vansin hawm heuhou ah leng uhen” a chi hi.

Pathian in ngapi liante a siam a, ganhing tang thei chiteng tui in a pawtsak a, amaute chi omdan ding bang leh kha nei vasa chiteng amaute chi omdan ding bang in a siam hi. Pathian in huai a en a, hoih a sa hi.
Pathian in, “Chi tampi suang in hong pung unla, tuipi tuite dim sak unla, vasate leng lei ah pung uhen” chi’n a vualzawl hi.
Huchi in, a ni ngana ah nitaklam a om a, zinglam leng a om hi.
Pathian in, “Lei in ganhing amau chi omdan ding bang chiat in; gante, khupboh a pai ganhingte, gamsate, amau chi omdan ding bang chiat in pawtsak uhen,” a chi a; huchi in huchibang a hong hita hi.

Pathian in gamsa amau chi omdan ding bang chiat in, gante amau chi omdan ding bang chiat in, lei a thil khupboh a paite tengteng amau chi omdan ding bang chiat in a bawl hi. Pathian in huai a en a, hoih a sa hi.
Pathian in, “I kibatpih in, eimah bang in, mi i bawl dia, tuipi a ngasate tung ah, tung a leng vasate tung ah, gante tung ah leh leitung tengteng tung ah thu i neisak ding” a chi hi.
Pathian in amah kibatpih in
mi a siam a, Pathian kibatpih
mah in ahi a siam;
pasal leh numei a siamta hi.

Pathian in amau a vualzawl hi. Pathian mah in a kiang uah, “Chi tampi suang ding in hong pung unla, lei luahdim unla, na thuthu un omsak un. Tuipi a ngasate tung ah, tung a leng vasate tung ah, thil hing leitung a khupboh a pai tengteng tung ah thunei un,” a chi hi.
Pathian mah in, “Ngai un, leitung tengteng a anteh chinei omteng leh sing chiteng, sing chinei gah omnate, k’on pia hi; na an ding uh ahi.

Lei a gamsa chiteng kiang ah, tung a leng vasa chiteng kiang ah, leitung a khupboh a pai chiteng kiang ah, hinna nei chiteng kiang ah a an ding un loupa hing chiteng ka pia hi” a chi a; huchibang a hong hita hi.
Pathian in a thilsiam tengteng a en a, ngai in, hoih a sa mahmah hi. Huchi in, a ni gukna ah nitaklam a om a, zinglam leng a om hi.
Huan, lei leh van leh asung a om tengteng siamzoh ahita hi.
Pathian in a ni sagih ni’n a nasep a zou a; a ni sagih ni’n a nasep tengteng a khawlsanta hi.
Pathian in a ni sagih ni a vualzawl a, a tangta hi. Huai ni a Pathian in a siam leh a bawl, a nasep tengteng a khawlsan tak ziak in.
Lei leh vante siam a a omlai ua a suante uh hiaite ahi;
lei a loupa himhim a om naikei a, lei a anteh leng a pou naikei hi.
Himahleh lei apan mei a hong suaktou a, leitung tengteng a nomsak hi.
Lei a kipan
Eden apan huan nomsak ding in lui a luang paisuak a; huai a kipan a ka zak a, ka li a hong hita hi.
A khatna min Pison ahi, hiai Havilah gam tengteng kualkhum lui ahi. Huai ah dangkaeng a om hi.
Huai gam a dangkaeng hoihtak ahi a, huai ah bedeli leh onik suang leng a om hi.
Lui nihna Gihon ahi a; huai lui in Kush gam tengteng a kualkhum ahi.
Lui thumna min Hiddekel ahi a; hiai Assuria gam suahlam a luang ahi. Lui lina bel Euphrates ahi.
Pathian in pasal kiang ah, “Huan a sing gah chiteng na utut na ne thei hi.
A hoih leh a sia theihna sing gah bel na ne ding ahi kei. Na nek leh na nek ni mah in na si ngeingei ding hi” chi in, thu a pia hi.

Pathian in leitung a kipan gamsa chiteng leh tung a leng vasa chiteng a bawlta hi. A min ding ua bang sak ding ahia chih theihna ding in Adam kiang ah a hon pikhawm hi. Ganhing chiteng a min uh Adam in a na phuah, a min uh ahi den hi.
Adam in gan tengteng, tung a leng vasa tengteng leh gamsa chiteng min a phuak chiat hi. Himahleh Adam panpihtu ding a omkei hi.
Pathian in Adam apan a lak nakguh apan in numei a bawl a, Adam kiang ah a honpita hi.
Adam in,
“Hiai hial zaw ka guh a kipan guh,
Ka sa a kipan sa ahi.
Pasal a kipan lakkhiak
a hih ziak in,
Numei, chih ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in, pasal in a nu leh a pa a paisan dia, a zi ah a belh ding. Huchi in sa khat a hong hita ding uhi.
Adam leh a zi vuaktang ahi tuak ua, a zum tuankei uhi.
Huan,
Numei in gul kiang ah, “Chilou e, huan a singgahte ne thei mah ung.
Huan laizang a sing gah Pathian in, ‘Na ne ding uh ahi kei, khoih leng na khoih ding uh ahi kei, huchilou in zaw na si ding uh chi a ka’ ” a chi hi.
Gul in numei kiang ah, “Si zenzen lou e.
Na nek ni ua pat na mit uh a hongvak dia, a hoih leh a sia thei in pathiante na hong bang ding uh, chih Pathian in thei kilkel eive,” a chi hi.
Numei in singgah nektheih ahi chih leh mit hiptak ahi chih leh mi pilsak dia singgah etlah huai ahi, chih a theih in a gah a lou a, a neta hi. A kiang a om a pasal leng a pia a, aman leng a neta hi.
A nih un a mit uh a hong vakta a, vuaktang a hih uh hong kithei ua; theipi nah a khui khawm ua, puan a kibawl tawm uhi.
Pathian in Adam a sam a, a kiang ah, “Kaw om na hia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Huan ah na aw ka za a, vuaktang ka hih ziak in ka lau a; ka na kibuta,” a chi hi.
Aman, “Vuaktang na hih kua’n honhilh ahia? Singgah neklouh ding ka chih ne na hita maw?” a chi hi.
Adam in, “Hon ompih dia n’on piak numei in singgah a honpia a, ne kei ve” a chi hi.
Pathian in, gul kiang ah, “Hichibang a na hih ziak in ganhing tengteng leh gamsa chiteng lak ah hamsiat na hi tuanse dia, khupboh in na pai gige dia, na damsung in leivui na ne ding ahi.
Nang leh numei k’on kidou sak dia, na suante leh a suante leng ka kidou sak lai ding. Huai in na lutang a sidup sak dia, nang a khetul na sidup sak ding” a chi hi.
Numei kiang ah, “Na haksatna leh na naupaina nakpi’n ka pungsak dia; haksatak in tate na nei ding. Himahleh na deihlam na pasal lam ahi dia, aman na tung ah thu a nei ding” a chi hi.
Adam kiang ah, “Na zi thu na man a, singgah na ne ding ahi kei, chi a, k’on thupiak na nek ziak in leitung nang ziak in hamsiat in a omta hi. Na damsung teng in gimtak a sem in a gah na neta ding hi.
Ling leh louling neite leng a hon omsak dia, lei a anteh na neta ding hi.
Lei a na kiknawn masiah na mai a kho-ul luang puappuap in an na neta ding. Lei apan lakkhiak na hi. Leivui na hi a, leivui ah na kiknawn ding” a chi hi.
Adam in a zi, mihing tengteng nu a hih ziak in, a min Evi a sa hi.
Pathian in Adam ading leh a zi ading in savun puanaktual a bawlsak a, a silhsak hi.
Huaiziak in,
Mihingte a delhkheta a; hinna sing lampi veng ding leh Eden huan suahlam pang ah Cherubte leh mei namsau kilek zualzual a omsakta hi.
Huan, Adam in a zi Evi a luppih a; huchi in a gai a, Kain a nei hi; “
A nau Abel a hon neinawn hi. Abel belamchingmi ahi a, Kain bel leiletmi ahi.
A nung in hichi a honghi a, Kain in
Abel in leng a belamhon lak a piang masapen leh a thau pen a hontawi a,
Himahleh Kain leh a thillat bel a kipahpih kei. Kain a heh mahmah a, a mel a liap hi.
, Kain kiang ah, “Bangdia heh na hia? Bangdia na mel liap ahia?
Hih hoih lechin pahtak na loh kei dia hia? Na hih hoih keileh khelhna kongkhak bul ah a kual nilouh a, a deihlam nangmah ahi ding, a tung ah thu na nei ding ahi,” a chi hi.
Kain in a nau Abel a houpih a, hichi ahi a, lou a a omlai un Kain in a nau Abel a sual a, a thatta hi.
Huaiziak in, na khut a kipan na nau sisan sang dia kam a na ka lei apan hamsiat na hita hi.
Lei na leh in leng a hoihna a honpe nawn kei ding” a chi hi.
Kain in,

Ngai in, tuni in leitung a kipan n’on delhkheta a, Na mit muh phaklouh a sel a om ding ka hita. Lei ah taimang leh vakvai hi ding ka hita hi. Hichi ahi ding a, kuapeuh honmu in a honthat mai ding uh” a chi hi.
Kain
Kain in a zi a luppih a; Huchi in a gai a, Enok a nei hi. Khua a sat a, a khaw min a tapa tamsak in Enok a sa hi.
Enok in tapa Irad a nei a; Irad in tapa Mahujael a nei hi. Mahujael in tapa Methusael a nei a; Methusael in tapa Lamek a nei hi.
Lamek in zi nih a nei a; khat min Adah ahi a, khat pen min Zillah ahi.
Adah in Jabal a nei a; amah puanin a om ganvulmite suangpa ahi.
A nau min Jubal ahi a, amah kaihging leh tamngai tummi tengteng suangpa ahi.
Zillah in leng Tubal Kain, dal leh sik, tuzat heizat chiteng sekmi, a nei hi. Tubal, Kain sanggamnu Naamah ahi.
Lamek in a zite kiang ah,
Adah leh Zillahte aw, ka aw za unla;
Lamek zite aw, ka thugen ngaikhia un.
A hon liamsak ziak in mi khat ka that a,
A hon sidup sak ziak in valnou khat ka that hi.
Kain phu bawn a mun sagih a la ding a hih uleh
Lamek phu a mun sawmsagih leh sagih in a la ding uh, a chi hi.
Adam in a zi a luppih nawn a; tapa a nei nawn a; a min Seth a sa hi. Pathian in Abel sik in chisuan ding a hon sehsakta; Kain in lah amah a thatta ngal a, a chi hi.
Seth in leng tapa a nei a; a min Enosh a sa hi. Huai a kipan mite’n
Hiai Adam suante tuanna laibu ahi. Pathian in mi a siam ni’n Pathian batpih in amah a bawl hi.
Pasal leh numei in amau a siam a; amau a vualzawl a, amau siam a a om ni un a min uh Adam, a sa hi.
Adam in kum za leh sawmthum a hih in amah mah bang, a kibatpih ngei tapa a nei a; a min Seth a sa hi.
Seth a neih nung in Adam kum za giat a damlai a; tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Adam damsung tengteng kum za kua leh sawmthum ahi a; huchi in a sita hi.
Seth in kum za leh nga a hih in, tapa Enos a nei hi.
Enosh a neih nung in Seth kum za giat leh sagih a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Seth damsung tengteng kum za kua leh sawmlehnih ahi a; huchi in a sita hi.
Enosh in kum sawmkua a hih in tapa Kenan a nei hi.
Kenan a neih nung in Enosh kum za giat leh sawmlehnga a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Enosh damsung tengteng kum za kua leh nga ahi a, huchi in a sita hi.
Kenan in kum sawmsagih a hih in, tapa Mahalaleel a nei hi.
Mahalaleel a neih nung in Kenan kum za giat leh sawmli a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Kenan damsung tengteng kum za kua leh sawm ahi a; huchi in a sita hi.
Mahalaleel kum sawmguk leh nga a hih in tapa Jared a nei hi.
Jared a neih nung in Mahalaleel kum za giat leh sawmthum a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Mahalaleel damsung tengteng kum za giat leh sawmkua leh nga ahi a, huchi in a sita hi.
Jared in kum za leh sawmguk leh nih a hih in tapa Enok a nei hi.
Enok a neih nung in Jared kum za giat a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Jared damsung tengteng kum za kua leh sawmguk leh nih ahi a, huchi in a sita hi.
Enok in kum sawmguk leh nga a hih in, tapa Methusel a nei hi.
Methusel a neih nung in Enok kum za thum sung Pathian toh a tonkhawm ua, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Enok damsung tengteng kum za thum leh sawmguk leh nga ahi.
Pathian toh Enok a tonkhawm ua, amah a omta kei a; Pathian in a lata hi.
Methusel in kum za leh sawmgiat leh sagih a hih in tapa Lamek a nei hi.
Lamek a neih nung in Methusel kum za sagih leh sawmgiat leh nih a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Methusel damsung tengteng kum za kua leh sawmguk leh kua ahi a, huchi in a sita hi.
Lamek in kum za leh sawmgiat leh nih a hih in tapa a nei hi.
Hiai ngeingei in
Noah a neih nung in Lamek kum za nga leh sawmkua leh nga a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Lamek damsung tengteng kum za sagih leh sawmsagih leh sagih ahi a; huchi in a sita hi.
Noah kum za nga a upa ahi. Noah in Shem, Ham leh Japheth a nei hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, leitung ah mite hong pung ua, tanute a honnei uhi.
Pathian tapate’n mite tanute melhoih in a mu ua; a deihlam chiat uh zi in a nei uhi.
, “Ka Kha in mi tangtawn in a sual nilouh kei ding, amau lah sa ahi ngal ua. Himahleh kum za leh sawmnih a dam ding uh” a chi hi.
Huailai in miliante lei ah a om ua; huai nung in leng Pathian tapate’n mite tanute a luppih ua, amau toh tate a neih zel lai un, huaite mah nidanglai a mihat, mi minthangte ahi uh.
Leitung a mi a bawl ziak in
, “Ka mi siam leitung a kipan ka hihmang mai ding. Mite, sate, ganhingte leh tung a leng vasate tan in; ka bawl ziak in ka kisik” a chi hi.
Noah in bel
Noah suan hiaite ahi uh. Noah midik ahi a, a dam tonpihte lak ah gensiatbei ahi. Noah Pathian toh a tonkhawm hi.
Noah in tapa thum Shem, Ham leh Japheth a nei hi.
Pathian mitmuh in lei a sekhinta a, lei hiamgamna in a dim khinta hi.
Pathian in lei a en a, ngai in, a sekhinta a; sa tengteng in leitung ah a omdan uh a hih sekhinta uhi.
Pathian in Noah kiang ah, “Sa tengteng beina ka ma ah a hongtungta. Amau tawn in lei hiamgamna in a dim khinta ngal a. Ngai in, lei toh amau ka hihmang ding.
Nang a ding in meilah sing in long bawl inla; long ah dantante na bawl ding ahi. A sunglam leh a pawlam meilah nai in na zut vek ding ahi.
Hiai na bawl ding dan ahi. Long dunglam tong za thum hi henla, a vailam tong sawmnga hi henla, a sanlam tong sawmthum hi hen.
Long ah tohlet na bawl dia, a tunglam tong khat chiang a na zoh ding ahi. Long kongkhak a pang ah na bawl dia; chial nuainung leh chial nihna leh chial thumna nei in na bawl ding ahi.
Ngai in, kei mahmah in, sa tengteng hinna hatna pai khempeuh, van nuai a kipan hih mangthang ding in leitung ah tuichim ka tungsak dia; lei a thilchih om a sivek ding uh.
Himahleh nang toh ka thukhun ka kipsak dia, long ah na lut ding ahi. Nang na lut dia, na tapate leh na zi leh na tapate zite leng na kiang ah a lut ding uh ahi.
Sa tengteng a thilhing chiteng lak a kipan, chichih nihnih in, na kiang ah hinsak ding in long ah na pilut ding ahi. A nu leh a pa zel ahi ding uh.
Vasate amau chi omdan bang chiat in, gante amau chi omdan bang chiat in, chichih nihnih in na hinsak ding in na kiang ah a hongpai ding uh ahi.
An tengteng la inla, na kiang ah koihkhawm in. Nang leh amau ading in an ahi ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchibang in Noah in a hih a; Pathian in a kiang a thu a piak tengteng bang in a hihta hi.
Huan,
Sa siang chiteng lak ah a pa leh a nu, kop sagih zel; sa sianglou lak ah a pa leh a nu chiat toh kop nih zel, na kiang ah na pi ding ahi.
Tung a leng vasa lak ah leng, a nu leh a pa chiat, kop sagih zel in, leitung a chi khah dia hinsak ding in.
Ni sagih in a samlai a, huaikhit chiang in leitung ah ni sawmli leh zan sawmli sung vuah ka zu sak ding. Ka bawl thil hing chiteng leitung a kipan ka hihmang ding, a chi hi.
Noah in
Leitung a tuichim a hongtun lai in, Noah kum za guk a upa ahita hi.
Tuichim a tun ding ziak in Noah long ah a lut a, a tapate leh a zi leh a tapate zite leng a kiang ah a lut uhi.
Sa siang lak ah leng, sa sianglou lak ah leng, vasa lak ah leng, leitung a khupboh a pai chiteng lak ah leng,
Pathian in Noah kiang a thu a piak bang in, a nu leh a pa chiat, a kopkop in, Noah kiang ah long ah a lutta uhi.
Ni sagih nung in leitung ah tuichim a tungta hi.
Noah kum za guk a hih in a kha nihna, ni sawmlehsagih ni’n, huai ni mah in tui thuk zapi nak tengteng a hong puakzak a, van tohlette leng a hong kihongta uhi.
Ni sawmli leh zan sawmli sung teng leitung ah vuahpi a zuta hi.
Huai ni mah in Noah, Noah tapate Shem, Ham, Japheth leh Noah zi long ah a lutta ua, a tapate zi thumte leng a kiang ah a lut uhi.

Amaute a lut ua, sa chiteng amau chi omdan bang chiat in, ganhing leitung a khupboh a pai chiteng amau chi omdan bang chiat in, vasa chiteng, amau chi omdan bang chiat in, vasa chiteng, kha nei chiteng leng a lut uhi.
Sa tengteng hinna hatna pai him himte, a kopkop in Noah kiang ah long ah a lutta uhi.
A lutte Pathian in a kiang a thu a piak bang in, sa tengteng lak a a nu leh a pa zel in a lut uhi. Huchi in
Tuichim leitung ah ni sawmli sung teng a tung a; tui a hong khang a, long a lam a, leitung ah a domkangta hi.
Tui a hongom zuazua a, leitung ah a khan in a hong khangta hi, long tui tung ah a kilam hi.
Leitung ah tui nakpi’n a hongom zuazuata a; van nuai a tang sang tengteng a tumkhin vekta hi.
Tong sawmlehnga hial a sang in tui a hongom a; tangte tupmang in a omta uhi.
Sa lei a tangthei tengteng, vasate, gante, gamsate, ganhing lei a khupboh a pai chitengte, michih tengte toh a si khin vekta uhi.
A nak ua hinna kha hatna omna tengteng, gam a om tengteng a sikhin vekta uhi.
Lei a thil hing chiteng omte, mite, gante, ganhingte, tung a leng vasate toh hihmang in a om ua; lei a kipan hihman in a omta uh. Long sung a om Noah leh a kiang a omte kia hawi in a om uhi.
Tui ni za leh sawmnga sung teng leitung ah a om hi.
Huan, Pathian in, Noah leh long sung a a kiang a thilhing chiteng leh gan om tengteng a theigige a; Pathian in leitung ah huih a nungsak a, tui a hong dai panta hi.
Tui thukpi nakte leh van tohlette hong kikhakta ua, van a kipan vuah leng theusak ahita hi.
Lei a kipan tui a kiam giaigiaita a; ni za leh sawmnga nung in tui a hong tawm deuhta hi.
A kha sagihna, ni sawmlehsagih ni’n Ararat tang ah long a hong kingata hi.
Tui, a kha sawmna tan in a kiam giaigiai zel a; a kha sawmna ni khat ni’n mualvumte a kimuta hi.
Ni sawmli nung in hichi ahi a, Noah in a bawl long tohlet a hongta hi.
Va-ak khat a khahkhia a, lei a kipan tui a kankhit masiah huai va-ak a vial lenlen hi.
Leitung ah tui a tawmta hia, tawm nailou, chih theihna ding in vakhu khat a khah khe nawn hi.
Himahleh vakhu in tukna ding himhim a mu kei a, a kiang ah long ah a kiknawn a, tui lah leitung pumpi ah a omlai ngal a. Pawlam ah a khut a golh khia a, aman long sung ah a kiang ah a lalut nawn hi.
Ni sagih dang a ngaklai a; vakhu long a kipan a khahkhe nawn hi.
Vakhu nitaklam in a kiang ah a honglut nawn a; ngai in, a muk in olive nah khat a hontuah hi. Noah in lei ah tui a tawmta, chih a theita hi.
Ni sagih dang a ngak nawn a; vakhu a khah khe nawn a; a kiang ah a hong kiknawn kei hi.
Hichi ahi a, a kum za guk leh khatna, a kha khatna, a ni khat ni’n, tui lei a kipan a kangta hi. Noah in long khuhna a koihsuana, a en a; ngai in, leitung a hulta hi.
A kha nihna, ni sawmnih leh sagih ni’n lei a hulta hi.
Pathian in Noah kiang ah thu a gen a;
Long a kipan pawt in, nang pawt inla, na zi leh na tapate leh na tapate zite leng na kiang ah pawt uhen.

Sa tengteng lak a thilhing chiteng na ompihte, vasate, gante, ganhing leitung a khupboh a pai chitengte toh na kiang ah pikhia in, leitung a chipha tak a chi tampi suang a a hong punna ding un, a chi hi.
Noah a pawt a, a tapate leh a zi leh a tapate zite leng a kiang ah a pawt uhi.
Sa chiteng, ganhing chiteng, vasa chiteng, leitung a tangthei peuhmahte amau chi omdan bang chiat in long a kipan a pawtta uhi.
Noah in
huai namtui a za a;
Lei omlai teng buh leh buhlakte, khovot leh kholumte, nipi leh phalbite, sun leh zante a bei kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan, Pathian in Noah leh a tapate a vualzawl a, a kiang uah, “Chi tampi suang in hongpung unla, lei luahdim un.
Nou kihtakna leh lauhna lei a sa chiteng leh tung a leng vasa chiteng in a nei ding uh. Hiaite leh lei a khupboh a pai tengteng leh tuipi a ngasa tengteng na khut ua piak ahita uhi.
Thilhing tangthei chitengte nou ading in nekding ahi ding ua; anteh hing k’on piak bang in bangkim k’on pevek hi.
Himahleh sa, a hinna sisan toh na nekhawm ding uh ahi kei.
Na hinna sisan phu ka la ngeingei ding. Sa chiteng lak ah ka la dia, mi lak ah leng. Michih a unaute uh lak ah, mite hinna phu ka la chiat ding.
Kuapeuh mi sisan suahmi, mi mah in amah sisan a suah ding ahi. Pathian batpih a mi bawl ahi ngal a.
Nou chi tampi suang in hong pung unla, ta leh nau tampi nei unla, leitung ah hongpung un” a chi hi.
Pathian in, Noah kiang leh a kiang a om, a tate kiang ah,
“Ngai un, kei mahmah in na kiang uah leh nanung ua na suante uh kiang ah leng ka thukhun ka hihkip hi.
Na kiang ua om thilhing chiteng, na ompih uh vasate, gante, na ompih uh lei a sa chitengte kiang ah leng; long a kipan hongpawt tengteng, lei a sa chiteng kiang na ngawn ah.
Na kiang uah ka thukhun ka hihkip ding; sa tengteng leng tuichim a hihman in a om nawn kei ding uh. Lei hihse ding in tuichim a tung nawn kei ding” a chi hi.
Pathian mah in, “Kei leh nou leh na kiang ua thil hing chiteng omte kal a , suan tawp neilou a omte ading in, hiai ka thukhun chiamtehna ahi ding hi.
Meipi ah ka sakhituihup ka zam sak a, huai kei leh lei kal a thukhun chiamtehna ding ahi.
Hichi ahi ding a, leitung a meipi ka kaisak in sakhituihup meipi ah a kimu ding hi.
Kei leh nou leh sa tengteng lak a thilhing chitengte kal a , ka thukhun om ka theigige ding. Sa tengteng hihmang ding in tui a letnawn kei ding hi.
Sakhituihup meipi ah a zam zel ding. Pathian leh leitung a sa om tengteng lak a thilhing chiteng kal a tangtawn thukhun om ka theihgige theihna ding in ka en zel ding” a chi hi.
Pathian mah in, Noah kiang ah, “Hiai kei leh leitung a sa om tengteng kal a ka thukhun hihkip chiamtehna ahi” a chi nawn hi.
Noah tapa long a kipan pawtte Shem, Ham leh Japheth ahi uh. Ham Kanaan Pa ahi.
Huai mi thumte Noah tapate ahi ua, amau a kipan pawtte’n leitung pumpi a zelsuak uhi.
Noah louneimi in a hongom pan a, grephuan a bawl hi.
Uain a dawn a, a kham a; a puanin ah a lumkhialta hi.
Ham, Kanaan pa’n a pa lumkhial a mu a, inn pua a om a naute nih a hilh hi.
Shem leh Japheth in puan a la ua, a liang ua kizawn in a nung pai ua, a pa uh lumkhial a khuhta uh. A mai uh lehlam nga in a pa uh lumkhial a mu kei uhi.
Noah uain kham a honghalh a, a tapa naupangpen in a tung a a hih dan a hon theita hi.
“Kanaan hamsiat in om hen.
A unaute sikhate sikha
ahi ding” a chi hi.
“Shem
Pathian phat in om hen.
Kanaan a sikha in om hen.
Pathian in Japheth hihlian henla,
Kanaan a sikha in om hen,” a chilai hi.
Noah tuichim tun nung in kum za thum leh sawmnga a dam hi.
Noah damsung tengteng kum za kua leh sawmnga ahi a; huchi in a sita hi.
Huan, hiaite Noah tapa Shem, Ham leh Japheth suante ahi uh. Tuichim tun nung in tapate a neichiat uhi.
Japheth tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek leh Tiras ahi uh.
Gomer tapate: Askenaz, Riphath leh Togarmah ahi uh.
Javan tapate: Elishah, Tarsis, Kittim leh Dodanim ahi uh.
Huaite a kipan in Jentelte, amau pau leh amau nam bangzel in, amau chite omna tuikulh gam, amau gamte ah a kikhen zak uhi.
Ham tapate: Kush, Mizraim, Phut leh Kanan ahi uh.
Kush tapate: Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah leh Sabteka ahi uh. Raamah tapate: Sheba leh Dedan ahi uhi.
Kush in tapa Nimrod a nei hi. Amah lei ah mi hattak a honghi panta hi.
ma ah sabengmi hattak ahi a; huaiziak in ahi, “
A lal patna Sinar gam a Babel khua, Erek khua, Akkad khua leh Shinar gam a Kalneh khua ahi uh.
Huai gam a kipan a pawt a, Assuria gam ah a lut a, Ninevi khua, Rehoboth Ir khua leh Kaineh khua a sat hi.
Ninevi leh Kalah kikal ah Resen khua a sat a, huai Resen khua thupitak ahi.
Mizraim in Ludim, Ananim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,
Pathrusim leh Kasluhim, Philistiate leh Kaphtorimte pawtna, a suangta hi.
Kanan in tapa masa Zidon a nei a, Heth leng a neilai a,
Jesbuste, Amorte, Girgaste;
Hivte, Arkate, Sinte;
Arvadte, Zemarte, Hamathte a suang a; huai nung in Kanaan namte a ki thehzakta uhi.
Kanante gamgi Zidon khua a kipan Gerar, Gaza, Sodom leh Gomorrah, Admah, Zeboim leh Lasa khua tan ahi.
Huaite, a namte bangzel leh a paute, a gamte leh a namte lak ua bangzel in Ham suante ahi uhi.
Shem, Eber ta tengteng suangpa, Japheth u in leng tate a nei hi.
Shem tate: Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud leh Aram ahi uh.
Aram tapate: Uz, Hul, Gether leh Mas ahi uh.
Arpaksad in tapa Shelah a nei a; Shelah in tapa Eber a nei hi.
Eber in tapa nih a nei a: khat min Peleg ahi a, a damlai in lei khen in a omta ngal a; a nau min Joktan ahi.
Joktan in tapa Almodad, Seleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah;
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah;
Obal, Abimael, Sheba;
Ophir, Havilah leh Jobab a nei a; huai tengteng Joktan tapate ahi uh.
A tenna uh Mesa a kipan suahlam tang Sephar tan ahi.
Huaite Shem suante ahi uh, a namte bangzel leh a paute bangzel in, a gamte ah leh a chite bangzel in.
Huaite Noah suan namte ahi ua, a suante uh bangzel in a chite uh lak ah; tuichim tun nung in huaite a kipan ahi a; lei a chichih khenkhiat ahi uhi.
Huan lei a mi tengteng in pau khat leh paudan khat a nei uh.
Hichi ahi a, suahlam a kipan a kisuanzel laiun, Sinar gam ah phaizang a mu ua; huai ah a tengta uhi.
“Kisa un; teklei i bawldia, hoihtak in i halding” a kichita uhi. Suang sik in teklei a nei ua, suanghukna sik in longnai a nei uhi.
“Kisa un, khopi i bawl dia, insang a vum vansun ding in i bawl dia, i min i thang sak ding uh. Huchilou in zaw lei pumpi ah thehdalh in i omkha ding” a chi uhi.
Mite tate’n khopi leh insang a lam uh en ding in
“Ngai dih ua, mite pumkhat ahi ua, avek un lah pau khat a nei ngal ua; hiai thil a hih pan uhi. Tu’n zaw a thil hihtupte uh leng kham vual ahita kei ding hi.
Kisa un, i va hohsuk ding ua, pau a kitheituah louhna ding un, a pau uh i va suklamdang sak ding” a kichi uhi.
Huchi in
Huaiziak in, a min Babel a chi uh;
Hiai Shem suante ahi uh. Shem kum za a upa ahi a; tuichim tun nung kum nih nung in tapa Arpaksad a nei hi.
Arpaksad a neih nung in Shem kum za nga a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Arpaksad in kum sawmthum leh nga a hih in, tapa Shelah a nei hi.
Shelah a neih nung in Arpaksad kum za li leh thum a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Shelah in kum sawmthum a hih in tapa Eber a nei hi.
Eber a neih nung in Shelah kum za li leh thum a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Eber in kum sawmthum leh li a hih in, tapa Peleg a nei hi.
Peleg a neih nung in Eber kum za li leh sawmthum a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Peleg in kum sawmthum a hih in tapa Reu a nei hi.
Reu a neih nung in Peleg kum za nih leh kua a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Reu in kum sawmthum leh nih a hih in, tapa Serug a nei hi.
Serug a neih nung in Reu kum za nih leh sagih a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Serug in kum sawmthum a hih in, tapa Nahor a nei hi.
Nahor a neih nung in Serug kum za nih a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Nahor, kum sawmnih leh kua a hih in, tapa Terah a nei hi.
Terah a neih nung in Nahor kum za leh sawmkua a damlai a, tanu leh tapate a neilai hi.
Terah in kum sawmsagih a hih in tapate Abram, Nahor leh Haran a nei hi.
Hiaite Terah suante ahi uh: Terah in tapa Abram, Nahor leh Haran a nei a; Haran in tapa Lot a nei hi.
Haran a pianna gam a, kaldaite khua Ur ah, a pa Terah ma in a si hi.
Abram leh Nahor in zi a nei ua; Abram zi min Sarai ahi. Nahor zi min Haran tanu Milkah ahi. Haran, Milkah pa leh Iskah pa leng ahi.
Sarai a ching a; ta himhim a neikei.

Terah in a tapa Abram, a tapa, Haran tapa, Lot, a mou, a tapa Abram zi Sarai a pi a; Kanan a hoh ding in Kaldaite khua Ur a kipan a pawtkhe khawmta uhi. Haran khua a hongtung ua, huai ah a tengta uhi.
Terah damsung kum za nih leh nga ahi a, Haran khua ah Terah a sita hi.
Huan,
Chi thupi mahmah in k’on bawl dia, vual ka honzawl dia, na min ka hih thupi ding. Nang vualzawlna na hi ding.
Nang hon vualzawlte ka vualzawl dia,
hon hamsiat peuhmah ka hamsiat ding.
Nang ah lei a namchih vualzawl in
a om ding uh” a chi hi.
Abram in a zi Sarai leh a naupa tapa Lot leh, a thil kaihkhawm tengteng uh leh Haran khua a, a mi neih tengteng uh a pi a; Kanan gam a teng ding in a pawtta ua; Kanan gam a tungta uhi.
Abram huai gam a Sekem mun pha in, Moreh tosaw tan in, a pai zel hi. Huailai in, Kanante huai gam ah a teng uhi.
Abram kiang ah a kilak a, “Hiai gam na suante kiang ah ka pe ding” a chi hi. Huai ah a kiang a kilak
Huai a kipan Bethel suahlam a tang ah a kisuan a, huai ah a puanin a kaita hi. A tumlam ah Bethel a om a, a suahlam ah Ai khua a om hi. Huai ah
Abram sim gam lam zuan in a kisuan lai hi.
Huai gam ah kial a keta a; huai gam a nak kial mahmah ziak in, Abram Aigupta gam a omtadih ding in a paisukta hi.
Hichi ahi a, Aigupta gam lut dia a kisaklai un, a zi Sarai kiang ah, “Ngai in, numei melhoih tak na hi, chih ka thei hi.
Huchi in hichi ahi ding a, Aiguptate’n nang a honmuh chiang un, hiai a zi ahi, a chiding ua; kei a honthat ding ua, nang a honhawi ding uhi.
Nang ziak a hoihtak a ka om theihna ding in leh nang vanga ka hin theihna ding in, a sanggamnu ka hi, hehpih in chi zel in” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Aigupta a Abram a lut leh, Aiguptate’n numei a mu ua, a melhoih a sa mahmah uh.
Pharo miliante’n leng a mu ua, Pharo kiang ah a hoih dan a gen uh. Huchi in, numei Pharo inn ah a pi lutta uh.
Aman Sarai ziak in Abram hoihtak in a hih a; belamte, bawngte, sabengtungpate, sikhapate, sikhanute, sabengtungnute leh sangawngsaute a neih lohta hi.
Abram zi Sarai ziak in Pharo leh a inkuante tung ah hipi khawktak a tung sak hi.
Pharo in Abram a sam a, “Ka tung a na thilhih bangchidan a mai a? Na zi ahi chih bangdia honhilh lou na hia? Ka sanggamnu ahi, bangdia chi na hia?
Huaiziak a kei maw, ka zi dia ka na neih hial, huaiziak in, tu’n en in, na zi, pi inla, paimang in,” a chi hi.
Pharo in a tungthu ah mi kiang ah thu a pia a, amah a va khat a ua, a zi toh, a neih tengteng toh.
Abram Aigupta gam a kipan a pawt a, simlam ah a pai tou hi; a kiang ah a zi, a neih tengteng leh Lot leng a paitou hi.
Abram gante, dangkate leh dangkaengte in a hausa mahmah hi.
Simlam a kipan Bethel tan a pai zel a, Bethel leh Ai khua kikal a tung hi, a tung a a puanin a omna mun ah.
A tung a, maitam a dohna mah ah Abram in
Lot, Abram kiang a pai sam in, belamhonte, bawnghonte leh puaninte a nei hi.
A omkhawmna ding un gam a kichingta kei a; a van neih uh a tam mahmah hi. A omkhawm thei nawn kei uhi.
Abram ganpute leh Lot ganpute kikal ah kiselna a hong pawtta a; huailai in Kanante leh Perizte huai gam ah a teng uhi.
Abram in Lot kiang ah, “Hehpih in, nang leh kei kikal ah, na ganpute leh ka ganpute kikal ah leng kiselna omkei hen; unau i hi uhi,” a chi hi.

“Gam pumpi na ma ah a om ka hia? Hehpih in ka kiang a kipan tuam om mai in. Nang veilam a na pai leh, kei taklam ah ka pai ding. Ahihkeileh, nang taklam a na pai leh, kei veilam ah ka pai ding” a chi hi.
Lot a dak a, Zoar kholam zuan in, Jordan phaizang tengteng,
Lot in Jordan phaizang tengteng a telta hi. Lot suahlam ah a kisuan a; a kikhenta uhi.
Abram Kanan gam ah a teng a, Lot phaizang khuate ah a teng a, Sodom khua pha in a puanin a kai hi.
Sodom mite Pathian mitmuh in nakpitak a hoihlou leh khial in a om uhi.
A kiang a kipan Lot a om tuam nung in,
Na gam muh tengteng na kiang ah leh na suante kiang ah tangtawn a ding in k’on pe ding.
Na suante lei a leivui bang in ka bawl ding. Mi’n lei a leivui a sim seng uh leh, na suante leng sim seng ahi ding uh.
Thou inla, gam dung leh vai palsuak in; na kiang a honpe ding ka hi” a chi hi.
Abram in a puanin a suan a, Hebron a om Mamre tawsaw kiang ah a tengta a, huai ah
Huan, Sinar khaw kumpipa Amraphel, Ellasar khaw kumpipa Ariok, Elam khaw kumpipa Kedorla-omer, Goiim khaw kumpipa Tidal damlai in hichi ahi a;
Amau Sodom khaw kumpipa Bera a sim uh. Gomorrah khaw kumpipa Birsa, Admah khaw kumpipa Sinab, Zeboiim khaw kumpipa Semeber, Bela khaw kumpipa leng a sim uhi, huai Zoar ahi.
Hiai tengteng Siddim guam ah a pang uh, huai guam Chi Tuipi ahi.
Kum sawmlehnih sung Kedorla-omer nuai ah a na om ua, a kum sawm leh thumna in a helta uhi.
A kum sawmlehlina ah Kedorla-omer leh a kiang a kumpipa omte a hong ua, Asteroth-karnaim khua ah Rephaimte a that ua, Ham khua ah Zuzimte a that ua, Kariathaim phaizang ah Emimte a that uhi.
A omna Seir tang ah Elparan pha in, Horte a that uhi, Elparan gamdai zul a om ahi.
A kiknawn ua, Enmishpat a tung ua, huai Kadesh ahita, Amalekte gam a mi teng leh Amorte, Hazezon tamar khua a tengte leng a that nawn uhi.
Sodom khaw kumpipa, Gomorrah khaw kumpipa, Admah khaw kumpipa, Zeboiim khaw kumpipa leh Bela khaw kumpipa a pawt ua, Bela khua Zoar khua ahita, Siddim guam ah amau sual ding in a pangta uhi.
Elam khaw kumpipa Kedorla-omer, Goiim khaw kumpipa Tidal, Shinar khaw kumpipa Amraphel te, Ellasar khaw kumpipa Ariok sual ding in, Kumpipa li in kumpipa nga a sual uhi.
Siddim guam longnai khuk in a dim a; Sodom leh Gomorrah khaw kumpipate a taikek ua, huai ah a kia ua, a keloute tang ah a tai touta uh.
Sodom leh Gomorrah mite sum tengteng leh a nekding tengteng uh a la ua, a paita uhi.
Lot, Abram unau tapa, Sodom khua a om, a neih teng toh a la ua, a paita uhi.
Mi khat hong taikhia a hongpai a, Hebru mi Abram a hilh a; amah Amormi Mamre tawsaw kiang ah a teng hi. Mamre Eskol unau leh Aner unau ahi a; huai mite Abram toh pangkhawm ahi uh.
Abram in unaupa sal in a pi uh, chih a zaktak in, a inn a piang, aman a chilsiamsa mi za thum leh sawmlehgiat a pikhia a, Dan khua pha in a delhta hi.
Zan in amau sual ding in amah leh a sikhate a ki hawmzak ua, a that ua Hobah pha in a delh uhi. Hobah bel Damaska mallam ah a om hi.
Thil tengteng a honla kiknawn vek a, a unaupa Lot leh a neih tengteng a honla kiknawn vek a, numeite leng a hon pinawn a, midang tengteng toh.
Kedorla-omer leh a kiang a om kumpipate that khin, a paikik in Sodom kumpipa Shave guam ah, Abram dawn ding in a hohsuk hi. Shave guam kumpipa guam ahita.
Salem khaw kumpipa Melkizedek in tanghou leh uain a hontawi a; amah Pathian Tungnungpen siampu ahi.
Aman Abram a vualzawl a; “Lei leh van neipa, Pathian Tungnungpen Abram vualzawl in om hen.
Na melmate na khut a hon pepa, Pathian Tungnungpen, phat in om hen” a chi hi. Abram in amah bangkim a sawm a khat a pia hi.
Sodom khaw kumpipa’n Abram kiang ah, “Mite honpia inla, thilte nang kineih in” a chi hi.
Abram in Sodom kumpipa kiang ah, “Lei leh van neipa,
Khauzang khat lel leng, khedap khau khat lel leng, na neih himhim ka lakei ding, huchilou in zaw, Abram, kei hauhsak sak ahi, na chikha ding” a chi hi.
“Tangvalte nekmang leh ka mi paipihte tantuan kia louzaw ka lakei ding, Aner, Eskol leh Mamrete’n a tantuan uh la uhen” a chi hi.
Huai thilte nung in, “Abram, lau ken, kei na phaw leh na kipahman thupitak ka hi” chi’n,
Abram in, “Aw,
Abram mah in, “Ngai in, chi lah n’on suahsak kei a; en in, ka inn a piang ka gouluah ding ahi” a chi hi.
“Ngai in, huai mi na gouluah ding ahi kei. Nangmah gil a hong gah ding ngei, na gouluah ahizaw ding” chi’n,
Amah inn pua ah a pikhia a, “Vanlam en inla, aksite na sim theih leh sim him in” a chi hi. Amahmah in a kiang ah, “Na suante huchibang ahi ding uh” a chi hi.
Aman
A kiang ah, “Hiai gam na luah ding a honpe dia Kaldaite khua Ur a kipan hon pikhia
Aman “
Aman, a kiang ah, “Bawngla kum thum a upa, kelpi kum thum a upa, vakhu leh vapal nou honla in” a chi hi.
Huai teng a honla a, a laitak ah a phelkhap chiat a, a phel khat, a phel khatlam doh in a koih chiat a; vasate bel a phelkhap kei hi.
Sasialne vasate saluangte tung a a tuk chiang un Abram in a hawlkhe zel hi.
Nitum dia a kisak sialsial lai in, Abram a ihmu hithit hi. Ngai in, a mial a mial, thil mulkimhuai petmah in amah a honkhuh hi.
Hiai thilte nung in Pathian in Abram kiang ah, “Na suante amau gam hilou ah mikhual in a om ding ua, a na uh a sepsak ding uh, chih teltak in thei in. Kum za li sung hih gentheih in a om ding uhi.
A nna uh a sepsak nam uh ka vaihawm khum ding. Huaikhit chiang in thil tampi nei in a hong paikhe ding uhi.
Nang na pipute kiang ah lungmuangtakin na pai ding a; na lu a kelsam pouvek in a honvui ding uhi.
Himahleh, suan lina ah hiai ah a hongpai nawn ding uh. Amorte khelhnate lah a kim nai ngalkei a” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, nitum a, khua a hong mial in, ngai in, halzulna meikhu lunglung leh meisel kuang luahluah huai sa kiphelkhapte kal a paipai a hongom hi.
Huai ni’n
Kente, Kenizte, Kadmonte,
Hitte, Perizte, Rephaimte,
Amorte, Kanante, Girgahte leh Jebuste toh leng ka pelai hi, chi in Abram toh thu a khungta hi.
Huan, Abram zi Sarai in ta himhim a neihsak kei hi. Sarai in Aigupta mi sikhanu khat a nei a, a min Hagar ahi.
Sarai in Abram kiang ah, “Ngai dih ve,
Abram zi Sarai in Abram Kanan gam a kum sawm a om nung in, a sikhanu Aigupta mi a pi a, a pasal Abram kiang ah a zi ding in a pia hi.
Hagar a luppih a; a gaita hi. A gai chih a kitheihtak in, a pi a simmawh maimah hi.
Sarai in Abram kiang ah, “Ka thil thuak mawh nang pua in. Ka sikhanu na kawi ding in k’on pia a; a gai chih a kitheihtak in, a hon simmawh maimah hi.
Abram in Sarai kiang ah, “Ngai in, na sikhanu na khut a om ahi, nang pha na saksak a tung ah hih in,” a chi hi. Sarai in a hih gentheih mahmah tak in a taimangsanta hi.
A kiang ah, “Hagar, Sarai sikhanu aw, koi apan hongpai na hia, koi a hoh dia kisa na hia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Ka pi Sarai kiang a kipan taimang ka hi” a chi hi.
angel in, a kiang ah, “Na suante simsenglouh khop hial a tam in ka pungsak ding” a chi nawn hi.
angel mah in, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, nau na paita, tapa na nei ding a;
Amah gam sabiltung bang ahi ding a; michih a dou ding a, michih in leng amah a dou ding uh. A unaute a kipan a tuamten ding” a chi nawn hi.
Hagar in amah houpih
Huaiziak in huai tuikhuk Beer-lahai-roi sak ahita. Ngai in, Kadesh leh Bered khaw kikal ah a om hi.
Hagar in Abram tapa a neihsak a; Abram in a tapa, Hagar in a neihsak min Ishmael a sata hi.
Hagar in Abram adia Ishmael a neihsak lai in Abram kum sawmgiat leh guk a upa ahi.
Abram kum sawmkua leh kua a upa a hih in,
Nang toh kikal ah thu ka khung dia, nakpitak in k’on pungsak ding” a chi hi.
Abram a khupboh a; Pathian in amah a houpih hi.
“Ngai in, ken zaw, ka thukhun na kiang ah ahi, ka khun, chi tampite Pa na hita ding.
Na min leng Abram ahi nawnta kei dia, na min Abraham ahi zawta ding; chi tampite Pa dia k’on bawltak ziak in.
Nakpitak in k’on chipha sak ding a, nang ah chichihte ka bawl ding a, nang a kipan kumpipate a hong omkhe ding uh.
Kei leh nang leh na suante, suan sawnsawnte tan in leng ka thukhun nang ading leh nanung a na suante ading a, a Pathian uh hi ding in, tangtawn thukhun ding in ka hihkip ding hi.
Na kiang ah leh nanung a na suante kiang ah mikhual na hihna gam, Kanan gam tengteng, tangtawn gou ding un k’on pe ding, Kei, a Pathian uh ka hi ding” a chi hi.
Pathian mah in Abraham kiang ah, “Nang ka thukhun na zui ding ahi. Na nung a na suante suan sawnsawnte tan in leng a zui ding uhi.
Hiai kei leh nang leh na suante kal a ka thukhun na zuih ding uh ahi. Na lak ua pasal peuhmah zeksum ding ahi.
Na zekvun sa uh zeksum in na om ding uhi. Huai nang toh i kal a thukhun chiamtehna ahi ding hi.
Na lak ua kuapeuh ni giat a upa, na suan sawnsawn tan un leng, na suan hi chitchiat lou leng na inn a piang hiam, mikhual kuapeuh a kipan dangka sum a na lei hiam leng, pasal peuhmah zeksum ding ahi.
Na inn a piang leh na dangka sum a na leite leng zeksum ngeingei ding ahi. Ka thukhun tangtawn thukhun ding in na sa ah a omta ding hi.
Pasal zeksumlouh leh a zekvun sa a zeksum a omlou, a chipihte lak a kipan satkhiat ahi ding; aman ka thukhun hihsia ahi” a chi nawn hi.
Pathian mah in, Abraham kiang ah, “Na zi Sarai, a min Sarai na chi nawnta kei dia, a min Sarah ahi zawta ding.
Amah ka vualzawl ding a, huai lou leng amah ah tapa k’on pe ding. Ahi, amah ka vualzawl ding a, Namte Nu ahita ding. Nam tuamtuam kumpipate amah a kipan a hongom ding” a chi hi.
Abraham a khupboh a, a nuia, a lungsim in mi kum za a upa in ta a neiding maw? Sarah kum sawmkua a upain ta a neiding maw? a chi hi.
Abraham mah in, Pathian kiang ah, Ishmael na ma ah omthei leh aw, a chi hi.
Pathian in, “Hilou e, na zi Sarah in tapa a hon neihsak taktak ding; a min Isak na sak ding ahi. Ka thukhun, a nung a, a suante ading in tangtawn thukhun ding in a kiang ah ka hihkip ding.

Ishmael tungthu leng k’on ngaihkhiak sak hi. Ngai in, amah ka vualzawlta a, chi tampi ka suangsak ding hi. Nakpitak in leng ka pungsak ding a, aman kumpipa sawmlehnih a suang ding a, amah chi thupitak in ka bawl ding hi.
Himahleh ka thukhun, Sarah in nikum hichi hun a a hon neihsak ding Isak kiang ah ahi ka hihkip ding” a chi hi.
A kiang a thugen a tawp a, Pathian in Abraham a paitouh santa hi.

Abraham in a tapa Ishmael leh a inn a piang tengteng leh dangka sum a, a lei tengteng, Abraham inkuante lak a pasal peuhmah, a pi a, Pathian in a kiang a a gen bang in, huai ni mah in a zekvun uh a sumsakta hi.
Abraham zekvun a sumlai in kum sawmkua leh kua a upa ahi.
A tapa Ishmael a zek vun a sum lai un kum sawmlehthum a upa ahi.
Huai ni mah in Abraham leh a tapa Ishmael zeksum ahita uh.
A inkuanpihte lak a pasal tengteng, a inn a piangte leh mikhual a kipan dangka sum a a leite leng, amah toh zeksum ahi vekta uhi.
Huan, Abraham sun nisat laitak a puanin kongkhak bul a, a tutlai in, Mamre tawsaw kiang ah
Abraham a dak a, a en a, ngai in, a kiang ah mi thum a na ding uhi. A muh tak in puanin kongkhak a kipan amau mu ding in a vatai a, leilam ah a kunsuk hi.
“Ka
Tui tawmchik bek honla uhenla, na khete uh sil unla, sing nuai ah khawl tadih un.

Tanghou tawmchik bek ka vala dia, na lungtang uh halhsak un. Huaikhit chiang in pai zel nani uteh. Huai ding a na sikha kiang a hongpai na hi peuhmah ding uh” a chi hi. Amau, “Na chih bang in va hih in” a chi uhi.
Abraham Sarah kiang ah puanin sung ah a lutpah a, “Tangbuang nel mahmah tehna thum bawl inla, mek inla, tanghou pei in bawl in” a chi hi.
Abraham bawnghon lam ah a tai a, bawngnou hoihtak a honla a, sikha kiang ah a pia a, aman a bawl mengmeng hi.
Nawituidat, nawitui leh bawngnou sa kibawl a la a, a ma uah a va luita hi. Sing nuai ah a kiang uah ading nilouh a, amau a neta uh.
Amau a kiang ah, “Na zi Sarah koi a om ahia?” a chi ua, “Aman pam a puanin ah” a chi hi.
Amau, “Hun a hong chin nawn peuhpeuh chiang in na kiang ah ka hong nawn ngeingei ding uh. Ngai in, na zi Sarah in tapa a nei ding” a chi hi. A nung a puanin kongkhak bul a kipan Sarah in a naza hi.
Abraham leh Sarah upapi, tektak ahita ua; numei dan ngeina Sarah ah a kamkhin thamta hi.
Sarah in tektak ka hihnung in kipahna ka nei diam maw, ka toupa lah a upata ngal a? chi’n, a lungsim in a nui hi.
ading in thil himhim haksa lua a om ahia? Hun seh a hongtun chiang in, na kiang ah ka hong nawn dia, Sarah in tapa a nei ding” a chi hi.
Sarah in, “Ka nui kei” chi’n a nial a, a lauh ziak in. Aman, “Zuau ahi; na nuitawk ve” a chi hi.
Mite huai a kipan ading ua, Sodom kholam a en ua, Abraham amau kha ding in a kiang uah a pai hi.
, “Ka thilhih ding Abraham ka im diam aw;
Abraham lah chi thupi leh thilhihtheitak a hong hingei dia, amah ah khovel a chichih vualzawl a om ding ahi.
lampi a zuih theihna ding un, a nung a a tate leh a inkuanpihte dik hih ding leh vaihawm ding thu a piak theihna ding in amah ka septa hi; huchi a a tungthu genpa
Tuin ka hohsuk dia, a kikou ging uh ka kiang a hongtung bangbang in a hih uhia, hihlou, ka en dia, ahihkei uleh ka thei mai ding,” a chi hi.
Mite huai a kipan a kihei ua, Sodom kholam a zuanta uhi. Abraham bel
Abraham in a vanaih a, “Mi diktatte, mikhialte lak a hihmang khawm tel ding na hi maw?
Khosung ah mi diktat sawmnga bek a om kha ding uh. Asung a mi diktat sawmnga omte ziak in a khua hawilou in na hihmang ding maw?

Nang tel in huchibang in, mi diktatte migiloute bang a, a om samna ding ua mi diktatte migiloute lak a hihlup zaw na hih tel kei ding hi. Lei tengteng Vaihawmpa in diktattakin ahihkei dia hia?” a chi hi.
Abraham in, “Ngai in, kei leivui leh meivu lel in
Mi diktat nga in sawmnga ching zoulou ahi kha ding a; nga a chinlouh ziak in khaw pumpi na hihmang ding maw? chi’n a dawng hi. Aman sawmli leh nga ka muh leh ka hihmang kei ding,” a chi hi.
Aman Amah a houpih zel a, “Huai ah sawmli kia na mu ahi kha dia,” a chi hi. Aman, “Sawmli ziak in leng ka hihmang dahmai ding,” a chi hi.
Aman, “
Aman, “Ngai in,
Aman, “
Abraham toh a kihou khit un
Huan, angel nih, nitaklam in Sodom khua a phasuk ua; Lot Sodom khaw kulh kongkhak ah a na tu hi. Lot in amau a na mu a, va mu ding in ading a, a mai lei ah a kunsak hi.

“Ngai un, ka toupate aw, hehpih in na sikha inn ah honglut phot unla, giak unla, na khete uh sil un. Na thoubaih ding ua, na pai nawn na ding uh” a chi hi. Himahleh amau, “Hilou e, kholak ah ka giak zaw ding uh” a chi uhi.
Himahleh aman nakpitak in a kun a; a kiang ah a pi a, a inn ah a lutta uh. Aman meh a bawl a, tanghou silngou sohlouh a kang a, a neta uhi.
A lup ma un khomite, Sodom khomite, veng teng a mi tengteng, a tek a khang in a inn a umkim velta uh.
Lot kiang ah, “Tu zan a na in a honglut mite koi a om uh ahia? Amau ka luppih theihna ding un ka kiang uah hon pikhia in” a hong chi uhi.
Lot kongkhak bul ah a kiang uah a vapawt a, kongkhak a khak hi.
“Ka unaute aw, hehpih in, hichitelin gilou dah un.

Ngai un, pasal luppih ngei nailou tanu nih ka nei hi. Hon hehpih unla, amau na kiang uah k’on pikhe dia, hoih na sak bang un, a tung uah na hih na ding uh. Hiai mite tung ah zaw bangmah hih mahmah kei un. Hiai ding a ka inn sung a honglut lah ahi ngal ua” a chi hi.

Amau, “Hon hon mai in” a chi uhi. Amau mah in, “Hiai mi soplai hiai a teng ding in a hong pem lut a, vaihawmpa a om a tup vial. Tu’n amau tung a hihsang in nang tung ah ka hihse zawsem ding uh” a chi uh. Lot a bohta ua, kongkhak hihse ding in a honnaih uhi.
Himahleh mite’n a khut uh a golhkhia ua, Lot a kiang uah inn sung ah a kailut ua, kongkhak a khak bikbek uhi.
Kongkhak bul a mite, a lian a neu in a mit uh a tawsak ua, Huchi in kongkhak a muzou takei uhi.
Mite’n, Lot kiang ah, “Hiai mite lou hiai ah inkuanpih dang na nei hia? Na makpapate, na tapate, na tanute leh khaw sung a na neih peuhmahte khua a kipan pikhia in.
ma a, a kikou husa uh a thupi luattak ziak in hiai khua hihmang ding ka hi uh. Hihmang ding in
Lot a paikhia a, a tanute kitenpih, a makpate kiang ah a vagen hi. “Thou unla, hiai khua a kipan pawtkhia un,
Phalvak in, angelte’n, “Thou inla, na zi leh hiai a na tanu nih omte pi in. Huchilou in zaw hiai khua gawtna ah na mang tel kha ding uh” chi’n, Lot a nohta uhi.
Himahleh a awltat mahmah lai a,

Hichi ahi a, pawlam a, a pikhiak khit un, “Na hinna ding in taikhia in; na nunglam nga kenla, Phaizang himhim ah leng khawl ken. Huai tangsang ah suahtak san in, huchilou in zaw na mangkhawm kha ding hi” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Lot in a kiang uah, “Ka

Ngai in, na sikha in na hehpihna a mu a, nang na chitna na liansak a, huai chitna, ka hinna humbit in ka tung ah na langsak hi. Huai tangsang ah zaw ka tai theikei ding, thil hoihlou khat in honpha in ka si kha ding hi.
Ngai in, huai khua taina ding in a naipen a, khaw neuchik leng ahi. Aw, huai ah, khaw neuchik ahi ka hia! hon taisak zaw in, Huchi in ka hing ding hi” a chi hi.
Aman, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, hiai thil tungtang ah leng k’on mang hi, na khaw gen ka hihmang dah ding.
Kin inla, huai ah tai in. Huai mun na tun mateng lah bangmah ka hihthei ngalkei hi” a chi hi. Huaiziak in, huai khaw min Zoar chih in a omta hi.
Lot Zoar khua a tun in leitung ah ni a hongsuak khinta hi.
Sodom leh Gomorrah khaw tung ah van a
Huai khuate, Phaizang tengteng, khua a mite tengteng leh leitung a thil poute tengteng a hihmang vekta hi.
Himahleh Lot zi in nunglam a enkik a chikhuam a suakta hi.
Abraham beltak in
Sodom leh Gomorrah kholam leh phaizang gam tengteng lam a en hi. Ngai in, huai gam a meikhu, halzulna meikhu bang mai in a khu tou ngoingoi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Pathian in phaizang khuate a hihmanlai in Pathian in Abraham a theigige a, Lot manthatna lak a kipan a sawlkhia hi.
Zoar khua a kipan Lot a paitou a, tang ah a teng a, a tanu nihte leng a kiang ah a teng uhi; Zoar khua ah lah a teng ngam kei a, amah leh a tanu nihte kawhawm ah a tengta uhi.
Huchi in a tanu upa zaw in a nauzaw kiang ah, “I pa a upata a, khovel tengteng dan bang a hon luppih ding lei ah pasal khat leng a om nawn kei hi.
Kisa in, i pa uain i dawnsak dia, Huchi in i pa chisuan beilou a i bawl theihna ding in a kiang ah i lum ding” a chi hi.
Huai zan in a pa uh uain a dawnsakta uh. A upa zaw a lut a, a pa kiang ah a va lum a; aman a luplam a na phawkkei a, a thohlam leng a phawk kei hi.

Hichi ahi a, a zing in a upa zaw in a naupang zaw kiang ah, “Ngai in, zan in ka pa kiang ah ka lum a; tu zan in leng uain i dawnsak nawn dia; nang va lut inla, i pa chisuan beilou a, i bawl theihna ding in a kiang ah valum sam in” a chi hi.
Huai zan in leng a pa uh uain a dawnsak nawn ua; a naupang zaw a thou a, a kiang ah a valumta hi. Aman a luplam a phawk kei a, a thohlam leng a phawk kei hi.
Huchibang in Lot tanu nihte’n a pa ua pan nau a paituak uhi.
A upa zaw in tapa a nei a, a min Moab a sa a, huai mi tulai a Moabte suangpa ahi.
A naupang zaw in leng tapa a nei a, a min Ben Ammi a sa a, huai mi tulai a Ammonte suangpa ahi.
Abraham huai a kipan simlam zuan in a kisuan a, Kadesh leh Shur khaw kikal ah a teng a, Gerar ah hun bang tan hiam a tam hi.
Abraham in a zi Sarah, “Ka sanggamnu ahi” a chi hi. Gerar kumpipa Abimelek in mi a sawl a, Sarah a va pisakta hi.
Himahleh, Pathian in zan a, a mang in Abimelek kiang ah a hongpai a, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, na numei pi ziak in misi leltak na hita, mi zi ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Abimelek in a luppih nai tadih kei hi.
Amahmah in, ka kiang ah, “Ka sanggamnu ahi,” a chi hi? Amah ngei in leng, ka sanggampa ahi, a chi behlap ngal a. Lungtang hoih tak pu leh khut siangthou tak neikawm in hiai ka hih ahi, a chi hi.
Pathian in a mang in, “Ahi, hiai lungtang hoih tak pukawm a na hih ahi, chih ka thei a, ken leng ka tung a na khelh ding k’on kham hi. Huaiziak in, amah na khoih ka phallouh ahi.
Tuin huai mi zi pekik in; amah lah zawlnei ahi ngal a. A hon thumsak dia, na dam ding. Na piak kik keileh, na si ngeingei ding, chih thei in, nang leh na neih tengteng toh” a chi hi.
Abimelek beltak in a thou a, a sikha tengteng a sam a, a bil uah huai thu tengteng a hilh a, mite’n a lau mahmah uhi.

Abimelek in Abraham a sam a, a kiang ah, “Ka tung ua na thilhih bangchidan ahia oi? Bang lam ah ahia na tung a ka khelh a, kei leh ka khua leh tuite tung a thil gilou thupitak n’on tut? Thilhih tuak louh tak ka tung ah na hihta” a chi hi.
Abimelek mah in Abraham kiang ah, “Bang na mu a, hichibang a thilhih na maizen a?” a chi nawn hi.
Abraham in, “Hiai khua ah Pathian lauhna a om hetkei ngei ding a, ka zi ziak in a honthat mai ding uh, chih ka ngaihtuah ziak ahi.
Huailou in ka sanggamnu leng ahi him a, ka pa tanu ahi a, ka nu tanu bel ahi kei. Himahleh ka zi a hong hita hi.

Hichi ahi a, Pathian in ka pa inn a kipan a hon vakvaih sak lai in, a kiang ah, ‘Hiai na hehpihna ka tung a na latsak ding ahi. Ka tunna peuh uah, ka sanggampa ahi honchi zel in’ ka chi him ahi” a chi hi.
Abimelek in belamte, bawngtalte, sikhapate leh sikhanute a pi a, Abraham kiang ah a pia a, a zi Sarah leng a pekikta hi.
Abimelek in, En in, ka gam a za akei hiam, na utna peuh ah tengin, a chi hi.
Sarah kiang ah, “En in, na sanggampa dangka sang khat ka peta hi. Ngai in, na kiang a om tengteng leh nangmah ading in amah na mit khuhna ahi ding. Hiai bang in amah taihilh in a om hi.”
Abraham Pathian kiang ah a thum a, Pathian in Abimelek leh a zi leh a sikhanute a damsak nawn a, huchi in ta a neita hi.
Abraham zi Sarah ziak in
Huan,
Sarah a gai a, Pathian in a kiang a, a gen hunseh in a tek nung in Abraham tapa a neihsakta hi.
Abraham in Sarah in a neihsak a tapa min Isak a sa hi.
Abraham in Pathian in a kiang a thu a piak bang in a tapa Isak ni giat a chin in a zek a sumsak hi.
A tapa Isak a pian lai in Abraham kum za khat a upa ahi.
Sarah in, “Pathian in hon nuisakta; a za michih in a hon nuihpih ding uh,” a chi hi.
Amahmah in, “Sarah in naungekte a pom ding, chih kuan ahia Abraham kiang a gen thei ding? A tek nung in tapa ka neihsakta” a chi hi.
Naungek a hong khangliana, nawinek a tawpsakta uh. Isak nawinek a tawpsak ni un, Abraham in Ankuang thupitak a luita hi.
Aigupta mi Hagar tapa, Abraham adia a neihsak pen in Isak a nuihsan lai Sarah in a mu hi.
Huaiziak in, Abraham kiang ah, “Hiai sikhanu leh a tapa delhkhia in. Hiai sikhanu tapa in ka tapa Isak gou a luahpih ahi theikei ding” a chi hi.
Hiai thu a tapa mah toh kisai a hih ziak in Abraham ngaih in thil hoihlou tak ahi.

Himahleh Pathian in Abraham kiang ah, “Naupang tungtang thu leh na sikhanu tungtang thu na ngaih in thil hoihlou hi kei hen. Sarah in na kiang a thu a gen tengteng zui in, Isak ah na suante a chi ding uh, chih ahi ngal a,
Sikhanu tapa ah leng, na suan a hih ziak in, chichih tham ngial ka bawl ding” a chi hi.
Abraham beltak in a thou a, tanghou leh tuithawl, tui a dim a la a, Hagar kiang a pia in, a liangkou ah a suan hi, huan naupang mah leng, a paisakta hi. A pai a, Beer–sheba gamdai ah a vak vakta hi.
Tuithawl a tui a hong omta kei a, naupang singlim nuai khat ah a koihta mai hi.
“Naupang si ding ka en ngamkei” a chih ziak in gamla kuam ah, thal kap phakna ding ah, a vapai a, a mazawn a tu in ngaihtak in a kapta hi.
Pathian in naupang aw a za a; Pathian angel in van a kipan Hagar a sam a, a kiang ah, “Bangchi na hia Hagar? Lau ken, a omna a naupang aw Pathian in a za hi.
Thou inla, naupang phong inla, na khut in len in, amah chi thupitak a bawl ding ka hi” a chi hi.
Pathian in a mit a hih vaksak a, tuileh a muta hi. Huai ah a vapai a, tuithawl dim in tui a dim a, naupang a dawnsakta hi.
Naupang kiang ah Pathian a om a, a hong khangliana; gamdai ah a teng zel a, thalkapmi a hong hita hi.
Paran gamdai ah a teng a; a nu’n Aigupta gam a kipan zi a guan hi.
Hichi ahi a, huailai in Abimelek leh a sepaih pawl heutu Phikol in Abraham kiang ah, “Na thilhih peuh ah Pathian na kiang ah a om.
Tuin hiai ah Pathian min lou inla, kei leh ka tapa leh ka tapa’ tapa leng khemlou in, k’on hehpih khittaksa bang in kei leh na tenna gam hehpih thuksam ding in ka kiang ah kichiam in” a chi hi.
Abraham in, “Ka kichiam ding” a chi hi.
Abimelek sikhate’n tuileh a suhsak ziak in Abraham in Abimelek a sal hi.
Abimelek in, “Hiai thilhih pen kua ahia, ka thei himhim kei. Nang lah n’on hilh ngalkei a, tuni ngallou in ka za nai himhim kei” a chi hi.
Abraham in belamte leh bawngtalte a pi a, Abimelek kiang ah a pia a; a nih un thu a khungta uhi.
Abraham in a belamhon lak a belamnou a nu sagih a koih tuam hi.
Abimelek in Abraham kiang ah, “Belamnou a nu sagih a tuam a na koih bang a chia ahia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hiai tuileh kei leh ahi, chih n’on theihpihna ding in hiai belamnou a nu sagih ka khut a kipan na lak ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in huai mun Beer–sheba a sa a; huai a a nih ua a kichiam ziak un.
Beer–sheba ah thu a khungta uhi. Abimelek a thou a, a sepaih pawl heutu Philok toh, Philistiate gam ah a pai nawnta uhi.
Abraham in, Beer–sheba ah meilah sing a suan a, huai ah
Abraham Philistiate gam ah sawtpi a tam hi.
Huai thilte nung in Pathian in Abraham a ze-et hi. A kiang ah, “Abraham” a chi a; aman, “Hiai ah ka om” a chi hi.
Aman, “Na tapa, na tapa neihsun, na ittak, Isak pi inla, Moriah gam ah pai inla, k’on hilh ding tang khat ah haltum thillat in lan in” a chi hi.
Abraham beltak in a thou a, sabiltung a bawl a, a kiang ah a tapa Isak toh sikha tangval nih a pi hi. Haltum thillat ading in sing a eka, a thou a, Pathian in a hilhna mun lam ah a paita hi.
A ni thum ni’n Abraham a dak a, amun gamlapi hilai in a mu hi.
Abraham in a sikha tangvalte kiang ah, “Hiai ah sabiltung toh a na om un. Kei leh naupang huai pam ah ka va hoh ding ua; Pathian ka va be ding ua; na kiang uah ka hong kiknawn ding uh” a chi hi.
Abraham in haltum thillatna ding sing a la a, a tapa Isak a pawsak hi. Aman mei leh temta a tawi a; a nih un a paikhawmta uhi.
Isak in a pa Abraham a houpih a, “Pa” a chi a, aman, “Bawi, hiai ah ka om” a chi hi. Aman “En dih, mei leh sing a om a; hileleng haltum thillat ding belamnou lah koi ah?” a chi hi.
Abraham in, “Bawi, Pathian in amah ading haltum thillat ding belamnou a ngaihtuah tawm ding hi” a chi a; a nih un a paikhawm zel uhi.
Pathian in a hilhna mun a va tungta ua, Abraham in huai ah maitam a doh a, sing a chiangkhawm a, a tapa Isak a hen a, maitam a sing tung ah a lumsak hi.
Abraham in a khut a lik a, a tapa thahna ding temta a la hi.
angel in van a kipan amah a sam a, “Abraham, Abraham” a chi a, aman, “Hiai ah ka om” a chi hi.
Aman, “Naupang tung ah na khut kha ken. Amah bangmah loh ken. Na tapa, na neihsun mahmah leng kei adia na it louh ziak in Pathian na lau, chih tuin ka theita” a chi hi.
Abraham a dak a, a en a, ngai in, a nunglam ah belampa a ki a singbawka awk a na om hi. Abraham in huai belampa a va man a, a tapa sik in haltum thillat in a lan zawta hi.
Abraham in huai mun min, “Jehovah Jire” a sa hi; tuni tan a “
“Hiai thil na hih ziak leh na ta neihsun na it louh ziak in keimah in ka kichiam hi.
K’on vualzawl ngeingei dia, van a aksite zah leh tuipi piau a piaunel zah in na suante ka pungsak ngeingei ding. Na suante’n a doute uh kulh kongkhak a nei ding uhi.
Ka thu na man ziak in na suan ah khovel a chichih vualzawl in a om ding uh” a chi hi.
Abraham a sikha tangvalte kiang ah a kiknawn a, a thou ua, Beer–sheba lam manoh in a pai uh. Abraham Beer–sheba ah a teng hi.
Hichi in, huai thilte nung in, Abraham kiang ah, “Ngai in, Milkah in leng na nau Nahor tate a neih sakta ve,” chi in Abraham a hilh uhi.
A ta masa Huz ahi a; a nau Buz ahi a, Aram pa Kemuel;
Chesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaph leh Bethuel leng ahi uh”
Bethuel in tanu Rebekah a nei a; huai giatte Milkah in Abraham nau Nahor a neihsak ahi uh.
A mei, a min Reumah in leng Tebah, Gaham, Thahash leh Makah a nei hi.
Sarah damsung kum za leh sawmnih leh sagih ahi. Hiaite Sarah damsung kumte ahi uh.
Sarah Kanan gam a Kiriath Arba, Hebron kichi khua ah a si a Sarah tung a awm kitum ding leh kap ding in Abraham a hong hi.
Abraham a misi luang ma a kipan a dingtou a, Heth suante kiang ah,
“Na lak uah mikhual leh khualtam lel ka hi a; ka misi luang mulou dia ka vui theihna ding in vuina mun honpia un” chi in a ngen hi.
Heth suante’n Abraham a dawng ua, a kiang ah,

“Ka toupa, hon ngaikhia in, nang ka lak ua kumpi thupitak na hi a; ka hante uh lak a na deihna penpen ah na misi vui in. Na misi na vuina ding in ka lak uah kuamah in ka han uh honpiak ka itkei ding uh” a chi uhi.
Abraham huai gammite leh Heth suante ma ah a dingtou in a kun hi.
“Ka misi ka muhlouh dia ka vui pha nasak uleh, hon ngaikhia unla, Zohar tapa Ephron kiang ah hon ngetsak un.
A lou taw a om, a neih, Makpelah kawkhuk honpe ding in, na lak ua vuina mun ding aman hun a sak zahzah la henla, honpia hen” a chi hi.
Heth suante lak ah Ephron a teng a; Heth mi Ephron in Heth suante theih in, a khaw kulh kong a lut peuhmah nangawn theih in.
“Hilou e, ka toupa, hon ngaikhia in. Lou leh asung a om kawkhuk leng k’on pia hi. Ka chipihte tate mitmuh in ka honpia hi. Na misi vui in” chi’n, Abraham a dawng hi.
Abraham huai gammite ma ah a kun hi.
Huai gammite theih in Ephron kiang ah, “Pha nasak leh hehpih in hon ngaikhia in; lou man k’on pe ding, kei a kipan la in, huai mun kia ah ka misi ka vui ding” a chi hi.
Ephron in Abraham a dawng a, a kiang ah,
“Ka toupa, hon ngaikhia in. Leimun dangka sekel za li ahi a, huai zaw, nang leh kei ading in gentham ahi ahia? Na misi vui mai in” a chi hi.
Abraham in Ephron thu a zuita a; Heth suante theih in Ephron in a genzah, dangka sekel za li, sumsinte zat zel a buk a, Ephron kiang ah a peta hi.
Ephron lou, Mamre toh kizawn Makpel gam a om, a lou toh, asung a kawkhuk om toh, lou a sing om tengteng toh, a loukim a sing om tengteng toh,
Heth suante mitmuh in, a khaw kulhkong a om peuhmahte muh in, gou ding in Abraham kiang ah piak kip in a omta hi.
Huai nung in Abraham in a zi Sarah Kanan gam a Mamre toh kizawn, Hebron kichihna, Makpelah lou a kawkhuk ah a vuita hi.
Lou leh asung a kawkhuk om vuina mun ding in Abraham kiang ah Heth suante’n a pekipta uhi.
Abraham hong upata in a hongtek mahmahta hi.
Abraham in a sikha, a inn a upapen, a neih tengteng tung a thuneipa kiang ah, “Hehpih in na khut ka pheipi nuai ah golh in.
, van Pathian leh lei Pathian lou in, ka tenna Kanan mite nungak lak a mi ka tapa zi dia neihsak lou ding in, k’on kichiam sak ding.
Ka gam lam a ka tanaute kiang ah hoh inla, ka tapa Isak zi na neihsak ding ahi” a chi hi.
Sikha in a kiang ah, “Numei in hiai gam lam ah honzui nuam keileh, na tapa na hongpawtna gam a pi kiknawn ding ka diam?” a chi hi.
Abraham in a kiang ah, “Ka tapa huai a pikik nawnlou ding in pilvang in.

van Pathian, ka pa inn a kipan leh ka pianna gam a kipan hon pikhepa leh hon houpihpa leh, hiai gam na suante kiang ah ka pe ding, chi a, ka kiang a kichiampa’n, amah ngei in a angel na ma ah a paisak dia, huai a kipan ka tapa zi na neisak ding ahi.
Numei in a honzuih nopkei leh, ka kiang a na kichiamna thu ah na siang ding. Abang abang hita leh, ka tapa huai ah na pikik nawn ding ahi kei” a chi hi.
Sikha in a khut a pu Abraham pheipi nuai ah a golh a, huai thu ah a kiang ah a kichiamta hi.
Sikha in a pu sangawngsau lak ah sangawngsau sawm a kai a, a pu thil hoih chiteng tawi in, a pawtta hi. A thou a, Mesopotamia gam a Nahor khua ah a hohta hi.
Nitaklam a numeite tuitawi dia a kuan hunlaitakin, dainawl a tuileh kiang ah a sangawngsaute a khukdin sak hi.
“Aw
En in, tuikhuk kiang ah ka ding a, khua a mite tanute tuitawi ding in a hong kuan uh.

Hichi hi hen, nungak kuapeuh kiang a, hehpih in ka dawn ding in na tuibel niamsak dihve, ka chih a, aman, dawn in, na sangawngsaute leng dawn ding ka pe ding, chi peuhmah, huai mi ngei na sikha Isak zi dia na mi seh hi hen. Hiai ah ka pu tung ah hehpihna na lang sak, chih ka thei ding” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, a genkhit ma in, ngai in, Abraham nau Nahor zi Milkah tapa Bethuel tanu Rebekah tuibel a liangzang a pua in a hong kuan hi.
Huai nungak a mel a hoih mahmah a, nungak siangthou ahi a, pasal in a luppih ngeikei hi. Tuikhuk ah a paisuk a, a tuibel a dimsak a, a paitou nawn hi.
Sikha amah tuak ding in a tai a, “Hehpih in na tuibel a tui tawmchik hon dawnsak ve” a chi hi.
Aman, “Dawn ve, ka toupa” a chi a; kintak in a tuibel a khut in a dom khesuk a, a dawnsak hi.
A dawn nung in, “Na sangawngsaute ading leng a dawnkham masiah uh ka tawi ding” a chi hi.
Kintak in a tuibel gankuang ah a tei a, tuitawi ding in tuileh lam ah a tai nawn a, a sangawngsau tengteng ading leng a tawi hi.
Sikha in a lohchingsak leh saklouh theihna ding in a daidide hi.
Hichi ahi a, sangawngsaute’n a dawnkham tak un, sikha in dangkaeng bilbah sekel kimkhat a gik leh a khut ading dangkaeng tau nih sekel sawm a gik a suah khia hi.
A kiang ah, “Kua tanu na hia? Hehpih in honhilh in. Na pa inn ah ka giahna ding uh mun a om diam?” a chi hi.
Aman, a kiang ah, “Bethuel, Milkah tapa, Nahor adia a neihsaknu tanu ka hi” a chi hi.
Amahmah in, a kiang ah, “Buhpawl leh gan an ka hau tuak uhi, giahna mun leng ka nei uh” a chi hi.
Sikha in a lu a kunsak a,
“Ka pu tung a a hehpihna leh a thutakna tawp tuanlou,
Nungak a tai a, huai thute a nu inkuanpihte a va hilh hi.
Rebekah in sanggam pasal a nei a, a min Laban ahi. Laban a pawt a, tuikhuk lam ah huai mi kiang ah a va taita hi.

Hichi ahi a, bilbah leh a sanggamnu khut a taute a mu a, huai mi’n, “Huchi kha chi in honchi” chi a, a sanggamnu Rebekah thugente a zaktak in, huai mi kiang ah a hohta hi. Ngai in, amah tuikhuk ah sangawngsaute kiang ah a na ding gige hi.
Laban in, “Nang,
Huan inn ah a lut a, Laban in sangawngsau van a phela; sangawngsaute ading in buhpawl leh gan an a pia a, a khe leh a lawmte khesilna ding tui a pia hi.
Abraham sikha ma ah nekding a lui a; himahleh, aman, “Ka hong nasan thu ka gen mateng ka ne kei ding,” a chi hi. Aman, “Gen ve,” a chi hi.
“Aman, “Abraham sikha ka hi.
ka pu nakpitak in a vualzawl a, mi liantak a hong hita.
Ku pu zi Sarah in tek nung in ka pu ading in tapa a nei a; amah kiang ah a neih tengteng a pe vek hi.
Ka pu in, ka tenna gam a Kanante nungak lak a ka tapa zi ding a na neihsak ding ahi kei.
Ka pa inn lam ah, ka tanaute kiang ah hoh inla, ka tapa zi na neisak zaw ding ahi, chi’n, a hon kichiam sak hi.
Ken ka pu kiang ah, Numei in honzui nuam kei kha ding,” ka chi hi.
Aman, ka kiang ah, “
Ka tanaute kiang ngei na tun chiang in, ka kiang a na kichiamna a kipan na siang ding. Nungak a honpiak kei uleh ka kiang a na kichiamna a kipan na siang ding” a chi hi.
“Tuni in tuikhuk ka hongtung a, ‘Aw,
Hichi hi hen, nungak tuitawi dia hong kuan, kuapeuh kiang a, hehpih in dawn ding na tuibel a tui tawmchik honpia in, ka chih a;
aman ka kiang a, dawn in, na sangawngsaute ading leng ka tawi ding, chi peuhmah, huai mi ngeingei ka pu tapa adia
Ka lungsim a ka gen khitma in, ngai in, Rebekah, a tuibel pua in a hong kuan a; tuikhuk ah a paisuk a; tui a tawi a; a kiang ah, ‘hehpih in tui hon dawnsak ve’ ka chi hi.
Aman kintak in a liangzang a kipan tuibel a domkhia a, ‘dawnin, na sangawngsaute leng dawn ding ka pe ding,’ a chi hi. Ka dawn a, sangawngsaute leng a dawnsak hi.
Ken, ‘kua tanu na hia?’ chi’n ka dong a; aman ‘Nahor tapa, Milkah in a neih sakpa Bethuel tanu ka hi’ a chi hi. Bilbah a bil ah ka batsak a, taute leng a khut ah ka bunsak hi.
Ka lu ka kunsak a,
Tuin ka pu na hehpih ua, a tung a chihtak pet a na hih ding uleh honhilh un. Na hih kei ding uleh leng honhilh un. Taklam hiam, veilam hiam, ka nga thei ding” a chi hi.
Laban leh Bethuel in a dawng ua, “Hiai thil
En in, ‘Rebekah na ma ah a om hi, pi inla, pai in’
Hichi ahi a, Abraham sikha in a thu uh a zaktak in leisi in
Abraham sikha in dangka suang kizepnate, dangkaeng kizepnate leh silhlehten a lakhia a, Rebekah a pia a; a sanggampa leh a nu kiang ah leng thil manpha pipi a pia hi.
Amah leh a lawmte’n ne in a dawn ua, a giakta uh. Zingsang in a thou ua, “Ka pu kiang ah hon paisakta un,” a chi hi.
A sanggampa leh a nu’n, “Nungak ni sawtlou chik, ni sawm lel bek, ka kiang uah omtadih hen. Huaikhit in a hongpai na ding,” a chi uhi.
Aman, a kiang uah, “Hon zekaisak kei dih ua,
Amau, “Nungak ka sam ding ua, amah kam mahmah kihoupih leh” a chi uh.
Rebekah a sam ua a kiang ah, “Hiai mipa kiang ah na pai nuam maw?” a chi uh. Aman, “Pai nuam ve ning e” a chi hi.
A sanggamnu uh Rebekah leh a donnu leh Abraham sikha leh a mite a paita uhi.
Rebekah a vualzawl ua, a kiang ah,
“Ka sanggamnu uh aw, nang,
sing ngenta sang tampite nu
honghi in!
Na suante’n amau
hawte kulh kongkhak
neihsak uhen!” a chi uhi.
Rebekah a thou a, a sikhanute toh sangawngsaute tung ah a tuang ua, huai mi a zuita uhi. Abraham sikha in Rebekah a pi a, a paita uhi.
Huan Beer Lahai-roi dil lam a kipan Isak a hong a, sim gam a teng ahi.
Isak nitaklam in pawn ah kingaihtuah ding in a pawtkhia hi. A dak a, a en a, ngai in, sangawngsau hongpaite a mu hi.
Rebekah a dak a, Isak a muhtak in sangawngsau tung a kipan a kum hi.
Abraham sikha kiang ah, “Pawn a hondawn dia hongpai kua ahia?” a chi a; sikha in, “Ka pu ahi” a chi hi. A kikhuhna puan a la a, a kikhuhta hi.
Sikha in a thilhih tengteng Isak a hilh hi.
Isak in Rebekah a nu Sarah puanin ah a pilut a, Rebekah a la a, a zi a hong hita hi. Amah a it a, a nu sihnungin Isak a hong lungmuangta hi.
Huan, Abraham in zi dang a nei nawn a, a min Keturah ahi.
Aman Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak leh Shuah a neihsak hi.
Jokshan in tapa Sheba leh Dedan a nei a, Dedan tapate Ashurim leh Letushim leh Leummim ahi uh.
Midian tapate Ephah, Epher, Hanok, Abidah leh Eldah ahi uh. Huai tengteng Keturah tate ahi uhi.
Abraham in a neih tengteng Isak a pia hi.
A mei tapate kiang ah Abraham in thilpiakte a pia a; amah damlai ngei in a tapa Isak a kipan amaute suahlam gam ah a sawlmang hi.
Abraham damsung kum za leh sawmsagih leh nga ahi.
Abraham in a kha a khahta hi. Lu a kelsam pouvek in tekpi tekkun a dam in a si a, a chipihte kiang a pi in a omta hi.
A tapa Isak leh Ishmael in Hit mi Zohar tapa Ephron lou a, Mamre phak ma a Makpel kawkhuk ah a vuita uh.
Huai lou, Abraham in Hit suante apan a leisa ahi a, huai ah Abraham leh a zi Sarah a vui uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Abraham sih nung in, Pathian in a tapa Isak a vualzawl a; Isak Beer-lahai-roi ah a teng hi.
Hiaite Abraham tapa Ishmael, Sarah sikhanu, Aigupta mi Hagar in Abraham a neihsak suante ahi uh.
Hiaite a min chiat uleh a suante uh bangzel in Ishmael tapate min ahi. Ishmael tapa upapen Nebajoth ahi a, huai ban ah Kedar, Adbeel leh Mibsam,
Misma, Dumah leh Massa,
Hadar, Tema, Jetur, Naphish leh Kedemah ahi uh.
Huaite Ishmael tapate ahi ua, huaite a khua uh bang leh a giahphual uh bangzel a a min uh gelh ahi a, a chi uh bangzel in kumpipa sawmlehnih ahi uhi.
Ishmael damsung kum za leh sawmthum leh sagih ahi a; a kha a khah a, a si a, a chipihte kiang ah pi in a omta hi.
A tapate Havilah gam a kipan Assuria gam lamsang a Aigupta gam phakma a Shur tan in a teng ua, a unau dangteng a kipan a tuamten uhi.
Hiaite Abraham tapa Isak suante ahi uh: Abraham in tapa Isak a nei a.
Isak in Padan-aram gam a Suria mi Bethuel tanu, Suria mi Laban sanggamnu Rebekah zi a, a neihlai in kum sawmli a upa ahi.
A zi a chiin ziak in Isak in
Asung a a nau paite a kisual uhi; aman, “Hichibang a hih ngal leh, bangziak in ahia, ka hi chih?” a chi a;
“Na sul ah nam nih a om uh.
Na gil sung a kipan nam nih
a kikhen ding ua,
Nam khat nam khat sang in a hat zaw ding.
A upa zaw in a naupang zaw
nna a sem ding” a chi hi.
A nau neih a hun in, ngai in, a sul ah phik a om hi.
Amasa zaw a san a san seksawk, puanmul bang a mul thiapthuap a hongpawt a, a min Esau a sa uh.
Huai nung in a nau a pawt nawn a, a khut in Esau khetul a lenkip a; amah min Jakob a sa uh. Rebekah in amaute a neihlai in Isak kum sawmguk a upa ahi.
Naupangte a hong khanglian ua; Esau sabetsiam, gamvakmi ahi a; Jakob mi mawl, puanin a teng mi ahi.
Isak in a sakhi sa a nek zel ziak in Esau a it a; Rebekah in bel Jakob a it hi.
Jakob in be a huan a; Esau gamkuan a hongtung a, a tawl mahmah hi.
Esau in Jakob kiang ah, “Hehpih in na be huan hon nesakin; ka bah mahmah hi” a chi hi. Huaiziak in ahi, a min Edom a chih uh.
Jakob in, “Na tamasa hihna hon leisak phot lechin” a chi hi.
Esau in, “Ngai in, si dek ka hi ngal a; hiai tamasa hihna kei ading in bang a phatuam dia?” a chi hi.
Jakob in, “Tuni in ka kiang ah kichiam phot in” a chi hi. A kiang ah a kichiam a, a tamasa hihna Jakob kiang ah a khong maimah hi.
Jakob in Esau tanghou leh a be huan a pia a; aman ne in a dawn a, a thou a, a paita hi. Huchibang in Esau in a tamasa hihna a ngaineu hi.
Huan, huai gam ah, Abraham damlai a kial ke masapen chih louh, kial a hong kenawn a, Isak Philistiate kumpipa Abimelek kiang ah Gerar khua ah a va hohsuk hi.
a kiang ah a hong kilak a, “Aigupta gam ah hohsuk ken. K’on hilh ding gam ah teng in.
Hiai gam ah omtadih inla, na kiang ah ka om dia, k’on vualzawl ding hi. Hiai gam tengteng nang kiang leh na suante kiang a pia in, na pa Abraham kiang a ka kichiamna ka hihkip ding hi.
Van a aksi zah in na suante ka pungsak dia, hiai gam tengteng na suante kiang ah ka pelai ding hi. Na suan ah khovel a nam tengteng vualzawl in a om ding uh.
Abraham in ka thu a mang a, ka thuhilhte, Ka thupiakte, ka thusehte leh ka dante a zuih ziak in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Isak Gerar khua ah a teng hi.
Huai khua a mite’n a zi tungtang a dong ua; aman, “Ka sanggamnu ahi, a chi hi. A mel a hoih ziak in hiai khua a mite’n Rebekah ziak in a honthat kha ding uh” chi’n, ‘ka zi ahi’ a chi ngamkei hi.
Hichi a, huai a sawtpi a om nung in, Philistiate kumpipa Abimelek in tohlet a kipan a en a, ngai in, Isak in a zi Rebekah a thohlai a muta hi.
Abimelek in Isak a sam a, “Ngai in, na zi a hina hi. Bangdia, ka sanggamnu ahi, chi maimah na hia?” a chi hi. Isak in a kiang ah, “Amah ziak in ka si kha ding, ka chih ziak ahi” a chi hi.
Abimelek in, “Ka tung ua na thilhih bangchidan ahia? Mite lak a mi kuapeuh in na zi luppih kha thei uh a kei maw, ka tung uah siamlouhna n’on tungsak ding” a chi hi.
Abimelek mah in, “Kuapeuh hiai mi hiam, a zi hiam, khoih, hihlup ngeingei ding ahi” chi’n mi tengteng thu a pia hi.
Isak in huai gam ah buh a ching a, huai kum in a leh za a nei hi.
A hong thupi mahmah a, nakpitak a mi thupi hongsuak hial in a honglian huaihuai hi.
Belamhon leh bawnghon a nei a, inkuan leng tampi a nei hi. Philistiate’n amah a haza uhi.
A pa Abraham damlai a, a pa sikhate’n tuileh a toh tengteng uh Philistiate’n a hudim ua, lei in a hihdim vekta uhi.
Abimelek in Isak kiang ah, “Ka kiang ua kipan paimang in, kou sang in lah na hatzaw ngal a” a chi hi.
Isak huai a kipan a pawt a, Gerar guam ah a puanin a kai a, huai ah a tengta hi.
Isak in a pa Abraham damlai a tuileh a tohte uh a tou nawn a; Abraham sih nung in Philistiate’n lah a na hudim vek ngal ua. A pa’n a min a na sak bangbang in a min a sa chiat hi.
Isak sikhate’n guam ah a tou ua, huai ah tuileh naknei a mu uhi.
Gerar khua a ganpute’n, “Kou tui ahi,” chi’n Isak ganpute toh a kisel uh. Amah toh a kisel ziak un tuileh min Esek a sata hi.
Tuileh dang a tou nawn ua; huai leng tuh tum in a kisel pih nawn ua; a min Sitnah a sa hi.
Huai a kipan a kisuan a, tuileh dang a tou nawn hi. Huai tuh tum in a subuai nawn kei uhi. Tuin, “
Huai a kipan Beer–sheba ah a hohtou hi.
Huai zan mah in
Huai mun ah maitam a doh a,
Gerar khua a kipan Abimelek, a lawm Ahuzaath toh, sepaih pawl heutu Phikol toh, a kiang ah a hoh uhi.
Isak in a kiang ah, “N’on ngaikei ua, na kiang ua pan n’on paimangsak ngal ua, bangchidan in ahia ka kiang a na hong uh?” a chi hi.
Amau, “
Na zakdah ka hih ngeilouh bang ua, thil hoih kia loungal na tung himhim a ka hihlouh ua, hoihtak a k’on paimangsak bang un, nang leng ka siatna ding himhim uh na hihlouhna ding in. Tuin nang
Huan amau ading in Ankuang a luisak a, ne in a dawn uhi.
Zingsang in beltak in a thou ua, a kichiam tuah uhi. Isak in amau a paisak a, a kiang a kipan hoihtak in a pawtta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, huai ni mah in Isak sikhate a hong ua, tuileh toh thu a honghilh ua, a kiang ah, “Tui ka muta uh” a chi uh.
Aman huai tuileh Sheba a sa hi. Huaiziak in huai khaw min tutan in Beer–sheba ahi lai hi.
Esau kum sawmli a upa a hih in, Hit mi Beeri tanu Judith leh Hit mi Elon tanu Basemath zi in a nei hi.
Huaite Isak leh Rebekah lungtang hih gentheite ahi uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Isak a hongtek a, khua mutheilou khop in a mit a hong mialta hi. A tapa upazaw Esau a sam a, a kiang ah, “Ka tapa” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Hiai ah ka om” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ngai in, ka tek mahmahta a, ka sih ni ding lah ka theikei hi.
Tuin hehpih in na vanzat, na thaltang leh na thalpeu tawi inla, va gamvak inla, sakhi hon va matsak in.
Ka sih ma a k’on vualzawl theihna ding in, ka deihlam tak in meh ding in limtakin hon bawlsak inla, ka nek ding in ka kiang ah hontawi in” a chi hi.
Isak in a tapa Esau a houpih lai Rebekah in a naza hi. Esau sakhi benga honpaw ding in a gamvakta hi.
Rebekah in a tapa Jakob kiang ah, “Ngai in, na pa’n na u Esau kiang a a thugen ka za hi.
Sakhi honpuak in, ka nek a, ka sih ma a
“Ka tapa, tuin k’on thupiak bang in ka thu zui in.
Ganhon lak ah va hoh inla, kelnou nih hoih tak, huai a kipan honla in. Huai a deihlam tak in na pa ading in meh limtakin ka na bawl ding.
A sih ma a hon vualzawlsak ding in, a nek ding in na pa kiang ah na va paipih ding ahi” a chi hi.
Jakob in a nu Rebekah kiang ah, “Ngai in, ka u Esau mi mulhau ahi a, kei mi nel ka hi
Ka pa’n a hon na zawt vialvial kha ding a, amah ading in khempa ka honghi ding a, vualzawl gentak louh hamsiat kizon lel ka hi kei ding maw” a chi hi.
A nu’n, a kiang ah, “Ka tapa, na hamsiat muh ding ka tung ah om hen. Ka thu zui inla, hon valak in” a chi hi.
A kuan a, a va la a, a nu kiang ah a hon paipih hi. A nu’n a pa deihlam tak in meh limtakin a bawl hi.
Rebekah in a tapa upapen Esau puansilh hoihtak, a kiang a inn a om a la a, a tapa naupang zaw Jakob a silhsak hi.
Huaiban ah kelnou vun leng a khut leh a ngawng nelna mun ah a phah hi.
Mehlim tak leh tanghou a bawlte a tapa Jakob khut ah a pia hi.
Amah a pa kiang ah a hoh a, “Pa aw” a chi a; aman, “Hiai ah ka om, ka tapa, kua zaw pen na hia?” a chi hi.
Jakob in, a pa kiang ah, “Na tapa upa zaw Esau ka hi; n’on sawl bang in ka hihkhinta. Hehpih in thou inla, hon vualzawl ding in tu inla, ka sakhi sa ne in” a chi hi.
Isak in, a tapa kiang ah, “Ka tapa, bangchidan ahia, hong man gang na tel chia?” a chi hi.
Isak in Jakob kiang ah, “Ka tapa, hehpih in hongnai dih, k’on zawt vialvial ding, ka tapa Esau na hina hiam” a chi hi.
Jakob in a pa Isak a va naih a; aman a na zawt vialvial a, “A aw Jakob aw hiven, a khutte lah Esau khutte hiven” a chi hi.
A u Esau khut bang a, a khut a mul ziak in amah a theikei hi. Huchi in amah a vualzawlta hi.
“Ka tapa Esau ngei na hi maw?” a chi a; aman, “Hi e” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hontawi nai in, k’on vualzawlna ding in ka tapa sakhi sa ka ne ding” a chi hi. A hontawi nai a, a neta a, uain leng a honla a, huai leng a dawn hi.
A pa Isak in a kiang ah, “Ka tapa, hongnai in, hontawp in” a chi hi.
A vanaih a, a tawp a, aman a puansilh gim a za a, a vualzawl hi.
“En in, ka tapa gim
vualzawl gam gim bang ahi.
Pathian in van daitui,
lei hoihna, buh tampi leh uain
tampi honpia hen.
Nam tuamtuamte’n na nna
sem uhenla, chi tuamtuamte na ma ah kun uhen.
Na unaute tung ah toupa in om inla;
na nu tate na ma ah kun uhen.
Hon hamsiatte hamsiat in om uhenla,
hon vualzawl peuhmah
vualzawl in om hen” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Isak in Jakob a vualzawl zohtakin, Jakob a pa Isak kiang a kipan a pawtkhe manlel in a unaupa, Esau sabeng a hongtung hi.
Aman leng mehlimtakin a bawl a, a pa kiang ah, “Pa, thou inla, n’on vualzawlna ding in na tapa sakhisa ne in” a chi hi.
A pa Isak in, a kiang ah, “Kua na hia?” a chi a; aman, “Na tapa, na tapa upa zaw, Esau ka hi” a chi hi.
Isak nakpi’n a ling zungzung a, “Sakhi man a, ka kiang a, a sa hontawi, na hong tunma a, ka na nekkhit a, ka vualzawlpa kua ahia? Ahi, amah vualzawl in a om ding” a chi hi.
Esau in a pa thugen a zak in nakpitak leh khase mahmah in a kapta a, a pa kiang ah, “Pa aw, hon vualzawl in, keileng hon vualzawl mahmah ve aw” a chi hi.
Aman, “Na nau in a hong zekhem a, na vualzawlnate a hong laksakta hi” a chi hi.

Aman, “A min Jakob a chih uh dik mahmah hilou hia? Nihvei a hon suanta; ka tamasa hihna a hon laksak a; ngai in, tuin ka vualzawlna a hon laksak nawnta” a chi hi. Amahmah in, “Vualzawlna kei adia honsit saklou maw?” a chi hi.

Isak in a dawng a, Esau kiang ah, “Ngai in, amah na kumpipa in ka bawl a, a unau tengteng leng a sikha ding in ka pevek a, buh leh uain in leng ka vakta hi, nang ading in, ka tapa, bang hon hihsak ding ka hia?” a chi hi.
Esau in, a pa kiang ah, “Pa, Vualzawlna khat kia lel leng neilou na maw? Pa aw, keileng hon vualzawl mahmah ve” a chi hi.
Esau ngaihtak in a kapta a, A pa Isak in a dawng a, a kiang ah,
“Ngai in, na tenna ding lei hoihna tak,
tunglam a kipan van daitui
kiakna mun ahi ding.
Na namsau in ahi,
na hin ding, na nau nna
leng nasem ding.
Hichi ahi ding a,
na kitutkhiak hun chiang in a hakkol na ngawng a kipan na singkheta ding” a chi hi.
A pa’n Jakob a vualzawl ziak in Esau in a mudah hi. Esau in a lungsim in, “Ka pa sun ni ding a naita a, huaikhit chiang in ka nau Jakob ka that mai ding” a chi hi.
A tapa upa zaw Esau thugen Rebekah a hilh ua; mi a sawl a, a tapa naupang zaw Jakob a sam a, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, na u Esau in na tungthu ah, nangmah honthah tum in a ki khamuan hi.
huaiziak in, ka tapa, tuin ka thu mang in. Thou inla, Haran khua a ka sanggampa Laban kiang ah taimang in.
Na u hehna a daih mateng a kiang ah ni bangzah hiam va om phot in.

Na u hehna na tung a a daih a, a tung a na thilhih a mangngilh ma teng. A daih a, a mangngilh chiang in mi k’on sawl dia, huai a kipan ka hong pikhe sak ding. Bangdia ni khat a na nih ua hon tan ding ka hia?” a chi hi.

Rebekah in Isak kiang ah, “Hit tanute ziak in hin ka chimtak mahmah hi. Jakob in hiai gam nungak, hiai Heth tanute lak a mi zi dia a neihnawn ngial in zaw, kei ading in hin bang a phatuam dia?” a chi hi.
