Huan, Isak in Jakob a sam a, a vualzawl a, thu leng a pia a, a kiang ah, “Kanan gam nungakte lak a mi zi in na nei ding ahi kei.
Thou inla, Padan-aram gam a na nu pa Bethuel inn ah hoh inla, huai a kipan na nu sanggam pa Laban tanute lak a mi zi in va nei in.
Pathian bangkim hihthei in hon vualzawl in, mipi tampite na hong hih theihna ding in chi tampi hon suangsak in, hon pungsak hen.
Mikhual na hihna gam, Pathian in Abraham kiang a a piak na luah na ding in Abraham vualzawlna leng hon tangsak hen, nang leh na suante leng” a chi hi.
Isak in Jakob a paimangsak a; Padan-aram gam a, Jakob leh Esau nu Rebekah sanggampa Suria mi Bethuel tapa, Laban kiang ah a paita hi.
Esau in, Isak in Jakob a vualzawl a, zi nei ding in Padan-aram gam ah a paimang sak, chih leh a vualzawl lai a, Kanan gam nungakte lak a mi zi in na nei ding ahi kei,
chi’n thu a pia chih leh Jakob in a nu leh a pa thumang in Padan-aram gam ah a paita chih a thei hi.
Esau in Kanan gam nungakte’n a pa Isak lung a hihkim kei uh chih a thei hi.
Esau Ishmael kiang ah a va hoh a, Abraham tapa Ishmael tanu Mahalath, Nebajoth sanggamnu, zi in a nei a, zi a neihsate ban ah a neih behlap ahi.
Jakob Beer–sheba a kipan a pawt a, Haran kholam a zuanta hi.
Koilai mun hiam a tung a, ni a tumkhit ziak in huai ah a giakta hi. Huai a suang khat a la a; lukham in a nei a, huai ah ihmu ding in a lumta hi.
Mang a nei a, ngai in, leitung ah lei a hong kidoh a, a dawn in van a sun hi. Ngai in, a tung ah Pathian angelte kahtou in a kumsuk uhi.
Ngai in, a dawn ah
Na suante lei a leivui zah ahi ding ua, tumlam, suahlam, mallam leh simlam ah na dalhzak ding uh. Nang ah leh na suan ah khovel a namchih vualzawl in a om ding uh.
Ngai in, na kiang ah ka om a, na paina peuh ah k’on veng dia, hiai gam ah k’on pi kiknawn ding. Na kiang a ka gen ka hih masak keileh k’on nuse kei ding” a chi hi.
Jakob ihmu a hong khanglou a, “Hiai mun ah
A lau a, “Hiai mun lauhuai na mah e! Hiai mun dang hilou in, Pathian inn na hi eive, hiai van kongpi na hi eive” a chi hi.
Jakob zingkhang in a thou a, a suang lukham a la a, suangphuh in a phut a, a dawn ah sathau a buak hi.
Huai mun min Bethel a sa a; a khaw min bel a tung in Luz ahi.
Jakob in, “Pathian ka kiang a om a, ka paina lampi a a hon ven a, nekding tanghou leh silh ding puansilh
Ka pa inn a lungmuangtak a ka hongpai nawn leh
Hiai suang ka phuh leng Pathian inn ahi dia; ka kiang a na honpiak ding tengteng a sawm a khat k’on pe ngeingei ding,” chi in a kichiamta hi.
Huai nung in Jakob a pai zel a, suahlam tate gam a tungta hi.
A et leh ngai in, pawn ah tuileh a na om a, a kiang ah belamhon thum a kual uh. Huai tuileh a kipan belamhonte tui a dawnsak uhi. Tuileh kong a suang om a lian mahmah hi.
Huai ah belamhon tengteng a paikhawm ua; tuileh kong a kipan suang a khuksuan ua, suang tuileh kong a, a omna ngei ah a koih uhi.
Jakob in a kiang uah, “Ka unaute aw, koilam mi na hi ua?” a chi hi.
Amau, “Haran khaw mi ka hi uh,” a chi uh.
Aman a kiang uah, “Nahor tapa Laban na thei uhia?” a chi a; amau,
“Thei e” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Damlai a hina maw?” a chi a;
amau, “Damlai mah uh, En in, a tanu, Rakil leng belamte pii ding in a hong kuan” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Ngai un, ni a sanglai mahmah hi, gan pikhawm leng a hun naikei. Belamte tui dawnsak unla, va khah un” a chi hi.
Amau, “Ka hih theikei ding uh, belamhon tengteng a pikhawm ua, tuileh kong a kipan suang a khuksuan mateng uh. Huaikhit chiang in belamte tui ka dawnsak zel uhi” a chi uhi.
Amau a houpih lai in Rakil a pa belamte toh a hongtung a; aman huai belamte a chin zel ahi.
Hichi ahi a, Jakob in a nu sanggampa Laban tanu Rakil leh a nu sanggampa Laban belamhon a muh in a va naih a, tuileh kong a kipan suang a khuksuan a, a nu sanggampa belamte tui a dawnsak hi.
Jakob in Rakil a tawp a, ngaihtak in a kapta hi.
Jakob in, “A pa tanau leh Rebekah tapa ahi” chih Rakil a hilh hi. Rakil a tai a, a pa a va hilhta hi.
Hichi ahi a, Laban in a sanggamnu tapa Jakob tanchin a zaktak in, amah dawn ding in a tai a, a pom a, a tawp a, a inn ah a pita hi. Jakob in huai thu tengteng Laban a hilh hi.
Laban in a kiang ah, “ka guh mah leh ka sa mah na hi,” a chi hi. Huchi in kha khat a kiang ah a omta hi.
Laban in Jakob kiang ah, “Ka tupa na hih ziak in a mawkin ka nna nasem dia hia? Bang na loh dia? Honhilh in” a chi hi.
Laban in tanu nih a nei a; a upa zaw min Leah ahi a, a naupang zaw min Rakil ahi.
Leah mit a nou a, Rakil bel chinou hoihtak ahi a, a mel leng a hoih mahmah hi.
Jakob in Rakil a it a, “Na tanu naupang zaw Rakil toh kiteng ding in kum sagih nang nna k’on sepsak ding” a chi hi.
Laban in, “Amah ahihleh midang kiang a ka piak sang in nang kiang a ka piak mah a hoihzaw ve. Ka kiang ah om nilouh in,” a chi hi.
Jakob in Rakil kitenpih ding in kum sagih a nna a sep sakta hi. Himahleh Rakil a it mahmah ziak in ni tamlou chik bang in a thei hi.
Jakob in Laban kiang ah, “Ka luppih theihna ding in ka zi honpia in, ka hun lah a kimta ngal a” a chi hi.
Laban in huai khua a mi tengteng a kaikhawm vek a, Ankuang a luita hi.
Hichi ahi a, khomial tung in a tanu Leah a pi a, Jakob kiang ah a pilut a; aman a na luppih hi.
Laban in a sikhanu Zilpah a tanu Leah kiang ah a sikhanu ding in a pia hi.

Hichi ahi a, zingsang a hong hih in, ngai in, Leah a na hi maimah hi. Jakob in, Laban kiang ah, “Ka tung a na thilhih bangchidan ahia? Rakil toh kiteng ding in na nna ka sem ka hia? Bangziak a honkhem maimah na hia?” a chi hi.
Laban in, “Ka gam uah huchibang a ta upa zaw ma a a nau zaw piak dan ahi kei.
Hiai minu nipikal zou phot inla, huchi in, kum sagih dang ka nna nasep zoh chiang in a nau zaw leng k’on pe ding” a chi hi.
Jakob in huchibang in a hih a, ni sagih a zouta a; a tanu Rakil a zi ding in a peta hi.
Laban in a sikhanu Bilhah a tanu Rakil kiang ah a sikhanu ding in a pia hi.
Rakil leng a luppih a, Leah sang in Rakil a it zaw a, Laban nna kum sagih dang a semta hi.
Leah a gai a, tapa a nei a, a min Reuben a sa hi. “
A gai nawn a, tapa a nei nawn a; “
A gai nawn a, tapa a nei nawn a; “Tuin tapa thum ka neihsak ziak in, ka pasal in a hon zuita ding” a chi hi. Huaiziak in a min Levi a sa hi.
A gai nawn a, tapa a nei nawn a; “Tutung in zaw
Rakil in Jakob ta himhim a neihsak kei chih a kitheih in a sanggamnu a hazata hi. Jakob kiang ah, “Tate honpia in, huchilou in zaw ka si ding” a chi hi.
Rakil tung ah Jakob a heh a, “Gilgah hon pelou Pathian bang ka hi ahia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “En in, ka sikhanu Bilhah luppih in. Huchi in ken leng amah a kipan tate ka neihsam theihna ding in ka phei tung ah ta k’on nei ding hi” a chi hi.
A sikhanu Bilhah a zi ding in a pia a, Jakob in amah a na luppih hi.
Bilhah a gai a Jakob ta a neihsakta hi.
Rakil in, “Pathian in a hon ngaihtuah a, ka aw leng a za a, tapa a honpia” a chi hi. Huaiziak in, a min Dan a sa hi.
Rakil sikhanu Bilhah a gai nawn a, Jakob tapa dang a neihsak nawn hi.
Rakil in, “Nakpitak in ka sanggamnu ka buan a, ka zouta” a chi a; a min Naphtali a sa hi.
Leah in ta dang a nei nawn kei chih a kitheih in, a sikhanu Zilpah a pi a, a zi ding in Jakob kiang ah a pia hi.
Leah sikhanu Zilpah in Jakob tapa a neihsak hi.
Leah in, “Vangphathuai mah ei” a chi a; a min Gad a sa hi.
Leah sikhanu Zilpah in Jakob tapa dang a neihsak nawn hi.
Leah in, “Hampha natel ing e! Numeite’n hampha honchi ding uh eive” a chi a; a min Asher a sa hi.
Buhlak lai in Reuben in gamlak ah zawl-ai a va mu a; a nu Leah kiang ah a hontawi hi. Rakil in Leah kiang ah, “Hehpih in na tapa zawl-ai a khen hon pedih,” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Ka pasal n’on suhsak thilduai ahi hia? Ka tapa zawl-ai leng hon suh sak na tum nawn lai maw?” a chi hi. Rakil in “Na tapa zawl-ai sik in tuzan in a hon luppih ding,” a chi hi.
Nitaklam in Jakob gamlak a kipan a hongtung a, a dawn ding in Leah a kuan a, “N’on luppih ding ahi. Ka tapa zawl-ai in k’on guaita ngal a” a chi hi. Huai zan in amah a luppihta hi.
Pathian in Leah thumna a ngaikhia a, a gai a, Jakob tapa ngana a neihsak nawn hi.
Leah in, “Ka sikhanu ka pasal kiang a ka piak ziak in Pathian in ka loh honpia eive” a chi a; a min Issakar a sa hi.
Leah a gai nawn a, Jakob tapa gukna a neihsak nawn hi.
Leah in, “Pathian in thil hoihtak a hon neisak a; tuin zaw ka pasal tapa guk ka neihsak tak ziak in, ka kiang ah a tengta ding” a chi a; a min Zebulun a sa hi.
Huai nung in tanu a nei nawn a, a min Dinah a sa hi.
Pathian in Rakil a theigige a, Pathian in a thumna a ngaikhia a, a sul a hon sak hi.
Amah a gai a, tapa a nei a; “Pathian in ka minsia a la mangta” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Rakil in Joseph a neih nung in, Jakob in Laban kiang ah, “Kei ka omna ngei ah, ka gam ah hon paisakta in aw.
Na nna ka sepsan ka zite leh ka tate honpia inla, hon paisak in. Na nna k’on sepsak dan lah na thei ngal a” a chi hi.
Laban in a kiang ah, “N’on hehpihtheih leh omtadih lai ve.
Amahmah in, “Na loh ding sep inla, honhilh dih, k’on pe ding” a chi hi.
Aman, a kiang ah, “Bangchi’n na nna ka sem a, bangchi’n na gan ka kiang ah a om ua, na thei a kei hiam?
Ka hong ma in tawmchik kia na nei a, tu’n zaw tampi a hong phata uhi. Ka kalsuanna peuh ah
Aman, “Bang k’on pedia?” a chi a; Jakob in, “Bangmah na honpiak ding ahi kei. Hiai thil hihsak leh na ganhon ka khah dia ka chingnawn ding hi.

Tuni in na ganhon ka va enkhe vek dia, belam lak a, a vom gial petmah a gial leh a vom a gial zekzek leh a vom peuhmah, kel lak a, a kang a gial petmah a gial leh a kang a gial zekzekte huai a kipan ka pituam zel ding hi. Tuban huchibang a hong piang peuhmah ka loh ahita ding hi.

Tuban na mitmuh a khial a ka omna thu ah na hongpai hun chiang in, ka diktatna in a hon dawnsak mai ding. Kel lak a a kang a gial petmah a gial lou leh a kang a gial zekzek lou leh belam lak a a vomlou ka kiang a na muh peuhmah ka guk in na sepmai ding” a chi hi.
Laban in, “Ngai in, na gen bang tak hile a ke” a chi hi.

Huai nitakin keltal a kang a gial leh a kang a gial zekzek teng leh kelnu a kang gial petmah a gial leh a kang a gial zekzek teng a kanna om peuhmah, belam lak a a vom tengteng toh a pituam a, a tapate khut ah a pia hi.
Amah leh Jakob kikal ah ni thum lam a omsak a; Jakob in Laban ganhon dangte a ching nawn hi.
Jakob in hiangzau sing leh makha sing leh sesing chiang hing a la a, a hawng a khokngou chiat a, chiangte ah angoute a kilangsak hi.
A chiang hawng khohte ganhonte’n tui a hong dawnzelna tuikuangte ah, tui luannate ah leh ganhonte mazawn zel ah a koihta hi; tuidawn dia a hongpai chiang ua a gaina ding un.
Ganhonte chiangte ma ah a gai panta ua, a gialte, gial petmah a gialte, a gial zekzekte a hon neizel uhi.
Jakob in belamnoute a koihtuam a, ganhonte Laban ganhon lak a, a gial leh a vom tengteng lam a ngasak zel a; amah ganhonte a koihtuam zel a, Laban gan lak ah a koih kei hi.
Hichi ahi a, gannu hatzawte a huk chiang un, a gai theihna ding un Jakob in tuiluanna ah, gan mitmuh in chiangte a koih zel hi.
Himahleh gannu a hatloute mai ah a koih kei hi. A nou hatloute Laban a ahi ua, a hatte Jakob a ahi zel uhi.
Jakob nakpi’n a hongpung a, ganhon thupitak, sikhanute, sikhapate, sangawngsaute leh sabiltungte a neita hi.
Huan, Laban tapate’n, “Jakob in i pa neihsate lamang in, i pa neihsa a kipan hiai thupina tengteng a mu hi,” a chih uh a na zata hi.
Jakob in Laban mel a en a, ngai in, tuma lam bang in a tung ah a hoih nawn kei, chih a thei hi.
, Jakob kiang ah, “Na pipute gam ah leh na tanaute kiang ah pai nawnta in. Na kiang ah om ding ka hi” a chi hi.
Jakob in mi a sawl a, gamlak a a ganhon omna ah Rakil leh Leah a samsaka, a kiang uah,
“Na pa uh mel ka muh in, tuma lam bang in ka tung ah a hoih nawn kei, chih ka thei hi. Himahleh ka pa Pathian ka kiang ah a om hi.
Na pa uh nna ka theihtawp in ka sem chih na thei uhi.
Himahleh na pa un hon zekhem a, ka loh lah sawmvei tak a hihlamdang a; himahleh Pathian in ka siatna ding a khoih a phalkei hi.
Gial petmah a gialte na loh ahi ding, a chih leh, gan tengteng in gial petmah a gialte a nei uh. A gialte na loh ahi ding, a chih leh, gan tengteng in a gialte a nei zel uh.
Huchibang in Pathian in na pa gante a laksaka, kei a hon peta hi.
Hichi ahi a, gante a gai pat lai un, ka mang in ka dak a, ngai in, a pa, ganhonte, a gialte, gial petmah a gialte, a gial a gial iik iakte ahi uh chih ka mu hi.
Ka mang in Pathian angel in, ‘Jakob,’ hon na chi a; ken ‘hiai ah ka om’ ka chi hi.
Aman, ‘dak inla, en in, a pa ganhonte tengteng a gialte, gial petmah a gialte, a gial a gial iik iakte ahi uh. Laban in na tung a a thilhih tengteng ka mu hi.
Kei, suangphuh a sathau na nilh a, ka kiang a thu na chiamna Bethel, huai Bethel Pathian ka hi. Tuin thou inla, hiai gam a kipan pawt inla, na pianna gam ah pai nawnta in’ ” a chi hi.
Rakil leh Leah in a dawng ua, a kiang ah, “Ka pa uh inn ah kou ading in tantuan leh gouluah ding a om lailai ahia?
Aman mikhual banglel a honsim hita lou hia? A hon khong khinta a, ka man ulah a ne khinta ngal a.
Pathian in ka pa uh hauhna a laksak tengteng ei leh i tate a ahi. Pathian in na kiang a a gen peuhmah hih in” a chi uhi.
Jakob a thou a, a tapate leh a zite sangawngsau tung ah a tuangsak hi;
Kanan gam a a pa Isak kiang a paiding in a gan tengteng leh a sumkhol tengteng, a gan muhte, Padan-aram gam a a kholte a paipih vek hi.
Laban a belam mulmet ding in a paimang a; Rakil in a pa milim pathiante a guksak hi.
Suria mi Laban theihlouh kal in Jakob in a guk paimangsan a, a paimangsan ding thu a hilh kei hi.
Huchi in a neih tengteng toh a taimangta hi. A thou a, Luipi a kan a, Gilead tanglam zuan in a pai hi.
A ni thum ni’n Jakob a taita chih Laban a hilh uh.
A unaute a pi a, ni sagih lam tan a delh a; Gilead tang ah a delh phata hi.
Suria mi Laban kiang ah zan in a mang in Pathian a hong a, a kiang ah, “Jakob kiang ah a sia, a pha a bangmah genlou ding in pilvang in,” a chi hi. Laban in Jakob a delh phata hi.
Jakob in a puanin tang ah a kaikhin a; Laban in leng a unaute toh Gilead tang ah a kai uhi.
Laban in Jakob kiang ah, “Na thilhih bangchidan ahia oi? Ka theihlouh kal a na guk paimang a, namsau a lak salte bang mai a ka tanute na pimang?
Bangdia hon taimangsan a, hon guk paisan a, nopsaknate toh, late toh, khuangtate toh, kaihgingte toh k’on khak theihna dia n’on hilhlouh?
Ka tute leh ka tanute ka tawp na phal kei. Haihuaitakin thil na hih hi.
Hon hihsethei ka hi a; himahleh na pa Pathian in tu zan in, Jakob kiang ah a sia, a pha bangmah genlou ding in pilvang in, chi’n, a hon houpih hi.
Na pa inn na ngaih mahmah tak ziak in, pai ut hi tawk lechin leng bangdia ka pathiante hon guksak na hia?” a chi hi.
Jakob in a dawng a, Laban kiang ah, “Ka lauh ziak ahi. Na tanute n’on laksak teitei kha ding ka chi a, ahi.
Kuapeuh na pathiante na muhna a hing kei ding. I unaute mitmuh in nang a ka kiang a om enchian inla, la ve” a chi hi.

Rakil in a na gu chih lah Jakob in a thei ngalkei a. Jakob puaninte ah, Leah puaninte ah leh sikhanu nihte puaninte ah Jakob a lut a; himahleh a mu kei hi. Leah puanin a kipan a pawt a, Rakil puanin ah a lut hi.
Rakil in milimte a na la a, sangawngsau van lak ah a na koih a, a na tutkhum hi. Laban in a puanin sung tengteng a maisuak vek a, himahleh a mu kei hi.
Aman a pa kiang ah, “Na ma a ka din ngaplouh ziak in ka toupa, heh ken aw. Numei omdan ngeina ka tung a a om laitak ahi ngal a” a chi hi. A zongzong a, himahleh milimte a muzou takei hi.
Jakob a hehta a, Laban a salta hi. Jakob in Laban kiang ah, “Bang ah ka talek a, bang ah ka khial a hon delh na hia?
Ka van tengteng na mai nung in leng, na inn sung van himhim bang a na muh? Eigel kal a thu a khen theihna ding un ka unaute leh na unaute ma ah na muh pen koihkhia in.
Kum sawmnih vingveng na kiang ah ka omta; na belampite leh na kelpite’n nou a neikhial ngeikei uh. Na belamhon lak a a pate leng ka ne ngeikei hi.
Gamsa keih leng na kiang ah k’on tun ngei ngalkei a: a mang sik in ken ka thuak zawzela; sun a guk hiam, zan a guk hiam lah ka dit na phut gige hi.
Hichibang in ka om zel a; sun nisa leh zan khovot in a hon hihgim thei mahmah a; ihmut leng ka mu ngeikei hi.
Kum sawmnih sung teng na inn ah ka om a; na tanu nihte loh ding in kum sawmlehli na nna ka sem a, na gante loh ding in kum guk ka sem nawn a; ka loh sawmvei na hih lamdang hi.

Ka pa Pathian, Abraham Pathian leh Isak Pathian lauhna ka kiang a omlou hile houh, tun vuaktang lel a hon paisak ngeingei ding na hi. Pathian in ka haksat thuakdan leh ka sepgim dan a mu a, tu zan a nang honsal ahi” a chi hi.

Laban in a dawng a, Jakob kiang ah, “Hiai tanute ka tanute ahi ua, hiai naupangte ka naupangte ahi uh. Hiai gante kei gante ahi ua, na muh tengteng kei avek ahi uh. Tuni in hiai ka tanute tung ah leh a ta neihte uh tung ah bang ka hihthei dia?
Kisa in, kei leh nang thu i khung ding; Kei leh nang kikal ah theihpihna hi hen” a chi hi.
Jakob in suang a la a, suangphuh in a phut hi.
Jakob in a unaute kiang ah, “Suang lakhawm un” a chi hi. Suang a la ua, a chiang ua, a suang chiankhawm kiang ah an a ne uhi.
Laban in huai suang chiankhawm, Jegarsahadutha, a sa a; Jakob in Galeed, a sa hi.
Laban in, “Hiai suang chiankhawm tuin kei leh nang kikal ah theihpihna ahi” a chi hi. Huaiziak in, a min Galeed chih ahita hi.
Mizpah chih leng ahi, “Kikhen a i om hun chiang in
“Ka tanute na suk gentheih a, ka tanute lou zi dang na neih leh, ka tanute chih louh kuamah i kiang ah a omkei na ua, en in, Pathian, kei leh nang kal hon theihpihpa ahi” a chi ngal hi.
Laban mah in, “Hiai suang chiankhawm en inla, keimah leh nangmah kikal a ka phuh sungphuh leng en in.

Poi kikhoihsak ding in, kei hiai suang kheng in na kiang ah ka hongpai kei ding, chih leh nang leng hiai suang chiankhawm leh hiai suangphuh kheng in ka kiang ah na hongpai kei ding, chih, hiai suang chiankhawm a theihpihna hi henla, hiai suangphuh leng a theihpihna mah hi hen.
Abraham Pathian, Nahor Pathian, a pa uh Pathian in i kal ah thukhen hen” a chi hi. Jakob in a pa Isak lauhpa minlou in, a kichiamta hi.
Jakob in tang ah kithoihna a lan a, a unaute tanghou ne ding in a sam a; tanghou a ne ua, tang ah a giak chiat uhi.
Zingsang in beltak in Laban a thou a, a tute leh a tanute a tawp a, a vualzawl hi. Laban a pai a, amah omna ah a kiknawnta hi.
Jakob a pai zel a, Pathian angelte’n a na tuak uhi.
Jakob in amau a muh in, “Hiai Pathian giahphual ahi” a chi a; huai mun Mahanaim a sa hi.
Jakob in, Edom gam, tua Seir gam ah a ma ah thangkoute Esau kiang ah a sawl hi.
A kiang uah, ka toupa Esau kiang ah hichi’n na gen ding uh. “Na sikha Jakob in hichi’n a chi. Laban kiang ah mikhual ka hi a, tutan ka om nilouh hi.
Bawngtalte, sabiltungte leh belamte, sikhapa leh sikhanute ka nei hi. Na hehpihna ka muh theihna dia ka toupa hilh ding in mite k’on sawl hi.”
Thangkoute Jakob kiang ah a hong kiknawn ua, “Na u Esau kiang ka va tung ua, mi za li toh nang dawn ding in a hongpai hi” chi’n, a gen uhi.
Jakob in a lau mahmah a, a lungkhamta hi. A kiang a mi omte, belamhonte, bawnghonte leh sangawngsaute pawl nih in a khen hi.
Esau hongpai a, pawl khat a thah leh leng pawl khat omlai taimang thei ding, a chi hi.
Jakob mah in, “Aw ka pa Abraham Pathian, ka pa Isak Pathian,
Na sikha tung a hehpihna na muhsak leh thutak tengteng na muhsak lak a, a neupen leng mutak ka hi kei. Hiai Jordan lui ka chiang kia toh ka kan a; tuin zaw pawl nih hial ka hong hita uhi.
Hehpih in ka u khut a kipan, Esau khut a kipan, hon humbit in. Huchilou in zaw kei leh numei naupang tan in a honthat kha ding, chih ka lau hi.
Nang k’on hihhoih ngeingei dia, na suante tuipi a piaunel simzohlouh tanhiala a tam bang in ka bawl ding n’on chi ngal a” a chi hi.
Huai zan in huai ah a giakta a; a neihlak a kipan a u Esau ading thilpiak a lakhia hi.
Kelpi za nih, keltal sawmnih, belampi za nih leh belampa sawmnih,
Sangawngsau zatlai sawmthum a noute toh, bawngpi sawmli leh bawngtal sawm, sabengtungpi sawmnih leh sabiltung nou sawm.
Hiaite pawl chih a tuam chiat in a sikhate khut ah a kem sak a, a sikhate kiang ah, “Ka ma ah pai galkah unla, pawl chih kalnei sak zel un,” a chi hi.
A makaipa kiang ah, “Ka u Esau in a hontuah a, na kiang a, kua na hia? Kaw hoh dek na hia? Na ma a om kuate ahi ua? chi a a hondot leh,
Na sikha Jakob a ahi ua; Ka pu Esau, nang ka toupa adia a hon khak thilpiak ahi. Ngai in, amah ka nung uah a om, na chi ding” chi in thu a pia hi.
A nihna leh a thumna leh ganhon hawlte tengteng kiang ah leng, “Esau na muh chiang un huchibang mah in na gen ding uh.

Ngai in, na sikha ka nung uah a om, chi chiat un” chi in thu a pe chiat hi. “Thilpiak ka ma ah pai leh a lung ka damsak dia, huai nung in a mel ka mu ding. Huchi in, a hon na kipahpih ding,” a chi hi.
Huchi in, thilpiak a ma ah a pai galkah sak a; amah huai zan in a pawlte lak ah a giak hi.
Zan in a thou a, a zi nihte leh a sikhanu nihte leh a tapa sawmlehkhatte a pi a, Jabbok lui ngahna ah a kanta hi.
Amau a pi a, lui a kan ua, a neih tengteng leng a kansak vek hi.
Jakob amah kia in a omta a, mi khat toh phalvak tan a kibuan uhi.
A zoukei, chih a kitheih in a pheipi guhtuah a khoihsak a, a kibuan lai un Jakob pheipi guhtuah a kilawita hi.
Aman, “Honkhah in, phalvak ding ahita,” a chi hi; aman, “N’on vualzawl keileh k’on khah kei ding” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Na min bang ahia?” a chi a; aman, “Jakob” a chi hi.
Aman, “Na min Jakob ahi nawn kei ding, Israel a honchi zawta ding uh. Pathian leh mihingte na buan a, na zouta ngal a” a chi hi.
Jakob in amah a dong a, “Hehpih in na min honhilh in” a chi hi. Aman, “Bangziak in ahia ka min n’on dot?” a chi hi. Huai ah a vualzawlta hi.
Jakob in huai mun min “Peniel” a sa hi. “Pathian a mai chin mahmah ah ka mu a, ka hinna a hawi ziak in” a chi hi.
Peniel a khenlai in, ni a hongsuak a, amah a honsun a, a pheipi ziak in a baita hi.
Huaiziak in, Jakob pheipi guhtuah a sadual tak a khoih sak ziak in tutan in Israel suante’n pheipi guhtuah a sadual om a ne ngeikei uhi.
Huan, Jakob a dak a, ngai in, Esau a kiang a mi za li toh a hongpai hi. Huchi in Leah, Rakil leh sikhanu nihte kiang ah a tate a omsak khipkhep hi.
Sikhanute leh a tate a makai in a koih a, Leah leh a tate a zom in a koih a, Rakil leh Joseph bel a nanungpen in a koih hi.
Amah a ma uah a pai a, a u kiang chin a tun masiah sagihvei leisi in a kun hi.
Himahleh Esau amah mu ding in a tai a, a pom a, a ngawng a kun in a tawp a, a kap uhi.
Esau a dak a, numeite leh naupangte a mu a; “N’on pite kuate ahi ua?” a chi hi. Aman, “Pathian in hehpihtak a na sikha kiang a a piak naupangte ahi uh” a chi hi.
Sikhanute leh a tate uh a hongpai ua, a kun uhi.
Leah leng a tate toh a hongpai nai ua, a kun ua, huaikhit in Joseph leh Rakil leng a hongpai nai ua, a kun uhi.
Esau in, “Ka ganhon kituahpih tengpi bang na chihna ahia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Ka toupa, na hehpihna ka muh theihna ding in ka chi a ahi” a chi hi.
Esau in, “Ken leng hau veng e, bawi aw, na neih tengteng nang a hi hen” a chi hi.
Jakob in, “Hilou e, n’on hehpih theih leh hehpih in k’on thilpiakte hon sansak in. Pathian mel mu bang in na mel ka mu a, ka tung ah lah na kipak ngal a.
Pathian in hon hehpih ziak leh a kiching ka neih ziak in k’on thilpiakte sang in” a chi hi. Huchi in a kun a, aman a sangta hi.
Esau in, “Kisa in, pai ni, na ma ah ka pai ding” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Naupangte a neulai dan uleh belamhon ka kiang a omte a nou a hih dan uh, ka toupa, na thei hi. Ni khat lel leng hatlua a, a hawl uleh ganhon tengteng a sivek ding uhi.

Ka toupa, hehpih in na sikha ma ah pai inla; Ken Seir tang ah, ka toupa, na kiang ka tun mateng, ka ma a gante a paitheih hun bangbang uleh naupangte a paitheih hun bangbang un, awlawl in k’on masuan zel ding” a chi hi.
Esau in, “Ka kiang a om mi khenkhat hon nutsiat leng a ke” a chi hi. Aman, “A poimawh khol ahia? Ka toupa mitmuh in hehpihna hon musak in” a chi hi.
Huai ni mah in Seir tanglam zuan in Esau a kiknawnta hi.
Jakob Sukkoth mun ah a pai a, amah ading inn a lam a, a gante adin leng buktate a lam hi. Huaiziak in, huai mun min Sukkoth a sa hi.
Jakob Padan-aram gam a kipan a hong a, lungmuangtakin Sekem khua, Kanan gam a om, a tung a, khopi ma ah a puanin a zakta hi.
A puanin zakna mun, Sekem pa Hamor tate a kipan, dangka za khat in a lei hi.
Huai ah maitam a doh a, a min El-Elohe-Israel a sa hi.
Huan, Leah tanu Dinah, Jakob a neihsak, huai gam nungakte mu ding in a pawtkhia hi.
Hiv mi Hamor, huai gam kumpipa tapa Sekem in amah a na mu a; a man a, a luppih a, a hihnin hi.
A lungsim Jakob tanu Dinah tung ah a om bikbek a, huai nungak lah a it a, amah kamsiam tak in a houpih hi.
Sekem in a pa Hamor a houpih a, “Huai nungak zi ding in hon neisak in” a chi hi.
Jakob in a tanu Dinah a ninsak khin, chih a za a; a tate gamlak ah a gan lak uah a om uhi. Huchi in, a hongtun mateng uh Jakob a daidide hi.
Sekem pa Hamor Jakob houpih ding in a kiang ah a hoh hi.
Jakob tapate’n a zaktak un gamlak a kipan a hong paita ua; Jakob tanu luppih in Israelte lak a thil gilou haihuai tak, thilhih hetlouh ding, a hih ziak in a lungkham ua, a heh mahmah uhi.
Hamor in amau a houpih a, “Ka tapa Sekem lungsim na tanu uh tung ah a om bikbek a, hehpih in zi ding in neisak ve ua,
Kila tuah ve ni e; na tanute uh hon lasak unla, ka tanute u leng la sam un.
Ka kiang uah na teng ding ua; gam leng a kiching gige ding. Hiai ah teng unla, sumsin unla, hiai ah kihih inbul un” a chi hi.
Sekem in nungak pa leh a sanggampate kiang ah, “Hon hehpih un, ka kiang a na gen peuh uh k’on pe ding.
Man leh thilpiak zaw bangzah gen le uchin, na chih bangbang uh k’on pe ding. A bang hileh, nungak pen zi ding in hon neisak phot un” a chi hi.
Jakob tapate’n a sanggamnu uh Dinah a nitsak ziak in Sekem leh a pa Hamor zekhem in a dawng ua, a kiang uah,
“Hiai thil zeksumlouh mi kiang a ka tanu uh piak pen ka hih theikei ding uh. Huai lah kou ading in minsiatna ahi ngal a.
Hichibang a kichiam kia in na thu uh pha ka sa ding uh. Na lak ua pasal peuhpeuh kou bang a zeksum in om uhen.
Huchi in ka tanute uh na nei ding ua, kou leng na tanute uh ka neisam ding uh. Na kiang uah ka teng ding ua, chi khat i hi ding.
Himahleh, zeksum thu a ka thu uh na zuihkei ding uleh, ka tanu uh ka pi ding ua, ka paimai ding uh” a chi uhi.
A thugen un Hamor leh Hamor tapa Sekem a kipaksak hi.
Tangval in Jakob tanu a deih mahmah ziak in huai thil sawt hallou in a hihta hi. Amah a pa inkuan tengteng lak a mite zahtak pen ahi.
Hamor leh a tapa Sekem in a khaw kulh kongkhak uh a pha ua, a khote uh a houpih uhi.
“Hiai mite kituahpih tak in a om uh. Huaiziak in hiai gam a teng in, hiai ah sumsin uhen. Ngai un, amau ading in gam lah a za ngal a. A tanute uh zi in nei lehang, i tanute uh leng neisak sam ni.

Himahleh nam khat i hong hihna ding a i kiang a ten theihna ding un hichibang a i chiam kia in huai mite’n pha a hon sak pih ding uhi. Zeksum a hih bang ua i lak ua pasal peuhpeuh zeksum hong hita lehang.
A gante uh, a sumte uh, a sa tengteng uh ei a ahi vekkei dia hia? A thu uh phasak pih maive ni, Huchi in i kiang uah a teng ding uhi” a chi uhi.
Hamor leh a tapa Sekem thu a khaw kulh kongkhak a pawt khe tengteng in a zui ua; a khaw kulh kongkhak a pawtkhe tengteng, pasal peuhpeuh zek a sumsak uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a ni thum ni a, na a thuaklai un, Jakob tapate lak a nih, Dinah sanggampa Simeon leh Levi in a namsau uh tawi tuak in a guk in khua a va sualta ua, pasal tengteng a thatgam uhi.
Hamor leh a tapa Sekem namsau hiam in a that ua, Sekem inn a kipan Dinah a pi ua, a pawtta uhi.
Jakob tapate’n a mi thahte uh a va phanawn ua, a tanu uh a nitsak ziak un huai khua a lokta uhi.
A belamhonte uh, a bawnghonte uh, a sabiltungte uh, a khua ua thil omte leh a lou ua thil omte a laksak uhi.
A sum tengteng uleh a ta a nau neu chikchik leh a zite uh tengteng sal in a man ua, inn tengteng a lok uhi.

Jakob in Simeon leh Levi kiang ah, “Nou hiai gam a tengte lak a, Kanante leh Perizte lak ah, huat n’on pawsak ua, n’on lungzingsak mahmah uh. Kei tawmchik ka hih ziak in hon sual ding in a kikhawm khawm ding ua, a honthat mai ding uhi. Huchi in, hihmang in ka om ding a, kei leh ka inkuanpihte toh” a chi hi.
Amau, “Ka sanggamnu uh kizuak bang a a bawl ding ahi ahia?” a chi uhi.
Huan, Pathian in Jakob kiang ah, “Thou inla, Bethel ah hohtou in, huai ah teng in. Na u Esau a kipan na taimanglai a, na kiang a kilak Pathian ading in huai ah maitam doh in” a chi hi.
Jakob in a inkuanpihte leh a kiang a om tengteng kiang ah, “Na lak ua om gamdang pathiante koihmang unla, kihihsiangthou unla, na puansilhte uh kheng un.
I thou ding ua, Bethel ah i paitou ding uh. Ka lungzin lai a hon dawng, ka paina a ka kiang a om zel Pathian ading in maitam ka doh ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in gamdang pathiante a khut ua om tengteng leh a bil ua bilbah a bah tengteng uh Jakob kiang ah a pia uhi. Jakob in Sekem khaw kiang a tosaw nuai ah a phum hi.
A pai ua, a kim ua khuate’n a lau mahmah ua, Jakob tapate a delhkei uhi.
Jakob Kanan gam a Luz khua a tung a, amah leh a kiang a om tengteng toh, Luz Bethel ahi.
Huai ah maitam a doh a, a u a kipan a taimanglai a, a kiang a Pathian a kilak ziak in huai mun min El Bethel a sa hi.
Rebekah donnu Deborah a si a, Bethel khang a tawsaw nuai ah a vui ua; a tawsaw min Allon bakuth a sa uhi.
Jakob Padan-aram gam a kipan a hongtun in Pathian a kiang ah a kilak nawn a, a vualzawl hi.
Pathian in a kiang ah, “Na min Jakob ahi a; na min Jakob ahi nawn kei ding a, na min Israel ahi zawta ding” a chi hi. Huchi in, a min Israel a sata hi.

Pathian mah in a kiang ah, “Kei Pathian bangkim hihthei ka hi. Chi tampi suang in hongpung in. Chichih tham ngial leh chi tuamtuam omkhawm leng nang ah a hongom ding ua, na khal a kipan kumpipate leng a hongpawt ding uhi.
Abraham leh Isak kiang a ka gam piak na kiang ah k’on pe ding. Na omlouh nung chiang in na suante kiang ah leng gam ka pe zel ding” a chi hi.
Pathian in a houpihna mun a kipan Jakob a paitouh santa hi.
A houpihna mun ah Jakob in suangkhuam a phut a; a tung ah dawn thillat a buak a, a tung ah sathau leng a buak hi.
Jakob in, Pathian in a houpihna mun min Bethel a sa hi.
Bethel a kipan a pai ua; Ephrath khaw tunna ding gamlatak ahihlaiin Rakil in nau a veia, a nakvei mahmah hi.
Hichi ahi a, a gim laitak in naudommi’n, “Lau ken, hiai tapa leng na nei ding” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, a kha a pawtlaiin, a sita a, a min Ben Oni a sa a; himahleh a pa’n Benjamin a sa hi.
Rakil a sita, Ephrath lampi ah a vui uhi, Ephrath khua Bethlehem khua ahi.
A han tung ah Jakob in suang a phut a; huai tunitan in Rakil han suangphuh ahilai hi.
Israel a pai zel a, Migdol Eder khenlam ah a puanin a kai hi.
Hichi ahi a, Israel huai gam a a omlai in Reuben in a pa mei Bilhah a va luppiha; Israel in huai a za hi.
Jakob tapate sawmlehnih ahi uh. Leah tapate Reuben, Jakob ta upapen, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakar leh Zebulun ahi uh.
Rakil tapate Joseph leh Benjamin ahi uh.
Rakil sikhanu Bilhah tapate Dan leh Naphtali ahi uh.
Leah sikhanu Zilpah tapate Gad leh Asher ahi ua; huaite Jakob tapa, Padan-aram gam a a neihte ahi uhi.
Jakob Kiriath Arba khua a Abraham leh Isak omna Mamre ah a pa Isak kiang a tungta hi. Kiriath Arba khua Hebron ahi.
Isak damsung kum za leh sawmgiat ahi.
Isak in a kha a khahta a, upapi tekkuna damin a si a, a chipihte kiang ah piin a omta hi. A tapate Esau leh Jakob in amah a vuita uhi.
Huan, hiaite Esau suante ahi uh, Esau Edom ahi.
Esau in a zite Kanan gam a nungakte lak a a neih ahi: Hit mi Elon tanu Adah leh Hiv mi Zibeon tanu Anah Tanu Aholibamah ahi ua;
Ishmael tanu, Nebajoth sanggamnu Basemath toh.
Adah in Eliphaz Esau a neihsak a; Basemath in Reuel a nei hi.
Aholibamah in Jeush, Jaalam leh Korah a nei a; hiaite Esau tapate, Kanan gam a a neihte ahi uhi.
Esau in a zite, a tapate, a tanute, a in a mi tengteng, a gante tengteng, a sa tengteng leh a thil neih tengteng, Kanan gam a a muhte a paipih a, a nau Jakob kiang a kipan gamdang ah a paimangta hi.
A thilneihte uh a thupi lua a, a omkhawm theikei uh. A gante uh ziak in mikhual a a omna gam un a chinta kei hi.
Esau Seir tang ah a tengta hi. Esau Edom ahi.
Hiaite Seir tang a Edomte suangpa Esau suante ahi uh:
Hiai Esau tapate minte ahi: Eliphaz, Esau zi Adah tapa; Reuel, Esau zi Basemath tapa.
Eliphaz tapate: Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam leh Kenaz ahi uh.
Timna, Esau tapa Eliphaz mei ahi a; aman Amalek Eliphaz a neihsak hi. Hiaite Esau zi Adah suante ahi uh.
Hiaite Reuel tapate ahi uh: Nahath leh Zerah, Sammah leh Mizzah. Hiaite Esau zi Basemath suante ahi uh.
Hiaite Zibeon tanu Anah tanu Esau zi Aholibamah tapate ahi uh: Aman Esau Jeush leh Jalaam leh Korah a neihsak hi.
Hiaite Esau tapate lak a heutute ahi uh: Esau ta masapen Eliphaz tapate; heutu Teman, heutu Omar, heutu Zepho, heutu Kenaz,
heutu Korah, heutu Gatam leh heutu Amalek. Hiaite Edom gam a Eliphaz a kipan pawt heutute ahi ua, hiaite Adah suante ahi uh.
Hiaite Esau tapa Reuel suante ahi uh: Heutu Nahath, heutu Zerah, heutu Sammah leh Heutu Mizzah. Hiaite Edom gam a Reuel a kipan a pawt heutute ahi ua; Esau zi Basemath suante ahi uhi.
Hiaite Esau zi Aholibamah suante ahi uh: Heutu Jeush, heutu Jalaam leh heutu Korah. Huaite heutu Anah tanu Esau zi Aholibamah suante ahi uh.
Huaite Esau tapate ahi ua; a lak ua heutute ahi uh. Esau Edom ahi.
Hiaite Hor mi Seir tapa gam luahte ahi uh: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Anah.
Dishon, Ezer leh Dishan. Huaite Edom gam a Seir tapa Horte heutute ahi uh.
Lotan tate Hor leh Hemam ahi ua; Lotan sanggamnu Timna ahi.
Hiaite Sobal tate ahi uh: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shepho leh Onam.
Hiaite Zibeon tate ahi uh: Ajah leh Anah. Hiai Anah, a pa Zibeon sabiltungte a khah lai a gamdai a tuisa khukte mukhepa ahi.
Hiaite Anah tate ahi uh: Dishon leh Anah tanu Aholibamah.
Hiaite Dishon tate ahi uh: Hemdan, Esban, Ithran leh Cheran.
Hiaite Ezer tate ahi uh: Bilhan, Zaavan leh Akan.
Hiaite Dishan tate ahi uh: Uz leh Aran.
Hiaite Horte heutute ahi uh: heutu Lotan, hetu sobal, hetu Zibeon leh heutu Anah.
Heutu Dison, heutu Ezer leh heutu Dishan. Hiaite Seir gam a heutu a hih dan bang a Horte heutute ahi uh.
Hiaite kumpipa kuamah in Israel suante tung a vai a vaihawm ma ua, Edom gam a vaihawm kumpitate ahi uhi.
Beor tapa Bela in
Edom gam ah vai a hawm a,
a khopi min Dinhabah ahi.
Bela a si a,
Bozrah khua a mi Zerah tapa
Jobab in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Jobab a si a, Timante gam a mi
Husam in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Husam a si a, Bedad tapa Hadad,
Moab pawn a Midiante thatpa’n a sik in vai a hawm a,
a khopi min Avith ahi.
Hadad a si a, Masrekah mi
Samlah in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Samlah a si a, Luipi gei a
Rehoboth khua a mi Saul in
a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Saul a si a, Akbor tapa Baal hanan in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Akbor tapa Bal hanan a si a,
Hadar in a sik in vai a hawm a,
a khopi min Pau ahi.
A zi min Mehetabel ahi a, amah Mezahab tanu Matred tanu ahi
Hiaite a inkuan uh bangzel leh a mun bangzel uh leh a min bangzel ua Esau suan heutute min ahi. Heutu Timnah, heutu Alvah leh heutu Jetheth.
Heutu Aholibamah, heutu Elah, heutu Pinon.
Heutu Kenaz, heutu Teman, heutu Mibzar.
Heutu Magdiel leh heutu Iram. Hiaite a gam neih uah a omna uh bangzel in Edom suan heutute ahi uh. Edomte pa Esau ahi.
Jakob bel a pa mikhual a, a omna gam, Kanan ah a teng hi.

Hiaite Jakob suante ahi uh. Joseph, kum sawmlehsagih a upa a hih in, a ute toh ganhon a khah uhi. Amah naupang a hilai a, a pa zite Bilhah leh Zilpah tapate kiang ah a om a; Joseph in a gitlouhna thu uh a pa uh kiang ah a tun hi.
Israel in Joseph, a teklam ta a hih ziak in a tate tengteng sang in a itzaw a; puanaktual ze tuamtuam a gial a bawlsak hi.
A pa un amah, a u tengteng sang in a itzaw chih a ute’n a thei uhi; amah a mudah ua, kampha himhim in a houpih thei takei uhi.
Joseph in mang a nei a, a ute a hilh a, amah a mudah semsem uhi.
Aman, a kiang uah, “Hehpih in ka mang ngai dih uh.
Ngai un, lou ah buhphalte i na gak ua, ngai dih uh, kei buhphal a thoutou a, ading nemnom hi. Ngai un, nou buhphalte’n a hongum ua, kei buhphal ma ah a kun chiat uh” a chi hi.
A ute’n a kiang ah, “Nang soplai in ka tung uah vai na hawm mahmah ding maw? Nang soplai in ka tung uah thu na nei mahmah ding maw?” a chi uh. Huchi in, a mang ziak in amah a mudah semsem uhi.
Mang dang a neinawn a, a ute a hilhnawn hi, “Ngai un, mang ka neinawn hi. Ni, kha leh aksi sawmlehkhatte ka mai ah a kun uhi,” a chi hi.
A pa leh a ute a hilh hi. A pa’n a tai a, a kiang ah, “Mang na neih bangchi mang ahia? Kei leh na nu leh na ute leisi in na mai ah ka kun taktak ding u maw?” a chi hi.
A ute’n amah a haza ua; a pa’n bel a thugen a lungsim in a pai nilouh hi.
A ute Sekem ah a pa uh ganhon khah in a hoh uh.
Israel in Joseph kiang ah, “Na ute’n Sekem ah ahi maw ganhon a khah uh? Hongpai dih, a kiang uah k’on sawl ding” a chi hi. Huan aman, “Hiai ah ka om” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Na ute a damdam na uhiam, ganhon leng a damdam na hiam va en inla, a tanchin uh hong hilh nawn in” a chi hi. Hebron guam a kipan a sawlkhia a, Sekem a vapha hi.
Mi kuahiam in amah a mu a, ngai in, pawn ah a vakvak hi. Huai mi’n, “Bang zong na hia?” chi’n, a dong hi.
Aman, “Ka ute zong ka hi. Hehpih in ganhon a khah na uh honhilh ve” a chi hi.
Huai mi’n, “Hiai a kipan pawt hive un, Dothan ah i hoh ding uh, a chih uh ka za” a chi hi. Joseph in a ute a delh a, Dothan ah a va mu hi.
Amau gamlapi a kipan a na galmuh ua, a kiang nai uh a tunma in, amah thah a na sawmkhin uhi.
Amau, “En un, mangneipa a hongpai.
Hong un, i that dia, kawkhuk khat ah i khe ding uh. Gamsa gilou in a ne, china ni. A mangte bangchibang in a om a, chih i thei mai ding uh” a kichi uhi.
Reuben in huai a naza a, a khut ua pan a honkheta hi. “Thah zaw i that hial kei ding uh” a chi hi.
Reuben mah in a pa uh kiang a, a pitheihna dia, a khut ua pan a hotkhiak theihna ding in, a kiang uah, “Sisan zaw suahkei un, gamdai ah kawkhuk ah khia un, khut zaw a tung ah kha kei un” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Joseph a ute kiang a tun in, Joseph puanaktual ze tuamtuam a gial a silh, a na suahsak uhi.
Amah a pi ua, kawkhuk ah a kheta uhi. Huai kawkhuk a vuak ahi a, tui om nawnlouhna ahi.

An ne ding in a tu chiat ua, a dak ua, a en ua, ngai in, Ishmael khualzin mite Gilead gam a kipan a sangawngsau ua thil gimnamtui, singnai damdawi leh murra pua in Aigupta gam a paisuk dingte a hongpai uhi.
Judah in a unaute kiang ah, “I naupa uh i thah ua, a sisan suak i im un bang phattuamna om ding ahia?
Hong un, a tung a khut khalou in, Ishmaelte kiang ah i zuak zaw ding uh. Amah lah i nau uh, i sa ngeingei uh lah ahi ngal a” a chi hi. A unaute’n a thu a zuita uhi.
Midian sumsinmite a hongpai ua; Joseph kawkhuka kipan a kaikhia ua, Ishmaelte kiang ah Joseph dangka sawmnih in a khawngta uhi. Amau Joseph Aigupta gam ah a pi uhi.
Reuben kawkhuk ah a hongpai nawn a, Ngai in, Joseph kawkhuk ah a na omta kei hi. A puansilhte a botkekta hi.
A naute kiang ah a hoh nawn a, “I nau uh a om nawn kei. Kei koi a paita ding ka hia oi?” a chi hi.
Joseph puanaktual a la ua, keltal a gou ua, a si ah a puanaktual a diah uhi.
Huai puanaktual ze tuamtuam a gial a khak ua, a pa uh kiang ah a honla ua; “Hiai lel ka mu ua, na tapa puanaktual ahi hia, hilou, en mah dih” a chi uh.
Aman a na theipah a, “Ka tapa puanaktual eive. Gamsa gilou in ne eive. Joseph bohnen vek a om hi mahmah ding eive’ a chi hi.
Jakob in a puansilhte a botkek a, saiip puan a teng a, ni tamtak a tapa a sun hi.
A tapa tengteng leh a tanu tengteng amah lungmuan ding in a thou ua; himahleh amah lungmuan a utkei. “Sunkawm in han ah ka tapa kiang ah ka paisuk ding,” a chi hi. Amah ngai in a pa a kap hi.
Midiante’n Aigupta gam ah Joseph a lutpih ua, Pharo nuai a heutu khat, vengmi pawl heutu Potiphar kiang ah a zuak uhi.
Huailai in, hichi ahi a, Judah a unaute kiang a kipan a paisuka, Adullam mi khat a min Hirah a vabel hi.
Judah in huai ah Kanan mi khat tanu a min Shuah a mu a; a kitenpiha, a luppihta hi.
Huchi in a gaia, tapa a nei a; Judah in a min Er a sa hi.
A gai nawn a, tapa a neinawn a; a nu’n a min Onan a sa hi.
Tapa a neinawna, a min Shelah a sa a; amah a neihlai in Judah Kezib khua ah a om hi.
Judah in a ta masa Er ading in zi a pisak a, a min Tamar ahi.
Judah ta masa Er
Judah in Onan kiang ah, “Na u zi luppih in kitenpih inla, na u ading in chi suahsak in” a chi hi.
Onan in chisuah ding pen amah suan ahi kei ding, chih a thei hi. Hichi ahi a, a u zi a luppih teng in a u adia chi a suahsak louhna ding in a chi lei ah a kesak hi.
A thilhih in

Judah in a mounu Tamar kiang ah, “Ka tapa Shelah a pichin mateng na pa inn ah meithai in va omtadih in” a chi hi. Huchilou in zaw amah leng a ute bang in a si kha ding, a chi hi. Huchi in, Tamar a pai a, a pa inn ah a va omta hi.
A nung in Shuah tanu Judah zi a si a; Judah a hong khamuan in Timnah khua ah a belam mulmette kiang ah a lawm Adullam mi Hirah toh a hohtou uhi.
Mi’n Tamar, “Na pasal pa a belam mulmet ding in Timnah khua ah a hohtou” chi in, a hilh uhi.

A pasal sunna puansilhte a suah a, kikhuhnapuan in a kikhuh a, a kituam bikbek a, Timnah khaw lampi ah Enaim kulhkongpi ah a na tu hi. Shelah a pichingta ngal a, a pa’n a zi ding in amah a pisak kei, chih a thei hi.
Judah in amah a muh in kizuak hi’n teh a chi a; a mai lah a kikhuh bikbek ngal a.
Lampi gei a huai numei a va zuan a, “Kisa in, hehpih in i lumkhawm ding” a chi hi. A mou mah ahi, chih a thei ngalkei a. Aman, “Hon luppih leng bang n’on pedia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ganhon lak a kipan kelnou k’on khak ding” a chi hi. Aman, “Huai n’on khak ma in kichiamna bang n’on pedia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Kichiamna bang k’on pedia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Na min sawnna leh na taute leh na chiang” a chi hi. Huchi in hiaite a pia a, a luppih a, amah a kipan nau a paita hi.
A thou a, a kikhuhnapuan a suah a, a meithai puansilhte a silh nawnta hi.
Judah in a kichiamna numei khut a kipan la ding in a lawmpa Adullam mi khut ah kelnou a khak a, himahleh aman huai numei a va muzouta kei hi.
Huchi in, numei omna mun a mite kiang ah, “Lampi gei a Enaim a kizuaknu koi a om ahita a?” chi’n a dong hi. Amau, “Kizuak hiai ah a omkei” a chi uhi.
Huchi in, Judah kiang ah a kiknawn a, “Amah ka muzou kei. A mun a mite’n leng kizuak mawngmawng hiai ah a omkei a na chi uh” a chi hi.
Judah in, “Aman neiden mai hen, huchilou in zaw i zahlak kha ding. Ngai in, hiai kelnou khak ing a, amah lah mu zoulou chi in a” a chi hi.
Kha thum vel nung in mi’n, “Judah, na mounu, Tamar kizuak ve aw; huai lou leng, ngai in, sawn a pai hi” chi’n, a hilh uh. Judah in, “Pikhia unla, hallup in om hen” a chi hi.

A pikhiak uleh, Tamar in, “Hiai thilte neipa a kipan ahi nau ka pai” chi’n, a pasal pa kiang ah mi a sawl hi. Amahmah in, “Hehpih in hiai min sawnna, taute leh chiang, kua a ahia, enchian ding in ka hong thum” a chi hi.
Judah in huai thilte amah a ahi, chih a na thei hi. “Kei sang a amah diktat zaw ahi. Ka tapa Shelah lah amah toh ka na kiteng sakta kei a” a chi hi. Huchi in Judah in amah a luppih nawn hetkei hi.
Nau a veilai in hichi ahi a, ngai in, a sul ah phik a na om uhi.
Hichi ahi a, nau a veilai in khat in a khut a hon golhkhia a; naudommi in, “Hiai a pawt masa zaw ahi” chi’n a na len a, a khut ah khau san a bunsak hi.

Hichi ahi a, a khut a laklut nawn lai in, ngai in, a lamet louhpi in a unau a hong pawtkhia hi. Naudommi in, “Bangchidan a nang hon phusuak mawk na hia? Nang a mawh khu in” a chi hi. Huaiziak in a min Perez a sa uhi.
Huai nung in a unau, a khut a khau san bun pen a hongpawt nawn a, a min Zerah a sa uhi.
Huan, Joseph Aigupta gam ah a pisuk ua; Pharo nuai a heutu khat, vengtu pawl heutu, Aigupta mi, Potiphar in a hon pisuk Ishmaelte khut a kipan a leita hi.
Joseph kiang ah a om a, amah mi lohching tak ahi a; a pu Aigupta mi inn ah a om hi.
A pu in,
Huchi in Joseph in a pu deihsakna a mu a, a inn ah nna a semzel hi. Aman a inkuante tung ah heutu in a bawl a, a neih tengteng a khut ah a koihvek hi.
Hichi ahi a, a inn leh a neih tengteng tung a heutu dia a bawl nungsiah Joseph ziak in
Huchi in a neih tengteng Joseph khut ah a koih a, a neih teng, a annek kia lou ngal a theipih kei hi. Joseph pianhoih leh melhoih tak ahi.
Huai nung in hichi ahi a, a pu zi in Joseph a ngaih et a; “Hon luppih in” a chi hi.
Himahleh a utkei a, a pu zi kiang ah, “Ka pu in hiai inn ah ka kiang ah bangbang a om a chih lah a thei ngalkei a, a neih tengteng ka khut ah a koihvek hi.

Hiai inn sung ah kei sang a lian zaw kuamah a omkei. A zi na hih ziak in nang kia loungal, kei a kipan bangmah it a neikei hi. Bangchi’n hiai khelhna liantak hih in Pathian tung ah thil ka hihkhial thei dia?” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, niteng in Joseph houpih zel mah leh amah luppih lamthu hiam, amah kiang a om lamthu hiam a limsak nuam kei hi.
Huchih lai in hichi ahi a, a nna sem ding in inn sung ah a va lut a; inn sung ah mi himhim kuamah a omkei hi.
Huchi in aman, “Hon luppih in” chi in a puansilh in a na man a, aman a puansilh a khut a nusia in a taikhia hi.
Hichi ahi a, a puansilh a khut a nusia in a taikhia, chih a theihtakin,
A inn a mite a sam a, a kiang uah, “En un, hon zahlaksak ding in Hebru mi khat i kiang ua honpi eita ve. Hon luppih tum in ka kiang ah a honglut a, Huchi in ngaihtak in ka kikouta hi.
Hichi ahi a, aw suah a ngaihtak a ka kikou a zaktak in hiai ka kiang ah a puansilh a nusia a, a taikheta” a chi hi.
Joseph pu a hongtun masiah a puansilh a kiang ah a na koih gige hi.
A kiang ah hiai thu a na gen a, “Hebru sikha i kiang a na honpi in hon zahlaksak tum in ka kiang ah a honglut hi.
Hichi ahi a, aw suah a ka kikou tak in hiai a puansilh ka kiang a nusia in a taikheta” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Joseph pu in a zi in a kiang a, “Na sikha in hichi’n a honbawl” chi a, a thugen a zak in, a hehna a kuang hi.
Huchi in, Joseph pu in amah a pi a, suangkulh, kumpi suangkulhtangte khumna mun ah a khum a; huchi in suangkulh ah a omta hi.
Himahleh
Huchi in, suangkulh vengmi in suangkulh a tang tengteng Joseph khut ah a kemsakta hi. Huchi in, huai a, a hih peuhmah uh Joseph hih ahi.
Joseph kiang ah a om a, a thilhih peuhmah
Huan, huai thilkhit in hichi ahi a, Aigupta kumpipa uain pepa leh a tanghou bawlpa’n a pu uh Aigupta kumpipa a lungkim sakkei uhi.
Pharo a sikha heutu nihte tung ah, a uain pia heutupen tung ah leh a tanghou bawl heutupen tung ah a hehta hi.
Huchi in vengmi pawl heutu inn ah, suangkulh, Joseph hen a a omna ah, a tangsakta hi.
Vengmi pawl heutu in amau Joseph a kemsak a, amau a na a sepsak ua, ni bangzah hiam tak a tang uhi.
Suangkulh a hen a om, Aigupta kumpipa uain pepa leh tanghou bawlpa in zan khat mangkhiakna tuam tuak a nei uhi.
A zing in Joseph a kiang uah a valut a, amau a hong mu ua, ngai in, a na lungkham mahmah uhi.
Aman, “Bangchi na hi ua, tuni in lungkham mel paw natel u chia?” chi’n Pharo sikha heutu suangkulh a tangte a dong hi.

Amau a kiang ah, “Mang ka neituak ua, hon hilhchiansak thei kuamah lah a om ngalkei a ahi” a chi uh. Joseph in a kiang uah, “Mang hilhchetnate Pathian a ahi ka hia? Hehpih in na a mang uh honhilh un” a chi hi.
Huchi in, uain pia heutupen in a mang Joseph a hilh a, a kiang ah, “Ngai dih, ka mang in, ka ma ah grepgui a hongom hi.
Grepgui ah ka thum a om a, a hong selnou ua, a hongpak ua, a pakbomte’n grep minte a hon omsak uhi.
Pharo nou ka khut ah a hongom a; grep gahte ka lou a, Pharo nousung ah ka suk a, huai nou Pharo khut ah ka na pia” a chi hi.
Joseph in a kiang ah, a hilhchetna hiai ahi. “Ka thumte ni thum ahi.
Tu a kipan ni thum in Pharo in na lutang a domkang ding a, nna nasep mah a hon semsak nawn ding. A uain pepa na hihlai a, na piak ngeina bang in Pharo nou a khut ah na pe nawn ding.
Himahleh na hong hamphat chiang in hon theigige inla, hehpih in hehpihna ka tung ah hon kilang sak inla, Pharo kiang ah ka tungtang hon gen inla, hiai in a kipan hon pikhia in.
Hebrute gam a kipan mi’n a guk a, a hon gukmang uh ka hi a; hiai gam ah leng khuksunga a hon khumna ding in bangmah ka hih khial kei” a chi hi.
Tanghou bawlpa in hilhchetna a hoih chih a theih in, Joseph kiang ah, “Ken leng mang ka nei a, ngai in, lawhbeu thum ka lu in ka na pua hi.
Lawhbeu tungnungpen ah Pharo an, tanghou bawlpa bawl, chichih a na om hi. Huaite vasate’n lawhbeu ka lu a ka puaka kipan a na ne souhsouh uh,” a chi hi.
Joseph in a dawng a, “Hiai a hilhchetna ahi. Lawhbeu thum ni thum ahi.
Tu a kipan ni thum in Pharo in na pumpi a kipan na lutang a dom kang dia, singdawn ah a khai ding. Huchi in, vasate’n na sa a ne souhsouh ding uh” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, a ni thum ni, Pharo pian champha ni’n, aman a sikha tengteng ading in Ankuang a lui hi. A sikhate lak a uain pia heutupen lutang a domkangta hi.
Uain pia heutu pen uain pemi mah in a pangsak nawn a; Pharo khut ah nou a peta hi.
Himahleh Joseph in amau a hilhchet bangtak in, tanghou bawl heutupen a khailumta hi.
Himahleh, uain pia heutu pen in Joseph a theigige kei a, a mangngilhta hi.
Huan kum nih vingveng nung in hichi ahi a, Pharo in mang a nei a; ngai in, luigei ah a na ding hi.
Ngai in, bawngpi sagih hoihtak tak, thautak tak tui a kipan a hong pawtkhe tou ua, loupa nou lak ah a hongta uhi.
Ngai in, bawngpi dang sagih kil theuthou, gawng gemgom a hong pawtkhe nawn ua, bawngpi dangte kiang ah luigei ah ading uhi.
Bawngpi kil theuthoute’n bawngpi hoihtak tak, thau taktakte a negai maimah uhi.
Huchi in, Pharo a khanglou a, a ihmu nawn a, mang a nei nawn hi. Ngai in, buhkung khat ah a vui sagih lian pipi, hoih liahliah a hongom khia hi.
Ngai in, huai nung in vui sagih ngat giuhgeuh suahlam huih in a nuai ek a hong omkhe nawn hi.
A vui ngat giuhgeuhte’n a vui sagih lian pipi, hoih liahliahte a valhkhin maimah uh. Huchi in Pharo a khanglou a; ngai in, mang a na hi.

A zing in hichi ahi a, a lungsim a buai mahmah a; mi a sawl a, Aigupta gam a mitkhialdawi siam tengteng leh mi pil tengteng a samkhawm hi. Pharo in a mang amau a na hilh a; himahleh Pharo mangte hilhchian thei kuamah a omkei uhi.
Huchih lai in uain pia heutupen in Pharo kiang ah, “Tuni in ka khelhna ka thei khia hi.
Khatvei Pharo a sikhate tung ah a heh a, huchi in vengmipawl heutu inn ah kei leh tanghou bawl heutupen a hon tangsak hi.
Kei leh aman zan khat mang ka nei ua, mang khiakna tuam tuak ahi ka mat uh.
Huai ah ka kiang uah vengmi pawl heutu sikha, Hebru mi, tangval khat a om a; amah ka hilh ua, aman ka mangte uh a hilhchianta hi. Ka mang bang tuaktuak un a hon hilhchet sak hi.
Hichi ahi a, kei ka nasep mah a hon semsak nawn a, amah a khailumta hi” a chi hi.
Pharo in Joseph a samsak paha, kintak in suangkul a kipan a pikheta uh. Amah a kimet ngil a, a puansilh a khek a, Pharo kiang ah a va lutta hi.
Pharo in Joseph kiang ah, “Mang ka nei a, a hilhchian thei kuamah a omkei uh. Nang mang thu na theih leh na hilhchian thei chih na tungtang mi gen ka naza” a chi hi.
Joseph in Pharo a dawng a, “Huai ahihleh kei a om ahi kei hi. Pathian in Pharo lungkimhuaitakin a dawng zaw ding” a chi hi.
Pharo in Joseph kiang ah, “Ka mang in, ngai in, lui gei ah ka na ding hi.
Ngai in, bawngpi sagih thau taktak, hoih pipi tui a kipan a hong pawtkhe tou ua, loupa nou lak ah a hongta uhi.
Bawngpi dang sagih ginalou leh deihhuai lou leh gawng siatsuat, huchibang tel a hoihlou Aigupta gam tengteng a leng ka muh ngeilouh, a nung uah a hong pawtkhe tou nawn uhi.
Bawngpi gawng siatsuat deih huailou pipite’n bawngpi sagih thautak tak hongpawt masate a negai maimah uh.
A nekgaih khitnung un leng, a ne uh chih a kithei tuankei hi. A tunglai mah bang in deihhuailou tak in a om lailai uhi. Huchi in ka khanglouta hi.
Ka mang in, ngai in, buh kung khat ah vui sagih lian pipi, hoih pipi a hong vuikhia hi.
Ngai in, huai nung in vui sagih vuai ningniang, neuchik chik, suahlam huih in a nuai a hong vuikhe nawn hi.
A vui ngat ngiungeute’n a vui sagih hoihtaktakte a valhkhit maimah uh ka mu hi. Mitkhialdawi siamte ka hilh a, himahleh a hon hilhchian thei kuamah a omkei uh” chi’n, a gen hi.
Joseph in Pharo kiang ah, “Pharo mang khat ahi. Pathian in hihdia a kisak Pharo theisak ahi.
Bawng sagih hoihtaktakte kum sagih ahi ua; vui sagih hoihtaktakte leng kum sagih mah ahi uh. Mang khat ahi.
A nung ua bawng sagih tektaktak, deihhuailou taktak hongpawt khetoute kum sagih ahi ua, vui sagih a hawm ngen suahlam huih nuaite toh; huaite kial kum, kum sagih ding ahi.
Hiai ahi Pharo kiang a ka gen. Pathian in hihdia a kisak Pharo kiang a theisak ahi.
Ngai in, Aigupta gamsung tengteng ah niang leh tai a om kum, kum sagih a hongtung ding hi.
Huai nung in kial kum, kum sagih a hongom nawn ding. Huchi in niang leh tai a omna Aigupta gam ah mangngilh vek ahita ding. Kial in gam a negawp vek ding hi.
Niang leh tai kum honzui kial a thupi mahmah ding ziak in mite’n hiai gam hauhsaklai hun a thei nawnta kei ding uh;.
Pharo mang nihvei a neihtuan sakna ahihleh hiai ziak ahi. Thilhih ding Pathian in a hihkip a, Pathian in a tungsak pah ding.
Tuin Pharo in mi khat, teitak leh piltak zongkhia henla, Aigupta gam tung ah heutu in omsak hen.
Pharo in hiai hih hen. Gam tung ah heutute sep henla, niang leh tai a om kum, kum sagih sung Aigupta gam buh mun nga a khen, mun khat zel kaikhawm hen.
Amau huai kum hoih kum hongtung ding a buh tengteng kai khawm in Pharo nuai a om ding in khuate ah tunung a nek ding in buh sungkhawm henla, kholkhawm hen.
Kial ziak a gam a manlouhna ding in, buh kial kum, kum sagih Aigupta gam a hongtun hun a ding in hiai gam adia kiginkholhna ahi ding” a chi hi.
Huai thu Pharo leh a sikha tengteng in hoih a saklam tak uh ahi.
Pharo in a sikhate kiang ah, “Hichibang Pathian kha omna mi i muzou ding ua hia?” a chi hi.
Pharo mah in Joseph kiang ah, “Pathian in hiai tengteng hon theihsak ziak in, nang bang a tei leh pil himhim a omkei uhi.
Nang ka inn kawte tung ah heutu in na om ding a, ka khua leh tui tengteng na thu bangzel in a om ding uh. mangtutphah a tut thu ah kia nang sang in ka lianzaw ding” a chi hi.
Pharo mah in Joseph kiang ah, “En in, Aigupta gam tengteng tung ah heutu in k’on bawl hi” a chi hi.
Pharo in a khut a kipan a min sawnna zungbuh a tolkhia a, Joseph khut ah a bunsak a, puanmalngat a bawl puansilhte a silhsak a, a ngawng ah dangkaeng khainiang a oksak hi.
A kangtalai neih nihna ah a tuangsak a; a ma ah khukdin un, chi’n, mi a kikousak hi. Huchi in, Aigupta gam tengteng tung ah heutu in a bawlta hi.
Pharo in Joseph kiang ah, “Kei Pharo ka hi, na thu lou in Aigupta gamsung tengteng ah kuamah in a khut uh hiam, a khe uh hiam a likkei ding” a chi hi.
Pharo in Joseph min Zaphnath paneah a sa a; On khaw siampu Potipher tanu Asenath a zi ding in a pia hi. Joseph a pawt a, Aigupta gam a siksuak hi.
Joseph Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharo ma a a dinlai in kum sawmthum a upa ahi. Joseph Pharo a kipan a pawt a, Aigupta gam tengteng a siksuak hi.
Hauh kum, kum sagih sung, lei in buh tampi a tungsak hi.
Aigupta gam a hauh kum, kum sagih a hongtung a, buh tengteng a dongkhawm a, huai buhte khuate ah a sungkhawmta hi. A kim a om khochih lou a buhte a sungkhawm chiat hi.
Joseph in buh tampi tuipi piaunel zah bang in a sungkhawm venvon a, a sim leng a tawphial hi; simzoh vuallouh ahihtak ziak in.
Kial hongtun ma in Joseph in tapa nih a nei a, huaite On khaw siampu Potipher tanu Asenath in a neihsakte ahi uhi.
Joseph in a tapa masa min Manasseh a sa a; “Pathian in ka sepgimna leh ka pa inn sung mite tengteng a hon mangngilh sakta” a chi hi.
A tapa nihna min Ephraim a sa a; “Pathian in ka gimthuakna gam ah chi a hon suangsakta” a chi hi.
Hauh kum, kum sagih Aigupta gam a hongtung a beita hi.
Kial kum, kum sagih ding, Joseph gen bang in a hongtung panta hi. Gamchih ah kial a hong keta a; Aigupta gamsung teng ah bel nekding a om hi.
Aigupta gam a mi tengteng a kial tak un, Pharo kiang ah nekding ngen in a kikou uhi. Pharo in Aigupta mite kiang ah, Joseph kiang ah hoh unla; na kiang ua a gen peuhmah hih un, a chi hi.
Leitung pumpi ah kial a keta hi. Joseph in sunkhawmna buhinte a hong a, Aigupta gam ah leng kial a nakkiak mahmah hi.
Leitung pumpi a kial a nakkiak ziak in gamchih a mite buh lei ding in Aigupta gam ah Joseph kiang ah a hongzel uhi.
Huan, Jakob in Aigupta gam ah buh a om, chih a thei hi. Jakob in a tapate kiang ah, “Bangdia ki en maimah na hi ua?” a chi hi.
Amahmah in, “Ngai un, Aigupta gam ah buh a om, chih ka za hi. Silou a i hinkhiak theihna ding in huai ah va hohsuk unla, huai a kipan ei ading in valei un” a chi hi.
Joseph unau sawmte Aigupta a buhlei ding in a hohsuk uhi.
Joseph nau Benjamin Jakob in a ute kiang ah a hohsak kei hi. Tuahsia a va tuak kha ding, a chi hi.
Israel tapate mi hohte lak ah buh lei ding in a hoh ua; Kanan gam ah leng kial a ke ngal a.
Joseph Aigupta gam tung ah heutu ahi a; amah huai gam mi tengteng kiang a buh zuakpa ahi. Joseph ute a hongpai ua, leisi in a mai ah a kun uhi.

Joseph in a ute a na mu a, amau a na theilai hi. Himahleh a kiang uah midang bang in a kibawla, khauhtak in amau a houpih hi. A kiang uah, “Koi a kipan a hong na hi ua?” a chi hi. Amau, “Buh lei dia Kanan gam a kipan hongpai ka hi uh” a chi uhi.
Joseph in a ute a theilai a, amau bel amah a theikei uhi.
Joseph in amau tungtang thu, manga a matte a theikheta hi. A kiang uah, “Enkhemite na hi uh. Gam venlouhna munte en dia hong kuan na hi uh” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “toupa, hilou e, na sikhate buh lei dia hong kuan ka hi uh.
Mi khat ta vek ka hi ua, mi diktak ka hi uh. Na sikhate enkhemite ka hi zenzen kei uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ka taksang kei, gam venlouhna munte en dia hongpai hi mah uteh” a chi hi.
Amau, “Kou na sikhate unau sawmlehnih, Kanan gam a om, mi khat tate ka hi uh. Ngai in, ka nautumpen uh tuin ka pa uh kiang ah a om hi. Khat pen ahihleh a om nawnta kei hi” a chi uhi.
Joseph in a kiang uah, “Enkhemite na hi uh k’on chih na hi mahmah uhi.
Hichibang a ettel in na om ding uh. Na nautumpen uh hiai a, a hongpai keileh Pharo hinna a kichiam in hiai a kipan na pawtkhe kei ding uh, k’on chi ahi.

Nou ah thutak a om hia, omlou chetna ding in na lak ua khat sawl unla, na nau uh honpi hen. Nou bel hen in na om phot ding uhi. Huchilou in zaw Pharo hinna a kichiam in, enkhemite na hi mahmah uh, k’on chi ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in avek un ni thum a tangsak chiat hi.
A ni thum ni’n Joseph in a kiang uah, “Hichi’n hih le uchin na hing ding uh; Pathian ka lau hi.
Midiktat na hih uleh na unau lak uah khat na suangkulh tanna in uah hen in om hen.
Na nautumpen uh ka kiang ah honpi un. Huchi in na thu uh a tel dia, na sikei ding uh” a chi hi. Huchibang in a hihta uhi.

Amau, “I nau tung a i thilhih uh mawh petmah i hi, hehpih dia a honnget ngutngut lai a, a lungtang mangbat dan mu napi a, i ngaihkhiak saknop louh uh. Huaiziak in hiai mangbatna in hon buak ahi” a kichi uhi.
Reuben in, “Naupang tung ah thil hihkhial kei un, chi’n, na kiang uah ka gen kei maw? Na ngaikhe nuam kei ua ahi. Huaiziak in, ngai un, a sisan phu i tung ua lak ahi tave” chi’n, amau a dawng hi.
A kal ua pauletmi a om ziak in Joseph in a thugen uh a thei chih a theikei uhi.
Aman amau a lehngatsan a, a kapta hi. A kiang uah a hong kiknawn a, amau a houpih a, a lak ua pan Simeon a pituam a, a mitmuh un a henta hi.
Joseph in a ipte uh buh a hihdim ding leh a dangkate uh a ip ua koih nawnchiat ding in leh lampi a nekding pe ding in thu a pia hi. Huchi in huchibang in a hihsakta hi.
A buh uh a sabiltungte a pawsak ua, huai a kipan a pawtkheta uhi.
A lak ua mi khat in a giahbuk ua a sabiltung an pedia a ip a hon leh, a dangka a muta hi. Ngai in, a ip gongbul ah a na om hi.

A unaute kiang ah, “Ka dangka na koihnawn uh hi ve e. Ngai un, ka ipsung ah a na om hi” a chi hi. A lunglel ua, “Pathian in hichibang a eite a honbawl bangchidan a diam aw?” chi’n, ling kawm in a ki entuah uhi.
Kanan gam a a pa uh kiang a hongtung ua, a tung ua thil tung tengteng a hilh uhi.
“Huai mi, a gam heutupa un, khauhtak in a hon houpih a, enkhemite ding in a honkoih hi.
Kou a kiang ah, mi diktak ka hi uh. ‘Enkhemite ka hi zenzen kei uh.’
Unau sawmlehnih ka hi ua, ka pa uh tapate ka hi vek uh. Khat a om nawn kei a, ka nautumpen uh tuin Kanan gam ah ka pa uh kiang ah a om” ka chi uhi.
Huai mi, a gam heutupa un, ka kiang uah, “Hichi’n midiktak na hi uh chih k’on thei ding. Na unau khat uh ka kiang ah nusia unla, na inkuanpih kialte ading in buh pua unla, paita un.

Na nautumpen uh ka kiang ah honpi un. Huchi in enkhemite na hi kei ua, midiktak na hi zaw uh, chih ka thei ding. Huchi in na unaupa uh k’on penawn dia, hiai gam ah sum na sinta ding uh” a honchi, a chi uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a ipte uh a butkhiak lai un, ngai in, a dangka tunchiat uh a ip uah a na omchiat hi. Amau leh a pa un a dangka tunte uh a muh un a lau mahmah uhi.

A pa uh Jakob in a kiang uah, “Noute’n ka tate hon tansak na hi uh. Joseph a om nawn kei. Simeon lah a om nawn kei, Benjamin nasan lah pimang na tum nawn uh. Hiai thil tengteng in honkiak khum eita ve” a chi hi.
Reuben in a pa kiang ah, “Na kiang a k’on pi kiknawn kei leh ka tapa nihte that mai in. Amah ka khut ah hon kemsak inla, na kiang ah k’on pi kiknawn mai ding” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka tapa na kiang uah a hongsuk kei ding. A u a sita a, amah kia lah ahita ngal a. Na paina lam lak ah tuahsia tuak leh ka lu kang lungkhamna in han ah na tumsak ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan, huai gam ah kial a nakkiak mahmah hi.
Hichi ahi a, Aigupta gam a kipan a buh puaktouh uh a nekgaih nung un, a pa un, a kiang uah, “Kuan nawn unla buh tawmchik bek ei ading in valei nawn un” a chi hi.
Huchi in, Judah in a kiang ah, “Huai mi’n, na nau uh n’on tonpih kei uleh, ka mel na mu kei ding uh, chi’n, honkalh ngiungeu hi.
Ka nau uh n’on zuihsak ding leh, buh k’on va leisak ding uh.
N’on zuihsak keileh zaw, ka hohkei ding uh. Huai mi’n ka kiang uah, Na nau uh n’on tonpih kei uleh, ka mel na mu kei ding uh, a chita ngal a” chi’n a gen hi.
Israel in, “Bangziak in ahia nau dang na neihlai tantan na hilh chitchiat uh? Kei adia hoihlou na hih uh?” a chi hi.

Amau, “Huai mi’n, na pa uh hinglai hia? Unau dang na neilai uhia? chi’n, i tanchin leh i tanaute tanchin a hon dong hi. A hon thudot bangzel in ka hilh uhi. Na nau uh hon pisukun, a chi ding chih kuan a thei chitchiat dia?” a chi uh.
Judah in a pa Israel kiang ah, “Ka nau uh hon zuisakin. Huchi in ka kisa ding ua, ka kuan ding uh. Kou leh nang leh ka ta neu chikchikte u leng silou a i hin theihna ding un.
A tungtang thu keimah in bultum na ning. Ka khut a kipan mahmah ah amah honphut in. Amah na kiang a ka honpi kiknawn kei a, na ma a k’on dinsak nawn kei leh, a mawh tangtawn in ka paw ding hi.
Om sawtlou hile ung, a nihveina hongtung nawn khinta ding hi ung” a chi hi.

A pa uh Israel in a kiang uah, “Huchibang a hih vanglak leh hichi’n hih un. Na seng un hiai gam a thil hoih khenkhat singnai damdawi, khuaizu, gimnamtui, Murra, theihawksek leh makha gah, neukha chiat huai mi ading thilpiak tawisuk un.
Dangka a mun nih in tawi unla, na ip gongbul ua a hon dangka piak nawn leng tawi nawn un; a muhkhelh ahi kha ding.
Na nau u leng pi unla, thou unla, huai mi kiang ah va hoh nawn un.
Na unau khat pen uleh Benjamin a hon khahsakna ding in Pathian bangkim hihthei in huai mi hon hehpihsak hen. Ka tate tan ahihleh tan ka himai kei ding hia” a chi hi.
Huchi in, thilpiak a tawi ua, dangka leng a mun nih a tawi ua, Benjamin leng a pi uhi. A thou ua, Aigupta gam ah a hohsuk ua, Joseph ma ah ading nawn uhi.
Joseph in Benjamin a kiang ua om a muhtak in, a inn kemmi kiang ah, “Huai mite inn sung ah pilut inla, sa gou inla, bawl in, huai mite’n sun chiang in ka kiang ah an a ne ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in, aman Joseph thupiak bang in a hihta a; Joseph inn ah a pilutta hi.

Joseph inn a pilut a, a om ziak un a lau ua, “I hoh masak lai a, i ip ua dangka hong kiknawnte ziak in eive a hon pilut uh. I tung ua siatna zong a, honsual in, ei leh i sabiltungte toh sikha dia hon mattum eive,” a chi uhi.
Joseph inn kemmi kiang ah a va hoh ua, kongbul ah a houpih uh.
“Pu aw, ka hong masak lai ua buh lei ding lel a hongsuk ka hi uh.
Hichi ahi a, giahbuk ka tun un ka ipte uh ka hong ua, ngai in, ka dangka chiat uh ka ip gongbul uah a na om hi. Ka dangka uh a buk ngeingei in a na om a, huchi in ka hontawi uhi.
Buh leina ding in dangka dang k’on tawi ua, ka dangka u lah kuan ahia ka ip ua koih ka thei ngalkei uh” a chi uh.
Aman, “Lungmuangtakin om unla, lau kei un. Na Pathian, na pa uh Pathian in na ipte uah gou a honpia ahi maive. Na dangka ulah ka mungal a” a chi hi. Huchi in Simeon a kiang uah a hon pikhia hi.
Huai mi in Joseph inn sung ah amau a pilut a, tui a pia hi. A khe uh a sil ua; a sabiltungte u leng an a pia hi.
A thilpiak tawi uh Joseph sun an ne dia a hongpai ma in a na bawlkhol uh; huai ah an a ne ding uh, chihlah a za uhi.
Joseph a inn a, a hong paitakin, a khut ua thilpiak om inn sung ah, a kiang ah a tawilut ua, leisi in a mai ah a kun chiat uhi.
Aman a tanchin uh a dong a, “Na pa uh tanchin na gen uh, huai putek a damdam na hia? A hing lai hia?” a chi hi.
Amau, “Na sikha ka pu uh a damlai hi, a hinglai hi” a chi uh. Huchi in a lu uh a kun sak ua, zahtakna a pia uhi.
Amah a dak a, a nau Benjamin, a nu tapa a mu a, “Hiai na nautumpen uh, a tanchin na honhilh uh hia?” a chi hi. Amahmah in, “Ka tapa, Pathian in hon hehpih hen” a chi hi.
Joseph in a nau a muh in a khase mahmah a, kintak in kahna ding mun a zongpah a, a dantan sung ah a lut a, huai ah a kap kheta hi.
A mai a phiat a, a vapawt nawn a, a kidek teitei a, annek bawl un, a chi hi.

Huchi in amah ading atuam in, amau ading atuam in, Aigupta mi a nekpihte ading atuam in a bawlta uhi. Aiguptate’n lah Hebrute a nekpih thei ngalkei ua; huchibang hihlah Aiguptate ading in thil sianglou ahi.
Huchi in, a upapen tamasa a hihna bang in, a naupangpen nautumpen a hihna bang in Joseph ma ah a tu ua; huchi in lamdang a sa chiat uhi.
Joseph in a ma a mite a kipan tantuan an a ban piaksaka, Benjamin tantuan houh amaute tantuan tengteng sang in a mun nga in a tam tuam hi. Uain a dawn ua, nuam a sa chiat uhi.
Huan, aman a inn kemmi kiang ah, “Huai mite ip in a puakzoh zahzah uh buh in dimsak inla, a dangka chiat uh a ip gong bul chiat uah koih in.
Ka nou, huai dangka nou, a naupang penpa ip gong bul ah koih in, a buh man dangka toh” chi’n, thu a pia hi. Huchi in, aman Joseph thugen bang in a hihta hi.
Khua a vaktakin amau a sabiltungte utoh a paisakta hi.
Khua a kipan a paikhiak ua gamla a tunma un, Joseph in a inkemmi kiang ah, “Thou inla, huai mite va delh in. Na va phak chiang in a kiang uah, Bangchidana thil hoih, thil hoihlou a thuk na hi ua?
Huai ka pu uain dawnna leh a aisanna mahmah hilou ahi maw? Hichibang na hih uh na gilou uhi” chi in, a chi hi.
A delhpha a, huai thute a kiang uah a gen hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Pu, bangchidan ahia hichi thu na gen? Na sikhate’n huchibang thil ka hihlouh ding dan uh.
Ngai in, ka ip gongbul ua dangka ka muhte uh leng Kanan gam a kipan na kiang ah k’on tawi ve ua oi. Bangchidan in na pu inn a dangka hiam dangkaeng hiam ka gu thei maizen ding ua?
Na sikhate lak ah kuapeuh na muhna penpen si hen, kou leng ka pu uh sikha in ka om mai ding uh” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Hi hen, na thu bangzel un hi hen. Himahleh kuapeuh k’on muhna penpen ka sikha in om hen. Nou ahihleh dembei na hi ding uh,” a chi hi.
Huaitak in amau ipchiat uh kintak in lei ah a ngakhia ua, amau ipchiat a hong uhi.
Aman a upapen ah apan a, a naupangpen pha in a zong a; Huchi in Benjamin ip ah nou a muta hi.
Huaitak in a puansilhte uh a botkek ua, amau sabiltung chiat a pawsak nawn ua, khua ah a kiknawnta uhi.
Judah leh a unaute’n Joseph inn a vapha ua; amah huai ah a na omlai hi. Huchi in a mai ah a khupboh chiat uh.
Joseph in a kiang uah, “Bang thil ahi mai a na hih uh? Kei bang mi, aisan a siam teitei uh, chih na theikei ua hia?” a chi hi.

Judah in, “Pu, na kiang ah bang ka genta ding ua? Bang k’on hilhta ding ua? Bangchibang in ka kigen vengta ding ua? Pathian in na sikhate tatlekna a mu kheta hi. Ngai in, pu, na sikhate ka hita mai uh. Kou leh a khut a nou a muhna pen uh leng” a chi hi.
Aman, “Huchibang a ka hihlouh ding dan. A khut a nou a muhna pen kia ka sikha in a om ding a, nou zaw lungmuangtakin na pa uh kiang ah paitouta un” a chi hi.

Huaitak in, Judah in Joseph a vanaiha, “Pu aw, hehpih in, pu, kei na sikha, na bil a na zak ding in thu kam khat hon gensak inla, na hehna na sikha tung ah kuangsak ken. Nang lah Pharo bang hial na hita hi.
Pu, nang, ‘Pa hiam unau hiam na nei uhia?’ chi’n, na sikhate na hondong hi.
Pu, kou na kiang ah, ‘Pa putek tak leh a teklam a neih naupangchik, ka nei uh. Huai mi upa a sita a, a nu neih lak ah amah kia a omlai a, a pa’n lah amah a it mahmah hi’ ka chi uhi.
Nang na sikhate kiang ah, amah pen ka mit a ka muh theihna ding in ka kiang ah hon pisuk un, na chi hi.
Pu, kou na kiang ah, ka nau un a pa a nuse theikei ding; a pa paisan leh a pa a simai ding, ka chi uhi.
Nang na sikhate kiang ah, ‘Na nautumpen uh n’on tonpih kei uleh, ka mel na mu nawn kei ding uh’ na chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, na sikha ka pa uh kiang ka vatun un, Pu, na thu ka hilh uhi.
Ka pa un, ‘Kuan nawn unla, buh tawmchik bek ei ading in va lei nawn un’ a chi hi.
Kou, ‘ka hohsuk thei nawn kei ding uh. Ka nautumpen uh a hongding leh bel ka hohsuk ding ua, ka nautumpen uh a hong keileh huai mi mel mu theilou ding ka hi uh’ ka chi uh.
Na sikha ka pa un ka kiang uah, ‘ka zi in tapa nih a hon neihsak, chih na thei uhi.
A khat pen ka kiang a kipan a paikhia a, bohzan vek a om hingei ding ahi, ka chi hi. Huai nungsiah amah mulou vengveng ka hi.
Huchi in, hiai mi leng ka kiang a kipan na pimang ua, tuahsia va tuak leh ka lu kang lungkham a hana tumsak ding na hi uh,’ a chi hi.
Huchi in, ka nau in kou honzui lou a, na sikha ka pa kiang vatung leng, a hinna, ka nau uh hinna toh a kizop ziak in,
hichi ahi ding a, naupang in a hon zuikei, chih a theih chiang in a si mai ding. Huchi in na sikhate’n na sikha ka pa uh lu kang lungkhamna a han a tumsak ding ka hi uhi.
Na sikha in na kiang a ka honpi kiknawn kei leh, a mawh tangtawn in ka pa lak ah ka paw ding, chi’n, ka pa kiang ah ka nau uh tungtang thu ah a bultumpa in ka kibawlta hi.
Huchi in, hehpih in na sikha ka nau uh sik in, Pu, na sikha in hon omsak inla, ka nau a ute zuitou sak in.
Ka nau in hon zuilou in bangchi’n ka pa kiang ka paitou thei dia? A tung a siatna tung mu ding ka kei hiam” a chi hi.
Huan, a kiang a dingte ma ah Joseph a kidek zouta kei a, “Mi tengteng ka kiang a kipan pawtkhesak vek un” chi’n, a kikou hi. Joseph a unaute kiang a a kigen sungteng a kiang ah kuamah ading kei uh.
A kap lawlawih a, Aiguptate’n a za ua, Pharo inkuanpihte’n leng a za uhi.
Joseph in a unaute kiang ah, “Joseph ka hi. Ka pa a damlai na maw?” a chi hi. Himahleh a unaute’n a dawng theikei ua, a ma ah buaitak in a omta uhi.
Joseph mah in a unaute kiang ah, “Hehpih in honnaih un” a chi hi. Huchi in a vanaih ua, aman, “Na unaupa uh Joseph, Aigupta gam a lutpih dia na khot uh ka hi.
Himahleh hiai a paiding a n’on khot ziak un lungkham kei unla, ki hehkhum tuankei un. Mite hinna hondam ding in Pathian in na ma ua honsawl masa ahi.
Hiai kum nih sung hiai gam ah kial a keta a; kum nga in a samlai hi. Huai sung in leileh a omkei dia, buhlak leng a omkei ding.
Tu nung khang om zel ding hawisak ding leh noute hotdamna thupitak a hingdam a k’on omsak theihna ding in Pathian in na ma uah a honsawl masa hi.
Huchi in, hiai a honsawl nou na hi kei ua, Pathian ahizaw hi. Aman Pharo pa inn leh a inkuanpih tengteng heutu in leh Aigupta gam tengteng vaihawmtu in a hon bawlta hi.
“Kintak in ka pa kiang ah vapai unla, a kiang ah, na tapa Joseph in hichi’n a chi. Pathian in Aigupta gam tengteng heutu in a hon bawlta a, ka kiang ah hong paisuk in, sawt hon halken.
Huchi in, Gosen gam ah na teng ding a, ka kiang ngei ah na om ding; nang, na tate, na tute, na belamhonte, na bawnghonte leh na neih tengteng toh.
Hiai ah keimah in ka honvak ding. Kial lah kum nga omlai ding ahi ngal a. Huchilou in zaw na genthei kha ding, nang leh na inkuanpihte leh na neih tengteng toh” honchi un.
Ngai un, noumau mit ngei leh ka nau Benjamin mit ngei in keimah kam mahmah in a genlai na mu kilkel uhi.
Aigupta gam a ka thupina tengteng thu leh na thilmuh tengteng thu uh ka pa na hilh ding ua; ka pa kintak in hiai ah n’on pisuk pah ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
A nau Benjamin ngawng a kun in a kapta a; Benjamin leng amah ngawng a kun in a kapta hi.
A unau tengteng a tawp a, a kahkhum chiat a, huaikhit in a unaute’n thu vantang a genpih uhi.
Joseph unaute a hong uh chih thu thuthang Pharo inkawte’n a naza uhi. Huai in Pharo leh a sikhate a kipaksak mahmah hi.
Pharo in Joseph kiang ah, “Na unaute kiang ah, huchi in hih in. Na gante uh buh pawsak unla, pawt unla, Kanan gam ah pai un.
Na pa uh leh na inkuanpihte uh honpi unla, ka kiang ah hongpai un. Aigupta gam a thilhoihte k’on pe ding a, hiai gam a thil om hoihpente na ne ding uh.
Thu k’on pia hi. Hichi’n hih un. Na ta neu chikchikte uh ading leh na zite uh ading Aigupta gam a kipan kangtalaite la unla, na pa uh pi ding in va kuan un.
Na van uh leng ngaihtuah nuam dah un, Aigupta gam tengteng thil hoih peuhmah nou a ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Israel tate’n huchibang in a hih ua, Joseph in Pharo thupiak bang in kangtalaite a kiang uah a pia a, lampi a nekding leng a pia hi.
Avek ua kiang ah puansilh kikhenna ding a pe chiat a; Benjamin kiang ngial ah houh dangka za thum leh puansilh kikhenna ding nga a pia hi.
A pa kiang ah hiaite a khak hi: Aigupta gam a thil hoih pua sabiltung sawm leh lampi a, a pa ading buh leh tanghou leh nekding pua sabengtungnu sawm.
Huchi in a unaute a sawlkhia a, a paita uhi. Aman a kiang uah, “Lampi ah kina lou ding in pilvang un” a chi hi.
Aigupta gam a kipan a paitou ua, Kanan gam a a pa Jakob kiang a va tungta uhi.
A kiang ah, “Joseph a hinglai a, Aigupta gam tengteng heutu ahi” chi in, a hilh uhi. A thugen uh a gintak louh ziak in, a lungtang a bahta hi.
A kiang ua Joseph thugente a hilh ua; a tuanna ding kangtalai Joseph in a khakte a muh in Jakob lungtang a halhnawn hi.
Israel in, “A hunta; ka tapa Joseph hingdam a na om ahi maw. Ka sih ma in amah ka va mu ding” a chi hi.
Huan, Israel a neih tengteng toh a pawt a, Beer–sheba a tung a, a pa Isak Pathian kiang ah kithoihnate a lan hi.
Pathian in zan a mengmuhna in Israel a houpih a, “Jakob, Jakob,” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hiai ah ka om,” a chi hi.
Aman, “Kei Pathian, na pa Pathian ka hi. Aigupta gam a hohsuk lau ken. Huai ah chi thupitak in k’on bawl ding hi.
Aigupta gam ah na kiang ah ka hong dia; k’on pitou nawn ngeingei ding, na sih chiang in Joseph in hon mitsi sak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in, Jakob Beer–sheba a kipan a pawt a; Israel tate’n a pa uh Jakob leh a ta neuchikchikte uh leh a zite uh tuanna dia Pharo in kangtalai a khakte ah a tuangsak uhi.
Huchi in, Jakob leh a suan tengteng in Kanan gam a a lamkhiak uh, gante leh vante tawi in, Aigupta gam a tungta uhi.
A tapate, a tupate, a tanute, a tunute leh a suan tengteng, Aigupta gam ah a lutpihta hi.
Hiaite Israel suan Aigupta gam a lut, Jakob leh a tapate min ahi. Reuben, Jakob ta masa.
Reuben tapate Hanok, Pallu, Hezron leh Karmi ahi uh.
Simeon tapate: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Johar leh Kanan numei tapa Shaul ahi uh.
Levi tapate: Gershon, Kohath leh Merari ahi uh.
Judah tapate: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez leh Zerah ahi ua; (Er leh Onan Kanan gam ah a sita ua) Perez tapate Hezron leh Hamul ahi uh.
Issakar tapate: Tola, Puva, Job leh Shimron ahi uh.
Zebulun tapate: Sered, Elon leh Jhaleel ahi uh.
Hiaite tengteng Leah tapa, a tanu Dinah toh, Padan-aram gam a Jakob a neihsakte ahi ua; a tapate leh a tanu tengteng sawmthum leh thum ahi uh.
Gad tapate: Ziphion, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arobdi leh Areli ahi uh.
Asher tapate: Jimnah, Ishuah, Isui leh Beriah leh a sanggamnu uh Serah ahi uh. Beriah tapate: Heber leh Malkiel ahi uhi.
Hiaite Zilpah Laban in a tanu Leah kiang a a piak tapate, Jakob a neihsak mi sawmlehguk ahi uhi.
Jakob zi Rakil tapate: Joseph leh Benjamin ahi uh.
Joseph in Aigupta gam ah tapa Manasseh leh Ephraim a nei a, huai mite On khaw siampu Potipher tanu Asenath in amah a neihsakte ahi uh.
Benjamin tapate: Belah, Beker, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim leh Ard ahi uh.
Hiaite Rakil tapa Jakob a neihsakte ahi ua; avek un sawmlehli ahi uh.
Dan tapa Husim ahi.
Naphtali tapate: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer leh Shillem ahi.
Hiaite Bilhah tapate Laban in a tanu Rakil kiang a a piak ahi uh. Hiaite Jakob a neihsak a; avek un sagih ahi uh.
Jakob tapate zite simlouh in Jakob kiang a Aigupta gam a lut, a khal a pawt tengteng avek un sawmguk leh guk ahi uhi.
Joseph in Aigupta gam a tapa a neihte nih ahi ua; Jakob inn kawte, Aigupta gam a lutte, sawmsagih ahi uhi.
Jakob in Gosen gam lampi na kawkmuh ding in Joseph kiang ah Judah a hohmasa sak hi.
Huchi in, Gosen gam ah a lutta uh. Joseph in a kangtalai a bawlkhol a, Gosen gam ah a pa dawn ding in a hohtou hi. A kiang ah a kigen a, a ngawng a kun in a kap nilouh hi.
Israel in Joseph kiang ah, “Dam in na om a, na mel ka muh nawn ziak in tun zaw si ding in ka kimanta” a chi hi.
Joseph in a unaute leh a pa inkuanpihte kiang ah, “Ka va hohtou dia, Pharo ka hilh dia, a kiang ah, ka unaute leh ka pa inkuanpihte, Kanan gam a omte ka kiang a hongtungta uhi.
Amaute ganvulmi, belamchingmite ahi uhi. A belamhonte uleh a bawnghonte uh leh a neih tengteng uh a honpaw vek uhi, chi’n, ka vagen ding.
Hichi ahi ding a, Pharo in nou a honsap a, bang nasem na hi ua? a honchih chiang in,

Na sikhate, hon suangtute a kipan naupang chik ka hih lai ua pan in tutan ganvulmi ka hi uh, na chi ding uh. Huchi in, Gosen gam ah na tengthei ding uhi” a chi hi. Belamchingmite himhim lah Aigupta mite kihlam tak ahi uhi.

Huaikhit in Joseph in Pharo a va hilh a, a kiang ah, “Ka pa, ka unaute, a belamhonte uh, a bawnghonte uh leh a neih tengteng u toh Kanan gam a kipan a hongtung suk ua; ngai in, Gosen gam ah a om uh” a chi hi.
A unaute lak a kipan mi nga a pi a, Pharo a valak hi.
Pharo in a unaute kiang ah, “Bang nasem na hi ua?” a chi hi. Amau Pharo kiang ah, “Na sikhate, kou hon suangtute a kipan, belamchingmite ka hi uh” a chi uhi.

Amau mah in Pharo kiang ah, “Hiai gam a om tadih dia hong ka hi ua; ka gam uah lah na sikhate belamhonte nekding a om nawnta kei a; kial lah Kanan gam ah a uang mahmah hi; hehpih in na sikhate Gosen gam ah hon tengsak in” a chi uhi.
Pharo in Joseph a houpih a, “Na pa leh na unaute na kiang ah a hongta ua;
Aigupta gam a kiching mahmah hi. Na pa leh na unaute gam hoihna mun ah tengsak in. A lak ua thilhihtheitak, theihna nei ngial a om leh ka gam tung a heutu ding in bawl in” a chi hi.
Joseph in a pa Jakob a pilut a, Pharo ma ah a dingsak a; Jakob in Pharo a vualzawl hi.
Pharo in Jakob kiang ah, “Kum bang zah na hita a?” a chi hi.
Jakob in Pharo kiang ah, “Ka khualzin nung zaw kum za leh sawmthum ahi a, ka damsung kumte a tawm a, a haksa hi. A hon suangtute a khualzin lai ua a damsung kum u leng phazou kei ing” a chi hi.
Huchi in Jakob in Pharo a vualzawl a, Pharo a kipan a pawtta hi.
Joseph in a pa leh a unaute tenna a bawlsaka, Pharo thupiak bang in Aigupta gam a mun hoihpen ah, Rameses gam a gou ding un a peta hi.
Joseph in a pa leh a unaute leh a pa inkuanpih tengteng a inkuan uh bangzel in nekding a pia a, a vakta hi.
Huai gam tengteng ah nekding himhim a omta kei a; kial lah a uang mahmah hi. Kial ziak in Aigupta leh Kanan gam a bahta hi.
Joseph in a buh leina man uh, Aigupta gam leh Kanan gam a dangka om tengteng a khawmsak vek hi. Joseph in huai dangka Pharo inn ah a tawilut hi.

Aigupta gam leh Kanan gam a dangka tengteng a zatbei khit un, Aigupta mi tengteng Joseph kiang ah a hong ua, “Nekding honpia in. Na ma a si maimah ding ka hi ding uam? Dangka lah a om nawnta ngal kei a” a chi uhi.
Joseph in, “Na gante uh hon pemai un. Dangka a om nawn kei leh na gan man un nekding k’on pe ding” a chi hi.

A gante uh Joseph kiang ah a honpi ua; Joseph in sakol man ding leh, belamhon man ding leh, bawnghon man ding leh sabiltung man ding in nekding a pe zel hi. Huai kum in a gan tengteng uh man in nekding a pia a, a vak chiat hi.

Huai kum a bei a, kum a hongthak nawn in a kiang ah a hong nawn ua, “Ka dangka teng uh a beitak dan ka toupa k’on imkei ding uh. Ka ganhonte uh ka toupa’n na neita hi. Ka toupa mitmuh in ka sapum uh leh ka gam uh chih louh, bangmah ka nei nawn kei uhi.

Bangziak in na mitmuh in kou leh ka gam uh mangthang maimah ding hiam? Koumau mah ka gam u toh an in honlei mai in. Koumau leh ka gam uh Pharo sikhate ka hi ding uhi. Silou a dam a ka om theihna ding un leh gam a siatlouhna ding in buh chi honpia in” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Joseph in Pharo ading in Aigupta gam tengteng a leisakta hi. Kial a tung ua a awt mahmah ziak in Aigupta mite’n lah a lou uh a zuak chiat uhi. Huchi in gam Pharo a ahivekta hi.
Mite Aigupta gamgi tawp khatlam a kipan khatlam tawppha in khuate ah a kisuansakta hi.
