Siampute gam kia a leikei a, siampute’n Pharo a kipan tantuan a nei ua, Pharo in a piak a tantuan uh a ne zel uhi. Huaiziak in a gam uh a zuak kei uhi.
Huai nung in, Joseph in, mite kiang ah, “Ngai un, tuni in na gam uh leh noute Pharo ading in k’on leita hi. Hiai ah nou ading in buhchi a om, lei ah na ching ding uhi.

Buhlak hun chiang in hichi ahi ding. Pharo ading in seh nga suah, seh khat zel na pe ding ua, a seh li pen noumau a ahi ding. A chi ding, noumau, na inkuanpihte uh leh na tanu neu chikchikte uh nekding ahi ding” a chi hi.
Amau, Nang ka hinna uh na humbitta hi. Ka toupa’n pha a sakleh hon hehpih inla, Pharo sikhate ka hi ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in, Joseph in Pharo in seh nga suah, seh khat a muhzel ding thu, Aigupta gam ading in tunitan in dan in a bawlta hi. Siampute gam kia ahi, Pharo a hilou.
Israel in Aigupta gam a Gosen gam ah tenna a bawlta a, huai ah a kihih inbul a, chi tampi a suang a, nakpitak in a pungta hi.
Jakob Aigupta gam ah kum sawmlehsagih a teng a, Huchi in, Jakob damsung kum za leh sawmli leh sagih ahi.

Israel sih hun a hong naita a; a tapa Joseph a sam a, a kiang ah, “N’on hehpih theih leh hehpih in na khut ka pheipi nuai ah golh inla, hon hehpih in, ka tung ah chihtaktak in hih in. Hehpih in Aigupta gam ah honvui mahmah ken.
Hon suangtute kiang a ka ihmut hun chiang in, nang Aigupta gam a kipan n’on pawkhe ding a, amaute vuina mun ah n’on vuizaw ding ahi” a chi hi. Aman, “Na chih bang in ka hih ding” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka kiang ah kichiam in” a chi a; a kiang ah a kichiamta hi. Huchi in lupna lukhung si in Israel a kunta hi.
Huan, hiaite nung in hichi ahi a, Joseph kiang ah, “Ngai in, na pa a chi a na” a chi uhi. Huchi in, a tapa nihte Manasseh leh Ephraim a kiang ah a tonpih hi.
Jakob kiang ah, “Ngai in, na tapa Joseph na kiang ah a honghi” chi’n a hilh uh. Israel a kihalhsak a, lupna ah a tuta hi.
Jakob in Joseph kiang ah, “Pathian, bangkim hihthei, Kanan gam a Luz khua ah ka kiang ah a kilak a, a hon vualzawl hi.
Ka kiang ah, chi tampi k’on suangsak dia, k’on hih punglai ding. Chi tuamtuam omkhawm in k’on bawl ding. Hiai gam nanung a na suante kiang ah a tangtawn gou ding un ka pe ding” a honchi hi.
“Na tapa nihte, Aigupta gam a na neihte, kei a ahi uhi. Ephraim leh Manasseh, Reuben leh Simeon mah bang in kei a ahi ding uhi.
Hiai mite nung a ta na neihte nang a ahi ding uh, a goutan uah a ute uh min a kikoppih ding uh.

Kei tungthu ahihleh, Padan gam a kipan ka hongpai lai in Rakil Kanan gam ah lamkal ah Ephrath khua gamla kuam ahihlai in, ka kiang ah a si hi. Huai ah Ephrath khaw lampi ah ka vuita, huai bel Bethlehem khua ahi” a chi hi.
Israel in Joseph tapate a en a, “Hiaite kuate ahi ua?” a chi hi.
Joseph in a pa kiang ah, “Hiaite ka tapa, Pathian in a honpiakte ahi uh” a chi hi. Aman, “Hehpih in ka kiang ah honpi in, amau ka na vualzawl ding” a chi hi.
Israel mit a upat tak ziak in a chim nawnkei a, aman a na tawp a, a na pom hi.
Israel in Joseph kiang ah, “Na mel muh ka kilamen nawn kei a, himahleh, ngai in, Pathian in na suante mel nangawn a hon musakta” a chi hi.
Joseph in amau a pa pheikala kipan a pikhia a, a mai a leisi in a kun hi.
Joseph in a nih un a kai a, Ephraim pen a khut taklam in Israel khut veilam pang ah, Manasseh pen a khut veilam in Israel khut taklam pang a kai in a pinai hi.
Israel in a sawkkalh teitei a, a khut taklam in a sawk a, Ephraim a naupangzaw sip ah a nga a; Manasseh bel a ta masa ahi.
Joseph a vualzawl a,
Hon suangpa Abraham leh Isak om zelna Pathian,
tuni tan a ka damsung
tengteng hon vakpa Pathian,
Thil hoihlou tengteng a
kipan hontanpa Angel in naupangte vualzawl hen.
Ka min leh hon suangpa
Abraham leh Isak min pu uhen.
Khovel ah thupitak hi ding in
hongpung uhen, a chi hi.
Joseph in a pa’n a khut taklam Ephraim sip a a ngak a muh in a lungkim kei a; a pa khut Ephraim sip a kipan Manasseh sip a suan ding in a domkang hi.
Joseph in a pa kiang ah, “Pa, hichibang ding ahi kei. Hiai ahi ta masa, na khut taklam a sip ah ngazaw in” a chi hi.

Himahleh, a pa a utkei a, “Ka thei hi, ka tapa aw, ka thei hi. Amah leng nam gentham in a om dia, amah leng a thupi ding hi. Himahleh a naupa amah sang in a thupizaw dia, a suante leng chituam tuam tamtak a honghi ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in Jakob in, “Nang ah Israel vualzawl ahi ding, Pathian in Ephraim leh Manasseh bang in honbawl hen,” chi in a vualzawl hi. Huchibang in Manasseh ma ah Ephraim a omsak hi.
Israel mah in Joseph kiang ah, “Ngai in, si ding ka hita hi. Himahleh Pathian na kiang uah a om dia, nou hon suangtute gam ah a hon pilut nawn ding hi.
Huai lou leng, na unaute tantuan sang in tankhat in k’on petuan hi, ka namsau leh ka thalpeu a Amorte khut a kipan ka laksak pen” a chi hi.
Huan, Jakob in a tapate a sam a, hichibang in a gen hi. “Ni nanungte a na tung ua thil hongtung dingte k’on hilh theihna ding in hong kikhawm un.
Nou Jakob tapate aw,
hong kikhawm unla,
Ngaikhia un;
na pa uh Israel thu ngai un.
Reuben, nang ka tapa masa, ka thilhihtheihna,
ka hatna gah masapen na hi.
Sanpen na leh thuneihpenna nang a ahi.
Himahleh tui bang a kiplou na hi,
tungnun penna na neikei ding;
na pa lupnapi ah na kal ziak in.
Huai ah ka lupna a kal in
na hihbuah hi,
Simeon leh Levi unau ahi ua,
a namsaute uh sisan suahna vanzat ahi.
Ka kha aw, nang zaw
a kikupna uah va kigolh ken.
Ka thupina, nang zaw a kikhopna uah telken.
A heh un mi a that ua,
a genhak un bawngtal thagui a sattat uhi.
A hehna un hamsia dong hen,
hangsantak ahi ngal ua.
A thangpaihna un leng
hamsia dong hen,
hinsetak ahi ngal ua.
Jakob ah amau ka kikhen sak dia,
Israel ah ka hihdalh ding hi.
Judah, nang na unaute’n a
honphat ding uh.
Na khut na doute ngawng ah
na nga dia; na tapate na ma ah a kun ding uhi.
Judah humpinelkai nou ahi.
Ka tapa, na sakeih na paitouh santa.
Na kun a, humpinelkai bang in na bok a,
humpinelkainu bang in
na kualsuk hi. Kua’n ahia
hon thou sak ngam ding?
Lalchiang Judah a kipan a mangkei ding,
Vaihawmpa chiang a khekal a
kipan a mangkei ding.
Shiloh a hongpai mateng;
namchih in amah thu a mang ding uhi.
A sakolnou grepgui ah a khih dia,
a sabiltung nou grepgui hoih chi ah a khih ding hi.
A puansilhte uain in a sawp dia,
a puan grep sisan in a sawplai ding hi.
A mitte uain in a san ding ua,
a hate nawitui in a ngou ding uhi.
Zebulun tuipi gei ah a teng dia,
longkhawlna luipiau ahi dia;
a gamgi Zidon ah ahi ding.
Issakar sabiltung hattak ahi a,
vangik nih kal a kual hi.
Khawl hoih in a thei a,
gam leng hoih in a thei;
Huchi in van paw ding in a liangzang a niamsak a,
kuli nna sem in sikha in a hong omta hi.
Dan in Israel nam lak a khat bang in
a mite vai a hawmsak ding.
Dan lamlian gei a gul,
lampi a gulgial, a tung a
tuang mi thalkiak ek khop a
sakol khe tu nakpa ahi ding.
Aw
ka ngak gige hi.
Gad, gal in a sual dia, himahleh
aman a khetul lam uah
amau a sual zaw ding hi.
Asher, a nek a hoih dia,
Kumpi nekte a piangsak ding hi.
Naphtali zukpi khah ahi.
Thu hoih pipi a gen zel hi.
Joseph hiang gahnuamtak ahi,
tuikhuk kiang a hiang gahnuamtak;
a hiang nawnsawnte’n bang a tuam uhi.
Thalkapmite’n amah nakpitak in a hihgenthei ua,
a kap ua, a simmawh uhi.
Himahleh, amah thalpeu
khauhtak in a om gige a,
a ban thate Jakob Mihatpa in a hatsak leh belamchingmi,
tua Israel suangpi hatsak ahi.
Na pa Pathian,
nang hon panpih dingpa,
Bangkim hihtheipa,
tunglam van vualzawlnate,
nuailam a om gige tui thuktak
vualzawlnate,
nawite leh sul vualzawlnate,
nangmah hon vualzawl dingpa ngei hihhat in na om hi.
Na pa vualzawlnate hon suangtute
Vualzawlna sang in tangtawn tangte tawpkhawk pha in a thupizawta hi.
Hiaite Joseph lu tung ah a om dia,
a unaute a kipan hihtuam a
ompa sip ah a om ding hi.
Benjamin nge duhgawl bang in,
zingsang in a sa matte a ne dia,
nitaklam in a gallak a hawm ding” a chi hi.
Huaite tengteng Israel nam sawmlehnihte ahi uh. Huai thute leng amaute vualzawlna a kiang ua a pa uh thugen ahi. Vualzawlna a tanding gun bangzel un a vualzawl chiat hi.
Aman a tate thugou a siah a, a kiang uah, “Ka chipihte kiang a pi a om ding ka hita. Hit mi Ephron lou a kawkhuk ah kei hon suangtute kiang ah honvui un.
Kanan gam a Mamre ma a Makpelah lou a kawkhuk, Abraham in kivuina mun dia Hitmi Ephron a kipan lou toh a lei ah.
Huai ah Abraham leh a zi Sarah a vui ua; huai ah Isak leh a zi Rebekah a vui ua; huai mah ah Leah ka vui hi.
Lou leh asung a kawkhuk om Hit suante a kipan a lei ahi” a chi hi.
Jakob in a tapate kiang a thugou a siah khit in a khete lupna ah a nga tou a, a kha a khahta a, a chipihte kiang ah pi in a om samta hi.
Huan, Joseph in a pa mai a si a, a kah a, a tawp hi.
Joseph in a sikha damdawi siamte a pa luang muattheilou a bawl ding in thu a pia hi. Huchi in damdawisiamte’n Israel luang muattheilou in a bawlta uhi.
A luang bawlna in ni sawmli a zang ua, muattheilou a bawlna in ni hiai zah a lutnak hi. Ni sawmsagih sung teng Aiguptate’n amah a sun uhi.
Amah a sunnite uh a beinung in, Joseph in Pharo inkuante a houpih a, “Na mitmuh ua deihsakna ka muh leh hehpih in Pharo bil a zak ding in, ‘Ka pa’n, ngai in, si ding ka hita.

Kanan gam a ka han dia ka tohsa ngei ah na honvui ding ahi,’ chi’n, a hon kichiamsak hi. huaiziak in, tuin hehpih in ka pa hon pawtousak inla, hon va vuisak in, Huchi in ka hongpai nawn ding, a chi, chi’n, hon gensak un” a chi hi.
Pharo in, “A hon kichiamsak bang in na pa va pawtou ve” a chi hi.
Joseph a pa vui ding in a va hohtou hi. Pharo sikha teng, a inkuan lak a upate leh Aigupta gam upa tengteng leh,
Joseph inkuanpih tengteng leh, a unaute leh, a pa inkuanpihte, a kiang ah a va hohtou uhi. A ta neu chikchikte uleh a belamhonte uleh a bawnghonte kia uh Gosen gam ah a nusia uhi.
A kiang uah kangtalaite leh Sakol tungtuang mite leng a hohtou ua, huchi in pawl lianpi ahi uhi.
Jordan luigal a Atad phual a tung ua, huai ah nakpitak in a kah ua, ni sagih sung a pa sunna a nei uhi.
Hiai gam mi Kanante’n, Atad phual a a misun uh a muh un, hiai Aiguptate misi sunna thupitak ahi, a chi uhi. Huaiziak in huai mun Abel mizraim a sa ua, huai Jordan luigal a om ahi.
A tapate’n a thupiak bang in a hihsak uhi.
A tapate’n Kanan gam ah a zawnglut ua, Abraham in kivuina mun dia, Hitmi Ephron a kipan a lou toh a lei Mamre ma a Makpelah lou a kawkhuk ah a vuita uhi.
A pa a vui khit in Joseph leh a unaute leh a pa vui dia a kiang a hohtou tengteng Aigupta gam ah a pai kiknawnta uhi.
Joseph unaute’n a pa uh sih a ngaihtuah ua, “Joseph in hon mudah dia, a tung a i thil hihkhelh tengteng phu i tung uah kim sipsip in a honla kha ding e” a chi uhi.
Joseph kiang a hilh ding in mi a sawl ua, “Na pa’n a sih ma in hichi’n thu a pia hi.

Joseph kiang ah, ‘hehpih in na unaute tatlekna leh a gitlouhna uh ngaidam in. Na tung ah thil hoihlou a hihta ngal ua. Tuin hehpih in na pa Pathian sikhate tatlekna ngaidam in,’ a chi, chi’n vagen un” a chi hi. A kiang a a gentak un Joseph a kap hi.
A unaute leng a va hoh ua, a ma ah a khupboh chiat uh. “Ngai in, na sikhate ka hi uh” a chi uhi.
Joseph in a kiang uah, “Lau kei un. Pathian sik a om ka hi ahia?
Nou zaw ka tung ah thil gilou hih lungsim na pu ua; himahleh tuni in mi tampi hing leh dam a humbitna dia thil hoih suahsak Pathian lungsim ahizaw hi.
huaiziak in, tuin lau kei un. Nou leh na ta neu chik chikte uh ka honvak ding” a chi hi. Huchi in, amau a lungmuan a, kamsiam tak in a houpih hi.
Joseph, amah leh a pa inkuanpihte toh Aigupta gam ah a teng ua, Joseph kum za leh sawm a dam hi.
Joseph in Ephraim ta, tusawn thum chiang a mu hi. Manasseh tapa Makir tate leng Joseph pheitung ah a khanglian uhi.

Joseph in a unaute kiang ah, “Si ding ka hita hi. Himahleh Pathian in a hongveh ngeingei dia, hiai gam a kipan hon pikhia in, Abraham, Isak leh Jakob kiang a kichiam a, piak a chiam gam ah a hon pitou ding” a chi hi.
Joseph in Israel suante a kichiam sak a, “Pathian in a hongveh ngeingei dia, ka guhte hiai a kipan na zawngtou ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Joseph kum za leh sawm a upa a hih in, a sita hi. A luang muattheilou in a bawl ua, Aigupta gam ah hankuang sung ah a koih uhi.
Huan, hiaite Aigupta gam a honglut, Israel suante min ahi: Michih leh a inkawte Jakob toh hongtonte.
Reuben, Simeon, Levi leh Judah.
Issakar, Zebulun leh Benjamin.
Dan leh Naphtali, Gad leh Asher.
Jakob tai apan hong pawtkhia mi tengteng sawmsagih ahi uhi Joseph bel Aigupta gam ah a na om khinta hi.
Joseph leh a unau tengteng leh a suan tengteng leng a sita uhi.
Israel suante’n gah a suang ua, tampi in a khang ua, a kibehlap ua, hat petmah in a hong hatkhia ua; a gam a hong dimta uhi.
Joseph theilou, Aigupta gam ah kumpipa thak a hong omta hi.
Aman a mite kiang ah, “En un, Israel suan mipite ei sang in a tam zaw ua, a hatzaw uhi.

Kisa un, piltak in amau i bawl ding uhi. Huchilou in zaw a hong kibehlap lap ding ua, hichi a honghi dia, kidouna a hongom chiang in, i melmate lam ah a pang ding ua, ei a hondou kha ding uhi, huchi in gam apan a pawtsan kha ding uhi” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in puakgikte a amau hihgim ding in a tung uah nasem heutu a koihta uhi. Huchi in, Pharo ading in khopite, Pithom leh Rameses a lamta uhi.
Himahleh amau a hihgim semsem uleh, a kibehlap semsem ua, a khang semsem uhi. Huchi in Aiguptate’n Israel suante a lau mahmah uhi.
Huaiziak in Aiguptate’n Israel suante gimtakin nna a semsak uhi.
nasep haksa in a hinna uh nuamloutakin a bawlsak ua, buan mante leh teklei bawl in gamlak a nna chiteng sem in, nakpitak in nna a semsak uhi.
Aigupta kumpipa’n Hebru naudommite kiang ah thu a gen a, huaite lak a khat min Siprah ahi a, a dang khat min Puah ahi.
“Hebru numeite lak a nau na dom chiang un, tutphah tung ah en unla, tapa ahihleh na that ding ua, tanu ahihleh na hawi ding uhi” a chi hi.
Himahleh naudommite’n Pathian a lau ua, Aigupta kumpipa’n thu a piak bang a hihlou in, pasal naupangte a hinghawi uhi.
Aigupta kumpipa’n naudommite a samsaka, a kiang uah, “Bangdia hiai thilhih a pasal naupangte hinghawi na hi ua?” a chi hi.
Naudommite’n Pharo kiang ah, “Hebru numeite Aigupta numeite bang ahihlouh ziak un, a tei ngal ua, naudommite a kiang uh a tun ma un a neikhin zel uhi” a chi uhi.
Huaiziak in Pathian in naudommite a kem hoih a, huchi in mite a hong kibehlap ua, a hat mahmah uhi.
Huchi in naudommite’n Pathian a lauh ziak un inkuante a bawlsakta hi.
Pharo in a sikha tengteng thupia in, “Tapa hongpiang peuhmah lui ah na pai ding ua, tanu hong piang peuhmah na hinghawi ding uh,” a chi hi.
Huan, Levi inn apan pasal khat a paikhia a, Levi tanu zi in a nei hi.
Huai numei in nau a pai a, tapa a nei a, naupang melhoih ahi chih a theih in kha thum a selta hi.
A sel zoh nawnlouh tak in, phaiphek bawm a bawlsak a, vahaibuan leh chim in a zutbit a, asung ah nau a koih a; luipang ah loupa kawm ah a koih hi.
A sanggamnu, bang hongsuak hiam chih thei ding in gamla kuam ah ading hi.
Pharo tanu lui ah kisil ding in a hong paisuk a; a nungzui numeite toh luigei ah a vak uhi. Loupa lak a bawm a mu a, a sikha numei khat va la ding in a sawl hi.
A hon leh, naupang a muta a, ngai in, naungek a kapta hi. A hehpihta a, “Hiai Hebru tate lak a khat ahi” a chi hi.
A sanggamnu’n Pharo tanu kiang ah, “Nau hon donsak ding, Hebru numeite lak a naudonmi khat k’on va sapsak na ut hia?” a chi hi.
Pharo tanu in a kiang ah, “Kuan in,” a chi hi. Nungak a kuanta a, naungek nu a vasamta hi.
Pharo tanu in a kiang ah, “Hiai nau la inla, hon donsak in. Na loh k’on pe ding” a chi hi. Huchi in huai numei in nau a lata a, a donta hi.
Nau a khang a, Pharo tanu kiang ah a honpi a, huchi in a tapa a hong hita hi. “A min Mosi a sa a, tui apan ka kaihkhiak a hih ziak in,” a chi hi.
Huailai in hichi ahi a, Mosi a honglet in a unaute kiang ah a va hoh a, a puakgikte uh a va mu hi. A unaute lak a khat, Hebru mi khat Aigupta mi in a vuaklai a va muta hi.
A dak loplop a, kuamah a omkei, chih a theihtakin, Aigupta mi a thatta a, piaunel ah a sel hi.
A ni nih ni a, a va hohnawn leh, ngai in, Hebru mite lak a mi nih a na kisual ua; gilou hihpa kiang ah, “Bangdia na lawm vua na hia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka tung ua lal leh vaihawm dia nang kua’n honbawl ahia? Aigupta mi na thah bang a, hon thah tum na hi maw?” a chi hi. Huchi in, Mosi a lau a, “Hiai thil kithei khe petmah eive,” a chi hi.
Pharo in hiai a zak in, Mosi thah ding in a zongta hi. Himahleh Pharo mai apan Mosi a taimangta a, Midian gam ah a tengta a; tuileh kiang ah a tu hi.
Midian siampu in tanu sagih a nei a, amau a hongpai ua, tui a hontawi ua, a pa uh ganhon buahna ding in a tuitheite a dim uhi.
Belamchingte a hong ua, a hawlmang uhi. Himahleh, Mosi ading a, amau a panpiha, a ganhon uh tui a buak hi.
A pa uh Reuel kiang a a hongpai tak un, “Bang a chia, tuni’n hong paibaih ve uchia?” a na chi hi.
Amau, “Belamchingte khut apan Aigupta mi khat in a hon hunkhia a, tui leng a hontawi chingsak a, ganhon a buak hi” a chi uhi.
Aman a tanute kiang ah, “Ahihleh amah kaw om ahia? Bangdia huai mi hon nusia? An ne ding in sam un” a chi hi.
Mosi huai mi kiang a ten a lungkima, aman a tanu Zipporah Mosi a peta hi.
Tapa a neihsaka, melmak gam ah mikhual ka hita, a chih ziak in a min Gershom a sa hi.
Hun hongpai zel ah hichi ahi a, Aigupta kumpipa a sita a, huchi in a koltan ziak un Israel suante a thumthum ua, a kap ua, a kahna uh a koltan ziak un Pathian kiang ah a tungtou hi.
A mauna uh Pathian in a za a, huchi in Pathian in Abraham toh, Isak toh leh Jakob toh a thukhun a theigige hi.
Pathian in Israel suante a en a, Pathian in amau a zahtak hi.
Mosi in a sungpa, Midian siampu, Jethro ganhon a ching hi. Ganhon gamdai nunglam a pi in, Pathian tang, Horeb pha in, a hongpai hi.
Pawn lak apan meikuang in a kiang ah
Mosi in, “Ka kihei dia, hiai thilmuh thupi, bangdia pawn kanglou ahia, ka en ding” a chi hi.
Huchi a en dia a kihei
Aman, “Hiai mun hon naihken. Na khepek apan na khedapte suah in. Na dinna mun lei siangthou ahi” a chi hi.
Hiai a chilai a, “Na Pa Pathian ka hi, Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian leh Jakob Pathian.” Mosi in Pathian a et ngamlouh ziak in a mai a sel hi.
Aiguptate khut apan amau pikhe ding leh huai gam apan gam hoih, za, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luanggam tundia hong paisuk ka hi; Kanante, Hitte, Amorte, Perizte, Hivte leh Jebuste gam ah.
Huaiziak in tuin, ngai in, Israel suante kah thawm ka kiang a hongtungta. Aiguptate’n amau a nuaisiah uh leng ka mu hi.
Huaiziak in, tuin kisa in, Pharo kiang ah k’on sawl ding, Aigupta gam apan Israel suante, ka mite n’on pikhiak theihna ding in” a chi hi.
Mosi in Pathian kiang ah, “Pharo kiang a hoh a, Aigupta gam apan Israel suante pikhe ding, kei kua ka hia?” a chi hi.

Aman, “Na kiang ah ka om ngeingei ding, k’on sawl chih, hiai nang ading in a kitheina ahi ding. Aigupta gam apan mite n’on pikhiak khit chiang in, hiai tangtung ah Pathian nna nasem ding uh” a chi hi.

Mosi in Pathian kiang ah, “Ngai in, Israel suante kiang a ka hong a, a kiang ua, hichia ka chih chiang in, na pipute uh Pathian in na kiang uah a honsawl, amau huchi in ka kiang ah a chi ding uh, A min bang ahia? A kiang uah bang ka chi dia?” a chi hi.
Pathian in Mosi kiang ah, “KA HIH KA HI” a chi hi. Huchibang in Israel suante kiang ah na vagen ding, “KA HIH in na kiang uah a honsawl hi” a chi hi.

Pathian in Mosi kiang ah huchi in a chih behlap lai hi. “Israel suante Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian leh Jakob Pathian in na kiang uah a honsawl. Hiai ka min ahi gige a, suan tengteng tan a kei theihgigena ahi.
Kuan inla, Israel upate kaikhawm inla, a kiang uah hichi’n chi in. ‘Na pipute uh
Hichi in ka chita, Aigupta gimna apan Kanante, Hitte, Amorte, Perizte, Hivte leh Jebuste gam, bawngnawi leh khuaizu luanna ah k’on pilut ding’.
Na aw a ngaikhe ding uhi. Huchi in na kuan dia, nang leh Israel upate, Aigupta kumpipa kiang ah na hoh ding ua, a kiang ah hichibang in na chi ding uhi. ‘Hebrute
Ahi a, Aigupta kumpipa’n a hon paisak kei ding, ban thahatna toh lou in chih ka theitel hi.
Ka ban ka zak dia, a lak ua ka hih ding ka thillamdang tengteng in Aigupta gam ka gawt ding. Huai nung in a hon paisak ding hi.
Aiguptate mitmuh in hiai mite deihsakna ka pe ding. Huchi in hichi ahi dia, na pai chiang un a khutvuak in na pai kei ding uhi.

Numei teng in invengte leh a inn a khualtamte apan dangka suangmantamte, dangkaeng suangmantamte leh puansilhte a leitawi ding. Huchi in huaite na tapate uh na silhsak ding ua, na tanute uh na silhsak ding uhi. Huchi in Aiguptate na lok ding uhi.”
Huan, Mosi in a dawng a, “A hina a, ngai in, a hon umkei ding ua, ka aw leng a ngaikhe sam kei ding uhi.
a kiang ah, “Na khut a bang ahia?” a chi a; aman, “Chiang” a chi hi.
Aman, “Lei ah khia in” a chi a; lei ah a khia a, gul a hongsuak a; Mosi huai apan a taikheta hi.
Mosi kiang ah, “Na khutzan inla, gul a mei in la in” a chi hi. A khut a zan a, gul a mei in a manta a, a khut ah chiang a hongsuak nawn hi.
A pipute uh
“Aman na khut na ang ah koihnawn in” a chi hi. A khut a ang ah a koihnawn a, a ang apan a lakhia a, ngai in, a khut khatlam bang a hongsuak nawn hi.
“Hichi ahi dia, a hon gintak kei ua, chiamtehna khatna aw leng a ngaihkhiak sam kei uleh, chiamtehna nanung aw a gintak ding uh ahi ding hi.

Hichi a honghi dia, hiai chiamtehna nihte a gintak kei lai ua, na aw leng a ngaihkhiak sam kei uleh, lui apan tui na la dia, gamkeu ah na sung ding. Lui apan na tui lakkhiak gamkeu ah sisan a honghi ding” a chi hi.
Mosi in
a kiang ah, “Mihing kam bawl kua ahia? Ahihkeileh pautheiloute, bengngongte, muhnate leh mittawte kua bawl ahia? Kei
Huaiziak in, tuin kuan inla, na kam ka ompih dia, na gen ding k’on hilh ding” a chi hi.
Aman, “Aw
Mosi tung ah
A kiang ah thu na gen dia, a kam ah thute na guang ding. Na kam ka ompih dia, na hih ding k’on hilh ding hi.
Amah mite kiang ah na thugenpa ahi dia; amah nang adia kam tang ahi ding. Nang amah ading in Pathian tang na hi ding hi.
Chiamtehnate na hihna ding in, na khut in hiai chiang na tawi ding ahi” a chi hi.

Mosi a kisa a, a sungpa Jethro kiang ah a kik a, a kiang ah, “K’on ngen hi. Hon paisak inla, Aigupta gam a om ka unaute kiang ah ka kik ding, a damlai u hiam ka va thei ding” a chi hi. Jethro in Mosi kiang ah, “Damtak in va hoh in” a chi hi.
Midian gam a Mosi kiang ah, “Pai inla, Aigupta gam ah kiknawn in. Thah hon tum mi teng lah a sita ngal ua” a chi hi.
Mosi in a zi leh a tate a pi a, sabiltung tung ah a tuangsak a, Aigupta gam ah a kiknawnta hi. Mosi in a khut in Pathian chiang a tawi hi.
Pharo kiang ah,“
k’on chi ahi, na a hon sepsak theihna ding in, ka tapa paisak in. Paisak na nial leh ngai in, na tapa ka that ding, na ta masapen mahmah, na chi ding hi.”
Lampi a khualbuk ah hichi a hong hita,
Huchihlai in Zipporah in suang hiam a la a, a tapa zekmuk vun a atkhia a, a khebul ah a khia a, “Kei ading in sikai pasal na hi mahmah hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in amah a paisak hi. Zekvun ziak in “Sisan kai pasal na hi” a chi hi.
Mosi in amah sawl
Mosi leh Aron a paita ua; Israel suan upate tengteng a kaikhawm vek uhi.
Mosi kiang a
Huchi in mite’n a gingta ua;
Huan, huai nung in Mosi leh Aron a lut ua, “Hichibang in Israelte
Pharo in, “Israelte paisak dia a aw ka man ding,
Huchi in amau, “Hebrute Pathian in a hon kimuhpih a; gamdai ah ni thum lam ah, hon paisak in, k’on ngen uhi.
Aigupta kumpipa’n a kiang uah, “Bangdia Mosi leh Aron, noute’n nna nasep ua mite khawl sak na hi ua? Na puakgikte uh pua un” a chi hi.
Pharo in, “Ngai un, gam a mite tuin a tam ua, a puakgik ua pan na khawlsak uhi” a chi hi.
Pharo in huai ni mah in mite nasem heutute leh upate thu a pia hi.
“Tuma siah a bang in teklei bawlna ding in mite pawl na pe nawn kei ding uhi. Kuan uhenla, pawl va kilak uhen.

Tuma siah a teklei bawlsa tengteng uh, a tung uah na koih ding a; huai apan in bangmah na kiamsak kei ding uhi. A tha uh a dah kha dia; huchi in kap in, ka Pathian kiang uah hon paisak inla, hon va kithoihsakin, a chi kha ding uhi.
Nna tamsem a tung uah guan unla, a sepgim theihna ding un; thu ginalou limsak kei uhen” a chi hi.
Mite nasem heutute a paikhia ua, a upate u toh, mite kiang ah thu a gen ua, “Pharo in pawl a honpe kei ding,
‘Nou kuan unla, na muhtheih theihna uah pawl kilak un.’ Himahleh nna nasep uah bangmah kiamsak ahi kei ding” a chi uhi.
Mite pawl hilou in buhbul lakhawm ding in Aigupta gam teng ah a vak zakta uhi.
Nasem heutute’n amau a nawh ua, nna nasep uh zou un, na niteng sep dingte uh, pawl a omlai in, a chi uhi.
Israel suan upate, Pharo nasem heutute a tung ua a koihte un, a vua ua, bangdia tuma siah a bang a zan leh tuni a na teklei bawl uh zoulou na hi ua? chi’n, a phutluih uhi.
Huaitak in Israel suan upate a hong ua, Pharo kiang ah a kap ua, “Bangdia na sikhate hichi bawl tel na hia?
Na sikhate pawl piak ka hi kei ua, amau lah ka kiang uah, teklei bawl un, a chi uhi. Ngai in, na sikhate vuak in ka om ua, a mawh na mite ahi uhi” a chi uhi.
Himahleh aman, “Thadah na hi uh, thadah na hi uh. Huaiziak in, hon paisak inla,
Huaiziak in kuan unla; nna vasem un. Pawl a hon kipe kei dia, himahleh teklei bikhiah zah na piakkhiak ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
Na niteng nasep ua na tekleite ua pan bangmah na kiam sak ding uh ahi kei, a kichih nung Israel suan upate’n thusia om a hih dan a theita uhi.
Pharo apan a hong paikhiak un lampi ading Mosi leh Aron a kituahpih uhi.
A kiang uah, “
Na min a thu gen dia Pharo kiang a ka va hoh nungsiah lah, aman hiai mite tung ah gilou a bawl ngal a. Na mite lah na pikhe hetkei” a chi hi.
Pathian in Mosi kiang ah thu a gen a, a kiang ah, “
Thilbangkim hihthei Pathian min in Abraham kiang ah, Isak kiang ah leh Jakob kiang ah ka kilakta. Himahleh ka min JEHOVAH in a lak ua theih ka hi kei.
Amau Kanan gam, mikhual a a omna gam uh, a khualzinna gam uh, pe ding in amau toh ka thukhun leng ka hihkipta hi.
Aiguptate’n koltanna a, a tansak un, Israel suante maunate leng ka zata a, ka thukhun ka theigige hi.
Huaiziak in Israel suante kiang ah,
Mipite ading in ka hong kilak dia, nou ading in Pathian ka hi ding. Huchi in Aiguptate puakgikte nuai apan hon lakhepa
Gam tungtang thu Abraham, Isak leh Jakob kiang a pedia ka chiam, gamsung ah k’on tun ding. Huchi in, gouluah ding in k’on pe ding, Kei
Mosi in Israel suante kiang ah huchibang in thu a genta. Himahleh lungsim dahna ziak leh koltanna haksatna ziak in Mosi a ngaikheta kei uhi.
“Lut in, a gam apan Israel suante a paikhiak sakna ding in Pharo kiang ah thu gen in” a chi hi.
Mosi in
Huchi in
Hiaite a suangtute inn a kipan a lupente ahi uhi: Reuben Israel tapa masa pen; Hanok leh Pallu, Hezron leh Karmi. Hiaite Reuben inkawte ahi uhi.
Simeon tapate: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Zohar leh Kanan numei tapa Shaul. Hiaite Simeon inkawte ahi uhi.
A khang uh dungzui in hiaite Levi tapate min ahi: Gershon, Kohath leh Merari. Levi damsung kumte kum za leh sawmthum leh sagih ahi.
Gershon tapate, a inkaw dungzui un, Libni leh Shimei.
Kohath tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron leh Uzziel. Kohath damsung kumte kum za leh sawmthum leh thum ahi.
Merari tapate: Mahali leh Musi. A khang uh dungzui in hiaite Levi inkawte ahi uhi.
Amram in a pa sanggamnu Jokebed zi in a nei hi. Aman Aron leh Mosi a neihsak hi. Amram damsung kumte kum za leh sawmthum leh sagih ahi.
Izhar tapate: Korah, Nepheg leh Zikri.
Uzziel tapate: Misael, Elzaphan leh Zithri.
Aron in Amminadab tanu, Nahson sanggamnu, Eliseba zi in a nei a, Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, leh Ithamar a neihsak hi.
Korah tapate: Assir, Elkanah leh Abiasaph. Hiaite Korah inkawte ahi uhi.
Aron tapa Eleazar in Putiel tanute lak a khat zi in a nei a, Phinehas a neihsak hi. Hiaite Levi inkuan suangtute inn a kipan a lupente ahi uhi.
Hiaite
Hiaite Aigupta kumpipa Pharo kiang a Aigupta apan Israel suante pikhe dia thugentute ahi uhi. Hiaite Mosi leh Aron mah ahi uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Aigupta gam a Mosi kiang a
“Kei
Himahleh Mosi in
Thu k’on piak tengteng na gen ding. Huchi in Aron na naupa in a gam apan a Israel suante sawlkhe ding in Pharo kiang ah a gen ding.
Pharo lungtang ka khauh sak dia, Aigupta gam ah ka chiamtehnate leh ka thillamdangte ka pungsak ding hi.

Himahleh, Aigupta tung a ka khut ka ngak theihna ding leh ka sepaihte leh ka mi Israel suante, vaihawmna thupite a Aigupta gam apan ka pi khiak theihna ding in, Pharo in nang a hon ngaikhe kei ding hi.
Aigupta tung a ka khut ka likkhiak a, a lak ua pan Israel suante ka pikhiak chiang in, Aiguptate’n Kei,
Mosi leh Aron in
Pharo kiang a thu a genlai un, Mosi kum sawmgiat a upa ahi a, Aron kum sawmgiat leh thum a upa ahi.
“Pharo in na kiang ua nou ading in thillamdang suah un, a chih chiang in Aron kiang ah, Na chiang la inla, Pharo ma ah khia in, gul hongsuak hen, na chi ding” a chi hi.
Mosi leh Aron Pharo kiang ah a lut ua,
Pharo in leng mipilte leh bumsiamte a sam a; Aigupta mitkhialdawi tawite’n a mitkhialdawi un huchibang mah in a hihta uhi.
Amau leng michih in a chiang uh a khia ua, gulte a hongsuak uhi. Himahleh Aron chiang in amau chiangte a valhta hi.
Pharo in a lungtang a khauhsak a, amau thu a ngaikhe kei,
Zingsang in Pharo kiang ah hoh in. Ngai in, lui ah a hoh hi. A hongpai ngak in luigei ah na ding in. Na khut in huai chiang, gul hongsuak pen na tawi ding ahi.
A kiang ah, ‘Hebrute
Hichibang in
Lui a om ngasate a si ding ua, lui a uih dia; Aiguptate’n lui tui a dawn theikei ding uhi” a chi hi.
Lui a om ngasate a si ua; lui a uih a, Aiguptate’n lui tui a dawn theita kei uhi. Aigupta gam pumpi ah sisan a omta hi.
Aigupta mitkhialdawi tawite’n leng a mitkhialdawi tawi un huchi mah bang in a hih uhi. Pharo lungtang a khauh a,
Pharo a kihei a, a inn ah a paita a, huai thil in a lungtang a khoih kei hi.
Aigupta tengteng in dawn ding zong in luikim a khuat uhi. Lui tui lah a dawn theikei uhi.
Amau paisak na nial leh, ngai in, ukengte in na gam tengteng ka gawt ding hi.

Lui in ukeng a tam a tam a hon suahkhe ding ua, huaite a hong paitou ding ua, na inn ah a honglut ding ua, na lupna dansung ah, na lupna tung ah, na sikhate in ah, na mite tung ah, na thuk ah leh na tangbuang bawlna ah a hongom ding uhi.
Ukengte nang tung ah leh, na mite tung ah leh, na sikhate tung ah a hong kaltou ding uhi” chi in.
Aron in Aigupta luite tung ah a khut a lik a; ukengte a hong paitou ua, Aigupta gam a tuamta uhi.
Huchi mah bang in mitkhialdawi tawite’n a mitkhialdawi un a hih ua, Aigupta gamtung ah ukengte a hon latou uhi.
Huaitak in Pharo in Mosi leh Aron a samsaka, “Kei leh ka mite apan ukengte a lakmang theihna ding in,

Mosi in Pharo kiang ah, “Ka tung ah kiuangsak in; Nang ading leh, na sikhate ading leh, na mite ading leh nang leh na innte apan, tui a a om theihna ding ua ukengte lakmang nadia chikchiang a hon ngetsak ding ka hia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Zingchiang in” a chi hi. Aman, “Na thu bang hi hen.
Nang leh, na innte uh leh, na sikhate leh na mite apan ukengte a pawtkhe ding ua; lui kia ah a omta ding uhi” a chi hi.
Mosi leh Aron Pharo apan a paikhia ua; Pharo gawtna dia ukengte a koih tungtang ah
Mosi thu bang in a hihta a; innte leh, khuate apan leh loute apan ukengte a sita uhi.
Huchi in a kaikhawm ua, a vum ua, gam a uihta hi.
Himahleh Pharo in a tung a zangta chih a theihin, a lungtang a khauhsaka; amaute a ngaikhe kei;
Huchibang in, a hih ua; Aron in a chiang toh a khut a lik a, lei a leivui a sat a, mi tung leh sa tung ah hik a hong hita a; gam a leivui teng Aigupta gam pumpi ah hik a hongsuak vekta hi.
Mitkhialdawi tawite’n leng a mitkhialdawi un hikte omsak ding in huchibang in a hih ua, himahleh a hih theikei uhi. Huchi in mi tung leh sa tung ah hik a omta hi.
Huaitak in mitkhialdawi tawite’n Pharo kiang ah, “Hiai Pathian khutzung ahi,” a chi uhi. Himahleh Pharo lungtang a khauhsak a,

Huchi lou a, ka mite na paisak kei leh, ngai in, na tung ah leh na sikhate tung ah leh, na mite tung ah leh, na inn sung ah thou honpi ka sawl ding. Huchi in Aiguptate innte thou honpi in a dim ding, a omna lei uh toh.
Huai ni’n ka mite tenna, Gosen gam ka sat khen ding, huai a thou honpi a om louhna ding in; Huchi a gam sung ah kei
Ka mite leh na mite kikal ah kikhenna ka koih ding. Zingchiang in hiai chiamtehna a om ding hi” a chi hi.
Huchibang in
Pharo in Mosi leh Aron a samsaka, “Pai unla, gam sung ah na Pathian kiang uah va kithoih un” a chi hi.
Mosi in, “Huchibang a hih a dik kei.
Gamdai ah ni thum lam ah ka pai ding ua, a hon thupiak ding bang a
Pharo in, “Gamdai a
Mosi in, “Ngai in, nang apan ka paikhe dia, Pharo apan, na sikhate apan, na mite apan zingchiang a thou honpi a paimang theihna ding in
Pharo apan Mosi a pawtkheta a,
Huchi in Mosi thu bang in
Hiai hun in leng Pharo in a lungtang a khauhsak a, mite a paisak nuamta kei hi.
Huan,
Amaute paisak na nial a, amau na let lailai leh,
Ngai in,
Israelte bawnghon leh Aiguptate bawnghon a satkhen ding. Israel suante a lam bangmah si a omkei ding.
hun biseh a septa, zingchiang in
A zing in
Pharo in mi a sawl a, ngai in, Israel bawnghon lak ah khat lel leng a sikei mahngei hi. Himahleh Pharo lungtang a khauh a, mite a paisak kei hi.
Aigupta gam ah leivuinen a hongsuak dia, Aigupta gamsung teng ah, mi tung leh sa tung ah meimatum setak a honghi ding” a chi hi.
Meiphualpi a vut a la ua, Pharo mai ah a dingta uhi. Mosi in vanlam ah a thehtou a; mi tung leh sa tung ah, meimatum a hong hita hi.
Huchi in meimatumte ziak in mitkhialdawi tawite Mosi ma ah ading theita kei ua; mitkhialdawi tawite tung leh Aiguptate tung ah lah meimatum a om ngal a.
Pharo lungtang a khauhsak a, Mosi kiang a
Hiai hun in na lungtang tung leh na sikhate tung leh na mite tung a ka gawtna tengteng hontun ding ka hi ngal a. Lei pumpi ah kei bang kuamah a omkei, chih na theihna ding in.
Tuin ka khut zankhia in nang leh na mite hipi in hon gawt leng lei apan satkhiat in na om ding hi.
Himahleh hiai ziak in ahi, nang k’on tunding, nangmah a ka thilhihtheihna ka latsak theihna ding leh huchi a leitung tengteng a ka min a ki puankhiat theihna ding in.
Amaute paisaklou ding in, ka mite kalh in nang leh nang na kiliansak nalai maw?
Ngai in, zingchiang tu hun in a piantung a kipan tutan a om ngei nailou Aigupta gam ah gialpi petmah ka zusak ding hi.

Huaiziak in, tuin mi sawl inla, lou a na neih tengteng leh na gantate kaikhawm in. Michih tung leh sa lou a kimu tung ah, in lam a hong kihawl lou tung ah, gial a hong kesuk dia, a si ding uhi” a chi, chi in.
Kuapeuh Pharo sikhate lak a
thu khawksa loute’n a sikhate uh leh a gantate uh lou ah a nusia uhi.
Mosi in vanlam ah a chiang a zankhia hi.
Huchi in gial a om a, gial toh kihel mei thupi mahmah, nam a hih nungsiah Aigupta gam a, huchibang om ngeilou.
Gial in Aigupta gamsungte a lou omte teng a dengta hi. Mi leh sa; lou a haichi chih gial in a dengta a, gam a singchih a kitansakta hi.
Israel suante tenna, Gosen gam kia ah gial a omkei hi.
Pharo in mi a sawl a, Mosi leh Aron a sam sak a, a kiang uah, “Tutung in ka khialta.
ngen in, a hunta hi, vanpiging thupi leh gial thupi a om nawn louhna ding in. K’on paisak dia, na om nawn kei ding uh” a chi hi.
Mosi in a kiang ah, “Khopi apan ka pawt khiak chiang in
Himahleh nang leh na sikhate’n ahihleh,
Pat leh barli buh den in a om a, barli buh a tuipumta a, pat a gah a takta ngal hi.
Himahleh huitbuh leh buhman zaw den in a omkei; a nou lai ziak un.
Pharo apan Mosi in khopi a pawt khiak san in,
Pharo in vuah leh gial leh vanpiging a tawpta, chih a theih in, a khial tamsem a, amah leh a sikhate’n a lungtang uh a khauhsak uhi.
Huchi in Pharo lungtang khauhsak in a om a, Mosi kam a
Huan
Na tapa bil leh na tapa tapa bil a, Aigupta gam a bang thil ahia ka hih, a lak ua chiamtehna ka hihte na gentheih a,
Mosi leh Aron Pharo kiang ah a lut ua, a kiang ah, “Hebrute
Huchi a hih kei a, ka mite paisak na nial leh ngai in, na tuipiau ah zingchiang in khaukhup k’on sawl ding hi.
Lei mai a tuam ding ua, mite’n lei a mu theikei ding. A suakta bang a ne ding ua, gial in a hon hawisak teng, lou apan nang adia singpou chiteng a ne ding uhi.

Na innte uah a dim ding ua, na sikhate innte leh Aiguptate innte leh leitung om apan tuni tan a na pate, na pate uh pate un a muh ngeilouh uh,” a chi uhi. Huchi in a kihei a, Pharo apan a pawtkheta hi.
Pharo sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Bang tan hiai mipa ei adia thang hi ding ahia? Mite paisak in,
Mosi leh Aron Pharo kiang ah a honpi nawn ua; aman a kiang uah, “Pai un,
Mosi in, “Ka naupangte u toh, ka tekte utoh, ka tapate uleh ka tanute uh, ka ganhonte uleh ka belamhonte utoh ka pai ding uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “
Huchi hilou e, nou pasal piching teng kuan unla,
Mosi in a chiang Aigupta gam tung ah a lik a,

Huchi in Aigupta gam tengteng tung ah khaukhupte a paitou ua, Aigupta gam tengteng ah a khawl ua: a chimtakhuai mahmah uhi. A malam uah huchibang khaukhup amau bang in a om ngeikei a, a nunglam uah leng huchibang a omkei ding hi.

Leimai tengteng a tuam ziak un, gam a mialta hi. Gam a haichi chih gial in a hawi singgahte toh a ne uhi. Huchi in singte ah hiam, lou a haichite ah hiam leng thil hing a omta kei, Aigupta gamsung teng ah.
Huaitak in Pharo in kintak in Mosi leh Aron a samsaka; “
Huaiziak in tuin, k’on ngen hi. Hiai tutung kia ka khelhna ngaidam inla, kei apan hiai sihna a lakmang theihna ding in,
Huchi in Pharo apan a paikheta a,
suahlam huih hat mahmah a khahta a, huai in khaukhupte a lamang a, Tuipi San ah a lawnlutta hi. Huchi in Aigupta gam tengteng ah khaukhup khat leng a omta kei hi.
Himahleh
Mosi in vanlam ah a khut a likkhia a; huchi in ni thum sung Aigupta gam tengteng ah khomial bikbek a omta hi.
Kuamah a kimu tuah kei ua, a omna apan ni thum sung kuamah a thou kei uhi. Himahleh Israel suante tenna uah khovak a nei uhi.
Pharo in Mosi a sam a, “Pai un,
Mosi in, “
Ka bawnghonte un leng a honzuih ding uh ahi. Nunglam ah chi in khat lel leng nawtsiat ahi kei ding. Huaite apan
Himahleh
Huchi in Pharo in a kiang ah, “Ka kiang apan paimang in. Kiveng in, ka mel mu nawn ken. Ka mel na muh nini a si ding na hih ziak in” a chi hi.
Mosi in, “Na gen hoih e. Ka mel na mu nawn kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan,
Tuin mite bil ah thu gen inla, pasal chih in invengte kiang ah ngen hen. Numei chih in invengte kiang ah dangka suangmantamte leh dangkaeng suangmantamte ngen hen” a chi hi.
Aiguptate mitmuh in mite deihsakna a pia hi. Huailou in Aigupta gam ah leh Pharo sikhate mitmuh in leh mite mitmuh in Mosi a thupi mahmah hi
Mosi in, “Hiai bang in
Aigupta gam a piang masa tengteng, a mangtutphah a tu Pharo tapa masapen apan buhhek a om sikhanu ta masapen leh ganta piang masa tengteng toh a si ding uhi.
Aigupta gam pumpi ah kahna thupi a om dia, huchibang om ngei nai lou, huchibang om ngei nawnlou ding.
Himahleh Israel suante lak a kuamah siatna ding in, mi hiam gan hiam siatna ding in ui in a lei a tangsak kei ding a;

Huai hun chiang in na milian tengteng ka kiang ah a hongsuk ding ua, a hong kun ding ua, ‘nang honzui mitengteng toh paikhia un’ a honchi ding uhi. Huaikhit chiang in ka paikhe ding” chi in hehtak in Pharo apan Mosi paikhia hi.
Mosi leh Aron in Pharo ma ah hiai thillamdang tengteng a hihta ua;
Hiai kha nou adia khate kipatna ahi ding. Nou ading in kum khat a a kha masapen ahi ding hi.
Israel khawmpite kiang ah thu gen in, Hiai kha ni sawm ni’n a pipute inkuan bangzel in, michih in amah ading in belamnou a kilak chiat dia, in khat zel ading in belamnou khat zel ahi ding.
Belamnou khat adia inkuan a tawmluat leh, a mi zah dungzui in amah leh a in zom a, invengte toh lakhawm hen. Michih in a kham ding bangzel in belamnou na sim ding uhi.
Na belamnou uh gensiatbei, a pa kum khatna ahi dia; belamhon lak hiam kelte lak apan in hiam na la khe ding uhi.
Huai kha mah a ni sawmlehli tan na kem ding ua; nitaklam in Israel khawmpi omkhawmte’n a gou ding uhi.
A sisan na la ding ua, a nekna ding in kongkhak biang khuam nihte ah leh kongkhak tung ah na tat ding uhi.
Huai zan in sa mei a hai, tanghou silngou sohlouh toh na ne ding uhi; lou kha toh na ne ding uhi.
Sial nek kei unla, tuihuan hetkei un, a lutang, a khete, leh a sungkua toh mei in na haimin zaw ding uhi.
A zingchiang tan in a bangmah na valsak kei ding uhi. A zingchiang tan a omlaite mei in na hal ding uhi.
Hichibang in na ne ding uhi. Na kawng uh gaksa in, na khedap uh na khe ua bulhsa in, na khut ua na chiangkhunte uh tawisa in na kin nekding uhi.
Tu zan chia Aigupta gam ka tawnsuak ding hi. Aigupta gam a piang masa teng, mi leh gan that ding ka hih ziak in. Aigupta pathian tengteng siatna ding in ka vaihawm ding hi. Kei
Sisan nou ading in na omna innte uah chiamtehna ahi ding. Sisan ka muh chiang in, k’on Paikan dia, Aigupta gam ka gawt lai a, nou hon hihse ding in na tung uah hiai gawtna a omkei ding hi.
Tuni nou ading in theihgige ahi ding. Na khang teng un

Ni sagih tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding ua; ni masapen ni ngei in na innte ua pan in silngou na koihmang ding uhi. Ni masapen apan a ni sagih ni tan, tanghou silngou sawh ne peuhmah, huai mi Israel apan satkhiak ding ahi ngal a.

Ni masapen ni’n kikhopna siangthou a om dia, a ni sagih ni’n nou ading in kikhopna siangthou a om ding. Huai nite in nekbawl chihlouh ngal nna seplouh himhim ding ahi, Nek bawl kia na hihthei ding uhi.
Tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina na tang ding ua; hiai ni mah a Aigupta gam apan na mite uhi ka pikhiak ziak in. Huaiziak in tangtawn in na khang un dan in hiai ni na tang ding uh ahi.
A kha khatna ah, huai kha a ni sawmlehli ni, nitaklam a kipan huai kha nitaklam a ni sawmnih leh khat matan in, tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uhi,
Na inn sung uah ni sagih silngou muh in a om ding ahi kei. Kuapeuh silngou sawh ne, huai mingei mi khual hiam hi in, a gamsung a piang hita leh Israel khawmpi apat satkhiat ding ahi.
Silngou sawh bangmah na ne ding uh ahi kei. Na tenna peuhmah uah tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uhi, a chi hi.
Mosi in Israel upate a sam sak a, a kiang uah, “Na inkuan bangzel un belamnou kaikhia unla kilak unla, Paikan gou un, a chi hi.

Hussop gaklop na la ding ua, belkuang sung a om sisan ah na diah ding ua, belkuang sung a om sisan in kongkhak biang khuam tuak leh kongkhak tung na zep ding uhi. Zingsang masiah na lak ua kuamah a inn kongkhak ah a va pawtkhe ding ahi kei.
Aiguptate that dia
Tangtawn in na tapate uh ading leh nou ading in dan in hiai thil na tang ding uh ahi.
A chiam bang a, nou a honpiak ding gam, na tun chiang un, hichi ahi dia, hiai biakna thilzek in na nei ding uh ahi.
Hichi a honghi dia, na tate un na kiang ua, Hiai biakna thilzek bang na chihna uh ahia? a honchih chiang un,
Aiguptate a thah a, ei innte a tatkhiak lai a, Aigupta gam a Israel suante innte paikanpa,
Israel suante a paimang ua,
Huan, hichi ahi a, zankim lai in
Huchi in zan in Pharo a thou a, amah leh a sikhate leh Aigupta tengteng. Aigupta gam ah kahna thupitak a omta a; inn khat mahmah mi khat sih louhna a omlouh ziak in.
Zan in Mosi leh Aron a samsaka, “Thou unla, ka mite lak apan paikhia un. Nou gel leh Israel suante pai un. Na gensa bang un,
Na bawnghonte uleh na ganhonte u leng, na chih bang un, pi unla, pai un. Huchi in keileng hon vualzawl un” a chi hi.
Kintak a gam apan a sawlkhiak theihna ding un Aiguptate’n mite a nawh mahmah ua; “Mi sisa hivek ding i hi uh” a chih ziak un.
Mite’n a tangbuang uh silngou sawh ma in a la ua, a liangzang uah a tangbuang haihnate uh puan a khihsawn in.
Mosi thu bang in Israel suante a omta ua; Aiguptate dangka suangmantam leh dangkaeng suangmantam leh puansilh a ngen uhi.
Aiguptate mitmuh in
Israel suante Rameses apan Sukkoth a tung ua, naupangte simlouh pasal ngen khe a pai nuai guk ahi uhi.
Mi kihelte’n leng bawnghonte, ganhonte leh ganta tampi mahmah toh amau a zuitou uhi.

Silngou sohlouh a hih ziak in, Aigupta gam apan a honpuak uh tangbuang tanghou beu silngou sohlouh in a kang uhi. Aigupta gam apan hawlkhiak a om a, a tam theih nawnlouh ziak un, annek bangmah a kibawl kholh man kei uhi.
Aigupta gam a teng, Israel suante tamsung, kum za li leh sawmthum ahi.
Kum za li leh sawmthum bei in hichi ahi a, huai ni ngei in hichi ahi a, Aigupta gam apan
Aigupta gam a kipan amau a pikhiak ziak in
Himahleh michih sikha sum a leisa, a zek na sum nung in hiai a ne thei ding hi.
Gamdangmi leh sikha goih in hiai a ne ding ahi kei hi.
Inn khat a nekding ahi; inn apan sa, a bangmah na la thang ding uh ahi kei. A guh leng na hihtan ding uh ahi kei.
Israel khawmpi tengteng in hiai a zuih ding uh ahi.
Na kiang ua mikhual a om a,
Khotualmi ading leh na lak ua mikhual tam ading in dan khat a om ding ahi,” a chi hi.
Huchibang in Israel suan tengteng in a hih uhi.
Huai ni mah in hichi ahi a,
Huan,
Piang masapen tengteng, Israel suante lak a sul hong peuhmah, mihing hi in ganta hita leh siangthou in sehtuamsak in, kei a ahi, a chi hi.
Mosi in mite kiang ah, “Hiai ni theigige un, Aigupta gam apan na hongpawt khiak ni uhi, saltanna inn apan na hongpawt khiak ni uhi. Khut thahat in
Hiai ni, Abib kha in na hong paikhia uhi.
Hichi a honghi dia,
Ni sagih tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding ua, a ni sagih ni’n
Ni sagih tanghou silngou sohlouh a kine dia; na kiang uah tanghou silngou sawh a kimu ding ahi kei. Na omna tengteng uah leng silngou muh in a om ding ahi kei hi.
Huai ni’n na tapa na hilh dia. ‘Aigupta gam apan ka hong paikhiak lai a
Na ban ah nang ading in chiamtehna ahi dia, na mitte kikal ah theihgigena, huchi a na
Huaiziak in kum teng in a hunbi in hiai dan na zui ding uh ahi.
Hichi ahi ding a,
ading in sul hong tengteng na koihtuam dia, na neih ganta apan hongom, a nou masapen teng; a pate
Sabiltung nou masapen teng belamnou in na tan dia; huchi a na tat kei leh, a ngawng na hektan ding. Na tapate lak a mihing tapa masa tengteng na tan ding ahi.
Hun hongtung ding ah hichi ahi ding a, na tapa in, ‘hiai bang ahia? chi a a hondot chiang in, nang a kiang ah, Ban thahat in
Hichi ahi a, Pharo in a hon paisak noplouh lai in,
Huchi in na khut ah chiamtehna ding ahi dia, na mitte kikal a khaukhip ahi ding hi;

Hichi ahi a, Pharo in huai mite a paisak lai in, Pathian in, nai zaw mahleh, Philistiate gamtawn in a pikei hi. Pathian in, “Kidouna a muh chiang un mite a kisik kha ding ua, Aigupta gam ah a kiheikik kha ding uh” a chih ziak in.
Huchi in Pathian in mite a pikual a, Tuipi San gamdai lampi tawn in a pi hi. Huchibang in Aigupta gam apan Israel suante a pawlpawl a kizawm in a paitou uhi.
Mosi in Joseph guhte a pua hi. “Pathian in pellou in a hongveh dia; hiai apan ka guhte na puak ding uh ahi” chi a Israel suante chihtak tak a, a kichiam ziak in.
Sukkoth apan a zin kheta ua, gamdai zul ah, Etham mun ah a giakta uhi.
a ma uah sun in meipi khuampi ding in, amaute lampi a pi ding in a pai a; zan in mei khuampi ding in, amaute vakna pe ding in; sun leh zan a pai hi.
Mite ma apan sun a meipi khuam ding ahihkeileh zan a mei khuampi ding a lamang ngeikei hi.
Huan,
“Israel suante kiang ah thu gen in. Kihei uhenla, Pi-hahiroth ma ah, Migdol leh tuipi kikal ah, Baal-Zephon zawntak ah giak uhen. A ma ah tuipi kiang ah na giak ding uh ahi.
Israel suante tungtang thu, gamdai in a daltan ziak in gamsung ah a tang in buaigawp uh, Pharo in chi ding ahi.
Amaute nungdelh ding in Pharo lungtang ka khauhsak ding. Pharo tung leh a sepaihte tung ah zahtak in ka om ding hi. Huchi a Aiguptate’n

Mite a paikheta uh, chih Aigupta kumpipa a hilh uhi. Pharo lungtang leh a sikhate lungtang mite siatna ding in hei in a om hi. “Eite na a sepna ua pan Israel i paisak uh, bangdia hiai hih i hi ua!” a chi uhi.
A kangtalai a mansak a, a mite a tonpihta hi.
Kangtalai hoihpen za guk, Aigupta gam a kangtalai tengteng leh a heutute chiat uh toh a tonpih hi.
Aigupta kumpipa Pharo lungtang a khauhsak a; Israel suante a nungdelhta hi. Israel suante hangsantak in a paikheta uhi.
Himahleh Aiguptate’n a nungdelh ua, Pharo sakol tengteng leh kangtalai tengteng, a sakol tungtuangmite leh a sepaih pawlte Baal-zephon ma a, Pi-hahiroth pam a tuipi kiang a a giahna uah a phata uhi.
Pharo in a honnaih lai in, Israel suante a daktou ua, ngai in, Aiguptate’n amau a hondelhta uhi. A lau mahmah ua; Israel suante
Mosi kiang ah, “Aigupta gam a han a omlouh ziak a gamdai a si dia hon pikhia na hi maw! Bang achia hichibang a honbawl dia Aigupta gam apan hon pikhia na hia?
Aigupta gam a k’on hilh uh hiai thu ahi kei maw? Om maimai ni, Aiguptate na i septheihna ding in, chi’n. Gamdai a ka sih sang ua, kou adia Aiguptate nasep a hoihzawk ding ziak in” a chi uhi.
Mosi in mite kiang ah, “Lau kei unla, ding dinden un,
nou ading in a hon dousak dia, na paukei ding uhi” a chi hi.
Na chiang lik inla, tuipi tung ah na khut zankhia inla, sat in. Huchi in Israel suante tuipi laizang ah leihul ah a paisuak ding uhi.
Ngai in, ken Aiguptate lungtang ka khauhsak dia; amaute a delhzui ding uhi. Pharo tung ah, a kangtalaite tung ah leh a sakol tungtuangmite tung ah zahtakhuaina ka kimuh ding hi.
Pharo tung, a kangtalaite tung leh a sakol tungtuangmite tung a zahtakhuaina kakimuh chiang in, Kei
Israelte giahphual ma a pai, Pathian angel a kisuan a, a nunglam uah a pai a; meipi ding a mailam ua kipan a kisuana, a nunglam uah a dingta hi.

Aiguptate giahphual leh Israelte giahphual kikal ah a hong omta a; amau ading in meipi leh khomial ahi a; himahleh zan in hiaite ading in vak a pia hi. Huchi in zankhua in a kuamah a kinaihtuah thei zawsam a omkei uhi.
Mosi in tuipi tung ah a khut a zankhia a;
Tuipi lak a gam hul tung ah Israel suante a pai ua; a khut taklam uh leh a khut veilam uah amau ading in tuite bang a hong hita uhi.
Aiguptate’n a delh ua, Pharo sakol tengteng, a kangtalai tengteng, leh a sakoltungtuangmi tengteng nangawn tuipi lak ah amau nung ah a pailut uhi.
Hichi ahi a, zingsang a hong hih tak in
A kangtalai khete uh a lakkhiak sak a, haksapi in a hawl ua; Aiguptate’n, “Israelte ma apan taikek ni. Amaute ading in
Mosi in tuipi tung ah a khut a zankhia a, zingsang a hong hih in tuipi a hatna ah a hong kiknawn a; Aiguptate a lak ah a taikek ua; tuipi lak ah
Tuite a hong kiknawn ua, kangtalaite, sakoltungtuangmite leh Pharo sepaih a nung ua honglut tengteng tui in a khuhta hi. A lak uah khat lel leng dam a suakta omkei uhi.
Himahleh tuipi lak ah gam hul tung ah Israel suante a pai ua; a khut taklam uleh, a veilam uah tuite amau ading in bang ahita hi.
Huchibang in
Aiguptate tung a a nasep thupi Israelte’n a mu ua,
Huaikhit in Mosi leh Israel suante’n
“Thupitak a, a vualzoh ziak in,
Sakol leh a tung a tuangmi tuipi ah a paikheta.
ka hotdamna a honghi a;
ka Pathian ahi,
omna ka bawlsak ding.
Ka pa Pathian, huchi in amah
ka tawisang ding hi.
Pharo kangtalaite leh a sepaihte
tuipi ah a paikheta:
a heutute uleng,
Tuipi San ah a kelum uhi.
Thukna in amaute a khuhta:
Suang bang in a taw ah a tumta uhi.
thilhihtheihna thupi a hong hita:
melma a gawi zanta hi.
Na hoihna thupina in nang hondou dia thoute a zouta:
na thangpaihna na sawlkhia a,
huai in amaute buhpawl
bang in a kangta hi.
Na nakvangte mut in tuite
kaihkhawm in a om ua,
tui tampite vum bang a
chian in a om,
huchi in tuipi sunggil ah
thuknate kipsak in a om hi.
Melma in, Ka delh dia, ka pha dia,
gallak ka hawm ding:
huaite ah ka duhgawlna a tai ding,
ka namsau ka phawi dia,
ka khut in amau ka hihgawp ding, a chi hi.
Nang na huih in na muta,
tuipi in amau a khuhta hi;
tui hatte ah ngen bang in a tumta uhi.
nang bang kua a om a?
pathiante lak ah!
Sianthouna a thupi,
phatnate a lauhuai,
thillamdang hih ah,
Nang bang kua a om a?
Na khut taklam na zankhia a,
lei in amau a valhta hi.
Na tatsa mite nang na chitna in
na pikhia a;
na tenna siangthou ah na hatna in amau na pita hi.
Mite’n a za ua, a ling uhi:
Palestin a tengte nattom in a manta.
Huaichiang in Edom hausate’n
lamdang a sa mahmah ua:
Moab a mi thilhihtheite,
linna in a man;
Kanan a tengte tengteng a zulmang uhi.
Launa leh kihtakna a tung uah a hongtung;
na khut thupina in suang bang in a dai uhi;
na mite’n a Paikan masiah uh, na leisa,
na mite’n a Paikan masiah uh.
Na gouluah tang ah amau na hontun ding a,
Na suan ding,
tenna ding a na kibawlna mun ah,
Mun Siangthou ah,
na khut in a lamkipsa ah.
vai a hawm ding.”
Pharo sakol kangtalaite leh a sakoltungtuangmite toh tuipi ah a pilut a,
Miriam zawlneinu, Aron sanggamnu’n khuangta a khut in a la a; numei tengteng in khuangta toh lamkawm in a nung ah a zui uhi.
Miriam in amau a dawng a,
“Thupitak a, a vualzoh ziak in,
sakol leh a tungtuangmi tuipi ah a paikheta hi” chi in.
Huchibang in Tuipi San apan Mosi in Israelte a pi a, Sur gamdai ah a pai ua, gamdai ah ni thum a pai ua, tui a mu kei uhi.
Marah a hongtun un, Marah tuite a khat ziak in a dawn theikei uhi; Huaiziak in a min Marah a sa uhi.
Mosi dem in mite a phun ua, “Bang dawn ding i hia!” a chi uhi.
kiang ah a kap a;
“Lungluttak a
Elim, tuikhuk sawmlehnih omna leh tumsing sawmsagih omna a hongtung ua; huai a tuite kiang ah a giakta uhi.
Huan Elim apan a zinzel ua, Israel suante Aigupta gam apan a pawt khiak nung uh a kha nihna, a ni sawmlehnga ni’n Israel suante Sin gamdai a tung ua, huai Elim leh Sinai kikal a om ahi.
Gamdai ah Israel suante omkhawm Mosi leh Aron dem in a phun uhi.
Israel suante’n a kiang uah, “Sa bel bulte a i tutlai un, kham tak a tanghou i neklai un, Aigupta gam ah
A ni guk ni’n, hichi ahi ding a, a honlakte uh a bawl ding ua; nitenga a lakkhawm uh mun nih a tam ahi ding” a chi hi.
Mosi leh Aron in Israel suan tengteng kiang ah, “Nitaklam in huai hun in
Zingsang in, huai hun in
Mosi in, Nitaklam a nekding sa, Zingsang a kham ding tanghou
Mosi in Aron kiang ah thu a gen a, “Israel suan omkhawm tengteng kiang ah
Hichi ahi a, Aron in Israel suan omkhawm tengteng kiang a thu a gen lai in, gamdai lam a et uleh, ngai in, meipi ah
Mosi kiang ah thu a gen a;
“Israel suante phunna ka za; a kiang uah thu gen in. Nitaklam in sa na ne ding ua, zingsang lam in tanghou na kham ding uhi. Huchi in
Hichi ahi a, nitaklam in vengkeng a hong kuantou ua, giahphual a hong tuamdim ua; zingsang in giahphual kimvel ah daitui a kia hi.
Daitui kia a om nawnlouh tak in, ngai in, gamdai pumpi ah thil bem neu, leitung a zingdai tuikhal ngou chia a neu, a om hi.
Israel suante’n a muh un, “Hiai Bang ahia?” a kichi tuah ua, bang ahia chih lah a thei ngalkei ua. Mosi in a kiang uah, Hiai
Michih in a khamhun ding bang in la hen. Na mite uh zah dungzui in, michih ading in omer khat, la uhen chi a,
Israel suante’n huchibang in a hih ua, a khen in tam deuh, a khen in tawm deuh a la uhi.
Omer in a teh uleh a tamla in bangmah a nei valkei a, a tawm la in bangmah a tasam kei hi. Michih in a kham ding bangzel in a la uhi.
Mosi in, Kuamah in zingsang tan nutsiat neikei hen, a chi hi.
Hinapi in Mosi a ngaikhe kei ua; a lak ua khenkhatte’n zingchiang tan in a nusia ua, a than a, a uih hi. Huchi in Mosi a tung uah a hehta hi.
Zingsang teng in, michih in a kham ding bangzel in a la ua; ni a hongsat chiang in a zul hi.
A ni guk ni’n hichi ahi a, tanghou a mun nih a tam mi khat ading in omer nih zel a la uhi. Khawmpite heutu tengteng a hong ua Mosi a hilh uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hiai
A zingchiang tan Mosi sawl bang in a koih ua, a uih kei a, than leng a omkei hi.
Mosi in, “Tuni in huai ne un; tuni lah
Ni guk na lakhawm ding ua; himahleh a ni sagih ni khawlni ahi, huai ni’n bangmah a omkei ding” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, a ni sagih ni’n lakhawm ding in mi khenkhat a paikhia ua, himahleh bangmah a mu kei uhi.
Mosi kiang ah, “Bang tan ka thupiakte leh ka dante zuilou ding na hi ua?
En in,
Huchi in mite a ni sagih ni’n a khawlta uhi.
Israel inkawte’n a min Manna a sa ua; sing namtui chi bang ahi, a ngou; chep in tanghou pei khuaizu sawh a bang hi.
Mosi in, “Hiai thil
Mosi in Aron kiang ah, “Bel la inla, huai ah omer khat manna dim koih in,
Mosi thu a piak bang in, Aron in Thukhun ma ah, koih ding in a luitouta hi.
Gam kiluah a hongtun masiah uh, Israel suante’n kum sawmli manna a ne uhi. Kanan gamgi a hongtun masiah uh, manna a ne uhi.
Omer khat, ephah khat mun sawm ahi.
Huan, Israel suante omkhawm Sin gamdai apan a zin ua,
Huaiziak in mite’n Mosi a kinakpih ua, “Ka dawn ding uh tui honpia in” a chi uhi. Mosi in a kiang uah, “Bangdia hon kinakpih na hi ua? Bangdia
Mite lah tuiduh in huai ah a dang uh a tak a; mite Mosi tung ah a phun ua, “Dangtakna a kou leh ka tate uh leh ka gante uh honthat dia, bangdia Aigupta gam apan hon lakhia na hia?” a chi uhi.
Mosi

Ngai in, Horeb ah suangpi tung ah na ma ah ka ding dia, suangpi na sat dia, huai apan tui a hong pawtkhe ding, mite’n a dawn theihna ding un” a chi hi. Israel upate muh in huchibang in Mosi in a hihta hi.
Huai mun min Massah leh Meribah a sa hi, Israel suante’n Toupa tong in, Amah ze-et a, “I lak uah
Huaikhit in Amalek a hong kuan a, Rephidim ah Israelte a hong dou hi.
Mosi in Joshua kiang ah, “Mi hon telkhia inla, pawtkhia ni’n, Amalek i dou ding. Zingchiang in ka khut a Pathian chiang tawi in tangvum ah ka kuan ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi in a kiang a, a gen bang in Joshua in a hih a, Amalek a dou uhi. Mosi leh Aron leh Hur tang vum ah a hohtouta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Mosi in a khut a liktouh chiang in, Israelte a hat ua; a khut a khiaksuk chiang in, Amalek a hat hi.

Himahleh Mosi khut a gik a; huchi in suang a la ua, a nuai ah a koih uhi. Huai tung ah amah a tu a, Aron leh Hur in a khut a dop touhsak uhi. Khat, khat lampang ah, a dang, a dang lampang ah. Huchi in nitum matan a khutte a pangzou hi.
Huchi in Joshua in Amalek leh a mite a namsau in a zouta hi.
Mosi in huai ah maitam a doh a, a min a sa hi.
A khang a khang a
Jethro, Midian siampu, Mosi sungpan, Mosi ading leh a mi Israelte adia Pathian in a hih tengteng leh Aigupta gam apan
Huchi in Jethro, Mosi sungpan, Zipporah, Mosi zi, a sawlkik nung in a na kem hi,
Zipporah tapa nihte toh. Huai nih lak a khat min Gershom ahi a, “Melmak gam ah mikhual ka na hi” a chih ziak in.
A dang min Eliezer ahi a, “Ka pa Pathian hon panpihpa ahi, Pharo namsau apan a hon tatkhiak ziak in” a chi hi.
Jethro, Mosi sungpa a tapate leh a zi toh gamdai ah Mosi kiang ah a hong ua, Pathian tang a a puanin kaihna mun ah.
Mosi kiang ah, “Kei na sungpa Jethro na kiang ah ka hong, na zi leh a kiang a a tapa nihte toh” a chi hi.
Mosi, a sungpa dawn ding in a pawtkhia a, a kuna, a tawp a; bang na chi uhiam chi’n a kidong ua; puanin sung ah a lut uhi.
Mosi in a sungpa Pharo tung leh Aiguptate tung a Israelte ziak a
Aiguptate khut apan a tatkhiak, Israelte tung a
Jethro in, “Aiguptate khut apan leh Pharo khut apan hon tankhepa, Aiguptate khutnuai apan a mite tankhepa
Tuin pathian tengteng sang in
Jethro Mosi sungpan, haltum thillat leh thillat dangte Pathian ading in lan hi. Pathian ma a Ankuang umkhawm ding in Aron leh Israel Upa tengteng a hongpai uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a zing in Mosi mipite vaihawm ding in a tu hi. Mipite zingsang apan nitaklam tan in Mosi kiang ah ading uhi.

Mosi sungpan Mosi in mite tung a a hih tengteng a muh in, “Mite tung a hiai thil na hih bang ahia? Bangdia tangtut na hia? Bangdia zingsang apan nitaklam tan a mite na kiang a ding uh ahia?” a chi hi.
Mosi in a sungpa kiang ah, “Pathian dong dia mite ka kiang a hongpai ahi uhi.
Haksatna a neih chiang un, ka kiang ah a hongpai ua; khat leh a dang kikal ah vai ka hawm a, Pathian thusehte leh a dante ka theisak hi” a chi hi.
Mosi sungpan a kiang ah, "Na thilhih a hoih kei hi.
Nang leh na kiang a om hiai mite na segawp mahmah ding uhi. Nang adia hiai thil a gik luat ziak in, nang kia in na hih theikei hi.
Tuin ka aw ngaikhia in, k’on thuhilh ding hi. Na kiang ah Pathian om hen. Pathian lam ah nang mite palai na hidia a thubuaite uh Pathian kiang ah na tun ding hi,
Thusehte leh dante amau na sinsak dia, a paina ding lam uh leh a nasep ding uh toh na ensak ding hi.

Huailou in mite apan hithei, Pathian kihtakdan siamte, thutak mite, enna hawte na telkhe dia, amaute a tung uah na koih ding. Sangte vaihawmte, zate vaihawmte, sawmngate vaihawmte leh sawmte vaihawmte ahi ding uhi.

Hun tengteng in amau mite vai hawmsak uhen. Hichi ahi dia, thu lian chiteng nang kiang a hongtun ding ua, thu neu chiteng amau a ngaihtuah ding uhi. Huchi in nang ading in a baihlam zaw dia, na puakgik a hon puakpih ding uhi.
Hiai thil na hih a, huchibang a Pathian in thu a honpiak leh, huchi in na pangzou dia, hiai mite leng lungkim in a mun uah a paiding uhi” a chi hi.
Mosi in a sungpa aw a ngaikheta a, a gen tengteng a hihta hi.
Israel tengteng apan Mosi in mihitheite a telkhia a, mite tung a lutang in a bawlta hi. Sangte vaihawmte, zate vaihawmte, sawmngate vaihawmte leh sawmte vaihawmte in a bawl hi.
Hun tengteng in mite vai a hawmsak ua; thu haksate Mosi kiang ah a tun ua, thu neute amau a ngaihtuah uhi.
Huchi in Mosi in a sungpa a paisak a, a gam ah a paita hi.
Aigupta gam apan Israel suante a hong paikhiak uh; a kha thumna, huai ni mah in Sinai gamdai a hongtung uhi.
Rephidim apan pawtkhia in, Sinai gamdai a hongtung ua, gamdai ah a giak uhi. Huai ah Israelte’n tang mazawn ah puanin a kai uhi.
Mosi Pathian kiang ah a hohtou a,
Aiguptate tung a ka hihleh muvanlai khate a k’on tuah, keimah kiang ngei kontut dan na muta uhi.
Huaiziak in tuin, ka aw na man taktak ua, ka thukhun na zuih taktak uleh, lei tengteng kei a a hih ziak in mite sang in kei ading in gou tuambik na hi ding uhi.
Kei ading in siampute, lalgam leh nam siangthou na hi ding uhi. Hiai thute Israel suante kiang a na gen ding ahi” a chi hi.
Mosi a hong a mite upate a samsaka,
Mi tengteng in kituaktakin a dawng ua,
Mosi kiang ah, “Mite kiang ah hoh inla, tuni leh zingchiang a ding in amaute siangsak in, a puante uh sawp uhen.
A ni thumni ading in mansa in om uhen. A ni thum ni a mi tengteng muh a Sinai tangtung a
Mite kimvel ah dai na kai dia, tang a hohtou lou ding in pilvang un, ahihkeileh tang kim khoihlou ding in pilvang un. Kuapeuh tang khoih sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.

Khut in a lawng ding uhi a hi kei, a lawng peuhmah suang a denlup ngeingei ahi dia; ahihkeileh kap pailet ahi ding. Gan hiam mihing hiam hileh leng, a hing kei ding. Pengkul sawtpi a gin chiang in, tang ah a hong tou ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
Tang apan mite kiang ah Mosi a paisuk a, a puante uh a sawp uhi.
Aman mite kiang ah, “Ni thum ni ading in kisakhol un; na zite uh naihkei un” a chi hi.
A ni thum ni’n zingsang in hichi ahi a, vanpi gingte leh khophiate, tang tung a meipi sah, pengkul aw a ngaiha ngaih a hongomta a, giahphual sung a om mi tengteng a lingta uhi.
Mosi in puanin apan mite Pathian toh kimu ding in a hon pikhia a; amau tang nuailam ah ading uhi.
mei a tangtung a, a hongkum ziak in Sinai tang a pumkhut vekta hi. Huai a meikhu meipi khu bang in a tungkaha, a tang pumpi a ling zungzung hi.
Sawtpi pengkul ging a ngaih semsem lai in Mosi in thu a gen a, Pathian in aw in amah a dawng hi.
Sinai tangtung a tangvum tung ah
Mosi kiang ah, “Paisuk inla, mite vauhilh in. En ding in
Mosi in
Mosi mite kiang ah a hohsuk a, a kiang uah thu a genta hi.
Huan, Pathian in hiai thute tengteng a gen hi.
Kei
Keimah loungal a dang pathiante na nei ding ahi kei.
Milim gelhthoh himhim ahihkeileh tungvan a om thillim kibatpih mawngmawng hiam nuai lei a om hiam leinuai a tuisung a om kibatpih na kibawl ding ahi kei.
A kiang uah na kun ding ahi kei, a na uh leng na sem ding ahi kei. Kei lah
Kei hon it a, ka thupiakte zuite lak a sang tampite kiang a hehpihna pia ka hi.
Sabbath ni theigige in, tang siangthou ding in.
Ni guk sungteng nna nasem ding a, na nna tengteng nasep ding ahi.
Himahleh a ni sagihna
A ni guk ni’n
Na nu leh na pa zahtak in.
Tual na that ding ahi kei.
Ang na kawm ding ahi kei.
Na gu ding ahi kei.
Na inveng siatna ding in palai taklou na hi ding ahi kei.
Na inveng inn na eng ding ahi kei. Na inveng zi na eng ding ahi kei, a sikhapa leng, a sikhanu leng, a bawngtal hiam, a sabiltung hiam, thil himhim na inveng a peuhpeuh; a chi hi.
Mi tengteng in vanpi gingte, khophiate, pengkul husate leh tangkang khu a mu ua; mite’n huaite a muh un, a kisuan ua, gamlapi ah ading uhi.
Mosi kiang ah, “Ka kiang uah thu gen inla, k’on ngaikhe ding uhi. Himahleh Pathian in hon houpih kei hen, ka si kha ding uh” a chi uhi.
Mosi in a kiang uah, “Lau kei un. Amah launa na ma ua a om a, na khelh louhna ding un, Pathian nou hon enchian ding a hong ahi” a chi hi.
Mite gamla tak ah ading ua, Pathian omna mun mial bikbek lam ah Mosi a vapai nai hi.
Kei lou dangka pathiante na kibawl ding uh ahi kei. Dangkaeng pathiante leng na kibawl ding uh ahi kei.

Kei ading in lei maitam na bawl ding ua, huai ah na haltum thillatte leh na lemna thillatte, na belamte leh na bawngtalte na lan ding uh ahi. Mun tengteng a ka min ka khumna ah na kiang uah ka hong dia, k’on vualzawl ding hi.
Suang maitam n’on bawlsak leh, suangsek a na bawllouh ding ahi. Suang tung a na vanzat na lik leh, na hihninta ahi ngal a.
Huai a na vuaktanna a kimuhkhiak louhna ding in, ka maitam ah kalbi in na kahtou ding ahi kei” a chi hi.
Huan, hiai vaihawmnate, a ma ua na ngak dingte ahi uhi.
Hebru sikha na lei leh, kum guk sung nang na a sem dia, a kum sagih na ah bangmah pelou in noplen in a pawtkhe ding.
Amah tuma honglut ahihleh, amah tum in a pawtkhe ding. Zi nei ahihleh, a zi in amah a zuikhe ding.
A pu in zi a piak a, tapate hiam tanute hiam a neihsak leh, a zi leh a tate a pu a ahi ding ua, amah kia in a pawtkhe ding.
Sikha in teltak a, “Ka pu ka it, ka zi leh ka tate ka it; noplen in ka pawtkhe kei ding” a chih leh;
A pu in vaihawmte kiang ah amah a pi dia; kongkhak chiang ah hiam kongkhak khuam chiang ah hiam a pi dia, a pu in vuhna in a bil a vut pailet ding. Huchi in aman a pu na a sem tawntung ding hi.
Min a tanu sikhanu dia a zuak leh, sikhapate bang in a paikhe kei ding.
Amah khampa, a pu a lungkimsak kei leh, a pa a tankik sak ding. A tung ah muanhuailou tak a ahihleh melmak nam kiang a zuak ding in thuneihna a neikei.
A tapa zi dia a deih leh, tanute bang in a bawl ding hi.
Aman zi dang a neih thuah leh, a annek, a puansilh leh a piak ding a kilawm a sukkiam louh ding ahi.
A tung a hiai thumte ahihkeileh, sum leh pai pelou in noplen in a pawtkhe ding ahi.
A sihna dia mi vua peuhmah, sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Mi’n that ding in bukkei henla, Pathian in a khut ah pekhe zawta leh, a taina ding mun ka sehsak ding hi.
Himahleh zekhem a amah that ding in, mi’n a invengte tung ah maingaltak in gamta leh a sihna ding in, amah ka maitam apan na la dia, a sih ding ahi.
Kuapeuh in a pa hiam, a nu hiam vaw leh, sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Kuapeuh in mihing gu in zuak leh, ahihkeileh a khut ah muhkhiak in om leh, amah sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Kuapeuh in a nu leh pa hamsiat sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Mite kisual uhenla, khat in khat suang in deng hiam, a khuttum hiam in tum henla, silou in, lupna ngakta leh;
thounawn in, chiangkhun khun in kholak vak leh, a vawpa a hul dia; a hun sukbei man a pedia, amah a dam siangsak sipsip ding hi.
Mi’n a sikhapa hiam, a sikhanu hiam chiang in sat henla, a khut lum in si leh amah gawt ngeingei ding ahi.
Himahleh ni khat hiam, ni nih hiam nung a dam a, a thohzoh leh, gawtlouh ding ahi; amah a pu neihsa a hih ziak in.

Mite kisual in, numei gailai hihna in, a nau tolh henla, himahleh siat detna in zuikei leh; numeinu pasal in a tung a, a chih bangbang a gawt ngeingei ding ahi. Vaihawmte’n a bikhiah bang uh a liau ding hi.
Siatna mawngmawng in zuita leh hinna tang a hinna a piak ding ahi.
Mit tang a mit, ha tang a ha, khut tang a khut, khe tang a khe.
Mei a hal tang a mei a hal, liam tang a liam, pawn tang a pawn.
Mi’n a sikha mit hiam, a sikhanu mit hiam suksak in, seta leh a mit ziak in noplen in a khah ding ahi.
A sikhapa ha hiam, a sikhanu ha hiam sukheta leh, a ha ziak in noplen in a khah ding ahi.
Bawngtal in pasal hiam, numei hiam, si in, sita leh; huai bawngtal denlup ngeingei ding ahi. A sa neklouh hial ding ahi. Himahleh a bawngtal nei pen gawtlouh in a suakta ding.

Himahleh huai bawngtal a malam a, a ki a misik hat hi a, a neitu kiang a hilhsa leng hinapi a, aman a na khum tuanlou ahihleh, pasal hiam, numei hiam a na siklup leh, huai bawngtal denlup ding ahi a; a neitu leng sihsak ding ahi.
A tung ah dangka sum a kiphut leh a kiphut bangbang a hinna tatna man ding in a pe ding ahi.
Tapa hiam, tanu hiam a na sik leh, hiai vaihawmna bang a, a tung a hih ding ahi.
Bawngtal in sikhapa hiam sikhanu hiam a sik leh, a pu kiang ah dangka sekel sawmthum a pedia, bawngtal pen denlup ding ahi.
Pasal in kawkhuk sin hong henla, ahihkeileh pasal in kawkhuk tou henla, sin kei henla, asung ah bawngtal hiam sabiltung hiam ke leh,
Kawkhuk neitu in a bawlhoih a, a neipa kiang a dangka sum a piak ding ahi. Huchi in a gan si pen amah a ahi ding.
Mi khat bawngtal in midang khat bawngtal mah hihna henla, sita leh; a bawngtal hinglai pen a zuak ding ua, a sum a kihawm ding uhi. A bawngtal si pen leng a kihawm ding uhi.

Ahihkeileh a malam a huai bawngtal sikhat ahi, chih a kitheih a, a neitu in a khum kei chih a kitheih leh; bawngtal tang a bawngtal a piak ngeingei ding ahi. Huchi in a gan si amah a tuam ahi ding hi.
Mi’n bawngtal hiam, belam hiam gu in gou hiam zuakta leh; bawngtal khat gun in bawngtal nga, belam khat gun in belam li a dit ding ahi.
Guta inluh kimu in, kivua in sita leh a vawpa pen sisan suah chi a mawhsak theih ahi kei ding.
Himahleh a tung ah ni a suah nung ahihleh sisan suah chi a mawhpaih theih ahi ding. Ditna kim a piak ding ahi. Piak ding bangmah a neih kei leh, a guktak ziak a amah zuak ding ahi.
A van guk a khut a hinga a kimuh leh, bawngtal hiam ahihkeileh sabiltung hiam, ahihkeileh belam hiam hitaleh, a mun nih a piakkik ding ahi.
Mi’n lou hiam, grephuan hiam nek a omsak in, a gan lutsak in, midang lou ah ta leh; amah lou hoihna pen leh amah grephuan hoihna pen apan ditna a bawl ding ahi.
Mei hongkangin, linglak hong kuang in, buh hiam ahihkeileh hai ding lai hiam ahihkeileh lou kangse taleh; a mei khahpa’n ditna a bawl ngeingei ding ahi.
Mi’n a invengpa kep ding in dangka sum hiam van hiam pe khia henla, huai mi inn apan kiguta leh; guta a kimuh leh a zahnih pia hen.
Guta a kimuh kei leh, a invengpa van tung ah a khut a kha na hiam, chih theihna ding in inn neipa vaihawmte kiang ah a pi ding ahi.

Tatlekna chiteng, bawngtal thu ah hiam, sabiltung thu ah hiam, belam thu ah hiam, puansilh thu ah hiam, van mang dan himhim hiam, midang in kei a ahi, a chih leh, a langtuak thu vaihawmmite ma a tut ding ahi. Vaihawmte mawhpaihpa’n a invengpa a lehnih a piak ding ahi.
Mi’n a invengpa kiang ah a kep ding in sabiltung hiam, bawngtal hiam, belam hiam gan himhim hiam pe khia henla; si hiam, liam hiam, hawlmang hiam a om in, kuamah in muta kei leh;
kichiamna amau gel kikal ah a om dia; a invengpa vantung ah a khut a khakei chihna; a van neipa’n huai a pom dia, adin kei ding hi.
Amah apan guk a om leh, a neipa kiang ah ditna a bawl ding hi.
Gan balnen in a na omta leh, a theihpihna ding in a sa hontawi hen, bohnen a om pen adin kei ding hi.
Mi’n a invengpa banghiam khel henla, a neipen omlouh kal in liam in hiam si hiam in omta leh, a dit ngeingei ding ahi.
Himahleh a neipa a kiang a om ahihleh adin kei ding. Van khelhman in adin khin lel hi.
Khamsa hilou nungak siangthou khat pasal in zol henla, luppih leh, mouman pia in zi in a nei ngeingei ding ahi.
A numei pa’n a kiang a piak a nial bilbel leh, nungak siangthoute man dungzui in sum a pe ding hi.
Numei mitkhialdawitawi a hin na phal ding ahi kei.
Ganta luppih peuhmah sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Mikhual na subuai hiam, na nuaisiah hiam ding ahi kei hi. Aigupta gam a mikhual na hihtak ziak un.
Meithai hiam, naupang paneilou hiam na hihgenthei ding ahi kei.
Bangchi teng a amau na gentheih sak a, ka kiang a a hong kah peuhmah uh leh, a kahna uh ka ngaikhe ngeingei ding hi.
Ka thangpaihna a sou dia, namsau in ka honthat ding hi. Na zite uh meithai ahi ding ua, na tate uh paneilou ahi ding uhi.
Na kiang ua om ka mite lak a mizawng kuapeuh kiang a sum na leitawi sakleh, leitawisakmi hih bang a sumpung na nek louh ding ahi.
Kichiamna a na inveng puansilh na lak leh, ni tumma a amah kiang a na va piakkik ding ahi.
Huai lah a kikhuhna neihsun ahi ngal a, a vun adia a puansilh ahi. Bang in a ihmu dia? Hichi ahi dia, ka kiang a, a hong kah chiang in ka za ding; hehpihthei ka hih ziak in.
Pathian na kou ding ahi kei a, na mite vaihawmmi leng na hamsiat ding ahi kei hi.
Na theigah min masate, na uain masate lan ding in na zekai ding ahi kei. Na tapate lak a piang masapen kei n’on piak ding ahi.
Huchi mah bang in na bawngtalte lak ah leng na hih ding ahi. Na belamte lak ah leng hiai bang in na hih ding ahi. Ni sagih sung a pi kiang ah na omsak dia, a ni giat ni a kei n’on piak ding ahi.
Kei adia misiangthoute na hih ding uh ahi. Huaiziak in gamlak a gamsa nek bang sa himhim na neklouh ding uh ahi a; uite na pe zaw ding uhi.
Thutut zuau na genzak ding ahi kei. Theihpih diklou hi ding in migiloute toh na kizop ding ahi kei.
Gilou hih ding in mipi na zui ding ahi kei. Vaihawmna kaikawi ding in mi tam lamlam zui in amau na gum ding ahi kei.
Thubuai genna ah mizawng dou in guptuam na nei ding ahi kei.
Na melma bawngtal hiam sabiltung hiam taimang na tuah leh a kiang a na pinawn ngeingei ding ahi.
Nang hon haw mi sabiltung, a vanpuak lel a puk na muh leh taisan lou a, na panpih ngeingei ding ahi.
Thubuai a kihekna ah mizawngte ading in thukhenna na kaikawi ding ahi kei.
Thil diklou apan gamlapi ah om in. Thil hihkhial lou leh midikte that ken; migiloute siamtangsak lou ding ka hih ziak in.
Golhgukna na la ding ahi kei. Golhgukna in mit a tawsak a, midiktatte thu a kaikawi ngal hi.
Huailou in mikhual na hihgenthei ding ahi kei. Mikhual lungtang na theih ziak in, Aigupta gam ah mikhual in na om ngeita uhi, chih thei in.
Kum guk sung na gam ah haichi na tuh dia, a gahte na lakhawm ding.

Himahleh a kum sagihna na omsak kinken a, na khawlsak ding ahi; na mite lak a mizawngte’n a nektheihna ding un. A nutsiat peuh uh gamlaksate’n a ne ding uhi. Huchibang mah in na grephuan leh na olive huan tung ah na hih ding uhi.
Ni guk sung nangmah nna nasem dia, a ni sagih ni’n na khawl ding; na bawngtal leh na sabiltung a khawl ua, na sikhanu tapa leh mikhual a halh theihna ding un.
Na kiang a ka gen tengteng zui ding in pilvang inla; pathian dangte min louken, na kam apan zak in leng omkei hen.
Kum khat sung in ka kiang ah Ankuangluina thumvei na bawl ding ahi.

Tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina bawl in k’on thupiak bang in, Abib kha a hun sehsa in, ni sagih sung tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding ahi. Huai ni a Aigupta apan na hong paikhiat ziak in. Ka ma a kuamah khutvuak a a hong kilat ding uh ahi kei.
Pawltak Ankuanglui, na sepgim gahte, lou a na tuh puaklutna Ankuangluina na bawl ding ahi. Na lou apan na sepgimna gahte na puaklut khit chiang in kumtawp ah, Puaklut Ankuanglui na bawl ding ahi.
Kum khat sung in thumvei pasal tengteng
Ka kithoihna sisan tanghou silngousoh toh na lat ding ahi kei. Ka kithoihna thau a zingsang chiang tan in a om ding leng ahi kei hi.
na Pathian inn a na gam gah masapente lak a masapen na laklut ding ahi. Kelnou, a pi nawitui in na huan ding ahi kei.
Ngai in, lampi a nang honkem ding leh ka mun bawlsa a nang hontun ding in na ma ah Angel khat ka sawl hi.
A ma ah pilvang inla, a aw zui in, hehsak ken. Na tatleknate a ngaihdam louh ding ziak in. Ka min lah amah ah a om ngal a.
Himahleh a aw na zuih taktak a, ka gen tengteng na hihleh; na melmate tung ah melma ka hidia, nang hondoute tung ah doumi ka hi ding hi.
Ka Angel na ma ah pai dia, Amorte, Hitte, Perizte, Kanante, Hivte leh Jebuste lak a nang hon pilut ding ka hi ngal a; huchi in amau ka satkhe ding hi.

A pathiante uh ma ah na kun ding ahi kei. A na uh leng na sem ding ahi kei. A thilhihte bang uh leng na hih ding uh ahi kei. Himahleh amaute na zou siang sipsip dia, a milimte uh na hihzan dimdem ding ahi.
na Pathian nna uh nasem ding ua, aman na annek tuidawn uh a vualzawl ding hi. Huchi in na lak ua pan chinatna ka lamang ding hi.
Kuamah nausia a omkei dia, na gamsung uah kuamah a chingkei ding. Na nite zah uh ka tangtung sak ding hi.
Na ma uah kei lauhna ka sawl dia, na hong tunna mi tengteng lak ah buaizakna ka omsak ding hi. Huchi in na melma tengteng nang apan ka taikek sak ding hi.
Na ma ah khuaizanta ka sawl dia, huai in Hivte, Kanante leh Hitte na ma apan a hawlkhe ding hi.
Kum khat sung in amaute na ma apan ka hawlkhe kei ding. A gam a hongvuak dia, noute hon hihse ding in gamsa a hongpung ding hi.
Na hongpun ua, gam naluah mateng, na ma ua pan amaute tawmkha kha in ka hawlkhe ding hi.
Tuipi San apan Philistiate tuipi pha hial in, gamdai apan lui chiang pha in na gamgi ka khung ding. Na khut ua a gamluah mite k’on piak khiak ding ziak in na ma uah amaute na hawlkhe ding uhi.
Amau toh hiam a pathiante utoh hiam leng thukhun na bawl ding uh ahi kei.
Na gamsung uah a teng ding uh ahi kei. Nang ka tung ah a hon khialsak kha ding uhi. A pathiante uh nna nasep uleh huaite nou adia thang a hi ding hi.
Huai nung in Pathian in Mosi kiang ah, “
Mosi kia
Mosi a hongpai a,
thu tengteng Mosi in a gelh a, zingsang in beltak in a thou a, tang nuai ah maitam a bawl a, Israel nam sawmlehnih dungzui in, khuam sawmlehnih a phut hi.
Aman Israel suante lak a tangvalte a sawl a, amau
Mosi in bawngtalte sisan kimkhat a la a, kuangkum sung ah a koih a; a sisan kimkhat maitam tung ah a theh hi.
Thukhun Laibu a la a, mite zak in a sim hi. Mite’n “
Mosi in sisan a la a mite tung ah a theh a, “Thukhun sisan en un, hiai thu tengteng thu a
Mosi, Aron, Nadab, Abihu leh Israel Upa sawmsagihte a paitou ua;
Israel Pathian a va mu uhi. A khepek nuai ah sapphir suangmantam a bawl hileh kilawm leh van bang a siang a om hi.
Himahleh Israel suante lak a upate dou in Pathian in a tung uah a khut a likkei hi. Amau leng Pathian mu napi in hingdam a om in ne in a dawn uhi.
Mosi leh amah huhpa Joshua ading khia ua, Pathian tang ah a hohtou uhi

Upate kiang ah, na kiang ua ka hong kiknawn masiah uh hiai ah hon ngak un. Ngai un, Aron leh Hur na ompih uhi. Mi kuapeuh in thubuai bangpeuh gen ding na neih uleh, amah a kiang uah honghoh hen” a chi hi.
Mosi tang ah a hohtou a, meipi in tang a khuhta hi.
Sinai tang tung ah
Tangvum tung a
Meipi lak ah Mosi a lutta a, tang ah a va hohtou hi. Mosi tang ah ni sawmli leh zan sawmli a va omta hi.
Huan,
Thillat a hontawi theihna ding un, Israel suante kiang ah thu gen in. Michih lungtang a uttak a pete apan thilpiak na la ding.
Amau apan thilpiak na lak ding hiai bang ahi. Dangkaeng leh dangka leh dal.
Puanmalngat dum, khau sandup, leh khau sanau leh khau hoih leh kel mul.
Belampa vun sansaksa leh ngalvang vun leh singgi sing.
Vak ding in sathau, thaunuh ding gimlim, gim namtui ading toh.
Onik suangte, siampu puan leh awmtuamna a siat ding suangte.
Mun siangthou hon bawlsak uhen; a lak ua ka ten theihna ding in.
Nang k’on etsak bangbang in, biakbuk lim bang in leh a vanzat tengteng lim bang in na bawl ding ahi.
Singgi sing in thukhun bawm na bawl ding ahi. A dunglam tong nih leh a kim ahi dia, a vailam tong khat leh a kim ahi dia, a sanlam tong khat leh a kim ahi ding hi.
Dangkaeng tak in na luan dia, a sunglam leh a pawlam na luan dia, a kimvel ah dangkaeng lallukhu bawl in a tung ah na bawl ding ahi.
Dangkaeng in a sikkual li na sung dia, a ning lite ah na bulh ding. Sikkual nih a pang khat ah a om ding ua, sikkual nih dangte a pang khat ah a om ding uhi.
Singgi sing chiang na bawl dia, dangkaeng in na luan ding hi.
Thukhun bawm sik a sikkualte sung ah chiangte na thunlut dia, huaite thukhun bawn zawn a hih theihna ding in.
Chiangte thukhun bawm sikkual sung ah a om ding uhi.
Thukhun bawm sung ah ka honpiak theihsakna na koih ding ahi.
Dangkaeng tak in chitna tutphah na bawl dia; a dunglam tong nih leh a kim ahi dia, a vailam tong khat leh a kim ahi ding.
Chitna tutphah mong nihte ah, dangkaeng in cherubte na bawl dia, huaite sekthoh in na bawl ding ahi.
A mong khat ah Cherub khat na bawl dia, Cherub dang a mong langkhat ah. A mong nihte ah chitna tutphah ah cherubte na bawl ding ahi.
Cherubte’n tungsang lam ah a khate uh a zakkhe ding ua, a khate ua chitna tutphah tuam in, a mai un a ki en tuah ding ua; cherubte mai chitna tutphah lam ah a om ding hi.
Thukhun bawm tung ah chitna tutphah na koih dia; thukhun bawm sung ah k’on piak ding theihsakna na koih ding ahi.
Huai ah k’on kimuhpih dia, chitna tutphah tung apan, theihsakna thukhun bawm tung a om Cherub nihte kikal apan Israel suante kiang a thupiak k’on piak ding thil tengteng thu ah, k’on houpih ding hi.
Singgi in dohkan na bawl dia; a dunglam tong nih ahi dia; a vailam tong khat, a sanlam tong khat leh a kim ahi ding hi.
Dangkaeng tak in na luan dia; a kimvel in dangkaeng lallukhu na bawl ding ahi.
A kimvel in a gei khut chia in na bawl dia; a kimvel in a gei ah dangkaeng lallukhu na bawl ding ahi.
A sikkual ding in dangkaeng in li na bawl dia; sikkualte a ning lite a khe li tung a omte ah na koih ding.
Dohkan puakna ding chiangte a omna ding in a gei chin ah sikkualte a om ding uh ahi.
