Singgi in chiangte na bawl dia, dangkaeng in na luan dia, huaite dohkan a kipuak theihna ding ahi.
A kuangte, a keute, a sinte, a noute, a sitna ding in na bawl ding hi. Huaite dangkaeng tak in na bawl ding hi.
Ka ma a dohkan tung ah tanghou sawmlehnih na koih gige ding hi.
Dangkaeng tak in khawnvak koihna na bawl ding hi. Khawnvak koihna sekthoh in na bawl ding ahi. A kungpi leh a hiangte, a pakmum leh a pakte, a kibang mah in na bawl ding ahi.
A pangte apan hiang guk a kakhe dia; khawnvak koihna pang khat apan hiang thum, khawnvak koihna pang dang apan hiang thum.
Belkuang thumte makha bang a bawlte, hiang khat a pakmum leh pak; hiang dang a belkuang thumte makha bang a bawlte, pakmum leh pak; huchibang in khawnvak koihna apan a hongsuak hiang gukte.
Khawnvak koihna ah belkuang li makha bang a bawl a om ding ahi, a pakmumte leh pakte u toh.
Huai mah a hiang nihte nuai ah pakmum khat a om dia, huai mah a hiang nihte nuai ah a pakmum khawnvak koihna apan a hongsuak khia hiang gukte dungzui in.
A pakmumte leh a hiangte a kibang ding ua: avek in dangkaeng tak a sekthoh ahi ding hi.
Huai ah khawnvak sagih na bawl dia; khawnvakte a diam ding ua, a pang a vakna a piak theihna ding un.
A taitehte leh a meivukuangte, dangkaeng tak ahi ding ua;
belsuan tengteng toh dangkaeng tak talent khat a bawl ding ahi.
Tang a k’on etsak lim dungzui a bawl ding in pilvang in, a chi hi.
Huailou in biakbuk puanmalngat hoih koptah puanzak sawm toh a dum leh a sandup leh a sanau na bawl dia; Siamtak a bawl cherubte toh na bawl ding ahi.
Puanzak khat saudan tong sawmnih leh giat ahi dia, puanzak khat zatdan tong li; puanzak chih in tehna khat a nei ding ahi.
Puanzak ngate a kithuap khawmchiat ding uh ahi. Puanzak nga dangte a kithuap khawmchiat ding uh ahi.
A kithuahna a a kipehna apan puanzak khat gei ah a dum in vang na bawl dia; huchibang zel in, puanzak dang mongchin mahmah ah, a nihna kithuahna ah na bawl ding ahi.
Puanzak khat ah vang sawmnga na bawl dia, a nihna kithuahna a om, puanzak mong ah vang sawmnga na bawl ding. Huchi a bangte a kimat chiat theihna ding un.
Dangkaeng in kilhna sawmnga na bawl dia, kilhnate’n puanzakte nihnih in a kilhkhawm ding; huchi in biakbuk khat ahi ding hi.
Biakbuk tungkhuhna ding in kel mul puanzakte na bawl dia; puanzak sawmlehkhat na bawl ding ahi.
Puanzak khat dunglam tong sawmthum ahi dia, puanzak khat vailam tong li; puanzak sawmlehkhat tehna khat ahivek ding hi.
Puanzak ngate amau mah in na thuapkhawm dia, puanzak gukte amau mah in, biakbuk mai ah puanzak gukna na khep ding ahi.
A thuahna a puanzak pawnung penpen mong ah vang sawmnga na bawl dia, a nihna thuahna puanzak mong ah vang sawmnga na bawl ding ahi.
Dal in kilhna sawmnga na bawl dia, kilhnate vang ah na guang dia, puanin khat a hih theihna ding in, na thuapkhawm ding ahi.
Puanin puanzak val omlai tum khatpen biakbuk phaitam a khai ding ahi.
Puanin puanzakte dunglam a omlaite, a pang khatlam ah tong khat, a khuhna ding in hiai lam pang leh huailam pang a biakbuk pangte a khai ding ahi.
Puanin khuhna ding belampa vun sansaksa leh a tungsawn khuhna ding in ngalvang vunte na bawl ding ahi.
Biakbuk ading in singgi singpek tunna dingtang in na bawl ding ahi.
Singpek khat dunglam tong sawm ahi dia, singpek khat vailam tong khat leh a kim ahi ding hi.
Singpek khat ah a tunna ding nih a om dia, kimuamtuah ding in lem in. Huchibang in biakbuk singpek tengteng ading in na bawl ding ahi.
Biakbuk ading in singpek na bawl dia, simlam pang ah pek sawmnih ahi ding.

Singpek sawmnih nuai ah dangka in kingakna khuakkuak sawmli na bawl ding. A kimuamtuah nihte ading in singpek khat nuai ah kingakna khuakkuak nih, a kimuamna nihte ading in singpek dang khat nuai ah kingakna khuakkuak nih na bawl ding ahi.
Biakbuk pang nihna ading in mallam pang ah singpek sawmnih a om ding hi.
A dangka kingakna khuakkuak sawmlite singpek khat nuai ah kingakna khuakkuak nih, singpek dang khat nuai ah kingakna khuakkuak nih.
Biakbuk pang tumlam a te ding in singpek guk bawl in.
Pang nih ah biakbuk ningte ading in singpek nih na bawl ding ahi.
A nuailam ah a kithuapkhawm ding ua, sikkual khat ah a tunglam ah a kithuapkhawm ding uhi. Huchibang in amau tuak ading in ahi ding hi. Ning nihte ading in ahi ding uhi.
Singpek giat a om dia, a dangka kingakna khuakkuakte uhi, kingakna khuakkuak sawmlehgukte; kingakna khuakkuak nihte leh singpek dang khat nuai a kingakna khuakkuak nihte.
Singgi sing chiangtawn na bawl dia; biakbuk pang khat a singpekte ading in.
Biakbuk pang dang khat a singpekte ading in chiangtawn nga, biakbuk pang a singpekte, tumlam sik nihte ading in, chiangtawn nga.
Singpekte laitak a chiangtawn laita in mong khat apan mong khat tan a phak ding ahi.
Singpekte dangkaeng in na luan dia, chiangtawnte ading in dangkaeng sikkualte a munte ading in na bawl ding ahi.
Tang a k’on etsak dungzui in biakbuk na dinsak ding ahi.
Puanzak a dum, a sandup, a sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptah siamtak a hih na bawl dia, cherubte toh bawl ding ahi.
Dangkaeng a luan singgi sing khuam lite tung ah na zak ding a; a bannate dangkaeng ahi ding a, dangka kingakna khuakkuak lite tung ah.
Puanzak kilhnate nuai ah na khai dia, huchi a huai a theihpihna bawm n’on lak lut theihna ding in. Puanzak in nang ading in Mun Siangthou leh Mun Siangthou pen kikal a khen ding hi.
Mun siangthou pen ah theihpihna bawm tung ah chitna tutphah na koih ding.
Puanzak pawlam ah dohkan na tung ding a; simlam ah biakbuk sik ah dohkan ngai in khawnvak koihna na koih ding. Mallam sik ah dohkan na tung ding hi.
Puanin kongkhak ading in puankhai na bawl ding, puanmalngat hoih koptah, phim a khui, a dum, a sandup leh a sanau.
A khaina ding in singgi sing khuam nga na bawl dia, dangkaeng a luan, a bannate dangkaeng ahi ding uhi. Huaite ading in dal kingakna khuakkuak nga na sung ding ahi.
Singgi sing in maitam na bawl dia, tong nga a sau, tong nga a za; maitam detdou ahi ding. A sanlam tong thum ahi ding ahi.
A ning lite tung ah a kite na bawl dia; a kite a kibang ding ua; dal in na luan ding ahi.
A meivu dohna ding belte na bawl dia, a luahna suahdul, kuangdal, keupi leh a sikkhut leh a meibel dai. A belsuan tengteng dal a na bawl ding ahi.
Huai ading in dal in singkhul ding koihna len bang in na bawl dia; a tung a ning li ah dal sikkual li na bawl ding ahi.
A nuailam maitam huapna nuai ah na koih dia; huchi a maitam laizanga, lente a kikim theihna ding in.
Maitam ading in chiangte na bawldia, singgi sing chiangte dalin na luan ding ahi.
Chiangte sikkual sung a thunlut ding ahi a; chiangte maitam sik nihte tung ah a om ding hi, a puakna ding in.
Tang a k’on etsak bang in, singpekte ah a hawm na bawldia, huchibang in na bawl ding ahi.
Biakbuk huang na bawl ding ahi. Simlam pang ading in simlam manoh in puankhai, huang umna ding in puanmalngat hoih sik khat ading in tong za a sau a om ding ahi.
A khuam sawmnihte leh a kingakna khuakkuak sawmnihte dal ahi ding ua; khuamte khainate leh puanduangte dangka ahi ding uhi.
Huchi mah bang in mallam pang ah a saulam tong za a sau puankhai a om ding, dalkhuam sawmnihte leh a kingakna khuakkuak sawmnihte dangka chi khuam, a khaina leh puanduangte ahi ding hi.
Tumlam pang a huang vailam ading in puankhai tong sawmnga a om ding. A khuamte uh sawm leh a kingakna khuakkuak sawm ahi ding.
Suahlam a suahlam pang a huangsung umna vailam tong sawmnga ahi ding.
Kongpi sik khatlam a puankhaite tong sawmlehnga ahi dia; a khuamte thum, a kingakna khuakkuak thum ahi ding.
Langkhat lampang ah puankhai tong sawmlehngate a om dia; a khuamte thum leh a kingakna khuakkuak thum ahi ding.
Huangsung kongpi ading in puankhai tong sawmnih a om dia, a dum, a sandup, a sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptah, phim a khui ahi dia, a khuam uh li ahi dia, a kingakna khuakkuak li ahi ding hi.
Huangsung kimvel a khuam tengteng dangka puanduang a gak ahi dia, a bannate dangka ahi dia, a kingakna khuakkuak dal ahi ding hi.
Huangsung dunglam tong za khat ahi dia, a vailam tong sawmnga koipeuh ah, a sanlam tong nga puanmalngat hoih koptah a bawl, a kingakna khuakkuak dal ahi ding.
Biakbuk a vanzat tengteng, a nasepna chiteng, a kilhbelhna sikzumte leh huangsung a kilhbelhna sikzum tengteng dal ahi ding ahi.
Israel suante meivak ding in olive thautak a bawl hontawi ding in thu na pe ding, khawnvak kuangsak gige ding in.
Puanzak, theihpihna ma a om, pawlam a kikhawmte biakbuk ah, Aron leh a tapate’n
Israel suante lak apan na unaupa Aron leh a tapate siampu hi a ka na a sep theihna ding un la in. Aron leh a tapate: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar na la ding ahi.
A thupina ding leh a kilawmna ding in na unaupa Aron ading in puan siangthou bawl in.
Pilna kha a ka dimsak khutsiam tengteng kiang ah thu gen in, amau Aron puan, amah hihsiangna ding a bawltheihna ding un. Huchi a aman siampu nasepna mun a ka na a septheihna ding in.

A puanbawl ding uh hiaite ahi: Awmtuam, siampupuan, puanaktual, puanakzem, lukhu leh kawnggak. Na unaupa Aron ading leh tapate ading in puan siangthou a bawl ding uh ahi, huchi a aman siampu nasepna mun a ka na sep a theihna ding in.
Amau dangkaeng, a dum, a sandup, a sanau leh puanmalngat hoih a la ding ua;
Dangkaeng, a dum, a sandup, a sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptah in hoihtak a bawl in, siampupuan a bawl ding uhi.
A liang nihte gei nihte a kimat ding ua; a kimatkhawm ding uhi.
Siampu puanakzem gakna, puanduang kawnggak dangkaeng khau toh khau dum, khau sandup leh khau sanau siamtak a gat puanmalngat in a bawl ding uh ahi.
Onik suang nih na la dia, huaite tung ah Israel suante min na gelh ding ahi.
Suang khat tung ah a minte uh lak a guk, suang dang tung ah, a omlaite min guk dangte, a piandan bangzel un na gelh ding ahi.

Suainamna zungbuh khuakthoh a kigelh bang in, suang mantam khuak thoh a gelhsiamte gelh, huai suangmantam nihte ah Israel tapate min na gelh ding a, huai suang mantamte dangkaeng khuaksung ah na phum ding ahi.
Huai suang nihte Israel suante adia theihgigena suang ding in siampu puan liangzang ah na koih ding. Huchi in theihgigena ding in Aron in a liangzang nihte tung ah
Dangkaeng bulhna na bawl ding ahi.
A mongte a dangkaeng tak khainiang nihte; pakkhi bang in na bawl dia, a kibulhnate ah pakkhi bang khainiangte na khih ding ahi.
Vaihawmna omtuamna siamtakin na bawl dia; siampu puan bawl bang in na bawl ding, dangkaeng in, a dum in, a sandup in leh a sanau in leh puanmalngat hoih koptah in, na bawl ding ahi.
Khep nih in a kikhep dia, a khep a dung a vai kikim, khap khat a sau leh khap khat a za ahi ding ahi.
Huaite tung ah suangmantamte na bulh dia, suang vual li in. A vual khatna sardi suang, topaz suang leh karbankul suang ahi ding. Hiai a vualkhatna ahi ding hi.
A vual nihna emerald suang, sapphir suang, leh diamond suang ahi ding ahi.
A vual thumna liguri suang, agate suang leh amethis suang ahi ding.
A vual lina beril suang, onik suang leh jasper suang ahi ding hi. A bulhna ua dangkaeng bulh ding ahi.
Suangte Israel suante min toh a kithuah dia, a min uh dungzui in sawmlehnih, chiamtehna gelhte bang in. Michih a min toh nam sawmlehnihte dungzui in ahi ding uhi.
Awmtuam tung ah pakkhi bang a bawl a mongte ah dangkaeng siang khainiang na bawl ding.
Awmtuam tung ah dangkaeng sikkual nih na bawl dia, huai sikkual nihte awmtuam mong nihte tung ah na koih ding hi.
Awmtuam mongte tung a om sikkual nihte ah dangkaeng pakkhi bang nihte na koih ding ahi.
Pakkhi bang khainiang nihte mong nih dangte bulhna nihte ah na khih dia, a ma a siampupuan liangzangte ah na koih ding hi.
Dangkaeng in sikkual nih na bawl dia, huai gei a siampu puan mong nihte tung ah na koih ding, a sunglam a siampu puan gei a om pen ah.
Dangkaeng in sikkual dang nihte na bawl dia, siampupuan gei nihte nuailam a a tung ah na koih ding, a malam sang a a kikhepna zawntak ah, siampu puan konggak lamdang tung tak ah.
A sikkual in awmtuam siampu puan sikkual ah puanduang dum toh na hen dia, huchi a siampupuan kawnggak lamdang tung a a om theihna ding in leh siampu puan apan awmtuam a kiphellouhna ding in.
Aron in,
Vaihawmna awmtuam ah Urim leh Thummim na koih ding.
Siampu puan puanaktual a dum in na bawl ding ahi.
A khung ah a awng a om dia; a laitak a, a awng kimvel ah gat thoh khihna a om dia, siklen puanak ban neilou hileh kilawm ahi ding, a kek louhna ding in.
A gei tung nuai ah, a dum in, a sandup in, leh a sanau in na bawl dia, a gei kimvel in. Dangkaeng dakte a kimvel in a kikal zel uah na bawl ding ahi.
Dangkaeng dak leh theibuhfai puanaktual gei tung ah a kivel in a om ding ahi.
Aron in na a sep chiang in huai a silh ding hi. Huchi in
Dangkaeng tak in kuang na bawl dia, a tung ah na gelh ding, suai namna zungbuh bang a khuak in, SIANTHOUNA
Huai laigelhna sikpek siampu dialkhip a, a mailam ah khau dum in na khihbelh ding ahi.
Huai Aron taltang ah a om dia, aman Israelte thillat siangthou toh kisai a, Israel suante khelhna a paw ding ahi. Huai Aron taltang ah a om gige dia, thillat siangthoute Toupa mai ah san ahi ding hi.
Puanmalngat hoih puanak na gan dia, puanmalngat in lukhu na bawl dia, a gat thoh in kawnggak na bawl ding hi.
Aron tapate ading in puanakte na bawl dia, kawnggakte na bawlsak ding. A thupina ding leh a kilawmna ding in lukhute amau ading in na bawl ding ahi.
Huaite na unaupa Aron tung ah leh a kiang a a tapate tung ah na koih dia; amau thau na nilh dia, na septuam dia, na siansak ding ahi, siampu nasepna mun a ka na a sep theihna ding un.
A vuaktanna uh khuh ding in puan pheituam zumte na bawlsak dia; a tai apan a phei chiang a tun ding uh ahi.

Kihoupihna puanin a a lut chiang un hiam ahihkeileh Mun Siangthou a nasem dia dohkan kiang a, a hongpai chiang un, khelhna khatpeuh neih ziak a a sih louhna ding un huaite a sa tung uah a om gige ding ahi. Huchi in huai amah ading leh a nung a a suante ading in tangtawn a thuseh ahi ding hi.
Huan, siampu a pang a, ka na sem ding a na siansakna dia hiai ahi a tung ua na hih ding, bawngtal nou khat leh belampa nih gensiatbei na la ding ahi.
Huaiban ah tanghou silngou sohlouh, tanghou beu silngou sohlouh thau a zut leh tanghou pek silngou sohlouh thau a zut, huitbuh tangbuang in na bawl ding ahi.
Huaite lawh sung ah na koih dia, bawngtal leh belampa nihte toh, lawh in n’on tawi ding hi.
Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah Aron leh a tapate n’on pi dia, tui in amau na sil ding ahi.
Huaikhit in siampu puansilhte na la dia, puanaktung leh siampu puanaktual leh siampupuan leh awmtuam Aron na silh sak dia, siamtak a kigan puanduang kawnggak in amah na gak ding ahi.
A lu tung ah lukhu na koih dia, lukhu tung ah lallukhu siangthou na koih ding ahi.
Thau nilh chi na la dia, a lu tung ah na buak dia amah na nuh ding ahi.
A tapate n’on pi dia puanaktungte na silhsak ding ahi.
Kawnggak in amau na gak dia, Aron leh a tapate, lukhu bem na khu sak ding hi. Omden ding thuseh ading in siampu nasep amau a ahi ding. Hichibang in Aron leh a tapate na hihsiangthou ding ahi.
Kihoupihna puanin ma ah bawngtal na kaisak dia; Aron leh a tapate’n bawngtal lu tung ah a khutte uh a nga ding uhi.
Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak kiang ah,
Bawngtal sisan na la dia, na khutzung in maitam kite na nuh dia, sisan tengteng maitam bul sik ah na sungkhe ding ahi.
A sunglam tuam a thau tengteng na la dia, a sin tung a a lam om leh, a kaileng nihte, leh a tung ua a thau maitam tung ah na hal ding hi.
Bawngtal sa leh, a vun leh a ek, giahphual pawlam ah mei in na hal ding hi. Hiai khelhna thillat ahi.
Belampa khat na la dia, belampa lu tung ah Aron leh a tapate’n a khut uh a nga ding uhi.
Belampa na that dia, a sisan na la dia, maitam kimvel in na theh ding hi.
Belampa na semnen dia, a sunglam na sawp dia, a khete leh a sate leh a lu na koihkhawm ding hi.
Belampa avek in maitam tung ah na haltum ding ahi. Hiai
Belampa dang na la dia; belampa lu tung ah Aron leh a tapate’n a khut uh a koih ding uhi.

Belampa na gou dia, Aron bil taklam dawn leh a tapate bil taklam dawn ah leh a khut taklam khutpi uah, a khe taklam khepi uah, a sisan na la dia, na nuh ding a, maitam kimvel ah huai sisan na theh ding ahi.

Maitam tung a om sisan na la ding a, nuhtheih thau toh, Aron tung ah leh a puan tung ah leh a tapate tung ah leh a kiang a a tapate puan tung ah na theh ding. Huchi in amah leh a puante leh tapate leh a tapate puante hihsiangthou ahi ding hi.
Huai Belampa thaute, a mei thau, asung thau, a sin leh a kailing nihte leh a thaute, a taklam phei toh na la ding ahi. Hiai bel siangthou a sehtuamna belampa a hih ziak ahi.
mai a lawhbeu a om silngou sohlouh tanghou kikoihte lak a tanghou beu khat, sathau a kikang tanghou pei khat leh tanghou kan pek khat na la dia,
Aron khut leh a tapate khut ah na koih dia; huaite
Amau khut apan huaite na sang dia, haltum thillat ding in maitam tung ah na hal ding ahi,
Aron hih siangthouna belampa awm na la dia,
Huai siangthou a sehtuamna belampa apan veithillat a veisa a awm leh vei thillat a veisa a phei, Aron tan leh a tapate tante na hihsiangthou ding hi.
Hiai Israel suante apan a Aron leh a tapate tan ngeina ahi gige ding ahi. Huai bel Israel suante’n a lemna thillatte ua pan
Aron puansilh siangthoute amah nung in a tapate a ahi ding uhi; Amaute a hih siangthou ding leh sehkip ding in.
Amah mun a siampu honghi a tapa in Mun Siangthou a nasem dia Kihoupihna puanin sung a a lut chiang in, ni sagih sung huai puansilhte a silh ding ahi.
Kihih siangthouna belampa na la dia, Mun Siangthou ah a sa na tuihuan ding ahi.
Aron leh a tapate’n belampa sa leh lohsung a om Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak kiang ah tanghou a ne ding uhi.
Amau sehkipna ding leh hih siangthouna dia a khelhna thoihna thilte a nekding uh ahi. Thilzek leh siangthou a hih ziak in midang kuamah in a nek louh ding uh ahi.
Kihihsiangthouna sa hiam tanghou hiam a zingsang tan a om leh mei in na hal ding ahi. A sianthou ziak in na ne ding ahi kei hi.
Huchibang a thu k’on piak bangbang in Aron kiang ah leh a tapate kiang ah na hihdia, ni sagih sung amau na hihsiangthou ding ahi.
Lemna thillat ding in niteng in bawngtal khat khelhna thillat ding in na lan ding ahi. Hiai adia lemna na bawlzoh chiang in, maitam na hihsiang dia, thau na nilh dia, na siangthousak ding ahi.
Ni sagih sung maitam ading in lemna na bawl dia; na hihsiangthou dia; maitam siangthou pen ahi ding. Huai maitam khoih peuhmah a sianthou ngeingei ding ahi.
Niteng a maitam tung ah kum khat a upa belamnou nih na lat gige ding ahi.
Belamnou khat zingsang in na lan dia; belamnou khat dang nitaklam in na lan ding ahi.
Belamnou khat na lat chiang in tangbuang seh sawm suah, seh khat, a thau toh hin khat a seh lina toh dawn thillat ding in uain hin khat a seh lina na lan ding ahi.
Belamnou khat dang pen nitaklam in na lan dia, tangbuang thillat dungzui in, leh dawn thillat dungzui in gimlim ding in, na hihdia,
Na khang na khang un hiai
Huai ah Israel suante ka kituahpih dia, ka thupina in biakbuk a hih siangthou ding hi.
Kihoupihna puanin leh maitam ka hihsiangthou dia; siampu a pang a kei adia nasem ding in Aron leh a tapate leng ka hihsiangthou tuaktuak ding hi.
Huchi in Israel suante lak ah ka teng dia, a Pathian uh ka hi ding.
a Pathian uh, a lak ua ka ten theihna dia amaute Aigupta gam apan pikhepa ka hi, chih a thei ding uhi.
Gimlim halna ding maitam na bawl ding ahi. Singgi sing in na bawl ding ahi.
A saulam tong khat ahi dia; a zatlam tong khat mah. A saulam leh a zatlam a kikim dia, a sanlam tong nih ahi ding ahi. A kite leng a kibang in sa khat ahi ding uhi.
Dangkaeng tak in naluan dia; a tung, a sikte leh a kite ah a kimvel in dangkaeng in a geivel na bawlding hi.
Dangkaeng sikkual nih a pang nih ading na bawl dia, maitam pang nihte ah na bulh dia, a zawnna zawlte khumna ding ahi ding uhi.
Singgi sing in a zawnna ding chiangte na bawl dia, dangkaeng in huaite na luan ding ahi.
K’on kituahpihna ding mun, theihsakna tung a om chitna tutphah ma, theihpihna bawm kiang a om puanzak ma ah na koih ding ahi.
Zingsang teng in huai tung ah Aron in gimlim a haldia; khawnvakte a det chiang in, a tung ah gimlim a hal ding ahi.
Nitaklam a Aron in khawnvakte a det chiang in, a tung ah gimlim a hal ding. Na khang na khang un
Huai ah theihlouh gimlim hiam haltum thillat hiam, tangbuang thillat hiam, na lan ding uh ahi kei. Huailou in huai ah dawn thillat leng na sung ding uh ahi kei hi.
Kum khat in khatvei Aron in khelhna thillat sisan a kite ah a tat dia, lemna a bawl ding ahi. Na khang na khang un kum khat in khatvei a tung ah lemna a bawl ding ahi. Hiai
Huaikhit in
A zah uh theihna dia kisimpina na bawl chiang in, pasal chih in a kha tatna sum
Simtel a om michih in tatna sum a piak ding ahi. Mun siangthou sum sekel kimkhat ahi ding ahi. Sekel khat gerah sawmnih a gik ahi.
Simtel a omte lak a paisuak peuhmah kum sawmnih a upa leh a tunglam in
Na kha ua ding a lemna bawlna dia,
Hiai bang in Israel suante lemna sum na la dia, Kihoupihna puanin a nasepna ding in na sep ding ahi. Na kha uh tatna ding a,
Kisilna ding in tuikuang dal in na bawl dia, a tunna khete leng dal in na bawl ding ahi. Kihoupihna puanin leh maitam kikal ah na koih dia, huai ah tui na koih ding ahi.
Aron leh a tapate’n a khutte uh leh a khete uh tui in a sil ding uh ahi.
Kihoupihna puanin sung a, a lut ding chiang uhiam, nasem dia

Huai bang a, a sih louhna ding ua a khutte uh leh a khete uh a sil ding uh ahi. Hiai tangtawn in amau ading in thuseh ahi dia; a khang a khang un amah ading leh a suante ading nangawn in ahi ding ahi, a chi hi.
Gimlim leng kilak inla, murra tui sekel za nga leh singguithak gimlim huaizah kimkhat, sekel za nih leh sawmnga sialluang khum sekel za nih leh sawmnga,
Singguithak sekel za nga, Mun Siangthou sekel dungzui in, olive thau hin khat.
Nuhtheih siangthou in thau na bawl dia, nuhtheih damdawi misiamna bang a gawm; nilhtheih thau siangthou ahi ding.
Huai in Kihoupihna puanin na nuh ding, theihpihna bawm toh,
A dohkan leh a belsuan tengteng leh khawnvak koihna leh a belsuan chiteng leh gimlim maitam toh.
Haltum thillat maitam leh a belsuan tengteng leh, tuikuang leh a khe.
Huaite na hihsiangthou dia; a siangthou pen hi ding in. Bang peuh huaite khoih a sianthou ngeingei ding uh ahi.
Aron leh a tapate thau na nilh dia, amau na siangsak ding, siampu nasepna mun a kei adia na a septheihna ding un.
Israel suante kiang ah thu na gen dia, na khang na khang un kei ading in hiai thaunilh siangthou ahi ding hi.
Mihing sa tung ah na buak ding uh ahi kei. A kihel khawm bang in a kibatpih dang himhim leng na bawl ding uh ahi kei. Hiai nilh siangthou ahi a, nou ading in a siangthou ding ahi.
Hiai bangbang a hel a, a kibatpih sathau bawl hiam, siampu hilou midang tung a zang hiam kuapeuh a mite lak apan ka satkhe ding, a chi, chi in.
Huai ban ah
Hiaite apan gimnamtui na bawl ding ahi. Gimnamtui bawlsiamte hel bang na hel ding ahi. Chisoh, a siang leh a zek a siangthou ahi ding hi.
Khenkhat na gawi zan mahmah dia, Kihoupihna puanin sung a theihpihna ma ah na koih dia, huai ah k’on kimuhpih ding hi. Hiai nang ading in siangthou pen ahi ding hi.
Na bawl ding gimnamtui toh kisai in, a helkhawm dan a a batpih nou aituam ding in na kibawl ding a hi kei. Nou ading in
A gimnamtui napdia a batpih bawl peuhmah a mite apan ka satkhe ding, a chi hi.
Huan
En in, Judah nam a Hur tapa, Uri tapa Bezaleel a min in ka samta hi.
Pathian Kha leh pilna leh theihsiamna leh theihna leh khutsiamna lam chiteng in amah ka dimsakta hi.
Aman khutsiamna in thil lim leh mel nei in a gel dia, dangkaeng leh dangka leh dal in thil a bawl ding hi.
Huai ban ah suangmantamte a at dia, singte lim leh mel nei in khutsiamtakin a bawl ding hi.
A seppih ding in Dan nam a mi Ahisamak tapa, Aholiab a kiang ah ka peta hi. Khutsiamna nei tengteng leng pilna lungtang ka peta a, amau nang k’on thupiak bang in thil tengteng a bawl ding uhi.
Kihoupihna puanin, theihpihna bawm, huai tung a om chitna tutphah leh puanin vanzat tengteng;
Dohkan leh a vante leh khawnvak koihna a van tengteng toh, gimlim maitam;
Haltum thillat maitam, a van tengteng toh, tuikuang leh a khe;
nasepna puante leh, siampu Aron puan siangthoute leh, a tapate puansilhte, siampu nasepna mun a nasem ding in;
Huan nilhtheih thau leh Mun Siangthou ading gimlim a bawl ding ua, nang k’on thupiak tengteng bang in a hih ding uhi, a chi hi.
Israel suante kiang ah thu gen in. “Chihtaktak a ka Sabbath na tan ngeingei ding uh ahi. Na khang ua kei leh nou kal a chiamtehna a hih ziak in. Nou honhih siangthou,
Huaiziak in Sabbath na tang ding ua; nou adia siangthou a hih ziak in. Kuapeuh hiai hihbuah sihsak ngeingei ding ahi. Kuapeuh hiai ni a nasem, a mite lak apan satkhiak ding ahi.
Ni guk sung nna septheih ahi dia; himahleh a ni sagihna Sabbath khawlni
Huaiziak in Israel suante’n Sabbath ni a tang ding ua, thukhun tawntung hi ding in, a khang a khangun Sabbath a tang ding uhi.
Hiai tangtawn in kei leh Israel suante kikal a chiamtehna ahi. Ni guk a
Sinai tangtung a Pathian in Mosi houpih a, thu a genkhit in theihsakna pek nih, suang pekte, Pathian khutzung a gelh, Mosi a pia hi.

Tang apan Mosi a hong paisuk pahlouh mite’n a theih un, mite Aron kiang ah a hong kikhawm ua, a kiang ah, “Kisa in, ka ma ua pai ding, pathiante hon bawlsak in. Hiai Mosi, Aigupta gam apan hon pikhepa lah, bang chita ahia, ka thei ngalkei ua,” a chi uhi.
Aron in a kiang uah, “Na zite uh bil a om, natapate uh bil a om, na tanute uh bil a om, dangkaeng bilbahte tolkhia unla, ka kiang ah hontawi un,” a chi hi.
Mi tengteng in a bil ua dangkaeng bilbahte a tolkhia ua, Aron kiang ah a hontawi uhi.

Aman a khut ua pan huaite a la a, sunthoh bawngnou lim a bawl a, huai bang in dangkaeng bawngnou lim in asung hi. Huaikhit in amau, “Israel aw, Aigupta gam apan nang hon pikhia na pathian hiai ahi,” a kichi uhi.
Aron in huai a muhtak in, a ma uah maitam a bawl a, Aron in thuphuan a nei a, Zingchiang
A zing in beltak in a thou ua, haltum thillat a lan ua, lemna thillat a tawi uhi. Mite ne ding leh dawn ding in a tu ua, noptal ding in ading uhi.

Amau ka lampi hilh apan a pialpah man hial uhi. Bawngnou lim sun a kibawl ua, huai a bia ua, a mai ah thillatte a lan ua, ‘Israel aw, hiai na pathian, Aigupta gam apan hon pikhetu ahi,’ a chi uhi,” a chi hi.
Mosi kiang ah, “Hiai mite ka muta a, ngai in, mi genhakte ahi uhi.
Huaiziak in tuin a tung uah ka thangpaihna a kuangzak a, amaute ka kattum theihna ding in hon khahzan in. Huchi in nam thupi in k’on bawl ding” a chi hi.
Mosi in

Bangding in ahia Aiguptate’n thu gen a, ‘Hihse dia amau pikhia eive, tangte a amau that ding leh, lei tengteng apan amaute kangtum ding in?’ Na thangpaihna thupi lakik inla, na mite tung a hiai thil hoihlou na ngaihtuah kikhelsak in.

A kiang ua, ‘Van a aksite bang in na suante ka pungsak dia, na suante kiang a thu ka gensa, hiai gam tengteng ka honpe ding, huchi in tangtawn in na luah ding uh,’ chi a, nangmah ngei a na kichiamna, na sikhate, Abraham, Isak leh Jakob theigige in” a chi hi.
Huchi in a mite tung a thil hoihlou hihdia a ngaihtuah
Mosi a kihei a, tang apan a paisukta. A khut ah theihpihna suangpek nihte a om hi. Suang pekte a lang nihtuak a gelh ahi a, khatlam leh lang khatlam a gelh ahi uhi.
Suangpekte Pathian thilhih ahi a, a gelhte leng Pathian gelh ahi, suangpekte tung a gelhte.
Joshua in mite kikou husa a zak in Mosi kiang ah, “Giahphual ah kidouna husa a om” a chi hi.
Aman,
“Tungnun kituh a kikoute aw ahi kei a,
nuaisiah a om ziak a kapte aw leng ahi kei.
Lasate husa ahizaw ka zak,” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, giahphual kiang a hong tuntakin, bawngnou leh lam a muta hi. Huchi in Mosi hehna a sou a, a khut apan suangpekte a pai a, tangnuai ah a keksakta hi.
A bawngnou bawl uh a la a, mei ah a khul a, a gawinen a, tui tung ah a theh a, Israel suante a dawnsak hi.
Mosi in Aron kiang ah, “Hiai mite’n bang ahia na kiang a a hih uh, a tung ua hichitel a khelhna thupi na tunsak?” a chi hi.
Aron in, “Ka toupa mite na thei hi, thilsia a zon dan uh na hehna kuang kei hen.
Ka ma ua pai ding, pathiante hon bawlsak in. Hiai Mosi Aigupta gam apan hon pikhetoupa lah, bang suakta ahia ka thei ngalkei ua, ka kiang a a chih ziak un;
Ken a kiang uah, Dangkaeng nei peuh in, hon tolkhia un, ka chi hi. Huchi in amau kei a honpia ua; ken mei sung ah ka khia a, hiai bawngnou lim a hong pawtkhia” a chi hi.
Aron in a utut ua om dia mite a taizak uh phal in, melmate ma ah zahlak in a omsak, chih Mosi in a mu hi.
Giahphual kongpi ah Mosi ading a, “
Aman a kiang uah, “Israel
Levi tate’n Mosi thu dungzui in a hihta ua; huchi in huai ni’n mite lak ah mi sang thum a si uhi.
Mosi in, “Michih in a tapa, michih in a unaupa douta na hih man un, a hon vualzawl theihna ding in tuni in
A zing in hichi ahi a, Mosi in mite kiang ah, “Khelhna thupi in na khialta uhi. Tuin
Mosi
Ahi a lah, tuin, a khelhna uh ngaidam in-; Na ngaihdam kei ding leh, na gelhsa na laibu apan kei hon thaimang in, ka hon ngen” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in tuin kuan inla, na kiang a ka genna mun ah mite pi in. Ngai in, na ma ah ka Angel a pai ding. Akoi abang hileh gawt dia ka veh ni’n a khelhna uh ziak in amau ka gawt ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Aron in a bawl bawngnou mai a thil a lat ziak in
Huaikhit in,
Na ma ah ka Angel ka sawl dia; huchi in Kanante, Amorte, Hitte, Perizte, Hivte leh Jebuste ka hawlkhe ding.
Bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luang gam ah hohtou un. Mi genhakte na hih ziak un, kei na lak ua hohtou lou ding ka hi. Huchilou in zaw lampi ah k’on kangtum kha ding” a chi hi.
Mite’n hiai thu hoihlou a zak un, a lungkham uhi. Huchi in mi kuamah kizepna a kizem a omkei uhi.

lah Mosi kiang ah, “Israel suante kiang ah, Mi genhakte na hi uhi. Mitphiat kallou a na lak ua hongtou a, hong kangtum thei ka hi. Huaiziak in na tung ua bang hih ding ka hia, chih ka theihna ding in na kizepnate uh suah un” chi’n, a na genkhinta hi.
Huchi in Israel suante’n Horeb tang ah a kizepnate uh a suahkhe vek uhi.
Mosi in puanin a sut a, giahphual pawlam, giahphual apan gamlapi ah a kai a, Kihoupihna puanin, a chi hi. Hichi ahi a, michih
Hichi ahi a, puanin lam a Mosi a paikhiak teng in, mite avek un ading ua, michih a puanin kongkhak bul ah ading ua; puanin a a lut mateng Mosi a enzui uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Mosi puanina a lut leh, meipi khuam a hong kuma, puanin kongkhak bul ah ading a,
Mi tengteng in puanin kongkhak bul ading, meipi khuam a mu uhi. Mi tengteng ading ua a bia uhi, michih in a puanin kongkhak chiat ah.
Mi’n a lawm a houpih bang in,
Mosi in

huaiziak in tuin, ka hon ngen ahi. Na mitmuh a hehpihna ka muh leh, nang k’on theihna ding leh na mitmuh a hehpihna ka muh theihna ding in, tuin na lampi hon ensak in. Hiai nam na mite ahi, chih ngaihtuah in” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka ompihna nang toh a ton dia, khawlna k’on pe ding” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Na ompihna kei toh a tonkei ding leh, hiai apan hon pitou ken.

N’on tonpih kei leh, bangchi’n na mite leh ken na mitmuh in deihsakna ka mu uh chih kithei ding ahia? Leitung pumpi a teng mi tengteng apan kei leh na mite a tuam ka hi uh, chih bang in a kichiansak dia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka hon ngen hi, na thupina hon ensak in” a chi hi.
Aman, “Na ma ah ka hoihna tengteng ka paisak dia, na ma ah
Himahleh ka mai na mu theikei ding. Mi, kei honmu, hing kuamah a omlouh ziak in.
, ‘En in, hiai ah ka kiang ah mun khat a om a; suangpi tung ah a na ding in.
Huchi in hichi ahi ding, Ka thupina in honkhen sung in suangpi heng ah k’on koih dia, ka honkhen sung in ka khut in ka honkhuh ding hi.
Huaikhit chiang in ka khut ka lakhe dia, huchi in ka nunglam na mu dia; himahleh ka mai bel a kimu kei ding’ ” a chi hi.
Huan,
Zingsang in mansa in om inla, zingsang in Sinai tang ah hongtou inla, tangvum ah ka kiang ah hong kihil in.
Na kiang a kuamah a hong touhlouh ding uh ahi. Tang kimvel a leng kuamah himhim muh a, a omlouh ding uh ahi. Tang mazawn lam a bawnghon leh belamhon leng a gamtat louh ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in suangpek nih a bawl a, a masapen bang in. Zingkhang in Mosi a thou a,
Huchi in a ma ah
hehpihthei leh itthei,
dohthei leh,
hoihna leh thutak hau.
Sangte adia chitna nei, gitlouhna,
tatlekna leh khelhna ngaidam,
mawhna bangchi mah a siang saklou ding,
pate gitlouhna tate tung leh a tusuante tung ah,
a khang thumna leh a khang lina tan a thuk”
chi in a phuang khia hi.
Kintak in Mosi leisi in a kunsuk a, a beta hi.
Aman, “Tu a na mitmuh a hehpihna ka muh leh,

Aman: Ngai in, nou toh thukhun ka bawl hi. Lei tengteng a hih a om ngeilou, koi nam a leng hih a om ngeilou, thillamdangte na mi tengteng ma ah ka hih ding hi. A lak ua na tenna mi tengteng in Toupa’n nou adia thil lauhuai ka hih dingte a mu ding uhi.
Nang tuni a k’on thupiak zui in. Ngai in na ma uah Amorte leh Kanante leh Hitte leh Perizte leh Hivte leh Jebuste ka hawlkhe ding hi.
Na paina gam a tengte toh thukhun na bawlkha ding uhi, kiveng un. Huchilou in zaw na lak ua thang ahi ding uhi.
A maitamte uh hihsia un, a milimte uh hih gawpsak un, a Aserah songte uh na phuksak ding uh ahi.
Pathian dang na be ding uh a hi kei:
Huai gam a tengmite toh kikal ah thukhun na bawlkha ding uhi. A pathiante uh kiang ah kithoihna a lat chiang in khattei in a honchial dia, a kithoihnasa na nekha ding uhi.
Na tapate ading in a tanute uh na pisak khading ua, a tanute uh a pathiante uh kiang a a kizuak chiang un, na tapate uh leng amaute hih bang a, a milim pathiante uh be ding in a khempuk kha ding uhi.
Sunthoh pathiante na kibawl ding uh ahi kei hi.

Tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina na nei gige ding uh ahi. Thu k’on piaktak bang in, Abib kha in, ni sagih sung tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uhi. Abib kha a Aigupta apan a na hong paikhiak ziak un.
Sul hong tamasa tengteng, na ganhon lak ua piang masapen teng, bawngtal hi in belam hileh, a pa peuhpeuh kei a ahi.

Himahleh sabiltung nou masapen belamnou in na tan ding uh ahi. Na tat kei uleh, a ngawng na hektan ding uh ahi. Na tapate tengteng lak a piang masapen na tan ding ahi. Ka ma ah kuamah khutvuak in a hong kilang ding uh ahi kei.
Ni guk sung nna nasem ding ahi. Himahleh a ni sagih ni’n na khawl ding ahi. Haichi pawi hun leh pawltak hun in na khawl ding ahi.
Nipi kalte a Ankuangluina, huitbuh pawltak gahmasa Ankuangluina, kumtawp a koihkhawmna ankuangluinate na tan ding ahi.
Kum khat in thumvei pasal tengteng
Na mai ua namte ka delhkhe dia, na gamgi uh ka keklian ding. Kum khat a thumvei
Ka mai a kithoihna thillat; sisan silngou toh na lan ding uh ahi kei. Paikan Ankuanglui kithoihna leng a zingchiang tan in nutsiat in a om ding ahi kei.
Na gam a gah masapente a masapen
kiang ah ni sawmli leh zan sawmli a om a; an a nekei a, tui leng a dawnkei hi. Suangpek tung ah thukhun thute, huai Thupiak Sawmte a gelh hi.
Sinai tang a kipan a khut a theihpihna suangpek nihte tawia, tang apan Mosi a hong paisuk lai in, amah a houpih sung in a maitang a tang, chih Mosi in a theikei hi.
Aron leh Israel suan tengteng in Mosi a muhtak un, ngai in, a maitang a tang a; amah naih a hongpai a lauta uhi.
Himahleh Mosi in amau a sam a; Aron leh mipi kikhawmte heutu tengteng a kiang ah a hong kiknawn ua; Mosi in amau a houpih hi.
Huai nung in Israel suan tengteng a hongpai nai ua; Sinai tang a a kiang a
Mosi in amau a houpih khitin, a maitang khuhna in a khuh hi.
Himahleh
Israel suante’n Mosi maitang a mu ua, Mosi maivun a tang hi. Mosi in Toupa houpih dia a lut nawn matan in a maitang a khuh zel hi.
Huan, Mosi in Israel suan tengteng a khawmkhawm a, a kiang uah: Hiaite na hih ding ua
Ni guk sung in nna sepzoh ahi dia, himahleh a ni sagih ni nou adia siangthou ahi ding hi.
Sabbath ni’n na omna peuh uah mei na chih ding uh ahi kei, a chi hi.
Israel suan kikhawmkhawm tengteng kiang ah Mosi in thu a gen a:
ading in na lak uah thilpiakte lakhawm un. Lungtang a utna nei kuapeuh in Toupa ading in thilpiakte: dangkaeng, dangka leh dal;
khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau, puanmalngat hoih, kel mul;
belampa mul diahsan, ngalvang vun, singgi sing;
khawnvak ading thau, thaunilh ding in gimlim; hal namtui ding;
Onik suangte, siampu puanak leh awmtuam a siat ding suangmantamte hon tawikhawm uhen.
Na lak ua khutsiam tengteng na hongpai ding ua,
Biakbuk, a puanin, a khuhna, a sikkawi, a singpekte, a sik tawnte, a khuamte leh a kingakna khuak kuakte;
a bawm leh a chiangte, chitna tutphah leh a khuhna puanzak;
Dohkan leh a chiangte, a tuium-belsuan leh tanghou koihna;
khawnvak ading in khawnvak koihna leng, a vante, a khawnvakte, a vakna thau;
gimlim maitam leh a chiangte, nilhtheih thau, gimlim leh biakbuk lutna kongkhak a dia puankhai.
Haltum thillatna maitam, a dal vutluah, a chiangte leh a tuium-belsuan tengteng, tuikuang leh a khe;
a huangsung puankhaite, a khuamte, a kingakna khuak kuakte, huangsung kongkhak a dia puankhai;
Biakbuk kilhna zumte, huangsung kilhna zumte leh a khaute;
nasepna puante, Mun Siangthou a nasepna dia siampu Aron puan siangthoute, a tapate puante bawl uhen, a chi hi.
Huchi in Israel suan kikhawmteng Mosi omna apan a paita uhi.
Michih a lungtang tohthoh a om peuhmah leh michih utna nei peuhmahte a hongpai ua, Kihoupihna puanin lamna ding leh asung a nasepna ding leh puansilh siangthoute bawlna ding
Lungtang a utna nei pasalte leh numeite a hongpai ua, dangkaeng a kibawl thil tuamtuam: bilbah, nakbah, zungbuh, awhthoh leh butthoh kizepnate, a hontawi ua, Toupa mai ah a lan uhi.
Khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau, puanmalngat hoih, kel mul, belampa vun, ngalvang vun neite’n huaite a hontawi uhi.
Thilpiak dia dangka leh dal neite’n
Numei khutsiam tengteng khut in khau a khek ua, a kheksa uh a hontawi ua, khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau leh puanmalngat hoih a hontawi uhi.
Lungtang tohthoh numei tengteng in kelmul a khek uhi.
Vaihawm mite’n onik suangte, suangte, siampu puan leh, awmtuam a siat dingte a hontawi uhi;
gimnamtui halding singgah namtui leh detding meivak leh nilh ding sathau a zat ding leh gimnamtui a hel ding sathau a hontawi uhi.
Mosi tawn a thu a piak a, van bawl ding a chih tengteng bawlna ding in Israel suante, numei leh pasal te’n amau utthu in thilpiakte
Mosi in Israel suante kiang ah: En un,
Pathian Kha leh theihsiamna leh theihna leh khutsiamna chi teng in amah a luahdim sak hi.
Huai bel khutsiam tak a bawl dingte gelsiamna, dangkaeng leh dangka leh dal thilbawlsiamna ahi a, bulh ding suangmantamte atsiamna, singlam siamna ahi.
bulh ding suangmantamte atsiamna, singlam siamna leh khutsiam thilbawl chi teng a siamna ahi.
Hiai ban ah amah leh Dan nam a Ahisamak tapa Aholiab leng midangte sinsak siamna a pia hi.
Amau teng khuakthoh a thilbawl siamna chikim leh khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau, puanmalngat hoih gat zep siamna, gat siamna, ze tuamtuam gelh siamna nei ding in pilna a pia hi.
Hiai bang in Bezaleel, Aholiab leh Mun Siangthou vanzatte bawl ding dan thei ding a Toupa’n pilna leh theihsiamna a piak khutsiamte’n
Huaikhit in Mosi in Bezaleel, Aholiab leh michih khutsiamna nei, a lungtang ua
Amaute’n Mun Siangthou bawlna dia Israel suante’n a hontawi uh thilpiak tengteng Mosi apan a lata uhi. Huchi in zingsang teng in utthu a piak thillatte a kiang ah a hontawi uhi.
Mun siangthou a nna tengteng sem, khutsiam teng a nasep chiat apan a hongpai ua,
Mosi kiang ah, “

Mosi in thu a pia a, giahphual teng ah a tangkoupih ua, pasal hileh numei hileh Mun Siangthou bawlna dia thilpiak kuamah in penawn kei un, a chi hi. Huchi in, thilpiak hontawi nawnlou dia kham in a omta uhi.
Mun siangthou bawlna a nna tengteng sepna ding in a van neihsa uh kiching in, a tam lawta hi.
Nasemte lak a khutsiamte’n biakbuk khuhna ding siamtak a khui cherubte lim tuanna puanzak sawm, khau dum, khau sandup leh khau sanau khuk in a bawl uhi.
Puanzak khat dunglam tong sawmnih leh giat ahi a; a vailam tong li; puanzak tengteng letdan a kikim chiat hi.
Puanzak ngate kithuah in a khep uhi. Puanzak dang ngate leng a khep uhi.
A kithuahna mong khepna apan puanzak khat gei ah khau dum in bilte a bawl ua, huchi mah in a nihna khepna ah, puanzak dang gei chin ah bilte a bawl uhi.
Puanzak khat ah a bil sawmnga a bawl ua, a nihna kikhepna a puanzak gei ah a bil sawmnga a bawl uhi. A bilte kizawn geihgeih in a om uhi.
Dangkaeng in kilhna sawmnga a bawl ua, kilhnate in puanzakte a gawm khawm hi. Huchi in biakbuk khat a hong hita hi.
Puanin biakbuk tung ading in kelmul in puanzak a bawl ua; sawmlehkhat a bawl uhi.
Puanzak khat dunglam tong sawmthum ahi a, puanzak khat vailam tong li ahi. Puanzak sawmlehkhatte a lehlam a kibang vek hi.
Puanzak ngate amau in a kikhep tuam a, puanzak gukte amau in a kikhep tuam hi.
A kikhepna a puanzak mong chin ah a bil sawmnga a bawl ua, puanzak a nihna thuahna pen mong ah a bil sawmnga a bawl uhi
Khat a hih theihna dia puanin kaihkhawmna ding in dal in kilhna sawmnga a bawl uhi.
Puanin khuhna ding in belampa vun diahsan in a bawl ua, huai tung ah ngalvang vun in khuhna a bawl uhi.
Singgi sing in biakbuk singpek ding a bawl ua, a tunthoh in.
Singpek saulam tong sawm ahi a, singpek zatlam tong khat leh a kim ahi.
Singpek khat in atgek nih a nei a, a kigamlat dan uh kikim in huchibang in biakbuk singpek tengteng ading in a bawl uhi.
Biakbuk ading in singpek a bawl ua, simlam sang ah simlam pang ading in singpek sawmnih a bawl uhi.

Singpek sawmnih nuai ah dangkaeng in kingakna khuakkuak sawmli a bawl ua; a atgek nihte ading in singpek khat dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih, a atgek nih ading in singpek dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih a bawl uhi.
Biakbuk pang khatlam ading in, a mallam ning a om ading in singpek sawmnih a bawl uhi.
A Dangkaeng kingakna khuakkuak sawmlite toh; singpek khat dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih, singpek dang khat ah kingakna khuakkuak nih a bawl uhi.
Tumlam biakbuk pang a te ading in singpek nih a bawl uhi.
A pang nihte ah biakbuk ningte ading in singpek nih a bawl uhi.
A nuai ah a kithuah ua, a tung ah, sikkual khat ah a kikaikhawm ua; huchibang in a ning tuak ah a hih tuaktuak uhi.
Singpek giat a om a; a kingakna khuakkuak uh dangka a bawl kingakna khuakkuak sawmlehguk ahi ua, singpek chih dang ah kingakna khuakkuak nih a bawl uhi.
Singgi sing chiangtawn a bawl ua, biakbuk pang khat a singpekte ading in nga a bawl uhi.
Biakbuk pang dang a singpekte ading in chiangtawn nga a bawl ua, tumlam pang a biakbuk singpekte ading in chiangtawn nga a bawl uhi.
Chiangtawn laita pen singpekte khat apan a dang kap paisuak in a bawl uhi.
Singpekte dangkaeng in a luan ua, a dangkaeng sikkualte uh chiangtawn omna ding in a bawl ua, chiangtawnte dangkaeng in a luan uhi.
Khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau leh puanmalngat koptah hoih in puankhai a bawl ua; khutsiamtakin cherubte a bawl uhi.
Singgi sing in khuam li a bawl ua; dangkaeng in a luan ua, a bannate dangkaeng a bawl ahi. Huaite ading in dangka in kingakna khuakkuak li asung uhi.
Biakbuk kongkhak a ding in khau dum in, khau sandup in, khau sanau in leh puanmalngat hoih koptah, phim a khui in puankhai a bawl uhi.
A khuam ngate a banna utoh; a zingte uleh a puanduangte dangkaeng in a luan ua: himahleh a kingakna khuakkuak ngate dal ahi.
Huan, Bazaleel in singgi sing in bawm a bawl a, tong nih leh a kim a dunglam ahi a, tong khat leh a kim a vailam ahi, tong khat leh a kim a san lam ahi.
Dangkaeng tak in a sunglam leh a pawlam a luan a, dangkaeng lallukhu a kimvel in a bawl hi.
Dangkaeng sikkual li asung a, a ning lite a bulh ding in. A pang khat a sikkual nih, a pang khatlam ah sikkual nih.
Singgi sing in chiang a bawl a, dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Chiangte bawm pang a sikkual sung ah, bawm puakna ding in a thun lut hi.
Dangkaeng tak in chitna tutphah a bawl a; tong nih leh a kim a dunglam ahi a, tong khat leh a kim a vailam ahi.
Dangkaeng sekkhiat in chitna tutphah mong nihte tuak ah cherubte a bawl hi.
Hiai lampang mong ah Cherub khat, huai lampang mong ah Cherub dang khat, chitna tutphah apan a mong langnihte ah cherubte a bawl hi.
Cherubte’n tunglam ah a kha uh a zak ua, chitna tutphah tunglam ah, a mai uh kingattuah in, a kha un a khuh ua; chitna tutphah lam ah cherubte mai a om hi.
Singgi sing in dohkan a bawl a; tong nih a dunglam ahi a, tong khat a vailam, tong khat leh a kim a sanlam ahi.
Dangkaeng tak in a luana, a kimvel in dangkaeng lallukhu a bawl hi.
Huailou in huai ah a kimvel in khutpek chia in a gei a bawl a; a kimvel in a gei ding in dangkaeng lallukhu a bawl hi.
Dangkaeng sikkual li asung a, a khe lite a om a ning lite tung ah sikkualte a bulh hi.
A geichin ah, dohkan puakna ding chiangte ading in mun, sikkualte a om uhi.
Singgi sing in chiangte a bawl a, dohkan puakna ding in, dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Dohkan tung a om tuium-belsuan a bawl a, a kuangte leh a sikkeute leh a noubemte leh a khuhna ding singte, dangkaeng tak in a bawl hi.
Khawnvak koihna dangkaeng tak in a bawl a; sekthoh in khawnvak koihna a bawl hi: a kungpi, a hiang, a noubemte leh a mumte leh a pakte kibang chiat uhi.
A pangte apan hiang guk a kakhia a; khawnvak koihna hiang thum a pang khat apan, a pang dang apan khawnvak koihna hiang thum.
Noubem thum makha gah bang a bawl hiang khat ah, a mum leh a pak; noubem thum makha gah bang a bawl hiang dang ah, a mum leh a pak, huchibang in hiang guk teng ah khawnvak koihna apan in.
Khawnvak koihna makha gah bang a bawl noubem li a om a; a mumte leh a pakte.
A kibang in hiang nihte dang ah mum khat, a kibang in hiang nihte dang ah mum khat, a kibang in hiang nihte dang ah mum khat, hiang gukte bangzel in a kakhia uhi.
A mumte uh leh a hiangte uh kibang ahi ua: avek un dangkaeng tak sekthoh ahi.
Khawnvak sagihte, meihalnate leh meivukuangte dangkaengtakin a bawl hi.
Dangkaeng tak talent khat in tuium-belsuan teng a bawl hi.
Gimlim maitam singgi sing in a bawl a; a dunglam tong khat ahi, a vailam tong khat; kiptak a bawl ahi a; a sanlam tong nih ahi. A kibang vek uhi.
Dangkaeng tak in a luan a, a tung leh a kimvel in a pangte, a kite. Huailou leng a kimvel in dangkaeng lallukhu a bawl hi.
A lallukhu nuai ah dangkaeng in sikkual nih a bawl a, a ning nihte kiang ah, a sik nihte tung ah, a puakna ding chiangte omna ding in. Gimnamtui leh Thau Nuh ding Bawlna
Singgi sing in chiangte a bawl a, dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Nilh theih thau siangthou, gimlim namtui siangthou, damdawimi hih bang in, a bawl hi.
Singgi sing in haltum thillat maitam a bawl a; a dung tong nga ahi a, a vai tong nga ahi a, a sanlam tong thum ahi. Kiptak a bawl ahi.
A ning lite ah a ki a bawl a; a kite a kibang vek ua; dal in a luan hi.
A tuium-belsuan tengteng, maitam, belte, vutluahte, salu kuangte, sa thuknate leh meibel tengteng dal in a bawl hi.
A laizangtak nuai ah a mong dang ah dal hakvang maitam ading in a bawl hi.
Chiangte omna ding in, dal hakvang mong lite ading in sikkual li asung hi.
Singgi sing chiang a bawl a, dal in a luan hi.
A puakna ding in, maitam pang a sikkualte sung ah chiangte a thun a; maitam singpek in asung a hawmsak hi.
Dal in tuikuang leh a khe a bawl a, numei kikhawm, Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak a kikhawmte limlangte a bawl hi.
Huangsung a bawl a; simlam pang simlam ah huangsung puankhai, puanmalngat hoih koptah, tong za khat a om hi.
A khuamte sawmnih ahi ua, a dal kingakna khuakkuakte sawmnih; khuam bannate leh a dangka puanduangte uhi.
A mallam pang ading in puankhaite tong za khat ahi ua, a khuamte uh sawmnih leh, a dal kingakna khuakkuakte sawmnih; a khuamte a bannate leh dangka gaknate.
A tumlam pang ading in tong sawmnga a sau puankhaite a om ua, a khuamte sawm leh a kingakna khuakkuak sawm; a khuamte a bannate leh a dangka gaknate uhi.
A suahlam pang suahlam ading in tong sawmnga.
Kongpi sik khat a puankhaite tong sawmlehnga ahi ua; a khuamte thum, a kingakna khuakkuakte thum mah.
Hiai lam sang leh huai lam sang a, huangsung kongpi sik khatlam pang ading in puankhai tong sawmlehnga ahi ua; a khuamte thum, a kingakna khuakkuakte thum mah ahi.
Huangsung a kimvel a puankhai tengteng puanmalngat koptah hoih ahi.
Khuam a kingakna khuakkuakte dal ahi ua; khuam a bannate leh a dangka gaknate dangka a zingte uh luanna; huangsung khuam tengteng dangka in a gaknate a kibawl hi.
Huangsung kongpi a puankhai phim a khui, khau dum, khau sandup, a sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptah ahi. A dunglam tong sawmnih ahi a, a pek sanlam tong nga ahi, huangsung puankhaite toh a kituak hi.
A khuamte li ahi a, a kingakna khuakkuakte li, dal a bawl. A bannate dangka a bawl, dangka a bawl a zingte leh a dung luante.
Biakbuk kilhnazum teng leh huangsung kimvel kilhna tengteng dal ahi uhi.
Hiai biakbuk vankim, sim a om bang in, theihpihna biakbuk a te ngei, Levite nasepna dia, Mosi thupiak bangzel a siampu Aron tapa, Ithamar khut a bawl ahi uhi.
Huchi in Bezaleel, Uri tapa, Hur tapa, Judah nam a mi in
Amah toh sem, gelh nasep siam, khau dum leh khau sandup leh khau sanau leh puanmalngat a zebawl siam, Holiab, Ahisamak tapa, Dan nam a mi ahi.
Dangkaeng tengteng Mun Siangthou a nasepna teng a sepna dia zat, thillat dangkaeng nangawn, talent sawmnih leh kua leh, sekel, Mun Siangthou a sekel dungzui in, za sagih leh sawmthum ahi.
Dangka, khawmpi a simte talent za khat leh sekel sang khat leh za sagih leh sawmguk ahi, Mun Siangthou a sekel dungzui in.

Mi chih ading in beka khat, huai bel, sekel kimkhat ahi, Mun Siangthou a sekel dungzui in, michih sim a omte ading in, kum sawmnih a upa leh a tung lam, pasal nuai guk leh sang thum leh za nga leh sawmnga.

Dangka talent za khat Mun Siangthou a kingakna khuakkuak ading in asung ua, puanzak a kingakna khuakkuakte toh; talent za khat adia kingakna khuakkuak za khat, kingakna khuakkuak khat adia talent khat zel.
Sekel sang khat za sagih leh sawmsagih leh nga in khuam a bannate a bawl a, a zingte luan in a kimatsak hi.
Thillat dal talent sawmsagih leh, sekel sang nih leh za li ahi.
Huaite in Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak kingakna khuakkuak a bawl a, dal maitam leh dal hakvang a bawl, maitam tuium-belsuan tengteng toh.
Huangsung kimvel a kingakna khuakkuak, huangsung kongpi kingakna khuakkuak, biakbuk kilhnazum tengteng leh, huangsung kimvel a kilhnazum tengteng a zou hi.
Khau dum leh khau sandup leh Khau sanau kigan in Mun Siangthou a nasepna ding siampu puante a bawl ua, Aron puansilh siangthoute a bawl uhi.
Khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptah dangkaeng in siampu puan a bawl uhi.
Dangkaeng khau leh khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau leh puanmalngat hoih a kigan in siampu puanakzem a bawl uhi.
A nunglam leh malam kaihkhawmna ding, a liangzang ah kaihna a bawl ua, a tunglam gei tuak a khihkhawm hi.
A tung a om, a siampu puanak siamnel tak a gat leng a kibang mah in a nasep dungzui in; dangkaeng, khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau leh puanmalngat hoih a
Onik suang a bawl ua, chiamtehna gelhna a gelh, dangkaeng bulhna a bulh in, Israel suante min bangzel in a bawl uhi.
Huaite siampu puanak liangzang ah a koih ua, Israel suante dia theihgigena suangte hi ding in:
Khutsiamtakin awmtuam a bawl a, siampu puanbawl bang in. Dangkaeng, khau dum leh khausan leh khau sandup leh, khau sanau leh puanmalngat hoih koptah in a bawl hi.
A dung a vai a kikim a; awmtuamna thuah nih in a bawl uhi. A saulam khap khat ahi a, a vailam khap khat, thuah nih ahi.
Huai ah suang vual li in a siat ua; a vual khatna sardi suang, topaz suang leh karbankul suang; hiai a vual khatna ahi.
A vual nihna, emerald suang, sapphir suang leh diamond ahi.
A vual thumna, liguri suang, agate suang leh amethis suang ahi.
A vual lina, beril suang, onik suang leh jasper suang ahi a; a phuhna uah dangkaeng bulhna a siatlut uhi.
Suangte Israel suante min bangzel leh a hihna zah uh bangzel in, sawmlehnih, chiamtehna gelhnate bang in, michih a min toh nam sawmlehnihte gelh ahi.
A mongte ah awmtuam tung ah khainiang, dangkaeng tak pakkhi a bawl uhi.
Huchi in dangkaeng bulhna nih a bawl ua, dangkaeng sikkual nih toh: awmtuamna mong nihte ah sikkual nihte a koih uhi.
Awmtuamna mongte a sikkual nihte sung ah dangkaeng khainiang nihte pak bang a bawl in a thun uhi.
Pak khainiang nihte mong nihte suangmantam bulhna nihte ah a koih ua, a ma ah siampu puan liangzang thuahna ah a koih uhi.
Dangkaeng in sikkual nih a bawl ua, awmtuamna mong nihte tung ah a koih ua, a gei ah, siampu puanak sunglam pang ah a om hi.
Dangkaeng sikkual nih dang a bawl ua, nuai lam ah siampu puanak mong nihte ah a koih uhi, a malam sang ah, a kikhepna zawntak ah, siampu puanak kawnggak kigatthoh tung ah a koih uhi.
Gakna khau dum in siampu puanak sikkualte in awmtuam a gakden ua, siampu puanak apan a awmtuam a kiphel theihlouhna ding in;
Siampu puanak puanaktual gat thoh, avek a dum a bawl hi.
Puanaktual laitak ah vanga om a, sikpuanak banbei vang bang in, a kek louhna ding a, a vang kimvel a kaihna khau a om hi.
Puanaktual mongte ah khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau leh puanmalngat hoih in theibuhfai gahte a bawl uhi.
Dangkaeng tak in dak a bawl ua, dakte puanaktual mong a theibuhfai gahte kikal ah, theibuhfai gahte kikal zel ah a khaisuak uhi.
Dak leh theibuhfai gahte nasepna ding a puanaktual mong kimvel ah
Aron leh a tate ading in puanmalngat puanak tung gat thoh a bawl uhi.
Puanmalngat hoih in lukhu leh puanmalngat hoih in lutuam leh puanmalngat hoih koptah in puan pheituam gek a bawl uhi.
Kawnggak puanmalngat hoih koptah, khau dum, khau sandup, khau sanau, khuithoh in a bawl ua:
Dangkaeng tak in lallukhu siangthou a bawl ua, a tung ah laigelh, chiamtehna gelhnate bang in, SIANGTHOUNA TOUPA A AHI chih a gelh uhi.
Huai ah khauhual dum a khih ua, lukhu tunglam gak toupek ding in;
Hichibang in khawmpite puanin biakbuk nasep tengteng zoh ahita hi.
Puanin leh puanbuk van tengteng, a kibatnate, a singpekte, a chiangte, a khuamte leh kingakna khuakkuakte Mosi kiang ah a hontawi uhi.
A khuhna belampa vun diahsan leh, a khuhna ngalvang vun leh, a khuhna puanzak;
Theihpihna bawm leh, a chiangte leh, chitna tutphah;
Dohkan leh, a tuium-belsuan tengteng leh Pathian Ompihna tanghou sawmlehnihte;
Khawnvak koihna, khawnvakte, leh a tuium-belsuan tengteng leh khawnvak adia sathau;
Dangkaeng maitam leh, nilhtheih sathau leh, gimlim leh, puanin kong ading a puankhai;
Dal maitam, a dal hakvang, a chiangte, leh a tuium-belsuan tengteng tuikuang leh a khe;
huangsung puankhaite, a khuamte leh, a kingakna khuakkuakte, leh huangsung kongpi puankhai, a khaute, a kilhnazumte, leh biakbuk nasepna tuium-belsuan tengteng, kihoupihna puanin ading:
Mun Siangthou a nasepna ding nasepna puan, hoihtak a bawlte, siampu Aron ading puan siangthoute leh, a tapate puante, siampu nasepna mun a nasepna ding,
Mosi thu a piak bang in, huchibang in Israel suante’n na tengteng a hih uhi.
Mosi in nasep tengteng a en a, ngai in
Huan,
Kha masa pen a ni masapen in Kihoupihna puanin biakbuk na ding sakta ding ahi.
Huai sung ah theihpihna bawm na koih dia, bawm puanzak in na khuh ding ahi.
Dohkan na la lut dia, a tung ah thil kizom a koih dingte kizom in na koih ding a; khawnvak koihna na lalut dia, a khawnvakte na det ding ahi.
Theihpihna bawm ma ah gimlim adia dangkaeng maitam na koih dia, kongkhak puankhai biakbuk ah na koih ding ahi.
Kihoupihna puanin biakbuk kongkhak ma ah haltum thillat maitam na koih ding ahi.
Kihoupihna puanin leh maitam kikal ah tuikuang na koih dia, huai ah tui na koih ding ahi.
A kimvel in huangsung na bawl dia, huangsung kongpi ah puankhai na khai dingtou ding ahi.
Thaunilh nala dia, biakbuk na nilh ding a; huai sung a omteng teng toh, na hihsiangthou dia, a tuium-belsuan tengteng a siangthou ding hi.
Haltum thillat maitam na nilh ding a; a tuium-belsuan tengteng toh, maitam na siangthousak ding. Huchi in maitam a siangthou penpen ding hi.
Tuikuang leh a khe na nilh dia, na siangsak ding ahi.
Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah Aron leh a tapate na honpi dia, tui in na sil ding ahi.
Puan siangthoute Aron na silhsak dia, na nilh dia, na siangthousak ding ahi; siampu nasepna mun a ka na a sep theihna ding in.
A tapate n’on tonpih dia, puanak tung na silhsak ding ahi.
A pa uh sathau na nilh bang in amau siampu nasepna mun a, ka na a sep theihna ding un thau na nilh ding ahi. A thaunilhna uh a khangkhang ua siampu hihna a hih taktak ding ziak in, a chi hi.
Hiai bang in Mosi in a hihta a;
Hichi ahi a, a kum nihna, a kha masa pen, a kha a ni masapen ni’n, biakbuk dinsak in a omta hi.
Mosi in biakbuk ading sakta a, a kingakna khuakkuakte a hen a, a singpekte a tung a, a chiangte a thunlut a, a khuamte a dingsak hi.
Biakbuk tung ah puanin a zalhta a; a tunglam ah puanin khuhna a koih a;
Theihpihna a la a bawm sung ah a koih a, chiangte bawm tung ah a koih a; bawm tung lam ah chitna tutphah a koih hi.
Bawm biakbuk sung ah a tawiluta, khuhna puanzak a zak a, theihpihna bawm a khuh hi.
Kihoupihna puanin sung ah dohkan a koih a, biakbuk pang mallam, puanzak pawlam ah.
ma ah dohkan tung ah tanghoute kizom in a koih a;
Kihoupihna puanin sung ah dohkan zawn ah, biakbuk sik simlam pang ah khawnvak koihna a koih hi.
Mosi thu a piak bang in
Huan puanzak ma ah kihoupihna puanin sung ah dangkaeng maitam a koih hi:
Huai tung ah namtui a hal a;
Biakbuk kongkhak ah puankhai a khai hi.
Kihoupihna puanin biakbuk kongkhak kiang ah
Kihoupihna puanin leh maitam kikal ah tuikuang a koih a, huai ah tui a koih a, kisawpna ding in.
Mosi leh Aron leh a tapate’n a khutte uh leh a khepekte uh huai ah a sil uhi.
Kihoupihna puanin sung ah a hoh ua, maitam kiang ah a hongpai nai ua
Biakbuk leh maitam kimvel in huangsung a bawl a, huangsung kongpi puankhaite a khaita hi. Huchi in Mosi in nasep a zouta hi.
Huaikhit in meipi in Kihoupihna puanin a tuam a,
Huchi in Kihoupihna puanin sung ah Mosi a lut theita kei, a tung a meipi a kai ziak in leh,
Biakbuk tung apan meipi laktouh a, a om chiang in, Israel suante a khualzinna uah malam ah a pai zel uhi.
Himahleh meipi lak touh a, a omlouh chiang in, a kilak touh louh ni’n a zinkei uhi.
A khualzin sung teng uh Israel inn kawte mitmuh in sun in
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Na lak ua kuapeuh in thillat
A thillat pen bawnghon lak a te haltum thillat ahihleh a pa, gensiatbei a lat ding ahi. Amah
Haltum thillat lu tung ah a khut a koih dia; huchi in amah ading in lemna bawlna dia pomsak ahi ding.
ma ah bawngpa a gou dia; Aron tapa, siampute’n a sisan a lan ding ua, Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul a maitam sisan in a theh ding uhi.
Haltum thillat vun a lip dia, a sem nen ding ahi.
Siampu Aron tapate’n maitam ah mei a koih ding ua, mei tung ah sing a chiangkhawm ding uhi.
Aron tapa siampute’n sabakte, a lute leh a thaute maitam a mei tung ah sing ah kilawm tak in a koih ding uhi.
A sungkuate leh a khete tui in a sil ding ua; siampu in
A thillat, haltum thillat ding a ganhon lak a te, belam hiam, kel hiam ahihleh a pa, gensiatbei a lan ding ahi.
Maitam sik, mallam pang ah
A sem ding a, a lu toh, a thau toh; siampu in maitam tung a meitung a sing tung ah a koihhoih ding hi.
A sungkuate leh a khete tui in a sil dia; a pum in siampu in a lan dia, maitam ah a hal ding hi.
Siampu in maitam ah a hontawi dia, a lu a hektan dia, maitam ah a hal ding. A sisan maitam pang ah a tak kangsak ding ahi.
A gongkholh a mul toh a pai dia, maitam kiang, suahlam pang a meivu koihna mun ah a pai ding hi.
A khate a bottol dia, a tak botzak lou in siampu in maitam a mei tung ah a hal ding; huai
Huan Kuapeuh in thillat, tangbuang thillat
Aron tapa siampute kiang ah a paipih dia; aman a pham khat in huai a tangbuang nel dimdem, a sathau toh, a begaw tengteng toh a lakhe ding a, siampu in maitam tung ah theihgigena,
Tangbuang thillat bangte Aron leh a tapate ading ahi ding. Huai
Tangbuang thillat, a kanna a kan thillat na lat leh, tangbuang nel dimdem, sathau a mek silngou sohlouh tanghou hiam, sathau a zut, silngou sohlouh tanghou pei hiam ahi ding ahi.
Na thillat, kuang a kan tangbuang thillat ahihleh, silngou sohlouh, sathau a mek, tangbuang nel dimdem ahi ding hi.
Na phelkhap ding a, sathau a na buah ding ahi. Huai tangbuang thillat ahi.
Na thillat kan bel a kan, tangbuang thillat ahihleh tangbuang nel dim dem leh sathau a bawl ahi ding hi.
Hiai thil a bawl tangbuang thillat
siampu in tangbuang thillat apan theihgigena pen a lakhe dia, maitam ah a hal ding. Hiai
Tangbuang thillat lat bangte Aron leh a tapate a tuam ding ahi dia; hiai
Tangbuang thillat himhim,
Gah masapen thillat bang in
Na tangbuang thillat ah na Pathian thukhun chi na maih ding ahi kei. Na thillat tengteng ah chi na lattel ding ahi.
Gah masapen tangbuang thillat
Sathau na buak dia, a tung ah begaw na koih ding ahi,
siampu in huai theihgigena, buh sukzan bangzah hiam toh begaw tengteng toh a hal ding ahi. Hiai
Huan a thillat, lemna thillat kithoihna a hih a, bawnghon lak a a lat leh,
A thillat lu tung ah a khut a koih dia, Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah a gou ding. Aron tapa siampute’n maitam a sisan in a kimvel in a theh ding uhi.
Lemna thillat kithoihna,
a kal nihte leh a tuam thau a phuk chin a om leh a sin tuam lam, a kalte toh kigawm in a suah ding ahi.
Aron tapate’n maitam ah mei a sing om tung a haltum thillat tung ah a hal ding uhi. Hiai
Lemna thillat kithoihna a
A thillat a, belamnou a lat leh
A thillat lu tung ah a khut a koih ding a, Kihoupihna puanin kongpi ah a gou ding. Aron tapate’n maitam a sisan in a kimvel in a theh ding uhi.
Lemna thillat kithoihnate,
a kal nihte leh a phuk chin a om, a tuam thau leh a sin tuam a lap, a kalte nangawn toh a suah ding ahi.
siampu in huai maitam ah a hal dia; hiai
A thillat kel ahihleh
A lu tung ah a khut a koih ding a, Kihoupihna puanin kong ah a gou ding. Aron tapate’n maitam a sisan in a kimvel in a theh ding uhi.
A thillat pen a lan dia,
a kal nihte leh a phuk chin a om, a tuam thau leh a sin tuam lam, a kalte toh nangawn in a suah ding ahi.
Hiai siampu in maitam ah a hal ding ahi. Gimlim dia mei a thillat nekding ansiah ahi a; a thau tengteng
Sathau hiam, sisan hiam na ne ding uh ahi kei, chih na suante uh ading in a banban in na tenna phot uah tangtawn a thuseh ahi ding, a chi hi.
Huan,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah:
Thaunilh siampu in thil a hihkhelh a mipite tung a mawhpaihna a tunsak leh a thilhih khelhsa thoihna ding in
Bawng pen Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah
Thaunilh siampu in bawng sisan bangzah hiam a la dia, Kihoupihna puanin ah a hontawi ding hi.
Siampu in sisan ah a khut a diah dia, a khenkhat
Siampu in
Khelh thoihna bawng thau tengteng, a sungkua thau leh a gilbom teng leng a lavek dia;
a kal nihte leh a phuk chin a om, a tuam thau leh a sin tuam a lam, a kal nihte nangawn toh a suah ding ahi.
Lemna thillat kithoihna bawngpa a kipan a lak bang in, siampu in haltum thillat maitam ah a hal ding ahi.
Bawng vunte, a sa tengtengte, a lu toh, a khete toh, a sungkuate, a ekte,
a bawng pumpi toh giahphual pawlam mun siang ah, vut paihna ah a paipih dia, sing tung ah a hal ding, vut paihna a hal ding ahi.
Israel mipi tengteng in a hihkhelh khak ua, mipi mitmuh a sel a hih a,
siamlouh a tan ua, a thil gilou hih uh theihkhiak ahihleh, mipi in khelhthoihna ding in bawngtuai a lan ding ua, Kihoupihna puanin kong ah a honkai ding uhi.
Mite upate’n
Thaunilh siampu in Kihoupihna puanin ah bawng sisan bangzah hiam a hontawi ding hi.
Siampu in huai sisan ah a khutzung a diah dia, puanzak bul ah
Sisan pen Kihoupihna puanin a
A thau tengteng a la vek dia, maitam ah a hal ding.
Huchibang in bawng pen a hih dia; khelh thoihna bawng a hih bang geih in hiai leng a hih ding ahi. Huchi in siampu in kilemna a bawl ding a, ngaihdam ahi ding uhi.
Huai Bawng giahphual pua ah a paipih dia, bawng masa a hal bang in a hal ding hi. Hiai mipi adia khelh thoihna ahi.
Vaihawmtu in thil a hihkhelh a,
a thil gilou hih a theih leh a thillat ding in kelpa gensiatbei a honkai ding ahi.
Kel lu tung ah a khut a koih dia,
Siampu in khelh thoihna sisan a khutzung in tamlou a la dia, haltum thillat maitam kite ah a tat dia, haltum thillat maitam bul ah a sisan a sungkhe ding hi.
A thau tengteng, lemna thillat kithoihna thau a hal bang in maitam ah a hal ding ahi. Huchi in a khelhna tungthu ah siampu in kilemna a bawlsak dia, ngaihdam ahi ding hi.
Vantang lak a mi, a kuamahmah in
a thil gilou hih a theih leh a thillat ding in kelnu gensiatbei, a thilhih khelhsa khelh thoihna ding in a honkai ding hi.
Khelh thoihna lu tung ah a khut a koih dia, haltum thillatna mun ah khelh thoihna a gou ding hi.
Siampu in a sisan, a khutzung in tamlou a la dia, haltum thillat maitam kite ah a tat dia, a sisan tengteng maitam bul ah a sungkhe ding hi.
A thau tengteng lemna thillat kithoihna thau a lak bang in a lavek ding hi. Siampu in
Khelh thoihna dia a thillat ding belamnou a hontawi leh, a nu, gensiatbei a hontawi ding ahi.
Khelh thoihna lu tung ah a khut a koih dia, haltum thillat a gohna uah khelhna thoihna ding in a gou ding hi.
Siampu in khelh thoihna sisan a khutzung in tamlou a la dia, haltum thillat maitam kite ah a tat dia, sisan tengteng maitam bul ah asung khe ding hi.
A thau tengteng, belamnou thau, lemna thillat kithoihna a lak bang in a lavek ding a, siampu in
Huan, kuapeuh a thilmuh hiam, a thilzak hiam adia theihpih a hih a, kichiamsakmi aw a zak a leng gen nuamlou a, thil a hihkhelh leh a thulimlouhna mawh a paw ding.
Kuapeuh in thil sianglou himhim, gamsa sianglou luang hiam, gan sianglou luang hiam, a vak thoh ganhing sianglou luang hiam theilou a, a khoihkhak leh, sianglou leh mawhtang ahi ding hi.
Mihing leng a sianlouhna bang peuh hi hen aw, a sianlouhna thei lou a, a khoih leh a theihkhiak hun in siamlouh a tang ding hi.
Kuapeuh in thil hoihlou hiam, thil hoih hiam hihdia, a kam a theilou a, a kichiam zialzial leh, akoi abang hitaleh, a kichiam zialzialna a theihkhiak hun in siamlouh a tang ding hi.
Hichi ahi ding a, hiai thilte khat a leng siamlouh a tan chiang in a khelhna a phuang ding ahi.
Khelh thoihna ding in belamhon lak ah a nu, belamnou hiam kel hiam, a thil hihkhelhsa man ding in
A neih in belamnou a chin zohkei leh
Siampu kiang ah a hontawi dia, aman khelh thoihna ding in a lan masa dia, phelkhap lou in a ngawng ah a lu a hektan ding hi.
Khelh thoihna sisan maitam pang ah tamlou a theh dia, a sisan omlai teng maitam bul ah a tak kangsak ding hi. Hiai khelh thoihna ahi.
A khatpen dan dungzui in haltum thillat ding in a lan dia; siampu in a thil hihkhelhsa tungthu ah lemna a bawlsak dia, ngaihdam ahi ding.

Himahleh vakhu nih hiam, vapal nou nih hiam a neih zohkei leh a khelhman thillat ding leh khelh thoihna ding in tangbuang nel dimdem, ephah mun sawm a khen, mun khat a hontawi ding hi. Sathau a buak ding ahi kei a, a tung ah begaw a koih ding ahi kei; khelh thoihna a hih ziak in.
Siampu kiang ah a hontawi dia, siampu in theihgigena ding in a pham khat a la dia, maitam tung ah
Huai thillaka a bangmah leng a hihkhelhsa tungtang thu ah siampu in kilemna a bawlsak dia, ngaihdam ahi ding. A omlai teng tangbuang thillat bangmah in siampu tantuam ahi ding, a chi hi.
Kuapeuh in thil a hihkhelh a,

Thil siangthou tung a a na hih diklouh khitsa pen adin dia, a mun nga a khen, mun khat a behlap dia, siampu a pe ding ahi. Huchi in siampu in tatlek thoihna belampa in kilemna a bawlsak dia, ngaihdam ahi ding.
Kuapeuh in thil a hihkhelh a, hihlouh dia
Belamhon lak a belampa gensiatbei, a man kilawm hun, tatlek thoihna ding in siampu kiang ah a honkai ding ahi. Siampu in theiloupi a hihkhelh khak tungthu ah kilemna a bawlsak dia, ngaihdam ahi ding.
Hiai tatlek thoihna ahi a;
Huan,
Kuapeuh in thil hihkhial in,
ahihkeileh, vanmangte mu in, khem in, zuau in kichiam leh, hiai thil tengteng a khatpeuh leng a hihkhelh leh,
Hichi ahi ding a, a khialngei a hih a, siamlouh a tan leh a van gukte, khem a a thillakte, a kiang a kepsak sumte, vanmang a topte,
zuau a kichiamna thil bangpeuh leng a ditnawn ding ahi. A kim sipsip in a dinnawn vek dia, a mun nga a khen, mun khat val in a behlap ding. Siamlouh a tanni in a neitu a pe ding ahi.
A tatlek thoihna, belamhon lak a, a man kilawm hun, belampa gensiatbei tatlek thoihna ding in
Siampu in
Aron leh a tapate kiang ah, hiai haltum thillat dan ding ahi. Haltum thillat pen maitam tung a, a halna ah zankhua in a zingchiang tan in a om dia; maitam a mei a kuang nilouh ding ahi.
Siampu in a puanmalngat puansilh a silh dia, a sa khuhna ding in a puanmalngat khekol a teng dia; maitam a haltum thillat kangvute a la dia, maitam pang ah a koih ding ahi.
A puansilh siangthou a suah dia, puansilh dang a silh dia, a vute giahphual pua munsiangthou ah a paipih ding ahi.
Maitam tung ah mei kuansak nilouh ahi dia, a mit ding ahi kei. Siampu in zingsang teng in sing a khul dia, haltum thillat a koih hoih dia, huai ah kilemna thillatte thau a hal ding ahi.
Maitam ah mei a kuang gige dia, a mit ding ahi kei hi.
Hiai tangbuang thillat dan ding ahi. Aron tapate’n maitam bul ah,
Aman a pham khat in tangbuang thillat tung a begaw tengteng a lakhe dia,
A lak bangte Aron leh a tapate’n a ne ding uhi. Huai Mun Siangthou ah silngou sohlouh in a ne ding ua; Kihoupihna puanin kongtual ah a ne ding uh ahi.
Silngou toh a kan ding uh ahi kei. Mei a ka thillat a tantuan ding ua ka piak ahi. Huai khelh thoihna leh tatlek thoihna bang a siangthou pen ahi.
Aron suan pasal tengteng in a nekding uh ahi. Hiai
Thaunilh a, a om ni ua, Aron leh a tapate’n
Sathau in kuangdai sung ah na kang dia, sathau a a kidiah suak khit chiang in na honla lut dia; na balnen dia, tangbuang thillat
A tapate lak a, a sik a pangmi, thaunilh siampu in a lan dia; tangtawn dan ding in
Siampu in tangbuang thillat a lat peuhmah haltum vek ding ahi a, nek hetlouh ding ahi, a chi hi.
Hiai khelh thoihna dan ding ahi. Haltum thillat goh zelna ah khelh thoihna leng
Khelh thoihna lantu siampu in a ne dia; Kihoupihna puanin kongtual ah, Mun Siangthou ah a ne ding ahi.
Kuapeuh huai sa khoih peuhmah a siangthou ding ahi. A sisan pen bang puan peuh a theh ahihleh, a banna peuhmah Mun Siangthou ah na sawp ding ahi.
A huanna leibel pen sukkhap ding ahi. Sumbel a huan ahihleh bel nawt siang a khuah siang ding ahi.
Pasal siampu tengteng in huai a ne ding uh ahi. Hiai thil siangthou pen ahi.
Khelh thoihna sisan, Mun Siangthou a kilemna bawlna dia Kihoupihna puanin a hong kitawi pen nekding ahi kei, mei a haltum ding ahi.
Huchi mah bang in hiai tatlek thoih dan ding ahi. Thil siangthou pen ahi.
Haltum thillat a gohzelna ua tatlek kithoihna leng goh ding ahi a; a sisan a maitam theh kimvel ding ahi.
A thau tengteng a lat ding ahi. A mei thautakte, a sungkua thaute,
a kal nihte leh a boh thau, a phuk kiang a thau leh a sin tuam lap, a kalte nangawn in a suahkhe ding ahi.
Siampu in
Pasal siampu tengteng in a ne ding ua; Mun Siangthou a nekding ahi. Hiai thil siangthou pen ahi.
Tatlek thoihna pen khelh thoihna mah bang ahi a, dan khat ahi. Kilepna bawltu siampu in huai a tang ding hi.
Siampu, kuapeuh haltum thillat latsaktu siampu ngei in haltum thillat dia a lat vun a pum tan ding ahi.
A kanna a kan tangbuang thillat peuhmah, sikbel a kan leh kuang a kan tengteng a lantu siampu a tuam ding ahi.
Tangbuang thillat tengteng sathau a mek leng, a gaw leng a dang mah bang in Aron tapa tengteng a kihawm dialdial ding uh ahi.
Hiai pen mi’n

Kipahthu genna dia a lat leh kipahthu genna kithoihna ding in sathau a zut, silngou sohlouh tanghou leh sathau a zut silngou sohlouh tanghou pa didekte leh sathau a mek tangbuang nel mahmah kidiah suak a lat tel ding ahi.
Kipahthu genna dia lemna thillat kithoihna ah tanghou silngou soh a lat tel ding ahi.
Huai a thillat teng a
Kipahthu genna dia a lemna thillat kithoihna sa pen thillat a lat ni mah a nekgaih ding ahi. A zingchiang tan a bangmah a sit ding ahi kei.
Himahleh a thillat kithoihna pen thuchiam hiam, amah ut thu a thillat hiam ahihleh kithoihna a lat ni mah a nekding ahi a; nekbang a zing chia nekding ahi.
Himahleh kithoihna sa, a ni thum ni tan a om lailai leh hal ding ahi.
A lemna thillat kithoihna sa ni thum ni tan a a nek uleh, pom sak ahi kei dia, a lantu leng a lan a sim ahi kei ding. Thil kihhuai ahi dia, kuapeuh a ne in a thulimlouhna mawh uh a paw ding hi.
Thil sianglou himhim toh kisukha sa nekding ahi kei, hal ding ahi. Sa siang peuhmah nekding ahi.
Himahleh lemna thillat kithoihna sa,
Kuapeuh in thil sianglou himhim, misianglou hiam, gan sianglou hiam, thil kihhuai sianglou himhim a khoih a, lemna thillat kithoihna sa,
Bawng hiam, belam hiam, kel hiam thau na ne ding uh ahi kei.
Amah sih a si thau leh sa balzan thau thil dang adia zat ding ahi. Na ne himhim ding uh ahi kei.
Kuapeuh,
Na tenna peuh uah sisan himhim, vasa hiam, gamsa hiam sisan hiam na ne ding uh ahi kei.
Kuapeuh hita leh, sisan ne himhim a chipihte lak apan satkhiat ding ahi, chi’n Israel suante houpih in, a chi hi.
kiang a lemna thillat kithoihna lan peuhmah in,
adia mei a thillat amah khut mahmah in a hontawi ding a; a thau leh a awm a honla ding ahi, a awm pen
Siampu in maitam ah a thau a hal dia, a awm bel Aron leh a tapate a tuam ding ahi.
A liang taklam pen kilemna thillat kithoihna apan vei thillat dia siampu na piak ding uh ahi.
Aron tapate lak a lemna thillat sisan leh thau lantu kuapeuh in a tantuan ding in a liang taklam a tang ding ahi.

A awm leh a liang a veilel pen uh Israel suante a lemna thillat kithoihna apan ka la tuam a, Israel suante tangtawn dan ding in siampu Aron leh a tapate ka pia ahi, chi’n Israel suante kiang ah gen in, a chi hi.
Hiai ahi, siampu nasem dia
Amau thau a nilh ni a Israel suante’n a piak ding ua
Hiai ahi haltum thillat, tangbuang thillat, khelh thoihna leh tatlek kithoihna dan.
Sinai gamdai a Israel suante’n thillat
Huan,
Aron a tapate toh pi inla, puansilhte, nilhchite sathau, khelh thoihna bawngpate, belampa nihte, tanghou silngou sohlouh bawm khat toh tawi inla,
Mi tengteng Kihoupihna puanin kongpi kim ah omkhawm sak in, a chi hi.
Mosi in
Mosi in omkhawmte kiang ah, Hiai ahi,
Mosi in Aron leh a tapate a honpi a, tui in amau a sil hi.
Puanak a silhsak a, kawnggakna in a gak a, puanaktual a silh sak a, siampu puanak in a tuam a, siampu puanak gakna siamtak a gat in a gak a, huai in a gakbelh hi.
Awmtuamna a thuah a, awmtuamna ah Urim leh Thummim a koih hi.
Dial a khimsak a, dial tung ah dangkaeng sikpek a bulh a, huai mailam ah Toupa’n Mosi a thupiak bang in siampu lukhu siangthou a kilhbelh hi.
Mosi in nilhchi sathau a la a, biakbuk leh asung a thil om tengteng a nilh a, a siangthousak chiat hi.
Huai mah in sagihvei maitam a theh a, maitam leh a tuium-belsuan tengteng, maiphiatna kuang leh a tunna siangthousak ding in a nilh hi.
Tua sathau Aron lu ah a buak a a siangthouna ding in a nilh hi.
Mosi in Aron tapate a honpi a, puanak sungsilh tualte a silhsak a, kawnggakna in a gak a,
Khelh thoihna bawngpa a honkai a, Aron leh a tapate’n khelh thoihna ding bawngpa lu tung ah a khut uh a koih uhi.
A gou a; Mosi in a sisan a la a, huai maitam adia kilemna bawlna ding in a khutzung in maitam ki ah a kimvel in a tat a, maitam a siang sak a, maitam bul ah sisan asung in a siangthousak hi.
A gilbom tengteng, a sin, a lap, a kal nihte leh a thau a la a, maitam tung ah Mosi in a hal hi.
Bawngpa pen a vun toh, a sa toh, a ek toh giahphual pua ah a hal hi,
Haltum thillat belampa pen a lan a, Aron leh a tapate’n belampa lu tung ah a khut uh a koih uhi.
A gou a, Mosi in maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh hi.
Belampa a sem a, a lu, a semnente leh a thau a hal hi.
A sungkua leh a khete a sil a; belampa pen maitam ah avek in a hal hi. Huai gimlim dia haltum thillat ahi a;
Belampa dang, hihtuamna belampa pen a hon lanawn a, Aron leh a tapate’n belampa lu tung ah a khut uh a koih uhi.
Mosi in a gou a, a sisan a la a, Aron bil taklam dawn, a khut taklam khutpi leh a khe taklam khepi a nuh hi.
Mosi in Aron tapate a pi a, a bil taklam dawn, a khut taklam khutpi, a khe taklam khepi a nuh a, maitam sisan in a kimvel in a theh hi.
A thaute, a mei thau, a gilbom tengteng a sin tuampen a lapte, a kal nih leh a thau leh a liang taklam a la hi:
ma a tanghou silngou sohlouh bawm apan tanghou silngou sohlouh khat leh sathau a mek tanghou pei khat leh tanghou peipa’n khat a la a, thau tung leh a liang taklam tung ah a koih hi.
Avek in Aron khutpek tung ah leh a tapate khutpek tung ah a koih a,
Mosi in a khut apan a la a, haltum thillat tung ah maitam ah a hal hi. Huai gimlim dia a hihtuamna ahi.
Mosi in a awm a la a,

Mosi in nilhchi sathau apan tamlou leh maitam a sisan tamlou a la a, huai in Aron leh a puansilhte a theh a; a tapate leh a tapate puansilhte leng a theh hi. Aron leh a puansilh a hih siangthou a, a tapate leh a tapate puansilhte leng a hih siangthou hi.
Mosi in Aron leh a tapate kiang ah, “Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah sa huan unla, Aron leh a tapate’n a nekding uh ahi, chi a thu ka piak bang in, huai ah hihtuamna bawm a tanghou toh ne uhen.
Sa leh tanghou nekbangte na hal ding uh ahi.
Na kihihtuamna ni uh a chin masiah Kihoupihna puanin kongpi pawtsan lou in ni sagih na om ding uh ahi. Ni sagih sung nou hon hihtuam ding ahi ngal a.
Tuni a a hihsa bang in, nou adia kilemna hon bawlsak ding in
Huaiziak in Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah ni sagih, sun leh zan in na om nilouh ding ua, na sihlouhna ding ua
Huchi in
Huan, hichi ahi a, a ni giat ni’n Mosi in Aron leh a tapate leh Israel upate a sam hi.
Aron kiang ah, “Khelh thoihna ding in bawngnoupa leh haltum thillat ding in belampa gensiatbei tuaktuak kai inla,
Israel suante kiang ah, ‘khelh thoihna ding in kelpa, haltum thillat ding in bawngnou leh belamnou kum khat a upa tuaktuak gensiatbei tuak
leh bawngpa leh belampa, sathau a mek tangbuang thillat toh
Mosi in thu a piak bang in Kihoupihna puanin kong ah a honkai ua; mi tengteng in a va naih ua,
Mosi in, “Hiai ahi na hih ding ua

Mosi in Aron kiang ah, “Maitam honnaih inla, na khelh thoihna leh na haltum thillat lan inla, nang ading leh mipite ading in kilemna bawl in. Mipite thillat pen lan inla, amau ading in kilemna bawl in,
Aron in maitam a vanaih a, amah a tuam khelh thoihna bawngnou a gou hi.
Aron tapate’n a kiang ah sisan a hontawi ua, huai sisan ah a khutzung a diah a, maitam kite ah a tat a, sisan pen maitam bul ah asung hi.
Himahleh, khelh thoihna thau, a kalte leh a sin tuampen lapte maitam tung ah a hal a,
A sa leh a vun giahphual pua ah a hal hi.
Haltum thillat pen a gou a; Aron tapate’n a sisan a pia ua, aman maitam kimvel in a theh hi.
Haltum thillat sabakte leh a lu a pia ua, aman maitam ah a na hal hi.
A sungkuate leh a khete a sil a, maitam ah haltum thillat tung ah a hal hi.
Mipite thillat pen a lan a, mipite khelh thoihna kel a kai a, a gou a, a ma amah bang in khelh thoihna ding in a lan hi.
Haltum thillat a lan a, a dan bang in a lan hi.
Tangbuang thillat a lan a, huai apan pham khat a la a, zingsang a haltum thillat chihlouh leng maitam ah a hallai hi.
Mipite a tuam dia lemna thillat kithoihna bawngpa leh belampa leng a gou a, Aron tapate’n a sisan a pia ua, maitam a kimvel in a theh hi.
Bawngpa thau leh belampa thau, a mei thau, a gilbomte, a kalte, a sin tuampen a lapte leng a pia uhi.
A thau pen a awmte tung ah a koih a, aman a thau pen maitam ah a hal hi.
A awm leh a liang taklam pen Aron in
Aron in mipi lam ah a ban a zak a, avek un vual a zawl hi. Khelh thoihna, haltum thillat leh lemna thillat a latzoh in a hong paisuk hi.
Mosi leh Aron Kihoupihna puanin ah a valut ua, a hong pawtkhe nawn ua, mipite a vualzawl uhi.
ma apan mei a hong pawtkhia a, haltum thillat leh thaute maitam ah a kangtumta hi. Mipi tengteng in huai a muh un a kikou zuazua ua, leisi in a khupboh uhi.
Huan, Aron tapa Nadab leh Abihute’n a meilakna uh a la tuak ua, huai ah mei am a koih ua, gimlim a buak ua,
ma apan mei a hong pawtkhia a, amau a kanglum a,
Mosi in Aron kiang ah, “Kei honnaih mite ah ka siangthou ding a, mipi tengteng ma ah thupisak in ka om ding, chi a
Mosi in Aron pangak Usiel tapa, Misael leh Elzaphan a sam a, a kiang uah, “Mun siangthou mai apan giahphual pawlam ah na unaute uh pawkhia un” a chi hi.
Amau a hong painai ua, a unaute uh a puanaktual un giahphual pawlam ah Mosi gen bang in a pawkhia uh.
Mosi in Aron kiang ah leh a tapa Eleazar leh Ithamar kiang ah, Na sam uh khah kei unla, na puante uh leng botkek sam kei un, huchilou in zaw na si kha ding ua; mi tengteng tung ah
Kihoupihna puanin kongpi apan na pawt ding uh ahi kei. Huchilou in zaw na si ding uh.

Nang hiam, na tapate hiam in leng, Kihoupihna puanin sung a na lut chiang un, zu leh dawn theih hat himhim dawn kei un, huchi lou in zaw na si ding uh. Hiai na suan zelte uh tan a tangtawn thuseh ding ahi.
Huai bel a siangthou leh siangthou lou, a siang leh sianglou na khentheihna ding uleh;
Mosi zang a a kiang ua a gen, thupiak tengteng Israel suante na sinsak theihna ding uh ahi, a chi hi.
Mosi in Aron kiang ah leh a tapa damlai Eleazar leh Ithamar kiang ah,
adia mei a thillat a nang a tuam leh na tapate a tuam a hih ziak in Mun Siangthou ah na ne ding uhi. Huchibang a thupiak a om ka hi.
