A awm vei leh a liang taklam vei pen mun siang ah na ne ding uh; nang leh na tapate leh na tanute toh. Israel suante lemna thillat kithoihna nang a tuam leh na tapate adia seh ahi ngal a.
A liang vei leh a awm vei pen
Mosi in khelh thoihna kel pen ngenteltak in a zong a, ngai dih, a na halkhin tham uh ahi a; huchi in, Aron tapa damlai, Eleazar leh Ithamar tung ah a hehta hi.
“Bangdia khelh thoihna Mun Siangthou a nelou na hi ua? Thil siangthou, mipite thulimlouhna paw dia
Ngai dih ua, a sisan pen Mun Siangthou ah laklut ahi kei a, thu k’on piak bang a Mun Siangthou a na nek ngeingei ding uh eive” a chi hi.
Aron in Mosi kiang ah, “Ngai dih, tuni in
Mosi in huai a zak in a lungkimta hi.
Huan,
Israel suante houpih unla, leitung a gamsa tengteng lak a na nekding uh gamsa hiaite ahi uh.
Gamsa khechin nih a ka paisuak, eknel hai peuhmah na nethei ding uh.
Himahleh eknel hai hiam, khechin nih a ka paisuak hiam lak ah hiaite zaw na ne ding uh ahi kei. Sangawngsau in eknel hai le leng, a chin a kat louh ziak in; nou ading in a sianglou ahi.
Zupi, eknel a hai na a, himahleh a chin a katlouh ziak in nou ading in a sianglou ahi.
Zusapi, eknel a hai na a, himahleh a chin a katlouh ziak in, nou ading in a sianglou ahi.
Vok, a chin a ka paisuak na a, himahleh eknel a hailouh ziak in; nou a di’n a sianglou ahi.
A sa uh na ne ding uh ahi kei, a luang uh leng na khoih ding uh ahi kei, nou ading in a sianglou ahi.
Tui sung a tengte lak ah hiaite na ne thei ding uh: Tuipite leh luite a om kha leh lip nei photphot na nethei ding uhi.
Tuisung a tengte leh tui a thilhing om tengteng lak ah tuipi a te, lui a te, kha leh lip neilou photphot nou ading in thil kihhuai ahi.
Nou ading in thil kihhuai ahi ding ua; a sa uh na ne ding uh ahi kei. A luangte uh thil kihhuai a na neih ding uh ahi.
Tui a kha leh lip neilou photphot zaw nou ading in thil kihhuai ahi.
Vasa lak ah hiaite thil kihhuai a na neih ding uh ahi a; nekding ahi kei. Thil kihhuai ahi uh: muvanlai, musane leh tuivapi.
Muvompi leh musi chi himhimte.
Va-ak leh a chi himhimte.
Simbu, vabak, tuipi vasate leh mu chi himhimte.
Simbutanglip, ngagal leh simbupi.
Tuivapi, vabukngak leh musanepi,
Intung va, dil vasa leh a chi himhim, huihtun leh bakte.
Kha nei khe li a pai chi peuhmah nou ading in thil kihhuai ahi.
Himahleh a leng thei ganhing neu pawl khat na nektheih ding uh a om. Huaite ahihleh leilak a tomthei kheguh tang neite ahi uhi.
Hiaite lak a na nek theih dingte uh, Khaupe chi himhim, kelkum, khuangbai ahihkeileh khaukhup.
Himahleh kha nei, khelinei dangte peuhmah nou ading in kihhuai ahivek uhi.
Hiaite ziak in sianglou na suakthei uhi. Kuapeuh hiai ganhing sianglou sisa toh kisukha peuhmah nitaklam tan in a sianglou ahi ding.
Kuapeuh huai luang lami peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding uh ahi, nitaklam tan in a sianglou ahi ding uh.
Gamsa chin ka paisuak lou, eknel leng hailou chi tengteng nou ading in a sianglou ahi ua; kuapeuh huaite khoih sianglou ahi ding.
Bokvak a pai tengteng lak a khebom a pai peuh mahte nou ading in a sianglou ahi a; a luang uh khoih peuhmah nitaklam tan in a sianglou ahi ding.
A luang lami peuhmah in a puante a sawp ding ahi, nitaklam tan in a sianglou ahi ding a; nou ading in a sianglou ahi.
Lei a vakthoh chi lak a nou adia sianglou hiaite ahi: Bui, chikpi, thankikpi leh a chi himhim.
Inhik, tangteuh, thankik, dokdawn leh zusa.
A vak thoh chi tengteng lak a nou adia sianglou hiaite ahi uh. Kuapeuh hiaite sisa a khoih uleh nitaklam tan in a sianglou ahi ding uhi.

A sih ua bang peuh a delhkhum uh, a sianglou ahi dia; vanzat photphot sing a bawl tuium-belsuan hiam, puan hiam, savun hiam, sai ip hiam leng tui a diah ding ahi a; nitaklam tan in a sianglou ahi ding. Huaikhit in a hong siang ding hi.
A kiakna peuh leibel chih na hihtam ding uh ahi, asung a om tengteng a sianglou ahi ding uh.
Huai bel a nekchi om tengteng leh huai a om tui a diahsa himhim sianglou ahi dia; dawn chi, dawntheih chi tengteng leng huai bel sung a om himhim sianglou ahi ding.

Thil bangpeuh a siluang a kahiang khatpeuh in a delhkhum phot sianglou ahi zel dia; tanghou kanna hiam, kan lumna bel hiam leng hihtap vek ding ahi, sianglou ahi khin a, nou ading in sianglou ahi ding.
Himahleh tuikhuk hiam, tuibem, tui tamtak omna sianglou chih a omkei a, himahleh a siluang in a sukkhak peuhmah a sianglou ahi ding.
Chin ding haichi himhim zaw siluang in banglai peuh in delhkhumta leh a sianglou kei hi.
Himahleh haichi, tui a diahsa siluang in koilai peuh a delh khak leh nou ading in sianglou ahi.
Gamsa na nektheih chi himhim u leng a sih leh a luang khoih mi peuhmah nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
A sa ne peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding uh ahi, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding. A luang lami in leng a puante a sawp ding ahi, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Ganhing leitung a bokvak chi tengteng thil kihhuai ahi ua, nekding ahi kei.
A kitholh chi leh khe li a pai chi hiam, khe tampi nei chi hiam, leitung a bokvak chi himhim na ne ding uh ahi kei, thil kihhuai ahi ngal ua.
A bokvak chi himhim in na kihihthanghuai ding uh ahi kei, hiaite in na kihihbuah ding uh ahi kei, huaite in sianglou in na kibawl ding uh ahi kei hi.
Kei
Na Pathian uh hi ding a Aigupta gam a kipan nou hon pikhia
Hiai pen gamsa leh vasate leh tui a teng chi thilhing chiteng leh lei a bokvak chitengte tungthu a dan ding ahi.
A siang leh sianglou khenna ding leh gamsa nektheih chi leh gamsa nek theihlouh chi khenna ding in, chi in, a chi hi.
Huan,
Israel suante kiang ah: Numei in nau a pai a, tapa a neih leh ni sagih sung sianglou ahi dia; numei dan ngeina hunlaia a sianlouh bang in sianglou ahi ding hi.
A ni giat ni’n a tapa zekmong vun a sum ding ahi.
Sisan ziak a kisiangsak in ni sawmthum leh thum a omlai ding ahi. A kisiansak ni a kim mateng thilsiang himhim a khoih ding ahi kei a; Mun Siangthou ah leng a lut ding ahi sam kei hi.
Nau numei a neih leh bel numei dan ngeina hunlaia a sianlouh bang in nipikal nih sung sianglou ahi dia, sisan ziak a kisiangsak in ni sawmguk leh guk a omlai ding ahi.

Tapa hiam, tanu hiam ziak a kisiansak ni a kimchiang in haltum thillat ding in belamnou kum khat a upa leh khelh thoihna ding in vapal nou hiam, vakhu hiam Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah siampu kiang ah a hontawi ding ahi:
Aman

A neih in belamnou a chin kei leh vakhu kopkhat hiam, vapal nou kopkhat hiam a tawi ding ahi: Khat haltum thillat ding in, a khat pen khelh thoihna ding in. Siampu in kilemna a bawlsak dia, huchi in a hong siangta ding, chi in gen in, a chi hi.
Huan
Mi vun a, a khem hiam, a bol hiam a, phak hileh kilawm a kimuh leh siampu Aron kiang ah hiam, a tapa siampute lak a kuapen hiam kiang a pi ding ahi.
Siampu in a vun a hi pen a na en dia, a hi omna a mul a kan a, a hi pen a vun sang a thuk zaw a a kimuh leh phak ahi a, siampu in amah a na en ding a, mi sianglou in a phuang ding ahi.
A vun a bolte a kan a, a vun sang a thukzaw a a kimuh kei leh, a mul a kan kei leh hi neimi pen siampu in ni sagih sung a khum tuam ding hi.
Siampu in ni sagih ni’n amah a endia; ngai dih, a hi pen a ngeingei a a muh a, a hi pen a vun a a zamzak kei leh siampu in ni sagih mah a khumtuam nawn ding hi.

Siampu in ni sagih ni’n a en nawn dia; ngai dih, hi pen a mial a, hi pen a vun a a zamzak kei leh siampu in a siang chih a phuang ding ahi. A khem lel ahi a, a puante a sawp dia, a hong siang ding hi.
Himahleh a siansakna dia siampu a kietsak nung a a khempen a vun a a zamzak mahmah leh siampu a kiensak nawn ding ahi:
Siampu in a en dia, ngai in, a khempen a vun a a zamzak leh siampu in sianglou chih a phuang dia, hiai phak ahi.
Mi’n phak hi a vom leh siampu kiang a pi ding ahi;
Siampu in a na en dia, ngai dih, a vun a a kang a omkhiak a, a mul a kansak a, a bawk dulh hethut leh,
A sa a phak kumlui om ahi a, siampu in a sianglou ahi chih a phuang dia, himahleh amah sianglou a hih ziak a khumtuam ding ahi kei hi.
A phakpen a vuna a zamzak mahmah a, a hi veimi vun, a lu apan a khe tan a siampu theihchiang phak in a bop leh, siampu’n a en ding hi.
Ngai dih, phak in a sa tengteng a bop suaksa ahihleh, hi veimi a siang chih a phuang dia, a kangkhinta a, a siangta hi.
Himahleh a sa a dulh hethut leh, a sianglou ahi dia,
Siampu in a sa dulh hethut a en dia, sianglou in a phuang ding hi. Sa dulh hethut pen sianglou ahi a, phak ahi.
Himahleh sa dulh hethut pen a na lamdan nawn a, a na kan nawn leh siampu kiang ah a hoh ding hi.
Siampu in a na en dia; ngai dih, a hi a kan leh siampu in hi veimi a sianglou kei chih a phuang ding hi. Amah a siangta hi.
A sa leh a vun a om meimatum ahi a, a damta hi.
A meimatum omna mun a na kan a na san hiam, kang sandeuh a na bol hiam ahihleh, siampu in a et ding ahi.
Siampu in a na en dia, ngai dih, a vun sang a thuka a kimuh a, a mul a kan leh siampu in sianglou in a phuang ding ahi: phak hi ahi a, meimatum a hong suakkhia ahi.
Himahleh siampu in a na et a, ngai dih, mul kang a omlouh a, a mialsim phet ahihleh, siampu in ni sagih a khumtuam ding a:
A vun a a zamzak leh siampu in sianglou in a phuang ding hi.
Himahleh a bol ngou pen a omna ngei a om a, a zamzak kei leh meimatum pawn lel ahi a; siampu in a siangthou chih a phuang ding ahi.
Ahihkeileh a vun polna mun a sa a om a, a kang hiam, a san sim hiam ahihkeileh a ngou leh,

Siampu in a na endia, ngai dih, a polna laitak a mul pen a kan a, huchi a vun sang a thukzaw a a kimuh leh phak ahi a, meikat a hong omkhia phak ahi a, siampu in sianglou in a phuang ding ahi, hiai phak hi ahi.
Himahleh siampu in a na et a, ngai dih, a pol a mulkang omlou a, a vun sang a thuklou zaw a, mialdeuh lel ahihleh siampu in ni sagih a khum tuam ding hi.
Siampu in ni sagih ni’n amah a en dia, a vun a a zamzak mahmah leh siampu in a sianglou in a phuang ding hi, hiai phak hi ahi.
A polpen a omna ngei a a na omdet a, vun a a zamzak kei leh, mialdeuh lel ahihleh meikat bawklel ahi a, siampu in a siang chih a phuang ding ahi; meikang pawn lel ahi.
Numei hiam, pasal hiam in a lu ah hiam, a khamul lak ah hiam hi a vei leh
Siampu in hi pen a na en dia; ngai dih, a vun sang a thukzaw a a kimuh a, a mul eng ngattak om leh siampu in sianglou in a phuang ding ahi; meimasungtum ahi a, a lu hiam a khamul hiam phak ahi.
Siampu in meimasungtum hipen a et a, ngai dih, a vun sang a thuklou zaw a a kimuh a, a mul vom a omkei leh siampu in meimasungtum hi veimi pen ni sagih a khumtuam ding hi.
Ni sagih ni’n siampu in hi a en dia, ngai dih, meimasungtum a zamzak louh a, mul eng a omkei leh, meimasungtum a vun sang a thukzaw a a kimuh kei leh,
met ding ahi a, meimasungtum laitak bel a met ding ahi kei; siampu in meimasungtum neimi ni sagih dang a khumtuam nawn ding ahi.

Ni sagih ni’n siampu in meimasungtum a en nawn dia; ngai dih, meimasungtum pen a vun a a zaklouh a, a vun sang a thukzaw a a kimuh kei leh, siampu in siang in a phuang ding ahi. Huchi in a puante a sawp dia, a hong siangta ding hi.
Himahleh meimasungtum pen a ki siansak nung a, a vun a a zamzak mahmah leh,
Siampu in amah a na endia, ngai dih, meimasungtum pen a vun a, a zamzak leh, siampu ading in mul eng zon a kiphamoh chitchiat kei ding; amah sianglou ahi.
Himahleh meimasungtum pen a ngeingei a a muh a, mul vom a pou leh, meimasungtum a damta ahi a, amah a siang a, siampu in a siang, chih a phuang ding hi.
Numei hiam, pasal hiam, a vun ah pol, pol ngou kilhkelh a na om leh,
Siampu in a en dia, ngai dih, a vun a pol pen mialngou simlel ahihleh pollel ahi a, vun a hongsuak ahi a, amah a siang hi.
A sam pulhsiangmi lugiau ahi; himahleh amah a siang hi.
A sipsam a pulh siang leh talngalh ahi a, himahleh amah a siang hi.
Himahleh lugiau hiam, talngalh hiam ah, hi sansim a ngou a om leh, a lugiau hiam, a talngalh hiam phak ahi.
Huchi in siampu in a na en dia, ngai dih, a lugiau hiam, a talngalh hiam a hi hong bawkkhia pen a sansim leh ngousim hethut a, a vun a phak bang a kimuh leh,
Amah phak ahi a, sianglou ahi. siampu in sianglou a phuan ngeingei ding ahi, phakna a lu ah a om hi.
Phak hi veimi puante bohkek ahi dia, a samte khah ahi dia, a muk tunglam a tuam dia, sianglou, sianglou, chi in a kikou ding ahi.
Phak in a bop sungteng sianglou ahi dia; sianglou ahi a, a tengtuam dia; giahphual pua ah a teng ding hi.
Phak hi omna puansilh, samul puan hiam, khau zangngat puan hiam;
a gat thoh hiam, a phanthoh hiam; khau zangngat hiam, samul hiam, savun hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl ah hiam; savun hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl ah hiam, savun hiam,
Gat ah hiam, phan ah hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl ah hiam a hingsim hiam a a dawkkhiak leh, phak hi ahi a, siampu in a en ding hi.
Siampu in hi a en dia, hi omna ni sagih a khumtuam ding hi.
Ni sagih ni’n hi a en dia, hi pen puansilh, gat ah hiam, phan ah hiam, savun ah hiam, bang ding peuh a leng a zat uh savunte ah hiam, a zam leh hipen phakkip mahmah chi ahihleh sianglou ahi.
Puansilh, gat hiam, phan hiam, samul hiam, khau zangngat hiam, savun a bawl chi himhim hiam, phak omna peuhmah hal ding ahi, phakkip mahmah chi ahi ngal a, hal ngeingei ding ahi.
Siampu in a na et a, huchi a, ngai dih, puansilh, gat hiam, phan hiam, savun a bawl chi himhim ah leng hipen a zamkei leh
hi omna siampu in sawp ding thu a pedia, ni sagih dang a khumtuam nawn ding hi.

Hi omna sawp a hih khitnung in siampu in a na ennawn dia, ngai dih, huai hi latdan a kikhek kei leh hipen zamkei mahleh, a siang tuankei, mei a na hal ding ahi; a kip chi ahi, a sunglam hiam, a pawlam hiam a giau leh leng.
Siampu in a na et a, huchi a, ngai dih, sawpkhit nung a mial sim lel ahihleh puansilh apan hiam, savun apan hiam, gat apan hiam, phan apan hiam a botkhe ding ahi.
Puansilh pen, gat ah hiam, phan ah hiam, savun bawl ah hiam a latlai lai leh a hong pawtnawn ahi a; hi omna pen na hal ding ahi.
Puansilh, gat hiam, phan hiam, bangpeuh savun a bawl chi himhim hiam na sawp a, hi in a nutsiat leh sawpnawn ding ahi a, huchi in a hong siangta ding hi.
Hiai bel, puansilh samul hiam, khau zangngat hiam, gat hiam, phan hiam, savun a bawl chi himhim hiam a phak hi om a sian leh sianlouh phuanna dan ding ahi, chi in.
Huan,
Hiai phak siansak ni a hihdan ding ahi. siampu kiang a pi ding ahi.
Huchi in siampu giahphual pua ah a paikhe dia; siampu in a en dia, ngai dih, phakmi pen a phakna hi a dam leh
Siampu in a kisiangsak ding mi vasa hing siang nih, sidar sing, khauzang san leh hussop tawisak ding in thu a pe ding hi.
Siampu in vasa khat pen leibel ah luitui tung ah goh ding in thu a pe ding hi.
Vasa hing pen a la dia, sidar sing, khauzang san, hussop toh luitui luang tung a gohsa vasa sisan ah a diahvek ding hi.
Phakna apan a kisiangsak ding mi sagihvei a theh dia, a siang chih a phuang ding, huchi in vasa hing pen gamlak ah a khah ding hi.

A kisiangsak ding mi’n a puante a sawp dia, a kimetmai vek dia, a kisil ding ahi. Huchi in a hong siang dia, huaikhit chiang in giahphual ah a hoh dia, himahleh a puanin pua ah ni sagih a omlai ding hi.
Hichi ahi ding a, a ni sagih ni’n a lu a sam tengteng leh a khamul leh a mitkhu multe a metmai dia, a mul tengteng a metmai ding hi. A puante a sawp in a kisil dia, huchi in a hong siangta ding hi.

A ni giat ni’n belamnoupa nih gensiatbei leh belamnounu khat gensiatbei, kum khat a upa leh tangbuang thillat ding in tangbuang nel mahmah ephah mun sawm a khen, mun thum sathau a mek leh sathau thawl khat a tawi ding ahi.
A siangsakpa siampu in kisiangsak ding mi leh huai thilte Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah
Siampu in belamnoupa khat pen sathau log khat toh a la dia, tatlek thoihna ding in a lan dia,

Khelh thoihna leh haltum thillat a goh zelna mun uh, Mun Siangthou ah belamnoupa pen a gou dia, khelh thoihna siampu a tuam ahihbangin tatlek thoihna leng siampu a tuam ahi; hiai thil siangthou pen ahi.
Siampu in tatlek thoihna sisan a la dia, kisiangsak ding mi bil taklam mongte, a khut taklam khutpite, a taklam khepite siampu in a nuh ding hi.
Sathau log khat pen siampu in a la dia, amah khutpek veilam ah asung ding hi.
Siampu in a khut veilam a sathau ah a khut taklam zung a diah ding a,
A khut a sathau omlai teng in kisiangsak ding mi bil taklam dawn, a khut taklam khutpi leh a khe taklam khepi ah tatlekna kithoihna sisan tung ah a nuh ding hi.
Siampu in a khut a omlai teng in kisiangsak ding mi lu a nuh dia; huchi in siampu in
Siampu in khelh thoihna a lan dia, a sianlouhna apan kisiang sak ding mipen kilemna a bawlsak dia; huaikhit in haltum thillat a gou ding hi.
Siampu in haltum thillat leh tangbuang thillat maitam ah a lat ding a siam a, siampu in kilemna a bawlsak ding a, huchi in a hongsiang ding hi.

Mizawng a hih a, hiaite a neihzoh kei leh, belamnoupa khat tatlek thoihna, kilemna bawl sakna dia vei ding leh tangbuang thillat dia tangbuang nel mahmah ephah mun sawm a khen, mun khat, sathau a zut, sathau log khat toh a tawi ding ahi.
Vakhu kop khat hiam, vapal nou kop khat hiam, a neihzoh lamlam; khat khelh thoihna ding, khat pen haltum thillat ding ahi ding hi.
A ni giat ni’n a kisiansakna ding in siampu kiang ah Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah
Huchi in siampu in tatlek thoihna belamnou leh sathau log khat a la dia, vei thillat ding in
Tatlek thoihna belamnou pen a gou dia; siampu in tatlek thoihna sisan a la dia, kisiangsak ding mi bil taklam dawn, a khut taklam khutpi leh a khe taklam khepi a nuh ding hi.
Siampu in sathau amah khutpek veilam ah asung ding ahi.
Siampu in a khut veilam a sathau khenkhat a khut taklam in
Siampu in a khut a sathau in kisiangsak ding mi bil taklam dawn, a khut taklam khutpi, a khe taklam khepi leh tatlek kithoihna sisan tungtak ah a nuh ding hi.
Siampu in a khut a sathau om laiteng in
Vakhu hiam, vapal nou hiam, a neihzoh lamlam khat a lan dia;
a neihzoh lamlam, khelh thoihna ding in khat, haltum thillat ding in khat, tangbuang thillat toh. Huchi in siampu in kisiangsak ding mi ading in
Hiai bel phak hivei, kisiansakna dan bang a chinloute adia dan ahi, a chi hi.
Luah dia k’on piak Kanan gam na lut chiang ua, na luah ding uh gam a inn khat a phak hi ka koih leh,
Huai inn neitu in, hiai inn ah hi hileh kilawmtak om leh kilawm ka sa, chi in siampu a honghilh ding ahi.
Siampu in hi a en dia, a lut ma in inn sung hihvuak ding in siampu in thu a pedia, hiai insung a thil om tengteng sianglou ahi ding hi; huai nung in siampu inn sung en ding in a lut ding ahi.
Aman hi a en dia, ngai dih, hi in a hinglam sim hiam a sanlam sim hiam a bang a nekkuak a, bang sang a niam zaw a a kimuh leh,
Siampu inn apan kongpi ah a pawt dia, ni sagih sung huai inn a khak ding ahi.
A ni sagih ni’n siampu’n inn a va en nawn dia, ngai dih, hi pen huai inn bang a a na zamzak leh;
Siampu in huai hi omna suangpen lakhia a, khopi pawlam a ninpaihna mun a paih ding in thu a pe ding hi.
inn sung lam a kiat siang kimvel sak dia, suang zutbitna a kiat khiak leivui pen dainawl mun nin ah asung ding uhi.
Suang dang a la ding ua, huai suangte mun ah a koih ding ua; suang zutbitna dang a la ding ua, inn a hu ding uhi.
Suang a lakkhiak a, inn a kiat siang a, a hukkhit nung a hi a hong dawk nawn leh, siampu a valut dia, a va en nawn ding hi.
Ngai dih, hi a na zamzak leh huai inn a phak a kip chi ahi a, sianglou ahi
Huai inn a phel dia, a suang, a sing leh a suang zutbitna teng leng dainawl mun nin ah a nawn khevek ding ahi.
Kuapeuh huai inn khak ahihsung himhim a lut taphot nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding hi.
Kuapeuh huai inn a lum taphot in a puante uh a sawp ding ua; kuapeuh huai inn a an neta phot in a puante uh a sawp ding uh ahi.
Siampu a lut a, a etkimvel a, ngai dih, huai inn huk hoih a hih nung a, hi a zamzak kei leh, inn a siang chih siampu in a phuang ding, hi pen a ki khinmang tak ziak in.
inn siansakna ding in vasa nih leh Sidar sing leh khauzang san leh hussop a tawi ding hi.
Vasa khat pen lei bel ah luitui luang tung ah a gou ding hi.
Sidar sing, hussop, khausan leh vasa hing pen a la dia, vasa gohsa sisan ah leh luitui ah a diah ding hi.
Vasa sisan, luitui luang, vasa hing pen, sidar sing, hussop leh khausan in huai inn a siangsak ding ahi.
Vasa hing pen khua apan gamlak ah kilemna bawlna ding in a leng khesak dia; huchi in huai inn a siangsak ding a, a hong siang ding hi.
Hiai pen phak hi chichih leh meimasungtum tungthu a dan ahi;
puan a om leh innte a om phak ading;
chibawk, khem, pol leh chikang chihte toh kisai a,
sianlouhna hun leh sianna hun a sinsak ding, phak dan ahi.
Huan,
Israel suante houpih unla, a kiang uah, Mi kuapeuh sa a thil a pawt leh a thilpawt ziak in sianglou ahi.
A thilpawt sungteng sianglou ahi a, a sa ah a pawt gige hiam, a pawt a tawpta hiam leng hitaleh, amah sianglou himhim ahi.
Thilpawt mi lupna peuhmah sianglou ahi dia; a tutna peuhmah leng sianglou ahilai ding hi.
Kuapeuh a lupna khoih peuhmahte’n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uhi.
Thilpawt mi tutna a tu peuhmahte’n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uh.
Kuapeuh thilpawt mi sa khoih peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uhi.
Thilpawt mi in mi sianglou chil a siatkhum leh a puante a sawp dia, a kisil ding ahi, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Tuanna bangpeuh a leng thilpawtmi a tuan leh sianglou ahi ding.

Kuapeuh a kingaihnasa nung thilkhoih peuhmahte nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding ua; huai thil lasuan mi peuhmah in a puante uh a sawp ding ua; a kisil ding uh ahi. Nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uhi.
Kuapeuh thilpawt mi in a khut sillou a a khoih peuhmah in a puante a sawp dia, a kisil ding ahi. Nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Thilpawt mi leibel khoihsa suktap ding ahi; a sing vanzat tengteng silsiang vek ding ahi.
Thilpawtmi bel, a thilpawt hihsiang ahihleh, a ki siansakna ding in ni sagih a kipe dia, a puante a sawp dia; luitui ah a kisil dia; huchi in a hong siangta ding hi.
A ni giat ni’n vakhu kopkhat hiam, vapal nou kopkhat hiam tawi in
Siampu in khelh thoihna ding in khat, haltum thillat ding in a khat pen a lan ding hi. Siampu in a thilpawt thu ah
Pasal kuapeuh kipolhna chi amah apan a pawt leh a pumpi in a kisil vek dia, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Puansilh leh vun, kipolhna chitukna peuhmah sawpsiang vek ding ahi a, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Numei a luppih leng a nih ua a kisil tuak ding uh ahi. Nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uhi.
Numei in thilpawt a neih a, a sa a thilpawt si ahihleh ni sagih sung sianglou ahi dia; kuapeuh amah khoihkha taphot nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
A sianlouh sung a, a lupna peuhmah sianglou ahi dia, a tutna peuhmah leng sianglou ahilai ding hi.
A lupna khoih peuhmahte’n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi. Nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uh.
Kuapeuh a tutna khoih peuhmahte’n a puante uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi. Nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uhi.
A lupna a thil om hiam, a tutna a thil om hiam khoih peuhmah leng nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uh.
Kuapeuh in a luppih a, a sineih luang in amah a sukkhak leh ni sagih sung sianglou ahi dia; a lupna peuhmah sianglou ahivek ding hi.

Numei a sineih ngeina hilou, ni sawtkuam tak a sipawt hiam, a nitdan ngeina sang a sawtzaw sipawt hiam ahihleh, a sianlouh dan ngeina sung a, a om zel bang in sipawtmi a nit sungteng sianglou in a om ding hi.
A sipawt sungteng a lupna taphot a sianglouh ngeina hunlai a, a lupna bang ahi dia; a tutna peuhmah a sianlouh ngeina hunlai a, a sianglouh bang in sianglou ahi ding.
Kuapeuh huai thil khoih peuhmah sianglou ahi dia, a puante a sawp dia, a kisil ding ahi. Nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Himahleh a sipawt pen siansak ahihleh ni sagih aman a kisim dia, huchi in a hong siangta ding hi.
A ni giat ni’n vakhu kopkhat hiam, vapalnou kopkhat hiam a tawi dia, Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah siampu a hong pe ding ahi.
Siampu in khelh thoihna ding in khat, haltum thillat ding in khat a lan ding ahi. Huchi in siampu in sipawt mi a sianlouhna thu ah
Hiai bang in Israel suante a sianlouhna ua pan na hihtuam ding uh ahi, a lak ua ka biakbuk a hihbuah khak chiang ua leng a sianglouhna ua a sihlouhna ding un.
Hiai dan pasal thilpawt neimi leh kipolhna apan chi pawtkhia a ninte leh
numei kha teng sineih sung ading, pasal hi in numei hitaleh sa apan thilpawt neimi ading leh sianglou a ngaih numei luppih pasal ading ahi, a chi hi.
Huan, Aron tapa nihte’n

Mosi kiang ah: Na unau Aron houpih inla, puanzak sung Mun Siangthou ah, bawm tung a chitna tutphah ma ah chiklaipeuh in leng honglut hetkei heh, a si kha ding hi. Chitna tutphah tung a, meipi a hong kilang ding ka hih ziak in.
Hichibang in Aron Mun Siangthou ah khelh thoihna ding in bawng tuai, haltum thillat ding in belampa toh a hoh ding ahi.

Puanmalngat puanak siangthou a silh dia, a sa khuhna ding in puanmalngat pheitawm a bun ding, puanmalngat dial a khim ding ahi. Hiaite puansilh siangthou ahi a; a kisil masa dia, huchi in a silh phet ding ahi.
Israel suan mipi hon apan khelh thoihna ding in kelpa nih leh haltum thillat ding in belampa khat a tawi ding ahi.
Aron in amah a tuam, khelh thoihna bawngpa pen a lan dia, amah leh a inkawte ading in kilemna a bawl ding ahi.
Kel nih a kai dia, Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah
Aron in kel nih tungthu ah ai a san dia, khat Toupa a tuam ahi dia, a khat pen thuaksik thuak kel ahi ding.
Aron in
Thuaksik thuak kel dia puk pen kilemna bawlna dia khah ding in
Aron in a ma a tuam khelhna bawngpa pen a la dia, amah leh a inkawte ading in kilemna a bawl dia, amah a tuam khelh thoihna bawngpa pen a gou ding hi.
ma a maitam apan meilakna dim in mei am a la dia, gimlim gawizan ngiingei pham khat toh puanzak sung ah a lutpih ding hi.
Gimlim khu in thu theihpihna tung a chitna tutphah a bopna ding in
Bawngpa sisan bangzah hiam a la dia, a khutzung in chitna tutphah suahlam pang a theh dia, a khut in chitna tutphah bul sisan in sagihvei a theh ding ahi.
Mipi a tuam khelhthoihna kel pen a gou dia, a sisan, bawngpa sisan a bawl bang in a bawl dia, chitna tutphah tung leh chitna tutphah ma ah a theh ding hi.

Israel suante sianlouhnate leh a khelhnate ua a tatleknate uh ziak in Mun Siangthou ading in kilemna a bawl ding hi. Huai mah bang in, a sianlouhnate uh lak a om, Kihoupihna puanin ading in leng a bawlsam ding hi.
Mun siangthou a kilemna bawl dia a lut lai in, amah leh a inkawte leh Israel mipite adia kilemna bawlkhin a a hongpawt khiak masiah kuamah puanin sung ah a om ding ahi kei.
ma a maitam lam ah a pawt dia, huai ading in kilemna a bawl dia, bawngpa sisan leh kel sisan bangzah hiam a la dia, maitam kite ah a kimvel in a tat ding ahi.
A khut in huai sisan sagihvei a theh dia, a siangsak dia, Israel suante sianglouhna apan a hih siangthou ding hi.
Mun siangthou leh Kihoupihna puanin leh maitam adia kilemna a bawlkhit chiang in, kel hingpen a honkai ding hi.

Aron in kel hing lu tung ah a khut langnih a koih dia, a tung ah Israel suante gitlouhna teng leh khiala a tatlekna teng uh a pulak dia; huaite kel lu tung ah a nga dia, mi khat a sehkholhsa un gamdai ah a pimang ding hi.
Huai kel in a gitlouhna tengteng uh luahlouh gam ah a paw mang dia, kel bel gamdai ah a khah ding hi.
Kihoupihna puanin ah Aron a lut dia, Mun Siangthou a, a lutlai a puanmalngat puansilh a suah dia, huai ah a nuse ding hi.
Mun siangthou ah a kisil dia, a puansilh a silh dia, a hong pawtkhe dia, amah a tuam haltum thillat leh mipi a tuam haltum thillat a lan dia, amah leh mipi ading in kilemna a bawl ding hi.
Khelh thoihna thau maitam ah a hal ding hi.
Thuaksik thuak kel khah mi kuapeuh in a puante a sawp dia, a kisil dia, huaikhit in a omna mun ah a pai nawn ding ahi.
Khelh thoihna bawngpa leh khelh thoihna kel sisan kilemna a bawlna dia Mun Siangthou a, a lutpih uh giahphual pua ah a paipih ding hi; a vun, a sa leh a ek a hal ding ahi.
A hal mi’n a puan a sawp dia, a kisil dia, huaikhit in a omna mun ah a pai nawn ding ahi.
Hiai na tangtawn dan ding uh ahi: A kha sagihna, huai kha ni sawm ni’n na lungsimte uh na gimsak ding ua, na gam ua mi himhim hiam, gamdangmi na lak ua teng hiam in bangmah a seplouh ding ahi.
Hiai ni’n noute hihsiangthou ding in noute ading in kilemna bawl ahi dia; huchi in
Nou adia Sabbath khawlni ahi a, na lungsimte uh na gimsak ding uh. Hiai tangtawn dan ding ahi.

Siampu, a pa sik a siampu hidia sathau nilh ding leh hihtuam mi hi ding in kilemna a bawl dia, puanmalngat puansilh siangthou a silh dia; Mun Siangthou ading in kilemna a bawl dia; Kihoupihna puanin leh maitam ading in leng kilemna a bawl sam ding hi.
Siampute leh mipi hon ading in kilemna a bawl nawnlai ding hi.
A khelhna tengteng uh ziak a kumchih a khatvei Israel suante adia kilemna bawl na tangtawn dan ding uh ahi, a chi hi. Huchi in
Huan,
Aron leh a tapate leh Israel suan tengteng houpih inla, a kiang uah: Hiai
Israel inkawte lak a mi bawngpa hiam, belamnou hiam, kel hiam giahphual hiam, giahphual pawlam hiam a gou a,
biakbuk ma a
Hiai pen Israel suante’n a kithoihnate uh, gamlak a kithoihnate uh a honlak ua,
siampu in Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul a maitam sisan in a theh dia, a thau
A angkawmna uh dawite kiang ah a kithoih nawn ding uh ahi kei. Hiai a suante uh tan a tangtawn a dia dan ahi.
A kiang uah, Israel inn kaw mi himhim hiam, gamdangmi a lak ua tengte hiam in haltum thillat hiam, kithoihna hiam,
kiang a kithoihna dia Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul a hon tawilou a om leh huai mi a chipihte lak apan satkhiat ding ahi.
Kuapeuh Israel inn kaw lak a mi hiam, gamdangmi a lak ua teng hiam, bang sisan leng ne peuhmah, huai sisan nemi tung ah ka mai ka gumsak dia, a chipihte lak apan satkhiat ahi ding hi.
Sa hinna pen sisan a a om ziak in, Na hinna uh adia kilemna bawlna dia maitam tung a nou k’on piak ahi. Hinna dia kilemna bawlna pen sisan mahlah ahi ngal a.
Huaiziak in, Israel suante kiang ah, Kuamah in sisan na ne ding uh ahi kei. Gamdangmi na lak ua teng in leng sisan a ne ding ahi kei, ka chi ahi.
Israel suante lak a mi hiam, gamdangmi a lak ua teng hiam, gam vavak a, sa hiam, vasa hiam, nektheih chi a hontut leh a sisan a pawtsak dia, a sisan leivui in a vuk ding ahi.

Sa tengteng hinna thu ah a sisan leh a hinna kibang geih ahi. Huaiziak in, Israel suante kiang ah, sa sisan mawngmawng na ne ding uh ahi kei, sa tengteng hinna a sisan ahi ngal a. Kuapeuh hiai na satkhiat ahi ding.

Amah sih a si hiam, sa keih lup hiam ne mi, huai gam a mi hiam leng hi hen aw, a puan uh a sawp ding ua, a kisil ding uh ahi. Nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding uh. Huchi in nitaklam in a hong siangta ding uh.
A sawpkei ua, a kisil kei uleh a thulimlouhna mawh a kipuak ding uh, a chi hi.
Huan,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Kei
Na omna masa uh Aigupta gam mite hihbang in hihkei unla, k’on pilutna ding Kanaan gam mite hihbang in leng hihkei un.
Ka vaihawmte na zui ding ua, ka dante zui in na mang ding uh ahi. Kei
Huaiziak in, ka dan leh ka vaihawmte na mang ding uh ahi, huai mi’n ahihleh a hing ding hi. Kei
Kuamah in na tanau nai numei, a vuaktanna lem ding in na zuan ding ahi kei. Kei
Na pa vuaktanna ahihkeileh na nu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei. Na nu ahi a, a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei hi.
Na pa zi vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, na pa vuaktanna ahi.
Na sanggamnu, na pa tanu hiam na nu tanu hiam, na pianpih hiam, na pianpih louh hiam vuaktanna leng na lem ding ahi kei.
Na tapa tanu hiam, na tanu, tanu hiam vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei. A vuaktanna uh nang vuaktanna ahi ngal a.
Na pa zi tanu, na pa suan vuaktanna, na sanggamnu ahi, a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei.
Na pa sanggamnu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei. Na pa tanaunu nai ahi.
Na nu sanggamnu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, na nu tanau nu nai ahi ngal a.
Na pa sanggam vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei, a zi na zuan ding ahi kei, na nu ahi.
Na mounu vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei. Na tapa zi ahi a, a vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei.
Na sanggampa zi vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei. Na sanggampa vuaktanna ahi.
Nutate vuaktanna na lem ding uh ahi kei. A vuaktanna lem ding in a tapa tanu hiam, a tanu-tanu hiam na la ding ahi kei. Na tanau naite ahi ua; gitlouhna lianpi ahi.
Na zi a damlai teng, a sanggamnu, a vuaktanna lem ding in na zi in na nei ding ahi kei hi.
Numei a nitdan ngeina a, a nit sung in a vuaktannna lem ding in na zuan ding ahi kei.
A lak a kihihnin ding in na invengpa zi na luppih ding ahi kei.
Molech adia mei a lutsuak sak ding in na gil a gah himhim na pe ding ahi kei, na Pathian min na hihse ding ahi sam kei. Kei
Numei bang in pasal na luppih ding ahi kei. Thil kihhuai ahi.
Kihihnin ding in ganta himhim na luppih ding ahi kei. Luppih ding in ganta ma ah numei adin ding ahi kei. Gitlouhna tungtuan ahi.
Hiaite ah, a bangmah ah kihihnin kei un. Hiai thil tengteng ah na ma ua ka delhkhiak khitsa namte a na nin khinta uhi.
A gam leng a nin khinta hi. Huaiziak in, a thulimlouhnate uh ziak in amau ka gawt a, gam in asung a tengmite a lawkhe khin vek hi.
Huaiziak in, nou zaw ka dante, ka vaihawmte na zui ding uh ahi. Hiai thil kihhuaite na hih ding uh ahi kei, na gam ua mi himhim hiam, gamdangmi na lak ua tengte hiam in leng.
Hiai thil kihhuai tengteng na ma ua hiai gam a omte’n a na hih khin ua, gam mah leng a nin khinta hi.
Na ma ua om nam a lawkhia mah bang in na hihnit ua gam in a hon luakkhiat louhna ding in.
Kuapeuh hiai thilkihhuaite lak a khatpeuh hihmi a chipihte apan satkhiat ahi ding.
Huaiziak in, hiai thilkihhuai na ma ua omte’n a chin bang uh na chin samlouhna ding un leh huai a na ki hihnit louhna ding un ka thupiak na zui ding uh ahi. Kei
Huan,
Israel suan mipite tengteng houpih inla, a kiang uah: Na siangthou ding uh ahi, Kei,
Michih in na nu leh na pa na lau ding uh ahi. Ka khawlnite na tan ding uh ahi. Kei
Milim lam ah kihei kei unla, sunthoh milim pathiante leng kibawltawm kei un. Kei
Na lat ni mah uh ahihkeileh a zing a na nekding uh ahi. A ni thum ni tan a, a val a omlai leh mei a na hal ding uh ahi.
Ni thum ni a kinek leh thilkihhuai ahi a; pomsak ahi kei ding hi.
A ne kuapeuh in
Na lou ua buh na lak chiang un, lounawl zulte tan in na lavek ding uh ahi kei. A sang leng na zong ding uh ahi kei.
Na grephuan uah a sang na zong ding uh ahi kei. Na grephuan ua a gah kia leng na tomkhawm ding uh ahi kei. Mi zawng leh gamdangmi ading in na hawisak ding uh ahi. Kei
Na gu ding uh ahi kei. A taklou in thil na hih ding ahi kei. Zuau na kihilh tuah ding uh ahi kei.
Na Pathian min hemsak ding in ka min in dikloutakin na kichiam ding uh ahi kei. Kei
Na invengte na khem ding ahi kei. Na guk sak ding leng ahi kei. Kilohmi loh zankhua in a zingsang tan in na kem ding ahi kei.
Nangong na hamsiat ding ahi kei. Mittaw ma ah a pukna ding na koih ding ahi kei. Na Pathian na lauh ding ahi. Kei

Vaihawmna ah diktatlou tak in thu na khen ding ahi kei. Mi zawng na simmawh tuam ding ahi kei hi. Mi thilhihthei na zahtak tuam ding ahi kei. Himahleh diktattak in na invengte vai na hawm sak ding ahi.
Na chipihte lak ah migensia in na vialvak ding ahi kei. Na invengte sisan thu ah a hilou lam in na pang ding ahi kei.
Na lungtang in na unau na haw ding ahi kei. Na invengte na taihilh ngeingei ding ahi. Na huchih leh a gitlouhna ah na siang ding hi.
Phu na la ding ahi kei. Na chipihte suante huatna na pai ding ahi kei. Nang na ki-it bang in na invengte na it ding ahi. Kei
Ka thupiakte na zui ding uh ahi. Na ganta chi tuamtuam suangsak ken. Na lou ah haichi chi nih chingkhawm ken. Thil chituam nih gatpolh puan na silh ding ahi kei.
Kuapeuh sikhanu, a pasal ding khamsa nei, tat nailouh, khahkhiak nailouh numei toh lumkhawm peuhmah gawt ding ahi. Himahleh hihlup ding bel ahi kei, amah zalen ahihlouh ziak in.
Kihoupihna puanin kongpi bul ah
A thil hihkhelhsa, a khelhna ah
Gam na valuah ua, nek dia theikung chichih na suan hun un a gah sianglou in na ngai ding uh. Nou ading in kum thum sianglou a ngaih ding ahi a, nek hetlouh ding ahi.
Himahleh, a kum lina ah a gah teng
A kum ngana ah nou adia a punzel theihna ding in a gah na ne ding uh ahi. Kei
A sisan toh khat peuh na ne ding uh ahi kei. Bum ching in ai nasan ding uh ahi kei.
Na baknel apan a kimvel in na lu na met ding ahi kei. Na khamul langtuak leng na tan ding ahi sam kei.
Misi ziak in na sa uh na atkeh ding uh ahi kei. Na satung ua gelh in chiamtehna na gelh ding uh ahi kei. Kei,
Na tanu kizuak sak ken. Gam angkawmna gam a hongsuak kha dia, gitlouhna in a hong dim kha ding hi.
Ka Sabbathte na tan ding uh ahi. Ka Mun Siangthou na zahtak ding uh ahi. Kei,
Dawi aisansiamte zuan kei unla, bumsiamte leng a hon nitsak louhna ding un zongkhe kei un. Kei,
Lu a kelsam poute ma ah ding in. Tek omna na zahtak in. Na Pathian lau in. Kei,
Gamdangmi, na gam ua a na tengsam a om leh na hihsiatlouh ding uh ahi.
Gamdangmi na lak ua tengte bel nou a din na gam ua mi bang ahi ding ua, nangmah na ki-it bang in amah na it ding ahi. Nou leng Aigupta gam ah gamdangmi na hi ngeita uhi. Kei
Vaihawm thu ah, tehna chiang ah, gikdan ah leh saudan tehna ah diktatloupi in na hih ding uh ahi kei.
Bukna dik, gikdan dik, ephah dik, hindik na nei ding uh ahi. Kei

Huan,

Israel suante kiang ah, Kuapeuh, Israel suante lak a mi hiam, Israel gam a teng gamdangmi hiam, a gil a gah Molech pe peuhmah hihlup ngeingei ding ahi. Hiai gam a miteng in suang in a denglum ding uhi.
Ka Mun Siangthou leh ka min siangthou hihnin ding a, a gilgah khenkhat Molech kiang a a piak ziak in huai mi tung ah ka mai ka gumsak dia, a chipihte lak apan ka satkhe ding hi.
Hiai gam a mite’n a gil a gah Molech kiang a piak a kitheihmohbawl ua, a hihlup kei uleh,
amah leh a inkawte tung ah ka mai ka gumsak dia, Molech kiang a kei hon angkawm san peuhmahte toh a chipihte uh lak apan ka satkhe ding hi.
A lak ua angkawm dia dawi aisansiamte leh bumsiamte zuan mi tung ah ka mai ka gumsak dia; a chipihte lak apan ka satkhe ding hi.
Huaiziak in, kihihsiangthou unla, siangthou in om un. Kei
Ka thupiakte pom in na zui ding uh ahi. Kei
A nu hiam, a pa hiam hamsiat khum peuhmah hihlup ngeingei ding ahi. A nu hiam, a pa hiam hamsiat khum ahi a, a tung ah a sisan mawh a om ding ahi.
Mi zi angkawm, a invengte zi angkawm zaw, a angkawmpa leh a angkawmnu, a nih ua hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
A pa zi luppih in a pa vuaktanna lem ahi a; hihlup tuaktuak ding ahi. A sisan mawh a tung uah a om ding hi.
Mi’n a mounu a luppih leh hihlup tuaktuak ding ahi. Tatsiatna tungtuan hih ahi ua, a sisan mawh a tung uah a om ding hi.
Mi’n numei a luppih bang a pasal a luppih leh thil kihhuai mahmah hihtuak ahi ua, hihlup ngeingei ding ahi. A sisan mawh a tung uah a om ding hi.
Mi’n nuta zi in nei leh gitlouhna ahi. Na lak ua thulimlouhna a omlouhna ding in amah leh nutate mei a hallup ding ahi.
Mi’n ganta a luppih leh hihlup ngeingei ding ahi. Ganta leng hihlup ding ahi.
Numei in ganta a va naih a, a kiluppih sakleh huai numei na hihlup ngeingei ding uh ahi. Ganta leng hihlup ngeingei ding ahi a; a sisan mawh a tung uah a om ding hi.

Mi’n a sanggamnu, a pa tanu hiam, a nu tanu hiam a kitenpih a, a vuaktanna a muh a, aman leng a vuaktanna a muh leh thil gilou hih ahi ua, a mite mitmuh a satkhiat ding ahi uh. A sanggamnu vuaktanna lem ahi a, a tatlekna mawh a paw ding hi.
Mi’n numei a kha teng sineih a neih lai a, a luppih a, a vuaktanna a lem leh a si pawtna lem ahi a, aman leng a si pawtna lem ahi a, a chipihte ua pan a nih ua satkhiat ding ahi.
Na nu sanggamnu hiam, na pa sangnu hiam vuaktanna na lem ding ahi kei. A sanggam nai vuaktanna lem ahi a, a gitlouhna mawh a paw ding.
Mi’n a pangak zi a luppih leh a pangak vuaktanna lem ahi a; a khelh mawh uh a paw ding ua, suanlehpak bei in a si ding uh.
Mi’n a unaupa zi a kitenpih leh thilnin ahi a, a unaupa vuaktanna lem ahi a, suanlehpak neilou in a om ding uh.
Huaiziak in ka thupiak tengteng, ka vaihawm tengteng na pom ding ua, na zui ding uh ahi. Huchi in tenna dia k’on pina gam in nou a hon lawkhe kei ding hi.
Na ma ua ka delhkhiaksa namdangte thilhihte na zui ding uh ahi kei. Hiai thil tengteng a hih ua, huaiziak in, amau ka kih hi.
Himahleh nou kiang ah, a gam uh, nawitui leh khuaizu luanna gam na luah ding un k’on pe ding, ka chi khinta hi. Kei

Huaiziak in, sa siang leh sianglou leh vasa siang leh sianglou na khen tuam ding ua; sa hiam, vasa hiam lei a vak thoh chi himhim hiam nou adia sianglou dia ka sehtuamte in na hinna uh na kihhuai sak ding uh ahi kei.
Kei ading in Mi Siangthou na hi ding uh ahi. Kei
Pasal leng, numei leng dawi aisansiam zawl hiam, bumsiam hiam hihlup ngeingei ding ahi a; suang a denlup ding ahi uh. A sisan mawh uh a tung uah a om ding hi, a chi nawn lai hi.
Huan,
A tanau nai, a nu uh, a pa uh, a tapa uh, a tanu uh, a unau,
a sanggamnu, a ompih lai uh nungak, pasal nei nailoute ziak in ahihleh a ki hihnin thei ding uhi.
Hiai bang ahihkei ngal leh, a chipihte uh lak a intekpen a hih ziak in a kihihnin ding ahi kei.
A lu uh a metgiau ding uh ahi kei. A khamul siktuak uh leng a tan tom ding uh ahi kei. A sa uh leng a atkeh ding uh ahi kei hi.
A Pathian uh ading in Mi Siangthou ahi ding ua, a Pathian min a hemsak ding ahi kei hi.
Numei kizuak hiam, min hem hiam, a pasal maksa hiam a kitenpih ding ahi kei, a Pathian ading in Mi Siangthou ahi ngal a.
Huaiziak in, amah na siangthousak ding ahi; aman na Pathian tanghou a lat ziak in, nang ading in a siangthou ding hi. Kei,
siampu kuapeuh tanu kizuak a, a kihih thanghuai leh a pa a hih thanghuai ahi a, mei a hal ding ahi.
A unaute lak a siampu lianpen, a lu sathau nilhsa, puansilh dia sehtuamsa in a lukhuhna a lakhe ding ahi kei. A puante a botkek ding ahi kei.
Misi luang omna ah a lut ding ahi kei. A nu hiam, a pa hiam ziak in a kihihnin ding ahi sam kei hi.
Mun siangthou apan a pawtkhe ding ahi kei. A Pathian Mun Siangthou a hih thanghuai ding ahi sam kei hi. A Pathian sathaunilhna lah a tung ah a om ngal a; Kei
Zi ding in nungak siangthou a kitenpih ding ahi.
Meithai hiam, maksa hiam, numei minhem hiam, kizuak hiam a kitenpih ding ahi kei. Amah chipih, nungak siangthou zi ding in a kitenpih ding ahi.
A chipihte lak ah a suante a hihnin ding ahi kei. Kei
Aron kiang ah, a suante lak a na khang ua demna ding nei peuhmah in a Pathian adia ansiah lan ding in honzuan kei hen.
Kuapeuh melhemna nei in a honnaih hetlouh ding ahi. Mittaw, khebai, nakpek ahihkeileh a kan a val a om peuhmah;
Ahihkeileh khe kitan, khut kitan,
Ahihkeileh nungkul, mineu lua, mit sia, meima damthei lou nei ahihkeileh chiltang kitam,
Siampu Aron suan gensiatna ding nei himhim in
A Pathian adia an siangthou leh siangthou pen ahihleh a ne thei ding hi.
Himahleh gensiatna ding nei a hih ziak in puanzak sung ah hiam, maitam kiang nai ah hiam a hongpai theikei ding. Ka mun siangthoute a hihnin kha ding hi. Kei
Huchi in Mosi in Aron leh a tapate leh Israel suante tengteng kiang ah a genta hi.
Huan,
Aron leh a tapate kiang ah gen inla, Israel suante’n ka ma a thillat siangthou, kei adia sehtuam a latte uh zahtak tak in sai uhen. Ka min siangthou a hihnin kha ding uh. Kei
A kiang uah, khang sawnsawn in na suante uh lak a kuapeuh sianglou a ngaih a om in
Aron suan kuapeuh phak hiam, thilpawt nei hiam in a sian masiah thil siangthoute nekei hen. Misi in a hihnit hiam, amah apan chipawt peuhmah hiam;
ahihkeileh amah sianglou hisak thei bokvak ganhing khatpeuh khoihkha hiam bangchibang sianglou khoihkha sianglou in a om ding hi.
Huchibang khoihmi nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi dia, tui a a kisil kei leh thil siangthoute a nek louh ding ahi.
Nitum chiang in a hong siangta ding hi. Huaikhit in thilsiangthoute a netheita ding, a nekding an a hih ziak in.
A kihihnin ding in amah sih a si hiam, gamsa in a balnen hiam a ne ding ahi kei. Kei
Huaiziak in, ka thupiak a zuih ding ahi. Huchilou in zaw a kihihnitna khelh mawh a kipuak ding a, a sihloh ding hi. Kei
Gamdang mi’n thil siangthou a ne ding ahi kei. Siampu kiang a gamta hiam, kiloh hiam in thil siangthou a ne ding ahi kei.
Himahleh siampu in kuahiam sum a a lei leh, huai mi in bel a ne thei dia, a inn a piangte’n leng a ne thei sam ding uh.
Siampu tanu in gamdang mi a kitenpih leh thillat siangthoute a ne ding ahi kei.
Himahleh siampu tanu in ta neilou in meithai in hiam, mak hiam a om a, a pa inn a, a kiknawn leh a nungak laimah bang in a pa nek dingte a nesam ding hi. Himahleh gamdang mi in a ne ding ahi kei.
Mi’n theilou a thil siangthou a nek leh amun nga a khen, mun khat a koih behlap dia, thil siangthou pen siampu kiang ah a pe ding hi.
Israel suante’n
Ahihkeileh, hiai thil siangthoute ne in a tatlekna uh mawh a kipuak ding uh, hiaite kei
Aron leh a tapate leh Israel inn kaw tengteng houpih inla, a kiang uah, Israel lak a teng, gamdang mi hiam, kuapeuh a thillat uh, haltum thillat dia
Santak na hihtheihna ding un bawng hiam, belam hiam, kel hiam, a pa gensiatbei na lat ding uh ahi.

Kuapeuh thuchiam hih buching ding hiam, amah utthua a thillat ding hiam, lemna thillat kithoihna a ganhon lak a hiam, a belamhon lak a hiam,
A mittaw, a guh tan, a khebai, meima nei, chibawk leh phak nei,
Amah ut thu a thillat ding in bawngpa hiam, belamnou hiam, a kan a val a om sahiang nei hiam, sahiang kimlou hiam bel na lan thei ding uh. Himahleh thuchiamna thillat ding in hiaite pom ahi kei ding.
A chiltang dup hiam, kitam hiam, keh hiam
Gamdang mi apan la in huaite lak a himhim na Pathian uh adia sehtuam an ding in na lan ding uh ahi kei. A siatna leh gensiat kaina a om ziak in pomsak theih ahi kei ding hi, chi in, a chi hi.

Huai ni mah a nekbei ding ahi, a zingchiang tan in bangmah na sit ding uh ahi kei. Kei

Ni guk sung nna nasem ding ua, a ni sagih ni khawlna Sabbath ahi a, khawmpi siangthou ahi. Hiai ni’n nna nasem ding uh ahi kei. Na tenna teng uah hiai
Ankuanglui hunbi, khawmpi siangthou, a hun geihgeih a na phuan ding uh hiaite ahi.

Pomsak theih na hihna ding un, aman buhphal pen
Buhphal na vei ni un belamnoupa, gensiatbei, kum khat a upa haltum thillat ding in
Tangbuang thillat bel tangbuang nel chi ephah mun sawm a khen, mun nih sathau a mek,

Na Pathian uh adia thillat na lat ma un, huai ma himhim in tanghou hiam, kan thoh hiam, an thak hitaleh na ne ding uh ahi kei. Hiai na tenna teng ua na suante zel uh tan a na tangtawn dan ding uh ahi.

Khawlni sagihveina zingsang apan ni sawmnga na sim ding ua,
Na tenna mun ua pan in ephah mun sawm a khen, mun nih a bawl, tanghou beu vei ding nih, tangbuang nel chi, silngou toh kan,
Tanghou lat toh kituak in belamnou sagih gensiatbei, kum khat a upa leh bawngtuai leh belampa nih na lan ding uh ahi. Huaite a tangbuang thillat uh leh a dawn thillat u toh,
Khelh thoihna ding in kelpa khat leh kilemna thillat kithoihna ding in belamnou a pa nih kum khat a upa na lat ding uh ahi.
Siampu in gah masa a bawl tanghou, belamnou nih toh
Huai ni mah na sep ding ua, nou ading in khawmpi siangthou ahi dia, nna himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei. Hiai na tenna teng uah na suante uh tan in tangtawn dan ding ahi.
Na lou ua buh na lak chiang un na lounawl zul uh lavek kei un. A sang leng na zong ding uh ahi kei. Mizawng leh gamdang mi adia na hawi sak ding uh ahi. Kei

Nna himhim na sem ding uh ahi kei;
A kha sagihna ni sawm ni Kilemna Ni ahi a; nou ading in khawmpi siangthou ahi ding. Na lungsimte uh zangsak unla,
Huai ni’n bang napeuh na sem ding uh ahi kei.

ma ah dohkan siangthou tung ah vual nih in, vual khat a guk tuaktuak in na chiang ding ahi.

Khawlni teng in
Hiai Aron leh a tapate a tuam ahi dia, Mun Siangthou ah a ne ding uh. Tangtawn dan ding a

kam apan thupawt ngakna in suangkulh ah a khum uhi.

min gense peuhmah hihlup ngeingei ding ahi. Mi tengteng in suang in a deng ngeingei ding uh ahi.

Huan
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, K’on gam piak ding na va tun chiang un,
Na lou uah kum guk sung thil na ching ding ua, na grephuan kum guk sung na satnou ding ua, a gahte na la ding uhi.
A kum sagih kum in gam khawl kinken na,
Na buhpou na la ding ahi kei, na keplouh grep na lou ding ahi kei. Gam khawl kinken na kum ahi ding ahi.
Gam khawl kum a te na nektawm ding uh ahi dia; nang, na sikha leh na sikhanu, na kilohmi, na kiang a teng gamdangmi ading ahi.
Na bawnghon, na gam a ganta adia nektawm ding ahi.
Khawl kum, kum sagih na sim dia, kum sagih mun sagih ahi ding a; khawl kum, kum sagih sung kum sawmli leh kua ahi ding hi.
Huaikhit kha sagihna, ni sawm ni’n pengkul ngaihtak in na vialmut sak dia; Kilemna Ni in na gam tengteng uah pengkul na vialmut sak ding uhi.

Kum sawmngana na kipahpih ding ua, gamsung tengteng ah, huai a tengtengte kiang ah noplenna thu na phuang ding uhi. Nou ading in Jubili ahi dia; michih in noumau a chiat na neinawn ding uh. Michih amah inkuan ah a tengnawn ding ahi.
Huai kum sawmngana pen nou ading in Jubili ahi dia; bangmah na ching kei ding ua, a pou leng na lakei ding ua, keplouh grep gah leng na lou ding uh ahi kei.
Jubili a hih ziak in nou ading in siangthou ahi dia, na lou ua thil gahte na ne ding uhi.
Hiai Jubili kum in michih kiang ah amah a mah na pe kiknawn ding uh ahi.
Na invengte kiang a banghiam na khot a, na invengte kiang a banghiam na lei in leng kikhem in kinekna lemtang in na zang ding uh ahi kei.
Jubili khit a kum zah bangzel in na invengte thil na lei dia, buh leh bal tun kum tamdan dungzui in na kiang ah a zuak ding ahi.
A kum tam dan dungzui zel in aman na khangsak dia, a kum tawm dan dungzui in aman na kiamsak ding ahi. Buhlehbal tunkum tam dungzui a na kiang ah zuak lah ahi ngal a.
Na kikhem ding uh ahi kei. Na Pathian na lau ding uh ahi. Kei
Huaiziak in, ka thusehte zui in ka vaihawmte na pom ding uh ahi. Huchi in huai gam ah bittak in na teng ding uhi.
Gam in gah a suah dia, niang leh tai a ne in na ta ding ua, bittak in na vateng ding uhi.
Ahihleh, a kum sagih kum in bang ka neta ding ua? Ngai dih, bangmah lah ka ching kei ua, ka thil tungte uh lah ka la sam kei ua, na chih uleh,
A kum guk kum in ka vualzawlna na tung ua tung ding in thu ka pedia, kum thum sung ading gah a suah ding hi.
A kum giat kum in buh na ching ding ua, haichi na pawi sung un buh luite na ne ding ua, kum kua kum tan, a hongthak nawn matan in a luite na ne ding uhi.
Tangtawn a dia gam pen khotden ding ahi kei, gam lah kei a ahi ngal a. Noute mikhual, a khohloh lel na hi uh.
Na gamluah tengteng uh, tatkik na phal ding uh ahi.
Na unau a hong gentheih a, a gam khenkhat a zuak leh a tanau naipen a hong kuan dia, a unau gam zuaksa a tan ding ahi.
Mi’n tatsak ding mi neikei mahleh a hong navaka tatna khop a neih leh,
a zuak kum sut henla, a zuaknapa kiang ah a val pe nawn hen; huchi in a gam a luahnawn ding.
Amah adia a tatkiktheih nawn kei leh, a khotsa pen Jubili kum tan in a leipa khut ah om hen. Jubili kum in a pawt nawn dia, aman a gam a luah nawn ding hi.
Mi’n kulhnei khua a tenna inn a zuak leh a zuak apan kum khat sung in a tatnawn theihna hamphatna a nei ding hi. Kum khat sung in a tanthei nawn ding hi.
Kum khat sung a a tattheihkei leh, kulhnei khua a a inn pen tangtawn in a suante zel tan in leng a leimi a ahi den ding ahi, Jubili chiang in leng a pawt tuankei ding hi.
Kulh neilou khua a innte singtang gam bang a ngaih ahi dia, tattheih ahi dia, Jubili chiang in a pawt ding.
Himahleh Levimite khua, a tantuam khua ua innte Levimite’n chiklaipeuh in leng a tanthei ding uhi.
Levi chite lak a mi’n a tat kei leh zuaksa inn leh a tantuan khua pen Jubili chiang in a pawt ding. Levi chite khua a innte Israel suante lak a a tantuan uh ahi.
A khokim ua loute zuaktheih ahi kei ding, tangtawn a tantuan uh ahi.
Na unau a hong gentheih a, nang a hong belh leh na kep ding ahi. Mikhual ahihkeileh khualzin bang himahleh amah na kiang ah na tengsak ding ahi.
Amah apan dangka hiam, thil hiam, a pung laken, himahleh, Pathian lau in, na unau na kiang a a ten theihna ding in.
A pung delh in na sum na leitawi sak ding ahi kei.
Kei
Na unau a hong gentheih a, na kiang a a hong puklut leh sikha bang a na zat ding ahi kei.
Kilohmi bang leh na kiang a tengsam bang in na kiang ah a teng dia, Jubili kum tan in nangmah na a sem ding ahi.
Huaikhit in na kiang apan a pawt dia, amah leh a tate, amau inkuan ngei ah a lutnawn ding uh, a pi leh pute in leh lou a luahnawn ding uhi.
Aigupta gam apan ka pikhiak, ka sikhate ahi ngal ua, sikha dia zuakkhiak ding ahi kei uh.
Huhamtakin a tung uah gamta kenla; na Pathian lau zaw in.
Sikhanu leh sikhapa na neih dingte na kim ua nam lak a mi, sikhanu leh sikhapa dia na lei dingte ahi ding uhi.
Na lak ua teng gamdangmi leh na gam ua piang a inkawte uh lak a mite leng na lei theisam ding ua; amau na thilneih a suak ding uh.

Na nung ua na tate uh gouluah ding in, a thilneih ding un na bawl ding uhi. Huai lak a mite na tangtawn sikha ding in na nei ding uh. Himahleh na unau Israel suante lak ah huham tak in na gamtang ding uh ahi kei.
Gamdangmi hiam, na kiang ua teng kuahiam hong hau a, a kiang a na unaupa a hong gentheih a, na kiang a gamdangmi hiam, na kiang a teng kiang hiam kiang a amah leh amah a kizuak khiak leh,
khotsa ahihnungin leng a kitankik thei ding hi; a unaute lak a khat in amah a tan thei ding hi.
A pangak in hiam, a pangak tapa in hiam a tan thei ding; a chipihte lak a a tanau nai in hiam a tan thei ding hi. Amah leng a hong hauh nawn leh a kitanthei ding hi.
A puklutnapa toh a puklut apan Jubili kum nawn ding sutkhawm uhenla, a puklut man, a kum omdan in ahi dia; kiloh sikha dia goih sut bangzel a sut sak ahi ding hi.
Kum tampi a omlai leh a tatna man pen a belh sung hu toh kituak a piak kiknawn ding ahi.
Jubili kum tunna ding kum tawmchik kia omlai ahihleh sut khawm uhenla; a om kum tam dan dungzui in a tatman a pekik ding ahi.
Kum khat bizel a goih kilohmi bang in a bel ding hi. A belhpa a tung a huhamtak a na gamtat saklouh ding ahi.
Hiai kumte a tat ahihkeileh, Jubili kum in a pawt ding, amah leh a tate teng toh.
Israel suante lah ka sikhate ahi ngal ua, Aigupta gam apan ka pikhiak, ka sikhate ahi uh. Kei
Milimte na kibawl ding uh ahi kei. Milim bawltawm suangphuh na dingsak ding uh ahi kei. Biak ding in na gam uah suang milim na phut ding uh ahi sam kei. Kei
Ka Sabbathte na tang ding ua, ka Mun Siangthou na zahtak ding uh ahi. Kei
Ka thusehte na mang ding ua, ka thupiakte pom a na man uleh vuahtui a hunhun in k’on zusak ding hi.
Lei in thil a hon piangsak dia, gam a singte’n gah a suang ding uhi.
Na phual ua buh in grep loh hun a banpha dia, na grep loh hun un thilchin hun a ban pha ding hi. Na tanghou uh niang leh tai in na ne ding ua, na gam uah bittak in na teng ding uh.
Hiai gam ah muanna ka omsak dia, na lum ding ua, kuamah in a hon lausak kei ding. Gamsa hoihloute hiai gam apan ka hawlmang dia, namsau in na gam uh a tuansuak sam kei ding hi.
Na melmate uh na delh ding ua, na ma uah namsau a thah in a om ding uh.
Mi nga in za khat na delh ding ua, za khat in sing khat na delh ding uh. Na melmate uh na ma uah namsau a thah in a om ding uhi.
K’on deihsak dia, chi tampi k’on suangsak ding hi. Na lak uah ka thukhun ka hihkip ding.
Sawtpi na kepsa, a luite na ne ding ua, a thak koihna ding in a luite na lakhe ding uh.
Na lak uah ka biakbuk ka omsak dia; ka hinna in noute a hon kih kei ding.
Na lak uah ka teng dia, na Pathian uh ka hidia, nou leng ka mite na hi ding uh.
Kei
Himahleh ka thu pom lou a, hiai thupiak tengteng na zuih kei ua, ka thusehte na deihkei ua,
na hinna un ka vaihawmte a huat a, ka thupiak tengteng zui lou a, ka thukhun na bohsiat uleh ken leng na tung uah hiai ka hih ding.
Na tung uah thil lauhuai, na hinna uh netum leh na mit uh hihsia kumzawnna leh khodam ka lengsak ding hi. Na haichite uh bangmahlou dia ching na hi ding ua, na melmate un a ne zel ding uh.
Na tung uah ka mai ka gumsak dia, na melmate uh ma ah na vuallel ding uh. Nou hon hawte’n na tung uah vai a hawm ding ua, kuamah delhlouh in na tai ding uhi.
Huchi pipi a leng ka thu na pom kei lai uleh na khelhnate uh ziak in sagihvei k’on gawt lai ding hi.
Na thilhihtheihna kiotsakna uh ka hihse dia, na tung ua van sik bang in leh na nuai ua lei sumsan bang in ka bawl ding.
Na tha uh na sengthawn lel ding ua; na gam un thil a piangsak kei dia, gam a singte’n gah a suang sam kei ding uh.
Kei kalh lam a na om ua, ka thu na pom kei uleh na khelhna uh dungzui in a mun sagih in na tung uah gawtna ka tungsak ding.
Na lak uah gamsate k’on sawl dia, huaite’n na tate uh a hon laksak ding ua, na gantate uh a hih mangthang ding ua, na hong tawm mahmah ding ua, na lampite uh nutsiat in a om ding hi.
Hiaite tawn a k’on bawlhoihna na pom tuankei ua, kei kalh a na omlai lai uleh,
Ken leng nou k’on kalh dia, kei mahmah in na khelhnate uh ziak in sagihvei k’on gawt ding hi.

Huchi in na tung uah namsau ka lengsak dia, huai in ka thukhun na palsat uh phu a la ding hi. Noumau khosung chiat a na kibawm khawm chiang un, na lak uah hi ka lengsak dia, melma khut a piak na hi ding uhi.
Na muan pen uh tanghou ka beisak chiang in, numei sawm in thuk khat ah na tanghou uh a emkhawm ding ua, na tanghou uh buk chitchiat in a honpe ding ua; na ne ding ua, na kham tuankei ding uhi.
Huchi tengteng a leng ka thu na pom kei ua, kei kalh a na om lailai uleh hehtak in noute k’on kalh ding hi.
Na khelhnate uh ziak in sagihvei, kei mahmah in k’on gawt ding hi.
Na tapate uh sa na ne ding ua, na tanute uh sa na ne nalai ding uhi.
Na mun sangte uh ka chimsak dia, na milimte uh ka puksak dia, na luang uh na milimte uh luang tung ah ka pai ding. Ka hinna in nou a hon kih ding hi.
Na khuate uh ka gamsak dia, na mun siangthoute uh ka hawmsak dia, na gimlimte uh ka dik kei ding hi.
Gam ka hihse ding a; huai a om na melmate un lamdang a sa ding uh.
Namdangte lak ah k’on dalhsak dia, nou hon delhzui ding in namsau ka phawi ding. Huchi in na gam uh a hawm dia, na khuate uh a gam ding.
A hawm sungteng leh na melmate uh gam a na om sungteng uh gam in a khawlnite a tang dia, a khawlnite ah nuam a sa ding uhi.
A hawm sungteng in a khawl ding; asung a na tenlai ua a khawllouh ziak un.
Na lak ua mi omsunte, a melmate uh gam ah a lungtang sung uah bahna ka omsak ding hi. Nahthel ging in leng a delh dia, namsau apan taikek bang in a taikek ding ua, kuamah delhlouh in a puk ding uh.
Kuamah delhlouh in namsau ma a taikek bang in a kipal puk lem lum ding ua; na melmate uh dal ding in hatna himhim na neikei ding uh.
Namdangte lak ah na mangthang ding ua, na melmate gam in nou a hon negai ding.
Na lak ua omsunte na melmate uh gam ah a thulimlouhna ziak un, a muih hiaihiai ding ua; a pi leh pute un a thulimlouhnate uh ziak a a muih loh bang un amau leng a muihloh sam ding uhi.
Ka tung a a khelh ziak leh a thulimlouhna uh leh a pi leh pute thulimlouhna leh kei kalh a a om ziak un,

Ken leng amau ka kalh a, a melmate uh gam a ka omsak dante a kitheihmohbawl kei ding ua; a sumlouh lungtang ua a kiniamkhiak ua, a thulimlouhna uh ziak a ka gawtna a pom uh leh, Jakob kiang a ka thukhun ka theigige ding hi.
Isak leh Abraham kiang a ka thukhunte ka theigige ding hi.

A gam mah leng ka theigige ding hi. Gam in leng a kihep mangsan dia, amau omlou in a hawmsung in a khawlnite ah nuam a sa ding. Ka vaihawmte a deihlouh ziak uh leh a hinna un ka thusehte a muh noplouh nak ziak in, a thulimlouhna uh gawtna a pom ding uhi.
Huchi pipi in leng, a melmate uh gam a a om un amaute ka paimang kei dia, amaute hih mangthang ding leh ka thukhun bohse ding in amaute ka kih kei ding. Kei
A Pathian uh ka hih theihna dia namchih mitmuh a Aigupta gam apan ka pikhiak, a pipute uh thukhun amaute ziak in ka theigige zaw ding hi. Kei
Hiaite Sinai tang a Mosi zang a amah leh Israel suante kal a
Huan,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, Mi khat in midangte
Pasal ahihleh na sehdan ding
kum sawmnih leh kum sawmguk
kikal a upa, Mun Siangthou a
sekel buk dungzui in
dangka sekel sawmnga hu ahi ding ahi.
Numei ahihleh na sehdan ding sekel sawmthum ahi ding ahi.
Kum nga leh kum sawmnih kikal a upa ahihleh,
na sehdan ding pasal,
sekel sawmnih, numei,
sekel sawm ahi ding ahi.
Kha khat leh kum nga kikal a upa ahihleh,
na sehdan ding pasal,
dangka sekel nga,
numei, sekel thum ahi ding.
Kum sawmguk a kipan a tunglam ahihleh,
na sehdan ding pasal,
sekel sawmlehnga,
numei, sekel sawm ahi ding.
Himahleh na sehzah pe zoulou khop a mizawng ahihleh siampu kiang ah a vapai dia, siampu in a nasep ding; thuchiam mi zoh hun bangbang a na sep ding ahi.
Thillat,
A hih lamdang ding ahi kei, a hoihpen, a sia in, a siapen a hoih in a kheng ding ahi sam kei. Gan pen gan mah a a khen teitei leh a nih in a siangthou ding uhi.
Gan sianglou,
Siampu in a hoih dan bang in a man hun a na sep ding. Siampu in a seh bangbang ahi zel ding hi.
Himahleh a tat nawn taktak ding leh na sehzah mun nga a khen, mun khat a behlap ding ahi.
Mi’n a inn
A lan mi in a inn pen a tatnawn ding leh aman ding a na seh zah mun nga a khen, mun khat a behlap ding hi. Huchi in amah a ahi nawn ding hi.
Mi’n a gam a lou a khen
A lou pen Jubili kum apan lat ahihleh na seh bang ahi toupek ding.
Jubili kum nung a lat ahihleh bel siampu in Jubili tun nawnna ding kum dungzui zel in aman a sep dia, na seh dan apan a kiam hun bawl ahi ding.
A lan mi in a tatnawn taktak ding leh aman na sehzah mun nga a khen, mun khat a behlap dia, amah a ahi nawn ding hi.
Lou pen a tat noplouh hiam, midang kiang a khot hiam ahihleh tatnawn theih ahi kei ding.
Jubili kum a a pawtnawn hun in loupen
Amah lou him hilou, a leisa lou, mi’n
Jubili kum tan in na seh dan bang in siampu in a man a seh sak dia, na seh bang in
Jubili kum in a leinapa, a gamneipa mah in a tang nawn ding.
Na sehdan tengteng Mun Siangthou sekel bangzel ahi dia, gerah sawmnih sekel khat ahi ding.
Ganta lak a piang masapen, a pian masak pen ziak a
Gan sianglou ahihleh na seh dan bang a tat ding ahi dia, a mun nga a khen, mun khat a behlap ding hi. Tat ahihkeileh, na seh dan bang a khot ding ahi.
Mi’n a neih lak a bangpeuh, mihing hi in, ganta hiam, a neihsa lou hitaleh,
Kuapeuh si dia vaihawmsak, mihing lak apan manthatsak ding, tat ding ahi kei, amah sihsak ngeingei ding ahi.
Gam sung a sawm a khat peuhmah, gamsung a haichi hitaleh, sing gah hitaleh,
Mi’n a sawm a khat a tat nop leh, mun nga a khen, mun khat a behlap ding ahi.
Bawng leh belam sawm a khat thu ah, ganvulmi chiang a chiamtehsa nangawn leng, a sawmna zel
Huai gan hoih hia, hoihlou, a enchian ding ahi kei, a khek ding leng ahi sam kei. A khek leh, a khek pen leh a khekna pen leng a nih un siangthou ahi ding ua; tat ding ahi kei hi.
Hiaite Israel suante adia
Aigupta gam a kipan a hongpawt uh a kum nihna, a kha nihna, a ni khat ni’n Sinai gamdai ah Kihoupihna puanin ah
Israel suan omkhawm tengteng, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in pasal tengteng simvek in; a chi hi.
Kum sawmnih apan a tunglam Israel lak a galdou thei chiang peuhmah nang leh Aron in a pawlpawl in na simvek ding uh ahi.
Na kiang ah namchih lak a khat, inkuan a lupen zel a om ding uh ahi.
Hiaite na kiang a om dingte min ahi:
Reuben nam a Shedeur tapa Elizur,
Simeon nam a Zurisadai tapa Shelumiel.
Judah nam a Amminadab tapa Nahson.
Issakar nam a Zuar tapa Nethaneel.
Zebulun nam a Helon tapa Eliab.
Joseph tate, Ephraim nam a Ammihud tapa Elisama. Manasseh nam a Pedazur tapa Gamaliel.
Benjamin nam a Gideoni tapa Abidan.
Dan nam a Ammisaddai tapa Ahiezer.
Asher nam a Okran tapa Pagiel.
Gad nam a Deuel tapa Eliasaph.
Naphtali nam a Enan tapa Ahira.
Hiaite mipite tel, a pi leh pute uh nam a lupen Israel inkuan a lupente ahi uh, chi in.
Mosi leh Aron in huai mi a min uh a lohte a pi uhi.
Mi tengteng a kha nihna, ni khat ni’n a samkhawm vek ua; a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam teng a pipute uh min a taklang uhi.
Mosi thu a piak bang in Sinai gamdai ah a simta uhi.
Israel tapa upapen Reuben tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in pasal kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Reuben nam, a simte uh sing li leh sang guk leh za nga ahi.
Simeon tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in pasal kum sawmnih apan a tunglam galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Simeon nam, a simte uh sing nga leh sang kua leh za thum ahi uh.
Gad tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in pasal kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Gad nam a, a simte uh sing li leh sang nga leh za guk leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Judah tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Judah nam a, a simte uh sing sagih leh sang li leh za guk ahi uh.
Issakar tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Issakar nam a, a simte uh sing nga leh sang li leh za li ahi uh.
Zebulun tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh kizomdan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Zebulun nam a, a simte uh sing nga leh sang sagih leh za li ahi uh.
Joseph tate lak a Ephraim tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh tam dan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou thei teng a sim uh.
Ephraim nam a, a simte uh sing li leh za nga ahi uh.
Manasseh tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh tam dan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou thei teng a sim uh.
Manasseh nam a, a simte uh, sing thum leh sang nih leh za nih ahi uh.
Benjamin tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh tam dan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Benjamin nam a, a simte uh, sing thum leh sang nga leh za li ahi uh.
Dan tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh tam dan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Dan nam a, a simte uh, sing guk leh sang nih leh za sagih ahi uh.
Asher tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh tam dan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Asher nam a, a simte uh, sing li leh sang khat leh za nga ahi uh.
Naphtali tate suante a chichi in, a inkuan kuan in, a min uh tam dan bangzel in kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng a sim uh.
Naphtali nam a, a simte uh, sing nga leh sang thum leh za li ahi uh.
Hiaite Mosi leh Aron in Israel lupen sawmlehnih, inkuan a lupente toh a simte uh ahi.
Huchi in Israel suan a inkuan kuan ua kum sawmnih apan a tunglam, galdou theiteng, Israel gam a te sim ahi uhi.
A sim teng uh nuai guk leh sang thum leh za nga leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Levite pipute a sim telkei uh.
Mosi a houpih a,
Levi chi na sim tel ding ahi kei, Israel mite lak ah na sim tel ding ahi sam kei.
Levite theihpihna biakbuk kemmite leh van tengteng kemmite dia sehzawk ding ahi. Biakbuk a van tengteng a zawng ding ua, a kem ding ua, biakbuk a kimvel in a omkhum ding uhi.
Biakbuk malam a a pai chiang in Levite’n a phel ding ua; biakbuk kaihding chiang in Levite mah in a kainawn ding uh. Namdang hong kigolh peuhmah hihlup ding ahi.
Israel suante’n amau mun chiat ah, a pawlpawl in a tam dan uh dungzui zel in a puaninte uh a kai ding uh.
Himahleh Levite’n Israel suante khawmpi tung a hehna a om louhna ding in theihpihna biakbuk kimvel ah a kaiding uhi. Levite’n theihpihna biakbuk a kep ding uh ahi.
Huchibang in Israel suante’n
Huan,
Israel suante’n a inkuan chiamtehna uh takchiat in a pawl uh hih dan bang in a puanin uh a kai ding uhi. Kihoupihna puanin nga chiat in a kimvel in a kai ding uhi.
Ni suahna lam suahlam pang ah a pawl uh tam dan dungzui zel a puanin kai dingte Judah pawlte ahi ding ua; Judah tate lak a lupen ding Aminadab tapa Nashon ahi.
Sima ompawlte tam dan, sing sagih leh sang li leh za guk ahi uh.
Amah zom a puanin kai dingte Issakar chi ahi ding a; Issakar tate lak a lupen ding Zuar tapa Nethaneel ahi.
Sima om, pawlte tam dan sing nga leh sang li leh za li ahi uh.
Zebulun chite, Zebulun tate lak a lupen ding Helon tapa Eliab ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing nga leh sang sagih leh za li ahi uh.
A pawl uh tam dan bangzel in sim a om Judah inkuante nuai khat leh sing giat leh sang guk leh za li ahi uh. Amaute’n ma a kai zel ding uh.
A pawl uh tam dan bangzel in a simlam pang ah Reubente pawl a om ding ua; Reuben tate lak a lupen Sedeur tapa Elizur ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing li leh sang guk leh za nga ahi uh.
A zom a dingte Simeon chi ahi ding ua; Simeon tate lak a lupen ding Zurisadai tapa Selumiel ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing nga leh sang kua leh za thum ahi uh.
Huaikhit in Gad chite ahi ding ua, Gad tate lak a lupen ding Reuel tapa Eliasaph ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing li leh sang nga leh za guk leh sawmnga ahi uh.
Reubente tam dan nuai khat leh sing nga leh sang khat leh za li leh sawmnga ahi uh, a pawl uh dungzui in. A zom in amau a pawtkhe ding uhi.
Kihoupihna puanin ah a kipan khe ding ua, Levite a lai ah a om ding ua, a omna thu zil bangzel in a pawlpawl in a paichiat ding uh.
A pawl tam danthu in a tumlam pang ah Ephraimte a om ding ua, Ephraim tate lak a lupen ding Amihud tapa Eliasam ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing li leh za nga ahi uh.
A zom in Manasseh chi ahi ding a; Manasseh tate lak a lupen ding Pedazur tapa Gamaliel ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing thum leh sang nih leh za nih ahi uh.
A zom nawn in Benjamin chite, Benjamin tate lak a lupen ding Gideoni tapa Abidan ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing thum leh sang nga leh za li ahi uh.
Ephraimte tam dan nuai khat leh sang giat leh za khat ahi. A zom nawn in a paikhe ding uhi.
A pawl uh tam dan bangzel in Dante a mallam pang ah a om ding ua; Dan tate lak a lupen ding Amisadai tapa Ahiezer ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing guk leh sang nih leh za sagih ahi uh.
A zom a puanin kai dingte Asher chi ahi ding a; Asher tate lak a lupen ding Okran tapa Pagiel ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing li leh sang khat leh za nga ahi uh.
A zom nawn in Naphtali chite; Naphtali tate lak a lupen ding Enan tapa Ahira ahi.
Sima om, a pawlte tam dan, sing nga leh sang thum leh za li ahi uh.
Dante tam dan nuai khat leh sing nga leh sang sagih leh za guk ahi ua; amau a pawlpawl a pawtkhia in a nanung pen ahi ding uhi.
Hiai Israel suante inkuan teng a mi a simte uh, tam dan ahi a, nuai guk leh sang thum leh za nga leh sawmnga a pha uhi.
Levite Israel suante lak a sim tel ahi kei uhi,
Huchibang in Israel suante’n a hih ua;
Aron tapate min a upapen Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar ahi.
Hiaite siampu dia thaunilh, siampu nasem ding a sehtuam, Aron tapate min ahi.
Nadab leh Abihu ahihleh Sinai gamdai a mei zatlouh ding a chih,
Levi chite, siampu Aron kiang ah pi inla, a na a septheihna ding un a kiang ah omsak in.
Amau biakbuk a nasem in Kihoupihna puanin chin ah amah leh khawmpi tengteng ading in na a sem ding uhi.
Kihoupihna puanin van tengteng a kem ding ua, Israel suante ading in biakbuk ah a sem ding uh.
Levite Aron leh a tapate kiang ah na pe ding a; Israel suante lak a kipan amah kiang a piak ahi uhi.
Aron leh a tapate na sep ding a, a siampu hihna na a sem nilouh ding uh. Midang hong kigolh a om leh hihlup ding ahi, a chi hi.
Ngai in, Levite Israel suante lak apan Israel suante tachil sul hong masapen sik leh tang a keimah ngei in ka lak ahi uh. Huaiziak in, Levite kei a ahi ding uhi.
Piang masa ta tengteng kei a ahi. Aigupta gam a piang masa tengteng ka thah ni’n Israelte lak a piang masa tengteng, a mihing leh gan tan in kei a tuam ding in ka kham ahi. Kei a ahi ding uh. Kei,
Sinai gamdai ah
Levi tate a inkuan kuan un, akhang akhang un sim inla; pasal peuhmah kha khat apan a tunglam teng na sim ding ahi, a chi hi.
Mosi in a hih ding a thupiak bang in
Levi tapate min: Gershon, Kohath leh Merari ahi.
Amau suangpa Gershon tapate min Libni leh Shimei ahi.
Amau suangpa Kohath tapate min Amram, Izhar, Hebron leh Ujiel ahi.
Amau suangpa Merari tapate min Mali leh Musi ahi. Hiaite a inkuan uh bangzel a Levi suante ahi uh.
Gershon, Libnite leh Simeite suangpa ahi a, hiaite Gershonte suante ahi uhi.
Pasal tengteng kha khat apan a tunglam a simte uh sang sagih leh za nga ahi uhi.
Gershonte suante’n a puanin uh biakbuk tumlam pang ah a kai ding uhi.
Gershonte inkuan a lupen Lael tapa Eliasaph ahi.
Gershon tate’n Kihoupihna puanin a a sep ding uh ahihleh biakbuk leh puanin, a tung, Kihoupihna puanin leh a kongkhak puanzak kep ahi ding a;
a intual puanzakte, biakbuk chin a, a intual kongkhak puanzak leh maitam kim a zat ding khau tengteng toh leng ahilai ding hi.
Kohath bel Amramte, Izharte, Hebronte leh Ujielte suangpa ahi a; hiai teng Kohath suante ahi uhi.
Pasal tengteng kha khat apan a tunglam a simdan bang un sang giat leh za guk ahi ua, Mun Siangthou a kem ding uhi.
Kohath tapate suante’n biakbuk simlam pang ah a puanin a kai ding uhi.
Kohathte suante inkuan a lupen ding Ujiel tapa Eliazaphan ahi.
A kep dingte: bawm, dohkan, sathau, khawnvak koihna, maitam, Mun Siangthou a nasepna tuium-belsuan tengteng, puanzak leh huai a nasepna thil tengteng ahi.
Siampu Aron tapa Eleazar Levite lupen ahi ding a, Mun Siangthou kemmite a makaih ding hi.
Merari, Malite leh Musite suangpa ahi. Hiai Merari suante ahi uh.
Pasal tengteng kha khat apan a tunglam a simdan bang un sang guk leh za nih ahi uh.
Merari suante inkuan a lupen Abihail tapa Zuriel ahi a; biakbuk mallam pang ah a puanin a kai ding uhi.
Merari tapate kep ding a sehte biakbuk khuam lepkhawm, bang kal, a khuamte, a kingakna khuak kuak, a vanzat tengteng leh nasepna vanzat tengteng ahi uh.
A kongpi umna khuamte, a kingakna khuakkuakte, a kilhbelhna leh a khaute toh leng ahilai ding hi.

Biakbuk suahlam pang Kihoupihna puanin chin a, nisuahna lam a puanin kai ding ahihleh Mosi leh Aron leh a tapa ahi ding ua, Mun Siangthou ah Israel suante a tuam ding in a kul peuhpeuh a sem ding uh. Namdang hong kigolh peuhmah thah ding ahi, a chi hi.
thupiak a Levite a inkuan kuan ua pasal tengteng kha khat apan a tunglam Mosi leh Aron in a sim teng uh sing nih leh sang nih ahi uh.
Israel suante lak a piang masa teng sik in kei ading in Levite n’on laksak dia, Israel suante gan tengteng a piang masapen sik in Levite gante, n’on laksak ding ahi, kei
Mosi in
A min uh kizom bangzel in kha khat apan a tunglam piang masa pasal teng a sim a, sing nih leh sang nih leh za nih leh sawmsagih leh thum ahi uh.
Israel suante lak a piang masa teng sik in Levite la inla, a gan uh sik in Levite gan; Levite kei a ahi ding ua; kei
Levite sang a tamzawte lak ah tatding in Israel suante piang masa za nih leh sawmsagih leh thum la in.
Sekel nga chiat na la ding ahi; Mun Siangthou a sekel bang in na la ding hi, Sekel bel gerah sawmnih ahi:
A tatna sum val Aron leh a tapate na piak ding ahi, a chi hi.
Levite tatte ban ah a tatna sum uh Mosi in a la hi.
Israel suante piang masate lak apan sum a la a; sum siangthou sekel bang in sang khat leh za thum leh sawmguk leh nga a la hi.
Mosi thu a piak,
Huan,
Levi tate lak a Kohath tate, a khang a khang un, a inkuan kuan un, simvek in,
Kum sawmthum apan a tunglam, kum sawmnga tan in nasepna, Kihoupihna puanin a sem ding teng.
Kihoupihna puanin Mun Siangthou pen a Kohath tapate nasep ding hiaite ahi.
Giahphual a suan ding teng un Aron, a tapate toh a lut ding ua, Mun Siangthou puanzak a hawkkhe ding ua, huai in thukhun bawm a khuh ding uh.
Huai pen ngalvang vun in a khuh ding ua, puandum buang in leng a khuh ding ua, a zawnna chiang a thuah ding uhi.
Etsakna tanghou dohkan tung ah puandum buang a phah ding ua, huai ah kuangte, keute, belhbute leh noute butkhiakna ding a koih ding uhi. Tatlak lou in tanghou koih huai ah a om ding ahi.
Huai pen puansan in a khuh ding ua; a khuhna ngalvang vun in a khuh ding uh, a zawnna chiang a thuah ding uhi.
Vaksak khawnvak koihna leh huai adia a zat ding ua khawnvakte, a taitehte, a vu koihnate, thau bing tengteng puandum buang in a khuh ding uhi.
Huai leh a vanzat tengteng a khuhna ngalvang vun a khuh in a zawnna ah a koih ding uhi.
Dangkaeng maitam puandum buang in a khuh ding ua, a khuhna ngalvang vun in a khuh nawn ding uh, a zawnna chiang a thuah ding uhi.
Mun siangthou, a vanzat leh tuium-belsuan tengteng a la vek ding ua, puandum buang in a tun ding ua, a khuhna ngalvang vun in a khuh ding uh, a zawnna ah a koih ding uhi.
Maitam a meivu a lamang ding ua, a tung ah puansandup a phah ding uhi.

A tung ah a nasep vialvialna uh tuium-belsuan tengteng, mei laknate, sa thukna sikkhutte, vutluahnate, tuikuangte leh maitam tuium-belsuan tengteng a koih ding uhi. A khuhna ngalvang vun in a khuh ding ua, a zawnna a bulh ding uh.

Aron leh a tapate’n Mun Siangthou leh Mun Siangthou van tengteng om mun suan dia a khuh khit chiang un; huaikhit chiang in a zawng ding in Kohath tapate a hongpai ding uhi. Himahleh thil siangthou himhim a khoih ding uh ahi kei, huchilou in zaw a si kha ding uhi. Hiaite Kihoupihna puanin a Kohath tapate nasep ding ahi.
Siampu Aron tapa Eleazar sep ding, det ding thau, gim namtui, niteng a tangbuang thillat, nilhchi thau, biakbuk, huai a thil om tengteng, Mun Siangthou leh a vante ngaihtuah ahi, a chi hi.
Kohath suan inkuan zaw Levite lak apan satkhe kei un.
Himahleh thil siangthoute khoihlou a, silou a a om theihna ding uh hichibang ahi. Aron leh a tapate lut uhenla, a sep ding uh leh a tantuam ding chiat uh sehsak uhen.
Himahleh a kikhuh lai teng thil siangthoute en ding in lut kei uhen, a lut uleh a si ding uh, a chi hi.
Gershon tapate leng a inkuan kuan un, a khang a khangun simvek in.
Kum sawmthum apan a tunglam kum sawmnga a upa tan in nasepna Kihoupihna puanin a semthei ding teng zah simvek in.
Gershon suante tantuam naseplam leh puaklam hiai ahi.
Biakbuk puanzakte, kihoupihna puanin, a khuhnate, a tung khuhna ngalvang vun, Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak puanzak;
intual puanzakte, intual kongkhak puanzakte, a biakbuk leh maitam bul a, a khaute leh a vanzat tengteng uh toh a pua ding ua, sep dia kiphamoh peuhmah a sem ding uh hi.
Gershon suante nasep, a seplam leh puaklam ah a tantuan tengteng uh Aron leh a tapate’n a sep ding ua; a hih ding uh banghiam nengneng tan a sehsakin huaite a sem ding uhi.
Huaite Kihoupihna puanin a Gershon suante nasep ahi. A hih ding uh siampu Aron tapa Ithamar seh ding ahi.
Merari tapate, a khang a khangun, a inkuan kuan un na sim ding ahi.
Kum sawmthum apan a tunglam kum sawmnga a upa tan in Kihoupihna puanin a sem ding zah na simvek ding ahi.
Kihoupihna puanin a a nasep uh, a tantuam ding uh hiaite ahi. Biakbuk khuam lepkhawmte, a bangkalte, a khuamte, a kingakna khuakkuakte;
a intual umna khuamte, a kingakna khuakkuakte, a kilhbelhnate, a khaute, a vanzat tengteng leh a vanzat dang tengteng puak. A min uh lou chiat in a tantuam ding uh na sehsak ding ahi.
Huaite siampu Aron tapa Ithamar heu a Kihoupihna puanin a Merari tapate suante’n a hih ding uh banghiam nengneng tan a a nasep dan ding uh ahi, a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi leh Aron leh khawmpi lak a lupente’n Kohathte tapate a khang a khangun, a inkuan kuanun a simta uhi.
Kihoupihna puanin a nasepna ading in michih nasem dia kisate, kum sawmthum apan a tunglam kum sawmnga a upa chiang.
Huaite a khang a khang a a sim uh sang nih leh za sagih leh sawmnga ahi uhi.
Hiaite ahi uh, Kihoupihna puanin a na sem Kohathte suan a simte uh, Mosi zang a
Hiaite a inkuan kuan a, a khang a khang ua kisim, Gershon tate ahi uh.
Kum sawmthum apan a tunglam kum sawmnga a upa tan Kihoupihna puanin nasepna adia michih nasem dia kisate.
A khang a khang a, a inkuan kuan ua a simte uh sang nih leh za guk leh sawmthum ahi uh.
Huaite ahi uh, Gershon tapate suante, Kihoupihna puanin a nasem teng,
Huaite a inkuan kuan ua, a khang a khang ua, Merari tapate a simte uh ahi,
Kihoupihna puanin a sem ding a nasem zah ding, kum sawmthum apan a tunglam kum sawmnga a upa chiang.
Huai a khang a khang a, a inkuan kuan ua a simte uh sang thum leh za nih ahi uh.
Hiaite Merari tapate suante a sim uh, Mosi zang a
Mosi leh Aron leh Israelte lupente’n a khang a khang a, a inkuan kuan a, a simte uh avek un huaiteng ahi uh.
Nasem ding leh Kihoupihna puanin a puakchi pawmi ding zah, kum sawmthum apan a tunglam kum sawmnga a upa chiang.
A simte uh sang giat leh za nga leh sawmgiat ahi uh.
Mosi zang a
Huan,
Israel suante a giahna mun ua kipan phak tengteng leh sipawt tengteng leh misi ziak a buah peuhmahte pawtkhe sakvek ding in thupia in.
Numei leh pasal pawt khesak in giahphual pua ah na koih ding ahi. A laitak a ka omna giahna mun a buahsak louhna ding un, a chi hi.
Huchi in Israel suante’n huchibang in a hih uhi, dainawl ah a koihkhia ua;
Israel suante kiang ah gen inla, pasal hiam, numei hiam in
a hihkhelhna ah thupha a tawi ding ahi. A hihkhelh man pen kim tak in adin dia, a mun nga a khen, mun khat a hihkhelh napa a piak behlap ding ahi.
Himahleh huai mi in khelh man piakna ding tanau nai a neihkei leh, khelhman pen
Israel suante thil siangthou vei thillat tengteng, siampu kiang a lat peuhmah siampu a tuam ding ahi.
