Michih thil siangthou siampu a tuam ahi dia, mite’n siampu a piak peuhmah a ma a tuam ahi ding, chi in, a chi hi.
Israel suante kiang ah gen inla, a kiang uah, Mi, a zi in a lampialsan a, mi’n amah luppih henla, a pasal in theikei leh,
huchibanga a om nilouh a, kihihthanghuai pipi a ki genkhe nai lou hi in, a thei kuamah omlou, mat louh hi leh;
a pasal thikthu hong sia a, a zi muangmoh a, siangthoulou mah a na hihleh, ahihkeileh a pasal thikthu hong sia a, a zi muangmoh a, a zi siangthou a na hihleh:

huai mi in a zi adia thillat barli buh tangbuang ephah mun sawm a khen, mun khat tawi in a zi siampu kiang ah a pi ding hi. A thillat ding sathau a buak ding ahi kei a, begaw leng a nuh ding ahi sam kei. Thikthusiatna tangbuang thillat, theihgigena thillat, thulimlouhna theihgigena ahi.
Siampu in a zi a pi dia,
Siampu in leibel in tui siangthou a la dia, biakbuk pialkhang a leivui a la dia, tui ah a khe ding hi.
Siampu in huai numei
Siampu in huai numei a kichiam sak dia, numei kiang ah, Na pasal hilou midang kuamah in hon luppih kei a, nitna lam a na lampial kei leh hamsia tungsak hiai tui kha apan na hul ding.
Himahleh lampialsan a na kihihnit a, na pasal lou mi kuahiam in a hon luppih leh na hul kei ding, a chi ding.
Siampu in numei a vau dia, a kichiamsak ding. Numei kiang ah siampu in,
Hamsia tungsak hiai tui na gil ah a lut dia, na gil a puaksak dia, na pheipi a zawsak ding. Numei in, Amen, Amen, a chi ding.
Siampu in huai hamsia thute laibu ah a gelh dia, tui kha ah a diah ding hi.
Hamsia tungsak tui kha numei a dawnsak ding ahi. Huchi in hamsia tungsak tui kha a gil sung ah a lut dia, a hong kha ding hi.
Siampu in thikthusiatna thillat tangbuang numei khut apan a la dia;
Siampu in tangbuang thillat theihgigena pham khat a la dia, maitam ah a hal dia, huaikhit in tui numei a dawnsak ding ahi.

Tui a dawnsak leh hichi ahi dia; a hong nit a, a pasal tung a thil hihkhial a na hihleh hamsia tungsak huai tui a gil sung ah a lut dia, a hong kha dia, a gil a hong puak dia, a pheipi a hongzaw dia; huchi in numei a chipihte lak a hamsia thuaknu a honghi ding hi.
Himahleh numei a nit kei a, a sianthou leh a hul dia, nau a pai thei ding.
Hiai zi lampial a, a pasal hilou midang toh kihihnin hiam,
ahihkeileh a pasal thikthu hong siat a a zi a hazat chiang a vaihawm ding dan ahi. Huchi in
Huchi in pasal pen thulimlouhna ah a hul dia, numei in a khelhna mawh a paw ding hi, chi in, a chi hi.
Huan,
Israel suante kiang ah gen inla, a kiang uah, pasal hiam, numei hiam in leng banghiam thuchiam tuam,
Uain thuk, zu thuk leh grep tui a dawn ding ahi kei a, grep mindup hiam, minvuai hiam leng a ne ding ahi sam kei hi.
A kihihtuam sungteng grepgui apan a tang leng, a hawng leng a ne ding ahi kei.
Kihihtuamna thu a chiam sungteng a lu leng a met louh hial ding ahi.
adia a kihihtuam sungteng misi luang a naih ding ahi kei.
A pa, a nu, a unaupa, a unaunu hiam sih thu ah leng a kihihnin ding ahi kei hi; Pathian adia a kihihtuamna in amah a gak ziak in.
A kihihtuam sung teng
A kiang ah mi hong siguih in, a kihihtuamna lutang hon hihnin kha taleh, a kisiansak ni, a ni sagih ni’n a lu a met ding ahi.
A ni giat ni’n Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak a siampu kiang ah vakhu kopkhat hiam, vapal nou kopkhat hiam a hontawi ding ahi.
Siampu in khat khelh thoihna ding in a lan dia, a khat pen haltum thillat ding in, misi ziak a a hihkhelhna ah kilemna a bawlsak ding. Huai ni mah in a lu a hih siangthou ding ahi.
A kihihtuamna nite Toupa kiang a pia in khelh thoihna ding in belamnoupa kum khat a upa a hontawi ding hi. Himahleh a kihihtuamna hihnit a hihtak ziak in a mangta ding uhi.
Hiai Nazaritmi dan ahi: A kihihtuamna ni a bukim chiang in Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak a pi ahi ding.
adia thillat ding in belampa kum khat a upa gensiatbei haltum thillat ding in khat, khelh thoihna ding in belamnounu kum khat a upa gensiatbei khat, lemna thillat ding in belampa gensiatbei khat,

silngou sohlouh tanghou leh tangbuang nel mahmah thau a mek tanghou leh tangbuang nel mahmah thau a mek tanghou beu leh thau a zut tanghoupek bawm khat, a tangbuang thillat ding uleh dawn thillat dingte toh a lan ding ahi.
Siampu in huaite
Belampa pen palbawm a tanghou silngou sohlouh toh lemna kithoih thillat
Nazaritmi in Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah a kihihtuamna lu a met dia, a kihihtuamna sam a ladia, lemna kithoihna thillat nuai a mei ah a haltum ding hi.
Siampu in belampa liang huan min leh bawm a silngou sohlouh tanghou khat leh silngou sohlouh tanghou pek khat a la dia, Nazaritmi in a kihihtuamna lu a met khit in a tawisak ding hi.
Siampu in vei thillat ding in
Hiai ahi, Nazaritmi thuchiam dan leh
Aron leh a tapate kiang ah, hichibang in Israel suante na vualzawl ding ahi. A kiang uah,
hon hehpih hen.
lungmuanna nou honpia hen,
chi in gen un, chi in a gen hi.
Huchibang a hih in Israel suante tung ah ka min tuansak ahi dia, amau ka vualzawl ding, a chi hi.
Mosi in biakbuk a lamkhit a, thau a nilhkhit a, a hih siangthou khit a, van tengteng leh maitam leh tuium-belsuan tengteng thaunilh a, a hih siangthou ni’n hichi ahi.
Israel intekpen, a inkuan ua intekpente’n thillat a lan ua, huaite a nam ua intekpente, a simte uh tung a omte ahi uh.
A thillatte uh kangtalai tung nei guk leh bawngtal sawmlehnih, intekpen nih in kangtalai khat zel, khat in bawngtal khat zel
Mosi a houpih a,
Biakbuk nasepna ding in a phatuam kha ding, na la chiat un; Levite, a nasep uh dungzui zel in na pe chiat ding hi, a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi in kangtalaite leh bawngtalte a la a, Levite khut ah a pia hi.
Kangtalai nih leh bawngtal li Gershon tapate a nasep uh dungzui zel in a pia hi.
Kangtalai li leh bawngtal giat, siampu Aron tapa Ithamar, Merari tapate a nasep uh dungzui in a pia hi.
Kohath tapate bel Mun siangthou a nasep amau a tuam hi a, a nasep uh a zawnthoh a hih ziak in a pe kei hi.
Intekpente’n thaunilh ni’n maitam latna dia a thillatte uh maitam bul ah a lan uhi.
Mosi kiang ah, Intekpen chih in maitam latna dia a thillat, a thillat uh amau tan hizel ding in a lan ding uhi, a chi hi.
Ni khat ni a thillat lan ding mi Judah chi Aminadab tapa Nashon ahi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik, dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding in thau helsa tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuaktuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding in bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding in keltal khat;
Lemna kithoihna thillat ding in bawngtal nih, belamtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga leh belamnoupa kum khat a upa nga ahi a, hiaite Aminadab tapa Nashon thillatte ahi uh.
Ni nih ni’n Issakar intekpente’n Zuar tapa Nethaneel in a lan hi.

A thillat ding in dangkasik kuang khat a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding in bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding in keltal khat;
Lemna kithoihna thillat ding in bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa nga a lan hi. Hiaite Zuar tapa Nethaneel thillatte ahi uh.
Ni thum ni’n Zebulun tate intekpen Helon tapa Eliab in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik, dangkasik belhbu khat; tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikima gik gimlima dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding in keltal khat;
Lemna kithoih thillat ding in bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa nga ahi. Hiaite Helon tapa Eliab thillatte ahi uh.
Ni li ni’n Reuben tate intekpen Sedeur tapa Elizur in a lan hi.
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat dia thau hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dimtuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoihna thillat ding in bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa nga ahi. Hiaite Sedeur tapa Elizur thillatte ahi uh.
Ni nga ni’n Simeon tate intekpen Zurisadai tapa Selumiel in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum; Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik, dangkasik belhbu khat; tangbuang thillat ding in thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dimtuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat a lat ding in bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa nga. Hiaite Zurisadai tapa Selumiel thillatte ahi uh.
Ni guk ni’n Gad tate intekpen Deuel tapa Eliasaph in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Halmang thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa ngate Deuel tapa Eliasaph thillatte ahi uh.
Ni sagih ni’n Ephraim tate intekpen Amihud tapa Eliasam in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat; haltum thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnou a pa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa ngate Amihud tapa Eliasam thillatte ahi uh.
Ni giat ni’n Manasseh tate intekpen Pedazur tapa Gamaliel in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat; tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel, tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoihna thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa ngate Pedazur tapa Gamaliel thillatte ahi.
Ni kua ni’n Benjamin tate intekpen Gideoni tapa Abidan in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoihna thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa nga ahi. Hiaite Gideoni tapa Abidan thillatte ahi uh
Ni sawm ni’n Dan tate intekpen Amisadai tapa Ahiezer in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa nga ahi. Hiaite Amisadai tapa Ahiezer thillatte ahi uh.
Ni sawmlehkhat ni’n Asher tate intekpen Okran tapa Pagiel in a lan hi.
A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangka keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat upa ngate Okran tapa Pagiel thillatte ahi uh.
Ni sawmlehnih ni’n Naphtali tate intekpen Enan tapa Ahira in a lan hi.

A thillat dangkasik kuang khat, a gikdan sekel za leh sawmthum, Mun Siangthou a sekel sawmsagih toh kikim a gik dangkasik belhbu khat, tangbuang thillat ding thau toh hel tangbuang toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah a dim tuak;
Sekel sawm toh kikim a gik gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu khat;
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tuai khat, belamtal khat, belamnoupa kum khat a upa khat;
Khelh thoihna ding keltal khat;
Lemna kithoih thillat ding bawngtal nih, belamtal nga, keltal nga, belamnoupa kum khat a upa ngate Enan tapa Ahira thillatte ahi uh.
Maitam thau nilh ni a Israel intekpente thillatte dangkasik kuang sawmlehnih, dangkasik belhbu sawmlehnih leh dangkaeng keu sawmlehnih ahi.
Dangkasik kuang sekel za leh sawmthum toh kikim a gik chiat ahi a, belhbu sawmsagih chiat ahi. Dangkasik tuium-belsuan tengteng Mun Siangthou a sekel sang nih leh za li toh kikim a gik ahi.
Gimlim a dim dangkaeng keu sawmlehnih Mun Siangthou a sekel sawm toh kikim a gik chiat ahi. Dangkaeng keu tengteng sekel za leh sawmnih toh kikim a gik ahi.
Haltum thillat ding bawngtal tengteng sawmlehnih ahi a, belamtal sawmlehnih, belamnoupa kum khat a upa sawmlehnih, a tangbuang thillatte uh toh. Khelhna thoihna ding keltal sawmlehnih.
Lemna kithoihna thillat ding bawngtal sawmnih leh li ahi a, belamtal bel sawmguk, keltal sawmguk, belamnoupa kum khat a upa sawmguk ahi. Hiai thau nilh khit a maitam latna dia thilpiakte ahi uh.
Huchi in biakbuk a amah be dia Mosi a lut in thukhun bawm tung a chitna tutphah tunglam a Cherub nihte kikal apan amah hon houpih aw a za hi.
Huan,
Aron houpih inla, a kiang ah, Khawnvak na det chiang in khawnvak sagihte’n sathau khawnvak koihna malam a tatvak ding uh ahi, chi in.
Aron in huchibang in a hih a;
Hiai khawnvak koihna ahihleh dangkaeng a sekthoh chi ahi a; a mung bul a kipan a paktan a sekthoh ahi. A lim
Levite, Israel suante lak apan hihtuam inla, hihsiangthou in.
Amaute hihsiangthou ding in hichibang in na hih ding ahi. A tung uah sawpsiangna tui sung inla, a pumpi tengteng uh metsak inla, a puante uh sawpsak inla, kihih siangthousak in.
Bawngtal tuai khat tangbuang thillat thau toh hel tangbuang nel mahmah toh lasak inla, khelh thoihna ding in bawngtal tuai khat dang leng na kaisak ding ahi.
Levite Kihoupihna puanin bul ah pi inla, Israel suan omkhawm tengteng ki gawmkhawm sakvek in.
Levite
Huchi in Aron in Levite,
Levite’n bawngtalte lutung ah a khut uh a nga ding ua; Levite adia kilemna bawlna ding in, khat, khelh thoihna ding in, a khat pen haltum thillat ding in
Levite Aron leh a tapate ma ah na omsak dia,
Huchibang in Israel suante lak apan Levite na hihtuam dia, huchi in Levite kei a ahi ding uh.
Huaikhit in Levite Kihoupihna puanin nasem ding in a lut ding ua, nang amaute na hihsiangthou ding, vei thillat ding in na lan ding ahi.
Israel suante lak apan kei a tuam dia seh ahi ngal ua. Sul hong tengteng, Israel suante ta masapen teng tang in kei ading in ka neita hi.
Israel suante lak a ta masapente, mihing toh ganta toh kei a ahi him uhi. Aigupta gam a ta masapente ka sihsak lai in kei a tuam dia ka sehsa ahi.
Huchi in Israel suante lak a ta masapente tang in Levite ka nei khinta ahi.

Huchi in Israel suante tang a Kihoupihna puanin a nasem ding leh Israel suante’n Mun Siangthou a honnaih ua leng Israel suante lak a hi a len louhna dia lemna bawl ding in Israel suante lak apan Levite Aron leh a tapate ka pia ahi, a chi hi.
Huchibang in Mosi, Aron leh Israel suan omkhawm tengteng in Levite tung ah a hihta uhi. Levite tungtang thu a
Huchi in Levite siansak ahi ua, a puante uh a sawp ua; Aron in
Huaizoh in Levite Aron leh a tapate nuai a, a nasep uh sem ding in Kihoupihna puanin sung ah a lut uhi. Levite tungtang thu a
Levite tantuam hiaite ahi. Kum sawmnih leh nga chiang tunglam in Kihoupihna puanin a nasep a sem ding uh.
Kum sawmnga a upate’n a nasep uh a khawlsan ding ua, na a sem nawn kei ding uh.
Himahleh khawmpite biakbuk kep thu ah a unaute uh a huh zel ding ua, nasep zaw a sem nawn kei ding uh. Hichibang in Levite nasep na gel sak ding ahi, a chi hi.
Huan,
Israel suante’n Paikan Ankuangluina a hunbi zel in nei uhen.
A hunbi in, hiai kha, ni sawmlehli nitaklam in na nei ding uhi. Huai a hih dia seh tengteng leh dan bang in na nei ding uhi, a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi in Israel suante Paikan Ankuangluina nei ding in a hilh hi.
Huchi in Sinai gamdai ah kha khatna, a ni sawmlehli ni nitaklam in Paikan Ankuangluina a neita uhi.
Kuate hiam misiluang ziak a sianglou a na om ua, huai ni’n Paikan Ankuangluina ah a tel theikei ua, huchi in huai ni’n Mosi leh Aron ma ah a hoh uhi.
Huaite’n a kiang ah, “Misi luang ziak in sianglou ka hi ua; huaiziak in hia, Israel suante lak a a hunbi a
Mosi in a kiang uah, “Na pau kei phot dih uh. Na tungtang thu uah
Israel suante kiang ah, Na lak ua kuapeuh, na suante uh lak a kuapeuh, misi luang ziak a sianglou hiam, a na zinmang hiam a om zenzen uleh
Kha nihna, ni sawmlehli ni nitaklam in a nei ding ua; tanghou silngou sohlouh loukha toh a nekding uh ahi.
A zing ading in bangmah a koih ding uh ahi kei. A guh leng a hihtan ding uh ahi kei. Paikan Ankuangluina a hih dia seh bang zel a a hih ding uh ahi.
Himahleh, siang ngal a, zinmangna neilou, Paikan Ankuangluina a tellou mawkmawk ahihleh a chipihte lak apan huai mi satkhiak ding ahi. A hunbi a
Namdang mi na kiang ua om in
Huchi in biakbuk lamkhit ni’n biakbuk, theihpihna puanin pen meipi in a tuam lii liai hi. Nitaklam in biakbuk tung ah meikuang bangbang a zingsang tan in a om hi.
Huchibang in a om nilouh a; meipi in a tuam nilouh a, zan chiang in mei bang in a kilang hi.
Meipi in puanin a kikhinsan teng in Israel suante’n pai ding vai a hawm zel ua; meipi a khawlna mun peuh ah Israel suante’n giahphual a satzel uh.
thupiak in Israel suante a pai zel ua,
Biakbuk tung a meipi sawtpi a om leh Israel suante’n
Meipi biakbuk tung a ni tamlou sung a om chiang in giahphual a sat ua,
A kalkal in meipi nitaklam apan a zingsang pha in a om a; zingsang a meipi in a tung kahsan leh a pai zel uh. Ni khat lel hiam, zan khat lel hiam om a meipi in a tungkah san leh a pai zel uhi.
Biakbuk tung a meipi ni nih hiam, kha khat hiam, kum khat hiam a om a, huai a a om nilouh leh Israel suante giahphual ah a om nilouh ua, a paikei uh. A tung kahsan leh bel a pai zel uhi.
Huan,
Dangka pengkul nih bawl inla; sekthoh in bawl in. Mipite sapkhawmna ding leh pawtsakna dia na zat ding ahi.
Huai a kimut chiang in mipi tengteng na kiang ah Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak bula a hong kikhop vek ding uh ahi.
Khat lel a mut uleh Israel mipite heutu intekpente kia na kiang a a hong paikhawm ding uh ahi.
Gallau mut a na mut uleh suahlam pang a omte a pawt ding uhi.
Gallau mut a na mutnawn uleh simlam pang a omte a pawt ding uhi. A pawtna ding un gallau mut bang a a mut ding uh ahi.
Himahleh mipite hong paikhawmna ding in na mut peuhmah ding ua, gallau mut a bel mutlou in.
Aron tapa siampute’n pengkul a mut ding uh ahi. Huai nou ading in na suante uh tan a tangtawn dan ahi ding hi.
Na gam ua melma, nou hon nuaisiahte dou dia na kuan chiang un gallau mut in pengkulte na mut ding uhi. Huchi in

Nuam nasak nite un, a hunbi a na ankuangluinate uah, na kha thakte uah, na haltum thillat uahte leh na kilemna thillat kithoihnate uah pengkul na mut ding uh ahi. Huchi in na Pathian ma uah nou ading in theihgigena ahi ding. Kei
Kum nihna, kha nihna, huai kha ni sawmnih ni’n, hichi ahi a, meipi in theihsakna biakbuk tung a tungkah santa hi.
Huchi in Israel suante a paidan dungzui in Sinai gamdai apan a pawt ua; Paran gamdai ah meipi a khawlta hi.
Mosi zang a
A masapen in Judah pawlte, a pawl uh tamdan dungzui zel in a pawt ua; a heutu uh Aminadab tapa Nashon ahi.
Issakarte heutu Zuar tapa Nethaneel;
Zebulunte heutu Helon tapa Eliab ahi.
Biakbuk a phel ua, Gershon tapa leh Merari tapa biakbuk zawngmite a pawt uhi.
Reubente a pawl uh tamdan dungzui in a pawt ua; a heutu uh Sedeur tapa Elizur ahi.
Simeonte heutu Zurisadai tapa Selumiel ahi.
Gadte heutu Deuel tapa Eliasaph ahi.
Kohathte’n Mun Siangthou a zawng ua, a pawt ua; a dangte’n a tun ma un biakbuk a na lam uh.
Ephraimte a pawl uh tamdan dungzui in a pawt ua; a heutu uh Emihud tapa Elisama ahi.
Manassehte heutu Pedazur tapa Gamaliel ahi.
Benjaminte heutu Gideoni tapa Abidan ahi.
A nanungpen in Dante a pawl uh tamdan dungzui in a pawt ua; a heutu uh Amisadai tapa Ahiezer ahi.
Asherte heutu Okran tapa Pagiel ahi.
Naphtalite heutu Enan tapa Ahira ahi.
Hiai bang ahi Israel suante pawl a tamdan dungzui ua a paidan uh, hiai bang in a paizom zel uhi.
Mosi sungpa Midianmi Reuel tapa Hobab kiang ah, Mosi in, “K’on pe ding,
Aman a kiang ah, “Ka hong dahmai ding, ka gam uah ka tanaute kiang ah ka paizaw mai ding” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hon paisan mahmah ken, gamdai ah lah giahphual satna ding na theizaw ngal a, kou ading in mit na honghi ding hi.
Hichi ahi dia, ka kiang ua na hongsam leh, ahi, hichi ahi ding.
Huchi in
A buk ua pan a pawt un
Hichi ahi a, huai bawm a pawt ding peuhmah chiang in Mosi in,
na melmate hawlzak in,
nang hon hawte na ma ah taikek uhen,” a chi zel hi.
A kingakna peuh ah,
Huan, mipite’n
Huchi in mipite’n Mosi a sam ua; Mosi
Huai mun min Taberah a sa hi,
A lak ua mikihel pawl khat in sa lunggulhna a hon neita ua; Israel suante leng a kap nawn ua, “Kua’n ahia nekding sa honpe ding?
Ut leh dah a Aigupta gam a ngasa i nekzelte i theigige ua, tangmaite, mazelte, phulun sialnek chite, vaiphulunte, phulun ngou leng.
Himahleh tuin i guhngek uh a keu khinta, bangmah lamet ding a omkei, manna lel loungal” a chi uhi.
Manna bel koriander tang bang, a latdan in bedeli suang bang ahi.
Mite’n a tomkhawm ua, gawinelna in a gawinel ua, sum in a su ua, belte ah a huan ua, tanghou in a bawl uhi. Nek in sathau a kan tanghou a bang hi.
Giahphual a zan a dai a kiak in manna leng a hong kia hi.
Mipite a inkuan kuan un a puanin kongkhak chiat uah a kap uh, chih Mosi in a naza hi.
Huchi in
Hiai mipite tengteng ka suan ahi ua hia? A pi leh pute uh kiang a kichiam a piak na chiam gam a pilut di’n. Naupommi in nawitui nelai a pom bang in na angsung ah pom in, n’on chih dia ka pikhiak?
Hiai mipi tengteng piak ding sa koi apan ka nei dia? ‘Ka nek ding un sa honpia in,’ chi in a kap ngal ua.
Hiai mipi tengteng keimah kia in ka paw zoukei. Kei ading in a gik lua hi.
Hichibang a honhih ding na hihleh, hon hehpih inla, hon sisak vanglak in, honhih genthei nawn mahmah ken” a chi hi.
Huchi in ka hongpawt dia, huai ah k’on houpih ding. Na tung a om kha om pen a tung uah ka koih ding. Nang kia’n pawlou in mipite puakgik a hon puakpih ding uhi.
Nang mipite kiang ah, Zingchiang a ding in kihih siangthou vek unla; huchi in sa na ne ding uh. Sa nekding kuan ahia honpe ding? Aigupta gam a nuam i saksak utoh, chi in
Ni khat kia, ni nih kia, ni sawm kia, ni sawmnih kia leng na ne kei ding ua;
Himahleh kha khat pumlum, na nakvang ua a hongpawt khiak a nou adia kihhuai a hong hih masiah na ne ding uhi. Na lak ua om
Mosi in, “Ka ompih mipite khe a paithei kia leng nuai guk ahi ua; kha khat pumlum nek ding in sa ka pe ding, na chi hi.
Belamhon leh ganhon leng gohsak lehang leng, a kham ding ua hia? Tuipi a ngasa tengteng leng matsak vek lengle, a khamzou ding ua hia?” a chi hi.
Mosi a pawt a,
meipi ah a hongsuk a, a hong houpih a, amah tung a om Kha pen Upa sawmsagihte tung ah a koih hi. Hichi ahi a, kha a tung ua a koihtakin thu a gen ua; a genzom sawtkei uhi.

Himahleh giahphual ah mi nih a omlai ua, khat min Eldad ahi, a khatpen min Medad ahi. Kha a tung uah a om a, upate lak a minkhum ahi ua, himahleh Kihoupihna puanin ah bel a hohkei uhi. Giahphual ah thu a gen uhi.
Huchi in tangval khat a va tai a, Mosi a va hilh a, “Eldad leh Medad in giahphual ah thu a gen uh” a chi hi.
Nun tapa Joshua, a tuailai apan Mosi nasempa’n a dawng a, “Ka toupa Mosi, kham ve” a chi hi.
Mosi in a kiang ah, “Kei gum a na thikthu sia hia? Pathian mi tengteng zawlnei hivek le uh,
Huchi in Mosi leh Israel Upa tengteng giahphual ah a lut nawn uhi.
Mipite’n huai ni nitum leh zankhua leh a zing nitum in vengkeng a va tomkhawm ua; a tom tawmpen in leng homer sawm a tom hi. Giahphual kim ah amau a chiat a phou uhi.
Huai sa a neklai un, a nek khit ma un, mipite tung ah
Hiai mun min Kibroth-hattaavah a sa a; huai a saduhte a vui ziak un.
Kibroth-hattaavah apan mipite Hazeroth ah a pai ua; Hazeroth ah a giahphual a sat uhi.
Huan, Miriam leh Aron in Mosi in Kus numei zi a, a neih ziak in a gensia ua; Kus numei bel a neingei hi.
Amau, “Mosi kiang kia ah hia
Mosi bel leitung a mihing tengteng sang in a migi mahmah ahi.
Thakhat in
meipi ding ah a hong paisuk a, puanin kongkhak ah a hong ding a, Aron leh Miriam a sam a; a nih un a hong paisuk uhi.
Aman, “Ka thu ngaikhia un. Na lak ua zawlnei na om uleh amah kiang ah kei
Ka sikha Mosi bel huchibang ahi kei. Ka inkaw tengteng ah a muanhuai hi.
Amah toh paukam in thuguk omlou in teltak in ka kihou ding ua;
Huchi in
Puanin tung a meipi a kikhinta hi. Ngai in, Miriam vuk bang a ngou in a hong phakta a; Aron in Miriam a en a, ngai in, phak a na hita maimah hi.
Huchi in Aron in Mosi kiang ah, “Ka toupa aw, ka tung uah khelhna nga mahmah ken. Haihuaitakin ka na hihta ua, ka na khialta uhi.
A nu sul apan sisa phial mahmah a a hongpawt bang in amah omsak ken” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi in, “Pathian aw, damsak nawn dihve:” chi in
Huchi in giahphual pua ah ni sagih sung Miriam khumtuam in a om hi. Miriam a pilut nawn ma un mipite a kisuan kei uhi.
Huaikhit in mipite Hazeroth apan a pawt ua, Paran gamdai ah giahphual a sat uhi.
Huan,
“Israel suante ka piak, Kanan gam va enkhe ding in mi sawl in. A nam inkaw chih ua mi, a intekpa pen lak a mi khatchiat na sawl ding” a chi hi.
Mosi in Paran gamdai apan
Hiaite a min uh ahi: Reuben nam lak a mi Zakur tapa Shammua.
Simeon nam lak a mi Hori tapa Shaphat.
Judah nam lak a mi Jephunneh tapa Kaleb.
Issakar nam lak a mi Joseph tapa Igal.
Ephraim nam lak a mi Nun tapa Oshea.
Benjamin nam lak a mi Raphu tapa Palti.
Zebulun nam lak a mi Sodi tapa Gaddiel.
Joseph nam, Manasseh nam a chih uh, lak a mi Susi tapa Gaddi.
Dan nam lak a mi Gemalli tapa Ammiel.
Asher nam lak a mi Mikael tapa Sethur.
Naphtali nam lak a mi Vophsi tapa Nahbi.
Gad nam lak a mi Maki tapa Geuel.
Hiaite gam enkhe dia Mosi in a sawlte min ahi. Nun tapa Oshea Mosi in Joshua a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi in Kanan gam enkhe ding in amaute a sawl a, a kiang uah, “Simlam lampi ah paiphot unla, tangte ah kahtou un.
Huai gam bangchibang ahia, huai a teng mipite a hat uh hia, hatlou, a tawm uh leh a tam uh;
A tenna gam uh a hoih hia hoihlou, a omna khuate uh bangchibang ahia, puanin maimah hia, kulh nei;
Huai gam lei thau ahi hia, lei gawng, gammang om hia omlou chih va enkhia un. Hangsantak in om unla, huai gam theigahte honpua un” a chi hi. Tu grep gah masa gah hun laitak ahi.
Huchi in a kuan touta ua, huai gam Jin gamdai apan Hamath lutna Rehob tan in a enkhe vek uhi.
Simlam ah a hohtou phot ua, Hebron a va tung ua, huai ah Anak suan Ahiman, Sesai leh Talmai a om uhi. Hebron bel Aigupta gam a Zoan kilam ma kum sagih a kilam khinta ahi.
Eskil guam a va tung ua, huai ah grep gahbom khat a hiang toh a sattan ua, chiang in mi nih in a zawng uhi. Theibuhfai leh theipite leng a pua uhi.
Huai mun Eshkol phaizang a sa ua; Israel suante’n huai a grep bom a satkhiak ziak un.
Ni sawmli zoh in gam etkhiakna apan a hong kiknawnta uhi.
Huchi in Paran gamdai a Kadesh ah Mosi leh Aron leh Israel suan mipi tengteng kiang a hongtung ua, a kiang uah leh mipi tengteng kiang ah thu a hontun ua, huai gam theite a ensak uhi.
A kiang ah, “N’on sawlna gam ah ka va hoh ua, bawngnawi leh khuaizu luanna a na hingei ngut a; hiai a gam thei ahi.
Himahleh a gam a mi tengte mi hat pipi ahi ua, khuate leng kulh nei, thupi taktak ahi. Anak suante leng ka va mu uhi.
Amalekte simlam gam ah a teng ua; Hitte, Jebuste, Amorte, tang gam ah a teng uh. Kanante tuipi gei leh Jordan lui dung ah a teng uh” chi in a hilh uhi.
Huchi in Mosi ma ah Kaleb in mipite a daisak khipkhep a, “Kisa tou zok ni, va latou zok ni, i zou ngeingei ding uh” a chi hi.
Himahleh a hohpihte’n, “I va zou thei vek kei ding e, ei sang in lah a hatzaw ngal ua” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Israel suante kiang ah, “Ka va gam etkhiak uh gam, enkhe dia ka va vakna uh, asung a mi tengte nekkhit hatmi ahi ua; a mi om ka muhte uh mi awmkhauh pipi ahi uh.
Huai ah Anak suante, miliante, awmkhauh pipi ka va mu ua; khaupe banglel in ka va kimu ua, amau leng khaupe ek banglel in a honmu uh” chi’n a hoihlou lam in a gen uhi.
Huan omkhawm tengteng aw suak in a kap ua; huai zan in mite a kap uhi.
Israel suan tengteng Mosi tung leh Aron tung ah a phun ua; omkhawm tengteng in a kiang uah, “Aigupta gam ah Pathian in honthat geih hileh aw! Ahihkeileh gamdai ah hon na that geih hileh aw!
Bang a chia namsau a si maimah dia Pathian in hiai gam a honpi ahi diam aw? I zi leh i tate lah mat maimah ding ahi ngal ua. Aigupta gam a kiknawn ei adia hoihzaw lou ding hia? a chi uhi.
Huchi in a kihou khawm ua, heutu bawl ni e, Aigupta gam ah kiknawn ni” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Mosi leh Aron Israel suan mipi omkhawm tengteng ma ah a khupboh uhi.
Nun tapa Joshua leh Jephunneh tapa Kaleb, gam va enkhete lak a telte’n a puan uh a botkek uh.
Israel suan omkhawm tengteng kiang ah, “Enkhe dia ka va vakna gam uh gam hoih tak ahi.
I tung ua
tung ah helkei phot le uchin. Huai gam a mite leng lau sam kei un. I an ding uh ahi ua, a kihumbitna uh bangmah ahi kei.
Himahleh omkhawm tengteng in suang a den a sawm ua; huchi in
Huchi in
Hipi in ka gawt dia, ka in-gamsak dia, nangmah ah amau sang a thupi leh thilhihthei zaw nam ka bawlkhe zawmai ding” a chi hi.
Mosi in
Hiai gam a teng mite a hilh ding uh. Hiai mite lak ah nang
Hiai mite na thahgam leh na minthanna za namte’n
hiai mite kichiam a, a chiam gam a a pi theihlouh ziak in gamdai ah a thatta hi, a chi ding uh.
Tuin k’on ngen ahi, ka
lungneltak, migitna hau, thulimlouhnate, tatleknate ngaidam zel; mawh a a sehte khah ngeiloupa, pate thulimlouhna tate, tate tasawnte, suan thumna leh suan lina tan a gawtzel ahi, na chi hi.
Na migitna a thupi bang ngei leh Aigupta gam apan tutan a na ngaihdam bang in mipite thulimlouhna ngaidam in” a chi hi.
Himahleh kei ka hin bang in
Aigupta gam leh gamdai a ka thupina leh ka thillamdang hihte mu a, huchi pipi a leng sawmvei tak hon ze-et lailai a, ka thu zuilou lai mi tengteng in;
a pipute uh kiang a kichiam a ka chiam huai gam a mu kei hial ding uh. A lak ua kei hon ngaineute mawngmawng in leng a mu sam kei ding uh.
Ka sikha Kaleb in bel lungsim dang a put a, a honzuih taktak ziak in, amah zaw a va hohna gam ah ka pilut dia, a suante’n huai a luah ding uhi.
Phaizang a Amalekte leh Kanante teng uh ahihman in Zingchiang in kihei unla, Tuipi San lampi lam gamdai ah lut un” a chi hi.
“Hiai mi thulimlou omkhawmte, ka tung a phunphunte bang tan ahia ka dohzoh ding? Israel suante phunna, ka tung a a phunnate uh ka za hi.
A kiang uah, Ka hinna lou in ka gen ahi, ka bilbuk ngei a na gen bang un na tung uah ka hih ding hi.
Na luang uh gamdai ah a puk dia; na lak ua simsa mi tengteng, kum sawmnih apan a tunglam ka tung a phun teng,
Banzak hial a, k’on omsak ding, ka chih gam ah Jephunneh tapa Kaleb leh Nun tapa Joshua kia loungal na lut kei ding uh.
Himahleh mat ding lel ahi ding uh, na chih uh na tate uh ka pilut dia, na ngaihneu uh gam a thei ding uhi.
Nou bel na luang uh hiai gamdai ah a puk ding hi.
Na tate uh gamdai ah kum sawmli sung a vakvai ding ua, gamdai a na luangte uh a mawk man masiah na kizuakna uh amau a thuakloh ding uhi.
Gam na va etkhiak ni zah uh, ni sawmli, ni khat tang in kum khat zel, kum sawmli sung na tatlekna uh na thuak loh ding ua, huchi in ka thuchiam ka hihlamdan dan na thei ding uhi.
Kei
Gam enkhe dia Mosi mi sawl hong kiknawnte’n, gam omdan a hoihlou lam a gen un amah tung ah omkhawmte a phunsak hi.
Huai gam omdan a hoihlou lam a gente ngei
Gam enkhe dia hohte lak a Nun tapa Joshua leh Jephunneh tapa Kaleb bel a si kei uhi.
Mosi in huai thute Israel suan tengteng a hilh a; huchi in mipite’n nakpitak in a sun uhi.
Huchi in zingsangpi in a thou ua, mualvum ah a hohtou ua, “Ngai in, hiai ah ka hongpai uh.
Mosi in, “Tu a bangdia
Na kiang ua
Na ma uah Amalekte leh Kanante a om uhi. Namsau a thah na hi phet ding uh.
Himahleh mualvum a hoh a tum ua; himahleh
Huchi in huai mual a om Amalekte leh Kanante a hong kuansuk ua, a hong dou ua, Hormah tanpha in a satpuk phengphung uhi.
Huan,
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, tenna ding a gam k’on piakna na tun chiang un,

kiang a mei a thillat ahihkeileh haltum thillat ahihkeileh thuchiam tangtun dia kithoihna ahihkeileh noumau ut thu a thillat ahihkeileh Ankuanglui hunbi ahihkeileh ganhon lak ahihkeileh belamhon lak ahihkeileh
kiang a thillat lan mi peuhmah in tangbuang thillat, tangbuang nelte ephah mun sawm a khen, mun khat, sathau hin mun li a khen, mun khat a mek a lat ding ahi.
Dawn thillat dia uain hin mun li a khen, mun khat haltum thillat ahihkeileh kithoihna belamnou khat adia na bawl ding uh ahi.
Belamtal a tangbuang thillat, tangbuang nelte, ephah mun sawm a khen, mun nih, sathau hin mun thum a khen, mun khat mek na bawl ding uh ahi.
Dawn thillat dia
Haltum thillat ding ahihkeileh thuchiam tangtun dia kithoihna ahihkeileh
Bawngtal lat toh kiton in tangbuang thillat tangbuang nelte ephah mun sawm a khen, mun thum sathau hin kimkhat a mek na lat ding uh ahi.
Dawn thillat dia uain hin kimkhat,
Huchibang in bawngtal ahihkeileh belampa ahihkeileh belamnou, ahihkeileh kelnou ahi ding ahi.
A tamdan uh dungzui zel in na bawl ding ua, a tamdan uh dungzui zel in na lan ding uhi.
Huai gam a piang tengteng in hichibangzelin
Namdang mi na kiang ua tengsa him ahihkeileh kuapeuh na kiang ua teng zelzel ding hiamte’n leng
Na suante uh leh mipite leh namdang na kiang ua omte adia leng dan khat kia a om ding ahi.
Nou ading leh na kiang ua namdang omte ading in dan khat leh hih dan kibang khat kia a om ding, a chi hi.
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah, hichi ahi dia, k’on pina ding gam na va tun ua,
huai gam tanghou na nek chiang un,
Na tanghou mek masakpen lak ua beu khatvei thillat dia na lat ding uh ahi. Buhphual a vei thillat dia na vei bang un na vei ding uhi.
Na suante uh tan in na tanghou mek masakpen uh
Hiai thupiak tengteng,
thu a piak tung apan na suante uh tan adia Mosi zang a thu a piak tengteng chihna ahi.
Hichi ahi dia, omkhawmte’n theilou a, a hihkhak uh ahihleh, omkhawm tengteng in haltum thillat
Siampu in Israel suan omkhawm tengteng ading in kilemna a bawlsak dia, ngaihdam ahi ding uh. Theilou a hihkhak a hih ziak leh a thillat uh
Israel suante omkhawm tengteng ngaihdam ahi ding ua, a lak ua namdang omte leng; mipi tengteng in a hihkhak uh a hih ziak in.
Min theilou a thil a hihkhelh leh khelhna kithoihna ding in kelnu khat kum khat a upa a lat ding ahi.
Theilou a
Theilou a hihkhialmi ading in, Israel suante, huai gam a piangte ading leh namdangmi na lak ua omte ading in leng dan khat na neih ding uh ahi.
Himahleh tup mawng a hihkhial ahihleh, huai gam a piang hiam, namdang hiam leng hitaleh
thu a musit a, a thupiak a bohsiat ziak in, huai mi satkhiak ding ahi, a thulimlouhna mawh aman a paw ding, chi in, a chi hi.
Israel suante gamdai a omlai un mi khat Sabbath ni a sing tom a mu uh.
A sing tom mumite’n amah Mosi leh Aron leh mipite kiang ah a honpi uhi.
Bangchi a hih ding ahia chih genkhiak nailouh a hih ziak in tanna in ah a khum uhi.
Mosi kiang ah, hiai mi hihlup ngeingei ding ahi, giahphual pua ah mipi tengteng in suang in a deng ding uh, a chi hi.
Huchi in
Israel suante kiang ah, a suante uh tanpha a, a puanmong ua a gei bawl ding leh a mong teng gei a a dum khak ding in gen in.
Huai a mong na et ua,
Ka thupiak tengteng na theihgige ua na zuih ua, na Pathian uh adia na sianthou theihna ding uh ahi.
Na Pathian uh hidia Aigupta gam apan nou hon pikhepa
Levi tapa Kohath, huai tapa Izhar, huai tapa Korah pen Eliab tapate, Dathan leh Abiram leh Peleth tapa On leh Reuben tate’n mite a pi ua;
Israel suante, mi tallang deuhdeuh mipi lak a heutu vaihawmmi dia telte lak a mi za nih leh sawmnga toh Mosi ma ah a va kisa uhi.
Mosi leh Aron kalh in a kikhawm ua, a kiang uah, “Na uang lua uh, Na uang lua uh, mipite a siangthou chiat ua,
Mosi in huai a zak in a mai a leisi in a khupboh hi.
Korah leh a pawlte tengteng kiang ah, “Zingchiang in
Hichi in hih un, Korah leh a pawlte tengteng aw, zingchiang in meilaknate tawi unla;
Huai ah mei koih unla,
Mosi in Korah kiang ah, “Nou Levi tapate aw, ngaikhia unla,
biakbuk nasep sem ding leh, khawmpi na sem dia khawmpite ma ading a, amah kiang a hon om naisak dia, Israel Pathian in Israel khawmpite apan nou a hon omsak, nou adia thil neuchik phet a kilang hia?
Amah kiang ah a hon om naisakta a, na kiang a na unau Levi tapa tengteng, siamputna leng na zong ua hia?
Huaiziak in nang leh na pawl tengteng
Mosi in Eliab tapa Dathan leh Abiram a samsaka; “Amau k’ong paitou kei ding uh.
Gamdai a honthat dia nawitui leh khuaizu luanna gam apan n’on pikhiak thil neuchik ahi hia? Ka tung uah na kilalsak nawn ngal a.
Nawitui leh khuaizu luanna gam ah n’on pilut kei a, lou ding leh grephuan gou ding lah n’on pe kei a; hiai mite mitte na mialsak ding maw? Ka hong paitou kei hial ding uh” a chi uh.
Huchi in Mosi a heh mahmah a, “
Mosi in Korah kiang ah, “Zingchiang in nang, na mi kikhawmte leh Aron
A meilakna uh tawi chiat uhenla, gimlim buak uhen.
Huchi in michih in a meilakna uh a tawichiat ua, mei a koih ua, gimlim a buak ua, Mosi leh Aron toh Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah a va ding uhi.
Korah in mipi tengteng a ma ah Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah a omkhawm sak a; mipi tengteng kiang ah
Mosi leh Aron a houpih a,
“Hiai mite apan kihui khia un, amau ka hihmang guih theihna ding in” a chi hi.
Amau a khupboh ua, “Pathian aw, sa tengteng kha Pathian, mi khat khelh ziak in mipi tengteng tung ah na heh dia hia?” a chi uhi.
“Mipite kiang ah, Korah, Dathan leh Abiram puanbuk apan kihemkhia un” chi in gen in, a chi hi.
Mosi a thou tou a, Dathan leh Abiram kiang ah a vahoh a; Israelte upate’n a zui uhi.
Omkhawmte kiang ah, “Hiai migiloute puanin apan pawtkhia un. A bangmah uh khoih kei un, huchilou in zaw a khelhna tengteng uah na pangkha ding uh” chi in a gen hi.

Huchi in Korah, Dathan leh Abiram puanbuk apan a pawtkhe duamduam ua; Dathan leh Abiram a puanin ua pan a hong pawtkhia ua, a puanin kongkhak uah a zite, a tapate leh a tanu neu chikchikte uh toh ading uhi.
Mosi in, “Keimah lungsim a pawtkhia ahi kei a, hiai thilhih ding in
Hiai mi tengteng dan banglel a a sih ua, mi tengteng gawt banglel a gawt a hih uh leh Pathian in kei hon sawllou ahi ding.
Himahleh
Hichi ahi a, huai thu tengteng a gen khit in a nuai ua lei a hong khangkham phok hi.
Lei in a kam a ka a, a inkuan un Korah mi tengteng, a neih tengteng utoh a valhkhin vekta hi.
Huchi in amau leh amau a tengteng Sheol ah hing in a tum vek ua, lei in a kam a chihkhum a, omkhawmte lak apan a mangthangta uhi.
Huchi in a kim ua Israel tengteng a kikou husa uah a taizak ua, lei in ei leng a honvalh kha ding, a chi uhi.
apan mei a hong pawtkhia a, gimlim lan mi za nih leh sawmnga a hong kanglumta hi.
Aron tapa siampu Eleazar kiang ah thu gen inla, aman mei apan meilaknate lakhe ding in hilh in, thil siangthou ahi ngal a.
A hinna tung mah a hiai mikhialte meilaknate maitam khuhna kuang ding in sek hi uhen,
Siampu Eleazar in mi kangte dal meilaknate a la a; maitam khuhna ding in a sekta hi.
Israel suante adia theihgigena hi ding in huchi a Aron tate hilou namdang himhim,
Himahleh a zingsang in,
Hichi ahi a, Mosi leh Aron tung a mipi a phunkhawm lai un, Kihoupihna puanin lam a en ua; ngai in, meipi in a honkhuh a,
Mosi leh Aron Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah a hoh uhi.
Mosi a houpih a:
“Hiai mipi lak apan kihemkhia un, amau ka hihmang guih theihna ding in” a chi hi.
Amau a mai ua leisi in a khupboh uhi.
Mosi in Aron kiang ah, “Na mei lakna tawi inla, maitam apan mei koih inla; gimlim buak inla, mipi kiang ah paipih meng inla, amau a di’n kilemna bawl in.
Aron in Mosi gen bang in a tawi a, omkhawmte lak ah a tailut a, ngai in, huai hipi mipi lak ah a hongleng pan a; gimlim a buak a, mipi ading in kilemna a bawl hi.
Misi leh mihing kikal ah ading a, hipi a khawlta hi.
Huchi in Korah tungtang thu a site simlouh, hipi a si tengteng sing khat leh sang li leh za sagih ahi uh.
Aron Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak a Mosi kiang ah a kiknawn a, huchi in hipi a khawlta hi.
Huan,
Israel suante houpih inla, a inkuan chih a tuam ding in chiang khatchiat, a inkuan uh dungzui zel a a intek pen tengteng zah, chiang sawmlehnih la inla; a chiang uah a min uh gelh in.
Levi chiang ah Aron min gelh inla; a inkuan chih uh ading in chiang khat zel ahi ding ahi.
Kihoupihna puanin thutheihsakna ma ah na koih dia, huai ah i kimu ding.
Hichi ahi ding a, ka tel ding mi chiang a sel ding; huchi in Israel suante na tung a a phunna uh ka daisak ding, a chi hi.
Mosi in Israel suante a houpih a, a intekpen tengteng in amau inkuan chih a tuam ading, intek pen chih in chiang khatzel, chiang sawmlehnih a pia uhi. Huaite lak ah Aron chiang leng a tel sam hi.
Mosi in theihoihna biakbuk ah
A zing in hichi ahi a, Mosi theihpihna puanin ah a va hoh a; ngai in, Levi inkuante adia Aron chiang a na sel a, pakmum a suah a, a pakpalh a, vaisuaklu min a suang hi.
Mosi in
Mosi kiang ah, “Helhat tate ahi uh chih theihsak zelna ding in Aron chiang theihpihna bul ah koih nawn in. Huchi in ka tung a a helna uh na daisak thei ding, a sihlouhna ding un” a chi hi.
Huchibang in Mosi in
Israel suante’n Mosi kiang ah, “Ngai in, ka si ua, ka mangthang uh, ka vek un ka mangthang uh.
biakbuk kiang nai a hongpai peuhmah a si ding uh. Kou leng si in ka mangthang ding u maw?” a chi uhi.
Huan,

Na unaute, Levi suante leh na pa inkawte hon tawnpih in, huchi a amau Mun Siangthou tung a khelhna toh kisai a mohpuakna a lak theihna ding un. Nang leh na tapate’n bel siampu hihna toh kisai thil hihkhelhte ah mohpuakna na lak ding uh ahi.
Nna nasep a honhuh ding ua, puanin nasep tengteng a tang ding ua, himahleh Mun Siangthou tuium-belsuan leh maitam pen honnaih kei uhen, a sihlouhna ding un, amau hiam, nang hiam in leng.
Puanin nasepna tengteng ah kihoupihna puanin na pen a tang ding uh. Nam dangte’n nou a honnaih ding uh ahi kei hi.
Nang Mun Siangthou nasep leh maitam nasep pen na tang ding, Israel suante tung a hehna a om nawnlouhna ding in.
Ngai in, ke’n na unau Levite, Israel suante lak apan ka telkhia a, Kihoupihna puanin ah a sem ding uh.

Nang leh na tapate’n maitam leh puanzak sunglam thu ah na siampu nasep uh na sem ding uh. Nang na sem dia; siampu nasep na sep ding in k’on pia hi. Namdang hong kigolh peuhmah thah ahi ding uh, a chi hi.

Mei adia keptuam, thillat siangthoupente nang a ahi ding uh. A thillat teng uh, tangbuang thillat hiam khelhna thillat hiam mawhna thillat hiam tantuan thillat tengteng nang leh na tapate tantuan ahi uh.
Mun siangthou pen ah na ne ding ua; pasal teng in a ne ding ua, nou ading in hiai thil siangthou ahi.

Hiaite kei a tuam ahi. A thilpiak uh tangbuang thillat, Israel suante vei thillat tengteng tan in. Nang, na tapate leh tanute adia tangtawn a na tantuam ding ua ka honpiak ahi. Na inn a mi siang tengteng in a ne thei ding uh.
Sathau hoih pen, grep hoih pen, buh hoih pen leh gah masa pen
A lou ua gah min masa pen
Israelte thillat tengteng nang a ahi ding.
Kha khat a hih in tat dingte tatna man na seh dan bang in, Mun Siangthou a sekel hihdan bang a sekel nga a na tat ding ahi, sekel pen gerah sawmnih ahi.
Himahleh bawng suakkhe masapen hiam, belam suakkhe masapen hiam, kel suakkhe masapen hiam, na tat ding ahi kei; a siangthou uhi. A sisan uh maitam ah na theh dia,
A sa uh nang a ahi dia, vei thillat leh a liang taklam pang nang a a hih bang in.
Thil siangthou vei thillat, Israel suante’n
Aron kiang ah, A gam uah goutan na neikei dia, a lak uah leng tantuan na neisam kei ding. Israel suante lak a na tantuan leh na goutan, Keimah ka hi.
Ngai in, a nasep, puanin a a sepman ding un, Israel gam a sawm a khat tengteng Levi suante kiang ah ka pia ahi.
Tu apan Israel suante’n Kihoupihna puanin a honnaih het louh ding uh ahi; khelhna pua in a si kha ding uh.
Himahleh Levite’n bel Kihoupihna puanin nasep a sem ding ua; Israelte khelhna toh kisai mohpuakna a la ding uh. Hiai a suante tan ading in dan ahi dia; Israel suante lak ah goutan a neikei ding uh.
Israel suante’n sawm a khat
Levite houpih inla, a kiang uah, Na goutan ding ua Israel suante sawm a khat k’on piak na lak chiang un, huai sawm a khat apan sawm a khat
Na vei thillat uh buhphual a buh leh uain tung masapen dia sim ahi ding.
Huchibang in Israel suante lak a sawm a khat na lak tengteng uah leng
Na thillat tengteng lak ua a hoih pen, a siangthou pen
Huaiziak in, a kiang uah, a hoih pen na vei chiang un Levite buhphual a tung leh grep sukna apan tung bang a sim ahi ding.
Koilai peuh ah leng na ne thei ding uh, nou leh na inkuanpihte un leng; Kihoupihna puanin a nasep man uh ahi ngal a.
A hoih pen na vei uh leh a khelh mawh na paw kei ding uh. Israel suante thil siangthou na hih thanghuai kei ding ua, na si kei ding uhi, chi in, a chi hi.
Huan,
Hiai
Siampu Eleazar nape dia, aman giahphual pua ah a pikhe dia, a ma ah mi khat in a gou ding hi.
Siampu Eleazar in a khut in a sisan a la dia, Kihoupihna puanin ma ah a sisan sagihvei a theh ding.
Mi khat in huai bawngla a mitmuh in a hal dia; a vun, a sa, a sisan leh a ek a haltum ding hi.
Siampu in sidar sing, hussop leh khausan a la dia, bawngla a hal uah a pailut ding ahi.
Siampu in a puansilhte a sawp dia, a kisil dia, huaikhit in giahphual ah a hoh dia, nitaklam tan in siampu sianglou ahi ding.
A hal mi in a puansilhte a sawp dia, a kisil dia, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Mi siang in bawngla vu a lakhawm dia, giahphual pua a mun siang a ngaih ah a koih dia, Israel suan mipite kisiansakna tui dia zat ding ahi. Hiai khelh siansakna ahi
Bawngla vu lakhawm min a puansilhte a sawp dia, nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding. Hiai Israel suante leh namdang a kiang ua omte ading in tangtawn dan ding ahi.
Kuapeuh siluang khoih peuhmah ni sagih sung sianglou ahi ding.
Amah ni thum ni’n a kisiangsak dia, ni sagih ni’n a siang ding. Himahleh, ni thum ni a a kisiansak kei leh ni sagih ni’n leng a siang kei ding hi.
Kuapeuh siluang khoihmi, a kisiansak kei leh
Puanin a mi a sih leh hiai a dan ding ahi. Puanin a lut peuhmah leh puanin sung a om peuhmahte ni sagih sung sianglou ahi ding uh.
Tuium-belsuan kihong, sitlouh peuhmah a sianglou ahi uh.
Gamlak a namsau a thah hiam, misiluang hiam, mihing guh hiam, han hiam mi’n a khoih leh ni sagih sung sianglou ahi ding.
A siangloute a tuam ding in khelh thoihna vu a la ding ua, bel ah tuikhuk tui toh asung ding uhi.
Mi siang in, hussop a la dia, tui ah a diah dia, puanin tung, tuium-belsuan tengteng, huai a ommi tengteng, guh hiam, thah siluang hiam, misiluang hiam, han hiam khoih mite tung ah a theh ding.
Mi siang in ni thum ni leh ni sagih ni’n mi sianglou a theh dia, ni sagih ni’n a hihsiang dia; a puansilhte a sawp dia, a kisil dia, nitaklam in a hong siangta ding hi.
Mi sianglou kisiangsak lou in
Hiai amau ading in tangtawn dan ding ahi. Kisiansakna tui a theh peuhmah in a puansilhte a sawp dia; a kisiansakna tui khoih peuhmah nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding.
Mi sianglou in a khoih peuhmah sianglou ahi zel dia; huai khoih mi kuapeuh nitaklam tan in sianglou ahi ding, a chi hi.
Huan Israel suan omkhawm tengteng huai kha khatna in Jin gamdai a lut ua; mipite’n Kadesh ah giahphual a sat ua; huai ah Miriam a si a, huai ah a vui uhi.
Omkhawmte ading in tui a omkei a; Mosi leh Aron kalh in a kikhawm uh.
Mite’n “
Bangdia

Bangziak in ahia hiai gam hoihloupi a hon pilut dia Aigupta gam apan n’on pawt khiak sak mahmah? Buh leh balte, theipite, grepkungte, theibuhfaite omlouhna mun ahi, tui dawn ding mahmah leng a omsam kei hi” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Mosi leh Aron mipi apan Kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ah a hoh ua, a khupboh ua;

“Chiang la inla, mipite omkhawm sak inla, nang leh na unaupa Aron toh, huai suangpi in a mitmuh ua tui pawtsak ding in thupia in. Suangpi apan tui na lakkhiak sak dia, mite leh a gante uh na dawnsak ding ahi” a chi hi.
Mosi in
Mosi leh Aron in mipite suangpi bul ah a omkhawm sak ua, Mosi in a kiang uah, “Nou mihelte aw, ngai un, hiai suangpi apan tui k’on lak khiaksak ding ua hia?” a chi uhi.
Mosi in a ban a zak a, suangpi a chiang in nihvei a sat a; huchi in tui tamtak a hongpawt a, mipite leh a gante un a dawn uhi.
Mosi leh Aron kiang ah, “N’on gintak louh ua, Israel suante mitmuh a n’on pahtawi louh ziak un hiai omkhawmte ka piak gam ah na pilut kei ding uh” a chi hi.
Hiai Meribah tui ahi. Israel suante’n
Mosi in Kadesh apan Edom kumpipa kiang ah mi a sawl a, “Na unaupa Israel in hichi in a chi, Ka tung ua thuakna hongtung tengteng na thei hi.
Ka pipute uh Aigupta gam ah a hohsuk ua, sawtpi Aigupta gam a ka om uh, Aigupta mite’n kou leh ka pipute hoihlou tak in honbawl uh.
Huchi in

Hehpih in na gam ka tawn paisuak ding uh aw. Lou hiam, grephuan hiam ka tawn kei ding ua, tuileh tuite leng ka dawn kei ding uh. Kumpipa lamlian ah ka pai ding ua, na gam ka khen masiah uh taklam hiam, veilam hiam ah ka pial kei ding uh” a chi hi.
Edom in a kiang ah, “N’on palsuak ding ahi kei. N’on pal leh hondou ding in namsau toh ka hong kuan ding” a chi hi.
Israel suante’n a kiang ah, “Lamlian ah ka paitou ding ua; kou leh ka gan un na tui ka dawn uh leh aman k’on pe ding uh. Thil dang bangmah hihlou in a pai in ka paisuak mai ding uh” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Paisuak lou ding” a chi hi. Huchi in Edom mipite tampi leh mihat taktakte toh amau dou ding in a hong kuanta uhi
Hiai bang in Edom in Israel mite a gam a a paisuak uh a phal kei a, Israel mite’n a kiksan nawnta uhi.
Huchi in Kadesh apan a pawt ua; Israel suan mipi tengteng Hor tang a hongtung uh.
Mosi leh Aron, Edom gam naih Hor tang ah a houpih a,
“Aron a chipihte kiang a pi ahi ding. Meribah tui a ka thu kalh a, a hel ziak in Israel suante ka piak gam ah a lut kei ding.
Aron leh a tapa Eleazar Hor tang ah honpi tou in.
Aron puansilhte suah sak inla, a tapa Eleazar silhsak in. Aron a chipihte kiang a pi ahi ding, huai ah a si ding” a chi hi.
Mosi in
Huchi in Mosi in Aron puansilh a suahsak a, Eleazar a silh sak hi. Aron mual vum ah a sita a, Mosi leh Eleazar mual vum apan a hong paikhe suk uhi.
Mipi tengteng in Aron a si chih a theih un, Israel tengteng in ni sawmthum a sun uhi.
Huan, Kananmi, Arad Kumpipa simlam a om in Israel mite Atharim lampi ah a hongpai uh chi a kigen ging a naza a; huchi in Israel mite a dou a, galmat khenkhat a nei hi.
Israel mite’n
Israel mite thu a pom a, a kiang uah Kanan mite a pia a, amau leh a khuate a hihmang uhi. Huai mun min Hormah a sa uhi.
Hor tang apan Tuipi San lam ah Edom gam kualkhum in a pai ua; a lampi ziak in mipi a lunglel mahmah uhi.
Mipite’n Pathian leh Mosi kalh in, “Gamdai a si dia bang ding a Aigupta apan honpi khia na hia? Tanghou lah omlou, tui lah omlou. Hiai tanghou kihhuai lah ka hinna un a kih hi” a chi uh.
Huchi in
Huaiziak in, mite Mosi kiang ah a hongpai ua, “
Mosi kiang ah, “Gul gukhah lim bawl inla, khuam lek ah khai in. Hichi ahi ding a, gultuk mi peuhmah in huai a et uleh a dam ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi in dalgul a bawl a, khuam lek ah a khai a; hichi ahi a, gul tuk mi peuhmah in huai dal gul a et uleh a dam uhi.
Israel suante a pai zel ua, Oboth ah giahphual a sat uh.
Oboth apan a pai nawn ua, ni suahna lam Moab gamdai bul Ije abarim ah giahphual a sat uh.
Huai apan a pai nawn ua, Zered guam ah giahphual a sat uh.
Huai apan a pai nawn ua, Amorte gamgi apan hong dawktuam gamdai a Arnon lehlam ah giahphual a sat uh. Arnon bel Moab gamgi, Moab leh Amorte kikal a om ahi.
Huaiziak in,
Ar tenna a luangkhia luite leh Moab gamgi a omte ah a thilhihte, a chih.
Huai apan Beer ah a pai nawn ua; huai bel
Huchi in Israelte’n hiai la a sa uh.
“Aw tuikhuk,
hong kikhoh khia inla,
a thu la in sa un.
Dan petu in a kawkmuh bang a miliante uleh mipite heutute’n a khetbuk u toh a laih uh tuikhuk” chi in.
Huchi in gamdai apan Mattanah tan;
Mattanah apan Nahaliel ah; Nahaliel apan Bamoth ah;
Bamoth apan Moab lou a guam leh gamdai sun suk Jeshimon lam nga Pisgah vum ah a pai uhi.
Israel mite’n Amorte kumpipa Sihon kiang ah mi a sawl ua,
“Na gam ah hon paisuaksak ve; lou ah hiam, grephuan ah hiam ka pial kei ding ua; tuileh tuite ka dawn kei ding uh. Na gam ka khen masiah uh kumpipa lamlian ah ka pai zel ding uhi” chi in.

Himahleh Sihon in Israel mite a gam a a paisuak uh a phalkei hi. Sihon in a mite tengteng a kaikhawm vek a, Israel mite dou ding in gamdai ah a kisa zawta hi. Jahaz a va tung ua; huai ah Israel mite a dou uh.
Israel mite’n namsau in amah a that ua, a gam Arnon apan Jabok tan in, Ammon suante tan in a lazou uhi. Ammon suante gamgi kulh nei a hih ziak in a gam chianglel a lazou uhi.
Israel mite’n huai khua tengteng a la ua; Israel mite’n Amorte khua tengteng a luah uhi. Heshbon leh a khopel tengteng ah leng a teng uhi.
Heshbon khua bel Amorte kumpipa Sihon khua ahi. Amah huai ma a Moab kumpipa a sual a a khut apan gam tengteng, Arnon tan a laksakpa ahi.
Huaiziak in, paunak gente’n,
“Heshbon ah hongpai in,
kilamthak hen,
Sihon khopi kilamthak hen, a chi uhi.
Heshbon apan mei a hongpawt a,
Sihon khopi apan meikuang.
Moab a Ar a kangkhin a,
Arnon a munsang a toupate toh.
Aw, Moab, Na tung a gik hi.
Na mangthangta,
Aw Kemosh mi!
Aman Amorte kumpipa Sihon kiang ah tapate galtaite bang in leh a tanute saltangte bang in a pia hi.
Himahleh amau ka kap ua,
Dibon tan in Heshbon a mangthangta.
Huchi in Nophah tan in ka hihmang uh,
huai in Medeba tan a pha hi.”
Huchibang in, Amorte gam ah Israel mite a teng uhi.
Mosi in Jazer enkhe ding in mi a sawl a, a khuate a la ua, huai a teng Amorte a hawlkhia uhi.
A kiknawn ua, Bashan lampi ah a paitou uh. Bashan kumpipa Og, amau dou ding in, amah leh a mite tengteng, Edre-i ah a kisa khia uhi.
Mosi kiang ah, “Amah lau ken. Amah, a mite tengteng leh a gam na khut ah k’on pekhinta hi. Heshbon a om Amorte kumpipa Sihon tung a na hih bang in na hih ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in amah leh tapate hawi himhim neilou in a mite tengteng toh a that ua; a gam a luahsakta uhi.
Huan, Israel suante a pai zel ua, Jeriko zawn Jordan gal a Moab phaizang ah giahphual a sat uhi.
Jippor tapa Balak in Israel mite’n Amorte a bawldan tengteng uh a na thei hi.
Moabte’n mite a lau mahmah ua, a tam ngal ua. Israel suante ziak in Moabte a lungkham uhi.
Moabte’n Midian upate kiang ah, “Hiai mipite’n bawng in loupa a nekgaih bang in i kim ua mi tengteng a negai ding uh” a chi uhi. Huailai in Jippor tapa Balak Moab kumpipa ahi.

Huaiziak in Beor tapa Balaam, Pethor a om kiang ah mi a sawl hi. Huai bel a mite suante gam a lui kiang a om ahi. Amah a va sam ua, “Ngai in, Aigupta gam apan hong paikhia mipi a om ua; ngai in, lei tengteng a tuamdim ua, ka kiang chin ah a om uhi.

Hehpih in hongpai inla, hiai mite hong hamsiat dihve. Kei ading in a hat lua ua, ka zoh theih ua ka gam apan ka delhkhiak theih zenzen khak uleh. Na vualzawl peuhmah vualzawl in a om a, na hamsiat peuhmah hamsiat in a om, chih ka thei” a va chisak hi.
Huchi in Moab upate leh Midian upate aisanna ding tawi in a pawtkhia ua; Balaam kiang a va tung ua, Balak thukhah a hilh uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Tu zan hiai ah giak unla,
Balaam kiang ah Pathian a hong a, Na kiang a mite kuate ahi ua? a chi hi.
Balaam in Pathian kiang ah, “Jippor tapa Moab kumpipa Balak in ka kiang ah,
Ngai in, Aigupta gam apan a hongpai mipite’n lei tengteng a luahdim uh. Hongpai inla, hong hamsiat in, ka zoh theih a, ka delh khiak theih khak leh’ ” chi in mi a honsawl hi, a chi.
Pathian in Balaam kiang ah, “A kiang ua na hoh ding ahi kei. Huai mite na hamsiat ding ahi kei; mi hampha ahi uh” a chi hi.
Balaam zingsang in a thou a, Balak miliante kiang ah, “Na gam uah pai nawnta un.
Huchi in Moab miliante a thou ua, Balak kiang ah a pai ua, “Balaam in a honzui utkei” a chi uhi.
Balak in milian tamsem, a sang ua zahtakhuai zaw a sawlnawn hi.
Balaam kiang a va tung ua, a kiang ah, “Jippor tapa Balak in hichi in a chi, ‘Ka kiang a na honghoh ding bangmah in dal kei hen.
Mi thupitak in k’on bawl dia, ka kiang a na gen peuhmah ka hih zel ding. Huaiziak in, hongpai teitei inla, hiai mite hong hamsiat sak mahmah mai in’ ” a chi uhi.
Balaam in Balak mite a dawng a, a kiang uah, “Balak in a inn dim dangka leh dangkaeng honpe ding himahleh, a bangmah
Huaiziak in,
Zan in Balaam kiang ah Pathian a hong a, a kiang ah, “Hiai mite nang hong sam a hong a hih uleh, thou inla, a kiang uah hoh in. Himahleh na kiang a ka gen kia na hih ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in zingsang in Balaam a thou a, a sabiltung tung ah tutphah a phah a, Moab miliante a zuita hi.
A hoh ziak in Pathian a heh mahmah a, amah a na lamdal ding in
Sabiltung in
angel grephuan umna kikal kuak ah ading hi.
Sabiltung in
angel a pam deuh ah a pai a, mun kawchik laitak, taklam hiam, veilam hiam a leng pialna om louhna laitak ah ading hi.
Sabiltung in
sabiltung a pausak a, Balaam kiang ah, “Bang k’on chih a ahia? Thumvei tak n’on huchi sat?” a chi hi.
Balaam in sabiltung kiang ah, “N’on simmawh ziak in ahi. Namsau tawi hileng, k’on that khinta hial ding” a chi hi.
Sabiltung in Balaam kiang ah, “Tu tan a na tuanna gige na sabiltung ka hi ka hia? Hichibang in k’on hih ngei ahia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Hih ngeilou e” a chi hi.
angel in a kiang ah, “Bang achia hichibang a na sabiltung thumvei sat na hia? Ngai in, na gamtatdan ka mitmuh a a siat ziak in hon na lamdal dia hong pawtkhia ka hi.
Sabiltung in a honmu a, ka ma a thumvei pial ahi. Pial kei leh amah that lou a, nang hon thatkhin ding ka hi” a chi hi.
Balaam in
Balak in Balaam a hong chih a zak in Arnon lam a gamgi chiang ah Moab khopi pha in a vadawna, huai bel gamgi tawpna ahi.
Balak in Balaam kiang ah, “Phatuamngai tak a nang hong sam dia mi k’on sawl ahi kei maw? Bangdia ka kiang a hong nuam lou na hia? Mi thupitak in k’on bawl thei ka hia?” a chi hi.
Balaam in Balak kiang ah, “Ngai in, ka honghi. Bangmah gen theihna mawngmawng ka nei ahia? Pathian in ka kam a thu a koih kia ka gen ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Balaam Balak kiang ah a hohta a, Kiriath huzot a vatung uhi.
Balak in bawng leh belam a lan a, khenkhat Balaam leh a kiang a om miliante kiang ah a khak hi.
Hichi ahi a, a zingsang in Balak in Balaam a pi a, Baal mun sangte ah a hohtouhpih a, huai apan mite omna chiang a mupha hi.
Balaam in Balak kiang ah, “Hiai ah maitam sagih hon bawlsak inla, bawngtal sagih leh belampa sagih hon suktuah sak in” a chi hi.
Balak in Balaam gen bang in a hih a; Balak leh Balaam in maitam chin ah bawngtal khat leh belam khat a lan uhi.
Balaam in Balak kiang ah, “Na haltum thillat bul ah a na ding gige inla, kei ka va paituam ding. Kei hon houpih ding in
Huchi in mual giau velvul ah a hohtou hi. Pathian in Balaam a na kituahpih hi. Balaam in a kiang ah, “Maitam sagih ka bawlkhin a; maitam chih ah bawngtal khat leh belampa khat ka lan chiat” a chi hi.
Huchi in a kiang ah a kiknawnta a; ngai in, a haltum thillat bul ah amah leh Moab milian tengteng leng a na ding lai uhi.
Aman thu a genta a,
“Aram apan Balak in a honpi a,
Suahlam tang a Moab kumpipa’n,
‘Hong inla, Jakobte hon hamsiat sak in, hong inla,
Israelte hong dalsak in!’ a chi a.
Bangchi’n Pathian hamsiat louh ka hamsiat dia? Bangchi’n
Pathian dal louh ka dal dia?
Amau lah suangpi tung apan ka mu ngal a,
tangte apan amau ka mu a,
ngai in, mite a tuam in a teng ding ua, namte lak a sim tellouh ding ahi uh.
Jakobte leivui kua’n a simthei dia,
Israelte mun li a khen,
mun khat kua’n ahia simthei ding?
Mi diktat sih in si sam ning,
ka tawpna amah a bang hi hen!” a chi hi.
Balaam kiang ah Balak in, “N’on bawldan bangchidan ahia? Ka melmate hamsiat ding in ka honpi a, na vualzawl zaw mawk ngal a!” a chi hi.
Aman a dawng a, “
Balak in a kiang ah, “Mun dang ah hohnawn dih ni e, huai apan na thei vek ding. A omna chiang uh na mu ding, avek un zaw na mu vek khol kei ding. Huai apan hon hamsiat sak in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Zophimte tenna Pisgah vum ah a pitou a, maitam sagih a doh a, maitam chih ah bawngpa khat leh belampa khat a lan hi.
Balak kiang ah, “Pam a
A kiang ah a va hoh a, ngai in, a haltum thillat bul ah a na ding nilouh hi. Moab miliante leng a kiang ah a om uh. Balak in a kiang ah, “
Aman thu a genta hi:
“Thou inla, Balak, ngaikhia in.
Jippor tapa, ka thu ngai in.
Pathian zaw
Zuauhat mihing ahi kei.
Kisik hat mihing tapa leng ahi sam kei.
A gensa ahihkei dia hia?
A na gensa a hih piching kei dia hia?
Ngai in, vualzawl ding in
thupiak ka mu a,
aman a vualzawl khin a,
ken ka hih lamdang theikei.
Jakobte ah thulimlouhna a mu kei a,
Israelte ah phengphitna a mu sam kei.
a kiang uah a om a,
a lak uah kumpipa kikou husa a om hi.
Aigupta apan Pathian in a pikhia a,
gam bawngtal tha bang a nei uhi.
Jakobte tung ah bumhaina a omkei a;
Israelte tung ah leng khimhaina a omsam kei hi.
Jakobte leh Israelte kiang ah
Pathian thilhih hihlat ahi!
Ngai in, mipite humpinelkai lian bang in a thou ua,
humpinelkai dawng bang in a ding tou ua;
a sa mat uh a nek ma un a kual kei ding uh,
a mat uh sisan a dawn ma un” a chi hi.
Balak in Balaam kiang ah, “Hamsiat kenla, vualzawl leng Vualzawl het ken” a chi hi.
Himahleh Balaam in a dawng a, Balak kiang ah, “
Balak in Balaam kiang ah, “Hong dih, mun dang ah konpi nawn dia, huai apan n’on hamsiat sak Pathian in a phal kha zenzen hiam” a chi hi.
Huchi in Balak in Balaam Jeshimon lam nga, Peor vum ah a pitouta hi.
Balaam in Balak kiang ah, “Hiai ah maitam sagih hon bawlsak inla, bawngpa sagih leh belampa sagih hon suktuah sak in” a chi hi.
Balak in Balaam gen bang in a hih a, maitam chih ah bawngpa khat leh belampa khat a lan hi.
Israelte vualzawl ding
Balaam a vandak a, Israel mite a nam dungzui zel a om a mu a; Pathian Kha a tung ah a hongtung hi.
Huchi in hiai thu a gen a,
“Beor tapa Balaam in a gen a, a mit a kichian tak a mupa’n a gen hi.
Pathian thute za a,
Bangkim hihtheipa
kilakna mu a khup a puk a,
a mitte hong vakpa in a gen hi.
Jakob aw,
na puaninte hoih hina e,
Israel aw,
na biakbukte uh!
Phaizang bang in a kiphah a,
luidung a huante bang in,
luidung a sidar singte bang ahi uh.
A baltinte apan tui a sungkhe dia,
a haichi tui tampite ah a om dia,
a kumpipa Agag sang in a sangzaw dia, a lalgam
tawisang in a om ding hi.
Aigupta apan Pathian in a pikhia a,
gam bawngtal hatna bang a nei a,
A melma uh namdangte a negai dia,
a guhte uh a tansak dia,
a thaltangte in a kap pailet ding hi.
A kun a, humpinelkai bang in a kual a,
humpinelkai bang mai in;
kua’n a tokthou dia?
Hon vualzawl peuhmah vualzawl in om uhenla,
hon hamsiat peuhmah hamsiat in om hen” a chi hi.
Balaam tung ah Balak a heh mahmah a; a khutte nuaituah in Balak in Balaam kiang ah, “Ka melmate hamsiat ding in k’on sam a, tuin, thumvei tak amau na vualzawlta.
Huaiziak in, na mun ah taimang in. Thupitak a hon tawisang ding k’on chih na hi a; himahleh, ngai in,
Balaam in Balak kiang ah, “Na misawlte kiang ah ka genkei maw?
‘Balak in a inn dangka leh dangkaeng a dim honpe ding himahleh, a hoih lam hiam, a selam hiam
Ngai in, ka mite kiang ah ka paita ding. Huaiziak in, honghoh in, tunung a na mite tung a hiai mite’n a hih ding uh k’on hilh ding,” a chi hi.
Hiai thu a gen a, Beor tapa Balaam mitvak tak a mu in a gen hi.
“Pathian thute za a,
Tungnung Pen theihna thei,
Bangkim hihthei kilakna mu, a khup a puk a mit hongvakta in;
Amah ka mu,
himahleh tuin hilou in;
Amah ka en a,
naichik ah hilou in.
Jakob apan aksi khat a hongsuak khe dia,
Israel apan lalchiang a hong dingkhe dia,
Moab gam nawlte a dou dia,
Seth tate a hihse ding hi.
A melma Edom leh Seirte lakzoh in a om ding ua;
Israel in hattak in a hih ding hi.
Jakob apan ukmi khat a hong paikhe dia,
khopi a omsunte a hihmang ding” a chi hi.
Amalek lam a nga a, thu a gen a,
Amalek bel nambul pen ahi na a,
a dawn lam tangtawn a manthatna ahi, a chi hi.
Kente lam a nga a, thu a gen a,
Na tenna mun a kip a, suangpi ah na bu na sep hi.
Asshurte’n sal a a hon
pimang masiah, hih manthat in na om ding uh, a chi hi.
Thu a gennawn a,
Pathian in hiai a hih,
kua a hing zou dia?
Himahleh Kittim gam apan
longte a hongtung ding ua,
Asshur a hihgim dia,
Eber a hihgim ding ua,
Amah leng a mangthang ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Balaam ading khia a, a khua ah a paita. Huchi in Balak leng a paisamta hi.
Huan, Shittim a Israelte a tam sung un, pasalte’n Moab numeite a luppih uhi.
A pathiante uh ma a kithoihnate ah a chial ua; huchi in a ne ua, a pathiante ma ah a kun uhi.
Israelte’n Peor Baal a besamta uhi. Huchi in Israelte tung ah
Mosi kiang ah, “Mipite heutu tengteng pi inla,
Mosi in Israelte vaihawmmite kiang ah, “Peor Baal biakna a tel peuh mahte that vek un” a chi hi.
Ngai in, puanin kongkhak a mite kapa, a om laitak un, Mosi leh Israel omkhawmte mitmuh in Israel mi khat in Midian numei khat a unaute kiang ah a honpi hi.
Siampu Aron tapa Eleazar tapa Phinehas in a muhtak in omkhawmte apan a thou a, teipi khat a lata hi.
Israel mi a puanin sung ah a delhluta, Israel mi toh a nih un a sun paileta, numei pen a gil ah a sun pailet hi. Huchi in Israel suante tung a hipi a daita hi.
Himahleh huai hipi a site sing nih leh sang li ahi uh.
“Siampu Aron tapa Eleazar tapa Phinehas in a lak ua kei adia phatuam a ngaih ziak in Israel suante apan ka hehna a heimang a, huchi in ka thikthusiat ziak in Israel suante ka hih mangthang kei hi.
Huaiziak in, Ngai in, ka lemna thukhun amah ka pe ding hi.
Amah leh a nung a a suante ading in tangtawn siamputna thukhun ahi dia; a Pathian adia phatuam ngai a Israel suante adia kilemna a bawlsak ziak in, chi in gen in” a chi hi.
Midian numei toh a thah uh Israel mi min Jimri ahi a, amah Simeonte lak a inkuan a intek pen Salu tapa ahi.

Mi’n
Numei in leng a nungak lai a, a pa inn a a omlai a,
a thuchiam leh a thuchiam a a kihenna a pa’n a zak a, a pa’n a daihsan maimah leh a thuchiam tengteng a paisuak ding ahi. A thuchiama a kihenna a om gige ding ahi.
Himahleh a pa’n a zak ni a a phalkei leh a thuchiama a kihenna thuchiamte a koi mahmah a paisuak kei ding. A pa’n a phallouh ziak in
Thuchiam min thu khuallou a, a henna a omlai a pasal a neih a;
a pasal in a zak a, a zak ni a, a daih dide leh a thuchiam a om gige dia, thuchiama a henna leng a om gige ding.

Himahleh meithai hiam, mak a omnu hiam thuchiam zaw, a henna tengteng in a delh gige ding.
Inn a thu a chiam a, kichiam a a kihen leh,
A pasal in a zak a leng a daih dide a, a phallouh kei leh a thuchiam a om gige dia, kichiam a a kihenna leng a om gige ding hi.
Himahleh a pasal in a zak ni a bangmahlou a bawl a, a hihmang leh a thuchiam hiam, kichiam a a kihenna a kam a thupawt peuhmah a om nawn kei ding. A pasal in a hihmang khinta ahi.
Thuchiam tengteng leh hinna hihgim dia hen a kichiamna tengteng a pasal in a kipsak thei in a hihmang thei hi.

Huan,
“Midiante tung ah Israel suante phu la in. Huaikhit chiang in na chipihte kiang a pi na hita ding” a chi hi.
Mosi in mipite a houpih a, “Midiante tung a
Israel nam tengteng lak a namchih a mi sang khat zel kidouna a na kuan ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Israelte sang tamtak lak apan, namchih apan sang khat chiat, kidouna a kuan ding in sepaih sing khat leh sang nih a pekhia uhi.
Huchi in Mosi in chichih lak a mi sang khat chiat leh siampu Eleazar tapa Phinehas Mun Siangthou a tuium belsuante, thupiakna dia pengkulte tawi in kidouna ah a kuansak hi.
Mosi thu a piak bang in Midiante a dou ua; pasal teng a that uhi.
A mithahte lak ah Midiante kumpipate leng a tel uh. Huai Midiante kumpipa ngate min, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur leh Reba ahi a, Beor tapa Balaam leng namsau in a that uhi.
Israel suante’n Midiante numei teng leh a tate uh sal in a pi ua; a gan tengteng uh, a belamhon tengteng uh leh a van tengteng uh gallak in a la uhi.
A omna khuate leh a giahna tengteng uh a halvek uhi.
Gallak tengteng, mihing leh gan tan in a paipih vek uhi.
Salte, matte leh gallakte, Mosi, siampu Eleazar leh Israel suan omkhawmte kiang ah, Jeriko zawn Jordan gei Moab phaizang a giahphual uh a hontun uhi.
Mosi, siampu Eleazar leh omkhawmte intek penpente’n giahphual pua ah a na dawn uhi.
Sepaih heutu, sangte tung a heutute leh zate tung a heutute, kidouna apan hongtungte tung ah Mosi a heh hi.
Mosi in a kiang uah, “Numei tengteng na hinghawi vek uh maw?
Ngai un, Balaam lemtheih a Peor tung tang thu ah Israelte
Huaiziak in, naupangte lak a pasal tengteng that unla, pasal luppihsa numei teng leng that un.
Numei naupang pasal luppih nailouh tengteng nou ading in hinghawi un.
Giahphual pua ah ni sagih sung giak unla; kuapeuh mi that leh thah a om misi khoih peuhmah a ni thum ni leh a ni sagih ni’n kisiangsak un, noumau leh na salte uleng.
Van himhim leh savun a thilbawl tengteng, kelmul a thilbawl tengteng, sing a thilbawl tengteng thu ah na kisiangsak ding uh” a chi hi.
Siampu Eleazar in kidouna a hoh kidou mite kiang ah, “Hiai
Bangpeuh dangkaeng, dangkasik, dal, sik, langva leh ngen,

mei a hal a setheilou teng mei ah na tholh paisuak ding ua, huchi in a hong siangthou ding uh. Bang peuh, silsiang na tui a hih siangthou ding ahi. Mei a hal thuak theilou peuhmah tui a na tholh paisuak ding uh ahi.
A ni sagih ni’n na puan uh na sawp ding ua, na hong siang ding uh. Huaikhit in giahphual ah na honglut ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
“Nang, siampu Eleazar leh omkhawmte inkuan intekpente’n gallak a, a lak uh mihing leh gante simvek un.
Gallak mun nih ah khen un; kidouna a kuan kidoumite ading leh omkhawmte ading in.
Kidouna a kuan galdoumi apan
Huaite a tan kimkhat ua pan la unla,
Israel suante tan sawmnga apan khat, mihing apan, bawng apan, sabiltung apan, belamhon apan leh ganhon apan sepkhia inla, huaite
Huchi in
Sepaihte’n a mat uh gallak simlouh a lak uh belam nuai guk leh sing sagih leh sang nga,
Bawng sing sagih leh sang nga,
Sabiltung sing guk leh sang khat,
Pasal kithuahpih nailou numei sing thum leh sang nih ahi uh.
A kimkhat, kidouna a kuante tantuan, belam nuai thum leh sing thum leh sang sagih leh za nga ahi.
siah belam za guk leh sawmsagih leh nga ahi.
