Mosi thu a piak bang in siah,
Mosi in galdou mite apan a hawm Israel mite tantuan kimkhat galdou a kuante lak ah a hawm hi.
Mipi tantuan kimkhat belam nuai thum leh sing thum leh sang sagih leh za nga,
Bawng sing thum leh sang guk,
Sabiltung sing thum leh za nga,
Mihing sing khat leh sang guk ahi.
Israel tantuan kimkhat apan Mosi in mihing leh gan sawmnga zel ah khat a la a,
Sepaihte tung a heutu, sangte tung a heutute, zate tung a heutute’n Mosi a va naih uh.
Mosi kiang ah, Na sikhate’n ka khut ua om kidou mite ka sim ua, kuamah kimlou ka omkei uhi.
Ka hinna ua dia
Mosi leh siampu Eleazar in dangkaeng a bawl van tengteng a na sang uhi.
Sangte tung a heutute leh zate tung a heutute’n dangkaeng
Galdou mite’n a gallak uh amau a chiat ding in a la ngal ua.
Mosi leh siampu Eleazar in sangte tung a heutu leh zate tung a heutute dangkaeng a la ua, Israel suante theihgigena ding in Kihoupihna puanin ah
Reuben leh Gad tate’n gan a hau mahmah ua; Jazer gam leh Gilead gam a muh un, a mun gan adia hoihtak hi’n a thei uhi.
Huchi in Gad tate leh Reuben tate’n Mosi, siampu Eleazar leh omkhawm mipite a va houpih uh.
“Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimrah, Heshbon, Elealeh, Shebam, Nebo leh Beon,
Israel omkhawmte ma a
Hoih na sakleh hiai gam ka luah ding un honpia inla, Jordan lui honpi galkai dah maive” a chi uhi.
Mosi in Gad tate leh Reuben tate kiang ah, “Na unaute uh kidouna a kuan ding ua, nou bel hiai ah na om maimah ding uh maw?
Bangdia
Kadesh-barnea apan gam va enkhe dia ka sawl in na pate un hichi mah bang in a hih uhi.
Eskol guam a tun touh un gam a va mu ua,
Huai ni’n
Aigupta gam apan hongpawt, kum sawmnih chiang tunglam mi himhim in Abraham, Isak leh Jakob, kiang a kichiam a, ka piak gam kuamah in a mu kei ding uh; a honzuih taktak louh ziak un.
‘Keniz mi Jephunneh tapa Kaleb leh Nun tapa Joshua kia loungal, amau bel
Israelte tung ah
Ngai un, Israelte tung a
zuilou a, na om himhim uleh aman amaute gamdai ah a omsak nawn ding hi. Hiai mi tengteng na hihmang mai kei ding u maw?” a chi hi.
A vanaih ua, a kiang ah, “Hiai ah ka gan ua ding in belamhuangte leh ka tate uh ading in khua ka sat ding uh.
Kou bel a mun ding uh ka tut masiah uh Israel suante ma a pai ding in ka kigalvan ding uhi. Hiai gam a mite ziak in ka tate uh kulh nei khuate ah a teng ding uh.
Israel suante michih in a mun luah ding a luahchiat ma un ka inn uah ka paikik kei ding uh.
Ka luah ding uh bel hiai lam gal Jordan suahlam a hih ziak in Jordan galkhat lam leh a khen lam zaw ka luahpih sam kei ding uh” a chi uhi.
Mosi in a kiang uah, “Huchibang na chih ua, galdou dia
ma a gam zoh a hih masiah na lak ua kigalvan tengteng
Toupa ma a gam lak a om a, huaikhit chiang a na kiknawn ding uleh
Himahleh huchibang a na hihkei uleh, ngai un,
Na tate uh ading in khuate sat unla, na belamte uh ading in leng huangte bawl unla, na gen bangbang un hih un” a chi hi.
Gad tate leh Reuben tate’n Mosi kiang ah, “Na sikhate’n ka toupa uh thupiak bang in ka hih ding uh.
Ka zi, ka tate uh, ka belamhonte uh leh ka ganhon tengteng uh Gilead gam khuate ah a na om ding uh.
Himahleh na sikha, kidou dia kigalvan tengteng in ka toupa uh gen bang in
Huchi in Mosi in, a tungtang thu uah siampu Eleazar, Nun tapa Joshua leh Israel nam inkuan intekpente thu a pia hi.
Mosi in a kiang uah, “Gad tate, Reuben tate leh galdou dia kigalvan tengteng in
Himahleh kigalvana a hong galkah pihkei uleh Kanan gam ah na lak uah a telmai ding uh” a chi hi.
Gad tate leh Reuben tate’n, “A sikha kiang a
Kigalvan a
Mosi in Gad tate, Reuben tate leh Joseph tapa Manasseh suan nam kimkhatte Amor kumpipa Sihon gam, Bashan Kumpipa Og gam, huai gamte a khua tengteng toh, a kim gam a khuate nangawn toh a pia hi.
Gad tate’n Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer;
Atroth leh Shophan, Jazer, Jogbehah;
Beth Nimrah leh Beth Haran a lam ua, khopi kulhneite, belam huangte toh.
Reuben tate’n Heshbon, Elealeh, Kirjathaim,
Nebo leh Baal meon, a minte khek khit ahi, leh Sibma a lam ua; a khosatte uh min dang a phuak uhi.
Manasseh tapa Makir tate Gilead gam ah a hoh ua, a la ua, huai a teng Amorte a hawlkhia uhi.
Mosi in Gilead gam Manasseh tapa Makir a pia a; huai ah a teng hi.
Manasseh tapa Jair in huai a khuate a vala a, Havothjair a sa hi.
Nobah in Kenath a vala a, a khopelte toh, amah min tam in Nobah a sa hi.
Mosi leh Aron makaih a Aigupta gam apan a pawlpawl a pawt a, a pai zel dan uh hiai bang ahi.
thupiak in a paikhia ua, a pai zel nate uh Mosi in a gelh a; a paikhiak ua a painate uh hiaite ahi.
A kha khatna, ni sawmlehnga ni’n Rameses apan a pawt ua; Paikan Ankuanglui ni zing in Aigupta miteng muh in hangsantak in Israel suante a pawtkhia uhi.
Aigupta mite’n a ta masa pen teng uh
Huchi in Israel suante Rameses apan a pawt ua, Sukot ah giahphual a sat uh.
Sukot apan a pawt ua, gamdai phak tung Etham ah giahphual a sat uh.
Etham apan a pawt ua, Baal-zephon bul a Pi-hahiroth lam ah a kinung khin ua, Migdol chin ah giahphual a sat uh.
Pi-Hahiroth chin apan a pawt ua, tuipi a paltan ua, gamdai ah a lut uh. Etham gamdai ah ni thum lam a pai ua, Marah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Marah apan a pawt ua, Elim a tung uh. Elim ah tuinak nei sawmlehnih leh tum sing sawmsagih a om a; huai ah giahphual a sat uhi.
Elim apan a pawt ua, Tupi San ah giahphual a sat uh.
Tuipi San apan a pawt ua, Sin gamdai ah giahphual a sat uh.
Sin gamdai apan a pawt ua, Dophkah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Dophkah apan a pawt ua, Alush ah giahphual a sat uh.
Alush apan a pawt ua, Rephidim ah giahphual a sat ua, huai ah mipite dawn ding tui a omkei hi.
Rephidim apan a pawt ua, Sinai gamdai ah giahphual a sat uh.
Sinai gamdai apan a pawt ua, Kibroth-hattaavah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Kibroth-hattaavah apan a pawt ua, Hazeroth ah giahphual a sat uh.
Hazeroth apan a pawt ua, Rithmah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Rithmah apan a pawt ua, Rimmon-parez ah giahphual a sat uh.
Rimmon-parez apan a pawt ua, Libnah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Libnah apan a pawt ua, Rissah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Rissah apan a pawt ua, Kehelathah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Kehelathah apan a pawt ua, Shepher tang ah giahphual a sat uh.
Shepher tang apan a pawt ua, Haradah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Haradah apan a pawt ua, Makheloth ah giahphual a sat uh.
Makheloth apan a pawt ua, Tahath ah giahphual a sat uh.
Tahath apan a pawt ua, Terah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Terah apan a pawt ua, Mithkah ah giahphual a sat uh;
Mithkah apan a pawt ua, Hashmonah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Hashmonah apan a pawt ua, Moseroth ah giahphual a sat uh.
Moseroth apan in a pawt ua, Bene-jaakan ah giahphual a sat uh.
Bene-jaakan apan a pawt ua, Hor-hagidgad ah giahphual a sat uh.
Hor-hagidgad apan a pawt ua, Jotbathah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Jotbathah apan a pawt ua, Abronah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Abronah apan a pawt ua, Ezion-geber ah giahphual a sat uh.
Ezion-geber apan a pawt ua, Jin gamdai ah giahphual a sat uh huai bel Kadesh leng a chi uhi.
Kadesh apan a pawt ua, Edom gam chin a Hor tang ah giahphual a sat uh.
Siampu Aron
Aron Hor tang a a sih in kum za leh sawmnih leh thum ahi.
Kanan mi, Kanan gam simlam a om Arad kumpipa’n Israel suante a hongpai uh a naza hi.
Hor tang apan a pawt ua, Zalmonah ah giahphual a sat uh.
Zalmonah apan a pawt ua, Punon ah giahphual a sat uh.
Punon apan a pawt ua, Oboth ah giahphual a sat uh.
Oboth apan a pawt ua, Moab gam naih Ije abarim ah giahphual a sat uh.
Ije abarim apan a pawt ua, Dibon gad ah giahphual a sat uh.
Dibon gad apan a pawt ua, Almon diblathaim ah giahphual a sat uh.
Almon diblathaim apan a pawt ua, Nebo chin a Abarim tang ah giahphual a sat uh.
Abarim tang apan a pawt ua, Jeriko zawn, Jordan gei Moab phaizang ah giahphual a sat uh.
Jordan gei Beth jeshimoth apan Abelshitim pha in Moab phaizang ah giahphual a sat uh.
Jeriko zawn Jordan gei Moab phaizang ah
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah Jordan lui na kan ua, Kanan gam na lut chiang un,
Huai gam a om tengteng na delhkhe vek ding ua, a suang milim pathian tengteng uh na hihse vek ding ua, a milim sunte uh na hihse vek ding ua, a mun sangte uh na hihse vek ding uh ahi.
Gam na luah ding ua, huai ah na teng ding uh. Na luah ding ua gam k’on piaksa na hi uhi.

A chi dungzui bangzel in aisan in gam na luah ding ua, a inbul deuhte gam za deuh na pe ding ua, a inbul lou deuhte gam neudeuh na pe ding uh. Aisan a pukna peuh mi chih a tuam ahi dia; na pi leh pute uh chi paidan bangzel in na luah ding uhi.
Himahleh huai gam a omte na delhkhiak kei uleh na omsakte uh na mit ua ding in sutna zum leh na sa ua ding in ling bang ahi ding ua, na omna gam uah buaina a hontun ding uhi.
Hichi ahi ding a, a tung ua hih ka tup bang na tung uah ka hih ding, chi in, a chi hi.
Huan,
Israel suante thu pia inla, a kiang uah, Kanan gam na tun chiang un, Kanan gam, a gamgi dan dungzui zel a na luah ding gam uh,
simlam na luah ding chiang uh Jin gamdai apan Edom gam zulzul ahi dia, simlam gamgi Chi Tuipi tawp apan suahlam pang ahi ding.
Na gamgi uh Akrabbim tung kahna simlam pang ah a kawi dia, a hong pawtna Kadesh-barnea simlam ah ahi dia, Hazaraddar ah a pai dia, Azmon ah a pai zel ding.
Gamgi Azmon apan Aigupta lui tan in a kawi dia, a tunna tuipi ah ahi ding.
Tumlam pang ah tuipi thupi a gamgi ding in na tang ding ua, hiai tumlam a na gamgi uh ahi ding.
Hiai mallam a na gamgi uh ahi ding. Tuipi lian apan Hor tang huap in na bawl ding uh.
Hor tang apan Hamath lutna tan in na bawl dia, gamgi tunna bel Zedad ah ahi ding hi.
Gamgi Jiphron ah a pai zel dia, a tunna Hazarenan ah ahi ding. Hiai mallam a na gamgi uh ahi ding hi.
Suahlam a na gamgi uh Hazarenan apan Shepham tan in na bawl ding uh.
Gamgi Shepham apan Riblah tan in Ain suahlam pang ah a suk pai dia; huchi in gamgi a pai suksuk dia, Kinereth tuipi suahlam pang a sun ding.
Gamgi Jordan ah a paisuk dia, a tunna Chi Tuipi ah ahi dia hiai a kimvel a gamgi paidan bang in na gam uh ahi ding, chi in, a chi hi.
Mosi in Israel suante thu a pia a, Hiai
Reuben tate nam in a inkuan uh dungzui zel leh Gad tate nam in a inkuan uh dungzui zel leh Manasseh nam kimkhat in leng a gam luah ding uh a tangta ngal ua.
Nam nih leh nam kimkhatte’n a gam luah ding uh ni suahna lam Jeriko zawn Jordan gal suahlam ah a tangta uh, a chi hi.
Luah dia gam hon khennen pihte min hiaite ahi. Siampu Eleazar leh Nun tapa Joshua.
Gam luahdia khennen ding in namchih apan a intekpen khat chiat na tel ding ahi, a chi hi.
Huai mite min bel hiaite ahi. Judah nam a mi Jephunneh tapa Kaleb.
Simeon tate nam a mi Amihud tapa Semuel.
Benjamin nam a mi Kislon tapa Elidad.
Dan tate nam lak a intek pen Jogli tapa Bukki.
Joseph tate lak a mi, Manasseh tate nam intek pen Ephod tapa Haniel.
Ephraim tate nam lak a intek pen Sitan tapa Kemuel.
Zebulun tate nam lak a intek pen Parnak tapa Elizaphan.
Issakar tate nam lak a intek pen Azan tapa Paltiel.
Asher tate nam lak a intek pen Selomi tapa Ahihud.
Naphtali tate nam lak a intek pen Ammihud tapa Padahel.
Hiaite Kanan gam a Israel suante gam luah ding hawm dia
Huan, Jeriko zawn Jordan gei, Moab phaizang ah
Israel suante thu pia inla, a gam uah Levite tenna ding khuate bawlsak uhen. A gante uh tatna ding in khaw dainawl kim Levite na piak ding uh ahi.
Khuate a tenna ding uh ahi dia, a kimte bel bawng leh a gante leh a ganvulh tengteng ading ahi.
Levite na piak ding dainawl khaw kulh apan tong sang khat a sau ahi ding ahi.
Kulh pawlam apan na teh dia, suahlam pang ah tong sang nih, mallam pang ah tong sang nih, khopi bel a laitak ah a om ding ahi. Hiai amau dainawl tuam ahi ding.
Levite na piak ding khuate lak ah tualthatte taina ding kihumbitna khopi guk ahi dia; huaite lou khua sawmli leh nih na piaklai ding uh ahi.
Levite na piak ding khua tengteng khua sawmli leh giat ahi ding. Dainawl toh na piak ding uh ahi.
Israel suante luah khua na piak dan ding, mi tamte na pe tam dia, a tawmte na pe tawm ding ahi. Michih in a luah uh gam tamdan dungzui a khua Levite na piak ding uh ahi, a chi hi.
Israel suante houpih inla, a kiang uah,
Jordan lui na galkah ua Kanan gam na lut chiang un kihumbitna khua na sep ding uh ahi, tualthat kha mi taina ding in.
Huai khuate, phulami apan na kihumbitna khua uh, omkhawmte ma a vaihawmsak dia adin ma a tualthatmi a sihlouhna ding ahi.
Nou adia kihumbitna ding na sehte uh khopi guk ahi ding.
Jordan gal ah khopi thum na sep ding ua, Kanan gam ah khopi thum na sep ding ua, kihumbitna khopite ahi ding uhi.
Israel suante leh namdang leh a kiang ua tengte ading in hiai khopi gukte kihumbitna ahi dia, huai ah kuapeuh mi that kha a tailut ding ahi.
Himahleh mi kuahiam in sik a mi a sat a, a sih leh tualthat ahi a, tualthat bel hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
Si khop a suang a mi a den a, a sih leh tualthat ahi a, tualthat bel hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
Ahihkeileh mi khat in mi khat thei sing in deng henla, sita leh tualthat ahi a, tualthat bel hihlup ngeingei ding ahi.
Sisan phulami’n tualthatmi a that dia, a muh peuh chiang in a that ding ahi.
Mi khat peuh in huatna toh tupkholhna nei in midang khat sawn henla, ahihkeileh tupmawng in banghiam in deng henla, huai mi sita leh;
Ahihkeileh kimelmakna nei in a khuttum in tum henla, huai mi sita leh a hihlumpa hihlup ngeingei ding ahi. Amah tualthat ahi a, sisan phulami in a thah ding ahi.
Himahleh kimelmakna nei hilou a, kuahiam khat in midang a sawn khak ahihkeileh tup mawng hilou a amah a den khak a,
ahihkeileh amah mulou a, amah that thei suang a tung a a khiaka, amah a sih leh a melma leng hilou a, hihnat tum leng hilou a hih ziak in.
Omkhawmte’n hiai vaihawmna dan bang in a hihlummi leh sisan phulami vai a hawmsak ding uh ahi:

Omkhawmte’n tualthatmi sisan phulami apan a humbit ding ua, omkhawmte’n a taina, a kihumbitna khua ah a tengsak ding ua, sathau siangthou nilh a om siampu lian a sih mateng huailai khua ah a teng ding hi.
Himahleh chiklaipeuh in tualthatmi a taina, a kihumbitna khaw gamgi pawlam a pai a;
sisan phulami in a kihumbitna khaw pawlam a a muh a, sisan phulami in a thah leh a sisan ah mawh a pawkei ding.
Siampu lian a sih mateng a kihumbitna khua ah a teng gige ding a, himahleh siampu a sih in bel tualthatmi a tenna gam ah a paikik ding ahi.
Hiai thilte na suante uh tan a na tenna peuh ua na vaihawm dan ding uh ahi.
Kuapeuh in mi a thah leh tualthatmi pen theihpihte kam apan thupawt a hihlup ding ahi. Himahleh theihpih khat kia mi hihlupna ding in a hun kei.
Tualthatmi na tan ding uh ahi kei. Sihna khop a mawh ahi a, hihlup ngeingei ding ahizaw.
Siampu sih ma in, kihumbitna khua a tailut kuapeuh a gam a sawl kiknawn dia tatna sum na lak ding uh ahi kei.
Huchi in na tenna gam uh na hih thanghuai kei ding ua, sisan in gam a hih thanghuai leh sisan suahna gam hih thanghuai silna ding in a suahmi sisan kia lou lah zattheih ahi ngal kei a.
Na tenna gam uh, ka omna na hih thanghuai ding uh ahi kei. Kei
Huan, Joseph inkuanpihte lak a mi, Manasseh tapa Makir tapa Gilead tate inkuan intekpente lak a mite’n a honnaih ua, Mosi leh heutu, Israel suante intekpente ma ah thu a gen uhi.

Amau Israel suante lak a mi, namdang kuapeuh tate a va kitenpih uleh, ka pi leh pute uh gam a luah uh laksak a, a kitenpih uh namte gam toh gawm ding ahi dia; huchibang in ka gam tantuan ua kipan lakkhiak a ahi ding hi
Israel suante Jubili a hongtun chiang in a gam uh a va kitenpih uh namte gam toh gawm ding ahi dia; huchi in ka pi le pute uh gam apan amau gam lakhek a honghi ding hi” a chi uh.
Mosi in,
Jelophehad tanute tungtang thu a
Huchi in Israel suante gam pen namdang kiang a suan ahi kei ding. Israel suante’n a pi leh pu uh nam gam a neih gige ding uh ahi.
Israel suante lak a gouluah ding tanu peuhmah Israel suante’n a pi leh pute uh gam a luahchiat zel theihna ding un a pa nampih lak a mi zi a hih ngeingei ding ahi.
Huchi in gam bel namdang kiang a suan ahi kei ding hi. Israel suante’n amau gam chiat a tang gige ding uh ahi ngal a’ ” a chi hi.
Jelophehad tanu Mahlah, Tirzah, Hoglah, Milkah leh Noah te’n a pa uh unau tapate a kitenpih uhi.
Joseph tapa Manasseh tapate a kitenpih ua, a gam uh a pa uh nam ah a om gige hi.
Hiaite
Hiai thute Jordan suahlam gamdai, Paran leh Tophel leh Laban leh Hazeroth leh Dizahab kikal a Suph chin a Arabah a Mosi in Israel mi tengteng kiang a a gen ahi.
Horeb tang a kipan Kadesh-barnea, Seir tanglam lampi tawn a pai in ni sawmlehkhat lam ahi.
Kum sawmlina, kha sawmlehkhatna, huai kha ni khat ni’n, hichi ahi a,
Heshbon a om Amorte kumpipa Sihon leh Edre-i leh Astaroth a om Bashan kumpipa Og a thah nung in;
Jordan suahlam Moab gam ah hiai dan Mosi in hiai bang in a genchian panta hi:
Kisuan unla, paikhia unla, Amorte tanggam ah leh a kimvel teng Arabah ah, tanggamte ah, phaizang gam leh Lebanon ah, Luipi Euphrates tan in pai un.
Ngai un, gam k’on pekhin a; na pu uh Abraham, Isak, Jakob leh amau nung a, a suansawnte uh kiang a kichiam a
Huailai in na kiang uah, “Kei kia in k’on paw zoukei.
na Pathian un a hon pungsak a, ngai un, tuin na tam dan uh van a aksi zah hial a hong hita hi.
, na pi leh pute Pathian in tu sang a mun sang tamtakin hon pungsak henla, a honchiam bang in hon vualzawl hen.
Bangchi’n kei kia in na buainate uh, na puakgikte uh, na kihou theihlouhnate uh ka pawzou dia?
Na nam lak ua mi, mi pil, theisiam mi, a dan ding theimi kitelkhia unla, na tung ua heutu ding in ka bawl ding” ka chi hi.
Nou, “Na thil gen kou adin a hoih mahmah” chi in n’on dawng uhi.

Huchi in na nam heutute uh ka la a, na nam lak ua mi, mi pil a dantheimite na tung ua heutu in ka bawl hi: sangte tung a heutute, zate tung a heutute, sawmngate tung a heutute, sawmte tung a heutute, intek pente toh.
Huailai in na vaihawmmite uh kiang ah, “Na unaute uh kal a thu ngaihkhiak sak unla, unau leh unau kikal ah leh gamdang mi, a ompih toh a kal uah diktattak in vaihawm un.

Vaihawmna ah deihsaktuam na nei ding uh ahi kei. Mi neu leh mi lian kibang a na ngaihkhiak sak ding uh ahi. Kuamah na lau ding uh ahi kei. Vaihawmna lah Pathian a ahi ngal a. Nou adia thu haksa luate ka kiang ah na hontun zel ding ua, huai ka ngaikhe zel ding” chi in thu ka pia hi.
Huailai in na thilhih ding tengteng uah thu k’on pia hi.
Na kiang uah, “
Ngai dih ua,
Ka kiang ah na hongpai vek ua, “A gam va enkhia a, i hoh touhna ding lampi leh i hohna ding khaw tanchinte honghilh nawn di’n i ma uah mi sawl leng” na chi uhi.
Huai thu in a hon kipaksak a; Huchi in na lak ua mi sawmlehnih, nam khat a khat zel ka tel hi.
Huchi in a pawtta ua, tang ah a kahtou ua, Eskol guam a va tung ua, a va enkhe vek uhi.

Na inn sung ua thil kihhuai lalut in huai thil bang in hamsiat thuak ding in na kibawl ding uh ahi kei. Kih petmah a kih in na mudah mahmah ding uh ahi, hamsiat thuakna thillah ahi ngal ua.

Thil kihhuai himhim na ne ding uh ahi kei.

Vasa siang tengteng na ne thei ding uh.
Hiaite zaw na ne ding uh ahi kei: Muvanlai, mungawnggiau, mu akla;
Musane, mu meika, mu chi himhim;
Va ak chi himhim;

Gamdai simbu, musane, va ngawngsau;

Kum sagih a chin kum in ngaihdamna na bawl ding uh ahi.

“Ngaihdam kum, kum sagihna a hongtung dekta, chi in, na unau zawngte mudah a bangmah pe nuamlou in na lungtang uah dikloutak a ngaihtuahna omlou ding in pilvang un.” Huchilou in zaw, amau na tungtang thu uah
Na piak ngeingei ding uh ahi. Na piak chiang un leng na lungtang uh a nuam mawh ding ahi kei. Huchibang thil ziak in ahi,

Huai gam ah lah mizawngte omlouh lai omlou ding ahi ngal a. Huaiziak in, Na gam ua na unaute uh tung ah, tasamte tung ah, na mizawngte uh tung ah, na thilphal ngeingei ding uh ahi, chih k’on thupiak ahi.

Hichi ahi ding a, noute leh na inkuan uh a ngaih ziak uleh, na kihoutheih ziak ua, “K’on pawtsan kei ding,” a chih bikbek leh;

Tanghou silngou soh toh na ne ding uh ahi kei. Na damsung teng ua Aigupta gam apan na pawt ni uh na theihgigena ding un ni sagih tanghou silngou sohlouh, haksatna tanghou toh na nekding uh ahi, Aigupta gam apan kintak a pawtkhia na hi uhi.
Na gamsung uah ni sagih sung, na lak uah silngou muh in a om ding ahi kei. Ni khat ni nitaklam a na kithoihna sa uh zankhua in a zingsang tan in bangmah a om ding ahi kei.
na Pathian un a min omna mun dia a seh ding kia ah ahi ding. Huai ah Aigupta gam apan na hongpawt hun bang un nitaklam in Paikan Ankuang kithoih in na kithoih ding uhi.
Na em ding ua,
Ni guk sung tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uh ahi. A ni sagih ni pen
Nipikal sagih na sim ding ua; na buhlak tung ua kipan nipikal sagih na sim ding uhi.
na Pathian un a hon vualzawl bangzel in na sepkhiak uh lak a noumau utthu a thillat lan in
na Pathian un a min omna dia a seh ding ah na sikhanute uh, na tenna ua om Levite, na lak ua om gamdang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite toh
Aigupta gam ah sikha na hi uh, chih na theihgige ding uh ahi. Hiai dante pilvang tak in na zui ding uh ahi.
Na buhphual ua kipan leh na uain sukna khuk ua kipan na sekkhawm khit un ni sagih sung bawkta Ankuanglui na nei ding uhi.
Na Ankuangluina uah nou toh, na tapa utoh, na tanu utoh, na sikhanu utoh, na tenna ua om Levite, gamdang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite toh kipaktak in na om ding uhi.
a munseh ding ah
Kum teng in na pasal tengteng uh thumvei
na Pathian un vualzawlna a hon muhsak bangzel in michih in a zoh hun bang in a pe ding ahi.
Dikloutakin vai na hawm ding uh ahi kei. Kuamah deihsak tuam na nei ding uh ahi kei. Golhgukna na la ding uh ahi kei. Golhgukna in mipilte mit a tawsak a, mi diktatte thu a kaikawi hi.
na Pathian un a honpiak gam dam a na luah theihna ding un a dik kia na zui ding uh ahi.
na Pathian un a muhdah lam suang leng na phut ding uh ahi sam kei hi.
Bawngtal hiam, belam hiam, demna om leh hoihlouhna himhim nei in
Na lak uah
Ka thupiak louh, ni hiam, kha hiam, van a te himhim hiam,
a honhilh ua, nang na zak a, phatuamngai tak a na dot a, ngai in, a dik a, thu a tel mahmah a, huchibang thil kihhuai Israelte lak a hih a na hihleh;
Huai thil gilou hihmi, pasal hiam, numei hiam na kulh kongkhak pawlam uah pasal hiam numei hiam pen na pikhe ding ua, suang in na deng lum ding uhi.
Theihpih nih hiam, thum hiam kam apan in a si ding mi hihlup ding ahi. Himahleh theihpih khat kia kam apan in hihlup ding ahi kei.
Hihlup ding pen tung ah theihpihte’n a khut uh that ding in a kha masa ding ua, huaikhit chiang in mipi tengteng in, huchibang in na lak ua kipan thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uh ahi.
Sisan kisuah thu ah, sum leh pai thu ah, kivuak thu ah, na tenna ua kiselna thu himhim a nou adia vaihawm haksa lua a hongom leh,
huai hun a siampu Levite leh vaihawmte kiang a hoh in na dong ding uhi. Amau thu hihpuk ding dan a hon na kawkmuh ding uhi.
Huchi in nou
Thu hihpuk dan a hon na sinsak uh leh vaihawm dan a hon na hilh bangzel un na hih ding uhi. Thu hihpuk dan a hon na kawkmuh uh taklam ah hiam, veilam ah hiam na pialsan ding uh ahi kei.
na Pathian uh ma a nasem a pang siampu leh vaihawmmi thu pomlou a, engtat peuhmah, huai mi hihlup ding ahi. Israel apan huai thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uh ahi.
Huchi in mi tengteng in a za ding ua, a lau ding ua, a engtat nawn kei ding uhi.
na Pathian un a telpen kumpipa dia na neih ding uh ahi. Na unau lak ua mi khat na kumpipa ding ua na bawl ding uh ahi. Namdang mi, na unau uh hilou zaw nou hon-uk dia na bawl ding uh ahi kei.
Himahleh sakol tampi a kaikhawm ding ahi kei, ahihkeileh sakol zong ding in Aigupta gam a kiknawn din mite a sawl ding ahi kei. A ziak ahihleh
A lungtang pimang a a omlouhna ding in zi leng tampi a neih ding ahi kei. Dangka leh dangkaeng leng tampi a khawm ding ahi kei.
Hichi ahi ding a, a lalgam mangtutphah a a tut chiang in siampu Levite apan kila hiai dan teisawn a, amah adia laibuzial a a gelh ding ahi.
Hiai dan amah kiang ah a om gige dia, a damsung teng a, a simzel ding ahi. Huchi in Toupa a Pathian laudan a sinthei dia, hiai danthu tengteng leh danthusehte pilvangtak in a zuithei dia,
a unaute tung ah a lungtang a kisathei kei dia, dan apan taklam hiam, veilam hiam ah a pialkei ding hi. Huai nung in a lalgam Israel tung ah amah leh a suante’n sawtpi vai a hawm ding uhi.
Siampu Levite, Levi nam tengteng in Israelte lak ah tantuan leh goutan a nei ding uh ahi kei.
A unaute uh lak ah goutan a nei ding uh ahi kei. A goutan ubel a kiang ua a gen bang in
Mipite lak apan kithoihna lanpa siampu a tuam ding hiaite ahi: Bawngtal leh belam liang leh a biangtuai lang nih leh a gilpi siampu a piak ding uh ahi.
Na buh na bal, na uain, na thau tung masate uh, na belam mulmet masak pente uh leng na piak ding uh ahi.

Huai a
A siamput man uh simlouh in midang tuam nek ding a tang sam himhim ding uhi.
Na lak uah mi kuamah a tapa hiam, a tanu hiam mei a paisuaksak, mi kuamah aisan ching, mi kuamah mangsan ching hiam, bum hiam, mitkhialdawi tawi hiam,
Zawl aitawi hiam, mi sisa houpih hiam, khate zawl hiam, misisate dong thei hiam na om ding uh ahi kei.
Hichibang thilhih chingte peuhmah
na Pathian uh ma a na hoihkim ding uh ahi.
Huai na valuah ding uh gam a namte’n mitkhialdawi leh aisan chingmite a ngaikhia ua; nou zaw
na Pathian un keimah bang na unaute uh lak a mi zawlnei a hon bawlsak dia, a ma thu na ngaikhe ding uh ahi.
ka kiang ah, a thugen uh a gen hoih ngel uhi.
A unaute uh lak ah nangmah bang zawlnei ka bawlsak dia, a kam ah ka thute ka koih dia, a kiang a ka thupiak peuhmah a kiang uah a gen ding.
Hichi ahi ding a, ka min a ka thu a gen zuilou peuhmah ka ngaihtuah ding hi.
Ka min a gen ding ka piaklouh gen teitei zawlnei hiam, pathian dangte min a thugenmi zawlnei hiam, huai zawlnei hihlup ding ahi.
Na lungtang ua, bangchi’n ahia a thu
Zawlnei in
Huai khopite zotna ding lampite sial unla,
Huai a tailut mi that kha bitthei ding hiaite ahi: Mi a invengte tuma lam a huatna leng nei khollou a that kha peuh mahte;
a invengte toh sing phuk dia gamlak a kuan a sing phuk dia a heipi a sat a, heipi tang kitol in a invengte a denlup khakte ahi ding ua hiai khopite lak a khatpeuh ah a taithei ding uhi.
Sisan phulami in a heh na a pailai a mithatmi a delh a, lampi a sau ziak a delhpha in a va satlum kha ding hi. Tuma lam a huatna na nei khollou a hih ziak in sitak ahi kei hi.
Huaiziak in, Khopi thum nou adin na sep ding uh, chi in thu k’on pia hi.
na Pathian uh it ding leh a lampi zui gige dia, tuni a k’on thupiak tengteng na zuih uh leh hiai khopi thumte simlouh in nou ading in khopi thum dang na behlap nawn ding uh.
Hiai bel
Himahleh min a invengte a huat a, a tan a, a sual a, si khophial a a vuak a, huai khopite lak a khat a a tai leh;
a khaw upate un mi sawl uhenla, huai mipa vapi uhenla, hihlup ding in sisan phulami khut ah pe khia uhen.
Amah na hehpih ding uh ahi kei a, nou adia hoih ding in Israel gam apan poikhoih lou sisan suahna na hihmang ding uh ahi.
Mi a thulimlouhna hiam, a khelhna himhim hiam theihpih khat a hun kei dia; theihpih nih kam hiam, theihpih thum kam hiam a thu hihkip ding ahi.
Mi khatpeuh thil hihkhial a ngohdia tup gilou nei theihpih mi adin leh,
huai bang a kingohna neite gel
Vaihawmte’n ngenteltak in thu a dong ding ua, ngai in, theihpihmi thu theihpih zuau a hih a, a unau zuau a ngoh ahihleh;
a unau tung a hih a tup bangbang amah tung ah na hih ding uh. Huchibang in na lak ua thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uhi.
Midangte’n a za ding ua, a lau ding uh. Huchi in tunung chiang in huchibang thil hoihlou mawngmawng na lak uah a hih nawn kei ding uh.
Na hehpih ding uh ahi kei. Hinna tang in hinna, mit tang in mit, ha tang in ha, khut tang in khut, khe tang in khe ahi ding ahi.
Na Melmate uh dou dia na kuan ua, sakol, kangtalai, mipi nou sang a tamzaw na muh chiang un, na lau ding uh ahi kei. Aigupta gam apan nou hon pikhepa
Kidou dia na kuan dek chiang un siampu in mipi vanaih henla, houpih henla, a kiang uah,
“Israelte aw, za un, tuin na melmate uh dou ding na hi ua, na lungtang uh patau sak kei un. Lau kei unla, ling sam kei un, amaute lauhsak in omkei un.
Noute hon tonpih a na melmate uh hon dousak a, hon hondam ding
Heutute’n mipite kiang ah, “Inn thak lam a lan nailou na om uhia? A inn ah paikik nawn hen. Kidouna ah a va si kha dia, midang in a lan kha ding hi.”
“Grephuan bawl a, a gah ne nailou na om uhia? A inn ah pai kiknawn hen, kidouna ah a va si kha dia, midang in a ne kha ding hi.”
“Zi kham a kiteng nailou na om uhia? A inn ah pai kiknawn hen. Kidouna ah a va sikha dia, midang in a kitenpih kha ding” chi in gen hen.
Heutute’n mipite kiang ah, “Lau leh patau na om uhia? A inn ah pai kiknawn hen, a unaute uh lungtang amah lungtang bang in a zulsak kha ding” chilai uhen.
Hichi ahi ding a, heutute’n mipite kiang a thu a gen khit un mipite makaih ding sepaih heutute a sep ding uhi.
Dou ding khaw kim na vatun chiang un lemna thu gen phot un.
Hichi ahi ding a, a hon kileppih ua, a na kihon uleh hichi ahi ding a, huai a mi om tengteng nasem dia na goih ding uh ahi dia, na nna a sem ding uhi.
Hon kileppih utlou a, a hon na dou ding uleh um un.
na Pathian un na khut ua a honpiak hun chiang in pasal tengteng namsau in na thatvek ding uh ahi.
Numei leh a ta neu chik chikte uh, gante leh khua a thil omte leh huai a gallak thil tengteng nou a tuam dia na lak ding uh ahi.
Hiai namte khua hilou, na tenna ua kipan a khaw gamla tengteng huchibang in na hihzel ding uhi.
Hitte, Amorte, Kanante, Perizte, Hivte leh Jebuste na hihmang vek ding uhi.
A pathiante uh tung a a hih zel uh thil kihhuai tengteng a hon sinsak louhna ding un hihmang vek un. Huchilou in zaw

Lak tuma na dou uh khua sawtpi na um chiang un, a singte uh heipi in na phuk ding uh ahi kei, na nekding uh ahi ngal a. Huai khopi douna a zat ding in leng na phuk ding uh ahi kei, huai gam a singte mihing hinna ahi ngal a.
Himahleh gah neilou singte bel phuk in na hihse thei ding ua, na doute khua na lakzoh masiah uh a douna vanzat in na zang ding uhi.
na upate uh leh na vaihawmtute uh a hongpai ding ua, a thahna kim khua apan a teh ding ua,
Hichi ahi ding a, a luang apan khaw naipen khua a upate’n bawnghon lak a bawngla, zat nailouh, hakkol paw nailou a kai ding uhi.
Huai khua upate’n bawngla, tuiluanna, lei lehlouh leh bangmah chinlouhna guam ah a kaisuk ding ua, guam ah a ngawng a tan ding uh.
Levi tapa siampute’n a honzuan ding ua, amau
Luang naihpen khua upa tengteng in guam a bawngla ngawng a tan tung uah a khut uh a sil ding uhi.
“Ka khut un hiai sisan a suahkei a, ka mit un leng a mu sam kei.
aw, na tatkhiak, na mi Israelte lak ah poikhoihlou sisan suahna mawh hon khusak ken” chi in a pang ding uhi. Huchi in sisan thu ah ngaihdam ahi ding uhi.
Huchibang in
Na melmate uh dou dia na kipat khiak ua,
sal lak a numei melhoih tak, na mi deihlam, zi dia na mi deihlam tak na muh leh,
na inn ah na pi dia; a lu a met dia, a khutchin a tan ding hi.
A sal puanak a suahkhe dia, na inn ah a om dia, kha khat sung a nu leh a pa a sun dia, huaikhit in, na luppih dia, a pasal na hidia, amah na zi ahi ding hi.
Amah a kipahna na neih kei leh a ut utna a pai na phal ding ahi, sum leh pai in na zuak ding ahi kei a, sumsinna in na zang ding leng ahi kei, amah na daisakta ngal a.
Min zi nih nei henla, khat pen deih in khat pen hawta leh, a deihnu leh a huatnu in ta suansak tuakta leh; a upapen a huatnu tapa hita leh;
a gou neih a tapate a khopsak hun chiang in a deihpen tapa, a tapa upa a huat pen ta sang a deihsakna a piaktuam ding ahi kei.
A huat pen ta, a ta upapen, a neih tengteng apan tan nih huai adia a bawl ding ahi; a hatna bul ahi a, tachil hihna a ma a tuam ahi.
Min tapa phengphitak, helhattak nei henla, a nu leh a pa thumanglou in, a sawina uh limsakta kei leh;
a nu leh apan a kai ding ua, a khaw upate uh kiang ah a khaw kulh kongpi bul ah a pi ding uhi.
A khaw upate uh kiang ah, hiai ka tapa uh phengphitak leh helhattak ahi a, ka thu uh leng a mang nuam kei a; kizatbei hat leh khamhat mi ahi, a chi ding uhi.
Huchi in khua a mi tengteng in suang in a denglum ding uhi. Huchibang in na lak ua kipan thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uh ahi. Israel mi tengteng in a za ding ua, a lau ding uhi.
Min sihna khop khelhna a hih a, thah a om a, singdawn a na khai uleh;
a luang sing ah zankhua in a om ding ahi kei. Huai ni mahmah in na vui ding uhi. Sing a khai peuhmah lah Pathian hamsethuak ahi ngal a.
Na unau bawngtal hiam, a belam hiam mang na muh leh na daih san ding ahi kei. Na unau inn ah na pi ngeingei ding ahi.
Na unau inn kiang nai a om ahihlouh a, a neimi na theihlouh uh ahihleh, na inn ah na pitou dia, na kiang ah a om nilouh dia, na unau in a zon hunhun in na pe nawn ding ahi.

Huchi mah bang in a sabiltung leng na hih ding ahi. Huai mah bang in a puansilh leng na hih ding ahi. Huchi mah bang in na unau thil mansak na muh peuhmah na hih ding ahi, na daihsan mawkmawk ding ahi kei.
Na unau sabiltung hiam, bawngtal hiam, lampi a puk na muh leh na daihsan maimah ding ahi kei. Na phot pih ngeingei ding ahi.
Numei in pasal van a silh ding ahi kei. Pasal in numei van silh ding ahi kei. Kuapeuh huchibang hihmi
Lampi a vasabu, sing ah hiam, lei ah hiam, a nou hiam, a tui hiam om, a nou hiam a tui hiam, a pi in a opkhum lai na muh leh a nou a pi toh na lakkhawm ding ahi kei.
A pi na khah ngeingei ding ahi. A nou bel na la thei ding hi. Huchi in nang adin a hoih dia, na damsung na sawtsak ding hi.
inn thak na lam chiang in a tung apan mi kia a, a sisan mawh na khuklouhna din a tung na um ding ahi.
Na grephuan ah thil chi nih na ching ding ahi kei. Huchilou in zaw na chi tuh gah leh na grephuan a gah teng sianglou ahi ding uhi.
Bawngtal leh sabiltung lei na kaikhawm sak ding ahi kei.
Samul leh pat a gatkhawm puan na silh ding ahi kei.
Na kituamna puan uh a gei li ah mong khih na bawl ding uh ahi.
Pasal khat peuh in zi a neih a, a luppih a, a muhdah nawn thepthup a,
hiai numei ka kitenpih a, ka luppih a, nungak siangthou a hihna ka mu kei, chi a zahlaktak a bawl a, a min a hihsiat leh,
Nungak nu leh pa’n kulh kongpi ah huai khaw upate kiang ah nungak siangthou a hih kichetnate a hontawi ding uhi.
Nungak pa’n upate kiang ah, “Hiai mipa ka tanu ka neisak a, a haw nawn thepthup hi.

Ngai un, Na tanu nungak siangthou a hihna ka mu kei, chi in zahlaktak in a bawl a, himahleh hiaite ka tanu nungak siangthou a hihna ahi” a chi ding hi. Huchi in huai khaw upate ma ah tua puan a phah ding hi.
Huai khaw upate’n huai mi paipih in a gawt ding ua;
Israel nungak siangthou a suk minsiat ziak in dangka sekel za khat a liausak ding ua, nungak pa a pe ding uhi, amah zi ahi dia, a damsung in a khen theikei ding.
Himahleh huai mipa thu a na dik a, nungak siangthou a hih kichetnate muh ahihkeileh;

nungak pen apan kongpi ah a pikhe dia, a tenna khua a mite’n amah suang in a denglum ding uh; a pa inn a kizuak a Israelte lak a thil gilou haihuai mahmah a hih ziak in. Huchibang in na lak ua kipan, huai thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uhi.
Pasal khat in pasal nei numei a luppih lai muh ahihleh a luppih pasal leh numei a nih ua a sih ding uh ahi. Huchibang in Israel apan huai thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uhi.
Nungak siangthou, mi zikham, pasal khat in khopi a a muh a, a luppih leh;

a nih un khaw kulh kongpi ah na pikhe ding ua, suang in na denglum ding uh; numei pen khua a om ngal a, a kikou louh ziak in. Pasal pen a invengte zi a hih minsiat ziak in. Huchibang in na lak ua kipan huai thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uh ahi.
Himahleh min gamlaka midang in zi dia a khamsa nungak a muh a, a pawngsual leh hiai thilhih pasal kia sihsak ding ahi.
Nungak pen bangmah lohlouh ding ahi. Nungak in sihna khop khelhna bangmah hihlou ahi. Hiai bang mi ahihleh min a invengte sual a, that toh kibang ahi.
Hiai bang thu ahihleh gamlak ah a vatuak kha a, mi zikham nungak a kikou a, panpih ding mi omlou a hih ziak ahi.
Min nungak siangthou kuamah khamlouh a muh a, a mat a, a luppih a muh uleh;
a luppih pasal in nungak pa dangka sekel sawmnga a pe ding ahi. Zi in a nei ding ahi, a hih minsiat tak ziak in. Huchi in a damsung in a khen theikei ding hi.
Pasal in a pa zi a kitenpih ding ahi kei. A pa lupna a buahsak ding ahi kei.
Chiltang kitam ahihkeileh zahmoh atkhiat mi kuapeuh
Sawn
Ammonte leh Moabte
Aigupta gam apan na hong pawtlai ua tanghou leh tui a, a hon na dawnlouh ziak un leh hon hamsiat dia Mesopotamia gam a Pethor khua a Beor tapa Balaam a goih ziak un.
Himahleh
Na damsung teng un a khamuanna ding uh leh a lohchinna ding uh na ngaihtuahpih ding uh ahi kei.
Edomte na kih ding uh ahi kei, na unaute uh lah ahi ngal ua. Aigupta mite na kih ding uh ahi kei, a gam ua mikhual na hihtak ziak un.
A suan uh thumna apan
Na melmate uh dou dia giahphual na sat chiang un thil sianglou chiteng apan na kihuikhiak ding uh ahi.
Na lak ua kuapeuh zan chiang a amah apan bawtui pawt ziak a thanghuai na om uleh, giahphual apan a pawt dia, giahphual ah a lutnawn ding ahi kei.
Himahleh ni a hong kai chiang in, a kisil dia; nitum chiang in giahphual ah a lut nawn ding ahi.
Giahphual pawlam ah zun leh ek thakna ding mun na sep ding uh ahi.
Na vanzat lak uah ninluahna na nei ding ua; hichi ahi ding a, na dailen chiang un, huai in lei na khuak ding ua, zun leh ek na thak uh na vuk nawn ding uhi.

na Pathian un lah na giahphual uah nou hon humbit ding leh na melmate uh honpe din a hongtel ngal a. Huaiziak in, na giahphual uh a siangthou ding ahi. Huchilou in zaw na lak ua thil sianglou a mu dia, a hon paimangsan ding hi.
Na kiang ua sikha, a pu hon taikhiak san na pe kiknawn ding uh ahi kei.
Na omna ua a deihpen a tel peuhpeuh ah na lak uah a omsam ding ahi. Amah na nuaisiah ding uh ahi kei.
Israel tanute lak ah kizuak a om ding ahi kei a, Israel tapate lak ah leng pasal kizuak a om ding ahi kei.
Kizuak man hiam, tawkaw man hiam thuchiamna din
A pung delh in na unau na leitawisak ding ahi kei. Dangka lam a pung hiam, nekding lam a pung hiam, bangpeuh a pung delh a leitawisak louh ding ahi
Gamdang mite bel a pung delh in na leitawi sak thei ding uh. Himahleh na unaute a pung delh in na leitawi sak ding ahi kei. Huchi in na va luah ding uh gam a na khut ngakna tengteng uah
Thuchiam lam a na kidek uleh nou adin khelhna ahi kei ding.
Na kam ua pawtsa na hih ding uh ahi: Ut thu a thillat na kam ua na chiam uh
Na invengte grephuan a na hoh chiang un na deih zah uh na ne ding ua, himahleh na seng ua na guanlouh ding uh ahi.
Na invengte buh ding lai mun a na hoh chiang un a vui na khiakthei ding uh. Himahleh na invengte buh ding lai ah kawite na zang ding uh ahi kei hi.
Pasal khat in zi a neih a, amah a sianglou banghiam khat a muh ziak a a lungtun kei leh hichi ahi dia, kimakna lai a gelhsak dia, a pedia, a inn apan a pawtsak ding hi.
A inn apan a pawt nung in midang a vanei thei ding hi.
A pasal nanungpen in a zakdah a, kimakna lai a gelhsak a, a piak a, a inn apan a pawtsak hiam, a pasal nanung zaw, zi a neipa a si hiam ahihleh;
a pasal masa, amah paisakpa’n a hih nitsa ahi a, a nei nawn theikei ding.
Pasal zi nei tung sepaih in a kuan ding ahi kei a, bang nasem dia phut ding leng ahi kei. A inn ah kum khat zalen in a om dia, a zi lungnuam tak in a omsak ding hi.
Buh gawizanna hiam, a tunglam suang hiam kichiamna ding in kuamah apan na lentang ding uh ahi kei; mi hinna lettang sak na hi ngal ua.
Kuapeuh, Israel suan, a unaute lak a mi gu a, sal a zat hiam, zuak hiam theihkhiak ahihleh huai gutapa hihlup ding ahi. Huchibang na lak ua kipan thil hoihlou na hihmang ding uh ahi.
Phak hipi tung tang thu ah hoihtak a ettel a, siampu, Levite sinsak dan bangzel a hih din pilvang un. Amau thu ka piak bang in pilvang tak in na hih ding uh ahi.
Aigupta gam apan na hong pawtna lampi a
Bangpeuh na invengte uh na leitawi sakleh a khamna la din a inn ah na lut ding ahi kei.
inn pua ah na ding dia, leitawi sakmi in tua khamna inn pua ah a hon tawikhe ding ahi.
Mi zawng ahihleh a khamna kem in na giahpih ding ahi kei.

Bang teng hileh nitum chiang in a kichiamna thil a kiang ah pekik in. Huchi in a puantual silh in a ihmu thei dia, nang a hon phatthei ding hi. Huai khamna thilpen na Pathian ma ah nang ading in diktatna ahi ding hi.
Na mi goih, mi genthei leh tasam na unau hiam, na gam ua na tenna ua om gamdang mi hiam leng hita leh na simmawh ding uh ahi kei.
A sep ni’n a loh na pe ding uh; ni’n a tumkhum ding ahi kei. Mizawng ahi a, huai ah a lungtang a koih hi. Huchilou in zaw na tungtang uah
Tate ziak in pate hihlup ding ahi kei a, pate ziak in tate leng hihlup ding ahi sam kei. Michih amah khelhna ziak a hihlup ding ahi.
Gamdang mite leh pa neiloute dikloutak a na gensak ding ahi kei. Meithai puan leng khamna din na laksak ding ahi kei.
Nou leng Aigupta gam ah sikha na hi ngeita ua,
Na lou ua buh na lak un, buhphal na khop maih uleh na lak nawn ding uh ahi kei. Gamdang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite ading ahi. Huchi in
Na Olive sing uh na sat chiang un a hiangte na sat ding uh ahi kei. Gamdang mite, pa neiloute leh meithaite ading ahi.
Na grephuan ua na loh chiang un a sang na zong ding uh ahi kei. Gamdang mite, pa neiloute leh meithaite ading ahi.
Aigupta gam ah sikha na hita uh, chih na theigige ding uh ahi. Huaiziak in, ahi, hiai thilhih dia thu k’on piak.
Mi a kinak ua, vaihawmna mun a a hoh uleh, vaihawmte’n a na gensak ding ua, mi diktat siam a tangsak ding ua, migilou mawh a tangsak ding uhi.
Hichi ahi ding a, migilou zep tuakmah ahihleh, vaihawm min a lumsak dia, a ma ah a zep ding ahi. A gitlouh dungzui a zep ding zah bikhiah ding ahi.
Sawmli vei tan zep theih ahi dia, huai val zaw hilou in. Hiai sang a val a zep leh na unaupa uh na zahlaksak lawkha ding uh.
Bawngtal in buh a chil lai in a muk na gak ding uh ahi kei.

Unaute teng khawm uhenla, tapa neilou in a lak ua khat si leh, a sipa zi in pawlam a midang a kitenpih ding ahi kei. A pasal unaupa in a luah dia, zi in a nei dia, a pasal unau mohpuakna tung ah a hih ding ahi.
Hichi ahi ding a, a tachil suansak in Israel lak a, a min a manlouhna din a unau sip a min a pu ding ahi.

Aman a unaupa zi kitenpih a utkei leh, a unaupa zi kulh kongpi a upate kiang ah a hohtou dia, “Ka pasal unaupa’n Israel lak a a unaupa min omsak zel a utkei a, ka pasal unaupa hih ding ka tung ah a hih nuam kei” a va chi ding hi.
Huchi in a khaw upate un amah a sam ding ua, a houpih ding ua aman, “Ka kitenpih nuam kei” chi a apan leh;

A unaupa zi a kiang ah upate ma ah a hong dia, upate ma a va naihtou dia, a khedap a suahsak dia, a mai ah a chil a se ding hi. “A unaupa inkuan khotuah nuam loupa tung ah hichibang a hih hi ngeingei hen” a chi ding hi.
Huchi in, inkuan khedap suahsakpa, chi in Israelte lak ah a min putsak ahi ding hi.
Mi kilai uhenla, a khat penpa zi in a kilaih pihpa apan a pasal hon khe din a zahmoh kaihsakta leh;
a khut na tansak ding uh ahi. Na hehpih ding uh ahi kei.
Na ipsung uah bukna suang chi tuamtuam, a gik leh a zang na nei ding uh ahi kei.
Na inn uah tehna chi tuamtuam, a lian leh a neu na kem ding uh ahi kei.
Bukna diktak leh hoihtak na nei ding uh ahi. Tehna diktak leh hoihtak na nei ding uh ahi. Huchi in
Huchibang hihmi, diktatlou tak a hih tengteng
Aigupta gam apan na hong pawtna lampi ua Amalekte’n a hon na bawl dan uh:
Pathian leng lau lou a, na bahlai uh leh na nguailai ua lampi a hon kituahpih a, na lak ua a nanungpente, na nunglam ua hatloute, na bahlai leh na gimlai ua a hon na sualdante uh theigige un.
Huaiziak in hichi ahi ding a,
Huan hichi ahi ding a,
na Pathian un a honpiak na gam leigah tung masapen chiat uh na hontawi ding ua; bawm ah na koih ding ua,
Huai hun a siampu kiang ah na hoh ding ua, a kiang ah, honpiak dia i pi leh pute kiang a, a chiamna gam ka hongtungta uh, chih tuni in
Siampu in na khut ua kipan bawm a la dia,
Nou
Aigupta mite’n a hon simmawh ua, a hon hihgenthei ua, nasep haksa pipi a hon semsak uh.
Huchi in
Aigupta gam apan khut hattak, banzak, thillauhuai tak, chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte in a hon pikhia a;
hiai mun ah a hon pilut a, hiai gam, nawitui leh khuaizu luanna gam a honpia hi.
Ngai in,
na Pathian un na inkuante, noute, Levi mite, na lak ua gamdang mite thil hoih a honpiak tengteng ah kipaktak in na om ding uhi.

Kum thum kum, sawm a khat piak kum a na thil tung tengteng uh sawm a khat na piakkhit uleh, Levi mite, gamdang mite, pa neiloute, meithaite’n na omna uah a ne ding uh, a hong khosak theih samna ding un.

na Pathian uh ma ah, thu na honpiak tengteng bang in ka inn ua kipan thil siangthoute ka sepkhia ua, Levi mite, gamdang mite, pa neiloute leh meithaite ka peta uh. Na thupiak a koi mahmah ka bohse kei ua, ka mangngilh kei uhi.
Ka dahlai un huai ka ne kei ua, ka sian louhlai un ka thehthang sam kei ua. Misi tuam adin leng ka pe kei uhi.
Na omna siangthou van apan hon en inla, nawitui leh khuaizu luanna gam, ka pi uh leh pute piak dia na kichiamsa bang in na mi Israelte leh na gam honpiak vualzawl in, na chi ding uh.

Tuni in
Thu a hon chiamsa bang in leh a thupiak tengteng na zuihna ding un
A na gensa bang a
Huan Mosi leh Israel upate’n mipite thu a pia ua, tuni a k’on piak thupiak tengteng zui un.
na Pathian un a hon gam piak a lut dia Jordan na kan ni chiang un hichi ahi dia, suang liantakte na phut ding ua, suanglou na nuh ding uh ahi.
Na galkah khit chiang un a tung uah hiai danthu tengteng na gelh ding uh ahi. Huchi in
Jordan lui na galkah khit chiang un hichi ahi ding a, tuni a k’on thupiak bang in Ebal tang ah suangte na phut ding ua, suanglou na nuh ding uh ahi.
Huai ah
na Pathian uh maitam suang seklouh in na bawl ding uh ahi. Huai ah
Kilepna thillatte in na kithoih ding ua, huai ah na ne ding ua,
Suangte ah hiai danthu tengteng teltak in na gelh ding uh ahi, a chi hi.
Mosi leh siampu Levite’n Israel mi tengteng a houpih ua, Israel mite aw, hoihtak in ngaikhia un. Tuni in
Huaiziak in,
Huai ni mah in Mosi in mipite thu a pia a,
Jordan luigal na kahkhit chiang un mipite vualzawl ding in Gerizim tang ah hiaite adin ding uh ahi: Simeon nam, Levi nam, Judah nam, Issakar nam, Joseph nam leh Benjamin nam.
Hamsiat ding in hiaite Ebal tang ah adin ding uh ahi: Reuben nam, Gad nam, Asher nam, Zebulun nam, Dan nam leh Naphtali nam.
Levite’n a hon gen pan ua, Israel mi tengteng kiang ah aw ngaihtak in,
“Khutsiamte khutsuak
“A nu hiam, a pa hiam zahtaklou peuhmah hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a na chi ding uh.
“A invengte gamgi suan mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a na chi ding uh.
“Lampi apan mittaw lampi lou a paisak mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a na chi ding uhi.
“Gamdang mi, pa neilou leh meithai vai dikloutak a hawmsak mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a na chi ding uhi.
“A pa zi luppih mi hamsethuak in om hen” a pa niklem a hih ziak in, a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a na chi ding uh.
“Bang gan peuhpeuh luppih mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a na chi ding uhi.
“A sanggamnu, a pa tanu hiam, a nu tanu hiam, luppih mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a chi ding uhi.
“A sungnu luppih mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a na chi ding uh.
“A invengte gukthah mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a chi ding uhi.
“Poikhoihlou thahna dia golhna lami hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a chi ding uhi.
“Hiai danthute zui dia pom kiplou mi hamsethuak in om hen” a chi ding ua, mipi tengteng in, “Amen!” a chi ding uhi.
Huan hichi a honghi ding a,
na Pathian uh thu na zuih peuhmah uleh hiai vualzawlna tengteng na tung uah a hongtung dia, a honzui ding uhi:
Inlam leh gam lam ah vualzawl in na om ding uh.
Na gil ua gah, na lei ua gah, na ganhon, na bawngpi leh na belamhon uh vualzawl in a om ding.
Na bawm uh leh na tanghou mekna kuangte uh vualzawl in a om ding.
Vakkhete vualzawl in na om ding ua, in a honglutte leng vualzawl in na om ding uh.
Na melma nou hondoute
Na kiang ua a na kichiam bang in
Huchi in khovel namchih in
Nou piak dia na pi leh pute uh
a mei hilou in, a lu in a honbawl dia, a nuai nung hilou in, a tung nung na hi ding uhi.
A thute a bang mahmah taklam hiam, veilam hiam a pathian dangte zui leh nasem dia na pialsan kei peuhmah uleh.
Himahleh hichi a honghi ding a,
Inlam leh gam lam ah hamsia na thuak ding uh.
Na bawm uh leh na tanghou mekna kuang uh hamsethuak in a om ding uh.
Na gilgahte, na leigahte leh na bawngpi uh leh na belamhon gahte hamsethuak in a om ding uh.
Na pawtkhete uh hamsethuak in a om ding ua, a honglutte leng hamsethuak in a om ding uh.
Luah dia na lutna gam ua kipan a honhih manthat masiah
kumzawnna, khosik, bawkna, sat huthutna, namsau, keuna leh muatna in a hon gawt dia, na manthat vek masiah uh hiaite’n a hon delh ding uhi.
Na lu tung ua van dal ahi dia, na nuai ua lei sik ahi ding.
na gam vuah uh leivui leh vut a suaksak dia; na manthat masiah uh van apan na tung uah a hong ke ding hi.
Na luang uh tungleng vasa tengteng leh gamsa tengteng nekding an ahi dia, mi kuamah in amaute a delhmang kei ding uhi.
Hihdam theihlouh Aigupta meimatum, chithak, bawkna leh vunthak in
Haina, mittawtna leh lunglelhna in

Mittaw in khomial a maimai bang in, sun khovak nasan ah na maimai ding ua, na khosakna uah na lamzang kei ding uh. Nuaisiah ding leh gallak ding phet na hi ding ua, hon hunkhe ding kuamah a omkei ding uhi.
Zi na kham ding ua, midang in a luppih ding uh. Inn na lam ding ua, na luahkei ding uh. Grephuan na bawl ding ua, a gah na nekei ding uh.

Na mit muh un na bawngtal uh a hon gohsak ding ua, a sa na nekei ding uh. Na mitmuh un na sabiltung uh thagum a suhsak na hi ding ua, piakkik na hi kei ding uh. Na belam uh na melmate uh piak ahi ding; hon hun khe ding kuamah na neikei ding uh.
Na tanute uh leh na tapate uh namdangte piak ahi ding ua, nitum in amau ngai in na en vungvung ding ua, na et etna lam un na mitte uh a vai ding; bangmah lah hihtheih na neikei ding uhi.
Na leigah, na sepkhiat teng uh na theihlouh uh nam in a ne khin dia, hihgentheih leh hihsiat in na om gige ding uh.
Huchi in hiai thil mu in na hailoh ding uhi.
na khuk uah, na khe uah, hihdam theihlouh meimatum a hon veisak ding, na khepek ua kipan na lusip tanpha un.
Nou leh na kumpipa uh nangawn in na pi leh pute’n a theih ngeilouh uh nam kiang ah
a hon pimang na ding nam tengteng lak ah lamdang chih leh paunak leh a selam a gentehna na honghi ding uhi.
Lou ah buhchi tampi na kuankhiak pih ding ua, tawmchik kia na la ding uh, khaupe in a negai vek ding hi.
Grephuan na bawl ding ua, na kem ding ua, himahleh a uain na dawn kei ding uh. Grep lah na lou kei ding uh, lung in a negai ding hi.
Na gam tengteng uah olive sing na suan ding ua, himahleh a thau na nilh kei ding uh, na olive gahte uh a pulh khin ding hi.
Tanu tapa na suang ding ua, himahleh sal a kaihmang a, a om ding ziak un na ompih khakei ding uhi.
Na theikung tengteng uh leh na leigah tengteng uh khaupe an ahi ding.
Gamdang mi na lak ua tengte na tung uah a sang hiaihiai ding ua, nou na niam giaigiai ding uhi.
A hon leitawisak ding ua, nou zaw na leitawisak kei ding uh. Amau a lu ahi ding ua, nou a mei na hi ding uh.
Hiai hamsia tengteng na tung uah a hongtung dia, a hondelh dia, a honpha dia; hih manthat a na om masiah uh; a thupiak leh a dan honpiak zui dia
Na tung uah leh na suante uh tung ah tangtawn a dia chiamtehna leh lamdang chih ding in a om ding uhi.
Thil bangkim a na hong kiningchin ua leng
Huaiziak in, nou hondou dia
Gamlapi apan kawlmong apan nou hondou ding nam,
nam lauhuai melpu, upa leng khawksalou leh tuailaite leng deihsak tuamlou.
Na ganhon pungte leh na leigah, na manthat masiah uh a ne ding ua, buh, uain, thau, na bawnghon leh na belamhonte uh a hawikei ding uh, na tung ua manna a hon tunsak tan in.
Na gam tengteng ua na muanpen uh, na kulhsangte uh a chip tan in na kulh kongpi tengteng uah a hon um ding ua,
Na melmate’n a hon um bichilh ziak un leh a hon khelh chipna uah na gil ua gah,
Na lak ua mi nunnem leh chingkam nangawn in leng a unaupa, ahihkeileh a zi it, a ompihlai a tate ngialtak leng a it kei ding hi.
Bangmah a neih nawnlouh ziak in a tate uh sa a nekding kuamah a pekei ding hi. A hon umna uh leh a hon khelh chipna uah, na melmate’n na kulh kongpi ua a hon khelhchip ziak un.
Na lak ua numei chinou leh chingek, a chinouna leh a chingekna ziak a lei leng sik nuamlou in a pasal deih mahmah uh, a tapate, a tanute;
a pomlai a tasen leh a ta pianglai ding leng a en mawh ding uh. Bangkim a taksap khit ziak in a simnek ding; na melmate’n na kulh kongpi ua a hon khelhchip ziak un.
noute leh na suante uh tung ah hipi lamdangtak, hipi leng gige, damlouhna haksatak leng gige chi a lengsak ding hi.
Na lauh mahmah uh Aigupta gam hite na tung uah a lengsak nawn dia, a hon lenkip ding uhi.

Van a aksi zah hita noute tawmchik kia na hong hita ding uh;
Hichi ahi ding a, hon hihhoih ding leh hon pungsak dia
Huai nam lak ah tawldamna na mu kei ding ua, na khe ua din khawlna a omkei dia; huai ah,
Na hinna uh lauthawng gige in a om dia, sun leh zan in lau gige in na om ding ua, na hinna un kitheihchetna a neikei ding hi.

Horeb tang a a kiang ua thu a khun simlouh,

Khemna thupi mahmahte, chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte na mit mahmah ua na muh uh.
Himahleh
Gamdai ah kum sawmli ka honpi a; na puansilhte uh na silh tul kei ua, na khedapte uh leng na buntul kei lai uhi.
Kei,
Hiai mun na hongtun un Heshbon kumpipa Sihon leh Bashan kumpipa Og hondou din a hong kuan ua, amau i na zou uh.
A gam uh i la ua, Reubente, Gadte, Manasseh nam kimkhatte luah din i pia uhi.
Na thilhih tengteng ua na lamzan zel theihna ding un hiai thukhun thute pom unla, zui un.
Tuni in na vek un, na nam lupente uh, na upate uh, na heutute uh leh Israelmi tengteng,
na ta neute uh, na zite uh, na tenna ua gamdang mi na om pih uh, na singphukmi uh leh na tuitawi mite uh nangawn in;
na Pathian uh kichiamna leh a thukhun tuni a nou toh a bawl a na lut theihna ding un:
Na pipute uh Abraham, Isak leh Jakob kiang a a na kichiam bang leh na kiang ua a na gensa bang a a mite hidia tuni a a hon hihkip theihna ding leh na Pathian uh a hihtheihna ding in;

pathian dangte, a theih ngeilouh uh pathiante, aman a sehsak louhte na sem a, a biak ziak un.

Thil kiselte
Huan, hichi ahi ding a, hiai thil tengteng na ma ua ka omsak, vualzawlna leh hamsiate na tung ua a hongtun a,
na Pathian lam na ngat nawn ua, tua thu k’on piak bang a nou leh na tate utoh na lungtang tengteng uh leh na lungsim tengteng ua a aw na zuih hun chiang un:
Na lak ua mi van tawppha a delhkhiak a om uleh,
na Pathian un na pi leh pute un a luah gam ah a hon pilut nawn dia, na luah ding uh. Aman a hon lamzang sak dia, na pi leh pute uh khup in a hon pungsak ding hi.

na Pathian un hiai hamsia tengteng a hon simmawhte, na melmate uh leh a hon hawte tung ah a tungsak ding hi.
Na hong kihei nawn ding ua,
na Pathian un na khutngakna tengteng uah, na gil ua gah ah, na ganhon gah uah leh na gam gah uah hoih a tungsak dia, na pi leh pute uh tung a a kipah bang in na tung uah
Hiai dan bu a tuang a thupiakte, a dante zui dia
Hiai thupiak, tua k’on piak nou adin a haksa law kei a, gamlat leng a hon gamlat kei hi.
I zak ua i zuih theihna din, “Kua ahia van a hon kahsak a, hon laksak ding?” chih din van a om ahi kei hi.
I zak ua i zuih theihna din tuipi gal ah “Kuan ahia hon va hohsak dia, hon laksak ding?” chih din tuipi gal a om leng ahi sam kei.
Na zuih theihna ding un thu in a honnaih mahmah a, na kam uh leh na lungtang uah a om hi.
Tuin na ma uah hinna leh hoih, sihna leh hoihlou ka koih hi.
na Pathian uh it ding, a lampi zui ding, a thupiak, a dan, a vaihawm, zui dia tua k’on thupiak na zuih uleh na hing ding ua, na hongpung ding ua, na valuah ding gam ah
Himahleh na lungtang uh a ki heimang a, na ngaihkhiak kei ua, pimang a na om ua, pathian dangte na biak ua, a na uh na sep uleh;
na mangthang ngeingei ding uh, chih tuin k’on hilh ahi. Jordan lui kan a, luah dia na va lutna gam ah na damsawt kei ding uhi.
Na ma uah hinna leh sihna, vualzawlna leh hamsia ka koih chih tu a hon theihpih ding in lei leh van ka sam ahi. Huchi in hinna tel un, na hinna ding un nou leh na suante uh toh.

na Pathian uh it in, a aw zui in, amah len chinten un, amah na hinna uh, na damsawtna uh lah ahi ngal a. Huchi in na pu uh Abraham, Isak leh Jakob kiang a kichiam a piak gam ah na teng ding uhi, a chi hi.
Huan, Mosi in, Israel mite teng kiang ah hiai thu a gen hi.
“Tuin kum za leh sawmnih ka hita a; ka vialvak zou nawn kei.
na Pathian un na ma uh a pi dia, hiai namte a hon hihsiat sak dia, a gam uh na luah ding uh.
Amorte kumpipa, Sihon leh Og leh a gam tung ua a hih bang in a tung uah a hih dia; amaute a hihse ding hi.
amau a honpe dia, thu ka honpiak thupiak tengteng a tung uah na hih ding uhi.
Kuhkaltak leh hangsantak in om un. Lau kei unla, kihta sam kei un. Na kiang ua honpepa
Mosi in Joshua a sam a, Israel mi tengteng mit muh in a kiang ah, “Hattak leh hangsantak in om in. Hiai mite toh a kiang ua a pi leh pute uh
Na ma uh pipa
Mosi in dan a gelh a,
Mosi in, amau thu a pia a, “Kum sagih kum, ngaihdam kum teng a bawkta Ankuangluina,
mun a seh dia Israel mi tengteng
Mipite, numei leh pasal, na ta neu chikchikte uh, na ompih uh gamdang mite, amau a ngaihkhiak ua, a kisin ua,
a tate uh a theinailoute’n leng a zak ua, Jordan luikan a na valuah ding uh gam a na ten sungteng ua
puanin ah meipi ding in a kilak a; meipi ding puanin kongpi lu tung ah ading hi.

Huchi in huai chiang in a tung uah ka heh dia, ka lehngatsan dia, ka kibuk mangsan dia, hihsiat in a om ding uh. Thil hoihlou leh mangbatna tampi a tung uah a tung ding hi. Huchi in huai ni’n, i Pathian uh i lak ua a omlouh ziak in hiai thil hoihlou i tung uah a hongtung ahi kei maw? a chi ding uh.
Pathian dangte lam nga a thil hoihlou a hih ding tengteng uh ziak in huai ni’n ka kibuk san ngeingei ding hi.
Huaiziak in, tuin ‘hiai la gelh inla, Israel suante sinsak inla, a kam uah koih in. Hiai la Israel suante kalhna a kei adia theihpihtu a hih theihna ding in.

A pi leh pute uh kiang a kichiam a ka chiam, nawitui leh khuaizu luang gam ah ka pi a, ne leh ta in a om ua, a tai ua, a hong thau hial chiang un pathian dangte lam a nga ding ua, a nna uh a sem ding ua, kei a hon hehsak ding ua, ka thukhun a bohse ding uh’.

Hichi ahi ding a, thil hoihlou leh mangbatna tampi a tung ua a hongtun chiang in, hiai la a khelhna uh theihpihtu ahi ding. A suante kam apan mangngilh theih ahi kei ding hi. Tuin ka kichiam gam a ka pilut ma him in leng a lunggel uh a kawi dan ka thei hi,” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mosi in, huai la, huai ni mahmah in a gelh a, Israel suante a sinsak hi.
Nun tapa Joshua kiang ah hiai thupiak a pia hi. “Hattak leh hangsantak in om in. Israel suante kiang a ka kichiam bang in huai gam ah na pilut ding hi. Na kiang ah ka om ding,” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Mosi in hiai danthute laibu a gelhkhit a mansa ahihvek nung in:
“Hiai dan bu la unla, noute kalh a theihpihtu hi din
Na helhat dan uh leh na paupen dan uh ka thei hi. Ngai un, tua k’on dampih lai a bawn
A bil ua zak a hiai thu ka gen a, noute kalh a theihpihtu dia lei leh van ka sap theihna din na nam ua intekpen tengteng leh na heutute uh hon samkhawm un.

Ka sihnungin nakpitak in na kihihse ding ua, k’on thupiak lampi apan na pial ding uh chih ka thei kilkel hi. A tawp chiang ngial in houh thil hoihlou in a hon buak khum dia; na khut thilhih ua hihheh din
Mosi in, Israel kikhawm khawm tengteng zak in hiai la thu a bul apan a tawppha in a genvek hi.
Bil na doh un, vante aw, ka gen ding hi. Lei aw, ka kam a thu za in.
Vuahtui bang in ka thu a zu ding a,
Daitui bang in ka thugen a tak ding.
Loupa nou dipdip tung a vuah bang leh lounah tung a vuah phin bang in.
Amah suangpi ahi,
A thilhih a dik kim sipsip hi.
A omdan tengteng dan ahi.
Pathian muanhuai,
thulimlouhna neilou,
diktat leh hoih ahi.
Amau leh amau a kihihsia ua,
a tate ahi kei uh,
gensiat a lohna uh ahi,
suan ginalou leh genhak ahi uhi.
Mihai leh pilloute aw,
huchi in maw,
Nou honsuang,
na pa uh ahi kei maw?
A honbawl a,
a hon ding kipsak hi.
Nidanglai nite theigige inla,
suan tampi kumte ngaihtuah dih.
Na pa dong in,
a hon kawkmuh ding,
na upate’n leng a honhilh ding uhi.
Tungnung Pen in namte gam a piaklai a,
mihing tate a khenlai in namte gamgi Israel suante zah in a khung hi.
Jakob lah a goutan ahi.
Gamdai gam ah a mu a,
gamdai sia mau honhon ah,
a kim ua omkhum in a kem a,
A mit laivom bang in a kem hi.
Muvanlai in a bu a a nou tokthou a,
a nou tung ah kha a zap a, a khate a zak a,
a tuah a, a kha a a puak bang in;
Gamdang pathian hilou in
Lei munsangte ah a tuangsak a,
lou a thil tung a ne zel a;
suangpi apan khuaizu a kikhoh khesak zel a,
suangtak apan thau toh;
Bawng nawitui khal,
belam nawitui,
belamnou thau toh,
Bashan uain na dawn ding.
Himahleh Jeshurun a hongthau a,
a hong kipek a; na thau a,
na sapha a, na maitai a;
a bawlpa Pathian a lehngatsanta,
hotdamna Suangpi a ngaineu hi.
Gamdang pathiante’n
i Pathian mullitna a tokthou a,
thil kihhuai in a hehsak hi.
Pathian hilou, dawite kiang ah
a theih ngeilouh uh
pathiante kiang ah,
a hong khonung om phing
pathian thakte, na pi,
na pute un a kihtak ngeilouh uh kiang ah.
Nang honsuang Suangpi na
ngaisang kei, nang hon bawlpa Pathian na mangngilh lai hi.
Huai
a mudah a, a tanu leh tapate’n a hih heh ziak un.
Ka bukmang san dia,
a tawpna uh bang ahi dia
chih ka en ding a chi.
Suan thulimlou ginna neilou tate ahi uhi.
Pathian hilou thil in ka mullitna a tokthou ua;
a thil ginalou un a hon hehsak uh;
chi a genlouhte ka mullitsak dia,
nam haite in ka hehsak ding hi.
Ka hehna a kuang a, gawtmun nuainung pen tan in a kang a,
lei leh a thilpung a kang ding,
tangte kingaknate mei in a kang ding hi.
A tung uah siatna ka chiangkhawm dia,
a tung uah thal ka khah ding.
Gilkial in a gongthak ding ua,
meisa leh siatna in a kang mang ding ua,
a tung uah gamsa hate ka sawl dia,
leivui a gulte gu toh.
Nungak, tangval, nawi nelai,
lu a kelsam poute tanpha’n pawlam ah namsau in a si ding ua,
sung lam ah launa in.
Ken, ka delhzak vek ding,
mihing lak a amau theihgigena ka hihmang vek ding.
Melma thangpaihna laulou hileng,
a melmate un theikhial in,
i khut uh tawisang in a omta,
huai teng
a chi kha ding uhi, ka chi hi.
Pilna neilou namte ahi ua,
amau ah theihsiamna a omkei.
Aw, pil le uh hiaite a theisiam
ding ua, a tunung thu uh ngaihtuah ding hive un!
Bangchi’n khat in sang a delh dia,
nih in sing a taikek sak ding ua,
a Suangpi un amaute a khawngkhinta hi,
A suangpi uh lah i melmate
mahmah theihdan in leng
i Suangpi bang ahi kei hi.
A grepgui uh Sodom grepgui ahi a,
a loute uh Gomorrah loute ahi.
A grepte uh sinkha grepte ahi uh,
a gahbomte a kha hi.
A uainte uh dragon gu leh
gulgial gu khatak ahi.
Hiai ka kholkhawm, ka goubawm a bilh bikbek ahi kei maw?
Phulak leh thuk zaw
kei hih ding ahi,
a siksan uh a teu hun chiang in;
a siatna ni uh a hong naita,
a tung ua thil hongtung dingte a hong tungpahta ding hi.
a sikhate leng a lainat ding,
a thilhihtheihna uh a bei chih leh kuamah sikha leh noplen a omkei,
chih a muh chiang in.
Aman a pathiante uh koi ah,
a muan suangpi uh koi ah;
a kithoihna thau netute,
a dawn thillat uain dawntute?
Hong thou in nou hong panpih uhenla,
nou hon humbittute hile uh a ke, a chi ding.
Kei, kei mahmah ka hihthei unla,
pathian dang a omkei.
Ka that a, ka hingsak a,
ka liamsak a, ka damsak hi.
Ka khut apan noute hon hunkhe thei kuamah a omkei uhi
Vanlam ah ka khut ka zak a,
Keimah hinna lou in ka kichiam hi.
Ka namsau tat-hiam a,
ka khut a vaihawmna ka let leh ka melmate tung ah phu ka la dia,
kei hon hawte ka thuk ding hi.
Ka thaltangte a sisan uah ka diah dia,
ka namsau in sateng ka that bei dia;
thahte leh salte sisan toh
melmate tung a phulakna a kipan,
a chi ding hi.
Aw, nou nam chihte aw,
a mite toh kipak un;
a sikhate sisan phuba a la ding hi.
Amah doute tung ah phu a la ding,
a gam leh a mite adin
kilemna bukim a bawl ding.
Huchi in mipite zak in Mosi leh Nun tapa, Joshua in hiai la thu tengteng a gen uhi.
Mosi in huai thu tengteng Israel mi tengteng kiang a a genkhit in, a kiang uah;
Tua na kiang ua k’on thu theihsak ah na lungtang uh koih kip unla, hiai dan tengteng pilvang mahmah a zui din na tate uh thupia un.
Nou adin thil bangmahlou lel ahi kei a, na hinna uh ahi ngal a. Hiai thilhih in luah dia Jordan na va galkahna gam uah na damsawt ding uhi, a chi hi.
Huai ni mah in
Moab gam a Jeriko zawn a Abarim tang dung a Nebo tang ah va hohtou inla, Israel suante luah dia ka piak Kanan gam va gal et in.
Na unaupa Aron Hor tang a si a, a chipihte kiang a pi a hihtak mah bang in na kahtouh na tang ah na si dia, na chipihte kiang a pi na hita ding hi.
Jin gamdai a Kadesh a Meribah tui a Israel suante lak a ka tung a na khelh ziak in leh Israel suante lak a n’on pahtawilouh ziak in.
Tua gam na va galmuh dia; himahleh Israel suante ka piak gam ah na lut kei ding, a chi hi.
Hiai vualzawlna in ahi, Pathian mi Mosi in a sih ma a Israel suante a vualzawlna:
Sinai apan
Seir apan a kiang uah a thou khia a,
Mi Siangthou sang sawm lak apan a hongpai;
A khut taklam apan amau adin meikuang bang dan a om.
Ahi, a mite a it a,
Mi Siangthou tengteng
na khut ah a om uh.
Na khebul ah a tu ua;
na thute a zuichiat ding uh.
Mosi in eite dan a honpia,
Jakob mipite gouluah ding.
Jeshurun ah amah kumpipa ahi,
mipite intekpen leh Israel chi tengteng a omkhawm lai un.
Reuben hing hen, silou in,
a mite ahihleh tawm kei uhen.
Hiai Judah vualzawlna ahi.
a mite kiang ah pilut in.
A khut amah adin kiching henla,
nang a melmate doupihpa hi in.
Levi tungthu ah,
na Thummim leh na Urim,
na Mi Siangthou kiang ah omsak in,
Massah ah na ze-et a,
Meribah tuite ah na dou hi.
Ka nu leh ka pa ka theikei, chi in;
a unaute leng a thei sam kei hi.
Amah tate ngeileng a thei tuankei;
na thu a pom ua,
na thukhun a zui ngal ua.
Na vaihawmte Jakob a sinsak ding ua,
Israelte, na dan.
Na ma ah gimlim a koih ding ua,
na maitam ah haltum thillat.
A neihte vualzawl in,
a khut nasepte a na pom inla;
amah doute kawng sat inla,
amah hawte kawng toh,
adin nawnlouhna ding un.
Benjamin tungthu ah zaw,
a kiang ah bit in a teng ding.
Nitum in amah a khuh dia,
a liangte kikal ah a teng ding.
Joseph tungthu ah zaw,
a gam
van thil mantam daitui in,
tui thuk mahmah nuai lam a tui in.
Nisa in a piansak gah manphate leh khapi in a omsak thil mantamte in.
Nidanglai tangte a thil
deihhuaipente in,
tangtawn tang a thil mantamte in.
Lei leh a tung a thil mantamte in,
loubuk a ompa deihsakna in.
Vualzawlna Joseph lu tung ah hongom hen,
a unaute apan hihtuam a ompa lusip ah.
A thupina bawngtal piang masa thupina bang ahi a,
a kite gam bawngtal kite bang ahi.
Huai in namchih a si a,
kawlmong tan in a si ding.
Amaute Ephraim sang sawmte ahi ua,
Manasseh sangte ahi uhi.
Zebulun tungthu ah, Kipak in,
Zebulun, na vakkhiaknate ah,
Issakar, na puaninte ah.
Tang ah chichih a sam ding ua,
huai ah diktatna kithoihnate a lan ding uh.
Tuipi buchinna ne ding ahi ngal ua,
piaunel a gou kiselte toh, a chi hi.
Gad tungthu ah, Gad hihlianpa phat in om hen,
humpinelkai bang in a teng a, a luzang in a ban a hamkek hi.
Amah adin a hoihna pen a tel a,
Dan pepa tantuan mun a
amah a tut ziak in,
intekpente toh a hoh a,
dik leh Israelte kiang a
vaihawmnate a zui hi.
Dan tungthu,
Dan humpinelkai nou ahi a,
Bashan apan a hong tawm ding.
Naphtali tungthu ah, Naphtali aw,
deihsakna a lungkim,
sim leh tum luah in.
Asher tungthu ah, Asher tate a
vualzawl in om henla,
a unaute lak ah tuitum henla;
thau ah a khete diah hen.
Na khedap sik leh dal ahi dia,
na damsung ni bang in
na hatna leng a om ding.
Jeshurun Pathian nang hon panpih dia van a tuang,
thupitak a van a tuang bang kua mahmah a omkei uhi.
Tangtawn Pathian na kibukna ahi a,
nuai lam ah a tangtawn ban a om,
melmate a hon satmang dia,
Hihmang in, a chi ding hi.
Israel bel galmuangtak in
amah kia in a teng dia,
Jakob tui leh buh leh uain
gam ah a om ding,
a vante’n leng daitui a kesak ding uhi.
Na hampha hi, aw, Israel,
nangmah bang a
Nang hon panpihpa phaw,
na thupina namsau ahi!
Na melmate nang ah a hong kipe ding ua,
nang a munsangte uh na tuanchil ding hi.
Huan, Mosi Moab phaizang apan Jeriko zawn a Nebo tang, Pisgah tang vum ah a hohtou a;
Naphtali leh Ephraim gam tengteng, Manasseh leh Judia gam tengteng, a tumlam tuipi pha in.
Sim gam leh tum khopi Jeriko phaizang, Zoar pha in.
a kiang ah, “Hiai gam ahi, Abraham, Isak leh Jakob kiang a, ‘Na suante ka pe ding,’ chi a kichiam a ka na chiam. Muh ahihleh k’on musak peuhmah a, himahleh huai ah na paikei ding,” a chi hi.
Huchi in
Beth Peor zawn a Moab gam phaizang ah Toupa’n a vui a; himahleh tunitan in kuamah in a han a theikei uh.
Mosi a sih in kum za leh sawmnih a upa ahi; a mit a mial kei a, a tha leng a kiam tuankei hi.
Israel suante’n Mosi Moab phaizang ah ni sawmthum a kah ua, Huchi in Mosi sun a a kah nite uh a hong beita hi.
Nun tapa Joshua pilna kha in a dim a; Mosi in a tung a, a khut a koih ziak in. Israel suante’n a thu a zui ua,
Huai nung in Israelte lak ah Mosi bang a
Chiamtehna leh thillamdang tengteng, Pharo leh a sikha tengteng kiang leh Aigupta gam tengteng a ensak a,
khut hattak leh lauhuai pipi a Israel mi teng mitmuh a Mosi in a hih bang hih a omkei uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a,
“Ka sikha Mosi a sita a; thou inla, nang leh hiai mipi tengteng in Jordan lui kan unla, Israel suante ka piak gam ah pai un.
Mosi kiang a ka gensa bang in na khepek ua na sikna peuhmah uh k’on pevek ding.
Gamdai apan leh hiai Lebanon tang apan lui lianpi Euphrates luipha a, Hitte gam tengteng, nitumna lam a tuipi zatak pha in na gam uh ahi ding.
Na damsung teng kuamah himhim in a hon nangzou kei ding. Mosi kiang a ka om bang in, nang kiang ah leng ka om ding hi. K’on zuausan kei dia, pai leng k’on paisan sam kei ding hi.
Hattak leh hangsantak in om in. A suante uh kichiam a piak ka na chiamsa gam, hiaite luahsak ding na hi ngal a.

Ka sikha Mosi in dan tengteng zui dia thu a honpiak zui chinten din hattak leh hangsantak in om peuhmah phot in. Na paina teng a na lamzan zel theihna ding in na taklam ah hiam, na veilam ah hiam pialsan het ken.

Hiai danbu in na kam pawtsan hetkei hen. Hiai a thu kigelh tengteng na zuih chinten theihna ding in sun leh zan in na ngaihtuah zaw ding ahi. Huchi in na lampite na tuahpha sakdia, na hong lamzang ding hi.
Thu ka honpia hilou hiam? Hattak leh hangsantak in om in. Lau kenla, lunglel sam ken,
Joshua in mipi heutute thu a pia a,
“Giahphual vasik unla, mipite kiang ah, ‘Nekding sutuah dih ua, Tu apan ni thum in
Reubente, Gadte leh Manasseh nam kim khatte kiang ah Joshua in,

Na zite uh, na ta neu chikchikte leh na ganhonte uh zaw Jordan lui gal a Mosi in gam a hon na piak ah a om ding uh. Nou mi hat leh hangsan teng kigalvansa in na pai masa ding ua, na unaute uh na panpih ding ua,
na unaute uh noute bangmah a khawlna a piak a,
Amau, “Hihdia n’on thupiak tengteng ka hih ding uh, N’on sawlna teng ah leng ka pai ding uh.
Banglam peuh a Mosi thu ka zuih bang un, nang thu leng ka zui ding uh.
Kuapeuh na thupiak kalh a, hel a, thu na piak peuhmah zui nuamlou zaw hihlup ding ahi. Hattak leh hangsantak in om peuhmah phot in” chi in Joshua a dawng uhi.

Huan Nun tapa Joshua in, “A gam leh Jeriko khua va en mahdih ua” chi in mi nih Sittim apan a sim a enkhe ding a sawl hi. A va hoh ua, kizuak khat, a min Rahab inn ah a valut ua, huai ah a va zintung uhi.
“Ngai in, tu zan in gam enkhe din Israel suante a hong uh” chi in Jeriko kumpipa hilh in a om hi.
Jeriko khaw kumpipa’n, “Na inn a hongtung mikhualte hon pekhia in. Gam pumpi enkhe dia hong ahi uh” chi din Rahab kiang ah mi a sawl hi.
Numei in huai mi nihte a pi a, a sel a, a kiang uah, “He, mite ka kiang ah a hong ngei ngut ua, himahleh koi apan hongpai ahi ua, chih zaw ka theikei.
Hichi ahi a, khomial, kulh kongpi khak hunlai in huai mite a pawtkhe nawnta uh. Koi lam ah ahia a pai uh ka theita kei hi. Delh meng le uchin, na phalai ding uh” a chi hi.
Himahleh in tung ah a pitou a, in tung a jija kung siatkhawm lak a selkhin lah ahi ngal a.
Mite’n Jordan lui lam ah, a galkaina tan in a vadelh ua; a delhmite a pawt khiak tak un kulh kongpi a khak uhi.
A lup ma un in tung ah a kiang uah a va hohtou hi.
A kiang uah, “Hiai gam
Aigupta gam apan na hongpawt khiak un
Huai ka na zak tak un, ka lungtangte uh a zulkhin a, noute ziak a laulou himhim a omkei hi.
Tuin na tung uah ka hehpihna ka langsakta hi, nou leng ka pa inkawte tung ah na hehpihna uh langsak sam un.
Ka nu leh ka pa, ka sanggam pasalte, ka sanggam numeite leh a neih teng uh hawi unla, sihna lak apan ka hinna uh hon hum bitsak din
Mite’n a kiang ah, “Ka thilhih uh na genkhiak kei ding leh na sih tang in ka si ding uh. Hichi ahi ding a,
Tohlet ah khauhual a zan khesuk a; a inn khopi kulh khou a om ahi a, kulh tung a teng ahi.

A kiang uah, “Tanglam zuan in pai un, huchilou in zaw nou hon delhte’n a honmu kha ding uh. Huai ah ni thum va kibu un; nou hon delhte a hong kiknawn masiah uh. Huai zoh chiang in na pai nawn na ding uh” a chi hi.
Mite’n a kiang ah, “Kichiamna a n’on kichiamsakna ah zaw dembei ka hi ding uh.
Ngai in, hiai gam ka honglut chiang un hiai khausan n’on khiakna tohlet ah na gak belh in. inn sung ah na kiang ah na pa, na nu, na sanggam teng leh na pa inkawte tengteng pilut vek in.

Hichi ahi ding a, na inn kongpi apan kholak a pawtkhe peuhmah a lu tung ah a sisan a om dia, kou ahihleh mawh in ka omkei ding uh. Kuapeuh insung a na kiang a om peuhmah a tung ua khutkhak ahihleh, ka lu tung uah a sisan uh a om ding hi.
Himahleh ka thilhih uh na genkhiak leh n’on kichiamsakna ah mawh in ka omkei ding uh” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Na thu bangzel uh hileh ake” a chi a; huchi in amau a khakhia a, a paita uhi. Tohlet ah khau san a gakden hi.
A pai ua, huai tang a va tung ua, huai ah ni thum, amau delhte a kiknawn masiah uh a va om uhi. A delh mite’n lamtawn in a zong ua, himahleh a mu zoukei uh.
Huai mi nihte a kiknawn ua, huai tang apan a paisuk ua, a galkah ua, Nun tapa Joshua kiang a tung ua; a tung ua thiltung tengteng a hilh uh.
Joshua kiang ah, “
Huan, Joshua zingkhang in a thou a, Israel suan tengteng toh Shittim apan a kisuan ua, Jordan lui a tung uhi. A galkah ma un huai ah a giak uhi.
Hichi ahi a, ni thum nung in heutute’n giahphual a vatawn vialvial uhi.

Himahleh nou toh a kal tehna tong sang nih vel ahi ding ahi. Naih kei unla, huchi in na paina ding lampi na theithei ding uhi. Hiai lampi lah tuma lam in na tawn ngei ngalkei ua” chi in mipite thu a pia uhi.
Joshua in mipite kiang ah, “Kihih siangthou un, zingchiang a Toupa’n na lak ua thillamdang mahmah hih ding ahi” a chi hi.
Joshua in siampute kiang ah, “Thukhun bawm zawng unla, mipite ma ah galkah un” a chi hi. Huchi in thukhun bawm a zawng ua, mipite ma ah a paita uhi.
Thukhun bawm zawng siampute, Jordan luigei na tun chiang un, Jordan lui ah dingden un, chi in thu pia in” a chi hi.
Joshua in Israel suante kiang ah, “Hongpai unla,
Joshua in, “Hiai ah Pathian hing na lak uah a om a, na ma uah Kanante, Hitte, Hivte, Perizte, Girgaste, Amorte leh Jebuste a delhkhe ngeingei ding hi.
Ngai un, lei pumpi Toupa thukhun bawm in na ma uah Jordan lui a kan hi.
Israel namte lak a mi sawmlehnih, namchih sik in mi khat zel telkhia un.
Hichi ahi ding a,
Hichi ahi a, mipite Jordan lui kan dia a puanin ua kipan a pawtlai un, thukhun bawm zawng siampute mipite ma ah a pai uhi.
Bawm zawngte Jordan lui a va tung ua, bawm zawng siampute khe in tuigei a siktakin, buhlak sung teng Jordan lui a kuang tengteng ah tui a let gige hi.

Saklam apan tuipi luanglai a khawlta a, gamla kuamtak a Zarethan gam chin a Adam khua ah a hong kiching hi. Arabah tuipi, chi tuipi lam a luangsuk lai a kitat geih a; huchi in mipite Jeriko khozawn tak ah a galkahta uhi.
thukhun bawm zawng siampute Jordan luilai ah, leihul ah ading ua, mipi tengteng Jordan lui a galkah vek uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, a nam pumpi in Jordan lui a galkah siang nung un,
“Mipite lak a mi sawmlehnih, namchih a mi khatzel telkhia inla,
A kiang uah, Jordan luilai, siampute dinna laitak a suangte sawmlehnih la unla, pawphei unla, giahphual, tu zan a na giahna ding uah koih un, chi in thu pia in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Joshua in Israel suante lak a mi sawmlehnih, namchih a mi khat zel a telkhiakte a sam a;
Joshua in a kiang uah, “Toupa na Pathian uh ma ah bawm in Jordan luilai ah galkah unla, Israel suante a nam zah zel in, michih in suang khatchiat pua hen.
Hiaite na lak uah chiamtehna a honghi dia, tunung chiang in na tate un, hiai suangte bang na chihna uh ahia? chi a a hondot chiang un,
Nou a kiang uah,
Israel suante’n Joshua thupiak bang in a hih ua, Israel suante’n a nam zah zel in, Jordan luilai a suang sawmlehnih a la ua; a giahphual uah, a paw phei ua, huai ah a koih uhi.
Thukhun bawm zawng siampute dinna laitak Jordan luilai ah Joshua in huai suang sawmlehnihte a phut a; huaite tunitan in a omlai uhi.
Mosi in Joshua thu a na piak tengteng bang a
Hichi ahi a, mipi tengteng a galkah siangvek nung un,
Reuben suante, Gad suante leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte Mosi in a kiang ua a na genkhitsa bang in, Israel suante ma ah kigalvan in a galkah uh.
Galvan a kivan dimdiam mi sing li vel galdou din Jeriko phaizang ah
Huai ni’n
Joshua kiang ah thu a gen a:
“Siampute, thu theihpihna bawm zawngte Jordan lui apan hongpawt ding in thupia in” a chi hi.
Joshua in siampute, “Jordan lui apan hong pawtta un” chi in thu a pia hi.
Hichi ahi a, siampute,
Mipite a kha khatna, ni sawm ni’n Jordan lui apan a pawt ua, Jeriko suahlam pang Gilgal ah giahphual a satta uhi.
Suang sawmlehnih, Jordan lui apan a puakkhiak uh, Joshua in Gilgal ah a phut hi.
Israel suante kiang ah, “Tunung chiang a na suante un a pate uh, hiai suangte bang chihna ahia? chi a hondot chiang un,
‘Israelte’n Jordan lui leihul ah a galkah ua ahi, chi in na suante uh na theisak ding uhi.’
na Pathian un nidanglai a Tuipi San i galkah masiah ua, i ma ua a na kangtat sak mah bang in,
Lei a nam chiteng in
Huan hichi ahi a, Jordan lui khen suahlam a om Amorte kumpipa tengteng leh tuipi gei a om Kanan gam kumpipa tengtengte’n a galkah masiah uh
Huailai in
Joshua in temta hiamte a kibawla, Israel suante Gibeth Haraloth ah a zek uh a sumsak hi.
Joshua in a zeksumna san hiai ahi: Aigupta gam apan pawt tengteng, pasal galdoumi tengteng Aigupta gam apan a pawt khiak nung un lamkal ah gamdai ah a sihkhittak ziak uh ahi.
Aigupta gam apan pawt tengteng zeksumsa vek ahi ua; himahleh Aigupta gam apan a pawt ua gamdai a lamkal a piang tengteng bel zeksum ahi kei uhi.
aw a ngaihkhiak noplouh ziak ua mipi tengteng, Aigupta gam apan hongpawt galdoumite tan hihman a a omvek tan un Israel suante gamdai ah kum sawmli a vialvak uhi.
A suante uh amau sik a a khan letsakte Joshua in a zek uh a sum sak hi. Lamkal a a zek uh sum a hih louh ziak in zeksum louh a na hi him uhi.
Hichi ahi a, mipi tengteng zek a sum khit un, a dam mateng uh amau giahphual chiat uah a om uhi.
Joshua kiang ah, “Tuni in Aiguptate’n nou a hon muhsitna uh noumau apan ka khuk mangta” a chi hi. Huchi in tunitan in huai mun Gilgal a chi uhi.
Israel suante’n Gilgal ah giahphual a sat ua; Jeriko phaizang ah huai kha, a ni sawmlehli ni’n Paikan Ankuang a lui uhi.
Paikan khit a zingmah in huai gam a tanghou silngou sohlouh leh vaimim kan a ne uhi.
Huai gam a buh a nek ni zing apan manna a keta kei a; Israel suante’n manna leng a mu nawn kei uhi. Huai kum in Kanan gam a buh leh bal a ne zawta uhi.

Huan, Joshua Jeriko khaw kiang chin a, a omlai in a dak a, a entou a, ngai in, a mazawn chin ah mi khat a namsau phawisa tawi in a na ding hi. Joshua in a va naih a, a kiang ah, “Kou lam a pang na hi hia, ka melmate uh lam a pang?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hilou e,
sepaihte heutu in Joshua kiang ah, “Na khepek apan na khedap phel in. Na dinna Mun Siangthou ahi” a chi a; huchi in Joshua in a phelta hi.
Jeriko khua Israel suante ziak in a kikhak bikbek a; kuamah a pawt kei ua, kuamah leng a lut kei uh.
Joshua kiang ah, “En in, Jeriko leh a kumpipa uh leh a mi hat hangsante uh na khut ah k’on pekhinta hi.
Galdoumi tengteng in khopi kimvel in khatvei na va velsuak phot ding uh. Huchibang in ni guk sung na hih ding uh ahi.
Siampu sagih in bawm malam ah belampa ki pengkul sagih a tawi ding ua, a ni sagih ni’n khopi sagihvei na velsuak ding ua, siampute’n pengkul a mut ding uh.
Hichi ahi ding a, belampa ki a mutging uh na zak chiang un, mipi tengteng ngaihtak in kikou uhen. Huchi in khopi kulh a chim dia, mipi amau mazawn chiat ah a paitou ding uh” a chi hi.
Nun tapa Joshua in siampute a sam a, a kiang uah, “Thukhun bawm zawng unla, siampu sagih in
Aman mipite kiang ah, “Pai zel unla, khopi velsuak un, mi kigalvante
Hichi a hong hita a, Joshua in mipite kiang a thu a genkhit in
Mi kigalvante pengkul mut siampute ma ah a pai ua, nungdal mite’n bawm a masuan ua, siampute’n paikawm in pengkul a mut uhi.
