Joshua in mipite kiang ah, “Kikou kei unla, na aw u leng zak hi kei hen. Kikou dia thu k’on piak ni a tun mateng na kam ua apan thu pawtkei hen. Huai hun chiang in na kikou ding uh” chi in thu a pia hi.
bawm khopi khatvei velh in a velsuak sak a; giahphual ah a pai ua, giahphual ah a giak nawn uhi.
Joshua zing khang in a thou a, siampute’n
bawm ma ah belampa ki pengkul sagih tawi siampu sagihte a pai ua, pengkul a mut uh. Mi kigalvante a ma uah a pai ua; nungdalte’n
A ni nih ni’n khopi khatvei a velsuak nawn ua, a giahphual uah a kiknawn uh. Huchibang in ni guk a hih uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a ni sagih ni’n zingkhang, phalvak in a thou ua, a hihdan ngeimah un sagihvei a velsuak ua; huai ni kia in khopi sagihvei a velsuak uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a sagihveina a siampute’n pengkul a muttak un Joshua in mipite kiang ah, “Kikou un:
Khopi leh asung a thil om tengteng
Nou zaw hamsiat thilte apan kihuikhe hiau un, huchilou in zaw, hamsiat thilte la in noumau mah hamsiat in na omloh kha ding uhi. Israelte giahphual hamsiat a omsak in na buaisak kha ding uhi.
Dangkasik, dangkaeng, dal leh sik tuium-belsuan teng ahihleh

Mipite a kikou ua, siampute’n pengkul a mut uh. Hichi ahi a, mipite’n pengkul ging a zaktak un, ngaihtak in a kikou ua, kulh a chimta hi. Huchi in mipite a mazawn chiat uah a paitou ua, khopi ah a lut ua, khopi a lata uhi.
Khopi sung a mi tengteng, numei leh pasal, a neu a lian, bawngpa, belam leh sabiltung teng namsau in a satlum vek uhi.
Joshua in mi nih, gam va enkhete kiang ah, huai kizuaknu inn ah va lut unla, a kiang a na kichiamsa bang un huai numei leh a neih teng honpi khia un, a chi hi.
Enkhemi tangvalte a va lut ua, Rahab, a nu leh pa, a sangamte leh a neih teng a hon pikhia ua, a tanau teng leng a hon pikhia ua; Israelte giahphual pawlam ah a omsak uhi.
Khopi leh asung a thil om teng mei in a halvek ua; dangkasik, dangkaeng, sumeng leh sik tuium-belsuan teng kia
Himahleh Rahab kizuaknu leh a neihteng leh a pa inkuante Joshua in a hinghawi vek a; Israelte lak ah tunitan in a tenglai uhi; Jeriko khua enkhe dia Joshua in a misawlte a na humbit ziak in.
Huailai in Joshua in,
Hiai Jeriko khopi hon lamnawn peuhmah
A suangphum phummi ta masa leh a kulh kongpite
tungkhemi ta tumpen leng hamsiat in om hen,
chi in amau a hilh chiatchiat hi.
Himahleh Israel suante hamsiat thilte ah a hong talekta uhi. Judah nam a Zerah tapa Zabdi, huai tapa Karmi, huai tapa Akan in hamsiat thilte a na lata a, Israel suante tung ah
Joshua in Jeriko khua apan Bethel suahlam Beth-Aven chin a om Ai khua ah mi a sawl a, a kiang uah, “Va hohtou unla, gam va enkhia un” chi in a gen hi. Mite a va hohtou ua, Ai khua a va enkhia uhi.

Joshua kiang ah a kiknawn ua, a kiang ah, “Mi tengteng hohtou chitchiat kei uhen. Mi sang nih hiam sang thum hiam va hohtou uhenla, Ai khua dou le uh. Mi tengteng va hihgim chitchiat ding ahi kei; tawmchik kia lah ahi ngal ua” a chi uhi.
Huchi in mipi lak a mi sang thum huai ah a hohtou ua, Aite ma ah a hong taikek uhi.
Aite’n mi sawmthum leh guk a na that ua; kulh kongpi chin apan Sebarim phahialin a hondelh ua, a kumsukna ah a that uhi. huaiziak in, mite lungtang a zulkhina, tui bang a hong hita hi.
Joshua in a puante a botkek a,
Joshua in, “Maizen!
aw, hichi a melmate delh a Israelte a taikek mawk uh bang ka lohta dia oi?
Kanante leh hiai gam a tengte’n a za ding ua, a honum ding ua, lei apan ka min uh hih mangthang ding eita ve ua. Na min thupi bang na chihta dia leh?” a chi hi.
Israelte’n thil a hihkhial ua; zuih dia ka piak ka thukhun ah a talek ua, hamsiat thilte a la ua, a gu na lai ua, a sim im behlap ua, amau vanlak mahmah ah a simsel uhi.
Huaiziak in ahi, Israel suante’n a melmate uh zoulou a, a melmate apan a taikek uh. Hamsiat in a omta ua ahi. Hamsiat a om pen na lak ua pan na hihmang kei leh k’on ompih nawn kei ding.
‘Thou inla, mipite hihsiangthou photmai in’. A kiang uah, Zingchiang adin ki hihsiangthou un.
Zingchiang in a chichi a, na hong kilat ding uh ahi. Hichi ahi ding a,
Hichi ahi ding a, kuapeuh hamsiat thil na la peuhmah, amah leh a neih tengteng mei a halvek ding ahi.
Joshua zingkhang in a thou a, Israelte a chichi in a hong kilang sak a; Judah namte mat a hong hita uh.
Judah namte a hong kilang sak nawn a; Zerah namte a na man a; Zerahte inkuante a malmal in a hong kilang nawn ua; Zabdi mat a na hi.
A inkuante a malmal in a hong kilang sak nawn a; huchi in Judah chi a Zerah tapa Abadi, huai tapa Karmi, huai tapa Akan mat a hong hita hi.
Joshua in Akan kiang ah, “Ka tapa,
Akan in Joshua a dawng a, a kiang ah, “

‘Gallak lak a Babulon puan hoihtak leh, dangka sekel za nih leh dangkaeng tang sekel sawmnga buk ka mu a, ka enlah lua a, ka la mai hi. Ngai in, ka puanin sung a lei a selguk ahi a, dangka pen huai nuai ah a om’ ” a chi hi.
Joshua in mite a sawl a, puanin sung ah a vatai ua; ngai in, a puanin ah selguk ahi ngei a, a nuai ah dangka a na om hi.
Puanin sung a kipan a la ua, Joshua leh Israel suan tengteng kiang ah a hontawi ua; amau

Joshua leh Israel tengteng in Zerah tapa Akan dangka, puan, dangkaeng tang, a tapate, a tanute, a bawngpa, a sabiltungte, a belamte, a puanin leh a neih tengteng toh a pi ua; Akor guam ah a paitouh pih uhi.
Joshua in, “Bangdia honhih mangbang na hia?
A tung ah suang a chiang vum ua, tunitan in a omlai hi. Huchi in

Huan, Toupa’n Joshua kiang ah, “Lau ken, lunglel sam ken. Galdou thei tengteng tonpih inla, thou inla, Ai khua ah hohtou in. Ngai in, Ai khaw kumpipa, a mite, a khua leh a gam na khut ah k’on peta hi.
Jeriko leh a kumpipa uh tung a na hih bang in, Ai khua leh a kumpipa tung ah leng na hih ding hi. Gallak leh gante kia nou a tuam din nei un. Khopi nung ah guktan un” a chi hi.
Joshua leh galdou thei tengteng Ai khua a hohtou din a kisata uh. Joshua in mi hat hangsan sing thum a telkhia a, zan in a sawlkheta hi.
A kiang uah, “Ngai un, khopi nunglam ah khopi dou din guktan un. Khopi apan gamla lua ah pai kei unla, mansa in om gige un.
Kei leh ka kiang a om tengteng in khopi ka honzuan ding uh. Hichi ahi ding a, tuma a mah bang in hongdou dia a hongpawt tak un, a ma uah i taikek ding uh.
Hondelh din a hongpawt ding ua, khua apan gamla sim i ki hepkhiak tan in. Amau, ‘Tuma a mah bang in i ma uah taikek uh e,’ a chi ding ua; a ma uah i taikek ding uh.
Guktanna apan na hong pawtkhe ding ua, khopi na la ding uhi.
Hichi ahi ding a, khopi na lak chiang un, khopi na hal ding uh.
Joshua in a kuansakta a, guktanna mun ah a hoh ua, Ai khaw tumlam ah Bethel leh Ai khaw kikal ah a om uh. Joshua bel huai zan in mipite lak ah a giak hi.
Zingkhang in Joshua a thou a, mipite a kaikhawm a, amah leh Israel upate mipite ma ah Ai kholam ah a hohtou uhi.
Mi tengteng, a kiang a galdou thei omte tan in a hohtou ua, a va zuan ua, khopi chin ah a hohtou ua, Ai khaw mallam pang ah a giaktou uh. Ai khua toh a kikal uah guam a om hi.
Mi sang nga a tonpih a, khopi tumlam a Bethel leh Ai khaw kikal ah a guktan sak hi.
Mite, khopi mallam a sepaihte panmun leh khopi tumlam a guktanmite panmun hoihtak in a sep a; Joshua huai zan in guam lak ah a pai hi.

Hichi ahi a, Ai khaw kumpipa’n huai a muhtak in, kintak in zingkhang in a thou a, huai khua a mite leh amah leh a lawite tengteng toh, a munseh Arabah zawn ah Israelte dou ding in a pawtta hi. Himahleh khaw nunglam ah amah dou din guktanmi a om uh chih a theikei hi.
Joshua leh Israel tengteng zohsa bangtak in a om ua, gamdai lampi ah a tai uhi.
Khopi a om tengteng amau delh din a samkhawm ua; huchi in Joshua a delh ua, khopi apan gamla sim ah khemkhiak in a omta uhi.
Ai khua ah leh Bethel khua ah Israelte delhlou khat leng a omkei ua; khopi bangmah loukal a pawtsan in Israelte a delhta uhi.
Guktan mite a omna ua kipan a hong paikhe guih ua, a khut a zaktakin a tai ua, khopi ah a lutua, a lata ua; khua a halpah uhi.
Aite’n a nunglam uh a et uleh, ngai in, khopi meikhu vanlam a khutou a mu ua, a koilam lam ah leng tai theihna himhim a neikei ua; Gamdai a tai delhte’n a na lehdelh uhi.
Joshua leh Israel tengteng in guktanmite’n khopi a lak ua, khopi meikhu paitou a muhtak un a kiknawn ua, Aite a that uhi.
Midangte amau dou din khopi sung apan a hong pawtkhia ua Israelte’n a kaltehta uhi. A khen a langkhat ah, a khen a langkhat ah a om uhi. Huchi in a that ua, khatlel leng hawi leh khah a neikei uhi.
Ai khaw kumpipa a hingmat ua, Joshua kiang ah a honpi uhi.

Hichi ahi a, Israelte’n Ai khaw mi gamlak a om tengteng, gamdai gam a amau a vadelhna mun uah namsau in a thatvek uhi. Huaikhit in Israelte tengteng Ai khua ah a kiknawn ua, asung a om tengteng namsau in a vathat uhi.
Huai ni a si tengteng numei leh pasal sing khat leh sang nih ahi ua, Ai khua a pasal teng a sikhin vek uhi.
Joshua in lah a teipi likna khut Aite tengteng a hihman keuhkeuh masiah a kaikik kei hi.
Joshua thu a piak a, hihdia a chih bangbang in huai khopi a gante leh gallakte kia Israelte a tuamdin a tangta uhi.
Joshua in Ai khua a hala, tangtawn adin leivum in a bawl a, tunitan in loihsan ahita hi.

Ai khaw kumpipa nitak tan in sing dawn ah a khai a; nitum kuan in Joshua in thu a pia a, huchi in a luang singdawn apan a lakhia ua, khopi kulh kongpi lutna ah a pai ua, a tung ah suang a vum ua, tunitan in a omlai hi.
Joshua in Ebal tang ah
Mosi dan laibu a gelhsa bang in,
Huai ah Israel mite muh mah in Mosi dan gelhsa huai suangte tung ah a teisawn hi.
Israel tengteng, gamdang mi hi in, tualsung mi hita leh avekpi un, a upate uh, a makaite uh leh vaihawmmite toh
Huaikhit in Joshua in danthu teng, vualzawlna thu leh hamse thu tengteng a sim a, dan laibu a kigelh tengteng bang in a simkhia hi.
Mosi thupiak tengteng Israel omkhawm tengteng leh numeite leh naupang neu chikte leh a lak ua namdang omte ma ah Joshua in simlouh himhim a neikei hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Jordan gal a kumpipa tengteng, tang a omte, phaizang a omte, tuipi zatak dung teng a Lebanon pha a om tengteng, Hitte, Amorte, Kanante, Perizte, Hivte leh Jebuste’n a na zak un,
Joshua leh Israelte pheikhai khat a dou tum in a kikhawm uhi.
Himahleh Gibeon khomite’n Joshua in Jeriko khua leh Ai khua a bawl dan a na zak un, lepchiah pil in a gamtang uhi.
Palai a kibawl in iplui pipi, uain thawllui pipi, a sesa kithuap nemnum sabiltungte a pua in mi a kisawl uhi.
Khedap lui thuap nennon a bun ua, puan lui pipi a silh ua, a nekding tanghoute uh gaw gemgom, ap khetkhut ngen ahi.
Gilgal giahphual ah Joshua kiang ah a va hoh ua, a kiang leh Israelte kiang ah, “Gamlapi apan hongpai ka hi ua, huaiziak in tuin kou leh nou lemna thu khung ni” a chi uhi.
Israelte’n huai Hivte kiang ah, “Ka lak ua teng hi kha ni u chia; bangchi’n nou toh lemna thu i khung thei dia?” a chi uh.
Amau Joshua kiang ah,“Na sikhate ka hi uh,” a chi uhi. Joshua in a kiang uah, “Kuate na hi ua? Koilam apan hongpai na hi ua?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “
Jordan lui gal a Amorte kumpipa nihte, Heshbon gam kumpipa Sihon, Bashan gam kumpipa Astaroth khua a om Og tung a a thilhih tengteng ka naza uhi.
Ka upate uh leh ka gam ua tengte’n ka kiang uah, ‘Lampi a nekding tawi unla, amau vahoupih un, a kiang uah, “Na sikha ka hi uh. Nou toh kilem ni, na va chi ding uh”’ chi’n a honsawl uhi.
“Hiai ka nekding uh tanghoute na kiang a hongdia kongpawt ni ua ka inn ua kipan a sa a k’on puak uh ahi. Himahleh tuin en dih, a gaw gemgoma a ap khetkhutta hi.
Hiai thawl uain ka thunnate uh leng a thak ahi. En dih, a vang khinvek hi. Hiai ka puante uh leh ka khedapte uh leng ka hong paina uh a gamla mahmah a, a luigawpta hi” a chi uhi.
Mite’n a tawi uh nek leh dawn dingte a chiam ua,
Huchi in Joshua in amau toh kilemna a bawl a, amaute hawi din amau toh thu a khungta hi. Paikhawm miliante leng a kiang uah a kichiam uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a kiang ua thu a khun ua kipan ni thum nung in, a khopite uh amau kiang nai a tengsam ahi uh, chih a thei kheta uh.
Israel suante a kipan khia ua, a ni thum ni’n a khopite uh a va tung uhi. A khopite uh Gibeon, Kephirah, Beeroth leh Kiriath-jearim ahi uh.
Paikhawm miliante’n
Himahleh milian tengteng in paikhawm tengteng kiang ah, “
Hichibang in a tung uah hih ni. I hinghawi mai ding uh. Huchi lou in zaw i tung uah thangpaihna a hongtung kha ding, a kiang uah lah i na kichiam khinta ngal ua” a chi uhi.
Miliante mah in a kiang uah, “Hinghawi in om uhen. Himahleh paikhawm tengteng adia sing pawmite leh tui tawimite hi uhen” a chi uhi; miliante’n a na chiamkhit tak bang un.
Joshua in amaute a samsaka, a kiang uah, “Bangdia, gamlapi apan hongpai ka hi uh, chi a hon zekhem na hi ua? Ka kiang nai a tengsam lah na hi ngal ua.
Huaiziak in tuin hamsiat na hi uh, na lak ua mi kuamah ka Pathian inn adia singpawmi leh tuitawimi na hihna ua pan a suakta ngeikei ding uh” a chi hi.
Amau Joshua a dawng ua, “
Tuin ngai in, na khut a om ka hi ua; na ngaihtuahna a hoih leh dik a na theih bang in ka tung uah hihmai in” a chi uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Israel suante apan Joshua in hunkhia in, a thatta kei uhi.
Huai ni’n Joshua in a seh bang in paikhawmte leh

Hichi ahi a, Jerusalem khaw kumpipa Adoni zedek in Joshua in Ai khua a la a, a hihsegawp dimdem a, Jeriko khua leh a kumpipa a hihsiat bang in Ai khua leh a kumpipa leng a hihse gawp a, Gibeon khua a mite’n Israelte toh lemna bawl in, a lak uah a tengsam uh, chih a zak in, a lauta mahmah hi.
Gibeon khua bel lianpi, kumpipa khopite lak a khat bang a lian ahi. Ai khua sang a lianzaw leh a mite leng hattak a hih ziak un a lau mahmah uhi.
Huaiziak in Jerusalem kumpipa Adonizedek in Hebron khaw kumpipa Hoham, Jermuth khaw kumpipa Piram, Lakis khaw kumpipa Japhia leh Eglon khaw kumpipa Debir kiang ah,
“Hongpai unla, hong panpih un, Gibeon i vadou ding uh. Joshua leh Israel suante toh lemna a bawl ngal ua” chi in a thukhak hi.

Amorte kumpipa ngate: Jerusalem kumpipa, Hebron kumpipa, Jermuth kumpipa, Lakis kumpipa leh Eglon kumpipa a kikhawm ua, a sepaih tengteng utoh a hohtou ua, Gibeon khozawn ah giahphual sat in a douta uhi.

Gibeonte’n Gilgal a giahphual ua Joshua kiang ah mi a sawl ua, “Na sikhate hon nusia ken. Kintak in ka kiang uah hongtou inla, hong hondam inla, hong panpih in. Singtang gam a teng Amor kumpipate kou hong dou din a kikhawm uh” chi in a va hilh uhi.
Joshua leh a kiang a galdou thei mi tengteng leh mi hat hangsan tengteng Gilgal apan a hohtou uhi.
Joshua kiang ah, “Amaute lau hetken. Na khut ah k’on pekhinta hi. A lak ua mi kuamah na ma ah ading zoukei ding uh” a chi hi.
huaiziak in Joshua in amaute a dou guih a; zankhua a Gilgal apan a a na hohtousa ahi.
Israelte ma ah amaute a hihbuai gawpta a, Gibeon khua ah tampi a that a, Bethhoron zottouhna lampi ah a delh a, Azek leh Maked khaw pha in a that hi.
Hichi ahi a, Israelte ma ah a taikek ua, Bethhoron apan a paisukna mun a a omlai un,
“Ni, Gibeon khaw tung ah ding nilouh in;
kha, nang leng,
Aijalon guam ah om nilouh in” a chi hi.
Mite’n a melmate uh tung a phu a lak masiah uh ni ading kinken a,
kha leng a om nilouh hi.
Hiai thu Jasar laibu a gelh hilou hia? Huchi in ni vanlai ah a om nilouh a, ni khat sung vengveng tum thu a ngaihtuah kei hi.
huchibang a mihing aw a ngaihkhiak ni, a ma in a om ngeikei a, a nung in leng a om ngeikei;
Joshua leh Israelte a giahphual uh Gilgal ah a kiknawn vek uhi.
Huai kumpipa ngate a taimang ua, Maked kawkhuk ah a kibu uhi.
“Kumpipa ngate muh ahi ua, Makeddah kawkhuk ah a kibu uh” chi in Joshua hilh in a om hi.
Joshua in, “Kawkhuk kam suang lianpi khuk in sin unla, a vengmite leng omsak un.
Noute bel omkei unla; na melmate uh delh unla, a nungdalte that unla; a khua himhim uah lutsak kei un.
Hichi ahi a, Joshua leh Israel suante’n a bei masiah ua a thah khit un, kulhpi nei khuate a, a omlaite a tailut khit un,
mi tengteng Joshua kiang Makkedah ah galmuangtak in a hong kiknawn ua. Israel suante dem in kuamah in lei a lok ngamkei uhi.
Joshua in, “Kawkhuk kam hong unla, kumpipa ngate kawkhuk apan ka kiang ah hon kaikhia un” a chi hi.
Hichibang in a hih ua, kumpipa ngate: Jerusalem kumpipa, Hebron kumpipa, Jermuth kumpipa, Lakis kumpipa leh Eglon kumpipa kawkhuk apan a kiang ah a hon pikhia uhi.

Hichi ahi a, kumpipate Joshua kiang a a honpi tak un, Joshua in Israel tengteng a samkhawm a, amah toh kuan galdou thei mite lak a heutute kiang ah, “Hong painai unla, hiai kumpipate ngawng sik un,” a chi hi. Huchi in a hong painai ua, a ngawng uh a hong siksak uhi.
Joshua in a kiang uah, “Lau kei unla, lunglel sam kei un. Hattak leh hangsantak in om un. Na dou uh na melma tengteng tung ah
Huaikhit in Joshua in amau a satzan a, a that a, sing nga dawn ah a khai a; nitaklam tan in singdawn ah a kikhai lai uhi.
Hichi ahi a, ni tumkuan in Joshua in thu a pia a, sing dawn apan a lakhia ua, a kibukna kawkhuk ah a pailut ua, a kawkhuk kam suang lianpi in a sin ua, tunitan in leng a omlai hi.

Joshua in huai ni’n Makkedah khua a la a, a kumpipa uh tan in namsau in a lok a; huai khua a om tengteng a satlum vek a, khat lel leng hawi a neikei hi. Jeriko khaw kumpipa tung a a hihmah bang in, Makkedah khaw kumpipa tung ah leng a hihta hi.
Joshua Israel tengteng toh Makkedah khua apan Libnah khua ah a pai ua, Libnah khua a dou uhi.

huai khua kumpipa tan in Israelte khut ah a pia hi. Huai khua dou in asung a om tengteng a thatvek hi. Asung a ommi khatmah leng hinghawi a neikei hi. Jeriko khaw kumpipa tung a a hihmah bang in a kumpipa tung ah a hih hi.
Joshua Israel tengteng toh Libnah khua apan Lakis khua ah a pai ua, panmun a khoh ua, a sual uh.
Lakis khua Israelte khut ah a pia a, a ni nih ni’n a la ua, huai khua dou in asung a om tengteng namsau in a thatvek ua, Libnah khaw tung a, a hih bang in a hihta uhi.
Bezer khaw kumpipa Horam, Lakis khua panpih din a kuantou a; Joshua in amah leh a heute nasan khatmah leng hawilou in a thatgam hi.
Joshua Israel tengteng toh Lakis khua apan Eglon khua ah a pai ua, panmun a khoh ua; a dou uhi.
Huai ni’n a la ua, huai ni mah in huai khua dou in asung a om tengteng namsau in a thatbei sipsip hi. Lakis khaw tung a a hih bang in a hihta hi.
Joshua, Israelte tengteng toh Eglon khua apan Hebron khua ah a pai ua; a dou uh.

A la ua, huai khua, a kumpipa, a khopel tengteng leh asung a om tengteng namsau a dou in a thatvek ua, Eglon khaw tung a hih bang in khat mah leng hinghawi a neikei hi. A khua nangawn hihse vek in asung a om tengteng a that bei sipsip hi.
Joshua leh Israel tengteng Debir khua ah a kihei nawn ua; a dou ua;

huai khua, a kumpipa leh a khopel tengteng a la ua; namsau in a dou ua, asung a om tengteng a that bei sipsip ua; khatmah leng hawi a neikei uh. Hebron khaw tung leh Debir khua leh a kumpipa uh tung a hih bang in a hihta hi.
Huchi in Joshua in a gam pumpi, tang gamte, simlam a phaizang leh mual gamte hihse vek in a kumpipa tengteng uh a thatvek a; khatmah hinghawi a neikei hi.
Joshua in Kadesh-barnea apan Gaza pha in, Gosen gam tengteng toh Gibeon pha in a hihse vek hi.
Huai kumpipate tengteng leh a gam uh
Joshua leh Israel tengteng a giahphual Gilgal ah a kiknawn vek uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Hazor khaw kumpipa Jabin in huai a zak in, Madon khaw kumpipa Jobab, Simron khaw kumpipa leh Aksaph khaw kumpipa,
Mallam tanggam kumpipate, Kineroth simlam a Arabah kumpipate, Phaigam kumpipate leh tumlam pang a Doron kumpipate,
Suahlam leh tumlam a om Kanan mite, tanggam a om, Amorte, Hitte, Perizte, Jebuste, Mizpah gam Hermon tang nuai a om Hivte kiang ah mi a sawl hi.
Huan, a sepaih tengteng utoh mi tampi, a tamdan uh tuipi a piaunel zah mahmah, sakol leh kangtalai tampi toh a kisa uhi.
Huai kumpipa tengteng a kimu khawm ua, Israelte dou din Merom tuite ah a giakkhawm uhi.
Joshua leh galdou theimi tengteng Merom tuite ah a va kuanguih ua, a dou uhi.
Israelte khut ah a pia a, a dou ua, Zidon lianzaw pha in, Misrephoth maim munte pha in, suahlam pang a Mizpeh guamte pha in a delh ua; khat leng hawi neilou in a thatvek uhi.
a sawl bang in Joshua in a tung uah a hih a; a sakolte khukguh a kilawi sak ua, a kangtalaite uh a halsak uhi.
Huai hun in Joshua a kileh hei a, Hazor khua a la a, a kumpipa uh namsau in a that hi. Tuma in Hazor khua huailai a hiai gamte tengteng lak a khopi pen ahi.
Huai khua a om tengteng namsau in a that vek a, a hih chimit vek a, a hing peuhmah khatmah leng a hinghawi kei uhi.
Huchi in Kumpipate khopi tengteng leh a kumpipa tengteng uh Joshua in a man vek a, namsau a dou in a that a, a hih chimit vek a;
Mualpawng a khopi a na om khinsate, Hazor khua chihlouh, Israelte’n khatmah leng a hal kei uh. Huai khua bel Joshua in a hal hi.
Hiai khopite a gallak tengteng leh gante Israel suante’n amau a tuam ding in a nei ua; mihing bel a hihman vek masiah uh namsau in a that zel ua, a hing peuhmah hawi a neikei uhi.
a sikha Mosi thu a piak bang in, Mosi in huai thu Joshua a pesawn a; Joshua in huai bang in a hihzel hi.
Huai bang in Joshua in huai gam tengteng, tanggamte, sim gam tengteng, Gosen gam tengteng, guam leh phaizang teng leh Israelte tangte leh phaizang teng toh a la vek hi.
Seir tang va suntou Halak tang apan Hermon tang nuai a Lebanon guam a Baal gad pha in; a kumpipate tengteng uh a man a, that in a hihlum hi.
Joshua in huai kumpipa tengteng sawtpi tak a dou hi.
Gibeon khua a om Hivte kia chihlouh Israelte toh lemna bawl khua a omkei uh. Dou a lakvek ahi uhi.
Mosi thu a piak bang a, a hih chimit vek a, deihsakna nei hetlou a, a hihman theihna dia a lungtang uh hih khauhsak a Israelte dou sakpa
Huailai in Joshua a kuan a, tanggamte apan, Hebron khua apan, Debir khua apan, Anab khua leh Judia tanggam tengteng leh Israel tanggam tengteng apan Anakimte a hihmang vek hi.
Israel suante gam ah Anakimte khat lel leng a tengta kei ua; Gaza, Gath leh Ashdod khuate kia ah bel a omlai uhi.
Huchi in
Hiaite ahi uh huai gam kumpipate, Israel suante’n a hihman ua, a gam uh Jordan luigal, nisuahna lam gamte, Arnon guam apan Hermon tang tan, suahlam pang a Arabah tengteng toh a neihsak uh kumpipate:
Amorte kumpipa Sihon, Heshbon a teng in Arnon guam pang a om Aroer khua apan vai a hawm a, guam laitak a khopite, Ammon suante gamgi Jabok lui pha in Gilead gam kimkhat tung ah vai a hawm hi
Suahlam ah Arabah ah Kineroth dil tan in ahi a; suahlam ah Beth jeshimoth hohna lampi lam ah Arabah tuipi, Chi tuipi tan in ahi a; simlam ah Pisgah tang nuai pha in ahi.
Astaroth leh Edre-i khua a om Rephaim nam omsunte lak ah Bashan kumpipa Og in vai a hawm hi.
Amah Hermon tang, Salka khua leh Bashan tengteng, Geshurte leh Maakatte gamgi pha leh Heshbon kumpipa Sihon gamgi chiang Gilead gam kimkhat pha in vai a hawm hi.

Hiai gam Kumpipate ahi, Joshua leh Israel suante’n Jordan lui gal tumlam pang a, a thahte uh, Lebanon guam Baal gad apan Seir tang suntou Halak tang pha in. Joshua in Israel suante a kikhen dan bangzel un huai gam a gouluah ding un a pe chiatta hi.
Tanggam a, phaizang gamte, Arabahte, tanggamte, gamdai gamte, sim gamte; huaite bel Hit mite, Amor mite, Kanan mite, Periz mite, Hiv mite, Jebus mite gam ahi.
Jeriko Khaw Kumpipa khat; Bethel khosik a Ai khaw kumpipa khat;
Jerusalem khaw kumpipa khat; Hebron khaw kumpipa khat;
Jarmuth khaw kumpipa khat; Lakis khaw kumpipa khat;
Eglon khaw kumpipa khat; Gezer khaw kumpipa khat;
Debir khaw kumpipa khat; Geder khaw kumpipa khat;
Hormah khaw kumpipa khat; Arad khaw kumpipa khat;
Libnah khaw kumpipa khat; Adullam khaw kumpipa khat;
Makkedah khaw kumpipa khat; Bethel khaw kumpipa khat;
Tapuah khaw kumpipa khat; Hepher khaw kumpipa, khat;
Aphek khaw kumpipa khat; Lasaron khaw kumpipa, khat;
Madon khaw kumpipa khat; Hazor khaw kumpipa khat;
Shimron meron khaw kumpipa khat; Aksaph khaw kumpipa khat;
Taanak khaw kumpipa khat; Magiddo khaw kumpipa, khat;
Kedesh khaw kumpipa khat; Karmel tang a Jokneam khaw kumpipa, khat;
Dor tuipang a Dor khaw kumpipa, khat; Gilgal a Goiim namte kumpipa khat;
Tirzah khaw kumpipa khat; kumpipa tengteng sawmthum leh khat ahi uh.
Joshua a hong upata a, a hong tek mahmah ta hi.
Hiai gamte ahi lak louh: Philistia gam tengteng leh Geshur gam tengteng.

Aigupta gam chin a om Sihor apan mallam pang a Ekron gamgi tan in, huai bel Kanan mite gam a sim ahi; Philistiate toupa ngate, Gaza mite, Ashdod mite, Ashkelon mite, Git mite leh Ekron mite; simlam a Avi mite.
Kanan mite gam tengteng leh Zidon mite gam a Mearah, Amorte gamgi Aphek khaw pha in.
Gebal mite gam leh nisuahna lam Lebanon gam tengteng Hermon tang nuai Baal gad apan Hamath kholutna pha in.
Lebanon apan Misrephoth maim mun pha in, tanggam a teng tengteng, Zidon mi tengteng. Amaute Israel suante ma ah ka delhkhe dia; k’on thupiak bang in Israel gouluah din bawlsak in.
Huchi in hiai gam nam kuate leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte gouluah din hawmsak in” a chi hi.
Huai gam ahihleh Arnon guam gei a om Aroer khua apan leh guam laitak a khopi leh Medeba phai gam tengteng, Dibon tan ahi.
Amorte kumpipa Sihon, Heshbon khua a Kumpipa a tu khopi tengteng Ammon suante gamgi tan ahi.
Gilead gam leh Geshurte leh Maakatte gamgi chiang leh Hermon tang tengteng leh Bashan gam tengteng Salkah khaw tan ahi.
Astaroth leh Edre-i khua a kumpipa a tu Bashan gam kumpipa Og gam tengteng toh, huaite Rephaim nam milian omsunte ahi uh; huaite Mosi in a na dou a, a na delhkheta hi.
Himahleh Geshurte leh Maakatte Israel suante’n a delhkhe kei ua; Geshurte leh Maakatte tunitan in Israelte lak ah a tengden lai uhi.
Levi namte kia ahi gouluah ding a piak louh. A kiang ua a na gensa bang in
Reuben suante nam a inkuan dungzui in Mosi in gam a na peta hi.
A gamgi uh Arnon guam pang a om Aroer khua apan guam laitak a khopi leh Medeba phaigam tengteng apan,
Heshbon leh huai phaigam a khopi tengteng; Debon, Bamoth baal, leh Beth baal meon;
Jahaz, Kedemoth leh Mephaath;
Kiriathaim, Sibmah leh guam gei a Zereth sahar;
Beth peor leh Ashdot pisgah leh Beth jeshimoth;
Phai gam khopi tengteng, Heshbon a vaihawm Amorte Kumpipa Sihon lalgam teng, Mosi in a na thah khitsa Midiante kumpipate Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur leh Reba omna gam toh ahi.
Beor tapa Balaam, aisansiam leng a inkuante toh Israel suante’n a that uhi.
Reuben suante gam chiang bel Jordan leh a pang teng ahi. Hiai gam leh a khopite leh khuate ahi Reuben suante adia a inkuan omdan bangzel a gouluah dia a sehsak uh.
Mosi in Gad suante a inkuan dungzui un gam a pia hi.
A gamgi uh Jazer khua leh Gilead gam khopi tengteng leh Ammon suante gam kimkhat, Rabah khaw kiang a om Aroer pha in;
Heshbon apan Ramath mizpeh leh Betonim pha in; Mahanaim apan Debir gamgi pha in;
Guam ah Betharam, Bethnimarah, Sukoth, Zaphon, Heshbon kumpipa Sihon gam teng, Jordan leh a gei a gamte, Jordan gal suahlam pang a Kinereth dil tawp chiang tan in ahi.
Hiai Gad suante adia a inkuan omdan bangzel a a gouluah ding ua seh, a khopite uh leh a khuate uh ahi.
Mosi in Manasseh suan kimkhatte gam a pia hi. Manasseh suan kimkhatte adia a inkuan omdan bangzel a piak ahi uh.
A gamgi uh Mahanaim apan Bashan gam tengteng, Bashan gam kumpipa Og gam tengteng leh Bashan gam a Jair khopi tengteng toh, khua sawmguk ahi.
Gilead gam kimkhat leh Bashan gam kumpipa Og gam a Astaroth, Edre-i; huai Manasseh tapa Makir suan, Makir suan kimkhatte adia a inkuan uh omdan bangzel a seh ahi.
Hiaite Moab phai, Jeriko zawn, Jordan gal lehlam a, Mosi in gouluah dia a piak gamte ahi uh.
Levi chite Mosi in gouluah ding a pe kei hi. A kiang ua a na gensa bang in
Hiaite ahi Israel suante’n Kanan gam a lak ua, siampu Eleazar, Nun tapa Joshua leh Israel suante nam inkuan intekpente’n a gouluah ding ua a na hawm uh.
Nam kuate leh nam kimkhatte a tuam dia
Mosi in nam nih leh nam kimkhatte Jordan gal ah a gouluah ding uh a na peta hi. Levi chite bel a lak uah gouluah ding a pe kei hi.

Joseph suante nam nih ahi ua, Manasseh leh Ephraim. Levi chite huai gam ah tantuam a pe kei uh, a omna ding uh khopite leh a daikim ua gantatna ding mun leh a inn leh a lou uh bawlna ding loungal piak ahi kei uhi.
Mosi thu a piak bang in Israel suante’n a hih ua, gam a hawm uhi.
Judah suante Gilgal khua ah Joshua kiang ah a va hoh ua; Keniz mi Jephunneh tapa Kaleb in a kiang ah, “Kadesh-barnea mun a Pathian mi Mosi kiang a
sikha Mosi in Kadesh-barnea mun apan gam va enkhe dia a hon sawllai in kum sawmli a upa ka na hita a; ka lungsim a om bangtak a kiang ah ka tun nawn hi.
Himahleh ka unau ka kiang a paisamte’n mipite lungtang a tuisuak sak ua; ken bel
Mosi in huai ni’n,
Huchi in ngai in,
Hichi pipi in leng Mosi in a hon sawllai mah bang in ka hatlai a, nidanglai a kidouna ding leh nasep silbawlna dia thagui ka neih mah bang in tuin leng ka neilai hi.
Huaiziak in hiai tang,
Joshua in a vualzawl a; Jephunneh tapa Kaleb a gouluah din Hebron khua a peta hi.
Huaiziak in, Hebron khua tunitan in Keniz mi, Jephunneh tapa Kaleb gouluah a hong hita hi;
Hebron khaw min a ma in Kiriath Arba ahi. Arba ahihleh Anakimte lak a mi thupipen ahi. Huaikhit in a gam a hong galmuangta hi.
Hiai Judah suante a inkuan dungzui a amau a tuamdia seh a om ahi: Edom gamgi chiang, simlam pang Zin gamdai tanhial in, simtawp tanpha in a kizalh suk hi.
Simlam gamgi bel, chi Tuipi sim tawp a tuipi gamgeng apan simlam doh ahi.
Simlam zuan in Akrabbim tan in a pai zel a, Zin a va tung hi. Kadesh-barnea simlam ah a tungkah a, Hebron a vatung a, Adar ah a toupai a, Karka a kualkhum hi.
Azmon ah a pai zel a, Aigupta luita ah a tuakkhia a; tuipi ah gamgi a tawp hi. Hiai bel simlam pang gamgi ahi.
Suahlam pang gamgi bel Chi Tuipi ahi a, Jordan ah a tawp hi.
Mallam pang gamgi bel tuipi tuimeng apan Jordan tun tawp chiang ahi.
Beth-hoglah ah a toupai a, Beth-arabah mal ah a pai zel a; Reuben tapa Bohan suang ah a paitou zel hi.
Akor guam apan Debir ah a paitou a, lui simlama om Adumim a tungkahna chin ah Gilgal lam zuan in mallam ah a pai zel a; En-semes tuite ah a paipai a, En-rogel ah a suakkhia hi.
Hinam tapa guam ah Jebuste gam pang simlam, huai bel Jerusalem ahi, pha in a paitou a; Hinnom tang lampang guam chin a om tangvum ah a paitou a, huai bel Rephaim mallam pang guam tawp mahmah ahi.
Tangvum apan Nephtoah a lui tuite pha in a paisuak a, Ephron tang a khopite ah a pai zel a; gamgi Baalah, huai bel Kiriath-jearim ahi, lam ah a paisuk hi.
Baalah apan tumlam pang ah Seir tang pha in a kihekkual nawn a, mallam pang ah Jearim, huai bel Kesalon ahi, tang zul ah a paisuk a, Timnah lam ah a pai hi.
Mallam pang Ekron zul ah a paikhia a, Sikron ah a paisuak a, Baalah tang ah a pai zel a, Jabneel ah a pawt a; tuipi ah a tawp hi.
Tumlam pang gamgi bel tuipi a zat a za leh a piau chiang teng ahi. Huai gam chiang ahi Judah suante adia a inkuan uh dungzui a sehsak a om.
Jephunneh tapa Kaleb
Kaleb in huai khua apan Anak tapate thum Sesai, Ahiman leh Talmai a delh khia hi.
Huai apan Debir khua a mite a vadou a; a ma in Debir khaw min Kiriath Sepher ahi.
Kaleb in, “Kuapeuh Kiriath Sepher vadou a, va lazou peuhmah ka tanu Aksah a zi din ka pe ding” a chi hi.
Kaleb unau Kenaz tapa Othniel in a va lazou a; huchi in a tanu Aksah a zi din a neisakta hi.
Hichi ahi a, a kiang a va tun in, a pa gam ngen din a kuan a; a sabiltung apan a kum hi. Kaleb in a kiang ah, “Bang na deih a?” a na chi hi.
Aman, “Hon vualzawl in. Simlam gam lah n’on peta ngal a. Tuinak neite leng hon petel lai in” a chi hi. Huchi in tuinak nei saknungte leh khangnungte a peta hi.
Hiai ahi Judah suante nam, a inkuan uh dungzui a a gouluah uh.
Simlam a Edom gamgi zul a Judah suante a neih khopi hiaite ahi uh: Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kinah, Dimonah leh Adadah;
Kadesh, Hazor leh Ithnan;
Ziph, Telem, Bealoth,
Hazor, Hadattah, Kerioth, Hezron (huai Hazor ahi),
Amam, Shema, Moladah,
Hazar gaddah, Hesmon, Beth palet,
Hazar shual, Beer–sheba, Bizjothjah,
Baalah, Ijim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Kesil, Hormah.
Ziklag, Madmannah, leh Sansannah.
Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain leh Rimmon ahi ua; Khopi tengteng sawmnih leh kua ahi a, a khopelte uh toh.
Phai gam lam ah Estaol, Zoreah, Asnah,
Zanoah, En-gannim, Tappuah, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Sokoh, Azekah,
Sharaim, Adithaim, Gederah leh Gederothaim ahi ua, khopi teng sawmlehli ahi ua, a khopel teng uh toh.
Zenan, Hadasah, Migdal Gad;
Dilean, Mizpah leh Joktheel;
Lakis, Bozkath, Eglon;
Kabbon, Lahmas, Kitlish;
Gederoth, Bethdagon, Naamah, Kakedah. Khopi tengteng sawmlehguk ahi ua, a khopel teng uh toh.
Libnah, Ether, Ahsan,
Jiphtah, Asnah, Nezib,
Keilah, Akzib leh Maresah. Khopi tengteng kua ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Ekron leh a khopite leh a khopelte toh.
Ekron apan tuipi tanpha in Ashdod zul a om tengteng a khopelte toh.
Ashdod leh a khopite leh a khopelte: Gaza leh a khopite leh a khopelte; Aigupta lui leh tuipi za leh a gei chiang pha in.
Singtang gam lam ah Samir, Jattir, Sokoh,
Dannah leh Kirjath Sannah, huai bel Debir ahi,
Anab, Estemoh, Anim leh Gosen,
Gosen, Holon leh Giloh; khopi tengteng sawmlehkhat ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Arab, Dumah, Esean,
Janum, Beth tappuah, Aphekah,
Humtah leh Kiriath Arba, huai bel Hebron ahi, leh Zior; khopi tengteng kua ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Maon, Karmel, Ziph, Juttah,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoah,
Kain, Gibeah leh Timnah; khopi tengteng sawm ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Halhul, Beth Zur, Gedor,
Maarath, Beth Anoth leh Eltekon; khopite tengteng guk ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Kiriath-baal, huai bel Kiriath-jearim ahi, leh Rabah; khopi nih leh a khopel teng uh toh.
Gamdai a Beth-arabah, Middin, Sekaka,
Chi khopi Nibshan leh En Gedi; khopi tengteng guk ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Jerusalem khua a teng Jebuste ahihleh Judah suante’n a delhkhe zoukei ua, tunitan in Jerusalem ah Judah suante leh Jebuste a teng khawm uhi.
Joseph suante tantuam, Jeriko zawn apan gamdai kiang, suahlam pang Jeriko tuite ah a suak a, Jeriko apan singtang gam ah Bethel pha in a paitou zel hi.
Bethel apan Luz ah a suak a, Arkamite gamgi a Ataroth pha in a pai zel hi.
Tumlam pang ah Japhleti gamgi Bethhoron khangnung zaw gamgi, Gezer pha in a paisuk zel a; tupi ah a suak hi.
Huchi in Joseph suante Manasseh leh Ephraim suante’n tantuam in a lata uhi.
A inkuan uh dungzui zel a Ephraim suante gamgi hiai ahi: Suahlam pang a tantuam uh gamgi Ataroth Addar ahi a, Beth-horon sak nungzaw a pha hi.
Mikmethath mal tumlam pang ah a suak a, suahlam pang ah Taanathsilo pha in a kihei nawn a, Janohah suahlam ah a pai zel hi.
Janohah apan Ataroth ah, Naarah ah a paisuk a, Jeriko a tung a, Jordan ah a suak hi.
Tappuah apan tumlam pang ah Kanah luita pha in a pai a; tuipi ah a suak hi. Huaite ahi Ephraim suante a inkuan uh dungzui a a tantuam uh.
Manasseh suante tantuam lak a Ephraim suante adia khopi a seh tuam sakte toh, a khopi tengteng leh a khopelte leng.
Gezer a teng Kanante a delhkhe kei ua; Ephraimte lak ah Kanante tunitan in a omlai ua, a sikha un a om uhi.
Manasseh suante tantuam hiaite ahi. Manasseh Joseph tapa masa ahi a, Gilead pa, Manasseh tapa masa Makir galhat a hih ziak in Gilead leh Bashan gam a tang hi.

Manasseh suan dang tengteng ading in a inkuan uh dungzui in tantuam leng a om hi. Abiezer suante ading, Helek suante ading, Sekem suante ading, Hepher suante ading, leh Semidah suante ading. Huaite a inkuan uh dungzui zel a Joseph tapa Manasseh suan pasalte ahi uhi.
Manasseh tapa Makir, huai tapa Gilead, huai tapa Hepher, huai tapa Zelophehad in tapa neilou in tanu ngen a nei hi. A tanute min Mahlai, Noah, Hoglai, Milkah leh Tirzah ahi.
Siampu Eleazar ma ah leh Nun tapa Joshua ma ah leh miliante ma ah a hoh ua, “Ka unaute uh lak a tantuam hon pesam din
Jordan gal ah Gilead leh Bashan gam simlouh in, Manasseh tantuam ding in mun sawm a puk a;
Manasseh tanute’n a tapate uh lak ah tantuam a neihsam ziak uh ahi. Gilead gam bel Manasseh tapa dangte’n a tang uhi.
Manasseh gamgi Sekem suahlam a om Asher apan Mikmethath pha in ahi a; taklam pang ah En Tappuah mite tenna pha in a pai hi.
Tappuah gam Manasseh a ahi a; himahleh Manasseh gamgi chin a Tappuah ahihleh Ephraim suante a ahi.

Gamgi Kan in luita simlam pangah a paisuka, Ephraim suante gamgi a sun hi. Ephraim suante khopite khenkhat Manasseh suante khopite lak ah a om hi. Himahleh Manasseh suante gamgi bel Kana kuam mallam pang ah a pai a, tuipi ah a tawp hi.
Simlam pang Ephraim a ahi a, mallam pang pen Manasseh a ahi. Tuipi a gamgi ahi. Mallam ah Asher pha in ahi a, suahlam ah Issakar pha in ahitou hi.

Issakar leh Asher gam ah Manasseh in Beth Sean leh a kim a khuate, Ibleam leh a kim a khuate, Endor a tengte leh a kim a khuate Taanak a tengte leh a kim a khuate, Meggiddo a tengte leh a kim a khuate zou in, khaw seh thum a nei uhi.
Himahleh Manasseh suante’n huai khopi a tengte a delhkhe zou kei ua; Kanan mite huai gam ah a teng uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Israel suante a honghat hiaihiai un, Kanante nasem a goih din a omsak ua, a delhkhe siangvek kei uhi.
Joseph suante’n Joshua kiang ah, “Bangchidan ahia gouluah ding tantuam seh khat, tan khat kia n’on piak tuam,
Joshua in a kiang uah, “Tam na hih uleh, Perizte leh miliante gammang na tenna ding un vavat un. Ephraim tang gam pen nou adia a neu luat leh” a chi hi.
Joseph suante’n, “Tanggam kou adin a hun kei hi. Phaigam a teng Kanan tengteng, Beth shean leh a khopi a tengte leh Jezreel guam a tengte’n sik kangtalai a neichiat tuamse uh” a chi uhi.
Joshua in Joseph inkuante, Ephraim leh Manasseh suante kiang ah, “Na tam mahmah ua, hat leng na hat ua; tan khat kia na neikei ding uhi.

‘Tanggam teng nou ading ahilai ding hi. Gammang hita leh, na vat ding ua, a gam chiang tengteng nou a ahi ding’. Kanante’n sik kangtalaite nei in, hat tawk le uh leng, na hawlkhe zou ding uh” a chi hi.
Huai nung in Israel suan mipi tengteng Shiloh khua ah a kikhawm ua, huai ah Kihoupihna puanin a kai uh. Huai gam teng a zoukhinta uhi.
Israel suante lak ah a tantuam uh tang nailou nam sagih a omlai uhi.
Joshua in Israel suante kiang ah, “
Namchih a mi thum zel telkhia unla; amau a kuan ding ua, gam a va en vialvial ding ua, a tantuam hun ding uh bangchiat zel in a vagelh ding ua; ka kiang ah a hongnawn ding uh.
Mun sagihin a khenphot ding ua; Judah pawl simlam ah a tantuam uah a om ding ua, Joseph inkuante mallam ah a tantuam uah a om ding uh.
Gam mun sagih in va khen unla, huai gelhna honpia un. Huchi in hiai ah
Levi teng in na lak uah tantuam a neikei ding uh.
Huchi in huai mite a pawtkheta ua, Joshua in, “Gam va en vialvial unla, hon gelhkhia unla, ka kiang ah hontun nawn unla, hiai ah Shiloh khua ah
Mite a kuan ua, gam a va en vialvial ua, mun sagih in a khen ua, laibu ah a khuakhua in a gelhkhia ua, giahphual Shiloh ah Joshua kiang ah a kiknawn uh.
Joshua in Shiloh ah
Aisan a inkuan uh dungzui in Benjamin suante tung ah a keta a; a gamgi chiang uh Judah suante leh Joseph suante kikal ahi.
Mallam pang a a gamgi chiang uh Jordan apan ahi a; Jeriko sik ah mallam pang ah a paitou a, tumlam pang ah tanggam ah a paitou zel a; Beth-Aven gamdai ah a tawp hi.
Hiai apan Luz lam ah, Luz, huai bel Bethel ahi, sik ah, simlam pang ah a pai zel a; Beth-horon khang simlam pang a tangzul ah Ataroth-adar ah a paisuk hi.
A pai zel a, Beth-horon simlam pang a tangchin apan tumlam ah simlam pang ah a kualphei a; Kiriath-baal, huai Kiriath-jearim ahi, Judah suante khopi ah a tawp a; huai tumlam pang gamgi ahi.
Simlam pang a gam Kiriath-jearim tawp apan ahi a; tumlam ah a pawt a, Nephtoah lui tuite ah a pai zel hi.
Rephaim mallam pang guam a Hinnomtapa guam chin a tangmong ah a paisuk a; Jebuste sik ah, simlam pang a Hinnom guam ah a paisuk a, En-rogel ah a paisuk hi.
Mallam zuan in a pai a, En-semes ah a pai a, Adumim kahtouhna chin Geliloth ah a pai a; Reuben tapa Bohan suang ah a paisuk a;
Arabah sik mallam pang ah a pai zel a, Arabah ah a paisuk a;
Beth-hoglah sik, mallam pang ah a pai zel a; a tawpna bel Jordan simtawp, Chi Tuipi mallam tuipi meng ah ahi. Huai simlam gamgi ahi.
Jordan suahlam pang, a gamgi chiang ahi. Huai ahi Benjamin suante a inkuan uh dungzui a a tantuam gam in a kolhkhum sung.
Benjamin suante a inkuan dungzui un a khopite uh, Jeriko, Beth-hoglah, Emek keziz,
Beth-arabah, Zemariam, Bethel,
Avim, Parah, Ophrah,
Kephar-ha-ammonai, Ophni leh Geba; a khopi tengteng sawmlehnih ahi a, a khopel tengteng toh.
Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,
Mizpeh, Kephirah, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah;
Zelah, Eleph, Jebus, huai Jerusalem ahi, leh Gibeah leh Kiriath, khopi sawmlehli, a khopelte toh. Hiaite ahi Benjamin suante a inkuan uh dungzui ua a tantuam ding ua seh.
Aisan nihveina Simeon suante tung ah a inkuan uh dungzui in a puk hi. A tantuam uh Judah suante tantuam lak ah a tel hi.
A tantuam ding ua pukte Beer–sheba, Sheba, Moladah,
Hazar-shual, Balah, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,
Ziklag, Beth-markaboth, Hazar susah,
Beth-lebaoth leh Sharuhen; khopi tengteng sawmlehthum ahi a, khopel teng uh toh.
Ain, Rimmon, Ether leh Ashan: khopi li, a khopelte toh.
Huai khopi kim a khopel tengteng Baalath Beer simlam a Ramah a pha hi. Huaite Simeon suante a inkuan uh dungzui a amau tantuam dia seh.
Simeon suante tantuam Judah suante tantuam lak a ahi. Judah suante tantuam amau adin a zalaw ngal a; huaiziak in Simeon suante tantuam lak ah a tel hi.
Aisan thumveina Zebulun suante tung ah a inkuan uh dungzui in a puk hi. A tantuam gamgi uh Sarid tan ahi.
A gamgi uh tumlam pang ah Maralah pha in a pai a, Dabeseth a va tung a; Jokneam kiang a luita a va tung hi.
Sarid apan suahlam pang ni suahna lam ah Kisloth-tabor gamgi pha in a kawitou a; Daberath ah a pawt hi.
Huai apan suahlam pang ah Gittah-hepher leh Etah-kazin ah a pai zel a, Neah lam zuan in Rimmon ah a pawt hi.
Mallam ah Hanathon ah a kualphei nawn a, a pawtna Iphtah El guam ah ahi.
Katath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah leh Bethlehem; khopi tengteng sawmlehnih ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Hiaite ahi Zebulun suante a inkuan uh dungzui a, a tantuam ding ua seh; huai khopite leh khopelte toh.
Aisan liveina Issakar suante tung ah a inkuan uh omdan dungzui in a puk hi.
A gamgi chiang uh Jezreel, Kesuloth, Shunem,
Haphraim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kishion, Abez,
Remeth, En-gannim, En-haddah leh Beth-pazzez tan ahi.
Tabor, Shahazimah leh Beth-shemesh a va pha a; a pawtna Jordan ah ahi a, khopi tengteng sawmlehguk ahi a, a khopel teng toh.
Hiaite ahi Issakar suante nam a inkuan uh dungzui a, a tantuam ding ua seh; khopite leh a khopelte toh.
Aisan ngana Asher suante tung ah a inkuan uh dungzui in a puk hi.
Gamgi chiang Helkath, Hali, Beten, Aksaph,
Allammelek, Amad leh Mishal ahi a; tumlam pang ah Karmel tang leh Sihor-libnath a phasuk hi.
Ni suahna lampang ah Beth-dagon a kualtou a, Zebulun leh mallam pang ah Jiphthah-el guam ah Beth-emek leh Neiel a vapha a; veilam ah Kabul pha in a pai a,
Ebron leh Rehob, Hammon leh Kanah, Zidon thupi pha in a pai zel hi.
Gamgi Ramah leh Tura khopi kulhnei ah a kualphei a, Hosah ah a kualphei nawn a, Akzib gam tuipi ah a pawt hi.
Ummah, Aphek leh Rehob; khopi tengteng sawmnih leh nih ahi a, a khopel teng toh.
Huaite ahi Asher suante nam a inkuan uh dungzui a, a tantuam uh; khopite leh a khopelte.
Aisan gukna Naphtali suante tung ah a inkuan uh dungzui in a puk hi.
A gamgi chiang uh Heleph leh Za-ananim a singkung lianpi apan Adami Nekeb, Jabneel leh Lakkum pha in a pai a, Jordan ah a tawp hi.
Tumlam pang ah Aznoth-tabor ah a paisuk in; huai apan Hukok ah a pai a, simlam ah Zebulun a vatung a, tumlam ah Asher a tung a, ni suahna lam ah Judia gam a Jordan a phatou hi.
Khopi kulhbang neite: Ziddim, Zer, Hamath, Rakkath, Kinneret,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edre-i, En-hazor,
Iron, Migdal-el, Horem, Beth-anath leh Beth-shemesh ahi a, khopi tengteng sawm ahi a, a khopel teng uh toh.
Hiaite ahi Naphtali suante nam a inkuan dungzui ua a tantuam uh, khopite leh a khopelte ahi.
Aisan sagihna Dan suante tung ah a inkuan uh dungzui in a puk hi.
A tantuam gamgi uh Zoreah, Estaol leh Ir-shemes,
Sha-alabin, Aijalon leh Jethlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Bene-berak, Gath-rimmon,
Me-jarkon, Rakkon leh Jopah kiang a gamgi toh.
Dan suante gamgi in huaite a vakheng a; Dan suante’n Lesem a dou ua, a la ua, namsau in a hihmang ua, a tangta uh. Huai ah a teng pah ua, a pu uh Dan mintam in Lesem, Dan a na chi uhi.
Hiaite ahi Dan suante nam a inkuan uh dungzui a, a tantuam uh; huai khopi leh a khopelte toh.
Huchi in a tantuam ding ua gamgi bawl bangzel a gam a hawmkhit un, Israel suante’n Nun tapa Joshua a lak uah tantuam a bawlsak uhi.
thupiak bang in Ephraim singtang gam a, a khopi din a nget mah Timnath Serah a pia ua; aman khopi a sat a, huai ah a teng hi.
Hiaite ahi siampu Eleazar, Nun tapa Joshua leh Israel suante nam inkuan a intekpente’n Shiloh a
Huan,
“Israel suante kiang ah, ‘Kihumbitna khuate bawl in, Mosi zang a na kiang ua ka genkhitsa ahi.
Kuapeuh theilou leh tumlou pi a mithat kha, huai ah a tailut thei ding hi. Huchi in sisan phulami apan nou adin kihumbitna ahi ding.

Huai khopite lak a a koi hiam pen a, a tailut chiang in, khopi kulh kongpi lutna ah a va ding dia, huai khaw upate bil a zak in a tanchin a vatun ding. Amau khopi sung ah a kiang uah a pilut ding ua, a lak ua a ten sam theihna din a omna ding a sehsak ding uhi.
Sisan phulami in a hondelh leh a thatmi pen a khut ah na pe ding uh ahi kei. A invengte theilou a, a thah ahi a, a ma in a haw ngalkei hi.

Mipi ma a vaihawmsak dia adin ma leh siampu lian a pangpa a sih mateng, huai khopi ah a teng ding hi. Huai nung in mi thatmi pen amah khaw sung mahmah, a tai khiaksan khua, amah mah inn sung ah a lut nawn ding ahi’ ” chi’n gen in, a chi hi.
Huchi in Naphtali tanggam a Galili a Kadesh, Ephraim tanggam a Sekem leh Judia singtang gam a Kirath Arba, huai bel Hebron ahi, a septa uhi.
Suahlam ah Jordan gal a Jeriko ah Reuben nam gam a gamdai phaizang a Bezer, Gad nam gam a Gilead gam a Ramoth, Manasseh nam gam a Bashan a Golan a septa uhi.
Hiai khuate ahi Israel suan tengteng leh a lak ua namdang tengte adia seh a om. Kuapeuh mi that kha, hiai khuate a tailut in mipi mai a adin mateng sisan phulami khut ah silou in a omthei ding hi.
Huchi in Levi chi inkuan a intekpente siampu Eleazar kiang ah leh Nun tapa Joshua kiang ah leh Israel suante nam inkuan a intekpente kiang ah a hoh uhi.
“Kanan gam a Shiloh khua ah,
Huchi in Israel suante’n

Aisan Kohath suan tung ah a pukta hi. Huchi in siampu Aron suan Levi chi a mite’n Judah nam tantuam apan, Simeon nam tantuam apan leh Benjamin nam tantuam apan khopi sawmlehthum aisan in a tangta uhi.
Kohath suan dangte’n Ephraim nam suante tantuam apan, Dan nam tantuam apan leh Manasseh nam kimkhat tantuam apan khopi sawm aisan in a tangta uhi.
Gershon suante’n Issakar nam suante tantuam apan, Asher nam tantuam apan, Naphtali nam tantuam apan leh Bashan gam a Manasseh nam kimkhatte tantuam apan, khopi sawmlehthum aisan in a tangta uhi.
Merari suante’n a inkuan uh dungzui in Reuben nam tantuam apan, Gad nam tantuam apan leh Zebulun nam tantuam apan khopi sawmlehnih a tangta uhi.
Israel suante’n
Huchi in Judah suante nam tantuam apan leh Simeon suante nam tantuam apan hiai khopi minlohte a pia uhi.
Huaite Levi suan, Kohath pawl a namte, Aron suan pawl ading ahi; aisan amau tung ah a puk masapen hi.
Amau adin Judah tanggam a Kiriath Arba leh a kim a gantatna gam toh a pia uhi. Kiriath Arba Hebron kichi ahi a, Arba ahihleh Anak pa ahi.
Khopi kimvelte leh a khopelte Jephunneh tapa Kaleb tantuam din a pia uhi.
Siampu Aron suante Hebron, mi thatmite kihumbitna khopi, a kimvel toh, Libnah khua, a kimvel toh;
Jattir khua, a kim a velte toh, Astemoa khua, a kim a velte toh;
Holon khua, a kim a velte toh, Debir khua, a kim a velte toh;
Ain khua, a kim a velte toh, Juttah khua, a kim a velte toh; Beth Semes khua, a kim a velte toh; huai nam nihte tantuam apan khopi kua a pia uhi.
Benjamin nam tantuam apan Gibeon khua, a kim a velte toh, Geba khua, a kim a velte toh;
Anathoth khua, a kim a velte toh, Almon khua, a kim a velte toh; khopi li a pelai uhi.
Aron suan, siampute khopi tengteng khopi sawmlehthum ahi, a kim a velte toh.
Kohath suante inkuan, Levi pawl leh Kohath suan dangte’n leng a tantuam khopite uh Ephraim nam tantuam apan in ahi a tan uh.
Mi thatmite kihumbitna khopi Ephraim singtang gam a Sekem khua, a kim a velte toh, Gezer khua a kim a velte toh,
Kibzaim khua, a kim a velte toh, Bethhoron khua, a kim a velte toh; khopi li a pia uhi.
Dan nam tantuam apan Eltekeh khua, a kim a velte toh, Gibbethon khua, a kim a velte toh;
Aijalon khua, a kim a velte toh, Gath-rimmon khua, a kim a velte toh, khopi li.
Manasseh nam kimkhatte tantuam apan Taanak khua, a kim a velte toh; Gath-rimmon khua, a kim a velte toh; khopi nih.
Kohath suan dangte nam khopi tengteng khaw sawm ahi, a kim a velte toh.
Gershon suante pawl, Levi namte Manasseh nam kimkhatte tantuam apan, mi thatmite kihumbitna khopi, Bashan gam a Golan khua, a kim a velte toh; Beeshterah khua, a kim a velte toh; khopi nih a pia uhi.
Issakar nam tantuam apan Kishion khua, a kim a velte toh, Daberath khua, a kim a velte toh;
Jarmuth khua, a kim a velte toh, En-gannim khua, a kim a velte toh; khopi li.
Asher nam tantuam apan Mishal khua, a kim a velte toh;
Helkath khua, a kim a velte toh, Rehob khua, a kim a velte toh, khopi li.
Naphtali nam tantuam apan, mi thatmite kihumbitna khopi, Galili gam a Kadesh khua, a kim a velte toh, Hammoth Dor khua, a kim a velte toh, Kartan khua, a kim a velte toh, khopi thum.
Gershon pawl a inkuan uh dungzui zel a, a tantuam uh khopi tengteng sawmlehthum ahi, a kim a velte toh.
Merari suante pawl inkuan, Levi pawl dangte bel Zebulun nam tantuam apan Jokneam khua, a kim a velte toh, Karta khua, a kim a velte toh,
Dimnah khua, a kim a velte toh, Nahalal khua, a kim a velte toh, khopi li.
Reuben nam tantuam apan Bezer khua, a kim a velte toh, Jahaz khua, a kim a velte toh,
Kedemoth khua, a kim a velte toh; khopi li.
Gad nam tantuam apan, mi thatmite kihumbitna khopi, Gilead gam a Ramoth khua, kim a velte toh, Mahanaim khua, a kim a velte toh;
Heshbon khua, a kim a velte toh, Jazer khua, a kim a velte toh; avek in khopi li.
Hiai tengteng Levi pawl inkuan dangte Merari suante pawl a inkuan uh dungzui zel a, a khopite uh ahi. Huchi in a tantuam uh khopi sawmlehnih ahi.
Israel suante pawl tantuam apan Levi pawl khopi tengteng sawmli leh giat ahi, a kim a velte toh.
Hiai khopite’n a kimvel a neichiat ua; khopi tengteng huchibang vek ahi uh.
Huchi in
a pipute uh kiang a kichiam a, a na chiamsa bang ngei in munchih ah muanna a pia a, a melma tengteng uh kuamah a ma ua pangzou himhim a omkei uhi.
Israel inkuante kiang a, a hoih lam thu a na gen tengteng vuaksuak khat leng a omkei a, a hongtung vek hi.
Huaikhit in Joshua in Reuben pawlte, Gad pawlte leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte a sam hi.
A kiang uah, “
Tuni pha in na unaute uh na taisan kei ua,
na Pathian un a kiang ua a na gensa bang in, na unaute uh muanna a peta hi. Huaiziak in,
sikha Mosi in
Joshua in amau a vualzawl a, a paisakta hi. Huchi in a puanin lam uah a paita uhi.

Manasseh nam kimkhatte Mosi in Bashan gam ah tantuam a pia a; a kimkhat dangte Joshua in tumlam pang ah Jordan gal ah a unaute lak ah tantuam a pezawta hi. Joshua in a inlam ua a paisakdek lai in a vualzawl hi.

A kiang uah, “Na puanin lam uah hauhsakna tamtak toh paita unla, gan tampi toh, dangka toh, dangkaeng toh, dal toh, sik toh, silhlehten tampi toh. Na melmate ua pan na gallakte uh unaute toh kihawm dialdial un” a chi hi.
Reuben suante, Gad suante leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte a kiknawn ua, Kanan gam Shiloh khua apan Israel suante kiang apan Gilead gam,
Kanan gam a Jordan gamgi a va tun un Reuben suante, Gad suante leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte’n Jordan lui gei ah maitam lianpi kholang mahmah khat a doh uhi.
Ngai in, Reuben suante, Gad suante leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte’n Kanan gamchin tak, Jordan gamgi, Israel suante gam lampang ah maitam a doh uh, chih Israelte kiang ah kuahiam khat in a va hilh hi.
Israel suante’n hiai thu a zak un, Israel suan mipi tengteng amaute dou tum in Shiloh khua ah a kikhawm uhi.
Israel suante’n Gilead gam a Reuben suante, Gad suante leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte kiang ah siampu Eleazar tapa Phinehas a sawl uhi.
Milian sawm, Israel nam a inkuan a intekpente in Phinehas a zui uhi.
Reuben suante, Gad suante leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte kiang Gilead gam ah a hoh ua, a kiang uah,
Huchi in
Peor mun a tatsiatnate, ei adia neu lua a sim theih ahi maw? Tunitan in leng huai a i khelhna ua pan silsiang i hi naikei ua,
Tuni a
Na gam luah uh sianglou ahihleh,
Zer tapa Akan in hamsiat thil ah a na hihkhial a, Israel mipi tengteng tung ah hehna a hongom ahi kei maw? Huai mi tatsiatna ah amah kia a mangthang tuam kei hi’ ” a chi uhi.
Reuben suante, Gad suante leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte’n Israel nam a intekpente a dawng ua, a kiang uah,
Haltum thillatna ding hiam, nekding thillatna ding hiam, lemna thillatna ding hiam ahihleh,
‘Tunung chiang in na suante un ka suante uh kiang ah, Nou
Nou Reuben suante leh Gad suante aw,
Huaiziak in, kisa un, maitam i bawl ding uh, haltum thillatna ding leh kithoihna ding bel hilou in.
Kou leh, nou leh i nung ua i suante kikal ah theihpihna ahi dia, huchi in ka haltum thillatte uh leh ka kithoihnate uh leh ka lemna thillatte ua
Huaiziak in, hichi ahi ding a, tunung chiang a, ka kiang uh hiam, ka suante uh kiang uh hiam a huchibang a, a honchih chiang ua kou, En ve ua, ka pipute un
tung a hel a
Siampu Phinehas leh a kiang a om mipi milian, Israel pawl nam intekpente’n Reuben suante leh Gad suante leh Manasseh suan kimkhatte thugen a zak un a kipaksak mahmah hi.
Siampu Eleazar tapa Phinehas in Reuben suante leh Gad suante leh Manasseh suan kimkhatte kiang ah,
Huchi in siampu Eleazar tapa Phinehas leh milian pawl, Reuben suante leh Gad suante apan leh Gilead gam apan Kanan gam ah Israel suante kiang ah a kiknawnta ua, thu a va tun nawn uhi.
Huai thute’n Israel suante a kipaksak mahmah a; Israel suante’n Pathian a phatta uh. Huchi in Reuben suante leh Gad suante dou a, a tenna gam uh suksiat sak din kuankhiat a tum nawn kei uhi.
Reuben suante leh Gad suante’n huai maitam pen ‘theihpihtu’ a chi uh. “
Hichi ahi a,
Joshua in Israel tengteng, a upate leh a intekpente, a vaihawmmite leh a heutu teng uh a samsaka, a kiang uah, “Ka upa in, ka tekta hi.
na Pathian un noute ziak a hiai nam tengteng tung a a thilhihte na muta ua;
Ngai un, Jordan lui leh tumlam Tuipi Lian kikal a nam omlaite zou in, aisan in na tantuam ding un k’on pia hi.
na Pathian un na ma uah amau a delhkhe dia, na muhbat louhna uah a hawlmang vek ding.
Huaiziak in Mosi dan laibu a gelh tengteng taklam ah hiam veilam ah hiam a na pialsan hetlouhna ding un hangsantak in zui un.
Hiai nam na lak ua omlaite toh tengkhawm kei un. A pathiante uh min gen kei unla, a minte un kichiam kei unla, a na uh leng sem kei unla, a ma uah leng kun in a na uh sem kei un.
Himahleh tuni tan a na hih gige bang un,
na ma uah chi thupitak leh hattakte a delhkhe khinta hi. Na ma uah tunitan in kuamah pangzou himhim a omkei uhi.
Na lak ua mi khat in mi sang khat a delh dia, na kiang ua a gensa bang in,
na Pathian uh it ding in pilvang mahmah un.

Pilvang lou a, na lehngatsan himhim ua, hiai namte lak a omlaite, na lak ua omlaite ngei, na pawlmat ua, amaute toh pasal leh zi a na kineih ua, amaute na luppih ua, amau leng nou a hon luppih u le zaw,
na Pathian un hiai namte na mitmuh un a hon delhkhiak sak nawn kei ding hi.
Ngai un, tuni in lei pumpi dan bang in ka paita ding hi.
huaiziak in hichi ahi ding a,
na Pathian un a hon thupiak thukhun na tatlek san ua, pathian dangte nasem a kun a na biak uleh,
Huan, Joshua in Israel nam tengteng Sekem ah a samkhawm a, Israel upate, a intekpente, a vaihawmmite leh a heutute uh a samsaka; Pathian ma ah a hong kimu sak chiat uhi.
Joshua in mi tengteng kiang ah, “
Na pu uh Abraham huai lui gal apan ka pikhia a, Kanan gam teng tawnsuak in ka pi a, a suante ka pungsak a, Isak ka pia hi.
Isak kiang ah Jakob leh Esau ka pia a; Esau tantuam din Seir tang ka pia a; Jakob leh a tate Aigupta ah a paisuk uhi.
Mosi leh Aron ka sawl a, a lak ua thillamdang hih in Aigupta ka gawt a: huaikhit in amau k’on pikhia hi.
Na pipute uh Aigupta gam apan ka pikhia a, tuipi na hongtung ua; Aigupta mite’n na pipute uh kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuang mite toh Tuipi San tan in a nungdelh uhi.
Amau
Jordan lui gal a om Amorte gam ah ka honpi a; amau a hondou uh. Na khut uah amau k’on pia a, a gam uh na luahta uh. Amau k’on hihmang sakta hi.
Moab kumpipa Zippor tapa Balak a hong kisa a, Israel a dou a; Beor tapa Balaam nou hon hamsiat din a samsak hi.
Himahleh Balaam thu ka ngaikhe kei hi. Huaiziak in nou a hon vualzawl zawsopta hi. Huchi in a khut apan k’on honkheta hi.
Jordan lui na kan ua, Jeriko khua na tung tou ua; Jeriko khomite’n a hon na dou ua, Amorte, Perizte, Kanante, Hitte, Girgaste, Hivte leh Jebuste toh; amau na khut uah k’on peta hi.
Na ma uah tunpi ka sawl a, huai in na ma uah amau a delh a, Amorte’ kumpipa nihte tan in leng. Himahleh na namsau un hiam, na thal un hiam in ahi kei hi.
Na sepkhiak hetlouh uh gam leh na bawl hetlouh uh khopite k’on pia a, huaite ah na teng ua; na suanlouh uh grephuan leh olive huan apan na ne uhi.
Huaiziak in
na sep hoihlou a na theih uh leh tuni in kua na ahia na sep ding uh, tel un. Na pipute un Luigal a, a na a sep uh pathiante hia, na luah uh gam a Amorte pathiante? Kei leh inkuante’n zaw
Mipite’n, “
i Pathian ngei ahi, i pipute toh Aigupta gam saltanna inn apan hon pikhia a, i mitmuh a chiamtehna thupitak tak hih a, i paina teng leh mipi tengteng i nawk paisuakna ah leng hon vengbit hi.
i ma ngei uah namchih huai gam a om Amorte ngei a delhkhe vek hi. Huaiziak in kou leng
Joshua in mipite kiang ah, “
na paisan ua, namdang pathiante nna nasep uleh, na tung ua thil hoih a hihkhit nung in a hong kihei dia, hon hihna in a honhih mangthang ding” a chi hi.
Mipite’n, Joshua kiang ah, “Hilou e,
Joshua in mipite kiang ah, “A na sep tum in
Amahmah in, “Huchi ahihleh na lak ua namdang pathian omte koihmang unla, na lungtangte uh
Mipite’n Joshua kiang ah, “
Huai ni’n Joshua in mipite toh kikal ah thu a khung a, Sekem khua ah dan leh vaihawmna a sehsak hi.
Joshua in hiai thu Pathian Dan Laibu ah a gelh a; suang lianpi a la a,
Joshua in mipi tengteng kiang ah, “Ngai un, hiai suang i thu hon theihpihtu hi hen.
Huchi in Joshua in mipite a tantuam gamchiat uah a paisakta hi.
Hichi ahi a, huai thilte khit in Nun tapa Joshua,
Gaash tang mallam pang, Ephraim tanggam a amah tantuam gamgi sung Timnath Serah ah a vuita uhi.
Joshua damsung leh amah khup a dam,
Israel suante’n Aigupta gam apan Joseph guhte a puak touh uh Sekem a Sekem pa Hamor tate apan Jakob in dangka za khat a a leina mun ah a vui ua; huai mun Joseph suante tantuam ahita hi.
Huan Aron tapa Eleazar a si a; Ephraim tang gam a a tantuam dia a piak a tapa Phinehas tang ah a vui uhi.
Joshua sih nung in hichi ahi a, Israel suante’n, “Kanante dou a ei adia hon sualsak din kua a hohtou masa dia?” chi’n
Judah in a unau Simeon kiang ah, Kanante dou din ka gam tantuam ah hong paitou in. Keileng na gam tantuam ah ka hongpai sam ding, a chi hi. Huchi in Simeon a kiang ah a hohta hi.
Huchi in Judah a va hoh a; Kanante leh Perizte
Bezek khua ah Adonibezek a mu ua, a dou ua, Kanante leh Perizte a that uhi.
Himahleh Adonibezek a tai a; a nungdelh ua, a man ua, a khutpi leh a khepi a tansak uhi.

Adonibezek in, “Kumpipa sawmsagihte khutpi leh khepi ka tan khiaksakte’n ka dohkan nuai ah anneng a tawm uh. Ka hih banggeih a Pathian in honthuk eita ve” a chi hi. Jerusalem khua ah a pi ua, huai ah a sita hi.
Judah suante’n Jerusalem khua a dou ua, a la ua, namsau in a sual ua, a khopi a hal uhi.
Huai nung in Judah suante tanggam simlam leh phaizang a teng Kanante dou din a kuansuk uhi.
Judah in Kanante Hebron khua a tengte a vadou a, A ma in Hebron min Kiriath Arba ahi; Sesai, Ahiman leh Talmai a that uhi.
Huai apan Debir khomite a dou uh, A ma in Debir khaw min Kiriath Sepher ahi.
Kaleb in, Kuapeuh Kiriath Sepher khua dou a, la peuhmah ka tanu Aksah a zi din ka pe ding, a chi hi.
Kaleb nau Kenaji tapa Othniel in a lazou a, a tanu Aksah a zi din a peta hi.
Hichi ahi a, a kiang a vatun in gam ngen thei din a pa a kunzou hi. Sabiltung apan a kum khia a; Kaleb in a kiang ah, “Bang na deih a?” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Hon vualzawl in. Simlam gam lah n’on peta ngal a, tuinak neite leng hon pelai in” a chi hi. Kaleb in tuinak nei tungnungte leh khangnungte a peta hi.
Mosi puzon Ken suante Arad simlam a om Judah gamdai ah Judah suante toh tum khopi apan a hohtou ua; mipite lak ah a va teng uhi.
Judah bel a unau Simeon toh a kisa ua, Zephath khua a om Kanante a vathat ua, a hih chimit vek uhi. Huai khopi min Hormah chih ahi.
Judah in Gaza khua leh a tuipiau, Askelon khua leh a tuipiau leh Ekron khua leh a tuipiau tan in a la hi.
Judah kiang ah a om a; tanggam a tengte a delhkhia a; guam a tengte bel sik kangtalaite a neih ziak un a delhkhe zou kei hi.
Mosi in a na gensa bang in Hebron khua Kaleb a pia ua, aman huai apan Anak tapa thumte a delhkhia hi.
Benjamin suante’n Jebuste, Jerusalem khua a tengte a delh khe kei ua, Jebuste Benjamin suante toh tunitan in Jerusalem ah a teng khawm uhi.
Joseph inkuante leng Bethel khua dou din a kisa tou ua, a kiang uah
Joseph inkuante’n Bethel khua ah enkhemite a sawl uhi. A ma in huai khaw min Luz ahi.
Enkhemite’n mi khat khaw sung apan hong pawtkhia a mu ua, a kiang ah, Hehpih in khopi sung lutna hon ensak dihve, huchi in k’on hehpih ding uh, a chi uhi.
Khopi sung lutna a ensak a, namsau in huai khua a dou ua; huai mipa leh a inkuanpihte teng bel a hinghawi uhi.
Huai mipa Hitte gam ah a lut a, khua a sat a, huai khaw min Luz a sa a; tunitan in hiai min a pulai hi.

Manasseh in Beth shean khua leh a khopel a tengte, Taanak khua leh a khopel a tengte, Dor khua leh a khopel a tengte, Ibleam khua leh a khopel a tengte, Meggiddo khua leh a khopel a tengte a delhkhe kei hi. Kanante huai gam ah a teng uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Israel suante a honghat un Kanante a na sem ding un a omsak ua, a delhkhe siang vekkei uhi.
Ephraim in Gezer khua a teng Kanante a delhkhe kei a; Kanante Gezer khua ah a lak uah a teng zawta uh.
Zebulun in Kitron khua a tengte leh Nahalol khua a tengte a delhkhe kei a; Kanante a lak uah a tengsam ua, a nasem ding un a om zawta uhi.
Asher in Akko khua a tengte, Zidon khua a tengte, Ahlab khua a tengte, Akjib khua a tengte, Helbah khua a tengte, Aphik khua a tengte leh Rehob khua a tengte a delhkhe kei hi.
Asher suante huai gam a teng Kanante lak ah a teng samta uhi; amau lah a delhkhe ngalkei ua.

Naphtali in Beth-shemesh khua a tengte, Beth-anath khua a tengte a delhkhe kei. Huai gam a teng Kanante lak ah a teng samta uhi. Beth-shemesh khua a tengte leh Beth-anath khua a tengte nasem din a omta uhi.
Amorte’n Dan suante tang gam ah a hawltou ua; phaizang a a paisuk uh a phal ngalkei ua.
Amorte Aijalon a Heres tang leh Shaalbim khua ah a teng ua, Joseph inkuante’n amau a zou ua, a nasem ding un a lak uah a teng uhi.
Amorte gam chiang Akrabbim tungkahna apan, suangpi apan leh Sela apan ahi.
Hiai gam a tengte toh thukhung kei unla; a maitamte uh hih chip sak un’ ka chi hi. Himahleh ka thupiak na zuikei ua, bangziak in ahia hiai na hih uh?
Huaiziak in, Amaute k’on delhkhiak sak nawn kei dia, na pang uah lingte ahi zawta ding ua, a pathiante uh nou adin thang ahi ding uh” ka chi ahi.
Hichi ahi a,
Huai mun min Bokim a sa ua; huai ah
Joshua in mipite a kikhenzak sak nung in Israel suante michih amau tantuam gam chiat luah din a paita uhi.
Joshua damsung leh upate Joshua kheng a dam teng,
Nun tapa Joshua,
Gaash tang mallam pang Ephraim tang gam a amah tantuam gamgi sung Timnath Heres khua ah a vui uhi.
Amah khang a mi teng leng a pipute uh kiang ah a paikhawmta uhi. Amaute nung in
Israel suante’n
, a pipute uh Pathian, Aigupta gam apan pikhepa a lehngatsan ua, pathian dangte, a kim ua tengte pathiante a zui ua, a bia ua,
a lehngatsan ua, Baal leh Astoreth na a sem uhi.
Israelte tung ah a hehta a, amau doumite khut ah a pia a, a melma uh, a kim ua tengte kiang ah a khong a, a melmate uh a zouta kei uhi.
Koipeuh ah hoh mahle uh
Himahleh
Huchipi in leng a vaihawmmite uh thu a ngaikhe kei ua, pathian dangte kiang a angkawm in amaute a be zawta ua, a pipute un
vaihawmmite a bawlsak chiang in, vaihawmmi kiang ah

Himahleh hichi ahi a, vaihawmmi a sih khit chiang in, a nungtolh ua, pathian dangte zui a, a na uh a sep uah a pipute uh sang mah in a gamta se zawsem ua; a thilhihte uh leh a paupengna uh leng a tawpsan tuankei uhi.
Israelte tung ah
Huaiziak in tuban Joshua sih ma a delhkhiak louh namte ka delhkhiak sak nawn kei ding.
A pipute uh zuih bang a
Huchi in
Kanan gam a galdou kha nai hetlou Israelte ze-etna din
A tup bel Israel suante, tuma a galdou dan thei nai het loute galdou dan sinsak a hihna ding lel ahi.
Huaite bel Philistiate kumpipa ngate, Kananmi tengte, Sidonte leh Lebanon tang a teng Hivte ahi ua, Baal Hermon tang apan Hamath khaw lutna pha in ahi uh.
Mosi zang a a pipute uh thu a na piakte a zuih ding uh leh zuih louh ding uh theihna din, huaite Israelte ze-etna ding ahi uh.
Israel suante Kanante, Hitte, Amorte, Perizte, Hivte leh Jebuste lak ah a teng uhi.
A tanute uh zi in a nei ua, a tanute uh a tapate uh zi in a pia ua, a pathiante uh na a sem uhi.
Israel suante’n
Huchi in
Israel suante’n
kha amah tung ah a hongtung a, Israel tung ah vai a hawm hi. Aman Mesopotamia gam kumpipa Kushan Risathaim a va dou a,
Huchi in kum sawmli gam galmuang in a omta a, huchi in Kenaz tapa Othniel a sita hi.
Israel suante’n
Aman Ammon leh Amalek suante a kaikhawm a; Israelte a va dou a, tum khopi a luahta hi.
Huchi in Israelte Moab kumpipa Eglon thunuai ah kum sawmlehgiat a om uhi.
Himahleh Israel suante’n
Ehud in namsau hiam tuah tongtan a sau in a sek a; puan nuai ah a taklam pheipi ah a henbelh hi.
Moab kumpipa Eglon kipahman a va pia a; Eglon bel mi thau tak ahi.
Kipahman a vapiak khit in, kipahman tawite a paisak nawn hi.

Amah bel Gilgal khaw kiang a suangsekna mun apan a nungkik nawn a, “I aw, kumpipa, honhilh ding thuguk ka nei hi” a chi hi. Aman, “Dai un,” a chi hi. Huchi in a kiang a ding teng in a pawt khiaksan vek uhi.
Ehud in a kiang a va naih a; amah bel a nipi dantan ah amah kia in a na tu hi. Ehud in, “Pathian in na kiang a gen ding thu a hon thukhak hi” a chi hi. A tutphaha kipan amah a hong ding hi.
Ehud in a khut veilam in a pheipi taklam a namsau a doka, a gil ah a dawt hi.
A namsau bul tan in a tuma, a thau in namsau a hubita, a gilpi apan namsau a dokkhe kei a, a ek a tolhkhia hi.
Huchi in Ehud inlim ah a pawt a, dantan kongkhakte a khakkhum a, a kalh bikbek hi.
A pawt khitnung in, a sikhate a hongpai ua, a va et tak un ngai in, dantan kongkhakte a na kikalh hi. “A nipi dantan ah a tuam omtadih a hi’n teh” a chi uhi.
Zumhuai tan khop in a ngak nilouh ua, ngai in, dantan kongkhakte a hong himhim kei a; huchi in tahbi a la ua, a hong ua; ngai in, a kumpipa uh pialkhang ah sisa in a na puk hi.
Ehud lah huchi a a ngak nilouh sung un a na taimang khina, huai suangsekna mun a khenga, Seirah ah a tailut hi.
Hichi ahi a, huai mun a tun in Ephraim tanggam ah pengkul a muta, Israel suante tanggam apan a kiang ah a paisuk ua, aman a ma uh a kaita hi.
Aman a kiang uah, Honzui dih ua.
Huai hun in Moabte sing khat mi hat ngenta leh mi hat hangsan hoih ngenta a that ua; khatlel leng taikhia a omkei uh.
Huchi in huai ni’n Moabte Israelte lak ah a zahlak uhi. Huchi in, gam kum sawmgiat sung galmuang in a om hi.
A nung in Anath tapa Shamgar a hong kilanga, huai mi’n Philistiate za guk bawng sutna chiang in a sunluma; Israelte a hunkhia hi.
Ehud sih nung in Israel suante’n Toupa mitmuh in thil gilou a hih nawn uh.
Huchi in Hazor a vaihawmpa, huai Kanan gam kumpipa Jabin kiang ah Toupa’n a khawngta hi. Huai mi sepaih heutupen bel Sisera ahi a, Jentelte gam Haroseth khua ah a teng hi.
Israel suante’n Toupa a sam uh. Huai min kangtalai za kua tak a nei a, kum sawmnih sung Israel suante nakpitak in a nuaisiah hi.
Huailai in zawlnei Deborah, Lapidoth zi in Israelte tung ah vai a hawm hi.
Ephraim tanggam a Ramah leh Bethel khaw kikal a tumsing nuai ah Deborah a teng hi. Israel suante a kiang ah a vai uh hawmsak din a honghoh zel uhi.
Kedesh Naphtali gam apan Abinoam tapa Barak a thukhak a, a kiang ah, “Toupa, Israelte Pathian in, Tabor kiang ah hohtou inla, Naphtali suante leh Zebulun suante mi sing khat pi in.
Huchi in Kison lui ah Jabin sepaih heutu Sisera, a kangtalaite leh a mipite toh k’on sawl ding; amah nang k’on pe ding, chi in thu a honpia ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Barak in a kiang ah, “Hon tonpih lechin ka hoh ding. N’on tonpih kei ding leh ka hohkei ding” a chi hi.
Aman, “K’on tonpih tham ding. Himahleh na hohna a minhoih lohlou ding na hi. Toupa’n Sisera numei kiang ah a khong ding hi” a chi hi. Huchi in Deborah a thou a, Barak toh Kedesh khua ah a hohta uhi.
Barak in Zebulunte leh Naphtalite Kedesh ah a thukhak khawm a; mi sing khat amah toh a hohtou ua; Deborah leng a kiang uah a hohtou sam hi.
Ken mi Heber bel Mosi puzon Hobab suante lak apan a na om tuam a, Kadesh kiang a Zaanaim gam a tawsaw sing mun ah a puanin a vakai hi.
Abinoam tapa Barak bel Tabor tang ah a hohtou chih Sisera a hilh uhi.
Huchi in Sisera in a kangtalai tengteng, sik kangtalai za kua leh a heute Jentelte gam Haroseth khua apan, Kison lui ah a kaikhawm hi.
Huchi in Deborah in Barak kiang ah, “Khai le, tuni Toupa’n Sisera a honpiak ni ahi. Na makaipa Toupa ahi ka hia?” a chi hi. Huchi in Barak Tabor tang apan a paisuk a, mi sing khat in a zuisuk uhi.
Toupa’n Sisera leh a kangtalai tengteng leh a sepaih tengteng namsau in Barak ma ah a hihbuai gawpta a; Sisera a kangtalai apan a kumkhia a, a khe in a taimang hi.
Barak in bel kangtalaite leh sepaihte Jentel gam Haroseth pha in a delh hi. Huchi in Sisera sepaih tengteng namsau in a that vek a; khat lel leng a hinghawi kei uhi.
Sisera bel Ken mi Heber zi Jael puanin ah khe in a tailut hi. Hozor Kumpipa Jabin leh Ken mi Heber inkuante kikal ah lemna a om hi.
Jael bel Sisera dawn din a hongpawt a, a kiang ah, “Pu, honglut in, ka kiang ah honglut in; lau ken” a chi hi. Huchi in puanin sung ah a kiang ah a lutta a, aman puan in a khuh hi.
A kiang ah, “Hehpih in tui tawmchik honpe dihve, ka dang a tak mahmah hi” a chi hi. Aman bawngnawi khuainulhai a hong a, a dawnsak a, a khuhkhum nawn hi.
A kiang ah, “Puanin kongpi ah ding inla, huchi in, ‘Hiai ah mi a om hia?’ chi a hondot uleh, ‘omlou’ na chizel in” a chi hi.

Heber zi Jael in puanin khetkilhna a la a, sek a tawi a, awlchikin a khe a suanpheia, khetkilhna in a haizek ah a khen paisuak a, lei toh a kilhbelh hi. Bah in a ihmut a lim mahmah ngal a; huchi in a sita hi.

Ngai in, Barak in Sisera a hondelh a, amah tuak din Jael a vapawt a, a kiang ah, “Hongpai in, na mi zon k’on ensak ding,” a chi hi. Huchi in a kiang ah a vahoh a; ngai in, Sisera a na sita mai a, puanin khetkilhna a haizek ah a na tal hi.
Huchi in Pathian in huai ni’n Israel suante ma ah Kanan gam kumpipa Jabin a nuaisiah hi.
Kanan kumpipa Jabin a nuaisiah masiah uh Israel suante a hat semsem uhi.
Huai ni’n Deborah leh Abinoam tapa Barak in hiai la a sa uhi:
“Israel a makaite’n a makaih lai un,
amau utthu a mite’n a zuihlai un,
“Aw, nou kumpipate aw,
ngaikhia un.
Aw, nou heutute aw, bil na doh un.
Kei mahmah in
Edom pawn a na hongpawt in,
lei a ling a,
van a hong kia a,
meipi’n vuah a zusak uhi.
Tangte
Sinai tang mah leng.
“Anath tapa Samgar damlai nite leh
Jael damlai nite in lamliante totlouh in a om ua,
zin leh lengte lah lam neute ah a pai uhi.
Israel gamte a tulkhin a,
a khuate luahlouh in a tul khin hi,
kei Deborah ka gamtang a,
Israel gam nu ka gamtat masiah.
Amau pathian thakte a tel ua;
huchi in kulh kongkhak bul ah kidouna a om a;
Israel gam a mi sing li lak ah lum leh tei muh in a om hia?
Ka lungsim Israelte vaihawmpa,
mipite lak a lungluttak a
kipiate lam ah a om hi.
“Pau un, nou sabiltung kang tung a tuangte,
nou vaihawmna a tute leh lampi a paite.
Thal kapmite husa zak phaklouh,
tui tawina mun ah
Israel gam tung a thildik a hihte ngei.
“Huchi in
“Thou in, thou in, Deborah;
thou in, thou in, lasa in.
Thou in, Barak, thou inla,
Abinoam tapa, na salmatte pi in.
Huchi in mi omlaite mipite lak a miliante tung ah thu a neisak a,
Ephraim apan a zungzam khat
Amalek dou a om a, Benjamin,
na mite lak a mite’n nang a honzui uh,
Makir apan gam vaihawmmite a hong paisuk ua,
Zebulun apan Laigelhmi chiang tawimite a hong paisuk uhi.
Issakar miliante Deborah kiang ah a om ua; Issakar leh Barak mah leng.
Amah guam lam a sawlsuk ahi a,
Reuben pawlte ahihleh
Nakpitak in a kingaihtuah lai uhi.
Bangdia belam huang lak a tu nilouh,
Belamhon ham ngai ding lel a?
Reuben pawlte adin lungtang a
Kingaihtuahna thupitak a om hi.
Gileadte Jordan gal ah
a om nilouh ua; bangdia
Dante longte a om nilouh uh ahia?
Asherte tuipi piau ah a tu kinken ua,
a tuipiaute ah a om nilouh uhi.
Zebulun leh Naphtali pawn munsang a
sihngap gigete ahi uh.
“Kumpipate’n a hong dou ua,
Kanan kumpipate’n
Meggiddo tui kiang,
Taanak khua ah a dou ua:
sum himhim a lakei uhi.
Van apan a hondou ua;
Aksite’n a mun ua kipan
Sisera a hondou uh.
Kison lui in amaute a taimang a,
nidanglai lui, Kison lui in,
Aw ka kha, hattak in pai zel in.
“Huchi in sakolte a kipek thotthot ua,
sakol hatte a tawmtawm ziak un.
“Meroji hamsiat un,”
huai a tengte nakpitak in hamsiat un.
Toupa’n mi hattak a douna panpih dia a honglouh ziak un.
“Numei lak ah Jael, Ken mi
Heber zi nuamsapen ahi,
numei puanin a tengte lak ah amah mi nuamsapen ahi.
Tui a hong ngen a,
aman nawitui a pia hi:
nou hoih in nawitui dat a na pia hi.
Kilhna a tawi a,
a taklam in nasemmi sek;
sek in Sisera a khen a,
a lu ah a khen pailet a, ahi,
a haizek ah a khen a,
a khen tal vengvong hi.
A khe bul ah a kuna, a puk a, a luma;
a khe bul ah a kuna, a pukta a;
a pukna mun ah a sita hi.
“Sisera nu bel tawlet ah a dak a,
vathangkalh awng ah a sam a,
Bang achia kangtalai hong tunghak ahia?
Bang achia a kangtalai khe zekai ahia? a chi hi.
A numei pilte’n a na dawng ua, ahi,
amah dawng din hong nawn ua:
“A mu zouta kei ua hia?
Gallak kihawmta lou uhia?
Michih in nungak khat hiam nih chiat;
Sisera tan ding gallak puan ze tuamtuam,
gallak puan ze kilawm,
ze tuamtuam,
gallak ngawng a velh ding puan,
a langnih a ze kilawm, ze tuamtuam,” chi in.
“Huchibang in aw,
Amah itte bel hattak a pai, nisa bang hi uhen” a chi uhi.
Huchi in gam kum sawmli sung galmuang in a om hi.
Huan, Israel suante’n
Midiante’n Israelte a zouta ua; huchi in Midiante ziak in tang ah kawkhukte, kawhawm leh kulhte a bawl uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Israelte’n haichi a chinkhit un Midiante, Amalekte leh suahlam tate a hong kuan ua; a va dou ua,
Panmun a va khoh ua, Gaza tan in lei a thilpoute a hihsiat sak ua, Israel gam ah nekding himhim a hawi kei ua, belam, bawng leh sabiltung tan in a hihse vek uhi.
A ganhonte uh leh a puaninte utoh a hong kuan ua, khaupe bang in tampi a hong kuan ua; amaute leh a sangawngsaute uh simseng ahi kei a, gam hihse dia hong kuan ahi uhi.
Huchi in Israelte Midiante ziak in a genthei mahmahta ua; Israel suante’n
Hichi ahi a, Midiante ziak a Israel suante’n
‘Aigupta gam apan k’on pitou a, saltanna inn apan k’on pikhia hi.
Aiguptate khut apan leh nou hon nuaisiah mi teng khut apan k’on hunkhia a, na ma uah amaute ka delhkhia a, a gam uh nou k’on pia hi.
Kei
angel a kiang ah a hong kilak a, a kiang ah, “Nang mihat hangsan,
Gideon in a kiang ah, “Aw ka toupa,
Aman a kiang ah, “Aw
Aman a kiang ah, “Na mittung ka hihleh, nang mahmah in n’on pi chih chiamtehna banghiam hon musak in.
Na ma a lat ding thilpiak ka va lak a, na kiang a ka hong nawn masiah hiai apan hehpih in nana paimang ken” a chi hi. Aman, “Na hong nawn masiah ka na om gige ding” a chi hi.
Gideon inn sung ah a lut a, kel nou leh tangbuang ephah khat silngou sohlouh a bawl a; a sa seng ah a koih a, huai gel tui bel ah a koih a, tawsaw sing nuai ah a kiang a hontawi in a honglan hi.
Pathian angel in a kiang ah, “Sa leh tanghou silngou sohlouh la inla, hiai suang tung ah koih inla, a tui pen sungkhia in” a chi hi. Huchibang in aman a hihta hi.
Huchi in
Huchi in Gideon in “
Huchi in Gideon in huai ah
Hichi ahi a, huai zan mah in
Hiai suangpi tung ah zeneitakin
Huchi in Gideon in a sikhate lak a mi sawm a pi a,
Khopi a mite zingkhanga, a thoh uleh ngai in, Baal maitam hihchip in a na om a, a bul a Ashera phukpaih in a na om a, maitam tung ah bawngtal nihna lat in a na om hi.
“Hiai kua hih ahia?” chi in a kihou ua, a kidong tuahua, a zon khit un, “Joash tapa Gideon in hiai thil a hih a na hi” a chi uhi.
Huchi in khopi a mite’n Joash kiang ah, Na tapa vapikhia in, a sih ngeingei ding ahi. Baal maitam a hihchip ziak leh a bul a Aserah a phuk ziak in, a chi uh.

Joash in amah hong kalh teng kiang ah, Baal gum ding na hi u maw? Aman hon hondam ding hia? Kuapeuh amah gum zingsang mahmah a thah ding ahi. Pathian khat ahihleh a maitam a hihchip ziak in, kigum leh a kei dia, a chi hi.
Huaiziak in, huai ni’n amah Jerubbaal a sa uhi, a maitam hihchip a hih ziak in “Baal in amah kalh heh,” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Midian tengteng leh Amalekte leh suahlam tate a kikhawm ua; lui a kan ua, Jezreel guam ah a kikulh uhi.
Himahleh,
Manasseh tengteng kiang ah mi a taisak a; huaite’n leng a naih khawm uh. Asherte, Zebulunte leh Naphtali teng kiang ah leng mite a taisak a; amau leng a behlap touta uhi.
Gideon in Pathian kiang ah, “Na gen bang a ka khut a Israelte na hutkhiat ding leh,
Ngai in, buhphual ah belam mul ka koih dia, belam mul tung kia a daitui a na om a, lei tengteng a na hulvek leh, na gen bang in ka khut in Israelte na hunkhe ding, chih ka thei ding” a chi hi.
Huchibang a honghi a, a zing zingsangpi a thou a, belam mul a suk leh belkuang dim tui a takkhia hi.

Gideon in Pathian kiang ah, “Ka tung ah heh ken, khatvei kia k’on gen nawn ding. Hehpih in, khatvei kia belam mul in hon ze-et sak nawn in. Tutung in ahihleh belam mul kia hul henla, leitung tengteng ah daitui om nawn leuleu hen, a chi hi.
Huchibang in Pathian in huai zan in a hih a; belam mul kia a na hul a, leitung tengteng ah daitui a na om leuleu hi.
Huchi in Jerubbaal, huai bel Gideon ahi a, leh a kiang a om mi tengteng zingkhang in a thou ua, Harod tuikhuk chin ah a kikulh uh. Midiante bel mallam pang Moreh tangbul guam ah a kikulh uhi.

Huaiziak in, ngai in, mite zak in, ‘Kuapeuh lau leh ling a om leh kiknawn henla,’ Gilead tang apan pai kiknawn hen, chi in, genkhia in” a chi hi. Huchi in mite sing nih leh sang nih a kiknawn ua; sing khat a omlai uhi.
Huchi in mite lui ah a pisuk a,
A khut pek a liahthohte mi za thum ahi ua, midang tengteng kun a khukdin a tuihip vek ahi uh.
Huchi in
Huchi in mite’n nekding leh a pengkulte uh a tawi ua; Israel mi tengteng a puanin lam uah a paisak vek a, mi za thumte bel a omsak a, Midiante kulh bel a nuai phaizang ah a om hi.
Hichi ahi a, huai zan in
Himahleh hohsuk na lauh leh na sikha Purah toh kulh ah va hohsuk phot un.
Huchi in a thugen uh na za dia; huaikhit chiang in na khut hihhat in a om dia, kulh ah na hoh ngamta ding” a chi hi. Huchi in a sikha Purah toh kulh a galvengte tuah masak napen omna ah a hohsuk uhi.
Midiante, Amalekte leh suahlam tapate tengteng huai phaizang ah khaupehon bang in tampi a na om ua; a sangawngsaute uh simseng vuallouh, a tamlam uh lah tuipi piau a piaunel zah mahmah ahi uhi.

Gideon a tunsuk in, ngai in, mi khat in a lawmpa a mang a na hilh a, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, mang ka nei a, barli buh tanghou phel Midiante kulh ah a na om a, puanin ah a na tuklut a, a hon hihchim a, a hih lumlet a, puanin a kiphah maimah” a chi hi.
A lawmpa’n a dawng a, “Huai ahihleh Israelmi, Joash tapa Gideon namsau lou bang dang hi kei e. Pathian in Midiante leh sepaih tengteng a khut a pia ahi ve” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Gideon in huai mang leh a lehkhiakna a ki hilhchian uh a zak in Pathian a beta hi. Huchi in Israelte kulh lam ah a kiknawn a, “Thou dih uh;
Huchi in mi za thumte pawl thum in a khen a, avek un pengkul leh leibel vuak, asung a meisel koihsa a pe chiat hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hon en unla, ka hih bang in hih sam un. Ngai un, kulh tuah masakpen ka tun chiang a ka hih bang a na hih sam ding uh ahi.
Kei leh ka kiang a om tengteng in pengkul k’on mut chiang un, kulh kimvel a om tengteng in pengkul na mutsam ding uhi, ’
Huchi in Gideon leh a kiang a om mi zate’n zanven laizang, galven a kikhen kuan laitak in kulh tuah masak a tungsuk ua, pengkul a mut ua, a leibel tawi uh a tatkham uhi.
Pawl thumte’n pengkul a mut ua, leibelte a tatkham ua, a khut veilam un meisel a tawi ua, a taklam un pengkul mut ding a tawi uhi. “
Kulh kim ah michih amau panmun chiat ah ading vek ua; huchi in sepaih tengteng a tai ua; a kikou ua, a taikek uhi.
Mi za thumte’n pengkulte a mut ua,
Israelte Naphtali, Asher leh Manasseh tengteng apan kigawm khawm in Midiante a nungdelhta uhi.
