Gideon in Ephraim tanggam tengteng ah, Midiante hongsual un, Bethbarah tan in luite na lakkhalh un, Jordan lui toh, chi’n mite a vial taisak a, huchi in Ephraim tengteng a kikhawm ua, Bethbarah tan in luite Jordan lui toh a na lak khalh vek uhi.

Midian kumpipa Oreb leh Zeeb a man ua; Oreb suangpi ah a that ua, Zeeb pen Zeeb grep sukna khuk ah a that uhi. Midiante a delhta ua, huchi in Oreb leh Zeeb lutang Jordan luigal a Gideon kiang ah a hontun uhi.
Huan, Ephraimte’n a kiang ah, “Bangziak a hichibang a honbawl e, Midiante na douna ua na honchial samlouh?” a chi uhi. Huchi in nakpitak in amah a tai uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Nou toh genkak di ken bang ka hih zou a eita? Abi-ezerte grep loh sang a Ephraimte grep loh hoihzaw hilou maw?
Pathian in Midiante kumpipa Oreb leh Zeeb na khut uah a hon peta hi. Huchi in nou toh genkak din ken bang ka hih zou a eita?” a chi hi. Huchi in huai thu a gen tak in a tung a a hehna uh a daita hi.
Gideon leh a kiang a om mi za thumte’n Jordan lui a phasuk ua, a kan ua, bah mahle uh a delh teitei uhi.
Sukoth khua a mite kiang ah, “Hehpih in kei honzuite sangpek pedih ua; a bah mahmahta uh. Midiante kumpipa Zebah leh Zalmunna delh ka hi” a chi hi.
Sukoth khua a miliante’n, “Zebah leh Zalmunna na khut a omkhinta uhia, huchi a na sepaihte tanghou ka piak pahmai ding uh? a chi uh.
Gideon in hiai ziak in, ”
Huai apan Penuel ah a hohtou ua, a kiang uah huchi mah bang in a gen nawn hi. Penuel khua a mite’n Sukoth khua a mite dawn mah bang in a dawng uhi.
Penuel khomite kiang ah, “Vualzou a ka hong kiknawn chiang in, hiai kulh ka hihchim ding” a chi hi.
Zebah leh Zalmunna bel Karkor ah a om ua, a sepaihte leh suahlam tate sepaihte a sibang teng, sing khat leh sang nga toh. Namsau dokmi nuai khat leh sing nih lah a sikhinta ngal ua.
Gideon bel Nob leh Jogbeh suahlam a puanin a tengte lampi ah a hohtou a, sepaihte a vadou a; sepaihte galmuangtak in a na om ngal uhi.
Zebah leh Zalmunna a taikekta ua; amau a delh ua; huchi in Midiante kumpipa nih Zebah leh Zalmunna a man ua, sepaihte tengteng a hihbuai gawpta uhi.
Joash tapa Gideon bel kidouna apan nisuah ma in a hong kiknawnta hi.
Sukoth khua ah tangval khat a man ua, thu a dong uh. Huchi in Sukoth khua a milante leh upate min a gelhsak vek a, sawmsagih leh sagih ahi uh.

Sukoth khua a mite kiang ah a hohtou a, “Zebah leh Zalmunna en dih ve ua, hiaite a kei ua, Zebah leh Zalmunna na khut ua omsa bang a, mi bahte tanghou ka piak ding uh?” chi a n’on enghou uh, a chi hi.
Huchi in huai khua upate a man a, gamdai ling leh loulingneite in Sukoth mite a thuhilh hi.
Penuel khaw kulh a hihchim a, khua a mite leng a that hi.
Huchi in Zebah leh Zalmunna kiang ah, “Tabor tang a na mi thahte uh mi bangchibang ahi ua? a chi hi. Amau, Nangmah bang ahi uh; Kumpipa tapate a bang chiat uh” a chi uhi.
Aman, ka unaute ahi uh, ka nu tapate mahmah eive ua.
A tapa upapen Jether kiang ah, “Khaile, nang amaute that in” a chi hi. Himahleh tangval in a namsau a phawikei; tangval lel ahihlai ziak in a lau hi.

Huchi in Zebah leh Zalmunna in, “Nangmah hong kisa inla, hong satlum tanla. Piching leh piching kisual ding ahi” a chi uhi. Huchi in Gideon a thou a, Zebah leh Zalmunna that in, sangawngsaute ngawng zepnate a la hi.
Huchi in Israel mite’n Gideon kiang ah, “Nang ka tung uah vaihawm in, nang leh na tapa leh na tapa tapate tan in leng. Nang Midiante apan lah n’on hunkheta hi” a chi uhi.
Gideon in a kiang uah, “Ken zaw na tung uah vai ka hawm kei ding. Ka tapa in leng na tung uah vai a hawmsam kei ding.
Gideon in a kiang uah, “Thil khat ahihleh honnget ka ut, michih in na gallak bilbah uh, honpe chiat un, a chi hi, Ishmaelte a hih ziak un dangkaeng bilbah a nei uhi.
Amau, “Phaltakin k’on pe ding uh” a chi uh. Huchi in puan a phah ua, michih in a gallak bilbah uh a hon paikhe chiat uhi.
Huai dangkaeng bilbah a ngette gikdan dangkaeng sekel sang khat leh za sagih ahi; hakkolte, bilbahte, Midian kumpipate puan sandup simlouh in, a sangawngsaute uh khainiang omte leng tellou in.
Gideon in huaite in Ephod a bawl a, a omna Ophrah khua ah a koih hi. Israel tengteng in hiai thil ah ang a kawm uh. Huchi in Gideon leh a inkawte adin thang a hong hita hi.
Huchi in Midiante bel Israel suante nuaisiah in a om uh; a tangkhe zou nawn kei uh. Huchi in Gideon damsung kum sawmli sung in gam galmuang in a omta hi.
Joash tapa Jerubbaal a pai a, a inn ah a tengta hi.
Gideon in zi tampi a neih ziak in amah suan mahmah tapa sawmsagih a nei hi.
Sekem khua a a mei in tapa a suansak lai a, a min Abimelek a sa hi.
Joash tapa Gideon kha leh khuk tuah a dam in a sita a, Abiezer mi Ophrah khua a a pa Joash han ah a vui uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Gideon a sihphet in Israel suante a kinung hei ua, Baalte toh ang a kawm ua, Baal Berith pathian in a neita uhi.
Israel suante’n a kim ua melmate tengteng lak apan amau hunkhepa
Jerubbaal, Gideon mah, Israelte tung a theihtawp a hoih suahpa inkawte leng a hehpih kei uhi.
Huan, Jerubbaal tapa Abimelek Sekem khua ah a nu sanggampate kiang ah a hoh a, a nu pa inkawte tengteng a houpih hi.

“Sekem khua a mi tengteng zak in thu gen unla, ‘Jerubbaal tapa tengteng mi sawm sagihte’n na tung ua vai a hawm uhia hoih na sak uh, mi khat in na tung ua vai a hawm uh?’ Gendih ua, keileng na guh uh leh na sa uh hi sam ka hi, chih theigige un” chi in a gen hi.
A nu sanggampate’n Sekem khua a mi tengteng zak in huai thu tengteng a gen uh. Huchi in Abimelek zuih utna lungsim a hon puta ua; “Amah i unau ahi” a chi ngal ua.
Baal Berith inn apan dangka sawmsagih a pia ua, huai in Abimelek in mingongtat leh mi ginalou pipi a guai a, amau amah a zui uhi.
Ophrah khua a a pa inn ah a va hoh a, Jerubbaal tapate, a unau sawmsagihte suang khat tung ah a that hi. Jerubbaal tapa naupangpen Jotham bel a na kibuk ziak in a that khakei hi.
Sekem khua a mi tengteng leh Bethmillo a mi tengteng a kikaikhawm ua, Sekem khua a suangphuh bul tawsaw kiang ah Abimelek kumpipa in a bawlta uhi.

Hiai Jotham a hilh uleh Gerizim tang ah a hohtou a, a vum ah a va ding a, aw ngaih tak in a kikou a, a kiang uah, “Nou Sekem khua a mite aw, ka thugen ngaikhia dih ua, huchi in Pathian mah in leng nou thu a hon ngaikhe sam ding hi:
Khatvei a tung ua kumpipa ding thaunilh din singte a kuan khia ua; Olive sing kiang ah, ‘Nang ka kumpipa hi in,’ a chi uhi.
Himahleh olive sing in a kiang uah, ‘Pathian leh mihing pahtawina dia a zat pen uh ka thau nusia in singte tung ah dopsang in ka om ding maw?’ a chi hi.
Singte’n theipi kung kiang ah, ‘Kisa dih, nang ka kumpipa ding un hongom in,’ a va chi uhi.
Himahleh theipi kung in a kiang uah, ‘Ka khumna leh ka gah hoih tak nusia in singte tung a dopsang in ka om ding maw?’ a chi hi.
Singte’n grepgui kiang ah, ‘Kisa dih, nang ka kumpipa ding un om in aw?’ a chi uh.
Grepgui in a kiang uah, ‘Pathian leh mihing kipaksak ka uain nusia in singte tung a dopsang in ka om ding maw?’ a chi hi.
Huchi in sing tengteng in lingvom kiang ah, ‘Kisa in, nang ka kumpipa ding un om in,’ a chi uhi.

Lingvom in singte kiang ah, ‘Na kumpipa ding ua thau honnilh taktak na hih uleh ka lim ah hong bu in hon muang un; huchi ahihkei leh ling apan mei hongpawt henla Lebanon tang a sidar singte kangkhin hen,’ a chi hi.
“Huaiziak in tuin, chihtak tak a Abimelek na kumpipa ua bawl na hih ua, Jerubbaal leh a inkawte hoihtak a bawl a, a kituahpih bang a, a tung a na hih ua;
Ka pa’n gal a hon dousak a, a na sihloh hialta a, Midiante khut apan in nou a hon hunkheta hi.
Tuni in ka pa inkawte tung ah na hel ua, a tapate sawmsagih tak suang khat tung ah na that ua, na unaupa uh a hih ziak in a sikhanu tapa Abimelek Sekem khomite kumpipa din lah na bawlta ngal ua.
Tuni a Jerubbaal leh a inkawte tung a chihtak tak a gamta na hih uleh, Abimelek tung ah kipak unla, amah leng na tung uah kipak hen.

Himahleh huchibang ahihkeileh Abimelek apan mei hong kuang khia henla, Sekem khua a mite leh Bethmillo mite kangtum hen. Sekem khua a mite leh Bethmillo apan mei kuang hongpawt henla, Abimelek kangtum vek hen” a chi hi.
Huchi in Jotham a tai a, a taimang a, Beer ah a tai a, a unaupa Abimelek a lauh ziak in huai ah a tengta hi.
Abimelek in Israelte tung ah kum thum vai a hawm hi.
Pathian in Abimelek leh Sekem khua a mite kikal ah kha gilou a sawl hi. Huchi in Sekem khomite Abimelek tung ah lepchiahtak in a gamta uhi.

Huai ahihleh Jerubbaal tapa sawmsagihte tung a mulkimhuai tak a, a gamtat ziak a a tung a phulakna a hongtun theihna ding leh amaute thatpa a unaupa uh Abimelek tung a leh, a unaute that ding a amah a na panpih Sekemte tung a, a sisan uh a om theihna ding ahi.
Sekem khua a mite’n mualvumte ah amah guktan mite a koih ua, huai mun a vapai peuhmah a na suam ua; huai thu Abimelek a hilh uhi.
Ebed tapa Gaal, a unaute toh a hong kuan ua, Sekem khua ah a lut ua; Sekemte’n a na muangmoh kei uh.
Lou lam ah a hoh ua, a grephuan ua grepte a lou ua, a chil ua, vualnuam a bawl ua, a pathian in uah a lut ua, ne a dawn in Abimelek a hamsiat uhi.

Ebed tapa Gaal in, “Eite’n a na uh i sep sak ding, Abimelek kua ahia? Sekem mah leng kua ahia? Jerubbaal tapa ahi kei maw? Zebul, a sepaih Makai hilou a maw? Sekem pa Hamor mite na sem ding maw? Bangziak in eita amah na i sep ding uh?
Hiai mite ka khut nuai ah om le uh aw! Abimelek ka lakhe ding. Abimelek kiang ah, Na sepaihte pungsak inla, hong paikhia in” a chi hi.
Huai khaw vaihawmpa Zebul in Ebed tapa Gaal thugen a zak in, a heh tohthoh in a om hi.
Huchi in gitlouhpil in, Abimelek kiang ah, “Ngai in, Ebed tapa Gaal leh a unaute Sekem ah a hong uh. Ngai in, na tung a heltum in na khua a mite a hanthawn uhi.
Huchi in na mite toh kisa unla, zan in pawn ah na tang un.

Huchi in hichi ahi ding a, zingsang a nisuahtakin, beltak in thou inla, khua hong dou mai in. Ngai in, amah leh a lawite’n nang hondou dek chiang un, hoih na sak dandan in a tung uah na hihmai ding hi” chi a hilh din mite a taisak hi.
Huchi in Abimelek leh a mi tengteng zan in a thou ua, pawl li a kikhen in Sekem khua a va umta uh.
Ebed tapa Gaal a vapawt a, khopi lutna kongpi ah a va ding a, Abimelek leh a mite a guktanna ua kipan a hong kuanta uhi.
Gaal in mipite a muh in Zebul kiang ah, “Ngai in, mualvum apan mipite a hong paisuk uh” a chi hi. Zebul in a kiang ah, “Mual lim mihing bang a mu lel hiteh” a chi hi.
Gaal in, “En tanla, gamlai tak ah mipi a hong paisuk uhi. Pawl khatte houh aisan siampa tawsaw sing lampi ah a hongpai uh” a chi nawn hi.
Huchi in Zebul in a kiang ah, “Abimelek kua ahia, a na i sep ding pen uh? chi a na genna kam koi a omta ahia? Hiaite na mi muhsitte mah hilou umaw? Va pawtkhia inla, va dou in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Gaal in Sekemte makai in Abimelek a va douta hi.
Abimelek in a na delh a, a taisia a, khopi tan in mi tampi liam in a puk uhi.
Abimelek bel Arumah khua ah a teng hi. Zebul in Gaal leh a unaute Sekem khua a teng theilou din a delhkhe vek hi.
Hichi ahi a, a zing in mipite pawn ah a pawtkhia uh chih Abimelek a hilh uhi.
Mipite a pi a, pawl thum in a khen a, pawn ah a guktan ua; a dak a, ngai in, mipite khopi apan a hong pawtkhia ua, huchi in amau a na sual ua, a thatta uhi.
Abimelek leh a pawlte malam ah a tai ua, khopi lutna kongpi ah ading ua, pawl nihte’n pawn a omte tengteng a pumboh ua, a thatta uhi.
Abimelek in khopi huai ni’n nitum in a sual a; huchi in khopi a la a, asung a mite a that a, khopi a hih sevek a; chitui in a theh hi.
Sekem kulh a omte tengteng in huai thu a naza ua, Berith pathian biakin sung bitna mun ah a tailut uhi.
Sekem kulh a mi tengteng a omkhawm vek uh chih Abimelek a hilh uh.

Abimelek leh a kiang a om tengteng Zalmon tang ah a hohtou uh. Abimelek in heipi a tawi a, sing hiang a satkhia a, a pua a, a kiang a om a mite kiang ah, “Ka hih dan na mu uh, ka hih bang in nou leng hih mengmeng un” a chi hi.

Mi tengteng in sing hiang a satkhe chiat ua, Abimelek hih bang in a pua ua, in kulhpi kim ah a sekhawm ua, kulhpi sung a omte a hal khum uhi. Huchi in Sekem kulhpi sung a om tengteng a sivek ua, pasal leh numei teng sang khat vel ahi uh.
Huchi in Abimelek bel Thebez khua ah a hoh a, Thebez khua a um a, a lata hi.
Himahleh huai khopi sung ah kulhpi kiptak a om a, huai ah pasal leh numei tengteng leh khopi sung a mi tengteng a tailut ua, a kikhak khum bikbek ua, kulh tung ah a omkhawm uhi.
Abimelek bel kulhlam ah a hoh a, a vadou a, hal din kulh kongpi ah a hoh hi.
Numei kuahiam in buhgawizanna suang khat Abimelek lu tung ah a khesuk a, a luguh a kitam hi.
Huchi in a galvan tawipa tangval a sampah a, a kiang ah, “Na namsau phawi inla, honthat mai in. Huchi a mite’n, ‘Numei thah ahi,’ ” a hon chihlouhna ding un” a chi hi.
Israelte’n Abimelek a si chih a theihtak un, a inlam chiat uah a paita uhi.
Abimelek in a unau sawmsagih a thah leh a pa tung a giloutak a a tatsiatna Pathian in hiai bang in a thukta hi.
Sekem khomite gitlouhna tengteng Pathian in a thuk samta hi. Jerubbaal tapa Jotham hamsiat amau tung ah a hongtungta hi.
Huan, Abimelek sih nung in Israelte hunkhe din Issakar mi Tola a hong dingkhia hi. Amah Puah tapa ahi. Puah bel Dodo Tapa ahi. Amah Ephraim tang gam Shamir khua ah a teng hi.
Kum sawmnih leh thum sung Israelte tung ah vai a hawm a, huchi in a sita a, Shamir khua ah a vui uhi.
Huai nung in Gilead mi Jair a hong dingkhia a, kum sawmnih leh nih sung Israelte tung ah vai a hawm hi.
Aman sabiltung nou tung a tuang tapa sawmthum a neia, amau Gilead gam ah khua sawmthum a nei ua, huaite tunitan in Havothjair a chilai uhi.
Jair a si a, Kamon khua ah a vui uhi.
Israel suante’n
Huchi in
Huai kum in amau Israel suante hihbuai in a nuaisiah uhi. Jordan gal Gilead gam a Amorte gam a Israel suan om tengteng kum sawmlehgiat sung a nuaisiah uhi.
Ammon suante bel Judahte, Benjaminte, Ephraim inkawte dou din Jordan a galkah ua; huchi in Israelte a lungzing mahmah uhi.
Israel suante’n, “I Pathian in Baalte na i nasep ziak un hon lehngat santa hi, a tung ah thil i hihkhialta uhi” chi’n
Israel suante kiang ah, “Aiguptate apan, Amorte apan, Ammon suante apan leh Philistiate apan noute k’on hunkhe kei maw?”
Jidonte, Amalekte leh Ammonte’n leng noute a hon nuaisiah ua; n’on sam ua, huchi in a khut ua kipan k’on hunkhia hi.
Himahleh noute’n n’on lehngatsan ua, pathian dangte nna nasem zawta uh. Huaiziak in, k’on hunkhe nawn kei ding.
Na pathian telte uh samta unla, amau na gimthuak hun un hon hunkhia uhen” a chi hi.
Israel suante’n
Huchi in a lak ua namdang pathiante a koihmang ua,
Ammon suante a kikhawm ua, Gilead gam ah a va kikulh ua, Israel suante leng a kikhawm ua, Mizpah ah a kikulh uhi.
Mipite leh Gilead gam a miliante a kihou ua, Ammon suante doupa’n ding kua a om a? Huai mi Gilead gam tengteng tung ah heutu ahi ding, a kichi uhi.
Gilead mi Jephthah mi hat hangsan ahi a, kizuaknu tapa ahi. Gilead in Jephthah a suang hi.
Gilead zi in tapate a suansak a; a zi tapate a hong pichin un Jephthah a delhkhia ua, a kiang ah, “Nang zaw ka pa uh inn ah gou na luah theikei ding. Numei tuam khat tapa na hih ziak in” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Jephthah a unaute apan a taimang a, Tob gam ah a teng hi. Jephthah kiang ah mi thulimlou pipi a tengkhawm ua, amah a zuizel uh.
Huai nung deuh in Ammon suante’n Israelte a douta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Ammon suante’n Israelte a dou uleh, Gilead upate Tob gam a Jephthah pi din a paikheta uhi.
Jephthah kiang ah, “Ammon suante ka dou theihna ding un ka heutupen ding un hongom in” a chi uhi.
Jephthah in Gilead upate kiang ah, “N’on hua ua, ka pa inn apan n’on delhkhia uh, ahi kei maw? Bang a chia na buaitak ua ka kiang a hong na hi ua?” a chi hi.

Gilead upate’n Jephthah kiang ah, “Huaiziak tak ahi, tua nang lam ka hong ngat nawn uh. Ammon suante dou dia ka kiang ua na pai theihna din; Gilead gam a teng tengtengte tung ah ka heutu ding un na om ding” a chi uhi.
Jephthah in Gilead upate kiang ah, “Ammon suante dou dia n’on pikik nawn ua,
Gilead upate’n Jephthah kiang ah, na thu bangbang a ka hihkei uh leh “
Huchi in Jephthah bel Gilead upate kiang ah a hohta a, mite’n heutu ding leh a pipen pen din a na bawlta uhi. Jephthah in Mizpah ah
Jephthah in Ammon suante Kumpipa kiang ah, “Bangchidan a hichibang a ka gam hong dou dia ka kiang a hongpai mawk na hia?” chi in palai a sawl hi.

Ammon suante kumpipa’n, “Israelte Aigupta gam apan a hong pawtlai ua, ka gam a hon laksak ziak uh ahi. Arnon apan Jabok leh Jordan tan in. Huaiziak in huai gamte lungdam in hon penawn mai in” chi in Jephthah palaite a na dawng hi.
Huchi in Jephthah in Ammon suante kumpipa kiang ah palai a sawl nawn hi.
A kiang ah, Jephthah in hichi in a chi, “Israelte’n Moab gam a laksak kei ua, Ammon suante gam leng a laksak sam kei uh.
Himahleh, Aigupta gam apan Israelte a hongpawt un gamdai tawn in Tuipi San a hongtung ua, tua apan Kadesh ah a hongpai uhi.

Israelte’n Edom kumpipa kiang ah, ‘Hehpih in na gam ah ka paisuak ding uh,’ chi in palai a sawl uh. Himahleh Edom kumpipa in a na ngaikhe nuam kei. Huchi mah bang in Moab kumpipa kiang ah a sawlnawn a, himahleh pha a na sa kei hi. Huchi in Israelte Kadesh ah a omta uhi.

Huchi in gamdai ah a paisuak ua, Edom gam leh Moab gam kimvel in a pai ua, Moab gam suahlam pang ah a pai ua, Arnon lehlam pang ah giahphual a sat uh. Moab gam sung ah a lut kei hial uh, Arnon bel Moab gamgi chiang ahi.

Israelte’n Amorte Kumpipa Sihon leh Heshbon kumpipa kiang ah palai a sawl uh. Israelte’n a kiang ah, ka hong thum uhi, ‘Ka mun ua ka paina ding un hehpih in na gam tawn in hon paisuaksak in,’ a chi uhi.
Himahleh Sihon in Israelte a gam a paisuak din a muangzou kei. Sihon in a mi tengteng a kaikhawm a, Jahaz ah a kikulh a, Israelte a douta hi.
, Israelte Pathian in Sihon leh a mi tengteng Israelte khut ah a pia a, amau a that uhi. Huchi in Israelte’n huai gam a om Amorte gam tengteng a tangta uhi.
Huchi in Amorte gamgi chiang tengteng Arnon apan Jabok pha in, gamdai apan Jordan pha in a tangvekta uhi.
Huchi in
Na pathian Kemos in nang a tuam dia a hon sehsaksa tang ding hilou na hi maw? Huchi in
‘Moab kumpipa Jippor tapa Balak sang in na hatzaw ahia? Aman Israelte kinakpih in ahihkeileh a dou ngei himhim ahia?
Heshbon leh a khopelte, Aroer leh a khopelte, Arnon gamgi naih khopi tengteng a kum za thum tak a tenlai ua, bangdia nang a na lakik lou nilouh na hia?
Huaiziak in, na tung ah thil bangmah ka hihkhial kei hi. Nangman hondou na tup ziak in ka tung ah thil na hihkhial ahi.
Himahleh Ammon suante kumpipa’n Jephthah thukhah a na ngaikhe nuam kei hi.
Huchi in
Jephthah
Hichi ahi ding a, Ammon suante apan galmuanga ka pai kiknawn chiang in bang peuh ka inn kongpi apan a hon dawn masa penpen
Huchi in Jephthah bel Ammon suante dou din a kuanta hi.
Aroer apan Minnith pha leh Abel Keramim kal a khopi sawmnih a zou vek a, mi tampi a that hi. Huchi in Israel suante’n Ammon suante a nuaisiahta uhi.
Jephthah a tenna khua Mizpah a a inn ah a pai a, ngai in, a tanu in khuangtate toh lam in a na dawn hi. A ta neihsun ahi a; amah lou tapa leh tanu dang himhim a neikei hi.
Hichi ahi a, amah a muhtak in a puante a botkek a, “Ehe, ka tanu! N’on niamkiak sak mahmah ve. Hon mangbangsak mite lak a khat na hita.
Aman a kiang ah, “Pa,
Aman a pa kiang ah, “Hichibang in kei adin kihih hen. Kha nih sung ka tang om dia, tangte ah a suk a tou in ka pai dia, ka nungak siangthou hihna ka sun ding, kei leh ka lawmte’n,” a chi hi.
Aman, “Pai ve” a chi hi. Huchi in kha nih tam din a sawlkhia a; a pawt a, amah leh a lawmte’n tangte ah a nungak siangthou hihna a va sun uhi.
Hichi ahi a, kha nih nung in a pa kiang ah a hong kiknawn a, aman a na kichiamsa bang in a tung ah a hih hi. A tanu nungak siangthou in a omdenta a, pasal toh a lumkhawm ngeikei hi.
Israel tanute’n Gilead mi Jephthah tanu kum teng in ni li sung a sun zel uhi.
Hiai Israelte lak ah ngeina in a neita uhi.

Huan, Ephraimte a kikaikhawm ua, mallam zuan in a pai ua; Jephthah kiang ah, “Bangdia Ammon suante dou dia hongpai phei a, na kiang a hoh dia hon chial sam lou? Na inn toh k’on buhal khawm ding uh” a chi uhi.
Jephthah in a kiang uah, “Ammon suante ka mite toh theihtawp suah in ka dou ua; k’on saplai in a khut ua kipan in lah n’on hunkhe utkei ua.
Huchi in n’on hunkhe nuam kei uh chih ka theih tak in, sih khawk salou hial in ka pang a, Ammon suante dou din ka kuan a, huchi in

Huchi in Jephthah in Gilead mi tengteng a kaikhawm a, Ephraimte a douta hi. Gileadte’n Ephraimte a that uh. “Nou Gileadte, Ephraimte leh Manassehte lak a galtai vakvai maimaite na hi uh” a chih ziak un.

Gileadte’n Ephraimte ma in Jordan lui kainate a na la ua; hichi ahi a, Ephraimmi suaktate’n, “Ka hong galkah ding uh” a chih chiang un Gileadte’n a kiang ah, “Ephraim mi na hi hia?” a na chi zel uh. Aman, “Hilou e,” a chih leh,

A kiang ah, “Shiboleth, chimah dih” a na chi ua, aman, “Siboleth” a chi zawzela; a loutel theikei hi. Huchi in a man ua, Jordan lui kainate ah a na that zel uh. Huchi in huai tung in Ephraimte sing li leh sang nih a that uhi.
Jephthah in Israelte tung ah kum guk vai a hawm a, huchi in a sita a, Gilead gam a khua khat ah a vui uhi.
A nung in Bethlehem khua a mi Ibzan in Israelte tung ah vai a hawm hi.
Aman tapa sawmthum leh tanu sawmthum a nei hi. A tanute gamdang ah a sawl a, a tapate adin gamdang apan tanu sawmthum a pisak hi. Aman Israelte tung ah kum sagih vai a hawm hi.
Ibzan a sita a, Bethlehem khua ah a vui uh.
A nung in Zebulun mi Elon in Israelte tung ah vai a hawm a; Israelte tung ah kum sawm vai a hawm hi.
Zebulun mi Elon a sita a, Zebulun gam a Aijalon khua ah a vui uhi.
Huai nung in Pirathon mi, Hilel tapa Abdon in Israelte tung ah vai a hawm hi.
Aman tapa sawmli leh tupa sawmthum leh sabiltung nou sawmsagih tung a tuangzel tupa sawmthum a nei hi. Aman Israelte tung ah kum giat vai a hawm hi.
Pirathon mi, Hilel tapa Abdon a sita a, Ephraim gam, Amalek mite tanggam ah Pirathon khua ah a vuita uh.
Huan Israel suante’n
Zoreah khua ah Dan nam mi khat a om a, a min Mano ahi a, a zi bel a ching a, nau a neikei hi.
angel numei kiang ah a hong kilak a, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, ching a, nau nei theilou himah lechin na gai dia, tapa na nei ding hi.
Huchi in pilvang in, uain leh zu hat leh sianglou thil himhim ne het ken.

‘Ngai in, na gai dia, tapa nei ding na hi ngal a. A lu ah mulmet tem himhim zat ahi kei dia, naupang bel sul a a omlai apan Pathian adia Nazarit hi ding ahi ngal a’. Aman Israelte Philistia mite khut apan hutkhiak apan ding” a chi hi.

Numei in a pasal kiang ah, “Pathian mi khat ka kiang ah a hong a, a mel Pathian angel mel bang ahi a, kihtakhuai tak ahi. Koilam mi ahia chih bel ka dong chit chiat kei a, aman lah a min a honhilh sam kei hi.

Himahleh ka kiang ah, Ngai in, na gai dia, tapa na nei ding. Huchi in uain leh zu hat himhim dawn kenla, sianglou thil himhim leng ne het ken. Naupang sul a a omlai apan a sih tan in Pathian adia Nazarit mi hi ding ahi, a chi” chi’n a gen hi.
Huchi in Mano in
Pathian in Mano thugen a na ngaikhia hi. Numei pawna a tutlai in a kiang ah Pathian angel a hong nawn hi. A pasal Mano bel a kiang ah a omkei hi.
Numei kintak in a tai paha, a pasal a va hilh a, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, zanlam a ka kiang a hong hohpa ka kiang ah a hong kilak nawn hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mano a thou a, a zi a zui a, huai mi kiang a va tung uhi. A kiang ah, “Numei kiang a thu gen nang na hi maw?” a chi hi. Aman, “Hi e,” a chi hi.
Mano in, “Na thu bangzel in hongtung hen. Naupang om ding dan bangchibang ahi dia, a sep ding bang ahi dia leh?” a chi hi.
Grepgui apan mawngmawng a ne ding ahi kei a, uain leh zu hat a dawn ding ahi kei. Sianglou thil mawngmawng leng a ne ding ahi kei. Ka thupiak tengteng zui hen, a chi hi.
Mano in
angel in Mano kiang ah, “Honkhou lechin leng na an zaw ka ne kei ding. Haltum thil lan ding na hihleh
Mano in
Huchi in, Mano in kelnou khat leh nekding thillat a la a; suangpi tung ah
Hichi ahi a, maitam apan meikuang vanlam a a kahtouh lai in,
Himahleh
Mano in a zi kiang ah, “Pathian i muh ziak in i si ngeingei ding” a chi hi.
Himahleh a zi in a kiang ah, “
Numei in Tapa a neita a, a min Samson a sa uh. Naungek a hong khang lian a,
Zoreah leh Eshtaol kikal ah Mahaneh Dan mun ah
Huan, Samson bel Timnah khua ah a hohsuk a, Timnah khua ah Philistiate tanute lak ah numei khat a va mu hi.
A hong paitouh nawn in a nu leh a pa a hilh hi. “Timnah khua ah, Philistiate tanute lak ah numei khat ka mu a; ka zi din hon pisak un” a chi hi.

Huchi in a nu leh apan a kiang ah, “Na unaute tanute lak ah hiam, ka mipite lak a hiam numei om hetlou hia? Zeksumlouh Philistiate lak a zi ding na va zon maimah?” a chi uhi. Samson in a pa kiang ah; “Hon pisak mai in; aman a hon lungkim sak mahmah ahi” a chi hi.
Himahleh a nu leh apan, hiai
Huchi in Samson bel a nu leh a pa toh Timnah khua ah a hohsuk ua, Timnah khua a grephuan a va tung uh. Ngai in, humpinelkai lunlai a na humham hi.
kha a tung ah nakpitak in a hongtung hi. Huchi in kel nou balnen bang mai in a balnen maimah hi; bangmah lah a tawi kei a. Himahleh a thilhih a nu leh a pa a hilh kei hi.
A hohsuk a, huai numei a houpih hi. Aman Samson a kipaksak mahmah hi.
A nung in vapi din a hoh nawn a, humpinelkai luang en ding in a vapial hi. Ngai in, humpinelkai luang ah khuai hon leh a zu a na om hi.

Huai a la a, a pai nawn a, a paikawm in a ne kawmkawm hi. A nu leh pa kiang a tungtou a, amau leng a pia a, amau leng a ne sam uhi. Himahleh huai khuaizu humpinelkai luang apan a lak ahi chih a hilhkei hi.
Huchi in a pa numei kiang ah a va hohsuk a, huai ah Samson in Ankuang a lui hi. Huai ahihleh tangvalte hihdan ahi him hi.
Hichi ahi a, amah a muhtak un, a kiang a om din mi sawmthum a pi uhi.
Samson in a kiang uah, “Tuin thuhaksa hondong ning e. Ankuanglui ni, ni sagih sung a n’on hilhchet theih ua, na theihkhiak theih uleh puanmalngat silh sawmthum k’on pe ding.

Himahleh n’on hilhchet theihkei uleh, puanmalngat silh sawmthum leh kikhenna puan sawmthum n’on piak ding uh ahi” a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, “Na thuhaksa gen dihve leh, ka na ngaikhe ding uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Netu apan nekding hongpawt, hattak apan thil khumtak hongpawt” a chi hi.

Ni thum sung in huai thuhaksa a hilhchian theikei uh. Huchi in hichi ahi a, a ni sagih ni’n Samson zi kiang ah, “Ka kiang ua hiai thuhaksa hilhchetna puangkhe din na pasal kun in. Huchilou in zaw nang leh na pa inkawte k’on hal ding uh. Ka neihsa uh la dia honsam na hi kei maw?” a chi uhi.

Huchi in Samson zi a ma ah a kapa, “N’on it kei a, n’on hawzaw ve. Ka chite lah thuhaksa na dong ngal a, kei bel n’on hilhchian kei” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Ngai in, ka nu leh pa leng ka hilh kei a; nang k’on hilh dia hia?” a chi hi.
A Ankuanglui uh, ni sagih sungteng a ma ah kapkap hi. Hichi ahi a, a ni sagih ni’n a nget ngutngut ziak in a hilh khongkhong hi. Aman thuhaksa hilhchetna a chite a va hilhta hi.
A ni sagih ni, nitum ma in huai khua a mite’n a kiang ah:
“Khuaizu sang a khum zaw bang ahia?
Humpinelkai sang a hatzaw bang ahia?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “ka bawngla in leilet kei le uchin zaw,
ka thuhaksa thei khe lou ding
hive uchin,” a chi hi.

Toupa kha a tung ah nakpitak in a hongtung a, Ashkelon khua ah a hohsuk hi. Mi sawmthum a va that a, a puansilhte uh a hawksak a, kikhenna puante thuhaksa hilhchiante a pia hi. Huchi in a heh mahmah a, a pa inn ah a paitou hi.
Himahleh Samson zi pen apan a kitenna ua theihpih a pang Samson lawmpa kiang ah zi ding in a pia hi.
Himahleh hichi ahi a, a nung sawtlou in, buhlak hun in, Samson in kelnou tawi in a zi a va veh hi. Dantan sung ah ka zi kiang ah ka valut ding, a chi hi. Himahleh apan a lut a phalta kei hi.
Apan, “Amah na haw mahmah ka sa hi. Huaiziak in na lawmpa kiang ah ka peta hi. A nau amah sang in a melhoih zaw hilou hia?” a chi hi.
Samson in, “Tutung in Philistiate khoih leng amau sang in dem ka kai kei zaw ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Samson in sihal za thum a va man a, meisel a la a, a mei uleh mei a peh khawm a, a mei uh kikal chiat ah meisel a koih chiat hi.
Meiselte a det tak in Philistiate buhlak ah a tailut sak a, buhphal leh buh ding laite, olive munte toh nangawn in a kangvek hi.

Huchi in Philistiate’n, “Kua hih ahia?” a chi uh. Amau, “Timnah khua a mi makpapa Samson hih ahi. Huai Timnah khua a mi in Samson zi a lawmpa zi dia a piak man ahi” a kichi uhi. Huchi in Philistiate a hong kuan ua a pata un a hallumta uhi.
Samson in a kiang uah, “Hichibang na hih uh leh na tung uah phu ka la sam ding, huaikhit in ka tawp ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in nakpitak in a sual a, tampi a that a, a paisuk a, Etam suangpi tung ah a omta hi.
Huchi in Philistiate a hohtou ua, Judah gam ah a va kikulh ua, Lehi mun ah a kiphalh uhi.
Judah gam a mite’n, “Bangchidan ahia kou sualdia na hong kuan mawk uh?” a chi uhi. Amau, “Samson khaukhih a ka tung ua a hih mah bang a amah tung a leng hih din ka hong uhi” a chi uhi.

Huchi in Judah gam a mi sang thum Etam suangpi tung ah a hoh ua, Samson kiang ah, “Philistiate i tung ua vaihawmmite a hih uh theilou na maw? Bangchidan a hichibang a ka tung ua thil hon hihta mai na hia oi?” a chi uh. Aman a kiang uah, “Ka tung a, a hih bang ua ken leng amau tung a hihsam ka hi” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Nang hon khaukhih a, Philistiate khut a honpe dia hong kuan ka hi uh” a chi uh. Samson in a kiang uah, “Noute’n honthat lou din ka kiang ah kichiam un” a chi hi.

Amau a kiang ah, “That lou e. Himahleh k’on khaukhih chinten ding ua, a khut ua honpe ding ka hi uh. Thah zaw k’on that kei hial ding uh” a chi uhi. Huchi in khauzen thak nih in a khih ua, suangpi apan a pita uhi.
Lehi mun a hongtun in, Philistiate’n a na dawn ua, a na kikou zuazua uhi.
Sabiltung khaguh thak a mu a, a sawk a, a la a, huai in mi sang khat a satlum hi.
Samson in, Sabiltung khaguh in ka chiang vum venvon a, sabiltung khaguh in mi sang khat ka satlum, a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, a thugen khit in a khaguh tawi a pai a; huai mun Ramath Lehi a sa hi.
A dang a tak mahmah a,

Himahleh Pathian in Lehi mun a leikuak a khisak a, tui a hong kikhoh kheta hi. Huai a dawntakin a lungsim a honghalh a, a honghat nawnta hi. Huai mun min En hakkore a sa a; tunitan in Lehi mun ah a omlai hi.
Huchi in Philistiate hun in Israelte tung ah kum sawmnih vai a hawm hi.
Huan, Samson bel Gaza khua ah a hoh a, huai ah numei kizuak khat a va mu a, a va luppih hi.

“Samson hiai ah a honghoh,” chi in, Gaza mite a hilh uhi. Huchi in a va umta ua, khopi kulh kongpi chin ah zankhua in a tang uh. Zankhua in a daisipsip ua, “Khua hongvak peuhmah leh, huchi in that na ni” a kichi uhi.
Samson bel zankim tan in a luma, zankimin a thou a, khopi kulh kongkhakte leh a khuam nih a len a, a kalhnate toh a phawi kheveka, a liangzang ah a pua a, Hebron ma a mualvum ah a pawtou hi.
Hichi ahi a, a nung in Sorek guam a numei khat a it a, a min Delailah ahi.

Philistia miliante a kiang ah a hohtou ua, a kiang ah, “Amah ka zoh theihna ding un, a hatna san theihtum in kankhia in. Huchi in ka vek un dangka sang khat leh za khat k’on pe chiat ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Delailah in Samson kiang ah, “Na hat mahmahna san honhilh dihve. Bangchi’n ahia hihnat dia khau khihtheih na hih ding?” a chi hi.
Samson in a kiang ah, “Khauhual thak, keu nailou sagih in hon hen le uchin, ka hat kei dia, midang banglel mah ka hi ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Philistiate miliante’n khauhual thak sagih, keu nailou a pia ua, aman huaite in a henta hi.

Dantan sunggil ah guktanmite a koih a, a kiang ah, “Samson, Philistiate’n hon sualdek uh e” a chi hi. Aman Khauhual mei in jija khaulom a kangtat bangphet in a hihtatta hi. Huchi in a hatna san a theikhe zoukei hi.
Delailah in Samson kiang ah, “Ngai in, n’on khem a, zuau honhilh na hi. Bangchi a hen theih ding na hia? Hon hilhta in” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Khauzen thak, zat nailouh in hon hen le uh, huchi in ka hatkei mai ding, midang banglel mah ka hi ding” a chi hi.

Delailah in khauzen thak a la a, a hen a, a kiang ah, “Samson, Philistiate’n a hon sualdek uh” a chi hi. Dantan sunggil ah guktanmite a om uhi. A khut a henna patzang suktat bang mai in a hihtatta hi.

Delailah in Samson kiang ah, “N’on khemlai a, zuau n’on hilh lai hi. Bangchi a hen theih ding na hia? honhilh dihve” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Ka sam phek sagih puan in gatkhum leteh ahimai” a chi hi.
Aman kilhna in a kilhkip giugeu a, a kiang ah, “Samson Philistiate’n hon sualdek uh e,” a chi hi. Huchi in ihmu lai a honghalh a, puanbu kilhdenna leh puanbu nangawn toh kikhong sak in a paikhia hi.
A kiang ah, “Na lungtang honpe hetlou pi in, bangchidan a k’on it, chi thei na hia oi? Tun thumvei hilhial n’on khemta hi, na hat mahmahna san n’on hilh nai kei lailai” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, niteng in a ngen ngutngut a, a dotdot ziak in, sih ding khop hial in a lunggimta hi.

Huchi in a lungsim tengteng a hilhvekta hi. A kiang ah, “Ka lu ah mulmettem himhim zat ahi ngei naikei hi. Ka nu sul a ka omlai apan Pathian adia Nazarit mi dia na om ka hi. Tuin metta leng, ka hatna a mang vek ding, huchi in ka hat kei dia, midang banglel ka hi ding” a chi hi.

A lungsim tengteng a hilhvekta chih Delailah in a theih phet in, “Tu kia honghoh un, a lungsim tengteng a honhilh vekta” chi’n Philistia miliante thukhak in a samsak hi. Huchi in Philistia miliante a kiang ah a va hohtou ua, dangka a tawi uhi.
A pheipi tung ah a ihmu sak hi. Mi a sam a, a samphek sagihte a metkhe sakvek hi. Huchi in amah a hih genthei panta a, a hatna in a nusiata hi.
“Samson, Philistiate’n a hong sualdek uh e” a chi hi. Ihmu lai a honghalh a, “Nidang mah bang in ka pawt nawn ding, ka kitungkhe nawn ding” a chi hi. Himahleh
Philistiate’n a man ua, a mitte a khelkhiak sak uh. Gaza khua ah a paipih suk ua, Sikkol a bunsak ua; suangkulh ah buh gawizantu in a pang hi.
Himahleh a sammet ahihnungin hongpou in a hongkhang nawn hi.
Philistia miliante Dagon pathian kiang a kithoihna thupitak lan ding leh kihih nuamsa din a kikhawm uh. “I pathian un i melmapa uh Samson a honpeta” a chi uhi.
Mipite’n a muh un a pathian uh a phat ua, “I pathian un i melmapa, i gam hihsia a mi tampite thatpa i khut uah a honpeta” a chi uhi.

Hichi ahi a, a lungtang un nuam a saklaitakin, Samson pen muhnop din vasam dih ua, a chi uhi. Huchi in Samson suangkulh apan a va sam khia uhi. A ma uah muhnop din a omta a; khuam leh khuam kikal ah a dingsak uhi.
Samson in amah kaitu naupang kiang ah, “Hiai inn doupen khuam hon khoihsak dihve, k’on ngaideh” a chi hi.
Huai inn ah pasal leh numei in a dim miuhmeuh uhi. Philistiate milian tengteng huai ah a omvek ua, Samson muhnop dia enmite intung ah pasal leh numei sang thum a om uhi.
Samson in
Samson in, huai inn doupen sut nihte a len a, a khut taklam in khat, a khut veilam in khat mah a pansan hi.

Samson in, “Philistiate toh sikhawm ning” a chi hi. Huchi in theihtawp in a kunsuk a; miliante leh mipi asung a om tengtengte huai inn chim in a delhkhumta hi. Huchi in a damlai a a thahte sang in a sihkhumte a tamzaw uhi.

Huchi in a unaute leh a pa inkawte tengteng a hong paisuk ua, a la ua a zawngtou ua, Zoreah leh Eshtaol kikal a; a pa Manoa kivuina mun ah a vuita uhi. Huchi in aman kum sawmnih sung Israelte tung ah vai a hawm hi.
Huan, Ephraim tanggam ah mi khat a om a, a min Mikah ahi.

Aman a nu kiang ah, “Dangka sang khat leh za khat nang apan lakmang a omte, nang leng na hamsiat leh ka zak mahmah a na genpen, ngai in, huai dangka ka kiang ah a om hi, kei lak ahi,” a chi hi. A nun, “Ka tapa
Dangka sang khat leh za khat a nu a pekik a, a nun, “Hiai dangka kei khut mahmah in ka tapa in milim a bawlna ding leh milim a sunna din
Huchi in huai dangka a nu a pekik a, a nun dangka za nih a la a, dangka sekmi a pia a, aman milim khuakthoh leh sunthohte a na bawl a, huaite Mikah inn ah a om uhi.
Mikah in pathiante in a nei a, ephod leh milimte a bawl a, a tapa khat a siampu in a septuamta hi.
Huailai in Israel gam ah kumpipa a omkei a; michih in a ma mit a dik a sakte a hihchiat mai uhi.
Judah gam Bethlehem mi Judah nam, Levi chi tangval khat, huai ah a va om hi.
Huai mi Bethlehem Judah khopi apan a pawt a, omna zong in a vak ahi. A vakna lam ah Ephraim tanggam a Mikah inn a va tung hi.
Mikah in a kiang ah, “Koi apan hongpai na hia oi?” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Bethlehem Judah mi Levi chi ka hi a, omna mun zong a vak ka hi” a chi hi.
Mikah in a kiang ah, “Ka pa leh siampu din ka kiang ah teng in, kum teng in, dangka sik tang sawm ka honpe dia, puansilh khat leh nek dingte leng” a chi hi. Huchi in Levi chi a lutta hi.
Levi chi, huai mi kiang a ten a lungkim hi. Huchi in huai tangvalpa a tapa khat bang in a omta hi.
Mikah in Levi chi a septuamta a, huchi in tangvalpa a siampu in a pangta a, Mikah inn ah a tengta hi.
Huchi in Mikah in, tuin zaw Levi chi ka siampu din ka neita hi.
Huailai in Israel gam ah kumpipa a omkei. Dan chite’n gamluah ding a zong uh. Israel chite lak ah gamluah ding a tang naikei uhi.

Dan suante’n a nam pumpi lak ua mi, pasalpha nga, Zoreah leh Eshtaol khua apan gam enkhe ding leh va entel din mi a sawl uh. A kiang uah, “Vakuan unla, gam va entel dih ua” a chi uh. Huchi in Ephraim tanggam a Mikah inn a va tung ua, huai ah a giak uhi.
Mikah inn kiang a, a omlai un Levi chi tangval aw a thei ua, huailam a va zuan ua, a kiang ah, “Hiai a honpi kua ahia? Hiai mun ah bang ahia na hih? Bangchi’n ahia hiai a na ten?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Mikah in huchi in a hon na bawlta a, a hon guai a, a siampu in ka om hi” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Ka hohna ding uah ka lamzang ding uh hia ding lou, chih theihtheihna din Pathian hon dotsak dihve” a chi uhi.
Siampu in a kiang uah, “Lungmuangtakin pai un. Na hohna ding ma uah

Huchi in mi ngate a pawtkhia ua, Laish khua ah a lut ua, huai mite Zidon mite mah bang a galmuangtak leh lungmuangtaka om hithiat a om a va mu ua; amaute zahlaksak ding thuneimi kuamah a omkei a, Zidonte toh a kigamla ua, kuamah toh leng a kisaikha kei uhi.
Zoreah leh Eshtaol khua ah a unaute uh kiang ah a hongpai ua; a unaute un a kiang uah, “Bangchi ahia oi?” a chi uh.
Amau, “Thou dih ua, i sual ding uh. Gam ahihleh ka va mungei ua, ngai un, a hoih mahmah hi. Dai maimah ding na hi uhia? Huai gam valut a, valuah din zekai kei dih uh.
Vahoh le uchin galmuanga om mite ahi chih nava muh ding uh, a gam lah a za mahmah ngal a. Pathian in nou a hon pekhinta hi. Lei a thil om ah zaw bangmah taksap ding a om hetlouhna mun ahi” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Zoreah leh Eshtaol khua apan Dan namte kidouna galthuam silh in mi za guk a pawtta uh.
A va hohtou ua, Judah gam Kiriath-jearim khua ah om mun a bawl uh. Huaiziak in huai mun tunitan in Mananeh Dan a chilai ua, Kiriath-jearim tanglam ah a om hi.
Huai apan Ephraim tanggam lam a zuan ua, Mikah inn a va tung uhi.

Huchi in Laish gam enkhe dia mi nga pawtte’n a dawng ua, a unaute uh kiang ah, “Hiai innte ah ephod, milimte, milim bawltawmte, milim suntawmte a om chih na thei uhia? Huchi in bangchi’n ahia na hih ding uh ngaihtuah un” a chi uh.
Huai apan a pai ua, Levi chi tangval omna Mikah inn ngei a va tung ua, a tungtang thu a dong uhi.
Dan suan, mi za guk kidouna galthuam silhte kulh kongpi bul ah ading uhi.
Mi nga gam enkhete a va hohtou ua, a lut ua, milim bawltawm, ephod, milimte leh suntawm milimte a la ua, siampu mi za guk kidouna galthuam silhte lak ah kulh kongpi bul ah ading hi.
Huaite Mikah inn ah a valut ua, bawltawm milimte, ephod, milimte leh suntawm milimte a valak uleh, siampu in a kiang uah, “Hiai a bang hih na mai ua?” a chi hi.

Amau, “Dai in, na khut in na muk hum inla, ka kiang uah hongpai inla, ka pa uh leh siampu ding un hongom in. Nang adin inn khat kia siampu a om hia hoih zaw, Israel lak a chi khat leh nam khat siampu dia om?” a chi uh.
Siampu lungtang a kipak mahmah a, huchi in ephod, milim, leh bawltawm milimte a la a, mipite lak ah a omta hi.
Huchi in a paikhia ua, a nau neute uh, gante uh leh a vante uh a masuan touzel uh.
Mikah inn apan gamla kuam a paikhiak nung un Mikah invengte a ki kaikhawm ua, Dan suante a delhphata uhi.
Dan suante a sam uh. Amau a nunglam a nga ua, Mikah kiang ah, “Bang a chia ahia, mi huai zahzah n’on tonpih?” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Ka bawl pathiante leh siampu na paipih ua, na pai vengveng ua, bang ka neilai a? Bangziaka bangchi na hia, na honchih uh?’ a chi hi.
Dan suante’n a kiang ah, “Ka lak uah pau mawkmawk kei dih aw, huchilou in zaw mi thangpai khut na thuak kha dia, na inkawte toh na hinna na tan ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Dan suante a pai ua, Mikah in lah sualngam vual hi un a theikei a, a in lam ah a pai nawnta hi.
Mikah thilbawlte leh a siampu neih a paipih ua, Laish khua, galmuanga om hithiatte kiang a tungtou ua, namsau in a that ua; khua mei in a halta uh.
Zidon apan a gamlat mahmah ziak in a va hunkhe ding mi kuamah a omkei uh. A kuakua toh kizatna mahmah a neikei uhi. Beth rehob kiang as om phaizang ahi a, Khopi khat a lam ua, huai ah a tengta uhi.
A khaw min Israel tapa, a pu uh Dan tam in, Dan a sa uhi. Himahleh a tung in huai khaw min Laish ahi.
Dan suante’n huai milim bawltawm a dingkhe sakta uh. Mosi tapa Gershon tapa Jonathan leh a tapate, gamsal a pi a hih masiah uh Dan chite siampu ahita uhi.
Huchi in Mikah bawltawm milim ahihleh Shiloh khua a Pathian inn a om laiteng a dingsak uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huailai a Israel gam a kumpipa a omlouh lai in, Levi chi a mi khat Ephraim tanggam tawplam ah a om a, Judah gam a Bethlehem mi mei in a nei hi.
A mei in a angkawm san a, huchi in Judah gam a Bethlehem a a pa inn ah a taisan hi. Huai ah kha li tak a om hi.
A pasal a thoua, a sikha leh a sabiltung nih pi in kamdam in a vakhem a, lungkim a pikik nawn tum in a va delhzui hi. Aman a pa inn ah a na pilut a, apan a na muh in a na kipahpih hi.
A sungpa, numei pa’n a kiang a om din a na khou a; a kiang ah ni thum a om a, a ne un a dawn khawm ua, huai ah a tung hi.

Hichi ahi a, a ni li ni’n zingkhang in a thoua, amah bel pawttumin a thou hi. Numei pa’n a makpa kiang ah, “Tanghou tawmchik ne in. Na lungtang hihhalh tadih inla, huaikhit chiang in na pai ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a tu ua, a nih un a ne un a dawn khawm uh. Numei pa’n huai mi kiang ah, “Lungkimtakin tuzan giak in, na lungtang nuamsak in” a chi hi.
Huai mi bel pawt tum in a thou a, himahleh a sungpa’n a zolzol a, a giak nawnta hi.
A ni nga zingkhangpi in pawt tum in a thou hi. Numei pa’n, “Na lungtang hihhalh tadih lechin a kei dia, nitak ni nem hun tanbek omtadih in” a chi hi. Huchi in a nihun an a nekhawm nawn uhi.

Huai mi bel a mei leh a sikha toh pawt tuma a kisak leh a sungpa, numei pa’n a kiang ah, “Ngai in, ni leng a kaita, tu zan giak nawn mai inla, ni leng tum ding ahita. Hiai ah giak in; na lungtang a kipahna ding in. Huchi in zing chiang in zingkhang in na thou dia, in lam ah na pai mai ding” a chi hi.
Himahleh huai mi huai zan giah a utkei a, a thou a, a pawtta hi. Jebus khozawn a tung a, huai bel Jerusalem khua ahi, sabiltung nih bawlsa a pi a; a mei leng a tel hi.
Jebus khaw kiang a tun un ni a kai mahmahta hi. Sikha in a pu kiang ah, “Hongpai dih, hiai Jebuste khopi ah i lutmai ding, i giakmai ding” a chi hi.
A pun a kiang ah, “Israel suan hilou namdang khua ah lut lou e. Gibeah kholam i zuan zaw ding” a chi hi.
A sikha kiang ah, “Kisa aw, hiai munte a koi zaw hiam i zuan ding. Gibeah khua ah hiam, Ramah khua ah hiam i giak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a pai nawnzel ua; Benjaminte Gibeah khaw kiang a tun un ni a tumta hi.
Gibeah khua a giak din a lut ua, a lut un huai khopi khaw lak ah a tu uh, kuamah a zintun ding a omkei uhi.
Ngai in, nitaklam in putek khat loukuan a hongpai hi. Huai mi bel Ephraim tang gam a mi ahi a, Gibeah khua a om zual ahi. Amah Benjamin chite lak a ahi.
A kihei leh kholak a mikhualpa a mu hi. Putek in, “Koi a hoh ding? Koi apan a hongpai na hia?” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Judah gam a Bethlehem apan Ephraim tangtawp gam lam a hoh ka tum uhi. Huai a om ka hi, Bethlehem, Judah gam ah ka va hoh a; tuin
Ka sabiltung ua ding buhpawl leh gan an ka nei uh. Kei leh na sikhanu leh na sikhate kiang a omtangval ading leng tanghou leh uain a omlai a, bangmah taksap ka neikei uh” a chi hi.
Putek in, “Lungmuangtakin om in. Na kulna tengteng ken ka tumvek ding. Kholak ah zaw giak mahmah ken” a chi hi.
Huchi in a inn ah a pilut a, sabiltungte an a pia a; a khete uh a sil ua, ne in a dawn uhi.

Huchi a nuamsa leh kipaktak a a omlai un, ngai in, huai khua a mi, Belial tapate khenkhat in huai inn a hon umta uh. Kongkhak a hongkhen ua; inn neipa putek kiang ah, “Na inn a hong tungpa hon pikhia in, ka luppih ding uh” a chi uhi.
Inneipa a kiang uah a va pawt a, a kiang uah, “Hilou e, ka unaute aw, hichitel a gilou zaw hih mahmah kei un. Hiai mi ka mikhual ahi. Hiai thil haihuai hihkei un, a chi hi.
Ngai un, hiai ah ka tanu nungak leh a mei a om uh. Amau k’on pikhe dia, amaute zahlaksakin na utut uh a tung uah hih un. Himahleh hiai mi tung ah zaw hiai thil gilou hih kei un” a chi hi.

Himahleh huai mite’n a thu a zui nuam kei ua, huchi in hiai mi’n a mei a man a, a kiang uah a va pikhia hi. Amau a na luppih ua, khovak masiah zankhua in a pawngsual uhi. Huchi in khua a hong vaktakin, a khah uhi.
Khua a hong vaktakin numei a pai a, a pu tunna pa inn kongpi bul ah a puk a, khovak nung tan in a om nilouh hi.
A pu zingsang in a hong thou a, inn kongpite a hong a, pai tum in a va pawt hi. Ngai in, a meinu kongpi bul ah a khutte inn sung lam nga in a na lum hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Thou in, i pai ding” a chi hi. Himahleh a dawng kei hi. Huchi in a sabiltung tung ah a koihtou a; a thou a, a mun lam ah a paita hi.
A inn a tun in temta a la a, a mei a sem a, a guhte toh seh sawmlehnih in a semnen a, Israel gam teng ah a khak vek hi.
Hichi ahi a, a mu peuhmahte’n, “Israel suante Aigupta gam apan a hongpawt nung uh hichibang thilhih leh muh tutan in a om ngei nai kei. ‘Ngaihtuah unla, kihou unla, na lungsim uh gen un’ ” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Israel suante tengteng a kisata ua, pheikhai lual in Dan khua apan Beer–sheba khaw pha in Gilead gam a mite toh Mizpah khua ah
Mi tengteng heutu, Israel chite tengteng nangawn Pathian mite kikhopkhawmna ah a tel ua, sepaih namsau tawi mi nuai li ahi uhi.
Benjamin suante’n Israel suante Mizpah khua ah a hohtou uh chih a za uh, Israel suante’n, “Bangchidan a hichibang a gitlouhna hongom ahia, honhilh un?” a chi uh.
Levi chi, a thah uh numei pasal in, “Benjamin chite omna Gibeah khua ah ka mei toh giak din ka valut uh.
Gibeah mite’n a hong sualta ua, zan in inn a hongum ua; honthah a tum ua, ka mei a pawngsual ua a sita hi.
Huchi in ka mei luang ka sem a, Israelte gamluah tengteng ah ka khak a, Israel gam ah thil kihhuai leh haihuaitak a na hihta ngal ua.
Nou Israel suante aw, na vek un ngai un, na ngaihdan uleh na phasak dan uh gen dih ua” a chi hi.
Huchi in mi tengteng pheikhai lual in a thou ua, “Kuamah i puanin lam ah i pai hetkei ding, kuamah i inn ah i lut kei ding uh.
Gibeahte i bawl ding dan hichibang ahi. Ai i san ding ua, amaute i dou ding uh.
Gibeah mun a Benjaminte i vasualna ua mipite nekding pe din Israel nam tengteng lak a mi za khat ah sawm zel, sang khat ah za zel, sing khat ah sang zel i telkhe ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Israel mi tengteng pheikhai lual in huai khopi sual din a kikhawm uhi.
Israel namte’n Benjamin nam tengteng kiang ah mi a sawl ua, “Na lak ua na hih uh bang gitlouhna ahia?
Gibeah khua a mi Belial tate honpi unla, Israel gam a gitlouhna a daih theihna din ka na that ding uh” chi in mi a sawl uh. Himahleh Benjamin chite’n a unau Israel suante thugen a zui nuam kei uh.
Benjamin suante bel Israel suante dou din khopite apan a hong pawtkhawm ua, Gibeah khua ah a lutta uhi.
Huai ni a Benjamin suante khopi apan namsau tawi a pawtte, Gibeah khua a mi za sagih telkhiak simlouh in sing nih leh sang guk ahi uh.
Huai tengteng lak ah veilong za sagih, telkhiat a om ua; amaute’n vaisuangseh in samzang chia leng a khial kei uhi.
Israel mite, Benjamin mite simlouh in namsau tawi ngen mi ngen nuai li ahi uh. Amau tengteng galdou thei vek ahi uhi.
Israel suante a thou ua, Bethel ah a hohtou ua, Pathian a va dong ua, Benjamin suante kuan ahia va sual masa ding? a chi uh.
Israel mite Benjamin pawl sual din a kisa ua, Israel mite’n Gibeah khua ah amaute sual din panmun a khoh uhi.
Benjamin suante Gibeah khua apan a hongpawt ua, huai ni’n Israel suante lak a mi sing nih leh sang nih a hongthat uhi.
Mipite, Israel mite a kihasuan nawn ua, a sual tung ni ua a sualna mun mah uah sual din panmun a khoh nawn uhi.
Israel suante a hohtou ua, Pathian ma ah nitak tan in a va kap ua,
“Ka unau uh Benjamin suante ka va sual nawn ding uam?” chi’n
A ni nihni in Israel suante’n Benjamin suante a va naih uh.
Benjamin suante leng huai a ni nih ni’n sual din Gibeah khua apan a pawtsam ua, Israel suante lak a mi sing khat leh sang giat a hongthat nawn uh. Huaite tengteng namsau tawi mi ahi uhi.
Huchi in Israel suan tengteng leh, mi tengteng a va paitou ua, Bethel ah a hohtou ua, a kap ua,
Israel suante’n
Huailai in Aron tapa Eleazar tapa Phinehas in a na a semzel ahi. “Ka unau uh Benjamin suante ka va sual nawn ding uam, ka tawpsanta mai ding uam?” chi’n
Israel suante’n Gibeah khaw kim ah tangpangmi a gukkoih uhi.
Israel suante Benjamin suante sual din a ni thum ni’n a kisa nawn uh. Nidang mah bang in Gibeah khua sual din panmun a khoh nawn uh.

Benjamin suante bel huai mite sual din a pawt ua, khua a pawtsan uh. Huchi in nidang mah bang in mite sual in a thatpan nawnta ua, pawn ngial ah Bethel kholam lamliante ah Israel suante sawmthum a that uh.
Benjamin suante’n “A ma mah bang in i ma uah a zahlak nawnta uh e” a chi uhi. Israel suante’n bel, “I tai ding uh, khopi apan lamlian lam ah i tolhkhe sak ding” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Israel suan tengteng in a panmun uh a pawtsan ua, Baal Tamar mun ah panmun a khoh uhi. Israel suan a guk a na tangpangte a mun ua pan, Gibeah phaizang a panmun tan in a hong pawtkhia uhi.
Israel suan tengteng lak a telkhiat mi sing khat in a va sual ua, kidouna a thupi mahmah hi. Himahleh amau thil hoihlou a kiang naichik ah a om chih a theikei uhi.
Israelte ma ah Benjamin suante a that hi. Israel suante’n huai ni’n Benjamin suante mi sing nih leh sang nga leh za khat a that uhi. Huai tengteng namsau tawimi ahivek uhi.
Huchi in Benjamin suante’n a vuallelta uh chih a hong kitheita uhi. Israel suante’n Gibeah khua sual dia a guk a tang pang mite a koih uh a muan ziak un Benjamin suante a nungtolh san uhi.
A guk a tangpang mite’n Gibeah khua a sualguih uh. Huchi in a guk a tangpangte a kiphalh ua, khua a mi tengteng namsau in a sualta uhi.
Israel suante leh a guk a tangpang mite’n a kichiam uh bel khopi sung a mei khuttouh sak ding, chih ahi.
Huai a muh chiang ua, Israel taikekte kileh hei a, dou ding a chih uh ahi.
Huchi in khopi sung a meikhu a hong kitun nguingui tak in, Benjamin suante a kihei uleh, ngai in, khopi a pum in vanlam ah a khutou ngoingoi maimah hi.
Huchi in Israel suante a hong kilehhei ua, Benjamin suante’n lamdang a sa mahmah uh. A tan uh a hoihkei ding chih lah a theita ngal ua.
Huaiziak in, Israel suante ma ah gamdai ah a taikekta uhi. Himahleh a delhzui pek ua, khopi apan hong pawtte’n huai ah na that uhi.
Benjamin suante bel a umsip ua, a delh ua, ni suahna lam Gibeah kiang a a khawlna uah a phata uhi.
Benjamin suante mi sing khat leh sang giat a si ua; avek un mi hat hangsan chiat ahi uhi.
A kihei ua, gamdai lam Rimmon suangpi ah a tai uh. Mi sang nga lamliante ah a tom ua; Gidom tan in a delhzui ua, mi sang nih a that uhi.
Huchi in huai ni a Benjamin suan si, namsau tawimi ngen sing nih leh sang nga ahi ua, avek un mi hat hangsan ahi uhi.
Mi za gukte gamdai lam Rimmon suangpi ah a taikek ua, huai Rimmon suangpi ah kha li sung a om uhi.
Israel suante Benjamin suante tung ah a kisa nawn ua, khopi sung a om peuhmah gante, a muhmuh uh namsau in a satlum zel ua, huailou leng a khaw muh peuhmah uh a halzel uhi.
Huan, Israel suante’n Mizpah khua ah, i lak ua mi kuamah in i tanute uh Benjamin suante zi din i pe kei ding uh, chi in a kichiam uhi.
Mipite Bethel ah a hoh ua, Pathian ma ah nitak tan in a tu ua, a awte uh suah in a kap vongvong uhi.

Hichi ahi a, a zing in zing khang in a thou ua, huai ah maitam a bawl ua, haltum thillatte leh lemna thillatte a lan uhi.

Israel suante a unaupa uh Benjamin suante tungthu ah a kisik ua, “Tuni in Israel suante lak ah nam khat satkhiak ahita, a chi uhi.
A omsunte adin a zi ding uh bangchi’n i hihta ding ua? I tanute uh lah a zi ding ua neisak lou din
Amau a chi ua, Mizpah a
Mite a kisim uleh, ngai in, Jabesh-gilead gam a omte khat lel leng a na omta kei uhi.
Kikhawm khawmte’n mi hangsan hoih ngen sing khat leh sang nih a sawl uh. “Kuan unla, Jabesh-gilead gam a omte numei leh a tanu neute u toh namsau in va satlum vek un.
Na hih ding dan uh hichibang ahi. Mi tengteng leh numei, pasal luppih khinsa peuhmah hihmang thang vek un” chi in thu a pia uhi.
Jabesh-gilead gam a omte lak ah nungak za li, pasal kithuahpih ngei hetlouh a mu uh. Huchi in a omna uh Shiloh khua ah a pi ua, huai bel Kanan gam a om ahi.
Kikhawm khawm tengteng in mi a sawl ua, Rimmon suangpi a om Benjamin suante a va houpih ua, kilemna bawl din a sam uhi.
Huaitak in Benjamin pawl a hong nawn ua; Jabesh-gilead gam a numei a hawite uh a zi ding un a pia uh. Huchi in leng a kiching kei lai uhi.
Israel nam lak a
Huchi in kikhawmte upate’n, “A damlaite zi ding bang i chih ding ua? Benjamin suante lak a numeite lah hihmang ahita ngal ua?” a chi uhi.
“Amau Israel nam hihman louhna din Benjamin suan omsunte bangchi’n suan i neisak ding ua?
I tanute uh lah a zi un i neisak thei ngalkei ua” a chi uh. Israel suante’n, “Kuapeuh Benjamin suante zi dia nei sak peuhmah hamsiat in om uhen” chi’n a kichiam uhi.
Amau, “Ngai un, Bethel mallam, Bethel apan Sekem zotna lamlian suahlam pang a Lebonah simlam a om Shiloh khua ah kumchih in
Amau Benjamin suante kiang ah, “Va hoh unla, grep mun ah va guktan un;
Na en unla, ngai un, Shiloh khua a nungakte lamna a lam dia a hongpawt uleh, grep mun apan hongpawt unla, Shiloh nungakte na zi ding un man chiat unla, Benjaminte gam ah paipih un.

Hichi ahi ding a, a pate uh hiam, a sanggampate uh hiam kalh dia i kiang ua a hong uleh, a kiang uah, Hon hehpih un. Kidouna sung in lah zi ka guan theikei uh. Nou lah na tanute uh na piak thoh un hilou a, kichiamna a mawh tanglou ding na hi uh” ka chi ding uh, a chi uhi.
Benjamin suante’n huchibang in a hih uh. Lampawlte lak a mi amau zah chiat zi din a man ua, a paimangpihta uhi. Huchi in a gam uah a pai ua, khopite a puahnawn ua, huai ah a tengta uhi.
Huaitak in huai apan Israel suante bel amau chichi leh amau namnam in a kihuituam nawn ua, huai nungsiah amau gam chiat ah a pai nawn uhi.
Huailai in Israelte lak ah kumpipa a omkei a; michih in amah mit a dikte a hih chiat uhi.
Vaihawmmite’n vai a hawmlai un hichi ahi. Huai gam ah kial a kia hi. Judah gam a Bethlehem mi khat Moab gam a teng tadih din amah leh a zi leh a tapate nih toh a hoh uhi.
Huai mi min Elimelek ahi, a zi min Naomi ahi, a tapate nih min Malon leh Kilon ahi. Amau Judah gam a Bethlehem, Ephrath mi ahi uh. Moab gam ah a hoh ua, huai ah a om nilouh uhi.
Elimelek, Naomi pasal a si a, amah leh a tapate nih kia ahita uh.
Amau Moab gam numei zi in a nei ua, a khat pen min Orpah ahi a, a khat pen min Ruth ahi. Huai ah kum sawm a omta uhi.
Mahlon leh Kilon a si tuaktuak ua; huchi in huai numei a tate nih leh a pasal in a sihsanta uhi.
Huchi in a moute toh Moab gam apan kiknawn din a kisa uh.
Huchi in a omna apan a moute nih toh a pawt ua; Judah gam a kiknawn din a paita uhi.
Naomi in a mou nihte kiang ah,“Na nute uh inn tuak ah pai nawnta un. Misi tung leh ka tung a siamtak a na hih bang un
na nih un na pasalte uh inn a khawlna na muh theihna ding un hon hehpih hen” a chi hi. Huchi in a tawp a, aw suah hial in a kapta uhi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Pai kei nung, na chite kiang a na paina ah ka tel sam ding uh” a chi uhi.
Naomi in, “Ka tanute aw, pai nawn zaw un. Bangziak a ka kiang a hongpai sam mahmah ding na hi ua? Na pasal ding uh tapate ka pai thei nawn dia hia?
Ka tanute aw, Kisa unla, pai un. Pasal nei din lah ka upa lawta ngal a. Lametna ka nei chimah leng, tuzan mahmah in leng pasal nei in tapate leng neimah leng,
a pichin tan ua om ding na hi ding uam? Pasal lou in na om nilouh ding ua hia? Hi tellou e, ka tanute aw; nou ziak in ka lungkhamna a uang semsem hi. Toupa khut ka tung a tu eita ve” a chi hi.
A aw uh suah in a kapnawn leuleu uh. Huchi in Orpah in a pi a tawp a; Ruth in bel a len chinten hi.
Aman, “Ngai in, na moupihnu a chite kiang leh a pathian kiang ah a pai kiknawnta. Nang leng na moupihnu delh inla, pai nawnta in aw” a chi hi.
Ruth in, “Nang khen ding leh nang zuilou a kiknawn ding in hon kun ken. Na paina peuh ah ka pai dia; na giahna peuh ah ka giak dia; na chite ka chite ahi ding ua, na Pathian ka Pathian ahi ding.
Na sihna peuh ah ka si dia, huai ah n’on vuisam ding ahi. Nang leh kei sihna loungal thil dang in a honkhen leh
Huchi in a kiang a pai a tum chiltel chih a theih in a daihsanta hi.
Huchi in Bethlehem tan a paikhawmta uh. Hichi ahi a, Bethlehem a tun un, a khozang un a ling ua, numeite’n, “Hiai Naomi ahi maw?” a chi uh.
Aman a kiang uah, “Naomi honchi kei un. Marah honchi zaw un.” Bangkim hihtheipa’n lah khatak in a hon hihta ngal a, a chi hi.
Buchingtak in ka pawt a,
Huchi in Naomi a hongkik a, a mounu Moab mi Ruth toh Moab gam apan a hongkik uhi. Barli buh lak pattung lai in Bethlehem a hongtung uhi.
Huan, Naomi in a pasal tanau, Elimelek suan, mi neizoutak tanau a nei a; a min Boaz ahi.
Moab mi Ruth in Naomi kiang ah, “Lou ah hon hohsak in. Mi lou ah hon hehpihmi buhsang ka va zong ding aw,” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Hoh ve, ka tanu” a chi hi.
Huchi in a hohta a, buhlamite lakmaih a vazong a; huchi in Elimelek suan Boaz lou ah a va hoh kha geih hi.
Huchi in, ngai in, Bethlehem apan Boaz a vahoh a, buhlamite kiang ah, “Na kiang uah
Huchi in Boaz in a sikha, buhlamite tung a heutu kiang ah; “Hiai kua nungaknou ahia oi?” a chi hi.
A buhlamite tung a heutu a sikha in, “Moab nungaknou, Moab gam apan Naomi toh hongpai ahi.

Aman, ‘hon hehpih inla, na buhsang ka zong dia, buhlamite’n a buhphal uh a lakkhawm khit chiang un ka zong zel ding aw’ a chi hi. Huchi in a hongpai a, in a tomchik a om chihlouh zingsang apan a om nilouh hi,” chi in a dawng uhi.
Huchi in Boaz in Ruth kiang ah, “Ka tanu, ngai dih. Buhsang zong in lou dang ah hoh kenla, hiai apan pai ken. Ka sikha nungakte kiang ah om gige in.
A buhlak uh en gige inla, a nung uh suizel in. Tangvalte nang bangmah hon chihlou din thu ka pevekta hi. Na dangtak peuh chiang in tuibel a tangvalte tui tawisa dawnzel in” a chi hi.
Huchi in a kun a, leisi in a khupboh a, a kiang ah, “Namdang hinapi ing a, nang hichibang a n’on theihnopa n’on na hehpih bangchidan ahia?” a chi hi.

Boaz in a dawng a, a kiang ah, “Na pasal sih nungsiah na pi tung a na thilhih dan tengteng min a honhilh vek uh. Na nu leh na pa leh na pianna gam paisan a tuma lam in a na mi theih ngeilouhte kiang a na hongpai dante leng.
na thilhih hondin henla,
Aman, “Ka toupa, hon hehpih in. Nang n’on lungmuan a, na sikha nungakte lak a mi hi kei mah leng, na sikhanu hoihtak in n’on houpihta ngal a” a chi hi.

Annek hun in Boaz in a kiang ah, “Hongpai inla, Tanghoute hong ne sam inla, tanghou themte uain thuk ah hong diah sam in” a chi hi. Huchi in buhlamite kiang ah a tu a; buhkan a pia a; a ne a, a nek nung in leng a khamval lai hi.
Buhsang zong dia a dinnawn in, Boaz in a tangvalte kiang ah, “Buhphalte lak ah leng tawmsak zel unla, tai kei un.
A lomte leng dohkhiak sak unla, nutsiat zel unla, tom henla, tai kei un” chi’n thu a pia hi.
Huchi in lou a buhsang nitaklam tan in a zong hi. A zonsa a khen a, barli buh ephah khat hiam tak a pha hi.
A van kisuan in khopi ah a paita hi. A pi in a buhsang zon a na mu a; aman a nek khamval a sitte a suahkhia a, a pia hi.

A pi in a kiang ah, “Tuni a koilam a buhsang zong na hia? Koi ah ahia na va sep? A hon na thei nuampa vualzawl in om hen” a chi hi. Aman kua kiang ah ahia a vasep chih a pi a hilh hi. “Tuni a ka va nasepna min Boaz ahi” a chi hi.
Naomi in a mounu kiang ah, “
Moab mi Ruth in, “Kei kiang ah leng honchi eive” a chi hi.
Naomi in a mounu Ruth kiang ah, “Ka tanu, lou dang a a honmuh hetlouhna din a sikha nungakte lak ngen ah pai lechin a hoih ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in, barli buh leh buhpi lakkhit mateng Boaz sikha nungakte lak kia ah buhsang zong in a hoh a, a pi kiang ah a teng hi.
Huan, a pi Naomi, a pasal nu’n a kiang ah, “Ka tanu, nang adin khawlna k’on zonsak kei dia hia, huchi in nang adin a hoih ding hi.
I tanaupa Boaz, a sikha nungakte toh nna nasepnapa om hilou hia? Ngai in, tuzan in phual ah barli buh a zapsiang ding hi.
Huchi in, kisil inla, thau kinilh inla, na kizepna puansilh inla, phual ah va hohsuk in. Himahleh an ne a, a dawn khit masiah a kiang ah kitheisak ken.
Hichi ahi ding a, a lup chiang in a lupna chiamteh inla, lut inla, a khe lem inla, va lum in. Aman na hih ding a honhilh ding” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Na gen teng ka hih ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in phual ah a hohsuk a, a pi hilh bang in a hihta hi.
Boaz in an a ne a, a dawn khit in a lungtang a kipak a, buhvum bul a lum din a paita hi. Amah awlawl in a hongpai a, a khe a lem a, a lumta hi.
Hichi ahi a, zan lai in huai mipa a lauta a, a langkhat a nga a; ngai in, a khe kiang ah numei khat a na lumta mai hi.
Aman, “Kua na hia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Na sikhanu Ruth ka hi. Huchi in na sikhanu na puan honzawn in, ka tanau bul lah na hi ngal a” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka tanu,
Huchi in ka tanu, lau ken aw. Na gen bang in na tung ah ka hih ding. I khua a mi tengteng in numei kizentak na hi chih a thei vek ngal ua.
Kitanau nai i hi ngut hi. Himahleh kei sang a naizaw a om hi.
Tuzan zaw om peuhmah inla, zing chiang zingsang in na tung a aman a tanau hih ding a hihnop leh a hoih hi. Himahleh tanau hih ding na tung a a hihnop kei leh, tanau hih ding pen
Huchi in zingsang tan in a khebul ah a lum hi. Kuamah a kimuh chian theihma in a thoukhia hi. Aman, “Phual ah numei a hong chih himhim kuamah in theikei hen” a chi hi.
A kiang ah, “Na puansilh la inla, doh in” a chi hi. Huchi in a doh a, barli buh tehna guk a teh a, a suan a; huchi in khua ah a paita hi.
A pi kiang a tun in, “Ka tanu, bang n’ong chi a?” a na chi hi. Aman, huai mipa in a tung a thil a na hih tengteng a hilhta hi.
“Hiai barli buh tehna guk a honpia a, ‘na pi kiang ah a vuak in pai ken,’ ” a honchi, a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka tanu, bangchibang in ahia thil a hongom ding na theih ma in tu maimai in. Tuni a hiai thil a hih khit mateng huai mipa dai mailou ding ahi,” a chi hi.

Huchi in Boaz kulh kongpi ah a hohtou a, huai ah a tu hi. Ngai in, a tanau bul uh a tungtang thu Boaz in a gen a hongpai hi. Huai mi kiang ah, “E! nang na hi maw! hongpai inla, tu dihve” a chi hi. Amah hongpai in a tuta hi.
Huai khua a upate lak a mi sawm a pi a, a kiang uah, “Hiai ah tu dih ua” a chi a, huchi in amau a tuta uhi.
A tanau bul uh kiang ah, “Moab gam apan hongkik Naomi in i unaupa Elimelek gam a zuak hi.

Huchi in khomite mitmuh leh ka mite upate mitmuh in lei in. Na tat nop leh tan in. Himahleh na tatnop kei leh ka theih theihna din honhilh in. Nang lou lah kuamah a tan dia kilawm a om ngalkei uh. Nang zom in kei ka hi chih nang hon theihsak kiphamawh in ka thei” a chi hi.
Aman, “Ka tan ding” a chi hi.
Boaz in, “Naomi khut apan huai gam na lei nin, misi zi, Moab numei Ruth apan misi min beilou a, a gouluah ding mi a om zel theihna din na lei tel ding ahi” a chi hi.
A tanau bulpa in, “Kei adin zaw ka tan theikei. Huchilou in zaw keimah gouluah ka mansuah kha ding. Ka tat theihna nang tangmai in. Ken zaw tan theilou ka himai hi” a chi hi.
Nidanglai a Israelte lak a thil bangkim a hihkipna ding ua a kitat dan uleh a kikhen dan uh hichi ahi. Khedap a phel ua, a vengte uh a pia ua, huai Israelte lak a a hihdan uh ahi.
Huchi in a tanau bulpa un Boaz kiang ah, “Nang adin lei zaw in” a chi hi. Huchi in a khedap a phelta hi.
Boaz in upate leh mipi tengteng kiang ah, “Tuni in noute Elimelek thilneih tengteng leh Kilon leh Mahlon thilneih tengteng Naomi khut apan ka lei chih theihpihtute na hi uh.
Huai kia hilou in misi min a manlouhna din Moab numei Ruth, Mahlon zi ka zi din ka lei a, huai, tuni in noute a theihpihtute na hi uh” a chi hi.
Kulh kongpi a mipi tengteng leh upate’n, “Theihpihtute ka hi uh. Na in a numei honglut Rakil leh Leah, Israel inkuan dingsak nihte bang in
hiai nungaknou apan suan a hon bawlsak ding ziak in na inkuan uh Tamar in Judah a suansak Perez inkuan bang honghi hen” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Boaz in Ruth a pi a, a zi a hong hita hi. Huchi in a luppih a,
Numeite’n Naomi kiang ah, “Tuni mahmah a tanau nai bei a hon omsak lou,
Amah na hinna tungdingpa leh na teklam a hon vakpa a honghi dia; na mounu nang hon it nu, tapa sagihte sang a nang adia hoih in amah lah a suangta ngal a” a chi uhi.
Naomi in nau a la a, a pom a, a donta hi.
A inveng numeite’n a min a phuak ua, “Naomi adin tapa a hong piangta” chi’n a min Obed a sa uhi. Amah, David pa Jesse pa ahi.
Hiaite Perez suante ahi uh. Perez in Hezron a suang a;
Hezron in Ram a suang a; Ram in Aminadab a suang a;
Aminadab in Nashon a suang a, Nashon in Salmon a suang a;
Salmon in Boaz a suang a, Boaz in Obed a suang a;
Obed in Jesse a suang a, Jesse in David a suang hi.
Ephraim tang gam Ramathaim zophim khua ah mi khat a om a, a min Elkanah ahi. Huai mi Jeroham tapa ahi a, huai mi Elihu tapa ahi a, huai mi Tohu tapa ahi a, huai mi Ephraim mi Zuph tapa ahi.
Aman zi nih a nei a, a khat min Hannah ahi, a khat min Peninnah ahi. Peninnah in tate a nei a, Hannah in bel tate a neikei hi.
Huai mi a khua ua kipan Shiloh ah Sepaihpawlte
Elkanah kithoih ni a hongtun in, a zi Peninnah leh a tapate leh a tanute tengteng tantuan a bawlsak hi.
Hannah tan nih a bawlsak a, Hannah lah a it mahmah ngal a. Himahleh
a sul a khak sak ziak in a melma in a lungkham saknak hi.
Huchibang a kumtenga a hih ziak in
A pasal Elkanah in a kiang ah, “Hannah, bang a chia ahia na kah? Bang a chia an ne lou na hia? Bang a chia lungkham na hia? Tapa sawm sang in nang adin ka hoihzaw ka hia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in, Shiloh a a nek ua a dawn khit un Hannah ading a, siampu Eli
Hannah lungsim haksa mahmah in a om a,
Thu a chiam a, “Sepaihte
Hichi ahi a,
Hannah in a lungtang in a gen a, a muk kia a tangsak a, a aw bel zak ahi kei hi. Huaiziak in Eli in zukham a sa hi.
Huchi in Eli in a kiang ah, “Bang tan ahia kham a na om nilouh ding? Na uain koihmang in” a chi hi.
Hannah in, “Kham kei veng e, ka toupa. Lungsim lungkham mahmah numei ka hi. Uain leng, Zu chik leng ka dawn kei,
Na sikhanu Belial tanu in honngoh hetken. Lungsim a dimlet ka lungkimlouhna leh ka lungkhamna genkhia ka hi zaw hi” chi’n a dawng hi.
Eli in, “Lungmuangtak in pai in, Israelte Pathian in na thil nget nang honpia hen” chi in a dawng hi.
Aman, “Na sikhanu na mitmuh in deihsakna musak in” a chi hi. Huchi in numei a paita a, an a ne a, lungkham mel a puta kei hi.
Zingsangpi in a thou ua,
Hichi ahi a, Hannah in nau a pai a, a hun a hongtun in tapa a nei hi.“
Huchi in, Elkanah leh a inkawte tengteng
Hannah bel a hohtou kei hi. A pasal kiang ah, “Kei zaw naupang in nawinek a tawp masiah ka hohtou kei ding. Huai hun chiang in
A pasal Elkanah in a kiang ah, “Hoih di na chih bangzel in hih in. A nawinek na tawpsak tan in om in. Himahleh
Nawinek a tawp tak in, tangbuang ephah khat leh uain thawl khat tawi in bawngtal thum toh Shiloh a
Bawngtal khat a gou in, naupang Eli kiang ah a pi uhi.
Aman, “Toupa, na hinna lou in ka gen ahi, kei zaw aw, toupa, hiai lai a na kiang a ding a
Hiai naupang ngen in ka thum a,
Huaiziak in ken leng
Huai ah aman
Huan, Hannah a thum a hichi in a chi hi:
“Ka lungtang
a kipak mahmah,
ka ki
Ka melmate tung ah
ka kam letsak in a om a,
na hotdamna a ka kipah mahmah ziak in.
Nang bang mahmah lah
a om ngalkei uh.
I Pathian bang suangpi himhim leng a omsam kei.
Huchi tel a kisathei in thu
gennawn kei unla; na kam ua pan pau uang himhim pawt kei hen.
aman thilhihte hoihtak in a bukzel hi.
Mi hat thalpeute a kitansak a,
a kisuite taihatna a gak in a om hi.
Niang leh tai a omte nekding
zong in a lohtawm ua,
gilkialte kial nawnlou uhi.
A chingnu’n ta sagih a neita a,
ta tampi neinu a bahta hi.
Han ah a paisuk sak a, a pikhe tou hi.
a hausa sak a,
a hihniam a, a hihsang hi.
Leivui apan a zawngte ading tousak a,
ekvu apan khutdohte a dom tou hi.
Mi liante kiang a a omsak theih a,
thupina mangtutphah
a tan theihna ding un.
Lei kingaknate
aman khovel lah a tung uah a ngata ngal a.
“A misiangthoute khe a kem dia,
migiloute bel miallak ah
daihsak in a om ding uh.
Hatna a kuamah in
zoulou ding ahi ngal a.
van apan vanpiging bang in
amaute a dou ding.
vai a hawm dia;
a kumpipa kiang ah hatna a pedia,
a thaunilhpa ki a pahtawi ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Elkanah bel Ramah ah a inn ah a paita hi. Huchi in naupang in siampu Eli ma ah Toupa na a semta hi.
Eli tapate Belial tate ahi ua;
Mite lak a siampute hihdan ngeina ahihleh min kithoihna a honglat chiang un, sahuan laitak in siampu sikha sa thukna sikkhut zum thum nei tawi in a hongpai zel hi.

Belgong za hiam, belgong nei hiam, belkhaina nei hiam, bel hiam sung a sunsuka, huai sa thukna zum in a hon thukkhiak tengteng siampu in a lazel hi. Huchibang in Israel mi huai a hongpai tengteng apan Shiloh khua ah a na hihsak zel uhi.
A thau a khul ma un siampu sikha a hongpai a, kithoihmi kiang ah, “siampu ading haimin ding sa honpia in. Na sa huan a deihkei, a sial a deih hi” a chi hi.

Min a kiang ah, “A thau pen khul phot uhenla, huaikhit chiang in na hinna in a deih zahzah na la ding” a na chih chiang un aman, “Hilou e, tu mah a n’on piakpah ding ahi. N’on piak kei leh thagum in ka la ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in tangvalte khelhna
Himahleh Samuel in bel naupang mahleh, puanmalngat siampu puanak silh in
Huailou leng a nun puanaktual neu a khui sak a, kumteng kithoihna uh lan dia a pasal toh a hoh chiang un kumteng in a tawisak zel hi.
Eli in Elkanah leh a zi a vualzawl a, “
Eli bel a tek mahmahta hi. Israel mi tengteng tung a a tate thilhih tengteng leh Kihoupihna Puanin kongkhak bul a nasem numeite a na luppih zel thute uh a za hi.
Huchi in a kiang uah, “Bangdia hichibang thilhih na mai ua? Hiai mi tengteng apan na thilhih dan hoihloute uh ka naza ngal a.
Hichi di hilou ahi, Ka tate aw, na tanchin uh ka zak a hoihlou lam ngen ahi.
Mi khat, midang tung a a khelh leh Pathian in vai a hawmsak ding hi. Himahleh
Naupang Samuel a khang lian deuhdeuh a; Pathian leh mihing deihsak in a om hi.
Eli kiang ah Pathian mi khat a hong a, a kiang ah, “

Israel nam tengteng lak apan ka siampu hi ding, ka maitam a thillan ding, gimlim hal ding leh siampu puanak silh dia amah ka tel ahi kei maw? Na pa inkawte kiang ah Israel mite haltum thillat teng ka pia ahi kei maw?

Bangziak in ahia ka tenna a na lat ding ua ka thupiak ka kiang a kithoihna leh kei a tuam dia thillat pen lei toh sikden a, kei sang a na tate na zahtak zawk a, noumau na kisukthauna dia ka mi Israelte kithoihna a hoih pente na zat uh?’
Huaiziak in
Ngai in, ‘na bante leh na pa inkawte bante ka tankhiat ni a hongtung, na inn ah tekkun a dam a omkei ding uh.
Ka tenna inn ah, Pathian in Israel hauhsakna a piak teng ah melma na mu dia, tangtawn in na inn ah tekkun a dam a omkei ding uh.
Ka maitam apan ka hihman louh ding na mi pen na mit hihkhamtu leh na lungsim lungkham saktu ahi ding. Na inn a hongpiang peuhmah a dawnsih zel ding uhi.
Hiai, na tapate nih Hophni leh Phinehas tung a thiltung ding nang adin chiamtehna ahi ding. Ni khat in a nih un a si tuaktuak ding uhi.
Kei adin siampu muanhuai ka ding khesak dia, huai in ka lungtang leh ka lungsim toh kituak in na a sem ding. Inkuan kiptak in ka lamsak dia, tangtawn in ka thaunilhmi ma ah a om ding.

Hichi ahi ding a, na inn a omlai tengteng dangka leh tanghou ngen in a kiang ah a kuan ding ua, tanghou tawmchik bek nekding ka muh theihna ding un siampu na khat bek hon semsak ve aw, chi’n k’ong thum hi, a chi ding uh’ ” a chi hi.
Huan, Naupang Samuel in Eli ma ah
Hichi ahi a, huailai in, Eli a mun a a luplai in, a mit a mial panta a, khua a gina muhthei nawn ngelkei hi.
Pathian khawnvak a mih ma in, Pathian bawm omna
Eli kiang ah a vatai a, a kiang ah, “Hiai ah ka om, n’on sam a” a chi hi. Aman, “K’on sam kei; va lum nawn in,” a chi hi. Huchi in a pai a, a va lum nawnta hi.
Huailai in Samuel in
Huaiziak in, Eli in Samuel kiang ah, “Pai inla, va lum nawn inla, a hon sap nawn leh,
Huai ni’n a inkuan tung tangthu ka gen tengteng a bul apan a tawp tan in Eli tung ah ka hih ding ahi.
A tate’n Pathian a gensiatna khelhna uh theigigena pi a, a kham louh ziak in a inkuan tangtawn adin ka hawmsak ding hi, chih ka hilh khinta ngal a.
Huaiziak in, Eli inkuan kiang ah Eli inkuan bohsiatna kithoihna in hiam, thillat in hiam, chikchiang in leng siansak theih ahi kei ding, chi in ka kichiam khinta hi” a chi hi.
Samuel zingsang tan in a lum a,
Huchi in Eli in Samuel a sam a, “Samuel, ka tapa” a chi hi. Aman, “Hiai ah ka om” a chi hi.
Aman, “Bang thil ahia
Samuel in thil tengteng a hilh sipsip a, a kiang ah bangmah im a neikei. Huchi in aman,
Samuel a hong khanglian deuhdeuh a, a kiang ah
Huchi in Dan apan Beer–sheba tan in Israel mi tengteng in
Shiloh ah a kilak nawn a;
Huan, Samuel thu Israel mi tengteng lak ah a thangkheta hi. Israel mite Philistia mite dou din a kuan khia uh. Ebenezer kiang ah panmun a khoh ua, Philistia mite’n Aphek ah panmun a khoh uhi.
Philistia mite Israel mite na dal din a na kiphalh uh. A hong kidou uleh Philistia mite ma ah Israel mite a zahlakta ua, kidouna mun ah sepaih sang li vel a that uhi.
Mipite a giahmun ua a vapai uleh Israel upate’n, “Bangziak in ahia tuni a Toupa’n Philistia mite ma a hon zahlaksak mahmah? I kiang ua om a i melmate khut apan hon hondam din Shiloh apan
Huchi in mipite’n Shiloh ah mi a sawl ua, huai apan Cherubim tung a tu, sepaihte
Huchi in
Philistia mite’n a kikou husa uh a zak un, “Hebrute giahmuna kikou husa gingta zuazua mai bang chihna ahia leh?” a chi uh. A giahmun uah
Philistia mite’n a lau ua, “Giahmun ah Pathian a hong hi” a chih ziak un. “I tung a gik hi! Tuma lam in huchibang a om ngei ngal kei a, a chi uhi.
I tung a gik hi! Huai Pathiante khut hattak apan kua in ahia hon hondam ding? Huai Pathiante ahi, Aigupta mite gamdai a hipi chiteng a that hi.
Aw, nou Philistia mite aw, nou sikha ua a om bang ua nou Hebrute sikha a na omlouhna ding un hattak in om unla, ki pasal sakun. Ki pasal sakunla sual un” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Philistia mite’n a sual ua, Israel mite a zahlak sak ua, michih a puanin lam chiat uah a taikek uhi. A nakthah mahmah ua, Israelte sepaih sing thum a si uhi.
Pathian bawm a laksak ua, Eli tapa nih, Hophni leh Phinehas leng a that uhi.
Sepaih lak a Benjamin suan, mi khat a tai a, a puankhawng kikek nengnungin leh a lu a leikai niaunuau in huai ni mahmah in Shiloh a va tung hi.
A hongtun in, ngai in, Eli in lampi gei a tutna a tukawm in a na en nilouh a, Pathian bawm ziak in a lungtang a ling ngal a. Min khua a tun a tanchin a gen leh a khaw miteng a kapkhia uhi.
Eli in a kikou husa uh a zak in, “Tua thawm ging vengvung bang chihna ahia?” a chi hi. Mi khat kintak in a va hoh a, Eli a va hilh hi.
Eli bel kum sawmkua leh giat a upa ahi a, a mit a mialta a, khua a mu thei nawn kei.
Huai mi’n Eli kiang ah, “Sepaih lak apan hong paikhia ka hi. Tuni a sepaih lak apan hong taikhia ka hi” a chi hi. Aman, “Ka tapa, bangchibang in thil a om a oi?” a chi hi.

Tanchin hontun pa’n a dawng a, “Israel mite Philistia mite ma ah a taikek ua, mipi lak ah kithahna thupitak a omlai a, na tapate nih Hophni leh Phinehas leng a si uh, Pathian bawm leng a lak sakta uhi” a chi hi.

Hichi ahi a, Pathian bawm thu a gentakin kongpi bul a tutphah apan a thalpuk a, a ngawng a kitan a, a sita hi. Amah tekta a kikhouh zou nawn lou a hih ziak in. Israel tung ah kum sawmli sung vai a hawm hi.
A mounu, Phinehas zi in a naupai a, a neih a hun mahmahta hi. Aman Pathian bawm laksak a hih thu leh a pu leh a pasal a si uh chih a zak in a kun suk a, nau a veita hi, a na in phata hi.
A sihdek lai in a kiang a ding numeite’n a kiang ah, “Lau ken, tapa na neita” a chi uhi. Himahleh a dawng hetkei a, a limsak sam kei hi.
“Thupina in Israel a pawtsanta” chi in nau min Ikabod, a sa hi. Pathian bawm lah a laksakta ua, a pa leh a pasal lah a sita ngal ua.
“Thupina in Israel a pawtsanta, Pathian bawm lah a lak sakta ngal ua” a chi hi.
Huan, Philistia mite’n Pathian bawm a la ua, Ebenezer apan Ashdod ah a paipih uh.
Philistia mite’n Pathian bawm a la ua, Dagon inn ah a la lut ua, Dagon kiang ah a koih uhi.
Ashdod khomite a zing khangpi a, a thoh uleh, ngai in,
A zing nawn zing khangpi a, a thoh uleh, ngai in,
Huaiziak in, Dagon siampu hiam, Dagon in a hongpaite in leng Ashdod a Dagon inn bul tunitan in a sikngam kei uhi.
Huchi in
Huchi in Ashdod a mite’n huchibang thiltung a muh un, “Israelte Pathian bawm i kiang uah om gige kei hen, eimah leh i pathian Dagon tung ah a khutkhak a na tel mai” a chi uhi.
huaiziak in, Philistia hausa tengteng a kiang uah a samkhawm ua, “Israelte Pathian bawm bang i loh dia?” a chi uh. Amau, “Israelte Pathian bawm Gath ah puak hi hen” chi in a dawng uhi.
Huchi in Israelte Pathian bawm Gath ah a paipihta uhi.
Hichi a honghi a, a paipih lai un
Huchi in Pathian bawm Ekron ah a tun ua, Ekron khomite’n Israelte Pathian bawm eite leh i mite that din i kiang a hon tunta uh, chi in a kikou veng vung uhi.

Huchi in Philistia hausa tengteng a samkhawm ua, “Israelte Pathian bawm paimang sak unla, koute leh ka mite a hon thah louhna din a omna mun ngei ah pai nawn hen” a chi uh. Khaw pumpi ah sihna khop siatna a om a, Pathian khut lah huai khua ah a gik mahmah ngal a.
A siloute’n zangtan a veichiat ua, huai khaw kikou husa van ah a tungtou hi.
Huan,
Philistia mite’n, “

Amau, “Israelte Pathian bawm na paisak ding uleh leng a vuak in paisak hetkei un. A kiang ah tatlek kithoihna lan ngeingei un. Huchi in hihdam in na om ding uh. Huchi in bangdia a khut nou apan lakkhiat a omlou ahia chih na thei ding uh” a chi uhi.

Huchi in amau, “A kiang a ka tatlekna thillat ding bang ahia?” a chi uh. Amau, “Philistia hausate zah dangkaeng zangtan lim nga leh dangkaeng sansim lim nga; na vek ua tung leh na hausate uh tung a leng hipi lah khat ahi ngal a.

Huaiziak in, na zangtan lim uh leh na gam uh hihsetu sansim limte bawl un. Israelte Pathian thupina pia un, huchi in a khut na tung uah, na pathiante uleh na gam uh tung ah a zang sak nuam khamoh kei ding” a chi uhi.
Aigupta mite leh Pharo in lungsim a khauhsak bang un bangdia na lungtang uh khauh sak na hi ua? A lak ua thillamdang a hih in mite paisak in a pawtkhe sak uh, hilou maw?
Huaiziak in, tuin kangtalai thak sutuah unla, bawngpi nih a nawi suklai, hakkol paw ngeilou toh; huai bawngpite kangtalai ah khih unla, a noute uh amau apan in ah honpi un.
bawm la unla, kangtalai ah koih unla; tatlek thoihna dia na lat uh dangkaeng thil pen singlem ah thun in a sik ah koih unla, paisak unla, khah un.

Huchi in gamgi lampang lampi tawn in Beth-shemesh ah a pai hiam en un, a pai leh i tung ua thil hoihlou tak amah hih a na hi dia; a paikei leh ei hon gawtpa amah khut a na hi kei chih i thei ding ua, i tung ua hong omsam himhim lel ahi ding, a chi uhi.
Mite’n huchibang in a hih ua; bawngpi a nawi suklai nih a pi ua, kangtalai ah a khih ua, a noute uh bel in lam ah a khum uhi.
bawm kangtalai ah a koih ua, dangkaeng sansim lim leh zangtan lim koihna singlem toh.

Bawngpite’n Beth-shemesh lam zuan in lampi a zui vengveng ua; huchi in ham kawmkawm in lampi a zui ua, taklam ah hiam, veilam ah hiam a pial hetkei uh. Philistia hausate’n Beth-shemesh gamgi pha in a zui uhi.
Beth-shemesh khomite’n phaizang ah buh a na la ua, a daktou ua, bawm a mu ua, a kipahpih mahmah uhi.
Huai Kangtalai Beth-shemesh a mi Joshua lou ah a lut a, suangpi lian mahmah omna tak ah a khawlta hi. Kangtalai sing a ek ua, bawngpite
Levi chite’n
Huai Philistia hausa ngate’n a muh nung un, huai ni mahmah in Ekron kholam ah a pai nawnta uhi.
Philistia mite’n dangkaeng zangtan lim
Dangkaeng sansim lim ahihleh khaw tengteng kulh nei khua leh singtang lam khua leng sim vek a hausa ngate a Philistia mite khaw zah ahi.
Beth-shemesh khomite’n, hiai Pathian siangthou
Huchi in Kiriath-jearim khomite kiang ah, “Philistia mite’n
Huchi in Kiriath-jearim khua a mite a hohsuk ua,
Hichi ahi a, Kiriath-jearim a bawm a omsung sawtpi, kum sawmnih tak ahi. Huchi in Israel inkuan tengteng in
Samuel in Israel inkuan tengteng kiang ah, “Na lungtang tengteng uh toh
Huchi in Israel mite’n Baal leh Ashtaroth a koihmang ua,
Samuel in, “Israel mi tengteng Mizpah ah samkhawm vek unla,
