Huchi in Mizpah ah a paikhawm ua, tui a tawi ua,
Philistia mite’n Israel mite Mizpah ah a omkhawm uh chih a zak un, Israel mite sual din Philistia hausate a kisa tou ua, Israel mite’n huai a na zak un Philistia mite a lauta uhi.
Huchi in Israel mite’n Samuel kiang ah, “Philistia mite khut apan hon hondam dia
Samuel in belamnou nawi nelai a la a, haltum thillat in
Samuel in haltum thillat a latlai tak in Philistia mite’n Israel mite sual din a honnaih uh. Himahleh huai ni’n
Israel mite Mizpah apan a pawt ua, Philistia mite a delh ua, Bethkar nuai a tun tan un a that zel uhi.
Huchi in Samuel in suang a la a, Mizpah leh Shen kikal ah a phut a, “Hiai tan
Huchi in Philistia mite a zahlakta ua, Israel gam ah a hoh nawnta kei uh. Huchi in Samuel damsung tengteng Philistia mite’n Toupa khut in a dousak hi.

Philistia mite’n Israel mite khua a lakte uh Ekron apan Gath tan in Israel mite a penawn vek uh. A gam Israel mite’n Philistia mite khut apan a tankheta uhi. Israel mite leh Amor mite kilem in a om uhi.
Huchi in a damsung teng Samuel in Israelte vai a hawmsak hi.
Kum teng in Bethel leh Gilgal leh Mizpah a vehzel a; huai mun teng ah Israelte vai a hawmsak hi.
A in omna a hih ziak in Ramah khua ah a pai nawn zelzel hi. Huai ah Israel mite vai a hawmsak hi. Huai ah
Huan, hichi ahi a, Samuel a upata a, a tapate Israel mite tung a vaihawmmi in a bawl hi.
A ta masapen min Joel ahi a, a zom min Abijah ahi. Amaute Beer–sheba a vaihawmmite ahi uhi.
Himahleh a tate’n a ma omdan a lakei ua, sum leh pai a delh ua, golhna a la ua, dik a vaihawmna a kaikawi uhi.
Huchi in Israel mite upate tengteng a kikhawm ua, Ramah khua ah Samuel kiang ah a hoh uhi.
A kiang ah, “Ngai in, na upa mahmahta a, na tapate’n lah na omdan a lakei hial uh. Namdang tengteng bang a ka tung ua vaihawm ding kumpipa hon bawlsak in” a chi uhi.
Himahleh a kiang a, “Ka tung ua vaihawm ding kumpipa honpia in” a chih un Samuel a kipaksak kei hi. Huchi in Samuel
Samuel kiang ah, “Mite’n na kiang a, a gen tengteng uh ngaikhia in. Nang hon deihlou ahi kei ua, a tung ua kumpipa dia kei hondeih lou ahizaw uhi.
Aigupta gam apan ka pikhiak ni apan tutan a a thilhih dan tengteng uh, hon lehngatsan a pathian dangte na a hon sepsan zel uh mah bang in nang tung ah a hih uhi.
Huaiziak in, a thu uh ngaikhia in. Himahleh chitaktak in vauhilh inla, a tung ua vaihawmmi kumpipa tatdan ding kawkmuh in” a chi hi.
Samuel in

“Na tung ua vaihawmmi ding kumpipa tatdan hichibang ahi ding. Na tapate uh a la dia, amah mah ading, sakol kangtalai ading leh a sakol tungtuangmite ding in a sep ding. A khente a sakolkangtalai ma ah a tai ding uh.
A sepaih sang heutu ding leh sawmnga heutu ding a sep dia; khenkhatte a leilet ding, a buhla ding, galvante bawl ding, a kangtalai van bawl ding in a zang ding hi.
Na tanute uh gimlim bawl ding, anhuan ding leh tanghou bawl din a zang ding hi.
Na lou, na grephuan, olive huan a a hoih tata a honsut dia, a sikhate a pe ding hi.
Na haichi leh na grephuan a sawm a khat a hon laksak dia; a sikhate leh heutute a pe ding hi.
Na sikhapate, na sikhanute, na tangval hoihhoihte leh na bawngte a honsut dia, a nasem din a zang ding.
Na belamhon lak a sawm a khat a hon laksak dia; nou a sikhate na hi ding uhi.
Huai hun chiang in na tel ding uh kumpipa ziak in na kapkhe ding uh. Himahleh huai hun chiang in
Himahleh mipite’n Samuel thu a zui nuam kei uh. “Ahi kei, kumpipa i neih ngeingei ding uh ahi.
Huchi in namdang tengteng bang i honghi dia, i kumpipa’n vai a hon hawmsak dia, i namte pi in galte a hon doupih ding” a chi uh.
Samuel in mipite thugen tengteng a za a,
Samuel kiang ah, a thu uh la inla, kumpipa bawlsak in, a chi hi. Samuel in Israel mite kiang ah, “Michih noumau khua chiat ah paita un,” a chi hi.
Huan, Benjamin gam a Benjamin suan mi khat mi hat leh hangsan mahmah a om a, a min Kish ahi. Huai mi Abiel tapa ahi a, huai mi Zeror tapa ahi a, huai mi Bekorath tapa ahi a, huai mi Aphia tapa ahi.
Aman tapa khat a nei a, a min Saul ahi. Tangval deihhuai tak ahi a, Israel mite lak ah amah sang a deihhuai himhim a omkei. Kuamah a liangzang khup leng a omkei uhi.
Saul pa Kish sabiltungte a mang hi. Kish in a tapa Saul kiang ah, “Thou inla, sikha khat pi inla sabiltungte va zong dihve” a chi hi.

Huchi in Ephraim tanggam ah a vak a, Shalisha gam ah a vak hi. Himahleh a mu kei uh. Huchi in Shalim gam ah a vak ua, huai ah leng a mu kei uh. Benjamin mite gam ah a vaknawn ua, himahleh a mu tuankei uhi.
Zuph gam a tun un Saul in a kiang a om a sikha kiang ah, “Kisa dih, i pai nawn mai ding, huchih kei leh ka pa’n sabiltungte awlmoh nawnlou in ei a hon ngaihtuah zaw kha ding” a chi hi.

Aman a kiang ah, “Ngai in, hiai khua ah Pathian mi a om a, mi zahtakhuai tak ahi. A gen peuhmah a hongtung ngeingei nak hi. Kisa in, huai ah i hoh ding, i hohna lampi a hon hilhthei zenzen khak leh” a chi hi.

Huchi in Saul in a sikha kiang ah, “Ahi na a, ngai dih, hoh hita le hang, huai mi ading bang i tawi dia? I bawm ah lah tanghou a om nawn kei. Pathian mi kipahman tawi ding a om hetkei hi. Bang i nei a eita?” a chi hi.
Sikha in Saul a dawng nawn a, “Ngai in, dangka sekel mun li a khen, mun khat ka tawilai hi. Hiai i hohna ding a honhilh man din Pathian mi ka pe ding” a chi hi.
Tuma siah Israelte lak a min Pathian dot a ut leh, “Kisa dih, mutheipa kiang ah i hoh ding, a chi nak uh. Tulai a zawlnei a chih uh tuma lam in mutheipa a chi uhi.
Huchi in Saul in a sikha kiang ah, “Hoih geih e, va hoh peuhmah ni,” a chi hi. Huchi in Pathian mi omna khua ah a hohta uhi.
Khozotna lampi a a paitouh lai un nungak tuitawi dia hong kuante a mu ua, a kiang uah, “Hiai ah mutheipa a om hia?” a chi uhi.
Amau a dawng ua, “Om mah e, ngai in, na ma uah a pai, kin un, tuni in khua ah a na hoh hi. Tuni in munsang ah mite a kithoih uhi.

Khua a na luttouh tak un mun sang a an ne dia a hoh ma in na va mungal ding uh. Kithoihna vualzawlpa ding a hih ziak in a tun mateng mipi’n an a nekei ding uh. Huaikhit chiang in a misapte un an a ne zel uhi. Huaiziak in hohtou meng unla, na va mu pah ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in, khua ah a hohtou uh. Khua a lut uleh, ngai in, Samuel munsang a hoh ding in amau a kituahpih hi.
Saul hong ma ni khat in Samuel kiang ah

“Zingchiang in hichi hun in Benjamin gam apan na kiang ah mi khat k’on hohsak dia, ka mi Israelte tung a heutu ding in thau na nilh ding ahi. Aman Philistia mite khut apan ka mite a hondam ding. A kikou husa uh ka kiang a hongtun tak ziak in ka mite zaw ka limsak ahi” a chi hi.
Samuel in Saul a muh in
Huchi in kulh kongpi ah Saul in Samuel a va naih a, “Mutheipa inn koilai a om ahia, honhilh dihve” a chi hi.

Samuel in Saul a dawng a, “Kei huai mutheipa ka hi. Ka ma ah mun sang lam zuan in pai inla, tuni in ka kiang ah an nane ding hi. Zingchiang zingsang in k’on paisak ding. Na lungtang a om tengteng leng k’on hilh ding.
Ni thum paita a mang na sabiltung thu lunghimawh ken. Muh ahita uh. Israelte lunggulh kua tung ah ahia a om? Nang leh na pa inn a mi tengteng tung ah ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Saul in a dawng a, “Israel nam lak a neupen, Benjamin nam ka hi kei maw? Ka inkuan leng Benjamin inkuan tengteng lak a neupen ahi kei maw? Bangchidan a hichidan ka kiang a gen na hia?” a chi hi.
Samuel in Saul leh a sikha a pi a, mikhual indan ah a pilut a, a sap uh, mi sawmthum lak ah mun zahtakhuai ah a tusak hi.
Samuel in anhuan mi kiang ah, “Na kiang a koihtuam ding ka chih, tantuan k’on piakpen honla dih” a chi hi.

Huchi in anhuan mi in a phei leh a tung a om a hontawi a, Saul ma ah a lui hi. Samuel in, “En dih, ka na koihtuam, um inla ne in. A hun sehsa adia hiai mite ka chialkhawm lai a k’on sehsak him ahi, ka na chita ngal a” a chi hi.
Huchi in huai ni’n Saul in Samuel toh Ankuang a umkhawm uhi.
Munsang apan khua a hong paisuk un intung ah Saul in Samuel a houpih hi.
Zing khangpi in a thou a; nisuah kuan in Samuel in intung a om Saul a sam hi. “Thou in, k’on paisakta ding” a chi hi. Huchi in a nih un a paikhia ua, Saul leh Samuel a pawtta uh.
Khaw nawl a tunsuk un Samuel in Saul kiang ah, “Sikhapa i malam ah paisak inla, amah a paita a, nang bel khawl tadih in, Pathian thu k’on hilh ding” a chi hi.
Huaikhit in Samuel in sathau bawm a lakhia a, a lu ah asung a, a tawp a, “

Tuni a n’on nutsiat chiang in Zelzah ah Benjamin gamgi a Rakil han kiang ah mi nih na mu dia; amau na kiang ah, ‘Na sabiltung zonte a muta uh. Ngai in, na pa’n sabiltungte lungkhampih nawnlou in, nang a hon lungkhampihta hi. Ka tapa adin bang ka hihdia, chichi ahi, a chi ding uh’.

Huai apan pai zel inla, Tabor tawsaw na vatung dia, huai ah mi thum Bethel a Pathian kiang a hohtou dingte’n hon na kituahpih ding uh. Khat in kelnou a pom dia, khat in tanghoupek khal thum a tawi dia, khat in uain thawl a tawi ding hi.
Chibai a honbuk ding ua, tanghoupek khal nih a honpe ding ua; huai na la ding ahi.

Huaikhit in Philistia sepaihte omna Pathian tang na va tung ding. Hichi ahi ding a, huai khua na va tun chiang in zawlnei pawl khat a ma ua pekgingte, khuangtate, tamngaite leh kaihgingte tawi mi pawl toh munsang apan hong paikhesuk na tuak dia, amaute’n thu a gen ding uhi.
Kha nakpitak in na tung ah a hongtung ding a, nang leng amau toh thu na gen dia, huchi in mituam na suak ding hi.
‘Hiai chiamtehnate na tung a a hongtun chiang in, thil hongom in a zil dungzui in na hih ding ahi. Pathian lah na kiang ah a om ngal a.

Kei ma in Gilgal ah hohsuk in. Ngai in, keileng haltum thillatte leh lemna kithoihnate lan din na kiang ah ka hongsuk ding’. Na kiang a ka hong a, na hih ding k’on hilh ma ni sagih na tam ding” a chi hi.
Huchibang a hong hingei a, Samuel paisan dia a nungngat tak in Pathian in lungtang dang a peta hi. Huai chiamtehna tengteng huai ni’n a hongtung vek hi.
Huchi in tang a hongtun uleh, ngai in, zawlneite’n a na kituahpih uh. A tung ah

Hichi ahi a, tuma siaha amah a na theisate’n zawlneite thugenna ah a telsam chih a theih un, a kihou ua, “Kish tapa tung a thil hongom bangchidan ahita a? Saul leng zawlneite lak a telsamta ahi maw?” a kichi uhi.
A omna khua ua mi khat in a dawng a, “A pa uh kua ahi tuan a ahia?” a chi hi. Huchi in Saul leng zawlnei ahi samta maw? chih paunak a hong hita hi.
A thugen khit in munsang a tungta hi.
Saul pangak in a kiang ah leh a sikha kiang ah, “Kaw hoh na hi ua?” a chi hi. Aman “Sabiltung zong ka hi uh. Ka muh zohlouh ziak un Samuel kiang ah ka vahoh uh” a chi hi.
Saul pangak in, “Samuel in na kiang ua bang ahia a gen honhilh dih” a chi hi.
Saul in a pangak kiang ah, “Sabengtungte a muta uh chih a honhilh hi” a chi hi. Himahleh lalgam thu Samuel in a genpen a hilh kei hi.
Huchi in Samuel in mipite Mizpah ah
Huai ah Israel suante kiang ah, “

Himahleh tuni in na mangbatna tengteng uleh na gimthuakna tengteng ua kipan nou hon humbitpa na Pathian uh na deihkei uh. A kiang ah, Ahi kei, kumpipa hon bawlsak in, na chi uh. Huaiziak in, tuin a nam a nam leh a chi a chi in
Huchi a Samuel in Israel chi tengteng a hong kilat naisak tak in Benjamin chitel a hong hita.
Benjamin chite bel a inkuan kuan in a hong kilak ua, Matri mite inkuan tel a honghi a, Kish tapa Saul tel a hong hita hi. Amah a zon uh leh a muzou kei uh.
huaiziak in,
Huchi in a tai ua, a va pikhia uh. Mipi lak a adin leh mi lak ah a sangpen a, kuamah a liangzang khengzou a omkei uhi.
Samuel in mi tengteng kiang ah, “
Mite a kikou ua, “Pathian in kumpipa hondam hen” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Samuel in mipite lalgam omdan ding a hilh hi. Laibu ah a gelh a,
Saul leng Gibeah khua a a in ah a pai sam hi. Pathian in a lungtang uh a khoih mihangsante leng amah toh a paikhawm uhi.
Himahleh Belial tapate’n, “Hiai mi’n bangchi’n a hon hondam thei mahmah dia?” chi in amah a ngaineu ua, thilpiak a hong pekei uh. Himahleh amah bel a daidide hi.
Huchi in Ammon mi Nahash a hong kisa a, Jabesh-gilead sual tum in a vagiah khum hi. Jabesh mi tengteng in Nahash kiang ah, kou toh thukhun bawl in, huchi in nang na ka sem ding uh, a chi uh.
Ammon mi Nahash in a kiang uah, hichibang in ahi nou toh thu ka khun ding. Na mit taklam tengteng uh khelkhiak vek ahi dia; huai Israel mi tengteng minsiatna dia koih ahi ding, a chi hi.

Jabesh khua upate’n a kiang ah, “Israel gam tengteng a thupawmite ka sawl theihna ding un ni sagih sung hon hungaih in. Hon hondam ding kuamah a omkei leh na kiang ah ka hong paikhe ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in huai thupawmite Saul omna khua Gibeah a hongtung uh. Mite bil a zak in huai thute a gen ua; mite aw suah in a kap uhi.
Ngai in, lou apan Saul bawng hawl in a hongpai hi. Saul in “Bang a chi ua ahia mite a kah uh?” a chi hi. Jabesh khua a mite thugen a hilh uhi.
Huai thu a zaktak in Saul tung ah Pathian Kha a hongtung a nakpitak in a hehta hi.
Huchi in bawngtal nih a la a, a satnen vek hi. Israel gam tengteng ah thupawmite a hawmsak a, “Kuapeuh Saul leh Samuel zui nuamlou peuhmah hiai bawngtal bang a hih ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in mipite’n
Bezek ah amaute a sim a, Israel mite nuai thum ahi uh. Judah mite sing thum ahi uhi.

A hongpai thupawmite kiang ah, “Jabesh-gilead mite kiang ah, zingchiang in nisat sanlaitak mah in hotkhiak na hi ding uh va chi un” a chi hi. Thupawmite a vahoh ua, Jabesh mite a hilh ua, huchi in a kipak mahmah uhi.
Huchi in Jabesh mite’n “Zingchiang in na kiang uah ka hongpawt khe ding ua, ka tung uah na utut un hihmai un” a chi uhi.

Hichi a honghi a, a zing in Saul in mipite pawl thum in a koih a, zing ven hunlaitakin a giahmun uah a lut uh. Ammon mite sun nisat sanlai tan in a that uhi. Hichi ahi a, a thahvalte a dalhzak vek ua, nih a omkhawm himhim leng a omkei uhi.
Mipite’n Samuel kiang ah, “Kuate ahia, Saul in i tung uah vai a hawm tel ding maw chi? Huai mite honpi in ka that ding uh” a chi uhi.
Saul in, “Tuni chitchiat in zaw kuamah that kei un. Tuni in
Huchi in Samuel in mipite kiang ah, “Kisa dih uh, Gilgal ah i hoh ding ua, huai ah lalgam i thaksak nawn ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in mite tengteng Gilgal ah a hohta uh. Saul Gilgal ah
Huan, Samuel in Israel mi tengteng kiang ah, “Ngai dih ua, ka kiang a na thugen tengteng uh ngaikhia in, na tung uah kumpipa ka bawlta hi.
Tuin, ngai dih ua, kumpipa in na ma uh a kai hi. Kei zaw tek in ka lu leng a kangta hi. Ngai dih ua, ka tapate na kiang uah a om uh. Ka naupan apan tutan na ma uh k’on pi hi.
Hiai ah ka om hi.
Amau, “n’on khem ngeikei. N’on hih genthei ngei sam kei. Kuamah khut apan lak tuak louh leng na la ngeikei” a chi uh.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ka khut ah bangmah kilawmlou na mu kei uh, chih tuni in
Samuel in mite kiang ah, “Mosi leh Aron seppa leh Aigupta apan na pipute uh pikhepa
Huchi in ding kinken unla,
Aigupta gam a Jakob a lut nung in, na pipute un
Himahleh,
Jerubbaal, Bendan, Jephthah leh Samuel a sawl a, khatlam khatlam a na melmate uh khut apan a hon hunkhia hi. Huchi in bittak in na tengta uhi.
Ammon suante kumpipa Nahash nou dou din a hong kuan chih na theihtak un, ka kiang ah, ‘Ahi kei, kumpi in ka tung uah vaihawm hen’ na chi uh.
Huchi in na kumpipa tel uleh nget uh en dih uh,
laudan na siam ua, a nna nasep ua, a aw na zuih ua,
Himahleh,
Huchi in ding kinken unla,
Tuni in huit buh a la uh ahi kei maw? ‘Van gingsak ding leh vuah zusak din
Huchi in Samuel in
Mi tengteng in Samuel kiang ah, “Ka sihlouhna ding un,
Samuel in mite kiang ah, “Lau kei un, hiai thil gilou tak na hihta uhi. Himahleh
Lampial kei un. Manna bei thilte leh nou hon hunkhe theiloute zuikei un; amaute bangmahlou ahi ngal ua.
A min thupitak ziak in
Huai phet leng ahi kei a, nou adia thum tawp in
laudan siam photphot un. Na lungtang tengteng un chihtak tak in amah na sem unla; nou adia a thilhih thupitakte ngaihtuah un.
Himahleh gilou tak a thil na hihlai lai uleh nou leh na kumpipa uh na mangthang ding uh” a chi hi.
Saul kum sawmthum a hih in vaihawm apan a; Israelte tung ah kum nih vai a hawm hi.

Saul in Israelte lak ah mi sang thum a tel hi. Huai teng lak a sang nih Mikmash ah leh Bethel tang ah Saul kiang ah a om uh. Sang khat Benjamin gam a Gibeah ah Jonathan kiang ah a om uh. A dangteng a puanin uah a paisak vek hi.
Jonathan in Gibeah a om Philistia galvil sepaihte a vasual hi. Huai Philistia mite’n a naza uh. Huchi in Saul in, “Hebru mite’n naza uhen” chi in a gam tengteng ah pengkul a mutsak hi.
Israel tengteng in, Saul in Philistia galvil sepaihte a sual chih leh Israelte’n leng Philistia mite huat in a om uh chih thute a na zata uh. Huchi in mite Saul kiang ah Gilgal ah a ki kaikhawm uhi.

Philistia mite Israelte sual din a ki kaikhawm uhi. Kangtalai sing thum, sakol tungtuangmi sang guk, mihing tuipi piau a piaunel zah mahmah a tam ahi uh. Huchi in a kuantou ua, Bethaven suahlam pang ah Mikmash ah panmun a khoh uhi.
Israel mite’n umbit in a om uh, chih a kitheih un, mite lah a lunghimawh mahmahta ua, mite kawkhuk ah, lounok ah, suangpi pang ah, kulh ah leikawhawm ah a kibuta uhi.
Hebru mi khenkhatte Jordan gal ah Gad leh Gilead gam ah a tai uh.
Saul bel Gilgal ah a om lailai a, mite’n ling kawmkawm in amah a zui uhi.
Samuel hunseh bang in ni sagih a tam hi. Himahleh Samuel lah Gilgal ah a hongpai kei hi. Huchi in mite’n a taizak santa uhi.
Saul in, “Haltum thillat ding leh lemna thillat dingte hiai ah ka kiang ah honla un” a chi hi. Huchi in haltum thillat a lan hi.
Hichi ahi a, haltum thillat a lankhin lel a, ngai in, Samuel a hongtung hi. Amah mu din Saul a kuan hi. Samuel in, “Bang na hih na hia?” a chi hi.
Saul in, “Mite’n a hon paimangsan khin ua, nang lah niseh ni’n na hongtungta kei hi. Philistia mite lah Mikmash ah a kikaikhawm uh chih ka thei hi.
Huaiziak in, ‘Philistia mite’n Gilgal ah hon sualdek dek uhi.
Samuel in Saul kiang ah, “Na thilhih a haihuai mahmah hi.
Himahleh na lalna a mongta ding.
Samuel a thou a, Gilgal apan Benjamin gam a Gibeah ah a hoh touta hi. Saul in a kiang a mi omte a sim a, za guk tak ahi uh.
Saul leh a tapa Jonathan leh a kiang ua mi omte Benjamin gam a Gibeah ah a om uh. Himahleh Philistia mite’n Mikmash ah panmun a khoh uhi.
Lokmite Philistia mite panmun apan pawl thum a hong kuan uh. Pawl khat in Shual gam a Ophrah lam zuan lampi a zui uh.
Pawl khat in Bethhoron lam zuan lampi a zui ua, pawl dang in gamdai zul Zeboim guam lam zuan gamgi lampi a zui uhi.
Philistia mite’n, “Hebru mite’n namsau hiam, tei hiam a bawl kha zenzen ding uh” a chih ziak un Israel gam pumpi ah siksekmi a kimu kei hi.
Himahleh Israel mi tengteng, michih a leilehna, a suanggal, a heipi, a tupi tat hiam din, Philistiate kiang ah a hohsuk zel uhi.
Himahleh tupite, suanggalte, sikkhutte leh heipite tat hiamna dia sikhat leh chiang mukzumte bawlna ding a nei uhi.
Huchi in hichi ahi a, a kidou ni un Saul leh Jonathan kiang a om mite’n namsau hiam, tei hiam a neikei uh. Saul leh a tapa Jonathan in bel a nei uhi.
Philistia galvil sepaihte Mikmash kuam ah a paikheta uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, ni khat Saul tapa Jonathan in a galvan tawipa tangval kiang ah, “Kisa dih, gal langkhat Philistia mi galvil sepaihte omna ah i va hoh ding” a chi hi. Himahleh a pa a hilh kei hi.
Saul bel Gibeah gam tawp lampek a Migron a theibuhfai kung nuai ah a om hi. A kiang a om mite za guk ahi uh.
Shiloh a
Jonathan in Philistia mi galvil sepaihte omna a hoh a tupna guam leh guam kikal ah a langtuak tuak ah suangpi sangtak a om hi. A khat min Bozez ahi a, a khat min Seneh ahi.
Suangpi sang khatpen Mikmash zawn mallam a om ahi a, a dang khat pen Gebeah zawn simlam a om ahi.
Jonathan in a galvan tawipa tangval kiang ah, “Kisa dih, zeksumlouh sepaihte omna ah i va hoh ding.
A galvan tawipan a kiang ah, “Na lungsim a om bangtak in hih in. Ngai in, na lungsim bang geih ka lungsim ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Jonathan in, “Kisa in, a kiang uah i va hoh galkah dia, i va kimu sak ding.
I kiang a, “Na kiang ua ka hong matan uh na om un, a honchih uleh i mun ah i ding kinken dia, a kiang uah i hohtou kei ding.
Ka kiang lam uah hongtou un, a chih uleh bel i hohtou dia,
A nih un Philistia mi galvil sepaihte a va kimusak uhi. Philistiate’n “En dih uh, Hebru mite a bukna leihawm apan a hong paikhia uh,” a chi uhi.
Galvil sepaihte omna a mite’n Jonathan leh a galvan tawipa, “Hongtou unla, thil banghiam k’on ensak ding uh,” chi in a na sam uhi.
Jonathan in a galvan tawipa kiang ah, “Hon zuitou dih.
Jonathan a khut leh khe toh pangin a kaltou a, a galvan tawipan a zui hi. Amau bel Jonathan ma ah a puk ua, a ma nung in a galvan tawipan amaute a that hi.
Jonathan leh a galvan tawipan a thah masak pen uh mi sawmnih vel, lou ching khat, bawngtal nih leilehna chia sung ahi.
Giahmun leh gamlak a mipi tengteng a ling ua; galvil sepaihte leh lokmite leng a lingsam uh. Huan zin a hongling a; huchi in nakpitak a linna a om hi.
Benjamin gam Gibeah Saul galvil mite’n a en vialvial uhi. Ngai in, mipite zul in a zulkhe zungzung ua, khatlam khatlam ah a kiphu muimui uhi.
Huchi in Saul in a kiang a mipi omte kiang ah, “Tuin kisim unla, kuate ahia kimlou hong ki en dih ua” a chi hi. A hong kisim uh leh ngai in, Jonathan leh a galvan tawipa a na omta kei uhi.
Saul in Ahijah kiang ah, “Pathian bawm vala dih” a chi hi. Huailai in Pathian bawm Israel suante kiang a om hi.
Hichi ahi a, Saul in siampu a houpih laitak in Philistia mite giahmun lam a thawmging a ngaih semsem hi. Saul in siampu kiang ah, “Na khut kaikik in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Saul leh a kiang a mipi om tengteng a paikhawm ua, kidouna ah a hohta uh. Ngai in, amau leh amau namsau in a na kisattuah ua, huchi in a pumbuai uhi.
Hiai ban ah tuma lam a Hebru mite huai gam kim apan Philistiate giahmun a amau toh vapaitoute leng Saul leh Jonathan kiang ah om in Israel mite lam ah a hong pang nawnta uhi.
Huchi mah bang in Ephraim tanggam a Israelmi kibu tengteng in Philistia mite a taimang uh chih a naza ua, amau leng kidouna a pangsam in a delhzui uhi.
Huchi in huai ni’n

Huai ni’n Israel mite a mangbang uh. Saul in, “Ka melmate tung a phu ka lakna dia nitaklam a hih masiah kuapeuh in an a nek leh hamsia thuak hen” a chih ziak in. Huchi in kuamah in an himhim a chiam kei uhi.
Mipi tengteng gamnuai a vatung ua, lei ah khuaizu a na om hi.
Mipite gamnuai a vatun un, ngai in, khuaizu a na takkhia hi. Himahleh mipite’n hamsia a lauh ziak un kuamah in khut a sawkin a chiam ngamkei uhi;
Himahleh Jonathan in apan mipite hamsiaa a vau lam theilou in; a chiang mongin khuaikhak sun in a neta a, huchi in a mithah a hongchiangta hi.
Mipi lak a mi khat in a houpih a, “Na pa’n zaw mipite tuni a an ne peuhmah hamsethuak in om hen” chi in a vau bikbek hi. Huchi in mipite a bah uhi, a chi hi.
Jonathan in, “Ka pa’n mite buaisak lel eive. Enta unla, khuaizu tawmchik ka chep ziak lel a ka mit a hongvak tak dan.
Mipite’n gallak thil a muh peuhpeuh uh tuni in a utut uh ne thei le uh vakzaw na tel in chia! Huaiziak in, Philistiate tamsem thahlouh loh i hi ve ua” a chi hi.
Huai ni’n Mikmash apan Aijalon tan in Philistia mite a dou uh. Huchi in mipite a bah mahmah uhi.
Mipite’n a gallak thil uh a boh in a boh uh. Belamte, bawngtalte leh bawngnoute a man ua, lei ah a that ua, mipite’n a sisan toh a neta uhi.
“Ngai in, mipite’n sisan toh ne in
Saul in, “Mipi lak ah vakzak vek unla, a kiang uah, michih in a bawng honkai hen. Michih in a belam honkai hen. Hiai ah hong gou in ne hen. A sisan toh ne a
Saul in

Saul in, “Zanchiang in Philistia mite vadou unla, zing khovak tan in i sual ding uh. Kuamah i hawikei ding uh” a chi hi. Amau, “Hoih nasak peuhmah hih in” a chi uh. Siampu in ahihleh “Pathian naih ni” a chi hi.
Saul in Pathian a dong a, “Philistia mite ka vasual diam? Israelte khut ah amaute na pe diam?” a chi hi. Himahleh huai nin a dawng kei.
Saul in, “Nou mipi heutu tengteng hongnai dih ua. Tuni in a koipen ah ahia i khelh uh theihkhiak tum dih uh.
Israelte hondam zelpa
Israel tengteng kiang ah, “Noute a tuam in omkhawm unla, kei leh ka tapa Jonathan a tuam in ka omkhawm ding uh” a chi hi. Mipite’n Saul kiang ah, “Hoih nasak bang in hih in” a chi uhi.
Saul in
Saul in, “Kei leh ka tapa kikal ah aisan un,” a chi hi. Huchi in Jonathan tung ah a puk hi.
Saul in Jonathan kiang ah, “Bang ahia na hih honhilh in” a chi hi. Jonathan in a hilh a, “Ka chiang tawi mong in khuaizu neuchik ka na chiam hi. Ngai in, ka sih ding mah ahi” a chi hi.
Saul in, “Pathian in a hihhih in hih mai hen. Huai sang a thupizaw in leng. Jonathan, na si ngeingei ding ahi” a chi hi.
Mipite’n Saul kiang ah, “Israelte lak a hiai hotdamna thupi mahmah hihpa Jonathan a si dia hia? Si lou hial ding.
Saul in Philistia mite a delhlai a kiksanta a, Philistia mite amau om mun ah a paita uhi.
Saul in Israelte tung ah vaihawmna a la a, a ning teng ah a melmate, Moab, Ammon suante, Edom, Zobah kumpipate leh Philistia mite a dou a; a kiheina peuh ah a vualzou zel hi.
Hangsantak in gal a dou a, Amalekte a zou a, a lokmite khut apan Israelte a honkhia hi.
Saul tapate bel Jonathan, Jishul leh Malkishua ahi ua, a tanu nihte min hiaite ahi; a upa zaw min Merab ahi a, a naupang zaw min Mikal ahi.
Saul zi min Ahinoam ahi a, amah Ahimaaz tanu ahi. A sepaih heutu min Abner ahi a, amah Saul pangak Ner tapa ahi.
Kish bel Saul pa ahi a. Abner pa Nar bel Abiel tapa ahi.
Saul damsung teng in Philistia mite toh nakpitak in a kidou uhi. Saul in mi hat leh hangsan a muh peuhmah a nuai a sem din a lazel hi.
Huan, Samuel in Saul kiang ah, “
Sepaihte

Amalekte dou din kuan inla, a thilneih tengteng uh hawi himhim neilou in hihmang vek in. Numei leh pasal, naungek leh nawi nelai, bawngtal leh belam, sangawngsau leh sabiltung tan in that vek in, a chi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Samuel in mipite a samkhawm a, Telaim khua ah amaute a sim a, sepaih nuai nih leh Judah mi sing khat ahi uh.
Saul Amalekte khua a tungsuk a, guam ah a na buk hi.

Saul in Kente kiang ah, “Hongpawt unla, Amalekte apan kihui khia un. Huchilou in zaw, ka honthat tel kha ding. Nou zaw Israel suan tengteng Aigupta apan a hongpawt khiak lai un nana hehpih ua” a chi hi. Huchi in Kente Amalek mite lak apan a pawtkhia uhi.
Saul in Amalek mite Havilah apan Aigupta gam gei a Shur tan in a dou hi.
Amalek mite kumpipa Agag a hingmata, mipi tengteng namsau in a satlum vek hi.
Himahleh Saul leh mipite’n Agag a hawi ua, belam leh bawngtal hoihhoih, a thauthau, belamnoute, a hoih tengteng a that nuam kei uh. A hoihlou leh a deihlouh peuhmah uh bel a thatvek uhi.
“Saul kumpipa dia ka seh ka kisik hi. Honzui lai hon ki nungngatsan in ka thupiak bang in a hih ngalkei a” a chi hi. Hiai in Samuel a hehsak a, zankhua in
Saul mu din Samuel zing khangpi in a thou a, Karmel ah Saul a hoh hi. Ngai in, huai ah amah theihgigena suang a phut a, a kiknawn a, a pai zel a, Gilgal ah a paisukta, chih Samuel hilh in a om hi.
Saul kiang Samuel a hongtung a, a kiang ah, “
Samuel in, “Tua belam ham ka bil a honglut leh bawng ham ka zakte bangchidan ahi dia le?” a chi hi.
Saul in, “Amalek mite a hon laksak uh ahi.
Samuel in Saul kiang ah, “Daiin,
Aman a kiang ah, “Gen dihve” a chi hi.
Samuel in, “Nang ngaih in mi neuchik himah lechin leng, Israel nam heutu dia bawl na hi kei maw?
nang a hon sawlkhia a, Kuan inla, mikhialte, Amalek mite thatvek inla, a manthat sipsip masiah uh dou zel in, a honchi hi.
Bangdia
Saul in Samuel kiang ah, “E,
Himahleh mipite’n gallak thil belam leh bawngtal hihman ding lak ah a hoihhoih Gilgal khua a
Samuel in,
Ngai in, kithoihna sang in thuman a hoihzaw a,
belamtal thau sang in a thuman a hoihzaw hi.
Helna zaw aisan khelhna toh a kibang a, engtatna zaw
milim biakna toh a kikim hi.
Aman leng kumpipa din nang a hon nialta hi” a chi hi.
Saul in Samuel kiang ah, mipite lau a, a thu uh ka manna lam ah
Huaiziak in, tuin ka khelhna ngaidam inla,
Samuel in Saul kiang ah, “
Huchi in Samuel paidia a kihei leh a puan-mong ah a len a, a kekta hi.
Huchi in Samuel in a kiang ah, “Tuni apan
Israelte thagui a zuaukei dia, a kisik sam kei ding. Mihing bang a kisik nawn themthum mi ahi ngal kei hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in aman, “Ka na khialta hi. Himahleh ka mite upate leh Israelte ma a hon zahtak din k’on ngen hi.
Huchi in Samuel in Saul a paipihta a, Saul in
Samuel in, “Amalek mite kumpipa Agag ka kiang ah honpi un” a chi hi. Samuel kiang ah ling kawm in Agag a vahoh hi. Agag in sihna mulkimhuai in hon paikhengta eive, a chi hi.
Samuel in, “Na namsau in numeite ta neilou dia a bawl bang in na nu leng numei lak a ta neilou mi ahi ding” a chi hi. Huchi in Samuel in Agag Gilgal khua ah
Huchi in Samuel Ramah khua ah a pai a; Saul bel a inn ah Saul omna khua Gibeah ah a paitouta hi.
Huchi in Samuel in a sih ni pha in Saul a mu nawnta kei hi. Samuel bel Saul ziak in a lungkham hi. Israelte kumpipa dia Saul a na tel ziak in
Huan
Samuel in, “Bangchi’n ka kuan thei dia? Saul in a naza leh a honthat ding” a chi hi.
Kithoihna ah Jesse sam inla, na hih ding k’on hilh ding. A min k’on hilh dingpa sathau hon nilhsak in” a chi hi.
Samuel in
Hichi ahi a, a hongpai un Eliab a na en a, “
Himahleh
Jesse in Abinadab a sam a, Samuel ma ah a paisak hi. Aman, “Hiai leng
Jesse in Shammah a va paisak nawn hi. Aman, “Hiai leng
Huchi in Jesse in a tapa sagihte Samuel ma ah a paisak nawn hi. Samuel in Jesse kiang ah, “
Samuel in Jesse kiang ah, “Hiai ah na tate a omkim vek uhia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “A naupangpen a omlai hi. Ngai in, belam a ching hi” a chi hi.
Samuel in Jesse kiang ah, “Va samsak dihve; a hongtun masiah i tu kei ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in a va samsak a, amah a honpi ua. Amah bel san thiuh theuh, mithah kilawm leh melhoih tak ahi. “
Samuel in sathau bawm ki a la a, a unaute lak ah amah sathau a nilh hi.
Himahleh,
Saul sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Ngai in, Pathian sawl dawi in nang a hon hihbuai hi.
Ka toupa un na ma a om na sikhate kaihging tumsiam tak mizon thu honpe dihve. Pathian sawl dawi in a honmat chiang in a tum dia, na hoih mai ding” a chi uhi.
Saul in a sikhate kiang ah, “Tumsiam tak mi hon zonsak unla, ka kiang ah honpi un” a chi hi.
A sikhate lak a khat in a dawng a, a kiang ah, “Ngai dih, Bethlehem mi Jesse tapa khat ka muta a, huai mi tumsiam tak, mi hangsan tak, kidou mi, thugen siam, melhoih tak ahi a, a kiang ah
Saul in Jesse kiang ah mi a sawl a, “Na tapa David belamchinga om ka kiang ah hon hohsak in” a chi hi.
Jesse in sabiltung, tanghou leh uain thawl khat leh kelnou a la a, Saul piak din a tapa David a pawsak hi.
Saul kiang ah David a vatung a, a ma ah a vading hi. Aman a na it mahmah a, a galvan tawipa in a pangsak hi.
Saul in Jesse kiang ah, “David ka kiang ah om hen, ka mit a tung mahmah hi” chi a hilh din mi sawl hi.
Hichi ahi a Pathian sawl dawi Saul tung a a hongom chiang in David in kaihging a la a, a tumzel hi. Huchi in Saul a honghalh a, a hoih a; dawi in a pawtsan hi.
Huan, Philistia mite’n kidou din a sepaihte uh a kaikhawm ua, Judah gamsung Soko khua ah a kikhawm uhi. Ephes Dammim mun ah Soko khua leh Azekah khaw kikal ah panmun a khoh uhi.
Saul leh Israel mite a kikhawm ua, Ela guam ah panmun a khoh uh. Philistia mite na dal din a kiphalh uhi.
Philistia mite tang pang ah a om ua, Israel mite bel a langkhat tang pang ah a om ua, a kikal uah guam a om hi.
Philistia mite panmun apan a mi hat uh, a min Goliath, Gath khaw mi, tong guk leh khap khat a sang a hong pawtkhia hi.
Dal lukhu a khu a, awmphaw a silh a; a awmphaw gikdan dal sekel sang nga ahi.
A ngal ah dal ngalphaw a bun a, a nungzang ah dal teita a kuah hi.
A tei peu siamkol bang ahi a; a tei lu bel sik sekel za guk a gik ahi. A phaw pawpa a ma ah a pai hi.
A ding a, Israel sepaihte a sam a, a kiang uah, Bangdia kidou dia hong kiphalh na hi ua? Kei Philistia mi, nou Saul sikha na hi kei uh maw? Mi kitel unla ka kiang ah hong paisuk hen.
A hon sual a a honthah leh na sikha un ka om ding uh. Himahleh ken ka zoh a ka thah leh ka sikha un na om ding ua, ka na uh na sem ding uh, a chi hi.
Philistia mi in, Tuni in Israel sepaihte ka tou a, mi khat hon kuansak unla ka na kisual ding uh, a chi hi.
Saul leh Israel tengteng in huai Philistia mi thugente a zak un, a lunglel ua, lauh petmah in a lauta uh.
David Jesse tapa ahi a, amah bel Judah gam a Bethlehem, Ephrath mi ahi a, tapa giat a nei hi. Amah Saul hunlai in tektak ahi khin a, tektak a ngaih ahi khinta hi.
Jesse tapa upa zaw thum in kidouna ah Saul a zui uhi. A tapa thum kidouna a hohte min a upapen Eliab, a zom Abinadab, a thumna Shammah ahi.
David a naupangpen ahi a, a u thumte’n Saul a zui uhi.
David, Bethlehem ah a pa belam kem in Saul kiang apan a vahoh hi.
Philistia mi in zingsang leh nitak teng in a va naihzel a, ni sawmli sung a va kitaklang zel hi.
Jesse in a tapa David kiang ah, “Vaimim kan ephah khat leh hiai tanghou beu sawm pua inla, na unaute kiang ah a giahmun uah va hohpih pah in.
Bawngnawi dat khal sawm a pawl ua sang heutupa adin puak inla; na unaute bangchi’n a om ua va en inla, a tanchin uh theihna banghiam hon pua in” a chi hi.
Saul leh amau leh Israel mi tengteng Philistia mite dou din Elah guam ah a om uhi.

David zingkhang in a thou a, belamte chingmi khat a kemsak hi. Jesse in thu a piak dungzui in a pua a, a kuanta hi. Kidouna mun a pawtkhe lel sepaihte kidou dia a kikou zuazua laitak un amah kangtalai omna mun a va tung hi.
Israelte leh Philistia mite kidou din a na kikhung ua, sepaih leh sepaih a na ki galsai uhi.
David in a kemmi khut ah a van a koih a, sepaihte kiang lam ah a vatai a, a ute chibai a vabuk hi.

Amaute a houpih laitak in ngai in, a mi hat uh Gath khua a Philistia mi a min Goliath Philistia mite sepaih pawl lak apan a hong paisuk a, a thugen ngeimah a hong gennawn hi. Huai thu David in a zata hi.
Israel mi tengteng in huai mi a muh un, a taikek ua, lauh petmah in a lau uhi.

Israel mite’n, “Huai mihing hong kuan khia na mu hia? Israel mite tou dia hong kuan khia ahi. Kuapeuh amah that kumpipa’n nakpitak in sum lam in a hih hausa dia, a tanu a pedia, a pa inkuan Israelte lak ah a zalen sak ding” a chi uhi.

David in a kiang a dingte kiang ah, “Hiai Philistia mi that a, Israelte minsiatna lamang mi bangchi bawl ahi dia? Hiai zeksumlouh Philistia mi kua ahia a hih, Pathian hing sepaihte a touvial mahmah” a chi hi.
Mipite’n huchi in a dawng ua, “Amah that peuhmah ka gen bang ua bawl ahi ding” a chi uh.

A u upapen Eliab in mite kiang a, a thugen lai a naza hi. David tung ah Eliab a heh guih a, “Bangdia hongsuk na hia? Gamdai a belam tamlou omte kua chingsak na hia? Na kisaktheihdan leh na lungsim hoihlouh dan ka thei. Kidou en ding bang in na hong mawkmawk a” a chi hi.
David in “Bang ka hih a ahia? A ziak om hilou ahi maw?” a chi hi.
Aman midang lam a ngatsan a, a gen ngeimah a gen hi. Mipite’n a ma amah bang in a dawng nawn uhi.
David thugen a zak un Saul kiang ah a gensawn ua; aman a sam hi.
David in Saul kiang ah, “Amah ziak in kuamah lungsim lunglel kei heh. Na sikha in huai Philistia mi ka vasual ding” a chi hi.
Saul in David kiang ah, “Nang zaw huai Philistia mi sual din na kuan theikei ding, valnou phet na hi ngal a. Amah lah a valnou tung apan galdou siammi ahi” a chi hi.
David in Saul kiang ah, “Na sikha in a pa belamte a chinlai in, humpinelkai hiam vompi hiam a hong kuan a, belamhon lak apan belamnou a man hi.
Ka delhzui a, ka sual a, a kam apan ka hunkhe zel hi. Amah hongsual tum in a hong ding a, ken a baksam ah ka man a, ka sual a, ka that zel hi.
Na sikha in humpinelkai leh vompi ka that tuaktuak hi. Huai zeksumlouh Philistia mi amau bang in a omsam ding hi. Pathian hing sepaihte a touvial a” a chi hi.
David in, “Humpinelkai khutbom apan leh vompi khutbom apan kei hon hunkhepa
Saul in David kiang ah, “Kuan in, na kiang ah
Saul in amah galthuam David a silhsak a, dal lukhu a khusak a, awmphaw a silhsak hi.

David in a galvan tung ah a namsau a kuah a, pai din a kisa hi. Huchibang a chiamteh ngei naikei hi. David in Saul kiang ah, “Ka paipih theikei. Hichibang ka chiamteh ngeikei” a chi hi. Huchi in David in a galthuam a suahta hi.
A chiang a tawi a, luita a suang mum mam pilhpelh nga a tel hi. A belamchinna ip, a kawlzal ah a kuah hi. A vaisuanglot a tawi a, Philistia mi a vazuan naita hi.
Philistia mi a hongpai zel a, David a zuan nai hulhul a; a lum tawipa a ma ah a pai hi.
Philistia min a en vialvial a, David a muh leh a simmawh mahmah hi. Amah lah san chiuchiau, mithah kilawm tak, valnou lel lah ahi ngal a.
Philistia mi in David kiang ah, “Ui ka hi maw chiangte toh ka kiang a na hongpai?” a chi hi. Philistia mi in a pathiante lou in David a hamsiat khumta hi.
Philistia mi in David kiang ah, “Ka kiang ah hongpai in, na sa tung a leng vasate leh gamsate ka nesak ding” a chi hi.
David in Philistia mi kiang ah, “Nang zaw namsau, tei leh teita tawi in n’ong kuan hi. ‘Kei zaw sepaihte
Tuni in
Hiai a kikhawm tengteng in
Hichi ahi a, Philistia mi a hong kuan a, David sual dia a honnaih leh David sepaihte lam ah Philistia mi sual din a tai gepgep hi.
David in a ip a sawk a, suang khat a lakhia a, a vaisuanglot in a lawn a, Philistia mi taltang tak ah a deng hi. A taltang ah suang a lut a, a khup in a puk helhul maimah hi.
Huchi in David in vaisuanglot leh suang in Philistia mi a zou hi. Philistia mi a deng a, a thatta hi. Himahleh David in namsau a tawi kei.

Huaiziak in, David a tai a, Philistia mi tung ah ading hi. A namsau a la a, a pai apan a dokkhia a, huai in a that a, a lu a tanta hi. Philistia mite’n a mi hat uh a sita, chih a theih un a taikekta uh.

Israel mite leh Judah mite a thou ua, a kikou ua, Philistia mite Gath leh Ekron kulh kongkhak pha in a delh uh. Philistia mite lak a liamte Shaaraim lam tawn in Gath leh Ekron pha in a puk zengzung uhi.
Israel suante’n Philistia mite a delh uh a tawpsan ua, a hong kiknawn ua, a giahmun uh a lok uhi.
David in Philistia mi lu a la a, Jerusalem ah a paipih a, a galvan bel a puanin ah a koih hi.
Saul in Philistia mi sual dia David kuan a muh in sepaih heutu Abner kiang ah, “Abner, hiai valnou kua tapa ahia?” a chi hi. Abner in “Na hinna lou in ka gen, toupa aw, ka theikei,” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n “Hiai naupang kua tapa hiam dongkhia in” a chi hi.
Philistia mi that David a hongpai in Abner in a pi a, Philistia mi lu tawikawm in Saul kiang ah a paipih hi.
Saul in a kiang ah, “Tangval, kua tapa na hia?” a chi hi.
David in a dawng a, “Bethlehem mi na sikha Jesse tapa ka hi” a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Saul kiang a thu a gen khit in Jonathan hinna leh David hinna a hong kipeh geih a, huchi in Jonathan in amah hinna a it bang in amah a it hi.
Saul in huai nin a omsak ngal a, a pa inn ah a paisak nawnta kei hi.
Huchi in Jonathan leh David in thu a khung ua, amah hinna bang geih a amah a it ziak in.
Jonathan in a puansilhlai a suah a, David a pia a, a kivatna leh a namsau leh a thalpeu leh a taigakna nangawn a pia hi.
Saul in a sawlna peuh ah David a hohzel a, kizentak in a gamtang hi. Saul in sepaihte heutu in amah a bawl a, huai mi tengteng ngaih in leh Saul sikhate ngaih in a hoih hi.

A hongpai un hichi ahi a, Philistia mi that David a hongpai in Israel khaw teng ah numeite lasa leh lam kawm in khuangta leh thilging theite toh, nuamsatak in kumpipa Saul dawn din a hong pawtkhia uhi.
Numeite’n lam kawm a la a kidawng tuah in, “Saul in asang asang a that, David in asing asing” a chi uhi.
Hiai lasak in Saul a kipaksak kei a, a heh mahmah hi. David bel asing asing thatin a ngai ua, kei ka hihleh asang asang kia thatin a hon ngai uh. Gam lou ngal a tanding dang bang ahia omta? a chi hi.
Saul in huai ni apan David a hazat bawlta hi.
Hichi ahi a, a zingsang in Saul tung ah Pathian sawl dawi a hongtung a, inn sung ah thu a gen hi. David in nidang a a hih mah bang in kaihging a tum hi. Saul in a teipi a tawi hi.
Saul in a teipi a khoh a, huai bang ah David ka khohden ding, a chi hi. David in nihvei a kihep khiaksan hi.
A kiang a
Huaiziak in, Saul in amah apan a kisuansak a, a sepaih sang tung a heutu in a bawl hi. Huchi in David mipi lak ah lut in a pawt zel hi.
David bel a hih peuhmah ah piltak in a gamtang zel a;
Saul in piltak in a gamtang chih a muh in a lau hi.
Himahleh Israelte leh Judahte tengteng in David a it ua; a lak ua lut a pawt zel lah ahi ngal a.
Saul in David kiang ah, “Ngai in, ka tanu upa zaw Merab na zi din k’on neisak ding. Hangtak in hon gum peuhmah lechin.
David in Saul kiang ah, “Kua ahia ka hih a, ka hinna leh Israelte lak a ka pa inkuante leng bang ahia a hih uh, kumpipa makpa ka hihna ding?” a chi hi.
Himahleh hichi ahi a, Saul tanu Merab David toh kitensak a hong hun in Meholath mi Adriel zi din a pe mawk hi.
Saul tanu Mikal in David a it a; Saul a hilh ua; huai in a kipaksak hi.

Saul in, “A awkna ding thang a hong hih theihna ding leh Philistia mite’n a tung a khut a khak theihna ding un amah ka pe ding” a chi hi. Huaiziak in, Saul in David kiang ah, “Tuni’n ka makpa na hihna ding hunlem a nihveina na nei” a chi hi.

Huchi in Saul in a sikhate thu a pia a, “A simtham in David houpih unla, ngai in, kumpipa na tung ah a kipak mahmah a, a sikhate tengteng in leng nang a hon it uh. Huchi in kumpipa makpa in om in” chi un, a chi hi.
Saul sikhate’n huai thu David bil ah a gen uh. David in, “Mi genthei leh kuamah theihphak ngellouh kei adin kumpipa makpa hih thil namai in na sep ua hia?” a chi hi.
Saul sikhate’n, “David in huchibang in a chi” chi’n a hilh uh.

Saul in David kiang ah hichibang in na chi ding uh, “Kumpipa’n kumpipa melma phulakna din Philistia mite zekvun za khat chihlouh man bangmah a deihkei a chi” chi un, a chi hi. Saul in David lah Philistia mite khut a sihsak lungsim in a nei bikbek hi.
A sikhate’n huai thu David a hilh uleh kumpipa makpa hih David a kipak mahmah hi.

Huchi in ni chiamte a beima in, David leh a mite a thou ua, Philistia mite za nih a va that uh. David in a zekvun uh a honpua a, kumpipa makpa a hih theihna din kumpipa kimtakin a pia hi. Huchi in Saul in a tanu Mikal a zi din a peta hi.
Saul in David kiang ah Pathian a om chih a theitelta hi. Saul tanu Mikal in amah a it hi.
Huchi in Saul in David a lau semsem a, Saul bel David melma ahi denta hi.
Philistia miliante a va kuankhe zel uh. Hichi ahi a, a kuan khiak peuhmah chiang un David bel Saul sikha tengteng sang a piltak a a gamtat ziak in a min a thang semsem hi.
Huan, Saul in a tapa Jonathan leh a sikha tengteng kiang ah David that un, a chi hi.
Himahleh Saul tapa Jonathan in David a deihthoh mahmah hi. Jonathan in, “Ka pa Saul in thah din hon zong hi, huaiziak in, zingchiang in zingsang in pilvang inla mun guk ah bu nilouh in.
Ka pawtkhe dia, na omna gamlak ah ka pa kiang ah ka va ding dia, na tungtang thu ah ka pa ka houpih ding. Huchi in ka theih k’on hilh ding” a chi hi.
Jonathan in a pa Saul ma ah David a phat a, a kiang ah, “Kumpipa a sikha David tung ah khial hetkei hen. Na tung ah lah a khial kei a, a thilhihte lah nang adia hoih pipi ahizaw ngal ua.
Sih khawksalou in Philistia mi a sual a,
Huchi in Saul in Jonathan thugen a zui hi. Saul in kichiam in, “
Jonathan in David a sam a, huai thil tengteng a hilh hi. Jonathan in David Saul kiang ah a pi a, tuma lam mah bang in a kiang ah a om nawnta hi.
Kidouna a hongom nawn a, David a kuan khia hi. Philistia mite a vasual a, tamtak a vathat a, a ma ah a taikek uhi.
Saul bel a inn a teipi tawi a, a tutlai in
Saul in a teipi in David bang toh khohden a tum hi. Himahleh Saul kiang apan a kitholh khegeih a, teipi pen bang ah a khohtal hi. Huchi in David a taikhia a, huai zan in a suakta hi.
Saul in a zingsang a David tang a that ding in mi a sawl hi. David zi Mikal in, tu zan a na hinna na humbit kei leh zingchiang in a honthat ding uh, chi in a hilh hi.
Mikal in David tohlet ah a khai khesuk a; huchi in a taimang a, a suakta hi.
Mikal in milim a la a, lupna ah a lumsak a, a lu lam ah kelmul lukham a koih a, puan in a khuh hi.
David pi dia Saul in mi a honsawl kiang ah, “A chi a na” a na chi hi.
Saul in David va en din mi a sawl nawn a, “A lupna toh hon zawngtou le uchin ka na that ding” a chi hi.
A mi sawlte a va lut uleh, ngai in, lupna ah milim a lu lam a kelmul lukham kham in a na om hi.

Saul in Mikal kiang ah, “Bangdia hichibang a hon zekhem a, bitna dia ka melma pawtsak na hia?” a chi hi. Mikal in Saul a dawng a, “Hon paisak in, bangdia nang honthat ding ka hia?” a honchi, a chi hi.
Huchi in David a taimang a, a suakta hi. Ramah khua a Samuel kiang a va tung a, Saul in a tung a a thilhih tengteng a va hilh hi. Amah leh Samuel a kuan ua, Naioth ah a om uhi.
Ngai in, Ramah khua a Naioth ah David a om, chi in Saul a hilh uh.
Huchi in David pi din Saul in mi a sawl hi. Zawlnei pawlte lasak lai leh Samuel a tung ua heutu a om a vamuh un Saul in a mi sawlte tung ah Pathian Kha a hongtung a, amau leng la a sata uhi.
Huai Saul a hilh uleh, midang a sawl nawn a, amau leng la a vasa sam uh. Saul in a thumveina din mi a sawl nawn a, amau leng la a vasa sam uhi.

Amah leng Ramah khua ah a va hoh a, Seku mun a tuileh lian mahmah a va pha hi. “Samuel leh David koi a om ahi ua?” chi in a dong hi. Mi kuahiam khat in, “Ngai in, Ramah khua a Naioth ah a om uh” a chi hi.
Ramah khua a Naioth ah a hoh a; Pathian kha a tung ah a hongtung samta a, a pai zel hi. Ramah khua a Naioth a tun tan in la a sazel hi.
Aman a puansilhte leng a suahsam a, Samuel ma ah la a sa a, huai ni nitum leh huai zankhua in vuaktang in a lum hi. Huaiziak in, “Saul leng zawlnei lak a telsam ahi maw?” a chi uhi.

Huan, David bel Ramah khua a Naioth apan a tai a, Jonathan kiang a vatung hi. “Bang ka hih a ahia? Bang ahia ka tatsiatna? Na pa tung ah bang ahia ka hihkhelh, hichitak a honthah a tup maizen?” a chi hi.

Aman, “That lou e. Na si hetkei ding. Ngai in, ka pa’n kei hon theisak lou in bangmah himhim lian in neuta leh, a hih ngeikei hi. Bang ding in ahia hiai thute kei a honim ding? A honim kei hial ding” a chi hi.
David in, “Na pa’n lah n’on hehpih dan a thei mahmah ngal a. Jonathan in hiai zaw thei dah hen, huchilou in zaw a lungkham lua kha ding chi ahi ding. Himahleh
Jonathan in David kiang ah, “Na hinna in a deih peuhpeuh k’on hihsak zel ding” a chi hi.
David in Jonathan kiang ah, “Ngai in, zingchiang a kha thak ding ahi. Kumpipa kiang a Ankuang um ngeingei ding ka hi. Himahleh a ni thum ni nitaklam tanpha in gamlak a kibu din ka kuan zaw ding.
Na pa’n ka omlouh a hon theihkhiak leh, David in a khua Bethlehem a va hohzual a hon ngen ngutngut a; a inkuan ua dia a kum teng a a kithoih hun uh ahi” na chi in.
“A hoih vo oi, a chih leh na sikha a lungmuang ding. Himahleh a heh leh thil hoihlou hih a tum, chih theimai in.
Huaiziak in, na sikha hoihtak in hih in. Na sikha lah
Jonathan in, “Thatlou e. Ka pa’n na tung a thil hoihlou hih a tum chih ka theih peuhmah leh nang hilhlou in ka om mahmah dia hia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in David in Jonathan kiang ah, “Na pa’n hehngawh in hon na dawngta leh kuan a honhilh dia?” a chi hi.
Jonathan in David kiang ah, “Paidih, gamlak ah i va hoh peuhmah ding” a chi hi. Huchi in gamlak ah a va hoh khawm uhi.
Jonathan in David kiang ah “
Ka pa’n na tung ah thil hoihlou hih ut bang hita leh, k’on hilhlouh a, lungmuangtak a na pai theihna dia k’on khahkei leh,
Ka sih louhna dia ka damsung kia a
Tangtawn in ka inkawte leng na hehpih tawp ken.
Jonathan in David inkawte toh thukhun bawl in “David melmate khut tan in leng
Huchi in Jonathan in David a kichiamsak nawn hi. Amah hinna a it bang geih in lah a it ngal a.
Huchi in Jonathan in a kiang ah, “Zingchiang a kha thak ding ahi. Na tutna a vuak ding ziak in na omlouh a kilang ngei ding hi.
Ni thum na om nung in paisuk pah inla, tuma a thil a hong omlai a na kibukna mun ah hoh inla, Ezel suang chin ah a na om gige in.
Muitum bang in thaltang thum a sik ah k’on kapkhe ding hi.
Ngai in, kuan inla, thaltangte va mukhia in, chi in naupang ka sawl ding. Naupang kiang a, En in, thaltangte na nunglam ah a om, la inla hongpai in, ka chih leh
Himahleh naupang kiang a, en in, thaltangte na pamlam ah a om uh, ka chih leh paimang mai in.
Nang leh ken thil i gensa tungthu ah ngai in, nang toh i kikal ah
Huchi in David gamlak ah a kibu a; kha a hong thak a, kumpipa Ankuang um in a tu hi.
Hun dang a a tutna ngei bang in a tutna ah kumpipa a tu hi. Jonathan ading a, Saul kiang ah Abner a tu a; David mun bel a vuak hi.
Himahleh Saul in huai ni’n bangmah a gen kei. “A tung ah thil banghiam a om a, sianglou hiam ahi ding, a sianglou ahi ngei ding” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, khadet zing a ni nih ni’n David mun a vuaklai lai hi. Huchi in Saul in a tapa Jonathan kiang ah, “Bang achia Jesse tapa zan leh tuni a Ankuang um dia hong pailou ahia?” a chi hi.
Jonathan in Saul a dawng a, “David in Bethlehem a hoh a honngen ngutngut hi.

Hon hohsak teitei in, ka inkawte’n khua ah kithoihna nei din a hon thukhak chinten uh. Huchi in n’on hehpih theih leh hon hohsak inla, ka unaute ka vaveh ding, a chi hi. Huaiziak in, kumpipa dohkan ah a hong kei hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Jonathan tung ah Saul a heh guih a, a kiang ah, “Nang, numei genhak leh paupeng tapa, Jesse tapa na zahlakna ding leh na nu vuaktanna zahlak sak din na tel chih theilou honsa na hi hiam?
Jesse tapa hia a omsung teng hihkip na hi kei dia, na gam leng. Huaiziak in, samsak pah inla, ka kiang ah hon pisak in, a sih ngeingei ding ahi” a chi hi.
Jonathan in a pa Saul a dawng a, a kiang ah, “Bang ding in maw thah ding a hih? Bang a hih a ahia?” a chi hi.
Saul in thahtum in teipi in a khoh a, huchi in Jonathan in apan David thah a tum ngei, chih a thei hi.
Jonathan bel dohkan apan heh mahmah kawm in ading a, huai kha ni nih ni’n an a um sam kei hi. Apan David a zahlak sak mahmah ziak in a lungkham pih hi.
Hichi ahi a, zingsang in Jonathan in naupang khat pi in gamlak ah David toh a mun sehsa uah a hoh uhi.
A naupang kiang ah, “Tai inla, ka thaltang kap khiatte va zong in” a chi hi. Naupang a tailai in, a pam lam ah thaltang a kap hi.
Naupang, Jonathan in a kapkiakna mun a va tun in Jonathan in naupang a sam a, “Thaltang na pamlam ah ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Jonathan in a naupang a sam a, “Hong paimeng in, kin in, zekai ken” a chi hi. Jonathan naupang in thaltangte a tawm khawm a, a pu kiang ah a hong paita hi.
Himahleh, naupang in bangmah a theikei, Jonathan leh David kia in thil omdan a thei uhi.
Jonathan in a naupang kiang ah a thal leh a vante a pia a, a kiang ah, “Pai inla, khua ah nana paipih in” a chi hi.
Jonathan in a paitakin David a omna mun simlam pang apan ading a, a mai a leisi in thumvei a kunsuk a, a kitawp tuah ua, a kikah khum ua, David a nak kahzaw hi.
Jonathan in David kiang ah, “Lungmuangtakin pai in aw, nang toh kei kikal ah leh ka suante leh na suante kikal ah tangtawn in
David bel Nob khua a siampu Ahimelek kiang ah a honghi. Ahimelek in ling kawm in David a na dawn a, a kiang ah, “Bangchidan ahia tangtat na chia, kuamah tonpih na neih louh?” a chi hi.

David in siampu Ahimelek kiang ah, “Kumpipa’n thilhih din thu a honpia a, ka kiang ah, k’on thil hihsak tup leh k’on thupiak kuamah in theikei heh, a chi bikbek hi. Ka sikhate a mun ding uh ka sehsakta” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in tuin “Na khut ah bang a om a? Tanghou beu nga ahihkeileh na neih lamlam honpia in” a chi hi.
Siampu in David a dawng a, “Tanghou vantang ka neikei a, himahleh tanghou siangthou bel ka nei hi, tangvalte numei apan a ki hepkhiak nak uleh” a chi hi.

David in siampu a dawng a, a kiang ah, “Tu ni thum sung numei apan ka kihem khevek taktak uhi. Ka hong pawtkhiak deklai in leng tangvalte tuium-belsuan a siangthou a, tanghou leng vantang ahi a, ahi, tu ni tuium-belsuan sung a siansak mah bang in” a chi hi.
Huchi in siampu in tanghou siangthou a peta. Huai ah lah tanghou koih a lak ni ua tanghou lum a khen dia
Huai ni’n Saul sikhate lak a mi khat
David in Ahimelek kiang ah, “Teipi hiam, namsau hiam na kem kei maw? Kumpipa honsawlna thukin a hih ziak in ka namsau leh ka galvan bangmah ka hontawi mankei hi” a chi hi.
Siampu in, “Philistia mi Goliath, Elah guam a na thahpa namsau, ngai in, siampu puanak nung ah puan a tuam in a om hi. Huai na laknop leh la in. Huai loungal a dang a omkei” a chi hi.
David in, “Huai val a om ding hia, honpe dihve” a chi hi.
Huchi in David ading a, huai ni’n Saul lau in a taimang a, Gath kumpipa Akish kiang ah a paita hi.
Akish sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Hiai mi huai gam kumpipa David ahi kei maw? Saul in asang asang a that, David in asing asing, chih loukawm in a tungtang la in a sa zuazua uh ahi kei maw?” a chi uhi.
David in huai thute a lungsim in a pai a, Gath kumpipa Akish a lau mahmah hi.
Huchi in a ma ah a omdan a hihlamdang a, a mitmuh un a kihai sak hi. A khut in kongkhakte a ham ekek a, a khamul ah a chil a luangsak zungzung hi.
Huchi in Akish in a sikhate kiang ah, “Enta unla, mihai a hihna thei ua, bangdia ka kiang a honpi na hi ua?
Mihai ka kitaksap ziak in hia hiai mi a haidan hihlang dia ka ma a na honpi uh? Hiai mi ka inn ah a honglut tel mahmah ding maw?” a chi hi.
Huchi in David bel huai apan a pawtkhia a, Adullam kawkhuk ah a omta hi. A unaute leh a pate inkawte tengteng in a zak un huai ah a kiang ah a hohsuk uh.
Lungkham peuhmah, leiba nei peuhmah leh lungkimlou peuhmahte a kiang ah a ki kaikhawm uh. Huchi in, a heutu un a omta hi. A kiang ah mi za li hiam tak a om uhi.
David bel huai apan Moab gam a Mizpah ah a hoh hi. Moab kumpipa kiang ah, “Pathian in a hon hihsak ding thil ka theih masiah ka nu leh ka pate na kiang ah na om le uh” a chi hi.
Moab kumpipa ma ah amau a pi a; huchi in kawkhuk a David a omlai teng a kiang ah a om uhi.
Zawlnei Gad in David kiang ah, “Kawkhuk ah om nilouh ken. Pawt inla Judah gam ah pai in” a chi hi. Huchi in David a pawt a, Hareth gammang ah a lutta hi.
Saul in “David leh a kiang a omte a muta uh” chih a naza hi. Saul bel Gibeah a Ramah khua a tamarisk sing nuai ah teipi tawi in a tu hi. A kim ah a sikha tengteng ading uhi.
Saul in a kim ading a sikhate kiang ah, “Nou Benjamin mite aw, ngaikhia un; Jesse tapa in loute leh grephuante honpia in a sepaih sang heutu leh a sepaih za heutu in a honbawl dia hia?

Na vek un n’on sawm ua, ka tapa in Jesse tapa kiang a thu a khun ka kiang a hihlang himhim na omkei uh. Ka tapa in ka sikha kei hondou ding leh tuni nasan a kei hon tang dia a hanthawn thu ka kiang a hihlang na omlouh uh?” a chi hi.
Huchi in Saul sikhate kiang a ding Edom mi Doeg in a dawng a, “Jesse tapa Nob khua a Ahitub tapa Ahimelek kiang a, a hong ka mu hi.
Aman
Huchi in kumpipa’n Ahitub tapa Ahimelek leh Nod khua a siampu a pang a pa inkawte tengteng a samsak hi.
Saul in, “Nang, Ahitub tapa, na ngaikhia in” a chi hi. Aman, “Ka toupa, hiai ah ka om” a chi hi.
Saul in a kiang ah, “Tanghou leh namsau na pia a,
Ahimelek in kumpipa a dawng a, “Kumpipa makpa, na thumang, na inkuan sung ua mi zahtakhuai David bang a muanhuai na sikhate tengteng lak ah kua a om ua?
Amah adia Pathian thu ka dotsak a masapen ahi ahia? Ahi kei. Kumpipa’n a sikha hiam, ka pa inkawte kuapeuh hon ngoh mahmah kei hen. Na sikha in hiai thu bangmah ka theikei hi” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n, “Ahimelek, na si ngeingei ding ahi, nang leh na pa inkawte tengteng toh” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang a ding sepaihte kiang ah, “Kihei unla,
Kumpipa’n Doeg kiang ah, “Nang kihei inla, siampute sual in” a chi hi. Edom mi Doeg a kihei a, siampute a sual a, huai ni’n puanmalngat siampu puanak silh, mi sawmgiat leh nga a that hi.
Nob, siampu khua namsau in a sual a; numei leh pasal naupang leh nawi nelaite na ngawn, bawngte, sabiltungte leh belamte toh namsau in a satlum hi.
Ahitub tapa Ahimelek tapate lak a khat, a min Abiathar a tai khia a, David kiang ah a taitung hi.
Abiathar in Saul in
David in Abiathar kiang ah, “Edom mi Doeg huai a, a omni mah in Saul a hilh ngeingei ding chih theisa in ka om hi. Na pa inkuan tengteng kei ziak a si ahi uh.
Nang ka kiang ah om inla, lau ken. Kei thah hon tumte’n nang leng thah a hontum ding uh. Ka kiang ah om lechin na bit ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan, ngai in, “Philistia mite’n Keilah khua a sual ua, phual a buhte a laksak vek uh” chi in David a hilh uh.
Huchi in David in, “
David mite’n a kiang ah, “Ngai in Judah gam a om nangawn i lau ua, Keilah khua a hohsuk a Philistia sepaihte vasual lauhuai zawsem nan chia” a chi uhi.
David in
Huchi in David leh a mite Keilah khua ah a hoh ua, Philistia mite a vasual ua, a gante uh a laksak ua, tamtak a that uh. Huchibang in David in Keilah khomite a humbitta hi.
Hichi ahi a, Ahimelek tapa Abiathar Keilah khua a David kiang a, a tailai in siampu puanak tawi in a paisuk hi.
Keilah khua ah David a hoh chih Saul a hilh uh. Saul in, “Pathian in ka khut a amah honpia eive. Kulh kongpi leh a kalhna nei khua ah lah lut in a kikhumta ngal a” a chi hi.
Saul in mi tengteng kidou din Keilah khua va sual a David leh a mite va um din a samkhawm hi.
David in Saul in a tung ah thil hoihlou a sawm chih a na thei hi. Siampu Abiathar kiang ah, siampu puanak honla dihve, a chi hi.
Huchi in David in, “Aw
Keilah khua a mite’n a khut ah honpe ding uam? Na sikha in ka zak bang in Saul a hong paisuk diam? Aw
, “A hongsuk ding” a chi hi. Huchi in David in, “Keilah khua mite’n kei leh ka mite Saul khut ah a honpe ding uam?” a chi hi.

Huchi in David leh a mite, guk hiam tak a thou ua Keilah khua apan a pawt ua, a lemna lamlam ah a paita uh. David Keilah khua apan a tai kheta, chih Saul a hilh ua; huchi in kuankhiak a kikhel sakta hi.
David gamdai ah, leikawhawm ah a om hi. Ziph gamdai a tanggam ah a om nilouh hi. Saul in niteng in amah a zong a, himahleh Pathian in a khut ah a pekei hi.
David in amah thah tum in Saul a hong kisa chih a thei a; huchi in David Ziph gamdai gamlak ah a om hi.
Saul tapa Jonathan a thou a, gamnuai ah David kiang ah a hoh a, David khut
A kiang ah, “Lau hetken, ka pa Saul khut in a hong zongkhe kei ding, Israelte tung ah kumpi na honghi dia, kei nang hon zompa ka hi ding. Hiai leng ka pa Saul in a thei kilkel hi” a chi hi.
A nih un
Huchi in Ziph mite Gibeah ah Saul kiang ah a hohtou ua, David ka kiang uah gamnuai a leikawhawm ah, gamdai simlam sang Hakilah tang ah a na kibu nilouh a kei maw?
Huaiziak in, aw kumpipa, hong paisuk na ut lamtak ahi bang in hong paisuk inla, kou ka hih ding uh ahihleh kumpipa khut amah honpiak ahi ding, a chi uhi.
Saul in, “
Pai unla, va chian nawnsem unla, a nung vazui unla, a mumi leng va chian hoihnawn sese un. Lepchiah piltak in thil a hihnak chih min a honhilh uhi.

Huaiziak in, a bukna mun tengteng thei sipsip unla, ka kiang ah hong nawn ngeingei unla, nou kiang ah keileng ka hong sam ding hi. Hichi ahi ding a, hiai gam a a om peuhmah leh Judah mi sang tampi lak apan ka zongkhe ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a thou ua, Saul ma in Ziph ah a hoh uh. Himahleh David leh a mite gamdai simlam Arabah a Maon gamdai ah a om uhi. Huai mun Jashimon simlam a om ahi.
Saul leh a mite amah zong din a hoh uh. David a hilh ua, huchi in suangpi zuan in a pawtkhia hi. Maon gamdai ah David a delhta hi.

Saul tang langkhat lampang ah a pai a, David leh a mite bel tang langkhat lampang ah a pai uhi. David Saul lau in kintak in a tai a; Saul leh a mite’n lah David leh a mite mat tum in a um kimvel ngal ua.
Himahleh Saul kiang ah, “Kinmeng inla, hongpai in, Philistia mite’n i gam uh a hongsual uh” chi’n thangkou a hongtung hi.
Huchi in Saul in David a delhlai a kiksan hi. Philistia mite sual din a paita hi. Huaiziak in huai mun Sela hammah lekoth a chi uhi.
David huai a kipan a paitou a, En gedi leikawhawm ah a om hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Saul Philistia mite vadelh hong paikik in ngai in, “David En Gedi gamdai ah a om” chih hilh in a om hi.
Huchi in Saul in Israel mi tengteng lak a telkhiak tuam mi sang thum a pi a, sathakte tenna suangpi lak lam ah David leh a mite zong in a hohta uh.
Lamkal ah belam huang kawkhuk omna a va tung uh. Saul khawl din a valut hi. David leh a mite kawkhuk sunggil lam ah a om uhi.
David mite’n, a kiang ah, “Ngai dih,
Hichi ahi a, a den chiang in Saul puanmong a vatan in David lungsim a sun mahmah hi.
Huchi in a mite kiang ah,
David in huai thu in a mite a khamdai a, Saul sual dia a kuan uh a phalta kei hi. Saul bel kawkhuk apan a pawt a, a pai nawnta hi.
A nung zek in David leng a thou a, kawkhuk apan a pawt a, “Kumpipa, ka toupa” chi in Saul a nungsap hi. Saul nunglam ah a hong kihei a, David in a mai a lei ah a kunsuk hi.
David in Saul kiang ah, “Ngai in, David in na siatna a zong, chi a mite’n na kiang a, a gen uh bangdia gingta na hia?
Ngai in, tuni in

Huai kia leng hilou in, pa, en in, na puanmong leng ka tawi hi. Na puanmong ka tan theih a, k’on thah louh na ah ka khut ah thil hoihlou leh tatlekna a omkei, chih leh ka hinna laktum in honzong zong lechin leng, na tung ah ka khialkei chih thei in.
nang leh kei kikal ah vaihawm henla,
Nidanglai a paunak in, Migilou apan gitlouhna a pawt zel, a chi hi. Himahleh ken bel na tung ah khut ka kha kei ding.
Israel kumpipa kua zong in ahia a hongpawt khiak? Kua ahia na delh? Ui sisa, uihik lel.
Huaiziak in,
Hichi ahi a, David in Saul kiang a hiai thute a gen khit in, Saul in, “Hiai ka tapa David aw hilou a maw?” a chi hi. Huchi in aw suah in Saul a kapta hi.
David kiang ah, “Kei sang in na diktat zaw, nang zaw ka tung ah thil hoih na hih a, ken bel thil hoihlou ka hih hi.
Tuni in ka tung a thil hoih na hih dan na hihlang a,
Min a melma muta leh bangmahlou in a khahmawk diam? Huaiziak in, tuni a ka tung a na thilhih ah
Ngai in, kumpipa na hong hingei dia, Israel gam na khut a hihkip in a om ding chih ka theita hi.
Huaiziak in, ka nung a ka suan hongom dingte hihmanglou ding in
Huchi in Saul kiang ah David a kichiam hi.
Huchi in Saul inn ah a pai a, David leh a mite leikawhawm ah a paitou uhi.
Huan, Samuel a sita a; Israel mi tengteng a hong paikhawm ua, amah a kah in Ramah khua ah a inn uah a vuita uhi. David a thou a Paran gamdai ah a hohsuk hi.
Maon khua ah mi khat a om a, a neih leh lam Karmel tang ah a om hi. Amah mi thupitak ahi a, belam sang thum leh kel sang khat a nei hi. Karmel tang ah a belam mul a met hi.
A min Nabal ahi a, a zi min Abigail ahi. Huai numei teitak leh melhoih tak ahi. Himahleh pasal pen mi chihhak tak leh gilou tak ahi a; Kaleb suan ahi.
David in gamdai apan Nabal in a belam mul a met chih a naza hi.
Huchi in David in tangval sawm a sawl a, tangvalte kiang ah “David in Karmel tang ah vahoh tou unla, Nabal kiang ah hoh unla ka min in chibai va buk un.
Mi neizoupa kiang ah huchi in va chi un: ‘Nang tung ah, na inkuante tung ah leh na neih tengteng tung ah khamuanna om hen.
Na belam mul metmite a om uh chih ka naza hi. Na belamchingmite ka kiang ah a om zel ua, a poi uh bangmah ka khoihkei ua, Karmel tang a a omsung un bangmah a mangsak kei uh.

Na tangvalte dong lechin a hon hilhmai ding uh. Huchi in hiai tangvalte a na hehpih in, ni hoih nitak a hong ka hi ngal ua. Na neih bangbang na sikhate leh na tapa David na pe dihve’ ” a chi, chi un, a chi hi.
David tangvalte a va tun un David min in huai thu tengteng Nabal kiang ah a gen ua, huchi in a daita uh.
Nabal in David sikhate a dawng a, “David kua ahia oi? Jesse tapa kua ahia oi? Tulai in sikha tampi pute taimangsan a tam uh.
Ka tanghou, ka tui leh ka belam mulmet mite adia ka gohsa kuate ahi ua chih ka theihlouhte ka pe mahmah dia hia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in David tangvalte a kihei ua, a kiknawn ua; huai thu tengteng a honghilh uh.
David in a mite kiang ah, “Na namsau uh kuah chiat un,” a chi hi. A namsau uh a kuah chiat uh. David in leng a namsau a kuah a, mi za li tak in David a zuitou ua; mi za nih van veng in a om uhi.
Tangval khat in Nabal zi Abigail kiang ah, “Ngai in, David in gamdai apan ka pu uh chibai buk din mi a honsawl a, aman a na sal hi.
Himahleh huaite lah ka tung uah a hoih mahmah ua, ka poi uh bangmah a khoih kei uh. Gamlak a ka omlai ua ka omkhawm sung tengteng uh bangmah ka tan kei uhi.
Belamching a a kiang ua ka omsung tengteng un sun leh zan kou adin bang ahi mai uhi.

Huaiziak in, bang ahia na hih ding hoihtak in ngaihtuah dihve. Ka pu uh tung ah leh a inkuan tengteng tung ah thil hoihlou tup in a nei hi. Amah lah a Belial tapa mahmah a, kuamah houpih theih ahi kei hi” chi’n a gen hi.
Abigail in kintak in tanghou beu za nih, uain thawl nih, belam nga huan dia mansa, vaimim kan buk nga, grep gah phoukeu bawk za, leh theipi beu za nih a la khawm a, sabiltung a pawsak hi.
A sikha tangvalte kiang ah, “Ka ma ah na pai zel unla, ngai un, ka honzui ding” a chi hi. Himahleh a pasal Nabal a hilh kei hi.
Huchi in hichibang ahi a, a sabiltung tung a tuang a tangsang sing lak a a paisuk lai in, ngai in, David leh a mite’n a honzuan ua, huchi in amau a tuakta hi.
David in, “Bangmah a mansak louhna dia gamdai a hiai mipa neih tengteng a thawn lel in ka na vensak a na hi mahmah ve. Thil hoih lah thil hoihlou in a hon dinta ngal a.
Zingchiang zingsang khovak pha a amah a tengteng lak a pasal naupang khat kia lel leng ka hawi peuhmah leh Pathian in David melmate thupizaw sem in bawl hen” a chi hi.
Abigail in David a muh in a sabiltung apan a kumsuk zok a, David ma a leisi in a kunsuk hi.
A khe bul ah a khupboh a, “Keimah in, ka toupa aw, keimahmah in thulimlouhna ka khu ding. Na sikhanu’n na bil a zak din thu gen henla, na sikhanu thugen hehpih in ngaikhia in.
Ka toupa aw, Belial mi Nabal bangmah in sim ken. A min bangbang ahi geih hi. Nabal ahi namah a, a hai hi. Kei na sikhanu in zaw ka toupa’n n’on sawl tangvalte ka na mukha kei hi.
Huaiziak in tuin, toupa aw,
Hiai ka toupa adia na sikha in vualzawlnate ka hontawi ka pu honzui tangvalte piak hi hen.
Na sikhanu tatlekna hehpih in ngaidam in.
Nang hon delh ding leh na hinna hihmang din mite hong kisa mahle uh, ka toupa hinna zaw
Hichi ahi ding a,
A ziak omlou a sisan na suahlouh a, ka toupa’n phu na laklouh nang adin lungkhamna himhim ahi kei ding. Ka toupa adin leng lungkimlouhna himhim ahi sam kei ding.
David in Abigail kiang ah, “Tuni a kei hon na dawn dia hon sawlpa
Na lemtheihna vualzawl in om henla, nang sisan suah mawhna apan hon humnu leh keimah khut a phu lalou dia hon bawlnu vualzawl in om hen.
Kei hon dawn dia hong pawtkhe pahlou hile chin,
Huchi in David in a thiltawite a la a, a kiang ah, “Lungmuangtakin na inn ah paitouta in. Na thu ka mang hi. Na nget pen k’on sansak hi” a chi hi.

Abigail Nabal kiang ah a hohtou hi. Ngai in, a inn ah kumpipa Ankuanglui bang mai in Ankuang a na lui hi. A kham mahmah ziak in Nabal a maitai ngial hi. Huaiziak in, a zingsang khovak masiah bangmah a hilh kei hi.
Hichi ahi a, zinglam a Nabal uain kham a halh in a zi in huai thute a hilh a, a lung a daiduak a, suang bang in a hong omta hi.
Hichi ahi a, ni sawm nung in
David in Nabal a si chih a zak in, “Ka minsiatna dia Nabal thilhih apan hon genpih a, a sikha thil hoihlou hihlou dia hon khampa
David sikhate’n Karmel tang a Abigail kiang a tun touh un, “David in a zi dia nang hong pi din a honsawl” chi’n amah a houpih uhi.
A thou a, a mai a leisi in a kunsuk hi. “Ngai dih ua, na sikhanu uh ka toupa sikhate khesil ding sikha ka hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Abigail a thouzok a, sabiltung tung ah a tuang a, a nungzui nungak ngate toh David mi sawlte a zui ua, a zi in a omta hi.
David in Jezreel a mi Ahinoam leng a na pikhin a; huchi in a zi din a om tuaktuak uhi.
Saul in lah a tanu Mikal David zi Gallim khua a mi Laish tapa Palti toh a na kitengsak zouta hi.
Huan, Ziphte Gibeah ah Saul kiang ah a hoh ua, “David gamdai chin a Hakilah tang ah a kibu kei maw?” chi in a vagen uhi.
Huchi in Saul a thou a, Ziph gamdai ah Israel mite lak apan tel khiak mi sang thum pi in Ziph gamdai ah David zong din a hoh sukta uh.
Saul in gamdai chin, lamkal ah Hakilah tang ah panmun a khoh a, David gamdai ah a omlai hi. Saul amah zong in gamdai ah a hong chih a thei hi.
Huaiziak in, David in enkhemite a sawl a, Saul a hong taktak chih a thei telta hi.
David a thou a, Saul panmun khohna ah a hoh hi. David in Saul leh a sepaih heutu, Ner tapa Abner lupna a mu hi. Saul kangtalai um sung ah a lum a, a kim ah mite’n om mun a bawl uhi.
David in Hit mi Abimelek leh Joab unau Zeruiah tapa Abisai kiang ah, “Saul panmun ah kua ahia ka kiang a hongding?” chi’n a gen hi.
Abisai in, “Kei na kiang ah ka hongsuk sam ding” a chi hi.

Huchi in David leh Abisai mipite omna ah zan in a va hoh uhi. Ngai in, Saul bel kangtalai um sung ah lum in a ihmu hi. A lu lam ah a teipi lei ah a siat tal a, Abner leh mite bel a kim ah lum in a ihmu uhi.
Abisai in David kiang ah, “Tuni in Pathian in na melma na khut a honpia eive. Huaiziak in, teipi in khatvei in lei ah k’on sunden suk ding aw? Ka sun tuan nawn kei ding” a chi hi.
Himahleh David in Abisai kiang ah, “Hih mangthang ken,
David mah in, “
thaunilh tung ah khut ka kha hetkei ding. A lu kiang chin a teipi leh tuithawl ahihleh la inla, pai ni” a chi hi.
Huchi in David in Saul lu kiang chin a teipi leh tuithawl a la a, a pai nawnta uh. Kuamah in a mu kei ua, kuamah in phawkin a khanglou sam kei.
Huchi in David galkhat lam ah a hoh a, gamla kuam ah mualvum ah ading a; a kikal uh gamlapi ahi.
David in mipite leh Ner tapa Abner zak in a kikou a, “Abner, n’on dawng kei dia hia?” chi in a sam hi. Huchi in Abner in a dawng a, “Kumpipa sam nang kua na hia?” a chi hi.
David in Abner kiang ah, “Mi hangsan na hi kei maw? Israelte lak ah nang bang kua a om a? Bangchidan ahia kumpipa, na toupa na ven louh? Kumpipa, na pu hihmang din kuahiam khat a hongpai hi.
Na thilhih dan a hoihkei.
Saul in David aw a thei a, “Tua nang aw hia, ka tapa David?” a chi hi. David in, “He, toupa, kumpipa aw, ka aw ahi” a chi hi.
“Bangziak in ahia ka toupa in a sikha a delh? Bang thil ka hih a ahia? A khut ah thil gilou bang ahia om?
Huaiziak in, toupa, ka kumpipa’n a sikha thu ngaikhia hen. Kei dou dia na lungtang tokthoupa
Huaiziak in, ka sisan

Saul in, “Ka na khialta hi. Ka tapa David, hongpai nawn in. Tuni a na mitmuh a ka hinna a manphat mahmah ziak in bangmah himhim ka hihta kei ding hi. Ngai in, thil haihuai mahmah ka na hihta a, ka nak khelh mahmah hi” a chi hi.
David in a dawng a, “toupa aw, teipi en dih, tangval khat hong henla, hongla hen.
michih a diktat man uleh a muanhuai man uh a pe ding. Tuni’n
Ngai in, tuni a na hinna k’on mantam sak mahmah bang in
Huchi in Saul in David kiang ah, “Ka tapa David, vualzawl in om in. Thilhihthei tak in na om dia, na zouzel ding” a chi hi. Huchi in David a pai a, Saul leng a mun ah a pai nawnta hi.

Huan, David in a lungsim in, “Chikchiang hiam a zaw Saul khut a mangthang khongkhong ding kei ve. Philistia mite gam a taimang sang a hoih zaw omlou ding ahi. Huchi in Saul in Israel gam a hon zonna a lungdong dia, huchi in a khut apan ka suakta ding” a chi hi.
David a thou a, amah leh a kiang a mi za guk omte Maok tapa Gath kumpipa Akish kiang ah a paita uhi.
David leh a mite, michih a inkuan kuan un, David zi nihte, Jezreel mi Ahinoam leh Nabal zi Karmel mi Abigail te toh Gath khua ah Akish kiang ah a tengta uhi.
David Gath khua ah a tai chih Saul a hilh ua, huchi in a zong nawnta kei hi.
David in Akish kiang ah, “Hon hehpih inla, na gam a khua khat ah tenna ding mun hon pesam inla, huai ah ka teng ding uh. Na sikha bang ding in kumpipa khua ah na kiang ah a om nilouh dia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in Akish in huai ni’n Ziklag khua a peta hi. Huaiziak in, Ziklag tunitan in Judah gam kumpipate a ahi nilouh hi.
Philistia gam a David a omsung kum khat pumpi leh kha li ahi.
David leh a mite a vahoh tou ua, Geshur mite, Girzi mite leh Amalek mite a vadou uhi. Huai namte Telam apan Shur gam lampang Aigupta gam pha a om ahi uh.
David in gam a sual a, numei leh pasal hawi himhim a neikei. Belamte, bawngte, sabiltungte, sangawngsaute leh a puansilhte uh a laksak hi. A pai nawn a, Akish kiang ah a hoh hi.
Akish in, “Tuni’n koilam na dou a?” a chi hi. David in, “Judah sim gam, Jerahmeelte sim gam leh Kente sim gam” a chi hi.
“Philistia gam a a omsung mawngmawng in ‘David in hichibang in a hihzel,’ ” a chi kha ding ua, chi in numei pasal Gath khua a pi ding hawi himhim a neikei hi.
Akish in David thugen a taksang a, “A mi Israelte a kimudah sak mahmah ziak in, tangtawn in ka sikha din a om ding” a chi hi.

Huan, hichi ahi a, huailai in Philistia mite’n a sepaihte uh Israel mite sual a dou din a kaikhawm uh. Akish in David kiang ah, “Nang leh na mite kei toh galdou dia na hong kuan ngeingei ding uh ahi, chih thei in” a chi hi
David in Akish kiang ah, “Awle, na sikha in bang a hihthei a chih na thei ding” a chi hi. Akish in David kiang ah, “A hoih ve, kei hon vengpa din k’on bawl den ding” a chi hi.
Samuel a sita a, Israel mi tengteng in a kah ua, amah khua mah Ramah ah a vui uhi. Saul in dawi aisansiam zawlte leh dawisiamte a gam apan a delhkhe khin hi.
Philistia mite a ki kaikhawm ua, Shunem ah panmun a khoh uh. Saul in Israel mi tengteng a kaikhawm a, Gilboa ah panmun a khoh sam hi.
Saul in Philistia sepaihte a muhtak in a lau a, a lungsim a ling tonton maimah hi.
Saul in

Saul in a sikhate kiang ah, “Dawi aisansiam zawl numei a kiang a ka hoh a ka dot ding hon zon khiaksak un,” a chi hi. A sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Ngai in, Endor khua a dawi aisansiam numei om eive” a chi uhi.

Saul a kibawl lamdang a, puan dang a silh a, amah leh midang nih a hoh uh. Zan in numei kiang a va tung uhi. Dawi aisanna in ai honsan sak inla, na kiang a, a min ka gen peuhmah hon sapsak in, a chi hi.
Numei in a kiang ah, “Ngai in, Saul thilhih na thei a, a gam a dawi aisansiam leh dawisiamte a hihmang khinta a, bangdia ka sihna dia ka hinna thangkam khum dia kisa na hia?” a chi hi.
Saul in “
Numei in, “Kua k’on sapkhiaksak dia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Samuel hon sapkhiaksak in” a chi hi.
Numei in Samuel a muh leh ngaihtak in a kikou a, Saul kiang ah, “Bangdia hon zekhem, Saul lah na hi ngal a?” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Lau ken. Bang a na muh?” a chi hi. Numei in Saul kiang ah, “Lei apan pathiante hong pawtkhia ka mu” a chi hi.
A kiang ah, “Bangchi bang ahia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Putekpi a hongpawt a, puanaktual a silh” a chi hi. Saul in Samuel ahi chih a thei a, a mai a leisi in a kun hi.

Samuel in Saul kiang ah, “Bangdia hihbuai a honsam khia na hia?” a chi hi. Saul in a dawng a, “Ka lung a zing mahmah a ahi. Philistia mite’n a hondou ua, Pathian in lah a hon lehngatsan a, zawlnei hiam, mang hiam in leng lah a hon dawng himhim kei hi. Huaiziak in, ka hih ding honhilh din ka honsam ahi” a chi hi.
Samuel in, “Huchi a
Kei honzang a, a gen bang in
thu na manlouh ziak leh Amalekte tung a a heh mahmah dungzui a na tangtun louh ziak in. Tuin na tung ah hiai thil a hihta hi.
Huailou leng,
Huchi in Samuel thugen ziak in Saul a lau mahmah a, lei ah a puk vialvual maimah hi. Tha leh zung himhim a neikei a, nitum leh zankhua a an ne lou ahi ngal a.
Numeinu Saul kiang ah a hoh a, a dah mahmah chih a thei hi. A kiang ah, “Ngai in, na sikhanu in na gen ka taksang a, sih leh sih ka kiang a na thugente ka zui hi.
Huaiziak in, nang leng na sikhanu thu taksang sam in. An tawmchik bek ka honlui dia, huchi in na pai chiang a hatna na neih theihna din ne in” a chi hi.
Himahleh a utkei a, “Ka nekei ding” a chi hi. Himahleh a sikhate’n numei toh a sawl teitei ua; a thu uh a mangta hi. Lei apan a thou a, lupna ah a tuta hi.
Numei in bawngnou vakthau a inn ah a nei a, a gouzok a; tangbuang a la a, a mek a, silngou sohlouh tanghou a bawl hi.
Saul leh a sikhate ma ah a lui a, a na neta uh. Huchi in a thou ua, huai zan in a paita uhi.
Philistia mite’n a sepaih tengteng uh Aphek ah a kaikhawm vek ua, Israel mite’n Jezreel a tuikhuk kiang ah panmun a khoh uhi.
Philistia kumpipate a zaza in, a sangsang in a pai ua, David leh a mite’n Akish toh a nung uh a zui uhi.

Philistia Kumpipate’n, “Hiai Hebrute’n bang ahia a hih uh?” a chi uh. Akish in Philistia kumpipa kiang ah, “Hiai David Israelte kumpipa Saul sikha, hichi tan a ka kiang a omkhin a, ka kiang a, a honglut nung a lah tu tan a leng a diklouhna ka muhlouhna pa ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.

Himahleh Philistia kumpipate a tung ah a heh uhi. Philistia kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Hiai mi na mun sehsak a pai din kiksak inla, kidouna ah i kiang uah hongsuk kei heh. Huchilou in zaw kidouna ah i melmate lam ah a pangkha ding. Hiai mite lu din hiai mipa leh a pu kilem nawn ve un teh aw?
Hiai David mah ahi kei maw, Saul in asang asang a that, David in asing asing, chi a, a tungtang thu la a sak uh?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Akish in David a sam a, a kiang ah, “
Huaiziak in, Philistia kumpipate na hih lungkimlouh louhna din kik inla, lungkimtakin pai in” a chi hi.

David in Akish kiang ah, “Ahihleh, bang thil ahia ka na hih? Na kiang a ka omsung teng in tunitan in, ka toupa kumpipa melma dou lou a ka kiknawn maimah ding, na sikha tung ah bang mu na hia oi?” a chi hi.
Akish in a dawng a, “David kiang ah, Ka mitmuh in Pathian angel bang in na hoih chih ka thei hi. Himahleh Philistia Kumpipate’n, Kidouna ah i kiang ah a hongsam kei ding, a chi bikbek mawk uhi.
Huaiziak in, na kiang a om na pu sikhate toh zingkhang in thou unla, zingkhang a na thohphet ua khua a vak chiang in pai un” a chi hi.
Huchi in David leh a mite Philistia gam a kiknawn din zingsang a pawtkhe ding in a thouta uh. Philistia mite Jezreel ah a hohtou uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, ni thum ni a David leh a mite Ziklag a tun un, Amalekte’n simlam leh Ziklag khua a na sim khin uh. Ziklag khua a na sual ua, mei in a na hal uhi.
Numeite leh khua a om peuhmah a lian, a neu sal in a man ua, kuamah thatlou a pi in a paipih khinta uhi.
David leh a mite khua a vatun un, ngai in, a na kangsiang khinta hi. A zite, a tapate leh a tanute uh sal in a na mankhinta uhi.
David leh a kiang a omte’n aw suah in kah leng kap zou nawnlou khop in a kap uhi.
David zite nih: Jezreel mi Ahinoam leh Karmel mi Nabal zi Abigail leng sal in a pikhinta uhi.
David a lungzing mahmah hi. Michih a tapate uh leh a tanute uh ziak a lungkham in amah suang a den ding thu a gen ziak un. Himahleh David bel
David in Ahimelek tapa siampu Abiathar kiang ah, “siampu puanak hon valaksak dihve” a chi hi. Abiathar in David siampu puanak a va laksak hi.
David in, “Hiaite delh leng ka phalai diam?” chi in
Huchi in David a kuanta a, amah leh a kiang a mi za guk toh. Besor lui a va tung ua, a mi nutsiatte uh huai ah a om uhi.
David in a delhzel a, amah leh mi za lite toh, mi za nihte’n a bahtak ziak un Besor lui a kan zoukei uhi.
Gamlak ah Aigupta mi a mu ua, David kiang ah a pi ua, tanghou a pia ua, aman a ne a, tui a dawnsak uhi.
Theipi beu them khat leh grep gah phoukeu bawm nih a pia uh. Hiaite a nek leh a hong halh nawn a; ni thum leh zan thum an ne lou leh tui dawnlou lah ahita ngal a.
David in a kiang ah, “Kua na hia? Kaw kipan a hong na hia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Aigupta gam tangval, Amalek mi sikha ka hi. Ni thum ahita a, ka chi a nat ziak in ka pu in a hon nusia maimah hi.
Kereth sim gam leh Judah sim gamte ka sim ua, Kaleb sim gam leng ka sim uhi. Ziklag khua leng ka hal uh” a chi hi.

David in a kiang ah, “Huaite omna ah n’on pisuk thei diam?” a chi hi. Aman, “Hon thatlou ding leh ka pu khut a hon penawn lou din Pathian min lou in ka kiang ah kichiam inla, huchi in huaite omna ah k’on pisuk ding,” a chi hi.
A pisuk leh, ngai in, Philistia gam leh Judah gam a gallak tampi a lak ziak un Ankuang a lui ua, a ne un a dawn ua mun teng ah a na om dalh pheng phung uhi.
Huchi in David in nitum apan zingsang nitaklam tan in amau a sual hi. Tangval za li sangawngsau tung a tuang a taikekte kia loungal kuamah dam a suakta himhim a omkei uhi.
David in Amalek mite puakmang tengteng a lanawn vek a, David in a zi nihte leng a hunkheta hi.
Huchi in a lian, a neu in, a tapate uh, a tanute uh, a gallak uh leh a thillak himhim bangmah tan a neikei ua, David in a laksak nawn vek hi.
David in belamhon leh ganhon tengteng a la a, gan dangte ma ah a hawl ua, “Hiaite David gallak ahi” a chi uhi.

Mi za nih a bah ziak ua David zuizou nawnlou a Besor lui a a omsakte uh kiang ah David a vatung hi. Amau David dawn ding leh a kiang a omte dawn din a pawtkhia uh. Mite kiang a tun in David in amaute chibai a buk hi.

David kiang a hohte lak migiloute leh Belial mi teng in a dawng ua, “I kiang ua a hong tellouh ziak un gallak thil i va lak nawn himhimte amau i pekei ding uh. A pi ua a pai theihna ding un a zite chiat uh leh a tate chiat uh ahihleh a pi uh i phal ding uh” a chi uhi.
David in, “Unaute aw,
Kuan ahia hiai thu a na thu uh zui ding? Kidouna a hohte tan bangmah van veng a na omte’n leng a tansam ding uh ahi; kibang vek a tan ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huai ni apan tunitan in Israelte adia thupiak leh dan din a bawlta hi.
David Ziklag khua a tun in, gallak khenkhat, Hiai,
Bethel a omte kiang ah, Ramoth sim a omte kiang ah, Jattir a omte kiang ah,
Aroer a omte kiang ah, Siphmoth a omte kiang ah, Eshtermoa a omte kiang ah;
Rakal a omte kiang ah, Jerameel khua a omte kiang ah, Kente khua a omte kiang ah;
Hormah a omte kiang ah, Korashan a omte kiang ah, A thak a omte kiang ah;
Hebron a omte kiang ah, David leh a mite tatna mun tengteng kiang ah.
Huan, Philistia mite’n Israelte a sual ua; Israelte Philistia mite apan a taikek ua, Gilboa tang ah thah in a om zelzul uhi.
