Philistia mite’n Saul leh a tapa a delhzui vengveng uh. Philistia mite’n Saul tapate: Jonathan, Abinadab leh Melkishua a that uhi.
Saul a naksual mahmah ua, thalkap mite’n a kap khat a ua, thal kapmite’n nasatakin a kapliam uhi.

Huchi in Saul in a galvan tawipa kiang ah, “Na namsau dok inla, honsun pailet in. Huchilou in zaw hiai zeksumlouhte a hongpai ding ua, a hong sun pailet ding ua, a hon bawlse kha ding uh” a chi hi. Himahleh a galvan tawipan a hih utkei; a lau mahmah ngal a. huaiziak in, Saul in a namsau a la a, a boh khumta hi.
A galvan tawipan Saul a si chih a theih in aman leng a namsau a boh khum samta a, a sikhawmta uh.
Huchi in Saul, a tapa thumte, a galvan tawipa leh a mi tengteng huai ni mah in a sikhawm vek uhi.

Guam galkhat lam a Israel mi omte leh Jordan gal a omte’n Israel mite a taikek uh, chih leh Saul leh a tapate a si uh chih a theih un khuate a pawt khiaksan ua, a taimangta uhi. Huchi in Philistia mite’n a va luahta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a zingsang in Philistiate a galthahte uh puansilh suahsak dia a vapai uleh Saul leh a tapate thum Gilboa tang a si a va mu uhi.
A lu a tan ua, a galvan a suahkhiak sak ua, mite kiang leh a milim pathiante inn a suah din a kim ua Philistia mite gam teng ah a khak uhi.
A galvan Ashtaroth inn ah a koih ua; a luang Bethsan kulhbang ah a tak uhi.
Jabesh-Gilead a omte’n Philistia mite’n Saul a bawldan thu a na zak un,
Mi hangsan tengteng a thou ua, zankhua in a pai ua, Saul luang leh a tapate luang Bethshan kulhbang apan a la uh. Jabesh a tung ua, huai ah a hal uhi.
A guhte a la ua, Jabesh a sing nuai ah a vui ua, ni sagih sung an a ngawl uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Saul sihnung in David Amalekte zoukhin a hong kiknawn a, Jiklag khua ah David ni nih a om hi.
Hichi a honghi a, a ni thum ni’n, ngai in, mi khat Saul panmun a kipan a puante bohkeksa leh a lu a leikai niaunuau in a hongpai hi.
David kiang a hongtun in lei a khupboh in zahtakna a pia hi. David in a kiang ah, “Koi apan hongpai na hia?” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Israel mite panmun apan hong taikhia ka hi” a chi hi.

David in a kiang ah, “Bangchibang in thil a om a? Honhilh dihve” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Kidouna apan mite a taikek ua, mi tampi a puk ua, a si uh. Saul leh a tapa Jonathan leng a si tuaktuak uh” a chi hi.
David in amah hilhpa tangval kiang ah, “Bangchi in ahia Saul leh a tapa Jonathan a sih uh na theih?” a chi hi.
A hilhpa tangval in, “Bangchi chi hiam in Gilboa tang ah ka na omkha zenzen hi. Ngai in, a teipi ngai a Saul ding ka mu a, kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuang mite’n a hon naihta uhi.
A nunglam a ngatleh a honmu a, a honsam hi. Ken, ‘Hiai ah ka om,’ chi’n ka dawng hi.
Ka kiang ah, ‘Kua na hia?’ a honchi hi. Ken, Amalek mi ka hi, chi’n ka dawng hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, ‘Ka kiang ah hongding inla hongthat maidih, ka hinglai vanglak a, lungdonna inlah a honmanta ngal a’ a chi hi.
A kiang ah ka ding a, huchi a pukgawp khinsa, damzou nawnlou ding chih ka theih ziak in ka thatta mai hi, a lu a lallukhu leh a ban a tau ka la a, ka pu kiang ah ka hontawi hi” a chi hi.
David in a puansilhte a botkekta a, huchi mah bang in a kiang a mi om tengteng in leng a hih uhi.
Saul leh a tapa Jonathan leh
David in amah vahilh tangval kiang ah, ‘koilam mi na hia?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Gamdang mi, Amalek mi tapa ka hi” chi’n a dawng hi. David in a kiang ah, “
David in tangval khat a sam a, “Vanaih inla, that in,” a chi a, aman a vasat a, a sita hi.
David in a kiang ah, “Na sisan nangmah lutung ah om hen. Nangmah kamngei in,
David in Saul leh a tapa Jonathan hiai kahtam in a sun hi:
Thalkap dan Judah suante sinsak din a sawl a, ngai in, Jasher laibu ah hiai gelh ahi:
“Aw Israel, na kilawmna
munsangte ah a that ua,
na mi hatte a pukta uhi.
Gath ah genkei unla,
Ashkelon kongzingte ah phuang kei un.
Huchilou in zaw
Philistia tanute a kipak ding ua,
zeksumlouh tanute a vualzou kha ding uhi.
Nou Gilboa tangte aw,
na tung uah daitui leh
vuah ke kei hen.
Thillat dingte leng suahsam ken.
Huai ah lah mihat lum Saul lum,
thaunilh louh mi lum bang mai in gilou tak in a paimang uhi.
Thah a omte sisan apan leh mihat thau apan Jonathan thal a kiknawn kei a,
Saul namsau a vuak in a kiknawn kei hi.
Saul leh Jonathan hindan
a deihhuai in a kilawm a,
a sih un leng a kikhen kei uhi.
Mipite sang in a hatzaw ua,
humpinelkaite sang in a hatzaw uhi.
“Nou Israel tanute aw, Saul kah un,
puansan kilawmte na tung uah a bang a,
na puan uah dangkaeng a zephoihnate hon koihsakpa ahi.
Kidou laitak a mihatte a puk maizen uh!
Aw, Jonathan, na mun sangte ah nang a hon thatta uhi.
“Ka unaupa Jonathan, na tungthu ah ka lungzing petmah hi.
Ka tung ah na hoih mahmah a,
N’on itna a lamdang hi,
numei itna a khup hi.
Mihatte a puk ua, kidouna galvante leng a mangthang khinta!”
Huan, hichi ahi a, huai nung in David in “Judah gam a khua khat peuh ah ka hohtou diam?” chi in
Huchi in David huai ah a hohtou a, a zi nihte, Jezreel mi Ahinoam leh Karmel mi Nabal zi Abigail toh.
David in a kiang a om mi tengteng a pitou a, michih a inkuante chiat utoh, Hebron khuate ah a tengta uhi.
Judah gam a mite a honghoh ua, huai ah Judah inkawte tung a kumpipa din David thau a nilh uhi. Huchi in, “Saul vuimite Jabesh-gilead mite ahi uh” chi’n David a hilh uh.
Jabesh-gilead mite kiang ah David in mite a sawl a, a kiang uah, “Na pu, na pu uh Saul na hehpih dan uh hihlang a na vui ziak un,
Tuin
Huaiziak in, tuin na khutte uh honghat henla, hangsantak in om un. Na pu uh Saul a sita hi. Judah inkawte’n a tung ua kumpipa din thau a honnilh khinta uhi” chi’n a va gensak hi.
Himahleh Ner tapa Abner, Saul sepaihte heutu in, Saul tapa Ishboshet Mahanaim ah a paipih hi.
Gilead, Ashur, Jezreel, Ephraim leh Israel tengteng tung a kumpipa in a bawlta hi.
Saul tapa Ishboshet in Israel tung a vaihawm apat in kum sawmli a upa ahi a, kum nih sung vai a hawm hi. Himahleh Judah mite’n David a zui uh.
David in Hebron a Judah chite tung ah kum sagih leh khaguk vai a hawm hi.
Ner tapa Abner leh Saul tapa Ishboshet sikhate Mahanaim apan a pawtkhia ua, Gibeon ah a pai uhi.
Zeruiah tapa Joab leh David sikhate a paikhia ua, Gibeon dil ah a kituak uh. Pawl khat dil galkhat lam ah a tu a, pawl khat pen dilgal langkhat ah a tu hi.
Abner in Joab kiang ah, “Tangvalte hong kuan uhenla, i ma uah hong kisual uhen, a chi hi. Joab in, “Hong kuan le uh ake” a chi hi.
Huchi in a kuan ua, a zahchiang sep in a galkah phei ua, Benjamin chi, Saul tapa Ishboshet lam a pang sawmlehnih, David sikha sawmlehnih ahi uh.
A langte uh luchiat ah a kimantuah ua, amau tumte chiat namsau in a nak ah a kidawt ua; a pukkhawm vek uhi. Huaiziak in, huai mun Helkath, hazzurim a chi ua, huai Gibeon a om ahi.
Huai ni a a kisual uh a thupi mahmah a, Abner leh Israel mite David sikhate ma ah zoh in a om uhi.
Huai mun ah Zeruiah tapate thum, Joab, Abisai leh Asahel a om uh. Asahel zukpi bang a ngalhat ahi.
Asahel in Abner a delh a; Abner a delh taklam hiam veilam hiam a pialsan hetlou in a delh vengveng hi.
Abner a lehngat a “Nang na hi maw, Asahel?” a chi hi.
Aman a dawng a, “Ka hi,” a chi hi.
Abner in a kiang ah, “Na taklam hiam, na veilam hiam ah pialkhia inla, tangval khat man inla, a galvan laksak in” a chi hi. Himahleh Asahel in amah a delh a pialsan nuam tuankei hi.
Abner in Asahel kiang ah, “Hon pialsan in. Bangdia lei a hon satpuk ding ka hia? Na unaupa Joab mel ka mu ngam dia hia?” a chi nawn hi.

Himahleh a pial nuam tuankei hi. Huaiziak in, Abner in a teipi tawlam in a nakguh ngana nuai tak a sun a, a nunglam ah teipi a paisuak a, huai ah a puk a, huai mun ah a sita hi. Hichi ahi a, Asahel puk a, a sihna mun a hongpai teng huai mun ah a khawl zel uhi.
Himahleh, Joab leh Abisai in Abner a delhzui ua; Gibeon gamdai lampi a Giah chin a Ammah tang a tun un ni a tumta hi.
Benjamin suante Abner kiang ah a kikaikhawm ua, pawl khat in a kibawl ua, mualvum ah a va dingta uh.

Abner in Joab a sam a, “Namsau in hon negai den ding hia? A tawplam in a hong kha mahmah ding, chih na theikei maw? Bang tan ahia a unaute uh delh tawpsan a kiknawn dia mipite hilhlou a na om ding?” a chi hi.
Joab in, “Pathian hinna lou in ka gen ahi. Bangmah na genlou hile chin zingchiang apan mite paimang khinta ding ua, a unaute uh delhlou ding hi ve un” a chi hi.
Joab in pengkul a mut a, mite ading depdup uh. Israel mite a delhta kei ua, kuamah a sual nawnta kei uhi.
Abner leh a mite zan khua in phaizang tawn suak a pai in Jordan a kan ua, Bithron a kantan ua, Mahanaim a tung uhi.
Joab bel Abner delh a kiknawnta a, mipi tengteng a kaihkhawm vek leh David sikhate sawmlehkua leh Asahel a kimta kei uhi.
Himahleh David sikhate’n Benjamin mite leh Abner mite za thum leh sawmguk a that uhi.
Asahel luang a la ua, Bethlehem a a pa han ah a vui uh. Joab leh a mite zankhua in a pai ua, khua vak in Hebron a tung uhi.
Saul inkuante leh David inkuante sawtpi a kidou ua; David in hatlam a manoh a, Saul inkuante’n hatlouh lam a manoh uhi.
David in Hebron ah tapate a nei a, a ta masapen, Ammon, Jezreel mi Ahinoam lak a ahi.
A zom Kileab, Karmel mi Nabal zi Abigail lak a ahi. A thumna Absalom, Geshur kumpipa Talmai tanu Makah tapa ahi.
A lina Adonijah, Haggith tapa ahi a; a ngana Shephatiah, Abital tapa.
A gukna Ithream, David zi Eglah lak a ahi. Hiai teng David tapa Hebron a piangte ahi uh.
Hichi ahi a, Saul inkuante leh David inkuante a kidou sung un Saul inkuante adin Abner a kihat sak semsem hi.
Saul in mei a nei a, a min Rizpah ahi. Amah Aiah tanu ahi. Ishboshet in Abner kiang ah, “Bangdia ka pa mei luppih na hia?” a chi hi.

Ishboshet thugen in Abner a heh sak mahmah hi. Judahte ui lutang leltak ka hi ahia? Tunitan in na pa Saul inkuante leh a unaute leh a lawmte tung ah chitna ka hihlang a, David khut ah k’on pe kei hi. Hinapi a nang hiai numei tung a khial a n’on ngoh mawk!
Pathian in Abner a lohloh in loh henla, huai sang a se zaw in leng. David kiang a
Saul inkuante lak apan a gam laksak ding, Israel leh Judahte tung a Dan apan a Beer–sheba tan a David mangtutphah tungding ding.
Huchi in aman Abner dawn himhim leng a dawng theikei, a lau mahmah ziak in.

Abner in amah sik in David kiang ah mi a sawl a, “Hiai gam kua a ahia? Ka kiang ah thu khung in. Huchi in, ngai in, Israel mi tengteng na lam a pang din ka khut nang lam ah a pang ding” chi in a va gensak hi.

Aman, “Hi hen. Na kiang ah thu ka khung ding. Himahleh na tung ah thil khat k’on phut hi. Huai hiai ahi. Hong mu dia na hongpai chiang in Saul tanu Mikal n’on pi phot kei leh ka mel na mu theikei ding,” a chi hi.
David in Saul tapa Ishboshet kiang ah, “Philistia mite zekvun za khat a ka lei ka zi Mikal honpia in” chi din mi a sawl hi.
Ishboshet in mi a sawl a, a pasal Laish tapa Paltiel mahmah apan a pita hi.
A pasal in a zui a, kap kawm in a nung a zui zel a; Bahurim tan a zui hi. Abner in a kiang ah, Pai in, kiknawn in, a chi hi. Huchi in a kiknawnta hi.
Abner in Israel upate a houpih a, “Tuma siah David na kumpipa ding un na zong uh.
Tuin na kumpipa un bawl un.
Abner in Benjamin mite bil a zak in a gen hi. Israel mite leh Benjamin inkuan tengteng in hoih a sak bangbang un Hebron a David bil a zak dia gen ding in Abner a hoh hi.
Abner leh a mite sawmnih Hebron a David kiang ah a pai uhi. David in Abner leh a kiang a mi sawmnihte adin Ankuang a lui hi.

Abner in David kiang ah, “Ka thou dia, na kiang a thu a khun theihna ding un leh na deihthusam bangtak a vai na hawm theihna din Israel mi tengteng ka toupa kiang a kaikhawm ding in ka kuan ding” a chi hi. David in Abner a kuansak a, lungmuang tak in a kuanta hi.

Ngai in, David mite leh Joab galdou zou a hongtung ua, gallak tampi a honpua uh. Himahleh Abner bel Hebron a David kiang ah a na om nawn kei hi. A na paikik sak khinta a, amah leng lungmuang tak in a na paita hi.
Joab leh a kiang a mipi tengteng a hongtun un, Ner tapa Abner kumpipa kiang ah a hoh hi. Aman a na paisak nawn khin a, “Lungmuangtakin a pai nawnta” chi in Joab a hilh uhi.
Joab kumpipa kiang ah a hoh a, “Na thilhih bangchidan ahia oi? Ngai in, Abner na kiang ah a hong a, bangdia paimang sak a, a paimang vengveng mawk?
Ner tapa Abner na thei a, nang hon zekhem dia na pawt lam leh na lut lam leh na thilhih peuhmah theih tuma hongpai ahi,” a chi hi.
David kiang apan Joab a hongpawt khiak in Abner delh din mi a sawl hi. Sirah a tuileh apan a va pikik uh. Himahleh David in a theikei hi.
Abner Hebron a hongtun in Joab in sim houpih din kulh kongpi ah a pi tuam hi. A unau Asahel sisan pawt thukna din a nakguh ngana nuai tak a dawt a, huchi in a sita hi.
A nung a David in a zak in, “Ner tapa Abner sisan thu ah keimah leh ka gam

Joab lu tung ah kia henla, a pa inkawte tengteng tung ah toh. Joab inkawte lak ah meima sia vei hiam, phak natna nei hiam, chiangkhun ngai a pai hiam, namsau a si hiam, kial thuak hiam kitatlak lou in hongom hen” a chi hi.
Huchi in a unaupa uh Asahel Gibeon a kidouna a a thah ziak in Joab leh a unau Abisai in Abner a that uhi.
David in Joab leh a kiang a mi om tengteng kiang ah, “Na puante uh botkek unla, saiip puan silh unla, Abner sun in a ma ah pai un” a chi hi. David in leng siluang a zui hi.
Abner Hebron ah a vui ua, kumpipa’n a aw a suak khesakin Abner han ah a kap a, mipi tengteng leng a kap uhi.
Kumpipa’n Abner a kah a:
“Abner, mihai sih in a si dia hia?
Na khut hen ahi kei a,
na khete leng sikkol butsak ahi sam kei.
Migiloute ma a mi a puk bang a na puk maizen? a chi hi.”
Mi tengteng in a kah nawn uhi.

Huchi in sun a hih lai in mi tengteng David an ne sak din a hongpai uh. Himahleh David in, “Nitum ma a an nek hiam, thil dang hiam leng ka nek leh Pathian in a lohloh honloh hen; huai sang a se zaw in leng” chi in, a kichiam hi.
Mi tengteng in huai a theih un a kipak mahmah uh. Kumpipa thilhih peuhmah in mite a kipaksak hi.
Mi tengteng leh Israel mi tengteng in huai ni’n Ner tapa Abner thah a hih kumpipa thu ahi kei chih a thei uhi.
Kumpipa’n mite kiang ah, “Tuni in Israel mi lian, mi thupitak a si, chih thei lou na hi umaw?
Kumpipa dia thaunilh himah leng, tuni in ka hat kei hi. Hiai Zeruiah tapate kei adin a thuak hak lua uh.
Huan, Saul tapa Ishboshet in Hebron ah Abner a si chih a na zak in a khutte a honghat kei ua, Israel mi tengteng a patau uhi.
Saul tapa Ishboshet in sepaih pawl heutu nih a nei hi. Khat min Baanah ahi a, a dang min Rekab ahi. Amau Benjamin suan Beeroth mi Rimmon tapate ahi uh. Beeroth bel Benjamin nam a sim tel a ngaih ahi.
Beeroth khua a mite Gitaim ah a tai ua, tunitan in huai ah a teng uh.

Saul tapa Jonathan in tapa khebai a nei hi. Jezreel apan Saul leh Jonathan tanchin a na theih in kum nga a upa ahi. Amah donnu in a pom a, a taimangpih hi. Hichi ahi a, taimang dia a kintatna lam in a kesak a, a khe a hong baita hi. A min Mephibosheth ahi.
Beeroth mi Rimmon tapate Rekab leh Baanah a pai ua, Ishboshet inn ah sun nisat laitak a lupna a a luplai in a kiang ah a hoh uhi.
Huit buh la ding hileh kilawm in inn sung lam ah a lut ua, a nakguh ngana nuai tak ah a dawt ua, huchi in Rekab leh a unaupa Baanah a taimang uhi.
Inn a valut un a lupna dantan a lupna a lum a vadawt ua, a that ua, a lu a tan ua, a lu a la uh. Arabah kantan in zankhua in a paimang uhi.
Ishboshet lu Hebron ah David kiang ah a honpua ua, kumpipa kiang ah, “Ngai in, nang honthah tum, na melma Saul tapa Ishboshet lu hiai ah a om;
David in Beeroth mi Rimmon tapa Rekab leh a unaupa Baanah a dawng a, a kiang uah, “
Tanchinhoih hontun a kisep in, ‘Ngai in, Saul a sita, chi a mi khat in a hon hilh lai in, amah ka man a, Jiklag ah ka that hi’. Huai a tanchinhoih a hon puakman a ka na piak ahi.
Mi diktat, amah inn sung a a ma lupna tungngei a lum, migilou in a thah uh sisan man na tung uah ka honphut nawnsem dia, leitung apan a lamang kei dia hia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in David in a tangvalte thu a pia a, amaute a that uh. A khutte uleh a khete uh a tansak ua, Hebron a dil tung ah a khai uhi. Ishboshet lu bel a la ua, Hebron a Abner han ah a vui uhi.
Huchi in, Israel chi tengteng Hebron a David kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Ngai in, na guh leh na sa ka hi uh.
Hun paisa in leng Saul ka tung ua kumpipa ahihlai a leng Israelte pikhia leh pilutpa na hi.
Israel upa tengteng Hebron ah kumpipa kiang ah a hoh uh. Kumpipa David in Hebron ah
Vai a hawm pattung in David kum sawmthum a upa ahi a, kum sawmli sung vai a hawm hi.
Hebron ah Judahte tung ah kum sagih leh kha guk vai a hawm a; Jerusalem ah Israelte leh Judah tengteng tung ah kum sawmthum leh thum vai a hawm hi.

Kumpipa leh a mite huai gam a teng Jebus mite sim din Jerusalem ah a hoh uhi. Huai mite’n David a honglut theihlouh gingta in, David kiang ah, “Hiai ah na honglut hetkei ding. Mittaw leh khebaite’n a hon na dal ding uh” a chi uhi.
Himahleh David in Zion kulh a lazou a, huai David khua ahi.

David in huai nin, “Jebus mi sual peuhmahte tuiluanna ah paitou uhenla, David mudah khebai leh mittawte that uheh” a chi hi. Huaiziak in ahi, “Mittaw leh khebaite inn ah a honglut kei ding uh,” a chih uh.
Huchi in David kulh ah a teng a, David khua a chi uhi. David in Millo apan a kimvel leh a sunglam ah kulh a bawl hi.
David in
Tura kumpipa Hiram in David kiang ah mi a sawl a, sidar singte a khak a, khutsiamte leh suangseksiamte a sawl a, David adin inn a lamsak uhi.
David in
David in Hebron a pawtsan nung in Jerusalem apan mei leh zi a nei behlap hi. Huchi in David in tapate leh tanute a neinawn lai hi.
Jerusalem a neihte min hiaite ahi: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan leh Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg leh Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada leh Eliphalet.
Himahleh Philistia mite’n David Israel mite kumpipa din thau a nilh uh chih a zak un Philistia mi tengteng David zong din a hohtou uh. David in a naza a, kulh sung ah a paisuk hi.
Philistia mite Rephaim guam ah a kiphalh uhi.
David in, “Philistia mite sual din ka hohtou diam? Amaute ka khut ah n’on pe diam?” chi’n
“Hoh tou in. Philistia mite na khut ah k’on pe ngeingei ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in David Baal-perazim ah a hoh a, huai ah David in amaute a sual a, “
Huai ah a milim pathiante uh a nusia ua, David leh a mite’n a hal uhi.
Philistia mite a paitou nawn ua, Rephaim guam ah a kiphalh uhi.
David in
Hichi ahi ding, singtheimi lek a pai husa na zak leh gamtang in. Philistia sepaihte sual din na ma ah
Huchi in
David in Israel mite lak a mi teltuam sing thum a kaikhawm nawn hi.
Huchi in David a thou a, Judah gam a Baale khua apan cherubte tung a tuang sepaihte
Pathian bawm kangtalai thak ah a koih ua, Abinadab in apan a la khia uh. Abinadab tapa Uzzah leh Ahio in kangtalai thak a hawl uhi.
Abinadab inn apan Pathian bawm a la khia ua; Pathian bawm ma ah Ahio a pai hi.
David leh Israel mi tengteng in
Nakon a buhphual a tunun, Uzzah in Pathian bawm a sawka, a len a; bawng in a hoisak ziak in.
Uzzah tung ah
hehna Uzzah tung a a puahzak ziak in David a lungkim kei a, huai mun Perez-uzzah a sa a, tuni tan ahilai hi.
Huai ni’n David in
David in
Bawm Git mi Obed-edom inn ah kha thum a om hi. Huchi in Obed-edom leh a inkuan tengteng
“Pathian Bawm ziak in, Obed-edom inkuan leh a neih leh lam tengteng
Hichi ahi a,
David
Huchi in David leh Israel mi tengteng in kikou zuazua leh pengkul mut kawm in
Hichi ahi a,
Huchi in
David in haltum thillatte leh lemna thillatte a latkhit in sepaihte
Mi tengteng a numei a pasal michih tanghou phel khat leh sabak khat leh grep gah phoukeu bawm khatchiat a pia hi. Huchi in michih amah inlam chiat ah a paita uh.

Hiaizoh in a inkuante vualzawl din David a paikik hi. Saul tanu Mikal David dawn din a hongpawt a, “Tuni in Israel kumpipa thupi hina mai e, miginalou, zumna theilou kisuah khia bang mai in tuni in a sikha nungakte mitmuh in a kisuahkhia hi” a na chi hi.
David in Mikal kiang ah, “Na pa leh a inkuante tengteng sang a kei hon tel,
Hiai sang mah in leng ka zumpihhuai lai ding. Keimah mitmuh in leng ka sithuai lai ding. Himahleh huai sikha nungak na gente pahtawi in ka om ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Saul tanu Mikal in a sihni tanpha in ta a neikei hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, kumpipa a inn a om a,
Kumpipa’n zawlnei Nathan kiang ah, “Tuin en in kei sidar sing inn ah ka teng a, himahleh Pathian bawm puanin ah a om” a chi hi.
Nathan in kumpipa kiang ah, “Na lungsim a om bangtak in va hih in,
Hichi ahi a, huai zan mah in
“Ka sikha David vahilh in,
Israel suante Aigupta gam apan ka pikhiak apan tunitan in inn ah ka tengkei a, puanin ah leh biakbuk ah ka teng zaw hi.
Israel suante lak a ka paina tengteng ah leng, ka mi Israel vak dia thu ka piak vaihawmmite kiang ah, “Bangdia sidar sing a inn hon lamsak lou?” chi in ka gen ngei ahia?
Huaiziak in, ka sikha David kiang ah, Sepaihte
Na hohna peuh ah na kiang ah ka om zel a, na ma ah na melmate ka hihmang zel hi. Lei a mi thupitakte bang in min thupitak k’on bawlsak hi.
Hiai ban ah ka mi Israelte adin mun ka sep dia, amau ka suan ding a, amau mun mah ah a teng ding ua, tuma lam bang in gitlouhna tate’n a hih genthei nawn kei ding uh.
Na melmate tengteng lak apan k’on khawlsak hi. Huailou him in
Na ni a bei a na pute kiang a na lup chiang in, nanung a na suan, na gil a gah ding ka tungding dia, a gam ka hihkip ding.
Aman ka min adin inn a lam dia, a gam mangtutphah tangtawn adin ka hihkip ding.
A pa ka hi ding a, amah ka tapa ahi ding. Thil a hihkhelh leh, mihing chiang leh mihing tate khetna in ka thunun ding.
Himahleh, na ma a ka suanmang Saul kiang apan ka lakmang bang in ka chitna in a hon paisan kei ding hi.
Na inkuan leh na gam tangtawn a hihkip ngiungeu ahi dia, na mangtutphah lah tangtawn a hihkip ahi ding, chi’n
Huai thute tengteng bangzel leh huai kilak na banggeih in Nathan in David kiang ah a gen hi.
Huchi in kumpipa David a lut a,
Pathian aw, huaite leng nang mitmuh in thil bangmah tham ahi kei uh. Himahleh na sikha inkuan omdan ding thu kum tampi sung a din leng na gen khinta hi.
David in na kiang ah bang a gennawn tuan ding a?
Na sikha theih din na thu ziak leh nangmah lungtang bangzel in hiai thil thupi tengteng na hihta hi.
Huaiziak in,

Aigupta gam apan leh namte leh a pathiante ua apan tankhia a, min bawlsak ding leh na gam adia na mite ma a thil thupitak leh thil lauhuai tak hih ding na mi Israelte bang khovel ah namdang kua a om a?
Huchi in Israel mite tangtawn a na mite a hong hihtheihna ding un nang adin na hihkipta hi.
Huchi in
Sepaihte
Sepaihte
Tuin
Huaiziak in, tuin na sikha inkuante na ma a tangtawn a a om gige theihna ding un vualzawl in.
Huan, huai nung in hichi ahi a, David in Philistia mite a sual a, a zou hi. Huchi in David in Philistia mite khut apan Metheg ammah a lak khiatsak hi.
Moab mite a sual a, lei ah a lumsak a, khau in a teh a; vual nih a that a, vual khat bel a hinghawi hi. Huchi in Moab mite David sikhate a hong hita ua, thilpiakte a hontawi uhi.
David in Euphrates lui a, gam la nawn dia hoh in Zobah kumpipa Rehob tapa Hadadezer leng a that hi.
Huchi in David in a sakol tungtuangmi sang khat leh za sagih leh lei sepaih sing nih a matsak hi. Huchi in kangtalai kai ding za khat chihlouh sakol tengteng a tha uh a sattan sak hi.
Damaska a Suria mite Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer huh dia kuante David in Suria mite lak a mi sing nih leh sang nih a that hi.
Huchi in David in Suria gam a Damaska ah sepaih a koih hi. Suria mite David sikhate a hong hita ua, siah a liau uhi.
David in Hadadezer pawlte dangkaeng lumte a laksak a, Jerusalem ah a paipih hi.
Hadadezer khopite Betah leh Berothai apan David in dal tampi a la hi.
Hamath kumpipa Toi in Hadadezer sepaih tengteng David in a zou chih a zak in,

Hadadezer a sual a, a zou chih a zak in chibai buk ding leh vualzawl din Toi in a tapa Joram David kiang ah a sawl a; David in lah Hadadezer dou in a na that khinta hi. Huchi in Joram in dangka belte, dangkaeng belte leh dal belte a hontawi hi.
Huaite leh namdang a zoh tengteng apan a lak dangka leh dangkaeng kumpipa David in
Suriate, Moabte, Ammon suante, Philistiate, Amalekte leh Zobah kumpipa Rehob tapa Hadadezer a kipan a gallakte.
David chiguam ah Suria mi sing khat leh sang giat a vathat a, a pailam in a minthang ta hi.
Edom ah sepaih a koih a; Edom gam teng ah sepaih a koih hi. Huchi in Edom mi tengteng David sikha a hong hita uh. Huchi in
Huchi in David in Israel mi tengteng tung ah vai a hawm a; David in a mitengteng tung ah diktattak in vai a hawm hi.
Zeruiah tapa Joab sepaih heutu pen ahi. Ahilud tapa Jehosaphat bel tanchin gelhpa ahi.
Ahitub tapa Zadok leh Abiathar tapa Ahimelek siampute ahi ua; Serai bel Laigelhmi ahi.
Jehoiada tapa Benai Kereth mi leh Pelet mite heutu ahi ua, David tapate bel vaihawmtu liante ahi uh.
David in, “Jonathan ziak a hehpihna ka latsak theihna ding in Saul inkawte lak a mi a omlai a om hia?” a chi hi.
Saul inkawte sikha khat a min Jiba a om hi. David kiang a hoh din a sam uhi. Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Jiba na hi hia?” a chi a; aman, “Na sikha amah ka hi” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n, “Pathian hehpihna ka latsak theihna di’n Saul inkawte lak a mi omlai omlou uhia? a chi hi.
Jiba in kumpipa kiang ah, Jonathan in tapa khat a neilai a, khebai ahi, a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Kaw om ahia?” a chi hi.
Jiba in kumpipa kiang ah, “Ngai in, Lodebar ah Amiel tapa Makir inn ah a om” a chi hi.
Huchi in kumpipa David in mi a sawl a, Lodebar apan Ammiel tapa Makir inn apan mi a va pisak hi.
Saul tapa Jonathan tapa Mephibosheth David kiang ah a honghi. A mai a leisi in zahtakna a pia hi. David in, “Mephibosheth,” a chi a; aman, “En in, na sikha” chi’n, a dawng hi.
David in a kiang ah, “Lau ken. Na pa Jonathan ziak in hehpihna k’on musak ngeingei ding. Na pu Saul gam tengteng k’on penawn dia, ka dohkan ah an na ne gige ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a kun a, “Ui sisa banglel n’on limsak, kei na sikha bang ka hia?” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n Saul sikha Jiba a sam a, a kiang ah, “Saul thil neih tengteng leh a inkawte thil tengteng na pu tapa ka pevek hi.

Amah adin lei na lehsak dia, nang leh na tapate leh na sikhate teng in na pu tapa in nekding a neihtheihna di’n na sepkhiakte na honla ding. Na pu tapa Mephibosheth in bel ka dohkan ah an a um gige ding” a chi hi. Jiba in tapa sawmlehnga leh sikha sawmnih a nei hi.

Huchi in Jiba in kumpipa kiang ah, Kumpipa ka toupa’n a sikha thu a piak bangzel in na sikha in a hih ding, a chi hi. Kumpipa’n, “Mephibosheth in ka dohkan ah kumpipa tapa bang in an a um ding” a chi hi.
Mephibosheth in tapa naupang a nei a, a min Mik ahi. Jiba inn a om tengteng Mephibosheth sikhate ahi uh.
Huchi in Mephibosheth Jerusalem ah a tengta hi. Kumpipa dohkana an a um gige ziak in; a khe langtuak bai ahi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huai nung in Ammon suante kumpipa a si a, a tapa Hanun in a mun ah vai a hawm hi.

David in, “Apan a hon na hehpih bang in ken leng Nahash tapa Hanun ka hehpih sam ding” a chi hi. Huchi in David in a pa tungtang thu a lungmuan din amah mite a sawl a, huchi in David mite Ammon suante gam a va tung uhi.

Himahleh Ammon suante makaite’n a toupa uh Hanun kiang ah, “David in na pa a zahtak ziak a na kiang a lungmuanmi honsawl hi in na um ahia? David in na mite khuate a hong hihsiatna dia zongkhe ding leh enkhe dia honsawl ahi ka hia?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in, Hanun in David mite a man a, a khamul langkhat uh a metsak a, a puansilhte uh a laitak ah a taw uh phazou lel in a tansak a, a sawlkheta hi.
David a hilhtak un, amau dawn ding mi a sawl hi. Amau lah a zum mahmah ngal ua. Kumpipa’n, “Na khamul uh a selsau ma in Jeriko ah omtadih unla, huai nung in hong paikik un” a chi hi.

Ammon suante’n David huatlam a na hihta uh, chih a theih un, Ammon suante’n Beth rehob a Suriate leh Zobah a Suriate sepaih sing nih leh kumpipa Maka mi sang khat, Tob mite sing khat leh sang nih toh a thukhak in a guai uhi.
David in huai a zak in Joab leh sepaih hangsan tengteng a sawl hi.
Ammon suante a hong kuan ua, kholutna kongkhak lam ah panmun a khoh uh. Zobah a mite leh Rehob a Suriate leh Tob leh Makate bel a tuam in pawn ah a om uhi.
Huchi in a malam uh leh a nunglam uah a honsual ding uh chih Joab in a theih in, Israel mite lak a mi hoih tata telkhia a, Suria mite sual din panmun a na khoh hi.
Midang tengteng a unaupa Abisai khut ah a koihvek a, Ammon suante sual din panmun a khoh hi.
“Suria mite ka zoh kei ding leh, nang n’on huh dia, Ammon suante na zoh kei ding leh ken k’on huh ding hi.
Hangtak in om unla, i mite leh i Pathian khua hum in i kipasal sak ding uh.
Huchi in Joab leh a kiang a mite’n Suria mite sual din kidouna mun a naih ua; a ma uah a taikek uhi.
Ammon suante’n Suria mite a taikek uh chih a theih un amau leng Abisai ma ah a taikek samta ua, khosung ah a lut uhi. Joab in Ammon suante a kiksan a, Jerusalem ah a paita hi.
Suria mite’n Israelte ma ah thah in a om uh chih a kitheih un a ki kaikhawm uhi.
Hadadezer in mi a sawl a, Lui khenlam a Suria mite a pikhia a, Hadadezer sepaih heutu Sobak in makai in lehlam ah a hongpai uhi.
Huai David a hilh ua, aman Israel mi tengteng a samkhawm a, Jordan luikan in Helam ah a pai uhi. David dou din Suria mite’n panmun khoh in a hong dou uhi.
Suria mite Israelte ma ah a taikek ua, David in Suria mi kangtalai za sagih tung a tuang leh sakol tung tuang mi sing li a that a, a sepaih heutu uh Sobak leng a that a, huai ah a sita hi.

Huchi in Hadadezer sikha a om kumpipa tengteng in Israelte ma ah tamtak thah ahi uh chih a theih un, Israelte toh kilemna a bawl ua, a sikha un a omta uh. Huchi in Suria mite’n Ammon suante a panpih ngam nawn kei uhi.

Huan, hichi ahi a, kum a hong kivei a, kumpipate galdou dia a kuankhiak lai un, David in Joab leh a sikhate tengteng a sawl a, Ammon suante a hihmang ua, Rabah khua a umkhum uhi. Himahleh David bel Jerusalem ah a tam nilouh hi.
Hichi ahi a, nitak ninem in a lupna apan David a thoukhia a, kumpipa inn tung ah a kahtou hi. Inn tung apan numei khat kisil lai a mu hi. Huai numei bel melhoih tak ahi.
David in mi a sawl a, huai numei tanchin a dong telsak hi. “Eliam tanu, Bathsheba, Hit mi Uriah zi ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
David in thupawte a sawl a, a va pita uh. A kiang a hongtung a, a na luppihta hi. A sianlouhna apan siansak khit ahita hi, huchi in a inn ah paikikta hi.
Huchi in numei a hong gaita a; “Nau ka paita” chi in David a thei sak hi.
David in Joab kiang ah, “Hit mi Uriah ka kiang ah honsawl in” chi’n a thukhak hi. Joab in David kiang ah Uriah a sawlta hi.
Uriah a kiang a tun in David in “Joab leh mite bang a chi ua, kidouna ah bang a chi ua?” chi in a dong hi.
David in Uriah kiang ah, “Na inn ah pai inla, na khete vasil in” a chi hi. Huchi in Uriah kumpipa in apan a pawtkhia a, kumpipa’n an nekding thawnpiak a zuisak hi.
Himahleh Uriah a toupa sikha tengteng lak a kumpipa inn kongkhak bul ah a giak a; a inn ah a pai kei hi.
“Uriah a inn ah a pai kei” chi a David a hilhtak un, David in Uriah kiang ah, “Khualzin hongtung hilou na hi maw? Bangdia na inn a pailou na hia?” a chi hi.

Uriah in David kiang ah, “Pathian bawm, Israelte leh Judahte aidakbuk a om gige ua, ka toupa Joab leh ka toupa sikhate gamlak ah a kikulh uh. Kei ka inn a pai in ka ne in ka ta in, ka zi kiang ah ka lum ding maw? Na hinna leh na kha hinna lou in ka gen ahi, huai zaw ka hih kei ding” a chi hi.
David in Uriah kiang ah, “Tuni leng hiai ah omlai inla, zingchiah na paina ding” a chi hi. Huchi in Uriah huai ni leh a zingchiang leng Jerusalem ah a omta hi.
David in amah a sam a, a ma ah ne in a dawn hi. A dawn khamsak hi. Nitaklam in a inn a pailou in a toupa sikhate lak ah a giak hi.
Hichi ahi a, a zingchiang in David in Joab lai a khak a, Uriah a pawsak hi.
Huai laikhak ah “Uriah gal khawkna pen ah ma phusak inla, a thah ua a sihna din kikhin san un” chi’n a gelh hi.
Hichi ahi a, Joab in khua a umlai in, mi hangsante omna hi a a theih ah Uriah a pangsak hi.
Khua a mite a pawtkhia ua, Joab a sual ua, David sikhate khenkhat a si ua, Hit mi Uriah leng a si hi.
Huchi in Joab in mi a sawl a, kidou tungtang thil tengteng David a hilhsak hi.
A mi sawl kiang ah, Kumpipa kiang a kidou tanchin tengteng na genkhit in,
A hong heh guih a, “Bangdia dou dia huchibang a khobul chin a hoh na hi ua? Kulh apan a honkap ding uh chih theilou na hi uh maw?”

Jerubeseth tapa Abimelek that kua ahia? Buh gawizanna suang tungnungpen numei in kulh apan a tung ah a khesuk a, Thebez ah a si ahi kei maw? Bangdia hichibang a kulh kiang chin a pai na hi ua?” a chih leh, “Na sikha Hit mi Uriah leng si eive, na chi ding uh,” chi’n, thu a pia hi.
Huchi in a mi sawl a kuanta a, a va tung a, Joab in a sawlsan tengteng David a hilh hi.
A mi sawl in David kiang ah, “Mite’n a hon na zou ua, pawn ah honsual ua, kou a kholutna kongkhak tanpha in ka nawhkik uhi.
Thalkap mite’n kulh apan na sikhate a honkap ua, huchi in kumpipa sikha khenkhatte a si ua, na sikha Hit mi Uriah leng a si” a chi hi.

Huchi in David in misawl kiang ah, Joab kiang ah huchi in vagen in. “Hiaite’n na lungsim kipaklou sak kei hen. Namsau in kuamah a khentuam ngalkei a, naksem in khua sual unla hihsia un, chi in, hanthawn in” a chi hi.
Uriah zi in a pasal Uriah a si chih a zak in a pasal a sun hi.
A sun hun a bei nung in David in a inn ah a pi a, a zi a hong hita a, tapa khat a neihsak hi. Himahleh David thilhih in
Huan,
Mi hausa in belamhon tampi leh ganhon tampi a nei hi.

Mi zawng in bel belamnou a nu neuchik khat lei a, a vulh kia lou ngal bangmah a neikei hi. Amah leh a tate toh khanglian khawm in a kuang sawk pih leh a nou kikoppih, a angsung a om, a tanu banggeih a a ngaihtuah ahi.
Mi hausa kiang ah khualzin mi khat a va tung hi. A kiang a mikhual tung amah belam leh gangoh phallou in mi zawngpa belamnou a gohsak zawta hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in huai mi tung ah David a heh mahmah a, Nathan kiang ah, “
Hichibang thil a hih ziak leh hehpihna a neih louh ziak in a belamnou a mun li in adin ding ahi” a chi hi.
Nathan in David kiang ah, “Huai mipa Nangmah na hi.
Na pu in k’on luahsak a, na pu zite na angsung ah ka koih hi. Israel leh Judah inkawte ka honpia a; huaite a tawmluat uleh thildangte leng hon piakbeh lai ding ka hi.
Bangdia
Huaiziak in, na inn apan namsau a paikhe kei ding. Kei hon ngaineu a, Hit mi Uriah zi na zi dia na lak ziak in.

hichi in a chi. Ngai in, nangmah inkawte mah nang kalh ding thil hoihlou ka tungkhe dia, na mitmuh mahmah in na zite k’on laksak dia, na inveng ka pedia, aman hiai sun khovak in na zite a luppih ding.
Nang a guk in na hih a, ken Israel mite tengteng mitmuh in sun khovak in ka hih ding” a chi hi.
David in Nathan kiang ah, “
Himahleh hiai na thilhih a Pathian gensiatna dia hunlemtang thupitak
Huchi in Nathan in a inn ah a paisanta hi. Uriah zi in David a suansak naupang tung ah
Huaiziak in, David in naupang adin Pathian kiang ah a ngen ngutngut a, an a ngawla, a lut a, zan khua in lei ah a lum hi.
A inkawte lak a upate a thou ua, lei apan kaithou din a kiang ah ading uh. Himahleh a thou nuam kei a, a kiang uah leng a ne sam kei.

Hichi ahi a, a ni sagih ni’n naupang a sita hi. David sikhate’n naupang a sita chih a hilh ngamkei uh. “Ngai in, naupang a damlai in a kiang ah thu i gen ua, a ngaikhe nuam kei a. Naupang a sita chih bangchi’n i hilh ngam dia? Bangchi hiam in thil hoihlou a kihih kha ding” a chi uhi.
Himahleh David in a sikhate kisimhou a muh in naupang a sita chih a theita hi. David in a sikhate kiang ah, “Naupang sita hia? a chi a, amau, “A sita” a chi uh.
Huchi in David lei apan a thou a, a kisil a, sathau a kinilh a, a puante a kheng a;
Huchi in a sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Na thilhih bangchidan ahia? Naupang a damlai in an na ngawl a, na kap a, himahleh naupang a sihtak in na thou a, an na ne a” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Naupang a damlai in anngawl in, ka kap hi. Naupang a damna din
Himahleh tuin a sita ngal a, bang din an ka ngawl dia? Ka pi kiknawn thei dia hia? A kiang ah ka pai dia, himahleh amah ka kiang ah a hong kiknawn kei ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in David in a zi Bathsheba a lungmuan a, a kiang ah a lut a, a luppih a, tapa a suang a, a min Solomon a sa hi.
Huchi in zawlnei Nathan a thukhak a, aman
Huchi in, Joab in Ammon suante khopi Rabah a sim a, khopi a lata hi.
Joab in David kiang ah mi a sawl a, “Rabah ka sim a, tuite khopi ka lata hi.
Tuin mi omlai teng kaikhawm inla, khopi sualtum in zuan inla, la in. Ken khopi la leng ka min a pu kha ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in David in mi tengteng a kaikhawm a, Rabah ah a hoh ua, a vasim ua, a lata uhi.
A kumpipa uh lallukhu khuklai a laksak a, a gikdan dangkaeng talent khat ahi a, suangmantamte leng a tel hi. David a khusak ua, khopi ah gallak tampi a la uhi.

Huchi in asung a om mipite a pikheta a, singatnate, leilehna sikzumte leh sik heipite zang in na a semsak hi. Lei haltakte a bawlsak a; Ammon suante khopi tengteng ah huchibang in a hih hi. Huchi in David leh mi tengteng Jerusalem ah a pai kiknawnta uh.
Huai nung in hichi ahi a, David tapa Absalom in sanggam numei melhoih khat a nei a, a min Tamar ahi. David tapa Amnon in amah a it hi.
Huchi in Amnon a sanggamnu Tamar ziak in a buai mahmah a; a chi a na hi. Amah lah nungak siangthou a hih ziak in a tung a thil banghiam hih haksapi ahi chi’n Amnon in a ngaihtuah hi.
Himahleh Amnon in lawm a nei a, a min Jonadab ahi. Amah David unaupa Shimea tapa ahi. Jonadab gitlouhpil mahmah mi khat ahi.

Aman Amnon kiang ah, “Aw, nang kumpipa tapa bangchidan ahia, a niteng a na gawn hulhul mawk? Hon hilhlou ding maw?” a chi hi. Amnon in a kiang ah, “Ka unaupa Absalom sanggamnu Tamar ka it a ahi,” a chi hi.

Jonadab in a kiang ah, “Na lupna ah lumlum inla, ki chinasak in. Na pa’n a hongveh chiang in a kiang ah, Hehpih in ka sanggamnu Tamar ka kiang ah honghoh henla, tanghou nekding hongpia hen. Ka muhtheih in ka mitmuh mahmah in nekding hon bawlsak leh, a khutngei ah ka na ne ding, na chi in” a chi hi.

Huchi in Amnon a lum a, a ki chinasakta hi. Kumpipa’n amah a va et in Amnon in a kiang ah, “Hehpih in ka sanggamnu Tamar hongpai henla, ka mitmuh mahmah in tanghou pek nih hiam hon bawlsak henla, amah khut mahmah ah ka ne ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in David in Tamar kiang ah, “Na sanggampa Amnon inn ah hoh inla, nekding va bawlsak dihve” chi din a in ah mi a sawl hi.
Huchi in Tamar, a sanggampa Amnon inn ah a hoh hi. Amah a na lum hi. Tangbuang a la a, a mek a, a mitmuh a tanghou pek bawl in a kang hi.
A kanna bel a la a, a ma ah a bungkhia hi. Himahleh aman a ne nuam kei hi.

Amnon in, “Mi tengteng in hon pawt khiak san uhen” a chi hi. Huchi in a pawt khiak sanvek uhi. Amnon in Tamar kiang ah, “Na khut mahmah a ka nek theihna din nekding dantan ah honla in,” a chi hi. Tamar in a tanghou pek bawl a la a, a sanggampa Amnon kiang ah dantan ah a la lut hi.
Nesak dia a kiang nai a a va paipih in a nalen a, a kiang ah, “Ka sanggamnu, ka kiang ah honglum in” a chi hi.
Aman a dawng a, “Hilou e, ka sanggampa, honchi teitei ken. Israelte lak ah hichibang thilhih ding ahi kei. Hiai thil gilou haihuaitak hih ken.
Ken ka maizumna koi ah ka paisak dia? Nang leng Israelte lak a mihaite lak a khat na hi ding. Huaiziak in, tuin kumpipa houpih zaw in, n’on neih a nial kei ding” a chi hi.
Himahleh a thu a zuikei a, amah sang in a hatzaw ngal a, thagum in a luppih teiteita hi.
Huchi in Amnon in huat chihtak in a hawta a, a huatna a itna sang in a lianzaw hi. Huchi in Amnon in a kiang ah, “Thou inla, paimang in” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Huchi ding ahi kei. Hichibang a dikloutak a n’on delhkhiak ka tung a na gamtatsa sang in a hoihkei zaw hi” a chi hi. Himahleh a zuinuam tuankei hi.
Huchi in a nasem sikha a sam a, “Hiai numei ka kiang apan pawtsak inla, kong khak bikbek in” a chi hi.
Puanaktual ze tuamtuam a gial a silh hi. Huchibang puanaktual kumpipa nungak siangthoute’n a silh uh ahi. Huchi in a sikha in a pikhia a, kong a khak bikbekta hi.
Tamar in a lu ah meivu a koih a, a puanaktual silh ze tuamtuam a botkek a, a sip ah a khut a koih a, ngaihtak a kapkawm in a paita hi.

A sanggampa Absalom inn a kiang ah, “Na sanggampa Amnon na kiang a om ahi maw? Himahleh tuin daimai in, ka sanggamnu, na sanggampa a ka, limsak dah in” a chi hi. Huchi in Tamar a sanggampa Absalom inn ah nguitak in a kikhumta hi.
Himahleh kumpipa David in huai tengteng a zak in a heh mahmah hi.
Absalom in Amnon kiang ah a sia a pha, bangmah a gen nuam kei hi. A sanggamnu Tamar a chih teitei ziak in Absalom in Amnon a haw mahmah hi.
Kum nih vengveng a beinung in hichi ahi a, Ephraim kiang a Baal hazar ah Absalom in belam mul a metsak hi. Hiai ah kumpipa tapa tengteng a chial hi.
Kumpipa kiang ah Absalom a hoh a, “Ngai in, na sikha in belam mul a metsak a, kumpipa leh a sikhate na sikha kiang ah hohle uh a keidia” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n Absalom kiang ah, “Hilou e, ka tapa, ka vek un hohlou e, k’on hih tuailuai law kha ding uh” a chi hi. Huchi in aman chial teitei mah leh a ut tuankei a, himahleh a vualzawl hi.
Huchi in Absalom in “Ahihkeileh ka unaupa Amnon bek ka kiang uah honghoh leh a ke” a chi hi. Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Bang din a honghoh tuamse dia?” a chi hi.
Himahleh Absalom in a ngen teitei a, huchi in Amnon leh kumpipa tapa tengteng a zuisak hi.

Absalom in, a sikhate kiang ah “Ngai un, Amnon uain dawn a nuam a saklai in na kiang ua Amnon that un, k’on chih leh, that unla, lau kei un, thu k’on pekhin hilou hia? Hangsantak in om unla, kipasal sak un” chi’n thu a pia hi.
Huchi in Absalom sikhate’n Amnon tung ah Absalom thupiak bang in a hih uh. Huchi in kumpipa tapa tengteng a thou ua, a sabiltung uah a tuangchiat ua, a taimangta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, lampi a a omlai un, Absalom in kumpipa tapate tengteng a thatvek a, khat lelleng a hawi kei hi, chi in David kiang ah thu a na tung hi.
Huchi in kumpipa a thou a, a puansilhte a botkek a, lei ah a lumta hi. A sikha tengteng in leng a puansilhte uh botkek in a kiang ah ading uhi.

David unau Shimea tapa Jonadab in a dawng a, “Ka toupa in kumpipa tapa tangval tengteng a thatvek uh chih gingta kei hen. Amnon kia ahi a si. A sanggamnu Tamar a chih teitei nungsiah Absalom in hichibang a hih a tup him ahi.
Huaiziak in tuin ka toupa, kumpipa’n kumpipa tapa tengteng a si uh chih gingta in lunghimawh kei hen. Amnon kia ahi a si” a chi hi.
Huai sung in Absalom a taimangta hi. Galvil tangval a dak a, a en a, ngai in, a nunglam a tangpang a lampi ah mi tampi a hongpai uhi.
Jonadab in kumpipa kiang ah, “Ngai in, kumpipa tapate a hongpai uh, na sikha in a gen banggeih a na hina” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, a genkhittak in ngai in, kumpipa tapate a hongtung ua, a aw uh suah in a kap uh. Kumpipa leng a sikhate toh kah petmah in a kapta uhi.
Himahleh Absalom a taimang a, Geshur kumpipa Amihud tapa Talmai kiang ah a hoh hi. David in niteng in a tapa a sun hi.
Absalom a taimang a, Geshur gam ah a hoh a, huai ah kum thum a va om hi.
Kumpipa David Absalom kiang a hoh a ut mahmah hi. Amnon tungtang thu ah a lung a muangta hi. Amah lah a sikhinta chih a theingal a.
Huchi in Zeruiah tapa Joab in kumpipa lungsim Absalom tung ah a om chih a na thei hi.
Huchi in Joab in Tekoa ah mi a sawl a, huai a numei pil khat a va pisak hi. A kiang ah, Lusun bang in kibawl inla, lusun puansilh inla, sathau leng kinilhlou in numei sawtpi misi sun bang in om in.
Kumpipa kiang ah hoh inla, a kiang ah hichibang in thu vagen in aw, a chi hi. Huchi in Joab in a kam ah thute a muam hi.
Tekoa khua a numei in kumpipa kiang a thugen di’n a mai a leisi in a khupboh a, zahtakna pia in, “toupa aw, honhuh in” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Bangchidan ahia?” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Meithai petmah ka hi a, ka pasal a sita hi.
Na sikha nu’n tapa nih a nei a, a nih un lou ah a kisual ua, kuamah phelh ding lah a omkei a, a khat pen in a dang a sat a, a thatta hi.

Ngai in, a inkuan tengteng in na sikhanu a dou khawm ua, a unaupa thatpa, a unaupa a thah ziak a ka thah sam theihna ding un hon pekhia in, huchi in gouluah dingpa leng ka that pah ngal ding uh, a chi uh. Huchibang in ka mei am omlai a mitsak ding ua, ka pasal min neilou leh leitung a suan himhim neilou in a om mai ding” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n numei kiang ah, “Na inn ah pai inla, na tungtang thu ah thu ka pe mai ding” a chi hi.
Tekoa khua a numei in kumpipa kiang ah, “Ka toupa, kumpipa aw, huai gitlouhna mawh ka tung leh ka pa inkawte tung ah ke mai hen. Kumpipa leh a mangtutphah in mawhpaw kei hen” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n, “Kuapeuh na tung a banghiam gen peuhmah ka kiang ah honpi inla, a hon khoih nawn hetkei ding uh” a chi hi.
Aman, “Sisan suahmite tung a phulamite’n hihmang nawnlou ding in kumpipa’n
Huchi in numei in, “Na sikhanu in toupa ka pu kiang ah thu kam khat kia k’on gen nawn peuhmah ding aw” a chi hi. Aman, “Gen ve” a chi hi.
Numei in, “Ahihleh bang ziak in ahia Pathian mite dou a hichibang a hihtum na hia? Hiai thu apan kumpipa mawh in a kilang ahi, kumpipa’n a delhmangpa a pi kiknawnlouh ziak in.
Ka si ngeingei ding ua, lei a bawsa luahnawn theihlouh tuisik bang ka hi uh. Pathian in hinna a lamang kei a, a delhmangpa amah apan hawlkhiak ahihlouhna ding lunggel ahizaw hi.
Huchi in toupa ka pu kiang a hiai thu gendia ka hongleng mite’n a hon lauhsak ziak uh ahi. Na sikhanu’n, kumpipa kiang ah ka genphot dia, kumpipa’n a sikhanu nget a hihsak khakleh, ka chi a ahi.
Kumpipa’n kei leh ka tapa Pathian gouluahlou dia hihman tummi lak a na sikhanu hunkhe din a na ngaikhe ding, ka chi hi.
Huchi in na sikhanu adin, toupa, ka pu thu lungmuanhuaitak hi henla; a sia a pha na khen din toupa ka pu lah Pathian angel bang mai ahi ngal a.
Kumpipa’n a dawng a, numei kiang ah, “Kondot peuhmah bangmah hon im ken aw” a chi hi. Numei in, “Toupa ka pu in gen leh a ke” a chi hi.

Kumpipa’n, “Hiai thu himhim ah Joab in panna a nei hia?” a chi hi. Numei in a dawng a, “toupa, ka pu, na kha hinna lou in ka gen ahi, toupa ka pu in a gensa kuamah in taklam hiam, veilam ah hiam a pel theikei ding uh. Na sikha Joab in honsawl a, hiai thu tengteng na sikhanu a honmuam vek hi.
Thil omdan hih lamdang din hiai thil na sikha Joab in a hih ahi. Ka pu bel khovel a thil om tengteng theithei in Pathian angel bang a pil ahi” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n Joab kiang ah, “Ngai in, ka hihsamta hi. Huaiziak in, pai inla, tangval Absalom vapi nawn lechin maw” a chi hi.

Joab in a mai a leisi in a khupboh a, kumpipa kiang ah kipahthu a gen hi. Joab in, “toupa ka kumpipa aw, toupa’n a sikha ngetna a lohchin sak ziak in tuni in na sikha in na mit ka tung chih ka na theita hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Joab a thou a, Geshur ah a hoh a, Absalom Jerusalem ah a honpita hi.
Kumpipa’n, “A ma inn ah pai henla, ka mel hong mu kei hen,” a chi hi. Huchi in Absalom a ma inn ah a pai a, kumpipa mel a muta kei hi.
Israel tengteng lak ah Absalom bang a melhoih a phatloh kuamah a omkei uh. A khe lek apan a lusip pha in gensiatna himhim a omkei hi.
A sam a met chiang in, kum kivei teng in a metsak a, a sam lah a gik ziak in a metzel hi, a bukzel a, kumpipa bukna sekel za nih a pha hi.
Absalom in tapa thum leh tanu khat a nei a, a min Tamar ahi a, melhoih tak ahi.
Absalom kum nih hilhial Jerusalem ah a om a; himahleh kumpipa mel himhim a mu kei hi.
Absalom in kumpipa kiang a amah sawl din Joab a thukhak hi. Himahleh a hoh nuam kei a, a thukhak nawn in leng a hohnuam tuankei hi.
Huchi in a sikhate kiang ah, “I aw, Joab lou, kei lou kiang ahi a, barli buh a nei a, va hal un” a chi hi. Huchi in Absalom sikhate’n lou a va halta uh.
Huchi in Joab a thou a, Absalom kiang ah a inn ah a hoh a, “Bangdia na sikhate’n ka lou hal ahi ua?” a chi hi.

Absalom in Joab a dawng a, “Ngai dih, Bangdia Geshur apan hongpai ka hia? Huai ah omden leng kei adia hoihzaw mah ding hiven. Kumpipa kiang a sawl dia hon thukhak ka hi. Huaiziak in tuin kumpipa mel hon musak in. Tatlekna nei ka hihleh honthat mai leh a ke” a chi hi.
Joab kumpipa kiang ah a hoh a, a hilh hi. Aman Absalom a sam a, kumpipa kiang ah a hoh a, kumpipa ma ah a mai a leisi in a khupboh a; huchi in kumpipa’n Absalom a tawp hi.
Huaikhit in hichi ahi a, Absalom in kangtalai leh sakolte leh mi sawmnga a ma a tai din a bawlkhol hi.

Absalom zingkhang in a thou a, kulh kongkhak lampi nawl ah a na ding hi. Thubuai a na khensak dia kumpipa kiang a hongpai peuhmah a na sam a, “Kua khua na hia?” a na chizel hi. Amau, “Na sikha Israel namte lak a khat ka hi” a chizel uh.
Absalom in, “I aw, na thu a hoih in a dik hi. Himahleh a ngaikhe ding mi kumpipa’n kuamah a sepkei” a na chizel hi.

Absalom mah in, “Michih thubuai gen ding nei hiam, nget ding nei hiam peuhmah ka kiang ah hongpaina ding un, gam vaihawmpa in bawl in om leng china tel ing e aw! Huchi in diktak in vai ka na hawmsak ding” a na chi zel hi.
Hichi leng ahilai a, kuapeuh amah zahtakna pedia hong paitou peuhmah a khut in a na sawka, a na len a, a na tawp hi.
Israel mi kumpipa kiang a thugen dia hong kuan peuhmahte Absalom in huchibang in a na hihzel hi. Huchi in Absalom in Israel mite lungtang a guksak hi.
Hichi ahi a, kum li a hong bei in Absalom in kumpipa kiang ah, Hebron khua a
Na sikha in Suria gam a Geshur a ka omlai in Jerusalem a a hon pikik peuhmah leh
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Khamuangtak in kuan in” a chi hi. Huchi in a thou a, Hebron ah a hohta hi.
Himahleh Absalom in, “Pengkul ging na zak peuhmah chiang un, Hebron ah Absalom kumpipa ahita, na chi ding uh” chi in Israel nam tengteng kiang ah mi a simsawl khinta hi.
Jerusalem apan a sap mi za nih in Absalom a zui uh. Amau bel lungsim siangtak pu in a hoh ua, thil omdan bangmah a theikei uhi.
Absalom in kithoihnate a latlai in Gilon mi Ahitophel, David thudotmi, a Giloh khua apan a thukhak hi. A thusawm guk uh a thupi mahmah a; Absalom lam ah lah mipite a pung hulhul uhi.
David kiang ah, Israel mite lungtang Absalom lam ah a awn mahmah, chih thupuatu khat in a honghilh hi.

David in Jerusalem a om, a sikha tengteng kiang ah, “Thou unla i taikhe ding uh. Kuamah lah Absalom apan suakta lou ding i hi ngal ua. Pawtkhe meng un. Huchilou in zaw a hon phapah mai dia, i tung uah thil hoihlou tak a hontun dia, namsau in khua a hongsual kha ding” a chi hi.
Kumpipa sikhate’n kumpipa kiang ah, “Ngai in, na sikhate ka toupa, ka kumpipa un a seh peuhmah hihdia mansa ka hi gige uh” a chi uhi.
Kumpipa a pawt a, a inkaw tengteng in a zui uhi. Kumpipa’n inn ngak din numei sawm, a meite a koih hi.
Kumpipa a pawt a, mi tengteng in a zui uh. Gamla kuam mun khat, inn tawpna ah a khawl tadih uhi.
A sikha tengteng in a paikheng ua; Keritmite, Peletmite, Gitmite, mi za guk Gath apan amah honzuite kumpipa ma ah a pai uhi.
Huchi in, kumpipa’n Gitmi Ittai kiang ah, “Bangchidan ahia nang na hongtel? Pai kiknawn inla, kumpipa kiang ah om in. Nang zaw mikhual gamdangmi leng na hi ngal a, nangmah mun lam ah kiknawn mai in.

Zan zeka hong na hi a, tuni a ka kiang ua asuk atou a honzui sam din k’on chi ding maw? Ka pai theihtheihna a pai ding ka hi, nang zaw kiknawn inla, na unaute tengteng pi kiknawn in. Hehpihna leh thutak na kiang ah om hen” a chi hi.
Ittai in kumpipa kiang ah, “
David in Ittai kiang ah, “Pai inla, pai zel aw leh” a chi hi. Huchi in Gitmi Ittai, a mite tengteng leh a tu a ta tengteng toh a pai uhi.
Ngaihtak in huai gam miteng a kap ua, mipite a paivek uh. Gamdai lampi zuan in a pai ua, kumpipa’n leng Kidron lui a kan a, mipi tengteng in leng a kan uhi.
Zadok Pathian thukhun bawm zawng in Levite tengteng toh a kiang ah a pai uhi. Pathian bawm a nga ua, mipi in khua a pawt khiak sanvek tan in Abiathar a hohtou hi.
Kumpipa’n Zadok kiang ah, “Pathian bawm pen khopi sung ah zawnglut nawn un.
Himahleh, nang ah kipahna mahmah ka neikei, a chih leh ngai in, hichimai ka hi a, hoih a sak bangbang in ka tung ah hihmai hen” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n siampu Zadok kiang ah, “Mutheipa na hi ka hia? Na tapate nih, na tapa Ahimaaz leh Abiathar tapa Jonathan toh lungmuangtakin khopi ah pai nawn un.
Ngai in, kei zaw tanchin a hong theihsak masiah uh gamdai a luikannate ah ka na om ding” a chi hi.
Zadok leh Abiathar in Pathian bawm Jerusalem ah a paipih nawn ua; huai ah a omta uh.
David Olive tang paitouhna ah a kahtou a, a paitouh kawm in a kap kawmkawm hi. A lu a khuh a, khevuak in a pai hi. A kiang a mi om tengteng in a lu uh a khuhchiat ua, kap kawmkawm in a paitou uhi.
Kua hiam khat in Ahitophel Absalom lam a pangin thusawmmite lak ah a pangsam, chih David a hilh hi. David in “
Hichi ahi a, David Pathian biakna tangvum a kahkhiak touh leh ngai in, Arka mi Hushai a puanak bohkek silh a, a lu a leikai niaunuau in amah dawn din a hongpai hi.
David in a kiang ah, “Ka kiang a na hongsam leh zaw, kei adin puakgik na hi ding.

Himahleh khopi a na kiknawn a, Absalom kiang a, toupa aw, na sikha in ka om ding. Tuma lam a na pa sikha a ka om bang in, tuin na sikha in ka om leuleu ding, na vachih leh Ahitophel lemtheihna hon dalsakpa na hi zaw ding hi.
Huai ah na kiang ah siampu Zadok leh Abiathar leng a omsam uh ahi kei maw? Hichi ahi ding a, kumpipa inn a thupawt na zak peuhmah siampu Zadok leh Abiathar na hilh zel ding.
Ngai in, a tapate uh nih Zadok tapa Ahimaaz leh Abiathar tapa Jonathan leng a kiang uah a om uhi. Na thil zak peuhmahte hon theisak din amau na honsawl zel ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in David lawm Hushai khopi ah a lut a; Absalom Jerusalem ah a lutta hi.

Huan, David in tangvum kahkhiakna a khenzek nung in, ngai in, Mephibosheth sikha Jiba in sabiltung nih toh a na dawn hi. Sabiltung nihte’n tanghou beu za nih, grep phoukeu bawk za khat, nipi thei za khat leh uain thawl khat a pua uhi.

Kumpipa’n Jiba kiang ah, “Hiaite bangchidan ahia?” a chi hi. Jiba in, “Sabiltungte kumpipa inkuanpihte tuanna ding ahi. Tanghou leh nipi theite tangvalte nekding; Uain bel gamdai a bah peuhmahte dawn ding ahi” a chi hi.

Kumpipa’n, “Ahihleh na pu tapa koi ah?” a chi hi. Jiba in kumpipa kiang ah, “Ngai in, Jerusalem ah a om. ‘Tuni’n Israel inkawte’n ka pa lalgam a honpe kiknawn ding uh’ ” chi a a ngaihtuah ziak in, a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n Jiba kiang ah, “Ngai in, Mephibosheth thilneih tengteng nang a ahivekta” a chi hi. Jiba in, “Ka toupa, kumpipa aw, na mitmuh a hehpihna mu din kingainiamtakin k’on ngen” a chi hi.
Kumpipa David Bahurim a tun in ngai in, Saul inkawte lak a mi Gera tapa, a min Shimei a hong pawtkhia a; hamsia loukawm kawm in a hong paitou hi.
Suang in David a deng a, kumpipa David sikha tengteng leng; Mi tengteng leh sepaih hat tengteng a taklam leh veilam ah a om uhi.
Shimei in hamsiat in hichi in a chi: “Paimang vengveng in, pai mang vengveng in, nang sisan suahhat leh Belial mipa:
A sik a vai na hawm Saul inkawte tengteng sisan
Huchi in Zeruiah tapa Abisai in kumpipa kiang ah, “Bangdia hiai ui sisa in toupa, ka pu hamsiat mawkmawk ahia? Ka kuantou ding a a lu ka tansak mai ding?” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n, “Nou Zeruiah tapate aw, nou n’on theihsak ding uh bang a om a?
David in Abisai leh a sikhate tengteng kiang ah, “Ngai un, ka tapa, ka gil a gah mahmah in honthah a tum hi. Hiai Benjamin mi’n naktup sem nan chia! Bangmah loh kei unla, hamsia ahihleh loh hen.
ka haksatna a honmu dia,
Huchi in David leh a mite lampi ah a pai zel uh. Shimei bel a gal tangpang ah a pai zel a, a paikawm in a hamsiat zel a, suang in a deng a, leivui in a theh hi.
Huchi in kumpipa leh a kiang a mi om tengteng Aiphim a tungta uh. Huchi in huai ah a khawl tawldam uhi.
Absalom leh Israel mi tengteng Jerusalem ah a hoh ua, a lak uah Ahitophel leng a tel hi.
Hichi ahi a, Arka mi Hushai, David lawm, Absalom kiang a tunin Absalom kiang ah, “Pathian in kumpipa humbit hen, Pathian in kumpipa humbit hen” a chi hi.
Absalom in Hushai kiang ah, “Hichibang ahi maw na lawm na hehpihna dan? Bangdia na lawm kiang a hoh lou?” a chi hi.
Hushai in Absalom kiang ah, “Ka hohkei ding.
Kua na ka sem dia? A tapa ma ah na ka sem ding ahi kei maw? Na pa ma a ka sep bang in nangmah ma ah ka sem ding” a chi hi.
Absalom in Ahitophel kiang ah, “Bangchi’n i hih diam aw, na ngaihdan gen dihve” a chi hi.
Ahitophel in Absalom kiang ah, “Na pa mei, inn ngak a a koihte luppih in. Israel mi tengteng in na pa’n nang a hon mudah chih a naza ding ua; nang lam a pang tengteng khut a hat ding” a chi hi.
Absalom adin inn tung ah puanin a kai uh. Huchi in Israel mi tengteng mitmuh in pa meite a luppih hi.
Huailai in Ahitophel lemtheihnate, Pathian thu dongpa lemtheihna bang ahi a; huchi mah bang in David leh Absalom in leng Ahitophel a na ngai uhi.
Huailou leng Ahitophel in Absalom kiang ah, “Mi sing khat leh sang nih ka telkhe dia, tuzan in David delh din ka kuan ding
A bahlai leh hatlouh laitak ka vapha n’on dia, ka va lausak ding. Huchi in a kiang a mi tengteng a taimang ding uh. Huchi in kumpipa kia ka vathat mai ding.
Mipite na kiang ah k’on pikik nawn vekding. Na mi zonpa mi tengteng hongkik toh kibang ahi. Huchi in mi tengteng khamuang in a om ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan, hiai thugen in Absalom leh Israel upate a kipaksak hi.
Huchi in Absalom in, “Arka mi Hushai sam peuhmah phot inla, amah gendan i ngaikhe peuhmah ding uh” a chi hi.
Hushai Absalom kiang a hongtun in Absalom in, “Ahitophel in hichibang in a gen a, a genbang a hih ding i ding uam? Hihlou ding hileng nang hon gen himhim dih” chi in a na houpih hi.
Hushai in Absalom kiang, “Tutunga Ahitophel lemtheihna a hoih kei” a chi hi.
Hushai in, “Na pa leh a mite na thei a, sepaih hangsantak, gam a vompi a nou laksak bang mai ahi uh. Na pa lah galdou mi ahi a, mipi lak ah a giak kholkei ding.

‘Ngai in, tuin leng koilai leihawm hiam ah, koilai mun ah hiam a kibu ahi ding. Hichi ahi ding a, a kisual tung ua mi khenkhat a puk ua leh a za peuh in, Absalom zuite a that ek uh, a chimai ding uh’.

Huchi in mi hangsantak, humpinelkai lungsim bangpu mi hial leng a hong lungke mahmah ding uh. Israel mi tengteng in lah na pa sepaih hangsantak ahihdan leh a kiang a mi omte mi hangsan taktak ahihdan uh a thei vek uhi.
‘Kei hoihsak sam dan, Israel mi tengteng Dan apan Beer–sheba pha in tuipi a piaunel zah hial ding na kiang ah samkhawm vek lehang; kidouna ah nang nangawn kuan lechin.
Huchi in koilai mun peuh ah i kituahna na ah lei a daitui kia bang mai in i boh ding ua; amah leh a kiang a mi om tengteng khat lel leng i hawikei ding uhi.
Huailou leng, khua a a lut leh Israel mi tengteng, khauhual tawi in huai khua ah i vahoh ding ua, suang neuchik leng omlou hial khop in lui ah i kaikhe vek ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Absalom leh Israel mi tengteng in, “Arka mi Hushai hoih sak Ahitophel hoihsak sang in a hoihzaw” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Hushai in siampu Zadok leh Abiathar kiang ah, “Huchibang khachibang in Ahitophel in Absalom leh Israel upate hoih din a ngaihtuah pih a; ken huchibang khachibang in hoih din ka ngaihtuah hi.
Huaiziak in, tuzan in gamdai lui kainate a giak nawnlou in kan ngeingei un. Huchilou in zaw kumpipa leh a kiang a om tengteng a hihmang vek kha ding uh chi’n David hilhsak zok un” a chi hi.
Khopi sung a lut uh kuama’n a muhlouhna ding un, Jonathan leh Ahimaaz bel En-rogel ah a om ua; sikhanu khat in amaute a va hilhzel hi. Amau kumpipa David a va hilh sawnzel uhi.
Himahleh naupang in a na mu a, Absalom a hilh hi. Himahleh a nih un a taimang pah ua, Bahurim a mi khat, a intual a tuileh nei in ah a va hoh ua, tuileh sung ah a lutsukta uhi.
Numei in tuileh a sitna in a sin a, a tung ah buh a phou a, kuama’n a theikei hi.
Absalom sikhate numei kiang ah a vahoh ua;
Ahimaaz leh Jonathan kaw om ahi ua? a chi uh.
Numei in a kiang uah, Lui a kanta ding uh, a na chi hi. A va zong ua, a mu kei ua, Jerusalem ah a kiknawn uh.
Hichi ahi a, a paitum khit un tuileh apan a hong pawtkhia ua, kumpipa David a va hilh uhi. David kiang ah, “Pawtkhia unla, luikan pah un, huchi in Ahitophel in a hontum hi” a chi uh.
Huchi in David leh a kiang a mi om tengteng a pawtkhia ua, Jordan lui a kan uh. Khua a hongvak in Jordan lui kanlou khat lel leng a omkei uh.

Ahitophel in a hoihsak dan a zuikei uh, chih a theih in a sabiltung a van a, a pawtkhia a, a khua ah a pai hi. A inkuante khosakna ding a bawlsak sipsip a, huchi in a awklumta hi. Amah a sita a, a pa han ah a vui uhi.
Huchi in David Mahanaim a vatung hi. Absalom in a kiang a Israel mi tengteng toh Jordan lui a kan uhi.
Absalom in Joab sik in Amasa sepaih heutu din a koih hi. Amasa bel, mi khat a min Ithra tapa ahi. Ithra bel Israel mi, Joab nu sanggam Nahash tanu Abigail zi a neipa ahi.
Israel mite leh Absalom in Gilead gam ah panmun a khoh uhi.
Hichi ahi a, David Mahanaim a tun in, Ammon suan Rabah khua a mi Nahash tapa Shobi, Lo Debar khua a mi Amiel tapa Makir, leh Rogelim khua a Gilead mi Barjilaite’n
Lupnate, maiphiatkuangte, leibelte, huitbuh, barli buh, tangbuang, be kankeu,
Khuaizu, mokhon, belamte, bawng nawikhalte, David leh a kiang a om mite nekding a hontawi uhi. “Gamdai ah mite a gilkial ua, a tawl ua, a dangtak uhi” a chih ziak un.
Huan, David in a kiang a om mite a sim a, sepaih sang tung a heutute, za tung a heutute a bawl hi.

David in mite a sawlkhia a, mun thum a khen, mun khat Joab in a heu a, mun thum a khen mun khat Joab unaupa Zeruiah tapa, Abisai in a heu a, mun thum a khen, mun khat Gitmi Ittai in a heu hi. Kumpipa’n mite kiang ah, “Keimah leng nou toh ka kuan ngeingei ding” a chi hi.

Himahleh mipite’n, “Kuan lou e. Koute zaw na taimang hita le ung leng, khawk a sa kei ding uh. A kimkhat hiam vasi le ung leng khawk a sa kei lai ding uh. Nang koute sing khat sang in na manpha zaw hi. Huaiziak in khopi apan hon panpih dia nana om a hoihzaw hi” a chi uh.
Kumpipa’n a kiang uah, “Hoih nasak bangbang un ka hih ding” a chi hi. Huchi in kumpipa kulh kongpi bul ah ading a, mipi tengteng a zaza in leh a sangsang in a paikhe zungzung uhi.

Kumpipa’n Joab, Abisai leh Ittai kiang ah, kei ziak in tangval Absalom tung ah nemtak in hih un, chi in thu a pia hi. Mipi tengteng in Absalom tungtang thu a kumpipa’n sepaih heutute tengteng thu a piaklai a za uhi.
Huchi in mipite Israel mite dou din kidouna mun ah a hohta ua; a kidouna uh Ephraim gammang ahi.
Huai ah David mite ma ah Israel mite a vuallel ua, huai ni’n sepaih sing nih a that uhi.
A kidouna un huai gam tengteng a uapvek ngal a. Huai ni’n namsau sang in leng gammang sung a mang a si a tamzaw hi.

Absalom in David mite a bingtuah guih hi. Absalom a sabiltung tung a tuang ahi a, sabiltung tawsaw singhiang bawkpha tak nuai ah a lut a, a lu tawsaw sing ah a awkta hi. Lei phalou, van phalou in a luai nilouh hi. Sabiltung a taisuak hi.
Kuahiam in mu in, Joab a hilh a, “Ngai in, tawsaw sing ah Absalom kikhai nilouh ka mu,” a chi hi.
Joab in a hilhpa kiang ah, “Ngai in, huai lah na mu ngal a, bangdia hih lum a lei a kesak pah ngallou? Huchibang a hih hile chin dangka sawm leh kawnggak hon pepah ding hi veng in” a chi hi.

Huai mi’n Joab kiang ah, “Dangka sang mu ding hileng le kumpipa tapa tung ah ka khut ka kha kei himhim ding, i bil ua i zak mahmah in kumpipa’n nang leh Abisai leh Ittai kiang ah, Tangval Absalom kuamah in khoih hetkei un, chi in thu a honpe ngal a.
Ginom huailou tak in na that mawk leng, kumpipa lak ah lah bangmah sel theih ahi ngalkei a, nang lah na kihulsak nawn maimah tuak ngal a” a chi hi.
Huchi in Joab in, “Hichibang in na kiang ah ka om nilouh thei hetkei” a chi hi. Teipi thum a tawi a, tawsaw sing lak a na hinglai Absalom lungtang a dawt pailet hi.
Joab galvantawi tangval sawmin a hongum ua, Absalom a sun ua, a thatta uhi.
Joab in pengkul a mut a, Israelte delh mipite a hong kiknawn ua; Joab in mite a na nang bikbek hi.
Absalom luang a la ua, gammang ah leihawm thukpi ah a pai ua, a tung ah suang a sekhawm venvon uhi. Huchi in Israel mi tengteng amau puanin chiat ah a taikekta uhi.

Absalom in a damlai in kumpipa guam ah amah theihgigena ding suang a na phutkhin hi. Ka min a dailouhna ding tapa lah ka nei ngal kei a, chi in amah min a tamsak hi. Huchi in tunitan in hiai Absalom theihgigena suangphuh chih in a om hi.
Huchi in Zadok tapa Ahimaaz in, “Ka vatai dia,
Joab in a kiang ah, “Tuni’n zaw tanchin vahilh nai ken. Nidang chiang in tanchin va hilhzaw in, kumpipa tapa a sih ziak in, tuni’n zaw tanchin bangmah va hilhdah in” a chi hi.
Joab in Kush mi kiang ah, “Kuan inla, na thilmuh kumpipa va hilh dihve” a chi hi. Huchi in Kush mi a kun a, a taikhe pah hi.
Zadok tapa Ahimaaz in Joab kiang ah, “A koi a bang hileh, Kush mipa ka vadelh ding” a chi hi. Joab in, “Ka tapa aw, tanchin hilhman lah na mu kei dia, bangdia tai ding na hia?” a chi hi.
Himahleh aman, “A koi a bang hileh ka tai ding” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Tai maive leh” a chi hi. Huchi in Ahimaaz phaizang lampi ah a tai a, Kush mipa a makhelh hi.
David kulh kongpi chial kikal ah a na tu hi. Galvilpa kulh kongpi pawnung zaw pen tunglam ah a paitou a, a dak vialvial hi. Ngai in, mi khat amah kia in a hongtai hi.
Galvilpa a kikou a, kumpipa a hilh hi. Kumpipa’n, “Mi khat kia ahihleh tanchin hong gen ding nei ahi ding” a chi a; a hongpai mengmeng a, a hongnai hiaihiai hi.
Galvilpa’n midang hongtai a mu nawn hi. Galvilpa’n kongkhak vilpa a sam a, “Ngai in, midang amah kia in a hongtai nawn” a chi hi. Kumpipa’n “Aman leng tanchin hongtun sam ding ei ve’ a chi hi.
Galvilpa’n, “A masapen taidan Zadok tapa Ahimaaz taidan bang mahmah in ka thei” a chi hi. Huan, kumpipa’n, “Amah mi hoih mahmah ahi, tanchinhoih hontun ding ahi” a chi hi.
Ahimaaz in a sam a, kumpipa kiang ah, “Bangkim a hoih e” a chi hi. A mai a leisi in kumpipa ma a kun in, “

Kumpipa’n, “Tangval Absalom a dam na maw?” a chi hi. Ahimaaz in a dawng a, “Joab in kumpipa sikha, kei na sikha mahmah a honsawl khiaklai in a buai nuainuai uh ka mu a, himahleh bang ahia chih ka theikei” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n, “Ka pam ah hong dingta dih in” a chi hi. Huchi in a pam ah a na ding hi.
Ngai in, Kush mi a hongtung hi. Kush min, “toupa ka kumpipa adin tanchin ka hontun hi. Na tung a helte tengteng phu tuni’n
Kumpipa’n Kush mi kiang ah, “Tangval Absalom a dam na maw?” a chi hi. Kush mi in a dawng a, “toupa, ka kumpipa melmate leh na siatna zongmite tengteng huai tangval bang in omvek uheh” a chi hi.

Huchi in kumpipa a lungdong mahmah a, kulh kongpi tung a dantan ah a hohtou a a vakap hi. A paitouh kawm in, “Aw, ka tapa Absalom, ka tapa Absalom, na sihsik in sizaw mai leng maw, Aw Absalom, ka tapa, ka tapa” a chi hi.
Huan, Joab a hilh ua, “Ngai in, kumpipa’n kap in Absalom a sun hi” a chi uh.
Huai ni a a vualzohna uh mi tengteng adin sunna a honghi zawta hi. “A tapa ziak in kumpipa a lungkham mahmah” a chih uh huai ni’n mite’n lah a na zata ngal ua.
Mite kidouna a mi taimang a zum ziak a a guk a paimang bang in huai ni’n a guk in khopi ah a lut uhi.
Kumpipa’n a mai a hum a, “Aw, ka tapa Absalom, aw Absalom, Ka tapa, ka tapa!” chi in kumpipa a kap huphup hi.
Joab inn ah kumpipa kiang ah a lut a, “Na hinna, na tapate hinna, na tanute hinna, na zite leh na meite hinna humbit mite tuni in zumtak in na bawlta hi.

Nang honhawte na it a, nang hon itte na hua hi. Heutute leh sepaihte nang adia bangmah hilou bang in tuni in na hihlangta hi. Absalom dam in, kou midang tengteng tuni in sizaw vek le ung, na kipahlam tak hi leh kilawm in ka thei hi.
Huaiziak in, thou inla, pawtkhia in. Na mite lungmuansak ding lamthu gen in. Na pawt khiak kei leh

Huchi in kumpipa a thou a, kulh kongpi ah a va tu hi. “Ngai un, kumpipa kulh kongpi ah a tu hi” chi in mipi tengteng a hilh uhi. Mipi tengteng kumpipa ma ah a va hoh uhi. Israelte bel amau puanin chiat ah a taikek uhi.
Israel nam a mi tengteng a kisel vengvung ua, “Kumpipa’n i melmate khut apan a hon hunkhia a, Philistiate khut apan a hon hondamta. Tuin Absalom ziak in gam a taikhiak san hi.
Absalom i kumpipa dia thau i nilhpa uh lah kidouna ah a sita a; Bang a chia kumpipa pikikna ding kamkhat bek na genlouh uh?” a kichi uh.

Kumpipa’n siampu Zadok leh Abiathar kiang ah a sawl a, Judah upate kiang ah, “Bangdia kumpipa a inn a pikik thu a, a zekai pen a pang na hi ua? Israel mite’n kumpipa pikik thu a gen ulah kumpipa kiang a tungta hi.
Ka unaute na hi ua, ka guh leh ka sa lah na hi ngal ua, bang a chia a zekaipen a pang peuhmah na hi ua? chi in vagen un” a chi hi.
Amasa kiang ah, “Ka guh leh ka sa na hi ka hia? Joab sik a ka ma a sepaihte heutu a k’on bawl kei leh, Pathian in a lohloh honloh mai henla, huai sang a thupizaw in leng, a chi” chi din mi a sawl hi.
Huchi in Judah mi tengteng lungtang mi khat lungtang bang mai in a awnsakta hi. Huchi in kumpipa kiang ah, “Na mi tengteng toh hong kiknawn un” chi din mi a sawl uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa a pai nawn a, Jordan a hongtung hi. Kumpipa dawn a, Jordan a na pi galkai din Gilgal ah Judahte a hoh uhi.
Hahurim a Benjamin mi Gera tapa Shimei leng kintak in kumpipa dawn din Judahte mah toh kiton in a pawtkhia hi.
A kiang ah Benjamin mi sang khat toh, Saul inkawte sikha Jiba, a tapa sawmlehnga leh a sikha sawmnih toh ahi ua, kumpipa ma in Jordan a galkahta uhi.
Kumpipa inkawte pi galkahna ding leh hoih a sak bangbang a hih din long a paipih uh. Jordan lui a galkah leh Gera tapa Shimei kumpipa ma ah a khupboh hi.

Kumpipa kiang ah, “Ka toupa’n thulimlouhna nei in hon sepkei henla; toupa ka kumpipa’n Jerusalem a pawtsan ni a na sikha in dikloutak a na hihte leng theigige sam kei hen. Kumpipa’n a lungtang ah paikei hen.
Na sikha in thil ka hihkhial chih ka kithei hi. Huaiziak in, ngai in, Joseph inkaw tengteng lak a ka toupa kumpipa mu dia tuni a hongpawt masapen ka hi” a chi hi.
Himahleh Zeruiah tapa Abisai in a dawng a, “

David in, “Nou Zeruiah tapate aw, nou n’on na theihsak ding uh bang ahia om? Tuni a kei hondoute na hi ding u maw? Tuni a Israelte lak a mi thah ahi dia hia? Tuni’n Israel mite tung a kumpipa ka hih theilou ka hi maw?” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in, kumpipa’n Shimei kiang ah, “Na si kei ding” a chi hi. Huchi in Kumpipa a kiang ah a kichiamta hi.
Saul tapa Mephibosheth kumpipa mu din a honghi. Kumpipa a pawt khiak ni apan galmuang a a hong painawnni tan in a khete a zunkei a, a khamul a tankei a, a puan leng a sawp sam kei hi.
Hichi ahi a, kumpipa mu dia Jerusalem a hongtun in kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Mephibosheth, Bangdia ka kiang a hongsam lou?” a chi hi.
Aman a dawng a, “Ka toupa, kumpipa aw, ka sikha in a hon zekhem a; na sikha in, kumpipa kiang a hoh din ka tuanna ding sabiltung ka van ding, ka chi a; na sikha lah a khe a bai ngal a.
Kumpipa ka toupa kiang ah na sikha a hek hi. Himahleh toupa ka kumpipa Pathian angel ahi. Huaiziak in, hoih na sak bangbang in hih in.

Ka pa inkawte tengteng toupa ka kumpipa ma a thahvek dia kilawm ahi uhi. Himahleh na sikha na an umpihte lak ah na pangsak hi. Huaiziak in, kumpipa kiang ah thildang phut ngamlai dia kilawm ka hi maw?” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Na tungtang thu bangdia gennawn nak na hia? Nang leh Jiba gam kihawm un ka chi hi” a chi.
Mephibosheth in kumpipa kiang ah, “Eh, aman tangvek hen, toupa ka kumpipa lah amah inn mah ah galmuang in a hongpai nawnta ngal a” a chi hi.
Gilead mi Barjilai Rogelim apan a hongsuk a; kumpipa Jordan a pi galkah din amah toh Jordan ah a hoh hi.
Barjilai upapi ahi a, kum sawmgiat a upa ahita. Mahanaim a kumpipa omsung in nekding a pia a, amah mi neizou tak ahi.
Kumpipa’n Barjilai kiang ah, “Ka kiang ah hong inla, ka kiang ah Jerusalem ah, k’onvak ding” a chi hi.
Barjilai in kumpipa kiang ah, “Jerusalem a kumpipa toh hohtou din bangtan ka damlai dia?

Tuin kum sawmgiat ka hita a; a sia leh a pha ka khen thei ahia? Na sikha in ka nek leh dawn, a lim leh lim louh leng a theikak thei ahia? Pasal leh numeite lasak ging leng ka za thei nawn ahia? Huaiziak in, na sikha bangdin toupa ka kumpipa adia puakgik ka hih maizen ding?
Na sikha in kumpipa toh Jordan galkah lel ka tup ahi. Bang din kumpipa’n huchibang in hoihman a honthuk chitchiat dia?

Hehpih in na sikha hon paisak nawn mai in, k’on ngen hi. Ka nu leh ka pa han omna koumau khua ngei ah ka si ding. Himahleh en in, na sikha Chimham; toupa ka kumpipa toh hong galkah henla, a tung ah hoih nasak bangbang in hih in” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a dawng a, “Chimham ka kiang ah a galkah sam dia, hoih na sak bangzel in a tung ah ka hih ding. Thil n’on nget peuhmah k’on hihsak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in mi tengteng Jordan gal a kah ua, kumpipa leng a galkah hi. Kumpipa’n Barjilai a tawp a, a vualzawl hi. Huchi in amah a mun ah a pai nawnta hi.
Huchi in kumpipa Gilgal ah a galkah a, Chimham a kiang ah a galkah sam hi. Judami tengteng in kumpipa a pi galkah ua, Israel mi leng a kim khat a pang uhi.

Ngai in, Israel mi tengteng kumpipa kiang ah a hong ua, kumpipa kiang ah, “Bang a chia ka unau uh Judah mite’n nang hon gukhia a, kumpipa leh a inkawte leh David mite teng Jordan gal a a pikhawm vekmawk uh?” a chi uhi.

Judah mi tengteng in Israel mite a dawng ua, “Kumpipa ka kinaihpih uh a hih ziak ahi. Bangdia hiai thu a heh mawk? Kumpipa neih muang a om ka hi mahmah u maw? Thilpiak banghiamte leng a honnei ahia?” a chi uh.

Israel mite’n Judah mite a dawng ua, “Kumpipa ah tan sawm ka nei ua, David ah noute sang in anglaitanna ka neizaw uh. Bangdia hon ngaineu maw? Kumpipa pi kiknawn sawm masate ka hi kei uh maw? a chi uh.
Huchi in Judah mite thu Israel mite thu sang in a khauhzaw hi.

Huan, Benjamin mi Bikri tapa Sheba, Belial mi khat a na om hi. Aman pengkul a mut a, “David ah tantuan i neikei ua, Jesse tapa ah leng gouluah ding i neisam kei, Israel mite aw, na puanin lam chiat uah pai un” a chi hi.
Huchi in Israel mi tengteng in David a zuih uh a lehngatsan ua, Bikri tapa Sheba a zuita uhi. Judah mite’n Jordan apan Jerusalem pha in a kumpipa uh a len chinten uhi.
David Jerusalem a a inn ah a hongpai hi. Kumpipa’n numei sawm a meite inn ngak dia a koihte a pi a, inn khat ah a khum a, a nekding uh pia in a vak a, himahleh amau a luppih kei hi.
Kumpipa’n Amasa kiang ah, “Ni thum sung in Judah mite honsap khawm sak inla, nang leng hong omsam in” a chi hi.
Amasa Judah mite samkhawm din a kuan hi. Himahleh a hunseh sak sang in a va tamsawt zawta hi.

David in Abisai kiang ah, “Bikri tapa Sheba in Absalom sang in i poi uh a khoihzaw dia hia? Na toupa mite pi inla delh un. Huchilou in zaw khaw kulhnei ah a lut man dia, muh phaklouh in i khahsuah kha ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in, Joab mite, Kereth mite, Pelet mite leh a mi hat tengteng un amah a zuikheta uh. Jerusalem apan Bikri tapa Sheba delh din a pawtkhia uhi.
Gibeon a suangpi omna a vatun un, Amasa in amaute a na dawn hi. Joab in kidouna van a silh a, a tung ah namsau a pai toh kawnggak ah a kuah hi. Mailam a a paikawm in huai namsau a phawi hi.
Joab in Amasa kiang ah, Unaupa, “Na hoih tadih na maw?” a chi hi. Huaikhit in Joab in Amasa tawp din a khut taklam in a khamul a man hi.

Himahleh Amasa in Joab in a tawi namsau a limsak kei hi. Joab in a gil ah a dawt a, a gilzangte lei ah a tolhkhe zelzul a, a dawt tuan nawn kei hi. Huchi in a sita hi. Joab leh a unaupa Abisai in Bikri tapa Sheba a delh uhi.
A kiang ah Joab mite lak a tangval khat ading a, “Joab lam a pang leh David lam a pang peuhmah in Joab zuihen” a chi hi.

Amasa bel lamlian laitak ah si a kidiah in a na lum hi. Huai mi’n mi tengteng ding didepa a muh in lamlian apan Amasa luang gamlak ah a suan a, a kiang a hongpai peuhmah khawlzela a muh ziak in puan in a tuam hi.
Lamlian apan suankhiak ahihnungin Bikri tapa Sheba delh din mi tengteng in Joab a zui uhi.
Abel leh Bethmaka pha in Israel nam tengteng leh Ber mi tengteng a tawnvek a; amau a ki kaikhawm ua amah a zuita uhi.
Bethmaka a Abel khua ah amah a um ua; khaw zulzul ah lei a chiang ua, kulh zul ah ading uhi. Joab kiang a mi om tengteng in chimsak din kulh a khoh okok uhi.
Huchi in numei pil khua apan a hong kikou a, “Ngai un, ngai un; Joab kiang ah, Hongpai nai in, na kiang ah thu ka gen ding, va chi un” a chi hi.
A kiang a vanaih tak in numei in, “Joab na hi hia?” a chi hi. Aman “Hi e,” chi’n a dawng hi. Huchi in a kiang ah, “Na sikhanu thugen ngaikhe dih,” a chi a, aman, “Ka ngaikhia hi,” chi’n a dawng hi.
Huai numei in, “Nidanglai in Abel khua ah a kikum ngeingei ding uh” a chizel uh. Huchibang in thu a tawpsak zel uhi.
Kei Israel lak a kituah ut leh muanhuai mite lak a khat ka hi. Nang zaw Israel khua, a khaw bulpi pen hihsiat tum neilim ve. Bangdia
Joab in a dawng a, “Huchibang ahi zenzen kei. Nawmvalh hiam, hihsiat hiam ka tumkei himhim hi.

Huchibang thu ahi kei hi. Ephraim tanggam a mi Bikri tapa a min Sheba in kumpipa kalh in, David hilhial kalh in a khut a lik hi. Amah hon pekhe le uchin khua ka pawtsan mai ding” a chi hi. Numei in Joab kiang ah, “Ngai in, a lutang kulh apan lawtkhiat ahi ding” a chi hi.

Huchi in numei in a pilna in mi tengteng kiang ah a vapai a, Bikri tapa Sheba lutang a tan ua, Joab kiang ah a lawnkhia uhi. Huchi in pengkul a mut a, amau puanin chiat zuan in khua apan a paita uhi. Joab Jerusalem ah kumpipa kiang ah a paikikta hi.
Joab Israel sepaih tengteng heutu ahi a; Jehoiada tapa Benaiah ahihleh Kereth mi leh Pelet mite heutu ahi.
Adoram nasem dia goih teiteite heutu ahi a, Ahilud tapa Jehosaphat tanchin gelhmi ahi.
Sheva Laigelhmi ahi a; Zadok leh Abiathar ahihleh siampute ahi uh.
Jair mi Ira leng David miliante heutu ahi.
Huan, David damlai in kum kizom in kum thum kial a kia hi. David in

Kumpipa’n Gibeon mite a sam a, a kiang uah, Gibeon mite Israel suante ahi kei ua, Amor mi omsunte ahizaw uh. Israel suante amau kiang ah a na kichiamkhin ua; Saul in Israel suante leh Judah suante adia phatuam a ngaih ziak in thah a tumnak hi.
David in Gibeon mite kiang ah, “Bang ahia k’on hihsak ding?

Gibeon mite’n a kiang ah, “Saul leh a inkawte dangka leh dangkaeng ka lakei ding uh. Kou ziak in Israel ah mi kuamah na thatkei ding uh” a chi uhi. Aman, “Na gen peuhmah uh k’on hihsak ding” a chi hi.
Amau kumpipa kiang ah, “Hon hihmangpa leh Israel gamsung himhim a omlou dia hihmang hon sawmpa
tapa sagihte honpia inla,
Himahleh kumpipa’n, David leh Saul tapa Jonathan kikal a, a nih ua kal a
Kumpipa’n Aiah tanu Rizpah in Saul tapa nih a neihsak Armoni leh Mephibosheth a pi a, Meholath mi Barjilai tapa Adriel, Saul tanu Mikal in tapa nga a neihsakte toh
Gibeon mite khut ah a pekhia a, tang a

Aiah tanu Rizpah in saiip puan a la a, amah adin suangpi tung ah a phah hi. Buhlak kipattung apan huai siluangte tung a van vuahtui in a buahtan in, sun chia siluangte tung a vasate a tuk ding uh leh zan chia gamsate khoih ding a phalkei hi.
Aiah tanu, Saul meinu Rizpah thilhih David a hilh uhi.

Huchi in David a kuan a, Philistia mite’n Gilboa a Saul a thah ni ua Philistia mite’n Bethsan mun lian a a khai uh a guhte uh, Jabesh-gilead mite’n a va guklak uh, Saul guh leh a tapa Jonathan guhte a la hi.
Huai apan Saul guhte leh a tapa Jonathan guhte a latou a; a khailupte uh guhte leng a lakhawm hi.
Saul guhte leh a tapa Jonathan guhte Benjamin gam a Jelaha a pa Kish han ah a vui uh. Kumpipa thupiak dungzui in a hih uhi. Huaikhit in huai gam tung ah Pathian a lungkimta hi.
Philistia mite’n Israel mite a dou nawn uhi. David, a mite toh a va kuansuk ua; Philistia mite a vasual ua, David a bah mahmah hi.
Ishbibenob, milian tapate lak a khat, a teipi gikdan dal sekel za thum, namsau thak kuah in David thah a tum hi.

Himahleh Zeruiah tapa Abisai in a hong hunkhia a, Philistia mi a sual a, a thatta hi. David mite’n, “Israelte khawnvak na mihsak louhna din kidou ding in ka kiang uah nang zaw na kuan nawn kei ding” chi’n a kiang ah a kichiam uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Gob ah Philistiate toh kidouna dang khat a om nawn hi. Huai hun in Hushat mi Sibbekai in milian suante lak a khat Saph kichi a that hi.
Philistia mite toh Gob khua ah a kidou nawn uh. Bethlehem mi Jaar oregim tapa Elhanan in Gitmi Goliath unaupa a that a, huai mi teipi siam kolpi bang ahi.

Gath khua ah kidouna a om nawn hi. Huai ah mi khat a san a sang, a khut langkhat tuaktuak a khutzung guk, a khe langkhat tuaktuak a khezung guk, avek a sawmnih leh li nei a om hi. Amah leng milian suan ahi.
Aman Israel mite a vatou a, David unau Shimea tapa Jonathan in a na that hi.
Huai lite Gath khua a milian suante ahi ua, huchi in David leh a mite khut in a sita uhi.
Huan, David in a melma tengteng khut apan leh Saul khut apan
“Aman,
ka suangpi leh ka kulhpi leh hon humbitpa ahi.
Ka suangpi Pathian,
Amah ka muang ding a;
ka phaw leh ka hotdamna ki,
ka insang leh ka bukna ahi.
Ka hondampa,
hiamgamna apan n’on hondam hi.
Phattak
huchi in hondoute lak apan hotdam in ka om ding hi.
Sihna tuikihawt in hon umkimvel a,
Pathian limsaklou
mite tuilian in a hon lausak.
“Sheol khauhualte’n a hon gaksuak a;
sihna thangte’n a hon awk sak uh.
Ka lungzin in
ka Pathian ka sam hi:
a biakin apan ka aw a za a,
ka kikou husa a bil ah a lut hi.
Huaitak in lei a ling a, a kisat hi.
A heh ziak in van kingaknate
nangawn kisat in a lingta uhi.
A nak apan meikhu a zam tou a,
a kam apan pawt mei in a kang hi.
Huai in meihol a kuangsak hi.
“Aman vante a kunsak a,
a hongsuk ua; a khenuai ah mialna a om hi.
Cherub tung ah a tuang a,
a lengta hi, huihkhua tung ah amah muh in a om hi.
Khomial in a ki umkimvel a,
tui vomte, van meipi sah miuhmeuhte a bawl hi.
A ma a vakna tawn in
meiholte a kuang hi.
Tungnungpen in a aw a suaksak hi.
Thaltangte a kapkhia a,
amau a dalhzak sak a;
khua a phesak a, a buaizak sak hi.
