a nakvangte a hu in tuipi lampite a hong kilang a,
lei kingaknate hihlat in a omta hi.
“Aman tunglam apan a hon
sawksuk a, a honlen a;
tuipi apan a hon kai kheta hi.
Kei hondou hattak apan
hon humbit a,
kei hon hawte apan leng;
kei adin lah a hatlaw ngal ua.
“Ka tuahsiat ni’n a honsual ua,
himahleh
Aman mun awngthawltak ah a hon pikhia a;
ka tung a a kipah ziak in a hon humbitta hi.
ka khutte sianthoudan dungzui in a honthuk hi.
ka Pathian apan gilou takin ka pai mang ngei ngalkei a!
A vaihawmna tengteng ka ma a a om ziak in:
a thusehte ka kilehheisan ngeikei hi.
A ma ah leng gensiat bei ka hilai a, ka thulimlouhna apan ka ki huikhia hi.
Huaiziak in,
ka diktatdan bangzel in
a hon na thukta a;
a mitmuh a ka sianthoudan bangzel in.
Chingtheite kiang ah chingthei in na kilang ding a,
mi hoihkimte kiang ah hoihkim in na kilang ding hi.
Misiangthoute kiang ah
siangthou in na kilang ding a;
mi genhakte kiang ah
genhak in a kilang ding.
Haksa thuak mite na hondam ding a;
mi kisatheite na niamsak theihna ding in a tung uah na mit a tu gige hi.
ka khawnvak na hi ngal a.
Nang panpih in sepaihhon toh ka tai a,
ka Pathian panpih mah in kulh ka tawmkan hi.
Pathian lampi a hoihkim a;
amah muangte tengteng adin
Amah lum ahi.
I Pathian lou kua suangpi a om a?
Pathian ka hatna leh thilhihtheihna ahi a,
Aman ka lampite a hoihkim in a bawl hi.”
Ka khepekte zukpi
khepek bang in a bawl a;
Ka mun sangte ah a hon omsak zel hi.
Ka khutte galdou ding in a sinsak a;
huchi in ka bante’n dal thalpeu a tansak hi.
Nang na hotdamna lum n’on pia a;
na nunnemna in n’on bawl lianta hi.
Ka nuai a ka kalsuante na liansak a,
huchi in ka khete a tolh kei uhi.
Hondoute ka delhpha a,
ka hihmang a;
hih manthat sipsip a a om
masiah uh ka nungkik kei hi.
A thohnawn theihlouhna ding un ka hihmang sipsip a,
ka satzan ngiingei a; ahi,
ka khenuai ah a pukta uh.
Nang galdou din hatna in n’on gak a;
hon sualmite ka nuai ah na nuaisiahta hi.
Hon hawte ka hih manthat theihna ding in,
kei hondoute ngawng na honpia hi.
Amau a dak kimvel ua,
himahleh hondam ding kuamah a omkei uh.
himahleh a dawng kei.
Huaitak in ken lei a leivui bang in
ka khennel dimdem a,
kholak buannawi bang mai in ka tuanzak a, ka thehzak vekta hi.
Nang ka mite kisualna apan leng n’on humbit a;
namchih lutang hi ding in n’on kem hoih hi.
Ka theih ngeilouh nam in ka na a semta ding.
Namdangte ka kiang ah a hong kipe ding ua;
ka tanchin a zak tak un ka thu a zui ding uh.
Namdangte a tulmang ding ua,
a insang ua kipan ling kawm in a hong paisuk ding uh.
Ka suangpi phat in om henla; ka hotdamna suangpi
Pathian tawisang in om hen:
Phu hon laksakpa leh namchih ka nuai a koih sukpa Pathian;
Hondoute apan hon domtoupa:
Kei hondoute tunglam ah n’on domkang a,
hiamgam mi lak apan n’on humbit hi.
Huaiziak in, aw
namchih lak ah
kipahthu k’on hilh ding a,
na min phat in la ka sa ding hi.
A kumpipa adia Amah hotdamna insang ahi a,
A thaunilh, David leh a suante tung ah tangtawn in
hehpihna a langsak, a chi hi.
Hiaite David thu nanungpen ahi. Jesse tapa David, sangtak a dopsang a ompa, Jakob Pathian thaunilhpa, Israelte la phuaktu in a chi hi.
a thu ka lei ah a om hi.
Israelte Pathian in a gen a,
Israelte Suangpi’n ka kiang ah a gen hi.
Mi tung a vaihawmmi a dik ngeingei dia
Pathian lau kawm a vai a hawm ding ahi.
Amah ni a hongsuah a,
mei om hetlou zingsang vak bang ahi dia,
vuahzuk khit a khua hong siang a lei a loupa selnou mitmet bang ahi ding ahi.
Pathian adin ka inkuan hiai bang hi kei mahleh,
kei toh tangtawn thukhun a bawl a,
bangkim kizentak in a hihkip hi.
Aman khangsak kei mahleh hiai ka hotdamna leh ka deihlam tengteng ahi.
Himahleh Belial tate bel avek a ling paihkhiat bang ahi ding uh,
khut a lak theihlouh a hih ziak un.
Himahleh amau khoih ding mi
sik leh teipi a, a kivat ding ahi.
Huchi in amun mah ah hal ahi ding uh.
Hiaite David sepaih hangsante min ahi. Tekmon mi Joseph Bashebeth sepaih heutute lak a heutupa ahi a; amah khatvei thu a mi za giat thatpa Eznit mi Adino a chih mah uh ahi.
Amah zom in Ahohi tapa Dodo tapa Eleazar ahi. Amah Philistia mite kidou dia a kikaihkhawm ua, a tou ua, Israel mite a paimang vek lai ua David kiang a sepaih hangsan thumte lak a khat ahi.
Amah a thou a, Philistia mite a khut a kham matan namsau leng khahlou khop in a that hi. Huai nin
Amah nung in Har mi Agi tapa Shammah ahi. Behiang tampi omna lou a Philistia mite a kikaihkhawm lai un, Israel mite a taikek uhi.
Himahleh amah huai mun ah ading a, a veng a, Philistia mite a that a,
Sepaih hangsan sawmthum lak a thumte a hohsuk ua, buhlak lai tak in David kiang ah Adullam kawhawm ah a hoh ua; Philistia sepaihte’n Rephaim guam ah panmun a khoh uh.
Huchih lai in David inn sung ah a om a, huchih laimah in Philistia sepaihte Bethlehem ah a om uhi.
David in tui a lunggulh mahmah a, “Bethlehem a tuileh tui, kulh kongkhak kiang a dawn ding hongpia om le uh aw!” a chi hi.
Huchi in sepaih hangsan thumte’n Philistia sepaihte a paltan ua, kulh kongkhak kiang a Bethlehem tuileh a vatawi ua, a hontawi ua, David kiang ah a paipih uh. Himahleh aman a na dawn ngamkei a,
“Aw
Zeruiah tapa Joab unau Abisai thumte lak a a heutupen uh ahi. Teipi in mi za thum a sual a, a that a, thumte lak ah minhoih a loh hi.
Thumte lak ah pahtawi tuak pen ahi kei maw? Huaiziak in, a heutu ding un a bawl uhi. Himahleh tungnungpen thumte lak a tung zou kei hi.
Kabjil mi hangsan tapa Jehoiada tapa Benaiah thil thupitak hihpa in Moab mi Ariel tapate nih a that a; huchi in a hohsuk a, vukkiak hun lai in leikawhawm ah humpinelkai leng a vathat hi.
Aigupta mi, milian tak a that a; huai Aigupta mi in teipi a tawi hi. Himahleh aman chiang tawi in a vazuan a, Aigupta mi teipi tawi a va sut a, amah teipi in a sunlumta hi.
Jehoiada tapa Benaiah in huchibang thil a hih ziak in sepaih hangsan thumte lak ah min hoih a loh hi.
Mi sawmthumte sang in pahtawi tuak ahi. Himahleh tungnungpen thumte lak a sim tel ahi zoukei hi. David in amah vengtu heutu in a koih hi.
Joab unau Asahel bel sawmthum lak a khat ahi:
Bethlehem khua a mi
Dodo tapa Elhanan;
Harod mi Shammah,
Harod mi Elika;
Pal mi Helez,
Tekoa mi Ikkes tapa Ira:
Anethot mi Abiezer,
Hushathmi Mebunnai:
Ahohmi Zalmon,
Netophath mi Maharai:
Netophath mi Baanah tapa Heleb,
Benjamin suan,
Gebeah a mi Ribai tapa Ittai;
Pirathon mi Benaiah,
Gaash luite a mi Hidai;
Arbath mi Abialbon,
Barhum mi Azmaveth;
Shaalbon mi Eliaba,
Jashen tapate lak a Jonathan;
Harar mi Shammah, Arar mi
Sharar tapa Ahiam;
Mankat mi Ahasbai tapa Eliphelet,
Gilon mi Ahitophel tapa Eliam;
Karmel mi, Hezrai, Arba mi Paarai;
Zobah mi Nathan tapa Igal,
Gad mi Bani;
Ammon mi Jelek,
Beeroth mi Nahari,
Zeruiah tapa Joab galvan tawi;
Ith mi Iraan, It mi Gareb;
Hit mi Uriah ahi uh.
Avek un sawmthum leh sagih ahi uh.
Huan,
Kumpipa’n a kiang a om sepaih heutu Joab kiang ah, “Israel nam tengteng lak ah Dan apan Beer–sheba pha in vialvak inla, mi bangzah ahi ua ka theihtheihna din simvek in” a chi hi.
Joab in kumpipa kiang ah, “
Himahleh kumpipa thu in Joab leh sepaih heutute thu a zouta hi. Huchi in Joab leh sepaih heutute Israel mite sim din kumpipa kiang apan a paikheta uhi.
Jordan gal a va kah ua, Gad guam laitak taklam a khaw om Aroer ah Jazer pha in om mun a khoh uhi.
Gilead gam leh Tahtim hodshi gam a tung ua; Danjaan, leh Zidon kimvel a tung uhi.
Tura kulh leh, Hivmite khaw tengteng leh, Kanan mite khaw tengteng a va tung ua; Beer–sheba a, Judah simlam ah a paikhia uhi.
Huchi in gam tengteng a totsuah khit un kha kua leh ni sawmnih a bei in Jerusalem a hong tungkik uhi.
Joab in mihing zah kumpipa a pia a; Israel gam ah namsau tawi mi hangsan nuai giat a om uhi. Judah mi bel nuai nga a om hi.
Mihing a sim khit un David lungtang a nuam hetkei. David in
Zingsang a David a thoh leh David zawlnei Gad kiang ah
“Kuan inla, David kiang ah,

Huchi in David kiang ah Gad a hoh a, a hilh a, a kiang ah, “Na gam a na tung a kum sagih sung kial a kiak hia? Na melmate’n a hondelh ua kha thum sung amau apan na taimang hia, Na gam a ni thum sung hipi a hong len? Hon sawlpa bangchi’n ka dawng dia? Kingaihtuah inla, honhilh in” a chi hi.
David in Gad kiang ah, “Ka lung a zing mahmah mai hi.
Huchi in
Angel in hihse dia Jerusalem lam a, a khut a lik leh
David in mi that angel a muh in
Huai nin David kiang ah Gad a hoh a, a kiang ah, “Kuantou inla, Jebus mi Araunah phual ah
Huchi in David,
Araunah in a malam a et leh, amah lamzuan a kumpipa leh a sikhate hongpai a mu hi. Huchi in Araunah a pawt a, a mai a leisi in kumpipa ma ah a khupboh hi.
Araunah in, “Bang a chia ahia toupa ka kumpipa, a sikha kiang a a hong?” a chi hi. David in, “Mipite lak a hipi a khawl theihna dia
Araunah in David kiang ah, “toupa ka kumpipa’n hoih a sak bang in la henla, lan hen: En in, haltum a lat din bawngtalte a om ua, sing din phual vanzatte leh bawngvante a om uh.
Aw toupa, hiai tengteng Araunah in kumpipa a pevek hi” a chi hi. Araunah in kumpipa kiang ah, “
Kumpipa’n Araunah kiang ah, “Hilou e, a man pia in k’on lei teitei ding ahi. Kei lam a bangmah senna omlou in
David in huai ah
David hong upata in, a hongtek mahmahta hi. Huchi in puan in a khuh zel ua, himahleh lum a sathei tuankei hi.
A sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Ka toupa kumpipa adin nungak zong le ungla; Kumpipa kiang chin ah om gige henla, kem leh; na angsung ah honglum leh, ka toupa Kumpipa’n lum a honsa thei ding” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Israel gam tengteng ah nungak melhoih a zong ua, Shunam mi Abishag a va mu ua, Kumpipa kiang ah a pi uhi.
Huai nungak a mel a hoih mahmah a, Kumpipa a kem a, a nektak a bawlsak hi. Himahleh, Kumpipa’n amah a kithuahpih kei hi.
Haggith tapa Adonijah in, “Kei Kumpipa a pang ding kei ve” chi in a kingai thupi mahmah hi. Kangtalai leh sakol tungtuang mi sawmnga a ma a tai dingte toh a kisa sak hi.
Apan lah chiklai in leng, “Bangdia hichibang a hih na hia?” chi in a lungkham sak ngeikei hi. Amah melhoih mahmah a, Absalom sang ahi.
Aman Zeruiah tapa Joab leh siampu Abiathar thu a dong a; amau Adonijah lam ah a pang ua, amah a panpih uhi.
Siampu Zadok, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah, zawlnei Nathan, Shimei, Rei leh David pawl a mihangsante bel Adonijah lam ah a pangkei uhi.
Adonijah in belamte, bawngtalte, ganvak thaute Zoheleth suang ah a gou a, huai bel En-rogel kiang chin a om ahi. Kumpipa tapate, a unau tengteng leh Judah gam a Kumpipa sikha tengteng a chial hi.
Zawlnei Nathan, Benaiah, mi hangsante leh a unaupa Solomon bel a chial kei hi.
Nathan in Solomon nu Bathsheba kiang ah, “Haggith tapa Adonijah, i toupa David theihlouh in vaihawm in a om chih zalou na hi maw?
Na bitna ding leh na tapa Solomon bitna ding k’on hilh ding.

Kumpipa David kiang ah valut inla, a kiang ah, Aw toupa, ka kumpipa, na sikhanu kiang ah na tapa Solomon, ka nung in a honglal ngeingei dia, amah ka mangtutphah ah a tu ding, chi in na kichiam ahi kei maw? Bang achia Adonijah in vaihawm ahia?” vachi dih a chi hi.
“Ngai in, Kumpipa na va houpih laitak in ken leng k’on zui lut sam dia, na thugen k’on hihkippih ding” chi in a gen hi.
Bathsheba Kumpipa kiang ah indan ah a valut a; Kumpipa a upa mahmahta a, Shunam mi Abishag in Kumpipa nektak a na bawl hi.
Bathsheba in Kumpipa kun in zahtakna a pia hi. Kumpipa’n, “Bang na deih a?” a na chi hi.
Aman, “Ka toupa aw,
Ngai in, tuin Adonijah lah a lal a; nang ka kumpipa toupa’n lah na theikei hi.
Bawngtalte, ganvak thaute leh belamte a gou liapluap a, kumpipa tapa tengteng leh, siampu Abiathar leh sepaih heutu Joab a chial a, na sikha Solomon a chial kei hi.
Huchi in, toupa aw, ka toupa nung a a mangtutphah a kua hong tu ding ahia chih na gen ding in, Israelte tengteng mit nang ka toupa kumpipa tung ah a tu hi.
Huchilou in zaw hichi ahi ding a, toupa kumpipa a pute kiang a a ihmut sam hun chiang in, kei leh ka tapa Solomon thil hihkhial in a hon sepmai ding uh: a chi hi.
Ngai in, huchi a kumpipa a houpih laitak in, zawlnei Nathan a valut sam hi.
“En dih, zawlnei Nathan a hong,” chi in kumpipa a hilh uh. Kumpipa kiang a vatun in, kumpipa ma ah a mai a leisi in a khupboh hi.
Nathan in, “Ka toupa, kumpipa aw, ka nung ah Adonijah a lal dia, ka mangtutphah ah a tu ding na chi maw?

Tuni in a kuansuk a, bawngtalte, ganvak thaute leh belamte a gou zengzung a, kumpipa tapa tengteng, sepaih heutute leh siampu Abiathar a chial hi. Ngai in, a ne un a dawnkhawm ua, Pathian in kumpipa Adonijah hondam hen, a chi uh.
Himahleh kei na sikha ngei leh siampu Zadok, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah leh na sikha Solomon a hon chial kei hi.
Hiai toupa ka kumpipa thu a hih a hih ngal leh toupa ka kumpipa’n a nung a mangtutphah a tu dingpa a kuapen ahia chih na sikhate na hilh nailou na hi ding maw?” a chi hi.
Kumpipa David in a dawng a, Bathsheba hon sapsak dih ua, a chi hi. Kumpipa kiang ah a vahoh a, kumpipa ma ah a va ding hi.
Kumpipa a kichiam a, lungzinna tengteng a ka hinna humbitpa
Na kiang a
Bathsheba a mai a leisi in a khupboh a, kumpipa zahtakna pia in, “Ka toupa, kumpipa David tangtawn in damzel hen” a chi hi.
Kumpipa David in, “siampu Zadok leh zawlnei Nathan, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah hon va sapsak dih ua” a chi hi. Amau kumpipa ma ah a vapai uhi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang uah, “Na toupa uh sikhate pi unla, ka tapa Solomon keimah sabiltung mahmah ah tuangsak unla, Gihon ah pisuk un.
Siampu Zadok leh zawlnei Nathan in Israelte kumpipa din thaunilh uhen. Pengkul mut unla, Pathian in kumpipa Solomon hondam hen, chi un.
Huchi in amah na zuitou ding ua, ka mangtutphah ah a hong tu ding hi. Amah lah ka sik a lal ding ahi ngal a. Amah Israel gam leh Judah gam vaihawmtu dia ka seh ahi” a chi hi.
Jehoiada tapa Benaiah in kumpipa a dawng a, “Amen,
ka toupa kumpipa kiang a a om bang in, Solomon kiang ah leng omsam henla, ka toupa kumpipa David mangtutphah sang in a mangtutphah hih thupizaw hen” a chi hi.
Huchi in, siampu Zadok, zawlnei Nathan, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah, Kereth mite leh Pelet mite a hohsuk ua, Solomon David sabiltung tung ah a tuangsak ua, Gihon ah a pi uhi.
Siampu Zadok in puanin apan thau koihna a la a, Solomon a nilh hi. Pengkul a mut ua, huchi in mi tengteng in, “Pathian in kumpipa Solomon hondam hen” a chi uhi.
Mi tengteng in amah a zuitou ua, mite’n tamngaite a tum ua, a kipak mahmah ua, a husa ging un lei a kheng hi.
Adonijah leh a michial, a kiang a om tengteng in Ankuang a lui khit un a za ua, Joab in pengkul mutging a zak in, “Khopi sung a husa ging zuazua bangchidan ahia leh?” a chi hi.
Huai a chih laitak in, ngai in, siampu Abiathar tapa Jonathan a va hoh a, Adonijah in, “Hongpai dihve, nang zaw mi kizen na hi a, tanchinhoih na hontun mahmah ding” a na chi hi.
Jonathan in a dawng a, Adonijah kiang ah, “Tun keng e, toupa aw, kumpipa David in Solomon kumpipa in a bawlkhinta hi.
Amah toh siampu Zadok, zawlnei Nathan, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah, Kereth mite leh Pelet mite kumpipa’n a sawl a, kumpipa sabiltung tung ah a tuangsak uhi.
Siampu Zadok leh zawlnei Nathan in Gihon ah kumpipa din thau a nilh uh. Huai apan nuamsatak in a paitou ua, huai in khopi sung a thawn zuazua hi. Husa na zak uh huai ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Solomon leng lalgam tutphah ah a tuta hi.

Kumpipa sikhate i toupa kumpipa David vualzawl din a hong ua, “Pathian in na min sang in Solomon min hihhoih zaw henla, na mangtutphah sang in a ma mangtutphah hih thupizaw hen” a hong chi uh. Huchi in kumpipa lupna tung ah a kun hi.
Kumpipa’n leng, “
Adonijah mi chial tengteng in a lauta ua, a thou ua, a lampi chiat uah a paivekta uhi.
Adonijah in Solomon a lau a, a thou a, maitam ki a va len hi.
“Ngai in, Adonijah in kumpipa Solomon a lau a; kumpipa Solomon in a sikha namsau a thatlou din ka kiang ah kichiam phot hen” chi in maitam ki a len hi chi’n Solomon a hilh uhi.
Solomon in, mi ginomtak a hih a suklat peuhmah leh a samzang khat leng lei ah a ke kei ding. Gitlouhna a nei chih theihna a om leh a si ding, a chi hi.
Huchi in kumpipa Solomon in mi a sawl a, maitam apan a va pisuk ua, a vahoh a, kumpipa Solomon ma ah a kun hi. Solomon inn a kiang ah, “Na in ah pai in” a na chi hi.
Huan, David sihni ding a hong naita a; a tapa Solomon thu a pia hi.
“Lei tengteng lampi ah ka pai sam dia; nang hattak leh pasalphatakin om in.
Na thilhih peuhmah leh na kiheina lam peuhmah a na lamzan theihna din Mosi dan a gelh a hih bang in,

Toupa’n ka tungtang thu a, ‘Na suante’n a lungtang tengteng uleh a lungsim tak ua ka mitmuh a thutak a om ding a, a omdan ua a pilvan uleh Israelte mangtutphah a tu ding mi na tatlak kei ding, chi a a gen a hihkip ding hi.’ ”

“Zeruiah tapa Joab in a hon bawldan, Israelte sepaih heutu nih Ner tapa Abner leh Jether tapa Amasa a bawldan na thei hi. Amaute a thah a, kileplai a kidou sisan suah a, a tai a kawnggak leh a khedap but a kidouna sisan a bansak dan.
Huchi in pha nasak dan bang in hih inla, a lu a kelsam pou han ah lungmuang tak in tumsak ken.
Gilead mi Barzillai tate tung ah hehpihna hihlang in. Na dohkan a an ummi din telsak in. Na unau Absalom apan ka taimang lai in ka kiang ah a hong ngal a.

Ngai in Bahurim mi, Benjamin suan, Gera tapa Shimei na kiang ah a om hi. Aman Mahanaim a ka hohlai in hamse hoihlou pi a honloh khum hi. Himahleh Jordan ah hong dawn din a hong kuan hi. Huai ah, namsau in k’on that kei ding, chi in
Huchi in mawhlou in zaw koih ken; Mi pil na hi ngal a. A tung ah bangchi’n na hihdia chih ahihleh na theimai ding. A lu a kelsam pou sisan toh han ah na tumsak ding ahi” a chi hi.
David bel a pute kiang ah a ihmu samta a, David khopi ah a vui uhi.
Israelte tung a David lal sung kum sawmli ahi. Hebron ah kum sagih a lal a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh thum a lal hi.
Solomon a pa David mangtutphah ah a tu a; huchi in a gam nakpitak a hihkip in a hong omta hi.
Haggith tapa Adonijah Solomon nu Bathsheba kiang ah a hoh a. Aman, “Hoih lam thu a hong na hi maw?” a na chi hi. Aman, “Hoihlam thu ah hi e” a chi hi.
“Na kiang ah banghiam gen ding ka nei hi” a chi nawn a, aman, “Genve,” a chi hi.
Aman, “Lalgam kei a ahita chih leh Israelte tengteng in leng kumpipa din kei a hon en gige uh chih na thei. Himahleh ka unaupa adin lalgam hei a om a,
Tuin thil khat nget ding k’on nei a, hon nial ken” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Genve” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hehpih in kumpipa Solomon hon houpihsak inla, na thu sellou ding ahi ngal a, Shunam mi Abishag zi din hon neisak in” a chi hi.
Bathsheba in, “Hileh a ke, kumpipa k’on na houpihsak ding” a chi hi.

Bathsheba in Adonijah adia kumpipa Solomon houpih din a kiang ah a hohta hi. Amah mu din kumpipa ading a, a ma ah a kun a, a mangtutphah ah a tuta hi. Kumpipa nu adin mangtutphah a koihsak a; a taklam ah a tuta hi.
“Thil neuchik khat k’on ngen ut hi. Hon nial mahmah ken, a chi hi. Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Nu ngenve” k’on phalsaklou kei ding“, a chi hi.
Aman, “Shunam mi Abishag na unaupa Adonijah zi din neisak in” a chi hi.

Kumpipa Solomon in a dawng a, a nu kiang ah, “Bangchidan a Shunam mi Abishag Adonijah adia ngen na hia oi? Gam leng ngetsak vanglak tan la; amah ka u a vo oi. Amah ading leh siampu Abiathar leh Zeruiah tapa Joab adin leng ngen tan la” a chi hi.
Kumpipa Solomon in
, a thuchiam bang a hon hihkip, ka pa David mangtutphah a hon tusak, inkuan hon na phuhkhiak sakpa hinna lou in ka gen ahi. Adonijah tuni mahmah a sihsak ngeingei ding ahi” chi in a kichiamta hi.
Huchi in, kumpipa Solomon in Jehoiada tapa Benaiah a sawl a, aman a vasual a, a thatta hi.
Siampu Abiathar kiang ah kumpipa’n “Anathoth khua a na in leh lou ah pai in, sitak lah na hi ngal a. Himahleh ka pa David ma a
Huchi in, Solomon in Abiathar
Huai thu Joab kiang a hongtung a, Joab Absalom lam ah a pang kei na a, Adonijah lam ah a pang hi. Joab
Benaiah
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “A chih bang in hih inla, va sual inla, vui in, a ziak om hetlou a Joab in sisan a suahna apan kei leh ka pa inkawte na hulsak theihna din, a chi hi.

Amah sang a kizenzaw leh hoihzaw mi nih, Ner tapa Abner, Israelte sepaih heutu leh Jether tapa Amasa, Judahte sepaih heutu ka pa David theihlouh a sual a, namsaua a thah ziak in Toupa’n a sisan a lu tung ah a kiksak nawn ding hi.
huaiziak in, a sisan uh Joab lu tung leh a suante lu tung ah tangtawn in a kiknawn dia; David leh a suante leh a inkawte leh a mangtutphah tung ah
Huchi in, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah va hohtou in a vasual a, a thatta hi. Huchi in gamdai ah amah inn mah ah vui in a om hi.
Kumpipa’n Jehoiada tapa Benaiah sepaihte tung ah a sik in a pang sak hi. Siampu Zadok kumpipa’n Abiathar sik in a pangsak hi.
Kumpipa’n Shimei a samsaka, a kiang ah, “Jerusalem ah inn kilam inla huai ah teng inla, huai apan koi dangmah ah pawt ken.
Na pawt ni, Kidron lui na kan ni’n na si ngeingei ding chih thei in. Na sisan nangmah lu tung mah ah a om ding” a chi hi.
Shimei in kumpipa kiang ah, “A dik hi.
Hichi ahi a, kum thum nung in Shimei sikhate lak a nih, Gath kumpipa Maakah tapa Akish kiang ah a taimang uhi. “Ngai in, na sikhate Gath ah a om uh,” chi in Shimei a hilh uhi.
Shimei a thou a, a sabiltung a van a, a sikhate zongdin Gath a Akish kiang ah a hohta hi. Shimei in Gath apan a sikhate a vapi hi.
Shimei Jerusalem apan a pawt a, Gath ah a hoh a, a hong kiknawn chi in Solomon a hilh uhi.
Kumpipa’n Shimei a samsaka, a kiang ah, “Na pawt ni, gam dang a na pawtkhiak ni’n na si ngeingei ding, chi in
Bangdia
Kumpipa mah in Shimei kiang ah, na lungtang sunggil a gitlouh dan, ka pa David tung a na gamtatdante na thei vek hi. Huchi in Toupa’n na gitlouhna nangmah lu tung ngei ah a kiksak nawn ding.
Kumpipa Solomon vualzawl in a om dia, David mangtutphah
Huchi in kumpipa’n Jehoiada tapa Benaiah thu a pia hi. Amah a kuan a, a vasual a, a thatta hi. Huchi in gam Solomon khut a hihkip in a omta hi.
Huan, Solomon in Aigupta kumpipa Pharo toh kizolhna a bawl hi. Pharo tanu a kitenpih a, amah inn leh
Mipite kia munsangte ah a kithoih ua, huai ma in
Solomon in
Kumpipa kithoih din Gibeon khua ah a hoh hi. Huai lah mun sang poimawhtak ahi ngal a. Solomon in huai maitam tung ah haltum thillat sang khat a lan hi.
Gibeon ah zan in Solomon kiang ah a mang in

Solomon in, “Na sikha, ka pa David na mitmuh a thutak leh diktatna leh lungtang diktak pua a om bang in, nang a kiang ah hehpihna thupi mahmah na langsak hi. Nang hiai hehpihna thupi mahmah amah adin na guang a, nang a mangtutphah a tu ding tapa na pia a, tuni a a hongom petmah bang in.
Aw
Na sikha, na mitelte, mi tampi, a tam ziak ua simseng vual louh leh a zah theihseng vuallouhte lak ah a om hi.
huaiziak in, na mite vaihawmsak din na sikha theihsiamna lungtang pia in, huchi a a sia leh a pha ka khenkak theihna din. Na mi hiai zah zouzai kuan ahia vaihawm sak thei ding?” a chi hi.
Solomon in huai ngen a, a thugen in
Pathian in a kiang ah, “Na damsawtna ding, nang adia hauhsaknate, na melmate sihna ding ngenlou a, vaihawm siamna dia theihsiamna na nget zawk ziak in;
Ngai in, na nget bang in ka hihta hi. Ngai in, pilna leh theihsiamna lungtang k’on pia hi. Huchi in, na ma ah nang bang kuamah a omkei ua, na nungchiang in leng nang bang kuamah a hong omkei ding.
Na nget louh, hauhsakna leh zahtakhuaina leng k’on pelai hi. Huchi in na damsung in kumpipate lak ah nang bang a omkei ding uh.
Na pa David in a zuih bang a ka thusehte leh ka thupiakte zui dia ka lampite a na pai leh k’on damsawt saklai ding” a chi hi.
Solomon a khanglou a, ngai in, mang a na hi. Huchi in Jerusalem ah a hoh a,
Kizuak numei nih kumpipa kiang ah a hong ua, a ma ah a va ding uhi.
Numei khat in, “Aw ka toupa, hiai numei toh inn khat a teng khawm ka hi ua; huai inn a amah toh ka omlai un nau ka nei hi.
Hichi ahi a, ka nau neih nung ni thum ni’n hiai numei in leng nau a neisam hi. Omkhawm ka hi ua; huai inn a om koute gellou, kuamah mikhual om a omkei hi.
Zan in hiai numei ta a na si a; aman a delhlup khak ahi.
Zanlai in a thou a, na sikhanu a ihmut kal in, ka sik a ka tapa a na la a, a pom a, a ma ta sipen ka ang ah a na sial hi.
Zingsang a ka ta nawi pedia ka thoh leh, ngai in, a na sikhin hi. Himahleh zingsang a ka etchet leh ngai in, ka suan ka tapa pen a na hi kei” a chi hi.
Numei dang in, “Hilou e. A hingpen ka tapa ahizaw, a sipen na tapa ahi” a chi hi.
Khat in, “Hilou, a sipen na tapa ahi, a hingpen ka tapa ahi,” a chi chiltel hi. Huchibang in kumpipa ma ah a gen tuaktuak uhi.
Kumpipa’n, “Khat in, a hingpen ka tapa ahi a, a sipen na tapa ahi,” a chi hi. Khat pen in, “Hilou, a sipen na tapa ahi, a hingpen ka tapa ahizaw, a chizel hi,” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n, “Namsau hon valak un,” a chi hi. Huchi in namsau kumpipa ma ah a honla uhi.
Kumpipa’n, “Naungek hingpen tumnih suah unla, a kimkhat khat pia unla, a kimkhat a dang nu pia un, a chi hi.

Naungek hingpen nu in a ta a lainat mahmah ziak in kumpipa kiang ah, “Aw ka toupa, naungek hingpen amah pemai in, that mahmah ken” a chi hi. Khatpen in, “Kei a hituan kei henla, nang a leng lah hituan kei heh. Himahleh tumtan hi hen” a chi hi.
Huchi in, kumpipa’n a dawng a, “Naungek hingpen amah pia un, that kei un. Amah a nu ahi” a chi hi.
Israel tengteng in huai thu a kumpipa thukhen dan a naza ua; kumpipa a lau uh. Vaihawm din Pathian pilna amah ah a om chih a thei uhi.
Huchi in Kumpipa Solomon Israel tengteng kumpipa ahi.
Hiai a milian neihte ahi uh:
“Zadok tapa Azariah siampu ahi.
Shisha tapa Elihoreph leh
Ahiah Laigelhmi ahi uh.
Ahilud tapa Jehosaphat tanchin gelhmi ahi.
Jehoiada tapa Benaiah
sepaih heutu ahi a;
Zadok leh Abiathar siampu ahi uh.
Nathan tapa Azariah heutute
tung a mi ahi a;
Nathan tapa Zabud siampu leh kumpipa lawm ahi khawm hi.
Ahishar inn sung lam heutu ahi a;
Abda tapa Adoniram phutluih a nasemte heutu ahi.”
Solomon in Israel tengteng tung ah heutu sawmlehnih a nei hi. Huaite’n kumpipa ading leh a inkawte adin nek leh tak a ngaihtuah zel uh. Mi khat in kum khat in kha khatzel nekding tak ding a pezel hi.
Hiaite a min uh ahi:
“Ephraim tang gam ah Benhur.
Makaz, Shaalbim, Beth-shemesh leh
Elon bethhanan ah Ben deker ahi.
Arutboth ah Benhesed ahi a,
aman Sokoh leh Hepher gam teng leng a tangkhawm hi.
Dor gam tengteng ah Ben Abinadab ahi a,
aman Solomon zi tanu
Taphath zi in a nei.
Tanak khua leh Meggiddo khote,
Jezreel khaw nuai,
Zarethan khochin a om
Beth shean bial teng ah,
Beth shean apan
Abel meholah,
Jokmeam gam bul tan in
Ahilud tapa Baana ahi.”
“Ramoth Gilead ah Ben Geber ahi a,
aman Manasseh tapa Jair khote,
Gilead gam a omte a tang khawm hi.
Bashan gam a Argob bial, khua thupi
taktak sawmguk,
kulh leh a kalhna daltawn neite leng a tangkhawm hi.
Mahanaim ah Iddo tapa Ahinadab ahi.
Naphtali ah Ahimaaz ahi a,
aman leng Solomon tanu
Basemath zi in a nei hi.
Asher leh Bealoth khua ah
Husai tapa Baanah ahi a;
Issakar ah Paruah tapa Jehosaphat;
Benjamin ah Elah tapa Shimei
Amorte kumpipa Sihon leh
Bashan kumpipa Og gam,
Gilead gam ah Uri tapa Geber ahi a,
Amah huai gam heutu omsun ahi.”
Judahte leh Israelte tuipi piau a piaunel zah mahmah in a tam ua, a ne un a dawn ua, nuamtak in a om zel uhi.
Solomon in lui apan Philistiate gam leh Aigupta gamgi pha in gam teng ah vai a hawm hi. Thilpiakte a hon tawizel ua, Solomon damsung teng a na a sem uhi.
Solomon ni khat annek, tangbuang nel mahmah pawt a sawmthum leh tangbuang pawt a sawmguk;
Bawngtal thau tak sawm, gam a bawngtal sawmnih leh belam za khat ahi uh. Hiaite lou leng sakhite, sangaite, sakhital, ak vakthaute leng ahilai uhi.
Luigal khenlam gam teng, Tiphsah apan Gaza tan, luigal khenlama kumpipate tung ah a lal hi. A kimvel a miteng toh kilem in a om hi.
Solomon damsung in Judahte leh Israelte Dan apan Beer–sheba tan in michih amau grep leh theipi chinna nuai ah bittak in a teng chiat uhi.
Solomon in kangtalai kai sakol sing li leh sakol tungtuang mi sing khat leh sang nih a nei hi.
Hiai heutute’n amau tankha kha in Solomon leh kumpipa Solomon dohkan hongum teng nekding a pia ua, piak kimlouh a nei ngeikei uh.
Michih in a hih dia seh bang dungzui in a omna ding mun ah sakolte leh gan taihat mahmahte adin barli buh leh buhpawlte a honpua uhi.
Pathian in Solomon pilna leh theihsiamna thupi mahmah leh lungsim letna tuipi piau a piaunel bang mai a pia hi.
Solomon pilna in suahlam ta tengteng pilna leh Aigupta mite pilna tengteng a khupvek hi.
Mi tengteng sang in a pilzaw a, Mahol tate, Ezrah mi Ethan, Heman, Kalkol leh Darda sang in leng. Huchi in a kim a nam tengteng lak ah a min a thangkheta hi.
Paunak sang thum a gen a, a late sang khat leh nga ahi uh.
Sing tanchin, Lebanon tang a Sidar sing apan kulhbang a hong selkhia hussop tan in a gen hi. Gamsate tanchin, vasate tanchin, bokvak a paite tanchin leh ngasate tanchin leng a gen hi.
Huchi in Solomon pilna ngaikhe din a pilna zasa lei a kumpipa teng a hongpai uhi.
Huan Tura kumpipa Hiram in Solomon kiang ah a sikhate a sawl hi. A pa mun ah kumpipa in amah thau a nilh uh chihlah a na zata ngal a. Hiram in David a it gige him ahi.
Solomon in mi sawl in Hiram kiang ah,
“Ka pa David in
Tuin
Ngai dih,

huaiziak in, tuin Lebanon tang a sidar singte hon phuksak din thupia inla, ka sikhate leng na sikhate lak ah a hong telsam ding ua, na sikhate loh ahihleh na chih peuhmah k’on pe ding. Zidon mite bang a sing phuksiam ka lak uah kuamah a omkei uh, chih na theingal a” chi in a gensak hi.
Hichi ahi a, Hiram in Solomon thu a zak in a kipak mahmah hi. “Hiai mi tampi tung a vaihawm dia tapa piltak David pepa
Huchi in Hiram in Solomon kiang ah, “N’on thukhah ka naza hi. Sidar sing thu leh meilah sing thu na deih peuhmah ka hih ding.

Ka sikhate’n Lebanon tang apan tuipi pha in a hon lasuk ding uh. N’on mun sehsak a tuipi a tolh din ka gaklomsak ding hi. Huai ah ka phelsak dia, nang nana la ding hi. Nang leng ka inkawte nekding tum in ka deih n’on hihsak sam ding” chi in mi a sawl hi.
Huchi in, Hiram in sidar sing leh meilah sing Solomon deih teng a pia hi
Solomon in Hiram inkawte nek din buh pawt a sing nih leh sathau suk pawt a sawmnih a pia hi. Hiai Solomon in kumtenga Hiram a piak dan ahi.
Kumpipa Solomon in Israel tengteng lak a phutluih nasemmi a bawl a; amau mi sing thum ahi uh.
Lebanon ah kha khat a kikheng zel in sing khat a sawl zel hi. Kha khat Lebanon ah a om ua, kha nih amau in ah. Adoniram phutluih nasem mite heutu ahi
Solomon in thilpawmi sing sagih leh suang sekmi sing giat tangte ah a nei hi.
Huaite simlouh in Solomon in a nasep tung a heutu tuam, nasep vengmi sang thum leh za thum a neilai hi.
Kumpipa thupiakin inn suangphum dia lepdin suang lian pipi, suangmantam pipi leh suang seksa a honpua uhi.
Inlammite, Solomon mite leh Hiram mite leh Gebal mite’n suangte a sek ua, huai inlamna din sing leh suangte a bawl uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Israel suante Aigupta gam apan a pawt nung uh kum za li leh sawmgiatna kum, Israelte tung a Solomon a lal kum lina, Ziv kha, kha nihna in
Solomon in
Huai inn a Mun Siangthou malam a inlim a vailam tan tong sawmnih a sau ahi a, a malam a pen a vailam tong sawm ahi.
inn adin tohlet neuchik vathang kalh om in a bawl hi.
Huai inn bang kimvel leh biakin bang kimvel in biakin mun bang kimvel leng huai inn bangsi in inn chial nei a lam hi.

A kimvel in dantan a bawl a; a chial nuainung pen a vailam tong nga ahi a, a lai a pen a vailam tong guk ahi. A thumna a vailam tong sagih ahi. Kalvaite ahihleh inn bang a kigolh a kiphamoh kei. Inn pawlam ah a kimvel in bang ah a kingakna a kibawl ziak ahi.
Huai inn a lamlai un suang a laihna mun a seksa vek a bawl ahi. Huchi in a lamsung un sek ging, heipi ging leh sik vangzat ging huai inn ah zak ahi kei hi.
Dantan laita pente kongpi huai in taklam pang ah a om a; a laita ah kahna kivial in a kahtou ua, a laita apan a thumna ah.
Huchi in huai inn a honlam a a zou a, inn bel sidar inkam leh a pek in a khuh hi.
Inchial neite a kisituah vek in tong nga chiat a sang in a lam a; huaite in toh sidar sing a peh ahi.
Solomon kiang ah
Hiai inn na lam laitak tung tangthu, ka thusehte na pom a, ka vaihawmte na zuih a, ka thupiak tengteng zui dia na pom peuhmah leh, na pa David kiang a ka gensa, huai ka thu na tung ah ka hihkip ding.
Israel suante lak ah ka teng dia, ka mi Israelte ka limsaklou kei ding, a chi hi.
Huchi in, Solomon in huai inn a lam a, a zouta hi.
Inn sung lam bang din sidar singpek a zang a; a pialkhang apan a tunglam bang pha in asung lam ah sing a belhvek hi. A pialkhang din meilah singpek a phah beh hi.
inn phaitam lam tong sawmnih pen pialkhang apan bangte tan in sidar singpek vek in a bawl a; biakna mun, Mun Siangthou pen adin leng a sunglam ah a zang hi.
Huai inn, a malam a biakin a dung lam tong sawmli ahi.
Huai inn sunglam ah a pakmum leh a pakpalh limgelh kilawm sidar sing a khuak a om a; avek in sidar singvek ahi a; suang himhim muh ahi kei hi.
Huai, biakna mun sung a dunglam tong sawmnih, a vailam tong sawmnih, a sanlam tong sawmnih ahi a, dangkaeng hul ngen in a luan a; sidar sing a bawl maitam leng a luan hi.
Huchi in, Solomon in huai inn sung dangkaeng hul ngen in a luan a; biakna mun malam dangkaeng khainiang in a daikaih a; huai dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Huai in avek a a zohpha in a pumpi in dangkaeng in a luan tawmtawm hi. Biakna mun maitam pumpi leng dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Biakna mun ah tong sawm tuaktuak a sang, Cherub nih olive sing in a bawl hi.
Cherub kha khatpen tong nga ahi a, Cherub kha langkhat pen tong nga mah ahi. A kha mong khat apan a kha langkhat mong kikal tong sawm ahi.
Cherub khat pen leng tong sawm ahi a; Cherubte a kikim geih a, a kibang geih uhi.
Cherub khat sanlam tong sawm ahi a, Cherub khat pen leng huai toh kikim mah ahi.

Cherubte inn sunggil zaw ah a koih a; cherubte kha a kizak a, khat kha in bang lang khatlam a va khoih a, Cherub khat pen kha in leng bang langkhat a khoihsama; huai inn laitak ah a kha uleh a kha uh a ki hihkha uhi.
Huai cherubte dangkaeng in a luan hi.
inn bang tengteng a kimvel in cherubte, tumsing leh pak palh limte gelh kilawm inn sunglam leh pawlam ah a bawl hi.
A inn pialkhang sunglam leh pawlam dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Biakna mun lutna din olive sing kongkhak a bawl a; kongpi lutung leh kongpi biangte a bang seh nga suah seh khat chiat ahi.
Huchi in, olive sing inn kongkhak nih a bawl a; huai ah cherubte tum sing leh pak palh limte gelh kilawm in a bawl hi. Huai dangkaeng in a luan a; cherubte leh tum singte dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Biakin lutna din a bang seh li suah seh khat chia in olive kongpi khuam a bawllai hi.
Meilah sing kongkhak nih toh; kongkhak khat a pek nihte kheptheih ahi a, kongkhak khat pen a pek nih leng kheptheih ahi.
Huaite ah cherubte tum sing leh pak palh limte a gelh a; huai gelh kilawm mamtakin dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Biakin huangsung intual sung gilzaw pen suangsek chial thum leh sidar singpek thuah khat in a bawl hi.
A kum lina, Ziv kha in
A kum sawm leh khatna, Bul kha, kha giatna in huai inn zuih ding bangbang a, bangkim mansa vek ahi. Huchi in kum sagih sung a lam hi.
Huan, Solomon in a inn kum sawmlehthum a lam a, huchi in a inn teng a lamzou vekta hi.
Lebanon gammang inn, khuamvual li, khuam tung a sidar singpek tung ah a lam a; a dunglam tong za khat ahi. A vailam tong sawmnga ahi a, a sanlam tong sawmthum ahi.
Huai khuam a kinga dantan sawmli leh nga tunglam ah sidar singphel a khuh ahi a; vual khat ah sawmlehnga zel ahi.
Vual thum ah tohlette a om a, vak leh vakte bel vual thum in a kigalsai vek uhi.
Kongkhak leh khuam tengteng singpek a ning li nei a bawl ahi a, vak leh vakte vual thum in a kigalsai vek uhi.
Inlim khuam nei a bawl a; a dunglam tong sawmnga ahi a, a vailam tong sawmthum ahi. Huaite ma ah inlim a bawl a; a khuamte leh a ma a lutna tung kah toh.
A vaihawmna ding mangtutphah inlim, vaihawmna inlim, a vaihawmna ding a bawl hi. Huai pialkhang langkhat apan langkhat pha a sidar sing a khuh ahi.
A ma tenna din, inn lim nung a, huangsung intual dang nei om pen huchi mah bang a bawl ahi. Huai inlim mah bang in Pharo tanu Solomon in zi a a neih in a lamsak lai hi.

Hiai tengteng suang manpha pipi, a hun geihgeih a sek zel suang, atna a at a lam ahi. Sunglam leng, pawlam leng a suangphum apan a lek pha in. Huchi mah bang in pawlam ah huangsung intual lianpi tanpha in.
Suangphum suang manpha pipi, suang lian pipi, suang tong sawm leh suang tong giatte a lep ahi.
Huai tung lam ah suang manpha pipi, suang a hun geihgeih zel a sek leh sidar sing ahi.
A kimvel in huangsung intual lianpi suangsek chial thum leh sidar singpek thuah khat a um ahi.
Kumpipa Solomon in Tura khua apan mi sawl in, Hiram a sam hi.

Huai mi Naphtali nam meithai tapa ahi, a pa Tura khua mi, dalsekmi ahi. Amah dalseklam himhim ah a pil in a theihsiam in a khutsiam petmah hi. Kumpipa Solomon kiang ah a hoh a, a na tengteng a sepsak vek hi.
Dal khuam nih, tong sawmlehgiat a sang; a kimvel a teh a tong sawmlehnih a lian tuaktuak a bawl hi.
Khuam lu a koih ding dalsun bawk nih a bawl a; bawk khat sanlam tong nga ahi a, bawk khat pen sanlam tong nga mah ahi.
Khuampite dawn ah lubawkte gial im iam leh kihek ngin ngian a om a; hiai lubawk kisuangsawn bel khainiang kiphan sagih, bawk khat pen adin leng sagih mah a kituam ahi.
Huchi in khuamte a bawl a; khuam lu a bawkte tuamna din gial im iam khat tung ah a kimvel vual nih a om a; huchi mah bang in khat tung ah leng a omlai hi.
Inlima khuamdawna bawk ah lili lim a tuanga, huai tong li ahi.
Khuam nih dawna bawkte gei ah gial im iam kiang ah theibuhfaite a om a; theibuhfaite bel huai bawkte ah za nih tuaktuak a volh in a om uhi.
Biakin inlim ah khuamte a dingsak a; taklam khuam a dingsak a, a min Jakin a sa a; veilam khuam leng a dingsak a; a min Boaz a sa hi.
Khuamte dawn ah lili lim a tuang a; huchi in khuam lam nasep teng zoh siang ahita.
Dal tuibem lianpi, tong sawm, a sanlam tong nga asung a; a gei tong sawmthum kimkot ahi.
A gei nuai ah pakmum lim in a kimvel vek a, tong sawm ahi a, tuibem kimvel in a om hi. Huai pakmumte vual nih in a om ua, sun khawm pah ahi.

Huai bawngtal sawmlehnih tung ah a kinga a, thum in mallam a nga ua, thum in tumlam a nga ua, thum in simlam a nga ua, thum in suahlam a nga uhi. Tuibem a tung uah a kitung a, a mei lam un a sunglam a doh hi.
Khutpek chia a sah ahi a; a gei lili pak bang, nou gei bang a bawl ahi. Bath sang nih takna ahi.
Tun sawnna sawm dal in a bawl a; tunsawnna khat saulam tong li ahi a, a vailam tong li mah ahi a, a sanlam tong thum ahi.
Tunsawnna bawl dan hichibang ahi. Huai in kuak a nei a, huai kuakte a geite kikal ah a om hi.
A geite kikal a kuakte ah humpinelkaite, bawngtalte leh cherubte a tuang a; a gei tungte ah tunsawnna a om hi. Humpinelkaite leh bawngtalte nuailam ah kilawmsaknate a om dindian hi.
Tunsawnnate ah dal kangtalai li leh dal tung chih a om chiat a; a ning lite ah kingakna a om chiat hi. Kisilna nuai lam ah a kingakna sun a om a, a sik chiat ah kilawmsakna a omchiat hi.
Valh gongsung tong khat ahi; a kam kimvel valh bang a bem ahi a, tong khat leh a kim ahi. A kam gei kimvel gial kilawm ahi a, a kuakte ning li ahi a, a bem kei uh.
Kangtalai lite a kuak nuai lam ah a om ua; kangtalai tungchihte tunsawnna ah a om uh. Kangtalai sandan tong khat leh a kim ahi.
Huai kangtalaite bawldan sakol kangtalai khe bawldan bang ahi a; a tungchihte, a valhte, a sutkalhnate leh laibawkte avek a sun ahi.
Tunsawnna ning li chiat ah kingakna li a om a; huai kingaknate tunsawnna toh pumkhat vek ahi uh.
Tunsawnna tung ah valh, tong kimkhat a sang a om a; tunsawnna tung a a tunna khete leh a kuakte pumkhat vek ahi.
A tunna khepekte leh a kuakte ah a zat bangbang in cherubte, humpinelkaite leh tumsingte a tuangsak a, a kimvel in kilawmsakna a om dindian hi.
Huchibang vek in tunsawnna sawm a bawl a; avek in pumkhat a sun ahi chiat ua, kikim chiat, bawldan kibang geih ahi chiat uh.
Kisilna bel sawm dal in a bawl a; kisilna bel khat in bath sawmli a dong a; kisilna bel tong li chiat ahi uh. Tunsawnna sawm tung ah kisilna bel khat a kitung chiat hi.
Tunsawnnate inn taklam pang ah nga a tung a, inn veilam pang ah nga mah. Tuibem pen inn taklam pang ah suahlam ah simlam nga in a tung hi.
Hiram in kisilna belte, vutluahte, maiphiatkuangte a bawl a, huchi in,
Khuam nihte,
khuam dawn a bel bang a bawk nihte,
khuam dawn a bel ban a bawk nih tuamna gial im iam nihte,
tuamna gial im iam nih adia
theibuhfai za lite,
khuam dawn a bel bang a bawk nih tuamna ding gial
im iam tuaktuak adia theibuhfai vual nihte;
tunsawnna sawm leh tunsawnna tung a kisilna bel sawmte;
tuibem khat leh tuibem nuai a bawngtal sawmlehnihte,
belte, vutluahte leh maiphiatkuangte toh.
Tuium-belsuan tengteng
Jordan phaizang ah Sukkoth leh Zarethan kikal a bellei omna ah hiai teng kumpipa’n asung hi.
Huai tuium-belsuan tengteng a tam mahmah ziak in Solomon in buk khelou in a koih a; dal bukzah pen theihkhiak ahi kei hi.
Solomon in
Mun siangthou pen ma a khawnvak koihnate, taklam a nga leh veilam a ngate dangkaeng siang in; pakte, khawnvakte leh taitehte dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Noute, khawnvak puantehnate, maiphiatkuangte, keute leh meilaknate dangkaeng siang in; inn sunggil zaw, Mun Siangthou pen kongkhakte leh inn, biakin, kongkhak bulhnate dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Huchi in, kumpipa Solomon in
Huchi in Solomon in Israel upate, a nam intekpen tengteng Israel suan inkuan intekpente, Jerusalem khua a kumpipa Solomon kiang ah David khopi Zion apan
Israel mi tengteng Ethanim kha, kha sagihna ah, Ankuangluina ah kumpipa Solomon kiang ah a kikaikhawm vek uhi.
Israel upa tengteng a hong ua, siampute’n bawm a zawng uhi.
bawm leh Kihoupihna Puanin leh puanin a tuium-belsuan siangthou tengteng tan in siampute leh Levi chite’n a zawngtou uhi.
Kumpipa Solomon leh Israel kikaikhawm tengteng a kiang a hong kikhawmte bawm ma ah a omkhawm uh. Belam leh bawngtal a tam ziak a simseng vuallouh leh a zah theih seng vuallouh in a kithoih uhi.
Siampute’n
Cherubte’n bawm omna tungzawn ah a kha uh a zak gige ngal ua, cherubte’n bawm leh a zawnna chiangtawnte a huapvek uhi.
A zawnna chiangtawn a sau mahmah a, a zawnna chiangtawn mongte biakna mun ma, Mun Siangthou apan a muhtheih hi. Himahleh in pawlam ah zaw a dawk kei, tuni tan huai ah a om nilouh hi.
Aigupta gam apan a pawt ua
Hichi ahi a, siampute Mun Siangthou apan a hongpawt khiak tak un
Meipi ziak in siampute nasem in a om theikei uh. Toupa thupina in
Solomon in thu a gen a:
Na tenna din, tangtawn a na om gige na ding inn k’on lamsak petmah hi” a chi hi.
Kumpipa a kinunghei a, Israel kikaikhawm tengteng a vualzawl a, Israel kikaikhawm tengteng ading dipdep uhi.
Aman, “

Aigupta gam apan ka mi Israelte ka pikhiak ni apan Israel nam lak a koilai khua leng ka min omna ding, inlamna ding ka tel ngeikei hi. Himahleh ka mi Israelte heutu din David ka tel hi, chi a a na genpa, amah khut mahmah a hon pichingsakpa phat in om hen.
Ka pa David in Israelte Pathian,
Himahleh
Himahleh nang zaw, inn na lam kei ding. Na tapa, na khal a hong pawtkhe ding in ka min adin inn a lamzaw ding, a na chi hi.
Huai ah bawm omna ding mun ka na sep a, huai ah Aigupta gam apan a pikhiaklai a i pute uh kiang a a thukhun,
Solomon
“Aw
Ahi, nang na kam in thu na gen a, na khut in n’on lohching sakta a, tuni a, a hong omta ngei bang in.
huaiziak in, aw
Aw Israelte Pathian, na sikha ka pa David kiang a thu na gensa hehpih in tungsak in.”
“Himahleh Pathian lei ah a teng petmah dia hia? Ngai in, van leh vante van a leng talou na hi a; hiai ka inn lam ah naktat tuakkei na tel chia!
Himahleh
Hiai mun lamnga a na sikha in thum a a thusam ding ngaikhia a, nang, huai ah ka min a om ding, na chihna mun ngei a, inn lam a sun leh zan in na mit a hah gige theihna ding in.
Na sikha leh na mi Israelte’n hiai munlam nga a, a hong thum chiang un a ngetnate uh na ngaihkhiak sakzel in. Ahi, na tenna mun, van ah na ngaikhia in; ngaikhia inla, ngaidam in.”
“Mi kuapeuh in a invengte tung ah thil hihkhial in, kichiam sak hial a hong kiphatmoh leh hiai inn a na maitam ma ah hong kichiam henla,
Nang van ah na ngaikhia inla, gamtang inla na sikhate vaihawm sak in, migilou pen mawhpaih in a lu tung ah a omdan nga inla, midiktat pen siamtang sak in a diktatna bangbang amah pia in.
Na mi Israelte’n na tung a thil a hihkhelh ziak ua melmate lak a a vuallelh ua nang lam a hong ngatnawn ua, na min a phat ua, hiai inn a thum a thil a honnget uleh,
Nang van ah a na ngaihkhiak sak inla, na mi Israelte khelhna ngaidam inla, a pute uh gam na piak ah pikik nawn in.”
“Na tung a thil a hihkhelh ziak ua van a kikhak a, vuah a hong zuklouh hun chiang in, hiai munlam nga a hongthum ua, na min a puankhiat ua, amau na bawl gentheih ziak a a khelhnate uh a kisik uleh,
Nang van ah a na ngaikhia inla, na sikhate leh na mi Israelte khelhna ngaidam inla, a paina ding uh lampi hoih sinsak inla, na mite goutan dia na piak na gam ah vuah zusak in.”

“Ka gam ua kial a hong kiaka, hipi a honglen a, keuna hiam, muatna hiam, khaukhup hiam, lung hiam a hongom a, a melmate un a kongpi kim ua a hongum ua, hipi khat peuh, chinatna bangpeuh a hongtun leh,
Na mi Israel tengteng lak a amau lungtang a hipi om a thei a, hiai inn lam nga a khut zankhia a, thumna leh ngetna a honlat uleh;

Na omna van ah a na ngaikhia inla, ngaidam inla, gamtang inla, nang a lungtang uh theipa, michih a omdan bangbang in lohching sak in; Nang zaw, nangmah kia mihingta tengteng lungtang theipa lah na hi ngal a.
Ka pute uh na piak gam a a ten laiteng uh nang a honlauh theihna ding un.”
“Na mi Israelte hilou namdang, na min ziak a gam gamlapi apan hongpaite tungtang thu leng;
Na min thupi mahmah, na khut hat mahmah, na ban na zak thu a na zachiat ding ahi ngal ua, huaite’n hiai inn lam nga a, a hongthum chiang un,

Nang na omna van ah a na ngaikhia inla, namdang in a hon nget a na hihsak in. Na mi Israelte bangmah a namchih in na min a theih ua, laudan a hong siam ua, hiai ka inn lam in na minpu ahi chih a hon theihtheihna ding un.”
“Na mite’n a melmate uh na sawlna lamlam ah a dou ua, na khopi tel lam nga leh, na min adia ka lam inn lam nga a,
A thumna uleh ngetna uh nang van ah a na ngaikhia inla, a thu uah gamtang in.”
“Na tung a thil a hihkhelh uleh, kuamah thil hihkhial lou lah a om ngal kei a; a tung ua na hehna, melma gam gamla mahmah hiam, naichik hiam a leng sal a a pi ua;
Sal a a pina gam ua a hong kingaihtuah khiak ua, a kisik ua, thil i na hihkhial hi, diklou tak leh gil mahmah in i na gamtata uh, chi a sal a pimite gam a nang a honnget uleh,

A melma amau sal a pite gam a a lungtang tak uleh a lungsim tak ua nang lam a hong ngat ua, a pute uh na piak gam lam leh na khopi tel lam leh na min adia ka inn lam lamnga a na kiang a a hongthum uleh;
A thumna uleh a ngetna uh nang na omna van ah a na ngaikhia inla, a thu uah gamtang in.
Na mi na tung a thil hihkhialte leh na tung a a na tatlekna uah a tatleknate tengteng uh ngaidam inla; sal a pite’n a hehpih theihna ding un hehpihna neisak in.
Na mi na goutan, Aigupta gam apan sik haltuina sung apan na pikhiakte lah ahi uhi.”
“A honsap chiang ua na ngaihkhiak dia, na sikha ngetna leh na mi Israelte ngetna lam a na mit na hah gige theihna ding in.
Aw
Hichi ahi a, Solomon in
A ding tou a, aw ngaihtak in Israel kikhawm tengteng a vualzawl hi.
“A thuchiam tengteng bangzel a, a mi Israelte khawlna pepa
i Pathian, i pute kiang a, a om bang in i kiang uah om henla; hon paisan in hon donsak lou kei hen.
Huchi in a lampi tengteng tawn ding leh i pipute a na piak khitsa bang a, a thupiakte, a thusehte, a vaihawmte zui dia i lungtangte Amah lam a a ngatsak theihna ding in.
A sikha thu leh a mi Israelte thu ah a ni omdan bangzel a, a gamtat theihna din hiai ka thugen,
Pathian ahi a, kuamah dang a omkei uh chih khovel a namchih in a theihtheihna ding in.
Huchi in a thuseh bang a om ding leh a thupiakte zui din
Israel tengteng leh Solomon in
Solomon in
Huai ni mah in kumpipa’n
Huchi in, huai hun in Solomon leh Israel tengteng, mipi kikhawm tampi, Hamath lutna apan Aigupta gamlui pha a mite’n
A ni giat ni’n mipite a kikhen sak a, amau kumpipa a vualzawl ua, huchi in
Huan, hichi ahi a, Solomon in
Gibeon khua a, a kiang a, a kilak bang in
a kiang ah, “Na thumna leh na ngetna ka ma a n’on tutte ka na ngaikhia hi. Na inn lam tangtawn a ka min omna din ka hih siangthouta hi. Ka mit leh ka lungtang huai ah tangtawn in a omta ding hi.
Nang leng thu k’on piak peuhmah bang a hih dia na pa David a om bang lungtang hoihtakpu leh lungsim diktakpu a ka mitmuh a na om a, ka thusehte leh ka vaihawmte na zuih gige leh
Israelte tung ah na gam mangtutphah tangtawn adin ka hihkip ding a; na pa David kiang a, Israelte mangtutphah a tu ding na tatlak kei ding, chi a ka na chiamsa bang in.
Himahleh nang hiam na suante hiam in n’on zuih uh kiksan a, ka thupiakte leh ka thusehte leh k’on theihsakte pomlou a, pathian dangte nna nasep ua, na biak uleh,

Gam ka piak apan Israelte ka hihmang dia; hiai inn ka min adia ka hihsiangthou sa ka mitmuh phaklouh ah ka suanmang ding. Huchi in Israel nam chihte lak ah enghouna leh a selam gentehna a zat a honghi ding.
Hiai inn sangtawk lehleng, a kiang a pai peuhmah in lamdang sa in a muk uh a hum ding ua, bangdia
Mite’n
Hichi ahi a, Solomon inn nihte;
Tura kumpipa Hiram in Solomon sidar singte, meilah singte leh dangkaengte a kulteng a tup sakvek ahi, kumpipa Solomon in Galili gam a khua sawmnih Hiram a pia hi.
Solomon in a piak khuate en din Tura khua apan Hiram a pawtkhia a; a va en a himahleh a lungtung kei hi.
Aman, Unaupa aw, hiai n’on khopiakte bangchibang khua a maizen ua? a chi hi. Huchi in tunitan in aman huai khuate Kabul gam a chi hi.
Hiram in dangkaeng talent za leh sawmnih kumpipa a khak hi.
Kumpipa Solomon in phutluih nasem pawl a bawl nasan hiai ahi:
Aigupta kumpipa Pharo a hohtou a, Gezer khua a vala a, a hal a, huai khua a teng Kanaante a that a, a tanu Solomon zi thilpiak in a na pekhinta ngal a.
Solomon in Gezer, Bethhoron khangnung zaw,
Baalath leh Israel gamdai a Tadmor khuate,
Solomon in thil koihkhawmna khua a neih tengteng, a kangtalai koihna khuate, Jerusalem khua leh Lebanon a vaihawmna gamsung tengteng Solomon in lunggulhtaka bawl a tup tengteng a bawl hi.
Israel suante hilou, Amorte, Hitte, Perizte leh Jebus omsun tengtengte;
a suan uh, huai gam a omlai Israel suante’n a hihman zohvek theihlouhte lak ah Solomon in sikha, phutluih nasem pawl a bawl a, tunitan in a sem lai uhi.
Israel suante bel Solomon in sikha in a bawl kei. Galdou mite, a intekpate, a miliante, a sepaih heutute, a kangtalai leh a sakol tung tuang pawl heutute ahizaw uh.
Hiaite Solomon nasep tung a heutu tuam, za nga leh sawmnga, nasep veng mite ahi uh.
Himahleh Pharo tanu bel David khopi apan amah in, Solomon inn a lamsak ah a paitou hi. Huchi in Solomon in Millo a bawl hi.
Solomon in
Kumpipa Solomon in Edom gam a Tuipi San gei Eloth chin a om Ezion-geber mun ah longhon a bawl hi.
Hiram in a sikha longmite, tuipi a kiseksa, long a Solomon sikhate kiang ah a sawl hi.
Huai mite Ophir ah a vahoh ua, dangkaeng talent za li leh sawmnih a honpua ua, kumpipa Solomon kiang a hontun uhi.
Huan,

Jerusalem khua ah nungzuimi tampi toh, gimlimte leh dangkaeng tampi leh suangmantamte pua sangawngsaute tonpih in a hoh hi. Solomon kiang a tun in a lungtang a thu a pai tengteng suah khevek in a houpih hi.
Solomon in a thudot tengteng a dawngvek a; kumpipa theihlouh, a hilhchet theihlouh himhim a omkei hi.
Sheba kumpinu’n Solomon pildan tengteng, a inn lam,
A dohkan a nekding, a sikhate tutdan, a nasemte nasep dan, a kivatdante uh, a nou pemite,
Huchi in kumpipa kiang ah, na thilhihte leh na pildante ka gam a ka zak thuthang a dikmah a na hi.
Himahleh keimah mit mahmah a kongmuh masiah a gen uh ka taksang kei hi. Huchi in ngai in, a kimkhat leng a hon na hilh sam ua, a gen uh ka zak sang in na pildan leh na hoih dan a na thupizaw hi.
Na mite, hiai na sikha, na kiang a om gige na pilna thu ngaikhe gigete a hampha uhi!
na Pathian, na tung a kipak mahmah, Israelte mangtutphah a hon tusakpa phat in om hen.
Huchi in dangkaeng talent za leh sawmnih leh gimlim a tam a tam leh suangmantamte kumpipa a pia a, Sheba kumpinu’n kumpipa Solomon gimlim a piak bang lawmlawm a tam a lut ngeita kei hi.
Hiram longhon, Ophir apan dangkaeng vapawte’n leng Ophir apan almug sing tampi leh suangmantamte a honpua uhi.
Kumpipa’n almug singte
A nget louh Solomon in a piakte chihlouh leng kumpipa Solomon in Sheba kumpinu’n a deih tengteng, a nget peuhmah a pia hi. Huchi in amah leh lawite a omna gam ah a pai nawnta uhi
Solomon kiang a kum khat sung a dangkaeng lut gikdan dangkaeng talent za guk leh sawmguk leh guk ahi.
Hiaite lou leng sumsinmite leh thilzuakmite, Arab kumpipate leh gamsung vaihawmmite apan siahpiakte a neilai hi.
Kumpipa Solomon in dangkaeng sekpek in lum lian za nih a bawl a; lum khat ah dangkaeng sekel za guk a lut hi.
Dangkaeng sekpek in lum za thum a bawl a; lum khat ah dangkaeng mina thum a lut a; huaite kumpipa’n Lebanon gammang inn ah a koih hi.
Kumpipa’n saiha mangtutphah thupi mahmah a bawl a, huai dangkaeng hoihpen tui in a luan hi.
mangtutphah kaltouhna ah siksan guk a om a, mangtutphah nunglam dawn a bem hi. A tutna siktuak ah douna a om tuaktuak a; a douna zulte ah humpinelkai ding lim nih a om hi.
Siksan gukte siktuak ah humpinelkai ding sawmlehnih lim a om a; huchibang koi gam ah leng a bawl ngeikei uhi.
Kumpipa nou tengteng dangkaeng ahivek a, Lebanon gammang inn a, a tuium-belsuan tengteng leng dangkaeng ngen mah ahivek uhi. Dangka himhim a omkei. Solomon damlai in huai bangpi in a simkei uhi.
Kumpipa’n tuipi ah Hiram longhon kithuahpih Tarsis longhon a nei a; Tarsis longhon in kum thum halzel in dangkaeng, dangka, saiha, zawng leh utong a hon paw zel uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa Solomon in khovel a kumpipa tengteng hauh lam leh pillam in a khupvek hi.
Pathian in a lungtang a pilna thu a koihsak ngaikhe din khovel a mi tengteng in Solomon a hongzuan huthut zel uh.
Michih in thilpiakte kum teng a piak zah nei in dangka tuium-belsuan, dangkaeng tuium-belsuan, puan, galvan, gimlim, sakol leh sabiltung noute a hong pe zel uh.

Solomon in kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuangmite a kaikhawm a, kangtalai sang khat leh za li leh sakol tungtuangmi sing khat leh sang nih a nei hi. Huaite kangtalai koihnate ah, Jerusalem khua a kumpipa omna ah a omsak hi.
Kumpipa’n Jerusalem khua ah a tam mahmah ziak in dangka chite suang bang mai a sehkhop in a omsak a, sidar singte phai a theipi sing banglel a sehkhop in a omsak hi.
Solomon neih sakolte Aigupta gam apan a hon tolhkhiak ahi a; kumpipa sumsinmite’n huaite a honhon in a na khakzel ua, a hon a leizel ahi.

Aigupta gam a kangtalai dangka chi sekel za guk zel in leh sakol dangka chi sekel za leh sawmnga zel in a hon pawlut uhi. Huchibang mah in Hitte kumpipa tengteng leh Suria kumpipate adin leng a pawkhia uhi.
Himahleh Solomon in Pharo tanu ban ah namdang numei tampi a it hi. Amau Moabte, Ammonte, Edomte, Zidonte leh Hitte ahi uhi.
Huai namte tungtang thu
Huchi in zipi za sagih, kumpipa tanute a nei a, mei za thum a nei hi. Huai a zite’n amah a lam pialsakta uhi.
Hichi a honghi a, Solomon a hong upat nung in, a zite’n pathian dangte lam ah a lungtang a pikawi sak uh. Huchi in a pa David lungtang bang in
Solomon in Zidonte pathiannu Ashtaroth leh Ammonte pathian kihhuai mahmah Milkom a zuita hi.
Huchi in Solomon in
Huchi in Solomon in Jerusalem chin a tang ah Moabte pathian kihhuai mahmah Khemosh ading leh, Ammon suante Pathian kihhuai mahmah Molech adin munsang a bawlta hi.
Huai mah bang in namdang a zi tengteng a pathiante uh kiang a kithoih a gimlim halzelte ading leng a bawlsak hi.
Huchi in,
Hiai thu, pathian dangte na zui ding ahi kei, chih thu a na pepa
Huaiziak in,
Himahleh na pa David ziak in na damsung tel in zaw ka hih tadih kei ding. Himahleh na tapa khut apan gam pen konsut ding hi.
Gam tengteng k’on sutvek kei dia; himahleh ka sikha David ziak leh ka tel Jerusalem ziak in nam khat na tapa ka pe ding” a chi hi.
Toupa’n Edom mi, Hadad Solomon melma din ading khesakta a; amah Edom gam kumpipa suan ahi.
Huan hichi ahi a, David Edom gam a, a omlai a, a mi thahte uh vui dia a sepaih heutu Joab a hohtou a, Edom mi pasal peuhmah a vathah khitnung in,
Joab leh Israel mi tengteng kha guktak Edom gam a pasal tengteng a hihlup khit masiah om uh ahi ngal a.
Hadad leh a pa sikhate lak a Edom mi khenkhatte Aigupta gam ah a tai ua; Hadad ahihleh naupang neu ahilai hi.

Midian gam apan a pawt ua, Paran a hongtung uh. Paran apan mite a pi ua, Aigupta gam, Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharo kiang a tungsuk ua; aman inn a na pia a, nek dingte a na ngaihtuahsak a, gam leng a na pia hi.
Hadad Pharo mit a tung mahmah a, huchi in a ma zi sanggamnu, kumpinu Tahpenes sanggamnu a zi din a pia hi.
Tahpenes sanggamnu in tapa Genubath a neihsak a, Tahpenes in Pharo inn ah a nawinek tawpna a bawlsak hi. Genubath Pharo inn ah Pharo tate lak ah a omta hi.
Hadad in Aigupta gam apan David a pute kiang ah a ihmuta chih leh sepaih heutu Joab leng a sita chih a na zak in, Hadad in Pharo kiang ah, “Ka gam ua ka paitheihna din hon pawtsak ve” a chi hi.

Huchi in, Pharo in a kiang ah, “Ka kiang a na om in taksap bang na nei a? Ngai in, huchi a na gam ua pai nawn na tup maimah?” a chi hi. Aman, “Bangmah neilou e. Bang teng hileh hon paisak himhim in” a chi hi.
Pathian in a melma din Eliadah tapa Rezon, a toupa Hadadezer, Zobah kumpipa apan taimangsa a dingsak nawn hi.
David in Zobah khua a mite a thahlai in aman a kiang ah mite a kaikhawm a, sepaih heutu in a na pang hi. Damaska khua ah a hoh ua, huai ah a teng ua, Damaska khua ah kumpipa in a tuta hi.
Hadad in buaina tut behlap in Solomon damsung teng Israelte melma ahi gige a; Israelte a haw mahmah a, Suria gam tung ah vai a hawm hi.
Nebat tapa Jeroboam, Zered a Ephraim mi Solomon sikha mah, a nu min Zeruah ahi a, meithai ahi, huai mi’n leng kumpipa tung ah a khut a lik sam hi.
Kumpipa tung a a khut a hon likna san hichibang ahi: Solomon in Millo a bawl a, a pa David khua siatna lailai a bawlhoih hi.
Jeroboam ahihleh mihat leh hangsan ahi a; huchi in Solomon in huai tangval mi thanuamtak ahi chih a theih ziak in Joseph inkawte nasep tengteng tung ah heutu in a bawl hi.
Huailai in hichi ahi a, Jeroboam Jerusalem khua apan a pawt khiak lai in Shiloh mi zawlnei Ahijah in lampi ah a na mu a; Ahijah in puan thak a silh a; amau gel kia in gamlak ah a om uh.
Ahijah in a puanthak silh a la a, nen sawmlehnih in a botkek hi.
Jeroboam kiang ah, “Nen sawm la in.”
Himahleh ka sikha David ziak leh Israel nam tengteng lak a ka tel khopi, Jerusalem ziak in nam khat a nei ding.

Amau hon paisan a , Zidonte pathiannu Ashtaroth, Moabte pathian Kemosh leh Ammonte pathian Milkom a biak ziak un leh ka mitmuh a thil hoih hih ding leh ka sehte leh ka vaihawmte zui dia a pa David bang a ka lampite a zuihlouh ziak in.
Gam pumpi ka sutkei dia; himahleh ka thupiakte leh ka thusehte zuipa, ka tel, ka sikha David ziak in a damsung in kumpipa in ka om saklai ding.
Himahleh lalgam a tapa khut apan ka sutkhe dia, nang k’on pe ding, nam sawmte tan in leng.
Ka sikha David in ka min omna dia ka tel khopi Jerusalem a ka ma a vak a neih gige theihna din nam khat bel a tapa ka pe ding hi.
Nang k’on sep dia, na ut tengteng bang in vai na hawm dia, Israelte kumpipa na hi ding.

Hichi ahi ding a, thu k’on piak peuhmah na pom a, ka lampite na zuih a, ka sikha David bang a ka thusehte leh ka thupiakte zui dia ka mitmuh a thil hoih na hihleh na kiang ah ka om dia, David adia ka dinkip sak bang in inkuan kip k’on din khiaksak dia, Israelte k’on pe ding hi.
Huchi in David suan ka hihgim dia, himahleh tangtawn in zaw ahi kei ding” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in, Solomon in Jeroboam thah a tuma, Jeroboam ading a, Aigupta gam ah, Aigupta gam kumpipa Shishak kiang ah a tai a, Solomon sih matan Aigupta gam ah a omta hi.
Solomon tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng leh a pilna Solomon thilhih gelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Solomon in Israel tengteng tung a Jerusalem a vai a hawm sung kum sawmli ahi.
Huchi in Solomon a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, a pa David khopi ah a vui uhi. Huchi in a tapa Rehoboam a sik in a hong lalta hi.
Huan, Rehoboam Sekem khua ah a hoh hi. Israel tengteng Sekem khua ah kumpipa a amah bawl din a hoh khinta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Nebat tapa Jeroboam in huai thu a na zak in Kumpipa Solomon kiang apan a taimangna Aigupta gam a omlai ahi a, huchi in Jeroboam Aigupta gam a om ahi.
Amah a va samsak ua, Jeroboam leh Israel kikaikhawm tengteng a hong ua, Rehoboam kiang ah,
“Na pa’n ka hakkol uh a giksak mahmah hi. Huaiziak in, na pa honzat gimna leh a hakkol giktak ka tung ua a ngak hon hihzang sak inla, huchi in nang na ka sem ding uh” chi in a hong gen uh.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ni thum sung va kikhin khephot unla; ka kiang ah hongpai nawn un” a chi hi. Huchi in mite a paikheta uh.
Kumpipa Rehoboam in a pa Solomon damlai a, a kiang a om upate, “Hiai mite bangchi’n ka dawng dia honhilh mah dih uh” chi’n a dong hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Tuni a hiai mite sikha a na om a, a na uh sem a, amau dawng a, a kiang ua thu hoih na gen leh, tangtawn in na sikha in a om ding uh” a chi uhi.
Himahleh upate hoihsak a zuikei a, amah toh kivual tuailai a kiang a omte a dong zawta hi.
A kiang uah, “Hiai mite, ka kiang a, Na pa’n ka tung ua hakkol a ngak hon hihzang sak in, chi a hong genmite bangchi’n ka dawng dia, honhilh mah dih uh” a chi hi.

A khanvual tuailaite’n a kiang ah, “Hiai mite, Na pa’n ka hakkol uh a giksak thei mahmah a, nang hon hihzang sak dihve, na kiang a chi mite kiang ah, hichibang in chi inla, hichibang in a kiang uah gen in.
‘Ka pa kawng sang in ka khutme a lianzaw. Ka pa’n hakkol giktak a hon na batsak a, ken na hakkol uh ka behlap lai ding hi. Ka pa’n zepna in a honsawi a, ken aikam in k’on sawi ding’ a chi hi.
Huchi in Jeroboam leh mi tengteng kumpipa’n ni thum nung chiang in “Ka kiang ah hong nawn un” chi a a hilh bang in, a ni thum ni’n Rehoboam kiang ah a vahoh uhi.
Kumpipa’n mite khauhtak in a na dawng a, upate hoihsak a paisan hi.
Tuailaite hoihsak bang in, “Ka pa’n na hakkol uh a na giksak a, ken na hakkol uh ka behlap lai dia, ka pa’n zepna in a hon na sawi a, ken ahihleh aikam in k’on sawi ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n mite thu a ngaikheta kei a; hiai bang a thil om

Israel tengteng in kumpipa’n a thugen uh a pom kei chih a theih un, “David ah tantuan bang i nei ua? Jesse tapa ah gouluah ding i neikei uh. Israelte aw, na puanin chiat uah pai un. David, na inkuan kingaihtuah in” chi in kumpipa a dawng uh. Huchi in Israelte a puanin chiat uah a paita uhi.
Himahleh Judah khopite a teng Israel suante tung ah Rehoboam in vai a hawm hi.

Huchi in kumpipa Rehoboam in phutluih nasemte heutu Adoram a sawl hi. Israel tengteng in suang in a na deng ua, a sita hi. huaiziak in, Jerusalem a tai din kumpipa Rehoboam kintak in a kangtalai ah a tuang hi.
Huchi in tunitan in David inkawte tung ah Israelte a na hel uhi.

Hichi ahi a, Israel tengteng in Jeroboam a hong kiknawn chih a zak un, kikaihkhawmna a hoh din a samsak ua, Israelte tung ah kumpipa in a bawl uhi. Judah nam chihlouh David inkawte zui kuamah a omkei uh.
Jerusalem a tuntakin Rehoboam in Israel inkawte dou a Solomon tapa Rehoboam gamla nawn din Judah inkuan tengteng leh Benjamin nam apan mi hangsan a telkhiak, nuai khat leh sing giat a kaikhawm hi.
Himahleh Pathian mi Shemaiah kiang ah Pathian thu a hongtung hi.
Judah gam kumpipa Solomon tapa Rehoboam kiang ah leh Judah leh Benjamin inkuan tengteng kiang ah leh midang teng kiang ah,
Toupa’n hichi in a chi, “Va hohtou kei un. Israel suan, na unaute vadou kei un. Na inn chiat uah pai nawn vek un. Hiai kei thilhih ahi, chi’n gen in” a chi hi. Huchi in
Huchi in Jeroboam in Ephraim tanggam ah Sekem khua a sat a, huai ah a teng hi. Huai apan a pawtkhia a, Penuel khua a sat hi.
Jeroboam in a lungtang in, “Lalgam David inkawte a honghi nawn diam aw” a chi hi.
“Hiai mite Jerusalem a

Kumpipa’n mi a dong a, dangkaeng in bawngnou lim nih a bawl a; a kiang uah, “Nou adin Jerusalem a hohtouh a haksa lawtel hi. Aw, Israel en dih uh, Aigupta gam apan nou hon pikhia na pathiante uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in khat Bethel ah a koih a, khat pen Dan ah a koih hi.
Mipite lah hiai bawngnou lim khat be din Dan tanpha a vapai ziak un hiai khelhna a hong hita hi.
Munsang ah innte a lam a, Levi suante hilou, mi niampente lak a mi siampu in a bawl hi.

Jeroboam in Judah gam a Ankuanglui a neih mah bang un kha giatna, huai kha ni sawmlehnga ni Ankuanglui ni din a sep hi. Maitam ah a hohtou a; Bethel ah a bawngnou lim kiang ah a kithoih hi. Munsang a bawlte ah siampute sep in Bethel ah a koih hi.
Aman a deih bang a, a seh kha mah, kha giatna, ni sawmlehnga ni’n Bethel a maitam a bawl ah a hohtou hi. Israel suante adin Ankuangluina a sep a, maitam a gimlim hal din a hohtou hi.
Huan, ngai in,
Aman
Huai ni mah in chiamtehna a pia hi. “Hiai

Hichi ahi a, Pathian mi in Bethel a maitam a kikou khum thu kumpipa’n a zak in, Jeroboam in, “Manun” chi’n maitam apan a khut in a sawk hi. Mat tuma a sawkna khut a zawta a, a khut a kai kiknawn theita kei hi.
Pathian min
Kumpipa’n a dawng a, Pathian mi kiang ah, “Ka khut a hong damnawn theihna din
Huchi in Kumpipa’n Pathian mi kiang ah, “Ka inn ah kei toh i pai dia hong kihihhalh tadih inla, huchi in kipahman k’on pe ding” a chi hi.
Pathian mi’n kumpipa kiang ah, “Na inn kimkhat zah honpe ding himah lechin leng na kiang ah k’ong pai tuankei ding, hiai ah tanghou ne in tui himhim leng ka dawnsam kei ding.
Tanghou va ne in tui himhim leng va dawn kenla, ‘na va hohna lampi ah leng kiknawn ken chi a
Huchi in lampi dang ah a pai a, Bethel a a hong kuanna lampi ah a paita kei hi.
Bethel ah zawlnei putek khat a om hi. A tapate’n huai ni a Bethel a Pathian mi thilhih tengteng a hilh vek uhi. Kumpipa kiang a a thu gente leng a pa uh a hilhlai uhi.
A pa un a kiang uah, “Koi lampi a tawn a?” a chi hi. A tapate’n Judah gam apan hongpai Pathian mi painawnna lampi a kawkmuh uh.
Huchi in a tapate kiang ah, “Sabiltung hon bawlsak dih uh” a chi hi. Sabiltung a bawlsak ua; a tung ah a tuangta hi.
Pathian mi a delhta a, tawsaw sing nuai a tuin a va mu hi. A kiang ah, “Nang na hi maw Judah gam apan hongpai Pathian mi?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hi e” a chi hi.
Huchi in aman a kiang ah, “Ka inn ah kei toh hongpai inla; tanghou hong ne dihve” a chi hi.
Aman, “Nang toh kiknawn thei ka hi kei, na kiang a hongthei leng ka hi sam kei. Hiai ah na kiang ah thanghou ne in tui himhim leng ka dawn sam kei ding.
Tanghou va ne in tui himhim leng va dawn kenla, na va hohna lampi ah leng kiknawn ken, chi a
Aman a kiang ah, “Keileng nangmah bang a zawlnei ka hi. Angel in
Huchi in a kiang ah a kiknawn a, a inn ah tanghoute ne in tui a dawnta hi.
Hichi ahi a, dohkan a umlai un, a pi kiknawnpa zawlnei kiang ah
Huchi in Judah gam apan hongpai Pathian mi kiang ah,
hong kiknawn a, tanghou ne in tui leng dawn ken, ka chihna mun mahmah a tanghou ne a, tui na dawn ziak in na luang na pute han a koih ahi kei ding” chi in a genkheta hi.
Hichi ahi a, tanghou ne a, tui a dawn zoh in, zawlnei a pi kiknawnpa’n sabiltung a bawlsak hi.
Huchi in a paita a lamkal ah humpinelkai toh a kituak ua, a na thatta hi. A luang lampi ah a kipai a, sabiltung a kiang ah ading a, humpinelkai leng siluang kiang ah ading hi.
Ngai in, mi a vapai ua, lampi a siluang kipai leh siluang kiang a humpinelkai ding a mu ua; zawlnei putek tenna khua ah a vagen uhi.
Lam kal apan vapikik nawnpa zawlnei in huai thu a na zaktak in, “Pathian mi,
A tapate kiang ah, “Sabiltung hon bawlsak dih uh” chi in a gen a; a bawlsak uhi.
Huchi in a kuanta a, a luang lampi a kipai leh sabiltung leh humpinelkai a luang kiang a ding a va mu hi. Humpinelkai in luang a na ne nai kei a, sabiltung leng a na ham kei hi.
Zawlnei in Pathian mi luang a dom a, sabiltung tung ah a koih a, a kikpihta hi. Huchi in zawlnei putek tenna khua ah sun ding leh vui din a la lutta hi.
A luang amah han ah a sial a; “Ka unaupa khawk hina mah e!” chi’n a sun uhi.
Hichi ahi a, a vui khitnung in a tapate kiang ah, “Ka sih chiang in Pathian mi kivuina han ah hon vuisam un. A guhte kiang ah ka guhte koih un.
Pathian thu a Bethel a maitam leh, Samaria gam khopite a munsangte inn tengteng a kikou khumna thu hongtung ngeingei ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huai thilzoh in Jeroboam in a omdan diklou a tawpsan tuankei hi. Mi niampente lak a munsang siampu dia a bawl siampute a om theihna ding un a deihdeih a hihtuam hi.
Huai thil Jeroboam inkuan khelhna amau in-gam saktu leh khovel apan hihmangthangtu a hong hita.
Huailai in Jeroboam tapa Abijah a china hi.

Jeroboam in a zi kiang ah, “Thou inla, Jeroboam zi na hi chih a hon theihtheih louhna ding un ki hihlamdang inla, Shiloh ah vahoh dih; ngai in, huai ah zawlnei Ahijah, hiai mite tung a kumpipa dia k’ong om ding ka tungtang thu genpa a om hi.
Tanghoubeu sawm leh tanghou pei lianloute leh khuaizu thawl khat tawi inla, a kiang ah vahoh dih. Naupang omdan ding hon na hilh ding” a chi hi.
Jeroboam zi in huchibang in a hih a, a thou a, Shiloh ah a hoh a, Ahijah inn ah a va hohta hi. Ahijah in khua a muthei nawn kei a; a upat ziak in a mitlah a mialta hi.

Ahijah kiang ah, “Ngai in, Jeroboam zi a tapa tungtang a thu dong din a hong. A chi a na a, hichibang in na hilh ding ahi. Hichi ahi ding a, a honglut chiang in numei dang hileh kilawmtak in a hong kibawl ding” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Ahijah in a honglut lai a khesik ging a na zak tak in, “Nang Jeroboam zi honglut dihve. Bang a chia ahia midang a na kibawl? Tanchin hoihlou tak nang honhilh dia sawl ka hi.
Pai nawn inla, Jeroboam kiang ah,

David inkuante gam ka sut a, huai nang k’on pia hi. Himahleh nang ka sikha David bang in na omkei. Aman zaw ka thupiakte a zui a, ka mitmuh a thil hoih kia hih tum in a lungtang tengteng in a honzui hi.
Himahleh nang bel na ma a mite tengteng sang in thil na hihkhial mahmah se a, n’on hehsakna din pathian dangte leh milim sunte na bawl a, n’on nungngatsanta hi.

Huaiziak in, ngai in, Jeroboam inkuan tung ah thil hoihlou ka tungsak dia, Jeroboam apan ta pasal taphot Israel gam a mi nehden leh den louh leng ka hihmang dia, min ek a phiatsiang sipsip bang in Jeroboam inkuan a gamvek masiah ka phiatmang ding hi.
Jeroboam inkaw lak a mi, khopi a si peuhmahte ui in a ne dia; gam a si peuhmahte tung a leng vasate’n a ne ding uh. Hiai
Huchi in, thou inla na inn ah pai nawn mai in, khopi sung na siktakin huai naupang a si ding hi.
Huchi in Israel tengteng in a sun ding ua, a vui ding uh. Jeroboam inkawte lak ah amah kia han a koih ahi ding hi. Jeroboam inkaw lak ah amah kia a
Amah adia Israelte tung a kumpipa hi ding; Jeroboam inkuan hihmang ding mi khat a tungkhe ding hi. Himahleh bang eita? Huai ni ding, tu mah ahi.
lah tui a phaiphek lingling bang mai in Israelte a honsat ling dia; huchi in
Israelte thil hihkhial sak a, a hih Jeroboam khelhnate ziak in Israelte a lehngatsan ding” a chi hi.
Jeroboam zi a thou a, a pawtkhia a, Tirzah khua a vatung a; inn kongpi bul a tuntak in huai naupang a sita hi.
a sikha zawlnei Ahijah zang a thu a gen bang ngei in Israel tengteng in a vui ua, a sunta uhi.
Jeroboam tanchin dang, a galdou thute leh a vaihawm thute, ngai in, Israel kumpipate vaihawm lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang hi.
Huchi in Jeroboam vaihawm sung kum sawmnih leh nih ahi a, a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, a tapa Nadab amah sik in a hong lalta hi.
Solomon tapa Rehoboam Judah gam ah a lal hi. A lal tung lai in Rehoboam kum sawmli leh khat a upa ahi.
Judahte’n
Tangsang teng ah leh sing hing teng nuai ah suangphuhte phut in mun sangte leh Asherte nangawn a bawl ngal ua.
Huai gam ah pasal kizuakte leng a om ua; Israel suante ma a
Kumpipa Rehoboam lal kum nga kum in hichi ahi a, Aigupta kumpipa Shishak in Jerusalem a sual hi.
inn a goute leh kumpipa inn a goute a la a, avek in a la khin hi. Solomon dangkaeng lum bawl tengteng leng a la telvek hi.
Kumpipa Rehoboam in huaite tang in dal lumte a bawl a, kumpipa inn kongpi vengmi heutute a kem sak hi.
Hichi ahi a,
Rehoboam tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Rehoboam leh Jeroboam a damsung teng un a kidou uhi.
Huchi in Rehoboam a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, David khopi ah a pute lak ah a vuita uh. A nu min Naamah ahi a, Ammon mi ahi. A tapa Abijam a sik in a hong lalta hi.
Huan Nebat tapa kumpipa Jeroboam kum sawmlehgiat a lal kum in Judahte tung ah Abijam a lal pan hi.
Jerusalem khua ah kum thum a lal a; a nu min Maakah, Absalom tanu ahi.
A ma apan thil gilou a hih tengteng a hihsam ahi. A pu David bang in a lungtang
Himahleh David ziak in
Hit mi Uriah tungtang chihlouh in David in
Rehoboam a damsung teng Jeroboam toh a kidou gige uhi.
Abijam tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia? Abijah leh Jeroboam a kidou uhi.
Abijam a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a; David khopi ah a vui uhi. A ma sik in a tapa Asa a lalta hi.
Israel kumpipa Jeroboam kum sawmnih a lal kum in Asa bel Judahte tung ah a lal pan hi.
Kum sawmli leh khat Jerusalem ah a lal a; a nu min Maakah ahi a, amah Abishalom tanu ahi.
Asa in a pu David mah bang in Toupa mitmuh in thil hoih a hih hi.
Pasal kizuakte gam apan a delhkhia a; a pute’n milim a na bawl tengteng uh a lamang hi.
A nu Maakah leng, milim kihhuai mahmah Asher a bawlsak ziak in, a kumpinu hihna a tawpsak hi. A milim bawl a hihsia a, Kidron lui ah a hal hi.
Munsangte ahihleh a lamang kei a; himahleh Asa lungtang a damsung teng in
Apan thil a na latsate leh amahmah in a na latsa dangka, dangkaeng leh tuium-belsuan
Asa leh Israel kumpipa Baasha lal sungteng a kidou gige uhi.
Israel kumpipa Baasha in Judah a va dou a, Judah kumpipa Asa kiang a lut ding leh pawtkhe ding dalna din Ramah khua a bawl hi.
Huchi in Asa in

Kei leh nang kikal ah leh ka pa leh na pa kikal ah thukhun a om a; ngai in, thilpiak dangka leh dangkaeng k’on khak hi. Hongpai inla, Israel kumpipa Baasha in a hon paisanna din amah toh na thukhun uh hihsia in, chi in a khak hi.
Benhadad in kumpipa Asa thu a na pom a, Israel khuate dou din a sepaih heutute a sawl a, Ijon, Dan, Abel beth maakah khuate, Kinneroth bial tengteng leh Naphtali gam tengteng tan in a dou hi.
Hichi ahi a, Baasha in huai thu a na zaktak in Ramah a bawl a tawp a, Tirzah khua ah a tengta hi.

Kumpipa Asa in Judah gam tengteng ah thu a thangsak vialvial hi. Kuamah om awl a omkei uh. Huchi in Baasha in Ramah khua bawlna dia suang leh sing a zatte a nawn ua; huaite zang in kumpipa Asa in Mizpah khua leh Benjamin gam a Geba khua a bawl hi.
Asa tanchin dang tengteng, a thilhih dan tengteng, a thilhih tengtengte leh a khobawlte Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw? Himahleh a teklam in a khe a hong nata hi.
Huchi in a ihmuta a, a pu David khopi ah a pute lak ah a vui ua; a tapa Jehosaphat a sik in a lal hi.
Jeroboam tapa Nadab Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum nihna ah Israel tung ah a lal pan a, Israel tung ah kum nih a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou tak a hih a, a pa lampi a tawn a, Israelte thilhih a khialsak a, a hihkhelhna pentak aman leng a hihsam hi.
Issakar inkuante lak a mi Ahijah tapa Baasha in amah a guk sawm a, Philistiate tan, Gibbethon khua ah Baasha in a that hi. Nadab leh Israel tengteng in Gibbethon a umlai uh ahi.
Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum thumna ah ahi Baasha in a thah a, a sik a, a lal.
Hichi ahi a, kumpipa a hong hih in Jeroboam inkaw tengteng a that a; Jeroboam adin kuamah a hinghawi kei hi.
Huai bel Israelte thil hihkhial sak a a hih, Jeroboam khelhnate ziak leh
Nadab tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Asa leh Israel kumpipa Baasha a lal sungteng un a kidou gige uh.
Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum thum na ah Ahijah tapa Baasha Tirzah ah Israel tengteng tung ah a lal pan a, kum sawmnih leh li a lal hi.
mitmuh in thilh hoihlou mahmah a hih a, Jeroboam lampi zuih a zui a, Israelte thil hihkhialsak a a hihkhelhna a hihsam hi.
Huchi in Baasha kalh in Hanani tapa Jehu kiang ah
“Leivui apan k’on domsang a, ka mi Israelte tung ah heutu in k’on bawl hi. Nang Jeroboam lampi zuih na tawn a, a khelhnate a hon hehsak din ka mi Israelte thil na hihkhial sak hi.
Ngai in, Baasha leh a inkawte ka hihmang ding hi. Huchi in Nebat tapa Jeroboam inkawte bang mai in na inkawte ka bawl ding.
Baasha inkawte lak a mi khopi a si peuhmah ui in a ne dia; a inkawte lak a mi gamlak a si peuhmah tungleng vasate’n a ne ding uh” chi in.
Baasha tanchin dangte, a thilhihte leh a thilhih theihdante Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Baasha a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, Tirzah khua ah a vui ua; a tapa Elah a sik in a lalta hi.
Baasha leh a inkawte tungtang thu ah a khutsuak a
Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmnih leh guk na ah Baasha tapa Elah, Tirzah ah Israelte tung ah a lal pan a, kum nih a lal hi.
A sikha Zimri, a kangtalai kimkhat tung a heutu in Tirzah khua ah amah guk thah a sawm hi. Huchih lai in, Tirzah khua ah inn sung lam heutu Arza inn ah zukham in a om hi.
Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmnih leh sagih kum in Zimri a valut a, a sual a, a that a, a sik in a lalta hi.
Hichi ahi a, a hong lal pan a, a mangtutphah a a hongtut tak in, Baasha inkaw tengteng a thatvek a; a tanaute leh a lawmte lak a mi pasal photphot khat leng a hawikei hi.
Huchi in, zawlnei Jehu zang a Baasha kalh a a gen,
, Israelte Pathian, a ginnatlouhna ua hehsak dia, a tohthoh ua, a hihkhelh uh, Baasha khelhnate leh Elah tapa khelhna, huai a Israelte a hih khelhsak ziak un.
Elah tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmnih leh sagih na ah Zimri, Tirzah ah ni sagih a lal hi. Philistiate neihsa, Gibbethon khua a mite’n a um uhi.
A um mite’n “Zimri in a guksawm a, kumpipa a that” chih a gen uh a naza ua; huchi in Israel tengteng in sepaih heutu, Omri, huai nin a giahmun uah Israelte tung a kumpipa in a bawl uhi.
Omri bel Israel tengteng toh Gibbethon apan in a hohtou ua, Tirzah a va um uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Zimri in khua a la uh chih a theih in, kumpipa inn a kulh ah a tailut a, kumpipa inn ah a kibuhal a, a sita hi.
mitmuh a thil hoihlou mahmah hih a a khelhnate ziak leh Jeroboam lampi tawn a Israelte thil hihkhial sak a, a khelh ziak in.
Zimri tanchin dangte leh a sawmgukna thute Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Israel mite pawl nih in a kikhenta ua; mipi kimkhat in Ginath tapa Tibni kumpipa dia bawl tum in a zui ua; a kimkhat in Omri a zui uhi.
Himahleh Omri zuite’n Ginath tapa Tibni zuite a zou ua: huchi in Tibni a si a, Omri a hong lalta hi.
Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmthum leh khatna ah Omri Israelte tung ah a lal pan a, kum sawmlehnih a lal a: Tirzah ah kum guk a lal hi.
Shemer a Samaria tang dangka talent nih in a lei a; tang ah khua a sat a, a khosat min huai neipa Shemer mintam in Samaria a sa hi.
Omri in
Nebat tapa Jeroboam dan tengteng a la a, a ginnatlouhna ziak ua
Omri thilhih tanchin dangte leh a thilhih theihdan a hihlat thute Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Huchi in Omri a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, Samaria khua ah a vui ua; a tapa Ahab a sik in a hong lalta hi.
Judah kumpipa Asa lal kum sawmthum leh giatna ah Omri tapa Ahab Israelte tung ah a lal pan hi. Omri tapa Ahab Samaria ah kum sawmnih leh nih Israelte tung ah a lal hi.
Omri tapa Ahab in a ma a mi tengteng sang in
Hichi ahi a, Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhna bang hih sam bangmahlou a ngai hileh kilawm tak in, Zidonte kumpipa Eth baal tanu Jezebel zi in a nei a, Baal na sem in a be samta hi.
Samaria a Baal inn a lam ah Baal adin maitam a doh hi.
Ahab in Aserah a bawl a; a ma a Israel kumpipa tengteng sang in Ahab in
A lal lai in Bethel mi Hiel in Jeriko khua a sat a; a ta chil Abiram tanloh in a suangphum a phum hi. A nautum Segub tanloh hial in a kulh kongkhakte ading khesak a,
Huan Gilead gam a Tishbi khua a mi Elijah in Ahab kiang ah, “
“Hiai apan pawt inla, suahlam zuan in pai inla, Jordan gei a om Kerith lui ah va kibu in.
Hichi ahi ding a, Huai luitui na dawn dia; huai ah nang hon vak din va-ak thu ka pekhin hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in a kuan a,
Va-akte’n zingsang in tanghou leh sa a hong puakzel ua, nitaklam in tanghou leh sa a hong puaknawn zel uhi. Huai luitui a dawn hi.
A nung deuh in hichi ahi a, huai gam a vuah himhim a zuk louh ziak in lui a hong kangta hi.
“Thou inla, Zidon gam a Zarephath khua ah hoh inla, huai ah om in. Nang honvak din meithai khat thu ka pekhin” a chi hi.
Huchi in a thou a, Zarephath khua ah a hohta hi. Huai khaw kulh kongpi a tun in, ngai in, meithai khat sing tom a na om a; amah a sam a, “Bel in tui tawmchik honla dihve, ka na dawn ding” a chi hi.
La dia kuan a sam a, “Tanghou neuchik bek hontawi lechin” a chi hi.
Aman,

Elijah in a kiang ah, “Lau ken, na gen bang in va hih in. Himahleh huai in tanghou neuchik petmah hon bawlsak phot inla, huai hontawi inla, huaikhit chiang in nang ading leh na tapa ading na bawl ding hi.
, Israelte Pathian in hichi in a chi.
