Huchi in, Elijah gen bang in a hih a; amah leh a inkawte leh Elijah toh ni tamtak a ne uhi.
Elijah zang a a gen
Huai thilte nung in hichi ahi a, huai numei, inn neinu tapa china in a hong gim mahmah a, a nak a hong beita hi.
Aman Elijah kiang ah, “Nang Pathian mi aw, ka tung a lungkim louhna bang nei na hia? Ka khelhna hon thei khesak ding leh ka tapa hon thahsak dia hongpai neive!” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Na tapa honpia in” a chi hi. Huchi in a pom lai a la a, a omna dantan ah a pom tou a, a lupna ah a sial hi.
a sam a, “Aw
Huchi in, naupang tung ah thumvei bokkhup in,
Toupa’n Elijah thu a na ngaihkhiak sak hi. Hichi in naupang hinna amah sung ah a hongom nawn a, a hong halhnawnta hi.
Elijah in naupang a pi a, dantan apan inn sung ah a paipih suk a, a nu a pia hi. Elijah in, “En in, na tapa a hing hi” a chi hi.
Numei in Elijah kiang ah, “Tuin Pathian mi na hi a, na kam a
Huan, ni sawtkuamtak nung in hichi ahi a, a kum thum kum in
Elijah Ahab kiang a kihil din a kuanta hi. Samaria gam ah kial a na mahmah hi.
Ahab in Obadiah, a in sunglam heutu a sam hi. Obadiah bel
Hichi ahi a, Jezebel in

Ahab in Obadiah kiang ah, “Tui naknei tengteng leh luiguam tengteng omna gam vatuan vialvial dihve. Sakol leh sabiltungte i hut hing theihna din loupa i muhsak theikha hiam, huchilou in zaw gante i tanvek kha ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in gam totsuak ding in a kihawm ua; Ahab amah kia in lampi dang ah a pai a, Obadiah leng amah kia in lampi dang ah a pai hi.
Huchi a Obadiah a pailai in, ngai in, Elijah in a natuak a; aman a theilai a, huchi in a khupboh a, “Ka toupa Elijah na hi maw?” a chi hi.
Aman a dawng a, “Hi e, kuan inla, ngai in, Elijah huai ah a om hi, chi’n na toupa vahilh in” a chi hi.
Aman, “Thil bang ahia ka hihkhelh a, na sikha thah dia Ahab khut a na honpiak ding?
na Pathian hinna lou in ka gen ahi, ka pu in nang a hon zonsak louhna nam leh gam himhim a omkei. Hiai ah a omkei, a chih chiang un nang a hon muhlouhna thu uah gam leh nam a kichiamsak hi.
Tuin nang, kuan inla, ngai in, Elijah hiai ah a om, chi’n na toupa vahilh in, na chi hi.
Hichi ahi ding a, nang k’on nutsiattakin
Jezebel in
Tuin nang, kuan inla, ngai in, Elijah huai ah a om hi, chi’n na toupa va hilh in na chimawk a; aman kei a honthat mahmah ding, a chi hi.
Elijah in, a ma ka dinna sepaihte
Huchi in Ahab houpih din Obadiah a kuan a, a hilhta a; huchi in Elijah mu din Ahab a kuanta hi.
Hichi ahi a, Ahab in Elijah a muh in Ahab in a kiang ah, “Nang na hi maw, Israelte buaisakpa?” a chi hi.
Aman a dawng a, “Israelte ka buaisak kei. Nang leh na pa inkawte eive a buaisak zaw.
Huchi in tuin Israel tengteng leh Baal zawlnei za li leh sawmnga leh Asher zawlnei, Jezebel dohkan a Ankuang um za lite ka kiang ah Karmel tang ah va samkhawm in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Ahab in Israel suan tengteng kiang ah mi a sawl a, zawlneite Karmel tang ah a samkhawm hi.
Elijah in mipi tengteng a vanaih a, “Vanglak a bang tan om ding na hi ua?
Huchi in, Elijah in mipite kiang ah, “

Huchi in bawngtal nih hongpia uhenla; amau bawngtal khat amau a tuam din tel uhenla, sem nen uhenla, singtung ah koih uhenla, a nuai ah mei tohlou in. Ken leng bawngtal khat ka bawl sam dia, sing tung ah ka koih dia mei ka toh sam kei ding.
Nou na pathiante min uh sam unla, ken
Elijah in Baal zawlneite kiang ah, “Nou bawngtal khat nou a tuam din tel unla, bawl masa un; nou na tamdeuh ua; na pathiante min sam unla, himahleh a nuai ah mei toh kei un” a chi hi.

Bawngtal a tan pen uh a la ua, a bawl ua, “Baal aw, hon dawng in” chi in zingsang apan sun tan in Baal min a sam uh. Himahleh aw a omkei a, a dawng leng a omsam kei a, maitam kibawl tung ah a tawm uhi.

Sunlai in hichi ahi a, “Elijah in amau enghou in, kikou ngaih ve ua; pathian khat ahi ngal a. Midang houpih hiam, nungdelh neilel hiam, khualzin ahihkeileh ihmu lel phawn teitei ngai houh hinte” a chi hi.
Huchi in a ngaih a ngaih in a kikou ua, a hihzel dan bang un sisan pawt khop hial in temta in a ki atkeh ua, thilzum in a kisun uhi.
Sun nung a hong hih in hichi ahi a, nitaklam kithoih hun tan in thu a gen uhi. Himahleh aw hiam, dawngtu hiam limsaktu leng a omkei.
Huchi in Elijah in mipi tengteng kiang ah, “Hongnai dih ua” a chi hi. Huchi in mipi tengteng in a vanaih uhi.
maitam kichimsa a bawlpha a; na min Israel ahi ding, chi a
Huai suangte in
Sing a koih hoih sipsip a, bawngtal a semnen a, singtung ah a koih hi. “Bel li tui in dimsak unla, haltum thillat leh sing buakun” a chi hi.
A nihveina din “Buaknawn un” a chi a; a buaknawn uhi. A thumveina din “Buaknawn un,” a chi a, a buaknawn uhi.
Huchi in tui maitam kim ah a luang zuazua a; tohkuak tui in a dimta hi.
Nitaklam kithoih hun in hichi ahi a, zawlnei Elijah in a va naih a, “
Hon ngaikhia in, Aw
Huchi in,
Huchi in mipi tengteng in huai a muh un a khupboh ua, “
Elijah in a kiang uah, Baal zawlneite man unla, khat leng suaktasak kei un, a chi hi. Huchi in a man ua, Elijah in Kishon lui ah a pi suk a, huai ah amau a that hi.
Elijah in Ahab kiang ah, paitou inla, ne in dawnta in; vuahpi zu ding husa a om, a chi hi.
Ahab ne leh dawn di’n a paitouta hi. Elijah bel Karmel tang vum ah a paitou a; lei ah a kunsuka, a khukte kikal ah a mai a phual hi.
A sikha kiang ah, “Va paitou inla, tuipi lam va en mahdih!” a chi hi. A va paitou a, tuipi lam a en a; “Bangmah a omkei ” a chi hi. Aman sagihvei kuannawn in, a chi hi.

A sagihvei na ah hichi ahi a, ngai in, tuipi apan mihing khuttum chia lel meipi a leng tou viaiviai, a chi hi. Aman vapai inla, Ahab kiang ah, na kangtalai bawl inla, paisukta in, vuah in a honkhum kha ding, chi in, a chi hi.
Sawtlou nung in hichi ahi a, huih leh meipite in van a dup keih kuih a, vuahpi petmah a hongzuta hi. Ahab kangtalai a tuang in Jezreel khua ah a paita hi.
khut Elijah tung ah a om a; a puan a teng a, Ahab ma ah Jezreel kholutna tan a taita hi.
Huan, Ahab in Elijah thilhih tengteng, namsau a zawlnei tengteng a thah thute toh Jezebel a hilh hi.

Huchi in Jezebel in Elijah kiang ah, “Huai mite lak a mi khat hinna bang a zingchiang a hichi hun ma a na hinna k’on bawlsak sam kei leh pathiante’n a lohloh uh honloh uhenla, huai sang a sezaw in leng” chi a hilh din mi a sawl hi.
Huchi in huai a theih in a lau a, a thou a, a hinna humbit din a tai hi. Judah gam a Beer–sheba khua a va tung a, huai ah a sikha a nusia hi.
Amah gamdai ah ni khat lampaina tan ah a hoh a, Juniper sing nuai ah a tuin sih a ngenta hi. “A hunta hi;
Juniper sing nuai ah a lum a, a ihmuta hi. Ngai in, angel in a hong khoih a, a kiang ah, “Thou inla ne in” a chi hi.
Aman a en vialvial a, ngai in, a lu chin ah tanghou pei, suangsa a haiminsa leh tuithawl a na om hi. Huchi in hiaite ne in a dawn a, a lum nawn hi.
angel a nihveina din a hongpai nawn a, a hong khoih a, “Thou inla, ne in, Na paina ding a gamla lawlai hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in a thou a, ne in a dawn a, an ziak a hatna in Pathian tang Horeb tan ni sawmli leh zan sawmli a pai hi.
Huai a kawkhuk khat a vatung a, huai ah a omta hi. Ngai in,
Aman, “
Aman, “Pawtkhia inla, huai tang ah
Zinlin khit in mei a hongpawt a; himahleh huai mei ah
Hichi ahi a, Elijah in huai a zak in a puanin a mai a khuha, va pawtkhia in kawkhuk lutna ah a va ding hi. Ngai in, huai aw in a kiang ah, “Hiai a bang hih na hia, Elijah?” a chi hi.
Aman, “
a kiang ah, “Pai nawn inla, gamdai lam a Damaska khua ah pai in. Na tun chiang in Suria kumpipa din Hazael thau na nilh ding hi.
Israel kumpipa din Nimshi tapa Jehu thau na nilh ding; na sik a zawlnei din Abel meholah khua a mi Shaphat tapa Elisha leng thau na nilh ding ahi.
Hichi ahi ding a, Hazael namsau pel peuhmah Jehu in a that dia; Jehu namsau pel peuhmah Elisha in a that ding.
Himahleh Israel gam ah Baal ma a khukdin ngeilou leh amah tawp ngeilou mi sang sagih kei adin ka sit hi” a chi.

Huchi in huai apan a pawtkhia a, Shaphat tapa Elisha a va mukhia hi. Aman langkawn bat bawngtal tuak sawmlehnih in lou a na kai hi. A sawmlehnihna a zang hi. Elijah in a va naih a, a puan a va silhsak hi.
Aman a bawngtalte paisan in Elijah a nungdelh a, “Ka nu leh ka pa hon tawpsak din k’on ngen, huchi in k’on zui ding” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Pai nawn ve leh, bang k’on chih a eita?” a chi hi.
Amah zuilai a kiknawn a, bawng tuakkhat a gou a, bawng vante in a sa a huan a, mite a pia a, amau a ne uhi. Huchi in a thou a, Elijah a delh a, a na a sepsakta hi.
Huan, Suria kumpipa Benhadad in a sepaih tengteng a kaikhawm vek a, kumpipa sawmthum leh nih a tel ua, sakol leh kangtalaite toh a kuantou a, Samaria khua a va um a, a douta hi.
Israel kumpipa Ahab kiang ah khopi sung ah mi a sawl a, a kiang ah, Benhadad in hichi in a chi,
“Na dangka leh dangkaeng kei a ahi. Na zite leh na tate, na neih hoihpente tan in leng kei a ahi” a chi hi.
Israel kumpipa’n a na dawng a, “Ka toupa, kumpipa aw, na gen bang in kei leh ka neih tengteng nang a ahi” a chi hi.
A mi sawlte a pai nawn ua, Benhadad in hichi in a chi, “Ka kiang a na dangka leh dangkaeng, na zite leh na tate n’on piak ding ahi, chi in mi honsawl ding ka hi,
‘Zingchiang hiai hun in ka sikhate na kiang ah k’on sawl dia, na inn leh na sikhate inn a hong mai ding uh.’ Hichi ahi ding a, na mit late a la ding ua, a hon paipih vek ding uh” a chi hi.

Israel kumpipa’n a gam a upa tengteng a sam a, thei un, “Hiai min thil hoihloutak hih a tupdan. Ka kiang ah mi a honsawla, ka zite, ka tate, ka dangka leh ka dangkaeng a hong ngen a, amah ka na nialkei hi” a chi hi.
Upa tengteng leh mipi tengteng in a kiang ah, “Amah na limsak dah inla, a ngette leng pesam ken” a chi uhi.

Benhadad misawlte kiang ah, “Kumpipa, ka toupa kiang ah, na sikha kiang a misawl a na honnget masak tengteng bang in ka hihdia; himahleh hiai zaw ka hih kei ding” a chi, chi un. Huchi in a misawlte a pai nawn ua, huai thu a va tun uhi.

Benhadad in a kiang ah mi a sawl nawn a, “Kei honzui teng in a khut dim ua a pham dia kiching Samaria khaw leivui nutsiat ahihleh pathiante’n a lohloh honloh uhenla, huai sang a sezaw in leng” a chi hi.
Israel kumpipa’n a dawng a, “Mi a kigalvan khinsa, a galvan suah khesa bang in kiuangsak kei hen, chi in va hilh un” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, amah leh Kumpipate’n puanin a zu a na dawn khawm lai un huai thu Benhadad in a naza a, a mite kiang ah, “Kisa dih ua” a chi hi. Huchi in khua dou din a kisata uhi.
Huchi in, ngai in, zawlnei khat in Israel kumpipa Ahab a va naih a,
Ahab in, “Kua zang in eita?” a chi hi. Aman, “
Huchi in aman gam sehkhente a heutu tangvalte a kaikhawm a, za nih leh sawmthum leh nih ahi uh. Huai mite nung in mi tengteng, Israel suan tengteng a kaikhawm a, sang sagih ahi uh.
Sunlai tak in a vapawt ua, Benhadad leh kumpipate, amah panpih kumpipa sawmthum leh nihte huai puanin ah zu dawnkham in a na om uh.
Gam sehkhente a heutu tangvalte a vapawt masa ua; Benhadad in mi a sawl a, “Amau, Samaria khua apan hongpawt a om uh” chi in a hilh uh.
Aman, “Kilep tuma hong a hih uleh hingmat unla, kidou tuma hong a hih uleh leng hingmat un” a chi hi.
Huchi in hiai gam sehkhente a heutu tangvalte leh a honzui sepaihte khua apan a pawt uhi.
A bitum chiat uh a va that ua; huchi in Suriate a taikekta ua, Israelte’n a delh uhi. Huchi in Suria kumpipa Benhadad sakol tung a tuang in sakol tungtuang mite toh a suakta hi.
Israel kumpipa a va pawtkhia a, sakol leh kangtalaite a va sual a, Suriate tampi a that hi.
Zawlnei in Israel kumpipa a vanaih a, a kiang ah, “Kihat sak inla, na hihdan ding ngaihtuah in kum hong bei leh Suria kumpipa’n hong dou nawn ding ahi” a chi hi.
Suria kumpipa sikhate’n a kiang ah, “A pathiante uh tangte pathiante ahi uh. Huaiziak a eisang a amau hatzaw ahi uh. Phaizang ah dou le hang, amau sang in i hatzaw ngeingei ding uh a chi uhi.
Hiai thilhih in. Kumpipate avek un lakhia inla, amun uah gamukmite koih in.

Sepaihte, sakolte leh kangtalaite, na mansuahsa zah geih sepaihte ding khethak saknawn in. Huchi in phaizang ah i dou ding ua, amau sang in i hatzaw na ding uhi” a chi uh. Aman a thugen uh a ngaikhia a, huchibang in a hihta hi.
A kum nawn in hichi ahi a, Benhadad in Suriate a kaikhawm a, Israelte dou din Aphek ah a hohtou hi.
Israel suante leng a ki kaikhawm ua, nekding a sekkhawm masa ua, dou din a kisata uhi. Israel suante kelnou tawmchik chik hon nih banglel in a va kilang ua; Suriate bel gam ah a pumdim uhi.
Pathian mi’n Israel kumpipa vanaihin, a houpih a, a kiang ah, “
Ni sagih sungtak a ki nangtuah nilouh uh. Hichi ahi a, a ni sagih ni’n a kidouta ua; Israel suante’n Suria mite ni khat in sepaih nuai khat a that uhi.
Midangte bel Aphek ah, khopi sung ah a tailut ua, omlaite mi sing nih leh sang sagih kulhchimin a chipkhumta hi. Benhadad a tai a, khopi sung ah dantan sunggil ah a lut hi.

A sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Ngai in, Israel inkuan lak a kumpipate mi hehpihthei kumpipate ahi uh chih thu ka za uh. Saiip puan teng in, ka lu ua khau a kikhihin Israel kumpipa kiang ah hon va hohsak in; aman a hon hinghawi nuam khamawh kei ding” a chi uh.

Huchi in saiip puan a teng ua, a lu uah khau in a kikhih ua, Israel kumpipa kiang ah a vahoh ua, “Na sikha Bebhadad in, hehpih in hon hinghawi hen” a chi, a chi uh. Aman, “Damlai ahi maw? Amah Ka unaupa ahi” a chi hi.

Huai mite’n lungnuamtakin, a lungsim thutak gen ahi ding chih gingta in, “Na unaupa Benhadad himah e” a chipah uhi. Huchi in aman, “Vapai unla, honpi un” a chi hi. Benhadad a hong pawtkhia a, a kiang ah a hoh a; aman a kangtalai ah a na tuangsak hi.

Benhadad in a kiang ah, “Ka pa’n na pa apan khua a na lakte k’on pekik ding. Ka pa’n Samaria khua a sumsinna munte a bawl bang in Damaska khua ah sumsinna munte na bawlsam ding a chi hi. Huchibang a thu kikhung in k’on paisak ding hi” a chi hi. Huchi in a kiang ah thu a khung a, a paisakta hi.
zawlnei tapate lak a mi khat in
Huchi in a kiang ah, “
Huchi in midang a vamu nawn a, “Honkhen in,” a chi a; huai mi in a khen a, a liamta hi.
Huchi in zawlnei a pai a, lampi ah kumpipa a na tang a, a mai a vut nuh in a na kibawl lamdang hi.

Kumpipa a hongtun in kumpipa a na sam a, “Kei na sikha kidouna lak ah ka tailut a; ngai in, mi khat a hong kilehhei a, ka kiang ah mi khat a honpi a, hiai mi na veng in, a taimang leh a hinna sik in na hinna na tan dia, ahihkeileh dangka talent khat na piak ding ahi” a chi hi.
Kei na sikha ka pumbuai ziak in a na paimangta hi, a chi hi. Israel kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Huchibang geih in na tung a thukhen ahi ding, nangmah in thukhen khin neive” a chi hi.
Aman a mai apan vut a la khezok a; Israel kumpipa’n zawlneite lak a mi ahi chih a theita hi.
Aman a kiang ah, Toupa’n hichi in a chi. “Hihsiat gawp dia ka sehsa mi khat na paisak ziak in a hinna sik in nang hinna, a mite sik in na mite na tan ding” a chi hi.
Israel kumpipa bel nguitak leh lungkimlou tak in a pai a, Samaria khua a hongtungta hi.
Huan, huai thilte nung in hichi ahi a, Jezreel mi Naboth in grephuan a nei a, huai Jezreel ah Samaria kumpipa Ahab inn kiang ah a om ahi.

Ahab in Naboth kiang ah, “Ka inn kiang a om a hih ziak in anteh louhing huan din na grephuan honpia in. A sik in grephuan hoihzaw k’on pe ding. Ahihkeileh na deihzawk lelah a dangka in aman hun ding k’on pe ding” chi in a gen hi.
Naboth in Ahab kiang ah, “Ka pu ka pate gou nang k’on pethei hetkei ding” a chi hi.

Jezreel mi Naboth in huchibang thu a kiang a a gen ziak in Ahab ngui leh lungkimlou tak in a in ah a lut hi; ka pu ka pate gou k’on pe thei hetkei ding, a chi bikbek ngal a. Huchi in a lupna ah a lum a, khatlam a nga a, an a ne kei hi.
Huchi in a zi Jezebel a vahoh a, a kiang ah, “Bangchidan ahia na lungsim huchitaka a lungkham a, an na neklouh?” a chi hi.

Aman a kiang ah, “Naboth kiang ah, Na grephuan hon leisak in, ahihkeileh na deihzawk leh a sik in grephuan dang k’on pe ding ka chi hi. Aman, ka grephuan zaw k’on pethei hetkei ding, chi’n a hon dawng a ahi” a chi hi.
A zi Jezebel in a kiang ah, “Israel gam kumpipa na hi ka hia? Thou inla, an ne inla, lungsim nuamtak in om in. Jezreel mi Naboth grephuan ken k’on pe ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Ahab min in laithonte a gelh a, Ahab chiamtehna in a chiamteh hi. Hiai laithonte Naboth invengte a upate leh makaite kiang ah a khak hi.
Laithonte ah, “An ngolh na phuang unla, mipi lak ah Naboth makai sak un.
Belial tate mi nih a ma ah tusak unla, Nang Pathian leh kumpipa na gensia hi, chi a amah hek ding mi a na bawl un. Huchi in amah paw khia unla, suang in a na denglum un” a chi hi.
A tenna khua a upate leh makaite’n Jezebel in a kiang ua a khak laithon a kigelh bang in a na hihta uhi.
An ngolh a phuang ua, mipi lak ah Naboth a makai sak uhi.

Belial tate mi nih hongpai in a ma ah a va tu ua; Belial tate’n mipite ma ah, Naboth in Pathian leh kumpipa a gensia, chi in amah a hek uhi. Huchi in khua apan a pawkhia ua, suang in a deng ua, a sita hi.
Jezebel kiang ah, Naboth suang in a deng ua, a sita chih hilh din mi a sawl uhi.

Jezebel in Naboth suang in a deng ua, a sita chih a zak in hichi ahi a, Jezebel in Ahab kiang ah, “Thou inla, Jezreel mi Naboth grephuan, a hon leisak phallouh neita aw le. Naboth a dam nawnta kei, a sita hi” a chi hi.
Ahab in Naboth a sita chih a zak in hichi ahi a; Jezreel mi Naboth grephuan nei dia kuansuk din Ahab a thouta hi.
“Thou inla, Samaria khua a om Israel kumpipa houpih din hohsuk in. Ngai in, Naboth grephuan ah a om a, neihtum in huai ah a hohsuk hi.
A kiang ah,
Ahab in Elijah kiang ah, “Na hong muta maw, ka melmapa?” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Hon muta keive,
Ngai in na tung ah thil hoihlou ka tungsak dia, na suante ka lamang dia, Ahab apan a ta pasal taphot Israel gam a mi zalen hi in zalen lou hita leh ka satkhe ding hi.
Nang n’on hehsak ziak in leh Israelte thil na hih khelhsak ziak in Nebat tapa Jeroboam inkawte leh Ahijah tapa Baasha inkawte bang mai in na inkawte ka bawl ding, a chi hi.
Jezebel tungtang thu leng
Ahab inkawte lak a mi khopi a si peuhmah uite’n a ne ding ua; gam a si peuhmahte tung a leng vasate’n a ne ding uh” a chi hi.
A zi Jezebel tohthoh a
Israel suante ma a delhkhiaksa Amorte thilhih chi teng bang in milimte bia in thil kihhuaitak a hih hi.
Ahab in huai thu a zak in hichi ahi a, a puan a botkek a, saiip puan a silh hi. An a ngawl a, saiip puan ah a lum a, kidawmtak in a pai hi.

“Ka ma a Ahab a kiniamkhiak dan na mu hia? A kiniamkhiat ziak in a damsung in hiai thil hoihlou ka tungsak kei dia, a tapa damsung in bel a inkawte tung ah hiai thil hoihlou ka tungsak ding” a chi hi.
Huan, kum thum sung Suriate leh Israelte kidou lou in a om uhi.
A kum thum kum in hichi ahi a, Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat Israel kumpipa kiang ah a hohsuk hi.
Israel kumpipa’n a sikhate kiang ah, “Ramoth a Gilead khua ei a ahi chih thei napi a, bangchidan a Suria kumpipa khut apan sutkhelou a mawk om ihi ua oi?” a chi hi.

Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Ramoth a Gilead ah galdou din kei toh n’ong kuan diam?” a chi hi. Jehosaphat in Israel kumpipa kiang ah, “Kei leh nang, ka mite leh na mite pumkhat i hi ua, ka sakol leh na sakol pumkhat ahi ve ua le” a chi hi.
Jehosaphat in Israel kumpipa kiang ah, “Tuni in

Huchi in Israel kumpipa’n zawlnei mi za li a samkhawm a, a kiang uah, “Ramoth a Gilead khua dou din ka kuantou diam, kuantou lou ding?” a chi hi. Amau, “Kuan in, Toupa’n kumpipa khut ah a honpe ding” a chi uh.
Himahleh Jehosaphat in “Hiai ah
Israel kumpipa’n Jehosaphat kiang ah, “
Huchi in Israel kumpipa’n heutu khat a sam a, “Imlah tapa Mikaiah kintak in vapi mahdih” a chi hi.
Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat bel Samaria kongpi lutna gei phaizang ah a kumpipa uh puan a kithuam in a mangtutphah tuaktuak uah a tu uh. zawlnei tengteng in a ma uah thu a gen uhi.
Kenanah tapa Zedekiah in sik kite a bawlsak a, Toupa’n hichi in a chi, “Hiaite in Suriate mangthang sipsip khop in na hihse ding chi’n,” a chi hi.
Huchi mah bang in zawlnei tengteng in “Ramoth a Gilead khua ah va hohtou inla, va lohching in,

Mikaiah sam dia sawl a ompan a kiang ah, “Ngai dih, zawlneite’n thukhatsat in a hoihlam in kumpipa kiang ah thu a genchiat uh. A gen khitsa bang un gensam inla, a hoihlam in vagen in” chi’n a ngen hi.
Mikaiah in, “

Kumpipa kiang a tun touh in, kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Mikaiah, Ramoth a Gilead khua dou din ka kuantou diam, kuantou lou ding?” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Kuantou inla, va lohching in; Toupa’n kumpipa khut ah a honpe ding” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Thutak kia loungal ka kiang a
Aman, “Israel tengteng ching ding neilou belam bang in tang a dalhzak in ka mu hi.
Israel kumpipa’n Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Ka tungtang thu a hoihlou lam kia loungal a hoihlam himhim a gen kei ding chih k’on hilh ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Aman “Huaiziak in,
Toupa’n, Ramoth a Gilead khua a hohtou a, gal a si dia kuan Ahab kunzou ding ahia? a chi hi. Khat in hichibang in, midang in huchibang in, a chi uhi.
Huchi in kha khat a hongpawt a,

a kiang ah, Bang in eita? a chi hi. Aman ka vahoh dia, a zawlnei teng muk ah kha zuauthei ka vasuak ding a chi hi. Aman va kun mah inla, na lohching lai ding. Va kuan inla, huchibang in va hih veleh, a chi hi.
Huaiziak in, tuin ngai in,
Huchi in Kenanah tapa Zedekiah in a honnaih a, Mikaiah biang a hong beng a, “
Mikaiah in “Ngai in, dantan sunggil a kibu dia na lut ni’n na thei ding” a chi hi.
Israel kumpipa’n, “Mikaiah pi unla, khopi ukpipa Ammon leh kumpi tapa Joash kiang ah paipih nawn un” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n hichi in a chi, “Hiai mi suangkulh ah khum unla, galmuanga k’ong pai nawn masiah gimthuakna an leh gimthuakna tui na pia un” a chi hi.
Mikaiah in “Galmuanga na hongpai nawn leh
Huchi in Israel kumpipa leh Jehosaphat Ramoth a Gilead khua ah a hohtou uh.
Israel kumpipa’n Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Ka kibawl lamdang dia, kidouna ah ka hohtou dia; nang bel na kumpi puansilh in” a chi hi. Huchi in Israel kumpipa a kibawl lamdang a, kidouna ah a hohtou hi.
Suria kumpipa’n a kangtalai tung a heutu sawmthum leh nih te kiang ah, “Israel kumpipa kia loungal mi neu leng, mi lian leng a kuamah sual kei un” chi’n thu a pia hi.
Kangtalai tung a heutute’n Jehosaphat a muh un, hichi ahi a, “Israel kumpipa ahimah ve” a chi uh. Huchi in sual tum in a umta ua; Jehosaphat a kikoukhia hi.
Kangtalai tung a heutute’n Israel kumpipa a na hi kei chih a theih un hichi ahi a, a delhlai uh a nungkiksan uhi.

Mi khat in tup tuam neilou in a thalpeu a lai a, Israel kumpipa kithopna kikal tak ah a kap khat a hi. Huchi in a kangtalai hawlpa kiang ah, “Kaihei inla, sepaihte lak apan hon pawtpih in, ka liam hi” a chi hi.
Huai ni’n kidouna a thupi mahmah a; kumpipa a kangtalai tung a kingai in Suriate lamnga in a opsuk a, nitaklam in a sita a; a liamna apan sisan kangtalai sung ah a luang hi.
Nitum kuan in sepaihte lak ah, “Michih amah khua ah, michih amah gam ah paivek hen” chi’n thu puankhiat ahi.
Huchi in kumpipa a sita a, Samaria khua a lutpih ua; huchi in Samaria khua ah kumpipa a vuita uhi.
Samaria khua dil khat ah kangtalai a sil ua;
Huchi in Ahab tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng, saiha inn a lamte, a khosat tengteng Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Ahab a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a; a tapa Ahaziah a sik in a hong lalta hi.
Israel kumpipa Ahab lal kum lina ah Asa tapa Jehosaphat Judahte tung ah a lal pan hi.
Jehosaphat a lal kipat in kum sawmthum leh nga ahi a; Jerusalem khua ah kum sawmnih leh nga vai a hawm hi. A nu min Azubah ahi a, amah Shilhi tanu ahi.
A pa Asa lampi tot tengteng a tawn a; pialsan hetlou in
Jehosaphat in Israel kumpipa toh kilemna a bawl hi.
Huchi in Jehosaphat tanchin dangte, a thilhih theihdan a hih lat thute, a galdou thute Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
A pa Asa damlai a pasal kizuak omlaite a gam apan a delh khe vek hi.
Edom gam ah kumpipa a omkei a, thuneihna piaksawn mi khat in vai a hawm hi.
Jehosaphat in Ophir a pai a dangkaeng paw ding Tarsis longte a bawl hi. Himahleh Ezion-geber mun ah longte a siat khitvek ziak in a hohta kei hi.
Huchi in Ahab tapa Ahaziah in Jehosaphat kiang ah, ka sikhate na sikhate toh longte ah kuankhawm le uh ake, a chi a; himahleh Jehosaphat in lem a sa kei.
Huchi in Jehosaphat a pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, a pute lak ah a pu David khopi ah a vui ua; a tapa Jehoram a sik in a lalta hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat lal kum sawmlehsagih kum in Ahab tapa Ahaziah Samaria ah Israelte tung ah a lal pan a, Israelte tung ah kum nih a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou a hih a, a nu leh a pa lampi totte, Nebat tapa Israelte thil hihkhial sakpa Jeroboam lampi totte a tawn sam hi.
A pa hihteng hih in Baal na a sem a, a bia a,
Huan, Ahab sih nung in Israelte tung ah Moabte a hel uhi.

Ahaziah Samaria khua a dantan tungnung vathangkalh tohlet apan a kekhia a, a kihihnata hi. Huchi in mi a sawl a, a kiang uah, “Kuan unla, hiai ka natna a hoihkhe nawnthei hiam Ekron khaw pathian Baal zebub va dong un” a chi hi.
Himahleh
hichi in a chi. Na kahtouna lupna apan na hong kumsuk nawn kei dia, na si ngeingei ding, chi’n vagen in” a chi hi. Huchi in Elijah a kuanta hi.
A mi sawlte a kiang ah a hong kiknawn un a kiang uah, “Bang a chi a ahia na hong kiknawn mawk uh?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Mi khat hong houpih din a hong a, ka kiang uah, Pai unla, nou hon sawlpa kumpipa kiang ah kiknawn unla, a kiang ah,
Aman a kiang uah, “Nou hon houpih dia hong, huai thute hong hilhpa mi bangchibang ahia oi?” a chi hi.
Amau a dawng ua, “Samul puan a kizem ahi a, a kawng savun kawnggak in a gak,” a chi ua; aman “Tishbi mi Elijah eive” a chi hi.

Kumpipa’n sepaih sawmnga heutu, a heute sawmnga toh a kiang ah a sawl hi. A kiang ah a hohtou uhi. Huchi in ngai in, amah mualvum ah a na tu hi. Aman “Nang, Pathian mi, kumpipa’n hong paisuk in, a chi ve” a chi hi.

Elijah in a dawng a, sepaih sawmnga heutu kiang ah, “Pathian mi ka hihleh van apan mei hong kesuk henla, nangmah leh na heute sawmnga hong kangmang vek hen” a chi hi. Huchi in van apan mei a hong kia a, amah leh a heute sawmnga a kangmang vek uhi.
A kiang ah sepaih sawmnga heutu dang, a heute sawmnga toh a sawlnawn hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Nang Pathian mi, kumpipa’n, hong paisuk meng in, a chi ve” a chi hi.

Elijah in a dawng a, a kiang a ah, “Pathian mi ka hihleh van apan mei hong kesuk henla, nang leh na heute sawmnga hong kangmang vek hen” a chi hi. Huchi in Pathian mei van a kipan a hongkia a, amah leh a heute sawmnga a kangmang vekta uhi.

Sepaih sawmnga dang heutu, a heute sawmnga toh a sawl nawn a, huai sepaih sawmnga dang heutu a kuantou a, Elijah ma ah a va khukdin a, a kiang ah, “Pathian mi aw, ka hinna leh hiai na sikha mi sawmngate hinna na mitmuh in manpha hen.
Ngai in, van apan mei a hong ke suk a, sepaih sawmnga heutu nihte a heute sawmnga u toh a kang mangta ua; huaiziak in ka hinna na mitmuh in manpha hen” chi’n a ngen hi.
Huchi in
Aman a kiang ah,
Huchi in Elijah in a gen
Ahaziah thilhih tanchin dangte Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Huan,
Elijah in Elisha kiang ah, “Hiai ah a na om dih;
Bethel a om zawlneite tapate Elisha kiang ah a hoh ua, a kiang ah, “Tuni’n
Elijah in a kiang ah, “Elisha, hiai ah na om dih;
Jeriko a om zawlneite tapate’n Elisha a va naih ua, a kiang ah, tuni’n
Elijah in a kiang ah, “Hiai ah na om dih,
Zawlneite tapate lak a mi sawmnga a vahoh ua, amaute zawn ah gamla kuamtak ah a va ding ua; amau gel bel Jordan gei ah a na ding uhi.
Elijah in a puan a la a, a lomzial a, tui a sat a, a langtuak ah a hong kikhenta a, huchi in a nih un leikeu ah a paita uhi.
A galkah nung un hichi ahi a, Elijah in Elisha kiang ah, “Na kiang apan lakmang a ka omma in bang ahia k’on hihsak ding hon ngen in” a chi hi; Elisha in “Na kha tan nih tang leng” a chi hi.
Aman “Thil haksapi ngen neive; haksa mahleh na kiang apan lakmang a ka omlai na muh leh na tang ding, n’on muh kei lehbel na tangkei ding” a chi hi.
A paikawm kawm ua, a houlim lai un hichi ahi a, ngai in, mei kangtalai leh mei sakolte a hong kimu guih uhi. A kal ua kigolh in a kikhen sakta a; Elijah bel pingpei in van ah a paitouta hi.
Elisha in huai a mu a, “Ka pa aw, ka pa aw, Israelte kangtalai leh a sakol a tuangte aw!” chi in a kikou hi. Huchi in Elijah a muta kei a; amah puan a man a, phel nih in a botkek hi.
Elijah puan hong kia leng a tawm a, a pai kiknawn a, Jordan luigei ah ading hi.
Elijah puan hong kia a la a, huai in tui a sat a, “
Jeriko khua a zawlneite tapate, amah zawn a omte’n a muh un, “Elijah kha Elisha tung ah a tumah ve” a chi uhi. Amah mu din a kuan ua, a ma ah leisi in a kunsuk uhi.
Amau, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, na sikhate’n mi ngalhat pipi sawmnga ka ompih uh. Na heutupa zong din sawl ve.
Zumhuai khop a a nget nung un, “Kuansak ve ua” a chi khong hi. Huchi in mi sawmnga a sawl ua; ni thum sung a zong ua, himahleh a mu zoukei uh.
Jeriko khua a a nituanlai in a kiang ah a hong nawn ua; aman a kiang uah, na kiang uah, “Kuansak kei un, k’on chi ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Huai khua a mite’n Elisha kiang ah, “En in, hiai khomun a nuam mahmah a, ka toupa un leng n’on muhpih hi. Himahleh tui a hoihkei a, a gam mahmah gahsuah theilou gam ahi” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Tuithawl thak honla unla, chi thun un,” a chi a; huchi in a honla uhi.
Tuikhuk ah a vahoh a, chi a thehlut a, “
Huchi in Elisha gen bang in tunitan in huai tui a limta hi.
Huai apan Bethel ah a hohtou a; lampi a a pailai in khua apan pasal naupang hon a hong pawtkhia ua, a hong nuihsan ua, a kiang ah, “Nang lugiaupa, va hohtou in, nang lugiaupa va hohtou in” a chi uhi.
A nunglam a nga a, amau a mu a, Toupa min in a hamsiatta hi. Huchi in gamnuai apan vompinu nih a hong pawtkhia ua, a lak ua naupang sawmli leh nih a balgawp uhi.
Huai apan Karmel tang ah a hoh a, huai apan Samaria khua ah a pai nawnta hi.
Huan, Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat kum sawmlehgiat a lal kum in Ahab tapa Jehoram Israelte tung ah Samaria khua ah a lal pan a; kum sawmlehnih a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihloupi a hih a; himahleh a nu leh a pa bangtel in zaw thil ahihkei hi. Ama’n a pa Baal suangphuh a paimang hi.
Himahleh, Israelte thil hihkhial sak Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhnate amah ah a belh chinten a; huai a paisan kei hi.
Moab kumpipa Mesha belam vulmi ahi a; aman Israel kumpipa kiang ah belamnou nuai khat mul leh belampa nuai khat mul siah a liau hi.
Himahleh Ahab sih nung in hichi ahi a, Moab kumpipa Israel kumpipa tung ah a helta hi.
Huchihlai in kumpipa Jehoram Samaria khua apan a pawt a, Israel tengteng a kai khawmvek hi.

Huchi in a pawt a, Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat kiang ah “Moab kumpipa ka tung ah a hel a, Moabte na hondou pih diam?” chi in mi a sawl hi. Aman “Hondou pih e, kei leh nang, ka mite leh na mite pumkhat i hi ua, ka sakolte leh na sakolte leng pumkhat ahi uh” a chi hi.
Amahmah in, “Koi lampi ah ahia i kuan touh ding?” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Edom gamdai lampi ah” a chi hi.
Huchi in Israel kumpipa Judah kumpipa toh, Edom kumpipa toh, a kuanta ua; ni sagih a paikual ua; a sepaihte leh a gan tonpihte dawn ding tui a omta kei hi.
Israel kumpipa’n, “E heh he!
Himahleh Jehosaphat in, “Hiai ah
Jehosaphat in, a kiang ah “Aman

Elisha in Israel kumpipa kiang ah, “Nang leh ken kizopna bang i nei a? Na pa zawlneite leh na nu zawlneite kiang ah vahoh in” a chi hi. Israel kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Pailou e; kumpipa thumte Moabte khut a piak din
Elisha in, “A kiang a ka dinna sepaihte
Himahleh, kaihging tumsiam mi honsam un” a chi hi. Kaihging tumsiam in a hontum leh, hichi ahi a,
Aman,

mah in hichi in a chi. Huih himhim na mu kei ding ua, vuah himhim leng na musam kei ding uh. Himahleh hiai phaizang tui in a dim vek ding hi. Huchi in nou leh na bawnghonte uh leh na gante un a dawn ding uh.
Hiai
Kulhpi nei khua tengteng leh khopi hoih tengteng na hihse ding ua, sing hoih tengteng na phuk ding ua, tuikhuk tengteng na hubing ding ua, mun hoih tata suang in na dengse vek ding uh” a chi hi.
Zingsang in, thillat lat hunlai in hichi ahi a, ngai in, Edom gam lam apan tui a hongluang a, a gam tui in a hong dimta hi.
Moab tengteng in amau sual din kumpipate a hong kuantou uh chih a na zak un, galdou thei chiang tengteng a na kikaikhawm ua, gamgi ah a na pangta uhi.
Huchi in, zingkhang in a thou ua, ni in tui tung a hon salvak a, Moabte’n a zawn ua tui sisan bang a san in a mu uhi.
“Sisan eive, kumpipate amau le amau a kidou ua, amau leh amau kithat uh ahi mahmah ve. Kisa un, Moabte aw, gallak thil i vatuh ding uh” a chi uhi.
Israelte giahphual a vatun uleh, Israelte a hong thouphut ua, Moabte a sual ua, huchi in a ma uah a taikek uh. Moabte that kawm in a gam uah a delhlutta uhi.

Khuate a hihsia ua; amun hoih tata teng uh michih in a deng ua, suang in a dimgawpta hi. Tuikhuk tengteng a hubing ua, sing hoih tengteng a phuk ua; Kir hareseth khua a om suangte kia a khoihkei uhi. Huai leng vaisuanglot tawipawl in a um kimvel ua, a sual uhi.
Moab kumpipa’n a kidou uh zou din a kitheita kei a, Edom kumpipa kiang a tungdia phut paisuak tum in namsau tawi mi za sagih a pikhia a, himahleh a lohsam uhi.
Huchi in a tapa upapen, a sik a honglal ding pen kulhdawn ah haltum thillat in a lanta hi. Huchi in Israelte a tung ah a heh mahmah ua, a kisa ua, a gam uah a paikik nawnta uhi.
Huan, zawlneite tapate zite lak a numei khat in Elisha kiang ah, “Na sikha, ka pasal a na sita hi. Na sikha in
Elisha in a kiang ah, “Bang k’on hihsak dia? Honhilh ve, inn ah bang na nei a?” a chi hi. Aman Na sikhanu’n “Sathau um khat kia loungal inn ah bangmah ka neikei” a chi hi.
Huchi in aman, vakuan inla, na invengte tengteng bel vuak va khel khawm in; tamlou kia zaw khel ken.
Na honglut chiang in na tate toh kong kikhak khum unla, huai bel tengteng ah sathau thun inla; a dim dim in na tuamkoih ding“ a chi hi.
Huchi in a kiang apan a paita a, amah leh a tapate toh kong a kikhak khum ua; amau belte a honla ua, aman a na thunzel hi.
Belte a dim nung in, hichi ahi a, a tapa kiang ah, “Bel honla nawn dih” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah “Bel a om nawn kei” a chi hi. Huchi in sathau a kangta hi.
Huaikhit in Pathian mi kiang ah a vahoh a, thil omdan a va hilh hi. Aman, “Vapai inla, sathau vazuak inla, na leibat va din inla, a val in na tapate toh khosa un” a chi hi.
Ni khat Elisha Shunem khua ah a vazin hi. Huai ah numei neizoutak khat a om hi. Aman an ne din a na sawl teitei hi. Huchi in a pai peuhmah chiang in huai ah an ne din a lut hi.
Aman a pasal kiang ah, “Ngai in, hiai mi honnawk zelpa Pathian Mi Siangthou ahi, chih ka thei.
Kisa dih, in pindan neu i bawlsak dia, lupna, dohkan, tutphah leh khawnvak koihna i koihsak ding. Huchi a i kiang a a hong chiang in a lutzel ding” a chi hi.
Ni khat a vahoh a, huai in pindan ah a valut a, a valum hi.
A sikha Gehazi kiang ah, “Hiai Shunem numei honsam dih” a chi hi. A vasama maah a hongding hi.

Aman a kiang ah, “Ngai in, Nang nakpitak in n’on deihthoh a, bang k’on hihsak sam dia, kumpipa hiam, sepaih heutu hiam hon houpihsak leng na ut hia? chi’n a kiang ah gen in” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Ka chipihte lak maha teng ka hi” a chi hi.
Aman “Amah a dia bang hihding ahia leh?” a chi hi. Gehazi in a dawng a, “Tapa zaw a neikei hi, a pasal lah a upata hi” a chi hi.
Aman, “Vasam dih,” a chi hi. A va sam a, kongah a hongding hi.
Aman, “Tu bang hun a hong tun nawn chiang in tapa na pomta ding” a chi hi. Aman, “Maizen, toupa, nang Pathian min na sikhanu kiang ah zuaugen ken” a chi hi.
Huchi in numei a gai a, Elisha in a kiang a, a gen bang a ahun a hongtun nawn in tapa a neita hi.
Naungek a hong khanglian a, ni khat a pa toh buhla mite kiang ah a kuansam hi.
A pa kiang ah, “Ka lu, ka lu” a chi hi. A pa’n sikha valnou khat kiang ah, “A nu kiang ah pom in paipihin” a chi hi.
A paipiha, a nu kiang a tunin a pheitung ah suntan a tu a, huchi in a sita hi.
A paitoua, Pathian mi lupna ah a siala, kong a khakkhum a, a pawtta hi.
Huchi in a pasal a sam a, “Sikha kuahiam leh sabiltung khat hon ngaihtuahsak dihve, Pathian mi kiang ah ka vatai dia, k’ong kiknawn ding” a chi hi.
Aman “Bangdia tuni chitchiata a kiang a hohtum na hia? Kha thak leng ahikeia, khawlni leng ahi ngalkeia” a chi hi. Aman, “A hoih ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in sabiltung a bawl a, a sikha kiang ah, “Hawl inla malam ah pai in, thu k’on piak kei leh awl paiken” a chi hi.
Huchi in a paita hi, Pathian mi kiang ah Karmel tangah a vahoh hi. Pathian min gamlapi apan a na muh in, hichi ahi a, a sikha Gehazi kiang ah, “En in, huai ah Shunem numei a om.
Amah dawn din vatai inla, a kiang ah, na dam hia? Na pasal dam maw? Naupang leng dam maw? va chi in” a chi hi. Aman a na dawng a, “Dam e” a chi hi.

Tang a Pathian mi kiang a va tun in, a khe a len chinten a, amah hong sawnhang tum in Gehazi in a va naih hi. Himahleh Pathian mi’n “Bangmah chih ken, a lungsim a mangbang hi. Toupa’n ka lak ah a sel a a honhilh naikei hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in aman, “Ka toupa, tapa k’on ngen ahia? Honkhem ken, k’on chi hilou maw?” a chi hi.

Huchi in Gehazi kiang ah, “Na puan teng inla, ka chiang tawi in vahoh in. Kuapeuh mu lechin leng, chibai buk ken. Kuapeuh in chibai a honbuk uleh leng dawng ken. Ka chiang naupang maitang ah vanga in” a chi hi.
Naupang nun, “
Gehazi in amau a na makhelha, naupang mai ah chiang a na nga hi. Himahleh aw leh zak bangmah a omkei. Huchi in houpih din a kiknawn a, “Naupang hak hetkei veh aw” chi’n a hilh hi.
Elisha insung a va lut leh ngai in, naupang a si khinta a, a lupna ah a na lumsak lai uhi.
Huchi in a valut a, a nih un kong a khakkhum a,
A paitou a, naupang a bohkhuma, a muk leh a muk, a mit leh a mit, a khut leh a khut a sutuaha; a tung ah a kizana; huchi in naupang taksa a honglum hiaihiai hi.
Huchi in a kiknawn a, inn sung ah a kivialleh a; a hohtoua, a tung ah a bok a; huchi in naupang sagihvei a hong hahchiai a, a hong hakta hi.
Huchi in Gehazi a sam a, “Hiai Shunem numei honsam dih” a chi hi. A vasam a, a kiang a a valut leh, “Na tapa pom in” a na chi hi.
Huchi in a valut a, a khebul ah a khupboh a, a mai a leisi in a kuna; a tapa a pom a, a pawtkhia hi.
Gilgal ah Elisha a hohnawn hi. Huai gam ah kial a kia hi. zawlneite tapate a ma ah a tukhawm ua; aman a sikha kiang ah, “Bel lianpi suang inla, zawlneite tapate an huansakin” a chi hi.
Mi khat gam ah meh zong in a vakuana, gam khau a va mua, a gah khenkhat a lou a, a puan in a tun theihzah a tun a, a atnena, bel sung ah a kha hi. Bang ahia chih a thei kuamah a omkei uh.
Huchi in huai mite nek din a suakkhia ua, an huan a nek ua leh, hichi ahi a, “E, Pathian mi, bel sung a sihna om a kei maw” a chi kheukhou ua; a ne theita kei uhi.
Aman, “Tangbuang hon ladih ua” a chi a; huai bel ah a kha hi; “Mite nek din hon suakkhe dih ua” a chi hi. Huchi in bel ah lauhuai bangmah a omta kei hi.
Baal Shalisha apan mi khat a hong a, Pathian mi adin buh thak masapen a bawl barli buh sangpek sawmnih leh buh thak vui a ip in a hontawi a; aman, “Hiai mite nekdin pia in” a chi hi.
A sikha in, “Bang e, mi za khattak hiai ka lui ding maw?” a chi hi. Aman hiai mite nekding pia in. Toupa’n hichi in a chi, “A ne ding ua, a khamval lai ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in a lui a, a ne ua,
Suria kumpipa sepaih heutu Naaman, Toupa’n Suriate humbitpa a a zat ziak in, a pu ngaih in thupi leh zahtakhuai tak ahi. Amah mi hat ahi lai a, himahleh a phak hi.
Suriate a pawlpawl in a kuan khia ua, Israel gam apan numei naupangnou khat sal in a honpi ua; aman Naaman zi na a sem hi.
Aman a pi kiang ah, “Ka toupa Samaria khua a zawlnei kiang a om hileh chi nang e! A phakna a na hihdamsak ding hi a” a chi hi.
Mi khat a valut a, a toupa kiang ah, “Israel gam a numei naupang nou in huchibang khachi bang in a gen” chi in a pu a hilh hi.
Suria kumpipa’n “Vahoh hen aw, Israel kumpipa kiang ah lai ka khak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a pawt a, dangkasik talent sawm leh, dangkaeng khal sang guk leh silhlehten kikhenna ding sawm a keng hi.
Huailai in Israel kumpipa a vapia a, huai ah hiai a kigelh hi. “Hiai lai na mu dia, ngai in, ka sikha Naaman a phakna na hihdam sak din na kiang ah k’on sawl hi” chih.

Israel kumpipa’n huailai a sim a, hichi ahi a, a puan a botkek a, “Mite that thei a, hingsak nawn thei Pathian hia ka hih? Hiai mi in phak hihdam dia ka kiang ah a honsawl mawkmawk. Ngaihtuah unla, ka tung ah thusia a zong hi, chih theidih ua” a chi hi.

Pathian mi Elisha in Israel kumpipa’n a puan a botkek chih a na zak in, hichi ahi a, “Bangdia na puan botkek na hia? Ka kiang ah hongpai leh a ke, huchi in Israel gam ah zawlnei a om chih a theimai ding” va chi din kumpipa kiang ah mi a sawl hi.
Huchi in Naaman a sakolte leh a kangtalaite toh a vahoh a, Elisha inn kongbul ah a va ding hi.
Elisha in, “Jordan lui ah sagihvei va kisil inla, na sa in ngeina a pu nawn dia, huchi in na siangta ding” chi din mi a sawl hi.
Himahleh, Naaman a heh mahmah a, a paikhia a, “Ngai un, amah mah ka kiang a hongpawt dia, a hongding dia,
Damaska khaw luite Abana leh Pharpar Israel gam lui tengteng sang in a hoihzaw ka hia? Huaite a kisil in ka siangthou theikei dia hia?” a chi hi. Huchi in a kilehhei a, heh mahmah in a pai hi.

A sikhate’n a vanaih ua, a va houpih ua, “Ka pa aw, zawlnei in thil haksatak hon hihsak dek lehleng na hihmai kei dia hia? Va kisil inla, hong siangthou in, a chih pen hihzawk tuaklua hilou maw?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in a hohsuk a, Pathian mi gen bang in Jordan lui ah sagihvei a va kidiaha; huchi in a sa naungek sa bang a hong hinawn a, a hongsiangta hi.

Amah leh a heu tengteng Pathian mi kiang ah a kiknawn ua, a ma ah a va ding uhi. Aman “Ngai in, Israel ah loungal leitung tengteng ah Pathian a na omkei, chih ka theita. Huaiziak in, tuin na sikha vualzawlna la din k’on ngen” a chi hi.
Himahleh aman “A kiang a ka omna
Naaman in, “Ahihkeileh, kei na sikha sabiltung nih puak khop leitang hon lasak in. Tuban siah kei na sikha in
Hiai thil ah
Aman a kiang ah, “Lungmuangtakin pai in” a chi hi. Huchi in a kiang apan a pawt a, gamla lou a paikhe man hi.
Himahleh Pathian mi Elisha sikha Gehazi in, “Ngai in, ka pu in Suria mi Naaman thil hontawite la hetlou in a paisak mawka.
Huchi in Gehazi in Naaman a delhta hi. Naaman in kuahiamin a delh a muh in, na houpih din kangtalai apan a kumkhia hi. “Hoihvek na maw?” a chi hi.

Aman, “Hoihvek mah e. Ka pu in, Ngai in, tumah in Ephraim tang gam apanin zawlneite tapate lak a tangval nih ka kiang ah a hong ua, amaute dangkasik talent khat leh puansilh kikhenna ding nih pia in” chih gen ding in a hongsawl hi” a chi hi.
Naaman in, “ Khamuang inla, Talent nih lave” a chi hi. Huchi in ladin a ngen a, dangkasik talent nih puansilh kikhenna ding nih toh ip nih ah a thuna, a sikhate nih a pawsaka, a ma ah a paipihta uhi.
Tang a vatun un a laksaka, inn sung ah a koih a; huchi in mite a paisakta hi.
Amah a lut a, a pu ma ah a va ding hi. Elisha in a kiang ah, “Koi a hong kipan na hia, Gehazi?” a chi hi. Aman, “Na sikha koimah ah ka hohkei” a chi hi.

Aman a kiang ah, “Nang mu dia kangtalai apan huai mi a hong kumlai in ka lungtang na kiang ah a paikei maw? Sum, puansilhte, olive huante, grephuante, belamte, bawngtalte, sikhapate leh sikhanute lakhun ahi ahia?
Huaiziak in, Naaman phak nang ah a belh dia, tangtawn in na suante ah leng a belh ding” a chi hi. Huchi in a omna apan vuk bang a ngouin phaksa in a paikheta hi.
Huan, zawlneite tapate’n Elisha kiang ah, “En in, hiai mun na kiang a ka tenna uh kou adin a kawchik lua hi.
K’on ngen uh. Jordan lui ah kahoh suk ding ua, huai ah sing ka vala chiat ding ua, ka tenna ding uh huai ah ka valam ding uh aw?” a chi uhi. Aman a dawng a, “Kuan ve ua” a chi hi.
Mi khat in, “Na sikhate kiang ah hohsam in” a chi hi. Aman, “Hohsam leng a kei dia” chi’n a dawng hi.
Huchi in a kiang uah a hohsamta hi. Jordan lui a tun un sing a phuk uhi.
Mi khat in a phuk sanlai in, a heitang tui ah a kia hi. Aman, “Maizen! Pu, mi a kikhel eive” chi’n a kikou hi.
Pathian mi in “Koilai ah ahia a kiak?” a chi hi. Aman a kiakna mun a ensak hi. Huchi in sing hiang khat a sat a, huai ah a pailut a, sik a hong kilam hi.
Aman, “Tawm aw leh” a chi a; huchi in a sawk a, a tawmta hi.
Suria kumpipa’n Israelte a hong dou a, huai mun ah giahphual ka sat ding, chi’n a sikhate thu a kum hi.
Pathian mi’n Israel kumpipa kiang ah, “Huchibang mun a hoh lou din pilvang in. Huai ah Suriate a hongsuk ding uh” chi’n mi a sawl hi.
Israel kumpipa’n Pathian mipa’n a na hilhna mun mi a va enkhesak zel hi. Huai ah nihvei khatvei phetlou in, a na kihumbit zel hi.
Huchi in huai thu ah Suria kumpipa lungtang a mangbang gawp hi. A sikhate a sam a, a kiang uah, “I lak ua mi a kua ahia Israel kumpipa lam a pang? N’on hilh kei ding ua hia?” a chi hi.
A sikhate lak a mi khat in, “Kuamah pang kei ve ung e, kumpipa, ka toupa aw. Israel gam a om zawlnei Elisha in na dantan sunggil a na gente Israel kumpipa a na hilh zel ahizaw hi” a chi hi.
Aman, “Koi a om ahia va zong un, ka va mansak ding” a chi hi; “Ngai in, Dothan ah a om” chi’n a hilh uhi.
Huchi in sakolte, kangtalaite leh sepaih tampite huai ah a sawl a, zan in a vahoh ua, khua a um kim vel uhi.
Pathian mi sikha zingkhang in a thou a, a va pawt khiak leh, ngai in, sepaihte’n sakol leh kangtalaite toh khua a na umsuakta uh. Sikha in a kiang ah, “Maizen! Pu aw, bang i chihta dia le?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Lau ken; amau lam a pangte sang in ei lam a pangte a tam zaw hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Elisha a thum a, “
Amah lam a a hong paisuk uleh
Elisha in a kiang uah, “Hiai lampi ahi kei, hiai leng khua ahi sam kei. Kei honzui un, na mi zonpa uh kiang ah k’on pi ding” a chi hi. Huchi in Samaria khua ah a pita hi.
Samaria khaw sung a tun un hichi ahi a, Elisha in, “
Israel kumpipa’n amau a muh in Elisha kiang ah, “Ka Pa aw, ka that diam? Ka that diam?” a chi hi.
Aman a dawng a, “That ken; na namsau leh na thalpeu in na salmatte na that dia hia? Tanghou leh tui a ma uah lui inla, ne in dawn uhenla, a pu uh kiang ah pai kiknawn uhen” a chi hi.
Huchi in nekding thupi mahmah a bawlsak a; a nek ua a dawn khit un a paisak vek ua, a pu uh kiang lam ah a pai nawn uh. Huchi in Suria pawlte Israel gam ah a hong nawnta kei uhi.
Huai nung in hichi ahi a, Suria kumpipa Benhadad in a sepaih tengteng a kaikhawm a, Samaria khua a va umta hi.
Samaria khua ah kial a nasa mahmah a, ngai in, sabiltung lutang dangka sawmgiat in a khot uh leh begap kab mun li a khen mun khat dangka nga a lei ahihtan hial un, khua a um bikbek hi.
Israel kumpipa kulhdawn a a pailai in numei khat in, Aw kumpipa, ka toupa, honhuh in, chi’n a na sam hi.
Aman, “
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Bang na chi a ahia awi?” a chi nawn hi.
Aman a dawng a, “Hiai numei in ka kiang ah, Tuni in na tapa i nek din hon thoh ve, zingchiang in ka tapa i ne na keidia, a chi hi.
Huchi in ka tapa ka huan ua, ka ne uh. A zing in ken a kiang ah, Na tapa i nek din hon thohsam in, ka chi hi. Aman a tapa a selgu maimah hi” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n numei thugen a zak in hichi ahi a, a puan a botkek a; kulh dawn a a pailai ahi a; mipite’n a et uleh, ngai in, a sa tung ah saiip puan a na silh nilouh hi.
Huchi in aman, “Tuni a Saphat tapa Elisha in a lutang a puak lai peuhmah leh Pathian in a lohloh in honloh mai hen, huai sang a leng thupizaw in” a chi hi.
Elisha a inn ah a tu a, upate leng a kiang ah a tu sam uh.

Kumpipa’n a kiang ah mi khat a sawl a, himahleh a misawl a kiang a tun ma in upate kiang ah, “Hiai tualthatpa tapa in ka lu la din mi a honsawl, chih na thei na uhia? Pau kei dih ua, a misawl a hongtun chiang in, kong na khak unla, kongkhak in na dal bikbek un. A nung ah a pu kalsuan ging a kiza kei maw?” a chi hi.
Huchi a amau a houpih sanlai in, ngai in, a mi sawl a hong tungsuk hi. Ngai in, kumpipa’n “Hiai thil hoihlou
Elisha in, “
Heutu khat kumpipa’n a khut a ngaknapa’n Pathian mi a dawng hi.
“Ngai in,
Huailai in kulh lutna kongpi bul ah phak li a om uhi. Amau, “Bangdia sih ngak lel a tu nilouh i hi ua?

Khopi sung ah lutni, chi leng, khopi sung kial a, huai a vasi mai ding hang a; hiai ah tu nilouh le hang lah, si thouthou ding hang a; huaiziak in tuin paini, Suria sepaihte kiang ah i valut peuhmah ding uh. A hon na hinghawi uh leh i hing dia; a hon na thah uh leh si i hi maike” chi’n a kihou uhi.
Huchi in Suriate giahphual a hoh din khomui in a kuan uhi. Suriate giahphual tuah masak a vatun un, ngai in, kuamah a na omkei uhi.

Toupa’n Suria sepaihte kangtalaite husa, sakolte husa leh sepaih tampi husa a na zasak hi. Huchi in, “Ngai un, Israel kumpipa’n Hit kumpipate leh Aigupta kumpipate ei hong dou dia guai eive” chi’n a kihou uhi.
Huchi in a thou ua, khomui in a taikekta uh. A puaninte uh, a sakolte uh, a sabiltungte uh leh a giahphual uh a om ngeingei in a taisan ua, a taikekta uhi.

Huai mi phakte giahphual tuah masak a vatun un puanin khat ah a lut ua, ne in a dawn uh. Dangkasik, dangkaeng leh puansilhte a la ua, a sel ua; a nung kiknawn ua, puanin dang ah a lut nawn ua, huai a leng a la ua, a sel uhi.

“A denchiang in, i hihdik hetkei. Tuni tanchin kipahhuai tun ni ahi a, ei i daidide ua; khovak i ngak uleh gawtna i tuak ding uh. huaiziak in, kisa ni, kumpipa inkawte i va hilh ding uh” chi’n a kihou uhi.

Huchi in khopi kongkhak vengmi a va sam ua; “Suriate giahphual ah ka va hoh ua, ngai in, kuamah a na omkei ua, mihing husa himhim leng a omkei, sakolte leh sabiltungte kia a na kikhih a, puaninte leng a om ngeingei in a na om uhi” chi’n a hilh uhi.
Kongkhak vengmite a sam a; amau kumpipa inn sung a mite a vahilh uh.

Kumpipa zan in a thou a, a sikhate kiang ah, “Suriate hon bawldan k’on hilh ding. I gilkial dan uh a thei uh. Huaiziak in, khopi apan a hongpawt uleh a hing in i na man ding ua, khaw sung ah i lut ding uh, chi in gamlak a kibu dia a giahphual uh pawt khiak san ahi uh” a chi hi.

A sikhate lak a khat in a dawng a, “Khopi a omsun sakol nga va pisak inla, ngai in, Israel mipi a damlai tengteng Israel mipite si bang a sehte ahi himhim uhi; huchi in amaute sawl in enkhia ni” a chi hi.
Huchi in kangtalai kai sakol nih a pi ua; kumpipa’n, “Va en dih ua” chi’n, Suria sepaihte delh din a sawl hi.
Jordan lui pha in a vadelh ua; ngai in, Suriate’n a kin ziak ua a paih uh puansilhte leh vante lamtawn in a om zelzul hi. Huchi in a mi sawlte a hong kiknawn ua, kumpipa a honghilh uhi.
Huchi in mipi a pawtkhia ua, Suriate giahphual a valok uhi. Huchi in
Kumpipa’n sepaih heutu, a khut a ngakpa kulh kongpi vengmi in a sep hi. Mipite’n a kulh kongpi bul ah a chil uhi, Pathian mi’n a kiang a kumpipa a hong paisuklai a, a na gen bang in a sita hi.

Hichi ahi a, Pathian mi’n kumpipa kiang a, Zingchiang hichih hun ding vel in Samaria kulh kongpi bul ah “Barli buh tehna nih Sekel khat in a khong ding ua, tangbuang nel tehna khat sekel khat mah in,” a chih a;
sepaih heutu in Pathian mi dawng a, “Ngai in,
Huchibang in a tung ah a hongtungta hi; mipi’n kulh kongpi bul ah a chil ua, a sita hi.
Huan, Elisha in a tapa a hihdamsak numei kiang ah, “Thou inla, nang leh na inkawte na om theihna munmun uah va kialtai tadih un.
Huchi in numei a thou a, Pathian mi thugen bang in a hih a; a inkawte toh Philistiate gam ah kum sagih a va kialtai uhi.
Kum sagih a hong kivei nung in hichi ahi a, huai numei Philistiate gam apan a kiknawn a; a inn leh lou ngen din kumpipa a zuan hi.
Kumpipa’n Pathian mi sikha Gehazi a houpih a, “Elisha in thil thupi a hih tengteng honhilh dihve” a chi hi.

A sisa mi khat a hinsak nawn thu kumpipa a na hilhlaitakin hichi ahi a, ngai in, a tapa a hinsak nawn numei in a inn leh lou kumpipa kiang ah a hong ngen hi. Gehazi in, “Ka toupa, kumpipa aw, hiai numei ahi, hiai ahi a tapa, Elisha in a hinsak nawn” a chi hi.

Kumpipa’n numei a dot leh a hilh hi. Huchi in kumpipa’n heutu khat a sehsak a, “Amah a tengteng, a lou a thilpiang tengteng tan in, hiai gam a pawt khiak san apan tuni tan a teng penawn vek un” a chi hi.
Elisha Damaska khua ah a hoh a; Suria kumpipa Benhadad a chi a na hi. “Pathian mi hiai ah a hongve” chi’n a hilh uh.
Kumpipa’n Hazael kiang ah, “Thilpiak tawi inla, Pathian mi houpih din vahoh inla, ka chinatna apan ka hoih khenawn thei diam, Toupa hon na dotsak leh” a chi hi.

Hazael amah houpih din a kuan a, thilpiak ding Damaska khua a thil hoih chiteng, sangawngsau sawmli puak khop a tawi a, a ma ah a va ding a, “Na tapa Benhadad, Suria kumpipa in, ka chinatna apan ka hoih khenawn diam chidin na kiang ah kei a honsawl hi” a chi hi.
Elisha in a kiang ah, “Pai nawn inla, a kiang ah, na hoihkhe nawn na mah ke, a chi ve, va chi in. Himahleh a taktak in bel a si ngeingei ding chih,
Huchi in amah adia zumhuai khop in Elisha in a ensal gegu a; huchi in Pathian mi a kapta hi.

Hazael in, “Bangdia ka toupa kap ahia?” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Israel suante tung a na thil hoihlou hih ding ka theih ziak in ahi. A kulhte uh na hal dia, a tangvalte uh namsau in na that dia, a tanu neu chikchikte na paizan dia, naupai lai a numeite uh na pik kek ding” a chi hi.
Hazael in, “Kei na sikha ui leltak in hiai thil thupi hihthei ding ka hi mahmah ahia?” a chi hi. Elisha in a dawng a, “Suriate tung ah na honglal ding chih
Huchi in Elisha kiang apan a pawt a, a pu kiang ah a paita hi. Aman, “Elisha in bang a hon na hilh a?” a chi hi. Aman, “Na hoih khenawn na tham ding, chi in a honhilh” a chi hi.
A zing in hichi ahi a, puansahpi khat a la a, tui ah a diah a, a mai a khuhsak a, huchi in a sita a; a sik in Hazael a lalta hi.
Israel kumpipa Ahab tapa Joram kum nga a lal kum in huailai in Jehosaphat bel Judah kumpipa ahi, Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat tapa Jehoram a lal pan hi.
A lal patlai in kum sawmthum leh nih a upa ahi a; Jerusalem khua ah kum giat vai a hawm hi.
Ahab inkawte bang in, Israel kumpipate lampi tot a tawn a; Ahab tanu zi in a nei hi. Huchi in
Himahleh
A damlai in Judahte tung ah Edomte a hel ua, a tung ua kumpipa ding a ki bawltawm uhi.
Huchi in Joram bel Zair ah kangtalai tengteng toh a hoh hi. Zan in a kisa khia a, amau um Edomte leh a kangtalai tung ua heutute a va sualta hi. Huchi in mite a puaninte uah a tai uhi.
Edomte tunitan in Judahte tung ah a hel lailai uhi. Huai hun mah in Libnah leng a na helsam uhi.
Jehoram tanchin dangte leh a thilhih tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a ki gelh keimaw?
Huchi in Jehoram a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, a pi leh pute lak ah David khopi ah a vui ua; a sik in a tapa Ahaziah a lalta hi.
Israel kumpipa Ahab tapa Joram lal kum sawmlehnih kum in Judah kumpipa Jehoram tapa Ahaziah a lal pan hi.
Ahaziah in vai a hawmpat in kum sawmnih leh nih a upa ahi. Jerusalem ah kum khat vai a hawm hi. A nu min Athaliah ahi a, amah Israel kumpipa Omri tanu ahi.
Ahab inkawte lampi tot a tawn sam a, Ahab inkawte hih bang in
Amah Ahab tapa Joram in Ramoth a Gilead khua a Suria kumpipa Hazael a va douna ah a pangsam hi. Suriate’n Joram a na hihliam uhi.

Kumpipa Joram Suria kumpipa Hazael a douna ua Suriate’n Ramah khua ah a na hihliam uh, Jezreel khua a kidamsak din a kiknawnta hi. Judah kumpipa Jehoram tapa Ahaziah Ahab tapa Joram a damlouh ziak in veh din Jezreel khua ah a hohsuk hi.
Huan, zawlnei Elisha in zawlneite tapate lak a khat a sam a, a kiang ah, “Na puan teng inla, hiai sathau bawm tawi inla, Ramoth a Gilead khua ah va hoh in.
Na vatun chiang in Nimshi tapa Jehosaphat tapa Jehu va zongkhia inla; valut inla, a unaute lak apan sam khia inla, dantan sunggil ah lut pih in.
Huchi in sathau bawm la inla, a lu ah sung inla,
Huchi in tangval, zawlnei tangvalpa Ramoth a Gilead khua ah a hohta hi.

A vatun leh ngai in, sepaih heutute a tukhawm ua; aman, “Sepaih heutu, na kiang a gen ding thukhah ka nei,” a chi hi. Jehu in, “Kua pen kiang ah eita?” a chi hi. Aman, “Nang kiang ah, sepaih heutupa” a chi hi.
A thou a, inn ah a lut a; a lu ah sathau asung a, a kiang ah, “
Ka sikha zawlneite sisan leh
Ahab inkaw tengteng a mangthang vek ding uh. Ahab apan pasal taphot Israel gam a zalen hin sikha hita leh ka hihmang ding hi.
Ahab inkawte Nebat tapa Jeroboam inkawte leh Ahijah tapa Baasha inkawte bang in ka bawl ding hi.
Uite’n Jezreel khaw kulh zul ah Jezebel a ne ding ua, amah vui ding mi a omkei ding” chi’n, a chi hi. Huchi in kong a hong a, a taikheta hi.

Huchi in Jehu bel a toupa sikhate kiang ah a hongpawt a; khat in a kiang ah, “Hoihlam thu hia? Huai mihaipa koi apan na kiang a hong ahia?” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Huai mi na thei ua; a thugen leng na thei uh” a chi hi.
Amau “Thei maizen dia, tun honhilh in” a chi uh. Aman, “Hichibang in a honchi ahi: ‘
Huchi in michih in a puan uh a suah somsom ua, kailawn tung ah a phahsak chiat ua, “Jehu kumpipa ahita ” chi’n pengkul a mutta uhi.
Huchi in Nimshi tapa Jehosaphat tapa Jehu in Joram thahna ding a guksawm hi. Suria kumpipa Hazael ziak in Joram leh Israelte tengteng in Ramoth a Gilead khua a veng uhi.

Kumpipa Joram Suria kumpipa Hazael toh a kidouna ua Suria mite’n a sukliam uh Jezreel khua a kidamsak din a kiknawn hi. Huchi in Jehu in, “Kei lam a pang na hih uleh kuamah Jezreel khua a hiai thu gen di’n khua apan paikhe sak kei un” a chi hi.
Huchi in Jehu bel kangtalai ah a tuang a, Jezreel khua ah a hoh a, Joram huai ah a lum hi. Judah kumpipa Ahaziah leng Joram veh din a hohsuk hi.
Jezreel kulh ah galvilmi ading a, Jehu pawlte amah toh hongpai a mu a, “Mi tampi ka mu” a chi hi. Joram in, “Sakol tungtuang mi amau vadawn din sawl inla, Hoihlam thu hia?” va chi uhen, a chi hi.

Huchi in mi khat sakol tung a tuang amau dawn din a kuan a, Kumpipa’n hichi in a chi: “Lemna thu toh hongpai na hi hia? a chi hi. Jehu in, Lemna thu toh hongpai leng, nang na theih ding bang a om a? Ka nung ah pai in” a chi hi. Galvilmi’n, “I misawl a kiang uh a vatung a, himahleh a hong kiknawn hetkei mawk” chi in a hilh hi.

Huchi in mi khat sakol tung a tuang a sawl nawn a, huai mi leng a kiang uh a va tung a, Kumpipa’n hichi in a chi: “Lemna thu toh hongpai na hi hia?” a chi hi. Jehu in a dawng a, “Lemna thu toh hongpai leng, nang na theih ding bang a om a? Ka nung ah pai in” a chi hi.
Galvilmi leng a kiang uh a va tung a, amah leng a hong kiknawn hetkei mawk hi. “Huai kangtalai a kihawl dan leng Nimshi tapa Jehu hawl dan geih ahi; mihai bang mai in a hawl hi” a chi hi.

Joram in, “Kimansak un” a chi a; kangtalai a kimansakta uh. Huchi in Israel kumpipa Joram leh Judah kumpipa Ahaziah amau kangtalai tuaktuak in a va pawtkhia ua, Jehu tuak din a taikhia ua, Jezreel mi Naboth huan ah a va mu uhi.
Joram in Jehu a muh in hichi ahi a, “Lemna toh hongpai na hia, Jehu?” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Na nu Jezebel angkawmna leh bumna a tamlai teng bangchi’n lemna a omthei dia?” a chi hi.
Joram a kihei a, a tai a, Ahaziah kiang ah, “Kikhem a kilehbawlna om eive, Ahaziah” a chi hi.
Jehu in a thalpeu a theihtawp in a lai a, Joram liang leh liang kikal ah a kap a, thaltang in a lungtang a pailet a, a kangtalai sung ah a puklut hi.
Huchi in Jehu in a sepaih heutu Bidkar kiang ah, “Dom inla, Jezreel mi Naboth huan ah paikhia in. Tuma lam a nang toh a pa Ahab nung a i tuankhawm lai a
zan in Naboth sisan leh a tapate sisan ka muh ngei ahi” a chi hi. “

Himahleh Judah kumpipa Ahaziah in huai a muh in huan in lampi ah a tai hi. Jehu in a delh a, “Amah leng huai kangtalai sung ah that un” a chi hi. Huchi in Ibleam kiang, Gur zottouhna ah a sat uhi. Meggiddo khua ah a tailut a, huai ah a sita hi.
A mite’n Jerusalem khua ah kangtalai in a paipih ua, amah han ah, a pi leh pute lak ah David khopi ah a vui uhi.
Ahab tapa Joram kum sawmlehkhat a lal kum in Ahaziah Judahte tung ah a lal pan hi.
Jehu Jezreel khua ah a valut chih Jezebel in a naza hi. Huchi in a mitte a nuh a, a sam a zem a, tohlet ah a na dak khia hi.
Jehu kulh kongpi a, a honglut laitak in, “Na pu thatpa nang Zimri, lemna thu toh hongpai na hi hia?” a na chi hi.
Tohlet lam nga in amah a daktou a, “Kei lam a pang kuakua na om ua? Kua?” a chi hi. Michilgeh nih hiam, thum hiam amah lam nga in a hong dak khia uhi.
Aman “Hon lawnkhia un” a chi hi. Huchi in a lawnkhia ua; a si khenkhat in bang leh sakolte a theh nengnung a; aman lei ah a khe in a na chil hi.
Huchi in a lut a, ne in a dawn a; “Hamse thuaknu vadom unla, vavui un, kumpipa tanu lah ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Vui din a kuan ua; himahleh a luguh, a khebomte leh a khutpek bomte kia loungal a mu kei uhi.
Huchi in a hongpai nawn in a honghilh uh. Aman, “Hiai
Jezebel luang Jezreel khaw kulhchin a huan a ekchim bang ahi dia, huchi a, hiai Jezebel eive, a chih louhna ding un, chi a a gen ahi” a chi hi.
Huan Ahab in Samaria ah tapa sawmsagih a nei hi. Jehu in Samaria a, Jezreel khaw heutute, upate leh Ahab tate a na dontei mite kiang ah, laigelh in a khak hi.
“Hiai laikhakte na muhphet chiang un, na pu tate na kiang uah a om ua, kangtalaite, sakolte, kulhpi nei khuate leng, galvante toh na nei uhi.
Huchi in na pu tate lak a mi, a hoihpen leh a kizen pen zongkhia unla, a pa mangtutphah ah tusak unla, na pu uh inkawte adin galdou un” a chi hi.
Himahleh amau a lau mahmah ua, “Ngai dih ua, kumpipa nihte’n a zohlouhsa uh ahi a, en bangchi’n i zou mahmah dia?” a chi uhi.

Kumpipa inn sung heutupen, khopi ukpen, upate, naupangte a na dawnteimi teng in Jehu kiang ah, “Na sikhate ka hi uh, hihdia n’on hilh tengteng ka hih ding uh. Kuamah kumpipa in ka bawl kei ding uh; nang hoih na saksak in hih in” chi in mi a sawl uhi.
A kiang uah, “Kei lam a pang na hih ua, ka thu na man ding uleh na pute uh tapate lu honla unla, zingchiang in hichih hun ma in Jezreel khua ah ka kiang ah hong un,” chi in lai a khaknawn hi.
Kumpipa tapate sawmsagih ahi ua, khopi miliante, amau dontei mite kiang ah a om uhi.
Laikhak a muh un hichi ahi a, kumpipa tapate a man ua, a sawmsagih un a that ua, a lute uh bawmpi a koih in Jezreel khua ah a kiang ah a khakta uhi.
Thangkou khat a hongtung a, “Kumpipa tapate lu a hon tawita uh” chi’n a hilh uh. Aman “Kulh lutna kongpi gei ah mun nih in sekhawm unla, zingchiang tan in om hen” a chi hi.
A zingchiang in hichi ahi a, a vapawt a, ading a, mi tengteng kiang ah, “Noute diktat hi un, ngai un, ka pu ka guksawm a, ka hihlumta a; ahihleh hiai tengteng kua thah ahia leh?
Ahab inkawte tungtang a gen,
Huchi in Jehu in Jezreel khua a Ahab inkuan a mi omsun teng, a milian tengteng, a lawm tengteng leh a siampute khat lel leng hawi sak hetlou in a that siang vek hi.
Huchi in a thou a, a pawt a, Samaria ah a hohta hi. Lampi a belampute belam mulmetna in a va tun in,
Jehu in Judah kumpipa Ahaziah unaute a mu a, “Kuate na hi ua?” a chi hi.
Amau “Ahaziah unaute ka hi uh, Kumpipa tate leh kumpinu tate chibai vabuk dia paisuk ka hi uh” chi in a dawng uh.
Aman, “Hing mat un” a chi a; huchi in a hing mat ua, belam mulmetna in khukchin ah a that ua, mi sawmli leh nih ahi ua; khat lel leng a hawikei uhi.

Huai apan a pawt nung in Rekab tapa Jehonadab, amah dawn dia hongpai a mu hi. Chibai a buk a, a kiang ah, “Na tung a lungsim dik ka put bang in, lungsim dik na pu sam hia?” a chi hi. Jehonadab in, “Pu e” chi in a dawng hi. “Ahihleh na khut honpe dih” a chi a; huchi in a khut a pia a, aman a kiang ah kangtalai sung ah a kailut hi.
Aman ka kiang ah “Hong sam inla,
Samaria a vatun in Ahab inkawte Samaria a omsunte a hihman khitvek masiah a that zel a, Elijah kiang a a gen
Jehu in mite tengteng a samkhawm a, a kiang uah, Ahab in Baal na a sem zekphet ahi a, Jehu in bel nakpi’n a sem ding hi.

Huchi in Baal zawlnei tengteng, a bemi tengteng leh a siampu tengteng ka kiang ah hon samkhawm dih ua. Kuamah kimlou kei uhen; Baal kiang ah kithoihna thupitak lat ding ka nei a; kuapeuh a kimlou a hing hetkei ding, a chi hi. Himahleh Jehu in Baal bemite hihlup tum in, gitlouh piltak a, a hih ahi.
Jehu in, “Baal min in khawmpi thupi bawl un” a chi hi. Huchi in a genzakta uhi.
Jehu in Israel gam tengteng ah a khakkhia a; huchi in Baal bemi tengteng a hongpai ua, a tellou himhim a omkei uhi. Baal in ah a lut ua; Baal in kongpi apan a phaitam pha in a dim dipdep uhi.
Kivatna puan kemmi kiang ah, “Baal bemi tengteng kivatna puan honla in” a chi hi. Huchi in kivatna puante a honla uhi.
Jehu, Rekab tapa Jehonadab toh Baal in ah a lut ua; Baal bemite kiang ah, “Hiai ah Baal bemite loungal,

Kithoihnate leh haltum thillatte lan dia a lut un, Jehu in inkuan ah mi sawmgiat a na dingsak khin hi. “Na khut ua k’on piak kuapeuh a suahtak leh, a suaktami hinna tang a amah hinna lak ding ahi” a chi hi.

Haltum thillat a lat khittak in hichi ahi a, Jehu in galvil sepaih leh a heutute uh kiang ah, “Lut unla, vathat un; kuamah suakta sak kei un” a chi hi. Huchi in namsau in a sat ua; galvil sepaih leh a heutute uh a paikhia ua, Baal inn sung ah a lut uhi.
Baal in a milimte a lakhia ua, a hal uhi.
Baal lim a laichim ua, Baal in a hihsia ua, tunitan in dailenbuk in a zanglai uhi.
Huchibang in Jehu in Israel gam apan Baal a hihsia hi.
Himahleh Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhna, Israelte thil a hihkhial sak a, a hihte Jehu in a tawpsan kei hi. Huai bel Bethel khua leh Dan khua a dangkaeng bawngnou limte biak ahi.
Jehu kiang ah, “Ka mittung tak a thil na hih ziak leh ka lungsim a deihthusam bangtak a Ahab inkawte tung a na hih ziak in, na tapate suan lina tan in Israel mangtutphah ah a tu ding uh” a chi hi.
Himahleh Jehu in
Huailai in
Jordan apan suahlam, Gilead gam tengteng, Gadte, Reubente, Manassehte, Arnon guam a Aroer apan Gilead leh Vasan gam tan in.
Jehu tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng, a thilhih theihdan tengteng Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Jehu a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, Samaria khua ah a vui ua; a sik in a tapa Jehoahaz a honglal hi.
Samaria gam a Israelte tung a Jehu vaihawm sung kum sawmnih leh giat ahi.
Huan, Ahaziah nu Athaliah in a tapa a si chih a theih in, a thou a, kumpipa tapa tengteng a that vek hi.

Ahaziah tapa Joash bel kumpipa Jehoram tanu, Ahaziah sanggamnu Jehoseba in kumpipa tapa a thahte uh lak apan pimang in, a donmi toh lupna dantan ah a omsak a; Athaliah muhtheih louh din a sel ua, huchi in thah ahita kei hi.
Amah bel amah toh
A kum sagihna ah Jehoiada in Keroth mite leh galvil sepaihte lak a mi sepaih za heutute a samsaka,
Aman, “Na hih ding uh hichibang ahi. Na lak ua sabbath a hong dingte seh thum suah seh khat in kumpipa inn na veng ding uh.
Seh thum suah seh khat bel Sur kulh kongpi ah na om ding uh. Huchibang in na veng ding ua, a siat ding na dal ding uhi.
Na lak ua pawl nih, Sabbath a pai dingte’n kumpipa kiang ah
Michih in galvantawi in kumpipa na umsuak ding ua; kuapeuh huai huamsung a honglut na thahzel ding uh ahi. Huchi in kumpipa a lut leh a pawt zui vialvial un” chi’n thu a pia hi.
Sepaih za heutute’n siampu Jehoiada thupiak bangbang in a hih ua; amau heutu chiat khawlni a hong dingte leh sabbath a pai dingte a pi ua, siampu Jehoiada kiang ah a hoh uhi.
Siampu in sepaih za heutute
Galvil sepaihte’n galvan tawichiat in, Tempul sik taklam a kipan veilam tan in maitam leh inn zul ah kumpipa adin umkhum uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa tapa a hon pikhia a, lallukhu a khusak hi. Theihsakna thu a pia a; kumpipa in a bawl ua, sathau a nilh ua; a khut uh a beng ua, “Pathian in kumpipa hondam hen” a chi uhi.
Galvilmi leh mipite husa Athaliah in a na zak in,

A en a, ngai in, kumpipa dan dungzui in khuam zul ah a na ding a, sepaih heutute leh pengkul mutmite bel kumpipa kiang nai ah ading uhi. Huai gam mite’n nuam a sa mahmah ua, pengkul a mut uh. Huchi in Athaliah in a puante a botkek a, “Guk sawmna! Guk sawmna ahita ve!” chi’n a kikou hi.
Siampu Jehoiada in sepaihte tung a heutute dia a seh sepaih za heutute thu a pia a, a kiang uah, “Sepaihte kikal ah pawtsak in. Kuapeuh amah zui namsau a satlup ding ahi” a chi hi. Siampu in, “
Huchi in a man ua; kumpipa inn a sakolte lutna lampi a pai in, huai ah a thatta uhi.
Jehoiada in
Huai gammi tengteng Baal inn ah a hoh ua, a hihchim ua; a maitamte leh a limte a hihnen dimdem ua, Baal siampu Mattan leng maitam bul ah a that uh.
Huchi in siampu in
Aman sepaih za heutute, vengmite, galvil sepaihte leh huai gam a mi tengteng a pi a,
Huchi in huai gam a mi tengteng a kipak ua, khopi buai lou in a omta hi; Athaliah namsau in kumpipa inn ah a that uhi.
Joash in vai a hawm patlai in kum sagih a upa ahi.
Jehu kum sagih a lal kum in Joash a lal pan hi. Jerusalem ah kum sawmli a lal a; a nu min Zibiah ahi a, Beer–sheba khomi ahi.
Siampu Jehoiada in Joash a sinsak sung teng
Himahleh munsang teng hihsiat vek ahi tuankei a; munsangte ah mite kithoih lailai in gimlim a hal nilouh lai uhi.
Joash in siampute kiang ah, “
siampute’n a meltheihte ua pan la uhenla; inn sia, a siatna na bawl uhen” a chi hi.
Himahleh hichi ahi a, kumpipa Joash bel kum sawmnih leh thum a lal nung in leng siampute’n inn sia a bawlkei lailai uhi.

Huchi in kumpipa Joash in siampu Jehoiada leh siampu dangte a sam a, a kiang uah, “Bangdia inn siatna bawllou na hi ua? Tun zaw na sumkemte apan dangka la nawn kei unla, inn sia bawlna din pekhe zawta un” a chi hi.
Siampute’n mite apan dangka lak nawnlouh leh inn siatna puahphat louh pha a sa uhi.
Himahleh siampu Jehoiada in bawm a la a, a sin gei a vutvang a,
Hichi ahi a, bawm ah dangka a tamta chih a theih un, kumpipa Laigelhmi leh siampu lianpen
A dangka sim uh nasemmite,
suangsekmite leh suanglaikhe mite kiang ah,
Himahleh
Nasemmite a pe zel ua,
Nasemmite piak dia dangka a kepsak mite uh leng a etzui pih tuankei uh. Amau ginom tak in a hihzel uhi.
Mawhna thoihna dia thillat dangka leh khelhna thoihna dia thillat dangkate bel
Huchi in Suria kumpipa Hazael in Gath khua a vasual a, a la a; Hazael in Jerusalem a hoh a tum hi.
Judah kumpipa Joash in Judah kumpipa apu Jehosaphat, Jehoram leh Ahaziah in a na latsa thilzek tengteng leh amah thilzekte leh,
Huchi in Joash tanchin dangte, a thilhihte tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
A sikhate a thou ua, a guk in a sim sawm ua, Joash bel Silla zot sukna lampi Millo inn ah a sual ua; a thatta uhi.
Amah Simeath tapa Jozakar leh Somer tapa Jehozabad te’n a that ua; huchi in a pi leh pute lak ah David khopi ah a vui ua; a tapa Amaziah a sik in a hong lalta hi.
Judah Kumpipa Ahaziah tapa Joash kum sawmnih leh thum a lal kum in Jehu tapa Jehoahaz Israelte tung ah Samaria khua ah a lal pan a, kum sawmlehsagih a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou mahmah a hih a, Israelte thil hihkhial sak a, a hih Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhnate aman leng a hih samta a, a paisan nawn kei hi.
Israelte tung ah a heh mahmah a, huchi in Suria kumpipa Hazael khut leh, Hazael tapa Benhadad khut ah a damsung teng a pevekta hi.
Jehoahaz in
Huchi in
Himahleh Israelte thil a na hih khialsak a Jeroboam inkawte khelhnate a paisan kei ua, a hih lailai zawsop ua; Samaria khua ah Aserah leng a om lailai hi.
Jehoahaz in a mite lak a sakol tungtuang mi sawmnga, kangtalai sawm leh sepaih sing khat chihlouh a neih a phalsak ngalkei a; Suria kumpipa’n a hihmang vek a, leivui chilzan bang in a bawl hi.
Huchi in Jehoahaz tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengtengte, a thilhihtheih dante Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Hichi in Jehoahaz bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a; Samaria khua ah a vui ua; a tapa Jehoash a sik in a lalta hi.
Judah kumpipa Joash kum sawmthum leh sagih a lal kum in Jehoahaz tapa Jehoash Israelte tung ah Samaria khua ah a lal pan a, kum sawmlehguk a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou pipi a na hih a; Israelte thil hihkhialsak a a hih Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhna tengteng a paisan kei a, a ching lailai zawsop hi.
Huchi in Jehoash tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng, Judah kumpipa Amaziah toh a kisuallai ua a thilhih theihdante Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Jehoash a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a; Jeroboam a mangtutphah ah a tu a, Jehoas bel Samaria Khua ah Israel kumpipate lak ah a vui uhi.
Elisha a chi a na a, a chinatna a sihpih hi. Huchi in Israel kumpipa Jehoash a kiang ah a hohsuk a, a kah a, “Aw, ka pa, ka pa, Israelte kangtalai leh sakol tungtuangmite” a chi hi.
Elishain a kiang ah, “Thalpeu leh thaltangte honla in” a chi a; aman thalpeu leh thaltangte a honla hi.
Israelte kumpipa kiang ah, “Thalpeuh tung ah na khut nga in” a chi hi. Huchi in a khut a nga a; Elisha in kumpipa khut tung ah a khut a nga hi.
Aman, “Suahlam tohlet hong in” a chi hi. Huchi in a honghi. Elisha in, “Kap in” a chi a; a kap hi. Aman “
“Thaltangte honla in” a chi a, Israel kumpipa kiang ah, “Lei sun dih” a chi a; huchi in thumvei a sun a, a tawpta hi.
Huchi in Pathian mi a tung ah a heh a, “Ngavei ahihkeileh gukvei na sut ding eive; huchi in Suriate mangthang vek khop in na zou ding. Himahleh Suriate thumvei kia zou ding na hita ve” a chi hi.
Huchi in Elisha a si a, a vui uh. Kum a hong kivei in, Moab pawlte’n a gam uh a hong dou uhi.
Mi khat a vui laitak un hichi ahi a, ngai in, mi pawl khat a mu uh. Huchi in huai mi Elisha han sung ah a khemawk ua; a luang in Elisha guhte a sukkhak tak in, a hong hing nawn a, ading touta hi.
Suria kumpipa Hazael in Jehoahaz damsung teng in Israelte a nuaisiah hi.
Himahleh
Suria kumpipa Hazael a si a; a tapa Benhadad a sik in a lal hi.
Jehoahaz tapa Jehoash in Hazael tapa Benhadad in a pa Jehoahaz a dou a, khua a laksakte a sutnawn a, Joash in thumvei a zou a, Israel gam khuate a la kiknawn hi.
Israel kumpipa Jehoahaz tapa Jehoash kum nih a lal kum in Judah kumpipa Joash tapa Amaziah a lal pan hi.
A lal pattung in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih leh kua a lal a; a nu min Jehoadan, Jerusalem mi ahi.
mitmuh in thil dik a hih a, himahleh a pu David zaw a phakei; a pa Joash thilhih bang a hih sam hi.
Munsangte lakmang ahi tuankei a, munsangte ah mite a kithoih lai ua gimlim a hallai uhi.
Lalgam a khut a hong kip tak in hichi ahi a, a pa, kumpipa thatmi amah sikhate a that hi.

Himahleh huai tualthatmite tate a that kei hi. Mosi Dan bu a “Tate ziak in pate hihlup ding ahi kei a, pate ziak in leng tate hihlup ding ahi sam kei, michih amau khelhna ziak in a si ding uh” chi a Toupa thupiak gelh a hih bang in.
Edomte chi guam ah sing khat a that a, Selah khua a sual a, a la a, a min din Joktheel a sa a, tunitan in hiai ahilai hi.
Huchi in Amaziah in Israel kumpipa Jehu tapa Jehoahaz tapa Jehoash kiang ah, hong kuan in, kimai tuah ni, chi in mi a sawl hi.

Israel kumpipa Jehoash in Judah kumpipa Amaziah kiang ah, “Lebanon tang a ling in Lebanon tang a sidar sing kiang ah, Na tanu ka tapa zi din neisak dihve, chi in a thukhak a; Lebanon tang a gamsa a hongpai a, huai ling a hong tuanpuk hi.

Nang Edomte na zou ngei a, na lungtang a hong kisathei hi; na kisaktheihna ompih maimai in; nang leh Judah nangawn tan a siatna, nang adia hoihlou ding thil bang ding a khoihkhe ding na hia?” chi in a dawng hi.
Himahleh Amaziah in a na ngaikhe nuam kei a; huchi in Israel kumpipa Jehoas a va hohtou a vadouta hi. Judah kumpipa Amaziah toh Judah gam Beth-shemesh ah a va kimaituahta uhi.
Judah bel Israelte ma ah a zahlakta a; michih amau in chiat ah a taikekta uh.

Israel kumpipa Jehoash in Judah kumpipa Ahaziah tapa Joash tapa Amaziah Beth-shemesh ah a man a, Jerusalem khua ah a paipih a, Jerusalem kulh, Ephraim kongpi apan kulh ning kongpi pha in tong za li a hihchim hi.
inn leh kumpipa in a gou koihkhawmna a dangkaeng leh dangka leh tuium-belsuan om tengteng a la a, thuchiam tangtunna dia mat a om mite toh, huchi in, Samaria kholam ah a pai nawnta hi.
Huchi in Jehoash thilhih tanchin dangte, a thilhihtheih dante, Judah kumpipa Amaziah a dou thute Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang ka hia?
Huchi in Jehoash a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, Samaria khua ah Israel kumpipate lak ah a vui ua; a tapa Jeroboam a sik in a lalta hi.
Judah kumpipa Joash tapa Amaziah Israel kumpipa Jehoahaz tapa Jehoash sih nung in kum sawmlehnga a damlai hi.
Huchi in Amaziah tanchin dangte Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Jerusalem khua ah amah a guksawm ua; huchi in Lakish khua ah mi a delhsak ua, huai ah a thatta uhi.
A luang sakol in a paipih ua, a pi leh pute lak ah David khopi Jerusalem ah a vui uhi.
Judah mi tengteng in kum sawm leh kum guk a upa, Azariah a pi ua, a pa Amaziah sik in kumpipa in a bawl uhi.
Aman Elath khua a bawl hoihnawn in Judah gam ah a pangsak nawn a; huai nung in kumpipa a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta hi.
Judah kumpipa Joash tapa Amaziah kum sawmlehnga a lal kum in Israel kumpipa Jehoash tapa Jeroboam Samaria khua ah a lal pan a, kum sawmli leh khat a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou a hih a; Israelte thil a hihkhial sak a, Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhna tengteng a paisan kei hi.
, Israelte Pathian in a sikha, Gath hepher mi Amittai tapa zawlnei Jonah zang a a thugen bang in, Hamath lutna apan a Arabah Tuipi pha in Israel gam ah a pangsak nawn hi.
Israel min van nuai ah a chimitsak zenzen ding chih ahihleh a genkei him a; Jehoash tapa Jeroboam zang in a hondam zawta hi.

Huchi in Jeroboam tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengtengte, a thilhihtheih dante, a galdou thute, tuma lam in Judah gam tan hi gige Damaska leh Hamath khua Israelte adia a na laksak nawn thute Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Jeroboam a pi leh pu, Israel kumpipate kiang ah a ihmu samta a; huchi in a tapa Zakariah a sik in a lalta hi.
Israel kumpipa Jeroboam kum sawmnih leh sagih a lal kum in Judah kumpipa Amaziah a lal pan hi.
A lal pattung in kum sawmlehguk a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga leh nih a lal a; a nu min Jekoliah, Jerusalem mi ahi.
A pa Amaziah thilhih bangbang hihsam in
Himahleh munsangte lakmang ahi tuankei. Munsangte ah mite kithoih lailai in, gimlim a hal lai uhi.
kumpipa a gawt a, huchi in a sih ni pha in a phak a, inn tuam ah a tengta hi. Kumpipa tapa Jotham in a gam ua mite vai hawmsak in inkuan tung a heutu in a om hi.
Huchi in Azariah tanchin dangte a thilhih tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Azariah bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a; a pi leh pute lak ah David khopi ah a vui ua; huchi in a tapa Jotham a sik in a lalta hi.
Judah kumpipa Azariah kum sawmthum leh giat a lal kum in Jeroboam tapa Zakariah Israelte tung ah Samaria ah kha guk a lal hi.
A pute hih mah bang in
Jabesh tapa Shallum in a guksawm a, mipite ma ah a sual a, a that a, a sik in a lalta hi.
Huchi in Zakariah tanchin dangte bel ngai dih, Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang hi.
Huai bel
Judah kumpipa Uzziah kum sawmthum leh kua a lal kum in Jabesh tapa Shallum a lal pan a; Samaria khua ah kha khat sung a lal hi.
Gadi tapa Menahem Tirzah khua apan a hohtou a, Samaria ah a hoh a, Jabesh tapa Shallum Samaria khua ah a sual a, a that a, a sik in a lalta hi.
Huchi in Shallum tanchin dangte, a sawmgukna thute ngai dih, Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang hi.
Huchi in Menahem in Tirzah apan Tiphsah leh asung a om tengteng leh a gamte a sual a; amah adia a ki honlouh ziak un a sual a; huai ah naupai lai numei tengteng a pik kek hi.
Judah kumpipa Azariah kum sawmthum leh kua a lal kum in Gadi tapa Menahem Israelte tung ah a lal pan a, Samaria ah kum sawm a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou a hih a; Israelte thil hihkhialsak Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhna a damsung in a paisan kei hi.
Assuria kumpipa Pul in a gam a hongsual a; gam a neihkip pih theihna din Menahem in Pul dangka talent sang khat a pia hi.
Menahem in Assuria kumpipa piak din Israel mi neizou tengteng lak ah dangka sekel sawmnga chiat a khon a; huchi in Assuria kumpipa a pai nawn a, huai gam ah a tam nilouh kei hi.
Menahem tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Menahem a pi leh pute kiang ah ihmuta a; a tapa Pekahiah a sik in a lal hi.
Judah kumpipa Azariah kum sawmnga a lal kum in Menahem tapa Pekahiah Israelte tung ah Samaria khua ah a lal pan a, kum nih a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou a hih a; Israelte thil hihkhial sak, Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhnate a paisan kei hi.

A sepaih heutu Remaliah tapa Pekah in amah a guksawm a, Samaria khua a kumpipa in a kulh ah Argob toh, Arieh toh a thatta a; a kiang ah Gilead mi sawmnga toh; huchi in Pekahiah a that a, a sik in a lalta hi.
Huchi in Pekahiah tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengtengte ngai dih, Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang hi.
Judah kumpipa Azariah kum sawmnga leh nih a lal kum in Remaliah tapa Pekah Israelte tung ah Samaria khua ah a lal pan a, kum sawmnih a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou a hih a; Israelte thil hihkhial sak, Nebat tapa Jeroboam khelhnate a paisan kei.

Israel kumpipa Pekah lal lai in Assuria kumpipa Tiglath-pileser in Ijon, Abel beth maakah, Janoah, Kadesh, Hazor, Gilead leh Galili gamte leh Naphtali gam tengteng a la a Assuria gam ah sal in a pi hi.
Elah tapa Hosea in Remaliah tapa Pekah a guksawm a, a sual a, a that a, Uzziah tapa Jotham kum sawmnih a lal kum in a sik in a lalta hi.
Huchi in Pekah tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng, ngai dih, Israel kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang hi.
Israel kumpipa Remaliah tapa Pekah kum nih a lal kum in Judah kumpipa Uzziah tapa Jotham a lal pan hi.
