A lal pattung in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa ahi. Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehguk a lal a; a nu min Jerus, Zadok tanu ahi.
A pa Uzziah thilhih bangbang hih sam in
Himahleh munsangte hihmang ahi tuankei; munsangte ah mite’n kithoih in, gimlim a hallai uhi.
Huchi in Jotham tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huailai in Suria kumpipa Rezin leh Remulia tapa Pekah Judate sual din
Jotham a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, a pi pute lak ah a pu David khopi ah a vui ua; a tapa Ahaz a sik in a lalta hi.
Remaliah tapa Pekah kum sawmlehsagih a lal kum in Judah Kumpipa Jotham tapa Ahaz a lal pan hi.
Ahaz a lal pattung in kum sawmnih a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehguk a lal hi. A pu David bang in
Israel kumpipate tot lampi a tawnsam a, ahi,
Munsangte leh tangte tung ah leh sing hing chih nuai ah kithoih in gimlim a hal hi.
Huchi in Suria kumpipa Rezin leh Israel kumpipa Remaliah tapa Pekah Jerusalem dou din a kuantou ua; Ahaz ava um ua, himahleh a zou theikei uhi.
Huailai in Suria kumpipa Rezin in Elath khua Suria gam din a lanawn a, Judahte Elath khua apan a delhkhia a; huchi in Suriate’n Elath khua a va luah ua, tunitan in a tenglai uh.

Huchi in Ahaz in Assuria kumpipa Tiglath-pileser kiang ah, Na sikha leh na tapa ka hi ka hia; kei hong dou dia hong kuan, Suria kumpipa khut apan leh Israel kumpipa khut apan hon hunkhe dihve, chi in mi a sawl hi.
Ahaziah in
Assuria kumpipa’n a thugen a na pom a; huchi in Assuria kumpipa’n Damaska khua a vadou a, a la a, a mite Kir gam ah sal in a pi a, Rezin a that hi.

Kumpipa Ahaz bel Assuria kumpipa Tiglath-pileser houpih din Damaska khua ah a hoh a, Damaska khua a maitam a va mu a huchi in kumpipa Ahaz in huai maitam lim leh a kibawl dan banggeih etton din siampu Urijah kiang ah a khak hi.
Siampu Urijah in maitam a bawl a; kumpipa Ahaziah in Damaska khua apan a khak banggeih in siampu Urijah in Damaska khua apan a Ahaz a hongpai nawn in a na bawl khinvekta hi.
Damaska khua apan kumpipa a hongtun in maitam a mu a; kumpipa’n maitam a naih a, a tung ah thillatte a lan hi.
Maitam ah a haltum thillat hal in tangbuang thillat a lan a, dawn thillat asung a, a lemna thillatte sisan a theh hi.
ma a dal maitam a la a, maitam leh

Kumpipa Ahaz in, maitam lianpi tung ah zinglam haltum thillat, nitaklam tangbuang thillat, haltum thillat, tangbuang thillat, i gam ua mipi tengteng haltum thillat, tangbuang thillat leh dawn thillat toh hal in lan inla; a tung ah haltum thillat sisan tengteng leh kithoihna sisan tengteng theh in; dal maitam bel kei thudotna ding ahi, chi in siampu Urijah thu a pia hi.
Huchi in siampu Urijah in kumpipa Ahaz thupiak bangbang in a hihta hi.
Kumpipa Ahaz in tunna kuakte a atkhia a, kisilna bel a koih khia a; a tunna dal bawngtal apan lakhia in suanglep tung ah a tung hi.
Sabbath adia a tungnei lampi in a bawl uleh in pawlam a kumpipa lutna
Huchi in Ahaz thilhih tanchin dangte Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Ahaz a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, a pi leh pute lak ah David khopi ah a vui ua; a tapa Hezekiah a sik in a lalta hi.
Judah Kumpipa Ahaz kum sawmlehnih a lal kum in Elah tapa Hosea Israelte tung ah Samaria ah a lal pan a, kum kua sung a lal hi.
mitmuh in thil hoihlou tak a hih a, himahleh a ma a Israel kumpipate bangzen in zaw ahihkei hi.
Assuria kumpipa Salmaneser in a vadou a, huchi in Hosea a sikha a honghi a, siah a pia hi.

Assuria kumpipa’n Hosea Aigupta kumpipa So kiang a mi sawl in a guksawm chih a na theikhia a; a kum chin a, a piak zel bang in leng Assuria kumpipa kiang ah siah a pekei behlap lai a; huaiziak in Assuria kumpipa’n suangkulh ah hensa in a khumta hi.
Huchi in Assuria kumpipa’n gam tengteng a tuan suakvek a, Samaria ah a hohtou a, kum thum a umkhum hi.
Hosea kum kua a lal kum in Assuria kumpipa’n Samaria a la a, Israelte Assuria gam ah a pi a, Halah, Habor a Gozan lui leh Mediate khuate ah a koih hi.
Huchibang a, a na omna uh bel Israel suante’n Aigupta kumpipa Pharo khut nuai apan, Aigupta gam apan a pikhepa
Israel suante ma a, a na delhkhiaksa namte thuzoh leh Israel kumpipate thusehte a zuihzawk ziak uh leng ahi.
Israel suante’n
Tang sangteng ah pathian limte leh sing hing teng nuai ah suangphuhte phut in Aserah songte a bawl uhi.
Huai munsang tengteng ah
a kiang uah, “Hichibang hihkei un” a chih milim pathiante na leng a sem uh.
Huchi pipi in leng a zui nuam kei ua, a pi leh pute un
A thusehte, a pi leh pute uh toh a thukhun, a kiang ua a thu theihsakte a nial ua; thil ginalou a zui ua, bangmah louphet a hong hita uh. A tungthu ua
a Pathian uh thupiak tengteng a lehngatsan ua, bawngnou limsun nih a bawl ua, Aserah song a bawl ua, van a om tengteng a bia ua, Baal na a sem uhi.
A tapate uh leh a tanute uh mei tawn in a lutsak ua, aisan leh bum a ching ua,
Huaiziak in,
Judahte’n leng
Israel suante himhim a deihta kei a, amau a hihgenthei a, a muh phaklouh ua a suanmang masiah lokmite khut ah a pia hi.
Israelte lah David inkawte a hihna uh a paihsakta ngal a; huchi in Nebat tapa Jeroboam pen kumpipa din a bawl ua; Jeroboam in Israelte’n
Israel suante’n Jeroboam thil hihkhelh bangbang a hihsam ua;
a zawlnei tengteng zang a a na gensa bang a a muh phaklouhna a, a suanmang masiah huaite a paisan ngalkei ua. Huchi in Israelte amau gam apan Assuria gam ah a pi ua, tunitan in huai gam ah omlai uhi.

Assuria kumpipa’n Babulon khomite, Kuth khomite, Ava khomite, Hamath khomite leh Sepharvaim khomite a thukhak khia a, Samaria khote ah Israel suante mun a luahsak a; huchi in Samaria gam a luah ua, a khuate ah a teng uhi.
Huailai a a om tung un hichi ahi a, Toupa laudan a siamkei ua, huchi in Toupa’n a lak uah humpinelkaite a sawl a, khenkhatte a keilum uhi.

Huchi in Assuria kumpipa kiang ah, “Na lakkhiaka, Samaria gam khuate a na koih namte’n hiai gam Pathian omdan a theikei ua, huaiziak in, a lak uah humpinelkaite a sawl a; ngai dih, hiai gam Pathian omdan a theihlouh ziak un a that uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Assuria kumpipa’n, “Huai a sal a na pite uh lak a siampu khat pi unla, hong omsam henla, huai gam Pathian biak dan sinsak hen” chi’n thu a pia hi.
Huchi in Samaria gam apan a pite uh lak a siampu khat Bethel khua ah a va teng a,
Himahleh namchih in amau pathian chiat a kibawl ua, Samari mite’n munsang a na bawl innte ah namchih in amau omna khua chiat ah huai a pathiante chiat uh a koih uhi.
Babulon mite’n Sukkoth benoth a bawl ua, Kuthte’n Nergal a bawl ua, Hamathte’n Ashima a bawl ua;
Avate’n Nibhaz leh Tartak a bawl uhi. Sepharvaimte’n pathiante Adrammelek leh Anammelek kiang ah a tate a hal uhi.
Huchi in
a lau ua, a pikhiakna gam ua namte hihdan bang in amau pathiante na a sem uh.
Tuma lam a, a hihdan bang un tunitan in a hihlai lai uhi.
“pathian dangte zaw lau kei unla, amau bekei unla, a kiang ah kithoih kei un.
, thilhihtheihna thupitak leh banzak hial a Aigupta gam apan nou hon pikhepa amah laudan na siam zawk ding uh ahi, amah na biak ding uh ahi a, amah kiang a na kithoih ding uh ahi.
Huchi in thusehte, vaihawmte, dante, thupiakte a hon na gelhsak sate tangtawn in na pom gige ding uh ahi; pathian dangte laudan na siam ding uh ahi kei.
Na kiang ua thu ka khun pen na mangngilh ding uh ahi kei; pathian dangte leng laudan na siam ding uh ahi sam kei hi.
na Pathian uh laudan na siam ding uh ahi. Huchi in na melma tengteng khut apan aman a hon hunkhe dia, chi a thu a khun a, amau adia
Bangchi mah bang in leng a zui nuamtuan kei ua, tuma lam a a hihdan bang un a hihlai lai uhi.
Huchi in huai namte’n
Huan, Elah tapa Israel kumpipa Hosea kum thum a lal kum in hichi ahi a, Judah kumpipa Ahaz tapa Hezekiah a lal pan hi.
A lal pattung in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih leh kua a lal a; a nu min Abi, Zakariah tanu ahi.
A pu David thilhih tengteng hihsam in,

Munsangte a hihgawp a, suangphuhte a hihchim a, Aserahte a phuk a; Mosi dalgul bawl a kitam nensak vek a; huai hun tanpha in Israel suante’n a kiang ah gimlim a hal ngal ua, aman huai Nehustan a sa hi.
Aman
a len chinten a, amah zuih a tawp nuam kei a, a thupiak,
Huchi in
Philistiate Gaza khua tan in a gamgi chiang tengteng toh, galvilmi insang apan kulhnei khopi tan in a that vek hi.
Kumpipa Hezekiah kum li a lal kum, Israel kumpipa Elah tapa Hosea kum sagih a lal kum in hichi ahi a, Assuria kumpipa Salmaneser in Samaria a hong dou a, a um kimvel hi.
Kum thum a chin kum in a lazou a; Hezekiah kum guk a lal kum, Israel kumpipa Hosea kum kua a lal kum in ahi Samaria khua a lakzoh.
Assuria kumpipa’n Assuria gam ah Israel a pimang a, Halah, Habor, Gozan lui leh Mediate khuate a koihta hi.
Kumpipa Hezekiah kum sawmlehli a lal kum in Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib Judah gam a khaw kulh nei tengteng dou din a hohtou a, a lata hi.

Judah kumpipa Hezekiah in Lakish khua a Assuria kumpipa kiang ah, “Thil ka na hihkhial hi, kei apan kiknawn in, ka tung a n’on got peuhmah ka paw ding” chi a gen din mi a sawl hi. Assuria kumpipa’n Judah kumpipa Hezekiah dangka talent za thum leh dangkaeng talent sawmthum a bikhiah sak hi
Huchi in Hezekiah in
Huai tungmah in Hezekiah in

Assuria kumpipa’n Tartan, Rabsari leh Rabsakeh sepaih tampi toh Lakish khua apan Jerusalem khua a kumpipa Hezekiah kiang ah a sawl hi. Jerusalem khua a tungtou ua; a tun touh un puansawpmi lamlian lampi a dil saknung zaw tuilakna kiang ah ading uhi.
Kumpipa a sap uleh, inn sung heutu Hilkiah tapa Eliakim, Laigelhmi Sebnah leh tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joah a kiang uah a hong pawtkhia uhi.
Rabsakeh in a kiang uah, “Hezekiah kiang ah vagen dih ua, Kumpipa thupitak Assuria kumpipa in hichi in a chi: Na gin a na muan bang ahia oi?
Kidouna adin geldan siam leh hatna ka nei uh, na chi a; himahleh huaizaw paukam lel ahi. Kua ahia na muan a ka tung a na hel maizen?
Tuin, ngai in, hiai sialluang chiang, Aigupta muang na hita a; huai a mi a kingaih leh a khut a sun ding hi. Aigupta kumpipa Pharo bel amah muang tengteng tung ah huchibang ahi naknak hi.
Ahihkeileh, Ka kiang ah,
Huchi in ka pu Assuria kumpipa toh thu kichiam dih ua, huchi in a tung a tuangmi ding na muhtheih peuhmah ding leh sakol sang nih k’on pe ding.
Bangchi’n ahia kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuang mite thu in Aigupta tung a na muanna koih in, ka pu mite lak a neupen heutu khat lel leng na nankik zoh mahmah ding?
Hiai gam

Hilkiah tapa Eliakim leh Sebnah leh Joahte’n Rabsakeh kiang ah, “Hehpih in na sikhate Suria pau in hon houpih in; huai lah ka theisiam ngal ua; kulh tung a mite ziak in Judah pau in hon houpih nawn ken” a chi uh.

Himahleh Rabsakeh in a kiang uah, “Ka pu in na pu uh kiang leh nou kiang kia ah hiai thu gen din a honsawl ahia? Kulh tung a tute, noute leh a ek uh ne dingte kiang ah leng a honsawl ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Rabsakeh ading a, Judah pau in aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Kumpipa thupitak Assuria kumpipa thu ngaikhia un.
Kumpipa’n hichi in a chi, Hezekiah zekhem in omkei un; aman lah a khut apan nou hon humbit theilou ding ahi.
Hezekiah in,

Hezekiah thu pom kei un. Assuria kumpipa’n hichi in a chi. Hon kileppih unla, ka kiang ah hong pawtkhia un; michih in amah grepgui leh amah theipi kung a nechiat uhenla, michih in amah tuikhuk tui dawn chiat hen.
Noumau gambang a buh leh uain gam, tanghou leh grephuan gam, olive leh khuaizu gam, silou a na hin theihna ding uh gam a k’on pi masiah, Hezekiah in,
Nam chihte pathian mawngmawng lak a himhim in a gam uh Assuria kumpipa apan a humbit ngeita uh hia?
Hamath leh Arpad pathiante koi a omta uh ahia? Sepharvaim, Hena leh Ivah pathiante leng koi a omta ahi ua? Samaria ka khut apan a humbit uhia?
Gamchih pathian tengteng lak a kuate ahi ua a gam uh ka khut apan humbit a,
Amau a dai sipsip ua, kam khat in leng a dawng kei uh: kumpipa thupiak dan, “Amah dawng ken” chih ahi ngal a.
Huchi in kumpipa inn sung heutu Hilkiah tapa Eliakim, Laigelhmi Sebnah leh tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joahte’n a puansilh bohkekte uh silh in Hezekiah kiang ah a hoh ua, Rabsakeh thu gente a hilh uhi.
Huan, kumpipa Hezekiah in huai a zak in hichi ahi a, a puansilhte a botkek a, saiip puan a silh a,
Inn sung heutu Eliakim, Laigelhmi Sebnah leh siampu upate saiip puansilh in Amoz tapa zawlnei Isai kiang ah a sawl hi.
Amau a kiang ah, Hezekiah in hichi in a chi. “Tuni mangbatna leh salhna leh minsiatna ni ahi. Naute lah a pian uh a hunta ngal a, piang sak ding in lah thahatna a om nawnta ngalkei a.
A pu Assuria kumpipa’n Pathian hing gense dia a sawl Rabsakeh thugen tengteng,
Huchi in kumpipa Hezekiah sikhate Isai kiang ah a hoh uh.
Isai in a kiang uah, Na pu kiang ah huchi in gen in,
Ngai in, asung ah kha ka omsak dia, thuthang a za dia, amah gam ah a pai nawn ding. Huchi in amah gam mahmah ah namsau puksak in ka omsak ding, a chi hi,” chi in, a chi hi.
Huchi in Rabsakeh a kiknawn a, Assuria kumpipa’n Libna khua a na suallai a mu a; Lakish apan a pawt chih a zaksa him ahi.
“Ngai in, Nang hondou din a pawtta” chi a Tirhak Ethiopia gam kumpipa tungtang mi gen a na zak in Hezekiah kiang ah mite a sawl hi.
Hichi in Judah kumpipa Hezekiah kiang ah na gen ding uh, “Na Pathian na muan in Jerusalem khua Assuria kumpipa khut ah piak ahi kei ding, chi in hon zekhem kei hen.
Ngai in, Assuria Kumpipate’n gam tengteng hihse vek ua, a tung a a thilhih uh naza a; nang humbit na hi tuan dia hia?
Namchih pathiante’n ka pi leh pute’n a hihmangte uh a humbit ua hia? Gozan, Haran, Reseph, Eden ta Thelasar khua a omte.
Hamath kumpipa, Arpad kumpipa, Sepharvaim khopi kumpipa, Hena kumpipa, Ivah kumpipa te koi a om ahita ua? chi’n” a chi hi.
Hezekiah in a misawlte khut apan lai a mu a, a sim a: Hezekiah
Hezekiah
aw, na bil na doh inla, ngai dih ve;
, Assuria Kumpipate’n namte leh a gamte uh a hihse ngei ua, a pathiante uh mei ah a pai uh.
Hiaite pathian ahi kei him ua, mihing khut a bawl sing leh suang ahizaw uhi. Huaiziak in, mei a pailut in a hihmang uhi.
Huaiziak in, tuin
Huailai in Amoz tapa Isai in Hezekiah kiang ah,
Amah tungtang
Kua na minse sak a, kua na gensia a? Kua tung ah ahia na aw na san sak a, na mit na hah sang? Israelte Mi Siangthoupa tung ah ahi.
Na misawlte zang in
Gamdang tui ka laikhia a, ka dawn zel a, ka khepek nuai ah Aigupta lui tengteng ka kangsak vek ding, na chi hi.
Keimah in nidanglai apan huai ka hih ahihdan bang, malai apan huai ka bawl ahihdan bang naza ka hia? Khaw kulhneite in chinkhawm lel bang a hihsepa din nang k’on septa hi.
Huaiziak in, asung a omte’n hatna a neikei ua, a lauthawng ua, a hong zahlakta uhi. Gamlak loupa bang leh loupa hing bang leh, intung a loupa bang leh, buh a let ma a hai vuai bang ahi uhi.
Ken bel na tut, na lut, na pawt leh ka tung a na hehte ka thei hi.
Ka tung a na heh ziak leh, uangtak a na pau ka bil a a hong luttouh ziak in ka nakbulh na nak ah ka bulh dia, ka sikbah na muk ah; na hong kuanna lampi mahmah ah k’on kiksak nawn ding, chi in.
Hiai nang adia chiamtehna ahi ding. Tukum in buhsang na sen ding ua; kum nawn chiang in a sang mah; kum thumna ah buh na tuh ding ua, at unla, grephuante bawl unla, a gahte ne un.
Huchi in Judah inkawte lak a damlai omsunte’n a suklam in zung a kai ding ua, a toulam in a gah nawn ding uhi.
Jerusalem apan a omsunte Zion tang apan a damlaite a pawt khe ding uhi.
Huaiziak in,
A hong kuanna lampi ah, huai mah ah a nung kiknawn dia, hiai khopi a hongtung kei ding,
Kei ziak leh ka sikha David ziak in hiai khopi humbit ding in ka veng ding hi, chi in.
Huchi in huai zan in hichi ahi a,
Huchi in Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib a pawt a, a kiknawn a, a pai zel a, Ninevi khua ah a omta hi.
A pathian Nisrok inn a amah a biaklai in hichi ahi a, Adrammelek leh Sarezerte’n namsau in a that ua; huchi in Ararat gam ah a tai lutta uh. Huchi in a tapa Esar haddon a sik in a lalta hi.
Huailai in Hezekiah muanmoh in a china hi. Huchi in Amoz tapa zawlnei Isai a kiang ah a hong a, a kiang ah,
Huchi in bang lam nga in a kihei a,
Isai huangsung intual laitak a tunma in hichi ahi a,
“Kiknawn inla, ka mite heutu Hezekiah kiang ah gen in,
Na damsung kumte kum sawmlehnga in ka behlap dia; nang leh hiai khopi Assuria kumpipa apan ka humbit ding’. Keimah ziak leh ka sikha David ziak in hiai khopi ka hum ding” a chi, chi in.
Isai in, Theipi gah beukhat honla un, a chi a; huchi in a honla ua, a meimatum ah a tat a, a hong dam nawnta hi.
Hezekiah in Isai kiang ah, “
Isai in,
Hezekiah in a dawng a, “Limliap kalbi sawm tan a malam a kintouh a baihtel a, huaizaw hi kei hen, limliap kalbi sawm tan in nunglam ah nungkik zaw hen” a chi hi.
Huchi in zawlnei Isai in
Huailai in Baladan tapa Babulon kumpipa Merodakbaladan in laikhakte leh thilpiakte Hezekiah a khak a; Hezekiah chi a na chih a na zak ziak in.

Huchi in Hezekiah in amau a na kipahpih a, a thil manpha koihna inn a thil manpha tengteng, dangka, dangkaeng, gimlimte, sathau manpha, a galvan koihna inn teng leh a gou koihkhawmna inn sung a om tengteng a ensak a: a inn leh a gamsung a Hezekiah in a etsak louh a neikei hi.

Huailai in zawlnei Isai kumpipa Hezekiah kiang ah a hong a, a kiang ah, “Huai mite’n bang ahia a gen uh? Koi apan na kiang a honghoh ahi ua?” chi’n a dong hi. Hezekiah in, “Gam gamla, Babulon apan hong ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in aman “Na inn ah bangbang ahia a muh uh?” a chi a; Hezekiah in, “Ka insung a om tengteng a muvek ua, ka gou lak ah ka etsak louh a omkei ” chi’n a dawng hi.
Isai in Hezekiah kiang ah, “
Ngai in, na insung a om tengteng leh tuni tan a na pi leh pute’n a na kholkhawmte uh Babulon khua ah a paipih nite uh a hongtung ding; Bangmah nutsiat a neikei ding uh
Na gil a gah, na suan ding, na tate ngei leng a paimangpih ding ua; Babulon kumpipa in ah michilgeh ahi ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in Hezekiah in Isai kiang ah, “Na gen
Huchi in Hezekiah tanchin dangte, a thilhih theihdan tengteng leh dil leh tuilakna a bawl a, khopi sung a tui a laklut thute Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Hezekiah bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a; a tapa Manasseh a sik in a lal hi.
Manasseh a lal pattung in kum sawmlehnih a upa ahi. Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga leh nga a lal a; a nu min Hephzibah ahi.
Israel suante ma a delhkhiaksa namte thil kihhuai tak a hihte uh bang,
A pa Hezekiah in a hihsiatsa munsangte a dingsak nawn a; Israel kumpipa Ahab hih bang in Baal maitamte a dingsak a, Aserahte a bawl a, van a om tengteng a bia in a na uh a sem hi.
“Jerusalem ah ka min ka omsak ding” a chihna
inn huangsung intual nihte ah van a om tengteng adin maitamte a bawl hi.
A tapa mei ah a paisuaksak a, aisan leh bum a hih a, dawi zawlte leh kha napeuh a dong hi.
David leh a tapa Solomon kiang a, “Hiai inn leh Jerusalem khua, Israel chi tengteng lak a ka tel ah ka min tangtawn in ka omsak ding.

Thu ka piak tengteng leh ka sikha Mosi in dan a piak tengteng a zuih peuhmah uleh a pi leh pute uh ka piaksa gam apan Israelte khete leng ka kalsuan khesak n’on sam kei ding” a na chih khitsa inn ah Aserah lim bawl in a koih hi.
Himahleh amau a zuikei ua;
a sikha zawlneite zang in thu a gen hi.
“Judah kumpipa Manasseh in hiai thil kihhuai takte a hih a, Amorte sang tham in a hihkhial thupi hi. Judahte’n leng a milimte a thil a hih khelhsak ziak in” a chi hi.
, Israel Pathian in hichi in a chi. “Ngai dih ua, Jerusalem leh Judah tung ah a za peuhmahte bil langnih khengzou khop a thil hoihlou k’on tungsak ding hi.
Samaria tehna khau leh Ahab inkaw ulum khai Jerusalem tung ah ka khung dia; min a kuangnul a kilumletsak bang in Jerusalem ka nul ding hi.
Ka goutan omsunte ka taisan dia, a melmate uh khut ah ka pe ding.

Huchi in a pi leh pute uh Aigupta gam apan a hongpawt nung uh tuni pha a ka mit muh a thil hoihlou a hih ua, hon hehsak ziak un, a melma tengteng mat ding leh gallak ding ahi ding uh” chi in, a chi hi.
mitmuh a thil hoihlou tak hih a Judahte thil a hih khelhsak, khelhna a simlou in Manasseh in poikhoihlou sisan nakpitak in a suah lai a, Jerusalem dung leh vai a dimsak hi.
Manasseh tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng, a thilhih khelhte Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Manasseh a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a, Uzza huansung a om amah inn huan mah ah a vui ua; a tapa Ammon a sik in a lalta hi.
Ammon a lal pattung in kum sawmnih leh nih a upa ahi. Jerusalem ah kum nih a lal a; a nu min Mesullemeth, Jotbah khua a Haruz tanu ahi.
A pa Manasseh hih bangmah
A pa lampi tot tengteng a tawnsam a, a pa septe milim pathiante na sem in amau a bia hi.
Huchi in
Ammon sikhate’n amah a guksawm ua, kumpipa amah inn ah a thatta uhi.
Himahleh huai gam a mite’n kumpipa Ammon guksawmmi tengteng a thatvek uhi. Huchi in huai gam mite’n a tapa Josiah a sik in kumpipa in a bawlta uhi.
Huchi in Ammon thilhih tanchin dangte Judah kumpipate lal lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Uzza huan a amah han ah a vui ua; a tapa Josiah a sik in a lalta hi.
Josiah a lal pattung in kum giat a upa ahi. Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh khat a lal a; a nu min Jedidah, Boskath khua a Adaiah tanu ahi.
Aman
Kumpipa Josiah a lal kum sawmlehgiat kum in hichi ahi a, kumpipa’n Mesullam tapa Azaliah tapa Laigelhmi Saphan kiang ah,
“Siampu lianpen Hilkia kiang ah hohtou inla, kongkhak vengmite’n mite apan a na lakkhawm uh
inn lam nasemmite pia uhen; amau in sebawl
Singlem bawlmite, inlammite, inn sia bawlmite’n inn siatna tak bawlna sing leh suangsek a lei theihna ding un, chi’n vagen in, chi in
Himahleh dangka a piakte uh etpih nawn din a gelhsak tuankei, muanhuai tak a hihzel a hih ziak un” a chi hi.
Siampu lianpen Hilkia in Laigelhmi Saphan kiang ah, “
Laigelhmi Saphan kumpipa kiang ah a hoh a, kumpipa kiang ah thu a vatun nawn a, “Na mite’n in a dangka om a pekhe vek ua:
Laigelhmi Saphan in, “Siampu Hilkia in laibu a honpia” chi in kumpipa a hilh a, huchi in Saphan in kumpipa ma ah a sim hi.
Kumpipa’n dan laibu a thute a zak in hichi ahi a, a puante a botkek hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n siampu Hilkia, Saphan tapa Ahikam, Mikaiah tapa Akbor, Laigelhmi Saphan leh kumpipa sikha Asahiah kiang ah,
“Kei, mi tengteng leh Judah teng adin hiai laibu a thu tuang toh kisai in

Huchi in siampu Hilkia, Ahikam, Akbor, Saphan, Asahiah, puansilh kempa Harhas tapa Tikvah tapa Sallum zi zawlnei Huldah kiang ah a hoh ua, a va houpih uhi. Amah bel Jerusalem sehkhen nihna a teng ahi.
Aman a kiang uah
‘Ngai in, hiai mun ah leh asung a tengte tung ah thil hoihlou k’on tungsak ding, Judah kumpipa’n laibu a, a thusim tengteng bang in.
Kei a hon paisan ua, pathian dangte kiang ah gimlim a hal ua, a khutsuak ua a hon thangpaihsak ziak un hiai mun ah ka thangpaihna nakpi’n a kuangdia, a mawkmih kei ding hi.
Himahleh
hiai mun leh, asung a tengte hihgam leh hamsiat in a om ding uh chih thu ka gen na zak a, na lungtang a nem a,

Huchi in ngai in, na pi leh pute kiang ah k’on pi dia, na han ah lungmuangtaka piin na om dia, hiai mun a thil hoihlou ka tunsak ding tengteng na mit in a muvek kei ding” a chi hi. Huchi in huai thu kumpipa kiang ah a tun nawn uhi.
Huan, kumpipa’n mi a sawl a, Judah leh Jerusalem khopi a upa tengteng a kiang ah a samkhawm uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa Judah gam a mi tengteng leh Jerusalem khua a mi tengteng toh, siampute leh zawlneite toh, mipi tengteng toh, a neu a lian in
Kumpipa khuam zul ah ading a, huai laibu a tuang thukhun thu hihkip din lungtang tengteng leh a kha tengteng a
Kumpipa’n siampu lianpen Hilkia leh a zom a siampute, kongkhak vengmite kiang ah

Milim pathian bia siampute, Judah Kumpipate’n Judah gam khopi munsangte a, Jerusalem kim a gimlim haldia a na seh uh a tawpsak a; Baal adia, ni adia, kha adia, aksite adia van a omte tengteng adia gimlim halmite leng.
inn a Aserah pen Jerusalem pawlam Kidron lui a lakhia in a hal a, a siknen gawp a, a nen mi vantangte han ah a theh hi.
Aserah puangan numeite omna,

Judah khopi apan siampu tengteng a pikhia a, siampute’n gimlim a halna uh Geba apan Beer–sheba pha in a hihbuah vek a; khopi kongpi a veilam pang a om khopi ukpa Joshua kongpi ah a lut a kongpite a munsangte a chimsak hi.
Munsang siampute Jerusalem a
Kuamah in a tapa hiam, a tanu hiam Molech kiang ah mei a paisuaksak nawnlouhna din, Hinnom suante guam a Tophet a hihbuah hi.
inn lutna a inn huangsung a kumpipa inn vengmi Nathanmelek dantan chin a Judah Kumpipate’n ni adia sakol a piakte uh a lamang vek a; ni kangtalai mei in a hal hi.
Ahaz inn chial tung a Judah Kumpipate’n maitam a bawlte uh leh Manasseh in

Jerusalem ma a tatsiatna tang taklam pang a Zidonte pathian kihhuai mahmah Astoreth adia, Ammon suante pathian kihhuai mahmah Khemosh adia, Ammonte Pathian kihhuai mah Molech Israel kumpipa Solomon in munsang a bawlte kumpipa’n a hihbuah hi.
Milimte a kitam gawpsak vek a, Ashera a hihpuk a, huai munte ah mihing guhte a koih hi.

Huailou leng Israelte thil hihkhial sakpa Nebat tapa Jeroboam in Bethel a maitam leh Israelte thil hihkhial sakpa Nebat tapa Jeroboam in a bawl munsang, huai maitam a hihchim a munsang mei a hal in a sikzan a, Ashera a hal hi.
Josiah a kihei a, tang a hante a mu a; huchi in han a guhte a va lasak a, huai thu Pathian min a na gen,
Huchi in aman, huai a ka muh kua suangphuh ahia? a chi a; khomite’n, Pathian mi, Judah gam apan hongpai, Bethel a maitam tung a tua na hih a na genkholpa han eive, chi in a hilh uhi.
Aman “Bangmah chih kei un; kuamah in a guhte lasuan kei hen” a chi hi. Huchi in a guhte Samaria gam apan zawlnei hong paipa guhte toh bangmah a chih kei uhi.
Israel Kumpipate’n
Huchi in huai a munsang siampu tengteng maitam tung ah a that a, huaite ah mihing guhte a hal a, Jerusalem ah a kiknawnta hi.
Kumpipa’n mi tengteng kiang ah, “Hiai thukhun bu a tuang bang in
Israelte tung a vaihawmmite’n vai a hawm ua kipan Israel kumpipa tengteng, Judah kumpipate lal sung teng in huchibang hial Paikan Ankuang a zangngei naikei uhi.
Kumpipa Josiah lal kum sawmlehgiatna kum in Paikan Ankuang Jerusalem khua ah
Huai ban ah
Mosi dan tengteng a lungtang leh kha tengteng leh hatna tengteng a
Huchipi in leng
, “Israel ka suanmang bang in Judah leng ka muh phak louhna ah ka suanmang sam dia, hiai khua ka tel Jerusalem ngei leh huai a inn ka min a omna ding, ka chih ka paimang ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Josiah tanchin dangte, a thilhih tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai tanchingelhnabu ah a tuang kei maw?
Amah a lal lai in Aigupta kumpipa Pharo Neko Assuria kumpipa dou din Euphrates lui ah a hohtou hi. Kumpipa Josiah in amah a na dou a; aman a muhtak in Meggiddo khua ah a that hi.

Huchi in a sikhate’n Meggiddo apan a luang kangtalai in a paipih ua, Jerusalem ah a lutpih ua, amah han ah a vui uh. Huchi in huai gam a mite’n Josiah tapa Jehoahaz a pi ua, thau a nilh ua, a pa sik in kumpipa in a bawlta uhi.
Jehoahaz a lal pattung in kum sawmnih leh thum a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kha thum sung a lal a; a nu min Hemutal, Libnah khua a Jeremiah tanu ahi.
A pi leh pute hih bang in
Pharo Neko in Jerusalem a vaihawm thei nawnlou din Hamath gam a Riblah khua ah a koltang sak a; a gam uh dangka talent za khat leh dangkaeng talent khat siah a kipe sak hi.
Pharo Neko in Josiah tapa Eliakim, a pa Josiah sik in a lal sak a, a min Jehoiakim chi in a kheksak hi. Jehoahaz bel a pimang a; Aigupta gam ah a pai a, huai ah a sita hi.

Jehoiakim in dangka leh dangkaeng Pharo a pe phot a; himahleh a ma gam Pharo thupiak bang in dangka adin siah a liausak hi. Pharo Neko kiang a piak din michih liau dia a sehzah chiat bang in huai gam a mite dangka leh dangkaeng a liausak hi.
Jehoiakim a lal pattung in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehkhat a lal a; a nu min Zebudah, Rumah khua a Pedaiah tanu ahi.
Huchi in a pi leh pute hihdan bang in
A lal lai in Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in huai gam a hongdou a, Jehoiakim bel a sikha in kum thum a om hi. Huai nung in a lehngatsan a, a tung ah a helta hi.
Kaldai pawlte, Suria pawlte, Moab pawlte, Ammon suan pawlte amah sual din a sawlkhia a, a sikha zawlneite zang a a gen
Manasseh khelhna, a thilhih tengteng ziak a, a muh phak louhna a amaute suanmang din, Judah tung ah
Midik sisan a suah ziak in leng; midik sisan a Jerusalem a hih dim ziak in leng
Huchi in Jehoiakim tanchin dang leh a thilhih tengteng Judah kumpipate lal lai tanchin gelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in Jehoiakim bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmuta a; a tapa Jehoiakin a sik in a lalta hi.
Aigupta kumpipa a gam apan a hong kuan khe nawn kei hi. Babulon kumpipa’n Aigupta gam lui apan Euphrates lui pha a kumpipa gam huap tengteng a lak zoh tak ziak in.
Jehoiakin bel a lal pat tung in kum sawmlehgiat a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kha thum a lal a a nu min Nehushta, Jerusalem khua a Elnathan tanu ahi.
A pa hih dan tengteng hih in,
Huchihlai in Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar sikhate Jerusalem ah a hohtou ua, khua a va um uhi.
Huchi a a sikhate’n a va umlai un Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar khua ah a va hohtou hi.
Huchi in Judah kumpipa Jehoiakin, a nu, a sikhate, a miliante, a heutute toh Babulon kumpipa kiang ah a va pawtkhia ua; a lal kum giat kum in Babulon kumpipa’n a na man hi.
gen bang in, a in a gou tengteng leh kumpipa inn a gou tengteng a lavek a,
Jerusalem a mi tengteng, milian tengteng, mihat hangsan hoih tengteng, sing khat leh khutsiam leh siksekmi tengteng sal in a pivek hi. Huai gam a mi gentheite chihlouh kuamah a omta kei uhi.
Jehoiakin bel Babulon ah a pi a; kumpipa nu, kumpinute, a heutute leh huai gam a mihatte Jerusalem apan Babulon ah sal in a pi hi.
Babulon kumpipa’n pasal hoih tengteng sang sagih leh khutsiam leh siksekmi sang khat, mi hat hoih teng galdou thei mi ngen Babulon ah sal in a pi vek hi.
A pa unaupa Mattaniah, Babulon kumpipa’n a sik in a lal sak a, a min Zedekiah chi in a kheksak hi.
Zedekiah bel a lal pattung in kum sawmnih leh khat a upa ahi. Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehkhat sung a lal a; a nu min Hamutal, Libnah khua a Jeremiah tanu ahi.
Jehoiakim hihdan tengteng bang in a hih a,
hehna tawn in Jerusalem leh Judah tung ah Zedekiah Babulon kumpipa tung a a hel apan Aman a muh phaklouh dia a paihmang masiah hiai thilte a hongtungta hi.
A lal kum kua kum, kha sawmna, ni sawm ni tak in hichi ahi a, a sepaih tengteng toh Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar hong kuan in Jerusalem a hong dou a, om mun a vabawl a; kulh in a umsuakta hi.
Hichi in kumpipa Zedekiah lal kum sawmlehkhatna tan in khua um in a om hi.
A kha lina, ni kua nin khua a kial mahmahta a, huai gam mite adin tanghou a omkei hi.
Khopi kulh a hihvang ua, zan in galdou thei mi tengteng kumpipa huan ning, kulh bang nih kikal a kulh kongpi ah a taikhe vek ua; Kaldaite’n khua a umsuak uhi; kumpipa Arabah lampi ah a pai hi.
Himahleh Kaldai sepaihte’n kumpipa a delh ua, Jeriko phaizang ah a pha ua; a sepaih tengteng in amah taizak sanvek uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa a man ua, Babulon kumpipa kiang ah Riblah khua ah a pi ua; a tungtang thu a ngaihtuah uhi.
Zedekiah tapate a mitmuh ngei in a that ua, Zedekiah mitte a khelkhiak sak ua, kol a bunsak ua, Babulon ah a paipihta uhi.
Huchi in Babulon kumpipa, kumpipa Nebukadnezzar lal kum sawmlehkua na, kha ngana, ni sagih ni’n Babulon kumpipa vengmi pawl heutu Nebuzaradan Jerusalem ah a lut hi.
inn leh kumpipa inn a hal a; Jerusalem inn tengteng, inn thupi taktakte a hal hi.
Vengmi pawl heutu kiang a om Kaldai sepaih tengteng in Jerusalem kim a kulhte a hihchim vek uhi.
Khopi sung a nutsiat a om mite, Babulon kumpipa kiang a kipia mite leh mipi dang teng vengmi pawl heutu Nebuzaradan in sal in a pi vek hi.
Huai gam a a genthei tatate lak a mite vengmi pawl heutu in grepgui kem ding leh loubawl din a nusia hi.
Belte, vut luahnate, khawnvak puan tehnate, keute leh dal tuium-belsuan tengteng, nasepna dia a zatte uh a la uhi.
Meilaknate, belkuangte toh, vengmi pawl heutu in dangkaeng a bawlte bel a dangkaeng a la a, dangka sik a bawlte a dangka a la hi.
Solomon in

Khuam khat sandan tong sawmlehgiat ahi a, a dawn ah dal sunbawk a om a; huai sunbawk sandan tong thum ahi. Sunbawk kim ah gial tiktek leh theibuhfai a tuang a, dal a bawlvek ahi uh. Huchi mah bang in khuampi khat leng a gial tiktek hi.
Vengmi pawl heutu in siampu lian Seraiah leh a zompa siampu Zephaniah leh kongkhak vengmi thum a man hi.

Galdou thei mite tung a heutu khat toh, kumpipa kiang a om khopi tung a omlai ngate toh, mipite min gelhpa sepaihte heutu Laigelhmi toh, khopi sung a omlai gam a mi sawmguk toh khopi sung apan a man hi.
Vengmi pawl heutu Nebuzaradan in amau a pi a, Babulon kumpipa kiang ah Riblah khua ah a paipih hi.
Babulon kumpipa’n Hamath gam, Riblah khua ah amau a na that hi. Huchi in Judah, a gamsung apan sal a pikhiak in a omta hi.
Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in Judah gam a a nutsiat teng tung ah Saphan tapa Ahikam tapa Gedaliah ukpa din a bawl hi.

Huchi in sepaih pawl heutu tengteng leh a heute’n Babulon kumpipa’n Gedaliah ukpa in a bawl chih a zak un Mizpah khua ah Gedaliah kiang ah a hoh ua, huaite bel Nathaniah tapa Ishmael, Kareah tapa Johanan, Netophath mi Tanhumeth tapa Seraiah, Mak mi tapa Jaazaniah leh a heute ahi uhi.
Gedaliah huai mite leh a heute uh kiang ah a kichiam a, a kiang uah, “Kaldaite sikha a om lau kei un. Hiai gam ah teng unla, Babulon kumpipa na sem un, huchi in nou adin a hoih ding” a chi hi.

Himahleh a kha sagihna ah hichi ahi a, kumpipa suan Elishama tapa, Nethaniah tapa Ishmael bel mi sawm toh a hong kuan a, Mizpah khua a Judami leh Kaldaimi a kiang a omteng leh Gedaliah a hongsual ua, a that vek uhi.
Huchi in mi tengteng a lian a neu in sepaih heutute toh a pawtkhia ua, Kaldaite a lauh ziak un Aigupta gam ah a paita uhi.

Judah kumpipa Jehoiakin saltan kum sawmthum leh sagih na, kha sawmlehnih na, ni sawmnih leh sagih ni’n hichi ahi a, Babulon kumpipa Evil Merodak in a lal pattung kum in Judah kumpipa Jehoiakin a tanna in apan a khahkhia hi.
A kiang ah hoihtak in thu a gen a, Babulon a kumpipa om samte mangtutphah tung ah a mangtutphah a koihsang tuamse hi.
A tanna in puansilhte a kheng a, a damsung teng in a kiang ah an a ne gige samta hi.
Huchi in a loh ding, kumpipa’n a piak tatlaklou a om a, a damsung teng in, niteng a a zat ding a bawlsak gige hi.
Adam, Seth, Enosh;
Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jared;
Enok, Methusel, Lamek;
Noah, Shem, Ham, leh Japheth;
Japheth tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek, leh Tiras.
Gomer tapate: Asikenaz, Riphath, Togarmah.
Javan tapate: Elisah, Tarsish, Kittim, Rodanim.
Ham tapate: Kush, Mizraim, Put, Kanaan.
Kus tapate: Sheba, Havilah, Sabta, Raamah leh Sabteka. Raamah tapate: Sheba, Dedan.
Kush in Nimrod a suang; lei ah mi hat a honghi pan hi.
Mizraim in Ludim, Anamim, Lahabim, Naphtuhim,
Pathrusim, Kasluhim, Philistiate hong kipatna, leh Kaptorim a suang.
Kanaan in Zidon a ta masapen leh Heth a suang a;
Jebus mi, Amor mi, Girgas mi;
Hiv mi, Arki mi, Sin mi.
Arvad mi, Zemar mi leh Hamath mi.
Shem tapate; Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, Meshek.
Arpaksad in Selah a suang a, huan Selah in Eber a suang hi.
Eber lak ah tapa nih a piang ua: khatpen min Peleg ahi; a damlai in lah lei a kikhen ngal a. A unaupa min Joktan ahi.
Joktan in Almodad, Seleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah;
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah;
Ebal, Abimael, Sheba;
Ophir, Havilah, Jobab a suang hi. Hiaite tengteng Joktan tapate ahi uh.
Shem, Arpaksad, Selah;
Eber, Peleg, Reu;
Serug, Nahor, Terah;
Abram, huai mah Abraham ahi.
Abraham tapate; Isak, Ishmael.
Hiaite a khang uh ahi: Ishmael tamasapen Nebajoth. Huchi in Kedar leh Adbeel, Mibsam,
Misma, Dumah, Massa; Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphish, Kedemah. Hiaite Ishmael tapate ahi uh.
Keturah, Abraham mei, tapate: Zimran, Joksan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, Suah a nei hi. Joksan tapate; Sheba, Dedan.
Midian tapate; Ephah, Epher, Honok, Abida, Eldah. Hiaite tengteng Keturah tapate ahi uh.
Abraham in Isak a suang. Isak tapate; Esau, Israel.
Esau tapate; Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jaalam, Korah.
Eliphaz tapate; Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, Amalek.
Reuel tapate; Nahath, Zerah, Sammah, Mizzah ahi uhi.
Seir tapate: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dison, Ezar leh Disan.
Lotan tapate; Hori leh Homam: Timna, Lotan sanggamnu ahi.
Sobal tapate; Alian, Manahath leh Ebal, Sephi leh Onam. Huan Zibeon tapate; Aiah leh Anah.
Anah tapate; Dison. Dison tapate; Hamran, Esban, Ithran leh Keran.
Ezer tapate; Bilhan, Zaavan leh Jaakan. Disan tapate; Uz leh Aran ahi uhi.
Huchi in hiaite Israel suante tung a vaihawm kumpipate himhim a om ma ua, Edom gam a vaihawm kumpipate ahi uhi:
Beor tapa Bela; a khopi min Dinhabah ahi.
Bela a si a, huchi in Bozrah a Zerah tapa
Jobab in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Jobab a si a, Teman mite gam a
Husam in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Husam a si a, Bedad, Moab gam a
Midian mi that, Bedad tapa Hadad in a sik in vai a hawm a;
a khopi min Avith ahi.
Hadad a si a, huchi in Masrekah mi
Samlah in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Samlah a si a, huchi in lui kiang a Rehoboth a Saul in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Saul a si a, huchi in Akbor tapa
Baal hanan in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Baal hanan a si a, a sik in Hadad in
vai a hawm a; a khopi min Pai ahi:
huan a zi min Mehetabel,
Matred tanu,
Mezahab tanu ahi.
Hadad leng a si hi.
Edom hausate; hausa Timnah,
hausa Aliah, hausa Jetheth;
Hausa Aholibamah, hausa Elah,
hausa Pinon;
Hausa Kenaz, hausa
Teman, hausa Mibzar;
Hausa Magdiel, hausa Iram.
Hiaite Edom hausate ahi uhi.
Hiaite Israel tapate ahi uh: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakar leh Zebulun;
Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad leh Asher.
Judah tapate; Er, Onan, leh Selah: huaite Shuah tanu Kanaan nu a kipan a amah lak a piang thumte ahi uh. Huan Er, Judah ta masapen,
Huchi in Tamar a tapa zi in Perez leh Zerah a suansak a. Judah tapate tengteng nga ahi uh.
Perez tapate; Hezron leh Hamul.
Huan Zerah tapate; Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol leh Dara: avek un nga.
Huan Karmi tapate: Akar, thil siangthou a talekpa, Israel hihbuaipa.
Huan Ethan tapate; Azariah.
Hezron, amah lak a piangte leng; Jerahmeel, Ram, leh Kelubai.
Huan Ram in Amminadab a suang; Amminadab in Nahson, Judah suante lal, a suang hi,
Nahson in Salma a suang a, Salma in Boaz a suang;
Boaz in Obed a suang a, Obed in Jesse
Jesse in a ta masapen Eliab, a nihna Abinadab leh a thumna Sima a suang a;
A lina Nethaneel, a ngana Raddai;
A gukna Ozem, a sagihna David:
Huan a sanggamnute uh Zeruiah leh Abigail ahi uh. Huchi in Zeruiah tapate; Abisai, Joab leh Asahel, thum.
Abigail in Amasa a suang a: huchi in Amasa pa Ishmael mi Jether ahi.
Huan Jezron tapa Kaleb in Azubah a zi, leh Jerioth lak ah tate a suang a: hiaite a tapate ahi; Jeser leh, Sobab leh Ardon.
Azubah a si a, Kaleb in amah ading in Ephrath a pi a, huai in Hur a neihsak hi.
Hur in Uri a suang a, Uri in Bezaleel a suang hi.
Huai nung in Jezron Gilead pa Makir tanu kiang ah a lut a; huai zi dia a pi lai in kum sawmguk a upa ahi; aman Segub a suansak hi.
Segub in, Gilead gam a khopi sawmnih leh thum nei Jair, a suansak hi.
Aman amau a kipan Geshur, Aramin leh Jair khuate a la a, Kenath leh, huai a khoneite, khopi sawmguk toh. Hiaite tengteng Gilead pa Makir tapate a ahi uh.
Huai nung in Kaleb ephrathah ah Hezron a sia, huchi in Abi’a Hezron zi in Tekoa pa Asur a suansak hi.
Huan Hezron ta masapen Jerahmeel tapate a ta masapen Ram, Bunah, Oren, Ozem leh Ahijah ahi uh.
Jerahmeel in zi dang a nei a, a min Atarah ahi; amah Onam nu ahi.
Jerahmeel ta masapen Ram tapate Maaz, Jamin leh Eker ahi uh.
Onam tapate Sammai leh Jada ahi uh: Sammai tapate; Nadab leh Abisur ahi uhi.
Abisur zi min Abihail ahi; aman Ahban leh Molid a suansak hi.
Nadab tapate; Seled leh Appaim ahi ua, Seled bel tate neilou in a si hi.
Appaim tapate; Ishi. Ishi tapate; Sesan. Sesan tapate; Ahlai.
Huan Jada Sammai unaupa tapate; Jether leh Jonathan: Jether ta neilou in a si hi.
Huan Jonathan tapate: Peleth, Zaza. Hiaite Jerahmeel tapate ahi uh.
Huchi in Sesan in, tanute chihlouh, tapate a neikei hi. Huan Sesan in Aigupta mi khat sikha a nei a, a min Jarha ahi.
Huan Sesan in a tanu a sikha Jerha kiang ah zi din a pia a; huchi in Attai a neihsak hi.
Huan Attai in Nathan a suang a, Nathan in Zabad a suang hi;
Zabad in Ephlal a suang a; Ephlal in Obed a suang;
Obed in Jehu a suang a, Jehu in Azariah a suang;
Azariah in Helez a suang a, Helez in Eleasah a suang hi;
Eleasah in Sisamai a suang a, Sisamai in Sallum a suang;
Sallum in Jekamiah a suang a, Jekamiah in Elisama a suang hi.
Huchi in Jerahmeel unaupa Kaleb tapate Mesa a ta masapen, Ziph pa ahi a; huan Hebron pa Maresah tapate.
Huan Hebron tapate; Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, Shema ahi uh.
Shema in Raham, Jorkoam pa a suang a; Rekem in Sammai a suang hi.
Huan Sammai tapa Maon ahi; Maon Bethzur pa ahi.
Ephah, Kaleb mei in, Haran, Moza leh Gazez a suang a: Haran in Gazez a suang hi.
Jahdai tapate; Regem, Jotham, Gesan, Pelet, Ephah, Saap.
Maakah, Kaleb mei in, Seber leh Tirhanah a nei a.
Madmannah pa Saap, Makbenah pa leh Gibea pa Sheva a nei a; Kaleb tanu Aksah ahi.
Hiaite Kaleb tapate ahi uh; Ephrathah ta masapen Hur tapa, Kiriath-jearim pa Sobal;
Salma Bethlehem pa, Harep Bethgader pa.
Kiriath-jearim pa Sobal in tapate a nei a; Haroeh leh Menaheth kimkhatte ahi ua,
Kiriath-jearim inkawte; Ithrites mite, Puthit mite, Sumathit mite, Misrai mite; Zareathit mite leh Estaolit mite hong kipatna ahi.
Salma tapate; Bethlehem, Netophath mite, Ataroth Joab inkuante, Zorit mite, Manahathit mite kimkhatte ahi uh.
Huan Jabez a teng laigelhmite inkawte; Tirathit mite, Simeathit mite, Sukathit mite. Hiaite Ken mi Rekab inkawte pa, Hemath a kipan hongpaite ahi uhi.
Hiaite Hebron a piang David tapate ahi uh:
Ta masa, Amnon,
Jezreel numei Ahinoam lak a;
nihna, Daniel, Karmel numei Abigail lak a;
Thumna, Absalom Geshur kumpipa
Talmai tanu Maakah tapa;
Lina, Adonijah Haggith tapa;
Ngana, Abital a Sephatiah;
Gukna, A zi Eklah lak a Ithream.
Hebron ah a tapa gukte a piang ua; huai ah kum sagih leh kha guk vai a hawm hi:
Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh kum thum vai a hawm hi.
Hiaite Jerusalem a piang lite ahi:
Simeah, Sobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ammiel tanu Bathshua lak ah kua:
Ibhar, Elisama, Eliphelet;
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia;
Elisama, Eliada, Eliphelet.
Hiaite tengteng, meite tapate chihlouh in, David tapate ahi uh; huan Tamar bel a sanggamnu uh ahi.
Huan Solomon tapa Rehoboam ahi. Abi’a a tapa, Asa a tapa, Jehosaphat a tapa;
Joram a tapa, Ahaziah a tapa, Joash a tapa;
Amaziah a tapa, Azariah a tapa, Jotham a tapa;
Ahaz a tapa, Hezekiah a tapa, Manasseh a tapa;
Ammon a tapa, Josiah a tapa.
Josiah tapate; tamasa Johanan, nihna Jehoiakim, thumna Zedekiah, lina Sallum.
Jehoiakim tapate: Jekoniah a tapa, Zedekiah a tapa.
Huan salmatpa Jehoiachin suante: Salathiel a tapa,
Malkiram, Pedaiah, Senazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, Nedabiah.
Pedaiah tapate; Zerubbabel leh Shimei: Zerubbabel tapate; Mesullam, Hananiah; Selomith a sanggamnu uh ahi:
Hasubah, Ohel, Berekiah, Hasadiah, Jusa hesed, nga.
Huan Hananiah tapate; Pelatiah, Jesaiah: Rephaiah tapate, Arnan tapate, Obadiah tapate, Sekaniah tapate.
Sekaniah tapate, Semaiah: huan Semaiah tapate; Hattus, Igeal, Bariah, Neariah, Saphat, guk.
Neariah tapate; Elioenai, Hizkiah, Azrikam, thum.
Elioenai tapate; Hodaiah, Eliasib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Dalaiah, Anani, sagih.
Judah tapate: Perez, Hezron, Karmi, Hur leh Sobal.
Sobal tapa Reaiah in Jahath a suang a; Jahath in Ahumai leh Lahad a suang. Hiaite mite Zorathit inkawte ahi uh.
Huan hiaite Etam pa tapate ahi uh: Jezreel, Ishma, Idbash: huan a sanggamnu uh min Hazelelponi ahi:
Gedor pa Penuel, Husah pa Ezer. Hiaite, Ephrathah ta masa, Bethlehem pa, Hur tapate ahi uh.
Tekoa pa Asur in zi nih, Helah leh Naarah a nei.
Naarah in Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, Haahashtari a neihsak a. Hiaite Naarah tapate ahi uh.
Helah tapate Zereth, Izhar, Ethnan ahi uh.
Koz in Anub, Zobebah, Harum tapa Aharhel inkawte a suang hi.
Huan Jabez bel a unaute sang in a zahtakhuai zaw a: a nun a min Jabez a sa a, lungkhamna toh amah ka neih ziak in, chi in.

Jabez in Israel Pathian a sam a, Aw hon vualzawl mahmah in, ka gam liansak in, na khut ka kiang ah om in, hoihlou a kipan in kei honkem in, hon lungkham saklouhna ding in chi in. Huchi in Pathian in a nget a phalta hi.
Huan Kelub, Suah sanggampa’n, Eston pa, Mehir a suang hi.
Eston in Bethrapha, Paseah, Irnahas pa Tehinnah a suang hi. Hiaite Rekah mite ahi uh.
Huan Kenaz tapate: Othniel, Seraiah; huan Othniel tapate: Hathat.
Meonothai in Ophrah a suang: Seraiah in Geharasim pa Joab a suang; khutsiammite chih in a om uhi.
Jephunneh tapa Kaleb tapate; Iru, Elah, leh Naam: Elah tapa: Kenaz.
Jahallel tapate; Ziph leh Ziphah, Tiria leh Asarel.
Ezra tapate; Jether, Mered, Epher, Jalon: huan Miriam leh Sammai, Estemoa pa Ishbah a nei hi.
A zi Jehudijah a numei in Jered Gedor pa, Heber Soko pa, Jekuthiel Zanoah pa a suang hi. Huchi in hiaite Mered in a pi, Pharo tanu Bithia tapate ahi uh.
Huan Naham sanggamnu, Hodiah zi tapate, Gar mi Keilah pa, Maakah mi Estemoa pa ahi uh.
Simon tapate; Amnon, Rinnah, Benhanan, Tilon. Ishi tapate; Zoheth, Ben Zoheth ahi uhi.
Huan Judah tapa Selah tapate; Lekah pa Er, leh Meresah pa Laadah leh puanmalngat hoih bawlte inkuante, Asbea inkawte;
Jokim, Kozeba mite, Joash, Saraph, Moab a vaihawmna nei, Jasubilehem. Huchi in chiamtehna laite a lui mahmah hi.
Hiaite belvelmite leh, Netaim leh Gedera a tengte ahi uh: huai ah a nasepna ziak in kumpipa kiang ah a teng uhi.
Simeon tapate: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, Saul,
A tapa Sallum, a tapa Mibsam, a tapa Misma.
Misma tapate; a tapa Hammuel, a tapa, Zakkur, a tapa Shimei.
Shimei in tapa sawmlehguk leh tanu guk a nei a, himahleh a unaute’n tate tampi a neikei ua, Judah tate bang in, a inkawte tengteng uh leng a pungkei uhi.
Beer–sheba ah, Moladah ah, leh Hazar-shual ah a teng ua;
Bilhah ah, Ezem ah, Tolad ah;
Bethuel ah, Hormah ah, Ziklag ah;
Beth-markaboth ah, Hazarsusim ah leh Bethbirei ah, Saaraim ah. Hiai David vaihawm tanpha in a khopite uh ahi.
Etam leh Ain, Rimmon, Token, Ashan, a khotate uh ahi, khopi ngate:
Huai kim a khotate tengteng Baal pha in ahi. Hiaite a tenna uh ahi a, khangthusuina a nei uhi.
Mesobab, Jamel leh Amaziah tapa Josah;
Joel leh Josibiah tapa Jehu, Seraiah tapa, Asiel tapa;
Elioenai, Jaakobah; Jesohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel leh Benaiah;
Siphi tapa Ziza, Allon tapa, Jedaiah tapa, Simri tapa, Semaiah tapa;
Hiai minlohte a inkaw sung ua vaihawmte ahi uh: huan a pipute uh inkawte a khang mahmah uhi.
A ganhon uh adia loupanek zong ding in, guam suahlam pang tanpha in, Gedor lutna chiang pha in a pai uhi.
Loupa nek hoihna leh tamna a mu ua, gam za leh dai lah galmuang; tuma a huai a omte lah Ham a kipan ahi uhi.

Hiai mingelhte Judah kumpipa Hezekiah damlai in a hongpai ua, a puaninte uh leh huai a om Meun in a sual ua, tunitan in, amaute a hihse vek ua, a mun uah a teng uhi; huailai a a gante uh adia louhing a om ziak in.
A lak ua khenkhatte, Simeon tapate, mi za nga, a heutute uh Ishi tapate Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, leh Uzziel makaih in Seir mual ah a hoh uhi.
A suakta Amalek mite lak a omlaite a sual ua, tunitan in, huai ah a tengta uhi.

Huan Israel ta masapen Reuben tapate, amah piang masapen ahi; himahleh a pa lupna a hihbuah ziak in, a upa hihna Israel tapa Joseph tapate kiang a piak ahi; huchi in upatna dungzui in khangthu a kisim kei hi.
A unaute tung ah Judah a vualzou a, amah a kipan in vaihawmtu a hongom a; himahleh upatna Joseph a ahi:
Israel ta masapen Reuben tapate; Hanok, Pallu, Hezron, Karmi.
Joel tapate: Semaiah a tapa, Gog a tapa, Shimei a tapa,
Mikah a tapa, Reaiah a tapa, Baal a tapa;
Beer a tapa, Assuria kumpipa Tilgath pilneser in a pimang; Reuben mite vaihawmtu ahi.
Huan a khangthute uh khangthusutna a kisim lai a a inkuan kuan ua a unaute; hausapa, Jeiel, Zekariah,
Bela Azaz tapa, Shema Joel tapa, Aroer teng, Nebo leh Baal meon pha a teng:
Suahlam ah luipi Euphrates a kipan gamdai lutna pha in a tengta hi: Gilead gam a a gante uh a pun ziak in.
Huan Saul damlai in Hagri mite toh a kidou ua, huaite a zou a: Gilead suahlam gam tengteng ah a puaninte uah a teng uhi.
Huan Gad tapate amau zawntak ah, Salkah tan in Bashan gam ah a teng uh:
Joel hausapa leh, a zom Sapham, leh Janai, leh Saphat Bashan ah:
A pipute uh inkawte a unaute uh: Mikael leh, Mesullam leh, Sheba leh, Jorai leh, Jakan, leh Zia, leh Eber, sagih.
Hiaite Huri tapa Abihail tapate ahi uh, Jaro tapa, Gilead tapa, Mikael tapa, Jesisai tapa, Jahdo tapa, Buz tapa;
Ahi Abdiel tapa, Guni tapa, a pipute uh inkawte hausapa.
Bashan a Gilead ah, a khopite, Saron huapkhakte tengteng, a gamgi tanpha un, a teng uhi.
Hiaite tengteng Judah Kumpipa Jotham damlai leh Israel kumpipa Jeroboam damlai in a khangthute in sim in a omvek uhi.
Reuben tapate leh, Gad mite leh Manasseh nam kimkhat mihangsante, namsau leh lum thuahthei mite, leh thalpeu a kap ding, kidou siam, galkap dia kuanthei, singli, sangli, za sagih leh sawmguk ahi uh.
Hagarit mite, Jetur toh, Naphish toh, Nodab toh a kidou uhi.

Amaute dou ding in panpih in a om ua, huchi in Hagarit mite a khut ua piak in a om ua, a kiang ua om tengteng toh; amau lah Pathian kiang ah kidouna ah a kap ngal ua, Pathian in a ngetna uh a za a; amah a muanna uh a koih ziak un.
Huchi in a gante uh a lamang ua; a sangawngsau uh sing nga, belam nuai nih leh sing nga, sabiltung za nih, mite nuai khat.
Kidouna Pathian a a hih ziak in, mi tampi petmah a puk uhi. Huchi in saltanna tanpha in a mun uah a tengta uhi.
Huan Manasseh nam kimkhatte tate gamsung ah a teng ua: Bashan a kipan Baal hermon leh Senir leh Hermon mual tan in a pung uhi.
Hiaite Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, Jahdiel, mi hat hangsante, mi minthangte, a pipute uh inkawte lupente ahi uhi.
Huchi in a pipute uh Pathian dou in a talek ua, a ma ua Pathian in a hihsiat, gam a mite pathiante lak ah ang a kawm uhi.

Israel Pathian in Assuria kumpipa Pul kha leh, Assuria kumpipa Tilgath pilneser kha a tokthou a, huchi in amaute a pimang a, Reuben mite leh, Gad mite leh, Manasseh nam kimkhatte mahmah, tunitan in Halah, leh Habor, leh Hara, ah amaute a pia, Gozan lui pha in.
Levi Tapate: Gershom, Kohath, Merari.
Huan Kohath tapate: Amaram, Izhar, Hebron, Uzziel.
Amram tate: Aron, Mosi, Miriam. Aron tapate: Nadab leh Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar.
Eleazar in Phinehas a suang a, Phinehas in Abisua a suang a;
Abisua in Bukki a suang a, Bukki in Uzzi a suang a;
Uzzi in Zerahiah a suang a, Zerahiaih in Meraioth a suang a;
Meraioth in Amariah a suang a, Amariah in Ahitub a suang a;
Ahitub in Zadok a suang a, Zadok in Ahimaaz a suang a;
Ahimaaz in Azariah a suang a, Azariah in Johanan a suang a;
Johanan in Azariah a suang a, amah Jerusalem a Solomon inn lamlai siampu nasep sempa ahi:
Huan Azariah in Amariah a suang a, Amariah in Ahitub a suang a;
Ahitub in Zadok a suang a, Zadok in Sallum a suang a;
Sallum in Hilkiah a suang a, Hilkiah in Azariah a suang a;
Azariah in Seraiah a suang a, Seraiah in Jahozadak a suang a;
Jahozadak saltanna lam ah a pai hi,
Levi tapate: Gershom, Kahath, leh Merari.
Hiaite Gershomtapate minte ahi uh: Libni leh Shimei.
Kohath tapate Amram, Ezhar, Hebron, Uzziel ahi uh.
Merari tapate: Mahli leh Musi. Hiaite a pipute uh inkawte dungzui in Levite inkuante ahi uh.
Gershom a kipan: Libni a tapa, Jahath a tapa, Zimmah a tapa;
Joah a tapa, Iddo a tapa, Zerah a tapa, Jeatherai a tapa.
Kohath tapate: Amminadab a tapa, Korah a tapa, Assir a tapa;
Elkanah a tapa, Ebiasaph a tapa, Assir a tapa;
Tahath a tapa, Uriel a tapa, Uzziah a tapa, Shaul a tapa.
Elkanah tapate: Amasai leh Ahimoth,
Elkanah ahihleh: Elkanah tapate; Zophai a tapa, Nahath a tapa;
Eliab a tapa, Jeroham a tapa, Elkanah a tapa.
Samuel tapate: ta masapen Joel, a zom Abiah.
Merari tapate: Mahli, Libni a tapa, Shimei a tapa, Uzza a tapa;
Simeah a tapa, Haggiah a tapa, Asaiah a tapa.
Huan hiaite David in thukhun bawm a khawl nung a,
Jerusalem a Solomon in
Hiaite a tapate toh nasemte ahi uhi.
Kohath mite tapate ahihleh: Heman lasami, Joel tapa, Samuel tapa;
Elkanah tapa, Jeroham tapa, Eliel tapa, Toah tapa;
Zuph tapa, Elkanah tapa, Mahath tapa, Amasai tapa;
Elkanah tapa, Joel tapa, Azariah tapa, Zephaniah tapa;
Tahath tapa, Assir tapa, Eliasaph tapa, Korah tapa;
Ezhar tapa, Kohath tapa, Levi tapa, Israel tapa.
A unaupa Asaph, a taklam pang a dingpa, Asaph Berekiah tapa mahmah, Simeah tapa;
Mikael tapa, Baaseih tapa, Malkiah tapa;
Ethni tapa, Zerah tapa, Adaiah tapa;
Ethan tapa, Zimmah tapa, Shimei tapa,
Jahath tapa, Gershomtapa, Levi tapa,
A khut veilam ah a unaute uh Merari tapate: Etham Kisi tapa, Abdi Malluk tapa;
Hasabiah tapa, Amaziah tapa, Hilkiah tapa;
Amzi tapa, Bani tapa, Samer tapa;
Mahli tapa, Musi tapa, Merari tapa, Levi tapa.
A unaute uh Levi mite Pathian inn biakbuka nasepna tengteng a ding a a seh ahi uhi.

Himahleh Aron leh a tapate’n haltum maitam tung ah, gimlim maitam tung ah, Mun Siangthou pen a nasepna tengteng ading in a lan ua, Pathian sikha Mosi thupiak tengteng bang in, Israel ading a tatna bawl ding in.
Huan hiaite Aron tapate ahi uh; Eleazar tapa, Phinehas a tapa, Abisua a tapa;
Bukki a tapa, Uzzi a tapa, Zerahiah a tapa;
Meraioth a tapa, Amariah a tapa, Ahitub a tapa:
Zadok a tapa, Ahimaaz a tapa ahi.
Huchi in hiaite a gamgite ua a puanin kaihnate uh dungzui a a tenna uh ahi: Aron tapate kiang ah, Kohath mite inkawte a, amau mun dia aisan a piak masakpen ahi.
Amau kiang ah Judah gam ah Hebron leh, a kim a vela a huapkhakte a pia uhi;
Himahleh huai a khopi munte leh khotate, Jephunne tapa Kaleb kiang ah a pia uhi.
Aron tapate kiang ah kihumbitna khopite a pia uh, Hebron; Libna leng a huapkhakte toh, Jattir, Estemoa a huapkhakte toh;
Hilen a huapkhakte toh, Debir a huapkhakte toh;
Ashan a huapkhakte toh, Beth-shemesh a huapkhakte toh:
Huan Benjamin nam a kipan; Geba a huapkhakte toh, Allemeth a huapkhakte toh, Anathoth a huapkhakte toh. A inkuante tengteng a a khopite tengteng uh khopi sawmlehthum ahi hi.
Kohath tapa omlaite kiang ah, huai nam inkuan a kipan, nam kim khat, Manasseh nam kimkhat a kipan khopi sawm aisan a piak ahi uhi.
Huan Gershomtapate ahihleh, a inkuante uh dungzui in, Issakar nam a kipan, Asher nam a kipan, Naphtali nam a kipan, Bashan a Manasseh nam a kipan, khopi sawmlehthum.
Merari tapate kiang ah aisan a piak ahi, a inkawte uh dungzui in, Reuben nam a kipan, Gad nam a kipan, Zebulun nam a kipan, khopi sawmlehnihte.
Israel tate’n Levi mite kiang ah khopite a huapkhakte uh toh a pia uhi.
Judah tate nam a kipan, Simeon tapa nam a kipan, Benjamin tate nam a kipan, hiai khopi minlohte, aisan in a pia uhi.
Kohath tapa inkawte lak a khenkhatte’n Ephraim nam a kipan amau gamgi khopite a nei uhi.
Amau kiang ah bitna khopite a pia uh, Ephraim singtang gam a Sekem a huapkhakte toh; Gezer leng a huapkhakte toh;
Jokmeam a huapkhakte toh, Bethhoron a huapkhakte toh;
Aijalon a huapkhakte toh, Gath-rimmon a huapkhakte toh;
Manasseh nam kimkhat a kipan; Aner a huapkhakte toh; Bileam a huapkhakte toh, Kohath tapate inkaw lak a omlaite din.
Gershom tapa kiang ah, Manasseh nam kimkhat inkuan a kipan a piak ahi, Bashan a Golan a huapkhakte toh, Astaroth a huapkhakte toh:
Issakar nam a kipan in: Kedesh a huapkhakte toh, Daberath a huapkhakte toh;
Ramoth, a huapkhakte toh, Anem a huapkhakte toh:
Asher nam a kipan in: Masal a huapkhakte toh, Abdon a huapkhakte toh;
Hukok a huapkhakte toh, Rehob a huapkhakte toh:
Naphtali nam a kipan in: Galili a Kedesh a huapkhakte toh, Hammon a huapkhakte toh, Kiriathaim a huapkhakte toh.
Levi mite omlaite kiang ah, Merari tapate, Zebulun nam a kipan a piak ahi, Rimmon a huapkhakte toh, Tabor a huapkhakte toh:
Jeriko a Jordan khen, suahlam pang, Reuben nam a kipan, amaute piak ahi, gamdai a Bezer a huapkhakte toh, Jahzah a huapkhakte toh,
Kedemoth a huapkhakte toh, Mephaath a huapkhakte toh:
Gad nam a kipan in: Gilead a Ramoth a huapkhakte toh, Mahanaim a huapkhakte toh,
Heshbon a huapkhakte toh, Jazer a huapkhakte toh.
Issakar tapate: Tola, Puah, Jasub, Simron, li.

Tola tapate: Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam, Semuel, a pipute uh inkawte lupente, huaibel, Tola a kipante; a khangte ua mi hat hangsante: David damlai a zah uh sing nih leh sang nih leh za guk ahi uh.
Huan Uzzi tapate: Izrahiah: huan Izrahiah tapate; Mikael, Obadiah, Joel, Ishiah, nga: avek un mipipente ahi uh.
Amau toh, a pipute uh inkawte dan in, a khangte un, kidouna ding a sepaih pawlte ahi uh, sing thum leh sang guk; zi leh tapa tampi a nei uhi.
Huan Issakar inkawte tengteng lak a, mi hat hangsante, a unaute uh avek ua khangthusutna a sut in, sing giat leh sang sagih ahi.
Benjamin tapate: Bela, Beker, Jediael, thum.
Bela tapate: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, Iri, nga; pipute inkawte lupente, mi hat hangsante; huan khangthusutna a sim in sing nih leh sang nih leh sawmthum leh li ahi uh.
Beker, tapate: Zemira, Joas, Elizer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth, Alameth. Hiaite tengteng Beker tapate ahi uh.
Huchi in khangthu sutna a sim ahi ua, a khangte uh dungzui in, a pipute uh inkawte lupente, mi hat hangsante, sing nih leh za nih ahi uh.
Huan Jediael tapate: Bilhan: Bilhan tapate; Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Kenaan, Zethan, Tarsis, Ahisahar.
Hiaite tengteng Jediael tapate ahi uh, a pipute uh inkawte lupente dungzui in, mi hat hangsan, kidouna adia sepaih pawl a kuankhe thei dingte, sing khat leh sang sagih leh za nih ahi uh.
Suppim leng Huppim, Ir tapate, Husim, Aher tapate.
Naphtali tapate: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, Sallum, Bilhah tapate.
Manasseh tapate: Asriel, a zi in a suan: a mei Aram numei in Gilead pa Makir a suang hi;
Makir in Huppim leh Shuppim sanggamnu a min Maakah zi in pi a; a nihna min Zelophehad ahi: Zelophehad in tanute a nei hi.
Maakah, Makir zi in tapa a nei a, a min in Peres a sa a; a unaupa min Seres ahi; a tapate Ulam leh Rakem ahi uh.
Ulam tapate; Bedan. Hiaite Gilead tapate ahi uh Makir tapa, Manasseh tapa.
A sanggamnu Hammoleket in Ishod, Abiezer, Mahalah a nei.
Semidah tapate Ahian, Sekem, Likhi, Aniam ahi uh.
Huan Ephraim tapate: Suthelah, Bered a tapa, Tahath a tapa, Elead a tapa, Tahath a tapa,
Zabad a tapa, Suthelah a tapa, Ezer, leh Elead, a gante uh lamang ding a a hongpai suk gamsung a om Gath mite’n a thatta uh.
A pa uh Ephraim in ni tampi a sun a, huchi in a unaute amah lungmuan ding in a hong uhi.
Huchi in a zi kiang ah a hoh a, nau a pai a, tapa a nei a, a inn sung a tuahsiat ziak in a min ding in Beriah a sata hi.
A tanu Serah ahi a, Bethhoron nuainung leh tungnung leh Uzzen serah lam nu ahi.
Rephah a tapa ahi, Reseph leng; Reseph tapa Telah, Tahan a tapa;
Ladan a tapa, Ammihud a tapa, Elisama a tapa;
Nun a tapa, Joshua a tapa.
A neihte uleh a tennate uh Bethel leh huai a khuate ahi, suahlam ah Naaran, tumlam ah Gezer, huai khopite toh, huai Azzah leh khopite tan in:
Manasseh tate gamgi chin ah, Beth shean leh, a khopite, Taanak leh a khopite, Meggiddo leh a khopite, Dor leh a khopite, hiaite ah Israel tapa Joseph tate a teng uhi.
Asher tapate: Imnah, Isuah, Ishuai, Beriah, Serah a sanggamnu uh.
Beriah tapate: Heber, Malkiel, Birzaith pa.
Heber in Japhlet, Somer, Hotham, Sua a sanggamnu a suang.
Japhlet tapate: Pasak, Bimhal, Asavath. Hiaite Japhlet tate ahi uh.
Samer tapate: Ahi, Rohgah, Jehubbah leh Aram.
Helem a unaupa tapate; Zophah, Imna, Seles, Amal.
Zophah tapate: Suah, Hernephar, Sual, Beri, Imrah;
Bezer, Hod, Samma, Silsah, Ithran, Beera.
Jether tapate: Jephunneh, Pispa, Ara.
Ulla tapate; Ara, Hanniel, Rezia.
Hiaite tengteng Asher tate ahi uh, pipute inkawte lupente, mihat, tel, hangsan, kumpi tapate lak a vaihawmte. Kidouna nasepna ding a Khangthusutna a sim in amau zah singnih sangguk ahi uhi.
Huchi in Benjamin in a ta masa Bela, a zom Asbel, a thumna Aharah a suang a;
Nohah a lina, Rapha a ngana.
Bela in tapate a nei a, Addar, Gera leh Abihud;
Abisua, Naaman, Ahoah;
Gera, Sephuphan, Huram.
Hiaite Ehud tapate ahi uh: hiaite Geba a tengte pipute inkawte lupente ahi uh, huchi in amaute Manahath ah sal in a pi uhi:
Naaman, Ahiah, Gera, amaute salin a pi a; Uzza leh Ahihud a suang hi.
Saharaim in amaute a sawlmang nung in, Moab mun ah tate a suang a; Husim leh Baar a zite ahi uh.
A zi Hodes apan, Jobab, Zibia, Messa, Malkam a suang hi;
Jeuz, Sakia, Mirma. Hiaite pipute inkawte lupente, a tapate ahi uhi.
Husim lak ah Abitub leh Elpaal a suang hi.
Elpaal tapate: Eber, Misam, Samed, Ono lamkhetu leh Lod, huai khopite toh lampa:
Beriah, Shema, Aijalon, Gath a tengteng delhzakte tengtengte pipute inkawte lupente ahi uh;
Ahio, Saksak, Jeremoth;
Zebadiah, Arad, Edar,
Mikael, Ispah, Joha Beriah tapate;
Zebadiah, Mesullam, Hezeki, Heber;
Ismerai, Jezliah, Jobab, Elpaal tapate,
Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi;
Elienai, Zilthai, Eliel;
Adaiah, Beraiah, Simrath, Simhi tapate;
Ispan, Heber, Eliel;
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan;
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah;
Ipdeiah, Penuel, Sasak tapate;
Samserai, Sehariah, Athaliah;
Jaaresiah, Eliah, Zikri, Jeroham tapate.
Hiaite a khangte ua pipute inkawte lupente ahi uh, mi pipente: hiaite Jerusalem ah a teng uhi.
Gibeon ah Gibeon pa a teng a, a zi min Maakah ahi:
A tapa masapen Abdon, Zur, Kis, Baal, Nadab;
Gedor, Ahio, Zaker.
Mikloth in Simeah a suang hi. A naute uh toh Jerusalem ah, a unaute uh zawn ah a tenglai uhi.
Ner in Kis a suang a; Kis in Saul a suang; Saul in Jonathan, Malkisua, Abinadab leh Eshbaal a suang.
Jonathan tapa Merib baal ahi a; Merib baal in Mikah a suang hi.
Mikah tapate; Pithon, Melek, Tarea, Ahaz.
Ahaz in Jehoaddah a suang a; Jehoaddah in Alemeth,
Azmaveth leh Zimri a suang a; Zimri in Moza a suang;
Moza in Binea a suang a; Rapha a tapa, Eleasa a tapa, Azel a tapa:
Azel in tapa guk a nei a, a min uh hiaite ahi; Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Seariah, Obadiah leh Hanan. Hiaite tengteng Azel tapate ahi.
Unaupa Esek tapate; Ulam a ta masa, Jehush a zom, Eliphelet a thumna.
Ulam tapate mi hat hangsan, thalkapmite ahi uh, tapate, tapate, tapate tampi, za khat leh sawmnga a nei uhi. Hiaite tengteng Benjamin tapate ahi uh.
Huchi in Israel tengteng khangthu a sim in a om ua; huan, ngai in, Israel leh Judah kumpipate laibu ah gelh in a om uhi: a tatlekna ziak un Babulon lam ah sal a pimang in a om uhi.
Amau tante a khopite ua teng masapente bel, Israel, siampute, Levi mite leh Nethinim mite ahi uhi.
Jerusalem ah Judah tate, Benjamin tate, Ephraim leh Manasseh tate a teng uhi;
Uthai Ammihud tapa, Omri tapa, Imri tapa, Bani tapa, Perez tate ah Judah tapa.
Silon mite; Asaiah piang masapen leh a tapate.
Zerah tapate ah; Jeuel, a unaute, za guk leh sawmkua.
Benjamin tapate ah; Sallu Mesullam tapa, Hodaviah tapa, Hasenuah tapa;
Huan Ibneiah Jeroham tapa, Elah Uzzi tapa, Mikri tapa, Sallum Sephatiah tapa, Reuel tapa, Ibnijah tapa;
A unaute uh, a khangte uh dungzui in, za kua leh sawmnga leh guk. Hiai mite tengteng a pipute uh inkawte a pipute inkawte lupente ahi uhi.
Huan siampute ah: Jedaiah, Jehoiarib; Jachin;
Azariah Hilkiah tapa, Mesullam tapa, Ahitub tapa,
Pathian inn a vaihawmpa;
Adaiah Jeroham tapa, Pashur tapa, Malkijah tapa,
Maasiai Adiel tapa, Jahzerah tapa, Mesullam tapa,
Mesillemit tapa, Immer tapa;
A unaute uh, a pipute uh lupente, sang khat leh za sagih leh sawmguk; Pathian inn a nasepna thilhihna ding a mi hithei mahmahte.
Huan Levi mite ah: Hashub tapa Semaiah,
Azrikam tapa, Hasabiah tapa, Merari tapate ah;
Bakbakkar, Heres, Galal, Mattaniah Mikah tapa,
Zikri tapa, Asaph tapa;
Obadiah Semaiah tapa, Galal tapa,
Jeduthun tapa, Berekiah Asa tapa, Elkanah tapa,
Netophath mite khuate a tengte.
Huan kongkhak ngakmite; Sallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, a unaute uh: Sallum bel a pipen ahi.
Kumpipa kongpi suahlam pang ngak sek: Levi tate puanin adia kongkhak ngakmite ahi uhi.
Sallum Kore tapa, Ebiasaph tapa, Korah tapa, a unaute, a pa inkawte a, Korah mite, nasepna thilhihna a heutu ahi ua, biakbuk kongpite ngakmite: a pipute uh
Phinehas Eleazar tapa hun paisa ah amaute tung a vaihawmpa ahi a, a kiang ah
Zekariah Meselemiah tapa kihoupihna puanin kongkhak ngakpa ahi.
Hiaite tengteng kongpite kongkhak ngakmite hidia telte za nih leh sawmlehnih ahi uh. Hiaite a khuate ua khangthu a sim ahi ua, a sepding uh bawlsa a David leh zawlnei Samuel in a hihkipsa ahi uhi.
Huchi in amau leh a tate un
A pang lite ah, suahlam, tumlam, mallam, simlam ah kongkhak ngakmite a om uhi.
A unaute uh, a kallak lak in ni sagihnite teng in amau kiang a om ding in a hongpai zel ding uh ahi:
Kongkhak ngakpipen lite lah, Levi mite, sepding sehsa a om ahi ua, Pathian insung a dantante leh sumkoihnate tung ah heutu ahi uhi.
Huailai a thupiak amau tung a a om ziak in, Pathian inn kimvel ah a giak ua, zingsang teng in huai hon ding amau nasep ahi.
Huan a lak ua kuate hiam in nasepna tuiumbel suante a kem ua; kikou a laklut in a om ua, kikou a lakkhiak in a om uhi.
A lak ua khenkhatte vante, mun siangthoupen tuium-belsuan, tangbuang nelte, uainte, sathaute begaw leh gimnamtuite kem ding a seh ahi uhi.
Siampute tapate lak a a khente gimnamtuite toh hel a bawl uh.
Mattithiah, Levi mite, Korah mi Sallum ta masapen, lak a khat in belliangneite kan thilte tung a nasepna sehsa a nei hi.
A unaute uh lak a a khen, Kohath mite tapate’n tanghou a kem ua, khawlnite a bawl ding in.
Hiaite lasamite ahi ua, Levi mite inkawte pipute inkawte lupente, dantante sung ah a teng ua, sun leh zan in a nasepna ua zat in a om ua, nasepna dangte a kipan awl uhi.
A khang pumpite uah, hiaite Levi mite pipute inkawte lupente ahi uhi, mi pipente: hiaite Jerusalem ah a teng uhi.
Huan Gibeon ah Gibeon pa a teng a, Jehiel, a zi min Maakah:
A tapa masapen Abdon, Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab;
Gedor, Ahio, Zekariah, Mikloth.
Huan Mikloth in Simeam a suang a, huchi in amau leng a unaute utoh Jerusalem ah, a unaute uh zawn ah a teng uh.
Ner in Kish a suang a; Kish in Saul a suang; Saul in Jonathan, Malkisua, Abinadab leh Esbaal.
Jonathan tapa bel Merib baal ahi; Merib baal in Mikah a suang hi.
Huan Mikah tapate; Pithon, Melek, Tahrea leh Ahaz.
Ahaz in Jara a suang a; Jara in Alameth, Azmaveth leh Zimri a suang hi; Zimri in Moza a suang.
Moza in Binea a suang; Rephaiah a tapa, Eleasah a tapa, Azel a tapa:
Azel in tapa guk a nei a, a min uh hiaite ahi: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Seariah, Obadiah leh Hanan: hiaite Azel tapate ahi uh.
Philistia mite’n Israel a dou ua; huchi in Israel mite Philistia mite ma ah a taikek ua, Gilboa mual ah thahgam in a om uhi.
Philistia mite’n Saul leh a tapate a delh vengveng ua; Philistia mite’n Jonathan, Abinadab leh Malkisua, Saul tapate a that uhi.
Huchi in kidouna Saul ading in a haksa mahmahta a, thalkapmite’n amah a phata uhi; huan thalkapmite ziak in a lungkham mahmah hi.

Huchih lai in Saul in a galvan pawpa kiang ah, “Na namsau dok khia inla, huai in hondawt pailet in; huchilou in zaw hiai zeksumlouhte hongpai in bawllouh louh in a honbawl kha ding uh,” a chi a. Himahleh a galvan pawpa a utkei; a lau mahmah ngal a. Huaiziak in Saul in a namsau a la a, kisiatnan a neita hi.
A galvan pawpan Saul a sita chih a theih in, huai bangmah in aman leng a namsau kisiatna in a zang a, a sita hi.
Huchi in Saul a sita a, a tapa thumte; huan a inkawte tengteng leng a sikhawmvek uhi.
Guam a om Israel mite tengteng in Sepaihte taikek leh Saul leh a tapate a si uh chih a muh un a khopite uh a nusia ua, a taikekta uhi; Philistia mite a hong ua huaite ah a tengta uhi.
A zingsang in hichi ahi, thahsate puante suah ding a Philistia mite a hong pailai un, Gilboa mual ah Saul leh a tapate a puk uh chih a mu uhi.
Huan amah vante a suah ua, a lutang a la ua, a galvan leng, a milimte uh kiang leh mite kiang ah tanchin puak ding in Philistia mite gamsung ah a khak kimvel vek uhi.
Huchi in a galvan a pathiante uh inn ah a koih ua, Dagon biakin ah a lutang a tak uhi.
Jabesh-gilead tengteng in Saul tung a Philistia mite thilhih tengteng a zak un,
Mi hangsante tengteng a thou ua, Saul luang leh, a tapate luang a vala mang ua, Jabesh ah a honpua ua, Jabesh a tosaw sing nuai ah a guhte uh a vui ua, ni sagih an a ngawl uhi.
Huchi in
Huai a thukan a,
Huchi in Israel tengteng Hebron ah David kiang ah a hong kikhawm ua, “Ngai in, na guh leh na sa ka hi uh.
Tuma lam in, Saul mahmah kumpipa a hihlai in, Israel pikhia a pilut nang na hi a;
Huchi in Israel Upa tengteng Hebron ah kumpipa kiang ah a hongpai ua; huan David in Hebron ah
David leh Israel tengteng Jerusalem, huai mah Jebus ahi, ah a hoh ua; huchi in Jebus mite, huai gam a tengte, huai ah a om uhi.
Huchi in Jebus a tengte’n David kiang ah, “Hiai lam a na honglouh ding ahi” a chi ua. himahleh David in Zion kulh muanhuai a la a; huai mah David khopi ahi.
David in, “Kuapeuh Jebus mite that masapen pen a lianpen leh heutu ahi ding” a chi a. Huan Zeruiah tapa Joab a kuantou masapen a, huchi in amah a lianpen a bawl in a omta hi.
David bel kulh muanhuai ah a teng a; huaiziak in David khopi a chi uhi.
Huchi in khopi a bawlsuak vek a, Millo kimvel a kipan nasan in: huchi in Joab in khopi dang a bawlpha vek hi.
David bel a hongthupi semsem a; sepaihte
Hiaite David neih mi hatte lak a a pipente ahi uh, Israel tungtang a
Hiai David in a neih mi hatte zah ahi: Jasobeam, Hakmon mi tapa, sawmthumte lak a pipen; za thumte dou ding in a teipi a lek a khatvei thu in amaute a that hi.
Amah nung in Dodo tapa Eleazar, Ahoh mi, mi hat thumte lak a khat ahi hi.
Pasdammim ah David kiang ah a om a, huai ah kidou tum in Philistia mite a kikhawm ua, barli buh a dimna mun ah; Philistia mite ma a kipan in mite a taikekta uhi.
Huchi in huai mun laitak ah ading ua, a hum ua, Philistia mite a that uhi;
Heutu lian sawmthumte lak a thum suangpi a David kiang ah, Adullam kawkhuk ah a hohsuk uhi; Philistia mite tampite’n Rephaim phaizang ah puanin a kai uhi.
Huailai in David bel kawhawm sung ah a om a, Philistia mite kulhpi bel Bethlehem ah a om hi,
Huchi in David in tui a lunggulh a, “Aw kongpi kiang a om, Bethlehem tuileh tui dawn ding a hongpia mi khat om leh chi nang e!” a chi hi.
Huai thumte’n Philistia mite tampi lak a phu paisuak ua, kongpi kiang a om, Bethlehem tuileh a kipan tui a vatawi ua, a honla ua, David kiang a hontun uhi: himahleh David in a dawn nuam kei a,

“Hiai ka hih, ka Pathian in honphal kei hen: a hinna uh lauhuaina a koih hiai mite sisan ka dawn ding hia? Amau lah a hinna uh lauthawnna toh in a hontawi uh ahi ngal ua” a chi hi. Huaiziak in a dawn nuamta kei hi. Hiai thilte huai mi hat thumte’n a hih uhi.
Abisai, Joab unaupa, huai thumte lak a khat ahi: aman za thumte dou ding in a teipi a lik a amau a that a, mi thumte lak ah min a neita hi.
Thumte lak ah, nihte sang in, amah a zahtakhuai zaw hi huchi in a heutupa ding ua bawl in a om hi: hitamahleh thum masate zaw a pha kei hi.
Benaiah Jehoiada tapa, Kabzeel a mi hangsan, thilhih thupite hihpa tapa, Moab a Ariel tapate nihte a that a: a paisuk lai a, vuk kiak lai in kawkhuk lak ah humpinelkai a that hi.

Aigupta mi a that a, mi lian mahmah, tong nga a sang; huan Aigupta mi khut a a teipi siamganmi chiam bang ahi; huchi in a kiang ah chiang toh a hohsuk a, Aigupta mi khut a kipan teipi a la a, amah mah teipi in a hihlumta hi.
Hiai thilte Benaiah Jehoiada tapa in a hih a, huchi in huai mihat thumte lak ah min a nei hi.
Ngai in, sawmthumte sang in zahtakhuai zaw in a om a, himahleh thum masate zaw a pha kei hi: huchi in David in a galvil heutu in amah a koih hi.
Sepaih pawlte a mi hatte:
Asahel, Joab unaupa,
Elhanan Bethlehem a Dodo tapa;
Sammoth Haror mi, Helez Pelon mi;
Ira Tekoa mi Ikkes tapa,
Abiezer Antoth mi;
Sibbekai Husat mi, Ilai Ahoh mi;
Maharai Netophath mi,
Heled Netophath mi Baanah tapa;
Ithai Benjamin tate
Gibeah a Ribai tapa,
Benaiah Pirathon mi;
Hurai Gaash luitate a,
Abiel Arbath mi;
Azmaveth Baharum mi,
Eliahba Saalbon mi;
Gizon mi Hasem tapate,
Jonathan Sage Harar mi tapa;
Harar mi Sakar tapa Ahiam,
Ur tapa Eliphal;
Hepher Mekerath mi,
Ahijah Pelon mi;
Hezro Karmel mi,
Naarai Ezbai tapa;
Joel Nahtan unaupa,
Mibhar Hageri tapa;
Ammon mi Zelek,
Beroth mi Naharai,
Joab galvan pawmi Zeruiah tapa;
Ira Ithri mi, Gareb Ithri mi;
Uriah Hit mi, Zabad Ahlai tapa;
Adina Reuben mi Siza tapa,
Reuben mite lak a pipen leh a kiang a sawmthumte;
Hanan Maakah tapa,
Josaphat Mithni mi;
Uzzia Asterath mi, Shama leh
Jehiel Aroer mi Hotham tapate;
Jediael Simri tapa,
Joha a unaupa, Tiz mi;
Eliel Mahavi mi, Jeribai, Josaviah,
Elnaam tapate, Ithmah Moab mi;
Eliel, Obed, leh Jasiel Mezob mi.
Huchi in hiaite Kish tapa Saul ziak a a ki hepmang lai a Ziklag a David kiang a hongpaite ahi uh: huchi in kidouna a amah panpihmite mi hatte lak ah a om uhi.
Thalte in a kigalvan ua, suangkap leh thalpeu a thalkap ah khut taklam leh veilam a zangthei ua; amaute Saul unau, Benjamin a kipan ahi uhi.
A pipen Ahiezer ahi, huan Joash, Gibeah mi Semah tapate;
Azmaveth tate Jeziel leh Pelet;
Berkah, Antoth mi Jehu;
Gibeon mi Esmaiah, sawmthumte lak a mi hat, sawmthumte tung ah; Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan leh Geerath mi Jozabad;
Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Semariah, Sephatiah Haruph mi;
Elkanah, Jesiah, Azarel, Joezer, Jasobeam, Korahith mi;
Joelah, Zebadiah, Gedor a Jeroham tapate. Gad nam a kipan
Gad mite ahihleh gamdai a kulh ah David lam ah a kituamseh ua, mi hangsan, kidouna adia chilsa, lum leh teipi khoih theite; a maitang uh humpinelkaite maitang bang a, mual a sazate bang a kin;
Ezer a pipen, Obadiah a zom, Eliab a thumna;
Mismannah a lina, Jeremiah a ngana;
Attai a gukna, Eliel a sagihna;
Johanan a giatna, Elzabad a kuan a;
Jeremiah a sawmna, Makbannai a sawmlehkhatna.
Hiai Gad tapate lak a te sepaihte heutute ahi uh: a neupen za khat toh a kikim a, a lianpen pen sang khat toh.
Hiaite Jordan lui piaute tui in a tuplai a, kha khatna a kan a paite ahi ua; huchi in phaizang a om tengteng, suahlam leh tumlam tuaktuak, delhzakte ahi uhi.
Benjamin leh Judah tate lak a mi, kulh ah David kiang ah a hong ua.

Huchi in amaute tuak ding in David a paikhia a, amaute kiang ah, “Hon panpih dia lemna deih a ka kiang a hong na hih ua leh, nou adin ka lungtang phankhawm ahi ding; himahleh ka khut ah bangmah hiamgamna a omkei chih thei a, ka galte adia kei honman ding a hongpai na hih uleh, ka pipute uh Pathian in huai en henla, sal hen” a chi hi.
Huailai in sawmthumte lak a pipenpa, Amasai tung ah kha a hongtung a,
“Nang David, Jesse tapa,
nang a, nang lam a pang ka hi uh: muanna,
na kiang ah om henla,
nang hon panpihmite kiang ah muanna:
na Pathian in lah nang a hon panpih ngal a,” a chi hi.
Huailai in David in amaute a na kipahpih a, pawl heutute ding in a bawlta hi.

Manasseh a kipan in leng khenkhatte, kidouna a Saul dou ding a Philistia mite toh a hongpai in David lam ah a pukmang uhi; himahleh amau amaute a panpih kei uh: Philistia mite toupate’n thuhilh in amah a sawlmang ngal ua, i lupente uh lauthawnghuaina ding in Saul, heutupa lam ah a pukmang ding, chi in.
David Ziklag a a hoh in, Manasseh a kipan amah lam ah hong puklut a om ua, Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Mikael, Jozabad, Elihu, Zilthai, Manasseh a kipan sangte heutute ahi uhi.
Huan galguk bawlte dou ding in David a panpih uh: amau lah mihat hangsante leh sepaih lak a heutute ahi ngal ua.
Sepaih pawl thupi, Pathian sepaih pawl bang a hong hih masiah uh niteng in David kiang ah amah panpih ding in a hong paikhawm uhi.
Hiaite
Judah tate lum leh teipi tawi theite sang guk leh za giat, kidou ding a kigalvan.
Simeon tate ah kidouna ding a, mihat hangsante, sang sagih leh za khat.
Levi tate ah sang li leh za guk.
Jehoiada bel Aron inkawte pipa ahi a, amah toh sang thum leh za sagih a om uhi;
Tangval hat hangsan, Zadok, leh a pa inkawte heutu sawmnih leh nih.
Benjamin tate, Saul unaute, sang thum: amaute lak a thupipen pente’n Saul inkawte lam ah a ginom lailai uhi.
Ephraim tate ah sing nih leh za giat, mihat hangsan, a pipute uh inkawte a mi minthangte.
Manasseh nam kimkhatte sing khat leh sang giat, hong a, David kumpipa a bawl dia, min a genkhiakte,
Issakar tate, hunte theihsiamna nei mite, Israel in bang a hihdia chih thei ding; amaute lupente za nih ahi uh; huan a unaute tengteng uh amau thupiak in a om uhi.
Zebulun a kipan, sepaih pawl kuankhe theite bang, kidouna van chichih toh a, kidouna bawl a thupethei sing nga; kidouna bawl a thupe thei, lungsim thuah nih neilou mite.
Naphtali a kipan heutu sang khat, amaute kiang ah lum leh teipi tawi sing thum leh sang sagih.
Dan mite kidouna a thupethei, sing nih leh sang giat leh za guk.
Asher a kipan, sepaih pawl a kuankhe thei, kidouna a thupe thei, sing li.
Jordan lehlam gal ah, Reuben mite leh, Gad mite, leh Manasseh nam kimkhatte a kipan, kidouna ading a kidouna vanzat chichih toh nuai khat leh sing nih.

Hiaite tengteng, kidou mi ngen hi in, kidouna thupe thei, lungtang hoihkim toh Hebron ah David Israel tengteng tung a kumpipa dia bawl ding in a hongpai ua: David kumpipa a bawl ding in Israel dang tengteng in lungkhat a pu chiat uhi.
Huchi in huai ah David kiang a, ne leh dawn in, ni thum a om uh: a unaute un lah amau ading in kisakna a bawl ngal ua.

Huai ban ah Issakar, Zebulun leh Naphtali tanpha a teng amau kiang nai a omte’n, sabiltungte leh sangawngsaute leh sakol neute leh bawngtalte in tanghou a honpua ua, annek ding, theipi gah beute, grep min bomte, uain leh sathau, a tam a tam bawngtalte leh belamte: Israel nopsakna thupi ahi.
Huchi in David in heutu leh makai chiteng, sangte leh zate heutute toh thu a kikum uhi.
David in Israel kikhawmte tengteng kiang ah, “Hoih na sak ua,
Huchi in i Pathian uh bawm i lakik nawn ding uhi: Saul hun lai in i na zong kei uhi” a chi hi.
Kikhawmpi tengteng in huchibang in i hih ding uh a chi ua: mi tengteng mit ah huai thildik ahi ngal a.
Huchi in David in Israel tengteng Aigupta gam luita Sihor a kipan Hamath lutna chiangpha in, Kiriath-jearim a kipan a Pathian bawm vala ding in a mite a kaikhawm hi.
Huchi in David, Israel tengteng toh, Baalah huaibel, Kiriath-jearim ah ahi, huaibel Judah gam ahi a, huai a kipan a Pathian,
Pathian bawm kangtalai thak in a pua ua, Abinadab inn a kipan a lakhia ua: huchi in Uzza leh Ahio in a hawl uhi.
Huchi in David leh Israel tengteng Pathian ma ah a hatna tengteng un late, kaihgingte, pekging guisawm neite, khuangtate, dakkhutbette leh pengkulte toh lopna bawl in a om uhi.
Huan Chidon buhchilna phual a hongtun un, bawngtalte a kisuih man un, Uzza in bawm len ding in a khut in a sawk hi;
Uzza tung ah
Uzza tung a a puahkhap ziak in, David a lungkimkei hi: huchi in huailai tunitan in, Perez-uzzah a chita hi.
Huai ni’n David in Pathian a kihta a, bangchi’n Pathian bawm in ka kitun thei dia? chi in.
Huchi in aman a kiang a, David khopi sung ah bawm a pawlut kei a, Git mi Obed-edom inn sung ah a pawlut zawta hi.
Pathian bawm bel kha thum Obed-edom inkawte kiang ah inn sung ah a om a: huchi in
Huchi in Tura kumpipa Hiram in David kiang ah sawltak mite a sawl a, sidar singte, suangsekmite, khutsiammite, inn lamsak ding in.
David in Israel tung ah
David in Jerusalem ah zite tamsem a pi a: huchi in David in tapate leh tanute tamsem a suangta hi.
Hiaite Jerusalem a a neih tate minte ahi; Sammua, Sobab, Nathan, Solomon;
Ibhar, Elisua, Elpalet;
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia;
Elisama, Beeliada, Eliphalet.

Philistia mite’n David Israel tengteng tung ah kumpipa a thaunilh ahi chih a zak un, David zong ding in Philistia mite tengteng a kuantou ua: David in huai a zak in, amaute dou ding in a kuankheta hi.
Philistia mite a hong ua, Rephaim phaizang a tuam uhi.
Huchi in David in Pathian a dong a, “Philistia mite dou ding in ka kuantou diam? Amau ka khut ah na honpe diam?” chi in.

Huchi in Baal-perazim ah a hongtou ua, David in amau a that a; huchi in David in, “Pathian in tuikhah bang in ka khut in ka melmate a hihsia” a chi a. Huaiziak in huai mun min ding in Baal-perazim a sa hi.
Huai ah a pathiante uh a nusia ua; David in thupiak a pia a, mei in a hal uhi.
Huchih nung in Philistiate’n phaizang a tuam nawnlai uhi.
David in Pathian thu a dong nawn a; Pathian in a kiang ah, “Amau delh ding in na kuantou kei ding: amau kihei mangsan inla, singtheimi singte zawntak ah amau sual in” a chi hi.
“Singtheimi singte dawn a taiging na zak chiang in; huaichiang in kidou ding in na kuankhe ding hi: Philistia mihonte that ding in na ma ah Pathian a kuankheta chihna ahi ding hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Pathian in amah thu a piak bang in David in a hih a: Gibeon a kipan Gezer pha in Philistia mihonpi a thatta uhi.
Huan David min, gam tengteng ah a thangkheta a; huchi in
Huchi in David khopi sung ah David in innte a kibawl a; Pathian bawm ading in mun a bawl a, puanin a kaihsakta hi.
Huailai in David in, Levi mite chihlouh kuamah in Pathian bawm a paw ding ahi kei:
A mun a bawlsaksa a
Huchi in David in Aron tapate leh Levi mite a khawm a:
Kohath tapate lak ah; Uriel a pipen leh a unaute za leh sawmnih:
Merrari tapate lak ah; Asaiah a pipen leh a unaute za nih leh sawmnih:
Gershom tapate lak ah: Joel a pipen leh a unaute za leh sawmthum:
Elizaphan tapate lak ah; Semaiah a pipen leh a unaute za nih:
Hebron tapate lak ah; Eliel a pipen leh a unaute sawmgiat:
