Uzziel tapate lak ah; Amminadab a pipen leh a unaute za leh sawmlehnih.
David in Zadok leh Abiathar siampute, Levi mite, Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Semaiah, Eliel, leh Amminadab a samsaka,
A kiang uah, “Noute Levi mite pipute inkawte lupente na hi ua: kihihsiang unla, nou leh na unaute uh, mun ka bawlsak sa a Israel Pathian,
A masapen a na puaklouh ziak un,
Huchi in siampute leh Levi mite, Israel Pathian,
Huchi in Toupa thu bangbang a Mosi in thu a piak bang in Levi tate’n a liangzang uah huai a chiangtawnte in Pathian bawm a zawngta uhi.
David in Levi mi pipente kiang ah a unaute uh lasamite tumging theihte toh, pekging guisawm neite leh kaihgingte leh dakkhutbette, ngaihtak a ging leh nuamsa a aw suah ding sepding in a hilh hi.
Huchi in Levi mite’n Joel tapa Heman a sep ua; a unaute lak ah, Asaph Berekiah tapa; huan Merari tapate a unaute uh lak ah, Kusaiah tapa Ethan;
Amau toh a unaute uh pawl nihnate, Zekariah, Ben, Jaaziel, Semiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah, Obed-edom, Jeiel, kongkhak ngakmite.
Huchi in lasamite, Heman, Asaph, Ethen te seh in a omta ua, ngaihtak a tum ding, dal dakkhutbette toh;
Zekariah, Aziel, Semiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseiah, Benaiah, pekging guisawm neite Alamoth toh kituak a bawl toh;
Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mineiah, Obed-edom, Jeiel, Azaziah, kaihgingte Seminith toh bawl, makai ding in.

Huan hichi ahi a, David a inn a a omlai in zawlnei Nathan kiang ah David in, “Ngai in, kei sidar sing inn ah ka om a, himahleh

Huai zan mah in hichi ahi a, Nathan kiang ah Pathian thu a hongtung hi:
“Ka sikha David vahilh in:
Israel suante Aigupta gam a kipan ka pikhiak a kipan tutan in inn lam ah ka omkei a; puanin leh biakbuk ah ka om zel hi.

Na paina peuhmah ah na kiang ah ka om zel a, na melmate k’on hih mansak zel hi; lei a mi thupi mahmahte bang in min thupitak k’on bawlsak sin hi.
Ka mi Israelte ading in mun ka sep ding a, kisuan nawn lou a amau tuam mun a a om gige theihna ding un amau ka phut ding hi;
Tuma a ka mi Israelte tung a vaihawmmite ka sehlai a thulimlouhna tate’n a hihsek bang un a hihgenthei n’on sam kei ding uh; na melma tengteng leng ka zahlaksak lai ding hi. Huailou leng
Huchi in na ni a bei a, na pi leh pute kiang a na pai hun chiang in, hichi ahi ding a, nanung a na suan, na tate lak a mi ka tungding ding a; a gam ka hihkip ding hi.

Ka inn ah leh ka gam ah amah tangtawn in ka ding kip sak ding a, a mangtutphah tangtawn a hihkip ahi ding hi, chi in.
Huai thute tengteng leh huai kilakna bang geih in Nathan in David kiang ah a gen hi.

Huai nung in hichi ahi a, David in Philistia mite a sual a, a zou a, Gath khua leh a khopelte Philistia mite a suhsak hi.
Moabte a sual nawn a, Moab mite David sikhate a hong hita ua, siah a pe zel uhi.
Euphrates lui a a gam kipsak ding a David a paikawm in Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer leng Hamath chin ah a sual nawn hi.

Huchi in David in kangtalai sang khat leh sakol tungtuangmi sang sagih leh sepaih sing nih a matsak a; David in kangtalai kaimi sakol tengteng a thagui a sattansak a, kangtalai za kai ding bel a hawi hi.
Huan Damaska a Suria mite Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer huh ding in a hong kuan ua, David in Suria mi sing nih leh sang nih a that hi.
Huchi in David in Damaska a Suria mite lak ah a sepaih a koih a; huchi in Suria mite David sikhate a hong hita ua, siah a pe zel uhi.
David in Hadadezer pawlte dangkaeng lumte a laksak a, Jerusalem ah a paipih hi.
Hadadezer khua Tibhath leh Chun a kipan David in dal tampi a pua a, huaite in Solomon in dal lohte, tunnate, dal tuium-belsuante a bawl hi.
Huchi in Hamath kumpipa Tou in Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer sepaih tengteng David in a zou chih a zak in.

Hadadezer a sim a, a thah ziak a chibai buk ding leh kipahpih ding in a tapa Hadoram David kiang ah a sawl a; Hadadezer leh Tou te lah kidou sek ahi ngal ua; dangkaeng leh dangka sik leh dal tuium-belsuan chichih leng a tawisak lai hi.
Huaite leng gamdang a zoh tengteng a dangka sik leh dangkaeng a lakte toh David in
Huailou leng, Zeruiah tapa Abisai in Edomte sing khat leh sang giat Chi guam ah a that hi.
Edom gam ah sepaihte a koih a; huchi in Edom mi tengteng David sikhate a hong hita uh.
Huchi in David in Israel mi tengteng tung ah vai a hawm a; a mi tengteng tung ah diktattak in vai a hawm hi.
Zeruiah tapa Joab bel sepaih heutu pen ahi a; Ahilud tapa Jehosaphat bel tanchin gelhpa ahi.
Ahitub tapa Zadok leh Abiathar tapa Abimelek bel siampu ahi ua, huan Savsa bel Laigelhmi ahi a;
Jehoiada tapa Benaiah bel Kereth mi leh Pelet mite heutu ahi a, David tapate bel kumpipa kim a heutulian ahi uhi.
Huan, huai nung in hichi ahi a, Ammon suante kumpipa Nahash a si a, a tapa in a sik in vai a hawm hi.

David in, “A pa’n hon na hehpih zel ziak in ken leng Nahash tapa Hanun ka hehpih sam ding” a chi a. Huchi in David in a pa tungtang thu a lungmuan ding in mite a sawl hi. Huan David mite Ammon suante gam ah Hanun kiang ah amah lungmuan ding in a vatung uhi.

Himahleh Ammon suan heutute’n Hanun kiang ah, “David in na pa a zahtak ziak a lungmuan ding mi na kiang a honsawl hi in na um ahia? A mite gam hihse ding a enchian leh enkhe ding a na kiang a hongpai ahi kha kei ding uam maw?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Hanun in David mite a man a, a khamul uh a metmai sak a, huan a puansilhte uh a laitak ah a tobou uh khuh pha minmen in a tansak a, a paisak ta hi.

Huchi in kuate hiam in a mite a na hih dan David a vahilh ua. Huan a dawn ding mi a sawl a; amau lah a zum mahmah ngal uhi. Kumpipa’n, “Na khamul uh sau nawn ma Jeriko ah om unla, huai zoh chiang in hongkik un” a chi hi.

Huchi in Ammon suante’n David zakdah lam a na hihta uh chih a kitheih un, Hanun leh Ammon suante’n Mesopotamia gam a mite, Suria maakah a mite, Zobah a mite, kangtalai leh sakol tungtuang mite goihna ding in dangkasik talent sang khat a khak uhi.

Huchi in kangtalai sing thum leh sang nih, Maakah kumpipa leh a mite toh a pi ua, Medeba kiang ah panmun a bawlta uhi. Ammon suante a khua ua kipan a pawtkhia ua, a ki kaikhawm ua, kidou ding in a kuanta uhi.
David in huai a zak in, Joab leh sepaih hangsante tengteng a sawlkhia hi.
Ammon suante a hong kuan ua, khopi kongpi chin ah a kiphalh ua, kumpipa amau thu a hong kuante a tuam in pawn ah a om uhi.
Huchi in a malam leh nunglam ah a honsual dek uh chih Joab in a theih in Israel mite lak a mi a hoihte a telkhia a, Suria mite sual ding in a ki zalh uhi.
Midang tengteng bel a unaupa Abisai khut ah a koihvek a. Ammon suante sual ding in amau leng a kizalh uhi.
Huchi in aman, “Suria mite ka zoh kei dek leh, hon panpih in; Ammon suante na zoh kei dek leh k’on panpih ding.
Hangsantak in om unla, i mite leh i Pathian khuate hum in i kipasal sak ding uh;
Huchi in Joab leh a kiang a mite’n kidouna mun a Suria mite a vanaih ua; huchi in a ma ah a taikekta uhi.
Ammon suante’n Suria mite a taikek uh chih a theih un amau leng a unaupa Abisai ma ah a taikek ta ua, khua ah a lut uhi. Huchi in Joab Jerusalem ah a paita hi.
Suria mite’n Israelte ma ah a pang theikei uh chih a na theih un, mi a sawl ua, Lui khenlam a Suria pawlte a sam khia ua, Hadadezer sepaih heutu Sophak bel a heutu pen uh ahi.
Huai thu David a hilh ua; aman Israel mi tengteng a samkhawm a, Jordan lui a kan ua, a vamu ua, sual ding in a kiphalh uhi. Huchi in Suriate kidoupih dia David a kisakkhit in amah a kidoupihta uhi.
Suria mite bel Israelte ma ah a taikek ua; David in Suria mi, kangtalai sang sagih tung a tuang leh sepaih sing li a that a, sepaih heutu Sophak leng a that hi.
Huchi in Hadadezer mite’n Israelte ma ah a pangthei takei uh chih a theih un, David toh kilemna a bawl ua, a sikhate ding in a omta uh; Suria mite’n leng Ammon suante a panpih nuamta kei uhi.

Huan hichi ahi a, kum a hong bei a kumpipate kidou ding a a kuankhiak lai un, Joab in a sepaih hatte a pikhia hi. Ammon suante gam a suhsak a, Rabah khua a um uh. David bel Jerusalem ah a om. Huan Joab in Rabah khua a sual a, a lata hi.
Huchi in David in a kumpipa uh lallukhu khuklai a laksak a, a gikdan dangkaeng talent khat ahi, suangmantamte leng a tel a; David a khusak ua; khopi a om gallak sum tampi a la hi.

Huchi in huailai a mipite bel a pikhia a, singatnate, leilehna sik zumte, heipite in na a semsak a. Huchibang in Ammon tate khopi tengteng David in a hih hi. David leh mi tengteng Jerusalem ah a pai nawnta uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, huai nung in, Philistia mite toh Gezer ah kidouna a om a; huchi in Husat mi Sibbekai in milian suante lak a mi Sippai a that a; huchi in a vuallelta uhi.
Philistia mite toh kidouna a om nawn a; Jair tapa Elhan in Git mi Goliath unaupa Lahmi a that a, a teikung chiampek bang ahi.
Gath khua ah kidouna a om nawn a, huai ah mi sang mahmah, a khut langtuak a khutzung guk, a khe langtuak a khezung guk, avek a sawmnih leh li nei a om a; amah leng miliante lak a khat ahi.
Aman Israel mite a simmawh a, David unau Simeah tapa Jonathan in a that hi.
Huaite Gath khua a milian lak a piang ahi uh; huaite David leh a mite khut ah a si uhi.
Huan Setan in Israelte a sual a, David bel Israelte sim utna a neisak hi.

Levi ta Gershon, Kahath, Merari zah in David in pawl a bawl a,
Gershon mite Ladan leh Shimei ahi uh.
Ladan tate pipente Jehiel, Setham, Joel, thum ahi uh.
Shimei tate Selomith, Haziel, Haran, thum ahi uh. Hiaite Ladan suan inkawte pipente ahi uh.
Shimei tate bel Jahath, Zina, Jeush, Beriah ahi uh. Hiai lite Shimei tate ahi uh.
Jahath a upapen ahi a, Zizah a sang ahi; Jeush leh Beriahte’n bel ta a hau kei ua; huaiziak in inkuan khat bang a sim ahi uh.
Kohath tate Amram, Izhar, Hebron, Uziel, li ahi uh.
Amram tate Aron leh Mosi ahi uh; Aron bel amah leh a suante tangtawn a ding a thil siangthoutakte hihsiangthoua, tangtawn a
Pathian mi Mosi bel, a tate Levi nam lak a sim ahi uh.
Mosi tate Gershom leh Eliezer ahi uh,
Gershomtate lak a upapen Sebuel ahi.
Eliezer tate lak a upapen Rehabiah ahi. Eliezer in tapa dang a neikei; Rehabiah in bel tapa tampi a nei.
Izhar tapate; Selmoth a pipen.
Hebron tate lak a pipen Jeriah ahi a, a sang Amariah, a sang nawn Jahaziel, a sang nawn Jekameam ahi.
Uziel tate lak a upa zaw Mikah ahi a, a sang Jesiah ahi.
Merari tate: Merari tate bel Mahli leh Musi ahi uh, Mahli tate, Eleazar leh Kish ahi uh.
Eleazar tapate neilou in a si a, tanute kia a nei a; Kish tapa a unaute un zi in a nei uh.
Musi tate Mahli, Eder, Jeremoth, thum ahi uh.
Huaite Levi suan, a inkuan uh bangzel a min gelha a sim uh inkuan pipen,

Levite’n leng biakbuk leh a nasepna ding tuium-belsuan tengteng a zon uh a kiphamohta kei hi” a chi hi.
David thupiak nanung ziak in Levite kum sawmnih a kipan a tunglam tan in sim ngal ahi uhi.

Tanghou koih dingte, tangbuang thillat ding a tangbuang nel mahmah, silngou hellouh tanghoupek hiam, bel a uk hiam, kan hiam, a teh leh a letdan bangteng ding bawlte toh;

Aron tapate pawl khen dan hichibang ahi, Aron tapate Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar ahi uh.
Nadab leh Abihu bel a pa uh sang in a si masa ua; ta a neikei uh; huaiziak in Eleazar leh Ithamarte’n siampu na a sem uhi.
David in Eleazar tapa Zadok leh Ithamar tapa Ahimelekte toh a nasep dan ding uh a hawmsak hi.
Ithamar suante sang in Eleazar suan pipen a pang a tamzaw uh; hichibang in a khen uh; Eleazar suan ah, inkuan pipen sawmlehguk ahi ua; Ithamar suan ah, inkuan pipen giat ahi uh.
Eleazar suan a mi leh Ithamar suan a mite lak ah, Mun Siangthou a miliante leh Pathian miliante a om tuaktuak uh ahihman in aisan in, amaute a khen uhi.

Huan Levi mi, Laigelhmi Nethaneel tapa Semaiah in kumpipa, milian, siampu Zadok, Abiathar tapa Ahimelek, siampute leh Levite inkaw pipente mitmuh in a gelh a; inkuan pipa khat tan Eleazar tung ah a puk a, khat bel Ithamar tung ah a puk hi.
Huchi in aisan khatveina bel Jehoarib tung ah a puk a, nihveina Jedaiah tung ah;
Thumveina Harim tung ah, liveina Seorim tung ah;
Ngaveina Makijah tung ah, gukveina Mijamin tung ah;
Sagihveina Hakoz tung ah, giatveina Abijah tung ah;
Kuaveina Jeshua tung ah, sawmveina Sekaniah tung ah;
Sawmlehkhatveina Eliasib tung ah, sawmlehnihveina Jakim tung ah;
Sawmlehthumveina Hupah tung ah, sawmlehli veina Jesebeab tung ah;
Sawmlehngaveina Bilgah tung ah, sawmlehgukveina Immer tung ah;
Sawmlehsagih veina Hezir tung ah, sawmlehgiatveina Apzes tung ah;
Sawmlehkuaveina Pethahiah tung ah, sawmnih veina Jehezekel tung ah;
Sawmnih leh khatveina Jakin tung ah, sawmnih leh nihveina Gamul tung ah;
Sawmnih leh thumveina Delaiah tung ah, sawmnih leh liveina Maaziah tung ah.
Huai bel
Levi suan dangte lak ah; Amram tate lak ah Subael ahi; Subael tate lak ah Jedeiah.
Rehabiah lam ah; Rehabaihte lak ah pipen Isshiah.
Izharte lak ah Selomoth; Selomoth tapate lak ah Jahath,
Hebron tapate, a upapen Jeriah ahi a, a sang Amariah, a sang nawn Jahaziel, a sang nawn Jokameam ahi.
Uziel tapate lak a mi Mikah; Mikah tapate lak a mi Samir ahi.
Mikah unaupa Isshiah ahi a; Isshiah tapate lak ah, Zekariah.
Merari tapate bel Mahli leh Musi ahi ua; Jaaziah tapate lak a mi Beno ahi.
Merari suante, Jaaziah lak ah Beno, Soham, Zakur leh Ibrite ahi uh.
Mahli lak ah, Eleazar ahi a, aman tapa a neikei.
Kish lak ah, Kish tapa Jerameel ahi.
Musi suante bel, Mahli, Ede leh Jerimothte ahi uh. Hiaite bel Levite suante lak a a inkuan ua pipente ahi uhi.
Hiai inkuan chih a lianpen leh naupangpen te’n leng Aron ta a unaute uh bang in, a gam tanding uh, kumpipa David, Zadok, Ahimelek, siampu leh Levite inkaw pipente mitmuh in ai a san sam uhi.

Huan Asaph, Heman, Jeduthun tapa khenkhat kaihgingte, pekgingte, dakkhutbette toh a lavek a nasemmi ding in David leh sepaih heutute’n a hihtuam ua; nasep ding omdan bangzel in nasemmite tamdan ding a sep uhi;
Asaph tapate lak a mi Zakur, Joseph, Nethaniah leh Asarelah ahi ua, amau bel Asaph tapate, kumpipa thupiak bang a lavek zel. Asaph thuthu a om ahi uhi.
Jeduthun lak ah; Jeduthun ta Gedaliah, Zeri, Jesaiah, Simei; Hasabiah leh Matithiahte, guk ahi uh; kaihging toh
Heman lak ah; Heman ta Bukiah, Mataniah, Uziel, Sebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanni, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamtiezer, Josbekasah, Malothi, Hothir leh Mahziothte ahi uhi;
Huaite tengteng Pathian lam thu a kumpipa zawlnei Heman ta pengkulkawi mutmi dingte ahi uhi. Pathian in Heman tapa sawmlehli leh tanu thum a pia.
Huaite tengteng
A tamlam uh, a unau,
Huan a neu a lian, sinsakmi leh sinmi in a tan ding uh kibangsap in ai a san uhi.
Huchi in aisan khatveina Asaph tapa Joseph tung ah a puk a; nihveina Gedaliah tung ah; amah leh a unaute leh a tapate sawmlehnih ahi uhi.
Thumveina bel Zakur tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih ahi uh.
Liveina Izri tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih ahi uhi.
Ngaveina Nethaniah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Gukveina Bukiah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sagihveina Jesarelah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Giatveina bel Jesaiah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Kuaveina bel Mataniah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmveina Shimei tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehkhatveina Azarel tung ah, a tapa leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehnihveina Hasabiah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehthumveina Subael tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehliveina Matithiah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehngaveina Jeremoth tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehgukveina Hananiah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehsagihveina Josbekasah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehgiatveina Hananiah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmlehkuaveina Malothi tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmnihveina Eliathah tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmnih leh khatveina Hothir tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmnih leh nihveina Giddalti tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih
Sawmnih leh thumveina Mahazioth tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih.
Sawmnih leh liveina Romamtiezer tung ah, a tapate leh a unaute sawmlehnih ahi uhi.
Kongkhak ngak pawl khen dan: Kora mi bel Asaph tapate lak a Kora tapa Meselemiah ahi a.
Huan Meselemiah in tapate a nei a; a ta masa Zekariah ahi a, a zom Jediael, a thumna Zebadiah, a lina Jathniel;
A ngana Elam, a gukna Jehohanan, a sagihna Elioenai ahi.
Obed-edom in tapate a nei a; a ta chil Semaiah ahi a, a zom Jehozabad, a thumna Joah, a lina Sakar, a ngana Nethaneel.
A gukna Amiel, a sagihna Issakar, a giatna Peulethai ahi, amah bel Pathian in a vualzawl hi.
A tapa Semaiah a kipan tapa, a inkawte uh pipente leng a piang ua; mi hat hangsan ahi chiat uh.
Semaiah tapate Othni, Rephael, Obed leh Elzabadte ahi ua, a unau uh Elihu leh Semakiah bel mi hat mahmah ahi uh.
Huaite tengteng Obed-edom suante ahi uh: amau leh a tapate uh leh a unaute uh nasepna lamsang ah mi piching ahi uh; Obed-edom a kipan mite sawmguk leh nih ahi uhi.
Meselemiah in tapa leh unau mi hat mahmah sawmlehgiat a nei.
Merari suante lak a Hosah in leng tapate a nei a; Simri bel a pipen ahi a, ta chil ahi kei na a, a pa’n pipen in a bawl hi;
A zom in Hilkiah ahi a, a thumna Tebaliah, a lina Zekariah ahi. Hosah tapate leh a unaute avek un sawmlehthum ahi uh.
Huai pipente lak a mi a unaute uh bang a
A neu a lian in, a inkaw dungzui zelun kongpi chih a om ding zonna ding in ai a san uhi.
Huchi in suahlam adia aisan pen Selemiah tung ah a puk hi. Vaihawmmi piltak, a tapa Zekariah adin ai a san ua, mallam pen amah a tuamin apuk hi.
Simlam bel Obed-edom tuam in; a tapate tuamin Asuppim.
Tumlama toupaina lampi a Saleketh kongkhak venna toh, Suppim leh Hosah tuamin.
Suahlam ah Levite guk a om ua, niteng in mallam ah li, simlam ah li, thil koihkhawmna in ah nih tuaktuak.
Tumlam in umsung ading in a lutna ah li; in umsung ah nih.
Huaite ahi uh, Kora tapate leh Merari mi tapate kongkhak ngakmi pawl a khente uh.
Huan a unaute uh Levite lak ah Ahijah Pathian sum koih khawmna inn leh thil siangthou koihkhawmna inn heutu ahi.
Ladan tapate; Gershon mite tapate Ladante a te, pipute inkawte a pipen Gershon mi Ladan a te; Jehieli.
Jehieli tapate; Zetham, Joel a unaupa,
Amram mite a kipan, Izhar mite a kipan, Hebron mite a kipan, Uzziel mite a kipan:
Sebuel Gershomtapa, Mosi tapa, sum koihkhawmna heutu ahi hi.
A unaute bel Eliezer tapa Rahabiah, Jesaiah, Joram, Zikri leh Selomithte ahi.
Selomith leh a unaute bel kumpipa David leh a inkawte uh pipen sepaih sang heutute leh za heutute leh sepaih pawl heutute’n a hih siangthousa uh, thil siangthou koihkhawmna in tengteng kemte ahi uhi.
Kidouna gallak thilte
Zawlnei Samuel, Kish tapa Saul, Ner tapa Abner leh Zeruiah tapa Joabte’n a hih siangthou tengteng uh, kuapeuh in thil a hih siangthousa peuhmah uh Selomith leh a unaute kep vek ahi.
Izhar mi Kenaniah leh a tapate Israel gam pawlam tungtang thu a heutute leh vaihawmmi ahi uh.
Hebron mi Hasabiah leh a unau mi hangsan sang khat leh za sagih Jordan gal tumlam a Israelte ukpa ahi uhi;
Hebron mi Jerijah bel a suan uh tungtang thu a inkaw pipen lam ah Hebronte pipa pen ahi. David kum sawmli a vaihawm kum a a zon un Gilead gam a Jazer khua ah mi hat hangsan a mukhia uhi.

A unau mi hangsante sang nih leh za sagih ahi uhi. Huaite inkuan pipen, kumpipa David in Pathian lam thil chiteng leh kumpipa na lam thu a Reuben, Gad leh Manassehte nam kimkhatte heutu dia bawlte ahi uh.
Israelte a tamdan uh inkuan pipente, sepaih sang heutute, za heutute leh kumpipa nasemmite tengteng kum khat sung a kha chih a kikheng zelzel, pawl chih a mi sing nih leh sang li ahi uhi.
Pawl khatna kha khatna a heutu Jebdiel tapa Jasobeam ahi a, pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Amah Perez suan a mi, kha khatna a sepaih heutu tengteng heutu pen ahi.
Kha nihna pawl heutu Ahoh mi Dodai ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha thumna a sepaihte heutu pen siampu Jehoiada tapa Benaiah ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Hiai Benaiah ahi a, sawmthum lak a mi hangsan, sawmthum tung a mi pen; a pawl ah a tapa Amizabad a tel hi.
Kha lina a sepaih heutu Joab unaupa Asahel ahi a, a tapa Zebadiah a sik a pang ahi, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha ngana sepaih heutu Izrah mi Samhut ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha gukna a sepaih heutu Tekoa mi, Ikkes tapa Ira ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha sagihna a sepaih heutu Ephraim suan Pelon mi Helez ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha giatna a sepaih heutu Zerah suan, Husat mi Sibbekai ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha kua na a sepaih heutu Benjamin suan Anathoth mi Abiezer ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha sawmna a sepaih heutu Zerah suan Netophath mi Maharai ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih sang li a om uh.
Kha sawmlehkhatna a sepaih heutu Ephraim suan Pirathon mi Benaiah ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih leh sang li a om uh.
Kha sawmlehnihna a sepaih heutu Othniel suan Netophath mi Heldai ahi a, a pawl ah sing nih sang li a om uh.
Huailou leng, Israel namte tung a:
Reubente lak a Zikri tapa
Eliezer vaihawmpa ahi a,
Simeonte lak ah Maakah tapa
Sephatiah ahi;
Levite lak ah Kumuel tapa,
Hasabiah;
Aron te lak ah Zadok;
Judate lak ah David
unaute lak ah Elihu,
Issakarte lak ah Mikael tapa Omri;
Zebulunte lak ah
Obadiah tapa Ishmaiah;
Naphtalite lak ah Azriel tapa Jeremoth;
Ephraim suante lak ah
Azaziah tapa Hosea;
Manasseh nam kimkhatte lak ah
Pedaiah tapa Joel.
Gilead gam a Manasseh
nam kimkhatte lak ah,
Zekariah tapa Ido;
Benjaminte lak ah
Abner tapa Jaasiel;
Dante lak ah Jeroham
tapa Azariel.
Huai te Israel nam heutute ahi uh.
David in kum sawmnih a kipan a nuailam a sim kei hi, Israelte bel van a aksi zah in a pungsak ding chih
Zeruiah tapa Joab in a sim pana, himahleh a simzou kei a, Israelte tung ah leng hehna a hongtungta a; kumpipa David vaihawm lai tanchin gelhna bu ah a zah gelh leng ahi sam kei hi.
Kumpipa sum kempa Adiel tapa
Azmaveth ahi a;
huan loulam ah, khopite ah,
khopel khong ah,
insangte a sum kempa bel
Uzziah tapa Jehonathan ahi a.
Lou a leileh nasep sem kempa
Kelub tapa Ezri ahi a;
Grep huan kempa Ramath mi,
Shimei ahi a,
grephuan a uain suksa koihkhawm kempa siphmite mi Zabdi ahi a.
Phaiguam olive sing leh theipi
kungte kempa Geder mi
Baal hanan ahi a,
sathau koihkhawmna kempa Joash ahi.
Saron a ta ganhon kempa Saron mi
Sitrai ahi a,
guam a ganhon kempa
Adlai tapa Saphat ahi;
Sangawngsau kempa Ishmael mite Obil ahi a,
sabiltung kempa
Meronoth mi Jehdeiah ahi a;
Belamhon kempa Hagar mi Jaziz ahi.
Huaite tengteng kumpipa David sumkem mite ahi uh.
Huan David pangak, mi pil, laisiam mahmah Jonathan bel thuthei pen ahi a, Hakmoni tapa Jehiel bel kumpipa tapate sinsakpa ahi.
Ahitophel kumpipa thutheihpihpa ahi a; Ariki mi Husai kumpipa lawm ahi a.
Ahitophel zom in Benaiah tapa Jehoiada leh Abiathar ahi uhi, kumpipa sepaih heutu bel Joab ahi.

Huan David in Israel heutu tengteng nam pipente, kumpipa nasem a kikheng zelzel pawl heutute, sepaih sang heutute, za heutute, kumpipa leh a tapate sum leh thil neih tengteng tung a heutute, milian mi hat, mihat hangsan tengtengte toh Jerusalem ah a samkhawm hi.
Huchi in kumpipa David ading a, ka unaute leh ka mite aw, ka thu na ngaikhia dih ua; “Ken
Himahleh, Pathian in ka kiang ah, ‘Nang zaw kidoumi sisan suahmi na hih ziak in ka min adin inn na lam kei ding’ a chi hi.
Himahleh
Ka tapa tengteng lak ah,
Huchi in ka kiang ah, Na tapa Solomon in ka inn leh ka intualte a dingsak ding; ka tapa ding in ka telta a, huchi in a pa ka hi ding.
Ka thupiakte leh ka vaihawmte a pom gige leh tua na hih gige bang un a gam tangtawn adin ka kipsak ding hi.
Huchi in
Huan nang ka tapa Solomon, na pa Pathian thei inla, lungtang hoih bukim leh lungsim kilawptak in a nasep sem in;
Pilvang in; munsiangthou adia inn lam ding in
Huchi in David in a tapa Solomon kiang ah biakin inlim, a inlim, sum koihkhawmna inlim, a dantan tungnung lim, asung dantan lim, chitna tutphah lim.
A lungsim a a lunggel bang tengteng,
Siampute leh Levite a pawlpawl a a omna ding uh lim,
Nasepna lam adia tuium-belsuan chichih, dangkaeng tuium-belsuan ding, dangkaeng zatzel zah ding,

Dangkaeng khawnvak koihna leh a khawnvak ding dangkaeng zatzel zah ding, khawnvak koihna leh a khawnvak tui ding a zatzel zah ding, khawnvak koihna a mun kiphamoh chiat bangzel a dangkasik khawnvak koihna ding adia zatzel zah ding toh;
Tanghou at koihna ding dangkaeng dohkan leh, dangkasik dohkan bawlna ding a, dangkaeng zatzah ding leh dangkasik zatzel zah ding a tehna in a pia hi.
Maiphiatna kuang, noute toh; dangkaeng belhbu ding, belhbu khat zel adia zatzel zah ding.
Cherubte a kha uh zak a,
David in, “Hiaite tengteng
Huchi in David in a tapa Solomon kiang ah, “Hattak leh hangsantak in om inla, pang in; laukenla, lunglel sam ken;

Huan ngai dih, Pathian in na chih teng semmi pawl siampute leh Levite a om ua, bang na peuh a, banglam peuh a nasep siam, hattak chiat a nang hon panpih ding na kiang ah a om zel ding uhi; heutute leh mipi teng in leng na thupiak peuhmah a zui ding uhi” a chi hi.
Huan kumpipa David in mipi tengteng kiang ah, “Pathian telkhiak ka tapa Solomon a naupanglai in bangmah a thei naikei a, a sep ding lah a thupi ngal a, biakin mihing ading ahi kei a,

Huchi in ka Pathian inn ading in a dangkaeng lam thil adin dangkaengte, dangkasik lam thil adin, dangkasik, dal lam thil adin dal, sik lam thil adin sik, singlam thil adin sing theihtawk in ka na kisa khinta a, a zepna ding onik suang, suang kilawm, a silhding suang kilawm chi tuamtuam leh suang mantam chichih leh suangpak suang tampite ka pekhinta hi.

Huaikia louleng ka Pathian inn ka deihsak mahmah a, keimah sum dangkaeng leh dangkate leng, inn siangthou adia ka na kisaksa tengteng chih louh in, ka Pathian inn ading in ka pia hi, huai bel bang zutna ding in Ophir dangkaeng,
Dangkaeng talent sang thum leh dangkasik siang thou talent sang sagih, zatna lam tuamtuam a misiamte zat ding in, dangkaeng zatna ding a dangkaengte.
Dangka sik zatna ding a dangkasikte ahi. Tuni in
Huchi in inkuan pipente, Israel nam heutute, sang heutute leh za heutute, kumpipa nasemte heutute toh kipaktak in a pia uhi.
Pathian inlamna ding dangkaeng talent sang nga leh darik sing khat, dangkasik talent sing khat leh dal talent sing khat leh sang giat, sik talent nuai khat a pia uhi.
Suangmantam neite’n
Huchi in mipite a kipak mahmah ua, lungsim munkhat pu a kipaktak a
Huchi in David in mipi tengteng ma ah
“Aw
Hauhsakna leh pahtawina na kiang a kipan ahi, bangkim tung ah thu na nei a, thilhihtheihna na khut ah a om a, mi tengteng hihthupina leh hatna piaktheihna na khut ah a om hi.
‘Huchi in ka Pathian uh kipahthu k’on hilh ua, na min thupi ka phat uhi,’
“Himahleh kua ahia ka hih a, ka mite leng kua ahia a hih ua, hiaite kipaktak a k’on lat theih mahmah uh? Thil tengteng na kiang a kipan a pawt ahi ua, nang a hon penawn lel ka hi uhi.
Ka pi leh pute uh bang in kou zaw na ma ah mikhual, mi kiang a omsam bang ka hi ua; leitung a damsung nite zaw limliap banglel ahi a, lamet ding himhim a omkei hi.
ka Pathian uh, na min siangthou ding a inn k’on lamsak ding a hiai thil ka na kisakna tengteng uh nangmah khutsuak ahi a, nang avek ahi.

Ka Pathian, nang lungtangte na enchian sek a, diktatnate na kipahpih nak chih leng ka thei hi. Ken zaw lungsim taktak in hiai thil tengteng kipak mahmah in k’on lan ahi, hiai lai a na mite leng kipak mahmah a na kiang a honlan mite ka muh in ka kipak mahmah hi.
Aw
Huan ka tapa Solomon na thupiakte, na thu theihsakte, na dante zui a, huaite tengteng hih ding leh ka kisakkholhna inlam ding in lungsim hoihkim pusak in” David in a chi hi.
David in mipi tengteng kiang ah, “Khaile,
A zing in
Huchi in huai ni’n
David tapa Solomon bel kumpipa ding in a bawltuan nawn ua,
huan, Zadok bel siampu ding in.
Huchi in Solomon
Huan heutute tengteng leh mi hat hangsante leh kumpipa David tapa dang tengtengte kumpipa Solomon lak ah a kipia uh.
Solomon Israelte tengteng mitmuh in nakpitak in a hihthupi a, Israel gam a a ma a kumpipate lak ah kuamah in a tan ngeilouh uh, kumpipa hihna thupi mahmah a tangta hi.
Jesse tapa David in Israelte tengteng tung ah vai a hawm hi,
Israelte tung a a vaihawm sung kum sawmli ahi; Hebron khua ah kum sagih vai a hawm a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh thum vai a hawm hi.
Upa tak, tekkun a dam in, hausatak leh pahtawi loh in a si a; a sik in a tapa Solomon in vai a hawmta hi.
Ngai in, kumpipa David tanchin a tung a kipan a tawptan in, zawlnei Samuel laibu, zawlnei Nathan laibu, leh zawlnei Gad laibute ah a tuang hi,
A vaihawm thute, a thilhihtheihdan tengtengte, amah leh Israelte tung leh gam tengteng tung a thil hong omdante toh.
Huan, David tapa Solomon a gamsung ah hatsak in a om a;
Solomon in Israel tengteng, sepaih sang heutu, za heutu, vaihawmmi, Israel gam tengteng a milian, inkuan a intekpen tengteng a houpih hi.
Huchi in, Solomon leh kikhawm tengteng Gibeon khua a mun sang ah a hoh ua; huai ah
Pathian bawm bel David in a nabawl khitsa mun ah Kiriath-jearim a kipan David in a latou khin a; Jerusalem ah a koihna ding puanin a zak khitsa him ahi.
Huan, Hur ta Uri tapa Bezalel bawl dal maitam
Solomon bel kihoupihna puanin chin a dal maitam omna
Huai zan in Solomon kiang ah Pathian a kilak a, a kiang ah, “Bang ahia k’on piak ding hon ngen in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Solomon in Pathian kiang ah, “Ka pa David kiang ah hehpihna thupitak na langsak a, a sik in kumpipa in n’on bawlta a
Aw
Huchi in hiai mipite ma a lut leh pawt a ka om theihna ding in pilna leh theihna honpia in; na mi hiai zahzah vai kuan ahia hawmsak thei ding?” a chi hi.

Huchi in Pathian in Solomon kiang ah, “Hichibang lungsim na puta, sum leh paite, hauhsaknate, pahtawinate, nang hon mudahte hinnate ngen lou a, damsawtnate leng ngenlou a, a tung ua kumpipa a k’on bawl na mite vai na hawmsak theihna ding a pilna leh theihnate n’on nget zawk ziak in, pilna leh theihna piak na hita hi.
Huchi in na ma a Kumpipate’n a na neih ngeilouh uh, nang nung a leng a neih hetlouh ding uh sum leh paite, hauhsaknate, pahtawinate k’on pelai ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Solomon mun sang chin a biakbuk omna Gibeon khua a zin Jerusalem ah a pai a, Israel tung ah vai a hawmta hi.

Huan, Solomon in kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuangmite a kaikhawm a; kangtalai sang khat leh za li leh sakol tungtuangmi sing khat leh sang nih a nei a, huaite kangtalai koihna khuate leh Jerusalem khua a kumpipa omnate ah a koih hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n Jerusalem khua ah dangkaeng leh dangkasikte suangtum bang mai in a koih a, sidar singte leng phaizang a theipi sing bang a tam in a koih lai hi.
Solomon neih sakolte Aigupta gam a kipan a lakkhiak ahi; kumpipa sumsinmite’n huaite a honhon in a khakzel ua, a hon a leizel ahi.

Aiguptate gam a kangtalaite bel dangkasik sekel za guk zel in a leikhiaksak zel ua; sakolte dangkasik sekel za leh sawmnga zel in; huchi mah bang in Hitte kumpipa tengteng leh Suria kumpipate kiang ah leng a zuaksawn zel uhi.
Huan, Solomon in
Solomon in van paw ding mi sing sagih leh, mual a sing phukmi sing giat leh amau vengmi sang thum leh za guk a sep hi.
Solomon in Tura kumpipa Huram kiang ah, “Ka pa David thil na hihsak a, a omna inn lamna ding sidarte na khak bang in, keileng hon kithuahpih sam in.
Ngai dih,
Huchi in ka inn lam tup thupi mahmah ding ahi, ka Pathian uh Pathian tengteng sang a thupizaw a hih ziak in.
Van, vante van ah leng talou ahi ngal a, kuan ahia a inn lamsak thei ding? Kei, a ma a gimlim halna ding lel chihlouh ngal kei leltakin ka lamsak thei mahmah ding hia?

Huchi in Judah gam leh Jerusalem a mi khutsiamte ka pa David in a na zatsek tuin ka kiang a omte lak a sem ding in mi khat, dangkaeng, dangkasik, dal, sik lam khoih thei, puan sandup, sanau, dumpuang bawl siam, gelh bangchibang peuh siammi honsawl in.
Lebanon a sidar sing, meilah sing, algum sing leng hon khak lechin; na mite’n Lebanon a singphuk a siam mahmah uh chih ka thei ngal a; huchi in ngai dih, ka mite nang mite lak ah tel sam le uh,
Sing tampi hon ngaihtuah sak ding: ka inn lam tup a thupi mahmah ding ahi.
Ngai dih, na singphukmite huit buh pawt a a sing nih leh barli buh pawt a sing nih leh uain bath sing nih leh thau bath sing nih ka pe ding” chi in mi a sawl hi.
Huchi in Tura kumpipa Huram in, “Toupa’n a mite a it ziak in a kumpipa ding ua nang honbawl eive” chi in Solomon lai in a dawng hi.
Huram in, “
Mi khutsiam, theihtheihna nei, ka pa Huram amah mah, k’on sawl a,

Dan suan a mi numei khat tapa ngei, a pa bel Tura khua a mi, dangkaeng lam, dangkasik lam, dal lam, sik lam, suang lam, sing lam, puan sandup, dumpuang, puanmalngat, sandang khoihsa, gelh bangchibang leng siam, siam chiteng siam ahi a; nang mi khutsiamte leh ka pu na pa David khutsiamte lak ah a hongsem ding uhi.
Huchi in huit buh, barli buh, thau, uain thu ka toupa’n a gen a sikhate hon khak hen;
Huchi in kou Lebanon a sing na deih zahzah ka na phuk ding ua, tuipi ah Jopa tan in k’on tolhsak ding uh; huan, nang Jerusalem ah na nawn tou ding” a chi hi.
Huan, Solomon in Israel gam a a pa David in a simsa, namdang mi tengteng a sim a, nuai khat leh sing nga leh sang thum leh za guk ahi uh.
Huchi in van paw ding mi sing sagih leh mual a sing phuk mi sing giat leh, mipite sepdan ngaihtuahsak ding mi sang thum leh za guk a sep hi.
Huchi in, Solomon in Jerusalem ah, Moriah tang, a pa David kiang a
A vaihawm kumli kum, kha nihna, ni nihni in a lam panta hi.
Pathian inn lamdan ding Solomon in a ngaihtuah dan hichibang ahi. A dunglam tong tehdan ngeina in tong sawmguk ahi a, a vailam tong sawmnih ahi.
A malam a inlim dunglam in vailam tan mah tong sawmnih ahi a, a sanlam za leh sawmnih ahi a, asung dangkaeng chi kia in a luan hi
Dantan lianzaw pen bang ah meilah sing a thuap a, huai dangkaeng chi kia in a luan a, huai ah tumsing leh khainiang lim a tuangsak hi.
Huchi in a kilawmsak ding in bel suangmantam in a zem a, dangkaeng bel Paravaim dangkaeng ahi.
inn bel, kalhkangte, bangte, a pialkhangte, kongkhakte dangkaeng in a luan a; bangte ah Cherub limte a tuangsak hi.
Mun siangthoupen a bawl a, a dunglam in vailam tan mah, tong sawmnih ahi a, a vailam bel tong sawmnih ahi a, dangkaeng chi ngen in a luan a, talent za guk a pha hi.
A kilhna gikdan dangkaeng sekel sawmnga ahi. Dantan tungnungte dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Inn siangthou pen ah Cherub lim nih a bawl a, huaite dangkaeng in a luan hi.
Cherub khate’n tong sawmnih a khak a, Cherub khat kha tong nga ahi a, bang a pha a, huan, a kha langkhat leng tong nga mah ahi a, Cherub khat kha a pha hi.
Huchi in Cherub dang khat kha leng tong nga ahi a, bang a pha a; huan, a kha langkhat tong nga mah ahi a, Cherub khat kha a pha hi.
Cherubte’n tong sawmnih khak in a kha uh a zak ua, ading ua, inn sung lam nga in ading uh.
Puanzak ding a dumpuang, a sandup, a sanau, khauzang ngatte in a bawl a, huai ah Cherub lim a tuangsak hi.
Inn mailam ah tong sawmthum leh tong nga a sang khuam nih a phut a, huaite dawn tong nga tuaktuak ahi.
Huai ah khainiang a bawl a, khuamdawn ah a vial a; theibuhfai za a bawl a, khainiang ah a khai hi,
Biakin mailam ah khuam a phut a, khat taklam ah, khat veilam ah, taklam a pen Jakin a chi a, veilam a pen Boaz a chi hi.
Dal maitam, a dunglam tong sawmnih, a vailam tong sawmnih, a sandan tong sawm a bawl hi.
Dal lawhbem lianpi, a gei leh a gei kikal a tong sawm kia, a sandan tong nga a bawl a; a gei a kimvel in tong sawmthum ahi.
A geinuai bawngtal limte in a velsuak a, tong khat ah sawmzel, dal lawh kimvel in a om hi. Bawngtal limte vualnih ahi a, dal lawh a kimat a sun ahi.

Huchi in bel bawngtal sawmlehnih tung ah a ki nga a, thum in mallam a nga ua, thum in tumlam a nga ua, thum in simlam a nga ua, thum in suahlam a nga uh; dal lawh bel huaite tung ah a koih a, a nunglam a nga hi.
Lawh pen khutpek tan in a sah a, a gei bel nou gei bang, lili pak bang a bawl ahi a, bath sang thum ta ahi.
Kisilna ding kuangzawn, sawm a bawl lai a, taklam sang ah nga a tung a, veilam sang ah nga a tung a; huaite bel haltum thillat silna ding ahi; huan, dal lawhbem bel siampute kisilna ding ahi.
Huan, bawl dan ding a a seh bang in, dangkaeng khawnvak koihna sawm a bawl a, biakin sung taklam ah nga, veilam ah nga a koih hi.
Dohkan sawm a bawllai a, biakin sung ah taklam ah nga, veilam ah nga a koih a, dangkaeng kuangzawn zakhat a bawl hi.
Huailou leng siampute huang leh huang zapite a um a, huang kongkhakte a bawl a, dal in a luan hi,
Lawh pen inn taklam pang ah suahlam ah simdoh in a tung hi.
Huram in belte, vutluahnate, kuangzawnte a bawl hi. Huchi in Pathian inn ading a kumpipa Solomon a bawlsak Huram in a zouta hi;
Khuam nihte,
nou bemte khuam dawn a zing nihte,
khuam dawn a nou bem nihte
tuamna gial chitek nihte;
Huai tuamna gial chitek nih ding a theibuhfai zalite khuam dawn a noubial nih tuamna ding gial chitek tuaktuak ding a theibuhfai vual nihte.
Kingaknate, kingakna tung a kuangzawnte leng a bawl a;
Lawh khat leh a nuai a bawngtal sawmlehnihte toh.
Belte, vutluahnate, sathuknate leh a tuium-belsuan tengteng leng Huram in
Huaite Jordan phaizang ah Sukoth leh Zered bellei mun ah kumpipa’n asung hi.
Huchibang in Solomon in tuium-belsuan tampi a bawl a; dalbel buk seng vual ahi kei hi.
Solomon in Pathian inn a tuium-belsuan om tengteng a bawl a, dangkaeng maitamte, tanghou koihna dohkante.
Seh bang a Mun Siangthou mai a det ding khawnvak koihnate, a khawnvak nangawn toh, dangkaeng keleu ngen in a bawl hi;
Dangkaeng pakte, khawnvakte leh taitehte, dangkaeng siang ngen in a bawl hi;

Khawnvak puantehnate, maiphiat kuangte, keute, meilaknate dangkaeng siangngen mah in; huan, inn sung lutna, inn sunggil zaw Mun Siangthou pen kongkhakte leh a inn, Biakin kongkhak te dangkaeng in a bawl hi.
Huchi in Solomon in
Huchi in Solomon in Israel upate, a nam intekte, Israel suante inkuan intekte tengteng, David khopi Zion a kipan
Huchi in Israel mi tengteng kha sagihna a Ankuangluina ah kumpipa kiang ah a hoh khawm uhi.
Israel Upa tengteng a hong ua, Levite’n bawm a zawng uhi.
Huchi in
Kumpipa Solomon leh Israelte paikhawm tengteng a kiang a hong kikhawmte bawm ma ah a omkhawm ua, belam leh bawngtal genseng vuallouh leh simseng vuallouh in a kithoih uhi.
Huchi in siampute’n
Cherubte’n bawm omna tung zawn ah a kha uh a zak gige ua, cherubte’n bawm leh a zawnna chiangtawnte a khuh vek uhi.
A zawnna chiangtawnte a sau mahmah a, a zawnna chiangtawnte kongte biakna mun mai, Mun Siangthou a kipan in a muhtheih a; himahleh pawlam ah zaw a dawk kei hi: tu tan huai ah om nilouh hi.
Aigupta gam a kipan a pawt ua,
Huan, hichi ahi a, siampute Mun Siangthou a kipan a a hongpawt tak un, siampu omte tengteng a kisiangsak ua, a pawl in a kibawl tuankei ua;

Levite lasami tengteng leng avek un, Asaph, Heman, Jeduthun, a tapate uh leh a unaute uh toh, puanmalngat silh a kivan in dakkhutbette, pekgingte, kaihgingte toh, maitam suahlam sang ah ading ua, a lak uah siampu za leh sawmnih pengkul mut in a omlai uhi:
Hichi ahi a, pengkul mutte leh lasamite’n
“Amah lah a hoih ngal a;
a chitna tangtawn a om ding ahi ngal a” chi a
Huchi in meipi ziak in siampute’n na a sem theikei ua;
Huchi in Solomon in thu a gen a,
ka om ding, a chi a,
Himahleh na tenna ding,
tangtawn a na om na ding
inn k’on lamsakta hi” chi in.
Huchi in kumpipa a kihei a, Israel kikhawm tengteng a vualzawl a; Israel kikhawmte ading khawm uhi.
Aman, “

Aigupta gam a kipan ka mi Israelte ka pikhiak ni a kipan Israelte nam lak a koi khua mah ka min omna ding inn lamna ding ka tel ngeikei a; ka mi Israelte tung a heutu ding mi kuamah ka tel ngeikei hi;
Himahleh, ka min omna ding in Jerusalem ka telta a, ka mi Israelte heutu ding in David ka tel hi, chi a genpa, amah khut mahmah a hon pichingsakpa phat in om hen.
Ka pa David in Israelte Pathian,
Himahleh
Na tapa, na khal a hongpawt ding in ka min ding in inn a hon lamzaw ding, a na chita hi.
Huchi in
Huai ah Israel suante kiang a na khun,
Huan,

Solomon in dal dohkan a saulam tong nga, a zatlam tong nga, a sanlam tong thum a bawl biakin huang laitak a tun tung ah a tuang a, Israel kikhawm tengteng ma ah a khuk din a, vanlam nga in a ban a zak a:
“Aw
Na sikha ka pa David kiang a, na thuchiam na tangtung sak a; ahi, tuni in na kam a na gensa na khut in na lohching sakta a:
Huchi in aw
Huchi in
“Himahleh, Pathian lei ah mihing lak ah om petmah dia hia? Ngai in, van, vante van ah leng na takei a, hiai ka inn lam ah takei sem natel ni chia!
Himahleh, aw
Hiai munlam nga a na sikha a thumna ngaikhia a, Huai ah ka min a om ding, na chihna mun mahmah, inn lam ah sun leh zan a na mit suan gige theihna ding in.
Na sikha leh na mi Israelte’n hiai mun lam nga a a thum chiang un a ngetnate uh na ngaihkhiak sak zel in, ahi, na tenna mun van ah na ngaikhia inla, na ngaikhia in, ngaidam in.
“Mi kuapeuh in a invengte tung ah thil hihkhial in, kichiamsak hong kiphamoh taleh, hiai inn a na maitam ma ah hong kichiam henla;
Nang van ah na ngaikhia inla, gamtang inla, migilou a gitlouh man a mawh tangsak in, mi diktat a diktak man a dik tangsak in, na sikhate vaihawmsak in.
“Na mi Israelte’n na tung a thil a hihkhelh ziak ua melmate lak a a vuallelh ua, nang lam a hong ngat nawn ua, na min a gup ua, hiai inn a thum a thil na kiang a a hon nget uleh;
Nang van ah na ngaihkhiak sak inla, na mi Israelte khelhna ngaidam inla, amau leh a pi leh pute uh na piak gam ah pi nawn in.
“Na tung a thil a hihkhelh ziak ua van a hongbina, vuah a hong zuklouha, hiai mun lam nga a a thum ua, na min a gup uleh, amau na hihgim ziak a a khelhna uh a kisik uleh;
Nang van ah na ngaikhia inla, a paina ding uh lampi hoih kawkmuh in na sikhate leh na mi Israelte khelhna ngaidam in na mite a goutan ding ua na piakna gam ah vuah zusak in.

Ka gam ua kial a hong kiaka, hii a honglen a, keuna hiam, muatna hiam, khaukhup hiam, lung hiam a hongom a, a melmate un a khuate uh a hongum ua, hii bangpeuh, natna bangpeuh a hongtun leh hii a vei uhiam, a lungkham na uh theipih in;
“Hiai inn lam nga a banzak a mimal hiam, Israel mipi hon in hiam thumna leh ngetna a hontut uh:
Na omna van ah na ngaikhia inla, ngaidam inla, michih a omdan bang chiat un lohchingsak in, a lungtang uh lah na thei ngal a: nangmah kia mihing tate lungtang theipa na hi:
“Ka pi leh pute uh na piak gam a omsung teng ua na lampi tawn thei ding a nang laudan a hong siamna ding un.
“ Na mi Israelte hilou, namdang mi, na min thupitak leh na khut hattak leh na banzak ziak a gam gamla tak a kipan a hongpai, hiai inn lam nga a a hong thum chiang un:

Nang na omna van ah na ngaikhia inla, namdangte leng nang hon sapdan uh dungzui in a tung uah hih in, huchi in na mi Israelte bangmah in khovel a namchih in na min a thei ding ua, nang laudan a hongsiam ding ua, hiai ka inn lam in na min a pu chih a thei ding uhi.
“Na mite’n a melmate uh na sawlna lamlam a a sual ua na khopi tel leh na min omna dia na lam inn lam nga a na kiang a a thum uleh:
Nang a thumna uh leh a ngetna uh van ah na ngaikhia inla, a thu uah pi zel in.
“Na tung a a hong khelh ua, kuamah lah khiallou a om ngalkei a, a tung ua na heh a, melma khut a na piak a, gam gamlapi ah hiam, naideuh ah hiam sal a a pi un leng,
Sal a a pina gam ua a kingaihtuah khiak ua, a kisik ua, i na khialta, dikloutak leh gitlouhhuai tak in thil i na hihta, chi a a tanna gam ua ngetna hontut ua:

Sal a amau a pi na ua, a tanna gam ua a lungtang tak uleh a lungsim taktak ua nanglam a hong ngat ua, a pi leh pute uh gam lam leh na khopi tel leh na min dia ka lam inn lam nga a na kiang a a thum uleh:
A thumna uh leh a ngetna uh nang na omna van ah na ngaikhia inla, a thu uah pi zel inla, na tung a na khialta na mite ngaidam in.
Aw ka Pathian, hehpih in na mit honghak inla, hiai mun a thumna ah na bil dohin.
“Aw
na omna mun ah paitou in nang leh na hatna bawm toh,
Aw
na siampute na hotdamna in van inla, na misiangthoute
hoihna in nuamsa sak in.
Aw
na thau nilhpa mel lehngatsan kenla,
na sikha David thil hoih hihte theigige in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Solomon a thum khit in van a kipan mei a hong lengsuka, haltum thillat leh kithoihnate a hong kangmangta a, huan
thupina in
Israel suante in van a kipan a mei hong lengsuk leh inn tung a
“Amah lah a hoih ngal a,
a chitna tangtawn in a om ding hi, chi in chibai a buk ua,
kipahthu a gen uhi.”
Kumpipa leh mipite’n
Kumpipa Solomon in kithoihna bawngtal sing nih leh sang nih leh belam nuai khat leh sing nih a lan uhi. Huchibang in kumpipa leh mipite’n Pathian inn a lan uhi.
Huan, siampute a mun chiat uah ading ua; Levite leng
Solomon in
Huchi in, huai tung in Solomon leh Israel mi tengteng mipi kikaikhawm thupitak Hamath kholutna a kipan a Aigupta gam luipha a mite toh ni sagih Ankuang a lui uhi.
A ni giat ni’n kikhopna tak a nei ua; maitam kipahpihna ding in ni sagih a zang ua, Ankuanglui ni ading in ni sagih a zang uhi.
Huchi in kha sagih na ni sawmnih leh thum nin mipite a kikhensak a,
Huchibang in, Solomon in
Huan, zan in Solomon kiang ah
Vante ka khak a, vuahte a zuklouh in hiam, khaukhup ka sawl a, gamte a hihsiat hiam ka mite lak a hi ka lensak hiam a;
Ka minpu ka mite kingaineu a a thum ua, hon zon ua, a omdan giloute uh a lehngatsan uleh van a kipan in ka na ngaikhe ding a, a khelhna uh ka ngaidam ding a, a gam uh ka damsak ding hi.
Hiai mun a thumna ka mit ka suan ding a, ka bil ka doh ding hi.
Huai a ka min tangtawn a a omtheihna ding in hiai inn ka sep a, ka hihsingthouta hi: huai ah ka mit leh ka lungtang a om tawntungta ding hi.
Huan, nang tungtang thu ah leng, na pa David bang a ka mitmuh a na om a, thu ka honpiak bang a na om a, ka thusehte leh ka vaihawmte na zuih leh:
Israelte lak ah ‘vaihawm mi na tasam kei ding,’ chi a na pa David kiang a ka thukhun bang in ‘na gam mangtutphah ka kipsak ding hi.’
“Himahleh na kiheimang ua, ka thusehte leh ka thupiakte na lehngatsan ua, Pathian dangte nna nasep ua, na biak uh leh:
Amau ka piak gam a kipan k’on hihmang ding a; hiai inn ka min ding a ka hihsiangthousa ka mitmuh phaklouh ah ka suanmang ding a, namchih lak a paunak leh a selam a gentehna ding in ka bawl ding hi.
‘Hiai inn sangpi a kiang a paipeuh in lamdang a sa ding ua, bangchi a hiai gam leh hiai inn

, a pi leh pute uh Pathian, ‘Aigupta gam a kipan pikhe pa a lehngatsan ua, Pathian dangte zuia, a biakua, a nnate a sep ziak un hiai siatna tengteng a tung uah a tung ahi, a honchi ding uh a chi hi.’ ”
Huan, hichi ahi a, Solomon in
Huram in Solomon khua a piakte Solomon inn a bawl a, Israel suante a omsak hi.
Solomon in Hamath Zobah a sual a, a zou hi,
Gamdai ah, Tadmor a bawl a, Hamath a vankoihna khuate toh.
Bethhoron saknung zaw leh khangnung zaw leng, kulhte, kongkhakte, a kalhnate nei in a bawl beh hi.
Baalath khuate, a vankoihna khua tengteng, a kangtalai koihna khuate, a sakol tungtuang mite omna khuate, Jerusalem leh Lebanon leh a gamsung tengteng ah Solomon in a deih bangbang in a bawl hi.
Israel suante hilou, Hitte, Amorte, Perizte, Hivte, Jebuste suan a omlai mite tengteng;
Israel suante’n a hihman louhte uh, huai gam a amaute nung a nutsiat a om a suante uh, tutan a, Solomon in sikha nasem ding a goih teitei pawl din a bawl hi.
Israel suante Solomon in a nasemmi sikha ding in a bawl kei a, kidou mite, a sepaih heutute intekte, a kangtalai leh a Sakol tungtuang mi heutu ahizaw uhi.
Huaite mipite heutu, Solomon intek pente ahi ua, za nih leh sawmnga ahi uhi.
Solomon in Pharo tanu David khopi a kipan a tuam a inn a lamsak ah a pitou a, “Ka zi Israel kumpipa David inn a om ding ahi kei,
Huchi in, Solomon inlim mailam a kibawl

Mosi thupiak, nitenga, ding a bikhiah bangbang in khawlni ah, kha thak ni, Ankuanglui hun nei, kum khat a thumvei, tanghou silngou sohlouh ankuangluinate, nipi kal Ankuangluinate, bawkta Ankuang luinate,

Huan, a pa David na seh bang in siampu pawlte leh Levite a tantuam chiat ua, niteng a sepkul dungzui zel a, phat dingte, siampute ma a nasem ding in a sep a; kongkhak teng ah a pawlpawl a vengmite a seplai a; huchibang in Pathian mi David in a nasep hi.
Kumpipa’n siampute, Levite thu a piak bangchi mah in sumthute leng a pialsan hetkei uhi.
Huchi in Solomon bel Edom gam a luipi gei a Ezion-geber ah leh Eloth ah a hoh a,
Huram in a sikha tuipi a gamtang mi, longte toh a kuansak a: Solomon sikhate toh Ophir ah a hoh ua, huai ah dangkaeng talent za li leh sawmnga a hontun ua, kumpipa Solomon kiang ah hontun uhi.

Solomon minthan dan Sheba kumpinu’n a zak in Solomon thuhaksa pipi a ettel tum in nungzui mi tampi toh sangawngsaute a gimlim leh dangkaeng tampi leh suangmantamte pua in Jerusalem ah a hohtou a: Solomon kiang a tun touh in, a lungsim a om tengteng suahsiang vek in a houpih hi,
Huan Solomon in a thudot tengteng a dawngvek a: Solomon in a dawn theihlouh himhim a omkei hi.
Huchi in Sheba kumpinu’n Solomon pilna leh a inn lam a muh in,
A dohkan a nekdingte, a sikhate tutdante, a nasemte nasep dante, a kivat dante uh, a nou pemite leh a kivatdante uh,
Kumpipa kiang ah, “Na thilhihte leh na pildan thuthang ka gam a ka zak a dik mahmah hi,
Himahleh keimah mit mahmah a k’ong muh masiah a gen kia uh ka um theikei a, ngai in, na pildan thupi kimkhat leng a hon na hilh sam ua hia: na minthanna ka zakte nakpi’n na khup hi.
Na mite nak hamphat na uh e, hiai na sikha na kiang a om gige a na pilna thu ngaikhe gigete hampha hina tel uh e!
na Pathian, na tung a kipak, a kumpipa ding a a mangtutphah a hon tusakpa
Huchi in kumpipa kiang ah dangkaeng talent za leh sawmnih leh gimlim tampi mahmah leh suangmantamte a pia a, Sheba kumpinu’n kumpipa Solomon gimlim a piak bang himhim a om ngeikei hi.
Huan, Solomon sikhate leh Huram sikhate Ophir a kipan a dangkaeng vapawte’n Algum sing leh suangmantam a hon pua uhi.
Kumpipa’n Algum sing
Sheba kumpinu’n a thil a piak simlouh in kumpipa Solomon in a deihdeih a pesam a, huchi in a gam lam ah a heute toh a pai nawnta uhi.
Huchi in Solomon kiang a kum khat sung a dangkaeng honglut gikdan dangkaeng talent zaguk leh sawmguk leh guk buk ahi.
Mi ompolhte leh sumsinmite hontawi simhetlouh in: huan, Arabia kumpipa tengteng leh gam ukpate’n Solomon kiang ah dangkaengte, dangkasikte a hontawi sek uhi.
Kumpipa Solomon in dangkaeng supek in lumlian chi za nih a bawl a, lumlian khat ah dangkaeng sekel za guk a bei hi.
Dangkaeng sukpek in lum za thum a bawl a; lum khat ah dangkaeng sekel za thum a bei a; huaite Lebanon gammang inn ah a koih hi.
Huan, kumpipa’n Sai hapak mangtutphah thupitak a bawl behlap a, dangka siang ngen in a luan hi.
mangtutphah a a kaltouhna siksan gukte, mangtutphah toh a zop, dangkaeng khengaknate, a ban ngakna bul ading humpinelkai lim nihte a om hi.
Siksan guk langtuak tung ah humpinelkai sawmlehnih ading ua: huchibang koilai gam ah leng a bawl ngeikei uh.
Kumpipa Solomon nou tengteng dangkaeng vek ahi a, Lebanon gammang inn a tuium-belsuan tengteng leng dangkaeng siangvek ahi; Solomon damlai in dangkasik bangmah in a simkei uhi.
Kumpipa’n longhon, Huram sikhate, Tarsis a hohsek kikoppih a nei a, kum thum halzel in, Tarsis longhon in dangkaeng, dangkasik, saiha, zawng leh utongte, a hon pawsek hi.
Huchi in kumpipa Solomon in khovel kumpipa tengteng hauhsakna leh pilna lam ah a khupvek hi.
Huchi in Pathian in a lungtang a a koih, a pilna thu ngaikhe ding in, kumpipa tengteng in Solomon a honzuan huthut uhi.
Kumteng a piak bikhiah nei in dangkasik tuium-belsuan, dangkaeng tuium-belsuan, puante, galvante, gimlimte, sakolte, sabiltungte a pe zel uhi.
Huan, Solomon in Sakol leh kangtalai koihna mun sang li a nei a, huan sakol tungtuangmi sing khat leh sang nih a nei a, huaite kangtalai koihna khuate ah, Jerusalem kumpipa kiangte ah a omsak hi.
Huchi in lui a kipan a Philistia gam leh Aigupta gam tan a kumpipa tengteng tung ah vai a hawm hi.
Jerusalem khua ah Kumpipa’n dangkasikte suang bang mai a tam in a omsak a, sidar singte phaizang a theipite banglel a ngaih in a omsak hi.
Solomon ading in sakolte Aigupta a kipan leh gamchih a kipan in a hon lazel uhi.

Solomon tanchin dangte a bul a kipan a tawp tanpha in, zawlnei Nathan gelh tanchin bu ah, Silo mi Ahijah genkholhna bu ah, Nebat tapa Jeroboam tungtang thu a zawlnei Jedai kilakna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Solomon in Jerusalem ah Israel mi tengteng tung ah kum sawmli vai a hawm hi.
Solomon bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, a pa David khua ah a vui ua, a sik in a tapa Rehoboam in vai a hawm hi.
Rehoboam bel Sekem khua ah a hoh a; Israelte tengteng Sekem khua ah kumpipa dia bawl ding in a hoh khinta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Nebat tapa Jeroboam in huai thu a zak in, kumpipa Solomon kiang a kipan a taimangna Aigupta gam a omlai a hingal a, Aigupta gam a kipan Jeroboam a hongpai nawn hi,
Mi a sawl ua, a va sam ua; huchi in Jeroboam leh Israel tengteng a hongpai ua. Rehoboam kiang ah,
“Na pa’n ka hakkol uh a giksak mahmah a; huaiziak in na pa’n hon zatgimna leh a hakkol giktak ka tung ua a koih hon sukzangsak inla, huchi in nang nna ka sem ding uh” chi’n a gen uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ni thum khit chiang in hongpai nawn zaw un,” a chi a, huchi in mipite a ki hemkhia uhi.
Kumpipa Rehoboam in, “Hiai mipite dawnna ding thupha bang ahia n’on hilh ding uh?” chi in, a pa Solomon damlai a Upate kiang ah a dong hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Hiai mipite na hehpih a na kipahsak a, a kiang ua thu hoih tata na gen leh tangtawn in na mite ahi ding uh” chi in a gen uhi.
Himahleh, upate hoihsakpih a pom kei a, amah khanvualpih tangvalte, a kiang a omsekte a dong zawsop hi.
A kiang uah, “Hiai mipite ka kiang a, Na pa’n ka tung ua hakkol a koih honhih zangsak in chi a gen mite ka dawn dan ding hoih bang ahia n’on hilh ding uh?” a chi hi,

A khanvualpih tangvalte’n a kiang ah hiai mipite na pa’n a hakkol uh a hihgik thei mahmah a, nang zaw hon hihzangsak zaw in na kiang a chi mite kiang ah huchi in chi inla, huchi in a kiang uah gen in, “Ka pa kawng sang in ka khutzung a golzaw.
Ka pa’n hakkol giktak a hon na pawsak a, ken ahihleh na hakkol uh behlap lai ding ka hi: ka pa’n khetna in nou a honsawi zel a, ken ahihleh aikam a honsawi ding ka hi,” chi in a gen uhi.
Huchi in Jeroboam leh mipite tengteng kumpipa’n “Ni thum khit chiang in hong nawn un” a chih bang in ni thum ni’n Rehoboam kiang ah a hoh uhi.
Kumpipa’n amau gumtakin a dawng a, kumpipa Rehoboam in upate thuhilhna a pom kei hi.
Tangvalte phatsakpih bang in, ka pa’n na hakkol uh a hihgik a, ken huai behlap ding ka hi; ka pa’n khetna in nou a hon na sawi a, ken zaw aikam a nou honsawi ding ka hi, a chi hi.
Huchi in
Kumpipa’n a thu uh a pom kei chih Israelte tengteng in a theih un mipite’n,
“David ah tantuan bang ahia i neih uh?
Jesse tapa ah gouluah ding i neisam kei uh:
Israel mite aw,
na puanin lamchiat uah pai un:
David, na inkuan sung ngaihtuah mai in,
chi in kumpipa a dawng uhi.”
Huchi in Israel tengteng a puanin lam uah a paita uhi.
Israel suan, Judah gam khua a omte bel a tung uah Rehoboam in vai a hawm hi.

Huchi in kumpipa Rehoboam in nasem dia a chih teiteite heutu Hadoram a sawl a; amah huai Israelte tengteng in suang in a na deng ua, a sita hi. Kumpipa Rehoboam Jerusalem khua a tai tum in a kangtalai ah a tuang pah hi.
Huchi in tutan in Israelte David inkawte tung ah a helta uhi.
Huan, Rehoboam Jerusalem a tun touh in, Israelte dou a, Rehoboam gam la nawn ding in Judah nuai khat leh Benjamin inkawte, mi hangsan chiat telkhiak, nuai khat leh sing giat tak a kaikhawm hi.
Himahleh Pathian mi Semaiah kiang ah
Judah gam kumpipa Solomon tapa Rehoboam kiang ah leh Judah gam leh Benjamin gam a Israel mi tengteng kiang ah,
Rehoboam bel Jerusalem khua ah a om a, Judah gam ah kivenna ding in khua a sat hi.
Bethlehem khuate, Etam, Tekoa a sata,
Bethzur, Soko, Adullam,
Gath, Maresah, Jip,
Adoraim, Lakish, Azekah,
Zoreah, Aijalon, Hebron khua; huaite Judah leh Benjamin gam a kulhnei khuate ahi.
Huchi in huai kulhte a hihkip a, heutute a koih a, nekding, thau leh uain a sekkhawm hi.
Khoteng ah lum leh tei a koih a, khua kiptak in a bawlchiat hi. Huchi in Judah leh Benjamin gam amah gam a hisak hi.
Huan, Israel gam tengteng a siampute leh Levite amau gam a kipan chiat in a kiang ah a hong uhi.
Levite’n a gam uh leh a omnate uh a pawtsan ua, Judah gam leh Jerusalem ah a hoh uh; Jeroboam leh a tapate’n
Amun sang a ding leh keltal leh bawngnou lim a bawl a ding a siampute a seh zawk ziak in.
Huan, Israel nam,
Huchi in, Judah gam a kipsak ua, kum thum sung Solomon tapa Rehoboam in a kipsak hi: kum thum sung David leh Solomon lampi a zui uhi.
Rehoboam in David tapa Jerimoth tanu Mahalath zi in a nei a, huai Jesse tapa Eliab tanu Abihail tanu ahi
Tapate a neihsak a; Jeush, Semariah leh Zahamte.
Amah nung in Absalom tanu Maakah a nei a; aman Abijah, Atai, Jiza leh Selomithte a neihsak hi.
Rehoboam in Absalom tanu Maakah bel a zite leh a mite tengteng tung ah a it tuan a; zi sawmlehgiat leh mei sawmguk a nei a, tapa sawmnih leh giat leh tanu sawmguk a nei ahi.
Rehoboam in Maakah tapa Abijah bel a unaute lak ah tungnungpen in a bawl a; kumpipa ding a bawl a lungsim ahi zawmah hi
Piltak in a gamta a, a tapate tengteng Judah gam leh Benjamin gam tengteng kulhnei khuate ah a om zaksak vek a; nekding tampi a pia a, zi tampi a zonsak chiat hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Rehoboam gam a hon phuhkipa, mi hattak a hong hihnung in amah lam a pang Israel tengteng toh
Hichi a honghi a, kumpipa Rehoboam vaihawm kum ngana kum in,
Kangtalai sing khat leh sang nih leh sakol tungtuang mi sing guk toh: Aigupta gammi honzui simvuallouh ahi uh; Lubte, Sukite, Ethiopiate ahi uhi.
Judah gam a kulhnei khuate a la a, Jerusalem a vatung hi.
Zawlnei Semaiah, Rehoboam leh Judahte intekpen, Sisak ziak a Jerusalem a kikaikhawmte kiang ah a hohtou a, a kiang uah, “
Huchi in Israel intekpente leh kumpipa a kiniamkhiak ua, “
Himahleh a sikhate ahi ding ua, ka nasep leh gamdang mi nasep dan a theihna ding un” chi in.
Huchi in Aigupta kumpipa Sisak Jerusalem sim in a paitou a,
Kumpipa Rehoboam in huaite tang in dal lumte a bawl a, kumpipa inn kongkhak ngakmi sepaih heutute a kemsak hi.
Hichi ahi a, kumpipa
A kiniamkhiak ziak in hih manthat ahihlouhna ding in a tung a
Huchi in kumpipa Rehoboam in a vaihawmna Jerusalem ah a kipsakta hi: Rehoboam a vaihawm pattung in kum sawmli leh kum khat a upa ahi,
zong dia a lungsim a zatlouh ziak in thil hoihlou a hih hi.

Huchi in Rehoboam tanchin a bul a kipan a tawppha in zawlnei Semaiah gelh tanchin bu ah leh zawlnei Iddo gelh tanchin bu a suante tanchin lak a gelh ahi kei maw? Rehoboam leh Jeroboam bel a kidou nilouhlouh uhi.
Huan, Rehoboam a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, David khua ah a vui ua: a sik in a tapa Abijah in vai a hawm hi.
Jeroboam kum sawmlehgiat a vaihawm kum in Judahte tung ah Abijah in vai a hawm pan hi.
Jerusalem ah kum thum vai a hawm a, a nu min Mikaiah, Gibeah mi Uriel tanu ahi. Huan, Abijah leh Jeroboam bel a kidou uhi.
Abijah in sepaih kidoumi, mi hangsan telkhiak nuai li toh a vasual a, Jeroboam mihat hangsan telkhiak nuai giat in kiphalh in a na dou uhi.
Abijah bel, Ephraim singtang gam a om Zemariam mualvum tung ah ading a, “Aw Jeroboam, Israelte tengteng toh na ngaikhia un;
Israelte Pathian in Israel gam David leh a tate kiang a chi a thukhun in tangtawn adin a pia chih thei dia kilawm mahmah hilou na hi uh maw?
Himahleh Nebat tapa Jeroboam, David tapa Solomon sikha a pu tung ah a hong hel maimah hi.
Rehoboam a naupanglai a, a lungsim a nem lai a, amaute a na nan theihlouh lai in Solomon tapa Rehoboam kalh in mithulimlou Belial tate a kikaikhawm uhi.
“David tapa lak ah

siampu, Aron tapate leh Levite delhkhia in, gamdang mite hihdan bang in siampu na kibawl uh ahi kei maw? Huchi in bawng tuai leh belam sagih a hong kilan peuhmahte pathian hiloupite siampu a hithei zel mawk uhi.
“Himahleh kou zaw,
Ni teng leh zan teng in
Ngai dih ua, Pathian ka ma uh pi in ka kiang uah a om a, a siampute leng a pengkul ua nou hon nawh ding a mut ding in a om uhi. Aw, Israel suante aw
Himahleh Jeroboam in a nunglam uah a guktan sak a: huchi in Judahte malam ah a om ua, guktan mite a nunglam uah a om uh.
Judahte a lehngat uleh a nunglam uah leh a malam uah gal a omta a,
Huchi in Judahte a kikou zuazua ua; huchi a Judah a kikou zuazua ualeh hichi ahi a, Abijah leh Judahte ma ah
Israel suante Judahte ma ah a taikek ua, Pathian in a khut uah a peta hi.
Huchi in Abijah leh a heute’n amau a that ua: Israel mitel ngen nuai nga a that uhi.
Huai tung in Israel suante vuallelh dan huchibang ahi, Judah suante’n
Huan, Abijah in Jeroboam a delh a, a khuate a laksak a, Bethel a khopelte toh, Jesanah a khopelte toh, Ephron a khopelte toh.
Abijah vaihawm laiteng in Jeroboam in dinkhiak zohna a nei nawn kei;
Abijah bel a hat deuhdeuh a, zi sawmlehli a nei a, tapa sawmnih leh nih leh tanu sawmlehguk a nei hi.
Abijah tanchin dangte leh a omdante, a thu gente zawlnei Iddo hilhchetna bu ah a tuang hi.
Huchi in Abijah bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, David khopi ah a vui ua, a sik in a tapa Asa in vai a hawmta: a vaihawm sung in a gam uh kum sawm galmuang in a om hi.
Asa in
Gamdang pathian maitamte leh munsangte a lamang a, suangphuhte a hihchim a, Aserah songte a hihtam hi.
Judahte
Huan, Judahte khua tengteng a munsangte leh milimte a lamang vek a; amah nuai ah a gam galmuang in a om hi.
Judah gam ah kulhnei khuate a bawl a, gam galmuang in a om a, huai kumte in kidouna a neikei a,
Judahte kiang ah, “Hiai khuate bawl phanawn ni e, kulh in um le hang, insangte, kulh kongkhakte, a kalhnate bawl ni:
Asa in Judah mi lum leh tei tawi mi sepaih nuai thum a nei a: Benjamin mi phaw leh thal zangmi nuai nih leh sing giat; huai tengteng mi hat hangsan vek ahi uhi.
Huan, Ethiopia mi Zerah, sepaih maktaduai khat leh kangtalai za thum toh amau sual ding in a hong kuan a; Maresah a hongtung hi.
Huchi in Asa bel sual din a vakuan a, Maresah ah Zephathah guam ah a kiphalh uhi.
Asa in
Huchi in
Asa leh a heute’n Gerar tan in a delh ua, Ethiopia mite si a tam mahmah ziak un a pang theikei ua;
Gerar kim a khua tengteng a sual ua,
Ganpute puaninte leng a sual ua, belam leh sangawngsau tampi a hawl ua, Jerusalem ah a pai nawnta uhi.
Oded tapa Azariah tung ah Pathian kha a hongtung hi.
Asa dawn ding in a paikhia a, a kiang ah, “Asa leh Judah mi tengteng leh Benjamin mite aw, ka thu ngaikhe dih ua, a lam a na pan sung teng un
Israel mite sawtpi Pathian tak neilou leh sinsakmi leh siampu neilou leh dan neilou in a om uhi.
Himahleh, a mangbat ua
Huailai in a pawt lam leh a lut lamte ading in galmuanna a omkei a, gamsung a om tengteng adin mangbatna thupi mahmah ngen ahizaw.
Nam leh nam, khua leh khua a kihihsia ua, Pathian in haksatna chiteng in a haksasak ahi.
Himahleh, nou zaw hattak in om unla, kithadah sak kei un, na thilhih man uh na mu ding uhi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Asa in huai thute leh zawlnei Oded thugente a zak in a kihangsaka, Judah gam leh Benjamin gam tengteng a kipan leh Ephraim tang gam a kholaka kipan a thil kihhuaite a paimang vek a;
Judah gam leh Benjamin gammi tengteng, a kiang a om Ephraim leh Manasseh leh Simeon gam a mite toh a samkhawm vek a:
Huchi in Asa kum sawm leh kum nga a vaihawm kum, a kha thumna ah Jerusalem ah a ki kaikhawm uhi.
Huai ni’n a gallak uh bawngtal za sagih leh belam sang sagih in
A lungsim uh leh a lungtang tengteng un
Kuapeuh
Huchi in
Judah mi tengteng a kichiamna uah a kipak ua, a lungtang tak ua kichiam a, kituak tak a a hih ziak un, muh leng a mu him ua; huchi in
Kumpipa Asa nu Maakah leng milim kihhuai tak Aserah a bawlsak ziak in a kumpinu hihna a tawpsak a; huchi in Asa in milim a phuk a, a hihzan vek a, Kidron lui ah a hal hi.
Himahleh, Israel gam a kipan munsangte paihmang ahi kei a; himahleh Asa lungsim a vaihawm sung in a kizen gige hi.
Apan thil a lat leh amah latte dangkasik, dangkaeng, tuium-belsuan Pathian inn ah a lalut hi.
Asa vaihawm lai kum sawmthum leh nga sung in kidou himhim a omkei hi.
Asa kum sawmthum leh guk a vaihawm kum in Israel kumpipa Baasha in Judahte a sual a, Judah kumpipa kiang a lut ding leh pawt ding dalna ding in Ramah khua a bawl hi.
Huchi in Asa in

“Ka pa leh na pa kal a thukhun a om bangmah in i kikal ah thukhun a om a, ngai dih, dangkasik leh dangkaengte k’on khak ahi; kisa dih, Israel kumpipa Baasha in a hon tawpsanna ding in a kiang ah na thukhun phel nawn mai in” chi in a khak hi.
Huchi in Benhadad in kumpipa Asa thu a na pom a; Israel khuate sual ding in sepaih heutute a sawl a, Ijon khua, Dan khua, Abel maim khua, Naphtali gam a van koihna khua tengteng a sual uhi.
Hichi ahi a, Baasha in huai thu a zak in Ramah khua a bawl lai a khawlsan a, a thilhih tup a kikhelsakta hi.
Huchi in, kumpipa Asa in Judah mi tengteng a pi a. Baasha in Ramah khua bawlna ding a suang leh sing a zatte a la vek ua, huaite in Geba leh Mizpah khua a bawl hi.
Huailai in zawlnei Hanani Judah kumpipa Asa kiang ah a hong a, a kiang ah, “
Ethiopiate leh Lubte sepaih hon liantak, kangtalai leh sakol tungtuangmite tampi ahi kei umaw? Himahleh
A lam a lungsim diktak pumite tung a a hatdan hihlang ding in khovel tengteng ah
Huchi in, Asa bel zawlnei tung ah a heh a, suangkulh ah a khumta a; a thugen ziak in a heh mahmah mai hi. Asa in mi khenkhatte leng a simmawh behlap lai hi.
Huan ngai dih ua, Asa tanchin a bul a kipan a a tawppha in Judah leh Israel kumpipate tanchin gelhna bu ah a tuang ahi.
Kum sawmthum leh kua a vaihawm kum in Asa bel a khe a hong nata a; a natna thupitak ahi; himahleh a natna ah
Huchi in Asa bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, kum sawmli leh khat a vaihawm kum in a si hi.
David khopi a amah a tuam dia a hankhuak ah a vui ua, gimlim tak, gimlim bawlmite’n gimlim chi tuamtuam a dim a kibawl lupna ah a sial ua, amah a tuam ding in meikuang thupi mahmah a sem uhi.
A tapa Jehosaphat a sik in a lal a, Israel mite dou ding in a kihihhat hi.
Huchi in Judah gam a kulhnei khua tengteng ah sepaih a koih a; Judah gam leh a pa Asa in a na lak Ephraim gam a khuate ah galvilmi a koih hi.
Huan, Jehosaphat kiang ah
A pi leh pute uh Pathian zong a, Israel mite hih bang hihlou a, a thupiakte a zuihzawk ziak in.
Huaiziak in
A lungsim
Kum thum a vaihawm kum in a mi lian Benhail, Obadiah, Zekariah, Nathanael, Mikaiah, Judah gam khuate a mite sinsak ding in a sawlkhia a;
Levi mi, Semaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Asahel, Semiramoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah, Tobadonijah a teltei ua, siampu Elisama leh Jehoram leng a tel uhi.
danbu a tawi ua, Judah gam ah a sinsak ua, Judah gam khua tengteng a tawn ua, mite a sinsak uhi.
Huchi in Judah gam leh a kim gam tengteng a mite’n

Philistiami khenkhat in Jehosaphat kipahman a hongpia ua, siah ding in dangkasik leng a pelai uh; Arabia mite’n ganhon, belamtal sang sagih leh za sagih leh keltal sang sagih leh za sagih a honkai uhi.
Huchi in Jehosaphat bel a hong thupi mahmah a, Judah gam ah kulhte leh thil koihkhawmna khuate a bawl a, Judah gam khuate ah nasep tampi a nei hi.
Jerusalem ah sepaih mihat hangsante a hau behlap lai hi.
A inkuan kuan ua a omdan uh hichibang ahi: Judah inkuan a sang heutute, heutu Adnah in mihat hangsan nuai thum a heu hi.
A zom Jehohanan in nuai nih leh sing giat a heu hi.
A zom nawn Jikri tapa Amasiah bel kiphaltak a
Benjamin inkuante mihat hangsan Eliada in thal leh lum zang mi nuai nih a heu hi.
Azom Jehozabad in galkap ding a mansiangsa nuai khat leh sing giat a heu hi.
Hiai tengteng Judah gam a kulhnei khua a kumpipa’n a koihte simlouh a kumpipa kiang a om gigete ahi uhi.
Huchi in Jehosaphat bel a hong hau in a thupi mahmah a, huchi in Ahab toh kizopna a bawl hi.
Kum bangzah hiam nung in Samaria ah Ahab kiang ah a hohsuk a, Ahab in amah leh a heute belam leh bawngtalte tampi a na goh a, Ramoth Gilead khua a hoh touhpih ding in a chial hi.

Israel kumpipa Ahab in Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Ramoth Gilead khua ah i hohtou khawm kei dia hia?” a chi hi. Aman a dawng a, “Kei leh nang, ka mite leh na mite pumkhat i hi ua, gal i dou khawm ding uh” a chi hi.
Jehosaphat in Israel kumpipa kiang ah, “

Huchi in Israel kumpipa’n, zawlneite mi za li a samkhawm a, a kiang uah, “Ramoth Gilead khua sual ding in ka kuan ding uam, kuan lou ding?” a chi hi. Amau “Kuan in, Pathian in kumpipa khut ah a pe ding” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Jehosaphat in, “
Israel kumpipa’n Jehosaphat kiang ah, “
Huchi in Israel kumpipa’n heutu khat a sam a, “Imla tapa Mikaiah honpi meng dih” a chi hi.
Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipa Samaria kulh kongpi lutna chin mun awng ah a kumpi puan ua kizem in a mangtutphah tuaktuak uah a tu ua; zawlnei tengteng in a ma uah thu a gen uhi.
Kenaanah tapa Zedekiah in sik kite a bawl a,
Huchi mah bang in zawlnei dangte’n leng, “Ramoth Gilead ah hoh inla, lamzang in;
Mikaiah sam dia a sawlpa un, “Ngai dih, zawlneite’n kithutuak in a hoihlam in kumpipa kiang ah thu a gen chiat ua; huaiziak in nang leng a chihsa bang un a hoihlam in vagen samdih ve” chi’n a gen hi.
Huan, Mikaiah in, “

Huchi in kumpipa kiang a tun in kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Mikaiah Ramoth Gilead khua sual ding in ka kuan ding uam kuan lou ding?” a chi hi. Aman, “Kuan unla, va lamzang un, na khut a piak ahi ding hi,” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Thutak keleu lou ka kiang ah
Aman “Belam chingtu neilou bang in Israel tengteng tang ah dalhzak in ka mu a;
Israel kumpipa’n Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Ka tungtang thu zaw a selam kia loungal a hoihlam himhim ahihleh a gen sam kei ding chih k’on hilh ahi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Mikaiah in a gennawn a, “
Israel kumpipa Ahab Ramoth Gilead a vakuana, va si ding a kua’n ahia khem ding? a chih chiang in khat in, ‘Huchi khachi in,’ a chi a, midang in, ‘huchibang khachibangin’ a chi hi.
Kha khat a hongpawt a,
Aman, ‘ka vahoh ding a, zawlneite tengteng kam ah kha zuauthei in ka vasuak ding,’ a chi hi. Huan aman, na va khem ngei ding a, na lohching ding, kuan inla, huchibang in hih in,’ ” a chi hi.
Huchi in ngai dih,
Huaitak in Kenaanah tapa Zedekiah in a vanaih a, Mikaiah biang ah a beng a, “Na kiang a thugen ding
Mikaiah in, “Ngai dih, dantan sunggil a bu ding a na lut ni chiang in n’on thei ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in, Israel kumpipa’n, “Mikaiah pi unla, khaw ukpa Ammon leh kumpipa tapa kiang ah paipih nawn un,
Kumpipa’n hichi in a chi a, ‘hiai mi suangkulh ah khum unla, lungmuangtak a ka hongpai nawn masiah gimthuakna an leh gimthuakna tui pia un,’ a chi a, na chi ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan, Mikaiah in, “Lungmuangtak a na hongpai nawn peuhmah leh
Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat bel Ramoth Gilead khua ah a vahoh tou uhi.

Israel kumpipa’n Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Kei ka kibawl lamdang ding a, kisualna ah ka hoh sam ding; nang zaw na kumpipa puan kisilh in” a chi hi. Huchi in Israel kumpipa bel a kibawl lamdang a, kidouna ah a hoh tou hi.
Suria kumpipa’n a kangtalaite tung a heutute kiang ah, “Israel kumpipa loungal mi neu leng milian leng na sual ding uh ahi kei” chi’n thu a pia hi.
Hichi ahi a, “Kangtalai tung a heutute’n Jehosaphat a muh uleh Israel kumpipa eive” a chi ua. Huchi in sual tum in a umta uhi; himahleh Jehosaphat a kikou a,
Huchi in hichi ahi a, kangtalai tung a heutute’n Israel kumpipa ahi kei chih a theih un delhlou in a kiksan nawnta uhi.

Mi khat in ngim tuam neilou in a thalpeu a lai a, Israel kumpipa a awmphaw leh a awmphaw kikal ah a kap a, huchi in a kangtalai hawlpa kiang ah, “Leh hawl inla, mipi lak a kipan hon paikhiakpih in, liamna natak ka tuak hi” a chi hi.
Huai ni’n kisualna a thupi mahmah a; Israel kumpipa bel Suriate lam nga in a kangtalai ah nitaklam tanpha in ading a; huan nitum kuan in a sita hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat bel lungmuangtak in Jerusalem a a inn ah a pai nawnta hi.
Huchi in zawlnei Hanani tapa Jehu in a na dawn a, kumpipa Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Migilou na panpih in
Himahleh hiai gam a kipan Aserah na paimang a,
Jehosaphat bel Jerusalem ah a om a; huan Beer–sheba a kipan a Ephraim tanggam pha in a mite lak ah a hoh nawn a,
Huchi in khochih ah Judah gam kulhnei khua tengteng ah vaihawmmite a koih a, vaihawmmite kiang ah,
“Na thilhih uh hoihtak a ngaihtuah in hih un, mihing ading a vaihawm na hi kei ua,

Koilai khua a mi in leng thubuai a hong gen ua, tualthah thu, dan leh thupiak thu, thuseh leh vaihawm thute a hong kilan uleh,

Huai nung in hichi ahi a, Moab suante leh Ammon suante khenkhat toh Jehosaphat sual ding in a hong kuan uhi.

Huchi in kuate hiam in Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Nang sual ding in mipi thupi mahmah, tuipi gal Suria a kipan a hong kuan uhi; ngai in, Hazazontamar ah a omta uh, huai bel Engedi leng a chisam uh” chi’n a gen uhi.
