Jehosaphat
“Aw
Aw ka Pathian uh, hiai gam a tengte na mi Israelte na delhkhiak sak a, na lawm Abraham suante tangtawn a dia na piak ahi kei maw?
Hiai gam ah a hong omta ua, na min adin Mun Siangthou a hon lamsak uhi.

‘Ka tung uah thil hoihlou, namsau a vaihawmnate hiam, hite hiam, kialte hiam a hongtun leh hiai inn ma leh nang ma ah k’ong ding ding ua, hiai inn ah lah na min a om ngal a, ka mangbatna uah nang k’on sam ding ua, nang n’on na ngaihkhiak sak in n’on hondam ding,” chi in.

“Huchi in, ngai in, Ammon suante leh Moabte leh Seir tang a mi, Israelte, Aigupta gam a kipan a hong paikhiak lai un, amau a sim uh na phal kei a, amau a kipan a ki heimang zaw ua, amau a hihmang kei uhi.
Ka luah ding ua n’on piak gam a kipan hon delhkhe ding in a hong kuan uhi.

Aw ka Pathian uh, a tung ua vaihawm lou ding na hi maw? Mi huai zahzah hon sual ding a hong kuante lah na sualthei ding dan mahmah ka hi kei ua; a lohna dan ka theikei ua, nanglam ka hong nga zawmai uhi, a chi hi.
Judahte tengteng, a nau neu chikchik uh, a zite uh a tate utoh
Huchi in mipi lak ah Jahajiel tung ah
Aman, “Nou Judah gam a mi tengteng leh Jerusalem a teng tengteng leh nang Jehosaphat, na ngaikhia un:
Zingchiang in vasual un; ngai dih ua, Ziz zottouhna ah a hong tou ua, Jeruel gamdai chin guam tawp lam ah na va mu ding uh.
Hiai kidouna na sual uh a kiphamoh kei ding: kiphalh unla, adin in ding mai unla, nou lam a pang
Huchi in Jehosaphat bel a mai a leisi in a kun a; Judah mite tengteng leh Jerusalem mite tengteng
Kohath suan leh Korah suan Levite aw ngaihtak a
Huchi in zingsangin zingkhang in a thou ua, Tekoa gamdai ah a lut ua; a pailai un Jehosaphat ading a, “Aw, Judah mite leh Jerusalem mite aw, ka thu ngaikhia un;
Mipite a hanthawn khit in sepaihte ma a paikawma
Huan, la a sak ua a phattak un Ammon suante, Moab suante, tang a mite Judate sual ding a hong kuante guktan ding mite
Ammon suante leh Moab suante’n Seir tang a omte thah chimih vek leh hihman sipsip tum in a sualta uhi; Seir tang a mite a hihman khit un amau leh amau kihihman tum in a kisual nilouh uhi.
Judahte’n gamdai etna mun sang a vatun uleh mipi lam a en ua; ngai dih, misi luang lei ah a puk zengzung a, khat lel leng a suakta kei uhi.

Huchi in Jehosaphat leh a heute gallak la ding in a vahoh ua, a lak uah sum leh paite, puansilhte, suangmantamte a vamu ua, a puak zoh louh khop un a la ua, a tam petmah a, ni thum tak gallak a sek uhi.
A ni li ni’n Berakah guam ah a kikhawm ua, huai ah
Huchi in Judah mi leh Jerusalem mi tengteng a pai nawn ua Jehosaphat in Jerusalem a nuamsatak a pai ding in a ma uh a kai a;
Huchi in pekgingte, kaihgingte, pengkulte toh Jerusalem a
Israelte melma a sual chih a theih un, gamchih a mite’n Pathian a lauta uhi.
Huchi in Jehosaphat gam galmuang in a omta a; a Pathian in a kimvel a mite lak a galmuanna a piak ziak in.
Jehosaphat in Judah tung ah vai a hawmta a; kum sawmthum leh nga a upa a hih in vai a hawm pan a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih leh nga vai a hawm a; a nu min Azubah, Silhi tanu ahi.
mitmuh a thil hoih hih in a pa Asa lampi pialsan hetlou in a zui hi.
Himahleh munsangte paihmang a hi kei a, mipite’n leng a pi leh pute uh Pathian tung ah a lungtang uh a nga tuan sam kei uh.
Huan, ngai dih ua, Jehosaphat thilhih tengteng a bul a kipan a tawppha in Hanani tapa Jehu tanchin gelhnabu ah a tuang a, Israel kumpipate tanchin bu ah a tuang hi.
Huai nung in Judah kumpipa Jehosaphat in Israel kumpipa Ahaziah, thil hoihlou tak a hihsekpa a kithutuahpih hi:
Tarsis lam a pai ding long a bawlkhawm ua, Ezion-geber ah longte a bawl uhi.
Huchi in, Maresah mi Dodavah tapa Eliezer in Jehosaphat kiang ah, “Ahaziah na kithuahpih ziak in
Jehosaphat a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, a pute lak ah a pu David khopi ah a vui uhi. A tapa Jehoram a sik in a lalta hi.
Aman unau, Jehosaphat tapate a nei a, Azariah, Jehiel, Zekariah, Azariah, Mikael leh Sephatiah ahi uh. Hiai tengteng Israel kumpipa Jehosaphat tapate vek ahi uhi.
A pa un thil thupitak tak a pia a, dangkasik, dangkaeng, thil mantam pipite, Judah gam a kulhnei khuate toh; himahleh gamte pen Jehoram a pia a, a ta upapen a hih ziak in.
Huchi in, Jehoram in a pa gamluah in a hong kihihhatta a, a unaute tengteng namsau in Israelte lak a intek tampi toh a that vek hi.
Jehoram bel kum sawmthum leh nih a upa a hih in vaihawm apan a: Jerusalem ah kum giat vai a hawm hi.
Ahab inkawte hih bang in Israel kumpipate lampi a zui hi: Ahab tanu zi in a nei hi: huchi in
Himahleh,
Amah damlai in Edomte Judahte lak a kipan a hel ua, kumpipa a kibawl tawm ua.
Huchi in Jehoram a sepaih heutute leh a kangtalai tengteng toh a kuan khia a, zan in a kuan a, amau leh kangtalai tung a heutute amau umkual Edomte a sual hi.
Huchi in Edomte tunitan in Judahte lak ah a hel lailai uhi; huailai mah in Libnah khua leng a hel uhi.
Huan, Judah gam tangte ah munsang a bawl a, Jerusalem mite a angkawm sak a, Judahte a pimang hi.
Huchi in zawlnei Elijah a kipan a kiang ah lai a hongtung a “
Israel kumpipate lampi na zui zaw a, Judahte leh Jerusalem a omte Ahab inkuan bang in ang na kawmsak a, na unau, na pa inkuante nang sang a hoihzaw na thahlai ziak in.
Ngai dih,
gilpi natna thupi mahmah na nei ding a, niteng in natna ziak a na ngoi teng a tolhkhiak vek tan in na china ding hi” chi in.
Huchi in, Ethiopia mite kiang a mi Philistiate leh Arabia te lungsim Jehoram sual ding in
Huchi in, Judate a vasual ua, a gam uah a lut ua, kumpipa inn a thil tengteng a la vek ua, a tapate, a zite uh leng; a tapa naupangpen Jehoahaz lousiah a tapa dang a nutsiat kei uhi.
Huai nung in
Huan, hichi ahi a, a kum nihna a bei in a natna ziak in a ngoi a pilhkhia khia a, natna mulkimhuaitak in a sita hi. A mite’n a pa meipi a sehsak bang un a sehsak kei uhi.
A vaihawm tung in kum sawmthum leh nih ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum giat vai a hawm a, kuamah it louh in a si a, David khopi ah kumpipate han lou ah a vui uhi.

Huchi in Jerusalem mite’n a tapa naupangpen Ahaziah a sik in kumpipa ding in a bawl ua; a ta upate tengteng, Arab sepaih honte, a panmun ua hongpai mite’n a that khin vek uhi. Huchi in Judah kumpipa Jehoram tapa Ahaziah in vai a hawmta hi.
Ahaziah in a vaihawm pat tung in kum sawmli leh nih a upa ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum khat vai a hawm a, a nu min Athaliah, Omri tanu ahi.
Aman leng Ahab inkawte lampi tot a tawn a; a nu bel thil gilou tak a thuhilhtu ahi.
Ahab inkawte hih bangmah in
Amah leng a thuhilh un a om a, Ramoth Gilead ah Suria kumpipa Hazael dou ding in Israel kumpipa Ahab tapa Jehoram kiang ah a hoh a, huchi in Suriate’n Jehoram a su liam uhi.

Suria kumpipa Hazael a sualna a Ramah a sukliam uh hihdam ding in Jezreel ah a hoh hi. Huchi in Judah kumpipa Jehoram tapa Azariah bel Ahab tapa Jehoram a damlouh ziak in a veh ding in Jezreel ah a kuan hi.
Huchi in Ahaziah Jehoram kiang ah a hoh a, a manthatna Pathian hih ahi a; Nimshi tapa Jehu sual ding in Jehoram kiang a a hoh ziak in. Huai mi bel Ahab inkawte hihmang ding a
Hichi ahi a, Ahab inkawte hihse ding a a sual lai in Judahte intekte leh Ahaziah na sem a unau tapate a mu a, a that vek hi.
Ahaziah a zong ua, a man ua, Samaria ah a bu ahi, Jehu kiang ah a honpi ua, a that ua; a lungtang tengteng a
Huan Ahaziah nu Athaliah in a tapa si chih a zak in a thou a, Judah inkawte kumpipa tengteng a that vek hi.

Ahaziah tapa Joash bel kumpipa tanu Jehosabeath in kumpipa tapa a thahte uh lak a kipan a selmang a, naudonmi toh lupna dantan sung ah a sel hi. Huchi in kumpipa Jehoram tanu Jehosabeath, siampu Jehoiada zi in, Ahaziah sanggamnu ahi, Athaliah muhlouh ding in a selgu a, huchi in a thah in a omkei hi.
A kiang ua teng in Pathian inn ah kum guk a guk in a kibu a; huchi in Athaliah in a gam uah vai a hawm hi.
A kum sagih kum in Jehoiada a kihatsak a, sepaih zaheutu, Jehoram tapa Azariah, Jehohanan tapa Ishmael, Obed tapa Azariah, Adaiah tapa Maaseiah, Jikri tapa Elisaphath kiang ah thu a khung hi.
Huchi in Judah gam ah a vak ua, Judah gam khochih a Levite leh Israel inkuan intekte a kaikhawm ua, Jerusalem a vatung tou uhi.
Kikaikhawmte tengteng in Pathian inn ah kumpipa kiang ah thu a khung uhi. Huan a kiang uah, “Ngai dih ua,
Na hih ding uh hichibang ahi, siampute leh Levite khawlni a hong kuansekte seh thum a khen seh khat kongkhak ngakmite na hi ding ua;
Seh thum a khen seh khat kumpipa inn ah na om ding ua; huan seh thum a khen seh khat kulh kongpi ah; mipi tengteng bel
Himahleh, siampute leh nasemmi Levite kia loungal kuamah
Levite’n a galvan uh tawi in kumpipa a um ding ua; kuapeuh inn a honglut thah ding ahi a; huan kumpipa a pawt leh a lut in amah kiang ah om zel un” a chi hi.

Huchi in Levite leh Judah tengteng in siampu Jehoiada thupiak bang in a hih ua; amaute heute chiat khawlni a hong kuan dingte leh khawlni a tawp dingte a pi ua; siampu Jehoiada in a tawp ding pawl lah a tawpsak naikei hi.
Siampu Jehoiada in sepaih za heutute
Huan, mite galvan tawichiat in taklam sang a kipan in veilam sang tan in maitam leh inn um in kumpipa a umsak uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa tapa a hon pikhia ua, lallukhu a khusak ua, theihsakna thu a pia ua, kumpipa in a bawl ua, Jehoiada leh a tapate’n thau a nilh ua, “Pathian in kumpipa hondam hen” a chi uhi.
Athaliah in mipi kumpipa pahtawi a kiphu motmot husa uh a zak in

A en a, ngai in, kongpi a khuambul ah kumpipa ading a, a kiang ah sepaih heutute leh pengkul mutmite toh; huai gam a mi tengteng in nuam a sa mahmah ua, pengkulte a mut zuazua ua; lasa mite’n a thil gingtheite uh tum in phatna la a sa khawm uh. Huchi in Athaliah in a puante a botkek a, “Gamdouna; gamdouna ahi ve” a chi hi.
Huan, Siampu Jehoiada in sepaihte tung a heutu dia seh sepaih za heutute a pikhia a, a kiang uah, “Sepaihte kikal ah pawtsak unla, huan kuapeuh a zuizui namsau a satlup hi hen” a chi hi. siampu in “
Huchi in lampi a awn ua, sakol lutna kongpi ah kumpipa inn ah a hoh a, huai ah a that uhi.

Siangthou lou peuhmah a lutlouhna ding un

Huchi in, Athaliah namsau a a thah nung un huai gam a mi tengteng nuamsatak in a om ua, khopi galmuang in a omta hi.
Joash bel a vaihawmpat tung in kum sagih a upa ahi; Jerusalem ah kum sawmli vai a hawm a; a nu min Jibiah, Beer–sheba mi ahi.

Jehoiada in amah zi nih a guan a, tapa leh tanute a nei hi.

Siampute leh Levite a kaikhawm a, “Judate khuate ah hoh unla kum teng a na Pathian inn uh bawl phatna ding in Israel mi tengteng kiang ah sum leh pai khonkhawm unla, zekai kei un” a chi hi. Himahleh Levite a kintat tuankei uhi.
Huchi in, kumpipa’n siampu lianpen Jehoiada a sam a, a kiang ah, “Bangdia Levite
Migilou nu Athaliah tapate’n lah Pathian inn a hihse khinta ua, huan,
Huchi in, kumpipa’n thu a pia a, bawm a bawl ua,
Gamdai a Pathian sikha Mosi in Israel mite hihding a thoh bikhiah a seh
Huchi in miliante leh mipite a kipak ua, a dangkate uh a honla ua, a khon khit masiah uh bawm ah a hong koihkoih mai uhi.

Levite’n kumpipa upate kiang a bawm a hontawi ua, dangka tampi a om chih a theih un kumpipa Laigelhmi leh siampu kumpipa seh upa in bawm a kipan a bung khia a, a la ua, a mun ah a koih nawn uh. Huchibang in ni teng in a hih ua, dangka tampi a kholkhawmta uhi.
Kumpipa leh Jehoiada in
Huchi in, nasemmite’n a sem pan ua, a sem hoih mahmah ua, Pathian inn a ngei bang geih in a bawlpha ua, ading kip nawnta hi.
A zoh un dangka omlai teng kumpipa leh Jehoiada kiang ah a hontawi ua, huai in
Jehoiada bel upa pi tekkun a dam in a sita. A sih in kum za leh sawmthum a upa ahi.
Huchi in Israelte lak ah Pathian tung ah leh a inn tungtang a thil a hihhoih ziak in David khopi ah kumpipate lak ah a vui uhi.
Jehoiada sih nung in Judah miliante a hong kuan ua, kumpipa kiang ah toukaina a bawl ua, Kumpipa’n a thu uh a na pom hi.

Himahleh
Siampu Jehoiada tapa Zekariah tung ah Pathian kha a hongtung a, amah mipi tunglam ah ading a, a kiang uah, “Pathian in hichi in a chi, Bangdia lamzan theihlouh loh a
Huchi in amah a sawmta ua, kumpipa thupiak in
Huchibang in kumpipa Joash in a pa Jehoiada hehpihna theigige lou in a tapa a thatta hi. A sih kuan in, “
Huan, hichi ahi a, kum a bei in Suria sepaihte’n a hongsual ua; Judah gam leh Jerusalem ah a lut ua, a milian tengteng uh a hihman sak ua, Damaska kumpipa kiang ah gallak tengteng a khakvek uhi.
Suria sepaihte bel tawmchik kia a hong kuan ua; a pi leh pute uh Pathian

A paisan nung un, natna thupitak thuak in a paisan ua, amah mite ngei in siampu Jehoiada tapate sisan ziak in a sawm ua, a lupna a lum lai a that ua, a sita hi: David khopi ah a vui ua, himahleh kumpipate han ah a phum kei uhi.
Hiaite amah sawmmite ahi uh: Ammon mi Simeath tapa Zabad leh Moab mi Simrith tapa Jehozabad.

Huchi in a tapate tung ah thute, a tung a puakgik tak puaksak tungtang thute; Pathian in a bawlphat tungtang thute, ngai dih kumpipa tanchin hilhchianna bu ah gelh ahi. Huan, a sik in a tapa Amaziah in vai a hawmta hi.
Amaziah bel a vaihawmpat tung in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih leh kua vai a hawm a; a nu min Jehoaddan, Jerusalem mi ahi.
mitmuh in thil hoih a hih a, himahleh a lungsim a pe bukim kei hi.
Huchi in, hichi a honghi a, a gam a hong dinkip in a pa that, sikhate a that hi.
Himahleh a tate uh a that kei a, Mosi Dan laibu a tuang, “Tate ziak in pate a si ding uh ahi kei, pate ziak in tate a si ding uh ahi sam kei, michih amau gitlouhna ziak in a si ding uh ahi” chi a

Amaziah in Judahte a kaikhawm a, Judah leh Benjamin mi tengteng a inkuan uh dungzui zel in sang heutu leh za heutute nuai ah a omsak hi.Kum sawmnih tunglam teng a sim a, mi teltuam, tei leh lum tawi thei, galkapthei mi nuai thum a om uhi.
Huan, Israel gam a mi, mi hat hangsan nuai khat dangka talent za in a guailai hi.
Himahleh, a kiang ah Pathian mi, mi khat a hong a, “Aw Kumpipa, Israel sepaihte na kiang ah pai kei le uh,

Hoh hile chin leng, hangtak in kidouna ah gamtang in: huchilou in zaw Pathian in melma mai ah nang a hon vuallel sak ding: Pathian in lah panpih theihna leh vuallelhsak theihna a nei ngal a,” a hong chi hi.
Huchi in, Amaziah in Pathian mi kiang ah, “Ahihleh Israel sepaihte ka piaksa talent za bang i chih ta dia awi?” a chi a. Huan, Pathian mi’n, “
Huchi in Amaziah in Ephraim gam a kipan a sepaih hongpaite paikik ding in a khen a; huaiziak in Judate tung ah a heh mahmah ua, heh mahmah in a paikikta uhi.
Amaziah in lunglellou in mite a pikhia a, Chi Guam ah a hoh ua, Seir suante sing khat a that uhi.
Sing khat dang Judate’n a hingmat ua, suangpi vum ah a pi ua, suangpi vum a kipan in a sawnkhe mengmeng ua, a kitam zan gawp uhi.
Himahleh Amaziah in a kiang ah galkap ding a pailou ding a a sawlkik sepaihte’n Judah gam khuate, Samaria a kipan a Bethhoron pha in a sual ua, mi sang thum a that ua, gallak tampi a la uhi.
Huchi in, hichi ahi a, Amaziah Edomte that a hongpai in Seir suante pathiante a honpua a, a pathian ding in a pangsak a, a bia ua, gimlimte a halsak chiat hi.
Huaiziak in Amaziah tung ah

Huchi in, hichi ahi a, a kiang a thu a genlai in kumpipa’n, “Kumpipa vaihawmpa ding in nang konbawl ua hia? Dai mai in: bang ding a na hinna tan ding na hia?” a chi a. Huchi in zawlnei in, “Pathian in hichibang a na hih ziak leh ka thuhilhna na ngaihkhiak louh ziak in nang hihmang lungsim in a nei chih ka thei hi, a chi a” a daita hi.
Huchi in, Judah kumpipa Amaziah in a thuhilh a pom a, Israel kumpipa Jehu tapa Jehoahaz tapa Joash kiang ah, “Hong dih, kimatuah in i ki en ding” chi’n mi a sawl hi.

Israel kumpipa Joash in Judah kumpipa Amaziah kiang ah, Lebanon tang a sidar sing kiang ah, “Na tanu ka tapa zi ding in nei sak dih” chi’n a thukhak a; huan, Lebanon tang a gamsa a hongpai a, ling a hong chil pukgawp mai hi.

‘Nang ngai dih, Edom ka zou,’ na chi a, na lungsim in na kisa thei a, na inn ah om kinken mai in; nang leh Judah gam nangawn a siatna, nang dia poi ding thil bangdia tokkhe ding na hia?” chi’n mi a sawl hi.
Himahleh, Amaziah in a ngaikhe nuam kei a; Edomte pathiante a zon ziak a, Judah gam a a melmate uh khut a a piaktheihna ding a Pathian hih ahi.
Huchi in, Israel kumpipa Joash a hohtou a; Judah kumpipa Amaziah toh Judah gam Beth-shemesh khua ah kimaituah in a ki enta ngei uhi.
Huan, Judate tan Israelte sang in a hongse zaw a; michih amau inlam chiat ah a paita uhi.

Israel kumpipa Joash in Judah kumpipa, Ahaziah tapa Jehoahaz ta Amaziah bel Beth-shemesh ah a man a, Jerusalem ah a pi a, Jerusalem kulh Ephraim kulh kongpi a kipan a kulh ning kongpi tan in tong za li tak a chimsak hi.
Huan,
Huchi in, Judah kumpipa Joash tapa Amaziah bel Israelte kumpipa Jehoahaz tapa Joash sih nung in kum sawmlehnga a damlai hi.
Amaziah thilhih dangte a bul apan a tawptan in ngai dih, Judah kumpipa leh Israel kumpipate vaihawm lai thugelhna bu ah a tuang kei maw?
Huchi in, Amaziah in Toupa zuih a tawpsan tak in Jerusalem ah thah a sawm ua, Lakish khua ah a tai a; himahleh khua ah mi a delhsak ua, huai ah a that uhi.
A luang sakol in a pua ua, a pi leh pute kiang ah Judah khopi ah a vui uhi.
Huchi in, Judah mi tengteng in kum sawmlehguk a upa Uzziah a pi ua, a pa Amaziah sik in kumpipa ding in a bawlta uhi.
Aman kumpipa a pi leh pute kiang a a ihmut nung in Eloth khua a bawlpha a, Judah gam ah a pang sak nawn hi.
Uzziah bel a vaihawmpat tung in kum sawmlehguk a upa ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga leh nih vai a hawm a, a nu min Jekoliah, Jerusalem mi ahi.
A pa Amaziah thilhih bangbang hih sam in
Pathian kilakna theisiam Zekariah damsung in Pathian zong ding in a kibawl chinten hi. Pathian a zon sung teng in Pathian in a lamzang sak hi.
Philistiate sim ding in a kuan khia a, Gath kulhte, Jabneh kulh, Ashdod kulh a hihchim a; huchi in Ashdod gam ah leh Philistiate lak ah khua a bawl hi.
Huchi in, Pathian in Philistiate lak ah leh Gurbaal a om Arabiate leh Meunimite lak ah a panpih hi.
Ammonte’n Uzziah lak ah siah a liau sek ua; huchi in a honghat mahmah ziak un Aigupta gam tan in a min thangta uhi.
Uzziah in Jerusalem ah a ning ah kongpi, guam kongpi, kulh kawina lai kongpi, insangte, a lamlai a, kulh in a um hi.

Gamdai ah leng insang a lam a, gam tampi a neih ziak in tuilehte a toukhia a, phailam leh phaizang ah ganhon a nei hi; lou neimite leh uain sukmite tanglam leh gam hoihte ah a koih a, amah louma lam limsakmi tak ahi.
Uzziah in sepaih kidou mi kumpipa sepaih heutu Hanani nuai a mi Laigelhmi Jeiel leh heutu Maaseiahte’n a seh bangzel ua a pawlpawl a galkap mi a neilai hi.
Mihat hangsan chiat, a inkuan upate tengteng sang nih leh za guk ahi uhi.
A nuai uah sepaih sin siamsa ngen nuai thum leh sang sagih leh za nga melma lak a kumpipa panpihmi galsualmi taktak a om uhi.
Huchi in, Uzziah in sepaih tengteng adin lum, tei, siklukhu, sikpuanak, thalpeu leh vaisuanglot adin suangte a kisakhol hi.

Jerusalem ah mipilte theihkhiak khawlte a bawl a insang leh kulh ning chih ah thalkapna leh suang lian kuamkuam a na denna ding a koih a; a min gamchih mualchih ah a thangta a; a hat mahmah tan inn a lam a lamdangtak a panpih in a om hi.
Himahleh a honghat nung in a lungsim a hongsang a, hoihlou hial in thil a hih a,
Huchi in, siampu Azariah in a zui a, mihangsan tak
Kumpipa Uzziah a khou ua a kiang ah, “Uzziah aw,
Huan, Uzziah a hehta a; gimlim halna ding meilakna a tawi hi, huchi a siampute tung a a heh laitak in
Huchi in, siampu heutu Azariah leh siampu tengteng in a en ua, ngai in, a tal a hongphak a, huai a kipan in a vikkhe pah ua, ahi,
Kumpipa Uzziah bel a sih ni tan in a phakta a, a phak ziak in a inn tuam ah a omta hi:
Uzziah thilhih dang tengteng bel a bul a kipan a a tawppha in Amoz tapa zawlnei Isai in a gelh hi.

Huchi in, Uzziah bel a pi leh a pute kiang ah a ihmu a, kumpipa a kivuina mun a a pi leh a pute lak ah a vui uhi. “Amah zaw phak ahi ngal a” a chi ua: huchi in, a tapa Jotham in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Jotham bel a vaihawmpat tung in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehguk vai a hawm a: a nu min Jerushah, Zadok tanu ahi.
A pa Uzziah thilhih bangbang hih in
Huan, Judah tanggam ah khuate a bawl a, gamnuai ah inn thupi taktakte, insangte a lamlai hi.

Huchi in, Ammon suante’n kumpipa a dou ua, a zou hi. Huchi in, Ammon suante’n huai kum in dangka talent za leh huit buh puak sing khat leh barli buh puak sing khat a pia uhi. Huchibang mah in Ammon suante’n a kum nihna leh a kum thumna ah leng a pia uhi.
Huchi in Jotham in
Jotham thilhih dangte a galdoute, a omdante ngai dih, Israel leh Judah kumpipate tanchin gelhna bu ah a tuang hi.
A vaihawm pat tung in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehguk vai a hawm hi.
Jotham bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, David khopi ah a vui uhi: a tapa Ahaz in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Ahaz bel a vaihawmpat tung in kum sawmnih a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehguk vai a hawm a: a pu David bang in
Israel kumpipate lampi a zui zaw a, Baalte a di’n milim suntawmte a bawl lai hi.
Hinnomtapa guam ah gimlimte a hal a,
Mun sangte, tangte, sing hing nuaite ah a kithoih a, gimlimte a hal zel hi.
Huaiziak in,
A pi leh pute uh
Ephraim mi hat Jikri in kumpipa tapa Maaseiah leh inn sung upa Azrikam leh Elkanah, kumpipa zom a that hi.
Huchi in, Israel suante’n a unaute uh nuai nih, numeite, a tapate uh, a tanute uh sal in a pi ua; gallak tamtak a laksak lai ua, gallak pen Samaria ah a tun uhi.
Huai ah
Judah leh Jerusalem mite sikhanu leh sikhapa a bawl na tum ua: himahleh noute ngei in leng
Huaiziak in, ka thu pom unla, na unaute uh sal a na matte uh paisak nawn un;
Huchi in Ephraimte heutu khenkhat, Johanan tapa Azariahte, Mesillemoth tapa Berekiahte, salum tapa Jehizkiah, Hadlai tapa Amasa kidouna a kipan a hongpaite a na khelh ua, a kiang uah:
“Salte n’on pilut ding uh ahi kei: ka khelhna uh leh ka tatlekna uh behlap in,
Huchi in sepaihte’n miliante leh mipi ma ah salte leh gallak sumte a nusia uhi.

Huan, minloh louhte a hong thou ua, salte a pi ua, gallak thil in vuaktang a om teng puansilh a guan ua, a van ua, khedapte a bunsak ua, nekding leh dawn ding a pia ua, sathau a nilh ua, a hatloute tengteng sabiltung ah a tuangsak ua, tumsing khua, Jeriko ah a unaute uh kiang ah a paisakta ua: amau Samaria ah a kik nawn uhi.
Huailai in kumpipa Ahaz in Assuria kumpipate panpihna ngen ding in mi a sawl hi.
Edomte’n Judahte a vasual ua, sal dia hon mat thuk ziak un.

Philistiate’n leng phailam khuate leh Judah simte a hongla ua, Beth-shemesh, Aijalon, Gederoth, Soko leh a khopelte toh, huan, Timnah leh a khopelte, Gimzo leng a khopelte toh a la ua, huai ah a om uhi.
Israel kumpipa Ahaz ziak in
Huchi in, Suria kumpipa Tilgath pilneser a kiang ah a hongpai a, hihhat naksang in a hih mangbang zaw hi.
Ahaz in
A mangbat laitak in leng hiai kumpipa Ahaz in

Amah sual mi Damaskate pathian kiang ah a kithoih hi; “Suria kumpipate pathian in amau a panpih ziak in keileng a hon panpih theihna ding in a kiang ah ka kithoih ding ahi” a chi hi. Himahleh amah leh Israel mi tengteng siatna ahi ngal a.
Huchi in, Ahaz in Pathian inn a tuium-belsuan a kaikhawm vek a, Pathian inn a tuium-belsuan a hihkham vek a,
Judah khaw tampi ah pathian dangte dia gimlim halna munsangte a bawl a,
A thilhih dangte tengteng leh a omdan tengteng a bul a kipan a tawppha in ngai dih, Judate leh Israel kumpipate tanchin bu ah a tuang hi.
Ahaz bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, Jerusalem khopi ah a vui ua; Israel kumpipate han ah a koih kei uhi: huchi in, a tapa Hezekiah in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Hezekiah in kum sawmnih leh nga a upa a hih in vai a hawm pan a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih leh kua vai a hawm a; a nu min Abijah, Zekariah tanu ahi.
Aman a pu David thilhih hih in
Aman a vaihawmpat kum kha khatna ah
Siampute leh Levite a pilut a, suahlam sang mun za lai ah a pikhawm a, a kiang uah,
“Nou Levite aw, ka thu ngaikhia un; noute kihihsiangthou phot unla, huchi in
I pi leh pute un thil a hihkhialta ua,
Inlim kongkhakte a khak ua, khawnvakte a hihmit ua, Israelte Pathian Mun Siangthou ah gimlimte a hal kei ua, haltum thillatte leng a lan kei uhi.
Huaiziak in
Ngai dih ua, i pi leh pute uh namsau a vuallelh sak in a om ua, i tanu leh i tapate uh, i zite uh, huaiziak in sal in a na om uhi.
Ngai dih ua, a hehna mahmah a then theihna ding in
Ka naute aw donlou in omkei un,
Huchi in Levi mi
Amasai tapa Mahathte,
Kohath mi Azariah tapa Joelte;
Merari tapate lak a Abdi tapa
Kiste, Jehallelel tapa Azariah,
Gershon, Jim tapa Joahte,
Joah tapa Edente,
Elizaphan tapate lak a mi
Simri leh Jeuelte: Asaph tapate lak a mi
Zekariah leh Mataniahte;
Heman tapate lak a mi
Jehuel leh Simeite;
Jeduthun tapate lak a mi Semaiah leh Ujielte a kuan khia uhi.
A unaute uh a samkhawm ua, a kihihsiangthou ua,
Huchi in, siampute kihihsiang ding in
Kha khatna ni khat ni’n apan ua, huai kha ni giat ni’n
Huchi in kumpipa Hezekiah kiang ah kumpipa inn ah a lut ua, “
Kumpipa Ahaz in a vaihawm lai a thil a hihkhelh a, a paihmang tuium-belsuan tengteng leng ka bawl zou vek ua, ka hihsiangthou lai ua; huan, ngai dih,
Huchi in kumpipa Hezekiah bel zingkhang in a thou a, khua a miliante a samkhawm a,
Gam, Mun Siangthou leh Judate ading a khelh thoihna ding bawngtal sagih, belamtal sagih, belamnou sagih leh keltal sagih a kai tou ua. Aron tapa siampute
Huchi in bawngtalte a gou ua; siampute’n sisan a la ua, maitam a theh ua: belamtalte a gou ua, a sisan in maitam a theh ua; belamnoute leng a gou ua, a sisan in maitam a theh uhi.
Huan, keltalte khelh thoihna ding in kumpipa leh mipite kiang ah a hon kai ua, a tung uah a khut uh a nga uhi.
Siampute’n a gou ua, Israel mi tengteng ading a lemna bawlna ding in a sisan un maitam ah khelh thoihna a lan ua: Kumpipa’n a thupiak bang in Israel mi tengteng ading in a lan uhi.
Huchi in, David leh kumpipa zawlnei Gad leh zawlnei Nathan thupiak bang in
Levite bel David bawl tumging chi toh ading ua, siampute pengkul toh.
Huan, Hezekiah in maitam a haltum thillat lan ding in thu a pia a. Halmang thillat a hon lat pat un
Huchi in, mipite’n Pathian a bia ua, la siamte’n la a sa ua, pengkul mutmite’n a mut ua, haltum thillat latkhit masiah huchibang in a hih nilouh uhi.
Thillat a latkhit un kumpipa leh a kiang a om tengteng in kun in Pathian a bia uhi.
Kumpipa Hezekiah leh miliante’n Levite bel David leh zawlnei Asaph phuahphatna lasa ding in thu a pia uhi. Huchi in, nuamsatak in phatna la a sa ua, a kun ua, Pathian a bia uhi.
Huchi in Hezekiah in, “
Mipite’n haltum thillat a honglat zah uh bawngtal sawmsagih leh belamtal za leh belamnou za nih ahi: hiaite tengteng
Thillat tengteng bawngtal za guk, belamtal sang thum ahi.

Himahleh siampu a tawmlua ua, haltum thillat pen a sem seng kei ua; huaiziak in a unaute Levite’n a kimansak ma un siampute a kihihsiangthou tan in a huh uhi: Levite siampute sang in kihihsiangthou thu ah a ngentel zaw uhi.
Huchi in, haltum thillatte a tam a, haltum thillat chih ading a lemna thillat thaute, dawn ding thillat a dingte leng a tam mahmah hi.
Huchi in
Mipite adia Pathian inn a kintak a bawl ziak in Hezekiah leh mi tengteng a kipak mahmah ua; up louhpi a thil om guih a hih behlap hi.
Huan, Hezekiah in Israel gam leh Judah gam teng ah mi a sawl a, Ephraim leh Manasseh gamte ah leng
Kumpipa leh a miliante leh Jerusalem a mipi teng in kha nihna ah, Paikan Ankuang neih a sawm uhi.
Huailai in a luithei naikei ua, siampu kihihsiangthoute a tam naikei ua, Jerusalem a mipi a ki kaihkhop nailouh ziak un.
A thil sawm uh kumpipa leh mipite ngaih in a dik hi.
Huchi in Israel gam teng, Beer–sheba a kipan Dan pha in

Huchi in lai taipihmite kumpipa leh a miliante uh laitawi in, Israel leh Judah gam tengteng a pai ding in kumpipa thupiak bang in a pawt ua, “Nou Israel suante aw, Suria kumpipate khut a kipan pawt a a damsunte
Nou zaw na pi leh pute uh leh na unaute uh,
Na pi leh pute uh bang in genhak nawn kei unla,
lam na hong ngat nawn uleh na unaute uh leh na tate uh sal a man mite’n a hehpih ding ua, hiai gam ah a hongpai nawn ding uhi:
Huchi in lai taipihmite khochih ah Ephraim leh Manasseh gam tengteng ah Zebulun pha in a pai ua: himahleh amau a nuihsan in a simmawh uhi.
Himahleh Asherte leh Manassehte leh Zebulunte tampi a kitulut ua, Jerusalem ah a hoh uhi.
Judah gamte ngial houh
Huchi in kha nihna ah tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina nei ding in mi tampi Jerusalem ah a hong kikhawm ua, a tam mahmah uhi.
Huan, a thou ua, Jerusalem a maitamte a la ua, gimlim halna maitamte leng a la ua, Kidron lui ah a pai uhi.
Huchi in kha nihna ni sawmlehli ni’n Paikan Ankuangluina a gou ua; siampute leh Levite a zum ua, a kihihsiangthou ua, haltum thillat toh
Huan, Pathian mi Mosi dan bangtak in amau munchiat ah ading ua; siampute’n Levite a kipan a a tan uh sisan a theh uhi.
Mipi lak ah lah kihihsiangthou lou a tam ua; huaiziak in
Ephraim, Manasseh, Issakar, Zebulun mite tampi a ki hihsiangthou kei na ua, danlou bang in Paikan Ankuangluina a ne uhi. Himahleh Hezekiah amau ading in a thum a,
“Chingthei
Michih a lungtang a
Pathian zongte,
Mun Siangthou siansakna
Dan dungzui in kisiangsak kei mahleh,
ngaidam hen” chi in.
Huchi in,
Israel mi Jerusalem a omte’n tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina nuamsatak in ni sagih a zang ua; Levite leh siampute’n kaihging ngaihtak toh
Huan, Hezekiah in siamtak in
Huan, mipi in ni sagih dang Ankuanglui nawn a sawm ua; huchi in ni sagih dang nuamsatak in Ankuang a lui nawn uhi.

Huan, Judah kumpipa Hezekiah in mipite bawngtal sang khat leh belam sang sagih goh ding in a pia a; miliante’n mipite bawngtal sang khat leh belam sing khat a pia uhi; siampu tampite a kihihsiangthou uhi.
Huchi in Judah mipi tengteng siampute toh Levite toh, Israel gam a kipan a mipi hongpai tengteng leh namdang Israel gam a kipan a hongpai Judah gam a omte’n nuam a sa mahmah uhi.
Huchi in nuamsakna thupitak Jerusalem ah a om a: Israel kumpipa David tapa Solomon chiang ah huchibang himhim Jerusalem ah a om ngei naikei hi.
Huchi in siampu ;eh Levite a thou ua, mipite a vualzawl uhi: a aw uh ngaihkhiak in a om a, a thumna un a omna siangthou van a pha hi.

Huchi in, huai tengteng a hihkhit un huai a Israel mi om tengteng in Judah gam tengteng leh Benjamin gam leh Ephraim leh Manasseh gam suangphuhte a hihzan ua, Aserte a phuk ua, munsangte leh maitamte a chipsak vek masiah uh Judah gam khuate ah a pai zel uhi. Huchi in, Israel suante tengteng a gam uah amau khua chiat ah a pai nawn uhi.
Huan, Hezekiah in siampute leh Levite a pawl dan bangzel un michih siampute leh Levite’n a tuahchiat ding un, haltum thillat leh lemna thillat lan mi dingte, nasemmi dingte, kipahthu genmi ding leh
dan a tuang bangbang in zingsang lam leh nitaklam haltum thillat dingte, khawlni leh kha thak leh hunbi nei Ankuang a dingte kumpipa tantuan ading gan a sep hi.
Jerusalem a mipite
Huai thupiak a dalhzaktakin Israel suante’n a buhte, uainte, thaute, khuaizute, a lou ua thilsuak masapente a hongpia ua; a bangkim uh sawm a khat leng a hongpia uhi.
Israel suante leh Judah suante, Judah khuate a omte’n a bawng uleh belam uh sawm a khatte,
Kha thumna ah a koihkhawm pan ua, kha sagihna ah a koihkhawm khin uhi.
Huchi in, Hezekiah leh a miliante un koihkhawm a muh un
Hezekiah in a thil koihkhawm tungtang thu uh huai siampute leh Levite a dong a.
Zadok mi siampu heutu Azariah in a dawng a, mite’n
Huchi in Hezekiah in
Huan, thilpiakte sawm a khatte, Pathian a tuamte muanhuaitak in a nawn lut uhi: a heutu uh Levi mi Konaniah ahi a, a unau Shimei bel a zom ahi.
Konaniah leh a unau Shimei nuai ah kumpipa Hezekiah leh Pathian inn a heutu Azariah seh in endikmi Jehiel, Azajiah, Nahath, Asahel, Jerimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Ismakiah, Mahath leh Benaiahte a om uhi.
Levi mi Imna tapa Kore, suahlam kongkhak ngakmi Pathian kiang a lungsim ut thu a thilpiak kempa leh
A nuai ah Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Semaiah, Amariah, Sekaniah, siampu khua ah nasep hunbi chiat ah a unaute uh a pawlpawl a lian a neute kiang a semmi a om uhi:
Khangthu a sut pasal kum thum chiang tunglam, ni teng a
A inkuan uh pipute gelhna a siampu a sehte leh Levi mi kum sawmnih chiang tunglam a pawl dan bangzel ua nasemmi dia sehte;
Pipute gelhna a tuang a ta neute tengteng uh, a zite uh, a tapate uh, a inkuan tengteng uh; a sepna bik ua siangthoutak a a ki hih siangthoute ahi uhi.
Aron suan, khochih khaw pua a om siampute leh Levite suante gelhna a tuang peuhmahte tantuan pe ding mi sehtuam a om uhi.
Huchibang in Judah gam tengteng ah Hezekiah in a hih a.
Pathian nasep lam thu ah, dan lam thu ah, thupiak lam thu ah, a Pathian zon thu ah a hih peuhmah ah a lungsim tengteng in a hih a, a lamzang zel hi.
Huchibang a muanhuaitak a thil a hihnung un Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib a hong kuan a, Judah gam ah a honglut a, kulh nei khuate a hong um a, lak a hong tum hi.
Sennakerib a hong kuan a, Jerusalem hongsual a tum chih Hezekiah in a theih in,
Khaw pawlam a tuite hihtat ding in a miliante leh a mi hatte a thuhilh a; huchi in a panpih uhi.
Huchi in mi tampi a kikaikhawm ua, tui tengteng leh gamsung a luangsuak luite a ching tan ua, Assuria kumpipate a honglut ua, “Tui tampi bang ding in a hongnei mahmah ding ua” a chi uhi.
Huchi in a kihangsak ua, kulh chipna tata a bawl a, insungte leh pawlam kulhte leng a bawlhoih hi. David khua ah Millo a hihkip a, galvante leh lumte tampi a bawl hi.
Kidouna a mipi heutute a bawl a, khopi kongkhak mun za lai ah a samkhawm hi.
“Hattak in, hangsantak in om unla, Assuria kumpipa leh a heute mipi lau kei unla, lunglel sam kei un:
Amah lam a pang sa sepaih ahi ua, ei hon panpih ding leh hon dousak ding a ei lam a pang bel
Huai nung in Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib in; amah leh a sepaihte Lakish ah a om ua, Judah kumpipa Hezekiah leh Jerusalem a Judah mi tengteng kiang ah,
“Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib in hichi in a chi, Jerusalem lak bang ahia na uplouhna uh?
Hezekiah in,
Hezekiah mah ahi kei maw, a munsangte leh a maitamte chimsak a Judah mi leh Jerusalem a mite kiang a, Maitam khat ah Pathian na be ding ua, gimlim na hal ding uh, chi a thu pepa?
Kei leh ka pute’n gamchih namchih tung a ka thilhih uh na theikei ua hia?
Kua nam pathian ahia ka pute’n a hihman uh ka khut a kipan a a mite uh hunkhe thei om a, nou Pathian in leng ka khut a kipan a a hon hutkhiak theih tuamna ding?

Huaiziak in Hezekiah in honkhem kei henla, huchibang in honkhem kei henla, amah um kei un; bang nam pathian leh bang gam pathian himhim a mite uh ka khut a kipan leh ka pute khut a kipan hunkhe thei a omkei ua; bangchi’n na Pathian un ka khut a kipan a hon hunkhe thei tuam mahmah dia?” chi in Jerusalem ah a mite a sawl hi.
Huan, a mite’n huai sang a thupi in
Israelte
Khua a lak theihna ding un a mulkimsakna ding leh lungzin sakna ding in Jerusalem a kulh a omte Judah pau in ngaihtak in a kikou khum uhi.
Jerusalem Pathian mihing khut a bawl khovel pathian banglel phet in a gen uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa Hezekiah leh Amoz tapa zawlnei Isai huaiziak in a thum ua, van a om a sam uhi.

angel a sawl a, huai in Assuria kumpipa giahmun a mihat hangsan tengteng leh makai heutute a that hi. Huchi in zum mahmah melpu in a gam lam ah a pai nawnta hi. Huan, a pathian inn a hohlai amah tapate mahmah in namsau in a that uhi.
Huchibang in
Huan, mi tampi in Jerusalem ah
Huailai in Hezekiah bel sizou ding in a china a,
Himahleh Hezekiah in amah ading a hoih kihih dungzui in ahihkei a, a lungtang a hong kisaktheih ziak in: huaiziak in a tung ah leh Judahte leh Jerusalem tung ah hehna a hongtung hi.
Himahleh Hezekiah in a lungtang kisaktheihna kisik in a kiniamkhiak nawn a, amah leh Jerusalem a mite toh; huchi in Hezekiah damsung in
Huan, Hezekiah in sum leh pai a hau a, a thupita mahmah a; dangkasik, dangkaeng, suangmantam, gimlim, lum leh tuium-belsuan hoih pipi koihkhawmna in a lam hi.
Buh, uain, leh thau koihkhawmna in leng a lamlai a; gan chiteng koihna leh belam huang leng a bawl hi.
Huchi in, khuate leng a bawllai a, belamhon leh bawnghon a hau mahmah hi. Pathian in neizou tak in a bawl hi.
Hezekiah mah in Gihon lui tui saknung zaw pen a hubing a, David khua tumlam pang ah a luang khesak hi. Huchi in Hezekiah a thilhih tengteng ah a lamzang zel hi.
Babulon miliante’n palai a sawl ua a gam a thillamdang a dot thu uah a lungtang om tengteng a theihtheihna ding in Pathian in a nusia in a ze-et hi.
Hezekiah thilhih dang tengteng, a thilhih hoihte ngai dih, Amoz tapa zawlnei Isai kilakna bu, Judah kumpipa leh Israel kumpipate tanchin bu ah a tuang hi.

Hezekiah a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, David tapate han mun paitouhna ah a vui ua; Judah tengteng leh Jerusalem a mite’n a sih ni’n thupitak in a gal uhi. A tapa Manasseh in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Manasseh bel a vaihawm pattung in kum sawmlehnih ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga leh nga vai a hawm hi.
mitmuh a thil hoihlou, Israel suante ma a
A pa Hezekiah in a hihchip nung munsangte a bawlpha a, Baalte ading in maitam a bawl a, Aserah limte a bawl a, van a om tengteng a bia a, a na uh a sem hi.
“Jerusalem ah tangtawn in ka min a om ding”
inn huangsung intual nih ah van a om tengteng ading in maitamte a bawl hi.
Hinnom tapa guam ah mei ah a tate a lutsak a; aisante a ching a, bumte a ching a, dawi aisan siam zawlte leh bumsiamte a guaisek a;

Pathian in David leh a tapa Solomon kiang a, “Hiai inn leh Jerusalem khua a Israel chi tengteng lak a ka tel ah ka min tangtawn in ka omsak ding, a chih khitsa Pathian inn ah amah bawl, milim bawl tawm a koih hi.
Thu ka piak tengteng leh dan tengteng, thuseh, thilhih ding Mosi zang a ka piakte a zuih peuhmah uleh a pi leh pute uh ka piaksa gam a kipan Israelte khe ka kalsuan khesak nawn kei ding” a chihna ah.
Manasseh in Judahte leh Jerusalem a mite thil a hihkhial sak a;
Huan,
Huaiziak in
Huchi in, mangbang tak a a omlai in
A kiang ah a thum a, hehpih a ngen a, a ngetna a ngaihkhiak sak a, Jerusalem ah a gam ah a pai nawnta hi.

Huai nung in David khaw pawlam ah Gihon tumlam pang guam ah ngasa kongkhak lutna pha in kulh a bawl a, Ophel umsuak in sangpi in a dingsak a: Judah khua kulhnei tengteng ah heutu hangsantak tak a koih hi.
Gamdang pathiante leh milimte,
maitam a bawl a, lemna thillat kithoihnate, kipahthu gennate a lan a, Judahte bel
Mipite munsang ah a kithoih lailai ua; himahleh
Manasseh tanchin dang tengteng, a Pathian kiang a a thum thute,

A thumnate, Pathian in a hehpihna leh a kiniamkhiak ma in a gitlouhna tengteng, munsang a bawl a, Asher leh milim bawltawma bawlkhiakna mun tengteng leng ngai dih, Hozai tanchin gelhna bu ah a tuang vek ahi.
Huchi in Manasseh bel a pi leh pute kiang ah a ihmu a, amah inn ah a vui ua; a tapa Ammon in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Ammon bel a vaihawm pattung in kum sawmnih leh nih ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum nih vai a hawm hi.
A pa Manasseh hihmah bang in
A pa Manasseh kiniamkhiak bang in
Huchi in, a sikhate’n a sawm ua, amah inn ah a that uhi.
Himahleh Ammon sawmmi tengteng mipi’n a thatvek nawn ua; mipite’n a tapa Josiah a sik in kumpipa ding in a bawlta uhi.
Josiah in a vaihawm pattung in kum giat a upa ahi; Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh khat vai a hawm hi.
mitmuh in thil hoih a hihzel a, a pu David lampite a zui a, taklam ah hiam, veilam ah hiam a pialsan kei hi.

Kum giat a vaihawm kum, naupang tak a hihlai a kipan him in a pu David Pathian a zong pan a; kum sawmlehnih a vaihawm kum in Judah gam leh Jerusalem a munsangte, Asherte, milim bawltawmte, milim suntawmte a hihbei a.
Baal maitamte a mitmuh in a chimsak ua; huaite sang a sangzaw ni limte a phuk a; Asherte, milim bawltawmte, milim suntawmte a hihkham vek a, a kiang ua kithoihmite han tung ah a thehzak hi.
Siampu guhte a maitamte uah a hal a, Judah gam leh Jerusalem a hihsiang a.
Huchi mah bang in Manasseh, Ephraim, Simeon leh Naphtali khuate tan in ahihvek hi.
Maitamte a chimsak a, Asherte, milim bawltawmte a hihkham a, Israel gam tengteng a milimte a phukvek a, Jerusalem ah a pai nawn hi.
Huan, a vaihawm kum sawmlehgiat kum, a gam leh innte a hihsiang kum in Azaliah tapa Saphan, khaw ukpa Maaseiah, Joahaz tapa Laigelhmi Joah

Siampu Hilkiah kiang ah a hoh ua, kongkhak ngak Levite’n Manasseh mite, Israel omlaite, Judah mi leh Benjamin mite, Jerusalem a mite kiang a kipan a na lakkhawm uh, Pathian inn a hong koih uh dangka a pia uhi.
Huchi in,
Judah Kumpipate’n a hihsiat uh bawlhoihna ding in suangsekte, a pehnate leh a inkamte ding singleina ding in khutsiamte leh inn lammite a pia uhi.

Huchi in, mite’n muanhuaitak in nna a sem ua; a heutu uh, nasep ngaihtuahmite, Merari tapate lak a Levi mi Jahath leh Obadiah, Kohath mi tapate lak a mi Zekariah leh Mesullamte ahi ua; Levi mi, midang, thil tum siam tengteng toh;
A puak a puakthoh mite heutu leh na chiteng semmite sep ding ngaihtuahmi ahi uhi: laigelhmite, heutute, kongkhak ngakmite Levi mite lak a mi ahi uhi.
Huan,
Huchi in, Hilkiah in Laigelhmi Saphan kiang ah, “
Huan, Saphan in laibu kumpipa kiang ah a paipih a, “Na sikhate’n hih ding a seh tengteng a hih uh.
inn a dangka om a bungkhia ua, heutute leh nasemmite a pia uh” chi in thu a tun hi.
Laigelhmi Saphan in, “siampu Hilkiah in laibu a honpia” chi in kumpipa a hilh a, kumpipa ma ah a sim hi.
Hichi ahi a, kumpipa’n Danthute a zak in, a puan a botkek hi.
Kumpipa’n Hilkiah, Saphan tapa Ahikam, Mikah tapa Abdon, Laigelhmi Saphan leh kumpipa sikha Asaiah thu a pia hi.
“Kuan unla, danthu na muhkhiak tungtang thu uah kei leh Israel leh Judah gam a mite ading in
Huchi in kumpipa’n thu a piakmite leh Hilkiah puansilh kempa Hasrah tapa Tokhat tapa Shallum zi zawlnei Huldah kiang ah a vahoh ua, huai thu ah a va houpih uhi. Amah bel Jerusalem Misneh a om ahi.
Huan, aman a kiang uah,
‘Ngai dih ua, hiai mun leh asung a omte tung ah thil hoihlou ka tungsak ding a, Judah kumpipa ma a ki simkhia, laibu a tuang hamsia tengteng leng;
A khut thilhih ua hon hehsakna ding ua hon lehngatsan a milim dangte ding a gimlim a hal ziak un hiai mun tung ah ka hehna sun ahi a, daihsak ahi kei ding,’ chi in.
Himahleh

Na lungtang hihnem a a om ziak a Pathian ma a na kiniamkhiak a, hiai mun tungtang thu leh asung a omte tungtang thu na zak a, ka ma a na kiniamkhiak a, na puan na bohkek a, ka ma a na kah ziak in ken leng na thu ka na ngaikhia hi.

Ngai dih, na pi leh na pute kiang ah k’on hohsak ding a, na han ah lungmuangtakin na pai ding a, hiai mun leh asung a omte tung a k’on tunsak ding thil hoihlou tengteng na mit in a mu kei ding, chi in, gen in’ ” a chi hi. Huchi in, kumpipa kiang ah thu a tunta uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n mi a sawl a, Judah gam leh Jerusalem a Upa tengteng a samkhawm hi.
Huchi in, kumpipa leh Judah mi tengteng leh Jerusalem a mi tengteng, siampu leh Levite, mipi tengteng a lian a neu in
Kumpipa bel a mun ah ading a, huai laibu a tuang thukunte hihkip ding in a lungtang tengteng, a kha tengteng a
Jerusalem leh Benjamin mi tengteng huchibang a om ding in a chi ua. Huan, Jerusalem a mite’n Pathian, a pi leh pute uh Pathian thukhun bang in a hih uhi.
Huchi in, Josiah hi in Israel gam in a huap tengteng a kipan thilkihhuai tengteng a paimang a, Israel gam a om tengteng
Huan, Josiah in Jerusalem ah
Huchi in, siampute a nasep uh a sehsak a,
Israel mite sinsakmi, Pathian ading a hihtuam Levite kiang ah, “Israel kumpipa David tapa Solomon inn lam ah bawm siangthou koih un; na liangzang ua zawn a kiphamohta kei ding;
Israel kumpipa David gelh bang leh a tapa Solomon gelh bang in na inkuan intekpen dungzui zel in a pawlpawl in kisa un.
Na unaute uh inkuan intekpen dungzui zel in Levite tuam a tantuan nei in Mun Siangthou ah om un.
Paikan Ankuangluina ding gou unla, kihihsiangthou unla, Mosi zang a
Huchi in, Josiah in huai a mi om tengteng Paikan Ankuang adia lan ding in ganhon lak a belamnou leh kel nou sing thum leh bawngtal sang thum a pia a: huaite kumpipa sum lak a ahi.

A miliante’n mipite, siampute, Levite amau ut thu a lan ding in a pia uhi. Pathian inn heutu, Hilkiah, Zekariah leh Jehielte’n Paikan Ankuang dia lan ding in gan nou sang nih leh za guk leh bawngtal za thum siampute a pia uhi.
Konaniah, a unau Semaiah leh Nethaneel, Levite heutu Hasabiah, Zeiel leh Jozabadte’n leng Paikan Ankuang dia lat ding in Levite gan nou sang nga leh bawngtal za nga a pia uhi.
Huchi in nasepna a bawl ua, kumpipa thupiak bang in siampute a mun uah ading ua, Levite a pawl dan bangzel un.
Paikan Ankuangluina ding a gou ua, siampute’n sisan a theh ua, Levite’n a vun a hawk uhi.
Huan, Mosi laibu a tuang bang a inkuan khen dan dungzui zel a
Huchi in, Paikan Ankuangluina ding a dan bang in a em min ua; thillat siangthou sa bel, bel, bel khainanei, bel gongza in a ui ua, mi tengteng kiang ah a paipih uhi.
Huaikhit in amau leh siampute ading a bawl ua; Aron ta siampute haltum thillat leh sathau lan in zan tanpha in a buai ngal ua; huaiziak in Levite’n amau leh Aron ta siampute ading a bawl uhi.

David, Asaph, Heman leh kumpipa zawlnei Jeduthunte thupiak bang in lasami Ashaph tapate a mun uah ading ua, kongkhak ngakmite bel kongkhak chih ah a om ua; a unau Levite’n a bawlsak ziak un a na uh paisan a kiphamoh kei hi.
Huchi in kumpipa Josiah thupiak bang a Paikan Ankuang nei ding leh
Huchi in, Israel suan huailai a omte’n huai ni’n Paikan Ankuang a bawl ua, tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuang leng ni sagih a bawl lai uhi:

Zawlnei Samuel damlai a kipan Israel gam ah Paikan Ankuang huchibang himhim a bawl ngeikei ua; Israel kumpipa kuamah in Josiah leh siampute leh Levite leh Judah tengteng leh Israelte’n a neih bang uh nei a omsam kei uhi.
Kum sawmlehgiat Josiah vaihawm kum in huai Paikan Ankuang a nei uhi.
Huai tengteng khit a Josiah in biakin a bawlkhit in, Aigupta kumpipa Neko Karkhemish sual ding in Euphrates lui ah a paitou a; Josiah in a vasual hi.

Himahleh, aman, “Nang Judah kumpipa, kei leh nang bang ahia i kihihna ding om? Nang sual ding in ka hongpai kei a, ka dousa dou ding in ahizaw ka hong, Pathian in kin ding in thu honpia a, ka lam a pang Pathian doudal kei dih, a hon hihmang kha ding hi” chi in palai a sawl hi.
Himahleh Josiah in a kiksan nuam kei a, a dou theihna ding in a kibawl lamdang a, Pathian kam a kipan a Neko thugen a pom kei a, Meggiddo guam ah na sual ding in a kuan hi.
Huchi in, thalkap mite’n Josiah a kapkha ua; kumpipa’n a sikhate kiang ah, “Hon paimangpih un, liamna thupi mahmah ka tuakta” a chi hi.

Huchi in a sikhate’n kangtalai a kipan a lakhia ua, a kangtalai dang ah a koih ua, Jerusalem ah a paipih ua, a si a, a pi leh pute han ah a vui uhi. Judah mi tengteng leh Jerusalem a mite’n Josiah a sun uhi.
Huan, Jeremiah in Josiah a kah a; lasami numei leh pasalte’n tutan in Josiah a kahna la uh a gen lailai uhi. Israel gam ah dan in a nei ua, ngai dih, kahna la ah a tuangta hi.
Josiah thilhih dang tengteng, a thilhih hoihte,
A masapen a nanungpente leng, ngai dih, Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipate tanchinbu ah a tuang hi.
Huai gam a mite’n Josiah tapa Jehoahaz a pi ua, Jerusalem ah a pa sik in kumpipa in a bawl uhi.
Jehoahaz bel a vaihawmpat tung in kum sawmnih leh thum ahi a, Jerusalem ah kha thum vai a hawm hi.
Aigupta kumpipa’n Jerusalem a a vaihawmna a tawpsak a, a gam uh dangkasik talent za leh dangkaeng talent khat a liausak hi.
Aigupta kumpipa’n a unaupa Eliakim Judah leh Jerusalem a kumpipa ding in a bawl a, a min Jehoiakim chi’n a khensak hi. Huchi in, Neko in a unaupa Jehoahaz Aigupta gam ah a pi hi.
Jehoiakim bel a vaihawmpat tung in kum sawmnih leh nga ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehkhat a vai a hawm hi:
Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar amah sual ding in a hong kuan a, Babulon a pi ding in kol a bunsak hi.
Nebukadnezzar in
Jehoiakim tanchin dangte, a thil kihhuai hihte leh a omdante ngai dih, Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipate tanchin bu ah a tuang hi; huan, a tapa Jehoiakin in a sik in vai a hawmta hi.
Jehoiakin a vaihawm pattung in kum giat ahi a, Jerusalem ah kha thum leh ni sawm vai a hawm a,
Kum a bei in kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in mi a sawl a,
Zedekiah a vaihawmpat tung in kum sawmnih leh khat ahi a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehkhat vai a hawm hi:
a Pathian mitmuh in thil hoihlou a hih a;
Pathian min a kichiamsakpa kumpipa Nebukadnezzar tung ah a hellai a, paupeng in a om a,
Siampu heutu tengteng leh mipite’n leng Pathian theilou mite mah bang in thilkihhuai pipite a hih ua; Jerusalem a hih siangthou
Huchi in,
Himahleh Pathian misawlte a musit ua, a thute a ngaineu ua, a mite tung ah

Huaiziak in Kaldai kumpipa a tung uah a gamtang sak a, aman a tangvalte uh a Mun Siangthou uah namsau in a that a, nungak leh tangval leng, tek leng, teksia leng lainatna a neikei a; a khut ah a pevek hi.
Pathian inn a tuium-belsuan tengteng, a lian leh a neu leng,
Pathian innte a hal a, Jerusalem kulhte a chimsak a, huailai a inn thupi tengteng a hal a, huailai a tuium-belsuan hoih tengteng a hihse vek hi.
Namsau thah bang teng Babulon ah a pi a, Persiate a honglal tak un amah leh a tapate sikha in a om uhi:
A khawlnite gam in nuamtak a a zattan a Jeremiah kam a gen
Huchi in Persia kumpipa Kura vaihawm tung kum in Jeremiah kam a
Persia kumpipa Kura in hichi in a chi, “Khovel gam tengteng
Persia kumpipa Kura kum khatna ah, Jeremiah kam a
Hichibang in Persia kumpipa Kura in a chi,
Lei gam tengteng kei a honpeta hi;
Judah a om Jerusalem a amah inn lamsak ding in kei thu a honpia hi.
A mite tengteng na lak ua om peuhmah, a kiang ah
Pathian om henla, Judah a om,
Jerusalem ah hohtou henla,
amah Pathian ahi,
Jerusalem a om inn lam hen.
Kuapeuh a khualtamna koi munpeuh a nutsiat a omna mun a mite’n,
amah dangka leh dangkaeng,
vante leh, gantate in panpih uhenla, Jerusalem a om Pathian inn ading a
utthu a thillat chihlouh” chi in.
Huchi in Judah leh Benjamin intekpate inkawte lupente, siampute leh Levite, Pathian in Jerusalem a om
Huan, a kimvel ua omte tengteng in a khut uh dangka tuium-belsuan, dangkaengte, vante, gantate, leh thil manphate in a hihhat ua, uttak a piakte tengteng simlouh in.
Kumpipa Kura in leng
Huaite Persia kumpipa Kura in sumkempa Mithredath khut in a lakhe vek a, Judah vaihawm, Sesbazzar pia in a sim sak hi.
Huchi in hiai a muhzah uh ahi:
dangkaeng kuang sawmthum,
dangka kuang sang khat,
gimlim halna kuang sawmnih leh kua;
Dangkaeng noubem sawmthum,
dangka noubem a hoihlou deuhte za li leh sawmkhat leh tuium-belsuan dangte sang khat.
Dangkaeng leh dangka tuium-belsuan tengteng sang nga leh za li ahi uh. Saltangte lak a te Babulon a kipan Jerusalem a pitouh a omlai un, hiai tengteng Sesbazzar in a tawitou vek hi.
Hiaite pimang a om koltanna a kipan a paitou, bial a tate, Babulon lam a a kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in a pimang, Jerusalem leh Judah a, michih amah khua chiat a hongkik nawnte ahi uh.
Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Seraiah, Relaiah, Mordekai, Bilsan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum, Baanah toh hongtonte, Israel mite lak a pasal zah:
Parosh suante sang nih za khat sawmsagih leh nih.
Sephatiah suante, za thum sawmsagih leh nih.
Arah suante, za sagih sawmsagih leh nga.
Pahath Moab suante, Jeshua leh Joab tate, sang nih za giat leh sawmlehnih.
Elam suante, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Zattu suante, za kua sawmli leh nga.
Zakkai suante, za sagih leh sawmguk.
Bani suante, za guk sawmli leh nih.
Bebai suante, za guk sawmnih leh thum.
Azgad suante, sang khat za nih sawmnih leh nih.
Adonikam suante, za guk sawmguk leh guk.
Bigvai suante, sang nih sawmnga leh guk.
Adin suante, za li sawmnga leh li.
Ater suante, Hezekiah tate, sawmkua leh giat.
Bezai suante, za thum sawmnih leh thum.
Jorah suante, za khat leh sawmlehnih.
Hasum suante, za nih sawmnih leh thum.
Gibbar suante, sawmkua leh nga.
Bethlehem suante, za khat sawmnih leh thum.
Netophath mite, sawmnga leh guk.
Anathoth mite, za khat sawmnih leh giat.
Azmaveth suante, sawmli leh nih.
Kiriath Arim Kephirah, Beeroth suante, za sagih leh sawmli leh thum.
Ramah leh Geba tate, za guk sawmnih leh khat.
Mikmas mite, za khat sawmnih leh nih.
Bethel leh Ai mite, za nih sawmnih leh thum.
Nebo suante, sawmnga leh guk.
Magbish suante, za khat sawmnga leh guk.
Elam dang suante, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Harim suante, za thum leh sawmnih.
Lod, Hadid leh Ono tate, za sagih sawmnih leh nga.
Jeriko suante, za thum sawmli leh nga.
Senaah suante, sang thum leh za guk leh sawmthum.
Siampute: Jedaiah suante, Jeshua inkawte, za kua sawmsagih leh thum.
Immer suante, sang khat sawmnga leh nih.
Pashur suante, sang khat za nih sawmli leh sagih.
Harim suante, sang khat leh sawmlehsagih.
Levi mite: Jeshua leh Kadmiel suante, Hodaviah suante, sawmsagih leh li.
Lasa mite: Asaph suante, za khat sawmnih leh giat.
Kongkhak ngak mite: Sallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita leh Sobai suante, avek un za khat sawmthum leh kua.
Nithunum mite: Ziha, Hasupha leh
Tabbaoth suante;
Keros, Siaha leh Padon suante;
Lebanah, Hagabah leh Akkub suante;
Hagab, Samlai leh Hanan suante;
Giddel, Gahar leh Reaiah suante;
Rezin, Nekoda leh Gazzam suante;
Uzza, Paseah leh Besai suante;
Ashna, Meunim leh Nephusim suante;
Bakbuk, Hakupha leh Harhur suante;
Bazluth, Mehida leh Harsa suante;
Barkos, Sisera leh Thamah suante;
Neziah leh Hatipha suante,
Solomon sikhate tate:
Sotai, Hassopheret leh Peruda suante;
Jaalah, Darkon leh Giddel suante;
Sephatiah, Hattil, Zebaim mi Pokereth leh Ami suante.
Nithinim mite teng, Solomon sikhate tate, za thum sawmkua leh nih.
Huchi in hiaite Telmelah, Telharsa, Cherub, Addan, leh Immer a kipan a paitoute ahi uh: himahleh a pipute inkawte, a suan uh, Israel a kipan ahi uhia chih a taklang theikei uh:
Delaiah, Tobiah leh Nekoda suante, za guk sawmnga leh nih.
Huan siampute suante: Habaiah, Hakkoz leh Barzillai Gileadmi Barzillai tanute a kipan a zi pipa suante, amau minzui a sak in a om hi.
Hiai khangthusutna a simmite lak a min gelhna a zong ua, himahleh a mu kei uh. Huaiziak in buah a sim in a om ua siamputna a kipan dangkoih in a om uhi.
Huan Tirsatha in, siampu Urim leh Thummim toh a hong dinkhiak mateng, thil siangthou penpente nelou ding in amau a hilh hi.
Omkhawm tengteng avek un sing li sang nih za thum leh sawmguk ahi.
A pasal sikhate uleh a numei sikhate uh, sang sagih za thum sawmlehsagihte simlouh in pasal lasami leh numei lasami sang nih a nei uhi.
A sakolte uh za sagih sawmthum leh guk ahi ua; sakolneute, za nih sawmli leh nga;
Sangawngsaute, za li sawmthum leh nga; sabiltung uh, sang guk za sagih leh sawmnih.
Huan Jerusalem a
Nasepna sumbawm ah a hihtheih dan un dangkaeng darik sing guk leh sang khat, dangka paund sang nga leh siampute puansilh za khat.
Huchi in siampute, Levi mite, mite lak a a khenkhat leh lasamite, kongkhak ngakmite leh, Nithinim mite, a khopite uah a teng ua, Israel mite a khopite uah a teng uhi.
Huchi a kha sagihna a hongtun a, khopite a Israel tate a omlai un, mite Jerusalem ah mi khat bang in a kikhawm khawm uhi.

Huchi in Jozadak tapa Jeshua leh, a unaute siampute leh, Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel leh, a unaute, ading ua, Pathian mi Mosi Dan a a kigelh bang a, a tung a haltum thillatte lan ding in, Israel Pathian maitam a bawl uhi.
Maitam a kingakna tung ah a tung ua; gamte a mite ziak in a tung uah launa a om hi: huchi in a tung ah
Huan a kigelh bang in, biakbukte Ankuangluina a bawl ua, a hih ding zah in niteng haltum thillatte, dan dungzui in, niteng a sepding kiphamoh bang in a lan uhi;
Huai nung in haltum thillat ngeinate, kha thakte thillatte leh, hihsiangthou a om
A kha sagih a ni khat ni a kipan in

Sumte suangsekmite kiang leh khutsiammite kiang ah a pia ua; Kura Persia kumpipa a kipan a phalna a muh bang ua tuipi a, Joppa tan a Lebanon tang a kipan sidar singte honla ding in, Zidonte kiang leh, Turate kiang ah, sa, dawn ding, leh sathau a pia uhi.

Huchi in a kha nihna, Jerusalem a Pathian inn a hongtun uh a kum nihna in, Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel leh, Jozadak tapa Jeshua leh, a unaute siampute leh Levi mite leh, koltanna a kipan a Jerusalem a hongpaite a kipan ua; Levimite kum sawmnih a upa leh a tunglam
Huchi in Pathian in a nasemmite heutu ding in, Jeshua a tapate leh a unaute, Kadmiel leh a tapate, Judah tapate, Henadad tapate, a tapate uh leh a unaute uh Levi mite toh ading khawmta uhi.
Inn lammite’n
Huchi in
Amah lah a hoih ngal a,
a chitna tangtawn in
Israel lam ah a om gige ngal a, chi in.
Huchi in

Himahleh siampute leh Levi mite leh pipute inkawte lak a mi tampi, a mit mahmah ua hiai inn suangphum a kikoih lai a, tua inn masa mute putekte, ngaihtak in a kapkhia ua; mi tampi nuamsa in ngaihtak in a kikou uhi.
Huchi in mite’n nuamsakna kikouna husa mite kahna husa toh a theikak theikei ua: mite ngaihtak in a kikou ua, a husa uh gamlapi ah a kiza hi.
Huchi a Judah leh Benjamin melmate’n saltangte tate’n

Zerubbabel leh, pipute inkaw lupente kiang ah a hongpai nai ua, a kiang uah, “Hon lampih le ung a ke: noute bang in, na Pathian ulah ka zong ngal ua; Assuria kumpipa Esarhaddon in hiai mun a hon pipa damlai nite a kipan amah kiang ah ka kithoih uhi” a chi uhi.

Himahleh Zerubbabel leh, Jeshua leh Israel pipu inkaw lupente’n a kiang uah, “Ka Pathian uh adia inn n’on lampihna ding ziak bangmah na neikei uh; himahleh Persia kumpipa Kura in kou thu a honpiak bang in, Israel Pathian,
Huchi in gam a mite’n Judah a mite khut a hatsak takei ua, inlamna ah amau a subuaita uhi.
Persia kumpipa Kura damlai tengteng, Persia kumpipa Darias lal lai tanpha in, a thiltup uh kalhse ding, amaute siatna ding in thuhilhmite a guai uhi.
Ahasueras vaihawm pattung lai in, Judah leh Jerusalem a tengte hekna lai a gelh uhi.
Huan Artaksarses damlai in Bislam, Mithredath, Tabeel leh a kithuahpihte’n Persia kumpipa Artaksarses kiang ah lai a gelh ua; laikhak gelhdan Suria laimal a gelh a, Suria pau a bawlkhiak ahi.
Dansiam Rehum leh Laigelhmi Shimsai in Jerusalem siatna ding in kumpipa Artaksarses kiang ah hichibang in laikhak a gelhta uhi:
Dansiam Rehum leh, Laigelhmi Shimsai leh, a kithuahpihte un huchi in a gelhta ua; Dinaimite, Apharsatkimite, Tarpemite, Apharmite, Arkimite, Babulonmite, Susanmite, Dehamite, Elammite leh
Sanappar lian leh thupi in a honpi khiak a, Samaria khopi leh luipi khen a gamdang leh a dangdang a kikoih namte.
Kumpipa Artaksarses kiang a a laikhak uh kopi tuh hiai ahi:
“Luipi khenlam leh, a dangdang a na sikhate.

Na kiang a kipan a hongtou Judahte Jerusalem ah kou kiang ah a hong uh chih kumpipa kiang ah theih in om hen: Khopi helhat leh hoihlou a lam lellel ua, a kulhbangte a zouta ua, a suangphumte a puahkhinta uh.
Kumpipa’n thei hen, hiai khopi lam a om a, a kulh bangte zoh a om leh zaw, leimante, siahte sumsinna leimante hiam lamlian leimante a pe kei ding ua, a tawptawp in kumpipa siatna ahi ding.
Tuin koute kumpi inn apan huhna ngahte ka hih ziak un, kumpipa zahlakna muh koute ding in a kilawm kei a, huaiziak in kumpipa thudik k’on khak uhi;

Na pipute chiamtehna laibu sung ah kizong hen: huchi in chiamtehna laibu sung ah na mu ding a, hiai khopi helhat, kumpipate leh bialte adia poikhoihhat chih leh, nidanglai mah in leng huai sung mah a helna a nabawlta uh na thei ding hi: huaiziak a hiai khopi kihihse gawp lah ahi ngal a.
Hiai khopi a kilam a, a kulhbangte hichibang a a kihihkhit lezaw, luipi khenlam ah tan na neikei ding chih kumpipa k’on theitel sak uhi, chi in.
Huchi in dansiam Rehum leh, Laigelhmi Shimsai leh, Samaria leh, luipi khen a gam a teng a kithuahpih tengteng kiang ah kumpipa’n dawnna a khak:
Chibai,
“Laikhak ka kiang a n’on khak uh ka ma ah teltak a sim ahita.
Huchi in thu ka pia a, a kizong khin a, nidanglai in hiai khopi in kumpipate tung ah helna a bawl a, huai ah helpina leh helna a na kibawlta chih muhkhiak in a om hi.
Huailou in kumpipa thilhihthei taktak, luipi khengam tengteng tung a vaihawm, Jerusalem tung a vaihawmte a na om ua; van leimante, sumsinna leimante leh, lamlian leimante amau kiang a piak ahi hi.
Huchi in keimah in thupiak ka bawl masiah, huai mite khawl ding leh, hiai khopi lam lou ding in, thupiak bawl un.
Hiai thu a ze awllou ding in pilvang un: bangding in kumpipate siatna ding in hoihlouhna a khang dia?” chi in.

Huchi a kumpipa Artaksarses laikhak kopi Rehum leh, Laigelhmi Shimsai leh a kithuahpihte ma a a sim khit un, kintak in Jerusalem a Judate kiang ah a hoh ua, kihatsakna leh thilhihtheihna zang in amau a khawlsakta uhi.
Huchi in Jerusalem a Pathian inn nasep a khawl a: Persia kumpipa Darias vaihawm kum nihna tan in a khawl hi.
Huan zawlneite, zawlnei Haggai leh, Zekariah Iddo tapa in Judah leh Jerusalem a om Judate kiang ah a thu a genkhol ua; a kiang uah Israel Pathian min in thu a genkhol uhi.
Huchi in Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel leh, Jozadak tapa Jeshua a thou ua, Jerusalem a om Pathian inn a lam panta ua; amaute panpih in a kiang uah Pathian zawlneite a om uhi.

Huchihlai mah in a kiang uah Tattenai, luipi khen a ukpipa leh Sethar boznai leh, a kithuahpihte uh a hong ua, a kiang uah hichibang in, Hiai inn lam ding leh hiai kulhbang zou ding in kuan thu a honpia a? a chi uhi.
Huaiban ah ka kiang uah, “Hiai inlam mite min bang ahia?” chi in hong dong uhi.
Himahleh Judah upate tung ah a Pathian uh mit a tu a, a thu Darias kiang a a hongtun a, huai tungtang laikhak a dawnna a hong kiknawn masiah, amaute a khawlsak kei uhi.
Laikhak kopi Tattenai, luipi khen a ukpipa leh, Sethar boznai leh, a kithuahpih Abharsa mite, luipi khen a omte’n kumpipa Darias a khak ua:
A kiang ah laikhak a khak uh hichibang a gelh ahi;
“Darias kumpipa kiang ah, Chibaibukna kim.
Kumpipa’n thei hen, Judia bial ah ka pai ua, suang thupite a lam, Pathian thupi inn ah, kulhbangte singte a kikoih a, hiai nasep thanopna toh a pai zel a, a khut uah ma a sawnzel hi.
Huai upate thu ka dong ua, hichibang in a kiang uah, Hiai inn lam ding leh hiai kulhbang zou ding in nou kuan thu a honpia a? ka chi uhi.
Nang kiang a tel mahmah genthei ding in, a minte uh leng ka dong ua, huchi a amau makaipen a om mite min ka gelhkhiak theihna ding un.
Huchi in hichibang in kou a hon dawng uhi, Van leh lei Pathian sikhate ka hi ua, hiai inn kum tampi a na kilamsa, Israel kumpipa thupi in a lam leh a zohsa inn ka lam uhi.
Himahleh ka pipute un van Pathian a na suk heh nung un, amaute Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar, Kaldai mi khut ah a pia a, aman hiai inn a hihsia a, mite Babulon lam ah a pimang hi.
Himahleh Babulon kumpipa Kura kum khatna kum in, kumpipa Kura in hiai Pathian inn lam ding in thupiak a bawl hi.

Dangkaeng leh dangka tuium-belsuan Pathian in a leng, Nebukadnezzar in Jerusalem a om Pathian inn a kipan a a lakkhiak a, Babulon biakin a laklutte, huaite kumpipa Kura in Babulon biakin a kipan a lakhia a, mi khat Sesbazzar, ukpipa dia a bawl kiang ah huaite a pekhia hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Hiai tuium-belsuan la inla, pai in, Jerusalem a om biakin ah koih in, a mun ah Pathian inn lam hi hen” a chi hi.
Huailai in Sesbazzar a hong a, Jerusalem a om Pathian inn suangphumte a koih a: huai hun a kipan tutan in lam in a om gige a, hinapiin lah zoh ahi kei hi.

Huaiziak in, tuin kumpipa’n hoih a sakleh, Babulon a om, kumpipa laigelhte koihchingna inn sung kizong henla, Jerusalem a hiai Pathian inn lam ding kumpipa Kura in thupiak bawlna hiam a bawl leh, hiai thu ah kumpipa’n a kipahna kou hon khak hen” chi in.
Huchihlai in kumpipa Darias in thupiak a bawl a, Babulon a goute koihkhawmna, laibute in sung a zong uhi.
Huchi in Akmetha ah, Media bial a om inpi ah laizial a kimu khia a huai ah chiamtehna ding in hichibang a gelh ahi.

“Kumpipa Kura kum khatna kum in, Kura kumpipa’n thupiak a bawl hi: Jerusalem a Pathian inn tungtang, a inlam hi henla, kithoihnate a latna mun uh leh, huai a suangphumte kiptak a koih hi hen; a sanlam tong sawmguk, a zatlam tong sawmguk;
Suang thupipi vual thum leh, sing thak vual khat toh: huan sumzatbei kumpipa inn a kipan a piakkhiak hi hen:

Nebukadnezzar in Jerusalem biakin a kipan a a lakkhiak, Babulon lam a a lak, Pathian inn a dangkaeng leh dangka tuium-belsuan piak nawn vek hi henla, Jerusalem a om Pathian biakin sung ah amau mun chiat ah koihnawn vek hi hen. Kura in nasep sutzop ding thu a pia hi”
“Tattenai, luipi khen a ukpipa, Sethar boznai leh na kithuahpihte uh Apharsa mite, luipi khen a omte: huai inn lamna a kipan gamla ah om un:
Hiai Pathian inn nasepna subuai kei un; Judahte ukpipa leh Judahte upate’n a mun ah hiai Pathian inn lam uhen.

Huailou in hiai Pathian inn lamna ding a hiai Judah upate kiang ah na hih ding uh thu ka bawl hi: kumpipa vante a kipan, luipi khen a siah a kipan mahmah in, hiai mite kiang a sumzatnate thanopna chiteng toh a piak ding ahi, huchi a dal a a omlouhna ding un.

Huan a taksapnate uh, bawngtalnoute, belamtalte, belamnoute, Van Pathian kiang a haltum thillat ding huitbuh, chi, uain leh thaute, Jerusalem a om siampute thu bangzel in, tatlaklou in niteng in amau piak ding ahi:
Huchi a van Pathian kiang a gimlim kithoihnate a lat theih ua, kumpipa hinna leh a tapate hinna adia a thum theihna ding un.
Thupiak ka bawllai a, kuapeuh in hiai thu a suklamdan leh, a inn a kipan inkam dohkhiak hi henla, huai ah amah dopkang touh leh henden in om hen; hiaiziak in a inn ekvum a bawl hi hen;

Huai mah hihlamdang ding, Jerusalem a om hiai Pathian inn hihse ding a a khut uh kuansak ding kumpipate tengteng leh mite tengteng Pathian huailai a teng ding a a min omsakpa’n paithal vek hen. Kei, Darias in, thupiak ka bawlta; thanopna tengteng toh sepkhiak in om hen” chi in.
Huchi in Tattenai, luipi khen a ukpipa, Sethar boznai leh a kithuahpihte un, kumpipa Darias in a sawl ziak in, thanopna tengteng toh huchibang in a semkheta uhi.

Judah upate’n zawlnei Haggai leh Iddo tapa Zekariah genkholhna pansan in inn a lam ua ma a sawnzel uhi. Israel Pathian thupiak dungzui leh Kura, Darias leh, Persia kumpipa Artaksarses thupiak dungzui in inn a lam ua a zouta uhi.
Kumpipa Darias vaihawm kum gukna kum a om, Adar kha ni thumni in hiai inn zoh ahita hi.
Huchi in Israel tate, siampute leh Levi mite leh, saltanna ta dangte’n, hiai Pathian inn latna nuamtak in a neita uhi.
Hiai Pathian inn latna ah bawngtal za khat, belam tal za nih, belamnou za li a lan ua; Israel tengteng adia khelhna thillat ding in, keltal sawmlehnih, Israel namte zah dungzui in.
Huchi in Jerusalem a om, Pathian nasepna ading in, Mosi laibu a kigelh bang in, siampute a tanhawmna uah, Levi mite a mun tan uah a koih uhi.
Huan saltanna tate’n a kha khatna a ni sawmlehli ni’n Paikan Ankuang a lui uhi.
Siampute leh Levi mite lah a kisiangsak khawmvek ngal ua; avek un a siang uhi: huchi in saltanna tate ading leh, a unaute uh siampute ading leh, amau mah ading in, Paikan gan a gouta uhi.
Saltanna a kipan a hong paikhe nawn, Israel tate leh,
Nuamtakin ni sagih sung tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina a bawlta uhi:
Hiai thilte nung in, Persia kumpipa Artaksarses vaihawmlai in, Seraiah tapa Ezra, Azariah tapa, Hilkiah tapa,
Sallum tapa, Zadok tapa, Ahitub tapa,
Amariah tapa, Azariah tapa, Meraioth tapa,
Zerahiah tapa, Uzzi tapa, Bukki tapa,
Ahisua tapa, Phinehas tapa, Eleazar tapa, Aron siampulian tapa:
Hiai Ezra Babulon a kipan a paitou a; amah Mosi Dan,
Huan kumpipa Artaksarses kum sagih kum in, Jerusalem ah Israel tate lak a a khen, siampute lak a a khen, Levi mite, lasamite, kongkhak ngakmite leh Nithinim mite, a hohtou ua.
Huchi in kumpipa kum sagih kum kha ngana in Jerusalem ah Ezra a hongpaita hi.
Babulon a kipan a kha khatna ni khat ni’n a kuantou pan a, a kha ngana a ni khat ni’n a Pathian khut hoih a tung a a om bangzel in, Jerusalem ah a hongpai hi.
Ezra bel
Tuin kumpipa Artaksarses in siampu, Laigelhmi,
“Artaksarses, kumpipate kumpipa’n, siampu, van Pathian Dan gelhmi, buching leh huchibang zel in, Ezra kiang ah.
Thupiak ka bawl hi, huchi a Israel a mite lak a amaute tengteng, ka gamsung a, a siampute uh leh Levi mite, amau utthu petmah a Jerusalem a pai ding a theihsakte, nang kiang ah pai uhen.
Kumpipa leh a thudotmi sagihte’n, na khut a omna Pathian dan dungzui a, Judah leh Jerusalem tungtang thu kan ding a, nang a honsawl bang un;
A tenna Jerusalem a om, Israel Pathian kiang a man neilou a kumpipa leh a thudot mite’n a piaksate uh dangka leh dangkaeng paw ding in,
Babulon bial tengteng a dangka leh dangkaeng na muh tengteng, mite leh siampute’n amau utthu a thillat, Jerusalem a om a Pathian uh in adia uttak a a lat tengteng u toh;

Huaiziak in thanopna toh hiai sum in bawngtalte, belamtalte, belamnoute, na lei ding a, a anpiak thillatte uleh a dawn ding thillatte uh toh, huchi in Jerusalem a om na Pathian uh inn maitam tung ah huaite na lan ding hi.
Dangka leh dangkaeng omlai hih ding dan nang leh na unaute’n hoih na sak dandan uh, na Pathian uh deihlam bang in hih un.
Na Pathian in a nasepna ding a tuium-belsuan k’on piak uh, Jerusalem Pathian ma ah pia in.
Na Pathian in ding a kiphamoh dangdangte, piakna ding na neih dingte, kumpipa sumin a kipan in pekhia in.

“Kei, kumpipa kei Artaksarses mahmah in luipi khen a om sumkemmite tengteng kiang ah thupiak ka bawl hi, huchi a Ezra siampu, van Pathian dan Laigelhmi in nou a hon nget, thanuam tak a hihzel a hih theihna ding in.
Dangka talent za khat, huitbuh tehna za khat, uain bath za khat, sathau bath za khat leh a zah genlou in chi nangawn.
Bangpeuh van Pathian in thu a piak, van Pathian inn ading in hih in om zel hen; a ziak bel bangding in kumpipa leh a tapate gamsiatna ding in thangpaihna a om dia?

Huailou in leng k’on chitaktak uh hi, siampute leh Levite, lasamite, kongkhak ngakmite, Nithinimmite hiam hiai Pathian inn sikhate lak a a kuakua tungtang ah, van leimante, sumsinna leimante hiam lamlian leimante amau liausak dan ahi kei ding hi.
Huan nang, Ezra, na khut a om na Pathian pilna zui in, thukhenmi leh vaihawmmi, tuipi khen a omte mite tengteng vaihawm ding in sep in; na Pathian Dante tengteng, huaite theiloute nou sinsak un.

Kuapeuh na Pathian Dan leh, kumpipa dan zuilou , sihna chiang hizong leh, thanuamtak in a tung ah vaihawmna bawl in om hen, ahihkeileh, khakmangna hiam, vankhakna hiam, suangkulh lutna tan in” chi in.
Jerusalem a om
Kumpipa leh, a thudotmite leh, kumpipa vaihawm pih thilhihthei tengteng ma a ka tung a chitna hon pepa amah ahi. Huchi in ka tung a
Huan hiaite a pipute uh inkawte lak a a lupente ahi ua, kumpipa Artaksarses vaihawm lai a kei hon zuite khangthusuina ahi.
Phinehas tapate lak ah, Gershom: Ithamar tapate lak ah Daniel: David tapate lak ah, Hattush,
Sekaniah tapate lak ah; Parosh tapate lak ah, Zekariah: amah toh pasalte khangthusuina a suikhawmte za khat leh sawmnga ahi.
Pahath moab tapate lak ah, Eliho enai Zerahiah tapa; huan amah toh pasal za nihte.
Sekaniah tapate lak ah, Jahaziel tapa; amah toh pasal sawmngate.
Adin tapate lak ah, Ebed Jonathan tapa; amah toh pasal sawmngate.
Elam tapate lak ah, Jesaiah Athaliah tapa; amah toh pasal sawmsagihte.
Sephatiah tapate, Mikael tapa Zebadiah; amah toh pasal sawmgukte.
Joab tapate lak ah, Obadiah Jehiel tapa; amah toh pasal za nih leh sawmlehgiatte.
Selomith tapate lak ah, Josiphiah tapa; amah toh pasal za khat leh sawmgukte.
Bebai tapate lak ah, Bebai tapa Zekariah; amah toh pasal sawmnih leh giatte.
Azgad tapate lak ah, Hakkatan tapa Johanan; amah toh pasal za leh sawmte.
Adonikam tapate lak ah, a nanungpente; hiaite a min uh ahi, Eliphelet, Jeuel, Semaiah leh, amau toh pasal sawmgukte.
Bigvai tapate, Uthai leh Zabbud; amau toh pasal sawmsagihte.
Huchi in Ahava pha a luang luipi tan in amaute ka kaikhawm a; huai ah ni thum ka giak uhi: mite leh siampute ka en vialvial a, huai ah Levi tapate kuamah ka mu kei hi.
Huan Eliezer, Semaiah, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zekariah, leh Mesullam, mi kizen tungtuante, sinsakmite Joiarib leh Elnathan leng ka thukhak hi.

Kasiphia mun a Iddo hausapa kiang ah amau ka sawlkhia a; Iddo kiang ah leh, Kasiphia mun a a unaute Nithinimte kiang a a gen ding uh ka hilh a, i Pathian inn ua ding a nasemmi ei adia hon tonpih ding in.
Huchi in i tung ua i Pathian khut hoih a om dungzui in pasal khat lunggelsiam, Mahli tapate lak a, Levi tapa, Israel tapa ei ding in Serebiah a tapate leh a unaute, sawmlehgiat toh a honpi uhi.
Hasabiah, amah toh Merari tapate lak a Jesaiah toh, a unaute leh a tapate uh, sawmnih toh;
Nithinimte, David leh a vaihawmpihte’n Levi mite nasepna ding a a piakte uh, za nih leh sawmnih Nithinimte: avek un minkhumna ah a khum uhi.

Huchi in huai ah, Ahava lui ah, anngawl ka phuang a, huchi a ei ading leh i nau neute ading leh, i neih i lamte tengteng adia lampi tang amah lak a zong ding a i Pathian uh ma a ei leh ei i ki niamkhiak theihna ding in.

Lampi a melma dou ding a ei hon panpih dia kumpipa kiang a sepaih pawl leh sakol tungtuangmi nget lah ka zum ngal a: hoihna ding a, amah zongte tung ah i Pathian khut a om a; himahleh amah mangngilh tengteng siatna ding in a thilhihtheihna leh a thangpaihna a om hi, chi a, kumpipa kiang a thu i gentak ziak in.
An i ngawl ua hiai ding in i Pathian ngen ngutngut ua: huchi in amah i ngenzou uhi.
Huailai in siampute lak a pipente lak a sawmlehnih, Serebiah, Hasabiah, leh a kiang ua om a unaute uh lak a sawm ka seh khen a,
Amau ading in dangka leh dangkaeng leh, tuium belsuante, kumpipa leh a thuhilhmite leh, a vaihawmpihte’n Toupa inn a a latte uh huailai a om Israel tengteng puak ding in ka buk sak hi.
A khut sung mahmah uah dangka talent za guk leh sawmnga leh dangka tuium-belsuan talent za ka buk sak a; dangkaeng lak ah talent za;
Dangkaeng noubem sawmnih, darik sang khat lak ah; dal hoih nawttet, dangkaeng bang a manpha bel nih.
Huan a kiang uah, “
inn dantante, Jerusalem a siampute lak a lupente leh, Levi mite leh, Israel pipute inkaw vaihawmte ma a huaite na buk masiah uh, kiveng unla, amaute kem un” ka chi hi.
Huchi in siampute leh Levi mite’n i Pathian inn ua Jerusalem a a puak ding un dangka leh dangkaeng leh, tuium-belsuan bukkhiakte a la uhi.

Huailai in Jerusalem lam a pai ding in, a kha khatna a ni sawmlehnih ni’n Ahava lui a kipan i pawtkhia ua: huan i Pathian khut i tung uah a om a, melma khut leh lampi a bukmi a kipan aman hon tankheta hi.
Huchi in Jerusalem i tung ua huai ah ni thum i om uhi.

A ni li ni’n dangka leh dangkaeng leh tuium-belsuan i Pathian inn uah Uriah siampu tapa Meremoth khut ah buk in a om a; a kiang ah Phinehas tapa Eleazar a om; a kiang uah Jeshua tapa Jozabad leh, Binnui tapa Noadiah, Levi mite a om uhi;
A zah leh a gikdan tengteng sim ahi a, huai hun in laibu a chiamteh ahi.

Pimangna a kipan a hongpai, saltanna tate’n Israel Pathian kiang ah haltum thillatte, bawngtal sawmlehnih Israel tengteng ading in, belamtal sawmkua leh guk, belamnou sawmsagih leh sagih, keltal khelhna thillat ding in sawmlehnih a lan uhi: hiaite tengteng
Kumpipa thukhenmite kiang leh, tuipi khen a ukpipate kiang ah kumpipa thupiakte a pekhia ua: huchi in mite leh Pathian inn a panpih uhi.

Huchi a hiai thilte hihkhit a a omlai in, vaihawmtute ka kiang ah a hongpai nai ua, “Israel mite leh, siampute leh Levi mite, gamte a mite a kipan amau leh amau a ki koihtuam kei ua, amaute kihhuainate, Kananmi, Hitmi, Perizmi, Jebusmi, Amonmi, Moabmi, Aigupta mi leh Amormite, dungzui in a om uhi.

Amau ading leh a tapate uh ading in a tanute uh a la ua; huchi in chi siangthou gamte mite toh amau leh amau a kihelkhawmta hi: ahi, hiai tatlekna ah vaihawmtute khut leh vaihawmmite a pipen ahi uhi” a chi hi.
Huchi a hiai thil ka zak in, ka puansilh leh ka puanak ka botkek a, ka khamul ka botkhia a, lamdangsa in ka tusuk hi.
Huailai in saltanna a amaute tatlekna ziak a, Israelte Pathian thute ziak a lau a ling michih ka kiang ah a hong kikhawm ua; nitaklam kithoih hun masiah lamdangsa in ka tu hi.
Nitaklam kithoih hunlai in ka tunggikna apan ka thou a, ka puansilh leh ka puanak bohkeksa toh; ka khukdin a,
“Aw ka Pathian, na kiang a daktou ding in ka zum in ka zakta hi, ka Pathian: ka thulimlouhnate uh ka lu tunglam uah a pung deuhdeuh a, ka mawhna un vante a sunta hi.

Ka pipute uh damlai hun a kipan tuni pha in nakpi’n ka mawhta ua; huchi in ka thulimlouhnate uh ziak in kou, ka kumpipate uh leh, ka siampute uh, gamte kumpipate khut ah, namsau ah, saltanna ah, lohna ah leh zahlakna ah, hiai ni bang in piakkhiak in ka omta uhi.
Huan tuin sawtlou sung a din

Sikha lah ka hi ngal ua; huchipi in leng sikha ka hihna uah ka Pathian un a hon mangngilh kei a, himahleh Persia kumpipate mitmuh in chitna a honpia a, halhna honpe ding, ka Pathian uh inn dingsak ding leh, huai a siatna bawlpha ding leh, Judah leh Jerusalem a kulhbang honpe ding in.
“Tuin, Aw ka Pathian uh, hiai zoh in bang ka chi ding ua? Na thupiakte lah ka lehngatsanta ngal ua,
Na sikha zawlneite zang in thu n’on pia a: ‘Luah ding a na paina uh, huai gam, gamte a mite nitna ziak a gam nin ahi. A kihhuainate un gam tawp khatlam a kipan khatlam tawp tan a hihdimna ziak in.

Huaiziak in na tanute uh a tapate uh kiang ah pe kei unla, a tanute uh leng na tapate uh ading in la sam kei un, a muanna uhiam a hauhsakna uhiam leng tangtawn in zong sam kei un: huchi a na hat ua, gam a a hoih na nek ua, tangtawn a na tate uh adia gouluah dia na nutsiat theihna ding un.’

Huchi a ka gamtat giloute uh ziak leh ka mawhna thupi mahmah ziak ua, ka tung ua hongtung tengteng zoh in, nang ka Pathian un ka thulimlouhnate uh gunzah sang a hon gawt tawmzaw a, a sibang omlai n’on piak mu in.
Na thupiakte bohse nawn in, kihhuaite hih mite toh kituak in ka om ding uam? Omlai ding omlou khop a, suakta ding himhim leng omlou khop a na bolgawp matan ka tung uah na heh nilouh dia hia?
‘Aw

Huchi a Ezra kap a Pathian inn mai a leisatna a kinei a, a thum a, thupha a tawilai in, Israel a kipan pasal leh numei leh naupang tampi kikhawmte a kiang ah hong kikaikhawm ua: mite lah a nakkah mahmah ngal ua.

Elam tapate lak a khat, Jehiel tapa Sekaniah in a dawng a Ezra kiang ah, I Pathian tung ah i talekta ua, gammi numei namdangte i kitenpihta uh: hitamahleh hiai thil thu ah Israel ading in lametna a omlai hi.

Huaiziak in tuin zite tengteng leh, amau a kipan a huchibang a piangte, ka toupa thuhilh dungzui in leh, i Pathian uh thupiak a lau a lingte thuhilh dungzui in, koihmang ding in i Pathian toh thu i khung ding uh; huan dan dungzui a hih hi hen.
Thou in, a thu lah nang a ahi ngal a, kou leng na kiang ah ka om ding uhi: hangsantak in om inla, hih in, a chi hi.
Huchi in Ezra a thou a, hiai thu dungzui a a hih ding un, siampute leh Levi mite lak a pipente leh Israel tengteng a kichiamsak hi. Huchi in a kichiamta uhi.
Pathian inn mai a kipan Ezra a thoukhia a, Eliasib tapa Jehohanan dantan sung ah a lut a: huailai a hongpai lai in, tanghou a ne kei a, tui lah a dawn kei hi: saltanna a te tatlekna ziak in a sun hi.
Judah leh Jerusalem teng a saltanna tate tengteng kiang ah thu a puangkhia ua, Jerusalem a ki kaikhawm vek ding in;
Kuapeuh ni thum sung a hong pailou, vaihawmte leh upate thu bangzel in, a van tengteng laksak ahi ding a, amah mah saltanna omkhawmte a kipan a tuamkoih ahi ding hi.

Huchihlai in Judah leh Benjamin mi tengteng Jerusalem ah ni thum sung in a kikaikhawm ua; a kha kuan a ahi a, a kha ni sawmnih ni: huchi in mi tengteng Pathian inn mai a mun lian ah a tu ua, hiai thu leh vuahpi ziak in a ling uhi.
Huchi in Ezra siampu ading a, a kiang uah, “Na talek ua, Israel mawhna khangsak ding in, numei namdangte na kitenpih uhi,
Huaiziak in tuin na pipute uh Pathian,
Huchi in kikhawmte tengteng in a dawng ua, aw ngaihtak in, “Ka tungtang uh na gen bang in, huchibang in ka hih ding uh” a chi uhi.
Himahleh mite tampi ahi ua, vuah tampi zuklai ahi, huchi in inkuan ah ka ding theikei ua, hiai lah ni khat hiam nasep ahi kei hi: hiai thu ah lah nakpitak in i talekta ngal ua.

Tuin omkhawmte ading in i vaihawmte ding seh in om henla, i Pathian uh thangpaihna ei a kipan a a kihei a, hiai thu hihbei a hih masiah, numei lamdangte kitenpihte i khopite a omte hun sehsate ah, khopi chiteng a upate amau toh, huailai a vaihawmmite toh, hongpai uhen.
Asahel tapa Jonathan leh Tikvah tapa Jahaziah kia’n hiai thu a sel uh: huan Mesullam leh Sabbethai Levi mi in amaute a panpih uhi.

Huchibang in saltanna a kipan kiknawnte’n a hihta uhi. Siampu Ezra, a pipute uh inkawte dungzui a, pipute inkaw lak a lupen kuate hiam toh, leh a minte ua amaute tengteng, tuam sehkhiak in a om ua; huchi in a thu entel ding in a kha sawmna ni khat ni’n a tuta uhi.
Huchi in a kha khatna a ni khat ni’n numei namdang kitenpih mite a hihkhin uhi.
Huchi in siampute tapate lak ah numei namdang kitenpih muh in a om a: huaite, Jeshua tapate, Jozadak tapa leh, a unaute, Maaseiah, Eliezer, Jarib leh Gedaliahte.
Huchi in a zite uh koihmang ding in pha a sa ua; a mawh ziak un, a mawhna ading in belamhon lak a belamtal a lanta uhi.
Immer tapate lak ah; Hanani leh Zebadiah.
Harim tapate lak ah; Maaseiah, Elijah, Semaiah, Jehiel leh, Uzziah.
Pashur tapate lak ah; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad leh Elasah.
Levi mite lak ah; Jozabad, Shimei, Kelaiah, huai mah Kelita ahi, Pethahiah, Judah leh Eliezer.
Lasamite lak ah; Eliasib: huan kongkhak ngakmite lak ah;
Sallum, Telem leh Uri.
Israel lak ah: Parosh tapate lak ah; Ramiah, Izziah,
