Malkiah Mijamin, Eleazar leh, Malkijah leh Benaiah.
Elam tapate lak ah;
Mattaniah, Zekariah, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremoth leh Eliah.
Zattu tapate lak ah: Elioenai, Eliasib, Mattaniah, Jeremoth, Zabad, leh Aziza.
Bebai tapate lak ah; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, Athlai.
Bani tapate lak ah;
Mesullam, Malluk, Adaiah, Jasub, Sheal leh Jeremoth.
Huan
Pahath moab tapate lak ah; Adna, Selal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah,
Bezalel, Binnui, leh Manasseh.
Harim tapate lak ah; Eliezer, Ishijah,
Malkiah, Semaiah, Simeon;
Benjamin, Malluk leh Semariah.
Hasum tapate lak ah; Mattenai, Mattattah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh,
Shimei.
Bani tapate lak ah; Maadai, Amram, leh Uel;
Benaiah,
Bedeiah, Kelluh;
Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliasib;
Mattaniah, Mattenai, leh Jaasau;
Bani, Binnui, Shimei;
Selemiah leh, Nathan leh, Adaiah;
Maknadebai, Shasai, Sharai;
Azarel leh, Selemiah, Semariah;
Sallum, Amariah, Joseph.
Nebo tapate lak ah; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Iddo, Joel leh Benaiah.
Hiai tengtengte’n namdang zite a pi ua: huchi in a lak ua khenkhatte’n hiai zite a kipan tate a nei uhi.
Hakaliah tapa Nehemiah thute: Kisleu kha, kum sawmnihna kum a, Susan Inpi a ka om in, hichi a honghi hi.
Hananiah, ka unaute lak a khat, a hong a, amah leh Judah a kipan mi kuate hiam; amaute kiang ah saltanna a kipan a nutsiat a omte, Judah suaktate tanchin leh Jerusalem thu ka dong hi.
Amau ka kiang ah, “Huailai bial a saltanna a kipan omlaite gimthuakna thupi thuak leh simmawh in a om uh: Jerusalem kulhbangte leng a chim a, a kongpite leng mei in a kang” a chi uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, hiai thute ka zaklai in, ka tu a ka kap a, ni bangzah hiam ka sun a; van Pathian ma ah an ka ngawl a ka thum hi.
“Aw

Tuin na bil in hon hungaih henla, na mitte hong kihong hen, huchi a na sikha thumna, huai hun a, sun leh zan a, na sikhate Israel tate adia, nangmah tung a ka hihkhelh uh, Israel tate khelhna thupha tawi a, ka thumna n’on ngaihkhiaksakna din: ahi, kei leh ka pa inkawte ka khialta uhi.
Thanghuaitak in na tung ah ka gamta ta ua, na thupiakte ka zuita kei ua, na sikha Mosi kiang a na thupiak, thusehte, leh vaihawmte.
‘Theigige in, k’on ngen ahi, na sikha Mosi kiang a thu na piak, Na tatlek uh leh mite lak ah k’on thehzak ding:

Himahleh ka kiang a na hongkik ua, ka thupiakte na zuih ua na hih uleh, delhkhiak a na omna uh vantawp mun ah himahleh, huai a kipan in amaute ka kaikhawm ding a, ka min omna dia ka mun telsa ah amau ka pikhawm ding’ chi in.
Tuin hiaite, na thilhihtheihna thupi leh, na banhat a na tatsa, na sikhate leh na mite ahi uh.
Aw
Kei bel kumpipa nou tawipa ka hi.
Kumpipa Artaksarses vaihawm kum sawmnih, Nisan kha in, a ma a uain a omlai in hichi ahi, uain ka la a, kumpipa kiang ah ka pia hi. A ma ah nidang in dahmel ka pu nai kei hi.
Kumpipa’n ka kiang ah, “Na chi lah a na kei a, bangchi a dahmel pu na hia? Hiai bangmah dang ahi kei a lungtang dahna ahi” a chi hi. Huaitak in ka lau mahmah hi.
Kumpipa kiang ah, “Kumpipa tangtawn in dam hen: bangchi’n ka mel a dahlou dia, ka pipute hante omna, khopi, segawp a om a, huai a kongpite mei in kangbei ahi?” ka chi hi.
Kumpipa’n ka kiang ah, “Ahihleh bang ahia na nget?” a chi hi. Huchi in van Pathian kiang ah ka thumta hi.
Kumpipa kiang ah, “Kumpipa kipah lam a hih a, na mitmuh a na sikha in deihsakna a muhleh, Judah gam ah, ka pipute han omna khopi ka bawl theihna ding in kei honsawl in” ka chi hi.

Kumpipa’n ka kiang ah, kumpinu leng a kiang ah a tu a, “Na khualzinna bang tan a sawt ahi dia? Chikchiang in na hong kiknawn dia?” a chi hi. Huchi in honsawl kumpipa kipahlam ahi a; amah hun ka pia hi.
Huailou in kumpipa kiang ah, “Kumpipa kipahlam a hih a, Judah gam tan ka tun mateng a kei a hon paisak zel theihna ding un, luipi khen a ukpipate kiang a piak ding laikhakte honpe lechin.

Inn toh kizom kulh kongpite ading leh, khopi kulhbangte ading leh, ka lutna ding inn ading a bawl ding inkamte bawlna dia sing a hon piakna ding in, kumpipa gammang kempa Asaph kiang ah laikhak hon khaksak lechin” ka chi hi. Huchi in kumpipa’n ka tung a ka Pathian khut hoih a om bang in hon phalsak hi.
Huchi in luipi khen a ukpipate kiang ka hongtung a, a kiang uah kumpipa laikhakte ka pia hi. Huchi in kumpipa’n honzui ding in sepaihpawl heutute leh sakol tungtuangmite a sawl hi.
Horon mi, Sanballat leh, sikha Tobiah, Ammon min a zak un, a lungkham sak mahmah a, Israel tate hoihna zong mi khat hongpai a om ngal hi.
Huchi in Jerusalem ah ka hong a, huai ah ni thum ka omta hi.

Zan in ka thou a, kei leh ka kiang a om mi tawmchikte; Jerusalem adia hih ding ka lungtang sung a ka Pathian in bang ahia a koih mi kuamah ka hilh kei a: ka kiang ah ganta, a tung a ka tuanna ganta chihlouh, leng a omkei hi.
Zan in gulpi tuileh lam, ekvum kongpi lam ah, guam kongpi a pai in ka pawtkhia a, a chimsa, Jerusalem kulhbangte leh, mei a kangsa kongpite ka velta hi.
Tuikhuk kongpi leh kumpipa dil ah ka hoh a: himahleh ka nuai a om ganta paina ding mun a omkei hi.
Luita zui in zan in ka paitou a, kulhbang ka vel a; ka kiknawn a, guam kongpi ah ka lut a, huchi in ka kiknawnta hi.
Huchi in ka paina lam hiam, ka hih hiam vaihawmmite’n a theikei uh; Judate kiang ah leng, siampute hiam, miliante hiam, vaihawmte hiam leh nasep sem midangte kiang ah leng ka gen naikei hi.

Huan a kiang uah, “I dinmun uh hoihlouh dan na mu ua, Jerusalem a siatkhit dan, huai a kongpite mei a kat khitdan: simmawh a i om nawnlouh na ding in, kisa un Jerusalem bang i lamnawn ding uh” ka chi hi.

Huchi in ka tung a hoih ka Pathian khut tanchin ka kiang a a gen kumpipa thute leng amau ka hilh a; Huchi in amau, “Thou ni’n lamni” a chi uhi. Huchi in nasep hoih sem ding in a khutte uh a hatsakta uhi.
Himahleh Horon mi Sanballat leh, Ammon mi sikha Tobiah leh Arabia mi Geshem in a zak un, a hon nuihsan ua, a hon simmawh ua, “Bang thil ahia na hih uh? Kumpipa tung a hel ding na hi uhia?” a chi uhi.

Amau ka dawng a a kiang uah, “Van Pathian, aman kou a hon lohching sak ding, huaiziak in kou a sikhate ka thou ding ua ka lam ding uh: himahleh nou Jerusalem ah thuneihna, theihgigena leh tan na neikei uhi” ka chi hi.
Huchi in siampu lian Eliasib a unau siampute toh a thou ua, belam kongpi a bawl ua; a hih siangthou ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua; Hameah insang tan in a hih siangthou ua, Hananel insang tan in.
Amah zom in Jeriko mite’n a lam uhi. Amau zom in Imri tapa Zakkur in a lam hi.
Hassenah tapate’n ngasa kongpi a hih ua; a inkamte a khung ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua, a kalhnate leh a kalhnatawnte.
Amau zom in Uriah tapa, Hakkoz tapa, Meremoth in a bawlpha hi. Amau zom in Mesullam Berekiah tapa, Meshezabel tapa in a bawlpha hi. Amau zom in Baana tapa Zadok in a bawlpha hi.
Amau zom in Tekoa mite’n a bawlpha ua; himahleh a miliante un a Toupa uh nasepna ah a nakpan nuam kei uhi.
Kongpi lui pen Paseah tapa Jehoiada leh Besodeiah tapa Mesullam in a bawlpha ua, a inkamte a khung ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua, a kalhnate leh, a kalhnatawnte.
Amau zom in Gibeon mi Melatiah leh Meronoth mi, Jadon, Gibeon mite, Mizpah mite, luipi khen a ukpipa mangtutphah toh kizomte’n a bawlhoih uhi.
Amah zom in Harhaiah, dangkaeng sekmite tapa Uzziel in a bawlhoih hi. Amah zom in gimlim bawlmite tapa Hananiah in a bawlhoih a, kulhbang za tanpha in Jerusalem a bubitsak uhi.
Amaute zom in Jerusalem seh kimkhat a vaihawmpa, Hur tapa Rephaiah in a bawlpha hi.
Amau zom in Harumaph tapa Jedaiah in, amah inn sunhial in a bawlpha a. Amah zom in Hasabneiah tapa Hattush in a bawlpha hi.
Malkijah, Harim tapa leh Hasub Pahath moab tapa in a mundang leh meipi insang a bawlpha uhi.
Amah zom in Jerusalem seh kimkhat a vaihawmpa, Hallohesh tapa Sallum in, amah leh a tanute toh, a bawlpha uhi.
Guam kongpi pen Hanun leh, Zanoah a tengte’n a bawlpha ua, a lam ua, a kongkhakte a tung ua, a kalhnate leh, a kalhnatawnte leh, ekvum kongpi lam a kulhbang tong sang khat toh.
Huchi in Bethhakkerem seh a vaihawmpa, Rekab tapa Malkijah in ekvum kongpi a bawlhoih a, a kongkhakte, a kalhnate leh, a tung a a kalhnatawnte a lam hi.

Mizpah seh a vaihawmpa, Kolhozeh tapa Sallum in tuikhuk kongpi a bawlhoih a; a lam a, a vuka, kongkhakte, kalhnate, leh kalhnatawnte leh, kumpipa huan kiang a Siloah dil bang, David khopi a kipan a sukpai leichial tan in a bawl hi.
Amah nung in Azbuk tapa Nehemiah, Bethzur gam kimkhat a vaihawmpa’n, David han toh kimatuah mun leh, dil bawltawm chiang leh, mi hatte inn tan in a bawlpha hi.
Amah nung in, Levite, Bani tapa Rehumte’n a bawlpha ua. Amah zom in Keilah seh kimkhat a vaihawmpa Asabiah in, amah sehding in a bawlhoih hi.
Amah nung in a unaute uh, Keilah seh kimkhat a vaihawmpa, Henadad tapa Bavai in a bawlhoih hi,
Amah zom in Mizpah vaihawmpa, Jeshua tapa Ezer in, sehdang, kulhbang kawina tak a galvan in tan a paitouhna sun in a bawlhoih hi.
Amah nung in Zabbai tapa Baruk in seh dang, kulhbang kawina a kipan siampu lian Eliasib inn kongkhak chiang a bawlhoih hi.
Amah nung in Hakkoz tapa Uria tapa Meremoth in sehdang, Eliasib in kongkhak a kipan Eliasib inn tawpna chiang a bawlpha hi.
Amah nung in, phaizang mite, siampute’n a bawlpha uh.
Amau nung in Benjamin leh Hasub in a inn pha un a bawlhoih ua. Amau nung in Ananiah tapa Maaseiah tapa Azariah inn amah inn sik ah a bawlhoih a.
Amah nung in Henadad tapa Binui in sehdang, Azariah inn a kipan kulhbang kawina tan, leh a ning chiang, a bawlhoih hi.
Uzai tapa Palal in kulhbang kawina sunchiang a bawlhoih a, kumpipa inn tungnung zaw a kipan a hong dingkhetou insang, venna pisa kiang a om toh.
Amah nung in Parosh tapa Pedaiah leh tempul nasem Ophel a tengteng suahlam pang tui kongpi leh insang lawkkhia zawn tan a bawlhoih uhi.
Amah khit in Tekoa mite’n seh dang, Ophel kulhbang chiangpha, insang thupi ding khetou sun in a bawlpha uhi.
Siampute’n sakol kongpi tunglam, michih in amah inn tung sun chiat in a bawlpha uhi.
Amaute nung in Immer tapa Zadok in amah inn tung suntou chiang a bawlpha a. Amah nung in suahlam kongpi ngakpa Sekaniah tapa Semaiah in, a bawlpha hi.
Amah nung in Selemiah tapa Hananiah leh Hanun Zalaph tapa gukna in seh dang a bawlpha uhi. Amah nung in Berekiah tapa Mesullam in a dantan tungzawn a bawlpha hi.
Amah nung in dangkaeng sekmite tapa Malkijah in Nithinimte inn leh, sumsinmite inn chiang, Hammipkad kongpi zawnchiang leh, a ning a kahtouhna chiang a bawlpha hi.
Huan a ning a kahtouhna leh belam kongpi kikal dangkaeng sekmite leh sumsinmite’n a bawlpha uhi.
Himahleh hichi ahi a, kulhbang i lam uh chih Sanballat in a zak in, a hehta a, nakpitak in a thangpai a, Judate a kouta hi.

Huchi in a unaute leh Samari sepaih pawl ma ah thu a gen a, “Hiai Judah zawngkhalte’n bang ahia a hih uh? Kihihhat ding uhia? Kithoih ding uh hia? Ni khat a zoh sawm uhia? A kangsa ahi chih mu napi in, ninneng sunvum a kipan a suangte bawlthak ding uhia?” a chi hi.
Huailai in Ammon mi Tobiah a kiang ah a om a, “Aman, a inlam uh, sehal khat kuantou leh, a suang bang uh a laichim ding” a chi hi.
Za in aw ka Pathian; simmawh in lah ka om ngal ua: a hon kouna uh amau lutung ah kiksak inla, saltanna gam a loh ding in amau pia in:
A ginatlouhna uh khuh kenla, na ma a kipan a khelhna uh nulmang in omsak ken: inlamte ma ah lah nang a hon hehsakta uhi.
Huchi in bang ka bawl ua; bang tengteng, a sandan kim chiang in a kizomta hi: mite’n lah nna sem ding in lungsim a nei uhi.

Himahleh hichi ahi a, Sanballat, Tobiah, Arab mite, Ammon mite leh Ashdod mite’n Jerusalem kulhbangte bawlphatna in ma a sawntou zel a, a kitapsiatna a kibawlpha, chih a zak un, a thangpai mahmah uhi;
Avek ua hong kuan a Jerusalem dou ding leh, huai a buaina omsak ding in a kikum khawmta uhi.
Himahleh i Pathian kiang ah i thum ua, sun leh zan a amaute vil ding i koih ua, amau ziak in.
Judah in, “Puakgik pawte hatna a bahta a,
ninneng tampi a om;
huchi in kulhbang bawl theilou i hi uh” a chi hi.
I melmate un, “A lak uh i hongtun ua, amaute i thah ua, nasep i khawlsak matan a theikei ding ua, muh leng a mu kei ding uh” a chi uhi.
Hichi ahi a, amau kiang a teng Judahte a hong pailai un, “Sawmvei i kiang uah mun tengteng a kipan hondou ding uh ahi” a honchi uhi.
Huaiziak in kulhbang nunglam mun a mun niampen pen, mun awngthawlte ah, ka koih a, mite a inkuan kuan uh dungzui in a namsaute utoh, a teipite utoh, a thalpeute utoh ka koih hi.
Huchi in ka en a, ka thou a, miliante leh, vaihawmmite leh mipi dangte kiang ah, “Amau lau kei un:
Hichi ahia, i melmate’n i na theita ua, Pathian in a thusawm uh bangmahlou a suaksak a, kulhbang bawl ding in i vek un michih a nasepna munah i kilehnawnta uh chih a zalai uhi.

Huchi in hichi ahia huai hun a kipan in, ka sikhate lak a a kimkhat nasepna ah a pang ua, a lak ua kimkhat in teipi, lum leh thalpeu leh sik puanakte a len ua; vaihawmmite Judah inkawte nung ah a omvek uhi.
Kulhbang bawlte leh, vangik pawte’n a puaklai un, michih in a khutte uh a khat nasepna a nasem in, a khut khatlam a galvan tawi in;
Inlam mite’n, michih in a namsau a pang ah khaisa a nei in, huchi in a lamtou zel uhi. Pengkul mutpa ka kiang ah a om hi.
Huchi in miliante kiang leh, vaihawmmite kiang ah leh mite lak a a dangdangte kiang ah, “nasep thupi in, a tam a, kulhbang tung ah i kikhenzak ua, kigamlat tak in:
Koilai mun peuh a pengkul ging na zakna uah, i kiang uah huai lam ah kuan un; i Pathian un gal hondou sak ding ahi” ka chi hi.
Nna i sem ua: a lak ua a kimkhat in zingsang kipat a kipan aksite hong kilat matan teipi a tawi uhi.
Huchi mah bang in huailai in mite kiang ah, michih a sikha toh Jerusalem sung ah giak hen, zan chiang a ei ding a galvil a hih a, sun chiang a na a sep theihna ding un, ka chi hi.
Huchi in ken leng, ka unaute’n leng, ka sikhate’n leng, kei hongzui galvil mite’n leng, i lak ua kuamah in i puante uh i suahkei ua, michih a galvan toh tui ah a hoh uhi.
Huailai in a unaute uh Judate dem a nakpitak a kikouna mite leh a zite uh a kipan a hong omta hi.
Kou, ka tapate leh ka tanute uh, tampi ka hi ua: ka nek ua ka hin theihna ding un, buh leh bal honpia un” chi pawl a hongom uhi.
“Ka loute uh, ka grephuante uh, ka innte uh ka zuak uhi: kial ziak in, buh leh bal honpia un” chi kuate hiam leng a om uhi.
“Ka loute uh leh ka grephuante ua dit ding in kumpipa siah ding in sum ka leitawi uh, chi mi khenkhat leng a om uhi.

Hinapi in ka sa uh ka unaute uh sa bang ahi a, ka tate uh lah amau tate bang: ngai un, ka tapate uh leh ka tanute uh sikhate hi ding in tanna ah ka pi ua, ka tanute uh lak a a khente tanna a pi in a omkhin man hial uhi: panpih theihna ka neikei ua; midangte’n lah ka loute uh leh ka grephuante uh a nei ngal ua” chi in.
Huchi a a kikouna uleh hiai thute ka zak in ka heh mahmah hi.
Huchih lai in ka kingaihtuah a, miliante leh vaihawmmite ka kiselpih a, a kiang uah, “Michih in a unau lak ah a pung na phut uh” ka chi hi. Huchi in amaute demna kikhawmpi thupi ka nei hi.

A kiang uah, “Khovelmite kiang a zuak a omsa, i unau Judahte i theih bang un i tanta ua; nou na unaute uh zuak un, i lak ua khot a om ding uh ahi maw?” ka chi hi. Amau a daidide ua, thu khat leng a neikei uhi.
“Na thilhih uh a hoih kei: i melmate khovel mite’n hon simmawhna ziak un, i Pathian laudansiam a na om ding uh hilou hia? ka chi behlap hi.
Huchi mah bang in, ‘ka unaute leh ka sikhate leh ken amau kiang ah sum leh buh leh bal ka leitawi sak uhi. K’on ngen ahi, a pung omsak keini.’

‘Pe nawn un, k’on ngen ahi, a kiang uah, tuni mahmah in, a loute uh, a grephuante, a olive huante uleh a innte uh, a sum uh a seh zana leng, buh leh bal, uain,’ leh sathau, amau a kipan na phutkhia uhi” ka chi hi.

Huchi in amau, “Ka pe nawn ding ua, amau a kipan bangmah ka ngiat kei ding uh; huchibang in ka hih ding ua, na chih mah bang in” a chi uhi. Ken siampute ka sam a, a kichiamna uh ka la a, huchi a hiai thuchiam bang a a hihna ding un.

Ken leng ka pheipi ka vuang a, “Hiai thuchiam bawllou peuhmah, a inn a kipan, a nasepna a kipan Pathian in hichibang in vuang hen; hichibang tak a vuan khiak ahi ding a, a hawm ding” ka chi hi. Huan khawmpite tengteng in, “Amen,

Huailou in Judah gam a a ukpipa ding ua seh a ka omlai a kipan, kumpipa Artaksarses kum sawmnihna leh kum sawmthum leh nih chiang, huai bel, kum sawmlehnih ahi a, kei leh ka unaute’n ukpipa tanghou ka ne kei uhi.

Himahleh kei ma a ukpipa masate mite tung a mawhsak theih ahi ua, amau a kipan in tanghou leh uain a la uh, dangka sekel sawmli simlouh in; ahi, a sikhate uh nangawn in mite tung ah vai a hawm uhi: himahleh ken Pathian ka kihtak ziak in huchibang in ka hih kei hi.
Ahi, huailou leng hiai kulhbang nasepna ah ka pang nilouhlouh a, gam himhim leng i leikei uh: ka sikhate tengteng huailam ah nasepna ah kaihkhawm in a om uhi.
Huaiban ah ka dohkan ah Judahte leh vaihawmmite lak a mi za leh sawmnga, i kim i vel ua om khovelmite lak apan i kiang ua hongpaite chih louh, a om uhi.

Ni khat ading a bawlkholhsa bawngtal khat leh belam hoihhoih guk ahi ua; vasate leng kei dia bawlkholhsa in a om ua, huan ni sawm sung a khatvei uain chichih kipan koih hoih: hinapi in hiai mite tung a tanna a gik ziak in, ukpipa tanghou hiaite tengteng ziak in ka phut kei hi.
Aw ka Pathian, hoihna ding in, hiai mite adia ka hih tengteng kei lam hon theigige in.

Huan hichi ahi a, kulhbang ka lamkhin a, huai ah khangkham a om nawnta kei chih, Sanballat, Tobiah, Geshem Arabia mi leh i melma dangdangte kiang a a ki tut lai in; huai huntan in kongpi kongkhakte tung naikei mah leng;
Sanballat leh Geshem in ka kiang ah mi a honsawl ua, “Hongpai in, Ono phaizang a khuate lak a khat ah kimuh khawmna i nei ding” chi in. Himahleh ka tung a gilou hih a ngaihtuah uhi.
Huchi in a kiang uah sawltakte ka sawl a, “Nna thupi ka seplai ahi, k’ong paisuk theikei: bangdia ka nna nusia a, na kiang ua ka hongsuk ziak a, nasep khawl ding ahia oi?” ka chi hi.
Huan hichibang ngen in livei ka kiang ah mi a honsawl ua; a ngeingei in amaute ka dawng zel hi.
Huchi in Sanballat in ka kiang ah hichibang in a ngaveina ding in a sikha a khut a laikhak honsa toh a honsawl a;
Huai ah, “Namte lak ah a kigen a, Gasmu in a chi a, nang leh Judahte’n hel na tum uh; huai ading in kulhbang na lam hi: huchi in nang a kumpipa uh hi ding in, hiai thute dungzui in,

Jerusalem a nang tanchin gen ding in zawlneite leng na sep a, Judah ah kumpipa a om chi in: huchi in tuin hiai thute dungzui in kumpipa kiang a tut ding ahi; Huaiziak in hong kuan inla, kihouna i nei ding” chi in.
A kiang ah mi ka sawl a, “Na gen bang a huchibang thilhih a omkei a, himahleh na lungtang a kipan na phuahtawm ahi” chi in.
Amau lah, hihlouh a hihna ding in, “Nasepna a kipan a khutte uh hatlouh sak in a om ding” chi a hon lausak a ut chiat ngal uhi.
Himahleh tuin Aw Pathian, nang ka khutte hatsak in.

Khum a om, Mehetabel tapa Delaiah tapa Semaiah inn ah ka hoh a; aman, “Biakin sung ah, Pathian inn ah i kikhawm dia, huchi in biakin kongkhakte i khak ding: nang that dia hong ding uh lah ahi ngal ua; ahi, zan in nang that ding a hong ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
Ken bel, “Kei bang mi, taiding honsa maw? Huan kua ahia, huchi a omkei bang, a hinna humbitna dia biakin sung a hohnuam ding? Ka lut kei ding,” ka chi hi.
Ka ngaihtuah a, huchi in, ngai in, Pathian in amah a sawlkei a; himahleh ka siatna ding in hiai genkholhna a genkheta hi: Tobiah leh Sanballat in amah a guai uhi.
Hiai ading a goih ahi, ka launa ding leh, huchibang a hih a, khial a, thutut gilou ding a thubuai a neih theihna ding ua, kei a hon simmawh theihna ding un.
Aw ka Pathian, Tobiah leh Sanballat a nasepte uh bangzel leh zawlneinu Noadiah leh, zawlnei dangte, lausak hontumte, theigige in.
Huchi in Elul kha ni sawmnih leh nga ni, ni sawmnga leh nih sung in, kulhbang zoh in a omta hi.
Hichi ahi a, i melmate tengteng in huai a zak un, i kim i vel ua om khovelmi tengteng a lauta ua, a mitmuh ngei uah nakpitak in a lunglelta uhi: hiai nasep i Pathian hih ahi chih a thei ngal ua.
Huailou in huailai in Judah miliante’n laikhak tampi Tobiah kiang ah a khak ua, amau kiang ah Tobiah laikhakte a hongtung hi.
Amah Arah tapa Sekaniah tanu pasal a hih ziak in, Judah ah mi tampi amah lam a kichiam lah a om ngal ua; a tapa Jehohanan in Berekiah tapa Mesullam tanu zi in a nei hi.
Huailou leng ka ma ah a thil hoih hihte a gen ua, amah kiang ah ka thute a tunzel uhi. Huchi in Tobiah in laikhakte kei hon hihlau ding in a khak hi.
Hichi a honghi a, kulhbang lamkhit a hih a, kongkhakte ka tun khit a, kongkhak ngakmite leh lasamite leh Levi mite seh a hihkhit nung un,
Ka unau Hanani leh Hananiah kulh ukpa kiang ah Jerusalem kepna ka pia a: mi ginom ahi a, tampi sang a Pathian laudansiam a hih ziak in.

A kiang ah, “Ni a sat mateng Jerusalem kongpite hon hi kei hen; galvilmi a dinlai un, kong khakte khak uhenla, amaute kalhkhum un: Jerusalem a tengte vengmi sep inla, michih amah dinmun ah, michih amah in zawn chiat ah” chi in.
Khopi a za in a lian a: himahleh huai ah mite a tawm ua, innte lah lam ahi kei uhi.

Huchi in ka Pathian in ka lungtang miliante, vaihawmmite, mipite, kaikhawm ding in a koih a, huchi a khangsutna a sim a hihtheihna ding un. Huan a masapen a honglang amaute khangsutna laibu ka muta a, huai ah gelh a om ka mu hi:
Hiaite bial naupangte ahi ua, Nebukadnezzar Babulon kumpipa’n a pimangte, huai pimang a omte lak a saltanna kipan a paitoute, Jerusalem leh Judah a kiknawn, michih amah khopi a kik;
Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Raamiah, Nahamani, Mordekai, Bilsan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum, Baanah toh hong paite.
Israel mite lak a pasal zah:
Parosh suante, sang nih za khat leh sawmsagih leh nih.
Sephatiah suante, za thum sawmsagih leh nih.
Arah suante, za guk sawmnga leh nih.
Pahath moab suante, Jeshua leh Joab tate, sang nih leh za giat leh sawmlehgiat.
Elam suan, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Zattu suan, za giat sawmli leh nga.
Zakkai suan, za sagih leh sawmguk.
Binnui suan, za guk sawmli leh giat.
Bebai suan, za guk sawmnih leh giat.
Azgad suan, sang nih za thum sawmnih leh nih.
Adonikam suan, za guk sawmguk leh sagih.
Bigvai suan, sang nih sawmguk leh sagih.
Adin suan, za guk sawmnga leh nga.
Ater, Hezekiah suan, sawmkua leh giat.
Hasum suan, za thum sawmnih leh giat.
Bezai suan, za thum sawmnih leh li.
Hariph suan, za khat leh sawmlehnih.
Gibeon suan, sawmkua leh nga.
Bethlehem leh Netophath suan, za khat sawmgiat leh giat.
Anathoth mite, za khat sawmnih leh giat.
Bethazmaveth, mite sawmli leh nih.
Kiriath-jearim, Kephirah, Beeroth suante, za sagih sawmli leh thum.
Ramah leh Geba mite, za guk sawmnih leh khat.
Mikmas suante, za khat leh sawmnih leh nih.
Bethel leh Ai mite, za khat sawmnih leh thum.
Nebo dang mite, sawmnga leh nih.
Elam dang suan, sang khat za nih sawmnga leh li.
Harim suan, za thum leh sawmnih.
Jeriko suan, za thum sawmli leh nga.
Lod, Hadid leh Ono suante, za sagih sawmnih leh khat.
Senaah suan, sang thum za kua leh sawmthum.
Siampute:
Jedaiah suante, Jeshua inkuan a kipan, za kua sawmsagih leh thum.
Imer suante, sang khat sawmnga leh nih.
Pashur suante, sang khat za nih sawmli leh sagih.
Harim suante, sang khat leh sawmlehsagih.
Levi mite: Jeshua, Kadmiel suante,
Hodevah suante, sawmsagih leh li.
Lasamite: Asaph suante, za khat sawmli leh giat.
Kongkhakngakte: Sallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub,
Hatita leh Sobai suante,
za khat sawmthum leh giat.
Temple nasemmi, Nithinim mite:
Ziha, Hasupha, Tabbaoth;
Keros, Sia, Padon;
Lebana, Hagaba, Salmai;
Hanan, Giddel, Gahar;
Reaiah, Rezin, Nekoda;
Gazzam, Uzza, Paseah;
Besai, Meunim, Nephisesim;
Bakbuk, Hakupha, Harhur;
Bazlith, Mehida, Harsa;
Barkos, Sisera, Tamah;
Neziah, leh Hatipha suante.
Solomon sikhate tate:
Sotai, Sophereth, Perida;
Jaala, Darkon, Giddel;
Sephatiah, Hattil, Zebaim mi Pokereth leh Ammon suante.
Nithinim mite tengteng leh Solomon sikhate suante, za thum leh sawmkua leh nih.
Huan hiaite Telmelah, Telharsa, Kerub, Addon leh Immer a kipan paitoute ahi uh: himahleh a pipute uh inkawte, Israel a kipan ahi hiam chih a ensak theikei uhi:
Delaiah, Tobiah leh Nekoda suante, za guk sawmli leh nih.
Siampute a kipan: Habaiah, Koz leh Barzillai suan, Gilead mi Barzillai tanute lak a zi neipa min a tamsak uhi.
Hiaite’n khangthusuina a sim a omte lak ah a min gelhna uh a zong ua, himahleh muh in a omkei: huaiziak in nin a sim ahi ua siamputna a kipan koihkhiak ahi uhi.
Ukpipa in a kiang uah, siampu khat Urim leh Thummim toh a hongsuah mateng thil siangthou penpente lak a neklouh ding chih a gen hi.
Omkhawm tengteng avek un sing li leh sang nih leh za thum leh sawmguk,
A pasal sikhate uh leh a nungak sikhate uh, sang sagih za thum sawmthum leh sagihte, simlouh in:
pasal lasa leh numei lasa za nih sawmli leh nga a nei uhi.
A sakolte uh za sagih sawmthum leh guk;
a sakolneute uh, za nih sawmli leh nga;
A sangawngsaute, za li sawmthum leh nga;
a sabiltungte uh sang guk za sagih leh sawmnih.
Pipute inkawte lak a lupente lak a kipan khenkhatte nasem ding in a kipia uhi.
Ukpipa in sumbawm ah dangkaeng darik sang khat,
maiphiatkuang sawmnga,
siampute puan za nga leh sawmthum a pia hi.
Huan pipute inkawte lak a lupente lak a khenkhatte’n dangkaeng darik sang sawmnih leh,
dangka paund sang nih leh za nih a pia uhi.
Mipite lak a a dangdangte piak dangkaeng darik sang sawmnih leh dangka paund sang nih leh,
siampute puan sawmguk leh sagih ahi.

Huchi in siampute, Levi mite, kongkhakngakte leh lasamite, mite lak a a khente leh, Nethinim mite leh Israel tengteng a khopite uah a tengta uhi. A kha sagihna a hongtun in, Israel tate a khopite uah a om uhi.
Huchi in mite tengteng tui kongpi mai a om mun lian ah mi khat bang in a kikhawm khawmta ua;
Siampu Ezra in omkhawmte, pasal leh numei, theihsiamna toh za thei ding tengteng ma ah kha sagihna ni khat ni’n danthu a honlata hi.
Pasal leh numeite, leh theisiam thei dingte ma ah, zingkhang a kipan sunlai tanpha in tui kongpi mai a om mun lian ma ah a simta hi; huchi in mite tengteng in Dan laibu a bil uh a doh chiat uhi.

Huai ding mah a a bawl uh, sing pulpit tung ah Laigelhmi Ezra ading a; a sik ah Mattithiah, Shema, Anaiah, Uriah, Hilkiah leh Maaseiah, a taklam pang ah ading ua; a veilam pang ah, Pedaiah, Misael, Malkiah, Hasum, Hasbaddana, Zekariah leh Mesullam.
Huchi in Ezra in mite mitmuh in laibu a hong a; mite tunglam ah a om ngal a; huan a hongta a, mite tengteng ading uhi:
Ezra in
Jeshua, Bani, Serebiah, Jamin, Akkub, Sabbethai, Hodiah, Maaseiah, Kelita, Azariah, Jozabad, Hanan, Pelaiah leh Levi mite’n mipite dan theisiam ding in a bawl ua: huchi in mite amau mun ah ading uhi.
Huchi in teltak in laibu ah, Pathian dan sung ah a sim ua; a omdan a taklang ua, huchi a lai simkhiak a theihsiamna ding un.
Huan Nehemiah, amah Tirsatha ahi a, leh siampu Ezra Laigelhmi leh Levite mite sinsakte’n, mite tengteng kiang ah, “Tuni
A kiang uah, “Pai unla, thaute ne unla, a khumkhum dawn unla, amah adia bangmah bawlkhol a omlou kiang ah tantuante khak un: tuni lah i Toupa uh adia ni siangthou ahi. Dah kei unla;
Huchi in Levite’n mite tengteng a daisak ua, “Tuni siangthou a hih ziak in, dai un; dah sam kei un” chi in.
Huan mite tengteng ne ding leh, dawn ding leh, vualnopna thupi bawlding in a paita ua, a kiang ua phuankhiak a om thute a theisiamta uhi.
A ni nih nin mite tengteng pipute inkaw lupente, siampute leh, Levi mite, Laigelhmi Ezra kiang ah, Dan thute ngaikhe ding in a kikhawm khawm uhi.
Mosi zang a Israel tate a kha sagihna Ankuangluina a aidakbuk a a tendan ding uh a thu a piakdan dan a kigelh a mu uhi:

“Mual ah kuan khia unla, Olive hiang, gam olive leh muising hiang, tum hiang, sing vunsah hiang, a kigelh bang a, aidakbuk bawlna ding in vala un, a khopi tengteng uh leh Jerusalem a a puankhiak theihna ding un” a chi hi.
Huchi in mite a kuan khia ua, a vala ua, michih in a inn tung ah, a pisate uah, Pathian pisate ah, tui kongpi a mun lian ah leh Ephraim kongpi a mun lian ah aidakbukte a kibawlta uhi.

Huan saltanna a kipan hong painawnte omkhawmte tengteng in aidakbukte a bawl ua, aidakbuk ah a teng uhi. Nun tapa Joshua damlai a kipan huai ni tanpha in Israel tate’n lah huchibang in a hih naikei uhi. Huchi in nakpi a kipahna mahmah a omta hi.
Huailou in niteng in ni masapen a kipan ni tawpni tan in Pathian Dan laibu sung ah a sim hi. Huan Ankuangluina ni sagih a nei ua; a ni giatni in thuseh dungzui in kikhopna thupi a omta hi.
Hiai kha ni sawmnih leh li ni’n Israel tate anngawl kawm leh, saiip puansilh kawm leh a tung ua lei kibuak kawm in a kikhawm ua.
Huchi in Israel chite mikhual tengteng a kipan in a ki koihtuam ua, ading ua a khelhnate uleh, a pipute uh thulimlouhnate thupha a tawi uhi.
A mun uah ading ua,
Huchihlai in Levi mite, Jeshua, Bani, Kadmiel, Sebaniah, Bunni, Serebiah, Bani leh Kenanite dohkan tung ah ading ua,
Huailai in Levi mite, Jeshua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hasabneiah, Serebiah, Hodiah, Sebaniah leh Pethahiah te’n,
“Ding unla tangtawn a kipan
tangtawn pha in
vualzawl un:
huchi in vualzawlna leh
phatna tengteng tunglam a tawisang a om,
na min thupi a vualzawl in om hen.”
Ezra in a gen a,
“Nang, nang kia mahmah
Van, vante Van a,
sepaihte tengteng,
lei leh asung a thil om tengteng,
tuipite leh asung ua
om tengteng na bawl a,
avek un na hawi a;
van sepaihte’n nang a hon bia uhi.
Abram tel a, Kaldaite Ur a kipan a amah pikhia a,
a kiang a Abraham
min pepa,
Na ma a lungtang ginom na mu a,
Kanaan mite, Hit mite,
Amor mite, Jebus mite leh
Girgas mite gam peding a
amah toh thukhun bawlpa,
a chite kiang a pe ding in,
na thute bawl piching a;
nang lah na diktat ngal a.
“Aigupta a ka pipute uh
gimthuakna na mu a,
Tuipi San a a kah uh na za a;
Pharo tung leh,
a sikhate tengteng tung leh,
a gam a mite tengteng tung ah chiamtehna leh thillamdangte na ensak a;
amaute siatna ding in kisatheitak in a gamtang uh
chih lah na thei ngal hi;
tuni a bang in, min na kimuh hi.
A ma uah tuipi na khen a,
huchi in gamhul tung ah
tuipi lak ah a paisuak ua;
amau delhte nang
tuithuk sung ah, tui hattak sung a suang bang in na pailut hi.
Huailou in sun in meipi kitung in amaute na pi a; zan in meipi ding in,
a paina ding lampi ua vakna
amaute kiang a pe ding in.
Sinai vum ah leng na hohsuk a,
van a kipan in amau na houpih a,
vaihawm dikte leh dan dikte,
thuseh leh thupiak hoihte na pia hi:
Amau kiang ah na khawlni
siangthou na theisak a,
na sikha Mosi khut in,
thupiakte leh, thusehte leh dan amaute na thupiak in na pia hi:
A gilkial un van a kipan
tanghou na pia a,
a dangtak un suangpi a kipan
amaute adin tui na pawt khesak a,
amaute peding a na khut na lik a,
gam luahding a kuan ding in
amaute thu na pia hi.
“Himahleh amaute leh a pipute un kisatheitak in a hih ua,
a paupeng ua, na thupiakte a ngaikhe kei uhi,
Thu a mang nuam kei ua,
a lak ua na hih na thillamdangte leng a limsak sam kei uh;
himahleh a kiuangsak ua,
a helna uah a tanna ua kiknawn ding in heutu khat a sep uhi:
himahleh nang ngaidam dia mansa,
lainatna a dim leh hehpihsiam,
heh mengmeng lou, chitna hau,
amaute lehngatsanlou Pathian na hi a.
Ahi, bawngnou sun a bawllai un,
Aigupta a kipan a nang hon pikhepa
hiai na Pathian ahi, a chi ua,
nakpitak a thangpaihnate a bawllai un;
Huchi napi in na chitna tampi
ziak in amaute gamdai ah
na lehngatsan kei hi:
sun in a tung ua kipan meipi ding a paimang kei a,
vakna amau peding,
zan a mei ding leng, a paina lampi uah amaute piding in.
Amaute chil di’n na kha hoih
na pia a, a kam uah na Manna na phallou kei a,
amaute a dangtak un tui na pia hi.
Ahi, kum sawmli gamdai ah
amaute na vak a,
bangmah a tasam kei ua;
a puansilhte uh a tulkei a,
a khepekte uh a bawkkei hi.
Huaiban ah gam leh mite amau a pia a,
a tantuante uh dungzui a na piakkhiakte:
Sihon gam, Heshbon kumpipa
gam leh Bashan kumpipa
Og gam a lata uhi.
Van aksite bang in a tate uh
na pungsak a, nei ding in
a lut ding uh chi a a pi leh pute kiang a na gen bang in
gamsung ah na pilut hi.
Huchi in tate a lut ua gam
a neita ua, a ma uah gam a
tengte na satpuk a,
Kanaante, a kumpite leh,
gam a mite, amau khut ah na pia a,
huchi a a utdan ua a tung ua a hihtheihna ding un.
Khopi hatte, gam hoihte a la ua,
thil hoih tengteng a dim innte
a nei ua, tuibel sekte, grephuante,
olive huante, a tam a tam
theikungte: huchi in a ne ua,
a vah ua, a hongthau ua,
na hoihna thupi ziak in a kipak mahmah uhi.
“Hinapi’n lah thu a mangkei ua,
na tung ah a hel ua,
na dan a nunglam uah a pai ua,
na kiang lam amaute nganawn sak ding a,
amaute dem a thugen na zawlneite a that ua,
thangpaihna thupi mahmah a bawl uhi.
Huaiziak in a melmate uh khut ah
amau na pia a,
amau a hih genthei uh:
a buai ni ua na kiang a
hong kahlai un, van a kipan in na za a;
na chitna tampi dungzui in a melmate uh khut a kipan a amaute hondam ding in hondammite a kiang uah na pia hi.
Himahleh a tawldam nung un,
na ma ah gilou a hih nawn ua:
huaiziak in a melmate uh khut ah amau na nusia a,
huchi in amau a tung uah thu a nei ua:
hinapi in a hong kihei ua,
na kiang a a kah un,
van a kipan na za a;
na chitnate dungzui in amaute
tam veipi na hunkhia hi;
Na dan a na pilut theihnawnna di’n,
amau na dem a:
himahleh kisatheitak in a hih ua,
na thupiakte a limsakkei ua,
na vaihawmte tung ah
a khial zawsop uhi,
huai mi’n a hih aleh,
huai ah a hing ding,
liang a sawisak ua,
a kiuangsak ua,
a za nuam kei uhi.
Himahleh kum tampi amau na thuakzou a,
na zawlneite in na kha zang in amaute na dem a:
himahleh a ngaikhe nuam kei ua:
huaiziak in gammite khut ah
amau na peta hi.
Huchi napi in na chitna tampite
ziak in amaute na hihbei
keuhkeuh kei a,
na lehngatsan kei;
nang lah hehpihthei leh chingthei Pathian na hi ngal a.
“Huaiziak in tuin,
ka Pathian uh,
thupi Pathian hat leh kihtakhuai,
thukhun leh chitna vompa,
na ma ah, ka tung uh,
ka kumpipate uh tung,
ka vaihawmte uh tung,
ka siampute uh tung,
ka zawlneite uh tung,
ka pipute uh tung, na mite,
Assuria kumpipate damlai a
kipan a tuni tan,
na mite tung a,
nauveina bangmah thamlou bang in kilang kei hen.
Akoi abangin ka tung ua
hongtung tengteng ah nang
na diktat a; nang lah diktak in
na hihngal a,
kou bel gilou tak in ka hih uhi:
Kumpipate leh ka vaihawmte
uh hiam, siampute uh hiam,
ka pipute uh hiam in
na dan a zuikei ua,
na thupiakte leh na thu theihpihnate,
amaute dem a na theihpihnate lah a ngaikhe nuam sam kei uhi.
A gam uah nang na a semkei ua,
na hoih mahmahna ziak a
amau na piak, a ma ua na piak gam lian leh hoih,
a nasep gilou ua kipan a kilehhei sam kei uhi.
Ngai in, tuni in sikhate ka hi ua,
a gahnekna ding leh huai a
hoihte neihna dia ka pipute uh kiang a na piak gam ahihleh, ngai in,
asung ah sikhate ka hi uhi,
Ka khelhna ziak ua ka tung ua
na koih kumpipate ading in a nak pun mahmah a:
a thuthu un, ka pumpite uleh,
ka gantate uh tung a thilhihtheihna a nei ua, kou ka nak gim mahmah uhi.”
Huan hiaite tengteng huchibang hita mah leh thukhun muanhuai ka bawl ua, ka gelh ua; ka vaihawmte uh, ka Levi mite uleh ka siampute un, huai ah suai a kai uhi.
Suaikaite hiaite ahi uh Nehemiah Tirsatha, Hakaliah tapa, leh Zedekiah;
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah;
Pashur, Amariah, Malkijah;
Hattush, Sebaniah, Malluk;
Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah;
Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruk;
Mesullam, Abijah, Mijamin;
Maaziah, Bilgai, Semaiah:
hiaite siampute ahi uh.
Levi mite: huaite,
Jeshua, Azaniah tapa,
Binnui Henadad tapa, Kadmiel;
A unaute uh, Sebaniah, Hodiah,
Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan;
Mikha, Rehob, Hasabiah;
Zakkur, Serebiah, Sebaniah;
Hodiah, Bani, Beninu;
Mite hausate:
Parosh, Pahath moab,
Elam, Zattu, Bani;
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai;
Adonijah, Bigvai, Adin;
Ater, Hezekiah, Azzur;
Hodiah, Hasum, Bezai;
Hariph, Anathot, Nebai;
Magpiash, Mesullam, Hezir;
Meshezabel, Zadok, Jaddua;
Pelatiah, Hanan, Anaiah;
Hosea, Hananiah, Hasub;
Hallohesh, Pileha, Sobek;
Rehum, Hasabnah, Maaseiah;
Huan Ahijah, Hanan, Anan;
Malluk, Harim, Baanah.

Huan mipi lak a a dangte, siampute, Levi mite, Kongkhak ngakte, Lasamite, Nithinim mite, leh gamte a mite lak a kipan amau leh amau Pathian dan lam a kituamsehte tengteng, a zite uh, a tapate uh, a tanute uh, michih theihna leh theihtheihna neite;
A unaute uh, a miliante uh lam ah a belh chinten ua, Mosi Pathian sikha in a piak Pathian dan a om ding leh,
Huan i tanute gam a mite pelou ding leh, i tapate adia a tanute uh lalou ding in:

Gam a mite’n khawlni a van hiam annek hiam zuak ding a hontawi uleh, khawlni hiam, ni siang ni hiam in huaite i leikei ding uh: huchi in kum sagihna louhaite lak leh leiba chiteng sik i kidek ding uh.
Huailou leng i Pathian uh inn a nasepna ding a kum teng a sekel seh thumna kibasak ding in, dante i kibawl uhi.

Tanghou koihna ding, anpiak thillat gige ading, haltum thillat gige ading, khawlnite, kha thakte, sehsa ankuangte ading, thil siangthoute ading, Israel adia lemna kithoihna bawlna dia khelhna thillatte ading, leh i Pathian inn ua nasepna tengteng ading in.
Ai i san ua, siampute, Levi mite leh mite, sing thillat ading in, dan a kigelh bang a, i Pathian uh

Dan a kigelh bang in, i tapate lak a piang masapen leh i gantate lak a leng, i bawnghonte lak leh i belamhonte lak a nou masapente, i Pathian inn ua nasem siampute kiang a i Pathian inn ua tawi ding in:

I tangbuang mek masakpen uleh, i vei thillatte uleh, sing chiteng gah, uain leh thau, i Pathian uh inn a dantante ah, siampute kiang ah i tawiding uh; huan i louma a sawmakhatte Levi mite kiang ah; amau, Levi mite’n, singtang khopi tengteng uah sawm a khat a la uhi.

Aron tapa siampu, Levi mite’n sawm a khat a lak chiang un, Levi mite kiang ah a om ding: huchi in Levi mite’n sawmakhatte sawm a khat i Pathian inn uah, dantante ah, sumbawm inn ah a tawitou ding uhi.
Israel tate leh Levi tate’n buh leh bal vei, uain, thau, thillat munsiang tuium-belsuan, nasem siampute, kongkhak ngakte leh lasamite omna, munsiangthou a tawi ding uh ahi:
Huchi in i Pathian inn i nuse kei ding uhi.
Huchi in mite vaihawmte Jerusalem ah a teng ua: midangte’n leng, khopi siangthou Jerusalem a teng ding sawm lak a khat leh khopi dangte a teng dia seh kuate theihna ding in ai a san uhi.
Mite’n Jerusalem a tengding a uttak a amau leh amau kipete tengteng a vualzawlta uhi.

Huchi in Jerusalem a teng bialsung a hausate hiaite ahi uh: himahleh Judah khopite ah michih amau khopite uah michih a tanchiat uah amau a teng ua, huaite, Israel siampute, Levi mite leh Nithinim mite leh, Solomon sikhate tate.
Jerusalem ah Judah tate lak a leh
Benjamin tate lak a kuate hiam a teng uhi. Judah tate lak ah: Athaiah Uzziah tapa, Zekariah tapa, Amariah tapa, Sephatiah tapa, Mahalaleel tapa, Perez tate lak ah;
Maaseiah Baruk tapa, Kolhozeh tapa, Hazaiah tapa, Adaiah tapa, Joiarib tapa, Zekariah tapa, Siloni tapa.
Jerusalem a teng Perez tapate tengteng za li sawmguk leh giat pasal hangsan ahi uh.
Hiaite Benjamin tapate ahi uh:
Sallu, Mesullam tapa, Joed tapa, Pedaiah tapa, Kolaiah tapa, Maaseiah tapa, Ithiel tapa, Jesaiah tapa.
Huai nung in Gabbai, Sallai, za kua sawmnih leh giat.
Huan Joel Zikri tapa a heutu uh ahi: huan Judah Senuah tapa khopi tung a nihna ahi.
Siampute lak ah:
Jedaiah, Joiarib tapa, Jakin tapa,
Seraiah, Hilkiah tapa, Mesullam tapa, Zadok tapa, Meraioth tapa, Ahitub tapa, Pathian inn a vaihawm,
leh a unaute uh huai in a nasep sem, za giat sawmnih leh nih: huan Adaiah Jeroham tapa, Pelaliah tapa, Amzi tapa, Zekariah tapa, Pashur tapa, Malkijah tapa,
Leh a unaute, pipute inkawte hausate, za nih sawmli leh nih: huan Amasai Azarel tapa, Ahzai tapa, Mesillemoth tapa, Immer tapa,
leh a unaute uh, mi hat hangsante, za leh sawmnih leh giat: huan a heutu uh Zabdiel, Haggedolim tapa ahi.
Levi mite lak ah:
Semaiah, Hassub tapa, Azrikam tapa, Hasabiah tapa, Bunni tapa;
Sabbethai leh Jozabad, Levi mite hausate lak a, Pathian in pawlam nasep a heutu;
Mattaniah, Mikha tapa, Zabdi tapa, Asaph tapa, thumna a kipahthugen pankhe pipen ahi: Huan Bakbukiah, a unaute lak a nihna; huan Abda, Sammua tapa, Galal tapa, Jeduthun tapa.
Khopi siangthou sung a Levi mite tengteng za nih sawmgiat leh li.
Huai ban ah kongkhak ngakte,
Akkub, Talmon, leh a unaute uh kongpite ngakte, za sawmsagih leh nih ahi uhi.
Huan Israel lak a omlaite, siampute lak a, Levi mite, Judah khopite tengteng ah a om ua, michih a gouluahna chiat uah.
Himahleh Ophel ah Nithinim mite a teng uh: huan Ziha leh Gispa Nithinim mite tung ah a om uh.
Jerusalem a Levi mite heutu leng Bani tapa Uzzi ahi, Hasabiah tapa, Mattaniah tapa, Mikha tapa, Asaph tapate, Pathian inn nasepna a lasamite;
Amau tungtang thu ah kumpipa a kipan a thupiak, ni teng a a kiphamoh bang in, lasamite ading a dan kipsa lah a om ngal a.
Huan Pethahiah, Meshezabel tapa, Judah tapa Zerah tate lak a mipite tungtang thu tengteng amah kumpipa khut ah a om hi.
Khuate, a lute uh toh ahihleh, Judah tate lak a a khenkhatte Kiriath Arba leh huai a khuate ah, Dibon leh huai a khuate ah, Jekabzeel leh huai a khotate ah a teng ua;
Jeshua leh Moladah leh, Bethphelet ah;
Hazar-shual leh, Beer–sheba leh huai a khuate ah;
Ziklag leh, Mekonah leh huai a Hazar-shual khuate ah;
Enrimmon leh, Zariah leh, Jarmuth ah;
Zanoah, Adullam leh a khotate uah, Lakish leh huai loute, Azekah leh huai a khuate. Huchi in Beer–sheba a kipan Hinnom guam tan in giahbuk a bawl uhi.
Benjamin tate leng Geba a kipan in a tengtou zel ua, Mikmash leh Aija ah, Bethel leh huai a khuate ah;
Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah ah;
Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim;
Hadid, Zeboim. Neballat;
Lod, leh Ono, khutsiamte guam ah.
Huan Judah a Levi mite sehkhen bangzah hiam Benjamin toh a kizom uhi.
Huan hiaite Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel toh tontou siampute leh Levi mite ahi uh, Joshua:
Siampute:
Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra Amariah, Malluk, Hattush;
Sekaniah, Rehum, Meremoth;
Iddo, Ginnetho, Abijah;
Miamin, Maadiah, Bilgah;
Semaiah, Joiarib, Jedaiah;
Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah, Jedaiah.
Hiaite siampute lak leh a unaute uh lak a Jeshua damlai a pipente uh ahi.
Levi mite mah leng:
Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Serebiah, Judah, Mattaniah, kipahthugenna tung a om, amah leh a unaute.
Bakbukiah leh Unni leng, a unaute utoh, biakbuk sung ah a om uh.
Huan Joshua in Joiakim a suang, Joiakim in Eliasib a suang, Eliasib in Joiada a suang,
Joiada in Jonathan a suang, Jonathan in Jaddua a suang hi.
Huan Joiakim damlai in siampute a om ua, pipute inkawte lupente:
Seraiah lak ah Meraiah:
Jeremiah lak ah Hananiah;
Ezra lak ah Mesullam;
Amariah lak ah Jehohanan;
Meliku lak ah Jonathan;
Sebaniah lak ah Joseph;
Harim lak ah Adna;
Meraioth lak ah Helkai;
Iddo lak ah Zekariah;
Ginnethon lak ah Mesullam;
Abijah lak ah Zikri; Miniamin lak ah,
Moadiah lak ah Piltai;
Bilgah lak ah Sammua;
Semaiah lak ah Jehonathan;
Joiarib lak ah Mattenai;
Jedaiah lak ah Uzzi;
Sallai lak ah Kallai;
Amok lak ah Eber;
Hilkiah lak ah Hasabiah; Jedaiah lak ah Nethaneel.
Eliasib, Joiada, Johanan, Jaddua damlai in Levi mite, pipute inkawte lupen a gelh ahi uh: Persia mi Darias vaihawm lai a, siampute toh in.
Levi tapate, pipute inkawte lupente, Kronikil laibu ah, Eliasib tapa Johanan damlai tanhiala, gelh ahi.
Huan Levi mite hausate: Hasabiah, Serebiah, Jeshua, Kadmiel tapa, amau delh a unaute uh, Pathian mi David thupiak dungzui in, indan leh indan kisu in.
Mattaniah, Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Mesullam, Talmon, Akkubte kongpite vankoihna dantan kem kongkhak ngakte ahi uhi.
Hiaite Jeshua tapa Joiakim, Jozadak tapa damlai, Nehemiah ukpipa leh Ezra siampu Laigelhmi damlai a om ahi uhi.

Huan Jerusalem kulhbang latna adin a omna tengteng uah Levi mite a zongkhia ua, kipahna toh, kipahthugenna leh, lasak, dakkhutbet, tumgingte leh kaihgingte toh a Jerusalem a amaute honpi ding a, kipahna bawl ding in.
Huchi in lasamite tapate a ki kaikhawm ua, Jerusalem kimvel a phaizang a kipan leh Netophath mite khotate a kipan in;
Bethgilgal a kipan in leng, Geba leh Azmaveth loute a kipan in: lasamite’n lah Jerusalem kimvel in khotate a na bawlta ngal ua.
Huchi in siampute leh Levi mite a kisiangsak ua: mite leh kongpite leh kulhbangte a siangsak uhi.
Huchihlai in kulhbang tung ah Judah vaihawmte ka pitou a, kipahthugen leh a hon a pai pawlpi nih ka sep a; huai ah pawl khat kulhbang tung ah ekvum kongpi lam ah a pai uhi.
Amau nung ah Hoshaiah leh Judah vaihawmte lak a kimkhat,
Azariah, Ezra, Mesullam,
Judah, Benjamin, Semaiah, Jeremiah,
Leh siampute tapate lak a kuate hiam pengkulte toh: Zekariah Jonathan tapa, Semaiah tapa, Mattaniah tapa, Mikaiah tapa, Zakkur tapa, Asaph tapa;
A unaute, Semaiah, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethaneel, Judah, Hanani Pathian mi David tumging theihte toh; a ma uah Ezra Laigelhmi a om hi:
Tuikhuk kongpi kiang ah, a mazawn tak uah, David khopi dohkang ah a paitou ua, kulhbang toupaina ah, David inn tunglam ah, suahlampang a tui kongpi pha in.
Huan a lak ua pawl dang kipahthugente amaute tuak ding in a pai ua, kei amau nung ah, kulhbang tung a, meipi insang tunglam ah, kulhbang lian tanpha in;
Ephraim kongpi tung ah, kongpi lui kiang, ngasa kongpi kiang a Hananel insang, Meah insang, belam kongpi tanpha in: venna kongpi ah ading den uh.
Huchi in Pathian insung a kipahthugen pawl nihte leh kei, leh ka kiang a vaihawmte lak a a kimkhat ading ua:
Siampute, Eliakim, Maaseiah, Miniamin, Mikaiah, Elioenai, Zekariah, Hananiah, pengkulte toh;
Huan Maaseiah, Semaiah, Eleazar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malkijah, Elam leh Ezer. Huchi in lasamite’n ngaihtak in, a heutupa uh Jezrahiah toh la a sa uhi.

Huai ni’n kithoihna thupite a lan ua, nuam a sa uhi; Pathian in lah nuamsakna thupi in amau nuam a sasak hi; numeite leh naupangte toh a kipak uhi: huchi in Jerusalem kipahna husa gamlapi tan a leng zak in a om hi.

Huai ni’n thohlawmte, vei thillatte, haithak masapente, sawmakhatte koihkhawmna dantante a heutu, Dan in a seh bang a, siampu leh Levite tantuan khochih in a na hihzoh bangzel ua lakhawm ding mite a sep uhi. Judahte bel nasemmi siampute leh Levite ziak in a kipak mahmah uhi.
A Pathian uh indan leh siansakna indan a kem ua, huchibang in lasamite leh kongkhak ngakmite’n David leh, a tapa Solomon thupiak bang in a hihta uhi.
David leh nidanglai a Asaph damlai in lasami heutupen leh Pathian kiang a phatna leh kipahthugenna lasate lah a om ngal a.

Huan Zerubbabel damlai leh Nehemiah damlai in Israel tengteng in, ni teng a a kul bang in lasamite leh kongkhak ngakmite tantuan a pe zel uhi: Levi mite ading in a siang a koihtuam ua; Aron tapate ading in Levi mite’n a siang a koihtuam uhi.
Huai ni’n mite zak in Mosi laibu a sim ua; Ammon mi leh Moab mi tangtawn in Pathian khawmpi sung ah a lut ding uh ahi kei chih, huai sung a kigelh a mu uhi.
Tanghou leh tui a Israel tate dawnlou a, amaute hamsiat ding a, amaute siatna ding a Balaam a lak ziak un: himahleh i Pathian in hamsia vualzawlna a suaksak hi.
Dan a zaklai un, hichi ahi a, gamdangmi suante apan Israel mite kikhen khetuamta uhi.
Huan hiai ma in, siampu Eliasib i Pathian inn ua dantante tung a seh a ompa, Tobiah toh kizom in,

Amah ding in dantan thupi a bawlkhol a, huai ah a malam in anpiak thillatte, begaw leh tuium belsuante leh, buh leh bal, uain, leh thaute sawmakhatte a koih ua, huaite bel Levi mite leh lasamite leh kongkhak ngakmite kiang a thupiak a piak ahi a; huchi in vei thillatte siampute ading in.
Himahleh hiai hunte in, Jerusalem ah ka omkei: Babulon kumpipa Artaksarses kum sawmthum leh nih kum in kumpipa kiang ah ka hoh a, ni bangzah hiam nung in kumpipa phalna ka ngen hi.
Huchi in Jerusalem ah ka hong a, Pathian inn pisate sung dantan amah adia a bawlsakna ah, Eliasib in Tobiah adia gilou a hihdan ka theisiam hi.
Huchi in kei a hon dahsak mahmah a: huaiziak in dantan a kipan in Tobiah inn van tengteng ka lawnkhia a.
Huan thu ka pia a, dantante a hihsiang ua: huai ah anpiak thillatte leh begaw toh, Pathian inn a tuium-belsuan k’on la nawn hi.
Levi mite tante amau kiang ah piak nailouh in a om chih ka thei a; huchi in Levi mite leh lasamite, nasep semte michih a loulam ah a taizak uhi.
Kei tuh vaihawmmite toh ka kiselta ua, bangding a Pathian inn mangngilh a om ahia? ka chi hi. Amau ka kaikhawm a, a mun uah ka koih hi.
Judah tengteng in buh leh bal leh uain leh thau sawm a khat sumbawm ah a hontawi uhi.

Sumbawm ading in sumkemmite ka bawl a, Selemiah siampute, Zadok laigelhmite leh, Levi mite lak ah Pedaiah: huan amau zom in Hanan Zakkur tapate, Mattaniah tapa: muanhuai sim ahi ngal ua, a nasep uh a unaute uh kiang a hawm ding ahi.
Aw ka Pathian, hiai thu ah hon theigige inla, ka Pathian inn ading a ka nasep hoih ka hihte leh huai a zuihdingte nulkhe ken.

Huailai in Judah ah khawlni a kuate hiam uain suknate chil a, buhphalte hontawi a, huaite toh a sabiltungte van guang ka mu a; uain, grep gahte, theipite van puakgik chichih, khawlni a Jerusalem a hon tawilutte leng: huan annekte a zuak ni uh huai ni’n amaute dem in thu ka gen hi.
Huai ah Tura mite leng a om ua, ngasa a hontawi ua, van chituamtuam toh, Judah tate kiang leh Jerusalem ah khawlni’n a zuak uhi.
Huchi in ken Judahte miliante ka kiselpih a, a kiang uah, “Bang thil gilou ahia hiai na hih ua, khawlni na hihnit uh?

Na pipute un huchibang in a hih ngei ua hia, i Pathian in ei tung leh hiai khopi tung ah hiai hoihlou tengteng a hontun ahi kei maw? Hinapi in nou khawlni hihnin in Israel tung ah thangpaihna tamsem na tun ua” ka chi hi.

Huan Jerusalem kongpite khawlni ma a khua mial pat in, hichi ahi a, kongkhakte khak ding in thu ka pia a, khawlni bei matan kihong lou ding in thu ka pia a: ka sikhate lak a a khen kongpi tung ah ka pangsak a, huchi a khawlni a puakgik a hong kilaklut louhna ding in.
Huchi in khatvei hiam nihvei hiam sumsinmite leh van chiteng zuakmite Jerusalem pawlam ah a giak uhi.

Amaute dem in thu ka gen a, a kiang uah, “Bangding a kulhbang kim a giak na hi ua? Na hih nawn uleh, na tung uah khut ka kha ding” ka chilai hi. Huai hun a kipan in khawlni’n a hongpai nawnta kei uhi.
Kisiangsak ding leh hong kuan a kongpite ngak ding, khawl ni siangsak ding in, Levi mite thu ka pia hi. Aw ka Pathian, hiai ah leng kei hon theigige in, na chitna letdan dungzui in kei honhawi in.
Huailai in Judahte Ashdod, Ammon leh Moab numeite kitenpihte leng ka mu hi:
Huchi in a tate’n Ashdod pau kimkhat leh namdangte pau a zang ua, Judahte pau in a pau theikei uhi.

Amaute ka kiselpih a, ka hamsiat khum a, a lak ua kuate hiam ka khen a, a mul uh ka bohkhiaksak a, Pathian lou in ka kichiam sak a, “Na tanute uh a tapate uh ading in na pekei ding ua, na tapate uh ading hiam, noumau ading hiam in leng a tanute uh na la ding uh ahi kei chi in.

Israel kumpipa Solomon hiaite in a khial kei maw? Hinapiin lah nam tampite lak ah amah bang kumpipa a omkei a, a Pathian it in a om a, Israel tengteng tung ah Pathian in kumpipa in a bawl hi: himahleh amah nangawn numei lamdangte’n a khialsak uhi.
Ahihleh hiai gilou mahmah hih ding in, numei lamdangte kitenpih a i Pathian tung a talek ding in, na thu honzui ding ka hi umaw?”
Joiada tapate lak a khat, siampu lian Eliasib tapa, Horon mi Sanballat tanu pasal ahi a: huaiziak in kei a kipan ka delhkhia hi.
Aw ka Pathian, siamputna, siamputna thukhun, leh Levi mite a hihnit ziak un, amau theigige in.
Huchi in mikhualte tengteng a kipan in amaute ka sawpsiang a, siampute ading leh Levi mite ading in, michih a nasep uah, nasep dante ka sehsak a;
Hunsehsa a sing thillat ading, leh gahmasa ading in. Aw ka Pathian, hoihna ding in kei hon theigige in.
Ahasueras damlai in hichi a honghi a, hiai Ahasueras bel India a kipan Ethiopia tan a, bial za leh sawmnih leh sagih tung a vai a hawm hi.
Huailai a, Inpi Susan a kumpipa Ahasueras a gam mangtutphah tung a a tutlai,
A vaihawm kum thum kum in, a vaihawmte leh a sikhate tengteng ading in Ankuangluina a bawl a; Persia leh Media thuneihna, bialte a miliante leh vaihawmte a ma ah a om uhi:
A gam thupi hauhsaknate leh a vaihawmna sang zahtakhuaina ni tampi, ni za leh sawmgiat a ensak hi.
Huchi in hiai nite zoh in, kumpipa’n Inpi Susan a om mite tengteng, a lian leh a neu, adin kumpipa Inpi pisa ah, Ankuangluina ni sagih a bawl hi.

Puan kang khaite, a hing, a dum, puanmalngat hoih leh sandup khauzangte a dangka zungbuhte leh suangpak khuamte a henden a om a: tutna nemte dangkaeng leh dangka a bawl, suangchian suangpak san, ngou, eng leh vom a bawl tung ah a om uhi.
Dangkaeng noute in dawn ding amau a pia ua, noute a kibang kei vek uhi, kumpipa uain tampi, kumpipa khuttawi letna dungzui zel in,
Huchi in dan bangzel in uain dawnna a om a; kuamah phutluih a omkei hi: kumpipa’n a inn heutu tengteng kiang ah, michih in nuam a sak bangzel ua a hih ding un a theisak khin hi.
Kumpinu Vasti in leng kumpipa Ahasueras in a om numeite ading in Ankuangluina a bawlsam hi.
A ni sagih ni a, kumpipa lungtang uain a kipak a a omlai in, Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha leh Abagtha, Zether, leh Karkaste, kumpipa Ahasueras omna a nasem michilgehte thu a pia hi.
Kumpipa ma a kumpi lukhu toh Vasti hon tonpih a, a kilawmna mite leh vaihawmte ensak ding in, amah et in a hoih hi.
Himahleh kumpinu Vasti in michilgehte zang a kumpipa thupiak hoh lou ding in a sel a: huaiziak in kumpipa a heh mahmah a, asung ah a hehna a kuang hi.
Huchihlai in hunte thei mipilte kiang ah kumpipa’n, huchibang lah kuapeuh dan leh vaihawmna theite lau a kumpipa omdan sek ahi him hi.
Amah zom in Karsena, Sethar, Admatha, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena leh Memukan, Persia leh Media vaihawmtu sagihte kumpipa mai mute leh, gamsung a tumasate ahi uhi.
“Michilgehte zang a kumpipa Ahasueras chih a hihlouh ziak in, dan dungzui in kumpinu Vasti tung ah bang i hih ding ua?” a chi hi.

Kumpipa leh vaihawmte ma ah Memukan in a dawng a, “Kumpinu Vasti kumpipa tung ah kia thil diklou hih ahi kei a, kumpipa Ahasueras bial sung a om vaihawmte tengteng tung leh mite tengteng tung ah leng hih ahi.

Kumpipa Ahasueras in a ma a hongpai ding in kumpinu Vasti thu a pia, himahleh a hongpai kei, chih a kigenthang chiang in, hiai kumpinu thilhih numei tengteng kiang a tung ding a, a mit uah a pasalte uh simmohna suaksak ding ahi.
Tuni a kumpinu thilhih naza Persia leh Media vaihawmte’n kumpipa vaihawmte tengteng kiang ah huchi mah bang a gen ding uh. Huchi in nakpi a kisimmohna leh thangpaihna a hong kipankhe ding hi.

Kumpipa deihlam ahihleh, amah a kipan kumpi thupiak pekhia henla, Vasti kumpipa Ahasueras ma ah hongpai nawn hetlou ding chih, hihlamdan theihlouh ding in, Persia mite leh Media mite dante lak a gelh in om hen; huan kumpipa’n amah sang a hoihzaw midang khat amah kumpi mun leh mual pe leh.
Huchi in kumpipa’n thupiak a bawl ding a gamsung tengteng a a kithehzak chiang in, a thupi ngal a; zi tengteng in a pasalte uh, a liante leh a neute kiang ah zahtakna a pe ding uh” chi in.
Huchi in thugen in kumpipa leh lalte a kipaksak a; huchi in Memukan thu dungzui in kumpipa’n a hihta hi.

Aman lah huai a kigelh dungzui in, kumpipa bial tengteng, bial chiteng leh mi chiteng kiang ah a pau uh dungzui in, huchi a michih in amah inn sung mahmah a dante a puaklut theih a, a mite pau dungzui a, a thehzak theihna ding in laikhakte a khakta hi.
Hiai thilte zoh in, kumpipa Ahasueras thangpaihna lungkimsak a om in, Vasti bang ahia a hih, a siatna dia bang ahia thupiak chih a theigige hi.
Huchi in a nasepsak kumpipa sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Kumpipa ading in nungak siangthou tuailai melhoih kizong henla:

Kumpipa’n a gam a bial tengteng ah heutu sep hen, huaite’n nungak siangthou tuailai tengteng Susan Inpi ah, numeite inn ah, Hegai kumpipa michilgeh numeite kempa in a hon pikhawm theihna ding un; huchi in siansakna ding a thilte uh amau kipe leh:
Huchi in nungak kumpipa lungkimsak pen Vasti sik in kumpinu hi hen” a chi uhi. Huai thil in kumpipa a lungkimsak a; huchibang in a hihta hi.
Susan Inpi ah Judah mi kuahiam, a min Mordekai, Jair tapa, Shimei tapa, Benjamin mi a om a;
Amah bel Jerusalem a kipan a salte Judah kumpipa Jekoniah Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in a pimang a omte toh pimang in a om uhi.
Aman Hadassah, huai bel Esther, a pangak tanu a kem piching hi: aman nu leh pa a neikei a, huai nungak a kilawm in a melhoih hi: a nu leh pa a sih un, Mordekai in a tanu ding in a la hi.
Huchi in hichi a honghi a, kumpipa thupiak leh a thubawl a kizak in, nungak tampi Susan Inpi, Hegai in a kaihkhawm a omlai un, Esther leng kumpipa in ah, Hegai, numeite kempa nuai ah a honpi uhi.

Huchi in nungak in amah a lungkimsak a, amah siamna a ngahta a; aman siansakna ding in a thilte amah a pepah a, a tantuante toh, amah piak ding a kilawm, kumpipa in a kipan nungak sagih toh: amah leh a nungakte numeite in a mun hoihpen ah a suanta hi.
Esther in a hihna a genkhe kei a, a tanaute hihna leng a genkhe sam kei hi: Mordekai in lah genkhe lou ding in amah a thuhilh hi.
Huchi in Mordekai bel niteng in numeite inn mai ah a Esther in bangchi’n a hihzel a, bang a hong chidia chih thei ding in a hohzel hi.

Numeite adia dan dungzui a kha sawmlehnih, murra thau toh kha guk, gim namtuite toh kha guk leh, numeite siansakna ding a t hilte toh, huchibang in a siansakna nite hihkim a a om nung in, nungak chih kumpipa Ahasueras kiang a a valut hun uh a tungta hi.
Nungakte kumpipa kiang a a lut chiang un, kumpipa inn a hohpih ding in numeite omna a kipan a deihdeih uh piak in a om uhi.

Nitaklam in a pai a, a zingnawn in numeite inn nihna ah, kumpipa michilgeh Shasgaz, meite kempa inn ah a hongkik a: kumpipa amah ah kipak napi in, kumpipa kiang ah a honglut kei a, a min a sap in a om hi.

Huchi a amah a tanu ding a la pa, Mordekai pangak Abihail tanu, Esther kumpipa kiang a a valut hun a hongtun in, Hegai kumpipa michilgeh, numeite kempa a seh chih ngallouh bangmah a kankei hi. Huchi in amah ente tengteng mitmuh in Esther in deihsakna a ngah hi.
Huchi in Esther kumpipa Ahasueras kiang a kumpi inn ah a kha sawmna, Tebeth kha a vaihawm kum sagihna kum in laklut in a omta hi.

Huchi in kumpipa’n numei tengteng sang in Esther a it a, nungak siangthoute sang in a mitmuh in hehpihna leh deihsakna a mu hi; huchi in a lu tung ah lallukhu a koih a, Vasti sik in kumpinu ding in amah a bawlta hi.

Huchihlai in kumpipa’n a vaihawmte tengteng leh a sikhate tengteng ading in Ankuang thupi, “Esther Ankuang mahmah” a luita a: bialte kiang ah khawlna a bawl a, kumpipa siamna bangzel in, thilpiakte a pia hi.
Huchi a nungak siangthoute nihveina dia kaihkhawm a omlai un, Mordekai bel kumpipa kongpi ah a tu hi.
Esther in a tanaute leh a mite hihna a genkhe kei; amah kiang a khanletsak a om bangtak in Mordekai thupiak bang in a hih hi.
Huailai a, Mordekai kumpipa kongpi a a tutlai in, kumpipa michilgeh lak a nih, Bigthan leh Teresh, kongkhak ngakte a heh ua, kumpipa Ahasueras tung a khutkha ding in a zongta uhi.
Huai thil Mordekai in a thei a, aman kumpinu kiang ah a theisak hi; Esther in Mordekai min in huai a kumpipa a hilhta hi.
Huchi in a thu a kikan leh, huchibang ahi ngei chih a ki mukhia a, a nih un sing dawn ah khailup in a om ua: tanchin gelhna laibu ah kumpipa ma ah a kigelhta hi.
Hiai thilte nung in kumpipa Ahasueras in Haman Agagmi Hammedatha tapa a kaisangsak a, malam a nawtsak a, a kiang a om vaihawmte tengteng tunglam ah a tutphah a koih hi.

Huchi in kumpipa sikha tengteng, kumpipa kongpi a omte niamchik in a kun ua, Haman a zahtak mahmah uh: kumpipa’n amah tungtang thu huchibang in thu a pia hi. Himahleh Mordekai a kunkei a, amah zahna a bawlkei hi.
Huchihlai in kumpipa sikhate, kumpipa kongpi a omte’n, Mordekai kiang ah, “Bangding a kumpipa thupiak a talek na hia?” a chi uhi.
Hichi ahi a, ni teng a amah a houpih lai un, amau a ngaikhe kei a, Mordekai thu paiding hia pailou ding chih thei ding in Haman a hilh uh: amah Judah mi ahi chih amaute a hilhta hi.
Huchi a Mordekai niamchik a kunlou in, amah a zahtak kei chih Haman in a theih in, a heh mahmah hi.

Himahleh Mordekai tung kia a khutkhak bang thamlou in a ngaihtuah a; Mordekai mite lah amah a ensakta ngal ua; huchi in Haman in Ahasueras gam pumpi a om Judahte tengteng, Mordekai mite, hihgawp ding in a zongta hi.
Kumpipa Ahasueras vaihawm kum sawmlehnih ni, kha khatna, Nisan kha in, “Pur” a san ua, huai bel aisan ahi, Haman ma ah, niteng in, kha teng in, kha sawmlehnih, Adar kha tan in.

Huan Haman in kumpipa Ahasueras kiang ah, “Mi kuate hiam kithehzak a na gam bial sung tengteng a mite lak a dalh a om ua; a Dante uh mi tengteng Dan toh a kibang kei a; kumpipa dante a zuikei uhi: huaiziak in amaute thuakzoh kumpipa punna ding ahi kei hi.
Kumpipa deihlam ahihleh, hihgawp a a omna ding un lai kigelh leh: kumpipa nasepna a heutute khut ah ken dangka talent sang sawm ka pe ding, kumpipa sumbawmte a tawilut ding in” a chi hi.
Huchi in a khut a kipan kumpipa’n a zungbuh a suah a, Agagmi Hammedatha tapa Haman kiang ah, Judahte melmapa kiang ah a pia hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n Haman kiang ah, Dangka na kiang a piak ahi, mipi leng, amau tung a pha na saksak hih ding in, a chi hi.

Huchihlai in a kha khatna, a ni sawmlehthum ni’n, kumpipa laigelhmite a samlut ua, kumpipa heutuliante leh kumpipa bial chih a omte tengteng leh mi chiteng vaihawmte Haman in thu a piak peuhmah dungzui in a kigelhta hi; bialchih kiang ah huai a kigelh dungzui in, michih kiang ah a pau bangzel un; kumpipa Ahasueras min in a kigelh a, kumpipa zungbuh in suai a kisawn hi.

Huchi in, Adar kha, kha sawmlehnih, a ni sawmlehthum ni mahmah a, ni khat a, Judah mite tengteng a tek a khang naupang noute leh numeite hihgawp ding, that ding leh mangthangsak ding in, kumpipa bial sung tengteng ah dak in laikhakte a khak ua, a sum uh gallak a la sak ding in.
Laigelh kopi, thupiak bialteng a piakkhiak ding leh huai ni dia mansa a om chiat ding a, mi tengteng kiang ah a suah uhi.
Kumpipa thupiak in dakte kinohtak in a sawlkhia ua, Susan Inpi ah thupiak a kipekhia hi: huchi in kumpipa leh Haman dawn ding in a tu ua; himahleh Susan khopi a lungzing hi.
Huchi a kihih tengteng Mordekai in a theih in, a puante a botkek a, vut toh saiip puan a silh a, khopi laizang ah a paikhia a, ngaihtak leh nakpi’n a kap hi.
Kumpipa kongpi mai pha in a hongpai a: saiip puansilh mi kuamah lah kumpipa kongpi sung ah a lut theikei hi.
Huchi in bial chiteng a, koilai peuh a kumpipa thupiak leh a thubawl tunna ah, Judahte lak ah nakpitak a sunna, anngawlna, kahna, mauna a om hi; mi tampi saiip puansilh in, vut lak ah a lum uhi.

Esther nungakte leh a heutute a hongpai ua a thu amah a hilhta uhi; huchi in kumpinu a dah mahmah a: puansilh Mordekai silh ding in a khak a, amah a kipan a a saiip puan lakhe ding in: himahleh a sangkei hi.
Huchi in Esther in Hatak, kumpipa michilgehte lak a khat a sam a, amah vil ding a kumpipa’n a seh, Mordekai kiang a hohding in thu a pia hi, hiai bang thu ahi, bangdia hichi ahi chih thei ding in.
Huchibang in Hatak bel kumpipa kongpi mai a om, khopi mun za ah Mordekai kiang ah a va pawtkhia a.
Mordekai in a tung a tung tengteng thu amah a hilh a, Judahte adia, amaute hihsiatna ding, kumpipa sumbawmte a Haman in dangka sumpiak ding a a chiam zah geih a hilh hi.

Huailou leng Esther kiang a lak ding leh, a kiang a phuan ding in amaute hihsiatna ding a Susan a thubawl piakkhiak laigelh kopi amah a pia a; kumpipa kiang a vahoh ding a hilh din, a kiang a thumna vabawl ding leh a mite adia, a ma a ngetna vabawl ding in.
Huchi in Hatak a hong a Mordekai thute Esther a hilh hi.
Huchihlai in Esther in Hatak kiang ah thu a gen a, Mordekai ading thukhah a pia hi,

“Kumpipa sikhate tengteng leh, kumpipa bialte a mite’n a thei kilkel uhi, mi kuapeuh numei, pasal leng, saplouh a, kumpipa pisa sungnung zaw pen a a hoh uleh, amah ading in dan khat a om a, ‘sihsak ding’ chih leh, ‘a hing ding,’ chi a, kumpipa’n dangkaeng kumpi chiang a letkhumte chih louh ngal: himahleh hiai ni sawmthum kumpipa kiang a hongpai ding in sap in ka na omta kei hi” chi in.
Huan Esther thute Mordekai a hilh uhi.
Huchihlai in Mordekai in Esther kiang a dawnna vatun nawn ding in amau a chi a, “Judah tengteng sang in, kumpipa inn sung a nang na suahtak kingaihtuah het ken.

Nang hiai hun a bangmah genlou a na daih dide leh, mun dang a kipan in Judahte ding in panpihna leh hutkhiakna a hongom ding a, himahleh nang leh na pa inkawte na mangthang ding uh: hun hichibang adia honglal na hihmel kuan a thei a?”
Huchi in Esther in Mordekai kiang a dawnna vatun ding in amau a chi hi.

“Kuan inla, Susan a om Judahte tengteng kaikhawm inla kei ding in anngawl unla, ni thum, zan hiam sun hiam: nek lah ne kei unla, dawn leng dawn kei un: huchi mah bang in ken leng ka nungakte toh an ka ngawl ding uh; huaichiangin kumpipa kiang ah ka hoh ngeingei ding, dan bang zaw ahi kei a: huchi a ka man leh, mang ka himai ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mordekai a kuan a, Esther in amah thu a piak tengteng bang in a gamta hi.

Hichi ahi a ni thum ni’n, Esther in a kumpi puansilh a silh a, kumpipa inn zawn a, kumpipa pisa sungnung zaw pen ah a vading a: kumpipa bel inn lutna zawn a, kumpi inn ah a mangtutphah tung ah a tu hi.

Hichibang ahi a, kumpipa’n pisa a kumpinu Esther ding a muh in, a mitmuh in deihsakna a ngahta hi: kumpipa’n a khut a om dangkaeng kumpi chiang Esther lam ah a lik hi. Huchi in Esther a hongnai a, kumpi chiang dawn a khoih hi.
Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Bang na deih a, kumpinu Esther? Na ngetna bang ahia? Gam kimkhat tan leng piak na hi ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Esther in, “ kumpipa’n hoih a sakleh tuni’n kumpipa leh Haman amah adia ka bawl annekna ah hongpai un” a chi hi.
Huan kumpipa’n, “Haman kinoh sak un, Esther gen bang a hih a hih theihna ding in” a chi hi. Huchi in Esther annekna bawl ah kumpipa leh Haman a hong uhi.
Huan uain a dawnlai un kumpipa’n Esther kiang ah, “Bang ahia na thumna? Phal a hihtheihna ding in: bang ahia na ngetna? Gam kimkhat tan in leng piak ahi ding” a chi hi.
Esther in a dawng a, “Ka thumna leh ka ngetna hiai ahi;

Kumpipa mitmuh a deihsakna ka muh leh, ka thumna phal ding, leh ka ngetna bawl ding a kumpipa a lungkim leh, kumpipa leh Haman amau adia ka bawl ding annekna ah hong le uh, kumpipa’n a chih bang in zingchiang in ka hih ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in huai ni’n nuamsa leh lung kipak in Haman a paikheta a: himahleh Mordekai kumpipa kongpi a om, amah dia ding lou a tat leng tanglou Haman in a muh in, Mordekai tung ah a heh mahmah hi.
Huchi in leng Haman a ki ip teitei a, inn ah a paita; huan mi a sawl a a lawmte leh a zi Zeresh a hon tonpih hi.
Haman in a kiang uah, a hauhsakna thupina leh, a tate tamdan leh, kumpipa’n a kaisang sakna thil tengteng leh kumpipa sikhate vaihawmte tung a a masak tuamdan a gen hi.
Haman in, ahi, “Esther in annekna a bawl ah mi kuamah kumpipa toh kei chih louhngal a hohsak kei; zingchiang in leng kumpipa toh kei a honsam hi.
Hitamahleh Mordekai huai Judapa, kumpipa kongpi a tu ka muh laiteng hiaite tengteng kei ading in bangmah a phatuam kei,” a chilai hi.

Huchi in a zi Zeresh leh a lawmte’n a kiang ah, “Khailupna khuam tong sawmnga a sang kibawl henla, zingsang in nang kumpipa kiang ah thugen inla huai a Mordekai khailup ahihtheih na ding in; huchi in vualnuamtak in kumpipa toh annekna ah na hoh ding uh” a chi uhi. Hiai in Haman a kipaksak a; huchi in khailupna khuam a bawlsakta hi.
Huai zan in kumpipa a ihmu theikei; tanchin chiamtehna laibu hontawi ding in thu a pia a, huaite kumpipa ma ah a sim uhi.
Kumpipa michilgehte lak a mi nih Bigthan leh Teresh, kongkhak vengte’n, kumpipa Ahasueras tung a khutkhak sawmte tanchin Mordekai in a gen chih a kigelh muh in a om hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n, “Hiai ziak in Mordekai tung ah bang zahtakna leh thupina hih in a om a?” a chi hi. Kumpipa sikha amah nasemte’n, “Amah a ding in bangmah hih a omkei” a chi uhi.
Kumpipa’n, “Pisa a om kua ahia?” a chi a. Huchi in Haman kumpipa inn pisa pawnung zaw ah, kumpipa kiang a a bawlkholhsa khailupna khuam a Mordekai khai ding gen ding in a honghi.
Kumpipa sikhate’n a kiang ah, “Ngai in pisa ah Haman a ding nilouh hi” a chi ua. Kumpipa’n, “Honglut heh” a chi hi.

Huchi in Haman a honglut hi. Kumpipa’n a kiang ah, “Mi kumpipa’n a zahtaknop tung ah bang kihih ding ahia?” a chi hi. Haman in a lungtang in, Kumpipa’n kei sang a zahtak kua kiang a bawl nuamzaw ahia? a chi hi.
Haman in kumpipa kiang ah, “Kumpipa’n a zahtak nopmi ading in,
Kumpipa’n a silhzel kumpi puansilh hon lakhia henla, sakol kumpipa tuanzelna leng, a lu zang a lallukhu a koihna zel:

Huchi in puansilh leh sakol kumpipa vaihawmpih thupi penpente lak a khat khut ah pekhe leh, huaite a kumpipa’n zahtak a utpa a zep theihna ding un leh, khopi kongzing lak ah sakol tung ah tuangsak henla, a ma ah, huchibang in kumpipa’n a zahtak nopte kiang ah hih in a om ding, chi in phuang leng” a chi hi.

Huailai tak in kumpipa’n Haman kiang ah, “Kin inla, na chih bang in, puansilh leh sakol la inla, kumpipa kongpi a tuzel Mordekai Judah mi tung ah hih in: na gen tengteng bangmah vuaksuak kei hen” a chi hi.
Huchi in Haman in puansilh leh sakol a la a, Mordekai a zem a, khopi kongzing lak ah a tuangsak a, a ma ah, “Hichibang in kumpipa’n a zahtak nop mi tung a a hih ahi ding” chi in, a phuangta hi.
Huan Mordekai kumpipa kongpi ah a hongpai nawn a. Himahleh Haman bel sun leh a lutang khuhsa in a inn lam ah kintak in a pai hi.

Huchi in Haman in a zi Zeresh kiang leh a lawmte tengteng kiang ah a tung a thiltung tengteng a genvek hi. Huaitak in a mipilte leh a zi Zeresh in a kiang ah,“A ma a na puk patna Mordekai Judah chi a mi a hileh, amah na zoukei ding, himahleh a ma ah na puk ngei ding” a chi uhi.
Amah toh a houlim sanlai un, kumpipa michilgehte a hongpai ua, Esther in annek ding a bawlna ading in kintak in hongpita uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa leh Haman kumpinu Esther toh annekna ah a hong uhi.
Uain a dawnlai un a ni nihni in kumpipa’n Esther kiang ah, Bang ahia na thumna, kumpinu Esther? A hon phalsak ding uh: bang ahia na ngetna? Gam kimkhat leng piak in na om ding, a chi hi.
Huchi in Esther kumpinu’n a dawng a, “Aw kumpipa, na mitmuh a deihsakna ka muh a, kumpipa kipahna ahihleh, ka thumna ah ka hinna leh ka mite hinna piak in om hen:

Zuak in ka omta ua, kei leh ka mite, hihgawp a om ding in, thah a om ding in leh hihmang ding in. Sikhapa ding leh sikhanu ding a zuak a om hi le ung zaw, melma in kumpipa siatna gunbawl theita kei mahleh, daidide ding hi veng in” a chi hi.
Kumpipa Ahasueras in thu a gen a, kumpinu Esther kiang ah, “Kua ahia, kaw om ahia, huchibang a lungtang sung a tum ngam?” a chi hi.
Esther in, “Melma leh gal, hiai giloupa Haman mah” a chi hi. Huchi in kumpipa leh kumpinu ma ah Haman a lauta hi.

Huchi in uain annekna a kipan a heh ziak in kumpipa ading a Inpi huan sung ah a lu a: huchi in kumpinu Esther kiang a a hinna ngen ding in Haman a dingta hi; kumpipa’n a siatna ding in hoihlou a tup a om chih a thei hi.

Kumpipa Inpi huan a kipan uain annekna mun ah a hongkik a; huchi in Esther omna tutphah nem tung ah Haman a puk hi. Kumpipa’n, “Inn sung a ka ma a kumpinu nangawn sual ding ahi hia?” a chi hi. Kumpipa kam a thupawt bang in, Haman maitang a tuamsakta uhi.

Huailai in kumpipa ma a om zel michilgehte lak a khat, Harbonah in, “En un, Haman in Mordekai, kumpipa gum a thugenpa adia a bawl, khailupna khuam tong sawmnga a sang, Haman inn ah ading hi” a chi hi. Huan kumpipa’n “Huai ah amah khailum un” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mordekai adia a bawlkholh sak khailupna khuamtung ah Haman a khailumta uhi. Huchi in kumpipa thangpaihna a daita hi.
Huai ni’n kumpipa Ahasueras in Judahte melmapa Haman inn kumpinu Esther kiang ah a pia hi. Kumpipa ma ah Mordekai a hong a; Esther in amah ading in kua ahia chih a genkhinta hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n a zungbuh a suah a, Haman a kipan a lak, Mordekai kiang ah a peta hi. Esther in Haman inkaw tung ah Mordekai a koihta hi.
Esther in kumpipa ma ah thu a genlai a, a khebul a puk in, Agagmi Haman gilou bawl leh Judahte siatna ding a a lunggel khitsa a lunggelna koihmang ding in khitui toh amah a ngen ngutngut hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n Esther lam ah a dangkaeng kumpi chiang a len a. Huchi in Esther a thou a kumpipa ma ah ading hi.

Aman, “Kumpipa lungkimna a hih a, a mitmuh deihsakna ka muh a, kumpipa ma a thildik a a lat a, a muh a lungkimhuai ka hihleh, Haman Hammedatha Agag mi tapa in laikhak a bawlte kumpipa bial a om Judahte hihsiatna ding a a gelh sut in om hen:
Huchilou in ka mite tung a gilou tungding ken bangchi’n ka en ngam dia? Ahihkeileh ka tanaute siatna bangchi in ka mu ngam dia?” a chi hi.

Kumpipa Ahasueras in kumpinu Esther kiang leh Mordekai Judah mi kiang ah, “Ngai un, Judahte tung a a khut a khak ziak in, Haman inkawte leh, khailupna khuam a a khailuppa uh amah Esther kiang ah a peta hi.

Na deih bang in, kumpipa min in, kumpipa zungbuh a sawn in, Judahte kiang ah leng laigelh un: laigelh kumpipa min a gelh a, kumpipa zungbuh a sawn, mi kuapeuh in a hihlamdang thei ngal kei a” a chi hi.

Huchi in kumpipa laigelhmite a sam ua, a kha thumna Sivan kha a, a ni sawmnih leh thum ni’n; Judahte tungtang thu Mordekai in thu a piak bang in gam heutute kiang leh, India a kipan Ethiopia pha a om bialte ukpipate leh vaihawmte, bial za leh sawmnih leh sagih, huai a gelhdan bangzel a bial chiteng kiang, mi chiteng a pau uh dungzui zel in, a laigelh uh bangzel a Judahte, a pau uh bangzel in a kiang uah gelh in a omta hi.
Kumpipa Ahasueras min in a gelh a, kumpipa zungbuh in a sawn a, kumpipa nasepna a kizangsek sakol man gang, hoihtak a vulhte a tuang in sakol tung ah dak in laikhakte a khakta hi.

Huai ah kumpipa’n khopi chiteng a om Judahte kikhawm khawm a, a hinna ua dia pang a, amaute sual ding a nauneute uleh a numeite uh, a sum uh gallak a la ding a kisa mite leh bial thilhihtheihna hihse ding leh mangthang sak din phalna a pia hi.
Kumpipa Ahasueras bial tengteng ah ni khat in, huaibel, a kha sawmlehnih, Adar kha ahi a, a ni sawmlehthumni tak in.
Bial chiteng a piak ding chi a thupiak, kigelh a kopi mite tengteng kiang ah suah in a om a, huai ni chiang a Judahte’n a melmate uh tung a phula ding a mansa a omchiat theihna ding un.
Huchi in dak kumpipa nasepna a zat sakol mangangte tung a tuangte a paikhia ua, kumpipa thupiak in amau a nawh in a khawksak ngal ua; thupiak pen Susan Inpi a piakkhiak ahi.
Huchi in Mordekai bel kumpi puandum leh kang, dangkaeng lallukhu thupi toh, puanaktual puanmalngat hoih leh sandup toh kumpipa ma a kipan a paikheta hi: Susan khopi a kikou a, a kipak hi.
Huchi in Judahte’n kouzanna leh kipahna, nuamna leh zahna a nei uhi.

Bial chiteng leh, khopi chiteng a, koilai peuh a kumpipa thupiak leh a thubawl paina peuh ah, Judahte’n Ankuangluina leh ni hoih kipahna leh nuamna a nei uhi. Huchi in gam a mite lak a tampite Judahte a honghi ua; Judahte launa lah a tung uah a hong omta hi.

Huan a kha sawmlehnih, Adar kha, huai mah a ni sawmlehthum ni, kumpipa thupiak leh a thubawl tangtunna ding a hong nailai in, Judate melmate’n a tung ua vaihawmna neih a kilamet ni uh; hinapi a, a hilou lam a hong kilehbuta, Judate’n amau mudahte tung a vaihawmna a hon neihlai un;

Kumpipa Ahasueras bial tengteng a khopite uah Judahte, amau siatna zongte tung a khutkha ding in, a kikhawm khawm ua: kuamah in lah amaute a nangzou kei uhi; mite tengteng tung ah lah amaute launa a hong omta hi.
Huchi in bialte a vaihawmte leh, gamukmite leh, ukpipate leh kumpipa nasemte’n, Judahte a panpih ua; Mordekai launa lah a tung uah a hongom ngal a.
Kumpipa inn ah Mordekai a thupi a, bial tengteng ah a min a thang kheta hi: hiai mipa Mordekai lah a hong thupi semsem hi.
Huchi in namsau a sat in Judahte’n a melmate tengteng a that ua, thahna leh hihsiatna in, amaute mudahte tung ah a hih ding uh a hihta uhi.
Susan Inpi ah Judahte’n mi za nga a that ua a hihgawp uhi.
Parsandatha, Dalphon, Aspahtha,
Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha,
Parmastha, Arisai, Aridai, Vajezathate,
Judate melmapa Hammedatha tapa Haman tapate, a that ua; himahleh gallak ah a khut uh a nga kei uhi.
Huai ni’n Susan Inpi a thah a om zah kumpipa ma ah a hontawi uhi.

Huan kumpipa’n kumpinu Esther kiang ah, “Judate’n Susan Inpi sung ah mi za nga a that ua a hihsia uh, Haman tapa sawmte toh; kumpipa bial dangte ah bang a chi bawlta phet ding uam ah: Khaile, bang na thum a? Na kiang a phal ahi ding: ahihkeileh bang ahia na ngetlai? Na kiang a phal ahi” a chi hi.
Esther in, Kumpipa lungkimna ahihleh, zingchiang a tuni a thupiak bangbang a gamtang ding in Susan a om Judahte phal inla, Haman tapa sawmte khailupna khuam ah kikhai le uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in huchibang a hih ding chi’n kumpipa’n thu a pia hi: Susan ah thubawl a kipekhia a: huchi in Haman tapa sawmte a khaita uhi.
Adar kha mah a ni sawmlehli ni’n Susan a om Judahte a kikhawm khawm ua, Susan ah mi za thum a that uh; himahleh gallak tung ah a khut uh a nga kei uhi.

Huchi in kumpipa bialte a om Judah dangte a kikhawm khawm ua, a hinna uh a hum ua, a melmate ua kipan khawlna a nei ua, amau mudahte lak ah mi sing sagih leh sang nga a that ua; himahleh gallak tung ah a khut uh a nga kei uh.
Adar kha ni sawm leh thumni in hiai tuh hih ahi; huai mah a ni sawmlehli ni’n a khawl ua, Ankuanglui ni leh kipahna ni’n a zang uhi.
Himahleh Susan a om Judate a kikhawm ua a ni sawmlehthum ni’n, leh a ni sawmlehli ni’n; huai mah a ni sawmlehnga ni’n a khawlta ua, Ankuanglui ni leh kipahna ni’n a zang uhi.
Huaiziak in khoneute a Judahte, khaw kulhbang neilou a tengte’n, Adar kha ni sawmlehli ni kipahna ni leh Ankuanglui nin, ni hoih ni, leh a kuakua tantuan kikhakna ni’n a nei uhi.
Huan Mordekai in hiai thilte a gelh a, kumpipa Ahasueras bial tengteng a om Judahte, gamla leh nai a omte kiang ah a khak hi,
Kum teng a, Adar kha ni sawmlehli leh ni sawmlehnga ni kumteng a tang ding a hilhna ding in,

Judahte a melmate ua kipan a khawlni uh, amau adia lungkhamna kipahna a hong hihna kha, misi sunna ni hoih a hong hihna kha bang in: huai nite Ankuangluina leh kipahna ni a om ua, tantuante a kuakua a kikhak ua, gentheite kiang ah thilpiakte piakna a neih theihna ding un.
Huchi in Judahte’n a patkhitsa bang un leh, Mordekai in amaute kiang a a gelhkhitsa bang in hih ding in a theisiam uhi.

Hammedatha tapa Haman, Agagmi, Judah tengteng melmapa’n Judah tengteng siatna ding amau hihse ding, a ngaihtuah a, amaute hihgawp ding leh, amaute hihse ding a, Pur, huai bel, aisan ahi, a na paih ziak in;

Himahleh a thu kumpipa ma a hongtun in, a ngaihtuah gilou, Judahte siatna dia a ngaihtuah, amah lutung mahmah a kibung ding in laikhakte in thu a peta a; huchi a amah leh a tapate khailupna khuam a khai a omna ding un.
Huchibang a hih ziak in hiai nite Purim, Pur minzui in a sa uhi. Huaiziak in hiai laikhak thute tengteng ziak leh hiai thu tungtang thu a muhsa uh, a tung ua hongtun ziak in.

Judahte’n a hihkip ua, amau tung leh, a suante uh tung leh, amaute huchibang a kizomkhawm bangte tengteng tung ah a kisuanta uhi, huchi a pellou a, huai a laigelh dungzui leh, huai a hun sehsa dungzui a, kum chiteng a hiai ni nihte a tan theihna ding un.

Huchi a hiai nite a khang a khang a, a inkuan kuan a, bial chiteng leh khopi chiteng a theihgige leh tan a omtheihna ding in; huchi a hiai Purim nite Judahte lak a kipan a a zuaulouh a, huaite theihgigena leng a suante uh a kipan a manlouhna ding in.
Huchi in kumpinu Esther, Abihail tanu leh, Mordekai Judah min, hiai Purim laikhak nihna sukkipna ding in thuneihna tengteng in a gelhta uhi.
Judahte tengteng kiang ah, Ahasueras gam a bial za leh sawmnih leh sagihte kiang ah, lungmuanna leh thutak thute, laikhakte a khakta hi,

Hiai Purim nite a hun a sehsa uh, Mordekai Judah mi leh kumpinu Esther in huaite pha a sak uh dungzui leh, amau ading leh a suante uh adia, anngawlna leh a kahna thu ua a na hihkip bang ua hihkip ding in.
Esther thupiak in hiai Purim thute a hihkip a; laibu ah a kigelhta hi.
Huan kumpipa Ahasueras in gam tung leh, tuipi tuikulh gam tung ah siah a bawlta hi.
Huchi in a thilhihtheihna leh a hatna thilhihte tengteng leh, Mordekai, kumpipa’n amah a koihsangna, letna genna kim, Media leh Persia kumpipate chiamtehna laibu a gelh ahi kei umaw?
Mordekai Judah mi, kumpipa zom a Judate lak a lian ahi, a u a nau mi tampi in a pom uh ahi. Aman mite hoihna ding zong a nasem a chipihte tengteng kiang a lemna thu a gen hi.
Uz gam ah mi khat a om a, a min Job ahi; amah mi hoihkim leh tang ahi a, Pathian kihta a, hoihlou mudah ahi.
Aman tapa sagih leh tanu thum a nei hi.
A neih leh lam leng belam sang sagih, sangawngsau sang thum, bawngtal za nga leh sabiltungnu za nga leh inkuan thupi mahmah ahi: huchi in hiai mipa suahlam tate tengteng lak ah a thupipen ahi.
Huan a tapate a kuan ua khat chiat inn ah a ni ni’n Ankuangluina a nei ua; huchi in mi a sawl ua a sanggamnumei thumte uh amau kiang a ne ding leh dawn ding in a samsak uhi.

Huan hichi ahi a, a Ankuanglui sanlaitak un, Job in mi a sawl a amaute a hih siangthou a, zingsang in beltak in a thou a, avek ua zah dungzui in haltum thillatte a lan: Job in, “Ka tapate’n thil a hihkhial un, a lungtang un Pathian a hamsiat kha ding uh” a chi hi. Hichibang in Job in a hih gige hi.
Huchi in
Huchi in
Setan in
