Amah kimvel in, a inn kimvel in leh a neih tengteng kimvel in, ning chiteng ah umna na bawl kei maw? A khut nasep na vualzawl a, gamsung ah a neih leh lam a pung hi.
Himahleh tuin na khut suahkhia inla, a neih tengteng khoih in, huchi in na maitang ah nang a hon gense ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan a tapate leh a tanute’n a unaupa uh upapen inn a a nek ua uain a dawn lai un ni khat thu in a hongtung hi.
Job kiang ah sawltak khat a hong a, “Bawngtalte’n lei a let ua, sabiltungte a kiang ah a gamta ua:
Sheba mite’n amau a delh ua, a pimang uh; ahi, namsau hiam in sikhate a that ua; huan nang hilh ding in kei ke leu ka suakta hi” a chi a.
Huchi a thu a genlai in midang khat leng a hong a, “Van a kipan in Pathian mei a kia a, belamte leh, sikhate a kangmang a, amau a kangtum hi: huan nang hilh ding in kei ke leu ka suakta hi” a chi hi.

Huchi a thu a genlai in, midangkhat a honglai a, Kaldai mite’n pawl thum a bawl ua, sangawngsaute a delh ua, a pimangta uhi, huan namsau hiam in sikhate a that ua; huan nang hilh ding in kei ke leu ka suakta hi” a chi hi.
Huchi a thu a genlai in, midang khat mah a hong a, “Na tapate leh na tanute’n a unaupa upapen inn a a nek ua uain a dawnlai un:
Ngai in gamdai a kipan in huih thupi a hongnung a, huai inn ning lite a hon nuai a, tangvalte tung ah a chim a, a si uh: huan nang hilh ding in kei ke leu ka suakta hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Job a thou a, a puanaktual a botkek a, a lu a metsiang a, leitung denna in a kinei a, Pathian a beta hi;
Aman, “Ka nu sul a kipan vuaktang in ka hong a, huailam ah vuaktang in ka kik ding:
Hiai tengteng ah Job in a hihkhial kei a, haihuaitak in Pathian leng a mawhsa kei hi.
Setan kiang ah, “Koi a hong kipan na hia?” a chi hi. Setan in
Huan
Setan in
Himahleh tuin na khut kha inla, a guh leh a sa khoih lechin, na maitang ah nang hon gense ding hi” a chi hi.
Setan kiang ah, “Ngai in, Amah na khut ah a om hi; a hinna leltak hawi in” a chi hi.
Huchi in
Huchi in aman kikhuatna din belpei a la a; meivu lak ah a tu hi.
Huailai in a zi in a kiang ah, “Na ginomna len chinten lailai na hi hia? Pathian gensia inla, si in” a chi hi.

Himahleh a kiang ah, “Numei hai thugente lak a khat bang in thu na gen. Bang ahia? Pathian khut ah hoih i mu dia, hoihlou leng i mu kei dia hia?” a chi a. Hiai tengteng ah Job in a muk in thil a hihkhial kei hi.

Huchi a Job lawm thumte’n a tung a hiai hoihlou hongtung tengteng a zak un, michih amah mun a kipan in a hong ua: Eliphaz, Teman mi, Bildad Suah mi leh Zophar Naaman mi: amah kah ding leh amah lungmuan ding in hoh khawm ding in thuseh a bawl uhi.
Huchi in gamlapi apan a daktouh uleh, amah a theikei ua, nakpi’n a kikou khia ua, a kapta uhi; a puanaktual uh michih in a botkek ua, a lutang uah vanlam ah leivui a kibuak uhi.
Huchi in a kiang ah leitung ah ni sagih leh zan sagih a tu ua, a kiang ah kuamah in thu khat leng a gen kei uh: a lungkhamna a thupi mahmah chih a thei uhi.
Hiai khit in Job in a kam a ka a, a ni a hamsiat hi.
Job in a dawng a hichi in a chi hi:
“Ka pian ni leh zan,
pasal naupang pai in a om,
a kichihna mangthang hen.
Huai ni mialna hi hen;
tunglam a kipan Pathian in ngaihsak kei hen, a tung ah
leng khovak tang kei hen.
Khomial leh sihna lim in amau ading in huai ngen uhen;
a tung ah meipi kai hen;
khua nimsak tengteng in huai tuh lausak uhen.
Zan ahihleh, mial sah
bikbek a tung ah tu hen;
kum nite lak ah kipak kei hen;
khate simna ah tel kei heh.
Ngai in, huai zan hut hen;
huai ah kipah aw ging kei hen.
Huai ni hamsiatte amau hamsiat uhen,
Leviathan tokthou ding a
mansa a omte.
Huai a khomui aksite mial uhen: khovak zong henla,
himahleh bangmah neikei hen;
zingsang mitvunte leng musam kei hen:
Ka nu sul kongkhakte a khaklouh ziak in,
ka mit a kipan a buaina a sel louh ziak in.
Sul a kipan bangdia silou ka hia?
Gila kipan ka hong paikhiak lai a bangdia kha khahlou ka hia?
Bangdia khukte’n kei hondom ahia?
Ahihkeileh bangdia ka tep ding nawi na om ahia?
Tuchiang in na lumkhin a,
na daimai ding lah ka hi ngal a;
ka na ihmuta dia;
huchi in ka na khawlta ding hi:
Lei kumpipate leh thudotmite,
amau ading a mun siate bawlte toh;
Ahihkeileh dangkaeng nei kumpite,
a innte uh dangka a dimsakte toh;
Ahihkeileh muhlouh a a hunlou a piang bang na hilou ka hia,
naungek khovak mu ngeiloute bang?
Huai ah migiloute’n sukbuai a tawpsan ua;
huai ah mitawlte a khawl uhi.
Huai ah salmatte nuam in
a omkhawm uh;
nasem heutute aw a za kei uhi.
Huai ah a lian leh a neu a om ua;
a pu a kipan in sikha a nuamlen.
Bangdia dah a omte kiang a khovak piak ahia,
kha a haksa sa kiang ah hinna;
Sihna deih a,
a tunlouhnate kiang ah;
gou selguk zon sang a thupi a
zongmite kiang ah;
Han a tunlai ua,
nakpitak a kipakte kiang ah?
Bangdia mi a lampi sel a om kiang leh
Pathian in a umsuak kiang a khovak piak a om ahia?
Ka thumna an ka nek ma in a hongtung a,
ka maunate tui bang a leihbuak in a om hi.
Ka kihtak thil lah ka tung ah
a hongtung ngal a,
ka laulau ka tung ah a hongtung hi.
Nuam ka sa kei a,
ka lung a muang kei,
khawlna leng ka neikei hi;
himahleh buaina a hongpai hi.”
Huailai in Eliphaz, Teman mi in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Min nang hon houlimpih
tum leh na zadah diam?
Hizongleh paulou in kua a omthei dia?
Ngai in, mi tampi na hilhta a,
khut hatloute na hihhatta hi.
A puklai in na thute’n a dingsak a,
khuk hatloute na kipsak hi.
Himahleh tun na tung ah a
hongtung a, na bah a;
nang a honkhoih a, na buaita hi.
Pathian na kihtakna, na muanna hilou hia,
na lametna na lampite muanhuaina?
“Theigige in, k’on ngen hi,
hoih hinapi a,
mangthang ngei kua ahia?
Ahihkeileh koilai ah ahia midik satkhiak a a om?
Kei muh in,
thulimlouhna leilette ahi ua,
buaina tuh a huai mah atte.
Pathian hu in a mangthang
ua, hehna a mut a hihman in a om uhi.
Humpinelkai huham leh,
humpinelkai hangsan aw leh,
humpinelkai tuailai hate,
a kitanta hi.
Samat taksap ziak in humpinelkai tek a mangthang a,
huan humpinelkaipi noute
a dalhzak uhi.
“Tuin a guk in thil ka kiang a hongtung ka bil in huai a huauna a sangta hi.
Zan mengmuhna a kipan a ngaihtuahnate ah,
mite nakpitak a a ihmut san lai un,
Launa ka tung ah a hontung a,
linna in ka guhte tengteng a sing hi.
Huailai in ka mai ah kha a pai a;
ka chimul a dingta hi.
Ka ding kinken a,
himahleh huai a kilatdan ka theikak theita kei a;
a lim tuh ka mit ma ah a om a;
daihna a om a, aw ka za hi,
Pathian sang in sithei mihing a dikzaw ding hia?
A Bawlpa sang in mihing siangthou zaw ding hia? chi in.
Ngai in, a sikhate ah muanna a koihkei a;
angelte hai in a ngoh hi:
Tungman inn a teng
amaute hi sem na un chia,
a suangphum leivui a om a,
leikha ma a chimsia:
Zingsang leh nitak kikal in hihsiat in a om ua:
theihlouh hial in tangtawn in a mangthang uhi.
Amau sung a puanin khau uh a bohkhiak touh hilou hia?
Pilna tellou in a si uhi.”
“Tun sam in;
nang hon dawng kua a om a?
Misiangthoute lak ah a kua lam na nga dia?
Lungzinna in lah mihai a that a,
huan thikna in mi mawl a that sek hi.
Mihai zungkai ka muta a;
himahleh thakhat in a tenna ka hamsiat hi.
A tate bitna a kipan gamlapi ah a om ua,
kongpi ah hihgawp in a om uh,
kuamah amaute hunkhe ding a omkei uhi.
A gilkial in linglak a kipan nasan a an kaihkhawm a gaihsak a,
suamhat in a neih leh lam a nawmvalh sak hi.
Gimthuakna leivui a kipan in
a hongpawt kei a,
lei a kipan in buaina leng a hong dawnkhe sam kei hi;
Himahleh mihing buai ding mah a piang ahi,
mei ekte a tou len bang in.
“Himahleh ken ahihleh,
Pathian lam ah ka zong ding a,
Pathian kiang ah ka thu ka koih ding hi.
Thil thupite hihpa leh
zonkhiak theihlouh;
simzohlouh thillamdangte:
Leitung a vuah pepa leh,
loute tung a tui sawlpa:
Huchi in aman a niamsate
tungsang ah a koihtou a;
misi sunte muanna ah a tawisang hi.
Zekhemhatte lunggelte
bangmahlou a suaksak a,
huchi in a khutte un
a thiltup uh a hih theikei uhi.
Mipilte a zekhemhatna un a man a:
mi hoihloute thilgel a thal paihsak hi.
Sunlai in khomialna a thuak ua,
Zanlai bang in suntang lai in a mai maimah uhi.
Himahleh aman gentheite mi hatte kam leh khut a kipan leh tasamte mahmah namsau a kipan a hondam hi.
Huchi in genthei in lametna a nei a,
thulimlouhna in a kam a humsak hi.
“Ngai in, Pathian in a bawlhoih
min nuam a sa hi;
huaiziak in bangkim hihthei sawina musit ken.
Aman lah meima a bawl a,
a tuam a: a liamsak a,
a khut in a damsak hi.
Buaina guk ah a hon
suaktasak ding a;
Ahi, sagih ah gilou in nang
a hon khoih kei ding hi.
Kial chiang in nang sihna a
kipan a hontan ding;
namsau thilhihtheihna a kipan, kidou chiang in.
Kamsung a leizepna a kipan
honsel ding a;
siatna a hongtun chiang in na lau sam kei ding hi.
Siatna leh kialna ah na nui ding a,
lei gamsate na kihta kei ding hi.
Gam a suangte toh na kithuahtheih ding ziak un;
huan gam a gamsate nang toh na kituak ding uhi.
Na puanin muang in a om
chih na thei ding a;
na ganhuang na veh ding a,
bangmah kimlou a omkei ding hi.
Na chite leng a thupi ding a,
na suante lei a loupa bang in
a om ding uh chih na thei ding hi.
Kum ching in na han na zuan ding a,
a hun a buhlak a om bang in.
Ngai in, hiai thu i zongta ua,
a dikmah ahi,
za in na hoihna ding in thei in.”
Huchi in Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Aw ka lungzinna kibuk thei hi henla,
ka tuahsiatna selbukna ah ki koihkhawm thei hileh:
Tun tuipite a piaunel sang in
a gikzaw ding: huaiziak in
ka thugente leng a khauh hi.
Thilbangkim hihthei thalte lah
ka sung ah a om ngal a,
gu huai a kipan a ka kha in a dawnvek:
Pathian mulkimhuainate kei dou din a kivual uhi.
Loupa a nekding mu gam sabiltung a ham ahia?
Ahihkeileh gan an mu bawngtal a ham ahia?
Gim neilou chi tellou in a kine thei dia hia?
Ahihkeileh aktuida ah limna mawngmawng a om hia?
Ka kha in amaute a khoih nuam kei;
kei ding in an kihhuai bang ahi uhi.
“Aw ka nget tang theileng zaw;
ka thil deih Pathian in hon phal lezaw:
Kei hon hihgawp ding in
Pathian deihlam hilai henla;
a khutzan in,
kei hon satkhe mai leh:
Huchi in lungmuanna ka neilai dia;
ahi, damlou natna ah ka kipak ding:
Misiangthoute thu ka kitheihmohbawl ngal kei hi.
Ka hatna bang ahia,
ka ngak ding?
Huan ka beina bang ahia,
ka kuhkal ding?
Ka hatna suangte hatna hi hia?
Ahihkeileh ka sa dalsik hia?
Kei ah panpihna a om hetkei a,
kei a kipan theihsiamna hawlmang in.
“Bah dia mansa a om kiang ah a lawm in siamna a etsak ding ahi kei maw;
huchilou in Bangkim hihthei kihtakna tawpsan ahi kei ding maw.
Luita bang in ka unaute a lepchiah uh;
luita mangthang luanna bang in.
Huai tuikhal in a vom a;
huai ah vuk a kisel.
A lum hun chiang in a tuimang ua,
a sat chiang in a mun ua kipan a mangthang uhi.
Huai lampi a khualzinte a pial ua,
bangmah omlouhna mun ah a paitou ua,
a mangthang uh.
Tema khualzinte’n a zong ua,
Sheba pawlte’n a lamen uh.
A kilamet hang un
a zahlak uh; huai lam ah
a vapai ua a zahlak uh.
Tuin bangmah na hi ngal kei ua;
mulkimhuaina na mu ua, na lau uhi.
Kei honpia un?
Ahihkeileh na neih leh lam ua kipan in kei ading in thilpiak lan un, ka chi hia?
Ahihkeileh, melma khut apan hontan un,
mi hat khut apan hon hukhia un ka chi hia?
“Hon sinsak in, huan ka dai ding:
ka diklouhna hon theisiam sak un.
Thudikna thute hat hinah e:
himahleh miselna in bang a selphou a?
Thute selphou ding a um na hi uhia?
Chimawhmi thugente huih bang ahi chih thei in.
Ahi, paneiloute tung ah ai na san ua,
na lawm uh sumsinna van in na bawl uh.
“Tuin hehpih in hon en un;
na ma uah thuzuau ka gen kei a.
Kiknawn un ka hon ngen ahi,
diklouhna omkei hen; ahi,
kiknawn un, ka thu a dik ahi.
Ka lei ah diklouhna a om hia?
Thil hoihlou ka lei in a
theikak theikei dia hia?
“Leitung ah mihing adin
kidouna a omkei maw?
A nite kilohmi nite bang ahi ka hia?
Lim deih mahmah sikha bang in, a loh lamen
kilohmi bang in:
Huai bang in bangmahlou
khate nei ding a bawl ka hi,
huan kei ading in zan chimhuaite seh ahi.
Ka lup chiang in, chikchiang in ka thou dia? ka chi a;
himahleh zan a sawt hi;
lehlam lehlam ah nisuah matan kilumlet in ka om hi.
Ka sa than leh leivui khal in a tuam a;
ka vun kimat in a puakkham hi.
Ka nite siamganmi khohthei sang in a kin zaw a,
lametna bei a zatbei ahi.
“Aw ka hinna huih ahi chih theigige in:
ka mit in hoih a mu nawn kei ding hi.
Kei honmu mit in hon en thei nawn takei ding a;
na mitte ka tung ah a om ding ua himahleh ka omta kei ding hi.
Meipi mangthang a omtak louh bang in,
huchi in kuapeuh
Sheol a paisuk a hong paitou nawnta kei uhi.
A inn ah a kiknawn kei ding a,
a mun in amah a thei nawn kei ding hi.
Huaiziak in ka kam ka khou kei ding a;
ka lungsim gimna ah thu ka gen ding;
ka kha haksatna ah ka phun ding hi.
Tuipi ka hi hia, ahihkeileh tua
Tuipi ngapilian ka hi ahia,
huchi a kei n’on chinnak?
Ka lupna in hon lungmuan ding a,
ka tutna nem in ka phunna
a zangkhai sak ding,
ka chih chiang in;
Huaichiang in mang in
n’on lausak a,
mengmuhna in n’on mulkimsak hi:
Huchi in ka kha in heklup leh sihna a tel a,
hiai ka guhte sang in.
Ka hinna ka chimtak a;
ka hing gige kei ding:
hon omsak maimai un;
ka nite lah bangmahlou ahi ngal a.
Mihing bang ahia,
hichitel a na pahtawi ding a,
amah tung a na lungtang na koih ding?
Zingsang teng a amah na veh a,
mitphiatkal chih a amah na ettel ding?
Bang tan vei kei hon lehngatsan louding na hia,
bang tanvei ka chil ka nawmvalh matan hon omsak maimai louding na hia?
Na khial hita leng,
na tung ah bang ka hih a,
Aw mite chingpa nang?
Bangdia nang adia
chiamtehna bang a hon koih na hia,
huchi a keimah adia puakgik ka hih maimah?
Bangdia ka tatlekna ngaidam lou a,
ka thulimlouhna lamang lou oi?
Kei tuin leivui a lum ding ka hi a;
kuhkaltak in na honzong dia,
himahleh ka omta kei ding hi.”
Huchi in Bildad Sua min a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Bang tan hiai thilte gen ding na hia?
Bang tan na kam a thute huih hat bang ding ahi ua?
Pathian in vaihawmna a hekkawi ahia?
Ahihkeileh Thilbangkim hihthei in dikna a hekkawi ahia?
Na tate a tung ah a khial ua,
huai tatlekna ziak a a khut a amaute a pikhiak leh:
Pathian lam kuhkaltak a na zon a, huai
Thilbangkim hihthei kiang a na thilnget na bawl leh;
Na siangthou a na dik leh;
nang ziak in tuin ka khanglou dia,
na diktatna omna a lohching sak ding hi.
Na kipatna neu mahleh,
na tawpna nanung lam nakpi’n a thupi ding hi.
“Huaiziak in k’on ngen hi,
hun masa thu kan inla,
a pipute un a na zonkhiak uh lam ah kisuk in:
Ei lah zan a lel i hi ua,
bangmah i theikei uh,
leitung ah i nite uh lah limliap ahi a:
Amaute’n nang a hon sinsak un, a honhilh un,
a lungtang ua kipan in thute a gen kei ding ua hia?
“Buannawi lou in phaiphek a
khangkhe thei ahia?
Tui lou in loupa a khangthei ahia?
Hing a om a,
satpuk louh a hihlai in,
loupa dangte ma in a vuainak hi.
Huai bangmah in
Pathian mangngilhte tengteng lampi ahi;
pathian limsaklou mi lametna a mangthang ding:
A muanna a kitam ding a,
a kingakna maimomlen ahi hi.
A inn tung ah a kingai dia,
himahleh ading kei ding:
huai ah a len chinten dia,
himahleh a pangsawt kei ding hi.
Nisuah ma in a hing a,
a huan ah a selte a mengkhia uhi.
A zungte leivum kim ah a zam ua,
suangte omna mun ah a hing hi.
A mun a kipan lakmang hileh,
huchi in amah a kitheihmohbawl ding a,
Ka honmu ngeikei, chi in.
Ngai in, hiai a lampi kipahna ahi a,
lei a kipan a dangte a hongsuak ding uh.
“Ngai in, Pathian in mi hoihkim a paikhe kei ding,
gilou hihmite leng a tungding sam kei ding hi.
Na kam nuih in a hon dimsak lai dia,
na mukte kikouna in.
Hon mudahte zumna in a khuh ding a;
gilou puanin a omta kei ding hi.”
Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Chihtaktak in huchi ahi
chih ka thei hi: himahleh
Pathian lak ah mihing bangchi in a dik thei dia?
Amah kiselpih a utlam ahihleh,
sang khat lak a khatvei zong
amah a dawng theikei ding hi.
Amah lungtang in a pil a,
hatna in thil a hihthei ahi:
amah dou in kua a kikhauhsak in,
a lohchingta a oi?
Mualte a suan a, a theikei ua,
heh a amaute a lumleh lai in.
A mun a kipan in lei a sing a,
huan huai a khuamte a ling uhi.
Ni thu a pia a, a suakkei;
aksite a bilhkhum ngiungeu hi.
Amah kia’n vante a phalhkhia a,
tuipi kihot tung ah a pai hi.
Aman Jangkhua,
Zuheisuktun, Siguk leh
simlam aksi munte a bawl hi.
Aman suitheih vuallouh
thil thupite sim zohlouh
thillamdangte a hih hi.
Ngai in, ka kiang ah a pai a,
amah ka mu kei: a pai lailai a,
himahleh amah ka mu kei hi.
Ngai in, samat a man a,
amah kuan a khamthei dia?
Bang hih na hia?
Kuan a kiang ah a chi dia?
“Pathian in a hehna a lakik kei ding;
Rahab panpihmite amah nuai ah a kun petmah uhi.
Bangchiphet a tawmzaw in
amah ka dawng in,
amah toh ngaihtuah ding in ka thute ka telkhe dia hia?
Diktatta zong leng amah ka dawngkei ding hi;
ka gal kiang ah thilngetna ka bawl theilel ding hi.
Amah sam in hon dawng mahleh;
ka aw a ngaikhia chih ka um kei ding hi.
Huihpi in a hon kitamsak a,
a san omlou in ka liamnate a pungsak hi.
Ka nak a hon phalkei a,
himahleh thangpaihna in hon dimsak hi.
Hatna thu genleng, ngai in,
Amah a hat hi:
vaihawmna thu,
kuan hun a honpe dia?
Ki diktatsak leng, ka kam mah in a hon mawhpaih hi:
hoihkim ta zongleng,
hoihlou in a hon telsak ding hi.
Hoihkim mah leng,
ka kilimsak kei;
ka hinna ka musit hi.
A kibang ahivek a;
huaiziak in ken,
hoihkim leh gilou a hihse tuak, ka chi hi.
Jepna in thakhat in that leh,
mi hoih thuakna a nuihsan ding hi.
Lei migilou khut a piak a a om chiang in huai a vaihawmmite maituam a;
amah ahihkeileh, kua ahita dia?
“Tuin ka nite laihawmmi sang in a kin zaw a a taimang ua,
hoih a mu kei uh.
Long kinte bang in a paimang
ua, muvanlai samat tung a
ngumkiak bang in.
Ka phunna ka mangngilh dia,
ka mel lungkham ka pai dia,
ka kipak ding, chi leng.
Ka lungkhamna tengteng ka lau a,
hoih n’on sa kei ding chih ka thei hi.
Mawhpaih in ka om dia;
bangdia a thawn a semgim ka hia?
Vuk tui in kisil in,
ka khutte siangsak kei leng;
Hinapi in guam ah n’on pailut
dia, keimah puante’n a hon kih ding uhi.
Kei bang mihing ahi kei a,
amah ka dawn theihn a,
vaihawmna a ka hoh khawm theihna ding un.
Ka kikal uah kougel hon
mattheihna ding in,
thulaigenmi a omkei hi.
Kei apan in a chiang lamang henla a kihtakhuaina in kei hon lausak kei hen:
Huaichiang in thu ka gen dia,
amah ka lau kei ding:
keimah ah huchibang ka hi ngalkei hi.”
“Ka kha in ka hinna a
chimtak a;
ka utdan dan in ka phun ding hi:
ka kha thangpaihna in thu ka gen ding.
Pathian kiang ah,
Hon mawhpaih ken;
bangdia hon kinakpih na hia hon theisak in,
ka chi ding hi.
Na nuaisiah nang adia
hoih ahi maw,
na khutte thilhih na muhsit a,
giloute thugen tung a na maitai?
Sa mitte nei na hi hia,
ahihkeileh mihing muh bang a mu na hi hia?
Na nite mihing nite bang hia,
ahihkeileh na kumte mihing kumte bang,
Ka thulimlouhna na kan a,
ka khelhna na nungdelh hi,
Ka gilou kei chih thei napi a,
na khut a kipan hon suaktasak ding a omlouh?
Na khutte’n a honsek un a hon
bawl kimvel sipsip a;
tun kihei in n’on hihse dia hia?
Theigige in, ka hon ngen ahi,
tungman bang a na hon mek dan;
leivui hontun nawn ding na hi hia?
Nawitui bang in n’on sungkhia in, nawituidat bang in na hontok kei maw?
Vun leh sa in na hontuam a,
guhte leh thagui in n’on phankhawm hi.
Hinna leh deihsakna na honphal a,
huan n’on venna in ka lungsim a hawi hi.
Himahleh hiai thilte na lungtang sung ah na sel a;
hiai bel na tup ahi chih ka thei hi:
Thil ka hihkhelh leh n’on
chiamteh a,
ka thulimlouhna a kipan n’on khahkei ding hi.
Ka gitlouh leh, ka tung a gik hi;
midiktat hileng zong,
ka lutang ka sangsak kei ding hi.
Lungbuaina in ka dim a,
huaiziak in ka gimthuakna en in.
Ka lutang a kiletsak leh,
humpinelkai bang in nang n’on beng a:
ka tung a na lamdan dan n’on ensak nawn hi.
Kei kalh a na palainate na ’,
ka tung a na hehna na khangsak a;
hondou ding sepaih hon thak n’on sawl hi.
“Bangdia sul apan hon
lakhia na hia?
Na si in kuamah muhlouh na hi leng.
Omlou mahbang ta ding hing a;
sul apan a han a puak a om ding hing a.
Ka nite a tom kei maw?
Huchi ahihleh, tawp in,
hon om sak maimai in,
huchi a neukha a ka lungmuan theihna ding in.
Ka kiknawn louhna a ka pai ma in khomialna gam leh sihna limliap gam mahmah ah:
Mialna mahbang a,
mialna sahna gam a:
sihna limliap gam,
dan himhim omlouhna,
khovak khomial bang a a omna mun ah.”
Huan Zophar Naamathmi in a dawng a, hichi in a chi a:
“Thu tampite dawnlouh
ding ahi a hia?
Mi houlimna a dim siamtansak ding hia?
Na kisaktheihnate’n
mite daisak ding hia?
na simmawh chiang in,
kuamah in nang hon zahlaksak lou ding uhia?
Ka thuhilh a siangthou a,
na mit uah ka siang hi, na chi ngal a.
Himahleh Pathian in
thugen maizen le zaw,
nang dem in a mukte hongleh;
Huchi in pilna thugukte
nang a hon ensak ding a,
a theihna ah thuah tampi ahi chih:
huaiziak in na thulimlouhna sang a tawmzaw na lak ah
Pathian in nang a honphut chih thei in.
“Zon in Pathian na mu thei diam; hoihkimna ah
Thilbangkim hihthei na mu thei diam?
Van bang in a sang a;
bang na hihthei dia?
Sheol sang in a thuk a;
bang na theithei dia?
Huai a tehna lei sang in a sauzaw a,
tuipi sang in a zazaw hi.
Paisuak henla, man henla,
vaihawmna ah sam leh, huchi’n kuan amah a dal thei dia?
Aman lah mi bangmah loute
a thei ngal a:
ngaihtuah kei mahleh,
thu limlouhna leng a mu hi.
Mihing theihsiamna bei in
theihsiamna a nei ding,
sabiltung nou mihing a a pian chiang in.
“Na lungtang na koih dik a,
amah lam a na khutte na zak leh;
Na khut a thulimlouhna a om a,
gamlapi a na koihkhiak a,
gitlouhna na puanin a na tensak kei leh;
Gensiatna ding omlou in na mai na daksak ding a;
ahi, na kip ding a,
na lau kei ding:
Na haksatna na mangngilh ding ziak in;
tui luangmang bang in na theigige ding hi:
Sunlai sang in na hinna a telzaw ding a;
khomial om mahleh,
zingsang bang ahi ding hi.
Lametna a om ziak in,
na kipta ding hi; ahi,
amah tanchin na zong ding a,
muang in na khawlta ding hi.
Lup leng na lum ding a,
kuamah in nang hon lausak kei ding uhi;
ahi, mi tampi’n nang honzong ding uhi.
Himahleh gilou mitte a zuausuak ding a,
a suakta kei ding ua, a lametna uh kha khah ahi ding hi.”
Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Ginlelh vuallouh in mite zaw na hi peuhmah ua,
nou toh pilna a si ding hi.
Himahleh noute bang in
theihsiamna ka nei hi;
nou sang in ka niam zaw kei hi:
ahi, hiaite bang thilte kuan a theikei a?
Kei zaw mi invengte adia
nuihzabuk ka hi a, kei,
huai Pathian sam a,
huai aman amah a dawnpa,
mi dik, mi hoihkim,
nuihzabuk ka na hi.
Omnuam a om ngaihtuahna ah
vangsiatna muhsitna a om a;
himahleh a khe uh teute ading in mansa in a om hi.
Suamhatmite puaninte a lohching a,
Pathian hehsakte a bit ua;
a khut a pathian tawite
Pathian in tampi a pia hi.
“Himahleh gamsate dong in,
huchi in amau nang a hon sinsak ding uh;
huan huihkhua a vasate’n,
nang a honhilh ding uhi:
Ahihkeileh lei kiang ah thu gen in nang a hon sinsak ding ua;
tuipi a ngasate’n na kiang ah a phuang ding uhi.
Hiai tengteng ah,
Amah khut ah thil hing chiteng kha leh,
mihing tengteng hatna a om hi.
Bil in thute enchian in,
Kam in an a chiam kei maw?
Mi upate kiang ah pilna a om a nite sauna ah theihsiamna a om hi.
“Amah kiang ah pilna leh hatna a om;
aman thupha leh theihsiamna a nei.
Ngai in, a kaipuk a,
a kilam nawn theikei ding;
mihing a khakbing a,
kuama’n a hong theikei ding.
Ngai in, tui a ching a a kang hi;
a khahkhia a, lei a tumvek hi.
A kiang ah hatna leh pilna a om a;
khem a omte leh khempa amah a ahi.
Thuhilhmite lohsam in a pimang a,
huan vaihawmmite mihai in a bawl hi.
Kumpipate kolte a sut a,
kawnggak in a kawng uh a gak hi.
Siampute lohsam in a pimang a, mi hatte a zou hi.
“Muan mite thugen a suan a,
upate theihsiamna a lamang hi.
Lalte tung ah muhsitna a buak a mihatte kawnggak a phel hi.
Mial a kipan in thil thukte a mukhia a,
sihna limliap khovak ah a hon lakhia hi.
Namte a pungsak a,
amau a hihsia:
namte a thehzak a,
a lakhawm nawn hi.
Lei a mite hausate lungtang a lamang a,
gamdai a lampi omlouhna ah amau a vakvai sak hi.
Vakna bei in khomial ah a mai ua, huchi in zukhammi bang in amau a hoisak hi.”
“Ngai in, ka mit in
hiai tengteng a mu hi,
ka bil in huai za in a theisiamta hi.
Na thei uh,
huai mah ken leng ka thei hi:
nou sang in ka niam zaw kei hi.
Thilbangkim hihthei kiang ah thu ka gen mahmah ding,
Pathian toh houlim ka ut hi.
Himahleh nou zuau phuakte na hi ua, a phattuambei
damdawisiam na hivek uhi.
Aw na vek un dai sipsip le uchin maw;
na pilna uh hi ding hiven.
Tuin ka thusut za un,
ka mukte ngetna ngaikhia un.
Pathian ading in diloutak in
thu na gen ding uam,
amah ading in khemhattak in
na houlim ding uam?
Ami na zahtak ding uam?
Pathian adin na sual ding uam?
Nou a hon zonkhiak a hoih hia?
Ahihkeileh min mi a khem bang in,
amah na khem ding uam?
Nou a honsal mahmah ding,
a guk a mite na zahtak uleh.
A hoih tungtuanna in nou a hon lausak kei dia hia,
nou tung ah a kihtakhuaina a ke kei diam?
Na thupilte uh vut banglel ahi,
Manna bei paunak ahi a,
na kidalnate uh tungman kidalnate ahi.
“Dai unla,
thu ka gen theihna ding in,
hon omsak maimai un,
ka tung ah a hongtung ding hongtung hen.
Bangding in ka ha in ka sa kei ding a, ka khut ah ka hinna koih ding ahia?
Aman honthat mahleh,
amah ka ngaklai ding:
a ma ah ka lampite ka kem hoih lailai ding hi.
Hiai leng ka hotdamna ahi ding;
Pathian limsaklou mi a ma a
hongpai lou ding a hih ziak in.
Ka thugen thanuamtak in za un,
ka thuphuan na na bil sung uah om hen.
Ngai un, tuin ka thu ka bawlhoihta a;
ka diktat ahi chih ka thei hi.
Kei hon kiselpih ding amah kua ahia?
Kei tuin ka dai dia kha ka khah ding hi.
Ka tung ah thil nih hih kei phot le uchin,
huchi in na mai a kipan ka bu kei ding hi.
Kei apan gamla ah na khut kaikik in;
na lauhuaina in hon lausak ken.
Huaichiang in honsam lechin,
k’on dawng ding;
ahihkeileh hon pausak inla,
hon dawng in.
Ka thulimlouhnate leh khelhnate bang ahia?
Ka tatlekna leh ka khelhna hon theisak in.
Bangdia na maisel a na melma dia honbawl na hia?
Singnah mutleng na hihbuai dia hia?
Buhpawl keu na delh dia hia?
Nang lah kei dem in khatak in na gelh a,
ka tuailai thulimlouhnate n’on luahsak hi:
Ka khete leng kol na bunsak a,
ka lampite tengteng na chiamteh hi;
ka khenuai kim ah gi na khung hi.
Mihing zaw thilmuat leh nget nekgawp puansilh bang in a mangthang hi.
“Mihing, numei apan
piang nite tomchik ahi a,
buaina ngen in a dim hi.
Pak bang in hong dawnkhia a,
a vuai nawn pah, limliap bang in a tai a, a om gige kei.
Mi huchibang tung ah na mit hak in,
vaihawmna ah kei n’on pi dia hia?
Thil nin a kipan in kuan ahia thil siang lakhe thei?
Kuamah in.
A nite sehsa ahi chih thei in,
na kiang ah a khate simna a om a,
a kan theilouh ding in
a gamgite na septa hi;
Amah enken, a khawl theihna
ding in, kiloh bang a,
a ni a hihkim matan.
“Phukpaih in om mahleh,
a hong selnawn ding a,
a hiang nou a tawp kei ding,
chih sing adin lametna lah a om ngal hi.
A zung lei ah upa mahleh,
A kungpi lei ah sita mahleh;
Tuigim ziak in a hongnou thak dia,
singsuan bang in bawkte a hon neikhe nawn ding hi.
Mihing a si a, a mang zel hi:
ahi, mihing in kha a khah a,
huan koi ah a om a?
Tuipi a kipan tuite a pai bang in, luipi bel a tul a, a kang hi;
Huai mah bang in mihing a lum a a thoukei hi:
vante a om nawnlouh matan,
a khanglou kei ding uh,
a ihmu uh leng a halh khe sam kei ding uhi.
Aw Sheol ah honsel lechin aw,
na thangpaihna a man masiah
hon na guk kep lechin,
hun sehsa hon na pia in,
kei hon theigige lechin aw;
Mi sileh a hingnawn diam?
Ka galdouna leh nasepna ni tengteng ka ngak ding a,
ka suahtakna a hongtun ma tan in.
N’on na sam dia, k’on dawng ding hi:
na khut nasep n’on lunggulh ding hi.
Tuin ka kalsuante na sim a:
ka khelhnate na chiamteh hi.
Ip sung ah ka tatlekna bilh in a om a,
ka thulimlouhna na gonggak hi.
“Mual kipuk bangmahlou
a honghi taktak a,
a mun a kipan in suangpi suan in a om hi;
Tuite’n suang a kiamsak ua;
leivui a kibawl munsangte
na taimang a; huan mihing
lametna na hihsia hi.
Tangtawn in amah na zou a,
a pai a; a mel na lamdangsak a,
na sawlmang hi.
A tapate zah in a om ua,
aman a theikei;
hihniam in a om ua,
himahleh aman amau ahi chih a theikei hi.
Himahleh a tung a sa in natna a nei a,
asung ah a kha in a sun hi.”
Huchi in Eliphaz Teman mi in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Mi pil in theihna
bangmahlou toh dawnna a bawl in, suahlam huih in a gilpi a dimsak sak diam?
Houlimna phatuamlou thu
a ngaihtuah in, ahihkeileh
hoih a hih theihna louh ding
a thugente a ngaihtuah diam?
Ahi, launa na hihmang a,
Pathian ma a
kipiakzohna na dal lai hi.
Na kam in na thulimlouhna
a sinsak a, zekhemhat mi lei
na tel ngal a.
Nang mahmah kam in
siamlouh a hon tangsak a,
kei hilou in; ahi, nang dem in
nangmah mukte mah in
hon theihpih hi.
“Mihing piang masapen hi hia?
Ahihke’h tangte om ma a
lakkhiak na hi maw?
Pathian thuhilh guk na za ta hia?
Huan pilna na kikoih hoih hia?
Ka theihlouh uh bang na thei a?
kou a omlou bang na theisiam a?
Ka lak uah samkang leh
upa mahmah a om tuaktuak,
na pa sang a nakpi a upazaw.
Pathian nepnate leh
siamtak a honhilhte
nang adia neu lua uhia?
Bangdia na lungtang in
nang hon pimang ahia?
Bangdia na mitte phia ahia?
Huchi a Pathian dem a
na lungsim na hei a,
na kam apan a huai thute
na pawtkhiak sak.
Mihing bang ahia, a sian ding?
Numei apan piang amah kua ahia a diktat ding?
Ngai in, a misiangthoute ah
muanna a nga kei a:
a mitmuh in vante a siang kei uhi.
Mi kihhuai leh sia,
mi thulimlouhna tui bang a dawn,
siang keina sem in chia:
“K’on ensak ding, honza in;
huan ka muhsa ka phuang ding:
Mipil kuate in ahia a pipute ua
kipan na thu gen a, a im louh uh;
Amau kiang kia ah gam piak in a om a,
mikhual kuamah a lak uah a pai kei uh:
Migilou in a damsung ni teng in natna a thuak a,
nuaisiah hatmi adia khawlkhawm kumte zah mah.
Launa ging a bil ah a om a;
hauh lai in lokmi a tung ah a hongpai ding hi:
Khomial a kipan a hongkik ding
chih a um kei a,
namsau a ngak in a om hi.
Tanghou zong in a vakvai a,
Koi a om ahia? chi in.
Khomial ni a kiang chin ah mansa in a om chih a theikei hi.
Dahna leh haksatna in amah a lausak a;
kumpipa galdou dia mansa bang in,
amah a zou uhi.
Pathian dou ding a khut a likkhiak ziak in,
Thilbangkim hihthei dou ding a kisathei tak a om a,
A lum, a tuamna sahtaknei toh
amah dou a a tai teitei ziak in;
A thau a a maitang a khuh a,
a gil a thau a kholkhawm a,
Khopi tulsa a teng a,
kuamah ten tuak louhna innte,
segawp ngiingei dingte a luah ziak in;
A hau kei ding a, a neih leh lam a om gige kei ding a;
amah lei ah zung a kai kei ding;
Khomial a kipan a suakta kei ding a, meikuang in a selnoute a kangkeu ding a,
a paklunlaite a mut mang ding.
Amah kikhem in,
banglou ah muang kei hen:
bangmahlou lah a thukna hi ding ahi ngal a.
A hun ma in hihzoh in a om dia,
huan a hiang nou kei ding hi.
Grepgui bang in a gah min lou
a singpulh dia, olive bang in
a pak a paikhe ding.
Pathian limsaklou
kithuahpihna hut ding ahi a,
golhna puaninte lah
mei in a kangmang ding hi.
Siatna a pai ua, thulimlouhna a suakkhe sak uh,
a lungtang un khemna a opkeuh uhi.”
Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Huchibang thil tampi ka zata hi: lungmuanmi chimtakhuai ngen na hi uhi.
Thu bangmah loute’n
tawp a nei ding uam?
Ahihkeileh dawng ding a nang hon hihheh bang ahia?
Nou bang in keileng ka pai
theisam hi; na kha uh ka kha mun a om hileh,
noute dem a thute kaikhawm a,
ka lu hon sinkhum thei ding hi vengin.
Himahleh ka kam in nou k’on hatsak ding a,
ka muk a muanna in na lungkhamna uh k’on nem ding.
“Thu gen mah leng,
ka dahna nep in a omkei a:
doh mah leng,
hihnop in ka om ahia?
Himahleh a hon chimtak sakta a:
ka lawmte tengteng na hihgamta hi.
Huan kiptak in na honlen a,
huai kei demna theihpihna ahi:
huchi in ka gawnna kei dem in a thou a,
ka mai tang ah a theisak hi.
A hehna in kei a hon botkek a,
a honsawi hi;
a ha a hon gawi khum a: ka tung ah ka gal in a mit a tat hiam hi.
A kam uh lianpi in a honkat khum ua;
simmohtak in ka biang ah a hon beng uh: kei dou
ding in a kikai khawm ua.
Pathian in Pathian limsakloute kiang ah a honpe khia a,
migiloute khut ah a hon paikhia hi.
Om nuam in ka om,
a hon kitamsak a; ahi,
ka ngawng in a honman a,
honpai nen hi: a muitum ding in a hon tungtou hi.
A thalkapmite’n ka kimvel ah
a hon um ua, ka sisan guite a bottat a, a hawi kei;
lei ah ka sinkha a sungkhia hi.
Siatna tung ah siatna in a hon sesak a;
galhat bang in ka tung ah a tai.
Ka vun tung ah saiip ka khui a,
leivui ah ka kingata hi.
Kahna in ka mai a hoihta kei a,
ka mitvunte ah sihna limliap a om hi;
Ka khut ah hiamgamna omkei mahleh,
ka thumna siangthou mahleh.
“Aw lei, ka sisan khuh ken,
huan ka kahna in khawlmun neikei hen.
Tu mahmah in, Ngai in,
a hon theihpih van ah a om a,
kei hon theihpihpa tungsang ah a om hi.
Ka lawmte’n hon nuihsan ua,
himahleh ka mit in Pathian ah khituite a sungkhia hi;
Huchi a Pathian lak a mihing dikna a letkip theih a,
invengte lak a mihing tapa dikna a letkip theihna ding in:
Kum tawmkha a hongtun chiang in,
ka kiknawn louhna ding lampi ah ka paita ding ahi.”
Ka lungsim hihgawp in a om a,
ka nite a bei, kei ding in han mansa in a om hi.
Ka kiang ah musitmite a omtaktak ua,
a hehna uah ka mit a om gige hi.
“Tuin thuchiam honpia in,
nangmah toh kei ading in mawhkhu honghi in;
kei toh khutte beng ding kua a om a?
Theihsiamna a kipan a lungtang uh na sel ngal a:
huaiziak in amau na hihlian kei ding hi.
Kuapeuh matding a a lawmte hek a,
a neih leh lam tan tummi, a tate nangawn mit a zuausuak ding hi.
“Mite houlimna ding in a honbawl lai a;
huchi in tangpi kih ka hong hita hi.
Lungkhamna ziak in ka mit leng a mial a,
ka hiangte tengteng limliap bang ahi.
Midikte’n hiai ah lamdang a sa ding ua, mi hoih
Pathian limsakloute dou ding in a kitokthou ding.
Himahleh mi diktat a lampi ah a pang zouzou dia,
kuapeuh khut siangneite a hat semsem ding uhi.
Himahleh hongkik un,
na vek un, tuin hong un:
huchi in na lak uah mi pil ka mu kei ding.
Ka nite a beita,
ka thiltupte a segawpta hi,
ka lungtang ngaihtuahte tan in.
Zan sun in a kheng ua:
khovak in khomial a naih, a chi uh.
Sheol ka inn bang in en leng;
khomial ah ka lupna phahta leng;
Siatna kiang ah,
Ka pa na hi, chi leng;
Tangtel kiang ah, ka nu leh ka sanggamnu na hi, chi leng;
Huchi hileh ka lametna koi a om ahia?
Lamet nei hileng kuan hon musak dia?
Sheol mundaite ah paisuk in
leivui ah ka kik khawm ding ua a diam?”
Bildad Suah mi in a dawng a, hichi in a chi a:
“Thute zong a bang tan thangkam ding na hi ua?
Ngaihtuah in, huaizoh chiang in ka pau ding uh.
Bangdia gamsa bang a sim a om a, na mitmuh ua sianglou ka hi ua?
Nang na hehna kipumpei ziak in lei mangngilh in a om diam?
Ahihkeileh a mun a kipan in suangpi suankhiak in a om diam?
“Ahi, migilou vakna mih sak in a om ding a,
a mei ek a tang kei ding.
A puanin ah vakna a mial dia,
a tung a khawnvak mihsak ahi ding.
A hatna kalsuante a hih tuailuai ahi dia,
amah thupha gen in a paikhe ding hi.
Amah khe mahmah in len sung ah amah a pailut ua,
len ah a awksak hi.
Thang in a khetul ah a man dia,
thang in amah a len ding hi.
Lei ah amah ading in thangkual sel in a om a,
lampi ah amah adin thang.
Kihtakhuaite’n ning chiteng ah amah a lausak dia,
a khetul ah a delhzui ding hi.
A hatna gilkial nek in a om dia,
tuahsiatna a khawlna ding in mansa in a om ding.
A pumpi hiangte a negai ding a,
ahi, a hiangte sihna ta masapen in a negai ding hi..
A suan a puanin a kipan zungkalh khiak in a om dia lauhuainate kumpipa kiang a pi in a om ding hi.
Amah a hilou a puanin ah
teng a om ding:
a tenna ah kat thehzak in a om ding hi.
Nuailam ah a zungte a keu dia,
tunglam ah a hiang sat khiak ahi ding.
Lei a kipan in a theihgige a mangthang ding;
kongzing ah min a neikei ding.
Khovak a kipan in khomial ah
hawllut ahi ding a,
khovel a kipan a delh khiak.
A mite lak ah tapa a neikei dia,
tute leng: a tenna ah kuamah
omlai a omkei ding hi.
A malam a omte’n a ni lamdang a sa ding ua,
nunglam a omte hihlau a a om bang un.
Huchibang midiktatloute
tennate ahi petmah a,
Pathian theilou mi mun ahi hi.”
Huchi in Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Bang tan ka kha hihbuai a,
thute a hon hihzan gawp ding na hi ua?
Hiai Sawmvei n’on kouta ua:
ka tung a gilou tak a
na hih uh na zum kei ua.
Nana paikhialta leng maw,
keimah kiang a ka diklouhna om gige hi.
Kei dem in nou kiliansak
petmah ve nuchin,
ka minsiatna ka tung ah na gen ding uh a,
Pathian in ka thu ah hon zouta
chih tuin thei un,
huchi in a len in a hon umsuak hi.
Ngai un, Hiamgamna, chi in ka kikou khia a,
himahleh zak in ka omkei:
panpih deih in ka kikou a,
himahleh vaihawmna a omkei hi.
Ka pai theihlouhna ding in ka lampi a um a,
ka paina ding te ah khomial a koih hi.
Ka thupina hon suahsak a,
ka lu a kipan lallukhu a lakhia hi.
Ning chiteng ah a hon hihniam a, ka mangta hi:
huchi in sing bang in ka lametna a bot khia hi.
Ka tung ah a hehna leng a sou a,
amah ading in a galte lak a
khat bang in a honsim hi.
A sepaihpawlte a hong kuan khawm ua,
ka siatna ding in a lampi uh a bawl uh ka puanin kimvel in puanin a kai uhi.
“Kei apan in ka unaute gamlapi ah a koih a,
ka meltheihte kei apan in a tuam vekta uh.
Ka tanaute’n a hon zuausan ua,
ka lawm theihngeite’n a hon mang ngilhta uhi.
Ka inn tengte leh,
ka sikhanute’n, mikhual a honsa ua: a mitmuh un
namdangmi ka hi.
Ka sikha ka sam a, a hon
dawng kei, ka kam in amah khem mah leng.
Ka hu ka zi ading in kihhuai a hi a,
sanggamte ziak in pumpi hasiang mah le'ng ka namsia hi.
Naupang neute nangawn in hon simmawh ua; ka thoh leh,
ka siatna ding in thu a gen uhi.
Ka lawm thudotte’n kei a honhua ua: amau ka itte
ka tung ah a hel uhi.
Ka guh ka vun ah leh ka sa ah a belh bikbek a,
ka ha vun toh ka suakta hi.
Hon hehpih un, hon hehpih un,
Aw nou ka lawmte;
Pathian khut in kei a hon khoihta ngal a.
Bangdia Pathian bang a nou hon sawi na hi ua,
ka sa a bangdia lungkim lou na hi ua?
“Aw ka thute tuin gelh in om le uh aw;
Aw laibu ah kigelh lut le aw;
Sik leh ngen gelhna zum in
tangtawn ading in suangpi
a gelh hile uh aw;
Ka Tanpa a hing chih leh,
a tawp chiang in leitung ah
a ding nawn ding
chih ka theih ziak in:
Ka vun huchibang a hihsiat a
a om khitnung in,
himahleh ka sa a kipan
Pathian ka mu ding hi:
Keimah ading in amah
keimah mah in ka mu dia,
ka mitte’n a en dia,
midang hilou in.
Ka sung ah ka lungtang a sidangta hi!
Amah bangchibang in i sawita phet di uam,
na chih uleh, kei ah thu bul muh in a om chih thei in;
Namsau kihta un:
hehna in lah namsau gawtnate a hontun ngal a,
huchi a vaihawmna a om chih na theihtheihna ding un.”
Huan Zophar Naamathmi in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
Huaiziak in ka ngaihtuahnate’n
kei dawnna a honpia a,
ka sung a om ka kinohna thu ziak mahmah in.
Kei hon zahlaksak salhna ka zata a, ka theihsiamna kha in a hon dawng hi.
Lei tung a mihing a om nungsiah, hun lui thu hiai na theikei maw;
Giloute vualzohna a tom a,
Pathian limsakloute nuamsakna mitphiat kal sunglel ahi chih?
A hoihkimna in vante suntou in,
a lu in meipite phatou mahleh;
Himahleh amah ek bang in tangtawn in a mangthang
ding a, Koi a om ahia?
Amah mute’n a chi ding uh.
Mang bang in a lengmang dia,
muh in a omkei ding hi:
ahi, zan mengmuh bang a hawlmang in a om ding hi.
Amah mu mit in amah a muta kei ding hi;
a mun in leng amah a muta kei ding hi.
A tate’n gentheite huhna a zong ding ua,
a khutte’n a thil hoih a pe nawn ding hi.
A guhte a tuailai khelhna in
a dim a, ah amah toh a lum ding uhi.
Gitlouhna a kam ah khum in a lei nuai ah sel mahleh;
Sit in, paisak kei in, a kam ah kem gige zou mahleh;
A gil a an kha in a a kitok a,
asung a gulgu bang in a kha hi.
Hauhsaknate a nawmvalh a,
a lawkhe nawn ding hi:
Pathian in a gilpi a kipan in a paikhe ding hi.
Khuai gu a tep dia:
gul lei in amah a that ding.
Luipite, khuaizu leh nawitui dat lui luangte a en kei ding hi.
Sepgim gah a pe nawn dia a nawmvalh suk kei ding hi;
a muhsa ah kipahna a neikei ding.
Aman lah gentheite a nuaisiah a, a mangngilh hi;
a lam louhpi inn hiamgam tak in a lata uhi.
“A deihgawlna in huntawk a neikei a a kipahpih thil himhim a khol kei ding.
A nekgaih louh bangmah omlai a omkei hi;
huaiziak in a hauhna in a daih sawt kei ding.
A hauh san lai in haksa sakna a nei dia:
Thulimlou mi khut a hongtung ding a,
A gilpi hihdim ding a a kisaklai in,
Pathian in a tung ah a thangpaihna kihtakhuaina a khe ding a,
a nek lai in a tung ah a zusak ding hi.
Sik galvan a kipan a tai dia,
dal thal in amah a kap pailet ding.
A dokkhia a, a pumpi a kipan in a hong paikhia:
ahi a sinkha apat a mukzum tevelvel hong paikhia a launate a tung ah a hongtung hi.
A gou ding in mialna tengteng kholkhawm in a om:
mei mutlouh in amah a negai ding; a puanin a nutsiat a om a negai ding hi.
Vante’n a bohsiatna a taklang ding ua, lei amah dou ding in a thou ding.
A inn a punna a paimang dia,
a hehni in a vante a luang mang ding hi.
Hiai Pathian apan a migilou tantuan ahi,
a gouluah dia Pathian in a sehsak.
Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Ka thugen hoihtak in ngaikhia unla, hiai na khamuanna thu uh hi hen.
Honthuak teitei unla,
ka hon gen ding a,
ka gen khit chiang in nuihsan na nu teh.
Kei phunna mihing tung ah hia?
Bangdia kuhkallou a
omlou ding ka hia?
Hon en unla, lamdang sa unla,
khut in na kam uh hum un.
Ka ngaihtuah in ka lung a dong a,
linna in ka sa a man nak.
Bangziak in ahia migilou a hin a,
tekkun a a dam a,
a hong thupikhiak?
A suante uh a kiang uah a mitmuh uah a hihkip a,
a gil ua gahte a mai ma uh.
A inn leh loute uh lauhuai lak ah a bit a,
Pathian chiang a tung uah a ke kei hi.
A bawngtal un chi a khah a,
a hut ngeikei,
a bawngpi un nou a nei a,
a nou a se ngeikei.
Ganhon bang in a taneute uh
a pawtsak ua,
a tate uh a lam uh.
A pekging uleh kaihging
toh kituak in la a sa ua,
a tamngai ging uah a kipak uh.
A nite uh lamzangtak in a zang ua, lungmuang in
Sheol ah a paisuk uh.
Pathian kiang ah, Hon paisan in,
na lampite theih ka kilawp kei uh.
Bangkim hihthei bang a a hih,
a na ka sep ding uh,
A kiang a ka thum un punna bang a ka muh ding uh? a chi uhi.
Ngai in; a lamzanna uh a khut ua om ahi kei ahia?
Migilou lemtheihna kei a kipan a gamlapi a om ahi.
“Migilou meisel bangzah vei a mit a,
vangtahna a tung ua a tun a,
Pathian in a thangpaihna in
lungkhamna a piak chiat?
Bangzah vei ahia buhpawl huih mut bang a hih ua,
buhsi huihpi mutmang bang a hih uh?
Pathian in gitlouhnate a tate uh ading in a kholkhawm,
na chi ua, amau tung ah tungsak le ake, a theihsiam nading un.
Amau mit ngei in a siatna uh mu uhenla,
Bangkim hihthei thangpaihna dawn uhen.
Aman nung in a inn uh
amau adin bang a a hih, a kha zah uh hihtawp a hih nung in?
Kuan ahia Pathian theihna sinsak ding?
aman sangpi a omte vai a hawmsak ngal a.
A lutlai in mi a si a,
nuam leh bit lai in.
A nawite nawizu in a dim a,
a guhngekte thau in a dim hi.
Midang lungkhamtak in a si a,
Nuamsa a a an chiam ngeilou in.
Vutlak ah kibang in a lum ua,
than in a pumtuam hi.
“Ngai in, na ngaihtuah uh ka thei, dikloupi a ka tung a na sawmte uh.
Koi ah ahia kumpi in a om,
migilou tenna puanin koi ah a om a? na chi uh.
Zinzin mite na dong ngeikei ua hia?
A gente uh na pom kei ua hia?
Migilou vangtah ni’n hawi in a om a,
thangpaih ni’n hotkhiak in a om, chih.
Kua ahia a maitang a a lampi pulak ding,
kua ahia a thilhih bang a amah din ding?
Han lam a puak a hih in,
a han ven ahi.
Luiguam a leitang amah din a nuam a;
mi tengteng in amah nung a zui ua,
amah ma a na paite simsenglouh ahi uh.
Bangchi in thu mulmal
omloupi in hon khamuan ding na hia?
Na dawnnate uah zuauthu loungal bangmah a omkei hi.”
Huchi in Eliphaz,
Teman mi in hichi in a chi hi;
“Mihing Pathian ading in a phatuam thei diam?
Kuapeuh a pil amah mah ading in a phatuam ngei a.
Na diktat, Thilbangkim hihthei ading a kipahna ahi ahia?
Ahihkeileh na lampite na hoihkim sak,
amah dia punna hia?
Nang a honsalh a,
vaihawmna a nang toh a lut,
amah na kihtak ziak hia?
Na gitlouhna a lian kei maw?
Na thulimlouhna ah leng
tawpna a omsam kei hi.
Bangmahlou ding in na unau thuchiamte na la a, vuaktangte a puansilh uh na suahsak hi.
Gim a in dawn ding in tui na pe kei a, gilkial adin tanghou na it hi.
Himahleh mi hat in gam a nei a; mi deihthoh a ung ah a teng hi.
Khutvuak in meithaite
na sawl mang a, pabeite
khutte hihtan in a om hi.
Huaiziak in thangte na kim ah a om ua, lau guihna in nang hon hihbuai hi.
Ahihkeileh khomial,
na muhtheih louh,
leh tui tampi in nang a honkhuh hi.
“Van sang ah
Pathian a om ka hia?
Aksite sandan en in,
sang hina tel uh e;
Nang, Pathian in bang a thei a?
Khomial bikbek ah vai a hawm thei dia hia?
Aman hon muhlouhna dinga,
meipi sah in liah a, van dum khen a a vak ahi, na chi.
Migiloute totsa lampi lui na kem ding hia?
A hun ma ua lakmang a om a,
a kingakna ua tuiluang bang a butkhiak a omte:
Pathian kiang a,
Hon pai mangsan in;
huan ei ading in
Thilbangkim hihthei in bang a hih thei a? chite.
Himahleh a innte uh thil hoih in a dimsak ua:
himahleh migiloute thugen kei a kipan a gamla hi.
Mi diktatte’n a mu ua,
a kipak ua;
mi hoihte’n amau a nuihsan ua,
Chihtaktak in ei dou ding a thoute satkhiak in a om ua,
amaute lak a omlaite mei in a hulta, chi in.
“Tuin amah kimeltheihpih inla,
muangtakin om in:
Huai ah hoih na kiang ah a hongpai ding hi.
A kam a kipan in
dan sang in, k’on ngen hi,
na lungtang ah a thute khol khawm in.
Thilbangkim hihthei kiang a
na kiknawn leh,
lamkip na hi ding;
Na puaninte a kipan a gamlapi a diktatlouhna na koihmang ding ahi.
Huan na gou leivui ah koih inla,
luite suangte lak ah
Ophir dangkaeng;
Thilbangkim hihthei
na gou ahi dia, a manpha
dangka nang a ding in
Thilbangkim hihthei ah kipak in, Pathian kiang ah
daktou ding na hih ziak in.
Amah kiang ah na thum ding a,
aman a honza ding hi.
Thil khat tung ah thupukna bawl in thu na pedia,
nang adia hihkip in a om ding hi;
huchi in na lampite ah khovak a tang ding.
A hon sawnpuk chiang un,
Thoh touhna a om, na chi ding;
Hihniam a omte aman a hondam ding hi.
Aman a hoihlou nasan a suaktasak ding a:
ahi, na khutte sianna ziak in amah suahtaksak in a om ding.”
Huchi in Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
Tuni mahmah in ka phunna helhuai ahi:
ka thuakna ka mauna sang in a gikzaw hi.
Aw amah ka muhna mun thei lengla, a tutna mahmah ah hoh thei leng aw!
A ma ah ka thu ka bawlhoih dia, thugente in ka kam dimsak ding hi veng.
A hon na dawnna ding thute ka thei dia,
huchi in bang ahia ka kiang a a gen ding ka theisiam ding.
A thilhihtheihna letna in kei a honsel diam?
Ii; himahleh kei a hon limsak ding hi.
Huai ah midik in amah thu a sutpih thei dia;
huchi in ka vaihawmmi apan suahtaksak in ka omtawntungta ding hi.
“Ngai in, mailam zuan in ka
pai a, himahleh huai ah
a omkei; nunglam zuan in,
himahleh amah ka mu kei hi.
Veilam pang ah, na sep lai in,
himahleh amah ka mu theikei
a: taklam pang ah a bu, amah
ka muh theihlouhna ding in.
Himahleh ka zuih lampi a thei a; a hon ze-et lai in,
dangkaeng bang in k’on suakkhe ding hi.
Ka khe in a kalsuante a len kip a; a lampite ka zuita a, ka pial kei hi.
A mukte thupiak a kipan
ka pai kik kei a,
a kam a thute a kiphamoh ka an sang in ka kholkhawm zaw hi.
Himahleh amah lungsim
kheklou ahi a,
amah kuan a hei thei dia?
A kha in a deih,
huai mah ahihzel hi.
Kei adia sehsa a hih ngal a:
thil huchibang tampi
a kiang ah a om hi.
Huaiziak in a omna ah
ka buai a; ka ngaihtuah
chiang in amah ka lau hi.
Pathian in ka lungtang
a bahsakta a,
Thilbangkim hihthei in
a hon hihbuaita hi.
Khomial ma in satkhiak in
ka om ngal kei a,
ka mai a kipan khomial sah leng a khuh sam kei hi.”
Bangdia Thilbang kimhihthei
in vaihawmna hunte bawl lou ahia?
Amah theite’n bangdia a nite mulou uh ahia?
Gamgi suan a om ua; ganhon hiamgam tak in a lamang ua,
a vak uhi.
Pabeite sabiltung a hawl mang ua: thuchiamna din meithai bawngtal a la uh.
Lampi a kipan tasamte a hei khia ua:
lei a gentheite a kisel khawm uhi.
Ngai in gamkeu a sabiltungte
bang in a thilhihna lam uah,
an thanuamtak a zong in a paikhia ua, a tate uh ding in gamdai in amau an a suaksak hi.
Gam lam ah a gan an a at ua;
migiloute grep gah a la uh.
Zankhua in puan bei in
vuaktang in a lum ua,
khovot ah khuhna neilou in.
Mualte vuahphin in a kawt ua,
belhding deihman in suangpi a kawi uhi.
“Pa neiloute nawi a kipan
kai khia a om ua,
huan gentheite thuchiam la:
Huchi in tasamte puanbei in
vuaktang in a vialvak ua,
buhphalte gilkial in a pua uhi.
Olive apan sathau a bawl ua;
a uain sukna uh a chil ua,
himahleh a dangtak uhi.
Khopi a kipan mite a mau ua,
liamte kha a kikou khia ua;
Pathian in a limsak kei hi.
“Hiaite khovak tung a helte lak a ahi ua; huai lampite
a theikei ua, a lampite ah
a om gige sam kei uhi.
Tualthatmi zan mial in a thou a, gentheite leh
tasamte a that a; ahi,
zan in gutami ahi.
Angkawm mi mit in leng khomui a ngak a,
kuamah in honmu kei ding,
chi in,
a mai a bawl lamdang hi.
Khomial in innte a vut pailet ua: sun chiang in
a kikhum bilh ua;
khovak a theikei uh.
Amaute tengteng ading in
zingsang sihna limliap bang
ahi a; zan mial lauhuaite
lawm in a nei uhi.
“Tuite tung ah kintak a taihmang in a om ua;
a tantuan uh lei ah hamsiat in a om: a grephuante sukmi in a naih kei.
Khokhal leh nisa in vuk tuite a tawpkang a:
huai mah bang in thil hihkhialte Sheol in a hih hi.
Sul in amah a mangngilh dia;
than in limsatakin amah
kivakna in a nei ding uh;
theihgige in a omta kei dia,
diktatlouhna sing bang a hihtan in a om ding.
“Ta neilou numei ching a negai a; meithai ading in hoih a hih kei hi.
Ahi a lah Pathian in a thilhihtheihna in mihatte
a dawmkang a, hinna a lamet phaklouh lai un a dingtou uh.
Bitna Pathian in amau a pia a,
huchi in huai ah a khawl uh;
a mitte a lampite uah a om hi.
Hihlet in a om ua;
himahleh sawtlou kal in,
a bei uhi; ahi, sukniam in a om ua, midang tengteng
bang in lampi a kipan lak khiak in a om ua, buhvui
bang a at khiak in a om uhi.
Huchibang na hi kei ta leh kua ahia zuauthei a hon chian ding a,
ka thugen ah bangmah omlou a lak ding?”
Bildad Suah mi in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
Lalna leh launa Pathian kiang ah a om;
Aman a mun sangte ah muanna a bawl hi.
A sepaihte honte kuan a simseng dia?
Kua tung ah ahia
A vakna tanlouhna a om?
Huchi a hih chiang in
Pathian ma ah bangchi in mihing a dik thei dia?
Ahihkeileh amah numei suan bangchi in a siang thei dia?
Ngai in, khapi nangawn in
vakna a neikei a,
a mitmuh in aksite a siangthou kei hi.
Mihing, tangtel sang a bangzah a neuzaw?
Pathian mitmuh ah mihing bangchi phet ahi diam,
mihingta, lungnou!”
Huan Job in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Thilhihtheihna neilou amah bangchi’n na panpih in;
hatna neilou ban bangchidan a hondam thei na hia?
Pilna neilou amah bangchi’n na thuhilh a,
nakpitak a theihna hoih na phuangkheta a;
Kua kiang ah ahia thute na genkhiak?
Kua kha ahia nang a kipan hong paikhia?
Sisate tuite nuai leh huai a tengte nuai ah a ling uh.
A ma ah Sheol vuaktang in a om a, Abaddon in
kikhuhna a neikei hi.
Aman mal mun awng ah a phalhkhia a, bangmahlou tung ah lei a khai hi.
A meipi sah in tuite a tun a;
a nuai ah meipi a kikek kei hi.
Khapi mai a khuh a,
a tung ah a meipi a phalh hi.
Tuite tung ah, khovak leh
khomial kigitna ah,
kawlmong a kaikual hi.
A salhna ah van khuamte a ling ua, lamdang a sa uh.
A thilhihtheihna in tuipi a khawlsak a, huan a
theihsiamna in Rahab a sat.
A hu in vante bawlhoih in
a om a; a khut in gulpi man gang tailai a sun hi.
Ngai in, hiaite a thilhih a mong lel ahi uh.
Ngatchik a a huau siausiau lel!
A thilhihtheihna Van ging kua ahia theisiam ding?”
Huchi in Job in a gentehna thu apan nawn a,
hichi in a chi hi:
“Pathian a hing bang in,
aman ka dikna a lamang a;
Thilbangkim hihthei in,
aman ka kha a hihbuai a;
Ka hinna ka sung a a om laiteng, Pathian hu ka nakvang a a om laiteng?
Ka mukte’n thutaklou a gen kei ding, ka lei in leng khemna thu a gen kei ding.
Siam k’on tangsak kei ding hi:
ka sihma ka dikna kei a pan ka koihmang kei ding hi.
Ka diktatna ka len chinten a,
ka khah kei ding hi:
ka damlai teng ka lungtang in kei honkou kei ding.
“Ka melma gilou bang hi henla,
kei dou dia thou mi diktatlou bang hi hen.
Punna muta mahleh,
Pathian limsakloumi lametna,
Pathian in a kha a lakmang
ngal in, bang ahia?
A tung a buaina a tun in,
a kikou Pathian in a za diam?
Thilbangkim hihthei ah nuam a sa in, Chiklaipeuh in
Pathian sap nuam a sa diam?
Pathian khut tungtang ah
nang k’on sinsak ding;
Thilbangkim hihthei kiang a om ken ka im kei ding hi.
Ngai un, noute tengteng in huai na muta ua;
A hih ngal leh, bangdia
bangmahlou honghi na hi ua?
“Hiai Pathian lak a
migilou tantuan leh,
nuaisiahhat mite goutan,
Thilbangkim hihthei apan a muh uh ahi.
A tate a pun uleh,
namsau ading ahi;
huan a suan tanghou in a tai kei ding hi.
A nung a omlaite hi leng in a vui dia, a meithaite un kahna a bawl kei ding uh.
Dangka leivui bang in vum in,
puansilh tungman bang in bawl mahleh;
A bawl thei, himahleh midikte’n a silh ding ua,
mi hoihte’n dangka pen a hawm ding uhi.
Inn a lam maimom len bang ahi a, vengmi in a bawl aidakbuk bang ahi.
Hausa in a lum a, himahleh
khop in a omkei ding;
a mit a hak a, huan a omkei.
Tuite bang in launate’n amah a pha a; zan in huihpi in amah a gu mang hi.
Suahlam huih in amah a pawmang a, a pai mang hi;
huchi in a mun a kipan in amah a mut mang hi
Pathian in amah nakpi’n a lawn dia, a dawm kei ding:
a khut a pan a taimang ding hi.
Mite’n amah a khut uh a betkhum ding ua,
a mun a kipan in amah a nuihsan khe ding uhi.”
Chihtaktak in dangka ading in khuk a om a,
a hihsiang uh dangkaeng ading in mun.
Lei a pan in sik a kilakhia a,
suang a kipan in dal a ki sungkhia hi.
Mihing in khomial phaktawp a neisak a,
khomial sah leh thuk ah phaktawp gamlapen tan in sikbu a zongkhia.
Mite om louhna ah kawkhuk lutna hawm a tou vang ua,
mite apat gamla ah a kikhai ua,
Lehlam lehlam ah a ki vei uh.
Lei ahihleh, huai a kipan in
tanghou a hongsuak a:
a nuai ah mei a hihbang in a kilumlet hi.
Huai suangte sapphir suang
mun ahi a dangkaeng nen a nei hi.
“Huai lampi sasial ne vasa in a theikei a, mu akla mit in leng a mu ngei sam kei hi.
Gamsa kisatheite’n a sikkha ngeikei ua,
humpinelkai lunlai leng huai ah a paikha naikei hi.
“Meisah suangpi tung ah a khut a koih a; a zung in mualte a lumlet a lumlet hi.
Suangpite lak ah tuilam a hong a; a mit in thil manpha chiteng a mu hi.
A takkhiak louhna ding un lui luangte a tuam a;
thil kisel khovak ah a hon lakhia hi.
“Himahleh koilai ah a pilna
a kimu dia?
Theihsiamna koilai a om ahia?
Mihing in a lampi a theikei hi;
mihing gam ah leng muh in a omkei hi.
Thukna in kei ah a omkei a chi a, Tuipi in, ka kiang ah a omkei, a chi hi.
Dangkaeng a muhtheih ahi kei a, huai man ding in dangka buk theih ahi kei hi.
Ophir dangkaeng toh a manphatna teh theih
ahi kei ding, Onik mantam
hiam Sapphir toh hiam.
Dangkaeng leh limlang in a kimpih theikei ua:
huai khenna din dangkaeng hoih leh suangmantam leng
ahi theikei ding hi.
Suang dum hiam suang muh paisuak theih a kigen kei ding:
Ahi, pilna man rubi suang sang in a sangzaw hi.
Ethiopia topaz suang in a pha kei dia,
dangkaeng tak toh leng a manphatna teh ding ahi kei.
“Ahihleh pilna koi a kipan a
hongpai ahia?
Theihsiamna koi a om hia?
Mihing tengteng mit a kipan a sel ahi chih leh,
huihkhua a vasate a kipan sitsa a om ahi chih thei in.
Abaddon leh Sihna in,
huai a thuthang ka bil un ka za uh, a chi uhi.
“Huai a lampi Pathian in a
theisiam, huai a mun a thei hi.
Lei mong tan in a en ngal a,
van nuai thil tengteng a mu hi.
Huih ading a gikna a piaklai in, leh tuite tehna a a teh lai in;
Vuah ading a thupiak a bawl a,
vanpiging khophia adia lampi a bawl lai in;
Huailai in aman a mu a,
a phuang a; a hihkip a,
ahi, a zongkhia hi.
Mihing kiang ah, Ngai in,
hoihlou a kipan paimang theihsiamna ahi, a chi hi.”
Job in a gentehna thu a gen nawn a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Aw nidanglai khate bang a om hileng, Pathian in a
honveh lai nite bang in;
Ka lu tung a a khawnvak a tan a, amah vakna a khomial a ka vak lai;
Ka hoihlai nite a ka om bang a,
ka puanin tung a Pathian thuguk a omlai in;
Ka kiang a Thilbangkim
hihthei a om a,
ka tate ka kim a omlai un;
Ka kalsuante bawngnawi a sawp a hih a,
suangpin sathau luite a butkhiaklai in:
Khopi a kongpi zuan a ka pailai in, kongzing a ka tutna ka bawl lai in,
Tangvalte’n a honmu ua, a bu
ua: upate a thou ua ading uh:
Lalte houlim a kidek ua,
a kam uah a khut uh a koih uh:
Miliante aw a dai a, a lei uh a kam dangtawng uah a belh hi.
Bil in a honzak lai in,
hampha a honchi a;
mit in a honmuh lai in,
pom a honchi a;
A kap mi genthei,
amah panpih a,
Pa neilou, panpih bei ka hutkhiak ziak in.
Mangthang ding a mansa a kipan vualzawlna ka tung ah a hongtung a:
meithai lungtang kipah ziak a lasa ding in ka omsak hi.
Diktatna ka silh a,
a hontuam hi: ka dikna puanak thupi leh lukhum bang leh suangmantam bang ahi.
Mittaw ading in mitte ka hi a,
khebai ading in khete ka hi.
Tasam ading in pa ka hi a:
ka theihlouh thubul ka zongkhia hi.
Diktatlou mi haizek ka hihtan a,
a ha a kipan a samat ka khahsak.
Huchi in ken,
ka bu ah ka si ding a,
piaunel bang in ka nite ka pungsak ding, ka chi a:
Ka zungte tuite pha in
a dalh zak a, ka hiang ah
zankhua in daitui a kai:
Kei ah ka thupina
a thak gige a, ka khut ah
ka thalpeu a thak gige.
“Mite’n a honngai ua,
a ngak ua, ka thuhilh ading in a daidide uhi.
Ka thute zoh in a pau nawn kei uh; ka thugen a tung uah a takkhia.
Vuah ngak bang in a hon ngak ua;
vuah nanungte ading bang in lianpi in a kam ka uh.
Kimuanna a neih louh chiang un a tung uah ka nuihmai a;
huchi in ka mel tang a paikhe kei uh.
A lampi ding uh ka telsak a,
hausa bang in ka tu a; sepaihpawl lak a kumpipa bang in ka leng a,
sunmite lungmuanmi bang in.”
“Huan kei sang a naupang,
a pate uh, ka ganching uite
toh koih dia ka sitte’n,
kei nuihzabawlna in a hon zang uh.
Ahi, a khutte uh hat a,
kei bang a hon lohtak dia, huai a hatna uh beisate’n?
Taksapna leh kialna in a tuikang ua;
lei keu leh sia a kheuh uh,
Pawn a anteh a lou ua;
huan loukha zungte a an uh ahi.
Mite lak a kipan hawlkhiak in a om ua; guta bang in amau nung ah a kikou ua.
Guam a hengte ah a teng ding ua, lei leh suangpi hawmte ah.
Pawn lak ah a ham ua; lahou nuaite ah a kisekhawm uh.
Mihaite tate ahi ua, ahi,
mi thulimlou tate; gam a pan in delhkhiak ahi uhi.
“Huan tuin kei a la uh ka honghi ahi, amau ading in houlimna ka hi.
A honkih ua, kei a kipan a tuam din uh,
ka mai a chil siat a kidek kei uh.
Pathian in ka khau a khah a,
a hon hihgim a,
huan ka ma ah kamkaihna a khahkhia uh.
Ka khut taklam ah tualaite
a thou ua; ka khe a nawlkhin
ua, siatna lampi ka ma ah a koih uhi.
Ka lampi hihsia in,
ka tuahsiatna a zong ua,
kuama’n a kham kei uh.
Awng zapi a paisuak bang in a hong ua: siatna lak ah ka tung ah a kikhuk uh.
Launate ka tung ah a hei ua,
huih bang in ka minphatna a delhmang uh;
meipi bang in ka hauhna a paimang hi.
“Huchi in tuin ka sung ah ka kha buakkhiak in a om;
gimthuakna nite’n kei a honman uhi.
Zan in ka guhte a sawi a,
kei honsun natnate’n khawl chih a neikei uh.
Ka natna hi hat mahmahna ziak in ka puansilh a nin a:
ka puanak ngawng bang in kei a hon gak hi.
Buannawi ah a honpai lut a,
leivui leh meivu bang ka hi hi.
Na kiang ah ka kikou a,
n’on dawng kei hi:
Ka ding a, kei n’on en maimah a.
Ka tung a gilou ding in na kilumlet a, na ban hatna in
kei n’on sawi hi.
Huih ah n’on domkang tou a,
huai tung ah n’on tuangsak;
huchi in huih ah n’on lumlet let hi.
Sihna na hontun ding chih ka thei hi, mihing tengteng adia sehsa inn ah.
“Himahleh siatna a pukgawp mi’n a banzak lou ding hia?
A tuahsiatna ah panpihna ngen in kikou lou ding hia?
Buaina a din ka kap kei diam?
tasam a ding in ka kha a dah kei ding a hiam?
Hoih ka ngak chiang in,
hoihlou a hongpai a;
khovak ka ngak chiang in,
khomial a hongpai.
Ka lungtang a buai, khawl a mu ngeikei;
gimthuakna nite ka tung ah a hongtung.
Hihvom a om in ka vialvak,
himahleh ni hihvom hilou in;
khawmpi ah ka ding a panpih deih in ka kikou hi.
Sehalte unaupa ka hi a,
vakengsangte lawm ka hi.
Ka vun a vom a,
kei a kipan a pilh uh,
kholum in ka guhte a kang hi.
Huaiziak in ka kaihging sunna a suak a,
ka mutging mikapte aw.”
“Ka mit toh thukhun
ka na bawlkhinta; Bangchi’n nungak ka en theita dia?
Ahihleh tunglam Pathian a
kipan in ka tantuan bang ahia,
tungsang a Thilbangkim hihthei a kipan in ka goutan?
Mi dikloute tung ah siatna,
gitlouh nasemte tung ah gawtna a tung kei maw?
Aman ka lampite a mu kei ahia?
ka kalsuante a sim vek kei ahia?
“Thuzuau toh na om a,
huai a ka khe khem ding a kinoh ahihleh;
Bukna diktak ah honbuk dih ua,
Pathian in ka thutakna thei hen!
Ka kalsuan lampi a kipan a na pial hiam, ka lungtang in ka mitte na zui hiam,
ka khutte ah nin himhim na belh hiam:
Huchi ka hihleh, chi tuh ning,
midang in ne hen;
ahi, ka lou a piang bulkalh khiak hi hen.
Ka lungtang numei lam a khem a om a,
ka inveng kongkhak ka na ngaktak leh:
Huchi a hihtak leh ka zi in midang ading in an su henla,
midangte amah tung ah kun uhen.
Huchibang gitlouhna hoih
hetlou ahi; ahi, vaihawmmite
gawt ding khelhna ngei,
Siatna ding a Abaddon tan a kangbei leh,
ka punna tengteng zungkalh ding mei hi ding lah ahi ngal a.
“Ka tung a phunna a neihlai ua,
ka sikhapa hiam ka sikhanu hiam makhua na musit a,
na khualsak lou ka hihleh;
Pathian a thohkhiak chiang in
bang ka hihta dia?
Thu a kan hun chiang in bang in ka dawngta dia?
Kei sul a hon bawlpan amah a bawl kei maw?
Khat in a hon bawltuak ahi kei maw?
“Migentheite a lunggulh uh ka piak louh a,
ahihkeileh a vuaksuak ding a meithai mitte ka na omsak leh;
Ahihkeileh kei kia in ka an ka nek a, huai a pabei in an a nek kei leh;
Ii, ka tuailai a kipan in pa bang ka hi, ka kiang ah a na khanglianta;
ka nu sul a kipan amah pipa ka hita hi:
Kuapeuh taksap ziak a mangthang hiam,
ahihkeileh tasam khuhna neilou hiam ka na muh leh;
A kongte’n kei hon vualzawl
lou a, ka belam mul a lumsak a a na omkei leh;
Kongpi a panpihna ka muh ziak a pabeite siatna ding a ka khut ka nalik leh;
Huchi ka hihleh, ka liang ka liangzang a kipan kia henla,
a guh a kipan ka ban kitan hen.
Pathian a kipan tuahsia kei a
ding in launa ahi ngal a,
A thupina ka tuak ngam kei hi.
“Dangkaeng lametpen a ka na bawl a, dangkaeng hoih kiang ah, ka muanna na hi,
ka na chihtak a;
Ka hauhna thupi ziak a hiam,
ka khut in tam a lam ziak a ka kipah a;
A vak lai a ni ka na et a, kha
thupitak paikhia ka na et a,
Ka lungtang guk a khem a a om a, ka kam in ka khut a na tawptak leh:
Hiai leng thulimlouhna
vaihawmmite gawt ding ahi:
tung a Pathian kiang a na zuauta hi ding ka hih ziak in.
“Kei hon mudah siatna a ka na kipah a, ahihkeileh hoihlou a tung a a tun chiang a ka na kipah luat leh;
Ka melma hamsiat ding leh a henna thum ding in ka kam ka na khialsak kei;
Ka puanin a te a,
A an a kihihvah lou kua a om a,
hon na chih kei ua leh;
Kongzing ah mikhual a giak ngeikei a;
khualzin adin ka kongte ka na hongta
Adam bang a ka angsung a
thulimlouhna na sel a,
ka tatlekna na khuh ka hih a,
A ziak, mi tampi launa thupitak
ka neih ziak a hih a, sungte
honmuh daina launa ziak a
huchi a daidide a,
popawt lou ka hihleh,
Aw, kei honza mi nei leng maw:
Ngai in, hiai ah ka min gelh a om hi.
Thilbangkim hihthei in hon dawng hen;
ka gal in a gelhkhiak matna
nei leng maw:
Chihtaktak in ka liangzang ah
ka paw dia; lallukhu bang in
kei ah ka kan den ding hi.
A kiang ah ka kal suan zah ka phuang ding a;
lal bang in ka kiang nai ah ka hoh ding hi.
“Ka gam kei dem a a kikou a,
lei lehsate a kah khawm uleh;
Sum lou a huai gahte ka na nektak a, ahihkeileh
huai a a neite a hinna uh
ka na tansak leh:
Buh hilou in loulingneite,
barli buh hilou in loubualte pou zaw hen.”
Job thute a beita hi.
Huchibang in hiai mi thumte Job dawn a tawpta ua, amah mit a diktat a hih ziak in.
Huailai in Buz mi Barakel tapa Elihu hehna a kuangkhia a, Ram inkuan a mi: Job tung ah a hehna a kuangkhia a, Pathian hizaw lou a amah siam a kitansak ziak in.
A lawm thumte tung ah leng a hehna a kuangkhia a, dawnna ding neilou a, hinapia lah Job a mawhpaih ziak un.
Amah sang a a upat zawk ziak uh, Job kiang a thugen ding in Elihu in a ngak hi.
Hiai mi thumte kam a dawnna a omkei chih a theih in, a hehna a kuangkhia hi.
“Huchi in Buz mi Barakel tapa
Ka naupang a,
nou na upa mahmah uh;
huaiziak in ka dai a, ka lungsim k’on ensak ngam kei hi.
Huchi in ka chi, Nite’n thu a gen ding uh,
kum tampi in pilna a sinsak ding hi.
Himahleh mihing lungsim a om a, Thilbangkimthei in
theihsiamna a pia hi.
A pilte mi thupite ahi kei ua,
vaihawmna theisiamte upate ahi sam kei uh.
Huaiziak in, hong ngaikhia un;
ken leng ka lungsim ka ensak ding, ka chi.
“Ngai un, na thute uh ka ngak a,
gen ding na zonkhiak lai un,
na thusutte uh ka ngaikhia.
Ahi, k’on limsak a,
ngai un, kuamah Job thuzoh
zou na omkei uh,
ahihkeileh na lak uah,
a thute dawng.
Pilna i muta, chilou din pilvang un; mihing hilou in
Pathian in amah a zou thei hi:
Aman kei siatna ding in
a thute ahihkei a;
ken leng nou thugente in amah ka dawng sam kei ding.
“Lamdangsa in, a dawng nawn kei ua,
gen ding thu khat leng a neikei uh.
Thu ging neih louh ziak in ading kinken ua,
a dawn nawnlouh ziak un ken ka ngak diam?
Ken leng ka dawnna ding ka nei hi, ka lungsim
ka ensak sam ding hi.
Thu in ka dim a; ka sung a ka kha in honsawl teitei hi.
Ngai un, ka gilpi pawtkhiakna
neilou uain bang ahi;
khuainulhaite bang in puakzak ding in mansa in a om hi.
Ka halh theihna ding in,
ka pau ding; ka mukte ka hong dia, ka dawng ding hi.
Mihing mihinna zahtaksak
kei un, k’on ngen hi;
kuamah kiang ah leng maitang phatna min ka pe kei ding hi.
Maitang phatna minte piak ding ka thei ngal kei a;
huchilou in zaw kei hon bawlpan a hon lazok ding hi.”
“Akoi abang hileh, Job,
k’on ngen hi, thugen za inla
ka thugen tengteng
ngaikhia in.
Ngai in, tuni, ka kam ka ka a,
ka kam in ka pau hi.
Ka thute’n ka lungtang dikna
a genkhe ding uh;
Ka mukte’n a theih ngei uh
chihtaktak in a gen ding uhi.
Pathian Kha in a honbawl a,
Thilbangkim hihthei hu in
hinna honpia hi.
Na theih leh, hon dawng in;
ka ma ah na thute a kizom in
koih inla na panna ah ding in.
Ngai in, nang bang in Pathian lam ah ka om hi:
keileng tungman a bawl ka hi.
Ngai in, ka lauhuaina in nang a hon lausak kei ding,
ka hahkatna leng na tung ah a gik kei ding hi.
“Chihtaktak in ka zak in na pauta a, huchi in na thute ging ka zata hi.
Ka siang hi, tatlekna bei;
ka hoih a, kei ah thulimlouhna leng a omkei, chi in:
Ngai in, kei demna ding ziak a mu a melma in a hon simta hi;
Ka khete kol a bunsak a, ka
lampite tengteng a chiamteh hi.
“Ngai in, k’on dawng ding,
hiai na diklouhna ah; mihing sang in Pathian a lianzaw hi.
Bangdia amah dou na hia,
Ka thute a bangmah mah lah a dawng kei ding, chi in?
Pathian in lah khatvei a gen a,
ahi, nihvei, mihing in limsak kei mahleh.
Zan a mang ah, mengmuhna ah, mite tung a ihmut kip a kiak lai in,
lupna tung a ihmut laite in;
Huailai in mite bilte a hong a,
vaunate in amau a hihlau a,
Huchi a a thiltup a kipan a
mihing a lakkik a,
mihing a kipan a kisaktheihna a satkhiak theihna ding in;
Aman kawkhuk a kipan a kha
a kep kik sak a,
namsau a kipan a hinna.
A lupna tung ah natna a sawi in leng a om,
a guhte a kinakna om gige toh in:
Huchi in a hinna in tanghou,
a kha in an lim a kih hi.
Asa a tum mang a, huchi in
muhtheih in a omkei;
A kimulou a guhte hong dawkkhia uhi.
Ahi, a kha han kiang ah a hongnai a,
a hinna hihsemite kiang ah.
A kiang a angel, kamlet,
sang khat lak a khat,
mihing kiang a amah adia
dik bang ahia chih
etsakding a om leh;
Huchi a amah ading a chingthei,
Kawkhuk a paisukna a kipan
amah suaktasak un, tatna ka muta,
A sa naupang a sang in
nou zaw hen; a tuailai nite
lam ah kik nawnta hen.
Pathian kiang ah a thum a,
amah ding in deihsak theih in
a om hi; huchi in nuamna
toh a mai a mu a: a diktatna
a kiang ah a pe nawn hi.
Mite ma ah la asa a,
Ka khialta a, a dik ka na
hekkawi a, thuk in ka omkei!
Kawkhuk sung a paisukna a
kipan a kha a tanta hi, a hinna
in vakna a muta ding hi, a chi a.
“Ngai in, hiai thilte tengteng
Pathian in, mihing lak ah hih a, nihvei, ahi thumvei.
Kawkhuk a kipan a kha
pikik ding in, huchi a mihing
vakna ahihvak a a om theihna ding in.
Chiamteh in, Aw Job, ngaikhia in: dai inla, thu ka gen ding.
Gen ding na neih leh,
hon dawng in: Pau in,
siam hon tansak ka ut ngal a.
Na neih kei leh,
kei hon ngaikhia in: dai inla pilna k’on sinsak ding hi.”
Huailou in Elihu in a dawng a, hichi in a chi a:
“Ka thute za un,
nou mipilte; nou theihna neite,
bil hondoh un.
Dangtawng in an a chiam bang in,
bil in thute a enchian hi.
A dik ei ading in i tel ding uh;
i lak ua hoih bang ahia i thei ding uh.
Job in, Ka dik a, Pathian in ka dikna a lamang,
a chi ngal a:
Ka dikna huchi hitamahleh
zuauthei a sim ka hi a;
tatlekna bei himah leng,
ka liamna hihdam theihlouh ahi.
Muhsitna tui bang a dawn bei,
Job bang mihing kua ahia?
Thulimlou nasemmite toh a hon a pai, migiloute toh omkhawm mi.
Aman lah, Pathian lak a ka kipahna ding bangmah
ka lohtak kei, a chi ngal a.
“Huaiziak in, nou theisiammite,
hon ngaikhia un: Pathian in,
gilou bangchi in a hih ngei dia;
Thilbangkim hihthei in thulimlou bangchi in a hih mahmah dia.
Aman lah mihing thilhih amah kiang a pekik ding a,
mi chiteng a lampite kiang a
pekik ding ahi.
Ahi, mawh khuksakna thu ah,
Pathian in gilou tak in a hih kei dia,
Thilbangkim hihthei in leng vaihawmna a hihse sam kei ding hi.
Kuan ahia amah leitung a
heutu hihna pia?
Ahihkeileh khovel pumpi kuan ahia a thu a koih?
Mihing tung a a lungtang nga a,
amah lam a a kha leh a hu lakhawm;
Sa tengteng a mangthang vek ding ua, mihing leivui a suak nawn ding hi.
“Theihsiamna na neih leh, hiai za in:
ka thu aw ngaikhia in.
Mi thudik hua in vai a hawm ding hia?
Dik leh hat amah na mawhpaih ding hia?
Kumpipa kiang a, ‘Na hoih kei’
chih a kilawm hia?
Ahihkeileh miliante kiang a,
Na gilou uh? chih.
Mi lalte mi hinna zahtak lou a,
Genthei sang a mi hausate
limsak zawte kiang a chih
kilawm semlou ding hia?
Amaute lah a khut nasep ahi ngal ua.
Mitphiat kallou in a si ua
zankim lai mahmah in;
mite a ling ua a pai mang ua,
mihing khut hilou in
mihatte lakmang in a om uhi.
A mitte mihing lampite tung ah a om a, a painate a mu hi.
Thulimlou nasemmite bukna ding khomial hiam limliap hiam a omkei hi.
Vaihawmna a Pathian ma a
pai ding in, mihing a ngaihtuah lailai a kiphamoh kei hi.
Lamte theihphak vuallouh in aman mi hatte a hihzan vek a,
a mun uah midang a tungkhia hi.
Huaiziak in a nasepte uh a thei hi;
zan in amau a lumlet a,
hihsiat in a om uhi.
Midang mitmuh mahmah in migiloute bang in amau a gawt hi.
Amah zuihna a kipan a pialkhiak ua,
a lampite a koimah a limsaklouh ziak un:
Huchi in genthei kahna a kiang tung ding in a bawl ua,
gimthuak kahna a za hi.
Amah na pau kei leh,
kuan siamlouh a tangsak dia?
Aman a mai a sel leh,
Amah kuan a mu thei dia?
Namte kiang a hih hiam,
ahihkeileh mihing kiang a hih hiam a kibang hi:
Huchi a Pathian theilou min vai a hawm louh a,
a mite thang a awksak ding a omlouhna ding in.
“Kuapeuh in Pathian kiang ah,
Gawtna ka thuakta,
ka gilou nawn kei ding,
Ka muhlouh nang hon sinsak in, gilou ka hihleh ka hih nawn kei ding, a chi uhia?
A thukna huchi a na nial na deih bang in a om diam?
Kei hilou in, nang na tel ngeingei ding ahi.
Theisiammite’n ka kiang ah,
Ahi, a chi ding uh,
a za mipilteng in.
Job in theihna bei in thu a gen a, a thute pilna bei ahi uh.
Mihaite bang a a dawnna ah,
a tawp chiang in Job tungtang ngaihtuah le uh.
Aman a khelhna ah helna a behlap a,
i lak uah a khut a beng a, Pathian kalh in a thu a pungsakta hi.”
Elihu in a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Hiai na dikna hi in na ngaihtuah hia, ahihkeileh,
kei a mawng ahi,
Pathian mai ah, na chi hia?
Kei a ding in bang phattuamna a om dia?
Khial lou a ka om in bang phattuamna ka nei a? na chih.
Nang leh na kiang a na lawmte k’on dawng ding.
Vante lam en inla, mu in; vante, nang sang a sangzaw, en in.
Na hihkhelh leh, amah dem a bang hih na hia?
Na tatleknate punsak hileh,
amah tung a bang hih na hia?
Diktat hile chin, amah bang na pia a?
Ahihkeileh na khut a kipan bang a mu a?
Na gitlouhna in nang bang in mi a hihna thei a;
na diktatna in mihing tapa a hih hampha thei hi.
“Nuaisiahna tam mahmah ziak in a kikou khia ua;
mi hat ban ziak in panpih deih in a kikou uh.
Kuamah in, Zan chia late honpia, Pathian kei hon
Bawlpa koi a om ahia;
Lei a gamsate sang a hon sinsak tamzaw leh,
van a vasate sang a hon pilsakzaw? a chi kei uh.
Huai ah a kikou ua, himahleh,
migilou kisaktheihna ziak in,
kuamah in dawnna a pe kei uh.
Chihtaktak in Pathian in bangmahlou a za kei dia,
Thilbangkim hihthei in leng a limsak sak kei ding hi.
Nang ngial houh: Amah ka mu kei, a thu ma ah a om,
Amah ka ngak hi, na chih vial.
Himahleh tuin, heh a a veh louh a,
kiotsakna leng a limsaklouh ziak in;
Huaiziak in Job in bangmahlou in a kam a ka ahi;
theihna bei in thu a tamsak ahi.”
Elihu mah in a gen zel a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Hon na thuakzou zek inla,
huan k’on ensak ding;
Pathian sik in lah banghiam khat gen ding ka nei ngal a.
Gamla a kipan ka theihna k’on la ding a,
kei hon Bawlpa tung ah diktatna ka nga ding hi.
Diktakin ka thute zuau ahi kei a:
hoihkim khat ka kiang ah a om hi.
“Ngai in, Pathian in thil a hihthei a, kuamah a musit kei:
theihsiamna hatna ah thil a hihthei hi.
Gilou hinna a hawi kei a:
himahleh gimthuakte kiang ah a dikna uh a pia hi.
Mi diktat a kipan a mit a la kik kei a:
himahleh mangtutphah tung a kumpipa toh amau tangtawn in a koih a,
huchi in hihlet in a om uhi.
Huan sikkhaute a gak a a om ua, gimthuakna guite a lak a a om uleh;
Huchi in a thilhih uh amau a ensak a, a tatlekna uh, huchi a kisatheitak a a na omna uh.
Thuhilhna lam ah a bil uh a honsaka,
thulimlouhna a kipan kik din thu a pia hi.
Amah thu a ngaihkhiak ua,
a na a sep uh leh,
a nite uh hauhsakna in a hihbei ding ua,
a kumte uh kipahna in.
Himahleh a ngaihkhiak kei ua leh,
namsau in a mangthang ding ua, huchi in theihna bei in a si ding uh.
“Himahleh amau lungtang a
Pathian limsaklouhnate’n hehna a khol khawm hi:
amau a henlai in panpih deih in a kikou kei uh.
Tuailai in a si ua,
siangloute lak ah a hinna uh a mangthang hi.
A gimthuakna in gimthuakte a suaktasak a, nuaisiah na ah a bil uh a honsak hi.
Ahi, gakchihna omlouhna,
mun lian lam ah dahna a kipan nang a hon pimang ding a;
na dohkan tung a kilui thauna in a dimta ding hi.
“Himahleh giloute vaihawmna in na dim a: vaihawmna leh diktatna in nang honlen hi.
Thangpaihna a om ziak in,
pilvang in huchilou in zaw na hauhna in nang a hon pimang kha ding hi;
golhgukna tampi in leng nang hon pialsak kei hen.
Dahna a na om louhna ding in,
na hauhsaknate a hun diam,
ahihkeileh na hatna thilhihtheihna tengteng?
Mite tengteng a mun ua
satkhiak a a om zan uah lunggulh ken.
Pilvang in, gilou limsak ken:
gimthuakna sang in hiai lah na telta hi.
Ngai in, Pathian in a thilhihtheihna in sangtak in a hih:
amah bang sinsakmi kua ahia?
Kuan amah a lampi thu a pia a?
Ahihkeileh, Diklouhna na bawlta, kua’n a chi thei dia?
“Mite’n la a sak uh, a thilhih hihlian ding in theigige in.
Huai ah mite tengteng a en ua;
huai mihing in gamlapi ah a mu hi.
Ngai in, Pathian a lian a,
amah i theikei:
a kumte zah zontheih ahi kei.
Tui takte aman a tawikhin a,
huai a tuihu a kipan vuah a zu:
Huai vante’n a sungkhia ua,
mihing tung ah tampi in a tak.
Meipi kiphahte leh a inn vanpi
gingte kua’n a theisiam dia?
Ngai in, a kim ah a khovak a zak a: tuipi nuai a tuam hi.
Hiaite in mite a vaihawmsak a;
an tampi a pia hi.
A khutte in khophia a tawi a;
chiamtehna khoh din thu a pia hi.
Huai husa in a tungtang thu a gen a,
ganhonte’n leng hong kuantou huihpi tungtang thu a thei uh.”
“Hiai ah leng ka lungtang
a ling a,
a mun a kipan suan in a om hi.
A aw ging leh a kam a kipan
a vanging paikhia noute’n ngaikhia un.
Van pumpi nuai ah a sawlkhia a,
a khophia lei tawpnate tan in.
Huaizoh in aw a kikou a;
a lalna aw in vanpi a gingsak a:
a aw zak a a om chiang in amau a len kei hi.
Pathian in a aw in lamdangtak
in vanpi a gingsak a;
i theihtheih louh,
thil thupite a hih zel hi.
Aman lah vuk kiang ah,
Lei ah kia in, a chi ngal a;
huchi mah bang in vuahmal phin kiang ah leng.
Mi chiteng khut a tuambit a;
a bawlsa mite tengteng in
huai a theihtheihna ding un.
Huailai in gamsate a mun uah a lut ua, a kuate uah a om uhi.
Simlam dantan a kipan huihpi a hong a:
mallam a kipan khovot.
Pathian hu in tuikhal piak ahi:
tuite nakna hihhaksat in a om.
Ahi, meipi nawnna a pawsak a;
a khophia meipi a phalhsak hi:
Amah pi in a kivial heihei ua,
ten theihna khovel maikaih a
amaute thu a piak peuhmah a hihna ding un:
Bawlhoihna ding hiam,
a gam ading hiam,
ahihkeileh chitna ding hiam a,
a hon paisakna ah.
“Hiai ngaikhia in, Aw Job:
Ding kinken inla,
Pathian thilhih lamdangte ngaihtuah in.
Amaute tung a Pathian thupiak a koih a, a meipi khophia a tansak dan na thei hia?
Meipite kibuk diknate,
amah theihna hoihkim thilhih
lamdangte na thei hia?
Sim huih ziak a lei a daih sipsip lai a,
na puansilhte a lum dan?
Amah toh van, suntawm limlang bang a khauh na phalh thei hia?
A kiang a ka gen ding uh hon sinsak in;
mialna ziak in ka thugen ding uh ka gelkhol theikei ua.
Thu ka gen ding chih amah
hilh ding a diam?
Ahihkeileh mihing in valh khit a om ut ding a diam?
Huchi in mite’n meipi a om khovak a mu kei ua:
himahleh huih a nung a,
amaute a hihsiang hi.
Mal a kipan in dangkaeng bang a thupi a hongpai a:
Pathian a lalna ah a thupi hi.
Thilbangkim hihthei thu ahihleh,
mu theikei hang:
thilhihtheihna ah a thupi pet mah hi:
Huan vaihawmna leh dikna hauhna ah gim a thuaksak kei ding hi.
Huaiziak in mite’n amah a lau ua: lungtang a pil kuamah a limsak kei hi.”
Huchi in pingpei a kipan in
“ Job a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
Theihna bei thute a thuhilh
hihmial hiai kua ahia?
Kipasal sak in tuin na kawng
gak in; hon dong ding ka hi,
ka kiang a na gen ding ahi.
“Lei kingaknate ka koih lai in nang koi ah na om a?
Phuang in,
theihsiamna nei na hihleh.
A tehnate kua bawl ahia?
Thei na hihleh! A tung a
tehna khau kua zan ahia?
A nuai suangphumte
kua phum ahia?
Huai a ning a suang kua koih ahia?
Zingsang aksite’n la a sak khawm ua,
Pathian tapate tengteng kipak a a kikou lai un?
“Ahihkeileh kuan kongkhakte in tuipite a khak bing a?
Gil a kipan hong pawtkhia bang a,
a hong puahkhiak lai in.
Huai a puansilh meipi leh,
khomial bikbek, huai ading a
tuamna puan ka bawl a,
Huai ading a ka thupiak bawl a,
kalhnate leh kongkhakte koih a,
Hiai tan na hongpai ding,
himahleh a ban hilou in, ka
chih a; hiai lai ah a kiuangsak
na tuikihotte kholsak in a om ding uh, ka chih lai in?
“Na nite a kipat nungsiah
zingsang thu na pia in,
phalvak a mun thei din na bawlta hia;
Lei tawpnate a mat theih a,
huai a kipan a gilou sinkhiak
a hihtheihna ding in?
Chiamtehna nuai a tungman leibang in mel a kikheng a;
puansilh bang in thil tengteng
zenei in ading khia hi:
Gilou a kipan a a khovak uh
lettang sak ahi a,
a ban liksang uh a kitan hi.
“Tuipi nak sung ah na lutta hia?
Ahihkeileh tuithuk tawp ah na paita hia?
Sihna kongpite na kiang ah taklat in a omta hia?
Ahihkeileh sihna limliap kongpite na muta hia?
Lei zatdan na thei siamta hia?
Phuang in, huai na theih leh.
“Khovak tenna zotna lampi koi ah a om a, huan khomial omna mun koisan ahia?
Huchi a gamgi tan a na tonpih theih a, huai a inn tan a lampite na theihna ding in?
Thei mah niteh maw, huailai a piangta hi ding chin a?
Na nite tamdan a thupi mahmah hi!
“Vuk koihkhawmna ah na lut ngei hiam,
ahihkeileh gial koihkawm na muta hia?
Huai buaina hun a ding leh kidou leh kisat ni adia ka koihkholhte?
Bang lampi ah ahia khovak a kikhen hiam leitung a
suahlam huih a dalhzak?
“Kuan ahia tui tampi luanna ding a tuilam khuak a,
kekkia adia lampi sial?
Mihing om louhna mun gam tung a vuah zusak ding in;
mihing om louhna,
gamdai tung ah;
Lei kisia leh segawpsa
lungkimsak ding; loupa hing nou khang khesak ding?
“Vuah in pa a nei hia?
Ahihkeileh daitui takte kua suan ahia?
Kua gil a kipan a tuikhal
hongpai ahia?
Van daituikhal ngou,
kua suahsak ahia?
Suang bang in tuite a tak a,
tuithuk maite a khal hi.
“Siguk khaute na khihkhawm thei hia?
zuheisuktun khaute na phel thei hia?
Amah hunbi ah Aksi lamvak a
chiamtehnate na pikhe thei hia?
Ahihleh Jangkhua leh tate na pi thei hia?
Van thusehte na thei hia?
Huai lalna lei ah na ding khesak thei diam?
“Nang tui tampi in a khuh theihna ding in meipi kiang ah aw na suah thei diam?
A pai theihna ding un khophiate na sawl khe thei hia?
Sunggil lam ah pilna kuan a koih a?
Ahihkeileh lungsim kiang ah kuan theihsiamna a pia a?
Pilna in kua’n meipite a sim thei dia?
Van tuithawlte kuan a bawkhe thei dia?
A lompi a leivui a luan a,
a sakte a kimat khawm ngiungeu lai un?
“Humpinelkai ading in samat na betsak ding hia?
Ahihkeileh humpinelkai noute gilkial na hihdam ding hia?
A kua ua a boh ua,
buk ding a a bukna mun ua a om nilouh lai un?
Va-ak ading a an kuan a pia a?
A noute Pathian kiang a kikou a
An duh man a a vakvak lai un?”
“Suangpi a gam sathakte’n
nou a suahsak hun uh na thei hia?
Ahihkeileh nou a neih lai uh na chiamteh thei hia?
A kha chinsak zah uh na thei hia?
Ahihkeileh a pian hun na thei hia?
