A kun ua, a tate uh a suang uh,
a lungkhamnate uh a paikhia uhi.
A tate uh deihhuai tak in a om ua,
gamlak ah a khang lian ua;
a kuan khia ua,
a hong kiknawn kei uh.
“Kua’n gam sabiltung a khah khia a?
Ahihkeileh kuan gam
sabiltunghonte a phel a?
Loupa gam a inn ka bawl a,
huan chi gam a tenna mun in;
Khopi buai nuanua a musit a,
Hawltute kikounate a za kei hi.
Mual dungte a gantatna mun ahi a,
huan thilhing chiteng a zong hi.
“Na nna sem ding in gam
bawngtal a lungkim diam?
Ahihkeileh na anpiakna
kiang ah a om gige diam?
Leilehna ah khau in gam
bawngtal na khih thei diam?
Ahihkeileh nanung ah guamte a toktam diam?
A hatna a thupi ziak in,
amah na muang diam?
Ahihkeileh a kiang ah na sepgimna na khiak diam?
Na buhchi inn a hontut a,
na buhphual a buh a kaihkhawm theihna ding in
amah na muang diam?
“Ostrik kha kisathei tak in
a kizap a; a khavengte leh
a multe a migi hia?
A tuite lah leitung ah a nusia a,
leivui ah a lumsak a,
Khe in a sikkham thei chih a
mangngilh a, ahihkeileh
gamsa in a sikgawp thei chih.
Amah a hilou bang in,
a noute siatna ding in a khauh a:
a sep gimna bangmahlou
himahleh, a lau kei hi:
Pathian in pilna a ngawlhsak
ziak in, theihsiamna leng a pe sam kei hi.
Tungsang lam a a ki tawisang
chiang in, sakol leh
a tungtuangmi a nuihsan.
“Sakol a hatna na piak hia?
Mul nem in a ngawng na tuam hia?
Khaukhup bang in na tawmsak hia?
A hamna thupi a lauhuai ve.
Guam ah lei a tuan a,
a hatna ah a kipak a, mi
kigalvante tuak ding in a paikhia.
Lauhuai a nuihsana,
a lungdong kei a, namsau leng a nungngat sam kei hi.
Amah ah thalbawm a ging lengleng a,
teipi te zelzel leh chiangzum.
Kihtakhuaina leh hehna in
lei a nawmvalh a;
Pengkul aw ahi chih leng a um sam kei hi.
Pengkul a gin teng in, Hah;
a chi a, kidouna, heutute vanpiging leh kikou,
gamlapi apan a thei.
“Na pilna in mu sangpi a lengsak in, a khate simlam ah a phalh hia?
Nang thupiak in muvanlai a tunglen in tungsang ah a bu a sep hia?
Suangpi tung ah a teng a,
huai ah giahna a nei a,
suanghengte leh kulh muanhuaite ah.
Huai a kipan in matding a mu a;
a mitte’n gamla a mu hi.
A noute’n leng sisan a tawpbei ua:
thah a omna mun,
huai ah a om hi.”
Huailou in
a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Kuapeuh awlmoh neilou in thil bangkim hihthei a kiselpih diam?
Kuapeuh Pathian kiselpih,
huai tuh amah dawngsak un.”
Job in
hichi in a chi hi:
“Ngai in, Bangmah ka hi kei a;
bangchi’n k’on dawng dia?
Ka kam ah ka khut ka koih.
Khatvei ka pauta a,
ka dawng kei ding;
ahi, nihvei himahleh ka pau nawn kei ding.”
Toupa’n pingpei a kipan in
Job a dawng a, hichi in a chi hi:
“Kipasal sak in tuin na kawng gak in:
nang a kipan ka honphut dia, kei kiang ah na honphuang ding hi.
Ka vaihawmna bangmahlou a koih ding na hiam?
Siam na tan theihna dia,
kei hon mawhpaih ding na hi hia?
Ahihkeileh Pathian bang in ban na nei hia?
Amah bang in aw in vanpi na gingsak thei hia?
“Tuin nang hoihkim leh
zahna in kizem in;
zahna leh lalna in kivan in.
Na hehna dimlette sungkhia in;
michih kisatheite en inla,
hihniam in.
Michih kisathei en inla,
kainiam in; a dinna uah migiloute tuanchil in.
Leivui ah amaute selkhawm in;
mun dai ah a mai uh kan in.
Huchi in na khut taklam in nang a hondam thei chih ka honthei ding.
“Nang k’on siam bang a ka siam,
tuin en in chingpi;
bawngtal bang in loupa a ne.
En in tuin, a hatna a kawng ah a om a, a gilpi thate ah a hatna a om hi.
Sidar sing bang in a mei a tangsak a: a pheite thaguite
phankhawm in a om hi.
A guhte dal lawng ahi a, a guh leh tangte sik tawn bang ahi.
“Pathian lampite a pipen ahi:
amah bawlpa kia in a namsau amah kiang lam naih ding in a bawl thei ding.
Chihtaktak in mualte’n amah an a puak ua; gamsate tengteng mawlna mun ah.
Singlimte nuai ah a lum a,
pumpeng mun dai leh gam nawng ah.
Tui lili singte’n a lim un a khuh ua; luigei singnah kaite’n a tuam kimvel uhi.
Ngai in, lui a dimlet leh,
a ling kei: a kam chiang pha hial in Jordan khang mahleh, a muang hi.
A kiven lai in kuapeuh in amah sikkawi in a man diam,
thang in a nak a vut pailet diam?”
“Ngakuai in
Ole na kai khe thei diam?
Ahihkeileh a khau in a lei na sawntum thei diam?
A nak sung ah khauhual na thun thei diam?
Ahihkeileh sikkawi in a haizek na vut pailet thei diam?
Na kiang ah thil nget tampi a bawl diam?
Ahihkeileh na kiang ah thu nemte a gen diam?
Tangtawn a ding in amah sikha dia na lak theihna ding in,
nang toh thukhun a bawl diam?
Vasa toh bang in amah toh
na mawl diam?
Ahihkeileh na sikhanute
ading in amah na hen diam?
Ngamanmite’n amah sumsinna
ding in a bawl ding uam?
Sumsinmite lak ah amah a zuak ding uam?
Siklen in a vun na dimsak
thei diam,
ahihkeileh a lu ngalingte in?
A tung ah na khut koih in;
kidouna theigige in, huchi in na hih nawn kei ding hi.
Ngai in, amah lametna
bangmahlou ahi: amah muh
mahmah in mi paihkhiak in a omkei dia hia?
Amah hihhalh ngam khop ding
in kuamah a hang kei:
ka ma ading kua ahia leh?
Amah ka dit ding, ka kiang
ah kuan a pe masa a leh?
Van nuai a om peuhmah kei a ahi.
“A guhlehtang thu ah ka dai kei ding, a hatna mahmah leh,
a pum kilawmna ah leng.
A puansilh tungnung kuan a suahsak thei dia?
A kamkaih thuah nih sung ah kua hongpai dia?
A mai kongkhakte kuan
a hong thei dia?
A ha kimvel ah lauhuaina a om.
A lip hattakte a kisaktheihna ahi,
Namkipsa bang in khakkhum ahi.
A kal ua huihzam a lut theihlouhna ding in,
khat in a dang a naih mahmah.
Khat leh a dang a kizom ua,
a kisoumat ua,
khentheihlouh in a om uh.
A hahchhiaute’n a vaksak a,
a mitte zingsang mitvunte bang ahi.
A kam apan meikuangte a pawtkhia,
meiekte a tawm khia hi.
A nakvangte a kipan in
meikhu a pawt a, halsiangna
bel leh chiklak loupa kang
a kipan bang in.
A hu in suang a kuangsak a,
a kam apan meikuang a pawtkhia hi.
A ngawng ah hatna a om gige a,
a ma ah lauhuaina a lam hi.
Asa thate a kizom khawm ua:
a tung ah a kip ua;
hihtat theih in a omkei uh.
A lungtang suang bang in a
kip a; ahi, buhgawina suang
nuainung bang ahi.
Amah a thoh chiang in,
mihatte a lau uh:
lauluatna ziak in omdan ding
a theikei uh.
Min amah namsau in sat leh,
a phatuam kei hi; teipi leng,
thal leng, sikmuk zum leng.
Buhpawl bang in sik a sim a,
sing muatsa bang in dal.
Thal in amah a taisak theikei ding:
amah lak ah vaisuanglot suangte buhpawl a suak hi.
Khetbukte buhpawl bang a sim ahi: Teipi ging a nuihsan hi.
A nuai lampangte belpei ahi:
buannawi tung ah buh khetna chiang bang in a kiphah.
Tuithuk belsou di’n a bawl a:
tuipi nuhtheih bawm in a bawl hi.
A nung ah lampi a vaksak a;
tuithuk samkang nei a sa uhi.
Leitung ah amah bang a lau neilou omkei a,
Thil sang chiteng a en a:
kisathei tapate tengteng tung ah kumpipa ahi.”
Job in
“Thil bangkim na hihthei chih leh nang thiltup kham theih ahi kei chih ka thei hi.
Hiai thuhilhna theihna tellou a sel kua ahia?
Huaiziak in ka theihsiamlouh,
ka theihlouh, kei adia thillamdang luate ka genkhia hi.
Za in, k’on ngen hi, ka pau ding;
nang k’on phut ding, kei lam ah nang phuang in, n’on chi hi.
Ka bil zakna in nang k’on za a;
himahleh tuin ka mit in k’on mu a,
Huaiziak in ka kikih a, leivui leh meivu ah ka kisik hi.”
Huan hichi ahi a, huchi a

Huaiziak in tuin, bawngtal sagih leh belamtal sagih la unla ka sikha Job kiang ah hoh unla, nou ading in haltum thillat lan un; huchi in ka sikha Job nou ading in a thum ding a; amah vang in ka sang dia, huchi in na haina uh dungzui in na tung uah ka hih kei ding; ka sikha Job bang in lah ka tanchin thildik na gen kei uhi, chi in.
Huchi in Eliphaz, Teman mi leh Bildad, Suah mi leh Zophar, Naamathmi a kuanta ua,
Job a lawmte adia a thumzoh in
Huailai in a kiang ah, a unaute tengteng leh, a sanggamnute tengteng leh, tuma lam in a meltheih hisa tengteng leh, a insung a tanghou amah toh nete a hongpai ua: amah a nem ua, a tung a
Huchi in
Tapa sagih leh tanu thum leng a nei hi.
A masapen, Jemima a chi a; a nihna min, Kezia; a thumna min, Keren happuk.
Huchi in gamsung pumpi ah Job tanute bang a melhoih a omkei uhi: a pa un a unaute lak ah goutan amau a pia hi.
Huai nung in Job bel kum za leh sawmli a dam a, a tapate, leh a tapate’ tapate, khang lina tan a mu hi.
Huchi in, Job a tek mahmah a, a Upat tak ziak in a sita hi.
Pathian limsakloute hoihsak
bang a om ngeilou a,
mikhialte lampi a leng ding lou a,
musitte tutphah a leng tu ngeilou mi a hampha hi;
A kipahna uh
ahizaw a;
a danthu sun leh zan in a ngaihtuah ngitnget hi;
Amah zaw tui luang kiang a
sing suan, a hun a gahzel,
a nah leng kau ngeilou
bang ahi; a thilhih peuhmah
a lamzang zel ding hi.
Pathian limsakloute huchibang ahi kei ua;
buhsi huih in a mut lengmang bang ahizaw uhi;
Huaiziak in mi Pathian
limsakloute zaw vaihawmna
ma ah a ding theikei ding uh,
mikhialte leng mi diktatte
kikhopna ah ading thei sam
kei ding uhi;
a thei naknak ngal a; mikhialte lampi bel a mangthang ding hi.
Bang achia namchih heh uh ahia,
bang achia michih in thil
phatuamlou ngaihtuah uh ahia?
Leitung a kumpipate a kisa
duamduam ua, heutute’n
leng
A gaknate uh hihtat in,
a khauhualte uh ei a kipan i
paimang ding uh, chi in.
Van a tupa a nui dia:
amau a nuihsan ding;
Huaikhit chiang in heh in
a kiang uah thu a gen ding a,
thangpai tak in amau
a hih mangbangta ding hi:
Keimahmah in ka tang
siangthou Zion ah ka
kumpipa ka tusak hi, a chi hi.
Thusehsa ka gen ding hi:
tuni in ka hon neikhia ahi;
Honngen in, huchi in na
gouluah ding in namchih k’on pedia,
kawlmong tawp tan in na gou ding in leng k’on pe ding hi;
Amaute sik chiang in na
hihkham dia; belvelte’n bel a paih khap bang un na pai kham ding a, A chi hi.
Huchi in kumpipate aw,
pilta unla:
leitung a vaihawmte aw,
thuzoh in omta un;
Laudan siam in
nna sem unla,
ling kawm in kipak un;
Tapa tawp unla, huchi kei leh
a heh dia, lam lak ah na
mangthang kha ding uh,
a thangpai zok ding hi.
Amah a ginna koih tengteng
a hampha uhi.
hina mahmah u e!
Kei honsualte tampi ahi uhi;
Amah ading in Pathian ah
panpihna himhim a omkei, chi a,
ka hinna tungtang thugente
tampi a om uhi.
Himahleh,
thupina leh ka kim ka vel in
ka phaw na hi a;
ka lu dom kangpa na hi;
Ka aw in
a tang siangthou a kipan in
a hon dawng zel hi.
Kei ka lum ka na ihmuta a;
ka khanglou nawn a;
Hondou a, hon um suakte,

vangtahnate a then masiah.

ding: Pathian kei dia bangkim hon hihsakpa.
Hon valhkhit tumpan a hon gensiat hun chiang in aman van a kipan in a honsawl ding a,
a hon hondam ding hi;
Pathian in a chitna leh a thutak a honsawl khe ding.
Ka hinna humpinelkai lak ah a om a;
mi mei a kang lak ah ka lum a, mihing tate lak ah;
huaite ha tei leh thal ahi a,
a lei uh namsau hiam tak ahi.
Pathian aw, nang van khen pek ah pahtawi in hongom in!
Na thupina leitung tengteng tung ah hongom hen!
Ka khe awkna ding in len a
phah ua; ka hinna a kun kheikhei a:
ka ma ah kawkhuk a tou ua;
amau mah a laitak ah a kia uhi.
Ka lungtang a kip ahi,
Pathian aw, ka lungtang a kip ahi:
la ka sa ding a, ahi,
phatna la ka sa ding hi.
Ka thupina, halh in; pekging leh kaihgingte aw,
halh un:
kei zingkhang in ka halh ding hi.
namchih lak ah nangmah phat in la ka sa ding hi.
Na chitna vansun in a thupi a, na thutak vandum sun in a thupi ahi.
Pathian aw, nang van khen pek
ah pahtawi in omta in;
na thupina leitung tengteng ah hong omta hen.
Diktatna thu daidide in maw na gen taktak uh!
Mihing tate aw, diktak in maw vai na hawm uh!
Ahi, na lungtang uah thil
thulimlou na hih nak ua;
leitung ah na khut ua thil ngongtatna na buk khia uhi.
Migilou saloute a nu uh gilsung a kipan in Pathian apan khen in a om ua:
a piantak un zuau thugen in a vakmang zel uhi.
A gu uh gul gu bang ahi a:
thangtom bengngong
a bil hum bang ahi uhi.
Huai in gul aitawi aw a ngaikhe kei a,
bangchibang a siam in bum mahle uh.
Pathian aw,
a kam uah hate tansak inla:
humpinelkai hatsanlaite ha lianpipite tong khia in.
Amau tui hattak a luang bang in tuimang uhenla:
a thalte a a ngim in,
sat tan bang in om zel hen.
Dokdawn, tui a mang maimah
zel bang hileh:
a hunlou a numei nau neih,
ni mel mu lou bang hi hen aw.
Na belte un ling satna a theihma un leng aman pingpei in a lamang ding.
A hinglai leh a kuanglai leng.
Mi diktat in phulakna a muh in a kipak ding a:
migilou salou sisan ah a khe a sil ding hi.
Huchi in mite’n,
mi diktat ading in kipahman a omtaktak a:
lei ah vaihawmpa Pathian a om taktak hi,
a chi ding uhi.
Ka Pathian aw, hondoute apan
hon humbit inla;
honsualte apan kipan mun sang ah honsuan in.
Thil hihkhialte apan hon humbit inla,
sisan suah hatte apan hon hondam in.
hilou in, ka khelh ziak leng hilou in, ngai in,
ka hinna a tang gige hi,
mi hatte honsual ding in a kikhawm uhi.
Ka khelh louh pi in leng honsual ding in a kisa ua:
hon panpih ding in kihihhalh inla, en in.
Israelte Pathian, nangmah ngei namchih gawt ding in thou inla:
milepchiah giloutakte peuhmah hawi ken.
Nitaklam in a hong nawn ua,
ui bang in a ham vengvung ua, khopi a kimvel ah a pai uhi.
Ngai in a kam un a sa-ik khia ua;
a muk uah namsaute a om a:
kua a thei a om a!
A chi maimah uhi.
Himahleh,
namchih na nuihsan ding hi.
Ka hatna aw, k’on ngak nilouh a,
Pathian ka insang ahi ngal a.
Ka tung a migi Pathian in a hondon ding a:
Pathian in ka melmate tung ah ka thudeih a hon musak ding hi.
Amau that kenla, huchilou in zaw ka mite’n a mangngilh kha ding ua:
Na thilhihtheihna in hihdalh inla, hihniam in.
A kam khelhna ziak un leh a muk ua thupawt ziak in a kisaktheihna ngei uah awk uhenla a thugen zel uh hamse lohna leh zuauthu ziak in leng.
Amaute thangpai in hih mangthang inla,
a om nawn louhna ding un hih mangthang inla,
Pathian in Jakobte lak ah vai a hawm chih theichiat uhen,
kawlmong pha in.
Huan, nitaklam in hong uhenla,
ui bang in ham vengvung uhenla,
khopi a kimvel ah pai uhen.
Amau nekding zong in a vakvak ding ua, a tai kei uleh a om zanhak ding uhi.
Himahleh ken na hatna thu
la in ka sa ding a; ahi,
zingsang in na chitna thu nuamtak in la in ka sa ding hi:
nang ka insang, ka mangbatni a ka kihumbitna na hi ngal a.
Ka hatna aw, nang phat in la ka sa ding a;
Pathian ka insang, ka tung a siam Pathian ahi ngal a.
Pathian aw, nang n’on khahkhia
a, n’on hihsia a; n’ong hehta a;
hon tungding nawn in aw.
Hiai gam na hih ling a,
na khangsakta hi: a khangkhamte siam hoih nawn inla;
a ling a ling ngal a.
Na mite thil haksa pipi na tuak
sak a: hoina uain n’on dawnsak hi.
Nang laudansiamte kiang ah puanzak na peta a,
thutak ziak a zak a hihtheihna ding in.
Na deihtakte humbit a a om
theihna ding un,
na khut taklam in hondam inla,
hon dawng in.
Pathian in a siangthouna ah
hichibang in a gen,
Ka nuam ding a: Sekem khua ka hawm ding a,
Sukkoth guam ka hawmzak ding hi.
Gilead gam kei a ahi a,
Manasseh gam kei a ahi a;
Ephraim gam leng ka lu humbitna ahi a;
Judah gam ka lalchiang ahi.
Moab gam ka kisilna bel ahi;
Edom gam ah khedap ka pai ding:
Philistia gam, nang zaw keimah ziak in kikou tanla, chi in.
Khopi kiptak ah kuan a hon pilut dia!
Edom gam ah kuan a honpi ding!
Pathian aw, nangmah mah in n’on deihlouh ka hi kei ua hia?
Pathian aw, ka sepaihte kiang uah lah na pawt ngal takei a.
Melmate sual ding in hon
panpih in, mihing panpihna
bangmahlou maimai ahi ngal a.
Pathian ziak in hangsantak in ka hih ding:
amah tuh i melmate sikden dingpa ahi ngal a.
Pathian aw, ka kikou husa
na za inla; ka thumna ngaikhia in.
Ka lungtang a bah lai in
kawlmong a kipan k’on sam ahi:
Suangpi kei sang a sangzaw ah honpi in.
Nang kei ading in humbitna melmate lak ah galven insang kiptak na hi ngal a.
Na puanin ah tangtawn in ka om ding a:
na kha nuai bukna mun ah ka muang ding hi.
Pathian aw, nang ka thuchiamte na ngaikhia a:
na min laudansiamte gamluah tuh n’on pia hi.
Kumpipa damsung hihsau in:
a kumte suan tampi bang ahi ding.
Pathian ma ah tangtawn in a om gige ding:
aw, amah a humbit theihna leh thutak bawl in.
Huchi in ka thuchiamte niteng a ka hih theihna ding in,
tangtawn in na min phat in la ka sa ding hi.
Ka hinna in Pathian kia a ngak a,
amah a kipan in ka hotdamna
a hongpawt ding ahi.
Amah kia ka suangpi leh
Hon hondampa ahi. Ka insang ahi a,
nakpitak in ka ling kei ding hi.
Nou tengteng in, mi khat that ding a,
bang awn leh gawl puk dekdek bang in bang tan ahia na sual ding uh?
A thupina a kipan a sawnkhe
ding lel in a kihou ua;
zuaugen a kipah lamtak uh ahi a: a kam un a vualzawl ua,
himahleh a lungsim un hamsia a loh zel ngal uhi.
Ka hinna, Pathian kia ngak in;
ka lametna amah kiang a kipan a pawt ahi ngal a.
Amah kia ka suangpi leh ka hotdamna ahi:
ka insang ahi a;
ka ling kei ding.
Pathian kiang ah ka hotdamna leh ka thupina a om a:
ka hatna suangpi leh ka kihumbitna Pathian ah a om hi.
Nou mipite aw, chiklaipeuh in leng amah muang unla,
na lungtang uh a ma ah sungbua un:
Pathian ei ading in kihumbitna ahi.
Mi nam niamte bangmahlou
lel ahi ua, mi nam liante leng
zuau lel ahi uhi:
bukna ah a paitou ding ua;
maimai sang in a zang zaw uhi.
Nuaisiahna muang kei unla;
mi hiamgam hat suan in neisam kei unla:
hauhnate a hong khan leh a tung ah na lungtang uh nga kei un.
Pathian in khatvei a gen a;
hiai nihvei tak ka zata hi;
thilhihtheihna Pathian a ahi chih.
michih a thilhih bangbang un na thuk ngal zel hi.
Pathian aw, nang ka Pathian
na hi a; phalvak in k’on zong hi:
ka hinna nangmah duh in
a dangtak a, ka sa in
a honngai ahi, gamkeu leh
guam tui omlouhna ah.
Huchi mah bang in
Mun Siangthou ah k’on en gige hi,
na thilhihtheihna leh na thupina mu ding in.
Na chitna ka hinna sang a a hoihzawk ziak in ka muk in a honphat ding hi.
Huchi mah bang in ka damsung teng in k’onphat ding a:
na min in ka khutte ka zak ding hi.
Ka hinna guhngek leh thau a a tai bang in a tai ding a;
ka kam in kipahna mukpu in a honphat ding hi.
Ka lupna tung a k’on theihgige lai in,
zan a na tungtang thu ka lunggel lai in.
Nang hon panpihpa na hi a,
na kha nuai ah nuam in la ka sa ding hi.
Ka hinna in honzui tettet a, na
khut taklam in n’on kai zel hi.
Ka hinna hihmang tum a zongte leimun nuainung ah a lut ding ua.
Namsau thilhihtheihna in a
puk ding ua:
sehalte tan a hi ding uhi.
Kumpipa bel Pathian ah a nuam ding a:
amah lou a kichiam peuhmah in a suang ding ua,
zuauhat kamte hum a om ding a hih ziak in.
Pathian aw, ka mangbat
thu ah ka aw na za inla:
melmate lauhhuaina lak ah ka hinna humbit in.
Thil hoihlou hihte kihou gukna lak ah honsel in;
thil hihkhialte buaina lak ah.
Amau namsau bang in a lei uh a tat hiam ua,
a thu khate ngei uh thalte bang a kap ding in a ngim ua.
Mi gensiatbeite mun dai a a kap theihna ding un:
lau lou in khatvei thu in a kap guih ngal uhi.
Thil gilou hih ding in a ki thuhilh ua;
thang a guk a kam thu bang ah a kihou zel ua:
kuan huaite a mu dia? a chi ua.
Thulimlouhna a zongkhia ua;
Hahkat tak in i zongta, a chi ua:
a sunglam ngaihtuahna leh lungtang uh thuk tak ahi ngal a.
Himahleh Pathian in amau a kap ding a:
Thakhat in thal a liam in a om ding uhi.
Huchibang in, amau lei ngei in amau a dou ziak in, kisui in
a om ding uhi:
amau mute’n a lu uh a sing uhi.
Huchi in, mi tengteng in
a lau ding ua: Pathian nasep a gen ding uhi,
a thilhih piltak in a ngaihtuah ding uhi.
Mi diktatte
lungtang diktat pu tengteng in a suang ding uhi.
Pathian aw, Zion ah phatna in hon ngak nilouh hi:
thuchiam na kiang ah tangtung sak in.
Thumna zapa aw, na kiang ah sa tengteng a hongpai ding hi.
Thulimlouhnate’n honzoh
chiang in,

Mi, na biakin huangsung intual a om thei ding a na tel a,
na kiang na naihsak in nuam
a sa hi: na inn hoihna in ka tai ding ua, na biakin
Mun Siangthou hoihna in.
Pathian hon hondampa aw,
diktatna mulkimhuai thilhihte
in n’on dawng ding hi;
nang kawlmong a mi tengteng
leh tuipi tung a gamlapi a
omte lametna na hi a.
Thilhihtheihna a tai a kigak a,
nangmah hatna a mualte hihkippa na hi hi.
Tuipi thomging, a kihot gingte leh michih chiak vengvung hihdaipa na hi.
Kawlmong tawp a omte’n leng na theihsaknate a lau ua:
zingsang leh nitak paikhiaknate nuam in na kikou sak hi.
Lei na veh a, tui in na khai a,
nakpi petmah in na hih hoih hi;
Pathian lui tui in a dim a:
lei huchibang a na bawl nung in amau ding in buh na bawlsak hi.
Leilehte tui tampi in na vak a;
a saichian na khengsak hi:
vuahtui in na nemsak a.
A thilpoute na vualzawl zel.
Kum na hoihna na khusak a;
na paina lam thil hoih in a tak hi.
Gamdai a gantatna munte ah a tak a, tangte leng nuamna gak suak in a om hi.
Gan tatna munte ganhon in a luahsuak a;

Leitung luah tengteng aw,
Pathian pahtawi in
nuam in kikou unla.
A min thupidan la in sa unla:
a phatna hihthupi un.

mulkimhuai na e!
Na thilhihtheihna thupidan thu ah nangmah melmate na kiang ah a kipe lut ding uhi.
Leitung luah tengteng in a hon be ding ua,
nangmah phat in la a sa ding uh, chi un,
Kisa un, Pathian thilhihte en un;

Aman tuipi leigaw a suaksak a;

huai ah amah ah i kipak uhi.
A thilhihtheihna in tangtawn in
vai a hawm hi;
a mit in namchih a en hi:
helhatte kipahtawi kei uhen.
Mi chihte aw,

Aman i hinna uh a hihhing gige a,
I khete kisuan a phal kei hi.
Pathian aw, nang n’on enchian a;

Nang len ah n’on pilut a;
ka kawng uah puakgik gik tak n’on koih hi.
Mihingte, kangtalai tung a tuang in,
ka lu tung uah na paisak a;

Halmang a thillatte toh na
inn ah ka lut ding a,

Ka muk in a gen a, mangbang a ka omlai a kam in a gente mah.

Buannawi thukpi,

nang ka haidan na thei hi;

thuak ziak in, zumnan ka mai

Himahleh,

humbit inla,

na chitna a hoih ngal a;

ka zahlaknate,

nakpitak in ka lungkham
behlap hi: huchi in hon
hehpih ding ka zong a,

a omlai un pial suak hen.
A mitte uh, a muh theihlouhna ding un, hihmial in om hen;
a kongte uh kivuang sak gige in.
Na lungkimlouh mahmahna a tung uah sungbua inla,
na heh thangpaihna in amau man hen.
A omna uh gam henla;
a puanin uah kuamah omkei hen.
Na satpa a sawi ua,
na sukliamte lungkhamna leng a gen ngal nak uhi.
A thulimlouhna uah thulimlouhna behlap inla;
amau na diktatna ah lut kei uhen.
A min uh hinna bu apan nulmang in om uhen,
midiktat lak ah gelh hi kei uhen.
Himahleh kei genthei tak leh
lungkham tak ka hi a:
Pathian aw, na hotdamna in mun sang ah honkoih in.
Pathian min la in ka phat ding a, kipahthu gen in
amah ka pahtawi ding hi.
Huchibang in bawngtal hiam,
ki leh chinnei bawngpa hiam,
sang in
Thunuailutte’n huai mu in a kipak uhi:
nou Pathian zongte aw,
na lungtang uh hing in om hen.
a hentate tuh a musit ngal kei hi.
Lei leh van in amah phat hen,
tuipite leh a sung ua thil tang thei peuhmahte toh.
Pathian in Zion honkhia in,
Judah khuate a siam dek ngal a:
huchi in huai ah a om ding ua,
neih toh a thuah ding uh.
A sikhate suante’n gou a luah ding ua; a min itte a sung ah a om ding uhi.
Pathian aw,
hon humbit ding in kin inla;
Toupa aw,
hon panpih ding in kin meng in.
Ka hinna hihmang tum a zongte
zahlak in zum uhen,
ka siatna zong a kipakte.
Ku! Ku! Chite a zahlak ziak un
taikek sak in om uhen.
A honzong tengteng nangmah ah nuamtak leh kipaktak in
om uhenla;
na hotdamna itte’n,
Pathian pahtawi in om hen,
chi gige uhen.
Himahleh kei zaw genthei leh
tagah tak ka hi a; Pathian aw,
ka kiang ah hongpai meng in:
nang hon panpihpa leh hon humbitpa na hi a;
sawt hal mahmah ken.
ka ginna ka koih zel hi;
chikmah chiang in zahlak in hon omsak ken.
Na diktatna vang in hon humbit in, hon honkhia inla:
kei lam ah na bil hondoh in,
hon hondam in.
Kei ading in omna suangpi,
ka hohtheih gige na, honghi in:
nang hon hondam ding in thu na pia a;
ka suangpi leh ka kulhpi na hi ngal a.
Ka Pathian aw, migilou salou khut a kipan hon honkhia in,
mi diktatlou leh nunsia khut a kipan.
nang ka lamet na hi: ka naupan
chik a kipan k’on muan na hi.
Ka nu gil a kipan in nangmah
na honlen zel a:
ka nu sung a kipan hon lakhepa na hi:
ahi nangmah ka honphat gige ding.
Mitampi theih in thillamdang
ka hi a; himahleh ka kihumbitna kiptak na hi.
Ka kam nang phatna in a dim ding a, nitum in nang pahtawina in a dim ding hi.
Ka tek chiang in hon nial kenla,
ka bah chiang in hon paisan ken.
Ka melmate’n ka tungthu a gen ua;
ka hinna tangte leng a kikou uhi.
Pathian in a paisanta: delh unla,
man un; humbitpa ding himhim a om ngal kei a chi in.
Pathian aw, hon gamlat mahmah ken: ka Pathian aw,
hon panpih ding in kin in.
Ka hinna tung a melmate zahlak leh mangthang in om uhenla;
ka siatna zongte gensiatna leh zumna a khuh in om uhen.
Himahleh ken zaw ka lamen gige ding a,
k’on phat semsem ding hi.
Ka kam in na diktatna thu a gen ding a, nitum in na
hotdamna thu a gen ding a:
a tamdan ka thei ngal kei a.
a diktatna, nangmah diktatna thu kia ka gen ding hi.
Pathian aw, ka naupan chik a kipan nang n’on hilh a;
tu tan in na thillamdang hihte ka theisak gige hi.
Ahi, Pathian aw,
ka tek a ka sam a kan hun in
hon paisan mahmah ken;
na hatna hiai khangte kiang leh,
na thilhihtheihna khang hong omlai dingte kiang a ka theihsak mateng.
Pathian aw, na diktatna leng a sang mahmah ahi;
Pathian aw,
nang thil thupitakte hihpa,
nangmah bang kua a om?
Nang, buaina tampi leh thupitak hon musakpa’n n’on hingsak nawn dia,
lei thukpi a kipan n’on pikhe nawn ding hi.
Nang ka thupina honhih pungsak inla,
hong kihei nawn inla,
hon khamuan in.
Pekging in k’on phat ding a,
ka Pathian aw, na thutak ka phat ding hi,
Nang Israelte Mi Siangthou aw,
kaihging toh nang phat in la ka sa ding.
Nangmah phat a la ka sak
chiang in ka muk a nuam mahmah ding a;
na tatsa ka hinna mah leng nuam a sa mahmah ding hi.
Ka lei in leng nitum in na diktatna thu a gen ding;
ka siatna ding zongte a zahlak un a zumta uhi.
Pathian aw, na vaihawmnate kumpipa
kiang ah pia inla,
na diktatna kumpipa tapa
kiang ah pia in.
Na mite dikna in vai a hawmsak ding a, na mi
gentheite vaihawmna dik in vai a hawmsak ding hi.
Tanglian leh tangneute’n
diktatna in mite kiang ah
khamuanna a hontun ding uhi.
Aman mi lak a gentheite vai a hawmsak ding a,
tagah tate a hondam ding a,
nuaisiahtu bel a hihzan ding hi.
Tung a ni leh kha om sungteng,
suan omsung teng in leng a kikou ding uhi.
Amah loupa gawitan tung a vuah kia bang in a ke ding a;
lei vak vuah tui bang mai in.
A damlai un mi diktat a hampha ding uh,
khapi om nawnlouh dong in khamuanna thupi toh a khang ding uhi.
Aman tuipi apan a tuipi dang pha in,
luipi apan kawlmong pha in thu a nei ding.
Gamdai a omte a ma ah a kun ding ua: a melmate’n leng leivui a liak ding uhi.
Tarsish gam leh tuikulh gam
Kumpipate’n kipahman a hontawi ding ua;
Sheba leh Sheba gam
Kumpipate’n thilpiakte a honlan ding uhi.
Ahi, kumpipa tengteng a ma ah a khupboh ding ua:
namchih teng in a na a sem ding uhi.
Genthei in a sap chiang in aman a humbit ding a, mi tagah,
panpihpa neilou leng a humbit ding hi.
Mi genthei leh tagahte a hehpih ding a, tagahte hinna a hondam ding hi.
A hinna uh nuaisiahna leh hiamgamna lak a kipan a tan ding a,
a sisan uh amah ngaihdan in manpha tak a hi ding hi.
Huan, a hing ding ua;
Sheba gam dangkaeng a kipan a piak ahi ding a:
mite’n amah a thumsak gige ding uhi;
nitum in a vualzawl ding uhi.
Lei ah, mualvum peuh ah,
buh tampi a om ding a;
a vui Lebanon bang in a ling suausuau ding a,
khua a mite bel loupa bang in a pha lihliah ding uhi.
A min tangtawn in a om den ding a;
a min ni a om sung in tatlak lou in a om zel ding a;
mite amah ah vualzawl in a om ding ua;
nam chihte’n amah hampha a chi ding uhi.
Israelte Pathian phat in om hen,
amah kia in thillamdang a hih zel a.
A min thupitak tangtawn in phat in leng om henla;
lei pumpi leng a thupina a hihdim in om hen.
Amen, Amen.
Jesse tapa David thumnate a beita hi.
Pathian Israelte tung ah a hoih ngei e,
lungtang siangthoute tung ah.
Himahleh ken zaw ka siktal dekdek a;
ka kalsuante a teu dekdek ahi.
Migilou saloute vangphat dan ka muh in mi kiuangsakte ka eng hi.
A sih lai un thuakgimna
a neikei ua:
a hatna uh a kip zawsop hi.
Midang bang a gimthuak in
a omkei uhi.
Midang bang a gawt
in leng a omsam kei uhi.
Huaiziak in kisaktheihna in
khainiang bang in a ngawng uh a vial a;
hiamgamna in puan bang in a tuam hi.
Thau ziak in a mit uh a pawng
leuluau a:
lungtang thudeih sang a thupi a nei uhi.
A nuihsan ua, gilou tak in nuaisiahna thu a gen ua:
kisaktheihna in a pau uhi.
A kam uh vanlam ah a koih ua,
a lei un leitung a pha suak zel hi.
Huaiziak in a mite huai ah a kiknawn ua,
Tui nou a dim a dawn siang sipsip uhi.
Pathian in bangchi’n a thei dia?
Tungnungpen in theihna a nei dia hia? a chi uhi.
En dih, hiai migilou saloute ahi uh; nuamsa a om in a hau deuhdeuh uhi.
A thawn in ka lungtang ka hihsiang a, ka khutte gensiatbei in ka sil hi.
Nitum in gawt in ka om a,
zingsang teng in sawi in ka om hi.
Huchibang in ka gen ding,
na chita leng; ngai dih,
muanhuailou tak a hih ka hi ding.
Huai ka theihna ding dan ka ngaihtuah in,
Kei din a na lua hi.
Pathian Mun Siangthou a ka lut a, a beina ding uh ka ngaihtuah masiah.
Amau mun naltak ah na koih a;
siatnate ah na paikhe zel hi.
Bangchidan ahia mitphiat kal kia a inn-gam tak uh aw!
Thil mulkimhuai takte a hih manthat vek in a omta uhi.
Min khanloh nung a mang bangmah a sak louh bang un,
Ka lungsim lungkham a a om a,
ka lungtang sut a ka omlai in.
Mi mawl leh bangmah theilou ka hi a,
na lak ah gamsa bang phet ka hi hial hi.
Himahleh na kiang ah ka om gige a: ka khut taklam na len gige hi.
Nang na lemtheihna in n’on pi ding a,
huai nung chiang in thupina ah n’on kipahpih ding hi.
Van ah nang lou kua ka nei a?
Lei ah leng nang lou ngal ka deih kuamah a omkei hi.
Ka sa leh ka lungtang a bahta a:
himahleh Pathian tangtawn a ka lungtang utna ding leh ka tantuan ding ahi.
Ngai in, nangmah gamlat a
omte a mangthang dek ua:
a hon angkawm san peuhmahte na hihmangta ahi.
Kei ading in bel Pathian naih a hoih a:
nna nasep tengteng thu ka hilh theihna ding in.
Pathian aw, bangding a hon
paimang den ding na hia oi?
Bangding a na gantatna mun a belamte tung a na hehna a khut?
Na mite kikhawmte,
nidanglai a na lei, na gou ding a na tat namte theigige in;
na omna Zion tang toh.
Tangtawn siatna lam ah na khe khai in, melmate’n
Mun Siangthou ah thil gilou chiteng a hihta uhi.
Nangmah doute na mite kikhawmte lak ah a awng zuazua ua;
a chiamnate uh chiamtehna ding in a takta uhi.
Mi singbawk heipi a ngimte bang in a kimu ua.
Tun ah a thilkhuak kilawm teng uh heita leh sek in a hihse chiat uhi.
Na Mun Siangthou a hal ua;
na min omna lei a tum khop hial in a hihbuahta uhi.
A lungsim un, avek in i hihse ding, a chi ua, hiai gam a Pathian kikhopna in tengteng a halse khinta uhi.
I kichiamtehnate uh i muta kei ua:
Zawlnei a omta kei ua a sawt ding dan thei himhim i lak uah leng a omkei hi.
Pathian aw, melma in bang tan ahia hon gensiat ding?
Gal in na min tangtawn in a gense dia hia?
Bangding in ahia, na khut,
na khut taklam na lak tak?
Pholh khe nawn inla,
amaute hihmang in.
Himahleh, Pathian nidanglai tan a ka Kumpipa,
lei lai tak a hotdamna siampa pen ahi.
Nang na hatna in tuipi na kikhensak a, nang tui a
dragonte na kitamsak hi.
Nang Ole lute na zansak a,
amah gamdai mi omte
kiang ah an ding in na pia hi.
Nang tuikhuk leh tuilian na khen a; nang lui lian taktakte na kangsak hi.
Sun nang a ahi a, zan leng
nang a ahi. Nang khovak leh
nisa na ngaihtuah hi.
Nang leitung gamgite
na khung vek hi: nang nipi
leh phalbi na siam ahi.
melma in a hon gensiat a;
nam haipi in na min a gensiat.
Aw na vakhu hinna gam sahang kiang ah pe mahmah kenla;
na mi gentheite hinna tangtawn in mangngilh sam ken.
Thukhun hon poimawhngaih in:
leimun mial tata hiamgamna omna in a dim hi.
Aw, nuaisiahna thuakte zahlak in kihei kei uhenla:
genthei leh tagahte’n na min phat uhen.
Pathian aw, thou inla,
nangmah thu kigen tawm inla, mihai in nitum in a
hon gensiat dan theigige in.
Nangmah galte husa mangngilh ken:
a hon sualte chiak vengvung a paitou gige ahi uhi.
Pathian aw, kipahthu k’on
hilh uhi; kipahthu k’on hilh
uhi, na min a nai ziak in:
min na thillamdang hih thute a gengen uhi.
Hun seh pen ka muh hun chiang in diktak in vai ka hawm ding hi.
Lei leh asung a om tengteng a zul khinta: ken a bante ka phut ahi.
Mi uangte kiang ah,
Uangtakin omkei un,
ka chi a: migilou saloute kiang ah, Na ki uh sangsak kei un, leng ka chi hi.
Na ki uh tunglam ah
hihsang kei unla;
ngawng golh zen in thu gen kei un.
Sansakna suahlam a kipan ahi kei a,
tumlam a kipan leng ahi kei lai a, simlam a kipan ahi sam kei hi.
Pathian vaihawmpa ahizaw:
Aman khat niamsak in khat a sangsak hi.
a uain a phul a; thildang toh hel in a dim a,
huai apat a bungkhia a;
pellou in a neng nangawn lei a migilou salou tengteng in a dawn siang sipsip ding uhi.
Himahleh ken zaw tangtawn in ka theisak ding a,
Jakob Pathian phat in la ka sa ding hi.
Migilou saloute ki tengteng ka hihtan ding a;
mi diktatte ki zaw sansak in a om ding hi.
Judahte lak ah Pathian theih in a om a;
Israelte lak ah a min a thupi hi.
Salem ah bawkta a om a.
Amah omna Zion ah a om hi.
Huai ah thalpeu thalte a hihsia a: phawte, namsaute,
kidouna vanzatte toh.
Nang thupitak leh hoihtak na hi a, sathah tangte sang in.
Lungtang phate’n loh a tuak ua,
a ihmu uh a ihmu denta uhi;
mi hatte leng kuamah in a khut uh a lik theita kei uhi.
Jakob Pathian aw,
na sawina ziak in kangtalai leh sakol leng gen ding theilou in a om tuaktuak uhi.
Nang, nangmah mah, lau ding
na hi: na heh peuhmah leh,
kua ahia na mitmuh a ding thei ding?
Na vaihawm thu van a kipan in na theisak a;
lei a lau a, a daita hi.
Lei a mi thunuailut tengteng
hondam ding leh vaihawm ding a Pathian a thoh lai in.
Pellou in mihing hehna in nang a honphat ding a:
hehna val in na kigak ding hi.
Thu chiam inla,
a kim a mi tengteng in kihtak dingpa kipahmante hon tawisak uhen.
Aman lalte kha a satkhe ding a;
amah lei a kumpipate ading in a kihtakhuai ahi.
Ka aw in Pathian ka sam a;
ka aw in Pathian ngei tuh
ka sam ding a, aman kei lam ah bil a hondoh ding hi.
Ka buai ni’n
ka khut zan chiang in leng khaikhe lou in ka zak gige a;
ka hinna in khamuan a om a nial hi.
Pathian ka theigige a, ka buai
naknak: ka ngaihtuah a,
ka kha a bah naknak.
Ka mitte mitmeisuan in n’on let sak a: pau theilou khop in ka buai hi.
Nidanglaite ka ngaihtuah a,
tanglai hun leh kumte.
Zan a ka lasak ka thei nawn a:
ka lungtang ah ka kingaihtuah a, ka kha in phatuamngaitak in a zong hi.
Chikmah chiang in a kipakta kei dia eita aw?
A chitna a mang tawntung dia eita aw? A thuchiam suan
tengteng pha in a mang dia eita aw?
Pathian in hehpih a mangngilh a eita aw?
Heh in lainatnate a khakta a eita aw?
Huai ka hatlouhna ziak ahi;
himahleh Tungnungpen khut taklam kumte ka theigige hi.
Toupa thilhih thute ka gen ding a: nidanglai a na thillamdang hihte ka theigige ding hi.
Nna nasep tengteng ka ngaihtuah ding a,
na thilhihte leng ka sut ding hi, ka chi a.
Pathian aw, na lampi Mun Siangthou ah a om a:
Pathian bang Pathian thupi kua a om a?
Nang thillamdang hihpa
Pathian na hi a:
michih lakte ah na hatdan na theisak zel hi.
Na ban in na mite na honkhia,
Jakob leh Joseph tate.
Tuite’n a honmu ua,
Pathian aw, tuite’n nang a honmu ua, a kikou ua;
tui thukpite leng a ling uhi.
Meipite’n tui a sungbua ua;
vante’n aw a suah ua:
na thalte leng a phe zolzol hi.
Na van ging husa pingpei ah a om a; khophiate’n khovel a tanvak zolzol a:
lei kising in a ling dopdop hi.
Na lampi tuipi ah a om a,
na lampite tui zatak ah a om a,
na khapte theih ahi kei hi.
Mosi leh Aron khut in na mite
belamhon bang in na pipi hi.
Ka mite aw, ka danthu ah bil na doh unla:
ka kam a thute ah na bil uh hondoh un.
Gentehna thu in ka kam ka
ding a: nidanglai a thugil
gente ka gen khe ding:
Huaite i bil un i za ua,
i lungsim in leng i thei uhi,
a pipute’n leng a honhilh uhi.
Huaite a tate uh lak ah i im
kei ding ua, khang hongom
ding kiang ah
a hatdan leh a thillamdang pipi hih dante i hilhzaw ding uhi.
Jakobte lak a thu theihsak a hihkip a, Israelte lak ah dan a sep a, huaite i pipute kiang ah thupiak in a pia a,
amau huai thu a tate uh kiang ah a theihsak ding un:
Khang hongom ding naupang
hongpiang dingte’n, a theihna ding un, huaite a thou ua,
a thou ua, a tate u kiang a,
a hilhsawn zel ding un:
A lametna uh Pathian a a koih ua, Pathian thilhihte
a mangngilh louhna ding leh a thupiakte a zonna ding un:
A pipute bang ua, suan genhak leh helhat suan lungtang bawl diklou,
Pathian lak a lungsim ginom lou pu a a om louhna ding un.
Ephraim suante galthuam a kithuam a, thalpeu tawi in,
kisual ni’n a taikek ua:
Pathian thukhun a zuikei ua,
a dan a om leng a ut kei ua:
A thilhihte a mangngilh ua,
a thillamdang a muhsakte toh.
A pipute uh mitmuh ah
thillamdang pipite a hih zel a.
Aigupta gam ah Zoan pawn ah.
Tuipi a khen hok a,
amau a galkaisak a:
tuite thil koih khawm venvon bang in a khawlsak meuhmouh hi.
Sun chiang in mei in a pi a,
zankhua in mei vak in leng a pipi hi.
Gamdai ah suangpite a kitam sak a, tui thukpi a kipan bang mai in dawn ding tampi a pia hi.
Suangpi a kipan in luite a pawtsak a, tuite luipi bang in a luang khesak hi.
Huchi pipi in leng a tung ah thil a hihkhial lailai ua,
gamkeu ah Tungnungpen tung ah a hel uhi.
A gongthak uh hihdamna ding a a nekding uh ngen in a lungtang un
Pathian a ze-et uhi.
Ahi, Pathian kalh in thu a gen ua;
Gamdai ah Pathian in dohkan a bawlkhol thei diam maw?
Ngai in, suangpi a sat a,
tuite a hong kikhoh khia a,
luite a piau ah a dimlet a;
an leng a pe thei lai diam maw?
A mite din sa a bawlkhol diam maw? a chi ua.
Huchi in
a hehta hi. Jakobte tung ah mei a hong kuangkheta a,
Israelte tung ah hehna hongsuakta hi;
Pathian a gingta kei ua,
a hotdamna leng a muan louh ziak un.
Himahleh tunglam van dumte thu a pia a,
van kongkhakte a honsak a:
A nek ding un manna a tung uah a zusak a,
van buh a kiang uah a pia hi.
Mihingte’n angel an a ne ua:
vahna khop in an a honpia hi.
Suahlam huih van ah a nungsak a: a thilhihtheihna in sim huih a nung sak hi.
Sa leivui zah a tung uah a zusak a, vasa kha nei tuipi a piaunel zah tak:
A giahna mun tak uah a kesak
a, a omna buk kim uah.
Huchi in a ne ua,
a vah ngial ua; a lunggulh ua a kiang uah a pia hi.
A gongthakna uh a dai naikei a,
a an uh a kam uah a omlai a,
Huchi in Pathian hehna a tung
uah a tung a, a mi hoihte uh
a that a, Israel tangval telte
a satpuk helhul hi.
Huchipi in leng thil a hihkhial lailai ua,
thillamdang hihte a gingta tuankei uh,
Huaiziak in a damsung nite uh
bangmahlou phet in a hihmang sak a, a damsung kumte uh launa in a hihmansak lai hi.
Amaute a thah chiang in amah a zong ua: a kiknawn ua,
phalvak in Pathian a zong uhi.
Pathian a suangpi uh ahi chih leh Pathian Tungnungpen a tanpa uh ahi chih a theikhe zel uhi.
Himahleh a kam un a maitang phat ua, a lei un a kiang ah zuauthu a gen uhi.
A lungtang uh amah lam ah a dik kei a, thukhun ah lah a ginom sam kei uh.
Himahleh, amah bel lainatna a dim a hih ziak in a thulimlouhna uh a ngaidam a,
amau a hihmang kei hi.
Ahi, tamveipi a hehna a la kik a, a thangpaihnate a tokthou nuam kei hi.
Sa leltak a hih uh a theigige a:
huih, kik nawnlou ding a nungzel bang in.
Gamdai ah a tung ah hel mun in, gamkeu ah amah hih
lungkham mun hina tel u e!
A kihei kiknawn un
Pathian a ze-et ua, Israelte
Mi Siangthou a hihvui uhi.
A khut a theigige kei ua,
melma lak a a humbit ni a theigige sam kei uhi.
Huchi a Aigupta gam ah a chiamtehnate a koih a,
Zoan pawn ah a thillamdang hihte leng a koih a;
A luipi uh sisan a suaksak a,
a luite uh leng sisan a suaksak hi,
huchi in a dawn theita kei uhi.
A lak uah thou tampi a sawl a,
huai in amau a ne khin a;
ukengte leng a sawl a,
huai in amau a hihmangta hi.
A thil poute u leng lung kiang ah a pia a, a sepgim gah uh
khaupe kiang ah a pia hi.
A grepguite uh gial in a hihsia a, a theipi kungte u leng vuk in a hihsia hi.
A gantate uh gialpi kiang ah a pia a, a ganhonte uh kek sa kiang ah a pia hi.
A hehna thupitak a tung uah
a khia a, thangpaihnate,
lunghihlouhna mahmahte,
mangbatnate, gilou angel honte,
A hehna ading in lam a bawlsak a; a hinna uh sihna lak ah a humbit kei a,
a hinna uh hi kiang ah a pezawta hi.
Aigupta gam a ta masa
tengteng a that a,
Ham puanin ah a hatna gah masapente.
Himahleh a mite belam bang in a pikhia a, ganhon bang in gamdai ah a pi hi.
Bittak in a pi a, huchi in
bangmah a lau kei ua:
himahleh tuipi in a melmate uh a khuh khinta hi.
A Mun Siangthou gamgi
a pitung a, hiai tang,
a khut taklam a a lei.
Namchih a ma uah a delhkhia a,
amau khuate gouluah ding in a hawm a, a puaninte uah
Israel namte a omsak hi.
Himahleh, Pathian
Tungnungpen a ze-et ua,
a tung ah a hel ua, a thu theihsakte a zui kei uhi.
Kihei nawn in, a pipute uh bang in lepchiahtak in a gamta zawta uhi:
thalpeu muanhuailou bang in a paikawi uhi.
A mun sangte un amah a hihheh ngal a, a milim
siamte un a mullit sak ahi.
Pathian in huai a na zak in
a heh a, Israelte a kih mahmah hi.
Huchi in Shiloh biakbuk
mihing lak a a puanin koih,
a paisan a:
A hatna sal ah a mansak a,
a thupina melma khut ah
a mansak hi.
A mite namsau kiang ah a pia a;
a gouluah ding tung ah a hehta hi.
Mei in a tangvalte uh a kangmang a, a nungakte un
kitenna a neita kei uhi.
A siampute uh namsau a hihpuk in a om ua;
a meithaite uh a kap kei uhi.
Huchihlai in,
mi hat uain ziak a kikou bang in.
Amah melmate a satkik a,
tangtawn min siatna a lohsakta hi.
Huailou leng Joseph puanin a deihkei a,
Ephraim nam leng a telta kei hi;
Judah nam a tel zawta a,
a it Zion tang mah.
A inn siangthou van sangte
bang in a lam a,
tangtawn ding a a hihkip leilung bang in.
A sikha David a tel a, belam
huang a kipante a lakhia a:
Belampu nou kaite zuihna a
kipan in a pikhia a,
a mite Jakobte leh a gouluah ding Israelte vak ding in.
Huchi in aman a lungtang uh
hoihna bangzel in amaute a vak a;
khut siam in a pita hi.
Pathian aw, namchih na gouluah ding ah a lut ua;
na biakin siangthou a hihnin uhi;
Jerusalem suangchim a vum uhi.
Na sikhate luang tungleng
vasate an ding in a pia ua,
na misiangthoute sa gamsate kiang ah a pia ua.
A sisan uh Jerusalem kim ah tui bang in a sungbua ua;
amau vui ding lah kuamah a om ngal kei uhi.
I kim ua mite gensiat in i na om ua, i kiangnai a mite muhsit leh nuihsat in i na omta uhi.
Na mullitna mei bang in a kuang ding ahia?
Nangmah theilou namchih tung ah na hehna sungbua in,
na min sam lou gam tung ah.
Jakobte a ne khin ua; a omna uh a hihgamta uhi.
Ka pipute uh thulimlouhnate ka lak uah theigige ken:
na lainatna in hon don pah hen.
Nakpitak a hihniam in ka omta ngal ua.
Hon hondampa Pathian aw,
na min thupina ding in hon panpih inla;
na min ziak in hon humbit in,
ka khelhnate uh sil siang in.
Bang achia namchih in,
A Pathian uh koi a om ahia leh?
Na sikhate sisan pawt phulakna ka mitmuh un namchih lak ah theih hi hen.
Henta thumna na ma ah tung
hen: na thilhihtheihna thupidan bangzel in si ding a sehte humbit inla:
ka kiangnai uate tung ah a leh sagih in thuk in.
Huchi in, kou na mite,
na gantatna mun a belamte’n,
tangtawn in kipahthu k’on hilh ding uhi:
suan tengteng tan in nangmah phatna ka theisak zel ding uhi.
Israelte chingpa, Belamhon
bang a Joseph pipa,
bil na doh in:
nang cherubte tung a tu,
hong vakkhia in.
Ephraim leh Benjamin,
Manasseh mitmuh in na hatna tokthou inla,
hon hondam ding in hongpai in.
Pathian aw, hon kiheisak nawn
inla; na mel hihvak in, huchi in
hotdam in ka om ding uhi.
bang tan ahia na mite thumna tung a na heh ding?
Amaute khitui tanghou in na
vak a, khitui dawn ding in
tehna liantak in na pe zel hi.
Nang ka kim ua mite ading in
kinakna din n’on bawl nak a:
ka melmate uh a nui chiat nak uhi.
Sepaihte Pathian aw,
hon kiheisak nawn inla:
na mel hihvak in, huchi in
hotdam in ka om ding uhi.
Aigupta gam a kipan grepgui
na honla a: namchih na
delh khia a, na suanta hi.
A ma na hih siang zel a,
thutak in zung a kai a,
gam a luahvek hi.
Tangte a limtuam in a om
chiat, a hiangte Pathian
sidar singte bang ahi.
A hiangte tuipi tan in a zamsuak sak a a selte Luipi pha in.
Bang achia a huangte hihsia na hia?
Lampi a pai peuhmah in a sat kheta uhi.
Gamnuai a ngal in a hihsia a,
gamsate’n leng a ne uhi.
Sepaihte Pathian aw,
hehpih in kihei nawn in;
van a kipan in hon ensuk inla, hiai grepgui en inla,
hongveh in.
A kung na khut taklam in a suan leh,
a hiang nang dia na khauhsak toh.
Mei ah a kangta, phuk in
a omta: na mel a salhna
ziak in a mangthang zel hi.
Na taklam a mi tung ah na khut om hen, mihing tapa nang dia na hihhat tung ah.
Huchi in k’on kiksan kei ding ua: hon hihhalh inla,
na min ka lou ding hi.
na mel hihvak in, huchi in hotdam in ka om ding uhi.
Pathian hon hihhatpa pahtawi
in nuamtak in lasa unla;
Jakobte Pathian pahtawi in nuam tak in kikou un.
Phatna lasa unla, khuangta,
kaihging ngaihnophuai,
pekging toh hontawi un.
Kha thak in pengkul mut unla,
kha lik a i Ankuangluina thupi ni’n.
Israelte ding a thuseh ahi ngal a,
Jakobte Pathian dan ahi.
Huai Joseph lak a thu
theihsakna ding a a seh ahi.
Aigupta gam tung a a paikhiak lai in:
ka theihlouh pau ka zak lai in.
A liangzang thilgik apan in ka lasuan a:
a khutte loh a kipan a khah in a om hi.
Mangbatni’n n’on sam a,
k’on humbit a; van ging bukna mun ah k’on dawng hi;
Meribah tuite ah k’on ze-et ahi.
Ka mite aw, ngaikhia unla,
ka hon theihsak bang in;
Israelte aw, ka thu ngaikhe
nuamle uteh aw!
Gamdang pathian himhim
na lak uah a om ding ahi kei;
midang Pathian himhim
na biak ding uh leng ahi kei hi.
Kei,
Aigupta gam a kipan honpi khepa tak:
na kam uh liankat un, ka hihdim ding hi.
Himahleh ka mite’n
ka aw a ngaikhe kei ua;
Israelte’n hon deihkei uhi.
Huchi in a lungtang uh genhak dan bangzel a om ding in ka khahzanta ahi,
amau hoihsak bang a a omna ding un.
Aw, ka mite’n ka thu ngaikhia in,
Israelte ka lampite ah pai le u aw:
A melmate uh ka hihneu zok in,
amau galte tung ah
ka khut ka lik ding hi.
amau hun bel a om nilouh louh ding ahi.
Nou bel buh hoihpen in k’on vak ding hi;
suangpi a khuaizu in k’on taisak ding ahi.
Pathian tuh Pathian kikhopna bawl ah ading a;
Pathiante lak ah vai a hawm hi.
Bang tan ahia diklou tak a vai na hawm ua, migilou saloute,
na deihsak tuam ding uh?
Gentheite leh paneiloute hawmsak unla; haksa thuakte,
tagahte tung ah hihdik un.
Gentheite leh tagahte gum unla;
migilou salou khut a kipan humbit un.
A theikei ua, theihsiamna leng a neikei uh;
mial ah a kileh a kileh ua:
leilung kingakna tengteng a lingta hi,
Pathiante na hi ua,
na vek un Tungnungpen tate na hi uh, ka chi hi.
Himahleh mihingte bang phet in na hongsi ding ua,
mi lian khat bang in na hongpuk ding uhi.
Pathian aw, thou inla, lei vai
hawmsak in: namchih na gouluah ding ahi uhi.
Pathian aw, paulou in om
kenla: Pathian aw, dai nilouh ken, om maimai mahmah ken.
Ngai in, na melmate a lum lutlut ua:
nangmah hawte a dak hawkhawk uhi.
Na mite lepchiahtak in a sawm ua, na mi selgukte tung ah a selam in a kihou a kihou khawm uhi.
Kisa dih ua, a nam uh mangsak khop in i hihmang ding uh:
Israel min himhim theihgige a a om nawn louhna ding in, a chi uhi.
Thukhatsat in a kihou ua;
na tung ah a selam a hih ding in thu a chiam khawm uhi.
Edom leh Ishmael puaninte,
Moab leh Haggar;
Gebal leh Ammon leh Amalek;
Philistiate Tura khua a omte toh:
Assuriate amau lam ah a pang ua;
Lot suante a panpih uhi.
Amau Midiante tung a na hih bang, Kison lui a
Sisera tung a na hih bang, Jabin tung a na hih bang in hih sam in.

banglel a na hita uhi.
A miliante uh Oreb leh
Zeeb bang in bawl inla, Ahi,
a kumpipa tengteng uh Zebah
leh Zalmunna bang in bawl in.
Huai mite’n, Pathian omnate i luahsak ding uh, a chi uhi.

buhsi huih mutleng bang in.
Gam kang mei bang leh,
tang kang meikuang bang in.
Amau na huihpi in delh inla,

Tangtawn in zahlak leh mangbang tak in om uhenla;
ahi, hihzum a om in
mangthang uhen.

leitung tengteng tung a
Tungnungpen na hi chih a theihna ding un.
Sepaihte
na omnate deihhuai natel e!
Ka hinna in
ka lungtang leh ka sa Pathian hing kiang ah a kikou khia hi.

ka Kumpipa leh ka Pathian,
huai nangmah maitamte ngei ahi.
Na inn a omte’n nuam a sa ua;
nang a honphat gige ding uhi,
Nangmah a hatna nei min nuam a sa hi;
a lungtang a Zion naihna lamliante om in.
Kahna guam a tot un,

Zion ah Pathian ma ah a kimusak chiat uhi.
ka thumna hon ngaikhia inla:
Jakobte Pathian aw, bil na doh in.
Pathian ka phaw pen u aw, en in,

Sepaihte
nangmah muang min nuam a sa hi.
na kipak a: Jakob, sal a om
na pikik nawnta hi.

Na thangpaihna tengteng na lamang a: na hehna thupitak na kiheisanta hi.
Hon hondampa Pathian aw,
hon kiheisak nawn inla,
ka tung ua na hehna tawpsak in.
Ka tung uah na heh nilouhlouh dia hia?

a mite leh a misiangthoute kiang ah khamuanna thu a gen dek a:

I gam ua thupina a om theihna ding in.
Chitna leh thutak a kituak a;
diktatna leh kituahna a kitawp a,
Thutak lei a kipan in a dawnkhia a; diktatna in van apan a hon tansukta hi.
Ahi,
I gam in leng a thilpou a pe ding hi.

hondoh inla, hon dawng in;

nitum in ka honsam ngal a.

kiang ah ka koih det ziak in.
ngaihdam na ngap a,

Ka mangbat ni’n k’on sam ding a,
huchi in n’on dawng ding hi,

Nang na thupi ngal a,

ka lungtang tengteng in k’on phat ding a;

Himahleh,
nang Pathian, lainatna a dim,
mi hehpihthei, lungnel,
chitna leh thutak hau, na hi.
Keilam hong nga inla, aw,

Hoihna ding chiamtehna honlak in;

A suangphum
tang siangthou ah a om hi.

en un; hiai mi huailai a piang ahi.
Ahi, hiai mi leh huai mi amah a piang ahi ua:

hiai mi huai a piang ahi,
chi’n, a sim ding uh,

Ka tuikhuk teng nangmah ah ahi a om, a chi ding uhi.
Pathian, sun leh zan in na ma ah ka kikou gige a;
Ka thumna na ma ah lut henla;
ka kikou husa ah na bil hondoh in;
Ka hinna mangbatnate in a dim a, ka hinna in Sheol a naihta ngal a.
Kawkhuk a paite toh simkhawm ka hi;
hatna himhim neilou mi bang ka hi a;
Gal thahte han a lumte bang a misi lak a paihkhiak ka hi;
huaite na theih tak louh,
na khut a kipan hihman ahi uhi.
Kawkhuk nuainungpen ah n’on lumsak a, mun mial, thupi ah.
Na hehna in hon delhkhum a,
nang na tui kihot tengteng in gim n’on thuaksakta hi.

Gimthuak ziak in ka mit a seta a:
nang lam ah ka khutte ka zak a.
Misite ading in thillamdang na hih dek ahia?

ding ua hia?

ka thumna in zingsang in a hondon hi.
Bang achia ka lak a na mai sel?
Ka naupan chil a kipan gimthuak leh si dekdek in ka om a;

Na heh mahmahna in hon vukmang a;
thil mulkimhuaite’n hon hihmangta hi.
Huaite’n nitum in tui bang in hon umsuak ua; ka kim ka vel in hon um chiat uhi.

la in ka sa ding a: ka kam in na ginomdan suan tengteng tan in ka theisak ding.

Pathian kihtakhuai tak,
a kim a mi tengteng sang a kihtakpen ding kua ahia?
nang bang a mi hat kua a om a?

Nang tuipi kisaktheihna vai na hawm a:
a tuikihawt kisep laite uh na hihdai hi.
Nang Rahab gal thah bang in na hihkham dimdem a;
nangmah galte na ban thahat in na keksakta hi.
Vante nangmah a ahi a,
lei leng nangmah a ahi:
khovel leh asung a omteng nangmah muhkhiak ahi.
Sim leh mal nangmah siam ahi a:
Tabor leh Hermon na min ziak in a nuam hi.
Nang ban thilhihtheitak na nei a:
na khut a hat a, na khut taklam pahtawi in a om hi.
Diktatna leh vaihawmna dik na mangtutphah kingakna ahi a:
chitna leh thutak na ma ah a pai hi.
Husa kipahhuai za namte’n
nuam a sa ua:
Na min ziak in nitum in a nuam ua, diktatna ziak in pahtawi in a om uhi.
Nang a hatna uh thupina na hi ngal a:
na deihsakna ziak in ka ki uh pahtawi in a om ding.
Ka phaw uh
ka kumpipa uh Israelte Mi Siangthou ahi.
Huailai in na misiangthoute
kiang ah kilakna in thu na gen a,
mi hattak khat tung ah panpihna ka nga a;
mi khat mite lak a tel khiak ka pahtawita hi, chi in.
Ka sikha David ka mukheta a;
ka thau siangthou in amah ka nilhta a:
Ka khut a kiang ah hihkip in a om ding a;
ka ban in amah a hihhat ding a,
a hihhat taktak ding hi.
Melma in a lak ah a phut kei ding; thulimlouhna tapa in a hihgim kei ding.
Amah galte a ma ah ka satpuk
ding a, amah hawte ka bawl ek ding.
Amah kiang ah bel ka ginomna leh ka chitna a om ding hi;
ka min ziak in a ki pahtawi in a om ding hi.
A khut tuipi ah ka ngasak ding a, a khut taklam luipite ah.
Aman, Nang ka Pa, ka Pathian,
ka hotdamna suangpi na hi,
chi in, a honsam ding hi.
Huan, ken amah tapa masa in ka siam ding a, lei a kumpipate lak ah tungnungpen in ka bawl ding hi.
Ka chitna tangtawn in amah ading in ka kep hoih sak ding a,
ka thukhun a kiang ah a om kip ding hi.
A suante tangtawn in ka omsak ding a,
a mangtutphah van omlai siah in ka omsak ding hi.
A tate’n ka dan a lehngatsan ua,

Ka thuseh a tatlekna a neih
ua, ka thupiakte a kep hoih kei uleh.
A tatlek chiang in ka gawt dia,

vek kei ding a,

ka muk a thupawt leng ka hihlamdang sam kei ding hi.
Khatvei ka siangthouna lou in ka kichiam a,
David kiang ah zuau ka gen kei ding;
A suante tangtawn in a om ding ua, a mangtutphah ka ma ah ni bang in a om ding hi.

Himahleh nang na khahkhia in na deihkei a,

a melma tengteng na hih nuamsata hi,

Bang tan ahia na hehna mei bang a a kuan ding?

David kiang a kichiam a na chiam, koi a om ahita a?
nam hattakte tengteng gensiatna ka angsung a ka thuak zeldan.

Amaute tui lian bang in na taimang a;

zingsang a loupa dawn khia bang ahi uhi.
Zingsang in a hongpou in a hong dawnkhia a;
nitaklam in phuk in a om a, a vuai hi.
Na hehna a hihman in ka om ua,

A thu Jakobte kiang ah a langsak a,
a thusehte leh a vaihawmte Israelte kiang ah a langsak hi.
Aman kua nam tung ah mah huchibang in a hih ngeikei a;
a vaihawmte a thei sam kei uhi.
Van a kipante
tunglamte ah Amah phat un.
A angel tengteng aw, amah phat unla;
a sepaih tengteng aw amah phat un!
Ni leh khate aw, amah phat unla;
aksi vakte aw, amah phat un!
Vante, vante aw, amah phat unla,
van tung a tui omte aw,
amah phat un!
Huaite’n
min phat uhen:
aman thu a pia a,
siam in a omta uhi.
Aman huaite tangtawn tangtawn a din a hihkip a:
khen nawn theihlouh ding in a gite uh a khung kip hi.
Nou Dragonte leh thuknate aw!
Lei a kipan
mei leh gial, vuk leh tuihute aw,
a thu zui zel huihpite:
tang lian leh tang neute,
sing gah nuam leh sidar singte aw:
gamsate leh ganvulhte aw;
ganhingte,tungleng vasate aw;
lei a kumpipate leh michih kumpi tate leh lei vaihawmte aw:
Nungak leh tangvalte, putek leh
naupangte aw,
Huaite’n
Amah min kia tawisang in a om ngal a:
a thupina in lei leh van a khup tham hi.
A mite adin ki a tungdingta,
a misiangthou tengteng adin phatna mah;
Amah kiang nai a om
Israel mite ading.
misiangthoute kikhopna ah a phatna lasa un.
Israelte amau siampa tung ah kipak uhenla;
Zion tate a kumpipa uh tung ah nuam uhen.
A min lou in phat uhenla;
khuangta leh kaihging toh amah phat in lasa uhen.
thunuailutte hotdamna in a zem ding hi.
Misiangthoute thupina ah kipak tak in om uhenla:
a lupna tungte uah nuam in Lasa uhen!
Pathian pahtawi a phatna a kam uah om henla,
namsau hiam tuah a khut uah om hen.
Namchih tung a phu la a,
michih tung a gawtna tungsak ding leh,
A kumpipate uh khainiang a hen a, a mi hoihte uh
sikkolte bunsak ding leh,
a tung ua vaihawm gelhsa
tungsak ding in:
huai kilawmna a misiangthou tengteng in a neichiat uhi,
Pathian a Mun Siangthou ah
phat unla:
A thilhihtheihna huihkhua zapi ah
Amah phat un!
A thilhih thupitak ziak in
Amah phat unla:
A thupi mahmah dan bang in
Amah phat un!
Pengkul ging in
Amah phat unla:
pekging leh kaihging in
Amah phat un!
Khuangta leh lam in
Amah phat unla:
Kaihging tuamtuam leh
Tamngai in Amah phat un!
Dakkhutbet ngaihtak in
Amah phat unla;
dakkhutbet ngaihtak in
Amah phat un!
Bangkim, ha thei peuhmah in
Israel kumpipa, David tapa Solomon paunakte:
Pilna leh hilhna theihna ding; theihsiamna thute theikakna ding;
Thilhih pilhuai a hilhna mu ding, diktatna, vaihawm leh hawmsiamna ah;
Mi mawlte kiang a kivensiamna peding, tangval kiang a theihna leh ngentelna;
Mi pil in a zak theih a, sinsiamna a a pun theihna ding in; theisiam mi in thuphate a phak theihna ding;
Paunak leh lim a thugen theisiam ding; mipilte thute, gentehna thugen theihhakte theisiam ding in.
Ka tapa, na pa hilhna za in, na nu dan mangngilh ken:
Na lu ading in deihhuai lutang zem leh na ngawng vial ding khainiangte hi ding ahi ngal a.
Ka tapa, mikhialte’n a honzol ua leh, pha sakpih ken.
Honzui in, sisan I buk ding ua, a ziak bei in mi hoihte a guk in i tang ding uh, a chih uleh:
Sheol bang in amaute a hing in i nawmvalh ding ua, huan, kawkhuk sung a paisukte bang in, a pum in:
Van manpha tengteng i mu ding ua, gallakte in i innte uh i dimsak ding uh;
Na tan kou lak ah na seplut ding a; sumbawm khat i neikhawm ding ua:
Ka tapa, lampi ah amau toh ton ken; a lampi ua kipan na khe kaikik in:
Gilou hih ding in a khe uh a tai ngal a, huan sisan suah ding in a kinoh uhi.
Vasa himhim mitmuh in, len a kiphah thawn ngal a:
Huan hiaite’n amau sisan ngei a tang ua, amau hinna ngei a guk in a buk uhi.
Huchibang tuh michih punna a duhgawlte lampi ahi a; huai in a neitute hinna a lakmang sak sek hi.
Kongzing ah ngaihtak in pilna a kikou a; mun liante ah a aw a suah a;
Mipi omkhawmte mun pipen ah a kikou a; kongpite lutna ah, khopi ah, a thute a gen:
Bang tan ahia, nou mi mawlte’n, mawlna na it ding uh? Nuihsanmite’n nuihsana amaute a kipah ding ua, mihaite’n theihna a huat ding uh?
Ka salhna ah kihei unla: ngai in na tung uah ka kha ka sung baw ding, na kiang uah ka thute ka theisak ding hi.
Ka sap a, na nial ziak un: ka bante ka zak a, kuamah in a limsak kei uh;
Himahleh ka thupha tengteng bangmahlou in na koih ua, ka salhnate bangmah na deihkei uhi:
Ken leng na tuahsiat ni un k’on nuihsan dia; na launa uh a hongtun chiang in k’on chiamnuih ding;
Huihpi bang a na launa uh a hongtun chiang in; pingpei bang a na tuahsiatna uh a hongtun chiang in; lungkhamna leh dahna na tung ua a hongtun chiang in.
Huai hun chiang in kei a honsam ding ua, himahleh ka dawng kei ding; thanuamtak in a honzong ding ua, himahleh a honmu kei ding uh:
Theihna a huat ua,
Ka thupha lak ah bangmah a deihkei ua; ka salhna tengteng a musit uhi:
Huaiziak in a lampi uh gah a ne ding ua, amau thusawmte ngei in a vah ding uhi.
Mi mawlte nungtolhna in amaute a that dia, mihaite hauhsakna in amau hihmang ding a hih ziak in.
Himahleh kuapeuh kei hon ngaikhia bittak in a teng ding ua, gilou launa panglou in a muang ding uhi.
Ka tapa, ka thute na san a, ka thupiakte nang a na khol khawm leh;
Huchi a pilna lam a na bil na doh a, theihsiamna lam a na lung na suk leh;
Ahi, theihkakna na sapa, theihsiamna ding a na aw na suah leh;
Dangka bang a huai na zona, gou sel bang a huai na zon leh;
Huchi in
lah pilna a pe ngal a; a kam a kipan in theihna leh theihsiamna a hongpai hi.
Midik ading in pilna hoih a khol khawm a, muanhuaina a omte amaute ading in lum ahi;
Vaihawmna lampite a ven theihna ding in, a misiangthoute lampi a hawi theihna ding in.
Huchi in diktatna leh vaihawmna na theisiam dia, huan, hawmsiamna, ahi, lampi hoih chiteng.
Na lungtang sung ah pilna a honglut ding a, huan na kha ading in theihna a nuam ding hi;
Ngentelna in nang a honveng dia, theihsiamna in nang a honkem ding hi.
Gilou lampi a kipan hon hunkhe ding, mi thil hoihlou gente a kipan;
Lampi tangte mangngilh, khomial lampite a pai ding;
Gilou hih ding a kipak a, gilou hoihlouhna a nuamsa;
A lampite ua kawi a, a lampite ua dikloute;
Numei lamdang a kipan nang honhun ding, mikhualnu a thute toh a maitangphatnu a kipan mahmah in;
Aman a tuailai lawm a nusia a, a Pathian thukhun a mangngilh hi:
A inn in sihna lampi a doh a, a lampite’n misite lampi:
Amah kiang hoh kuamah a kiknawn kei ua, kuamah in hinna lampite a phazou sam kei uhi:
Mi hoihte lampi a na pai theih a, mi diktatte lampi na zuih theihna ding in.
Mi tangte gamsung a teng ding ahi ua, huan asung ah mi hoihkimte a om tawntung ding uh.
Himahleh giloute gam a kipan satkhiak in a om ding ua, huan lepchiahtak a hihte huai a kipan zung kalhkhiak in a om ding uh.
Ka tapa, ka dan mangngilh ken; himahleh ka thupiakte na lungtang in kem hen:
Nite sawtna leh, damsung kumte leh muanna, nang a hong kibehlap ding ahi ngal a.
Chitna leh thutak in nang hon nuse kei hen: Na ngawng kimvel in vial inla; na lungtang dohkan tung ah amaute gelh in:
Huchi in Pathian leh mihing mitmuh in deihsakna leh theihsiamna hoih na mu ding hi.
Na lungtang tengteng toh
Na lampi tengteng ah amah thei inla, huchi in aman na lampite a pitang ding hi.
Nangmah mit ah pil kenla;
Na lai ading in damna ahi ding a, na guhte ading in guhngek.
Na van in Toupa zahtak in, na punna tengteng a gahmasate toh in:
Huchi in hauhna in na pangte a dimlet dia, na belte uain thak in a dimlet ding hi.
Ka tapa,
Pa’n a kipahna tapa a salh bang in.
Pilna mu mi leh theihsiamna mu mi’n nuam a sa hi.
Huai a vante lah dangka vante sang in a hoihzaw ngal a, huan huai a punna dangkaeng hoih sang in.
Rubi suang sang in a manpha zaw: huan amah toh na thil deihte na tehpih theikei ding.
A khut taklam ah nite sawtna a om a; a khut veilam ah hauhsaknate leh zahtakhuaina.
A lampite nuamna lampite ahi a, a lampite tengteng muanna ahi.
Amah lenchintente ading in hinna sing ahi: amah neiden michih in nuam a sa uhi.
theihsiamna in vante a hihkipta hi.
A theihna in thuknate a kitam a,
huan vante’n a daitui a taksak uhi.
Ka tapa, na mitte a kipan amaute paimang sakken; pilna hoih leh ngentelna kem gige in;
Huchi in na kha ading in hinna ahi ding ua, na ngawng ading in kilawmna.
Huchi in bittak in na lampi ah na pai ding a, na khe a kisui kei ding hi.
Na lup chiang in, na lau kei dia: ahi, na lum ding a, na ihmut a lim ding.
Lauguihna kihta ken, a hongpai chiang in, giloute hihgawpna leng lau sam ken:
na muanpi ahi sin ngal a, na khe thang a awklou ding in a veng ding hi.
A mudingte a kipan thil hoih it ken, hih ding a na khut thilhihtheihna a omlai in.
Na invengte kiang ah, na kiang a na neih lai in, pai inla, hong nawn in, huchi in zingsang chiang in k’on pe ding, chi ken.
Na invengte siatna ding gilou ngaihtuah ken, na kiang ah bittak in a teng chih thei in.
A ziak bei in mi toh kina ken, gilou bangmah na tung a ahihkei leh.
Hiamgamna mi eng ken, a lampite lak a bangmah tel ken.
Kilawmlou lah
hamsia migiloute inn ah a om; himahleh mi diktatte tenna a vualzawl hi.
Aman nuihsanhatte a nuihsana, himahleh kingainiamte kiang ah hehpihna a pia hi.
Mi pil in thupina gou a luah ding; himahleh zumna mihaite kaisanna ahi ding hi.
Tate aw, pa hilhna za un, theihsiam na thei ding in limsak un:
Thuginpi hoih k’on pe ngal a; ka dan taisan kei un.
Ka pa ding in tapa ka hi a, ka nu mitmuh a nunnem leh ithuai pen ka hi.
Huan a hon sinsak a, ka kiang ah, na lungtang in ka thute lenden hen; ka thupiakte zui inla, huchi in hing in:
Pilna nei in, theihsiamna nei in: mangngilh ken, ka kam a thute a kipan lunglel ken:
Huai mangngilh kenla, nang a honhawi ding a; amah it inla, aman a honkem ding hi.
Pilna thil pipen ahi; huaiziak in pilna la in: ahi, na muhsa tengteng toh theihsiamna la in.
Amah pahtawi inla, a man nang hon kaisangsak ding: pahtawina a hontun dia, amah na kawi lai in.
Na lu ading in kilawmna kizepna a honpe dia: kilawmna lallukhu nang a honpe ding hi.
Aw ka tapa, ka gente za inla, sang in; huchi in na damsung kumte a tam ding hi.
Pilna lampi ah k’on kisinsakta a; lampi tangte ah k’on pita hi.
Na pai chiang in, na kalsuante haksa in a omkei dia; na tai leh, na kisui puk kei ding.
Hilhna kiptak in len in; paisak ken: amah vom in; amah lah na hinna ahi ngal a.
Migiloute lampi ah lut ken, gilou mite lampi ah pai ken.
Pel khia inla, a kiang ah paiken; kiheisan inla, pai vengveng in.
Poi a khoih kei ngal uleh, a ihmu ngal kei ua; kuahiam a puksak kei uleh, a ihmutna uh lakmang in a om hi.
Gitlouhna tanghou lah a ne ngal ua, hiamgamna uain a dawn uhi.
Himahleh mi diktatte lampi khovak tung bang ahi, sunlaitak a ni bang a tangpha semsem.
Migiloute lampi khomial bang ahi: a kisuihna uh a theikei uhi.
Ka tapa, ka thute limsak in; ka gente ah na bildoh in.
Na mitte a kipan amaute lamang ken; na lungtang lak ah vom in.
Amau mute ading in hinna ahi ngal ua, a sa uh ading in damna.
Thanopna tengteng toh na lungtang kem in; huai a kipan lah hinna tuinakte a luang ngal a.
Nang a kipan kam hoihlou koihmang inla, nang a kipan in muk kilawmloute gamlapi ah koih in.
Na mitte’n tangtak in en uhenla, na etna na ma ah tang hen.
Na khe lampi pheisak inla, huan na lampi tengteng hihkip in omsak in.
Na khut taklam hiam veilam hiam ah pial ken: gilou lampi ah paiken.
Ka tapa, ka pilna limsak in; ka theihsiamna na bildoh in:
Ngentelna na vom theih a, na mukte’n theihna a kep theihna ding un.
Numei lamdang mukte’n lah khuaizu a tak khesak ngal a, a kam sathau sang in a nal zaw:
Himahleh a tawpna nanung gamsai bang in a kha a, namsau hiamtuah bang in a hiam hi.
A khete sihna lam ah a paisuk a; a kalsuante’n Sheol zuan in a len chinten;
Huchi in hinna lampi phei a mu kei hi: a lampite a kipkei a, aman a theikei hi.
Huaiziak in tuin, ka tapate, hon ngaikhia unla, ka kam a thute a kipan pai mang kei un.
Amah a kipan in na lampi gamlapi ah suanmang in, a inn kongkhak nai ah hongpai ken:
Huchilou in zaw midangte kiang ah na zahtakhuaina na pe kha ding a, na kumte gilou kiang ah:
Huchilou in zaw na hatna in mikhualte a vah kha ding ua, gamdang mi inn ah na sepgimnate a om kha ding;
Huan, na sa leh na pumpi hihgawp a a omlai in na tawpna nanung ah na sun kha ding:
Huchi in, hilhna za nuamlou hina tel ing e, ka lungtang in salhna na musit natel e, na chi kha ding;
Hon sinsakmite aw ka mangkei a, kei honhilhte lam leng ka bil in ka na dohkei:
Omkhawmte leh kikhawmpite lak ah gilou tengteng ah siatna ka na hita mahmah hi.
Nangmah tuibem a kipan tuite dawn in, nangmah tuileh a kipan tuiluang laite.
Na tuinakneite sukthanghuai gawp a om ding hia, kongzingte ah na luite?
Nangmah ading kia hi uhenla, nang kiang a mikhualte ding hilou in.
Na tuikhuk vualzawl in om hen; huan na tuailai zi ah kipak in.
Deihhuai sazukpi leh heksiam sakhipi bang. A itna leh ngaihnatna in chiklaipeuh in leng nang hon lungkimsak gige hen; huan a itna a vak in om gige in.
Bangziak in ahia, ka tapa, numei lamdang vak a om a, mikhual ang va kawi ding na hia?
Mihing lampite lah
Giloute amah thulimlouhnate’n aman ding a, a khelhna guite a kan in a om ding hi.
Hilhna taksap ziak in a si ding a; a haina thupina ah a paimang ding hi.
Ka tapa, na inveng adia mawh khu dia na din leh, mikhual ading a na khut na kichiam leh,
Na kam a thute a awk na hih a, na kam a thute a mat na hihleh,
Tuin hiai hih in, ka tapa, nang leh nang ki honkhia in, na inveng khut sung ah na om chih thei in; kuan in, nang leh nang kiniamkhiak inla, na inveng va ngen ngutngut in.
Na mitte ihmusak kenla, na mitvunte leng lususak sam ken.
Gamvakpa khut a sakhipi bang leh thangkampa khut a vasa bang in ki honkhia in.
Miksi kiang ah hoh in, nang thadah; a lampite ngaihtuah inla, pil in:
Hausa, heutu, hiam vaihawmmi, neilou in,
Nipi chiang in a an a sutuah ua, pawltak chiang in a an a kaikhawm hi.
Bang tan ihmu ding na hia, aw thadah? Na ihmutna a kipan chikchiang a thou ding na hia?
Neukha ihmut lai, neukha lusuk, ihmu ding a neukha khutte khep:
Huchi in na gentheihna guta bang in a hongpai dia, huan na taksapna mi kigalvan bang in.
Mi phatuamlou, migilou; kam kiuangsak toh a vak a;
A mitte in chiamtehna a bawl a, a khete in thu a gen a, a khutzungte in chiamtehna a bawl;
A lungtang sung ah hoihlouhna a om a, gilou a gel gige; kilemlouhna a tuh naknak hi.
Huaiziak in a tuahsiatna thakhat in a hongtung dia; thakhat a kekgawp in, hihdamna bei in a om ding hi.
Toupa’n a muhdah thil guk a om a; ahi, amah adia kihhuai sagih a om hi:
Mit ki uangsakte,
lei zuauthei,
mi hoih sisan suah khutte;
Ngaihtuahna gilou ngaihtuah lungtang,
siatna hih ding a kintaite;
Zuau thugen palai taklou,
leh unaute lak a kilemlouhna tuh.
Ka tapa, na pa thupiak zui in, huan na nu dan mangngilh ken:
Na lungtang tung ah vial gige inla, na ngawng kim ah gak in.
Na vak chiang in, nang a honpi ding: na ihmut chiang in, nang a honveng ding hi; huan na khanloh chiang in, nang a hon houpih ding.
Thupiak lah khawnvak ahi ngal a: huan dan vakna ahi; huchi in hilhna taihilhna hinna lampi ahi:
Numei gilou a kipan leh mikhual lei maitang phatna a kipan in nang honkem ding hi.
Na lungtang in a kilawmna lunggulh ken; a mitvunte in nang hon man kei hen.
Numei kizuaknu ziak in pasal tanghou them a mat in a om hi: huchi in angkawmnu’n hinna manpha a zongsek hi.
Mi’n a angsung ah mei a la thei diam, a puante a kangkei diam?
Ahihkeileh mi suangkuangthei sa tung ah a vak thei diam, a khete a kang kei diam?
Huchibang in kuapeuh invengte zi zuan; kuapeuh amah khoih gawtlouh a omkei ding.
Guta in a gilkial ziak a a lunggulhna taisak ding kia a a guk leh mite’n guta a musit kei uhi.
Himahleh muh a a om leh, a zah sagih in adin ding; a inn a van tengteng a pe ding hi.
Kuapeuh angkawm theihsiamna bei ahi: amah kha hihse ding a a hih ahi.
Liamnate leh zumhuaite a mu ding; huan a zahpihhuaina nulmang ahi kei ding.
Mullitna lah mi thangpaihna ahi ngal a; huchi in phulak ni chiang in a hawikei ding hi.
Tatna a limsak kei ding a; thilpiak tampi pe lechin leng, lungdam in a omkei ding hi.
Ka tapa, ka thute kem in, na kiang ah ka thupiakte kholkhawm in;
Ka thupiakte kem inla hing in; huan ka dan na mittang bang in
Na khutzungte tung ah vial inla; na lungtang suangpek tung ah gelh in.
Pilna kiang ah, ka sanggamnu na hi, chi inla, theihsiamna na tanaunu chi in:
Numei lamdang a kipan nang a honkep theihna ding un, a thute a maitangphatnu mikhual a kipan.
Ka inn tohlet apan ka dak khia a, tohlet vang kal ah ka en paisuak a;
Huan mi mawlte lak ah ka en a, tuailaite lak ah ka theikak a, tangval theihsiamna beipa,
A omna ning chin a kongzing a paisuak a, a inn lam zuan a pai zel pa;
Khomui in, nitaklam in, zan mial bikbek leh khomial ah.
Ngai in, numei khat, kizuak puansilh silh, lungtang kiva in a kituahpih a.
Amah ahi lawlaw a, a tum tuntun a; a khe a inn ah a om ngeikei:
Kongzing a omton a om a, mun liante a a omton a om a, ning chiteng a bukzel hi.
Huchi in amah a manta a, amah a tawpta a, zummoh maitang toh in a kiang ah:
Lemna kithoihnate ka kiang ah a om; tuni in ka thuchiamte ka peta hi,
Huaiziak in nang tuak ding in ka hong paikhia a, na mel thanuamtak a zong ding in, k’on muta hi.
Ka tutna nuam pialkhang phah zehoihte a zep, ka phah khinta, Aigupta khau puangialte toh.
Ka lupna murra, aloe, leh sinamon in ka namtui sakta hi.
Hongpai in, zingsang matan i itna dimset i la ding; itna in i kilungmuan tuah ding.
Ka pasal lah inn ah a om ngalkeia, khual gamla ah a zin hi:
Sum ip a kitawia; kha a lik chian inn ah a hongpai ding, a chi hi.
A thugen siamna in amah a kipesakta a, a muk a maitang phatnate in amah a sawlmangta hi.
Amah a zuipaha, gohdinga bawngtal a pai bang in, leh mihai bawlhoihna dia sikkhau khihmi bang in;
Thal in a sin a kap pailet tan; thanglam a vasa a kintat bang in, huai tuh a hinna gun a hih a theikei hi.
Tuin, ka tapate, huaiziak in hon ngaikhia un, ka kam a thute limsak un.
Na lungtang amah lampi lam ah awn kei henla, lampite lam ah paimang kei hen.
Amah lah tampi liamsa in a pai lumletta a: ahi, a thahsate mi hat tampi ahi uh.
A inn Sheol zotna lampi ahi, sihna dantante zuan a suk pai.
Pilna a kikou in, theihsiamna in a aw a suah kei maw?
Lampi a mun sangte tung ah,
lampite kisutna ah, ading a;
Kongpite biang ah, khopi lutna ah,
kongkhakte a pailutna ah,
nakpi’n a kikou hi:
Noute, aw mite, ka sam:
huan ka aw mite tapa kiang ah ahi.
Aw nou mi mawlt, kivensiamna
theisiam un; nou mihaite,
lungtang theisiam nei un.
Za un, thil hoihpente gen ding ka hi ngal a;
huan ka mukte honna thildikte ahi ding hi.
Ka kam in thutak gen ding
ahi ngal a; gitlouhna ka muk
a ding in kihhuai hi.
Ka kam a thute teng diktatna
ah a om; huaite ah bangmah
a diklou a omkei hi.
A theisiam kuapeuh ading in
a kichian a, theihna mu
amaute ading in a dik hi.
Ka hilhna sang unla,
dangka hilou in; dangkaeng
hoihpen sang in theihna.
Rubi suang sang in pilna
a hoihzaw hi; huan deihhuai
thilte tengteng huai toh
tehpih theih ahi kei uh.
Kei pilna in kivensiamna ka
tenna ding in ka bawl a, theihna leh theihkakna ka mu hi.
ding ahi; kisaktheihna leh,
kiotsakna, gilou lampi leh
kam hoihlou, ka hua hi.
Thupha kei a ahi, theihna hoih:
theihsiamna leh hatna ka nei hi.
Kei ziak in kumpipate’n vai a
hawm ua, lalte’n dikna thu a pia uh.
Kei ziak in lalte’n vai a hawm
ua, miliante leh lei a
vaihawmte tengteng in.
Kei hon itte amau ka it a;
kuapeuh honzong in honmu hi.
Hauhna leh zahna ka kiang
ah a om; ahi, sawtdaih
hauhna leh diktatna toh.
Ka gah dangkaeng sang in
a hoihzaw, ahi, dangkaeng
hoih sang in; ka sum
muhna dangka hoihpen sang in.
Diktatna lampi ka zui a,
vaihawmna lampite lak ah:
Kei hon itte van ka luahsak
theih a, a goubawm uh
ka dimsak theihna ding in.
Toupa’n a lampi kipattung in
a honnei a, nidang a a thilhihte ma in.
Tangtawn a kipan,
a tung a kipan leh lei omma apan koih kip ka hi.
Thuknate a omlouh lai in,
lakkhiak in ka om a; luikhuk tui a dimte a omlouh lai un.
Mualte a omkip ma in, tangte
omma in lakkhiak in ka om:
lei leh gam bawlkhiak ahihma in,
khovel leivui a bawl nailouh lai in.
Vante a hihkip lai in, huai ah ka om:
tui thuk maikaih a tehna a koih lai in:
Tung a vante a bawlkip lai in:
tui thukte tuikhukte a honghat lai un:
Tuipi kiang a a gi a piaklai in,
huchi a tuite’n a thupiak tung a a tatlek louhna ding un:
lei suangphumte a chiamteh lai in:
Huailai in a kiang ah ka om,
nasemmi heutu bang in:
huan niteng in a kipahna ka hi a,
a ma a kipak gige in;
A ten theihna lei ah; ka kipahna
mite tapate kiang ah a om hi.
Huaiziak in tuin, ka tapate, hon
ngaikhia unla: ka lampite zui mite’n nuam a sa ngal ua.
Hilhna za in pil unla, nial kei un.
Mi kei honza in nuam a sa hi,
niteng a ka kongpi leh ka
kongkhak khuamte a ngak in.
Kuapeuh honmu in hinna a mu ua,
Himahleh kuapeuh ka tung a
thil hihkhial in amah kha
a hihdik kei hi: kei hon
hawte’n sihna a it uhi.
Pilna in a inn a lamkhin a, a khuam sagihte a phut hi:
A gante a gouta a: a uain leng a helta hi; a dohkan leng a bawlkhinta hi.
A nungakte a sawlkhe ta a, khopi munsang penpente tung ah a kikou a,
Mi mawl peuhmah, hiai lam ah hong kihei hen: theihsiamna neilou amah tungtang ahihleh, aman a kiang ah,
Hong in, ka tanghou ne unla, ka helsa ka uain dawn un, a chi hi.
Paikhia unla, nou mi mawlte, hing un; theihsiamna lampi ah pai un.
Musitmi bawlhoih in amah ading in zumhuaina a mu: huan kuapeuh migilou sal in amah ading in minsiatna a mu.
Musitmi sal dah in, nang a hon hawkha ding: mi pil sal in, huchi in nang a hon it ding.
Mi pil kiang ah hilhna pe lechin, a pilzaw lai ding a: mi diktat sinsak in,
Kei ziak in na nite lah hihtam ahi ding a, na damsung kumte lah hihpun ahi ding hi.
Na pil leh, nangmah adia pil na hi. Huan mi na muhsit leh, nang kia’n na paw ding hi.
Numei hai a aphuai; mimawl ahi a, bangmah a theikei.
Huan a inn kongkhak ah a tu a, khopi munsangte a tutphah tung ah,
A vialpaite sam ding, a lampite ua paizelte,
Mi mawlte, hiailai ah hong kihei hen: huan amah theihsiamna neilou tungtang ahihleh, aman a kiang ah,
Tuigukte a khum a, a guk a tanghou nek a nuam hi, a chi.
Himahleh aman huai ah misite a om uh chih leh a mi sapte Sheol thuk ah a om uh chih a theikei hi.
Solomon paunakte.
Tapa pil in pa kipak a bawl a:
Himahleh tapa hai a nu gikna ahi.
Gitlouhna sumte’n bangmah a lohtak kei:
Himahleh diktatna in sihna a kipan a tankhia hi.
Himahleh migilou a kipan a tankhia hi.
Khut ze awlmi a hong genthei a:
Himahleh mi thanuam khut in hauhsakna a bawl hi.
Nipi lai a lakhawmpa tapa pil ahi: himahleh pawltak hun a ihmu zumhuai omsak tapa ahi.
Midiktat lu tung ah vualzawlnate a om a: Himahleh gilou kam hiamgamna in a tuam hi.
Midik theihgigena a nuam a: himahleh Migilou min a muat mang ding.
Lungtang pilin thupiakte a sang ding a: himahleh mihai haiham a puk ding.
Tangtaka pai hoihtak in a pai a: himahleh a lampite kilawmlousak theih in a om ding hi.
A mit a chiamtehna bawl in lungkham na a omsak a; himahleh mihai haiham a puk ding.
Midiktat kam hinna tuikhuk ahi: himahleh hiamgamna in gilou kam a tuam hi.
Huatna in kidouna a tokthou a, himahleh itna in tatlekna tengteng a khuh hi.
Theihkak theihna neimi muk ah pilna muh in a om: himahleh chiang theihsiamna neilou mi nungzang ading ahi.
Mipilte’n theihna a khol khawm ua: himahleh mihai kamin siatna a naih.
Mihausa hauhsakna a khopi muanhuai ahi: mi genthei siatna a gentheih uh ahi.
Midiktat sepgimna in hinna a zuan a; gilou punna in khelhna lam.
Bawlhoihna limsak hinna lampi ah a om a: himahleh salhna donlou a paikhial hi.
Huatna sel zuautheimukte a kipan ahi a; huan mi gensiatna gen mihai ahi.
Thu tampite ah tatlekna a omlou kei a: himahleh a mukte thuzoh in piltak in a hih hi.
Midiktat lei dangka hoihpen bang ahi: migilou lungtang a thamatna neuchik ahi.
Midiktat mukte’n mi tampi a vak a: himahleh mihaite theihsiamna taksap ziak in a si uh.
Mihai ading in gitlouhna hih kisuk halhna bang ahi: huchibang in theisiam mi ading in pilna ahi.
Migilou launa, amah tung ah a hongtung ding: midiktat deihna phal in a om ding hi.
Pingpei a lenmang bang in, migilou a om nawn kei: himahleh mi diktat tangtawn suangphum ahi.
Zuthuk in ha a suksiat bang in meikhu in mit a susia a, huchibang mah in amah sawlte ading in mi zongzaw a om hi.
Midiktat lametna kipahna ahi ding, himahleh migilou lametna a mangthang ding.
Midiktat suan mang ahi ngeikei ding: himahleh migilou gamsung ah a teng kei ding hi.
Midiktat kamin pilna a hontun a: himahleh lei ginalou satkhiak in a om ding.
Midiktat mukte’n laktuak bang ahia a thei a, himahleh migilou kam in ginatlouhna a gen hi.
Bukna diklou
Kisaktheihna a hongpai chiang in, zumna a hongpai; himahleh mi kiniamkhiakte kiang ah pilna a om hi.
Mitangte dikna in amau a pi ding, himahleh mi lepchiahte hoihlouhna in amau ahihse ding hi.
Thangpaih ni’n hauhsak a phatuam kei, himahleh diktatna in sihna a kipan a hunkhia hi.
Mi hoihkim diktatna in a lampi a seksak dia; himahleh migilou a gitlouhna ah a puk ding hi.
Mitangte diktatna in amau a suaktasak; himahleh lepchiahtak a hihte amau poikhoihna a lak in a om ding uhi.
Migilou a sih chiang in, a lametna a mangthang ding: huan thulimlouhna lametna a mangthang hi.
Midiktat buaina lak a kipan suahtaksak in a om a, a mun ah migilou a hongpai hi.
A kam a Pathian limsaklou mi’n a inveng a hihsia a: himahleh theihna ziak in mi diktat suahtaksak in a om hi.
Midiktat a lamzan chiang in, khopi a kipak a; gilou a manthat chiang in, kikouna a om hi.
Mitang vualzawlna ziak in khopi tawisang in a om: himahleh migilou kam a hihsiat in a om hi.
Kuapeuh a inveng musit pilna bei ahi: himahleh theisiam mi a daidide hi.
Tangthu genmi bang a vialvak in thuguk a taklang: himahleh lungsim muanhuai in thu a im hi.
Kipina pil omlouhna mun ah mite a puk ua: himahleh thupha gen tampi omna ah bitna om hi.
Kuapeuh mikhual adia a mawhkhu dia ding in na a sa ding, himahleh mawhkhu dia dinna hua a muang hi.
Numei deihhuai in zahtakhuaina a nei gige: huan pasal hatte’n hauhsakna a nei gige hi.
Mi chingthei in amah kha ading in a hih hoih a: himahleh migilou in amah sa a hihbuai hi.
Migilou in loh gina sanglou a: himahleh diktatna tuh in kipahman muan a nei hi.
Kuapeuh diktatna ading kip in hinna a tung ding: huan kuapeuh gilou delh in amah sihna ding in a hih ahi.
A lungtang ua hoihloute
Khut kilen mahle uh, migilou gawtlouh in a omkei ding: himahleh diktat chi suahtaksak in a om ding hi.
Vok nak sung a dangkaeng suang bang in, huchibang in numei melhoih ngentel na neilou ahi.
Midiktat deihlam hoih kia ahi a: himahleh migilou lametna thangpaihna ahi.
A thehzak a om a, a pung semsem hi; a kilawm khenga it a om a, himahleh taksap lam a manoh lel hi.
Misiam thausak in a om ding, huan kuapeuh tuibuak amah leng tui buah in a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh buh leh bal it, mite’n amah a hamsiat ding uh: himahleh kuapeuh a zuak luzang ah vualzawlna a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh hoih thanuamtak a zong in deihsak na a zong: himahleh kuapeuh siatna zong, amah tung ah a hongtung ding hi.
Kuapeuh a hauhsak na muang a puk ding: himahleh mi diktat nah hing bang in a lun ding hi.
Kuapeuh amah in hihbuai in huih a luah ding: huan mihai lungtang pil sikha in a om ding hi.
Mi diktat gah hinna sing ahi; kuapeuh a pil in khate a man hi.
Ngai in, mi diktatte lei ah thuk in a om ding. Migilou leh mikhial kinak thuksem nan chia!
Kuapeuh bawlhoihna it in theih na a it hi: himahleh kuapeuh salhna hua a hai ahi.
Mi hoih in
Gitlouhna in mi a phutkip kei ding: himahleh diktatna zung a kisuan ngeikei ding.
Numei hoih a pasal ading in lallukhu ahi: himahleh zumhuai bawl nu a guhte ah muat na bang ahi.
Mi diktat ngaihtuahna a dik a: himahleh migilou thute khemna ahi.
Migilou thute sisan suah dia bukna ahi a: himahleh mitang kam in amau a suaktasak ding hi.
Migiloute zoh in a om ua, a omkei uh: himahleh mi diktatte inn ading ding hi.
Mihing a pilna bangbang a phat in a om ding: himahleh kuapeuh lungtang hoihlou muhsit in a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh amah kingai thupi a, tanghou neilou mi sang in kuapeuh zahtak zeka om a sikha neimi a hoih zaw.
Mi diktat in a gan hinna a limsak hi: himahleh migilou chitna nemte a khel mahmah hi.
Kuapeuh a gam leilet in tanghou tampi a nei ding: himahleh mi bangmahlou nungdelh mi theihsiam na bei ahi.
Migilou in migiloute len a deih a: himahleh mi diktatte zung in gah a suang hi.
Mukte taklekna ah migilou ading in thang a om a: himahleh mi diktat buaina a kipan a hong paikhe ding.
