A muk gah in mi hoih tai in a om ding a: huan mihing khut a hihte a kiang a piak ahi ding.
Mihai lampi amah mit ah a dik a; himahleh kuapeuh a pil in thupha a ngaikhia hi.
Mihai buaina tu mahmah a theih ahi: himahleh mi pilvang in zahlak na a sel hi.
Kuapeuh thutak gen in diktat na a ensak a, himahleh palai zuau in khemna.
Namsau sut bang a pilvanglou tak a pau a om a: himahleh mi pil lei damna ahi.
Thutak lei tangtawn in hihkip in a om ding: himahleh lei zuauthei zaw mitphiat kal khat ading lel ahi.
Gilou thilgelte lungtang ah khemna a om: himahleh lemna thupha gente kiang ah nuam na a om hi.
Mi diktatte tung ah siatna a hongtung kei dia: himahleh migilou gilou in a dim ding.
Muk zuautheite
Mi pilvang in theihna a sel a: himahleh mihai lungtang in haina a phuang khia.
Mi thanuam khut in vaihawm na a paw dia: himahleh mi thadah sep ding nuai a koih in a om ding hi.
Mi lungtang gikna in a kunsak a; himahleh thu hoih in a kipaksak hi.
Mi diktat a inveng ading in pitu ahi a: himahleh migilou lampi in a maute a paikhial sak hi.
Mi thadah in a gamvakna a a matsa nangawn a em ngapkei a: himahleh mi thanuam vanneihte a manpha hi.
Diktatna lampi ah hinna a om; huai a lampi ah sih na a omkei hi.
Tapa pil in a pa hilhna a za a: himahleh musittu in a salhna a zakei hi.
Min a kam gah in hoih a ne ding hi: himahleh lepchiahmi kha in hiamgamna a ne ding hi.
Kuapeuh a kam veng in a hinna a vom a: himahleh kuapeuh a mukte hongza in siatna a nei ding hi.
Thadah kha in a deih a, bangmah a neikei: himahleh thanuam kha thausak in a om ding hi.
Midiktat in zuau a hua: himahleh migilou huathuai ahia, zumna a tung sek hi.
Lampi a mitang amah diktatna in a veng: himahleh mikhial zaw gitlouhna in a man hi.
Amah leh amah hausa a kibawl a om, himahleh bangmah a neikei: amah leh amah genthei a kibawl a om, himahleh hauhsakna thupi a nei hi.
Mihing hinna tatman a hauhsakna ahi: himahleh genthei in vaulauna a za kei hi.
Mi diktat vakna a kipak a: himahleh migilou khawnvak a kithat ding.
Kisaktheih ziak in kiselna kia a hong a: himahleh hoihtak a thuhilh pilna ahi.
Bangmahlou a hauhsakna muh a kiam ding: himahleh sepgimna ziak a lakkhawm a pung ding hi.
Lametna halsawt in lungtang a china sak a: himahleh deih a hongtun chiang in, hinna sing ahi.
Kuapeuh thu musit in a tung ah siatna a tun hi: himahleh kuapeuh thupiak kihta kipahman piak in a om ding.
Mi pil dan hinna tuikhuk ahi, sihna thangte a kipan a paimangna ding.
Theihsiamna hoih in deihsakna a pia a: himahleh lepchiah mi lampi a phok hi.
Mi pilvang peuhmah in theihna toh in na a sem a: himahleh mihai in diklouhna a theh zak.
Sawltak gilou hoihlou ah a puk a: himahleh palai muanhuai damna ahi.
Gentheihna leh zumna bawlhoihna nial kiang ah a om dia: himahleh salhna limsak zahtak in a om ding.
Deih hih pichin kha ading in a nuam a: himahleh gilou a kipan paimang mihaite ading in kihhuai ahi.
Mipilte toh ton in, huchi in na pil ding: himahleh mihaite kithuahpih in huaiziak in a thuak ding.
Hoihlou in mikhialte a delh a: himahleh midiktat hoih a thuk in a om ding hi.
Mi hoih in gouluah a ta leh tute kiang ah a nutsiat; mikhial hauhsakna mi diktat adia kholkhawm in a om hi.
Genthei loukhohna ah an tampi a om: himahleh diklouhna ziak a suksiat a om hi.
Kuapeuh chiang zanglou in a tapa a mudah a: himahleh amah it in amah thanuamtak in a sawi zel hi.
Mi diktat in a kha lungkimna tan in a ne a: himahleh migilou gilpi a tasam ding.
Numei pil in innte a lam a: himahleh mihai in amah khut in a phel sia.
A tang a gamta mi’n
Mihai kamsung ah kisaktheihna chiang a om: himahleh mi pil mukte’n huaite a hawi ding hi.
Bawngtalte omlouhna ah, anpiakna kuang a siang a: himahleh bawngtal hatna ziak in nakpi a punna a om hi.
Theihpih ginom in zuau a genkei ding: himahleh theihpih zuauthei in zuau a gen hi.
Musittu in pilna a zong a, a mu kei hi: himahleh theihsiamna nei ading in theihna a baih hi.
Mihai a omna ah lut in, amah ah theihna mukte na mu kei ding hi.
Mi pilvang pilna a lampi theihsiam ahi a: himahleh mihaite haina khemna ahi.
Mihai in khelhna a chiamnuihbawl a: himahleh mi tangte lak ah hoih deihna a om hi.
Lungtang in amah khatna a thei a; huan mikhual in a nuamsakna a tokbuai kei hi.
Migiloute inn suksiat in a om ding: himahleh mitang biakbuk a pha ding hi.
Mihing adia lampi dik a kilawm a om a, himahleh huai tawpna sihna lampite ahi.
Lungtang nuihna nangawn lungkhamna ahi a; huan vualnopna tawpna gikna ahi.
Lungtang a nungtolhmi amah lampite a dimsak in a om ding: huan mi hoih amah mah a kipan a hih lungkim in a om ding hi.
Mi mawl in thuchih a um a: himahleh mi pilvang in a paina hoihtak in a en hi.
Mi pil in a kihta a, gilou a kipan a paimang: himahleh mihai in musittakin a kipua a, a kimuang hi.
Kuapeuh hehbaih haitak in a gamta ding: huan ngaihtuah giloumi huat in a om hi.
Mimawl in haina a luah ding: himahleh mipilvang theihna khuksak in a om ding.
Hoih mai ah hoihlou a kun a; huan diktat kongpite ah gilou a kun hi.
Genthei amah inveng mahmah muhdah in a om: himahleh hausa in lawm tampi a nei hi.
A inveng musit in thil a hihkhial a: himahleh mi genthei hehpih, aman nuam a sa hi.
Hoihlou ngaihtuahte a paikhial kei umaw? Himahleh chitna leh thutak hoih ngaihtuah kiang ah a om ding hi.
Sepgimna tengteng ah phattuamna a om: himahleh mukte houlimna taksapna lam kia ah a pai hi.
Mipilte a hauhsakna ua theih in a om uhi: himahleh mihaite a haina ua theih in a om uhi.
Theihpih dik in khate a suaktasaka: himahleh zuaugen in khemna a omsak hi.
Mipi tamna ah kumpipa thupina a om: himahleh mipite omlouhna lal siatna ahi.
Kuapeuh a hehhak theihsiamna thupi a kipan ahi: himahleh kuapeuh lungtom in haina a tawisang hi.
Lungtang hoih sa adia hinna ahi: himahleh hazatna guhte muatna ahi.
Kuapeuh genthei nuaisiah in a Bawlpa simmawh ahi: himahleh kuapeuh tasam tung a chitna nei in amah a zahtak hi.
Migilou a gitlouh hihna a paihlut in a om a: himahleh mi diktat in a sihna ah lametna a nei hi.
Theihsiamna nei lungtang ah pilna a khawl a: himahleh mihaite sunglam pang a om kitheihsak in a om hi.
Diktatna in nam a tawisang a: himahleh khelhna mi kuapeuh ading in zahlakna ahi.
Sikha piltak a gamta lam ah kumpipa deihsakna a om a: himahleh zumna omsak tung ah a thangpaihna a om hi.
Dawnna nem in thangpaihna a hei mang a: himahleh thu sia in hehna a tokthou hi.
Mi pil lei in theihna a gen dik a: himahleh mihaite kam in haina a sungkhia hi.
Lei damthei hinna sing ahi: himahleh huai a kilawmlouhna kha sukkhapna ahi.
Mihai in a pa bawlhoihna a musit a: himahleh kuapeuh salhna limsak in pilvanna a mu hi.
Midiktat inn ah gou tampi a om: himahleh migilou summuhna buaina ahi.
Mi pil mukte’n theihna a phalh a: himahleh mihai lungtang in huchibang in a hih kei hi.
Migilou kithoihna
Migilou lampi
Lampi mangngilhmi ading in bawlhoihna haksatak a om a: huan kuapeuh taihilhna mudah a si ding hi.
Sheol leh Abaddon
Musitmi’n salh a om nuam a sa kei: mi pil kiang a zuan kei ding hi.
Lungtang nuam in mel kipak a bawl a: himahleh lungtang dahna ziak in lungsim a puakkham hi.
Theihsiamna nei lungtang in theihna a zong: himahleh mihaite kam haina in a kivak hi.
Gimthuak nite tengteng hoihlou ahi: himahleh kuapeuh lungtang kipak in Ankuangluina a nei gige hi.
Tawmchik a hoihzaw
Itna omna a anteh louhing nekding a hoihzaw, bawngtal thau leh huai a muhdahna sang in.
Mi thangpai in kinialna a tokthou a: himahleh kuapeuh hehhak in kinakna a damsak hi.
Thadah lampi ling daikalh bang ahi: himahleh mitang lampi lamlian a bawl ahi.
Tapa pil in pa kipak a bawl a: himahleh mihai in a nu a musit hi.
Pilna bei ading in haina nuamsakna ahi: himahleh theisiam mi’n a paina a tangsak hi.
Thupha omlouhna ah, thiltupte a vuaksuak: himahleh thupha gen tamna ah hihkip in a om uh.
A kam a dawnna ah mi’n nuamsakna a nei: huan a huntak a thugen hoih hina mah e:
Mi pil ading in hinna lampi a paitou a, nuailama Sheol a kipan a pai mang theihna ding in.
Lunggel giloute
Punna a duhgawl in amah inn a hihbuai a: himahleh kuapeuh thilpiak hua a hing ding.
Mi diktat lungtang in dawng ding in a kisin a: himahleh migilou kam in thil hoihlou a sungkhia hi.
Mitte vakna in lungtang a kipaksak a: huan tanchinhoih in guhte a thausak hi.
Hinna taihilhnate ngaikhia bil mipilte lak ah a om gige ding.
Kuapeuh bawlhoihna nial in amah kha a musit ahi: Himahleh kuapeuh taihilhna ngaikhia in theihsiamna a mu hi.
Lungtang kisakkholna mihing a ahi: himahleh lei dawnna
Mihing lampi tengteng amah mit ah a siang a: himahleh
Michih lungtang kisathei
Chitna leh thutak in thulimlouhna suksiang ahi: huan
Mihing lampite’n
Diktatna toh tawmchik a hoihzaw, diklouhna toh summuhna thupi sang in.
Mihing lungtang in a lampi a ngaihtuah a: himahleh
Kumpipa muk ah Pathian thu a om: a kam in vaihawmnate ah a talek kei ding hi.
Bukna dik leh tehna dik
Kumpipate ading in gilou hih kihhuai ahi: mangtutphah lah diktatna a hihkip ahi ngal a.
Muk diktatte kumpipate kipahna ahi; huan thudik gente a it uhi.
Kumpipa thangpaihna sihna sawltakte bang ahi: himahleh mi pil in a hih lungdam ding hi.
Kumpipa melvakna ah hinna a om; huan a deihsakna vuah nanung meipi bang ahi.
Pilna muh dangkaeng sang in nak hoihzawk hina e: ahi, theihsiamna muh dangka sang a telzawk ding ahi.
Mitang lamlian hoihlou a kipan a paimang ahi: kuapeuh a lampi kem in a kha a hawi hi.
Kisaktheihna siatna ma ah a pai a, huan lungsim kiuangsak pukna ma ah.
Gentheite toh lungsim niamkhiak a om a hoihzaw, kisathei toh gallak hawm sang in.
Kuapeuh thu limsak in hoih a mu ding: huan kuapeuh
Lungtang pil pilvang a chi ding uh; huan muk khumna in sinsiamna a pungsak hi.
Theihsiamna neimi ading in hinna luikhuk ahi: himahleh mihaite bawlhoihna a haina uh ahi.
Mi pil lungtang in a kam a hilh a, huan a muk ah sinsiamna a behlap hi.
Thu kipahhuai khuaizu bang ahi, kha adia khum, guhte adia damna.
Mihing adia dik a kilawm lampi a om, himahleh huai tawpna sihna lampite ahi.
Nasem gim mi ankam limna in amah a di’n a semgim a: a gilkialna in huai a kipan a lunggulh ngal a.
Mi thulimlou in siatna a ngaihtuah: huan a muk ah meisa bang a om hi.
Mi kiuangsak in kinakna a thehzak a: huan huauhatmi in lawm bulte a khenzak hi.
Hiamgam mi’n a invengte a khem a, a hoihlou lam lampi ah a pi.
Kuapeuh a mitsi, thil hoihlou a ngaih ding ahi; kuapeuh a muk chih in hoihlou a hon tunsak nak hi.
Samkang zaw thupina lallukhu ahi, diktatna lampi ah muh ahi.
Kuapeuh hehhak mihat sang in a hoihzaw; huan kuapeuh a lungsim thuzoh khopi laksang in.
Angsung ah ai a kisan a; himahleh huai a hihpaisuakna zaw
Tanghou gaw a muanna toh a hoihzaw, inn kinakna a dim sang in.
Sikha piltak a hih in tapa zumhuaina omsak tung ah vai a hawm ding, huan unaute lak a goutanna ah tan a nei ding hi.
Huansiangna bel dangka ading ahi, huan meipi dangkaeng ading: himahleh
Hoihlou hihmi’n gilou mukte a limsaka; huan Zuauhatin siatna lei a bil a doh hi.
Kuapeuh genthei musit in amah bawlpa a simmawh hi; huan kuapeuh tuahsiatni a kipak gawtlouh in a omkei ding hi.
Naupangte’ naupangte mi upate lallukhu ahi uh; huan naupang thupina a pate uh ahi.
Thugen hoih mihai toh a kilawm kei: muk zuauthei lal toh a kilawm kei sem.
A nei mit ah thilpiak suangmantam bang ahi: koilam peuh a a kiheina ah, a lohching hi.
Kuapeuh tatlekna khuh in itna a zong hi: himahleh kuapeuh thubuai a nuamsa in lawmte a khendalh hi.
Theihsiamna neimi sung ah taina a lut thukzaw mihai sung a vuakna za khat sang in.
Mi hoihlou in helna kia a zong a; huaiziak in sawltak khel amah dou ding a sawl in a om ding hi.
Vompi a noute laksak a om in mi tuak hen, a haina a mihai sang in.
Kuapeuh hoih sik a gilou kipahman pia, a inn a kipan gilou a paimang kei ding.
Kinakna kipatna mi’n tui a khahkhiak bang ahi: buaiziak in kinakna a omma in, kiselna paisan in.
Kuapeuh gilou siamtangsak, kuapeuh mi diktat mawhpaih, amau gel
Huaiziak in pilna lei ding in mihai khut ah a man a om ahia, theihsiamna a neikei chih thei in?
Lawm in chiklaipeuh in a it gige a, huan vangtah ni ading in unau khat a piang hi.
Mi theihsiamna bei in khut a beng a, invengte ma ah mawhkhu ding in a hongom hi.
Kinakna deih in tatlekna a deih hi: kuapeuh a kongpi dom sang in siatna a zong hi.
Kuapeuh lungtang sia nei in hoih a mu kei: huan lei hoihlou nei siatna ah a puk hi.
Kuapeuh mihai suang in a lungkhamna ding in a suang a; huan mihaipa’n nuamsakna a neikei hi.
Lungtang nuamsa damdawi hoih ahi: himahleh lungsim puakkham in guhte a keusak.
Migilou in a angsung a kipan in thilpiak a lakhia a, vaihawmna lampi hei koisak ding in.
Theihsiamna neimi ma ah pilna a om: himahleh mihai mitte lei tawp ah a om hi.
Tapa hai a pa ading in lungkhamna ahi a, amah piangsaknu ading in khatna ahi.
Mi diktat gawt hiam milian thutak ziak a zep leng a hoihkei hi.
Kuapeuh theihna a neimi a kamsim thei hi: kuapeuh a theihsiamna nei lungsim tawldam in a om hi.
Mihai nangawn, a daih dide lai in, pil a ngaih ahi: a mukte a chih lai in, pilvang bang a theih ahi.
Kuapeuh kituamseh in amah deihlam a zong hi, huan pilna hoih tengteng tung ah a thangpai hi.
Theihsiamna ah mihai in kipahna a neikei, himahleh a lungtang a kitaklat theihna ding ahi.
Migilou a hong chiang in, muhsitna leng a hongpai a, Zahtaklouhna toh zumna a hongpai hi.
Mihing kam thute tuithukte bang ahi; pilna tuikhuk luangte bang ahi.
Migilou guptuam a hoih kei, vaihawmna a midiktat nawlkhin leng.
Mihai mukte kiselna ah a lut a, huan a kam in zepna a sam hi.
Mihai kam a siatna ahi, huan a mukte a kha ding a thang ahi uh.
Huauhatmi thute tanghou limtak bang a hi a, gil sungnungpen pen ah a tumsuk uhi.
A nasepna ze awl leng susemi ading in unau ahi.
Mi hau hauhsakna a khopi muan ahi, amah ngaihdan a kulhbang sang tak bang.
Siatna ma ah mihing lungtang a kiuangsak a, zahna ma ah kiniamkhiakna a pai hi.
Kuapeuh a zak ma a dawnna pia, amah ading in haina leh zumna ahi.
Mihing lungsim in a thuakgimna a pawzou a; himahleh lungsim puakkham kuan a thuakzou ding?
Mi pilvang lungtang in theihna a mu a; huan mi pil bil in theihna a zong hi.
Mihing thilpiak in amah ading in omna a bawl a, huan mi thupite ma ah amah a pi hi.
Kuapeuh a gen masa dik in a kilang phot a; himahleh invengte a hongpai a amah a zongkhia hi.
Aisan in kiselna a tawpsak a, huan mihatte kikal ah a khen hi.
Unau hih khasiat khopi muan sang in lak a haksa zaw: huan huchibang kiselna kulhpi sikchiangte ahi.
Mihing gilpi a kam a gah in a dim ding: a mukte punna a hih lungkim in a om ding hi.
Sihna leh hinna lei thilhihtheihna ah a om; huan huai itte’n huai gah a ne ding uh.
Kuapeuh zi mu in thil hoih a mu a,
Genthei in kamdam in a khemsek a: himahleh hausa in khauhtak in a dawng hi.
Kuapeuh lawm tampite bawl in amah siatna a hih a: himahleh unau sang a ginom zaw lawm khat a om hi.
Ginom a mi genthei, mihau a mukte kilawmlou gen leh mihai sang in a hoihzaw hi
Huailou in, kha theihna bei a a om ding a hoihkei; Huan kuapeuh a khe a mangang a khialnak hi.
Mihing haina in a lampi a hihsia a; huan a lungtang in
Hausakna in lawmte tampi a behlapa; himahleh mi genthei a lawma kipan khen in a om.
Theihpih taklou gawtlouh in a omkei ding; huan kuapeuh zuaugen a suakta kei ding.
Mi tampi in misiam deihsakna a ngen ding ua; huan michih thilpiakte pia ading in lawm ahi.
Mi genthei unaute tengteng in amah a hua ua; amah a kipan bangchi a gamla in ahia a lawmte a pai uh! Thute in amau a delh a, himahleh a paikhin uh.
Kuapeuh pilna mu in a kha a it a; kuapeuh theihsiamna kem in hoih a mu ding hi.
Theihpih taklou gawtlouh in a omkei ding a; kuapeuh zuaugen a mangthang ding.
Nuamtat, mihai ading in a kilawm kei a; sikha, lalte tung a vaihawm a kilawm kei sem hi.
Mihing ngentelna in amah a heh haksak a; huan a tatlekna paikan a thupina ahi.
Kumpipa thangpaihna humpinelkai humham bang ahi; himahleh a deihsakna loupa tung a daitui bang ahi.
Tapa hai a pa tuahsiatna ahi; huan zi hanhat a intung keh gige ahi.
Inn leh hauhsaknate nu leh pate a kipan gouluah ahi: himahleh zi pil
Thadahna nakpi a ihmutna ah a pai a; huan mi thadahin gilkial a thuak ding.
Kuapeuh thupiak zui in a kha a kem; himahleh kuapeuh a lampite a pilvang lou a si ding.
Kuapeuh genthei hehpihna nei in
Lametna a omlai in na tapa sawi in; huan a kah ziak in na kha in khawlsan mawk ken.
Nakpitak a thangpai min gawtna a thuak ding: amah na hutkhiak leh, huai tuh na hih kiknawn kul ding ahi ngal a.
Thupha za inla, hilhna sang in, na hinkhua nanung a na pil theihna ding in.
Mihing lungtang ah thugel tampi a om a; himahleh
Mihing deihthusam a migitna tehna ahi; huan mi genthei mizuauthei sang in a hoihzaw hi.
Mi thadah in kuangsung ah a khut a phum a, huchi in a kam ah huai a hontun nawn ngap kei hi.
Simmawhhat sat in, mi mawl in pilvang dan a sin ding; theihsiamna nei sal in, huchi in theihna a theisiam ding hi.
Kuapeuh a pa tung a hiamgam a, a nu delhmang, zumna omsak leh simmohna tun tapa ahi.
Theihna thute a kipan a lampial lel din, ka tapa, hilhna zak tawp in.
Theihpihmi phattuamna neilou in vaihawmna a simmawh: Huan migilou kam in thulimlouhna a nawmvalh hi.
Muhsit hatmi ading in vaihawmnate bawlkholhsa ahi, mihai nungzang ading in vuaknate.
Uain muhsit hat ahi a, zu khauh kilai hat ahi; kuapeuh huai a paikhial a pilkei hi.
Kumpipa kihtakhuaina humpinelkai humham bang ahi: kuapeuh amah hihheh in amah hinna siatna ding in thil a hihkhial hi.
Mihing ading in kinakna a kipan kidang koih zahtakhuaina ahi: himahleh mihai in kinakna a bawl ding hi.
Mi thadah in phavang in lei a letkei ding; huaiziak in pawltak chiang in a zong dia, bangmah a neikei ding hi.
Mihing lungtang ah thupha gel tui thuk bang ahi; himahleh theihsiamna nei min huai a suahkhe ding hi.
Mi tampi’n amah tung a siam mi a tuak ding: himahleh mi ginom kuan a mu ding?
Midik amah muanhuaina a om amah nung in a tate a hampha uhi.
Kumpipa vaihawmna mangtutphah tung a tuin a mit in gilou tengteng a thehzak hi.
Kua’n, ka lungtang ka hihsiang a, ka khelhna a kipan ka siangthou, a chi thei dia?
Bukna chi tuamtuam leh, tehna chi tuamtuam, a nih tuaktuak un
Naupang nangawn in a thilhih in amah leh amah a kitheisak a, a nasep a siangthou hia, a dik hia chih.
Zathei bil leh, muthei mit,
Ihmut it ken, na genthei kha ding hi; na mit hak in, huchi in tanghou in na tai ding hi.
A leimi in, bangmah ahi kei, bangmah ahi kei, a chi: himahleh a pai khitnung in, huaichiangin a kiuangsak hi.
Dangkaeng a om, rubi suang tampi: himahleh theihsiamna mukte jewel suangmantam ahi uh.
Mikhual adia mawhkhu ding a kichiammi puansilh la in; mikhual numei adia kichiam ahihleh mawhkhuhna ding in len in.
Zuautheihna tanghou mihing ading in a khum a; himahleh a nung in a kam suanghum in a dim ding hi.
Thiltup chiteng thuhoih gel a hihkip ahi; huan pina pil in nang kidouna na bawl.
Kuapeuh tangthu gen a pai vialvial in thugukte a kitheisak hi: huaiziak in kuapeuh a mukte zapi a hong kithuahpih dah in.
Kuapeuh a pa hiam a nu hiam hamsiat, zan khomial penpen ah a khawnvak hekmial ahi ding hi.
A tung a kinohtak a gou muhtheih ahi, a tawpna vualzawl ahi kei ding hi.
Gilou thuk ding, chi ken:
Bukna chi tuamtuam
Mihing painate
Mihing ading in, a siangthou, chih mawkmawk thang ahi, huan a nung a thukan ding a thuchiam.
Kumpipa pil in migiloute a haih a, a tung uah chilna kangtalai khe a paisak hi.
Mihing lungsim
Chitna leh thutak in kumpipa a hawi a; huan a mangtutphah chitna a letkip ahi.
Tangvalte thupina a hatna uh ahi: putekte kilawmna a samkang uh ahi.
Keh zou a satna in thil hoihlou a singsiang a: satna in gilpi sunggil lamte a zel hi.
Kumpipa lungtang
Mihing lampi chiteng amah mit ah a dik a; himahleh
Diktatna leh vaihawmna hih kithoihna sang in
Mit hah sang leh, lungtang kisathei, migilou khawnvak nasan, khelhna ahi.
Mi pil ngaihtuahnate’n hauhsakna lam kia a nawt a; himahleh michih kinohhat taksapna lam kia ah a kinoh hi.
Lei zuauthei a gou muh tuimei lehlam lehlam a mutleng bang ahi; huaite zong min sihna a zong uhi.
Migilou hiamgamna in amaute a taimang ding, vaihawmna hih a nial ziak un.
Amah mawhna a dimpa lampi a kawi mahmah; himahleh misiangthou ahihleh, a thilhih a dik ahi.
Inn zapi sung a numei selhat toh ten sang in, inn tung vum ning a ten a hoihzaw, in
Migilou kha in hoihlou a deih; a invengte in a mit ah deihsakna a mu kei hi.
Muhsit hatmi gawt a a om chiang in, mi mawl bawlpil in a om hi; huan mi pil hilh a a om chiang in, theihna a mu hi.
Mi diktat in migilou inkuan a ngaihtuah; migiloute amau siatna ding in vuallel a a omdan uh.
Kuapeuh genthei kahna a bil hum, amah leng a kap ding, himahleh zak in a omkei ding hi.
A guk a thilpiak in hehna a nemzou, huan angsung a vantawi in heh mahmahna.
Mi diktat ading in vaihawmna hih kipahna ahi, himahleh thulimlou hihte ading in siatna ahi.
Theihsiamna lampi a kipan vakmangmi misite kikhopna ah a khawl ding.
Kuapeuh nopbawlna it mi genthei ahi ding; kuapeuh uain leh sathau hai a hau kei ding uh.
Migilou midiktat ading in tatnasum ahia, huan mi lepchiah mitang mun ah a hongpai hi.
Gamkeu a ten a hoihzaw, numei kiselhat leh kinak hat kiang sang in.
Mi pil tenna ah gou leh sathau manpha a om; himahleh mihai inn huai a nawmvalh vek hi.
Kuapeuh diktatna leh chitna delh in hinna, diktatna leh zahtakhuaina a mu ding hi.
Mi pil mihatte khopi ah a kah a, huailai a muanna hatna a phel hi.
Kuapeuh kamsima, paulou in buainate a kipan a kha a kem hoih hi.
Mi kisathei leh uang, a min muhsit hat ahi, kisaktheihna leh kiotsakna in thil a hih zel hi.
Thadahmi deih in amah a that a; a khutte’n sepgim a nial ngal uh.
Nitum a duhgawl tak a huaiham a om a; himahleh midiktat in a pia a, a itkei hi.
Migilou kithoihna kihhuai ahi, lungsim gilou toh huai a hontawi chiang in, bangchi phet a kihhuai sem ahi diam aw!
Theihpih zuauthei a mangthang ding; himahleh a za min kalh vuallouh in thu a gen ding.
Migilou in a maitang a taksak a himahleh mitang ahihleh bel, a lampite a bawlhoih hi.
Kidou ni ading in sakol bawlsa ahi; himahleh Vualzohna
Hauhsakna thupite sang in min hoih telzawk ding ahi, dangka leh dangkaeng sang in deihsakna a ithuai zaw hi.
Hausa leh genthei a kituak khawm ua, amaute bawl
Mi pilvang in hoihlou a mu a, a kibu hi. Himahleh mi mawl in a phuzel a, a thuakloh hi.
Kiniamkhiakna leh
Lingte leh thangte mi hoihlou lampi ah a om: kuapeuh a kha kem in huaite a gamlat ding hi.
A paina ding lampi ah naupang chil in, huan a upat hun nangawn in leng huai a kipan a paimang kei ding hi.
Mihau in genthei tung ah vai a hawm a, huan leitawimi leitawisakmi ading in sikha ahi.
Kuapeuh thulimlouhna tuh in tuahsia a la ding: huan a hehna chiang a lohching kei ding.
Kuapeuh khuttawi lian mitnei vualzawl in a om ding: mi genthei kiang a a tanghou a kipan a piak ziak in.
Muhsit hatmi delhkhia in, huan kinakna a paikhe ding hi: ahi, kisualna leh zumhuaina a tawp ding hi.
Kuapeuh lungtang siangthouna it, a mukte deihhuaina ziak in kumpipa a lawm ahi ding hi.
Theihna nei amah
Thadah in, pawlam ah humpinelkai a om: kongzing ah thah in a om ding, a chi.
Numei lamdangte kam kawkhuk thuk ahi: kuapeuh
Haina naupang lungtang sung ah henlop in a om a: himahleh bawldikna chiang in amah a kipan gamlapi ah a delhkhe ding hi.
Kuapeuh a punna khansakna dia mi genthei nuaisiah a, kuapeuh mi hau kiang a pia, taksapna a tung lel hi.
Na bildoh inla, mi pil thute za in, huan ka theihna lam ah na lungtang suk in.
Na sung a na kep leh thil nuam ahi ngal a, na muk a hihkip khawm a a om leh.
Na muanna
Thuphate leh theihna tungtang a thil hoih penpente na kiang ah ka gelhkhinta kei maw.
Na kiang a thu hondongte thutak a na dawn theihna ding a, thutak leh muanhuaite nang hon theisak hilou ka hiam?
A gentheih ziak in, genthei lok ken, kongpi ah gimthuak leng nuaisiah sam ken.
Mi heh mi toh kizawl kenla, huan thangpaihhatmi toh kithuah ken.
A lampite na sin kha dia, na kha ading in thang na mu kha ding hi.
Khutbengte lak a khat hikenla, ahihkeileh leibate ziak a mawhkhu a pangte lak a leng hi sam ken.
Piak ding na neih kei leh, bangding a na nuai a kipan na lupna lamang ding ahia?
Na pipute koihkipsa, tang a gamgi suan ken.
A nasep a kizen mi na mu hia? Kumpipate ma ah ading ding a: mi thulimloute ma ah ading kei ding hi.
Vaihawmmi toh ne ding a na tut chiang in, na ma a om amah hoihtak in ngaihtuah in.
Huan anhaimi na hihleh, na gawl ah temta koih ding na hi.
A anlimte duh lawken; an khemna a dim ahi chih thei in.
Hausa ding in kigimsak ken; nangmah pilna a kipan tawp in.
A omloupi tung ah na mit na koih ding maw? Hauhsaknate’n lah amau ading in kha a kibawl ngal ua, vanlam zuan a leng muvanlai bang in.
Mi sumchit neih tanghou ne ken, a anlimte leng duh sam ken.
Amah a kisim bang in, huchibang ahi: Ne inla dawn in, na kiang ah a chi a; himahleh a lungtang nang kiang ah a omkei hi.
Na an nek na lawkhe ding a, na thu hoihte na mansuah ding.
Mihai bil ah thugen ken, na thute pilna lah musit ding ahi ngal a.
Tang a gamgi suan ken; pa neilou lou ah lut ken:
Amaute tanpa lah a hat ngal a; na siatna ding in amau thu a gensak ding hi.
Na lungtang hilhna lam ah suk inla, na bilte theihna thute lam ah.
Naupang lak a bawlhoihna it ken. Chiang in sat lechin leng a si kei ding hi.
Chiang in amah na sat ding a, huan Sheol a kipan a kha na suakta sak ding hi.
Ka tapa, na lungtang a pil leh, kei mahmah, ka lungtang a kipak ding:
Ahi, ka lungtang in nuam a sa ding a, na mukte’n thil dik a gen chiang un.
Na lungtang in mikhialte eng kei hen; himahleh nitum in
Kipahman lah a omtaktak ngal a; huchi in na lametna satkhiak ahi kei ding.
Za in, ka tapa pil in, huchi in lampi ah na lungtang pi in.
Uain haite la kah om ken; sa haite lak ah:
Zukhamhat leh anhai genthei ding uh ahi ngal a: huan ihmut haina in puansia in mi tuam ding hi.
Nang honsuang na pa thu ngaikhia inla, a upat chiang in na nu musit ken.
Thutak lei inla, zuak ken; ahi, pilna, hilhna leh theihsiamna.
Mi diktat pa nakpitak in a kipak ding: huan kuapeuh tapa pil suang in amah a kipan nuamsakna a nei ding hi.
Na nu leh na pa kipaksak inla, nang hon suangnu nuamsa sak in.
Ka tapa, na lungtang honpia inla, na mitte ka lampite ah kipak uhen.
Kizuak lah guam thukpi ahi ngal a; huan numei lamdang kawkhuk kawchik ahi.
Ahi, suamhatmi bang in a buk a, huan mite lak ah lepchiahna a pungsak hi.
Tunggikna kuan a nei a? Lungkhamna kuan a nei a? Kinaknate kuan a nei a? Phunna kuan a nei a? A kullou liamnate kuan a nei a? Mit sanna kuan a nei a?
Uain a peng opte’n; uain lehbulh zong dia kuante in.
A san lai in uain en ken, nou sung a a zia a suahlai in, nemtak a a paisuklai in.
Atawp chiang in gulpi bang in a kei a, guldekpak bang in gu in a zen hi.
Na mitte’n thil lamdangte a mu ding a, na lungtang in thilhoihloute a genkhe ding hi.
Ahi, tuipilai a lum ahihkeileh longkhuam dawn a lum bang na hi ding hi.
A honsat ua, na ka sa kei; a honvua ua, bangmah in ka veikei; chikchiang in ka halh dia? Zong thaknawn naveng, na chi ding.
Migiloute siatna ding in enlah ken, a kiang ua om utsam ken:
A lungtang un nuaisiahna a sin ua, a mukte un siatna thu a gen uhi.
Pilna ziak in inn lam in a om a; theihsiamna in hihkip in a om:
Huan theihna in dantante hihdim in a om, hauhna manpha leh nuamte tengteng in.
Mi pil a hat: ahi, theihna neimi’n hatna a pungsak.
Piina pil in na galdouna bawl ding na hi ngal a: huan thuhilhmi tampite ah bitna a om hi.
Mihai ading in pilna a sang lua: kongpi ah a kam ka kei hi.
Kuapeuh hoihlou hih ngaihtuah, mite’n siatna deihmi a chi ding uh.
Mihai ngaihtuahna khelhna ahi: huan musitmi mite ading in kihhuai ahi.
Vangsiat ni a na bah leh, na hatna a neu.
Sihna lam a puakmanga omte suaktasak in, huan thah a om dia mansate nangman suaktasak in.
Ngai in, hiai ka theikei uh, na chih leh: lungtangte bukpa’n huai a ngaihtuah kei maw? Huan na kha kempa’n, huai a theikei maw? Huan michih kiang ah a thilhih bang in a pe kei ding maw?
Ka tapa, khuaizu ne in, a hoih ngal a; huan chep a khum khuaikhak:
Huchi in pilna na khalam ading ahi chih na thei ding: na muh leh, huchi in kipahman a om ding, huan na lametna satkhiak ahi kei ding hi.
Aw giloupa, mi diktat omna dou ding in tang ken; a khawlna mun hihsiatsak ken:
Mi diktat lah sagihvei a puk a, huan a thou nawn ngal a; himahleh migilou tuahsia zoh in a om ding hi.
Na melma a puklai in nuamsa ken, zoh a a omlai in na lungtang kipak kei hen:
huai a mu kha in, amah a kipahpih kei in, huan amah a kipan a thangpaihna a heimang kha ding hi.
Gilou hihte ziak in ki lungkhamsak dah in: giloute leng eng sam ken:
Migilou ading a kipahman omlou ding ahi ngal a: migilou khawnvak heklup in a om ding hi.
Ka tapa,
Amau apan a siatna lah thakhat a om guih ding ahi ngal a: huan amaute apan tuahsiatna kua ahia thei?
Hiaite leng mi pil thugente ahi.
Vaihawmna a mite deihsaktuam neih a hoih kei.
Kuapeuh migilou kiang a, Na diktat hi, chi peuhmah; mite’n amah a hamsiat ding ua, namte’n amah a kih ding.
Himahleh amah salte ading in kipahna ahi ding, huan a tung uah vualzawlna hoih a hongtung ding hi.
Dawnna dik pia mukte mite’n a tawp ding uhi.
Pawlam ah na thilhih bawlkhol inla, lou sung ah nang ading in huai tuh mansa in bawl in; huan huai nung in na inn lam in.
A bul bei in na inveng siatna ding in theihpihmi hi ken; huan na mukte in khem ken.
Ka tung a a hih bang in amah tung ah leng ka hih ding, chi ken; mi a nasep bang in ka thuk ding.
Thadahmi lou kiang ah ka pai a, huan theihsiamna bei mi grephuan kiang ah;
Ngai in, ling in a khannelh khin vek a, huai a a louma loulingnei in a khuhta a, huan huai a a suang bangte a chimkhinta hi.
Huchihlai in ka en a, hoihtak in ka ngaihtuah a: ka mu a, hilhna ka sangta hi.
Tomkha ihmut zeklai, neuchik lusuk, khut khep a neuchik ihmut zek.
Huchibang in suamhatmi bang in na gentheihna a hongpai ding a; huan mi kigalvan bang in na taksapna hongtung ding hi.
Judah kumpipa Hezekiah mite’n a teikhiak uh, hiaite leng Solomon paunakte ahi uh.
Thil im Pathian thupina ahi: himahleh thu zonkhiak kumpite thupina ahi.
Van sandan, huan lei thukdan, huan kumpipate lungtang zonkhiak theih ahi kei hi.
Dangka a kipan tuiek lamang in, huan siangsakmi ading in tuium-belsuan a hong omkhe ding:
Kumpipa ma a kipan gilou lamang in, huan a mangtutphah diktatna a hihkip ahi ding hi.
Kumpipa ma ah malam sang ah om ken, huan mi thupite omna mun ah ding ken:
Hiailam ah hong paitou in, na kiang a a honchih uh a hoihzaw; na mitte’n a muhsa uh, lal ma a koih niam a na om sang in.
Sual ding in man gang in kuan khepah ken, a tawp in bang hih ding ahia chih na theikei kha ding.
Na inveng toh kal thu amau toh genkhawm un, huan midang thugukte pholhsuah ken!
Huai za in nang a honkou kha dia, na zahlakna a kiheimang kei kha ding hi.
Kituak tak a thu khat gen dangka sengsunga dangkaeng apple theite bang ahi.
Thumangmi bilah taihilh mi pil dangkaeng bilbah leh dangkaeng hoih chi khi bang ahi.
Pawltak huan vukvot bang in, huchi in sawltak ginom amah sawlte ading in ahi; a pute kha a hihhalh ngal hi.
Vuah pailou meipite leh huih bang in, huchi in kuapeuh dikloutak a a thilpiakte a kiuangsak ahi hi.
Dohtheih mahmahna in vaihawmpa thuzoh ahi, huan lei nem in guh a hihtan ding hi.
Khuaizu na muta hia? Nang adia hun lel ne in: huchilou in zaw na vah ding a, na law kha ding hi.
Na inveng inn ah hoh vang in; huchilou in zaw a hon chimtakin a hon mudah kha ding hi.
A inveng siatna dia zuaugen khetbuk, namsau leh thal hiam bang ahi.
Buai hun a mi ginomlou muanzaw ha kisia, leh khepek guh kilawi bang ahi.
Mi lunggim kiang a lasa tuh khovot lai a puansilh suah bang leh zu leh tangal hel bang ahi.
Na melma a gil a kial leh nekding tanghou pia inla; huan a dang a tak leh, dawn ding tui pia in:
A lu tung a mei am sekkhawm lah na hi ngal a, huan
Mal huih in vuah a hon zusak paha; huchibang in migensiatna lei in hehmel a bawl hi.
inn tung ning a ten, inn sung za a kiselhat numei toh tenkhawm sang in a hoihzaw hi.
Kha dangtak adia tui votte bang in, gam gamla apan tanchinhoih ahi.
Mi diktat migilou in a lam pialsak tuh tuikhuk suknit leh tuinak hihsiat bang ahi.
Khuaizu tampi nek a hoih kei: huchi mah bang in mite ding in amau thupina zonkhiak thupina ahi kei.
Amah a lungsim thuzohna bei khopi chimsa leh bang neilou bang ahi.
Nipi lai a vuk bang leh, pawltaklai a vuah bang in, zahtakhuaina mihai ading in a kilawm kei hi.
Kawlgit a vakvai bang in, phialphiah a lenlai bang in, huchi mah bang in hamsia bulbal neilou a tangtung kei hi.
Zepna sakol ading, kamkaihna sabiltung ading, huan chiang mihaite nungzang ading ahi.
Mihai a haina dungzui in dawng ken, huchilou in zaw nang leng amah na bang kha ding.
Mihai a haina bang in dawng in, amah kideihna ah a pilsak kha ding hi.
Kuapeuh mihai khut a thukhak in amah khete a tankhia a, siatna ding a dawn hi.
Khebai khete a kikhai nelnel: huai bangmah in mihaite kam sung a gentehna ahi.
Mihai kiang a zahna piak zaw suanglotna khau a suang gakkhawm bang ahi.
Zukhamhat khut a loulingnei bang in, huai bangmah in mihaite kam sung a gentehna ahi.
Mihai leh mi vialvak guaimi, thalkapsiam midang liamsak zelmi bang ahi.
Ui amah luak lam a kiknawn bang in, huai bangmah in a haina sunzom mihai ahi.
Amah kideihna a pil mi na mu hia? Amah apan sang in mihai a kipan lametna a omzaw hi.
Thadah in, Lampi ah humpinelkai a om; humpinelkai kongzing ah a om, a chi.
Kongkhak a kopza ah a kiheizel bang in, thadaha lupna tung ah a om hi.
Thadah in kuangsung ah a khut a thuna; a kam a tun nawn ngapkei hi.
Thadah amah kideihna ah a san pethei ding mi sagih sang in pil a kisa zaw hi.
Kuapeuh paisuak a, amah a hilou kinakna a kihihbuai, ui a bil a man bang ahi.
Mihai in mei ekte, thal leh sihna viallot bang in;
mi invengte khem a, chiamnui ka hi ka hia? chi toh a kibang hi.
Sing taksap ziak in mei a mit a: huan huauhatmi omlouhna ah, kinakna a bei hi.
Suangkuangtheite meisumsa ading bang in leh sing mei ading bang in: kinak hat mi kilanna uangsak ahi.
Huauhatmi thute an limtak bang ahi, huan gilpi sungnungpen ah a tumsuk hi.
Leibel limlang tui a luan bang in lungtang gilou muk a zol in a nal!
Mi huauhat in a muk in a thehdalh a, a lungtang in khemna a pai.
Kilawmna thu a gen chiang in, amah um ken; a lungtang ah lah kihhuai sagih a om ngal:
A huatna zekhemna in kituam mahleh, khawmpite ma ah tangpi muh in a gitlouhna etsak ahi ding hi.
Kuapeuh khuk tou huai ah a ke ding: huan kuapeuh suang khuk, amah tung ah hong kileh ding hi.
Lei zuauthei in a hihliamsate a mudah a, maitangphat hat kam in siatna a bawl hi.
Zingchiang thu ah kiuangsak ken; ni’n bang a hon suahpih ding chih lah na thei ngalkei a.
Midang in nang honphat uhen, nangmah mah kam hilou in; mikhual in nangmah mah mukte hilou in.
Suang a gik a, piaunel a gik hi; himahleh mihai lungzinna huaite gel sang in a gikzaw hi.
Thangpaihna a gilou, hehna a khel; himahleh thikna ma ah kua ading thei dia?
A langtang a salhna a guk a itna sang in a hoihzaw.
Lawm hon liamsaknate a ginom ahi a: himahleh melma hon tawpna zekhemna ahi.
Kha gilvah in khuaikhak a chimtak a: himahleh kha gilkial ading in thil kha chiteng a khum hi.
Vasa a buk a kipan a vakvai bang in, huai bang in a mun a kipan mi a vakvai hi.
Nuhtheih leh gimnamtui in lungtang a kipaksak a: huai bangmah in mihing lawm khumna lungsimtak a thupha a hongpai ahi.
Na lawm mahmah, na pa lawm mangngilh ken; na tuahsiatna ni’n na unau inn ah hoh ken: inveng nai om gamlapi a unau sang in a hoih zaw hi.
Ka tapa, pil in, ka lungtang kipaksak in, kei hontaite ka dawn theihna ding in.
Mi pilvang in hoihlou a mu a, a bu hi: himahleh mi mawl in a awlmoh kei a, a thuak loh hi.
Mikhual ading mawhkhu dia om puansilh la in; huan numei lamdang adia mawhkhu dia om chiamkhamna ding in len in.
Kuapeuh aw ngaihtak a, zingsang a beltak a thou a, vualzawl, amah ading in hamsia a sim ahi ding hi.
Vuahchin ni a vuah zu leh numei kinak hat a kibang:
Kuapeuh amah khou huih khou bang ahia, khut taklam a sathau ham bang ahi.
Sik in sik a hiamsak bang in mihing in a lawm mel a hiamsak hi.
Kuapeuh theipi kung kem in huai a a gah a ne ding; huan kuapeuh a pu ngak zahtak in a om ding hi.
Tui a maitang in maitang a muh bang in, huai mah bang in mihing lungsim ah mihinna a kimu hi.
Sheol leh Abaddon a lungkim ngeikei ua, huan mihing mitte a lungkim ngeikei uh.
Huansiangna bel dangka ading ahi, huan meipi dangkaeng ading, huchi bangmah in mihing phatna a ze-et in a om hi.
Mihai sum sung ah buh taisate lak ah suk in su mahle chin, huchipiin leng amah a kipan in a haina a paimang kei lai ding hi.
Na belamhonte omdan thei ding in thanuam in, na ganhonte hoihtak in en in:
Hauhsaknate tangtawn a ding ah kei a; lallukhu in suan tengteng a daihzou hia?
Buhpawl puak in a om a, huan loupa nou a kilang, mualte a loupate a ki lakhawm ahi.
Belamnoute’n na puansilh ding honpe ding, huan kelte’n na lou man ding:
Huan na an ding in, na inkawte an ding in kel nawitui kiching a om ding hi; huan na nungakte vakna ding in.
Migilou kuamah delhlouh in a tai: himahleh mi diktat humpinelkai bang in a hangsan hi.
Gam tatlekna ziak in thunei mi tampi om a: himahleh theisiam leh theihna nei mite ziak in huai gam bel suk vaiveng theih ahi.
Taksap hau mi genthei nuaisiahte zaw lou susia vuahpi zu bang ahi.
Amau dan mangngilhte’n migilou a phat ua: himahleh huchibang dan zuite amau tung ah a thangpai uhi.
Mi hoihlou in vaihawmna a theisiam kei: himahleh amau
A lampite a hoihlou mihau sang in a thutakna a om mi genthei a hoih zaw hi.
Kuapeuh dan zui tapa pil ahi: himahleh kuapeuh anhai mite toh kithuah in a pa a zumsak hi.
Kuapeuh a neih a nou leh a pung a tamsak in mi genthei hehpihmi amah ding in a lakhawm hi.
Kuapeuh dan zalou ding a a bil kaihei a thumna nasan kihhuai ahi.
Kuapeuh lampi gilou a midik lamhaihsak, amah kawkhuk mahmah ah a kelut ding hi: himahleh mi hoihkim in gou hoih a luah ding hi.
Mi hausa amah ngaih in a pil a; himahleh mi genthei theihsiamna nei in amah a zongkhia hi.
Mi diktat a vualzoh chiang in, thupina lian a om: himahleh migilou a thoh chiang in, mite a bu uhi.
Kuapeuh a tatlekna khuh a lohching kei ding: himahleh kuapeuh huaite thupha tawi a mangngilh in chitna a mu ding uh.
Lauthei gige mi a hampha hi: himahleh a lungtang saksak gige siatna ah a ke ding hi.
Humpinelkai humham leh vompi hawk bang in; huai mah bang in mi gentheite tung a vaihawmmi gilou ahi.
Vaihawmmi theihsiamna tasam nuaisiah hatmi thupi ahi: himahleh kuapeuh huaihamna hua in a nite a sausak ding hi.
Mi kuapeuh mi himhim sisan a dim kawkhuk sung ah a tailut ding; kuapeuh in len kei hen.
Kuapeuh tangtak a om suahtaksak in a om ding: himahleh kuapeuh a lampite a hoihlou a pukzaw ding hi.
Kuapeuh a gam leilet in tanghou tampi a nei ding: himahleh kuapeuh mi bangmahlou nungzui in gentheihna kiching a nei ding hi.
Mi ginom in vualzawlna a hau ding: himahleh kuapeuh hau ding a kintat gawtlouh in a omkei ding hi.
Mite deihsaktuam neih a hoih kei: tanghou them ziak in mi a talek ding leng ahi sam kei hi.
Kuapeuh deihgawl sumchit hauhsakna delh in a kinoh a, huan a tung ah taksapna a hongtung sin chih a theikei hi.
Kuapeuh mi deihsakna a sal in a lei a maitangphathatmi sang in deihsakna tamsem a nung in a mu ding hi.
Kuapeuh a nu hiam a pa hiam lok a, tatlekna ahi kei, chi mi zaw; amah mah hihsemi kithuahpih ahi hi.
Kuapeuh lungsim duhgawl in kinakna a tokthou hi: himahleh kuapeuh
Kuapeuh amah lungtang muang mihai ahi: himahleh kuapeuh piltak a om, suahtaksak in a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh genthei kiang a pia a tasam kei ding a: himahleh kuapeuh a mitsel in hamsia tampi a nei ding hi.
Migiloute a lal chiang un, mite a kibu ua: himahleh a manthat chiang un, mi diktat a pung hi.
Kuapeuh salh a om nak a, genhak teitei hih damna omlou in thakhat in a kise ding hi.
Mi diktatte a pun chiang un, mite a kipak uh: himahleh migilou in vaihawmna a puak chiang in, mite a mau uh.
Kuapeuh pilna it in a pa a kipaksak a; himahleh kuapeuh kizuakte kithuahpih in a sum a mawk zatbei hi.
Kumpipa’n vaihawmna in gam a hihkip a: himahleh kuapeuh thilpiak phut teitei in a hihsia hi.
Mi invengte maitangphat in kalsuante ading in len a zaksak hi.
Mi hoihlou tatlekna ah thang a om: himahleh mi diktat in la a sa a, a kipak hi.
Mi diktat in mi genthei thu a theihpih a: migilou in huai thei ding in theihsiamna a neikei hi.
Mi simmawh hatte’n khopi a hal ua: himahleh mipilte’n thangpaihna a heimang uh.
Mi pil in mihai a kiselpih leh, a heh hiam a nui hiam, khawlna a omkei ding hi.
Sisan duh a dangtak in amah mi hoihkim a mudah: huan mitang ahihleh, a hinna a zong uhi.
Mihai in a hehna tengteng a gen a: himahleh mi pil in a genkhe kei a, a khemdai hi.
Vaihawmmi’n zuauthu a ngaihkhiak leh, a sikha tengteng gilou ahi uh.
Mi genthei leh nuaisiahhat a kituak khawm ua:
Kumpipa ginomtak gentheite ngaihtuah, tangtawn in a mangtutphah a kip ding hi.
Chiang leh salhna in pilna a pia: himahleh naupang amah thuthu a omsak in a nu ading in zumna a omsak hi.
Giloute a pun chiang un, tatlekna a pung hi: himahleh mi diktat in a pukna uh a en ding hi.
Na tapa bawlhoih in, awlna a honpe ding hi; ahi, na kha ading in nuamna a honpe ding hi.
Mengmuhna omlouhna ah, mite a zautat uh: himahleh kuapeuh dan zui, aman nuam a sa hi.
Sikha thute a bawlhoih in a omkei ding: thei mahleh a limsak kei ding.
A thute a man gang mi na mu hia? Amah sang in mihai a kipan in lametna a omzaw hi.
Kuapeuh a naupan a kipan a a sikha nuamtattak a kem in a tawptawp in amah tapa honghi in a nei ding hi.
Mi heh in kinakna a tok thou a, huan mi thangpai in tatlekna a hau hi.
Mihing kisaktheihna in amah a lainiam ding: himahleh kuapeuh lungsim kiniamkhiak in pahtawina a mu ding.
Kuapeuh gutami toh kithuah in amah kha a mudah hi: nakpitak a ngetna a za a huan bangmah a gen kei hi.
Mihing kihtakna in thang a hontawi a: himahleh kuapeuh
Mi tampi’n vaihawmmi deihsakna a zong ua: himahleh mihing vaihawmna
Mi diklou mi diktat ading in kihhuai ahi: huan kuapeuh lampi a tang migilou ading in kihhuai ahi.
Massa mi Jakeh tapa Agur thute:
Huai mi in Ithiel kiang ah,
Ithiel leh Ukal kiang ah:
Chihtaktak in kuamah
sang in ka haizaw a,
mihing theihsiamna ka neikei:
Pilna ka sin naikei a,
Mi Siangthou theihna leng
ka neikei, a chi.
Van ah kua a kahtouta in
a hong kumsuk a?
A khuttum sung ah kua’n huih a lakhawmta a?
A puansilh in kuan tuite a tun a?
Lei tawpnate kuan a hihkipta a?
A min bang ahia?
Huan a tapa min bang ahia, na theih leh?
Pathian thu chiteng ettel ahi: amah a muangte ading in lum ahi.
A thute ah behlap ken, a honsal dia, zuauthei a muh in na omkha ding hi.
Thil nih k’on ngen: ka sih ma in huaite hon kitheihmohbawl ken:
Bangmahlou leh zuau kei a kipan gamlapi ah suan in: Gentheihna hiam hauhsaknate hiam hon peken: kei adia kiphamoh an in honvak in.
Huchilou in zaw ka kham in, nang k’on kitheihmohbawl in,
A pu kiang ah sikha gense ken, huchilou in zaw nang a hon hamsiat dia, mawhtansak in na om ding hi.
A pa uh hamsiat suan khat a om a, a nu uh vualzawl lou.
Amau mitte a siangthou suan khat a om a, ahi a lah a nitna ua kipan silsiang louh ahi uhi.
Suan khat a om a, Aw a mitte uh sanghah hina e: huan a mitkhu vunte sansak in a om hi.
A hate uh namsau bang, leh a hate uh temta bang suan khat a om uh, lei a kipan a mi genthei leh, tasamte mite lak a kipan a nekbeina ding in.
Vot in tanu nih a nei a, honpia in, honpia in, chi in kikou ua. Thil thum lungkimsak theih ngeilouh a om uh, ahi, li, Hun e, chi lou:
Han leh sul hut; lei tui a hih lungkima omlou; huan mei, hun e chi lou.
Mit a pa nuihsan leh, a nu thuman musit, guam va-akte’n a tawm ding ua, muvanlai noute’n a ne ding uhi.
Thil thum kei ading a lamdang lua a om ua, ahi, ka theihlouh li:
Huihkhua a muvanlai lampi; suangpi tung a gulpi lampi; tuipi lak a long lampi leh pasal nungak toh a lampi.
Huai mah bang in angkawmhat numei lampi ahi; a ne a, zapi in a kam ka a, gitlouhna ka hihkei, a chi hi.
Thil thum ziak in lei a ling a, huan thil li a puak zohlouh ziak in;
Sikha kumpipa hong hihlai leh mihai ankham lai;
Numei huathuai tak in pasal a neih a, sikha nungak in a pi a luah in.
Leitung ah a neu thil li a om ua himahleh a pil mahmah uh:
Miksite hatlou ganhing hon ahi ua, himahleh nipi lai in a nekding uh a sutuah ua;
Kawlsazawte hatlou pawl tak ahi ua, himahleh suangpi heng ah a inn a bawl uhi:
Khaukhupte’n kumpipa a neikei ua, himahleh a honhon in avek un kilem in a pai uh;
Inhikte na khut a na tawi theih ahi ua; himahleh kumpipate inpite ah a teng uh.
A paichiang ua thupi thil thum a om ua, ahi, a pai chiang ua thupi, li:
Humpinelkai, gamsa laklak a hatpen pen, bangmah ma ah a kiheimang kei hi;
Kidouna sakol; keltal leng; huan kumpipa, a mite ma a pai.
Na kiletsak a haitak a na gamtat leh, ahihkeileh ngaihtuahna gilou na neih leh, na kam tung ah na khut koih in,
Nawitui pei in nawitui dat a omsak a, nak hekin sisan a suahkhe sak: huchi mah bang in thangpaihna paisuak in kilaina a omsak hi.
Kumpipa Lemuel thute; a nu’n amah a thuhilh thu:
Bang ahia, ka tapa? Bang ahia, Aw ka sul tapa? Huan bang ahia, Aw ka thuchiam tapa?
Na hatna numeite kiang ah pe kenla, kumpipate hihsete kiang ah leng na lampite pe sam ken.
Kumpipate ading ahi kei, Aw Lemuel, uain dawn kumpipate ading ahi kei; Zu khauh koi a om ahia, chih leng lalte ading ahi sam kei.
Huchilouin zaw a dawn un, dan a mangngilh un, gimthuak kuapeuh vaihawmna a kaikawi kha ding uh.
Mangthang dia mansa kiang ah zu khauh pia un, kha a haksa sa kiang ah uain:
Dawnsak unla, a gentheihna mangngilh sak un, a haksatna theigige nawn kei hen.
Pautheilou ading in na kam ka in, sukgawpa om mi huchibangte tengteng thu ah.
Na kam ka inla, diktak in vaihawm in, gentheite leh tasamte kiang ah vaihawmsak in.
Numei hoih kua’n a mu dia? A man rubi suang tungpek ah a om hi.
A pasal lungtang in amah a muanga, punna taksapna a neikei ding hi.
A damsung niteng in amah a hihhoih a, a hihse kei.
Samul leh jija a zong a, a khut in kilawptakin na a sem hi.
Sumsinmi longte bang ahia: gamla a kipan in a an a hontawi a.
Zan ahihlai in leng a thou a, a sikhanute kiang ah a sep ding uh, a inkawte an a pia hi.
Lou a ngaihtuah a, a lei a; a khut a gahte in grephuan a bawl hi.
Hatna in a kawng a gak a, a khutte a hatsak hi.
A sumsinna vante a phatuam chih a mu a; zan in a khawnvak a mit kei hi.
A khutte muikhut ah a nga a, a khutte mui ah a nga hi.
Gentheite lam ah a khut a zak a; ahi, tasamte lam a sawk hi.
A inkawte ziak in vuk a kihta kei a; a inkawte tengteng puan sanau in a kithuam uhi.
Puanphah zehoih mantam a kibawla; a puansilh puanmalngat leh san-dup ahi.
Kongpite a gam a upate lak a a pasal a tut chiang in mite’n a theituam in a om hi.
Puan hoih puansilh a bawl a, a zuak a; sumsinmi kiang ah kawnggakte a pekhia hi.
Hatna leh zahtakna a puansilh ahi; huan hun hongtung ding a nuihsan hi.
Pilna in a kam a ka a; siamna dan a lei ah a om hi.
A inkawte lampi hoihtak in a en a, huan thadahna tanghou a nekei hi.
A tate a thou ua, amah nuamsa a chi uhi; a pasal in leng, amah a phat hi.
Tanu tampite’n hoihtak in a hih ua, himahleh nang zaw amaute tengteng na khup vek hi, chi in.
Deihsakna khemna in a dim a, huan kilawmna bangmahlou ahi: himahleh numei
A khut a gahte amah pia un; huan kongpite ah a thilhihte’n amah phat hen.
Thugenpa, David tapa, Jerusalem kumpipa thute.
Bangmah loute bangmahlou, bangmah loute bangmahlou, bangteng bangmahlou ahi, Thugenpa’n a chi.
A sepgimna tengteng ni nuai a a sepgim a kipan mihing in bang phattuamna a nei a?
Khang khat a pai a, khang dang a hongtung a; tangtawn in lei a om gige.
Ni leng a suakzel a, ni a tum zel; huchi in a suahna a mun lam ah a kiknawn pah hi.
Simlam ah huih a pai a, mallam ah a kilehhei a; a lampi ah a kivialhei gige, huan huih a lam zuih ah a kiknawn zel hi.
Luite tengteng tuipi ah a luanglut ua, himahleh tuipi a dim tuankei hi: luite paina mun lam ah, huailam ah a pai nawn uh.
Thil tengteng gimna in a dim a; mihing in a gen theikei: muh in mit a lungkim kei a, zak in bil leng a lungkim sam kei.
A omkhinsa a hongom ding ahi a; hihkhitsa hih a om ding ahi a; huchi in ni nuai ah thil thak a omkei hi.
En dih, hiai a thak? chi a mite’n a gen uh thil a om hia? I ma ua hunte ua a om khinsa ahi.
Khang masate theihgigena a omkei a; a nung a hongom dingte lak ah hongom ding khang nanung lam theihgigena leng a omsam kei ding.
Kei Thugenpa Jerusalem ah Israel tung ah kumpipa ka hi.
Van nuai a hih a omte tengteng tungtang pilna a zong ding leh zongkhe ding a ka lungtang suah ka hi: huai a kisuk ding a mite tapate kiang a Pathian in a piak nakpitak a gimna ahi.
Ni nuai a hih a om nasepte tengteng ka muta a; ngai in, bangteng bangmahlou ahi a, huih nungdelh ahi.
A kawisa bawl tang theih ahi kei: huan a kimlou sim theih ahi kei.
Keimah lungtang ka houlimpih a, Ngai in, Jerusalem a ka ma a omte tengteng sang in pilna thupi k’on muhsak a; ahi, ka lungtang in pilna a neita, chi in.
Huchi in pilna thei ding leh, haina haitatna thei ding in ka lungtang ka suk a: hiai leng huih nungdelh ahi chih ka thei hi.
Pil mahmahna ah lungkham mahmahna a om a: kuapeuh theihna khangsak in lungkhamna a khangsak hi.
Ka lungtang in, “Kisa in, vualnopna in k’on entel dia; huaiziak in nopbawlna ah bual in” ngai in, hiai leng bangmahlou ahi, ka chi hi.
Nuihzatna thu ah, “Haina ahi”: vualnopna thu ah, “Bang a hih a?” ka chi hi.
A damsung ua mite tapate’n a hih ding uh bang ahia hoih ka muhtheih matan, ka lungtang in pilna kei honpi kawm in, uain a ka sa kipahsakdan leh, haina let chinten dan ka lungtang in ka zong hi.
Nasepna thupi ka bawl a; innte ka kilam a;
Grephuante ka kibawla; huante leh gamsitte ka kibawla, huaite ah thei chichih ka suan hi:
Gammang singte khoinate hihkawt ding in, tui lite ka kibawl hi.
Pasal sikhate leh numei sikhate ka lei a, ka inn sung ah sikhate a piang ua; belamhon leh bawnghon ka hau a, Jerusalem a ka ma a omte tengteng sang in:
Dangka leh dangkaeng leng, bialte a kipan leh kumpipate a kipan gou lamdang ka kilakkhawm a: pasal lasamite leh numei lasamite, mite tapa kipahna, a tam a tam meite ka kineih hi.
Huchi in Jerusalem a ka ma a om tengteng sang in ka thupi in, ka pung zaw a: ka pilna leng ka kiang ah a om gige hi.

Huan, bangpeuh ka mit in a lunggulh amau ka it kei hi: nuamsakna himhim a kipan in ka lungtang ka len kei, ka sepgimnate tengteng ziak in ka lungtang lah a kipak ngal a; huan hiai tuh ka sepgimna tengteng a kipan ka tantuan ahi.
Huchi in ka khutte’n a bawl uh nasep tengteng ka vel a, semgim a ka hih nasep gimna tengteng: huan, ngai in, bangteng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi a, ni nuai ah bangmah phattuamna a omkei hi.
Huan pilna leh lungsim kimlouhna leh haina en ding in ka kihei a: kumpipa nung a hongpai mihing in bang hihthei ding ahia? A kihih khinsa mahmah leng.
Huchi in, khovak in khomial a khen dandan in, pilna in haina a kheng ahi chih ka muta hi.
Mi pil mitte a lutang ah a om, mihai khomial ah a vak hi: huchi hinapi in lah thu khat mi tengteng kiang ah a tung a;

Huailai in ka lungtang in, “Mihaite kiang a a hongom bang in, huchibang in kei kiang ah leng a hongom ding; ahihleh bangding a kei pilzaw ka hia?” ka chi hi. Huan, ka lungtang in hiai mah leng bangmahlou ahi, ka chita hi.
Mi pil, mihai bangmah a, theihgigena lah tangtawn in a om ngal kei a: tunung chiang in avek ua mangngilh khit ahi ding uh chih thei in. Huan bangchi a mihai bang a mi pil si ahia?
Huchi in hinna ka hua a; ni nuai a bawl thilhih kei ading a a haksat ziak in: bangteng lah bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi ngal a.
Huan, ni nuai a ka sepgim ka sepgimna tengteng ka hua a: ka nung a hongom ding mi kiang a ka nutsiat ngei ding ahi chih thei in.
Kuan ahia mi pil hia ahihkeileh mihai a hong hih ding thei? Ka sepgimna tengteng a ka sepgimna tung ah thu a nei ding a, ni nuai a pilna ka etsakna ah. Hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Huaiziak in ni nuai a sepgimna tengteng ka na bawltak tungtang thu a ka lungtang lungdong sak ding in ka kipumhei hi.
Mi a sepgimna pilna leh, theihna leh, kivakna toh om lah a om ngal a: himahleh huai a semgim lou mi kiang ah a tantuan ding a nutsiah in a om ding hi. Hiai leng bangmahlou leh gilou lianpi ahi.
Ni nuai a a sepgimna tengteng a kipan leh, a lungtang a a kisukna tengteng a kipan mihing in bang a nei a leh?
A nite tengteng ahi lungkhamna lel ahi ngal a, a thuakna dahna; ahi, zan nangawn in a lungtang a khawl kei hi. Hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Mihing ading a a nek a a dawn a, a sepgimna a thil hoih a a kha a bualsak val a hoihzaw bangmah a omkei hi. Hiai leng ka thei a, Pathian khut a kipan om ahi.
Kei sang in, kuan ahia ne thei a, ahihkeileh kuan ahia nuamsakna nei zaw?

Amah hih lungkim mi kiang ah Pathian in pilna leh, theihna leh nuamsakna a pe ngal a: himahleh mikhial kiang ah, gimthuakna a pia hi, lakhawm ding leh khawlkhawm ding in, huchi a kuapeuh Pathian hih lungkim kiang a a piak theihna ding in, Hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Bang chiteng a ding in hunbi a om, van nuai a thiltup chiteng a ding in hun:
Pian hun leh sih hun; suan hun leh suansa boh khiak hun:
Thah hun leh hihdam hun;
phel hun leh lam nawn hun;
Kah hun leh nuih hun;
sun hun leh lam hun;
Suangte paihmang hun leh suangte lak khawm hun;
kawi hun leh kawi kidek hun;
Zon hun leh mansuah hun;
vom hun leh paihmang hun;
Bohkek hun leh khui hun;
pau louh hun leh thugen hun;
It hun leh muhdah hun;
kidou hun leh kilep hun.
A sepgimna na sempan bang phattuamna a nei a?
Huai a kisawizoina ding a Pathian in mite tapate kiang a a piak haksatna ka muta hi.
Thil chiteng a hun a kilawm in a bawl a: a lungtang uah khovel leng a koihta a, hinapi in mihing in Pathian nasep a bul a kipan a a tawppha a hihsa a mukhe theikei hi.
A damsung teng un kipah leh hoih hih sang a amau adia hoihzaw bangmah a omkei chih ka thei hi.
Michih in a nek a a dawn a, a sepgimna tengteng a hoih nuam a sakpih Pathian thilpiak ahi.

Bangpeuh Pathian in a hih, tangtawn in a om ding chih ka thei a: huai ah bangmah a kikoih theikei ding a, huai a kipan in bangmah mah a ki lakhe thei sam kei ding: Pathian in a hihkhinta a, huchi in a ma ah mite’n a lau ding uhi.
A omkhinsa pen; a om ding a omkhinsa ahi: huan Pathian in a paimangsa a zong hi.
Huchi in ni nuai ah, vaihawmna mun ah, gitlouhna a om chih leng ka mu hi; huan diktatna mun ah, gitlouhna huai ah a om hi.
Ka lungtang in, Pathian in midiktat leh migilou a ngaihtuah ding: thiltup chiteng leh nasep chiteng a ding in hun a om a, ka chi hi.
Ka lungtang in, mite tapate ziak in ahi, Pathian in amau a ettel sin a, amau mahmah gamsa banglel a hihdan uh a kitheih theihna ding un.

Mite tapate tung a tung peuhmah lah gamsate tung ah a tung ngal a; thil khat ngei a tung uah a tung a: khat a sih bang in, huchi mah bang in a dangdang a sia; ahi, hu khat a neikhawm ua: huan mihing in gamsate sang a masak zawkna a neikei: bangteng bangmahlou ahi ngal a.
Bangteng mun khat ah a pai ua; bangteng leivui a kipan ahi ua, bangteng leivui ah a kiknawn uh.
Mihing kha tunglam a a pai touh leh, gamsa kha nuailam a lei a a paisuk kua ahia thei?
Huaiziak in mihing a nasepte a a kipah ding sang a hoihzaw bangmah a omkei chih ka thei hi; huai a tantuan ahi ngal a: amah nung in bang ahi dia chih mu ding in amah kuan honpi nawn ahia leh?

Huchi in ka kihei a ni nuai a nuaisiahna hih a om tengteng ka mu a: huan ngai in, huchibang a nuaisiah a omte, lungmuanpa neiloute; huan amau nuaisiahte lam ah thilhihtheihna a om a, himahleh lungmuanpa a neikei uh.
Huaiziak in misite a sikhinsate a damlai dam a omlaite sang in ka phat zaw:
Ahi, a om ngei nailou, ni nuai a nasep gilou hih a om mu ngei nailou mi amau sang in ka ngaithupi zaw hi.
Huchi in sepgimna leh nasep siamna tengteng, hiai ziak a mihing invengte hazat a omna ka muta hi. Hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Mihai in a bante khepkhawm in amah sa a ne hi.
Khut dim nih sepgimna leh huih nungdelhna sang in, lungmuanna toh khut dim khat a hoihzaw hi.
Huchi in ka kihei a ni nuai a bangmahlou ka mu hi.

Amah kia a om khat ka mu a, nihna a neikei a; ahi, tapa a neikei, sanggampa leng a neikei; hinapi in lah a sepgim tawpna a omkei a, hauhsakna in a mitte leng a lungkim tuankei hi. “Kua adia semgim a, ka kha hoih tansak ka hia?” a chi a. Hiai leng bangmahlou ahi, ahi, nakpi a gimthuakna ahi.
Khat sang in nih a hoihzaw; a sepgimna ua ding a kipahman hoih a neih ziak un.
Puk le uh, khat in a lawm phong ding a hih ziak in: himahleh a puk chiang a amah kia a om a, amah phong ding midang neilou tung a gik hi.
Huailou in, nih a lupkhawm un, lumna a thei uh: himahleh khat kia bangchi’n a lum thei dia?
Huan, mi khat in amah kia a om pen zou leh, nih in amah a dou ding ua; khau zang guk a hek a kitat mengmeng kei hi.
Kumpipa tek leh hai, thuhilhna sangthei nawnlou sang in tuailai genthei leh pil a hoihzaw hi.
Suangkulh a kipan a kumpipa hi ding a hong paikhia lah a hingal a; ahi, amah gam mahmah a genthei sa a piang ahi.
Ni nuai a vak a hing tengteng, tuailaite toh a om uh ahihleh, a nihna, a mun ah ading chih ka muta hi.
Mi tengteng, a amaute tung a a omna mahmah, bei chih a omkei a: hinapi in lah tunung chia hongom dingte amah ah a kipak kei ding uh. Chihtaktak in hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
Pathian inn a na hoh chiang in na khepek kem in; ngaikhe ding a pai mihaite kithoihna piak sang in a hoihzaw ngal a: gilou a hih uh chih a kithei kei uhi.
Kamlawp kenla, Pathian ma a thil himhim gen ding in na lungtang lawptawp kei hen; Pathian lah van ah a om a, nang lah leitung ah na om ngal a: huaiziak in na thute tawmsak in.
Mang lah thu leh la tampi toh a hongom a; huan mihai aw thu tampi toh.
Pathian kiang a thuchiam na chiam chiang in, peding in hal ken; mihaite tung ah kipahna a nei ngal kei a: na thuchiam pen pia in.
Na chiam a na piaklouh sang in, na chiamlouh a hoihzaw hi.
Na kam in na sa thil a hihkhelh sak phal ken: angel ma ah leng, a dik kei chi sam ken: bangding in na aw ah Pathian in a heh in, na khut nasep a hihse dia?
Huchibang in mangte tamna ah bangmah loute a tam thu tampite ziak in siatna hongom ngal nak a: himahleh nang zaw Pathian kihta in.

Gentheite nuaisiahna leh, hiamgamna in bialsung ah vaihawmna leh diktatna a lamang chih na muh leh, huai thu lamdang sa ken: thuneitu sangte’n thuneihna neite a enkai ua; huan amau tung ah a sangzaw a om hi.
Huailou in lei a punna bangteng ading ahi: kumpipa ngei leng louma in a na a sepsak hi.
Kuapeuh dangka deihta dangka in a lungkim kei ding; kuapeuh hauhsakna punna deihta leng: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Van a kibehlap chiang in, amau nete a khang uh; huan huai neimi ading in bang phattuamna a om a, a mitte a huaite et chih ngallouh?
Ne tawm in ne tam leh, semgim mi ihmut a lim a; himahleh mihausa vahna in amah a ihmu sak kei hi.
Ni nuai a gilou hoih hetlou ka muh a om a, huai tuh, hauhsakna a neipa’n amah siatna dia a kep:
Himahleh huai hauhsaknate thuakna gilou in a mangthang hi; tapa a suan leh, a khut ah bangmah a omkei.
A nu gil a kipan a hongpai leh, vuaktang in a painawn ding a hongpai bang in, a sepgimna, a khut a a puak mang theih, ading in bangmah a lakei ding hi.
Huan hiai leng gilou hoih hetlou ahi, a hongpai dan tengteng in, hichibang in a pai ding a: huih ading a a sepgimna ah bang punna a nei a?
A damsung teng in khomial ah an a ne a, huan nakpitak a hihbuai in a om a, chinatna leh thangpaihna a nei hi.

Ngai in, hoih leh kilawm hi a ka muh min Pathian in amah a piak a damsung teng a a nek a, a dawn a, ni nuai a a sepgimna a sepgimna tengteng a hoih nuam a sakpiha, huai ahi: hiai lah a tantuan ahi ngal a.
Mi chiteng leng amah kiang a Pathian in hauhsakna leh neihzohna a piak, huai a nek theihna a piak a, a tantuan la ding leh a sepgimna a kipak ding in; hiai Pathian thilpiak ahi.
A damlai nite lah a theigige kei ding a; a lungtang kipahna a Pathian in amah a dawn ziak in.
Ni nuai a ka muh gilou a om a, mite tung ah a gik hi:

Mi Pathian in hauhsakna leh neihzohna leh, zahna a piak a, huchi a a deihpeuh a kha adia bangmah taksap nei hetlou a, a hihhang a huai a ne ding a Pathian in thilhihtheihna a piak louh a, mikhual in a nek zawkna: hiai bangmahlou ahi a, gilou natna ahi.
Mihing in ta za khat suang henla, kum tampi dam in a kumte nite tampi pha leh, a kha lah hoih in dim kei ngal in, kivuina neikei ngal leh; amah ading in a hun lou a pian a hoihzaw ka chi ahi:
Bangmahlou lah a honghi a, khomial ah a paimang a, huai a min khomial in a khuh hi;
Huailou in ni a mu kei a theih leng a theikei; hiai in a dang sang in a khawlna a nei a:
Ahi, kum sang khat gentuan dam mahleh, hoih nuam a sak pih tuankei: bang teng mun khat ah a pai kei umaw?
Mihing sepgimna tengteng a kam a ding ahi a, himahleh a gilkialna a dim tuankei.
Mihai sang in mi pil in bang phattuamna a nei a leh? Ahihkeileh, mihing ma a omdan thei, mi genthei in bang a nei a?
Lunggulhna tam vak sang in mitte muh a hoihzaw hi: hiai leng bangmahlou leh huih nungdelh ahi.
A na omkhinsa bangpeuh, sawtpi a huai a min piaksa ahi, huan mihing ahi chih theih ahi: amah sang a hatzaw amah toh leng a kisual theikei ding hi.
Thil tampi bangmahlou pungsak a om ding chih thei in, mihing bang a hoih tuan a?
A damsung bangmahlou limliap bang a a sukbei tengteng, a damsung in mihing ading a hoih kuan a thei a leh? Ni nuai ah amah nung in bang a om dia chih kuan mihing a hilh thei a ahia?
Nuhtheih mantam sang in min hoih a hoihzaw; mi pianni sang in sihni.
Ankuangluina inn a hoh sang in, sunna inn a hoh a hoihzaw: huai mi tengteng tawpna ahi a; huan mihing in a lungtang a a ngaihtuah ding ahi.
Nuih sang in lungkham a hoihzaw: mel lungkhamna ah lungtang kipahsak in lah a om ngal a.
Mi pil lungtang sunna inn ah a om; himahleh mihaite lungtang vualnopna inn ah a om hi.
Mi ading in mihaite lasak zak sang in, mi pil taina zak a hoih zaw.
Bel nuai a lingte puak vengvung bang in, mihai nuihna huchibang in a om ngal a: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Simmohna in mi pil a haisak mahmah a; thilpiak in theihsiamna a susia hi.
A kipatna sang in thil tawpna a hoihzaw: lungsim a kisaktheih sang in lungsim a dohtheih a hoihzaw hi.
Heh ding in na lungsim in man gang ken; hehna lah mihaite awm ah a khawl hi.
Nidanglaite hiaite sang a a hoihzawkna a ziak bang ahia? chi ken; hiai thu lah pilhuaitakin na dong kei hi.
Pilna gouluah bang in a hoih a; ahi, amau ni mute ading in a hoihzaw tham hi.
Dangka sum kihumna ahi bang in, pilna lah kihumna ahi ngal a: himahleh theihna hoihzawkna bel, pilna in a neimi hinna a hawi sak hi.
Pathian nasep ngaihtuah in: aman a kawisak sa, kua ahia bawl tang thei ding leh?
Hauhsak ni’n nuamsa inla, huan vangtahni in ngaihtuah in: mihing in a nung a thil om ding a muhkhiak louhna ding in, Pathian in khat lah a dang kiang ah kihiang helhel in a bawl hi.
Ka bangmahlou ni’n hiai tengteng ka muta hi: mi diktat a diktatna a mangthang a om a, huan migilou a gilou bawlna a a hinna hihsau a om hi.
Ki diktatsak lawzen ken; kipilsak lawzen sam ken: bangdia nang kihihse ding na hia?
Gilou lawzen kenla, hai sam ken: na hun tun ma a bangdia si ding na hia?
Hiai na let chinten a hoih hi; ahi huai a kipan in leng na khut kai ken: kuapeuh Pathian kihta lah a mute tengteng a kipan hong paikhe ding uh ahi ngal a.
Khopi a om vaihawmmi sawm sang in mi pil ading in pilna a thupizaw.
Hoih hih a, khiallou, leitung ah mi diktatna a om mahmah kei hi.
Thu kigen tengteng leng limsak khol dah in; huchilou in zaw na sikha in nang a hon hamsiat naza kha ding hi:
Na lungtang in lah huchi mah bang in nang leng midangte na hamsiat munchih a thei ngal a.
Hiai tengteng pilna in ka enchian vek a: Ka pil ding ka chi a; himahleh kei a kipan a gamla hi.
Gamla tak a thilte leh a thuk petpet a; kuan a mu khe thei dia?

Ka kipumhei a, thei ding leh zongkhe ding, pilna zong ding leh, thilte ziak zong ding, gitlouhna haina ahi chih thei ding, haina lungsim kimlouhna ahi chih thei ding in ka lungtang koih kip in a om hi:
Sihna sang a khazaw tuh numei, a lungtang thangte leh lente hi a, a khut henna khau hi ahi chih ka muta hi.
Ngai in, hiai ka mu khia, thugentu in a chi: thil a omdan tak mukhe ding in thil a khat a khat ka buk hi,
Tuin leng ka zonglai a ka mu kei: pasal sang khat lak a mitang khat ka mu, himahleh numei tengteng lak ah mitang ka mu kei hi.
Ngai in, Pathian in mihing hoihtak in a bawl chih, hiai kia ka mu a; himahleh bawltawm tampi a zongkhia uhi.
Mi pil bang a om kua ahia? Huan thil hilhchetna kua ahia thei? Mihing pilna in a mai a vaksak a, a mai takna a kikheng hi.
K’on thuhilh, Pathian thuchiam lam thu ah, kumpipa thupiak zui in.
A omna mun a kipan paikhe ding in man gang ken; thil gilou ah engtat ken: aman lah a utut a hihsek ngal a.
Kumpipa thu in thilhihtheihna a neih ziak in; “Bang ahia na hih?” Kuan ahia a kiang a chi thei ding?
Thupiak zuite’n thil gilou a theikei ding uh; huan mi pil lungtang in hun leh vaihawmna a theikhen zel:
Thiltup chiteng ah lah hun leh vaihawmna a om ngal a; mihing haksatna lah a tung ah a thupi ngal a:
A hongom ding lah a thei ngal kei a; bangchi in a om dia chih amah kuan a hilh thei dia leh?

Kha lentang ding in kha tung a thilhihtheihna neimi a omkei; sihna ni tung ah leng thilhihtheihna a neisam kei: Huan huai kidouna ah panna a omkei: piak a om gitlouhna in amah a hunkhe sam kei ding hi.
Hiai tengteng ka mu a, nasep chiteng ni nuai a hih ah ka lungtang ka pia a: a siatna ding in mi khat in midang tung a thil hihtheihna a neih louh hun a om hi.
Huan giloute vui a om ka mulai a, huan han ah a hong ua; huchi in hihdikte Mun Siangthou a kipan a paimang ua, khopi ah mangngilh in a om uhi: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.
Gilou nasep kintak a gawtna a kibawl louh ziak in, huaiziak in mite tapate lungtang gilou hih ding in huai ah koih kip in a om hi.
Mikhial in gilou za vei hih in, a nite susau mahleh, Pathian kihtamite amau ading in a hoih ding chih ka thei mahmah hi, a ma a laudan siamte:
Himahleh giloute ading in a hoih kei ding, a nite leng a sausak kei ding a, huai lah limliap bang ahi; Pathian ma a laudan a siamlouh ziak in.

Bangmahlou leitung a hih a om a om a; mi diktat omta bang hileh leng, amah tung a migilou nasep dungzui in a hongom nak hi; huailou in migiloute omta bang hileh leng, mi diktatte nasep dungzui in a tung uah a hongom hi: hiai leng bangmahlou ahi.

Nek leh dawn a vualnuam a om kan a ni nuai a mihing in thil hoihzaw a neih louh ziak in, vualnopna ka phat hi: Pathian in amah ni nuai a a piak a damsung ni tengteng a a sepgimna ah amah toh a om gige ding ahi ngal a.
Pilna thei ding leh, leitung a hih a om thulehla mu ding a ka lungtang ka suklai in: sun hiam zan hiam a mit a ihmut muhlouh lah a om ngal a:

Huchi in Pathian thilhih tengteng ka mu a, huchi in ni nuai a thilhih mihing in a mukhe theikei hi: zong khe ding in mihing nakpitak in pang lezong, a muhlouh ding ziak in; huailou in, mi pil in thei kisa mahleh, a mukhe theikei ding hi.

Hiai tengteng ka lungtang in ka vei ngal a, hiai tengteng zongkhe ding in; midiktatte, leh mipilte leh a thilhihte uh Pathian khut ah a om ahi chih: itna ahi hia, muhdahna, mihing in a theikei; a ma uah avek in a om hi.

Thil tengteng kibang in avek ua kiang ah a hongom a: mi diktatte leh migiloute tung ah tanchin khat a om hi; mi hoih kiang a leh mi siang kiang a leh mi sianglou kiang ah; kithoih mi kiang leh kithoihlou mi kiang ah: mi hoih a om bang in, mikhial a om a; a kichiampa, thuchiam kihtapa bang in.

Ni nuai ah hih a om tengteng ah hiai gilou ahi, bangteng tung a tanchin khat om: ahi nalai a, mite tapate lungtang gilou in a dim a, a damlai uh a lungtang uah lungsim kimlouhna a om, huai nung in misite kiang ah a pai uh.
Amah hing lai tengteng toh kizom a om ding in lah lametna a om ngal a: humpinelkai sisa sang in ui hinglai lah a hoihzaw ngal a.
Mihingte’n a si ding uh chih lah a thei ngal ua: himahleh misi in thil himhim a theikei, kipahman leng a neita kei uhi; amaute theihgigena lah a kimangngilh hi.
A itna uh bang in, a muhdahna uleh a enna uh tuin a mangta a; ni nuai a hih a om thil himhim ah tangtawn in tantuan a nei nawnta kei uhi.
Pai inla, nuamsakna toh na tanghou ne inla, lungtang kipak toh in na uain dawn in: Pathian in lah na thilhihte a sangkhinta ngal a.
Na puansilhte ngou gige in om hen; huan na lu in nilhtheih tasam kei hen.

Na bangmahlou damsung ni tengteng a na it zi kiang ah kipaktak in om inla, huai aman ni nuai a a honpiak, na bangmahlou ni tengteng in: huai lah damsung in na tantuan ahi ngal a, ni nuai a na sepgimna a na sepgimna ah.
Na khut in hih ding bangpeuh a muh na theihtawp in sem in; na paina lam han sung ah, nasep hiam, thilngaihtuah hiam, theihna hiam, pilna hiam a omlou ding ahi ngal a.

Ka kihei a, kitaitehna kinte ading ahi kei a, galdouna hatte ading ahi tuankei chih ka mu hi, tanghou leng pilte ading, hauhsakna leng theisiam mite ading, deihsakna khutsiamte ading hi tuanlou; himahleh hun leh phat amaute tengteng tung ah a hongom zel hi.

Mihing in a hun a thei kei hi: ngasate len gilou a a kiman bang leh, vasate thang a a awk uh bang in, huchibang in mite tapate, amau tung a thakhat a a hong tunguih lai in, hun gilou a mat in a om uhi.
Hichibang in pilna leng ni nuai ah ka mu a, ka kiang ah thupi in a kilang hi.
Khopi lianlou a om a, asung ah mi tawmchik; huan kumpipa thupi in a hong sim a, a la a, a douna ding in sepaih nasep thupitak a bawl hi.
Huchi in huai ah mi pil genthei khat a om, a pilna in khopi a hunkhia a; himahleh kuamah in huai migentheipa a theigige kei uh.
Huan, ken, “Hatna sang in pilna a hoihzaw; mi genthei pilna muhsit in a om a, a thute ngaihkhiak sak in a omkei ” ka chi.
Mihaite lak a vaihawmmi kikou sang in awl a mi pil thugente a kiza zaw hi.
Kidouna galvante sang in pilna a hoihzaw; himahleh mikhial khat in hoih tampi a hihsia hi.
Thou sisa in gimlim bawlpa nuhtheihna uihgim a sawlkhe sak a: huchi mah bang in haina neu chik in pilna leh zahna a bukzou nak hi.
Mi pil lungtang a khut taklam ah a om a; himahleh mihai lungtang a khut veilam ah.
Ahi, huaiban ah, lampi a mihai a vaklai in, a theihsiamna in a zuausan a, mi chiteng kiang ah hai a hihdan a gen hi.
Vaihawmmi lungsim nang dou ding a a thoh leh, na mun taisan ken; kipiak in tatkhelhna thupite a lungkimsak hi.
Gilou ni nuai a ka muh, vaihawmmi a kipan a diklouhna hong kipan khia bang in a om hi.
Haina nakpi a zahtakhuai in a kibawla, mun niam ah hauhsakna a tu hi.
Sikhate sakol tung a tuang leh, lalte leitung a sikhate bang a khe a pai ka mu hi.
Kuapeuh kawkhuk tou huai sung ah a ke ding; kuapeuh dai phuvang; gulpi in a kei ding.
Kuapeuh suang hemkhia huai in a kihihna ding a; kuapeuh sing a belh huai ah lauhuai in a kibawl hi.
Sik a mol a, min a ma a tat hiam kei leh, hatna tamsem a koih ding ahi: himahleh pilna thuzoh a phatuam hi.
Khim a om ma a gulpi in a keih leh, khimmi ah phattuamna a omta kei hi.
Mi pil kam a thute hehpihthei in a om a; himahleh mihai mukte’n amah mah a nawmvalh ding.
A kam a thute kipatna haina ahi: huan a houlimna tawpna lungsim kimlouhna gilou ahi.
Mihai in leng thu a khangsak a: himahleh mihing in bang a om dia chih a theikei; huan amah nung a hongom ding, amah kuan a hilh thei dia?
Khopi a hohna dan a theihlouh ziak in, mihaite sepgimna in amaute lak a michih a gimsak hi.
Aw gam, na tung a gik hi, na kumpipa naupang a hihlai in na lalte’n zingsang in a ne uh!
Aw gam, na kumpipa miliante tapa a hih a, na lalte’n, kham ding hilou a, hatna ding a a huntak a a neklai un, nuam na sa hi.
Thadahna ziak in intung a chim a; khut zawntatna ziak in inn a keh hi.
Nuihna ding in Ankuang a kilui a, uain in hinna a kipaksak; sum thil tengteng awnghukna ahi.
Kumpipa, na ngaihtuahna in hamsiat ken, na lupna dantan sung ah mihausate hamsiat ken: huih khua a vasate’n na aw paw ding ua, kha neite’n a thu gen ding uh a hih ziak in.
Tuite tung ah na tanghou pai in: ni tampi nung a mukhe ding na hi ngal a.
Sagih kiang ah tantuan pia in, ahi, giat ngei kiang ah; leitung a bang gilou hongom ding ahia chih lah na thei ngal kei a.
Meipite vuah a a dim leh, leitung ah a kihih awngthawl uh: huan simlam a sing a puk leh, hiam mallam ah, a pukna mun ah, huai ah a om ding hi.
Huih ngeingaih mi in a tuh kei ding a; meipi limsakmi in a at kei ding hi.
Huih lampi hiam, amah nau toh omna gil sung a guhte bang hong chi khan uh ahia chih na theihlouh bang in; bangteng hihpa Pathian thilhih na theikei hi.
Zingsang in na chi tuh inla, nitakin na khut ton maimah ken: koipen hong lohching ding ahia, hiai hia huai hia, ahihkeileh hong hoih tuaktuak ding uhia chih lah na thei ngal kei a.
Diktakin khovak a nuam a, mitte adia ni muh thil nuam tak ahi.
Ahi, mi kum tampi a dam a leh, huaite tengteng ah kipak hen; himahleh khomial hunte theigige hen, tampi pha ding uh lah ahi ngal a. A hongom tengteng bangmahlou ahi.

Aw tangval, na tuailai in kipak in: na tuailai nite ah na lungtang in hon kipaksak hen, na lungtang lampite ah leh, na mitte muh in om in: himahleh hiai thilte tengteng ziak in Pathian in nang vaihawmna a honpi ding ahi chih thei in.
Huaiziak in na lungtang a kipan lungkhamna suankhia inla, na sa a kipan gilou koihmang in: tuailaina leh khan lutlai lah bangmahlou ahi ngal a.
Na tuailai nite in nang honsiampa theigige in, ni hoihloute a hongtun ua kumte a hongnai ua, Amaute ah kipahna ka neikei, na chih hun a hongtun nailouh lai in.
Ni hiam, khovak leh, kha leh, aksite, hihmial a om a, meipite vuahzuk khit a a kiknawn ma un:
inn ngakte a kivuan ua, mi hatte a hong kun ua, a tawm tak ziak ua ansute a khawl ua, tawlet a dakkhete hihmial a a om ua,
Kong zing a kongkhakte khak a hih nailouh lai un; ansuk ging a ngaihlouh a, vasa aw a mi a thoh a, tumging theih tanute tengteng sukniam a a om nailouh lai un;

Ahi, tung sang a om a kihta ding ua, a lampi ah launa a om ding; vaisuaklu sing a paklun ding a, huan khaukhup tunggikna ahi dia, lingmin thuk a zuau ding; mihing a inn sau a pai a, sunmite kongzing kim a a pai ziak un.
Dangka khau kiphel a, dangkaeng noubem suktap a a om a, tuibel tuikhuk a hihkek a a om a, tuibem a kangtalai khe hihtan a a om nailouh lai in;
Huan, a om bang in leivui lei ah a kiknawn a, kha bel a pepa Pathian kiang ah a kik hi.
Bangmah loute bangmahlou, thugenmi’n a chi; bangteng bangmahlou ahi.
Huaiban ah, Thugenpa a pil ziak in, mite theihna a sinsak lailai a; ahi, paunak tampi kizom zom in a ngaihtuah a, a zongkhia a, a koih hi.
Thugenpa thu pomtakte mukhe ding in a zong a, diktak a gelhkhiak a omte, thutak thute ngei.
Mi pil thute sutna zum bang ahi a, hoihtak a khetkip sikilhnate bang tuh Belamchingpa khat thugen lakkhawm piakte ahi.
Huan huailou leng, ka tapa, hilh in om in: laibu tampi bawl ahihleh tawp chih ni a omkei hi; huan zil tamna zaw sa bahna ahi.
Hiai thu leh la tawpna ahi; avek in zak in a omta: Pathian laudan siam inla, a thupiakte zui in; hiai lah mihing hih ding pumpi ahi.
Pathian in thilhih chiteng, thil selguk chiteng, a hoih hia ahihkeileh a hoihlou toh vaihawmna a la lut ding ahi.
Late la, Solomon a.
Na kam tawpnate in hontawp
lechin aw!
na itna uain sang in a hoihzaw ngal a.
Na kinuhte’n gimlim hoihtak
a nei a,
na min kinuh butkhiak bang ahi a,
huaiziak in nungak siangthoute’n nang a hon it uhi.
Honkai in, nang k’on delh ding:
kumpipa’n a dantante sung ah a honpita a,
nang ah ka kipak un nuam ka sa ding uh,
uain sang in na itna ka genkhe mun za ding ua:
A dikte’n nang a hon it uh.
Ka vom a, himahleh ka mel a hoih hi,
Aw nou Jerusalem tanute, Kedar puaninte bang,
Solomon puankhaite bang.
Ka vom ziak in hon en ken,
ni’n a honhai ziak in.
Ka nu tapate ka tung ah a thangpai ua,
grephuante kem in a honbawl ua;
himahleh keimah grephuan leng ka kem kei.
Honhilh ve, aw nang ka kha in a it,
na ganhon vakna mun,
sunlai a na khawlsakna mun:
bangding a na kithuahpihte lak a ganhon kiang a maituam bang a kei om ding ka hia?
Na theih kei leh, Aw nang numeite lak a kilawmpen,
ganhonte khapte zui in kuan khia inla,
belamchingte puanin kiang ah na kelnoute vak in.
Aw ka it, Pharo kangtalaite lak a sakol toh k’on teh hi.
Na biang samphekte toh a kilawm a,
na ngawng suangmantam khite toh.
Dangkaeng samphekte dangka
siatte toh k’on bawlsak ding uh.
Kumpipa a dohkan a a tutlai in,
ka spiknardi gimlim in a namtuina a sawlkhia.
Ka ngaihnou kei ading in murra gimlim bang ahi a,
ka nawite kikal a om.
Ka ngaihnou kei ading in
Engedi grephuante a henna pak bawk bang ahi.
Ngai in, na kilawm, ka it;
ngai in, na kilawm;
na mitte vahui bang ahi uh.
Ngai in, na kilawm ka ngaihnou, ahi, a nuam:
i tutna nem leng a hing.
Sidar singte i inkamte ahi a,
i insunte meilah singte ahi.
Saron pak ka hi, phaizang lili pak.
Ling lak a lili pak bang in,
huchibang in tanute lak ah ka it a om hi.
Gamlak singte lak a apple kung bang in,
huchibang in tapate lak ah ka ngaihnou a om hi.
Nakpi a kipahna toh a lim nuai ah ka tu a,
a gah ka chep in a khum hi.
Ankuangluina inn ah a honpi a,
ka tung a kizak puanlap a itna ahi.
Grep phoukeu in honkhou unla,
apple theiin honnem un:
zawlngai in ka chi a na ngal a.
A khut veilam ka lu nuai ah a om a, a khut taklam in a honkawi hi.
Zuktal leh gam a zukpite k’on ngen hi,
Aw Jerusalem tanute,
ka it hihbuai kei unla,
phawng kei un, a lungkim matan.
Ka ngaihnou aw! ngai un, a hong hi,
mualte tung ah a tawm a,
tang tungte ah a diang hi.
Ka ngaihnou zaw zuktal hiam
sakhi tuailai bang ahi:
Ngai in, ka kulhbang nunglam uah ading a,
tohlette ah a en a,
a nannate ah amah a kimu sak.
Ka ngaihnou in thu a gen a,
ka kiang ah Pasal thou in, ka it,
ka kilawmnou,
hongpai meng in, a chi hi.
Ngai in, phalbi lah a beita ngal a,
vuah a theuta a,
a paimangta hi;
Leitung ah pakte hong kilang a;
vasate lasak hun a hongtung a,
i gam uah vakhu aw a kizata hi;
Theipi kung in gahhingte
a minsak a, grepguite a paklun uhi,
a gimlimte uh a suaksak uhi.
Thouve, ka it, ka kilawmnou hongpai meng in.
Mun sang a suangpi heng a om,
vakhu bang na hi, na mel hon
musak inla, na aw hon zasak in,
na aw a khum a, na mel a hoih hi.
Sehalte, grephuan hihsia,
sehal neute honmat sak ve;
ka grephuan uh a paklun ngal a.
Ka ngaihnou kei a ahi,
kei amah a ka hi:
lili pak lak ah a gan a ching a,
Ni a hongnem a, limliapte a man matan, ka ngaihnou, kihei inla,
Bether mualtung a zuktal hiam sakhi tuailai bang in om in.
Zan a ka lupna tung a ka ihmut
in, ka mang in ka it ka mu hi:
Amah ka zong zong a,
himahleh amah ka mu kei.
Ka thou dia, khopi kim ah
ka pai dia, kongzing leh lampi ah,
amah ka kha in a it ka zong ding,
ka chi a ka zong hi,
himahleh amah ka mu kei hi.
Khopi a vialpai vengmite’n a
honmu ua: a kiang uah, Amah
ka kha in a it na mu uhia? ka chi a.
Amaute ka paisan sawtlou chik ahi,
huan amah ka kha in a it ka mu hi:
ka paisak kei, ka nu inn sung,
honpai nu dantan sung a
amah ka pilut masiah.
Zuktal leh gam a zukpite in k’on ngen hi,
Aw Jerusalem tanute aw,
ka it hihbuai kei unla,
phawng kei un, a lungkim matan.
Gamdai a kipan a meikhu kitung bang a hongpai murra leh begaw kinuh a,
sumsinmi nuhngou vui kinuh hiai kua ahia?
Ngai in, Solomon lupna ahi;
a kim ah mi hat sawmguk,
Israel mi hatte a kipan a om uh.
Namsau a tawichiat ua,
kidouna a kivate ahi uhi:
Michih in a pheipi tung ah
namsau a tawichiat ua,
zan a launa ziak in.
Kumpipa Solomon in Lebanon
sing in kangtalai a kibawl hi.
Huai a khuamte dangka in
a bawl a, a nuai dangkaeng,
a tutphah a sandup, a laizang,
Jerusalem tanute a kipan a itna in phah ahi.
Aw nou Zion tanute, pawtkhia
unla, kumpipa Solomon en un,
a zineih ni leh a lungtang kipahna ni a,
a nun amah lallukhu a khuksak toh.
Ngai in, na kilawm hi, ka it;
ngai in, na kilawm hi;
na maituamna liah ah na mitte vahui bang ahi ua:
na sam kelhon bang ahi,
Gilead mualpang a kualte.
Na hate mulmet thak belamnu
hon bang ahi ua, sil khitphet
a hongpai toute;
huai ah amaute chiat in phik a nei ua, a lak ua kuamah a ching a omkei uh.
Na mukte khau san-au a bang ua,
na kam a kilawm a: na mit laivomte theibuhfai them bang ahi na maituamna liah ah.
Na ngawng David galvan koihna insang a lam bang ahi,
lumbem neute sang khat
kikhaina mun,
mi hat lum in a kivan uh.
Na nawite zuktal nou nih phikte a bang ua,
lili pak lak a tate.
Ni a nem a limliap a man mateng murra mual ah leh,
begaw tang ah ka hoh ding.
Na kilawm hi, ka it; nang ah
thil nin bangmah a omkei hi.
Lebanon a kipan honzui in,
Ka mou, Lebanon apan kei toh:
Amana vum a kipan dak in,
Shenir leh Hermon vum a kipan,
humpinelkaite kua a kipan,
gialbemte mual a kipan.
Ka lungtang na tuahmangta,
ka sanggamnu, ka mou;
na mitte lak a khat in ka
lungtang na tuahmangta hi,
na ngawng a khainiang khat in.
Na itna kilawm natel e,
ka sanggamnu, ka mou!
Na itna uain sang in
nakpi’n a hoihzaw!
Na kinuh gim, gimlim
chiteng sang in a hoihzaw.
Na mukte, Aw ka mou,
khuaikhak bang in a takkhia a:
na lei nuai ah khuaizu leh
nawitui a om; na puansilh
gim Lebanon gim ahi.
Huan umsuak ka sanggamnu,
ka mou; tuinak kihu, tui kivuh.
Na huansung theibuhfai, gah
manphate toh ahi; spiknardi
singsuan toh henna pak ahi.
Spiknardi leh pak gimlim,
kepbuk leh singnamtui begaw
