sing tengteng; murra leh aloe,
gimlim pipen teng toh.
Huan a tuikhuk na hi a,
tuihing lui,
Lebanon a kipan a lui luangte.
Khanglou in, Aw mallam huih;
huan hong in, nang simlam;
ka huan tung ah hongnung in,
Na gimnamtuite a luankhiak theihna ding in.
Ka ngaihnou a huansung ah hongpai henla,
a theigah manphate ne hen aw.
Ka huan sung ah ka hongpai hi,
ka sanggamnu, ka mou:
ka murra ka gimnamtui toh
ka lakhawmta: ka khuaikhak
ka khuaizu toh ka neta a;
ka uain ka nawitui toh ka dawnta.
Numeite Aw, lawmte,
Ne un; dawn un, ahi, tampi dawn un,
Aw ka ngaihnou.
Ka ihmu a, himahleh ka lungtang a hak:
a kiu ka ngaihnou aw ahi,
Honhon in, ka sanggamnu, ka it,
ka vahui, ka nin banglou:
ka lutang daitui in a dim a,
ka samtum lah zan a tuitakin.
Ka puanak tung ka suahta a:
bangchi’n ka silh nawn dia?
Ka khepekte ka silta a;
bangchi’n ka hihnin dia?
Ka ngaihnou in kongkhak awng
ah a khut a hon golhlut a,
amah ziak in ka lungtang
hihlin in a om hi.
Ka ngaihnou hon ding in ka thou ta a;
Ka khutte murra in a tak a,
ka khutzungte murra tui in,
kalhna hekna tung ah.
Ka ngaihnou ka honta a;
himahleh ka ngaihnou a na kiknawn a a na omta kei hi.
Thu a genlai in ka kha in a hon zuausan a:
amah ka zong a,
himahleh hon dawng kei hi.
Khopi a vialvak vengmite’n a
honmu ua, a honkhen ua,
a hon liamsak uh;
kulhbang ngakte’n ka puanak
a honlak mangsak uh.
K’on ngen ahi,
Aw Jerusalem tanute,
Ka ngaihnou na muh uleh,
zawlngai in ka chi a na
chih, amah na hilh un.
Na ngaihnou, ngaihnou
dang sang a a tuansemna bang ahia?
Aw nang numeite lak a kilawmpen?
Na ngaihnou, ngaihnou dang
sang a a tuansemna bang ahia,
huchibang n’on nget?
Ka ngaihnou zaw a san hiuhiau
a, sang sawm lak a pipen ahi.
A lutang dangkaeng hoihpen a
bang a, a samtumte a lian a,
va-ak bang in a vom hi.
A mitte luita tui kiang a vahui
bang ahi a; nawitui a sil,
kituaktak a bulh ahi.
A biangte gimnamtui omna
bang ahi a, loupa gimlim bang:
a mukte lili pak bang ahia,
murra tui takkhesak in.
A khutte dangkaeng zungbuh beril suangmantam siatna bang ahi:
a pumpi saiha a bawl sapphir
suangmantam a luan bang ahi.
A khete suangpak khuam,
dangkaeng hoihte kuak a kitung bang ahi:
A kilatdan Lebanon bang,
sidar bang a thupi ahi.
A kam a khum penpen a: ahi,
a ngaihhuai tuntun hi.
Hiai ka ngaihnou ahi a,
hiai ka lawm ahi.
Aw Jerusalem tanute.
Na ngaihnou koilam a pai ahia,
Aw nang numeite lak a
kilawm penpen?
Amah na ngaihnou koilam a kiheita ahia,
amah k’on zon pih theihna ding un?
Ka ngaihnou a huan ah a hohsuk
a, gimnamtui mun ah, huansung a vak in, lili pak lakhawm ding in.
Ka ngaihnou a ka hi a, ka ngaihnou kei a ahi:
lili lak ah a gan a vak hi.
Na kilawm hi, Aw ka it,
Tirzah bang a kilawm,
Jerusalem bang a deihhuai,
na lauhuaina sepaih pawl
puanlapte bang in ahi.
Na mitte kei kipan la kik in,
amau lah a honzouta ua.
Na sam Gilead pang a kual
kelhon bang ahi.
Na hate belamnu hon bang
ahi ua, sil khitphet a
hongpaitoute; huai ah amaute
chiat in phik a nei ua,
a lak uah kuamah a ching a omkei uh.
Na mit laivomte theibuhfai them na maituamna liah a om bang ahi .
Kumpinu sawmguk a om ua,
mei sawmgiat, huan nungak
siangthou simsenglouh.
Ka vahui, ka ninbanglou,
khat kia ahi; a nu lak a amah
kia ahi; amah suang lak a
a hoihpen ahi.
Tanute’n amah a mu ua,
nuamsa a chi uhi, ahi,
kumpinute leh a meite’n amah a phat uhi.
Zingsang bang a dakkhia amah kua ahia?
khapi bang a kilawm, ni bang a siang,
sepaihhon puanlap bang a lauhuai?
Makhatang huan ah ka paisuak a,
guam a singsuan hingte en ding in,
grep a pakmum hiam chih leh
theibuhfai a pakpalhta hiam chih en ding in.
Ahihkeileh ka theihkhiak ma in
ka kha in ka lunglutna ka mipite kangtalai lak ah a hon koihta hi.
Hongkik in, hongkik in,
Aw Shulammi; k’on et theihna ding un hongkik in,
khongkik in,
Bangdia Mahanaim mite lamen bang a
Shulam mi en ding na hi ua?
Khedap tungneilou ah na
khepekte kilawm hina mahmah e,
Aw kumpi tanu: na phei guhtuah suangmantam bang ahi ua,
nasem mi pil khut nasep bang.
Na lai nou bem bang ahi,
huai ah uain hel a kitasam
ngeikei a: na gilpi huitbuh
hum lili pak siat dim a bang hi.
Na nawi zuktal nou nih phik a bang uhi.
Na ngawng saiha insang a bang;
na mitte Barthrabbim kongpi a,
Heshbon a om tuilite a bang uh;
na nak Lebanon a insang a bang a
Damaska lam muhsukna om.
Na tung a na lutang karmel a bang a,
na lu a sam sandup a bang; huai sampha lak ah kumpipa sal a mat in a om hi.
Aw it, kipahna ding in nak kilawm in nak nop hina mahmah chia!
Na sandan tumsing bang ahi a,
na nawite grep gahbomte bang.
tumsing ah ka kaltou ding a,
huai a hiangte ka len ding,
ka chi a: na nawi grepgui
gahbom bang hi henla,
huan na nawi gim apple bang;
Na kam uain hoihpen pen bang hi,
Ka ngaihnou adia nemtak a paisuk,
ihmute muk a tolh paisuak.
Ka ngaihnou a ka hi a,
a deihlam kei lam ah a om.
Hong in, ka ngaihnou,
gam ah i paikhe ding a;
khoneute ah i giak ding.
Grephuan lam ah zingkhang
in i thou ding a;
Grepgui a pakmumta hia, a pak palh a kihongta hia i va en ding,
huan theibuhfai a pak kheta hia:
huai ah ka itna k’on pe ding hi.
Jawlzongpak in gimnamtui
a suaksak a, ka kongkhak uah
thei manpha chi kim,
a thak leh a lui a om, nang ading in ka na kholkhawm,
aw ngaihnou.
Aw ka nu nawi ne, ka unaupa
bang hile chin maw!
Pawlam a k’on muh leh,
k’on tawp ding; Ahi, kuamah in a hon musit kei ding uh.
Nang k’on pi ding a, ka nu inn
sung ah k’on lalut ding a,
aman kei a honhilh ding;
uain namtui k’on dawnsak ding a,
ka theibuhfai tuining.
A khut veilam ka lu nuai ah
a om ding a,
a khut taklam in a honkawi ding hi.
K’on ngen hi, Aw Jerusalem
tanute, Ka it, hihbuai kei unla,
phawng kei un, a lungkim matan.
Gamdai a kipan a hongtou hiai a ngaihnou tung a kingai kua ahia?
Apple sing nuai ah ka hon phawng a:
huai ah na nun nang a honvei a,
huai ah nang hon piangsak
amah nauvei in a om hi.
Na lungtang a suai bang in,
na ban a suai bang in kei
honkoih in: itna lah sihna
bang in a hat ngal a;
han bang in a gilou a:
huai a kuangte meikuang
Tui tampi in itna a phelh theikei
a, tuikhangte’n a tum thei kei hi:
itna ziak in min a inn a vante
pe ding hita leh, nakpitak a
muhsit in a om ding hi.
Sanggamnu neu ka nei ua,
nawi a neikei:
A tungtang kigen ni’n ka sanggamnu uh a ding in bang ka hih ding ua?
Kulhbang hi leh bel, amah tung
ah dangka insang neu khat ka lam ding ua:
kongkhak hita leh,
amah sidar singpek in ka sungkhum ding uh.
Kulhbang ka hi a, ka nawite huai a insang bang ahi uh:
huchihlai in mi muanna musa bang in a mit ah ka om hi.
Baal Hamon ah Solomon in
grephuan a nei hi;
kemmite kiang ah grephuan a khelsak a;
huai a a gah ading in michih in dangka sang khat
ngen a hontawi ding uh ahi.
Grephuan, kei a ahi a, ka ma ah
a om: Aw Solomon, nang,
sang na nei ding a, huai
a theigah kemte’n za nih.
Nang huante sung a teng,
na kithuahpihte’n na aw a
ngai ua, huai hon za sak in.
Kinmeng in, ka ngaihnou,
gimlim mualtung a zuktal hiam sakhi tuailai hiam bang in om in.
Amoz tapa Isai in Judah kumpipa Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz leh Hezekiah te vaihawm lai a, Judah leh Jerusalem tungtang thu a kilakna a muh thu:
“Vante aw, ngaikhia unla, lei aw, bildoh in,
Bawngtal in a neitu a thei a, sabiltung in leng a pu anpiakna a thei: Israelte’n bel a theikei uh, ka mite’n a ngaihtuah kei uh” chi in.
Ah! nam gilou thulimlouhna gikpi pua mite, thil hoihlou hihte, gamtat hoihlou pi a gamtate ahi ua:
Bang achia hel semsem a, vuak a om lailai na hi ua oi? Lutang a pum in a chi a na a, lungtang leng a pum in a gimta.
Khepeknuai a kipan a lutang pha in damlai himhim a omkei; chikeh, vuak sidup ek, meima naila ngen ahi: huaite lah a mekbing kei ua, tuam leng a tuam sam kei ua, sathau leng a nuh kei uhi.
Na gam uh loihin a omkhinta; na khuate uh mei in a kangkhinta: na gam uh gamdang mite’n na mitmuh un a neikhin ua, gamdang mite hihsiat bang in a sekhinta hi.
Zion tanu grephuan a vennabuk bang leh, tangmai huan a buk bang leh, khopi umsuak bang a nutsiat in a omta hi.
Sepaihte
Sodom vaihawmte aw,

, “Huai zahzah a na kithoihna uh kei ding a bang ahia a thamatna om? Belamtal haltum a latte leh gan vakthaute thau in a honnimta; bawngpate leh belamnoute leh kelpate sisan ah leng ka kipak kei, a chi.
Ka ma a kilak ding a na hongpai un, ka biakin huangsung intual sik ding kuan a honphut a?

Thilpiak bangmah loute hontawi nawn kei un; banghiam gimlim kei ading in thil kihhuaipi ahi; kha thakte, khawlnite, khawmpite na kichial khawmte mawkmawk uh ka iplah mahmah; kikhopna thupitak leng thulimlouhna ahi.
Na kha thakte uleh hunbi nei a na ankuangluinate uh ka lungsim in a hua hi: kei adin tunggikna ahi; ka thuak chimta hi.
“Huchi in na khut uh na zak chiang un leng ka mit k’on humsan dia: ahi, tamveipi na thum chiang un leng ka ngaikhe kei ding: na khutte ulah sisan in a dim ngal a.
Kisil unla, kihihsiang un; ka mitmuh phaklouh din na thilhihte uh a gitlouhna koihmang un; gilou hih tawpta un:
Thil hoih hih kisinta unla; vaihawmna diktat zong un, nuaisiahna thuakte panpih unla, pa neiloute vai hawmsak unla, meithai thu gensak un” a chi hi.
Gennop tak leh thumang a na om uleh, na gam thil hoihte uh na ne ding uh:
Himahleh na ut kei ua na hel uleh, namsau nekkhit in na om ding uh:
Bangchidan ahia khopi muanhuaitak kizuak a hongsuah maimah, vaihawm diktatna a dim nu hisek hi a! Amah ah diktatna a omsek a, tun lah tualthatmite om hi!
Na dangka eksia a hong hita, na uain lah tui toh hel ahita.
Na mi liante mihelhat, gutate lawmte ahi uh; michih in golhna a deih ua, thilpiak a delhnak uhi: pa neiloute a hawmsak sek kei ua, meithaite makhua khualna leng a kiang uh a tung ngei sam kei hi.
Huaiziak in,
Huchi in, na tung ah ka khut ka kha ding a, na eksia siang sipsip in ka hihmang ding, na sikgawm tengteng ka lamang vek ding:

Huan, na sung a vaihawmtute a tung a a om bang un ka omsak nawn ding a, na sung a lemtheimite a masapen a a om bang un ka omsak lai ding hi: Huai khitchiang in, Diktatna khopi, khopi muanhuai, a honchi ding uhi” a chi hi.
Zion vaihawmna diktata hotkhiak ahita ding a, asung a mi piangthak nawnte leng diktatna a hotkhiak ahi ding uhi.
Himahleh mihelte leh mikhialte hihsiatna a kituakin a om ding a,
Na tosaw deihmah mahte uh a zumpihta ding ua, na huan telte uh ziak in zaktatakin na om ding uhi.
Tosaw a nah vuaite leh huan tui mulou bang phet na hi ding hi.
Huchi in, mi hattak jija zial bang ahita ding a, a nasep meiek bang ahi ding; huchi in a kang tuaktuak ding ua; kuamah in a phelh kei ding uh, chi in.
Amoz tapa Isai in Judah leh Jerusalem tungtang thu a muh:
Ni nanungte ah hichi ahi ding a,
tangneu kha khate tung ah leng tawisan in a om ding;
huai ah namchihte a hoh ding uhi.
Huan, chi tampite a hoh ding ua,
Hongpai unla,
Jakob Pathian inn ah, i hohtou ding uh;
aman a lamte tanchinte
a hon sinsak ding a,
a lampite ah i pai ding, a chi ding uh;
Zion a kipan in danthu a hongpawt ding a,
Huchi in, aman namchih lak ah vai a hawm ding a,
chi tampi tak leng a taihilh ding:
a temsaute uh leilehna
mukzum di’n a sek ding uh:
namdang in namdang tung ah namsau a likta kei ding a,
kidou dan leng a sin kei ding uhi.
Jakob inkuanpihte aw, hongpai un
Suahlam a kipan a dan hongpawtta a, a na dim ua, Philistiate bang a aisansiamte a hih ua, gamdang mite tate toh khut a kilet ziak un, Na mi, Jakob inkuanpihte, lah na paisanta hi.
A gam uh dangka leh dangkaeng in a dim a, a sumte ulah simseng vual ahi kei; a gam uh sakol in a dim a, a kangtalaite ulah simseng vual ahi kei hi.
A gam uh milim in a dim a; a khut ua a sep khiak uh, a khutzungte ua a bawl uh, a besek uhi.
Mi neute hihniam in a om ua, mi liante leng niamsak in a om uh: huaiziak in amau ngaidam ken.
Mihing kideihnate hihniam in a om ding a, mite kisaktheihna niamsak in a om ding, huai ni’n
Sepaihte
Lebanon tang a sidar sing sang pipite leh tawisang a om tengteng tung ah, Bashan gam a tosaw tengteng tung ah,
Tang lian sangpipite tung ah, tang neu tawisang a om tengteng tung ah,
Inn sang sangpipite tung ah, kulh bang tengteng tung ah
Tarsish long lian tengteng tung ah, thil lim deihhuai tengteng tung ah leng hongom ding hi.
Mihing kideihnate hihniam in a om ding a, mite kisaktheihna niamsak in a om ding. Huaini in
Milimte a mang vengveng ding hi.
Huan, lei nakpipi a lingsak ding a a thoh hun chiang in,
Huai ni’n mite’n a dangka milimte uleh a dangkaeng milimte uh, biak ding a a bawlsak uh, buite leh bakte kiang ah a pai ding uh;
Lei nakpipi a lingsak ding a a thoh hun chiang in,
A nak vang ua hu om mihing muan tawpsanta un: Banglam ah ahia muantak a hih mahmah uh?
Ngai dih ua,
Mi hat leh kidousiamte toh; vaihawmmi leh zawlnei leh, aisansiam leh, upate toh;
Sawmnga heutu leh, mi zahtakhuai leh, lemtheimi leh, khutsiam leh thugensiamte toh.
Huchi in a mi liante kiang ah naupangte ka pe ding a, naungekte’n a tung uah vai a hawm ding uh.

Huchi in, mite nuaisiah in a om ding ua, michih kinuaisiah in a om ding uh, michih amau invengte toh kinuaisiah in a om ding uh: naupang upa tung ah kisathei tak in a om ding ua, mi thulimloupi nangawn mizahtakhuai tung ah kisathei tak in a om ding.
Mi’n a pa inn a unau len in, “Nang silhlehten na nei a, ka vaihawmtu un om inla, hiai siatna na khut ah om heh” a chih chiang in:
Huai chiang in amah a pau khe ding a, “Kei zaw bawlhoihtu in ka omkei ding hi; ka inn ah nekding a omkei a, silhlehten leng a omkei: mite vaihawmpa in n’on bawl kei ding” chi in.
A thupina mit vuisak ding a a pau uleh a thilhihte uh
A mel latdan in amau a hek tawm a; a khelhna uh Sodom bangtak in a langsak ua, a im kei uh. A tung uh gik e! thil hoihlou in a kithuk tawm ngal ua.
Mi diktat thu ah a hoih ding uhi, chi un; a thilhih gahte ulah a ne sin ngal ua.
Migiloute tung a gik hi! Lah a se sin ngal ua; a khut ua thilhih thukna a kiang ua piak a hih ding ziak in.
Ka mite zaw, amau nuaisiahtute naupangte ahita ua, numeite’n a tung uah vai a hawmta uhi. Ka mite aw, nou honpite’n a hon pikhial ua, na paina lamte a hihse sek uhi.
a mite upate tung ah leh amau mi liante tung ah vai a hawm ding:
Bang achia ahia ka mite na at ua, tagahte mai na gawizan uh?” a chi hi.
Huailou in
Zion tanute luzang ah meima khem a omsak ding a,
Huai ni chiang in
Bilbah kai ngiahngiahte, taute, kikhuhna puante;
Lutang puante, khebulh khainiangte, kawng a tente, gimlim bawmte, kikaunate;
Minsawnna zungbuhte, nakbulhte;
Ankuangluina vante, puanak tualte, puan silhte, kawljalte;
Limlangte, puanmalngatte, dialte, kituamhoihna puante.
Thau namtui sik in thil muat a om ding; kawnggak sik in khauzen a om ding; sam mam sik in talkolh a om ding; puan kilawmtak sik in saiip puan a om ding: melhoih sik in meikang pawn a om ding hi.
Na mite namsau vatpaih in a om ding ua, na mi hat mahmahte kidouna ah a puk ding uh.
A kulh kongkhakte ah awm kitum in a kap ding ua; a hawm a nutsiat ahi ding ua, lei ah a tu ding hi.

Huai ni’n numei sagih in pasal khat a len ding ua, “Koumau an ka ne ding ua, koumau silhlehten ka silh un ka teng ding uh; na min lel hon pusak in; ka minsia uh hon lakmangsak in” chi in, a gen ding uhi.
Huai ni’n
Huchi in, Zion nutsiat a om leh, Jerusalem a omden tuh siangthou chih in a om ding, michih Jerusalem a damlai a min gelhte.
Vaihawmna kha leh katna kha a
Huan,
Sun in nisa liah ding leh huihpi vuahpi lak a kihumbitna leh bukna mun ding in bawkta ahi ding hi.
Ka itluat thu, a grephuan
tungtang thu, ka itluat ading in la in ka sata mai ding.
Ka itluat in tang lei hoih mahmah ah grephuan a nei hi.
A kimvel in lei a toukuaka,
a suangte a tom sianga,
grepgui hoihpen a suan a,
a lai ah insang a lam a, huai ah grep sukna khuk leng a tou hi.
huchi in, grep gah a gah ding in a lamen a,
himahleh grep taklou a gah maimah hi.
Tuin, Jerusalem a omte leh Judah mite aw, “Hehpih in kei leh ka grephuan kal thu hon ngaihtuah dihve ua.
Tua grephuan ah ka hihsa a kan a val a tung ah hih nawn lailai ding bangbang om ahita mai a? Bangziak in ahia, grep gah a gah ding a ka lamet et toh, grep taklou a gah maimah?
Tuin ngai un, ka grephuan tung ah ka hih ding k’on hilh ding: a ling dai ka lamang ding a, nekgaih in a om ding; a suangdai ka chimsak ding a, sikden in a om ding:
Huan, ka hihse vek ding a; satnou in om ken chin, tohvui in leng omsam ken teh; loulingnei leh khau lingneite a pou zaw ding: meite leng a tung a vuah zusak lou ding in thu ka pe ding hi” a chi hi.
Sepaihte
Israel inkuanpihte ahi a,
Judah mite a kung deihhuai ahi uhi; vaihawmna diktat a lamen a;
himahleh, ngai in, nuaisiahna
a hongom zawta ahi: diktatna
a lamen a, himahleh, ngai in,
kikou husa a hongom zawta hi.
Gam laizang a amau kia a om theihna ding ua mi om samna ding mun himhim omlou khop hial a inn leh inn kizomsak zel leh, lou leh lou kizomsakte tung a gik hi.
Sepaihte
Grep huan tin sawm mun ah bath khat kia suak ding in a kisa a, buh chi homer khat tuh in ephah khat kia suak ding in lah a kisa ngal a” chi in.
Zu delh ding a zingkhang pipi a thou a, uain in a khamgawp sak mateng zan sawtpi pi tan a om sakte a tung uh a gik hi.
Tumging leh kaihgingte, khuangta leh tamngaite, uain toh a ankuangluina uahte a om sek a, himahleh
Huaiziak in ka mite zaw, theihna a neih louh ziak un, sal a pi in a omta ua: a mi zahtakhuaite uh a gil uh a kial a, a mipite uh dangtak in a dang uh a keu khinta hi.
Huaiziak in Sheol in a gilkialna a na liansak a, a kam teh vuallouh khop in a kata a: huchi in a thupinate uh, a mipite uh, a thupi mahmahnate un, a lak ua kipaktak a omte toh a lutsuk ngoingoi uhi.
Mi neute kunsak in a om ua, mi liante niamsak in a om ua, kisatheite sukniam in a omta uhi;
Sepaihte
Huan, belamnoute a tatna mun ua a ta bang un a ta diamdiam ding ua, mi thau pipite mun sesa a thilte vakvaite’n a ne ding uhi.
Zuautheihna khaute a thulimlouhna kai a, kangtalai khauzen a kaih bang a khelhna kaisek tung a gik hi!
I muhna ding in hihmeng henla, a thilhih ding hihkin heh; i theihna ding in Israelte Mi Siangthou lemtheih hongnai in hongtung hen, chi gigete ngei.
Thil hoihlou thil hoih chi a, thil hoih lah thil hoihlou chi zel a, vak mial a ngai a, mial vak a ngaisek a, thil khum thil kha a ngai a, thil kha thil khum a ngaisekte a tung uh a gik hi.
Amau pil a kingaihtuahte leh amau mit muh a teite a tung uh a gik hi!
Uain dawn lam a mi hattak, zu hel lam a thagui nei mite a tung uh a gik!
Golh nek ziak a migilou siamtangsak sek a, mi diktat diktatna laksak sekte ngei.

Huaiziak in meikuang in buhpawl a liak bei dundun sek bang in leh loupa keu meikuang a a puk zungzung sek bang in a zung uh a muatna bang in a om ding a, a pak uh leivui bang in a tungkah lunglung ding: Sepaihte
Huaiziak in
Namchih gamla tak a mite ading in chiamtehna a tak khe ding a, kawlmong a kipan sam ding in a singsit ding: huchi in, ngai in, amaute kintak in a hongpai pah ding uh:
Amau lak ah kuamah a gim kei ding ua, a kisui sam kei ding uh; kuamah a lusu kei ding ua, a ihmu sam kei ding uh; a kawnggak ulah phelkol in a omkei ding a, a khedap gakna leng a tansam kei ding hi.
A thalte uh a zum mahmah a, a thalpeu tengteng uh laisa in a om keukou a; a sakol chinte uh meisah suang a bang a, a kangtalai khete uh leng pingpei a bang hi.

A husa ging honhon uh humpinelkai humham bang mai ahi. Humpinelkai lunlai humham bang mai in a ging honhon hi: ahi, a ging honhon a, a samat ding uh a man ua, bittak in a paimangpih ua, kuamah in a honkhe theikei hi.
Huai ni’n tuipi ging hawhaw bang in a tung uah a ging hawhaw ding ua: Huchi in min gam a hon et uleh, ngai in, mial leh mangbatna ngen ahi a, vak lah huai a meite a hihmial in a om hi.
Kumpipa Uzziah a sih kum in
A kiang ah serafte ading ua; kha guk chiat a nei ua, a kha nihte un a mai uh a khuh ua, nih in a khepekte uh a khuh ua, nih in a leng uhi.
Huchi in,

Michih hehkawma vaw zialzial zel, michih thangpai kawm a kuamah kham ngeilouh sawina a vaihawm sak zel.
Lei pumpi a khawla, a dai vungvunga; thakhat in la a sa khe guih uh.
Ahi, na tungthu ziak in meilahte a nuam ua, Lebanon tang a sidar singte toh. Hihniam a na om nungsiah phukpaitu ding himhim ka kiang uah a hongtou ngei nawn kei uh, chi in.
Nuailam a kipan Sheol nang hondawn ding in, nangmah ziak in a buai lutlut hi; misi, lei a makai tengteng nangmah ziak in a tokthou a; namchih kumpipa tengteng a mangtutphah ua kipan a kaidingta hi.
Huai tengteng in nangmah bia in, na kiang ah huchi in a gen ding uh. Nang leng kou bang a hatta lou na hi maw?
Na thupi mahmahna Sheol a pikhiak suk ahita, na kaihging lunglungte toh; tangtel na nuai ah a phah ua, than in nang a hon khuhta uhi, chi in.
Sun Aksi aw, Zingsang tapa, bangchidan ahia van a kipan na kiaktak maimah! Namchih hihpukpa, bangchidan ahia lei a satkhiak suk a na om maimah!
Na lungtang in, Van ah ka kah ding a, Pathian aksite tunglam ah ka mangtutphah ka tawisang ding; huan, kikhopna tang, mal tawp a om ah, ka tu ding a;
Meipi sang a sang ah ka kah ding a; Tungnungpen bang mai in ka om ding, na chinak vial a.
Himahleh, Sheol ah, kawkhuk tawp ah, pikhiak suk a om ding na hi ngal a.
A hon mu peuh in a hon lim et ding ua, hiai mi maw lei hihling a, gamchih kising sak a,
Khovel gamdai bang a bawl a, a khua omte hihmang a, a salte a inn lam ua paidia pawtsak ngeilou? chi in, na tanchin a sut ding uhi.
Namchih kumpipa tengteng, avek un, amau inn chiat uah thupitak in a ihmu ua,

Nang bel a hunlou a piang kihhuaitak bang in leh, galthah, namsau a sut pailet, kawkhuk a thante lak a paisukte puansilh bang in na han in a kipan gamlapi a paih khiak in na om zawta hi; luang sikden bang mai in.
Na gam na hihsiat a, na khua na tuite na thah ziak in a lak ua vui in nang zaw na omkei ding hi. Thil hoihlou hihmite suante min tangtawn in a lou ngeikei ding uh.
A kisak ua, lei a neih ua, leitung khopi a a dimsak louhna ding un, a pipute uh khelhna ziak in a tate uh thah ding ngaihtuah un, chi in.
Huan, “Amaute sual ding in ka kisa ding, sepaihte
Sakuh ading in gou in ka bawl ding a, dilte ah leng ka bawl ding; hihmanna munphiat in ka phiat lai ding” sepaihte
Sepaihte
Ka gam ah Assuria mi ka hihse ding a, ka tangte ah ka chil ek ding a chih bang in; huai hun chiang in a hakkol uh amau a kipan a mangta ding a, a puakgik uh a liangzang ua kipan in a mangsam ding hi.
Huai ahi, lei pumpi a thuseh, huai mah ahi, namchih tung a khutzak.
Sepaihte
Kumpipa Ahaz sih kum in hiai puakgik a hong omta.
Philistia gam pumpi aw, nangmah vuakna chiang a kitan tak ziak in kipak ken: gul zung a kipan in guldekpak a pawt ding a, a gah gul kuang leng thei a honghi ding hi.
Mi genthei tamasate’n a ne un a ta ding ua, mi tagahte leng bittak in a om ding uh; nang a zung bel kial in ka that ding a, nang a omsunte thah in a om ding uh.
Kongkhak aw, mau tuaituai in; khopi aw, kikou in; Philistia aw, na pum in na zulmang khinta; mallam a kipan in lah meikhu a hongpawt ngal a, a hun seh uah tuantual himhim a om ngeikei uhi.
Philistia nam palaite bangchibang in i dawng ding ua?
Moab gam puakgik.
Zan khat thu in Moab gam a Ar khua suksiat in a om a, bangmahlou a bawl in a omta hi; zan khat thu in Moab gam a Kir khua suksiat in a om a, bangmahlou a bawl in a omta hi.
Dibon tanu, mun sangte a kap ding in a hoh touta a; Moabte’n Nebo leh Medeba a kahkhum ua, a lu tengteng uh a giau vek a, a khamul teng uleng met in a om vekta hi.
A kongzingte uah saiip puan a teng ua: a intungte uah leh a kholak uah michih nakpi’n a mau tuaituai uhi.
Heshbonte leng a kikou ua, Elealehte toh; Jahaz kholam in leng a aw uh a za uhi: huaiziak in Moabte galvan a kivante ngaihtak in a kikou ua; a hinna uh asung uah a ling hi.
Moabte ziak in ka lungtang a kikou a; a mi hoihte uh Zoar leh Eglath shelishijah khuate ah a tai ua: Luhith tou ah kap kawm in a paitou ua; Horonaim lampi ah siatna kikou in a kikou khia uhi.
Nimrim tuite hihsiat a om ding ahi: loupa a vuaikhinta; loupa selnoute a vuai a, thilhing a omta kei hi.
Huaiziak in, a sum neihsunte uleh a koih hoihte uh Muisum Lui gal a kai mang pih uhi.
Kikou husa Moab gamgi kim ah a thang ngal a; a mau tuaituai husa Eglaim khua a tungta hi.
Dimon tuite sisan in a dim vek ngal a: Dimon tung ah thil thupi sem tungsak ding ka hi, Moabte lak a taikhiate tung ah leh, huai gam a omsunte tung ah humpinelkai ka tungsak ding hi.
Gam vaihawmmi ading in belamnoute Sela khua gamdai a om a kipan in Zion tanu tang ah khak un.
Huchi in, Moab tanute vasa a bu a kipan dalh a lengleng bang in Arnon lui kainate ah a om ding uhi.
Thu honhilh inla, vai hon hawmsak in: na lim sunlai in zan bang in bawl inla; delhkhiakte sel in; taimangte mansak ken.

Moab lak a mi delhkhiak a omte na kiang ah om uhen; amau ading in hihsemi mel a kipan bukna mun hi hen: lepgumi lah bangmahlou a bawl in a omta ngal a, hihsiatna a daita a, nuaisiahnate gam a kipan a hih manthat in a omta uhi.
Huchi in mangtutphah hehpihna a hihkip in a om ding a, huai tung ah, David puanin ah, mi khat, vaihawm in, vaihawmna diktat zong in, thil diktat kintak a hihpah in, chihtaktak in a tu ding hi.
Moabte kisaktheihna thu, a kisathei mahmah uh chih, ka za ua: a suahngal dan uleh, a kisaktheih dan uleh, a hehdanthu uh; a kiawtsaknate uh bangmah ahi kei hi.
Huaiziak in Moab tung ah Moab a mau tuaituai ding ua, michih a mau tuaituai ding uh: Kir hareseth grep beu khase tuntun in na kah ding uhi.

Heshbon loute lah a tulkhinta a, Sibmah grepgui toh: namchih Kumpipate’n a kung hoih tata a kitansak phengphung ua: Jazer khaw tanpha in a zam ua, gamdai ah a zamlut ua; a hiangte a zamdalh sengsung ua, tuipi ah a zam galkahta uhi.
Huaiziak in Sibmah grepgui Jazer kah in ka kah ding a: Heshbon leh Elealeh aw, ka khitui in ka hon buak ding: na nipi gahte tung leh na buh tung ah kisual kikou husa a keta ngal a.

Kipahna laksak in a omta, lou hoihtak a kipan in leng nopna laksak in a omta a; grephuan ah lasak himhim a omta kei ding a, husa noptuak himhim leng a omnawn sam kei ding: grep sukna khukte ah chil a sukmi himhim in uain a chilkhe takei ding uh; grep la a kikou ka daisakta hi.
Huaiziak in ka gilte lah Moab hehpihna in pekging bang in a ging a, ka gilsung lah Kir hareseth hehpihna in pekging bang in a ginglai hi.
Huchi in, hichi ahi ding a, Moab a kilat chiang in mun sang a kihihgim a, thum ding a a Mun Siangthou a a hongpai chiang in a vuaksuak ding hi.
Huaite Moab tungthu
Tuin bel
Damaska khaw puak gik, Ngai in, Damaska khopi hi nawnlou ding a lakmang ahita, huchi in inn chimsia koihkhawm lel ahita ding hi.
Aroer khote taisan in a omta; belamhonte omna ding ahimai ding, huaite lah a om ngei ding ua, kuamah in a lausak kei ding uh.
Ephraim a kipan kulhpi a mang ding a, Damaska a kipan gam a mang ding, Suria gam a omsunte leng a mang ding uh; Israel suante thupina banglel in a om ding uh, sepaihte
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding a, Jakob thupina hihgawn in a om ding a, a sa thauna leng a hong gawngta ding hi.
Huchi in buh lapan buh a lak a, a vuite a lak bang mai ahi ding a, ahi, Rephaim guam ah min buh maihkhakte a tom bang mai uh ahi ding hi.
Himahleh, olive singgah lohkhit a a zikpi dawn a gah nih hiam thum hiam omlai bang leh, singgah hiang hoih li hiam nga hiam a omsek bang in, maihkhak top ding a omlai ding,
Huai ni chiang in min a Bawlpa uh lam a enta ding ua, a mitte un Israelte Mi Siangthou a zahtakta ding uh.
Maitam, amau khutsuakte lam a en nawnta kei ding ua, amau khut a bawl Asherim hiam, gimlim maitamte hiam a zahtak nawnta kei ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in a khopi kiptakte uh gammang leh tang vum a mun taisan sa, Israel suante ma a a taisansa bang uh, ahi ding; huchi in munloih ahita ding hi.
Nang hon hondampa Pathian na mangngilh a, na hatna Suangpi lah na theigige kei hi; huaiziak in singkung kilawm taktakte na suan ding a, asung ah hiang tuamte na vut paisuak ding hi:
Na suan ni’n na khang sak a, zingsang in thil chil ah na paksak a; himahleh gahloh lah lungngaihna leh natna thupitak ni’n a mang hi.
A! mipi tampi ging zuazua, tuipite ging zuazua bang a ging zuazuate leh namchih ging hawhaw, tui thupitakte ging hawhaw bang a ging hawhawte na tung uh a gik hi!

Namchih lah tuipi tampi ging hawhaw bang in a ging hawhaw ding ua; himahleh aman a taihilh ding a, huchi in gamlapi ah a taimang ding ua, tang a buhsi huih mut bang leh leivui huihpi mut leng lunglung bang in delh in a om ding uhi.
Nitaklam in, ngai in, thil mulkimhuaitak a om a; huan, khovak ma in lah a om nawn kei uh. Huai gallak a hon laksak mite tan ahi a, hon guksak mite tuam leng ahi hi.
Ethiopia gam khen a luigal a om, a khazap ging hawhaw gam tung a gik hi.

Tuipi ah, tui tung a tolh longte ah palaite sawlpa! Misawl hattakte aw, nam sang zehzoh mam hethot kiang ah, a pawt tung ua kipan tutan a mi kihtakhuai takte kiang ah, hoh un; nam in gam a hawm ua, a palpuk uhi, a gam uh luite’n a hawmzak hi.
Khovel a om tengteng leh lei a tengte aw, tangte a chiamtehna a takkhiak chiang un en un; pengkul a mut chiang un ngaikhia un.
ka kiang ah hichi in a chi hi, Ka om kinken ding a, ka omna ah ka en gige ding a; nisatlai a kholum huthut bang leh buhlak kholum lai a daitui mei bang in, chi in.
Grep loh hun ma a, a pak a bei a, a pak grep puam a a hongom chiang in, a hiang noute theikung attanna temta in a attan sin ngal a, a hiang zam dalhte a lamang in a sattan lai ding hi.
Huaite tang a vasa sa ne chite ading in, lei a sate ading in nutsiat in a om ding uh; huchi in vasa sa ne chite’n amaute nipi sung in a ne ding ua, lei a sa tengteng in phalbi sung in a ne ding uhi.
Huai hun chiang in, sepaihte
Aigupta gam puakgik,
Ngai in,

Aigupta mite Aigupta mite mah sual ding in ka tokthou ding a; huchi in michih in amau unau sual in michih in amau invengte sual in, a kidou ding uh; khua leh khua a kidou ding ua, gam leh gam a kidou ding uhi.
Huchi in, Aiguptate kha asung uah bangmahlou a bawl in a om ding a; a thusawm uh ka hihse ding; huchi in, milimte leh, bumsiamte thu a dong ding uhi.
Aigupta mite heutu tatsetak khut ah ka pekhe ding a; huchi in kumpipa hangsan in a tung uah vai a hawmta ding,
Tuipi tuite a kang ding ua, luite luang mang in a kangtatta ding.
Luite a namsia ua; Aigupta gam tuiluangte a kiam hiaihiai ding ua, a kangtat ding a; phailuangte leh tui loupate a vuai khin ding uhi.
Nile lui kiang a Nile lui gei mahmah a, gantatna pawnte leh, Nile lui kiang a thil chin tengtengte a hong keu vek ding a, taihmang in a om ding a, a om nawn kei ding hi.
Ngamanmite leng a kap ding ua, Nile lui a ngakuai khaimi tengteng in a awm uh a kitum ding ua, tui a lenpi zakte a thadahgawpta ding uhi.
Huailou in leng jija hiahsiang khoih mite leh puanngou gan mite a zahlak ding uhi.
A suangkhuamte hihzan in a om ding a, kilohmite a lungsim un a lungkham ding uh.
Zoan khua a miliante a hai ding ua, Pharo mi pil pente lemtheihna sa lemtheihna banglel a hong hita: Pharo kiang ah, mi pil tapa, nidanglai kumpipate tapa ka hi, bangchidan a chi sek na hi ua?
Na mipilte koi a om ahi ua? Amau honhilh pah ngal uhen; Aigupta gam tung a thil tung ding, sepaihte
Zoan khua a miliante mihai a hong hita ua, Noph khua a miliante khem in a omta uh; Aigupta namte ning a suangte’n Aiguptate a vakmang sakta a.
Aiguptate lak ah phengphitna kha a omsakta; huchi in zukham mi a luak a a hoi doidoi bang in Aiguptate a nasep chiteng uah a paikawi sakta uhi.
Aiguptate ading in lutang in hiam, mei in hiam, tumnah hiang in hiam, pumpeng in hiam a sepsak theih a om nawnta kei ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in Aigupta numeite bang ahi ding ua: Sepaihte
Judah gam a omte Aiguptate ading in mulkimhuaitak a hong hita ding ua, a min uh a lohna peuh uah a kihta ding ua, amau tung a tung ding sepaihte
Huai ni chiang in Kanante pau a pau leh, sepaihte
Huai ni chiang in Aigupta laitak ah
Huai Aigupta gam a sepaihte
Huchi in
Huan,

Huai ni chiang in Aigupta gam a kipan in Assuria gam pha in lamlian a om ding a; huchi in Assuria mite Aigupta gam ah a hoh ding uh; Aigupta leng Assuria gam ah a hoh ding uh. Aigupta mite’n Assuria mite toh Pathian a be khawmta ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in Israelte Aiguptate leh Assuriate toh a thumna ahi ding ua, lei laizang tak ah vualzawlna ahi ding uh:
Sepaihte
Assuria kumpipa Sargon sawl Tartan Ashdod khua ah a hong a, Ashdod khua a sual a, a lak kum in;
Amoz tapa Isai kam in, “Kuan inla, na kawng a saiip puan phel inla, na khe a na khedap koih in” chi in, a gen hi. Huchi in, huchibang in a hih a, vuaktang leh khevuak in a paipai hi.
Huan,
Assuria kumpipa’n Aigupta matte leh Ethiopia salte, a neu a lian in, vuaktang leh khevuak in leh taw dawk in Aiguptate zahlakna ding in a pimang ding.
Huchi in, a lamet pen uh Ethiopiate leh a thupina pen uh Aiguptate ziak in mangbang tak leh zahlaktak in a omta ding uhi.

Huchi in, huai ni chiang in hiai tuipi gei a mi in, ‘Ngai in, i lamet pen, Assuria kumpipa lak a hon humbit ding a, a hon panpihpa ding a i taina ulah hichi ahita a eite bangchi’n i suakta ding ua? a chi ding uh,’ ” a chi hi.
Tuipi gamdai puakgik,
Sim gam a pingpei a paisuak bang in gamdai a kipan in, gam lauhuaipi a kipan in a honghi.
Kilakna thu khauhtak ka kiang ah theihsak ahita; lepchiahtak a hihmi in lepchiahtak in a hih a, lokmi in a lok hi,
Elamte aw, paitou un, Mediate aw, um un; a thumna tengteng uh ka daisakta hi.
Huaiziak in ka kawng natna thupitak in a dim a, numei nauvei natna bang a natna in a hon manta; bil a za theilou khop in na ka thuak a; khaw mutheilou khop in ka mangbang hi.
Ka lungtang a ha huaihuai a, thil mulkimhuai tak in a hon hihlau a; nitak ninem ka ngaklah sek kei ding in linna a hongsuakta.
Dohkan a bawlkhol ua, galvengmi a vengsak ua, a ne ua, a dawn ua; mi liante aw, thou unla, lum thau nuh un.
Sepaih a pawlte, sakol tungtuang a kopkop a paite sabiltung pawlte, sangawngsau pawlte, a muh chiang in pilvangtak in a ngaikhe kilkel ding, chi in.
Huan, amah humpinelkai bang in a kikou a;

Ngai in, hiai lai ah mihing pawl, sakol tungtuang a kopkop a pai a hong uh, chi in. Amahmah in Babulon khua a pukta, a pukta, a milim pathian bawltawmte tengteng uh lei ah hihzan in a omta, chi in, a dawng hi.
Aw ka buh vuaksa, ka phual a buh; sepaihte
Dumah puak gik.
Min Seir tang a kipan in a honsam ua, “Galvengpa zan bangchi ahita a? Galvengpa, zan bangchi ahita a?” chi in
Galvengpa’n, “Zingsang hi ding ahita, zan leng; na dot nop uleh dong un; kihei nawn unla, hongpai un” a chi hi.
Arabia gam tung a puakgik,
Dedante khualzin pawlchihte aw, Arabia gam a gamnuai ah na giak ding uh.
Dangtak kiang ah tui a hontawi ding ua, Tema gam a omte’n a an un taimangte a na dawn uhi.
Amau lah namsaute a kipan, namsau dohsa a kipan leh, thalpeu laisa a kipan leh, kidouna thupitak a kipan a taimang uhi.
Thalkapmi, Kedar suante lak a mi hattak omsunte, tawmchik ahi ding uh;
Kilanna guam puak gik,
Bang na chi ua a mai, in tung a na kal touh vek uh?
Aw kikou husa a dim, khopi chiak vengvung, khaw kipaktak, na sung a a thahte uh namsau a thah ahi kei ua, kidouna a si leng ahi sam kei uh.
Na vaihawmmi tengteng a taimang chiat ua, thalkap mite gak in a om ua, gamlapi a kipan a hong taimangte.
Huaiziak in ken, hon enlou in lehlam en un, nakpi’n ka kap ding; ka mite tanu gallak a a lak thu uah hon nem vanglak dah un, ka chi hi.
, sepaihte
Huchi in, Elamte’n thalbawm a tawi ua, mihing tuanna kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuangmite toh; Kirte’n lum tuamna lah a phel uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, na guam hoihpente lah kangtalai in a dimta a, sakol tungtuangmite lah kulh kongkhak bul ah a kiphu noinoi uh. Huan, Judahte khuhna a lamang hi.
Judahte khuhna a la mangta. Huchi in huai ni’n gammang inn a galthuamna lam na enta uhi.
David khopi kulhpi siatnate leng na en ua, a tam chih na thei uh: huchi in dil khangnung zaw tuite na luangkhawm sak uhi.
Jerusalem innte na sim ua, kulhpi bang bawlhoihna ding in innte na phel uhi.
Dil lui tui omna ding in kulhpi nih kikal ah tuichin khawmna na bawl ua; himahleh huai hihmi lam na en kei ua, nidanglai a a na bawlpa na limsak hetkei uhi.
Huai ni’n
Himahleh, ngai in, nuamna leh kipahnate, bawng thahna leh belam thahnate, sa nekna leh uain dawnnate a om zawta a, ne ni, dawn ni, zingchiang a si ding i hi ngal ua, a chi uhi.
Huchi in sepaihte
A kiang ah huchi in gen in, Hiai a bang hih na hia? Hiai ah kua na nei a, han hiai a na khuak vial? Amah ading in sangpi a a han a khuak a, amah ading a suangpi a omna a bawl vial!
Ngai in,
Pellou in aman nang lum bang in a honpei ding a, gam zapi ah a honvawk lut ding: huai ah na si ding a, huailai mah ah, nang, na pu inn sung zahlaksakpa, na thupina kangtalaite a om ding hi.
Na nasepna a kipan k’on delhkhe ding a, aman heutu na hihna a kipan a honkai khesuk ding hi.
Huai ni’n hichi ahi ding a, ka sikha Eliakim, Hilkiah tapa, ka sam ding a; amah na puanaktual ka silh sak ding a.
Na kawnggak in ka hihhat ding a, na vaihawmna amah khut ah ka kem sak ding: Huchi in Jerusalem a omte adin leh Judah inkuanpihte ading in pa ahi ding.
Huan, David inkuanpihte tahbi a liangzang ah ka koih ding a: aman a hong ding a, kuamah in a khak kei ding uh: a khak ding a, kuamah in a hong kei ding uh.
Amah kilhna mun kiptak a a kilh ngiungeu bang un, ka hihkip ngiungeu ding a: huchi in amah a pa inkuanpihte ading in mangtutphah thupi mahmah a ding ahi ding hi.
Amah ah a pa inkuanpihte thupina tengteng a bang vek ding ua, a tate leh a suante, tuium-belsuan neu chiteng, belhbu tuium-belsuan a kipan tui koihna tuium-belsuan tengteng tan in.
Huai ni’n, kilhna, mun kiptak a kilh ngiungeu a om in a nangzou kei ding a; satkhiak a om in, a keta ding a, a tung a thil gik om lah hih manthat in a omta ding a;
Tura khaw puakgik.
Tarsish long liante aw, mau tuaituai un; innte omlou khop leh lutna ding omlou khop a hihsiat in a omta hi; huai lah Kittim gam a kipan in a kiang ua hihlat in a om hi.
Tuikulh a omte aw, dai sipsip un; Sidon khaw sumsin tuipi a paite’n a hon kiningchin sak uh.
Sihor apan buhchi tuipite tung ah honpua a, Nile lui a buh, a punna hi a, namchih sumsinna mun ahi hi.
Sidon aw, zum in; tuipi kulhpi in, thu a genta ngal a, “Nau ka vei ngeikei a, ka nei ngei sam kei, tangval lah ka vak ngei sam kei a, nungak leng ka khanglian sak ngei sam kei hi” chi in.
Thuthang Aigupta gam a tun hun chiang in Tura thuthang a nak vei mahmah ding uhi.
Tarsish ah va hoh unla; Tuikulha omte aw, mau tuaituai un.
Hiai maw na khaw kipak uh, a upat a upa, a khe in gamlapi a om ding a a pi sek?
Lallukhu khusaktu khua Tura tung ah kuan ahia hiai tung ding a sep? Huailai a sumsinmite lah miliante ahi ua, huailai a sumsinmite lah lei a mi zahtakhuaite ahi uhi.
Sepaihte
Tarsish tanu aw, Nile lui bang in na gam ah luang let in; na kawnggakna himhim lah a omta kei hi.
Tuipi tung ah a khut a zak a, gamte a lingsak a;
Aman, “Sidon tanu nungak aw, mi nuaisiah, nuam na sa nawn kei ding; thou inla, Kittim gam ah galkah in; huai ah leng khawlna himhim na mu tuankei ding hi” a chi hi.
En in, Kaldaite gam; hiai mite a omta kei uh; Assuria mi in gamdai a gamsate ading in a septa hi; a insangte uh a lam ua, huai a inpite a hihmang ua, in sia in a bawlta.
Tarsish longpite aw, mau tuaituai un; na kulhte uh hihsiat in a omta hi.
Huai ni’n hichi ahi ding a, Tura khua, kumpipa khat kum sim a, kum sawmsagih sung mangngilh in a om ding; kum sawmsagih beinung in kizuak la a a gen bang un Tura khaw tung ah a hongtung ding.
Nang kizuak mite mangngilhsa nung,
kaihging la inla, khaw kim ah vak in,
kaihging kai inla, theih a na om nawn theihna ding in la tampi sa in.
Huan, kum sawmsagih a beinung in hichi ahi ding a,
A sum muhkhiak leh a loh
Ngai in,

Huan, vantang tung a om bang in siampu tung ah leng a om ding; sikhapa tung a a om bang in a pu tung ah leng a om ding; sikhanu tung a om bang in a pi tung ah leng a om ding; a leimi tung a a om bang in, a khawngmi tung ah leng a om ding; leitawisakmi tung a a om bang in, leitawimi tung ah leng a om ding; a pung delh a leitawisakmi tung a a om bang in, a kiang a a pung pemi tung ah leng a om ding.
Lei lah awnsak keuhkeuh in leh hihsiat dimdem in a om ding;
Lei lah a kap in a tul a khovel lah bah in a tul a, lei a mi tungnungte a bah uhi.
Lei lah a ommite nuai ah a buahkhinta; dante ah a talek ua, thuseh lah a hihlamdang ua, tangtawn thukhuna a tatlek ziak un.
Huaiziak in hamsiat in lei a nekhina, a ommite lah siam louh tansakin a omta uh: huaiziak in lei a ommite lah a kanglum ua, mi tawmchik kia a omlai uh.
Uain thak lah a kap a, grepgui lah a bah a, lungtang nuamte tengteng a mau uhi.
Khuangtate kipahna lah a dai a, kaihging nuamsa ging lah a daita.
Lasa kawm in uain a dawn kei ding uh: zu lah a dawnmite ading in a kha mahmah ding.
Buaina khopi chipsak in a omta: kuamah a lut louhna ding un in chih khak in a omta.
Uain ziak in kongzingte ah kap husa a om a: nuamna tengteng mialsak in a om a, hiai gam nopna a mangta.
Khopi ah siatna nutsiat in a om a, a kulh kongkhak vuak siat in a omta.
Lei laitak ah michih lak ah huchi in a om ding hi, olive sing vuak nung a gah a omlai bang in leh, grep loh nung a grep maih loh ding a omlai bang in.
Huaite’n a aw uh a suah ding ua, a kikou ding uh;
Huaiziak in

Kawlmong tawp a lasak i za, Mi diktatte kiang ah thupina om hen, chih la. Himahleh, ken bel, Ka gawng huaihuai a, ka gawng huaihuai a, ka tung gik hi! Lepchiahtak a gamtamite’n lepchiahtak in a hih ua; ahi, lepchiahtak a gamtamite’n lepchiahtak in a hih uhi, ka chi hi.
Lei a om aw, lauhuainate, kawkhukte, thangte na tung ah a om hi.

Huchi in hichi ahi ding a, lauhuai husa a kipan a taipa kawkhuk ah a ke ding a; kawkhuk sung a kipan a pawt khetou mi thang ah a awk ding; tunglam a tohlette lah hon in a om ngal a, lei kingaknate lah a ling hi.
Lei lah a kitam gawpvek a, lei lah hihman in a omvek a, lei lah nakpitak in a ling hi.
Lei lah mi zukham bang in a hoi dongdong ding a, bawkta hawt bang in a kihot ding; a tatlekna lah a tung ah giktak in a om ding a, huchi in a puk ding a, a thou nawnta kei ding hi.
Huan, huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding a,
Hentate kawkhuk a pikhawm a a om bang un huaite pikhawm in a om ding ua, suangkulh a khum in a om ding uh, ni sawttak nung in gawt in a om ding uh.
Huai hun chiang in tung a kha zumtakin a om ding a, tung a ni zahlaktak in a om ding; sepaihte
na hi a; k’on pahtawi ding,
na min ka phat ding;
thillamdang tak, nidanglai a
vaihawmte, ginomtak leh
thutak in na hih ngal a.
Khopite lei vum in na suaksak a;
a kulhte uh leng na hihsia hi;
gamdang mite kumpipa in leng khua lou in na bawl ngal a;
chik chiang mah a lam in a om nawnta kei ding.
Huaiziak in mi hat mahmahte’n a hon pahtawi ding ua, nam kihtakhuai mahmah
khopi in a honkihta ding uhi.
Mi kihtakhuaite hu huihpi in
bang a sawn okok lai bang a a hongom chiang in,
nang zaw mi genthei ading in bukna,
tagah mangbang lai ading in
bukna, huihpi lak a kihumbitna,
nisa liahna na hi ngal a.
Mun keu a khaw lum na daisak
zel bang in, gamdang mite husa na daisak hi;
kholum meiliah a daihsak a a om bang in,
mi lauhuaite thom daihsak ahi ding.
Huan, hiai tang ah sepaihte
Huan, khuhna mi tengteng tung a khiak, puanzak nam tengteng tung a zak hiai tang ah a hihse ding hi.
Sihna a valh denta;
Huai ni’n, Ngai un, hiai i Pathian ahi; amah i ngakngak ua, huchi in a hon hondam ding: hiai
Hiai tang ah
Huchi in tuiliaumi in tuiliau ding a a khuat bang in, huai lak ah a khut a zakkhe ding a: a kisaktheihna lah a khut lepchiahna toh in
Huan, na kulh bangte insang kulhpi hihchim in, a koihniam a, lei ah, leivui pha hial in a puksakta hi.
Huai ni chiang in Judahte gam ah hiai la a sa ding uh.
Khopi kiptak i nei ua:
aman hotdamna kulh bangte leh kulhpite a ding in a sep ding hi.
Nam diktat thutak zui nam a
lut theihna ding in kulh kongkhakte hong un.
Na tung a lungsimnga mi,
nangmah a honmuan ziak in,
muanna kim in na kem ding.
tangtawn suangpi a om ngal a.
Aman sangpi a omte a hihniam a khopi sangpi mah:
a koih niam a,
lei pha in a koih niam a,
leivui pha hial in a puksak hi.
Khe in a sikden ding; gentheite
khe leh tagahte kalsuan in.
Mi diktat lampi lah dikna ahi a;
nang lungtang diktat pu in
mi diktat lampi na hihmam sek.
Ahi,
lampi ah k’on ngak uhi:
kou hinna deih zaw na min loh leh nangmah theihgigena ahi.
Zan chiang in ka hinna in
nangmah a hon ngai a; ahi,
zingkhang in ka sung a ka kha om in ka honzong ding hi:
na vaihawmnate lei a a hongom chiang in khovel a omte’n diktatna lah a sin zel ngal ua.
Mi thulimlou deihsak in om
mahleh, diktatna a sin tuansam kei ding: dikna gam ah diklou tak in a hih ding hi.
himahleh amau a mu tuankei ua:
himahleh mite adia na
phatuamngaihna a mu ding ua, a zumta ding uh;
ahi, nang hondoute mei in a kangmang ding.
nang ka nasep tengteng uh n’on sepsak hi.
nang kia hilou in kumpipa dangte’n leng ka tung uah thu a neikhinta ua,
himahleh nangmah mah panpih in na min ka louta ding uh.
Amau lah a sita uh a, a hing
nawn kei ding uh;
a mangta ua,
a thou nawn kei ding uh;
huaiziak in nang amau gawt in na hihsia a, a theihgigena teng uleng na hihmangta hi.
Hiai nam na pungsakta a,
nang pahtawi in na omta:
hiai gam a gamgite na hihlian hi.
a mau na thunun chiang in a thum zel uhi.
Numei naupai, neih hun naita
bang in;
kou na ma ah ka om uhi.
Nau ka pai ua, ka na ua,
huih banglel ka nei uh;
lei ah lah tatkhiakna lam himhim ka ngahkei ua;
khovel a omte lah a puksam kei uhi.
Na misite a hing nawn ding ua;
ka mi luangte a thou nawn ding uh.
Leivui a omte aw, halh unla,
nuamtak in lasa un: na daituite
khovak daitui bang ahi a,
lei in misite a paikhe ding hi, chih.
Kisa un, ka mite aw, na dantan sungte ah lut unla, na kongkhakte uh kikhak khum un: lunghihlouhna a ven masiah mitphiatkal lel leng bu un.
Ngai un,
Huai ni chiang in
Huai ni chiang in: Uain grephuan khat, huai pahtawi in lasa un.
Kei
Kei ah hehna a omkei hi: loulingnei leh khaulingneite’n hondou in honsual le u aw! Amau sual din ka kuan ding a, mun khat ah ka halkhawm ding hi.
Ahihkeileh, hon kileppihna ding in ka hatna len hen: ahi, hon kileppih hen.
Hun hontung ding ah Jakobte’n zung a kha ding ua; Israelte’n zung a kha ding ua; Israelte a mum un a pak ding uh: huchi in leitung gah in a dimsak ding uhi.
Amah vawte a vuak bang in amah a vaw sam ahia? Ahihkeileh, amah thahte thahna bang in amah thah in a om hia?
Amah na paimangsak lai in a hunlel in amah na sel a: suahlam huihnun ni’n a hu thupitak in amah a mutlengta hi.

Huaiziak in hiai in Jakobte thulimlouhna silsiang ahi ding a, hiai a khelhna uh pai mangpihna gah ngen ahi: Asherim hiam, gimlim maitamte hiam ding nawnlou ding khop in maitam suang tengteng suangpak den khap bang in a bawl uhi.
Khua kulhpi nei lah a lungzuang a, omna nutsiat leh paisan, gamdai bang ahi: huai ah bawngnou a ta ding a, huailai mah ah a kual ding a, a selte a ne ding.

A hiangte lah a vuai chiang un khiah in a om ding a; numeite a hongpai ding ua a hal ding uh: amau lah theihtheihna himhim neilou mi ahi ngal ua: huaiziak in amau bawlpa’n amaute a hehpih kei ding a, amaute sutuahpan amaute deihsakna himhim a neikei ding hi.
Huai ni’n hichi ahi ding a,
Huai ni’n hichi ahi ding a, pengkul lianpi a mut ding ua: Assuria gam a mangthang dekdekte leh, Aigupta gam a delhkhiak a omte a hongpai ding ua: Jerusalem khua a tang siangthou ah
Ephraimte zukhamhatte kisaktheihna lallukhu tung leh, a kilawmna uh thupi pak tullel laitak, uain thazoh a omte guam hausa tak lutang tung a om a tung a gik hi!
Ngai in,
Ephraimte zu khamhatte kisaktheihna lallukhu lah sikden in a om ding a:
A kilawmna uh thupi paktul laitak, guam hausatak lutang tung a om, nipi ma a theipi min masapen, a en mi in a muh a, a khut a a omtak a a nekkhit sek bang ahi ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in sepaihte
Vaihawm ding a tu ading in vaihawmna khate, kulh kongkhak bul a hon sualte nangkikmite ading in hatna ahi ding.

Himahleh huaite leng uain ziak in a kipekpek ua, zu ziak in a hoihoi ua: siampute leh zawlneite leng zu ziak in a kipekpek ua, uain valhkhit in a om ua, zu ziak in a hoihoi ua: kilakna thute ah a kipekpek ua, vaihawmna thu ah a hoihoi uhi.
Mun siang mahmah omlou khop in dohkan tengteng lah luak leh thilnin in a dim hi.
Aman theihna lam a kua ahia a sinsak ding? Thukhah leng aman kua ahia a theihsak sin laitei? Nawinek tawptungte leh nawi neksak nawnlouhte ahi ding uam?

Thuzohna thu tung a thuzohna thu chian touh, thuzohna thu tung a thuzohna thu chian touh: dan tung a dan chian touh, dan tung a dan chian touh: hiai ah tawmchik, huai ah tawmchik chih ngenta a hih ziak in.
Ahi, muk lamdang pumi zang in, pau tuam in hiai mite kiang ah thu a gen zawta ding:
Hiai lah khawlna ahi a, tawlte khawlsak un: hiai lah kihihhalhna ahi, a chihte: himahleh amau a ngaikhe nuam kei ua.
Huaiziak in, a pai ua, a thal a a puk ua, a kitap gawp ua, thang a a awk ua, mat a a om theihna ding un,
Huaiziak in, mi muhsithatte aw, hiai mite, Jerusalem khua a omte, vaihawmsakte aw,

Sihna toh thu i khungta, Sheol ah thu i kichiamta; vuakna tuilian a luansuak hun chiang in leipha in zaw a luang kei ding; zuauthute i kihumbitna ding in i zang ua, zuau nuai ah lah i buta ngal ua, na chih ziak un.
Huaiziak in
Vaihawmna diktat a tansakna khau ding in ka zang ding a, diktatna lah a ulum khai ding in ka zang ding a, gial in kihumbitna zuau thute a phiatmang vek ding a, tuite’n lah bukna a tum ding.
Huan, sihna toh na thu khun uh a kiphel ding a, Sheol toh na chiam uleng a piching kei ding, vuakna tuilian a luan suak hun chiang in. Huai hun chiang in a sik den in na om ding uhi.
A luan suak peuhmah chiang in nou a hon lazel ding; a zingsang a zingsang in, sun leh zan in, a luang suak sin ngal a; thukhah omdan theihsiam lah thil mulkimhuai ngen ahi ding, chi in.
Lupna lah khekhuanna ding in a tom lozen a, puan thuah lah lukhuhna ding in a neu lua hi.
A nasep, a nasep lamdang a sep theihna ding leh, a thilhih, a thilhih lamdang a zuih theihna ding in,
Huchi in mi muhsit chingte hi nawn kei un, huchilou in zaw na kolbutte uh muanhuaitak in a bawl kha ding uh; tawpna, tawpna tung ngei ding a seh, lei pumpi tung a a tunsak ding.
Bildoh unla, ka aw za un; ngaikhia unla, ka thugen za un.
Leiletmi in chi thehna ding in lei tatlaklou in a let ngei ahia? A lei khalte tatlaklou in a khenkham in a hihzan ngei ahia?
A tung a tohtam khit in mohurite a thehdalh ka hia? Zirate leng a theh ka hia? Buhte a vual in, huitbuhte leng a mun sehsa ah, vaibuhte leng a nawlzul ah a tuh sek ka hia?
A Pathian in lah amah diktak in a thuzoh in a sinsak ngal a.
Mohuri lah buh chilna khawl in a chil ngei ngal kei ua, zira tung ah leng kangtalai khe a tuksak ngeikei uh; mohuri zaw chiang in a khen ua, zira bel khetbuk in a khen zaw sek uhi.
Tanghou bawlna buh gawizan in a om a, aman tangtawn in a vaw kei ding a, a kangtalai khe leh a sakolte’n dalhsak mahleh, a gawizan sak ngeikei hi.
Huaite leng sepaihte
Ariel, Ariel, David puanin kaihna mun! kum ah kum gawm inla; ankuangluinate hongtung nawn hen;
Huai hun chiang in Ariel ka lungzing sak ding a, huchi in sunna leh kahna a om ding; huan amah kei ading in Ariel bang ahi ding.
Huan, nangmah sual tum in na kim ah k’on giahkhum ding a, nangmah sual ding in umsuakna insangte ka bawl ding.

Huchi in, puksak in na om ding a, leinuai a kipan in thu na gen ding a, na aw lah leivui lak ah awlawl in a gingkhe ding; na aw dawi aisansiam zawl aw bang in leinuai a kipan in a pawt ding hi, na pau leivui lak a kipan in a hongpawt siausiau ding hi.
Himahleh nang hondou mipite zaw leivui nel mahmah bang in a om ding uh, mi kihtakhuai mipite leng buhsi mangthang sekte bang in a om ding uh; ahi, huai mitphiatkal lou in a hongom guih ding hi.
Vangingte, zinlingte, ging thupi mahmahte, pingpeite, huihpite, hulmang thei mei in amah sepaihte
Huchi in Ariel dou nam tengteng mipite, amah leh a insang sualmi tengteng leh amah hih lungzingte tengteng, ihmu mang banglel ahi ding uh, zan a kilakna banglel.
Mi gilkial in mang a neih in an a ne a, himahleh a khanglou a a bahlai in tui a duhlai bang ahi ding hi; Zion tang sual, nam leh mipite, huai bang ahi ding uhi.
Ding kinken unla, lamdang sa un, kituam unla, mittaw in om un; a kham ua, himahleh uain ziak ahi kei; a hoihoi ua, himahleh zu ziak ahi kei.
ihmut limna kha na tung uah a sungbua a, zawlneite na mit uh a mitsi sak a, na lu uh, mutheite, a khuhta ngal a.
Huchi in kilakna himhim nou ading in laibu bilhkhum bikbek bang ahita, mite’n laisiammi kiang ah, hehpih in huai sim in, chi in a pia ua, aman, ka sim theikei, bilhkhum bikbek ahi, a chi a;
Huan, laibu tuh laisiam loumi kiang ah, Hehpih in hiai sim in, chi in a pia ua, aman, laisiam ka hi kei, a chi hi.
Huchi in,
Hiai mite lak ah thillamdang ka hih behlap ding, thillamdang, thillamdang mahmah; huchi in a mipilte uh pilna a mang ding a, a mi teite uh teina sel in a om ding, a chi hi.
A thutup uh

Thilte na lumlet vek uh! Belvelpa bellei banglela seh in a om sin ahia. Thil bawl in a bawlpa tung ah, amah honbawl ka hi sam a, a chih? Ahihkeileh, thil suktuaha om in a sutuahpa tungthu ah, theihna himhim a neikei, a chih?
Sawtlouchik nung in ahi ka hia, Lebanon lei hoih tak mun a suahsak in a om sina, lei hoih tak mun lah gammang a seha a om sin?
Huai ni’n bengngongte’n laibu thute a bil un a za ding ua, mittawte’n mial nuai leh mial lak a kipan in a mu ding uhi.
Thunuailutte’n leng
Mi lauhuai bangmahlou a bawl ahita a, mi simmohhat a daita, thulimlouhna ngaklah tengteng hih manthat in a omta uhi.
Huaite’n thu in mite thil hihkhial in a bawl ua, kulh kongpi ah taihilhmi awkna ding in thang a kam ua, mi diktat bangmahlou in a nawlkhin uhi.
Huaiziak in
A ta uh, ka khut suakte, a lak ua a muh un, ka min a siangthousak zawta ding uh; ahi, Jakobte Mi Siangthou a siangthousak ding ua, Israelte Pathian lah a kihta ding uhi.
Kha a vakmangte’n leng a hon theisiamta ding ua mi phunhatte’n sinsak thu a sinta ding uhi.
Pharo hatna a kihatsak ding in leh, Aigupta lim bel ding in, ka kam dong tuanlou in Aigupta gam a paisuk tum in a kuan uhi.
Huaiziak in Pharo hatna noute zahlakna ahita ding a, Aigupta lim na belh ulah na maizumna uh ahita ding.
A miliante lah Zoan khua ah a om ua, a palaite lah Hanes khua a tungta ngal uhi.
Amau adia phattuamna himhim neilou mi, huhna hilou, phattuamna neimi leng hilou, maizumna leh minsiatna hizawte, avek un a zumpih ding uh, a chi hi.

Sim gam a sate puakgik, buaina leh lunglauna gam, humpinelkainu leh humpinelkaipa, guldekpak leh gul kuangleng thei pawtna, a sum uh sabiltung nou tungte ah, a gou uh sangawngsau nungvumte ah pawsak in, amau adia phattuamna neilou mite kiang a piak ding in, a pai ton dapdap uhi.
Aigupta in lah phatuam lou tak leh panna neilou tak in a panpih zel ngal a; huaiziak in ahi, amah, Rahab tu kinkennu, ka chih.
Tuin pai inla, huaite a ma ua laigelhna pek ah gelh inla, laibu ah leng gelh in, tunung a tangtawn donga ding a hihtheihna din.
Huaite lah mi helhatte, ta zuautheite, ta
Mutheimite kiang a, mu kei un, zawlneite kiang a, Thildikte honhilh kholkei un, thil nuam lam ka kiang uah gen un, khemna thu gen un, khemna thu gen khol un;
Lampi lou ah pai un, lamsik ah pial un, Israelte Mi Siangthou ka ma ua kipan hihmang un, chi ngitngette.
Huaiziak in Israelte Mi Siangthou in hichi in a chi a, hiai thu na muhsit ziak un leh nuaisiahna leh phengphitna na muan ua, a tung ua na kingak ziak un.
Hiai thulimlouhna noute ading in suangbang sangpi selai, chim dekdek, puak eng ong, thakhat a mitphialkal lou a segawp ding bang ahi ding hi.
Huchi in belvelmi bel a kitam gawpsak bang un, hawi om hetlou a keknen in, a themnen lak ah belpei thuk a mei lakna ding hiam tuikhuka tui dipna ding omlou khop in, a kitam nensak ding, chi in.

Hilou e, sakol tung a tuang in i tai zozot ding uh, na chi zawsop ua, huaiziak in na tai zozot ngei ding uh; Thil hattak tung ah i tuang ding, na chi ua; huaiziak in nou hondelh ding lah hattak ahi ding uh.
Mi khat phawn in sang khat a taikek ding ua; mi nga phawn in na taikek ding uh; a tawp in mualvum a puankhai khai bang leh, tang tung a chiamtehna om bang a nutsiat in na om ding uhi.
Huaiziak in noute
Mite Jerusalem a Zion ah a om ding ahi ngal ua; na kap nawn kei ding uh; na kahna husa uah aman a hon hehpih mahmah ding a; a zaktak in a hon dawng ding hi.
lungkhamna tanghou leh haksatna tui nou honpe mahleh, nou hon sinsakmite a kibu nawn kei ding ua, na mit un nou hon sinsakmite a mu zawta ding hi;
Huan, taklam a na pial un hiam, veilam a na pial un, na bil un na nunglam ua thu, "Hiai lampi ahi, hiai ah pai un," chi in, a za ding hi.
Na dangka uh milim bawl dangka chi a zepna leh, na dangkaeng uh, milim sun dangkaeng tui a luanna na buahsak ding ua; thil nin bang in na paita ding ua, a kiang ah, Paimang in! na chi ding uh.

Huchi in, aman na buhchi uh lei a na tuh ding uh ading in vuahtui a pe ding a; lei a thilpoute leng an din a peding, huai lah hoihtak pung tak ahi ding; huai ni chiang in na ganta uh gantatna mun zapi ah a ta ding uh.
Bawngtal leh sabengtungnou leilette’n an chisoh, ninluahna leh phazah a hihsiangsa a ne ding uh.
Kithahna thupitak ni a galvenna singte a chip ni’n, tangsang teng ah leh mualvum sangteng ah luipite leh luite tuiluang a hongom ding.
Huailou leng
Ngai in,
A hu lah, manna lawhpi a namchih sep ding in, lui ngawng chiangpha hial a a kuang a let bang ahi; michih kam ah pikhelh sakna kaihgingna khau a om ding.
Zan a zehtan siangthou a zeh a tanlai ua la a sak bang un, la a sa ding ua;
Huchi in,
aw ziak in Assuria mi, khetbuk a mi khen nakpa, kitapzan sak a om ding ahi ngal a.
Amah lah chiang sehsa a
Tophet khat lah tuma a na bawlkholhsa ahi ngal a; ahi, kumpipa ading in bawlzoh siang ahi a; thutak zatakin a bawl a; a thil sekkhawm mei leh sing tamtak ahi a;
Aigupta gam a panpihna zong ding a hohsuk a, sakolte tung a muang a, a tam ziak ua kangtalaite leh a hat mahmah ziak ua sakol tungtuang mite muang a Israelte Mi Siangthou lam enlou a,

Dong kei mahle uh amah leng piltak ahi, thil hoihlou a hon tungsak ding a, a thute a khel nawn kei ding, thil hoihlou hihmite inkuan sual ding in a thou zaw ding a, khialte panpihna dou ding in a thou ding hi.
Aigupta mite zaw, Pathian ahi kei ua, mi lel ahi uh; huchi in
Vasate a bu tung ua a lengleng bang un sepaihte
Israel suante aw, nakpitak a na helsansa lam uh nga nawnta un.
Huai ni’n michih in amau dangka milimte, amau dangkaeng milimte, khelhna ding a amau khut a na kibawltawmte uh lah a paimang ding ua,

Huai hun chiang in Assuria mi bel, mi namsau a puksak hilou in, namsau hihpuk sak hilou in, namsau hihpuk in a om ding a; namsau mite a hilou in, amah a gai ding; huan, namsau lak a kipan a taimang ding a, a tangvalte lah siahliaumi a hong hita ding uhi.
Huchi in, a suangpi lah thil mulkimhuai ziak in a mang ding a, a miliante lah chiamtehna ziak in a buaita ding, chi in,
Ngai in, kumpipa khat diktattak in kumpipa in a tu ding a, mi liante’n vaihawmna diktak in vai a hawm ding uh.
Huchi in, mi khat huihpi lak a bukna mun bang, vuahpi lak a bitna mun, mun keu a tui luangte bang, gam tultak a suangpi lianpi nuamsa tak bang ahi ding hi.
Huchi in a mute mit a mial kei ding a, a zate bil in a ngaikhe ding.
Mi ngongtatte lungtang in theihna thu a theisiam ding a, dang-awkte lei teltak in a pau thei ding hi.
Migilou mi thilphal a chi nawnta kei ding uh, milepchiah misiam a chi nawn kei ding uh.
Pathian zahlouhna thilhih ding leh,
Mi lepchiah vante zaw hoihlou ahi a; tagahte’n thudik a gen un leng mi gentheite zuauthu a hihmang ding in aman lah thil gilou hih a ngaihtuah zel hi.
Mi thilphal bel thilphal in thil liante a ngaihtuah a: huchi in thilphal lam thilte ah a om gige ding hi.
Numei mawk omte aw, thou unla, ka aw ngaikhia un; tanu pilvangloute aw ka thugen ah bildoh un.
Numei pilvangloute aw, kum khat leh ni bangzah hiam nung in na buaita ding uh; grep loh ding lah a om ngalkei ding a, grep lohkhawm ding ah leng bangmah a suak sam kei ding hi.
Numei mawk omte aw, ling un: mi pilvangloute aw, buaitak in om un; kisuah unla, vuaktang in kibawl unla, na kawng uah saiip puan teng un.
Lou deihte ziak leh grep guigah nuamte ziak in a awm a tumtum ding uhi.
Ka mite gam loulingnei leh khaulingnei in nopsakna inn tengteng leh nopsakhuai khopi tengteng tung ah a buak ding hi:
Kumpipa inn paisan a om ding ahi ngal a; a mualpawng leh a galvenbuk tangtawn kawhawm ding leh, gam sabiltung kipahnate, ganhon tatna munte ahi ding;
Tunglam a kipan a kha ka tung ua sun a a om a, gamdai leihoihtak mun a suah a, leihoihtak mun lah gammang bang a sim a hih mateng.
Huai hun in vaihawm diktatna gamdai ah a teng ding a, diktatna leihoihtak mun ah a om ding.
Huan, diktatna nasep kituahna ahi ding a, diktatna a thilpawt lah tangtawn a muangtak a omna leh kitheihchetna ahi ding.
Huchi in ka mite bel galmuanga omna ah leh inkiptak leh khawlna mun muanhuaite a omta ding uhi.
Himahleh gammang bel hihpuk ding in gial a ke ding a; khopi hihniam in a om ding hi.
Tui luanna piau a chi theh zel, bawngtal leh sabiltung khahzel te aw, nuam na sa uhi.

Nang loh tuak ngeiloupi, a lok a pang, lepchiahtak a bawl tuak ngeilou pi, lepchiahtak a pang, na tung a gik hi. Mi loh na tawp hun chiang in nang leng loh na tuaksam ding hi; lepchiahtak a na hihkhit chiang in, na tung ah lepchiahtak in a hih ding uhi.
Lum vengvung husa in michih a taimangta ua; nang na kisak hial chiang in namchih hihdalh in a omta uhi.
Na sum uh gallak a lak ding lung in thil a nek dundun bang in nekgaih in a om ding; khaupete a tawm duamduam uh bang in amaute sum tung ah a tawm duamduam ding uhi.
Toupa tunglam ah tawisang in a omta hi; aman Zion vaihawm diktak leh diktatna in a dimsakta hi.
Na damsung in omkipna a om ding a, hotdamna, pilna, theihna a om kikeih ding;
Ngai in, a pasalphate uh pawlam ah a kikou ua; kituahna palaite a kap hawhaw uhi.
Lamliante a mualta ua, mizin vialvakte a om nawn kei uh; aman thukhun a bohsia a, khuate a musit a, mi khawk a sa kei hi.
Gam a kap in a gim a; Lebanon a zum in a vuai a; Sharon gamdai bang ahita; Bashan leh Karmel in a nah uh a singkhia uhi.
Lou keu naupai in na pai ding ua, buhpawl na suang ding uh; na hu uh noumau kangmang ding mei ahi.
Michih lah chinai suang hal bang, loulingnei vatsa mei a a paih bang uh, a chi ding uh, a chi hi.
Gamlapi a omte aw, ka thilhih bil in za un; naichik a omte aw, ka thilhihtheihdan thei un.
Zion a migilou omte’n a lau ua; Pathian zahlou mite linna in a manta hi. I lak ua kua ahia thil katmang ching mei kiang a om ding? I lak uah kua ahia tangtawn a kang zoizoi kiang a om ding?
Diktattak a om a, diktak a gen mi; nuaisiahnate punna himhim bangmah a ngailou a, golhna la nuamlou a bil hum a, gilou himhim en nuamlou a mitsi zel mi;
Huai mi tunglam ah a om ding a; a kidalna munsang suangpi kidalnate ahi ding; a an a kiang a piak ahi ding a, a tuite a om ngeingei ding hi.
Na mite’n kumpipa a kilawmna in a mu ding a, gam kiphalh zatak a hon en ding uhi.
A simmi koi a omta ahia? Siahliau tehmi koi a omta ahia? Galven insangte simmi koi a omta ahia? chi in, na lungtang in thil mulkimhuai mahmah na ngaihtuah ding.
Mihangtak, pau giltak na theihtheih louh a pau mite, pau tuam na theihsiamlouh a pau mite, na mu nawnta kei ding.

I zehtanna khopi Zion en dih; na mit in Jerusalem omna muanhuaitak, puanin chikchiang a leng suanlouh ding, kaihgakna khet chikchiang a leng bohlouh ding, a kaihna khau himhim kitatlou ding bang, a mu ding hi.
Huai ah
lah i vaihawmpa ahi a,
Na khaute kolsak in a om ding a; a puanzak peu bul uh a kipsak theikei ua, puanzak lah a zak theikei uh; huaitak in gallak sum tampi hawm in a om a; khebaite’n leng gallak sum a lata uhi.
Huai khua a mi om in, ka chi a na, a chi kei ding a, asung a mite khelhna ngaihdam in a om ding uhi.
Namchihte aw, bil a za ding in hongnai un; michihte aw, ngaikhia un; leitung leh asung a om tengteng in bil in za uhen; khovel leh asung apat pawt tengteng toh.
nam chiteng tung a lungkimlouhna nei in a sepaihte uh tengteng tung ah lah hehna a nei ngal a; amau a hihmang vek a, thah din a peta hi.
A lak ua thah a omte paihkhiak in a om ding ua, a luang namsia uh a paitou vutvut ding a, tangte a sisan ua zulsak in a om ding uhi.

Van a omte tengteng hihman in a om ding ua, laibuzial a zial bang un van zial in a om ding a, a omte tengteng, grepgui a kipan a nahvuai a pulh bang in leh, theipi kung a kipan a nahvuai a pulh bang in a vuai khin un a pulh vek ding uhi.
Ka namsau in van ah taitak in a dawnta ngal a, ngai in, huai vaihawm ding in Edomte tung ah leh ka hamsiat mite tung ah a ke ding.
namsau sisan in a tai ding a, thauna a thausak in a omta, belamnoute leh kelte sisan in, belampa gilthaute in;
Gam bawngtalte leng kituak a satpaih in a om ding ua, bawngpate bawngtalte toh, a gam un sisan a kham ding a, a leivui uh thauna a thausak in a om ding.
phulak ni lah ahita ngal a, Zion selna lam thu a thukna kum.
A luituite longnai dia suahsak in a om ding a, leivuite mei leh kat a suak ding a, a gam longnai kang a suak ding hi.
Sun leh zan in mihsak ahi kei ding a; a meikhu lah tangtawn in a tungkah ding a; suan omlai siah a sia in a om nilouh ding a; tangtawn in leng kuamah in a ngap kei ding uhi.
Tuivagik leh sakuh in huai gam a tang ding ua; simbu leh va-ak huai ah a teng ding uh; siatna khau leh siatgawpna ulum a tung ah a khai ding hi.
A mi hoihte uh gam uk ding in a sam ding ua, himahleh huai ah kuamah sap ding a omkei ding uh; a milian tengteng uh bangmah ahi kei ding uh.
A kumpipa uh inn ah loulingneite a pou ding a, a kulhpi sung uah dailing leh lingnok a pou ding; sehalte tenna ding leh vasa ngawngsaute ading in inn umsung intual ahi ding hi.
Huan, gamdai a, gamsate ngiate toh a kituak ding ua, sathak in a lawm a sam ding; ahi, zan thil lauhuaipi in huai ah omna a bawl ding a, amah ading in khawlna mun ding a mu ding hi.
Huai ah simbu thupi in bu a bawl ding a, a tui dia, a keuh ding a, a op khawm ding; ahi, huai ah mute koppih neichiat in a omkhawm ding uhi.
Aman lah amau ading in ai a sansak a, a khut a khau a teh in huai gam a hawmsak chiat a; tangtawn in a nei ding ua, suan omlai teng huai ah a om ding uhi.
Gamdai leh phaksap gam a kipak ding a;
gamkeu in nuamsa in
pawn pak bang in a pak ding.
A pak lun ding a, kipaktak leh lasa in nuam a sa ding hi;
Lebanon thupina a kiang ah piak ahi ding,
Karmel leh Sharon kilawmna toh;
i Pathian kilawmna toh.
Khut hatloute hatsak unla,
khuk zawte kipsak un.
Lungtang dawilokte kiang ah,
hattak in om unla, lau kei un;
ngai un, na Pathian uh phulakna toh a hongpai ding a,
a hon hondam ding, chi un.
Huai hun chiang in mittawte
mit hahsak in a om ding a,
bengngongte bil
hihvak in a om ding.
Huai hun chiang in khebaite
sakhi bang in a tawm ding ua,
pautheiloute lei in nuamsatak in la a sa ding; gamdaite ah tuite a hong phulkhe ding ua,
gam keute ah luita tui a hong phulkhe biabia ding uhi.
Huchi in piaunel sa mahmah munte dil a hongsuak ding a, lei dangtak mahmah tuinak a hongsuak ding;
sehalte tenna a,
a lupna uah, loupa,
maute leh sikhapat toh a om ding.
Huan, huai ah lamlian a om ding,
kongpi toh, huai siangthouna Lampi a chi ding uhi; mi thanghuai in lampi a tawn kei ding;
himahleh huai mite ading in ahizaw ding;
mi vialzinte, ahi, mihaite leng,
huai ah a mang kei ding uhi.
Humpinelkai himhim huai ah a omkei ding a,
sa hing ne himhim huai ah a paitou sam kei ding uh,
muhphak in leng a omkei ding;
Tatsate bel huai ah a paitou ding ua;
lasa kawm in Zion a tung ding uh,
tangtawn a kipahna a lu tung uah a omta ding a; nuamsakna leh kipahna
a ngah ding ua, lungkhamna leh thumna a mang ding hi.
Kumpipa Hezekiah kum sawmlehli kum in hichi ahi a, Assuria gam kumpipa Sennakerib tuh Judah gam a kulhnei khua tengteng sim ding in a va hohtou a a lata hi.
Assuria kumpipa’n Rabsakeh sepaihhon tampi piin Lakish khua a kipan Jerusalem khua a kumpipa Hezekiah kiang ah a sawl hi. Huan, dil saknung tuilakna kiang a puansawpmi pawn lamlian ah ading hi.
Huchi in kumpipa inkuanpihte tung a heutu a om Hilkiah tapa Eliakim, Laigelhmi Shebna, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joah a kiang ah a hongsuk uhi.
Huan Rabsakeh in a kiang uah, “Hezekiah kiang ah huchi in gen un: Kumpipa thupitak Assuria kumpipa in hichi in a chi, Na muanna kingakna bang ahi mai a?
Kidouna ding a na lemtheihna leh na hatna zaw thu lel ahi, ka chi; Kua muang a, ka tung a hel na himai a?
Ngai in, hiai sialluang chiang kitan Aiguptate muang neive; huai mi na muan leh, na khut ah a sun ding hi; Aigupta kumpipa Pharo ah zaw amah muangte tung ah huchibang ahi.
Ahihkeileh, ka kiang ah,
Huchi in, hehpih in, ka pu Assuria kumpipa kiang ah thu chiam in, huchi in ken sakol sang nih k’on pe ding, nang a tung ua tuangdingte na muh theihpeuh ding leh.
Bangchi’n, kangtalaite leh sakol tungtuang mite thu ah Aiguptate tung a na muanna nga a, ka pu sikha neupente lak a heutu khat leng na nan zoh ding?
Huan, hiai hihse ding a sim ding in

Eliakim leh Shebna leh Joahte’n, Rabsakeh kiang ah, “Hehpih in na sikhate Suria pau in hon houpih in; huai ka theithei ngal ua; kulhbang tung a mite zak in Judah pau in hon houpih nawn ken” a chi uhi.

Himahleh Rabsakeh in, “Ka pu in na pu kiang kia ah leh nang kiang ah hiai thu gen ding in honsawl ahia? Kulhbang tung a tute, noute toh amau ek ne ding leh amau zun dawn dingte kiang ah, a honsawl ahizaw kei maw?” a chi hi.
Huchi in, Rabsakeh ading a, Judah pau in ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Kumpipa thupi Assuria kumpipa thute ngaikhia un.
Kumpipa’n hichi in a chi: Hezekiah khem in om nuam dah un; aman lah a hon humbit theikei ding hi.
‘Hezekiah in,

Hezekiah thu ngaikhe kei un; Assuria kumpipa’n lah hichi in a chi ngal a, Thilpiak in hon kituahpih unla, ka kiang ah hong paikhia un; michih in a grepgui apan leh michih in a theipi kung apan ne chiat unla, michih in a tuikhuk apan tui dawn chiat un.
Ka hongpai a, noumau gam bang a buh leh uain omna gam, tanghou leh grephuante omna gam a k’on paipih ma tan.
hon humbit ding, chi a, Hezekiah in a honkhem khak leh pilvang un. Namchih pathian lak a mi himhim in a gam uh Assuria kumpipa kiang ah a humbitta ua hia?
Hamath leh Arpahte pathiante koi a om ahita ua? Sepharvaimte pathiante koi a om ahita ua? Huai Samaria khua kei a kipan in a humbitta ua hia?
Huai gam pathian tengteng lak a kuate’n ahi a gam uh kei a kipan a a humbit uh?
Amau bel a daidide ua, “Thu khat lel in leng a dawng kei uh; kumpipa thupiak, amau dawng kei un” chih ahi ngal a.

Huchi in kumpipa inkuanpihte tung a heutu a om Hilkiah tapa Eliakim, Laigelhmi Shebna, tanchin gelhmi Asaph tapa Joah ten a puansilh uh botkek in Hezekiah kiang ah a hongpai ua, Rabsakeh thugente a hilh uhi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, kumpipa Hezekiah in huai a zaktak in a puansilhte a botkek a, saiip puan a silh a,
A inkuanpihte tung a heutu a om Eliakim leh, Laigelhmi Shebna leh siampute upate saiip puan silh in Amoz tapa zawlnei Isai kiang ah a sawl hi.
Amau a kiang ah, Hezekiah in hichi in a chi, “Tuni mangbatna leh muhsitna ni ahi; naupangte lah a pian hun uh ahita a, amau piangsak ding in hatna lah a om nawn kei hi.
Rabsakeh a pu Assuria kumpipa’n Pathian hing gense ding a a sawl thugente,
Huchi in kumpipa Hezekiah sikhate Isai kiang ah a hongpai uhi.
Isai in a kiang uah, “Na pu kiang uah hichin na chi ding uh ahi,
Ngai in, asung ah kha banghiam ka omsak ding a, huchi in thuthang a za ding a, amah gam ah a kiknawn ding; huchi in amah gam ngei ah namsau a puksak in ka omsak ding, a chi” chi in, a chi hi.
Huchi in Rabsakeh a kiknawn a, Assuria kumpipa in Libnah khua a douna a kipan a paikheta chih a theikhinta hi.
Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib in Tirhak Ethiopia kumpipa tungthu, “Nang honsim ding in a pawtta” chi in mi gen a za hi. Huchi in huai a zaktak in Hezekiah kiang ah palaite a sawl a.
Hichi in Judahte kumpipa Hezekiah kiang ah na chi ding uh ahi, “Na muan Pathian in, Jerusalem khua Assuria kumpipa khut ah piak ahi kei ding, chi in, honkhem kei hen.
Ngai in, Assuria Kumpipate’n gam tengteng hihsevek in a tung ua a thilhihte uh na bil in na za hi, huchi in nang penpen humbit in na om tuam ding hiam?
Namchih pathiante’n, Gozan, Haran, Reseph, Eden ta Telassar khua a omte, ka pipute sukmante, a humbit ua hia.
Hamath kumpipate, Ivvah kumpipate koi a om ahita ua?” chi in, a chi a.
Hezekiah in palaite khut a kipan in lai a mu a, a sim a, huchi in Hezekiah
Hezekiah
“Sepaihte
aw na bildoh inla, ngai dih ve;
, Assuria Kumpipate’n gam tengteng leh a lei uh a hihse ngei ua, a pathiante uleng mei ah a pai uhi.
Huaite zaw Pathian ahi kei him ua, mihing khut a bawl sing leh suang, ahizaw uh; huaiziak in a hihmang uhi.
Huaiziak in,
Huailai in Amoz tapa Isai in Hezekiah kiang ah mi a sawl a, hichi in a chi a, “
“Zion tanu nungak in a hon musit a, a hon nuihsan hi; Jerusalem tanu in a lu a hon sinkhum.
Kua ahimai a na minsiatsak a na gensiat? Kua tung ah ahia na aw na puamsak a, na mit na san sak? Israelte Mi Siangthou tung ah ahi kei maw.
Na sikhate zang in
Tuileh ka let a, tui ka dawn zel a, ka khepek nuai in Aigupta lui tengteng ka kangsak vek ding” na chi hi.
Ken nidanglai apat in huai ka hih ahi a, tuma lam a kipan a ka suktuah ahi chih na za ka hia? Khua kulhneite inchim khawm banglel a hihsepa na hih theihna ding in tuin ka tungsak hi.
Huaiziak in asung a omte a hat law kei ua, a lau ua, a zahlak uhi; pawn loupa banglel leh, loupa hing banglel, intung loupa hing banglel, intung loupa bang leh, lou buh hoih mah bang lel ahi uhi.
Ken bel na tut, na pawt, na lut leh ka tung a na hehdan ka thei hi.

Ka tung a na heh ziak leh, na uangpau ka bil a a honglut touh tak ziak in ka nakbulh nang nak ah ka bulh ding a, ka sikkaihna leng na muk ah ka bulh ding hi, na hongpaina lampi mah ah k’on kiksak nawn ding, chih, chi in.

Huan, hiai pen nang ading a chiamtehna ding ahi ding; tukum in buh sang na sen ding ua; kum nawn in leng huai buhsang mah na sen ding uh; a kum thumna ah buh tuh unla, at unla, grephuante bawl unla, a gah ne un.
Huan, Judah inkuanpihte lak a damsunte bel a suklam a zungkai a, a toulam a gah in a omnawn ding.
A omsunte Jerusalem a kipan in a pawt ding ua, damlai dingte Zion tang a kipan in a pawt ding uh; sepaihte
“Huaiziak in
A hongpaina lampi ah huai mah ah a kiknawn ding a, hiai khopi a hongtung kei ding,
Kei ziak leh ka sikha David ziak in hiai khopi ka humbit ding hi” chi in, a chi a.
Huchi in
Huchi in, Assuria kumpipa Sennakerib a pawt a, a paikik a, Ninevi khua ah a om nilouh hi.

Huchi in, hichi ahi a, a pathian Nisrok inn a pathian a biak lai in a tapa Adrammelek leh Sarezerte’n namsau in a satlum ua; huchi in a taimang ua, Ararat gam ah a lut uhi. Huchi in, a tapa Esarhaddon in a sik in vai a hawm hi.
Huailai in Hezekiah muanmawh in a chi a na hi. Huchi in Amoz tapa zawlnei Isai a kiang ah a hong a, a kiang ah, “
Huchi in Hezekiah bang lam nga in a om a,
Huchi in
“Kuan inla, Hezekiah kiang ah gen in, Toupa, na pu David Pathian in hichi in a chi, Na thumna ka za a, na khituite leng ka mu a: ngai in, na damsung nite ah kum sawm le kum nga ka behlap ding.
Huan, nang leh hiai khopi Assuria kumpipa a kipan ka humbit ding a: hiai khopi ka hum ding hi.
En in, inlim chial a lim, Ahaz dakbi theihna a niamkiaksa, inlim chial sawm tan in ka kiksak nawn ding” a chi hi. Huchi in, ni a niamna dakbi theihna ah inlim chial sawm tan in a kiknawnta hi.
Judah kumpipa Hezekiah china, a dam nawn nung a a laigelh:
“Ka damsung nite sunlaitak in han kongpi ah lut ding in ka kisa a:
ka damsung kum omlai dingte suh in ka omta,
ka chi hi.
khovel a omte lak ah mihing ka mu nawn kei ding hi.
Ka omna suan in a om a, belamchingmi puan in bang in ka kiang a kipan a lakmang in a omta hi.
Puan gan min a puan a zial bang in ka hinna ka zial a;
aman siambu a kipan a
hon teptan ding a; ni khat leh zan khat thil thu a hon hihtawp maimah ding nei ve ka chi hi.
Zingsang tan ka dai teitei a; humpinelkai
bang in ka guh tengteng a sutan vek a:
nang ni khat leh zan khat thil thu a hon hihtawp mai ding neive.
Lensiam hiam, vakang hiam bang in ka hamham a, vakhu bang in ka thum hi,
tunglam etna in ka mit a vaita hi;
nang ka tang in ding in.
Bang ka gen dia? Aman a hon houpih a,
amahmah in a hihpah hi:
ka hinna ningkitelna ziak in ka damsung kum teng awl khakha in ka paikhiankhianta ding.
huaite kia ah ka kha hinna a om zel hi:
huaiziak in hondam sak nawn in hon hingsak nawn in.
Ngai in, ka lungmuanna ding in ahi,
ningkitelna thupitak ka na neih:
himahleh nang,
ka hinna na it ziak in,
siatna kawkhuk a kipan in na humbitta;
ka khelhnate tengteng lah
na nunglam ah na pai vekta hi.
Han in lah honphat thei ngal kei a,
sihna’n leng a hon pahtawi thei sam kei hi: kawkhuk a kumte’n na thutak
a lamen theikei uhi.
Mihing in, mihing in, amau ngei in tuni a ka hih bang in a honphat ding uh:
pa’n a tate kiang ah na thutak
a theisak ding.
a mansa gige hi: huaiziak in i damsung tengteng in,
ka late tumging guineite toh i sa ding.”
Isai in, theipi gah lomkhat la henla, damdawi a tat a tatte ding in a meimatum ah tuamkhum hen, huchi in a dam ding, a na chi khinta hi.
Hezekiah in leng,
Huailai in Baladan tapa Babulon kumpipa Merodakbaladan in laite leh kipahman Hezekiah kiang ah a khak a: a chi a na chih leh a damnawnta chih a zak ziak in.

Huchi in Hezekiah a tung uah a kipak a, a kiang uah a thil manphate koihna inn dangkate, dangkaengte, gimlim bangbang hiamte, sathau manphate, a galvan koihna inn sung tengtengte, a gou hoih lak a om tengtengte a ensak hi: A inn leh a gamsung a om himhim Hezekiah in a kiang ua a etsaklouh a omkei hi.

Huailai in zawlnei Isai bel kumpipa Hezekiah kiang ah a hong a, a kiang ah, “Den a mite’n bang ahia a gen uh? Koi a kipan in ahia na kiang a a hong uh?” a chi hi. Hezekiah in, “Gam gamlapi a kipan, Babulon a kipan in, ka kiang a hongpai ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in aman, “Na inn ah bangbang a en ua eita?” a chi a. Hezekiah in, “Ka insung a om tengteng a envek uh: ka gou hoihte ka etsak louh bangmah a omkei” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huchi in Isai in Hezekiah kiang ah, “Sepaihte
Ngai in na insung a om tengteng leh tuni tan a na pipute’n a kholkhawmte uh Babulon khua a paipih in a omvek ding; bangmah nutsiat in a omkei ding; huchibang nite a hongtung ding,
Huan, na tapa, na gil a hong gah ding, na suan dingte ngei lak a mi, a paimang pih ding uh; amau Babulon kumpipa inn ah michilgeh ding in a om ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in Hezekiah in, Isai kiang ah, “
Lungmuan un, ka mite lungmuan un, na Pathian un a chi.

lamsang in thugen unla,

a thil hihkhelh teng gun ding in

a chi hi. Mi tengteng loupa bang ahi ua, a thupina tengteng uleng

a pak a tul nak:

suah in, lau ken; Judah khuate kiang ah, En un, na Pathian uh!
En un,
a ban in vai a hawm ding:
En un, a kipahman a kiang ah a om a, ditna leng a ma ah a om.

Kuan ahia
dan ding kawkmuh?
Ahihkeileh kua ahia amah lemsehsak hi a amah chil?

Ahihkeileh, bang lim ahia

mi in asung a,

Puan in omna ding a zak a, miliante bangmahlou suaksakpa ahi.

Ahi, a suan ahi kei ua; ahi, a tuh ahi kei uh; ahi,

Ka lampi zaw
A vaihawmsakna ka Pathian lak a lakmang ahi, chih?

Tangtawn Pathian,
Siampa, a bah lou a, a gim
ngeilouh dan;
a theihsiamdan zonkhiak vual ahi kei hi.
Bahte kiang ah thilhitheihna a pia a,

Tuailaite nangawn bah in a gim ding ua,

bah lou in khe in a pai ding uhi.
Tuikulh gamte aw,
ka ma ah dai sipsip unla;

Kei
a nanungpen, a hihpa kei kia ka hi.

A hoih hi, chi in, khutsiam mi in dangkaeng sekmi a hanthawn a,

Himahleh nou Israelte ka sikha,
Jakobte ka mitel, ka lawm,
Abraham suante aw,
Nou, lei tawpna a kipan a ka mipi,

Lau kei un, kei lah na kiang uah ka om ngal a; mangbang kei un,

k’on hatsak ding a; ahi,
k’on panpih ding;
ahi, ka diktatna khut taklam in ka honlen gige ding hi.
Ngai in,
na tung ua lungkimlou tengteng zahlaktak leh zumtak in a om ding uh:
nou honselte lah bangmahlou
bang ahi ding ua, a mang ding uh.
Nou honselte na zong ding ua,

Kei
Lau kei un, k’on panpih ding, chi in,

Israelte Mi Siangthou ahi
Ngai in, buhsukna khawl thak

noute
Mi Siangthou n’on suang ding uh.
Mi genthei leh tagahte’n tui
a zong ua, a omkei a, a lei uh
dangtak in a hulkhin hi;
kei
ding a, kei Israel Pathian in

Tangsang giau ah luite ka luangsak ding a,

dil in ka bawl ding a,

Gamdai ah sidar singte, singgite,

Na thu uh hong gen un,

Jakobte Kumpipa’n a chi.
Huaite sulang uhenla,

ahihkeileh, thil hongtung
dingte hon theisak un.
pathiante na hi uh chih ka
theihna ding un tunung chiang a thiltung dingte gen un; ahi,
i mangbat chiatna ding un leh i et chiat ding un thil hoih hiam thil hoihlou hiam hih dih ua le.
Ngai un, bangmah na hi kei ua,

Mallam a kipan mi khat ka
dingsak a, amah a hongtung a;

I theihtheihna ding un kuan
ahia a tung a kipan gen ngei?

Ahi gen himhim a om kei uh, ahi,

Ken Zion kiang ah, En in,

Jerusalem kiang ah tanchinhoih hon tunmi khat ka pe ding.
Ka et in leng mi himhim a omkei ua;
amau ka dot in leng,
a lak ua lemtheimi, thu khat
