himhim leng a omkei uh.
En un, a nasepte uh bangmahlou ahi a, thil omlou ahi:
a milim sunte ulah huih leh huihkhua lel ahi hi.
Ka sikha, ka let gige, ka tel,
ka lung in a pahtak mahmah en dih ua: a tung ah ka kha ka koihta:
Jentelte kiang a piak ding in vaihawmna thu a hongpawt ding.
A kikou kei ding a, a aw a
suaksak sam kei ding,
kongzing ah a aw a kiza sak sam kei ding.
Sialluang gawpsa a kuaitan kei
ding a, Meikuang liakliak a mitsak kei ding: thudik in vai a hawm zaw ding hi.
Leitung a vaihawmna a omsak masiah,
amah a bah kei ding a,
a lungdong sam kei ding;
tuikulh gamte’n a dan thu a ngak nilouh ding uhi.
Pathian,
phalhpa, lei leh asung a
kipan a pawt tengteng hihlianpa,
a tung a mite kiang a hatna pepa leh a tung a paite kiang a kha pepan hichi in a chi:
Kei
honsam a, na khut ka len ding a,
k’on humbit ding,
mite thukhun ding leh Jentelte hihvakpa ding in k’onsep ding a:
Mitdelte mit hihvak ding leh
mitangte suangkulh a kipan pikhe ding leh,
mial lak a tute suangkulh a pan a pikhe ding in.
ka thupina midang kiang ah ka pe kei ding a, phat ka lohna leng milim bawltawmte kiang ah ka pe sam kei ding.
Ngai un, tuma thilte a hongtungta,
thil thakte gen ka hi: a pou ma in nang k’on hilh hi.
Tuipi a hohsukte leh, asung a om
tengteng leh, tuikulh gamte leh,
a tung a om tengteng aw,

suaksak uhen,
Kedarte omna khuate’n;

bang in a pawt ding a,

Sawtpi ka daita a;

milim sunte kiang a,
Ka pathian uh na hi uh,

Dan lah a diktatna ziak a letsak a
pahtawisaka om
Himahleh hiaite zaw guta guksak
leh lohtuak mite ahi ua; guam a ahivek ua,

sal ding ahi ua, kuamah in lah a humbit ngal kei ua, gallak a lak ding ahi ua, kuamah in,

Na lak uah huaite bildoh ding
kua na om ua?

a piak hilou hia?
Amah lampi ah a pai nuam ngal kei ua.
A danthu a mang sam kei uhi.
Huaiziak in a heh mahmahna leh
kibawlna tha amau tung ah a sungbua a,
huai in amaute a kang a himahleh a thei sam kei uh;
huai in amaute a hul a,
himahleh a lungsim un a ngaihtuah tuankei uhi.
Tuin zaw, Jakobte aw,
nou honsiampa leh,
Israelte aw,
nou hon bawlpa’n,
hichi in a chi;
Lau kei un, k’on tanta hi;
na min un k’on sam a,
kei a na hi uhi.
Tuite na ngah tan lai un na kiang uah ka om ding a;
luite na ngah tan lai un leng a hontum kei ding hi:
mei a na pai tan lai un leng
a honhul kei ding a; meikuang in a honliau kei ding hi.
Kei,
Israelte Mi Siangthou,
nou hon humbitpa ka hi ngal a;
noute tatna ding in Aigupta gam ka pia a,
Ethiopia leh Sheba gam na sik un ka pia hi.
Ka ngaih in manpha mahmah
na hi ua, mizahtakhuai mahmah leng na hi uhi,
it leng ka hon it ziak in,
na sik un mite ka pe ding a,
na hinna sik ding un michih ka pe ding hi.
Lau kei un, na kiang uah ka om ngal a:
na suante uh suahlam a kipan ka honpi ding a,
tumlam a kipan ka honpi khawm ding hi;
Mallam kiang ah, khah un,
ka chi ding a;
simlam kiang ah,
len kei un, ka chi ding;
ka tapate gamlapi a kipan
honpi unla, ka tanute

Ka min paw peuhmahte leh
ka thupina ding a ka siam
peuhmahte;
amau ka bawl a,
ahi, amau ka suktuah ahi uh hi.
Mit nei ngal a mittawte leh,
bil nei ngal a bengngongte, pi khia un.
Namchih kikhawm uhenla,
michih omkhawm uhen:
a lak ua kua ahia hiai gen thei a, tuma lam in thilte hon theisak thei?
Siamtansaka a om theihna
ding un a palaite uh honpi uhen:
ahihkeileh bil in za uhenla,
thutak ahi, chi uhen.
Mi theih a, mi upa, amah ka hi
chih na theih theihna ding un,
noute ka palaite na hi uh,

ka om ma in Pathian bawl
a omkei a, ka om nung in
leng a omsam kei uh.
Kei, keimahmah,
keimah loungal hondampa a omkei hi.
Ken ka gen a, ka hondam a,
ka theisak a,
na lak uah gamdang
Pathian a omkei hi: huaiziak in noute ka palaite na hi uh,
Ahi, ni om nungsang kei
amah ka hi; huchi in
ka khut a kipan honkhe thei kuamah a omkei uh;
nna ka sem a,
kuan ahia huai hei ding?
Toupa, nou hon tanpa, Israelte
Mi Siangthou in hichi in a chi:
Nou ziak in Babulon khua ah sepaihte ka sawl a, huchi in,
avek un, Kaldaite, a kipahna
longpi uah taimangmi pi in ka pi suk ding.
Kei
Israelte Siampa,
Na Kumpipa uh ka hi, chi in.
Tuipi a lampi bawlpa leh,
tui thupi mahmahte a paina ding bawlpa,
Kangtalai leh sakol, sepaihte
leh thilhihtheihna a pikhepa’n,
huaite a lumkhawm zengzung ua, a thou nawnta kei ding uh;
a chimit khin ua,
khawnvak puan mihsak bang in mihsak in a omta uh, chi in.
Tuma lam thilte zaw theigige
kei unla, nidanglai thilte ngaihtuah sam kei un.
Ngai un, thilthak ka hih ding;
tua kipan in a dawnkhe ding;
huai na theikei ding ua hia?
Gamdai nangawn ah lampi
ka bawl ding a, gamkeu ah
leng luite ka bawl ding.
Gamsate’n leng hon pahtawi
ding ua, sehalte,
vasangawngsaute tan in:
gamdai a tuite ka omsak ziak
leh, gamkeu a luite
ka omsak ziak in, ka mi, ka telte kiang a dawn ding a piak ding.
Hiai mite kei ading in ka bawl a;
kei phatna a hihlang ding uhi.
Himahleh Jakobte aw,
nou zaw n’on sam kei ua,
Israelte aw, nou zaw
nawn chimtak zawta uhi.
Haltum thillat gannoute
n’on lak ngeikei ua;
na kithoihnate un n’on pahtawi sam kei uhi.
Thillat in na k’on semsak
ngeikei a, begaw in
k’on hihgim ngeikei hi.
Kawltu dangka in n’on leisak
ngeikei ua,
na kithoihna thaute un
n’on taisak ngeikei uh:
na khelhnate uh puak nasepte
n’on semsak ua, na tatleknate un n’on hihgim zawta uhi.
Kei, kei mahmah,
keimah leh keimah ziak lel a,
na tatlekna uh nulmangpa ka hi;
na khelhnate uleng ka theigige nawnta kei ding.
Hon theihpih un;
ngaihtuah chiat ni:
siamtansak a na om theihna
ding un na thu uh gen un.
Na pu masapen uh a khial a,
na thugen mite uh leng
ka tung ah a talek uhi.
Huaiziak in Mun Siangthou a
miliante ka hihbuah ding a,
huchi in Jakobte hamsethuak ding in ka bawl ding a; Israelte muhdah din ka bawl ding hi.
Tuin zaw, Jakobte,
ka sikhate aw,
ka tel Israelte aw, ngaikhia unla:
sul apan nou hon bawlpa,
nou hon panpih dingpa’n
hichi in a chi:
Ka sikha Jakobte aw,
ka tel nou Jeshurunte aw, lau kei un.
Dangka tung ah tui ka sung
ding a, lei keu ah tuiluangte
ka sung ding; na suante uh
tung ah ka kha ka sung
ding a, na tate uh tung ah
ka vualzawlna ka sung ding hi:
Huchi in amau, tui luanna kiang a singhiang kaite a pou bang in,
loupa lak ah a pou ding uh.
Mi khat in,
a chi ding a; midang Jakob min in a kilou ding a;
midang in a khut a,
Israel min a beh min in a zang ding chi in, a chi hi.
amau tanpa sepaihte
Kei a masapenpa ka hi a,
nanungpenpa ka hi; keimah
loungal Pathian a omkei uhi.
Nidanglai a mite ka seh nungsang kei hih bang in kuan a sam dia,
huaite kuan a gen dia,
kuan ahia kei sik a kizom zel a hihlang ding?
Thil hongtung dingte leh hongom dingte gen hen.
Lau kei unla, kihta sam kei un;
tuma lam in na kiang uah ka genkhin in k’on theihsak khin hilou hia?
Noute ka palaite na hi uhi.
Keimah lou Pathian a om hiam?
Ahi, Suangpi himhim a omkei;
khat lel leng a om ka theikei.
Milim bawltawm bawlmite avek un huihkhua lel ahi ua; a thil deihlam uh a phatuam kei ding; a zahlakna ding un amau palaite un leng a mu theikei ua, a theithei kei uhi.
Kuan ahia Pathian bawl? Ahihkeileh, kuan ahia bangmah ding a phatuam loupi milim bawltawm sung?
Ngai in, a pawlpi tengteng a zahlak ding ua; na semmite leng mihingte lak a mi ahi uh: Avek un kikhawm vek uhenla, ding uhen; a lau ding ua, a zahlak khawm ding uhi.
Siksek in heipi a sek zel a, meihol ah a tholh a sek ding bang in a sek a, a ban hattak in a sek zel; ahi, a gil a hong kial a, tha a hong zoizel; tui a dawn kei a, a bah nak hi.

Singlem bawlmi in khau a kai gak a, pensil in a hi ding a bawl a, nawt mamna in a hih dingdan a bawl a, bem bawlna in a hi ding a bawl a, mihing lim bang in a bawl a, inn a om ding in mihing kilawmna bang in a bawl zel hi.
Sidarsingte a kiphuk a, sesing leh tosaw a la a, gammang sing lak a khat amah tuam a om ding in a hihkip a; meilahsing a suan a, vuahtui in a vak hi.

Huainung in mi ading a mei a khul ding ahita ding; huai a kipan in a la a, a kihihlum zel; ahi, a kuangsak a, tanghou a haizel hi: ahi, pathian a bawl a, a be zel hi; huai sing pen milim bawltawm ding in a bawl a, huai khupboh in a bia hi.
Huai sing khenkhat mei ah a khul a; a khenkhat sa nekna ding in a zang a; sa a em a, a tai hi; ahi, mei lum a awi a, Nuam e, ka lumta, mei mel ka muta e, a chi hi.
A val pathian ding in a bawl a, a bawltawm milim mah: huai khupboh a bia a, a kiang ah a thum a, Hon hondam in, ka pathian lah na hi ngal a, a chi zel hi.
A theikei ua, a ngaihtuah sam kei uh; aman lah a mit uh a mitsisakta ngal a; a theihsiam louhna ding un a lungtang uh leng a khaksakta hi.

Huchi in kuamah in a theikhe nawn kei ua, Khenkhat lah mei ah ka khul a; ahi, a am ah tanghou bang in ka hai a; sa leng ka em a, lah ka ne ngal a: a val thil kihhuai ding in ka bawl ding hia? Sing a suak khupboh in ka be ding hia? Hih ding in amau ah theihna leh theihsiamna a om tuankei hi.
Vut kia a ne zel a: a lungtang khem a om in, a hinna a kihumbit theihlouhna ding leh, Ka khut taklam ah zuau a om ka hia? a chih theihlouhna ding in, amah a kalsuan sakta hi.
Jakobte aw, huai thilte theihgige un,
Israelte aw, nou leng theigige un ka sikhate lah na hi ngal ua;
kei bawl na hi ua;
ka sikhate na hi uh: Israelte aw,
ka mangngilh in na omkei ding uhi.
Na tatleknate uh meipi hihmang bang in
ka hihmang ta a, na khelhnate uh mei hihmang bang in ka hihmang na lai hi;
ka kiang ah hongkik nawn un,
nou lah k’on tanta ngal a, chi in.
Vante aw, nuamsatak in lasa un,
lei nuailamte aw, kikou un, tangte aw,
gamnuai leh asung a sing om chiteng aw,
la sakhe guih un:
Israelte ah a kipahtawi ding hi.
nou hon bawlpan hichi in a chi:
Kei zaw
keimah kia a van kaipalhpa,
liansakpa ka hi; kua ahia ka kiang a om?
Kei lah zuautheite chiamtehnate
bangmahlou a bawl a, aisansiamte mihai a bawlpa, mipilte nunglam ngasak a,
a theihna uh haihuai a bawlpa.
A sikha thu hihkip a, a palaite lemtheih
tangtungsakpa, Jerusalem tungthu a,
Huai ah mi a om nawn ding uh,
chipa leh Judah gam khaw tungthu a,
Bawl in a om nawn chiat ding uh,
a siatna lailai ka bawl nawn ding, chipa.
Tui thuk mahmah kiang a, Kangtat in,
na luite leng ka kangtat sak ding, chipa.
Kura tungthu a, amah zaw
ka belamchingpa ahi a, Jerusalem tungthu a,
Bawl in a om nawn ding,
chih leh, Pathian biakin kiang a,
Na suangphum lep in a om nawn ding,
chi khop hial in ka deihlam tengteng a hih ding, chipa ka hi, chi in.
namte a ma a phukpai ding leh,
kumpipate kawnggakte
phelsak ding a, a ma a
kongkhakte honsak ding leh,
kulh kongkhakte khak louh a
omsak dingpa, a khut taklam
ka letpa kiang ah, hichi in a chi:
Kei na ma ah ka pai ding a,
a phok lailai ka kibang sak ding:
dal kongkhak ka hihse vek ding a,
a kalhna siktawnte ka tansak ding:
Israelte Pathian ka hi chih na theihtheihna ding in mial lak a goute ka honpe ding a,
mun dai a sum selte leng ka honpe ding.
Jakobte ka sikhate leh Israelte
ka telte ziak in na min in
k’on sam a; honthei ngeikei mahle chin na min k’on phuahsak hi.
Keimah
a dang himhim a omkei;
keimah loungal Pathian a omkei:
hon thei ngeikei mahle chin
na tai k’on gaksak ding hi:
Keimah loungal a dang a omkei
chih ni suahna lam a kipan
leh tumlam a kipan a theihtheihna ding un:
kei Toupa ka hi,
a dang himhim a omkei.
Vak ka bawl a, mial leng ka bawl hi;
kituahna ka bawl a,
gilou leng ka bawl hi;
kei zaw
thilte hih zelpa ka hi, chi in.
Vante aw, tunglam apan takkhe
sak un, van dumte’n diktatna
sung suk uhen:
hotdamna a dotkhiak theihna ding un lei kihong henla,
diktatna toh poukhawm hen; kei,
Amah Bawlpa kinakpih mi tung a gik hi!
Bellei in a velmi kiang ah,
Bangdia hon bawlna hia?
A chi dia hia?
Ahihkeileh, nna nasep in,
A khut in siam a neikei?
A chi dia hia?
A pa kiang a, Bang suang na hia?
chi mi tung hiam,
a nu kiang a,
bang ahia na suan ding?
chi mi tung hiam a gik hi!
amau Bawlpa’n hichi in a chi:
Thil hong tung ding thu
hon dong unla; ka tapate
leh ka khut nasepte ah
thu honpia un.
Lei ka bawl a, a tung a mihing
omte leng ka bawl a:
keimah in ka khut ngei in,
van ka kai palh a,
a sepaihte thu ka pia hi.
Kura diktatna nei in ka dingsak a, a lampite teng ka tangsak ding:
aman ka khopi a bawl nawn
ding a, a tatna man uh deih
ziak in hilou in, kipahman
deih ziak leng hilou in,
ka salte a pawtsak ding,
sepaihte
Aigupta semgimte leh Ethiopia sumsinmi leh
Saviate mi sang pipite na kiang uah a hongpai
ding ua, nou adin a om ding ua; nou a honzui ding ua;
khainiang bun in ahi a hongpai ding uh:
huchi in khupboh in,
Pathian noumau ah a om hi; a dang himhim a omkei,
pathian dang himhim a omkei,
chi in, a hong thum ding uhi.
Israelte Pathian aw, Hondampa,
Pathian kisel nakpa na hi ngut hi.
Zahlaktak in a om ding ua, ahi,
avek un zumtak in a om ding uh:
milim bawlmite zumna ah a lut ding uh.
Israelte bel tangtawn hotdamna a
tangtawn in na zahlak kei ding ua, na zumsak kei ding uhi.
aman lei a kipsak a,
bangmahlou din a bawl kei a,
mihing omna ding in a bawl a,
hichi in a chi ngal a:
Kei
a dang a omkei.
A guk in, mun mial ah, thu ka gen ngeikei a;
Jakob suante kiang ah bangmahlou ding in honzong un,
ka chi ngeikei:
kei
thudik mahmahte ka gen zel hi.
Kikhawm unla hongpai un;
namchih lak a gawtna pelte aw,
hongpai nai chiat un:
a sing milim bawltawm tawi a,
mi hondam theiloupi pathian kiang a thum zelte’n
theihna himhim a neikei uh.
Gen unla, hon pawtkhe sak un; ahi,
kidong uhenla: tuma siah a kipan kuan ahia theisak?
Nidanglai a kipan kuan ahia gen?
Kei
Keimah loungal Pathian dang
a omkei; Pathian diktat leh
hondampa ka hi;
keimah loungal a dang a omkei.
Kawlmong a mi tengteng aw,
kei lam hong nga unla,
hotdam in om un:
kei lah Pathian ka hi ngal a,
a dang himhim a omkei.
Khuk chih ka ma ah a khukdin
ding a, lei chih in leng ka kiang ah kichiam in thu a chiam ding chi in kei leh kei kilou in ka kichiamta,
thu lah diktatna in ka kam a kipan in a pawtta a,
a hongkik nawnta kei ding.
Min,
ka tanchin a gen ding uh:
amah kiang ah mi a hongpai
ding ua, a tung a lungkimlou
tengteng zahlaktak in
a omta ding uh, chi in.
Israel suan tengteng
siamtansak a a om ua,
Bel a kun a, Nebo a kihihniam
a; a milimte gamsa leh gan tung ah a na omta ua:
na thil vakpihte uh vanpuak a bawl ua,
gamsa bah a ding in vanpuak gik dia bawl ahi lel hi,
A na kihihniam un, a na kun
chiat ua, vanpuak gik lah a humbit thei ngal kei ua, amau mah sal a pi in a om zawta uhi.
Jakob inkuanpihte leh,
Israel inkuanpihte lak a omsun tengteng aw, gil a kipan k’on puak a, sul apan a ka kithuahpihte
aw, ka thu ngaikhia un:
Tekkun a na omtanpha un leng
amah ka hi ding a, na lu ua kelsam a pou vek hun chiang in leng k’on pom ding hi:
ken ka bawl a, keimahmah in ka paw ding; ahi, ken ka
pom ding a, ka humbit ding.
Kibang a seh ka hihna ding un
kua toh n’on teh a,
kua kimpih in n’on bawl a,
kua toh n’on teh ding?
Zaip a kipan dangkaeng bungkhe zel dangka bukna a buk zelte’n,
dangkaeng sekmi a chial ua,
aman pathian in a bawl a,
huchi in, a khupboh ua,
ahi, a be zel uhi.
A liangzang uah a pua ua,
a paipih ua, a omna a kipan a
suan nawn kei ding: ahi,
min amah a sam ding ua,
himahleh a dawng theikei ding,
a mangbatna ua kipan
a honkhe theikei ding hi.
Talekmite aw, huai theigige
unla, kipasal sak unla,
theikhe nawn un,
Nidang a thil masate theigige un:
kei Pathian ka hi a,
a dang a omkei uh;
kei Pathian ka hi,
kei bang a omkei uh;
Ken a tawpna ding uh a tung a
kipan in ka gen a;
pha ka sak a ding suak ding a,
ka deihlam tengteng
ka hihvek ding, ka chi hi:
Suahlam a kipan vasa duhgawl,
gamlapi a an in ka miseh ka sam ding a; ahi, ka genta,
ka tangtung sak ding;
ka na tumta, ka hih ding.
Lungsim kiuangsak, diktatna
toh kigamlate aw,
ka thu ngaikhia un:
Ka diktatna ka hontawi nai a,
gamla ah a omkei ding,
ka hotdamna in leng sawt a hal kei ding;
huchi in ka thupina
Israelte ading in hotdamna
Zion ah ka koih ding.
Babulon tanu nungak aw,
hongsuk inla,
leivui ah tu in;
Kaldai tanu aw,
mangtutphah lou ah lei ah tu in:
awm nou leh nuamsa
honchi nawn lou ding uhi.
Buhgawizanna suangte la inla,
tangbuang bawl in:
na kikhuhna puan koih inla,
na tentual lem inla,
na khe hong inla,
luite ngap galkah in.
Na vuaktanna khuhlouh in
a om ding a, ahi,
na zahmoh a dawk ding:
phu ka la ding a,
mi kuamah ka kithuahpih kei ding.
A hontanpa, a min sepaihte
Toupa ahi,
Israelte Mi Siangthou.
Kaldai tanu aw, daidide in
tu inla, mial nuai ah lut in,
Gamchih lalnu hon chita kei
ding uh
Ka mite tung ah ka heh a,
ka goutan ka hih thanghuai a,
na khut ah k’on pia hi:
nang a tung uah
hehpihna na langsak kei a;
teklamte tung ah nangawn ah
na hakkol giktak na nga ahi.
Kei tangtawn in lalnu ding in
ka om ding, na chi a:
huchi in huai thilte na lungsim in na ngaihtuah kei a, a tawpna ding na theigige sam kei hi.
Huchi in nang nuamtat a om,
awlmoh neilou a om,
lungsim a, Keimah ka hi,
keimah lou midang a omkei uh,
meithai in ka tu kei ding a,
tate tan thu ka thei sam kei ding,
chinu, hiai thei in:
Hiai thil nih, tate tanna leh
meithaina in, ni khat thu in
mitphiatkal lou in
a honpha ding a: na bumna
zatna tamngial in, na kivenna
tamkuam mahleh,
huaite nakpitak in na tung ah
a hongtung ding hi.
Na gitlouhna muang a;
Kuamah in hon muse kei uh,
na chi vial ngal a; na pilna leh na theihna in hon hihsia hi:
Keimah ka hi, kei lou midang
a omkei, na lungsim in
na chibehlap hi.
Huaiziak in thil hoihlou na
tung ah a hongtung dia;
na veng siamkei ding:
vangtahna in a hon buak ding a;
huai na hihmang theikei ding:
siatna leng thakhat in na tung ah hongtung guih ding a;
huai na theikhol kei ding.
Na kikauna leh bumna na zatna,
naupang nou na hih a kipan a na kisukgimnate, dinpih inla; na phattuampih theih ding phot a,
na zohpih theih ding phot leh.
Na lemtheihna a tam
mahmah ziak in na gimta hi:
tuin van thutheite, aksi enmite,
kha teng a thugenkholmite
ding uhenla, na tung a thil hongtung dingte lak a kipan in hon hong uhen.
Ngai in, buhpawl banglel ahi ding ua; mei in a kang ding;
meikuang thilhihtheihna lak a kipan a kihumbit kei ding uh:
hihlumna ding meihol
bang ahi kei ding a, awi ding
mei bang ahi sam kei ding.
Huchibang in na kihihgim nakna thilte nang ading in a om ding uhi:
na naupan nou a kipan a na lak a sumsinmite amau lampi chiat ah a vak mang ding ua;
hon humbit ding kuamah
himhim a omkei ding uh.
Aw Jakob inkuan, Aw Israel
min kikoppih, Judah tuite
apan a pawt, thutak hilou,
diktatna ah hi sam lou,
Israelte Pathian min lou
zelte aw, hiai ngaikhia un.
Khopi siangthou a mi a kichi
ngal ua, Israel Pathian
tung ah ginna a nga ua;
A min sepaihte
A tung a kipan in thil masate ka gen a; ahi,
ka kam a kipan in a pawt a, ka theisak a;
thakhat in ka tangtung
sak guih a, a hongtung hi.
Mi genhak na hi uh, na ngawng
uh sik tha ahi, na tal uh
dal ahi chih ka theih ziak in,
Nidanglai a kipan na kiang uah
ka genta; a hongtun ma in
na kiang uah k’on theisakta hi:
huchilou in zaw,
Ka milim in a hih ahi,
ka milim bawltawm leh ka milim sun in thu a piak ahi,
na chi kha ding uh.
Na zata uh; hiaite tengteng
en un; noumau na
genta kei ding ua hia?
Tua kipan in thil thak k’on
theisak ding a, thil kisel
na theih ngeilouhte uh.
Huaite nidanglai a siam hilou
in, tu a siam ahi; tuni ma in
na bil un na za ngeikei uh;
huchilou in zaw,
Ngai in, huaite i theihsa ahi,
na chi kha ding uh.
Ahi, na bil un na za ngeikei ua;
ahi, na lungsim un na thei
ngeikei uh, ahi, nidanglai a
kipan in na bil uh hon in
a om ngeikei him hi:
lepchiahtak in na hihzel uh chih leh,
sul a kipan in talekmi a honchi him uh chih lah ka thei ngal a.
K’on hihman louhna ding in
ka min ziak in ka hehna ka hawi lai ding a,
phat ka lohna ding in na tung uah ka kidek ding.
Ngai un, k’on hihsiang ahi,
himahleh dangka hihsiang bang in ahi kei;
haksatna haltuina mei ah k’on chian hi.
Kei leh kei ziak in, ahi,
kei leh kei ziak lel in ahi ka hih ding; bang ding in ka min suksiat in a om dia?
Ka thupina midang kiang ah ka pe kei ding.
Jakobte leh ka sap Israel aw,
ka thu ngaikhia un:
kei amah ka hi; a masapen ka hi,
a nanungpen leng ka hi.
Ahi, ka khut in lei kingakna
a phum a, ka khut taklam in a vante a kaipalh a:
ka sap tak in a ding khawm zel uh.
Noute aw, kikhawm unla,
ngaikhia un; a lak uah
kuan hiai thil a gen dia?
aman Babulon tung ah
a deihlam a hih ding a,
a ban Kaldaite tung ah
lik in a om ding.
Kei, keimah ngei in, thu ka
genta; ahi, amah ka sam a,
ka pi a, a lampi zangsak ding.
Noute’n honnaih unla,
hiai ngaikhia un;
a tung a kipan in a sim in
thu ka gen ngeikei;
a om tung lai a kipan in huai ah ka om:
tuin
Mi Siangthou in hichi in a chi:
Kei,
na hoihna ding ua honchilpa,
na paina ding lampi ua honpipa ka hi.
Aw noute’n ka thupiakte
na ngaikheta hi le uchin,
na tung ua lemna lui bang mai a om ding a,
na diktatna uh tuipi kihawtte bang mai a om ding hi ven maw:
Na suante uh piaunel zah pha
ding ua,
na gil ua gahte leng piaunel mal neu chikchik zah a pha ding ua;
a min uh ka ma a kipan thaimang in a omkei ding,
hihman in leng a omsam kei ding, chi in.
Babulon a kipan pawt unla,
Kaldaite taimang san un;
hiai lasak husa in genzak in,
hilh unla, kawlmong pha in
gingsak un,
Gamdai a a pi lai in a dangtak
kei ua: suangpi apan in amau
ading in tuite a luangkhe sak a:
suangpi a phelkhap a,
huchi in tui a hong pawtkhia hi.
Tuikulh a te aw, ka thu
ngaikhia unla, gamlapi a
michih aw, ngaikhia un:
ka hi; ka nu gilsung apan in
ka min a genta hi:
Ka kam namsau hiam bang in
a bawl a, a khut ah a honsel a;
thal nawttet vilvel in honbawl a,
a thalbawm ah a honkhum a:
Ka kiang ah, Nang zaw
ka sikha na hi; Israel pahtawi a ka omna ding, na hi, a chi a.
Ken bel, a thawn in ka semgim a,
bangmahlou ding leh huihkhua lel ding in ka thapai:
himahleh pellou in ka tung a vaihawmna ding
hon ditna ding leng ka Pathian
kiang ah ahi a om, ka chi.
Huan, tuin
a sikha a om ding a sul a kipan a hon bawlpan a gen,
ka Pathian ka hatna ahi behlap hi.
Ahi, aman, Jakob namte tundingna ding leh Israelte lak a humbitte a omsak nawnna ding in,
ka sikha a na omzaw,
thil neuchik mahmah a hilai:
Jentelte vaksakpa ding in k’on sep ding, kawlmong pha a
hondampa dia na om theihna ding in, a chi a.
Mi Siangthou un, mite muhsitpa,
namte kih tuntun, vaihawmmite sikha kiang ah hichi in a chi:
Muanhuai
Mi Siangthou, nang hontelpa
ziak in Kumpipate’n a mu ding ua, a thou ding uh;
mi liante’n amah a be ding uh, chi in.
Hun kipahhuai ah k’on dawng a,
hotdamna ni ah k’on panpih hi;
k’on hawi ding a, mipite
thukhunna ding in k’on pe ding,
lei ding kipsak a, gouluah nutsiatsa luahsak ding in;
Suangkulh tangte kiang a,
Pawt un, mial a omte kiang a,
Hong kilang un,
na chih theihna ding in.
Lampite ah a ne zel ding ua,
tangsang mai pengpong te ah a tatna mun uh a om ding hi.
A gilkial un a dangtak kei ding
ua; kholum a bawlgim in ni in
leng a hai sam kei ding hi:
amaute itpa in a pi ding a,
tui naknei kiang ah a pi ding a,
Huchi in ka tang tengteng lampi din ka bawl ding a, ka lamliante leng sansak in a om ding uh.
En in, hiaite gamlapi a kipan in
a hongpai ding ua; en in hiaite mallam a kipante,
tumlam a kipante in a hongpai ding uh;
Sinim gam a kipan in a hongpai ding uhi.
Vante aw, nuamtak in lasa un;
lei aw, nuamsa in om in;
tangte aw, lasa khe guih un:
a mi haksa thuakte leng a hehpih ding hi.
Himahleh Zion in, Jehovah in
a hon paisan a,
a hon mangngilhta, a chi.
Numei in a tapa, a gilgah ngei,
hehpih louhna ding in a nau
nawinelai a mangngilh thei ahia!
Thei e, huaite’n zaw a mangngilh uh ahi thei, himahleh ken zaw
k’on mangngilh kei ding hi.
En in, ka khutpek ah k’on gelh a;
na kulhbangte ka ma ah a om gige hi.
Na tate a kin ua, hon hihmang
mite leh hon hihsemite’n a hon pawtsan ding uh.
Dak inla, en vialvial inla, en in:
hiai tengteng a kikhawm ua,
na kiang ah a hongpai uhi.
Ka hinna lou in, Nang pahtawina kisilh bang in hiaite na kisilh a,
mou a kigak bang in hiaite in na kigak ngei ding,
Na mun sia leh nutsiatsate leh
na gam hihmansa thu zaw tuin a omte ading in na neu lawta ngeingei ding a,
nang honvalhte gamlapi ah a omta ding uhi.
Na ta mansak nung a na ta neih
nawnte’n, Mun kei ading in a neu lua a:
ka omna ding in mun honpia in, chi in,
na bil ah a hon gen ding uh.
Huchi in nang na lungsim in;
Hiaite kuan hon suaksak ua eita?
Ka tate ka mangsak a, keimah kia sal a, vialvak ka hi a:
huchi in hiaite kuan a kem ua eita?
Ngai in, keimah kia a nutsiat in ka om ngal a, hiaite koi a na om uh ahia?
na chi ding, chi in.
a chi, Ngai in, namchih ading in khut ka zak in, mi chih ading in ka chiamtehna ka tak khe ding:
huchi in na tapate angpom in na kiang ah a honpi ding ua,
na tanute leng liangkawlou a suan a pi in a om ding uh.
Kumpipate na tate donpate ahi
ding ua, kumpinute na tate donnu ahi ding uh: amau a
mai ua leisi in a hon be ding ua, na khe a leivui
a liak ding uh; huchi in kei
hon ngakmite zahlak in a omkei ding uh.
Gallakte mi hattak a kipan suh a om in,
sal lauhuaite hotkhiak in a om ding uam?
Om nake,
Mi hattak salte suh in a om
ding ua,
mi lauhuai gallakte hotkhiak in a om ding:
nang hondoute dou ding
ka hi ngal a, na tate
leng ka hondam ding hi.
Nang hon simmohte amau sa
ka nesak ding; uain khum kham bang in amau sisan a kham ding uh:
huchi in mi tengteng in, kei
Tanpa, Jakob Mi Hat ka hi chih,
a thei ding uh, chi in.
Na nu uh makna lai, ka makna,
kaw om ahia? Ahihkeileh,
ka leibatnate a kuapen
kiang ah ahia k’on zuaktak?
Ngai un, na thulimlouhnate uh ziak a na nu uh mak a om ahi.
Bang ziak in ahia ka hongpai a
mi himhim a omlouh uh?
Bangziak in ahia ka sap a hon dawng ding omlouh uh?
Ka khut tan theilou ding a tomsak in a om himhim ahia?
Ahihkeileh, humbit ding in
thilhihtheihna ka nei ka hia?
Ngai un, ka salhna in tuipi ka kangsak a,
luipite gamkeu in ka bawl hi:
tui himhim a omlouh ziak in a ngasate a uih a, dangtak in a si uh.
Van mial in ka thuam a,
saiip puan a khuhna ding in ka bawl zel, chi in.
Mi gimtak thu a ka tawldamsak siamna ding in sinsakte lei
aman zingsang teng a phawng in,
sinsakte a theih bang ua thei ding in ka bil a phawng zel.
hon vangsak a, kei zaw ka hel kei,
ka lehngat sam kei hi.
Ka nungzang satmite ka doh a,
ka biang mul botmite ka doh hi;
zahlakna ah leh chilsiatna ah ka mai ka sel kei.
ding a; huaiziak in ka zum kei a:
huaiziak in meisahsuang
bang in ka nga zel a,
ka zahlak kei ding chih ka thei.
Siam hon tangsakpa a nai hi;
kuan ahia hondou ding?
Ding khawm ni ung:
hondou kua ahia?
Honnaih heh.
Ngai in,
hon panpih ding; kuan ahia siamlouh hontang sak ding?
Ngai in, huaite puansilh bang in a lui ding ua, kausi in a nese ding.
Na lak ua,
a sikha thumang, kua ahia?
Mial a vak a, vakna himhim
neilou in
henla, a Pathian ah kinga hen.
Mei toh a, mei ekte a ki umte aw,
ngai un: na mei kuang uah leh na mei ek halte u lak ah vak un.
Hiai ka khut a kipan a na muh ding uh ahi hi:
lungkham tak a na lupna ding uh.
Diktatna delh mite, Nou,
mite aw, ka thu ngaikhia un:
noute sekna suangpi lam leh noute tohkhiakna kawkhuk lam en un.
Na pu uh Abraham lam leh
noute hon suangnu Sarah lam en un: khat kia a hih lai in ka sam a, ka vualzawl a,
mi tampi ding in ka bawlta hi.
Na
ngal a: a mun sesate tengteng a lungmuan a, a gamdai
Eden bang in a bawl a,
a gamkeu leng
kipahthugenna leh lasak husate a om ding hi.
Ka mite aw, ka thu ngaikhia unla;
ka namte aw, ka thu bil na doh un:
kei apan in danthu a hongpawt ding a, michih vakna ding in ka vaihawmna ka kipsak ding.
Ka diktatna a nai a, ka hotdamna a pawtta,
ka bante’n michih vai a hawmsak ding, tuikulhgamte’n a hon ngak ding ua,
ka ban a muang ding uh.
Vanlam ah daktou unla,
nuailam ah lei en un:
van meikhu bang in a zammang ding a, lei puansilh bang in
a lui ding, asung a omte huchi bang in a si ding uh:
ka hotdamna bel tangtawn in a om ding, ka diktatna leng hihman in a omkei ding.
Diktatna theimi, ka danthu
lungtang a pai mite aw, ka thu ngaikhia un; mihing gensiatna lau kei unla,
a hon tainate uh ziak in lunghimawh kei un.
Sim in puansilh a negawp vek bang in,
amau a negawp vek ding,
nget in samul a ne bang in,
amau a ne ding: ka diktatna tangtawn in a om ding a,
ka hotdamna suan tengteng tan in a om ding.
Na
hatna kisilh in; nidanglai a,
tang a suante omlai a na halh bang in halh in.
Nang Rahab satzanpa,
dragon sunpa na hi ka hia?
Nang tuipi, tui thuk zapi tui
kangsakpa, tuipi taw tatte kanna lampi dia bawlsakpa na hi ka hia?
lasa kawm in Zion a tung ding ua; tangtawn a kipahna a lu tung uah a omta ding;
kipahna leh nopsakna a mu ding ua,
lungkhamna leh mauna a mangta ding.
Kei, kei mahmah,
nou lungmuanpa ka hi:
si ding mihing kihta ding,
loupa bang a bawl ding mihing tapa kihta ding nang kua na hi hiam;
Na
van kaipalh a lei kingaknate
phumpa, mangngilh a,
nuaisiahmi hihse ding a
a ngimlai hehna ziak lel a nitum a lau?
Nuaisiahmi hehna koi a om ahita a?
Sal pimang kintak a khah in
a om ding a, suangkul ah a si
kei dia, an nekding a tasam kei ding hi.
Kei na
tuipi kihot ging honhonte khen a tuipi tokletpa ka hi ngal a:
ka min sepaihte
Van ka kaihpalh a,
lei kingaknate ka phum theih a,
Zionte kiang a,
ka mite na hi uh,
ka chih theihna ding in
ka thute na kam ah ka koih a,
ka khut in ka honhum hi.
Jerusalem aw,
Na
halh inla, thou in;
nang hoihoina nou a nengte na dawn a,
na dawn siang sipsip hi.
A tapa suan tengteng lak a
pi ding kuamah a omkei ua;
a tapa vaklet teng lak ah a khut a len kuamah a omkei uh.
Hiai thil nihte’n a honphat ahi;
kuan a hon kahpih ding ua?
Gamna, leh siatna leh kial,
leh namsau: bangchi in
k’on lungmuan diam aw?
Na tapate a bah ua, sathak
len a awk bang in, kongzing lu lam ah a lum uhi;
Pathian salhna in a dim uhi.
Huaiziak in, nang hihgentheih
leh uain kham hilou a mi kham, hiai za in:
Na
a mite thu genpih pa’n,
hichi in a chi, Ngai in, hoihoina nou, ka hehna nou belhbu ngei,
na khut a kipan ka lakheta;
na dawn nawnta kei ding;
Huchi in nang hon hihgentheite
khut ah ka koih ding;
amau na hinna kiang ah,
K’on tot ding un khupboh un,
a chi uh: huchi in a tawnmite
kiang ah na nungzang lei leh kongzing bang in na doh, chi in.
Zion aw, halh in, halh in,
na hatna silh in;
Jerusalem aw, khopi siangthou,
na puansilh kilawmtakte silh in:
tuban zeksumlouh leh mi nin na sung ah a lutta kei ding uh.
Jerusalem aw, na tung a bang
leivui sing in; thou inla, tu in:
Zion tanu aw, sal a om,
na ngawng gaknate phel in.
Pathian in hichi in a chi hi, Ka mite a tung in Aigupta gam a om ding in a paisuk ua: Assuria mite’n a thu a la bei in a nuaisiah uhi.
Huchi in tuin, hiai ah bang ka hihdia? Ka mite bangmahlou a pimang in a om ua,
Huaiziak in ka mite’n ka min a thei ding uh: huai ni’n a genpa ka hi chih a thei ding ua; ngai in, keimah ka hi, chi in.
Tangte a tanchinhoih tun a,
lemna thu tangkoupih a,
thil hoih tanchinhoih tun a,
hotdamna thu tangkoupih a,
Zion kiang a, Na Pathian kumpi in a tu,
chi mi khe a kilawm!
Tua! na galvilmite aw!
Aw a suah ua, nuamsatak in
la a sa chiat uh;
Zion a a hong kiknawn chiang in kimatuah a mu ding ahi ngal ua.
Jerusalem mun sesate aw, nuamsa kheguih unla, nuamsatak in la sa un:
huchi in kawlmong a mi tengteng in i Pathian hotdamna a mu ding uh.
Pawt un, pawt un,
huai a kipan in pawt un,
thil nin himhim lawng kei un;
asung a kipan paikhia un;
siangthou tak in om un.
Kintak in na paikhe kei ding ua,
taikek in na pai sam kei ding uh:
ahi ngal a; Israelte Pathian
na nungdal uh ahi ding hi.
Ngai in, ka sikha in piltak in
a hih ding, pahtawi leh
tawisang in a om ding a,
sangpi in a om ding.
Mi tampi’n lamdang honsak
bang un, a mel mihing mel sang in a siatsak ahi a,
a piandan lah mihing tate piandan sang mah a hihsiat in a om.
Huchi in aman nam tampi
tung ah sisan a theh ding;
Kumpipate’n amah lak ah a kam uh a chih ding uh:
a kiang ua gen ngeilouh a mu ding ua;
bil a a zak ngeilouh uh a ngaisiam ding uhi.
I thugen uh kuan a um a?
A ma ah thilpou noutak bang in amah lah a dawnkhia,
lei keu apan zung bang in a khangkhia hi:
piandan hoihna leh mel kilawmna a neikei a;
amah i muh un amah i deihna
ding un kilawmna a omkei hi.
Amah mihingte muhsit leh
deihlouh in a om a;
dahnate neimi leh natna theimi ahi a; amah lak a i mai uh sel bang i hi ua,
muhsit in a om a,
en lah amah i ngaisang tuankei uhi.
Aman i natnate pua in, i dahnate a pua a:
himahleh en bel dahna khu,
Pathian vuak,
hihgentheih in i bawl uhi.
Himahleh i tatleknate ziak in
amah liam in a om a,
i thulimlouhnate ziak in vuak
sidup in a om a:
i lungmuanna ding in sawina a tung ah a kia a;
a vuakna golhte a hihdam in i omta hi.
I vek un belam bang in i
vakmang ua; eimah lampi
tuam chiat uah i pialta uh;
Amah nuaisiah in a om a,
himahleh a kingainiam a,
a kam a ka kei;
belamnou goh ding a pi uh bang leh,
belam a mulmetmite ma a a daidide bang mai in; ahi,
a kam a ka kei hi.
Nuaisiahna leh vaihawmna a
lakmang in a om a; a dam tonpihte’n houh kua in ahia mihing gam a kipan hihman a a om ngaihtuah mahmah?
Ka mite tatlekna ziak a dahna khu a hih.
Huan, hiamgam a hih ngeikei a,
a kam ah zekhemna om ngeikei mahleh,
a han migiloute kiang ah a sehsak ua,
a sih nung in mihausa kiang ah a om hi.
a hinna khelhna adia thillat dia na zat peuhpeuh chiang in,
a chisuan a muta ding a,
a damsung nite a sausak ding,
lohching in a om ding hi.
A kha nauvei gim gah a mu
ding a, A lungkimta ding:
ka sikha diktattak in a theihna’n mi tampi’n siamtang ding a,
a thulimlouhnate uh a puaksak ding.
Huaiziak in miliante tantuan
amah ka hawm ding a,
gallak sumte aman mi hatte a hawm sam ding hi;
a hinna pen si khop hial a
A sun buak a, talekte lak a simtel a a om ziak in:
himahleh mi tampi khelhna a pua a,
talekte a thumsak hi.
Aw ching, nang tanei ngeilou,
nuamsatak in la sa in; nang,
nauvei ngeilou, la sakhe guih in,
kikou khia in: pasal neimi tate sang in lunglengnu tate lah a tam zaw ngal ua,
Na puanin mun kek in, na omnate puanin tung kaipalh in; chil ken:
na khaute sausak inla,
na kaihgakna khette kipsak in.
Taklam leh veilam ah na dalhza
ding a; huchi in na chisuante’n namchih gou a luah ding ua,
khopi loih sa nungte ah mi a omsak nawn ding uh.
Lau ken, na zahlak kei ding hi;
zum sam ken,
na zahlak kei ding:
na tuailai zahlakna na mangngilh in,
na meithaina minsiatna na theigigeta kei ding hi.
Nang hon bawlpa na pasal ahi a;
a min sepaihte
Mi Siangthou nang hontanpa
ahi; amah khovel tengteng
Pathian a chi ding uh.
Zi mak lungsim a lungkham tak,
tuailai zi khensa,
paihsa nung sapnawn bang in
Mitphiatkal lel ka honma a;
himahleh hehpihna thupitak
in k’on pi nawn ding.
Ka heh dimlet in mitphiatkal
na lak ah ka mai ka sel a;
himahleh tangtawn chitna in
k’on hehpih ding,
Huai lah kei ading in
Noah damlai nite bang ahi a:
Noah tuite’n leitung a tummang nawn kei ding, chi a, ka kichiam bang in,
Na tung ah ka heh nawn kei ding a, k’on sal n’on kei ding chi in,
ka kichiamta ahi.
Tangliante a paimang ding ua,
tang neute leng suan in a om ding uh;
ka chitna ahihleh nang a kipan in a pai mang kei ding a,
ka lemna thukhun leng suan in a omsam kei ding,
Aw nang hihgentheih, tuikihawt sepsep,
lungmuanna neilou,
ngai in na suangte zehoih in
ka lem ding, na suangphumte
sapphir suang in ka lem ding hi.
Na tungzumte rubi suang in,
na kongkhakte karbankul suang in,
na kulh tengteng suang
hoihte in ka bawl ding.
Na ta tengteng
na tate lungmuanna thupitak ahi ding.
Diktatna a kipsak in na om ding
a, nuaisiahna apan gamlapi ah na om ding, na lau kei ding hi;
thil mulkimhuai apan gamlapi
ah na om ding a,
a honnaih kei ding hi.
Ngai in, a hong kikhawm uh
ahi thei, himahleh
ka thu ahi kei ding: nang sual
ding a kikhawm peuhmahte
nang ziak in a puk ding uh.
Ngai in, ken siksekmi pumzap
a nasepna ding vanzat sek zelmi ka siam a;
kei mahmah hihse ding in hihsemi ka siam ding hi.
Nang sualna ding a vanzat sek
himhim a phatuam kei ding;
lei chih thubuai a nang honlang siamlouh na tangsak ding a,
Huai
a diktatna uh ka kiang a kipan ahi.
Ngai un, dangtak peuhmahte aw,
tuite ah hongpai un, dangka neiloute;
hongpai unla, lei unla ne un!
Ahi, hongpai unla, uain leh nawitui dangka pe lou in,
a man leng pe lou in lei un.
An hiloupi a bang ding a dangka pai?
Niang leh taina hilou a bang ding a na tha uh pai?
Ka thu hoihtak in ngaikhia
unla, thil hoih ne un, na hinna uh thil thau in nuamsa hen.
Na bildoh unla, ka kiang ah
hongpai un; za unla, huchi in na hinna uh a hing ding:
na kiang uah tangtawn thu ka khung ding,
David kiang a huai hehpihna chiamte.
Ngai in, mi chih ading in amah
palai in ka sep a, michih ading in pipa leh heutu in ka sep ahi.
Ngai in, na theih ngeilouh na
sam ding a, nang hon thei
ngeilou nam na kiang ah
hongtai ding uh,
Israelte Mi Siangthou ziak in;
aman a hon pahtawi ngal a.
Muh theih a a omlai in
a nai lai in sam un:
Migilou in a omdan tawpsan
henla, mi diktatlou in a
ngaihtuahnate tawpsan sam hen:
huchi in aman a na hehpih ding;
I Pathian kiang uah kiknawn hen,
aman a ngaidam mahmah ding hi.
Ka ngaihtuahte na ngaihtuahte
ahi kei a, na omdante leng
ka omdan ahi sam kei,
Van lei sang a a sangzaw bang in,
ka omdante na omdan sang in a sangzaw hi, ka ngaihtuahte leng na ngaihtuahte uh sang in a sang lai hi.
Vuah leh vuk van a kipan a zu a,
huailam ah a kiktou ngeikei,
lei a vak zaw hi, thil a pousak in a dawn sak a, buh chi thehmi kiang ah buh chi a pia a,
nemi kiang ah nekding a pe zel.
Huchi mah bang in ka kam a
kipan ka thupawt a om ding:
bangmah hih neilou in ka kiang ah a kiknawn kei ding a,
ka deih bang a hihzou zaw ding a,
thilhih ding a ka sawlna ah leng a lohching ding.
Nuamsa tak a pawt in,
lungmuangtak a pikhiak a om ding na hi ngal ua:
tangliante leh tang neute’n na ma uah la a sa khe guih ding uh,
gamlak sing tengteng in leng
a khut uh a beng ding uh.
Loulingnei tang in meilah a
pou zaw ding a,
khaulingnei tang in muising a pou zaw ding: huai
Huchibang hihmi leh, huaitak pomgeih mihing tapa in nuam a sa hi; khawlni tanglou lou a, tangzel leh, hoihlou hihlou ding a khut venghoih zel mi.
Huan gamdang mi,
Ka khawlnite tang a, ka kipahpihlam thilte tel a, ka thukhun pomkip michilgehte tungtang thu ah
A kiang uah ka inn sung leh ka kulh sungte a tanu leh tapa neite sang mah in theihgigena hoihzaw leh min hoih zaw ka pe ding; a kiang uah tangtawn min, hihman nawn louh ding, ka pe ding, chi in.
Gamdang mite leng, khawlni tanglou lou a, tang zel leh, ka thukhun pomkip peuhmah,

Amaute mah ka tang siangthou ah ka pi ding a, ka thumna inn ah nuam ka sasak ding; haltum a a thillatte uleh a kithoihnate uh ka maitam a kipahpih in a om ding: ka inn mi chih ading a thumna inn chi ding uh ahi ngal a, chi in.
Gamsa tengteng aw, ahi, gam nuai a sa om tengteng aw, ne ding in hongpai un.
A galvilmite a mit uh a taw a, theihna neilou ngen ahi ua; ui aw neilou ngen ahi ua, a na theikei uh; mang nei a, lum gige a, lup hai mi ahi uh.
Ahi, amaute uite huaihamtak ahi ua; hunsak chih a nei ngeikei uh; theihsiamna neilou belampu ahi ua, amau lampi pi, amau punna lam chiat, a nga ua, avek pi un.
Hongpai un, uain ka la ding a huchi in zu in i kithundim ding; zingchiang tuni bang ahi nawn ding a, ni thupi mahmah ahi ding, a chi chiat uhi.

Mi diktat a mang zel ua, kuamah in a lungsim un a ngaihtuah kei uh, Pathian limsakmite lakmang in a om ua, mi diktat thil hoihlou hongtung ding a kipan lakmang ahi uh chih kuamah in a ngaihtuah kei uhi.
Lungmuanna ah a lut ua; a lupnate uahte a lum tawldam zel uh, diktak a pai peuhmahte.
Himahleh nou bumsiamnu tapa, angkawm leh kizuak suante aw, hiai ah honnaih un.
Nuihzabawlna dia na zat zel uh kua eita? Kua na maiphen khum ua, na leikhat khum ua? Tatlekna ta, zuautheihna suante na hi kei u maw?
Nou tosaw lak a, singbuk nuai teng a milimte toh kithoh a suangpi kawllak nuai a guam sung a naupang that zelte.
Lui guam suang mam lak ah na tantuan a om a; huaite, huaite ngeingei na tantuan ahi: huaite ading in dawn thillat na sung a, thil piak na lan hi. Huai thil ah hih lungkim in ka om ding hia?
Tang sang zou mahmah tung ah na lupna na koih a: huailai mah ah kithoihna lan ding in na hohtou zel.

Huan, kongkhakte leh kongbiang liahte ah na theihgigena na tung a: kei din hilou in midang din na kisuah a, na hohtou ngal a; na lupna na kek a, a kiang uah thu na khung a; a lupna uh lah na muhna ah na it hi.
Huan, sathau toh kumpipa kiang ah na hoh a, na gimlimte lah na bawl thupi diakdiak a, na palaite gamlapi ah na sawl a, sheol pha hial in na niamsak hi.
Na paina lampi sau ziak in na gim a; himahleh, Lametna himhim a omkei, na chi ngal kei a: na hatna halhsakna na mu a: huaiziak in na bahta kei hi.
Kua na kihta in na lau, zuau na gen nak a, kei n’on theihtak louh a, na lungsim a na ngaihtuah taklouh mai? Sawtpi ka daidide kei maw? Kihtak leng n’on kihtak louh,
Na diktatna leh na thilhihte ka gen ding; bangmah lah na lohtak kei dia.
Na kikou chiang in na lak khawmte’n hon humbit uheh; himahleh huih in amau a la ding a, hu in a mut vek ding: kei honmuang in bel gam a nei ding a, ka tang siangthou a luah ding.
Aman, “Sung vum un, sungvum un, lampi bawl un, ka mite lampi bawl un, ka mite lampi a kipan pukna ding pai un,”

Mi tungnung, tawisang, tangtawn a om, a min Siangthou in hichi in a chi ngal a: “Kei mun tungnung leh siangthou ah ka om a, mi thunuailutte lungsim hihhalh ding leh kisik tuntunte lungtang hihhalh ding in mi lungsim a kisik tuntun a thunuailut tak kiang ah leng ka om hi.
Tangtawn a doulou ding ka hi, ka heh gige sam kei ding hi: huchikeileh mi lungsim ka ma ah a bah ding a, hinna ka bawlte leng a bah ding uh.
A huaiham a a thulimlouhna ziak in ka heh a, ka sat a, ka mai ka hum a, ka heh ahi: amah lah a lungtang omdan ngeingei in paupengtak in a om hi.
A omdante ka mu a, amah ka damsak ding: ka pi ding a, amah leh a sunpihmite kiang ah lungmuanna ka pe nawn ding.
Ken muk gah ka bawl; Lemna, lemna, gamlapi a om kiang ah leh naichik a om kiang ah om hen,
Mi thulimloute bel tuipi kihot gige bang ahi uh; a om kinken thei ngeikei a, a tuite’n lah nin leh buannawi a vikkhe zel uh,” chi in.
Ka Pathian in, “Mi thulimloute ading in muanna himhim a omkei,” a chi hi.
Ngaihtak in kikou in, kidam ken, pengkul bang in na aw suaksak loloih inla, ka mite kiang ah a tatlekna uh hilh inla, Jakob inkuanpihte kiang ah a khelhnate uh hilh in.

Zon zaw niteng in a honzong zel ua, ka lampi thute theih a kilawp ua: diktat tak a hih leh a Pathian uh vaihawmna tawpsan ngeilou nam bang in ka kiang ah vaihawmna diktat a hon ngen ua, Pathian naih leng a kilawp uhi.

Bangziak in ahia an ka ngawl ua, na muhlouh? Bangziak in ahia ka kihihgentheih ua, na theihlouh? a chi nak uhi. Ngai un, na anngawl ni un noumau nuamsakna na bawl ua, na nasemmite tengteng na nuaisiah uh.
Ngai un, kihoutheihlouh leh kiselna ding leh, thulimlouhna khuttum a kitum ding in ahi, an na ngawl nak uh: na aw uh tunglam a zak ding in hiai ni’n an na ngawl ngeikei uhi.
Huchibang anngawlna ka deihlam ahi hia? Mi a kihihgentheihna ni ding uh ahi maw? Sialluang bang a a lu kun ding leh, a nuai a saiip puan phah a vut buah ding hia? Huaite anngawlna
Hiai anngawlna ka deih lam ahi kei maw? Thulimlouhna a gakna phelsak leh, hakkol khaute sutsak leh, nuaisiahte pawtsak leh, hakkol chiteng hihtan sak.
Na an mi gilkialte kiang a hawm leh, genthei delhkhiakte na inn a pi ahi kei maw? Mi vuaktang muh a puan piak leh, nangmah tanaute a kipan a kisel louh ahi kei maw?
Huai hun chiang in na vak zing nisuak bang in a hongsuak ding a, na damna ding a hong poukhe zok ding: na diktatna in na ma a kai ding a;
Huai hun chiang in na sam ding a, huchi in
Gilkialte kiang a na deihlam pia a, hihgentheih mi na taisak leh, na vak mial lak ah a vakkhe ding a, na mial bikbek sun bang ahita ding:
Huan,

Huchi in nang a kipan a hongpawt dingte’n mun lui sesate a lem nawn ding ua: suan tampi suangphum ding in na lem tou nawn ding; huchi in nang bel, a selai bawl hoihpa, Mi omna ding a lampite bawl hoihpa, a honchi ding uh.
Khawlni tanglou lou ding a, ka ni siangthou a na deihlam hihlou ding a na khepek na ngat kiksak a, khawlni ni kipahhuai leh
tung ah na kipak ding a, lei munsangte ah k’on tuangsak ding; na pu Jakob gouluah thil in ka honvak ding:
Ngai un,
Na thulimlouhnate uh noumau leh na Pathian kal ua kia in a honkhen ahi, bil a a zak nop louhna ding in na khelhnate un a mai a hon liahsak ahi.
Na khutte ulah sisan a hihnit in a om a, na khutzungte ulah thulimlouhna a hihnit in a om hi; na mukte un zuau a gen a, na lei uh ginatlouhna thu gen in a phun nuanua hi.
Kuamah in diktak in thukhawk a gen kei ua, kuamah in thutak in thu a genpih ngeikei uh: huihkhua lelte a muang ua, zuau a gen nak uhi; thilhihkhelhna a pai ua, thulimlouhna a suang zel uhi.
Thangtom tuite a opkhum ua, maimom gil puan a gan uh: a tui nemite a si uhi, hihtap a om ah gul a hongpawt hi.
A maimon gil puante uh puansilh ding in a hong omkei ding a, a thilhihte uh leng a silh sam kei ding uh: a thilhihte ulah thulimlouhna thilhihte ahi a, hiamgamtak a hihna a khut uah a om hi.
A khete uh thil hoihlou lam ah a tai a, gensiat bei sisan suah ding in a kintat nilouh louh uh: a ngaihtuahte ulah thulimlouhna ngaihtuahnate ahi a; gamna leh siatna a lampi uahte a om zel hi.
Lungmuanna lampi a theikei ua; a paina uah dikna himhim a om ngeikei: amau ading in lam kawi bang a bawl ua; huailai a pai peuhmah in lungmuanna a thei ngeikei uh.

Huaiziak in vaihawmna ei a kipan a gamlapi ah a om naknak a, diktatna in a hon phazou ngeikei: vak i ngak ua, himahleh, ngai in, mial a honghi a; vakna i ngak ua, himahleh mial bikbek mah ah i pai uhi.
Mittaw bang in bang i mai puampuam ua, ahi, mit neiloute bang in i mai puampuam uhi: khomialtung bang in sun in i kisui ua; mi hatte lak ah misi bang phet i hi uhi.
Vompite bang in i vek un i ham dupdup ua, vakhute bang in nakpitak in i thum ngutngut uh: vaihawmna i ngak ua, himahleh, a om hetkei hi; hotdamna i ngak ua, himahleh gamlapi ah a hon omsan hi.
I tatleknate I ma uah a khangta a, i khelhnate’n a hon hek gige hi: i tatleknate lah i kiang uah a om gige ngal a, i thulimlouhnate i thei hi:
I takleknate,
Huchi in vaihawmna in nunglam a hong ngatsan a, diktatna in gamlapi ah a hondin santa: thutak lah kongzing ah a puk a, dikna a lut theikei hi.
Ahi, thutak a omta kei a; thil hoihlou tawpsanmi gallak in a kibawl zel: Huchi in
Huan, mi himhim a omkei chih a thei a, ngetsakmi mawngmawng a omlouh uh lamdang a chi a: huaiziak in amah ban mahmah in hotdamna a kibawla; amah diktatna mah in a kilenkip hi.
Diktatna lum in a nei a, hotdamna lukhu a khu a; puansilh in phulakna puansilhte a silh a, puanaktual ding in phatuamngaihna a silh hi.
A thilhihte uh bang in, a thilhihte uh bang in a man a thuk ding, amah doumite hehna in, a melmate thukna in a thuk ding; tuikulhgamte thukna in a thuk ding.
Huchi in Toupa min tumlam a kipan in a lau ding ua, a thupina leng ni suahna a kipan in a lau ding uh; amah lah tui khangguih, Toupa hu a mut luang zoizoi bang in a hongpai ding hi.
Zion ah Tanpa in a hongpai ding a, Jakobte lak a tatlekna tawpsanmite lak ah leng a hongpai ding,
Ken zaw, hiai ahi a kiang ua ka thukhun,
Thou inla, vak in; na vak a
hongtung a,
na tung ah a hong suakta hi.
Ngai in, mial in leitung a khuh
ding a, mial bikbek in mite a khuh ding ahi;
himahleh na tung ah
Huchi in namchih na vak lam ah a hongpai ding ua, kumpipate leng n’ong suah vakna lam ah a hongpai ding uh.
Dak inla, na mit in en vialvial
in, en in, avek un a kikhawm ua,
na kiang ah a hongpai uhi:
na tapate gamlapi a kipan in a hongpai ding ua, na tanute a hong don ding uhi.
Huai hun chiang in na mu
ding a, na vakta ding a,
na lungtang kipak in a ling ding,
zat sak in a om ding;
tuipi a hauhsakna in na kianglam a honnaih ding a,
namte thahatna na kiang a hongtun ding ziak in.
Sangawngsau tampi’n hontuam
ding ua, Midian leh Ephah gam a sangawngsau tuaite’n;
huaite tengteng Sheba gam a
kipan in a hongpai ding uh:
dangkaeng leh begaw
a honpaw ding ua,
phatna thu a theisak ding uhi.
Kedarte ganhon tengteng na kiang ah a omkhawm in a om ding ua,
Nebajoth a belamtalte’n na nna a sem ding uh: ka maitam ah kipak in a paitou ding ua,
ka thupina in ka pahtawi ding.
Mei bang a leng leh, vakhu
amau tohlet zuan a leng
duamduam bang kuate ahi ua?
Aman a hon pahtawi ziak in
Tarsish long liante’n masakpen a tuh ding.
Huan, gamdang mite’n kulh
bangte a lemtou nawn ding ua,
a kumpipate un na nna a sem ding uh: ka heh in k’on sat a,
himahleh ka hon deihsakna in
k’on hehpih leuleu hi.
Na kongkhakte leng hon in a
om gige ding ua; sun le zan in
a khak kei ding uh;
mite’n namchih sum na kiang a a hontawi ua, a kumpipate uh a honpi theih sam na ding un.
Na nna sem nuamlou nam leh
gam a mangthang ding uhi; ahi,
huai namte zaw suksiat in a om ding uh.
Ka Mun Siangthou zem ding in
Lebanon thupina na kiang ah a hongpai ding, meilahte, phante,
singgelh chi a hong paikhawm ding ua Ka khe sikna mun ka thupi bawl ding hi.
Nang honhih gentheite tapate
kun in na kiang ah a hongpai
ding ua; nangmah musitmite
na khepek nuai ah a kun ding
ua, nang bel
Mi Siangthou Zion, a honchi ding uh.
Kuamah veh ngeilouh khopi,
paisan leh huat a na om sang in tangtawn suanpen, suan tampi kipahna ding in k’on bawl ding.
Namchih nawitui na tep ding a,
kumpipate nawi leng na tep ding:
kei
Dal tang in dangkaeng k’on la ding a,
sik tang in dangka k’on la ding, sing tang in leng sumbelsik,
suang tang in sik:
lungmuanna na heutu ding in ka sep lai ding a,
diktatna nang hon phutmi ding in ka sep ding hi.
Hiamgam a thilhih husa na
gam ah zak ahita kei ding a,
hiamgamna leh siatna husa
leng na gamgi sung ah zak
ahita kei ding;
na kulh Hotdamna, na chi zaw ding a,
na kongkhakte leng,
Phatna, na chi ding hi.
Sun a nang hontan ding ni
a hi kei ding a; kha leng vakna ding in a hon vaksak sam kei ding:
Na ni a tumta kei ding a,
na kha leng a mangta kei ding hi:
ahita ding a,
na lusun nite a tawp ding hi.
Na mite avek un mi diktat ahi
ding ua, na gam a luah tawntung ding uh:
pahtawi a ka om theihna ding a amau a zung selkhia ka suan,
ka khut suak ahi ding uh.
Mi tawmpen sang khat ahi ding ua,
mi neupen leng nam hatte ahi ding uhi, kei
Liangvaite kiang a Tanchin hoih
gen ding a
ah a om; aman, lungtang khasiate tuam ding, salte kiang a pawtna
thu leh saltangte kiang a tanin honna thu gen ding.
Pathian phulak ni thugen ding bang, lungkhamte
lungmuan ding bang,
Vut tang a pakkhigui bang,
lungkham tang a nuamna thau bang, nguina kha tang a phatna puansilh bang a kiang ua piak ding,
Zion a lungkham a omte ading a seh ding bang in a honsawl ahi:
Amah pahtawi a a omna ding in,
diktatna sing
a hih theihna ding un.
Mun lui sesate a lem nawn ding
ua, tuma a khua sesate a ding hoih saknawn ding ua,
khopi sesa,
suan tampi gamnate,
a bawlhoih nawn ding uh.
Gamdangmite’n na ganhonte uh
ding in a vak ding ua,
theihngeilouh mite na leiletmi ding un leh na grepgui uh
kemmi ding in a om ding uh.
Nou bel,
chih a loh in na om ding uh:
mite’n i Pathian nasemmite a honchi ding uh;
namchih sum na ne ding ua,
a thupina uh na suang ding uh.
Na zahlakna gun uh a lehnih
na mu ding ua;
na zum gun un na tantuan uah nuamsa in la na sa ding uh;
huaiziak in na gam uah a zahnih na luah ding ua;
tangtawn nopsakna nou a ahi ding.
Kei
deih a, thulimlou tak a hiamgam zaw ka hua hi;
huchi in amau ka thukna chihtak ngial in a kiang uah ka pe ding a,
a kiang uah tangtawn thu
leng ka khung ding.
Huchi in a suante uh namchih
lak a theih ahi ding ua,
a tate uh michih lak a theih
ahi ding uh: amau mute’n
ka sa ding a, ka hinna Pathian ah kipaktak in a om ding;
mouneipa ding pakkhigui a
kizep bang leh, mou ding a
kivatnate a a kivan zel bang in,
ama’n hotdamna puansilhte a hon silhsak a,

Leitung in a thil dawn a pawtsak bang leh,
huan in asung a thil chinte a dawnsak bang in,
A diktatna uh vakna bang
a suah a, amah hotdamna
khawnvak kuang bang a a suah masiah, Zion ziak in ka dai nilouh kei ding a,
Jerusalem ziak in ka om kinken kei ding.
Huchi in na diktatna a mu
ding ua, kumpipa tengteng in na thupina a mu ding uh:
huan, min thak,
lallukhu leh i Pathian khut a thupina lukhu na hi ding.
Lamdang, a honchi nawn kei
ding uh; na gam leng,
Hihsiat a chi n’on sam kei ding uh;
Hephzibah, a hon chita ding ua,
na gam leng Biulah, a chi ding uhi:
na gam in pasal a nei ding hi.
Tangval in nungak zi a a neih
bang in na tapate’n zi in a hon nei ding uh:
mou neimi mou tung a a kipah bang in,
na Pathian na tung ah a kipak ding hi.
Jerusalem aw, na kulhtung ah galvilmi ka vilsak a;
sun leh zan in chiklaimah in a dai kei ding:
nou
omte aw, om kinken hetkei un.
Amah leng om kinken sak kei un,
Jerusalem a hihkip a, lei a
phathuai a a bawl masiah.
gamdang mite’n na sepkhiak
uain a dawn nawn kei ding uh.
A buh late’n a ne zaw ding ua,
Pawt unla, kulh kongpite ah
pawt un; mite din lampi bawl unla; sungvum un,
lamlian sungvum un; suangte tomsiang unla; mite ading in chiamtehna takkhia un.
Ngai un, kawlmong pha in
huchi in a theisak ahi,
Zion tanu kiang ah hichi in gen un, En in, nangmah
hotdamna a hongtung ding;
en in, a kipahman a kiang ah a om hi,
a ditna leng a ma ah a om hi.
Huchi in amau, Misiangthoute,
nang zaw Zonkhiak,
Paisan louh khopi a honchi ding uh,
chi in, a chi hi.
Edom gam a kipan hongpai, Bozrah khua a kipan puansilh diahsan silh kua ahia? A puansilh a thupitak, a hatna a thupidan bang a hongpai? Kei
Bangziak a na puansilh san a, na silhlehtente leng grep sukna khuk a chiltaimi silhlehten bang a om ahia?

Keimah kia in grep sukna khuk ah ka chiltai a; michih lak a mi khat lel leng ka kiang ah a omkei uh; ahi, amau ka heh a ka chil a, ka heh a ka pal a: huchi in a hinna sisan uh ka puansilhte ah theh in a om a, ka puan tengteng ka hihninta hi.
Phulak ni ka lungtang ah a om a, ka tatsa mite kum leng a hongtungta ahi.
Huchi in ka en a, panpih ding mi a omkei ua; len ding mi a omlouh uh lamdang ka sa a: huaiziak in keimah ban mahmah in hotdamna honpuak a; ka hehna in a hon lenkip hi.
Huchi in, michih ka heh in ka sikden a, ka heh in ka khamsak a, a hinna sisan uh lei ah ka bawta hi.
a hehpihnate leh a chitna thupidante bangzel a
Israel inkuanpihte lak a a hoihna thupi mahmah a a tung ua a vuh thu leng ka gen ding hi.
Aman, Ka mite, hitaktak hi ua, zuautat lou ding tate ahi uh, a chi hi. Huchi in amaute hondampa din a hong omta hi.
A mangbatna tengteng uah amah a mangbang a, angel, a ma a om in, amaute a humbit a: a itna leh a hehpihna in a tanta a; nidanglai ni tengteng ah amaute a pua in amaute a pom hi.
Himahleh a hel un, a Kha Siangthou a lungkhamsak ua: huaiziak in amau dou ding in kilehheisak in a om a, amau a sualta hi.
Huailai in a mite’n Mosi nidanglai nite a theigige ua, hichi in a chi uh, Tuipi a kipan a a belamhon chingmite toh amaute pi
A ban thupitak Mosi taklam a paisakpa koi a om ahia? Tangtawn min kibawl nadia a ma ua tui kikhensakpa koi a om ahia?
A kisuihlouhna ding ua tui thuktak a, gamdai a sakol pi bang a, amaute pikaipa koi a om ahia?
Guam a gan paisukte bang in
Abraham in hon theilou in, Israel in leng hon limsak keimah leh, nang zaw ka Pa uh na hi a: nang zaw, aw
aw, nang bangziak in ahia na lampi a kipan a hon vakmangsak na hia? Na sikha, na gouluah namte ziak in hongkik nawn in.
Na misiangthoute’n sawtlou chik kia a nei ua: hondoute’n lah na min siangthou a sikgawpta uh.
A tung ua vai na hawm ngeilouhte, na min pu ngeiloute namte ka bangta uhi.
Aw tangte na ma a a luankhiak zoizoina ding un, van botkek in hong kumsuk teitei lechin aw.
Namchih na ma a a linna ding un nang hondoute kiang a na min theihsakna ding in, mei in sing nen a kuangsak a, mei in tui a sousak bang in!
Ka lamet louh uh thil mulkimhuai na hihlai in na hongsuk a, tangte na ma ah a luangkhe zoizoi uhi.
Nidanglai a kipan in mite’n, nangkia loungal, amaute ngak ding a, sepsak zelpa Pathian a thei ngeikei ua, bil in lah a za ngeikei ua, mit in leng a mu ngei sam kei uhi.

Nang zaw, nuamtak a om a diktat tak a hih mi, na lampite a nang hon theigigete, na don a; ngai in, nang na heh a, kou thil ka hihkhial ua; huaite ah sawtpi ka omta ua, huchi in hotdam in ka om thei lai ding uam?
Mi nin bang in ka na om vekta ngal ua, ka diktatna teng uh leng puansilh nin bang ahi: ka vek un nah bang in ka vuai ua; ka thulimlouhnate un huih bang in a hon mutmang zel hi.
Huchi in na min lou a, nang honlen ding a kihihhalh kuamah a omkei uh: kou a kipan in na mai na selta ngal a, ka thulimlouhnate uh zang in n’on mangsakta hi.
Tuin zaw, aw
aw, heh kenla, thulimlouhnate leng tangtawn in theigige ken: ngai in hehpih in hon en inla, ka vek un nangmah mite ka hi uhi.
Na khopi siangthoute gamdai a hongsuak ua, Zion gamdai a hongsuak a, Jerusalem mun nawtsiat a hong hita hi.
Ka inn siangthou uleh ka inn kilawm tak uh, ka pipute un nang a honphat zelna uh, mei a hal ahi; ka thil deihhuaite tengteng ulah hihsiat in a omvekta ngal a.
aw, huai thilte ah na kidek thei ding ahia? Na dai nilouh in n’on hihgenthei nilouh ding ahia?
Kei hondeih ngeiloute zon in ka om; hon zong ngeiloute muhkhiak in ka om: ka min pulou nam kiang ah, “Hon en un, hon en un” ka chi hi.
Mi helhatte ading in nitum in ka bante ka zak, huaite bel amau ngaihtuahnate bangzel a lampi hoihlou a paite ahi.
Huante a kithoih a, teklei tungte a banghiam gimlim hal a, ka maitang mahmah a hon hihheh nakte.
Han lak a te tu a, mundaite a giak zelte, voksa ne a, a belte ua thil kihhuai tuichik om zelte.
Nang kia in ding in, hon naihken, nang sang in ka siangthou zaw hi, chite ahi uh: huaite bel ka nak a meikhu om, nitum a mei mitlou om gige nakte ahi uhi.
Ngai in, ka ma ah gelh in a om: ka dai nilouh kei ding a, ka thuk ding, a angsung uah ka thuk ding.
Noumau thulimlouhna leh na pute uh thulimlouhnate,
Huan, Jakob a kipan in chi khat ka pawtsak ding a, Judah a kipan in ka tangte luah ding ka pawtsak ding: huchi in ka mitelte’n huai a luah ding ua, ka sikhate huai ah a om ding uhi.
Huan, ka mi, kei hon zongte ading in, Sharon belamhonte huang ahi ding a, Akor guam bel bawnghon kualna mun ahi ding hi.
Himahleh nou

K’on saplai in n’on dawng nuam kei ua, thu ka gen lai in na za utkei ua, ka mitmuh in thil gilou na hihzaw ua, ka kipahpih louh thil na telzawk ziak un namsau in na tanhun uh k’on ngaihtuahsak ding a, na vek un thahna ah na kunvek ding uh.
Huaiziak in
Ngai un, ka sikhate lungtang a kipah ziak un la a sa ding ua, nou bel lungtang a na lungkham ziak un na kap ding uh, kha a na vui ziak un na mau vungvung ding uh.
Huan, na min uh kichiamna ding in ka mi telte kiang ah na nuse ding ua,

Huchi in, lei a amah ki vualzawl tawm mi bel thutak Pathian ah a ki vualzawl ding a; lei a a kichiammi in thutak Pathian lou in a kichiam ding; nidang a lungkhamnate mangngilh a a omtak ziak in leh ka mit a kipan a sel a a omtak ziak in.
Ngai un, van thakte leh leithak ka siam ahi; nidanglai thilte zaw theihgige in a om nawn kei ding a, lungsim ah leng a lut nawn kei ding hi.
Himahleh ka thilsiam ah tangtawn in kipak in nuamsa un; ngai un, Jerusalem nuamsakna ding in ka siam a, a mite kipahna din ka bawl hi.
Jerusalem tung ah nuam ka sa ding a, ka mite tung ah leng ka kipak ding: asung ah kap husa zak ahi nawn kei ding a, mau husa leng zak ahi nawn kei ding hi.

Huai a kipan a pawtzaw naungek ni sawtlou chik dam a omkei ding ua, putek a damsung nite tangtun lou leng a omkei ding uh; naupang lah kum za a upa in a si ding ua, mikhial kum za lel dam zaw hamsethuak ahi ding uhi.
Huan, innte a lam ding ua, huaite ah a om gige ding uh; grephuan a bawl ding ua, a gah leng a ne ding uh.

Midang omna ding in inn a lam nawn kei ding ua, midang nek ding in grephuan a bawl nawn kei ding uh; sing damsung nite bang in ka mite damsung nite lah om ding ahi ngal a, ka mi telte zaw sawtpi a sepkhiak tung uah a kipak ding uhi.
Bangmahlou in a semgim kei ding ua, vangtah lel ding in ta a neisam kei ding uh;
Huan, hichi ahi ding a, amau honsap ma un ka dawng ding a; thu a gen sanlai un leng ka bil in ka za ding hi.
Ngia leh belamnou a gamta khawm ding ua, humpinelkai in bawngtal bang in buhpawl a ne ding; leivui gulpi an ahi ding. Ka tang siangthou ah a kihihna nawn kei ding ua, a kihihse nawn sam kei ding uh,
Hiai thil bangkim lah ka khut a ka bawl ahi ngal ua, huchi in hiai thil bangkim a hong omta ahi,

Bawngtal goumi zaw mi that bang ahi a; thilpiak lanmi zaw vok sisan lanmi bang ahi a; begaw halmi zaw milim vualzawlmi bang ahi: ahi, amau lampi a telta ua, a thilkihhuaite uah a lungsim uh a kipak zel.

Ka saplai a kuamah in hon dawn kei ua, thu ka gen lai a bil a a zak louh ua, ka mitmuh a thil gilou a hih zawk ua, ka thil kipahpihlouh lam a tel ziak un ken leng amau khemna dingte ka telsak ding a, a kihtak lam uh a tung uah ka tungsak ding” chi in.
A thu a lingte aw,
Tua! Khopi a lum vengvung husa! Biakin husa eive! a melmate thukpa Toupa husa eive!
Aman vei manlou in nau a nei a; na manlou in pasal naupang a nei hi.
Huchibang kuan a za ngei a? Huchibang kua ahia a mu ngei? Ni khat in gam a piangguih ding ahia? Thakhat in nam suan in a omguih ding ahia? Zion in nau a veitak in a tate a neipah hi.
Pian hun tungsak ngal in ka neikei ding ahia?
Jerusalem itte tengteng aw,
Jerusalem nuamsakpih unla, kipahpih un:
amah sunte tengteng aw,
kipah ziak in nuamsak pih un.
Na tep ua, a lungmuanna nawite a na tai theihna ding un leh,
na tep peng ua, a thupina tampi a na kipah theih na ding un, chih.
Mi, a nun a lungmuan bang in k’on lungmuan ding; huchi in Jerusalem ah lung muan in na om ding uhi.
Huai na mu ding ua, na lungtang un nuam a sa ding a, na guhte uh leng loupa hing dipdip bang in a pha lihliah ding: huchi in
Ngai un, a hehna thangpaihna a thuk ding leh, a salhna meikuang a thuk ding in
Mei in ahi,
Huante ah a hoh ua, a lai a mi nung a om khepkhup ding a kihihsiangthou leh kisiangsak zelte, voksa leh thil kihhuai leh chikpi nete, a mangthang khawm ding uh,
A thilhihte uleh a ngaihtuahte uh lah ka thei ngal a: namchih leh pauchih ka pikhawm hun a hongtung sin; huchi in a hongpai ding ua, ka thupina a mu ding uh.

Huan, a lak uah chiamtehna ka omsak ding a, huchi in a lak ua gawtna pelte peuhmah namchih kiang ah Tarsishte, Pulte, thangpeu laite Lud kiang ah, tuikulhgam gamlapi, ka minthanna za ngei nailou Tubal leh Javante kiang ah, ka thupina mungei nailoute kiangte ah ka sawl ding; huchi in namchih lak ah ka thupina thu a gen ding uh.
Huchi in, Israel telte’n a thillat uh belsuan siangthou tak a
Huan huaite lak a kipan in siampu dingte leh Levimi dingte ka la ding, Toupa’n a chi.
Ka bawl ding van thakte leh lei thak ka ma ah om gige ding bang in, na suante uh leh na min uh leng a om gige ding ahi,
Huan, hichi ahi ding a, kha thak a kipan a kha thak dang tan in, khawlni a kipan a khawlni dang tan in mi tengteng ka ma a hon be ding in a hongpai zungzung ding uh,
A paikhe ding ua, ka tung a talekte luang a en ding uh: a thante uh a si kei ding a, a meite uh leng thah in a omsak kei ding hi; mitengteng ading in thil kihhuai mahmah ahi ding uhi.
Benjamin gam a Anathoth khua a siampute lak a mi Hilkiah tapa Jeremiah thute;
Judah Kumpipa, Ammon tapa Josiah hunlai, a vaihawm kum sawmlehthumna ah a kiang ah
Judah kumpipa, Josiah tapa Jehoiakim vaihawmlai in leng a hongtung a; Judah kumpipa Josiah tapa Zedekiah kum sawm leh kum khatna tawp, Jerusalem sal a pi kha ngana tan in.
“Gil sung a k’on bawl ma in k’on thei a, sul a kipan a na pawtkhiak ma in leng k’on koihtuam a, namte kiang a zawlnei din k’on sepkhin” chi in.
Huan ken, “E, Toupa Pathian, ngai dih, thu ka gen siam kei, ka naupang ngal a” ka chi hi.
Amau ziak in lau kenla, nang hon honkhe ding in na kiang ah ka om hi” chi in.

“Ngai in, na kam ah ka thute ka koihta, en dih, namte leh kumpipa gamte tung ah, botkhe ding, phel ding, hihse ding, paikhe ding, bawlhoih ding leh ding khesak ding in tuni in k’on koih na hi,” a chi hi.

Ngai dih, mallam kumpipa gam nam tengteng ka sam ding; chih

Huaiziak in puan teng inla, thou inla, k’on thupiak teng a kiang uah vagen in; a ma uah lunglel kenla, huchilou in zaw a ma uah k’on lunglel sak ding hi.
Ngai in, tuni in nang, a gam pumpite, Judah kumpipate, a heutute, a siampute leh a gam mipite dou in khopi kulh a um leh sik khuam leh dalsik khuam in k’on bawl ahi.

Guta a phawk ua a zum bang in, Israel inkawte a zumta uh, amau, a kumpipate uh, a heutute uh, a siampute uh, a zawlneite uleng.

Singbul kiang a, Ka pa na hi, chi a, suangbul kiang a, Kei honsuang na hi, chi mite: masuan lou in a dekkhuk sah uh a honsuan zaw ua, a mangbat hun un bel, Thou inla, hon hondam tanla, a chi ding uh, na pathian, huai na bawlte koi a om ahita ua?
Amau thou zaw uhenla, na mangbat lai in a hon hondam kha theimoh ding uhia; aw Judah, na pathiante bel na khopite zah mah ahi ve ua oi!
Bangdia ka tung a vui nak? Na vek un ka tung ah thil na hihkhial ngal ua, chih
Na tate uh ka khen a, a phatuam kei, a hoih loh tuankei uh; humpinelkai duhgawl bang mai in, noumau namsau in na zawlneite uh a ne khin uhi.
Aw khangthakte aw,
Nungak in a kizephoihnate a mangngilh thei in, mouthak in a kivatna a mangngilh thei ding maw? Ka mite’n ni simsenglouh sung in a hon na mangngilhta uhi.
Deihtakmi muh theihna ding in na omdan ngentel na chia! Numei gilou kiang ah leng na omdan na sinsakta ve.
Na nikte ah leng mi genthei poikhoihloute hinna sisan a lang a: na inn a buluh lai khutmat ahi kei uhi.
Ka mawh kei a, kei a kipan a hehna lakmang ahi, na chi nawn ngal a, ngai in, Ka gilou kei hi, na chih ziak in, na tungthu ka ngaihtuah ding.
Na omdan kheng mengmeng a, bangdia vialvak vak na hia? Assuria na zumpih bangmah in, Aigupta leng na zumpih lai ding hi.
Na khutte lukhuk in a kiang ua pan na pawt khe nawn dia,

Min zi ma henla, a zi in paisan in pasal dang nei leh, aman a na nei nawn diam? A gam in nitloh hial lou ding hia? chih a om. Nang bel tangval tampi kiang ah na hukmang in, huchipi in ka kiang ah na hongkik nawn ding maw? chih

Tang giau viauvuau lam ah na mitte lengtou sak inla, en in, a hon luppih louhna mun koi ah? Gamdai a Arabia mi bang mai in amau ngak in lampi gei te ah na tu nilouh sek, na hukna leh na thulimlouhnate in gam na hihnin khinta hi.
Huaiziak in vuah zuksak ahi kei a, vuah nanung leng a zu sam kei; mihuk talpuak in na pua, na zum hetkei hi.
Ka pa, ka tuailai a honpipa na hi, chi in, tua kipan in na sam kei ding maw?
Na heh tawntung ding ahia? A thangpaihna a omden ding ahia? Ngai in, huchibang in na pau ngei a, himahleh a gilou thei bangpen in thil na hih hi.
Huai lou leng Josiah vaihawm lai in
Huan ken bel hiai thil tengteng a hihnung in ka kiang ah a hongkik nawn ding, ka chi a; himahleh a hongkik tuankei; huchi in, a sanggamnu, khemhat Judah in a mu samta hi.
Aman nungkin hat Israel a angkawm ziak a ka mak a, makna lai ka piak a muh in leng a sanggamnu, khemhat Judah in a lau tuankei, huchih naksang in a vahoh a, hukna thil a va hihteita hi.
Huan a huk mawkmawk zenhouh ziak in gam a hihnin khinta a; singbul, suangbul kiang ah ang a kawmta hi.
Huchipi in leng a sanggamnu, khemhat Judah lungtangtaka ka kiang a hongkik lou in a zuaulel in a hongkik a, chih
Huan
Kuan inla, hiai thu mallam ah vaphuang in; Nungkin hat Israel hongkik in, chih
na Pathian tung a na helnate, singbawk nuai a pautuam mite kiang a na kiphal gaihnate, ka paukam suak na manlouhnate a na thulimlouhna ah thupha tawi in, chih
Aw nungkin hat tate aw, hongkik un, chih
Ka lungtuak lamtak belamchingte k’on pe ding a, amau theihna leh theihsiamnate in nou a honvak ding uh.

Huai nung in Jerusalem bel

Himahleh huai thil kihhuai mahmah in i tuailai a kipan i pipute’n tha a sukbeina uh a ne beita hi; a belamhonte uh, a ganhonte uh, a tanute uh, a tapate uh tan in.
Zum in lum ni e, i zahlakna in honkhuh heh;

a hin laiteng, chi a na kichiam leh, namte amah ah nuamsa a kichi ding ua, amah a suangta ding uh;

Gam pumpi ah pengkul mut unla, ngaihtak in kikou un.
Hong kikhawm unla, kulhnei
khopite ah i lut ding uh, chi un;

Huan ken, Ah,
Huai hun chiang in hiai mite leh Jerusalem kiang ah, “Gamdai tang giau velvul a kipan huih sa, Ka tanu, ka mite zapsiang ding hilou; siangsak ding hi sam lou;
Huih hat lua, ka thu in a hongtung ding ahi: tuin leng a tungthu uh ngaihtuahpa kei ka hi” chih ahi ding.
Ngai dih, a hong paitou ding, meipi bang in, a kangtalai pingpei bangmaite; a sakolte muvanlai sang in a hatzaw uh, i tung gik na e! Buluh a om i hive ua.
Aw Jerusalem, thulimlouhna a kipan na lungtang silsiang inla, hotdam a na om theihna ding in; bang tan ahia na ngaihtuahna gilou na pai ding?
Dan gam a kipan aw a hong pawtkhia a, Ephraim tang a kipan in thil hoihlou a phuang hi.
Namte hilh unla, Jerusalem ah phuang un, ngai dih, gam gamlapi a kipan sualmite a hongtung uh, Judah khopite tung ah a aw uh a suah uhi.
Louma vengmite bang mai in a kimvel in a um ua, ka tung a a hel ziak un chih
Na omdan leh na thilhihte’n, hiaite na tung ah a tun ahi, hiai na siatna ding ahi, a na mahmah a na lungtang sun eive.
“Ka lung a na, ka lung a na,

Siatna tung ah siatna a tungta,

Bang tan ahia kidouna puanzak
ka muh ding a,

Ka mite a hai mahmah ua lah a thei ngal kei ua,

Leitung ka et leh, ngai dih,

Ka et leh, ngai in,

Ngai un, aw Israel inkawte aw, gamlapi a kipan, nam khat na kiang ah ka honpi ding, chih
A thal bawm uh han kihong ahi a, avek un mi hattak ahi khin uh.

Na buh laksa leh na nek ding a nekhinvek ding uh; na tanute na tapate nekding mahmah: na ganhonte, na belamhonte a ne ding ua, na grepguite, na theipi kungte a ne ding ua, na khopi kulhnei, na muanpi pente mahmah namsau in a hihse ding uhi.

“Jakob inkawte lak ah hiai genkhia unla, Judah gam ah phuang un.
Aw theihtheihna neilou, mihaite aw, mit nei a lah mu lou, bil nei a lah zaloute aw, hiai ngaikhia un”

Himahleh hiai mite’n lungtang paupeng leh helhat a pu ua, a hel ua, a taimangta uh.
A lungtang un leng,
Hiai thilte na thulimlouhnate un a hihmang a, na khelhnate un thil hoih nou a hontan sak ahi.
“Ka mite lak ah migilou a om ngal ua, vasa gemmi in a tan bang in a tang gige ua, thang a kam ua, mite a man uh.
Bawm vasa a dim bang mai in, a innte uh khemna in a dim a, huaiziak in a honglian ua, a hong hauhsak lohta uhi.
A hongthau ua, a hongzol ua, ahi, a gitlouhna thilhihte un hun chiang a neikei, pa neiloute lamzanna ding in amau lam ah a pang kei uhi.
Hiai thilte ziak in ka gawt kei dia hia? chih
Huai gam ah thil lamdangtak leh mulkimhuaitak a hongtung hi.
Zawlneite’n zuauthu a gen ua, siampute’n lah amau thuthu in vai a hawm ua, ka mite’n lah huchibang hih a ut uhi, a tawp ah bangchi’n na hih ding ua leh?”

Benjamin tate aw, Jerusalem sung a kipan na bitna ding un tai mang unla; Tekoa ah pengkul mut unla Beth Hakkerem ah theihsakna suaksak un. Mallam a kipan in siatna a hong kuan hi, hihsiatna thupi mahmah.
Zion tanu melhoih tak leh nou tak ka hihmang ding.
Belampute, a belamhonte utoh a kiang a hongtung ding ua, a kim ah a puaninte uh a kaih khum ding ua, amau mun chiat ah a ke ding uh.
Amah dou ding in kisa un, thou unla, sun lai in i sual ding uh, ei ading in khawk hina e! ni a kihektaa, nitaklam limliap a na sauta hi.
Thou unla, zan in i sual mai ding uh! a inn hoihhoih uh hihsia ni.
Sepaihte
Tuileh in tui a pawtsak bang mai in a gitlouhna a pawtsak sek, asung ah hiamgamna leh kilohna a om chih zak ahi, ka ma ah natna leh kiliamsaknate a om nilouh hi.
Ka lungsim in a hon tuamsan vengveng ma in aw, Jerusalem, pilvang in, huchilou in zaw luahmi neilou gam dia honbawl in, k’on hihgawp kha ding hi.
Sepaihte
A ngaihkhiak theihna ding un kua ka houpih in, kua ka theisak dia? Ngai in, bil lam zeksumlouh ahi ua, a ngaikhe theikei uh; ngai in,
Huaiziak in
A innte uh midang kiang a piak ahi ding a, a loumate uleh a zite utoh; huai gam a tengte tung ah ka khut lik ding ka hi ngal a, chih
A neupen a kipan a lianpen tan in leng michih huaihamna in a dim ua; zawlneite leh siampute nasan leng, michih a zuautat mahmah uhi.
