Huan,
“Kawnggak na lei, huai na gak la inla, thou inla, Euphrates lui zuan inla, huai a suangheng kal ah sel in” chi in.
Huchi in
Ni tampi nung in
Huchi in Euphrates lui ah ka hohta a, ka thai a, ka selna a kipan kawnggak ka pholhkhia hi. Ngai dih, kawnggak a na ngotkhin vek a; bang ding mah in leng a phatuamta kei hi.
Huan,
hichi in a chi: hichi mah bang in Judah kisathei pipi leh Jerusalem kiotsakna mahmahte ka hihse dek hi.
Hiai nam gilou, ka thute ngaikhe nuam lou a, amau lungsim paupeng zui a pathian dangte nasem leh be ding a delhmite kawnggak bangmah ding a phatuam lou bang ahi ding uh.

Kawnggak mi kawng a a belh gige bang in Israel inkaw pumpi leh Judah inkaw pumpi ka mite, ka minthanna, ka kilawmna leh ka thupina a hong hihtheihna ding ua ka kiang a belh gige ding a ka bawl ahi uhi; himahleh a limsak kei uh.
Hiai thu a kiang ua na gen ding ahi:
Huchi in, a kiang uah,
Amau ka kiphusak ding a, pate a tate utoh, chih
Ngaikhia unla, bildoh un; kisathei kei un,
mialna a tunsak ma a khomui tung a te na khe uh a kipal ma in, vak na lamet laitak un mial a suaksak a,
mial bikbek ding in a bawl ding hi.
Himahleh na ngaihkhiak kei uleh na kisaktheihna uh
ziak in mundai ah ka kap nilouh ding;
ka khitui leng nakpitak in a luang gige ding,
Kumpipa leh a nu kiang ah, Niam tut un, na lukhute uh a keta hi, na lallukhu thupi uh, chi in.
Sim khopite a bingkhin a, kuamah honvual louh in; Judah tengteng sal in a tang ua, avek un a tang khin uhi.
Na mit uh dak tou unla, mallam a kipan a hong kuan en un. Na belamhon neih koi ah, huai na belamhon deihhuai tak?
Nangmah in lawm dia na bawlte na tung a a koih hun chiang un bangchi’n na chi dia? Numei nauvei bang mai in na nasa ngial kei ding maw?
Bangziak in ahia hiaite ka tung a a hongtun? Chisim na hihleh, na thulimlouhna ziak in ahi na nik lem a hih a na vuaktanna a kimuh.
Ethiopia mi vom in a vun a hihlamdang in gialbem in a zia a sel thei ahia? Huchi ahihleh nou thil gilou hihhat sekte’n leng thil hoih hihthei na ve uteh!
Gamdai huih in buhsi a mutleng bang mai in amau ka dalhsak ding.
Hiai na tantuan, na tuam dia ka hon sehsak ahi, n’on mangngilh a, zuau a na kingak ziak in, chih
Huchi in kei mahmah in na nik na mai khuh hial in k’on lemsak ding a, na zumhuaina a dawk ding hi.
Gamlak a tangte a na angkawmnate, na huk kikou husate, na kiphalgaih thupidante, huai na thilhih kihhuaite ka muta. Aw Jerusalem, na tung a gik hi: hihsiang na hih ma bang tan hi ding ahia?
Khokheng tungtang a Jeremiah kiang a
Judah in a sun a, a kulh
kongpite a ngui; lei ah puan
vom khu in a kun ua,
Jerusalem kah ging a tungkah.
A mi lalte’n a sikhate uh tui a tawisak ua, tuichin a zuan ua, tui a mu kei uhi,
Tuibel uh hawm in a kik ua;
a beidong ua, gen ding a theikei ua, a lu uh a khuh uhi.
Lei lah a khang a, gam pum a vuahtui a omlouh ziak in,
leiletmite a lungdong ua, a lu uh a khuh ua.
Ahi, zukpiin leng pawn ah
nou a nei a, a taisan ve,
lou hing a omlouh ziak in.
Gam sabiltungte mualvum ah
ading ua, sehal bang in
huihkhua ngai in a nak
huhu ua; nekding loupa
omlouh ziak in a mit uh a mial dundun hi.
Ka thulimlouhna un honhek
mahleh na min ziak in aw
ka puknate ulah a tamta ngal a,
na tung mahmah ah thil ka na hih khial uhi.
Aw nang Israelte lamet,
mangbat lai a hondampa,
bangdia hiai gam a mikhual bangzen a zan khat giak a zin banglel a om na hia?
Bangdia mi lungke gawp bang phet leh pasalpha hondam thei khollou bang lel a om na hia?
Himahleh nang zaw, aw
ka lak uah na omlai a, na min ka pu ua, hon paisan ken.
An ngawl mahle uh a kikou uh ka ngaikhe kei ding a, haltum leh buh leh bal thillat lan mahle uh ka dawng kei ding; namsau, kial, hipi in amau ka hihmang zaw ding, a chi hi.
Ken, Eh,
Huan,
Huaiziak in

Huan, a thugenna uh nam leng kial leh namsau ziak in Jerusalem kongzing ah paihkhiak ahi ding ua, a tanute uh a tapate utoh, vuimi himhim a neikei ding uh. A thulimlouhna uh amau tung ah ka sung dek ngal a.
Huan, a kiang ua hiai thu na gen ding ahi;
Sun leh zan in ka khitui luang hen,
hul himhim kei hen, ka mi,
ka tanu nungak siangthou in nakpi a liamna a tuak hi,
khutkhak na mahmah hi.
Ka gam pawt leh, maizen,
namsau a thahte!
Khopi a a lut leh, maizen,
kialpi misi!
gamchih ah zawlneite,
siampute a vakvai chiat ua,
a dan mahmah a theikei uh, chi in.
Judah paikhe siang na hi hiam?
Zion kih na hi maw?
Kou dia hihdamna omlou bikbek a bangdia hon thuaksak na hia?
Muanna ka zong ua, hoihna
bangmah a hongtung kei;
hihdamna hun ding leng,
ngai dih kha phanna lel.
Aw
ka pipute uh ginatlouhna toh,
na tung ah ka hihkhialta uhi.
Na min ziak in hon musit ken,
na mangtutphah thupi minse sak kenla,
ka kiang ua na thukhun theigige in hihse ken.
Namdang pathiante lak ah vuah
zusak thei a om uhia?
Ahihleh, van in vuahpi a tungsak thei hia?
Aw
huai pen nang na hi kei maw?
Hiai thil tengteng na hih ahi a,
ka lamet uh nang na hi.
Huan,
Huan, koi ah ka pai ding ua chi a nang a hondot uleh hichi in a kiang uah na chi ding hi:
Sihna tuam sihna ah;
namsau tuam namsau ah;
kial tuam kial ah,
saltanna tuam saltanna ah.
Thil li ka sehsak ding, chih
Judah kumpipa Hezekiah tapa Manasseh in Jerusalem a a thilhih ziak in lei kumpipa gam tengteng lak a vial sepsep ding in ka bawl ding.
Kuan
a hon hehpih dia aw Jerusalem?
Kuan hon lungkhampih dia?
Na omdan dong ding in kua a lampial dia oi?
Nang n’on paikhia a, na nungtawn tawn a, chih
Huchi in kisik ka chimtak a,
na tung ah ka khut ka lik a,
k’on hihmang hi.
Gam pumpi a kulh kongpite ah
kizapna in amau ka zap a,
ta bei in ka bawl a, ka mite ka hihmang a; a omdan uh
a kihei san louh ziak un.
Tuipi piaunel sang a tam in a meithaite uh ka pungsak ding a,
suntanglai in tangvalte siatna
ding in a tung uah lokmi ka
tungsak a, mangbatna leh
thil mulkimhuai ka tungsak guih hi.
Sagih suangnu a bahgawp a;
a kha a khahta; sun a hih lai in a ni a keta,
zahlak in a lungbuai a:
huan a omlaite a melmate khut ah namsau thah ding in ka pe ding, chih
Nu ei, gam pumpi a kituahlouhna mi leh kikalhna mi a n’on na suan ka tung gik hina tele! Ka leitawi sak kei a, mite’n leng a hon leitawi sak kei uh; himahleh avek un hamsia a honloh uhi.
, chihtak ngial in thil hoih ading in ka hon hihkip ding; chihtak ngial in siatna ni leh haksatna ni’n melma na kiang ah khut ka dohsak ding, a chi hi.
Min sik, mallam a sik leh ngen a kitansak thei ding ahia?
Na khelhna tengteng ziak in na sum lah pai lah na gou thilte manbei in gallak ding in ka pe ding, na gam tawn in.
Na theih ngeilouh gam ah na melmate na k’on semsak ding. Ka heh ziak a na tung a mei ampha ding a kuangkheta hi, a chi hi.
Nang man na thei hi, aw
Na thute hihlat ahia, ka ne a, na thute kei ading in kipahna leh ka lungtang nopna ahi; aw
Nopbawl mite lak ah ka tel kei a, ka kipahpih sam kei; nang khut ziak in ka tu tuam a, lungkimlouhna in n’on dimsak hi.
Bangdia ka natna dai theilou a, ka liamna dam theilou ahi, hihdam utlou bang mai a? Ka tung ah guam khemhat tui kang sekte bang na hi ding ahia?
Huchi in
Hiai mite lak a zaw ngen kulh bang in k’on bawl ding a, a honsual ding ua, himahleh a honzou kei ding uh, nang hon hondam ding leh honkhe ding in na kiang ah ka om ngal a, chih
Migiloute khut a kipan k’on honkhe ding a, mi lauhuaite khut a kipan k’on pawtkhe sak ding.
Zi na nei ding ahi kei a, hiai mun ah tanu tapate leng na nei ding ahi sam kei, chi in.
Tanu tapa hiai mun a piangte leh hiai gam a nu leh pa amaute suangte tungtang

Hipiin a si ding ua, kuamah vuilouh leh kuamah sun louh in a om ding uh; leitung ekvut banglel ahi ding uh. Namsaute, kialte in a mangthang ding ua, a luang uh tungleng vasate leh gamsate an ahi ding hi.
Hiai gam ah mi lian leh mi neute a si ding ua; vui ahi kei ding ua; kuamah in a sun kei ding ua, a ki at un a kimet giau loh kei ding uh.
Lusunmite a misi ngaih uh lungmuan ding in kuamah in nek ding a lui kei ding ua, a nu uh hiam a pa uh hiam ziak in leng nepna nou dawn ding kuamah in a tun kei ding uhi.
Huan, ne leh dawn ding in a lak ua tu ding in Ankuangluina inn ah na lut ding ahi kei.
Sepaihte
Hiai thu tengteng hiai mite kiang a na hilh hun chiang in amau, Bangziak in ahia
Hichi in na chi ding hi: Na pipute un a hon paisan ziak uh ahi, pathian dangte a delh ua, a na uh a sem ua, a bia ua, a hon paisan ua, ka dan a zuikei ua;
Huan noute’n na pipute uh sang a leklua in na hih ua, ngai un, michih in noumau lungtang gilou paupeng na zui ua, Kei n’on ngaikhe kei ua;
Huaiziak in ka gam a kipan noute leh na pipute un leng na theih ngeilouh uh gam ah ka hon delhkhe ding, huai ah sun leh zan in pathian dangte nna na sem ding ua, k’on hehpih dek ngal kei a, chih
Huchi in, ngai dih ua, nite a hongtung dek hi,
Mallam gam leh a delhzakna gam tengteng a kipan a Israel tate pikhepa
Ngamanmi tampi ka thukhak ding a, amau a man ding ua; huaikhit in gamvakmi tampi ka thukhak ding a, tang chiteng leh mual chiteng a kipan amaute a beng khe ding ua, suangpi hengkal a leng.
A omdan tengteng uah lah ka mit a tu nilouh ngal a; kei a kipan sel in a omkei ua, a thulimlouhna uh leng ka mit a kipan sel in a omsam kei hi.
Huchi in a thil kihhuai luangte ua ka gam a hihnit ua leh a kihhuaina ua ka goutan gam a dimsak ziak un a thulimlouhna uh leh a khelhna uh a zahnih in ka thuk ding, chih
Aw
Min pathiante a kibawlsak thei ua hia? Huaite pathian ahi sam ua, a chi ding uh.
Huaiziak in, ngai dih ua, tutung in amau ka theisak peuhmah ding; ka khut leh ka thilhihtheihna ka theisak ding, ka min
Judah khelhna sik laigelhna leh suangmantam hiam muk zum a gelh ahi; a lungtang pek ua khuak in a om a, a maitam uahte leng;
Sing hing bul leh mualpawngte ah a tate un a maitamte uleh a Aserahte uh a theigige ngal ua.
Aw nang gam a ka tang, gam dung tawn a na khelhna ziak in na sum leh na gou tengteng, na mun sangte toh gallak ding in ka pe ding.
Huai na tantuam ka honpiak na tan ding a, na gam theih ngeihlouh ah na melmate nna k’on semsak ding, ka hehna mei, tangtawn a kang ding lah na mut kuangta ngal ua.
Mihing muang a,
mihing ban hatna muang a,
neimi hamse thuak in om hen.
Gamdai a loupa keu gaw bang ahi a,
thil hoih pawt ding a mu kei ding.
Gamdai gamkeu, chi gam, kuamah luah louh ah a teng zaw ding hi.
Tui kiang a sing phuh,
luigei a zungkai, khaw lum
hongtung ding khawksa lou,
a nahte hing gige,
khokhen kum khawksa
lou, gah suan kikhelsak
tuan lou bang ahi ding hi.
Lungtang bel thil tengteng sang
in khemhat pen, hoihlou pumlum ahi a;
kuan ahia theithei ding?
Kei
bangzel uleh a thilhih gah bangzel a peding a lungsim enkhepa,
lungtang enchianpa ka hi.
Mi, kilawmlou a hong hau
bel vengkeng, amah tui loupi
keuhsak dia op bang ahi,
a damlai in amah a tuansan ding ua,
atawp in mihai a hong himai ding.
Ka Mun Siangthou omna bel
mangtutphah thupi mahmah,
a tung a kipan a tawisang a om ahi.
Aw
hon paisan mi tengteng a zahlak ding uh;
kei hon lehngatsan mite lei a leivui a gelh banglel ahi ding uh,
Aw
Ngai in, ka kiang ah,
Thil hoihlou tungsak ding ka honphut kei a, siatna ni lah ka deih hetkei chih na thei hi; ka kam a thupawt lah na maima a om ahi hi.
Kei ding in kihtakhuai hi kenla, mangbat ni a ka kihumbitna na hi.
Hon simmohte zahlak uhenla, kei bel zahlak keileng; amau bel lungzing uhenla, kei bel lungzing keileng; mangbat ni a tung uah tun inla, nakpi’n amau hihmang in.
A kiang uah, Nou Judah kumpipate, Judah tengtengte, Jerusalem a teng tengteng hiai kongpi a lut sekte aw,
hichi in a chi hi: Na hinna uh pilvang mahmah dih ua, khawlniin puak neikei unla, Jerusalem kulh kongpi ah lutpih sam kei un.
Huan, khawlniin na inn ua kipan puak na pokhe ding uh ahi kei a, nna na sem ding uh ahi sam kei; na pipute uh kiang a ka thupiak bang in khawlni na tang siangthou zaw ding uhi.
Amau zaw a ngaikhe kei ua, bil a doh kei ua; thununna a zak ua a tanlouhna ding un a kigenhaksak zaw uhi.

Nna na seplouh ua khawlni na tan siangthou uleh, hiai khopi kongpi ah leh heutute, David tutphah a tu dingte kangtalaite leh sakolte ah tuang in a honglut ding ua, amau leh a miliante uh Judah leh Jerusalem a tengte toh; huchi in hiai khopi ah mi a teng denta ding uh.

Judah khopi leh Jerusalem kim a kipan, Benjamin gam a kipan, gamniam gam a kipan, tanggam a kipan leh Sim gam a kipan in a hongpai ding ua, haltum thillat leh kithoihnate buh leh bal thillat leh gimlimte, kipahna kithoihnate

Himahleh khawlni tang siangthou ding leh khawlni a puak neih louh leh Jerusalem kulh kongpi a lutpih louh ding thu ah n’on ngaihkhiak kei uleh a kulh kongpite ah mei ka pawtsak ding a, Jerusalem kumpipa innte a kang bei ding a, a mit kei ding hi.
“Thou inla, belvelmi inn ah hohsuk inla, huai ah ka thute ka hon theisak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in belvelmi inn ah ka hohsukta a, a belbawlna khawl ah nna a sem hi.
Tung a bel a bawl lai a hong hoih kei leh belvelmi’n hoih a sak bang in bel dang din a bawl nawn zel hi.
Huchi in
Aw Israel inkawte aw, hiai belvelmi hih bang in nou ka honhih theikei a hia? chih
Chiklai in leng nam hiam gam hiam tungtang thu ah, k’on dokkhe ding, k’on phel ding a, k’on hihse ding, chi in na gen mah leng,
Huai nam in a tungthu ka gen ziak a a thil hoihlou hih a lehngatsan leh a tung a thil hoihlou hih ka tup ka kikhelsak ding.
Huan, chiklai in leng nam hiam gam tungtang thu ah, k’on bawl ding a, k’on dingsak ding a, chi in na gen zong hileng,
Ka paukam suak ngaikhe lou a ka mitmuh a thil hoihlou ahihleh amah ading in thil hoih hih ka tup ka kikhelsak sam ding.
Huaiziak in Judah mite leh Jerusalem a tengte kiang ah,
Himahleh amau zaw, “Kilawm kei e! Koumau phasak bangbang in ka om ding ua, michih koumau lungtang gilou genhak bangzel in ka om ding uh” a chi sek uhi.
Huaiziak in
Namdangte dong him dih ua,
hichibang mahmah kuan a thei a?
Nungak siangthou Israel in
thil lauhuai mahmah a hihta.
Lebanon vuk in a mualvum a nuse ngei ahia?
Gamla a kipan a tui vot hongluang sukte a kangtat ngei ahia?
Ka mite’n a hon mangngilh ua,
bangmah lou phet kiang ah gimlim a hal ua, huaite’n a
tuma lam lampi ua kipan a ki suisak a, lampipen hilou
lamkhem lam a zui uh;
A gam uh hih siatgawp ahi dia,
tangtawn a enghou ding;
kivialleh min lamdangsa in a lu uh a sing ding ua.
Suahlam huihpi bang in melma ma ah ka thehzak ding,
a vangtah ni un ka mel hilou,
ka dek ka musak ding hi.

Huan, amau, Kisa un, Jeremiah i sawm ding uh, siampu a kipan dan a dai kei ding a, mi pil a kipan thudot a dai sam kei ding, zawlnei a kipan thu a dai kei ding hi. Kisa un, i gense gawp ding ua, a thu i limsak kei ding, a chi uhi.
Hon limsak inla, aw
Gilou thil hoih a dit hi ngei hia? Amau lah ka kha ading in kawkhuk a tou ngal ua. Amau a kipan a na hehna heimang ding leh amau adia thil hoih gen ding a na ma a ka din sek theigige in.
Huchi in a tate uh kialpi kiang ah pekhia inla, namsau hatna kiang ah pia in; huan a zite uh taneilou in, meithai uhen; a pasalte uh hipi in si uhenla, a tangvalte uh leng kidouna ah namsau si uhen.
Simmite a kiang uh na tunsak guih lai in a inn ua kipan kap husa thangkhia hen: kei ading in kawkhuk a tou ngal ua, ka khe awkna ding in thang a kam uhi.
Himahleh nang, aw
Belvelmi kongpi lutna chin a Ben Hinnom guam ah hoh inla, huai ah na kiang a thu k’on hilh ding na phuang ding.
Hichi in na chi ding hi: Judah kumpipate leh Jerusalem a tengte aw,

Mite’n a honpai san ua, hiai mun a hihnin un, amau leh a pate uh leh Judah Kumpipate’n leng a theih ngei nai hetlouh uh, pathian dangte kiang ah gimlim a hal ziak uleh hiai mun mi hoih sisan a a dimsak ziak un leh Baal kiang a haltum thillat ding a a tate uh a halna ding ua Baal mun sangte a lamkhiak ziak un;
Huai zaw ka thupiak ahi kei a, gen leng ka gen sam kei a, ka lungsim ah leng a om ngeikei hi.
Huaiziak in, ngai dih, nite a hongtung ding,

Huan, hiai mun ah Judah leh Jerusalem thil tupte ka vuak suaksak ding a; amau pen namsau in a melmate uh ma ah leh a hinna uh lak tummite khut ah ka puksak ding; a luangte uh tung a leng vasate leh lei a gamsate an ding in ka pe ding.
Huchi in, hiai khopi lamdang sak ding leh enghou ding in ka bawl ding a, a vialpai peuh in siatna a tuahte ziak in lamdang a sa ding ua, a enghou lai ding uhi.
A tanute uleh a tapate uh sa ka nesak ding a; a melmate uh leh a hinna uh lak tummite’n a um ua a mangbat sak hun chiang un kuapeuh in a invengte uh sa a ne ding uh.
Huan, na paipihte mitmuh in bel na hihtam ding a, a kiang uah huchi in na chi ding.
Sepaihte
Huchi hial in hiai mun ka bawl ding, chih

Jerusalem innte leh Judah kumpipate innte, inn chiteng mahmah a tung a vanlam thilte kiang a gimlim halkhitna tengteng leh pathian dangte kiang a dawn ding thillat butkhiaknasa tengtengte Tophet mun bang hial a hihnit ahi ding hi.
Huan, Jeremiah bel,
Israelte Pathian, sepaihte
Huan Immer tapa,
Huchi in Pashur in zawlnei Jeremiah a khen a,
A zing in Pashur in Jeremiah a khahkhia a, huan Jeremiah in a kiang ah,

lah hichi in a chi ngal a: Ngai in, nang ading leh na lawmte tengteng ading in kihtak in k’on bawl ding: amau a melmate uh namsau in a puk ding ua, nang zaw na mit in na en lel ding. Judahte tengteng Babulon kumpipa khut ah ka pe vek ding: aman Babulon ah sal in a pi ding a, namsau in a that ding hi.

Huaiban ah, khopi hauhna tengteng, a sepkhiak tengteng, a thil manpha tengteng leh Judah kumpipate gou tengteng a melmate uh khut ah ka pe ding a, amau a lok ding ua, a man ding ua, Babulon ah a pi ding uh.

Huan, nang Pashur, na insung a om tengtengte toh sal ah na tang ding ua; Babulon ah na pai tei ding; huai ah na si ding a, huai ah vui in na om ding a, nang leh na lawm zuauthu na hilhsekte tengteng toh, a chi hi.
Aw
nang zaw kei sang in na hat a,
n’on zou a; nitum in nuihsat
ka hita, mi kuapeuh in a hon nuihsan uhi.
Thu ka gen peuhmah chiang in,
ka kikou khia a, hiamgamna leh siatna, chi in ka kikou;
nitum a dem leh muhsit lohna kia ahi.
Amah ka kan kei ding a, a min
in leng thu ka gen n’on sam kei ding, chi mah leng,
ka guh sung a mei kang ki khumkhin bang mai in ka lungtang sung ah a om a,
ka pai kinken zou kei a,
ka pha zou mahmah kei hi.
Mi tampi a guk phun uh ka za:
kil chih ah lauhuai a om,
hek unla,
i hek khawm ding uh, chi in.
Ka lawmte ka puk ding tang gigete’n, Khem in a om dia,
i zou ding, a tung ah phu i la ding, a chi uhi.
Himahleh
kihtakhuai mahmah bang in
ka kiang ah a om a,
a hon simmohte a puk ding ua,
honzou kei ding uh.
Zahlaktak in a om ding ua,
a lohchin sinlouh ziak un.
Tangtawn a a minsiatna uh
mangngilh in a omkei ding.
Aw sepaihte
mi diktatte enchianpa,
lungtang leh lungsim mu paisuakpa, a tung ua na phulak hon musak dihve,
ka tungtang thu k’on kemsakta hi.
hihmite khut a kipan panpih
deihte hinna a humbitta hi.
Ka piankhiak ni hamse thuak in om hen,
ka nun a hon piansak ni vualzawl in om dah hen.
Ka pa kiang a, Tapa na neita,
chih thu hontun a,
hong kipaksakmi tak hamse thuak in om hen.
Huai mi,
sun a hih chiang in galdou husa;
