A khut a kipan na suakta hetkei ding: mat na hi ding a, a khut ah honpe ding ua, na mit ngei in Babulon kumpipa na mu ding a, paukam ngei in na kihoupih ding ua, Babulon gam ah na hoh ding hi.
Himahleh, aw Judah kumpipa, Zedekiah,

Namsau in na si kei ding a, muangtak in ahi na sih ding: na ma a kumpipa masa, na pipute gimlim a halsak bang un, nang leng a hon halsak ding uh: a honsun ding ua, "Ehe heh, ka pu," chi in. Thu ka khahta hi, chih
Zawlnei Jeremiah in hiai thu tengteng Jerusalem a Judah kumpipa Zedekiah kiang ah a gen a;
Babulon kumpipa sepaih honte’n Jerusalem leh Judah khopi omlai tengteng, Lakish leh Azekah a sual lai un: Judah khopi lak a kulh neite hiaite kia ahita uhi.
Kumpipa Zedekiah in Jerusalem a om mipi tengteng kiang ah, michih in a sikhanu toh a sikhapate uh, Hebru nu hiam Hebru pa hiam a hih uleh, a khah ding uh ahi:
A unaupa Hebru mi nasep sak in kuamah a om ding uh ahi kei, chi a noplenna thu a phuan a, thukhun a bawl nung a
Michih in nasemnu hiam nasempa hiam a khah ding ahi, amau nna sepsakin kuamah a om ding uh ahi kei, chih thukhun pommi heutu tengteng leh mipi tengteng in thukhun a mang ua, a khahta uhi.
Himahleh huai nung in a kihei ua, a nasemnu uh leh a nasempa uh a khahsate uh a kaikik ua, a thunuai uah nasemmi ding in a koih nawn uh:
Huaiziak in Jeremiah kiang ah
Aigupta gam, saltanna inn a kipan ka pikhiak ni’n na pipute uh kiang ah thukhun ka bawl a:
Michih in a unaupa, Hebru mi, a kiang a zuaksa, kum guk a na nasemsa a kum sagihna tawp in a khah ding ahi, chi in: na pipute un bel a hon ngaikhe kei ua, a bil uh a doh sam kei uh.
Tuin noute’n, na hong kihei ua, michih in a invengpa kiang a noplenna thu phuang in ka mitmuh in thil dik n’on hihta ua: Ka min tam inn ah ka ma ah thukhun na hong kibawlta ua;

Himahleh na kihei nawn ua, ka min na hihbuah un a ut bang tak ua na khahsa nung uh, na sikhanu leh na sikhapa uh na pi kiknawn ua, na thunuai uah nasemmi ding bang sikhanute ding bang in na koih nawn uh.
Huaiziak in
Huan, ka thukhun bohsiate, ka ma a bawngnou atphel kikal a paisuak hial a thuchiam a tangtung sakloumi.
Judah heutute leh Jerusalem heutute, michilgehte, siampute, mipi tengteng, bawngnou atphel kikal a paite;
A melmate uleh a hinna zongmite khut ah ka pe ding a; huchi in, a luangte uh tung a leng vasate leh lei a gamsate an ding lel ahi ding.
Huan, Judah kumpipa Zedekiah leh a lawite a melmate uleh a hinna zongmite leh Babulon kumpipa sepaih hon, nou hon paisansate khut ah ka pe ding hi.
Ngai un, hiai khopi a hong kiknawn ding in thu ka pe ding a, chih
Judah kumpipa Josiah tapa Jehoiakim vaihawmlai a
Rekab inkawte kiang ah hoh in va houpih inla,
Huan, Habazziniah tapa, Jeremiah tapa, Jaazaniah leh a unaute, a tapa tengteng Rekab inkawte tengteng toh ka pi a;
Pathian mi Igdali tapa Hanan tate dantan,
Huchi in, Rekab suante pate ma ah belhbute, noute uain dim ka tung a, a kiang uah, “Uain dawn un” ka chi hi.
Amau bel, “Uain ka dawn kei hial ding uh; kou hon suangpa Rekab tapa Jonadab in, Noumau leh na suante un leng tangtawn a uain na dawn ding uh ahi kei;

inn na lam un haichi na tuh un, grephuan leng na bawl un na nei ding uh ahi sam kei hi: na damsung nite un puanin a na ten zawk ding uh ahi, na omna gam ua na damsawt theihna ding un, chi in thu a honpia hi.
Huchi in kou hon suangpa Rekab tapa Jonadab in paukam a thu hon thukhah tengteng, ka damsung ua kou leh ka zite uh, ka tapate uleh ka tanute un uain dawn louh ding un,
Ka tenna inn uh lam louh ding, grephuan hiam lou hiam haichi hiam neih louh ding tan in ka zui uhi:
Puaninte ah ka teng zaw ua, kou hon suangpa Jonadab thupiak tengteng mang in ka zui vek uhi.

Huan, hichi ahia, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in gam a hongsual lai in kou, Kisa un, Kaldai sepaih honte leh Suria sepaih honte lau ziak in Jerusalem ah i hoh ding uh, ka chi ua, huchi in Jerusalem ah ka tengta uhi” a chi uhi.
Huan,
Israel Pathian sepaihte

Rekab tapa Jonadab thu, a tapate kiang a a piak, uain dawn louh ding pen a zui ua, tunitan in bangmah a dawn kei ua, amau suangpa thupiak a zui mahmah uh hi: ken bel phalvak a thou in na kiang uah thu ka gen a, n’on ngaikhe kei uh.

Ka nasem zawlneite phalvak a thou in na kiang uah ka sawl a, michih na omdan gilou ua kipan hongkik vek unla, na thilhihte uh bawlhoih unla, pathian dangte zaw a na uh sem ding in zuikei unla; nou leh na pipute uh kiang a gam ka piak ah na teng ding uh chi in; himahleh na bil uh na doh kei ua, n’on ngaikhe sam kei uh.
Rekab tapa Jonadab suante’n amau suangpa thupiak a zui ua, hiai mite’n zaw a hon ngaikhe kei uh;
Huaiziak
Huchi in, Jeremiah in Rekab suante kiang ah: Sepaihte
Rekab tapa Jonadab in tangtawn in ka ma ading ding mi a tasam ngeikei ding, chi in sepaihte
Huan, hichi ahia, Judah kumpipa Josiah tapa Jehoiakim vaihawm kum lina ah hiai thu
Laibuzial la inla, hiai ah na kiang a thu ka gen tengteng, Israel tungthu, Judah tungthu, nam tengteng tungthu, na kiang a thu ka gen ni a kipan Josiah hunlai a kipan tuni pha a thu gelh in

Judah inkawte’n a tung ua thil hoihlou hih ka tup tengteng, a ngaikhia un michih in a omdan gilou uh a heithei khamoh kei ding uh, a thulimlouhna uh leh a khelhna uh ka ngaihdam theihna ding in a chi hi.
Huchi in, Jeremiah in Neriah tapa Baruk a sam a, huchi in Baruk in
Huan, Jeremiah in Baruk kiang ah, “Khakkhum ka hi a,
Huaiziak in nang hoh inla,
Michih in a omdan gilou uh a hei un,
Huchi in Neriah tapa Baruk in zawlnei Jeremiah thupiak tengteng bang in
Huan, hichi ahia, Judah kumpipa Josiah tapa Jehoiakim vaihawm kum ngana, kha kua na ah Jerusalem mi tengteng leh Judah khopi a kipan a Jerusalem a hongpai tengteng in anngawl thu a phuangta uh.
Huan, Baruk in
Huan, Shaphan tapa Gemariah tapa Mikaiah in laibu a om

Kumpipa inn ah a hohsuk a, Laigelhmi dantan ah a lut a, huan, ngai dih, huai ah heutu tengteng a na tu ua, Laigelhmi Elishamte, Semaiah tapa Delaiah, Akbor tapa Elnathan, Shaphan tapa Gemariah, Hananiah tapa Zedekiah leh heutu tengteng.
Huan, Mikaiah in mite bil a zak in Baruk in laibu a sim thu a na zak tengteng a hilh a.

Huan, heutu tengteng in Kusi tapa, Shelemiah tapa Nethaniah tapa Jehudi Baruk kiang ah a sawl ua, a kiang ah, “Mite bil a zak a nasim laibu tawi in hong in” chi ding in. Huchi in Neriah tapa Baruk bel laibuzial tawi in a kiang uah a hong hi.
A kiang ah, “Tu inla, ka bil ua ka zak ngei un sim dihve leh” a chi ua, huchi in Baruk in a bil ua a zak un a simta.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huai thute a zak uleh lau in a ki en chiat ua, Baruk kiang ah, “Hiai thu tengteng kumpipa ka hilh ngeingei ding uh” a chi uhi.
Baruk kiang ah, “Hiai thu tengteng na kam a kipan bangchi dan a gelh na hia, honhilh in?” chi in a dong uhi.
Baruk in, “Hiai thu tengteng a paukam in a honhilh a, laitui in laibu ah ka gelh mai ahi” chi in a dawng hi.
Heutute’n Baruk kiang ah, “Kuan unla, Jeremiah toh bu un; kuamah in na omna uh theikei uhen” a chi uhi.
Huchi in, huangsung ah kumpipa kiang ah a lut ua; laibuzial bel Laigelhmi Elishama dantan ah a koih ua; a thu tengteng paukam in kumpipa a hilh uh.
Huchi in kumpipa’n laibuzial la ding in Jehudi a sawl a, Laigelhmi Elishama dantan a kipan a la uhi. Huan, Jehudi in kumpipa leh kumpipa kiang a ding heutu tengteng bil a zak in a sim hi.
Kha kua na ahia, kumpipa bel a phalbi in ah a tu a, a ma ah meihol thuk ah kuang a om hi.
Hichi a honghi a, Jehudi in khep thum hiam khep li hiam a sim in kumpipa in a temta in a at tan a, thuk mei ah a zial bu pum kangmang vek ding in a lawnlutzel hi.
Kumpipa leh a nasemmi’n hiai thu tengteng ngaikhia mite kuamah a lau kei ua, a puansilh uh leng a botkek sam kei uh.
Huai phet hilou in Elnathan leh Delaiah leh Gemariahte’n laibuzial hal lou ding in kumpipa kiang ah a ngen ua, himahleh a ngaikhe nuam kei.
Huan, kumpipa’n kumpipa tapa Jerahmeel leh Azriel tapa Seraiah leh Abdeel tapa Shelemiah Baruk Laigelhmi leh zawlnei Jeremiah man ding in thu a pia: himahleh
Huan, laibuzial leh Jeremiah kam a kipan Baruk in a gelh tengteng thute kumpipa’n a haltum khit in
Laibuzial dang la inla, laibuzial masa a thu tengteng, Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim in a hal mangsate gelh nawn vek in.
Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim tungtang thu ah huchi in na chi ding hi:
Huaiziak in, Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim tungthu ah

A thulimlouhna uh ziak in amah leh a suante leh a nasemmite ka gawt ding: amau leh Jerusalem a tengte leh Judah mite tung ah a tung ua ka phuansa, a ngaihkhiak kei uleh thil hoihlou tengteng ka hontun ding, chi in.

Huchi in Jeremiah in laibuzial dang a la a, Neriah tapa Baruk laigelhmi a pia a, aman huai ah Jeremiah kam a kipan laibu gelhsa tengteng, Jehoiakim in mei a a khulmangsa thute a gelh a: huaiban ah a kibatpih thu tampi a behlap lai hi.
Huan, Josiah tapa Zedekiah, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in, Judah gam kumpipa ding a a bawl Jehoiakim tapa Koniah sik in vai a hawmta a.
Himahleh amah leh a nasem mite leh a gam a mite’n
Huan, kumpipa Zedekiah in Shelemiah tapa Jehukal leh Maaseiah tapa siampu Zephaniah bel zawlnei Jeremiah kiang ah, “
Jeremiah bel mipite lak ah a utut in a vakthei lai a: tanna inn ah lah a koih ngal kei ua.
Pharo sepaih honte Aigupta a kipan a hong pawtkheta ua: huchi in Kaldaite Jerusalem um mite’n a tanchin a zak un Jerusalem a tawpsanta uhi.
Huchi in,
Israel Pathian in hichi in a chi: Judah kumpipa hondong ding a nou honsawl kiang ah, ngai in, Pharo sepaih hon, nou hon panpih ding a hongpaite amau gam Aigupta ah a kiknawn ding uh.
Kaldaite a hongding ua, hiai khopi a sual dingua, a la dingua, meiin a halding uh.
“Kaldaite’n a hon paisan ngei ding uh” chi in, nou kikhem kei un, a hon pai sankei ding uhi.
Nou honsual Kaldai sepaihte bawl ek mahle uchin, a lak ua miliam omsunte kia in leng amau puanin a kipan in hong thouin hiai khopi mei in a hal thouthou ding uh, chi in na gen ding ahi, chi in.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Pharo sepaih honte lau ziak a Kaldai sepaih honte’n Jerusalem a paisan lai un,
Jeremiah in mite lak a a tantuan la ding in Benjamin gam a lut ding in Jerusalem a pawtsan hi.
Benjamin kongpi a tun in ngakmi heutu Hananiah tapa Shelemiah tapa a min Irijah a na om a; huai in “Kaldaite kiang a kipia na hi” chi in zawlnei Jeremiah a na man hi.
Jeremiah in, “Zuau ahi; Kaldaite kiang ah ka kipe kei” a chi a: himahleh a ngaikhe kei a, huchi in Irijah in Jeremiah a na man a, heutute kiang ah a pia hi.
Huan heutute Jeremiah tung ah a heh mahmah ua, a sat ua, Laigelhmi Jonathan inn ah a khum uhi; huai tan in dia a zat him uh ahi.
Huchi in, Jeremiah leinuai kawkhuk ah a lut a, ni tampi tak a om nung in kumpipa Zedekiah in a samkhia hi.
Huan, kumpipa’n a inn ah a guk in a kiang ah “
Jeremiah in kumpipa Zedekiah kiang ah, “Nang hiam na nasemmi hiam hiai mite tung ah bang thil ahia ka hihkhelh a n’on matsak?
Nang kiang a ‘Babulon kumpipa nang leh hiai gam dou ding in a hongpai kei ding, chi a thu genmi na zawlneite koi a om ahita ua?’
Aw, ka pu, kumpipa ngaikhia in, k’on ngen ahi, ka ngetna na sang in, ka hon ngen hi; Laigelhmi Jonathan inn ah hon kiksak nawn ken, huai ah ka si kha ding hi” a chi hi.

Huchi in, kumpipa Zedekiah in thu a pia a, Jeremiah bel ngakmi huangsung ah a tangsak a, tanghou bawlmite kongzing a kipan niteng in tanghou beu khat, khopi a tanghou a omlai siah a pia ua, huchibang in Jeremiah bel ngakmi huangsung ah a om nilouh hi.
Huan, Mattan tapa Sephatiah leh Pashur tapa Gedaliah leh Shelemiah tapa Jukal leh Malkiah tapa Pashurte’n, mipi tengteng kiang ah Jeremiah in,
hichi in a chi: hiai khopi a om nilouhte zaw namsau, kial leh hipi in a si ding ua, Kaldaite kiang a kipia bel a hing ding ua, a hinna a ki humbit ding a a hing ding, chi in.
hichi in a chi: hiai khopi Babulon kumpipa sepaih honte khut ah piak ahi ngei ding a, a la ding, chi a a gen a ngaikhia uhi.

Huchi in, heutute’n kumpipa kiang ah, “Hiai mi hihlup hi hen, k’on ngen uh; aman a kiang ua hiai thute gen in hiai khopi a galkapmi omlaite leh mipi tengteng tha a hatkei sak a: hiai mi’n hiai mipite hoihna a zong kei a, a siatna a zong zaw hi” a chi uhi.
Huan, kumpipa Zedekiah in, “Ngai un, amah na khut ua om ahi: kumpipa na deihlouh lam uh hihthei ahi sam a” a chi hi.

Huchi in, Jeremiah a pi ua, ngakmi huangsung a om kumpipa tapa Malkiah lei nuai khuk ah a pailut ua; Jeremiah bel khau in a khe suk ua, huai lei nuai khuk ah buannawi kia loungal tui a omkei a: Jeremiah bel buannawi ah a kia hi.
Huan, Ethiopia mi, michilgeh kumpipa inn a om sek Ebed-melek in Jeremiah lei nuai khuk ah a koih uh chih a naza a; huchih lai in kumpipa bel Benjamin kongpi ah a tu a;
Ebed-melek bel kumpipa inn a kipan a pawt a, kumpipa kiang ah.

“Ka pu, kumpipa, hiai mite’n zawlnei Jeremiah lei khuk a a na paihkhiak uh thil gilou thupi mahmah hih ahi uh, gilkial ziak in a omna mun ah simai ding a kei maw; khopi ah tanghou a om nawn kei a,” a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa’n Ethiopia mi Ebed-melek thu a pia a, “Hiai a kipan in mi sawmthum pi inla, lei nuai kawkhuk a kipan in a sih ma in zawlnei Jeremiah va lakhia un” chi in.
Huchi in Ebed-melek in mite a pi a, kumpipa dangka inn nuai ah a lut ua, puanak lui paihte leh puansilh siate a lakhia ua, lei nuai khuk ah Jeremiah kiang ah khau in a khaikhe suk uh.
Huan, Ethiopia mi Ebed-melek in Jeremiah kiang ah, “Hiai puanak luite leh puansilh siate na lenuai ah khau in gakkhum in” a chi hi. Huan, Jeremiah in huchibang in a hih hi.
Huan, Jeremiah bel lei nuai khuk a kipan khau in a kaikhia ua: Jeremiah bel ngakmi huangsung ah a om nilouh ta hi.
Huan, kumpipa Zedekiah in Jeremiah a sam a,
Jeremiah in Zedekiah kiang ah, “Honhilh leng n’on that mahmah kei dia hia? Thu hon hanthawn leng hon ngaikhe lou ding chin a” a chi hi.
Huan kumpipa Zedekiah in Jeremiah kiang ah, “
Huchi in Jeremiah in Zedekiah kiang ah, “
Babulon kumpipa heutute kiang a na kipiak kei lebel hiai khopi Kaldai khut a piak ahi ding a, a hal ding ua, a khut ua kipan na suakta hetkei ding a chi” a chi hi.
Huan kumpipa Zedekiah in Jeremiah kiang ah, “Kaldai mite kiang a kipia Judahte khut ah a hon mansak in nuihzat in a honbawl kha ding uh ka lau ahi” a chi hi.
Jeremiah in bel, “A hon mansak kei ding uh; na kiang a ka gen
Kipiak na utkei lebel hiai
“Ngai in, Judah kumpipa inn a numei omlaite tengteng
Babulon kumpipa heutute kiang ah pi in a om ding ua, huai numeite’n,
Na lawm hoih hoihte’n a honkhem ua, a honzouta ua,
na khe buannawi a a tumtak in a hon lehngatsan ua” a chi ding uhi.
Na zite, na tanute Kaldai mite kiang ah a pivek ding ua, a khut ua kipan na suakta kei ding a, Babulon kumpipa khut a mat in na omzaw ding a, nang ziak in hiai khopi a kang ding” a chi hi.
Huan Zedekiah in Jeremiah kiang ah, “Hiai thute kuamah in theikei uhen, huchi in na si kei ding.

Himahleh heutute’n ka hon houpih a zak ua, na kiang a a hong ua, na kiang a, Kumpipa kiang a na gen honhilh in; ka lak uah bangmah im kenla, k’on that kei ding uh; na kiang a kumpipa thugente leng, a chih uleh,
Nang a kiang uah, Jonathan inn a hon kiksak lou a, huai a vasi lou ding in kumpipa kiang ah ngetna ka pelut lel ahi, na chi ding hi” a chi hi.
Heutu tengteng in Jeremiah kiang a a hongpai un, a dongta ngei ua, kumpipa’n thu a piak tengteng bang in amau a hilh hi. Huchi in a kihoupih un a tawp ua; a thu theih phak ahi kei hi.
Huchi in Jeremiah bel Jerusalem lak ni tan in ngakmi huangsung ah a om nilouh hi.
Huan, Judah vaihawm kum kua na kha sawmna ah Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar leh a sepaihte’n Jerusalem a sual ua, a um uh.
Zedekiah vaihawm kum sawmlehkhatna kha lina, kha ni kua na ah khopi kulh a phu pailet uh.

Huan, hichi ahia, Jerusalem a lak un Babulon kumpipa heutute a honglut ua, kongpi laita ah a tu ua, Nergal sharezarte, Samgar nebote, Sarsekim Rabsari mi Nergal sharezar Rabmag mi leh Babulon kumpipa heutu dangte toh.

Huan, hichi a honghi a, Judah kumpipa Zedekiah leh galkapmi tengteng in amau a muh un a taikek ua, khopi a kipan zan in kumpipa huai lampi lam ah kulh bang nih kikal kongpi ah a taikhia ua, amah pen Arabah lampi lam ah a pawt hi.

Himahleh Kaldaite sepaihhon in amah a delh ua, Jeriko phaizang ah Zedekiah a pha ua; huchi in, a mat nung un Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kiang ah, Hamath gam a Riblah khua ah a pi ua, aman a tungthu a ngaihtuah hi.
Huchi in, Babulon kumpipa’n Riblah khua ah amah mitmuh ngei in Zedekiah tapate a that a, Babulon kumpipa’n Judah mi hoihteng leng a that lai hi.
Huailou leng Jedekiah mit a khelkhia a, kol a bunsak a, Babulon ah a pita hi.
Kaldaite’n kumpipa inn leh midang inn tengteng a hal ua, Jerusalem kulh bangte leng a hihsia uh.
Huan, ngakmi heutu Nebuzaradan in khopi a mipi omlaite a kiang a amau a kipiate leh mipi omsunte Babulon ah sal in a pi a;
Himahleh ngakmi heutu Nebuzaradan in Judah gam mi genthei bangmah neiloute a nusia a, grephuan leh loute a pe pah ngal hi.
Huan, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in Jeremiah tungtang thu a ngakmi Nebuzaradan kiang ah,
Amah pi inla, hoihtak in bawl inla, hihna himhim ken, na kiang a a gen bangbang in hihzel zaw in, chi in thu a pia hi.
Huan, ngakmi heutu Nebuzaradan in Nebushazban Rabsari mi Nergal sharezar Rabmag mi leh Babulon kumpipa sepaih heutu deuhdeuhte a thukhak vek a, amau Jeremiah ngakmi huangsung a kipan a samkhia ua,
Shaphan tapa Ahikam tapa Gedaliah kiang ah a inn a puak ding in a kemsak ua, huchi in mite lak ah a omta hi.
Huan, ngakmi huangsung a khakkhum a a omlai in, Jeremiah kiang ah
Ethiopia mi Ebed-melek kiang ah, Sepaihte
Huai ni’n nang bel k’on hunkhe ding, chih
Nang lah k’on humbit ding a, namsau in na puk kei ding a, kei n’on muan ziak in, chih
Judah leh Jerusalem sal tengteng, Babulon sal a a pite uh lak a Jeremiah khainiang lenkawm a a pilai a ngakmi a pawtsak nung a
Ngakmi heutu in Jeremiah a pia, a kiang ah, “
a hon tungsakta ngei a, a gen bangbang in ahita hi;

Tuin, ngai in, tuni in na khut a khainiang but k’on phelsak ahi. Babulon a ka kiang a hong na ut leh hong inla, na ut kei leh hong dahmai in; en dih, gam tengteng na ma ah a om hi, hoh pha nasak leh hoih na sak bang in pai in.

A kik ma in aman, Judah khopite tung a ukpi dia Babulon kumpipa’n a bawl Shaphan tapa, Ahikam tapa Gedaliah kiang ah kik inla, mite lak ah a kiang ah om in, ahihkeileh hoh pha na saksakna ah hohmai in” a chi hi.
Huchi in ngakmi heutu in nekding leh thilpiak a pia a, a paisanta hi. Jeremiah bel Ahikam tapa Gedaliah kiang ah Mizpah khua ah a hoh a, a kiang a gam a omsun mite lak ah a om teita hi.

Huan, sepaih pawl heutu tengteng gamlak a omte’n, amaute leh a heute uh Babulon kumpipa’n, Ahikam tapa Gedaliah huai gam a mi genthei penpen, Babulon sal a pilouhte a kemsak chih a zak un Mizpah khua ah;
Gedaliah kiang ah a hongpai ua, Nethaniah tapa Ishmael, Kareah Johanan leh Jonathan, Tanhumet tapa Seraiah, Netophath khua a Ephai tate leh Maakat khua a mi tapa Jezaniah leh a heute uh.
Huchi in, Shaphan tapa, Ahikam tapa Gedaliah in amau leh a heute uh kiang ah, “Kaldaite nasep kihta kei un: gam ah om dinden unla, Babulon kumpipa na sem unla, nou ding in a hoihmai ding hi.

Kei zaw Mizpah khua ah ka om ding a, Kaldai mi ka kiang a hong dingte ma ah noute sik in ka ding ding: noute’n ahihleh uainte, nipi theite, thaute lakhawm unla na bel uah koih unla, na khopi laksate uah teng un” chi in a kichiam hi.

Huchi mah bang in Judah mi tengteng, Moab gam a tengte, Ammon mite lak a tengte leh Edom gam a tengte leh gamdang a omte’n Babulon kumpipa’n Judah mi khenkhat a nusia a, a tung uah Shaphan tapa, Ahikam tapa, Gedaliah a koih chih a zak un;
Judah mi tengteng a hawlzakna gam tengteng ua kipan in a hong paikik ua, Judah gam a Mizpah khua ah Gedaliah kiang ah a hongtung ua, uain leh nipi thei a lakhawm uhi.
Huailou leng Kareah tapa Johanan leh sepaih pawlte heutu, gamlak a om tengteng Mizpah khua ah Gedaliah kiang ah,
“Ammon mite kumpipa Baalis in na hinna la ding in Nethaniah tapa, Ishmael a sawl chih na za hia?” a chi uhi.

Huan, Kareah tapa Johanan in Mizpah khua a Gedaliah kiang ah, “Hon paisak dihve, Nethaniah tapa Ishmael ka vathat mai ding, kuamah in a theikei ding uh: Judah mi na kiang omkhawm tengteng a dalh vek ua, Judah mi omsunte manthatna hih ding in bangdia na hinna la ding ahia?” chi in a simtham in a gen hi.
Ahikam tapa Gedaliah in bel Kareah tapa Johanan kiang ah, “Hiai thil na hih ding ahi kei; Ishmael na gendan a dikkei hi” a chi hi.

Huan hichi ahi a, kha sagihna ah Elisha tapa Nethaniah tapa Ishmael, kumpi chi a mi, kumpipa upate lak a khat, mi sawm pi in Mizpah khua ah Ahikam tapa Gedaliah kiang ah a hong ua; Mizpah khua ah an a ne khawm uh.
Huan, Nethaniah tapa Ishmael bel a mipi sawmte toh ading ua, Shaphan tapa Ahikam tapa, Babulon kumpipa’n gam ukpipa dia a bawl Gedaliah namsau in a that uhi.
A kiang a Judah mi om tengteng, Mizpah khua a Gedaliah kiang a omte leh Kaldai galkap mi om teite Ishmael in a that lai hi.
Gedaliah a thah nung ni nih in hichi a honghi a, kuamah in a theih ma un,
Sekem a kipan, Shiloh a kipan, Samaria a kipan in mi sawmgiat, a khamul uh met a, a puansilhte uh kek a, amau ki at in, tanghou latte leh gimlimte tawi in

Nethaniah tapa Ishmael bel Mizpah khua a kipan in amau dawn ding in a pawtkhia a, lamtawn in a kapkap a: huan, hichi ahi a, amaute a muh in a kiang uah, “Ahikam tapa Gedaliah kiang ah hongpai un” a chi hi.
Huchi in, hichi a honghi a, khopi sung a tun uleh Nethaniah tapa Ishmael leh a mipite’n amau a na that ua, kawkhuk ah a pai uhi.
A lak ua mi sawmte’n bel, “Honthat kei un, gam ah buh, buhman, sathau leh khuaizu tampi ka sel ngal ua” a chi uhi. Huchi in amau a hawi ua, a unaute uh lak ah a that telta kei hi.
Huan, kawkhuk, Ishmael in Gedaliah toh a mi thahte luang a paihna bel kumpipa Asa in Israel kumpipa Baasha a kihtak ziak in a bawl ahi. Nethaniah tapa Ishmael in huai luangte in a dimsak hi.

Huchi in, Ishmael in Mizpah khua a mi hing a omsun, kumpipa tanute, Ahikam tapa Gedaliah kiang a ngakmi heutu Nebuzaradan in a kepsak, Mizpah khua a omlai tengteng toh sal in a pivek a; Nethaniah tapa Ishmael in huaite sal dia pi in Ammon mite zuan in a pawt hi.
Himahleh, Kareah tapa Johanan leh a kiang a om sepaih pawl heutu tengteng in Nethaniah tapa Ishmael thil hoihlou hih tengteng a na zak un mi tengteng a pikhia ua,
Nethaniah tapa Ishmael sual ding in a kuan ua, tui tampi omna mun Gibeon ah a va mu uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, Ishmael kiang ah mi tengteng in Kareah tapa Johanan leh a kiang a sepaih heutu tengteng a vamuh un a na kipak law mahmah uhi.
Huchi in Ishmael in Mizpah khua a kipan a sal a a pi tengteng a kihei ua, a kiknawn ua, Kareah tapa Johanan kiang ah a pai diam uhi.
Nethaniah tapa Ishmael bel mi giat toh Johanan a kipan a taikhe geigei ua, Ammon mite kiang ah a paita uhi.

Huan, Kareah tapa Johanan leh a kiang a sepaih pawl heutu tengteng in, Nethaniah tapa Ishmael in Ahikam tapa Gedaliah a thah nung a Mizpah khua a kipan Nethaniah tapa Ishmael lak a Johanan in a hutkhiaksa mi omsun tengteng, kidou mite, numeite, naupangte, michilgehte, Gibeon a kipan a a pinawnte a pivek hi.
Huchi in, a pawt ua, Kaldaite ziak a Aigupta gam a tailut tum in Bethlehem khaw kiang ah Geruth Chimham ah a khawl uhi.
Nethaniah tapa Ishmael in, Ahikam tapa Gedaliah, Babulon kumpipa’n huai gam ukpipa dia a bawl a thah ziak in amau a kihta mahmah uhi.
Huan, sepaih pawl heutute leh Kareah tapa Johanan leh Hoshaiah tapa Jezaniah leh mipi tengteng, a neupen a kipan a a lianpen tan in a hongnai ua, zawlnei Jeremiah kiang ah:

“Na ma ah ka ngetna uh pom hi henla, hiai omsun mi tengteng ading ngei in na Pathian kiang ah hon thumsak ding in k’on ngen uhi; n’on muh bang ngei in mi tampite lak a kipan tawmchik kia nutsiat in ka omta uhi.
na Pathian in ka paina ding thil uh hon kawkmuh theihna ding in ” a chi uhi.
Huchi in, zawlnei Jeremiah in a kiang uah, “Na thu uh ka za hi, ngai un, na thu uh bangbang in
Amau Jeremiah kiang ah, “
A sia hiam a pha hiam k’on sawlna uh
Huchi in, hichi a honghi a, ni sawm nung in
Huchi in, Kareah tapa Johanan leh a kiang a sepaih heutu om tengteng leh sepaih tengteng, neupen a kipan a lianpen tan in a sam a, a kiang uah,
Hiai gam a na omdet uleh k’on tungding ding a, k’on phelzak kei ding a, k’on phutkip ding a, k’on botkhe kei ding, na tung ua thil hoihlou ka tutte lah ka lungheita ngal a.
Babulon kumpipa na lau sek uh lau nawn kei un, amah lau kei un chih
Na tung ua zah a ngaih theihna ding in zahngaihna nou ka honphal ding a, na gam mah uah k’on kiksak ding hi.
Himahleh, hiai gam ah i omkei ding uh, chi a
Hi hetlou Aigupta gam ah i paizaw ding ua, huai ah kidouna himhim i tuak kei ding a, pengkul ging leng i za kei ding a, an taksap a omsam kei ding, huai ah i teng zaw ding uh, na chih uleh,
Aw Judah omsunte aw,

Aigupta gam a lutding leh huai a teng ding in kihei teitei na hih uleh hichi a honghi ding a, namsau na kihtak ngei un Aigupta gam ah hon pha ding a, kial na kihtak sek un leng Aigupta gam ah nou a hondelh zui ding a, huai ah na si ding uhi.
Aigupta gam a teng ding a kihei teiteite tengteng huchibang in a om ding ua, namsau, kial leh hi in na si ding uh, thil hoihlou a tung ua ka tut ding a kipan kuamah a suakta un a bit kei ding uh.
“Sepaihte
Aw Judah omsunte aw,
na Pathian uh kiang ah n’on sawl ua,
Tuni in na kiang uah ka phuangta ahi; himahleh na kiang ua a hon sawlna bangmah in
Huaiziak in tunzaw theita un, tenna na lunggulhna mun ngei uah namsau, kial leh hi in na si ngeingei ding uhi” chi in a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Jerusalem mipi tengteng kiang a
Hoshaiah tapa Azariah leh Kareah tapa Johanan leh mi kiphasak tengteng in, Jeremiah a houpih ua, a kiang ah, “Zuaugen na hi,
Kaldaite khut a matsak a ka om ua honthah theihna ding un leh Babulon sal dia hon pitheihna ding in Neriah tapa Baruk in kou honsual ding a honsawl ei zaw ve” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Kareah tapa Johanan leh sepaih pawl heutu teng leh mipi tengteng in Judah gam a teng ding in
Huchi in Kareah tapa Johanan leh sepaih pawl heutu tengteng in Judah omsun tengteng, Judah gam a teng ding a hawlzak a a omna namte uh lak a kipan a hongkik;

Pasalte, numeite, naupangte, kumpipa tanute leh michih ngakmi heutu Nebuzaradan in Saphan tapa, Ahikam tapa Gedaliah leh a kiang a a nutsiatte uh zawlnei Jeremiah leh Neriah tapa Baruk leng, a pikhawmvek zawta uhi.
Huchi in Aigupta gam a tungta ua,
Tahpanhes ah Jeremiah kiang ah
Suang lianpi la inla, Tahpanhes a Pharo inn lutna chin a teklei lep zutna ah Judah mite mitmuh ngei in phut in.
A kiang uah, Sepaihte
Huan, a hong ding a, Aigupta gam a honggawt ding, sihna tuam sihna ah, saltanna tuam saltanna ah, namsau tuam namsau ah.
Aigupta mite pathian innte ah meite a khah ding a, a kang ding, sal in a pi ding a; belamchingmi puan a silh bang in Aigupta gam a silh ding, huai a kipan in galmuang in a pawt ding.
Aigupta gam a Beth-shemesh suang khuam sang pipite a chimsak ding a, Aigupta pathian innte mei in a hal ding, a chi, chi in, a chi a.
Aigupta gam a Judah om tengteng, Migdol khua, Tahpanhes khua, Noph khua leh Pathros gam a tengte tungtang a Jeremiah kiang a thu hongtung:
Sepaihte
Amau nou leh na pipute un pathian dangte a theih ngei nailouh uh na sem ding leh a kiang ua gimlim hal in, kei hon hehsak ding a, a ginatlouhnate uh a hihkhit tak ziak un.
Huchi pipi in na kiang uah nasem zawlnei tengteng phalvak a thou in ka sawl a, a kiang uah, “Aw, hiai thu kihhuai, ka huatlam tak hihkei un” chi in.
Himahleh a ngaikhe tuankei ua, a ginatlouhna uh pathian dangte kiang a gimlim hallouh ding pen a ngeingaih kei uh.
Huaiziak in ka hehna leh ka thangpaihna Judah khopite leh Jerusalem kongzingte ah ka sung a a kuangta a, tuni a a om bang in a sia a, a segawpta hi.
Huaiziak in tuin zaw

Na vatenna uh Aigupta gam pathiante kiang a gimlim hal in khovel gam tengtengte lak a hamsethuak leh gensiat na hih theihna ding uh leh gawimang na hih theihna ding ua na khut thilhih ngei ua hon hehsak na hi uh.
Na pipute uh gitlouhnate, Judah kumpipate gitlouhnate leh na zite uh gitlouhna, Judah gam leh Jerusalem kongzing a a hihkhitsate uh na mangngilh ta ua hia?
Tunitan in leng a kisik tuankei ua, na pipute uh leh noumau ma a ka taklat ka dan leh ka dan bawlte na zuikei ua, na lau sam kei uh.
Huaiziak in, sepaihte

Huan, Judah omsun, Aigupta gam a ten tuma kihei teiteite ka man ding a, a chimit vek ding uh; Aigupta gam ah a puk ding ua, namsau leh kialte a hihman in a om ding uh; neupen a kipan a lianpen tan in namsau leh kial in a si ding uh.
Jerusalem ka gawt bangmah in Aigupta gam a tengte namsaute, kialte leh hipite in ka gawt ding ahi ngal a.

Huchi in Aigupta gam a teng ding a kuan Judah omsunte Judah gam, a omna ding ua kiknawn a ut mahmahna gam uah kik ding in khat lel leng hihdam in a suakta kei ding uh, a sim a taikhe kia loungal kuamah a kik kei ding uh.

Huchi in mi tengteng, a zite un pathian dang kiang a gimlim a hal chih theite leh numei huai a dingte mipi tampi, Aigupta gam a teng mipi tengteng in, Pathros ah Jeremiah a dawng ua, hichi in a chi uh:

Kou leh ka pipute uh, ka kumpipate uh leh ka heutute un Judah khopite ah leh Jerusalem kongzingte ah a na hihzel bang un van kumpinu kiang a gimlim halte leh a kiang a dawn ding thillat butkhiakte, ka paukam suak peuhmah bang un ka hih ngeingei ding uh; huchihlai in ka lamzang ua, nek leh dawn ding a tama, siatna himhim ka mu sam ua.
Van kumpinu kiang a thil hal leh a kiang a dawn ding thillat butkhiakte ka tawp nungsiah uh bang peuh ka tasamta zaw ua, namsau leh kialte a hihman in ka omta uhi.
Huan, numeite’n, Van kumpinu kiang a gimlim ka hal lai uh leh a kiang a dawn ding thillatte ka butkhiak uh?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Jeremiah in mipi tengteng, numei pasal amah dawngmite tengteng kiang ah,
“Judah khopite leh Jerusalem kongzingte ah, nou leh na pipute uh, na kumpipate uh leh na heutute uh, leh gam a mipite in gimlim a halte uh
Na thil gilou hihziak uleh na thil kihhuai hihte uh ziak in
Gimlim na hal ua,
Huailou leng Jeremiah in mipi tengteng leh numeite kiang ah, “Aigupta gam a Judah tengteng aw,

Nou leh na zite un, Van kumpinu kiang a gimlim hal leh dawn ding thillat butkhiakte ka na chiamsa bangzel in ka hih ngeingei ding, chi in na kam un na genta ua, na khut un na pichingsak lai uhi. ‘Na thuchiamte uh hihkip unla, na thu tupte uh tangtung sak vanglak un.’
huaiziak in, nou Judah, Aigupta gam a tengte aw,
Ngai in, a hoihna ding uh hilou in a siatna ding un amau ka tang thek ahi: huchi in Judah mi, Aigupta gam a omte tengteng, namsau leh kialte a hihman in a om ding uh, a manthat vek matan un.

Namsau hihman val tawmchik Aigupta gam a kipan a pawt in Judah gam ah a lut ding uh; huan, Judah mi omsunte tengteng, Aigupta gam a teng ding a kuan mite’n kua thu ahia paizaw ding, ka thu hia amau thu, a thei ding uh.
Huan, hiai nou ading in chiamtehna ahi ding: ka thu na tung uah thil hoihlou lam ding in a pai ngei ding hi chih na theihna ding un hiai mun ah nou ka hon gawt ding ahi chih

hichi in a chi: Ngai un, Pharo Hophra, Aigupta kumpipa bel a melma, a hinna zong mite khut ah ka mangsak ding, Judah kumpipa Zedekiah, a melma, a hinna zawngmi Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar khut a ka piak bangmah in” a chi a.
Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim, Josiah tapa kum lina ah Jeremiah kam a kipan hiai thute laibu a a gelh lai a Neriah tapa Baruk kiang a zawlnei Jeremiah thugen:
Israel Pathian in, Aw Baruk, na kiang ah hichi in a chi: Nang, ka tunggikta na mai e:
“Ka thuakna ah lungkhamna a hon behlapta ngal a: ka thum ka bahpih a, tawldamna ka mu zoukei” na chi hi.
A kiang a hichia na gen ding ahi:
Huan, nang ading in thil thupi na zong hia? Zong dah mai in: sa tengteng tung ah thil hoihlou k’on tungsak ding a, chih
Namte tungtang a zawlnei Jeremiah kiang a
Aigupta thu, Euphrates luigei a Karkhemish khua a om, Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim, Josiah tapa kum lina a Nebukadnezzar in a bawl ek Aigupta kumpipa Pharo Neko sepaih hon tungtang thu:
Lum bemte, lum zawlte mansa in om unla, gal nawt un,
Sakol van unla, sakol tuang
mite aw, tuang un, dal lukhu khu in ding kip unla,
tei tat-hiam in sik puanak silh un.
Bangchidan, a taikekta uh!
A dek uh a ngat uh,
a galkapmite uh a vuallel uh,
baksam leng zen in a tai ua,
nunglam nga hetlou in,
ning chih ah gal a lang chih
Mi zuanzang a taimang theikei,
galkapmi a pawt tuankei uh,
huai a mi Euphrates luigei ah
a hawi ua, a puk khinta uh.
Nile lui bang a khang kua ahia?
Luipi tui kihot kimvel bang in?
Aigupta Nile lui bang in a khang a luipi tui kihot kimvel bang mai in,
ka khang ding a,
leitung ka luahsuak ding,
khopi leh a luahte ka hihse ding, a chi hi.
Aw sakolte aw, nawk zel unla,
aw kangtalai aw, nakpi’n pang un:
galdoumite’n ma phu uhenla,
Ethiopia mi leh Put mi,
lum tawimite, Lud mi
thalpeu zang siamte toh.
Huai ni ahi,
sepaihte
a melmate tung a phu a lak theihna, namsau in a gai ding a,
a tai ding, a sisan uh taitak in a dawn ding;
sepaihte
Aw, Aigupta tanu siangthou,
Gilead ah hohtou inla,
sing nai nuh chi vala in,
damdawi tampi a thawn in na zangta,
nang ading in damna himhim a omkei hi.
Namte’n na zahlakna a za ua,
na kah in lei pumpi a dim hi, galhatmi leh galhatmi a kiphu ua,
lei ah a puk khawm uh, chi in.
Nebukadnezzar, Babulon kumpipa a hongpai a, Aigupta gam a hong bawl ek ding dan thu
Aigupta gam ah gen unla,
Migdol ah phuang un;
Noph leh Tahpanhes ah phuang unla;
ding kip in kigalging un;
na kim a mi namsau in a gaita ngal a.
Bangdia na mi hatte
phiatmang a om ahi ua?
A ding zou kei ua,
a paihkhiak ziak in.
Mi tampi a kisui sak a, ahi,
a kiphu puk lemlum ua,
Nuaisiahna namsau taisan in
kisa un, i kik ding uh,
i pianna gam ah i mite kiang ah, a chi uhi.
Aigupta kumpipa Pharo pen
husa lian lel, a hun sehsa a paimang sak a om,
chi in huai ah a kikou uhi.
A hin a ka hin sung in chih
Kumpipa, a min sepaihte
tangte lak a Tabor tang bang in tuipi chin a
Karmel tang bang in a hongpai ngei ding.
Aw nang, tanu,
Aigupta gam a teng, saltang ding in kibawl mai in:
Noph khua a segawp dek a,
teng ding omlou in a kang mang ding hi.
Aigupta bel bawngla hoihtak
ahi, himahleh mal a kipan nasemmi ding hong kuan in a hongpai hi.
A lak ua sepaih goih laite bel bawngtuai vak thau bang mai ahi ua,
a dek uh a ngat ua,
a taikek ua, khawllou in,
a tung uah a siatna ni uh a tungta,
a gawtna hun ding uh:
Gulpi kitholh bang mai in husa a nei a,
a melmate kiton in a hongpai ua,
singphukmite bang in hei toh a hongsual uh.
A gam gammang vaksuak zoh
louh a hong hihse ding uh,
khaukhup sang in a tamzaw ua,
simsenglouh ahi uhi.
Aigupta tanu a zahlak ding,
mallam a mi khut a matsak in a om ding.
Sepaihte
A hinna uh, zong mite khut ah leh Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar leh a nasemmite khut ah ka mansak ding: huai hun chiang in luah in a om ding, nidanglai nite mah bang in, chih
Aw Jakob, ka nasempa,
lau kenla, aw Israel,
lunglel sam ken, Ngai in,
gamlapi a kipan nang k’on hunkhe ding a,
na suante leng a saltanna gam ua kipan,
Jakob a hongkik ding a,
muangtak in a om hiathiat ding a,
kuamah in a lausak nawn kei ding uh.
Aw Jakob, ka nasempa, lau ken,
k’on ompih ahi, chih
ka hondelh zakna nam tengteng ka beisak ding a,
nang zaw k’on beisak hetkei ding:
diktak in k’on gawt ding a,
gawtlouh in k’on khak kei ding hi.
Pharo in Gaza a gawt ma a Philistia mite tungtang a zawlnei Jeremiah kiang a
hichi in a chi:
Ngai un, mal a kipan in tui a hong khang hi, a kuang dim in a luang let ding;
gam a tum ding a asung a om tengteng toh,
khopi leh asung a tengte leng;
mite a kap ding ua,
gam a mi tengteng a mau tuaituai ding uh.
A sakol hat chinte leitot ging in kidou kangtalai ging dopdop in,
a kangtalai ging in,
pate a lunglel ua,
a tate uh enlou zen in.
Philistia mi tengteng lohna ni,
Tura leh Sidon a kipan a panpihmi omsunte sattanna ni ziak in,
Gaza mite lu a hong giauta,
Askelon a chimitta a,
a gam phaizang a teng laite;
bang tan kiat ding na hia?
Aw
kinken ma bang tan ahia?
Na pai ah kikhum in;
khawl inla om kinken ve.
a honseh a, hih ding a honpiak ngal leh bangchi’n na om kinken thei dia?
Moab tungtang thu: sepaihte
Pathian in hichi in a chi:
Nebo tung a gik hi:
hihgawp in a omta:
Kiriathaim bel zahlak sak in a omta, laksuan ahi.
Misgab bel zahlak leh hihsiat in a omta.
Moab minthanna a mangta;
Heshbon ah a siatna ding gen in,
Kisa un, nam a hihna kipan i hihmang ding uh, a chi ua.
Aw Madmen khua, nang leng daihsak sipsip na hi ding a,
namsau in a hondelh ding.
Horonaim a kipan a kikou husa,
lohna leh siatna thupi mahmah.
Moab a a mang hi, a tate kap ging zak in a om hi,
Luhithte ah kap in a paitou ua,
Horonaim sul ah manthatna
kikou ging lunglelhhuai a za uh.
Tai mang unla, na hinna uh humbit un,
gamdai gam sabiltung bang in om un.
Na nasep leh na sum leh pai na muan ziak in nang leng mat in na om ding hi;
Khemosh sal a pi ahi ding a,
a siampute leh a heutute toh.
Khaw chih ah hihsemi a hontung ding,
khaw khat lel in leng a pel kei ding;
phaizang gam leng a mang ding;
phaizang hihsiat ahi ding.
A lenmang theihna ding in
Moab kha pia unla,
a khuate a segawp ding a,
tengmi omlou in.
Limsaklou tak a Pathian nna semmi hamsethuak in om henla, sisan a suah ding a a namsau zang nuamlou mi hamsethuak in om hen.
A tuailai a kipan Moab in nuam a sa a, a uain a bohkhum a, bel dang a teituah leng a tuak kei a, sal a pi in a om ngeisam kei hi, a lim ngeingei a lim gige in, a gim leng a lamdang tuankei.
huaiziak in ngai un, Ni a hongtung hi, a bungkhe ding mi k’on sawl ding a, huan amau a bungkhe ding uh, chih
Israel inkawte’n a muanpi pen uh Bethel a zahpih bang un Moab in Khemosh a zahpihta ding hi.
Pasal hoih leh galdou mi hangsan i hi ua,
bangchidan a chi na hi ua?
Moab bel hihgawp in a om a,
a khopi meikhu in a zam khinta,
a tangval hoih teng a pukkhinta chih Kumpipa, a min sepaihte
Moab siatna a hongtung lellel,
a thuakna ding a kinoh hi.
Nou a kim a miteng in amah sun in a min thei teng in
chiang khauh leh chiang
thupi a kitanta hi, chi un.
Aw nang tanu, Dibon a teng,
na thupina paisan inla,
dangtak in tuin:
Moab lokmin nang a hon sual a,
na kulhte a hihseta hi.
Aw Aroer a teng nu, kongbul ah
ding in, enkhia in, taikekpa,
suaktanu dong inla,
Bang a maizen a? chi in.
Moab zahlaksak in a omta,
a chim gawpta ngal a,
mau tuaituai in kap un, Moab hihsiat ahita,
chih Arnon ah phuang un.
Gam tampi tung ah; Holon, Zahjah, Mephaath,
leh Dibon, Nebo, Bethdiblathiam,
leh Keriathiam, Bethgamul, Bethmenon,
leh Kerioth, Bozrah leh Moab gam a khua tengteng, a gamla leh a nai ah vaihawmna a hongtungta hi.
Moab ki attan in a om a, a ban hihtan in a omta, chih
Amah khamsak unla;
Israel nang ding nuihzabawlna ahita kei maw? Gutate lak ah a tel ahia? Amah tungtang na gen teng in na lu na sinkhum hilou hiam?
Moab a tengte aw, khopite taisan unla, kawl kikal ah teng un, vakhu, kawhawm geia bu bawlsek bang in om un.
Moab kisaktheihna ka zata ua, a kisathei ngutve, a kikoih sandan, a kisaktheih dan, a kiotsak dan leh a lungtang ki deihkhop dante.
A hehna bangmah ahi kei chih ka thei; a kiotsaknate’n bangmah a hihkaw kei, chih
Huchi in Moab tung ah ka mau tuaituai ding a, ahi, Moab pumpi ading in ka kap ding, Kir hareseth mite sun ahi ding uh.
Jazer kap sang a thupi in ka honkah ding a, aw Sibmah grepkung, na hiangte tuipi tung ah a kiphalh a, Jazer tuipi leng a tung hialta a, na nipi thei leh grep gahte hihsemi in a bawm hi.
Nuamna leh kipahna a mangkhin hi, theibil leh Moab gam a kipan: uain sukna khuk a ka uain ka beisakta a, kuamah in nuamsa a kikou in a chil nawn kei ding uhi.
Heshbon leh Elealeh ah a kikou ua, Jahaz tan in aw a suah ua, Zoar a kipan Horonaim tan, Eglath shelishijah tan in leng, Nimrim tui kim a dai ding hi.
Huailou in Moab mun sangte thillanmi leh a pathiante adia gimlim halmi ka hihmang ding,
Huchi in tamngai bang in ka lungtang Moab ading in a ging a, Kir hareseth mite ding in tumging bang in ka lungtang a ging hi; huaiziak in niang leh tai a thil a muhsate a mangthang khinta hi.
Lu chiteng metgiau ahi a, khamul chiteng met ahi; khut tengteng at ahi a; kongte ah saiip puan a om chiat hi.
Moab inn tung tengteng, kongzing leh munchih ah kahna a om a; Moab bel phatuam nawnlou bang in ka hihkham khinta hi, chih
Seta namai e! Segawp zou hina tel e: Moab zahlak in a lehngat tave: huchi in Moab bel a kimvel a mite tengteng adin nuihzabawlna leh mulkimhuai a hong hita hi.
Kerioth lak a hi a, a kulhte a phawng guih a, huai ni’n Moab pasalphate lungtang numei nauvei lungtang bang mai ahi ding.
Moab a mangthang ding, nam a ching nawn kei ding;
Launa, kawkhuk leh tangte, aw Moab luahmi, na tung ah a tung hi, chih
Launa taisanmi kawkhuk ah a ke ding, kawkhuk a pawt thang ah a awk ding, a gawtna kum ka hontun ding ngal a, a tung ah, Moab tung ah ngei, chih
Heshbon lim ah taikekpawl bahgawp in a khawl ding ua, Heshbon a kipan in mei a pawt a, Sihon lak a kipan in meikuang, chiak vengvungmite sip a sam toh Moab baksam a kang khin hi.
Na tung a gik hi, aw Moab! Khemosh mite a mangta ua; na tapate sal a pi in, na tanute sal in a tangta uhi.
Himahleh ni nanung chiang in Moab omdan ka hei ding a, chih
Ammon mite thu,
Huaiziak in, ngai un, nite a hongtung hi, chih
Aw Heshbon, mau tuaituai inla, Ai a lok khinta ua; Rabah tate aw, kap un, kap unla, umna sungte ah vial tai un. Kumpipa, siampu leh a mi liante toh sal a pi in a om ding uhi.
Bangdia na guam hoihte suang na hia, aw muanhuailounu a neih hoihhoihte muang a, Kua ahia honsual ding, chichi nakmi?
Ngai in, launa na tung ah ka hontun ding a, na kim a mi tengteng a kipan, chih
Huaikhit chiang in bel Ammon tate omdan ka kiheisak ding, chih
Edom thu, Sepaihte
Aw Dedan a tengte aw, taikek unla, lehngat unla, tummang vengveng un; amah ka gawt hun chiang in, Esau siatna a tung ah k’on tun ding hi.
Grep loumite na kiang a a hongpai un, maih a neikei ding ua hia? Zan a guta mite’n a deihzah uh a ngah masiah un a a lok zel kei ding ua hia?
Esau ka vuaktang sakta a, a guk khuhte ka hongta, a bu thei nawn kei ding. A suante hihsiat ahi ua, a unaute, a invengte toh, a omta kei.
Na tagahte limsak ken, ken ka hum ding, na meithaite’n kei hon muang uhen.
keimah kilou in ka kichiamta ngal a, Bozrah lamdang sak chiat, gen siat, hihgawp, hamsethuak ahi ding, a khua tengteng leng a segawp tawntung ding, a chi.
Ngai in, mihingte muhsit in namte lak nang k’on neusakta hi.
Na kihih mulkimhuaina tak na lungtang kisathei in a hon khemna ahi, aw nang kawl suangkal a, mualvum a tengzel, mu bang in, sangpi ah bu sep mahle chin, huai a kipan in k’on lakhe suk ding, chih
Huchi in, Edom bel lamdangsak chiat a honghi ding a, mi vialvak peuh in lamdang a sa ding ua, a naksiat ziak in a tekkhum ding uh.
Sodom leh Gomorrah leh a kim a khopite hihsiat a om mah bang in, kuamah a teng nawn kei ding ua, mihing ta kuamah huai ah a om ngei nawn kei ding uh.

Ngai un, Jordan gam gammang a kipan a humpinelkai, gan khahna mun ah a hong tou ding a; amah a kipan amau ka taimang sak pah ding a, a tung a thunei ding in ka utut ka sep ding. Keimah bang kua ahia om? Kuan ahia hunbi honkhiah sak ding? Belamchingmi kua ahia ka ma ading ding pen?
Huaiziak in Edom tung a
A puksiatna husa uah lei a ki sing a; a kap husa uh Tuipi san ah leng zak ahi ding.
Ngai un, muvanlai bang in a hong lengtou ding a; Bozrah tung ah kha a zak ding: huai ni’n Edom mi hangsante lungtang numei nauvei lungtang banglel ahi ding hi.
Damaska thu. Hamath zumta, Arpad toh, thu hoihlou a zata ngal ua, a zulta uh; tuipi kihot om kinken theilou bang in a buai uh.
Damaska a thazaw, taikek a tuma, linna in a lap a, Lungkhamna leh natna in numei nauvei bang mai in a lenta hi.
Khopi minthang leh kipahhuai khingta namai e:
Huchi in huai ni’n a tangval honte kongtual ah a puk ding ua, galdoumi tengteng a mangthang ding uh, chih sepaihte
Damaska kulh bang ah mei ka khah ding a, Benhadad kumpipa innte a kang khin ding hi.
Kedar leh Hazor gamte Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in a gawtna thu:
A puaninte uh, a ganhonte uh a laksak ding ua, a puanzakte uh, a tuium-belsuan tengteng uh, a sangawngsaute uh a paimang pih ding uh, ning chih ah launa a om a, chi in mite’n a kikou khum ding uh.
Tai kek unla, vak mang vengveng un, tummang vengveng unla, Aw Hazora tengte aw, chih
Thou unla, lungmuangtak a om, amah a khosa, kulh kongkhak leng neilou, kalhna siktawn leng neilou nam sual un, chih
A sangawngsaute uh gal in a la ding ua, a bawnghonpi uh a lok ding uh. Baksam metgiau honte ning chih ah ka dalhsak ding, a siatna ding uh ning chih a kipan in ka hontun ding, chih
Huan, Hazor bel sihna tenna mun ahi ding a, a segawp tawntung ding, huai ah kuamah a teng nawn kei ding uh, mihing tate a omta kei ding uh.
Judah kumpipa Zedekiah vaihawm pattungna Elam tungtang a
Sepaihte
Kawlmong li a kipan in huih lite ka hontun ding, Elam tung ah; ka dalhsak ding, kawlmong chih ah, Elam delhkhiak mite phak louh nam a omkei ding uh.
A melma uh, a hinna uh zongmite ma ah, Elamte ka lunglel sak ding, a tung uah siatna ka hontun ding, ka hehna mahmah tak, chih
A kumpipate uleh a heutute uh hihmang in Elam ah ka mangtutphah ka tung ding, chih
Himahleh ni nanungte ah hichi ahi ding, Elam omdan ka kiheisak ding, chih
Babulon tungtang, Kaldai mite gam tungtang a zawlnei Jeremiah kam a
Namchih lak ah gen unla,
phuang un, puanzak khai in,
phuang un, selkei un,
Babulon lak ahita.
Bel a zahlak a,
Marduk mulkimna in a dim a,
milimte a se khinta.
Mal a kipan amah nam khat in a honsual a, huai in a gam a hihgawp ding a, huai ah kuamah a teng nawn kei ding ua; a taikek ua, mi leh sate leng a mangkhinta uhi.
Huai nite in leh huai hun chiang in Israel tate a hongpai ding ua, amau leh Judah tate toh; kap kawm in a hongpai ding ua,
Zion lam nga in a kalsuanna ding uh a dong ding ua, Kisa un, tangtawn thukhun mangngilh nawnlou ding in
Ka mite zaw belam mang ahi ua; amau chingmite’n a pimang ua, mualte ah a paimang sak ua, tangte, mual dungte ah a pai ua, a huang uh a mangngilh khinta uhi.
A mu peuh in a ne zel ua, a melmate un, I gilou kei,
Babulon sung a kipan in taikhia unla, Kaldaite gam a kipan paikhia unla, kelhon lak a keltalte bang in om un.

Ngai dih ua, Babulon hongsual ding in mal gam a kipan nam honpi thupitak kikaikhawm ka tokthou ding a, amah dou ding in a kisa ding ua: huai a kipan in lak ahi ding uh: a thalte uh lah galbawl siamtak vuaksuak ngeilou bang ahi ding uh.
Huan, Kaldai loh in a om ding, a lok mite a tai ngial ding uh, chih
Kipak mahle uchin, nuamsa mahle uchin, aw ka goutan lok mite aw, lou lak ah bawngla takhialkhial bang leh sakoltal ham ngekngek bang himahle uchin;
Na nu uh a hongzum mahmah ding a, nou hon suangnu a hong zahlak ding hi. Ngai un, namte lak a nuainungpen, gamdai, gamkeu, gamvuak ahi ding.
hehna ziak in luahmi a omkei ding a, a sevek zaw ding hi, Babulon hoh peuhmah a mulkimsak ding a, a siatna tengteng ziak in a tek ding uhi.
Thalpeu tawimi tengteng aw, Babulon umsuak in kivual unla, kap unla, thalte chil kei un,
A kimvel in awng unla, amah leh amah a kipeta, a kulhte a pukta a, a bangte a chimta,
Babulon a kipan chi thehmi attan unla, buhlak lai a kawite tawimi toh, nuaisiahna namsau lau in amau mite lam a zuan chiat ding ua, amau gam chiat ah a tai ding uh.
Israel bel belam dalhzak ahi a; humpinelkaite’n a delhmang ua; Assuria kumpipa’n amah a ne phot a, a tawp in Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in a guhte a haizanta hi.
Huaiziak in sepaihte
Huan, Israel a tatna ah ka pinawn ding a, Karmel leh Bashan ah a ta ding a, Ephraim tang ah leh Gilead ah amah a ta ding hi.

Huai nite leh huai hun chiang in Israel thulimlouhnate a zong ding ua, muh ding a omkei ding; Judah thilhihkhelhte leng muh ding a omsam kei ding; omsun ding a ka koihte ngaidam ding ka hi ngal a, chih
Merathim gam sual un, a gam leh Pekod luah mite mahmah; that unla, hihgam sipsip unla, thu ka honpiak bangbang in hih un, chih
Huai gam ah gal husa a om, siatna thupi mahmah husa toh.
Khovel pumpi sek kitam in, nak keknen hina tele: Namte lak ah Babylon kinaksiat nah e!
Aw Babulon, nang ding in thang na kam a, theilou a awk neita ve; muhkhiak leh mat in na omta,
a galvan bawm a hongta, a hehna vanzatte a lakhia a,
Gamgi tawp pek a kipan in honsual unla, a thil koihkhawmna innte hong vek unla, paikhawm unla, hihse vek un, a bangmah hawi kei un.
A bawngtal tuaite that vek unla, goh in om uhen. A tung uh gik hinatel e! A ni uh, amaute gawtna ni mahmah a hongtungta hi.
Babulon sual ding in thalkap siam, thalpeu zangmi tengteng samkhawm un; a kimvel in buk bawl unla, kuamah suakta kei uhen; A thilhih bangbang in thuk un, a hihsa bang tengteng amah tung ah hih un:
Huaiziak in tangvalte a kholakte ah a puk ding ua, galkapmi tengteng huai ni’n a mangthang ding uh chih
Ngai in, nang mi kisathei, ka hondou ahi,
Huan mi kisathei a kisui in a puk ding a, kuamah in a phong kei ding ua, a khopite ah mei ka khah ding a, a kimvel a om tengteng ka kang siangsak vek ding.
Sepaihte
Amah amau lam ah a pang a, Babulon a tengte hihbuai in, khovel a muanna a tut theihna ding in.
Kaldai mite tung ah namsau
a leng hi, Babulon a tengte,
a heutute uh leh a mipilte uh tung ah leng,
chih
Mi zuautheite tung ah namsau,
mihai a hongsuak ding uh:
a galkap mi tung ah namsau,
a lunglel khin ding uh.
A sakolte uh leh kangtalaite uh tung ah namsau,
a sung a mi kilak hel tengtengte tung ah leng,
numei bang phet a honghi ding uh:
a gou thil tung ah namsau lok in a om maimai ding uhi.
A tuite kangin a keu khin a,
milimte gam lah ahi ngal a,
milimte lah a hailoh uhi.
Huaiziak in gamdai gam sahang, ngia toh huai ah a teng ding ua, Ostrik leng huai ah a teng ding uh; luah in a om ngei nawn kei ding; suan tengteng pha in leng luah in a omkei ding hi.
Pathian in Sodom leh Gomorrah leh a khaw invengte a hihsiat bangbang in; huai ah kuamah a tengta kei ding ua, mihing ta kuamah in a veh nawnta kei ding uh,
Ngai un, mallam gam apan mite a hong ua,
mun tawp a kipan nam thupitak leh kumpipa tampi a hong kuan uhi.
Thalpeu leh tei a tawi ua,
hiamgam tak, zahngaihna neilou ahi uh.
A husa uh tuipi ging huhu bang ahi a, sakol tung ah a tuang ua,
michih galkapmi bang a kivan in,
Babulon tanu aw,
nang a hongsual ding uhi.
A husa uh za in Babulon kumpipa khut a zawgawpta a,
numei nauveilai natna bang in,
natna thupitak in a manta hi.

Ngai un, Jordan gammang a kipan humpinelkai, kahna mun a a hongtou bang in a hong paitou ding a; amah a kipan in amaute ka taimangsak pah ding; a tung a thunei ding ka utut ka sep ding. Kei bang kua a om a! Kuan sep ding. Kei bang kuakua a om a? Kuan ahia hunbi hon sehsak ding? Belamchingmi kua ahia ka ma ading ding?
Huaiziak in Babulon tung ah
Babulon lakna husa ah lei a ling ding a, a kahna husa namte lak a zak ahi ding hi.
Zapsiangmi ka sawl ding, Babulon tung ah, amah zap in a gam a zapsiang ding ua, siatna ni’n um in a sual ding ahi ngal ua.
Thalpeu zangmi in thalpeu lailou in, sik puanak silh in, ding kei heh, tangval hon khat leng hawilou in, a sepaih tengteng nuai mang un.
Kaldai gam ah thah in a puk ding ua, a kholakte uah sut pailet in a om ding uhi.
Israel leh Judah, a gam uah Israel Mi Siangthou tung ah khelhna in a dim na ua, a Pathian uh sepaihte
Taimang unla, Babulon khaw sung a kipan, michih in amah hinna humbit hen; a thulimlouhna man loh kei un,
Babulon bel
Babulon bel a puk guih a, a mangta, amah kah ekek un, hihdam theih ding dan ahihleh singnai damdawi nuh chi laksak un.
Babulon hihdam ka tuma, a dam tuan ngal kei a, amah nusia in eimah gam chiat uah pai ni, a mawhna in van a suna, van dum pha a dopkang ahi.
Thalte tat-hiam unla, lumte len un, Media kumpipate lungsim
Babulon kulh bul ah kidouna puan zakthak un, venna hihhat in, galvilmi koih un, galbuknate bawl unla, Babulon mite tungtang thu ah
Aw nang, tui tamna mun a tengmi, sum leh pai hau mahmah, na tawpna a tungta, na hinna khau a kitanta hi.
Sepaihte
A thilhihtheihna in lei a bawl a,
A pilna in khovel a ding khesak a,
a lemtheihna in van a phalhsak.
A aw a suah a, van a tui a ging hawhaw a,
kawlmong a kipan meipi a paitou sak a, vuah zukna ding in khua a phesak a,
a goubawm a kipan huih a nungsak.
Michih a mual ua, theihna lou
in, dangkaeng sek michih in a lim sek pen a zumpih ua,
a milim sun lah zuau ngen ahi a,
amau ah nakna a omkei lai hi.
Bangmahlou, khemna nasep lel ahi ua,
a gawt hun chiang in a mang ding uh.
Jakob tantuan zaw hichibang ahi kei, thil tengteng bul ahi;
Israel a gouluah nam ahi a,
a min sepaihte
Nang bel ka galdouna heipi leh
vanzat na hi a,
nang honzang in namte ka
hih zan a, nang zang in lalna
gamte ka hihmang hi.
Nang honzang in sakol leh a
tung a ka hihzan a,
nangmah zang in kangtalai
leh a tung a tuang ka hih zan a;
Nangmah zang in numei leh pasal ka hihzan a,
nangmah zang in putek leh tuailai ka hihzan a,
nangmah zang in nungak leh tangval ka hihzan hi.
Nangmah zang in belamching
leh belamhon ka hihzan a,
nangmah zang in lou neimi leh bawngtal kop ka hihzan a,
nangmah zang in gam ukpipate leh upate ka hihzan sek ahi.
Nang mitmuh ngei in Zion tung a a thil hoihlou hih tengteng uh Babulon leh Kaldai mite tung ah ka thuk ding, chih
Ngai in, lei pumpi hihsia, aw hihsetu tang lian, nang ka hondou ahi, chih
Nang a kipan suang ning ding leh suangphum ding lakkhiak ahi nawn kei ding; tangtawn in na segawp zaw ding, chih

Huai gam ah kidou puanzak tak unla. Namte lak ah pengkul mut un, amah dou ding namte kisa sak unla, Araratte, Minnite, Askenaz gamte, amah sual ding sepaih sep unla, khaupe zuanzang bang mai in sakolte kaikhawm un.
Amah dou ding namte kisa sak un, Media kumpipate, ukpipate leh upate, a thuneihna gam tengteng toh.
Huai gam nat thuak in a ling a, Babulon gam, tengmi omlou a hihsiat ding in, Babulon tung a
Babulon galdoumite’n galkap ding ngapta lou in, a kulhpi uah a ton maimah uh, a pasalphatna uh a khing a, numei bang mai a hong hita ua, a tenna munte a kangkhin a, a deidanna siktawn a kitan hi.
Thangkou tai in midang leng a ki tuahpih a, misawl in leng midang a tuak a, Babulon kumpipa kiang a a khopi ning chih ah a manta uh chih hilh ding in.
Lui kannate a man ua, phailuangte a hal siang ua, kidoumite leng a lunglelta uh.
Sepaihte
Hon negaita, Babulon kumpipa
Nebukadnezzar in, hon haizan a,
bel vuak lel in a hon bawlta,
gulpi bang in hon nawmvalhta,
ka thil limte’n a gilpi a dimsak a,
a hon paikhe nawnta hi.
Kei leh ka sa tung a hiamgam thilhih,
Babulon tung ah om hen;
ka sisan Kaldai mite tung ah om hen,
Jerusalem in a chi ding.
Huaiziak in
Huan, Babulon bel hoihlou paihkhawm lel, sehal tenna mun, lamdang sak chiat leh enghou, tengmi omlou mun a honghi ding.
A kikou ton ding ua, humpinelkai lunlai bang in, a ngik tuaktuak ding ua, humpinelkai nou bang in.
A kham mahmah lai un Ankuang ka luisak dia, khothei hetlou in ka khamsak dia, khanglou hetlou ding a a ihmut den theihna ding un, chih
Ka pikhe ding a, belam goh ding bang in, belamtalte keltalte bang mai in.
Shesak lak ahita ve: lei pumpi pahtawi zel mat in a omta ve, namte lak ah Babulon a segawpta ve:
Babulon tuipiin a tumta, a kihot thupi mahmah in a khuh khinta.
A khopi a segawpta a, gamkeu, gamdai, mihing tenlouhna mihing ta kuamah phaklouh gam a hongsuakta hi.
Babulon bel ka gawt ding, a valhkhitsa a kam a kipan a suahkhe ding, namte bel a kiang ah a luangkhawm nawn kei ding uh, ahi Babulon kulhpi a chim ding.
Ka mite aw, asung a kipan hongpawt unla,

Na lungtang uh bah kei hen, huai gam a thuthang leng lau kei un; kum khat in thuthang a hongtung ding a, kum dang in thuthang a hongtung nawn ding ahi, kumpipa leh kumpipa kisual in gam ah hiamgamna a om ding.
Huaiziak in, ngai un, nite a hongtung hi. Babulon milim sektawmte tung a vai ka hawm a, a gam pumpi a zumna ni ding; huan, asung ah a mi thahte a puk ding uh.
Huchi in lei leh van leh asung a om tengteng in, Babulon tung a kipak in la a sa ding uh; mallam a kipan simmite a kiang ah a tung ding uh ahi ngal a, chih
Babulon in Israel mi thahte a puksak bang in Babulon ah gamchih a mi thahte a puk ding uh.
Nou namsau pel mite aw, kuan unla, ding maimai kei un, gamlapi a kipan in
Gensiatna thu ka zak ziak un ka zum ua, lungdonna in ka mai uh a tuam a,
Huaiziak in ngai un, nite a hongtung hi, chih
Babulon bel van sun in sang mahleh, a kulh sangte hihkip mahleh, a tung ah ka kiang a kipan hihsemi a hongtung ding, chih
Babulon a kipan kah husa leh
Kaldai gam a kipan
a siatna thupitak husa:
A gamtat husa uh tui tampi ging hawhaw bang ahi, a awng zuazua ua.
A tung ah simmi a hongtung,
Babulon tung ngei ah pang ni,
a mi hatte mat in a om ua,
a thalpeute uh a kitan gawpta,
a thuk ngeingei ding.
Huan, a heutute leh a mipilte,
a ukpipate leh upate leh mi hatte ka khamsak dia;
a lumden ding ua, a khanglou kei ding uh, chih, kumpipa,
Sepaihte
Sepaihte
Babulon kumpipa kulh bang sahtakte a chimvek ding a,
a kongpi sangte a kang vek ding;
a mite’n a thawn in a sem ua,
namte’n meihal ading lel in a kihihgim uh a na hi.
Judah kumpipa Zedekiah vaihawm kum lina a Babulon a hohlai a a kiang a hohsam, Seraiah Neriah tapa, Maaseiah tapa kiang a zawlnei Jeremiah thupiak.
Seraiah bel kumpipa inn sung heutupen ahia. Jeremiah in Babulon tung a siatna hongtung ding tengteng, Babulon tungtang a hiai thu gelh tengteng laibu ah a gelh hi.
Huan Jeremiah in Seraiah kiang ah, Babulon na tun hun chiang in hiai thu tengteng sim ngeingei inla,
Aw
Huan, hichi a honghi ding a, hiai laibu na sim khit chiang in suang toh gakkhawm in Euphrates lui ah pailut inla,
Babulon hichibangmai in a tum ding a, a tung a siatna ka hontut ding ziak in a thou nawn kei ding; a bah mahmah ding uh, chi in na gen ding ahi, a chi a. Hichiteng Jeremiah thu ahi.
Zedekiah a vaihawm pattung lai in kum sawmnih leh kum khat a upa ahi a; Jerusalem ah kum sawmlehkhat vai a hawm a; a nu min Hamutal ahi a, Libnah khua a Jeremiah tanu ahi.
Jehoiakim hih bangbang in
a heh mahmah ziak in Jerusalem leh Judah gam ah a ma a kipan a paihkhiakna khop in thil a hongtungta a; Huchi in Babulon kumpipa tung ah Zedekiah a helta hi.

Huan, a vaihawm kum kua na ah hichi a honghi a, kha sawmna, huai kha ni sawm ni’n Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar leh a sepaih honte Jerusalem dou ding in a hong kuan ua, buk a bawl khumta ua; a kim ah kulh a bawl uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa Zedekiah kum sawm leh khatna tan in khopi um in a omta hi.
Kha lina, huai kha ni kua na ah khopi a kial a hong uang mahmah a, gam mipite ading in nekding a omta kei hi.
Huchi in khopi kulh bang a sun vang ua, kidou mi tengteng a taimang ua, kumpipa huan a bang nih kikal a kongpi a pawtin, zanin khopi a kipan a taikhia ua; Kaldai mite khopi a om ahi uhi.
Himahleh Kaldai sepaihte’n kumpipa a delh ua, Jeriko phaizang ah Zedekiah a pha ua, sepaih honte a kiang a kipan a dalhzak uh.
Huchi in Zedekiah a man ua, Babulon kumpipa kiang ah Hamath gam a Riblah khua ah a paipihta ua; aman a tung ah vai a hawm a.
Babulon kumpipa’n Zedekiah tapate a mitmuh ngei in a that a; Riblah ah Judah heutu tengteng leng a that lai hi
Zedekiah mit a khelkhia a, Babulon ah a paipih hi; a sih ni tanpha in suangkul ah a koih hi.
Huan, Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kum sawm leh kua na, kha ngana, huai kha ni sawmna ah kumpipa vengpa pawl heutu, Babulon kumpipa ma ading sek, Nebuzaradan Jerusalem ah a honglut hi.
inn leh kumpipa inn a hal a, Jerusalem inn tengteng toh, inn thupi chitengte mei in a hal hi.
Huan, Kaldai sepaih hon tengteng, kumpipa vengpa pawl heutu kiang a omte’n Jerusalem kulhte a kim in a hihchim vek uh.
Huchi in vengpa pawl heutu Nebuzaradan in mipi lak a genthei pawl pente khopi a nutsiatte, Babulon kumpipa kiang a kipesate leh mi khutsiam omsun tengtengte toh sal in a pivekta hi.
Himahleh vengpa pawl heutu Nebuzaradan in gam a mi genthei pen khenkhatte grephuan kemmi leh vengmi ding in a nusia hi.
Belte leng, vutluahte, khawnvak mihsaknate, maiphiatkuangte, sikkeute, dal tuium-belsuan tengteng a zat sekte uh a la vek uh.
Noute leng, meivu koihnate, maiphiatkuangte, belte, khawnvak koihnate, sikkeute leh belhbute; dangkaeng a bawl huai dangkasik in vengmi pawl heutu in a la vek hi.
Khuam nih, dal a bawl bawngtal sawmlehnih, maiphiatna kuang kingakna, kumpipa Solomon in
Huan, khuamte khuam khat san dan, tong sawmlehgiat ahi a, tong sawmlehnih in a kimvel zou phet ahi; a sahdan zung za delh ahi a, asung a hawm hi.
A tung ah dal lubawk a om a, a lubawk san dan tong nga ahi a, a lubawk kimvel in dalngen a zep leh theibuhfai ahi a; khuam nih in leng hichimah bang in theibuhfai a nei hi.
A sik ah theibuhfai sawmkua leh guk a om a, a kim a a zepna theibuhfai tengteng za khat ahi.
Huan, vengpa pawl heutu in siampu lian Seraiah leh siampu nihna, Zephaniah leh kongkhak ngakmi thumte a man hi:

Kidou mite tung a heutu dia seh michilgeh leh mi sagih, kumpipa melmu sek mi, khopi a omte leh sepaihheutu gelhmi, gam mite min kempa leh gam mipi lak a mi sawmguk, khopi a na omte khopi a kipan in a pikhia hi.
Nebuzaradan, vengpa pawl heutu in amau a pia, Babulon kumpipa kiang ah Riblah ah a hontun hi.
Babulon kumpipa’n Hamath gam a Riblah ah amau a bawl ek a, a that vek hi. Huchi in Judah nam a gam ua kipan in sal a pimang in a omta.
Hiaite Nebukadnezzar in mipi sal a a pite ahi uh: kum sagihna ah Judah sang thum leh sawmnih leh thum;
Nebukadnezzar kum sawmlehgiatna ah Jerusalem a kipan in mi za giat leh sawmthum leh nih sal in a pi hi.
Nebukadnezzar kum sawmnih leh kum thumna ah Nebuzaradan vengtu pawl heutu in mi za sagih leh sawmli leh za guk a pi hi.

Kumpipa saltan kum sawmthum leh sagihna, a kha sawmlehnihna, huai kha ni sawmnih leh nga geih in hichi a honghi a, Babulon kumpipa Evil merodakin a vaihawm kum khatna ah, Judah kumpipa Jehoiakin lutang a dopkang sak a, suangkulh a kipan a pikhia hi.
A kiang ah hoihtak in a pau a, Babulon a a kiang a om Kumpipate tutphah sang a sang in mangtutphah a tunsak hi.
A suangkulh puansilhte a kikhengsak a, a damsung teng a ma ah a an a ne den hi.
Huan amah vakna ding a damsung ni tengteng, a sih ni tan in a ni teng tantuan Babulon kumpipa’n a pe gige hi.
Khopi mite a dimsek,
bangchidan a lungzuang a tu maimah ahia!
bangchidan a meithai bang a hongom maimah ahia!
namte lak a thupi sek a,
bialte lak a lalnu sek,
bangchidan a sikha suak ahia!
Zan in nakpitak in a kap a,
a khituite a biang ah a om:
a itte tengteng lak ah amah nem ding kuamah a neikei a:
a lawmte tengteng a tung ah
lepchiahtak in a gamta ua,
a melmate a honghi uhi.
Gimthuakna ziak leh,
saltanna thupi ziak in.
Judah saltanna ah a paita hi;
khovel mite lak ah a teng a,
tawldamna a mu kei:
mun kawchik ahte amah sawi tengteng in a pha uhi.
Kikhopna thupi a kuamah
a hongpai louh ziak un.
Zion lampite’n a sun ua;
a kongpite tengteng loih in a om a, a siampute a thum huthut uh:
a nungak siangthoute gimthuak in a om ua,
amah mah haksa thuak in a om hi.
A melmate lupen a honghi a
galte a lohching uh;
a tatlekna tamluat ziak in
gal ma ah a ta tuailaite saltanna ah a pai uh.
Zion tate a pan in kilawmna
tengteng a pai mangta;
a lalte loupa hing mulou zuktalte bang ahi ua,
a delhmi ma ah hatna neilou in a pai uh.
A gimthuak ni leh a haksat ni’n
Jerusalem in nidanglai a kipan a om khinsa a thil nuamte tengteng a theigige a:
gal khut a mite a puklai un,
amah kuamah in a panpih kei,
galte’n amah a mu ua,
a siatna ah a nuihsan uhi.
Nakpitak in Jerusalem in thil a hihkhial a;
huaiziak in thil nin bang in a hongom hi:
a vuaktanna a muh ziak un,
amah zahte’n a musit ua, ahi,
a nak huthut a,
nunglam ah a kiheita hi.
A nitna a nik ah a om a;
a beina nanung a theigige kei;
huaiziak in lamdangtak in a hong kun a; lungmuanmi
a neikei hi: ngai in,
Aw
melmapa a kiliansak hi.
Gal in amahnu gou manphate tengteng tung ah a khut a zak a:
a munsiangthou sung ah khovelmi a honglut chih a mu ngal a,

A mite tengteng a nak huhu ua,

en in ka hong buah ziak in.

Tung sang a kipan in ka guhte ah mei a honsawl a, amaute a zou a:

Ka tatleknate hakkol a khut a khih in a om a;

amau ka dou zohlouhte,
a khut uah
Ka lak a ka mi hatte

uain sukna bang in
Hiai thilte ziak in ka kap a;

Toupa a diktat a: a thupiak ka
helsan ua; Za un, k’on ngen hi,

Ka itte ka sam a, himahleh a honkhem uh:

Aw
ka lungsim a mangbang a;

nakpitak in ka helta ua: pawlam ah namsau thah in inn sung ah sihna a om hi.
Ka thum a za ua: kuamah hon
khamuan ding a omkei uh;

na phuan khiaksa ni na tun ding a, kei bang ahi ding uh.
A gitlouhna tengteng uh na
ma ah hongtung hen:

Bangchidan a
Zion tanu meipi a tuam ahia!
Israel kilawmna van a kipan lei ah a paikheta a,

Jakob tenna tengteng
a nawmvalh a a hehpih kei;

A heh mahmahna ah Israel ki tengteng a sat tan;

Melma bang in a thalpeu a lai a,

Zion tanu kulhbang

A kongpite lei ah a tum ua;

dan omlouhna namte lak ah a kumpipa leh a lalte a om uh; ahi,
a zawlneite’n
Zion tanu upate leitung ah
a tu ua, a pau kei uh;

Khitui in ka mitte a zuau a,

a chi ua.

Na kiang ah bang ka theisak dia?

Aw Jerusalem tanu?

Na siatna lah tuipi bang in a thupi ngal a:

Na zawlneite’n bangmahlou

mengmuh in a mu ua;

Honpai kheng tengteng in nang a khut uh a hon betkhum ua;

a paita, a hehpih kei:

hichibang a na hihna; numeite’n a gah uh a ne ding uam,
