sisan a suknit in a om ua, mite’n a puante uh a lawng kei uh.
Paimang un, Nin! paimang un, paimang un,
honlawng kei un, chi in amau a kikou khum ua:
a taimang ua, a vialvak lai un,
mite’n namte lak ah, hiai ah a om nawn kei ding uh, a chi uh.
amaute a limsak nawnta kei ding:
Siampute min a zahtak kei ua,
upate a deihsak kei uh.
Koute mitte vaigawp a, huhna mulou a:
lametna i ngak uah nam hon hondam theilou ding i ngakta uhi.
I kongzingte ua i pai theihlouh na ding in,
i kalsuante a zong ua:
i tawp uh a nai a, i nite a kimta:
i tawp uh lah a hongtungta.
Van a muvanlaite sang in ei hon delhte a kin zaw uh:
mualtung ah hon delh ua,
gamdai ah a hon na buk uhi.
I nakvangte a hu,
thaunilh, a kawkhuk ua lak in a om ua;
amah thu gen in.
A lim nuai a namte lak ah i hing ding, i chi uhi.
Nuamsa inla kipak in
Aw Edom tanu,
Uz gam a teng:
nou lah nang pha in leng a hongpai suak ding;
na kham ding a vuaktang in na kibawl ding.
Aw Zion tanu,
na thulimlouhna gawtna zoh ahita;
saltanna ah nang a hon pimang nawn kei ding:
na thulimlouhna in a hongveh ding, Aw Edom tanu;
na khelhnate a mukhe ding hi.
Theigige in, Aw
ka tung ua hongtung:
a hon kouna uh en in, mu in.
Ka gouluah uh mikhual kiang
a hei ahi a, ka innte uh
gamdang mite lam ah.
Tagah leh pabei ka hi ua,
ka nute uh meithai bang ahi uh.
Ka tuidawn ding uh sum in
ka lei ua; ka singte uh kou lak a zuak in a om hi.
A hondelhte ka ngawngzang
uah a om ua, ka bah ua,
khawlna ka neikei uh.
Aiguptate leh Assuriate kiang ah,
Tanghou a lungkim ding in ka kipia uh.
Ka pipute uh a khial ua,
a omkei uh; a gitlouhna uh kou ka pua uh.
Sikhate’n ka tung uah vai a hawm ua:
a khut ua kipan a kou hon tankhe ding kuamah a omkei uh.
Ka hinna uh lauthawnna toh ka tanghou uh ka mu ua gamdai namsau ziak in.
Thuk bang in ka vun uh a vom a nakpitak a kialna ziak in.
Zion a numeite a sual ua,
Judah khopite a nungakte.
A khut un lalte khailup in a
om ua, upa melte zahtak in a omkei hi.
Tangvalte’n khawl a pua ua,
naupangte singnuai ah a kisui uh.
Kongpi a kipan upate a khawl ua,
a lasakna ua kipan in Tangvalte a khawl uh.
Ka lungtang kipahna uh a tawp a, ka lamna uh dahna a suak hi.
Ka lu ua kipan ka lallukhu uh a kia a,
ka tung uh a gik hi!
ka khelh ziak un.
Hiai ziak in ka lungtang uh a bah a;
hiai thilte ziak in ka mitte uh a mial hi;
Hihsiat a om,
Zion mual ziak in;
sehalte a tung ah a vak uh.
Aw
na mangtutphah khang khat a kipan in khang khat tan in a om hi.
Bangdia tangtawn a hon mangngilh a,
hichi tantan hon nungngatsan na hia?
Nang lam hon ngasak in,
Aw
nidanglai bang in ka nite uh thaksak in.
Ahihkeileh n’on paikhe hilhial ahia?
Ka tung uah na heh mahmah ahia?
Saltan kum sawmthumna, kha lina, huai kha ni ngana ah Kebar lui a saltangte lak a ka omlai in hichi a honghi a, van a kihong a, Pathian kilakna ka mu hi.
Huai kha ni ngana ah, huai bel kumpipa Jehoiakin saltan kum ngana ahi.
Kaldai gam a Kebar lui ah, Buzi tapa siampu Ezekiel kiang ah
Huan ka en a, ngai in, mallam a kipan huihpi thupi mahmah a hong kuan a, meipi a saha sah, kuang zoizoi, a kim tengteng tanvak puappuap asung mei laitak ah sikam bang a am a om hi.
Huchi in huailai a kipan in thilhing li kibatpih a hong pawtkhia ua, a kimuh dan uh hichibang ahi: mihing batna a nei uhi.
Mai li a neichiat ua, kha li a neichiat uhi.
A khete uh a tang ahi a; a khepek nuai lam uh bawngnou khepek bang ahi a; huan dalte mahmah bang in a vakkhe zualzual uhi.
A pang lite ua a khanuai uah mihing khut bang a nei ua: huchi in a li un a mel uleh a khate uh hichibang in a pu uhi;
A khate uh a kizom a; a pai un leng a kihei ngeikei ua, a mazawn uah a paichiat uhi.

A mel un a kibatpihte mihing mel bang ahi a, a li un a taklam pang uah humpinelkai mel a pu ua, a li un a veilam pang uah bawngtal mel a pu ua, a li un muvanlai mel a punawn ua, a mel uh huchibang ahi.
Huan a khate uh a zakkhia ua, a kha nihte un a kizak zom chiat ua, nih in a pumpi uh a khuh uh.
Malam ah a paichiat ua, kha paina lam ding ah a pai ua, a pai un leng a kihei ngeikei uhi.
Thilhingte lak ah suangkuangthei ampha bang, meisel bang mai a suk leh tou in a pai a; meibel a ampha mahmah a, mei a kipan khopi a hong suakkhe zualzual hi.
Thilhingte khophe zualzual bang in a vialtai uhi.
Huan thil hingte ka et lai in, ngai in, thil hingte zul ah a mel lite uh ading in lei ah kangtalai khe khat zel ka mu hi.
Kangtalai khe leh a tatdan beril suang zia bang mai in a lang a, a li un latdan khat a nei ua, a latdan uh leh a tatdan uh kangtalai khe khat sung a kangtalai khe dang om bang ahi hi.
A pai chiang un sik li in a pai thei ua, a pai un leng a kihei ngeikei uh.
A kangtalai khe kual sangtak leh mulkimhuaitak ahi a; a li un kual, mit a dim teptup a nei uhi.
Huchi in thilhingte a pai chiang un a zul uah kangtalai peite a paisam uhi: thil hingte lei a kipan dopkang a a om uleh kangtalai khete leng dopkang in a omsam uhi.
Kha paina ding lam peuhmah ah a pai ua; huai lam ah kha a pai ding ahi hi; huchi in, kangtalai khete a zul uah dopkang in a om ua, thilhing kha kangtalai khete ah a om hi.

Huaite a pai chiang un hiaite a pai uhi: huaite adin chiang un hiaite ading ua: huaite lei a kipan a dopkang a a om chiang un kangtalai khete amau zul ah dopkang in a om ua, thilhingte kha kangtalai khete ah a om hi.
Thil hingte lu tung ah van kibatpih a om a, kristal vak bang a te mulkimhuai tak a lu tung uah a kiphalh zeizoi hi.
Van dum nuai ah a kha uh a kopkhat thil hing dangte sun in a zak ua, a kha uh kop khat nawn in a pumpi uh a khuh uhi.
Huan a len uleh a kha ging uh tui tampi mahmah ging bang, bangkim hihtheipa aw bang mai, mipi ging vengvung husa, sepaihhon husa bang mai in ka za a; adin uleh a kha uh a kaisak uhi.
A lu tung ua van dum tung ah aw a hongom a, adin uleh a kha uh a kaisak uhi.
Huan a lu tung ua van dum tung ah mangtutphah bang, sapphir suang bang mai a kimu a om a: huai mangtutphah bang tak tung ah mihing bang a kilang a om hi.
A kawngchiang tunglam sik hal ap bang mai in ka mu a, a kawng hileh kilawm chiang nuailam mei bang mai hi in ka mu a, a vak kimvel lelaw hi.
Vuahzuk ni a meipi tung a sakhituihup latdan bang in a kim vak a lang hi. Hiai
Huan ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, na khe in ding in, na kiang ah thu ka gen ding hi, a chi hi.
Ka kiang a thu a genlai in kha kei ah a honglut a, ka khe in a hon dingsak a, huchi in kei hon houpihpa ka ngaikhia hi.
Ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, Israel tate kiang ah, helhat nam, ka tung a helnakte kiang ah k’on sawl hi: amau leh a pipute un leng hiai ni pha nangawn in ka tung ah a talek uhi.
Suan paupeng leh genhakte ahi ua, a kiang uah nang k’on sawl hi; a kiang uah, “
Huchi in amau a ngaikhia uhiam, a ngaikhe kei uhiam, helhat a inkuan hi ua, a lak uah zawlnei a om chih a theigige ding uhi.

Nang, mihing tapa, amaute kihta kenla, a thu uah leng lunglel sam ken, na kiang ah khaulingnei leh loulingneite om in, aikam lak a teng himah lechin: helhat mi himahle uh, a thu uh kihta kenla, a latdan uah leng lunglel sam ken.
A ngaikhia uhiam, a ngaikhe kei uhiam, a kiang uah ka thu na gen ding ahi: helhat inkuan ahi uhi.
Himahleh nang mihing tapa, na kiang a ka gen ngaikhia in; mi helhat inkuan bang in helhat kenla: na kam ka inla, ka honpiak ne in, a chi hi.
Huan ka en a ngai in, khut in a honsawk a, ngai in huai ah laibuzial a om hi;
Ka ma ah a phalh a, a sunglam leh a pawlam gelh ahi; kahna, lusunna leh tunggikna gelhna a om hi.
Ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, na muh ne in; laibuzial ne inla, Israel inkawte kiang ah thu vagen in, a chi hi.
Huchi in ka kam ka ka a, laibuzial a hon nesakta hi.
Huan aman ka kiang ah Mihing tapa, na gil ah pai inla, hiai laibuzial k’on piak in na gilsung hihdim in, a chi hi. Huchi in ka neta a, a khumdan ka kam ah khuaizu bang ahi hi.
Aman ka kiang ah: Mihing tapa kuan inla, Israel inkawte kiang ah ka thute zang in vagen in.
Pau tuam leh pau haksate kiang a sawlna hi kei a, Israel inkawte kiang a sawl na hizaw hi;
Nam pau tuam leh pau haksa a thu uh na theih theihlouhte kiang a sawl na hi kei hi. A kiang ua nang k’on sawl in pellou in na thu a ngaikhe mahmah ding uhi.
Himahleh Israel inkawte’n a hon ngaikhe kei ding ua, kei a hon ngaikhe kei ding uhi, Israel inkawte tengteng taltang tak leh lungtang genhak mahmah ahi uhi.
Huan ngai in, na mai amau mai lak ah khauhsak in, na taltang leng amau taltang sang a takzaw in k’on bawl hi.
Suang tak mahmah, meisuang sang a tak in na tal ka bawl a, lau kenla, a mithah uah lunglel sam ken, helhat inkuan hi mahle uh, a chi hi.
Huailou leng ka kiang ah Mihing tapa, na kiang a ka thugen ding tengteng na bil in ngaikhia inla, na lungtang ah khum in.
Kuan inla, na chipih saltangte kiang vatung inla; a ngaikhia uhiam, a ngaikhe kei uhiam. “Hichibang
Huchi in kha in a hon domkangta a, amun a kipan
Huai tuh thilhingte kha kisukha leh a kiang ua kangtalai peite, zinling thawm bang nei ahi uhi.
Huchi in kha in a hon domkang a, a hon lamangta a: heh mahmah leh utlou pipi in ka kuanta hi,
Huchi in, Telabib a saltangte, Kebar lui a tengte kiang ka vatung a, a tutna uah ka tu a; lamdangsa tak in huai ah ni sagih ka tuta hi.
Huchi in ni sagih bei in hichi ahi a,
Mihing tapa, Israel inkawte vilpa in nang k’on sep hi; huchi in ka kam a thu na za ding a, kei sik in amau vauna na pe ding hi,

Migilou kiang a ka thu, “Na si mahmah ding ahi” ka chih a, huai migilou a hinna hum ding a a gitlouhna lampi paisan ding a vauna na neih louh a, vauna thu leng na hilh sam louh a, huai migilou a gitlouhna a a sih leh a sisan mawh nang lak ah k’on sik ngeingei ding hi.
Himahleh huai migilou na vau a, a gitlouhna a paisan louh a, a gitlouhna lampi a lehngatsan sam kei leh a gitlouhna ah a si ding a, nang bel na hinna na humbit ahizaw ding hi.

Huan mi diktat in a diktatna lehngatsan a gitlouhna a hih a, a ma a pukna ka koih leh, a si ding: vauna na neih louh ziak in a khelhna ah a si ding a; a thil diktat a hihsate theihgige ahi kei ding; a sisan mawh ahihleh na lak ah k’on sik ding hi.
Himahleh mi diktat khiallou ding a na vau a, a khelh keileh vauna a khawksak ziak in a hing ding; nang leng na hinna na humbit ding hi, a chi hi.
Huan huai ah
Ngai in, huai ah
Huchi in, kei ah kha a honglut a, ka khe in a hon dingsak a, a hon houpih a, Pai inla, na inn ah kikhak khum in.
Nang zaw, mihing tapa, khauhual in a honkhih ding ua, a hon gak ding ua, a lak uah na pawtkhe nawn kei ding.
Na lei na dangtawng ah ka belhsak ding a, na pau nawn kei ding a, amaute salpa na hinawn kei ding, helhat inkuan ahi ngal ua.
Himahleh na kiang a thu ka gen hun chiang in na kam k’on ka sak ding a, a kiang uah “
Nang mihing tapa, teklei pek la inla, na ma ah koih in, huai tung ah khopi Jerusalem khopi lim bawl in.
A kim a um in kulh khohkhum inla, mualpawng bawlkhum in sepaih giahbukte bawlkhum inla, kulh suksiatnate a kim in bawlkhum in.
Sikpek la inla, nangmah leh khopi kikal ah sik bang ding in tung in; huai lam masuan inla, um in a om ding a, nangmah in na um ding ahi. Hiai Israel inkawte adia etsak kholhna ahi ding.
Huan nang bel na veilam pang delh in lum inla, a tung ah Israel inkawte gitlouhna nga in; a tung a nalup sung ni zah bangzel a gitlouhna uh na puak ding ahi.
A gitlouhna kumte uh nang ading a nite hi ding in lah ka septa ngal a, ni za thum leh ni sawmkua ding: Huchibang in Israel inkawte gitlouhna na paw ding ahi.
Hiaite na khit hun chiang in na taklam pang delh in na lum leuleu dia, Judah inkawte gitlouhna na paw ding: ni sawmli nang din ka sep a, ni khat kum khat zel hi ding in.
Na ban khuhlou a zak in Jerusalem kisim lam nga inla, a tungthu gen khia in.
Ngai in, khauhual in k’on hentawm a, khopi kisim sung nite a bei masiah koilam ah leng na kihei ding ahi kei hi.
Buh, buhman, be, behiang, vai buhman la inla, bel khat ah koih inla, tanghou in bawl in; na pangkhat delh a na lup sung teng, ni za thum leh sawmkua sung, huai na ne ding ahi.
Na an nekding tehvek ding ahi, nikhat in sekel sawmnih ahi ding ahi: hunbi neitak in na ne ding hi.
Tuite leng tehvek in na dawn ding ahi, hin khat seh guk suah a seh khat ahi ding ahi, hunbi neitak in na dawn ding ahi.
A mit muh un mihing ekgaw sing dia zang in na kang ding a, buhman tanghou nek in na ne ding, a chi hi.
Huchi in
Huan ken, “Eh!
Huan aman ka kiang ah, “En in, mihing ek sik in bawng ek k’on pia, huaite zang in nek dingte na bawl ding hi” a chi hi.

Huailou leng ka kiang ah, aman, “Mihing tapa, ngai dih, Jerusalem ah, an hinna bul ka hihse ding a, a an uh tehvek in lauthawng tak in a ne ding uh; tui leng tehvek in, lungkhamtak in a dawn ding uhi.
An leh tui tasam a, lungkhamtak a kientuah a, a gitlouhna ua a thammang khitna ding un.”
Huan, nang mihing tapa, namsau hiam mahmah la inla, na lu leh na khamul metna ding in sammetmi tem in zang in; huan bukna la inla, sam khen in.

Seh thum a khen a seh khat sim a a omsung nite a bei hun chiang in khopi lai a mei ah na hal ding ahi; seh thum a khen a seh khat nawn na la dia, a kim ah namsau in na satnen ding ahi; huan, seh thum a khen a seh khat nawn huih mutleng ding in na thehzak ding hi, ken namsau in ka delh zui ding hi.
Huan tawmchik na la dia, na puanaktual mong ah na tun ding hi.
Hiaite lak a tamlou na la ding a, mei ah na thehlut ding ahi, a kangding; huai a kipan in Israel inkawte tengteng ah mei a hongpawt ding, a chi hi.
Namte sang a nakpi a gitlouhna hihzaw in ka thugel tung ah a hel a, a kim a gamte sang a thupi in ka dan bawl tung ah a hel uhi. Ka thugelte a paikhia ua, ka dan bawlte bang in a omkei uhi.
Huaiziak in
Ngai un, kei nasan in leng k’on nang ahi, namte mitmuh ngei in na lak uah vaihawmna ka tangtung sak ding hi.
Na kihhuaina tengteng uh ziak in thil ka hih ngei nailouh, hih leng ka hih ngei nawnlouh ding na tung uah ka hih ding hi.
Huchi in pate’n na sung ah a tate uh a ne ding ua, tate’n leng a pate uh a ne ding uh; nang a mi omsun tengteng ka dalhsak vek ding.
Huchi in hiai
Seh thum a khen a seh khat hi in hiam, kial in hiam na lak uah a si ding uh; seh thum a khen a seh khat nawn ka hihdalh ding a, namsau in ka delhzui ding hi.
Hichibang in ka hehna ka tangtung sak ding a, a tung uah ka hehna ka lungdam sak ding a, ka om a nuamta ding hi: kei
Huailou in, na kim a namte lak ah leh vialvak tengtengte mitmuh in khaw segawp leh simmohhuai in k’on bawl ding hi.
Huchi in, thangpai leh heh mahmah a, nakpi a taihilh a, na tung a thugelte ka tunsak hun in na kim a namte mitmuh in nuihsat leh kouna leh hilhna leh mulkimhuai na hi ding: Kei
A tung uah kialna thaltang hoihlou tak manna ding, noumau manna ding k’on kesak ding; na tung uah kialna ka uangsak ding a, na an uh, hinna bul ka hihse ding hi.
Huchi in na tung uah kialna leh gamsa hangte k’on sawl ding a, ta leh nau tan in a hon laksak ding uhi; hipi leh sisansuahna na lak uah a leng ding; na tung uah namsau k’on lek ding, kei
Mihing tapa, Israel tanglam nga inla, a kiang uah thu gen inla, Israel tangte aw,
Pathian in tangte leh mualte kiang ah leh guamte leh kuamte kiang ah hichi in a chi: Ngai un, kei, keimahmah in na tung uah namsau ka honlik ding a, na munsangte uh ka hihse vek ding hi.
Na maitamte uh a segawp ding a, na ni Pathian limte uh a kitam zan ding: na mi thah luangte uh na milimte uh ma ah ka pai ding.
Israel tate luang a milimte uh ma ah ka koih ding a, na guhte uh na maitam kim uah ka theh zak ding hi.

Na tenna mun tengteng uah khopi a se ding a, mun sangte a segawp ding; na maitamte uh hihsiat leh hihgawp a hih theihna ding un leh na milimte uh a kitapnen a, a man theihna ding in leh na ni Pathian limte uh phukpaih a a om theihna ding un, na nasepte uh aman theihna ding in.
Huan mi thahte na lak uah a puk ding ua, huchi in
Himahleh gamchih a na dalhzak hun chiang un namte lak ah namsau pelte a om ding ziak un a khen k’on hawi ding.

Huan nalak ua kipan a pawtte’n sal a a pina namte uh lak ah kei a hon theigige ding ua, a angkawmna lungtang uh ka lakmang sakleh a mit uh, a milim lam ua angkawmte ka hihsiat sakdante a thei ding uh: thil gilou a na hih ziak uleh a kihhuai ziak un amau mitmuh ngei in leng kihhuai a kisa ding uh.
Huchi in
Gamlapi a om hipi in a si ding ua, a nai a om namsau in a puk ding ua, a val, um a omte kial in a si ding uh; hichibang in ka heh mahmahna a tung uah ka lungdam sak ding hi.

Tangsangte ah, mualvumte ah leh sing hing peuhmah nuai ah leh tosaw bawkpha chih nuai a a milimte uh kiang a gimlim a latna mun ua a maitam kim ua a milimte uh lak a a misi luangte uh a om hun chiang in kei
A tung uah ka khut ka lik ding a, gamdai a kipan a Diblah lam a a tenna mun tengteng uah gam ka hihsia in ka hihgawp vek ding; huchi in kei
Nang mihing tapa,
Tu nang ading in tawpna ahi, na tung ah ka hehna k’on tungsak ding a, na omdan bangzel in vai k’on hawmsak ding a, na kihhuaina tengteng na tung ah k’on tun ding hi.
Ka mit in a honmaih kei dia, k’on hehpih sam kei ding hi: na omdan bang in na tung ah kontun zaw ding a, huchi in,
Tawpna a hongtung hi, tawpna a hongtung hi, na tung ah a hongthouta, ngai in, a hongtung hi.
Aw gam luahpa, na siatna ding na tung ah a hongtung hi, hun a hongtung hi, ni a naita hi; buaina, kipak a tangtung a kikouna ni hilou.
Tuin ka hehna na tung ah k’on buakzok ding hi, na tung ah ka hehna ka lungdamsak ding a; na omdan bangzel in k’on vaihawmsak ding hi; na kihhuaina tengteng na tung ah kontun ding hi.
Huan ka mit in a honmaih kei dia, k’on hehpih sam kei ding: na omdan bangzel in na tung ah ka hontun ding a, na kihhuaina leng na lak uah a om ding: huchi in kei
Ngai in, a ni, ngai in, a hongtung hi, na siatna ding a pawtta, satna chiang a pakta, kisaktheihna a pakmumta hi.
Hiamgamna gitlouhna chiang a suakta ahi; kuamahmah a omta kei ding a, a husa uhiam, a hauhsakna uhiam leng: kuamah in a it sam kei ding uh.
Hun a hongtungta, a ni a hongnaita: a leimi kipak kei henla, a khawngmi leng dah kei hen: thangpaihna avek ua tung ah a omta hi.
Khawngmi in, damlai mah leh, a thil khot a munawn kei ding hi; kilakna avek ua tungthu ahi a, kuamah a kik kei ding uh, kuamah a nuntakna thulimlouhna uah a khosa suak sam kei ding uh.
Pengkul a mut ua, bangkim a kimanta a; himahleh kidouna ah kuamah a hohkei ua; ka hehna avek ua tung ah a om hi.
Inpua ah namsau, asung ah hipi leh kial: gam a om namsau in a si ding ua, khopi a om kial leh hipi in a nekhin ding hi.
Himahleh a taikhete, a pawt ding ua, tangte ah phaizang gam vakhu bang in; avek un, lungzuangtak in amau thulimlouhna chiat ah a om ding uhi.
Khut tengteng a zaw ding a, khuk tengteng tui bang in a nem ding.
Saiip puan a teng ding ua, mulkimna in amau a tuam ding a, mel chiteng ah zumna a lang ding a, a lutang tengteng uh a giaukhin ding hi.
A dangkasik uh leh a dangkaengte un
A kizepna kilawmna uh a kisaktheihpih ua, a kihhuaina milim un leh a nitna thil un a suaksak zawlel uhi; huaiziak in amau ading in thil kihhuai ding in ka na bawlta hi.
Huan gallak ding in namdang khut ah ka pedia, lei a migiloute kiang ah gallak ding in ka pe ding a, amau a na hihnin ding uhi.
Amaute ka nungngatsan ding a, ka mun siang a hihnin ding uh: huan guta a honglut dia, a hihnin ding uh.
Khainiang bawl un, gam lah sisan suahhat vaihawmna in a dim a, khopi hiamgamna in ahi.
Huaiziak in namdang giloupente k’on pilut ding a a innte uh a neihsak ding ua; a hatna otpih uh ka hihtawp ding a, a mun siangte uh hihnit in a om ding hi.
Lungzinna a hongtung a, muanna a zong ua, a om hetkei hi.
Siatna tung ah siatsemna, thuthang tung ah thuthang a hongom ding a, zawlnei lak ah kilakna a zong ding ua, himahleh dante siampu lak ah a mang ding a, upate lak ah thudot a omkei ding hi.
Kumpipa a dah ding a, kumpi tapa lungdonna puansilh in a kivan ding a, vantang khut leng a ling ding, a kiang uah a om danthu un ka hih ding a, a thilhih bangzel un vai ka hawmsak ding; huan
A kum gukna, kha gukna, huai kha ni ngani’n hichi ahi a, ka inn a ka tut a, Judah upate ka ma a a tut lai un
Huchi in ka en a, ngai in, mi mei bang a kimu a hongom a; a kawng chiang nuailam hidia kilawm mei bang ahi a; a kawng chiang tunglam bel sik hal-ap bang a vaktak ahi.

Huchi in khut bang a honsawk khia a, ka tal sam in a hon man hi, kha in lei leh van kikal ah a hon domkang a, Pathian kilakna in Jerusalem ah a honpi hi, Jerusalem mallam huang sungnung kongpi khakna kiang a hon tunta a, huai ah mullitna lim tutna mun a om a, huai in a mullit sak hi.
Huan, ngai in, phaizang a ka muh bangmah in huai ah Israel Pathian thupina a om hi.
Huchi in aman ka kiang ah, “Mihing tapa, mallam nga in na mitsuan dihve leh, a chi hi. Huchi in mallam nga in ka mit ka suan a, ngai in, maitam kongpi mallam lutna ah hiai mullitna lim a na om hi.

Aman ka kiang ah, Mihing tapa, a thilhih uh na mu hia? Israel inkawte’n thil kihhuai mahmah, hiai a a hih ngei uh, ka inn siangthou a kipan a gamla a ka paimangna dia a hih uh? Himahleh thildang kihhuai zaw na mu nawn lai ding” a chi hi.
Huan huangsung lutna ah a honpi a; ka en a, bang ah vang a na om hi.
Huchi in ka kiang ah, “Mihing tapa, huai bang hon khuakdih” a chi hi. Ka khuak leh kongkhak a na om hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Lut inla, hiai a khelhna kihhuai tak a hih uh en dih” a chi hi.
Huchi in ka lut a, ka mu a, ngai in, thil hing chichih limte, gamsa kihhuai limte, Israel inkawte milim tengteng bang ah a kimvel in a na tuang hi.
Huan a ma uah Israel inkuan, upate lak a mi sawmsagihte a ding ua, a laitak uah Sephan tapa Jaazaniah a ding a, michih in belhbu a tawi chiat ua; huan gimlim khu gim a zam tou ngoingoi hi.
Huchi in ka kiang ah, “Mihing tapa, Israel inkuan upate mial nuai a thilhih na mu hia? Michih in milim dantan a a hih uh?
Ka kiang ah,“A thilhih uh kihhuai sem dang leng na mu nawn lai ding” a chilai hi.
Huchi in
Aman ka kiang ah, Aw mihing tapa, hiai na mu hia? Hiai sang a kihhuai zawsem na mu nawnlai ding a chi hi.
Huan,

Huchi in, aman ka kiang ah, “Hiai na mu hia, aw mihing tapa, a thil kihhuai hih uh, hiai a hih uh Judah inkawte ding in thil neutham hia? Gam hiamgamna in a hihdim ua, hon hehsak nawnsem ua, a nak uah sing hiang a bat uhi;
Huaiziak in ken leng hehtak in ka hih ding a; ka mit in a maih kei dia, ka hehpih sam kei ding; aw ngaihtak in ka bil ah hong kikou mahle uh ka ngaikhe kei ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in bil a ka zak in, “Khopi kemmite michih hihmanna van tawi in hongnai uhen” chi in ngaihtak in a kikou hi.

Huan ngai in, mallam kongpi tungnung paina a kipan in mi guk a hongpai ua, michih in hihlupna van a tawichiat ua; a lai ua mi khat puanmalngat silh in laituibuk a kuah hi. A lut ua, dal maitam kiang ah a ding uhi.
Huan Israelte Pathian thupina a omna Cherub a kipan in huai inn kongpi kiang ah a paitou a; puanmalngat silh, laituibuk kuahpa a sam hi.
a kiang ah, “Khopi sung tawnsuak inla, Jerusalem tawnsuak in; a sung a thil kihhuai hihsate ziak a tunggik a kapte a tal uah chiamteh in” a chi hi.
Huan midangte kiang ah ka zak mahmah in, “A nung ah khopi tawnsuak unla, khut kha un, na mit un a muh maih kei henla, hehpih sam kei un.
Putekte, tangvalte, nungakte, naupangte leh nute that siangvek un. Chiamtehna neite bel honnaih kei un; ka Mun Siangthou ah pan un” a chi hi. Huchi in, biakin kong a upate inn ah a panta uhi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Inn hihbuah unla, a um sungte mi luang in dimsak unla: pawt un” a chi hi. Huan, a pawtta ua, khopi ah a gamtangta uhi.
Hichi ahi a, khopi ah a gamtat lai un kei bel nutsiat in ka na om a, a khup in ka puk hi. “Ah!
Huchi in aman ka kiang ah, “Israel leh Judah inkawte thulimlouhna a thupi tel a ahi. ‘Gam sisan in a dim a: khopi vaihawmna kaihkawi in a om a,
Ka mit in amau ka maih kei ding a, ka hehpih sam kei ding hi; a gitlouh uh avekpi in amau ka khusak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in ngai in, puanmalngat silh a laituibuk kuahpa’n thu a tun a, N’on thupiak bang in ka hihkhinta, a chi hi.
Huchi in ka en a, ngai in, cherubte lu tung a van dum om ah sapphir suang hileh kilawmtak, mangtutphah bangtak a kimu a honglang a.
Aman puanmalngat silhpa kiang ah, “Cherub nuai a kangtalai peite kikal ah valut inla, cherubte kikal a meivu na khut langnih dim in valuak inla, khopi tung ah thehzak in” a chi hi.
Ka mitmuh lai mahmah in a kuanta hi. Huan mi a hohlai in cherubte Inpi taklam pang ah a ding ua; huang sungnung pen meipi in a dimta hi.
thupina cherubte a kipan a paitou a, biakin kongpi tung ah a vadingta a, huai inn meipi in a dim a, huangsung
Cherubte khazap gingte huangsung pawnung zaw leng Pathian Bangkim hihthei in a hon houpih lai a a om bang mai in a kiza hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, puanmalngat silhpa kiang ah, “Cherubte kikal a kangtalai pei kikal a kipan mei vala in” chi a thu a piak leh, amah a valut a, kangtalai khe chin ah a dingta hi.
Huan cherubim, cherubte kikal a kipan in, cherubte kikal a mei om a sawka, a la a, puanmalngat silhpa khut ah a pia a, aman a na la a, a pawtkheta hi.
Huchi in cherubte bel a kha nuai uah mihing khut bangtak a honglang a.

Huan ka en a, ngai in, cherubte sik ah kangtalai khe li, Cherub khat kiang ah, kangtalai khe khat, Cherub dang kiang ah kangtalai khe dang ka mu a; kangtalai khe latdan bel beril suang zia bang ahi hi.
A latdan un a li un kibatna khat a nei ua, kangtalai khe khat sung a kangtalai khe dang om bang mai ahi hi.
A pai chiang un sikli in a pai thei ua, a pai un leng a kihei ngeikei uh; himahleh amasa ngatna lam a zuizel uhi, a pai un a kihei tuankei uhi.
Huan a pumpi uh a pum in a nungte uh, a khutte uh, a khate uleh kangtalai khete leng a kim in mit in a dim a, a li ua kangtalai khete leng.
A kangtalai khete bil a ka zak mahmah in, “Kangtalai khe kipei” chih ahi.
Michih in mel li chiat a nei ua, mel khat Cherub mel ahi a, nihna mihing mel ahi a, thumna humpinelkai mel, lina muvanlai mel ahi.
Huchi in cherubte a paitou ua; hiai bel Kebar luigei a thil hing ka muh ahi.
Huan, cherubte a pai uleh kangtalai khete a kiang uah a paitei a, cherubte’n lei a kipan paitou ding a a khate uh a zak uleh kangtalai khete’n a lehngatsan ngeikei uh.
A din uleh hiaite a ding tei ua, a paitouh uleh hiaite a paitei zel ua, thil hing kha amau ah a om hi.
Huan cherubte’n a kha a zak ua, a pawt un ka mit muh mahmah in lei a kipan a paitou ua; kangtalai khete a kiang uah a om zel a: huan
Hiai bel Kebar lui a Israel Pathian nuai a ka thil hing muh mah ahi; cherubte ahi uh chih ka thei hi.
Michih in maituam li leh kha li a neichiat ua, a kha nuai uah mihing khut bang mai a om hi.
Huan a mel lam uh ahihleh Kebar lui a ka muh melte mah bang, a latdan uleh amau mahmah leng ahi uhi; huan a mazawn zel uah a paichiat uhi.
Huan kha in a hon domkang a,
Aman ka kiang ah, “Mihing tapa, hiaite gitlouhna sawmkhete ahi ua, hiai khopi ah gitlouh sawmkhe mite ahi uh.
Inn lam hun ahi naikei hi; hiai khopi sa ui bel ahi a, eite a sa i hi uh” chite.
Huaiziak in thu gen inla, aw mihing tapa, a tung uah thu gen in” a chi hi.
Huan
Hiai khopi ah na mithahte uh na pungsak huthut ua, a kongzingte na mithah un na dimsakta uhi.
Huaiziak in
Namsau na kihta ua, na tung uah namsau ka hontun ding,
A lai a kipan ka hon pawtkhe sak ding a, namdangte khut ah k’on mansak ding a, na tungthu uh a ngaihtuah ding uh.
Namsau in na si ding ua, Israel gamgi lam ah na tungthu uh ka ngaihtuah ding: huchi in kei
Hiai khopi na sa ui bel uh ahi kei ding a, nou a sung a sa na hi sam kei ding ua, Israel gamgi lam ah na tungthu uh ka ngaihtuah ding hi.
ka hi chih na theita ding uh, ka dan bawl na zuikei ua, ka thupawt leng na zui sam kei ua: na kim ua namte hihdan na zui zawta uh” a chi, chi in.
Huan hichi ahi a, thu ka gen a leh Benaiah tapa Pelatiah a na sita mai a, Huchi in ka khuppuk a, aw ngaihtak in ka kikou in, “Ah,
Huan
Mihing tapa, na unaute, na chi leh kuangte ngei leh Israel inkawte tengteng, avek un. “Jerusalem luah mite’n
Huaiziak in
Huaiziak in
Huchi in huai ah a hongpai ding ua, thil nin tengteng leh thil kihhuai a kipan a lamang ding uhi.
Lungtang khat ka pe ding a, na sung uah lungsim thak ka koih ding: Huan a sa ua kipan lungtang sak ka lamang ding a, lungtang nem a kiang uah ka pe ding hi:
Ka dan bawlte a zuih ua, ka thusehte a vom ua, a hih theihna ding un, Huchi in ka mite ahi ding ua, keileng a Pathian uh ka hi ding.
A nitna uleh a kihhuaina laigil lungtang zuite bel a khelhna uh avek in amau ka khusak ding,
Huchi in cherubte’n a khate uh a zak ua, a kiang uah kangtalai khete a om a, Israelte Pathian thupina a tung uah a om hi.
thupina khopi lai a kipan in a paitou a, khopi suahlam pang a tang sang ah a vadingta hi.
Huan kha in a hon domkangta a, kilakna ah Pathian kha in Kaldai gam a saltangte kiang ah a hontun hi. Huchi in ka kilakna muh in a hon paitouh santa hi.
Huchi in saltangte kiang ah
“Mihing tapa, helhat inkuan, muhna ding mit nei a mulou, zakna ding bil nei a zaloute lak ah om na hi, helhat inkuan ahi him uhi.

Huaiziak in, nang mihing tapa, saltanna a paiding bang in na vante lomgak dimdiam inla, sun khovak ah a mitmuh mahmah un paikhia in: a muh mahmah na mun ua kipan mun dang ah na paikhe ding ahi: helhat inkuan ahi ua, a kingaihtuah loh khamai ding uhi.
Huan na van sun khovak in a mitmuh mahmah uah saltang pai ding van lak in na lakhe ding a, nang mahmah leng a mitmuh uah gamdang a khakmang ding pai in na pai ding ahi.
A mitmuh mahmah uah kulhbang vangsak inla, huai ah lakhia in.
A mitmuh mahmah uah na paw ding a, mial ah na paikhe ding ahi: lei na muh louhna ding in na mai na khuh ding ahi; Israel inkawte ading in etsak kholhna din nang k’on bawl ahi ngal a, a chi hi.
Huchi in a hon thupiak bang in ka hihta; ka van saltang ding van bang in sun khovak in ka lakhia a, ka khut in bang ka sunvang a, khomial lai in ka lakhia a, a mitmuh mahmah uah ka pua hi.
Huan zingsang in
Mihing tapa, Israel inkuan, helhat inkuante’n na kiang ah. “Bang hih na hia?” a honchi uh ahi keimaw?
A kiang uah “
Nou adin etsak kholhna ka hi a, ka chih bang geiha a tung ua hih ahi ding; khak mang in, saltang ding in a paimang ding uh” chi in.
Huan a lak ua heutu omsun in mialnuai ah a liang in a paw ding a, a paikhe ding: a lakkhiakna ding un bang a vangsak ua, a mit in gam a muh nawnlouh ziak in a mai a khuh ding ahi.
Amah ka len in ka khuh ding a, ka thang a awk ahi ding: Kaldai gam a Babulon ah k’on pi ding a, muh zaw a mu kei ding; huai ah a si ding hi.
Amah panpih ding a a kiang a omte leh a chingmite tengteng gamchih ah ka hihzak ding a, namsau dok in ka delh ding hi.
Huan namte lak a ka delhzak a, gamchih a ka hihdalh hun chiang in
Himahleh namsau, kial, hipi a kipan mi tawmchik ka hawi ding; huaite’n a hongpaina gam ua namte kiang ah a kihhuaina tengteng a phuanna ding un; kei
Huan
Mihing tapa, na an ling vonvon kawm in ne inla, na tui lungzing a lingkawm in dawn in;
Huan gam a mite kiang ah
Huchi in mi tenna khopite a inn-gam ding a, gam hihsiat in a om ding a, huchi in
Huan
Mihing tapa, Israel gam a hiai paunak na neih uh bang chihna ahia? “A nite a sawt chian kilakna peuhmah a vuaksuak nawn zel” na chih uh.
Huaiziak in “
Israel inkuante lak ah kilakna hong vuaksuak leh aisan hoihlam a maitang phatna a omta kei ding hi.
ka hi a, ka gen ding a, ka gen tangtun ahi ding a, sit ahi kei ding: Aw helhat inkuante aw, na damlai mahmah un thu ka gen ding hi, ka tang tungsak pahding, chih
Mihing tapa, ngai in, “Israel inkawte a min Kilakna a muhte bel ni tampi ading ahi a, a genkholhte leng gamlapi ding ahi” a chi uhi.
Huaiziak in a kiang uah,
Huan
“Mihing tapa,” Israel zawlnei, amah lungtang kia a kipan a gen chingte tung ah thu gen inla, “
Zawlnei hai, amau ngaihdan zui a, bangmah muloute tung a gik hi:
Aw Israel, na zawlneite khawpi sesa a sehal om banglel ahita uh.
ni a kidouna ading zou ding a kulhbang dingkip sak ding leh Israel inkawte hum ding a kulhbang lam ding in na paitou kei uhi.
Kilakna hong vuaksuak lel na mu un, thugenkholh dik lou na gen uh ahi kei maw? “
Huaiziak in
Huan ka khut in bangmahlou mute leh zuaugen kholmite a nang ding a, ka mite kidot khawmna ah a tel kei ding ua, Israel inkuante min gelhna ah gelh in a omsam kei ding; huchi in
Galmuanna omloupi a, “Muan huai e” chi a mite a pimang ziak un leh mi bang bawl a, sunu nuhmite’n,
A ke nawn mai ding, vuahpi a hongzu ding a, nou gial lian pite aw, na hong ke ding ua, huih thupi in a hihse ding, chi in.
Ngai un, bang a chip khit chiang in, “Na sunu nuh uh koi ah, a honchi kei ding ua hia?”
Huaiziak in
Huchi in sunu na nuh ngou bang uh ka chim sak ding a, lei pha in a chim dia, huchi in a suangphumte a dawk hial ding hi: huan a chim ding a, bang chim ah hihmang in na om ding uh; huchi in
Hichibang in bang tung ah leh sunu nuhmite tung ah ka hehna ka damsak ding; huan, bang a om nawn kei a, a bangzutte leng a om nawnta kei uh, k’on chi ding hi.
Huai bel Israel zawlnei Jerusalem tung thugen a, galmuanna omloupi a galmuanna musakmite ngei, a om nawn kei uh, chih
Nang mihing tapa, na mite tanute, a lungtang lel ua genmite masuan inla, amau kalh in thu gen in,
Numei, mite ban a sik bunsak leh mi hinnate mat belhna ding a mi liante lu khuhna khuimite a tung uh a gik hi: Nou hinna ding in ka mite hinna na man ding uh maw?
Buhman tawmchik leh tanghou them mu ding a si lou ding sisak ding leh hing lou ding hingsak ding in na zuaugen uh ka mite’n a up ziak un ka mite lak ah ka min a thanghuai ahi.
Huaiziak in
Na lukhuhnate uh leng ka botkek ding a, ka mite na khut ua kipan ka suakta sak ding, na mat theih ding un na khut uah a omta kei ding uh; huchi in
Kei lungkham sak hilou a, mi diktatte lungtang zuau a na hihnat ziak un leh migilou hingdam a a omna ding a a khelhna lampi a kipan a kilehhei louhna ding in migilou khutte na hihhat ua,
Huaiziak in bangmahlou lel, thu genkhol diklou hiam zaw na mu nawn kei ding uh; huan ka mite na khut ua kipan ka hunkhe ding a,
Huchi in Israel upa khenkhatte ka kiang ah a hongpai ua, ka ma ah a tu ua.
thu ka kiang ah a hongtungta, ka kiang ah:
Mihing tapa, hiai mite’n a milimte uh a lungtang uah a lalut ua, a ma uah a thulimlouhna pukna uh a koih uhi; kei hon dong peuhmah ding ua hia?
Huaiziak in, amau houpih inla,
Israel inkawte a milim uh ziak a hon na omtuam san ziak ua a lungtang ua ka mat theihna ding in.
Huaiziak in Israel inkawte kiang ah

Israel inkaw lak a mi kuapeuh hiam, mikhual Israel gam a teng tei hiam, kei a kipan a kihihtuam, a lungtang ua milim lalut a, a ma ua thulimlouhna pukna koih kawm a, a tungtang ua hondong ding a zawlnei kiang a hohkei leh
Huai mi ka masuan ding a, min lamdang a sak ding in tangtawn tangtawn a gen ding in ka mite lak a kipan ka hihmang ding; huchi in kei
Huan zawlnei khem a om in thugen henla, kei
A thulimlouhna uh a paw ding ua: Zawlnei thulimlouhna amah dongmite thulimlouhna bang mai ahi ding hi.
Israel inkawte kei a kip a a man nawnlouh ua, a tatleknate tengteng ua a kihihnit nawn sam louhna ding un, ka mite a hihzawk ua a Pathian uh ka hih theihna ding in,
Mihing tapa, gam mite’n tatlekna thilhih a, ka tung a thil hihkhial a, ken ka khut ka lik a, a an uh, hinna bul ka hihsiat a, a tung ua kial ka tunsak a, mi leh sate k’on hihman leh hiai mi thum,
Noah, Daniel leh Job hial leng hongom bang hileh, a diktatna un amau hinna kia a humbit ding ahi, chih
Gam sahangte a gam uh ka tuansuak sak a, gam a hihsiat ua, a hong kigawp a, gamsa ziak a kuamah paisuak ding a omkei uleh
Hiai mi thumte om le uh, a hin a ka hin laiteng, chih
Ahihkeileh huai gam ah namsau ka lik dia, “Namsau, gamsung teng ah gamtang in” mi leh gamsa ka gawimang ding hi:
Hiai mi thumte om le uh leng, a hin a ka hin laiteng, chih
Ahihkeileh, huai gam ah, hipi k’on lensak a, mi leh sa hihmang ding a sisan suah a ka hehna huai gam tung a k’on sun leh:
Noah, Daniel leh Job hial leng na om le uh, a hin a ka hin sung teng, chih

Himahleh ngai in, huailai a omsun pikhiak dingte nutsiat in a om ding ua, tanute leh tapate leng: ngai un, a kiang uah a hong pawtkhe ding ua, a omdan uh a thilhihte na mu ding uh, Jerusalem tung a thil hoihlou ka hontut thu ah lungmuan in na om ding ua, a tung a kontut tengteng thu ah leng.
A omdan uleh a thilhihte uh na muh hun chiang un a hon lungmuan ding uh; a tung a ka thilhih tengteng hihsan neilou in ka hihkei chih na thei ding uh chih
Mihing tapa, gammang nuai a sing lak a Grepgui sing dang sang in bang ahi a leh?
A sing thil bawlna dia zat ahi hia? Tuium-belsuan khaina ding in kuan a zang ngei a leh?
Ngai in, mei a paihlut ahi a, toh ding in mei in a kangmang, a mong langnih, a kangkhin a a lai ah phattuamna a nei ahia?
Ngai in, a bitlai nangawn in a phatuam kei: phatuam sin kei na tel e, a kat khitnung in!
Huaiziak in
Amau ka masuan ding a, pawt mahle uh, mei a kipan, a kang bei ding, mei in,
A gam uh ka hihgawp ngei ding ahi, thulimlouhna a hih ziak un chih
Mihing tapa, Jerusalem a kihhuainate theikhe sak inla, a kiang ah,
Pathian in Jerusalem kiang ah hichi in a chi ahi: Na pawtna gam leh na pianna gam Kanan mite gam ahi a, na pa Amor mi ahi a, na nu Hit mi ahi.
Huan na pianna thu bel na pian ni’n na laigui at ahi kei a, nang hihsiang ding a tui a sil na hisam kei, chi nuh na tuak kei a, tuam lum na hi kei.
Lainat ding a na tung a hiaite hih ding in kuamah mit in nang a hon hehpih kei ua: gam lak a paihkhiak na hita, na pian ni a kipan kiha om na hi hi.
Huan na kiang a k’ong pai in sisan a talin k’on mu a, na kiang ah, “Sisan ah om lechin leng ‘hing in!’ k’on chi a”: ahi, ka honchi ahi; “Sisan ah om mahle chin ‘hing in!’.
Gam thil pakmum bang in k’on khangsak a, na sam a hong hoih a; savuak leh vuaktang lel na hi lailai hi.”
Huan na kiang a k’ong pai a k’on etin, deihhuai tham na hong hita a, ka puan k’on zawn a, na vuaktanna k’on khuhta hi: ahi, na kiang ah ka kichiam a, thukhun ah k’on lutpih a, kei a na hita hi, chih
Huchi in tui in k’on sil a, ahi, na sisan k’on hihsiang sipsip a, sathau k’on nuh hi.
Puanzem in k’on van a, saham vun khedap k’on bunsak a, puanmalngat hoih in k’on van a, silk puan k’on khusak hi.
Kizepna hoih in k’on zem a, na khut ah taute, na ngawng ah dangkaeng khainiangte,
Na nak ah nakbulhte, na bil ah bilbahte, na lu ah lallukhu hoihtak in k’on zem hi.

Huchi in dangkaeng leh dangkasik a zephoih na hita a, na puansilhte puanmalngat hoihtak leh silpuan leh puankhui kilawm ahi a: na nek tangbuang nel leh khuaizu leh sathau ahi, na kilawm mahmah a, kumpinu leng na ching hi.
Na kilawmna namte lak ah a thangkhia a, ka thupina a kivan in na buchingta, chih
Himahleh na kilawmna na muang lua a, na minthanna na hukloh a, mi vialvak peuh leh na muh peuh na luppih hi.
Na puansilhte suah in mun sangte na zuan a, huai ah kizuak in na pang a, hichibang in na om ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Ka dangkaeng leh ka dangkasik tuium-belsuan hoih taktak k’on piak na la a, pasal limbawlna ding in na zang, na hukpihta hi.
Puansilh khui kilawmte na la a, amau na tuam a, ka sathaute leh ka gimlimte a ma uah na tung hi.
K’on tanghou piak leng ka tangbuang hoih leh sathau leh khuaizu k’on vaknate gimlim ding in a ma uah na lui a; hichi a hong hita, chih
Huailou leng na tanu, na tapa, n’on suansakte a kiang uah kithoihna ding in zat bei din na pia a: na hukna thil namai ahi ahia?
Ka tate na thah a, meipi a pailut a a kiang ua na latte?
Na kihhuaina leh na hukna tengteng ah na naupanlai a vuaktang a na om leh na sisan a na tal maimah laite na thei nawnta kei hi.
Huan hiai na thulimlouhna tengteng khit in leng, hichi a honghi a, na tung a gik hi:
Mun kiphoute na kibawlna, kongzing chiteng ah mun sangte na lam a,
Lampi kipatna tengah munsang na lam a, na kilawmna kihhuai in na bawl a vialvak peuhmahte kiang ah na kilem dawk a, na hukna a uang semsem hi.
Aigupta mi, na inveng, sami mahmah toh kingaihna khelhna leng na hihta; hon hehsak ding in na hukna na uangsakta ahi.
Huaiziak in ngai in, na tung ah ka khut ka lik a, na annek ka kiamsak a, nang hon mudah Philistia tanute, na hukdan zumpih mahmah nute kiang ah ut ut a a honbawl ding un k’on peta hi,
Assuria mite kiang ah leng na kizuak a, huntawk chih lah nei tellou chin a; ahi, a kiang uah kizuak in na pang a, na kham tuan sam kei hi.
Kanan gam ah, Kaldai mite kiang ah na hukna na uangsak lailai a, na kham tuankei hi.
Nang lungtang seta namai e, na tatdan numei genhak gilou mahmah mai thil na hih a, chih
Lamka thuam teng a milim biakna inn na bawl a, kongzing chih a munsangte na bawlte loh na delhlouh ziak in kizuak leng na bang kei hi.
Zi angkawm, pasalte sang a mi tuam deihzaw nu:
Kizuak kiang ah thil a pesek ua, nang bel na lehpiak a hon deihmi ang ah, gamchih a kipan a hongpai ua, a hon luppih theihna ding un na nou zawnak ahi.
Huan na huk thu a kuamah in a honzot louh midang toh na kibatlouhna uh ahi; nang a man na pe zawsop a, kuamah in man a honpiak louh uh na lamdanna ahi.
Huaiziak in aw mi huknu,

Ngai in, nang hon ngaimi na nuamtatpihte tengteng leh na nangaih khitsa tengteng leh na muhdahte tengteng ka samkhawm ding a, he, na kim ah ka pikhawm ding a, na vuaktanna tengteng a muh theihna ding un a kiang uah na vuaktanna ka hihlang ding hi.
Huan numei pasal khen a, amah ta sisan suah tungthu a bang in k’on vaihawm khum ding; hehna leh mullitna sisan na tung ah ka tungsak ding.
A khut uah k’on pedia, na mun kidohte a hihpuk ding ua, na munsangte a chimsak ding ua; na puansilhte a suah ding ua, na suangmantamte a honsut ding ua, savuak leh vuaktang in a hon nuse ding uhi.
Na tung ah mipi a kaikhawm ding ua, suang in a hon deng ding ua, namsau in a hon kui pailet ding uh.
Na innte mei in a hal ding ua, numei tampi mitmuh in na tung ah vaihawmna a tangtung sak ding uh; na hukna ka tawpsak ding a, loh leng na pe ta kei ding hi.
Huchi in ka hehna na tung ah ka lungdam sak ding a, k’on mullitna a daita ding, ka daidide dia, ka heh ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Na tuailai nite na theihgige louh a, hiai thilte a n’on vuisak zawk ziak in ngai in, na tatdan dan, na tung ah ka tun ding, chih
Ngai in, paunak zang peuhmah in hiai paunak a zang ding uh, A tanu in a nu a sun, chih.
Na nu, amah pasal leh tate mudahnu tanu na hi a, ki tanauna lam ah bel, amah pasal leh tate mudahnu tanau na hi: na nu Hit mi ahi a, na pa Amor mi ahi.
Huan, na tanau, na u bel Samaria, na veilam a teng amah leh a tanute toh ahi uh; na tanau, na nau, na taklam a teng Sodom leh a tanute ahi uhi.
Himahleh amau omdan na zuikei a, a kihhuaina bang uh na hih keina a, na omdan tengteng a na thulimlouh zawkdan ngaihtuah in huaite bangmah tham ahi kei hi.
A hin a ka hin sungteng, chih
Na tanau Sodom thulimlouhna hiaite ahi: kisaktheihna, nekvah luatnate, amah leh a tanute nuamtat mawkmawkte ahi, mi gentheite leh tasamte a panpih tuan sam kei uh.
Huan mi uang ahi ua, ka ma a thil kihhuai hihsa ahi uh; huchi in hoih ka sak bang in ka hihmangta ahi.
Samaria in na khelhna kimkhat leng a hih sam kei; amau sang a na kihhuainate na nak hihzawk ziak in na hihsa na kihhuaina tengteng in na sangamnute siam na tangsak hi.

Na sanggamnute dikzaw a na suklat ziak in nangmah in na zahlakna na puak ding ahi; amau sang in thil kihhuai uangzawte na hih a, na khelhnate ziak in amau nang sang in a diktat zaw uhi; ahi, na sanggamnute siam na tansakna ah nang anen aham in zahlakna na tang ding ahi.
Huan a omdan uh, Sodom leh a tanu omdante, Samaria leh a tanu omdante, amaute toh ton in nang omdan mahmah ka hei ding.
Amau dia lungmuanna nana hih sekna a na thilhihsa tengteng ziak a na zum theihna ding in.
Huan na sanggamnute, Sodom leh a tanute, Samaria leh a tanute a omdan uh masa bang in a omnawn ding ua; nang leh na tanu leng na omdan uh masa bang in na omnawn ding uh.
Na thulimlouhna muh khiak a hih ma a na kihihthupi nite in na sanggamnu Sodom na kamse khuahna ahi sek kei maw?
Tun zaw Suria tanu leh a kim a mi tengteng, Philistia tanute na kim a hon simmawh mite’n a hon genseta uhi.
Na hukna leh na kihhuaina na paw zel ahi, chih
Huchi in
Himahleh na naupanlai a na kiang a ka thukhun ka theigige ding a, na kiang ah tangtawn thukhun ka bawl ding hi.
Huchi in na sanggamnute ka pom hun chiang in na omdante na honthei khe ding a, na kizumpih ding: amau lah na tanu ding in ka honpia hi, na thukhun ziakbel hilou in.
Na kiang a ka thukhun ka hihkip ding a,
Na thilhih tengteng k’on ngaihdam vek hun chiang in na theihgigena na zum ziak a na kamkat mahmah nawn louhna ding in, chih
Mihing tapa, Israel inkawte kiang ah thuhaksa bawlkhia inla, gentehna in gen in,
Pathian in hichi in a chi ahi, chi in: Muvanlai lianpi, kha zapi, khaveng saupi gial em um, mul bittak Lebanon tang ah a leng a, Sidar sing zik a tuah hi.
A hiang ziknou pen a kitan a, mi vialvakna gam ah a lenpih a, sumsinna khopi ah a phut hi.
Huai gam haichi leng a tuah a, leihoih ah a pawi pou a, tui tampi gei ah a phut a, nahkai sing bang in a phut hi,
Huan a khang a, grepgui niam bilbial a honghi a, selte a honsuah a, a hiangte a hong dawnta hi.

Muvanlai lianpi dang a om nawn a, kha zapi leh mul bittak a nei tei a, ngai in, hiai grep kung amah lam ah a zung a zam a: a suanna mun a kipan in amah lam ah hiangte a pou khia a, amah tui a a vak theihna ding in.
Hiangte a suah a, grep hoihtak a hih theihna ding in tui tampi gei a lei hoih a phuh ahi.
Ahi, ngai in, phuh hileh leng a piching den dia hia? Suahlam huih in a honnuai hun chiang in a vuai khin maimah kei dia hia? A pouna mun mah ah a vuai maimah ding chi in, a chi a.
Helhat inkawte kiang ah gen in, hiai thil omdan a theikei ua hia? Hilh in, ngai un, Babulon kumpipa Jerusalem ah a hongpai a,
A kumpipa uleh a heutu uh a man a, amah kiang ah Babulon ah a pi a, a kumpipa uh suan khat a man a, thukhun a bawlpih a, thu a chiam teitei a, gam a miliante a pimang vek a,
A lalna gam a keniam a, amah a a dinkhiak theih nawn louhna ding in a thukhun lenkawm kia a a din theihna ding in.

Himahleh sakolte leh mi tampi honsawl ding a ngen ding in Aigupta gam a palai sawl in a tung ah a helta hi. A lohching ding hia? Hichibang hihmi a suakta ding hia? Thukhun hihse ngal in a pawtkhe thou ding hia?
A hin a ka hin laiteng, chih
Mi tampi hihlup ding a mualpawngte leh kulhte a bawl hun chiang un leng Pharo sepaih hon leh pawl thupi mahmah leng bangmah a hihsak theikei ding uhi.
Thukhun bohsia in kichiamna a musitta ngal ua: thu a kichiam nung in hiai thil tengteng a hih nawn a, a suakta peuhmah kei ding hi.
Huaiziak in
Len in ka khuh ding a, ka thang ah a awk ding a, Babulon ah konpi ding a, huchi in a bohsiatna, ka tung ngei a a bohsiatnate ziak in amah ka sual ding.
Huan a pawl tengteng a taikekte tengteng namsau in a si ding ua, a omlaite kawlmong chih ah a dalh ding uh: huan kei

Kongkhak in phel nih a nei tuaktuak a; a phel khat bel kheptheih chiat ahi; kongkhak khat ah phel nih, a dang ah phel nih a nei hi.

Mallampang a dantante tong za a sau tong sawmnga a za ahi a.
Huang sungnung zaw pen mun ong tong sawmnih lamnga leh huang pawnung zaw suanglep lamdoh inchial thum a om tuaktuak hi.

Simlam ah leng mun ong zawn a kulh bang doh in dantante a om nawn hi;
A ma a paina leng mallam dantante paina mah bang ahi a: a dung leh a vai leng, a pawtkhiaknate, a lepkhawm dante, a kongkhakte’n simlam a nga chih kia loungal kibang vek ahi.
Huai dantante lutna ding paisuakna tawp suahlam bangchi’n ah kongkhak a om hi.

Aman ka kiang ah, “Simlam leh mallam dantan, mun awl hondohte dantan siangthoute ahi ua; thil siangthoute a koihkhawm ua; nekding latnate, khelh ziak a kithoihnate, mawh ziak a kithoihnate a latna ding uh ahi: a mun bel Mun Siangthou ahi.

Huailai a siampute a lut phot uleh, Mun Siangthou a kipan in huangsung pawnung zaw ah a pawtkhe ding uh ahi kei; huai ah a nasepna puansilhte uh a koih zawding ua, puansilh siangthou ahi ngal ua; puansilh dang silh kia in vantang lak ah a gamtang thei ding uh” a chi hi.
Inpi sungnungzaw pen a teh khit in suahlam nga kongpi ah a hon pikhia a, a kimvel in a teh hi.

Mihing tapa, hiai ka mangtutphah omna mun, ka khepek ngakna, Israel tate lak a tangtawn a ka tenna ding mun ahi: ka min siangthou Israel Inkawte’n amau in hiam, a kumpipate uh hiam, a hukna uleh a kumpipate uh luangvuina a zang in a hih thanghuai nawnta kei ding uh;

A kongpi uh ka kongpi chin mahmah a bawl in, a kongpi biang uh ka kongpi biang zul a koih in amau leh keimah kikal ah bang kia omsak in a thilhih kihhuaite un ka min siangthou a hih thanghuai uhi; huaiziak in ka hehna in amau ka hihmangta hi.
Tu a kipan in huknate, a kumpipa uh luangte kei a kipan a gamlapi ah koihmang le uh; huchi in a lak uah tangtawn in ka teng ding hi.
Nang mihing tapa, a Inpi lim uh Israel Inkawte kiang ah ensak in; a thil hihkhelh uh a zumpih theihna ding un, a bawldan ding leng na teh uhen.

Huan a thilhih tengteng uh a zumpih ua a Inpi omdante, a pawtkhiaknate, a lutnate, a geldante, a zatdante, a kepdante ensak inla, a mitmuh mahmah uah gelh in; a dan pumpi leh a zatdan tengteng a vom ua, a zuih theihna ding un.
Hiai a Inpi adia dan ding ahi: tang vum tungtam kim tengteng mun siangthoupen ding ahi; ngai dih, hiai Inpi adia dan ding ahi.
Huan tong a teh in hiai maitam letlam ahi, tong khat chih tong khat leh khutpek tuam ahi, a kingakna tong khat a sang, tong khat a za, a gei a kim a khap khat a pawng zel ahi.

Huan maitam sanlam hichibang ahi: lei a a kingakna a kipan a dohdan nuainungzaw pen tong nih ahi a, a zatlam tong khat; a dohdan neuzaw pen a kipan a a dohdan lianzaw pen tong li ahi a, tong khat a za ahi.
A maitam tungtam tong li a sang ahi nawn a, maitam tungtam a kipan in ki li ading hi.
Maitam tungtam a dung leh a vai tong sawmlehnih tuaktuak ahi; a dung a vai kikim ahi.
A dohdan a dung leh a vai tong sawmlehli tuaktuak ahi; a dung a vai kikim ahi: a gei tong kimkhat ahi: a kingakna a kim in tong khat ahi; a kalbi in suahlam a ngat ding ahi, a chi hi.

Huan helhat, Israel inkawte ngei kiang ah huchi in na gen ding ahi:
Lungtang leh sa zeksum louh, ka tanghoute, thaute na lat lai ua ka Mun Siangthou, ka inn mahmah hihbuah ding a na pilut ua, ka thukhun a na tatlek uh, na kihhuaina tengtengte uh na tawpta hen.
Ka thil siangthoute nou na kem kei ua, hiai pautuam mite ka Mun Siangthou ah nou sik a kemmi in na sepzaw uhi.

Ka Mun Siangthou ah nasemmi in a pang ding ua; Inpi kongkhakte a ngak ding ua; Inpi sung ah na a sem ding uh: haltum kithoihnate, mipi adia kithoihnate a gou ding ua; mipi na sepsak ding in a ma uah ading ding uhi.
A milimte uh ma ah a na uh a sepsak ding ua; Israelte Inkawte adin thulimlouhna a pukna a hihnak ziak un a tung uah ka khut ka lik ding a; a thulimlouhna uh a paw ding uh, chih

Huchi in ka kiang ah siampu nasem ding in a honnaih ngeikei ding ua; ka thil siangthoute, thil siangthoupente a honnaih ngei sam kei ding uh; a zahlakna uleh a thil kihhuai hih sate uh a paw zaw ding uh.
A Inpi kemmite ding in ka bawl ding a, nasepna tengteng leh hih ding om peuhmahte hih ding in.
Siampu Levi chi, Zadok ta, kei a kipan a Israel tate a vakmanglai ua ka Mun Siangthou kemmite’n bel ka nasem ding in a hongnaih ding uh; thau leh sisan lan ding in ka ma ah ading ding uh, chih
Ka Mun Siangthou ah a lut ding ua, nna hon sepsak ding in ka dohkan a honnaih ding ua, kei hon kemmi in a pang ding uh.
Huan, huang sungnungzaw kongpite a a lut un puanaktual malngat in a kithuam ding ua, huang sungnungzaw leh inn sunglam a na a sep sung un samul puan a silh ding uh ahi kei hi.
Dial malngat a khim ding ua, puanmalngat pheitom a bun ding ua, kho-ul sak thei a silh ding uh ahi kei hi.

Huan huangsung pawnung zaw, vantang kiang a a hong pawtkhiak uleh a nasepna puansilhte uh a suah ding ua, dantan siangthou ah a koih ding uh, puansilh dang a silh ding uh; mipite a puansilh ua misiangthou a a bawl tei louhna ding un.
A lute uh a metgiau ding uh ahi kei a; a sam uh leng a hawisau ding uh ahi sam kei; a met lel ding uh ahi.
Siampu peuhpeuh huang sungnung zaw pen a lut chiang un uain a dawn ding uh ahi kei hi.
Meithai hiam maksa nung hiam zi in a nei ding uh ahi sam kei hi; Israel Inkawte, nungak siangthou hiam siampu sihsan meithai a kitenpih zawk ding uh ahi.
Ka mite thil siangthou leh siangthoulou kibatlouhdan a hilh ding uh ahi; thil siang leh siang lou a khentuam sak ding uhi.

Thubuaite leng a ngaihtuah ding uh ahi; ka ngaihtuah bangzel in a ngaihtuah ding uh: Ka Ankuanglui sehsa tengteng ah ka dante leh ka dan bawlsate a zuih ding uh ahi; ka khawlnite leng a tan ding uh ahi.
Amau kihihbuah ding in misi luang a naih ding uh ahi kei; himahleh nu hiam, pa hiam, tanu hiam, tapa hiam unaupa hiam sanggamnu pasal neilou hiam adin a kihihbuah thei ding uh.

Huang sungnungzaw Mun Siangthou a nasem ding a a lut ni’n khelh ziak a kithoihna amah ading in a lan ding, chih
Goutan bangmah a neikei ding ua; a goutan uh kei ka hi ding. Israel ah tan bangmah na pe ding uh ahi kei, a tan uh keimah ka hi.
Nekding latte, khelh ziak a thillatte, mawh ziak a thillatte a ne ding ua; Israel lak a thil siangthou peuhmah amau ading ahi.

Gah masate lak a a hoihpente, na thillat chiteng ua a hoihpen, na thillat tengteng ua siampute ading ahi: na inn ua vualzawlna a tamden theihna ding in tangbuang meklom hoihpen siampu kiang ah na pe ding uh ahi.

Hiai ah Mun Siangthou adin a dung leh a vai tong za nga tuaktuak, kimkot ahi ding a, a kim in tong za nga a za mun ong a om ding ahi.

Gamseh siangthou bel, siampu, Mun Siangthou a nasemmi, a nasem ding a
Mun dang a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai tong sing khat, Levi chi Inpi a nasemmite tuam ding in, a tenna khopi ding in a om ding ahi.
Gamseh siangthou latsa zul ah khopi tan a vai tong za nga leh a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga na sep ding uhi, Israel Inkaw pumpi ading ahi ding.

Huan, kumpitapa tan bel gam siangthou latsa leh khopi tan malam ah tumlam a tumlam nga in, suahlam a suahlam nga in a om ding ahi. A dung bel tumlam gamgi a kipan a suahlam gamgi pha in, gamseh dang tanmah ahi.
Huai bel Israel gam a amah tantuam ahi ding ahi: ka vaihawmte’n ka mite a nuaisiah nawn kei ding ua, Israel Inkawte a nam tuamdan bangzel in gam a pe zaw ding uhi.
Bukna dik, ephah dik leh bath dik na zat ding uh ahi.
Ephah leh bath a kikim ding uh ahi, bath homer seh sawm a khen a seh khat ahi ding a, ephah leng homer seh sawm a khen a seh khat ahi sam ding: homer a kipan a tehkhiak ding ahi ding.
Huan sekel bel gerah sawmnih ahi ding a: sekel nga bel sekel nga geih ahi ding a, sekel sawm bel sekel sawm geih ahi ding a, na min a uh sekel sawmnga geih ahi ding hi.
Huan hiai thillat na lat ding uh ahi ding; buh homer khat zel ah ephah seh guk a khen a seh khat leh buh man homer khat zel ah ephah seh guk a khen a seh khat na pe ding uhi:
Huan sathau latdan ding kor khat zel ah bath seh sawm a khen a seh khat; kor bel bath sawm ahi.
Israel gantatna mun hoih a kipan belamhon lak a za nih zel ah a nou khat, nekding lat ding in, haltum kithoihna ding in lemna thillat ding in amaute hihsiangna bawlna ding in a lat ding uh ahi, chih
Gam a mi tengteng in Israel vaihawmpa kiang ah hiai thillat a pe ding uh.

Ankuang luina ah, kha thak ah, khawlni ah, Israel Ankuanglui ni sehsa tengteng ah haltum kithoihna, nekding lat, dawn ding latte lan in a ngaihtuah ding a; khelh ziak a kithoihna, nekding lat, haltum kithoihna, lemna thillat Israel Inkawte kisiansakna ding in aman a tumsak ding ahi.
Huan siampu in khelh ziak a kithoihna sisan a la ding a, Inpi kongpi biang leh maitam dohdan ning lite leh huang sungnung zaw pen kongpi bangka ah a tat ding hi.
Huai kha ni sagih ni’n hihkhak hiam theihlouh ziak hiam a thil hihkhial mite ading in leng huchi mah bang in na hih ding a, huchibang in Inpi hihsianna na bawl ding hi.
Kha khatna, huai kha ni sawmlehli ni’n Paikan Ankuang na tang ding ua; huan, ni sagih sung tanghou silngou sohlouh na ne ding uh:
Huai nin vaihawmpa in amah leh a gam a mi tengteng adia khelh ziak a kithoihna dia bawngtal tuai a tum ding ahi.
Ankuanglui hun ni sagih sung teng in bawngtal tuai gensiat bei sagih leh belamtal sagih zel
Huan tanghou lat ding in bawngtal khat zel ah ephah khat, belamtal khat zel ah ephah khat leh ephah khat zel ah sathau hin khat a tum ding hi.

Kha sagihna, huai kha ni sawm leh ni nga ni a Ankuangluina ah ni sagih sung huchibang mah in a hih ding a, khelh ziak a kithoihnate, haltum kithoihnate, tanghou latte leh sathau latte a tum ding ahi, a chi hi.
Huchi in

Huan vaihawmpa bel kongpi sumtong ah a lut ding a, kongpi bangka chin ah ading ding a, siampute’n a haltum kithoih leh lemna thillatte a bawlsak ding ua, lutna kongpi dantan ah Pathian a be ding; huchi in a pawtkhe ding a, kong bel nitaklam tan a khaklouh ahi ding ahi.
Huan vantang in bel khawlni leh kha thakte ah kongpi lutna chinte ah
Khawlni’n vaihawmpa’n
Belamtal khat zel ah tanghou lat ephah khat, belamnou pen ah bel a piak theih bangbang, leh ephah khat ah sathau hin khat zel ahi ding hi.
Kha thak ni’n bawngtal tuai gensiat bei khat, belamnou guk leh belamtal khat ahi ding a, gensiat bei ahihvek ding uh ahi:
Huan tanghou lat a bawl ding a, bawngtaltuai ah ephah khat, belamtal ah ephah khat, belamnou pen ah a theih bangbang, leh ephah khat zel ah sathau hin khat ahi ding hi.
Vaihawmpa a lut in kongpi sumtong ah a lut ding a, huai mah ah a pawtkhe nawn ding hi.
Vantangte bel Ankuanglui ni sehsa a
Huan a lut un vaihawmpa bel a lak uah a lut ding a, a pawt un a pawtkhe nawn ding hi.
Nopbawlna leh sehsa Ankuanglui nite, tanghou lat bawngtal tuai khat ah ephah khat, belamtal khat ah ephah khat, belamnou pen ah a piak theih bangbang, ephah khat ah sathau hin khat zel ahi ding hi.
Huan vaihawmpa’n utthu a thillat a lat dek leh haltum kithoihna hiam lemna thillat hiam
Niteng a
Zingsang teng in tanghou lat na bawl ding a, ephah seh guk a khen seh khat leh sathau hin khat seh thum a khen seh khat tangbuang nel mahmah nawmsakna din: huai bel tangtawn a
Hichibang in haltum thillat gige ding in belamnou, tanghou latte, sathaute zingsang teng in na bawl ding ahi, chi in.
Himahleh a goutan a pen a nasemmi kuahiam kiang a a piak leh salpawtna kum tan in a nei ding a, huai ah vaihawmpa kiang ah a pekik nawn ding hi. Amah gou ngeingei bel a tapate ading ahi ding.

Huailou in vaihawmpa in mite goutan a suhsak ding ahi kei a, a inn leh lou ua kipan a delhkhe ding ahi sam kei; amah a pen mah a tapate kiang ah goutan in a pedia; Amau inn leh lou a kipan mite a vakzak louhna ding un, a chi hi.
Huan kongpi pang a siampute adia dantan siangthou mallam nga ah a hon pilut a; ngai dih, a phaitam tumlam pang ah mun a na om hi.

Aman ka kiang ah, “Hiai siampute’n mawh ziak a thillat leh khelh ziak a thillat a huanna mun uh, tanghou lat omna mun ahi; huangsung pawnung zaw a a tawikhiak ua mite hihsiangna dia a bawllouhna ding un” a chi hi.
Huang pawnung zaw ah a hon pikhia a, huangsung ningzul ah a hon paisak a; ngai dih, a huangsung ning chiat ah huang a om nawn hi.
Huangsung ning li ah huang, bang nei, a dung tong sawmli, a vai tong sawmthum a na om a; huai a ning a te a li un a kikim vek uhi.
Huai mun li sunglam ah a kimvel in suang vualin a lem ua, huai vual nuai ah a kim in huanna ding thuk a om hi;
Huchi in ka kiang ah, “Hiaite huanna in, Inpi nasemmite’n mite kithoihna sa a huanna dingte uh ahi” a chi hi.

Huchi in Inpi kongkhak ah a hon pikik a; ngai dih, Inpi kongpi chin nuai a kipan, suahlam nga in tui a hong luangkhia a; Inpi suahlam nga ahi a, huan tui maitam simlam Inpi pang taklam nuai a kipan in a hong luangkhia hi.
Huan mallam nga kongpi ah a hon pikhia a, inkuan ah suahlam nga kongpi pawnung zaw pha in a honpi a; ngai dih, taklam pang ah tui a hong luangkhia hi.
Huan huai mi’n tehna khau tawi in suahlam nga a pai in tong sang khat a teh a; tui a honngap galkah sak a, siakmit tan ahi.
Huchi in tong sang khat a teh nawn a; tui a hon ngap galkah sak nawn a, khuk tan ahi. Huan, tong sang khat a teh nawn a; hon ngap galkah sak nawn a, tui kawng tan ahi.
Huan tong sang khat a teh nawn a; ngah galkah vuallouh luipi a hong hita a; tui a hong sangzel a, a ngah a ngah galkah vuallouh, a leuh a leuh tham luipi a hong hita hi.
Ka kiang ah, “Mihing tapa, hiai na mu hia?” a chi hi.
Huan luigei a kiknawn ding in a honpi kikta hi.
Huchi in ka kik a, ngai dih, luigei tawn in, luigei langtuak in sing tampi a na om hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Hiai tui suahlam gam lam a luang Arabah gam a luanglut ding ahi; tuipi ah a luanglut ding a, tuipi tui al tui siangthou a suaksak ding.

Huan hichi a honghi ding a; luite a luanna peuh uah ganhing chiteng in a damloh ding ua, ngasate a om huthut ding uh: tuipi tui a siangthouna ding leh a luanna peuh a ganhingte’n a hinlohna ding un hiai lui hongluang ahi.
Huan hichi a honghi ding a; a gei ah ngamanmite a ding ding ua; Engedi a kipan Eneglaim pha in lenpaihna mun ahi ding; a ngasa pen a chi bangzel un, tuipi lian ngasa bang mai in a tam mahmah ding uh.
Buannawi leh chiklakte bel a siangthou teikei ding ua, chi khuk ding a nutsiat ahi ding hi.

A luigei ah a gei langnih in theikung chichih a pou ding a, huaite a nah a vuai ngeikei in a gahlou ngei sam kei ding, Mun Siangthou a kipan a lui hong luangkhia vak a hih ziak in kha chih in a gah ding: a gah nekding ahi ding a, a nah bel hihdamna ding ahi ding” a chi hi.
Kibang chiat in na tang ding uh ahi; na pipute uh kiang a piak ding a ka kichiamsa ahi: hiai gam na gam tan un a puk ding ahi.
Hiai a gam pumpi gi ding ahi: Mallam ah Tuipi Lian a kipan in Hethlon paisuak in Hamath lutna guam ah Zedad a tung a;
Berothah, Damaska leh Hamath kigitna lai a om Sibraim, Hauran gamgi zul a om Hazorhattikon pha in.
Huchi in gamgi bel Tuipi Lian a kipan in Damaska gamgi zul a Hazarenan pha in ahi ding a: mallam ah Hamath gamgi ahi ding hi. Hiai mallam gamgi ahi.
Huan suahlam ah Hauran leh Damaska kikal ah Gilead leh Israel gam kikal a Jordan lui dung a zui ding; mallam gamgi a kipan in suahlam tuipi ah Tamar a pha ding. Hiai suahlam gamgi ahi ding hi.
Simlam ah Tamar a kipan in Meibothkadesh tuite pha in Aigupta lui zui in Tuipi Lian a tung ding. Hiai simlam gamgi ding ahi.
Tumlam ah Tuipi Lian in a gi ding a, simlam gamgi a kipan in Hamath lutna guam zawn pha in. Hiai tumlam gamgi ahi ding hi.
Huchi in hiai gam Israel nam dungzui in na lak uah na hawm ding uh.

Huan hichi ahi ding a, na gam tan ding uleh na lak ua namdang teng, zi leh ta nei sate gam tan ding bel na hop ding uh ahi. Amau lah Israel ta dia piang mawng ahi ding uh ahi; Israel namte lak ah noute bang in tan a neih ding uh ahi.
Huan hichi a honghi ding a; kua nam lak ah leng namdang na nateng leh, huailai a a gam tan ding na sehsak ding uh ahi, chih

Hiaite a nam minte uh ahi: Mallam gamgi Tuipi Lian a kipan a Hethlon paisuak in Hamath lutna guam ah Damaska gamgi a Hamath kiang mallam pang Hazarenan pha in, suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Dante tan ahi.
Dante tan toh a kigi in suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Asherte tan ahi.
Asherte tan toh a kigi in suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Naphtalite tan ahi.
Naphtalite tan toh a kigi in suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Manassehte tan ahi.
Manassehte tan toh a kigi in suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Ephraimte tan ahi.
Ephraimte tan toh a kigi in suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Reubente tan ahi a.
Reubente tan toh a kigi in suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Judahte tan ahi.

Judahte tan toh ki gamgi in suahlam leh tumlam ah, thilpiak na lat ding uh a vai tong sing nih leh sang nga ahi ding a; a dung suahlam leh tumlam sang ah tan dang bangmah in ahi a, a lai a Mun Siangthou om in.
Thilpiak

Huan hiai ah siampute adin gam siangthou thilpiak ding ahi ding a; mallam sang ah a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga leh tumlam sang ah a vai tong sing khat leh suahlam sang ah a vai tong sing khat, simlam sang ah a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga ahi ding ahi: A laizang ah
Siampu siansaksa, Zadok tapate ka thu kemmite ding ahi ding. Huaite Israel tate a vakmang lai ua Levi chite a vakmang sam bang ua vakmang loute ahi uhi.
Huan gam thilpiak pumpi a kipan amau a piaktuam, mun siangthoupen ahi ding a, Levi chi tan toh a kigi in.
Siampu tan zulzul ah Levi chite’n tan a nei ding ua, a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai tong sing khat ahi ding hi.
Huan a zuak ding uh ahi kei a, a khen ding uh leng ahi sam kei: a gam hoihna tata leng midang kiang a piak ding ahi kei hi:
Huan a vai tong sing nih leh sang nga ban ah tong sang nga vantang tan, khopi dinna ding, tenna inn dingte leh khopuate a ding ahi ding: khopi bel a laizang ah a om ding hi.

Huchi in a teh vialdan hichibang in ahi ding: A mallampang tong sang li leh za nga, a simlam pang tong sang li leh za nga; a suahlam pang tong sang li leh za nga, a tumlam pang tong sang li leh za nga ahi:
A khopi in khopua a nei ding a; mallam pang in tong za nih leh sawmnga; simlam pang tong za nih leh sawmnga, suahlam pang tong za nih leh sawmnga, tumlam pang tong za nih leh sawmnga ahi.

A dunglam val lai thilpiak siangthou zul a pen suahlam ah tong sing khat, tumlam ah tong sing khat ahi ding: thilpiak siangthousa zulzul ahi ding hi: huai a thilpawtte khopi a nasemmite nekding ahi ding.
Huchi in, khopi a nasemmi Israel nam tengteng a mite’n a lei a let ding uhi.
Thilpiak pumpi a dung tong sing nih leh sang nga, a vai tong sing nih leh sang nga ahi ding; thilpiak siangthousa, dung leh vai kikim khopi tan toh na lat ding uh ahi.

A val thilpiaksa siangthou leh khopi tan pang lang tuaktuak vaihawmpa tan ahi ding a, suahlam sang ah thilpiak tong sing nih leh sang nga ban, gamseh dangte zulzul vaihawmpa tan ahi ding: huchi in thilpiak siangthousa leh Inpi Mun Siangthou bel a laizang ah a om ding.
Huan Levi chi tan leh khopi tan vaihawmpa tante kikal ah a om ding a; vaihawmpa tan Judah tan leh Benjamin tan toh a kigi ding. Namdangte gam ding
Huan nam omlaite tungthu ah, suah leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Benjaminte tan ahi ding.
Benjaminte tan toh kigi in suah leh tumlam sang ah tan khat Simeonte tan ahi.
Simeonte tan toh kigi in suah leh tumlam sang Issakarte tan ahi a.
Issakarte tan toh kigi in suah leh tumlam sang tankhat Zebulunte tan ahi.
Zebulunte tan toh kigi in suah leh tumlam sang tan khat Gadte tan ahi.
Gadte tan simlam pang gamgi Tarmar a kipan in Meribah Kadesh tuite tan in Aigupta lui zui in Tuipi Lian a tung ding hi.
Hiai Israel namte goutan ding a gam kihawmdan ding leh a gam sehtuamte ahi uh chih
Huan hiaite khopi a kipan pawtnate ahi uh; mallam pang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum:
Khopi kongpite Israel nam min bangzel a sak ding ahi a; Mallam kongpi thumte, Reuben kongpi khat, Judah kongpi khat, Levi kongpi khat;
Suahlam pang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum: Joseph kongpi khat, Benjamin kongpi khat, Dan kongpi khat ahi ding hi.
Simlam pang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum: Simeon kongpi khat, Issakar kongpi khat, Zebulun kongpi khat ahi ding;
Tumlam pang tong sang li leh za nga ah kongpi thum: Gad kongpi khat, Asher kongpi khat, Naphtali kongpi khat, ahi ding hi.
A kimvel in tong sing khat leh sang giat ahi ding a; huai ni a kipan in khopi min bel, ‘
Judah kumpipa Jehoakim vaihawm kum thum kum in Babulon kumpipa Nebukadnezzar hong kuan in Jerusalem a hongum hi.
Huan
Kumpipa’n a michilgehte heutupa Aspenaz, Israel tate lak a kuate hiam, kumpi chite a kipan leh milian te a kipan honpi ding in a kiang ah thu a gen hi.

Tuailaite amau a gensiatna omlou, himahleh hoihtak a deihsakna tang leh, pilna tengteng a siamtheihna leh pilna theihsiamna lungpilte, kumpipa Inpi ading thei ding, huchibang mite; huchi a Kaldai laisiamna leh pau amaute a sinsak theihna ding in.

Huchi in kumpipa’n amau ni teng tantuan ding in kumpipa an leh a dawn uain a kipan in a sehsak a, huchi a kum thum vakthau a a omtheihna ding un; huchi a huai hun bei chiang a kumpipa ma a adin theihna ding un.
Huchi in hiaite lak ah, Judah tate a kipan, Daniel, Hananiah, Misael leh Azariah a om uhi.
Michilgehte heutupa’n amaute min ding a phuahsaka; Daniel min ding in Belteshazzar; Hananiah min ding in Sadrak; Misael min ding in Meshak leh Azariah min ding in Abednego a phuak hi.
Himahleh Daniel in kumpipa an hiam a dawn uain hiam a ki hihnit louh a lungtang in a tum chiltel hi. Huaiziak in michilgeh heutupa kiang ah a ki hihnit louhna ding in a ngenta hi.
Huchi in Pathian in Daniel michilgehte heutupa mitmuh in deihsakna leh lainatna a musak hi.

Huan michilgehte heutupa’n Daniel kiang ah, “Ka toupa kumpipa na an uleh na dawn uh seppa ka kihta: bangding in na khanvual pih uh tuailaite sang a na mel uh hoihlou zaw a honmu ding ahia oi? Huchi in kumpipa lak ah ka lutang na lauthawngsak dia hia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in Daniel in sumkempa, michilgehte heutupa’n Daniel, Hananiah, Misael leh Azariah tung a a sehpa kiang ah:
“Na sikhate ni sawm sung enkhia in, k’on ngen hi; nek ding in anteh louhing leh dawn ding in tui honpia uhen.
Huaichiang in na ma ah ka mel uleh amau kumpipa annete tuailaite mel et hi hen; na muh bang in, na sikhate tung ah hih in” a chi hi.
Huchi in amau thu a ngaikhia a, ni sawm sung a enkhia hi.
Ni sawm a bei in tuailai kumpipa annete tengteng sang in a mel uh hoihzaw in a kilang a, a sa uh leng a thau zaw hi.
Huchi in sumkempa’n a an uleh a dawn ding uh uain a lamang a, amaute kiang ah anteh louhing a pe zawta hi.
Hiai tuailai lite a hih uleh Pathian in amaute kiang ah laisiamna leh pilna tengteng a theihna leh kivakna a pia a: huchi in Daniel in mengmuhna leh mang tengteng ah theihsiamna a nei hi.
Kumpipa’n amaute hon pilut ding a chih nite a bei in michilgehte heutupa’n amaute Nebukadnezzar ma ah a honpi hi.
Kumpipa’n amau a houlimpih a; amau lak ah Daniel, Hananiah Misael leh Azariah bang kuamah muh in a omta kei hi: huaiziak in kumpipa ma ah a dingta uhi.
Huchi in pilna leh theihsiamna thu chiteng, amaute kumpipa’n a dotte ah a gamsung a om mitkhialdawi tawi leh bummi tengteng sang in a mun sawm a hoihzaw in amaute a mu hi.
Daniel kumpipa Kura kum khat vaihawm tanpha hial in a paisuak tou hi.
Nebukadnezzar vaihawm kum nih kum in Nebukadnezzar in mang a nei a; a lungsim a buai mahmah a, a ihmu theita kei hi.
Kumpipa’n mitkhialdawitawi leh, bummi leh, aisanmi leh Kaldaimite, kumpipa mang hilh ding a sap ding thu a pia hi. Huchi in a honglut ua kumpipa ma ah a hong dingta uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n a kiang uah, “Mang ka nei a, mang thei ding in ka lungsim a buai mahmah hi” a chi hi.
Kaldai mite’n kumpipa kiang ah Suria pau in, “Aw kumpipa, tangtawn in dam in; na sikhate na mang hilh in, a hilhchetna ka ensak ding uh” a chi uhi.
Kumpipa’n a dawng a, “Kaldai mite kiang ah, hiai thil kei a kipan a paikheta; mang leh a hilhchetna ka kiang a n’on theihsak kei ua leh atnen in na om ding ua, na innte uh ekvum a honghi ding.
Himahleh mang leh a hilhchetna n’on theihsak ua leh kei a kipan in thilpiakte leh kipahman leh nakpitak a zahtakna na mu ding uh; huaiziak in mang leh a hilhchetna hon ensak un” a chi hi.
A nihveina ding in amau a dawng ua, “Kumpipa’n mang honhilh henla, kou a hilhchetna ka ensak ding uh” a chi uhi.
Kumpipa’n a dawng a, “Kei a kipan hiai thil a paikheta chih na muh ziak un, hun hihsau tum na hi uh chih ka theitel hi.

Himahleh mang ka kiang a n’on theihsak kei uleh, nou ading in dan khat kia a om; hun a kikhen tan a, ka ma a thu zuau leh sia gelkhol na hih ziak un; huaiziak in mang honhilh unla, a hilhchetna n’on ensak thei uh chih ka thei ding” a chi hi.

Kaldai mite’n kumpipa ma ah a dawng ua, “Kumpipa thudot ensak thei leitung ah kuamah a omkei; kumpipa hiam, toupa hiam, vaihawmmi kuamah in mitkhialdawitawi kuamah hiam, bummi kuamah hiam, Kaldai mi kuamahmah huchibang thu a dot ngeilouh ziak un.
Kumpipa thildeih vangtak ahi, pathiante a omna uh sa toh hiloute chih louhngal, midang kuamah in kumpipa ma ah huai a ensak theikei ding uh” a chi uhi.
Hiai ziak in kumpipa a heh mahmah a, a thangpai tuntuna, Babulon mi pil tengteng hihmang ding in thu a peta hi.
Huchi in thupiak piakkhiak ahita a, mipilte thah ding ahi ta uhi; Daniel leh a lawmte thah ding in a zong uhi.
Huchi in Daniel in kumpipa veng sepaih zaheutu Ariok, Babulon mipilte that ding a kuankhe pa kiang ah thuhilhna leh thupil toh dawnna a kiksak hi:
Ariok kumpipa sepaih zaheutu a dong a a kiang ah, “Bangdia kumpipa a kipan thupiak huchitel a kin ahia?” a chi hi. Huchi in Ariok in Daniel kiang ah a thil omdan a theisak hi.
Daniel a lut a, amah adia hun sehsak ding in kumpipa a ngen hi, huchi a a hilhchetna kumpipa a etsak theihna ding in.
Huchi in Daniel a inn ah a pai a, Hananiah, Misael, Azariah, a lawmte kiang ah huai thil a theisakta hi.
Huchi a amaute’n hiai thuguk tanchin a van Pathian chitnate a nget theihna ding un; huchi a Daniel leh a lawmte Babulon a mipilte a lakte toh a manthat louhna ding un.
Huchi in zan mengmuhna ah Daniel kiang ah thuguk taklat in a omta hi. Daniel in van Pathian a phat hi.
Daniel in a dawng a:
Tangtawn tangtawn in Pathian min phat in om hen;
pilna leh hatna amah a ahi, a chi hi;
Aman hunte leh hunbite a hih
lamdang a; kumpipate a suankhia,
kumpipate a tung khia a; mipilte kiang ah pilna a pia a,
theihsiamna theite kiang ah theihna a pia hi.
Thil thukte leh thil gukte a taklang a, mial a om bang ahia a thei a,
a kiang ah khovak a om hi.
Na tung ah ka kipak a, k’on phat hi, Aw nang ka pipute
Pathian, pilna leh hatna hon pepa,
nang k’on nget uh ka kiang ua hon theisakpa’n;
kumpipa thu ka kiang uah n’on theisakta ngal a,
a chi uhi.

Huaiziak in Daniel, kumpipa’n Babulon mipilte hihse dia a sehpa, Ariok kiang ah a hoh a; a vahoh a a kiang ah hichibang in a chi hi; “Babulon mipilte hihmang ken; kumpipa ma ah hon pilut inla, kumpipa kiang ah a hilhchetna ka ensak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Ariok in kintak in kumpipa ma ah Daniel a pilut a, a kiang ah hichibang in a chi a; “Judah saltangte lak ah mi khat ka mu a, aman kumpipa kiang ah a hilhchetna a theisak ding” a chi hi.
Kumpipa’n a dawng a Daniel kiang ah, a min Belteshazzar hiven, “Mang ka neih n’on theisak thei in, a hilhchetna n’on theisak thei ding maw?” a chi hi.
Daniel in kumpipa ma ah a dawng a, “Thuguk kumpipa’n a nget mi pil hi in, aisanmite hileh, kumpipa kiang ah a ensak theikei ding uhi.

Himahleh van ah Pathian a om a aman thugukte a taklang hi; ni nanung lam a bang om ding ahia chih kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kiang ah a theisak hi. Na lupna tung a na lutang mengmuhna leh na mang hiaite ahi:

Nang na hihleh aw kumpipa na lupna tung ah na lungsim sung ah na ngaihtuahnate a hongom ua; tunung chiang a bang ahia hongom ding thu: huan amah thugukte na kiang a taklangpa’n bang ahia hongom ding na kiang ah a theisakta hi.

Himahleh kei bel pilna mihing dangte sang a pilna ka neih tamzawk ziak a hiai thuguk ka kiang a taklat ahi kei a; himahleh a hilhchetna kumpipa kiang a theihsak a hih theihna ding leh nang na lungtang ngaihtuahte na theihna ding ahizaw hi.
“Aw kumpipa ngai in, nang milim thupitak na muta hi. Hiai milim hattak mai, a vakna thupi mahmah, na ma ah ading a; a mel a kihtakhuai mahmah hi.
Hiai milim ahihleh a lutang dangkaeng hoih ahi a, a awm leh a bante dangka, a gil leh a pheipite dal,
a khete sik, a khezungte sik leh tungman khenkhat kihel ahi.
Suang khut a seklouh huai milim a khepek sik, leh tung deng a kitam nen sak dimdem tan in na mu hi.

Huchi in sik, tungman, dal, dangkate leh dangkaeng toh a kitam nen khawm vek ua, nipi buhphual a buhsi bang mai a honghi ua; huchi in huih in huaite a mutmang a, huai milim dengzan suangpi pen mual thupi a hongsuak a, lei pumpi a dimta hi.
“Hiai mang ahi a; kumpipa ma ah a hilhchetna ka gen ding uhi.
Aw kumpipa, nang kumpipate Kumpipa, van Pathian in a kiang a gam leh thilhihtheihna, hatna leh thupinate a piakna na hi.
Koipeuh a mite tate a tenna uah, gam a sate leh van a vasate na khut ah a honpia hi; amau tengteng tung a vaihawm ding a a bawl dangkaeng lutang na hi.
Nang nung in nang sang a niamzaw gamdang khat a hong dingkhe ding; huchi in lalgam thumna dang, leitung tengteng a thunei ding in.
Huan gam lina sik bang in a hat ding a, sik in a keknen sak a thil tengteng a nuaisiah bang in sik in hiaite tengteng a delhzan bang in, a keknen sak in, a delhzan ding hi.
Huan khepek leh khezung na muhte, a khen belvelmi tungman leh a khen sik ahihleh gam hawmzak ahi ding a; himahleh asung ah sik hatna a om ding a, sik tungman toh helkhawm na muh bangtak in.
Huan khepek khezungte, a khen sik leh a khen tungman pen ahihleh, huchibang in gam hatna chiang nei, kitapna chiang nei a hi ding hi.
Huan sik leh tungman kihel na muh pen ahihleh, mite chi toh amau a kitok hel ding uh; himahleh sik leh tungman a kigawm theihlouh bang in a ki kawikip kei ding uhi.

Huai kumpipate damlai in van Pathian in gam suksiat a om ngeilou ding, a thuneihna midang kiang a nutsiat a om ngei samlou ding, a hon dingkhe sak ding a; himahleh hiai gam tengteng a kitam nen sak ding a, a suse vek ding, amah bel tangtawn in ading ding hi.

Huchi in Suangpi mual a kipan khut a sek louh hong omkhia a, sik, dal, tungman, dangka leh dangkaengte a kitam sak dimdem na muh pen ahihleh; tunung chiang a bang ahia hongom ding kumpipa kiang ah Pathian thupi in a theisakta hi: mang omzia theihsa ahi a, a khiakna a kichian hi” a chi hi.
Huaitak in Nebukadnezzar in a mai a leisi in Daniel a bia a, thillat leh gim namtui a kiang a lan ding in amau thu a pia hi.
Kumpipa’n Daniel a dawng a, “Chihtaktak in na Pathian, pathiante Pathian leh, kumpipate
Huchi in kumpipa’n Daniel a liansak a, thilpiak tampi a pia hi, Babulon bial pumpi a heutu leh Babulon mipilte tengteng tung a ukpipa pen ding in a bawlta hi.
Daniel in Sadrak, Meshak, Abednego, Babulon bial thu leh la tung a koih ding in kumpipa kiang ah a ngen hi; himahleh Daniel zaw kumpipa kongpi ah a om hi.
Nebukadnezzar kumpipa’n dangkaeng milim, tong sawmguk a sang, tong guk a lian a bawl a; Babulon bial a Dura phaizang ah a dingsak hi.

Nebukadnezzar kumpipa’n bial heutute, vaihawmmite, ukpipate, thukhenmi, sumkemmi, thudotmi, dansiammi leh bial vaihawmmi tengteng a kaikhawm a, Nebukadnezzar kumpipa’n a dinkhiak milim kipahpihna bawlna a hongpai ding in mi a sawlkhia hi.

Huchi in bial heutu vaihawmmi, ukpipa, thukhenmi, sumkemmi, thudotmi, dansiammi leh bial vaihawmmi tengteng kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in a dinkhiak sak milim kipahpihna ah a hong kikhawm vek uhi; Nebukadnezzar adin khiaksak milim ma ah ading uhi.
Huaitak in tangkou ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Na kiang ua thupiak ahi, Aw mite, namte, paute,
Pengkul, tamngai, kaihging, gosem, nawtging, tumging pengnih nei leh tumging chichih ging na zak chiang un, puk unla, kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in adin khiaksak dangkaeng milim bia un:
Huan kuapeuh a bia a puklou a, beloute meipi kuang zuazua sung ah huai hun mah a paihlut ding ahi” a chi hi.

Huaiziak in huailai a mi tengteng in pengkul, tamngai, kaihging gawsem, nawtging leh tumging chichih ging a zak un, mi tengteng, namte, paute, a puk ua, kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in a tunkhiak dangkaeng milim a bia uhi.
Huchihlai in Kaldai mi kuate hiam a hongpai nai ua, Judah tuailaite a hong hekta uhi.
A dawng ua kumpipa Nebukadnezzar kiang ah, “Aw kumpipa, tangtawn in dam in!

Aw kumpipa, nang thupiak na bawl a, mi chiteng in pengkul, tamngai, kaihging, gawsem leh nawtging, tumging pengnih neite leh, tumging chichih a zak chiang ua, a puk ding ua dangkaeng milim a biak ding uh chi in.
Kuapeuh puklou a belou, meipi kuang zuazua ah paihlut ding” chi in,

Babulon bial a thu leh la tung a na sehsa Judah kuate hiam a om ua, Sadrak, Meshak, leh Abednego; hiai mite’n, Aw kumpipa, nang a hon limsak kei ua; na pathiante na a semkei ua na dinkhiak sak dangkaeng milim leng a bekei uh, chi in.
Huchi in Nebukadnezzar heh leh thangpai in Sadrak, Meshak, Abednego honpi ding in thu a pia hi.

Huchi in hiai mite kumpipa ma ah a honpi ua, Nebukadnezzar in a dong a a kiang uah, “Aw Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego, ka pathian nna nasep louh ua, dangkaeng milim ka tunkhiak na biak louh uh, na tup mawng uhia?” a chi hi.

Tuin na kimansak unla chik hunpeuh a pengkul, tamngai, kaihging, gawsem, nawtging leh tumging pengnih nei leh tumging chichih ging na zak chiang un puk unla milim ka tunkhiak bia un, hoihtak in; himahleh na biak kei ua leh meipi kuang zuazua sung ah huai hunmah in a hon pailut ding uh; huchi in ka khut a kipan a nou hon hunkhe ding huai pathian kua hi ding ahia?
Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego in a dawng ua kumpipa kiang ah, “Aw Nebukadnezzar, hiai thu ah k’on dawn uh a kiphamoh kei hi.
Huchibang ding ahihleh, Aw kumpipa, a na ka sep uh ka Pathian un meipi kuang zuazua a kipan kou a hon hunkhe thei hi, na khut apan a hon hunkhe ding hi.
Ahihkeileh leng, na thei in, Aw kumpipa, na pathiante na ka semkei ding ua, na dinkhiak dangkaeng milim leng ka be sam kei ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Nebukadnezzar a thangpai petmah a, Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego tung ah a mel putdan a kikheng hial hi; huaiziak in meipi a sat ngeina sang a mun sagih a a satsak ding in thu a pia hi.
Huan a sepaihpawl lak a om mihat kuate hiam Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego hen ding leh meipi kuang zuazua sung a pailut ding in thu a pia hi.
