Huchi in hiai mite a puansilhlai uh, samul puanak toh, puanak kawnggak nei leh a puansilh dangte utoh, mei kuang zuazua lak ah a pailutta uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa thupiak a khawk mahmah ziak leh meipi a sat mahmah ziak in huai mi Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego domte meikuang in a hul lumta hi.
Hiai mi thumte, Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego te meipi kuang zuazua lak ah hensa in a puk uhi.

Huchih lai in Nebukadnezzar in lamdang a sa mahmah hi: kintak in a thoukhia a: amah thudotmite kiang ah thu a gen a, “Meilak ah mi thum hensa in i pailut uh ahi kei maw?” a chi hi. Amau a dawng ua kumpipa kiang ah, “Dik, Aw kumpipa” a chi uhi.
Aman a dawng a, “Ngai un, mi li phelsa a om, meilak a vak in ka mu a, bangmah a chi kei uh, a mi lina melputdan Pathian tapa a bang hi” a chi hi.

Huchi in Nebukadnezzar meipi kuang zuazua gei chin ah a hongpai a; thu a gen a, “Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego, nou Pathian Tungnungpen sikhate, hong pawtkhia unla, hiai lam ah hongpai un” a chi hi. Huchi in Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego, meilak ah kipan in a hong pawtkhia uhi.

Huan bial heutute, vaihawmmite, ukpipate leh kumpipa dantheimite, omkhawmte’n hiai mite, mei in a pumpi tung uah hihtheihna a neikei a, a luzang ua sam leng a kangdang kei a, a puansilh uleng a lamdang kei a, meigim leng a namkei uh chih a mu uhi.

Nebukadnezzar in thu a gen a, “Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego Pathian in a angel sawl a, amah muang a sikhate hunkhia a, kumpipa thu hihlamdang a, amau Pathian loungal pathian na a seplouh ua a biaklouhna ding ua pumpite uh pepa phat in om hen,

Huaiziak in thupiak ka bawl hi, michih, namchih, pauchih, Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego Pathian gensiatna thil banghiam gente, atnen in a om dia, a innte uh ekvum a bawl ahi ding hi: hichibang a hunkhe thei pathian dang a omlouh ziak in” a chi hi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n Sadrak, Meshak leh Abednego, Babulon bial ah a kaisang sakta hi.
Kumpipa, Nebukadnezzar mite tengteng, namte leh paute, lei tengteng a tengte kiang ah, na kiang uah lemna hihpun in om hen.
Tungnungpen Pathian in keilam a a bawl chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte etsak kei ading in hoih leh a kilawm hi.
A chiamtehnate thupi hina mahmah e:
a thillamdangte thilhihthei hina mahmah uh e:
a gam tangtawn gam ahi a,
a vaihawmna a khang a khang in a om hi.
Kei Nebukadnezzar, ka inn sung ah ka khawl a, ka inpi sung ah ka lum hi,
Hon lausak mang ka nei hi; ka lupna tung ah ngaihtuahnate leh ka lungtang mengmuhte’n hon hihbuai uhi.
Huaiziak in hilhchetna ka kiang a a kitheihsak ding un, Babulon mi pil tengteng ka ma a pi ding thupiak ka bawlta hi.
Huchi in mitkhialdawi tawite, bummite, Kaldaimite leh aisanmite a hongpai ua: a ma uah ka mang ka genta hi; himahleh a hilhchetna ka kiang ah a hon theisak theikei uhi.
Himahleh a tawptawp in ka ma ah, Daniel a min ka pathian min dungzui in Belteshazzar hiven, amah a Pathian siangthoute kha a omna ma ah mang ka genta hi.

Aw Belteshazzar, mitkhialdawi tawite heutupa, nang ah, Pathian siangthoute kha a om a, thuguk bangmah in nang a hon hihbuai kei chih ka theih ziak in ka mang a ka muh mengmuhte leh a hilhchetna honhilh in, ka chi hi,
Ka lupna tung a ka lutang mengmuhte hichibang ahi: Ngai in, lei laizang ah sing khat ka mu a, huai sing sandan a thupi mahmah hi.
Huai sing a khangtou a, a honghat a, a sanna in van a suntou a, lei tengteng tawp huai ah a kimu hi.
A nahte a hoih un, a gah pha mahmah a; huai ah mi tengteng ading in an a om hi: gamsate a nuailim ah a om ua, van a vasate a hiangte ah a teng ua, sa tengteng huai a kipan in a kivak uhi.
Ka lupna tung a ka lup in mengmuhte ka mu a, ngai in, van a kipan in vengmi siangthou khat a hong paisuk hi.
Ngaihtak in a kikou a, hichibang in a chi a: Sing phuk inla, a hiangte satkhia inla, a nahte singkhia inla, a gah thehzak in: a nuai a kipan gamsate leh a hiang a kipan vasate hawlmang in om uhen.
Himahleh a bulsum leh a zungte pen hawi in, sik leh dal gui a henkhawm in, gam a loupa nou lak ah nutsiat in om hen. Van daitui in kawt henla, a tantuan lei a loupa lak a gamsate toh hi hen.
Huan a tung a hun sagih a bei mateng mihing lungsim kikheng in a kiang ah gamsa lungtang piak hi hen.
Tungnungpen in mite gam ah vai a hawm a, a utna peuh kiang ah a pia a, mi niampente ading khesak chih mihingte’n a theihna ding un vengmite’n a genkhia ua, misiangthoute’n a phuangkhia uhi.

Hiai mang kei kumpipa Nebukadnezzar in ka man hi: huan nang, Aw Belteshazzar, a hilhchetna genkhia in, ka gam a mipilte tengteng in ka kiang ah a hilhchetna a hon theisak theikei ua; himahleh nang na hihthei, nang a pathian siangthoute kha a om ziak in a chi hi.

Daniel, a min Belteshazzar in, sawtloukal lamdang a sa a, a ngaihtuahnate’n amah a patausak hi. Kumpipa’n a dawng a, “Belteshazzar, mang hiam a hilchetna hiam in nang hon patausak kei hen” a chi hi. Belteshazzar in a dawng a, “Ka toupa, mang nang hon mudahte lamthu hi henla, a hilhchetna na galte lam thu hileh maw.
Na sing muh, hong khang a, honghat a, a sanna in van a suttouh a, hiai a kipan lei tengteng a kimuhna;
A nahte a hoih a, a gah pha mahmah a, huai ah tengteng ading an a om a; huai nuai ah gamsate a teng ua, a hiang ah van a vasate a teng uhi:
Aw kumpipa, huai hong khang a, honghat na muh, nangmah na hi a: na thupina a khang in, van a sun in, na vaihawmna leitawp pha in ahi.

Van a kipan a kumpipa’n vengmi siangthou hong paisuk a muh, Sing phuk inla, hihgawp in; himahleh a bulsum leh a zungte hawi in, sik leh dal gui a henkhawm in gam a loupa nou lak ah van daitui in kawt henla, huan a tantuan gamsate kiang ah hi in, a tung a hun sagih a bei matan, chih thu ahihleh;
Aw kumpipa, hiai a hilhchetna ahi, ka toupa kumpipa tung a hongtung Tungnungpen thupiak ahi:

Mite a kipan hawlkhiak in na om dia; gamsate kiang ah na khosa ding a, bawngtalte bang a loupa neksak in na om ding a; van daitui in na kawt ding a; na tung ah hun sagih a bei ding; mite gam ah Tungnungpen in vai a hawm a; a ututna kiang ah a pia chih na theih ma tan.
Huan sing bulsum leh a zungte nutsiat ding a thupiak a om pen ahihleh; van Pathian in vaihawm petmah ahi chih na theihkhit chiang in na gam nang kiang a piakkik ding genna ahi.
Aw kumpipa, huaiziak in k’on thuhilh nang ading in pomtuak leh tagahte kiang a chitna etsakna in na thulimlouhnate tawpsan in; na hamphatna suksau a a omkhak zenzen leh a chi hi.
Hiai tengteng kumpipa Nebukadnezzar tung ah a hongtung hi.
Kha sawm leh nih bei in Babulon a kumpi Inpi sung ah a vialvak hi.
Kumpipa’n thu a gen a, hiai Babulon thupi, kumpipa tenna mun ding a, ka thilhihtheihna hatna leh ka thuneihna thupina ding a ka lam ahi kei maw? chi in.
Kumpipa kamsung a thu a omlai mahmah in, van a kipan aw a hong suakkhia a, “Aw kumpipa Nebukadnezzar, na kiang a thugen ahi: nang a kipan gam a paimangta hi.

Tungnungpen in mite gam ah vai a hawm a, a ututna kiang ah a pia chih na theih matan, mihingte a kipan in hawlkhiak na hi ding a, na tenna gamsate kiang ah ahi ding; bawngtalte bang a loupa ne ding a bawl in na om dia; na tung ah hun sagih a bei ding” a chi hi.

Huai bang thil a hongtungta a: mite a kipan a hawlkhiak in a om a; bawngtalte bang in loupa a ne petmah hi; a pumpi van daitui in a kawt a; a sam muvanlai multe a hong bang a, a chinte vasate chinte a hong bang hi.

Huan nite bei in kei Nebukadnezzar in vanlam ah ka mitte ka suantou a, ka theihtheihnate ka kiang ah a hong kiknawn a, huchi in Tungnungpen ka pahtawi hi; amah tangtawn a om gige phat in ka zahtak hi:
A vaihawmna tangtawn vaihawmna ahi a, a gam a khang a khang in ahi, chi in:
Huan lei a teng tengteng
bangmahlou bang a ngaih ahi ua:
huan van sepaih pawl leh lei a tengtengte
lak ah a deihlam bang in a hihzel a:
kuamah in a khut a len thei un,
a kiang ah, Bangdia hih na hia?
a chi theikei uhi.

Huai laimah in ka theihtheihna ka kiang ah a hong kiknawn a; ka gam thupina, ka lalna leh hoihna ka kiang ah a hongkik a; ka midotte leh ka toupate’n kei a hongzong ua; huchi in ka gam ah kiptak in ka ding a, kei ding in thupina lian mahmah behlap in a omta hi.
Huchi in kei Nebukadnezzar in van Kumpipa phat a pahtawi in ka zahtak a; a thilhih tengteng thutak ahi a, a lampite vaihawmna ahi a, kisatheitak a omte a hihniam thei hi.
Belshazzar kumpipa’n a toupate lak a mi sang khat ading in Ankuang thupitak a bawl a, sang khatte ma ah uain a dawn hi.

Belshazzar in uain a cheplai in, a pa Nebukadnezzar in Jerusalem a om biakin a kipan a a lak dangkaeng leh dangka tuium belsuante kumpipa leh a toupate, a zite leh a meite’n huaite a a dawn theihna ding un honla ding in thu a pia hi;.
Huchi in Jerusalem a om Pathian inn, biakin a kipan a lakkhiak dangkaeng tuium belsuante a hon lata ua; kumpipa leh a toupate, a zite leh a meite’n, huaite in a dawn uhi.
Uain a dawn ua, dangkaeng, dangka, dalsik, sing, leh suang pathiante a phat uhi.
Huai dakmah in mihing khutzungte a hong langkhia a, kumpipa Inpi bang pek tung, khawnvak koihna toh etdenna tak ah a lai a gelhta hi; kumpipa’n laigelhtu khut bangtan hiam a muta hi.
Huailai in kumpipa mel a hong lamdang a, a ngaihtuahnate’n amah a patau sakta hi; a khut a khe a kipzou takei a, a khukte a kisat tuah nomnom uhi.

Bummite, Kaldaimite leh aisanmite honpi un chi in nakpitak in kumpipa a kikou hi. Kumpipa’n thu a gen a, Babulon mipilte kiang ah, “Kuapeuh in hiai laigelh sim a, a hilhchetna hon ensak, puansandup silhsak ahi ding a; a ngawng kimvel in dangkaeng khainiang a awk ding a; gamsung ah vaihawmmi thumna ahi ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in kumpipa mipilte tengteng a honglut ua: himahleh laigelh a sim theikei ua, a hilhchetna leng kumpipa a theisak theikei uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa Belshazzar a patau mahmah a; amah ah a mel a hong lamdang a; a khawnbawlte a lungzing uhi.

Huchi in kumpipa leh khawnbawlte thu ziak in kumpinu Ankuangluina inn sung ah a honglut hi; kumpinu’n thu a gen a, “Aw kumpipa, tangtawn in hing in,” na ngaihtuahnate’n hon patausak kei henla, na mel leng lamdang kei heh:

Na gamsung a mi khat, amah a pathian siangthoute kha omna a om a; na pa damlai in vakna leh theihtheihna leh pilna, pathiante pilna bang, amah ah muh in a om; kumpipa Nebukadnezzar, kumpipa, na pa’n, amah mitkhialdawi tawite leh bummite, Kaldaimite leh aisanmite heutu in a bawl hi.

Lungsim hoihpen, theihna, theihtheihna, mangte hilhchetna, thugen haksa etsakna, ginlelhna hihvengna kumpipa’n Belteshazzar min a sakpa, huai Daniel mah ah muh in a om hi. Tuin Daniel kisam sak henla, aman hilhchetna ensak hen” a chi hi.
Huan Daniel kumpipa ma ah a honpi ua, Kumpipa’n thu a gen a Daniel kiang ah, “Daniel, ka pa’n Judah gam a kipan Judah salmat hon pilut na hi hia?
Nang ah pathian kha a om a, vakna leh theihtheihna leh pilna hoihpen nang a muh in a om chih na tanchin ka za hi.
Huchi in mipilte, bummite, ka ma ah a hon pilut ua, hiai laigelh sim a, a hilhchetna ka kiang a theisak ding in; himahleh huai thil hilhchetna a ensak theikei uhi.

Himahleh hilhchetnate na bawl thei a, ginlelhnate na bawlhoih thei chih na tanchin ka za: tuin laigelh na sim theih a, a hilhchetna n’on hilh theih leh puansandup k’on silhsak ding a; na ngawng kimvel in dangkaeng khi na awk ding a; gamsung ah vaihawmmi thumna na hi ding hi” a chi hi.

Huchi in Daniel in a dawng a kumpipa ma ah, “Na thilpiakte nangmah kiang ah hizaw henla, na kipahmante midang kiang ah pezaw in; ahi a, kumpipa kiang ah laigelh ka sim ding a, a hilhchetna amah ka theisak ding hi.
Aw nang kumpipa, Tungnungpen Pathian in na pa Nebukadnezzar gam leh thupina, letna leh vaihawmna a honpia hi:
Huai amah a piak letna ziak in mi tengteng, namte, paute a ma ah a ling ua a lau uhi: a utut a that a, a utut a hinghawi hi; a utut a kaithou a, a utut a sawnniam hi.
Himahleh a lungtang a hong kisaktheih a, kiuangsaktak a gamta a a lungsim hihkhauh a a omlai in, a mangtutphah a kipan suan in a om a, amah a kipan a thupina a lakheta hi.

Huan mite tapate a kipan a hawlkhiak in a om a; huchi in a lungtang gamsate a bang a bawl in a om a; bawngtalte bang a loupa a vak in a om a, a pumpi van daitui in a kawt a; Tungnungpen Pathian in mihing gam ah vai a hawm a, a ututte a tung ah ading khesak chih a hontheih matan.
Huan nang a tapa, Aw Belshazzar, hiai tengteng na theih in leng na lungtang na niamkhiak kei hi.

Himahleh van Toupa dem in na kihihsang a; amau na ma ah Toupa inn a tuium belsuante na lasak a; nang leh na toupate, na zite leh na meite’n, huaite in uain na dawn uhi; dangka leh dangkaeng, dal, sik, sing leh suang pathiante, mu theilou, za theilou, thei theiloute bia in na phat a; Pathian a khut a na hatna a omna leh na lampite tengteng neipa na thupibawl kei hi.
Huchi in amah a kipan huai khut banghiam tan sawl in a hongom a, hiai laigelh gelh in a omta hi.
Huan gelh a om laithu hiai ahi” MENE, MENE, TEKEL, UPHARSIN.
Huai hilhchetna hiai ahi: MENE: Pathian in na gam a simta, a beisakta hi;
TEKEL; bukna a buk in na om a, na chingzou kei hi;
PERES; na gam hawm in a om a, Mid mite leh Persia mite kiang ah piak ahita hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Belshazzar in thu a pia a, dangkaeng khainiang a ngawng kimvel in a oksak ua; amah tung ah thu a phuang ua, gamsung a vaihawmmi a thumna hi ding in.
Huai zan in Kaldai kumpipa Belshazzar thah in a om hi.
Mid mi Darias, kum sawmguk leh nih a upa in gam a tangta hi.
Darias in a gam pumpi bial za leh sawmnih omsuak ding bial heutu za leh sawmnih gam tung ah a koih hi.
Huan amaute tung ah, heutu lian thum, huaite lak ah Daniel khatna ahi a; huchi a hiai bial heutute’n huaite kiang ah thu a tut ua, kumpipa’n siatna a neihlouhna ding in.
Huchi in hiai Daniel, amah a lungsim hoihpen a om ziak in, heutuliante leh bial heutute tung ah a kan a val a bawl in a om a; kumpipa’n gam pumpi tung ah amah koih a ngaihtuah hi.

Huailai in heutuliante leh bial heutute’n gam thu a Daniel demna ding a zawng uhi; himahleh amah mi ginom a hih ziak in thupatna ding in a diklouhna a mu kei ua, amah a diklouhna leh khelhna muh in a omkei hi.
Huchi in hiai mite’n, “Hiai Daniel demna ding bangmah i mu kei ding; a Pathian dan a amah demna ding i muh kei ngal leh” a kichi uhi.
Huan hiai heutuliante leh bial heutute kumpipa kiang ah a kikhawm ua, a kiang ah hichibang in, “Aw, kumpipa Darias, tangtawn in dam in!

Gam heutulian tengteng, heutute leh bial heutute, dantheimite leh ukpipate, kumpi thuseh bawlkhiak a, khamna khauhtak bawl ding in a kikum khawm uhi. Huchi in mi kuapeuh, nang chih louh, Aw kumpipa, ni sawmthum sung a pathian hiam mihing hiam lak a ngetna a bawl leh, humpinelkai huangsung a paihlut in a om ding hi.
Tuin, Aw kumpipa, khamna hihkip inla, laigelh ah na min gelh in; huchi a Mid mite leh Persia mite dan bang a a kihihlamdan louhna ding in” a chi uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa Darias in laigelh leh khamna ah a min a gelhta hi.

Daniel in laigelh ah min a kigelhta chih a theih in a inn sung ah a lut a; a dantan sung a a tawlette Jerusalem lam a hon ahi uhi, a khukdin a, ni khat in thumvei, huchi in a thum a, a malam a a hih bang in, a Pathian ma ah kipahthu a gen hi.
Huchi in hiai mite a kikhawm ua, Daniel a Pathian ma a thu ngen leh thum a mu uhi.

Huchi in a hongpai nai ua, kumpipa khamna tungtang kumpipa ma ah a hong genta uhi; “Aw kumpipa, nang chih louh michih kuapeuh in ni sawmthum sung a pathian hiam mihing hiam kiang a ngetna a bawl leh humpinelkai huangsung a paih ding ahi chih khamna ah na gelh ahi kei maw” a chi uhi. Kumpipa’n, “Mid mite leh Persia mite dan lamdang theilou bang in huai dan kiplai ahi,” a chi hi.
Huan amau a dawng ua kumpipa ma ah, “Huai Daniel, Judah saltang tate lak a in nang leh na min gelhna khamna leng a hon limsak kei hi, Aw kumpipa, ni khat in thumvei ngetna a bawl hi” a chi uhi.
Hiai thute a zak in, kumpipa a lungkim hetkei a, amah suaktasak ding in Daniel tung ah lungtang a nga a; amah hutkhiak tum in nitum tan a semgim hi.

Huchi in hiai mite kumpipa kiang ah a kikhawm ua, kumpipa kiang ah, “Aw kumpipa, khamna hiam thuseh hiam kumpipa’n a hihkipsa hihlamdan theih a hihlouh Mid mite leh Persia mite dan ahi chih thei in” a chi uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa’n thu a pia a, Daniel a honpi ua, humpinelkai huangsung ah a paita uhi. Huan kumpipa’n thu a gen a, Daniel kiang ah, “A nna nasep gige na Pathian in a hon suaktasak ding” a chi hi.

Huan suang khat a honla ua, huangsung gong ah a koih ua; kumpipa’n amah suaisawnna zungbuh leh a tapate suaisawnna zungbuh in suai a namta hi; Daniel tungtang thu a bangmah hihlamdan theih a hihlouhna ding in.
Huchi in kumpipa a inpi ah a pai a, anngawl in, tumging leh nopbawlna a khawlsak in a zanhak a; amah lah a ihmu theikei hi.
Huchi in kumpipa zingsang in beltak in a thou a, humpinelkaite huangsung lam ah kintak in a vahoh hi.

Huangsung lam a Daniel kiang a a hongpai nailai in, kah aw in a kikou a; kumpipa’n thu a gen a Daniel kiang ah, “Aw Daniel, Pathian hing sikha, a nna nasep gige, na Pathian in humpinelkaite a kipan nang hon suaktasak thei hiam?” a chi hi.
Daniel in kumpipa kiang ah, “Aw kumpipa, tangtawn in hing in!

Ka Pathian in a angel honsawl a, humpinelkaite kam a hong chihsaka, a hon hihna kei uhi; amah ma a keimah a hoihna muh a a om ziak leh, Aw kumpipa nangmah ma a leng gilou ka hihlouh ziak in” a chi hi.

Huchi in kumpipa nakpitak in a kipak a, huangsung a kipan Daniel lakhe tou ding in thu a pia hi. Huchi in Daniel huangsung a kipan in a lakhe tou ua, a Pathian a muan ziak in a tung ah bangmah natna a kimu kei hi.

Huan kumpipa’n thu a pia a, Daniel hekte huai mite a honpi ua, humpinelkai huangsung ah a pai ua, amau, a zi leh tate uh; humpinelkaite’n a maute huangsung taw a hong tunma un a man ua, a guhte uh a hihnen vek uhi.
Huchi in kumpipa Darias in mite tengteng, namte, paute lei tengteng a tengte kiang ah lai a gelh a; “Na kiang uah lemna hihpun in om hen!
Ka gam sehthum tengteng ah Daniel Pathian ma ah mite a ling un a lau ding uh:
Amah Pathian hing, tangtawn a omkip,
a gam hihsiat ahi ngeikei ding a;
a thuneihna a om den ding hi chi in thupiak ka bawl hi.
Aman a suaktasak a, a tankhia a,
van leh lei ah chiamtehna leh thillamdangte a hih a;
aman Humpinelkaite thilhihtheihna a kipan in Daniel a suakta sak hi.
Huchibang in hiai Daniel Darias vaihawm lai leh Persia mi Kura vaihawm lai in a thupi mahmah hi.
Babulon kumpipa Belshazzar kum khatna kum in Daniel in a lupna tung a lup lai in mang a nei a, a lungsim ah mengmuh hong kilang a, mang tuh a gelh a a thute a kim in a gen hi.
Daniel in thu a gen a, “Zan a ka mengmuhna ah, ngai in, van huih lite tuipi thupi tung ah a hong nungkhia uh ka mu hi.
Huan tuipi a kipan sa thupi li, kibang lou chiat a hongpai tou ua

A khatna humpinelkai a bang a, muvanlai kha a nei hi; huchi a ka et lai in a khate bohkhiak in a om ua; lei a kipan phottouh a mihing bang a khe nih a dinsak a om in; mihing lungsim a kiang a piak in a om hi.

Huan ngai in, sa dang, a nihna, vompi bang, a pang langkhat tung ah photkang in a om a; a kam sung ah a hate kikal ah nakguh thum a om a; hichibang in a kiang ah hilh in a om a, “Thou inla, sa tampi negai in” chi in.
Hiai khit in ka en a, huan ngai in, sa dang khat, gialbem bang, a nungzang a vasa bang a kha li nei ka mu hi. Huai gamsa in lu li a nei a; a kiang ah thuneihna piak in a om hi.

Hiai khit in, zan mengmuhna in ka mu a, ngai in sa lina, lauhuai leh thilhihthei, nakpi mahmah a hat; sik ha lianpite nei in a negai in a botnen a; a omlaite a khe in a chil hi. A ma a gamsa om tengteng toh a kibang kei hi; ki sawm a nei hi.

Kite ka ngaihtuah lai in, a lak uah ki dang a neu khat hongpou khia a, huai ma ah huai ki masa thumte a zung ua bohkhiak in a om uhi, hiai kineu ah mit, mihing mit bang, leh kam thil thupite gen a omta hi.

Huchi a ka et lai in, mangtutphah a hong kikoih a, mi khat Tangtawn a om gige a tung ah a tuta hi; a puansilh vuk bang in a ngou a, samul siang bang in a lu a sam a ngou hi; huai mangtutphah meikuang zuazua ahi a, huai a kangtalai khete meikuang lai bang ahi.
Meikuang luipi hongpawt a a ma a kipan hong paikhia a, a sang a sangte’n amah na a sepsak uhi; a ma ah sang sawm mun sang sawm ading ua: vaihawmna a tungkhia ua, laibute a hong uhi.
Huai ki in a thugen thupite ziak in ka en nilouh hi. Huchi a ka et lai in, huai gamsa thah in a om a; a pumpi hihsiat in a om a; meikuang a a paih dong uh ka en gige hi.
Huan sa dangte ahihleh a thuneihna uh lakmang in a om a: hunseh khat leh hun khat tan a hinna uh hihsau in a om hi.
Zan mengmuhna in ka mu a, ngai in, van meipite toh mi khat mihing tapa toh kibang a hongpai a, nite tang a tuan kiang mahmah ah a hong a, amah a ma chin ah a honpi uhi.

Huan thuneihna, thupina leh gam piak in a om a; huchi a mi tengteng, namte, leh paute’n amah na a sepsak theihna ding un: a thuneihna tangtawn thuneihna ahi a, a mang kei ding, a gam hihsiat in a omkei ding hi.
Kei Daniel ahihleh ka sung ah ka lungsim a dah a, ka lutang mengmuh in kei a hon patausak hi.
A kiang nai a dingte lak a khat kiang ka zuan a, hiai tengteng thu ah thutak amah ka dongta hi. Huchi in huai thilte hilhchetna ka kiang ah a hon theisakta hi.
Hiai gamsa thupi lite etsak bel lei a hong dingkhe ding kumpipa lite ahi uhi.
Himahleh Tungnungpen misiangthoute’n gam a tang ding ua, tangtawn, tangtawn in, gam a neiden ding uhi, a chi hi.
Huchi in sa lina, amaute tengteng toh kibang lou, kihtakhuai mahmah, a hate sik hi a, a chinte dal, nekhin a, botnen a, a omlaite a khepek a chil tungtang thutak theih ka ut hi.

Huan ki sawm a lu zang a omte lak ah ki dang khat hong poukhia a, huai ma a ki thumte a pukna; huai ki mitte nei leh kam nei a thil thupite gen a, a latdan a lawite sang a hat tuakzaw pen tanchin ka thei nuam hi.
Huchi a ka et leh huai ki in misiangthoute dou in, gal a bawl a,
Nite Tang a tuan in Tungnungpen misiangthoute gum in thu a khen a, amau lalgam a neih masiah ua ding in amaute a zouta hi.
Huchi in Sa lina pen leitung ah gam lina ahi ding a, huai gam tengteng toh a kibang kei ding a, lei pumpi a gai ding a, a sikden dia, a botnen ding a chi hi.
Huan ki sawmte ahihleh, hiai gam a kipan in kumpipa sawm a hong dingkhe dingte ahi ua: amau nung in a dang khat; amasa toh a kibang kei ding a, aman kumpipa thumte a zou ding hi.

Tungnungpen dem in a gense ding a, misiangthoute a nuaisiah ding hi: hunte leh dan khen ding a ngaihtuah dia; hun khat leh hunte leh hun kim khat bei masiah misiangthoute a khut a piak in a om ding uhi.
Huaite zoh in vaihawmna a om ding a, a thuneihna lakmang ahi ding a, a tawptan a hihgawp ding leh suksiat in a om ding hi.

Huan leitung gam leh thuneihna leh van nuai pumpi nuai a gamte thupina, Tungnungpen misiangthoute kiang ah piak in a om ding: a gam tangtawn gam ahi a, a vaihawmnate’n amah na a sepsak un a thu a mang ding uhi.
Hiai ah thu leh la tawpna a om hi. Kei Daniel ahihleh ka ngaihtuahnate’n nakpi’n hon hihbuai a, kei ah ka mel a mual hi; himahleh ka lungtang in huai thu ka kem khinkhian hi.
Kumpipa Belshazzar vaihawm kum thum kum in, kei, Daniel kiang ah a tung a pen mah a hong kilat khitnung in mengmuhna ka kiang ah hong kilang nawn hi.
Ka mengmuhna ah hichi ahi a, Elam bial a Susan inpi ah ka om a; huan mengmuhna in Ulai lui kiang ah om in ka mu hi.
Huchi in ka dak leh ngai in, huai luigei ah belamtal khat ki nih nei ading hi, a ki nihte a sau uhi. Himahleh khat sang in a dang pen a sau zaw a, a sau zaw a a pou nanung pen ahi.

Tua Belamtal in a ki a si ding in tumlam, mallam, leh simlam nawt in ka mu hi; a ma ah sate ading theikei ua, a khut a kipan suaktasak thei leng kuamah a omkei uhi; himahleh amah deihlam in a hih a a hong thupi hi.
Huchi a ka ngaihtuah lai in, ngai in, lei pumpi tawnsuak in tumlam a kipan in keltal khat lei sukhalou in a hongpai a, huai kel in a mitte kikal ah ki minthang khat a nei hi.
Belamtal ki nih nei lui malam ading a ka muh kiang ah a hongpai a, a thilhihtheihna toh heh in amah a delhta hi.

Belamtal kiang chin ah a hongpai ka mu a, a tung ah nakpi’n a thangpaita a, belamtal a boh a, a ki nihte a hihtan a; huchi in belamtal in amah a dinna ding thahatna a neita kei hi; Lei ah a sipuk a, amah a chil a; a khut a kipan belamtal suakta sak ding kuamah a omkei hi.
Keltal nakpi mahmah in a kiliansakta a: huchi a a hatlai in, huai ki thupi a kitan a; a mun ah ki li minthang vanhuih lite lam ah a hong suakkhe tou uhi.
Huan huai kite lak a ki neu thupi mahmah khat, simlam, suahlam, leh gam kilawm lam nga in a hong khangkhia hi.
Huchi in van sepaihte bang hial in a hong thupi mahmah a; aksi honte lak a khenkhatte lei ah a pai khesuk a, amau a chil hi.
Ahi, van sepaihte Toupa tung nangawn ah a kiliansak a; amah a kipan in niteng haltum thillat a lamang a, a Mun Siangthou a pai khesuk hi.
Huan tatlekna ziak in haltum thillatte toh van sepaihte amah kiang ah piak in a om ua; huchi in thutak lei ah a paikhia a, a sep leh bawlte ah a lohching hi.

Huchi in misiangthou khat in misiangthou dang khat kiang ah “Hiai mengmuhna a kimu tatlekna mulkimhuai in niteng haltum thillat bang tan luahtou ding a, mun siangthoupen leh van sepaihte a khenuai a bang tan nuaisiah a omsak ding ahia” a chih ka za hi.
Huan aman ka kiang ah, “Nitaklam leh zinglam sang nih leh za thum sung tan in; huai chiang in munsiangthoupen silsiang ahi ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, kei, Daniel in ka mengmuh lai in, theihchet ka na tum a; huchi in ka ma ah mihing kibatpih bang a hongding hi.
Huan Ulai luipiau kikal ah, mihing aw kikou a, “Gabriel, hiai mipa mengmuhna theichiansak in” a chih ka za hi.

Huchibang in ka dinna mun naih in a hongpai a; huchi a a hongpai lai in, ka lauta a, ka mai in lei ka si hi: himahleh aman ka kiang ah, “Aw mihing tapa, mengmuh lah huntawp ading ahi a, theisiam in” a chi hi.
Huan kei a hon houpih lai in, leilam nga in nakpitak in ka ihmu ta a: himahleh a honkhoih a, a hon dingtang sak hi.
Huan aman, “Ngai in, thangpaihna huntawp lam a bang ahia hongom ding k’on theisak ding: huntawp sehsa ading lah ahi ngal a, a chi hi.
Belamtal na muh ki nih nei, Media leh Persia kumpipate ahi uh.
Huan huai keltal huham Grik kumpipa ahi: a mitte kikal a om ki thupi kumpipa khatna ahi.
Huan a kitan pen munluah ki lite ahihleh, huai nam a kipan in gam li hong dingkhe dingte ahi ua; himahleh amau bang in thilhihtheihna a neikei ding uhi.
Huan a gam vaihawm huntawpna uah, talekmite a honghat mahmah chiang un, kumpipa lauhuai melpu, zuau a zekhem siam khat ading khe ding hi.

Huchi in a thilhihtheina a hat dia, himahleh amah mah thilhihtheihna hilou in; siatna lamdangtak a tun dia, a thilhih khempeuh a lohching ding hi: huchi in mi hatte leh misiangthoute a hihse gawp ding hi.

Huan amah danzui in zekhemna nasep ah a lohching zel ding hi: huan a lungtang a kiliansak ding a, mitampite bit a kisaklai un a hihse ding a; kumpipate Kumpipa dou ding in a kisa ding; himahleh mihing khut hilou in hihkhap in a om ding hi.
Huan nitaklamte leh zingsang lam toh kisai mengmuhna kigen a dik ahi; himahleh a hongtung ding ni tampi ading a hihlai ziak in hiai mengmuhna khak bikbek in” a chi hi.
Huchi in kei Daniel ka sibup a; ni bangzah hiam ka china hi; ka thou a, kumpipa nna ka sem a hiai mengmuhna lamdang ka sa hi, himahleh kuamah in a theisiam kei hi.
Media mi, Ahasueras tapa Darias, Kaldaite gam a kumpipa ding a bawl, vaihawm kum khatna in.
A vaihawm kum khatna kum in kei, Daniel in laibute a kipan Jerusalem hihsiatna in kum sawmsagih daih ding ahi chih zawlnei Jeremiah kiang a
Huchi in
Huan
Ka khialta ua, hoihlou tak in ka gamtang ua, gilou tak in ka na hihta ua, ka hel ua, na thuseh leh na vaihawmte ka na lehngat santa uhi.
Ka kumpipate uh, ka vaihawmtute uleh ka pipute uh leh gam a mi tengteng kiang a na min a thugen, na sikha zawlneite thu leng ka na ngaikhe sam kei uhi.
“Aw
Aw
Amah tung ah na helta mahle ung chitnate leh ngaihdamte
ka Pathian uh aw leh a dante a om ding a a sikha zawlneite zang a ka ma ua hon na koihsakte ka na mangta kei uhi.

“Ahi, Israel tengteng in na dan a tatlek san ua, a hilou lam ah a pial ua, na aw a manlouhna ding un; huaiziak in na tung a ka hihkhelhte ziak in Mosi, Pathian sikha dansung a gelh a om kichiamna hamsia ka tung ah sunbuak in a om hi.
Huan koute demna leh ka tung ua vaihawmmite demna thute leh ka tung ua siatna thupitak in a hihkip khinta hi; Jerusalem tung a kihih bang van nuai pumpi ah lah a kihih ngei ngalkei hi.
Mosi dan sung a gelh a hih bang in, hiai siatna tengteng ka tung uah a hongtung hi; huchipi in leng ka thulimlouhnate uh kiheisan a, na thutak a theihkhen theihna ka neih theihna ding un
Huaiziak in
“Huan tuin, Aw Toupa ka Pathian uh, khut hattak a na mite Aigupta gam a kipan pikhepa leh tuni bang a minthanna kimuhpa, tuni bang in ka khialta ua, gilou tak in ka na hihta uhi.
Aw
Huaiziak in tuin, Aw ka Pathian uh, na sikha thumna leh a thilngette ngaikhia inla,

Aw ka Pathian, na bil hondoh inla, za in; na mitte hak inla, na min a kilou na khopi siatgawpnate en in; ka diktatna ziak un na ma a hiai ka thilngetnate uh lan ka hi ngal kei ua, na chitna thupite ziak in ahizaw hi.
Aw Toupa, za in, Aw
Huchi a thu ka gen a, ka thum a, ka khelhna leh ka mi Israel khelhna thupha ka tawi a,
Ahi, thumna a thu ka gen lai in, Pasal Gabriel, a chil a mengmuhna a ka muh pa, kintak a leng dia bawl a om in, nitaklam thillat hun ding in a hong khoih hi.
Huan a hon thuhilh a, a hon houpih a, “Aw Daniel, theihsiamna a siam mahmah a honbawl ding in tuin ka hong paikhia hi, a chi hi.
Na thilngetna kipat phet in a dawnna piak ahi; nang hilh ding a hongpai ka hi, nakpitak a it lah na hi ngal a; huaiziak in thu ngaihtuah inla, mengmuhte theisiam in:

“Na mite leh na khopi siangthou ading in tatlekna hihbeina ding, khelhnate tawpsakna ding leh thulimlouhna adia kilemna bawlna ding, tangtawn diktatna laklutna ding leh mengmuhte leh genkholhnate khakkhum bikbekna ding leh a siangthoupen thaunilhna ding in na tung ah nipikal sawmsagih hunseh leh thupiak ahi.

Huaiziak in thei inla, theikak in, Jerusalem tung ding nawn ding leh lam dia thupiak a paikhiak a kipan sathau nilh a om pa, vaihawm tan in, nipikal sagih ahi ding; huan nipikal sawmguk leh nih sung in hun haksa mahmahte a kongzing leh bukna guam toh a kilam nawn ding hi.

Nipikal sawmguk leh nih khit chiang in sathau nilh a om pa satkhiak in a om ding a, bangmah a neikei ding hi; huchi in a hongom ding vaihawmpa leh mite’n khopi leh Mun Siangthou pen a hihse ding ua; huntawpna tuikhang bang in a hongtung ding hi, a tawp dong in kidouna leh siatgawpnate a om ding a guankholhsa ahita hi.

Huchi in nipikal khat ading in tampi toh thukhun khauh tak a bawl ding a; nipikal kimkhat ading in kithoihna leh thillat a tawpsak ding hi; munsiangthou ah mulkimhuai leh kihhuai a tungkhe ding a; amah tung a tung dia guankholhsa huntawp leh thangpaihna a tung ah sunbuak a hihtan a om ding hi” a chi hi.

Persia kumpipa Kura vaihawm kum thumna ah Daniel, a min Belteshazzar kiang ah thu khat a hong kihil hi; huan huai thu a tak ahi a, kidouna thupi mahmah thu ahi; huchi in huai thu a theisiam a, mengmuhna theihsiamna a nei hi.
Huailai in kei Daniel in, nipikal pumpi kal thum ka sun hi.
Tanghou lim ka ne kei a; sa hi in uain hileh ka kam ah a lut kei a; sathau leng, nipikal thum a tunkim masiah ka nilh hetkei hi.
Huan kha masapen ni sawmnih leh li ni’n, lui lian, Hiddekel pang ah ka ding hi.
Ka dak a ngai in, mi khat puanmalngat silh, a kongte Uphaz dangkaeng siang a gak ka mu hi;
A pumpi leng beril suang bang ahi a; a maitang khophia bang ahi; a mitte meisel kuangpha a bang a, a bante leh a khepekte a dal nawttet a bang a; a thugen ging mipi aw a bang hi;
Huchi in kei Daniel kia in mengmuhna ka mu hi; ka kiang a om mite’n lah huai mengmuhna a mu ngalkei ua; himahleh a tung uah nakpi a linna a hongtung a, kibu ding in a taikekta uhi.
Huchi in kei kia a nutsiat in ka om a; hiai mengmuhna thupi ka muta hi; huchi in kei ah hatna a om nawnta kei a; ka kilawmna kei ah siatna a hongsuakta a; hatna ka neita kei hi.
Hina pi in ka muh mipa aw ka za a; a thute ka ngaihkhiak lai in, a khup in ka mai lei lam nga in nakpitak in ka ihmu hithit hi.
Ngai in, khut in a honkhoih a; ka khuk leh ka khutpek leh ban ah honlen in ling kawmkawm lai a hon phong hi.

Huan aman ka kiang ah, “Aw Daniel, nang nakpitak a it a ompa, na kiang a ka thugente theisiam in dingtang in; na kiang a sawl a ompa ka hi” a chi a; hiai thu ka kiang a a genlai in, ling kawm in ka dingta hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Lau ken, Daniel, theisiam ding leh na Pathian ma a kiniamkhiak ding a, na lungtang na koihkip ni masapen a kipan, na thugente zak in a om hi; na thugente ziak a hong ka hi.

Himahleh Persia gam kumpipa’n ni sawmnih leh khat kei hondal hi; himahleh ngai in, Persia kumpipa kiang ah hentang a ka om nilouh ziak in Mikael, vansawltak lianpen kei hon panpih ding in a hongpai hi;
Huchi in ni nanung lam chiang a na mite tung a hongtung ding bang ahia chih nang hon theisiam sak dia hongpai ka hi; mengmuhna tunung ni tampi a hong tungding a hilai hi” chi in.
Huan hiai thute bang a ka kiang a aman thu a gen khit in ka mai leilam ka ngat a a, ka pau theikei hi.
Huan ngai in, mi khat mite tapate toh kibang in ka mukte a hon khoihsak a; ka kam ka a, thu ka gen a, ka ma a dingpa kiang ah, “Aw ka
Bangchi in ahia ka
Huailai in mi khat mihing toh kibang in a honkhoih nawn a, a hon hatsakta hi.
Huan aman, “Aw nakpitak a it mipa, lau ken; na kiang ah muanna om hen, hattak in om in; ahi, hattak in om in, a chi hi. Aman ka kiang a thu a genkhit in, ka hatta hi; Ka
Aman, “Na kiang a bang ding a hongpai ka hia na thei hia? Tuin Persia gam makaipa kidoupih ding in ka kiknawn ding hi; huchi a ka paikhiak chiang in, ngai in, Grik makaipa a hongpai ding, a chi hi.
Himahleh thutak laibu sung a kigelh nang k’on hilh ding hi: Na makaipa Mikael chihlouh kuamah hiaite kalh a kei hon doupih a omkei uhi.”
Huan kei ka hihleh, Mid mi Darias kum khatna kum in, amah hihkip ding leh hihhat ding in ka ding hi.

Huchi in thutak k’on ensak ding hi. “Ngai in, Persia ah kumpipa thum a hong dingkhe lai ding ua; a lina pen amaute tengteng sang in nakpitak in a hausa zaw ding hi; huchi a a hauhna ziak a a honghat mahmah chiang in, Grik dou ding in mi tengteng a tokthou ding hi.
Huan kumpipa hattak a hong dingkhe ding a, thuneihna thupi toh vaihawm ding leh a deihdan a hih ding in.

A hong dinkhiak chiang in, a gam a kek ding a, van huih lite lam ah a hawmzak ahi ding; amah suan hilou in vai a hawm dia, himahleh amah thilhihtheihna a neikei ding; a gam bohkhiak leh midangte kiang a piak in a om ding hi.
“Huchi in simlam kumpipa a hat ding a, a sepaih heutu khat amah sang in a hatzaw ding a, gam a nei ding a; a vaihawmna thupi ahi ding.

Huan kum bangzah hiam nung in, a kizom khawm ding ua; simlam kumpipa tanu mallam kumpipa kiang ah kituahna bawl ding in a hongpai dia; himahleh hiai kizopna in hunsawt a daihkei ding hi; huai ni’n amah vengmite leh a pa leh amah kithuahpihpa leng piakkhiak in a om ding hi.

Himahleh a zung a kipan a hiang selnou mun ah mi khat a hong dingkhe ding a; huai tuh sepaih pawl kiang ah a hongpai dia; mallam kumpipa kulhpi sung ah a lut dia; amaute dou in thil a hih ding a, a vualzou ding hi;

Huchi in a pathiante u leng, a milim sun te utoh, huan a dangka leh dangkaeng tuium-belsuan hoihte utoh, Aigupta ah aman a sal in a lakik ding hi; huan mallam kumpipa a kipan kum bangzah hiam a kidang koih ding hi.
Huan simlam kumpipa gam ah a hongpai dia, himahleh amah gam lam ah a kiknawn ding hi.

“Huchi in a tapate’n a dou ding ua; sepaih thupi tampi a kaikhawm ding ua; huaite a dimlet in a hong kuan ding ua, a paisuak ding uhi; huan a kiknawn ding ua, amah kulh tan pha hial in a dou ding uhi.
Huchi in simlam kumpipa a heh mahmah ding a, a hong kuankhe dia mallam kumpipa a kidou pih ding hi. Mallam kumpipa’n sepaih a tam a tam tungkhe mahleh mipite a khut a piak in a om ding hi.
Huan mipite pimang in a om ding ua, a lungtang sansak in a om ding hi; huchi in sang sawm tampi a puksak ding a, himahleh a vualzou kei ding hi.
“Huan mallam kumpipa a hongkik dia, a ma sang a thupizaw mipi a hon tungkhe ding hi; kum bangzah hiam nung in sepaih hon thupi leh van tampi toh a hong kuan ding hi.
Huan huai hunte ah simlam kumpipa dou in mi tampi a dingkhe ding uh; na mite lak a hiamgam tate leng mengmuhna hihkip ding in a hong ki domkang ding uh; himahleh a puk ding uhi.
Huchibang in mallam kumpipa a hong dia, panmun a bawldia, khopi kulhneite a la ding; simlam sepaihte leh a mi telte’n leng a nang kei ding ua, nan na ding in hatna leng a omkei ding hi.
Himahleh amah dou dia hong paipa’n amah deihlam bang in a hih ding a, a ma ah kuamah ading kei ding; gam thupi ah ading dia, a khut ah siatna a om ding hi.

“A gam pumpi thahatna toh hongpai a tum chiltel ding a, simlam kumpi gam toh kizopna a bawl ding in a tanu a kiang ah a pe ding hi; himahleh a thilsawm a lohsam ding a, a phattuam pih sam kei ding hi.

Hiai khit in tuikulh lam a nga dia, gam tampite a zou ding hi; himahleh gamdangmi sepaih heutu khat in amah a zou dia, a mi simmawh na a tawp sak ding; ahi, a mi simmohna amah tung ah a kibungsak ding hi.
Huai hun chiang in amah gam kulhpi lam ah a kiknawn dia; himahleh a kisuipai in a puk dia, muh in a om nawn takei ding hi.

“Huai hun chiang in amah mun ah mi khat a hong dingkhe dia, aman a gamsung puahna ding in leiman khonpa gam thupi tan a palsuak sak dia; himahleh ni tamlou zoh in hehna leh kidouna hilou in hihsiat in a om ding hi.
“Huan a mun ah mi zahpihhuai khat a hong dingkhe dia, huai lalgam in zahtakna a piaklouhna pa uh; himahleh mite bit a kisaklai un a hongpai ding a, maitang phatna in gam a la ding hi.
Huan sepaih honte a ma ah taihmang in a om ding ua, sepaih honpite leh thukhun heutupa leng a hih manthat in a om ding uhi.
Huchi in amah toh pankhawmna kibawl nung in lepchiahtak in thil a hih ding a; a hong kuantou dia, nam neuchik toh honghat ding ahi.

Gam khen a hausa mahmah namte a bitlai pen un dou ding in a kuantou ding a, a pipute’n a hih zohlouh uh a hon hihzou dia, a pipute’n leng a hih ngeilouh uh a lak uah samat leh gallakte leh vante a hawmzak dia, ahi, kulhnei khopite dou ding in a guksawm ding hi, himahleh hun khat kia a daih ding hi.

“Huan sepaih thupi toh simlam kumpipa dou ding in a thilhihtheihna leh a hatna a tokthou ding a; huchi in simlam kumpipa’n sepaih a thupi a thupi leh hat in kidouna ah a dou thuk ding hi; himahleh amah siatna ding a a guk a thusawm a hih ziak in ading zoukei ding hi.
Ahi, a an nete’n amah a hihmang ding ua, a sepaihte phiatmang in a om ding uhi; huchi in tampi thah in a puk ding uhi.
Kumpipa nihte a hih uleh gilou lungtang pukawm in dohkan khat ah a tukhawm ding ua, zuau in a kikhem tuah ding uhi; himahleh huntawp a tung ding a sehsa a hih ziak in a lohching kei ding uhi.
Huai hun chiang in simlam kumpipa tuh gallak thupi toh a gam lam ah a kiknawn dia; huchi in a lungtang in thukhun siangthou a dou ding; a utut a hih ding a amah gam ngei ah a kiknawn ding hi.
“Hun sehsa ah a kiknawn dia, simlam ah a hongpai dia; himahleh hun masa hiam hun nanung bang ahi kei ding hi.

Amah dou dia Kittim longte hongpai ding a hih ziak in; huaiziak in a dah ding a, a kiknawn dia; thukhun siangthou dou in a hehna a sungbaw ding a a utut a hih ding hi; a hong kiknawn ngeingei dia, thukhun siangthou nungngat sante deihsakna a lak ding hi.
Amah lam ah sepaihte a pang ding ua, mun siangthoupen kulhpi mahmah a buahsak ding ua; haltum thillat gige a hihbei ding ua a hihgawp ding in kihhuai a tungkhe ding uhi.
Huan thukhun nungngatsante maitang phatna in a gilou tak in, aman a hekkawi dia; himahleh mi a Pathian uh theite bel a hat ding ua, thilhih minthangpente a hih ding uhi.
Huchi in mite lak a theihsiamna neite, ni tampi sung, namsau leh meikuang, saltanna leh loh in a om mahle uh, mi tampi a thuhilh ding uhi.
Huan a puk chiang un, panpihna tawmchik a ngah ding ua, himahleh maitangphatnate toh mi tampi in amau a pawlbawl ding uhi.
A lak ua theihsiamna neite lak a mi khenkhatte, amaute bawlhoih ding leh, siangthousak ding leh amaute ngousak ding in, a puk ding uhi. Huntawp tanpha; hun sehsa ading a hihlai ziak in.

“Huan kumpipa’n a deihlam bang in a hih dia; a kiliansak ding a, pathian chiteng tung ah a kikoih lian dia, pathiante Pathian dem in thil lamdangte a gen ding hi; thangpaihna a pichin matan a lohching ding; a tup chintensa a hih ding hi.
A pipute pathiante leh numeite lunggulh leng a zahtak kei dia, pathian leng a zahtak kei ding; mi tengteng tung a amah kiliansak ding hi.
Himahleh a man kulhpite pathian a pahtawi dia; a pi leh pute theih ngeilouh dangkaeng leh dangka leh suangmantamte leh thilthawnpiak manphate in amah a be ding hi.

Huan gamdang pathiante panpihna in kulh muanhuaipen pente a sual ding a; kuapeuh amah hihna pomte kiang ah zahna lianzaw a pe ding a, tampi tung a vaihawm ding in a bawl dia, man nei in gam a hawm ding hi.

“Huan huntawp chiang in simlam kumpipa’n amah a kidou pih ding; mallam kumpipa amah dou ding in pingpei bang in, kangtalaite toh, sakol tung tuangmite toh, long tampi toh a hong kuan ding hi; huchi in gamte ah a lut dia, a dimlet dia a paisuak ding hi.
Aman gam Siangthou leng a sim ding a, huchi in gam tampi zoh in a om ding hi; himahleh Edom leh Moab leh Ammon tate hausapate a khut a kipan suahtaksak in a om ding hi.
Gam tampite tung ah a khut a zan ding a; Aigupta gam a suakta kei ding hi.
Himahleh dangkaeng leh dangka goute tung leh, Aigupta thil manphate tengteng tung ah thilhihtheihna a nei dia; huan Libia mite leh Ethiopia mite a kalsuanna ah a om ding uhi.
Himahleh suahlam a kipan leh mallam a kipan a thuthang in amah a hihlau dia; thangpaihna thupi a mi tampi suse ding leh hihmang ding in a kuankhe ding hi.
Huan tuipi leh mual siangthou thupi kikal ah a Inpi puanbukte a kai ding a, himahleh amah a beina hongtung dia, kuamah in amah a panpih kei ding uhi.

Huai hun chiang in Mikael, heutu thupi na mite tapate vengbittu a hong dingkhe ding hi. Leitung pianchil a kipan tu hun tanpha a om ngei nailou, mangbat hun a hongtung ding hi, huai hun chiang in laibu sung a gelh a om a, muhkhiak a om na mite hutkhiak in a om ding uhi.
Huan a lak ua mi tampi lei a leivui a ihmute a khanglou ding ua, a khen tangtawn hinna tang ding in, a khen zumna leh tangtawn simmohna tang ding in.
A pilte vansin vakna bang in a vak ding ua; mi tampi diktatna lam a heite tangtawn tangtawn in aksite bang in a tang ding uhi.
Himahleh nang, Aw Daniel, huntawp tan ading in thute khakkhum bikbek inla, laibu bilh in; mi tampi a vialtai ding ua, theihna a pung ding.”
Huailai in kei, Daniel in ka en a, ngai in, midang nih, luigei hiai lam pang ah khat, luigei langlam pang ah khat ading uhi.
Huan khat in puanmalngat a silh a, lui tuite tung a ompa kiang ah, “Hiai thillamdangte tawpna ding bangchi a sawt ahi ding?” a chi hi.

Puanmalngat silh a, luituite tung a dingpa’n vanlam a a khut taklam leh a khut veilam liktou in, amah tangtawn a hingpa min a kichiam in hun khat, hunte leh hun kimkhat ahi ding a chih kazata hi; misiangthoute thilhihtheihna a suknen dimdem khit chiang un, hiai thil tengteng zoh ahi ding hi, chi in.
Huai ka za a, himahleh ka theisiam kei hi. Ken, “Aw ka
Aman, “Pai in, Daniel: thute khakkhum bikbek ahita ua, hun tawp matan a bilh bikbek ahita hi a chi hi.
Mi tampi a kihihsiangthou ding ua, a ngou ding ua, a kibawlhoih ding uh; himahleh giloute a gilou sem ding ua; giloute lak a kuamah in a theisiam kei ding uh; himahleh a pilte’n a theisiam ding uh.
Huchi in haltum thillat gige lakmang a om a, hihgawptu kihhuai tunkhiak a hongom ding hun a kipan, ni sang khat za nih leh sawmkua a om ding hi.
Ni sang khat za thum leh sawmthum leh nga ngak a, huai a hong a paite’n nuam a sa uhi.
Himahleh a tawp matan nang zaw pai in; na khawl ding a, nang adia piak na mun ah nite beina ah na goutan sang ding in na thounawn ding hi.
Judah kumpipate, Uzzia, Jotham, Ahaz, Hezekiah leh Israel kumpipa, Joas tapa Jeroboam damlai a, Beeri tapa Hosia kiang ah hongtung
Hosia zang a
Huchi in a kuan a Diblaim tanu Gomer a pi a; a hong gai a, tapa a neihsak hi.
Huan
Huai ni chiang in hichi a honghi ding a, Jezreel guam ah Israel thalpeu ka kitansak ding” a chi hi.
Huan a gai nawn a, tanu a nei hi.
Himahleh Judah inkaw tung ah chitna ka nei ding a,
Huan Lo-ruhama nawitui a ngawlhsak in, a gai nawn a, tapa a nei hi.
Pathian in “A min ding in Lo-ammi sa in: ka mite na hihlouh ua, na Pathian uh ka hihlouh ding ziak in” a chi hi.

Hinapi in Israel suante zah tuipi piaunel, tehtheihlouh, simtheih louh bang ahi ding; a kiang ua, “Ka mite na hi kei uh” chih a a omna mun uah, hichi ahi ding a, “Pathian hing tate na hi uh,” a kiang ua chih ahi ding hi.
Huchi in Judah suante leh Israel suante kaihkhawm ahi ding ua, amau ading in lu khat a kiguan ding ua, gam a kipan a kuantou ding; Jezreel ni thupi ding ahi.
Na unaute uh, Ammi kiang ah gen un; na sanggamnute uh, Ruhama kiang ah.
Na nu uh genpih un, genpih un; ka zi ahi kei a, a pasal ka hi sam kei hi; a maitang a kipan a kizuaknate leh a nawi kikal a kipan a angkawmnate koihmang hen;
Huchilou in zaw vuaktang in ka omsak in, a pianni bang in ka koih in, gamdai bang in ka bawl in, gamkeu bang in ka koih in, dangtakna in amah ka that kha ding hi;
Ahi, a tate tung ah chitna ka neikei ding a; kizuak tate a hih ding ziak un.
A nu uh kizuak a hih ziak in; amaute painu’n zumhuaitak in ahihta hi; “Ka tanghou leh ka tui, ka samul leh ka pat, ka sathau leh ka dawn ding honpia, ka itte ka delh ding” a chih ziak in.
Huaiziak in, ngai in, ling in a lampi ka dal dia, amah dal ding in dai ka kai dia, huchi in a lampite a mu kei ding hi.

Huchi in a itte a nungzuih ding a, himahleh a pha kei ding; amau a zong ding a, himahleh a mu kei ding; “Ka pai dia ka pasal masapen kiang ah ka kik ding; huaichiangin tu sang in kei ding in a hoihzaw ding” a chi ding hi.
A buh leh bal, uain, sathau ka piak leh, a dangka leh a dangkaeng, Baal adia a zat uh, ka hih pungsak chih a theihlouh ziak un.
Huaiziak in buh leh bal a lak hun in ka la nawn ding, ka uain a hun in, a vuaktanna khuhna ding ka samul leh ka pat ka botkhe ding hi.
Huchi in tu’n amah itte muh in a zahlakna ka mukhe ding a, ka khut a kipan kuamah in amah a tankhe kei ding hi.
A vualnopna tengteng ka tawpsak ding a, a ankuangluite, a kha thak, a khawlni, leh a khawmpi kulmut tengteng;
Hiaite ka kipahman ka itte’n kei a honpiak uh ahi, a chihna, a grepguite leh a theipi kungte ka suse vek ding huchi in gammang in ka bawl ding a, gamsate’n huaite a ne ding uhi.
Baalim ni, huaite a gimlim halnite amah tung ah ka kan ding a; a bilbahte leh a suangmantamte a kizem a, a it a zuih a, kei a hon mangngilh ziak in,
Huaiziak in, ngai in, amah ka khim ding a, gamdai ah ka tonpih ding a, a kiang ah lungmuanhuai tak in thu ka gen ding hi.

Huan huai a kipan in a grephuante amah ka pe ding a, lametna kongkhak ding in Akor guam; huan a tuailai nite bang in, Aigupta gam a kipan a a hongpawt khiak lai ni bang in huai ah aman la a sa ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding hi, Ishi n’on chita dia; Baali n’on chi nawnta kei ding,
A kam a kipan Baalim minte ka lamangta ding a, a min uh genkhiak a hih nawn taklouh ding ziak un.

Huai ni chiang in, gamsate, van vasate, lei a bokvak a pai thilte toh amau ading in thukhun ka bawl ding; thalpeu leh namsau leh kidouna gam a kipan ka hihmangta ding a, galmuangtak in amau ka kualsak ding hi.
Huan kei ading in tangtawn in nang k’on khamta ding; ahi,
diktatna leh vaihawmna leh,
itna siamna leh chitna in kei a ding in nang k’on kham ding hi.
Ginomna in kei ading in k’on kham ding a;
Huai ni chiang in hichi a honghi ding a, ka dawng ding,
vante ka dawng ding a,
amau lei a dawng ding uh,
Lei in buh leh bal leh, uain leh,
sathau in a dawng ding a,
Amau Jezreel a dawng ding uhi.
Huan lei ah kei din amah ka tuh ding a;
chitna tanglounu tung ah chitna ka musak ding;
ka mite hiloute kiang ah,
“Ka mite na hi uh” ka chi ding a;
amau, “Ka Pathian na hi”
a honchi ding uhi.
Huchi in kei a din amah dangka sekel sawmlehnga leh, Barli buh homer khat leh, barli buh homer kimkhat in ka leita hi.
A kiang ah, kei ading in ni tampi na om nilouh ding; kizuak in na om nawn kei ding a, mi kuamah zi na hi kei ding; huchibang in keileng nang lam ah ka om ding, ka chi hi.
Israel suante bel kumpi neilou, vaihawmmi omlou, kithoihna neilou, khuam siangthou lou, siampu puanak lou, leh pathiante lou in ni tampi om nilouh ding uhi.
Huai nungchiang in Israel suante a hongkik nawn ding ua,
Nou Israel suante,
Kichiam leh ginna hihsiat, thah, guktak, leh angkawm hih chih ngallouh bangmah a omkei hi; a ki tungkhia ua, sisan a kisuah zialzial uhi.
Huaiziak in, gam a dah ding a, asung a tengte leh gamsate leh tungleng vasate a bah ding ua, ahi, tuipi ngasate tengteng a mangthang ding uhi” a chi hi.
“Hinapiin kuamah in sual kei henla, kuamah in sal kei heh; na mite siampute kisualpihte bang ahi uh” chih Toupa thupawt ahi.
Huan sun in na kisui ding a, nang toh zawlnei leng zan in a kisui ding uhi; huchi in na nu ka hihse ding hi.

Ka mite theihna taksap ziak in hihsiat in a om ua; theihna na deih louh ziak in, ken leng, kei dia siampu na hih louhna ding in k’on sam kei ding; na Pathian dan na mangngilhta chih thei in, ken leng na suante ka mangngilh ding hi.
“A hongpun bangzel un, ka tung ah thil a hihkhial uhi; a thupina uh zumna in ka khek ding hi.
Ka mite khelhna kivakna’n a nei ua, a thulimlouhna uah a lungtang uh a koih kip uhi.
Huan mipite hi in siampute a kibang ua, a tatdante uh ziak in amau ka gawt ding, a thilhihte uah kipahman ka pe ding hi.
A ne ding ua, a kham kei ding uh; a kizuak ding ua, a pung kei ding uh;
Ka mite’n a milimte uh thu a dong ua, a kiang uah a aisan in thu a genkhia hi; angkawmna kha in amaute takhial sak in, a Pathian uh nuai a kipan angkawm in a omta uhi.

Mualvumte tung ah a kithoih ua, tangte tung leh, tosaw singte leh a hiang singte leh nainei singte nuai ah, huai nuailim a hoih ziak in, gimlim a hal uh; huaiziak in na tanute un kizuakna a hih ua, na moute un kizuakna a hih ua; na moute un angkawmna a hih uhi.

Na tanute un a kizuak chiang un ka gawt kei ding a, na jite un ang a kawm chiang leng un ka gawt kei ding a; pasalte kizuakna a paizak ua, tempula kizuakte kiang ah a kithoih uh; ‘huchi in theihna neilou mite nuaisiah in a om ding uhi.’
“Nang Israel in, kizuakna hihmah leteh, Judah ahihleh mawh kei hen, Gilgal ah hongpai kei unla, Bethaven ah leng hohtou sam kei un,
Bawngla genhak bang in, Israel genhak tak in a kibawla; mun za a belamnou bang in tuin
Ephraim milimte toh a kizom a; a omom in om hen.
A dawnkham nung un leng kizuak in a om lailai ua, thupina sang in zumhuaina a it tuntun uhi.
Huih in a kha in amaute mutmang ding a, a kithoihna ziak un a zum ding uhi.
Nou siampute aw, hiai za un, nou Israel inkawte, ngaikhia un, kumpipa inkawte aw, bildoh un, vaihawmna na tung ua hongtung ding hi; Mizpah a thang leh, Tabor tung a lenthang na hikhinta uhi.
Mithahna lam ah thukpi in a kihelta ua; himahleh amaute tengteng thuhilhpa ka hi.
Ephraim ka thei a, Israel ka lak ah sel in a omkei; Ephraim aw, tuin, kizuak in na omta a, Israel a buahta hi.
A thilbawlte un a Pathian kiang lam a ngasak kei ding hi; asung uah kizuakna kha a om a,
Israel kisaktheihna in a ma ah a theihpih a; huaiziak in Israel leh Ephraim a thulimlouhna uah a kisui ding uhi.
zong ding in a bawnghonte uh leh a belamhonte utoh a kuan ding ua; himahleh amah a mu kei ding uh; amau a kipan in a ki hemkheta hi.
tung ah lepchiahtak in a gamta ua; ta lamdangte a nei ua; tuin a loute uh toh kha thak in amau a negai ding hi.
Gibeah ah na pengkulbinei uh mut inla, Ramah ah pengkul; Bethaven ah, nanung ah; Aw Benjamin, lauthawngna gingsak un.
Salhna ni’n Ephraim a segawp ding a; a hongom ngeingei ding Israel namte lak ah ka theisakta hi.
Judah heutute gamgi chiamtehna lamangte hi uh; tuibang in ka hehna a tung uah ka sungbaw ding hi.
Epraim nuaisiah in a om, vaihawmna ah delhkhumin a om hi, thupiak zui a om a lungkim ziak in.
Huaiziak in Ephraim ading in puannget leh Judah inkawte ading in siatna ka hi ding hi.

Ephraim in a chinatna a muh a, Judah in a liamna a muh chiang in, huaichiang in Ephraim bel Assuria kiang ah a hohta a kumpipa Jareb kiang ah a sawlta hi; himahleh nang a hon hihdam theikei a, na liamna leng a hihdam thei sam kei hi.

Ephraim ading a humpinelkai bang leh, Judah inkawte adia humpinelkai tuailai bang ka hih ziak in; kei, kei mahmah in, ka botnen dia ka paimang ding; ka pawmang ding a; honkhe ding kuamah a omkei ding hi.
A tatkhelhna uh thupha a tawi ua, ka mel a zon masiah uh, ka pai dia ka mun ah ka kiknawn ding; a gimthuakna uah chihtaktak in kei a honzong ding uhi.
Hong un,
Ni nih nung in aman a hon hihhalh ding; ni thum ni’n a hon kaithou ding a, a ma ah i hing ding uhi.
Huan thei ni,
Aw Ephraim, bang k’on chih dia? Aw Judah, bang k’on loh dia? Na hoihna lah zingsang meipi bang leh daitui zulmang pah bang ahi.
Huaiziak in zawlneite in amaute ka heuhta; ka kam a thute in amaute ka thatta hi: na vaihawmnate khovak paikhe pah bang ahi.
Kithoihna hilou in, chitna ka deih a; haltum thillat sang in Pathian theihna ka deih hi.
Himahleh Adam bang in thukhun ah a talek ua: huai ah lepchiahtak in ka tung ah a hih uhi.
Gilead thulimlou sepna khopi ahi a, sisan a hihnit in a om hi.
Suamhat pawlte’n mi a guktan bang un, siampu pawlte’n Sekem zotna lampi ah tual a that uh; ahi, kilawmlou a hihta uhi.
Israel inkawte ah thil mulkimhuai ka muta a: huai ah Ephraim ah kizuakna muh in a om a, Israel a buahgawpta hi.
Huailou in, Aw Judah, ka mite saltang ka pinawn chiang in, nang ading in buhlak ding sehsa a om hi.
Israel ka sukdam chiang in, huai chiang in Ephraim thulimlouhna muhkhiak ahi, Samaria gitlouhna toh; zuauthei ahi ngal ua: gutate’n inn a luh ua, a pawlam ah suamhatte’n mite a suam uhi.
A gitlouhna tengteng uh ka theigige chih a lungtangte un a ngaihtuah kei uh: tuin amau thilhihte ngei in amaute a hihbuai hi; tuate ka mai ma ah a om uhi.
A gitlouhna un a kumpipa uh a kipaksak ua, a zuau un a heutute uh.
Avek un angkawmte ahi uh; thuk sa gige, tanghou kangmi in tangbuang mekman silngou in a zelh suah masiah meisawn kullou thuk bang ahi.
I kumpipa uh ankuangluini in heutute uain sa in amau leh amau a ki china sak ua; simmohhatte toh a khut a zankhia uhi.
A lungtang uh thuk khuk sa bang ahi a, mite zuau in a buk ua, zankhua in a hehna uh a am a zingsang in meikuang bang in a kuangkhia hi.
Thuk bang in a sa vek ua, a vaihawmmite uh a negai uh; a kumpipa tengteng uh a pukta uh: kei lam a hong patau kuamah a omkei uhi.
Ephraim, mite lak ah a kidiaha; lumleh louh tanghou beu ahi.
Mikhualte’n a hatna a gai ua, aman a theikei: ahi, a lutung koi lailai hiam a samkang a omlam a theikei hi.
Huan Israel kisaktheihna a mel ah a lang hi:
Ephraim vakhu hai bang, theihsiamna bei ahi; Aigupta lam ah a sam ua, Assuria kiang ah a pai uhi.
A pai chiang un, a tung uah len ka zak ding; van a vasate bang in amau ka kaikhe suk ding: ka sawi ding a, a khawmpi un a zaksa bang un.
A tung uh a gik hi; kei a kipan a taimang ziak un, a tung uah siatna a tung hi, keimah tung ah a talekta ua; a maute tankhe ut mah leng, ka siatna ding in zuau a gengen uhi.
A lungtang utoh ka kiang ah a kap kei ua, a lupna tung uah a kap zawsop uh: buh leh bal leh uain zong in a kikaikhawm ua, ka tung ah a hel uhi.
A khut uh sinsakin hatsakta mah leng, ka siatna ding in a ngaihtuah uhi.
A kik ua, himahleh tungsanga ompa kiang ah ahi kei; thalpeu gilou bang ahi uh: a lei hehna ziak in namsau in a heutute uh a puk ding uh: Aigupta gam ah hiai nuihsana a omna uh ahi ding hi.
Na kam ah pengkul bulh in, muvanlai bang in
Ka Pathian, kou Israel in k’on thei uh, chi in, kei lam ah a kikou khe ding uhi.
Israel in a hoih a nawlkhin a: melma in amah a delh ding hi.
Kumpipate a tungkhia ua, himahleh kei thu in bel a hi kei hi; heutute a bawl ua, ken ka theikei: satkhiak a a om theihna ding un a dangka uleh a dangkaeng un milimte a bawl uhi.
Aw Samaria, na bawngnou milim in hon satkheta; amaute tung ah ka hehna a sou: hoihna a tunma un bang tan hi ding ahia?
Bawngnou milim Israel a kipan in ahi a: nasemmite’n a bawlkhiak uh ahi, huai Pathian ahi kei, ahi, Samaria bawngnou milim a kitam zan ding hi.
Huih a tuh ua pingpei a at ua, buh leh bal ding lai a neikei; a vui in an a suah kei hi; huchi ahihleh suah hen, mikhualte’n a nawmvalh khin ding uhi.
Israel nawmvalh in a om, kipahna omlouhna bel bang in tuin namte lak ah a om uhi.
Gam sabiltung tangom bang in, Assuria zuan in a paitou uhi: Ephraim in itmite a guaita hi.
Ahi, namte lak a kizuak mahle uh, amaute ka kaikhawm ding; heutute kumpipa dangte puakgik ziak in a lungkham ding uhi.
Khial ding a Ephraim in maitam a punsak ziak in, amah adin maitamte khelhna ding ahi.
Amah ading in ka danthuseh sang sawm in gelh mah leng, thil lamdang bang a sim in a om uhi.
Ka thillatte kithoihna thu ahihleh, sa in a kithoih ua a ne uh; himahleh
Israel in amah bawlpa a mangngilh a, munsangte a lamta hi: himahleh a khopite tung ah mei ka sawl ding a, huai a kulhpite a kangtum ding uhi.
Aw Israel, midangte bang in nuamsa in kipak ken; Pathian a kipan in kizuak in na omkhinta ngal a, phual tung teng ah kizuakman na itta hi.
Phual leh uain suknate’n amau a vak kei ding a, uain thak in amah a zuausan ding hi.
gam ah a tengkei ding ua; himahleh Ephraim Aigupta ah a kik ding, Assuria ah an sianglou a ne ding uhi.

kiang ah uain thillatte a sungkhe kei ding ua, amah ading in lungkimhuai ahi sam kei ding uh: a kithoihnate uh amau ading in sisunmite tanghou bang ahi ding; huai ne tengteng hihnit in a om ding uh; a tanghou uh a gilkialna uh ading ahi;
Kikhawmpi chik leh
Ngai un, Assuria ah a pai ding uh; Aigupta in amau a khawm ding, Memphis in amau a vui ding. Dangka a bawl a gou manphate uh lahou in a khuh ding; a puaninte uah lingte a om ding hi.
Vehna nite a hongtung, thukna nite a hongtung; Israel in a thei ding hi zawlnei mihai a seh ahi a, khamite leng mihai ahi, na ginatlouhna a tam mahmah ziak in leh muhdahna a thupi ziak in.
Ephraim galvilmi Pathian toh a om hi; zawlnei tungtang ahihleh a lampi tengteng ah thangkampa thang a om a, muhdahna Pathian inn ah a om hi.
Gibeah nite a bang in, nakpi’n amau leh amau a kihihsia ua: a thulimlouhna uh a theigige ding a, a khelhnate uh a gawt ding hi.

Gamdai a grepte bang in Israel ka mu a; theipi kung a hun masapen lai a min masa bang in na pipute uh ka muta hi. Himahleh Baal-peor ah a hong ua, thil zumhuai lam ah a kipumpiak ua, a thil deihte uh bang in amaute kihhuai a hong hita uhi.
Ephraim ahihleh, vasa bang in a thupina uh a leng mang ding a: naupianna, naupaina leh nau neihna himhim a omkei ding hi.
A tate uh khoi lian mahle uh, amau ka sunsak ding a, piching a hawi in a omkei ding hi: ahi, amaute ka nutsiat hun chiang in a tung uah a tunggikna a om ding hi:
Ephraim, Tura ka muhsa bang in, mun nuam a phuh in a om: himahleh Ephraim in a tate tualthatmi kiang ah a hon pikhe ding hi.
Aw
A gitlouhna tengteng uh Gilgal ah a om a; huai ah amau ka mudahta hi; a thilhihte uh gitlouh ziak in ka inn a kipan amau ka delhkhe ding: Ka it nawn kei ding a; a heutute tengteng uh mihel ahi uhi.
Ephraim sat in a om, a zung uh a keu, gah a suang kei ding uh; tate suang mahle uh, a sulgah it uh ka that ding hi.
Ka Pathian in amau a paimang ding a, amah a ngaihkhiak louh ziak uh; huchi in namte lak ah vakvai in a om ding uhi.
Israel in gahtam a suahzel, grepgui pha ahi; a gahtam mahmah dungzui in a maitamte a pungsak; a gam hoihna dungzui in milim kilawm taktak a bawl uh.
A lungtang uh a kikhen a; huchi in mawhtansak in a om ding uh; a maitamte uh a sat ding a, a khuamte uh a lok ding hi.
Kumpipa i neikei uh;
Thukhunte bawlna a zuau a kichiam in, thu bangloute a gen ua; huaiziak in loulehsa a namtul bang in vaihawm na a poukhe ding hi.
Beth-aven bawngnoute ziak in Samaria a tengteng a lau ding ua; huai mite’n siampu a tung a kipakte a sun ding uhi, huai bawngnou ziak in thupina amah a kipan a paimangtak ziak in.
Kumpipa Jareb kiang a thilpiak ding a Assuria lam a puak ahilai ding a, Ephraim in zahlakna a mu dia, Israel amah pilna ah a zahlak ding hi.
Samaria bel tui tung a tuiphuan bang in a kumpipa satkhiak ahi.
Aven mun sangte leng, Israel khelhna hihsiat ahi ding, ling leh loulingnei a maitam tung uah a hong kahtou ding a; mualte kiang ah, “honkhuh un; tangte kiang ah hon pukkhum un,” a chi ding uhi.
Aw Israel, Gibeah nite a kipan na khialta a; huai ah ading ua; Gibeah thulimlouhna tate tung a kidouna in amaute a phak louhna ding in.
Ka hun chiang in, amaute ka sawi ding; a tatlekna uh thuah nih ziak a taihilh a hih hun chiang un, amau dou ding in mite a kikhawm ding uh.

Huan Ephraim bawngla chilsiamsa, buh leh bal chilkhiak ut ahi; himahleh a ngawng kilawm tung ah hakkol ka bat dia, Ephraim tung ah tungtuangmi ka koih ding; Judah in lei a let dia, Jakob in a sai a nawn ding.
Diktatna ah kituh unla, chitna bangzel in at un, na leileh lei uh satkham un; a hongpai a na tung ua diktatna a hon zuksak tan,
Gitlouhna lei na let ua, thulimlouhna na lata uh; zuaugenna gah na neta ua; na lampi ah, na mihatte ah na muangta uhi.
Huaiziak in na mite lak ah buaina a hongpawt ding a, na kulhte uh loh in a om ding hi, kidou lai a Salman in Betharbel a luh bang in; nu a tate toh paihnen in a om uhi.
Huchibang mah in na gitlouh mahmah ziak in Bethel in na tung ah a hih ding; nuaisiah in Israel kumpipa satkhiak siang in a omta ding hi.
Israel naupang a hihlai in,
amah ka it a,
Aigupta a kipan ka tapa ka sam khia hi.
Amaute a sap chiang un,
amau a kipan a pai gamla sem ua,
Baal kiang ah a kithoih ua,
lim bawltawmte kiang ah gimlim a hal uhi.
Hinapiin Ephraim pai ka
kisinsak a; ka ban in amau ka pom a; himahleh amau ka hihdam chih a theikei uhi.
Mihing khaute leh itna gui in
amau ka kai a, amau adin a muk tung uleh a muk nuai ua kibat hakkol ka lakkhiaksak a,
a ma uah an ka lui hi.
Aigupta gam ah a kiknawn kei ding a; himahleh Assuria mi a kumpipa ahi ding, kiknawn a nial ziak un.
Huan, a khopite tung ah namsau lik in a om dia, a siktawnte a hul in, a negai ding, a thuhilhte uh ngei ziak in.
Huchi in ka mite’n kei a kipan nungtawn a tum chiltel uh; amah tung sang a ompa sam mahle uh, kuamah in amah a liansak kei ding uh.
Ephraim,
bangchi’n k’on tawpsan dia?
Israel,
bangchi’n k’on tankhe dia?
Admah bang in bangchi’n k’on bawl dia?
Zeboim bang in bangchi’n k’on koih dia?
Ka sung ah ka lungtang a kilumlet a,
ka lainatnate toh a kuang khawm hi.
Ka heh mahmahna ka suak khesak kei ding a,
Ephraim hihse ding in ka kihei kei ding;
mihing hilou in, Pathian ka hi a,
nang lak a Misiangthou,
khopi sung ah ka lut kei ding hi.
Amau
Aigupta a kipan a vasa bang in ling kawm in a hongpai ding ua, Assuria gam a kipan a vakhu bang in; a innte ua teng ding in amau ka bawl ding,
Ephraim in zuauthu in kei a hon umsuak a, Israel inkuan in khemna in; himahleh Judah in Pathian toh vai a hawmlaia, misiangthoute toh a ginom lai hi.
Ephraim huih in a kivak a, suahlam huih a zui; zuaute leh siatgawpna a pungsak gige a; Assuria toh thukhun a bawl ua, Aigupta gam ah sathau puaklut in a om hi.
leng Judah a kiselpih a, a lampite bang in Jakob a gawt ding; a thilhihte bang in amah a thuk ding hi.
Sul ah a unaupa a khetul in a man a; a pichin in Pathian ah thilhihtheihna a nei hi;
Ahi, angel tung ah thilhihtheihna a nei a, a vualzouta a; a kap a, a kiang ah thumna a bawl hi; Bethel ah Amah a mu a, huai ah kou a hon houpih hi;
mahmah, sepaihte Pathian,
Huaiziak in nang na Pathian lamnga in; chitna leh vaihawmna kem in, na Pathian ngak nilouh in.
Amah Kanaan mi ahi, a khut ah khemna buknate a om; nuaisiah a utlam ahi.
Ephraim in: “Taktak in ka hong hauta a, hauhsakna ka kimuhkhiakta hi; ka sepgimna tengteng ah thulimlouhna thilhihkhelhna kei ah bangmah a mu kei ding uh,” a chi hi.
Himahleh Aigupta gam a kipan kei
zawlneite kiang ah leng thu ka gen ta a, mengmuhnate ka tamsakta hi; zawlneite nasepna zang in kibatpihte ka zangta hi.
Gilead thulimlouhna ahi hia? Bangmahlou ahivek uh; Gilgal ah bawngtalte in a kithoih ua; a maitamte uh loukaihna a leivup bang in a om uh.
Aram lou a Jakob a tailut bang in, Israel in zi loh ding in na a sem, zi loh ding in belamhon a ching hi.
Aigupta a kipan zawlnei in
Nakpi mahmah in Ephraim in
Ephraim in thu a genlai in, midangte ling uh a; Israel ah amah leh amah a kiliansak; himahleh Baal milim bia in, a sita hi.

Huchi in a khial semsem ua, a dangka un milim sun a bawl ua, amau theihtheihna dungzui a milimte mahmah avek ua khutsiammite nasep; A kithoihmite’n bawngnoute tawp uhen chi in, huaite a tungthu a gen uhi.
Huaiziak in zingsang meipi, daitui hulmang pah bang, phual a kipan a pingpei lak a buhsi bang a mut leng leh, meikhu suahna a kipan a meikhu bang ahi ding uhi.
Hinapiin kei Aigupta gam a kipan
Gamdai ah k’on theita a, khawkhalna gam ah.
A loupa hing nou mitmet mun uh bang in, a maute hihdim in a om ua; hihdim in a om ua, huan a lungtang uh hihlet in a om; huaiziak in kei a hon mangngilhta uhi.
Huaiziak in amau ading in humpinelkai bang ka hi a; gialbem bang in lampi kiang ah ka tang ding hi;
Vompi a noute sun bang in amaute ka maituah ding a, a lungtang ua kipan a lap uh ka kaikhe ding; huai ah humpinelkai bang in amaute ka nebei ding; gamsa bang in amaute ka botnen ding hi.
Aw Israel, na panpihpa dou a, kei n’on dou, na siatna ahi.
Na khopi tengteng a nang hon hondam ding na kumpipa tua kaw om ahia? Kumpipa leh hetute honpi un, na chihnate uh, na vaihawmmite uh koi ah?
Hehngoh in kumpipa ka honpia a, hehngoh in amah ka lamangta hi.
Ephraim thulimlouhna koihhoih in a om a, a khelhna chiamtehna a koih in a om hi.
Numei nauvei lungkhamna a tung ah a hongtung ding; tapa pillou suang ahi a, naupian hun tungta a, a mun a a omom ding ahita ngal kei a.
Han thilhihtheihna a kipan amau ka tan ding a; sihna a kipan amau ka tan ding; Aw sihna, na gu koi ah a om ua? Aw han, na hihsiatna koi ah a om a? Ka mit a kipan kisikna sel ahi ding hi.
A unaute lak ah gahpha mahleh, suahlam huih a hong kuan dia, gamdai a kipan
Samaria in a mawh a paw ding; a Pathian tung ah a hel a; namsau in a puk ding ua; a naungekte uh paihgawp in a om ding uh, nau toh kithuah a numeite uh dawt pailet in a om ding uhi.
Aw Israel,
Thupha tawi inla,
Assuria in a hondam kei dia; sakolte tung ah i tuang kei ding uhi; i khut a bawlte kiang ah, pathiante na hi uh, i chi nawn kei ding hi; nang ah pabeite’n chitna a mu uhi.
A ginomlouhna uh ka hihdam ding a,
amaute a thawn in ka it ding,
kei a kipan in ka hehna lah a kihei mangta hi.
Israel lak ah daitui bang ka hi ding,
lili bang in a paklun dia,
Lebanon sing bang in zungkip a ka khesuk ding hi.
A hiangte a bawkpha dia,
a kilawmna olive sing bang ahi dia, a gim
Lebanon bang ahi ding hi
A lim nuai a tengte a hong kik nawn ding ua,
buh leh bal bang in a hong hingthak ding ua,
grepgui bang in a paklun ding;
a gim Lebanon uain bang ahi ding.
Milimte bangding ka chi nawnta dia?
Ephraim in a chi ding hi.
Ka dawngkhin a,
amah ka limsak ding,
meilah sing hing bang ka hi a;
kei a kipan na gah muh ahi.
Kua ahia pil a, hiai thilte theithei ding? Pilvang a amaute thei ding?
Pethuel tapa Joel kiang ah
Putekte aw, hiai za un:
hiai, nou hunlai leh na pute uh hunlai in a omkha ngeita ahia?
Huai pen na tate uh hilh unla,
na tate un amau tate hilh uhenla,
a ta nawnte un suan dang hilhsawn zel uhen.
Singnget khau in a nek bang
teng khauhon in a ne a,
khauhon in a nek bang teng ka chita ngal a a ne a;
khaukhup in a nek bang teng khaupe in a nekhinta hi.
Khamte aw, halh unla kap un;
uain dawn tengteng aw, a uain khum ziak in kap vongvong un;
na kam ua kipan lah uain lakmang ahita ngal a.
Nam hat mahmah,
simsenglouh in ka gam a hong douta uhi, humpinelkai liante ha bang in a hiam hi.
Ka grepgui a hih sia ua ka
theipi sing hawng a kheuh ua,
a kheuh siangvek a, a paimang a;
a hiangte a kiat ngou vek hi.
Nungak in, saiip puanteng a,
a hoihlai pasal a sun bang in kap vongvong un.
Tangbuang latte,
dawn ding latte
siampu
Lou hihsiat ahi a,
gam a lungkham a;
buh hihsiat ahi a,
uain thak a kang a,
sathau a ginata kei hi.
Aw, nou louneimite aw, sun
unla; aw, nou grepgui
kemmite aw, huitbuh leh barli buh ziak in dah in mau ekek un;
lou a buhlak ding a mangthang vekta hi.
Grepgui a vuai a, theipi kung a
vuai a; theibuhfai zung,
tum leh apple theikung,
lou a sing tengteng leng a vulta hi:
mihing tate lak a kipahna lah a vuaimangta ngal a.
Nou siampute aw, saiip puan
teng unla kap un; nou maitam nasemmite aw, chiau vongvong un; nou ka Pathian na semmite
aw, hongpai unla, saiip puan
silh in zankhua in lum un:
na Pathian inn ua pan tangbuang lat leh dawn ding lat kham ahita ngal a.
Anngawl hun tang siangthou in,
khawmpi taksuak bawl unla,
Huai ni a tung a gik hi:
ni lah a nai ngal a,
Bangkim hihtheipa a kipan manthatna a hongtung ding hi.
Ka mit muh in nekding hihman ahi ka hia, ahi,
i nopna leh i kipahna i Pathian inn a kipan hihman ahi ka hia?
Chite leikhal nuai ah a muat a;
pangte lah a kigawp a,
buh innte phel in a om a, a buhte a vuaita uhi.
Gante nak thum hinatel u e!
bawnghonte a buai zak ua,
loupa hing mun a neih louh ziak un; ahi,
belamhonte a segawp uhi.
Aw,
mei in gamdai gam loupa mun a kangsiangta a,
meikuang in gam a sing tengteng a kang siangta hi.
Ahi, gamsate nang honngai
in a nak huhu ua;
luitate a kangtat a, mei in gamdai gam loupa mun a kang siangta hi.
Zion ah pengkul mut unla ka
tang siangthou ah kigalginna
phuang un; hiai gamsung a mi tengteng ling uhen;
Mialna leh khonimna ni,
meikai ni leh mialsah ni, tangte tung a phalvak tangkhia bang a mipi thupitak leh hattak,
huchibang om ngeinailou,
tu nung a suan tampi tan a leng om nawn ngei samlou ding a hongtung ding hi.
A maban uh mei in a kang
siang a; a nunglam uh meikuang in a hul a;
a ma uah gam lah Eden huan bang ahi, a nunglam uh gamdai gamkeu ahi a; ahi,
bangmah in huai a pelkei uh.
A latdan uh sakol latdan bang ahi; sakol tuangmi bang in a tai uhi.
Kidouna kangtalai ging bang in tang tung ah a kilek suausuau ua,
buhpawl kang kuang luahluah leh kidouna a mipi hattak mansa a bang uhi.
Amaute mu mipite a lau ua; a melte uh a hong mualkhin uhi.
Mi hattak bang in a tai ua;
kidou mi bang in bang ah a kah ua, amau zawn chiat ah a pai ua,
a kivolhdan uh a hihbuai kei uhi.
A kiphu kha tuankei ua;
amau lampi ah a paichiat ua;
galvante a nawk paisuak ua,
a pialzak kei uhi.
Khopi tung ah a tawm ua;
kulh tung ah a tai ua;
insungte ah a kaltou ua;
guta bang in tohlette ah a lut uhi.
A ma uah lei a ling a;
vante a ling hi;
ni leh kha a mial a,
aksite’n a vak uh a sel uhi;
Huan
a giahbukte lah a thupi nga la;
a thu tangtungsakpa a hat a,
kuan a thuak thei dia?
Na puan uh hilou in na lungtang uh botkek unla
amah hehpihthei tak leh lainatna a dim, lungnel leh chitna hau,
thil hoihlou a kipan kiknawn sek ahi, a chi hi.
kihei in tangbuang leh dawn ding thillat ah vualzawlna nutsiat in a omkei ding chih kuan a thei a?
Zion ah pengkul mut unla,
anngawl hun tang siangthou un,
kikhoppi taksuaktak bawl un.
Mipi kaikhawm unla,
kikhawm te hihsiangthou unla, putekte, naupangte,
nawitui nelaite kaikhawm unla;
mouneite a dantan a kipan in hongpawt uhenla,
mou leng a dantan sunggil a kipan in hongpawt hen.
Siampu,
inlim leh maitam kikal ah kap uhenla;
na goutante gensiat a om a namte’n a tung ua vai a hawmsak ding un pe ken;
A Pathian uh koi a om ahita a,
chi in a mipite lak ah bangdia chi ding ahi ua? chi uhen.
a deihthoh a,
a mite a hehpih hi,
Ngai unla, na kiang uah buhte,
uainte, sathaute k’on tungsak ding a,
huaite in na tai ding ua;
namte lak ah gensiat in k’on omsak nawn hetkei ding.
Himahleh na kiang ua kipan in
mallam sepaihhon ka suanmang ding a,
gamkeu leh sia ah ka paisak ding, amasa pawl suahlam
tuipi ah, a nanung pawl tumlam tuipi ah; a hong uih khe ding a,
namsetak in a hong nam ding,
thil thupitak a hih ziak in,
chi in a dawng hi.
Aw gam, lau ken, nuam in kipak in;
Gante aw, lau kei un, gamdai loupa mun a hongsel a,
sing a hong gah a,
theipi kung leh grepgui a hong selpha ding hi.
Nou, Zion tate aw, kipak un,
un; nou a ding in vuah a zusak a,
kha khatna a vuah masa leh vuah nanung a hunlel a honpe ding hi.
Pialkhangte buhin a dim ding a,
uain leh sathau belte
a dimlet ding uhi.
Na lak ua ka sepaih hon tampi
ka sawl, khaukhup te,
singnget khaute, khauhonte,
leh khaupete’n a nekkhit kumte nou k’on dinnawn ding hi.
Tampi na ne ding ua, na tai ding ua, nou lamdangtak a hon ngaihtuah sekpa
ka mite a zahlak ngeikei uhi.
Huan Israelte lak ah ka om
chih leh
kuamah dang a omkei uh chih na thei ding uh;
ka mite a zahlak ngei nawn kei ding uhi.
Huai nungchiang in hichi a honghi ding a,
mi tengteng tung ah ka kha ka sung ding;
huchi in na tapate, na tanute un ka thu a gen ding ua,
na putekte un mang a man ding ua, na tangvalte un kilaknate a mu ding uhi;
Huai ni chiang in sikhapate,
sikhanute tung ah leng ka kha ka sung baw ding hi.
Van leh lei ah thillamdangte,
sisan, mei leh meikhu ding ka musak ding hi.
Ni mial a suak ding a, kha sisan a suak ding hi,
Huan, hichi ahi ding, kuapeuh
Zion tang ah leh Jerusalem
khua ah a om ding uhi.
Ngai dih ua, huai nite leh buai
hun chiang in, Judah leh
Jerusalem ah nam tengteng ka kaikhawm ding hi.
Amaute Jehosaphat phaizang ah ka hon kaikhawm ding a;
ka gam namte lak ah a hawmzak ua,
ka mite a thehzak ziak un,
Israel a ding in amaute ka lang ding;
Ka min a ding in ai a san ua;
kizuak man ding in pasal naupang a pia ua,
uain a dawn theihna ding un, a man ding in numei naupang a zuak uhi.
Ahi, aw Tura leh Sidon leh Philistia gam tengteng aw, kei ading in bang na hi ua leh? Na thuk ding ua hia? N’on thuk uleh, hattak in, kintak in na thukna uh na lutung mahmah uah k’on thuksam ding hi.
Ka dangkasik leh a dangkaeng na la ua, ka thilhoihtak deihhuaite na biakin sung uah na tawilut uhi;
Judah tate leh Jerusalem tate leng a gamgi ua kipan a gamlapi ah na suanmang theihna ding un, Grik tapate kiang ah na zuakta uhi;
Ngai dih ua, na zuakna mun ua kipan in tokthou in ka pawtsak ding a, na thukna uh na lutung mahmah uah ka thuk sam ding hi;
Na tapate, na tanute uh Judah tate khut ah ka zuak ding, amau gamlapi ah Sheba mite kiang ah a zuak ding uhi,
Hiai nam lak ah phuang unla;
kidouna kisa unla; mihat mahmahte tokthou unla;
kidoumi tengteng te hong nai uhenla, hong paitou uhen.
Na leilehna mukzumte uh
namsau ding in sek unla na thei kung kuaika temtate uh teipi din sek un;
mihatlou in leng ka hat chi hen.
A kim a nam tengteng aw,
kin unla, hongpai unla ki kaikhawm un:
Aw
Namte kitokthou uhenla
Jehosaphat phaizang ah hong paitou uhen:
huai ah a kim a nam tengteng tung a vaihawm ding in ka tu ding hi.
Na kawite uh suah un,
buhlak a hun hi:
hongpai unla, childen un; grep sukna khuk a dim a, bel a dimlet a;
a khelhna uh a thupi hi.
Mipi tampite,
thukhenna guam a mipi tampite!
Thupukna phaizang ah,
Ni leh kha hihmial in om ding ua,
aksite’n a vakna uh a sel ding uhi.
Toupa Zion tang a kipan in a humham ding a, Jerusalem khua a kipan in a aw a suah ding hi;
Lei leh van a ling ding ua;
himahleh
Huchi in
huchi in, Jerusalem khua a siangthou ding a,
mikhual kuamah a paisuak nawn hetkei ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi
ding a, tang sangte’n uain khum
a kai sak ding ua, tangte nawitui in a luang ding a;
Shittim luiguam a nawmsak ding hi.
Judah tate tung ah engbawl tak a a gam uah sisan a suah ziak un,
Aigupta a segawp ding a,
Edom gam gamdai gamkeu a suak ding hi.
Judah gam tangtawn in luah in a om gige ding a,
Jerusalem khua suan a kipan suanzel tan in luah in a om ding.
Huan a sisan suahna uh ka sawpsiang louh ka sawpsiang ding a,
Judah kumpipa Uzzia vaihawm lai leh Israel kumpipa Joas tapa Jeroboam vaihawm lai a zinling ma kum nih in, Tekoa mun ganhon vengmite lak a mi Amos thu Israel tungtang a muh:
Huan aman,
“Toupa Zion tang a kipan a humham ding a,
Jerusalem a kipan in a aw a suah ding a;
belam vengmite gantatna munte a lungkham ding ua,
Karmel tangvum a vuai ding,” a chi hi.
Himahleh Hazael inn ah mei ka sawl ding a, Benhadad kumpipa innte a kang khin ding hi.
Huan Damaska khaw kongkhak sik ka hihtan ding a, Aven guam a kipan a luahmite leh Eden inn a kipan kumpipa chiang tawipa ka mangsak ding a; Suria gam mite Kir gam ah sal in a om ding uh,”
Himahleh Gaza kulh tung ah mei ka sawl ding a, a kumpipa innte a kang khin ding hi;
Huan Ashdod khua a kipan a luahmi leh Askelon kua a kipan kumpipa chiang tawimi ka hihmang ding a; huan, Ekron khaw tung ah ka khut ka lik ding a, Philistia mi omlaite a mang ding uh,”
Himahleh Tura khaw kulhtungah mei ka sawl ding a, a kumpipa innte a kang khin ding” a chi hi.
Himahleh Teman tung ah mei ka sawl ding a, Bozrah khaw kumpipa innte a kang khin ding, a chi hi.
Himahleh Rabah khaw kulh tung ah mei ka mut kuang ding a, huan, kidouna ni a kikou toh, pingpei ni a huihpi toh, a kumpipa innte a kangkhin ding:
A kumpipa uh sal in a man ding ua, a miliante toh kiton in”
Himahleh Moab tung ah mei ka sawl ding a, Kerioth khaw kumpipa guhte a kangkhin ding; huan Moab buaina leh kikou leh pengkul ging in a si ding hi.
Huai lak a kipan vaihawmmi ka hihmang ding a, a miliante tengteng, amah toh ka that ding”
Himahleh Judah tung ah mei ka sawl ding a, Jerusalem khaw kumpipa innte a kangkhin ding” chi in.
Gentheite leivui bang a sikden ut tuntun a, mizawngte vaihawmna a kaikawi uhi: huan, mi khat leh a pa nungak khat kiang ah ka min hihnin ding in a hoh zel uhi:
Maitam tengteng kiang chin a khamna puanphah tung ah a lumzel ua, a Pathian uh inn a mi a liausak mante un uain a dawn zel uh” chi in.
“Himahleh amau ma ah Amorte, Sidar bang a sang leh tosaw bang a khauh leng ka hihmang a; tunglam a kipan a gah leh nuailam a kipan a zung leng ka hihmang hi.
Huan Amorte gam nei ding in Aigupta gam a kipan in k’on pikhia a, gamdai ah kum sawmli sung ka honpi hi.
Huan zawlnei hi ding in na tapate uh lak a mi leh Nazarit te hi ding in na tangvalte uh lak a mi ka bawl a, Aw Israel tate aw, huchibang in ahi ka hia?
Himahleh Nazarit mite kiang ah uain dawn ding na pia ua, zawlneite kiang ah, thu genkei un, chi in thu na pia uhi.
Ngai dih ua, kangtalai a buhphal sawnsip bang in, na mun uah k’on sawn ding hi.
Huan mi taihatte hatna a mang ding a, mi hat in tha a suah thei sam kei ding hi; mi hat mahmah leng a kihumbit theikei ding hi.
Thalpeu zangmi leng ading thei sam kei ding; paihat theimi leng a kihumbit theikei ding, sakol tungtuang mi leng a kihumbit theikei ding hi:
Huai ni chiang in mi thilhihthei mahmah lak a mi hangsan leng vuaktang in a taimang ding uh”
Aw, Israel tate aw, Aigupta gam a kipan a k’on pikhiak inkawte aw,
“Noute kia khovel a inkuan tengteng a ka theih na hi ua: huaiziak in na thulimlouhna tengteng uah k’on gawt ding” a chi hi.
A sawm kei un mi nih a paikhawm ding ua hia?
Humpinelkai in gammang a sa a matlai louh ngal in, a humham ngei ahia? Humpinelkai lunlai in bangmah a matkei leh a kawhawm sung a kipan a humham ngei ahia?
Amah ding a tah a omkei leh, vasa leitung a thang ah a awk thei ahia? Thang pen bangmah awk lou in lei a kipan in a kisai dia hia?
Khopi ah mi launa lou ah pengkul a mut ding ua hia?
Diktak in
Humpinelkai a humham a, kua a laulou ding?
Ashdod khaw kumpipa innte leh Aigupta gam kumpipa innte ah gen unla, “Samaria tang tungte ah kikhawm unla, huai a buaina liantak omte leh huai lak a simmohna omte en un” chi in.
“A kumpipa uh innte a, hiamgamna leh kisuamna koihkhawm mite’n lah hihdik dan a siam ngal kei ua”
Huaiziak in
Ngai unla, Jakob inkawte tung ah theisak un.”
“Israel tatleknate amah tung ah ka gawt leh, huai ni chiang in, Bethel khua a maitamte leng ka gawt ngal dia; maitam kite a tansum ding ua, lei ah a ke ding uhi” sepaihte Pathian,
“Huan phalbi leh nipi inn ka satse ding a; saiha innte a mangthang ding a, inn thupite’n tawpna a nei ding uh”
Nou Bashan bawngpite, Samaria tangtung a om a, genthei simmoha, tasamte nuaisiaha, a toupate uh kiang a, “Honla unla i dawn ding uh,” chite aw, hiai thu za un:
Pathian in amah siangthouna lou in a kichiam a; “Ngai dih ua, sikkuaika a nou a hon lakmang a, na lak ua omsun ngakuai a a hon lakmang ni a hongtung ding hi.
Huan awngvang ah na paisuak ding ua, michih tangtak in a pai ding uh; Harmon mun ah nou leh nou na kipai ding uh”
“Bethel ah hong unla, talek un; Gilgal ah hong unla, tatlekna pungsak un; huan, na kithoihnate uh zingsang teng in honla unla, na sawm ua khatte uh ni khat hal zel in honla un;
Huan silngou pang kipahthu gen kithoihna lan unla, amau deihdan a lante hilh unla, phuang un; Aw Israel tate aw, hiai lah na deih ngal ua”
“Huan ken leng na khopi tengteng uah hasianna leh na mun tengteng uah taksapna k’on pia a; huchi in leng ka kiang ah na hongkik kei uh”
