“Buhlak hun ding kha thum a hihlai in na tung ua vuahzu ding leng ka len a; khopi khat tung a ka zuksak in, khopi dang tung ah ka zusak kei hi; mun khat tung ah ka zusak sek a, a zuk louhna mun a keu hi.
Huchi in khopi nih leh thum ah tui dawn ding zong in a taikhawm ua, a taikei uh: huchi in leng ka kiang ah na hongkik kei uh”
“Keuna leh apna in k’on gawt a; na huante uh, na grephuante uh, na theipi kungte uh, na olive singkungte uh singnget lungin a nekhin vekta hi: huchi in leng ka kiang ah na hongkik kei uh”

“Aigupta gam bang in na lak uah huihpi ka sawl a; namsau in na tangvalte uh ka that a, na sakolte uh ka pimang a; na giahphualte uh gim namsia na nak ua nam khop in k’on omsak a: huchi in leng ka kiang ah na hong kikkei uh”
“Sodom leh Gomorrah khua Pathian in a chipsak lai bang in, na lak uah mi khenkhat ka hihchim a, singkang lakkhiak bang na hi ua: huchi in leng ka kiang ah na hongkik kei uh”
Huaiziak in, “Aw Israel, na tung ah hichibang in ka hih ding: na tung a hiai ka hih ding ziak in, Aw Israel, na Pathian tuak ding in mansa in om in.”
“Ngai in, tangte dingkhe sak a,
huih bawl a, mihing kiang a a ngaihtuahna bang ahia chih genkhiak sak a,
zingsang mialsak a, leimun sangte chilpa a min
Aw Israel inkawte aw, hiai thu noute sunna ding ka gen za un.
Nungak, Israel, a pukta hi;
a ding nawn kei ding: a gam
tung ah paihkhiak ahita hi;
amah tungding ding in kuamah a omkei uhi.

“Hon zong un, na hing ding uh: himahleh Bethel khua zong kei unla, Gilgal ah lut sam kei unla, Beer–sheba khua ah galkah kei un: Gilgal khua pellou in sal in a man ding a, Bethel khua a hong vuaksuak ding hi.”
Vaihawmna singkha suaksak a, diktatna lei a paikhete aw:
Siguk leh Zuheisuktun bawlpa leh sihna limliap lak a tangsakpa leh sun zan mial a bawlpa, tuipi tuite sam a,
leitung a luangsakpa, amah tak zong le uchin;
a min
Kulh tung a manthatna
hong tungguih zou hial a,
mihatte tung a manthatna tungsakpa pen.
Kongpi ah taihilhmi a mudah ua, thudiktak genmi a kih uhi.
Huaiziak in mi gentheite tuan den in buh na laksak ua: suangsek in innte na lam ua, himahleh asung ah na teng kei ding uh. Grep huan nuamte na bawl ua, himahleh uain na dawn kei ding uhi.
Na tatleknate uh tamdan leh na khelhnate uh a thupidan lah ka thei ngal a; mi diktatte na simmawh ua, golhna la a, kongpi a tasamte a hih ding him ua pampaihte aw.
Huchi in hun hoihlou a hih ziak in mi pil zaw huai hun chiang in a daidide ding hi.
Na hin theihna ding un hoihlouhna zong lou in, hoihna zong unla: huan na gen bang un,
Khelhna hua unla, hoihna it un: kongpi ah vaihawmna kiptak in tung ding un: Joseph inkaw omsunte tung ah
Huaiziak in
Grephuan teng ah nakpi a kahna a om ding a: na lak uah ka paisuak ding”
Humpinelkai taisan a, vompi tuakmi bang leh inn a lut a, bang tung a khut nga a gul in a tuk bang ahi.
ni vak hilou in mial ahi sin ka hia? Mial sah leh vakna neilou in?
“Na ankuangluite uh ka hua in ka musit a, na kikhawmpi pisuakte uah leng ka kipak sam kei hi.
Ahi, na thillat uleh na buhlat uh honlan mahle uchin, ka sang kei ding a, na gan thau uh lemna thillatte leng ka limsak kei ding hi.
Na kaihging ging kilawm uh ka ngaikhe kei ding; huaiziak in kei a kipan bil aphuai na late uh lamang un.
Himahleh vaihawmna bel tuite bang in leh diktatna lui lian bang in luang hen”
“Aw Israel inkawte aw, kum sawmli sung in gamdai ah kithoihnate leh thillatte ka kiang ah na honlan ngei ua hia?
Ahi, Molok na milim pathian uh leh Kaiuan na milimte uh, na aksi pathian uh, nou dia na tawisang zaw uhi.
a min sepaihte Pathian in, noute Damaska khokhen ah sal in k’on paisak ding”
Zion tang a nuam lua a omte leh Samaria tang a bittak a omte leh Israel nam lian lak a inkuan mi thupite tung a gik hi:
Kalneh khua ah hoh unla, en un; huai a kipan in Hamath khaw thupi ah hoh unla: Philistia gam Gath khua ah paisuk unla: hiai gamte sang in noute na hoihzaw uhia? Nou gam sang in a gam uh a zazaw ahia?
Nou ni hoihlou gamlapi a koih leh hiamgam tunna naihsakte aw,
Saiha lupna a lum a, a tutphah sau tungte ua kizia a, belamhon lak a belamnoute leh bawnghonte lak a kipan bawng tuaite ne a;
David bang a kaihging tumtum a, lasak ding na bawlbawl uhi;
Belhbu lian a uain dawn a, sathau hoihpen a kinuhte mah; himahleh Joseph haksatna ziak in a lungkham kei uhi.
Huchi in tua sal dia pai masate toh sal in a pai ding ua, nuamsa a kiziate nuamsakna lakmang in a om ding hi.
Hichi a honghi ding a, inn khat mi sawm a om leh a sivek ding uhi.

Huan misite gang, amaute halpa ngei in inn sung a kipan a a guh lakhe ding in, inn sungtawng pen a mi om kiang ah, “Na kiang ah kuapeuh a damlai a om uhia?” a chih a, aman, “Omlou” a chih leh; aman, “Dai sipsip in!
Ngai dih ua,
Sakolte suangpi tung ah a tai ding ua hia? Huai ah min bawng in lei a let ding ua hia? Noute’n vaihawmna lah gu na suaksak ua diktatna gah singkha na suaksak uh:
Nou thil bangmahlou tung a kipak a, i hatna in ahi kei maw kite i lak ua? chite aw.
“En dih ua, Aw Israel inkawte aw, nou hondou ding in nam ka ding khesak ding a; huan Hamath khomual a kipan in Arabah luitan in nou a hon engbawl ding uh”
Huchibang in
Huan huchi a honghi a, huai gam a loupa a nek khitnung un, “Aw
Hiai thu ah
Huchibang in,
Ken, “Aw
Hiai thu ah
Hichibang in a hon ensak a: ngai dih ua,
Huan ka kiang ah
Isak mun sangte a hong segawp ding a, Israel mun siangthoute hihsiat ahi ding ua: Jeroboam inkawte namsau in ka dou ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan Bethel khaw siampu Amaziah in Israel kumpipa Jeroboam kiang ah: “Amos in Israel inkawte lak ah nang hon kalh a: gam in a thu tengteng a thuak theikei chi in.
Amos in lah hichi in a chi ngal a, “Jeroboam namsau in a si ding, pellou in a gam a kipan in Israel sal in a pikhe ding” chi in thu a khak hi.
Huan Amos kiang ah Amaziah in, “Aw nang zawlnei, kuan inla, Judah gam ah taimang inla, huai ah an ne inla, thu hilh in:
Himahleh Bethel khua ah thuhilh nawn ken: kumpipa Mun Siangthou leh kumpipa in a hih ziak in” a chilai hi.
Huan Amaziah kiang ah Amos in, “Zawlnei ka hi kei a, zawlnei tapa leng ka hi sam kei; ganhon vengpa leh theipi sing kempa ka hi zaw hi:
ka kiang ah, kuan inla, ka mi Israelte kiang ah thu gen in, honchi hi.
Huchi in tuin
Huaiziak in
Hichibang in
Aman “Amos, bang ahia na muh?” a chi a. Ken Nipi theibawm, ka chi hi.
Pathian in, huai ni chiang in biakin a lasakte dahla ahi ding a; munchih ah siluang tampi om ding a, daidide in a paikhe ding uh” a chi hi.
Hiai ngaikhia in, Aw tasamte nebei nuam a; gam a migentheite hihmang nuamte aw,

“Buh ka zuak theihna ding un kha thak chikchiang a bei ding a, tangbuang buh ka zuak theihna ding ua khawlni chikchiang a bei hiam, chi in; Ephah hihneu a sekel hihlian, diklou pia bukna khemna in na zang uhi;
Dangkasik a mi genthei lei a, mi tasamte khedap but khat a lei a, buhsi i zuak theihna ding in” chi in.
Hiai ziak in gam pumpi ling in asung a om peuhmahte a lungkham kei ding ua hia? Ahi, tuilian bang in a hong khangvek ding a; Aigupta gam lui bang in a hong buai in a kiam ding hi.
Pathian in, huai ni chiang in, hichi a honghi ding a, sunlai in ni ka tumsak ding a, nisat lai in lei ka mialsak ding hi.

Na ankuangluite uh lungkhamna leh na la tengteng uh kahna ka suaksak ding a; kawng tengteng saiip puan ka tengsak ding a, lu chih sip ah giauna k’on tungsak ding; tapa tang neih sunna ding in lungkhamna leh, a tawpna khatna ni bang in ka bawl ding hi.
Huan tuipi a kipan in tuipi ah leh mal a kipan suahlam ah leng a vakvai ding ua;
Huai ni chiang in nungak siangthou leh tangvalte dangtak in a bah ding uhi.
Samaria khaw khelhna lou a kichiam a, ‘Aw Dan, na Pathian a hing bang in’ leh ‘Beer–sheba khaw lampi a hing bang in’ chi, huai mite leng a puk ding ua, a thounawn hetkei ding uh” a chi hi.
Maitam chin a
Misi khua pha in paisuak mahle uh, huai a kipan in ka khut in ka lakhe ding a; van ah kaltou mahle uh huai a kipan ka kaikhe ding hi.
Karmel mual vum ah bu mahle uh ka zong ding a, huai a kipan amau ka lasuk ding a, tuipi taw ah ka mitmuh louh in bu mahle uh, huai a kipan gul thu ka pe ding a amau a tu ding hi.
A melmate uh ma ah sal in pai mahle uh, huai a kipan namsau thu ka pe ding a, amau a satlum ding ua: hoihna hilou in, hoihlouhna ding in a tung uah ka mit ka nga ding hi.
Gam khoih a, zulsakpa
sepaihte Pathian ahi ngal a;
huailai a omte tengteng a lungkham ding ua;
luipi bang in a khang ding ua,
Aigupta lui bang in a kiam nawn ding uhi;
Van a a dantante bawl a,
leitung a a dantan kual bawl a,
tuipi tuite sam a, leitung asung bawpa,
a min
, Ngai dih ua,
“Ngai dih ua, thu ka pe ding ahi; hakvang a buh a haih bang un, Israel inkawte nam tengteng lak ah ka haih ding a; himahleh tang neupen leng leitung ah a ke kei ding hi.
‘Ka mite mikhial tengteng, hoihlouhna in a hon delhpha kei ding a, honpha sam kei ding’ chite namsau in a si ding uh” a chi hi.
Edom mun a omlaite leh ka min a sap nam tengtengte a neih theihna ding un” a chi hi.
nite a hongtung lellel ahi”
huai ni chiang in leiletmi in buh atmi a delhpha ding a,
grep chilmi’n chithehmi a delhpha ding a; tangsang in uain khum a taksak ding;
tang tengteng a zul ding uhi.
Huan ka mi Israelte sal a kipan
ka pikik nawn ding a;
khua kigawpsate a bawl nawn ding ua,
a luah ding uhi;
huan grephuante a bawl ding ua,
a uain a dawn ding uh;
huante leng a bawl ding ua,
a gah a ne ding uhi.
A gam uah amau ka phutkip ding a, a kiang ua ka piak a gam ua kipan bohkhiak in a om nawnta kei ding,
Obadiah mengmuhna
“Ngai dih, namte lak ah k’on hihneuta hi; nakpi a muhsit in na omta hi.
Aw nang, suangpi kitam kal a teng, mun sang luah,
kuan ahia lei a hon kesak ding lungsim a chipa?
Na lungtang kisaktheihna in nang a hon khemta hi.
Muvanlai bang in sangpi ah lengtou mahle chin, na bu leng aksi lak a seh in om mah leh,
huai a kipan k’on kaikhe suk ding,
“Na kiang ah gutate, suamhatte zan in hongpai le uh,
hihman nak hih na ni chia,
a deihzah un a gukei ding ua hia?
Na kiang ah grep lakhawmmite hongpai le uh,
grep lak ding khenkhatte a nuse kei ding ua hia?
Esau thilte zonkhiak ahita a;
A goubawm selgukte maikhiak ahita hi:
Nang lawmte khem in na om a,
gamgi pha in hon delhkhe ding ua:
na kituahpihte’n nang a hon zouta ua; na tanghou nete’n na nuai ah thang a kam ua;
amah ah theihsiamna a omkei hi.
“Huai ni chiang in Edom a kipan mipilte ka hihmang in,
Esau tang a kipan theihsiamna ka hihmang kei dia hia?
Aw Teman, Esau tang ah michih thahgam a a omvekna ding ua,
na mihatte nakpitak in a lunglel ding uh.
“Na unaupa Jakob tung a na hiamgamna ziak in zumna
in nang a honkhuh ding,
tangtawn a hihmanthat in na om ding hi.
Langkhat a na din ni a,
mikhualte’n a sum a lakmang ni ua,
namdang mite a kulh kongkhak a a honglut ua,
Jerusalem tung a ai a san lai un,
nang leng amau lak a
tel bang in na om hi.
Himahleh na unaupa a siatlai in awibawl kenla,
Judah tate a manthat ni un kipak ken;
a haksat ni’n kisatheitak in pau ken.
Ka mite a vangsiat ni un a kullh kongpi uah lut kenla;
a vangsiat ni un a thuakna uh en kenla,
a vangsiat ni un a sum leh paite uh tung ah na khutte uh nga sam kei un.
A mi khenkhat taikhete that ding in lamthuam ah ding in haksat ni’n a mi omsunte mansak ken.
“Nam tengteng tung ah
na hihsiat mah bang in na tung ah hih ahi ding;
na hihdan nangmah luzang ah hongkik ding hi.
Ka tang siangthou a na dawn bang un, nam tengteng in
a dawn gige ding ua, ahi,
a dawn ding ua, a valh ding ua,
pianglou bang in a om ding uh.
“Zion tang ah bel taikhete a om ding ua,
a siangthou ding uhi;
Jakob inkawte’n a goutante uh a tang ding uhi.
Jakob inkawte mei ahi ding ua,
Joseph inkawte meikuang ahi ding,
Esau inkawte buhpawl ding ahi ding ua, amau lak ah a kuang ding uh, a kang mang ding uh:
Esau inkawte a val a omkei ding uh;
“Simlam mite’n Esau mual a tang ding a; phaizang mite’n
Philistia a tang ding uh:
amaute’n Ephraim leh Samaria lou a tang ding uh:
Benjamin in
Gilead gam a tang ding hi.
Kanaan mite lak a hiai
Israel suan saltang mipite’n
Zarephath gam tan a tang ding ua: Sephrad gam a
Jerusalem khomite saltang in
Simlam khopite a tang ding uhi.
Zion tang apan Esau dou ding in a kuantou ding ua,
a tung ah vai a hawm ding uhi;
huan gam
Amittai tapa Jonah kiang ah
“Thou inla, Ninevi khua, khopi thupitak ah hoh inla, a tungthu ki koupih in; a gitlouhna uh ka ma ah a hong tungtouta hi” a chi hi.
Himahleh Jonah bel
Himahleh
Long mite a lau ua, amau pathian chiat a sam ua; long zanna ding in long sung a vante tuipi ah a paikhia uhi. Jonah bel long sunggil pen ah na lutsuk pah a, huai ah lum in, a na ihmu hithit hi.
Huchi in longheutu a kiang ah a hongpai a, “Aw nang ihmu, bangchidan ahia? Thou inla, na Pathian sam in, Pathian in, i manlouhna ding in a hon ngaihtuah khamawh dia hiam” a chi hi.
Huan khai, “Hiai thil hoihlou i tung ua hongom kua ziak ahia chih i theihna ding in, ai i san ding uh” chi in a kihou uhi. Huchi in, ai a san ua, aisan Jonah tung ah a tuta hi.
Huchi in a kiang ah, “Hiai thil hoihlou i tung ua om kua ziak ahia, honhilh in, k’on ngen uh; na nasep bang ahia? Koi a kipan a hong na hia? Koi gammi na hia? Bang nam mi na hia?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hebru mi ka hi; tuipi leh gam bawlpa
Huchi in mite’n a kihta mahmah ua, a kiang ah, “Bangdia hiai bang hih na hia?” a chi ua a hilhkhitsa a hih ziak in mite’n lah
Huchi in a kiang ah, “Kou dia tuipi a kihoh louhna ding in na tung ah bang ka hih ding ua?” a chi ua, tuipi lah a kihot sang hulhul hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hon domkang unla, tuipi ah hon lawnkhia un; huchi in tuipi nou ading in a kihot nawn kei ding; kei ziak in na tung uah hiai huihpi thupitak a nung ahi chih ka thei hi” a chi hi.
Himahleh mite’n gam a kik ding in nakpi’n long a kal ua; himahleh a hithei kei: tuipi lah a tung uah a nak kihoh semsem hi.
Huaiziak in
Huchi in Jonah a domkang ua, tuipi ah a lawnkheta uhi: huchi in tuipi kihot phul vonvon a daita hi.
Huchi in, mite’n
Huan Jonah ngapi gilsung a kipan in,
“Ka haksatna ziak in
aman a hon dawng a;
Sheol gilsung a kipan in ka kikou a, nang ka aw na zata hi.
Thukpi ah, tuipi sunggil ah n’on pailut a,
tui tampi ka kimvel ah a om a; na tuikihawt leh na tui kisep tengteng in a hontum zel hi.
Huan na mitmuh a kipan paihkhiak ka hi a;
himahleh na biakin siangthou lam ka nga nawn ding,
ka chi hi.
Tuite’n ka hinna tan in a hon umkim ua; tui thuk ka kim ka vel ah a om hi;
louhingte’n ka lu a tuamsuak hi.
Tangte taw ah ka paisuk a;
lei in tangtawn a ding in a kalhnate’n a hon khakkhum a;
himahleh nang
kawhawm a kipan ka hinna na lakhia hi.
Ka hinna ka sung ah a bahlai in,
Ka thumna na biakin siangthou ah na kiang a hongtung hi.
Thilginalou leh zuaulel
limsakmite’n amau chitna a lehngatsan uh ahi.
Ken zaw kipahthu genna aw toh na kiang ah kithoihna ka lan ding;
ka chiamsa thu ka tangtun ding.
Hotdamna
Huan
Huan
“Thou inla, Ninevi khua, khopi thupitak ah hoh inla, thugen ding k’on chihpen va tangkoupih in” chi in.
Huchi in Jonah a thou a,
Jonah ni khat pai zoh chiang khopi sung ah a vapai phot a, “Tua pat ni sawmli in, Ninevi hihman ahi ding hi” chi in, a kikou hi.
Ninevi mite’n Pathian a gingta ua; anngawl a phuang ua, a lak ua a lianpen a kipan a neupen tan in saiip puan a silh uhi.
Huai thu Ninevi khaw kumpipa bil a hongtungta a, a mangtutphah a kipan a thou a, a kumpipuan a suah a, saiip puan silh in, vut ah a tuta hi.

Kumpipa leh a miliante thupiak in kumpipa’n Ninevi khosung ah thu a phuang in a pulakta hi. “Mihing hiam, gan hiam, bawnghon hiam, belamhon hiamte in bangmah chiam kei uhen: banghiam ne in tui leng dawn kei uhen:
Mihing leh ganhingte’n saiip puan silh uhenla, nakpitak in Pathian sam uhen: ahi, michih in amau lampi hoihlou leh a khut ua hiamgamna lehngatsan uhen.
I manlouhna ding in, Pathian lunghei in lungsim kilehhei in, a heh mahmahna a kipan a kilehhei kei ding chih kuan ahia theithei?” a chi hi.
Huchi in Pathian in a thilhihte uh en in, a lampi hoihlou uh a lehngatsan uh chih a mu a; a kiang ua a chihsa, hih a tup thil hoihlou Pathian in a lehngatsan a; a hihta kei hi.
Himahleh huai in Jonah a lungkim hetkei a, a heh hi.
kiang ah a thum a, “
Huaiziak in
Huan
Huchi in Jonah bel khopi a kipan a paikhia a, khopi suahlam pang ah a tu a, huai ah sawlbuk a lam a, khopi tung a thil hongtung ding muh tum in a nuailim ah a tu nilouh hi.
Himahleh Pathian in, a zingsang phalvak in, leikha a nasep khawl a, huai in umgui a keitan a ahong vuaita hi.
Hichi ahi a, ni a hongsuah in Pathian in suahlam huih a na sepkhawl a; ni in Jonah lu a hai a, a sibup a, amah adin sih a ngen hi, “Kei ding in hin sang in sih a hoihzaw” a chi hi.
Pathian in Jonah kiang ah, “Umgui tungtang thu ah na heh mawk na hih dik hia?” a chi hi. Aman, “Sih ut hial a ka heh, ka hih dik hi” a chi hi.
Ninevi khua, khopi thupitak, asung a mi nuai khat leh sing nih sang a tam, a taklam uleh a veilam uleng khen theiloute leh ganhon tampi omna, ka hehpih kei dia hia?” a chi hi.
Judah kumpipa Jotham, Ahaz, leh Hezekiah vaihawm laia Moreseth mi Mikah kiang a
Nou, mite aw, na vek un za unla: Aw lei leh asung a om tengteng aw, ngaikhia un:
nou dem in na tungthu uh theihpihpa hi hen.
Ngai dih ua,
a hong paisuk ding a,
lei munsangte a chil ngal ding hi.
Mei kiang chin a khuainun
bang leh mun ken a tui kikhoh khia bang mai in,
tangte a nuai ah a zul ding a,
munzangte a khangkham ding.
Hiai tengteng Jakobte tatlekna ziak leh Israel inkawte khelhna ziak ahi. Jakobte tatlekna bang ahia oi? Samaria ahi kei maw? Judah mun sangte bang ahia? Jerusalem ahi kei maw?
Huaiziak in Samaria gam a thilsia omkhawm bang in ka bawl ding a, grephuan mun bang mai in: huai mun a suangte luiguam ah ka khukkhe ding a, a suangphumte ka dawksak ding hi.

A milim bawltawm tengteng sukkhap vek ahi ding a, a kizuakna mante mei a haltum ahi ding a, a milim tengteng ka hihgawp ding: kizuakna man ding in a la vek ngal a, kizuakna man mah in a pang nawn ding uhi.
Hiaiziakin ka kap ding a, ka mau vongvong ding a, kisuah leh vuaktang in ka om ding: sehalte bang in ka kikou ding a, vangawngsaute bang in ka thum ding hi.
A liamna hihdam theih ahi kei: Judah gam a tungta ngal a: ka mite kongpi, Jerusalem hial a tungta hi.
Gath khua ah genkei unla kap hetkei un; Beth-leaphra khua ah leivui lak ah ki khuk un.
Aw Saphir mi, vuaktang leh zumtakin paimang in: Zaanan mite Beth-ezel kahna ziak in hong pawtkhe kei ding ua; huai ah bitna mun a omlouh ziak in.
Maroth mi in tanhoih tan a ngaklah tuntun hi,
Aw Lakis mi, kangtalai sakol hattak henden in: amah pen Zion tanu khelhna kipatna ahi. Israelte tatlekna nang a muh ahi.
Huaiziak in Moreseth-gath kiang ah kikhakna thilpiak na piak ding ahi: Akzib innte Israel gam kumpipate adin khemna ahi ding hi.
Aw Maresa mi, nang hon zoutu na kiang ah konpi ding: Israelte thupina Adullam pha in a hongpai ding hi.
Kimet giau inla, na ta deihtakte ziak in kimet giau in: musane bang in kihih giau semsem in; na kiang a kipan a sal a pi in a omta uhi.
A lupna tung ua thulimlouhna gelmi leh thil hoihlou ngaihtuah khemi tung a gik hi: zingsang a khua a vak in huai a hihzel uhi.
Mi loute eng in a laksak ua; innte a eng ua, a laksak zel uhi: mi leh a inkawte uh mi leh a goutan un a nuaisiah uhi.
Huaiziak in
Huai ni chiang in nou dem in gentehna a bawl ding ua, kahla khasiathuai a sam in:
Huaiziak in
Thu genkei un, chi in a genzel ua, hiai mite kiang ah thu a genkei ding uh: gensiatna a dai kei ding hi.
Aw Jakob inkawte aw,
Himahleh ka mite tunai chin in melma bang in a hong dingkhia uhi: kidou utlou a galmuangtak a mi vialvakte lak a kipan in a puansilh puanaktualte uh na suah sak uhi.
Ka mi numeite a inn nuamtak ua kipan na delhkhia ua; a naupang noute a kipan ka thupina a lamang den uhi.
Thou unla, paimang un; hiai khawlna mun ding ahi kei a; siatna thupitak tan ahi a, buahna a om ziak in.
Mi kuahiam in kha a om chi in zuauthu gen in, “Uain leh zu na taina ding uh ahi” chi in hong gen leh huai mi mipite kituahpih lel zawlnei ahi ding hi.
Aw Jakobte, na vek un k’on samkhawm ding a; Israel omsunte ka pikhawm ding a; Bozrah khua belam bang a koihkhawm ding: ganhon a loupa mun ua om bang in, mipi a hih ziak un a chiak zuazua ding uh.
A ma uah lampi phuvangpa a pai a; a phu pailet ua, kongkhak pha in a pai zel ua, huai ah a paikhia uhi: a kumpipa uh a ma uah a pai a,
Aw nou Jakob heutute leh Israel inkaw vaihawmmite aw, Ngaikhia unla, k’on ngen hi ka chi ahi: vaihawm dan na theih ding uh hilou hia?
Thil hoih na hua ua, thil hoihlou na it ua, a vun uh na hawksak ua, a guh ua kipan in sa na leukhia uhi:
Ka mite sa ne in; a vun uh na lip ua, a guh uh na hihtansak ua: ahi, sa uina bel sung a sa atnen bang in huan ding in na at nen uhi.
Huai hun chiang in
Ka mite thil hihkhial sakmi, nekding banghiam piak a a om chiang ua Muanna chi a kikou a, huaibang peloute peuhmah kidouna thu a vau lau zawlneite tungtang thu

Huaiziak in kilakna na neihlouhna ding un noute kiang zan hongtung hi; ai na san theihlouhna ding un na kiang uah mialna a hongom ding a; Zawlneite ading in ni a tum ding a, sun amau tung ah mial ahi ding hi.
Mutheimite a zum ding ua, aisansiamte a zahlak ding uh, avek un muk a hum ding uh: Pathian in a dawn louh ziak in.
Himahleh Jakobte kiang ah a tatlekna uh theisak ding leh Israelte kiang ah a khelhna uh theisak ding in
Nou Jakob inkawte heutute leh Israel inkaw vaihawmmi, vaihawmna kih a, dikna chiteng lumlet mite aw, hiai ngaikhia un, k’on ngen ahi.
Zion sisan in a lam ua, Jerusalem ginatlouhna in.
Huai ah heutute’n kipahman lamen in vai a hawm ua, siampute’n loh lamen in a sinsak ua, a zawlneite’n dangka lamen in ai a san uhi: huchi in leng,
Huaiziak in Zion, noute ziak in, lou bang a leileh ahi ding a, Jerusalem thilsia omkhawm ahi ding a, biakin omna gammang bang ahi ding.
Himahleh ni nanung chiang in
hichi ahi ding a,
tanglian tungte a hihkip in a om ding a,
tang neute tung ah tawisang in a om ding;
huai ah tawisang in a om ding;
huai ah chichihte a pai zungzung ding uh.
Nam tampite a pai ding ua,
hong unla,
Jakob Pathian inn ah i hohtou ding uh;
huchi in aman a lampi tanchinte hon sinsak ding a,
a lampite ah i pai ding ua,
a chi ding uh; Zion a pan danthu a hongpawt ding a.
Aman chi tampi lak ah vai a hawm dia, gamlapi a nam hattak leng a sal ding;
A namsaute uh leilehna muk zum din a sek ding ua,
a teipite uh theikung attanna temkawi ding in a sek ding uh;
namdang in namdang tung ah namsau a likta kei ding a,
kidou dan leng a sinsakta kei ding uh.
Mi chihte a grepgui nuai uah leh a theipi kung nuai uah a tu ding ua;
kuamah in a lausak kei ding ua, sepaihte
Chichih amau pathian min chiat in a om ding ua, ei leng
A damsunte ka khosuaksak ding a, gamlapi a delhmang a omte bel nam hattak in ka bawl ding: tuban siah Zion tang ah tangtawn in
Aw nang, ganchinna insang, Zion tanu tenna bitna tang, na kiang ah lalgam masa a hongtung ding; ahi, Jerusalem tanu kiang ngei ah lalgam a hongtung ding hi.
Bang a chia hichi nak kah na hia? Na sung ah kumpipa a om ka hia, nang hon gensakpa a mangthangta ahia, numei nauvei bang a lunggimna in nang a hon mat?

Aw Zion tanu, numei nauvei suak ding bang in natna thuak in vei in: khopi a kipan in na pawtkhe ding a, gam ah na teng ding a, Babulon tanpha a paiding na hi ngal a, huai ah hotkhiak in na om ding a, huai ah na melmate khut a kipan
Tuin tampi nang hondou in a kikhawm ua, hihbuai in om henla, i mit in Zion tung a a lunggulh pen mu hen, a chi uhi.
Himahleh
Aw Zion tanu, thou inla chil in: na ki sik bang in ka bawl ding a, na khepek dal bang in ka bawl ding; huan mi tampite na satnen ding a: a thilneihte uh
Aw sepaih honpi tanu, tuin sepaih hon kaikhawm inla: amau a hon umsuakta ua: Israelte vaihawmpa a biang ah sikchiang in a sun ding uhi.

Himahleh nang Bethlehem Ephratha, Judah gam a sang tampi lak a tel din neu tawk lechin leng, nang a kipan in Israelte vaihawmpa ding kei din a hongpawt ding; a hongpawtna sawtpi, tanglai nite a kipan ahi.
Huaiziak in nauveimi’n a suahsak ma teng amau a lehngatsan ding: huchi in a unau omsunte Israel suante kiang ah a kiknawn ding uhi.
Amah ading dia,
Huan, hiai mi kilemna ahi ding; Assuria mi a gam ua a hong a, i kumpipa uh innte a honsik chiang in, amah dou ding in belampu sagih leh mi thupi giat i kitelkhe ding uhi.
Assuria gam namsau in a hihse ding ua, Nimrod gam a lutna a hihse lai ding uh: huan aman, i gam ua Assuria mi hong a, i gam chiang uh a hongsik hun in, amah a kipan in a hon honkhe ding hi.
Jakob mi omsunte chi tampi lak ah

Jakobte mi omsunte namte lak ah leh chi tampite lak ah gamnuai sate lak a humpinelkai bang leh belamhon lak a humpinelkai lunlai bang in a om ding: aman a paisuak peuhmahte a sikden a, a botnen a, humbit ding leng kuamah a omkei uhi.
Na khut nang hondoute tung ah lik in om henla, na melma tengteng hihman in om hen.
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding a,
Na khopite ka hihmang ding a, na kulhhat tengteng ka hihchim ding;
Na khut a kipan bumsiamte ka hihmang ding a; aisansiamte ka hihmang ding a; aisansiamte na nei nawnta kei ding hi:
Nang a kipan na milim bawltawmte leh na suangphuhte ka hihmang ding a; na khutsuakte na be nawn kei ding hi.
Nang a kipan Aserte ka botkhe ding a; na khopite ka hihse ding hi.
Huan thu ngaikhelou namte tung ah hehna leh thangpaihna in phulakna ka piching sak ding hi.
Aw tang liante aw,
Aw ka mite aw, na tung uah bang ka hihta a ahia? Banglam in ahia k’on hihgim? Hon gen dih ua.
Aigupta gam a kipan in nou k’on pikhia a, saltanna inn apan nou k’on tankhia a; na ma uah Mosi, Aron leh Miriam ka sawl hi.
Aw ka mite aw,
Bang toh ahia
belamtal sang tampi hiam sathau lui singte hiam ah a lungkim dia hia? Ka tatlekna ziak in ka tachil pia in, ka khelhna ziak in pumpigah ka pedia hia?
Aw mihing, a hoih nang a hon ensakta hi;
Migilou inn sung ah gitlouhna a kaihkhawm goubawmte leh tehna diklou kihhuai tak a omlai hia?
Bukna diklou zangte leh khemna dia gikdan tehna diklou zangte siangthou ka chi ding ahia?
Huai a mi hausate lah hiamgamna in a dim ua, huai a tengte’n zuau a gen ua, a kam sung ua a lei uh khemhat ahi.
Huaiziak in ken leng nakpi a hon limsak in k’on khen a; na khelhna ziak in k’on hihgam hi.
Na ne ding a, himahleh na taikei ding; na kiang ah na daina a om ding a: na khol ding a, himahleh a bit kei ding; na kholsate namsau in a pai mangpih ding in ka pe ding hi.
Na ching ding a, himahleh na lakei ding: Olive gahte na chil ding a, himahleh a thau na nilh kei ding; grep chil mah lechin, a uain na dawn kei ding.

Omri thusehte lah na vom gige ngal a, Ahab inkaw thuhilhna tengteng zui in amau lemtheihna ah na pai uhi; huchi in mun gam gawp in k’on bawl sinta hi, na sung a tengte simmawh thuak in soisak in a om ding uhi.
Ka tung gikna mai e: nipi thei a sekkhawm hunlai a om bang leh grep loh hunlai a grep maih lohding bang ka hi ngal a: gahbom nek ding a omkei; ka hinna in theipi min masa a lunggulh hi.
Pathian limsakmi lei a kipan a mang ua, mihing lak ah midiktak a omkei uh: sisan suah ding in a tang vek ua; michih in amau unau len in a gem uhi.
A khutte uh thil hoihlou tung a thanuamtak a hih ding in a nga ua; kumpipa’n thilpiak ngiat a, vaihawmpa’n a negu a; mi lian in a lungsim thil hihkhelhna a genkhia a: huai in a kithutuak uhi.
A lak ua mi hoihpen loulingnei bang ahi a; midik pen leng dailing nei sang in a hoihkei zaw: nang vengmite ni, veh a na om ni ngei a hongtung hi; huai bel a mangbat ni uh ahi ding hi.
Lawm ah muang kei unla, makaimi ah ginna koih kei un: na angsung a omnu a kipan in na kam kongkhakte veng in.
Tapa in pa min a hihsia a, tanu in a nu a dou a, mou in a pi a dou ngal a; mihing melmate zaw amah inkawte mah ahi uh.
Ken zaw
Aw ka melma, ka puk hun chiang in hon awi ken: ka thou nawn ding; mial a ka tut in leng
tung a thil ka hih khelh ziak in, a lunghih louhna mahmah ka paw ding, ka tungthu a hon genpih a, kei adia vaihawmna a tangtun masiah; vak ah a hon pikhe ding a, huan diktatna ka mu ding hi.
Huchi in ka melma ka kiang a,
Na kulh bangte bawlna ni ding leh na gamgi kekletna ni hongtung ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in Assuria gam leh Aigupta khopi a kipan, Aigupta leh Lui phahial a kipan, tuipi leh tuipi kikal a kipan leh tang leh tang kikal a kipan na kiang ah a hongpai ding uhi.
Huchi pi in gam, asung a tengte ziak leh a thilhih uh gah ziak in hihgam ahi ding hi.
Karmel tangkal a gamnuai a lungzuang tak a om na goutan belamhon, na mite na khetbuk zang in vak inla: nidanglai bang in Bashan leh Gilead ah vak in om chiat uhen.
Aigupta gam a kipan a na paikhiaklai bang in a kiang ah thillamdang mahmahte ka ensak ding hi.
Namchih in huai a mu ding ua, a thilhihtheihna tengteng uh a zumpih ding uh: a muk uh a hum ding ua, a beng uh a ngong ding hi.
Gul bang in leivui a liak ding ua; khupboh a vakte bang in a omna kua ua kipan in ling kawm in a hongpai ding uh:
Nang bang a thulimlouhna ngaidampa leh a goutan omsun tatlekna nelhsiah Pathian kua a om a? A hehna tangtawn in a vom gige kei, hehpihna a a kipah mahmah ziak in.
A kihei kiknawn ding a, i tung ah hehpihna a nei ding; i thulimlouhnate a khe nuai ah a sikden ding; nang amau khelhna tengteng tuipi taw thukpi ah na pailut ding hi.
Nidanglai a ka pu leh pate kiang a na kichiamsa, Jakob kiang a thutak leh Abraham kiang a hehpihna na tangtun ding hi.
Ninevi khaw puakgik.
Elkos mi Nahum kilakna bu,
leh phulak ching ahi;
amah doumite tung ah phu a la a, a melmate ading in hehna a kholkhawm hi.
nakpi a thilhihthei ahi,
mimawhte siam a tangsak mahmah kei ding;
meipite a khe leivui ahi.
Tuipi a sal a, a kangtat sak a,
lui tengteng leng a kangsak khin a;
Bashan gam a bah a,
Karmel tang leh Lebanon tang paklunte a vuai uhi.
Tang liante amah ziak in a ling ua, tang neute a zul mang ua; a ma ah lei a vuak a,
ahi khovel leh asung a om tengteng toh in.
A lunghih louhna mai ah kua ahia ding thei ding a,
a hehna thupitak ah kua ahia om thei ding?
A hehna mei bang a sunbuak ahi a,
suangpite a kekzak sak vek hi.
amah a ginnna uh koihmite a thei hi.
Himahleh tuikhang luanglet zang in huai mun manthat vekna a tungsak ding a a melmate khomial a delhlut ding in.
bei sipsipna a tungsak ahi,
haksa nihveina a tung kei ding hi.
Lingnok bang a om in a uain dawn un diah kawt dimdem bang in om mahleh,
buhpawl keu bang mai a hihman vek in a om ding uhi.
Nang a pawt mi khat
hichi in a chi: a hat theihtawp un hat mahle uh, tam leng tampi himah le uh, huchi pi in leng vatpuk in a om ding ua, a mangthang ding uhi. Hon na hihgim khin mah leng k’on hihgim nawnta kei ding hi.
Tunzaw na kiang a kipan a hakkol ka kitansak ding a, nang gakna khaute ka kitatsak vek ding.
Tangte a tanchinhoih tun a, lemna thu tangkoupihte khe en dih; Aw Judah, na Ankuang lui inla, na thuchiamte tangtun in; mi thuginalou in a hon pal paisuak nawn kei ding a; hih manthat vek ahita hi.
Kitam gawpsakpa doutu
na mai ah a hongpawt hi:
kigalvan inla, na lampi veng in,
na kawng khauhsak inla na thilhihtheihna hattak in bawlhoih in.
Hihsemite’n Israel thupina hihsia in a grepguite hihtan mahle uh,
A mi hatte lum sansak ahi a,
mi hangsante a sanau in a kivan ua;
a kisakna ni’n kangtalaite kahpasik tet in a te kelkel ua,
teipite mulkim huaitak in a phe zolzol hi.
Kangtalaite kongzing ah a tai
gomgom a; lamlian zate ah a kiphu noknok ua;
meisel bang in a lang ua,
khophia bang in a tai zualzual uhi.
A miliante a sam khia a:
a kituak pailai a kisui ua;
kulhbang lam zuan in a kinoh ua,
kihumbitna ding a bawl uhi.
Lui kongkhakte hon ahi a,
kumpipa in hihsiat in a om hi.
Huan Huzzab salmat in a paimang pih ua,
a sikhanute’n a awm uh tum in vakhu bang a ham in a kah uhi.
Nidanglai a kipan Ninevi khua
zaw dil bang ahi;
himahleh a mi tampi a taikhia ding ua, khawlin, khawlin,
chi in kikou mahle uh kuamah a kihei kei ding uhi.
Dangka sik gallak in laksak
unla, dangkaeng leng gallak in laksak un;
gou manpha a dim ahihman in thil kisekkhawm leh vanhoihte tawi bei ni a nei kei ding hi.
Sukvuak in a om a, a vuak keuhkeuh a,
a siang sipsip: lungtang a zulmang a,
khukte a kihot ua,
kawng tengteng a na tuntun a,
avek ua mel a mualkhin hi.
Humpinelkai khosakna mun,
Humpinelkai pite leh a noute nekding a balnenna leh a lausak ding omlou a
Humpinelkai leh humpinelkai tekte pai vialvialna mun koimun hita ahia?
Humpinelkai tal in a noute khamkhop a botnen a,
Humpinelkai pite adin a keilum a, a kawkhukte uh sakeih in a dimsak a,
a omna kawkhuk samatte a dimsak in, a bu kim loupa a bohzan hi.
Sepaihte
Sisan suahhat khopi tung a gik hi;
zuau leh kilohna in a dimkhin a;
a sa keih uh tatlak lou ahi.
Zepna ging, kangtalai khe ging,
sakol tawmte, kangtalai tai gopgopte toh;
Sakol tungtuangmi sakol a tuangte,
namsau te zolzolte, teipi te zualzual toh;
mi thah om lemlumte, luang om ziazua toh;
luang in bei chih mahmah a neikei;
siluangte pal in a kisuipuk uhi:
Huai kizuak melhoih, bumsiamnu,
a angkawmna ziak a nam zuak a,
a bumhatna ziak a inkuan zuaknu angkawmna thupi mahmah ziak a hon gawm ahi.
Sepaihte
Ngai in, ka hondou ahi;
na mai lam ah na puan ka lem ding a;
na vuaktanna namte kiang ah leh na zahlakna kumpipa gamte kiang ah ka ensak ding.
Nin kihhuai mahmah in ka hontheh ding a,
zumhuai mahmah in k’on bawl ding a,
muhnop ading in k’on koih ding.
Hichi ahi ding a, nang honmu peuhmah nang a kipan a taimang ding ua,
Ninevi khua a hong segawpta hi:
kuan amah sun ding a, a hehnemtu ding koi a zong ding ka hia?
Luite kikal a om Noamon, a kim a tui in a um, a kulh ding a tuipi zang a kulhbang ding a tuipi nei sang in na hoihzaw ahia?
Ethiopia leh Aigupta a hatna ahi a, huai bel tawp hun neilou ahi; Put leh Lubim bel nang hon panpihte ahi uh.
Huchipi in leng lakmang in a om a, sal in a tang a: kongzing teng tawp ah a naupang neute a paihnen sak uh: a mi thahte uh ading in ai a san ua, a mi liante tengteng khainiang a gak ahi uh.
Nang leng na khamsam ding a, sel in na om ding; melma ziak in kulh kip na zonglai ding hi.
Na kulh tengteng theipi kung, gah min masa pulh bang ahi ding ua: a lin peuhmah uleh nemi kam ah a kelutzel uhi.
Ngai in, na sung a na mipite numei ahi ua; na melmate din na kongpi a kihong heuhou a: na kikalhna siktawnte mei in a kangtum hi.
Um kimvel a na omsung ading in tui tawi inla, ka kulhte hihkip in: tungman omna ah hoh in, belhkipna chil in, lei haltakna thuk hihkip in.
Huai ah mei in a hong kangtum ding a, namsau in a hon satlum ding a, singnget bang in a honhih mangthang ding hi. Singnget bang in kipungsak inla, khaukhup bang in kihihpung in.
Na sumsinmite van aksi sang a tam in na khangsak a: singnget in a hihsia a, a leng mang mai uhi.
Kumpilukhu khu na mite lah khaukhup bang ahi ua, na sepaihte khovot ni a huandai a khaupe hon bokkhawm bang ahi uh, himahleh ni a hongsuak a, a leng mang ua, a omna mun uh theih ahi kei hi.
Assuria kumpipa aw, na belamchingmite a lusu uhi: na miliante a khawl ua: na mipite tangte ah a dalh ua, pikhawmmi kuamah a omkei uhi.
Na natna damna sing a omkei; na liamna a thupi mahmah hi: na husa za peuh in khut a hon betkhum ua; na gitlouhna thuak khalou kua a om a?
Puakgik zawlnei Habakkuk in a muh;
Aw
Bangding a thulimlouhna hon musak a, ginatlouhna hon ensak na hia? Lohna leh hiamgamna lah ka ma ah a om ngal ua: kilanna a om a, kinakna a om hi.
Huaiziak in dan a ze-awl a, vaihawmna a kuankhe ngeikei: giloute’n lah diktatte a umsuak vek ua; huaiziak in vaihawmna pawtkhia hekkawi in a om hi.
Namte lak en unla, thei unla, lamdangtak in lamdang sa un: noute hunsung in nna khat ka sem ding hi, huai bel honhilh mahle uh na gingta nuam kei ding uhi.
Ngai un, Kaldaite ka bawlkhia hi, huai nam hiamgam leh ngongtat; huaite’n amau tenna mun hilou tang ding in lei vailam khaktan in a pai uh.
A mulkimhuai un a lauhuai ua; a vaihawmna uh leh a thuneihna uh amau ngei a kipan a pawtkhia hi.

A sakolte uleng gialbemte sang in a kin zaw ua, nitaklam ngiate sang in a lauhuai zaw uh; a sakol tungtuangmite uh a kiphalh ua; ahi, a sakol tungtuangmite uh gamlapi a kipan a hongpai uhi; ne gai ding a kinoh muvanlai bang in a leng uhi.
Hiamgam ding in avek un a hong ua; suahlam huih bang in kilawp tak in a mailam en in a tai ua; piaunel bang in salte a kaikhawm uhi.
Ahi, amau kumpipate a nuihsan ua, amau ading in thuneite nuihzatna ahi uhi; kulh muanhuai chiteng a nuihsan ua; leivui a vuma, a lak zel ziak in.
Huaichiang in huih bang in a leng ding ua, a talek ding ua, a mawh ding uhi, huai a hatna pathian in a nei uhi.
Aw
Gilou muhna ding a nang mit chimzaw, hoihlouhna ensim theilou, bang ding a lepchiahtak a thilbawlte mu a, gilou in amah sang a diktat zaw mi a nawmvalh lai a dai maimah na hia?
Mite tuipi ngasate bang, a tung ua vaihawmtu neilou, leh bokvak ganhingte bang a bawl maimah na hi.
Ngakuai in avek un a khaikhe tou a, a len in amau a man a, amaute a lenpi a huaikhawm a om in nuamsa in a kipak uhi.
Huaiziak in len a ding in kithoihna a lan ua, a lenpi ua ding in gimlim a hal hi; amaute ziak a a tan uh hoih a, a sa uh a tam ziak in.
Huaiziak in amau lente hihvuak a, namte hihsia gige tel ding ahi u maw?
Ka galvenna ah ka ding dia, insang ah ka pang ding a, ka kiang a bang ahia a gen chih thei ding in leh ka phunna tungtang bangchi’n ka dawng dia chih thei ding in ka ngak ding hi.
Huan
Mengmuh lah hun sehsa ading ahilai a, a tawplam ah a kinoh a, a zuau kei ding; omtadih mahleh, ngak in; a hongtun ding ziak in, a zekai kei ding hi.
Ngai in, a kha kiliansak amah mi diklou ahi, himahleh mi diktat tuh ginna in a hing ding hi.

Ahi, uain in lepchiahtak in a omsaka, mi kiuangsak om kinken lou ahi; gawtmun bang a a deih hihlian, sihna bang ahi a, suklungkim theih ahi kei, nam tengteng amah ah a kaikhawm zaw a, a tung ah mipite tengteng a sekhawm hi.

Hiaite tengteng in amah demin gentehna a gen un, amah demna paunak enghouna hiai bang a gen in, “Amah a lou hihpungpa tung a gik!” Bang tan? chi in, a genkei ding ua hia! Bang tan thilkhamna zang a kihih inbulpa;
Nang honsual ding in thakhat in a hong thoukhia un, nang hon hihbuai ding a hong khanglou in, nang amaute ading in gallak suak ding hilou na hi maw?
Nam tengteng na loh ziak in, mipite, a omsunte tengteng in nang a honlok ding ua; mite sisan ziak in leh gam tung, khopi tung leh asung a teng tengteng tung a hiamgam na hihna ziak in.
“Tunglam sang a a bu a seh theihna ding leh gilou khut a kipan a tatkhiak a om theihna ding a, a in adia punna gilou mumi tung a gik hi!”
Mi tampi satkhia leh, na hinna tung a khial in na inkawte tung ah zumhuaina na zong ahi.
Bang a kipan a suang kikou khe ding a, sing a kipan a inkam in dawng ding a hih ziak in.
“Khua sisan a lam a, khopi gitlouhna a dingsakmi tung a gik hi.”
Ngai in, mite sepgimna mei a khul ding singkhuah bang leh namte kisukgimna uh bangmahlou a suah ding sepaihte
Tuite’n tuipi a khuh bang in,
A inveng dawn ding pia a, huai a gu hel a, a vuaktanna uh na et theihna ding a, amah khamsaklai mi tung a gik hi;
Thupina deihna in zumhuaina in na dim a; nang leng dawn inla, zeksumloupa bang in om in;
Lebanon tung a hiamgam hihna in nang a honkhuh ding a, gamsate siatna in nang a hon lausak ding; gam tung, khopi leh asung a teng tengteng tung a hiamgam a mite sisan na suah ziak in.
A gelhmi in a gelh, milim gelh; milim sun, zuaute sinsakpa, milim pautheilou bawl ding a, huai a a nasep bang phatuam ahia?
Sing kiang a, Halh in, suang pautheilou kiang a, thou in, chi mi tung a gik hi; Ngai in dangkaeng leh dangka a luan milim, amah ah nakna omlou in a sinsak thei diam?
Himahleh
Zawlnei Habakkuk thumna, Sigionoth toh kituak a bawl.
Aw
ka za a, ka lau hi;
Aw
kumte lak ah ki theisakve;
thangpaihna chitna theigige in.
Teman a kipan in Pathian a hongpai a,
Paran tang a kipan in Mi Siangthou,
A thupina in vante a tuam a, amah phatna in lei a dim hi.
Amah thupina vak bang ahi a;
A khut apan nizung a hong
suakkhia hi;
a thilhihtheihna huai ah a khuh hi.
A ma ah hi a pai a,
a khepekte ah suangkuangthei kuang a paikheta hi.
A ding a, lei a lingsak a;
a mu a, namte a hawlzak hi;
tangtawn tangte hihdalh in a omta ua,
tangtawn mualte a kun ua,
a paina nidang a bang ahi.
Kushan puaninte gimthuak in ka mu a;
Midian gam mite linggawp uhi.
Luite tung a
Luite tung a na hehna om hia
ahihkeileh tuipi tung a na thangpaihna,
na sakolte tung a na tuanna leh hotdamna na kangtalaite tung a na tuanna?
Na thalpeu a vuak petmah a bawl ahi;
namte kiang ah kichiamnate thutak ahi uh,
Luite’n lei a khangkhamsak hi.
Tangte’n nang honmu ua, a lau uh;
tuikhang in a kheng a,
tuithuk in a aw a suah a,
tung sang ah khutte a liktou hi.
A omna uah ni leh kha
ading kinken ua;
a pai bang un na thalte vak ah,
na teipi te zolzol in a vak uhi.
Heh in gam na palsuak petmah a,
thangpai in namte na chil hi.
Na mipite hondam ding in
na kuankhia a,
na thaunilh hotdamna ding in;
giloute inn a kipan lutang
na hihliam a;
ngawng chiang pha hial in suangphum na hihse vek.
A galhatte lutang amah chiangte ngei in na sun a;
kei hondalh sak ding in pingpei bang in a hongpai uhi;
nuam a sakna uh gentheite a guk a nekhin ding in ahi.
Na sakolte in tuipi leh
tuihatte sunvumte na chil hi.
Ka za a, ka gilpi a kising a,
ka kam a awte ling pupulh a;
ka guhte ah muatna a honglut a,
ka mun ah ka linggawp hi;
buai ni a amah sim dia hong kuan mite dou dia a hong paitouh chiang a ka lin louhna ding in,
daidide in ka ngak ding hi.
Theipi kung pak phalou in,
Grepguite ah a gah omlou in;
Olive sepgimna vuaksuak in,
Loute’n nekding piangsaklou in;
Huang apan ganhonte satkhiak a om in,
huangsung ah ganta omta kei mahleh;
Huchipi in leng
ka kipak ding a,
ka hotdamna
Pathian ah ka nuam ding hi.
Jehovah,
ka khepekte zukpi khe bang in a bawl a,
ka mun sangte ah a honvak sak ding hi.
Lapu lian ading,
tumging guineite a sak ding.
Judah kumpipa, Ammon tapa Josiah damlai a, Kusi tapa, Gedaliah tapa, Amariah tapa, Hezekiah tapa, Zephaniah kiang a
“Leitung a thil om tengteng ka hihbei sipsip ding
Mihing leh sa ka hihbei ding; van a tungleng vasate, tuipi a ngasate, giloute toh kipalpuknate ka subei ding; leitung apan mihing ka satkhe ding hi”
“Judah tung leh, Jerusalem a tengte tung ah ka khut ka lik ding; hiai mun a kipan in Baal omlaite leh milim biak ching siampute min ka satkhe ding hi;
Intung a van aksihon bia;
zuihna a kipan kilehheite, leh
kithoih ni’n hichi ahi ding, heutute, leh kumpipa tapate leh, gamdang puan a kizem huchibang tengteng ka gawt ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in, phual kan a tawmte, hiamgamna leh khemna a a pu uh inn hihdimte, ka gawt ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in Ngasa kongpi apan kah thawmging a om dia, kongpi Nihna apan mauna leh tangte a kipan nakpitak a siatna husa a om ding,
Mau un, nou Maktes a tengte, na sumsin mite tengteng a omta kei ua; dangka teh mite satkhiak ahita uhi.
Huai hun chiang in hichi a hi ding hi, khawnvak tawi in Jerusalem zong ding ka hi; mi uain dawn a tengden, a lungtang ua,
Huchi in a hauhna uh gallak a honghi dia, a innte uh a segawp ding; innte a lam ding ua, himahleh a luah kei ding uh; grephuante a bawl ding ua, himahleh huai a uain a dawn kei ding uhi.
Huai ni thangpaihna ni ahi, lungzinna leh dahna ni, mialna leh lungkiakna ni, meipi leh khomial bikbek ahi.
Pengkul leh gallauna ni, khopi daikaih siatna, a ning a insangte siat ni.
Huan mite tung ah dahna ka tun ding a, mittaw mite bang in a vak ding uhi,
Ki kaikhawm un, ahi, ki kaikhawm un, zumna neilou namte aw:
Thupiak a kuankhiak ma a, buhsi bang a hon mutmang ma in, na tung ua
A vaihawmna zui, nou lei a mi nunnemte tengteng aw,
Gaza lah nutsiat in a om dia, Askelon hihgawp in; suntang lai in Ashdod a hawlkhe ding ua, Ekron a ki zungkalh ding hi.
Tuipi piau a teng Kereth namte aw na tung uh a gik hi,
Huchi in tuipi, piaute louhing noumun ahi ding a, belamchingte innte leh belamhonte a huangte ahi ding hi.
Huai piau bel Judah inkaw omlaite ading ahi ding; huai ah a belamhonte uh a vak ding uh; nitaklam in Askelon innte ah a kual ding uh;
Moab hon kouna leh, Ammon tate gensiatna ka zata hi. A kigitpihte uh tung a kiliansak a, ka mite gam a dou a sawm uhi,
Huaiziak in sepaihte
Sepaihte
Amau tung ah
Nou Ethiopiate leng, ka namsau a thah a om ding na hi uhi.
Huan aman mallam dou in a khut a likkhe ding hi: Assuria a hihse ding; Ninevi a kisegawp ding, huchi in gamdai bang in a keu ding uhi.

Belamte a lai ah a kual ding ua, namte ganta tengteng; vangawngsau leh sakuh a chial tungnung ah a giak ding ua; tohlet ah a aw in la a sa ding uh; sangkilte ah siatgawpna a om ding; sidar sing a nasepte a hihsiat ziak in.

Hiai khopi nuamsa pilvangloutak a teng a, a lungtang a keimah ka hi, kei lou kuamah dang a omkei; chi ahi; bangchidan a hong segawp a, gantate adia kualna ding hi ahia; kuapeuh a kiang a pai in a nuihsan in, a khut a leh khum ding uhi.
Khopi nuaisiah, hihbuah leh nitsak a om tung a gik hi;
Aw a mangkei a, bawlhoihna leng a kipahpih kei;
A lak a a heutuliante humpinelkai humham bang ahi ua, a vaihawmmite nitaklam ngia a zingchiang a nekding nuse utlou bang ahi uhi;
A zawlneite mizuau leh lepchiah ahi uh; A siampute un Mun Siangthou a hihbuah ua, dan tung ah a hiamgam uhi.
A lak ua
Namte ka satkheta a, a insangte uh a kisegawp hi; a kongzingte uh ka susia a, kuamah a paikei uhi; a khopite uh hihsiat in a om a, huchi in mi a omkei ua a teng leng a omkei uhi.

Chihtaktak in kei n’on kihta ding ua, bawlhoihna na kipahpih ding, ka chi a; huchi in a tenna satkhiak in a omkei dia, amah tungtang a sehsa tengteng bang in; himahleh beltak in a thou ua a hih tengteng uh a sesak uhi.
Huaiziak in matding zuan a ka thohni a tun masiah hon nangak un
Huai hun chiang a mite’n
Ethiopia luite khenlam a kipan gimlim halmite, dalhsa ka mite tanu mahmah in ka thillat a hontawi ding hi.

Huai ni chiang in ka tung a na tatlekna, na thilhihte tengteng ziak in na zahlak kei ding; huai hun chiang a na lak a na mi kisathei leh kiuangsakte lakhe ding ka hih ziak in, huchi in ka tang siangthou ah na kiuangsak nawnta kei ding uhi.
Himahleh na lak ah mi gimthuak leh genthei ka nuse ding a,
Israel omsunte’n gilou ahihkei ding ua, zuau a gen sam kei ding uh; a kam uah leng lei khemhat a kimu kei ding hi; ne a, lum ding a, amaute kuamah in a hihlau louh ding ziak un.
Lasa in, Aw Zion tanu;
kikou in, aw Israel;
Jerusalem tanu aw,
na lungtang tengteng toh kipak in nuamsa in.
na melma a delhkhia a, na lak ah Israel kumpipa,
gilou na lau nawn kei ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in, Jerusalem
kiang ah Lau ken, chih ahi ding;
Aw Zion, na khutte ze awl sak ken.
Na lak ah
hondam ding mihat; na itna ah a khawl ding,
lasa in na tung ah a nuam ding hi.
Khawmpi kulmut ziak a dahnate,
noute adia puakgik leh gensiatna hite ka lamang ding hi.
Ngai in, huai hun chiang in,
nang hihgimte tengteng ka bawl ding a,
panpih kiphamohnu ka hondam ding a, hawlmang a omnu ka lakhawm ding;
huchi in lei tengteng a a zahlakna uh a na omkhitnate ah, phatna leh
minthanna amau ka pe ding hi.
Huai hun chiang in k’on lanawn
ding a, huai hun chiang in nou k’on kaikhawm ding hi;
na mitmuh ua na saltanna ua kipan a k’on pinawn chiang in,
lei a mi tengteng lak ah min leh
phatna in nou k’on bawl ding,
Kumpipa Darias vaihawm kum nihna, kha gukna, a kha a ni khat ni’n, Judah ukpipa Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel kiang leh, siampu lian, Jehozadak tapa Joshua kiang ah zawlnei Haggai a kipan
Hichibang in sepaihte
Huchi in zawlnei Haggai a kipan in
Hiai inn kigawpsa a om a, nou adia na intung dalneite ua na ten hun uh ahi maw? chi in.
Huaiziak in tuin sepaihte

Tampi na tuh ua, tawmchik na la uh; na ne ua, himahleh na vahkei uh; na dawn ua, himahleh na dawnkham zoukei uh; na kisilh ua, himahleh kuamah na lum kei uh; loh mu in iptaw vangsa a koih ding in loh a mu hi, chi in.
Sepaihte
Tang ah hohtou unla, sing vala unla, inn lam un; huai ah ka kipak ding a, hihthupi in ka om ding,
Tampi na lamen ua, ngai un, tawmchik a honghi hi; inn na hontut chiang un, ka na mutmang hi. Bangding in? Sepaihte
Huaiziak in noute ziak in van in a daitui a khou a, lei in a gah a khou hi.
Huchi in, gam, tang, buh leh uain, sathau ah lei in a hon suahkhiak leh, mi leh ganhon leh, khut nasep tengteng tung ah keuna ka samta hi.
Huchi in Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel leh siampu lian Jehozadak tapa Joshua in mi omsunte tengteng toh
thukhah in
Judah ukpipa Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel kha leh, siampu lian, Jehozadak tapa Joshua kha leh, mi omsunte tengteng kha
A kha a ni sawmnih leh li ni, a kha gukna, kumpipa Darias vaihawm kum nihna in.
Kha sagihna, kha a a ni sawmnih leh khatna in, zawlnei Haggai a kipan
Judah ukpipa Sialtiel tapa Zerubbabel kiang ah, leh siampu lian, Jehozadak tapa Joshua kiang leh, mi omsunte kiang ah tu’n thu gen in, chi in:
Tuma a a thupina a hiai inn mu na lak uah kua na omlai ua? Huan tuin bangchibang in na mu ua? Na mitmuh un bangmahlou bang ahi maw? chi in.
Himahleh, Zerubbabel aw, hattak in om in,
Aigupta gam a kipan na hong paikhiaklai ua na kiang ua thu ka khun a, na lak ua ka kha a om gige dan theigige un; lau kei un.
Nam tengteng ka sing ding a, huchi in nam tengteng thildeihte a hongtung ding, huchi in hiai inn thupina in ka dimsak ding, sepaihte
Dangka kei a ahi, dangkaeng kei a ahi, sepaihte
Hiai inn thupina nanung amasa sang in, a thupizaw ding, sepaihte
Darias kum nihna, a kha kua a ni sawmnih leh lina in, zawlnei Haggai a kipan in
Sepaihte
Min a puansilh puanten ah sa siangthou lou leh a puanten in tanghou hiam, meh hiam, uain hiam, sa hiam sukha leh a hong siangthou diam? chi in. siampute’n, ‘Ii’ chi in a dawng uhi.
Haggai in, “Misi luang ziak a mi nin in hiaite a bangpeuh khoih leh siang in a om diam?” a chi hi. siampute’n a dawng ua, “Sianglou in a om ding” a chi uhi.
Haggai in a dawng a,
Huchi in tuin, k’on ngen ahi, tuni a kipan leh a banban in,
Tehna sawmnih kivum min a hong muhlai, huai nite a om nung siah, sawmkhat kia a om hi; bawm sawmnga a dim khe ding a min uain thau a hon muhlai in, sawmnih kia a om hi.
Na khut nasepte tengteng uah keuna leh kawtluatna leh gial in k’on gawt a; huchipi in leng kei lam na hong ngakei uh,
K’on ngen ahi, tuni a kipan leh a banban in,
Buhpang ah haichi a omlai hia? Ahi, grepgui, theipi kung, theibuhfai, olive sing a hongsuak kei lai a; tuni a kipan in k’on vualzawl ding hi.
Huai kha a ni sawmnih leh li ni’n Haggai kiang ah a nihveina in
Judah ukpipa Zerubbabel kiang ah, Van leh lei ka sing ding a,

Lalgam leh laltutphahte ka lumlet ding a, namte, lalgamte hatna ka suse ding a, kangtalaite leh huai a tuangte ka pai ding; huchi in sakolte leh a tung ua tuangmite a hongkum ding uh, michih a unau namsau in satlum ding a chi, chi in thugen in.
Huai ni chiang in Aw Zerubbabel, ka sikha, Sialtiel tapa, ka honla ding, sepaihte
Darias kum nihna, kha giatna in, Iddo tapa, Berekiah tapa, Zekariah, zawlnei kiang ah
Na pipute uh tung ah
Huaiziak in nang a kiang uah, huchibang in sepaihte
Hichibang in sepaihte
Na Pipute uh tua koi a om ahita ua? Huan a zawlneite uh tangtawn in a hing uhia?
Himahleh ka thute leh ka thusehte, ka sikha zawlneite thupiak a ka piakte, huaite’n na pipute uh a delhphate uh ahi kei maw? Huan a kihei ua, “Sepaihte
Darias kum nihna, Sebat kha, kha sawmlehkhat ni sawmnih leh li ni’n, Iddo tapa, Berekia tapa Zekariah, zawlnei kiang ah,
Zan in mengmuhna in mi khat sakol san tung a tuang, munliap a om muisingte lak ah ading ka mu a, a nunglam ah sakolte a om ua, a san, a sanpuang leh a ngou ahi uhi.
Huchi in, “Aw ka
Huai muising lak a dingpa’n a dawng a, “Hiaite lei a kivialleh a vak dia
Huchi in huai muising lak ah ding
Huan
Huchi in
Huchi in kei hon houpih angel in ka kiang ah, hichibang in sepaihte
Huan bangmah awlmohlou namte tung ah ka lungkim kei ding a: neukha lel a ka lunghihlouh lai in, siatna a thupisak semsem uhi.

Hichibang in sepaihte
Huan ka dak a, ngai in ki li ka mu hi.
Kei hon houpih angel kiang ah, “Hiaite bang hi ding ahia?” ka chi a. Aman, “Hiaite Judah, Israel, leh Jerusalem hawlzak mite ahi uh” chi in a hon dawng hi.
Huchi in

Huchi in ken, “Bang hihdia hiaite hong uh ahi ua?” ka chi hi. Aman thu a gen a, “Kuamah in a lu a dak saklouhna dia, Judah dalhzaksak hiai kite ahi uh: himahleh hiaite, dalhzaksak ding a Judah gam tung a a ki uh sangsak namte dou ding leh a kite uh paikhe ding a hongpai ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huan ka dak a, ngai in mi khat a khut a tehna khau tawi ka mu hi,
Huailai in ken, “Koilam a hoh ding?” ka chi hi. Aman ka kiang ah, “Jerusalem, a vailam bang tan hi, a dunglam bang tan hiam chih thei ding a teh ding” a chi hi.
Huan ngai in, kei hon houpih angel a paikhia a, amah kituahpih ding in angel dang khat a paikhe nawn hi,
A kiang ah, “Tai inla, hiai tangvalpa kiang ah, asung a mi leh gante tam mahmah ziak in, khua kulhbang bei bang in Jerusalem luah in a om ding va chi in, a chi hi.
Amah adia a kimvel a mei kulhbang a hih ding ziak in, leh a lak a thupina ka hih ding ziak in,
Khai, khai, mallam gam a kipan taikek un,
Khai! Zion ah tai in, nang Babulon tanu toh tengkhawm un.
Huchibang in sepaihte
Ngai in, a tung ua ka khut sing ding ka hi a, huchi in a na uh sepsakte ading in gallak ahi ding uh: huan sepaihte
Aw Zion tanu, lasa inla, kipak in; ngai in, kei, na lak ua ka teng ding in ka hongpai hi,
Hua nichiang in
Huan gam siangthou a a tantuam bang in
Dai un, mi tengteng,
Huchi in siampu lian Joshua
Setan kiang ah, “Aw Setan,
Huchi in Joshua puansilh nin a kizem in angel ma ah ading hi.

Angel in a ma a dingte kiang ah thu a genta hi. “Amah a kipan puansilh nin lamang un” chi in. Huan a kiang ah, “Ngai in, na thulimlouhna nang a kipan ka lakheta a, puansilh hoih in ka honzem ding hi” chi in.
Huan, ken “A luzang ah lukhu siang koih uhen” ka chi a. Huchi in lukhu siang a luzang ah a koih ua, puansilh in a tuam ua; huchi in
Huan
“Hichibang in sepaihte
Aw siampu lian Joshua, Tuin za un: nang leh na ma a tu na lawite; amau chiamtehna hoih mite ahi ua: ngai in ka sikha Hiang honpi ding ka hih ziak in.
Ngai in, Joshua ma a ka suang koih, suang khat mai sagih nei tung ah laigelh ka gelh ding, sepaihte
Huai ni chiang in, na grepgui nuai leh theipi sing nuai ah michih in a invengte na chial ding uh,”
Huan kei hon houpih angel a hong nawn a, mi ihmulai phawn bang in a hon phawng hi.
Huan ka kiang ah, “Bang na mu a?” a chi a. Ken, “Ngai in, dangkaeng khawnvak koihna, a dawn a a noubem leh huaite a dawn a khawnvak sagih omte ka mu” chi in ka dawng hi,
Olive sing nih a kiang a om, khat noubem taklam pang ah khat veilam pang ah, ka chi hi.
Huan ka dawng a, kei hon houpih angel kiang ah thu ka gen a. “Hiaite bang ahi ua, ka
Kei hon houpih angel in a hon dawng a, ka kiang ah. “Hiai bang ahi ua na theikei maw?” a chi a. Ken, ‘Ii,’ theilou
Huaitak in aman hon dawng a, ka kiang ah thu a gen a, “Hiai Zerubbabel kiang a
Kua na hia, Aw mual thupi? Zerubbabel ma ah munzang na honghi ding; aman a tung ah, Hehpihna, hehpihna chia kikou in suang poimawh pen a hon lakhe ding hi” a chi hi.
Huailou in
“Zerubbabel khut in hiai inn suangphum a koihkhinta; a khutte mah in a zou ding, huan sepaihte
Thil neu kipatni kua’n a simmawh thei a? Zerubbabel khut ah ulum a mu ding ua kipak ding uhi. Hiai
Huan ken ka dawng a a kiang ah, “Khawnvak koihna taklam pang tung a hiai olive sing nihte leh huai a veilam pang a bang ahi ua?” ka chi hi.
A nihveina ding in ka dong nawn a, a kiang ah, “Dangkaeng sel nihte sik a om, dangkaeng sathau amau a kipan suahzel olive hiang nihte bang ahi ua?” ka chi hi.
Aman hondawng a, hiaite bang hi ding ahi ua chih theilou maw? a chi a. Huan ken, “ ‘Ii,’ theilou, ka
Huaitak in aman, “Hiaite lei pumpi
Huan ka dak nawn a, ngai in, laibuzial leng ka mu hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, ‘bang na mu a?’ honchi hi. Ken, “Laibuzial leng ka mu; huai dunglam tong sawmnih ahi a, a vailam tong sawm” ka chi hi.

Aman ka kiang ah, “Hiai gam pumpi tung a paikhia hamsia ahi, huai dungzui in kuapeuh guta tu a kipan satkhiak in a om ding ua; huai dungzui in kuapeuh dikloupi a kichiamte tu a kipan satkhiak in a om ding uhi.
Ka paikhesak ding, sepaihte
Huchi in kei hon houpih angel a paikhia a, ka kiang ah, “Tuin dak inla, bang ahi a paikhia chih en in” a chi hi.
Ken, “Bang ahia?” ka chi hi. Aman, “Hiai a paikhia ‘Ephah’ ahi, a chi a, huailou in, hiai “Gamsung tengteng a mite khelhna ahi” a chi hi.
Ngai in, “Ngensin dopkang in a om a; Ephah sung a tu hiai numei ahi” a chilai hi.
Huan aman, “Hiai gitlouhna ahi” a chi a; Ephah sung ah a paisuka; huai a gongtung ah ngengik a ngasuk hi.
Huchi in ka dak a, ngai in, numei nih a khate uah huih a om a hong paikhia ua, tuivapi bang in kha a nei uhi; huchi in huai Ephah lei leh van kikal ah a domtou uhi.
Kei hon houpih angel kiang ah, “Hiaite’n Ephah koilam a paw ding uh ahia?” ka chi hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Sinar gam a a inn ding lam ding in, a bawlzoh chiang un amah muntak ah koih in a om ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in ka dak nawn a, ngai in, mual nih kikal a kipan in kangtalai li a hong paikhia ua, huai mualte dal mual ahi uhi.
Kangtalai khat in sakol san a nei ua kangtalai nihna in sakol vom;
Kangtalai thumna in sakol ngou; kangtalai lina in sakol puang hat a nei uhi.
Huan kei hon houpih angel ka dong a a kiang ah, “Hiaite bang ahi ua, ka
Angel in a hondawng a, ka kiang ah, “Hiaite van huih lite, lei tengteng
Sakol vomte omna kangtalai mallam gam ah a paikhia ua; amau zui in angoute tumlam ah a pawtkhia ua; a puangte simlam zuan in a pawtkhia uhi.”
Huan sakolte a paikhia ua, lei kantan a a vialvak theihna ding uh a ngaklah uhi. Aman, “Hiai a kipan pai unla, lei kantan in vialvak un” a chi a, huchi in lei kantan in a vialvak uhi.
Huchi in honsam a, ka kiang ah thu a gen hi, “Ngai in, mallam gam zuan a paite’n mallam gam ah ka kha a khawlsakta uh” a chi hi.
Huan
Saltangte a kipan thilpiak, Heldai, Tobijah, leh Jedai a kipan la in; a ni mah in nang hong inla, Zephaniah tapa Josiah inn ah lut in, Babulon a kipan hongpai ahi na uhiam; chi in.
Ahi, amau a kipan dangka leh dangkaeng la inla, kumpilukhute bawl in, Jehozadak tapa Joshua, siampu lian luzang ah khusak in.
Huan a kiang ah thugen inla, huchibang in sepaihte
Aman
Kumpilukhute Helem, Tobijah, Jedai leh Zephaniah tapa Josiah kiang ah,
Huan gamlapi a omte a hongpai ding ua
Kumpipa Darias kum lina in hichi a honghi a, Kisleu kha, kha kua na ni li ni’n, Zekariah kiang ah
Huan amau Bethel a omte’n Serezer leh Regemmelek; leh a mite uh
Sepaihte
Huailai in sepaihte
Gam a mite tengteng kiang leh, siampute kiang ah thugen in. Hiai kum sawmsagih sung, a kha ngana leh a kha sagihna a an na ngawl chiang un, kei ding in, keimah ding in na ngawlta uhia?
Na nek chiang un, na dawn chiang un, noumau amah ding in na ne un, na dawn uh ahi kei maw?
Jerusalem a kiluah lai leh a hauhsak lai a, a kimvel a khopite leh a Sim leh gamniam gam a kiluah lai a zawlnei masate zang a
Huan
Hichibang in sepaihte
Meithai nuaisiah kei un, pabeite, mikhual, gentheite leng, na lak ua kuamah in a lungtangin a unau siatna ding gilou ngaihtuah kei hen, chi in, a chi hi.
Himahleh ngaihkhiak a utkei ua, paupengtak in a ki heimang ua, a zaklouhna ding un a bil uh a hum uhi.
Ahi, suangtak bang in a lungtang uh a bawl ua, huchi kei leh dan a za kha ding ua, zawlnei masate khut a a Kha a sepaihte
Huan hichi a honghi a, Ka kikou lai a a ngaihkhiak louh ziak un a kikou chiang un leng ka ngai khesam kei ding, sepaihte

Himahleh a theihlouh uh namte lam ah pingpei in amaute ka delhsak ding. Huchi in gam amau nung in a segawp ding a, kuamah in a kantan un a lehkik kei ding uh; gam nuam a sukgawp ziak un, a chi chi in.

Hichi in sepaihte
Khopi kongzingte a kimawl in numei leh pasal naupangte in a dim ding hi.
Hichibang in sepaihte
Hichibang in sepaihte
Amau k’on pikhawm ding a, Jerusalem lai ah a teng ding ua; ka mite ahi ding ua, thutak leh diktatna ah, a Pathian uh ka hi ding hi.
Hichibang in sepaihte

Huai nite malam a mihing adia kilohna a omlouh a, a ganta dia leng kilohna a om samlouh ziak in; melma ziak in a pawtkhia hiam honglut hiam ading in leng muanna himhim a omsak kei a, mi tengteng michih a invengte dou in ka koih hi.
Himahleh tuin zaw hiai mite lak a omlaite tung ah tuma lam in nite a bang in ka omkei ding, sepaihte

Huan haichi pawi a om ding ahi ngal a; grepgui in a gah a suang ding a, leitung in a pung a omsak ding a, vante’n a daitui uh a pe ding uh; huchi in hiai mite lak a omlaite hiai thil tengteng ka luahsak ding hi.

Huan hichi a hi ding a, namte lak a hamsia na hihtak bang un, Aw Judah inkawte leh Israel inkawte, huchibang mah in nou k’on hondam ding a; vualzawlna na hi ding uh; lau kei un, himahleh na khutte uh hatsak un.
Hichibang in sepaihte
Huchi in Jerusalem tung leh Judah inkawte tung ah hoih hih ding tulai nite in ka tum nawnta hi; lau kei un.
Na hih ding uh thil hiaite ahi: Michih in a invengte toh thutak kihilh un; na kongpite uah thutak leh lemna vaihawmna hih un;
Huan na lak ua kuamah in a invengte siatna ding na lungtang uah gilou ngaihtuah kei un; thuchiam diklou deihkei un; hiaite tengteng ka thil huatlam ahi uh,
Huan sepaihte
Hichibang in sepaihte
Huchi in sepaihte
Huan “Khopi khat a te khopi dang a tengte kiang ah a pai ding ua,
Ahi, mi tampite leh nam hatte Jerusalem a
Huchibang in sepaihte
Hadrad gam dou in
Huan pil mahle uh a gamgit pih Hamath, Tura leh Sidon tung a tung ding hi,
Tura kulh muanhuaitak in a kilamkhia in, dangka leivui bang in vum venvon in, kongzingte buannawi bang in dangkaeng hoih in dim mah leh,
Ngai in,

Askelon in huai a mu ding a, a lau ding; Gaza in leng a mu dia, nakpi a suknat in a om ding; Ekron, a lametna zahlakna ahi ding a; Gaza a kipan kumpipa a mangthang ding a, Askelon luah in a omkei ding hi.
Huchi in Ashdod ah chi siangloute a teng ding ua, “Philistiate kisaktheihna ka satkhe ding hi.
Huan a kam a kipan a sisan ka lamang ding a, a hate kikal a kipan in a kihhuainate; huchi in amah leng i Pathian ading in omsun ahi ding hi; Jebusmi bang in Judah leh Ekron ah hausa ahi ding hi.

Huan sepaihpawlte ziak in ka inn a kimvel in ka um ding, huchi a kuamah a paisuak uhiam a kiknawn louhna ding un; huchi in nuaisiahmi in a paltan nawnta kei ding; tuin ka mit mahmah in ka muta hi” a chi hi.
Aw Zion tanu,
nakpi mahmah in kipak in;
Aw Jerusalem tanu,
kikou in; ngai in, na kumpipa kiniamkhiak in, sabiltungtung,
sabiltung nou tuan ngei nailouhna tung a tuang in na kiang ah a honghi:
Amah a diktat a, hotdamna a nei.
Ephraim a kipan kangtalai leh Jerusalem a kipan sakol ka satkhe ding a,
kidouna thalpeu satkhiak in a om ding a;
namte kiang ah lemna thu a gen ding; huchi in a gam
tuipi a kipan tuipi tan, luipi a kipan lei tawpnate tan ahi ding hi.
Nang tungthu ah leng,
na thukhun sisan ziak in tui omlouhna kawkhuk a kipan in na suangkulhtangte ka sawlkheta hi.
Lametna suangkulh a tangte,
kulh muanhuai lam ah kihei un;
tuni mahmah in na tung ah a zahnih in k’on dinkik ding chih ka phuang hi.
Judah thalpeu bang in ka lai kulta a, Ephraim thal a bawl in thalpeu ah ka bulhta hi;
Aw Zion, na tapate dou ding in na tapate ka tokthou ding,
Aw Grik, huchi in mi hat namsau bang in,
nang k’on bawl ding hi.
Huchi in a tung ah
kimu ding a, khophia bang
in a thal a paikhe ding;
a mut dia, simlam
pingpei toh a paikhe ding hi.
Sepaihte
suang sailimgtangte a sikden ding ua;
a negai ding ua, uain bang in
a sisan uh a dawn ding ua;
noubem te bang in a dim ding ua, maitam ningte bang in a kawt ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in
Pathian un amau belamhon bang in a hondam ding a;
lallukhu a suangmantamte bang in a gam ah a tang ding uhi.
Ahi, a hoihna a lian mahmah a,
a kilawmna a thupi mahmah a;
buh leh bal in tangvalte a tai ding a, uain thak in nungakte a tai ding uhi.
Vuah nanung hun in

Milimte’n bangmahlou thu a gen un, aisante’n zuau a mu uhi; mang zuauthei a gen ua, a thawn in a lungmuan uh; huaiziak in belamte bang in amau lampi ah a pai ua, belamchingmi a omlouh ziak in hihgim in a om uhi.
“Belamchingmite tung ah ka hehna a puakzak a, a heutute uh ka gawt ding” sepaihte
Amau a kipan in a ning a suang, amau a kipan puanin khetphim amau a kipan kidouna thalpeu, amau a kipan vaihawmpa a hong paikhe ding hi.
Kidouna a kongzing a buannawi a a melmate uh childen in, mihatte bang in a om ding ua; a kiang ua
“Judah inkawte ka hatsak ding a,
Joseph inkawte ka hondam ding,
amaute k’on pinawn ding a,
amau tung ah chitna ka nei hi;
huchi in ka paihkhiak hetlouh bang a honghi ding uh;
amau ka dawng ding hi.
Ephraim mite mihatpa in a om ding ua, uain ziak in
a lungtang uh a kipak ding a;
ahi, a tate un huai a mu ding ua,
a kipak ding uh;
Amau ka khutvan ding a,
amau ka kaikhawm ding;
amau ka tanta hi; A punkhitsa bang un a pung ding uhi.
Namte lak ah hawldalh mah leng;
gam gamlate ah kei hon theigige ding uh;
huchi in a tate uh toh ka kiang ah hongkik nawn ding uhi.
Aigupta gam apan ka pi nawn
ding a, Assuria a kipan ka pi kiknawn ding hi;
Gilead leh Lebanon gam ah amau ka pilut ding;
amau ading a mun kidaih louh dong in
Gimthuakna tuipi a palkai ding
ua, tuipi a tui kihawtte khet in a om ding uhi, huchi in
Nile luipi thukna tengteng a kangvek ding;
Assuria kisaktheihna koihniam in a om dia,
Aigupta kumpi chiang a paimang vengveng ding hi.”
Huan
a min in a vaktou un a vaksuk ding uh”
Aw Lebanon, mei in na
sidar singte a kattum theihna ding in na kongkhakte hong in.
Aw meilah sing, mau vongvong
in, Sidar sing a pukta ngal a,
a hoihtatate hihsiat a a om ziak un;
Aw nou Bashan tosaw singte chiau vongvong un,
gammangpi vatpaih ahita hi.
Ngai un belamchingmite a mau vongvong ding ua,
na thupina uh loh a a om ziak in,
Ngai un humpinelkai a humham a!
Jordan gammang a thengta hi!
Hichibang in
Amau leite’n a that ua, gawt in a omkei ua; amau zuakte’n Toupa phat in om hen! ka hauta uh! Amau chingte’n a lainat kei uhi” a chi uhi.
“Gam a tengte ka hehpih nawn kei ding”
Huchi in belamte a sumdawngte adia thahdia om belamte chingpa ka hong hita hi. Huchi in chiang nih ka kilak a; khat pen ‘Deihsakna’ ka chi a, a dangpen ‘Kizopna’ ka chi; huchi in belamte ka vak hi.
Huan kha khat in belamchingmi thum ka satkhia hi. Himahleh ka kha in amau a chimtak a, amau kha in leng kei a hon chimtak uhi.
Huaitak in ken, “K’on vak kei ding, a sisi, si heh, satkhiak a om ding satkhiak in om heh; nutsiatte khat leh khat sa kine tuah uhen” ka chita hi.
Huan ‘Deihsakna’ chiang ka la a, ka sattan a, mite tengteng toh ka thukhun ka bawl ka suksiat theihna ding in.
Huchi in huai ni’n a kitanta huchi in pawlte lak ah a genthei kei hon limsakte’n
Ken a kiang uah. “Hoih a na ngaihtuah ua leh, ka lohtak honpia, un ahihkeileh, tang un” ka chi hi. Huchi in ka lohtak ding in ‘dangka sekel sawmthum’ a buk uhi.
Huan
Huchi in ka chiang dangpen ‘Kizopna’ ka tumtan a, Judah leh Israel kikal a ki unauna ka suksiat theihna ding in.
Huan

Ngai in, gamsung a belamchingmi ka bawlkhe ding hi. Aman satkhiak a om dingte a vehkei dia, delhzak a om dingte leng a zong sam kei dia, satkeh a omte leng a hihdam sam kei ding, a hoih leng a vaksam kei dia, himahleh a thau sa a ne ding a a chinte nangawn uh a tolsak ding hi.
Belamhonte nusia belamchingmi phattuamna bei tung a gik hi; a ban tung leh a mit taklam tung namsau in dou ding a; a ban a keugawp kiuhkeuh ding a, a mit taklam a mial bikbek ding!” a chi hi.
Judah tungtang a
“Ngai in, khaw kimvel a mite ading in Jerusalem hoina nou in ka bawl ding a, Judah tung ah leng, Jerusalem lakna ah ahi ding hi.

Huan huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding a, mi tengteng ading in Jerusalem suang chimtakhuai in ka bawl ding a, amah ziak a tunggik kisate nakpi a liamsak in a om ding ua, amah dou ding in lei a namte tengteng a kikhawm khawm ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in lamdangsakna toh sakol chih ka khen ding a, hehna toh a tungtuangmi; huan Judah inkawte tung ah ka mit a hak ding a mittawtna in mite sakol chih ka gawt ding hi.
Judah hausate’n a lungtang un, Jerusalem a tengte’n sepaihte

“Huai ni chiang in Judah hausate sing lak a mei am bang in ka bawl dia, buhphal lak a meisel bang in; a kimvel a mite tengteng a negai ding uh. Khut taklam pang leh veilam pang a; Jerusalem amah mun ah a hong tengnawn ding uhi, Jerusalem mahmah ah.
Huai ni chiang in
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding a, Jerusalem dou ding a hong kuan namte tengteng hihse ding in ka kuankhe ding hi.

Huan David inkawte tung leh Jerusalem a tengte tung ah hehpihna leh thumna kha ka sungbaw ding a; a sutpa uh lam a en ding uhi: amah a sun ding ua, min a tapa neihsun a sun bang in, amah, min a tamasa khasetak a a kah bang in, a kah ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in Jerusalem ah sunna thupi a om ding, Megiddon guam a Hadadrimmon sunna bang in.
Huan gam pumpin a sun dia; inkuan chih in a tuam in; David nam inkawte a tuam in, a zite un a tuam in; Nathan nam inkawte a tuam in, a zite un a tuam in
Levi nam inkawte a tuam in, a zite un a tuam in, Shimei inkawte a tuam in, a zite un a tuam in;
inkuan omlai teng a inkuan chih a tuam in, a zite un a tuam in.
Huai ni chiang in khelhna leh nitna siangsak ding in, David inkawte leh Jerusalem a tengte ading in tuikhuk kihong a hongom ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding a, gam a kipan in milimte minte ka satkhe ding a, theihgige in a omta kei ding uhi; huan zawlneite leh kha nin gam a kipan in ka pai khesak ding, sepaihte
Hichi ahi ding a, zawlnei kuapeuh a hong kilat lai leh, amah suangtu a nu leh pa’n a kiang ah “Na hing kei ding:
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi ding a, zawlneite thu a genkholhna uah, a mengmuh uah a zahlak chiat ding ua; khem ding in samul phan puanak leng a silh sam kei ding uhi.
“Zawlnei ka hi kei, leiletmi ka hi; ka tuailai a kipan a sikha a bawl ka hih khittak ziak in” a chi zaw ding uhi.
Mi’n a kiang ah, na bante kikal a liamnate bang ahia? a chi ding uhi. Huchi in aman, “Huaite ka lawmte inn sung a ka liamna ahi uh” chi in a dawng ding uhi.
“Aw namsau, ka belamchingmi dou ding leh, mi ka lawm dou ding in halh in, sepaihte
Huan hichi a honghi ding a, gam tengteng ah, huai a seh nih satkhiak in a om dia a si ding uhi; himahleh huai a a thumna nutsiat in a om ding,

Huan a seh thumna mei a paisuak in ka hontawi dia, dangka hihsiangthou bang in ka hihsiangthou ding a, dangka ettel bang in ka entel ding hi; ka min a lou ding ua, amau ka dawng ding; ka mite ahi, ka chi dia, amau,
Ngai in,

Jerusalem dou a galdou ding in nam tengteng ka kaikhawm ding a; khopi lak in a om dia, innte loh in leh numeite sualluih in a om ding uhi; khopi kimkhat sal ah a paikhe ding a, mi omlaite khopi a kipan a satkhiak in a omkei ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in

Huai ni chiang in Olive mual tung ah ading dia, suahlam pang a Jerusalem mazawn a om ah, huchi in Olive mual bel suahlam sang tumlam sang huai ah a kitam ding hi, huchi in guam thupi mahmah a omta ding; mual kimkhat mallam ah a kimkhat simlam ah a kisuan ding hi. Huchi in ka mualte guam lam ah na taikek ding uhi.
Mualte guam Azal tung ding ahi ngal a; ahi, Judah kumpipa Uzzia damlai a zinling ma a kipan na taikek uh bang in; huchi in
Huan huai ni chiang in hichi ahi dia, khovot a omkei dia, vuk a omsam kei ding hi.
Himahleh
Huan huai ni chiang in hichi ahi dia, Jerusalem a kipan in tui hingte a luangkhe dia; a lak ua kimkhat suahlam tuipi ah, a lak ua kimkhat tumlam tuipi ah; nipi leh phalbi in a om den ding hi.
Huchi in leitung tengteng ah

Jerusalem sim Geba a kipan Rimmon tan, gam tengteng phaizang a suak ding a; Jerusalem bel Benjamin kongpi a kipan kongpi khatna chiang, a ning a kongpi chiang, Hananel insang a kipan kumpipa uain sukna pha a kipan khentuam in a om ding hi.
Huai ah mite a teng ding ua, hamsia a om nawn kei dia; himahleh Jerusalem ah muangtak in a teng ding uhi.
Huan Jerusalem kidoupih mite tengteng
Huai ni chiang in hichi ahi dia,
Judah in leng Jerusalem ah a dou dia; khokim khovel a namte tengteng hauhsakna dangkaeng, dangka, puansilh a tam a tam in a lakhawm ding hi.
Huchibang in hiai gawtna hipi gamsa tengteng leh sakol, sakolneu, sangawngsau leh sabiltungte puaninte ah hiai gawtna a om ding hi.
Huan hichi ahi ding a, Jerusalem dou dia hong kuan nam tengteng lak a nutsiat a om michih a kum sik in Kumpipa, sepaihte
Hichi ahi dia, lei a inkaw tengteng, Jerusalem a Kumpipa, sepaihte
Aigupta inkuan a hohtouh louh ua, a hongpai kei uleh, amau tung ah leng vuah a zukei ding; biakbukte Ankuangluina nei dia hohtou lou namte gawtna ding hipi a omzaw ding hi.
Hiai Aigupta gawtna bel biakbukte Ankuangluina nei dia hoh lou nam tengteng gawtna ahi ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in sakol longte ah,
Ahi, Jerusalem leh Judah a bel tengteng sepaihte
Israel kiang a
“Ka hon itta,”
Himahleh Esau ka hua a, a tangsangte ka hihgawp a, a goutan gamdai sehalte kiang ah ka peta hi,
Edom in, “Suk zawngkhal in i om ua, himahleh i kiknawn ding ua mun segawpsate i lam ding uh” chi mahleh, hichibang in sepaihte
Huchi in na mitte un a mu dia, “Israel gamgi khen ah
“Tapa in a pa a zahtak a, sikha in a pu; huchi a pa ka hihleh, kei zahtakna koi a om ahia?” Huchi a pu ka hihleh, kei kihtakna kaw om ahia? Sepaihte
Ka maitam tung ah tanghou sesa na lan ua, nou koilai ah ahia k’on hihnit uh? na chi uh.

Kithoihna ding a mittaw na lat un, gilou ahi kei maw? Khebai leh damlou na lat un, gilou ahi kei maw? Tuin na ukpipa kiang ah tawi in na tung ah a lungdam diam? Ahihkeileh nou hon deihsak diam?” sepaihte
Huchi in tuin k’on ngen hi, i tung a a chitna na theihna ding in Pathian deihsakna ngen un. Hiai na khut ua kipan thilpiak toh nou hon deihsak diam? sepaihte
A thawn a ka maitam tung a mei na tohlouhna ding un, na lak ua mi khat kongkhakte khak ding om leh aw; Sepaihte
Ni suahna a kipan ni tumna lam pha hial in leng Jentelte lak ah ka min a thupi hi, munchih ah ka min adin gimlim a kilan a, thillat siangthou; Jentelte lak a ka min a let ziak in, sepaihte
Himahleh nou na hihnin ua,
‘Ngai un, a chimtakhuai na e; na chilai ua, huan na hahchhiau khum uh, sepaihte
Himahleh a ganhon lak a a pa nei a, thuchiam a
Tuin, nou siampute aw, “Hiai thupiak nou ading ahi.
Ka min pahtawi ding a, na ngaihkhiak kei ua, na lungtang ua na koih kei uleh, huchi in na tung uah hamsia ka tungsak ding a, na vualzawlnate uh ka hamsiat khum ding, sepaihte
Ngai un, nou ziak in na chi tuh ka sal ding a, na mai uah ek ka theh thang ding a, na kithoihna ek ngei uh; huchi in huai toh lakmang in na om ding uhi.
Hiai thupiak, Levi toh ka thukhun a om theihna ding in, na kiang uah ka honsawlta chih na thei ding uh, sepaihte
“Hinna leh lungmuanna ka thukhun amah toh a om hi, a kihtak theihna ding in a kiang ah a maute ka peta a, kei a hon kihta a, ka min a zahtak mahmah hi.
Thudik a kam sung ah a om a, diktatlouhna a muk ah a kimu kei hi; lungmuanna leh tanna ah ka thu a zui a, gitlouhna a kipan in mi tampi a hei mangsak hi.
Siampu mukte’n theihna a kem un, a kam uah danthu a zong ding uh ahi him hi; amah lah sepaihte
“Himahleh lampi a kipan a pialsak in na om ua; tampi dan ah na kisuipuk sak uhi; Levi thukhun na suseta uhi.
Huaiziak in ka lampite na zuihlouh dungzui un, dan a mite deihsak tuam na neihzawk ziak un, ken leng mipite tengteng ma ah zahpihhuai leh dai in k’on bawlta hi, sepaihte
I vek un pa khat i neikei ua hia? Pathian khat in honsiam ka hia? Bangdia lepchiah tak a michih in i pipute uh thukhun hihnin a unau siatna ding a hih i hi ua?
Judah in lepchiahtak in a hihta a, Israel ah leh Jerusalem ah kihhuai hih in a om hi, Judah in Pathian Mun Siangthou it a hihninta a, theihlouh pathian tanu a kitenpihta hi,
hiai thilhihpa, sinsakpa leh sinsak a ompa, Jakob puanin a kipan leh sepaihte
Huan hiai na hih nawn uh;
Hinapi in lah, bangding in? a chi uhi. Na tuailai zi, lepchiahtak a na bawl, na kithuahpihnu, na thukhun zi hinapi in, amah leh nang kikal ah

Pathian in nihte sa khat in honbawl kei maw? Khat in na kha hon bawlsak in, a hingsak kei maw? Bang a chia khat? Pathian limsak chi a zong ahi. Huaiziak in michih in a tuailai zi lepchiahtak a hihlou ding in na kha thu uah pilvang un.
Israel Pathian in a chi, koihmangna ka hua a, hiamgamna a puansilh khuh mipa ka mudah hi, sepaihte
Na thu un
“Ngai in, ka sawltak ka sawl a, aman ka ma ah lampi a bawlkhol ding a
Himahleh a hong paina ni kuan a thuakzou thei dia? A honglat chiang in kua a dingzou dia? Amah hihsiangthou mei leh sahbon bang ahi ngal a.
Huchi in dangka hih siangthoumi leh siangsakmi bang in a tu ding a Levi tapate a hihsiang ding hi, dangkaeng leh dangka bang in amau a khuahsiang ding a, huchi in diktatna in
Huaichiang in Judah leh Jerusalem thillatte nidanglai bang leh tang a kumte bang in

“Huan vaihawmna ah aisanmite kalh in, angkawmte kalh in, zuau a kichiamte kalh in theihpihpa kin ka hi ding a, loh thu a migoih, meithai, nu leh pa bei, nuaisiah, a thuneihna a kipan mikhual kaiheipa, kei hon kihtaloute kalh in, na kiang uah ka hongding sepaihte
“Kei
Na pipute uh damlai a kipan ka thusehte na kilehheisan ua, na zuikei uhi. Ka kiang ah hongkik unla, na kiang uah ka hongkik ding, sepaihte
Min Pathian a lok diam? Hinapi in noute’n n’on lok uhi. Himahleh nou koi ah k’on lok ua eita? na chi uhi. Sawm a khatte ah leh thillat ah.
Hiai nam pumpi in, kei n’on loh ziak un hamsiatna a hamsiat na hi uhi.
Ka inn sung a an a hongom theihna ding in koihkhomna inn ah sawm a khat avek in hon lalut unla, huai in kei hon entel un, sepaihte
Huan negaimi pen nou ziak in ka sal ding a, na leigahte uh a suse kei ding hi; na grepgui u leng lou ah a hun tunma in a gah a kesak kei ding hi, sepaihte
Huchi in nam tengteng in nang nuamsa a honchi ding ua; gam kipahhuai na hih ding ziak un, sepaihte
“Kei dem a na thute uh a khauh hi”
“Pathian nasep a thawn ahi”; a thupiak i zuih ua, sunna puan silh a sepaihte
Tuin kisatheite nuamsa chi in, a gitlouhna nasemte tunding in a om uh; ahi; Pathian khemte hotkhiak in a om uh” i chi uhi.
“Huan amau kei a a hi ding ua, gou lamdangtak ka bawl ni chiang in” sepaihte
Huai hun chiang in na hong kihei ding ua, diktatte leh giloute, Pathian nasem leh amah semloute kal na khenchian thei ding uhi.

“Ngai in, a ni a hongtun ziak in, meipi bang in a kuang a; huchi in kisatheite tengteng, gilou nasemte tengteng, buhpawl hi ding uh; huan a hongtung huai ni’n amaute zung leh hiang nuse lou hial in a kang mang ding uh” sepaihte
Himahleh nou ka min kihtate kiang ah diktatna ni, a khate a hihdamna toh a hongsuak ding; huchi in na pawtkhe ding ua, huangsung bawngnoute bang in na diang velhvelh ding uhi.
Huan giloute na sikden ding ua; ka gamtat nichiang in na khepek nuai uah meivu ahi ding uh a hih ziak in, sepaihte
“Horeb a Israel tengteng ading a ka sikha Mosi dan, amah thupiak, thusehte leh vaihawmte ngei, theigige un.
“Ngai un,
Pate lungtang tate lam ah, tate lungtang a pate uh lam ah a ngasak ding a; huchilou in zaw hamsia in lei ka gawt kha ding hi.”
David tapa, Abraham tapa, Jesu Khrist khangthu bu:
Abraham in Isak a suang; Isak in Jakob a suang; Jakob in Judas leh a unaute a suang hi;
Judas in Tamar apan Perez leh Zerah a suang; Perez in Erom a suang; Erom in Aram a suang hi,
Aram in Aminadab a suang, Aminadab in Nashon a suang hi; Nashon in Salmon a suang;
Salmon in Rahab apan Boaz a suang; Boaz in Ruth apan Obed a suang; Obed in Jesse a suang hi;
Jesse in kumpipa David a suang; kumpipa David in Uria zi apan Solomon a suang;
Solomon in Rehoboam a suang, Rehoboam in Abijah a suang, Abijah in Asa a suang hi;
Asa in Jehosaphat a suang, Jehosaphat in Jeram a suang, Jeram in Uzzia a suang;
Uzzia in Jotham a suang; Jotham in Ahaz a suang; Ahaz in Hezekiah a suang hi;
Hezekiah in Manasseh a suang; Manasseh in Ammon a suang; Ammon in Josiah a suang;
Babulon sal a a pilai un Josiah in Jekoniah leh a unaute a suang hi.
Huan, Babulon sal a a pinung un Jekoniah in Salathiel a suang; Salathiel in Zerubbabel a suang hi;
Zerubbabel in Abiud a suang; Abiud in Eliakim a suang hi;
Eliakim in Azer a suang; Azer in Zadok a suang, Zadok in Akim a suang, Akim in Eluid a suang hi;
Eliud in Eleazar a suang, Eleazar in Mathan a suang, Mathan in Jakob a suang hi;
Jakob in Joseph, Mari pasal a suang; huai Mari lak ah, Jesu Khrist a hong piangta hi.
Huchi in suan tengteng Abraham apat David chiang suan sawmlehli ahi, David apat Babulon a sal a a pitan un, suan sawmlehli ahi, Babulon a sal a a pi ua pat Khrist tan suan sawmlehli ahi.
Jesu Khrist hong piandan hichibang ahi; A nu Mari leh Joseph kikham lai, a omkhawm ma un, Kha Siangthou in a gaisak chih a theita uhi.
Huchi in, a pasal Joseph, mi diktak ahi a, amah daisak a utkei a, a guk in tawpsan a tum hi.
Himahleh, huai thute a ngaihtuahlai in, ngai in, a mang in Toupa angel a kiang ah a hong kilak a, “Joseph, nang David tapa, na zi Mari neih lau ken, a naupai Kha Siangthou a ahi,
Tapa a nei dia, a min ding in Jesu na sa ding, aman a mite a khelhna ua kipan a hotdam ding ziak in” a chi hi.
Toupa’n zawlnei kam a:
“Ngai in, nungak siangthou a gai dia, tapa a nei dia,
a min Immanuel a sa ding uh” chi a a gen a hongtun theihna ding in
huai tengteng a hongom hi. Huai tuh, “I kiang uah, Pathian a om” chihna ahi.
Huchi in, Joseph ihmu a thoukhia a, Toupa Angel in a kiang a thu a piak bang in a hih a, a zi a neita hi.
