Himahleh, tapa a neih masiah a kithuahpih kei; huan a min Jesu a sata hi.
Huan kumpipa Herod vaihawm lai a Judia gam a, Bethlehem khua a Jesu a hong pianlai in, ngai in, suahlam a kipan mipilte Jerusalem khua ah a hongpai uhi.
“Koi ah ahia Judate Kumpipa a hong pian? Suahlam ah a Aksi ka mu ua, amah be dia hongpai ka hi uh” a chi uhi.
Kumpipa Herod in huai a zakphet in a lungzing a, Jerusalem tengteng leng a lung uh a zing sam uhi.
Huchi in, siampu liante leh mite Laigelhmi tengteng a samkhawm a, Khrist pianna ding thu a dongta hi.
Huan, amau a kiang ah “Judia gam a Bethlehem khua ah; zawlnei in hichi in a gelh a kei hiam:
‘Nang, Judia gam a Bethlehem aw, Judia khopite lak ah na neupen kei hial,
na sung a kipan ukpa hongsuak ding ahi ngal a, ka mi Israelte vengpa ding in’ ” chih, a chi uhi.
Huai nung in Herod in a guk in mipilte a sam a, ngentel tak in Aksi kilat lai a dongkheta hi.
Huan amau Bethlehem khua ah a paisak a, “Paita unla, naungek thu ngenteltak in dongkhia un, ken leng amah ka hong biak theihsamna ding in, na muhtak un, honghilh un,” a chi hi.
Huan kumpipa thu a zak un; a paita ua; ngai in suahlam a Aksi a muh uh naungek omna tung zawn a tun a a khawl masiah a ma uah a pai zel hi.
Aksi a muh un, a kipak law mahmah uhi.
Inn sung ah a valut ua, a nu Mari kiang a naungek om a muh un, a bokkhup ua, a bia uhi; a goubawm uh a hong ua, a kiang ah kipahna dangkaeng, begaw leh murra a lan uhi.
Herod kiang a kik nawnlou ding in a mang ua vauhilh a a om ziak un, amau kholam ah lamtuam ah a paita uhi.

Huan a painung un, ngai in, Toupa angel Joseph kiang ah a mang in a kilak a, “Thou inla; naungek leh a nu pi inla, Aigupta gam ah taipih in, k’on hilh nawn masiah huai ah om gige in; Herod in naungek hihsiat dia zong ding a hih ziak in” a chi hi.
Huchi in, a thou a, a zanzan in naungek leh a nu a pi a, Aigupta gam ah a paita hi.
Herod sih mateng huai ah a om gige hi; Toupa’n zawlnei kam a, “Ka tapa Aigupta gam a pan ka samkhia” chi a a gen a hongtun theihna ding in.

Huchih lai in Herod in mipilte khem a hih a kitheihtak in a heh mahmah a, mi a sawl a, a hun laitak thu ngenteltak a mipilte a dotkhiak bang in, Bethlehem khua leh a kim tengteng a pasal naupang kum nih chiang nuai lam avek un a thatta hi.
Huchihlai in zawlnei Jeremiah in:
“Ramah khua ah husa a za uh,
sunna, kah thawm, misi ngai a mau vengvungte,
Rakil in a tate a kah a, a om nawnlouh ziak un a khamuan theih kei” chi a a na gen a hongtungta hi.
Himahleh Herod a sih nung in, Ngai in, Aigupta gam a Joseph kiang ah Toupa Angel a mang in a kilak hi.
“Thou inla, naungek leh a nu pi inla, Israel gam ah pai in; naungek thahtumte a sihtak ziak un” a chi hi.
Huchi in a thou a, naungek leh a nu a pi a, Israel gam ah a paita uhi.
Himahleh Arkelaus, a pa Herod sik in Judia gam ah vai a hawm chih a zak in, huailam a pai a lau a; a mang a vauhilh a a om ziak in Galili gam ah a paita hi;
Nazaret kichi khua khat ah a tengta hi. “Amah zaw Nazaret mi a chi ding uh” chi a zawlneite na gen a hongtun theihna ding in.
Huchihlai in Baptispa Johan in,
“Kisik un! van gam a naita” chi in, Judia gamdai ah thugen in a hongpai hi.
Amah ahi, zawlnei Isai in:
“Gamdai a mi kikou aw in,
Toupa lamlian sial unla
a lampite tangsak un,
a chi” chi a a na genpen ahi.
Johan in sangawngsau mul puan a silh a, savun kawnggak a gak a, a an khaukhup leh khuaizu ahi.
Huchihlai in Jerusalem khua, Judia gam tengteng, Jordan luidung kim tengteng a hong paikhawm uhi.
A khelhna uh thupha tawi in a kiang honzuan ua, Jordan lui ah a Baptisma a tang uhi.
Himahleh, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite tampi a ma a baptisma tang ding a hongpai a muh in, a kiang uah, “Gulsuante! thangpaihna hongtung ding taisan ding in kuan hon thuhilh ahia?
Huchi in kisikna toh kilawm gah hon suangkhia un;’
Abraham ka pu uh ahi, chi in, kingaihtuah kei un, Pathian in hiai suangte Abraham suante in a dingsak thei hi k’on chi ahi.
Tua kipan in heipi singbul teng ah a koihta uh; huchi in, singchih gah hoih a gahlou peuhpeuh a phuk ua, mei ah a pailut zel uhi.

“Ken zaw kisikna ding in tui in k’on baptist ngei a, himahleh, amah ka nung a hongpai keimah sang in a thupizaw a, a khedap tawitak leng ka hi kei, Aman zaw Kha Siangthou leh mei in noute a hon baptist ding hi.
A khut in phazah a tawi a, a phual a zapsiang sipsip ding a, buhpang ah a buh asung ding, a si bel mei mittheilou in a haltum ding” a chi hi.
Huchihlai in a kiang a baptisma tang ding in Jesu Galili gam a kipan Jordan lui ah Johan kiang ah a hongpai hi.
Johan in, “Nang kei n’on baptist kiphamoh zawpi a, ka kiang ah na hong zawsop ahi maw?” chi in, a kham hi.
Himahleh Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Tuin lemsak teitei in, hichibang a diktatna tengteng hih tangtun ei dia kilawm ahi” chi in, a dawng a, huchi in lem a sata hi.
Huan Jesu baptisma a tantak in tui a kipan a pawtpah ngal a, ngai in, amah ading in van kihong a, Pathian Kha, vakhu bang a hongsuk in, a tung a hongtu a mu hi.
Huan ngai in, van a kipan aw in, “Hiai ka Tapa deihtak, ka kipahna mahmah ahi” a chi hi.
Huaikhit in Diabol khem a om ding in Jesu gamdai ah Kha pilut in a omta hi.
Huan ni sawmli leh zan sawmli an a ngolh nung in a gil hong kialta hi.
Khempa a hongpai a, a kiang ah, “Pathian Tapa na hihleh hiai suangte tanghou suak ding in thu pia in” a chi hi.
Himahleh aman, “Mihing tanghou kia in a hingkei ding, Pathian kam a thupawtte in a hingzaw ding” chih gelh ahi, chi in a dawng hi.
Huaizoh in, Diabol in khaw siangthou ah a pilut a, Pathian biakin tungzum ah a koih hi,
A kiang ah:
“Pathian Tapa na hihleh ki kesak in; ‘Na tungthu ah angelte thu a pe ding a,
a khut un hondom ding ua,
huchilou in zaw na khe in suang na sui khading’
chih gelh ahi ngal a,” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Toupa na Pathian ze-et ken chih gelh ahizaw,” a chi hi.
Huan Diabol in tang sangtak ah a pi nawn a, khovel gam tengteng leh a thupina a ensak hi,
Huan a kiang ah, “Khupboh in hon bia in, hiai tengteng k’on pe ding” a chi hi.
Huaitak in Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Setan, hiai a kipan paimang in, Toupa na Pathian na biak ding a amah nna kia nasep ding ahi chih gelh ahi,” a chi hi.
Huaizoh in Diabol in a paisanta a, ngai in, angelte’n amah nna a hong sepsak uhi.
Huan Johan a man uh chih Jesu’n a zakphet in, Galili ah a kihemkhia hi,
Nazaret khua a paisan a, Kapernaum khua ah a om nilouh a, huai tuh Zebulun leh Naphtali uk, dilgei a om ahi,
Zawlnei Isai kam a thugenkholh a tangtunna ding ahi:
“Dil lam a, Jordan gal a,
Zebulun gam leh Naphtali gam,
Jentelte Galili gam a,
mial nuai a tute’n vak thupi a mu ua, sihna lim nuai a tute tung ah vak a hongsuakta”
chi a a gen a hongtun theihna ding in.
Huai nung in Jesu’n, “Kisik un! Van gam a naita” chi’n thu a genta hi.
Huan Galili dilgei a a vakkawm in, unau nih Simon Peter kichi a unau Andru toh, dil ah lenpailai a mu a; amaute ngamanmi ahi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Honzui un, mihing man ding in k’on bawl ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a lente uh nuse pah in amah a zuita uhi.
Huan huai a kipan a pai zel a unau dang nih, Zebedai tapa Jakob leh a unau Johan, a pa uh Zebedai kiang a long a a lente uh bawlpha in a mu a; amau a samta hi.
Huchi in, long leh a pa uh nusia pah in amah a zuita uhi.
Jesu’n a kikhopnain ua thuhilh in, gam Tanchinhoih gen in, mite natna chiteng leh hatlouhna chiteng hihdam in Galili gam tengteng ah a pai vialvial hi.
Suria gam tengteng ah a tanchin a thangta hi; mi damlou tengteng damlouhna leh natna chih thuakte, dawimatte, kaihveite, zawte, a kiang ah a honpi ua, a na hihdam hi.
Galili gam a kipan, Dekapolis khua a kipan, Jerusalem leh Judia a kipan leh Jordan gal a kipan in mipi tampi tak in amah a zui uhi.
Huchi in mipite a muh in tang ah a paitou a, a tu a, a nungzuite a kiang ah a hongpai uhi;
Huan thu a gen a, amau thu a hilh hi:
“Lungsim a gentheite a hampha
uh van gam amau a ahi ngal a.
“Lungkhamte a hampha uh;
khamuan a om ding ahi ngal ua.
“Thunuailutte a hampha uh;
leigou luah ding ahi ngal ua.
“Diktatna lunggulh a gilkial a dangtakte a hampha uh,
tai ding ahi ngal ua.
“Zahngaitheite a hampha uh; zahngaihna mu ding ahi ngal ua.
“Lungsim a siangthoute a hampha uh; Pathian mu ding ahi ngal ua.
“Lemna bawlte a hampha uh;
Pathian’ tate chih ding ahi ngal ua.
“Diktakna ziak a sawina
thuakte a hampha uh,
van gam amau a ahi ngal a.
“Min keimah ziak a hontai ua, a honsawi ua, zuau a gilou chiteng a a honhek hun chiang un, na hampha uhi.
Kipak unla, nakpitak in nuam un; van ah na kipahman uh a thupi ngal a: Tuamah bang in na ma ua zawlnei omte leng a na sawi zel uhi.
“Lei chi na hi uh: himahleh chi peng leh, bang in ahia a hih al nawn ding? Paihkhiak a mihingte chilgawp loungal ding in, bangmah din a phatuam kei hi.
“Khovel vak na hi uh. Tang tung a khopi om selguk theih ahi kei hi.
Min khawnvak de in lawh nuai ah a koih ngeikei ua, a koihna ah a koih zaw uhi. Huchi in insung a om tengteng a tanvak hi.
Huchi mah bang in, na vak uh mi mitmuh ding in vak hen, huchi in na thil hoih hihte uh a mu ding ua, na Pa uh van a om a pahtawi thei ding uhi.
“Dan hiam, zawlneite thu hihmang ding a hongpai ka hih um kei un; hihmang ding a hongpai ka hi kei, hih tangtung ding a hongpai ka hi zaw hi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, lei leh van a man masiah danthu a sutvom neuchik hiam, thaivom neuchik hiam, khat leng a mang keihial ding, avek a a tunkim masiah uh.

Huchi in kuapeuh hiai thupiak neupente lak a khat bohsia a, huai zui dia mite thuhilh peuhmah, van gam ah mi neupen a kichi ding; himahleh kuapeuh zui a thuhilh behlapte, van gam ah milian a kichi ding hi.
Na diktatna un laigelhmite leh Pharisaite diktatna a khup kenzaw van gam ah na lut kei hial ding uh chih k’on hilh ahi.
“Nidanglai a mite kiang ah, ‘Tual na that ding ahi kei’ kichi leh, ‘kuapeuh tualthat vaihawmna adin lauhthawn huaitak in a om ding uh,’ ki chi na zata uhi;

Ken zaw, kuapeuh a unau tung a heh vaihawmna adin lauhthawn huaitak in a om ding. Kuapeuh a unau selphou vaihawmmite hawmsak a om lauthawn huaitak in a om ding; kuapeuh, ‘Nang mihai’ chi Gehenna mei a paih lauhthawn huaitak in a om ding uh” chih k’on hilh ahi.
Huaiziak in, maitam a na thilpiak na lat lai a na unau in na tung ah lung hihlouhna a nei chih na theihkhiak leh,
Huai maitam ma ah na thilpiak nusia inla, pai inla, na unau kilempih in, huaizoh in na thilpiak lan in.

Na langpa toh vaihawmna inn zuan a lampi a na paikhawmlai un kilempih in, huchilou in zaw na langpa’n thukhenmi khut ah a honpe dia, thukhenmi’n mimanpa kiang ah a honpe dia; suangkulh ah a honkhum ding hi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, paihsa san khat nangawn na piakkim masiah huai a kipan in na pawtkhe kei hial ding hi.
“Nidanglai mite’n ‘Ang na kawm ding ahi kei’ a chih uh na zata uhi.
Himahleh ken zaw kuapeuh etlahna lungsim toh numei en in, a lungsim in angkawm ahi chih k’on hilh ahi.
Na mit taklam in a hon hihpuk leh, khelkhia inla paimang in, na sapumpi Gehenna a paisang in na sapum a hiang khat manthat nang ading in a hoihzaw hi.
Na khut taklam in a hon hihpuk leh, tankhia inla paimai in; na sapumpi a Gehenna a paisang in, na sapum a hiang khat manthat nang ading in a hoihzaw hi.
“Kuapeuh zi ma in kimakna lai a kiang ah pia heh, leng a kichi.
Ken zaw kuapeuh kingaihna ziak hilou a, zi ma in amah angkawm sak ahi, kuapeuh maksa neinawn angkawm ahi chih k’on hilh ahi.
“Nidanglai in mite kiang ah, Zuau in kichiam kenla, Toupa kiang ah na kichiamnate tangtun zaw in, a kichi chih leng na zata uhi.
Ken zaw, k’on hilh ahi, chiam himhim kichiam kei un; van lou in kichiam kei un, huai Pathian mangtutphah ahi ngal a; lei lou in kichiam sam kei un, huai a khengakna ahi.
Jerusalem lou in kichiam sam kei un, huai Kumpipa thupitak khopi ahi.
Na lu lou in na kichiam ding ahi sam kei, samzang khat lel leng na hihngou in, na hih vawm thei ngalkei uhi.
Na thugen uh, ‘ahi, hi,’ ‘hilou, hilou,’ hi vanglak hen;” a kan a valzaw gitlouhna a suak ahi.
“Mit sik in mit, ha sik in ha, a kichi chih na zata uhi.
Ken zaw k’on hilh ahi. Migilou nang kei un; na taklam biang bengte, a lehlam leng doh zaw un.
Kuapeuh in na lak ah thusia bawl in, na puanak lak a tup leh, na puanza leng lasak ngal in.
Huan mel khat pai dia hon phut kiang ah mel nih pai in.
A hon ngen kiang ah pia inla, na lak a leitawi nuam kiheisan ken.
“Na vengte it inla, na melmate hua in, a kichi chih na zata uhi.
Ken zaw k’on hilh ahi, na melmate it unla, a honsawite thumsak un.
Na Pa uh van a omtate na hih theihna ding un. Aman migiloute leh mi hoihte tung ah a ni a suaksak a, mi diktatte leh diktatloute tung ah leng vuah a zusak hi.
Nou hon itte kia na it un, kipahman bang ahia na muh ding uh? Siahkhonmite’n leng huchibang in a hihsam kei ua hia?
Huan na unaute kia uh chibai na buk un bang na hihtam tuan ua ahia? Jentelte’n leng hichibang in a hih sam kei ua hia?
Huchi in na Pa uh van a om a hoihkim sipsip bang in na hoihkim sipsip ding uh ahi.
“Na thilpiakte uh mi muh ding in, mihing mitmuh a hihlou ding in pilvang un; huchilou in zaw na Pa uh van a om kiang ah kipahman na neikei ding uhi.

“Huchi in, mi kiang a thilpiak na piak in, mi lepchiahte’n miphat a loh theihna ding ua kikhopnain leh kongzing a a hihnak bang un na ma uah pengkul mutkei un. Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, a kipahman uh a mu ta uhi.
Nang zaw mi kiang a thilpiak na piak in, na khut taklam in a hih na khut veilam in theikei hen.
Na thilpiak a guk a a omtheihna din: huchi in na Pa a guk a mupa’n a hondin ding hi.

“Huan na thum chiang un milepchiah te bang in na hih ding uh ahi kei; min a muh theihna ding un, kikhopnain leh kongzing kathuam laitak ah ding kawm in thum a utse uhi. Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, a kipahman uh a muta uhi.
Nang zaw na thum in, na dantan sunggil ah lut inla, na kongkhak khak inla, na Pa a guk a om kiang ah thum in. Huchi in na Pa a guk a om in honmu in, a hondin ding hi.
“Huan, na thum un, Jentelte bang in gentuan mawkmawk kei un: a pau tam ziak ua zaka om ding a kisa uhi.
Huaiziak in, amau bang in omkei un, amah na nget ma ua na Pa un bangbang ahia na poimawh uh a theigige hi.
Huchi in nou zaw hichibang in thum un:
“Ka Pa uh van a om,
na min ki zahtak hen.
Na gam hongtung hen.
Na deihlam van a a kihih bang in,
lei ah leng kihih hen.
Tuni’n ka nek khop uh
an honpia in.
Kabatte uh hon ngaidam in,
kou leng ka leibate uh ka ngaihdam tak bang un.
Khemna ah hon pilut kenla,
gilou lak ah hon huzaw in,
Gam leh thilhihtheihna leh thupina
Tangtawn a nang a a hih ziak in, Amen” chi in.
Mi a tatleknate uh na ngaihdam uleh, na Pa uh van a om in leng a hon ngaidam sam ding hi.
Himahleh mite tatleknate na ngaihdam kei ngal un, na Pa un na tatleknate uh a ngaidam sam kei ding hi.

“An na ngolh un leng, milepchiahte bang in nguimel pawkei un: amau zaw mi mitmuh a anngawl a a kilat theihna ding un, a mel uh a nguisak nak uhi. Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, a kipahman uh a muta uhi.
Nou zaw, an na ngolh chiang un na lu uh sathau nilh unla, na mai uh phiat un.
Huchi in, na Pa uh a guk a om mitmuh loungal ah mihing mitmuh ah anngawl na bang kei ding ua; huchi in, na Pa uh a guk a mu pa’n a hondin ding hi.
“Lei a, leikha leh tuiek in a neksiatna ah, gutate’n phenvang a a gukna uah gou kikhol kei un.
Van ah, leikha leh tui ek in a neksiatlouhna ah, gutate’n a phen ua a guk samlouhna uah, gou kikhol zaw un.
Na gou omna peuh uah na lungtang uh leng a om ding hi.
“Sapum khawnvak mit ahi; huchi a na mit a chim leh na sapum avek in a tansuak ding hi.
Na mit a siat leh na sapum avek in a mial khin vek ding. Huchi in na sung a vak om pen mial hileh nak mial natel in chia!
“Kuamah in heutu nih nna a semkop theikei; khat hua in khat a it ding; ahihkeileh, khat gum in khat a simmawh ding. Pathian leh sumna na semkop theikei ding uh.

“Huaiziak in, k’on hilh ahi. Bang ahia ka nekding, bang ahia ka dawn ding, chi in, na hinna thu uh leh, bang ahia ka silh ding, bang ahia ka ten ding, chi in na sapum thu uh lunghimawh kei un. Nekding sang in hinna a thupizaw ka hia? Silhlehten sang in sapum leng a thupizaw ka hia?
Tungleng vasate en un; buh a tuh kei uh, a at kei uh, buh in ah leng a seklut sam kei uh. Himahleh na Pa uh van a om in amau a vak hi. Noute amau sang a nakpitak a manpha zaw hilou na hi umaw?
Huan noute lak ah lunghihmawh ziak a kuan ahia amah dunglam tong khat a hihsang tuan thei?
“Huan silhlehten thu bang ding a lunghimawh na hi ua? Gamlak lili pak khandan hoihtak in ngaihtuah un; na a sem kei ua, khau leng a khek kei uh.
Himahleh, k’on hilh ahi, Solomon hial leng a thupina tengteng a a kizep in hiai lili pak khat bang in zep in a omkei hi.
Huchi in gamlak loupa, tuni a hing a, a zing a thuk a khulmai ding bawn Pathian in huchi lawmlawm a a zep leh aw nou gintawmte, silhlehten ding honpe tawk lou ding hiam?
“Huchi in bang ahia i nekding, ahihkeileh bang ahia i dawn ding? Ahihkeileh bang silh in ahia i om ding chi in lunghimawh kei un.
Jentelte’n huai tengteng a zong uhi. Huai tengteng na poimawh uh chih na Pa uh van a om in a theigige hi.
A gam leh a diktatna zong masa un, huchi in huai tengteng a honpiak behlap ding hi.
“Huchi in a zing ading lunghimawh kei un, a zing in amah ading a ki lunghimawh tawm ding ziak in. Ni khat ading in ni khat gimthuak a hun hi.
“Vai hawmsak kei un, vai hawmsak na hihlouhna ding un.
Na vai hawmsak mah bang in hawmsak in na om ding uh, na tehna ngeimah un a hon tehsak nawn ding uhi.
Huan bangdia, nangmah mit a singtum om ngaihtuahlou a, na unau mit a ninneng neuchik mu na hia?
Bangchi’n na unau kiang ah, Na mit a kipan huai ninneng neuchik hon lakhe sak ve, na chih theih ding? Ngai in, nangmah mit mahmah ah singtum a om nilouh ngal a.
Milepchiah, na mit a kipan singtum lakhe masa in; huchi in na unau mit a kipan ninneng neuchik lakkhiak ding kichiantak in na mu thei ding hi.
“Ui kiang ah thil siangthou pekei un; vok ma ah na tuikepsuang uh pai kei un, a chilse kha ding ua, huan kihei in a hon balzak kha ding uhi.
“Ngen un, piak in na om ding uhi; zong un, na mu ding uh; kiu un, a hon honsak ding uhi;
Kuapeuh a ngen in a mu a; kuapeuh a zong in a mu a; kuapeuh a kiu honsak in a om ding hi.
Ahihleh noute kuapeuh na tapa un tanghou ngen leh, kuan suang na pe ding ua?
Ahihkeileh ngasa ngen leh kuan gul na pe ding ua?
Huchi hileh nou migilou in bawn, na tate uh thil hoih piak dan na theih un, na Pa uh van a om in a ngente thil hoih pe zawsem louding hia?
“Huaiziak in, thil bangkim min na tung ua a hih ua na deih bang uh, mi tung ah leng hihsam un; huai Dan leh zawlneite thu ahi him hi.
“Kong kawchik ah lut un; manthatna a paina kong a za a, a lam leng a lian a, huai a lut tam leng a tam mahmah uhi.
Hinna a paina kong a kawchik a a lam a neu hi, a tawnte tawmchik ahi uh.
“Zawlnei takloute lak ah pilvang un, amaute belam vun silh in na kiang uah a hongpai nak ua, a sunglam uh nge duhgawl pipi ahi uhi.
Amau a gah uah na thei ding uh. Khaulingnei gui ah grep gah a lou ngei ua hia?
Lenling ah leng theipi a lou ngei ua hia? Huchi mah bang in sing hoih peuhmah a gah hoih a; sing sia a gah se nak hi.
Sing hoih a gah se theikei, sing sia gah a hoih theisam kei hi.
Singchih gah hoihlou a phuk ua mei ah a pai uhi.
Huaiziak in, amaute a gah uah na theimai ding uhi.
“Toupa, Toupa, honchi napeuh van gam ah a lut kei ding uh; ka Pa van a om deihlam hihte a lut ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in mi tampi in, Toupa, na min in thute ka gen ua, na min in dawite ka delhkhia ua, na min in thillamdang tampi ka hihzel uh hilou hiam? a chi ding uh.
Huai hun chiang in, ‘Nou thil gilou hihte aw, k’on thei ngeikei, ka kiang a kipan paimang un, chi in amau ka hilh ding hi.’
“Huchi in michih hiai ka thuza a, zui peuhmah, mi pil suangpi tung a inn lammi toh ka teh ding hi.
Vuahpi a hongzu a, tui a hong khang a, huih a hongnung a, huai inn a honmut zialzial hi; himahleh a chimkei; suangpi tung a lepkip a hih ziak in.
Huan michih, hiai ka thuza a zomlou peuhmah, mihai piaunel tung a inn lammi toh ka teh ding hi.
Vuah a hongzu a tui a hong khang a, huih a hongnung a, huai inn a honmut zialzial a; a chimta a, huai inn a nakchip ngel hi” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu’n huai thu a gen zoh in, mipi’n a thuhilh lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
laigelhmite banglou a, thuneihna neitak a amaute thu a hilh ziak in.
Huan tang a kipan a a hong paisuk nung in mipi thupitak in amah a zuita uhi.
Ngai in, a kiang ah phak khat a hongpai a, “Toupa, na ut leh n’on hihsiangthou thei hi” chi in, a bia hi.
Jesu’n a sawk a, a khoih a, “Ka ut hi, na siangthouta in” a chi hi. Thakhat in phak a hong siangthou pah hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, "kuamah hilhlou ding in pilvang in, himahleh siampu kiang ah vakilak inla, Mosi in thilpiak ding a chihte lan in amau a hon theihchet na ding un," a chi hi.
Kapernaum khua a lut in, a kiang ah sepaih zaheutu a hongpai hi,
“Toupa, ka naupang zaw, inn ah a lum maimah a, nakpitak a hihnat in a om” chi in a na ngen hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, “Ka hongpai dia, ka hihdam ding” a chi hi.
Sepaih zaheutu’n, “Toupa, ka inn sung na lutna tak ahi kei, thu kia gen lechin, ka naupang a dam ding.

Keileng mi thunuai a om ka hi a, ka nuai ah sepaihte a om ua, ‘nang, pai in,’ ka chih leh, a pai zel; midang kiang ah, ‘nang hongpai in,’ ka chih leh, a hongpai zel; ka sikha kiang ah leng, ‘hiai hih in’ ka chih leh, a hihzel” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Jesu’n huai thu a zak in lamdang a sa a, amah zuite kiang ah, “Chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Israelte lak ah leng hichitel a ginna thupi ka mu kei hi.
K’on hilh ahi, suahlam leh tumlam apat mi tampi a hongpai ding ua, van gam ah Abraham, Isak leh Jakob kiang ah a tu ding uhi.
Gam tate zaw pawlam mial ah paihkhiak in a om ding uh; huai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n sepaih zaheutu kiang ah, “Paita in; na gin bang in na tung ah tung hen” a chi a, huchi in naupang a damta hi.
Jesu Peter inn ah a lut a, a zi nu khosik a lum a mu hi.
A khut a khoihsak a, a khosik a daita; a thou a, a na a sepsakta hi.
Huan nitaklam a hong hih in a kiang ah dawimatte tampi a honpi ua; thu in dawite a delhkhia a, damlou tengteng a hihdam hi.
Zawlnei Isai in, “Amah ngei in i hatlouhnate a la a, i natnate a pua” chi a a gen a hongtun theihna ding in.
Jesu’n a kimvel a mipi thupitak a muh in, galkhat lam a pai ding in thu a pia hi.
Laigelhmi khat a hongpai a, a kiang ah, “Heutupa, na paina peuh ah k’on zui ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Sehalte’n kua a nei ua, tungleng vasate’n leng bu a nei uh, himahleh Mihing Tapa in zaw lungakna ding mun a neikei” a chi hi.
Huan a nungzuite lak a midang khat in, “Toupa, ka pa hon vuisak phot in” a chi hi,
Himahleh aman a kiang ah, “Honzui in; misi in amau misi kivui uhen” a chi hi.
Huan long sung ah a lut a, a nungzuite’n a zui uhi.
Ngai in, dil ah huihpi thupitak a hongnung a, huchi in tuikihawt in long hontum tou a; amah lah a ihmu hi.
Huan a kiang ah a hongpai ua, a phawng ua, “Toupa, hon hondam in, mangthang ding ka kei uhiam” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ginglahte aw, bangdia lau na hi ua?“ a chi hi. Huchi in a thou a, huih leh dil a tai a; huan a hong dai sipsipta hi.
Huan mite’n lamdang a sa mahmah uhi. “Hiai mi bangchidan ahia, huih leh dil nangawn in a thu a man uh?” a chi uhi.
Huan galkhat lam Gadara mite gam a tun in dawimat nih, han a kipan a hongpawt in, a hontuak ua; a hang mahmah ua, huchi in, huai lampi ah kuamah a pai theikei uhi.
Ngai in, amau “Pathian Tapa kou leh nang bang ahia i kizolhna om? Hunchiam tunma a koute hongawt dia hongpai na hi maw?” chi in, a kikou uhi.
Huan a omna ua kipan gamla khop ah vokhon tampi a gamta uhi.
Huan dawite’n, “N’on delhkhiak a leh huai a vokhonte sung ah hon lutsak in” chi in, a kiang ah nakpi’n a ngen uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Pai un” a chi a, huchi in, a hong pawtkhia ua, vok sung ah a lut uhi; ngai in, vokhon tengteng tuigei ken ah a taisuk ua, dil ah a tailut ua, tui ah a mangthangta uhi.
Huan a vulte a tai ua, khua ah a pai ua, dawimatte tung a thil hongtungte bangkim a hilhta uhi.
Ngai in, a khua in Jesu mu ding in a hongpawt ua; amah a muhtak un a gam ua kipan a pawtkhe ding in nakpi’n a ngen uhi.
Huan long ah a lut a, a galkah a, a khua a hongtung kiknawn hi.
Ngai in, mi zeng khat damlou, lupna a lum a honzawng ua; huchi in Jesu’n a ginna uh mu in, zeng damloupa kiang ah, “Tapa, khamuangtak in om in, na khelhnate ngaihdam hi hen” a chi hi.
Ngai in, Laigelhmi kuate hiam a kingaihtuah ua, “Hiai mi’n Pathian a gensia” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Jesu’n a ngaihtuahte uh a thei a, “Bangdia na lungtang ua gilou ngaihtuah na hi ua? a chi hi.
‘Na khelhnate ngaihdam hi hen’ chih leh, ‘thou inla, khe in pai in, chih koi a baihlam zaw?’
Himahleh Mihing Tapa in leitung ah khelhnate ngaihdam theihna a nei chih na theihna ding un” zeng damloupa kiang ah “Thou in, na lupna la inla, na inn ah pai in” a chi hi.
Huchi in a thou a, a inn ah a paita hi.
Himahleh, mipi’n a muh un, lamdang a sa ua huchibang hihtheihna mihingte kiang a pepa, Pathian a pahtawita uhi.
Jesu huai a kipan a pai zel a, siah piakna mun a tu, mi khat, a min Matthai a mu a; a kiang ah, “Honzui in” a chi a, huchi in, a thou a, a zuita hi.
Hichi ahi a, a inn a Ankuang a umlai in, ngai in, siahkhawnmite leh mikhial tampi a hongpai ua, Jesu leh a nungzuite a umpih uhi.
Pharisaite’n huai a muh un, a nungzuite kiang ah, “Bangdia na heutupa un siahkhawnmite leh mikhialte kiang a ne ahia?” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n huai a zaktak in, “Mi damtheite’n daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, mi damtheiloute’n a kiphamoh zaw uhi.
Huchi in, ‘kithoihna deihlou in zahngaihna ka deih hi,’ chih, a omdan vazil un, mi diktatte sam dia hongpai ka hi kei, mikhialte sam dia hongpai ka hizaw” a chi hi.
Huchihlai in Johan nungzuite a kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Bangdia kou leh Pharisaite’n anngawl gige a, na nungzuite’n ngawllou uh ahia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Moupite kiang a a pasal a omlai teng moupite’n a sun thei ua hia? Himahleh, a pasal a kiang ua kipan a pimang nite a hongtung ding a, huai hun chiang in an a ngawl ding uhi.
Huan kuamah in puan lui puan tuikhai louh them in a thuap ngeikei uh; a thuapna in puan a kaihkek ding ziak in, a hong nakkek zawsem ding hi.

Kuamah in uain thak savun uain thawl lui ah a thun ngeikei uh; huchilou in zaw savun thawlte a puakkek dia, uain a baw dia, savun thawl leng a hong seding; huaiziak in uain thak savun uain thawl thak ah a thun zaw ua, huchi in hoihtak in a om tuaktuak” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang ua a genlai tak in, ngai in, vaihawmpa khat a hongpai a, Amah bia in, “Tu tak in ka tanu a si a; himahleh hongpai inla, a tung ah na khut koih lechin a hong hingnawn ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in, Jesu a thou a, a zuita a, nungzuite’n leng a zui uhi.
Ngai in, numei khat kum sawm leh kum nih si pawt damlou, a nung ah a hongpai a, a puanmong a khoihsak hi.
“A puan mongkai khoihlel leng, hihdam in ka om mai ding” a lungsim in a chi hi.
Huan Jesu a kihei a, amah a mu a, “Ka tanu, khamuangtak in om in; na ginna na dampih hi” a chi hi. Huchi in numeinu huai dakkal a kipan a damta hi.
Jesu vaihawmpa inn ah a lut a, tamngai tumte leh mipi thawm ngaih vengvungte a va muh in,
“Pawt un: naupang a si kei, a ihmu ahizaw,” a chi hi. Amau bel amah a nuihsan maimah uhi.
Himahleh mipite pawlam a a pawtsak zoh in amah a lut a, naupang khut ah a len a, a hong thou maimah hi.
Huai tanchin huai gam tengteng ah a thangkheta hi.
Jesu huai a kipan a pai zel a, mittaw nih in, “David Tapa, ka tung uah zahngai in” chi a kikou in a zui uhi.
Huan inn a a lut leh mittawte a kiang ah a hongpai ua; Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Hiai hihthei din n’on gingta ua hia?” a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, “Gingta e, Toupa” a chi uhi.
Aman a mit uh a khoih a, “Na gintak bang un na tung uah tung hen,” a chi hi.
Huchi in a mit uh a hongvakta hi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Kuamah theihlouh ding in pilvang un” a chi bilbel hi.
Himahleh amau a pawt ua, huai gam tengteng ah a tanchin a genthangta uhi.
Huai apan a pawtlaitak un, ngai in, dawimat pautheilou khat a kiang ah a honpi uhi.
Huai dawi a delhkhiak tak in pautheilou a hong pauta a; mipite’n lamdang a sa mahmah uhi, “Israelte lak ah hichibang a kimu ngeikei hi” a chi uhi.
Pharisaite’n bel “Dawi kumpipa ziak in ahi, dawite a delhkhiak nak,” a chi uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kikhopnain ua hilh in, gam Tanchinhoih gen in, damlouhna chiteng leh natna chiteng hihdam in, kholian leh khoneu tengteng a tawn vialvial hi.
Huchi in mipite a muh in, chingtu neilou belamte bang a gimthuak leh dalh a a om ziak un a lainat mahmah hi.
A nungzuite kiang ah, “Buhlak ding a tam mahmah a, himahleh a semmite a tawm uhi.
Huaiziak in a buhla dia semdingte sawl ding in buhneipa kiang ah ngen un” a chi hi.
Huai zoh in a nungzui sawm lehnihte a kiang ah a samkhawm a, a kiang uah khaninte tung leh amau hawlkhe ding, damlouhna chiteng leh natna chiteng hihdam ding in a thuneihna a pia hi.
Huai sawltak sawmlehnihte min hiaite ahi: A masapen in Simon Peter, leh a unau Andru; Zebedai tapa Jakob leh a unau Johan,
Philip leh Bartholomai; Thomas leh siahkhawn Matthai: Alphai tapa Jakob leh Thaddai;
Kanan mi Simon leh zuausan a mansakpa Judas Iskariot.
Hiai sawmlehnihte Jesu’n a sawlkhia a, a kiang uah huchi in thu a pia hi. “Jentelte lam ah paikei unla, Samari mite khua ah leng lut kei un.
Himahleh Israel inkuan belam mangte kiang ah paizaw un.
Huan, na pai un, van gam a naita, chi in, thu genzel un.
Damloute hihdam unla, misite kaithou unla, phakte hihsiangthou unla; dawite hawlkhia un, a thawn in na mu ua, a thawn in pia un.
Na kawnggak uah dangkaeng hiam, dangka hiam, dal dangka hiam tawi kei un.
Zinna ading in kawlzal hiam, puanak nih hiam, khedap hiam, chiangkhun hiam tawisam kei un; nasemmi nekding mutak ahi.
“Huan kholian hi in khoneu hitaleh na lutna peuh uah nou hon tungsaktak mi zongkhia unla, na pawtnawn mateng uh huai inn ah tungden un.
A inn ua na lutpeuh chiang un, chibai buk un.
Huai inn a mite chibai buktak a hih uleh na khamuanna uh a tung uah a tung dia; a takkei ua leh na khamuanna uh nou tung ah hong kiknawn ding hi.
Kuapeuh nou hon kipahpihlou a, na thu uh leng a ngaihkhiak kei uleh, huai inn a kipan leh huai khua a kipan na pawt chiang un, na khepek ua leivui tatkhia un.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, thukhen ni chiang in huai khua sang in Sodom leh Gomorrah gam thuak ding a dan a omzaw ding hi.
“Ngai dih ua, ngia lak a belam om bang in k’on sawlkhia hi: gul bang a pilvang, vakhu bang a poi khoihlou in om un.
Himahleh mihing lak ah pilvang un: vaihawmmite a hon mansak ding ua, kikhopnain ah a hon vuak ding ziak un.
Keimah ziak in gamukte leh kumpipate ma ah amaute leh Jentelte theihsakna ding in a honpi ding uhi.
Himahleh a hon matsak chiang un, bangchih ding ahia, bang thu ka gen dia? chi in lungkham kei un; na gen ding uh a huntak in a hon theisak ding hi.
A genpa noumau na hi kei ding ua, na Pa uh Kha in noumau ah a genzaw ding hi.
Huan hihlup ding in unaupa leh unaupa a kimansak ding ua, pa’n leng a ta a mansak ding; tate’n leng a nu leh a pate uh a dou ding uh, a hihlumsak ding uhi.
Ka min ziak in mi tengteng huat na hi ding uh; himahleh a tawppha a thuakngap peuhmah hotdam in a om ding hi.
Huchi in hiai khua a hon gawt chiang un, khaw dang ah taisan un; chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa hongpai ma in Israel gam a khopite na siksuak kei ding uhi.
“Nungzui a heutu tung ah a omkei; sikha leng a pu tung ah a omkei hi.
Nungzui a heutu bang a a hongom leh sikha a pu bang a a hongom tuh a hun e. Inn neipa bawn Beelzibul a chih uleh, a inkuanpihte nak chihna tel un chia!
“Huaiziak in amaute kihta kei un; langlou ding a sel bangmah a omkei, theihlouh ding a im bangmah a omkei hi.
Mial a nou k’on hilh vak ah na gen ding ua; bilbul a na zak uh intung a tuang in tangkoupih un.
Huan sapum that a kha that theiloute kihta kei unla; Gehenna a kha leh sapum hihmang theipa kihta zaw un.
Kawlgit nih dal dangka khat in a zuakzel uh hilou hiam? Himahleh a lak ua khat leng na Pa uh theihlouh in lei ah a ke kei ding hi.
Na samzangte uh nangawn leng simvek ahi.
Huaiziak in lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sang in na manpha zaw uhi.
“Huchi in mite ma a hon gum peuhmah, ka Pa van a om ma ah ka gum sam ding hi.
Himahleh kuapeuh mite ma a hon kitheihmohbawl, ka Pa van a om ma ah ka kitheihmohbawl sam ding hi.
“Leitung a lemna lengsak ding a hongpai honsa kei un; lemna lengsak ding hilou in namsau lengsak ding a hongpai ka hi zaw.
Mi a pa dousak ding in, tanu a nu dousak ding in, mou a nu dousak ding a hongpai ka hi.
Mi a melma amah inkuanpihte lak a mi mah ahi ding hi.
Kuapeuh a nu hiam, a pa hiam, kei sang a it zaw tuh ka mi hitak ahi kei; kuapeuh a tanu hiam a tapa hiam kei sang a it zaw leng, ka mi hitak ahi kei.
Kuapeuh a Kros pua a hon zuilou ka mi hitak ahi kei.
Kuapeuh a hinna mu in a tan ding a, keimah ziak a a hinna tan in a mu ding hi.
“Kuapeuh nou hon kipahpih in kei hon kipahpih ahi a, kuapeuh kei hon kipahpih a hon sawlpa kipahpih ahi.
Zawlnei kua hiam, zawlnei a hih ziak a kipahpih in zawlnei kipahman a mu ding; kuapeuh mi diktat kua hiam mi diktat a hih ziak a kipahpih in mi diktat kipahman a mu ding hi.
Huan kuapeuh hiai mi neuchikte lak a khat kiang a, nungzui a hih ziak a tuisik nou khat kia pia leng, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, a kipahman a tan kei hial ding” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu’n a nungzui sawmlehnihte thu a piakzawh in huai apan in a khopite ua sinsak ding leh thugen ding in a paita uhi.
Johan in suangkulh sung a Khrist thilhihte a na zak in a nungzuite sawl in a kiang ah,
“Hongpai dingpa na hi hia, ahihkeileh midang hungaih lai ding ka hi uhia?” a chisak hi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Painawnta unla, thil na muh uh leh na zak uh Johan kiang ah vahilh un:

Mittawte a mit uh a hongvakta, khebaite khe in a hongpai ua, phakte a hong siangthouta ua, bengngongte leng a bil uh a hongvakta, misite leng kaihthoh in a omta ua; a mizawngte’n leng Tanchinhoih hilh a dongta uhi.
Kuapeuh ka tung a lunghihlouhna mulou a hampha uhi” chi in a dawng hi.
Huai mite a paitak un, Jesu’n mipite kiang ah Johan thu a genta hi: “Bang ending a gamdai a paikhia neita ua? Sialluang huihmut ling maw?
Ahihkeileh bang ending pen a paikhia neita ua? Puannem silh maw? Ngai un, puannem silhte zaw kumpipate in ah eive a om uh.
Ahihkeileh bang ziakpen in ahia na paikhiak uh? Zawlnei ending in maw? Ahi tawk vaw oi, k’on chi ahi, zawlnei sang a leng thupizaw.
‘En dih ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl ahi,
aman na ma ah na lampite a bawl ding chih a tanchin a gelh uh hiai mipa ahi.’
Chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, numei suan lak ah baptispa Johan sang a thupizaw a piang kei; himahleh van gam a mi neupen amah sang in a thupizaw uhi.
Baptispa Johan om a kipan tutan in van gam in hiamgamna a tuaknak, hiamgamte’n hat thu in a la hi.
Zawlneite tengteng leh danthu in Johan a hongom tanpha in a na genkhol zel uhi.
Na pom nop uleh, huai zaw Elijah hongpai dingpa mah ahi.
Kuapeuh zakna ding a bilnei in za hen!
“Himahleh tulai khangte bang toh ka tehpih dia? Naupang dawlmun a tu a, a lawmte sam a,
Tamngai hontum sak ung a, lam lou uchin a, kap huphup ung a, sunlou uchin a, chite bang ahi uhi.
Johan a hongpai a, ne in a dawn kei a, dawizawl, a chi uhi.
Mihing Tapa a hongpai a, ne in a dawn a, En dih ua, anhaipa, uain haipa, siahkhonte leh mikhialte lawm, a chi uhi. Himahleh pilna a tate’n siam a tan uh” a chi hi.
Huan a kisiklouh ziak un, a thil thupi hihtamna khopite a tai hi.
“Korazin, na tung gik e; Bethsaida, na tung gik e; noumau a thil thupi kihihte Tura leh Sidon khua a hih hileh, saiip puansilh a vutlak a tu in a kisikta ding uhi.
Himahleh k’on hilh ahi, thukhen ni chiang in nou thuak ding sang in Tura leh Sidon khua thuak ding a dan a omzaw ding hi.
Huan nang Kapernaum, van tan a tawisang na hidia hia? Misi khua tan a paisuk ding neive, nangmah a thil thupitak kihihte Sodom khua a hih hileh, tutan in a omlai ding hi.
Himahleh k’on hilh ahi, thukhen ni chiang in na thuak ding sang in Sodom gam thuakding a dan a omzaw ding” a chi hi;
Huchihlai in Jesu’n a houpih a, “Pa aw, leitung leh van Toupa, nang mi pil leh mi bengvakte kiang ah hiai thu na im a, naungekte kiang a na theihsak ziak in k’on phat hi.
Ahi, Pa, tua bang hih, nang ngaih in a hoih ahi.
Ka Pa’n thilbangkim hon kemsakta; Pa lou in kuamah in Tapa a theikei; Tapa leh a kiang ua Tapa in a kitheihsak utnate kia loungal in kuamah in Pa a theikei hi.
“Nou semgim leh puakgik paw tengteng aw, ka kiang ah hongpai un, keiman khawlna k’on pe ding hi.
Ka hakkol pua unla, kei a kipan zil un; thunuailut leh lungtang kingainiamtak ka hi; huchi in, na kha ua ding in khawlna na mu ding uhi.
Ka hakkol a nuam a, ka puak leng a zang hi” a chi hi.
Huchihlai in, Jesu khawlni’n buhlei kantan in a pai hi; nungzuite a gilkial ua, buhvuite khiak in, a neta uhi.
Pharisaite’n huai a muh un, a kiang ah, “En dih, na nungzuite’n khawlni’n hihsianglou a hih uh” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “David in a gilkial lai a a lawmte toh a thilhih uh na simkei ua hia?
Huchi a Pathian inn a a lut a, amah leh a lawmte’n nek sianglouh, siampute kia neksiang tanghou koihtuam a nek thu uh?
Ahihkeileh khawlni’n Pathian biakin a siampu omte’n khawlni a bohsiat un leng siamtang in a om uh chih danthu na simkei ua hia?
Huchi a hih ngal leh, Pathian biakin sang a thupizaw hiai ah a om chih k’on hilh ahi.
Himahleh ‘kithoihna deihlou in, zahngaihna ka deih’ chih a omdan na thei hile uchin, mi siamtangte siamlouh tangsaklou ding hive uchin.
Mihing Tapa zaw khawlni Toupa ahi,” a chi hi.
Huan huai a kipan a pai a, a kikhopnain uah a valut hi.
Ngai dih, mi khat khutzaw a na om a, amah a hektheihna ding un, “Khawlni a hihdam a siang hia?” chi’n Jesu a dong uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Noute lak ah kuapeuh in belam khat nei unla, khawlni’n kawkhuk ah keta leh kua ahia len a kaikhelou ding?
Belam khat sang in mihing khat bangchilel a manpha zaw ahia? Huaiziak in khawlni’n hihhoih a siang hi” a chi hi.
Huaizoh in, huai mi kiang ah, “Na khut zan in” a chi hi, huchi in a zan a, a langkhat bang in a damsiangta hi.
Pharisaite bel a pawt ua, amah a hihlup theihna dan ding uh ngaihtuah in a kihou uhi.
Jesu’n huai thu a theih in huai mun a kipan in a kihemmang hi. Himahleh mitampi in amah a zui ua, a damloute a na hihdam vek hi.
A tanchin genthang hetlou ding in a kiang uah a chi hi.
Huai zawlnei Isai thugenkholh a tangtunna ding ahizaw hi:
“En dih, ka sikha ka tel,
ka deihtak, ka lungsim in a pahtak mahmah,
a tung ah ka Kha ka koih dia, huchi in,
Jentelte kiang ah dik a vaihawmna a ensak ding hi;
A selkei ding a, a kikou sam kei ding a,
kongzing ah kuamah in a aw a za sam kei ding uhi.
Dik a vaihawmna a vualzohsak mateng sialluang kigawpsa a hihtan khekei ding a,
meivak kuang liakliak a hihmit sam kei ding hi.
Amah min ah Jentelte’n lametna a ngah ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchihlai in dawimat mittaw pautheilou khat a kiang ah a honpi ua; aman a hihdam a, pautheilou hongpau in, a hon muthei ta hi.
Huchi in mipi tengteng in lamdang a sa mahmah ua, “Hiai mipa, David Tapa hilou ahi maw?” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Pharisaite’n huai a zakphet un, “Hiai mi’n dawite kumpipa, Beelzibul ziaklou in dawite a delhkhe kei ding” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n amaute ngaihtuahte a thei a, a kiang uah, “Koi gam leng amah kidou a mangthang nak; koi khua hiam, inkuan khat leng amah kidou, a khosuak kei ding hi.
Setan in Setan mah a delhkhiak in amah leh amah kidou hi ding hi a; a gam bangchi’n ading dia le?
Huan kei Beelzibul ziak a dawite delhkhia ka hihleh, na tate un kua ziak in ahia leh a delhkhiak uh? Huaiziak in, amaute noute tung a thukhenmite ahi ding uhi.
Himahleh, ken Pathian Kha ziak a dawite delhkhia ka na hihleh, Pathian gam na kiang uah hongtungta ahi ding hi.
Huchi ahihkei ngal in, min mi hat a gak masak phot kei leh bangchi’n ahia mi hat inn a lut a, a sum a laksak theih ding? Huai nung in a inn a lok mai ding hi.
Kuapeuh kei lam a panglou, hondou ahi; kuapeuh hon lakkhawm pihlou in a thehzak ahi.
Huaiziak in k’on hilh ahi, mi a khelhna chiteng uah leh Pathian a gensiatna chiteng uh ngaihdam a hi ding ua: Kha hilhial a gensiatna ngaihdamsak ahi kei ding hi.
Kuapeuh Mihing Tapa kalh, a kalhna uh ngaihdamsak ahi ding: kuapeuh Kha Siangthou hilhial kalh zaw huai a kalhna uh, tu damsung leh hun hongtung ding ah leng, ngaihdam a hi kei ding” a chi hi.
“Sing hoih a gah leng a hoih na chih kei ngal uleh, sing sia a gah leng a sia, chi vanglak un: sing a gah a a kitheih ziak in.
Gul suante aw, nou gilou napi in bangchi’n ahia thuhoih na gen theih ding uh? Lungtang a dimval kam in a genzel hi.
Mi hoih in a goubawm hoih a kipan thil hoihte a hon lakhia a, migilou in a goubawm hoihlou a kipan thil hoihlou a hon lakhe zel hi.
Huan k’on hilh ahi. Mite’n thuginalou a gen peuhmah uh huai thu tanchin mah vaihawm nichiang in a gen ding uhi.
Na thu in siam a hon tangsak dia, na thu mah in siamlouh a hon tangsak ding hi” a chi hi.
Huailai in laigelhmite leh Pharisaite lak a mi kuate hiam in amah a houpih ua a kiang ah, “Heutupa, nang a kipan chiamtehna muh ka ut uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Khang gilou leh angkawmte’n chiamtehna a zong ua, himahleh zawlnei Jonah chiamtehna loungal a kiang uah chiamtehna piak ahi kei ding hi.
Jonah ni thum leh zan thum ngapi gilsung a a om bang in, Mihing Tapa ni thum leh zan thum lei gilsung ah a omsam ding hi.
Ninevi khomite thukhen ni chiang in tulai khangte kiang ah ading sam ding ua, siamlouh a tangsak ding uh. Jonah thugen ziak in a kisik ua: ngai dih ua, Jonah sang a thupizaw hiai ah a om hi.

Simlam kumpinu thukhen ni chiang in hiai khangte kiang ah a thou ding a, siamlouh a tangsak ding hi, Solomon pilna ngaikhe ding in kawlmong a kipan a hongpai ngal a; ngai dih ua, Solomon sang a thupizaw hiai ah a om hi!
“Huan dawinin mihing sung a kipan a pawt in, khawlna zong in tui omlouhna mun ah a vakvaka, a mu kei hi.
Huan ‘ka pawtna inn mah ah ka kiknawn mai ding’ a chi a: a vatun leh a hawm a zephoihsa in a va mu hi.

Huaitak in a vapai a, amah sang a gilou zaw dawi dang sagih a honpi a, huai mi sung ah a lut ua, a tengta uhi: huai mihing omdan nanung amasa sang in a hong hoihkei zaw hi. Tuabang mah in, tulai khang giloutakte tung a a hongom ding” chi’n a dawng hi.
Mipite kiang a thu a genlai in ngai dih, a nu leh a unaute amah houpih tum in, inn pua ah ading uhi.
Mi khat in a kiang ah, “Ngai dih, na nu leh na unaute nang hon houpih tum in inn pua ah ading nilouh uh” a chi hi.
Aman a hilhpa kiang ah, “Ka nu kua ahia? Ka unaute leng kuate ahia ua?” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan nungzuite lam a a khutzan in, “En un, ka nu leh ka unaute:
Kuapeuh ka Pa van a om deihlam hihphot ka unau, ka sanggam nu leh ka nute ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huai ni’n Jesu inn a kipan a paikhia a, dilgei ah a tu hi.
Huan a kiang ah mipi thupitak a hong kikhawm ua, huchi in long ah a tuang a, a tu a, mipi tengteng piautak ah ading uhi.
Gentehna in thu tampi a kiang uah a gen hi: “Ngai dih ua, buhchithehpa buhchi theh in a kuan hi.
Buhchi a thehlai in a khen lamsik ah a kia a, vasate’n a nezou uhi.
A khen suangsilei lak ah a kia a: lei a sahlouh ziak in a hong poupah hi:
Himahleh ni a suah in haivuai in a om a: zung a neih louh ziak in, a vuai maimah hi.
Huan a khen loulingnei lak ah a kia a, loupa a hong pousang a: a depmangta hi.
A khen leihoih ah a kia a, khenkhat a leh za, khenkhat a leh sawmguk, khenkhatte a leh sawmthum in a honggah uhi.
Kuapeuh bil nei in, za hen!” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite a hongpai ua, a kiang ah, “Bangdia gentehna a thu gen na hia?” a chi uhi.
Aman a dawng a a kiang uah, “Van gam thuguk noute theih phal ahi a, amau theihzaw phal ahi kei hi.
Kuapeuh a nei piak behlap ahi ding a, a hau ding; kuapeuh a neilou a neihsun leng laksak ahi ding hi.
Huchi a hih ziak in a kiang uah gentehna in thu ka gen ahi; ‘mu napi’n a mu kei nak ua, za napi’n a theisiamkei nak uhi.’
Isai thugenkholh a tung uah a tung hi:
‘Bil in zaw na za ding ua,
a theih zaw na theisiam kei ding uh; muh zaw na mu ding ua,
theihzaw na theikei ding uh;
Hiai chite lungtang a nang gawpta a bilte uh a ngong a,
a mitsi ua, huchilou in zaw a mit un a mu ding ua,
a bil un a zakha ding ua,
a lungtang un a theisiam ding ua, a hong kiknawn kha ding ua, amau ka na hihdam kha ding’ a na chi hi.
Nou mitte zaw a hampha hi, a muh ziak in; na bil uh leng a hampha hi, a zak ziak in.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, zawlnei tampi leh mi diktat tampi’n leng na thilmuhte uh muh a ut ua, himahleh a mu kei uh; na thilzakte uh zak a ut ua, himahleh a zakei uhi.
“Huaiziak in, buhchithehpa gentehna thu za un;
Kuapeuh in kumpi gam thu bil a a zak a, a theihsiamkei leh migilou a hongpai a, a lungtang a thehsa a laksak nak hi. Huai tuh lamsik a theh ahi.
Suangsilei a theh bel, thu za a kipaktak a pom bang ahi;
Himahleh amah ah zung a omkei a, sawtlouchik kia a om a, thu ziak a gimthuakna leh sawina a hongom tak in a pukpah hi.
Huan loulingnei lak a thehte tuh thu za a, himahleh khovel awlmohna leh hauhsakna khemna in thu a dep a, gahlou in a hongom hi.
Huan leihoih tung a theh tuh thu bil a za a, theisiam ahi; huai tuh a gah ngei a, khenkhat a leh za, khenkhat a leh sawmguk, khenkhat a leh sawmthum in a pung” a chi hi.
Gentehna dang a kiang uah a gen nawn a; “Van gam tuh mi a lou a chi hoih thehpa toh teh ahi.
Himahleh mi a ihmut kal in melma a hongpai a, buh lak ah buhlem a theh a, a paimang nawnta hi.
Huan buh a hongpou a a hongvuih in buhlem leng a hong kilang sam hi.
Huchi in inneipa sikhate a hongpai ua, a kiang ah, Pu, na lou a chi hoih thehlou na hi maw? Buhlemte koi a kipan a hongom ahia? a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, melma in na theh eive, a chi hi. Sikhate’n a kiang ah ahihleh ‘huaite va lakhawm le ung hoih na sa hia?’ a chi uhi.
Aman bel, ‘salou e, buhlem na lakkhawmna lam uah buh na botkhawm kha ding uh.
Buhlak dong in poukhawm uheh; buhlak hun chiang in buh atte kiang ah, buhlem lakhawm masa phot unla, hal ding in lomgak un; buh pen bel ka buh in ah seklut un, ka chi ding’ ” a chi hi.
Gentehna dang a kiang uah a gen nawn a; “Van gam tuh ankam chi tang khat min a lak a, a lou a a theh bang ahi.
Huai chi laklak ah a neupen a; himahleh a hongpou sang chiang in loupa lak ah a lianpen a, sing a honghi a, huchi in tungleng vasate a hongpai ua, a hiang ah a giak uh” a chi hi.
Gentehna dang a kiang uah a gen nawn a; “Van gam tuh numei in silngou anbuang tehna thum lak a a bilh a, avek a a thoh mateng a phum bang ahi” a chi hi.
Jesu’n huai tengteng gentehna in mipite kiang ah a gen a, gentehna lou in a kiang uah bangmah a genkei hi;
Zawlnei in,
“Gentehna in ka kam ka ka ding a,
leilung pian tung a kipat thil kisel ka genkhe ding” chi a a gen a hongtun theihna ding in.
Huailai in mipite a paisan a, inn ah a lut a, nungzuite a kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Lou a buhlem gentehna thu hon hilhchian in” a chi uhi
Aman a dawng a, “Chi hoih thehpa Mihing Tapa ahi a; lou bel khovel ahi.
Chi hoihte gam tate ahi ua; buhlemte migilou tate ahi.
Melma buhlem thehpa Diabol ahi a, buhlak hun khovel tawpna ding ahi; a atte angelte ahi uhi.
Huchi in buhlemte a lakhawm ua mei a a hal bang un khovel tawpna ah a om ding hi.
Mihing Tapa in angelte a sawlkhe ding a, gam a kipan hihkhial sakte leh thil hihkhialte tengteng a khawmkhe ding uhi.
Amaute haltuina mei ah a pai ding ua, huailai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding hi.
Huai hun chiang in mi diktatte a Pa uh gam ah ni bang in a tang ding uhi. Zakna ding a bil nei peuh in za hen!
“Van gam tuh lou a gou phumguk bang ahi; huai min a mu a, a sel a, a kipah ziak in a neih tengteng a zuak a, huai lou a leita hi.
“Huan Van gam tuh sumsinmi tuikepsuang hoihtak zawngmi bang ahi nawn hi;
Huan aman tuikepsuang manpha tak khat a mu a, a neih tengteng zuak in a leita hi.
“Van gam tuh lenpi, tuipi a paih, chichih tunkhawmna bang ahi nawn hi.
A dimtak in a gei ah a kaikhia ua, a tu ua, a hoih teng bawm ah a lakhawm ua, a hoihloute a paih uh bang ahi.
Khovel tawp hun chiang in huchi bangmah in a om ding, angelte a hongpawt ding ua, mi diktatte lak ah migiloute a khenkhe ding uhi.
Huchi in haltuina mei ah a pai ding uh, huai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding, a chi hi.
“Jesu mah in a kiang uah, “Huai tengteng na theisiam uhia?” a chi a, amau a kiang ah, “Thei e” a chi uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, huaiziak in Laigelhmi van gam thuhilh a om peuhmah, inn neipa, a goubawm a kipan a thilthakte leh thilluite pholhkhepa bang ahi” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu’n huai gentehnate a genkhit in huai a kipan a paita hi.
A omna kholam a tung a, a kikhopnain uah amaute thu a hilh a, huchi in lamdang a sa mahmah uhi, “Hiai min hiai pilna leh hiai nasep thupi hihtheihnate koi a pat a a muh ahia?
Hiai mi singlem bawlpa tapa hilou hia? A nu Mari kichi hilou hia? A unaute Jakob, Joseph, Simon, Judas kichite hilou uhia?
Hiai mi phiangsan in koi a kipan a hiai tengteng mu ahia? A sanggamnute leng i kiang ua omvek hilou uhia?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in, a tung ah a lungkim kei uhi. Himahleh Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Zawlnei amah kholam leh amah inn lam loungal ah pahtawilouh in a om ngeikei” a chi hi.
A ginlouh ziak un huai ah nasep thupi dang tam ahihkei hi.
Huailai tak in kumpipa Herod in Jesu tanchin a naza hi.
A sikhate kiang ah thu a gen a, “Hiai Baptispa Johan ahi; misi lak a kipan thounawn ahi; huaiziak in huai thilhihtheihnate’n amah a sem ahi” a chi hi.
Herod in a unau Philip zi, Herodia ziak in Johan a man a, a hen a, suangkulh ah a na khum hi.
Johan in a kiang ah amah na neih a siangkei, a chih ziak in.
Johan hihlup ut mahleh mipi a kihta a, zawlnei a a bawl ziak un.
Himahleh Herod pianni a hongtun in Herodia tanu a lai ah a lam a, Herod a kipaksak hi;
Huai phet in a nget peuhmah pe ding in thu a kichiam hi.
Aman a nu thuhilh in, hiai kuang ah Baptispa Johan lutang honpia in, a chi hi.
Kumpipa a lungkhamta a, himahleh a thuchiamte leh a Ankuang umpihte ziak in piak ding thu a pia hi.
Huchi in mi a sawl a, Johan lutang a tansak hi.
Huan kuang in a lutang a honla ua, numei naupang kiang ah a pia ua, aman a nu kiang ah a paipihta hi.
Johan nungzuite’n a luang a hongla ua, a vui ua, huchi in Jesu a va hilh uhi.
Jesu’n huai a zak in, hiai a kipan long in gamkeu lam ah a paituamta hi. Himahleh mipi’n a zaktak un khua a kipan khe a pai in a zuita uhi.
Huchi in amah a hong paikhiak leh mipi thupitak a mu a, a hehpih mahmah a, a damloute uh a hihdam sak hi.
Nitaklam a hong hih in, nungzuite a kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Hiai mun gamkeu ahi a, ni a kaita a, mipite khuate a pai a, amau ading nek ding a lei theihna ding un paisakta in” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “A paimang uh kiphamoh kei, noumau nekding pia un” a chi hi;
Amau a kiang ah, “Hiai ah tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nih kia i nei uh” a chi uhi.
Aman “Huaite ka kiang ah honla un” a chi hi.

Huchi in loupa tung a tu ding in mipite thu a pia a, tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nihte a la a, vanlam en in a vualzawl a, a balkham a, tanghoute nungzuite kiang ah a pia a, nungzuite’n mipite kiang ah a pesawn uhi.
Huan avek un a ne ua, a vah chiatta ua; a khamval uh bawmpi sawmlehnih dim a ngah uhi.
A nete numei leh naupang simlouh in, piching ngen sang nga vel ahi uhi.
Huan mipite a sawlmang khit in a paima a galkhat a na pai masa ding in nungzuite long ah a tuangsak teitei hi.
Mipite a paimang nung in thum ding in tang ah a tuam in a paitou a, nitaklam a hong hih in huai ah amah kia in a omta hi.
Long dil laitak ah a omta a; huih in a hilou lam a a sawn ziak in tuikihawt in a septa hi.
Zan ven lina ah Jesu dil tung ah khe a pai a, a kiang lam uh honzuan in a mu uhi.
Nungzuite’n amah dil tung a khe a pai a muh un, “Sikha ahi” chi in a buai ua, lau in a kikou ta uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n amau a houpih paha, “Khamuangtak in om un, keimah ka hi, lau kei un,” a chi hi.
Peter in a dawng a, “Toupa, nang na hihleh tui tung ah nang kiang a hongpai thu honpia in” a chi hi.
Huan aman, “Hong paive” a chi a, Peter long a kipan a kum a, Jesu kiang zuan in tui tung ah khe in a paita hi.
Himahleh huihnung a muh in a lau a, tum din a kisa a, “Toupa, hon hondam in” chi in a kikou hi.
Jesu’n a sawkpah a, amah a len a a kiang ah, “Nang gintawm, bangdia ginglah na hia?” a chi hi.
Huan long a a tuan uleh huih a daita hi.
Long a omte’n, “Pathian Tapa na hi taktak hi” chi’n, amah a bia uhi.
Huan galkhat lam a kai uleh, Gennesaret gam a hongtung uhi.
Huai mun a mite’n amah a theihtak un, huai kim gam tengteng ah mi a sawl ua, damlou tengteng a kiang ah a honpi ua;
A puanmong bek khoih theih a ngen ngutngut ua; huan a khoih peuhmah a dam zel uhi.
Huailai in, Jerusalem khua a om Pharisaite leh laigelhmite Jesu kiang ah a hongpai ua,
“Bangdia na nungzuite upate thugousiah a talek nak uh ahia? Tanghou a nek chiang un a khut uh a sil ngeikei uh” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Nou leng bangdia na thugousiah ziak ua Pathian thupiak a talek na hi ua?
Pathian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa zahtak in, kuapeuh a nu hiam a pa hiam gensia si ngeingei heh’ a chi hi.
Nou bel, ‘kuapeuh a nu hiam a pa hiam kiang a, n’on zatna ding Pathian kiang a piak a hih peuhmah chiang in,
a nu leh a pa a zah ding ahi nawnkei’ na chi uhi. Huchi in na thugousiah ziak un Pathian thu bangmahlou na suah uhi.
Nou lepchiahte, Isai in na tungtang thu uh a na genkhol dik mahmah hi:
‘Hiai mite’n a kam un a honzah ua, a muk un a honphat ua,
himahleh a lungtang un a hon gamlat uhi chi in,
Himahleh, a thuhilhna ua mihing thupiak a hilh ziak un a hon biak uh a thawn mai ahi.’ ” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan mipi a sam a a kiang uah, “Ngaikhia unla, theisiam un;
Kam a lut in mihing a hihnin kei a; himahleh kam a pawt, huai ngei in mihing a hihnin zaw hi” a chi hi.
Huailai in a nungzuite a hongpai ua, a kiang ah, “Pharisaite’n huai thu a zak ua a lungkimlouh dan uh na thei hia?” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Kung tengteng ka Pa van a om suanlouh bohkhiak in a om ding.
Amaute awlmoh kei un: mittaw makai ahi uh; huchi in mittaw in mittaw mah a pi leh kawkhuk ah a ke khawm ding uh” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan Peter in a kiang ah, “Huai gentehna thu hon hilhchian in, chi in a dong hi.
Aman, “Tutan a nou leng thei nailou lai na hi umaw?
Kam a lut peuhmah gil ah a lutsuk a, dailenna ah paihkhiak in a om chih na theikei ua hia?
Kam a pawtte bel lungtang a kipan a hongpawt ahi ua: huaite ngeingei in mihing a hihnin nak hi.
Lungtang a kipan ngaihtuahna giloute, tualthahna, angkawmna, kingaihna, guktakna, hekna, gensiatna a hongpawt nak hi;
Huaite ahi mihing hihnin; khut sillou a annek in mi a hihnin kei” a chi hi.
Jesu hiai a kipan pawt in Tura leh Sidon uk ah a paita hi.
Huan ngai dih, huai gam a kipan Kanan numei khat a hongpai hi, “Toupa, David Tapa, ka tung ah zahngai in, ka tanu dawi in lungkhamhuaipi in a man” chi’n, a kikou hi.
Aman bel kam khat in leng a dawng kei hi. A nungzuite’n, “I nung ah a kikou kou a, paisak mai in” chi in a hong gen uhi.
Aman bel, “Israel inkaw nam lak a belam mangte kiang loungal ah sawl ka hi kei” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Himahleh numei a hongpai a, “Toupa honhuh in” chi in, a bia hi.
Huan aman, “Tate tanghou laksak a, uite kiang a paih a kilawm kei” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Numei in, “Toupa, hihzaw ahi tham hi; himahleh, uite’n leng a pu uh dohkan a kipan a tanghou nen kia a nezel sam ve ua oi” a chi hi.
Huaitak in Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Numei, na ginna thupi na tel e; na deih bangtak in na tung ah om hen” a chi a, a dawng a, huchi in a tanu huai hun ngei in a damta hi.
Jesu huai a kipan a pai a, Galili dil kiang a hongtung a: tang ah a paitou a, huai ah a tuta hi.
Huchi in mipi tampi a kiang uah a hong ua, khebaite, mittawte, pautheiloute, piangsualte leh midang tampi a honpi ua aman amaute a na hihdam chiat hi.
Mipite’n pautheiloute hong pau a, piangsualte hong hoih a, khebaite khe a pai a, mittawte’n hon mutheita uh chih a muh un lamdang a sa mahmah ua; huchi in Israelte Pathian a phatta uhi.

Huchi in Jesu’n a nungzuite a sam a, “Mipite ni thum ka kiang ah a omta ua, nekding bangmah a neihlouh ziak un, ka lainat mahmah; anngawl in ka paikik sak utkei hi, huchilou in zaw lamkal ah a bahse kha ding uh” a chi hi.
Nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Mipi hiai zahzah vahna khop tanghou huai zahzah gamdai ah koi a kipan i mu dia?” a chi uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, tanghou phel bangzah na nei ua? a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, phel sagih, nga neu tawmchik toh” a chi uhi.
Huan aman lei a tu ding in mipite thu a pia a.
Huan tanghou phel sagih leh ngate a la a, kipahthu a gen in, a balkham a, nungzuite kiang ah a pia a, huan nungzuite’n mipite kiang ah a pe sawn uhi.
Huan avek un a ne ua, a vah chiatta ua; a khamval nen uh bawmpi sagih a dim hi.
A nete tuh numei leh naupang simlouh in, piching ngen sang li ahi uhi.
Huan mipite a sawlmang nung in Jesu long ah a tuang a, Magadan gam a hongtungta hi.
Huaizoh in Pharisaite leh Saddukaite a hongpai ua, amah ze-etna ding in van a kipan chiamtehna amaute ensak ding in a ngen uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Nitaklam a hong hih in, khua a pha dia ading meisan a suak, na chinak uhi.
Huan zingsang in, tuni’n khua se dia ading e, meisan a suak a, a niamkai, na chinak uh. ‘Van omdan na theisiam ngal ua, himahleh, hun chiamtehnate na theisiam theikei uhi.’
Khang gilou leh angkawmte’n chiamtehna a zong ua, himahleh, Jonah chiamtehna loungal a kiang uah chiamtehna piak a hi kei ding” chi in, a dawng hi. Huan amaute paisan in a pawtkheta hi.
Huan nungzuite galkhat lam a tun un tanghou a paw mangngilh ua,
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Pharisaite leh Saddukaite silngou lak ah kiveng unla, pilvang un” a chi hi.
Amau, “Tanghou i puaklouh ziak uh eive” chi’n a kingaihtuah uhi.
Jesu’n huai a thei a, “Ginglahte aw, bang a chia tanghou na neihlouh ziak ua kingaihtuah na hi ua?
Tu nangawn in na lungsim un na thei naikei lailai umaw? Mi sang nga nek tanghou phel nga leh, a khamval uh bawmpi bangzah na dimsak zah uh na theigige kei ua hia?
Mi sang li nek tanghou phel sagih leh, a khamval uh bawmpi bangzah hiam na luahdim uh chih theilou maw?
Tanghou thu na kiang ua genlou in, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite silngou apan pilvang un, chih gen ka hizaw chih bang a chia theilou na hi ua?” a chi hi.
Huaitak in tanghou silngou lak a pilvang ding in a sawlkei a, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite thuhilhna apan pilvang ding in amau a sawlzaw chih a theita uhi.
Kaisaria uk a Philippi mun a hongtun in Jesu’n a nungzuite kiang ah, “Mite’n Mihing Tapa kua ahi a chi ua?” chi in, a dong hi,
Amau, “khenkhat in, Baptispa Johan ahi, a chi ua; khenkhat in, Elijah ahi, a chi ua; khenkhat in, Jeremiah hiam zawlnei kuahiam ahi” a chi uh, a chi uhi:
Aman a kiang uah, “Ahihleh, nou kua ka hi n’on chi ua?” a chi hi.
Simon Peter in, “Khrist Pathian Hing Tapa na hi” chi in a dawng hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Simon, Bar Jonah, hampha chia; sa leh sisan in a hon theihsak na hi kei a, ka Pa van a om hon theihsak na hizaw hi.
K’on hilh ahi, nang Peter na hi, hiai suangpi tung ah ka saptuam ka lamtou ding a, misi khaw kulh kongkhakte’n hiai a zoukei ding uh.
Van gam tahbite k’on pe ding a, leitung ah bangpeuh na hen van ah leng hen ahi ding a, leitung ah bangpeuh na phel van ah leng phel ahi ding” a chi hi.
Huaizoh in Khrist ahi chih kuamah hilhlou ding in nungzuite a chi bikbek hi.

Huai nung in Jerusalem a a pai ding dan, upate, siampu liante, laigelhmite apan thil tampi a thuak ding dan leh hihlup a a om ding dan, ni thum ni a kaihthoh a a om ding dan Jesu’n a nungzuite a theisak panta hi.
Huai phet in Peter in amah a pituam a; “Toupa, hi kei hen! Huaite na tung ah tung ngeikei hen!” chi in, a taihilh hi.
Jesu a kihei a, Peter kiang ah, “Setan, ka nung ah pai in; kei a di’n pukna na hi; Pathian thilte ngaihtuahlou in mihing thilte na ngaihtuah zaw hi” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a nungzuite kiang ah, “Kuapeuh in a hon zuihnop leh amah ki mangngilh in, a Kros pua in honzui hen.
Kuapeuh a hinna humbit ut in a tan ding a; kuapeuh keimah ziak a a hinna tan in a humbit ding hi.
Min khovel a pum in nei henla, a hinna tan leh amah ading in bang a phatuam dia? Ahihkeileh min a hinna sik in bang a pethei dia?
“Mihing Tapa a angelte toh, a Pa thupina a kizem a a hongpai ding ziak in. Huai hun chiang in michih a nasep bang un a dinchiat ding hi.
Chihtaktak in k’on chi hi, hiai a ding akhente, Mihing Tapa a gam a hongpai a muh masiah uh, sihna chiamlou hial ding a om uh” a chi hi.
Huan ni guk nung in Peter, Jakob, leh a unau Johan a tuam in Jesu’n tang sangtak ah a paitouh pih hi.
Huan a ma uah a mel omdan a hong lamdangta a; a mai ni bang in a hong tang a, a puansilh te vuk bang in a hong ngouta hi.
Huan ngai dih, Mosi leh Elijah, amah kihoupih in a kiang uah a kilak uhi.
Huan Peter in Jesu a houpih a, “Toupa, ei din hiai a om a hoih, na ut leh hiai ah aidakbuk thum ka bawl ding a; nang ading in khat, Mosi ding in khat, Elijah ding in khat” a chi hi;
A genlai tak in, Ngai dih, mei ngoutak in amau a hon liahta a; ngai dih, mei a kipan aw in, “Hiai ka Tapa deihtak, ka kipahna mahmah ahi: amah thu ngai un” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite’n huai a zak un khupboh in a puk ua, a lau mahmah uhi.
Jesu’n amau a hong khoih a, “Thou unla, lau kei un” a chi hi.
Huan a dak khia ua, Jesu kia loungal kuamah a muta kei uhi.
Huan tang a kipan a kumlai un, Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Mihing Tapa misi lak a kipan a thohnawn masiah na thilmuh uh kuamah hilhkei un” chi in thu a pia hi.
Huan a nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Laigelhmite’n, Elijah hongpai masa ding ahi, bangchidan a chi ahi ua?” chi in a dong uhi.
Aman, “Elijah a hongpai ding him ahi, bangkim a siam hoih ding hi
Himahleh k’on hilh ahi, Elijah zaw a hong paikhinta, amah a theikei ua, a tung ah a utut un a hihzawta uhi. Huchi mah bang in Mihing Tapa in leng a lak uah a thuaksam ding” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huaitak in, nungzuite’n, Baptispa Johan thu a kiang uah a gen ahi chih a hon theita uhi.
Huan mipi kiang a hongtun un, mi khat a kiang ah a hongpai a, a ma a khukdin in,
“Toupa ka tapa tung ah zahngai in, kaihvei ahi, a nak thuak telmai; tamveipi mei ah a puklut a, tamveipi tui ah leng a puknak hi.
Na nungzuite kiang ah konpi a, a hihdam theikei uh” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, “Ginna neilou leh khang genhakte aw, bang tan ahia k’on thuakzoh ding, amah ka kiang ah honpi un” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Jesu’n dawi a tai a, asung a kipan a pawt a; huai dak in naupang a damta hi.
Huai zoh in, nungzuite a tuam in, Jesu kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Bang a chia kou delhkhe theilou ka hi ua?” a chi uhi.

Aman a kiang uah, “Na gintak louh ziak un ahi. Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, ankam tang khat bang ginna na neih uleh, hiai tang kiang ah, Hiai a kipan huai a pam ah va kisuan in, na chi ding ua, a kisuan mai ding; nou ding in hihtheih louh bangmah a omkei ding” a chi hi.
Akoi abang hileh, hichibang zaw thumna leh anngawlna loungal in a paikhe kei ding hi.
Galili gam a a omlai un, Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Mihing Tapa zaw mihingte khut a matsak in a om ding; a that ding ua:
Ni thum ni’n kaihthoh in a om ding hi” a chi a, huchi in a lungkham mahmah uhi.
Kapernaum khua a hongtun un, Pathian biakin sumkhonte Peter kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Na pu un biakin sum pe zel lou hia? a chi uhi,

Aman, “Pezel e” a chi hi. Huan insung a a valut in, Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Simon, bangchi’n na ngai a? Lei a Kumpipate’n siah leh leiman sumte kua apan ahia a lak zel uh? A tate ua pan hia, mituam apan? chi in, a na gen tuh hi.
Peter in, “Mituam apan” a chihtak in, Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Huchi ahihleh tate awl uh ahi vaw oi.

Himahleh nang dil ah vahoh inla, ngakuai diah inla, nga a hongsuak masapen man in, a kam kek lechin dangka nih na mu ding; huaite la inla kei leh nang ading in a kiang uah pia in, huchilou in zaw amaute i hih lungkim kei kha ding,” a chi hi.
Huailai tak in nungzuite Jesu kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Van gam ah kua a thupipen dia?” a chi uhi.
Huan aman naupang neuchik a sam a; a lak uah a dingsak hi.
“Chihtaktak in k’on chi ahi, na lamdan ua, naupang neuchik bang n’ong hih kei uleh, van gam ah na lut kei hial ding uh.
Huchi in kuapeuh hiai naupang neuchik bang a kingainiam, huai mi van gam ah a thupipen ding a chi hi.
Huan kuapeuh ka min ziak a hichibang naupang neuchik khat kipahpih keimah hon kipahpih ahi.
“Himahleh hiai hon gingta neuchikte lak a khat leng hihpuk, a ngawng ah buhgawizanna suang lianpi oksak in tuipi thuklai ah khemang le uh amah ading in a hoihzaw ding hi.
Puknate ziak in khovel tung a gik hi; puknate bel om ding him ahi a; himahleh pukna omsakpa tung a gik hi.

“Huan na khut hiam, na khe hiam, in hon hihpuk leh, tankhia inla, paimang in; khut nih leh khe nih nei a tangtawn mei a paih a om sang in, piangsual hiam khebai hiam a hinna a lut nang ding in a hoihzaw hi.
Huan na mit in a hon hihpuk leh khelkhia inla, paimang in; mit lang nih nei a Gehenna mei a paih a omsang in, mit langkhat nei a hinna a lut nang ading in a hoihzaw hi.
“Hiai mineute lak a khat leng simmohlou ding in pilvang un, a angelte un van ah ka Pa van a om mel a en gige uh chih k’on hilh ahi.
Mihing Tapa mangthangte zong ding a hongpai ahi him ahi.
Bangchi na sa ua? Mi kuapeuh in belam za nei henla, a lak ua khat vakmangta leh sawmkua leh kuate nusia in, tang a pai in, a mang pen a zong kei dia hia?
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, a muhnawn zenzen leh sawmkua leh kua vakmangloute tung ah sang in, tua belam tung ah a kipak zaw ding hi.
Huchi mah bang in hiai mineute lak a khat manthat na Pa uh van a om deihlam a hi kei hi.
“Huan na unau in na tung ah thil a hihkhelh leh pai inla, amah leh nang kia theih in a khelhna hilh in; a hon ngaihkhiak leh na unau na zou ahi ding.
A hon ngaihkhiak kei leh midang khat hiam nih hiam na kiang ah na pi dia, huchi in thu chiteng theihpih mi nih hiam thum hiam kam a hihkip a a om theihna ding in.
Huan amau leng a ngaihkhiak nopkei lai leh, saptuamte kiang ah tun in. Huan saptuamte leng a ngaihkhiak nopkei leh, amah tuh nang ding in Jentel leh siahkhawnmi bang hi hen.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, leitung ah bangpeuh na hen uh, van ah hen ahi ding. Huan leitung a na phel uh, van ah leng phel ahi ding hi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilhnawn hi. Leitung ah na lak ua mi nih a thil nget ua a kithutuah uleh, ka Pa van a om hihsak in a om ding uh.
Mi nih hiam thum hiam ka min a a kikhopna peuh uah a lak uah ka om zel hi” a chi hi.
Huailai in Peter a hongpai a, “Toupa, ka unau in bangzah vei ahia ka tung ah hihkhial leh ka ngaihdam ding? Sagihvei tan in ahi diam?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, Sagihvei tan k’on chikei a, “Sagihvei mun sawmsagih tan,” k’on chi zaw ahi.
“Huaiziak in, van gam kumpipa kuahiam a sikhate kiang a a sumthu saifel tum toh tehpih ahi.
Huchi a sumthu honsai pattak in, mi khat talent sing khat ba a kiang ah a honpi uhi.
Huan piak ding a neihlouh ziak in, a pu in amah toh, a zi toh, a tate toh, a neih tengteng toh zuak a dit ding thu a pia hi.
Huchi in, sikha in Toupa, ‘ka tung ah zahngai tadih inla, avek in k’on pe ding, chi in khupboh in a bia hi.’
Huai sikhapa pu’n a hehpihta mahmah a, a khah a, a bat a ngaidamta hi.
Himahleh huai sikha a paikhia a, a sikha hihpihte lak a khat a makhai za khat ba a va mu a; amah a man a, na bat honpia in, chi in a gawlmek hi.
Huchi in a sikha hihpihpa’n khupboh in, ka tung ah zahngai tadih inla, k’on pe ding, chi in a ngen ngutngut hi.
Himahleh a utkei a; a bat a piak zoh masiah suangkulh ah a khumta hi.
Huchi in, a sikha hihpihte’n a thilhih a muh un, poi a sa mahmah ua, a thilhih tengteng a Toupa uh a hilhta uhi.
Huaitak in a toupa’n amah a sam a, a kiang ah, sikha gilou, n’on nget ngutngut ziak a, n’on bat tengteng hon ngaidam ing a:
K’on hehpih bang in nang leng na sikha hihpih na hehpih sam ding hilou hia? a chi hi.
Huchi in a Toupa a thangpaita a, a bat tengteng a piak zoh masiah migawtte kiang ah a peta hi.
Michih in na lungtang tak ua na unaute uh na ngaihdam kei uleh ka Pa van a om in leng huchi mah bang in na tung uah a hih sam ding” a chi hi.
Hichi ahi a, Jesu’n huai thute a gen zoh in, Galili gam a kipan a pawt a, Jordan luigal Judia gam ah a hoh hi.
Mipi thupitak in a zui ua; amaute a hihdam zel hi.
Huan Pharisaite a kiang ah a hong ua, amah ze-etna ding in, “Bangziak peuh in min a zi mak a siang hia?” a chi uhi.
Aman, “A tung a kipan amau bawlpa’n numei leh pasal a bawl leh,
Hiai ziak in pasal in a nu leh a pa a paisan ding a, a zi a len ding.

Huchi in, a nih un sa pumkhat a hong hita ding uh, a chi chih na simkei ua hia? Huchi in nih ahita kei ua, sa pumkhat ahi zawta uhi. Huaiziak in Pathian in a gawmsa mihing in khenkei hen” chi in, a dawng hi.
Amau bel a kiang ah “Ahihleh, bangdia Mosi in kimakna laipiak a mak ding chi a thupia ahia?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Mosi in na lungtang uh khauh ziak in eive na zite uh mak a phal; himahleh a tung a kipan huchibang ahi ngeikei hi.
Ken zaw k’on chi ahi, kuapeuh kingaihna ziak hilou a, zi ma a midang nei angkawm ahi: maksa nei peuhmah leng angkawm ahi” a chi hi.
Nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “A zi lam thu a pasal huchibang ahihleh kiten hoihkei” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, huai thu ahihleh, a piaknate kia loungal, mi napeuh in a pom theikei ding uh.

Mi chilgeh, a nu gilsung ua kipan huchibang a piang himte a om ua; michilgeh, mihing khut a gehte leng a omsam ua; michilgeh van gam ziak a chilgeh a kibawltawmte leng a omsam uhi. Kuapeuh a pom thei in pom hen” a chi hi.
Huailai in a tung ua a khutkoih a, a thumsak ding in, a kiang ah naupang neute a honpi ua; nungzuite’n a na tai uhi.
Jesu’n, “Naupang neute ka kiang ah honsawl unla, khamkei un; van gam hichibang mite a ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Huan a tung uah a khut a koih a, huai apan in a paita hi.
Huan mi khat a kiang ah a hong a, “Pu, tangtawn hinna ka neih theihna ding in thil hoih bang ka hih ding? a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Thil hoih thu bangdia hon dong? Hoih khat kia a om; himahleh, hinna a na lut utleh thupiakte zui in” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “A koipen maw?” a chi hi. Jesu’n, “Tual na thah ding ahi kei; Ang na kawm ding ahi kei; Na gu ding a hi kei; Na hek ding ahi kei;
Na nu leh na pa zahtak in, chihte leh nangmah na ki-it bang in na vengte na it ding ahi chih” a chi hi.
Tangval in a kiang ah, “Huaite teng ka zui zel; bang ka samlai a?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Hoihkim a om na ut leh, pai inla, na neih tengteng zuak inla, mizawngte kiang ah pia in, huchi in, van ah gou na nei ding; huan, hongpai inla, honzui in” a chi hi.
Tangval bel huai thu a zak in lungkhamtak in a paimangta a, mi hausa a hih ziak in.
Jesu’n a nungzuite kiang ah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, mi hausa dia van gam lut haksa pi ahi.
Huan k’on hilh ahi, mi hausa Pathian gam a lut sang in sangawngsau phim bil a lutsuak a baihlam zaw” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite’n huai a zak un, lamdang a sa mahmah ua, “Kua hotdam in a om zou dia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n amau a en a, a kiang uah, “Huai mihing hihvual a hi kei, Pathian a di’n bangkim hihtheih ahi” a chi hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Ngai dih, kou bangkim paisan in k’on zuita ua; bang ka mu ding ua?” chi in a dong hi.

Jesu’n a kiang ah, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, “Khovel thak ah, Mihing Tapa a thupina tutphah a a tut chiang in, nou kei hon zuite, Israel nam sawmlehnihte tung a vaihawm in, mangtutphah sawmlehnih ah na tu sam ding uhi.
Huan michih a innte, a unaute, a sanggamnute, a pa, a nu, a tate, a gamte ka min ziak a paisan peuhmah tuh a leh za a mu ding ua, tangtawn hinna a tang ding uh.
Himahleh mi tampi, masapen a omte, nanungpen in a om ding uh; nanungpen a omte leng masapen in a om ding uh” a chi hi.
“Van gam tuh inn neipa grephuan a semdingte chial ding a zing a pawtkhia bang ahi.
Aman nasemte toh ni khat a makhai loh dia a kituahtak un a grephuan ah a sawl chiat hi.
Huan dak thumna ding vel in a vapawt a, midang dawlmun ading maimaite a mu hi.
A kiang uah, ‘nou leng grephuan ah vapai sam ve ua, a kilawm hun k’on pe ding,’ a chi hi.
Huchi in a paita uhi. Huan, dak gukna ding leh dak kua na ding vel in a va pawtnawn a, huchi mah bang in a hih nawn hi.
Huan dak sawmlehkhatna ding in a va pawt a, midang dingte a mu a; a kiang uah, ‘Bangdia nitum a hiai lai ading maimai na hi ua?’ a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, ‘kuamah in a hon chiallouh ziak un,’ a chi uhi. Aman a kiang uah, ‘nou leng grephuan ah vahoh sam un,’ a chi hi.
Huan, nitaklam a hong hih in, grephuan neipa’n, a sumkempa kiang ah, nasemte sam inla, a nanungpen a kipan a masapen tan in a loh uh pia in, a chi hi.
Huan dak sawmlehkhatna ding khong in a chialte a hong uh leh makhai a mu chiat uhi.
A masapente a hong ua, muh tamdeuh a kigingta ua; himahleh amau leng makhai mah a mu chiat uhi.
A loh uh a santak un, inn neipa tung ah a phun uhi,
Hiai nanungpente’n dakkal khat kia a sem ua, kou sun haksa leh kho-ul thuakte toh kibang in na bawl a, chi in.
Aman bel, a lak ua mi khat kiang ah, ‘Lawm, na tung ah bangmah ka hihkhial sam a; makhai loh ding in i kituak ka hia?
Nang a la inla paimai in; nang ka honpiak bangmah hiai nanungpen kiang ah ka pe nuam ahi.
Kei a hiven, ka utut a ka hih a siang ka hia? Ahihkeileh kei ka hoih ziak in nang na haza ahia?’ chi in, a dawng hi.
Huchi in a nanungpente a masapente a honghi ding ua, a masapente leng a nanungpente a honghi ding uh” a chi hi.
Jerusalem khua a a hohtouh lai in Jesu’n a nungzui sawmlehnihte a pituam a, lampi ah a kiang uah,
“Ngai dih uh, Jerusalem khua ah i paitou dia, Mihing Tapa siampu liante leh laigelhmite khut a matsak in a om ding; amau si ding in a tung ah thu a hihpuk ding uhi.
Nuihzabawlna dia zatding leh Kros a kilhden ding in Jentelte kiang ah a pe ding uh; huan, ni thum ni a kaihthoh in a om ding” a chi hi.
Huailai tak in, Zebedai tapate nu, a tate pi in, a kiang ah a hong a, amah bia in, thil banghiam a ngen hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, “Bang ahia na deih?” a chi hi.
Aman, “Hiai ka tapa nihte na gam ah na taklam ah khat, na veilam ah khat a tut theihna ding un thupia in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, “Na nget uh theilou hi uteh. Ka nou dawn ding na dawn thei ua hia? Ka baptisma tan ding na tangthei ding ua hia?” chi in, a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Thei e” a chi uhi.

Aman a kiang uah, “Ka nou na dawn ngei ding ua; ka baptisma tan ding na tangthei ding uhi. Himahleh ka taklam leh ka veilam a tut ding thu zaw kei piak ding a hi kei, ka Pa bawlsakte ading ahizaw ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in sawmte’n huai a zak un unau nihte tung ah a hehta uhi.
Jesu’n amaute a sam a, “Jentelte vaihawmte a tung uah a thunei mahmah ua, a miliante un a tung uah thu a nei mahmah lai uh chih leng na thei uh.
Himahleh nou lak ah zaw huchi a hi kei ding; kuapeuh na lak ua milian hih ut na nasem un a omzaw ding hi.
Kuapeuh na lak ua masapen hih ut na nasem un a omlai ding ahi;
Mihing Tapa nasepsak a om ding in a hong paikei a, nasem ding leh mi tampi tatna dia a hinna pe ding a hongpai ahizaw hi” a chi hi.
Jeriko khua a kipan a pawtlai un mipi tampitak in amah a zui uhi.
Ngai dih, mittaw nih lamgei a tute’n Jesu a pai chih a zak un, “Toupa Nang David Tapa, ka tung uah zahngai in” chi in, a kikou uhi.
Mipite’n dai ding in a tai ua; himahleh, amau, “Toupa Nang David Tapa, ka tung uah zahngai in” chi in, a ki nakkou semsem uhi.
Jesu ading a, amau a sam a, “Na tung uah bang ka hih na ut ua?” a chi hi.
Amaute’n a kiang ah, “Mitvak ka ut uh” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n amau a hehpih mahmah a, a mit uh a khoih a; huchi in, a muthei pah ngal ua, amah a zuita uhi.
Huchi in Jerusalem khua a tunding kuan un, Bethphage khua, Olive tang a tun un Jesu’n nungzuite nih a sawl a, a kiang uah,
“Na mazawn khua uah vahoh unla, sabiltung khih, a kiang a a nou toh, na mu ding ua; phel unla, ka kiang ah honkai un.
Huan kuapeuh in na kiang ua banghiam a gen uleh, ‘Toupa’n a deih a ahi,’ na chi ding uh; aman a honsawl pah maiding” a chi hi.
Hiai tengteng zawlnei kam a gen a hongtun theihna ding in a hong omta hi.
“En dih, na Kumpipa,
thunuailut tak in, Sabiltung tung ah,
Sabiltungnou tung ngei a tuang in na kiang ah a hongpai,
chi in, Zion tanu hilh in,” a chih.
Huchi in nungzuite a vapai ua, Jesu’n a kiang ua thu a piak bang ngei in a hihta uhi.
Sabiltung leh a nou a honkai ua, a tung uah a puante uh a phah ua, huai ah a tuangta hi.
Huan mipi lak a tamzaw in lampi ah a puante uh a phah ua, midang in singsawl sat in, lampi ah a phah uhi.
Mipi a malam a paite leh a zuite’n,
“David Tapa kiang ah Hosanna!
Toupa min a hongpai a hampha hi; tungnungpen ah
Hosanna!” chi in, a kikou uhi.
Jerusalem khua a honglut in a khua in, “Hiai mi kua ahia?” chi in, a ling souhsouh uhi.
Mipite’n, hiai mi zawlnei Jesu, Galili gam a Nazaret khua a ahi, a chi uhi.
Pathian biakin ah Jesu a valut a, biakin a zuakmite leh leimite tengteng a delhkhia a, dangka khengte dohkante leh vakhu zuakte tutphahte leng a sawnpaih sak hi.
A kiang uah, “Ka inn thumna in a chi ding uh chi a gelh ahi; nou bel suamhatte khuk in na bawlzaw uh” a chi hi.
Huan Pathian biakin ah mittawte leh khebaite a kiang ah a hong ua; amau a na hihdam hi.
Himahleh siampu liante leh laigelhmite’n a thillamdang hihte leh biakin a, David Tapa Hosanna: chi a naupang kikoute a muh un, a lungkimkei mahmah uhi.
A kiang ah, hiaite thugen na za hia? a chi uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Za e, ‘naungekte leh nawi nelaite kam a pawt in pahtawina na hihkimta,’ chih na sim ngeikei ua hia?” a chi hi.
Huan amau a paisan a , khopi apat a pawt a, Bethani ah a pai a; huai ah a giakta hi.
A zing a khopi lam a a kiknawn lai in a gil a kialta hi.
Lampi sik ah theipi kung a mu a, a vanaih leh a nah kia loungal muh ding a omkei hi. Huan, a kiang ah, “Tangtawn in na gah nawn ken” a chi hi.
Huchi in theipi a vuaipah hi. Nungzuite’n huai a muh un, “Bangchidan ahia theipi a vuaipah tel?” chi in lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.

Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, ginna na neih ua, na ginlah kei uleh, theipi tung a hih bangphet leng na hihkei ding ua, hiai tang kiang ah leng, na kisuan inla, tuipi ah na kipailut in, chi le uchin, na chih bang un, a om maiding hi.
Bangpeuh gingta a thum a na nget uh na mu ding uh” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Pathian biakin a lutnung a thu a hilhlai in, siampu liante leh vantang upate a kiang ah a hong ua, a kiang ah, “Kua thu in ahia hiai thil na hih? Kuan thu honpia ahia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Ken leng thu kamkhat k’on dongsam ding a, huai n’on hilh uleh, kua thu in hiam hiai thilte ka hih chih k’on hilh sam ding hi.
Johan baptisma koi a kipan ahia? Van a kipan hia, ahihkeileh mihing a kipan?” chi in a dong hi. Amau a kingaihtuah ua, ‘Van a kipan chile hang, bangdia amah ginglou na hi ua leh?’ a honchi ding a;
Mihing a kipan chi lehang, mipi i kihta ngal a; mi tengteng in lah Johan zawlnei in a pom ngal ua” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Jesu a dawng ua, “Theikei ung” a chi uhi. Aman leng a kiang uah, “Ken leng kua thu in ahia hiai thilte ka hih k’on hilh sam kei ding” a chi hi.
“Himahleh nou bangchi na sa ua? Mi kuahiam in tapa nih a nei a, a khatna pen kiang ah a vahoh a, ‘Tapa aw, tuni’n ka grephuan ah vasem ve,’ a chi hi.
Aman, ‘ka utkei’ chi in a dawng hi. Himahleh a denchiang in a lungsim a kheng a, a kuanta hi.
Huan a nihna pa kiang ah leng a vahoh a, tua bangmah in a vachi hi. Aman ‘Pu, ka kuan ding’ chi a dawng na pi in a kuanta kei hi.

Huai mi nihte a kua zaw in a pa uh deihlam a hih a leh?” a chi hi. Amau “A masapen in” a chi uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, siahkhawnmite leh kizuakte’n Pathian gam ah nou a hon lutsan ding uh.

Johan diktatna tawn in na kiang uah a hong a, amah na gingta kei uhi: siahkhawnmite leh kizuakte’n amah a gingta uhi; noute’n huai na muh nung un leng amah na gintakna ding un na kisik nuam tuankei uhi.

“Gentehna thu dang ngaikhia un: Mi kuahiam inn neitu a om a, huai min grephuan a bawl a, dai in a umsuak a, grep sukna khuk a tou a, inn sang a lam a; loukemte kiang ah khohloh ding a pia in gamdang ah a paita hi.
Huan a gahloh hun in a gah lakhawm ding in loukemte kiang ah a sikhate a sawl hi.
Loukemte’n tua sikhate a na man ua, khat a vua ua, khat a that ua, khat suang in a deng uhi.
Huaizoh in sikha dang amasa pawl sang a tamzaw a sawlnawn hi; amau tung ah leng a ma ua mite a hih bangmah un a na hih nawn uhi.
Huai nung in, ‘Ka tapa a zahtak ding uh,’ chi in, a tapa a kiang uah a sawl hi.
Himahleh loukemte’n a tapa a na muhtak un, hiai mipa gouluahdingpa ahi; that ni e: a gouluah ding tansak ni, a kichi uhi.
Huchi in amah a man ua, grephuan a kipan a paikhia ua, a thatta uhi.
Huchi in grephuan neipa a hongpai chiang in huai loukemte tung ah bang chin a honhih dia le?” a chi hi.
Amau tuh a kiang ah, “Huai migiloute haksatak in a hih mangthang ding a, grephuan loukem midang a loh hun teng a a gahte a kiang a pe zel dingte kiang ah khohloh ding in a pe ding” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Inlammite suang deihlouhpen huai ngeingei a ning a suang phatuampen a hong hita. Huai Toupa hih ahi, i mit muh in a lamdang ahi, chih Laisiangthoute na sim ngeikei ua hia?”
Huaiziak in Pathian gam na kiang ua kipan laksak ahi dia, a gahsuah ding namdang kiang ah piak ahi ding, chih, k’on hilh ahi.
Huai suang tung a puk tuh a kitam gawp dia; a delhkhakmi a gawizan ding” a chi hi.
