Huan siampu liante leh Pharisaite’n a gentehna thute a zak un amau tungthu a gen chih a theita uhi.
Huchi in amah mat a tum ua; himahleh mipi’n zawlnei a a pom ziak un a kihta uhi.
Jesu’n amaute houpih in a kiang uah gentehna thu a gen nawn hi,
“Van gam tuh kumpipa kuahiam a tapa adia kitenna Ankuanglui toh teh ahi.
Huan kitenna Ankuang um dia a chialte sam ding in a sikhate a sawl a, himahleh a hong nuam kei uhi.

Aman, ka chialte kiang ah, ‘ngai dih ua, ka Ankuang a manta; ka bawngtalte leh ka ganvakthaute ka gouta a, bangteng a manta hi; kitenna Ankuang um ding in hongpaita un,’ chi un, chi in, sikha dang a sawlnawn hi.
Himahleh a na limsak kei ua, khat a lou ah a kuan a, khat a sumsinna ah a paimang hi;
Midangte’n a sikhate a man ua, zumhuaitakin a bawl ua, a hihlumta uhi.
Huchi in, kumpipa a thangpaita a; a sepaihhon a sawl a, tualthatte a hihmang a, a khua uh leng a halsakta hi.
A sikhate kiang ah, ‘kitenna Ankuang man ahita, ka chialte netak a hi kei uhi.
Huaiziak in lamlian ah pai unla, mi na muh peuhpeuh uh kitenna Ankuang um ding in chial un,’ a chi hi.
Huchi in huai sikhate a pawt ua, lamlian a vapai in, a muh peuhmah uh, migilou leh mi hoihte leng a pikhawm vek uhi: huchi in kitenna dantan michialte in a hong dimta hi.
“Himahleh kumpipa michialte enkhe ding a a honglut leh kitenna puan silhlou mi khat huai ah a mu hi.
Huchi in a kiang ah, ‘Lawm, bangchidan a kitenna puan silhlou a hiai a honglut na hia?’ a chi hi. Amah a daidide hi.
Kumpipa’n a sikhate kiang ah, ‘a khut leh a khe gak unla, pawlam mial ah paikhia un; huai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding,’ a chi hi.
Chialte tampi ahi ua, telte zaw tawmchik ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huailai in Pharisaite a thugen a a mat theihna ding dan a kikum uhi.

Huan amau a nungzuite uleh Herod pawlte a kiang ah a sawl ua, huai mite’n, “Sinsakpa, mi diktak na hi a, diktak in Pathian thu na hilh a, kuamah deihsak tuam leh maivil tuam na neikei chih ka thei uh.
Huaiziak in bangchi na sa a, honhilh in? Kaisar kiang a siah piak a siang hia sianglou?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a gitlouhdan uh a zetheih a, “Lepchiahte aw, bangdia hon ze-et na hi ua?
Na siahsum uh hon ensak un” a chi hi. Huan a kiang ah makhai a honla uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hiai kua lim leh kua min ahia?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Kaisar a” a chi uhi. Aman a kiang uah, huchi ahihnung Kaisar thilte Kaisar kiang ah pia unla, Pathian thilte Pathian kiang ah pia un, a chi hi.
Hiai thute a zaktak un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, amah nusia in, a paimangta uhi.
Huai ni mah in, Saddukaite, thohnawnna a omkei chite, a kiang ah a hongpai ua;
A kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, Mosi in, mi taneilou in sileh, a unaupa’n a zi luah in a unaupa a di’n chi a khahsak ding ahi, a chi hi.
Ahi a, koute lak ah sal sagih a om ua; a upapen in zi a nei a, a si a, chi a khahlouh ziak in a zi a unaupa luah ding in a nutsiat hi.
Huchi mah bang in a nihna in a luah a, a thumna in a luah lai a, a sagihna tan in a luah chiat uhi.
A tawp in avek ua a sih nung un numei mah leng a sita hi.
Huchi in thohnawnna ah amau sagihte lak ah kuapen zi ahi dia? Avek un lah a neichiat ua? chi in” a dong uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Laisiangthou leh Pathian thilhihtheihna na theihlouh ziak un na ngaikhial nak uhi.
Thohnawn hun ah zi leh pasal a kitenna a om nawn kei a, van a angelte bang ahi zawta ding uh” a chi hi.
Himahleh, misi thohnawnna thu Pathian in na kiang ua a gen na simkei ua hia?
‘Kei Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian, Jakob Pathian ka hi,’ Pathian zaw misi Pathian a hi kei a, mihing Pathian ahizaw” chi in dawng hi.
Mipite’n huai a zak un a thuhilh lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Pharisaite’n Jesu’n Saddukaite a selkhia chih a zak un a kikhawm uhi.
Huchi in a lak ua dansiammi khat in, amah ze-et in thu a dong hi.
“Sinsakpa, dan ah bang thupiak pen ahia thupipen? a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Toupa na Pathian tuh na lungtang tengteng in, na kha tengteng in, na lungsim tengteng in na it ding ahi, chih.
Huai thupiak thupipen leh poimawh pen ahi.
Huan a zom in, a kibatpih hiai ahi, ‘Nangmah na ki-it bang in na inveng leng na it ding ahi chih’
Huai thupiak nihte ah dan leh zawlneite thu tengteng a kikhaikhawm vek hi” a chi hi.
Huan Pharisaite a kikhoplai un, Jesu’n amaute thu a dong hi.
“Khrist bangchi na sa ua? Kua tapa ahia?” a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, “David tapa” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Bangchidan in ahia David in Kha a amah Toupa, a chih?
‘Toupa’n, ka Toupa kiang ah,
“Na melmate na khepek nuai a ka koih masiah ka taklam ah tu in” a chih?’
David in amah Toupa, a chih ngal leh,
bangchi’n a tapa ahi dia?” a chi hi.
Kuamah in kam khat in leng a dawng theikei ua, huai ni a kipan kuamah in thu dang a dong ngam nawnta kei uhi.
Jesu’n mipite leh a nungzuite kiang ah thu a gen hi.
“Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite Mosi tutphah ah a tu uhi.
Huaiziak in a honhilh peuhmah uh hih unla zuizel unla; amau thilhih bang zaw hih tuankei un, genzaw a gen ua, a hih tuankei uhi.
Puakgik haksatak a bawl ua, mite a suan ua, amau lah a khutzung un leng a suan nuam kei uhi.
A thilhih tengteng uh mihing muh ding in ahi, a hihzawk uh, a thilbuh uleh a khipte uh a liansak ua, a puanmongkai uh a sausak ua,
Ankuangluina ah mun hoihpen leh kikhopnain ah tutphah hoihpen leh,
Dawlmun a chibai buk leh min, ‘Rabbi, Rabbi,’ a chih bang uh a deihtuamse uhi.
Nou zaw, Rabbi chih in omkei un; sinsakpa khat na nei ua, nou tengteng unaute na hi uhi.
Huan leitung ah kuamah Pa, chi kei un: na Pa uh khat kia van a om ahi.
Heutute chih in omsam kei un, heutu khat na nei ua amah Khrist ahi.
Na lak ua thupipen na sikha ua a om zawk ding ahi.
Kuapeuh kiliansak a dai ding, kuapeuh kingaineu pahtawi in a om ding hi.
“Himahleh nou Laigelhmi leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: van gam lampi mite na khaksak ngal ua: nou lah na lut ngalkei uh, mi a lut dingte lut ding leng na phalkei zel uh.
Laigelhmi leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: meithai’ innte na negai ngal ua, thumna saupi mikhemna ding in na nei ua: huaiziak in mawhna liansem na mu ding uhi.

Nou Laigelhmi leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: phungkai khat lel bawl ding in tuipi leh gam na pai kimvel ngal ua, huchibang a a hongom tak in, amah noumau lehnih in gawtmun ta in na bawl uhi.
“Nou makai mittaw, kuapeuh Pathian biakin lou a kichiam bangmah ahi kei; kuapeuh Pathian biakin a dangkaeng lou a kichiam zaw tangtunsak ding ahi, chite aw, na tung uh a gik hi.
Nou mihai leh mittawte aw: a bang a thupizaw a dangkaeng hia, dangkaeng siangthousak Pathian biakin?
Kuapeuh maitam lou a kichiam bangmah ahi kei: a tung a thilpiak omlou a kichiam in a tangtunsak ding ahi, na chi uh.
Nou mittawte aw, a bang a thupizaw a, thilpiak hia thilpiak siangthousak maitam?
Huchi in ‘maitam lou a kichiam peuhmah zaw maitam leh a tung a om tengteng lou a kichiam ahi.’
Huan Pathian biakin lou a kichiam peuhmah zaw Pathian biakin leh asung a tengpa lou a kichiam ahi.
Huan van lou a kichiam peuhmah leng Pathian mangtutphah leh a tung a tupa lou a kichiam ahi.

“Nou Laigelhmi leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: pudina, mohuri, zira sawm a khat na pia ua, dan khawkzaw, diktatna, hehpihna, ginomna na limsak ngalkei uhi; himahleh hiaite eive na hih ding uh, a dangte hihlou tuanlou in.
Nou makai mittawte, thousi khisiang a sangawngsau nawmvalhte aw!
“Laigelhmi leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: nou leh kuang pawlam na hihsiang ua, asung lah lepgukna leh kideklouhna in a dim uhi.
Nou Pharisai mittaw, nou leh kuang sunglam hihsiang masa un, a pawlam leng a hongsiang theihna ding in.
“Laigelhmi leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh gik hi: hansuang nuhngou, pawlam a kilawmtak a kilang, a sunglam misi guhte leh nin chiteng a dim bang na hi uhi.
Nou leng huai bang in pawlam ah mihing mitmuh in diktattak in na kilang ua, na sunglam u bel lepchiahna leh gitlouhna in na dim uhi.
“Nou Laigelhmi leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: zawlneite han na lam ua, mi diktat hante leng na zem uhi.
‘I pipute damlai a na om hitaleng, zawlneite sisan suahna ua panglou ding hi hang a,’ na chi uhi.
Huchi in zawlneite thatte suante na hi uh chih na kitheisak uhi.
Na pipute uh hih bang in semzawm tou ngal un.
Gulte leh gulsuante aw, Gehenna vaihawmna bangchi’n na pelthei ding ua?

Ngai dih ua, huaiziak mah in na kiang uah, zawlneite, mipilte, laigelhmite k’on sawl ding; khenkhat na that ding ua, Kros ah na kilhden ding uh, khenkhat na kikhopnain uah savun khau in na zep ding ua, khoteng ah na sawi zel ding uhi.

Huchi in Abel mi diktattak sisan a kipan, Pathian biakin leh maitam kikal a Barak tapa Zekariah na thah uh sisan tan in, leitung a mi diktat sisan na suah tengteng uh noumau tung ah a hongtung ding hi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, huai tengteng tu khang tung ah a hongtung ding hi.
“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, zawlneite that, na kiang ua a honsawlte uh suang a na denglum a, akpi in a noute a khanuai a a opkhum bang in na tate bangzah vei opkhum ka tum a, himahleh na utkei uhi.
En un, na inn uh a vuak a taisan in a omta hi.
K’on hilh ahi, ‘Toupa min a hongpai a hampha hi na chih masiah uh tuban n’on mu nawn takei ding uh’ ” a chi hi.
Jesu Pathian biakin a kipan a pawtkhia a; a pailai in, a nungzuite Pathian biakin ensak ding in a kiang ah a hongpai uhi.
Himahleh aman a kiang uah, “Hiai tengteng na mu umaw? Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, hihchip louh a suang kichiang hiai ah a omkei ding” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Olive tang a a tutlai in nungzuite amau kia in a kiang ah, a hong ua: “Huaite chikchiang in a hongom dia? Na hong painawnna leh khovel tawpna ding chiamtehna bang ahi dia? honhilh in” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n amau a dawng a, “Kuamah in a hon khemzoh louhna ding in pilvang un.
Mi tampi’n, ‘Khrist ka hi, chi in, keimah minlou in a hongpai ding uh, mi tampi a khemzoh ding ziak un.’
Huan kidou thu leh kidou thuthang na za ding ua; na mangbat louhna ding un pilvang un; huaite a hongom ding him ahi; himahleh tawpna zaw ahi nai tadih kei ding hi.
Nam tuam leh nam tuam a kidou ding ua, gam tuam leh gam tuam a kidou ding ua, mun tuamtuam ah kial a ke dia, zin a ling ding hi.
Huai tengteng nauvei kipatna ahi.
“Huai hun chiang in gimthuak ding in a hon mansak ding ua, a honthat ding uh. Ka min ziak in nam tengteng huat na hi ding uh.
Huai hun chiang in mi tampi a puk ding ua, a kimansak tuah ding ua, a kihaw tuah ding uhi.
Zawlnei taklou tampi a hongpawt ding ua, mi tampi a khempuk ding uh.
Huan hihkhelhna a punding ziak in mi tamzaw itna a hong dai ding hi.
Himahleh, a tawptan a thuakngap peuhmah, huai mingei hotdam in a om ding hi.
Huan hiai gam Tanchinhoih nam tengteng theihsakna ding in khovel tengteng ah hilh in a om ding; huai khitchiang in tawpna a hongtung ding hi.
“Huchi in hihmangbangpa kihhuai, zawlnei Daniel gen, Mun Siangthou ading na muh chiang un, a sim peuhmah in a omdan thei hen.
Judia gam a omte tangsang ah taimang uhen.
Inn tung a om in a inn a banghiam la ding in kum kei uhen.
Huan, lou a om inn a puan la ding in kiknawn kei hen.
Huai ni’n gaite leh naunou pawmte tung a gik ding hi!
Na taimang hun ding uh phalbi lai hiam, khawlni hiam a hong tunlouhna ding in thum un.
Huai hun chiang in gimthuakna thupi a om ding ziak in, hichibang a thupi leilung piantung a kipan tutan in a om ngei naikei a, chikmah chiang in a hongom n’on sam kei ding.
Huai nite hihtom hi kei leh mihing dam in a pawtkei ding uh; himahleh, telte ziak in huai nite hihtom ahi ding hi.
“Huai hun chiang in kuapeuh in na kiang ua, ‘En dih, Khrist hiai ah hiam, ‘huai ah, hiam,’ a chih uleh, gingta kei un.
Khrist taklou leh zawlnei takloute a hongpawt ding ziak un, huaite’n hithei liai leh telte nangawn leng a khempuk theihna ding un chiamtehna leh thillamdang thupitakte a hih ding uhi.
Ngai un k’on hilhkholta ahi.
“Huchi in, na kiang uah, ‘ngai un, gamdai ah a om’ a honchih uleh, ‘paikhe kei un; dantan sunggil ah a om, a honchih uleh, taksang sam kei un’.
Khua, suahlam a a hongphiat a, tumlam tan a a kilat zel bang in, Mihing Tapa a hong painawnna huchibang ahi ding ahi.
Sapul omna mun peuh ah musanete leng a omkhawm ding uhi.
“Himahleh huai gimthuakna nite nungzek in, ni hihmial in a om ding a, kha a vak nawnta kei dia, van a kipan aksite a hong ke ding ua, van thilhihtheihnate hihlin in a om ding uhi.

Huai hun chiang in Mihing Tapa chiamtehna van ah a honglang ding a, huai hun chiang in leitung a nam tengteng in a sun ding ua, ‘Mihing Tapa thilhihtheihna leh thupina lian toh van meitung a hongpai a mu ding uh.’
Huan, a angelte pengkul ging thupi toh, a sawlkhe ding, amau a telte lei ning lite a kipan, vantawp a kipan a lehlam tawppha in, a kaikhawm ding uh.
“Huchi in, theipi kung ah gentehna thu zil un: a hiang a hongnou a, a nah a hongsel in nipi a nai chih na thei uh;
Huchi mah bang in nou leng huai tengteng na muh chiang un, amah a hongnaita a, kongkhak bul ah a om chih thei un.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, huai tengteng a tunkim masiah tulai khang a mangkei ding.
Lei leh van a mang dia, ka thu ahihleh a mang kei ding hi.
“Himahleh, huai ni leh hun thu Pa kia loungal kuamah in, van a angelte’n leng, Tapa in leng, a theikei uh,
Noah damlai bang in Mihing Tapa hong painawnna ah ahi ding.
Huai ni, tuichim tunma in, Noah long a a lut ni tan in, a ne un a dawn ua, zi leh pasal in a kinei ua;
Tuichim a hongtung a, avek ua a lakmang masiah bangmah a theikei uh; Mihing Tapa hongpai nawnna huchi mah bang ahi ding.
Huai hun chiang in lou ah mi nih a om ding ua; khat paimangpih in a om dia, khat nutsiat in a om ding.
Numei nih buh gawinelna ah buh gawinel in a om ding ua, khat paimangpih in a om dia, khat nutsiat in a om ding hi.
Huaiziak in kiging un, bang ni’n ahia na Toupa uh a hongpai ding na theihlouh ziak un.
Himahleh, hiai thei un, guta a hongpai hunding inn neitu in thei leh, a veng dia, a inn a phenvangsak kei ding hi.
Huaiziak in nou leng kiging gige in om un, na ginlouh dak ua Mihing Tapa a hongpai ding ziak in.
“Sikha muanhuai, piltak, a pu’n a hunteng a a tanding uh hawmsak ding a a inkuanpihte tung a heutu dia a koih, kuapen ahi dia le?
A pu a hongpai chiang a sikha huchibang hih a a muhpen a hampha ding hi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, a neih tengteng tung ah heutu di’n a koih ding.
Himahleh sikha gilou in, a lungtang in, ka pu a hong zok kei ding, chi in,
A sikha hihpihte na vua henla, nekham takhamte kiang ah ne in dawnta leh:
Huai sikha pu a gintak louh ni’n, a theihlouh lai in, a hongpai ding a,
Tum nih a suah ding a, mi lepchiahte tan bangbang a tangsak ding; huai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding hi.
“Huai hun chiang in van gam tuh nungak siangthou sawm, a khawnvak uh tawi a mouneipa dawn ding a pawtte toh teh ahi ding hi.
Huchi in a lak ua nga a hai ua, nga a pil uhi.
A haite’n a khawnvak uh a tawi ua, a tui a tawikei uhi.
A pilte’n bel a khawnvakte uh a tawi in, a um ah a tui leng a tawi uhi.
Huan mouneipa a hong zekai ziak in avek un a lusu ua, a na ihmuta uhi.
Ngai dih uh! zanlai in, ‘mouneipa a hong e: a dawn ding in hongpawt un’: chi in, kikou ging a hong omta hi.
Huaitak in nungak siangthoute a thouvek ua, a khawnvakte uh a hahsiang uhi.
Huan, a haite’n, a pilte kiang ah, na khawnvaktui uh hon pesam un; ka khawnvak uh mit ding in a kisa, a chi uhi.
Himahleh, a pilte’n, kou leh nou ading in a kiching kei ding; a zuakte kiang ah pai unla, lei zaw un, chi in, a dawng uhi.
Huan, lei ding a a paimang kal un mouneipa a hongtungta a; huchi in, a mansate amah toh kitenna Ankuang um ding in a lut ua; huan, kongkhak a khakta uhi.
Huai nung in nungak siangthou dangte leng a hongtung ua, “Toupa, Toupa, hon hon in” a chi uhi:
Himahleh aman, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, k’on thei ngeikei, chi in a dawng hi.
Huaiziak in, kiging un, a ni leh a hun na theihlouh ziak un.
“Van gam tuh mi gamdang a pai dia kisa, a sikhate sam a, a sumte a kiang ua kemsak bang ahi.
Sikha khat kiang ah talent nga a pia a, sikha dang kiang ah talent nih a pia a, sikha dang kiang ah talent khat a pia a; a hihtheih hun ding dan chiat ua pia in a paita hi.
Talent nga mupa huai in a va sumsin paha, talent nga dang a mukheta hi,
Huchi mah bang in talent nih mupa’n leng talent nih dang a mukhia hi.
Talent khat mupa bel a vakuan a, lei a tou a, a pu dangka a phumgu zawta hi.
“Hun sawtpi nung in huai sikhate pu amau toh a sum tungtang hihfel ding in a hongpai ta hi.
Talent nga mupa a hongpai a, talent nga dang a hontawi a, ‘Pu, nang talent nga n’on kemsak a; en dih, talent nga dang ka mukhia,’ a chi hi.
A pu’n a kiang ah, sikha hoih leh muanhuai, na hihhoih hi, tawmchik tung ah na muanhuai a, tampi tung ah k’on omsak ding; na pu kipahna ah lut in, a chi hi.
“Talent nih mupa leng a hongpai a, ‘Pu, nang talent nih n’on kemsak a; en dih, talent nih dang ka mukhia,’ a chi hi.
A pu’n a kiang ah, ‘Sikha hoih leh muanhuai, na hihhoih e, tawmchik tung ah na muanhuai a, tampi tung ah k’on omsak ding; na pu kipahna ah lut in,’ a chi hi.
“Huan talent khat mupa leng a hongpai a, ‘Pu, mi chihhakpi na hi chih k’on thei a; na tuhlouhna ah leng na at a, na thehlouhna ah leng na khawm hi;
Huaiziak in ka lau a, ka vapai a, na talent lei ah ka selgu a; en in, nang a ngei na mu nawn hi,’ a chi hi.
“A pu’n a kiang ah, ‘Sikha gilou leh zongzaw, ka tuhlouhna a ka at a, ka thehlouhna ah leng ka khawm chih na thei maw?
Huchi ahihngal leh ka dangka sumsinte kiang a na koih ding hi a, huchi a ka hongpai a kei a a pung toh ka muhnawn ding ahi.
Huaiziak in a talent khat laksak unla, talent sawm neipa kiang ah pia un.
Kuapeuh a nei piak behlap ahi ding a, a honghau ding; kuapeuh a neilou a neihsun nangawn laksak ahi ding hi.
Huan sikha phatuamlou pawlam mial ah paikhia un, huai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding,’ chi in, a dawng hi.
“Himahleh, Mihing Tapa, a angelte tengteng toh, a thupina a kivan a a hongpai hun chiang in, a thupina mangtutphah ah a tu ding hi.
A ma ah namchih a kikhawm ding ua; belamchingpa’n kel lak apan belamte a khenkhia bang in amaute a khenkhe ding hi.
Belamte a taklam ah a koih ding a, kelte a veilam ah a koih ding hi.
Huai hun chiang in Kumpipa’n a taklam a mite kiang ah, ‘Ka Pa deihsakte aw, hongpai un, khovel siamchil apan nou adia gam bawlsa luah un.
Ka gil a kial in, nekding n’on pia ua; ka dang a tak in, dawn ding n’on pia uh; mikhual ka hih in n’on zintun ua;
Vuaktang ka hih in, puan n’on silhsak uh; ka chi a nat in, ka kiang a na hong ziak un,’ a chi ding hi.
“Huai hun chiang in, mi diktatte’n, Toupa, chik in ahia gilkial a k’on muh ua nekding k’on piak uh? Dangtak a k’on muh ua, dawn ding k’on piak uh?
Chik in ahia mikhual a k’on muh ua, k’on zintun ua, vuaktang a k’on muh ua, puan k’on silhsak uh?
Chik in ahia china in hiam suangkulh ah hiam k’on muh ua, na kiang a ka hong uh? chi in, a dong ding uhi.
Kumpipa’n amaute kiang ah, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, ‘hiai ka unau neupente lak a mi khat tung a na hih uh ka tung a hih na hi uh’ chi in, a dawng ding hi.
“Huaikhit in, a veilam a mite kiang ah leng, ‘Hamsia thuakte aw, tangtawn mei Diabol leh a sawltakte dia mun bawl ah hon paimang san un;
Ka gil a kial in, nekding n’on pekei ua; ka dang a tak in, dawn ding n’on pekei ua;
Mikhual ka hih in, n’on zintun kei uh; vuaktang ka hih in, puan n’on silhsak kei ua; china leh suangkulh a ka om in, n’on veh louh ziak un’ a chi ding hi.
“Huai hun chiang in amau leng, Toupa, chik in ahia gilkial hiam, vuaktang hiam, china hiam, suangkulh ah hiam k’on muh ua, na nna k’on sepsaklouh uh? chi in a dong ding uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, ‘hiai mi neupente lak a mi khat tung a na hihlouh uh ka tung a hihlou na hi uh’ chi in, a dawng ding hi.
Huan huaite tangtawn gawtna ah a pai ding ua; mi diktatte bel tangtawn hinna ah a pai ding uhi” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu’n huai thu tengteng a genkhit in, a nungzuite kiang ah,
“Ni nih nungchiang in Paikan Ankuangluina a hongom ding chih na thei ua, Mihing Tapa kilhden ding in a mansak ding uh” a chi hi.
Huailai in siampu lianpen Kaiapha a chih uh huangsung ah siampu liante leh vantang upate a kikhawm uhi.
Jesu zekhem a mat a, a hihlup theihna ding un a kikum uhi.
Himahleh, “Ankuanglui sung in hikeileh huchilou in zaw vantang lak ah buaina a hongpiang khading” a chi uhi.
Bethani khua a, phak Simon inn a Jesu a omlai in,
Numei khat alabaster bawm a thau gimlim mantam tawi in, a kiang ah a hongpai a, an a umlai in a lu ah a sungbua hi.
Himahleh nungzuite’n huai a muh un a heh ua, “Bangdia hichibang a hih mangthang mawkmawk ahia?
Hiai thau mantam tampi a zuak a, mizawngte kiang a piak theih ahi ngal a” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n huai a theih in, a kiang uah, “Numei bangdia hihbuai na hi ua? Ka tung ah thil hoihtak a hih ahi.
Mizawngte tangtawn in na kiang uah a om uh a kei hiam, kei bel tangtawn a na kiang ua om ka hi kei hi.
Hiai thau gimlim ka sa a a sun, vui ding a honbawl ding in a hih ahi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, khovel tengteng ah koi ah leng hiai Tanchinhoih a genna peuh uah hiai numei thilhih leng amah theihgigena ding in a genzel ding uh” a chi hi.
Huai nung in sawmlehnihte lak a mi khat, Judas Iskariot a chih uh, siampu liante kiang ah a hoh a:
Amah, “Hon mansak le’ng, bang n’on peding ua?” a chi hi. Huchi in dangka sawmthum a buksakta uhi.
Huai nung matsakna ding hunlem a zongta hi.
Huan tanghou silngou sohlouh ni, ni masapen in nungzuite Jesu kiang ah a hong ua, “Paikan Ankuanglui nekna ding koilai ah hon bawlsak le ung na ut a?” a chi uhi.
Aman “Khopi ah kuahiam kiang ah hoh unla, a kiang ah, ‘Sinsakpa’n, ka hun a naita a; nungzuite toh Paikan Ankuang na inn ah ka um ding uh e’ a chi, vachi un” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ua a chih bang in nungzuite’n a hih ua; Paikan Ankuang a bawlta uhi.
Huai ni nitaklam in, nungzui sawmlehnihte toh an a um uhi.
An a neklai un, aman, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, na lak ua mi khat in kei a hon mansak ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a lungkham mahmah ua, a kiang ah, “Toupa, kei ka hi maw?” a chi chiat uhi.
Aman, “Ankuang hon sawkpihpa ngei in kei hon zuausan in hon mansak ding a chi hi.
Mihing Tapa tanchin a gelh bang un a pai ding hi. Himahleh, Mihing Tapa mansak dingpa tung a gik hi: huai mipa zaw piang keileh amah ading in a hoihzaw ding” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan a mansak dingpa Judas in a dong a, “Heutupa, keimah ka hi maw?” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah “Hi e” a chi hi.
Huan an a neklai un Jesu’n tanghou a la a, a vualzawl a, a balkham a; nungzuite kiang ah a pia a, “La unla, ne un; hiai ka sapum ahi” a chi hi.
Huaizoh in nou leng a la a, kipahthu a gen a, a kiang uah a pia a, “Na vek un dawn un;
Hiai ka sisan a thukhun thak, khelhnate ngaihdamna dia mi tampi dia pawt ding ahi.
Himahleh k’on hilh ahi, ka Pa gam a nou toh a thak ka dawn ni a tun masiah tuban grepgui gahtui ka dawn nawnta kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan la a sakzoh un a pawt ua, Olive tang ah a paita uhi.
Jesu’n amau kiang ah, “Tuzan chiang in na vek un ka tungthu a lungkia in n’on taisan vek ding uh;
‘Belamchingpa ka zep ding a,
belamte a dalh ding uh’ chih gelh bang in.
Himahleh ka thohnawn nung in Galili gam ah na ma uah ka pai ding” a chi hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Avek un na tungthu ah lungkia in om mahle uh kei zaw lungkia in ka omkei hial ding” chi in, a dawng hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, tuzan in ak khuan ma in, nang thumvei n’on kitheihmohbawl ding” a chi hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Na sihna a leng si sam ding himah leng k’on kitheihmohbawl kei hial ding” a chi a. Huchi bangmah in nungzuite’n leng a chi chiat uhi.
Huaizoh in amau toh mun khat Gethsemani a chih uh a tung ua: a nungzuite kiang ah, “Pam a ka vathum kal in hiai ah na tu un” a chi hi.
Peter leh Zebedai tapate nih a pi a, a lungkham in a hong mangbang mahmahta hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Ka kha a lungkham mahmah a, sihna khop hial ahi; hiai ah om unla, hon venpih un” a chi hi.
Neukha in malam ah a vapaizek a, khupboh in, “Ka Pa aw, a hih theihleh hiai nou in honpel mahmah hen; himahleh keimah thu hilou in, nangmah thuthu hizaw hen” chi in, a thum hi.
Huan nungzuite kiang ah a hongpai a, amau ihmu in a hong mu hi, Peter kiang ah, “Nou dakkal khat lel leng hon hahpih zoulou na hi umaw?
Khemna a na lut louhna ding un kiging gige in thum un; kha in zaw a ngap a, sa bel a hatkei” a chi hi.
Nihveina ah a vapai a, a thumnawn a, “Ka Pa aw, ka dawnlouh a hiai nou in a honpelh theihkei leh, nangmah thuthu hi hen” a chi hi.
A hongpai nawn a, amau ihmu in a hongmu nawn hi, a ihmut uh a suak mahmah hi.
Huan, a paisan nawn a, a thumveina ah a gen ngei gen in a thum nawn hi.
Huaikhit in nungzuite kiang ah a hongpai nawn a, a kiang uah, “Na ihmu lailai umaw, na tawlnga lailai umaw? Ngai dih uh, a hun a hongtungta, Mihing Tapa mikhialte khut ah khotkhit ahita.
Thou unla, pai ni, en dih uh, a hon mansak dingpa a hong naita hi” a chi hi.
Huan, a genlai mah in Judas, sawmlehnihte lak a mi khat, siampu liante leh laigelhmite leh upate kiang a kipan mipi thupitak leh namsau leh khetbukte toh a hongtungta hi.
A mansak dingpa’n chiamtehna ding a hilhkhol sipsip a, “Ka tawp penpen amah na man ding uh” chi in.
Huchi in Jesu a vanaih a, “Chibai, Heutupa, chi in, a tawp tonton hi.”
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Lawm, na hong nasan hih in” a chi hi. Huaitak in, Jesu a len ua, a manta uhi.
Huan ngai dih, Jesu ompihte lak a khat in a khut in a sawk a, a namsau a dok a, siampu lianpen sikha a ban a, a bil a ban khiaksak hi.
Himahleh Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Na namsau a koihna ah koih nawn in, namsau pan peuhmah namsau mah a a sih ding ziak in.
Ka Pa ngen leng angel sang guk mun sawmlehnih hon sawlpah ding; ngen theilou in n’on ngaihtuah ua hia?
Himahleh, ngen leng, bangchi’n ahia Laisiangthou in hichibang a hongom ding a chihte a tangtun theih ding?” a chi hi.
Huailai tak in Jesu’n mipite kiang ah, “Namsaute, khetbukte tawi in suamhat man ding bang in kei man ding a hongpawt na hi umaw? Pathian biakin ah niteng in thuhilh in ka tu a, n’on man ngalkei uhi.
Himahleh zawlnei Laisiangthou thute a tunkimna dia hiai tengteng hongtungta eive” a chi hi. Huchi in nungzui tengteng in amah a nusia ua, a taimangta uhi.
Jesu mante’n siampu lianpen Kaiapha inn a, laigelhmite leh upate omkhawmna ah amah a pita uhi.
Himahleh Peter in gamla tak ah siampu lianpen huangsung tan in amah a zui hi, huan a valut a, a tawpna tan thei ding in sikhate lak ah a vatu hi.
Amah hihlup theihna ding un siampu liante leh vaihawmte tengteng in Jesu hekna ding a zong uhi.
Theihpih zuau tampi hongpai mahle uh ngohna ding a mu theikei uhi. A denchiang in mi nih a hongpai uhi.
Hiai mipa’n, “Pathian biakin hihsia a, ni thum sung a lamnawn thei ka hi” a chi, a chi uhi.
Huchi in, siampu lianpen a dingtou a, a kiang ah, “Bangmah a dawnglou ding maw? Hiaite hon hekna bangchidan ahia?” a chi hi.
Jesu bel a daidide hi. Huan siampu lianpen in a kiang ah, “Pathian hing min in k’on ngen ahi, Khrist, Pathian Tapa na hi hia? Honhilh in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Hi e, himahleh, k’on hilh ahi, tunung chiang in Mihing Tapa thilhihtheihna taklam a tu a, van meitung a hongpai na mu ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan siampu lianpen in a puansilh a botkek a, “Pathian a genseta; theihpih dang bangdi’n i kiphamoh nawn dia? Ngai dih uh, Pathian a gensiat dan tuin na za uh. Bangchi nasa ua?” a chi hi.
Amau “Sitak ahi” chi in, a dawng uhi.
Huan a mai ah chil a sia ua, a tum ua; khenkhat in a khutpek ua beng in,
“Nang Khrist, kua ahia hontum honhilh in?” a chi uhi.
Peter pawlam huangsung ah a tu a: nungak nou khat a kiang ah a hongpai a, “Nang leng Galili gam a mi, Jesu kiang a om na hi ve” a chi hi.
Aman bel, “Na thugen ka theikei” chi in, avek ua ma ah a kitheihmohbawl hi.
Huan inlim a a pawttak in nungak dang in amah a mu a, huai a omte kiang ah, “Hiai mi Nazaret Jesu kiang a ompa ahi” a chi hi.
Peter kichiam in “Huai mihing zaw ka theikei” chi in, kitheihmohbawl nawn hi.
Huan sawtlou nung in, a kiang a dingte’n, Peter kiang ah, “Nang leng a lak ua mi na hi vaw oi, na pau ah a kithei hi” a chi uhi.
Aman bel huai mihing zaw ka theikei, chi in, hamsia kiloh in a kichiamta hi. Huchi in ak a khuang pahta hi.
Huan Peter in, “Jesu’n ak a khuan ma in nang thumvei n’on kitheihmohbawl ding” chi a a kiang a a thugen a phawkkhia a, a pawtkhia a, a kap huphup hi.
Huan zingsang a hong hih in siampu liante leh vantang upate tengteng Jesu that ding in a tungthu ah a kihou uhi.
Amah a hen ua, a pi ua, gam ukpa Pilat kiang ah a pi uhi.
Huan Judas a mansakpa’n Jesu siamlouh a tangsak uh chih a theih tak in a kisik a, dangka sawmthum siampu liante leh upate kiang ah a hontawi nawn hi.
“Midik sisan ka khot thil ka hihkhial hi” a chi hi. Amau, “Huai kou a ding in bang a khawk dia? Nang na lohloh loh in” a chihsan uhi.
Aman huai dangka Mun Siangthou ah a pailut a, paimang in a awklumta hi.
Huan siampu liante’n huai dangka a la ua, “Hiai thohlawm bawm a koih a siangkei, sisan man ahi” a chi uhi.
Huchi in a kihou ua, mikhualte vuina ding in belvelmi mun a leita uhi.
Huaiziak in huai mun tutan in ‘Sisan mun’ a chi uhi.
Huan zawlnei Jeremiah in a na gen, “Amah man ding a Israel tate lak a kuate hiam in a sak uh dangka sawmthum a lata uhi;
Toupa’n honhilh bang in belvelmi mun man ding in a pia ua” chih a hong tangtungta hi.
Huan gamukpa ma ah Jesu a ding hi. Gamukpa’n, “Judate kumpipa na hi hia?” chi in, a dong hi. Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Hi e” a chi hi.
Siampu liante leh upate’n a heklai un bangmah in a dawngkei hi.
Huchi in, Pilat in a kiang ah, “A hon hekna zouzai uh na za ka hia?” a chi hi.
Aman kamkhat lel in leng a dawng kei hi; huchi in gamukpa’n lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Huan gamukpa’n ankuangluini’n henta khat, a deihdeih uh, mipite ading in a pawtsak zel hi.
Huailai in henta minthang, Barabba a chih uh a om hi.
Huchi in, a hong kikhop un, Pilat in a kiang uah, “Kua zaw hon pawtsak leng na ut ua? Barabba hia, Jesu Khrist kichi?” a chi hi.
Hazat ziak in amah a mansak uh chih a thei hi.
Vaihawmna tutphah a a tutlai in, a zi in, “Hiai midik tung ah bangmah hih ken, tuni’n amah ziak in ka mang in thil tampi ka thuak hi” chi’n a thukhak hi.
Huan siampu liante leh upate’n, Barabba nget a Jesu hih manthat ding in, mipite a thuzoh uhi.
Gamukpa’n amau a houpih a, “Amau nihte a kua zaw hon pawtsak leng chi na hi ua?” a chi nawn hi.
Amaute’n, “Barabba” a chi uhi. Pilat in a kiang uah, “Jesu Khrist kichi, bang ka chihta dia le?” a chi hi. Avek un, “Amah zaw Kros ah kilhden in om hen” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Bang di’n maw? Bang a hihkhial a ahia?” a chi hi. Himahleh amau, “Kros ah kilhden in” chi in, a kikou vengvung uhi.

Huchi in, Pilat in bangmah a hih theikei a, a hong buai deuhdeuh zaw ding chih a theih in, tui a la a, mipite ma ah a khut a sil a, “Hiai midik sisan ah ka siang e; noumau na lohloh un loh un” a chi hi.
Huan mipi tengteng in, “A sisan zaw koumau tung ah leh ka tate uh tung ah om hen” chi in a dawng uhi.
Huaikhit in Barabba a pawtsak a; Jesu a zep a, Kros a kilhden ding in a peta hi.
Huaikhit in, gamukpa’ sepaihte’n Jesu Inpi ah a pilut ua, a pawl ua mi tengteng a kiang ah a hong kikhawm uhi.
A puante suahsak in, puan sandup a silhsak uhi.
Linglukhu a phan ua, a khusak ua, a khut taklam in sialluang a tawisak ua; a ma ah a khukdin ua “Chibai, Judate kumpipa” chi in nuihza bawlna’n a nei uhi.
Huan amah a chilsiat ua, sialluang laksak in, a lu a khen uhi.
Nuihza bawlna dia a neihkhit un, puan a suahsak ua, amah puante a silhsak nawn ua, Kros a kilhden ding in a pita uhi.
Huan, a paikhiak lai un, Kurini khua a mi, a min Simon a mu ua; huai mi a Kros paw ding in a man uhi.
Golgotha mun a hongtun un, huai tuh Luguh mun chihna ahi.
Uain thuk, thilkha toh hel, dawn ding in a pia ua, himahleh a cheptak in a dawn nuam kei hi.
Kros a a kilhden khit un, aisan in a puansilh a kihawm uhi.
Huan huai ah a tu ua a vengta uhi.
A hekna uh, “HIAI JUDATE KUMPIPA JESU AHI” chi a gelh, a lu tung ah a suang uhi.
Amah toh, suamhat nih, a taklam ah khat a veilam ah khat a kilhden uhi.
Huan mi vialvak peuh in a enghou ua, a lu uh sinkhum uhi,
“Nang Pathian biakin hihsia a ni thum a lam nawnpa, kihihdam in; Pathian Tapa na hihleh Kros a kipan hong kumsuk tanla” chi in.
Huchi mah bang in siampu liante’n, laigelhmite toh, enghou in,
“Mi dangte hondampa, amah leh amah kihondam theilou pi in. Israelte kumpipa a hihngal leh tuin Kros a kipan hongkum leh a kei dia, huchi in amah i gingta mai ding.
Pathian a muangna a ka, amah zaw a ut leh tuin hondam leh ake; Pathian Tapa ka hi, a chi ngal a” a chi uhi.
Suamhat a kilhden un leng, huchi mah bang in a enghou hi.
Huan dak gukna a kipan dak kua na tan in khua a hong mialvekta hi.
Dak kuan a ding in, Jesu aw ngaihtak in, “Eloi, Eloi, lam a sabakthani?” chi in, a ki koukhia a, huai, “Ka Pathian, ka Pathian bangdia hon paisan?” chihna ahi.
A kiang a ding khenkhatte’n huai a zak un, “Hiai mi’n Elijah sam ahi” a chi uhi.
A lak ua mi khat kintak in a taipah a, spanji a la a, uain thuk ah a diahdim a, chiang ah a suang a, a dawnsak tou hi.
Midangte’n, “Ngaihsak kei un, amah lakhe ding in Elijah a hong hiam i en ding” a chi uhi.
Jesu ngaihtak in a kikou nawn a, a kha a khahta hi.
Huan ngai dih, Pathian biakin puanzak a tunglam a kipan a nuailam tan in hong keksuakta a; zin a hongling a, suangpite khangkham in; hante a hong kihong hi.
Misiangthou ihmusate sapum tampi leng kaihthoh in a omta uhi;
Huaite a thohnawn nung in, han apat hongpawt in khaw siangthou ah a lut ua, mi tampi lak ah a kilakta uhi.
Huan sepaih zaheutu leh a kiang a Jesu veng a omsamte’n, zinling leh thil omdante a muh un a lau mahmah ua, “Hiai mi Pathian Tapa ahi ngeingei” a chi uhi.
Huai ah, numei tampi, a nna sepsak kawm zel a Galili gam a kipan a honzuite a om ua, gamlapi ah a en uhi.
Huaite lak ah Mari Magdalini, Mari Jakob leh Joseph nu, Zebedai tapate nute a om uhi.
Huan nitaklam a hong hih in, mihausa, a min Joseph Arimathai khua mi, a hongpai a, amah leng Jesu nungzui ahi sam hi.
Huai mi Pilat kiang ah a vahoh a, Jesu luang a ngen hi. Pilat in piak ding in thu a pia hi.
Huchi in Joseph in a luang a la a, puanmalngat siangtak in a tuam hi.
A han thak, suang khuakkuak ah a sial hi; han kongkhak ah suang lianpi in a delh a, a paita hi.
Huan huai ah Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang a om ua, han ma zawn ah a tu uhi.
Huan a zing in huai tuh Kiginni zing ahi, siampu liante leh Pharisaite Pilat kiang ah a omkhawm kheukhou uhi.
“Pu, huai mi khemhat in, a damlai in, ni thum nung in ka thounawn ding, a chih ka theigige uhi.

Huchi in han ni thum ni tan a venghoih ding in thupia in; huchilou in zaw a nungzuite’n amah a va gukhe ding ua, vantang kiang ah, misi lak a kipan a thounawnta ahi, a chi kha ding uh; huchi in khemna nanung zaw amasa sang in a hoihkei zawsem ding” a chi uhi.
Pilat in a kiang uah, “Vengmi sepaihte na nei ve ua oi; pai unla, na hihtheih bang un veng hoihsak ta unla” a chi hi.
Huchi in vengmi sepaihte toh a vahoh ua, han a veng hoihsak ua, hansuang a chiamteh uhi.
Huan khawlni a bei in, ni sagihni masapen ding a phalvak in, Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang han ending in a kuan uhi.
Ngai dih, nakpitak in zin a hongling a; Toupa angel van a kipan a hongsuk a, suang a hong khukkhia a, a tung ah a tuta hi.
A mel omdan khophia bang ahi a, a puansilhte tuh vuk bang in a ngou hi;
Amah a kihtak ziak un vengmite a ling ua, misi bang in a hong omta uhi.
Angel in numeite a houpih a, a kiang uah, “Nou zaw lau kei un: Jesu, a kilhden uh na zong uh chih ka thei:
Hiai ah a omta kei; a gen bang ngei in a thounawnta, a lupna mun en un, a chi uhi.
Paimeng unla, nungzuite kiang ah, ‘misi lak a kipan a thounawnta hi; ngai dih uh, Galili gam ah na ma uah a pai; huai ah amah na mu ding uh’ chi in, hilh un. Ngai dih uh, k’on hilhta ahi” a chi hi.
Huan lau leh kipak mahmah kawm in, han a kipan a pai mengmeng ua, a nungzuite hilh ding in a taita uhi.
Huan ngai dih, Jesu’n amau a tuak a, “Chibai aw,” a chi hi. Huchi in, amau a khepek a len ua, a bia uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Lau kei unla, paita un, Galili gam a pai ding in ka unaute va hilh un; huai ah n’on mu ding uh” a chi chi in.
Huan a pailai un vengmi sepaih khenkhat khopi ah a va lut ua, thil omdan tengteng siampu liante kiang ah a va hilh uhi.
Upate toh a kikhawm ua, a kihou zoh un, sepaihte kiang ah dangka tampi a pia uhi,
“Zan a, ka ihmut kal un, a nungzuite a hongpai ua, amah a guta uh, chi unla,
gamukpa’n huai a na zak leh amah leng i khem ding ua lunghimawh lou ding in i bawl na ke,” a chi uhi.
Huchi in dangka a la ua, a hilh bang un a hihta ua; huchi in, tutan in huai thu Judate lak ah a genthang lai uhi.
Himahleh nungzui sawmlehkhatte Galili gam ah, Jesu’n tang a sehsak ah a hoh uhi,
Amah a muh un a bia ua; khenkhat in a ginglah uhi.
Huchi in, Jesu a kiang uah a hongpai a, amau a houpih a, “Lei leh van a thuneihna tengteng ka kiang a piak ahita.
Huaiziak in, kuan unla, namchih apan nungzuite bawl unla, Pa, Tapa, leh Kha Siangthou min in baptist unla,
Thu k’on piak tengteng zui ding in thuhilh un. Ngai un, kei tangtawn in, khovel tawppha in leng, na kiang uah ka om ding hi” a chi hi.
Pathian Tapa, Jesu Khrist Tanchinhoih kipat tungna.
Zawlneite a gelh a hih bang in,
“Ngai dih, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, aman na lampi a bawlkhol ding;
Gamdai a kikoupa aw in,
Toupa lamlian sial unla,
a lampite hihtang un” chi a a gelh bang in.
Johan in gamdai ah a baptist a, khelhnate ngaihdamna ding a kisikna baptisma thugen in, a hongpawt hi.
Judia gam a mi tengteng leh Jerusalem khua a mi tengteng a pawt ua, a kiang ah a pai ua, a khelhnate uh thupha tawi in Jordan lui ah, amaute a baptist zel hi.
Johan sangawngsau mulpuan in a kivan a, a kawng savun kawnggak a gak a, a an khaukhup leh khuaizu ahi.
“Ka nung ah kei sang a thupizaw a hong pailel ahi; kuna a khedap khau pheltak leng ka hi kei,” a chi hi.
Ken tui in nou k’on baptist a; aman zaw Kha Siangthou in a hon baptist ding” chi in a gen hi.
Huai nite in hichi a honghi a, Jesu Galili gam a Nazaret khua a kipan a hongpai a, Jordan lui ah Johan in a na baptist hi.
Tui apan a hong pawttak in, van kihong leh kha vakhu bang a a tung a hongkum a mu hi.
Huan van a kipan aw a hongpawt in, “Nang ka Tapa deihtak na hi a, na tung ah ka kipak mahmah” a chi hi.
Kha in amah gamdai ah a sawlpah hi.
Huchi in, Setan khem in gamdai ah ni sawmli a om a, gamsa lak ah a om a; angelte’n a nna a sepsak uhi.
Johan mat a a om nung in, Jesu, Pathian lalgam Tanchinhoih gen in, Galili gam ah a hong paita hi.
“A hun a hongtungta a, Pathian gam a hong naita; kisik unla Tanchinhoih gingta un” chi in.
Galili dilgei a nawklai in Simon leh Simon unaupa Andru dil ah lenpai in a mu a; ngamanmi ahi him uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Honzui un, huchi in mihing man din k’on bawl ding” a chi hi.
A len uh paisan in amah a zuipah uhi.
Saulou a pai leh Zebedai tapa Jakob leh a unaupa Johan a mu a, huaite len bawlpha in long ah a om uhi.
Huan aman amau a sampah a; a pa uh Zebedai leh kilohmi a goihte utoh long nusia in a zuita uhi.
Huan Kapernaum khua ah a valut ua; khawlni’n kikhopnain ah a lut a, thu a hilh hi.
laigelhmite banglou a, thuneitak a amau thu a hilh ziak in a thuhilh lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
A kikhopnain uah dawininpai mi khat a na om a; aman:
“Nazaret Jesu, kou leh nang bang ahia i kizolhna om? Kou hon hihmang dia hongpai na hi maw? Nang k’on thei a, Pathian Misiangthou na hi” chi in, a kikou khia hi.
Jesu’n a tai a, “Dai inla, asung a kipan hongpawt in” a chi hi.
Dawinin in amah a engbawl a ngaihtak a kikou in asung a kipan a hongpawtta hi.
Huan avek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, huchi in, hiai bang ahia le! Sinsakna thak ahi ve! Dawininte nangawn thuneitak in thu a pia a, a thu a mang zel uh, chi in, a kihou uhi.
Huan Galili leh a kim gam tengteng ah a tanchin a thangta hi.
Huan kikhopnain a kipan a pawt un, Jakob leh Johan toh Simon leh Andru inn ah a lutpah uhi.
Huan Simon sungnu, khosik in a chi a na a, a na lum a; huchi in, a omdan Jesu a hilh pah uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a khut a len in, a phong a; huchi in khosik in a nuseta a, a na uh a sepsak hi.
Huan nitaklam a nitum nung in, damlou tengteng leh dawimatte a kiang ah a honpi uhi.
A khomi tengteng kongkhak bul ah a hong omkhawm khiukheu uhi.
Huan mi tampi natna chiteng a nate a hihdam a, dawi tampi a delhkhia a; dawite’n amah a theih ziak un a pau uh a phalkei hi.
Huan zingsang khovak ma tham in a thou a, a pawt a, gamdai mun ah a hoh a, huai ah a thum hi.
Simon leh a lawmte’n a nung ah a zui uhi.
Amah a vamuh un a kiang ah, “Mi tengteng in a hong zong uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Maban khuate ah paini huai a leng thu ka gen theihna ding in; huai mah ka hong pawtsan ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in thuhilh a dawite delhkhe kawm in Galili gam tengteng a a kikhopnainte uah a lut hi.
Huan a kiang ah phak a hongpai a, “Na utleh n’on hihsiangthou thei” chi in a ma ah khukdin in a ngen ngutngut hi.
Aman a hehpih mahmah a, a sawka, a khoih a, “Ka ut hi, na siangthouta in” a chi hi.
Huchi in, phakna in amah a nuse paha, a hong siangthouta hi.
Jesu’n amah a kham bikbek kawm in a sawlkhe pah hi.
“Kuamah kiang a bangmah genlou ding in pilvang in; himahleh siampu kiang ah vakilak inla, na kisiansakna ding in Mosi thilsehte lan in, mite’n a hon theihchetna ding un” a chi hi.

Himahleh amah a pawt a, huai thu nakpitak a kikoupih in a thangzakta hi; huchi in Jesu a langtang in khua ah a lutthei nawnta kei a, gamdai mun ah a om zawta hi; huan munteng a kipan a mite a kiang ah a hongpai uhi.
Huan ni bangzah hiam nung in Kapernaum khua a a honglut nawn leh, inn ah a om chih thu a hongthang hi.
Huchi in kongkhak kim a omna ding omlou khop in mi tampi a hong kikhawm ua, a kiang uah thu a gen hi.
Mizaw khat, mi li zawn, a kiang ah a honpi uhi.
Mipi ziak a a kiang nai a a hongpai theihlouh ziak un a omna intung a laihong ua; huaikhit in a lupna leh atunga mizaw lumkawm in a khai khesuk uhi.
Huchi in Jesu’n a ginna uh a muh in, mizaw kiang ah, “Ka tapa, na khelhnate ngaihdam ahita” a chi hi.
Laigelhmi khenkhat huai mun ah a tu uhi.
“Hiai min bangdia hichibang thugen ahia? Pathian a gensia hi; mi khat, Pathian kia loungal, kuan ahia khelhnate ngaidam thei?” chi in, a lungtang un a ngaihtuah uhi.
Huan Jesu’n, a lungtang un huchibang a ngaihtuah uh chih a lungsim in a theipaha, a kiang uah, “Huai thu bangdia na lungtang ua ngaihtuah na hi ua?
Mizaw kiang a, ‘Na khelhnate ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh ‘na lupna la inla, khe in paita in,’ chih a koi ahia a gen nuamzaw?
Himahleh leitung ah Mihing Tapa in khelhnate ngaihdam theihna a nei chih na theihna ding un” ahi, mizaw kiang ah:
“Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn ah pai in, k’on chi” a chi hi.
Huchi in amah a thou a, a lupna a lapah in, avek ua mitmuh in a paita hi; huchi in avek un lamdang a sa mahmah uh, hichibang himhim i mu ngeikei, chi in, Pathian a phat uhi.
Huan a pawt nawn a dilgei ah a paita hi, mipi tengteng a kiang ah a vapai ua, aman thu a na hilh hi.
A paikawm in, Levi, Alphai tapa, siahpiakna mun a tu a mu a, a kiang ah, “Honzuiin” a chi hi. A thou a a zuita hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu’n Levi inn ah an a um a, siahkhawnmite leh mikhialte tampi in Jesu leh a nungzuite a umpih uhi, amah zuite tampi ahi uhi.
Pharisaite leh laigelhmite’n Jesu’n mikhialte leh siahkhawnmite kiang a a nek a muh un, a nungzuite kiang ah, “Bangchidan ahia siahkhawnmite leh mikhialte kiang a a nek a a dawn?” a chi uhi.

Jesu’n huai a za a, a kiang uah, “Mi chidamte’n daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, midamloute’n a kiphamoh zaw uhi; mi diktatte sam ding a hongpai ka hi kei a, mikhialte sam ding a hongpai ka hi zaw” a chi hi.

Huan Johan nungzuite leh Pharisaite’n an a ngawl zel uhi. Amau a hongpai ua, Jesu kiang ah, “Bangdia Johan nungzuite leh Pharisaite nungzuite’n anngawl ua, nang nungzuite’n a ngolh samlouh uh?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Moupite kiang a a pasal a omlai teng mou pite’n an a ngawl thei ua hia? A pasal ding a kiang ua a omlai teng a ngawl theikei ding uhi.
Himahleh a pasal a kiang ua kipan pimang nite a hongtung ding a, huai ni chiang in zaw a ngawl ding uhi.
Kuamah in puan lui puan tuikhai nailouh them in a thuap ngeikei uh; thuap le uh, thuap bit a sawmna lam uah a kai kek ding a, a thak in a lui a kai kek ding a, a hong kek semsem ding hi.

Huan kuamah in uain thak, savun uain thawl lui ah a thun ngeikei, uain in savun thawl a phukham ding a, uain a bawbei ding hi, savun thawl mah leng; uain thak savun uain thawl thak ah a thun zaw uh” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu khawlni’n buhlei ah a paisuak hi, a nungzuite’n a paikawm un buhvuite a khiak uhi.
Pharisaite’n a kiang ah, “En dih, bangdia khawlni a hihsianglou hih ahi ua?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “David leh a lawmte a taksap ua a gilkial lai ua a thilhih uh na sim kei ua hia?
Abiathar siampu lianpen a hihlai a, Pathian inn a a lut a, siampute kia loungal in a nek sianglouh tanghou koihtuam a nek a, a lawmte kiang a a piaksam thu” a chi hi.
Huan amahmah in, a kiang uah, “Khawlni zaw mihing adia bawl ahi, mihing bel khawlni adia bawl ahi kei hi.
Huchi in Mihing Tapa zaw khawlni tung nangawn a Toupa ahi” a chi hi.
Huan kikhopnain ah a lut nawn a; huai ah khutzaw khat a na om hi.
Amah a hek theihna ding un khawlni a a hihdam nop leh noplouh a enkhia uhi.
Aman khutzaw kiang ah, “Ding khia in” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Khawlni’n hihhoih hia siang, hihsiat? Hotdam hia siang, hihlup?” chi’n a dong hi. Himahleh a daidide uhi.
Huan a lungtang uh tak ziak a lungkham mahmah leh hehkawm a amaute a et velvel nung in, huai mi kiang ah, “Na khutzan in” a chi a, huchi in, a zankheta a a khut a damta hi.
Pharisaite a pawtkhia ua, amah hihlup theihna ding lampi ngaihtuah in Herod pawl a mite toh a kihoukhawm pah uhi.
Jesu a nungzuite toh dil lam ah a paimang ua; Galili gam a kipan mipi tampitak in a zui uhi;
A thilhih thupidan a zak un Judia gam a kipan, Jerusalem khua a kipan, Idumai gam a kipan, Jordan gal a kipan, Tura leh Sidon khokim a kipan in mipi tampitak a kiang ah a hongpai uhi.
Mipi ziak in amah adia long neu mansa a om ding in a nungzuite a hilh hi, huchilou in zaw honum lutlut ding uh, a chi hi.
Mipi tampi a hihdamtak ziak in natna nei peuhmah in amah a khoih theihna ding un a boh huthut uhi.
Dawininte’n leng amah a muh un a ma ah khupboh in, “Nang Pathian Tapa na hi” chi in, a kikou uhi.
Huan a tanchin genthang lou ding in a kiang uah a chi bikbek hi.
Huan tang ah a hohtou a, aman a ngaihngaih a sam a; amau a kiang ah a hohtou uhi.
A kiang a om ding leh thugen dia a sawlkhiak ding in sawmlehnihte a namkip hi.
Natnate hihdam ding leh dawite delhkhe ding in thuneihna a pia hi.
Huai mite, Simon, Peter, a chih pa;
Zebedai tapa, Jakob leh Jakob unau Johan, huai mite Boanerges a chihte; huai omdan tuh vanpiging tapate chihna ahi.
Andru, Philip, Bartholomai, Matthai, Thomas, Alphai tapa Jakob, Thaddai, Kanan mi Simon leh,
a mansakpa, Judas Iskariot ahi uhi.
Huaizoh in, in khat ah a lut uhi. Huai ah mipi tampi a hong ki khawm nawn ua, huchi in an nangawn leng a ne theikei uhi.
Huan a lawmte’n a zak un, “Lungsim buai” chi in amah mat a tum uhi.
Huan Laigelhmi, Jerusalem khua a kipan a hongsukte’n, “Beelzibul a zawl hi, dawite kumpipa ziak in ahi, dawite a delhkhiak” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n laigelhmite a sam a, gentehna in a kiang uah, “Setan in Setan mah bangchi in a delhkhe thei dia?
Gam leng amah a kidou leh, huai gam ading khe theikei ding hi.
Inkuan khat leng amah a kidou uleh, huaite inkuan ading khe theikei ding uhi.
Setan leng amah kidou a, a kilan leh, ading khe theikei ding a, a mangthang zaw ding hi.
Kuamah in mi hatpa a hen masak phot kei leh inn a lut in a sum a laksak theikei uhi, huai nung in bel a inn a lok mai ding uhi.
“Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, mihing tate, a khelhna tengteng uah leh Pathian a gensiatna bang peuh uah leng a gensiatnate uh ngaihdam ahi ding hi.
Kuapeuh Kha Siangthou hilhial gensia zaw chikmah chiang in ngaihdam a hi kei ding a, tangtawn khelhna a siamlouh in a omzaw ding” a chi hi.
Dawinin a zawl ahi, a chih ziak un huai a gen ahi.
Huan a nu leh a unaute a hong ua, inn pua ah ading ua; amah sam di’n mi a sawl uhi.
A kim ah mipi tu diamduam te’n a kiang ah, “Ngai dih, inn pua ah na nu leh na sanggampate’n a hon ngak uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ka nu leh ka samgampate kuate ahi ua?” chi’n a dong hi,
A kiang a tute a en vialvial a, “En un, ka nu leh ka sanggampate;
kuapeuh Pathian deihlam hih photphot ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu leh ka nu ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huan tuipiau ah thu a hilh nawn hi. Mipi tampitak a kiang ah a hong kikhawm ua, huchi in, dil ah long ah a tuang a, a tu a, mipi tengteng tuipiau a leitung ah a om uhi.
Huan gentehna zang in thil tampi a sinsak a, amah sinsakna dan in a kiang uah,
“Ngaikhia unla, en dih ua; buhchithehpa buhchi theh ding in a kuan hi.
Huan hichi a honghi a, a thehlai in a khen lampi sik ah a kia a, vasate’n a nezou uhi.
A khen suangsilei ah a kia a; lei a sah louh ziak in a pou pah hi.
Himahleh ni a hongsuah in haivuai in a hongom a, zung a neih louh ziak in a vuaimang uhi.
A khen loulingnei lak ah a kia a, loupa a hong khang a, buhkungte a depmang a, a gahta kei hi.
A khen lei hoih ah a kia a, a pou a, a khanglian a, a gah a; a leh sawmthum a leh sawmguk leh a leh za in a pung chiat uhi” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Kuapeuh zakna ding bil nei in za hen!” a chi hi.
Huan amah kia a omlai in a kim a omte leh sawmlehnihte’n gentehna thu a dongchian thak uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Pathian gam thuguk zaw noute kiang a piak ahi a, pawlam mite ading in bel bangkim gentehna a gen ahi.
Muh zaw a mu na ua, theih zaw a theisiam kei ding uh, huchilou in zaw a kihei nawn ding ua, ngaihdam a hong hikha ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Hiai gentehna thu na theisiam kei umaw? Huchi a hih in bangchi’n gentehna thudangte na theisiam tuan ding ua?
Buhchithehpa’n thu a theh ahi.
Lamsik a thu theh hiai bang ahi uh; thu a zaktak un Setan kintak a hongpai in a lungtang ua thutheh a lakmangsak hi.
Huchi bangmah in suangsilei a theh hiaite ahi uh; thu a zak phet ua kipaktak a pom pahte.
Himahleh amau ah zung a neikei ua, sawtlou chik kia a om uh; huai nung in thu ziak a gimthuakna hiam sawina hiam a hongom phet in a kipukpah pah uhi.
Huan midangte loulingnei lak a theh bang ahi uh; huaite’n thu a zata ua,
himahleh khovel lunggulhnate, thildang duhgawlnate a honglut chiang in, thu a dep a, gahlou in a om hi.
Huchi in lei hoih a kia hiaite ahi uh; thu za a, pom, a leh sawmthum, a leh sawmguk, leh a leh za a gahte ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Mi’n khawnvak de in a koihna a koihlou in, lawh nuai hiam, lupna nuai hiam ah a koih ngei ua hia?
Thanglou ding a im bangmah a om ngeikei a, langlou ding a sel bangmah a omsam kei hi.
Kuapeuh zakna ding a bil nei peuh in za hen” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Na zak uh bang ahia, pilvang un; na tehna ngei mah ua tehsak in na om ding ua, a tamzaw bawn piak in na om ding uhi.
Kuapeuh a nei piak behlap in om ding ua, kuapeuh a neilou a neihsun nangawn laksak in om ding uh” a chi hi.
“Pathian gam tuh min lei a chi a tuh bang ahi a chi hi.
Zan chiang in a ihmu a, sun chiang in a thou zel a; chi pou in a na khang a, himahleh bangchi a pou a, khang ahia chih a theikei hi.
Lei in amah in gah a honsuah a; a masapen in akung, huan avui leh avui ah atang hongom hi.
Himahleh a gah a min chiang in, buhlak a huntak ziak in, kawite in a atpah uhi” a chi hi.
Huan “Pathian gam bang toh i tehpih dia? Ahihkeileh, bang gentehna in ahia i genteh ding? a chi hi.
Ankam chi tangkhat lei a a tuh un, lei a chi tengteng sang in neupen mahleh,
A tuh nung un a hongpou a, loupa tengteng sang in a honglian zawta a, hiang liantak a honnei a, huchi in tungleng vasate a lim ah a giak uhi, huchi mah bang ahi” a chi hi.
Huan huchibang gentehna thu tampi in, a theihsiam theih khomkhom uh, a kiang uah a gen zel hi.
Himahleh gentehna lou in zaw a kiang uah thu a gen ngeikei; amah nungzuite kiang ah a sim in bangkim a hilhchian zel hi
Huai ni mah nitaklam a hong hih in, a kiang uah “Galkhat lam i kai ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in mipite paisan in, a om ngeingei bang in, long ah a paipih pah ua, long dangte leng a kiang ah a om uhi.
Huchi in huihpi thupitak a hongnung a, tuikihotte long ah a hong kihot lut zuazua hi, huchi in long a hong dimta hi.
Amah lukham kham a ihmu in, longmei lam ah a om hi. Huan a phawng ua a kiang ah, “Heutupa, ka manthat uh khawksalou na hi maw?” a chi uhi.
Amah a hongthou a, huih a tai a, dil kiang ah leng “Dai inla, om kinken in” a chi hi. Huan huih a tawp a, a hong daidide hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Bangchi a hichitel a lau na hi ua oi? Ginna neilou na hi umaw?” a chi hi.
Huchi in lau petmah in a lau ua, “Hiai mi kua ahia le, huih leh dil nangawn in a thu a man uh?” a kichi uhi.
Huan dilgal, Gerasin mite gam a hongtung uhi;
Long a kipan a pawtnung in dawininpai khat, han a kipan a hongpawt in amah a natuak pah hi;
Huai mi han ah a om zel; kuamah in sik khainiang nangawn a hen theilouh uh ahi.
Sikkol leh sik khainiang in a hen ua; himahleh sik khainiang a bottat a, sikkol leng a hihtan zel a; kuamah in a khoizual zou kei uhi.
Sun leh zan in han leh tang ah a kikou kou a, suang in a ki-at hi.
Huan gamla tak a kipan Jesu a muhtak in a tai a, amah a bia hi.
Huan aw ngaihtak a kikou in, “Jesu, Pathian Tungnungpen Tapa, kei leh nang bang ahia i kizolhna om? Hon gimsak lou ding in Pathian min in nget chihtak in k’on ngen hi” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Nang, dawininpai, hiai mi sung a kipan pawt in” a na chita hi.
Huan aman “Na min bang ahia?” chi’n a dong hi. Aman, a kiang ah “Ka min nuai ahi, tampi ka hih ziak un” a chi hi.
Huai gam apat amau sawlkhe lou ding in Jesu kiang ah nakpi’n a ngen hi.
Huan huailai a tangpang ah vokhon tampi a ta uhi.
Dawininte’n, “Vok sung ah honsawl in, asung ua ka lut theihna ding un” chi in, a kiang ah a ngen uhi.
Aman thu a pia a, huchi in, dawininte a pawt ua, vok sung ah a lut ua; vokhon, sang nih phial ahi ua, ken ah a taisuk ua, dil ah a tailutta ua; dil ah tuihak in a sita uhi.
Huan vok anpete a tai ua, khua leh lou ah a gen ua, huai thil hongom bang ahia chih en ding in mite a hong taikhawm uhi,
Jesu kiang a hongtung ua, dawimatpa, a lungsim ngei pu leh puansilh a huai a tu a mu ua, huchi in a a lauta uhi.
A ma ua mute’n, dawimat tung a thiltun dan leh vok tanchin amaute a na hilh uhi.
Huan amau a gam ua kipan a pawt ding in a ngenta uhi.
Huan long a a lut in dawininpaipa’n amah kiang a omsak din a ngen hi.
Himahleh Jesu’n a phalkei a, a kiang ah, “Na inn a na lawmte kiang ah pai inla, Toupa’n nang dia thil hon hihsak a thupidan leh nang a hon lainat dan vahilh in” a chi zaw hi.
Huan a pai a, Dekapolis khua ah Jesu’n amah dia thil a hihsak thupidan a tangkoupihta hi. Huan mi tengteng in lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Jesu long a galkhat lam a a hong kainawn in mipi tampitak a kiang ah a hong paikhawm ua, amah dilgei ah a om hi.
Huchi in kikhopnain a vaihawmte lak a mi khat, a min Jaira, a hong a, Jesu a muhtak in a khebul ah a khupboh hi.
“Ka tanu naupang chik a si dekdek a; hongdam a, a hin theihna ding in hongpai a a tung a na khut koih ding in k’on ngen hi” chi in, nakpi’n a thum hi.
Huchi in Jesu a kiang ah a vahoh a, mipi thupitak in zui in, amah a boh lutlut uhi.
Huan numei khat kum sawmlehnih sipawt a damlou a om hi,
Daktor tampi lak ah nakpitak a thuak in, a neih tengteng a zangbei khinta a, phattuam naksang in a se zawsop hi.
Huai min Jesu tanchin a naza a, a nung ah mipi lak ah a hongpai a, a puanmong a khoih hi.
“A puanmong kia khoih leng hihdam in ka om mai ding” a lungsim in a chi hi.
Huan thakhat in a sipawt a kam ngal a, a natna hihdam ahi chih a sa ah a kitheita hi.
Jesu’n, asung a kipan thilhihtheihna a pawt chih a thei a, milak ah a kihei vialvial a, “Kua ahia ka puanmong khoih?” a chi hi.
A nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Mipi’n a honboh lutlut uh mu chin a, kua ahia hon khoih? Bangchidan a chi na hia?” a chi uhi.
Aman huai thilhihnu muh tum in a en vialvial hi.
Huchi in numei in a tung a thil a hihsak thei in, lau leh ling kawm in a hongpai a, a ma ah khupboh in, a kiang ah thudik a hilhvek hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Tanu na ginna dampih na hi, khamuangtak in pai inla, na natna a kipan na damta in” a chi hi.
A pau laitak in kikhopnain a vaihawmpa inn a kipan mi a hongpai ua, “Na tanu sita hi, sinsakpa hihbuai lailai ding na hiam?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a thugen uh ngeingaih lou in, kikhopnain a vaihawmpa kiang ah, “Lau ken, gingta mai in” a chi hi.
Peter, Jakob, leh Jakob unau Johan chih louhngal midang kuamah in amah a zuih uh a phal kei hi.
Huan kikhopnain vaihawmpa inn a tung a, Jesu’n a na buai vengvung, kap vengvung leh a mau vengvung a za hi.
A valut a, a kiang uah, “Bangdia bil am zen a kap na hi ua? Naupang silou hi, a ihmu ahizaw hi” a chi hi.
Huan amah a nuihsan maimah uhi. Himahleh aman avek un a delkhia a, naupang omna ah a valut hi,
Huan naupang khut a len a, a kiang ah, “Talitha kumi” a chi a, “Nungaknou, thou in, k’on chi” chihna ahi.
Huan numei naupang a thou a, a paipah ngal a; amah kum sawmlehnih mi ahi hi. Huan amau lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hiai kuamah in theikei hen” a chi bilbel hi, nekding piak ding thu a pia hi.
Huan huai a kipan a pawt a, a omna kholam a tungta a; a nungzuite’n a zui uhi.

Khawlni a honghi a, kikhopnain ah thu a hilh a; mi tampi a thu zate’n, “Hiai min hiai thu koi a kipan a muh ahia? Hiai mi kiang a pilna piak bang pilna ahia? A khut in hichi tel a thillamdang a hih bangchidan ahia?” a na chi uhi.

Hiai mi Mari tapa, Jakob, Joses, Juda leh Simon sanggampa, singlem bawlpa ahi ka hia? A sanggamnute leng hiai a i kiang ua om ahi kei ua hia?” a chi ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uhi. Huchi in, a tung ah a lungkim kei uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Zawlnei zaw amah kholam ah, amah inkawte lak ah, amah inn kia loungal ah pahtawi louh in a om ngeikei” a chi hi.
Huan, midamlou tawmchikte tung a khut koih a a hihdam kia loungal huai ah thil thupi ahihkei hi.
A gintak louh uh lamdang a sa mahmah hi. Huan, thuhilh kawm in khuate a tawn vialvial hi.
Huan sawmlehnihte a sam a, nihnih in a sawlkhia a; dawininte tung a thuneihna leng a pia hi.
A zinna ua ding in chiangkhun kia loungal bangmah tanghou leh kawlzal leng, a kawnggak ua dangka tawilouh ding a chi bikbek hi.
Khedap bel but ding a chi a; puanak nih silh kei un, a chilai hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Koipeuh ah leng na tunna inn uah, huai kipan na pawt mateng uh tung kinken un
Huan koi khua peuh in a hon kipahpih kei ua, na thu uh a ngaihkhiak kei ua leh huai a kipan na pawt chiang un, amau mawhpaih ding in, na khepek nuai ua leivui kai na tatkhe ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in a paikhia ua, mite a kisik ding uh ahi chih a gen uhi
Dawi tampi leng a delhkhia ua, damlou tampi leng thau a nilh ua, a hihdam uhi.
Huan kumpipa Herod in a naza a, a min a than ziak in, “Baptispa Johan, misi lak apan thounawn a, huaiziak in huai thilhihtheihnate’n amah a sem ahi, a chi hi.
Midangte’n bel, “Elijah ahi, a chi ua; midangte’n, malai zawlneite bang zawlnei khat ahi” a chi uhi.
Herod in bel a na zak in, “A lutang ka tanpa ngei, hong thounawnta ahi,” a chi hi.
Herod in a unau Philip zi Herodia ziak in mi a sawlkhia a, Johan a mansak a, suangkulh ah hen in a na khumkhinta hi. Herodia zi in a na neita ngal a.
Johan in, Herod kiang ah, “Na unaupa zi na neihsak sianglou ahi” a na chih khit ziak in.
Huaiziak in Herodia in amah a mudah a, hihlup a ut a, himahleh a hih theikei hi.
Herod in, Johan midiktat leh siangthou ahi chih a theih ziak in amah a kihta hi, amah a en a, a thu a zak in, thil tampi a hih a, kipaktak in a ngaikhia hi.
Huan Herod in a pian ni’n a mi thupite, sepaihheutu liante, Galili gam a miliante ading a zana Ankuang a luilai in hunlemtang a hong omta hi.
Herodia tanu a honglut a, a lam a, Herod leh a Ankuang umpihte a kipaksakta hi. Kumpipa’n numei naupangnu kiang ah, “Na deihdeih hon ngen in, k’on pe ding” a chi hi.
“Bangpeuh n’on nget phot, ka honpe ding, ka gam kimkhat nangawn leng” chi in a kiang ah a kichiam hial hi.
Amah a pawt a, a nu kiang ah, “Bang ka ngen dia?” a vachi hi. A nun, “Baptispa Johan lutang” a na chi hi.
Huan amah kintak in kumpipa kiang ah a valut paha, “Kuang in Baptispa Johan lutang n’on piak pah ka ut” chi in, a ngen hi.
Huan kumpipa a lungkham mahmahta a; himahleh a kichiamna leh a Ankuang umpihte ziak in a sel nuam kei hi.
Huan kumpipa’n amah vengte lak a sepaih khat a lutang vala ding a thupia in a sawlpah hi. Amah suangkulh ah pai in a lutang a vatan kheta hi.
Huai lutang kuang in a hontawi a, numei naupang kiang ah a pia a, huan numei naupang in a nu kiang ah a peta hi.
Huan a nungzuite’n a zak un, a luangla in, han ah a vuita uhi.
Huan sawltakte Jesu kiang ah a hong kikhawm ua, thil bangkim, a thil hihpeuh uleh a thuhilh peuh uh, a honghilh uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Noumau kia in gamdai mun ah a tuam in hong unla, khawl tadih un” a chi hi. Mipi a tam a, a kuan leh a pai a kiphamat ua, an nangawn leng a ne mankei uhi.
Huchi in gamdai mun ah long in a paimangta uhi.
Mite’n a pailai uh a mu ua, mi tampi in amau a thei ua, khochih apat huai ah khe in a taikhawm ua, a na makhelhta uhi.
Huchi in amah hong paikhiak in mipi tampitak a muta a, ching ding neilou belamte bang a hih ziak un a lainat mahmah a, thu tampi a hilhta hi.
Huan ni a kai mahmahta a, a nungzuite a kiang ah a hong ua, “Hiai gamdai mun ahi a, ni a kaita mahmah hi.
I kim a loute leh khuate ah hoh a, a nekding uh banghiam bek a lei theihna ding un amaute paisak ta in” a chi uhi.
Aman bel a kiang uah, “Noumau nekding pia un” chi in, a dawng hi. Amau a kiang ah, tanghou makhai za nih man valei in nekding peding ka ding uam?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Tanghou phel bangzah na nei ua? Hon en dih ua” a chi a. Huan a neihzah uh a theihtak un, “Nga leh ngasa nih toh” a chi uhi.
Huan aman, avek un, loupa hing tung ah a pawlpawl a tusak ding in a kiang uah thu a pia hi.
Vual za khat, sawmnga, zel in a tu uhi.

Huan aman tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nih a la a, vanlam en in a vualzawl a, tanghou phelte a balkhama, a ma ua lui ding in a nungzuite kiang ah a pia a; ngasa nih leng huaite tengteng lak ah a hawmzak hi.
Avek un a ne ua, a kham chiat uhi.
Huan tanghou leh ngasa nente bawm sawmlehnih a dim hi.
Tanghou phel nete pasal piching ngen sang nga ahi uh.
Huan mipi a kikhensak nung in galkhat lam a Bethsaida khua a na pai masa ding in a nungzuite long ah a tuangsak teitei hi.
Amau a kikhensak nung in thum ding in tang ah a hohta hi,
Nitaklam a hong hih in, long dil laitak ah a omta a, amah kia in gam ah a om hi.
Long kalh a mangbang in amaute a mu a, huih in a hilou lam ah a sep hi. Huchi in zanven lina ding kuan in dil tung a khe a pai in amau lam a honzuan a, amau paisuak san a tum hi.
Himahleh amah dil tung a khe a pai a muh un sikha sa in, a kikou khia uhi.
Avek un amah a mu ua, a lau mahmah uhi. Himahleh aman amau a houpih paha, a kiang uah, “Khamuangtak in om un, keimah ka hi, lau kei un” a chi hi.
Huan long ah a kiang uah a tuangtou sam a, huih a dai maimah hi. Huan lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
A lungtang uh a khauh ziak in tanghou beu thillamdang thu a ngaihtuah ban kei uhi.
Huan galkhat lam a kai un Gennesaret gam a tung ua, luipiau ah long a khih uhi.
Long a kipan a pawt nung un mite’n amah a na theipah uhi,
Huai gamkim tengteng ah a tai ua, a om chih a zakna peuh uah damloute a lupna un a honzawng hial uhi.
Huan khoneu leh kholian ah khopi leh khota leh koipeuh ah leng a lutna ah damloute, dawlmun ah a lumsak ua, a puanmong bek khoihsak din a ngen ngutngut uhi. Huan amah khoih peuhmah a dam uhi.
Huan Pharisaite leh laigelhmite lak a mi kuate hiam, Jerusalem khua a kipan a kiang ah a hong kikhawm uhi.
Huaite’n nungzui khenkhatte’n khut ninpi a tanghou a nek uh a mu ua, nin, chih tuh, sillou, chihna ahi.
Pharisaite leh Juda tengteng in Upate thugousiah a pom chinten ziak un a khut uh hoihtak a a silkei uleh a ne ngeikei uhi.
Dawlmun a kipan a a pai un leng a kisil phot kei uleh a ne ngeikei uhi. Huan thugousiah dang tampi a chin uh a om, nou, bel, taubelte sil thute ahi.
Huchi in Pharisaite leh laigelhmite’n, “Bang achia na nungzuite’n upate thugousiah bang a omlou a, khut ninpi a tanghou ne uhiam” chi in, a dong uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Isai in nou milepchiahte thu a na genkhol dik hilhial ve,
‘Hiai mite’n a muk un a hon zahtak ua, a lungtang un hon gamlat uh’ a chi hi.
‘Mihing thupiakte a sinsak lel ziak un a hon biak uh a thawn ahi,’ chih gelh bang in.
Pathian thupiakte nelhsiah in mihing thugousiah na len chinten ua eive” a chi hi.
A kiang uah, “Na thugousiah uh na zuih theihna ding ua Pathian thupiakte na deihlouh uzaw, lem na thei hial ve ua.
Mosi in, Na nu leh na pa zahtak in, Kuapeuh a nu hiam a pa hiam gensia si mahmah hen, a chi a;
Nou hichibang in na chi ua, min, a nu hiam, a pa hiam kiang ah, n’on phatuampihna ding Korban ahita, a chih leh, huai tuh Pathian kiang a piak, chihna ahi.
A nu ading hiam, a pa ading hiam a bangmah hihsak na phal nawn kei nak uh.
Na thugousiah uh na piak sawnsawnna un Pathian thu bangmahlou na suah uhi; huai bang thil tampi na hih uh” a chi hi.
Huan mipite a sam nawn a, a kiang uah, “Na vek un ka thu ngaikhia unla, theisiam un:”
Mihing pawlam a kipan asung a lut amah hihnin thei bangmah a omkei; mihing sung a kipan a hongpawt, huaite mihing hihnin ahizaw hi.
Kuapeuh zakna ding bil nei in, za hen!” a chi hi.
Mipite inn a a lutsan nung in a nungzuite’n gentehna thu amah a dong chian uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Nou leng huchitel a theihsiamna neilou na hi u maw? Bangpeuh pawlam a kipan a mihing sung a lut in amah a hihnin theikei chih na theikei ua hia?
A lungtang sung a lutlou a, a gilpi sung a a lut zawk ziak in leh dailenna a pawt khemai a hih ziak in” a chi a. Huai tuh an chiteng a siang, a chihna ahi.
Mihing sung apan hongpawt, huai ngeingei in mihing a hihnin nak ahi.
Mihingte sunglam lungtang a kipan in, ngaihtuahna giloute a hongpawt nak hi:
Kingaihna, guktakna, tualthahna, angkawmna leh enna, gitlouhna, khemhatna, bevenna, hazatna gensiatna, kisaktheihna leh, haihuainate ahi.
Hiai thilgiloute tengteng sunglam a kipan a hongpawt a, mihing a hihnin nak hi” a chi hi.
Huan a thou a, huai a kipan in Tura leh Sidon uk ah a paita hi. Inn ah a lut a, kuamah theih a deihkei a; himahleh a kisel theikei hi.
Huchi in numei khat, a tanu naupang chik dawininpai in, a tanchin a naza a, a khebul ah a khupboh hi.
Numei Grik mi ahia, Siriaphoinisia gam a piang ahi. Aman a tanu sung a kipan a dawi delhkhe ding in a ngen hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Tate hongvah masa uhen aw; tate tanghou laksak a uite kiang a paih kilawmlou hi” a chi hi.
Numei in a kiang ah, “Toupa, hihzaw ahi a, himahleh dohkan nuai a uite’n leng tate tanghou nen a ne zel sam vaw oi” chi in a dawng hi.
Aman, a kiang ah, “Na thugen ziak in paita in: dawi na tanu sung a kipan a pawtta hi” a chi hi.
Huan a inn ah a paita, a tanu, dawi in a pawt khiaksan, lupna a lum a va muta hi.
Huan Tura gam a kipan a pawtnawn a, Sidon khua tawn in Dekapolis gam Paikan in Galili dil a tungta hi.
Mi khat bengngong, pau leng pau kichian theilou a kiang ah hon tonpih ua, a tung a khut koih ding in a ngen uhi.
Aman mipi lak a kipan in amah kia in a pituam a, a khut zungte in a bilsung a khoih a, chilsia in a lei a khoihsak hi;
Vanlam en in a khoisa huthut hi. Huan a kiang ah “Ephatha” a chi a; huai bel, “Kihongta in” chihna ahi.
Huchi in a bilte uh a hong kihong a, a leigakna leng a hong kiphel a, chiantak in a pautheita hi.
A kiang uah, kuamah hilhlou ding a chi bikbeka; himahleh a nak kham phet in, a nak tangkoupih zawsem uhi.
“Aman bangkim hoihtak in a hih a; bengngongte nangawn a pausak zel,” a chi ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huai nite in, mipi tampitak a hongom nawn ua, nekding bangmah a neikei ua, aman a nungzuite a sam a, a kiang uah,
“Mipite tuin ka kiang ah ni thum a omta ua, nekding bangmah a neih louh ziak un ka lainat mahmah hi.
Anngawl in a inn uah paisak leng lamkal ah a bah kha ding uh; khenkhatte houh a hongpaina uh a gamla mahmah hi” a chi hi.
A nungzuite’n, “Mi’n hiai gamdai ah koi a tanghou in ahia hiai mite a hihtai theih ding uh?” chi in amah a dawng uhi.
Huan aman, “Tanghou phel bangzah na nei ua?” chi in, amau a dong a. Amau, “Phel sagih” a chi uhi.
Huan mipite lei a tu ding in thu a pia a; tanghou phel sagih a la a, kipahthu a genkhit in a balkham a, a ma ua lui ding in a nungzuite kiang ah a pia a; huchi in mipite ma ah a luita uhi.
Ngasa tawmchik leng a nei ua; aman a vualzawl a, huaite leng a ma ua lui ding in thu a pia hi.
Huchi in a ne ua, a kham chiat ua; a khamval nen uh bawm sagih dim in a luak uhi.
Amau sang li vel ahi ua; aman amaute a paisakta hi.
Amah bel a nungzuite kiang ah long ah a tuangpah a, Dalmanutha gam a tungta uhi.
Pharisaite a hongpai ua, amah ze-etna ding in, amah apan van a kipan a chiamtehna zong in amah a hong sel uhi.

Huan amah a lungsim in nakpi’n a nak kuaikuai hi, “Bang a chia hiai khangte’n chiamtehna zong uh ahia? Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, hiai khangte kiang ah chiamtehna himhim piak ahi kei ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in amaute paisan in long ah a tuang nawn a, galkhat lam ah a paita hi.
Huan a nungzuite’n tanghou a tawi mangngilh ua, tanghou phel khat kia lou ngal long ah tanghou dang himhim lah a neikei uhi.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, “Pharisaite silngou leh Herod silngou lak ah kiveng unla, pilvang un,” a chi hi.
Amau, “tanghou i neih louh ziak eive” chi in a a kingaihtuah uhi.
Jesu’n huai a theih in, a kiang uah, “Bangdia tanghou na neih louh ziak ua kingaihtuah na hi ua? Tu nangawn in na theisam kei u maw? Theisiam lou lai maw? Na lungtang uh na khauhsak ua hia?
Mit nei napi in na mu kei ua hia? bil nei napi in na za kei ua hia? theigige lou maw?
Sang nga lak a tanghou phel nga ka balkhap lai in a nen bawm bangzah ahia na luahdim uh?” a chi hi. Amau, “Sawmlehnih,” a chi uhi.
Huan sang li lak sagih ka balkhap lai in, a nen bawm bangzah ahia na luahdim uh? a chi a. Amau a kiang ah, “Sagih” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, bangchidan a tu nangawn a theisiam lou lailai na hi ua?” a chi hi.
Huai nung in Bethsaida a hongtung uhi; Huan a kiang ah mittaw a honpi ua, amah khoih ding in a ngen uhi.
Aman mittaw khut a len a, khua a kipan a pikhia hi; a mit ah chilsia in a tung a khut a koihkhit in, “Khua na mu thei hia?” chi in a dong hi.
Amah hong dak khia a, “Mite ka mu; singkung pai bang in ka mu” a chi hi.
A mit ah a khut a koihnawn a, aman a en gegu a, a hong dam maimah a, bangkim chiantak in a mu theita hi.
Huan Jesu’n, khua ah leng lut ken chi in, a in ah a paisakta hi.
Huan Jesu leh a nungzuite a hongpai zel ua, Kaisaria Philippi khua te a hongtung ua; huan paikawm in a nungzuite kiang ah, “Mite’n kei kua ahi a honchi ua?“ chi in, a dong hi.
Amau “Baptispa Johan ahi, a honchi ua; midang in Elijah ahi, a honchi ua; khenkhat in bel, zawlnei kuahiam ahi, a honchi uh” a chi uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Ahihleh nou kei kua ahi n’on chi ua?” chi in, a dong hi. Peter in a kiang ah “Khrist na hi” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan aman a tanchin kuamah hilhlouh ding in a chi bikbek hi.
Huan Mihing Tapa in thil tampi a thuak dingte, upate, siampu liante, laigelhmite deihlouh a a om ding, hihlup a a om ding leh ni thum nung a a thohnawn ding thute amau a hilh hi.
Huai thute chiantak in a gen hi. Huan, Peter in amah a pituam a, a tai hi.
Amah bel a hong kihei a, a nungzuite muh in, Peter a tai a, “Setan, ka nung ah pai in, Pathian thilte ngaihtuahlou in, mihing thilte na ngaihtuah zaw” a chi hi.
Huan mipite, a nungzuite toh a sam a, a kiang uah, “Kuapeuh in honzuih a ut leh amah kimangngilh in, a Kros pua in honzui hen.
Kuapeuh a hinna humbit ut in a tan ding a; kuapeuh keimah ziak leh Tanchinhoih ziak a a hinna tan in a humbit ding hi.
Min khovel a pum in a nei henla, a hinna tan leh, amah ading in bang a phatuam dia?
Min a hinna tang in bang a pe thei dia?

Kuapeuh tulai khang angkawm leh gilou chingte lak a keimah leh ka thu zumpih, Mihing Tapa in, angel siangthoute toh a Pa thupina a kivan a a hong hun chiang in, huai mite a hon zumpih thuk sam ding” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, hiai ading a khen, Pathian gam thilhihtheihna toh hongtung a muh ma ua, sihna chiamlou ding a om uh” a chi hi.
Huan ni guk nung in Peter, Jakob, leh Johan a pituam a, tangsangtak ah Jesu’n a paitouhpih a; a ma uah a mel omdan a hong lamdangta hi.
Huchi in a puansilhte lei a puansawpmi’n in a sawp ngou theihlouh khop hial a ngou velvol in a hong lamdangta hi.
Elijah leh Mosi a kiang uah a hong kilak ua, Jesu toh a kihou uhi,
Peter in Jesu a houpih a “Heutupa, ei din hiai a om a hoih; aidakbuk thum i lam ding a, nang adin khat, Mosi adin khat, Elijah adin khat” a chi hi.
A lau mahmah ziak un a genpen leng a theikei hi.
Huan amau liah in meipi a hong kai a; meipi apan aw a hongsuak a, “Hiai ka Tapa deihtak ahi, amah thu ngai un” a chi hi.
Kintak in a kimvel a en ua, a kiang ua Jesu kia lou kuamah a muta kei uhi.
Huan tang a kipan a paisuk lai un, “Mihing Tapa misi lak a kipan a thohnawn khit mateng a thilmuhte uh kuamah hilh louh ding” a chi bikbek hi.
Huchi in huai thu a vom kinken uhi, Misi lak apat thohnawn pen bang chihna hi ding ahia chih a kidong uhi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, Bangchidan a laigelhmite’n, “Elijah a hongpai masa ding ahi” chi ahi ua? chi in, a dong uhi.

Aman a kiang uah, “Bangkim bawlhoih thak ding in Elijah a hongpai masa him ahi; ahihleh thil tampi a thuak ding a, muhdah a mawkbawl in a om ding chi a mihing Tapa tungthu bangchidan a gelh a na om ahia leh? a chi hi.
Himahleh k’on hilh ahi, Elijah zaw a hongpai khinta hi, a tanchin a gelh bang ngei un a tung ah a utut un a hihkhinta uhi” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite kiang a tunsuk in, a kim ua mipi tampite leh laigelhmite a na kisellai uh a mu hi.
Mipi tengteng in amah a muhtak un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, a kiang ah a taipah ua, chibai a vabuk kheukhou uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Amaute toh bang thu ahia na kisel uh?” chi in a dong hi.
Mipi lak a mi khat in a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, ka tapa, dawi pautheilou nei, na kiang ah ka honpi a;
A matna peuh ah a puksak ekek a; huchi in a chilphuan kia in, a ha a gawi a, a gawng hulhul hi; na nungzuite’n delhkhe le uh ka chih leh a delhkhe theikei uh” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ginna neilou khangte aw, Bang tan na kiang ua om ding a bangtan hon thuakthei ding ka hia? Amah ka kiang ah honpi un” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan amah Jesu kiang ah a honpi ua; dawi in amah a muhtak in naupang nakpi’n a sawisa paha; huchi in lei ah a puk a, a chilphuan ke zezu in a kikhuk volvol hi.
Huan aman a pa kiang ah, “Hichibang a a hong kipatna bang tan ahita a?” chi in, a dong hi. Aman, “A naupanlai a kipan ahita”
“Huchi in amah hih mangthang ding in tamveipi mei ah leh, tui ah a sawnpuk a; himahleh nang bangchi chi hiam bek a na hihtheih leh hon hehpih inla, hon huh in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Na hihtheih leh e, a gingtami ading in bangkim hihtheih ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in naupang’ pa’n khitui toh, “Toupa, ka gingta hi, ka ginlahna hon huh in” chi in a kikou khia hi.
Jesu’n mipi hong taikhawm a muh in, dawinin a tai a, a kiang ah, “Nang dawi pautheilou leh bengngong, thu ka honpia hi, asung apat pawt inla, lut nawn ken” a chi hi.
Huchi in a kikou kheta a, nakpitak a a sawikhit in a pawtta a, naupang misi bang in a om a; huchi in mi tamzawte’n, a si ahi” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a khut a len a, a kaithou a; huan a hong thou maimahta hi.
Huan Jesu inn a a valut leh a nungzuite’n “Bangchi a kou delhkhe theilou ka hi ua? chi in a sim in a dong uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hichibang zaw thumna leh anngawlna kia loungal in bangchi mah in a pawt theikei” a chi hi.
Huan huai a kipan a paikhia ua; Galili gam a paikan ua, kuamah theih a deihkei uhi.
A nungzuite a sinsak lai a hih ziak in a kiang uah “Mihing Tapa mihingte khut a matsak in a om dia, a that ding ua; a hihlup nung uh ni thum nung in a thounawn ding” a chi hi.
Himahleh a thugen a theisiam kei ua, amah lah a dong ngam kei uhi.
Huan Kapernaum khua a hongtung ua; insung a a omlai in, amau kiang ah, “Lampi a bangthu ahia na kisel uh?” chi in, a dong hi.
Lampi ah, i lak uah kua i thupipen dia? chi a a na kisel khit ziak un a daidide uhi.
Huan amah a tu a, sawmlehnihte a sam a, a kiang uah, “Kuapeuh in masapen hih a ut leh mi tengteng sang in nanungpen in a om ding ahi, mi tengteng nasem in a om ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huan naupang chik khat a kai a, a lak uah a dingsak a: a pom a a kiang uah,
“Kuapeuh ka min ziak a hiai bang naupang chik khat sang keimah hon sang ahi a, kuapeuh kei hon sang kei hon sang ahi kei ding, hon sawlpa sang ahizaw uh” a chi hi.
Johan in a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, kuahiam na min a dawite delhkhia ka mu ua; a hon zuih louh ziak in ka kham uh” a chi hi.
Jesu’n “Kham nawn kei un; kuamah ka min a thil thupi hih kei hon gense pah thei a omkei hi.
Kuapeuh ei hon dou lou i lam a pang ahi.
Kuapeuh Khrist mi na hih ziak ua tui nou khat dawn ding honpia, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, a kipahman a tan kei hial ding hi.
“Huan kuapeuh hon gingta neu chikte lak a khat leng hihpuk, a ngawng ah buhgawizanna suang lianpi oksak in tuipi ah khele uh, amah ading in a hoihzaw ding hi.
Huan na khut in a hon hihpuk leh, tankhia in; melhem a hinna a lut nang ding in a hoihzaw, khut nih nei a gawtmun mei mittheilou a pai sang in,
A than uh a sih louh a, meikuang mihlouhna ah.
Na khe in a hon hihpuk leh, tankhia in, khe nih nei a gawtmun a paih a om sang in, khebai a hinna a lut nang ading in a hoihzaw hi.
A than uh a sih louh a, meikuang a mihlouhna ah
Huan na mit in a hon hihpuk leh, khelkhia in; mit lang nih nei a gawtmun a paih a om sang in mit langkhat nei a Pathian gam a lut nang ading in a hoihzaw hi.
A than uh sih ngeilouhna leh mei mih ngeilouhna ah.
“Michih mei a soh al in a om ding uhi.
Chi a hoih hi; himahleh, chi a pen khit leh bang in na hih al nawn ding ua? Noumau ngei ah chi nei unla, khat leh khat kilem in om un” a chi hi.
Huan ading a, huai a kipan Judia gam ah leh Jordan gal ah a paita hi. Mipite a kiang ah a hong kikhawm ua; huchi in, a hih ngei dan in amau thu a hih nawn hi.
Pharisai khenkhat a kiang ah a hong ua, amah ze-etna ding in, “Min zi a mak a siang hia?” chi in, a dong uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Mosi in bangchi’n thu a honpia a?“ chi in, a dong hi.
Amau, “Mosi in kimakna laigelh a mak a phal hi” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Na lungtang khauh ziak un ahi huai thupiak nou adia a hon gelhsak.
Himahleh leitung piantung a kipan, Pathian in amau numei leh pasal a siam hi.
Huai thu ziak in pasal in a nu leh a pa a paisan ding a, a zi a len chinten ding;
Huchi in, a nih un sa khat a hong hita ding ua; nih ahi nawn ta kei ua, sa khat a honghi zawta ding uh.
Huaiziak in Pathian in a gawmsa mihing in khen kei hen” a chi hi.
Huan inn ah a nungzuite’n huai thu amah a dong nawn uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Kuapeuh a zi ma a, midang nei in a zi ang a kawm san hi;
Aman leng a pasal khen a, midang a neih leh, angkawm ahi” a chi hi.
Mite’n a khoih ding in naupang neute a honpi ua; himahleh nungzuite’n huai mite a na tai uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n huai a muh in a lunghi kei mahmah a, nungzuite kiang ah, “Naupang neute ka kiang ah hon paisak unla, kham kei un; Pathian gam hichibang mite a ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, “Kuapeuh Pathian gam naupang neute’n a kipahpih bang a kipahpihlou asung ah a lut kei hial ding” a chi hi.
Huan amau pom in, a tung uah a khut koih in a vualzawlta hi.
Huan pai ding a a pawtlai in mi khat amah lam ah a hongtai a, a ma ah a khukdin a, a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa hoih, tangtawn hinna ka tan theihna ding in bang ka hihdia?” chi in, a dong hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Bangdia hoih honchi? Mi khat kia loungal kuamah hoih a omkei uh, huai Pathian ahi.
Thupiakte na thei vaw oi; tualthat ken, angkawm ken, gu ken, hek ken, khem ken, na nu leh na pa zahtak in, chihte” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, huai tengteng ka naupan lai a kipan ka zuita” a chi hi.

Jesu’n amah a en a, a it ta a, a kiang ah, “Hih ding khat neilai chia; pai inla, na neih peuhmah zuak inla, tagahte kiang ah pia in, huchi in van ah gou na nei ding; huan hongpai inla, honzui in” a chi hi.
Himahleh, huai thu ah a mel a hong mual a, lungkhamtak in a paimangta; mi hausa a hih ziak in.
Jesu’n a en vialvial a, a nungzuite kiang ah, “Mi hausate ding in Pathian gam lut haksat tuak na mai e” a chi hi.
Nungzuite’n a thugen lamdang a sa mahmah uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Naute aw, hauhna muangte adin Pathian gam a lut a haksa ngei e.
Mihausa Pathian gam a lut sang in sangawngsau phim bilvanga lut paisuak a baihlam zaw” a chi hi.
Amau lamdang a naksak mahmah ua, a kiang ah, “Ahihleh, kua hotdam ahi thei dia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n amau a en a, “Huai zaw mihing adin hihvual ahikeia, Pathian adin bel hih vuallouh ahi kei: Pathian adin bangkim hih theih ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
