Peter in a kiang ah, “Ngai dih, kou bangkim paisan in k’on zui ua” chi’n a genpan hi.
Jesu’n “Chihtaktak in k’onhilh ahi, kuapeuh keimah ziak leh Tanchinhoih ziak a inn, unaupate, unaunute, nu, pa, tate leh gamte paisan,
Tu damsung mahmah in, innte, unaupate, sanggamnute, nute, tate, gamte a leh za in, sawinate toh, hun hongtung ding a tangtawn hinna toh mulou ding mahmah omkei hi.
Himahleh mi tampi masapena omte nanungpen a honghi ding ua, nanungpente leng masapen a honghi ding uh” a chi hi.

Huan Jerusalem khua a hohtou ding in lampi ah a om ua; Jesu’n a ma uh a kai hi; amau lamdang a sa mahmah ua; a honzuite’n a kihta uhi. Aman sawmlehnihte a pituam nawn a, a tung a tung dingte a hilh hi.

“Ngai dih ua, Jerusalem khua a hohtou ding i hi ua; Mihing Tapa siampu liante leh laigelhmite khut a matsak in a om ding; amau si ding in a tung ah thu a hihpuk ding ua, Jentelte kiang ah a pe ding uhi;
Amau nuihzabawlna’n a nei ding ua, chil a siatkhum ding ua, a vaw ding ua, a that ding uh; himahleh ni thum nung in a thounawn ding” chi in, a tung a thiltung dingte amaute a hilh hi.
Huan Zebedai tapa Jakob leh Johan in amah a hongnaih ua, a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa na kiang a k’on nget peuh uh n’on hihsak ka ut uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Nou adin bang hon hihsak leng na ut ua?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Na thupina ah na taklam ah khat, na veilam ah khat hon tusak in” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Na nget uh na theikei ua ahi. Ka nou dawn ding na dawn thei ding ua hia? Ka baptisma tan ding leng na tang thei ding ua hia?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Thei e” a chi uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Ka nou dawn ding na dawn ding ua, ka baptisma tan ding leng na tang ding uh:
Himahleh ka taklam leh ka veilam a tut ding thu zaw kei piak ding a hi kei a, a bawlsakte uh ading ahizaw” a chi hi.
Huan sawmte’n huai a zak un, Jakob leh Johan tung ah a lungkimkei uhi.
Jesu’n amau a sam a, a kiang uah, “Jentelte tung a vaihawm dia a sehte uh a tung uah a lian mahmah ua, a miliante un a tung uah thu a nei mahmah uh chih na thei uhi.
Himahleh nou lak ah zaw huchibang ahi kei ding; kuapeuh na lak ua milian hih ut nasemtu in a pang zaw ding ahi.
Kuapeuh na lak ua masapen hih ut mi tengteng sikha in a pang ding ahi.
Mihing Tapa hial leng na sepsak a om ding in a hongpai kei a, na sem ding leh mi tampi tatna dia a hinna pe di’n a hongpai ahizaw hi” a chi hi.
Jeriko khua a hongtung uhi; huchi in Jesu Jeriko a kipan a nungzuite leh mipi tampitak toh a pawtlai un khutdoh mittaw, Timai tapa Bartimai lamgei ah a na tu hi.
Huan Nazaret Jesu ahi chih a zaktak in, “Jesu, David Tapa, ka tung ah zahngai in” chi in, a kikou hi.
Mi tampi in dai ding in a khou ua; himahleh aman, “David Tapa, ka tung ah zahngai in” chi in, a kinak kou semsem hi.
Jesu ading a, “Amah honsam dih ua” a chi hi. Huan mittaw a sam ua a kiang ah, “Khamuangtak in om in, thou in; a honsam” a chi uhi.
Huan a puan paikhia in, ading a, Jesu kiang ah a hohta hi.
Jesu’n amah a houpih a, “Na tung ah bangchi a ka hih na ut a?” a chi hi. Mittaw in a kiang ah, “Heutupa, muh theih ka ut” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, a kiang ah, “Paita in, na ginna dampih hiteh” a chi a, huchi in, a mu thei pahta a, lampi ah Jesu a zuita hi.
Huchi in Jerusalem khua tung ding a a kisak ua, Olive tang a Bethphage leh Bethani khaw kiang a tun un, a nungzuite lak a mi nih a sawl a, a kiang uah,
“Na mazawn ua, khua ah vahoh unla; na luttung un sabiltung nou kikhih, kuamah tuan ngeilouhna, na mu ding ua; phel unla, honkai un.
Huan kuapeuh in, huai bangdia hih a honchih uleh, Toupa’n a deih ahi; hiai ah a hon koihsak nawnpah ding, na chi ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan a hohta ua, kongzing ah kongkhak pawlam a sabiltung nou kikhih a vamu ua; huai a phelta uhi.
Huai ading kuate hiam in, a kiang uah, “Sabiltung nou bangdia phel?” a chi uhi.
Amau Jesu gen bangtak in a kiang uah a gen ua; huchi in a phalta uhi.
Huan sabiltung nou Jesu kiang ah a honkai ua, a tung ah a puante uh a phah ua; a tung ah a tuangta hi.
Mi tampi in lampi ah a puan uh a phah ua; midang in leng gam a sawlnah sat in a phah uhi.
A malam a paite leh a nunglam a honzuite’n,
“Hosanna! Toupa min a hongpai a hampha!
Gam hongtung ding, i Pa
David gam a hampha!
Tungnungpen ah Hosanna!” chi in a kikou uhi.
Huan Jerusalem khua a Pathian biakin ah a valut a; bangkim a et velvel khit in nitaklam leng a hong hita a, a pawt a, sawmlehnihte toh Bethani ah a hohta uhi.
A zing in Bethani a kipan a pawtnungin a gil a hong kialta hi.
Theipi kung nahnei gamlapi ah a mu a, a gah ka muh khak leh, chi in a vazuan hi; a vatun in a nah kia loungal bangmah a mu kei a; theipi gah hun ahi kei him hi.
Huchi in Jesu’n sing a houpih a, “Tuban tangtawn in nang apat kuamah in gah ne nawnta kei hen” a chi hi. A nungzuite’n huai a za uhi.
Huan Jerusalem khua a tung ua, Pathian biakin ah a valut a, biakin a zuakmite leh leimite a delhkhia a, dangka khengmite dohkante leh vakhu zuakmite tutphah a sawnpuk sak hi.
Pathian biakin a mite’n van a lut paisuak pih uh a phalta kei hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Ka inn namchih ading in thumna inn a chi ding uh, chih gelh ahi ka hia? Nou suamhatte khuk in nabawl ua” chi in, a hilhta hi.
Siampu liante leh laigelhmite’n huai a za ua, amah hih manthat theihna ding a zongta uhi; mipi tengteng in a thuhilh lamdang a sak ziak un amah a lau uhi.
Huan nitaklam a hong hih in khopi a kipan a pawtkhia uhi.
Huan zingsang a a paikawm un huai theipi kung a zung tan pha a vuaikhin in a muta uhi.
Huchi in Peter in theikhia in a kiang ah, “Heutupa, en dih: theipi kung hamsiat na loh a na vuaikhin vekta” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Pathian gingta un.

Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, kuapeuh in, hiai tang kiang ah, na kisuan inla, tuipi ah na kipailut in chi a, a lungtang a ginglel lou a a gen a tung ngeingei ding chih gingta peuhmah in a gen bangbang a mu ding uhi.
Huaiziak in k’on hilh ahi, bangkim thum a na nget peuhmah uh musa in kiging unla huchi in na mu ding uhi.
Thum a na din peuhmah chiang un kua tung ah leng thubuai banghiam na neih uleh ngaidam un; na Pa uh van a om in leng na tatlekna uh a hon ngaihdam theihna ding in.
Himahleh na ngaihdam kei uleh, na Pa uh van a om in na tatleknate uh a hon ngaidam sam kei ding” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan Jerusalem khua a tungnawn ua; Pathian biakin a a vaklai in siampu liante, laigelhmite leh upate a kiang ah a hongpai uhi,
A kiang ah, “Kua thu in ahia hiai thilte na hih? Hiai thilte hih ding in kuan ahia nang thu honpia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Ken leng thu kam khat k’on dong sam ding, hon dawng le uchin, huchi in kua thu in ahia hiai thil ka hih chih k’on hilh ding” a chi hi.
“Johan Baptisma van a kipan hia; mihing a kipan? Hon dawng un” a chi hi.
Huan a kingaihtuah ua, “Van a kipan chi lehang, Bang a chia a thu gingtalou na hi ua, a honchi dia;
Himahleh mihing a kipan chi leng mipi a kihta ua; mi tengteng in Johan zawlnei taktak in a bawl chiat uhi.”
Huchi in, Jesu a dawng ua, “Theikei ung” a chi uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Ken leng kua thu in ahia hiai thilte ka hih, k’on hilh sam kei ding” a chi hi.

Huan gentehna thu in a kiang uah a gen a, “Mi kuahiam in grephuan a bawl a, a kim huang in a um a, grep sukna ding khuk a tou a, insang a lam a, loukhoumite kiang ah khohloh ding in a pia a, gamdang ah a paisanta hi.
A gah loh hun in a tansik amau kiang a kipan la ding in lou khohloh mite kiang ah sikha khat a sawl hi.
Huai mi a na man ua, a vua ua, khutvuak in a paisak nawnta uhi.
Huan sikha dang a kiang uah a sawl nawn a; huai mi leng a lu a na hihliam ua, zumhuaipi in a na bawl uhi.
Huan sikha dang a sawl nawn zel a; huai mi a na that ua, sikha dang tampi leng, khenkhat a na vua ua, khenkhat a na that uhi.
Huan sawl ding khat, a tapa deihtak kia a neilai hi; ‘Ka tapa zaw a na zahtak ding uh’ chi in amah a nanungpen in a kiang uah a sawl hi.
Himahleh huai lou khohloh mite’n, ‘hiai mi gouluah dingpa ahi; i that ding uh aw; huchi in a gouluah ding ei a ahimai ding’ a kichi uhi.
Huchi in amah a man ua, that in, grephuan apat a lawnkhia uhi.
Huaiziak in, grephuan neipa’n bangchi’n a honhih dia? Lou khohloh mite a honhih mangthang dia; lou midangte a pe ding hi.
Hiai Laisiangthou na sim kei ua hia?
“Inlammite suang deihlouhpen,
huai mahmah a ning a suang
phatuampen a hong hita hi.
Huai Toupa hih ahi, i mitmuh un a lamdang hi” chih, a chi hi.
Huan amah mat a tumta ua; huai gentehna thu lah amau dem a a gen ahi chih a thei ngal ua. Huchi in amah a nusia ua, a paimangta uhi.
Huan a thugen a a mattheihna ding in Pharisaite leh Herod pawl a mi kuate hiam a kiang ah a sawl uhi.

Huchi in amau a hongtun un a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, midiktat na hi a, deihsak tuam kuamah na neikei chih ka thei uh, kuamah khentuam neilou in, chihtak ngial in Pathian lam thu na hilh zel hi: Kaisar kiang a leiman liau a siang hia siang lou?
Pe ding ka hi ua, pe lou ding?” a chi uhi. Aman a lepchiahdan uh thei in, a kiang uah, “Bangdia hon ze-et na hi ua? Makhai hontawi un, ka en ding” a chi hi.
A hontawi ua, aman a kiang uah, “Hiai kua lim leh kua min ahia?” a chi hi.
Amau “Kaisar a” a chi uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Kaisar thilte Kaisar kiang ah pia unla, Pathian thilte Pathian kiang ah peta unla” a chi hi. Huchi in lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huan Saddukaite, thohnawnna a omkei chite, a kiang ah a hong uh.
A kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, Mosi in, kuapeuh a unaupa’n ta neilou in a zi sihsan leh, a unaupa’n a zi luah in a unaupa ading in chi a suahsak ding chi’n a hon gelh sak hi.
Ahi, sal sagih a om ua; a upapen in zi a nei a, chi suahlou in a si hi.
Huan a nihna in a luaha, chi suahlou in a si nawn zel a; a thumna in huchi mah bang in.
Huchi in sal sagihte chi suahlou in a sita ua, a tawpna ah numei leng a sita hi.
Thohnawn hun in a kuapen zi ahi dia le? Sagih te’n zi in a neichiat ngal ua” chi in a dong uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Hiai ziak hilou hia, na theihkhelh nak uh, Laisiangthou leh Pathian thilhihtheihna na theihlouh ziak un?
Misi lak apat a thohnawn hun un zi leh pasal a kinei lou ding ua, van angelte bang hizawta ding uh ahi.
Huan misite kaihthoh a a om ding thu lah Mosi laibu a, Loubuk ah, Pathian in, ‘Kei Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian, leh Jakob Pathian ka hi, chi a, amah a houpih dan na simkei ua hia?’
Amah misi Pathian ahi kei a, mihing Pathian ahizaw; na theikhial tel uh” a chi hi.
Huan laigelhmite lak a mi khat a hong a, a kisel uh a na ngaikhia a, Jesu’n amaute thutak in a dawng chih a thei a, a kiang ah, “Thupiak tengteng ah koi ahia thupipen?” chi in, a dong hi.
Jesu’n, “A thupipen hiai ahi: Israel aw, ngai dih uh, Toupa i Pathian uh Toupa khat kia ahi;
‘Toupa na Pathian na lungtang tengteng in, na kha tengteng in, na lungsim tengteng in leh na hatna tengteng in na it ding ahi,’ chih.
A zom hiai ahi, ‘nangmah na ki-it bang in na vengte na it ding,’ chih. Hiaite sang a thupiak thupizaw a omkei” chi in, a dawng hi.
Laigelhmi’n a kiang ah, “Hina ngei e, Sinsakpa amah zaw khat kia ahi a, amah louzaw kuamah dang a omkei uh,
Amah lungtang tengteng, theihsiamna tengteng, hatna tengteng a it a, eimah i ki-it bang a vengte it haltum thilpiak leh kithoihna tengteng sang in a hoihzaw petmah chih, na gendik ngei” a chi hi.
Piltak in a dawng chih Jesu’n a theih in, a kiang ah, “Pathian gam na gamlat kei hi” a chi a, huai nungsiah kuamah in thu a dong ngamta kei uhi.
Huan Pathian biakin a Jesu’n thu a hilhlai in, amau a houpih a, “Khrist David tapa ahi chih laigelhmite’n bangchidan a gen uh ahia?
David ngei in, Kha Siangthou in, Toupa’n, ka Toupa kiang ah, “Na melmate na khepek ngakna a ka bawl masiah ka taklam ah tuin” a chi, a chi hi.
David ngei in amah Toupa, a chi ngal a, koi a kipan in ahia amah a tapa a hih?” a chi hi. Huan mivantang in kipaktak in a thu a ngaikhia uhi.
Huan a thuhilhna ah, “Laigelhmite lak ah pilvang un; amau puanaktual silh a vak a ut ua, dawlmunte ah mite chibai a buk ua,
Kikhopnain a tutphah hoihpen leh Ankuangluina a mun hoihpen a deihtuam nak uhi;
Meithai in a negai ua, kilim bawl in sawtpipi a thum uh; huaite’n siamlouhtanna lianzaw a tang ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan sumkholna zawn ah a tu a; sumkholna a mipi sumkhiakdan a en a; mi hau tampitak in tampipi a khia uhi.
Meithai zawngtak a hongpai a, dal dangka muza nih a khia a, huai tuh paihsa khat hu ahi.
Jesu’n a nungzuite a sam a, a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, sumkholna a khe tengteng lak ah hiai meithai zawngtakin a khe tam pen hi.
Hiaite tengteng in a neihlet uh a khia ua; aman zaw a deihthoh laitak, a neih sun, a hinna ding tengteng a khe vek ahi” a chi hi.
Huan Pathian biakin a kipan a paikhiak lai in, a nungzuite lak a mi khat in a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, en dih, suang leh inn a thupi mahmah hi” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, a kiang ah, “Hiai inn thupitak na mu maw? Hihchip louh a, suang kichiang hiai ah a omkei ding” a chi hi.
Huan Olive tang a Pathian biakin zawn a a tutlai in, Peter, Jakob, Johan leh Andru te’n a kiang ah,
“Huaite chikchiang in a hongom dia? Huai tengteng a tun ding chiang in chiamtehna bang a om dia, honhilh in” chi in a simdot uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Kuamah in honkhem louhna ding in, pilvang un.
Mi tampi, Khrist ka hi, chi in, keimah min lou in a hongpai ding uh, mi tampi a khempuk ding uhi.
Huan kidou thu leh kidou thuthang na zak hun chiang un mangbang kei un; huaite hongtung ding him ahi uh. Himahleh tawpna zaw ahi nai tadih kei ding.
Nam tuam leh nam tuam a kidou ding ua, gam tuam leh gam tuam a kidou ding ua; mun tuamtuam ah zin a ling dia; kial a ke ding hi. Hiaite nauvei kipatna ahi.
“Himahleh pilvang un; vaihawmmite a hon mansak ding ua; kikhopnain ah a hon vaw ding ua; keimah ziak in gamukte leh kumpipate ma ah theihpihna pe ding in na ding ding uhi.
Huan Tanchinhoih nam tengteng kiang a hilh masak ding ahi.

Huan a honpi ua, a hon matsak hun chiang un, bang ka gen dia chi in, ngaihtuah khawl kei un; a huntak a theihsaka na om peuh uh, huai ngeingei genzaw un; a genpen zaw noumau hilou in Kha Siangthou ahizaw ding hi.
Huan hihlup ding in unaupa leh unaupa a kimansak ding ua, pa in a tapa a mansak ding; tate’n leng a nu leh pate uh a dou ding uh, a thatsak ding uhi.
Keimah min ziak in mi tengteng huat na hi ding uh; himahleh a tawppha a thuakpa, huai mi hotdam in a om ding hi.
“Himahleh zawlnei Daniel in a gen bang a hihmangbangpa kihhuai a dinlouhna ding ading na muh chiang un, a sim peuh in a omdan thei hen, huai hun chiang in Judia gam a omte tang sang ah taimang uhen;
inn tung a om kum kei hen; a insung a thil lakhe ding in lutsam kei hen.
Huan lou a om a puansilh la ding in kiknawn kei hen.
Huaini in gaite leh naunou pomte tung a gik ding hi.
Huaite phalbi a a hong tunlouhna ding in thum un.
Huai nite bang a gimthuakna thupi Pathian bawl leilung piantung a kipan tutan in a om ngei naikei a, chikmah chiang in a om ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Huan Toupa’n huai nite hihtom kei leh mihing damin a suakta kei ding; himahleh, teltuamte ziak in nite a hih tom hi.
“Huai hun chiang in, kuapeuh in na kiang ua, En dih uh; Khrist hiai ah a om, ahihkeileh En dih uh: huai ah hiam a chih chiang un gingta kei un;
Khrist takloute leh zawlnei takloute hongpawt ding ahi ngal ua, huaite’n chiamtehna leh thillamdang a hih ding uh, hithei ngial leh teltuamte nangawn a khem theihna ding un.
Nou zaw pilvang un, ngai dih uh, bangkim k’on hilh khol khinta ahi.
“Himahleh huai nite zoh in, huai gimthuakna khit in, ni hihmial in a om ding a, kha a vak nawn kei ding hi.
Van a kipan aksite a hong ke ding ua, van a thilhihtheihna omte hihlin in a om ding uhi.
Huai hun chiang in Mihing Tapa, thilhihtheihna leh thupina lianpi toh mei lak a hongpai a mu ding uhi.
Huai hun chiang in angelte a sawlkhe dia, a telte lei ningli apat leitawp a kipan a vantawp pha in a pikhawm ding uhi.
“Huchi in theipi kung ah gentehna zil un: a hiang a hong nou a, a nah a hongsel in nipi a nai chih na thei uhi.
Huchi mah bang in, nou leng huaite hongtung na muh chiang un, amah a hongnaita a, kongkhak bul mahmah ah a om chih, thei un.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, huai tengteng a tunkim masiah tulai khang a mang kei ding hi.
Lei leh van a mang dia, ka thu ahihleh a mang kei ding hi.
“Himahleh huai ni leh dak Pa kia lou ngal kuamah in, van a angelte’n leng Tapa in leng a theikei uhi.
Pilvang unla, kiging gige in thum un; a hun theilou na hi ngal ua.
Mi a in paisan a, a sikhate thu neisak a, a nasep ding uh pe chiat a, kongkhak veng leng kigin ding thu pe phot a, gamdang a vatam bang ahi.
Huaiziak in kiging gige in om un, inn neipa hongpai ding hun, nitaklam in hia, zan in hia, ak khuan in hia, zing in hia chih na thei ngal kei ua;
Huchilou in zaw, hongpai guih kha leh ihmu in a honmu kha ding.
Huan na kiang ua ka gen mi tengteng kiang a ka gen ahi, Kiging gige in om un” a chi hi.
Huan ni nih nung in Paikan Ankuangluina leh Tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina om ding ahi a; siampu liante leh laigelhmite’n, amah zekhem a, man a, a hihlup theihna ding dan a zongzong uhi;
Himahleh “Ankuanglui sung in hi kei hen, huchilou in zaw vantang lak ah buaina a hongom kha ding” a chi uhi.
Huan, Bethani khua a phak Simon inn a a omlai a, Ankuang a um lai in numei khat, alabaster bawm a spiknardi thau gimlim man tampi tawi in a hong a, a bawm a hihkham a, a lu ah a sungta hi.
Himahleh khenkhatte a lunghita kei ua, “Bang ding a thau gimlim hihmang mawkmawk ahia?
Hiai thau makhai za thum sang a tamzaw a zuak a, migentheite kiang a piak theih ahi ngal a” a chi uhi. Huchi in, a tung ah a phun uhi.
Jesu’n, “Hih hen aw; bangdia va hihbuai na hi ua? Ka tung ah thil hoihtak a hih ahi.
Mi gentheite na kiang ua om gige ahi ua, na ut hun peuh un na hehpih thei uhi; kei bel na kiang ua om gige lou ding ka hi.
A hihtheih khamkham a hih ahi; ka sapum vui ding a sathau nuhkhol ahi.
Huchi in chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, khovel tengteng koipeuh ah leng Tanchinhoih a kigenna ah hiai numei thilhih amah theihgigena ding in a kigen zel ding” a chi hi.
Huan Judas Iskariot, sawmlehnihte lak a khat in, Jesu a kiang ua zuausan a a matsak theihna ding in siampu liante kiang ah a vahoh hi.
Amau huai thu a zaktak un a kipak mahmah ua, a kiang ah dangka piak a chiamta uhi. Huchi in zuausan a matsak ding dan lemtang a zongta uhi.

Huan Tanghou silngou sohlouh ni, ni masapen, Paikan Ankuangluina belamnou a gohzelna ni uah, a nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Paikan Ankuanglui na nek theihna ding in koi ah vabawl le ung na ut?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in a nungzuite lak a mi nih a sawl a, a kiang uah, “Khopi ah valut unla, huai ah pasal bel a tui pua in hontuak dia; amah zui un.
Huan a lutna peuh ah huai inn kempa kiang ah, ‘Sinsakpa’n ka nungzuite toh Paikan Ankuang ka nekna ding uh, mikhual inn pindan koilai ahia?’ a chi, na chi ding uhi.
Huchi in aman inn pindan tungnung za tak, van omsa, mansa dimdiam a hon ensak dia; huai ah ei ading in bawl un” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite a pawtta ua, khopi ah a valut ua, a kiang ua a gen bangtak in a vamu ua; Paikan Ankuang a bawlta uhi.
Huan nitaklam a hong hih in, amah sawmlehnihte toh a vahohta uhi.
Huan an a um ua a neklai un Jesu’n, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, na lak ua mi khat, ka kiang a nesam in, hon zuausan in hon mansak ding” a chi hi.
Huan a lungkham panta ua, khatkhat in a kiang ah, “Keimah ka hi hia?” a chi chiat uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Sawmlehnihte lak a mi khat, ka kuang a tanghou hon diahpihpa ahi.
Mihing Tapa a tanchin a gelh bang tak un a pai ding: himahleh Mihing Tapa mansak ding mipa tung a gik hi: Huai mihing zaw piang kei leh amah adin a hoihzaw ding” a chi hi.
Huan an a neklai un Jesu’n tanghou a la a, a vualzawl zoh in a balkham a, a kiang uah a pia a, “La un; hiai ka sapum ahi” a chi hi.
Huan nou a la a, kipahthu a gen zoh in a kiang uah a pia a; huchi in, avek un a dawn chiat uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Hiai ka sisan a thukhun thak ahi, mi tampi dia pawt ding ahi.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, Pathian gam a a thak ka dawn ni a tun masiah grep guigah tui ka dawn nawnta kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan la a sak zoh un, a pawt ua, Olive tang ah a paita uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Na vek un lungkia in n’on taisan ding uh. ‘Belamchingpa ka khen dia, belamte a dalh ding uh’ chih gelh ahi ngal a.
Himahleh ka thohnawn nung in Galili gam ah na ma uah ka pai ding” a chi hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Avek un lungkia in hon taisan mahle uh, ken zaw k’on taisan kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, Tu zan ngeingei in, ak nihvei a khuan ma in, nang thumvei n’on kitheihmohbawl ding” a chi hi.
Aman bel khauhtak in, “Na sihna ah si sam ding himah leng k’on kitheihmohbawl kei hial ding” a chi hi. Huchibang in a chi chiat uhi.
Huan Gethsemani a chih mun uh a tung ua; aman a nungzuite kiang ah, “Ka thum sung teng hiai ah na tu un” a chi hi.
Peter, Jakob leh Johan a pi a, nakpitak a lungkham in a mangbang mahmah hi.
Huchi in a kiang uah, “Ka kha a lungkham mahmah a, sihna khophial ahi; hiai ah om unla, kiging gige un” a chi hi.
Huan neukha in malam ah a vapai zeka, lei ah a khupboh a, a hihtheih leh, huai hun in amah pel ding in a thum hi.
“Abba, Pa, bangkim na hihthei a; hiai nou kei a kipan in lamang in; himahleh kei thu hilou in nangmah thuthu hizaw hen” a chi hi.
Huan a hongpai a, amau ihmu in a hong mu a, huchi in, Peter kiang ah, “Simon, ihmu na hi maw? Dakkal khat leng kiging gige in na om theikei maw?
Khemna a na lutlouhna ding un kiging gige in thum un. Kha in tuh a ngap a, sa zaw a hatkei” a chi hi.
Huan a vahoh nawn a, a thugen ngei gen in a thum nawn hi.
Huan a hongpai nawn a amau ihmu in a hongmu nawn hi, a ihmut uh a suak mahmah ngal a; a thugen dawn dan ding leng a theikei uhi.
Huan a hongpai thumveina ah a kiang uah, “Na ihmu lailai umaw, na tawlnga lailai umaw? A hunta ve; a hun hongtungta; mihing Tapa mikhialte khut a zuausan a piak ahita hi.
Thou un, i pai ding uh; en un, zuausanpa a hongnai hi” a chi hi.
Huan a genlai tak in, Judas, sawmlehnihte lak a mi khat, a hong tungpah a, siampu liante leh laigelhmite leh upate a kipan mipi, namsau leh khetbuk tawite toh.
Huan zuausanpa’n, “ka tawp peuhmah amah ahi ding; man unla, kizentak in na pimang ding uh,” chi in chiamtehna a na hilhkhawl dimdiam hi.
Huchi in a tuntakin a vanaih a, “Rabbi!” chi in, a tawp tonton hi.
Huan amah a lenta ua, a manta uhi.
Huan a kiang a dingte lak a mi kuahiam in a namsau a dok a, siampu lianpen sikha a sat a, a bil a sat khiaksak hi.
Huan Jesu’n amau a houpih a, a kiang uah, “Temsaute, khetbukte tawi in suamhat man ding bang in, honman ding in n’ong kuan uh maw?
Pathian biakin ah niteng a thuhilh in na kiang uah ka om a; n’on man ngal kei ua, himahleh Laisiangthou thugelh a tun theihna ding eive,” a chi hi.
Huan avek un amah a nusia ua, a taimang vekta uhi.
Tangval kuahiam, puanmalngat kia bat in, amah a zui a; amah a na man uhi.
Himahleh a puanmalngat a taisan a, vuaktang in a taimangta hi.
Jesu siampu lianpen kiang ah a pi ua; siampu liante, laigelhmite tengteng toh a hong ton uhi.
Peter in gamlapi a pai in amah a zui a, siampu lianpen inn huangsung konglai pha in; sikhate lak ah meilum awi in a tu sam hi.
Jesu a hihlup theihna ding un siampu liante leh vaihawmmite tengteng in amah hekna a zong ua, a mu kei uhi.
Mi tampi in zuau in a hek ua, himahleh, a hekna thu uh a kituak kei hi.
Huan kuate hiam ading ua, zuau in a hek uhi,
Hiai mi’n, “Pathian biakin khut a lam ka hihse dia, ni thum sung in biakin dang, khut a lamlouh, ka lam ding, a chih, ka za uh,” a chi uhi.
Huchi in leng a hekna thu uh a kituak thei sam kei uhi.
siampu lianpen a lai ah ading khia a, Jesu kiang ah, “bangmah a dawnglou maw? Hiaite hon hekna bangchidan ahia?” chi in, a dong hi.
Amah lah a daidide a, bangmah in a dawngkei hi. siampu lianpen in a kiang ah, “Khrist, Hampha Tapa, na hi hia?” chi in, a dong nawn hi.
Jesu’n, “Hi e; Mihing Tapa thilhihtheihna taklam a tu a, van meilak a hongpai na mu ding uh,” a chi hi.
siampu lianpen in a puansilh a botkek a, “Theihpih dang bang din i deih dia?
Pathian a gensiat dan na zata uh; bangchi na sa ua?” a chi hi. Avek un amah sitakin a sep chiat uhi;
Huan a khen in amah a chilsiat pah ua, a maituam in khuttum in a tum ua, a kiang ah, zawlnei bang in gen in, a chi uhi: sikhate’n a paipih kawm un a khutpek un a beng ekek uhi.
Huan Peter nuailam a inn huangsung konglai a a omlai in siampu lianpen sikha nungakte lak a khat a hongpai a,
Peter meilum awi a mu a, a en a, “Nang leng Jesu Nazaret mi kiang a om na hi ve,” a chi hi.
Aman, “Na thugen ka theikei, a ngaihna leng ka theikei,” chi in, a kitheihmohbawl hi. Inlim ah a pawtkhia a; huchi in ak a khuangta hi.
Huan nungak in a mu a, a kiang a dingte kiang ah, “Hiai mi a lak ua mi ahi,” a chi nawn hi.
Himahleh a kitheihmohbawl nawn hi. Sawtlou nung in a kiang a dingte’n, Peter kiang ah, “A lak ua mi hi tawk teh, Galili gam a mi na hi ngal a,” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Huai na mihing gen uh ka theikei,” chiin, hamsia kiloh in a kichiamta hi.
Huan ak khuan nihveina a khuang pah hi. Peter in, Jesu’n a kiang a, Ak nihvei a khuan ma in nang thumvei n’on kitheihmohbawl ding, a chih a theikhethak nawn a, huai a ngaihtuah a a kapta hi.
Huan zingsang a hong hih in, siampu liante, upate leh laigelhmite leh vaihawmte tengteng toh a kihou ua, Jesu a hen ua, a pi ua, Pilat kiang ah a peta uhi.
Pilat in a kiang ah, “Judate Kumpipa na hi hia, chi in a dong a, aman a kiang ah, “Na gen bang in himah ing” chi in, a dawng hi.
Siampu liante’n thu tampi in a hek uhi.
Huchi in Pilat in a dong nawn a, a kiang ah, “Bangmah a dawnglou maw? Ngai in, a hon hekna uh tamdan!” a chi hi.
Jesu’n bangmah in a dawngkei a; huchi in Pilat in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Huan Pilat in ankuangluini in mi henta khat a nget peuhmah uh a pawtsak zel hi.
Mi khat, Barabba a chih uh, a helte lak ah hensa in a om a, amah bel helna a pang leh tualthat ahi.
Mipite a hohtou ua, amau adia a hihsak zel bang a hihsak ding in a ngen uhi.
Pilat in a dawng a a kiang uah, “Judate Kumpipa hon khahsak leng na ut uhia?” a chi hi.
Siampu liante’n hazat ziak a paipih ahi uh chih a thei hi.
Himahleh siampu liante’n mipite Barabba pawtsak zawk ngen ding in a hanthawn uhi.
Huan Pilat in a kiang uah, “Judate Kumpipa a chih uh bang ka loh tadia le?” chi in a dong nawn hi.
Huan amau “Kros ah kilhden in” chi in a kikou nawn uhi.
Pilat in a kiang uah, “Bang din maw? Bang a hihkhial a ahia?” a chi hi. Himahleh amau, “Kros ah kilhden in” chi in, a kikou semsem uhi.
Huchi in Pilat in mipite hih lungkim ut in, Barabba a pawt sakta a; Jesu a vuak zoh in Kros a kilhden ding in a peta hi.
Huan sepaihte’n inn huangsung konglai, Praitoriam a chih uah, amah a pilut ua, a pawl ua mi tengteng a samkhawm uhi.
Huchi in puansandup a silhsak ua, linglukhu phan in a khusak uhi.
“Chibai, Judate Kumpipa!“ chi in, chibai a buk uhi.
A lu sialluang in a khen ua, chil a siat ua, khukdin in chibai a buk uhi.
Huan nuihzabawlna a a zatzoh un, puansandup a hawk ua, amah puan a silhsak nawn ua, Kros a kilhden ding in a pikhia uhi.
Huan mi khualzin khat, Kurini khomi, Alexander leh Rufas pa, Simon, a gam lam a kipan hongpai, a Kros paw ding in a man uhi.
Jesu Golgotha mun ah a pi ua, huai Luguh mun, chihna ahi.
Huan uain murra toh hel a pia ua, himahleh a dawn nuam kei hi.
Kros ah a kilhden ua, a tan ding chiat uh theihna ding in aisan in a puansilhte a kihawm uhi.
A kilhden uh dak thumna vel ahi.
A hekna lai a tunglam ah a gelh ua, “JUDATE KUMPIPA” chi in.
Huan suamhat nih, a taklam ah khat, a veilam ah khat amah toh a kilhden sam uhi.
Laisiangthou in, “Amah talekte toh simkhawm ahita,” chih genna hih tangtun in a omta hi.
Huan mi kivialleh peuh in a lu uh sing in, “Ehe! Nang Pathian biakin susia a ni thum a lamnawnpa,
Ki hondam inla, Kros a kipan hongkum in” chi in a enghou uhi.
Huchi mah bang in siampu liante’n, laigelhmite toh, amau lak a enghou in, midang bawn hondam a, amah kihondam theilou pi in, a chi uh.
I muh a, i gintak theihna ding in, Khrist, Israel Kumpipa, tuin Kros a kipan hongkum leh a kei dia” a chi uhi. Huan amah toh a kilhden samte’n leng a enghou uhi.
Huan dak gukna a honghih in, dak kua na dong in gam pumpi a hong mialta hi.
Dak kua na ding in Jesu aw ngaihtak in, “Eloi, Eloi, lam a sabakthani?” chi in a kikou khia a, huai tuh “Ka Pathian, Ka Pathian, bangdia hon paisan?” chihna ahi.
Huan a kiang a ding khenkhatte’n huai a zak un, “Ngai un, Elijah a sam” a chi uhi.
Mi khat a tai a, spanji uain thuk a diah dim in, chiang dawn ah a tak a, a dawnsak hi. Khawldih ua, amah lakhe ding in Elijah a hong hiam i en ding uh” a chi uhi.
Jesu aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, a kha a khahta hi.
Pathian biakin puanzak a tunglam a kipan a nuailam pha in a hong keksuakta hi.
A mazawn a sepaih zaheutupa ding in huchibang a a kha a khah a muh in, “Hiai mi Pathian Tapa ahi ngeingei” a chi hi.
Numeite’n leng gamla tak ading in a en ua; huaite lak ah Mari Magdalini, Mari Jakob naupangzaw leh Joses nu, Salomi leng a pang uhi;
Huaite Galili gam a a omlai a, amah zui a, a na sepsak zelte ahi uhi; numei dang tampi Jerusalem khua a amah toh hohtoute leng a om uhi.
Huan nitaklam a hih in Kisakkholhna a hih ziak in, huai khawlni ma ni ahi,
Arimathai khua a om, Joseph, vaihawmpa zahtakhuai, Pathian gam lamen mi, a hongpai a, hangsantak in Pilat kiang ah a lut a, Jesu luang a ngenta hi.
Huchi in Pilat in huchibang a a sih pah lamdang a sa mahmah a, huchi in sepaih zaheutupa sam in, a sihna a sawtta hiam chih a dong hi.
Sepaih zaheutupa kam a a sita chih a theih in, a luang Joseph kiang ah a pia hi.
Huan aman puanmalngat a lei a, amah a lakhia a, puanmalngat in a tuam a, han khuakkuak ah a sial a, hankong suang in a delhta hi.
Huan Mari Magdalini leh Joses nu Mari in a sialna a mu uhi.
Huan khawlni a bei in Mari Magdalini, Mari Jakob nu leh Salomite han ah a vahoh ua, amah nuh ding in gimlim a lei uhi.
Ni sagih ni masapen in, zingsang pi in, ni suahlai in han a va tung uhi.
“Han kong a suang kuan hon khukkhiak sak ding a diam aw?” a kichih laitak un,
A dak uh leh suang khukkhiaksa in a muta uhi, a lian mahmah hi.
Hansung ah a lut ua, pasal khat puanngou silh, a taklam pang a tu a mu ua; lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huchi in aman a kiang uah, “Lamdang sa kei un; Jesu Nazaretmi, a kilhden uh, na zong ua; a thou nawnta hi; hiai ah a omta kei; en un, a sialna uh!
Himahleh pai unla, a nungzuite leh Peter kiang ah, Galili gam ah na ma uah a pai ding hi; na kiang ua a chih bang ngei in huai ah na mu ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in linna leh lamdang sakluatna in amau a phaktak ziak in a pawt ua, han a kipan a tai vengveng ua; a lauh ziak un kuamah kiang ah bangmah a genkei uhi.
Huan ni sagih ni masapen zingsang a a thohnawn in, Mari Magdalini, asung apat dawi sagih a delhkhiakna nu kiang ah a kilak masapen hi.
Amah Jesu ompih zelte kiang ah a vahoh a, misi sun a a kahlai un a vahilhta hi.
Himahleh amah a hing a, muh leng a mu chih a za na ua, a gingta tuankei uhi.
Huai nung in a lak ua mi nih gam lam zuan a a pailai un mel dang pu in a kiang uah a kilak nawn hi.
Amau nungzui dangte kiang ah a vahilh ua, amau thu leng a gingta tuankei uhi.
Huai nung in, an a umlai un sawmlehkhatte kiang ah a kilak a, a thohnawn nung a a mute thu a gintak louh uh leh a lungtang khauh thu uah a taihilh hi.
A kiang uah, “Khovel tengteng ah pai unla, thilsiam tengteng kiang ah Tanchinhoih hilh un.
A gingta a baptisma tang hotdam in a om ding a; gingtalou tuh siamlouh tang in a om ding uhi.
Hiai chiamtehnate’n a gingtate a zui zel ding: Ka min in dawite a delhkhe ding ua, pau thak in a pau ding uhi;
gulte khut in a la ding ua; sihna gu bangchibang dawn mahle uh bangmah a chi kei ding uh; damloute tung ah a khut uh a koih ding ua, a damzel ding uhi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Toupa Jesu a kiang ua thu a genkhit in van a pitouh in a om a, Pathian taklam ah a tu hi.
Huchi in amau a paikhia ua, gam teng ah thu a genta uhi. Toupa’n amau a seppih a, chiamtehnate’n zui in thu a hihkip zel hi. Amen.
Huai thilte i lak ua takpetpet a gintak a om, mi tampi in a thu gelh a na tup uh,
A tung apat a mute leh thu nasemte’n a honhilh bang un,
Theophilus aw, a bul apat bangkim chiantak in ka sui a, kizom zel in nang ading in kigelh leh a hoih ding, ka chi hi.
Tuma a nang a honhilh uh thu dik ahi chih na theihsemna ding in.
Judia gam kumpipa Herod a damlai in, Abijah pawl a mi a min Zakariah a om a; huai mi in Aron tanute lak a khat zi in a nei a, a min Elizabeth ahi.
A nih un Pathian mitmuh in diktat in a om ua, gensiatbei in Toupa thupiak leh a dan tengteng zui in a om zel uhi.
Himahleh Elizabeth a chin ziak in ta a neikei ua, a nih un upa pitak ahi tuak uhi.
Huan hichibang ahi a, a pawlte hihdan ngeina bang a Pathian ma a siampu nasem a a omlai in,
Siampu dan bang in Toupa biakin a lut leh gimlim hal a tan ahi.
Gimlim hal hunlai in mipite avek un inn pua ah a na thum uhi.
Toupa angel khat gimlim halna maitam taklam a ding in a kiang ah a kilak hi.
Zakariah in a muhtak in a lungzing a, lau leng a lau hi.
Himahleh angel in a kiang ah, “Zakariah, lau ken, na ngetna zak a a om ziak in, na zi Elizabeth in tapa hon neihsak dia, a min Johan na sak ding ahi.
Huan nang nuam in na kipak ding a; amah a pian in mi tampi a kipak ding uhi.
Toupa ngaih in mi lian ahi dia, uain leh zu himhim a dawn kei ding; a nu sung apat in Kha Siangthou in a dim ding hi.
Israel suante tampi Toupa a Pathian lam uh a ngasak nawn ding hi.

Pate lungtang tate lam a ngasak ding, mi chihmawhte mi diktat pilna lam ngasak ding, Toupa adia mipite mansa a omsak ding a bawlkhol ding in Elijah lungsim leh thilhihtheihna pu in Toupa ma ah a pai ding” a chi hi.
Huan Zakariah in angel kiang ah, “Huai bangchi’n ka thei dia? Kei putek hi ing a, ka zi leng pitek ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Angel in a dawng a, a kiang ah, “Gabriel, Pathian ma ading zel ka hi; nang houpih ding leh hiai thu hoih honhilh ding a sawl ka hi.
Ngai in ka thugente a huntak a hongtung ding, na gintak louh ziak in huai thilte a hongtun masiah na daidide dia, pau leng na pau theikei ding” a chi hi.
Huan mipite’n Zakariah a na ngak ua, Pathian biakin sung a a om sawt ziak in lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huan a hongpawt in a kiang uah thu a gen theita kei hi; huchi in, biakin ah kha kilak a mu ahi chih a theita ua; a kiang uah chiamtehna te a bawl a, pautheilou in a om hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, a nasepna ni a kimtak in a inn ah a paita hi.
Tua nite nung in, a zi Elizabeth a gaita a, kha nga a kisel zoh in,
“Mi lak a ka minse khuhna ding in, Toupa’n a honmuh in, hichibang in ka tung ah a hihta” a chi hi.
Huan a kha gukna ah Pathian in Galili gam a khua khat Nazaret a chih uah, angel Gabriel,
Nungak siangthou khat kiang ah a sawl a, huai nungak tuh David suan mi khat a min Joseph toh kikham ahi ua; nungak min Mari ahi.
Huan angel a kiang ah a lut a, “Chibai, nang nakpitak a deihtuam: Toupa na kiang ah a om” a chi hi.
Huai thu ziak in a lunghimawh mahmah a, bangchidan a chibai honbuk a diam aw? chi in, a kingaihtuah hi.
Angel in a kiang ah, “Mari, lau ken; Pathian apan deihsakna na tang hi.
Ngai in, na gai dia, tapa na nei dia, a min Jesu na sa ding hi.
Amah mi lian a honghi ding a, Tungnungpen Tapa a chi ding uh. Toupa Pathian in a pu David mangtutphah a pedia,
Jakob suante tung ah tangtawn in a vai a hawm dia, a gam in bei ni a neikei ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan Mari in angel kiang ah, “Hiai bangchi’n a hithei dia? Pasal lah neilou ing a” a chi hi.

Huan angel in a dawng a, a kiang ah, “Kha Siangthou na tung ah a hongtung ding a, Tungnungpen thilhihtheihna in a hon liahkhum ding, huaiziak in misiangthou hong piangding leng, siangthou Pathian Tapa, chih in a om ding a chi hi.
Ngai in, na sanggamnu Elizabeth in leng a teknung in tapa a paita; a ching a chih uh, tu kha a kha gukna ahita hi.
Pathian thupawt himhim thil hitheilou a omkei hi” a chi hi.
Mari in, “Ngai in, Toupa sikhanu ka hi, na thu bangzel in ka tung ah tung hen” a chi hi. Huan angel in a paisanta hi.
Huailai in Mari a thou a, singtang ah, Judia gam a khua khat ah a hoh pah hi.
Zakariah inn ah a lut a, Elizabeth chibai a buk hi.
Huan hichi ahia, Mari in Elizabeth chibai a buktak in, asung a naungek a kitawm a; Elizabeth Kha Siangthou in a hong dimta hi; aw ngaihtak in a kikou hi:
“Nang numei sapsap din na hampha hi, na gilgah leng a hampha hi.
Ka Toupa nu ka kiang a na hong bangchidan ahia awi?
Ngai in, n’on chibai buk husa ka bil a a luttak in, a kipah ziak in ka sung a naungek a kitawm hi.
A gingtanu leng a hampha hi, a kiang a Toupa thugen tangtung ding a hih ziak in” a chi hi.
Huan Mari in:
“Ka nuntakna in Toupa a pahtawi e,
Ka kha leng ka Hondampa
Pathian tung ah a kipak mahmah a.
A sikhanu namtom dan a mu a,
a hehpih a; ngai in,
tu nungsiah khang tengteng in hampha a honchi ding uh.
Amah Mi hat in ka tung ah
thil thupitak hon hihsak a,
a min leng a siangthou hi.
A laudansiamte khang nawn tan in a hehpih zel hi.
A ban in a thahatdan a ensak a,
mi kisatheite a lunggelna uh a hihdalhta hi.
A mangtutphah ua tu kumpipate a kaikhia a,
namtomte a pahtawita hi.
Gilkial te thil hoih in a hihvah a, mihaute khutvuak in a paimang sakta hi.
A sikha Israel taksap awng a huta a,
a zahngaihna theihgigena ding in.
I pipute Abraham leh a suante kiang a tangtawn thuchiam a gen bang ahi.”
Mari kha thum vel a kiang uah a om a, a inn ah a kiknawnta hi.
Huan Elizabeth nauneih a hong hunta a; huchi in tapa a hon neita hi.
A vengte leh a sanggamte’n Toupa’n a hehpih mahmah chih a naza ua, a kipahpih uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, a ni giat ni’n naungek zeksum ding in a hongpai ua; a min ding in a pa min mah Zakariah sak a tum uhi.
A nun, “Hilou e, Johan sak ding ahi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
A nu kiang ah, “Na sanggamte lak ah hiai min pu kuamah a omkei uhi, a chi uhi.
Huan a pa kiang ah chiamtehna bawl in, a min ding in bang sa le hang na deih a? a chi uhi.
Huan laigelhna pek a ngen a, a min Johan ahi” chi in a gelh hi.
Avek un lamdang a sa mahmah uhi. Thakhat in a kam hong kihong in a lei a hong kiphel a, Pathian phat in a hong paukheta hi.
A kim ua omte tengteng in a lauta ua; huchi in huai thute Judia gam singtang tengteng ah a thangta hi.
A za peuhmah in, a lungtang un a vei chiat ua, “Huai naungek bangchi phet a honghi diam aw?” a chi uhi. Huan Toupa khut in amah a panpih hi.
Huan a pa Zakariah, Kha Siangthou in a dim a, a genkhol a,
“Toupa Israel Pathian phat in om hen,
a mite a hong veh a,
tatna a bawlsak hi.
A sikha David inkuante lak ah
hotdamna ki a hon bawlsak takziak in;
Tanglai a pan a zawlnei
siangthoute kam a a gen bang in.
I doute lak leh hon haw tengteng lak a hotdam a i om ding thu,
I pipute kiang a a chiam
zahngaihna tangtung sak ding leh a thukhun siangthou theigige ding in.
I pu Abraham kiang a kichiam a,
I doute lak a a hon humbit a,
lau lou a a na i sepna ding in.
I damsung teng a a mitmuh a siangthou leh diktattak a omna ding in.
Ahi, Bawi, nang zaw
Tungnungpen Zawlnei a honchi ding ua;
a lampite bawlkhol ding in
Toupa ma ah na pai ding hi.
A khelhnate uh ngaihdamna
dia a mite kiang a
hotdamna theihna pe din.
I Pathian lungtang a hehpihna
ziak in, huchi a tunglam a kipan i tung a ni a tan chiang a,
Miallak leh sihna lim a tute tanvak ding leh khamuanna
lampi a i khete kalsuan sak ding in,” a chi hi.
Huan naungek a hong khanglian deuhdeuh a, a khalam a honghat hiaihiai a, Israelte kiang a a hong kilak masiah gamdai ah a om gige hi.
Huai lai in hichi ahi a, Kaisar Augusta in khovel tengteng min khum ding thu a pia hi.
Huai tuh Suria gam a Kurini gamukpa a hihlai a min khumna masapen ahi.
Huchi in mi tengteng a min uh khum ding in amau khua chiat uah a hoh uhi.
Huan Joseph leng, David inkuante leh a suan a hihman in Galili gam a Nazaret khua a kipan in, Judia gam a David khua Bethlehem ah a hoh hi.
Mari a zikham gaisanlai toh, min khum ding in.
Huan hichi ahi a, huai a a omlai un, a nauneih a hong hun hi.
Huan a tamasa in pasal a nei khia a; puan in a tuam a, khualbuk a a taklouh ziak un gan anpiakna ah a sial hi.
Huan huai gam mah ah belamchingte a om ua, gamlak ah zan in a belam uh a ching uhi.
Toupa angel khat a kiang uah a hong ding a, Toupa thupina in a kim uh a tanvak a; huchi in a lauta mahmah uhi.
Angel in a kiang uah, “Lau kei unla, ngai un, mi chih ading in Tanchinhoih kipahhuai mahmah k’on tut ahi.
Tuni in nou ading in David khua ah Hondampa a piangta, amah Khrist Toupa ahi.
Hiai nou ading in chiamtehna ding ahi; naungek puan a tuam, gan anpiakna kuang a lum na mu ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan angel kiang ah van mipi hon a hong omkhawm guih ua, Pathian a phat ua:
“Tungnungpen ah Pathian thupi henla, leitung a a kipahpih mahmah mihingte lak ah lemthu leng hen,” a chi uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, angelte’n van a a paisan tak un, belamchingte’n, “Tun ah Bethlehem khopha in pai lehang, Toupa’n thu a honhilh hongtung i en ding uh” a kichi uhi.
Huchi in a pai mengmeng ua, Mari toh, Joseph toh, gan anpiakna kuang a naungek lum a vamu uhi.
A vamuh un a naungek tanchin angel in a hilh a genthangta uhi.
A za peuhmah in belamchingte thugen lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Mari in thugen tengteng a lungtang in a ngaihtuah a, a vom gige hi.
Belamchingte’n angel hilh bang ngei a bangkim a muh ua a zak ziak un, Pathian pahtawi leh phatkawm zel in a kiknawnta uhi.
Huan a zeksumni ding ni giat a hong chin in, a min din, sul a a om ma a angel in a gensa, Jesu a sa uhi.
Mosi dan bang a a kisiansakna ni uh a hongtun in, Jerusalem khua ah amah a va tonpihtou ua, Toupa kiang a amah lan ding in.
Toupa thu a, “Ta pasal sul hong peuhmah Toupa ading a sehtuam a chi ding uh” chi a gelh bang in.
Toupa Dan gen bang a vakhu kop khat hiam vapal nou nih hiam kithoihna lan ding in.
Huan ngai in, Jerusalem khua ah mi khat a min Simeon a om a; huai mi midiktat leh Pathian limsak ahi a, Israelte khamuanpa ding a ngak gige a, a tung ah Kha Siangthou a om hi.
Toupa Khrist a muh masiah zaw a si kei ding chih Kha Siangthou in a na theisak him ahi.
Kha theihsak in Pathian biakin ah a valut a; naungek Jesu a nu leh apan Dan ngeina bang a a tung a hihsak ding a a hon pilut lai un,
Aman a na angpom a, Pathian a phat hi,
“Toupa, tun ah zaw na thu bangzel in,
na sikha khamuangtak in na paisak ding a:
Na hotdamna ka mit in a muhtak ziak in,
Huai michih muh a na bawltak;
Jentelte kiang a kilakna vak leh na mi Israelte thupina ding” a chi hi.
Huan naungek thu a gen a nu leh apan lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Simeon in amau a vualzawl a, a nu Mari kiang ah, “Ngai in, hiai naupang Israel lak a mi tampi pukna ding leh dinkhiakna ding a seh ahi, gensiat a om chiamtehna hi ding in leng.
Ahi, nang lungtang leng namsau in a dawt pailet ding a; huchi a mi tampi in a lungtang ua a ngaihtuahte uh a latna ding in” a chi hi.
Huan mi khat, a min, Anna, zawlnei, Phanuel Tanu, Asher nam a mi a om a; amah tektak ahi a, a nungak tawp nung siah a pasal kiang ah kum sagih a om hi,
Kum sawmgiat leh kum li hial a meithai a, aman Pathian biakin paisanlou in a sun a zan in anngawl a thum in Pathian a be zel hi.
Huchih laitak in amah a hongpai a, Pathian kiang ah kipahthu a gen a, Jerusalem tatna lamen peuhmahte kiang ah Jesu tanchin a gen hi.
Huan Toupa dan bangzel a thil tengteng a hihzoh un, Galili gam a, amau khua Nazaret ah a kik nawnta uhi.
Naungek a hong khanglian deuhdeuh a, a honghat hiaihiai a, pilna in a dimta a, Pathian deihsakna a tung ah a om hi.
Huan kumteng in, Paikan Ankuanglui hun in, a nu leh a pa Jerusalem khua ah a hohzel uhi.
Amah kum sawmlehnih a hih in dan ngeina in a hohtou uhi.
Ankuanglui zoh a a kiknawn lai un, Jerusalem khua ah naupang Jesu’n a omsan a, a nu leh pa’n a theikei uhi,
Huchi in a pawllak ua om hi nanteh a chi ua, ni khatlam a paikhin ua, a sanggamte uh leh a meltheihte uh lak ah a zong uhi.
A muhlouh ziak un zong kawmkawm in Jerusalem khua ah a kik nawnta uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, ni thum nung in, Pathian biakin ah, sinsakmite lak a tu a, a thu uh na ngaikhia a, amau thudong in, a vamu uhi.
A thu zate’n a theihdan leh a dawn dan lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
A nu leh apan amah a muh un, lamdang a sa mahmah ua: a nun, a kiang ah, “Tapa aw, bangdia hichibang a honhih na hia? Ngai in, na pa leh ken lungkhamtak in k’on zong uh” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Bangdia honzong na hi ua? Ka Pa inn a ka om ding na theikei ua hia?” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang ua a thugen a theisiam kei uhi.
Huan amau a zuisuk a, Nazaret khua a hongtung ua, a thu uh mang in a om hi. A nun huai thil tengteng a lungtang ah a vom gige hi.
Jesu a pil deuhdeuh a, a honglian hiaihiai a, Pathian leh mihing deihsak in a om deuhdeuhta hi.
Tiberias Kaisar vaihawm kum sawmlehnga kum in, Judia gamukpa Pontia Pilat ahi a, Galili gam kumpipa Herod ahi a, a unau Philip, Ituria leh Trakoniti gam kumpipa ahi a, Abilin gam kumpipa Lusania ahi.
Annas leh Kaiapha siampu lianpen ahi ua, huailai in Gamdai ah Zakariah tapa Johan kiang ah Pathian thu a hongtung hi.
Amah bel Jordan luigei kim gam tengteng ah a hoh a, thil hihkhial ngaihdamna ding in kisikna baptisma thu a gen zel hi.
Zawlnei Isai laibu a,
“Gamdai a kikou aw in,
Toupa lamlian sial unla,
a lampite tangsak un.
Guam chih sundim ahi ding a,
tang leh mual chih, hihniam ahi ding; lampi kawite tansak ahi ding a, lampi phokte mamsak ahi ding.
Huan mi tengteng in Pathian hotdamna a mu ding uh”
a chi, chih gelh bang in.
Aman baptisma tangding a kiang a mipi hongsukte kiang ah, “Gul suante aw, thangpaihna hong tungding taisan ding a kuan hon vauhilh ahia?
Huchi in kisik minpu tak in gah un, Abraham ei hon suangpa ahi na lungsim un chi kei un; Pathian in hiai suangte Abraham suante in a dingsak thei chih k’on hilh ahi.
Tu mahmah in heipi singbul teng ah koih ahita; huchi in, sing chih gah hoih a gahlou peuhmah phuk in a om a, mei ah paih in a om” a chi hi.
Huan mipite’n a kiang ah, “Bang ka hih ding ua?” a chi ua, a dong uhi.
Aman, a kiang uah, “Kuapeuh puanak nih nei in a neilou kiang ah hawm hen; kuapeuh an nei in huchibang mah in hih hen” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan siahkhawnmite leng baptisma tang ding in a hong ua, a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, bang ka hih ding ua?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hon sehsak val uh khon kei un” a chi hi.

Sepaihte’n leng a kiang ah, “Kou leng bang ka hih ding ua?” a chi ua, a dong uhi. Aman a kiang uah, “Kuamah hiamgam in hih kei unla, diklou pi in kuamah hek kei unla, na loh uah lungkim un,” a chi hi.
Huan mite’n a lamet ua, mi tengteng in Johan tungthu a lungtang ua, Khrist ahi kha zenzen diam aw? chi a a ngaihtuah lai un,

Johan in a dawng a, avek ua kiang ah, “Ken tui in k’on baptist a, himahleh keimah sang a mi thupizaw a hongpai ding, a khedap khau pheltak leng ka hi kei; aman Kha Siangthou leh mei in nou a hon baptist ding.
A khut in a phazah a tawi a, a phual zapsiangna ding leh buhpang a buhte sunlutna ding in; a site mei mit ngeilou ah a haltum ding” a chi hi.
Huan hanthawnna tampi in mite kiang ah Tanchinhoih a hilh zel hi.
Himahleh kumpipa Herod in a naupa zi, Herodia tungthu ah leh a thilhihkhelh tung a Johan in a taihilh ziak in,
A thilhihkhelh tengteng behlap in amah suangkulh ah a khum hi.
Huan mi tengteng a baptist zoh in, hichi ahi a, Jesu leng baptist zoh a a om in, a thum a, van a hong kihong hi,
Kha Siangthou sa pu in vakhu bang in a hongsuk a, a tung ah a tuta a; van a kipan in aw a hongpawta, “Nang ka Tapa deihtak na hi; na tung ah ka kipak mahmah” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n thu a hilh pattunglai in amah kum sawmthum vel ahita, mi ngaih in zaw Joseph tapa ahi a, huai Heli tapa ahi a,
huai Matthat tapa ahi a, huai Levi tapa ahi a, huai Melki tapa ahi a, huai Janna tapa ahi a, huai Joseph tapa ahi a,
huai Matthathi tapa ahia, huai Amos tapa ahi a, huai Nahum tapa ahia, huai Esli tapa ahi a, huai Naggai tapa ahi a,
huai Maathi tapa ahi a, huai Matthathi tapa ahi a, huai Semmei tapa ahi a, huai Josek tapa ahi a, huai Joda tapa ahi a,
huai Joanan tapa ahi a, huai Rhesa tapa ahi a, huai Zerubbabel tapa ahi a, huai Salathiel tapa ahi a, huai Neri tapa ahi,
huai Melki tapa ahi, huai Addi tapa ahi, huai Kosam tapa ahi, huai Elmadam tapa ahi, huai Er tapa ahi,
huai Joses tapa ahi a, huai Eliezer tapa ahi a, huai Jorim tapa ahi a, huai Matthat tapa ahi,
huai Levi tapa ahi a; huai Simeon tapa ahi, huai Juda tapa ahi, huai Joseph tapa ahi, huai Jonam tapa ahi, huai Eliakim tapa ahi a,
huai Melia tapa ahi, huai Menna tapa hi, huai Mattatha tapa ahi a, huai Nathan tapa ahi, huai David tapa ahi,
huai Jesse tapa ahi, huai Obed tapa ahi a, huai Boaz tapa ahi a, huai Salmon tapa ahi a, huai Nahson tapa ahi,
huai Aminadab tapa ahi, huai Aram tapa ahi, huai Esrom tapa ahi a, huai Parez tapa ahi, huai Juda tapa ahi,
huai Jakob tapa ahi, huai Isak tapa ahi, huai Abraham tapa ahi a, huai Tera tapa ahi a, huai Nahor tapa ahi.
Huai Serug tapa ahi, huai Reu tapa ahi, huai Peleg tapa ahi, huai Eber tapa ahi, huai Selah tapa ahi,
huai Kainan tapa ahi, huai Arpaksad tapa ahi, huai Sem tapa ahi, huai Noah tapa ahi, huai Lamek tapa ahi,
huai Methusel tapa ahi, huai Enok tapa ahi, huai Jared tapa ahi, huai Mahalalil tapa ahi, huai Kainan tapa ahi,
huai Enos tapa ahi, huai Seth tapa ahi, huai Adam tapa ahi, huai Pathian tapa ahi.
Jesu, Kha Siangthou in a dim a, Jordan lui a kipan a kiknawn a, Diabol khemkawm in gamdai ah ni sawmli Kha pi in a om hi.
Huai nite in bangmah a ne kei hi.
A tawp in a gil a hong kialta hi. Diabol in a kiang ah, “Pathian Tapa na hihleh hiai suang tanghou suak ding in thupia in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Mihing tanghou kia in a hing kei ding, Pathian kam a thupawt in a hingzaw ding” chih gelh ahi, chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan a pitou a, mitphiat kallou in khovel gam tengteng a ensak hi.
A kiang ah, “Hiai tengteng tung a thuneihna leh a thupina k’on pe ding; ka kiang a piak ahita hi, ka ut peuh kiang ah leng ka pe zel hi.
Huchi in hon bia inla, avek in nang a ahi ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Toupa na Pathian na biak ding a, amah na kia na sep ding ahi” chih gelh ahi, chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan Diabol in Jerusalem khua ah a pi a, Pathian biakin tungzum ah a koih a, a kiang ah, “Pathian Tapa na hihleh hiai a kipan ke khesuk in;
Nangmah humbit ding in na tungthu ah zaw a angelte thu a pe ding a,
amau a khut un hondom ding uhi, huchilou in zaw na khe in suang na sui kha ding” chih gelh ahi ngal a, a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Toupa na Pathian ze-et ken” chih gelh ahi, chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Diabol in a khemna ding teng a a khem khit in a lemtan hun chiang ding in a paisanta hi.
Jesu, Kha thilhihtheihna in Galili gam ah a pai nawnta a; a tanchin huai kim gam teng ah a thangta hi.
Huan kikhopnainte ah thu a hilhzel a, mi tengteng phat in a om hi.
Huan a khanletna khua Nazaret a hongtung a; khawlni a a hihdan ngeina bang in kikhopnain ah a lut a, sim ding in ading hi.
Zawlnei Isai laibu a kiang ah a pia ua, aman laibuzial a phel a, hiai thu kigelhna laitak a sim hi:
Liangvaite kiang a
Tanchinhoih gen ding a n’on seh ziak in Toupa
Kha tuh ka tung ah a om;
Aman a honsawl, salte kiang ah pawtna thu leh,
mittawte kiang a mitvak neih nawnna thu gen ding,
simmawh thuakte pawtsakna ding.
Toupa lungkim kum thu gen ding in” chih.
Huan laibu a zial a, nasepsakpa a penawn a, a tuta hi. Huan kikhopnain a mi tengteng mit a tung ah a tuta hi.
A kiang uah, “Hiai Laisiangthou thu tuni in na zak un a tangtungta” chi in a gen pan hi.
Avek un amah a phat ua, a kamsuak hehpihna thute lamdang a sa mahmah uh. “Hiai mi Joseph tapa ahi ka hia?” a chi uhi.

Aman a kiang uah, “Nou hiai thupil thu, Daktor, nang leh nang kihihdam in, Kapernaum khua a na thilhih ka na zak peuh uh, hiai ah nangmah kholam ah leng hih in chi in, honchi khong ding zaw neive ua” a chi hi.
Amahmah in, “Chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, zawlnei kuamah amah kholam ah min a kipahpih ngeikei hi.
Huchi in diktak in k’on chi ahi, Elijah damlai a, kum thum leh kha guk van a bin a, khovel a kial nakpitak a a hongtun in, Israel gam ah meithai tampi a om uhi.
Himahleh a lak ua kuamah kiang ah Elijah sawl ahi kei, Sidon gamlama Sareptha khua a numei, meithai kiang kia a sawl ahizaw hi.
Huan zawlnei Elishah damlai in leng Israel gam ah phak tampi a om ua; himahleh a lak uah kuamah hihsiangthou in a omkei, Naaman, Suria mi kia hihsiangthou in a om zawta hi” a chi hi.
Huan kikhopnain a mi tengteng in huai thute a zaktak un, a heh mahmah uhi.
A ding suausuau ua, khua a kipan in a sawnkhia ua, paihkhiak ding in a khaw omna kawlkhou ah a pi uhi.
Himahleh amah a kikal uah a paisuak a, a paimangta hi.
Huan Galili gam a khua khat, Kapernaum ah a va hohsuk hi. Khawlni’n mite thu a hilh hi.
Thuneitaka a gen ziak in a thuhilh lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huan kikhopnain ah dawinin paimi khat a na om hi;
Amah aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Eh! Nazaret Jesu, kou leh nang bang ahia i kizolhna om? Honhih mangthang ding in na hong maw? Nang k’on thei, Pathian Misiangthou na hi” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a tai a, “Dai inla, asung a kipan pawt in” a chi hi. Huan dawi in a lai ah a hihpuk a, hihnalou in asung a kipan a pawtta hi.
Huan avek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, “Bang thu ahia le? Thu neitak leh thilhihtheitakin dawininte thu a pia a, a pawt uh” chi in, a kihou uhi.
Huan huai kim gam khua teng ah a tanchin a thangta hi.
Huan a thou a, kikhopnain a kipan a pawt a, Simon inn ah a lut hi. Simon zi nu nakpitak in a khosik a, huchi in amah ading in a na ngetsak uhi.
A kiang ah ading a, khosik a tai a, a daita hi; a thou paha, a na uh a sep sakta hi.
Huan ni tumkuan in natna tuamtuam a na, damlou nei peuhmah in a kiang ah a honpi ua; avek un a tung uah a khut a koihchiat a, a na hihdam zel hi.
Huan dawite’n leng, “Pathian Tapa na hi” chi a kikou in, mi tampi sung a kipan in hongpawt uhi. Huan amau a tai a, Khrist ahi chih a theih ziak un a pau uh a phal kei hi.
Huan khovak tak in a pawt a, kuamah omlouhna mun ah a hoh a; mipite’n a zong ua, a kiang ah a hong ua, amau a paisanlouhna ding in let a tum uhi.
Himahleh a kiang uah, “Khaw dang ah leng Pathian gam Tanchinhoih ka hilh ding ahi, huai ding a sawl ka hi ngal a” a chi hi.
huchi in Galili gam a kikhopnainte ah thu a hilhta hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, mipi’n Pathian thu a ngaihkhiak ua, amah a boh huthut lai un, amah Gennesaret dilgei ah ading hi.
Huan dilgei a long nih om a mu a, himahleh ngamanmite a pawtkhia ua, a lente uh a sawp uhi.
Huchi in long khat Simon a pen ah a tuang a, a kiang ah luigei a kipan neukha tolhlut sak deuh a ngen hi. Huan a tu a, long a kipan mipite thu a hilh hi.
Huan a thugen zoh in, Simon kiang ah, “Lithuk lam naih unla, ngaman ding in, na lente uh pai un” a chi hi.
Huan Simon in a kiang ah, “Heutupa, gimtakin zankhua in ka pang ua, bangmah ka mankei ua, himahleh na thu in lente ka pai nawn ding,” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan a paih ua leh nga tampi tak a khuh ua, a lente uh a kek iakkiak hi.
Huan long dang a om a lawmte uh amau huh ding in a khutvan uhi. A hongpai ua, long nih tum phialphial in asung dim tuaktuak uhi.
Simon Peter in huai a muh in, Jesu khebul a khupboh in, “Toupa, hon paisan in, mikhial ka hi” a chi hi.
A nga mat uh amah leh a lawmte’n lamdang a sa mahmah uhi;
Simon pawlte mah Zebedai Tapa Jakob leh Johan in leng lamdang a sa mahmah sam uhi. Simon kiang ah Jesu’n, “Lau ken, tuban siah mihing na manta ding” a chi hi.
Huan a longte uh luigei ah a tolh galkai ua, bangkim paisan in amah a zuita uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, khua khat a a omlai in ngai dih, mi khat phak a pumdim a om a, aman Jesu a muh in, a ma a khupboh in, “Toupa, na ut leh n’on hihsiang thei” a chi a, a ngen ngutngut hi.
Aman a sawk a, a khoih a, “Ka ut, na siangta in” a chi hi. Huan thakhat in a phak a hong beipah hi.
A kiang ah, “Kuamah hilh ken, himahleh siampu kiang ah va ki ensak inla, na sianhonna ding Mosi sehbang lan in, mite theihchetna ding in” a chi hi.
Himahleh a tanchin thu a thang sansan a; mipi thupitak a thu za nuam leh a natnate uh hihdam ut in a hong kikhawm kheukhou uhi.
Himahleh amah gamdai ah a paituam a, a thum hi.

Huan hichi ahi a, huailai in ni khat thu a hilh hi. A kiang ah Pharisaite leh dansiamte a tu uhi, huaite Galili leh Judia gam khaw teng a kipan a hongpai ahi uhi. Mite hihdamna ding in Toupa thilhihtheihna a kiang ah a om hi.
Huan ngai dih, lupna toh mizaw khat a honzawng ua; a ma a koih ding in zawnlut a tum uhi.
Himahleh mipi ziak in zawnlut ding dan a mu theikei ua, intung a kipan a laitak ah, Jesu ma ah a lupna toh a khai khesuk uhi.
Huan a ginna uh a muh in, a kiang ah, “Mihing, na khelhnate ngaihdam ahita” a chi hi.
laigelhmite leh Pharisaite’n, “Pathian gensia hiai mi kua ahia? Pathian kia lou in kuan ahia khelhnate ngaidam thei?” chi in a ngaihtuah uhi.
Huchi in Jesu’n a ngaihtuah uh a thei a, a kiang uah, “Na lungtang uah bang na ngaihtuah ua?
Na khelhnate ngaihdam ahita, chih leh thou inla, khe in paita in, chih, a koipen gen a nuam zaw?
Himahleh, khovel ah Mihing Tapa in khelhnate ngaihdam theihna a nei chih na theihna ding un” a chi a, “Damlou mizaw kiang ah; Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn ah pai in, k’on chi” a chi hi.
Huchi in a mitmuh un a thou paha, a lupna a la a, Pathian phat kawmkawm in a inn ah a paita hi.
Huan avek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Pathian a phat uhi. “Tuni in thillamdang pitak i mu hi” a chi ua, a lau mahmah uhi.
Huaite khit in a pawt a, siahpiakna mun a tu, siahkhonmi khat a min Levi a mu a; a kiang ah, “Honzui in” a chi hi.
Huchi in bangkim a paisan a, ading a, a zuita hi.
Huan Levi in a inn ah Jesu ading in Ankuang thupitak a lui hi; siahkhonmi leh midangte toh mi tampi in amau a umpih chiat uhi.
Pharisaite leh laigelhmite a nungzuite tung ah a phun uhi, “Bangdia siahkhawnmite leh mikhialte kiang a ne a dawn na hi ua?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Mi damtheite’n daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, mi damtheiloute’n a kiphamoh uhi.
Mi diktatte sam ding a hongpai ka hi kei a, mikhialte kisik ding a sam dia hongpai ka hizaw” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Johan nungzuite’n an a ngawl zel ua, a thum zel uh: Pharisaite nungzuite’n leng huchibang mah in a hihzel uh: himahleh na nungzuite’n a ne un a dawn gige uh” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Moupi mite kiang a a pasal ding a omlai siah moupi mite an a ngawlsak thei ua hia?
Himahleh a pasal ding amau a kipan pimangnite a hongtung ding a, huai ni chiang in zaw a ngawl ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah gentehna thu leng a gen a: “Kuamah in puan lui puan thak them in a thuap ngeikei, thuap mahle uh, a thak in a kaikek dia, a thak them leh a lui a kituak kei ding uhi.
Huan kuamah in uain thak savun uain thawl lui ah a thun ngeikei, thun le uh uain thak in savun thawlte a puakzak dia, a baw dia, savun thawlte leng a segawp ding uhi.
Uain thak savun uain thawl thak ah a thun zaw ding uhi.
Huan kuapeuh uain lui na dawn khin in leng, a thak a duh pah kei hi; a lui hoihzaw a chi ngal a” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, khawlni khat buhlei ah a paisuak a, a nungzuite’n buhvuite a khiak ua, a khutpek ua nuai siang in a ne uhi.
Pharisai kuate hiam in, “Bangdia khawlni a hihsianglou hih na hi ua?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a dawng a, “David a gilkial lai a a lawmte toh a thilhih uh huai bangte leng na sim kei ua hia?
Huchi a Pathian inn a lut a, siampute loungal in a nek sianglouh tanghou koihtuam a lak a, a lawmte kiang a a piak sam thu” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Mihing Tapa zaw khawlni Toupa ahi” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, khawlni dang khat kikhopnain ah a lut a, thu a hilh a; huai ah mi khat khut taklam zaw a na om hi.
Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite’n a hekna ding a muhtheihna ding un, khawlni’n hihdam ding in a kisa hia kisa lou a sim et uhi.
Himahleh aman a lungsim uh a thei a, khutzaw kiang ah, “Thou inla, a lai ah ding khia in” a chi hi. Huan a thou a, ading kheta hi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Khawlni’n hihhoih a siang hia, hih siat? Hotdam a siang hia, hihlup? K’on dong ahi” a chi hi.
Huan avek un a en velvel a, a kiang ah, “Na khut zankhia in” a chi hi. Huan a zankhia a, a khut a damta hi.
Huchi in a heh law mahmah ua, Jesu tung a hih ding dan a kihouta uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, huai a kipan in a pawt a, thum ding in tang ah a kuan a, Pathian kiang ah zankhua in a thum hi.
Khovak in a nungzuite a sam a; a lak uah sawmlehnih a tel a, a min ding un leng Sawltak a sa hi:
Huaite Simon Peter a chih leh a unaupa Andru, Jakob leh Johan, Philip leh Bartholomai,
Matthai leh Thomas, Alphai tapa Jakob,
Simon, Zelot kichi leh Jakob tapa Judas leh a mansakpa Judas Iskariot ahi uh.

Huan amau toh a paikhia a, mun zang ah ading a, a nungzui mipite toh, Judia gam tengteng a kipan leh, Jerusalem khua a kipan leh, Tura leh Sidon kholam a tuipi gei a kipan mipi tampitak a thu ngainuam leh a damlouhnate uh hihdam ut in a hongpai uhi.
Huchi in dawinin bolgawpte leng damsak in omta uhi.
Huan a kiang a kipan thilhihtheihna a pawtkhia a, michih a hihdam zel ziak in mipi tengteng in amah khoih a tum uhi.
Huan a dak khia a,
A nungzuite enkawm in a gen a:
“Nou gentheite aw, na hampha uhi;
Pathian gam nou a ahi ngal a.
Nou tua gilkialte aw,
na hampha uhi,
tai ding na hi ngal ua.
Nou tua kapte aw,
na hampha uhi,
nui ding na hi ngal ua.”
“Mihing Tapa ziak a mite’n a honhuat ua, hon pampaih ua, hontai ua, na min uh a hoih kei chi a a hon paihmang chiang un, na hampha ding uh.
Huai ni’n kipak unla, nuam in tawm un, ngai un, van ah na kipahman uh a om kihkeih hi; huchi bangmah in a pipute un zawlneite tung ah a hih uhi.”
“Himahleh, nou mihaute aw,
na tung uh a gik e;
na khamuanna uh na mukhinta ngal ua:
Nou tua vahte aw, na tung uh a gik e;
na gil hong uh kial ding ahi .
Nou tua nuite aw; na tung uh a gik e;
lungkham a kap ding na hi uhi”
“Mi tengteng in a honphat chiang un na tung uh a gik ding hi; huchi mah bang in a pipute un zawlnei takloute tung ah a hih uhi.
“Ka thu ngaikhete aw, k’on hilh ahi, na melmate uh it unla, a hon hawte hoihna ding hih un,
Hamsia hon hamsiatte vualzawl unla, a hon simmohte thumsak un.
Biang langkhat a hon bengpa a lehlam leng doh in; na puan hon laksakpa kiang ah na puanak leng it ken.
A hon ngen peuh kiang ah pia in; huan na van hon laksakpa kiang ah ngen nawn ken.
Huan min na tung ua a hih uh na deih ding bangzel un mi tung ah leng hih sam un.
“Huan a hon itte kia na it un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? Mikhialte’n leng amau itte a it sam ve ua oi!
Na tung ua hoihte tung kia a na hoih un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? Mikhialte’n leng huchi bangmah in a hih zel ve ua oi.
Muhnawn lametnate kiang kia a thil na leitawi sak un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? Mikhialte’n leng a ngeingei mu nawn ding in mikhialte kiang ah a leitawi sak sam uhi.

Himahleh na melmate uh it unla, a hoihna ding un hih unla, lunglel hetlou in leitawi sak un; huchi in na kipahman uh a tam dia, Tungnungpen tate na hi ding uh; aman mi kipahna dan theiloute leh migiloute a hehpih hi.
Na Pa un mi a hehpih bang in mi hehpih sam un.
“Hawmsak kei un, huchi in hawmsak in na omkei ding uh; kuamah siamlou in sepkei un, huchi in siamlouh in na omkei ding uh; ngaidam un, huchi in ngaihdam in na om ding uh;

Pia un, huchi in piak in na om ding uh, hoihtak a teh a, hen gak a, sin gak a, let nawinawi in na angsung uah piak in na om ding uh. Noumau tehna ngei mah a tehsak a piak in na om ding uh a hingal a, a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, gentehna a gen a, Mittaw in mittaw mah a pi thei diam? A nih un kawkhuk ah a kekhawm kei ding ua hia?
Nungzui a heutupa tung ah a omkei; himahleh michih a siamkim chiang un a heutupa bang in a om ding uhi.
“Huan bangdia, na mit a singtum om limsaklou a, na unau mit a ninneng neuchik om mu na hia?

Nangmah mit a singtum om mulou in, na unau kiang a, Unau, na mit a ninneng neuchik om hon lakhe sak ve, bangchi a chi thei na hia? Mi lepchiah na mit apat singtum lakhe masa in, huchi in na unau mit a ninneng neuchik lak khiak ding chiantak in na mu thei ding hi.
“Sing hoih gahsia a gah a om ngeikei; sing sia lah gah hoih a gah a om ngei sam kei hi.
Sing chih amau gah chiat ah a kithei hi. Min khaulingnei kung ah theipi a lou ngeikei uh, lingnok lak ah grep gah a lou ngei sam kei uh.
Mi hoih in a lungtang goubawm hoih a kipan thilhoihte a lakhia a; migilou in a lungtang goubawm sia a kipan thilhoihloute a lakhe zel hi; a lungtang a dim val kam in a genzel hi.
“Huan nou bang ding a, ka gente hihloupi a, Toupa, Toupa, honchi na hi ua?
Michih ka kiang a hong a, ka thu za a zui peuhmah kua bang ahi ua, k’on ensak ding:
inn lammi lei thukpi tou a, suangpi tung a suangphum lemmi bang ahi uh; huan tui a hong khan in, tuikhauh in huai inn a khoha, a hihling theikei, hoihtak a lam a hih ziak in.
Himahleh thu za a manglou suangphum louh a leitung maimaha inn lammi ahi; tui khauh in huai inn a khoha, a chim paha; huai inn siatna thupitak ahi” a chi hi.
Huan mipite zak a a thugen teng a khit in Kapernaum khua ah a lut lai in,
Sepaih zaheutu kuahiam sikha deihtak china in, a si dekdek hi.
Huchi in, Jesu tanchin a zaktak in a sikha hong hihdam ding a ngen ding in a kiang ah Juda upate a sawl hi.
Amau Jesu kiang a va tung ua, limtakin a ngen uhi,
“Amah zaw na hihsak tak ahi; ka nam uh a it a, ka kikhopnain uh leng amah hon lamsak ahi” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Jesu amau toh a hongpai hi. A inn a tundek kuan in sepaih zaheutu’n a lawmte a sawl a, “Ka inn sung na lutna tak ahi kei,
Huaiziak in na kiang a hongtakin leng ka kisim kei, thu leltak gen lechin, ka naupang a dam mai ding;

Keileng mi thunuai a om ka hi a, ka nuai ah sepaihte a om ua; huai mipa, hiai mipa, Pai in, ka chih leh a pai a, midang kiang ah leng, hongpai in, ka chih leh, a hongpai a; ka sikha kiang ah leng, hiai hih in, ka chih leh a hih zel” a chi hi.
Jesu’n huai thu a zak in lamdang a sa mahmah a, a kihei a, mipi amah zuite kiang ah, “K’on hilh ahi, Israelte lak ah leng hichi tel a ginna thupi ka mu kha kei,” a chi hi.
Huan a misawlte inn ah a pai nawn ua, sikha dam in a muta uhi.
Huan sawtlouchik in khua khat Nain kichi ah a hoh a; a nungzuite leh mipi tampitak a kiang ah a hoh sam uhi.
Khopi kongkhak kiang a tun in, ngai in, misi a hon zawngkhia ua, a nu tapa neihsun ahi a, amah lah meithai ahi ngal a; a khuamite tampi a kiang ah a om uhi.
Toupa’n meithainu a muh in, a lainat mahmah a, “Kap ken” a chi hi.
Huan a vanaih a, lang a va len hi; huchi in lang zawngte a khawlta uhi. “Tangval thou in, k’on chi,” a chi hi.
Huan misi a tukhia a, a hong pauta hi. Huchi in Jesu’n a nu kiang ah a peta hi.
Huan mi tengteng in a lau ua, Pathian a phat ua, “I lak ah zawlnei thupi a hong suakta, a chi ua, Pathian in a mite hong vehta” a chi uhi.
Huan huai mi tungtang thu Judia gam tengteng leh a kiang vel gam teng ah a thangkheta hi.
Huan Johan nungzuite’n huai thu tengteng Johan a hilh uhi.
Huchi in Johan in a nungzuite nih a sam a, Toupa kiang ah a sawl a, “Hongpai dingpa na hi hia, midang hungaih lailai ding ka hi uhia?” chi in.
Huan a misawlte a kiang a hongtun un, “Baptispa Johan in, Hongpai dingpa na hi hia, midang hungaih lai ding ka hi uhia? chi in, na kiang ah kou a honsawl” a chi uhi.
Huaitak in Jesu’n, damloute, hipi veite, dawimatte tampi a hihdam a, mittaw tampite leng a mit uh ahihvak hi.

A kiang uah, “Pai nawnta unla, thil na muh uleh na zak uh Johan vahilh un; mittawte mit a hong vakta, khebaite khe in a paita ua, phakte hihsiang in om ua, bengngongte bil a hongvakta, misite kaihthohin a omta uh, a zawngte’n Tanchinhoih hilh a tangta uh.
Huan kuapeuh ka tung a lunghihlouhna mulou a hampha hi” chi in, a dawng hi.
Johan sawltakte a painung un Jesu’n mipite kiang ah Johan thu a gen a, “Bang en ding a gamdai a paikhia neita ua? Sialluang huih mut ling maw?
Ahihkeileh, bang en ding pen a paikhia neita ua? Puannem silhmi maw? Ngai un, puan thupi silh leh mi nuamsate kumpipate in ah eive a om uh.
Ahihkeileh, bang en ding pen in ahia na paikhiak uh? Zawlnei maw? Ahi tawk vaw oi, k’on chi ahi, amah zaw zawlnei sang a leng thupizaw ahi.
‘En dih, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl ahi, aman na ma ah na lampi a bawlkhol ding, chi a, a tanchin kigelh, hiai mipa ahi.’
Numei suan lak ah Johan sang a thupizaw a omkei; himahleh Pathian lalgam a mi neupen leng amah sang in a thupizaw, k’on chi ahi” a chi hi.
Huan mi tengteng leh siahkhon mite’n huai a zak un, Johan khut a baptisma tangsa ahihman un, Pathian siam a tangsak uhi.
Pharisaite leh dan theimite’n bel a kiang a baptisma a na tangkei ua, amau ading a Pathian in a hoih dia a sehsak a deihkei uhi.
Huchi in Jesu mah in, “Hiai khang bang toh ka teh diam aw? Bang toh bang ahi ua?
Naupang dawlmun a tu a, ‘tamngai hon tumsak ung a, lam lou uchin a’; ‘sun ung a, nou kaptuan lou,’ chi a, kichi tuah bang ahi uhi.
Baptispa Johan a hongpai a, tanghou a nekei a, uain leng a dawnkei a nou, Dawizawl eive, na chi uhi.
Mihing Tapa a hongpai a, a ne in a dawn a, En dih uh, anhaipa, uain haipa, siahkhawnmite leh mikhialte lawm: na chi zel uhi.
Himahleh pilna a ta tengteng in siam a tan uhi” a chi hi.
Pharisaite lak a mi khat in a kiang a an ne din a deih hi. Huai Pharisai inn ah a lut a, an a um hi.
Ngai dih, huai khua a numei khat om in Pharisai inn ah an umin a tu chih a theihtakin alabaster bawmin thau namtui a hontawi hi.
A nung ah a khepek bul ah kapkawmin adinga, a khitui in a khepek a sukawta, a sam in a nul a, a khepek a tawp a, thau namtui a nuh hi.
Huan a sampa Pharisai in huai a muh in, a lungsim in, “Hiai mi zawlnei ahihleh a khoihnu numei kua ahia, mi bangchi ahia, theihtuaktak hi a, mikhial ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Simon, na kiang ah thu kam khat gen ding ka nei” a chi a, a dawng hi. Aman “Bang ahia, Sinsakpa?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n “Dangka leitawi sak kuahiam in leibami nih a nei a: khat in makhai za nga, khat in sawmnga a ba uhi.
Huan a ditna ding a neikei ua, a ngaidam tuaktuak hi. Huai mite a kua in amah a it zaw ding a?” a chi hi.
Simon in, “A ngaihdam tampen in hi in ka gingta” chi in a dawng hi. Aman a kiang ah, “Na chi dik” a chi hi.
Huan numei lam a nga a, Simon kiang ah, “Hiai numei na mu hia? Na inn ah ka honglut a, nang ka khepek silna ding tui n’on pekei a, aman a khitui in ka khepek a sukawt a, a sam in a nul hi.
Nang tawp himhim n’on tawp kei; aman ka honglut nungsiah ka khepek a tawp a tawlnga kei hi.
Nang ka lutang ah thau n’on nilh kei a; aman ka khepek thau namtui a nilh hi.
Huaiziak in k’on chi ahi, a khelhna tampi ngaihdam in a omta; aman nakpi’n a it hi; Himahleh, ngaihdam tawm in, neuchik in a it” a chi hi.
Huaizoh in numei kiang ah, “Na khelhnate ngaihdam ahi ta” a chi hi.
Huchi in a an umpihte’n, “Mikhialte nangawn ngaidam kua ahia eita?” a kichi uhi.
Numei kiang ah, “Na ginna in a hon hondam hi” khamuangtak in paita in, a chi hi.
A nung in Jesu thuhilh leh Pathian gam Tanchinhoih genkawm in kholian leh khoneute tawn vialvial in a pai a; a kiang ah sawmlehnihte a om uhi.
Numei kuate hiam dawimat leh china damnawnte, Mari Magdalini asung a dawi sagih pawtna a chih uh,
Joanna, Chuza, Herod sumkempa zi, Sussana leh midang tampite toh ahi uh; huaite’n amau neihsa in amah na a sepsak zel uhi.
Huan mipi tampitak a hong kikhawm ua, khochih apan a kiang a hong paikhawm mite kiang ah gentehna in thu a gen a:
“Buhchithehpa buhchitheh in a kuan a; a thehlai in a khen lamsik ah a kia a, min a sikden ua, tungleng vasate’n a nezou uhi.
Huan a khen suang tung ah a kia a; a poutakin a kawtlouh ziak in a vuai pah hi.
Huan a khen loulingnei lak ah a kia a, lou in a pou tonpih a, a depmang hi.
Huan a khen lei hoih ah a kia a, a hongpou a, a leh za in a gahta, a chi hi. Huai thu a genlai in a kikou a, kuapeuh zakna ding bilnei in za uhen!” a chi hi.
Huan a nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Hiai gentehna bang chihna ahia?” chi in, a dong uhi.
Aman “Pathian gam thugukte nou theih dia piak ahi a, midang kiang ah bel gentehna kia a gen ahi; mu napi a a muh theihlouhna ding uleh za napi a a theihsiam louhna ding un” chi’n a dawng hi.
Huai gentehna thu omdan hiai ahi: Buhchi Pathian thu ahi.
Lampi sik a te thu zasate ahi uh; himahleh Diabol a hongpai a, a ginlouh ua, hotdam a hih theihlouhna ding un a lungtang ua kipan thu a lak mangsak zel hi.
Huan suang tung a te a zaktak ua thu kipaktak a pompahte ahi ua; himahleh zung himhim a neikei ua, sawtlou chik kia a gingta ua, khemna hun in a tawpsan nak uhi.
Huan loulingnei lak a kiate thuzate ahi ua; himahleh a khosak zelna uah damsung khosak ngaihtuahnate, hauhsaknate, nuamsaknate’n a dep a, a gah piching kei nak uhi.
Lei hoih a kiate bel thuza a lungtang kizen leh hoih a kem kinken a, kuhkaltak a gahsuahte ahi uhi.
“Kuamah in khawnvak de in bel in a khuh kei uh, lupna nuai ah leng a koih kei uh; a lut peuhmah in a vak a muh theihna ding un a koihna ah a koih zaw uhi.
Thanglou ding a im bangmah a omkei a, theihlouh ding leh langlou ding a selguk bangmah a omsam kei hi.
Huchi in bangchi bang in ahia na zak uh pilvang un; kuapeuh a nei piak behlap ahi ding a, kuapeuh a neilou nei a kichih sun leng laksak ahi ding” a chi hi.
Huan a nu leh a unaute’n Jesu kiang a hongnaih ua, himahleh mipi ziak in a kiang a hongtung theikei uhi.
“Na nu leh na unaute nangmah muhtum in inn pua ah ading nilouh uh” chi in, a hilh uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Pathian thu za a gingtate ka nu leh ka unaute ahi uh” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, huailai in ni khat a nungzuite toh long ah a tuang a, a kiang uah, “dil galkhat lam ah i kai ding uh,” a chi a, huchi in long a phel ua, a paita uhi.
Long a a tuanlai un Jesu a ihmuta a; dil ah huihpi a hong nungsuk a, a long uh tui in a dim dekdek a, lauhuai pi in a omta hi.
Huan a kiang ah a va hoh ua, a phawng ua, “Heutupa, Heutupa, mangthang ding ka kei umaw” a chi uhi. Amah a khanglou a huih leh tui kihot a taita a; a tawp ua a daita mai uhi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Na ginna uh kaw om ahia?” a chi hi. Huan a lau ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uhi. “Hiai mi kua ahia leh huih leh tui nangawn thu a piak a, a thu a man uh?” a kichi uhi.
Galili gam zawn Gerasinte gam a tung uhi.
Huan gam a a paikhiak lai in, khua a mi dawimat kuahiam in a na mu a; huai mi sawtpi puan silhlou in a om hi, inn ah leng a omkei a, han ngenah a omzaw hi.
Jesu a muhtak in a kikou a, a ma ah a khupboh a, aw ngaihtak in, “Jesu, Pathian Tungnungpen Tapa, kei leh nang bang i kizawlhna a om a? Hon hihgim lou ding in k’on ngen ahi” a chi hi.

Jesu’n dawinin huai mi sung a kipan a pawt ding in thu a pekhinta hi. Huai mi dawi in a man gige ahi; khainiang leh kol a bunsak ua, a vengzel ua; himahleh a gakna uh a hihtat a, dawi in gamkeu ah a delhkhia hi.
Jesu’n, “Na min bang ahia?” chi in, a dong a, aman, “Nuai ka hi” a chi a, asung a dawi tampi a lut ziak in.
Huan kawkhuk tawneilou a paithu pelou ding in Jesu kiang ah a ngen uhi.
Huai tang ah vokhon tampi a ta ua; voksung a lut theihna thu a kiang ah a ngen uhi. Aman phalna a pia hi.
Dawite huai mi sung a kipan a pawt ua, voksung ah a lut uhi; huan vokhon dilgei ken ah a taisuk ua, dil ah a tailut ua, tuihak in a sita uhi.
Huan vok vulte’n huai thil omdan a mu ua, a tai ua, khua ah leh gam ah a gen uhi.
Huan bang ahita a? chi a, en ding in a pawt chiat uhi. Jesu kiang a hongtun un, dawi pawtsan nung puansilh a, lungsim ngeina pu in, Jesu khebul a tu a hong mu ua, huchi in a lauta uhi.
Huan a theite’n dawimat a hihdam danthu a maute a na hilh uhi.
Huan a kim Gerasinte gam a mi tengteng in, a lau mahmah ziak un, amah a kiang ua kipan paimang ding in a ngen ua; huan, long ah a tuang a, a paikik nawnta hi.
Dawi pawtsan mi in Jesu kiang a omden a ngen hi.

Himahleh Jesu’n, “Na inn ah pai inla, Pathian in nang dia thil a hon hihsak a thupidan vahilh in” chi in a sawlkhia hi. Huchi in a pai a, khopi sung tengteng ah Jesu’n amah adia thil a hihsak thupidan a tangkoupihta hi.
Huan Jesu a hong kiknawn in mipi in amah a kipahpih ua; amah a nangak nilouh uhi.
Huan ngai dih, mi khat a min Jaira kikhopnain vaihawmpa a hongpai a, Jesu khebul ah a khupboh a, a inn a hoh ding in a ngen ngutngut hi.
Tanu tangkhat, kum sawmlehnih hiam ding a nei a, amah laitat din a lum hi. Huan Jesu a pailai in mipi hon in a bawh lutlut uhi.
Numei khat kum sawmlehnih sipawt a china a sum neih tengteng daktorte lak ah a zangkhinta a, kuamah in a hihdam theih tuanlouh uh;
A nung ah a hongpai a, a puanmong a khoih a; thakhat in a sipawt a kam guih hi.
Jesu’n, “Kua ahia hon khoih?” a chi hi. “Kei zaw ka hi kei” a na chi chiat uhi. Peter leh a lawmte’n, “Heutupa, mipi’n honbawh lutlut ua, honvel vengvung ve ua” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n “Kuahiam in hon khoih ahi, thilhihtheihna ka sung a kipan a pawt chih ka theih ziak in” a chi hi.
Huan numei in a kisel theihlouh a theih in, ling kawm in a hongpai a, a ma ah khupboh in a khoihsan leh thakhat a a damtak dan mi tengteng ma ah a genkhe ta hi.
Huan a kiang ah, “Tanu, na ginna na dampih hi, khamuangtak in pai in” a chi hi.
A pau laitak in kikhopnain vaihawmpa inn a kipan mi khat a hongpai a, “Na tanu a sita, Heutupa hihgim nuamdah in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n huaithu a zak in, “Lau ken, gingta mai in, huchi in a dam nawn ding” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan inn a vatun in, Peter, Johan, Jakob leh naupang nu leh pate kia chih louhngal kuamah lut a phal kei hi.
Avek un a na kap kheukhou ua, a kap vengvung ua, himahleh, aman, “Kap kei un, a si kei, a ihmu ahizaw” a chi hi.
Huan sikhin a a theih ziak un a nuihsan maimah uhi.
Jesu’n a khut a len a, “Nungak, thou in” a chi a, a sam hi.
Huan a kha a hong kiknawn a, a thou pah hi.
Banghiam nekding piak ding thu a pia hi. A nu leh apan lamdang a sa mahmah uhi. Himahleh aman a thilhih kuamah hilhlou ding in a chi bikbek hi.
Huan Jesu’n sawmlehnihte a samkhawm a, dawinin tengteng tung a thilhihtheihna leh natnate hihdam theihna thuneihna a pia hi.
Huchi in Pathian gam thugen ding leh damloute hihdam ding in a sawlkheta hi.
A kiang uah, “Zinna ading in chiangkhun hiam, kawlzal hiam, tanghou hiam, dangka hiam, bangmah keng kei un; puanak nih leng keng kei un.
Na tunna inn uah tung kinken un, huai inn a kipan paikhia un.
Huan a hon kipahpihlou peuhmah huai khua a kipan na paikhiak chiang un amau mawhpaihna ding in na khepek ua leivui tatkhia un” a chi hi.
Huchi in a kuanta ua, khua a tawn vialvial uhi. Gamchih ah Tanchinhoih a hilh ua, mi a hihdam zel uhi.
Huan kumpipa Herod in a thilhih tengteng uh a naza hi; khenkhat in, “Johan hingnawnta ahi, a chi ua, khenkhat in,
Elijah hong kilak ahi, a chi ua, khenkhat in, nidanglai zawlnei kuahiam thounawnta ahi,” a chih ziak un, a lungzingta hi.
Herod in, “Johan a lu ka tanta a; himahleh hichi lawmlawm a a thu ka zakzak kua ahia?” chi in amah muh a tum hi.
Huan sawltakte a hong kiknawn un, a kiang ah a thilhihte uh a hilh ua. Aman amau pi in khopi Bethsaida kichi ah a paituamta hi.
Himahleh mipi’n a thei ua, a zui zel uh; aman amau a na kipahpih a, Pathian gam thu a hilh a, hihdam kiphamoh peuhmah a hihdam hi.
Huan nitaklam a hong hidekta a; sawmlehnihte a hongpai ua, a kiang ah, “Khuate leh a kim gam ah giahna leh annek tuidawn zong ding in mipite paisak tanla; gamkeu mun a om hi ngal hang a” a chi uhi.
Aman bel a kiang uah, “Nou nekding pia un” a chi hi. Amau, “Mi hiai zahzah nekding i va leisak kei leh, tanghou phel nga leh nga nih kia loungal bangmah i neikei uh” a chi uhi.
Piching ngen leng sang nga phial ahi uhi. Huan a nungzuite kiang ah, “Mite a pawlpawl in tusak un, sawmnga zel in” a chi hi.
Huchi in a hih ua, a tusak vekta uhi.
Huan tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nih la a, vanlam en in vual a zawl a a balkham a, mipi ma a lui ding in a nungzuite kiang ah a pia hi.
Huan a ne ua, a vah chiatta ua, a khamval nengte uh bawm sawmlehnih a luak dimta uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu amah kia a a thumlai in a nungzuite a kiang ah a om ua; a kiang uah, “Mipite’n kua ka hi a honchi ua?” chi in a dong hi.
Amau “Baptispa Johan a honchi ua; himahleh khenkhat in, Elijah hiam nidanglai zawlnei kuahiam thounawn a honchi uh” chi in, a dawng uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Ahihleh nou kua ka hi n’on chi ua?” a chi hi. Peter in, “Pathian Khrist mah” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan huai thu kuamah hilhlouh ding chi bikbek in, thu a pia hi:
“Mihing Tapa in thil tampi a thuak dia, upate, siampu liante leh laigelhmite deihlouh in a om dia, thah in a om dia, ni thum ni’n kaihthoh in a om ding” a chi hi.
Huan mi tengteng kiang ah, “Kuapeuh in hon zuih a ut leh, amah kingaihsaklou in, niteng a Kros pua in honzui hen.
Kuapeuh a hinna humbit ut in a tan ding; kuapeuh keimah ziak a a hinna tan in a humbit ding hi.
Min khovel a pum in nei henla, amah kimangsak hiam, ahihkeileh kimanloh leh amah ading in bang a phatuam dia?
Kuapeuh keimah leh ka thu zahpih mi zaw Mihing Tapa in amah thupina toh, a Pa thupina leh a angel siangthoute thupina toh a hongpai chiang in a zahpih ding hi.
Diktakin k’on hilh ahi, hiai a dingte a khen, Pathian gam a muh masiah uh sihna chiamlou hial ding a om uh” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jesu’n a thugen nung ni giat hiam in, Peter, Johan leh Jakob a pi a, thum ding in tang ah a hohtou uhi.
A thumlai in a mel omdan a hong lamdang a, a puansilhte mi lengthei in a hong ngouta hi.
