Huan ngai in, mi nih amah toh a kihou ua, huai mite Mosi leh Elijah ahi uh.
Thupina a kithuam in a kilak ua, Jerusalem khua a sihna a hih bukim ding thu a gen uhi.
Peter leh a lawmte bel a ihmut uh a suak a, himahleh a hak teitei ua a thupina leh a kiang a mi nih ding a mu uhi.

Huan huai mite’n Jesu a paisan deklai un, Peter in Jesu kiang ah, “Heutupa, ei din hiai a om a hoih, aidakbuk thum i khoh dia, nang adin khat, Mosi adin khat, Elijah adin khat, a chi a, a thugen leng a theikei hi.”
Huan huai thute a genlai in mei a hong kai a, amau a liahta; mei lak a a lutlai un a lau uhi.
Meipi a kipan aw a hongsuak a, “Hiai ka Tapa, ka tel ahi, amah thu ngai un” a chi hi.
Huan aw a daihtakin Jesu kia a muta uhi. Huan a daidide ua, huailai in a thilmuh uh kuamah bangmah a hilh kei uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, a zing in tang a kipan a paisuk nung un, mipi thupitak in amah a nadawn uhi.
Ngai in, mipi lak ah mi khat a kikou a, “Sinsakpa, ka tapa en ding in k’on ngen ahi, amah ka tapa neihsun ahi.
Ngai in, dawi in a man a, a kikou kheguih zel a; huchi in, a chilphuan ke hial in a gimbawl a, nakpitak a hih sidup in a paisan zel hi.
Na nungzuite kiang ah delhkhe ding in ka ngen a, a hih theikei uhi” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n, “Ginna neilou khang leh lampialte aw, bang tan ahia ka honthuak theih ding? Na tapa hiai ah honpi in” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan a hong pailai in dawi in a hihpuk ek a, nakpitak in a gimbawlta hi, himahleh Jesu’n dawinin a tai a, naupang a hihdam a, a pa kiang ah a paisak nawn ta hi.
Huan mi tengteng in Pathian thupidan lamdang a sa mahmah uhi. Huchi in mi tengteng in a thilhih tengteng lamdang a saklai un, Jesu’n a nungzuite kiang ah,
“Hiai thute na bil uah lut hen. Mihing Tapa mihingte khut a matsak a om ding ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Himahleh a thugen a theisiam kei uh, a theih theihlouhna ding un a kisel ahi, huai thugen tanchin amah a dong ngam kei uhi.
Huan a lak uah kua a thupipen dia? chih thu in a na kisel uhi.
Jesu’n a lungtang ua a ngaihtuah uh a thei a, naupang neu khat a kai a, a sik ah a omsak a, a kiang uah,
“Kuapeuh ka min ziak a hiai naupang neu kipahpih keimah hon kipahpih ahi ding uh; keimah hon kipahpih hon sawlpa kipahpih ahi: na vek ua lak a neupen a thupipen ahi ding” a chi hi.
Johan in “Heutupa, kuahiam na min a dawite delkhia ka mu ua, k’on zuihna ua a panlouh ziak in ka khamta uhi” chi in, a dawng hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, kham nawn kei un, kuapeuh nou hon dallou nou lam a pang ahi” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, amah pitouh a hun ding in, Jerusalem khua a hoh a tum chiltela, a ma ah mi a ma taisak hi;
Huan a pai ua, amah adia na kimansak ding in Samari mite khua khat ah a lut uhi.
A mai Jerusalem kholam naih a a lat ziak in amah a na kipahpih kei uhi.
Huchi in a nungzui Jakob leh Johan in huai a theih un, “Toupa, amaute kangmang ding in, Elijah hih bang in van a kipan mei hong ke ding a thu ka piak uh hoih na sa hia?” a chi uhi.
Amah a kihei a, amau tai in, “Bang kha apan na hi ua chih theilou na hi uhiam?
Mihing Tapa mite hih mangthang ding hilou in, hondam ding a hongpai ahizaw hi” a chi hi. Huan khaw dang ah a paita uhi.
Huan lampi a a pailai un, kuahiam in a kiang ah, “Na paina peuh ah k’on zui ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Sehalte’n kua a nei ua, tungleng vasate’n leng bu a nei uh, himahleh Mihing Tapa in zaw a lu ngakna ding mun a neikei” a chi hi.
Jesu’n midang kiang ah, “Honzui in” a chi hi. Himahleh aman, “Toupa, ka pa hon vuisak phot in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Misi in a misi uh vui uhen; nang Pathian gam thu va genzaw in” a chi hi.
Huan midang in leng “Toupa, k’on zui ding, himahleh ka inn a mite kampha in hon khasak phot in” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Kuapeuh leilehna len a, nunglam nga Pathian gammi hitak ahi kei” a chi hi.
Huaikhit in Toupa’n midang sawmsagih a sep a, a paina ding khoteng leh mun teng ah, a ma ah nihnih in a sawl hi,
A kiang uah, “Buh lak ding a tam mahmah a, himahleh a semte a tawm uh, huchi in a buhla ding a semdingte sawl ding in buh neipa kiang ah ngen un.
Pai un; ngai un, nge lak a belamnou bang in k’on sawl ahi.
Dangka ip, kawlzal leh khedap tawi kei unla, lampi ah kuamah chibai buk kei un.
Huan inn na lutna peuh uah a masapen in, hiai inn ah khamuanna tung hen, chi un.
Huai inn a khamuanna ta a om leh na khamuanna thu uh a tung ah a om ding a; a omkei leh na kiang uah a hongkik nawn ding hi.
Huai inn ah tung in om nilouh unla, a honpiak peuh uh ne in dawn un; nasemmi loh mutak ahi. Inn teng ah banhoh kei un.
Huan khua na lutna peuh uah hon kipahpih uleh, honlui peuh uh na ne ding ua; huai a damlou omte leng na hihdam ding ua;
A kiang uah, Pathian gam na kiang uah hongtungta, na chi ding uh.
Khua na lutna peuh uah hon kipahpih kei uleh a kongzing uah paikhia unla,
Na khaw leivui uh ka khepek ua bang teng na tung uah tatsiang ung e; himahleh Pathian gam hong naita chih thei un, na chi ding uhi.
K’on hilh ahi, huai ni chiang in huai khuate thuak sang in Sodom khaw thuak ding a dan a omzaw ding hi.
“Korazin, na tung a gik e; Bethsaida, na tung a gik e; Noumau a thillamdang kihihte Tura leh Sidon khua a hih hileh, saiip puansilh in, vut lak a tuin a kisik khinthamta ding uhi.
Himahleh thukhenni chiang in nou thuak sang in Tura leh Sidon khaw thuak ding a dan a omzaw ding.
Huan nang Kapernaum, van tan a tawisang in na om a, misi khua a sawnkhiak a om ding na hi.

Kuapeuh na thu uh ngaikhia keimah thu ngaikhia ahi a; kuapeuh nou hon deihlou kei hondeih lou ahi a; kuapeuh nou hon ngailou kei hon ngailou ahi a, kuapeuh kei hon ngailou tuh hon sawlpa ngailou ahi” a chi hi.
Huan sawmsagihte kipaktak in a hongkik nawn ua, “Toupa, dawite nangawn na min ziak in ka thuthu un a om uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Khophia bang in Setan van a kipan a hong kia ka mu hi.
Ngai un, gulte, aikamte sikdenna thu leh, melma thilhihtheihna tengteng tung a thuneihna k’on pia ahi; bangmah in a hon hihna kei hial ding,
Himahleh dawite na thuthu ua a om ziak un kipak kei un; van a na min uh gelh a hih ziak in kipak zaw un” a chi hi.

Huailai tak in Jesu Kha Siangthou in a kipak mahmah a, “Pa aw, lei leh van Toupa, nang mi pil leh mi bengvakte kiang ah hiai thu na im a, naungekte kiang a na thanziak in k’on phat hi; ahi, Pa, huchibang hih nang ngaih in a hoih ahi.
Ka Pa’n bangkim hon kemsak a, Tapa kua ahia, Pa loungal kuamah in a theikei, Pa leng kua ahia, Tapa leh a kiang ua Tapa in a theihsak nopnate kia loungal kuamah in a theikei” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite lam a nga a, a sim in, “Na thilmuhte uh a mu mitte a hampha e!
K’on chi ahi, zawlnei tampi leh kumpipa tampite’n leng na thilmuhte uh muh a kilawp gige ua, himahleh a mu kei uh, bil a na zakte uh leng zak a kilawp thei mahmah ua, himahleh a za kei uh” a chi hi.
Huan ngai un dantheimi kuahiam ading a, amah ze-etna din, “Sinsakpa, tangtawn hinna neihna ding in bang ka hihdia? a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Dan laibu ah bang gelh ahia? Bangchi’n na sim a?” a chi hi.

Huan aman “Toupa, na Pathian na lungtang tengteng, na kha tengteng, na hatna tengteng, na lungsim tengteng in na it ding ahi; nangmah na ki-it bang in na vengte na it ding ahi chih” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, “Na dawng dik hi; huchi in hih lechin na hing ding” a chi hi.
Aman bel kisiamtansak ut in, Jesu kiang ah, “Ahihleh, ka inveng kua ahia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a dawng a, “Kuahiam Jerusalem khua a kipan Jeriko khua ah a hohsuk a, suamhatte a tuak hi. Amau a puansilh a suahsak vek ua, a vua ua, si dektak in a pai santa uhi.
Huan siampu kuahiam huai lampi ah a vapai suk a, a muhtak in lampi sik lehlam ah a pel maimah hi.
Huan huchibang mah in Levi chi mi khat leng huai mun a hongtung a, a muh tak in lampi sik lehlam ah a pel maimah hi.
Himahleh, Samaria gam a mi kuahiam zin pailai a omna a hongtung hi, a muhtak in a lainat mahmah hi.
A kiang ah a vahoh a, a liamnate thau leh uain a buak a, a tuam a, amah gan tung ah a tuangsak a, khualbuk ah a paipih a, a kemta hi.
Huan a zing in makhai nih a suahkhia a, khualbuk kempa kiang ah a pia a, amah na kem inla, hiai ban a na zat teng, ka hong kiknawn chiang in k’on din ding” a chi hi.
Huai mi thumte lak ah, suamhatte tuakpa adin, invengte hipen kua hi in na gingta a? a chi hi.
Aman, “A hehpihpa” a chi hi. Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Nang leng huai mah bang in va hih in” a chi hi.
Huan a zinkawm un khua khat ah a lut a; numei khat a min Martha in a na zintun hi.
Huai nun sanggamnumei khat a nei a, a min Mari ahi, huai minu Toupa khebul ah a tu a, a thu a ngaikhia hi.
Martha in bel nasem in a buai mahmah a; huchi in a kiang a hongpai in “Toupa, ka sanggamnu’n kei kia nasem ding a honkhiat khawksalou na hi maw? Honhuh ding in sawl in, a chi hi.
Toupa’n, “Martha, Martha, thil tampi na ngaihtuah a, buai neive; thil khat kia a kul ahi;
Mari in tanhoih a tel a, huai laksak ding ahi kei” chi in, a dawng hi.
Hichi ahi a, Jesu koilai mun hiam ah a thum a, a thum khit in a nungzui mi khat in a kiang ah, Toupa, Johan in a nungzuite thum dan a hilh bang in hon hilhsam in, a chi hi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Na thum chiang un hichibang in na chi ding uh, a chi hi:
“Ka Pa uh, van a om,
na min kizahtak hen,
Na gam hongtung hen.
Niteng in ka nekkhop uh
an honpia in.
Ka khelhnate uh hon ngaidam in, Kou leng kuapeuh bat hon neite ka ngaidam uhi;
Khemna ah hon pilut ken.
Gilou lak ah hon huzaw in”
Huan a kiang uah, “Na lak ua kuahiam in lawm nei henla, zanlai in a kiang a hoh in, ‘Lawm, tanghou phel thum hon leitawi sak ve.
Ka lawm zin in a hon tawn a, a ma a lui ding bangmah ka neikei,’ chi henla;
Aman inn sung apan in, ‘hon hihbuai ken; tun zaw kong khak ahi, ka tate leng ka kiang ah lupna ah a ihmuta uh; thou in ka hong pe theikei chi in, dawng leh k’on hilh ahi,’
A lawm a hih ziak in thou in a va pekei na a, a nget ngutngut ziak in thou in a deih zahzah a vape ding hi.
“Huchi in k’on hilh ahi, ‘Ngen un, piak na hi ding uh; zong un, na mu ding uh; kiu un, honsak in na om ding uhi.
Kuapeuh a ngen in a mu a, kuapeuh a zong in a mu a, kuapeuh a kiu honsak in a om ding hi.’
Nou lak a pa pen, a ta in tanghou ngen leh kua ahia suang pe ding? Ahihleh ngasa ngen leh kuan ahia gul pe ding?
Ahihkeileh, aktui ngen leh aikam a pedia hia?
Huchi in nou migilou in bawn na tate thil hoih piak dan na theih uleh, na Pa uh van a om in a ngente Kha Siangthou pe natel in chia!” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n dawi pautheilou khat a delhkhia hi. Hichi ahi a, dawi a pawttak in pautheilou a hong pauta; huchi in mipi’n lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Himahleh a khen in, “Dawimang Beelzibul ziak in eive dawite a delhkhiak zel” a chi uhi.
A khen in, amah ze-etna ding in, van a kipan chiamtehna a ngen uhi.
Aman a ngaihtuah uh a thei a, a kiang uah, “Koi gam leng amah kidou peuh a mangthang a; inkuan khat leng amah kidou a mangthang hi.
Setan leng amah a kidou leh a gam bangchi’n a dingkhe dia? Beelzibul ziak in dawite a delhkhia, n’on chi ua;
Ken Beelzibul ziak a dawite delhkhia ka hihleh, na tate un kua ziak in ahia a delhkhiak uh? Huaiziak in amau noute hon vaihawmsak dingte ahi ding uh.
Himahleh ken Pathian khutzung ziak a dawite delhkhia ka hihleh Pathian gam na kiang uah a hong tungkhinta hi.
Mi hat in hiamzat kim tawi a a inn a ven sungteng, a sum bittak in a om gige hi;
Himahleh amah sang a hatzaw in a hongsual a, a zoh chiang in, a muan a galvan kim a sut a, sum a laksak a hawmzak zel hi.
Kuapeuh ka lam a panglou tuh hondou ahi a, kuapeuh honlak khawm pihlou in a hihzak hi.
“Dawinin mi sung a kipan a pawt in, khawlna zong in tui omlouhna mun peuh ah a vakvak hi. Huan, khawlna himhim a mu kei a, ka pawtna inn ah ka kiknawn mai ding, a chi hi.
A va tun in phiatsiang leh zephoih in a mu hi.
Huaitak in a vapai a, amah sang a gilou zaw dawi dang sagih a honpi a, huai mi sung ah a lut ua, a teng uhi; huai mihing omdan nanung amasa sang in a hoih keizaw tham hi” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, huai thute a genlai in, mipi lak ah numei khat a kikoukhia a, a kiang ah, “Nang honpai gil a hampha e, na nawitep toh” a chi hi.
Aman bel, “Pathian thu za a zuite mi hampha ahizaw uh” a chi hi.
Huan mipite a kiang a a hong kikhop lai un, Jesu’n, “Hiai khang giloute ahi uh; chiamtehna a zong ua; himahleh Jonah chiamtehna chih louh a kiang uah chiamtehna piak ahi kei ding.
Jonah Ninevi khua a mite adia chiamtehna a hih bang in, Mihing Tapa leng tulai khangte chiamtehna a honghi ding hi.

Thukhenni chiang in, Simlam kumpinu tulai khangte kiang ah ading dia, siamlouh a tangsak ding; Solomon pilna ngaikhe ding in kawlmong a kipan a hong ngal a; ngai un, Solomon sang a thupizaw hiai ah a om hi.
Thukhenni chiang in, Ninevi khua mite tulai khangte kiang ah ading ding ua, siamlouh a tangsak ding uh, Jonah thuhilh ziak in a kisik ngal ua; ngai un, Jonah sang a thupizaw hiai ah a om hi.
“Kuamah in khawnvak a det un inn nuaitawng ah a koih ngeikei uh, lawh nuai ah leng a koih ngei sam kei uh, a lut mite’n vak a muh theihna ding un a koihna ah a koih zel uhi.
Na sapum khawnvak na mit ahi; na mit a chim leh na sapum leng avek in a vaksuak nak hi; a chim kei leh bel na sapum a mial vek nak hi.
Huchi in na sung a vak om mial a na hi kha ding e, pilvang in.
Huchi in na sapum koilai peuh miallou a avek a a vakkhiak leh, khawnvak vak petpet in a tatvak bang in a vakkhe vek ding” a chi hi.
Huan a genlai in Pharisai khat in amah kiang a an ne ding in a chial a; huchi in, a lut a an a ne hi.
Pharisai in a an um a muh in, annek ma a khut a sillouh lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Toupa’n a kiang ah, “Nou Pharisaite’n nou leh kuang pawlam na silsiang ngeitak ua; na sung lam ulah lepgukna leh gilou in a dim hi.
Mihaite aw, pawlam bawlpa’n sunglam leng a bawl ka hia?
Himahleh na neihte uh mi genthei kiang a thil thawnpiak ding in zangun; huchi in ngai un, nou adin bangkim a siangvek hi.

“Nou Pharisaite aw, na tung uh a gik e: pudina, pardi leh anteh louhing teng sawm a khat na pia ua, diktatna leh Pathian itna na limsak kei uhi; himahleh huaite eive na hih ding uh, a dangte hihlou tuanlou in.
Nou Pharisaite aw, na tung uh a gik e: kikhopnain ah tutphah hoihpente leh dawlmun a chibai bukte na ngaisang uh.
Laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte, na tung uh a gik hi: han chiamteh louh, a tung a theilou a mi a paizelna bang, na hi uh” a chi hi.
Huan dantheimi khat in, a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, hiai thu na gen kou leng hontai na hi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan aman “Dantheimite aw, nou leng na tung uh a gik: Puakgik, puak haksa pipi mite na suan ua, nou lah huai puakgikte na khutzung khat un leng na khoih ngeikei uhi.
Na tung uh a gik: na pipute uh thahsa zawlneite han inn na lam ngal ua.
Huchi in na pipute uh thilhihte na theihpih un na hoihsakpih uh ahi; amau a that ua, nou a han innte na lam uhi.
Huaiziak in ‘Pathian pilna in leng, a kiang uah zawlneite leh sawltakte ka sawl dia, a khen a that ding ua, a khen a sawi ding uh a chi hi;’
Zawlnei tengteng sisan, leitung piantung a kipan a kisuah, tulai khangte tung ah phu a laktheih ding in a chi hi;
Abel sisan suah a kipan, Zakariah, maitam leh biakin kikal a sisan suah tan in; ahi, k’on hilh ahi, tulai khangte tung ah phu a kila ding.
Nou dantheite aw, na tung uh a gik e: theihna tabi na paimangpih ua; nou lah na lut ngalkei ua, mi a lut dingte na dal uhi” a chi hi.
Huai a kipan a pawtin, laigelhmite leh Pharisaite’n amah a tawng ua, thu chiteng gensak teitei tum in leh,
A pau khelh zenzen leh mat tum in a tang gige uhi.
Huchihlai a mipi sang tampi kiphu muimui zou hial a hong kikhop un, Jesu’n a masapen in a nungzuite kiang ah, “Pharisaite silngou, lepchiahna lak ah pilvang un,
Langlou ding a selguk bangmah a omkei a; theihlouh ding a im leng bangmah a omsam kei hi.
Huaiziak in mial a na gen peuh uh vak a zak in a om ding; dantan sunggil a bilbul a na thugen uh intung vum a tangkoupih in a om ding hi.
“Huan ka lawmte aw, k’on hilh ahi, sapum that a, huai nung a bangmah dang hih nawn theiloute zaw, kihta kei un,
Himahleh kua ahia na lauh ding uh k’on hilhkhol ahi; a hihlup nung a leng Gehenna a paihtheihna thuneipa lau un.
Kawlgit nga dal dangka nih in a zuaksek kei ua hia? Himahleh a lak ua khat leng Pathian in a mangngilh ngeikei hi.
Na luzang ua samzangte nangawn leng simvek ahi uh. Lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sang in na manpha zaw uhi.
“Huan k’on hilh ahi, mite ma a hon gum peuhmah Pathian angelte ma ah Mihing Tapa in a gum sam ding hi.
Himahleh mite ma a hon kitheihmohbawl peuhmah Pathian angelte ma ah ka kitheihmohbawl sam ding hi.
Mihing Tapa kalh a thugen peuhmah a genkalhna ngaihdam sak ahi ding a; himahleh Kha Siangthou hilhial gensia zaw a gensiatna ngaihdam sak ahi kei ding hi.
Kikhopnain a mite, vaihawmte, heutute ma a a honpi hun chiang un, bangchi in, bang thu in ka dawng dia, bang thu ka gen dia chi in lungkham kei un.
Huai huntak in, bang ahia na gen ding uh, Kha Siangthou in a honhilh ding hi” a chi hi.
Mipi lak a khat in Jesu kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, ka u kiang ah gou hon hawmsam ding in hilh in” a chi hi.
Himahleh aman a kiang ah, “Mihing, noumau tung ah kuan ahia kei thukhenpa hiam tanseppa hiam a honbawl? a chi hi.
A kiang uah, “Pilvang unla, enna lak ah kiveng un; hauhna mihing damsan ahi kei hi” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah gentehna thu a gen a, “Mi hau kuahiam a hong pung mahmah hi.
Huchi in a kingaihtuah a, bangchibang in ka hih diam aw? Ka buh leh bal koihkhawmna ding ka neikei hi.
Hichibang in ka hih ding e; ‘ka buhinte ka phel ding a, a sang a lianzaw in ka lam dia, huai ah buh leh ka van tengteng ka koih khawm ding.’
Huan ka kha kiang ah, ‘Kha aw, kum tampi sung daih ding tampi na kholta; khawl inla, ne in dawn inla, nuamtak in om in, ka chi ding,’ a chi hi.
Himahleh, Pathian in a kiang ah, ‘Nang mihai, tu zan chiah na kha a hon laksak ding uh, huai na lamkhiakte, kua a ahi ta dia?’
Amau ading a gou khola, Pathian lam a haulou huchi ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huan a nungzuite kiang ah, “Huaiziak in k’on hilh ahi, bang ka ne diam aw? chi in, na hinna thu uh leh, bang silh in ka teng diam aw? chi in, na sapum thu uh lunghimawh kei un.
Nekding sang in hinna a thupizaw hi, puansilh sang in leng sapum a thupizaw hi.
Va-akte ngaihtuah dih uh, buh a tuh kei ua, a at sam kei uh; buhpang leh buhin leng a neikei uh; himahleh Pathian in amau a vak hi; noute vasate sang a manpha zaw na hi uhi.
Huan nou lak ah lunghimawh ziak a kua in ahia amah dunglam tong khat a hihsang thei tuan?
Hiai lel leng hih theiloute’n bangdia thil dang lunghimawh nak na hi ua?

Lilite khandan ngaihtuah dih uh; na a semkei ua, khau leng a khek kei uh; himahleh k’on hilh ahi, Solomon hilhial leng a thupina tengteng a a kizep in, hiai lilite lak a khat bang a zep in a omkei hi.
Huchi in gamlak loupa tuni a hing a, a zing a thuk a khul nawn mai ding bawn Pathian in hichitel a a zep leh, aw, nou mi gintawmte, huaite sang in puansilh honpe zaw natel in chia!
Huan na nekding uh, na dawn ding uh, zong kei un; ginglel in leng omsam kei un.
Khovel a namte’n huai thil tengteng a zong uh; huai bang na kiphamoh uh chih na Pa un a theigige hi.
Himahleh Pathian kumpi gam zong zaw un, huchi in huai thilte leng a honpiak behlap ding hi.
“Pawltawmte aw, lau kei un; nou kiang a gam piak ding na Pa uh kipahlam tak ahi.
Na neih peuh uh zuak unla, mi gentheite kiang ah pia un; van ah guta naih phaklouhna ah, leikha neksiat louhna ah, dangka ip lui theiloute, gou bei theiloute kibawl un.
Na gou omna peuh ua na lungtang uh leng a om ding ziak in.
“Na kawng uh gak unla, na khawnvak uh leng diam sa in om un.
Min a pu uh kitenna Ankuangluina a kipan a a hongpai chiang a, kongkhak a hon kiuhtaka, hon theipah ding a a ngak nilouh bang in, om un.
A pu uh a hongpai chiang in sikha na ngak nilouh a a muhte a hampha uhi; chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, aman a kawng a gak dia, amau an um ding in a tusak ding a, a na uh a sepsak ding hi.
Zanlai in hiam, thoh hun in hiam a hong a, huchibang a a honmuh, huai sikhate a hampha uhi.
“Himahleh, hiai thei un, guta a hongpai ding inn neipa’n thei leh, a veng dia, a inn a phenvang sakkei ding hi.
Nou leng mansa in om un, na gintak louh dak un Mihing Tapa a hongpai ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan Peter in “Toupa, hiai gentehna koumau kia hia n’on hilh, mi tengteng?” a chi hi.
Toupa’n “Sumkempa ginom, piltak, a pu in a hunteng a a tan ding uh hawmsak ding a a inkuanpihte tung a heutu a a bawl ding kuapen ahi dia le?”
A pu a hongpai chiang in sikha huchibanga hih a hon muhding pa a hampha hi.
Diktakin k’on hilh ahi, a neih tengteng tung a heutu ding in a bawl ding hi.
Himahleh huai sikha in a lungtang in, ‘ka pu a hongzok kei ding e, chi in, a sikhanu, a sikhapa, na vaw ta leh, ne in dawn in na kham leh;
Huai sikha pu, a ginlouh ni’n, a theihlouh lai in, a hong ding a, tum nih a honsuah ding a, mi ginomloute tan bang a tangsak ding hi.’
Sikha a pu deihlam theigige na pi a na kiging tuanlou a, a pu deihlama gamta loupa’n nakpitak a vuak a tuak ding hi.
Himahleh theiloupia vuakna tham a gamtapa’n awlchika vuak a tuak ding. Tampi piak a ommi kiang ah tampi phutin a om ding a; tampi kepsakpa kiang ah a tamsem a phut ding uhi.
“Khovel a mei khesuk ding a hongpai ka hi; tuin leng kangpah leh china tel ing e!
Himahleh baptisma tan ding ka nei, huai hih tangtun mateng ka om nuamlou hina mahmah e:
Khovel a lem lengsak ding a hongpai hiam honsa na hi umaw? Hidek lou, k’on hilh ahi, kidou lengsak ding a hongpai ka hi zaw.
Tunung chiang in inkuan khat ah mi nga a kidou ding uh, thum in nih, nih in thum.
A kidou ding ua, pa in a tapa, a tapa in a pa; a nu in a tanu, a tanu in a nu; a pi in a mou, a mou in a pi, a chi hi.
Huan mipi kiang ah leng, “Tumlam a meikai na muh uleh, ‘vuah a zu ding na chi pah ua; huan a hongzu ngei zel hi.’
Sim huihnung na muh chiang un, ‘khua a lum ding, na chi ua, a hong lum hi.’
Nou lepchiahte aw, khovel leh van omdan leng na genchian thei ngal ua, bang a chia tu hun theichian siamlou na hi ua?
“Bang a chia noumau in thudik kikhen lou na hi ua?

Honhekpa toh thukhenpa kiang na zotlai un, lampi ah kilep theihna khat zawng teitei in; huchilou in zaw thukhenpa mai ah hon kailut ding a, thukhenpa’n miman heutu a hon mansak ding a. Miman heutupa’n suangkulh ah a honkhum kha ding hi.
K’on hilh ahi, paihsa san khat nangawn na piakkim masiah, huai a kipan na pawtkei hial ding” a chi hi.
Huailai in, kuate hiam a om ua, huaite’n Galili mite Pilat in a sisan uh Pathian biakna sagohte lak a a helsakte tungtang Jesu a hilh uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Huai Galili mite huchibang thil a thuak ziak un Galili mi tengteng sang in migilou tuan hi un na gingta ua hia?
Hilou e, k’on hilh ahi, nou leng na kisik kei uleh huchi mah bang in na mangthang vek ding uhi.
Huan Siloam insang in mi sawmlehgiat a delhlupte leng Jerusalem khua a om tengteng sang in migilou zaw hi un na gingta ua hia?
Hilou e, k’on hilh ahi, nou leng na kisik kei uleh huchibang mah in na mangthang vek ding uh” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan hiai gentehna a gen a: “Kuahiam in a grephuan ah theipi kung khat a suan hi. Huan a kung ah gah a hong zong a khat leng a mu kei hi.
Huchi in grepgui kemmi kiang ah, ‘Ngai in, kum thum sung hiai thei kung ah a gah ka va zong zel a, khat leng ka mu kei; phuk in; bangdia mun dal a om nilouh ahia?’ a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah ’Toupa, tukum bek om henla, a kimvel in ka tou ding a, ek in ka phungvuh lai dia;
Huchi a a gah leh a hoih ding, a gah keileh phuk mai in,’ ” a chi hi.
Huan khawlni’n aman kikhopnain khat ah thu a hilh hi.
Ngai in, kum sawmlehgiat hatlouhna nei dawimat numei khat a om hi; huai mi a kun kheukheu a, amah thu in ading tang theikei hi.
Jesu’n amah a muhtak in a sam a, a kiang ah, “Numei, na hatlouhna in a honkhahta” a chi hi.
Huan a tung ah a khut a koih a; thakhat in a tang paha, Pathian a phatta hi.
Jesu’n khawlni a mi a hihdam ziak in kikhopnain heutu a heh a, mipi a houpih a, a kiang uah, “Mihing nasepna ding ni guk a om vo oi; huai sung in kihihdam un, khawlni’n hilou in” a chi hi.
Toupa’n a kiang ah “Nou lepchiahte aw, khawlni’n na bawng uh hiam na sabiltung uh hiam a annekna a kipan phel in, tui dawn ding in na pikhe chiat zel uh hilou hia?
Hiai numei, Abraham tanu ahi ngal a, ngai un, Setan in kum sawmlehgiat a man a, Khawlni’n leng hiai gak phelsaklouh dan ahi ahia?” a chi a, a dong hi.
Huai thute a genlai in a melma tengteng a zum ua; mipi bel a thil thupi hih tengteng ziak in a kipak uhi.
Huchi in aman “Pathian gam bang ahia? Bang toh ka teh dia?
Ankam chi tangkhat min a lak a, huan a a theh bang ahi, huai a hongpou a, sing a honghi a, tungleng vasate a hiangte ah a giak uh,” a chi hi.
Huan “Pathian gam bang toh ka teh dia? a chi nawn a.
Silngou numei in a lak a, anbuang tehna thum lak a avek a a thoh mateng a phum bang ahi” a chi hi.
Huan aman thuhilh kawm zel in, Jerusalem kholam naih in kholian leh khoneute a tawn zel hi.
Kuahiam in a kiang ah, “Hotdamte tawmchik ahi ding u maw? a chi hi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, kong kawchik ah lut tum teitei un; k’on hilh ahi, mi tampi in lut a tum ding ua, a lut theikei ding uhi.
inn neipa a thoh a, kong a khaknungin, nou a pua ading in, Toupa, kong hon hon in, chi in kongkhak n’on kiuh chiang un, aman koilam mi na hi ua, hon theilou ka hi’ chi in, nou a hon dawng ding hi.
Huai hun chiang in, nou, na muh in ka ne ua, ka dawn ve ua oi, ka kongzing uah leng thu na hilh zel vaw oi, na chi ding uh.
Aman, k’on hilh ahi, koilam mi na hi ua, k’on thei ngeikei; nou thil gilou hihte aw, ka kiang apan paimang vek un, a honchi ding hi.
Abraham, Isak, Jakob leh zawlnei tengteng Pathian gamsung a om na muh ua, nou pawlam a delhkhiak na hih uh na kitheih chiang un, na kap ding ua, ha na gawi ding uhi.
Huan suahlam, tumlam, simlam leh mallam a kipan mite hongpai ding ua, Pathian gam ah ne in a dawn ding uhi.
Huan ngai un, nanungpente leng masapen a om ding ua, masapente leng nanungpen a om ding a om uh” a chi hi.
Huaitak in Pharisai kuate hiam a hongpai ua, a kiang ah, “Pawt inla, hiai a kipan paimang in: Herod in a honthat ding” a chi uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Huai sehal kiang ah hiai thu vagen un: ‘Ngai in, tuni toh, zingchiang toh dawite ka delhkhe dia, natnate leng ka hihdam dia a ni thum ni’n ka zou ding.
Abang abang hitaleh tuni toh, zingchiang toh, a ni thumni toh ka pai zel ding hi; Jerusalem khaw pawlam ah zawlnei sih theih hilou ahi’.
Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem: zawlneite that, na kiang a honsawlte uh suang a na denglum: akpi in a noute a khanuai a a opkhum bang in na tate bangzah vei opkhum ka tuma? Himahleh na ut kei uhi.
En in, na inn a vuak a taisan in a omta hi. Ka hon hilh ahi, ’Toupa min a hongpai a hampha, na chih masiah n’on mu kei ding’ ” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, khawlni’n Pharisai vaihawmmi khat inn a an ne ding a a hoh in a na enkhia uhi.
Huan ngai in a ma ah damlou chibawk kuahiam a om hi.
Huchi in Jesu’n dantheimi leh Pharisaite a houpih a, a kiang uah, “Khawlni’n hihdam a siang hia, siang lou?” a chi hi.
Amau a daidide uhi. Aman damlou a long a, hihdam in a paisakta hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Na lak uah sabiltung hiam bawngtal hiam nei unla, khawlni’n tuikul sung ah ke leh kua ahia kaikhe pah lou ding?” a chi hi.
Huai thu a dawng theikei uhi.
Huan a mi sapte un tutna mun hoihpen a telzel uh a mu a, a kiang uah gentehna a genta hi:
“Kitenna an ne ding a kuapeuh in a honsap chiang in tutnamun hoihpen ah tu kei un; huchilou in zaw noute sang a mi zahtakhuai zaw a na sam kha dia, huchi in a hon sampan,
‘Hiai mi tutna ding awn in,’ a honchi dia; huan nang zumpi in tutnamun niampen ah na tu nawn phing ding hi.

A honsap chiang in tutnamun niampen ah na vatu zaw ding a; huchi in a hon sampa a hong chiang in, na kiang ah, ‘Lawm, tutnamun hoihdeuh ah tuin, a hon chithei ding.’ Huchi in na an umpihte mitmuh in pahtawi in na om ding hi.
Kingaisang peuhmah a neu ding a: kingaineu pahtawi a om ding a hih ziak in” a chi hi.

Huan a sampa kiang ah leng, “Sun an hiam nitakan hiam a Ankuang na lui chiang in, na lawmte, na unaute, na sanggamte, na inveng mihaute na sam kei ding hi; huchilou in zaw a hon samthuk ding ua, a hon thuk chitchiat kha ding uhi.
Ankuang na luichiang in, tagahte, piangsualte, khebaite, mittawte, na sam zaw ding hi;
Huchi in huai ten thukna ding a neih louh ziak un, na hampha ding; midikte thohnawn chiang in thuknawn na hih ding ziak in” a chi hi.
Huan a an umpih kuahiam in huai thu a za a, a kiang ah, “Pathian gam a an ne ding a hampha hi” a chi hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, “Mi kuahiam in nitakin Ankuang thupi a lui a, mi tampi a sam hi;
Annek hun in, a misapte kiang ah, ‘hong paita un, bangkim a manta,’ chi ding in a sikha khat a sawl hi.
Huan avek un thukhatsat in paulam a neichiat uhi. A masapen in, a kiang ah, lou ka leita a, a en dia ka hoh kiphamoh hi; hon hehpih inla, hon ngaisiam hen, a chi hi.
Midang in bawngtal tuaknga ka leita a, a siat a phat chian ding in ka kuan ding a, hon hehpih inla hon na ngaisiam hen, a chi hi.
Huan midang in, zi ka neita a, huaiziak in ka hoh theikei, a chi hi.

Huan sikha in a pu kiang ah, huai thute a vahilh hi. Huan inn neipa a heh a, a sikha kiang ah, ‘kintak in pawt inla, kongzing leh kawmkal ah pai mengmeng inla, tagahte, piangsualte, mittawte, khebaite hiai lai ah hon pilut in,’ a chi hi.
Huan a sikha in, Pu, n’on thupiak bang in ka hihkhin a, himahleh mun awnglai lai ve aw, a chi hi.
A pu in, sikha kiang ah, ‘Pawt inla, lamlian leh daikil kal ah pai inla, ka inn dimna ding in mi hon sawllut teitei in a chi hi.’
K’on hilh ahi, ka misapte khat in leng ka Ankuang lui a chiam kei hial ding” a chi hi.
Huan mipi thupitakte a kiang ah a hohsam ua; huchi in amah a kihei a, a kiang uah,
“Kuapeuh ka kiang a hongpai in, a pa, a nu, a zi, a tate, a unau a sanggamnu, leh amah hinna nangawn huat kei leh ka nungzui ahi theikei ding.
Kuapeuh a Kros pua a hon zuilou ka nungzui ahi theikei ding.
Nou lak a kuapeuh in insang lam tum le uchin, amasa in tuin, lam zohna khop sum na neih uleh neih louh thei ding in, aman ding dan kua ahia sut lou ding?
Huchilou in zaw, suangphum khin phot a, a lamzoh theihkei leh, a en peuh in,
‘Hiai min gel napi in a zou thei ngalkei chi in, a nuihsan ding uh.’
Huan kumpipa kuan ahia kumpipa dang dou ding a a kuan ding in, amasa a tu a, mi sing nih toh amah dou ding a hong, mi sing khat toh a tuah ngam ding leh ding louh, mi dong lou ding?
Huchi ahihkei vanglak leh, kumpipa dang gamlapi a a omlai in, kituahna lam thuchiam ngen ding in palai a sawl ding hi.
Huchibang in, nou lak ah kuapeuh a neih tengteng paisanlou ka nungzui ahi theikei ding hi.
“Chi a hoih a, himahleh chi a pen khit in, bang in a hih al nawn ding a?
Lei ading in a hoihkei; ekvum ding in leng a hoih sam kei; min a paikhia uhi. Kuapeuh zakna ding a bilnei in za hen” a chi hi.
Huan siahkhawnmite leh mikhialte tengteng in a thu za ding in a kiang a honzuan uhi.
Pharisaite leh laigelhmite’n, “Hiai mi’n mikhialte a khawl a, a kiang uah an a ne chi in, a phun tuaktuak uhi.”
Huchi in aman a kiang uah hiai gentehna a gen hi:
“Nou lak ah kuapeuh in belam za khat nei henla, a lak ua khat mangsak leh gamdai ah sawmkua leh kuate nusia in, a mang pen a muhnawn masiah kua ahia zong lou ding?
Huan a muhnawn un kipaktak in a liangzang ah a pua hi.
Inn a tuntak un, a lawmte leh a vengte uh a samkhawm ua, a kiang uah, ‘hon kipahpih un, ka belam mang ka munawnta,’ a chi hi.
K’on hilh ahi, huchi mah bang in, midik sawmkua leh kua kisik tuan ding neiloute sang in mikhial khat kisik tung ah van a mi a kipak zaw ding uhi.
Huan numei kuapeuh in makhai sawm nei in khat mangsak leh, khawnvak de in, inn phiat in a muhnawn masiah kua ahia hoihtak a zong lou ding?
Huan a muhnawn in, a lawmte leh a vengte a samkhawm a, hon kipahpih un, ka makhai mansak ka mu nawnta, a chi hi.
K’on hilh ahi, huchi mah bang in, Pathian angelte ma ah, mikhial khat kisik tung ah, kipahna a om nak hi” a chi hi.
“Mi kuahiam in tapa nih a nei hi:
A naupangzaw pen in, a pa kiang ah, Pa, gou ka tansik honpia in, a chi hi. Huchi in, a sum a kiang uah a hawmta hi.
Huan ni sawtlou nung in a tapa naupangzaw pen in a tansik tengteng a lakhawm vek a, gam gamlapi ah a zinta hi, huai ah nuamtat lua in a sum a mawkzat mangta hi.
Huan a zatbei zohvek tak in, huai gam ah kial thupitak a hongtung a; nekding a hong tasamta hi.
Huchi in huai gam mi khat a vabel a; aman vokan pe ding in a lou ah a sawl hi.
Huan thil hawng vok in a nekte ua kihihvah a ut mahmah a; kuamah in bangmah a pe ngalkei uhi.
Huan amah leh amah hong kiphawkkhiak tak in, ka pa kiang a kilohte annek senglouh a tamtam toh, kei lah hiai ah gilkial a si ding himai veng in;
Ka thou ding a, ka pa kiang ah ka pai ding a, a kiang ah, “Pa, van a tung ah leh nangmah mitmuh in thil ka hihkhial; na tapa a sehtak ka hita kei hi;
Na kiang a kiloh khat bang in honbawl in ka chi ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in a thou a, a pa kiang ah a paita hi. Huan gamlapi a a omlai in, apan a mu a, a lainat mahmah a, a tai a, a vapoma a tawp tonton hi.
A tapa in a kiang ah, ‘Pa, van a tung ah leh nangmah mitmuh in thil ka hihkhial; na tapa a sehtak ka hita kei’ a chi hi.
Himahleh apan a sikhate kiang ah, ‘puan hoihpen hon lakhe pah unla, silhsakun; a khut ah zungbuh a khepek ah khedap bunsakun;
Bawngnou thautak honla unla; gou un, i ne ding ua, nopbawl in i om ding uh;
Hiai ka tapa a si a, a hong hing nawnta hi; a mang a, i mu nawnta uhi,’ a chi hi. Huchi in kipaktak in a om panta uhi.
“Huan a tapa upazaw lou ah a om hi; inn a hong tunkuan in bangpeuh tum ging leh lam husa a zata hi.
Huchi in a sikha khat a sam a, tua bang ahia? chi in, a dong hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, ‘na nau a hongtung a, damtak a a muhnawn ziak in na pa’n bawngnou thautak a gou,’ a chi hi.
Amah a heh a, a lut nuam kei hi; huchi in, a pa hong pawtkhia a, amah a hongsam hi.
Himahleh aman a pa kiang ah, ‘ngai in, kum hiai zah na nna sem ing a, na thu a talek ngeilou ing a; ka lawmte toh kipahna ka bawlna ding in kelnou leng n’on pe ngeikei hi.
Himahleh hiai na tapa kizuakte kiang a na sum nemang vekpa a hong tuntakin amah ading in bawngnou thautak na goh a,’ chi in a dawng hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, ‘Ka tapa, ka kiang a om gige hi chin a, ka neih tengteng nang a ahi.’
Kipak leh nuamtak a om ding ahi; hiai na nau a si a; a hong hing nawn a; a mang a, i mu nawnta ahi” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n a nungzuite kiang ah hiai thu leng a gen a: “Mi sumhau kuahiam in sumkemmi a nei a; huai min a sum a zatbeisak thu ah a kiang ah a hek uhi.
Huchi in aman amah a sam a, a kiang ah, ‘na tungtang thu ka zak bangchidan ahia? Na sumkepthu hon pelut in; tuban siah sumkem in na pang thei nawn kei ding,’ a chi hi.
Sumkempan, a lungsim in, ‘ka toupa’n ka sumkep hon tawpsak ding hi a, bangchi’n ka hihdia leh? Lei toh ka ngapkei a, khutdoh lah ka zum ngal hi.
Sumkep a hon tawpsak hun chiang in a innte ua hon omsak theihna ding un ka hih ding dan ka theita,’ a chi hi.
Huchi in a toupa sumbate a sam chiat hi, a masapen kiang ah, ‘Ka toupa lak ah bangzah na ba a?’ a chi hi.
Aman, ‘thau tehna dan za khat, a chi a, aman a kiang ah, na lai la inla tumeng inla, sawmnga gelh in,’ a chi hi.
Midang kiang ah, Nang bangzah na ba a? a chi hi. Aman buh tehna dan za khat, a chi a, aman a kiang ah, ‘Na lai la inla, sawmgiat gelh in,’ a chi hi.
Huan a toupa’n sumkempa diklou a lemtheih ziak in a phat a; vak tate sang in hiai khovel tate a tulai thu ua a pilzawk ziak un.
“K’on hilh ahi, diktatlouhna sum in nou adin lawm bawl un, sum a bei hun chiang a tangtawn a omna a a hon omsak na ding un.
‘Kuapeuh tawmchik tung a ginomlou tampi tung ah leng a ginom kei uhi.’
Sumlem tung a bawn na ginom kei uleh kuan ahia hauhna dik noute hon kemsak ding?
Midang a tung a bawn na ginom kei un, noumau a kua’n honpe ding a?
Sikha kuamah in heutu nih na a semkop theikei, khat hua in khat a deih ding, ahihkeileh khat gum in khat a musit ding, Pathian leh sumna na semkop theikei ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan Pharisai sum deihte’n huai thu tengteng a za ua, a nuihsan uh.
Huchi in aman a kiang uah, “Mi mitmuh a ki siamtangsak na hi uh, himahleh Pathian in na lungtang uh a thei a; mihing lak a a pahtawi uh Pathian mitmuh in kihhuaipi ahi.
“Dan leh Zawlneite, Johan hongom tan in a om a; huai nung siah Pathian gam Tanchinhoih a gen ua, michih in pawnglut a sawm uhi.
Himahleh danthu sutvom neuchik a man sang in lei leh van a manthat a baihlam zaw hi.
“Kuapeuh zi ma a, a dang nei, angkawm ahi; kuapeuh mi zi maksa nei angkawm ahi.
“Huan mi hausa kuahiam a om a, puan sandup leh puanmalngat a silh a, niteng in nuamsatak in a om hi.
A min Lazar khutdoh, meima a pumdim, a kongkhak bul ah a lum hi.
Mi hausa dohkan a khatehnen kiate nek a lunggulh a; uite’n a meimate a liahsak uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, khutdohpa a si a, angelte’n a paipih ua, Abraham angsung ah a koih uhi. Mi hausa leng a si a, vui in a omta hi.
Huan misi khua ah gimthuak in a om a, a daktou a, gamlapi a Abraham leh a angsung a Lazar om a muta hi.
A kikou a, ‘Pa Abraham, ka tung ah zahngai inla, Lazar honsawl in, a khutzung muk tui ah diah henla, ka lei hihvotna din; hiai mei kuang ah ka gim mahmah hi,’ a chi hi.

Himahleh Abraham in, ‘Ka tapa, nang na damlai in, thil hoih na mu a, huchi mah bang in Lazar in thil hoihlou a muh thei tanla; himahleh tun ah amah zaw hiai ah khamuangtak in a om a, nang zaw gim neive.

Tua lou leng hiai a kipan a nou kiang a paitumte a pai theihlouhna ding un leh kuamah huai a kipan a kou kiang a a hong kai theihlouhna ding in, kou leh nou kikal ah guam thupitak koih denin a om hi,’ a chi hi.
Huan aman, ahihleh, pa, amah ka pa inn ah paisak ding bek in, k’on ngen hi;
‘Sanggam pasal nga ka nei a; hiai gimna mun ah a hongpai kha ding uh chih a kiang uah vahilh leh’ a chi hi.
Abraham in bel, Mosi leh zawlneite a neive ua oi; huai mite thu ngai le uh a ke, a chi hi.
Huan aman Pa Abraham, ‘hilou e; misi lak a mi hilhial a kiang uah hoh leh a kisik ding uh, a chi hi.
A man a kiang ah, Mosi leh zawlneite thu a ngaih kei un zaw, misi lak a mi thounawn hoh mah leh leng a taksang tuankei ding uh’ ” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n a nungzuite kiang ah, “Puknate omlou thei a hi kei; himahleh puknate omsakpa tung a gik hi:
Hiai mi neute lak a khat leng hihpuk sang in, a hihpuk ding ngawng ah buhgawina suang oksak in, tuipi ah kipai leh, amah ading in a hoihzaw ding hi.
Pilvang un, na unau in thil a hihkhelh leh taihilh in; a kisik leh, ngaidam in.
Ni khat in na tung ah sagihvei thil hihkhial in sagihvei, ka kisik, chi a nang lam a a hong kiheinawn leh na ngaidam ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huan sawltakte’n Toupa kiang ah, “Ka ginna uh khangsak in” a chi uhi.
Toupa’n, “Ankam tangkhat bang ginna na neih uleh, hiai singtheimi kung kiang ah, na kibotkhia inla, tuipi ah na kisuan in, na chi ding ua, na thu uh a mangmai ding hi.
“Himahleh nou lak ah kuapeuh in leilet hiam, belam ching hiam sikha nei unla, a hong vaipaitakin, an hon umpah aw, kua ahia nou lak a na chi ding?
‘Ka nekding hon bawlsak inla, puanteng inla, ka nek a ka dawn zoh masiah ka nek bawl in; huaikhit chiang in nang ne in dawn in, na lak ua kua ahia na chi zaw lou ding?’
Na thu bang ua a hih ziak in na sikha kiang ah kipah thu na gen ngei ua hia?
Huchibang in ‘nou leng na kiang ua thupiak tengteng bang a na hih nung un, sikha phatuamlou, ka hih ding him uh ahi ka hih uh,’ chi un,” a chi hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jerusalem kholam a a pailai in, Samaria leh Galili gam a tawn hi.
Huan koi khua hiam a a lut ding in, mi phak ngenta, sawm in a na dawn uhi, huaite’n gamla tak ading in aw ngaihtak in,
“Jesu Heutupa, ka tung uah zahngai in” a chi uhi.
Aman amau a muh in, a kiang uah, “siampute kiang ah va kilak un” a chi hi. Hichi ahi a, a pailai un a hong siang chiat uhi.
Huan a lak ua khat in dam chih a kitheih in, aw ngaihtak a Pathian phatkawm in a kiknawnta hi.
Huan a khebul ah a khupboh a, a kipahthu a gen hi; huai mi Samari mi ahi.
Huchi in Jesu’n, “Mi sawm hong siangta hilou na hi umaw? Kuate koi ah?” chi in a dong hi.
Pathian phat ding a kiknawn, hiai theihlouhmi kia loungal kuamah muh a omlou uhia?” a chi hi.
A kiang ah, “Thou inla, paita in; na ginna na dampih hi” a chi hi.
Pharisaite’n Pathian gam hongtun hun ding a dot ziak un, a kiang uah, “Pathian gam muhtheih in a hongtung kei;
‘En un, hiai ah, hiam, huai ah, hiam, a chi kei ding uh;’ ngai un, Pathian gam na lak uah a om” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan nungzuite kiang ah, “Mihing Tapa damlaini ni khat bek na muh nop ni uh a hongom ding a himahleh na mu kei ding uh.
Na kiang uah, ‘hiai ah en un, hiam pam ah en un, a honchi ding ua; paikhe kei unla, amau leng zuikei un;’
van nuai lehlam a khua a phiat a, van nuai lehlam tanpha a a vak zel bang in Mihing Tapa a hongpai ni in a om ding ahi ngal a.
Himahleh huai ma in thil tamtak a thuak ding a, tulai khangte deihlouh in a om ding hi.
Noah damlai a thil omdan bang in, Mihing Tapa a hongpai nawn hun chiang in a omsam ding hi.
Noah long a a lut a, tui a honglet a, avek ua a hihlup khit ni a tun masiah, a ne un a dawn ua, zi leh pasal in a kinei uhi.
Huchibang in Lot damlai in a hongom a; a ne un a dawn ua, a lei un a zuak ua, a suan un a lam uhi.
Himahleh Sodom khua a kipan Lot a pawt ni’n van a kipan mei leh kat a zu a, avek un a hihlumta hi.
Huchibang in Mihing Tapa a hong kilak ni in a om ding hi.
Huai ni’n kuamah a van insung a om, amah inn tung a om, vala ding in kum kei heh; lou a om leng paikei hen.
Lot zi theigige un.
Kuapeuh a hinna humbit sawm in a mansuah ding a kuapeuh a hinna tan in a humbit ding hi.
K’on hilh ahi, huai zan in lupna khat ah mi nih a lum ding ua, khat lak in a om ding a, khat nutsiat in a om ding hi;
Numei nih buhgawizan in a om ding ua, khat lak in a om dia, khat nutsiat in a om ding hi.
Pasal nih lou ah a om ding ua; khat lak in a om dia; khat nutsiat in a om ding, a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Toupa, koi ah eita?” a chi ua, a dong uhi. Aman a kiang uah, “Saluang omna peuh ah musane leng a kikhawm ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan lunglellou a thum gige ding ahi chih theihna ding in a kiang uah gentehna a gen hi.
“Koilai khua hiam ah thukhenmi khat a om a, huai min Pathian a lau kei a, mihing leng khawk a sa kei hi;
Huai khua ah meithai khat a om a; aman, ka melma tung ah phu hon laksak in, chi in, a kiang ah a hoh zihzeh hi.
Huan amah sawtkhop a utkei a; himahleh a nung in a lungsim in ‘Pathian laulou in mihing khawksa keimah leng;
Hiai meithainu’n hon hihbuai ziak in a phu ka laksak mai ding, huchilou in zaw, a hong zihzeh leh a hon hihgim kha ding,’ a chi hi.
Huan Toupa mah in, thukhen midiktatlou thugen za un.
‘A tung uah dohzou tadih mah leh leng a mitel, a sun a zan a amah samte phu Pathian in a laksak kei dia hia?’
K’on hilh ahi, a phu uh a laksak pah ding. Himahleh Mihing Tapa a hongpai chiang in leitung ah huaibang ginna a honmu diam?” a chi hi.
Huan midiktat hih kigingta a, midang tengteng musit kuate hiam kiang ah hiai gentehna leng a gen hi:
“Mi nih Pathian biakin ah thum ding in a hohtou ua; khat Pharisai ahi a, khat siahkhonmi ahi.
Pharisai ading a, amah kia in hichibang in a thum hi: ‘Pathian, midang, negute, dikloute, angkawmte bang ka hihlouh ziak leh, hiai siahkhonmi bang leng ka hihlouh ziak in na tung ah ka kipak hi.’
Nipikal teng in nihvei an ka ngawl zel; ka neih teng sawm a khat ka pe zel, a chi hi.
Siahkhonmi’n bel gamla tak ading in, vanlam leng a dak ngamkei a, ‘Pathian, kei mikhial, ka tung ah zahngai in,’ chi in, a awm a kitum hi.
K’on hilh ahi, amasa sang in huai mipen siamtang in a inn ah a paikikta hi. Kingaithupi peuh a niam ding ua, kingainiam pahtawi in a om ding” a chi hi.
Huan a khoih ding in a kiang ah a naungekte uh a honpi ua; nungzuite’n huai a muhtak un a na tai uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n amau a sam a, “Naupang neute ka kiang ah hon paisak unla, kham kei un, Pathian gam huchibang mite a ahi ngal a.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, kuapeuh Pathian gam naupang neu in a kipahpih bang a kipahpihlou asung ah a lut kei hial ding” a chi hi.
Vaihawmmi kuahiam in, a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa hoih, tangtawn hinna tanna ding in bang ka hihdia?” chi in, a dong hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Bangdia hoih honchi? Mi khat kia ngallou kuamah hoih a omkei, huai tuh Pathian ahi.
Thupiakte, Angkawm ken, Tualthat ken, Gu ken, Hek ken, Na nu leh pa zahtak in, chihte, na thei vele” a chi hi.
Aman, “Huai tengteng ka tuailai chila kipan ka zui zel” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n huai a zaktak in a kiang ah, “Tuin thil khat na sam hi; na neih tengteng zuak inla, gentheite kiang ah hawm in, huchi in van ah gou na nei ding; huan hongpai inla, honzui in” a chi hi.
Amah bel, huai thute a zak in a lungkham mahmah a, a hauh mahmah ziak in.
Huchi in Jesu’n amah a en a, “Mihaute Pathian gam lut haksa na e!
Mi hausa Pathian gam a lut sang in sangawngsau phimbil a lutsuak a baihlam zaw hi” a chi hi.
Huai thu zate’n, “Huchi a hih in kua hotdam in a omthei dia?” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Mihing hih vuallouh Pathian hihtheih ahi” a chi hi.
Peter in, “Ngai in, kou bangkim nusia in k’on zui uh” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, Kuapeuh Pathian gam ziak a, inn hiam, zi hiam, unaute hiam, nu le pa hiam, tate hiam paisan photphot,
Tu damsung mahmah in a sang a tamzaw mulou ding kuamah a omkei, hunhong tunglai ding a tangtawn hinna toh” a chi hi.
Huan sawmlehnihte a kiang ah a pituam a, a kiang uah, “Ngai un, Jerusalem khua a hohtou ding i hi ua; zawlneite thugelh tengteng Mihing Tapa tung ah a tung ding hi.
Jentelte kiang ah piak in a om ding a, nuihzabawlna in a zang ding uh, zumhuaitakin a bawl ding ua, a chilphih ding uhi.
Huan a vaw ding ua, a that ding uh; ni thum ni’n a thou nawn ding” a chi hi.
Huai thute a theisiam kei ua, a thugen a lak uah sel in a om a, bang gen ahia chih leng a theikei uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Jeriko khua a tunkuan in, mittaw kuahiam lamgei ah khutdoh in a na tu hi;
Huai min mipi paiging a za a, bangchi thu ahia chih a dong hi.
Amau, “Nazaret Jesu a pai ahi” chih a hilh uhi.
Huchi in, “Jesu, David Tapa, hon hehpih in” chi in, a kikou hi.
A masate’n dai ding in a tai ua, himahleh, “David Tapa, hon hehpih in” chi in, a kinak kou semsem hi.
Huchi in Jesu ading a, a kiang a honpi ding in thu a pia hi.
A kiang a hongtun in, “Na tung ah bangchi a ka hih ahia na deih?” a chi a, a na dong hi. Aman “Toupa, muhtheih ka ut” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Mutheita in, na ginna dampih na hi” a chi hi.
Huan thakhat in a muthei pahta a, Pathian phatkawm zel in amah a zuita hi; huan mi tengteng in huai a muh un, Pathian a phat uhi.
Jeriko khua ah Jesu a lut a, paisuak din a kisa hi.
Ngai in, mi khat a min Zakai a om a; huai mi tuh siahkhon heutu ahi a, amah leng a hau ngial hi.
Jesu mi bangchi banghiam muh a tuma; amah lah a niam ngal a, mipi ziak in a mu theikei hi.
Huchi in a matai a, a en ding in theipi kung ah a kal a ; huai lampi a hontot ding ahi ngal a.
Jesu huai mun a tun in a dak a, a kiang ah, “Zakai, hongkum meng in; tuni’n na inn a tung ding ka hi” a chi hi.
Huan kintak in a kuma, kipaktak in amah a zintunta hi.
Huai a muhtak un avek un, “Mikhialte kiang a tung ding in a lutta ve” chi in, a phun uhi.
Zakai ading a, Toupa kiang ah, “Ngai in, Toupa, ka sum kimkhat tagahte kiang ah kape ding a; kua lak ah leng thil bangpeuh na negu taleng, a lehli in ka din ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Tuni’n hiai inn ah hotdamna a hongtungta, amah leng Abraham tapa ahi ngal a.
Mangthangte zong a hondam ding in Mihing Tapa a hongpai ahi him hi” a chi hi.
Huan huai thute a ngaihkhiaklai un, Jerusalem khua a naihtak ziak leh Pathian gam hong langpah ding hi a a gin ziak un gentehna a gen hi.
Huchi in hiai thu a gen hi. “Mi hoih kuahiam gamukna thu la a hong kiknawn ding in khaw gamla tak ah a hoh hi.
A hoh ding in a sikhate sawm a sam a, a kiang uah dangka sawm a pia a, ka hongtun nawn masiah hiai in sum na sin un, a chi hi.
Himahleh a khuate’n a hua ua, hiai mi katung ua vaihawm ding in ka deihkei uh, chi in a nung ah thu a khak uhi.
Huan hichi ahi a, gamukna thu a lak a, a hong kiknawn in a sikha sum a piakte, a hekpung dan uh theihna din a samsak hi.
A masapen a hongpai a, ‘Toupa, na dangka sawm in a pung,’ a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, ‘Sikha hoih, na hih hoih e; tawmchik tung a na ginom ziak in khaw sawm tung ah heutu in om in’ a chi hi.
A nihna a hongpai a, ‘Toupa, na dangka nga in a pung e’ a chi hi.
Amah kiang ah leng, ‘nang leng khaw nga tung ah heutu in om in,’ a chi hi.
Huan midang a hongpai a, Toupa en in, hiai na dangka, kho-ul nulna puan in ka kem kinken hi.
Mi mawktat na hihziak in k’on lau hi; na koihlouh leng na la a, na tuh louh leng na at ngal a, a chi hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, sikha gilou, na paukam suakngei in k’on siam louh ding. Mi mawktat ka hih a, ka koih louh leng ka lak a, ka tuh louh leng ka at na thei maw?
Huchi ahihleh bangdia ka dangka sum in a na koihlou? Huchi in ka hongpai in a pung toh ka lak ding ahi, a chi hi.
Huan a kiang a dingte kiang ah, ‘a sum laksak unla, dangka sawm neipa kiang ah pia un,’ a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, Toupa, aman sum sawm a nei a ka, a chi uhi.
K’on chi ahi, ‘a nei peuh piak behlap ahi ding a, a neilou a neihsun leng laksak ahi ding hi.
Himahleh hiai ka galte a tung ua vaihawm dia hon deihlou, honpi unla, ka ma ah that un’ ” a chi hi.
Hiai thu a gen khit in Jerusalem kholam naihtou in ma a kai hi.
Huan hichi ahi a, Bethphage leh Bethani khaw kiang, Olive tang kichi a tun in, nungzuite lak a mi nih a sawl hi.
“Na mazawn khua uah va hoh unla; huai ah na luttung un sabiltung nou kikhih, kuamah tuanna ngei nailouhna, na vamu ding ua, huai hon phel unla, honkai un.
Huan kuapeuh in ‘bangdia phel?’ chi a a hondot uleh ‘Toupa’n a deih ahi,’ ” chi un, a chi hi.
Huan a misawlte a paita ua, a kiang ua a gen bang in a vamu uhi.
Sabiltung nou a phellai un, a neite’n a kiang uah, “Sabiltung nou bangdia phel?” a chi uhi.
Amau, “Toupa’n a deih ahi” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Jesu kiang ah a honkai ua; huan sabiltung nou tung ah a puante uh a phah ua, a tung ah Jesu a tuangsak uhi.
Huan a paina ding lampi ah a puante uh a phah uhi.
Huan a tunkuan in, Olive tang kumsukna ding tak ah, nungzui mipi tengteng in a thil thupi hih tengteng a muh ziak un a kipak ua, aw ngaihtak in Pathian a phat uhi;
“Toupa min a kumpipa hongpai a hampha e;
van ah lem thu leng henla,
tungnungpen ah thupina om hen” chi in.
Huan mipi lak a Pharisai khenkhat in a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, na nungzuite tai in” a chi uhi.
Aman bel k’on hilh ahi, “Hiaite a daih uleh suangte bek a kikou ding uh” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan a tunkuan in, khua a mu a, a kahkhum a;
“Aw, nang tel in tusung in khamuanna thei leteh aw: himahleh tun zaw na muhlouhna ding in a kiselta ngal a.
Na galte’n na kim in leikulh a khoh ding ua, a hon um ding ua, na kim in pawt theihlouh in a hon opkhum ding ua, huchibang nite na tung ah a hongtung ding hi.
Na sung a na ta, na naute, nangmah toh lei ah a hon pai ek ding ua; na sung ah suang kichiang himhim a hawikei ding uh; veh a na om ni na theihlouh ziak in” chi in.
Huan Pathian biakin ah a valut a, bangpeuh zuakte a delhkhia a, a kiang uah,
“Ka inn thumna inn ahi ding,
chih gelh ahi;
nou bel suamhatte khuk in na bawlzaw uh” a chi hi.
Huan niteng in Pathian biakin ah thu a hilhzel hi. siampu liante, laigelhmite leh, vantang lak a heutu deuhte’n amah hihmang a tum uhi;
Himahleh mipi’n phatuamngaitak a a thugen a ngaihkhiak ziak un, a hih ding dan a thei tuankei uhi.
1 Huan ni khat Pathian biakin a mite thuhilh a, Tanchinhoih a genlai in, siampu liante, laigelhmite, upate toh a kiang ah a hongpai guih uhi;
A kiang ah, “Kua thu in ahia hiai thilte na hih? Kuan ahia thu honpia? honhilh in” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Ken leng thu kamkhat k’on dongsam ding; hon dawng un” a chi hi.
“Johan baptisma van a kipan hia, mihing a kipan?” chi in a dong hi.
A kingaihtuah ua, “Van a kipan chi le hang, bangdia amah ginglou? honchi thepthup ding hi.
Huan Mihing a kipan chi lehang lah, mi tengteng in suang in a hon deng ding uh; Johan zawlnei a hih a thei ngal ua” a chi uhi.
Huchi in a dawng ua, “Koi a kipan ahia ka theikei uh” a chi uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Ken leng kua thu in ahia hiai thil ka hih chih k’on hilh sam kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan mipite kiang ah hiai gentehna a gen a; “ Mi kuahiam in grephuan a bawl a, a loukemte kiang ah khohloh ding in a pia a, sawtpi tam ding in gamdang ah a hohta hi.
Huan a gahloh hun in a tan ding gah a piak ding un loukemte kiang ah sikha khat a sawl hi; ‘himahleh loukemte’n a na vua uhi.’
Sikha dang a sawlnawn a; ‘huai leng a na vaw nawn in, zumhuaipi in a na bawl ua, khutvuak in a paisak nawnta uhi.’
Huan a thumna a sawlnawn a; huai leng hihliam in a paikhia uhi.
Huaizoh in grephuan neipa’n, bangchi’n ka hihdia? ‘Ka tapa deihtak ka sawlmai ding; amah a na zah khamawh kei ding uh,’ a chi hi.
Himahleh loukemte’n amah a na muhtak un, ‘hiai gouluah dingpa ahi, that ni, huchi in, a gou ei a ahi ding,’ chi in, a kihou uhi.
Huchi in grephuan apat a paikhia ua, a hihlumta uhi. Huan grephuan neipa’n amau bang a lohta dia le?
Loukemte a hong hihmang dia, huan grephuan midangte a pe ding” a chi hi. Huan huai a zak un, “Huai telzaw tungkei leh” a chi uhi.
Himahleh amaute a en a, ahihleh hiai thu a gelh uh bang ahia? “Inlammite suang deihlouh pen, huai mahmah a ning a suang phatuampen a hong hita” chih.
Kuapeuh huai suang tung a puk a kitat gawp ding; a delhkhakte houh a delhzan ding, a chi hi.
Huailai tak in laigelhmite leh siampu liante’n mat a tum ua; himahleh mipi a lau ua; huai gentehna amau dem in a gen chih a theih ziak un.
Gamukpa vaihawmna leh thuneihna nuai a a piaktheih na ding un, a thu genkhelh tang in a enkhia ua, mi hoih a kibawl enkhetu a guk sawl uhi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, diktak in thugen in na sinsak zel a, kuamah khentuam neilou in chihtaktak in Pathian thu na hilhzel chih ka thei uh.
Kaisar kiang a siah ka piak uh siang hia, sianglou?” chi in a dong uhi.
Himahleh aman a zekhem uh a thei a, a kiang uah, “Bang a chia hon ze-et na hi ua?” a chi hi.
“Na sumtang uh honlak un, kua lim leh kua min ahia tuang?” a chi a, amau “Kaisar lim” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Tua ahihnung, Kaisar thilte Kaisar kiang ah pia unla, Pathian thilte Pathian kiang ah pia un” a chi hi.
Huchi in mipi ma a paukhelh lakding a mukei ua; a dawnna lamdang a sa mahmah ua, a daidide uhi.
Huan Saddukai, thohnawnna a omkei chite lak a mi kuate hiam a kiang ah a hong ua; thu a dong uhi:
“Sinsakpa, Mosi in, min zi nei in, ta neilou in sihsan leh, a unaupa’n a zi luah in, a unaupa ading in chi a suahsak ding chih, a gelh hi.
Ahi a, unau pasal sagih a om ua; upapen in zi a nei a, ta neilou in a si hi.
A nihna in a luah a; ta neilou in a si nawn hi.
A thumna in a luahnawn a, huchibang in unau sagihte’n a neichiat ua, ta neilou in a si uhi.
A tawpna ah numei leng a sita hi.
Huchi ahihleh thohnawn hun ah a kuapen zi ahi dia? Amau sagihte’n zi in a neichiat uh” a chi uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Tulai mite zi leh ta in a kinei zel ua;
himahleh huai hun chiang a teltak ding leh, misi lak apat thohnawnna tangtak a seh peuhmahte, zi leh ta in a kinei nawn kei ding uh;
Sih leng a si nawn theikei ding uh, angelte bang a om ding ahi ngal ua; thohnawnna tate a hih ziak un, Pathian tate ahi ding uh” a chi hi.
Misi kaihthoh in a om ding uh chih Mosi in leng Loubuk ah, Toupa, Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian, Jakob Pathian, a chih lai in, a theisak hi.
Amah misi Pathian a hi kei a, mihing Pathian ahizaw; amah ngaih in mi tengteng a hing vek ngal ua” a chi hi.
Laigelhmi kuahiam in, “Sinsakpa, na gendik e” chi in a dawng uhi.
Huchi in thudang a dong ngam nawn kei uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, Khrist David tapa ahi chih bangchidan a chi thei uh ahia?
Sa. laibu ah David mahmah in,
Toupa’n, ka Toupa kiang ah,
ka taklam a tuin,
“Na melmate na khepek ngakna dia ka bawl masiah,
a na chi hi.
Huchi in David in amah “Toupa a chi ngal a, bangchi’n ahia a tapa a hih theih?” a chi hi.
Huan mi tengteng theih in a nungzuite kiang ah, laigelhmite lak ah pilvang un.
“Amau puanaktual silh a vak a ut ua, dawlmun ah chibaibuk leh, kikhopnain a tutphah hoihpen a tut, Ankuangluina ah mun hoihpen a deihtuam nak uhi.
Meithaite innte a negai ua, mi khemna ding in sawt pipi a thum uhi. Huaite’n siamlouh a nak tansem ding uhi” a chi hi.
Huan a dak khia a, mi haute’n sumkholna a sum a khiaklai uh a mu hi.
Meithai zawngtak kuahiam in dal dangka muza nih hong khia leng a mu hi.
Huchi in, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, hiai tengteng sang in tua meithai zawngtakin a khe tamzaw;
Hiai tengteng in a neihlet uh a khia ua; aman bel a kitunhingna ding a a neih sunsun a khevek” a chi hi.
Huan kuate hiam in Pathian biakin thu, suang hoihtak leh thil piakkhawm a a zep kilawm dan uh, a genlai un, aman,
“Hiai na thilmuh uh, hih chiplouh a suang kichiang himhim hiai ah a omkei ding; huaibang ni a hongtung ding” a chi hi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, huaite chikchiang in a hongom ding ua? Huaite a hongtun ding chiamtehna bang a om dia?” chi in, a dong uhi.
Huan aman, “Pimang a na omlouhna ding un pilvang un. Mi tampi in, ‘Khrist ka hi’ a hun tungding ahita, chi in, keimah minsial in a hongpai ding uh, huaite zuikei un.’
Kidou thu leh buai thu na zak hun chiang un lau kei un; huaite a tung masa ding a, tawpna bel hipahlou ding ahi” a chi hi.
A kiang uah, “Nam tuam leh nam tuam a kidou ding ua, gam tuam leh gam tuam a kidou ding uh.
‘Zin nakpitak in a ling ding a, mun tuamtuam ah kial a ke ding a, hipi a leng lai ding; van a kipan thil lauhuai leh chiamtehna thupitak a hongom ding hi.’
Himahleh huai thil tengteng a tunma in, nou a honman ding ua, kikhopnain leh suangkulh ah pi in a hon hihgim ding uh, keimah min ziak in kumpipate leh gamukte ma ah a honpi ding uhi.
Hiai noute ading a theihpihna hun lemtang ahi ding hi.
Huchi in dawnna ding ngaihtuah khawllou ding in na lungtang uah kihih kip un.
Na melma tengteng un hondou ua honsel theihlouhna ding un kam leh pilna ka honpe ding a.
Huan na nu leh na pate, na unaute, na sanggamte, na lawmte un leng hon mansak ding ua; a khen a honthat ding uhi.
Keimah min ziak in mi tengteng huat na hi ding uh.
Himahleh, na samzang uh khat leng a mangthang kei ding.
Na kuhkalna uah na hinna uh na humbit ding uhi.
“Himahleh sepaihte’n Jerusalem khua a um uh na muh chiang un, a mangthang dek chih thei un.
Huai hun chiang in Judia gam a omte’n tang ah taimang san u hen; asung a omte’n pawtsan u hen, gam a omte asung ah lut kei uhen.
Huai nite phulakna ahi, thu a gelh tengteng uh a hongtun theihna ding in.
Huai nite in gaite leh naunou pawmte tung a gik ding, khovel ah haksatna thupitak a tun ding ziak in leh hiai chite tung a thangpaihna a tun ding ziak in.
Huan namsau in a si ding ua, namchih kiang ah sal a pi in a om ding uh; huan Jentelte ni a tawp mateng Jerusalem Jentelte sikden in a om ding hi.
“Huan ni leh kha leh aksite ah, chiamtehna a om ding a; tuipi mau leh a kihoh ziak in lei ah leng namchih haksatna leh mangbatna a tung ding;
mite launa ziak leh khovel a thil hongtung ding ngaihtuah ziak in, a sibup ding uhi; van thilhihtheihnate a ling ding hi.
Huai hun chiang in Mihing Tapa thilhihtheihna leh thupina thupi toh meilak a hongpai a mu ding uhi.
Huan huai thilte a hong tunpat chiang in entou unla, dak khia un; na tatna uh hong naita ahihman in” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah gentehna thu a gen a: “Theipi kung leh sing tengteng en un;
A hong selnoutakin huai na mu ua, nipi hongtung ding ahi chih noumau in na thei uhi.
Huchi mah bang in nou leng huaite hongtung na muh chiang un, Pathian lalgam a hongnaita chih thei un.
Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, thil tengteng a tunkim masiah tulai khangte a mangkei ding hi.
Lei leh van a mang dia, ka thu zaw a mang kei ding hi.

“Himahleh pilvang un, huchilou in zaw nek vahluat toh, zukham toh damsung khosak ngaihtuah in, na lungtang uh a dimlaw kha ding a, huai ni’n thangawk bang in thakhat in na tung uah a hongtung guih kha ding hi.
Tuabang tak in leitung tengteng a omte tung a tung chiat ding ahi ngal a.
Huai thil hongtung ding tengteng pel ding leh Mihing Tapa ma a dingtak ding a seh na hihtheihna ding uleh thahatna na neihna ding un chiklaipeuh in thumkawm in limsak gige un” a chi hi.
Huan niteng in Pathian biakin ah thu a hilhzel a; zan teng in a pawt a, Olive tang a chih uah a giak zel hi.
Huan zing in a thu ngaikhe ding in mi tengteng Pathian biakin ah a kiang ah a hongzel uhi.
1 Huan Tanghou Silngou Sohlouh Ankuangluini, Paikan Ankuangluina kichi a naita hi.
Siampu liante leh laigelhmite’n hihlupna dan a zong ua, vantang lah a kihta uhi.
Sawmlehnihte lak a pang, Judas, Iskariot kichi sung ah Setan a lut hi.
Huchi in amah a vapai a siampu liante leh heutute kiang ah zuausan a matsak theihna ding dan a va kihoupih hi.
Amau a kipak mahmah ua, a kiang ah dangka piak a chiamta uhi.
Aman lem a sa a, mipi omlouh kal a zuausan a matsakna lemtang a zawngta hi.
Huan Tanghou Silngou Sohlouh ni, Paikan Ankuangluina belamnou gohna ding ni, a hongtungta hi.
Huchi in Jesu’n, “Peter leh Johan a sawl a, Paikan Ankuang i nek ding in hon va bawlsak un” chi in.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Koi ah vabawl le ung na ut a?” a chi uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Ngai un, khopi a na lut un, pasal, bel a tui pua in hontuak ding a, a lutna inn ah zuilut un” a chi hi.
Inn neipa kiang ah, “Sinsakpa’n, ka nungzuite toh Paikan Ankuang ka nekna ding uh, mikhual inn pindan koilai ahia, a honchi, na chi ding uh.
Huchi in aman indan tungnung zapi, van omsa, a hon ensak ding; huai ah hih un,” a chi hi.
Huan a hohta ua, a kiang ua a gen bangtak in a muta ua; huan Paikan Ankuang a vabawl uhi.
Huan a nek hun in, aman an a um a, a sawltakte’n a umpih sam uhi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Ka thuak ding ka thuak ma in hiai Paikan Ankuang hon nekpih ka ut mahmah hi.
K’on hilh ahi, hiai Pathian gam a a taktak a hih masiah, ka ne nawn kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan nou a la a, kipahthu a genkhit in, “Hiai la unla, kihawm un;
K’on hilh ahi, tuban Pathian gam a hongtun masiah grepgui gahtui ka dawn nawn kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan tanghou a la a, kipahthu a genkhit in a balkham a, a kiang uah a pia a, “Hiai ka sapum ahi, na sikua piak ding ahi; keimah theihgigena in hihzel un” a chi hi.
Huchibang in nitak annek zoh in nou a la a, “Hiai nou ka sisan a thukhun thak, na sikua pawt ding ahi.
Himahleh ngai un, zuausan a hon mansak dingpa khut ka kiang ah dohkan tung ah a omta hi.
Mihing Tapa a seh bangtak in a pai ding hi, himahleh zuausan a mansak dingpa mihing tung a gik hi!” a chi hi.
Huan amau lak ah “Huchibang thilhih ding kua ahi dia le?” chi in, a kidong uhi.
Huan a lak uah kuapen ahia thupipen a seh chih thu ah, kiselna a hongpawt hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Jentel kumpipate a tung uah a thunei gige uh a, a tung ua thuneite Nu leh Pa, a chi gige uh.
Himahleh nou zaw huchibang na hi kei ding uh; na lak ua thupipen nauzaw bang in om henla, makai pen leng na sempen bang in omzaw hen.
Kua ahia thupizaw, an um hia, an pepa? An um hilou hia? Himahleh kei zaw na lak uah nasempa bang in ka om hi.
“Ze-etna ka tuah sung noute kei hon ompihte na hi uh;
Huchi in kei ka Pa’n gam a hon sehsak bang in gam k’on sehsak ahi.
Ka gam a ka dohkan a na nek ua na dawn theihna ding un; huchi in, Israel nam sawmlehnih vaihawm sak in mangtutphah ah na hongtu ding uhi.
“Simon, Simon, ngai in, Setan in buhsep bang a a honsep theihna ding in, noute hon ngen eive.
Himahleh na ginna a manlouhna ding in k’on thumsak hi; na kihei nawn chiang in nang na unaute hihkip in, a chi hi.
Huan aman a kiang ah, Toupa, na kiang ah suangkulh ah leh sihna ah leng pai sam ngap ka hi, a chi hi.
Aman Peter, k’on hilh ahi, n’on theihna ah thumvei n’on kitheihmohbawl masiah tuni in ak a khuang kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Dangka iplou, kawlzal lou leh khedap lou a k’on sawlkhiak in bang na tasam ua?” a chi hi. Amau, “Bangmah” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Tun zaw dangka ipnei in keng henla, kawlzal toh, kuapeuh namsau neilou in a puan zuak henla, lei hen.
K’on hilh ahi, Amah talekte lak ah sim tel ahi, chih gelh ka tung ah a hongtung ahi; ka tungtang thu tungkim ngei ding ahi ngal a” a chi hi.
Huan amau, “Toupa, en dih, hiai ah namsau nih a om” a chi ua. Aman a kiang uah, “A hun” a chi hi.
Huan amah a pawt a, a ngeina dan in Olive tang ah a hohta a; nungzuite’n leng a zui uhi.
A mun a vatun un, a kiang uah, “Khemna a na lutlouhna ding un, thum un” a chi hi.
Huan suang a denphak tan vel ah a vapai tuamta hi;
Huan a khukdin a, a thum a, “Pa, hoih na sakleh hiai nou ka kiang apan lasuan in; himahleh kei thu hilou in, nangmah thu hi zaw hen” a chi hi.
Huan van a kipan angel khat a hihhat ding in a kiang ah a hong kilak hi.
Huan a gim mahmah a, phatuamngai nawnsem in a thum a; a kho-ul, sisan bang in mal liantak in lei ah a takkheta hi.
Huan a thum khit a a thoh in, nungzuite kiang ah a hongpai a, a lungkham ziak un a na ihmu uh a mu hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Bangdia ihmu na hi ua? Khemna a na lutlouhna ding un thou unla, thum un” a chi hi.
Huan huai a genlai tak in, ngai dih, mipi a hongpai ua, sawmlehnihte lak a tel Judas in a ma uh a kai a; tawp tum in Jesu a honzuan hi.
Himahleh Jesu’n, a kiang ah, “Judas, Mihing Tapa tawp a mansak ding na hi maw?” a chi hi.
Huan a kim a mite’n thil hongtung ding a theihun, “Toupa, namsau in ka sat ding uam?” a chi uhi.
Huan a lak ua kuahiam in siampu lianpen sikha a sat a, a bil taklam a satkhiak sak hi.
Huan Jesu’n, “Hih nawn ken” a chi a, a bil a khoih a, a hihdamta hi.
Jesu’n a kiang a hong siampu liante Pathian biakin heutute leh upate kiang ah, Namsau leh khetbuk tawi in, suamhat man ding bang hial in na hong kuan uh maw?
Pathian biakin a na kiang ua niteng a ka omlai in hon mat tum in n’on sawk kei ua; himahleh tu mial thuneihna toh na tat hun uh ahi, a chi hi.
Huan a man ua, a pi ua, siampu lianpen inn ah a pilut uhi. Peter in gamlapi ah a zui hi.
Huan inn huangsung intual ah mei a chih ua, a tu khawm ua, Peter a lak uah a vatu sam hi.
Huan meivak a a tutlai in nungak kuahiam in a mu a, a en nilouh a, “Hiai mi leng a kiang a om ahi” a chi hi.
Aman bel, “Numei, amah ka theikei” chi in a kitheihmohbawl hi.
A denchiang deuh in midang in a hong munawn a, nang leng a lak ua mi na hi ve, a chi hi. Peter in bel, “Mihing aw, ka hi kei” a chi hi.
Huan dakkal khat phial nung in, midang in, “Hiai mi leng a kiang a om ahi tham hi; Galili gammi ahi” a chi chiltel hi.
Huan Peter in, “Mihing aw, na thugen ka theikei” a chi hi. Huan thakhat in, a paulaitakin ak a khuangta hi.
Huan, Toupa a kihei a, Peter a en hi. Peter in, “Ak khuanma in thumvei n’on kitheihmohbawl ding, chi a Toupa’n a kiang a a thugen a hon theikhe nawnta hi.”
Huan a pawt a, a kap huphup hi.
Jesu lente’n nuihza bawlna’n a zang ua, a sat uhi,
A mit a tuam ua, “Kua ahia honsat, gen in?” chi in a dong uhi.
Thu dang tampi in leng a gensia un a kou uhi.
Huan khovak tak in Upa hon, siampu liante leh laigelhmite, a hong kikhawm ua, a vaihawmna uah a pi uhi.
“Khrist na hihleh honhilh in” a chi uhi. Huan aman a kiang uah: “Honhilh mah leng na gingta kei ding uh;
Ken noute thu hon dong lengleng, n’on dawng kei ding ua, na honkhah sam kei ding uh.
Himahleh tuban siah Mihing Tapa, Pathian thilhihtheihna taklam ah a tu ta ding” a chi hi.
Huan avek un, “Nang Pathian Tapa na hi maw leh?” a chi ua. Aman a kiang uah, hi e, n’on chih bang un, a chi hi.
Huan amau bang theihpihna dang i deih lai dia? Eimah mah in amah kamsuak i zata ve le” a chi uhi.
Huan mipi tengteng ading ua, Jesu Pilat kiang ah a pita uhi.
“Hiai mi’n ka chite uh a pimang a, Kaisar kiang ah siahliau a kham, Khrist, kumpipa, a kichih ka za uh” chi in a hekta uhi.
Pilat in, a kiang ah, “Judate kumpipa na hi hia?” chi in, a dong a. Aman “Hi e,” chi in a dawng hi.
Pilat in siampu liante leh mipite kiang ah, “hiai mi tung ah bangmah khelhna ka mu kei,” a chi hi.
Himahleh amau, “Galili gam a kipan Judia gam khuateng leh hiai mun tan ah thuhilh in, mi tengteng a fuihse gige” chi in, a khauh semsem uhi.
Pilat in huai a zak in, hiai mi Galili gam a mi ahi hiam chih a dong hi.
Huchi in Herod uk sungmi ahi chih a theihtakin Herod kiang ah a sawlta a; huailai in amah leng Jerusalem khua ah a om hi.
Herod in Jesu a muh in a kipak mahmah a; a tanchin a zak ziak in, tuma siah apat muh a ut him ahi a, a thillamdang hih banghiam bek muh a lamen hi.
Huan thu tampi a dong a; himahleh bangmah in a dawng tuankei hi.
Siampu Liante leh laigelhmite’n ding in nakpitak in a hek uhi.
Herod leh a sepaihte’n Jesu a simmawh ua, nuihzabawlna’n a zang uh, puan thupitak silhsak in Pilat kiang ah a sawlnawnta hi.
Huai ni nitakin Herod leh Pilat a kihouthei ta uhi; huai masiah zaw kihouthei lou ahi uhi.
Pilat in siampu liante, heutute, mi tengteng a samkhawm a, a kiang uah,
“Mite a pimang chi in, hiai mi ka kiang ah n’on pi uhi, ngai un, na ma ua ka etchet nung in na hekna thu uah hiai mi tung ah bangmah khelhna ka mu kei hi;
Herod in leng a mu sam kei. I kiang uah a hon sawlnawnta hi. Ngai un, sihna khop hial bangmah a hih kei hi.
Huchi in ka vaw ding a, ka pawtsak mai ding” a chi hi.
Ankuangluini a lak ua mi khat a pawtsak teitei ding ahi ngal a.
Himahleh kituaktakin a kikou ua, “Hiai mi hih mangthang inla, Barabba pen hon pawtsak zaw in” a chi uhi.
Huai mi khopi a helna leh, tualthah ziak a suangkulh tang ahi.
Pilat in bel Jesu khah a ut a, a kiang uah thu a gen nawn hi.
Himahleh “Kros ah kilhden in, Kros ah kilhden in” chi in a kikou uhi.
Huan aman, a thumveina ah a kiang uah, “Bang ding in maw? Hiai min bang ahia ahihkhelh? Sihna khop hial a tung ah bangmah ka mu kei; ka vaw ding a, ka khah mai ding” a chi hi.
Amau bel aw ngaihtak in Kros a kilhden ding in a ngen teitei uhi. Huan a aw un a vau daita uhi.
Pilat in a nget bang ua hih ding in thu a hihpukta hi.
Helna leh tualthah ziak a suangkulh tang a nget uh a khah a; Jesu bel a utut a loh ding un a peta hi.
A pimanglai un, Simon Kurini khaw mi, gam lam a kipan hongpai a man ua, Jesu nunglam paw ding in a tung ah Kros a ngata uhi.
Huan mi nazong leh numei amah kah a mau zelzul, mipi tampitak in a zui uhi.
Jesu bel amaute lam nga in, “Jerusalem tanute aw, honkah kei un, noumau leh na tate uh ading in kap zaw un” a chi hi.
Ngai un, a ni a hongtung ding a, ‘huai ni’n, numei chingte, naupai ngeilouhna gilte, naungek tep ngeilouh nawite a hampha uh,’ a chi ding uhi.
Huai hun chiang in mite’n, ‘tangte kiang ah hondelh un’ a chi ding uh, mualte kiang ah, honkhuh un, a chi ding uhi.
Sing a hinlai a bawn hichibang a a hih uh leh; a keu chiang in bang a lohta phet ding ua?” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang ah midang nih, migilou, hihlup ding in a pisam uhi.
Luguhmun, a chih uh a tun un, migiloute, a taklam ah khat, a veilam ah khat toh Kros ah a kilhden uhi.
Jesu’n, “Pa, amau ngaidam in; a thilhih uh a theikei ua ahi, a chi hi. Huchi in a puansilhte kihawm in, ai a san uhi.
Huan mi vantang in ding kawm in a en uhi. Huchi in vaihawmmite’n, “Midang bawn a hondam a ka; Pathian tel Khrist a hihtaktak leh amah leng ki hondam hen aw,” chi in a enghou uhi.
Sepaihte’n leng amah nuihzabawlna’n a nei ua, a kiang ah a hong ua, zuthuk a pia uhi.
“Judate kumpipa na hih taktak leh ki hondam in” a chi uhi.
Huan a lutung zawn Kros ah, Grik, Latin leh Hebru laimal in, “HIAI JUDATE KUMPIPA AHI” chi in, laigelh a tak uhi.
Huan a migilou kilh khat un Jesu a tai a, “Khrist na hi ka hia? Ki hondam inla, kou leng hon hondam tanla” a chi hi.
Himahleh khatpa’n dawng kawm in, a taihilh a, “Pathian nangawn na kihta ka hia kibang sap a hon gawt uh?
Eizaw gawt tuak him i hi; i thilhih manlel mu i hi a; hiai min bangmah a hihkhial ngalkei a” a chi hi.
Aman, “Jesu Toupa na Kumpi gam a n’ong pai chiang in hon theigige in” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, tuni in ka kiang ah Paradise ah na omsam ding” a chi hi.
Huan dakgukna ding ahi a, huai nungsiah dak kua na huntan in gam pumpi a hong mialvekta a, nivak a beita hi.
Pathian biakin puanzak a lai ah a hong keksuak hi.
Jesu aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Pa, na khut ah ka kha k’on kemsak hi” a chi hi. Huai a chihzoh in a kha a khahta hi.
Sepaih zaheutupa’n thil omdan a muh in, “Hiai mi pellou in midik ahi ngeingei” chi in Pathian a phat hi.
Huai etnop en ding a mipi hong kikhawm tengteng te’n thil omdante a muh un a awm uh kitum in a kiknawnta uhi.
Huan a meltheihte tengteng leh numei Galili gam a kipan a honzuite, huai thilte en in gamla tak ah ading uhi.
Huan ngai un, mi khat a min Joseph, vaihawmmi, mi hoihtak, diktak, Judate khua khat Arimathai a kipan a om hi,
A vaihawm uah leh a thilhih uah leng a ki awikei him hi. Pathian gam a lamen gige hi.
Huai mi Pilat kiang ah a hoh a, Jesu luang a ngen hi.
Huan a lakhia a, puanmalngat in a tuam a, han, suang khuakkuak, kuamah sial nailouhna ah, a sial hi.
Huan huai ni kisakkholhna ni ahi, khawlni a hong tundek ziak in.
Galili gam a kipan a kiang a numei hongte’n a zuizel ua, han leh a luang sialdan a mu uhi.
Huan a pai nawn ua, gimnamtui leh thaunamtui a bawl uhi.
Huan khawlni’n thupiak bang in a khawlta uhi; ni sagih ni masapen in; phalvakin, gimnamtui a bawlte uh tawi in, han ah a vahoh uhi.
Hana kipan suangtum khuksuan a om a mu uhi.
Huan a lut ua, Toupa Jesu luang a mukei uhi.
Hichi ahi a, huai ziak a a mangbat laiun, ngai in, mi nih puan milengthei silh a kiang uah a hongding uhi.
A lau ua a khupboh lai un, a kiang uah, “Bangdia misi lak a mihing zong?
Hiai ah a omta kei hi, a thounawnta; Galili gam a a omlai a na kiang ua a thugen theigige un,
Mihing Tapa mikhialte khut a matsakin a om ding a, a kilhden ding uh, ni thum ni’n a thounawn ding ahi” a chih a chi uhi.
Huan a thugente a hon theinawn uhi.
Hanmuna kipan a pai nawn un, sawmlehkhatte leh midang tengtengte kiang ah huai thil tengteng a hilh uhi.
Sawltakte kiang ah huai thuhilhte bel Mari Magdalini, Mari, Joanna, Jakob nu Mari leh a kiang ua numei dangte ahi uhi.
Himahleh huaite thugen thu maimai in a ngai ua, amau a taksang kei uhi.
Himahleh Peter a thou a, han ah a taita a; huan a kuna, a en a, puanmalngat omte kia a mu a, huchi in thil omdan lamdangsa tak in inlam ah a paita hi.
Huan ngai in, huai ni mah in a lak ua mi nih khua khat Emmau a chih uah a hoh dek ua, huai khua Jerusalem apat ching sawmguk ahi.
Huan thil hongtung tengteng a gen khawm zel uhi.
Gen a a kisel lai un, Jesu ngei in a honzuan a, a kiang uah a paisamta hi.
Himahleh amah a theihlouhna ding un, a mit uh hihvaih in a om hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Paikawm a na genkhawm uh bang thu ahia?” a chi hi. Huan dahmel tak in ading dinden uhi.
Huan a min Kleopa pen in a kiang ah, “Jerusalem khua ah nangmah kia in hia na ten, tulai a thil omdan na theihlouh?” chi in a dong hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Bang thil eita?“ a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, “Nazaret Jesu, Pathian leh mi tengteng mitmuh a a thu leh a thilhih a zawlnei minthangtak tanchin thu:
Siampu liante leh ka heutute un thah ding in thu a pia ua, Kros ah a kilhden thute uh.
Kou amah zaw Israelte tanpa ding a lamen hi ung a, himahleh, huai thiltun nungsiah tuni a ni thumni ahita hi.
Huailou leng ka pawlte uh numei kuate hiam zingsang in, han ah a vahoh ua, hong hih mangbang uhi;
A luang mulou pi in, Pathian angelte kilak ka mu uh, huai mite’n a thounawnta chih a gen uh, a hong chi uhi.
Ka ompihte lak ua kuate hiam han ah a hoh ua, numeite genbang ngei in a mu ua; himahleh amah a mu kei uh” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Mihaite aw, zawlneite thugen tengteng gintak thu a ze awlte aw:
Khrist in huai thilte thuak a thupina a lut ding him ahi ka hia?” a chi hi.
Mosi leh zawlneite tengteng apan in, Laisiangthou tengteng amah tanchin gelh peuhmah amau a hilhchian zel hi.
Huan a hohna ding khua uh a tung dekta ua; amah gamla deuh a hohtum bang in a om hi.
Kam in a khou ua: “Ka kiang uah tam in; nitaklam leng hi ding hita a, ni leng tumdekta ahi” chi in. Huchi in a kiang ua tam ding in a lutta hi.
Hichi ahi a, a kiang ua an um a a tut in tanghou a la a, a vualzawl a, a balkham a, a kiang uah a pia hi.
Huan a mit uh a hongvakta a, a mel a theita uhi. Himahleh amah a mangta mai hi.
Amau, “Lampi a hon houpihlai a Laisiangthou thute hon hilhchet lai in i lungtang a vakhuai him hilou hia?” a kichi uhi.
Huailai tak in, a thou ua, Jerusalem khua ah a kiknawn ua, sawmlehkhatte leh a lawmte omkhawmte a mu uhi,
“Toupa a na thounawn taktak ahi, Simon kiang ah leng a kilakta” a na chi uhi.
Amau lampi a bang thil om hiam chih leh, tanghou a balkhap a, a mel a theihdante uh a hilh sam uhi.
Huai thu a genlai un Jesu mahmah a lakuah a hongdinga, a kiang uah, “Na tung uah khamuanna om hen” a chi hi.
Himahleh mulkimhuai a sa mahmah ua, a lau ua, sikha mu hi in a kingaihtuah uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Bang a chia mangbang na hi ua? Bangdia na lungsim ua ginlahna hongom ahia?
Ka khutte ka khepekte en un, kei mahmah ka kei hiam! Hon khoih unla, thei un; sa leh guh nei a n’on muh bang un kha in zaw sa leh guh a nei ngal kei hi” a chi hi.
Huai a genkhit in a khutte a khepekte amau a lak hi.
A kipahluat ziak ua a gin ngamlouh lamdang a saklai un, a kiang uah, “Hiai ah banghiam nekding na nei uhia?” a chi hi.
Ngahou, bak khat leh khuaizu khak a pia uhi.
A la a, a ma uah a neta hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Na kiang ua ka omlai a ka tanchin gelh peuhmah thute a hongtung ding chi a k’on hilhhilhte Mosi Dan, zawlneite leh phatnalate a thu kigente hiaite ka thu ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Laisiangthou thu theihna din a lungtang uh a vaksakta hi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Hichibang a gelh ahi, Khrist in gim a thuak ding a, ni thum ni’n misi lak a kipan a thounawn ding a chi hi:
Amah min in kisikna leh khelh ngaihdamna thu Jerusalem khua apat in namchih kiang ah hilh ahi ding, chi in.
Huai thil tengteng a theihpihte na hi uh.
Huan ngai un, ka Pa thilchiam na tung uah k’on sawl ding a; himahleh, tunglam a kipan thilhihtheihna silhsak a na om masiah uh khopi ah om kinken un” a chi hi.
Huan Bethani pha in amau a pikhia a; huan a ban a zak a, a vualzawl hi.
Hichi ahi a, a vualzawl laitak in amau a paisanta a, van ah pitouh in a omta hi.
Huan amah a bia ua, kipak kawm in Jerusalem ah a kik nawnta uhi:
Pathian biakin ah Pathian phat in a om nilouh uhi. Amen.
A tung in Thu a om, Thu tuh Pathian kiang ah a om, Thu tuh Pathian ahi.
Huai Thu a tung in Pathian kiang ah a om hi.
Bangkim avek in amah siam ahi; thilsiam tengteng amah siamlouh bangmah a omkei hi.
Amah ah hinna a om, huai hinna mihingte vakna ahi.
Vak mial lak ah a hong vak a; mial in huai a zoukei hi.
Pathian sawl mi khat a hongom, a min Johan ahi.
Huai mi theisak ding in a hong, huai vak theisak ding in, amah ziak a mi tengteng in a gintak theihna ding un.
Amah bel vak ahi kei a, vak thu theisak ding a hong ahizaw hi.
Vak dik michih hihvak nak a om a, khovel ah a honglel ahi.
Amah khovel ah a om, khovel amah siam ahi, himahleh khovel in amah a theikei hi.
Amah a mite kiang ah a hong a, amah a mite’n a na pom kei uhi.
Himahleh amah kipahpih a pom, a min gingtate tengteng Pathian tate suahtheihna a pia hi.
Huai mite bel sisan suan a hi kei ua, sa deihna a suan leng a hi kei ua, mihing deihna a suan leng ahi sam kei ua, Pathian suahsak ahizaw uhi.
Huai Thu sa a hongsuak a, i lak uah a hongteng hi, hehpihna leh thutak a dim in; a thupina Pa Tapa tang neihsun thupina bangbang i muta uhi.
Johan in amah theihpihna a pia a, “Ka nung a hong paipa’n honkheng, amah ka ma a omsa him ahihman in, chi a a thu ka genpa hiai ahi” a chi hi.
Huan eite’n a tangchinna a kipan hehpihna tung a hehpih nawnsawnna i tang chiat uhi.
Mosi zang a Dan piak ahi a, himahleh; hehpihna leh thutak Jesu Khrist ziak in a hongom hi.
Kuamah in chiklai mah in Pathian a mu ngeikei; Tapa tang neihsun, Pa angsung a om in amah a phuangkheta hi.
Huan Judate’n, “Kua na hia?” chi a, dong ding a, Jerusalem khua a kipan a a kiang a siampute leh Levi chi a mite a sawllai un hiai te Johan thu na theihsak ahi uhi:
Aman chiangtakin a gen a, “Khrist ka hi kei hi” chi in, a pulak hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Kua na hia leh? Elijah na hi hia?” a chi ua, a dong uhi. Huan aman, “Ka hi kei” a chi hi. “Huai zawlnei na hi hia?” a chi ua. Aman, “Hilou e” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah ahihleh, “Kua na hia? Honsawlte ka dawn theihna ding un honhilh in; na tanchin himhim bang ahia na gen ding?” a chi uhi.
Aman, zawlnei Isai gen bang in “Toupa lampi hihtang un” chi a, gamdai a kikoupa aw ka hi, a chi hi.
A misawlte uh Pharisaite kiang a kipan kuate hiam ahi uhi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Khrist bek, Elijah bek, zawlnei bek na hih kei ngal leh, bang a chia baptist nak na hia leh?” a chi ua, a dong nawn uhi.
Johan in a kiang uah, “Ken tui in k’on baptist a, na lak uah mi khat na theihlouh uh ading ahi,
Amah ahi ka nung a hongpai dingpa, ka ma a omsa pen, a khedap khau pheltak leng ka hi kei” chi in a dawng hi.
Huai Jordan gal a Bethabara a Johan in a baptisna mun a thiltung ahi.
Huan a zing in Johan in Jesu a kiang a hongpai a mu a, a gen a; “En un, Pathian Belamnou khovel khelhna lamangpa!
