Hiai ahi Amah, mi khat ka nung a hong paipa, ka ma a omsa him ahi, ka chih pa.
Amah lah ka na thei ngal kei a; himahleh Israelte kiang a amah latsak a hihna ding in tui a baptist in ka hongpai ahi” a chi hi.
Huan Johan in a thu a theisak a: “Kha vakhu bang in van a kipan a hongsuk ka mu a, a tung ah a tu nilouh, chi in a gen hi.
Amah lah ka thei ngal kei a; himahleh ‘tui a baptist ding a hon sawlpa’n ka kiang ah, Kua tung ah leng Kha hongsuk a a tung a om na muh peuh, hiai tuh Kha Siangthou a baptispa ahi,’ a honchi hi.
Huai ka muta a, hiai mipa Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka theisakta hi” a chi hi.
Huan a zing nawn in Johan ading a, a nungzui nihte toh; Jesu vial vakvak lai a en a:
“En un, Pathian Belamnou” a chi hi.
A nungzui nihte’n a thugen a za ua, Jesu a zuita uhi.
Jesu a kihei a, a honzui uh a mu a, a kiang uah, “Bang na zong ua?” a chi hi. Amau “Rabbi, huai sinsakpa chihna ahi, Koi a teng na hia?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hongle uchin na mu ding uh” a chi hi. Huchi in a hong ua a omna a mu ua; huai ni’n a kiang ah a tam ua, nitak anhuan hun phial ahi.
Johan thugen za a Jesu zuite nih a khat zaw pen Andru, Simon Peter unaupa ahi.
Aman a masapen in amah unau Simon a mu a, a kiang ah, “Messia ka muta uh” a chi a, huai bel Khrist chihna ahi.
Huchi in Jesu’n amah a na en a, “Johan tapa Simon na hi, Kifa a honchi ding uh” a chi a, huai suang chihna hi.
Huan a zing in Jesu’n Galili gam a hoh a tuma, Philip a mu a, a kiang ah, “Honzui in” a chi hi.
Philip bel Bethsaida khua mi ahi a, Andru leh Peter omna khopi mah ahi.
Philip in Nathanael a mu a, a kiang ah, a tanchin Mosi in dan laibu a a gelh leh zawlneite’n a gelh uh, “Amah ka muta uhi, Nazaret Jesu, Joseph tapa” a chi hi.
Nathanael in a kiang ah, “Nazaret khua ah thil hoih a pawt thei ahia?” a chi hi. Philip in a kiang ah, “Hongpai inla, en in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n Nathanael a kiang a hong dek in a mu a a tanchin a na gen a, “En un, Israel mitak, zekhemna himhim neilou” a chi hi.
Nathanael in a kiang ah, “Nang bangchidan a honthei na hia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Philip in nang honsap ma a, theipi bul a na omlai in, k’on mu hi,” chi in a dawng hi.
Nathanael in a kiang ah, “Rabbi, Pathian Tapa na hi, Israelte kumpipa na hi” chi in a dawng hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Theipi bul ah nang k’on mu hi, na kiang a ka chih ziak in na gingta ahi maw? Hiai te sang a thil thupizaw na mulai ding” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Jesu mah in a kiang ah, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, van kihong a, Pathian angelte Mihing Tapa tung a kahtou leh kumsuk na mu ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan ni thum ni in, Galili gam a Kana khua ah kitenna a om a, huai ah Jesu nu a om hi.
Jesu leh a nungzuite leng kitenna ah a chial uhi.
Uain a beitakin Jesu nun a kiang ah, “Uain a tasamta uh e,” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Numei, nang n’on theihsak ding bang ahia om? Ka hun a tung naikei hi” a chi hi.
A nu’n sikhate kiang ah, “Na kiang ua a gen peuhmah hihzel un” a chi hi.
Huan Judate silsiang dan bang in suang tuibel guk, buk sawmli mun nih hiam, mun thum hiam ta chiat, huai ah a tung uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Tuibelte tui in dimsak un” a chi hi. A gong toh kikim in a dimsak chiat uhi.
A kiang uah “Tuin dim unla, nekbawl thusa kiang ah paipih un” a chi hi. Huchi in a paipihta uhi.
Nekbawl thusa in, tui uain a hongsuak a chiama, a hong kipatna a theikei a, tuidim sikhate’n a thei uhi, mouneipa a samta a, a kiang ah,
“Michih in a tung in uain hoih a hawm ua, a tam deuh a dawn nung un, a hoihlou a hawm uh; nang bel tutan in uain hoih na kem lailai a” a chi hi.
Jesu’n hiai a thillamdang hihpatna Galili gam Kana khua a a hih ahi; a thupina a langsakta a; a nungzuite’n amah a gingta uhi.
Huan huaikhit in Kapernaum khua ah a hohsuk a, amah leh a nu toh, a unaute toh a nungzuite toh; huai ah ni tamlou chik a om uhi.
Huan Judate Paikan Ankuangluina a naita a, Jesu Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou hi.
Pathian biakin a bawng, belam leh vakhu zuak leh dangka kheng a tute a mu hi.
Huan khauhual in zepna ding a bawl a, belam leh bawng avek un Pathian biakin a kipan a delhkhia a, dangka khengte dangka a sungbua a, a dohkante uh leng a sawnpuk sak hi.
Vakhu zuakte kiang ah, “Hiai thilte hiai a kipan paipih un, ka Pa inn sumsinna mun in bawlkei un” a chi hi.
Huan “Na inn a ka phatuamngaihna in a hon gai ding” chih gelh ahi chih a nungzuite’n a theinawnta uhi.
Huchi in Judate’n a kiang ah, “Hiai na thilhih chiamtehna bang ahia n’on lah theih?” chi in a dong uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Hiai in hihse le uchin, ni thum sung in ka tung ding nawn ding” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Judate’n, “Hiai in kum sawmli leh guk lam ahi, nang ni thum sung in na tungding ding maw?” a chi uhi.
Himahleh amah sapum inn thu gen ahizaw hi.
Huaiziak in, misi lak a kipan a thohnawn in, a nungzuite’n huai thugen a theinawnta uhi. Laisiangthou thu leh Jesu thugen a gingta uhi.
Huan Paikan Ankuangluina Jerusalem khua a omlai in, a thillamdang hihte a mu ua, mi tampi in a min a gingta uhi.
Himahleh Jesu bel a lak uah a kikangkoih a, mi tengteng a thei hi.
Mihing thu kuamah hilhchet a kiphatmawh louh ziak in; Amahmah in mihing sung a om peuhmah a thei ngal hi.
Pharisaite lak a mi, Judate vaihawmpa, a min Nikodem a om hi.

Huai mi zan in Jesu kiang ah a hong a, a kiang ah, “Rabbi, Pathian a kipan hongpai sinsakpa na hi chih ka thei uhi. Pathian na kiang a omlou hileh hiai thillamdang na hihte kuamah in a hih theikei ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a dawng a a kiang ah, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, Mi kuapeuh a pianthak kei leh Pathian gam a mu theikei” a chi hi.
Nikodem in a kiang ah, “Mi a teknung in bangchi’n a piangthak thei dia? A nu sung a nihvei lut in a piang thei dia hia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a dawng a, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, Kuapeuh tui a leh Kha a a pianthak kei leh Pathian gam a lut theikei hi.
Sa suan peuhmah sa ahi a, Kha suan peuhmah kha ahi.
Na pianthak ngeingei ding ahi k’on chih lamdang sa ken.
Huih a utna na ah a nung a, a ging na za hi, himahleh koi a kipan hongpai ahia, koi ah ahia a hoh ding chih na thei ngalkei a; kuapeuh Kha a piang huchibang mah in a om hi” a chi hi.
Nikodem in a dawng a, “Hiai bangchi’n a omthei dia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a dawng a a kiang ah, “Israelte sinsakpa na hi ngal a, huaite na theikei maw?
Chihtaktak in chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, kou ka theih uh ka gen ua, ka muh uh ka theisak uh; himahleh ka thu theihsak uh na sangkei uhi.
Khovel thil k’on hilh bawn gingtaloute’n, vanlam thil honhilh leng bangchi’n na gingta ding ua?
Mihing Tapa van a ompa leh van a kipan hongsukpa kia loungal kuamah van ah a kahtou ngeikei uhi.
“Mosi in gamdai a gul a khaikang bang in, Mihing Tapa khaikang in a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh a gingta in amah ziak a tangtawn hinna a neihna ding in.
Pathian in khovel a it mahmah ziak in a Tapa tang neihsun a pia hi. Kuapeuh amah gingtate a manthat louh ua, tangtawn hinna a neih zawkna ding un.
Khovel siamlouh tangsak ding in Pathian in a Tapa khovel ah a sawl kei, khovel amah vanga a hin theihna ding in a sawl ahizaw hi.
“Kuapeuh amah gingta siamlouh in a omkei ding a, kuapeuh a gingtalou, tu a kipan siamlouh in a ompah ngal hi, Pathian Tapa tang neihsun min a gintak louh ziak in.
Hiai siamlouhna ahi, vak khovel ah a hong a, himahleh min vak sang in mial a itzaw uh, a thilhihte uh a gitlouh ziak in.
Kuapeuh thil gilou hih in vak a hawnak, vak ah leng a hongpai kei hi; huchilou in zaw a thilhihte a lang kha ding hi.
Himahleh kuapeuh a dik hihte a thilhih uh Pathian ziak a hih chih a latna ding in vak ah a hongpai uhi” a chi hi.
Huaikhit in Jesu a nungzuite toh Judia gam ah a hoh ua, huai ah Jesu a kiang uah a om nilouh a, a baptist zel uhi.
Johan in leng Ainon ah, Salim khaw kiang ah a baptist sam a, huai a tui a tam ziak in mi a hong ua, baptisma a tang uhi.
Hiai hun in Johan suangkulh a khum ahi naikei hi.
Huan Johan nungzuite leh Juda khenkhat silsiang thu ah a kisel uhi.
Johan kiang ah a hongpai ua, a kiang ah, “Rabbi, Jordan gal a na kiang a om, a thu mi na theihsakpan, ngai dih, mi a baptist a, mi tengteng a kiang ah a hongpai uh” a chi uhi.
Johan in a dawng a, “Van apan a piak ahihkeileh mihing in bangmah a nei theikei uhi.
Kei Khrist ka hi kei hi, a ma a misawl ka hi, ka chih, noumau mahmah hon theihpihte na hi uhi.
Mouneipa mounu pasal ahi; himahleh mouneipa lawm ding a a thu za mouneipa aw ziak in a kipak mahmah a; En un ka kipahna a tungta ahi.
Amah a lian semsem ding a, kei bel ka neu hiaihiai ding hi” a chi hi.
Tunglam a kipan hongpai zaw mi tengteng sang a tungnungpen ahi; lei a kipan bel lei a ahi a, leithu a gen a, van a kipan a hong paipa zaw mi tengteng sang a tungnungpen ahi.
A muh leh a zak peuh a theisak hi; kuamah in a thu theihsak a taksang kei uhi.
A thu theihsak taksang in, Pathian midiktat ahi, chih a kipsak hi.
Pathian sawl in Pathian thu a gen hi; aman zaw teh chitchiat in Kha a pe ngalkei hi.
Pa in Tapa a it a, a khut ah bangkim avek in a peta hi.
Kuapeuh Tapa gingta in tangtawn hinna a nei; himahleh Tapa gingtalou in hinna a neikei ding a, Pathian thangpaihna a tung ah a omzaw” a chi hi.
Johan sang in Jesu’n nungzui tamzaw a bawl a, tam a baptist zaw chih Pharisaite’n a za uh chih Toupa’n a theih in,
Jesu hial in zaw a baptist kei, a nungzuite’n a baptist zawzel uhi,
Judia gam paisan in, Galili gam ah a kik nawnta hi.
Huchi in Samaria gam tawnsuak a a pai teitei a kul hi.
Huchi in Samaria gam khua khat, Saikar a chih uah a hongtung a, Jakob in a tapa Joseph kiang a mun a piakna kiang ahi;
Jakob tuileh huai ah a om hi. Huchi in Jesu a paigim ziak in tuileh gei ah a tu a; sun annek hun ahi.
Huchi in Samari numei khat tuitawi in a hong kuan a, Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Dawn ding honpia in” a chi hi.
A nungzuite lah nekding lei in khua ah a hohta uhi.

Huchi in Samari numei in a kiang ah, “Nang Judami hi chin a, kei Samari numei hi’ng a, bangchidan a ka kiang a dawn ding hon ngen na hia? a chi hi. Judate’n Samari mite bangmah in a ngai ngal kei ua” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a dawng a a kiang ah, “Pathian thil thawnpiak leh dawn ding honpia in, na kiang a chipa thei leteh zaw nang a kiang a ngen zaw ding chin a, aman tuihing honpe ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huan numei in a kiang ah, “Pu, suahna ding bangmah lah na neikei a, tuileh a thukthuk toh, koi a kipan in ahia huai tuihing na muh ding?
Ka pu uh Jakob sang in na thupizaw ahia? Aman hiai tuileh honpia a, amah leh a tate leh a gante’n leng a dawn uhi” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Kuapeuh hiai tui dawn a dangtak nawn ding uh;” chi in a dawng hi.
“Kuapeuh a kiang a ka piak ding tuidawn bel, dangtak nawn ngeilou ding a; a kiang a tui ka piak ding pen amah ah tuinak a hong phulkhe ding a, tangtawn hinpha in a kikhohtou ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huan numei in a kiang ah, “Pu, huai tui honpe ve, ka dangtak nawn louhna ding leh hiai tantan a tuitawi ding a ka hong kuanlouhna din” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah “Pai inla, na pasal va sam inla, hiai ah hongkik nawn in” a chi hi.
Numei in a kiang ah, “Pasal ka neisam a” chi in a dawng hi. Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Pasal ka neisam a, na chih zaw, na chi dik ve;
Pasal nga na neita a, tua na neihpa na pasal ahi kei him ahi, hiai thu na chidik ve” a chi hi.
Numei in a kiang ah, “Pu, zawlnei na hi chih ka thei hi.
Kou pipute’n hiai tang ah Pathian a bezel ua; nou bel mihing in Pathian a biakna mun ding Jerusalem khua ahi na chi sese ua” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Numei, kei hon gingta in, hiai tang chitchiat lou leh Jerusalem khua chitchiat lou ah leng Pa na biak hun uh a tungta hi.
Nou na theihlouhpi uh na benak ua; kou zaw ka theih uh ka bia uhi. Hotdamna Judate a kipan ahi.
Himahleh a hun a tungta, tuin leng a tungkhin lel hi, huai hun chiang in Pathian be taktakte’n kha leh thutak a Pa be ding uh ahi, Pa’n huchibang mi a bemi ding in a zong hi.
Pathian zaw Kha ahi; a bemite’n kha leh thutak a a biak ngeingei ding uh ahi” a chi hi.
Numei in a kiang ah, “Messia, Khrist a kichi, a hongpai ding chih ka thei, amah a hongpai chiang in bangkim a honhilh ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, “Keimah nang hon houpihpa, huai amah ka hi” a chi hi.
Huan huailai in a nungzuite a hongpai ua, numei a houpih lamdang a sa mahmah uhi; himahleh kuamah in “Bang zong na hia? Bangdia numei houpih?” a chi kei uhi.
Numei in a tuibel a paisan a, khua ah a vapai a, mite kiang ah,
“Ka thilhih peuh honhilh zel mi khat a om, hong unla, en dih uh; Khrist a hih theihtuak hiam?” a chi hi.
Amaute khua a kipan a hongpawt ua, a kianglam a zuanta uhi.
Huai kal in nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, ne in” a chi uhi.
Himahleh aman a kiang uah, “An na theihlouh uh nekding ka nei” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite a kihou ua, “A nekding min a hontawi ding ua eita maw? a kichi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah a gen a, “Hon sawlpa deihlam hihleh, a nna sepzoh ding ka an ahi.
Nou, Buhlakna ding kha li a omlai, na chi uh hilou hia? Ngai un k’on hilh ahi, dak unla loute en un, tu mahmah in lak ding in a min ahi.
A lapa’n loh a mu a, tangtawn hinna ding in gah a la hi, huchi a a tuhpa leh a lapa a kipah tuak theihna ding un.
Khat in a tuha, midang in a la chih thu hiai ah a dik hi.
Na sepgimlouh uh at dia honsawl ka hi; midang in a sem ua, nou a sepsa uh na sunzom uh ahi” a chi hi.
Huan numei in, “ka thilhih peuh honhilh zel,” chi a a theihsak thu ziak in huai khua a om Samari mi tampi in Jesu a gingta uhi.
Huchi in Samari mite Jesu kiang ah a hongpai ua, a kiang ua om ding in a khou ngutngut ua; huchi in huai ah ni nih a tam hi.
Huan midang tampi in amah thu ziak in a gingta samta uhi.
Amau numei kiang ah, “Tun zaw na thugen ziak a gingta ka hi kei uh; koumau ngei in a thu ka za ua, hiai mipa khovel Khrist, Hondampa ahi ngeina chih ka theita uh” a chi uhi.
Huan ni nih nung in huai apan pawt in, Galili gam ah a paita hi.
Jesu ngei in, zawlnei zaw amah kholam ah pahtawi in a om ngeikei chih a theisak hi.
Huchi in Galili gam a hongtun in Galili gam mite’n a na kipahpih ua, Jerusalem khua a Ankuanglui lai a a thilhih tengteng a muhtak ziak un; amau mah leng Ankuangluina ah a hohsam uhi.
Galili gam a Kana khua, tui uain a suahsakna mun a hongtung nawnta hi. Kumpi Milian kuahiam a om a, a tapa Kapernaum khua ah a china hi.
Judia gam a kipan Galili gam ah Jesua hong chih a zak in a kiang ah a hohtou a, “Va hohsuk a a tapa sidekdek hihdam ding in” a chial hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte na muhkei uh leh na gingta kei hial ding uh, a chi hi.
Huan Kumpi Milian in a kiang ah, “Pu, ka ta sihman hongsuk mai in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Pai nawnta in, na tapa a damta” a chi hi. Huai mipa’n Jesu’n a kiang a thu a gen a gingta a, a paita hi.
A paisuk lai in a sikhate’n a na dawn ua, “Na tapa a damta” a na chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah a dam tunglai a dong hi. Amau a kiang ah, “Zan in ni kihek lai in a khosik a daita hi” a chi uhi.
Naupang pa’n Jesu’n a kiang a, “Na tapa a damta hi” a chihlai ahi chih a theita a; amah leh a inkuanpihte’n avek un, a gingta ta uhi.
Hiai Judia gam a kipan Galili gam a a hong a Jesu thillamdang hih a nihveina ahi.
Huai thil nung in Judate Ankuangluina a om a; Jerusalem khua ah Jesu a hohtou hi.
Jerusalem ah belam kongkhak kiang ah dil a om a, huai mun Hebru pau in Bethes’da a chi ua, inlim nga a nei hi.
Huai ah tui hongtat ngak in damloute, mittawte, khebaite, zawte tampi a lum uhi.
Bang hun hiam in huai dil ah angel a hohsuk a, tui a vatok a; kuapeuh huai tui a kitoh khit a valut masa penpen in, bangchibang natna nei hileh leng hihdam in a om zel hi.
Huai ah kum sawmthum leh giat damlou mi kuahiam a om hi.
Jesu’n a lum a mu a, huchibang in sawtpi a omta chih a thei a, a kiang ah, “Hihdam na ut hia?” a chi hi.
Damloupa’n, “Pu, tui kitoh in dil a honkoih ding mi ka neikei hi, ka hohsung in midang in hon makhelh nak uh” chi in a dawng hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Thou inla, na awngphah la inla, khe in paita in” a chi hi.
Thakhat in huai mipa a dampah a, a awngphah la in, a paita hi.
Huai ni khawlni ahi, huchi in Judate’n a dampa kiang ah, “Khawlni eive, na awngphah na lak a siangkei” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Hon hihdampa ngeingei in ka kiang ah, na awngphah la inla, khe in paita in” honchi ahi, a chi a, a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Na awngphah la inla, khe in paita in, na kiang a chipa kua ahia?” a chi ua, a dong uhi.
Himahleh a dampa’n kua ahia a hih a theikei hi, huai a mipi a om ziak un Jesu a paimangta hi.
A denchiang in Jesu’n amah Pathian biakin ah a mu a, a kiang ah, “Ngai in, na damta hi, khialnawn ken, huchilou in zaw thil hoihlou sem na tung ah a hongtung kha ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan huai mi a va paikhia a, Judate kiang ah “A hihdampa Jesu ahi” chih a hilh hi.
Huchi in khawlni a a thilhih ziak in Judate’n Jesu a engbawl uhi.
Himahleh Jesu’n amau a houpih a, a kiang uah, “Ka Pa’n tutan pha’n nna a semzel a, ken leng ka semzel” a chi hi.
Huchi in Judate’n hihlup a tum semsem ua, khawlni a tanlouh ziak kia ahi kei a, Pathian amah Pa a a bawl leh Pathian toh kikim a a kibawl ziak in leng ahi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Tapa in amah in bangmah a hih theikei, Pa thilhih a muh kia loungal; thil a hih peuhmah, Tapa in leng a hih samzel hi.
Pa in Tapa a it a, a thilhih peuhmah a kiang ah a musak a; hiaite sang a thilhih thupizaw a kiang ah a musak lai ding, lamdang na sak ding un.
Pa in misite a kaithou a, hinna a piak bang in, Tapa in leng a utna na kiang ah hinna a pia hi.
Pa in kuamah vai a hawmsak ngeikei, vai tengteng Tapa in a hawm sak zawta hi;
Mi tengteng in Pa zahna a piak bang un, Tapa leng zahna a piakna ding un. Kuapeuh Tapa zahloute’n, Pa a sawlpa leng a zahkei uhi.
“Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Kuapeuh ka thu za a, hon sawlpa gingta in, tangtawn hinna a nei; siamlouh in a omkei a, sihna a kipan a pawt a, hinna ah a lut zawta hi.
Chihtaktak in chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, A hun a tung dekta, tuin leng a tung lellelta, huai hun chiang in misite’n Pathian Tapa aw a za ding ua, a za peuhmah a hing ding uh.
Pa in amah a hinna a neih bang in, Tapa in leng amah a hinna nei ding in a peta hi.
Mihing Tapa a hih ziak in, a kiang ah thukhenna leh thuneihna a pia hi.
Hiai lamdangsa kei un, a hun a tungta, huai hun chiang in han a om tengteng in a aw a za ding ua,
A hong pawtvek ding uhi; thil hoih hihte hinna tang in a thounawn ding ua, thil gilou hihte siamlouh tang in a thounawn ding uhi.
“Keimah in bangmah ka hih theikei; bil a ka zak bangbang in vai ka hawmzel; ka vaihawm a dik ahi, keimah deihlam in om ka tum kei a, hon sawlpa deihlama om ka tup zel ziak in.
“Keimah tanchin theisak hileng, ka thu theihsak a dik kei ding hi.
Ka tanchin theisak midang ahi, aman ka tanchin a theihsak a dik chih ka thei hi.
Nou Johan kiang ah mi nasawl ua, aman thutak thu hon theisak hi.
Thu theihsak ka san mihing a kipan ahi kei a; himahleh na hinna ding un hiai thu ka gen ahi.
Huai Johan khawnvak kuangtak leh vaktak ahi, a vak ah nuamsak tak dih na ut uhi.
“Himahleh theihsakna ka neihzaw Johan theihsakna sang in a thupizaw hi: Pa’n thilhih zohding a a honpiak, ka thilhih ngei in Pa’n honsawl chih ka tanchin a theisak hi.
“Pa hon sawlpa’n leng ka tanchin a theisakta hi. Nou chiklai mah in a aw na za ngeikei ua, a mel leng na mu ngeikei uhi.
A thu leng noumau ah na paikei uh, a sawlpa na gintak louh ziak uh ahi.
“Laisiangthou na simsim ua, asung a tangtawn hinna om a na gintak ziak un: huai Laisiangthou ka tanchin theihpihna ahi.
Himahleh hinna nei ding in ka kiang ah na hong nuam kei uhi.
Mihing pahtawina ka sangkei.
Himahleh nou k’on thei hi, Pathian itna noumau ah na neikei uhi.
Ka Pa min in ka hong a, noute’n n’on kipahpih kei uh: midang amah min in hong leh amah na kipahpih ding uhi.
Nou kipahtawi tuahna paktate’n Pathian tak kia a pawt pahtawina zong lou in bangchi’n kei n’on gingta thei ding ua?
Ken Pa kiang a nou k’on hek ding gingta kei un: nou honhek khat a om na muan uh Mosi ngei ahi.
Mosi gingta hile uchin aman kei tanchin gelh a, keileng n’on gingta tading uhi.
Himahleh amah thugelh gingtalou in, bangchi’n ka thute na gingta ding ua?” a chi hi.
Huai thilte khit in, Galili dil, Tiberias dil kichi gallam ah Jesu a paita hi.
Damloute tung a thillamdang a hihte a muh ziak un mipi tampi in amah a zui uhi.
Jesu tang ah a hohtou a, huai ah a nungzuite kiang ah a tu hi.
Huan Paikan Ankuangluina, Judate Ankuangluina a naita hi.
Jesu a dak a, mipi tampi in a kiang lam honzuan in a mu a, Philip kiang ah, “Hiaite nekding tanghou koi a lei ding i hi ua?” a chi hi.
Huai thu amah ze-et nadia a gen ahi, a hih ding lah aman a theigige hi.
Philip in a kiang ah, “Michih in tawmchik a a tan chiat ding u leng, makhai za nih man tanghou in a daihkei ding” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan a nungzuite lak a khat, Simon Peter unau Andru in a kiang ah,
“Barli buh tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nih nei pasal naupang khat hiai ah a om hi; himahleh mi hiai zah lawmlawm lak ah bang tham hizou ding ahia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, “Mite tusak un” a chi hi. Huai ah loupa tampi a om hi. Huchi in pichingte a tuta ua, a tamlam uh sang nga vel ahi.
Jesu’n tanghou phelte a la a, kipahthu a genkhit in a tute kiang ah a hawm a, huchi mah bang in ngasate leng a deihhun un a hawm sam hi.
Huan a kham nung un, a nungzuite kiang ah, “Bangmah manglou ding in a nente luak un” a chi hi.
Huchi in a luak ua, barli buh tanghou phel nga nete nekbang nente bawm sawmlehnih a hihdim uhi.
Mite’n a thillamdang hih a muhtak un, “Hiai mi, zawlnei, khovel a hong dingpa a na hingei e” a chi uhi.
Huchi in amah kumpipa dia bawl ding a mat teitei tum in a hong kuan ding uh chih Jesu’n a thei a, tang ah amah kia in a paituam nawnta hi.
Huan nitaklam in a nungzuite dil ah a paisuk uhi.
Long ah a tuang ua, dil ah Kapernaum khua a zuan uhi. Khua a mialta a, Jesu lah a kiang uah a hongtung naikei hi.
Huihpi hattak a nun ziak in tui a kihot sang hulhul hi.
Ching sawmnih leh ching nga hiam, ching sawmthum hiam a kalh nung un, Jesu dil tung ah khe a pai a, long honnaih in a mu ua, a lauta uhi.
Himahleh aman a kiang uah, “Keimah ka hi, lau kei un” a chi hi.
Huchi in kilawptakin long ah Jesu a tuangsakta ua, huchi in long a zot gam uh a tungpah hi.
A zing in dilgal lehlam a mipi dingte’n, long khat loungal long dang a omkei a, Jesu a nungzuite toh long ah a tuang tonkei a, a nungzuite amau kia in a pai uh chih a thei uhi.
Himahleh Toupa’n kipahthu a gen nung a, tanghou a nekna kiang uh, Tiberias khua a kipan long neuchikchik a hongtung uhi.
Huchi in mipi’n Jesu leh a nungzuite a omta kei uh chih a theih un, amau leng longneute a tuang in, Jesu zong in Kapernaum khua a hongtung uhi.
Huan dilgala a hong muh un a kiang ah, “Rabbi, chik in ahia hiai lam n’ong tun? a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, thillamdangte na muh ziak ua hon zawng na hi kei ua, tanghou phel na nekvah ziak uh ahizaw.
An mang theiphet zawng in phiaphia kei un, himahleh an, tangtawn hinpha a om gige ding, Mihing Tapa honpiak ding zong in phezaw un; Pa Pathian in amah a chiamtehta hi,” chi in a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Pathian nna ka sep theihna ding un bang ahia ka hih ding uh?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Pathian nasep hiai ahi, a misawl gingta le uchin” chi in a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Chiamtehna bang ahia na hih ding, ka muh ua nang k’on gintak theihna ding un? Thil bang ahia na hih ding?
Van a kipan a kiang uah amau tanghou nekding a pia chih gelh bang in, Ka pipute un gamdai ah manna a ne uhi” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Van a kipan a tanghou na muh pen uh Mosi honpiak ahi kei, ka Pa’n van a kipan tanghou tak nou a honpia hi.
Pathian tanghou van a kipan in a hong paisuk a, khovel kiang a hinna pepa ahi” a chi hi.
Amau “Toupa, huai tanghou honpe gige in” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Keimah hinna tanghou ka hi; kuapeuh ka kiang a hongpai a gilkial kei ding, kuapeuh kei hon gingta chikmah chiang in a dangtak kei ding.
Himahleh nou n’on muh un leng n’on gingta kei uh chih k’on hilhta ve.
Pa’n honpiak peuhmah ka kiang ah a hong paivek ding uh; kuapeuh ka kiang a hongpai ka delhkhe kei hial ding hi.
Kei deihlam hih ding in van a kipan a hong paisuk ka hi kei a, hon sawlpa deihlam hih ding a hong paisuk ka hi zaw hi.
Hiai pen hon sawlpa deihlam ahi, aman honpiak tengteng bangmah mangsak lou in, nitawpni chiang in kaithou zaw leng.
Hiai pen ka Pa deihlam ahi, kuapeuh Tapa mu a gingta in tangtawn hinna a neih a, nitawpni chiang in amah ka kaithou ding” a chi hi.
Van a kipan a tanghou hong paisuk ka hi a chih ziak in, Judate a tung ah a phun uhi.
“Hiai mi Joseph tapa Jesu ahi ka hia, a nu leh a pa leng i theih? Van a kipan a hong paisuk ka hi bangchi chih a chi ahia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Phunphun dah un.
Pa honsawlpan a hip kei leh kuamah ka kiang ah a hongpai theikei. Ken a hongpai mi nitawpni chiah ka kaithou ding.
Zawlneite laibu ah Pathian hilh in a omvek ding uh, chih gelh ahi. Michih Pa thu za a thei peuhmah ka kiang ah a hongpai uhi.
Pathian a kipan pen loungal in kuamah in Pa a mu ngeikei, aman zaw Pa a mu hi.
Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in k’on hilh ahi, kuapeuh a gingta in tangtawn hinna a nei hi.
Keimah hinna tanghou ka hi.
Na pipute un gamdai ah manna a ne ua a si uhi.
Hiai tanghou i chih pen van a kipan a hong paisuk ahi, min a nek ua a sihlouhna ding un.
Keimah van a kipan a tanghou hing hong paisuk ka hi, kuapeuh in hiai tanghou a nek leh tangtawn in a hing gige ding; ahi, khovel hinna dia ka piak ding tanghou ka sa ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in Judate a kisel ua, “Hiai min bangchi’n a sa nek ding in honpe thei ding ahia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa sa na nek ua, a sisan na dawnkei uleh noumau in hinna neilou hive uchin.
Kuapeuh ka sa ne a, ka sisan dawn in tangtawn hinna a nei; huan, nitawp ni chiang in amah ka kai thou ding hi.
Ka sa zaw an taktak ahi a, ka sisan leng dawntak taktak ahi.
Kuapeuh ka sa ne a, ka sisan dawn mi keimah ah a om gige a, keileng amah ah ka om gige hi.
Pa hing in honsawl a, Pa ziak a hing ka hih mah bang in, kuapeuh kei hon nete keimah ziak in amah leng a hing ding hi.
Hiai van a kipan a tanghou hong paisuk ahi; na pipute un tanghou a ne ua, a sih bang uh zaw ahi kei; kuapeuh hiai tanghou ne tangtawn in a hing gige ding” a chi hi.
Huai thute Kapernaum khua a kikhopnain a thuhilh lai a a gen ahi.
Huchi in a nungzuite a khen tampi in huai a zak un, “Hiai thuhaksa ahi, kuan a ngaikhe thei dia?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in huai thu ah a nungzuite a phun uh chih Jesu’n a lungsim in a thei a, a kiang uah, “Hiai thu in honhih lunghilou hia?
Mihing Tapa tuma lam a a omna ngei a kahtou mu le uchin, bang na chi ding ua?
Hinna pia zaw kha ahi a, sa zaw bangmah din a phatuam kei; na kiang ua thu ka gente kha ahi a, hinna leng ahi.
Himahleh na lak uah a khen gingtalou om na hi uh” a chi hi. Jesu’n a gingtaloute leh a mansak dingpa a tung a kipan in a theigige ngal a.
Huan aman, huaiziak in ahi na kiang ua, “Pa in a piak kei leh kuamah ka kiang ah a hongpai theikei” ka chih, a chi hi.
Hiai nung in a nungzuite a khen tampi a paikik ua, amah a kithuahpih nawnta kei uhi.
Jesu’n sawmlehnihte kiang ah, “Nou leng paimang sam na ut uhia?” a chi hi.
Simon Peter in, “Toupa, kua kiang ah ahia ka pai ding uh? Nangman tangtawn hinna thute na nei hi, chi in a dawng hi.
Nangmah Pathian Mi Siangthou na hi chih ka taksangta ua, theih leng ka thei uhi” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Nou sawmlehnihte keimah hon tel hilou na hi umaw? Na lak ua mi khat Diabol a hih laitei toh” a chi hi.
Iskariot Simon tapa Judas, sawmlehnihte lak a telsam, huai thu a gen ahi, amah zuausan a mansakpa ding ahi.
Huaikhit in Galili gam ah Jesu a vak a; Judate’n amah hihlup a tup ziak un Judia gam a pha nuam kei hi.
Judate Biakbukte Ankuangluina a naita hi.
Huchi in a unaute’n a kiang ah, “Hiai a kipan in Judia gam ah vahoh in, na nungzuite’n na thilhih a muh theihna ding un” a chi uhi.
Kuamah in a guk in thil bangmah ahihkei ua, Amahmah in a langtang in mite theih din a hih hi. Hiai thilte na hih ngal leh khovel kiang ah kimusak in” a chi uhi.
A unaute nangawn in leng amah a gingta kei uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Ka hun a tung naikei; nou hun zaw chikpeuh in a tung gige hi.
Khovel in nou hon haw theikei hi, kei zaw hon hawnak uhi, a thilhihte uh a gilou chih ka theihsak ziak in.
Nou Ankuangluina ah va hohtou unla, kei zaw tu Ankuangluina ah ka hohtou tadih kei ding, ka hun a tun nailouh ziak in” a chi hi.
Huai thu a kiang uah gen in Galili gam ah a om nilouh hi.
Himahleh a unaute Ankuangluina a a hohtouh nung un, amah leng vantang theihlouh in, a guk bang in a hohtou sam hi.
Judate’n Ankuangluina ah amah a zawng ua, “Koi a om ahia?” a chi uhi.
A tung ah mipite lak a mi a phunsim supsup ua, “Khenkhat in, mi hoih ahi, a chi ua; khenkhat in, hi dekkei e, mipi a pimang ahi” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Judate a kihtak ziak un kuamah in a langtang in a tungtang thu a genlang ngamkei uhi.
Ankuanglui sanlaitakin, Pathian biakin ah Jesu a hohtou a, thu a hilh hi.
Huan Judate’n, “Hiai mi’n zil ngeiloupi a bang a chia thei ahia?” a chi ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Huan Jesu’n amau a dawng a, “Ka thuhilh kei a hilou in, hon sawlpa thu ahizaw hi.
Kuapeuh amah deihlam hih ut in ka thuhilh Pathian a kipan hia, keimah phuahtawm a ka gen chih a thei ding hi.
Kuapeuh amah phuahtawm thugen zaw, amah hoihna zawng ahi; a sawlpa hoihna zawngmi mitak ahi, amah ah diklouhna himhim a omkei hi.
Mosi in dan na kiang uah honpe ka hia? Himahleh na lak uah kuamah in Dan na zuikei uhi. Nou bang a chia hon hihlup tum?” a chi hi.
Mipi’n, “Dawizawl neive; kuan ahia hon hihlup tum?” chi in a dawng uhi.
Jesu’n a dawng a a kiang uah, “Thil khat ka hih nou tengteng in lamdang na sa uh.
Ahi a, Mosi in zeksum thu nou a honpiak ziak in khawlni’n leng mi zek na sum zel uhi. Huai pen Mosi a kipan hilou in pipute a kipan ahizaw hi.
Mosi dan a tatlek louhna ding a khawlni a pasal in a zek a sum ngal a leh, ken khawlni a mi ka hihdam ziak in ka tung ah na heh tuam umaw?
A kilat dan in ngaihtuah kei unla, diktattakin ngaihtuah zaw un” a chi hi.
Huan Jerusalem khua a mi khenkhat in, “Hiai mi thah a tuppa uh hilou hia?
En dih uh, a langtang in hiai ah thu a gen a, a kiang ah bangmah a genkei uhi. Amah Khrist ahi chih vaihawmte’n a thei taktakta ua eita maw?
Hiai mi a hong kipatna lam nangawn i thei ngal a. Khrist zaw a hongtun chiang in a hong kipatna lam kuamah in a theikei ding uh” a chi uhi.

Huaiziak in Pathian biakin a Jesu’n thu a hilhkawm in a kikou a, “Nou n’on thei ua, ka hong kipatna lam leng na thei uh. Himahleh keimah thu a hongpai ka hi kei, amah kei hon sawlpa midik ahi, amah lah na thei ngalkei uhi.
Ken amah ka thei hi; amah a kipan a hongpawt ka hi a, aman lah a honsawl ngal a” a chi hi.
Huchi in amah mat a tumta ua, himahleh a hun a tun nailouh ziak in kuamah in a khoih theikei uhi.
Mipi a khen tampite’n bel amah a gingta ua, “Khrist a hongtun chiang in, hiai mi hih sang a tam zaw thillamdang a hih dia hia? a chi uhi.
Huan Pharisaite’n a tung a mipi phunna thute a za ua; huchi in siampu liante leh Pharisaite’n amah man ding in heutute a sawlta uhi.
Jesu’n, “Sawtloukal na kiang uah ka omphot dia, hon sawlpa kiang ah ka pai ding hi.
Nou n’on zong ding ua, n’on mu kei ding uh; ka omna ah leng na hong theikei ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan Judate a kihou ua, “I muhlouh ding in hiai mi koi a hohdek ading? Grik pemdalhte kiang a hoh in Grikte thu vahilh ding a diam aw?
Nou n’on zong ding ua, n’on mu kei ding uh, ka omna ah leng na hong theikei ding uh a chih, bang a chihna a diam maw?” a chi uhi.
Huan ankuangluini nanungpen, ni thupi ni’n, Jesu ading a, a kikou a, “Kuapeuh a dangtak leh ka kiang ah hong henla, dawn hen.
Kuapeuh kei hon gingta Laisiangthou gen bang in tuihing luite asung apan a hong luangkhe ding” a chi hi.
Hiai thu a gingtate’n Kha a tan ding thu uh a genna ahi; Kha lah piak ahi nai tadih kei ua, Jesu lah pahtawi a a om nailouh ziak in.
Huchi in mipi lak a khenkhat in huai thu a zak un, “Hiai zaw zawlnei hi petmah e” a chi uhi.
Khenkhat in, hiai zaw “Khrist ahi” a chi ua, khenkhat in bel, “Bangdi’n Galili gam ah Khrist a hongpawt tel dia?
Khrist zaw David suante lak ah, David omna khua Bethlehem ah a pawt ding ahi chih Laisiangthou in a gen ka hia?” a chi uhi.
Huchi in amah ziak in mipi a kikhen ua, a kilangta uhi.
Khenkhat in mat a ut ua, himahleh kuamah in a khoih tuankei uhi.
Huan heutute, siampu liante leh Pharisaite kiang ah a hongpai nawn ua a kiang uah, “Bang a chia hon pilou? a chi uhi.
Heutute’n, “Hiai mi bang in kuamah in thu a gen ngeikei” a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Pharisaite’n a kiang uah, “Nou leng pimang a omsamta umaw?
Vaihawmte leh Pharisaite lak a mi amah gingta a omta ahia?
Huai dan theilou mipite soplai, hamsethuak eive ua” a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Nikodem, tuma a Jesu kiang a hong, a lak ua pangsam ahi a, aman a kiang uah,
“Amah kam ngei a thu zak leh a thilhih theih ma in i dan un mi siamlouh a tangsak ngei ahia?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Nang leng huai Galili mi na hi sam maw? Zong lechin, Galili gam ah zawlnei kuamah pawt ding a omkei uh chih thei tanla” a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Huan michih amau in chiat ah a paita uhi.
Olive tang ah Jesu a hohtou hi.
Zingsang phalvak in Pathian biakin ah a lutnawn a, mi tengteng a kiang ah a hongpai ua, amah a tu a, amau thu a hilh hi.
Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite’n numei khat a angkawm lai a mat uh a honpi ua; a lai ah a dingsak uhi.
Jesu kiang ah, “Sinsakpa, hiai numei angkawm, a angkawm laitak a a mat uh ahi.
Mosi Dan laibu in hichibang mi suang a denlup thu a honpia hi; nang bangchi na sa a?” a chi uhi.
Huai thu amah ze-etna dia a chih uh ahi, hekna ding a muh theihna ding un. Huchi in Jesu a kun a, a thugen uh zalou bang in a khutzung in lei a gelh hi.
Huan a dot lailai ziak un amah a daktou a a kiang uah, “Na lak ua khelhna neilou in amah suang in deng masa heh” a chi hi.
A kun nawn a, a khutzung in lei ah a gelh nawn hi.
Amau a thugen a zak un, upapen apan in a tawppha in, khatkhat in a gelkhia ua; huchi in numei a lai a a omna ngei a om toh Jesu kia a om uhi.
Jesu a daktou a, “Numei, koi a om ahi ua? Kuamah in siamlouh hon tangsaklou uhia?” a chi hi.
Huan aman “Toupa, kuamah in hon tangsakkei” a chi hi. Jesu’n, “Ken leng siamlouh k’on tangsak kei; pai inla, tuban hihkhial nawn ken” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah thu a gennawn a, “Kei khovel vak ka hi; kuapeuh honzui mial ah a khosa kei hial ding, hinna vak a nei zaw ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in Pharisaite’n a kiang ah, “Nangmah thu theisak na hi; na thu theihsak a dikkei” a chi uhi.

Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Keimah thu theisak na hita leng zong ka thu theisak a dik ahi. Ken ka hong kipatna leh ka manohna ding leng ka thei hi; noute’n bel ka hong kipatna leh ka manohna ding na theikei uhi.
Nou sa dan in vai na hawmsak uh; ken kuamah vai ka hawmsak kei hi.
Ahi, vaihawmsak na hi taleng zong, ka vaihawmsak a dik ding; keimah kia ka hi kei a, kei leh Pa hon sawlpa ka hi zaw uhi.
Ahi, na dan laibu uah leng mi nih thu a dik, chih gelh ahi.
Kei ka hihleh keimah thu theisakpa ka hi a, Pa hon sawlpan ka thu a theisak hi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Na pa koi ah?” a chi uhi. Jesu’n, “Nou kei n’on theikei uh, ka Pa leng na theikei uh; kei honthei hile uchin, ka Pa leng na thei ding uh” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huai thu Pathian biakin a thu a hilhkawm in, sumkoihna mun a a gen ahi; a hun a tun nailouh ziak in kuamah in amah a man sam kei uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Ka paimang ding a, nou n’on zong ding ua, na khelhna uah na si ding uh; ka hohna ding ah na hong theikei ding uh” a chi nawn hi.
Judate’n, “Ka hohna ding ah na hong theikei ding uh, a chih, a kihihlum dia a diam?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Nou nuailam a kipan na hi ua; kei tunglam a kipan ka hi; nou khovel a na hi ua, kei zaw hiai khovel a ka hi kei hi.
Huaiziak in na kiang uah, na khelhna uah na si ding uh, ka chih huai amah ka hi chih na gintak kei ua leh, na khelhna uah na si ngeingei ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Kua na hia?” a chi uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “A tung a kipan in na kiang uah ka genta hi.
Nou tungtang thu ah thil tampi gen ding leh ngaihtuah ding ka nei; himahleh, hon sawlpa zaw mi dik ahi; amah kiang a ka thuzakte khovel kiang ah ka hilh hi” a chi hi.
Pa thu a kiang uah a gen chih a theisiam kei uhi.
Huchi in Jesu mah in, “Nou mihing Tapa na khaikang nung un, amah ka hi chih leh, ken keimah thu in thil bangmah ka hihkei a, Pa in honhilh bangzel in hiai thu ka genzaw ahi chih na thei ding uhi.
Hon sawlpa ka kiang ah a om a, Pa in kei kia in hon nusia ngeikei hi; a thil kipahlam peuhmah ka hihzel ziak in” a chi hi.
Huan huai thute a genlai in mi tampi’n amah a gingta uhi.
Huchi in Jesu’n a gingta Judate kiang ah, “Ka thu a na om gige uleh, ka nungzuite na hi taktak ding uhi.
Huan thutak na thei ding ua, thutak in a hon suaktasak ding” a chi hi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Abraham suante keive ua, tutan in kuamah sal ah ka om ngeikei uh, suahtaksak in na om ding uh bangchi chih a chi na hia?” a chi ua, a dong uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, kuapeuh thil hihkhial khelhna sal ahi.
Sal chiklaipeuh in inn ah a om gige kei a; Tapa chiklaipeuh in a om gige hi.
Tapa in sal apat a hon suahtaksak leh, na suakta taktak ding uhi.
Abraham suante na hi uh chih ka thei hi, himahleh honthah na tum ngal ua, ka thu in nou ah mun a neih louh ziak in.
Ken ka Pa kiang a thil ka muh ka gen a; nou leng na pa u kiang a thil na muh uh na hih uh” a chi hi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Kou pa Abraham ahi” a chi ua, a dawng uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Abraham tate hile uchin, Abraham thilhih na hihta ding uhi a chi hi.
Himahleh Pathian kiang a thutak ka zak, nou hon hilhpa kei tun ah hon thah na tum ngal ua; Abraham in zaw hichibang in ahihkei. Nou zaw na pa uh thil na hihnak uhi” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Angkikawm a piang ka hi kei uh, Pa khat kia ka nei uh, Pathian” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Pathian na Pa uh hita leh nou kei n’on it ding uh; Pathian apan hongpawt leh a kiang a kipan hongpai ka hi; keimah thu a hongleng ka hi sam kei, aman a honsawl zaw ahi.
Bangziak a ka thugen theisiamlou? Ka thu na zak theihlouh ziak uh ahi.

Nou zaw na pa uh Diabol a pawt na hi ua, na pa uh utna na hih ding uh. Amah zaw a tung a kipan tualthat ahi, thutak ah a omkei, asung a thutak himhim a omlouh ziak in. Zuauthu a gen in amah a ngei a gen ahi; zuauthei ahi ngal a, zuaupa leng ahi.
Thutak ka gen ziak in nou hon gingtalou na hi uhi.
Na lak uah kuan ahia gilou lam a siamlouh hontan thei om? Thutak ka gen in leng nou bang a chia hon gingtalou?
Pathian apan pawt in, Pathian thu a pakta a; Pathian apan pawt na hihlouh ziak un na pakta kei uhi” a chi hi.
Huan Judate’n a kiang ah, “Samari mi dawizawl na hi ka chih uh, ka chi dikngel kei umaw?” a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Jesu’n, “Dawizawl ka hi kei. Ka Pa ka zahtak ahizaw, nou kei n’on zahtak kei uhi.
Himahleh keimah kilawmna zawng ka hi kei; a zawngmi leh a ngaihtuahmi khat a om ahi.
Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, min ka thu a zuih leh tangtawn in sihna a mu kei ding” a chi hi.
Huan Judate’n a kiang ah, “Dawizawl na hi chih tuin ka theita uhi. Abraham a sita, zawlneite toh, nang min ka thu a zuih leh, tangtawn in sihna a chiam kei ding, na chi hi.
Ka pu uh Abraham sang in na thupizaw ahia? Amah leng a sita a, zawlneite leng a sita uh; kua a kibawl na hia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n “Keimah kipahtawi leng ka kipahtawina bangmah ahi kei; na Pathian uh, na chih uh ka Pa, hon pahtawipa ahi; nou amah na theikei uhi.
Ken zaw amah ka thei; Amah ka theikei chi leng noumau bang a zuau thei ka hi ding: huchi in amah ka thei a, a thu leng ka zuizel hi.
Na pu uh Abraham, ka ni mu ding a hih ziak in a kipak a, huan a mu petmah a, a kipak hi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan Judate’n a kiang ah, “Nang kum sawmnga leng hi nailou pi in, Abraham na mu ahia?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Chihtaktak in, Chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Abraham om ma in leng ka om” a chi hi.
Huchi in a denna ding un suangte a tawm ua; himahleh Jesu a kibu a, Pathian biakin a kipan a pawtta hi.
Huan Jesu’n a paikawm in piantung a kipan mittaw khat a mu hi.
A nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Rabbi, mittaw sa a a pian kuan ahia thil hihkhial, hiai mi hia, a nu leh a pa?” chi in a dong uhi.
Jesu’n, “Hiai mi’n a hihkhial kei, a nu leh pa’n leng a hihkhial kei uh; Pathian nasepte a tung a a latna ding ahizaw” chi in a dawng hi.
Sun a hihlai in hon sawlpa nna i sep ngeingei ding uh ahi; zan hi dekdekta ahi, huai hun chiang in kuamah in nna a sem theikei ding uh.
Khovel a ka om sung in khovel vak ka hi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huchibanga a genkhit in, lei ah chil a sia a, tungman a bawl a, huan tungman a mit ah a nuh hi.
A kiang ah, “Siloam dil ah vasil in” a chi a. “Siloam tuh sawl” chihna ahi. Vapai in a sil a, mitvak in a hong kiknawn hi.
Huchi in a vengte leh tuma a khutdoh a mute’n, “Hiai mi tukawm a khutdohpa ahi ka hia?” a chi uhi.
Midang in “Amah ahi vaw oi, a chi ua, midang in, hi kei a kibatpih ahizaw, a chi uhi. Aman bel huai mi mah ka hi” a chi hi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Na mit bangchi’n ahia a hongvak?” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Mi khat, Jesu a chih un tungman a bawl a, ka mit a nuh a, ‘Siloam dil ah vahoh inla va sil in’ a honchi a, huchi in, ka vahoh a, ka sil a, mitvakna ka muta” a chi hi.
Huan amau a kiang ah, “Amah kaw om ahia?” a chi uhi. Aman, “Ka theikei” a chi hi.
Amaute’n huai mittawpa Pharisaite kiang ah a honpi uhi.
Jesu’n tungman bawl a, a mit ahihvak ni khawlni ahi.
Huchi in Pharisaite’n a mit a hongvak takdan a dong nawn uhi. Aman a kiang uah, “Ka mit ah tungman a koih a, ka sil a, ka mu theita hi” a chi hi.

Huan Pharisai khenkhat in, “Huai mi’n khawlni a tanlouh ziak in, Pathian a kipan ahi kei” a chi uhi. Khenkhat in bel, “Mikhial in bangchi’n hichibang thillamdang a hih thei dia?” a chi uhi. Huchi in a kikhen ua, a kilangta uhi.
Mittawpa kiang ah, “Na mit ahihvak nang bangchi bang in amah na ngaihtuah?” a chi nawn ua. Aman, “Zawlnei ahi: a chi hi.
Himahleh Judate’n a mit hongvakta nu leh pa a sap masiah uh, mittaw a na hi hima a mit a hongvakta chih a tungtang thu a taksang kei uhi.
A nu leh a pa kiang ah, “Hiai mi na tapa uh mittaw sa a piang ahi na chih uh ahi hia? Bangchi’n ahia tua a muhtheih tak?: chi in a dong uhi.
A nu leh apan, “Hiai ka tapa uh ahi chih ka thei uh, mittaw sa in a piang chih leng ka thei uhi.
Himahleh bangchi’n ahia tua hon muhtheih chih ka theikei uh, a mit hihvakpa leng ka thei sam kei uh; amah dong un; piching ahi a; amah thu kigen thei ahita ” a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Judate a kihtak ziak un a nu leh apan huai thute a gen uhi; Judate’n, huai ma him in leng, Amah Khrist ahi chi a gum a om leh kikhopnain apan nawhsuah ding chih a lemsa chiat ngal uhi.
Huaiziak in a nu leh pa’n “Piching ahi, amah dong un” a chi uhi.
Huchi in mittawpa a samnawn ua a kiang ah, “Pathian phat in hiai mi zaw mikhial ahi chih ka thei uh” a chi uhi.
Aman bel, “Mikhial ahi hia hilou ka theikei, thil khat ka thei, tuma in ka mit a taw a, tuin ka mu theita hi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Na tung ah bangchi’n ahia a hih? Na mit bangchi’n ahia ahihvak?” a chi uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Den in k’on hilhta vele, na theinuam ngalkei ua; bang a chia theinuam nawn na hi ua? Nou leng a nungzui hihsam ut u maw?” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huan amau amah a tai ua, “Nang amah nungzui na hi, kou zaw Mosi nungzuite ka hi uh chi in.
Pathian in Mosi a houpih chih ka thei uh, hiai mi phiangsan koi a hong kipan ahia ka theihsak kei uh” a chi uhi.
Huai min a kiang uah, “Huai pen tak ahi a lamdanna, koi a hong kipan ahia na theihlouh uh, ka mit lah ahihvak ngei ngal a a chi hi.
Pathian in mikhial thu a ngaikhe kei chih i thei uhi. Himahleh kuapeuh in Pathian a limsak a, a deihlam ahihleh, Pathian in amah a ngaikhia hi.
Khovel omtung a kipan kuamah mittaw sa a piang mit ahihvak nawn chih a kithei ngeikei hi.
Hiai mi Pathian a kipan a pawt ahihkei leh bangmah a hih theikei ding” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Nang khial lumlet a piang in hiai bang n’on hilh vial maw?” chi in a dawng uhi. Huchi in amah a nawhkhia uhi.
Huan a nawhkhia uh chih Jesu’n a za a; amah a muh in, “Pathian Tapa na gingta hia?” a chi hi.
Aman “Pu, amah kua ahia ka gintak theihna din?” chi in a dawng hi.
Jesu’n, “Amah na mukhinta a, tua nang hon houpihpa ahi” a chi hi.
Aman “Toupa, ka gingta hi” chi in amah a bia hi.
Jesu’n, “Thukhen ding in hiai khovel ah hong ka hi, mittawte mit a hongvakna ding leh, mitvakte mit a hongtawtna ding in” a chi hi.
A kiang a Pharisai omte’n huai thu a zak un, a kiang ah, “Kou leng mittaw ka hi sam u maw?” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Mittaw hile uchin khelhna neilou ding hi u chin a, himahleh ka muthei uh na chih ziak un khelhna ah na om gige uhi” a chi hi.
“Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, kuapeuh belam huang a kongkhak a lutlou a, lampi dang a kahlut mi guta leh suamhat ahi.
Kuapeuh kongkhak a lut belamchingpa ahi.
Kongkhak ngakpa’n amah a na honsak a; belamte’n a aw a za uh; aman belamte a min un a sam chiat a, a pikhe zel hi.
Amah a tengteng a pawtsaktakin, a ma uh a kai a, belamte’n amah a zuizel uh, a aw a thei uhi.
Midang zaw a zuikei ding uh, a taimangsan zaw ding uh; midangte aw a theihlouh ziak un” a chi hi.
Hiai gentehna Jesu’n a kiang uah a gen hi; himahleh bang thu ahia a kiang ua a gen chih a theikei uhi.
Huchi in Jesu’n a kiang uah a gen nawn a, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Kei belam kongkhak ka hi.
Ka ma a hongpai tengteng gutate leh suamhatte ahivek uh; himahleh belamte’n a thu uh a ngaihsak kei uhi.
Kei kongkhak ka hi; keimah a mi a lutleh, humbit in a om ding a, a lut in a pawt ding a, nekding leng a mu ding hi.
Guta zaw, gu ding leh that ding leh hihse ding lou in a hongpai kei; kei zaw hinna a neihna ding ua, tampitak a neihna ding ua, hongpai ka hi.
“Kei belamchingpa hoih ka hi; belamchingpa hoih in a belamte adin a hinna a pia hi.
Kiloh, belamchingpa tak hilou, belamte amah a hilou in, ngia hongpai a muh in belamte a taisan a; huan ngia in amau a kei a, huchi in belamte a hihdalh hi.
Kiloh ahi a, belamte ading a deihsakna himhim a neih louh ziak in a taimang hi.
Kei zaw belamchingpa hoih ka hi;
Pa in a hon theih leh ken Pa ka theih bang in kei a ka thei hi, kei a in leng a hon thei hi; huan belamte din ka hinna ka pia hi.
Hiai belam huang a lou belam dangte ka nei hi; amau leng ka honpi ding a, ka aw a za ding ua, honkhat in chingpa khat toh a omkhawm ding uhi.
Hiaiziakin Pa’n kei hon it ahi; laknawn ding a ka hinna ka piak ding ziak in.
Kuamah in hon laksak kei ding, keimah thuthu in ka pe zaw ding hi. Pe thei ka hi a lanawn thei leng ka hi. Hiai thupiak ka Pa apat ka muh ahi” a chi hi.
Hiai thu ziak in Judate a kikhen ua, a kilang nawnta uhi.
A khen tampi in “Dawizawl a hai eive; bangdia a thu ngaikhia na hi uh?” a chi uhi.
A khen in hiai dawizawl thute hi kei e. Dawi in mittaw mit ahihvak thei ahia? a chi uhi.
Huan Jerusalem khua a Tempul latna Ankuanglui lai ahi a; huai hun phalbi lai ahi.
Pathian biakin, Solomon inlim ah Jesu a kivialleh leh hi.
Judate’n hongum pelpul ua, a kiang ah, “Bang tan ahia vanglak a n’on bawl ding? Khrist na hihleh chiantak in honhilh in” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “K’on hilhta hi, na gingta tuankei uh; ka Pa min a thil ka hih hiaite’n ka tanchin a theisak uhi.
Himahleh na gingta kei uhi, ka belam lak a mi na hihlouh ziak un.
Ka belamte’n ka aw a za uh, ken leng amau ka thei a, amau a honzui uhi.
A kiang uah tangtawn hinna ka pia; tangtawn in a mangthang kei ding ua, kuamah in ka khut a kipan honsut sam kei ding hi.
Amau hon pepa ka Pa, mi tengteng sang a thupizaw ahi; kuamah in Pa khut a kipan a sut theikei ding hi.
Kei leh Pa lah pumkhat ka hi uh” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan Judate’n a denna ding in suang a tawm nawn uhi.
Jesu’n amau a houpih a, “Pa a kipan nasep hoih tampi k’on ensak a, huai nasepte lak ah bang nasep ziak in ahia suang a na honden dek uh?” a chi hi.
Judate’n a kiang ah, “nasep hoih ziak in suang in k’on dengdek kei uh; Pathian na gensiat ziak leh nang mihing hi ngal a, Pathian a na kibawl ziak ahizaw” chi in a dawng uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Na dan uah, ‘noute pathiante na hi uh k’on chi’ chih gelh ahi ka hia?
Pathian thu tunnate bawn pathiante a chih leh, Laisiangthou bohsiat theih ahi kei hi.
Pathian Tapa ka hi, ka chih ziak in Pa’n a seh a, khovel a a sawlpa Pathian na gensia honchi na hi umaw?
Ka Pa nasem ka hihkeileh hon gingta kei un.
Himahleh sem ka hihleh kei hon gingta kei mahle uchin ka nasepte bek gingta un; huchi a Pa keimah ah a om chih leh kei Pa ah ka om chih na theihna ua, na theihsiamna ding un” chi in a dawng hi.
Huaitak in mat a tum nawn ua, himahleh a khut ua kipan a suakta hi.
Jordan luigal ah Johan in a tung a mi a baptisna lam ah a paimang nawn a, huai ah a om nilouh hi.
Huan mi tampi a kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Johan in thillamdang bangmah ahihkei a; himahleh Johan in hiai mi tungtang thu a gen peuhmah a na dik mahmah hi” a chi uhi.
Huan huai ah mi tampi in amah a gingta uhi.
Huan mi khat, Mari leh a sanggam Martha omna khua Bethani mi, Lazar, damlou in om hi.
Mari, thaunamtui Toupa nilh a a sam a a khe nulnu sanggampa Lazar damlou in a om hi.
A sanggamnute’n Jesu kiang ah, “Ngai dih Toupa, na it a china hi” chi in, mi a sawl uhi.
Jesu’n huai a zak in, “Hiai natna sihna ding zen ahi kei, Pathian thupina ding ahizaw hi. Pathian Tapa hiai ziak a hihthupi a hih theihna ding ahi” a chi hi.
Martha, a sanggamnu, Mari leh Lazar te Jesu’n a it hi.
Huaiziak in a china chih a zak in, a omna ngei ah ni nih a tamlai hi.
Huaikhit in a nungzuite kiang ah, “Judia gam ah i hohnawn ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Rabbi, tuma zek in Judate’n suang a honden a tum ua; huchipi in huai ah na hohnawn dia hia?” a chi ua.
Jesu’n, “Sun in dakkal sawmlehnih a om ka hia? Mi sun a a vak leh a kisui ngeikei a, hiai khovel vak a muh ziak in.
Himahleh mi zan a a vak leh a kisui hi; amah a vak a omlouh ziak in” chi in a dawng hi.
Huai thute a genkhit in a kiang uah, “I lawmpa Lazar a ihmuta; a ihmu phawnghalh ding in ka hawh ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huchi in a nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Toupa, a ihmut takleh a khanglou nawn na ke” a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a sih thu gen ahi a; himahleh amau ihmu a khawl thugen hiam a sa uhi.
Huchi in Jesu’n chiantak in a kiang uah “Lazar si ahi a chi hi.
Huai a ka omlouh nou ziak in ka kipak hi, na gintak theihna ding un; himahleh a kiang ah i hawh ding uh” a chi hi.
Thomas, Didum a chih un, a nungzuihpihte kiang ah, “A sihna a i sihsamna ding in i hawh ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in Jesu a tun in ni li han ah a omta chih a thei hi.
Bethani khua Jerusalem kiang a om ahi a, ching sawmlehnga phial a gamla ahi;
Huchi in a sanggampa uh sihna tung a khamuan ding in Judate tampi Martha leh Mari kiang ah a hoh uhi.
Jesu a hong dek chih Martha in a zakphet in a vadawn a; Mari bel inn sung ah a tu lailai hi.
Martha in Jesu kiang ah, “Toupa, hiai a om hile chin, ka sanggampa si lou ding hi a.
Tun ah leng Pathian kiang a na nget peuhmah Pathian in nang honpe ding chih ka thei” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Na sanggampa a thounawn ding” a chi hi.
Martha in a kiang ah, “Nitawpni chiah, thohnawnna ah, a thounawn ding chih ka thei” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Kei thohnawnna leh hinna ka hi; kuapeuh hon gingta si mahleh a hing gige ding;
A hing peuhmah a, a hon gingta peuhmah tangtawn in a sikei ding; huai thu na gingta hia?” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, Gingta e, Toupa, Khrist, Pathian Tapa, khovel a hongpai dingpa na hi chih ka gingta hi” a chi hi.
Huan huai thu a genkhit in a kuan a, a sanggamnu Mari a sim sap a, “Sinsakpa hiai ah a om a, nang a hon samsak” a chi hi.
Aman huai a zaktak in, a dingkhe paha, a kiang ah a vahoh hi.
Jesu khua ah a lut naikei a, Martha in a vadawn lai a a omna ngei ah a omlai hi.
Huan insung a amah khamuana ompih Judate’n Mari dingkhe paha pawt a muhtak un, han ah kap ding a hohdek hi’n teh chi in, a zui uhi.
Huan Mari Jesu omna a vatunga amah a muhtak in a khebul ah a khupboh in, a kiang ah, “Toupa, hiai a om hile chin ka sanggampa silou ding hi a” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n Mari kap leh a honzui Judate kap a mu a, a lung a khoih mahmah a, kha in amau hi.
Huan aman “Amah kaw sial na hi ua?” a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, “Toupa hongpai inla, en in” a chi uhi.
Jesu a kapta.
Judate’n, “En dih uh, Lazar it na tel e” a chi uhi.
Himahleh khenkhat in, “Hiai mi, mittaw mit hihvakpa’n, hiai mi leng a silou sakthei kei a eita?” a chi uhi.
Huan Jesu nakpi’n a mau nawn a, han a tung hi. Huai han kawkhuk, suang a sit ahi.
Jesu’n, “Suang hemkhia un” a chi hi. A sipa sanggamnu Martha in a kiang ah, “Toupa, tun zaw a namta ding, a sihna ni li ahita” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, na gintak leh Pathian thupina na mu ding, k’on chi ka hia? a chi hi. Huchi in, suang a hemkhia uhi.
Huchi in Jesu a vandak a, “Pa ka thu na ngaihkhiak ziak in na tung ah ka kipak hi.
Ka thu na ngaikhe zel chih ka thei a; himahleh, mipi dingte ziak in hiai ka chi ahi, nang n’on sawl chih a gintak theihna ding un” a chi hi.
Huan huchi a a paukhit in aw ngaihtak in, “Lazar, hongpawt in” chi in a kikou hi.
Huan, misi a khut a khe, han puan a tuamsa in a hong pawtta a, a mai leng kinulna puan a tuam ahi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Phel unla, paisak un” a chi hi.
Huchi in Mari kiang a hongpai Jesu thilhih mu, Judate a khen tampi in Jesu a gingta uhi.
Himahleh, a khen Pharisaite kiang ah a vahoh ua, a kiang uah Jesu thilhihte a vahilh uhi.
Huchi in siampu liante leh Pharisaite’n vaihawmte a samkhawm ua, “Bangchi’n i hih ding ua? Hiai min thillamdang tampi a hih ngal a, a chi uhi.
Hichibang a i khahzan unzaw mi tengteng in amah a gingta ding ua; Rome mite a hongpai ding ua, i mun leh i namte a hon laksak ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huan a lak ua mi khat Kaiapha, huai kum a siampu lianpen in a kiang uah, “Nou bangmah theikei uteh,
I nam pumpi manthat louhna ding in mi tengteng sik a mi khat sih, nou adin a hoih chih leng na ngaihtuah kei uh” a chi hi.
Huai thu amah phuahtawm in a genkei, huai kum in siampu lianpen ahi a, a namte sik a Jesu a sih ding a genkhol ahizaw hi.
Huai namte sik kia ahi kei a, Pathian ta khovel a dalhte tengteng a pikhawmna ding in leng ahi sam hi.
Huchi in huai ni a kipan amah that ding in a kihou zel uhi.
Huaiziak in Jesu Judate lak ah a langtang in a vaknawnta kei a, huai a kipan gamdai zullam a khaw khat Ephraim a chih uah a vahohta hi; huai ah nungzuite toh a om nilouh ta uhi.
Huan Judate Paikan Ankuangluina a naita a, mi tampi kisiangsak ding in, gam apat, Paikan Ankuanglui ma in, Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou uhi.
Huchi in Jesu a zong ua Pathian biakin ah ding kawm in a kihou ua, Bang ahia na ngaihtuah uh? Ankuangluina ah a hong kei ding maw? a kichi uhi.
Siampu liante leh Pharisaite’n amah a mat theihna ding un kuapeuh in a omna a theih uleh amaute theihsak ding thu a peta uhi.
Huan Paikan Ankuangluina ding ni guk a omlai a, Jesu’n misi lak a kipan a a kaihthoh Lazar omna khua Bethani a hongtung hi.
Huai ah amah adin nitakan a bawl ua, Martha in nek a bawl hi, Lazar bel a Ankuang umpih khat ahi.
Mari in spiknardi buk kimkhat thaunamtui manphatak a hontawi a, Jesu khete a nuh a, a sam in a nul a, huai thaugim in insung a dimta hi.
Himahleh Judas Iskariot, a nungzuite lak a khat, a mansak dingpa’n,
“Hiai thaunamtui bangdia makhai za thum a zuak a migentheite kiang a pe zawlou uh ahia?” a chi hi.
Mi gentheite a awlmoh ziak a hiai thugen ahi kei; guta ahi a, dangka ip a kem a, asung a koih a lak zel ziak ahizaw hi.
Jesu’n, “Hih hen aw, ka kivui ni adia a sit ahi, sen hen aw.
Mi gentheite na kiang ua om gige ahi ua, kei bel na kiang ua om gige ding ka hi kei” a chi hi.
Huan huai mun ah Jesu a om chih Juda mipi’n a theih un; a hong ua, Jesu ziak kia hilou in, misi lak a kipan a kaihthoh, Lazar mah leng a muhnop ziak uh ahi.
Huan siampu liante Lazar leng that ding in a kihou uhi;
Amah ziak a Judate tampi in lang kaisana, Jesu a gintak ziak un.
A zing in, Ankuangluina a hong mipi tampi’n Jesu Jerusalem khua ah a hongpai ding chih a zak un,
Tumnahte a tawi ua, dawn ding in a pawtkhia ua,
Hosanna, Toupa min a Israelte Kumpipa hongpai a hampha e,
chi in, a kikou uhi.
Huan Jesu’n sabiltung nou a mu a, a tung ah a tuang hi.
Lau ken, Zion tanu;
en in, na Kumpipa,
sabiltung nou tung a tuang in,
a hongpai ding,
chih gelh a hih bang in.
Huai thute a tung in a nungzuite’n a theisiam kei ua; himahleh, Jesu pahtawi a hih nung in, a tanchin ah huai thugelh ahi chih leh, a tung ah huai thilte a na hihngei uh chih a theita uhi.
Huan Lazar hana kipan a sapkhiakpa, misi lak a kipan a kaihthoh lai a a kiang a mipi omte’n, a thu a theihpih uhi.
Huaiziak in ahi, mipite’n leng amah a vadawn uh, huai thillamdang a hih chih a theih ziak un.
Huchi in, Pharisaite’n, thei un, bangmah na hih theihlouh uh, en un, khovel in amah a zuita hi, a kichi uhi.
Huan Ankuangluina a Pathian be ding a hohtoute lak ah Grik kuate hiam a om uhi.
Huaite Galili gam a Bethsaida khua a mi Philip kiang ah a hong ua, a kiang ah, “Pu, Jesu ka mu nuam uh” a chi ua, a thum uhi.
Philip in Andru a honghilha; Andru leh Philip in Jesu a honghilh uhi.
Jesu’n a dawng a, a kiang uah, “Mihing Tapa pahtawi a a omna ding hun a tungta hi.
Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Buhtang lei a a kiaka, a sihphot keileh, amah kia in a om tawntung hi; a sih inbel, tampi in a gah hi.
Kuapeuh a hinna it in a mangsak ding a; kuapeuh hiai khovel a a hinna ngaineu in tangtawn hinna ah a kem ding hi.
Kuapeuh in ka nna a sepleh honzui hen; ka omna ah ka sikha leng a om ding hi; kuapeuh in ka nna a sep leh Pa’n amah a pahtawi ding hi.
“Tun ah ka kha a mangbang hi; bang ka gen dia? Pa, hiai hun apan hon hondam in, ka chi dia hia? chilou e, hiai ding a hiai hun a hongpai ka hi.
Pa na min pahtawi in, a chi hi. Huchi in van a kipan in aw hongsuak a, ka pahtawita, ka pahtawi nawnlai ding a chi hi.
Mipi a kiang a dingte’n huai a za ua, Vanpiging ahi, a chi ua; midangte’n, Angel in amah a houpih ahi, a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a dawng a, huai aw kei adia hongsuak ahi kei, noumau ading ahizaw, a chi hi.
Tu hiai khovel thukhensakna hun ahi; tu hiai khovel lal paihkhiak hun ahi.
Huan lei a kipan a khaikang a ka om leh, mi tengteng keimah kiang ah ka hip ding, a chi hi.
Huai thu a sih ding dan theihsakna dia a gen ahi.
Huan mipi’n a kiang ah, Khrist tangtawn in a om chih danbu ah ka thei uh, nang Mihing Tapa khaikang a om ding ka hi bangchi chih a chi na hia? Huai Mihing Tapa kua ahia? a chi ua, a dong uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, Vak na lak uah sawtlou a omtadih hi. Vak na neih lai un vak ah khosa un, huchilou in zaw mial in honlap ding hi. Kuapeuh mial a khosa in a paina a theikei hi.
Vak na neihlai un vak gingta un, vak tate na hong hih theihna ding un” a chi hi. Huai thute Jesu’n a gen a; huan a pai a, a muhlouh ding un a kiselta hi.
A ma uah huchitel a tam thillamdang hihmahleh, amah a gingta tuankei uhi:
Toupa, ka thugen uh kuan ahia gingta? Toupa khut leng kua kiang ah ahia latsak a a om? chi a zawlnei Isai thugen a tun na ding in.
Hiai ziak in ahi a gintak theihlouh uh, Isai in,
Aman a mit uh a hihtaw a,
a lung tang uh a hihkhauh a;
huchilou in zaw a mit un
a mu khading ua, a lungtang un a thei kha ding uh,
huan hong kihei nawn ding ua,
ken amau ka hihdam khading
chih, a gen nawn ziak in.
Hiai thilte Isai in a thupina a muh a a tanchin a gen ahi.
Himahleh, heutute lak nangawn ah tampi in Jesu a gingta uhi; himahleh Pharisaite ziak in a kipulak nuam kei uh, huchilou in zaw kikhopnain a kipan a hawlkhe kha ding uhi:
Pathian pahtakna sang in mihing pahtakna a deih zaw uhi.
Huan Jesu a kikou a, “Kuapeuh hon gingta kei gingta ahi kei a, hon sawlpa gingta ahizaw hi.
Kuapeuh kei honmu hon sawlpa mu ahi.
Vak khovel a hongpai pen ka hi, kuapeuh kei hon gingta mial a a omlouhna ding in.
Kuapeuh ka thugen za in, gingta kei mahleh, ken siamlouh ka tangsak kei: khovel siamlouh tangsak ding a hongpai ka hi kei a, khovel humbit ding a hongpai ka hi zaw hi.
Kuapeuh kei hon deihlou a, ka thugente pomlou in, siamlouh tangsak khat a nei hi, ka thugen huai thu mahmah in, nitawpni chiang in amah siamlouh a tang sak ding hi.
Keimah phuahtawm in thu ka genkei a; Pa hon sawlpan ka thugen ding leh ka hih ding thu a hon pezaw hi.
Amah thupiak tangtawn hinna ahi chih ka thei; huaiziak in ka thugen, Pa honhilh bangzel in ka gen ahi” a chi hi.
Paikan Ankuanglui kipat ma in, Jesu’n hiai khovel nusia a Pa kiang a a pai hun hongtungta chih a thei a; khovel a a itte, a tawppha in a it hi.
Huan nitak annek lai in, Diabol in Simon tapa, Judas Iskariot, lungtang a Jesu zuausan a matsak lungsim a koihsak khitnung in,
Pa’n a khut ah thilbangkim a peta chih leh Pathian a kipan hongpai ahi a, Pathian kiang a pai ding ahi chih Jesu’n theigige in,
Nitakan umlai ading a, a puante a suahkhia a, kinulna puan a la a, a teng hi.
Huan kisilna kuang ah tui asung a, nungzuite khe a silta a, kinulna puan a ten in a nul zel hi.
Huchi in Simon Peter kiang ah a honghi; “Aman Toupa, nang tel in ka khe na sil dia hia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Ka thilhih tun ah na theikei; himahleh tunung chiang in na thei ding” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Ka khe na silkei hial ding” a chi hi. Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Na khe ka sil kei leh ka kiang ah tan na neikei ding” a chi hi.
Simon Peter in a kiang ah, “Toupa, ka khe kia hilou in, ka khutte leh ka lutang leng aw” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Kisil khinsa a khe loungal sil a kiphamoh kei, a pumpi in a siang; nou na siang uh, na vek un zaw ahi kei” a chi hi.
A mansakpa dingpa a thei ngal a; huaiziak in, na vek un zaw na siangkei uh, a chi ahi.
Huchi in a khete uh a silkhit a, a puante a lak a, a tutnawn in a kiang uah, “Na tung ua ka thilhih na thei uhia?” a chi hi.
“Nou Toupa leh heutupa n’on chi ua; na chidik uhi, ka hihna mah ahi.
Kei Toupa leh na heutupa un na khe uh ka sil leh nou leng na khe uh na kisilsak ding uh ahi.
Na tung ua ka hihbang in, nou leng na hihsam ding un, hih ding dan honhilh ka hi.
Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, sikha a toupa sang in a thupizaw kei a; sawl a om leng a sawlpa sang in a thupizaw sam kei hi.
Huai thilte na theih ua, na hih uleh mi nuamsa na hi uhi.
Na vek ua thu ka genkei a; ka telte ka thei; himahleh Ka tanghou nepa’n ka tung ah a khetul a likta chih, Laisiangthou a hongtun theihna ding ahi.
Tuin a hong tunma in k’on hilh ahi, a hongtun hun chiang a kei amah ka hi chih na gintakna ding un.
Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, kuapeuh ka sawl kipahpih, kei hon kipahpih ahi; kuapeuh kei hon kipahpih, hon sawlpa kipahpih ahi,” a chi hi.
Jesu’n huai thu a genkhit in, a lungsim a mangbang a, “Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Na lak ua mi khat in kei hon mansak ding” chi in a theisakta hi.
Huan nungzuite’n a chihpen a theikei ua, a ki en tuah chiat uhi.
A nungzuite lak a khat, Jesu’n a itpa, dohkan sik ah Jesu angsung ah kingai in a om hi.
Simon Peter in huai mi kiang ah, kua pen thu ahia a gen dong ding in a khutvan hi.
Jesu awm ngai mah in a awnphei a, a kiang ah, “Toupa, kuapen ahia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, “Tanghou them ka diah a, ka piakpa ahi ding” chi in a dawng hi. Huchi in tanghou them a diah nung in, Iskariot, Simon tapa Judas kiang ah a pia hi.
Tanghou them a piak nung in Setan asung ah a lutta hi. Huchi in Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Na hih ding hihmeng in” a chi hi.
Dohkan a omte’n bang tuma hiai thu gen hiam chih a theikei uhi.
A khen in Judas in dangka ip a vom ziak in, Jesu’n Ankuangluina ading thil kiphamoh peuh lei in, chi hiam, mi gentheite kiang ah banghiam piak ding, chi hiam a sa uhi.
Huan tanghou them la in, a pawtkhe paha; huai zanlai ahi.
Huaiziak in a pawtnungin, Jesu’n a gen a, “Tuin Mihing Tapa pahtawi in a omta a, Pathian leng amah ziak in pahtawi in a om hi.
Amah a Pathian pahtawi a a om leh amah leng Pathian mahmah in a pahtawi ding, a pahtawi pah ding hi.

Naute aw, hun tomchik na kiang uah ka omlai tadih hi. Nou n’on zawng ding uh; Judate kiang a, ka paina ding ah nou na hongpai theikei ding uh chih ka gen bang in, tuin huchi mah bang in na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Thupiak thak konpia ahi, ki-ittuah un; ken nou k’on it bang in, nou leng ki-ittuah un.
Na ki-ittuah uleh mi tengteng in ka nungzuite na hi uh chih hiai ah a thei ding uh” a chi hi.
Simon Peter in a kiang ah, “Toupa, koi a hoh ding na hia? a chi hi. Jesu’n, ka hohna ding ah nang tuin n’on zui theikei ding; tunung chiah zaw n’on zui ding” chi in a dawng hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Toupa, bangding in ahia tua leng k’on zuih theihlouh ding? Nangmah ziak in ka hinna ka koihkhe ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n “Keimah ziak in na hinna na koihkhe ding maw? Chihtaktak in, Chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, nang thumvei n’on kitheihmohbawl ma in ak a khuangkei ding” chi in a dawng hi.
“Na lungtang uh hihmangbat in omkei hen; Pathian na gingta ua, keileng hon gingta sam un.
Ka Pa inn ah tenna mun tampi a om; a omlou hileh, k’on hilhta ding hi; nou ading a mun khat bawl dia kuandek ka hi.
Huan nou adia munbawl ding a ka kuan leh ka hong kiknawn ding a, ka kiang ah nou ka honla ding, ka omna a nou leng na om theihsamna ding un.
Ka hohna ding a lampi na thei uh” a chi hi.
Thomas in a kiang ah, “Toupa, koi a hoh ding na hia ka theikei uh, a lampi bangchi’n ka thei ding ua?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Keimah lampi, thutak leh hinna ka hi; keimaha pailou kuamah Pa kiang a tungkei a chi hi.
Kei n’on theihkhit uleh ka Pa leng na theikhinta ding uh; tu a kipan amah na thei ua muh leng na muta uhi” a chi hi.
Philip in a kiang ah, “Toupa, huai Pa kou hon ensak in, huchi in kou adin a hun ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Philip, hiai tanpi na kiang ah ka om a, huchi in leng hon theilou maw? Kuapeuh kei honmu Pa mu ahi. Huai Pa kou hon musak in bangchi chih a na chih ahia?
Kei Pa ah ka om a Pa keimah ah a om chih na gingta kei ahia? Na kiang ua thu ka gen, keimah phuahtawm in ka gen kei; Pa keimah ah a om gige a, thil a hihzaw nak hi.
Kei Pa a ka om leh Pa keimah a a om gingta un; ahihkeileh thilhih ziak bek in hon gingta un.
Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, kuapeuh hon gingta in ka thilhihte a hih sam ding; hiai sang a thupizaw leng a hih ding, Pa kiang a ka pai ding ziak in.
Huan ka min a na nget peuhmah uh ka hihzel ding, Pa, Tapa a pahtawi a a om theihna ding in.
Nou ka min a bangpeuh n’on nget uleh, ka hihzel ding hi” a chi hi.
“Nou n’on it uleh, ka thupiakte na zui ding uhi.
Huan Pa ka ngen dia, aman Khamuanpa dang a honpe ding, tangtawn a na kiang ua om ding in;
Huai thutak Kha; khovel in a neih theihlouh ahi, amah a muhlouh a, a theihlouh behlap ziak in; nou amah na thei ua, na kiang uah a om gige ngal a, noumau sung ah a om ding hi.
“Tagah din k’on paisan kei ding; na kiang uah ka hongpai nawn ding hi.
Sawtlou chik sung khovel in a hon munawn kei ding; himahleh nou zaw n’on mu ding uh; keimah ka hin ziak in nou leng na hing sam ding uhi.
Huai ni chiang in kei ka Pa a ka om leh nou keimah a na om bang un, kei noumau a ka omdan na thei ding uhi.
“Kuapeuh ka thupiakte nei a, zui, kei hon it ahi; kuapeuh kei hon it ka Pa’n a it ding, ken leng amah ka it ding a, a kiang ah ka hihna ka kilak ding, a chi hi.
“Huan Judas, Iskariot loupen in a kiang ah, Toupa, kou kiang a na kilak dia, khovel kiang a, na kilaklouh se ding bangziak ahia? a chi hi.
“Jesu’n a dawng a a kiang ah, min hon it leh ka thute a zui ding a; ka Pa’n amah a it dia, a kiang ah ka hongpai ding ua, amah toh ka tengkhawm gige ding uhi.
Kuapeuh hon itlou in ka thu a zuikei; na thuzakte uh kei a ahi kei a, Pa hon sawlpa a ahizaw hi.
“Na kiang ua ka omtak dih sung in, hiai thute k’on hilh hi.
Khamuanpa, Kha Siangthou, Pa in ka min a honsawl ding in bangkim nou a hon sinsak ding a, na kiang ua ka gen tengteng nou a hon thei khesak nawn ding hi.
“Khamuanna k’on nutsiat a; keimah khamuanna k’on pia hi; khovel in a piak bang in k’on pe kei hi. Na lungtang uh hihmangbat in omkei hen, lau leng lau kei hen.
Ka paimang ding a, na kiang uah ka hongpai nawn ding, k’on chih omdan na theita uhi. Nou n’on it uh leh Pa kiang a ka paiding ziak in na kipak ding uh ahi; keimah sang in Pa a thupizaw hi.
Tuin hiai thil a hongtun chiang a na gintak theihna ding un hongtun ma in k’on hilh ahi.
Na kiang uah thu ka gen tam nawn kei ding, khovel vaihawmpa a hongpai dek ziak in; aman keimah ah bangmah a neikei hi.
Himahleh ken Pa ka it chih leh Pa in hon thupiak bangzel in thil ka hih chih, khovel in a theihna ding uh eive. Ding dih ua, hiai a kipan i paikhe ding uh.
“Kei grepgui dik ka hi, ka Pa a kempa ahi.
Kei a hiang gahlou peuhmah a lamang a; a gah peuhmah a gah tamsemna ding in a hahsiang hi.
Na kiang ua ka thugen tawn in tun ah na siangthou pah uhi.
Keimah ah om gige un, keileng noumau ah ka om gige ding. Hiang, grepgui a a om gige kei leh amah in a gah theikei bang in, nou leng keimah a na om gige kei uleh, na gah theikei ding uhi.
“Kei a grepgui ka hi a, nou a hiangte na hi uh. Kuapeuh keimah a om gige a, keileng amah a ka om gige na, huai mah tampi in a gah hi; keimah lou in bangmah na hih theikei uhi.
Mi kei a a om gige kei leh, hiang bang a paihkhiak in a om a, a vuai hi; huan a tawm ua mei ah a pai ua, a kang hi.
Nou keimah a na om gige ua, ka thu leng noumau a a om gige leh na ut peuh uh ngen un, nou adia hih in a om ding hi.
Hiaiziakin tampi a na gah chiang un ka Pa pahtawi in a om hi, huchi in ka nungzuite na hi ding uhi.
Pa’n kei hon it bangmah in k’on it hi; ka itna ah om gige un.
Nou ka thupiakte na zuih uleh ka itna ah na om gige ding uhi, ken ka Pa thupiakte ka zui a, a itna a ka om gige mah bang in.
“Ka kipah noumau a a om gige theihna din leh na kipah uh a kimna ding in hiai thu na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Hiai ka thupiak ahi, ken nou k’on it bang in, noumau leng ki-ittuah un.
Mihing in a lawm adia a hinna a piak sang a itna thupizaw kuama’n a neikei hi.
Thu k’on piak peuhmah na hih uleh ka lawmte na hi ding uhi.
Sikha k’on chi nawn kei dia; a toupa thilhih sikha in a theihlouh ziak in; lawmte k’on chi zawta ding; Pa kiang a ka thilzak tengteng na kiang uah k’on theisakta hi.
Nou n’on tel kei ua, ken k’on tel zaw hi, vagah ding leh na gah uh om gige ding in k’on sep hi; ka min a Pa kiang a na nget peuhmah uh a hon piakna ding in.
Hiaite k’on thupiak ahi, ki-ittuah chiat un.
“Khovel in nou a honhuat leh nou a honhuat ma in keimah a hon haw khinta chih thei un.
Nou khovel a hi le uchin, khovel in amah a a it ding; khovel a kipan k’on telkhiak zawk ziak in, khovel in nou a hon hua hi.
Sikha a toupa sang in a thupizaw kei, chih thu k’on hilhta hi, theigige un. Amau kei a honsawi uleh, nou leng a honsawi ding uh; ka thu zui hita le uh, noumau thu leng a zui ding uhi.
Himahleh hiai thil tengteng ka min ziak in na tung uah a hih ding uh, hon sawlpa a theihlouh ziak un.
Kei hong pailou in a kiang uah thu gen keileng khelhna neilou ding hi ua, himahleh tuin a khelhna uah paulap ding a neita kei uhi.
Kuapeuh kei honhua in, ka Pa leng a hua ahi.
Midang kuamah hih ngeilouhte a lak ua hihlou hita leng, khelhna neilou ding hi ua, himahleh tuin amau kei leh ka Pa ka nih un hon muta uh, huat leng hon hawta uhi.
A dan uah, amau a ziak omlou in hon hua uh chih, thu gelhpen, a hongtunna ding ua hih uh eive.
“Huan Pa a kipan Khamuanpa na kiang ua k’on sawl ding, Pa a kipan thutak Kha a hongtun chiang in, keimah hon theihpih ding hi;
A tung a kipan a kei toh omkhawm na hih ziak un nou leng na theihpih ding uhi.
“Lungkia a na paimang louhna ding un na kiang uah hiai thute ka genta hi.
Kikhopnainte ah a hon nongsak ding ua; kuapeuh nou honthat Pathian tung a thil hoih hih in a kithei ding ua huai bang hun hongtung ding ahi.
Huai thilte a hih ding ua, Pa leh kei hon theihlouh ziak un.
Hiai thute na kiang uah ka genta hi, a hun a hongtun chiang a, k’on hilhkhinta chih na theihnawnna ding un. Hiai thilte na kiang ua ka om takdih ziak in a tung a k’on hilhlouh him na hi uhi.
“Tuin hon sawlpa kiang ah ka pai ding a noute kuamah in, koi a hoh ding? chi in, n’on dong kei uhi.
Hiai thute na kiang ua ka gen ziak in na lungtang uh lungkhamna in a dimzou hialta hi.
Himahleh thutak k’on hilh ahi; ka pai nou ding in a hoihzaw hi; ka paikei leh Khamuanpa na kiang uah a hong tungkei ding a; ka pai leh bel na kiang ua honsawl ding ka hi.
Amah a hongtun chiang in, khelhna, diktatna, leh vaihawmna thu ah khovel a siamlouh dan a theisak ding hi;
Khelhna thu ah siamlouh ahi ding uh, kei hon gintak louh ziak un.
Diktatna thu ah siamlouh a tang ding uh; Pa kiang a ka pai ding a, nou kei n’on muhnawn taklouh ding ziak un.
Vaihawmna thu ah siamlouh ahi ding uh, hiai khovel lal siamlouh a a puktak ziak in.
“Na kiang ua thugen ding tampi ka neilai a, himahleh tuin zaw na chin tadih kei uhi.

Himahleh amah Thutak Kha a hongtun chiang in, thutak tengteng ah nou a honpi ding; amah phuahtawm in thu a genkei dia; a zak peuhmah a genzaw ding, thil hongtung dingte leng nou a hon theisak ding hi.
Aman kei a hon pahtawi ding a; kei a a la ding a, nou kiang ah a hon theisak ding hi.
Pa’n thil a neih tengteng kei a ahi; huaiziak in kei a a la ding a, na kiang uah a hon theisak ding, ka chi hi.
“Sawtlouchik in nou kei n’on mu kei ding ua; sawtlouchik mah in nou kei n’on munawn ding uh, a chi hi.

“A nungzuite khenkhat in, i kiang ua a thugen bang ahi, sawtlouchik in nou kei n’on mu kei ding uh, sawtlouchik mah in n’on munawn ding uh a chih leh, Pa kiang a ka hohdek ziak in, a chih? a kichi uhi.
Amau mah in, sawtlouchik, a chih bang chihna ahia? A thugen i theisiam kei uh, a chi uhi.
“Huan amah dot ut a nei uh chih Jesu’n a thei a, a kiang uah, sawtlou chik in nou kei n’on mu kei ding uh, sawtlou chik mah in nou kei n’on mu nawn ding uh chi a ka thugen na kidong umaw?
Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, na khitui uh a ke ding a, na kap huphup ding uh, khovel bel a kipak ding; na lungkham ding ua, himahleh na lungkham uh kipahna a suak ding hi.
Numei nau nei ding in a veilai in a lungkham nak hi, a hun a tuntak ziak in; himahleh nau a suahtakin a lunggimna a thei nawnta kei hi, khovel a naungek mel hongpian a a kipah ziak in.
Tuin nou na lungkham uh; himahleh k’on munawn ding a, na lungtang uh a kipak ding, na kipahna uh kuamah in hon laksak kei ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in nou kei bangmah n’on ngen kei ding uh. Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, Pa kiang a bangpeuh ka min a na nget uleh a honpe ding hi.
Tu tan in ka min in bangmah na ngen nai kei uh. Ngen un, huchi in na mu ding uh, na kipah uh a kimna ding in.
“Huai thute a hem in na kiang uah ka genta hi; a hun a tung dekta, huai hun chiang in na kiang uah a hem in thu ka gen nawn kei ding a, chiantak in Pa tanchin k’on hilh ding hi.
Huai ni chiang in keimah min in thil na ngen ding uhi; Pa kiang ah ken k’on ngetsak ding ka chikei hi.
Pa in amah ngei in nou a hon it ngal a, nou kei n’on it ua, Pa a kipan ka hi chih n’on gintak ziak un.
Kei Pa kiang a kipan hongpawt a, khovel a hongpai ka hi a; khovel paisan a, Pa kiang a pai nawn ding ka hi, a chi hi.
Huan a nungzuite’n a kiang ah, “Ngai dih tuin teltak in a genta, a hem in na gen ta kei hi a chi uhi.
Nang bangkim na thei a, kuamah hondot na kiphamoh kei chih tuin ka theita uhi; hiai ziak in Pathian kiang a kipan hongpai na hi chih ka gingta uhi, a chi uhi.
Jesu’n a dawng a a kiang uah, tuin na gingta u maw?

“Ngai un, a hun hong tungding ahi, tuin leng a tungta hi, huai hun chiang in noumau in chiat ah na dalh vek ding ua, keimah kia n’on nuse ding uh. Himahleh Pa ka kiang a om ziak in keimah kia in ka omkei hi.
Hiai thute na kiang uah ka genta hi, keimah a na khamuanna ding un. Khovel ah gimthuakna na neiding uh, himahleh khamuangtak in om un, ken khovel ka zouta, a chi hi.
Huai thute Jesu’n a genkhit in vanlam nga in, “Pa a hun a tungta; na Tapa pahtawi in, Tapa in nang hon pahtawi theihna ding in;
Huchi a mi tengteng tung a thunei a na bawl in, a kiang a na piak peuhmahte tangtawn hinna a piak theihna ding in.
Hiai tangtawn hinna ahi, Nang Pathian tak kia leh na sawl Jesu Khrist theih.
Nang thilhih ding n’on piakte ka hihkhinta a, khovel ah k’on pahtawita hi.
Pa aw, khovel omma a na kiang a thupina ka neih in, tuin nangmah kiang ngei ah hon pahtawi in.
“Nang khovel a kipan a mi kei n’on piakte kiang ah na min ka hihlangta; amau nang a ahi ua, nang amau kei n’on piak ahi uh; amau lah na thu a zuita uhi.
Nang kei n’on piak tengteng nang a kipan ahi chih a theita uhi.
Nang thu n’on piakte a kiang uah ka peta a; huaite a kem ua, nang a kipan ka hi chih diktak in a theita uh, nang n’on sawl chih leng a gingta uhi.
Amau dia ka ngetsak zaw; khovel a dia ngetsak ka hi kei, nang n’on piakte ading ahizaw, nang a ahi uhi.
Thil tengteng kei a peuhmah nang a ahi a, nang a lah kei a ahi a; amau ziak in pahtawi in ka om hi.

Huan kei zaw khovel ah ka omta kei ding, hiaite bel khovel ah a om ding uh; kei na kiang ah ka hong paidekta hi. Pa Siangthou aw, nang kei n’on piakte na min in hum in pumkhat a hihtheihna ding un, eimah pumkhat i hih bang in.
A kiang ua ka om sung in, nang kei n’on piakte na min in ka hum a; amau ka don a, a lak ua khat leng a mangthang kei hi, mangthang tapa loungal, Laisiangthou a tun theihna ding in.
Himahleh tuin na kiang ah ka hong paidekta; khovel ah hiai thute ka gen ahi, ka kipah amau ua a neih kimna ding un.
Na thu a kiang uah ka peta hi; khovel in amau a hua a, khovel a a hihlouh ziak un, kei khovel a ka hihlouh mah bang in.
Nang amau khovel a kipan na lakkhiak ding ngen ka hi kei a, migilou lak ah na hum ding ka chi ahizaw hi.
Amau khovel a a hi kei ua, kei khovel a ka hihlouh mah bang in.
Amau thutak in hihsiangthou in, na thu thutak ahi.
Nang khovel a kei n’on sawl bang in, amau khovel ah ka sawl hi.
Amau ziak in ka ki hihsiangthou a, amau leng thutak a a sianthouna ding un.
“Hiaite ading kia a ngetsak ka hi kei, a thugen ziak ua kei hon gingta lai dingte ading in ngetsak ka hi; avek ua pumkhat a hihna ding un;
Pa, nang keimah a na om leh, kei nangmah a ka om bang in, amau leng eimah a a omna ding un; nang kei n’on sawl chih khovel in a taksan theihna ding in.
Huan nang thupina n’on piak ken amau ka peta; amau pumkhat a hihna ding un, ei pumkhat i hihmah bang in.
Kei amau ah, nang kei ah, amau pumkhat a a om ua a bukim theihna ding un; nang kei n’on sawl chih leh, n’on it bang in amaute na it chih khovel in a theihtheihna ding in.
“Pa, nang kei n’on piakte, ka omna a ka kiang a om ding in ka deih; leilung pian ma a itna a nang n’on piak ka thupina a muhtheihna ding un.
Pa diktat aw, khovel in zaw nang hon theikei a, ken zaw k’on thei hi; hiaite’n leng nang kei n’on sawl chih a thei uhi.
Huan a kiang uah na min ka theisakta a, ka theisak lai ding, nang kei n’on itna bangbang na itna amau a a om a, keileng amau a ka om theihna ding in” a chi hi.
Jesu’n huai thute a genkhit in a nungzuite toh a pawt ua, Kidron lui a kan ua, huai ah huan a om hi. Huai ah amah leh a nungzuite a lut uhi.
Huan a mansak dingpa Judas in leng huai mun a thei a; Jesu a nungzuite toh huai ah a pawt zelzel uhi.
Huchi in Judas in sepaih pawl, siampu liante leh Pharisaite kiang a om heutute a pi a, khawnvakte, meiselte, galvante tawi in huai ah a hongpai uhi.
Jesu’n a tung a thil tungding tengteng a theigige a, a vapawt a, a kiang uah, “Kua ahia na zon uh?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Nazaret Jesu a chi ua” a dawng uhi. Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Keimah ka hi” a chi hi.
A mansakpa Judas leng a lak uah ading a. “Keimah ka hi” a chihtak in, a nungtolh ua, lei ah a puk duam uhi.
Huan aman a kiang uah, “Kua ahia na zon uh?” chi in a dong nawn hi. Amau, “Nazaret Jesu” a chi uhi.
Huan Jesu’n, “Keimah ka hi chih k’on hilhta a; nou kei hon zong na hih uleh hiaite hoihtak in khah un” a chi a a dawng hi.
“Nang kei n’on piakte khat leng ka mangsak kei” chi a a thugen a tunna ding ahi.
Huan Simon Peter in a namsau vom a dok a siampu lianpen sikha a sat a, a bil taklam a satkhiaksak hi. Huai sikha min Malka ahi.
Huchi in Peter kiang ah Jesu’n, “Na namsau a pai ah siat in; Pa in nou a honpiak ka dawn kei dia hia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in sepaih pawl leh Judate heutute’n Jesu a man ua, a henta uhi.
Ana kiang ah a pi masa ua, Kaiapha sungpa a hih ziak in. Kaiapha, huai kum a siampu lianpen ahi.
Kaiapha bel, mitengteng sang a mi khat sih a hoih chi a, Judate hanthawn pa ahi.
Huan Simon Peter in nungzui dang khat toh Jesu a zui hi. Huai nungzuipa siampu lianpen meltheih ahi a, siampu lianpen in huangsung intual ah, Jesu kiang ah a lutsam hi;
Himahleh Peter pawlam ah kongkhak bul ah ading hi. Huchi in nungzui dang siampu lianpen meltheih, a vapawt a, kongkhak ngaknu a houpih a, Peter a pilut hi.
