Kongkhak ngak, nungak in Peter kiang ah, “Nang leng hiai mi nungzuite lak a pangsam na hi hia?” a chi hi.
Aman “Ka hi kei” a chi hi. Sikhate leh heutute huai ah ading uhi. A vot ziak in meihol in mei a toh ua, meilum a awi uhi. Peter leng a kiang uah a om a, ding kawm in meilum a awisam hi.
Siampu lianpen in Jesu a nungzuite tanchin leh a thuhilh a dong hi.
Jesu’n a dawng a a kiang ah, “Khovel kiang ah vantang theih in, thu ka gen gige hi; kikhopnain, Pathian biakin leh Judate omkhawmnate ah thu ka hilh zel a, a sim in bangmah ka genkei hi.
Bang a chia kei hon dong? A kiang ua ka thugen ka thuzate dong in, ngai in, amaute’n ka thugen a thei uh a kei hiam” a chi hi.
Huan a gentakin a kiang a ding heutu khat in Jesu a beng a, “siampu lianpen hichibang in na dawng maw?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Thudiklou gen ka hihleh, a gitlouhna hon theisak in. Himahleh, thupha ka gen in bang a chia hon beng?” a chi hi.
Huan Annas in hensa in siampu lianpen Kaiapha kiang ah a sawl hi.
Simon Peter in ding kawm in meilum a awi hi. “Nang leng a nungzuite lak a pangsam na hi hia?” a chi uhi. Aman, “ka hi kei” chi in, a kitheihmohbawl hi.
Huan siampu lianpen sikha khat Peter in a bil satkhiak sakpa sanggampa’n, a kiang ah, “Huan ah k’on mu kei maw?” a chi hi.
Huchi in Peter in a kitheihmohbawl nawn a; huan ak a khuangpah hi.
Kaiapha inn a apan in Vaihawmna inn ah Jesu a pinawn ua; zingsang ahi a; amau zaw Vaihawmna inn ah a lut kei uh, a lut un zaw buah in, Paikan Ankuanglui a ne theikei ding uhi.
Amaute kiang ah Pilat a vapawt a, “Hiai mi tung ah hekna bang ahia na neih uh?” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, “Hiai migilou hikeileh na kiang ah k’on pi kei ding uh” chi in a dawng uhi.
Huan Pilat in a kiang uah, “Nou pi unla, na dan bang un vaihawmsak un” a chi hi. Judate’n a kiang ah, “Kou thu in kuamah hihlup dan ahi kei” a chi uhi.
Hiai thu a sih ding dan, Jesu’n a gen bang a a tunna ding ahi.
Huchi in Pilat inn sung ah a lutnawn a, Jesu a sam a, a kiang ah, “Judate kumpipa na hi hia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n “Hiai ka tungtang thu nangmah lungsim puak khiak a na gen hia, midang in honhilh?” chi in dawng hi.
Pilat in, “Kei Judami ka hi ahia? Nangmah chipihte leh siampu liante’n ka kiang ah a honpi ua ahi; thil bang ahia na hih?” chi in a dawng hi.

Jesu’n, “Ka kumpi hihna hiai khovel ahi kei; ka kumpi hihna hiai khovel hileh Judate kiang a piak a ka omlouhna ding in, ka sikhate’n a dou ding uh. Himahleh ka kumpi hihna hiai khovel a kipan ahi kei hi” chi in, a dawng hi.

Pilat in a kiang ah, “E, kumpipa na hi maw?” a chi hi. Jesu’n, “Kumpipa ka hi n’on chi ve. Thutak theihsak ka piansan leh khovel a ka hong paisan ahi. Kuapeuh thutak a om peuhmah in ka thu a sang uh” a chi hi.
Pilat in a kiang ah, “Thutak bang ahia?” a chi hi. Huan huai thu a genkhit in, Judate kiang ah a va pawtnawn a, a kiang uah, “Bangmah a gitlouhna ka mu kei a chi hi.”
Himahleh Paikan Ankuangluina ah mi khat k’on pawtsakna ding dan na nei uh; huchi in Judate kumpipa hon pawtsak leng na ut uhia? a chi hi.
Amau a kikou nawn ua, “Hiai mi zaw hi kei henla, Barabba pen hi hen” a chi uhi. Barabba suamhat ahi.
Huchi in Pilat in Jesu a pi a, a zep hi.
Huan sepaihte’n linglukhu a phan ua, a khusak ua, puan sandup leng a silh sak uhi.
A kiang ah a hongpai ua, “Chibai, Judate Kumpipa”; a chi ua, a beng uhi.
Huan Pilat a pawt nawn a, a kiang uah, “En un, bangmah a gitlouhna ka mu kei chih na theihna ding un, na kiang uah k’on pikhia hi,” a chi hi.
Jesu linglukhu khu in leh puan sandup silh in a hongpawt hi. Pilat in a kiang uah, “En un, Mihing!” a chi hi.

Huan siampu liante leh heutute’n amah a muhtak un a kikou ua, “Kros ah kilhlum in, Kros ah kilhlum in” a chi uhi. Pilat in a kiang uah, “Noumau paipih unla, Kros ah kilhlum un; ken zaw bangmah a gitlouhna ka mu ngalkei hi” a chi hi.
Judate’n a kiang ah, “Ka dan uh khat a om, huai dan bangzel in Pathian Tapa a a kibawl ziak in a si ding ahi” a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Pilat in huai thu a zak in a launawn semsem hi;
Amah Inpi sung ah valut nawn in Jesu kiang ah, “Koi a hong kipan na hia?” a chi hi.
Himahleh Jesu’n a dawngkei hi. Pilat in a kiang ah, “Nang kei hon houpih lou ding maw? Honkhah thei leh Kros a hon kilhlum thei ka hi chih na theikei ahia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n, “Tunglam a kipan piak hi kei lechin, ka tung ah hihtheih na neikei ding. Huaiziak in na kiang a hon pekhepa’n khelhna lianzaw a pua hi” a chi hi.
Huai nungsiah Pilat in khah a tuma; himahleh Judate a kikou ua, “Hiai mi na khah leh Kaisar lawm na hi kei; kuapeuh kumpipa a kibawl Kaisar dou ahi” a chi uhi.
Pilat in huai thu a zak in Jesu a pikhia a, a min Suanglep, Hebru pau a Gabbatha a chih uh, huai mun ah thukhenna tutphah ah a tu hi.
Huan huai ni Paikan Ankuangluina kiginni ahi a, dak gukna ding ahi. Huan aman Judate kiang ah, “En un, na Kumpipa uh” a chi hi.

Huan amau a kikou ua, “Hih mangthang in, hih mangthang in, Kros ah kilhlum in” a chi uhi. Pilat in a kiang uah, Na kumpipa uh Kros ah ka kilhlum ding maw? a chi hi. siampu liante’n, “Kaisar loungal kumpipa dang ka neikei uh” a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Huchi in Pilat in Kros a kilhlup ding in amah a kiang uah a peta hi. Huchi in Jesu a pi ua, a paikhiak pih uhi.
Aman Kros kipuak in Luguh Mun, a chih uh, Hebru pau a Golgotha a chih mun tan a pai hi.
Huai ah Kros ah a lai ah Jesu midang nih a sik ah khat tuaktuak toh a kilhden uhi.
Pilat in lai a gelh a, Kros ah a tak a, “NAZARET JESU JUDATE KUMPIPA” chi in a gelh hi.
Huai laigelh Judate tampi in a sim ua; Jesu Kros a kilhlupna mun uh khopi kiang ahi a; Hebru pau, Grik pau leh Latin pau a gelh ahi.
Huchi in Judate siampu liante’n Pilat kiang ah, “Judate Kumpipa, chi in gelh ken; Judate Kumpipa ka hi” a chi, chi in, gelh zaw in, a chi uhi.
Pilat in “Ka gelhkhit, gelhkhit ahita ” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan sepaihte’n Kros a Jesu a kilhlup khit un a puansilh phel li a suah ua, phel khatchiat in a tang uhi; a puanak leng a la uh. Puanak khui louh puanak ahi a a ngawng a kipan a pum a gatthoh ahi;

Huaiziak in amau, “I botkek kei dia, kua tanding ahi hiam ai i san ding uh” a kichi uhi. Laisiangthou a, “Ka puansilhte a kihawm ua, ka puanak ding in ai a san uh” chih a tunna ding in hiai thil sepaihte’n a hih uhi.
Huan Jesu Kros kiang ah a nu leh a nu sanggam, Mari Kleopa zi leh Mari Magdalin ading uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a nu leh nungzui a itpa a kiang a ding a mu a, a nu kiang ah, “Numei, en in, na tapa” a chi hi.
Nungzuipa kiang ah, “En in, na nu” a chi hi. Huai dak apan huai nungzui in a in ah amah pita hi.
Huai nung in, Jesu’n thil bangkim hihzoh ahita chih a thei a, Laisiangthou a tunna ding in, “Ka dang a tak” a chi hi.
Huai ah bel khat uain thuk a dim a tung ua, huchi in spanji khat uain thuk a diahdim in, hussop chiang dawn a tak in, a muk ah a tulhtou uhi.
Huan Jesu’n uain thuk a dawn khitin, “Zoh ahita” a chi hi. A lu a kun a, a kha a khahta hi.
Huan kiginni a hih ziak in, luangte khawlni a Kros a a omlouhna ding in, huai khawlni ni thupi ahi ngal a. Judate’n Pilat kiang ah a khete uh hihtan a a luang uh paipih ding in a ngen uhi.
Sepaihte a hongpai ua, a kiang a Kros a kilhlup tuah masakpen leh mi khat a khe uh a hihtan uhi.
Himahleh Jesu kiang a hongtun un, a na sita chih a thei ua, a khete a hihtan tuankei uhi.
Himahleh sepaihte lak a mi khat in a nak ah tei in a dawt a, huchi in sisan leh tui a hong luangkhia hi.
A mupa’n a theisakta, a thu theihsak a dik ahi; a gendik chih a kithei a, nou leng na gintakna ding un.
Laisiangthou in, “A guh khat lel leng hihtan ahi kei ding” a chih tunna ding in huai thil a hong omta hi.
Huan Laisiangthou dang in, “A sutpa uh lam a en ding uh” a chi hi.

Huan huai thilte khit in, Joseph, Arimathai mi, Jesu nungzui, Judate kihtak ziak a sim om in Jesu luang paipih ding in Pilat kiang ah a ngen hi. Pilat in a phal a, huchi in a hongpai a, a luang a paipihta hi.
Huan Nikodem, a tung a zan a a kiang a hong in, murra leh aloe kihelsa buk sawmnga vel tawi in a hongsam hi.
Jesu luang a la ua, Judate kivui dan bang in gimlimte toh puanmalngat hoih in a tuam uhi.
Huan Kros a a kilh lupna mun uah huan khat a om a; huan ah kuamah sialna ngei nailouhna han thak khat a om hi.
Judate kiginni a hih ziak in, han a kiang chin uh a hih toh, huai ah Jesu a sialta uhi.
Nipikal a ni masapen a hongtun in, zingsangpi khuamial lai in, Mari Magdalini han ah a va hoh a, hansuang lakkhiaksa in a mu hi.
Huchi in a tai a, Simon Peter leh nungzui dang Jesu’n a itpa kiang ah a hongpai a, “Han a kipan Toupa a paimangpih uh, a koihna uh ka theikei uh” chi in a gen hi.
Huchi in, Peter a pawt a, nungzui dang toh han lam a zuan uhi.
A tai tuak ua; nungzui dang in Peter a makhelh a, han a tung masa hi.
Huan kunsuk in a en a, puanmalngat hoih a mu a; himahleh asung ah a lut kei hi.
Simon Peter amah nung in a hong tungsam a, hansung ah a lutsuak a; puanmalngat hoih omte a mu hi.
Jesu lukhung ah kinulna puan pen, puanmalngat hoih lak a omlou a, a tuam a khepsa a om a mu hi.
Huchi in nungzui dang, han tungmasa leng a lutsam a, a mu a, a gingta hi.
Misi lak a kipan a thounawn ding ahi chih Laisiangthou gen a theigige nawn kei uhi.
Huchi in nungzuite amau inn ah a pai nawnta uhi.
Himahleh Mari han pua ah kapkawm in ading a; kapkawm in a kun a, hansung a en hi.
Huan angel nih puanngou silh, Jesu luang sialna mun ah khat a lu lam ah khat a khe lam ah tu a mu hi.
Huan amau “Numei, bang a chia kap na hia?” a chi uhi. Aman “Ka Toupa a paimangpih ua, a koihna uh ka theihlouh ziak in” chi in a dawng hi.
Huan huchi a a gentakin a nunglam a nga a, Jesu ding a mu a, himahleh Jesu ahi chih a theikei hi.

Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Numei, bangdia kap na hia? Kua ahia na zon?” a chi hi. Aman huanpu hiam a sa a, a kiang ah, “Pu, amah hiai a kipan na paimang pih ahihleh na koihna honhilh tanla, huchi in ka la ding” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, ‘Mari’ a chi hi. Amah a kihei a, a kiang ah Hebru pau in, ‘Rabboni’ a chi a, huai “Sinsakpa” chihna ahi.

Huan Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Hon lawng ken, tu tan in leng Pa kiang ah ka kahtou naikei hi. Himahleh ka unaute kiang ah vahoh inla, a kiang uah, Ka pa, na Pa uh, ka Pathian, na Pathian uh kiang ah ka kahtou dek” a chi hi, chi in, a chi hi.
Mari Magdalini a va hoh a, nungzuite kiang ah, “Toupa ka muta,” a chi a, a kiang ah hiai thute a gen chih a hilhta hi.

Huan huai ni, Nipikal a ni masapen, nitaklam a hong hih in, Judate kihtak ziak a nungzuite omna inn kongkhakte a khaknung un, Jesu hongpai a, a lak uah a hong ding a, a kiang uah, “Na tung uah khamuanna om hen” a chi hi.
Huai a genkhit in a khut leh a nak a kiang uah a lak a. Toupa a muhtak un nungzuite a kipak uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Na tung uah khamuanna om hen, Pa’n kei honsawl bangmah in nou k’on sawl hi” a chi nawn hi.
Huai thu a genkhit in amau a hatkhum a, a kiang uah, “Kha Siangthou tang un.
Kua khelhna leng na ngaihdam uh ngaihdam ahi ding; kua khelhna leng na ngaihdam louh uh, ngaihdam louh ahi ding” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu a honglai in sawmlehnihte lak a pang sam Thomas Didum a chih uh, a kiang uah a omkei hi.

Huchi in nungzui dangte’n a kiang ah, “Toupa ka muta uh” a chi uhi. Himahleh aman a kiang uah, “A khut sikkhetna pawn ka muh a, ka khutzung a ka khoih a, a nak a ka khut ka golhlut hial kei leh, ka gingta kei ding” a chi hi.

Huan ni giat nung in, a nungzuite inn sung ah a om nawn uhi, Thomas leng a kiang uah a omsam hi. Huan kongkhakte khak hinapi in Jesu hongpai a a lak uah a hong dingta a, a kiang uah, “Na tung uah khamuanna om hen,” a chi hi.
Huan Thomas kiang ah, “Na khutzung in sawk in, ka khutte en in; na khut in khoih inla, ka nak ah sawk in; ginglou kenla, gingta in” a chi hi.
Thomas in, “Ka Toupa leh ka Pathian na hi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Nang zaw n’on muh ziak in na gingta ahi; mulou a gingta peuhmahte a hampha uhi” a chi hi.
Huan Jesu’n nungzuite ma ah chiamtehna dang tamtak a hih a, huaite hiai laibu ah gelhvek ahi kei hi.
Himahleh hiaite Jesu Khrist, Pathian Tapa ahi chih na gintakna ding uleh, na gintak ua a min a hinna na neihna ding ua gelh ahi.
Huai thilte nung in, Tiberias dil ah Jesu a nungzuite kiang ah a kilak nawn a; hichibang in amah mah a kilak hi.
Simon Peter, Thomas Didum a chih uh, Galili gam a Kana khua a Nathanael, Zebedai tapa nihte, a nungzui dang nihte toh a omkhawm uhi.

Simon Peter in a kiang uah, “Ngasa beng ding in ka kuan dek” a chi a, amau a kiang ah, “Kou leng na kiang ah ka hong sam ding uh” a chi uhi. A pawtkhia ua, long ah a tuang ua, huai zan in bangmah a man kei uhi.
Phalvak in Jesu piautak ah ading a; himahleh a nungzuite’n Jesu ahi chih a theikei uhi.
Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Naute aw, nekding banghiam na nei uhia?” a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, “Neilou” chi in, a dawng uhi.
Huan a kiang uah, “Long sik taklam ah len pai le uchin na man ding uh” a chi hi. A pai ua, ngasa tam ziak in a kaikhe zoukei uhi.
Huchi in nungzui Jesu itpa’n Peter kiang ah, “Toupa eive” a chi hi. Huchi in, Toupa ahi chih Simon Peter in a theih in, a puanak tungsilh a teng a, vuaktang a om ahi a, dil ah a tawmkheta hi.
Himahleh nungzuite’n long neuchik in, len ngasa a dim toh kaikawm in a honzuan ua, gam a kipan in a gamla ngalkei ua, tong za nih hiam phet ahi.
Huan gam a a hongsuah tak un, meihol a mei tohsa a tung a ngasa leh tanghou emsa a mu uhi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Tuin na ngasa mat uh a khen hon latou un” a chi hi.
Huchi in Simon Peter a vatuang a, len ngasa lianpi pi a dim tuigei ah hon kaikhia a, za leh sawmnga leh thum a pha hi: huchi lawmlawm in tam mahleh len a kek kei hi.
Huan Jesu’n a kiang uah, “Zingan na ne un” a chi hi. Nungzuite lak ah kuamah in a kiang ah, “Kua na hia?” chi in a dong ngamkei uhi, Toupa ahi chih a thei uhi.
Huan Jesu a hongpai a, tanghou a la a, a kiang uah a pia a, ngasate leng huchi bangmah in a pe sam hi.
Huai tuh Jesu misi lak a kipan a thohnawn nung a, a nungzuite kiang a a kilak thumveina ahi.
Huan zingan a nekkhit un, Simon Peter kiang ah Jesu’n, “Simon, Johan tapa, nang hiaite sang in kei n’on itzaw hia?” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “He, Toupa, k’on it chih na thei hi” a chi hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Ka belamnoute vak in” a chi hi.
Huan a nihveina ding in a kiang ah, “Simon, Johan tapa, nang kei n’on it hia?” a chi nawn hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “He, Toupa, k’on it chih na thei hi” a chi nawn hi.
Aman a kiang ah, “Ka belamte ching in,” a chi hi.

Huan a thumveina din a kiang ah, “Simon, Johan tapa, nang kei n’on it hia?” a chi hi. Huan thumveina a nang kei n’on it hia? A kiang a a chih ziak in Peter a lungkham a, a kiang ah, “Toupa, bangkim na thei a, k’on it chih na thei hi,” a chi hi. Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Ka belamte vak in.”

“Chihtaktak in, chihtaktak in, k’on hilh ahi, na naupan lai in na tai ah na kigak a, na utna peuh ah na hoh a; himahleh na upat hun chiang in na khut na zak ding a, midang in a hon gaksak ding uh, na utlouhna lam ah a honkai ding uh, a chi hi.
Huai thu bangchidan a si in ahia Pathian a pahtawi ding chih theihsakna ding a a gen ahi. Huai a genkhit in, a kiang ah, Honzui in” a chi hi.
Huaikhit in Peter a kihei a, Jesu nungzui itpa, nitak anneklai a a awm ngai a hong awnphei a, “A mansakpa ding kua pen ahia?” chi pa’n, honzui a mu hi.
Peter in amah a muhtak in, Jesu kiang ah, “Toupa, hiai min bang a hih dia?” a chi hi.
Jesu’n a kiang ah, “Ka hongpai nawn tan a om nilouh din deih leng, huai nang bang lunghimawh zenzen? Nang honzui in” a chi hi.

Huchi in huai nungzuipa silou ding in a thu unaute lak ah a thangta a; himahleh Jesu’n a sikei ding chih a kiang ah a gen kei a, “K’ong pai nawn tan a om nilouh din deih leng huai nang bang lunghimawh zenzen?” chi lel ahizaw hi.
Huai nungzuipa “Hiai thu theisakpa leh gelhpa ahi; huan a thu theihsak a dik chih i thei uhi.”
Huan hiaite lou Jesu thilhih a dang tampi a omlai; huaite gelhvek ding hileh, laibu gelh ding tengteng khovel ah leng tazou in ka gingta kei hi. Amen.
Theophilus aw, tuma a ka laigelh ah, Jesu thilhih leh a thuhilh pattung tengteng thu ka gelh hi.
Kha Siangthou tawn a a sawltak telte kiang a thupiak tampi a piakkhit a van a pitouh a a omni tan a thute ahi.
Huai sawltakte kiang ah gimna a thuaknung in theihna zuaulou tampi in hing in a kimusak a, ni sawmli hial a kiang uah a kilak a, Pathian gam thu a gen hi.
Huan a omkhawm uh a kithuahpih a, “Jerusalem khua paisan kei un, Pa thilchiam ka gen na zak uh ngak un, a chi chiltel hi.
Johan in tui in a baptist zel a, himahleh, ni sawtlou nung in Kha Siangthou a baptist in na om ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan amau a hong kikhop un a kiang ah, “Toupa, tuin hia Israelte kiang a lalgam na piaknawn ding?” chi in a dong uhi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Pa in a hun leh a ni amah thuthu a om dia a seh, nou theih ding ahi kei hi.
Himahleh, Kha Siangthou na tung ua a hongtun chiang in thilhihtheihna na nei ding uh; huchi in, Jerusalem ah, Judia leh Samaria gam teng leh kawlmong pha in ka theihpihte na hi ding uh” a chi hi.
Huai thu a genkhit in a muh laipi un, van a pitouh in a omta a, meipi in a muh phaklouh uah a pitouta hi.
Huan a paitouh lai a vanlam a et nilouh lai un, ngai in, mi nih, puanngou silh in, a kiang uah a hongding uhi.
Huai mite’n, “Galili gam a mite aw, bangdia vanlam en a ding? Hiai Jesu na kiang ua kipan a van a pitouha om, van a a paitou na muh bang un amahmah a hong kiknawn ding” a chi uhi.
Huan Olive tang a chih ua kipat Jerusalem khua ah a kiknawnta uhi. Huai tang Jerusalem khaw kiang ahi a, khawlni a hohna hunlel ahi.

Huan a lut un, a omna dantan tungnung uah a paitou ua, Peter leh Johan, Jakob leh Andru, Philip leh Thomas, Bartholomai leh Matthai, Alphai tapa Jakob, Simon Zelot Pawl a leh Jakob tapa Judas toh ahi uh.
Huai tengteng numei kuate hiam leh Jesu nu Mari toh, Jesu unaute toh, lungsim munkhat a, phatuamngaitak a thum in a om nilouh uhi.
Huan huai ni’n unaute lak ah Peter ading a, avek un za leh sawmnih ahi uhi.
“Unaute aw, Kha Siangthou in, David kam a, Jesu mante makai Judas thu a genkholh Laisiangthou thu a hongtung ding him ahi.”
Amah zaw i lak ua sim tel ahi a, hiai nasepna ah tan leng a neisam hi.
Himahleh huai min a khelhna man in mun khat a lei a, a khup in a kia a, a lai in a puakkham a, a gil tengteng a lawtvek hi.
Huai thu Jerusalem khua a omte tengteng in a naza uhi; huchi in huai mun amau pau in, Akeldama, a chi ua, huai Sisan Mun, chihna ahi.
“Sam Laibu ah hiai thu gelh ahi.
‘A omna mun hihgam in om hen,
asung ah kuamah omkei hen,’
‘huan a heutu hihna
midang in tang hen’ chih ahi.
Huchi in Toupa Jesu i lak ua lutzel pawt zel a a omsung teng a,
Johan baptisma nungsiah, i lak ua kipan van a pitouh a a om ni tan hiai hon kithuahpihpihte lak a mi khat a thohnawnna theihpih ding in a om ding ahi” a chi hi.
Huan mi nih a sepkhia ua, khat Joseph Barnaba ahi a, a min khem Justa leh midang khat Mathia ahi.
Huan a thum ua, “Toupa, Nang, mihing tengteng lungtang thei, hiai nihte a kua zaw ahia na tel honhilh in,
Judas in amah omna a pai ding in hiai nasepna leh sawltakna a kiaksan sik ading in” a chi uhi.
Huan ai a sansak ua, a aisan uh Mathia tung ah a tu a; huchi in amah sawltak sawmlehkhatte lak a sim tel ahita hi.
Pentikost ni a hongtun in, avek un mun khat ah a omkhawm uhi.
Thakhat in van a kipan ging huihpi nung bang in a hongom guih a, huchi in huai in a tutna inn uh a hihdim vekta hi,
leite amah leh amah mei bang a kihawm in, a lutung uah a hong tuang chiat hi.
Huchi in avek un Kha Siangthou in a luahdimta a, Kha in hihtheihna a piak a a pausak bangzel in pau dang in a pauta uhi.
Huan van nuai namchih lak a kipan Pathian limsak Juda kulmutte Jerusalem khua ah a om uhi.
Huan ging husa a zaktak un mipi a hong kikhawm ua, michih in a pau uh amau pau chiat a a zak ziak un a lungsim uh a hong buai hi.
Huan avek un a mangbang ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uhi, En dih uh, hiai a pau tengteng Galili gam a mi ahi kei ua hia?
Bangchi’n ahia i vek ua pianpih pau chiat a i zak uh?
Eite Parthai nam, Medai nam, Elamitai nam; khenkhat Mesopotamia gam a om, Judia gam a om, Kapadosia gam a om, Pento gam a om, Asia gam a om,
Phrigia gam a om, Pamphilia gam a om, Aigupta gam a om, Kurini khaw kiang a Libia gam a om i hi ua; khenkhat Rome apan mikhualte, Judate leh a phungkaite utoh i hi ngal ua;
Khenkhat Krit tuikulh leh Arab gam a i hi ngal ua; himahleh, Pathian thilhih thupite a gen uh eimau pau chiat in i za ngal ua! a chi uhi.
Huan avek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, a khiakna dan theilou in, “Hiai bangchidan ahia?” a kichi uhi.
Khenkhat in “Uain thak a kham ua hi” chi in a nuihsan uhi.
Himahleh Peter in sawmlehkhatte toh ding khawm in, aw ngaihtak in a kiang uah a gen a, nou Judia gam a mite aw, nou Jerusalem khua a om tengteng aw, hiai thei unla, ka thu leng ngaikhia un,
Hiaite na gin bang un a khamkei uh, dak thumna hun ahi.
Hiaite zawlnei Joel in a gen ahizaw:
‘Pathian in, ni nanungte ah
hichi ahi ding,
mi tengteng tung ah ka kha ka sungbaw ding a;
na tapa leh na tanute’n ka thu a hilh ding uh;
na tangvalte un kilaknate a mu ding ua, na putekte un mang a nei ding uh.
Ahi, huai ni’n ka sikhapate,
ka sikhanute tung ah leng ka Kha ka sungbaw ding a,
ka thu a gen ding uhi.
Huan tunglam van ah thillamdang nuailam lei ah chiamtehna ka musak ding a;
sisan, mei, meikhu hu toh:
Ni mial a suak ding a,
kha sisan a suak ding,
Toupa ni thupitak leh lauhuaitak a hongtun ma in.
Huan hichi ahi dia,
Toupa min lou peuhmah hotdam in a om ding hi.’
“Nou Israel mite aw, hiai thu za un: Nazaret Jesu, Pathian in amah zang in na lak uah thil thupite, thillamdangte, chiamtehnate a hih in a hon theichiansak hi; nou ngei in tuate na theichian uhi.
Huai mi Pathian vaihawm tel leh theihkholh bang in na mansak ua, nou migiloute khut in Kros ah kilhden in na hihlumta uhi.
Amah, Pathian in sihna thuaknatna phelsak in, a kaithouta a; amah sihna letden vual a hihlouh ziak in.
Huan David in a thu a gen a,
‘Ka ma ah chiklaipeuh in
Toupa ka mu gige hi.
Ka mangbat louhna ding in ka taklam ah a om hi;
Huaiziak in ka lungtang a nuam a, ka lei leng a kipak a,
ka sa lamentak in a om behlap lai hi.
Misi khua ah ka kha na nuse kei ding a,
muatna na Mi Siangthou na musak sam kei ding hi.
Nangman hinna lampite n’on theisak a;
nangman na mel in kipak in n’on hihdim ding,’ chi in.
“Unaute aw, chikhahpa David thu laulou in na kiang uah ka gen thei hi; amah zaw a si a, vui leng a vuikhin ua, a han leng tutan in i kiang ah a omlai hi.
Amah tuh zawlnei ahi a, Pathian in a khal a mi kuahiam sadan a a chite lak a mi khat Khrist mangtutphah a tu ding in a kaithou ding chih kichiam in a gen chih a thei hi.
Huchi in huai tuh a theihkholh him ziak in Khrist thohnawn ding thu a gen hi,
‘Misi khua a nutsiat in a omkei a,
a luang leng a muat sam kei hi,’ chi in.
Pathian in Jesu a kaithouta chih theihpihte i vek un i hi uhi.
Pathian khut taklam ah pahtawi in a om a, Kha Siangthou chiam Pa kiang a kipan in a mu a, na muh uh leh na zakte uh a hon sunbuak ahi uhi.
David zaw van ah a kahtou kei, amah ngei in,
‘Jehovah in ka Toupa kiang ah,
“Na melmate na khepek ngakna dia ka bawl masiah,
Ka taklam ah tu kinken in” a chi a na chi hi.
Huchi in Jesu, na kilhden uh, Pathian in Toupa leh Khrist hi khawm in a bawlta chih Israel inkuan chih in kichiantak in thei uhen” a chi hi.
Huan huaithu a zak un a lungtang ua sutbang a honghi ua, Peter leh sawltakdangte kiang ah, “Unaute aw, bangchi’n ka hihta ding ua?” a chi ua.
Peter in a kiang uah, “Na khelhnate uh ngaihdamna ding in lungsim khek unla, Jesu Khrist min in baptisma tangchiat un; huchi in Kha Siangthou thawnpiak na tang ding uhi.
A chiam nou ading, na tate uh ading, gamlapi a mi tengteng ading leh Toupa i Pathian in a kiang a a sap peuhmahte ading ahi” a chi hi.
Huan thudang tampi in a hilhchian a; tulai khang thulimloute lak ah kihumbit un, chi in a hanthawn hi.
Huan a thu zuipeuh in baptisma a tang ua, huai ni’n mi sang thum vel behlap in a om uhi.
Huan sawltakte thusinsakte sin in, kithuah in, tanghou balkham in, thum in, phatuamngaitak in a omkhawm uhi.
Huan michih in a lauta ua: sawltakte’n thillamdang leh chiamtehna tampi a hih uhi.
A gingta peuhmah in bangkim a kikop khawm uhi.
A goute uh, a thilneihte uh a zuak ua, a deihdong chinglel chiat in avek ua kiang ah a hawmzel uhi.
Huan niteng in, lungsim munkhat in, Pathian biakin ah phatuamngaitak in a om zelzel ua, a innte uah leng tanghou balkham in, nuam leh lungkim in, a an uh a ne zel uhi.
Pathian a phat ua, mi tengteng deihsak in a om uhi. Huan a hotdam lel peuhmah Toupa’n niteng in a kiang uah a behlap sakzel hi.
Huan Peter leh Johan, dak kua na ah thum hun lai in Pathian biakin a lut ding in a hohtou uhi.
Piching kuahiam a piantung apat khebai a hon zawng ua, biakin a lutte kiang a khutdoh ding in, biakin kongkhak, Kilawm, bul ah niteng in a lumsak uhi.
Peter leh Johan Pathian biakin a lutding mu in khut a doh hi.
Peter in amah a en gegu a, Johan in leng; huan Peter in, “Hon en in” a chi hi.
Aman amau apan banghiam muh a lamen a, a enpah hi.
Himahleh Peter in, “Dangka leh dangkaeng bangmah ka neikei; himahleh ka neihsun ka honpe ding, ‘Nazaret Jesu Khrist min in khe in paita in’ ” a chi hi.
Huan a khut taklam a len a, a kaithouta a; huchi in thakhat in a khete leh a siakmit guhte a hong hatpah hi.
Amah a tawmtou a, ading a, khe in a paipah hi. Khe a paipai, diangdiang leh, Pathian phat kawm in biakin ah a lut hi.
Huan khe a pai leh Pathian a phat mi tengteng in a muh un;
Biakin Kongkhak Kilawm bul a khutdoh a tupa ahi chih a thei ua; a tung a thiltung lamdang a sa mahmah ua, a buaipih uhi.
Huan aman Peter leh Johan a letlai in, mi tengteng in lamdang a sa mahmah ua, inlim Solomon a a chih uah a kiang uah a hong taikhawm uhi.
Peter in huai a muh in, mite a houpih a, “Nou Israel mite aw, hiaite bangdia lamdang sa? Koumau thilhihtheihna leh Pathian ka limsak ziak ua amah ka paisak bang zen ua bang a chia hon en gige?
Abraham, Isak, leh Jakob Pathian, i pipute Pathian in, a sikha Jesu a pahtawita ahi; amah na mansak ua, Pilat in khah a tup in leng a ma ah na ut kei uhi.
Mi Siangthou leh Dik na deihkei ua, tualthatpa na kiang ua piak na ngen zawta uhi.
Hinna Siampa tuh na that ua; himahleh Pathian in amah misi lak apat a kaithou nawn a; huai theihpihte ka hi uhi.
Amah min gintak ziak in a min in hiai mi na muh uh leh na theih un a hihhatta hi; Amah ziak a ginna a hongom in na vekua mitmuh in a hihdam vilvelta hi.
“Himahleh unaute aw, na heutute un a theihlouh ziak ua a hih bang un, na theihlouh ziak un hiaite na hih uh ahi chih ka thei uhi.
Himahleh Pathian in zawlnei tengteng kam in, Khrist in gim a thuak ding thu a theikholsak hi, huchibang in a tungsak zawta hi.
Huaiziak in na khelhna te uh thaimangna ding in kisik unla, kihei nawn un, huchi in Toupa apat halh hun hongtung ding hi.
Khrist Jesu nou adia a seh mah leng, a honsawl ding hi;
Himahleh Pathian in thil bangkim a bawlhoih hun a hongtun masiah amah van a a om ding him ahi; huai bawlhoih ding thu Pathian in leilung piantung a kipan a zawlnei siangthoute kam a a gen khit ahi.
Mosi ngei in Toupa Pathian in keimah a honbawl bang in na unaute lak ah zawlnei khat a hon bawlsak ding; aman thu tengteng na kiang ua a gen peuh na ngaihkhiak sak ding uhi.
Huan mi kuapeuh huai zawlnei thu ngaihkhiak saklou tuh, milak a kipan a hih mangthang ahi ding, a chi hi.
Ahi, Samuel om a kipan zawlnei tengteng, a nung ua mite toh, thugen peuhte’n, tulai tanchin a genkhol uhi.
Noute zawlneite leh thukhun tate neive ua; Pathian in Abraham kiang ah, Na suante ziak in khovel a namchih a vualzawl ding uh, chi in, na pipute uh kiang ah a chiam hi.
Pathian in a Tapa Jesu, misi lak a kipan kaithou in, na khelhnate uh kiheisanna ding leh kisikmite vualzawl ding in noumau kiang ah a honsawl masapen hi” a chi hi.
Huan Peter leh Johan in mite kiang a thu a genlai un, siampute, biakin heutute leh Saddukaite a kiang uh a hongtung guih ua;
mite a sinsak uh leh Jesu ziak a misi lak a kipan thohnawnna thu a hilh ziak un a lungkimkei uhi.
Huan a man ua nitaklam a hih ziak in a zingsang pha in suangkulh ah a khumta uhi.
Himahleh thungaikhete a khen tampite’n a gingta ua; a tamlam uh piching ngen leng sang nga vel a ching uhi.
A zing in a heutute uh, upate, laigelhmite,
Siampu lianpen Ana leh Kaiapha, Johan, Alexander, siampu lianpen tanau tengtengte leng Jerusalem khua ah a omkhawm uhi.
Peter leh Johan a lai ah a dingsak ua, “Bang thilhihtheihna in ahia, kua min in ahia hiai na hih uh?” chi in a dong uhi.
Huchi in Peter Kha Siangthou in a dim a, a kiang uah, “Nou mipite vaihawmte leh Israel upate aw,
hiai mi damlou tung a na hoih ka sep thu uah, hiai mi bangziak in ahia a hong damtak chi in tuin salh leh dot a om ka hi umaw;

Nou tengteng leh Israel mi teng in leng thei hen, Kros a Nazaret Jesu Khrist na kilhden uh, Pathian in misi lak a kipan in a kaithou nawn a, amah min ngei in hiai mi hiai ah na ma uah dam in a dingta ahi.
‘Nou inlammite aw,
na suangpaih uh, a ning a,
suang phatuampen a hong hita,
huai amah ahi a chi uhi.’
Midang kuamah kiang ah hotdamna a omkei, van nuai a mihing sak lak ah, hon hondam ding min dang a omkei” a chi hi.
Peter leh Johan hansan dan a muh un, laisiamlou mi leh namtom maimai ahi uh chih a theih un lamdang a sa mahmah uhi; huchi in Jesu kiang ah a omkhinta uh chih a thei uhi.
Huan mi a hihdam uh a kiang ua ding a muh un, bangmah a gense thei tuankei uhi.
Huchi in a vaihawmna ua pat a a paituamsak nung un, a kihou ua,
“Hiai mite bangchi’n i hihdia? Thillamdang minthang a hih uh Jerusalem khua a om tengteng in teltak in a theita uh; en leng i sel thei tuankei hi.
Himahleh midang kiang a a than semsem louhna ding un tunung siah kuamah kiang ah hiai min a thu a genlouhna ding un i vau ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in amau a sam ua, Jesu min a thugen hetlou ding leh hilh hetlou ding in a chi chiltel uhi.
Himahleh Peter leh Johan in a kiang uah, “Pathian mitmuh in Pathian thuman sang in noumau thuman a dikzaw hia ngaihtuah un.
Kou zaw ka thilmuh uh leh ka zakte uh genlou in ka om theikei uh” a chi uhi.
Huan amau tuh a vau semsem ua, a khahta uh, mipi ziak in gawtna lemtang a mu kei uhi; a thilhih ziak un mi tengteng in Pathian a pahtawi uhi.
Thillamdang a a hihdam uh kum sawmli sang a tamzaw ahi.
Huan Peter leh Johan a pawt un amau lawmte kiang ah a vahoh ua, siampu liante leh upate’n a kiang ua a gen peuh uh a hilh vek uhi.
Huchi in a ngaikhete’n a kituak in aw ngaihtak in Pathian kiang ah “Toupa, nang tuh van leh lei, tuipi leh asung a omte tengteng Bawlpa na hi;
Nang Kha Siangthou in, ka pu uh na sikha David kam in, hiai thu na gen ahi:
‘Jentelte bangchi’n eita a heh uh?
Namchih in bangchi’n ahia thil phatuamlou a ngaihtuah uh?
Khovel kumpipate ading ua,
heutute leng a kikhawm ua,
Toupa leh a Khrist kalh in,’ chi in.
Hiai khua ah na sikha siangthou, na thaunilh Jesu tung ah, Herod leh Pontia Pilat toh, Jentelte leh Israel mite toh a kikhawmta uhi.
Na khut leh na lungsim a hongtung ding a na sehkholh peuh hih ding in.
Huchi in tun ah, Toupa, a honvau dan uh ngai in; na sikhate kiang ah na thu hangsantak a gen theihna pia in.
Damsak ding a na khut na zak a, na sikha Jesu min a chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte hih ahihlai in” a chi uhi.
Huan a thum khit un a omkhawmna uh a hongling a, avek un Kha Siangthou in a dim ua, hangsantak in Pathian thu a hilhta uhi.
Huan a gingta mipite lungsim munkhat leh ngaihtuah munkhat in a om ua: a lak ua khat in leng a thil thilneihte, kei a tuam ahi, a chi kei ua, thil tengteng a kikop uhi.
Sawltakte’n thilhihtheihna thupitak in Toupa Jesu thohnawn thu a hilhhilh ua; avek ua tung ah hehpihna thupitak a om hi.
Huan a lak uah leng tasam kuamah a omkei uh; gam leh inn nei peuh in a zuak ua, a thilkhotte uh a man a hontawi uhi.
Huan sawltakte khe bul ah a koih zel ua, amau deihdong ching hun chiat in a hawmchiat zel uhi.
Huan Levi chi a mi khat, Kupra tuikulh a kipan, Joses, sawltakte’n Barnaba a chih uh, huai min omdan, “Khamuanna Tapa” chihna ahi.
Hiai mi in a gam neih a zuak a, a man a hontawi a, sawltakte khebul ah a koih hi.
Himahleh mi khat a min Ananias, a zi Sapphira toh a om ua; Ananias in a neih uh a zuak hi.
Huan a zi theih in a man a khen a im a, a khen tawi in sawltakte khebul ah a koih hi.
Himahleh Peter in, “Kha Siangthou khem ding leh gam man a khen im ding in bangdia Setan in na lungtang hihkhauh ahia?
A omlai teng nang a ahi gige ka hia? Na zuak nung in leng na thuthu in a om ka hia? Bang a chia hiai thute na lungtang a ngaihtuah? Mihing khem na hi kei a, Pathian khem na hi zaw” a chi hi.
Ananias in huai thu a zaktak in a puk a, a sita hi; a zakha peuh in a lau mahmah uhi.
Tangvalte a thou ua, tuam in a zawngkhia ua, a vuita uhi.
Dakkal thum ding hiam nung in, thil omdan theilou in a zi a honglut hi.
Peter in a kiang ah, “Honhilh in, gam hiai zahphet in maw na zuak uh?” a chi hi. Aman “He, hiai zah phet in ahi” a chi hi.
Huan Peter in a kiang ah, “Bang a chia Toupa Kha ze-et ding a kithutuak na hi ua? Ngai in, kongkhak bul ah na pasal vuite khepek a hong omta, nang leng a hon zawngkhe ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in thakhat in a khebul ah a pukpah a, a si hi; tangvalte a honglut ua, amah si in a hong mu ua, a zawngkhia ua, a pasal kiang ah a vuita uhi.
Huan saptuamte leh huai thu za peuhte’n a lau mahmah uhi.
Huan milak ah Pathian in sawltakte khut in chiamtehna leh thillamdang tampi a hihzel hi. Huan amaute avek un lungsim munkhat in Solomon inlim ah a kikhawm zel uhi.
Midang bel kuamah a lak uah a pang ngamta kei uhi; himahleh min amaute a phat uhi.
Huan Toupa lam ah numei leh pasal gingthak tampi behlap semsem in a om uhi.
Huchi in mi damloute kongzing ah a lumsak ua, Peter paikawm a a lim bek in a lak ua khat bek a liah theihna ding in, a chi uhi.
Jerusalem khokim a kipan mipite leng huai damloute dawinin hihgimte honpi in a hong khawm ua; huaite leng a hong dam chiat uhi.
Huan siampu lianpen a kisa a, a kiang a omte tengteng toh, a lawmte tuh Saddukai pawl ahi uhi; amau hazatna in a dim uhi.
Sawltakte a man ua, vantang khumna ah a khumta uhi.
Zankim in Toupa angel khat in kongkhakte hawng in, a pikhia hi.
Pathian biakin ah vading unla, mite kiang ah hiai hinna thu vagen un, a chi hi.

Huan huai thu a zak un khovak hunlai in, Pathian biakin ah a valut ua, thu a vagen uhi. Himahleh, siampu Lian leh a lawmte a hong ua, vaihawmte leh Israel suante upate tengteng a samkhawm ua, sawltakte honpi ding in suangkulh ah mi a sawl uhi.
Himahleh heutute suangkul ah a vahoh ua, amau a mu kei uhi; huchi in a kiknawn uhi.
“Suangkulh bittak a kikhak in, a vengte leng kongkhak bul ading a mu uhi, himahleh ka hong ua, asung ah kuamah ka mu kei ua” chi in a gen uhi.
Huan Pathian biakin Upa leh siampu liante’n, huai thute a zak un, hiai bangchiphet in a thang diam aw? chi in, a thu ah a mangbang petpet uhi.
Huan mi khat a hong a a kiang uah, “Ngai un, suang kulh a na mi khumte un Pathian biakin ading in thu a gen uh” chi in a hong gen hi.
Huchi in Tempul vengte heutupa leh sepaihte a vapai ua, vantang a kihtak ziak un hiamgamna omlou in sawltakte a honpi ua, huchi hi kei leh suang a den ahi kha ding uhi.
Huan a pitung un, vaihawmmite ma ah a dingsak uhi. siampu lianpen in a kiang uah,
“Huai min in thu hilhlouh ding k’on chita ua; thei un na thuhilh un Jerusalem khua a hihdim vekta hi, hiai mipa sisan hon khuksak tum neive ua” chi in a sal hi.
Himahleh Peter leh sawltakte’n, “Mihing thu sang in Pathian thuman a kiphamoh zaw hi a chi uhi.
Nou sing ah Jesu khaikang in na that ua, i pipute Pathian in a kaithou nawnta hi.
Amah mah Pathian in Kumpipa leh Hondampa a om ding in a taklam ah a hihlianta hi. Israelte khelhna apan kiheisak ding leh ngaidam ding in.
Huai thute kou a theihpihte ka hi ua; Kha Siangthou, Pathian in a thuzui peuhte kiang a a piaktak, a theipa ahi nawnlai” chi in a dawng uhi.
Amau huai thu a zak un a sin uh a thak mahmah a, hihlup a tumta uhi.
Himahleh vaihawmte lak ah, a min Gamaliel, Pharisai, Dansiammi, mi tengteng lak a minthangpi mi khat a dingtou a, huai mite inn pawlam a omsak takdih ding thu a pia hi.
Huan vaihawmte kiang ah, “Nou Israel mite aw, hiai mite tung a na thilhih tup uah pilvang un.
Tuma lam in Theuda kichi, mi khat a hongom a, huai mipa kiang ah mi tampi, za li phial, a awn uhi, amah tuh hihlup in a omta a; a thuzui peuhmah avek un a dalhzakta ua bangmah ahita kei uhi.
Huai mi om nung in kisimpi lai in, Galili gam ah mi khat Judas kichi a hongom nawn hi; a lam ah mi khenkhat a hip nawn hi; himahleh amah leng a sita a, a thuzui peuhmah avek un a dalhzakta uhi.
Huaiziak in tuin k’on hilh ahi, hiai mite khoih kei unla, amau omom in omsak un; hiai a thiltup uh leh a thilhih uh mihing a kipan ahihleh a mang ding hi.
Himahleh Pathian a kipan ahihleh amau na hihmang theikei ding uh; huchilou in zaw Pathian dou na hi zaw kha ding uh” a chi hi.
Huan a gen lem a sata ua; huchi in, sawltakte tuh a sam ua, a vua ua; a vuakkhit un, Jesu min a thu genlou ding chi bikbek in a khahta uhi.
Huchi in vaihawmte lak a kipan a pawtkhia ua, Khrist min ziak a daina thuaktak a seh a hih ziak un a kipak mahmah uhi.
Huan niteng in Pathian biakin leh amaute inn ah, Jesu Khrist ahi, chi in, thuhilh leh sinsak a tawp kei uhi.
Huailai a, nungzuite a punpun lai un, a niteng thilhawm uah Grik pauzang Juda meithaite limsaklou chi in Hebru pauzang Judate tung ah Grik Judate a phun uhi.
Huan sawmlehnihte’n nungzui mipite a samkhawm ua, “Pathian thugen tawpsan a dohkan a nektak ka bawl uh a hoih kei hi.”
Huaiziak in unaute aw, na lak uah Kha leh pilna a dim mi minhoih ngen sagih tel un, amau hiai thilgel ding in ka bawl ding uh;
kou tuh thum leh thu nasem in ka om gige ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huai thu in mi tengteng a kipaksak a; huchi in ginna leh Kha Siangthou a dim ngen, Stephen, Philip, Prokora leh Nikanor, Timon, Parmena leh Judate phungkai Antiok khua a mi Nikola a tel uhi;
Tua mite sawltakte ma ah a dingsak ua: amau a thum ua, a tung uah a khut uh a nga uhi.
Huchi in Pathian thu a hong dalh a; Jerusalem khua ah nungzuite a pungta mahmah uhi; siampute lak ah leng mi tampi ginna lam a hong ngata uhi.
Huan Stephen hehpihna leh thilhihtheihna in a dim a, mi lak ah thillamdang leh chiamtehna thupite a hihzom zel hi.
Himahleh Kurini, Aleksandria leh Silisia gam leh Asia gam a kipan Juda pawlkhat Salsuakte kikhopna kichite leh mi khenkhat a hong kisa ua, Stephen a hong kiselpih uhi.
Himahleh a pilna leh a genpihpa Kha a selkhe theikei uhi.
Huan mi khenkhat a guai ua; huai mite’n, “Mosi leh Pathian a gensiat ka za uh” a chi uhi.
Huan mite, upate leh laigelhmite a hanthawn ua, Stephen a sual ua, a man ua, vaihawmte kiang ah a pi uhi.
Theihpih zuauthei bawlkhia in, amaute’n, “Hiai min hiai in Siangthou leh Dan a gense gige.”
Nazaret Jesu’n hiai in a hihse dia, Mosi in honpiak dante a hihlamdang ding chih, a gen ka za uh, a chi uhi.
Huan vaihawmte tengteng in Stephen a ensal chiat ua, a mel angel mel bang in a mu uhi.
Huan siampu lianpen in, “Hiai thute a dik ahi na hia?” a chi hi.
Stephen in, “Unaute aw, pate aw, ngai un. I pu Abraham, Haran khua a a omma a, Mesopotamia gam a a omlai in, thupina Pathian a kiang ah a hong kilak in, a kiang ah,
Na kholam leh na chite lak a kipan pawt inla, gam k’on etsak ding lam ah pai in, a chi hi.
Huan amah tuh Kaldaite gam a kipan a paikhia a, Haran khua ah a va omta hi; huan a pa sihnungin huai a kipan in tua na omna kholam uah Pathian in a pemlut sak hi.
Huan hiai ah zaw bangmah munluah ding, khengakna tham leng, a pekei hi. Himahleh tapa a neihma nangawn in amah gou ding leh a nung a a suante gouluah ding in gam piak a chiam hi.
Pathian in hichibang in a gen; A suante mi kholam ah kum za li a tam ding ua min sikha in a bawl ding ua, a sawi behlap ding uh.
Pathian in, sikha a nei dingte nam keiman ka ngaihtuah ding a, huaikhit chiang in a hongpawt ding ua, hiai mun ah ka na a sem ding uh, a chi behlap hi.
Pathian in a kiang ah tua zeksum thu a khung hi; huchi in, Abraham in Isak a suang a, a ni giat ni’n a zek a sum a, huan Isak in Jakob a suang a; Jakob in chisuang ding sawmlehnihte a hon nei hi.
“Tua chisuang dingte’n Joseph a haza ua, Aigupta gam ah a zuak ua; himahleh Pathian a kiang ah a om hi.

A gimthuak tengteng ah a honkhe zel a, Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharo leng a hehpihsak a, mipiltak ahi chih a theisak behlap hi; huchi in aman Aigupta gam leh a in a mi tengteng tung ah gamukpa in a bawlta hi.
Aigupta leh Kanan gam tengteng ah kial a hongtung a, gimthuakna thupitak a hongtungta hi; i pipute’n nekding himhim a muta kei uhi.
Himahleh Jakob in Aigupta gam ah buh a om chih a zaktakin i pipute a sawlkhia a; tua bel a hoh pattungna pen uh ahi.
Huan a nihvei hohna uah, Joseph a unaute kiang ah kitheisakta a, huchi in Joseph chite tuh Pharo kiang ah a kitheisakta uhi.
Huan Joseph in a pa Jakob leh a unau tengteng mi sawmsagih leh nga a samsak hi.
Huchi in Jakob Aigupta gam ah a hohsuk a; amah leh i pipute a sita uhi.
Sekem khua ah a pawtung ua, Abraham in Sekem khua a Emmor tapate lak a dangka sum a a lei han ah a vuita uhi.
“Pathian in Abraham kiang a a thuchiam a hongtun ding in mite Aigupta gam ah a hongpung ua, a hongtam deuhdeuh uhi.
Huan Aigupta gam ah Joseph theilou kumpi dang khat hong lal hi.
Huai mi in i chipihte a zekhem a, i pipute a sawi a, a naungekte uh hinglou ding in a paikhe saksak hi.
Huailai in Mosi a hongpiang a, Pathian muh in melhoih mahmah ahi; a pa inn ah kha thum a kem uhi.
A koihkhiak un Pharo tanu in amah tapa ding a la in a kem hi.
Huan Mosi Aigupta gam a pilna tengteng a hilh ua, thu ah leh a thilhih ah a thupi mahmah hi.
“Huan amah kum sawmli a chin kuan in, a unau, Israel suante a veh hi.
Huan a lak ua mi khat gimthuaklai a mu a, a panpih a, a hihgimpa Aigupta mi a that a, phu a laksakta hi.
Mosi in amah khut in Pathian in amaute a hondam chih a unaute’n theina uhiam a sa a, himahleh a theikei uhi.
Huan a zing in a lak ua mi nih a kilai un a kiang uh a vanaih a, Pute aw, unau neive ua; bangdia diklou tak a kibawl na hi ua? chi in, lep a tum hi.
Himahleh a invengpa tung a thugilou bawl zaw pen in Mosi tuh a sawnhang a, koute tung a heutu leh vaihawm ding in kuan a honbawl a?
Zan a Aigupta mi na thah bang a, honthah tum na hi maw? a chi hi.
Huai thu ziak in Mosi a taimangta hi, Midian gam ah a tam nilouhta hi, huai ah tapa nih a vanei hi.
“Huan kum sawmli nung in Sinai tang gamdai ah; loubuk ah meikuang lak ah angel khat a kiang ah a hong kilak hi.
Mosi in a muh in, a thilmuh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah a; huan en ding a a pailai in, Toupa aw in:
Kei na pipute Pathian, Abraham Pathian, Isak Pathian, Jakob Pathian, ka hi a na chi hi. Huchi in Mosi a ling a a en ngamta kei hi.
Huan Toupa’n a kiang ah, Na khepek a kipan na khetuam suah in; na dinna Mun Siangthou ahi a chi hi.
Aigupta gam a om ka mite gimdan ka mu gige hi, a thum uh leng ka za gige, amau honkhe ding in ka hongsuk ding hi. Hong in, Aigupta gam ah k’on sawl ding, a chi hi.
“Kou tung a heutu leh vaihawm ding a kuan honbawl ahia, chi a a deihlouh uh, Mosi, loubuk a angel kilak tungtawn in, Pathian in amah mah heutu leh honkhepa hikhawm ding in a sawlta hi.
Aman Aigupta gam ah Tuipi San leh gamdai mun ah, kum sawmli sung in thillamdang leh chiamtehnate a musak phot a, amaute a pikheta ahi.
Israel suante kiang ah, Pathian in keimah bang in, na unaute lak ah mi zawlnei khat, a thu na ngaihkhiak ding uh a hon bawlsak ding chipa Mosi ahi.
Huai mi gamdai a saptuamte lak a ompa, Sinai tang a angel in a houpihpa leh, i pipute kiang a ompa ahi; huai mi eite hon piaksawn ding a thuhingte lasawnpa mah ahi.
“I pipute’n amah thu a mangkei ua, a hua ua, Aron kiang ah,
I makai ding in pathiante hon bawlsak in; Aigupta gam a kipan a hon pikhepa Mosi lah a tanchin ka thei nawnta kei uhi, chi in, a lungtang uh Aigupta gam lam ah a nga nawnta uhi.
Huailai in bawngnou lim a bawl ua, a mai a kithoihna a lan ua amau khutsuak milim tung ah a kipak uhi.
Huchi in Pathian in a lehngatsan a, van a aksi chibai a buk theihna ding un amaute a tawpsanta hi; Zawlnei laibu a,
‘Aw nou Israel inkawte aw,
gamdai ah kum sawmli sung in gan sisan a kithoih in thillat toh in kei n’on bia ua eita?
Molok biakna maitam leh na pathian uh, Remphan aksi leh,
na milim bawltawmte uh,
vialpuak in chibai buk ding in na zong ua huaiziak in Babulon khaw khenlam ah sal in k’on pawmang ding,’
chih gelh bang in.
“I pi leh pute’n gamdai ah theihpihna biakbuk, Mosi kiang a a theihsaka om bang leh a lim a muhsak a om bang in a na bawl uhi.

Huai biakbuk mah i pipute suansawnte’n leng a neisawn zel uhi, Pathian in i pipute ma a Jentel a delhkhiakte gam a luahlai un, Joshua makaih in biakbuk a lutpih ua; David hongom tan in huai ah a om gige hi.
David Pathian mitmuh in deihsaktakin a om a, Jakob Pathian ading in inn bawlsak a ngen hi.
Himahleh Solomon in huai inn tuh a lamsak zawta hi.
Himahleh zawlnei gen bang in Tungnungpen tuh khut a bawl innte ah a omkei hi;
‘Toupa’n van ka tutphah ahi,
lei ka khepek ngakna ahi: inn bangchibang n’on lamsak ding ua?
Ka khawlna mun ding koi mun ahia?
Hiai thilte keimah khut in ka bawl kei ahia?’ chi a, a gen bang in.
“Mi genhakte, lungtang leh bil a zeksumlouhte aw, chiklaipeuh in Kha Siangthou na dal gige uh; na pipute uh hihbang in na hih nilouhlouh uhi.
Na pipute un zawlneite lak ah kua ahia a sawilouh uh? Mi Diktak hongding thugen khawlte a that ua; huai midiktak mansakte leh thatte noumau na hi uhi.
Dan angelte piaksawn mu masa a zuiloute aw” a chi hi.
Huan huai thu a zak un a sin uh a thakta a, Stephen tung ah a ha uh a gawita uhi.
Himahleh amah Kha Siangthou in a dim a, vanlam a en a, Pathian thupina leh Pathian taklam a Jesu ding a mu hi;
“Ngai un, van kihong ka mu a, Pathian taklam a Mihing Tapa ding leng ka mu” a chi hi.
Huchi in amau aw ngaihtak in a kikou ua, a bil uh a hum ua,
Kituaktakin a pang ua, khua a kipan a delhkhia ua, suang in a deng ua, a theihpihte’n tangval khat a min Saul khebul ah a puante uh a koihkhawm chiat uhi.
Amaute’n Stephen suang in a dengta uhi; aman Pathian sam in, “Toupa Jesu, ka kha la in” a chi hi.
Huan khukdin in aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Toupa, hiai a khelhna tung uah mawh pawsak ken” a chi hi. Huchi in, huai a gen zoh in, a ihmuta hi. Saul in leng a sih hoih a sa hi.
Huai ni’n Jerusalem khua a saptuam omte, min nakpitak in a sawi panta ua; sawltakte kia loungal Judia leh Samaria gam khoteng ah a dalhzak vekta uhi.
Huan Pathian limsak kuate hiam in Stephen a vui ua, nakpitak in a sun uhi.
Saul in bel saptuam pawlte a sawi a, inn teng a lut in, numei pasal a kaikhia a, suangkulh ah a khum hi.
Huan a dalhzakte khoteng ah a paita ua, thu a gen zel uhi.
Samaria khua ah Philip a hohsuk a, a kiang uah Khrist thu a tangkoupih hi.
Huan a thillamdang hihte a zak ua, a muh un, mipite’n lungsim mun khat in, Philip thugente a limsakta uhi.
Dawininte mi tampi a matte sung ua kipan in aw ngaihtak a kikou a pawt leh, zaw leh khebai tampi hihdam a a om ziak un.
Huchi in tua khopi ah nakpitak a kipahna a om hi.
Huan mi khat a min Simon a om a; aman mi thupi ka hi, chi in tuma lam in huai khua ah mitkhialdawi in Samari khomite lamdang satakin a bawl nilouh hi.
Mi tengteng, a neupen apan a lianpen tan in “Hiai mi Pathian thilhihtheihna thupi a chih uh ahi” chi in, a thu a limsak chiat uhi.
A mitkhialdawi in sawtpi lamdang satak a a bawlnak ziak in a thu a limsak uhi.
Himahleh amau Pathian gam Tanchinhoih leh Jesu Khrist min Philip gen a gintak un, numei leh pasalte’n baptisma a tangta uhi.
Huan Simon nangawn in leng a gingta a, baptisma a tanzoh in Philip kiang ah a om gige a, chiamtehna leh thillamdang thupite a mu a, lamdang a sa thei mahmah hi.
Huan sawltak Jerusalem khua a omte’n Samari khua a mite’n Pathian thu a gingtata uh chih a zak un, a kiang uah Peter leh Johan a sawl uhi.
Huai mite a vatun suk uleh Kha Siangthou a tan theihna ding un a thumsak uhi.
Huai ma in a lak uah kuamah tung ah a tung naikei hi; Toupa Jesu min in baptisma a tang phet uhi.
Huan sawltakte’n a tung uah a khut uh a koih ua, Kha Siangthou a muta uhi.
Huan sawltakte khutngakna ziak a Kha Siangthou piak ahi chih Simon in a muh in; dangka piak a sawm hi.
“Hichibang thuneihna hon pesam un, kua peuh tung a leng khut ka koihna in Kha Siangthou a tansamna ding in” a chi hi.
Himahleh Peter in a kiang ah, “Na dangka nang toh mang hen, Pathian thilpiak dangka sum a lei na tup ziak in.
Hiai thu ah nang zaw na pang kei, tan leng na neikei hi; na lungtang Pathian ngaih in a dikkei hi.
Huaiziak in, hiai na gitlouhna tawpsan inla, Toupa kiang ah thum in, huchi in na lungtang a na ngaihtuah a hon ngaidam kha mawh ding hiam.
Thil khakna sinkha ah leh gitlouh gaklopna ah na om chih ka thei hi” a chi hi.
Huan Simon in, “Na thilgen uh bangmah ka tung a hong tunlouhna ding in noumau in Toupa kiang ah hon thumsak un” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huchi in amau Toupa thu a theihsak ua, a gen zohnung un, Jerusalem a kiknawn in, Samari mite tenna khua tampi ah Tanchinhoih a gen zel uhi.
Huan Toupa angel khat in Philip a houpih a, “Thou inla, simlam a Jerusalem a kipan a Gaza khaw sunsuk lampi huai gamdai ah hoh in,” a chi hi.
Huchi in a thou a, a paita hi: huan ngai in, Ethiopia gam a mi khat, Ethiopia kumpinu Kanda gou tengteng kempa, michilgeh thuneitak, Jerusalem khua ah Pathian be ding in a hohtou hi.
A paikik lam kangtalai a tuin zawlnei Isai laibu a sim hi.
Huchi in Kha in Philip kiang ah, “Huai kangtalai vanaih inla, ki thuahpih in” a chi hi.
Philip michilgeh kiang ah a vatai a, zawlnei Isai laibu a sim a za a, “Na sim a omdan na thei hia?” a chi hi.
Aman “Kuamah hon hilhchet louh in bangchi’n ka thei dia?” chi in a kiang a kaltou a tutpih ding in Philip tuh a chialta hi.
Laisiangthou a simlai tuh hiai ahi:
‘Goh ding belam bang in amah a pi ua;
Belamnou a mulmetpa ma a a dai dinden bang in aman leng a kam a ka kei;
A vuallelh lai in a tung ah thugen a phal kei ua;
a suante tanchin kua’n a hon gen ding ua?
Khovel a kipan in a hinna a laksak ngal ua,’ chi in.
Michilgeh in Philip a houpih a a kiang ah, “Zawlnei in hiai thu kua thu a genna ahia, amah thu hia, midang thu? k’on dong hi” a chi hi.
Huan Philip in a dawng a, Laisiangthou thu a bul apan in, a kiang ah Jesu thu a hilhta hi.
Huan lampi a a paikawm un koimun hiam tui omna a tung ua; huan michilgeh in, “En dih, hiai ah tui a om, baptisma tanna ding bang in a hondal a ahia?” a chi hi.
Philip in, “Na lungtang tengteng a na gintak leh na hi thei” a chi hi. Aman “Jesu Khrist Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka gingta” chi in a dawng hi.
Huchi in kangtalai a khawlsak ua, a nih un, Philip leh mi chilgeh, tui ah a hoh khawm suk ua; Philip in amah a baptista hi.
Huan tui apat a paitouh un Toupa Kha in Philip a lamangta hi; huan michilgeh in amah a mu nawn takei hi, nuamsatak in a pai zel hi.
Himahleh Azota khua ah Philip muh in a om nawnta hi; a paisuak a, Kaisaria khua a tun masiah khoteng ah Tanchinhoih a gen zel hi.
Saul in Toupa nungzuite vau leh thah a tupthu a gen lailai man in siampu lianpen kiang ah a vahoh hi.
Damaska khua a kikhopnain tengteng a mite kiang a piak ding in lai a ngen a, hiai Lampi zuimi kuapeuh a muh leh, numei leh pasal leng, hen a Jerusalem a honpi theihna ding in.
A pailai in, Damaska khua a tunkuan in, thakhat in van a kipan vak a kim ah a hongvak puap hi.
Huan lei ah a puk a, a kiang ah, “Saul, Saul, Bang a chia nang honsawi na hia?” chi in, aw a za hi.
Huan aman “Toupa, kua na hia?” a chi hi. Toupa’n a kiang ah, na sawi Jesu ka hi; kilhna sikzum tot nang din a haksa hi” a chi hi.
Huan ling leh lamdangsa kawm in, “Toupa bang sem ding a hondeih na hiam?” a chi hi. Toupa’n a kiang ah “Thou inla, khopi ah lut in, huchi in na hih ding hilh in na om ding hi” a chi hi.
A tonpihte gen ding theilou in ading ua, aw zaw a za ua, himahleh kuamah a mu kei uhi.
Huan lei a kipan in Saul a thou a; a honghaka kuamah a mu theita kei hi; huchi in a khut in a kai ua, Damaska khua ah a pilut uhi.
Huan ni thum khomulou in a om a, bangmah ne in a dawn kei hi.
Huan Damaska khua ah a min Ananias nungzui khat a om hi. Toupa’n mengmu bang in a kiang ah, “Ananias” a chi hi.

Huan aman, “En in, Toupa, hiai ah ka om” a chi hi. Toupa’n a kiang ah, “Thou inla, kongzing Tang a chih uah hoh inla, Judas inn ah, Tarsa khua a mi, a min Saul kichi kankhia in. Ngai in, a thum laitak ahi.
Aman mengmuhna in mi khat a min Ananias a kiang a valut a, a mit hihvakna ding a a tung a khutnga in a muta hi” a chi hi.
Ananias in, “Toupa huai mi Jerusalem khua a na misiangthoute tung a a tatsiat thu mi tampi kam ah ka za hi.
Huan hiai ah na minlou peuhmah hen ding in siampu liante a kipan thuneihna toh hongpai ahi” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Himahleh Toupa’n a kiang ah, “Hohmai in; Jentelte, kumpipate, leh Israel suante kiang a ka min puaklutna dia ka belseh ahi;
Ka min ziak in gimna bangchi a thupi ahia a thuak ding a kiang ah ka theisak ding” a chi hi.

Huan Ananias a vahoh a, inn ah a lut a, huan a tung ah a khut a nga a, “Unau Saul, na mitvakna ding leh Kha Siangthou dim a na om theihna ding in, Toupa, na hongpaina lampi a na kiang a kilak Jesu’n honsawl ahi” a chi hi.
Huan thakhat in a mit a kipan lip bang a keta a, a mit a vak nawnta a; a thou a, baptisma a tangta hi.
Huan an a ne a, a halhta hi. Huan Damaska khua a nungzui omte kiang ah ni bangzah hiam a tam hi.
Kikhopnain ah Jesu, Pathian Tapa a hihdanthu a tangkoupih zui ngal hi.
Huan a thuzate tengteng in lamdang a sa uhi, hiai mi Jerusalem khua a hiai minloute sawi zelpa ahi ka hia? Huai mite siampu liante kiang a hensa a piak a hongna pen ahi, a chi uhi.
Saul bel a hong hattuam a, huai mi Khrist ahi taktak chih a hilhchiana, Damaska khua a Juda omte gen ding bei in a koih hilhial hi.
Huan ni sawttak nung in Saul that ding in Judate a kihou uhi;
Himahleh aman a thiltup uh a na thei hi. Huan that ding in kulh kong teng ah sun leh zan in a tang uhi.
Himahleh a nungzuite’n amah zan in a pi ua, kulh tohlet ah bawm in a khaikheta uhi.
Huan Saul Jerusalem khua a tuntakin nungzuite kithuahpih a tuma; amau bel avek un amah a kihta uhi, nungzui a hihsam a gingta kei uhi.
Barnaba in amah a pi a, sawltakte kiang ah a hon paipih a, lampi a Toupa a muh a, a houpih dan bang, Damaska khua a Jesu min a hangtak a thu a hilh dan bang leng a kiang uah a genta hi.
Huchi in Jerusalem khua ah Saul tuh a kiang uah lutzel pawt zel in a omta hi, Toupa min in hangsantak in thu a gen zel hi.
Huan Grik pauzang Judate kiang ah thu a gen a, a sel a; amau bel amah hihlup a tum uhi.
Huan unaute’n huai a theihtak un, Kaisaria khua ah a pisuk ua, Tarsa khua ah a sawlmangta uhi.
Huchi in saptuamte Judia, Galili, leh Samari gam kimvel ah a kip deuhdeuh ua, muangtakin a omta uhi; huan Toupa laudansiam in, Kha Siangthou khamuan in a om ua, a hong pung deuhdeuh uhi.
Huan Peter in khokim a totvial vial kawm in, Lidda khua a Mi Siangthou omte kiang ah leng a hohsuk hi.
Huai ah mi khat a min Ainisi a zawt ziak a kum giat lupna a lum nilouh a mu hi.
Huan Peter in a kiang ah, “Ainisi aw, Jesu Khrist in a hon hihdam, thou inla, na awngphah zial in,” a chi hi. Huchi in a thou pahta hi.
Huan Lidda khua leh Saron phai a omte tengteng in Ainisi a mu ua, Toupa lam a nga duam uhi.
Huan Joppa khua ah a min Tabitha nungzui khat a om a, Tabitha minkhiakna tuh Dorka ahi, huai numei in thilhih hoih leh thilpiak a hau mahmah hi.
Huailai in, a chi a na a, a sita hi; huchi in a silsiang ua, indan tungnung ah a sial uhi.
Huan Lidda khua tuh Joppa khaw kiang a hih ziak in, nungzuite’n Peter huai ah a om chih a za ua, “Sawt hallou in ka kiang uah hongpai in” chi a vathum ding in a kiang ah mi nih a sawl uhi.
Huan Peter a thou a a kiang uah a paita hi. Huan a tuntakin indan tungnung ah a pi ua; meithai tengteng ding in Dorka a kiang ua a omlai a a puanak bawlte a puan bawlte lak kawm in a kap chiat uhi.
Himahleh Peter in avek un a pawtsak a, a khukdin a, a thumta hi; huan luanglam a nga a, “Tabitha, thou in” a chi hi. Huchi in a mit a honghaka, Peter a muhtak in a tutou hi.
Huan Peter in a khut a pia a, a kaithou hi, misiangthoute leh meithaite a sam a, dam in a peta hi.
Huan huai Joppa khua tengteng in a thei vek ua; mi tampi in Toupa a gingta uhi.
Huan Joppa khua ah savun bawlpa Simon inn ah ni tampi tak Peter a tam nilouh hi.
Kaisaria khua ah mi khat a min Kornelia a om a; Italy pawl a chih uh, huai pawl a sepaih zaheutupa ahi,
Amah Pathian limsakmi ahi a, a inkuanpihte tengteng toh Pathian laudan a siam uhi, mite kiang ah thil thawnpiak tampi a pe zel a, Pathian kiang ah leng a thum gige hi.
Hiai mi’n sun dak kua na ding in mengmuhna in chiantak in Pathian angel khat a kiang a lut a, ‘Kornelia’ chi in, a mu hi.
Huan Kornelia in lau in amah a na en kilkel a, “Toupa, bang ahia?” a chi hi. Aman a kiang ah, Na thumnate leh na thilpiakte theih gige na ding in Pathian ma ah a tungtouta hi.
Tun ah Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, mi khat Simon Peter a chih uh vapi sak in:
Savunbawlpa Simon inn ah a tung a, a in tuipigei a om ahi, aman na hih ding hon na hilh ding hi” a chi hi.
A houpihpa angel a paitakin, Kornelia in a sikhate lak a mi nih leh a nekbawl gigete lak a Pathian limsak sepaih khat a sam hi.
Thu tengteng a kiang ua a hilhkhit in Joppa khua ah a sawlta hi.
Huan a zingnawn in, khopi zuan a pai, khua a tun kuan un, Peter thum ding in dak gukna vel in intung ah a kaltou hi.
Huan a gil a hong kial mahmahta a, annek a utta hi; himahleh nekding a bawllai un ihmu bang in a hongom hi.
Van kihong in, banghiam bawm, puan liantak bang, ningli a khih, lei a luai a khaikhiak a om a mu hi.
Huai sung ah leitung a khelinei ganhing chichih leh gamsa leh, ganhing bokvak, tungleng vasa chichihte a om uhi.
Huan a kiang ah aw in “Peter, thou in gou inla, ne in” a chi hi.
Himahleh Peter in, “Toupa hilou e; sianglou leh nin bangmah himhim ka ne ngeikei” a chi hi.
Aw in, a nihveina in, “Pathian in a hih siangthousa nang sianglou chi ken” a chi hi.
Huchibang ngen in thumvei a hongom a; huan bawm van a khaitouh in a om nawnta hi.
Huan Peter in mengmu bang a a muh theisiamlou a, a buailai in, Kornelia mi sawlte’n Simon inn a na kankhia uhi.
Kongkhak bul ah a na ding ua a sam ua, “Simon, Peter a chih uh, huai a a tun leh tun louh” a na dong uhi.
Peter in mengmu bang a a muh a ngaihtuahlai in, Kha in a kiang ah, “Ngai in, mi thum in a hongzong uh.
Huchi in thou inla, kum inla, bangmah ginglel lou in amau zui in; amau ka sawl ahi uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in Peter huai mite kiang ah a hohsukta a, a kiang uah, “Ngai un na zon uh ka hi; bang ahia na hongna uh?” a chi hi.

Amau, Angel siangthou khat in, Kornelia sepaih zaheutupa, midiktak, Pathian laudansiam, Juda nam tengteng lak a mi hoih kiang ah, na thugen a zakna din, a inn ah nangmah sam ding in, a hilh hi, a chi uhi.
Huchi in mite a samlut a, a giaksakta hi. Huan a zing in Peter a thou a, a kiang uah a pai a, Joppa khomi unau kuate hiam leng a kiang uah a pai sam uhi.
Huan a zingnawn in Kaisaria khua ah a lutta uhi. Kornelia in, a sanggamte leh a lawm deihpente samkhawm in, amau a na ngak nilouh hi.
Peter a honglut dek laitak in Kornelia in a na dawn a, a khebul a khupboh in, a bia hi.
Himahleh Peter in amah a kaithou a, ding in, “Keileng mihing ka hi” a chi hi.
Amah toh kihou kawm in a lut a, mi tampi omkhawm a mu hi.
A kiang uah, “Juda mi namdang toh kithuah leh pai a sianlouh dan noumau na thei uhi; himahleh kuamah sianglou leh nin ka chih ding ahi kei chih Pathian in a hon theisak hi.
Huaiziak in na hong saptakin sellou in ka hongpai ahi. Huchi in ka hondong ahi, bangdia honsam na hi ua le?” a chi hi.
Huan Kornelia in, “Ni li ahita, tu hun bang tan in, ka inn ah, dak kua na hun thumna ah ka thum a; ngai in, puan vaktak silh mi khat ka ma ah a hongding hi,
‘Kornelia, na thumna zak in a omta, mi kiang a na thil thawnpiakte leng Pathian in a theigige hi.

Huaiziak in Joppa khua ah Simon, Peter a chih uh, sam ding in mi sawl inla, na kiang ah sam in; amah tuipi gei ah savun bawlpa Simon in a tung ahi, amah a hongtun chiang in na kiang ah thu a gen ding hi’ a chi hi.
Huaiziak in na kiang ah mi k’on sawl pah ahi; na hong a hoih ahi. Huchi in Toupa’n thu a honpiak peuhmah thei ding in tun ah Pathian mitmuh in i vek un hiai ah i om hi, a chi hi.
Huan Peter in a gen a, “Pathian in mi deihsaktuam a neikei chih, diktak in ka thei hi;
Himahleh namchih lak ah kuapeuh amah kihtakdan siam a, diktak a gamta peuhmah, a pahtakmi ahi naknak uhi.
Aman khamuanna Tanchinhoih Jesu Khrist tungtawn in Israel suante kiang ah a gen a, Jesu mi tengteng Toupa ahi.
Johan in a tangkou pihpih baptisma nung in, hiai Tanchinhoih, Galili gam a kipan a hongthang pan a, Judia gam tengteng ah a thangsuak a, noumau leng na thei uhi;

Nazaret Jesu tungtang thu, huchi a Pathian in amah Kha Siangthou leh thilhihtheihna a a thaunilh dan, Pathian a kiang a a om ziak in amah mi tung a thil hoih hihleh Diabol gawt tengteng hihdam in a vialvak vak hi.
Judate gam ah leh Jerusalem khua a a thilhih tengteng theihpih te ka hi uhi, amah sing dawn ah khai in a that uhi.
Amah Pathian in ni thum ni’n a kaithou nawn a, chiantak in a kitheisak hi,
Himahleh mi tengteng kiang ah ahi kei a, Pathian in theihpih dia a sehkholhte kiang kia ah ahi koute, misi lak a kipan a thohnawn nung a a kiang a ne a dawnte kiang ah.
Amah misi leh mihingte tung a Vaihawmpa dia Pathian seh ahi chih, mi kiang a tangkoupih leh theisak ding in Pathian in thu a honpia hi.
Kuapeuh amah gingta a min ziak in khelhnate ngaihdam in a om ding uh chih hiai a tanchin zawlnei tengteng in a na theihsak sak uh ahi” a chi hi.
Peter in huai thu a genlai tak in thu zate tengteng tung ah Kha Siangthou a hongtung hi.
Zeksumte lak a a gingtate Peter honzui peuhmah in Kha Siangthou thawnpiak Jentelte tung ah leng sunbuak a hih ziak in lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Pau theihlouh a thugen in Pathian phat in a za uhi.
Huan Peter in a phuang a, “Hiai mite, eimah bang a Kha Siangthou tang sam, baptisma ding in tuizat kuama’n a kham thei dia hia?” a chi hi.
Huchi in Toupa min a baptisma tan ding thu a pia hi. Huaikhit in ni bangzah hiam tam ding in a khou uhi.
Huan Judia gam a sawltak leh unau omte’n Jentelte’n leng Pathian thu a gingta uh chih a zata uhi.
Huchi in Peter Jerusalem khua a tuntouh tak in, zeksumte’n a kiang ah,
“Zeksumloute inn ah lut in, a kiang uah na ne” chi in a kalhta uhi.
Himahleh Peter in a bul a kipan in kizom zel in a kiang uah a hilhchian hi:
“Joppa khua ah thum in ka om a, huan ihmu bang in ka om a, banghiam bawm puan liantak bang a ningli a khih, van a kipan a khiaksuk bang in ka mu a; ka kiang ngeingei a hongtung hi.
Huai tuh ka en kilkel a, ka ngaihtuah a, ‘lei a ganhing kheli nei leh gamsate chichih, awm a kitholh ganhingte leh tungleng vasate ka mu hi.’
Huan aw in ‘Peter, thou in; gou inla, ne in, honchi in,’ ka za hi.
Himahleh ken, Toupa, hilou e, sianglou leh nin bangmah ka kam ah a lut ngeikei, ka chi hi.
Himahleh van a kipan in aw in, a nihveina in, Pathian in a hih siangthousa nang sianglou chi ken, chi in a hon dawng hi.
Huchibang ngen in thumvei a hongom a: huan bangkim van ah khaitouh in a om nawnta hi.
Huan ngai in, mi thum Kaisaria khua a kipan ka kiang ah a honsawl ua, ka omna inn mai ah a na ding nilouh uhi.
Huan Kha in kuamah khentuam neilou a amau zui ding in a honsawl hi. Hiai unau guk in leng a honzui sam ua, huai mi inn ah ka lutta uhi.
Huan aman ka kiang uah, a inn a angel kilak a muhdan leh angel in a kiang a, Joppa khua ah mi sawl a, Simon Peter a chih uh, pisak ding leh;
‘Aman thu a honhilh ding a, huai mi thu in nang leh na inkuanpihte hotdam in na om ding uh’ a chih dan leng a honhilh hi.
Huan thu ka gentung in, Kha Siangthou ka tung uah a hongtungta.
Toupa thu, Johan in tui in a baptist zel; himahleh nou zaw Kha Siangthou a baptist in na om ding uh a chih k’on theikhenawn uhi.
Huchi in Toupa Jesu Khrist i gintak ua, Pathian in thilthawnpiak a honpiak amau kiang a a piaksam, kei Pathian sel vual ka hi ahia?” a chi hi.
Huai thu a zak un a daita ua, huchi ahihleh “Pathian in Jentelte leng hing ding a kisik phalta ahi ngei maw” chi in, Pathian a phat uhi.
Huan Stephen ziak a sawina thuak dalhzakte, Phoinisia gam, Kupra tuikulh, leh Antiok khua pha in a pai ua, Judate kiang kia ah loungal kuamah kiang ah thu a gen kei uhi.
Himahleh a lak ua a khen tuh Kupra tuikulh leh Kurini khua a mite ahi ua, huai mite’n Antiok khua a tun un Grikte leng a houpih ua, Toupa Jesu Tanchinhoih a hilh samta uhi.
Huan Toupa khut in amaute a panpih a; mi tampi in a gingta ua, Toupa lam a hong nga chiatta uhi.
Huan a tanchin thu uh Jerusalem khua a saptuam omte bil ah a lutta a: huchi in Antiok khaw pha in Barnaba a sawlkhia uhi.
Amah a vatung a, Pathian hehpihdan a muh in a kipak hi, phatuamngaitak in Toupa len gige ding in avek un a hanthawn hi.
Barnaba mi hoihtak ahi a, Kha Siangthou leh ginna a dim ahi. Huan mi tampi Toupa kiang ah a behlap in a omta uhi.
Huan Saul zong ding in Barnaba Tarsa khua ah a hoh hi.
A muh in Antiok khua ah a honpi hi. Huan kum khat hilhial saptuamte kikhopna ah a pang zel ua, mi tampi leng thu a hilh uhi. Antiok khua ah ahi nungzuite “Khristian” a chih masak pen uh.
Huailai in zawlnei kuahiam Jerusalem khua a kipan in Antiok khua ah a hohsuk hi.
A lak ua mi khat a min Agaba, ading a, khovel tengteng ah kial thupitak a tung dek chih Kha hilh in a theisak a; huai kial tuh Klaudia vaihawm lai in a hongtungta hi.
Huchi in nungzuite’n a theihdan chiat un Judia gam a unau omte kiang ah panpihna khak a tum uhi.
Huai tuh a hihta ngei uhi, Barnaba leh Saul khut ah upate kiang ah a khak uhi.
Huailai in Kumpipa Herod in saptuamte lak a kuate hiam hihgim tum in a khut a likta hi.
Huan Jakob, Johan unau, namsau in a satlum hi.
Huai in Judate a kipaksak chih a theih in, Peter leng mat a tum zel hi. Huai ni tuh tanghou silngou sohlouh ni ahi.
Huan a mat nung in suangkulh ah a khum a, sepaih pawl li, li chiat zel in, a venkhel sak hi; Paikan Ankuanglui nung in mi tengteng kiang ah pikhiak a tum hi.
Huaiziak in Peter suangkulh ah a omsak tadih hi; himahleh, saptuamte’n amah ading in phatuamngaitak in Pathian kiang ah a thumsak uhi.
Herod in a pikhiak ding zan in Peter sepaih nih kikal ah khainiang nih bun in a ihmu a; a vengte kongkhak bul a om in suangkulh a veng uhi.
Ngai in, Toupa angel khat a kiang ah a hong ding a, suangkulh sung ah vak a hongtang hi; huan Peter nak ah a beng halh a, “Thou meng in” a chi hi. A khut a kipan khainiangte a tolh khesuk hi.
Huan angel in a kiang ah, “Na puan silh inla, na khetuam bun in” a chi hi. Huan aman huchibang in a hih hi. Angel in a kiang ah, “Na puan silhhoih inla honzui in” a chi hi.
Huan Peter a pawt a a zuita hi, angel tatdan a tak a hih a theikei a, mengmu bang a a muh hiam a kisa hi.

Huan chingmi masa leh a zawm a khennung un, khopi lutna sik kongpi a vatung ua, huai tuh amau ading in a kihong tawmta hi; huan a pawt ua, kongzing khat a kheng ua; huai a kipan angel in a amah paisanta hi.
Huan Peter a halhtakin, “Herod khut leh Judamite lametna tengteng a kipan a honkhe ding a Toupa’n a angel hon sawlkhia ahi chih tuin diktak in ka theita” a chi hi.
Huan a kingaihtuah khit in, Johan, Mark a chih uh, huai nu Mari inn ah a vahoh a; huai ah thum in mi tampi a na omkhawm uhi.
Kongpi kongkhak a kiuh tak in, nungak khat a min Roda, a dawng ding in a va hoh hi.
Peter aw a zaktak in a kipah ziak in kong honglou in a tailut nawn a, kongkhak bul ah Peter ading chih a vagen hi.
Himahleh amau a kiang ah, “Hai neita ve” a na chi uhi. Aman bel, “Hi petmah ahi” chi in a pang teitei hi. Amau “Angel hi in teh” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Peter in kongkhak a kiukiu a; a hon ua leh amah a mu ua, lamdang a sa uhi.

Huchi in aman amaute dai ding in a khutvan a, Pathian in suangkulh a kipan amah a pikhiakdan a hilhta hi. “Hiai thute Jakob leh unaute kiang ah vahilh un” a chi hi. Huan a pawt a mun dang ah a vapai hi.
Ni a hong suahtakin, sepaihte Peter tung a bang thil tung hiam, chi in buai chihtak in a buai uhi.
Huan Herod in amah a zong a a mu kei hi, a vengtute a enchian a, thah ding in thu a peta hi. Huan Judia gam a kipan Kaisaria khua ah a hohsuk a, huai ah a om nilouh hi.

Huan Tura leh Sidon khua a mite tung ah Herod a lunghikei mahmah hi: amau thukhatsat in Blasta, kumpipa lupna ngakpa, a lawm in a bawl ua, kumpipa kiang ah hongpai ua, amah a kipan nek leh dawn ngah zel ahihman un a kholamte uh toh kilemna a ngen uhi.
Huan a nichiam ni’n kumpipa Herod in kumpi puan a silh a, a mangtutphah a tuin amaute kiang uah thu a gen hi.
Mi tengteng in, “Hiai pathian aw ahi, mihing aw ahi kei” a chi ua, a kikou uhi.
Aman Pathian kiang a thupina a piaklouh ziak in Toupa Angel in amah a manpah a, hut in a ne a, a sita hi.
Pathian thu bel a dalh a, a pung zel hi.
Barnaba leh Saul in na a sepkhit un, Jerusalem khua a kipan a kiknawnta ua, Johan, Mark a chih uh, a tonpih uhi.
Antiok khua a saptuam omte lak ah zawlnei leh thuhilhmi kuate hiam a om ua; huaite Barnaba, Niger a chih uh Simeon, Kurini khomi Lusia, kumpipa Herod toh khangkhawm Manaen leh Saul ahi uhi.
Huan Toupa nasem a an a ngawllai un, Kha Siangthou in, “Barnaba leh Saul ka sapna nna sem ding in kei ding in hon koihtuam sak un” a chi hi.
Huchi in an a ngawl ua, a thumkhit un a tung uah a khut uh a koih ua, a paisakta uhi.
Huchi in Kha Siangthou sawlkhiak in a pai ua, Seliusia khua ah a hohsuk ua, huai a kipan in Kupra tuikulh ah long in a pai uhi.
Salami khua a a omlai un Judate kikhopnain ah Pathian thu a gen ua; Johan leng amau panpih ding in a tonpih uhi.
Huan tuikulhgam Papho khua pha in a nawksuak ua, bumsiam, zawlnei taklou, Judami khat a mu ua, a min tuh Bar Jesu ahi.
Huai mi gamukpa Serjia Paulus, mi piltak kiang a om ahi. Huai gamukpa’n Barnaba leh Saul a sam a, Pathian thu zak a tum hi.
Himahleh bumsiam Elima, kichi bel Bar Jesu a min khiakna ahi, amau nasep dal in gamukpa ginna a kipan heimang a tum hi,
Huchi in Saul, Paul a chih uh; Kha Siangthou in a dim a, amah a ensal hi.
“Nang, mi khem leh huathuai chiteng a dim Diabol tapa, diktatna tengteng melmapa aw, Toupa lam diktatte hihsiat na tawp kei ding maw?

Thei in, tuin Toupa khut na tung ah a tu hi, na mit a hongtaw ding a, bang tan hiam khovak na mu kei ding” a chi hi. Huchi in khomui leh mial in amah a khuhpah a, khut a kai ding mi zong in a mai puampuam hi.
Huan gamukpa’n huai thilhih a mu a, Toupa sinsakna lamdang a sa mahmah a, a gingtata hi.
Paul a tonpihte toh Papho khua a kipan in long in a pai ua, Pamphilia gam a Perga khua a tung uhi; huai ah Johan in amaute paisan in, Jerusalem khua ah a kiksan hi.
Himahleh amau Perga khua a kipan a pai zel ua, Pisidia gam a Antiok khua a tung uhi; Khawlni’n kikhopnain ah a lut ua, a tu uhi.
Dan leh zawlneite laibu a simkhit un, kikhopnain upate’n a kiang uah mi a sawl ua, “Unaute aw, mite hanthawnna thu banghiam na neih uh leh gen un” a chi uhi.
Huan Paul ading a, a khut a zap in a gen hi; “Israel mite leh Pathian laudansiamte aw, ngai un:
Hiai Israel chite Pathian in i pipute a tel a, Aigupta gam a a tamlai un a hihthupi a, ban thahat in amaute huai a kipan in a pikheta hi.
Huan kum sawmli gamdai ah a thilhihte uh a thuak teitei hi.
Kanan gam a nam sagihte a hihsiat khit in, a gam uh aisan a hawm a a luah ding un a pia hi.
Huaite nung kum za li leh sawmnga sung teng vaihawmmite a pe zel a, zawlnei Samuel huntan in.
Huan huai nung in kumpipa a ngen ua; Pathian in, Saul kichi, Benjamin nam a Kish tapa, kum sawmli sung amau a pia hi.
Amah a suanmang nung in a kumpipa ding un David a bawlta hi; Pathian in huai thu theihsak in, David, Jesse tapa, ka lungtang bang pu mi ka mukheta, aman ka deihlam a hih ding, a chi hi.
Hiai mi suan a kipan in Pathian in a thuchiam bang in Israelte kiang ah Hondampa, Jesu kichi a hon dinkhia hi.
Amah a hong paima in Johan in kisikna baptisma thu Israel mi tengteng kiang ah a na hilh masa hi.

Huan Johan in a sepding a zoh kuan in, ‘Noute’n kei kua na honsa ua? Amah zaw ka hi kei hi. Himahleh ngai un, ka nung ah mi khat hongpai dek ahi, kei zaw a khepek a khetuam pheltak leng ka hi kei’ a chi hi.
“Mite leh unaute, Abraham suante leh Pathian laudansiam Jentelte tengteng aw, noute kiang ah hiai hotdamna thu piak in a omta hi.
Jerusalem khua a omte leh a makaite un, amah a theihlouh ziak ua siamlouh a tansak lai un, zawlneite thute khawlni teng a a simte uh tangtung sak a na hi uhi.
A sihna ding khop a tung ah bangmah a muhlouh un leng, Pilat kiang ah hihlup ding in a ngen uhi.
Huan a thu zawlneite’n a gelhkholh tengteng uh a hih tangtun khit un, sing a kipan in a lakhia ua, han ah a sialta uhi.
Himahleh Pathian in misi lak a kipan a kaithou nawnta hi:
Huchi in Galili gam a kipan Jerusalem khua a amah toh hohtoute kiang ah ni sawtpi a kilak gige a; huai mite mah mi kiang a a thu theihpihte ahi uhi.
“Kou leng pipute kiang ah huai thuchiam a Tanchin kipahhuai k’on phuangzak uhi;
Huchi a Pathian in Jesu a kaihthoh, ei a tate kiang ah huai thuchiam tuh a hih tangtung hi; Sam nihna ah, ‘Nang zaw ka tapa na hi a, tuni in k’on neikhia hi,’ chih gelh bang in.
Muatna mun a painawnlou ding in Pathian in amah misi lak a kipan a kaihthoh ding danthusehsa bang in a gen hi, David kiang a hehpihna ka chiamte nangmah ka honpe ding, chi in.
Huaiziak in Sam dang ah, Na Mi Siangthou muatmang na phalkei ding, a chi behlap hi.
David zaw, Pathian vaihawmsak bang in amah khang hun a na a sepkhit in, a ihmu a, a pipute kiang ah a sial ua, a muatmangta hi.
Himahleh Pathian kaihthoh pen in zaw muatna a mu kei hi.
Huchi in unaute aw thei un; amah ziak in khelhna ngaihdamna thu na kiang ua gen ahi.
Kuapeuh a gingta tuh bangkim ah amah siamtansak in a om, huai lah Mosi dan in siamtansak in na om theikei uhi.
Huaiziak in pilvang un, huchilou in zaw zawlneite a a gen uh na tung uah a hongtung ding hi;
Musitte aw, en un, lamdang sa unla,
mangthang un; na damsung un nna khat ka sem hi,
huai nna mi’n honhilh mahle uh,
na gingta kei hial ding uhi chih” a chi hi.
Huan a pawt un, khawlni nawn chiang a huai thute gennawn ding in a ngen uhi.
Huan kikhawmte a kikhen tak un, Judate leh phungkaite Pathian limsak lak a mi tampi in Paul leh Barnaba a zuizel ua; amau a na houpih uhi, Pathian hehpihna ah om gige ding in a hanthawn hi.
Huan khawlni nawn in a khozang phial un Pathian thu ngaikhe ding in a hong kikhawm uhi.
Himahleh Judate’n mipite a muhtak un a haza mahmah ua; Paul thugente kalh in a gensia uhi.

Huchi in Paul leh Barnaba in hangsantak in a dawng ua, “Pathian thu noumau kiang ah gen masak ding him ahi; himahleh na nial ua, tangtawn a hingtaklou a na kiseh nung un, thei un, Jentelte lam ka ngata uh” a chi uhi.
Huchibang in Toupa’n thu a honpia hi, “Jentelte hihvakpa din ka honsep a, kawlmong pha a Hondampa dia na om theihna ding in ” chih gelh bang in, a chi hi.
Jentelte’n huai thu a zak un, a kipak ua, Toupa thu a pahtawi ua, tangtawn a hing ding a sehkholh peuhmah in a gingta uhi.
Toupa thu huai gam kimvel ah a dalhta hi.
Himahleh Judate’n numei zahtakhuai Pathian limsakte leh khua upate hanthawn in, Paul leh Barnaba sawisak in, a gam ua kipan a delhkhia uhi.
Amau leng a tung uah a khepek ua leivui a singkhia ua, Ikoniam khua ah a paita uhi.
Huan nungzuite kipahna leh Kha Siangthou in a dim chiat uhi.
Ikoniam khua ah Judate kikhopnain ah a luttuak ua, thu a genzel uhi, huchi in Judate leh Grik mipi tampi in leng a gingtata uhi.
Himahleh gingta nuamlou Judate’n Jentelte lungsim a tokthou ua, unaute a hawsak uhi.
Huaiziak in Toupa ah hangtak a thugen in huai ah sawtsim a om uhi. Aman chiamtehna leh thillamdangte a khut ua hihsak in, a hehpihna thu a theisak zel hi.
Himahleh khua a mipite a kilangta ua, a khen in Judate a gum ua, a khen in sawltakte a gum uhi.
Jentelte leh Judate a heutute utoh pangkhawm in sawltakte simmohhuaitak a bawl a suang a den a tuplai un,
Amau a na thei ua, Lykonia gam mah ah Listra leh Darbi khua ah leh a kim gam ah a taimang uhi;
Huai ah Tanchinhoih a gen zel uhi.
Listra khua ah khe zaw kuahiam a tu a, a piantung apat khebai him ahi a, khe in a pai ngeikei hi.
Huai min Paul thugen a ngaikhia a; huan Paul in a en gegu hi, “Damna ding in ginna a nei chih a thei a, aw ngaihtak in, na khe in dingtang in” a chi hi.
Huan amah a tawm a, khe in a paita hi.
Mipite’n Paul thilhih a muh un, Lykonia pau in aw ngaihtak in, “pathiante mihing bang in i kiang uah hongsukta uh e!” a chi uhi.
Amaute’n Barnaba pen, ‘Jupiter’ a chi ua, Paul bel thugen pen a hih ziak in ‘Hermes’ a chi uhi.
Huan Jupiter siampu khopi pawlam a om leh mipite’n bawngpate leh pakkhigui limte kongkhak kiang a hontawi in, amau biakna ding in lat a tum uhi.
Himahleh sawltak Barnaba leh Paul in huai a zak un, a puan uh a botkek ua, mipi lak ah a dianglut ua, a kikou uhi.

“Pute aw, hiai thilte bangdia hih na hi ua? Kou leng noumau hindan kibang pu mihing ka hive ua le: hiai thil ginaloute na kiheisan ua, van, lei, tuipi, leh asung ua om tengteng bawlpa Pathian hing kiang a n’ong kiheina ding un Tanchinhoih k’on tun uhi.
Pathian in nidanglai in namchih amau lampi chiat zuih a phal hi.
Himahleh amah theihsakna omlou in a kibawl kei hi, huchi in thil a hihhoih zel a, van a kipan in vuahtui a honpia a, na lungtang uh nekding leh kipahna in a hihdim gige a kei hiam” a chi uhi.
Huchi in huai thu in mipite’n amaute biakna dia gan a goh ding uh a kham zou teitei hi.
Himahleh Antiok leh Ikoniam khua ah Judami kuate hiam a hong ua, mipite a khempukta uhi; huchi in suang in Paul a deng ua, si a a gintak ziak un khua a kipan a kaikheta uhi.
Himahleh nungzuite a kim a a dinlai un, a hong thou a, khua ah a lut nawnta hi. Huan a zing in Barnaba toh Darbi khua ah a paita uhi.
Huan huai khuate kiang ah Tanchinhoih a hilh ua, nungzui tampi a bawlnung un Listra, Ikoniam leh Antiok khua ah, a kiknawn uhi.
Gim tampi thuak in Pathian gam i lut ding ahi him ahi, chi in, nungzuite lungsim a hihkip ua, ginna a om gige ding in a hanthawn uhi.
Huan saptuam pawl teng ah upate a sehsak ua, anngawl kawm a a thumkhit un, a gin uh Toupa kiang ah a kemsak zelzel uhi.
Pisidia gam a tawnsuak ua, Pamphilia gam a tung uhi.
Perga khua a thu a genkhit un Attalia khua ah a hohsuk uhi.
Huai a kipan in long in a pawt ua, Antiok khua a hongtung nawnta uhi. Huai mun ahi tua a thilhih khitsa uh hih ding a unaute’n Pathian hehpihna a kemsak a a sawlkhiakna uh.
Huan a tunnung un a saptuamte a samkhawm ua, Pathian in, amaute zang a a thilhihte leh Jentelte adia ginna kongkhak a honsak dan a hilh uhi.
Huan nungzuite kiang ah sawtsim a omta uhi.
Mi kuate hiam Judia gam a kipan in a hongsuk ua unaute kiang ah, “Mosi dan bang a zek na sumkei uleh hotdam na hi theikei ding uh” chi in, a hong gen uhi.

Huchi in Paul leh Barnaba in amaute kalh in nakpitak a kisel in a kilan ziak un, Paul leh Barnaba, a lak ua kuate hiam toh, huai thubuai dongchian ding in Jerusalem ah sawltakliante leh upate kiang ah hohtou ding in a sep uhi.
Huchi in Saptuamte’n a vakha ua amau Jentelte kiheikik nawndanthu genzel in, Phoinisia gam leh Samari gam a tawnsuakta uh; huchi in unaute tengteng a kipaksak mahmah uhi.
Jerusalem khua a tun touh un Saptuam pawlte, sawltakte, upate’n a na kipahpih ua; Pathian in amau zang a a thilhihte a gengen uhi.
Himahleh Pharisai pawl a mi gingta kuate hiam a kisa ua, “Jentelte zeksum ding leh Mosi dan a zuihchiat ding uh ahi” a chi uhi.
Huan sawltakliante leh upate, huai thu ngaihtuah ding in a kikhawm uhi.

Nakpi a a kisel nung un Peter a dingtou a, a kiang uah, “Mite leh unaute aw, Jentelte’n keimah kam a Tanchinhoih thu za a gingta ding a, Pathian in nidanglai a na lak ua kipan a a hon sehdan na thei uhi.
Lungsim theipa Pathian in eite honpiak bangmah in Kha Siangthou a kiang ua pesam in a tung uah a kipak chih a theisak hi;
Huan eite leh amau khentuam neilou in ginna in a lungsim uh a hih siangthou hi.
Huchi in i pipute leh eite’n i zuih zohlouhsa hakkol tun ah nungzuite tung a ngaktum a bangdia Pathian kalh na hi ua?
Amau gintak bangmah in eite’n leng Toupa Jesu hehpihna ziak a hotdam ding hi in i kigingta ngal ua” a chi hi.
Barnaba leh Paul in, amaute zang a Pathian in Jentelte lak a chiamtehna leh thillamdang a hih thu a genlai un mipite’n ngaikhia in a dai sipsip uhi.
Huchi a mipite a daih sipsip lai un Jakob in a dawng a, “Unaute aw, ka thu ngaikhia un, chi in a gen sam hi,
Simeon in Pathian in amah min pu ding leh a lak ua kipan mite lakhe ding in Jentelte a veh tungthu a genta hi.
Huai thu leh zawlneite thu, gelh a omsa toh a kituak hi.
Huai khitchiang in ka kiknawn ding a, David biakbuk chimsia ka bawlnawn ding a, a siatna lai ka puah ding a, ka tungding nawn ding;
Midang a omsunte leh ka minpu Jentelte ka min kikoppih te’n, Toupa a zonna ding un huai thilte tengteng ahihta hi, chi in.
Khovel siamchil a kipan hiai thu theisakpa Toupa’n a chi, chih gelh ahi.
Huaiziak in Jentelte lak a Pathian lamngate hihgim keini chih ka thusawm ahi.
