Milim biakna sanek, kingaihna nin, sa heklup leh sisan nek a tawpsanna ding un a kiang uah laigelh zaw lehang, ka chi pen hi.
Mosi dan lah nidanglai a kipan khaw teng ah a thu tangkoupih a hih ban ah kikhopnain peuh ah khawlni teng in a thu sim ahi” a chi hi.

Huan sawltakte, upate, saptuam tengteng toh, a pawl ua mi tel, Paul leh Barnaba kiang ah Antiok khua a hohsak hoih a sa ua; a telte uh min Judas, Barnaba a chih uh leh Sila ahi ua, huai mite unaute lak a heutu deuh ahi uhi.
Hichibang in a gelh ua, a khut uah a khak uh:
“Sawltakte leh unaute lak a upate’n Antiok khua, Suria gam leh Silisia gam a Jentel unaute chibai a buk uhi.

Ka pawl lak ua mi kuate hiam in noute kiang a thugen in, Zeksum ding leh Mosi dan zuiding in a hon hihbuai ua, na lungsim uh a hon mangbangsak uh chih ka za ua, amaute hiai thu gen ding in ka sawl kei uhi.
Huaiziak in thukhatsat a ka kikhop un, ka deihtak uh Barnaba leh Paul,
Toupa Jesu Khrist min ziak a sih khawk saloute toh, mi telte na kiang ua honsawl hoih ka sa uhi.
Huchi in Judas leh Sila k’on sawl uhi, amau leng hiai thu mah kam in a honhilh ding uhi.
Hiai thu poimawhte ka gelhte uh chih louhngal Kha Siangthou leh koute’n puakgik tuan na tung uah bangmah nga kei le ung hoih ka sa uhi:
Milim biakna sa nek, sa sisan nek leh kingaih tawpsan le uchin ka chi uh; hiaite na tawp uleh nou ading in a hoih ding hi. Damtakin om un” chi in.
Huchi in a sawl un a kuan ua, Antiok khua a tungsuk ua; mipi a samkhawm ua, lai a pia uhi.
Huan a simkhit un lungmuanna thu ziak in a kipak mahmahta uhi.
Judas leh Sila in, zawlnei leng ahi ua, thu tampi in unaute a khamuan ua, a hihkip uhi.
Huan huai ah sawtkhop a om nung un amau sawltakte kiang a pai nawn ding in, unaute’n khamuangtak in a pawtsak nawnta uhi.
Bangteng hileh Sila in bel a kiang ua omtakdih hoih a sa hi.
Paul leh Barnaba bel midang tampite toh Antiok khua ah Toupa thuhilh leh gen in a om nilouh uhi.
Huan ni bangzah hiam nung in Paul in Barnaba kiang ah, “Khoteng a Toupa thu i genna peuh a unau omte vaveh nawn in, a omdan uh va en lehang,” a chi hi.
Barnaba in Johan, Mark a chih uh, a kiang ua tonpih a tuma;
Himahleh Paul in bel aman Pamphilia gam a amau a kiksan a, nasepna a a kiang ua a hohlouh ziak in tonpih hoih a sa kei hi.
Huchi in nakpi’n a kiselta ua, huan a kikhen ua Barnaba in Mark a tonpih a, Kupra tuikulh lam ah long in a paita hi.
Paul in Sila a tel a, unaute’n Toupa hehpihna a kepsak nung un a paikheta uhi.
Huan saptuam pawlte hihkip zel in Suria leh Silisia gam a tawnsuak uhi.
Huchi in Darbi khua leh Listra khua ah leng a hoh a; huai ah nungzui khat a min Timothi a om hi. Amah gingta Juda numei tapa, a pa bel Grik ahi;
Listra leh Ikoniam khua a unau omte’n amah a phat mahmah uhi.
Paul in a kiang a hohsam ding in a deih a; huchi in huai a Juda omte ziak in zek a sumsak a, a pa Grik ahi chih a thei vek uhi.
Khoteng a a paikawm un Jerusalem khua a sawltak leh Upa omte vaihawm zui ding in unaute kiang ah thupiak zuih ding a pe zel uhi.
Huchi in ginna ah saptuam pawlte a kipta ua, niteng in a khang deuhdeuh uhi.
Huan Kha Siangthou in Asia gam a thugen a kham ziak in Phrigia leh Galatia gam a tawnsuakta uhi.
Mysia gam a hong tunnung un, Bithinia gam a lut a tum ua; himahleh Jesu Kha in a phalkei hi.
Huchi in Mysia gam a tawn in Troas khua ah a hohsukta uhi.
Zan in Paul in mengmu bang in Masidonia gam a mi khat ding a, “Masidonia gam ah hong kai inla, hong huh in” chi a thumthum in a mu hi.
Huan huai mengmuhna a neihkhit in a kiang ua Tanchinhoih gen ding in Pathian in a honsam ahi chih kichiantak a thei in, Masidonia gam ah hoh ka tumpah uhi.
Huan Troas khua a kipan long in ka pawt ua, tangtak in Samothrasi khua ah ka pai ua, a zing in Neapoli khua ah ka pai nawn uhi;
huai a kipan in Phillippi khua ah ka pai ua, huai khua tuh Masidonia gam a khua khat Rome khua a mipemte khua ahia, huai uk a khaw poimawh pen ahi. Huai khua ah ni tamsim ka tamta uhi.
Huan khawlni’n kulh kongkhak pawlam ah luigei ah, thumna mun hi a ka gintakna uah ka hoh ua; huan ka tu ua, numei hong paikhawmte kiang ah thu ka gen uhi.
Huan a min Lidia, puan sandup zuak, Thaitira khomi, Pathian bia numei khat in ka thu uh a za a; huan Paul thugen zui ding in Toupa’n a lungtang a hih vaksakta hi.
Amah leh a inkuanpihte’n baptisma a tankhit un, “Toupa a ginom a n’on seh uleh ka inn ah hongtung un” chi in, a hon ngen a, a hon khou hi.
Huan thumna mun a ka hohlai un, nungak kuahiam dawi aisansiam zawl in a hon kituahpih a, aman a aisan ziak in a pute sum tampi a muhsak zel hi.
Huai mi in Paul leh kou a honzui a, “Hiai mite, hotdamna lampi nou honhilhte, tungnungpen Pathian sikha ahi uh” chi in, a kikou hi.
Huchibang in ni tampi a hih hi. Huchi in Paul a lungkimta kei a, a kihei a dawi kiang ah, “Jesu Khrist min in asung a kipan pawt thu ka honpia” a chi hi. Huchi in a hongpawt khepah hi.
Huan a pute’n a summuhna uh a mang chih a theihtak un, Paul leh Sila a man ua, heutute ma ah dawlmun ah a kailut uhi.
Huchi in vaihawmte kiang ah a pi ua, “Hiai mite Judate ahi uh, ka khua uh a hihbuai mahmah uhi;
Rome mite adia kipahpih huailou leh zuih siangloute chindan a gengen uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in mipite sawltakte sual ding in a hong dingkhia ua, vaihawmte’n a puanuh a sahkeksak ua, chiang a satding in thu a pia uhi.
Huan tamvei pi a satkhitun suangkulh ah a khum ua, a vengpa kiang ah bittaka ven ding a chi bikbek uhi.
Huchitel a thu a piak ziak un aman tanna sungnung ah a khum a, a khe uh singkol a bunsak hi.
Himahleh zanlai in, Pathian kiang ah Paul leh Sila a thum ua, la a sa ua, hentate’n a ngaikhia uhi;
Thakhat in zin nakpitak in a hongling a, huchi in suangkulh suangphumte tan in a lingsak a, kongkhak tengteng a kihong paha, saltang chih kolbutte a kiphel vekta hi.
Huan a sungkul vengpa ihmu a honghalh a, suangkulh kongkhakte kihong in a mu a, hentate taimang uh a sa a, a namsau a dok a, a kithat dek hi.
Himahleh Paul, aw ngaihtak in a kikou a, “Bangmah kichih ken, ka vek un hiai ah ka omlai uhi” a chi hi.
Huan suangkul vengpan khawnvakte a zong a, asung a tawmlut in, ling kawm in Paul leh Sila ma ah a khupboh hi;
amaute a pikhia a, “Pute aw, hotdama om ding in bang ahia ka hih ding?” a chi hi.
Huan amau, “Toupa Jesu ging inla, huchi in hotdam in na om ding, nang leh na inkuanpihte toh” a chi uhi.
Amah leh a inn a omteng kiang ah Toupa thu a gen uhi.
Huai zanlai mah in a pikhia a, a satna golhte uh a silsiang a; amah leh a inkuanpihte tengteng in baptisma a tang uhi.
A inn ah a pitou a nekding a lui a, Pathian a gintak ziak un, amah leh a inkuanpihte, a kipak mahmah uhi.
Nisuahin vaihawmte’n, mimante sawl in, “Huai mite khahin” a chi uhi.
Suangkulh vengpan, Paul kiang ah a thu uh a hilh a, “Vaihawmte’n nou khah ding in mi a honsawl uhi; huaiziak in tu’n hongpawt unla, khamuangtak in paita un” a chi hi.

Himahleh Paul in, a kiang uah, “Rome khomi ka hi ngal ua, ka siamna uleh siamlouhna uh theilou in vantang mitmuh in n’on sat ua, suangkulh ah na honkhum ua; tun ah a guk a hon delhkhe dek na hi u maw? A hi kei ding; amau mahmah hong uhenla hong pikhia uhen” a chi hi.
Huchi in mimante’n huai thute vaihawmte kiang ah a hilh uhi. Rome mite ahi uh chih a zakun a lauta uhi;
A vahohin a vakun ua, a pikhia uhi, khua a kipan paimang ding in a deih uhi.
Huan suangkulha kipan a pawt ua, Lidia inn ah a lut uhi: Unaute a muh un, a khamuan ua, a pawtta uhi.
Amphikoli khua leh Appo lonia khua tawn in, Thessalonika khua a tungta uh, huai ah Judate kikhopnain a om hi;
Paul, a dan ngeina bang in, a kiang uah a lut a, khawlni thumvei Laisiangthou a kipan in teltak in a sutpih hi.
Khrist in gimthuak ding him a hihdan leh misi lak a kipan a thounawn ding a hihdan hilhchianin, a hihlang zel hi. “Hiai Jesu, a thu k’on hilh, amah Khrist ahi” chi in a gen behlap hi.
Huchi in a lak ua khenkhat in a gingta ua, Pathian limsak Grik mipi thupitak leh numei makai tampi toh Paul leh Sila a kithuahpihta uhi.
Himahleh gingtalou Judate’n a mullit ua; dawlmun a migilou thadah kuate hiam a kiang uah a tonpih ua, mipi samkhawm in khua pumpi a tokbuai ua, Jason inn a luh ua, vantang kiang a pikhiak a tum uhi.
Amau a muhlouh tak un Jason leh unau dang kuate hiam khaw heutute kiang ah a kailut ua, a kikou ua, “Khovel tokbuai a lumlette hiai ah a hong uhi”
Jason in a na zintun a; hiai mite’n Kaisar vaihawmna kalh in kumpipa dang khat, a min Jesu a om a chi uhi.
Huan mipi leh khaw heutute’n huai thu a zak un a buaita uhi.
Jason leh midangte tatkhiakna ding banghiam a la ua, amau tuh a khahta uhi.
Huan unaute’n a zanzan in Beriah khua ah Paul leh Sila a paisak pah ua; huailai a vatun un Judate kikhopnain ah a lut uhi.
Huai mite Thessalonika khuate sang in a na hoihzaw ua, huchi in lungsim kipaktak in thu a pom ua, a thugen uh a dik leh diklouh theihna ding in niteng in Laisiangthou a zong zel uhi.
Huchi in huaite mi tampi in a gingtata uhi; Grik numei zahtakhuai leh pasalte leng tampi mahmah in a gingtata uhi.
Himahleh Thessalonika khua a Judate’n, Paul in Beriah khua ah Pathian thu a gen chih a zaktak un, huai ah leng a vahoh ua, mipite hanthawn in, a hihbuai nawn uhi.
Huchi in unaute’n tuipi tan a pai ding in Paul a sawlkhia ua, Sila leh Timothi bel huai ah a omtadih uhi.
Paul pitute’n Athen khua tan in a pi ua; Sila leh Timothi kintak a a kiang a hongpai ding a thukhah pua in a paikikta uhi.
Huan Paul in Athen khua a amau a nangak lai in, huai khua milim pathian a dim in a mu a, a lungtang in na a sa mahmah hi.
Huchi in kikhopnain ah Judate leh Pathian limsakte a houlimpih zel a, dawlmun ah leng huai a na om peuhmahte toh niteng in a kihoulim zel uhi.

Huan Epikuria mi leh Stok mi lak a mi pil kuate hiam in leng amah a hong kiselpih uhi. “Hiai mi kamtam in bang ahia gen a tup?” a chi ua, a khen in “Jesu thu leh thohnawnna thu a genziak in gamdang pathiante thugenpa a hihtuak e” a chi uhi.
Amah a len ua, Areopaga ah a honpi ua, a kiang ah, “Hiai sinsakna thak na gengen n’on theisak thei diam?
Thil lamdang banghiam ka bil uah na hontun ahi; huchi in, hiai thil omdan theih ka ut uh” a chi uhi.
Athen khomi tengteng, huai a mikhualte toh, a man peuh ua leh thu thak photphot gen hiam, a ngaikhia ding in a hunte uh a zang zel uhi.
Huchi in Areopaga laitak ah Paul ading a, “Nou Athen khua a mite aw, bangkim ah sabiak limsaktak mi na hi uh chih ka thei hi.
Ka vakkawm a, na biaknate uh ka etlai in, maitam khat, a tung a, ‘Theihlouh Pathian’ ading, chi a kigelh, ka mu ahi. Huchi in theilou a na biak uh, huai thu k’on hilh ahizaw hi, a chi hi.
Pathian khovel leh asung a thil tengteng siampa, lei leh van Toupa a hih ziak in khut a lam inn peuh ah a omkei hi.
Thil tasam bang in mihing khut a nasepsak in leng omkei, amah mah bangkim kiang a hinna, hatna leh thil tengteng pepa ahizaw hi.
Huan leitung maikaih teng a om ding in bul munkhat vek in namchih a siam a, amau ading in hunbi a sehsak a, tenna ding gamgi a khunsak hi.
Aman hon gamlat keimah leh mitengteng in Pathian a zon ua a mai a mai ua, a muh teiteina ding ua a lemgel ahi.
Noumau laphuahsiam kuate hiam in leng, ‘ei leng a suante i hi uh, chi a a genbang un. Amah vang in i hing in i tang in, i om uhi.’
Huchi in ‘Pathian suante i hihnung, Pathian dangkaeng peuh, dangka peuh, suang peuh, mihing khutsiam leh suktuah sekte bang ahi chih i gingta ding uh ahi kei hi.’
Huchi in Pathian in i theihlouh laikhawng a kitheihmohbawl a; himahleh, tun ah zaw gamchih a mi tengteng kisik ding thu a peta hi, ni a chiam ziak in.
Huai ni chiang in Pathian in a miseh zang in dikna in khovel vai a hawm ding; a miseh tungthu amah misi lak a kipan a kaithou in, mitengteng kiang ah a theisakta hi” a chi hi.
Huan misi thohnawnna thu a zaktak un, a khen in a nuihsan ua; a khen in, “Hiai thu na kiang ah ka ngaikhe nawn ding uh” a chi uhi.
Huchi in Paul tuh a lak ua kipan a pawtta hi.
Himahleh mi kuate hiam amah lam ah a pang chinten ua, a gingtata ua, huailak a khenkhat Areopaga mi Dionisia leh numei khat a min Damari leh a kiang ua midangte toh ahi uhi.
Huai thilte zoh in Athen khua a kipan Paul a pawt a, Korinth khua ah a hohta hi.

Huan a min Akuila, Juda khat a mu a, huai mi Pontus gam a piang ahi a, Klaudia in Judate tengteng Rome khua a kipan pawtthu a piak ziak in a zi Priscilla toh Italy gam a kipan hong tungphet ahi uhi. Paul huai mite kiang ah a tungta hi,
A nasep uh kibang a hih ziak in amau a kikoppih in na a semkhawm ua; a nasep uh puanin bawl ahi.
Khawlni teng in kikhopnain ah chitaktakin thu a genzel a, Judate leh Grikte thuzoh a tum hi.
Masidonia gam a kipan Sila leh Timothi a hongsuk un, Paul thugen kia in a omta hi, tua Jesu hi Khrist ahi chih Judamite kiang ah a hilhchian zel hi.
Himahleh a kalh un a gensia ua, Paul in a puan a sing a, a kiang uah, “Na sisan mawh uh noumau lutung ah om hen; kei zaw ka hul ahi; tuban Jentelte kiang ah ka pai ding” a chi hi.
Huan huai a kipan a pai a, a min Titas Justa mi khat inn ah a lut a, huai min Pathian a be zel hi, a inn leng kikhopnain toh a kizom ahi.
Huan Krispus pa kikhopnain heutu in a inkuanpihte tengteng toh Toupa a gingta a, Korinth khua a mi tampi’n leng za in a gingta ua, baptisma a tang uhi.
Zan in Toupa’n Paul kiang ah mengmu bang in, “Lau kenla, dai lou in thu genzel in;
Kei na kiang ah ka om a kei hiam, sihna ding in kuamah in na tung ah khut a khakei ding uhi; hiai khua ah mi tampi ka nei ngal a” a chi hi.
Huan Paul huai ah a lak uah Pathian thuhilh in kum khat leh kha guk a omta hi.
Huan Gallio tuh Akaia gamukpa a hihlai in Judate’n kituakin Paul kalh in buaina a bawl ua, vaihawmna tutphah ma ah a pi uhi.
“Huai mi’n danlou bang in a Pathian be ding in mi a khempuk hi” a chi uhi.
Paul in a dawn dek leh Gallio in, Judate kiang ah, “Judate aw, hiai thildiklou thu hiam, thil hihkhelh thu hiam bek hileh, pellou in k’on awlmoh ding hi;
Himahleh thumalte leh minte, noumau danthu lel zaw noumau kingaihtuah zaw un; ken zaw huchibang thu ngaihtuah ka ut kei” a chi hi.
Huan vaihawmna tutphah a kipan in amau a delhkheta hi.
Huan Grik mi tengteng in kikhopnain heutu Sostheni a man ua, vaihawmna tutphah ma ah a vua uhi. Gallio in a thilhih uh khawk a sa kei hi.

Huaizoh in Paul ni sawttak a tam nilouh a; huai zoh in unaute kampha in a kha a, huai a kipan Suria gam lam ah long in a paita, a kiang ah Priscilla leh Akuila leng a pai sam uhi. Paul in thuchiam a neih ziak in Kenkriai khua ah sam a metphot hi.
Huan Ephesa a tung ua, huai ah amau a nuseta; amah bel kikhopnain ah a lut a, Judate kiang ah chitaktakin thu a sutpih hi.
Huan sawt deuh tam ding in a khou ua, himahleh a ki awi kei hi,
“Pathian in a phal leh na kiang uah ka hong nawn ding” chi in, kampha in a khen a, Ephesa khua a kipan long in a paita hi.
Huan Kaisaria khua ah a hong kai a, Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou a, saptuamte chibai a buk hi; huaikhit in Antiok khua ah a hohsukta hi.
Huan huai a sawtkuam a om nung in a pai nawn a, nungzuite tengteng hihkip in Galatia gam leh Phrigia gam a tawnsuak vek hi.
Huan Judami khat, a min Apollos, Aleksandria khua a piang, mi piltak, Ephesa khua ah a hohsuk a; aman Laisiangthou a nak theih mahmah hi.
Hiai mi’n Toupa Lampi thu zilsa ahi a, lungsim a phatuamngaitak a hih ziak in Toupa thu a hilh zel hi, Johan baptisma thu kia a thei hi.
Kikhopnain ah hangsantak in thu a gen hi. Huchi in Priscilla leh Akuila in a thugen a zak un, a in uah leh a kiang ah Pathian Lampi thu kichian sem in a hilhchianta uhi.
Aman Akhaia gam a paikai a tuptakin unaute’n a hanthawn ua, amah a kipahpihna ding un nungzuite kiang ah lai a gelhsak uhi. Huan a tun in, Pathian hehpihna ziak a gingtate nakpitak in a panpih hi.
Vantang theih in Judate nakpitak in a seldong a, Laisiangthou zang in tua Jesu Khrist ahi chih a theisak hi.
Korinth khua a Apollos a om kal in Paul in saklam gamte tawnsuak masa kawm in, Ephesa khua a tung a, nungzui kuate hiam a mu hi.
Aman a kiang uah, “Na gintak chil ua pan Kha Siangthou na tang uhia?” a chi hi. Amau a kiang ah, “Tanglou, Kha Siangthou a om chih zak leng ka za kei uh,” a chi uhi.
Aman, “Bang baptisma ahia na tan uh?” a chi hi. Amau Johan baptisma, a chi uhi.
Huan Paul in, “Johan in zaw a nung a hong paipa Jesu gingta ding a mite hilh in kisikna baptisma in a baptist zel ahi” a chi hi.
Huan huai thu a zaktak un Toupa Jesu min in baptisma a tang uhi.
Paul in a tung uah a khut a koih a, Kha Siangthou a tung uah a hongtungta hi. Huchi in paute in thu a gen ua; Pathian thu leng a hilhta uhi.
Avek un piching sawmlehnih vel ahi uhi.
Huan Paul kikhopnain ah a lutzel a, kha thum phial hangsantak in thu a gen hi, Pathian lalgam thu gum in a sel a, mi a thuzoh zel hi.
Himahleh a khen a chihmawh ua, a gingta nuam kei ua, mipi ma a Lam a gensiat tak un, aman amaute a paisan a, nungzuite a pituam a, niteng in kisinsakna mun Tairanas ah thu hilh in a sutpih zel hi.
Huchibang ngen in kum nih phial a hih a; huchi in Asia gam a om tengteng, Judate leh Grikte’n leng Toupa thu a zata uhi.
Pathian in Paul khut in thillamdang taktak a hihsak hi.
Huchi in a taksa sukha kinulna puan neu, puan tungsilh damloute kiang ah a hontawi ua, a natnate uh a damzel hi, asung ua kipan dawite leng a pawt uhi.
Huan Judami dawi hawlkhia chi a vakvai dawithu thei kuate hiam in, “Paul in a thu a tangkoupih Jesu Khrist min in k’on vau hi, chi in, dawimatte tung ah Toupa Jesu min a lou uhi.”
Judami siampu lian khat Skeva in huchibang hih tapa sagih a nei hi.
Himahleh dawi in a kiang uah, “Jesu ka gingta hi, Paul leng ka thei hi, nou kuate na hi ua?” a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan dawipai in a boh a, avek un a zou a, a nuaisiahta hi, huchi in huai mipa inn a kipan vuaktang leh liam in a taikheta uhi.
Huchi in Ephesa khua a om tengteng, Judate leh Grikte kiang ah huai mi thu a thangta hi. Huan avek un a lau ua, Toupa Jesu min a lianta hi.
Huan a gingtate leng a khen tampi a hong ua, a thilhih khelhte uh thupha a tawi ua, a kipulak uhi.
Mitkhialdawi hihmi a khen tampi in leng a laibute uh a hontawi khawm ua, mi tengteng mitmuh in a halta uhi; huan a man a sut ua dangka sing nga hi in a thei uhi.
Huchi lawmlawm a thupi in Toupa thu a dalh a, a zouzel hi.
Huan huaikhit in, Paul in Masidonia gam leh Akhaia gam tawtsuak takdih a, Jerusalem khua a hoh a tum hi. “Huai a ka hohkhit chiang in Rome khua ka sik sam ding hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in amah nasepsakte nih Timothi leh Erasta Masidonia gam ah a paisak phot a, amah bel Asia gam ah a tam tadih hi.
Huailai in Lam ziak in mi buai petmah in a buaita uhi.
Mi khat a min Demetrias, dangka siksek a Diana milim bawlpa a om a, khutsiamte ading in kilohna tampi a pia hi.
Hiai mi in amaute a samkhawm a, a nasep bang uh semte toh; huan a kiang uah, “Pute aw, hiai nasepna i hauhna uh ahi chih na thei uhi.

Hiai Ephesa khua kia hilou in, Asia gam khokim teng phial ah leng, Paul in khut a bawl pathiante Pathian ahi kei uh chi in mi tampi thuzoh in, a kiheisak khinta chih noumau ngei in na mu un na za uhi.

Huchi in i nekzonna un a thuak ding chih a lauhuai kia hilou in, pathiannu thupitak Diana biakin leng a hon ngaineu ding uh. Asia gam a mi tengteng leh khovel a min a biak zel uh, a thupipi toh, a neu ding chih a lauhuai hi” a chi hi.
Huai thu a zaktak un, a heh mahmah ua, “Ephesa khua a Diana thupitak ahi” chi in a kikou uhi.
Huchi in a khua in a pumbuai vekta ua, Gaias leh Aristarkhas, Masidonia gam a mi, Paul nungzuite, a man ua, kituaktakin etnop inn ah a taipih kheukhou uhi.
Paul in mipi lak a lut a tup leh nungzuite’n a phalkei uhi.
Asia gam a heutupente lak a khenkhat kuate hiam Paul lawmte ahi ua, a kiang ah mi a sawl ua, etnop inn ah lut teitei lou ding in a kun uhi.
Omkhawmte a buai ua, mi tamzaw in a kikhop san uh leng a theikei uh, khenkhat thukhat in a kikou ua, khenkhat thudang in a kikou uhi.
Mipi lak a mi khenkhat in Alexander a siamna thu gendan ding a hilhta ua, Judate’n amah mailam ah a sawnphei uhi. Huan Alexander in a khut in a zapa, mi tengteng kiang ah a siamna thu gen a tum hi.
Himahleh amah Judami ahi chih a theihtakun, dakkal nih sung aw kituak tak in, “Ephesa khua a Diana thupitak ahi” chi ngen in a kikou uhi.
Huan khosung laigelhpa’n mipi a sukdaih khit in, “Ephesa khua a mite aw, Diana thupitak biakin leh van a kipan a milim kia, Ephesa khuate a kem na hi uh chih, kua ahia theilou om?
Huchi in hiai thu selvual ahihlouh nung in, na daidide ding uh ahi, thunung venglou in bangmah na hih ding uh ahi kei hi.
Hiai mi hiai n’on pite uh, biakin lokmi ahi kei ua, i pathiannu gensete leng ahi kei uh.
Huchi in Demetrias leh a lawm khutsiamte’n leng kua lak ah leng thubuai a neih uleh, thubuai genna innte honsa in a om vele, gam ukpate leng a om uhi; kihek uhen.
Thil dang buaina nei him na hih uleh, kikhopna ngeina ah a lem ding uh.
Tuni a thu vengvung ziak in salh lauhuai in i omta uhi, a thu om ngellou buaina bawl a ngohtheih i hi ngal ua, hiai kikhopna san bangmah gen ding theilou ding i kei uhiam” a chi hi.
Huan huchibang thu a genkhit in omkhawm heutute a kikhenzak sakta hi.
Buaina a vennungin, Paul in nungzuite a samsaka, a hanthawn a, kampha in a kha a, Masidonia gam a pai ding in a pawtta hi.
Thu tampi a nungzuite hanthawn in huai gam a tawnsuaka, Grikte gam a tungta hi.
Huan huai ah kha thum a tam hi. Suria gam a long a zindek kuan in, Judate’n amah thah a sawm ziak un, Masidonia gam tawn a kilehkik a tum zawta hi.
Asia gam tana amah zuite, Pirha tapa Sopater Beriah khomi, Thessalonika khua apan Aristarkhas leh Sekunda te, Darba khomi, Gaias, Timothi leh Asia gam a Tikika leh Trophimas te ahi uhi.
Huaite’n ka ma uh a kai ua, Troas khua ah a hon na ngak uhi.
Kou bel tanghou silngou sohlouh ni a bei in Philippi khua a kipan long in ka pawt ua, ni nga nung in Troas khua ah a kiang uh ka tung uhi; huai ah ni sagih ka tam uhi.
Huan ni sagihni masapen in, tanghou balkham ding a ka kikhoplai un, Paul in a kiang uah thu a gen hi; aman a zingchiang a pai a tup ziak in zankim tanhial thu a gen hi.
Huan indan tungnung ka omkhawmna uah khawnvak tampi a om hi.
Huan a min Eutikas tangval khat tohlet ah a tu a, a na lusu hi. Huan Paul in thu a gen sawttak ziak in aman a ihmut suak a thuakzouta kei a, insawng thumna a kipan in a keta a, a sisa in a phong uhi.
Himahleh Paul a kumsuk a a bohkhum in a angpom a, “Lunglau kei un, a laitat kei lai hi” a chi hi.
Huan Paul a kahtou nawn a, tanghou balkham in an a ne a, sawtpi khovak pha hial in a kiang uah thu khotang a gen a, huai nung in a paita hi.
Huan valnoupa dam in a pi ua, a khamuang petmah uhi.
Huan koute Assos khua zuan in long in ka na pai masa ua, Long ah Paul tuansak ka tum uhi; aman khe a paina lam tot a tup ziak in huchibang tuh amah geldan ahi.
Huan Assos khua a a hontuah chiang in, long ah ka tuangsakta ua, Mitilini khua ka tung uhi.
Huan huai a kipan in long in ka pai nawn ua, a zing in Khios tuikulh zawn ka tung ua; huan a zingnawn in Samo tuikulh ka tung ua, Troguliam ah ka giak uhi. A zingnawn in Mileta khua ka tung nawn uhi.
Huan Paul in Asia gam a omsawt a utlouh ziak in, Ephesa khua long in khen a tupsa him ahi a, a hih theih leh Jerusalem khua ah Pentikost ni huam tum in a kin pai hi.
Huan Mileta khua a kipan in Ephesa khua ah mi a sawl a, saptuam upate a kiang ah a samsak hi.
Huan a kiang a hongtun un, aman a kiang uah, Asia gam ka tot chil ni a kipan na kiang ua ka omsung teng in ka omdan na thei uhi.
Thunuailut pen kawm leh Judate’n hon sawm ziak ua khitui kai leh thilhaksa ka tung a tungte thuakkawm in Toupa na ka sem hi,
Huchibang in a phatuam ding thu na kiang uah bangmah im ka neikei a, vantang lak leh inn teng ah thu k’on hilh zel hi,
Judate leh Grikte kiang ah leng Pathian lam a lungsim ngat thu leh, i Toupa Jesu Khrist lam a ginna thu ka theisak zel hi.
Ngai un, tuin Kha in honsawl teitei a ka theih ziak in, Jerusalem khua a hoh dia kisa ka hi, huai ah ka tung a thil hongtung ding bangmah ka theikei hi;
Kha Siangthou in, henna leh haksatna in nang hon dawn hi, chi in, khaw teng ah a honhilh zel hi, tuate kia ka theih ahi.
Himahleh ka kitaitehna lam ka maban tun ding leh Toupa Jesu kiang a huai nasepna ka muh pen semkhin phot leng, ka hinna leng khiaklah tham in ka sep kei hi.
“Huan thei un, noute tengteng, Pathian lalgam thu tangkoupih a ka vakvaknate’n ka mel na mu nawnta kei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Huaiziak in mi tengteng sisan ah ka hul ahi chih tuni in k’on theisak hi.
Pathian vaihawm tengteng avek in na kiang uah im ka neikei hi.
Pathian saptuamte, amah sisan a a leite, vak ding in noumau leh na heute uh tengteng tung ah pilvang un, Kha Siangthou in a tung uah nou heutu in a honbawl hi.
Ka pai nung in ngehangte na lak uah a honglut ding ua, pawlte a hawikei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Noumau lak a mi nangawn, nungzui pawlte amau lam a kaimang ding in thu tuam gen na hongom ding uhi.
Huaiziak in limsak unla; kum thum hilhial khitui kekawm a, sun leh zan a michih taihilh ka tawplouh dan, theigige un.
Tuin noute Pathian leh a hehpihna ah k’on kemsak hi, tua in noute hon bawllian thei a, mi lungsim siangthoute kiang ah goutan a hon neisak theilai hi.
Kuamah dangka, dangkaeng leh puansilh ka eng ngeikei hi.
Hiai khutte’n keimah leh ka lawmte taksap a sepkhiak zel dan, noumau ngei in na thei uhi.

Bangkim ka hih peuhmah na chin ding ua ka hih ahi, huchibang a semgim leh, Toupa Jesu thu theigige kawm in mihatloute na panpih ding uh ahi; amahmah in, ‘laksang in piak in lukhong a neizaw’ a chih” a chi hi.
Huai thu a genkhit in a khukdin a, avek un a thum uhi.
Huan avek un a kap huphup ua, Paul ngawng ah kawi in a tawp uhi.
A mel a muhnawn taklouh ding thu a gen a lungkhamna pen uh ahi. Huan long pha in amah a va kha uhi.

Huan hichi a honghi a, amaute toh ka kikhen ua, long in ka pawt ua, huaikhit in tangtak in Kos tuikulh ka tung ua, a zing in Rodi tuikulh ka tung nawn ua, huai a kipan in ka pai zel ua, Patara khua ka tung uhi.
Phoinisia gam paiding long khat ka mu ua, ka tuang ua, ka pai zel uhi.
Huan Kupra tuikulh ka mu ua, veilam pang ah ka kheng ua, Suria gam ah ka pai zel ua, Tair khua ah longvan nawnkhiak ding a om manin ka kumphot uhi.
Nungzuite ka zongkhia ua, huai ah ni sagih ka tam uhi; huan Kha theihsak in Paul kiang ah, Jerusalem khua a hohtou lou ding in a chi uhi.
Himahleh huai nite khitin ka pawt ua ka paita ua, unaute’n avek un, a zi a tate utoh khopi pua dong a hongkha ua; tuipi piau ah ka khukdin ua, ka thum uhi.
Huan Mangpha ka kikhak zohun, long ah ka tuang ua, amau bel a inn uah a pai nawnta uhi.
Tair khua a kipan long a ka paikhit un Ptolema khua ka tung ua, unaute chibai ka buk uhi, a kiang uah ni khat ka nituang uhi.
Huan a zing in ka pawt ua Kaisaria khua ka tung ua huai ah Tanchinhoih genpa, Philip inn ah ka lut ua, amah tuh sagihte lak a khat ahi a, a kiang ah ka tam uhi.
Huai mi’n tanu li, nungak siangthou ngen a nei a, amau zawlnei bang in thu a genkhol zel uhi.
Huai ah ni tampi ka tam ua, huailai in Judia gam a kipan a min Agaba zawlnei khat a hongsuk hi.

Ka kiang uah a hong a, Paul kawnggak a la a, a khete, a khutte amah in a kigak a, “Jerusalem khua a Judate’n hichibang in hiai kawnggak neipa a gak ding ua, Jentelte khut ah a pelai ding uhi, Kha Siangthou in a chi” a chi hi.
Huan huai thu ka zaktak un, kou leh huai khua a mite’n Paul Jerusalem khua a hohlou ding in ka khou chiat uhi.
Himahleh Paul in a dawng a, “Bangchi na hi ua, na kahkah uh, n’on khasiatsak uh? Toupa Jesu min ziak in Jerusalem khua a hen kia hilou in, sih leng ngap ka hi” a chi hi.
Huan khouhzoh vual ahihlouh tak in, ka tawpta ua, “Toupa thuthu hi hen aw” ka chi uhi.
Huai nung in ka van uh ka bawl ua, Jerusalem khua ah ka hohtou uhi.
Kaisaria khua a mi nungzuite kuate hiam, ka kiang uah a pai ua, amau, a min Mnason inn, nungzui masa pawl Kupra tuikulh a mi khat ka tunna dingpa uh a pi sam uhi.
Huan Jerusalem khua ka tun un unaute’n nuamtak in a hon na kipahpih uhi.
A zing in Paul toh Jakob kiang ah ka lut ua; huai ah saptuam upate tengteng leng a om uhi.
Paul in amau chibai a buk khit in, a nasepna zang a Pathian in Jentelte lak a thil a hihsak peuhmah avek in a gen hi.
Unaute’n huai thu a zak un Pathian a pahtawi uh; huan Paul kiang ah, “Unaupa, Judate lak a gingtami tamdan na mu a; avek un dan lam ah phatuam a ngailai uhi.

Nang Jentelte lak a Juda omte tengteng kiang ah a tate uh zeksum louh ding leh dan bang a omlouh ding chi in, Mosi dan paihkhiakna ding na thuhilh zel chih mi kam ah na thu a thei vek uhi,” a chi uhi.
Bangchi hita ding ahia le? Na hongtung chih a za ngal ding uhi.
Huaiziak in na kiang a ka gen bang un hih in; thuchiam nei pasal li ka kiang uah a om uhi;

Huai mite pi in la, a kiang uah kisiangsak sam inla, a sam uh a met theihna ding un amau din sum seng in; huchi in mi tengteng in mi kam a na thu a zak teng uh gentham ahi kei chih a thei ding ua, nangmah mah Dan zui in kichiantak in na omzaw chih a thei ding uhi.
Jentelte lak a gingtate thu zaw, milim biakna thil neklam ah, sa sisan nek thu ah, sa heklup neklam ah, kingaihlam a kipan in a kihulsak ding uh ahi, chi in, ka gen ua, ka gelhta uhi” a chi uhi.

Huan a zing in Paul in pasalte a pia, a kiang uah a kisiangsak a, Pathian biakin ah a lut a, amau dia sagoh ding a piaksak chiat masiah kisiansakna ni a neiphot ding uh chih, siampu kiang ah a hilh hi.
Kisiansuahna ni sagih a chin dektak in Asia gam a Judate’n Pathian biakin ah Paul a mu ua, mipi tengteng a hanthawn ua, amah a man ua, a kikou uhi;

“Israel mite aw, hong huh un! Hiai mi, gam teng a mi tengteng kiang a Judamite dante, hiai innte gensepa ahi; huailou leng, Pathian biakin ah Grik mite a lutpih a, hiai in siangthou a hihbuah khin” a chi uhi.
Huai ma in khua ah Ephesa khua a mi Trophimas a kiang ah a mu ua, Paul in huai mi Pathian biakin ah a lutpih a gingta uhi.
Huan a khua in a kising kheukhou ua, mite a taikhawm ua; Paul a man ua, Pathian biakin a kipan a kaikhia ua; kongkhakte a khakpah ngal uhi.
Amah hihlup a tup laitak un Jerusalem khua a mi tengteng a buai uh chih sepaih pawl heutu lianpen kiang a tungtou hi.
Aman sepaihte leh sepaih za heutute a pipah a, a kiang uah a taisuk uhi; heutu lianpen leh sepaihte a muhtak un Paul vuak a tawpta uhi.
Sepaih heutu lianpen in a honnaih a, Paul a len a, khainiang nih butsak ding thu a pia a; kua ahia a hih a bang ahia a hih a dong hi.
Mipite a khen thukhat in a kikou ua, a khen thu dang in a kikou ziak un, buaina ziak diktak a theikei a, kulh a pilut thu a pia hi.
Paul kalbi a tunlai in mipi a hiamgam ziak un sepaihte’n amah a pumzawn uhi;
Mitengteng in, “Hih mangthang un” chi a kikou in, a zui uhi.
Sepaihte’n kulhsung a a pilut deklai un Paul in, sepaih heutu lianpen kiang ah, “Na kiang ah thu kamkhat ka gen thei diam?” a chi hi.
Huan aman, “Grik pau na thei maw? Tuma a mite hanthawn a, gamdai mun a mihing sang li suam a thatte heutupa Aigupta mi na hi kei maw?” a chi hi.
Paul in, “Silisia gam a Tarsa khua a om Judami ka hi, khopi neu liailou khat khua leh tui ka hi; hon hehpih inla, mi tengteng kiang ah thu hon gensak in” a chi hi.
Huan a lemsaktakin kalbi ah Paul ading a, mi tengteng daihna ding in a khutvan a; huan a daih duam tak un Hebru pau in a kiang uah thu a gen hi.
“Unaute aw, pate aw, tun ah na kiang uah ka siamna thu k’on hilh ding hi, ngaikhia un, a chi hi.
Huan Hebru pau in a kiang uah thu a gen chih a zaktak un, a dai nawnsem ua; huan aman:

“Judami ka hi a, Silisia gam a Tarsa khua a piang ka hi. Himahleh hiai khua ah Gamaliel khebul a zila khanglian ka hi, i pipute Dan omdan kimtak zilzel a om ka hia, tuni a noumau tengteng bang in Pathian ading a phatuam ka ngaisam hi.
Hiai Lam a mite that hial khop in ka sawizela, numei pasal ka hen a, suangkulh ah ka khumsak hi.

Siampu Lianpen leh upate tengteng in leng huai thu hon theihpih ua, amau a kipan in leng unaute piak ding in lai ka mu hi, huan Damaska khua a omte sawi ding leh hensa a Jerusalem khua a pi ding in ka hoh hi.
“Huan hichi a honghi a, ka pai a Damaska khaw kiang ka tun in, sunlai in, thakhat in van a kipan vak thupitak ka kim ah a hongvak hi.
Huan lei ah ka puk a, ka kiang ah, Saul, Saul, nang bang a chia honsawi? chi in aw ka za hi.
Huan ken Toupa kua na hia? chi in, ka dong hi. Aman ka kiang ah, Nazaret Jesu na sawi ka hi, a chi hi.
Ka lawmte’n vak a mu ua, hon houpihpa aw a za kei uhi.
Ken, Toupa, bang ka hihdia? ka chi a. Toupa’n ka kiang ah, thou inla, Damaska khua ah lut in, thil tengteng na hihding a chih peuhmah a honhilh ding uh, a chi hi.
Huan huai vak thupi ziak in khua ka mu theita kei a, ka lawmte’n khut in a honkai ua, Damaska khua ah ka lutta uhi.
“Huan mi khat, Ananias Dan lam a Pathian limsak leh huai a Judate tengteng lak a min hoih,
amah a hong a ka kiang ah ading a, ‘Unau Saul, mitvakna nei in,’ a honchi hi. Huaitak in amah ka mu theita hi.
Aman i pipute Pathian in a deihlam thei ding in hondeih a, Diktatpa hon musak a, a kamsuak za ding a honsep ahi, a chi hi.
Na muh leh na zak thu ah mitengteng kiang ah amah thu theihpihpa na hi ding.
Huan bangdia om maimai na hia? Thou inla, amah min in baptisma tang inla, na khelhna hihsiang tanla, a honchi hi.
“Jerusalem khua a ka pai nawn nung in, Pathian biakin a ka thum lai in, mengmu bang in ka om hi.
Huan kin inla, Jerusalem khua a kipan pawt in; ka tanchin na gen ding a pomtuak kei uh a hon chihlai ka mu hi.
Huan ken, Toupa kikhopnain teng a nang gingta peuhmah ka hentasak a, ka vuak zel dan a thei uhi.
Huan na thu theihpihpa Stephen sisan a suahlai un kei leng a kiang uah ka ding a, a sihding lem ka nasa a, a hihlumte puante leng ka nakem hi, ka chi hi.
Huan aman, pai in, hiai a kipan in gamla tak a Jentelte kiang ah k’on sawl ding ahi, a hon chita hi, a chi hi.
Huan huai thutan in a ngaikhia ua; aw ngaihtak in a kikou ua, “Mi hichibang hingtak ahi kei, khovel a kipan hih mangthang un” a chi uhi.
A kikou ua a puan uh a lem ua, a pai ua, leivui a vik uhi,
huchi in sepaih heutu lianpen in Paul kulhsung a pilut thu a pia a, a tung ah huchitel a a kikouna uh a theihna ding in vuak kawm a dottel ding, a chi hi.
Savun khau a a leh hensawm khit un, Paul in a kiang a ding sepaih zaheutu kiang ah, “Siamlouh tansak louh Rome mi vuak ding dan toh kituak hia?” a chi hi.
Sepaih zaheutu in huai a zaktak in, sepaih heutu lianpen kiang ah a hoh a, “Na thilhih ding pilvang dih aw; hiai mi Rome mi a na hi” a chi a, a hilh hi.
Sepaih heutu lianpen a hong a, a kiang ah, “Rome mi na hi maw? honhilh in” a chi hi.
Aman “Hi e” a chi hi. Sepaih heutu lianpen in, “Hiai khomi hihna ken sum tampi a ka lei ahi” chi in, a dawng hi. Paul in, “Kei zaw Rome mi a piang him ka hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in, dottel tumte’n amah a paisan pah ngal ua; sepaih heutu lianpen in Rome mi ahi chih a theih in a kihta a, a hen ziak in a lau hi.

A zing in Judate’n bangziak a Paul a hek uhiam chih theihtel tum in, sepaih heutu lianpen in amah a phel a, siampu liante leh vaihawm tengteng kikhop ding thu a pia a, Paul pisuk in, a ma uah a dingsak hi.
Paul in vaihawmte a en kilkel a: “Unaute aw, tunitan in Pathian mitmuh a hoihlam a ka theih peuhmah hih in ka om hi” a chi hi.
Huan siampu lianpen Ananias in, Paul kiang a dingte kiang ah, a kam betsak ding in thu a pia hi.
Paul in a kiang ah, “Nang bang nuhngou bang lelpa, Pathian in a honbeng zaw ding hi, nang Dan bang a vaihawm ding a tu a, Dan lou bang a mibet ding na chi vial maw?” a chi hi.
Huan a kiang a dingte’n, “Pathian siampu lianpen bangdia tai?” a chi uhi.
Paul in, “Unaute aw, siampu lianpen ahi chih ka theikei a ahi; na chipihte tung vaihawmte tung ah thu hoihlou gen ken, chih gelh ahi ngal a” a chi hi.

Paul in a khen Saddukaite, a khen Pharisaite ahi uh chih a theih in vaihawmte lak ah a kikou a, “Unaute aw, Pharisai ka hi, Pharisai tapa leng ka hi; misi lametna leh thohnawnna thu ah vaihawmte mai a dinsak a om ka hi” a chi hi.
Huai a gentakin, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite a nakisel ua, vaihawmte a kilangta uhi.
Saddukaite, misi thohnawnna a omkei, angelte, khate leng a om tuankei, a chi uhi; Pharisaite’n huai tegel a om chih a gen uhi.

Huai thu in nakpitak in a buaita uhi; Pharisaite lam a mi laigelhmite khenkhat ading ua; a sel ua, “Hiai mi bangmah a gitlouhna i mu kei uhi; Kha hiam Angel hiam in a kiang a thugen hileh eite Pathian dou suak ding ihi uh” a chi uhi.
Huan kituahlouhna lianpi a hongom tak in, sepaih heutu lianpen in Paul a bohzan uh a lau a, sepaihte kiang ah, a va hohsuk a, a lak ua kipan kulh a va pitou teitei ding a chi hi.
Huan a zanin “Toupa Paul kiang ah ading a, “Khamuangtak in om in, Jerusalem khua a ka thu na theihsak bang in Rome khua ah leng na theisak ding hi,” a chi hi.
Huan ni a suah in Judate a panghuan ua, Paul a thah masiah uh bangmah ne a dawnlou ding in a kichiamta uhi.
Huai thubawlte sawmli sang a tamzaw ahi uhi.
Amau siampu liante leh upate kiang ah a hoh ua, “Paul ka thah masiah uh bangmah chiamlou ding in ka kichiam uh a chi uhi.

Huaiziak in, nou vaihawmte toh a thu kichian nawnsem a ngaihtuah tum bang in, na kiang ua pekhe ding in sepaih heutu lianpen kiang ah a hem deuh in va gentou un; na kiang nai uh a tunma in kou amah that ding in ka mankhin uhi” a chi uhi.
Himahleh Paul sanggam nu tapa in a thusawm uh a naza a, kulh ah a valut a, Paul a vahilhta hi.
Paul in sepaih zaheutu khat a sam a, “Hiai tangval sepaih heutu lianpen kiang ah pi in, a kiang ah thu banghiam gending nei a hihtuak” a chi hi.
Huchi in sepaih heutu lianpen kiang ah a pi a, “Paul, hentapa’n, honsama, hiai tangval na kiang a honpi ding in a honsawla, na kiang ah thu banghiam gen ding a nei a hihtuak” a chi hi.
Sepaih heutu lianpen in a khut in a len a, a simin a tuam paipiha, “Bang ahia honhilh ding na neih?” chi in a dong hi.
Aman, “Paul thu kichian nawnsema na ngaihtuah ding mah bang in, zingchiah vaihawmte kiang ah pisuk ding in Judate’n honnget hoih a sa chiat uh.

Himahleh a thu uh na gingta ken; a lak ua mi sawmli sang a tamzaw in thah a sawm ua, huai mite’n amah a thah masiah uh bangmah ne a dawn lou ding in a kichiam uh; tuin na thu ngakin mansa in a om uhi” a chi hi.
Sepaih lianpen in tangval a paisaka, “Hiai thute n’on theisak chih kuamah hilh ken” a chi bikbek hi.
Huan sepaih zaheutu nih a sam a, “Zan ihsip hun in Kaisaria khaw pha a pai ding in sepaih za nih toh, sakol tungtuangmi sawmsagih toh, teitawimi za nih toh bawl un, a chi hi.
Gamukpa Felik kiang bita a tunsak theihna ding in Paul a tuanna ding un sakol na bawl ding in leng” a chi hi;
Huan hichibang in lai a gelhta hi.
“Klaudia Lisia in Felik Gamukpa hoihpa chibai a buk hi.
Hiai mi Judate’n a mu ua, a thah deklai un a kiang uah sepaihte pi in ka hoh a, Rome mi ahi chih ka theih in ka honkheta hi.
Huan a hekna uh theih ut in, vaihawmte kiang ah ka pisuk hi,
huchi in a danthu uh banghiam a hek ahi chih ka thei a, himahleh a hekna thu uah sihna leh henna ding bangmah ka theikei hi.
Huan Judate’n amah a tang uh chih min a hon theihsaktak un, na kiang ah amah k’on sawl ngal ahi, a hekte leng a tung a thubuai a neih peuh uh na ma a gen ding in thu leng ka pia hi” a chi hi.
Huchi in sepaihte’n a thupiak bang in Paul a zanzan in a pi ua, Antipatri a tunpih uhi.
Huan a zing in sakol tungtuangmite a kiang a pai zel ding in a kiksan ua, kulh ah a hoh nawnta uhi;
Huan amau Kaisaria khua a tung ua, Gamukpa kiang ah lai a pia ua, Paul leng a ma ah a dingsak uhi.
Gamukpa’n a simkhit in, Paul omna gam a dong hi. Huan Silisia gam a ahi chih a theih in,
“Nang hon hekte a hongtun chiang un na thubuai ka ngaihtuah ding” a chi hi. Herod thukhenna inn a vending thu a pia hi.
Huan ni nga nung in siampu lianpen Ananias a hong tungsuk a, Upa kuate hiam toh, a min Tertulla thugensiam khat toh; Paul tung a thubuai Gamukpa kiang ah a gen uhi.
Paul a sapkhiak nung un Tertulla in amah a hek pan a:
“Felik hoihpen, nangmah vanga khamuang petpet a ka om ziak un leh n’on kepna ziak a hiai chite ading a giloute kham hoih a om zel ziak in,
Chiklaipeuh in koipeuh ah leng lungkimtakin ka pom gige uhi.
Abang abang hitaleh, nang adia chimtakhuai hih ka ut kei hi, na migitna in thu kamkhat ahihleh hon ngaihkhiak sak ding in k’on ngen hi.
Hiai mi huathuai pi, khovel a Judate tengteng tokbuaipa leh, Nazarit mite pawl a a makaipen khat uh a hih ka thei uhi.
Pathian biakin hihbuah leng a tuma; huaiziak in ka man uhi,

Ka dan bang ua a tung a vaihawm tum hi ung a, himahleh sepaih heutu lianpen Lisia hong kuan a, ngongtat kawm in amah ka khut ua kipan a lamang a, a tung a thubuai neite na kiang a hongpai ding in thu a pia hi.
Nangmah ngei in amah dongtel in ka hekna tengteng uh na theithei ding hi” a chi hi.
Huan Judate’n leng huai thu huchibang ahi, chi in, a panpih uhi.
Huan Gamukpa’n thugen ding a Paul khut a a zaptakin:
“Aman nang kum tampi hiai chite vaihawmsakpa na hih ka theih ziak in kipaktak in ka siamna thu ka gen ding ahi.
Jerusalem khua a Pathian be ding a ka hohtouh nung ni sawmlehnih a val naikei ding chih nana thei ding hi.
Pathian biakin ah leh kikhopnain ah leng khua ah leng kuamah ka sel leh mipi ka hanthawn amau zong a hon mu kei uh.
Tun ah leng a honhekna thu uh na theih in a bul a suikhe theikei ding uh.
Himahleh hiai thu na kiang ah ka genkhe ding, Dan leh zawlneite thugelh tengteng gingta in, Lam dan, pawl tuam a chihte uh bang in ka pipute uh Pathian ka be zel hi.
Mi diktatte leh diktatloute thohnawnna a om ding chih Pathian ah ka lamen a, hiai khawngte’n leng huai tuh a gingta sam uhi;
Tua ziak in Pathian leh mihing tung a hihkhiallou ding in sialehpha siangtak nei ding in ka kibawl gige hi.
Huan kum tampi nung in ka chipihte kiang ah thilpiak ding leh thillat ding hontawi in ka honghi.
Huai thil ka piaklai in, Asia gam a kipan Judami khenkhatte’n Tempul ah mipi panglou leh buaina omlou a, Pathian biakin ah kisiangsak in a honmu uhi.
Hiai mite’n ka tung a thubuai nei hile uh na ma ah hongpai in a hong hekkhinta ding uhi.
Ahihkeileh hiai mite ngei in vaihawmte ma a ka din lai in, ka hihkhelh bang ahia a muh uh, gen uhen.
Hiai thu kam khat ziak houh a hih kei ngal leh, a lak ua ding in, Misi thohnawnna thu ah tuni’n na ma uah salhin ka om ahi, ka chih a chi a, a dawng hi.
Huan Felikin Lam thu a theihchet ziak in, “Sepaih heutu lianpen Lisia a hong tunsuk hun chiah na thu uh ka lem ding” chi in, a koih tadih hi.
Sepaih zaheutu kiang ah, Paul zalentak leh a lawmte a hongveh leh nektak a bawlsak utte khamlou a, vensak ding in thu a pia hi.
Huan ni bangzah hiam nung in Felik a hong nawn a, a zi Drusilla Judanumei toh, Paul a samsaka, Khrist Jesu ginna thu a ngaikhia hi.
Paul in diktatna thu, kidek thu, thukhen vaihawmna hongtung dingte a suipih detdet lai in, Felik in lauhuai a sa mahmah a, “Pai nawn phot inla, hunlem ka neih hun chiang in k’on sam ding” a chi hi.
Paul in dangka a piak peuh a lamen a, huaiziak in a sam mun sim a, a houpih zihzeh hi.
Himahleh kum nih a kivei sung in Porsia Festa in Felik a hon khengta hi; Felik in Judate lak a minhoih deih in, Paul hensa in a nuseta hi.
Huchi in Festa in gamukna a lak in; ni thum nung in Kaisaria khua a kipan Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou hi.
Siampu liante leh Juda makaite’n a kiang ah Paul tungtang thu a selam in a na theisak uhi.
Jerusalem khua a pitouh sak ding in hehpihna leng a na ngen ua; lampi a na buka thah a tum uhi.
Himahleh Festa in, “Paul Kaisaria khua a kep ding leh amah leng huailam a ka hohpah ding.” a chi hi.
Huaiziak in “Huai mi’n gitlouhna nei ahihleh na lak ua thunei peuhmah in hon zuisuk in honghek uhen” chi in, a dawng hi.
A lak ua ni sawmval a tam nung in, Kaisaria khua ah a paisuka; a zing in thukhenna tutphah a tuin, Paul honpi ding in thu a pia hi.
Paul a hongtun phet in, Jerusalem khua kipan Juda hongsukte a kim ah ading ua, suikhiak vuallouh ding thubuai tampi giktak tak a gen uhi.
Paul in a siamna thu a gen a, “Judate Dan hi in Pathian Biakin thu hi in, Kaisar tung ah leng bangmah hihkhelh ka neikei” a chi hi.
Himahleh Festa in Judate lak a min hoih a deihman in Paul kiang ah, “Jerusalem khua a hohtouha, huailai a ka ma a hiai thute lepsak na deih hia?” chi in a dong hi.
Paul in, “Kaisar thukhenna tutphah ma a, vaihawmsak a om ding in ka ding hi. Judate tung ah thil bangmah ka hihkhial kei chih nangmah in leng na theichian mahmah hi.

Migilou ka hih a, sihna khophial khelhna ka hihleh, sih leng ka nial kei; himahleh hiaite honhekna a bul bangmah a omkei leh, kuamah in a kiang uah hon pekhe theikei ding. Kaisar kiang ah ka tun ding” a chi hi.
Huan Festa in a vaihawmpihte a houlimpih kimvel nung in, “Kaisar kiang ah thu natuna: Kaisar kiang ah na pai mahmah ding” chi in a dawng hi.
Ni bangzah hiam nung in kumpipa Agrippa leh Barnisi Kaisaria khua a hongtung ua, Festa chibai a buk uhi.
Huaia ni tampi a tam ziak un Festa in Paul thubuai kumpipa kiang ah a gen a, “Felik in mitang kuahiam a nusia hi
Jerusalem khua a ka omlai in siampu liante leh Juda upate’n a tungtang thu a honhilh ua, siamlouh tansak a hon ngen uhi.
Ken amaute kiang ah, a hekpa uleh a hekte a kimaituah ua, a hekna thu ua a siamna thu genna hunlem a neih ma in, mi kuahiam thah ding a piakkhiak Rome mite dan ahi kei hi, chi in, ka dawng hi.
Huchi in hiai lai ka hongtun un, sawt hallou in a zing in thukhenna tutphah ah ka tu a, huai mi tuh honpi ding in thu ka pia hi.
A hekte a dinlai un, ka muanmoh dan ngohna a tung ah gitlouhna thubuai a genkei uhi.
A sabiak thu ua, Jesu, mi khat sisa, Paul in a hingnawn ahi, chi a a gup ziak in a tung ah thubuai a nei uh a na hi zaw hi.
Ken huai thute ngaihtuah ding dan ka theikei a, Jerusalem khua a hoh a, huailai a huai thu lepsak a ut leh utlouh ka dong hi.
Himahleh Paul in Kumpipa lepdia sit a ngen zawta hi. Huaiziak in Kaisar kiang a ka hohsak theih masiah veng ding in thu ka pia hi” a chi hi.
Huan Agrippa in Festa kiang ah, hiai mi thu keimahmah in zak ka ut gige ahi, a chi hi. Aman, zingchiah a thugen na ngaikhe ding, a chi hi.
Huchi in a zing in Agrippa leh Barnisi thupitak in a hong ua, thugenna in ah a lut ua, sepaih heutuliante toh, khua a milian deuhte toh; huan Festa thu in Paul a pilut sak uhi.

Huan Festa in, “Kumpipa Agrippa leh hiai lai a om tengtengte aw, hiai mi na muh uh ahi, a tungtang thu a Judate tengteng in, hingtak nawnlou ding chi a kikou a, Jerusalem khua leh hiai lai a ka kiang a a hek uh ahi.
Himahleh sihna ding khop bangmah ahihkei chih ka thei hi. Huan aman Kumpipa kiang a tut a tup ziak in sawl ka tum ahi;

Himahleh a thu ginatakin bangmah gelh ding ka theikei hi. Huaiziak in na ma uah k’on pikhia hi, Kumpipa Agrippa nangmah ma a honpi tuanse ka hi a, etchet nung in banghiam bek gelh ding ka muh theihna ding in.
Hekna kiteltak omloupi a henta kuahiam Kumpipa kiang a sawl thil haihuai hi in ka thei hi” a chi hi.
Huaizoh in Agrippa in Paul kiang ah, “Na siamna thu na genthei hi, a chi hi. Huan Paul in a khutvan a, a siamna thu a gen hi.
“Kumpipa Agrippa, Judate’n a hon hekna tengteng uah ka siamna thu gen ding a tuni a na ma a ka din theih hampha ka kisa hi.
Judate tawndan leh pupa ngeinate theisiam leh pil mahmah na hih ziak in ka kipak tuanse hi. Huaiziak in thuakzou tak in ka thugen hon ngaihkhiak sak ding in k’on ngen hi.
“Ka tuailai hun a kipan ka chipihte lak leh Jerusalem khua a ka omdan Judate tengteng in a thei uhi.
A tung a kipan ka tanchin theite ahi ua, huchi a ka sabiak dan ua ngentel pen a khosa Pharisai ka hih dan a ut ua leh a hon genpih thei uhi.
Pathian in ka pipute uh kiang a thu a chiam lametna ziak in hiai ah tuin vaihawmsak in ka ding hi.
Huai thuchiam lametna ziak in ka nam uh sawmlehnih in, sun leh zan in Pathian na phatuamngai tak a sem in muh a lamen uhi. Kumpipa aw, huai lametna tungthu ah Judate’n a hon hek uhi.
Pathian in misite a kaithou ding chih bangchidan a thil hitheilou a ngaihtuah na hi ua?
“Kei mahmah in Nazaret Jesu min kalh a hihtheih teng hih thil hoih in ka na ngaihtuah hi.
Huai bang Jerusalem khua ah leng ka hih zel hi; siampu liante kiang a thu mu in, misiangthoute lak a mi tampi suangkulh ah ka khum zel hi; a hihlup lai un lemsa lam ah leng ka na pang zel hi.
Huan kikhopnain teng ah ka sawi gige a, Jesu thu gensiatsak ka tum teitei hi. Huan a tung uah ka gilou mahmah a, gamdang khua tanpha in leng ka sawi zel hi.
“Huchibang a hih ding in siampu liante thu mu in leh a sawlna lai uh tawi in Damaska khua ah ka hoh hi.
Kumpipa aw, huchi a ka pailai in sunlaitakin, nivak sang a vakphazaw van a kipan in keimah leh ka paipihte kim ah hongvak ka mu hi.
Ka vek un lei ah ka puk ua, Hebru pau in, Saul, Saul, nang bang a chia honsawi? Sutna chiangzum tot nang dia na ahi, chi in ka za hi.
Ken Toupa, kua na hia? ka chi hi. Toupa’n, na sawi, Jesu ka hi a chi hi.
Himahleh thou inla ding in; hiai na thilmuhte leh na kiang a k’on lahlai dingte semding leh theihpih dia sikha a nang honbawl ding in na kiang ah ka hong kilak ahi;
Mitengteng leh ka honsawlna mite, Jentelte khut a kipan k’on humhing ding hi;

A mit uh hihvak ding in a kiang uah k’on sawl ahi, huchi in mial apan vaklam a nga ding ua, Setan thuneihna Pathian lam a ngatsan ding uhi, khelhna ngaihdamna a muhna ding uleh a hon gintak ziak ua sehtuam siangthoute lak a goutan a neihna ding un, a chi hi.
“Huaiziak in kumpipa Agrippa aw, van a kilakna ka selkei hi,

A tung in Damaska khua a mite kiang ah, huan Jerusalem khua a te kiang ah, Judia leh gamchih a mite kiang leh Jentelte kiang ah leng kisik minpu a thilhih a kisik a, Pathian lam a ngatna ding un ka hilhzaw hi.
Huaite ziak in Judate’n Pathian biakin ah a hon man ua, hon hihlup a tum uhi.

Himahleh Pathian kiang a kipan a panpihna ka muh ziak in tunitan in mi neute leh mi liante kiang a thu theisak in ka omlai hi, zawlneite leh Mosi in hongtung ding a chih thu kia uh loungal thu dang genlou in.
Huchi a, Khrist in gim a thuak ding a, misi lak a kipan a thohnawn ziak a mi tengteng kiang leh Jentelte kiang a vak musakpa masapen ahi ding a chih thu uh, a chi hi.
Huchibang a a siamna thu a genlai in, Festa in, aw ngaihtak in, “Paul, hai na hi; na theih tamna in nang hon haisak hi” a chi hi.
Himahleh Paul in, Festa hoihpen, “Hai kei veng e; thu diktak leh thu piltak ka genzaw ahi.
Hiai thute kumpipa’n a thei vaw oi, a kiang ah leng laulou in ka gen hi; hiai thil bangmah a kiang ah im ahi kei chih diktak in ka thei hi. Hiai thu inkil kawm peuh a a guk a hih ahi kei hi.
Kumpipa Agrippa, zawlneite na gingta hia? Na gingta chih ka thei” a chi hi.
Agrippa in Paul kiang ah, “Sawtlou chik sung in Khristian n’on suaksak zoudek” a chi hi.
Paul in, “Sawt in sawt kei leh, nang kia ka chi kei, tuni a ka thu za tengteng leng keimah bang a om ding in Pathian kiang ah ka ngen ahi, kolbun tuanse lou in” a chita hi.
Huan kumpipa toh, gamukpa toh, Barnisi toh, a kiang ua tute toh ading chiat uhi;
A paituam ua a kihou ua, “Hiai mi’n sihna leh kolbutna khop hial thil bangmah a hih kei” a chi uhi.
Agrippa in Festa kiang ah, “Hiai mi’n Kaisar kiang a tut ding na chikei leh pawt mai ding hiven” a chi hi.
Italy gam a long a pai ding thu a hihpuk tak un, Paul leh henta dang kuate hiam Augusta pawl a sepaih zaheutu a min Julia a kemsak uhi.
Huan Adramittium khaw long, Asia gam tuipi piau a khaw omte tawn ding ah ka tuang ua, tuipi ah ka paita uhi; Masidonia gam a mi Aristarkhas, Thessalonika khaw mi ka kiang uah a om hi.
A zing in Sidon khua ka tawn uhi. Julia in Paul a limbawl ngial a, kihihhalh ding in a lawmte kiang ah a pawtsak hi.
Huai a kipan in tuipi ah ka pai nawn ua, huih in a hilou lam a honmut ziak in Kupra tuikulh zul huih hatlouhna lam ah ka tai uhi.
Silisia gam leh Pamphilia gamzul tuipi ka khennung un, Lidia gam a Mira khua ka tung uhi.
Huai ah sepaih zaheutupa’n Aleksandria khaw long Italy gam tawn ding a mu a; huai ah ahon tuangsak hi.
Ni tampi, awlawl in ka pai ua, Knidas khaw zawn haksapi in ka tung teitei ua, huih in hon sawnkik ziak in Salmoni zuan in Krit tuikulh zul huih hatlouhna lam ah ka tai uhi.
Haksatak in tui geigei ah ka pai ua, Long khawlna Kilawm a chih mun uh ka tungta uhi; huai kiang ah Lasia khua a om hi.
Huan ni tampi a beitak ziak in leh long a pai a lauhuai ziak in, Anngawlni a khengta ngal a, Paul in amau a thuhilh a, a kiang uah,
“Pute aw, tua long a tuangte siatna leh manthatna thupitak i tung ua tung ding ahi chih ka thei a, a sum leh long tung ah kia ka chi kei a, eimah tung ah leng ka chi ahi” a chi hi.
Himahleh sepaih zaheutu in Paul thugen sang in longpu leh long neipa thu a gingta zaw hi.

Phalbi douna ding in longkhawlna a ginat louh ziak in a tamzaw in huai a kipan a tuipi a paikhiak a, Phinisi khua tun teitei a, huailai a phalbi dou a sawmpih ua; Phinisi tuh Krit tuikulh a longkhawlna khat ahi, malsak leh simsak lam ahi.
Sim huih awlawl a a hong nuntakin a deihlam uh mu a kisa ua, sikkip a khai khia ua, Krit tuikulh zulzul ah ka pai uhi.
Himahleh sawtlou nung in gam lam a kipan in huih hattak a hong nungsukta a, huai huih tuh Euroklidon a chi zel uhi.
Long a hon mutkhata a, huihlam a ngat theihlouhtakin ka khahta ua, hon mutleng hon mutlengta hi.
Kauda tuikulh neuchik petmah pansan in huih hatlouhna lam ah ka tai ua, haksatak in long neu ka bitsak thei uhi;
A kaihkhiak nung un panpihna khaute khong a zang ua, long nuailam ah vialkawm in a khih uhi. Puanzakna bangkim a puksak ua, huchilou in zaw Sirti a lenlut a lau ua, huchi in a hon mutleng lengta hi.
A zing in, tuikihawt in honsep ek ziak in, long a vante tui lak ah a paikheta uhi.
Huan a ni thumni in, amau khut in long vante a paikhe nawnta uhi.
Huan ni tampi ni leh aksi leng a kimu kei a, huihpi hat petmah in honnuai a, hin himhim ka lamen nawn kei uhi.
Huan an nelou a sawttak a om nung un, Paul a lak uah ading a, “Pute aw, Krit tuikulh a kiphellou dia, ka thuman a, hiai siat leh manthatna tuahlouh ding hizen a.
Himahleh tun ah leng khamuangtak a om ding in k’on hanthawn hi. Na lak uah kuamah in hinna na mangsak kei ding uh, long zaw a mangthang ding.
Amah Pathian a ka hih a a nna leng ka sep, amah angel tuzan in ka kiang ah a hongdinga, ka kiang ah,
“Paul, lau ken, Kaisar ma ah na ding ding. Ngai in, long a na kiang a zin tengteng leng Pathian in a honpia hi, a honchi hi.
Huaiziak in Pute aw, khamuangtak in om un, Pathian ka gingta hi, honhilh bang in a om ding hi.
Himahleh bang tuikulh hiam ah hon lenkhe ding ahi” a chi hi.
Zan sawmlehli a chin zan in Adria tuipi ah huih in a langlang ah a hon mutleng leng lai hi. Zankim lai in, long mite’n koi gam hiam tungdek in a kithei uhi;
Huchi in tui thukdan a teh ua, lam sawmnih in a thei ua, huan sawtlouchik in a tehnawn ua, lam sawmlehnga in a thei uhi.
Huan longmei lam ah sikkip li a khia ua, huchilou in zaw suang se mun ah hon lenkhe zenzen kha ding chih a lau ua; huan khovak kal a ngaklahta uhi.
Huan longmite’n long malam a sikkipte khiak ding bawl a kineih in longneu tuh tuipi ah a khia ua long taisan a tum uhi.
Hiai lai in Paul in, sepaih zaheutu leh sepaihte kiang ah, “Hiaite long a om gige kei uleh a bit kei ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi in sepaihte’n longneu khaute a at tat ua, a khahta uhi.
Khovak kuan in, Paul in an ne ding in mi tengteng a sawl a: Tuni ni sawmlehli ahita, bangmah nelou in na om ua, an na ngawl nilouh uhi.
Huaiziak in, an ne ding in k’on sawl chiat ahi; na damna ding uhi; na lak uah kuamah a samzang khat leng a mangthang kei ding” a chi hi.
Huai thu a genkhit in tanghou a la a, Pathian kiang ah kipahthu a genkhit in, mi tengteng ma ah a balkham a, a ne panta hi.
Amau leng khamuangtak in a om ua, an a ne samta uhi.
Long a mite kavek un za nih leh sawmsagih leh guk ka hi uhi.
An a nekkham khit un, buh tuipi ah a pai ua, long a hihzang deuh uhi.
Huan ni a suah in, koilai gam ahia chih a theikei ua; himahleh, koilai longkhawlna hiam piautak nei khat a mu ua, huai tung ah a hih theih uleh long taikhiak sak a tum uhi.
Huan sikkip khihnate a attat ua, tuipi ah a nusia ua; tua lai mah in kaihheina khihnate a phel ua, malam puanzak huih mut ding dan in a kaitou ua; piautak a zuanta uhi.

Himahleh tuikihawt khauh nih kituahna mun ah ka lutkha zenzen ua, long in lei het in, huchi in, long mailam a tang bikbekta a, hihtat zoh louh in a om hi, long meilam bel tuikihawt a hat ziak in a kekgawpta hi.
Huan hentate tuiliau galkai khattou a om kha ding ua, a taimang kha ding uh chih a lauh manun sepaihte’n amaute hihlup mai a sawm uhi.
Himahleh sepaih zaheutu in Paul humhing a ut a, a thiltup uh a khama; tuiliau siam peuhmah tuipi ah tawmkhiaka gam na kaimasa ding leh,
Midang a khen singpek tung leh a khen long van tung a kitholh galkai ding in thu a pia hi. Huchi in, avek un gam ah bittak in a galkai vek uhi.
Huan gam a ka suahtak un, tuikulh min tuh Malta ahi chih ka theita uhi.
Tuikulh gammite’n hehpih in hon na hehpih ua; vuah a hongzuk ziak leh khovot ziak in mei a toh ua, ka vek un a hon na kipahpih uhi.
Paul in singlom khat a toma mei ah a chih a, a sat ziak in gul a hong vakkhia a, a khut a tuin a tangden hi.
Tuikulh gammite’n ganhing a khut a kikhai den a muh un, “Hiai mi tualthat ahi ding, tuipi a kipan in taikhe mahleh diktatnain a hin a phalta lou ahi” a chi uhi.
Himahleh aman gul mei ah a singkhia a, bangmah a chi kei hi.
Amau bel a bawk hiam, thakhat a puk paha si ding in a gingta uhi; hunsawtpi a ngak nilouh ua, bangmah a chi kei chih a theih un a lungsim uh a kheng ua, Pathian ahi a chi zaw uhi.
Huai mun kiang ah huai tuikulh a hausapa a min Publia a om a, huai mi in a hon na kipahpih a, ni thum siamtakin a hon tungsak hi.
Publia pa khosik leh santen vei in a na lum a; Paul a kiang ah a lut a, a thum a a tung ah a khut a koih in a hihdamta hi.
Huai a hihdam khit in tuikulh a midang natna nei peuhmah a hong ua; a dam chiatta uhi.
Huai mite’n nakpitak in a hon na pahtawi ua; ka pai ding un ka vante uh long ah a hong koih uhi.
Huan kha thum nung in, Aleksandria khaw long, phalbi a tuikulh a omsa, pathian phik, Kastor leh Pollux lutang kisuanna long ah ka pai uhi.
Sirakasi khua ka tawn ua huai ah ni thum ka tam uhi.
Huai a kipan ka paikawi ua, Rejiam khua ka tung ua; ni khat nung in sim huih a hongnung a, a zingnawn in Puteoli khua ka tung nawn uhi;
Huai ah unaute ka mu ua, a kiang uah ni sagih tam ding in a hon khou ua; huchibang in Rome kholam ah ka pai zelta uhi.

Huan unaute’n ka Tanchin uh a zaktak un huai a kipan in Appii dawl leh Khualbuk thumte omna chiang ah hong dawn ding in a hong kuan ua; Paul in huai mite a muh in Pathian kiang ah kipahthu a gen a, a lungmuang mahmahta hi.
Rome khua a ka lut un Paul bel a vengpa sepaih kiang a amah kia a om a phal uhi.

Ni thum nung in, Paul in Juda heutu deuh peuhmah a samkhawm a; a kihoukhawm ua, a kiang uah: “Unaute aw, mi tengteng leh i pipute dan tung ah bangmah ka hihlouh in leng Jerusalem khua a kipan in Rome khua a mite kiang ah a hon hentasak uhi.
Amau a hon etchet khit un sihna khop hial ka tung ah bangmah a muhlouh ziak un khah a hontum uhi.
Himahleh Judate’n huai a sel ziak un Kaisar kiang tunlou thei ka hita kei a; himahleh ka chipihte hekna nei a hihbel ka hi kei hi.
Huailam thu a noumau honmu a hon houpih ding in ka honsam ahi; Israelte lamet thilte toh kisai a khainiang bun ka hi ngal a” a chi hi.
Amau a kiang ah, na tanchin Judia gam a kipan lai in ka mu kei ua, unaute hiai a hong omte kuamah in na tungtang thubuai bangmah a pulak kei ua, gen leng a gen ngeikei uhi.
Himahleh hiai pawl zaw gam teng ah gensiat ahi ngal ua, nang bangchi’n ahia na ngaih chih theih ka ut uhi” a chi uhi.

Huan ni a chiam ua, huai a tunna ah a kiang ah mi tampi a hong ua; zing a kipan nitaklam pha in a kiang uah huai thu a hilhchian a, Pathian gam thu a theisak a, Mosi dan laibu thu leh zawlneite laibu thu in Jesu lam ah amau a thuzoh zel hi.
Khenkhat in a thugen a gingta ua, a khen in a gingta kei uhi.
Huan a kituakta kei ua, Paul in thu a genkhit in a paikheta uhi. A thugen tuh hiai ahi, “Kha Siangthou in zawlnei Isai kam a na pipute uh kiang a a thugen a dik mahmah hi chi in:
‘Hiai chite kiang ah vagen in,
Bil in zaw na za na ding ua,
a ngaihna zaw na theikei hial ding ua; muh zaw na mu ding ua,
theih zaw na theikei hial ding uh:
Hiai chite lungtang a takta a,
a bilte uh a na ngong deuh a,
a mit uh leng a si ua,
huchilou in zaw a mit un a mu ding ua, a bil un a za ding ua,
a lungtang un leng a thei ding uh, a kiheikik ding ua,
ken ka hihdam kha ding hi’ a chi, a chihpen ahi.
Huaiziak in Pathian hotdamna thu Jentelte kiang a khakkhiak ahi chih thei un, amau zaw ngaih leng a ngaikhe ding uh” a chi hi.
Huchi a hiai thute a genkhit nung in, Judate tuh a pawtkheta ua, amau lak ah nakpitak a kiselna a nei uhi.
Huchi in Paul kum nih vengveng amah inluah ah a om a, a kiang a hoh peuhmah a na kipahpih hi,
Pathian gam thu a hilh a, Toupa Jesu Khrist thu hangsantak in a gen zel a, kuamah in amah lah a kham kei uhi.
Paul, Jesu Khrist sikha, sawltak hi ding a sap, Pathian Tanchinhoih lam a khenkhiak,
Pathian in tuma lam a Laisiangthou a a zawlneite a a chiamsa,
A tapa, salam a David suan a piang tungtang thu,
Amah Pathian Tapa hihna bel misi lak a kipan thilhihtheihna toh a thohnawnna ziak a siangthouna Kha in Jesu Khrist, Toupa chi a a phuankhiak ahi.
A min ziak a ginna namchih lak a mi gingtasak ding in, amah ziak in hehpihna leh sawltak hihna i tangta hi;
huai lak ah nou leng Jesu Khrist sapte na hi uhi:
Rome khua Pathian deihtak, misiangthou a om ding a sapte tengteng kiang ah: Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Khrist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Amasa in khovel tengteng ah na ginna uh a than ziak in na vek ua tung a ka kipahthu Jesu Khrist ziak in ka Pathian kiang ah ka gen hi.
Ka thumnate ah tawplou in na min uh ka lou nilouh ahi chih kei hon theihpihpa Pathian ahi a, amah ahi a Tapa Tanchinhoih gen a ka kha a a na ka sep gige pa pen;
Tu bek a na kiang ua ka hong theihna ding in Pathian thuthu a zinhun lemtang ka muh teitei theihna ding ka ngen hi.
Na kipna ding ua khalam thilpiak banghiam nou ka honpiak theihna ding in nou honmuh ka ut thei mahmah ngal hi;
Huai na ginna uh leh ka ginna a i kikhamuan tuah theihna ding ka chihna ahi.

Unaute aw, Jentel dangte kiang a ka sepgim gah ka muhtak bangmah in, noumau lak ah leng gahte ka muh theihna ding in na kiang uah tamveipi hong ka tumta chih na theihlouh uh ka deihkei hi; himahleh tuma teng in dal in ka om hi.
Grik mite leh melmak mite kiang ah bat ka nei a; mi pil leh mi pilloute kiang ah leng.
Huchi in nou Rome khua a omte kiang ah leng Tanchinhoih gen ka ut mahmah hi.
Tanchinhoih tuh ka zahpih kei a; kuapeuh a gingta phot ading in hotdamna ding a Pathian thilhihtheihna ahi ngal a; a tung in Judami adin ahi a, huan Grik mi ading in leng a hong hinawn hi.
Huai ah tuh gin semsemna ding in ginna in Pathian diktatna latsak in a om hi; “Midiktat tuh ginna in a hing ding,” chi a gelh bang in.
Thutak dikloutak a dalte leh Pathian limsaklouhna leh diktatlouhna tengteng tung ah van a kipan in Pathian thangpaihna a hong kilangta hi;
Pathian in a theihsak tak ziak in Pathian tanchin theihtheih ding tuh a lungsim uah chiangtak a theihsak in a om ngalta hi.
Khovel siamtung a kipan a pianken muhtheihlouh, a tangtawn thilhihtheihna leh a Pathianna, thilsiamte ah chiantak a muhtheih ahi; huaiziak in paulam ding a neikei uhi;
Pathian thei ngal in Pathian bang in a pahtawi kei ua. A kipahthu leng a gensam kei uhi; thil thulimlou a ngaihtuah zawta ua, a lungtang hai uh a hong mialta hi.
Pil kisa khem in mihai a hongsuak ua,
setheilou Pathian thupina a sethei mihingte leh vasate, gamsate leh bokvak ganhingte lim a suaksak uhi.
Huaiziak in a sa uh zumhuaipi a kibawltuah ding in a lungtang uh duhgawlna bang a thilnin hihphal in Pathian in a lehngatsan hi.
Pathian thutak tuh zuau tangsak in, a bawlpa biak sang in a bawl bia in a na a sem uhi. A bawlpa tuh tangtawn a phat tuak ahi, Amen.
Huaiziak in Pathian in zumhuaipi a huk phal in lehlam a ngatsanta hi; a numeite nangawn un leng a omdan pianpih uh danlou bang a om ding in a kibawl lamdang uhi;
pasalte’n leng numei zatdan ngeina tawpsan in, huk in a kienlah ua, pasal leh pasal zummawh thilhih in a om ua, a gitlouh man muh ding uh tuh a satung uah a mu uhi.
Huan Pathian theih a utlouh ziak un, thil kilawmloute hih ding a a deihlouh lam lungsim neih phal in Pathian in a lehngatsanta hi;
Huchi in diktatlouhna, gitlouhna, huaihamna, huatna in a dim ua; hazatna, tualthahna, kiselna, khemna, nundan hoihlou in a dim uhi;
gensiatnate, migennate, Pathian huatlamte, kisaktheihnate, kisatheimite, thil gilou bawlkhete,
nu leh pa thu mangloute, theihna beite, thuchiam susete, itna pianpih neiloute, hehpihna neiloute ahi uhi.
Huchibang hihte tuh sitak ahi uh chih Pathian dan tuh theigige in, amau kia a hih leng hilou in, midang hih zelte tung ah leng a kipak uhi.

Huaiziak in mihing aw, mi selhat kuapeuh himahlechin paulam himhim na neikei hi. Midang na selna mah ah nangmah leh nangmah siamlouh kitangsak na hi. Nang selhat in leng huchibang thilte na hih sam ngal hi.
“Huchibang thilhih nakte tung ah Pathian vaihawmna diktak in a tung” chih i thei uhi.
Mihing aw, huchibang thilhih nakte gensia, nang leng huchibang na hihsam ngal nak a, Pathian vaihawmna pelh na kigingta ahia?
Ahihkeileh Pathian hoihna kisikna a nang hon pidinga om ahi chih theilou in, a hoihna, a thuaktheihna leh, a dohtheihna hauhnate na ngaineu ahia?
Himahleh na lungtang khauh leh kisik utlouhnate ziak in, na tung ah thangpaihna na kholkhawmte Pathian vaihawmna diktat hong kilatna, thangpaihna ni chiang a ding in kholkhawm ahizaw hi.
Pathian in michih a thilhih bangzel un a hawmsak ding;
Thil hoih hih teitei a, thupina leh pahtawina leh manthat theihlouhna zong mite kiang ah tangtawn hinna a pe ding hi.
Himahleh genhakte, thutak zuilou a, gitlouhna zui zawte tung ah, hehna leh thangpaihna, haksatna leh lungkhamna thupitak a om dia;
Mihing thil hihkhial tengteng kha tung ah a om ding, Judami kha tung ah a om masa dia, huan, Grik mi kha tung ah a om nawn ding hi.
Himahleh, thil hoih hih peuhmahte kiang ah thupina, pahtawina, khamuanna piak ahi ding, Judami kiang ah piak ahi masa dia, huan, Grik mi kiang ah ahi nawn ding hi.
Pathian in mi deihsaktuam a nei ngal kei hi.
Kuapeuh dan neilou a thil hihkhial, dan lou in a mangthang ding hi; kuapeuh dan nei a thil hihkhial dan a vaihawm in a om ding.
Dan zami phette Pathian mitmuh in midik ahi kei ua; dan zuite midik ahizaw ding uhi.
Dan neilou Jentelte’n amau pianpih a dan thilte a hih un, amau dan neikei mahle uh, amau leh amau dan in a kinei tawm uhi.
A lungtang uah dan thilhih gelh ahi chih langsak ding in a sialehpha theihna un a theihpih hi; a lungsimte un leng theihpih ahihman in a ngaihtuahna un siamlouh a tangsak hiam siam a tangsak zel hi;
Ka Tanchinhoih gen bang in, Pathian vaihawmni chiang in mihing thugukte, Jesu Khrist tawn in a ngaihtuah ding hi.
Himahleh nang Juda kichi na hi a, dan a kinga in Pathian na suang hi.
A deihlam na thei a, thil hoihzawte hoih na sa a, dan a hilh in na om hi,
Nangmah mittawte pipa, miallak a omte vakna hi in na kigingta hi.
Dan ah pilna leh thutak omdan na theih ziak in, mipilloute hilhpilpa, naungekte hilhpa in na kigingta hi;
Huchibang na hih ngal leh nang midangte hilhpa, nangmah na kihilh ka hia? Nang mi guta lou dia hilhpa, nang na gu nak maw?
Nang angkawm lou dia hilhpa, nang ang na kawm maw? Nang milim hawpa, nang milim biakin a thilte na gu nak maw?
Nang dan suangpa, nang dan a na tatlek ziak in Pathian na hihminse zel ahi maw?
“Pathian min noumau ziak in Jentelte lak ah gensiat in a omta hi” chi a kigelh bang in.
Dan zuipa na hihleh zeksum a phatuam ngial hi; dan a talekpa na hih lebel, na zeksum sum louh bang phet a hong hita hi.
Huaiziak in, zeksum lou mi in danthusehte a zuih leh a zeksum louh sum bang a sim ahi kei dia hia?
Huan amau sa a zeksum louh in dan a zuih kim uleh, nang danthu gelh leh zeksum nei ngal a dan a talekpa a hon mawhpaih kei ding ua hia?
A lang lel a Judami hi zaw Judami tak ahi kei hi; a lang a sa lel a zeksum zaw zeksum tak leng ahi sam kei hi.
Himahleh a lang lel hilou a, Judami hi, Judami tak ahi; huan zeksum tak, lungsim a sum ahi, laithu phet ah hilou in, kha ah ahi; huai mi’n mihing phat a loh kei a, Pathian phat a loh zaw ahi.
Ahihleh Juda mi’n hamphat tuamna bang ahia a neih tuan? Zeksum leng bang ahia a phattuamna?
Koi lam peuh ah a phatuam hi; Pathian thute a kiang ua kep sak a a om ziak ahi pen.
Mi khenkhatte’n ginna neikei mahle uh, bang ahi tuan a eita? A gintak louhna un Pathian muanhuaina bangmahlou in a bawl tuan ahia?
Bawl tuan lou hial; Pathian mi diktak hita hen, michih zuauthei hi uhen:
“Nang na thugen in siam na tanthei a,
vaihawma na om in leng na zoh theihna ding in,”
chih gelh bang in.
Himahleh i diktatlouhna in Pathian diktatna a hihlat hoih sem leh, bang i gen dia? Pathian in mi a gawt in, mi diktatlou ahi hia? Mihing dan bang in ka gen ahi.
Hilou hial: huchibang hihleh, Pathian in khovel vai bangchi’n a hawm dia?
Himahleh ka zuauthu gen ziak a Pathian thu dik dan amah hihthupi khop hial a a latsem ngal leh, bang a chia keileng mikhial bang a siamlouh tansak a omlai ka hia?

Bang a chia, hon hek ua, mi khenkhat in genlouhpi hon gensak bang un. “Thil hoih hongtun theihna ding in thil gilou i hih ding uh” chi a i gen zawk louh? Huchibang ching mite’n siamlouh a tan uh a dik him ahi.
Ahihleh amau sang in i hoihzaw khol ua hia? Hoihzaw lou hial; Judate leh Grikte khelhna sikha a omvek in tuma in leng i ngohta vele;
“Kuamah mi diktat himhim
a omkei uh, khat leng a omkei uh;
Kuamah theisiam himhim a omkei uh, kuamah Pathian
zong himhim a omkei uh.
A hilou lam ah a pialkhinta ua,
bangmah phatuamlou in a om khinta ua,
kuamah thil hoih hih himhim a omkei uh,
khat leng a omkei uh.”
“A gawl uh han kihong ahi a;
a lei un zekhemna thu a gen uhi.”
“A kam sung uah gul gu a om hi.”
“A kam uh hamse lohna leh thukha in a dim hi.”
“A khe uh sisan suah ding in a kin suan uhi;
A lampi uah manthatna leh gimthuakna a om a;
Khamuanna lampi a theikei ua,
A mit uah Pathian launa a omkei,” chih gelh bang in.
Dan in bangpeuh a gen, danthuthu a omte kiang ah a gen ahi chih i thei uhi; kam chiteng a hum theihna ding in leh khovel a mi tengteng Pathian vaihawm a a om theihna ding un.
Huchi in “Dan thilhihte ziak in mi kuamah a mitmuh in siamtang in a omkei ding uhi;” dan tawn in khelhna theihna a hongom hi.
Himahleh tun bel dan leh zawlneite na theihsak Pathian dikna dan tellou a hihlat in a omta hi;
Huai tuh Jesu Khrist gintak ziak a, a gingtate tengteng adia Pathian diktatna ahi. Lamdanna himhim a omkei:
Mi tengteng in thil a hihkhelh ziak ua Pathian thupina a tan zohlouh nung un,
Khrist Jesu a om tatna ziak in, hehpihna a a thawna siamtansak in a om uhi.
Amah tuh a sisan ziak a thuphatawina hi in, ginna a muh ding in Pathian in a luikheta hi. Hiai tuh Pathian dikna latsakna ding ahi, aman a dohtheihna ziak a nidanglai khelhnate a Paikan tak ziak in;
Huan amah ngei a dik a, chih leh Jesu a ginna neimi siam a tangsak chih chetna ding in.
Na kiotsakna uh koi a om ahia leh? Pawsiah in a omta hi. Bang dan in ahia leh? Thilhihna dan in hia? Hilou hial, ginna dan in ahizaw hi.
Huchi in dan thilhihte ziak hilou in, ginna in min siamtansak in a om chi in i sep uhi.
Pathian, Judate Pathian kia hia? Jentelte Pathian leng ahi sam ka hia? Hi e, Jentelte Pathian leng ahi.
Pathian khat kia a hih ziak in; aman zeksumte a ginna ziak un, zeksumlouhte a ginna ziak un siam a tangsak ding hi.
Huchi ahihleh dan bangmahlou in i bawl ua hia? Bawllou hial. Dan tuh i hihkip zaw uhi.
Ahihleh Abraham, sa dan a i pu un, bang ahia a muh i gen ding?
Abraham in thilhih ziak a siam a tan ngalleh suan ding a nei ahi, Pathian ma ah zaw hi hetlou in.
Laisiangthou in bang a gen a? Abraham in Pathian a gingta a, huan huai ginna tuh a dikna a seh ahi chi in a gen ahi.
Huan nasemmi loh tuh hehpihna a seh ahi kei a, bat a seh ahizaw hi.
Himahleh nasem lou a, Pathian limsaklou siamtangsakpa gingta zaw mi ginna amah diktatna a seh ahi.
Mi a thilhih ngaihtuah lou a, Pathian in diktat a a seh, vual a zawlsak thu David in leng,
“A tatleknate ngaihdam a om a,
a khelhnate uh khuh a omte, a hampha uhi,
Toupa’n khelhna nei a a sehlouhte a hampha uhi,”
chi a a gen bang in.
Ahihleh huai vualzawlna zeksumte kia tung ah hia a om, zeksumloute tung ah leng? Abraham ginna a diktatna a seh ahi, i chi ngal ua.
Huai bangchi seh ahia? A zeksum nung in hia, a zeksum ma in? A zeksum nung in ahi kei a, a zeksum ma in ahizaw hi.

Huchi in a zeksum ma in ginna ziak a diktatna a mu chih chiamtehna ding in zeksum thu a mu hi. Huchi a amah tuh zeksum lou, himahleh a gingtate diktatna sehsak a omte tengteng pa a hih theihna ding in.
Huchi mah bang a zeksumte kia hilou a, zeksum hilou a, i pa uh Abraham in zek a sum ma a ginna a neih bang ginna neite pa a hihtheihna ding ahi.
Abraham leh a suante kiang a khovel gouluah ding ahi ding uh chih thuchiam zaw dan a kinga ahi kei a, ginna ziak a diktatna a kinga ahizaw hi.
Dan neimite gouluahte hi ding hile ubel, ginna bangmah in a phatuam kei a, thuchiam leng thuchiam ahita kei hi.
Dan in thangpaihna a tun nak ngal a; himahleh dan omlouhna ah tatlekna leng a omkei hi.

Huaiziak in thuchiam hehpihna a piak a hihtheihna ding in ginna a kinga ahi, a suante tengteng in thuchiam pellou a a luah theihna ding un. Dan neimite kia’n a luah kei ding ua, Abraham neih bang ginna neite’n leng a luahsam ding uhi; amah i vek ua pa ahi.
“Nam tampite pa in k’on bawlta” chi a gelh bang in, misite hihhing pa leh thil omloute om bang a genpa a gin Pathian mitmuh ah eite pa a bawl in a omzaw hi.
Lamet tuak a a omlouh in leng aman zaw lamen tak in a gingta a, “Chi tampite pa a hong hih theihna ding in: Tua bang in na suante a honghi ding uh,” chi a hilh a a om bang in.
Huan ginna kiplou tuanlou in, a pumpi sisa bang a om tuh a ngaihtuah a, amah kum za vel mi ahi ngal a, Sarah ching leng a ngaihtuah sam hi.
Pathian thuchiam ginglel in ginna tasam in a omkei a, Pathian a pahtawi hi.
A thuchiam a lohching sakthei chih a gingtaa, a ginna a hongkip zawta hi.
Huaiziak in a ginna a diktatna a seh ahita hi.
Huchi in a ginna a diktatna a seh ahi chih amah ziak kia a gelh ahi kei a, eite ziak in leng ahi.
Jesu i Toupa misi lak a kipan a kaithoupa gingtate i hi. I ginna tuh diktatna a seh ahi ding hi.
Jesu i tatlekna ziak a matsaka om, siam i tanna ding a kaihthoh a om ahi.
Huaiziak in, ginna ziak a siamtansak a om in i Toupa Jesu Khrist pansan in Pathian toh kilem in i om uhi.
Amah tawn mah in hiai hehpihna ah i lut ua; huai ading in Pathian thupina i tan ding lametna ah kipak in i om uhi.
Huai kia leng hilou in, i gimthuakna ah leng kipak in i om uh, gimthuakna in kuhkalna a tun hi.
Kuhkalna in theihtelna a tun a, theihtelna in lametna a tun chih thei in.
Huan lametna in a hon zahlaksak kei a, huai Kha Siangthou i kiang ua honpiak tawn a Pathian itna i lungtang ua sun a a omtak ziak in.
I hat nailouh lai in a huntak in Khrist Pathian limsakloute sih sik in a hong sita hi.
Mi dik sik a sih, mi a ut ngelkei hial ding ua, mi hoih sik in bel mi kuahiam bek in sih a ngap khamawh kei ding hi.
Himahleh Pathian in mikhialte i hih lai a Khrist i sik a a sihna ah a hon itna a langsakta hi.
Huchi in a sisan a siamtansak a i omkhit nung in, amah ziak in Pathian hehna , a kipan hotdam in i om ngei ding uhi.
Melma i hihlai a bawn a Tapa sihna ziak a Pathian toh na kitam khin i hih ngal un tuh, kitam a i omkhit nung un a hinna ziak in hotdam in i omsem ding uhi.
Huchi kia leng ahi kei a, kitamna tua hon musakpa i Toupa Jesu Khrist ziak in Pathian ah leng i kipak ahi.
Huchi in mi khat ziak in khelhna khovel ah a lut a, khelhna ziak in sihna a lut a, mi tengteng a khelh ziak un sihna in mi tengteng a zelsuak hi.
Dan om ma in khovel ah khelhna a om khin ngal a; dan a omlouh lai in khelhna tuh khelhna a sim ahi kei hi.
Himahleh Adam om a kipan Mosi om pha in Adam tatlekna bang a thil hihkhialloute tung ah leng sihna in vai a hawm zel hi. Adam tuh hongpai ding tehpihna ahi.

Himahleh thilthawnpiak zaw tatlekna toh a kibang kei. Mi khat tatlekna ziak a mi tampi a sih ua leh Pathian hehpihna leh mi khat Jesu Khrist hehpihna thawnpiak a kiching zawsem a mi tampi tung a vuh in a om hi

Huan thilthawnpiak mi khat tatlekna gah toh leng a kibang sam kei hi. Mi khat tatlekna tung a vaihawmna in siamlouh tansakna a tun a, mi tampi tatlekna tung a thilthawnpiak in bel siamtansakna a tun hi.

Mi khat tatlekna ziak a sihna in huai mi khat mah pansan a vai a hawm leh, hehpihna kiningching mahmah leh diktatna thawnpiak tangte’n mi khat Jesu Khrist pansan in hinna a vai a hawm zawsem ding uhi.
Huan mi khat tatlekna in mi tengteng ading a siamlouh tansakna a tut mah bang in, mi khat diktatna thilhih in mi tengteng ading in suahtakna leh hinna a hontun hi.
Bangziak hiam i chih leh, mi khat thumanlouhna ziak a mi tampi mikhial a bawl a hih bang un, mi khat thumanna ziak in mi tampi mi diktat a bawl ahi ding uhi.
Khelhna latsak semna ding in Dan a hongom behlap a; himahleh khelhna a khanna peuh ah hehpihna a khang sem,
Huchi a khelhna in sihna a vai a hawm mah bang, hehpihna in leng i Toupa Jesu Khrist pansan a diktatna ziak a tangtawn hinna dong a vai a hawm theihna ding in.
Bang i genta dia leh? Hehpihna a khansem theihna ding in khelhna ah i om nilouh ding ua hia?
Om nilouh lou hial ding. Eite khelhna lam a sisa, khelhna ah bangchi’n i hing thei lailai dia?
Eite Khrist Jesu a baptist lut a om tengteng a sihna ah baptist lut in i om chih na theikei ua hia?
Huaiziak in a sihna a baptist lut a om in amah toh vuikhawm in i om uhi, huchi a Pa thupina in misi lak a kipan a Khrist a kaihthohtak bang a eite leng hinna thak a i khosak theihna ding in.
A sihna kibatpih a amah toh i kizopkhit ngal leh, a thohnawnna kibatpih in leng i kizom sam ding hi.
I mihing lui a kiang ah kilhden in a om samta chih i thei; huchi a khelhna pumpi hih manthat a a om theihna ding leh tua kipan a khelhna sikha a i om louhna ding in.
Kuapeuh sisa khelhna lak ah a suakta ta hi.
Huan Khrist toh i sihsam leh, a kiang ah i hingsam ding chih gingta uhi;
Khrist misi lak a kipan kaihthoh in a omta, a si nawn kei ding chih i thei ngal uhi; sihna in amah tung ah thu a neita kei hi.
A sihna khelhna lam thu ah tangtawn adin khatvei kia a si ahi, a hinna bel Pathian lam thu ah a hing ahi.
Huchi mah bang in, nou leng khelhna lam thu ah sisa in kisep unla, Pathian lam thu ah bel Khrist Jesu ah hing in kisep un.
Huaiziak in na pumpi uh duhgawlna thumang ding in na pumpi si thei uah khelhna vaihawmsak kei un.

Na pumpi hiangte uh leng diktatlouhna vanzat ding in khelhna kiang ah pe phal sam kei un; himahleh misi lak a kipan hing nawn bang in Pathian kiang ah kipia unla, na pumpi hiangte uh leng diktatna vanzat ding in Pathian kiang ah pe phal zaw un.
Noute danthunuai om hilou a, hehpihna a nuai a om na hih ziak un khelhna in na tung uah thu a nei nawn kei ding hi.
Bangchi’n ahi dia leh? Dan thunuai a om i hi kei ua, hehpihna nuai a om i hih zawk ziak in i khial ding uh ahi diam? Hilou hial ding.
Kua kiang peuh ah leng a thumang ding a a sikha dia na kipiak un sihna khop a khelhna sikha hiam, diktatna khop a thumang sikha hiam, a thu na man uh sikha na hi uh chih na theikei ua hia?
Himahleh Pathian kiang ah kipahthu om hen; noute khelhna sikha na hitamah le uchin, thuginpi a na kipiakna uh na lungtang taktak un na zuita uhi.
Khelhna lak a kipan suahtak sak in na omta ua, diktatna sikhate na hong hita uhi.

Na sa uh hatlouh ziak in mihing dan in thu ka gen hi; na sa hiangte uh nitna leh tatlekna ding a tatlekna kiang a sikha dia na piak phal bang un, tuin na sa hiangte uh siangthouna ding in diktatna kiang ah sikha ding in pe zaw un.
Khelhna sikhate na hihlai un diktatna lak ah na siang uhi.
Tua na thil zahpih sate uah, huailai in gah bang ahia na muhzel uh? Huai thilte tawpna zaw sihna ahi.
Tun ah bel khelhna lak a hihsiang a om in, Pathian sikhate na hong hih un, siangthouna mu khop in na gah uh na nei uh a kei hiam, huai tawpna tangtawn a hinna toh.
Khelhna man sihna ahi ngal a, Pathian thilthawnpiak bel i Toupa Khrist Jesu ziak in tangtawn a hinna ahi.
Ahihleh unaute aw, dan in mi a damsung teng a tung ah vai a hawm nak chih na theikei ua hia? Dan thei mite kiang ah ka gen ahi.
Numei, pasal nei a pasal a damsung teng a pasal dan a hen in a om a; himahleh a sih in bel pasal lam ah dan a kipan khah in a om ahi.
Huchi in a pasal damsung a midang a kitenpih leh, Angkawm, chih ahi ding hi; a pasal a sih in bel huai dan a kipan khah in a om a, huchi in midang nei leh leng angkawm ahi kei hi.
Ka unaute aw, Pathian lam a i gah theihna ding in midang, misi lak a kipan kaihthoh ngeingei na kitenpih theihna ding un, Khrist pumpi pansan in danlam ah sihsakin na omta uhi.
Sa a i omlai un dan ziak a khelhna utna hong suakte’n, i sahiangte ah sihna khopa gah ding in a semnak hi.
