Tuin bel hon lenpa lak ah sikhinin, dan a kipan khah in i omta, laigelh lui bang hilou a, Kha a hinna thaka na i sep theihna ding in.
Bang i genta dia leh? Dan khelhna hia? Hilou hial. Himahleh, dan tawn a theih hi kei leh khelhna theilou ding hi’ng a; dan in, “Eng ken” chi kei leh, eng chih theilou ding hi’ng a.
Himahleh khelhna in, thupiak ziak in, lemtan lai mu in enna chiteng ka sung ah a omsak hi.
Dan lou in khelhna si ahi. Tuma lam in kei danlou in ka hing a; himahleh thupiak a hongom tak in khelhna a honghalh a, kei ka sita hi.
Huan hinna thuchiam nei thupiak kei adin sihna a honghi chih ka na theita hi.
Khelhna in thupiak ziak in, lemtan lai mu in honkhem a, thupiak zang in a hon hihlumta hi.
Huchi in dan a siangthou hi, thupiak leng a siangthou a, a dik a, a hoih ahi.

Ahihleh thil hoih kei adin sihna a honghi ahia? Hilou hial. Khelhna kei din sihna a honghi zaw ta ahi. Huchi in khelhna, khelhna ahi chih a lat theihna ding in thil hoih zang in a honthat ahi; thupiak ziak a khelhna, khelhna thupitak a honghih theihna ding in.
Dan khalam thil ahi chih i thei ngal ua, kei bel sami, khelhna a khotsa ka hi.
Thil ka hih pen, a dan ka theikei; ka thilhih zel pen, ka thilhih utlam ahi ngal kei a, ka thil huatlam tak ka hih zawnak hi.
Ka hih utlouh lam ka hih ngal in, dan a hoih chih pompih ka hi ta hi.
Huaichiang in, ka thilhihpen keimah hih ahita kei a, khelhna keimah a om hih ahizaw hi.
Keimah ah, huai bel ka sa ah, thil hoih himhim a teng kei chih ka thei: thil hoih hih utna keimah ah a om na a, thil hoih ka hihthei kei.
Hoihna hih ka ut pen ka hih kei a, khelhna hih ka utlouhpen, ka hih zawnak hi.
Ka utlouh lam pen ka hih ngal chiang in, a hihpa kei ka hita kei a, khelhna keimah a om pen ahizaw hi.
Huchi in hiai dan k’on theita hi; thil hoih hih ka ut lai in gitlouhna ka kiang ah a hongom nak ahi.
Ka lungsim taktak in Pathian dan tung ah ka kipak ngal nak hi;
Himahleh ka sahiangte ah dan tuam a om chih ka thei, huai in ka lungsim dan a dou a, ka sahiangte a khelhna dan om kiang ah sal in a honpi hi.
Mi genthei hina lawmlawm ing e! Hiai sihna pumpi apan kuan ahia hon suakta sak ding?
Jesu Khrist i Toupa ziak in Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen ahi. Huchi in keimah takinzaw ka lungsim in Pathian dan ka sem a, ka sa in gitlouhna dan a sem hi.
Huaiziak in, tun ah zaw Khrist Jesu a omte ading in siamlouh tansakna himhim a omta kei hi.
Khrist Jesu a Hinna Kha dan in khelhna leh sihna dan a kipan hon suaktasak ta ngal a.
Sa ziak a dan a hatlouh a, ahihtheih vuallouh, Pathian in, amah Tapa ngei, khelhna sa gilou bang pu in, khelhna thoihna dia honsawl in, sa a khelhna om tuh siamlouh a tangsak ta hi,
Sa dan zuilou a Kha dan zui zawte eimah a dan in a ngiat diktatna tangtun a a om theih na ding in.
Sa dan a omte’n sa lam thilte a lunggulh nak uh; Kha dan a omte’n bel Khalam thilte a lunggulh nak uhi.
Sa thilte deih zaw sihna ahi ngal a, Kha thil deih bel hinna leh khamuanna ahi;
Sa deihdan zaw Pathian douna a hih ziak in. Huai Pathian dan in a om ngalkei a, om leng a om theikei him ahi.
Huchi in, sa a omte’n Pathian a kipaksak theikei uhi.
Himahleh Pathian Kha noumau a a omtaktak leh, sa a om na hi kei ua, Kha a om na hi zaw uhi. Himahleh, kuapeuh Khrist Kha neilou zaw amah a ahi kei.
Khrist Kha noumau a a om ngal leh, khelhna ziak in pumpi a si ahi; kha tuh dikna ziak in a hing ahi.
Himahleh misi lak a kipan Jesu kaithou nawnpa Kha noumau a a om leh, misi lak a kipan Khrist Jesu kaithou nawn pa’n, noumau a om a Kha pansan in na pumpi sitheite uh a hihhing sam ding hi.
Huaiziak in unaute aw, bat i nei; sa dan a om ding in sa lak ah bel ahi kei;
Sa dan a na om uleh, na si mahmah ding uhi; himahleh pumpi thilhihte Kha a na hihlup zel uleh na hing ding uhi.
Pathian Kha pi a om peuhmahte zaw, Pathian tate ahi ngal uhi.
Lau a omnawn ding in sikha hihna kha na tang uh ahi ngal kei a; ta hihna kha na tang uh ahizaw. “Abba, Pa!” chi a i kikou chiang in,
Kha mahmah in, eimah kha toh, Pathian tate i hi chih hon theisak hi;
Huan tate i hihleh gouluahpihte i hi uhi; Pathian gouluahte, Khrist luahpihte i hi ua; a kiang a pahtawi a i omsam theihna ding a amah i thuakpih taktak leh.
Tulai a thuaknate denchiang a i tung a thupina hihlat a om ding toh tehpih tham in ka sep kei hi.
Thilsiam tengteng in, lamen mahmah in, Pathian tate honglatna a ngaklah mahmah uhi.
Thilsiam tengtengte thil thulimlou thuthu a omsak in a omta uh; a ut ua om ahi kei ua, lametna a a omsakpa ziak ahizaw hi;
Thilsiam tengteng leng siatna sikha a kipan suahtaksak in a om ding ua, Pathian tate noplenna thupi ah a lut ding uhi.
Thilsiam tengteng tutan in thum leh nauvei na thuak in a om uh chih i thei ngal uhi.
Thilsiamte kia hilou in, eite ngei, Kha gahmasa tengte leng, ta hihna kilatna, i pumpi tatna ngak in i lungsim in i mau sam ngal uhi.
Hiai lametna a hotdam i hi ngal ua. Himahleh muhtheih gige lametna zaw lametna ahi kei. Kuan a muhtheih gige a lamen a?
I muhlouh pen i lamet lebel i ngak teitei hi.
Huai bang in, Kha in i hatlouhna ah hon huh zel a; bangchi a thum ding ahia chih i thei ngal kei ua; himahleh Kha in mauna gen vuallouh in hon thumsak zel hi.
Pathian deihlam bangzel a misiangthoute a thum sak zel ziak in, lungtang enpan Kha deihlam a thei hi.
Pathian in a itte, aman a seh bang a a sapte adin, a hoihna ding un bangkim in a sepsak chiat chih i thei hi.
A theihkholhte amah Tapa bangtak a om ding in a sepkhol a, a Tapa unau tampite lak a ta masapen a hong hih theihna ding in.
Huan a sehkholhte a sam a; huan a sapte siam a tangsak lai a; siam a tansakte a pahtawi lai hi.
Huai thu ah bang i genta dia leh? Pathian eilam a apan leh kuan ahia honzou thei ding?
Amah Tapa ngei leng hawilou a, i vek ua ding a pepan thil tengteng a thawn in a honpe tawk kei dia hia?
Pathian mitelte kuan ahia hek ding? Siamtangsakpa Pathian ahi ngal a.
Kuan ahia siamlouh tangsak ding? Si pen Khrist Jesu ahi ngal a; ahi, a thounawn zawta a, Pathian taklam a om a hon gensakpa ahi.
Khrist itna a kipan kuan ahia honkhen ding? Gimthuakna in hia, lungngaihna in hia, sawina in hia, taam in hia, vuaktanna in hia, lauhhuaina in hia, namsau in hia honkhen ding?
“Nangmah ziak in nitum in thah in ka om uh;
belam goh dingte bang a sim ka hi uh” chih gelh bang in.
Khenlou hial ding, huaite tengteng ah, hon itpa ziak in, vualtungtuangte sang a tungtuang zaw i hi hi.
Sihna hiam, hinna hiam, angelte hiam, thupinate hiam, thil omlelte leh thil hongom dingte hiam thilhihtheihna leh,
Sanna, thukna leh thilsiam dangte himhim in leng, i Toupa Khrist Jesu a om Pathian itna a kipan, honkhen theikei ding chih diktak in ka thei hi.
Khrist ah thu taktak ka gen ahi, ka zuau kei, Kha Siangthou ah ka sialehpha theihna in leng hon theihpih hi,
Ka lungtang ah haksatna thupitak leh lunggaihna dai theilou ka pai ahi.
Ka unaute salam a ka chipihte sik in, kei pen Khrist a kipan hihtuam khop hial in hamsethuak in om leng ka chi hi.
Israel mi ahi ngal ua; ta hihna, thupina leh thukhun tengteng, dan piakna leh Pathian nasepna a thuchiam tengteng amau a ahi;
Pipute leng amau a ahi ua, salam thu ah Khrist leng amau a kipan a hongpawt ahi a; amah thil tengteng tung a om, tangtawn a phattuak Pathian ahi. Amen.
Himahleh Pathian thu bangmahlou bang a omta ahi kei hi. Israel suante Israel mi ahivek kei uhi;
Abraham suante a hih ziak un avek un a tate leng ahi kei uhi; “Isak ah na suante a kiminloh ding” chih ahizaw hi.
Huai sa tate Pathian tate ahi kei ua, thuchiam tate Abraham suan a seh ahizaw uh, chihna ahi.
Thuchiam pen hiai ahi: “Tu hun bang in ka hong dia, Sarah in tapa a nei ding.”
Huai phet ahi kei Rebeka in leng i pu Isak lak a nau a pailai in,
Naupangte a pian ma un, sialehpha a theihma un, thilhih ziak hilou in, a sampa deih ziak hi zaw in, tel lam thu ah Pathian thu seh a kip theihna ding in a kiang ah;
“A upa zaw in a naupang zaw nna a sem ding” Pathian in a chi hi.
“Jakob ka it a, Esau zaw ka hua” chih gelh bang in.
Bang i genta ding ua leh? Pathian ah diktatlouhna a om ahia?
Omlou hial. Aman, “Ka hehpih peuhmah ka hehpih dia, zah ka ngaihna tung peuhmah ah zah ka ngai ding” chi in, Mosi kiang ah a genta hi.
Huaiziak in, a deihpa ziak ahi kei a, a taipa ziak leng ahi sam kei a, a hehpihpa Pathian ziak ahizaw hi.
Laisiangthou in Pharo kiang ah, “Hiai ziak tak in ahi k’on tunding, nang a ka thilhihtheihna ka taklat theihna ding leh leitung tengteng a ka min a than theihna ding in” a chi hi.
Huchi in Pathian in a ut peuhmah a hehpih a, a ut peuhmah a genhak sak hi.
Nou ka kiang ah, bangdia mawh a hondem ahia? A deihlam kuan kalh ahia? honchi ding na hih tuak uhi.
Ahi a, mihing aw, nang Pathian nial vialpa kua na hia leh? Thilsiam in a siampa kiang ah “Bang achia hichibang a hon siam” a chi dia hia?
Bellei tang khat apan bel khat kilawm tak, manphatak a zat ding leh manphalou deuh a zat ding bawl din belvelpa’n bellei tung ah thu a neikei ahia?
Pathian in a hehna leh a thilhihtheihna latsak a ut a, a hehna thuak ding a hihsiat a om ding a a bawlkholhte tung a a hehpihna hauhdan a latsak a a thuakzoh teitei leh bang a poi a?
Huchi a a thupina hauhsaknate, a zahngaihna thupina tang ding a a bawlkholhte tung a a sunbuak leh a latsak theihna ding in,
Huaite tuh eite i hi ua, huai hehpihna belte Judate lak a kipan kia hilou a, Jentelte lak a kipan a leng sapte ahi.
Hosea laibu ah:
“Ka mite hi ngeilou, ka mite,
ka chi dia; it ngeilouhnu leng itnu, ka chita ding hi.
“Huan hichi a honghi ding a,
a kiang ua, ka mite na hi kei uh a chihna mun ngei ah
Pathian hing tate chih in a om ding uh,
chih gelh bang in.
Isai in leng Israel mite thu kikou pih in, “Israel mite zaw tuipi piaunel zah in tam mahle uh, a sibang kia hotdam in a om ding uh.
Toupa’n kintak a hihzou vek in leitung ah a gawt ding thu a tangtun dek ngal a” a chi hi.
Isai in, Mipite “Toupa’n chisuah ding hon na hawi saklou hileh Sodom khua bang in i na omta ding ua, Gomorrah khua bang a bawl in i na omta ding uh” chi a a genkholh bang in.
Bang i genta dia leh? Jentel, diktatna delhloute’n, ginna ziak a diktatna tuh a na phata uhi.
Israel, diktatna dan delhte’n, diktatna pen a pha zouta kei uh.
Bangziak in ahia? Ginna in a delhkei ua, thilhih a muhtheih bang in a delh ziak uh ahi. Pukna suang ah a pukta uhi.
Laisiangthou in:
“Ngai in, Zion ah kisuihna suang leh pukna suangpi ka koih a,
kuapeuh amah gingta tuh a zahlak kei ding” chih gelh bang in.
Unaute aw, ka lungtang deihlam leh amau adia Pathian kiang a ka thumna pen zaw, hotdam a hong hihtheihna ding uh ahi.
Pathian lam ah phatuam a ngai uh chih ka theihpih ahi, himahleh theihna ahihvak in zaw ahi kei uh.
Pathian diktatna theilou in, amau diktatna lamkhiak a tum ua, Pathian diktatna ah a kipe lut sam kei uhi.
Khrist bel a gingta peuhmahte adin diktatna a muh theihna ding un dan tawpna ahi.
Mosi in, “Dan a diktatna zui zaw, huai diktatna ziak in a hing ding” chi in a gelh hi.
Ginna a diktatna in bel huchi in a gen: “Na lungsim in, kua ahia van ah kah ding? Hiam, ‘tunglam a kipan Khrist va pisuk ding’ chihna ahi;
Kua ahia khukthuk a hohsuk ding? Hiam, ‘huai bel misi lak a kipan Khrist pitou nawn ding’ chihna ahi, chi ken” chi in.
Ahihleh, bang ahia a gen? “Thu in a honnaih hi, na kam leh na lungtang ah a om” chi in, a gen ahi; huai ginna thu ka gen pen uh ahi.
Na kam a Jesu Toupa ahi chih na gup a, misi lak a kipan Pathian in a kaithou chih na lungtang a na gintak leh hotdam in na om ding.
Min lungtang in a gingta ua, diktatna a mu uhi; kam in a gum ua, hotdamna leng a mu nak uh ahi.
Laisiangthou in, “Kuapeuh amah gingta a zahlak kei ding” a chi hi.
Juda leh Grik mite bangmah ah a lamdang tuankei ua, Toupa khat avek ua tung ah Toupa ahi a, a minlou peuhmahte tung ah hoihna a hau ngal a.
“Kuapeuh Toupa minlou tuh hotdam in a om ding” chih ahi.
Ahihleh, a gintaklouhpi uh bangchi’n a lou ding ua? A thu a zaklouhpi uh bangchi’n a gingta ding ua? Thuhilhmi omlou in bangchi’n a za ding ua?
Sawl ahihkei uleh bangchi’n thu a hilh ding ua? “Thil hoih tanchin kipahhuai tunte khe kilawm natel e!” chih gelh bang in.
Himahleh Tanchinhoih avek un a ngaikhe kei uhi. Isai in “Toupa, ka thugen uh kuan ahia gingta?” a chih bang in.
Huchi in ginna tuh zakna ziak in a hongom a, zakna Khrist thu kigen ziak in a hongom hi.
Ahihleh a bil un a za kei ua hia?
Za nake; “A husa uh gamchih ah a thang a,
a thu uh kawlmong pha in a thangsuakta” chih ahi.
Ahihleh,
Israel mite’n a za kei ua hia?
“Mipi dia gentham louhte k’on haza sak dia;
nam pilloute zang in k’on hehsak ding,” chi in,
Mosi in a gen masapen hi.
Huan Isai in hangsantak in,
“Hon zongloute muh in ka omta;
hon kanloute ka kimusakta” a chi hi.
Himahleh Israel mite thu ah, “Mi chihmawh leh selhatte din sun nilouh in ka ban ka zak hi” a chi hi.
Ahihleh Pathian in a mite a paikhia ahia? Paikhelou hial. Keileng Israel mi, Abraham suan, Benjamin nam ka hi ngal a.
Pathian in a mi a theihkholhte a paikhe kei hi. Laisiangthou in Elijah thu a gen na theikei ua hia? Aman Israel mite tungthu Pathian kiang ah a tun a,
“Toupa na zawlneite a that ua, na maitamte a hihchim ua; keimah kia nutsiat in ka om, keileng hon hihlup a hontum uhi” a chih.
Himahleh Pathian in bangchi’n a dawng a? “Baal ma a khukdin ngeilou mi sang sagih keimah ading in ka hawi hi” chi in, a dawng hi.
Huchibang in tulai in leng a sibang, hehpihna a tel a om uhi.
Hehpihna ziak ahihleh, nasep ziak ahita kei, huchi ahihkei leh, hehpihna tuh hehpihna ahita kei ding.
Bangchi ahita dia leh? Israel mite’n a zon uh a mu kei uh. Telte’n bel a mu uh, a dangte tengteng a nang gawp ta uhi.
“Pathian in tunitan in a kiang
uah lusukna kha a pia a,
muh theihlouhna mitte, zak theihlouhna bilte toh”
chih gelh bang in.
David in,
“A dohkan uh amau a ding in thang leh pial,
pukna leh phulakna honghi hen;
A theihlouhna ding un a mitte uh hong mial hen,
nang a nungzang uh kunsak gige in” a chi hi.
Ahihleh a kisuih uh a kipuk den na ding uhia? Hilou hial ding. A puk ziak un Jentelte kiang ah hotdamna a hongtung zawta hi, Israel mite hazat ding in.
Huchi in a pukna u bawn khovel hih hauhsakna a hih a, a kiamna uh bawn Jentelte hauhsakna ahihleh, a buchin nawnna uh bangchi phet a hamphatna lianzaw in a zui diam aw!
Huchi in nou Jentelte kiang ah ka gen ahi. Kei Jentelte kiang a sawltak ka hih ziak in, ka nasepna pen ka pahtawi ahi,
Huchi a ka chipihte ka hazat saktheih teitei na ding leh a lak ua khenkhatte ka hotdam theihna ding in.
Amau paihkhiakna bawn khovel toh kituahnawnna ahihleh, amau deih nawn na ding sihna a kipan hin nawnna loungal bang ahi dia?
Huan, gah masa thillat, tangbuang mekthem a sianthou leh huchi mah bang in a beupi a siangthou hi; a zungpi a siangthou leh a hiangte leng huchi mah bang ahi uhi.
Hiang khenkhat te hihtan a a om in, nang olive taklou, amau lak a phuhlut in na om a, olive sing a hauhna zung kikoppih sam na hihman in,
Hiang dangte lak ah kisathei ken. Kisathei mahle chin nang a zung vakpa na hi kei a, huai a zung nang honvakpa ahizaw hi.
Huan nang “Phuhlut a ka om theihna ding in hiangte hihtan in a om khinta vaw oi” na chi dia.
Ahi a gintaklouhna ziak un hihtan in a om ua, nang na ginna ziak in na ding ahi, uang kenla, lau zaw in:
Pathian in hiangtakte pen bawn a hawi kei ngal leh, nang leng a honhawi tuankei ding hi.
Huchi in Pathian hoihna leh a thukhauhna ngaihtuah in: a pukte ading a a thukhauhna; nang ading in bel a hoihna, hoihna a na om gige leh; huchi ahihkei leh nang leng satkhiak in na omsam ding.
Huan amau leng gingtalou a a om nilouh kei uleh, phuhlut in a om nawn ding uh; Pathian in amau a phutlut nawn thei hi.
Nang piandan a olive taklou a kipan a satsup bawn, piandanlou bang a olive sing hoih a phutlut a na om leh, tua a hiangtakte, amau olive sing ngei ah phutlut hina tel un chia!
Unaute aw, hiai thuguk na theihlouh uh ka utkei a, huchilou in zaw na kipilsak ding uh: Jentelte buchinna a hongtun masiah Israel mi khenkhatte tung ah siatna a hongtung tadih hi.
Huchi in Israel mi tengteng hotdam in a om ding uh:
“Zion a kipan in Hondampa a hongsuak ding a,
Jakob kiang a kipan Pathian limsaklouhna a hihmang ding”
“Hiai a kiang ua ka thukhun ding hiai ahi,
a khelhnate uh ka lakmang chiang in” chih gelh bang in.
Tanchinhoih lam ngaihtuah in, nou ziak in melma ahi ua; tel thu lam ngaihtuah in bel a pipute uh ziak in deihtakte ahi uhi.
Pathian in a thilthawnpiak ah leh a sapna ah a lungsim a khel ngeikei hi.
Nidanglai in Pathian thu na gingkei ua, himahleh tuin amau a ginlouh ziak un zahngaihna na mu ngal ua.
Huchi mah bang in tuin, Pathian in nou a hon hehpihna ziak a, zahngaihna a muhtheihna ding un amau leng ginglou eita ve ua.
Pathian in a hehpih vek theihna ding in mi tengteng ginlouhna ah a khumvekta hi.
Pathian pilna leh theihna hauhdanthuk hina tel e! A vaihawmnate theihtheih vual leh, a lampite suizoh vual hi keina tel e!
“Toupa lungsim kua’n ahia thei?
Kuan a vaihawm sak a?
“A ditnawn ding in leng a kiang ah kuan ahia thil pe masa?”
Amah a kipan leh amah ziak leh amah ading in thil tengteng a hongom ahi ngal a; amah kiang ah tangtawn in thupina om hen. Amen.
Huchi in unaute aw, Pathian zahngaihna ziak in, kithoihna hing, siangthou leh Pathian lungtuak ding in na sapum uh lan ding in k’on ngen ahi; huai na biakna dan ding him uh ahi.
Hiai khovel dan bang in omkei unla; Pathian deihlama hoih leh, lungtuahhuai tak leh hoihkim na theihtel theihna ding un, na lungsim uh a thaka om in hong lamdang zawta un.

Na lak uah kuamah na kilet sak ding hun val ua kiliansak lou in, Pathian in michih kiang a ginna hun a piak bangzel a diktak a ngaihtuah zaw ding in Pathian in honpiak hehpihna ziak in k’on chi chiat ahi.
Sapum khat ah hiang tampi i nei ua, hiang tengteng nasep bel a kibang kei hi,
huchi mah bang in, eite tampi himah lehang Khrist ah sapum khat ihi ua: a tuamtuam in i ki hiangtuah chiat uhi.
Hehpihna a honpiak dan bangzel in thilthawnpiak tuamtuam i neichiat uhi: thugen ding ahihleh i ginna toh kihun in i gen ding uhi;
Nasep ding ahihleh na i sem chiatchiat ding uh; thuhilhmi’n leng hilh hiathiat hen;
Taihilhmi’n leng taihilh geihgeih hen; thilpemi’n itlou in pia hen; vaihawmmi’n thanuam tak in hawm hen; mi hehpih in kipaktak in hehpih hen.
Itna ahihleh lepchiahna tellou in hi hen. Gilou hua unla, hoih lam len chinten un.
Unaute it lam ah ittak in kilainat tuahchiat un; pahtawi lam ah, kideihsak tuah chiat un.
Thanop lam ah, thadah kei un; Kha a vakna toh phatuamngai in Toupa nna sem un.
Lametna ah kipak unla; gimthuakna ah kuhkal unla; thumna ah thum teitei unla;
Misiangthoute taksapna ah taksap awnghu unla; mikhualte kipahpih in om nilouh un.
Honsawite vualzawl unla, vualzawl unla, hamsiat kei un.
Kipakte kipahpih unla, kapte kahpih un.
Ngaihtuah kibang in omchiat un, kingaihtuah sang lawkei unla, mi neuneu kithuahpih zaw un. Kipilsak kei un.
Kua gitlouh leng gilou in thuk kei un. Mi tengteng muh in thil kilawm ngaihtuah un.
A theih liai leh noumau lambek, mi tengteng toh kituak in om un.
Deihtakte aw, phu kila kei unla, Pathian hehna awn zaw un, “Phulak himhim keimah lak ding ahi, ken ka thukna ding, Toupa’n a chi” chih gelh ahi.
Huaiziak in, “Na melma a gilkial leh nekding pia inla; a dangtak leh dawn ding pia in; huchibang a na hihleh a lutung ah mei am na sekkhawm ahi ding hi.”
Gitlouh zoh in om kenla, hoihna in gilou zou zaw in.
Michih a tung ua vaihawmte thuthu in om hen. Pathian thu lou in kuamah vaihawm a om ngalkei ua; vaihawmmite Pathian seh ahi uh.
Huaiziak in kuapeuh vaihawmmi sel Pathian seh kalh ahi; a selte’n amau tung ah vaihawmna a mu ding uhi.
Vaihawmte thil hoih hihte ding in kihtakhuai ahi kei uhi; thil hoihlou hihte ding in bel kihtakhuai ahi uhi. Ahihleh vaihawmmi kihtalou a om na ut uhia? Thil hoih hih le uchin phat na loh ding uh;
Amah tuh na hoihna ding ua Pathian nasemmi ahi ngal a. Himahleh kihta un, namsau lah a mawktawi ngalkei a; amah Pathian nasemmi, thil hihkhialmi tung a heh a phulami ahi.
Huaiziak in Pathian hehna kihtakna ziak kia hilou in, na sialehpha theihna ziak un leng vaihawmmi thuthu in na om ding him uh ahi.
Hiaiziakin siah leng na liau zel ve ua leh; huchibang thil ngei hih teitei ding in Pathian nasemmite ahi uhi.
Mi tengteng kiang ah piak ding peuhmah pia un; leiman piakna ding kiang ah leiman pia unla, siah liauna dingpa kiang ah siah liau unla; kihtak dingpa leng kihta unla; zahtak dingpa leng zahtak un.
Ki-ittuahna loungal, kuamah bangmah ba kei un; amau mihinpih itpa’n dan a zuikimta hi.
Hiaite, “Angkawm ken, Tualthat ken, Gu ken, Eng ken” chih leh, thupiak dang omlai himhimte, “Nangmah na ki-it bang in na invengte na it ding hi” chih in a khaikhawm vek hi.
Itna in a invengte a hihse ngeikei a; huaiziak in itna zaw dan zuih kimna ahi.
Huailou in, tu bang hun ahia chih na thei ua, ihmu khanloh a hun mahmahta chih na thei uhi. Tun zaw i gintak tunglai sang in i hotdamna a nai zawta ngal a.
Zan a bei dekdek ta a, khua a vak dekta hi; huaiziak in mial a thilhihte paikhia in vak thuam in i kithuam ding uh.
Sun a om bang in kilawm tak in i om ding uh, zu dawn buai leh zu kham a omlou in, huk leh kingaihhat a omlou in, kilai leh ki haza a omlou in.
Toupa Jesu Khrist in kithuam zaw unla, na sa duhgawlna uh pichin ding in bangmah kibawl kei un.
Huan ginna hatlou mi, a ngaihdante gense lou in ngai un.
Mi khat in thil bangkim nethei din a kigingta a, mi hatlou inbel anteh louhing kia a ne hi.
Bangkim nete’n a neloute simmawh kei henla; a neloute’n leng a nete gense kei heh; Pathian in amah a kipahpih khin ngal a.
Midang sikha gensepa kua na hia? A din leh a puk amah pu ading ahi. Himahleh amah zaw dinsak in a om ding, Toupa’n a dingsak thei hi.
Mi khat in ni khat nidang sang in a sep thupi tuam a, midang in ni tengteng kibang chiat in a sep. Michih amah lungsim ah kitheichian hen aw.

Ni tangpan Toupa pahtawina ding in a tang hi. Huan bangkim nepa’n, Pathian kiang ah kipahthu a gen ziak in, Toupa pahtawina ding in a ne a; a neloupa’n leng Toupa pahtawina ding in a ne kei a, Pathian kiang ah kipahthu a gen hi.
Kuamah eimah a dia hing i hi kei ua, kuamah eimah a dia si leng i hi sam kei hi.
I hin leh Toupa ading in i hing a; i sih in leng Toupa adia si i hi ngal a: huaiziak in i hin in leng, i sih in leng Toupa a i hi uhi.
Khrist sihna leh a hinnawnna pen, mihing leh misi Toupa a hih theihna ding ahi.
Himahleh nang bang a chia na unau gensia na hia oi? Ahihkeileh nang bang a chia na unau simmawh na hia oi? Pathian thukhenna tutphah ma ah i vek un i ding ding uhi.
“Toupa’n mi tengteng ka ma ah a kun ding ua,
lei tengteng leng
Pathian kiang ah a kipulak ding uh chi in, ka chiam ahi” a chi, chih gelh ahi.
Huchi in, i vek un Pathian kiang ah eimah tanchin i gen chiat ding uhi.
Huaiziak in, kigense nawn keini, kuapeuh in a unau lampi ah kisuihna hiam dalna hiam koihlouh tum zaw hen.
Amah mawngmawng ah sianglou bangmah himhim a omkei chih Toupa Jesu ah ka thei mahmah hi; bangkhat sianglou a seh pen bel a seppa ading in a sianglou ahi hi.
Na banghiam nek ziak a na unau lungsim a nat leh, itna dan in na gamta kei ahi. A sih sik a Khrist in a sih sakpa na thilnek in hihmang kei hen;
Huchi in nou adia hoihna gilou lam a gen in omkei hen.
Pathian gam nek leh dawn thu hilou in Kha Siangthou a diktatna, kituahna leh kipahna ahizaw hi.
Kuapeuh huai thu ah Khrist nasem Pathian kipahpih leh mihing phat in a om hi.
Huchi in kituahna ding leh kihihhat tuahna ding thilte i delh ding uh.
Na thilnek ziak in Pathian nasep hihse ken. Thil tengteng a siangthou ngei a, himahleh na banghiam nek in mi a hihpuk leh a nepa ading in gilou ahi.
Na unau pukna ding ahihleh, sa neklouhte, uain dawnlouhte, thil bangpeuh hihlouh a hoih ahi.
Ginna na neih Pathian ma ah nangmah kia theih in nei mai in. Amah hoih saklam a siamlouh kitangsak lou tuh a hampha hi.
Himahleh in ginglelpa’n a nek leh, ginna a a neklouh ziak in, siamlouh a tang hi; bangpeuh ginna lou a hih zaw khelhna ahi.
Huchi in ei a hatte’n, eimah kipahna zong lou in, a hatloute hatlouhnate i thuak pih ding uh ahi.
Eimah invengte hih phattuamna ding in a hoihna ding un kipahsak i tum chiat ding uh.
Khrist in leng amah kipahna a zong ngal kei a; “Nang hon taite taina ka tung ah a tuta” chih gelh bang in ahizaw.
Laisiangthou a kuhkalna leh khamuanna mu a lametna i neih theihna ding un, nidanglai a gelh peuhmahte eite hon hilhna ding a gelh ahi uhi.
Tuin kuhkalna leh khamuanna Pathian in, Khrist Jesu ah noute lungsim leh ngaihtuahna munkhat pu in hon omsak hen:
Huchi a, lungsim munkhat leh kituaktak a Toupa Jesu Khrist Pa, leh Pathian na pahtawi theihna ding uh ahi.
Huaiziak in Khrist in Pathian thupina ding a noute a hon kipahpih mah bang in, khat leh khat kipahpihtuah chiat un.
Tuin, pipute kiang a thuchiamte hihkipna ding in Khrist Pathian thutakdan theihsakna ding in zeksumte nasempa a hong hita chih na kiang uah ka gen hi:
A hehpihna ziak a Jentelte’n Pathian a pahtawina ding un,
“Huaiziak in Jentelte lak ah k’on phat dia,
na min pahtawina ding in la ka sa ding,”
chih gelh bang in.
“Huan nou Jentel tengtengte aw,
a mite toh kipak un” a chi nawn hi.
“Nou Jentel tengtengte aw,
Toupa phat un, mi tengteng in amah phat uhen” a chi nawn hi.
Isai in:
“Jesse zungzam a hong khang ding a,
Jentelte tung a vaihawm dingpa a hong dingkhe ding hi;
amah ah Jentelte’n a lametna uh a koih ding uhi” a chilai hi.
Kha Siangthou thilhihtheihna ziak a lametna na hauh theihna ding un, lametna Pathian, na gintak ziak un, kipahna leh kituahna chiteng in honhih dim hen.
Huan ka unaute aw, nou tungthu zaw noumau mah hoihna in na dim ua, na ki hanthawn tuahthei uh chih keimahtakin leng diktak in ka thei hi.
Himahleh Pathian in a honpiak hehpihna ziak in nou hon theihpih ding in koi kalkal hiam ah hangsantak in ka gelh hi,
Jentelte kiang a Khrist Jesu nasempa a ka om theihna ding in, Jentelte Kha Siangthou a hih siangthou a hih ua, pomtak a hih theihna ding un Pathian Tanchinhoih lam ah siampu na ka sem ahi.
Huchi in Pathian na ka sep lamthu ah Khrist Jesu ah kisaktheihna ding ka nei ahi.
Khrist in Jentelte thumangsak ding a ka thugen leh nasepnate zang a a sepkhiakte loungal bangmah ka gen ngam ngal kei hi.

Chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte, thilhihtheihna ah, Kha Siangthou thilhihtheihna in Jerusalem khua leh a kim gam a kipan in, Illirikum gam pha in, Khrist Tanchinhoih gamchih ah ka hilh kimta; keimah hon zang a a thilhih tuh huchitel ahi.
Ahi, midang suangphum tung a lem ka hihlouhna ding in, Tanchinhoih Khrist min lohkhitna mun a genlou in.
“A tanchin gen ngeilouhnate’n
a mu ding ua, za ngei nailoute’n a za ding uh” chih gelh bang in,
gen ka tum zaw ahi.
Huaiziak in ahi, na kiang ua hong ka kikhel sak naknak.
Tuin bel hiai gam kim ah sepna mun himhim ka neita kei a, kum tampi na kiang ua hong ut in leng ka omta hi;
Spain gam a ka hoh chiang in ka pai kawm a nou honmuh ka kilamen ngal a, noumau toh kithuah khawm phot in, maban ka paina ding ah noute’n n’on vakhak suk uh leng ka lamen ahi.
Tuin bel, misiangthoute nasem ding in Jerusalem khua ah ka hoh tadih ding hi.
Masidonia leh Akhaia gam a mite’n kipaktak in Jerusalem khua a misiangthoute lak a gentheite adin thilpiakte a pe chiat uhi.
Hiai thilpiak in amau nakpi’n kipaksak hi; amau ding in leng bat ahi him hi; Jentelte’n Judate khalam Vualzawlna a kikoppih ua leh, salam thil a amaute taksap awng a huksak sam uh a kilawm him ahi.
Huaiziak in huai ka hih a, gah leng amaute diktak a ka muhsak nung in, noute hontawn in, Spain gam ah ka pai zel ding hi.
Huan na kiang ua ka hong chiang in, Khrist tanchinhoih vualzawlna kim pu in ka hongding chih ka thei hi.
Unaute aw, Pathian kiang a n’on thumsak na uah, hon thumpih teitei ding in Toupa Jesu Khrist leh Kha Siangthou itna in nget petmah in k’on ngen ahi;
Juda gam a gingloute lak a ka bit theihna ding leh, Jerusalem khua adia huhna ka tawi misiangthoute kipahna lamtak a hihtheihna ding in.
Pathian hoihsak bang a nuamtak a na kiang ua ka hong a, i halh khawm vek theihna ding in.
Lemna Pathian na vek ua kiang ah om hen. Amen.
I sanggamnu, Phoebi, Kenkriai khua a saptuamte nasem,

Toupa min a misiangthoute bang a nana kipahpihna ding uleh, na huh uh a kiphatmohna peuh a nana huh ding un hon kimeltheihsak ka ut ahi. Amahmah in leng mi tampi a na huh a, kei ngei leng a hon huhzel hi.
Khrist Jesu a hon huhte Priscilla leh Akuila chibai honbuk sak un.
Amau ka hinna humbitna ding in amau ngawngtan a ngap ua: amau tung kia ah kipahthu ka gen kei a, Jentel saptuam tengteng tung ah leng ka gen sam hi.
A inn ua saptuam kikhawmte leng chibai honbuk sak un. Ka deihtak, Epanita, Asia gam a Khrist gingta masapen, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Mari nou dia semgim, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Ka chipih leh ka hentakpih, Andronika leh Junia, chibai honbuk sak un; amau sawltakte lak a minthang tak ahi ua, kei sang a Khrist a om masa zaw ahi uh.
Amplias, Toupa a ka deihtak, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Khrist a i naseppih uh Urbane leh ka deihtak Stakhis chibai hon buksak un.
Khrist a mitak, Apelle, chibai honbuk sak un. Aristobula inkuanpihte lak a mite chibai honbuk sak un.
Ka chipih, Herodion, chibai honbuk sak un. Narkissa inkuanpihte lak a mi, Toupa a om, chibai honbuk sak un.
Triphaina leh Triphosa Toupa a semgimte, chibai hon buksak un aw. Deihtak Persi, Toupa a semgim mahmah sa chibai hon na buk sak un.
Toupa tel Rufas leh a nu, kei nu sam leng, chibai hon na buk sak un.
Asinkaraita, Phligon, Hermas, Patroba, Hermes te a kiang ua unau omte toh, chibai hon na buksak un aw.
Philologas leh Julia, Nerias leh sanggamnu, Olimpa leh, a kiang ua Mi Siangthou om tengteng, chibai hon na buksak un.
Tawp siangthou in chibai kibuk un. Khrist saptuam pawl tengteng in chibai honbuk chiat uhi.
Huan unaute aw, thuhilhna thu noumau hilhlouh lam a kikhenna leh pukna omsakte apan kiveng ding leh kiheisan ding in k’on ngen ahi.
Huchibang mite’n i Toupa Khrist na a sem kei ua, amau gilpi nna a sem zaw uhi; a kamphat uleh a kamsiam un mi pilloute lungtang a zekhem nak uhi.
Na omdan uh mi tengteng lak ah a thangkheta ngal a. Huaiziak in noumau tungthu ah ka kipak hi; himahleh, hoihlam a na pil ua, gilou lam a na pillouh uh ka deih ahi.
Huan lemna Pathian in na khepek nuai uah Setan a hon sikdensak pah ding hi. I Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.
Ka naseppih Timothi leh ka chipih Lusias leh Jason, Sosipaterte’n chibai a honbuk uhi.
Kei Tertia, hiai laigelhtu in, Toupa min in chibai ka honbuk hi.
Ka tunnapa Gaias leh saptuam tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi. Huai sum kempa Erata leh unaupa Kuartas in chibai a honbuk uhi.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na vek ua kiang ah om hen. Amen.
Tuin Amah, ka Tanchinhoih gen bang leh thuguk kilakna bangbang a Jesu Khrist ka tangkoupih bang a noute hon hihhattheipa, huai thuguk tanglai sawtpi mahmah sung selguk a na om mahleh,
tun bel ginna thumanna piangsak ding in zawlnei laibute zang a nam tengteng kiang a theihsak leh tangtawn Pathian thupiak bang in taklat in a hong omta hi.
Pilna Pathian kiang kia ah, Jesu Khrist tawn in thupina tangtawn dong in om hen! Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihlama Jesu Khrist sawltak hi ding a sap leh i unaupa Sostheni in,
Korinth khua a Pathian saptuam omte, Khrist Jesu a sehtuam siangthoute, misiangthou hi ding a sapte leh gamchih a i Toupa, amau leh eite Toupa, Jesu Khrist minlou tengteng kiang ah:
Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Khrist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Khrist Jesu a Pathian hehpihna noute kiang a hong kipiak ziak in na tungthu uah Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen gige hi;
Bangkim ah thugen peuhmah ah leh theihna chiteng ah, amah a hihhauh in na om uhi.
Huchi in Khrist thu ka theihsak pen noumau ah hihkip in a om hi;
Huan i Toupa Jesu Khrist kilakna ngakkawm in, khalam thilpiak himhim na tasam kei uhi;
Aman i Toupa Jesu Khrist ni chiang a gensiat bei a na omna ding un, a tawppha in a hon hihkip behlap ding hi.
A Tapa Jesu Khrist i Toupa toh kithuahna nei ding a nou honsam lutpa, Pathian a muanhuai hi.

Huan unaute aw, na vek un thu kibang na gen ua, nalak ua kikhenna himhim a omlouhna ding in lungsim munkhat leh ngaihtuah munkhat a diktak a na kizop chinten zawkna ding un Toupa Jesu Khrist min in k’on ngen ahi.
Ka unaute aw, na tungtangthu uh, nalak uah kiselna a om chih Kloi inkuanpihte’n honhilh uhi.
Hiai ka chihna ahi, nou sung a mi tengteng in, “Kei Paul pawl ka hi,” “kei Apollos pawl ka hi,” “kei Kifa pawl ka hi,” “kei zaw Khrist pawl ka hi,” na chih uh.
Khrist khenzak in a om ahia? Paul na sik un kilhden in a om ahia? Ahihkeileh Paul min a baptist in na om ua hia?
Khrispa leh Gaias loungal nalak uah mi kuamah k’on baptist louh ziak in Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen ahi;
Huchi hi kei leh zaw min keimah min a baptist na hi uh a chi kha ding uhi.
Stephen inkuanpihte bel ka baptist ngei a, tuate louzaw midang ka baptist hia ka theikei.
Khrist in baptist ding in a honsawl kei a, Tanchinhoih gen ding in a honsawl ahi; thupil a genlou in, huchilou in zaw Khrist Kros thilhihtheihna bangmahlou a suaksak kha ding uhi.
Kros thu zaw mangthang lelte adin haina ahi ngal a; ei hotdam lelte adin bel Pathian thilhihtheihna ahizaw hi.
“Mi pil pilna ka hihmang ding a,
lemthei lemtheihna leng
ka paikhe ding” chih gelh ahi.
Mi pil koi ah ahia? Laigelhmi koi ah ahia? Hiai khovel a selhatmi koi ah ahia? Pathian in khovel pilna haihuai ahi chih a theisak kei ahia?
Pathian pilna ah bel, khovel in a pilna zang a Pathian a theihtheih louh nung in thugen haihuai zang a a gingtate hotdam a kipahlam ahi.
Judate’n chiamtehnate a phut ua, Grikte’n pilna’n a zong uhi.
Eite’n bel Khrist kilhden thu i gen ua; huai tuh Judate adin pukna, Jentelte adin haina ahi;
Himahleh Judate leng hi hen aw, Grikte leng hi heh, sapte adin zaw Khrist, Pathian thilhihtheihna leh Pathian pilna pen ahi.
Pathian haina mihing sang in a pilzaw a, Pathian hatlouhna leng mihing sang in a hatzaw hi.
Unaute aw, a hon sapna ngaihtuah dih ua, salam a mi pil tampite, mi hat tampite, mi hoih pipite, sap a hihlouh dan uh:
Himahleh Pathian in khovel thilhaite a tel a, mipilte a zahlaksak theihna ding in; huan Pathian in khovel thilhatloute a tel a, a hatte a zahlak sak theihna ding in;
Khovel thil niam leh thil siammawhhuaite, thil omloute tan in Pathian in a tel a, thil omte bangmahloua a bawl theihna ding in;
Huchi in Pathian ma ah mi kuamah a kiuangsak theikei ding uh.
Amah Khrist a noute hinna nak ahi; Pathian in Khrist i pilna, i diktatna, i sianthouna leh i tatna hi ding in a bawlta hi;
Huaiziak in gelh a hih bang in, “A suang peuhmah in Toupa suang hen.”
Unaute aw, Pathian thuguk nou honhilh ding a na kiang ua ka honglai in thugen thupi leh pilna thupi toh ka hongpai kei hi.
Jesu Khrist, amah mah kilhden a om thu kia loungal nalak uah bangmah theih ka tum kei hi.
Hatlou leh lau in, nakpitak a ling kawm in nalak uah ka om hi.
Ka paukam suak leh ka thugente thupil a khemna thu ahi kei a, Kha leh thilhihtheihna theihsakna in ahizaw hi.
Huchi a na ginna uh mihing pilna a kingalou a, Pathian thilhihtheihna a kinga a a om theihzawkna ding in.
Himahleh pichingte lak ah ahihleh thupil i hilh zel a, himahleh hiai khovel thupil zaw ahi kei; hiai khovel vaihawmte mangthang dingte thupil leng ahi sam kei hi:
Pathian pilna guk leh kisel, i thupina ding a Pathian in khovel omma a a sehkholhsa pen i hilh zawnak hi.
Hiai khovel vaihawmte himhim in a theikei uhi; thei le uzaw thupina Toupa kilhden lou ding hi ve un.
“Mit a muh ngeilouh,
bil a zak ngeilouh,
mihing lungtang a lut ngeilou,
Pathian in amah itte adia a bawl,”
chih gelh bang in.
Pathian in Kha in huaite ei a hon theisakta hi; Kha in bangkim Pathian thugilte leng a suikhe vek hi.
Mihing ngaihtuahte mihing lungsim asung a om mah lou in, kuan ahia thei ding? Huchi mah bang in Pathian ngaihtuahte Pathian Kha mah lou kuamah in a theikei uhi.
Huan a thawn a Pathian in thil honpiakte i theihna ding in, eite’n zaw khovel kha hilou in, Kha, Pathian a kipan ngei i mu zaw uhi
Mihing pilna a sinsak thute a hilhlou in Kha sinsak in i hilhzaw ua, Kha neite kiang ah khalam thutakte i hilhchian uhi.
Khovel min Pathian Kha thilpiakte a sang kei nak hi, amah ngaihdan in haihuai ahi ngal a, kha a theihchet a hih ziak in a theithei kei hi.
Khami in bel thil bangkim a chian zel a, amah lah kuamah in a chian kei uhi.
“Kuan ahia Toupa lungsim theikhin a,
amah thuhilh thei ding?”
Eite’n bel Khrist lungsim i pu uhi.
Unaute aw, kha mite kiang a gen bang in na kiang uah thu ka gen theikei hi; samite, Khrist a naungekte kiang a gen bang in ka genzaw hi.
An gum na nektheih nailouh ziak un, nawitui in ka honvak a, tua an gum hi tuin leng na nethei naikei lailai uh, sami na hihlai ziak un.
Nalak uah kihazatna leh kiselna a om nak ziak in sa mi hilai in mihing bang a omlai hilou na hi u hiam?
Mi khat in “Paul pawl ka hi,” midang in, “Kei zaw Apollos pawl ka hi,” na chih laiteng uh mihing lel hilai hilou na hi uhiam?
Apollos kua ahia leh? Paul leng kua ahia? Nasemmi, noumau hon gingta sakmi lel eive ua, huai leng Toupa’n a piak bangzel in ahi.
Ken ka suan a, Apollos in tui in a vak a, himahleh Pathian in a khangsak hi.
Huchi in a khangsakpa Pathian kia loungal, a suanpa lah bangmah ahi kei a, tui a vakpa leng bangmah ahi tuankei hi.
Huan a suanpa leh tui a vakpa pumkhat ahi ua, himahleh amau sepgim bangzel in, amau kipahman a mu tuaktuak ding uhi.
Koute Pathian na seppihte ka hi ua, noute Pathian louma na hi ua, Pathian inlam leng na hi uhi.
Pathian in hehpihna honpiak bangzel in inlam heutupen piltak bang in ken suangphum ka lem a, midang in a tung ah inn a lam uhi. Himahleh michih a tung a a lamdan ding uah pilvang uhen.
Suangphum lepkhitsa loungal suangphum dang kuamah in a lem theita kei ua, huai suangphum Jesu Khrist ahi.
Hiai suangphum tung ah kuapeuh in dangkaeng in hiam, dangkain hiam, suang mantamin hiam, singin hiam, loupain hiam, buhpawl hiam inn lam leh; chetna ni tungding ahi.
Michih nasep a honglang ding hi; ni in a hihlang ding ahi ngal a, mei a a kilak ding ziak in; mei ngeingei in michih nasep bangchibang ahia chih a enchian ding hi.
Kua nasep leng a tung a a lampen a om gige leh huai mi in kipahman a mu ding.
Kua nasep leng a kat leh huai mi in a tan ding hi; amah taktak zaw mei a paisuak bang in hotdam in a om ding hi.
Pathian tempul na hih uh leh Pathian Kha noumau sung ah a teng gige chih na theikei ua hia?
Kuapeuh in Pathian tempula hihsiat leh Pathian in huai mi a hihse ding; Pathian tempula siangthou ngal a, huai tempul noumau na hi uhi.
Kuamah amah leh amah kikhem kei hen. Nalak ua kuapeuh hiai khovel a pil a kisak leh, a hongpil theihna ding in mihai hongsuak hen.
Hiai khovel pilna Pathian ngaihdan in haina ahi.
“Aman amaute a pil lepchiahna uah a man hi” chih gelh ahi:
Toupa’n mipilte ngaihtuahna a thawn ahi" chih a thei chi a gelh ahi nawnlai hi.
Huaiziak in kuamah in mihingte suang kei uhen; bangkim nou a ahi vekta ngal a;
Paul hiam, Apollos hiam, Kifa hiam, khovel hiam, hinna hiam, sihna hiam, thil omsa hiam, thil hongom ding hiam;
Avek in nou a ahivek hi; noumau leng Khrist a na hi ua; Khrist leng Pathian a ahi.
Koute zaw Khrist nasemte leh Pathian thuguk kemte bang in min hon thei uhen.
Hiai ah kempa mi muanhuai hih a kiphamoh ahi.
Himahleh nou n’on ze-etna ua leh mihing ngaihtuahna in n’on ze-etna uh kei ading in thil neuchik ahi.
Keimah leng ka ki ze-et ngei tuankei. Bangmah kimawhsakna ding ka kithei kei a; himahleh huai in siam hon tangsak tuankei hi; hon ze-etpa Toupa ahizaw hi.

Huchi in a hun ma in bangmah ze-et kei un, Toupa hongpai masiah, aman mial a thil selgukte vak ah a hon lakhe ding hi; lungtang a tupte leng a hihlang lai ding hi; huai hun chiang in michih in Pathian a kipan in amau tan hun chiat in phatna a loh chiat ding uhi.

Unaute aw, na phattuampihna ding un hiai thu Apollos leh kei tung ah ka belh hi, huchi a koute a kipan a hindan na sin theihna ding uleh, a kigelhsa pen sang a na lak ua kuamah mi khat midang sang a ngaina zaw a na kisaktheihpih louhna ding un.
Kuan ahia nou a thiltuam deuh om a mu? Na muhsawn louh ngal uh bang ahia na neih uh? Huchi a a musawn lel na hih uleh na muhsawn uh a thawn a piak hilou bang a bangdia kisathei zenzen?
Tuin na vahta ua! Tuin na hong hauta ua! Kou lou in vai na hawmta uhi! Ahi, vaihawm taktak le uchin ka vaihawm sam theihna ding un.
Pathian in kou sawltakte, si ding a sehsa bang in a nanungpen in hon sepkhia hi in ka thei ahi; khovelte leh angelte leh mihingte mitmuh a etnop a bawl in ka om uhi.
Kou zaw Khrist ziak in mihai ka hi ua, nou bel Khrist ah mi pil na hi zaw uhi; kou zaw ka hatkei ua, nou bel na hat uhi; nou zaw mi pahtawi in na om ua, kou zaw mi simmawh in ka omzaw uhi.
Tutan in leng ka gilkial un ka dangtak ua, puansilh ka kiching kei ua, mi khutthak nuhna ka hi ua, mun leh mual ka neikei uhi;
Koumau khut a sem in ka gim mahmah uhi; min hontai uleh ka vualzawl ua; a honsawi uleh ka thuak teitei uhi;
Min hon gensiat uleh ka khem ua; tutan in leng khovel ninnok thil tengteng nin kihhuai bang in a honbawl uhi.
Na zumna ding un hiai thu ka gelh ahi kei a, ka ta deihtakte bang a hon taihilh ding in ka gelh ahizaw hi.
Khrist ah heutu sing khat nei mahle uchin, pa zaw tampi na nei tuankei uhi. Ken Khrist Jesu ah Tanchinhoih in noute k’on neikhia hi.
Huaiziak in ka omdan zui ding in k’on ngen ahi.
Hiaiziakin Timothi, Toupa a ka ta deihtak leh muanhuai, na kiang uah k’on sawl hi. Aman Khrist a ka omdan, gamchih a saptuamte teng thu ka hilh zel dan noute a hon theisak nawn ding hi.
Huan kei na kiang ua hong nawnlou ding bang zen in khenkhat nana kiuangsak uhi.
Himahleh Toupa’n pha a sakleh sawtlou chik nung in na kiang uah ka hongding, huchi in mi kiuangsakte kamhat thu hilou in, a thilhihtheihna uh ka thei zawta ding hi.
Pathian gam zaw kamhat thu ah a omkei a, thilhihtheihna ah a omzaw hi.
Bang na deihzaw ua? Sikchiang toh hia, itna leh kingaihniamna lungsim toh na kiang ua ka hongding?
Nalak uah kingaihna nin a om chih thu a thang vengvung hi. Huchibang kingaihna nin Jentelte lak a leng om ngeilou, nalak ua mi khat in amah pa zi a kitenpih hi.
Huai thilhihpa nalak ua kipan delhkhiak ding a lungngaih naksang in na kisaktheih pih zaw uhi.
Kei mahmah sapum in ka pang kei na a, kha in noute lak ah ka om a, thil huchitel hihpa tuin leng Toupa Jesu min in nalak ua pang bang a kingaihtuah in thupukna ka bawlta hi,
I Toupa Jesu Khrist min a na kikhop chiang un, noute lak ah kha in ka om a, Toupa Jesu Khrist thilhihtheihna leng a om hi,
Mi huchibang zaw a kha Toupa ni chiang a hotdam a a om theihna ding in a sa hihmang ding in Setan kiang ah pia un.
Na kisaktheihna uh hoihlou ahi. Silngou tawmchik in tanghou beu a pum in a zelsuak chih na theikei ua hia?
Silngou panglou na hih mah bang un tanghou beu thak na hong hihtheihna ding un silngou luipen pai khesiang un. I Paikan Ankuangluina ding Khrist latkhiakin a omta hi:
Huaiziak in Ankuanglui ni, silngou lui a Ankuang lui lou in, nunsia leh gitlouhna silngou a leng Ankuanglui samlou in, takna leh thutak tanghou silngou sohlouhin Ankuang i lui zaw ding uhi.
Ka laikhak ah kingaihhatte kithuahpih lou ding in na kiang uah ka gelh hi;
Hiai khovel a kingaihhatte hiam, huaiham leh lepgute hiam, milimbete hiam kithuahpih hetlouh ding chi ka hi kei a; huchibang hileh khovel a kipan na paikhiak uh kul ding ahi.

Tun bel kuapeuh unau min paw ngal in, kingaihhatmi hiam, mi huaiham hiam, milim bemi hiam, hanhatmi hiam, zukham hatmi hiam, lepgumi hiam hileh, kithuahpih lou ding in na kiang uah ka gelh ahi; mi huchibang kiang ah nek leng ne kei un.
Pawlam mite tung a vaihawm ding ken bang ahia ka awlmoh ding om? Nou sung a mite hilou hia na ngaihtuah ding uh?
Pawlam a mite tung a Pathian in vaihawm hilou hia? “Huai migiloupa na lak ua kipan koihmang un.”
Na lak uah kuapeuh in midang toh thubuai neita le uchin, misiangthoute ma a tunlou in, mi diktatloute ma ah na tun ngam ding ua hia?
Ahihleh misiangthoute’n khovel tung a vaihawm ding ahi chih na theikei ua hia? Khovel mite tung a bawn vaihawm ding na hih uleh, thil neupente leng ngaihtuah taklou na hi ua hia?
Tulai damsung thute genlouh angelte nangawn i vaihawm ding uh ahi chih na theikei ua hia?
Huchi in tulai damsung thute ngaihtuah ding na neih un bangdia saptuamte ngaihniam pente ngaihtuah sak na hi ua?
Na zumna ding un ka gen ahi. A unaute kal a thu hihpuk thei mi pil, khat bek na lak uah na mu kei ua ading maw?
Unau in a unau mah ginglou mite vaihawmna a a tut zawk nak!
Hilou ahi, hiai na diklouhna khat uh ahipah hi, thubuai na kineih tuah nak uh. Bangdia dikloupi a hihna na thuak zaw lou? Bang a chia kizangsak zaw mailou oi?
Hilou ahi, noumau ngei in na unaute uh tung ah leng na hihdik kei ua, na zangsak uhi.
Ahihleh midiktatloute’n Pathian gam a luah kei ding uh chih na theikei ua hia? Zekhem in omkei un, kingaihhatte, milim bete, angkawmte leh mihukte leh tokawhukte,
Gutate, mihuaihamte, zukhamhatte, salhhatte leh lepgute’n Pathian gam a luah kei ding uh.
Huan noute khenkhat huchibang na hi uhi; himahleh Toupa Jesu Khrist min in leh i Pathian Kha ah siansak na hita ua, hihsiangthou na hita uh, siamtang na hita uhi.
“Thil bangkim hih kei ding in a sianga” himahleh thil bangkim hih a hoihkim kei hi; “Thil bangkim hih kei ding in a sianga” himahleh bangmah sikha din ka kiphal kei hi.
“Nek dingte gilpi a ahi a, gilpi leng nek ding a ahi” himahleh Pathian in ahihmang tuaktuak ding. Huan sapum pen kingaihna ding ahi kei a, Toupa ading ahi; Toupa leng sapum ading ahi:
Pathian in misi lak a kipan Toupa a kaithou a, eite leng a thilhihtheihna in a hon kaithou sam ding hi.
Na sapum uh Khrist hiang ahi chih na theikei ua hia? Khrist hiangte laksak in kizuak hiang ding peuh in ka bawl dia hia?
Bawllou hial ding. Ahihleh kizuak zop amah toh pumkhat ahi uh chih na theikei ua hia? “A nihun sa pumkhat a hi ding uh” a chi ngal a.
Toupa zop bel amah toh kha pumkhat ahi uhi.
Kingaih taisanun. Mihing thil hihkhelh chiteng sapum pawlam ah ahi; mingaihhat in bel amah sapum tung ah thil a hihkhial hi.
Ahihleh na sapum uh, na sungua om Pathian kiang a kipan a na muh uh, Kha Siangthou tempul ahi chih na theikei ua hia? Noumaua leng na hi kei uhi.
Noute man a leisa na hihman un, na pumpi uh leh na kha Pathiana mah in, Pathian pahtawi un.
Tuin, na thilgelh thute uzaw: “Pasal ading in numei khoih louh a hoih hi.”
Himahleh kingaihna a om nak ziak in pasal chih in amah zi chiat nei henla, numei chih in leng amah pasal chiat nei hen.
Pasal in a zi kiang ah a tan ding hun pia hen; huchi mah bang in zi in leng a pasal kiang ah a tan ding hun pe sam hen.
Zi in amah sapum tung ah thu a neikei a, a pasal in thu a nei zaw hi; huchi mah bang in pasal in leng amah sapum tung ah thu a neikei a, a zi in thu a nei zaw hi.

Thum ding a na kipiak theihna ding uleh, na kikholh nawn theihna ding ua sawtlou kal a dia pha nasak tuaktuak kei ngal uleh a kuamahmah kizangsak kei un, huchilou in zaw na kidek zohlouh ziak un Setan in a honkhem kha ding hi.
Himahleh hiai thu thupiak dan hilou in phal lam thu in ka genzaw ahi.
Ken bel, mi tengteng keimah bang a a omvek uh ka deih ahi. Himahleh michih in Pathian a kipan thilpiak amau muh lam, khat in lam tuam in khat in lam dang in a neichiat uhi.
Himahleh lengkulte leh meithaite kiang ah huchi in ka chi ahi: Keimah bangtak in om le uh amau din a hoih ding hi.
Kidektheihna a neihkei ua leh kiteng u hen; huk sang in kiten a hoihzaw hi.
Huan kitengsate kiang ah thu ka pia, keimah bel hilou in, Toupa piak ahizaw; Zi in a pasal khen kei hen;
A khen vanglak leh pasal nei nawnlou in om vanglak hen, ahihkeileh, a pasal toh mah kituak nawn uheh; huan pasal in a zi ma kei hen.
Midang kiang ah ahihleh Toupa hilou in keimah in ka gen: Unau kuapeuh in zi, gingloumi kitenpih leh a kiang a om gige a ut leh, ma kei hen.
Huan numei pasal ginglou kitenpih in, a pasal in a kiang a om gige a ut leh ma kei hen.

Pasal gingloumi a zi ziak in hihsiangthou in a om a, zi gingloumi leng a pasal ziak in hihsiangthou in a omsam ahi; huchi hita kei leh, na tate uh a siangthou kei ding uhi; himahleh a siangthou na uhi.
Himahleh a ginglou pen in a khen leh khen mai hen, huchibang ah zaw unaupa hiam, unaunu hiam, hen ahita kei ding. Pathian in lemna ah a honsam hi.
Zi aw, na pasal na hotdam ding leh ding louh bangchi’n na thei a eita? Pasal aw, na zi na hotdam ding leh ding louh bangchi’n na thei a eita?
Himahleh, Toupa’n michih kiang a a piak bang chiat leh Pathian in michih a saplaia a omdan bangchiatin om hen. Huchibang in saptuam pawl tengteng ah ka hihkip hi.
Zeksumsa a sapa om uhia? Zeksumlouh honghi tuankei uhen. Zeksumlouh a om sap a om uhia? Zeksum tuan dah uhen.
Pathian thupiakte zuih lel louh ngal zeksum i chih bangmah ahi kei a, zeksum louh leng bangmah ahi kei hi.
Michih sapa a omlai ua a tan ngeina uah om chiat uhen.
Sikha hisa a sap na hi hia? Khawksa tuan ken. Na suahtak theih leh sensukin.
Sikha hisa a om Toupa sap Toupa sikha noplen ahi a; huchi mah bang in noplen sa a sap Khrist sikha ahi.
Man a lei na hita ua mihingte sikha ah lut kei un.
Unaute aw, michih sapa a omlai bangbang in Pathian kiang ah om gige hen.
Huan nungak siangthou lam thu ah zaw Toupa thupiak himhim ka neikei; himahleh muanhuai a om ding in Toupa kiang a kipan zahngaihna mu ka hih ziak in ka ngaihtuah dan ka gen ding.
Tulai haksatna ziak in pasal a omdan ngeingei bang in om leh amah ading in hoih in ka gingta hi.
Zi a hen na hi hia? Kisutkhiak tum ken. Zi a henlouh na hi hia? Zi zong ken.

Himahleh zi na neih leh thil na hihkhial kei hi, nungak siangthou in leng pasal a neih leh thil a hihkhial sam kei hi. Himahleh, hichibang mite’n sa ah gimna a thuak ding uhi; himahleh ken zaw hon thuaksak louh ka ut hi.
Himahleh unaute aw, hiai ka chi ahi: hunseh a tomta; zi neite neilou bang a a om theihna ding un;
Kapte kap lou bang a a om theihna ding un leh kipakte kipaklou bang a a om theihna ding un;
Khovel zangte zang law zen lou a a om theihna ding un: hiai khovel omdan lah a mangthang gige ahi.
Lungzinna neilou a na om uh k’on deih hi. Zi neilou pasal in Toupa lungkimsakna ding in, Toupa lam thilte a limsak hi.
Zinei pasal in bel a zi lungkimsakna ding in, khovel thilte a limsak hi.

Pasal neisa leh nungak siangthou kilamdanna a om hi. Pasal neilou numei in a sapum leh Kha Siangthou ding dan, Toupa lam thilte a limsak a; pasalnei numei in bel a pasal lungkimsak ding dan, khovel lam thilte a limsak hi.
Nou phattuamna ding in hiai ka gen ahi; na tung ua khamna nga hilou in, navak a na omna ding uleh Toupa kiang a na kipiakna uh bukimna ding in ahizaw.
Kuapeuh in a zikham tung a gamta diklou hi a a kigintak a, a lunggulhna a let ngal a a kul leh, hoih a sak bang in hih hen aw: kiteng uhen, khelhna ahi kei.
Himahleh kuapeuh a lungtang a thukhensat a, a loutheilou khop a kulna nei hilou a, amah kithuzohmi in a siangthouna kepbit a tup chinten leh a hih hoih ding.
Huchi in nungak kitenpih pa’n a hih hoih a; himahleh Zi neilou dia amah kikham in a hih hoih zaw ding hi.
Zi zaw a pasal a dam laiteng hen ahi; himahleh a pasal a sih a leh a deih peuh a nei thei ding a, himahleh Toupa a om mi ahi ding ahi.
Himahleh kei ngaihdan in, a om ngei in om gige leh nuam a sa zaw ding; ken Pathian Kha neisam in ka kithei hi.
Tuin milimte kiang a kithoihna tungtang zaw: I vek un theihna i neichiat uh, chih i kithei hi. Theihna in mi a kisathei sak a itna in mi a bawl hoih hi.
Kuapeuh in thil banghiam thei a a kingaihtuah leh, a theih ding thei nailou ahi.
Himahleh mi kuapeuh in Pathian a it leh, huai mi mah amah theih ahi.
Huchi in milimte kiang a kithoihna thilnek thu zaw, “Khovel ah milim himhim bangmah a hih louh dan uleh, khat kia loungal Pathian dang himhim a omlouh dan i thei uhi.”
Van ah leh lei ah pathian minpu tampi om mahle uh, huchibang pathian tampi leh toupa tampi a om uhi.

Eite ading in bel Pathian khat kia Pa, a om a amah kiang a kipan in bangkim a pawt a, eite leng amah adia om i hi uhi. Toupa khat kia, Jesu Khrist a om hi, Amah ziak in bangkim a om hi, eite leng amah ziak mah a om i hi uhi.

Himahleh huai theihna mi tengteng ah a omkei hi; khenkhatte milim biakna sa a hih ziak un, milim kiang a kithoihna ahi chih thei napi in tutan in a ne uhi; huchi in a sialehpha theihna uh a hatlouh ziak in a thanghuaisak uhi.
Himahleh, sanek in Pathian mit hon tungsak tuankei ding a, ne keimah lehang i se tuankei a, ne mah lehang leng i hoih tuan sam kei hi.
Himahleh pilvang un, huchilou in zaw na noplenna uh bang chichi hiam in mihatloute adin pukna a honghi kha ding hi.
Nang theihna neimi, kuapeuh in milim biakna in a Ankuang um a a honmuh ngal un, amau mihatlou na hita le uh milim kiang a kithoihna thil ne ding in a sialehpha theihna hong maingal lou ding hia?
Huchi in na theihna ziak in unau hatlou, a sih sik a Khrist in a sihsakpa, a mangthang ding hi.
Unaute tung a huchibang thil na hihkhelh ua, a sialehpha theihna uh a hatlouh naklai a na liamsak behlap un, Khrist tung ah thil na hihkhial uhi.
Huaiziak tak in ka sa nek in ka unau a hihpuk sang in, ka unau ka hihpuk louhna ding in kumtawn in sa himhim ka neta kei ding hi.
Noplen ka hi ka hia? Sawltak ka hi ka hia? I Toupa Jesu ka muta ka hia? Noute Toupa a ka nasep gah na hi kei ua hia?
Mi dangte adin sawltak hi keimah leng, nou ading bek in zaw ka hi; Toupa a ka sawltak hihna chiamtehna noumau na hi uhi.
Hiai kei hondemte ka dawn na ahi,
Ne ding leh dawn ding in thu ka neikei ua hia?
Sawltak dangte leh Toupa unaute leh Kifa bang in zi gingtami pi vialvial ding in thu ka neikei ua hia?
Ahihkeileh kei leh Barnaba kia koumau kivak kawm a khut a nasem lou ding in thu ka neilou tuam ua hia?
Sepaih kua ahia amah kivak a galkap ngei? Kuan ahia a gah ne lou a grephuan bawl ngei? Ahihkeileh kuan ahia ganhon nawitui nelou a ganhon vul ngei?
Huai thute mihing bang mai in ka gen ahia? Danthu mah in leng huai ngei a gen sam ka hia?
Mosi dan Laibu ah, “Bawngtal in buh a chillai in a muk gak ken” chih gelh ahi. Pathian in bawngtal ading kia hia a ngaihtuah sak?
Ahihkeileh ei ading a kigen ahi hia? Hi e, ei ading a a gelh ahi; Leiletpa’n lamet nei a leh ding ahi a, buhvawpa’n leng tanneih sam lamen in a vuak ding ahi.
Koute’n khalam thilte na kiang ua ka tuh ngal uleh, na salam thilte uh at le ung leng thil thupi ahi dia hia?
Midang in bawn na tung ua thuneihna a tan uleh kou tang sem lou ding ka hi uh maw? Himahleh huai thuneihna ka zang kei uh; Khrist Tanchinhoih ka dallouhna ding un bangkim ka thuak teitei uhi.
Tempula thiltan bawl vialvialte’n Pathian biakin a kipan nek a mu ua, maitam a nasemte’n maitam apan a ne uh chih na theikei ua hia?
Huchi mah bang in, Toupa’n Tanchinhoih gente nek muhna ding in Tanchinhoih mah a sep hi.

Himahleh ken zaw tuate khat leng ka zang kei hi; ka tung a hiaite na hih ding uh ahi chi a hiai thu gelh ka hi kei hi. Kuapeuh in ka suanpen bangmahlou a a bawl sang un, si mai leng kei ading in a hoihzaw hi.
Tanchinhoih gen mah leng kisaktheihna ding ahi kei hi. Hihlouh theihlouh ka tung ah a kinga ahi; Tanchinhoih gen keileng ka tung gik ding ahi.
Huai tuh keimah utthu a hih hileng kipahman ka nei hi; himahleh, keimah utthu ahihkei leh Tanchinhoih kepna nna piak a om ka hi.
Ka kipahman bang ahia leh? Tanchinhoih ka gen in loh neilou a, Tanchinhoih a thawn a pia ka hihtheihna ahi.
Kuamah sikha hi kei mah leng, mi tamsem ka lak theihna ding in mi tengteng sikha in ka kibawlta hi.

Huchi in Judate ka laklut theihna ding in Judate kiang ah Judami bang in ka om zel; dan nuai a omte ka laklut theihna ding in dan nuai a omte kiang ah dan nuai a om bang in ka om zel, dan nuai a om tuanlou in;
Dan neiloute ka laklut theihna ding in dan neiloute kiang ah dan neilou bang in ka om zel, Pathian dan a omlou tuanlou in, Khrist dan zawm ngal in.
Hatloute ka laklut theihna ding in hatloute kiang ah hatlou bang in ka om zel; hihtheihna teng zang a khenkhatte ka hotdam theihna ding in mi tengteng kiang ah bangkim ka hita hi.
Tanchinhoih ziak in bangkim ka hih zel a, a vualzawlnate ka tansam theihna ding in.
Kitaitehte avek un a tai ua, himahleh khat kia in kipahman a mu zel chih na theikei ua hia? Na muhtheihna ding un huchi mah bang in tai un.
Huan kidemna a kimawlmi peuhmah bangkim ah mahni kithunun in a om nak uhi. Amau zaw lallukhu sethei mu ding in a hih ua, eite’n bel lallukhu setheilou mu ding in.
Huaiziak in kei ka tai a, a ziak bei hilou in; huihkhua leltak nawhlou in, ka pang hi:
Ka sapum ka hih sidup a; sikha in ka bawl zawzel hi; huchilou in zaw midangte kiang a ka tangkoupih nung in leng bangchi hiam in keimah tak kipahman mutaklou a in ka om kha ding hi.
Unaute aw, hiaite na theihlouh uh ka deihkei, huchi a i pipute tengteng mei nuai a a omvek ua, avek ua tuipi leng a kan ua,
Avek ua mei leh tuipi a Mosi a baptist lut a a omvek ua,
Avek ua khalam an kibang a nek chiat ua,
Avek ua khalam dawn ding kibang a dawn chiat uhi. Amaute zui, khalam Suangpi apan a dawn chiat ngal ua; huai Suangpi Khrist ahi.
Himahleh a lak ua mi tamzaw tung ah Pathian a lunghita kei a; gamdai ah a puklum uhi.
Huan huai thilte ei ding a etton ding ahi, thil gilou a lunggulh bang ua i lunggulh sam louhna ding in.
A lak ua khenkhat milim bemi a hihbang un milim bemi hi kei un. “Mipite ne ding leh dawn ding in a tu ua, lam ding in ading nawn chiat uh” chih gelh bang in.
A lak ua khenkhat in nungak a ngai ua, ni khat in sing nih leh sang thum in a puklup loh bang un, i kingai sam kei ding uh,
A lak ua khenkhat in Toupa a ze-et ua, gul a hihman a a om bang un, Toupa zaw i ze-et kei ding uh.
A lak ua khenkhat a phun ua, hihmangthangpa hih manthat a a om bang un, phun sam kei ni.
Huan, huaite vaukholhna ding in a tung uah a hongtung hi; eite, hun tawp hong tunnate, hon thuhilhna ding a leng gelh ahi uhi.
Huaiziak in ding a kingaihtuah pilvang hen, huchilou in zaw a pukkha ding hi.

Mihing thuaktheih val khemna himhim na tuang uah a tung ngeikei hi. Pathian zaw a muanhuai hi, aman na thuaktheih val uh khemna na tuah uh a phalkei ding; na thuaktheihna ding un khemna peuh ah taikhiakna lampi a bawl zaw ding hi.
Huaiziak in ka deihtakte aw, milim biak taisan un.
Mipilte kiang a gen bang a ka thugente ngaihtuah un.
Vualzawlna nou a k’on vualzawl uh, Khrist sisan kikoppihna ahi ka hia? Tanghou ka balkhap uh Khrist pumpi kikoppihna ahi ka hia?
Eite mi tampi tanghou beukhat, pumkhat i hi uhi; i vek un tanghou beu khat ah i tangchiat uhi.
Salam a Israelte en dih ua; kithoihna sa nete’n maitam thilte a kikoppih kei ua hia?
Bang ka genna ahia le? Milim lak a kithoihna leh milim leng banghiam tak ahi chih ka genna hia?
Jentelte kithoihna, Pathian lak ah hilou in dawite lak ah a kithoih uh ahi chih ka genzaw ahi; noute zaw dawite toh na kithuah uh hon deihlou ka hi.
Toupa nou leh dawi nou na dawn khawm theikei ding uh; Toupa dohkan leh dawi dohkan ah na nekhawm thei sam kei ding uh.
Ahihkeileh Toupa hazatna tohthoh i tum uh ahi maw? Amah sang in i hatzaw ua hia?
“Thil bangkim hih a sianga” himahleh thil bangkim hih a hoihkei hi. “Thil bangkim hih a sianga” himahleh thil bangkim hih in mi a bawlhoih kei hi.
Kuapeuh in amah hoihna ding zong lou in midang hoihna ding zongzaw hen.
Sa dawla a zuak peuhmah uh na sia leh phatheihna ziak un bangmah donglou in ne un.
“Lei leh asung a tengteng Toupa a ahi ngal a.”
Ginglou mi lak a kuahiam in nou honsap a, hoh na ut ngal un, sialehpha theihna ziak ua bangmah donglou in, a hon lui peuh uh ne un.
Himahleh kuahiam in “Hiai zaw kithoihna ahi chi a a honhilh leh sialehpha theihna ziak leh nou a hon hilhpa ziak in nekei un.”
Nangmah sialehpha theihna ka chi kei a, amah sialehpha theihna pen ahi ka chih zawk. Bang a chia midang sia leh phatheihna in ka noplenna thunun ahia?
Kipaktak a ka tan leh a tung a kipahthu ka genna tung ah bang ding a gensiat a om ka hia?
Huchi in na nek uhiam na dawn uhiam, na hihpeuhmah uh, Pathian thupina ding ngen in hih un.
Judate ding hiam, Grikte ding hiam, Pathian saptuamte ding hiam in a pukna ding uh bangmah hih kei un,
Ken keimah phattuamna zong lou a, hotdam a hihtheihna ding ua mi tampi phattuamna zong a, mi tengteng bangkim a ka kipahsak bang in.
Hon enzuite hi un, keileng Khrist enzuipa ka hih mah bang in.
Huan bangkim a n’on theihgige ziak un leh thukhah k’on hilh bang a na vom chinten ziak un k’on phat ahi.
Himahleh pasal peuhmah lutang Khrist ahi, numei lutang pasal ahi, Khrist lutang Pathian ahi chih na theih uh ka deih hi.
Pasal a lu khuhkawm a thum hiam, thugen hiam peuhmah in, a lu a selphou hi.
Himahleh numei a lu khuhlou a thum hiam, thugen hiam peuhmah in a lu a selphou ahi; metmai toh kibang ahi.
Numei a lu khuhlou a a om ngal leh met vanglak hen. Himahleh, numei ading a sam met leh metmai a zumhuai leh a lu khuh hen.
Pasal zaw Pathian batpih leh thupina a hih ziak in a lu a khuh ding hilou himhim ahi; numei bel pasal thupina ahi.
Pasal numei a kipan a pawt ahi kei a; numei bel pasal a kipan a pawt ahizaw hi:
Pasal numei adia siam ahi kei a; numei bel pasal adia siam ahizaw hi:
Huaiziak in, angelte ziak in numei in pasal thuneihna chiamtehna a khuk ding ahi.
Himahleh Toupa thilgel dan ah, numei pasal lou in a om theikei a, pasal leng numei lou in a om thei sam kei hi.
Numei pasal a kipan a pawt a hih bang in, pasal leng numei lak a piang ahi ngal a; himahleh bangkim Pathian a kipan a pawt vek ahi.
Noumau kingaihtuah dih ua, numei in a lu khuhlou a Pathian kiang a thum a kilawm hiam?
Pasal in samsau a neih leh amah ading in a zumhuai ahi chih na lungtang pianpih un leng a hon theisak kei ahia?
Numei in bel samsau a neih leh amah ding in thupina ahizaw; a sam khuhna ding a piak a hih ziak in.
Himahleh mi kuahiam hiai thu a a genhak leh huchibang paidan himhim i neikei uh, Pathian saptuam pawlte’n leng a neisam kei hi.
Himahleh nou hiai thu k’on hilhna ah k’on phat theikei, na hoihsemna ding uh hilou in, na siatsemna ding ua na kikhop nak ziak un.
A masapen in saptuamte na kikhop un, nalak uah kilangkhenna a om chih ka za a; gin leng ka gingta sim hi.
Nalak ua a taktakte a lattheihna ding un, nalak ua gintuamna leng a omsam ding him ahi.
Na hong kikhop ua na nekkhawm uh Toupa Nitakan ahi kei hi:
Michih in na nek chiang un noumau nitakan na ne masa zel ngal ua; huchi in mi khat gil a kial a, a dang in a kham uhi.

Bangchidan ahia? Nek leh dawnna ding inn na neikei ua hia? Ahihkeileh Pathian saptuamte musit in, bangmah neiloute na selphou ua hia? Na kiang uah bang ka genta dia? K’on phat dia hia? Hiai lam thu ah k’on phat theikei hi.
Ka thu honhilh sawn Toupa kiang a kipan a ka muh ahi a, huchi a Toupa Jesu’n matsak a a om zan a, tanghou a lak a,
Kipahthu a genkhit a a balkhap a, “Hiai ka pumpi nou adia piak ahi, Keimah theihgigena in hiai hih zel un,” a chih.
Huchi mah bang a nitakan a nekkhit a nou leng a lak a, “Hiai nou ka sisan a thukhun thak ahi, na dawn teng un keimah theihgigena in hih zel un,” a chih.
Huai tanghou na nek ua, nou na dawn teng un a hongpai nawn masiah, Toupa sihna na phuangzak uhi.
Huaiziak in kuapeuh kilawmloutak a tanghou ne hiam, Toupa nou dawn hiam in Toupa sapum leh sisan tung ah siamlouh a tang ding hi.
Huchi in michih amah ki enchian zaw hen, huchibang in tanghou ne in nou dawn hen.
A ne leh dawn in Toupa pumpi ngenteltak a a ngaihtuah kei leh amah tung a vaihawmna ding in a ne in a dawn hi.
Hiaiziakin nalak ua mi tampi na hatkei ua, na zawngkhal uhi, tampi’n na sih loh uhi.
Himahleh ngenteltak in eimah kingaihtuah zel lehang, vaihawmsak a om naklou ding i hi uhi.
Himahleh vaihawmsak a i om in leng khovel toh siamlouhtang a i omlouhna ding in Toupa taihilh in i om zel ahi.
Huaiziak in ka unaute aw, ne ding a na kikhop un kingak chiat un.
Na kikhop uh vaihawmna na thuakpihlouhna ding un, kuapeuh in a gil a kial leh a in lam ah ne masa hen. Huan thu dang zaw ka hongpai chiang in ka bawllem ding hi.
Tuin unaute aw, khalam thilpiak thute na theihlouh uh ka ut kei hi.
Jentelte na hihlai un bangchidan peuh a honpi lai un leng, huai milim pautheiloute lam ah pimang in na om uh chih na thei uhi.
Huaiziak in kuamah in, Pathian Kha a thugen in, “Jesu hamsiat in om hen” a chi ngeikei. Huan kuamah in, Kha Siangthou kia loungal in, “Jesu Toupa ahi” a chi ngeikei uh chih k’on theisak hi.
Huan thilpiak tuamtuam a om a, Kha bel kikhat ahi.
Nasepna tuamtuam leng a om, himahleh Toupa khat ahi.
Nasepsakna tuamtuam leng a om, himahleh Pathian khat ahi, mi tengteng a bangkim sempa ahi.
Himahleh Kha theihsakna michih kiphattuampih chiatna ding in piak ahi.
Mi khat kiang ah Kha in pilna thu a pia hi; midang kiang ah, huai Kha mah in theihna thu a pia hi;
Huan midang kiang a, huai Kha mah in, ginna a pia hi; midang kiang ah hihdam theihna a pia hi;
Midang kiang ah thillamdang hihtheihna, midang kiang ah thugen theihna, midang kiang ah khate theihkak theihna, midang kiang ah pau chi tuamtuamte, midang kiang ah paute hilhchetna.
Himahleh hiaite tengteng Kha khat leh a kikhat mah in, michih kiang ah a deih bangzel a hawm in a sem hi.
Sapum i chih khat ahi a, hiang a nei a, sapum hiangte tengteng, tam mahle uh, pumpi khat ahi a; Khrist huchibang mah ahi.
I vek un sapum khat a om ding in Kha khat a baptist in i omta ua, Judate hiam, Grikte hiam, sikhate hiam sikha lou hiam; huan i vek un Kha khat a kipan dawnsak in i omta uhi.
Sapum i chih hiang khat kia hilou in tampi ahizaw hi.
Khepek in, “Khut ka hihlouh ziak in sapum a pang ka hi kei” chileh, huai thu ziak in sapum a panglou ahi tuankei hi.
Huan bil in, “Mit ka hih louh ziak in sapum a pang ka hi kei” chileh, huai thu ziak in sapum a panglou ahi tuankei hi.
Sapum tengteng mit hi vek leh gingzakna koi ah a om dia? Avek in gingzakna hileh, gimzakna koi ah a om dia?
Himahleh Pathian in hiang khempeuh sapum ah a utna peuh ah a omsak chiatta hi.
Huchi in huai tengteng hiang khat kia hileh sapum pen koi ah a om dia?
Himahleh hiang tampi ahizaw uh, himahleh sapum khat kia ahi.
Huan mit in, khut kiang ah, “Bangmah in k’on deihkei” a chi theikei; lu in leng khepekte kiang ah, “Bangmah in k’on deihkei” a chi thei sam kei hi.
Huchih naksang in, sapum hiang hat dia kilawmlou pente a kiphamoh zaw mahmah uhi;
Huchi in sapum hiang pahtawi thamlouh zaw a i sehte, huaite ngei i pahtawi zaw uhi; huan i hiang kilawmloute’n kilawmna thupizaw a mu zel uhi;
I hiang kilawm te’n bel huchibang a hih a kiphamoh kei uhi. Pathian in, kilawmna neilou hiang pahtawi zawk ding in, sapum a lemkhawm hi.
Huchi a sapum a kikhenna omlou a, a hiangte’n kibang tak a a kibuaipih tuah theih zawkna ding un.
Huchi in hiang khat in a thuak leh hiang tengteng in a thuakpih a, hiang khat pahtawi a a om leh hiang dangte’n a kipahpih zel uhi.
Huchi in noute Khrist Sapum na hi ua, a hiangte na hi chiat lai uhi.

Huan Pathian in khenkhat saptuam lak ah a honkoih a, a khatna ah sawltakte, a nihna ah thugenmite, a thumna ah heutute a koih a; huai nung in thillamdang hihte a om a; huai nung in hihdamtheihna thilpiakte, panpih theihna thilpiakte, vaihawm siamna thilpiakte, pautheihlouh chi tuamtuam a thugen theihna thilpiakte a om nawn hi.
Avek un sawltak ahivek uhia? Avek un thugenmi ahivek uhia? Avek un heutu ahivek uhia?
Avek un thillamdang hihmi ahivek uhia? Avek un hihdam theihna thilpiakte a nei vek uhia? Avek un pautheihlouhte in thu a gen vek uhia? Avek un thu hilhchianmi ahivek uhia?
Thilpiak thupipente lunggulh mahmah zaw un. Huan lampi hoihsem k’on ensak ding hi.
Mihing paute leh angel paute in thugen mah leng, itna ka neih kei leh dak ging lel hiam, dakkhutbet ging lel hiam ka hi ding hi.
Huan thugen theihna nei in, thuguk tengteng leh theihna tengteng thei vek in, mual suan theihna khop hial ginna kim nei mah leng, itna ka neih kei leh bangmah ka hi kei hi.
Huan migentheite vakna ding in ka sum tengteng pevek in, ka pumpi leng kang ding hial in kipe mah leng, itna ka neih kei leh kei ding in bangmah a phatuam kei hi.
Itna in a dohzou a, a migi a; itna in a haza kei a, a kisathei sam kei hi;
Itna a kiuangsak kei a, a huham sam kei. Itna in amah thulou thu a salou kei a, amah angsung a khual sam kei; a hehbaih kei a, hehsa in a omden sam kei hi;
Itna in gilou a kipahpih kei a, a dik a kipahpih zaw hi.
Itna in bangkim a thuak teitei a, bangkim a gingta a, bangkim a lamen a, bangkim a thuak khezel hi.
Itna zaw chikchiang mah in a beikei ding: himahleh, thugennate om mahleh hihtawp a honghi ding a, paute om mahleh a hongtawp ding a, theihnate om mahleh hihtawp a honghi ding.
A kimlou in i thei a, a kimlou in thu i gen uhi:
A kim a hongtun chiang in a kimlou hihtawp ahita ding.
Ka naupan lai in naupang pau in ka pau a, naupang theih in ka thei a, naupang ngaihtuah in ka ngaihtuah hi; tua k’ong pichin nung in naupang hihdan ka tawpsanta hi.

Tuin zaw limlang ah i mu milmial ahi, huai hun chiang in zaw kimaituah in ahita ding hi. Tuin zaw a kimlou in ka thei a, himahleh huai hun chiang in zaw theihkhit a ka om bang in ka theikimta ding hi.
Huchi in hiai thumte, ginna, lametna, itna, a om gige ding hi; huaite a a thupipen itna ahi.
Itna delh zel unla, khalam thilpiakte leng lunggulh gige un, himahleh thu na gentheihna ding uh lunggulh sem un.
Paute a pau in mi kiang a thugen hilou in Pathian kiang a gen ahizaw hi, kuamah in a thugen a theikei a; himahleh kha ah thuguk a gen ahi.
Thugenmi in bel mihing kiang ah bawlhoihna thute, hanthawnna thute, khamuanna thute a gen zawzel hi.
Paute a pau in amah kia a kibawl hoih a, thugenmin saptuamte a bawlhoih zaw hi.

Huan na vek un paute a na pau uh k’on deihsak a, himahleh thu na gen uh k’on deihsak sem hi; saptuamte’n kibawlhoihna a muh theihna ding un a hilhchet nawn kei leh thugenmi zaw paute a pau mi sang in a thupizaw hi.
Tuin unaute aw, paute a thugen in na kiang uah hongleng, theihsakna lam hiam, thugenna lam hiam, thuhilhna lam hiam na kiang ua ka gen kei ngal leh, bang ahia k’on hih phattuamna ding om?
Thil hinna neilou, gingtheite leng, tamngai hiam, kaihging hiam, gennei a a ginkei leh, bang la ahia a tum ua a kaih uh bangchi’n a theihtheih dia?
Pengkul gen neilou a a mut un kua galkap din a kisa ding a?
Huchi mah bang in nou leng pautheih baihlama na gen kei uleh bangthu ahia na gen uh bangchi’n a theihtheih dia? Huihkhua a paulel na hi kei ding ua hia?
Khovel ah pau chi tuamtuam tampi a om tham a, himahleh gen neilou himhim a omkei hi.
A pau in a gen ka theih kei leh a genmi ading in kei melmak ka hi ding a; a genmi leng kei ading in melmak ahi ding.
Huchi in noute’n khalam thilpiakte na lunggulh mah bang un saptuam bawlhoihna ding in theihtawp suah in zang un.
Huaiziak in paute a thugen in a hilhchet theihna din thum hen.
Paute a ka thum leh ka kha in zaw a thum ngei a, ka theihna bel a phatuam tuankei hi.
Bangchi’n ahita dia le? Kha in ka thum dia, theihna in leng ka thum ding; kha in la ka sa dia, theihna in leng la ka sa ding hi.
Hichilou in, Kha in vualzawl mahle chin a thei nailoute’n na thugen theilou pi in na kipahthugen uh bangchi’n, Amen, a chithei ding ua?
Nang zaw chihtak in kipahthu na gen hoih a, midang a bawlhoih tuankei hi.
Noumau tengteng sang in paute a thu ka gen tamzawk ziak in Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen hi:
Himahleh saptuamte kikhopna ah paute a thu sing khat gen sang in midangte ka hilh theihna ding in ka theihtheihna in thumal nga kia gen ka utzaw ahi.
Unaute aw, ngaihtuahna ah naupang kei un; himahleh gilou ah zaw naungek unla, lungsim ah piching un.
Dan laibu ah:
“Paute leh gamdang mite muk in,
hiai mite kiang ah thu ka gen ding a;
huchi in leng a hon ngaikhe tuankei ding uhi,
Toupa’n a chi” chih gelh ahi.
Huaiziak in paute zaw gingtate din chiamtehna ahi kei a, gingloute din ahizaw, thugen bel gingloute adin chiamtehna ahi kei a, gingta te ding in ahizaw hi.
Huaiziak in saptuam tengteng kikhawm a na vek ua, paute a na pau uleh thei nailoute leh gingloute honglut leh a hai uh honchi kei ding ua hiam?
Na vek ua thu na gen uleh ginglou hiam, thei nailou hiam honglut leh a siamlouhdan uh na vek ua ma ah hihlat ahi ding;
Huchi in a lungtang thugukte uh hihlat in a omta ding a, leisi in Pathian a be ding ua, “Pathian na lakuah a omtaktak” chih a gen ding uhi.
Unaute aw, bangchi ding ahita dia leh? Na hong kikhop un, phatna la hiam, thu kihilh hiam, theihsakna thu hiam, paute, hilhchetna hiam na neichiat zel ua. Bangkim bawlhoihna ding in hih hi hen.
Kuapeuh in paute a thu a gen uleh, nih in hiam, a tampen in thum in hiam hileh, kikhel zel in leng hi hen.
Huan mi khat in hilhchian hen; hilhchianmi a omkei leh saptuamte kikhopna ah dai in om henla, amah leh Pathian kiang ah gen hen.
Thugenmi in leng nih in hiam, thum in hiam, gen uhenla, midangte’n hoihtak in ngaihtuah uhen.
Himahleh a kiang a tu midang kiang a theihsakna thupiak a hongtun leh a masapen dai mai hen.
Mi tengteng in a theihtheihna ding leh mi tengteng khamuang a a om theihna ding un, na vek un khatkhat in thu na genthei ngal ua.
Thugenmite khate thugenmite thuthu in a om uh ahi;
Pathian buaina Pathian ahi kei a, lemna Pathian ahizaw hi. Mi Siangthou saptuam pawl tengteng a om bang in,
Saptuamte kikhopna ah numeite dai dinden in om uhen; amau zaw a thugen uh phal ahi kei a; Dan gen bang in thumang in omzaw uhen.
Huan bangpeuh a theihnop uleh inn ah amau pasalte dong uhen; saptuamte kikhopna a numei thugen zaw a zumhuai hi.
Pathian thu noumau apan pawt ahi maw? Ahihkeileh noumau kiang kia a hongtung ahi maw?
Kuapeuh thugenmi hiam kha mi hiam a kisak leh na kiang ua ka gelh Toupa thupiak ahi chih a theih ding ahi.
Himahleh kuapeuh in a theihkei leh amah leng theih ahi kei hi.
Huaiziak in unaute aw, thugen lunggulh unla, paute a thugen leng kham kei un;
Himahleh bangkim kilawm leh diktak a hih hi hen.
Huaiban ah unaute aw, Tanchinhoih k’on hilhzaw k’on theisaknawn ding a; huai Tanchinhoih na kipahpih ua, huai mah ah na ding ua;
K’on thuhilh pen na mawk gintak uh hilou a, pom kichian na hih uleh huai mah ah hotdam in na om uhi.
A masapen in ken ka muh sam nou k’on hilhsawn a; huchi a, Khrist Laisiangthou bangbang a i khelhnate ziak a a sih a,
A vui ua, Laisiangthou bangbang a ni thum ni’n kaihthoh in a om hi.
Huan Kifa kiang ah a kilak a, huaikhit a sawmlehnihte kiang a a kilak thute.
Huaikhit in unau za nga sang a tamzawte kiang ah a kilak nawn a, huaite lak a mi, a tamzaw tutan in a damlai ua, khenkhat bel a ihmuta uhi.
Huaikhit in Jakob leh sawltak tengteng kiang ah a kilak nawn hi.
Huan a tawppen ah, a hunlou bang a piang, keimah kiang ah leng a kilak hi.
Kei zaw sawltak lak a neupen, Pathian saptuamte ka sawi ziak a sawltak chih tuaklouh ka hi.

Himahleh Pathian hehpihna ziak in ka hihhih ka hita; huan a hehpihna honpiak a thawn in a omkei a, huchih naksang in amau tengteng sang in ka semgim zaw hi; himahleh keimah kia in ka sem kei a, Pathian hehpihna ka kiang a om in a sem zaw hi.
Himahleh, ken leng, amau leng huchi in ka gen zel ua, huchi in nou leng na gingta uhi.
Huan Khrist misi lak a kipan kaihthoh in a om chih a honhilh ngal uleh, bangchidan ahia na lak ua khenkhat in, misi thohnawnna himhim a omkei na chih uh?
Misi thohnawnna himhim omlou ahihleh, Khrist leng kaihthoh in a omkei ding hi.
Huan Khrist kaihthoh a a omkei leh, i thugen uh bangmahlou ahi ding a, na gin uleng bangmahlou ahi ding hi.
Ahi, Khrist a kaithou chih Pathian i theihpih ziak in, Pathian lam thu ah theihpih zuauthei i honghi ding hi, misite kaihthoh a a omkei uleh, amah leng a kaithou kei ding hi.
Misite kaithoha a omkei un zaw, Khrist leng kaihthoh in a omta kei ding.
Huan Khrist kaihthoh a a omkei leh, na gin uh bangmahlou ahi ding a, na khelhna uah na om nilouh uh ahi ding.
Huchi hileh, Khrist a ihmusate a mangthangta uh ahi ding hi.
Tu damsung kia a Khrist tung a lametna i neih in zaw mi tengteng lak a mi hehpihhuai pen i hi ding hi.
Himahleh Khrist misi lak a kipan kaihthoh in a omtaktak ahi, ihmute lak a kipan gahmasa a na hita hi.
Mi khat ziak a sihna a hongom ziak in mi khat ziak mah in misi thohnawnna leng a hong omta ahi.
Adam ah mi tengteng a si mah bang un, Khrist ah mi tengteng hih hin in leng a om ding uhi.
Himahleh amau hunchiat ah: Khrist gah masapen te ahi a; huaikhit chiang in a hong painawnna ah Khrist a te a thou ding uhi.
Huaikhit chiang in a tawp a hongtung ding; huai hun chiang in, vaihawmna tengteng, thuneihna leh thilhihtheihna tengteng a hihman nung in, Pathian kiang ah, Pa kiang ngei ah gam a pe ding hi.
A melmate tengteng a khenuai a a koih masiah aman vaihawm ding ahi ngal a.
Melma nanungpen hihmang a om ding sihna ahi.
Aman, “A khenuai ah bangkim a koih hi.” Himahleh “A khe nuai ah bangkim koih in a om” a chih in a nuai a bangkim koihpa a pang kha kei chih a kimu gige ahi.
Huan a nuai a bangkim koih a a om hun chiang in, Tapa mahmah leng a nuai a koih in a om ding a, Pathian bangkim a bangkim a hih theihna ding in.
Huchi ahihkei in, misite ading a baptisma a tansak uh bang a chihna uh hi ding ahia? Misite kaihthoh a a omlou ding a hih uleh bang a chia amau adia baptisma tansak uh ahia?
Bangziak a eite dakkal chih a sih lauhuai a om i hi ua?
Unaute aw, Khrist Jesu i Toupa a k’on suanna sial in ni teng in ka si, ka chi ahi.
Mihing dan in gen leng Ephesa khua a gamsate kilaipih ka hihleh, kei din bang a phatuam ding? “Misi, kaihthoh a a omkei ding uleh ne in dawn leng a ke, zingchiang a si ding hive hang in.”
Zekhem in omkei un: “Lawm giloute’n omdan hoih a hihgawp nak uhi.”
Kizentak in halh unla, thil hihkhial kei un; khenkhat in Pa Pathian theihna himhim na neikei ua huai na zumna ding ua ka gen ahi.
Himahleh kuahiam khat in, “Misi bangchi’n kaihthoh ahi ding uh? Sapum bangchibang pu in ahia a hong thoh ding?” a chi ahi ding e.
Nang, mihai, nang mahmah in na tuh leng, a sih phot kei leh hih hin in a omsam a;
Huan chi na tuh in a sapum hongom ding pen ahi kei a, a tang lel na tuh zawnak, buh tang hiam, chi dang tang hiam ahi thei hi.
Himahleh Pathian in amah deih bangbang in sapum a pia a, haichi tang chih kiang ah amau sapum chiat a pia hi.
Sa tengteng sa chi khat ahi kei ua; mihing sa a tuam a, gamsa sa a tuam a, vasa sa a tuam a, ngasa sa a tuam hi.
Van sapum a om a, lei sapum leng a om hi, himahleh vanlam sapumte thupina a tuam a, leilam sapumte thupina a tuam hi,
Nisa thupina a tuam a, khapi thupina a tuam a, aksite thupina a tuam hi; aksi leh aksi leng a thupina uh a tuam hi.
Misite thohnawnna leng tua bang ahi. Muatthei a tuh in a om a, muattheilou a kaihthoh in a om hi.
Pahtawilouh a tuh in a om a, thupitak a kaihthoh in a om hi. Hatlou a tuh in a om a, thilhihtheihna nei a kaihthoh in a om hi.
Sapum a tuh in a om a, kha pumpi a kaihthoh in a om hi. Sapumpi a om leh kha pumpi leng a om hi.
Huchi in mi masapen “Adam mihing a honghi a” chi a gelh ahi; Adam nanungpen bel hinna pepa kha a honghi hi.
Himahleh khalam a om masa kei a, salam a omzaw; huai zoh in khalam pen a om hi.
Mihing masapen lei a siam, leimi ahi a; mihing nihna pen van apan Toupa ahi.
Lei a siam mihing leimi a hih bang in, van a kipan mi tuh vanmi ahi.
Huan lei a siam mihing batna i put bang in, van a kipan hong paipa batna leng i pu sam ding uhi.
Unaute aw, sa leh sisan in Pathian gam a luah theikei ding a; muatthei in muattheihlouhna a luah sam kei ding chih, ka gen ahi.
Ngai un, thuguk k’on hilh ding hi! I vek un i ihmu kholkei ding ua, himahleh i vek un pengkul nanungpen gin a chiang in, sawtloukal in,
Mitphiatkal lou in hihlamdan in i om vekta ding; pengkul ging ding ahi ngal a, huchi in misite muattheilou a kaihthoh in a om ding ua, eite leng hihlamdan in i omta ding uhi.
Hiai muatthei in muattheihlouhna a silh ding ahi a, hiai sithei in leng sihtheihlouhna a silh sam ding ahi.
Huchi a hiai muatthei in muattheihlouhna a silh a, hiai sithei in sihtheihlouhna a silh hun chiang in, huai hun ngeingei in, “Zohna in sihna a valh zouta” chih thugelh a hongtung ding hi.
“Aw sihna, na gu koi a omta ahia?
Aw han, na zohna koi a omta ahia?”
Sihna gu khelhna ahi a; khelhna thilhihtheihna dan ahi.
Himahleh i Toupa Jesu Khrist ziak a zohna hon pepa Pathian kiang ah kipahthu om hen.
Huaiziak in ka unau deihtakte aw, kiptak in, hihlin vuallouh in, Toupa nasep phatuamngaitak a sem gige in om un, na sepgimna uh Toupa ah a thawn ngeikei chih na thei uhi.
Huan misiangthoute adia thohlawm thu zaw, Galatia gam a saptuam pawlte kiang a thu ka piak bang in nou leng na hih sam un.
Ni sagih ni masapen in michih in vualzawlna na muh bangzel un koih khawl chiat unla; ka hong chiang a thohlawm lakkhawm himhim a om louhna ding in.
Huan na hehpih thilpiak uh Jerusalem khua a hohpih ding in ka hongtun chiang in kuapeuh hoih na chih ua lai na piak uh ka sawl ding hi.
Huan kei vahoh kilawm ahihleh, kei toh a hoh ding uhi.
Huan Masidonia gam ka totsuah khit chiang in na kiang uah ka hong ding a; Masidonia gam lah ka tuansuak himhim ding hi.
