Nou kiang ah bang tan hiam, phalbi sungteng houh ka tam nilouh kha diam, ka hohna ding peuh ah noute’n n’on khaksawn theihna ding un.
Tua paikawm lel a honmuh malam ka ut kei a, Toupa’n lem a sakleh na kiang ua sawtsim tam ka lamen hi.
Himahleh Pentikost ni tan in Ephesa khua ah ka tam ding hi.
Kong lianpi, phatuampi sepna ding kei adin a kihong ngal a; huan doumite leng tampi a om uhi.
Huan Timothi a hongtun leh lauthawng lou a na kiang ua a omna ding in pilvang un; ken ka sep bangmah in Toupa nna a sem hi.
Huaiziak in kuamah in musit kei uhen; ka kiang a a hong theihna ding in khamuangtak in khakhia unla; unaute toh amah muh ka lamen hi.
I unaupa Apollos thu zaw, unaute toh na kiang ua hong ding in ka deih ngial hi, himahleh tun zaw hong a utkei a; a lemtan hun chiang in a hongding hi.
Kiveng unla, ginna ah ding kip unla, kihihhang unla, hattak in om un.
Na hih peuhmah uh itna a hih hivek hen.
Unaute aw, Stephena inkuanpihte zaw Akhaia gam a gingta masate ahi ua, misiangthoute na sem ding in a kipia uh chih na thei uhi;
Huchibang mite kiang ah leh, nasep a panpih leh, semgim peuhte kiang a lut ding in k’on hanthawn hi.
Huan Stephenas, Fortunate, leh Akaikas a hongtun uh ka kipak hi, noute hihlouh langlou a ka taksapna hon huh ziak un.
Amau ka lungsim leh na lungsim uh hon hihhalh ua, hichibang mite zaw kipahpih un.
Asia gam a saptuam pawlte’n chibai honbuk uhi. Akuila, Priscilla leh a inn ua om saptuamte’n deihsaktakin Toupa ah chibai honbuk uhi.
Unau tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi. Tawp siangthou in chibai kibuk un.
Kei Paul in hiai chibai bukna keimah khut mahmah a ka gelh ahi.
Kuapeuh in Toupa Jesu Khrist a itkei leh hamse thuak in om hen. I Toupa a hongpai hi.
Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.
Khrist Jesu a ka itna na vek ua lak ah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihlama Khrist Jesu sawltak leh i unaupa Timothi in; Korinth khua a Pathian saptuam omte kiang leh Akhaia gam tengteng a misiangthou omte kiang ah:
Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Khrist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist, Pathian leh Pa, hehpihnate Pa leh khamuanna tengteng Pathian phat in om hen.
Pathian in koumau hon khamuanna ngei in gimthuakna peuhmah a omte leng ka khamuan sam theihna ding un, aman ka gimthuaknate uah a hon khamuan hi.
Khrist thuaknate tampitak ka tan bang un, Khrist ziak in khamuanna leng tamsem ka tang uhi.
Himahleh gimthuak a ka om uleh noumau khamuanna ding leh hotdamna ding ahi a; huan khamuan a ka om uleh ka thuak bang uh na thuak chiang ua na theih ua na khamuanna ding uh ahi.
Huan gimthuakna tangsamte na hih bang un, khamuanna tang samte leng na hi uh chih ka theih un k’on lametsakna uh a kip ahi.
Unaute aw, Asia gam a ka tung ua gimthuakna tung na theihlouh uh ka deihkei uhi, huchi a nakpitak a thuakzoh vuallouh leh hin leng lamet huailou khophial a delhden in ka om uhi.
Ahi, sihna thupukna muta in ka kingai uhi; himahleh huai koumau kimuanglou a misite kaithoupa Pathian ka muan zawkna ding uh ahi;
Aman huchibang sih lauhuai lak ah hon hunkheta a, a hon hunkhe nawn ding; a hon hunkhe nawnzel ding chih amah tung ah ka lametna uh ka nga uhi.
Noute’n leng thumna in n’on panpih ding uh ahi, huchi in tampite thumna dawnna vualzawlna piak a ka om chiang un koute ziak in mi tampi in kipahthu a gen ding uhi.

Koute suanpen hiai ahi, sapilna ah hilou in, Pathian hehpihna hi zaw in siangthouna leh Pathian dikna nei in khovel ah ka gamta ua, nou lam ah ka gamta hoih nawn sem uh chih ka sialehpha theihna un hon theisak hi.
Na simtheih uleh na theihtheih ding uh loungal thu dang himhim na kiang uah ka gelh kei uhi; a tawppha in ka thu uh na theihsiam uh ka lamen lai uhi.
Theihsiamna tan na neihtak bang un, i Toupa Jesu ni chiang in, noute k’on suan theih bang un nouleng koute n’on suang thei sam ding uhi.
Huan huai gintakna nei in, na kiang uah hong masa leng ka chi a, kipahna thuah nih na neih theihna ding un.
Noumau tawn kawm in Masidonia gam ah pai zel leng la, Masidonia gam a kipan a na kiang uah hong kiheinawn in, Judia gam a ka hohna ding ah noumau hong kha le uchin ka chi hi.
Huchibang ka ngaihtuah lai in ka lungsim kiplouhdan langsak hia ka hih? Ahihkeileh, “Ahi, chih leh, Ahi kei,” chi tuaktuak ding in, thilhih ka tup nak pen khovelmi bang in hia ka tup?
Himahleh Pathian a muanhuai bang in noumau lam a ka thu uh, Ahi, chih leh Ahi kei, chih ahi kei hi.
Abang abang hi hen aw, Pathian Tapa Jesu Khrist thu, kei Silvana leh Timothi in na lak ua ka gen un, “Ahi leh Ahi kei” chih ahi sam kei a, Amah ah zaw thil tengteng “Ahi” chih ahi gige hi.
Pathian thuchiamte tengteng in amah ah, “Ahi,” chih a muvek hi. Huaiziak in ahi Pathian thupina ding a amah ziak a, “Amen,” ka chih uh.
Huan Khrist a noumau toh hon hihkippa leh kou hon sawlpa Pathian ahi;
Amah zaw hon chiamtehpa leh i lungtang a khamna Kha hon pepa leng ahi.
Himahleh ka kha tung a theihpih ding in Pathian ka sam ahi, noumau honhawi ding in ahi Korinth khua a ka hong taklouh zaw.
Na ginna uh hon thuneihkhum hilou in, na kipahna ding ua nou toh semkhawm ka hi zaw uhi; ginna ading kip na hi uhi.
Himahleh keimah lamthu ah zaw hiai ka na tum chiltelta ahi, lungkham nadia na kiang ua hong nawn talou ding in.
Ken k’on hih lungkham leh ka hih lungkhampen mahlou in kuan ahia kei honhih kipak ding?
Huchi in huai mahmah ka gelh ahi, huchilou in zaw ka hong in ka kipahna dingte lak ah lungkhamna ka mu zaw kha ding a; ka kipahna zaw na vek ua kipahna a hih k’on gintaksak chiat ngal hi.
Khitui tampi kekawm in lungtang a haksa leh lauthawng pipi a ka gelh ahi; hih lungkham a na omna ding uh ahi kei a, na tung ua itna thupi zawsem ka nei chih na theihzawkna ding uh ahi.
Himahleh kuapeuh in mite a hih lungkham leh keimah kia honhih lungkham ahi kei a, uanggen lua bel hilou in, na vek un a honhih lungkham chiat ahizaw hi.
Huchibang mi adin gawtna na piaktak uh a ki hun ahi.
Huchi in na ngaidam un na khamuan zawta ding uh ahi, huchilou in zaw bang chichi hiam in mi huchibang a lungkham luatna in a valhzou kha ding.
Huaiziak in amah na itna uh hihkip ding in k’on ngen hi.
Hiaiziak mah in leng ka gelh ahi, bang peuhmah thu na man uleh, na man louh uh theihchetna ding in.
Banglam peuh a mi na ngaihdam uh ken leng ka ngaidam hi; ken ka ngaihdam khitsa, bangpeuh ka na ngaihdam tak leh noumau ziak in Khrist ah ka ngaidam ta ahi.
Huchilou in zaw Setan in nuamtak honsa kha ding hi; a tup lah i haih ngal kei uhi.
Huan Khrist Tanchinhoih gen ding a Troas ka tun in, Toupa ah kongkhak honsak in ka om uhi.
Himahleh ka unaupa Titas ka muhlouh ziak in ka khalam ah zaw muanna himhim ka nei tuankei a, huchi in amaute kampha in ka khen a, ka pawt a, Masidonia gam ah ka paita hi.
Himahleh Khrist vualzohna a honpi zel pa leh koute a munchih a amah theihna gimnamtui theisakpa Pathian kiang ah kipahthu om hen.
Hotdam a omlelte leh mangthang lellelte ah Pathian adin Khrist gimnamtui ka hi uhi;
Pawl khatte adin sihna lak ah sihna ding gimnam ka hi ua, pawl khatte din hinna lak a hinna ding in gimnam ka hi uh. Hiai bangte adin kua ahia chingzou ding?
Mi tampi in Pathian thu mite khem a sumsinna a a zat bang un kou zaw ka zang kei uhi; Pathian sawltak hi zaw in, chihtaktak in Pathian mitmuh in Khrist ah thu ka gen zel uhi.
Koumau kigenhoih pan nawn dek ka hi uhia? Ahihkeileh, na kiang ua piak ding hiam aw na kiang ua kipan hiam genhoihna lai, mi khenkhat adia a kiphamoh bang in kou din a kiphamoh sam ding ahia?
Noute ka lai uh, na lungtang ua gelh, mi tengteng theih leh sim na hi uhi;
Khrist lai, kou hon gelhsak laitui a gelh hilou, Pathian hing Kha gelh hi zaw, suangpek a gelh hilou, sa lungtang pek a gelh hi zaw na hi uh chih chiantak in na taklang ta uhi.
Huan Pathian lam ah huchibang muanna Khrist vang in ka nei uhi;
Bangpeuh koumau a kipan a pawt a sim ding in koumau kia in ka chin uh ka chi kei ua; ka chin theihna uh Pathian kiang a kipan ahizaw.
Amahmah in thukhun thak nasemte hi ding in hon chingsak a; a lai thu gelhlel nasemte ding hilou in, a Kha nasemte din ahizaw hi; lai thu gelh lel in zaw ahihlum nak a, Kha in bel a hihhing hi.
Mosi mel a vak ziak in Israel tate’n a mel a en gige theikei ua, huai thupina a mang hiaihiai a; sihna nasepna suang a laimal gelh bawn, huchi tel a thupi a a tun leh,
Kha nasepna pen bangchi phet a thupi in a tung diam aw?
Siamlouh tansakna nasepna bawn a thupi leh, diktatna nasepna a thupizaw mahmah ding ahi.
Hih thupi a omsa in hiai ah zaw thupina himhim a neita ngal kei a, thupina thupizaw in a khuhtak ziak in.
Mangta hiaihiai bawn thupi a a tun leh, om gige ding thupi a tuam in omzaw mahmah ding ahi.
Huan, huchibang lametna ka neih ziak un hangsantak apan ngamna ka nei uhi,
Mosi hih bang in ka hihkei ua, aman zaw thupina mang hiaihiai man tawpna Israel tate’n a et gige louhna ding un a mai maikhuhna in a khuh a;
A lungsim ubel hihkhauh in a om a; tuni tanpha in Thukhun Lui a sim un khuhna ngeina hawk louh in a om gige ngal a, huai khuhna Khrist ah hihmang in a omta hi.
Himahleh tuni tanpha in Mosi Laibu a sim peuh chiang un a lungtang uah khuhna a om gige hi.
Himahleh a lungtang uh Toupa lam a ngat peuh chiang un khuhna lakmang ahita ding hi.
Huan Toupa huai Kha ahi a, Toupa Kha omna peuh ah noplenna a om zel hi.

Huchi in eite zaw i vek un mai khuhlou in limlang bang a Toupa thupina tangsawn sak zel in, amah kibatpih ngeingei a om ding in hihlamdan in i om zel uhi; hiai Toupa a kipan i muh ahi; Amah tuh Kha ahi.
Huaiziak in hehpihna ka muh bangzel uleh hiai nasepna ka neih ziak un ka lungke kei uhi;

Thil zumhuai kiselte ka pampaih zawta ua, zekhemna thu ka zang kei ua, Pathian thu tuh mi khemna ding in ka zang kei ua, thutak theisak in Pathian mitmuh in michih sialehpha theihna mit ka tungsak uhi.
Himahleh ka Tanchinhoih uh khuh a a om leh, mangthang lelte ah ahi khuh a a om;
Khrist Pathian batpih leh a thupidan Tanchinhoih vak in amau a salhvak theihlouhna ding in, huaite ah hiai khovel pathian in a gingtaloute lungsim a sukmial sakta hi.
Koumau thu ka genkei ua, Khrist Jesu Toupa thu ka genzaw uhi, koute leng Jesu ziak in sikha ka hih uh leng ka gen zel uhi.
Jesu Khrist mel ah Pathian thupidan theihna vak honpe ding in, “Mial a kipan vak a vakkhe ding” chipa Pathian in i lungtangte a salvakta ngal hi.
Himahleh thilhihtheihna thupina koute a hilou a, Pathian a a hihtheih zawkna ding in huai gou tuh leibel ah ka kem uhi.
Alanglang ah nehden in ka om ua, himahleh ningkitel in ka om tuankei uhi; mangbang in ka om ua himahleh ka lungke tuankei uhi;
Sawi in ka om ua, himahleh taisan in ka omkei uh; khetpuk in ka om ua, himahleh hihmang in ka omkei uh.
Ka sapum uah chiklaipeuh in leng Jesu sihna ka pu zel ua, Jesu hinna leng ka sapum ua a lat theihna ding in.
Koute hingdam a omlaite Jesu ziak a si ding a matsak in ka om gige ua Jesu hinna leng ka sa sithei ua a lattheihna ding in.
Huchi in koute ah sihna in a sem gige a, nou ah bel hinna in a sem gige hi.
Himahleh “Ka ging a, huaiziak in thu ka gen ahi” chih gelhpa ginna lungsim ngei pu in, kou leng ka ging ua, thu leng ka gen uhi;
Toupa Jesu kaithoupa’n koute leng Jesu ah hon kaithou sam ding a, noumau toh amah omna mun ah hon dingsak ding chih thei in.
Bangkim noumau hoihna ding ahi ngal a, hehpihna mi tamzaw ziak a hihkhan a om a, Pathian thupina ding a kipahthugenna nakpitak a a khansak theihna ding in.
Huai thu ziak in ka bah kei uhi; i pawlam mihing zawngkhal hiaihiai mahleh, i sunglam mihing pen niteng a bawlthak zel in a omzaw ahi.
Ka gimthuakna neukha uh tu mitphiatkal sung kia a om ding in, thupina thupitak tangtawn a ding in a hon bawlsak hulhul ahi;
Thil muhtheihte enlou in, thil muhtheihlouhte ka en zaw uhi; thil muhtheihte zaw sawtlou kal a ding ahi a, thil muhtheihlouhte bel tangtawn a ding ahizaw hi.
I omna lei a puanin pen hihsiat in om mahleh van ah inn, khut a lamlouh, tangtawn a om ding, Pathian a kipan inn kip i nei uh chih i thei uhi.
Van a kipan i omna ding silhthuah ut mahmah in hiai puanin ah thum chihtak in i thum gige uhi.
Huchibang a silh in omleng vuaktang in i omkei ding uhi.
Eite hiai puanin a i omsung in gikpua in thum petmah in i thum ngal ua, silhlou a om i ut ziak ahi kei a, silhthuah a om i ut ziak ahizaw, sithei pen hinna valh zoha a om theihna ding in.
Huan huai mahmah ding a hon sutuahpa khamna Kha hon pepa Pathian ahi.
Huchi in pumpi a i omlai teng in Toupa kiang ah i omkei chih thei in, muangtakin i om gige uhi.
Muthei a pailou in, ginna in i paizaw zel uhi.
Muangtakin i om, huan pumpi a omlou a Toupa kiang a om i utzaw hi.
Huaiziak in om in, om keileng, amah kipahpih lam mi hih i tum chinten ahi.
Michih in sapum a thilhihte a sia a pha in, i hih bangbang a i muhchiat theihna ding in, Khrist thukhenna tutphah ma ah hihlat in i omvek ding uhi.
Huchi in Toupa kihtakna dan thei in mihingte ka hanthawn zel uhi, koute hihna Pathian kiang ah latsak a om bang in, na sialehpha theihna uah leng latsak a ka om uh ka lamen uhi.
Na kiang uah ka kigenhoih nawn uh ahi kei a, lungtang hilou a, dinmun lel suangte bang ahi hiam dawnna ding na neih theihna ding un kou lam ah suan theihna honbawl in ka genzaw uhi.
Ka hai uleh Pathian adin ahi a; ka pil uleh noumau adin ahi.
Khrist itna in a honsawl teitei ahi; hichi’n ka ngaihtuah uhi: mi tengteng sihsik in mi khat a si a, huaiziak in mi tengteng a si uhi;
Mi tengteng sih sik a Khrist a sihna pen a hingte leng amau adia a hin nawnlouh ua, a sihsik ua si a thounawn ading a a hin zawkna ding uh ahi.
Huchi a hih ziak in tuban kou zaw salam ah kuamah ka thei nawnta kei ding uh; salam ah Khrist na theita mahle ung leng; tun zaw ka theita kei uhi.
Huchi a hih ziak in, kuapeuh Khrist a a om leh thilsiam thak a honghi a; thilluite a mangta a, ngai un, a hong thakta uhi.
Himahleh bangkim Pathian kiang a kipan a pawt ahi a; aman Khrist ziak in amah toh kituak in honbawl a kituahna nasepna a honpia hi;
Huchi in Pathian in Khrist ah khovel amah toh kituaknawn in a bawl a, a tatleknate uh tatlekna a sehsak lou in, kituahnawnna thu hon kemsak ahi.
Huaiziak in, Khrist palai ka hi ua, Pathian in koute zang in a hon ngen ahi; Pathian toh kituakta un aw chi in, Khrist sik in k’on ngen uhi.
Amah a Pathian diktatna i hong hih theihna ding in khelhna himhim theilou amah Pathian in eite ziak in khelhna in a bawl hi.
Pathian hehpihna phattuampih lou a na tan louhna ding un, amah seppih koute’n k’on ngen petmah uhi.
“Hun kipahhuai ah k’on ngaikhia a,
hotdamna ni ah k’on panpih” a chi ngal a.
Ngai un, tu hun kipahuai ahi a; ngai un, tu hotdamna ni ahi!
Ka nasepna uh dem a omlouhna ding in banglam peuh ah kuamah pukloh ding himhim ka bawl kei uhi.
Pathian nasemte bang in bangkim ah mi mit tung in ka om zawzel ua, nakpi a kuhkalna ah, haksatna ah, taksapna ah, lunggimna ah,
Vuakna ah, hentakna ah, buaina ah, sepgimna ah, ihmutmohna leh gilkialna ah;
Siangthouna, theihna, dohtheihna, chitna, Kha Siangthou leh
Itna taktak, thutakna leh Pathian thilhihtheihna nei in; taklam leh veilam a diktatna galvante zang in;
Thupina leh pahtawi louhna, min gensiat leh min genhoihna ah leng;
Midiktat hi ngal in mikhemte bang a bawl in ka om ua; min thangtak hi ngal in theih thamlouh bang in, si dekdek a vuak a om in, hihlup louh in ngai dih ua, ka hing uhi;
Lungkham tak a om in, himahleh kipak gige ngal in; zawngtak hi ngal a, bangkim a midangte hih hausa in ka om uhi.
Korinthte aw, na kiang uah ka kamka ua, ka lungtang uh hihlet in a om hi.
Koumau henchip in na omkei ua, noumau na thil deihlam uah na kihenchip zaw uh.
Huchi in k’on piak bangbang honpe thuk sam ding in tate kiang a gen bang in ka gen ahi, nou leng na lungtangte uh zasak sam un.
Ginglou mite toh kituak loupi a hakkol paw khawm in omkei un; diktatlouhna leh diktatna in bang ahia kikopna a neih uh? Ahihkeileh, mial leh vak in bang ahia kithuahna a neih uh?
Belial leh Khrist in leng bang ahia kituahna a neih uh? Ahihkeileh, ginglou leh gingmi’n bang ahia tankhawm a neih uh?
Milimte leh Pathian tempul in leng bang ahia kituahna a neih uh? Eite zaw Pathian hing tempul i hi ngal ua;
“Pathian in, amau ah ka om dia,
amau ah leng ka pawt dia;
huan a Pathian uh ka hidia,
amau leng ka mite ahi ding uh,
a chih bang in.
Huaiziak in, a lak ua kipan in hongpawt unla,
a tuam in om un, thil sianglou himhim khoih kei un,
Toupa’n a chi, huchi in,
k’on kipahpih dia,
Nou din na Pa uh ka hidia,
nou leng kei din tanu tapa na hi ding uh,
Toupa bangkim hihthei in a chi” chi in.
Huchi in, deihtakte aw, huai thuchiam i neih ziak un, sa leh kha buahna tengteng ah i kisiangsak ding uh, Pathian laudansiam kawm a siangthouna hih kim in.
Na lungtang uah mun hon awn un; kua tung mah ah ka khial kei uh, kuamah ka hihgawp kei uh, kuamah tung ah hamphat ka tum kei uhi.
Huai siamlouh nou hong tangsak ding in ka chi kei; sih leh sih chiat a, dam leh dam chiat ding in ka lungtang uah nou k’on vom uh chih tuma zek in ka genta hi.
Nou lam ah zaw ka pau ngamdan a thupi a k’on suan dan a thupi hi: khamuanna in ka dim a, ka haksatna tengteng uah nuamsa in ka dimlet hi.
Masidonia gam ka tun un leng ka sa un muanna himhim a nei tuankei a, khatlam khatlam a hihgim in ka om zawta ua; pawlam kisualnate a om a; sunglam launate leng a om hi.
Himahleh, nuaisiah a omte khamuanpa, Pathian in,

Titas hongna in hon khamuanta a; a hongna kia in ahi kei a, na lungkham dante uh, na kahdante uh, ka tung a na phattuamngaihdante uh honhilh in, noumau a a khamuanna mah in leng a hon khamuanta ahi; huchi in, ka kipak nawn sem hi.
Ka laikhak in honhih lungkham mah leng, ka kisik kei hi; a tung in ahihleh ka kisik a, huai laikhak in nou a honhih lungkham chih ka theih ziak in; himahleh sawtloukal kia ahi.

Tun zaw ka kipak ahi, hih lungkham a na om ziak uh ahi kei a, kisikna ding a na lungkham ziak un ahizaw hi. Koumau ziak a bangmah na tan louhna ding un Pathian deihlam bang a hih lungkham in na om uhi.
Pathian deihlama lungkhamna in hotdamna ding in, kisikna a bawl a, kisikhuai thil a tun kei; khovel lungkhamna in bel sihna a tunzaw hi.

Enmah un, Pathian deihlama lungkhamna in bangchibang chihtakna, bangchibang kihahsiang nopna, bangchibang kiawilouhna, bangchibang patauhna, bangchibang lunggulhna, bangchibang phattuamngaihna, bangchibang gawtna ahia nou adia hontut tak. Bangkim ah huai thu ah na siang uh chih na kihihlang ta uhi.

Huchi in, na kiang uah gelh mahleng, a gilou hihpa ziak in ka gelh kei a, a gilou thuakpa ziak in leng ka gelh sam kei, ka tung ua na phattuam ngaihdan uh Pathian mitmuh a na kiang ua theihsaka a om theihna ding in ka gelh ahizaw hi.
Huaiziak in, khamuan in ka omta him ua; koumau khamuanna kia lou ah leng, Titas kipahna ziak in ka kipak nawnsem ua, nou tengteng in a lungsim na hihhalhsak tak ziak un.

A kiang ah banglam peuh ah leng noumau honsuang mahle ung, ka zahlak ngal kei ua, zahlak nak sang in bangkim, na kiang ua thu taktaka ka genzel bang un, Titas ma a k’on suan uh thu taktak a honghita ngei hi.
Huan, na vek ua a thu na mandante uh, lau leh ling kawm a amah na kipahpih dante uh theigige in, a lungsim noumau lam ah a nakte’n nawnsem ta ahi.
Thil bangkim ah na tung ua ka muan ziak in ka kipak ahi.
Huan, unaute aw, Masidonia gam a saptuam pawlte lak a Pathian hehpihna piak pen k’on theisak ding uhi;
Huchi a haksa thuakna ze-etna thupi a a kipahna uh dimlet leh nakpi a a gentheihna uh dimlet a thilphalna thupi uh a hong hih dan bang.
A neih bang un, ahi, a neih sang ua thupi in leng, amau ut thu un a pia uh chih theih pih ka hi,
Hiai hehpihna leh misiangthoute nasepsakna thu a nakpitak a hon ngen ngutngut in.
Huai leng ka lamet louh bang un a hih ua, Pathian deihlam in, amau mahmah Toupa kiang ah leh kou kiang ah a kipe masa phot ua.
Huchi in, tuma a a patsa, hiai hehpihna leng noumau a hihkim nalai ding in Titas ka ngen uhi.
Huchi in, bangkim ginna, thugen siamna, theihna, phattuamngaihna tengteng, n’on itna uh na hauh bang un, huai hehpihna leng na hauh theihna ding un thanop suah un.
Thupia bang in ka gen kei a, midang phattuamngaihna in na itna uh gildan leng chian ding in ka gen ahizaw.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna, a gentheihna ziak a na hong hauh theihna ding un hau mahleh noumau ziak ngeingei a hong gentheih takdan, na thei uhi.
Huchi in, huai ah ka ngaihdan bang ahia ka gen hi: kum khat paita a na hihpat kia uleng hilou a na ut pat uh tuin buchingsakta le uchin nou adin a hoihpen ahi.
Huchi in, ut ding a kimanna a om bang in, na neih bangzel ua tangtunna leng a omtheihna ding in, tun ah zaw hih tangtungta un.
Kimanna pen a om phot leh, mi a neihlouhpi hilou in, a neih bangzel a a piak kipahpih tuak ahi.
Midang a gim louh ua, nou na gimna ding un ka chi kei hi.

Kibatlualna ding in, na hauhna uh tulai in a taksap awnghukna a hong hih a, a hauhna uleng na taksap awnghukna uh a honghih sam theihna ding in ka chi ahizaw, huchi in, kibatlualna a hongom thei ding hi.
“A khawm tam in a val in a
neikei a, a khawm tawm in leng a tasam tuankei” chih gelh bang in.
Huan, ken nou k’on awlmoh bang a awlmohna lungtang Titas kiang a pepa Pathian kiang ah kipahthu om hen.
Ka ngetna uh a hon sansak a; himahleh ka nget ziak kia uh hilou in, amah phatuamngaihna in, amah ut thu in na kiang ua hoh dia pawt ding in a kisa hi.
Unaupa khat toh amah k’on sawl uhi. Tua unaupa a saptuam un tanchinhoih lam a a phatna uh saptuam pawl tengteng ah a thangsuak hi;

Huchi lel leng ahi kei a, Hiai hehpihna thawnpiak paw ding a kou toh zin vialvial ding saptuam telkhiak ahi a, Toupa thupina ding in hiai thil thawnpiak ka hawm ua, midangte huh na ki thalawpna uh ensak ding in leng ka hawm uhi.
Hiai thilpiak ka hawmna lam uah kuamah in a hondem louhna ding un ka pilvang uhi.
Toupa ngaihdan kia in hilou in, mihing ngaihdan a leng thil kilawm ka ngaihtuah khol zel uhi.
Huan, a kiang uah ka unaupa uh ka sawl ding ua, amah thil tampitak ah phatuamngai tak ahi chih tamveipi ka theichianta uhi, tu khol a houh nou a hon taksan mahmah ziak in phatuam a ngai nawn sem hi.
Titas ahihleh, ka lawm leh noumau lam a ka naseppih ahi a; huan, ka unaute uh ahihleh, saptuam pawlte palai, Khrist thupina ahi uhi.
Huaiziak in, na it uh chih theihna leh, k’on suanna uh theihtelna saptuam pawlte ma ah a kiang uah langsak un.
Misiangthoute adia thilpiak thu zaw na kiang uah ka gelh a kiphamoh kei hi.

Na kiman dan uh ka thei ngal a, huailam thu ah zaw kum khat ahita Akhaia gamte kimansa in a omta uh chi in Masidonia gam a mite kiang ah k’on na suang zel a; na phattuamngaihna un a lak ua mi tampi a tawk halhta hi.
Himahleh huailam thu ah zaw k’on suanna bangmahlou a hong hih louhna ding in unaute ka hohsak zel a, ka gen bangtak a mansa a nana om theihna ding un.
Huchilou in zaw Masidonia gam a mi kuate hiam in a honzuih zenzen uleh, kimanlou in hong mu le uh, noute kia hilou in noute k’on ginna uh lam ah kou leng ka zahlak kha ding uhi.

Huaiziak in unaute bel nou kiang a hong masa a, hoihtak a thilpiak na chiamkholhte uh na bawlkhol ding a, nget kiphamoh in ka gingta hi, laksak teitei bang hilou a phaltak a piak bang zaw in mansa a na omna ding un.
Himahleh huailam thu ah zaw, theh tawm in a at tawm ding a, theh tam in a at tam ding hi.
Michih in it pipi a pelou in, piaklouh theihlouh a ngaihtuah a pe tuanlou in, a lungtang ua a tup bangzel un pe chiat uhen; Pathian in kipaktak a pemite a it hi.
Huan Pathian in hehpihna chiteng in na tung uah a vukthei ahi; huchi in nou bangkim ah a hun ngial nei gige in, nasep hoih chiteng a ding in na hau thei ding uhi;
“A hawmzak a;
gentheite kiang ah a pia a;
a diktatna tangtawn in a om gige” chih gelh bang in.
Thehpa kiang a a chi pepa leh nek ding a tanghou pepa’n na theh ding uh chi a honpe dia a hon hih pungsak ding a, na diktatna gahte uh leng a hon hih pungsak ding.
Thilphalna chiteng kou ziak a Pathian kiang a kipahthu genna pen nei ding a, bangkim a hihhauh a om in,
Hiai sepsakna nna in misiangthoute taksapna awngte a huksak kia ahi kei a, Pathian kiang a kipahthu genna tampi in, a luang let nalai ahi.
Hiai nasepna a etkhiak a om in Khrist Tanchinhoih lam a na thugin uh na zuihdan uleh amau ading leh mi tengteng adia thilpiak a na thilphal dan un Pathian na hihthupi ding uh ahi;
Amau ngei in leng na tung ua Pathian hehpihna thupi mahmah ziak in, nou adia thumsak kawm in a hon ngai mahmah uhi.
A thilpiak genzawh vuallouh ziak in Pathian kiang ah kipahthu om hen.
Huan kei Paul, na lak ua na mitmuh ua thunuailuttak a om a, na kiang ua omlouh tak a noumau lam a khauh in Khrist lungnemna leh nunnemna in k’on ngen ahi;
Ahi, na kiang ua ka om chiang in khenkhat sa bang a om a honsepte tung a hangsantak a om ka tup ngamna bang in, k’on khauhkhum a kul louhna ding in k’on ngen ahi.
Sa ah om mah leng sa kidou bang in i dou kei ua,
Eite kigalvannate zaw sa leng ahi kei a, kulhpi kiptak phelna ding a Pathian ziak a thilhihtheitak galvan ahizaw hi.
Lung a gel pansante leh thilsang chiteng Pathian theihna dal ding a sangtak a bawlte i phuk zel; ngaihtuahna chiteng Khrist thumanna sikha a pi in;
Na thumandan uh hihkim a a om chiang in, thumanlouhna tengteng phula ding nangawn a leng mansa in ka om uhi.
Noute’n pawlam muhtheih thilte kia en na hi u maw? Kuapeuh in Khrist ahi a a kigintak leh amah kingaihtuah nawn hen, amah Khrist a ahi bang in, koute leng ka hi sem uhi.
Ka thuneihna uh nou hihsiatna ding ahi kei a, noumau bawlhoih zawkna ding a Toupa’n a honpiak suang mah leng ka zahlak kei ding uhi.
Ka laikhakte a nou hon hihlau tum bang a ka latlouhna ding in huai ka chi ahi.
“A laikhakte zaw a gik in a khauh a, a sa a hongom leh mi zawngkhalpi ahi a, a pau leng a deihthoh huai,” a chi uhi.
Ka omlouh chiang ua ka laikhakte ua ka thugelh uleh, huailai a na kiang ua ka om chiang ua ka hih ding uh a kibatlouhna a omkei chih huchibang mite’n a theisiam ding uhi.
Khenkhat amau kiphatte lak ah ka kisim khawm ngam kei ua, amau toh leng ka kitehpih ngam sam kei uhi. Himahleh amau zaw amau leh amau kiteh in amau leh amau kitehpih in lungsim neilou in a om uhi.
Kou zaw Pathian hontehna val in ka kiuangsak kei ding uhi, mohpuakna a honpiak bangzel in ka kiuangsak zaw ding uhi, noumau ngei leng huai mohpuakna in hon huamkhak na hi uhi.
Ka thuneih phaklouhna ding tantan uh hong uk hilou in, Khrist Tanchinhoih gen in na khua ua tam in ka hongpai uhi.
Koute ka hihna pel ua kiphat hiam, midang sepgimnate kisuanpih ka hi kei uhi; na ginna uh a khandan bangzel in, na lak ua ka nasepna uh nakpitak a hihlet in om leh chih lametna ka nei zaw uhi,
huchi in midang nasepsa suang hilou a, nou khenlam gamte pha in Tanchinhoih ka gen theihna ding un.
Himahleh “A suang peuh in Toupa suang hen.”
Amah kiphat in phat a loh ngal kei a, Toupa’n a genhoih in phat a loh zaw ahi.
Ka hai deuhna uah noute’n Pathian ah n’on thuaktheih uh ka ut hi: Ahi, thuak leng n’on thuak thei ta uhi.
Pathian hawmthohna, thikthuse khop in ahi nou k’on deihthoh; Khrist kiang a nungak siangthou bang a ka honpiak theihna ding in, pasal khat k’on hawisak hi.
Himahleh gul in a zuau pil a Evi a khem bang in, Khrist lam a takna leh siangthouna a kipan bangchi hiam in na lungsim uh a hihse kha ding, chih ka lauthawng hi.
Khattei hongpai a Jesu dang, a thu ka gen ngeilouh uh, a gen a, kha lamdang na muh ngeilouh uh, leh Tanchinhoih lamdang na san ngeilouh uh, na pompah un kipe baih lua na himah kei ding ua hia!
Hiai Sawltaklian thuneipen na chihte uh sang in banglam peuh ah niamzawkna nei in ka kigingta kei hi.
Thugen lam ah pau zatsiam kei mah leng theihna ah zaw huchibang ka hi kei uhi; huai noute kiang ah banglam peuh leh thil tengteng ah ka kilang sak uhi.
Ahihkeileh, Pathian Tanchinhoih a thawn lel a k’on hilh ziak a tawisan a na om theihna ding ua ka kihihniam in thil ka hihkhial ahia?
Na nna uh ka sep theihna ding in midangte a kipan a huhna la in, saptuam pawl dangte ka lok ahi;

Huan na kiang ua ka om a, ka taksap lai in, kuamah k’on hihbuai kei a; unau Masidonia gam a kipan a hongpaite’n ka taksap awng a hong huksak ngal ua: bangkim ah noumau hihbuailou in ka kibawl bang in, ka kibawl zel ding hi.
Khrist thutak keimaha a om bang in, hiai ka kisuanna zaw Akhaia gam lam a hihdaih in a omkei ding.
Bangziak in? K’on it louh ziak hia? Pathian in k’on it a thei hi.
Huan a nasep uh kisaktheihpih a, kou sep bangbang a sem kichite kichihna ka bulkalh theihna ding in ka sep tuh ka sem zom zel ding hi.
Mi huchibangte zaw Khrist sawltak a kibawltawm a, sawltak takloute, nasemmi, mi khemhatte ahi uhi.
Huai ahihleh a lamdang kei; Setan hial leng vak sawltak in a kibawl tawm nak ahi.
Huaiziak in a nasemte leng diktatna nasemmi in kibawltawm mahle uh thillamdang ahi kei; huaite tawpna zaw a thilhih bangzel un ahi ding hi.
Ka chi nawn: kuamah in mihai in honsep kei uhen: himahleh n’on seh vanglak uleh, ken leng neu chik bek a ka kisaktheih sam theihna ding in mihai bangtak in honpom un.
Ka genzaw Toupa thuneihna in ka gen kei a, ka kisaktheihna mihai bangtak in ka genzaw ahi.
Mi tampite’n khovel thilte a kisaktheihpih ziak un keileng k’ong kisathei sam ding hi.
Nou bel mi pil na hih ziak un mihaite lungkimtakin na thuakzou zel uhi.
Mi sal a hon bawlte, hon negaite, nuamtak honsa a na tung ua kiliansak leh na mai ua hon bengte na thuakthei zel ngal ua.
Huchi dia zaw hatlou lua mah kei ve ua! Kisit in ka gen ahi.
Hebrute ahi uhia? Keileng ka hi. Israelte ahi uhia? Keileng ka hi. Abraham suante ahi uhia? Keileng ka hi.
Khrist nasemte ahi uhia? Mihai bang in genta leng, ka hi sem; sepgimna ah thupi sem in, suangkulh tanna ah bang thupi sem in, vuakna ah bang a kan a val in, sih lauhuaina tamveipi ka tuak hi.
Judate lak ah vuakna khatvei a sawmli chinglou ngavei ka tuak hi;
Thumvei chiang a khet in ka om a, khatvei suang a den in ka om hi, thumvei longsiatna ka tuak, zan khat leh ni khat tuipi ah taihmang in ka om hi,

Khualzinna ah tamveipi, luite lak ah lauhuai, suammite lak ah lauhuai, ka chipihte lak ah lauhuai, Jentelte lak ah lauhuai, khopi ah lauhuai, gamdai ah lauhuai, tuipi ah lauhuai, unau takloute lak ah lauhuai;
Septawlna leh sepgimna, ihmutmohna ah tamveipi, gilkial leh dangtakna ah, anngawlna ah tamveipi, khosik leh vuaktang a omnate.
Huan hiaite ban a kigenlou saptuam pawl tengteng ka ngaihtuahna niteng a hon delh gige leng a om hi.
Mi hatlou ka awlmohpih louh kua a om a? A puksia ka lungkhampih louh kua a om ngei a?
Suang ding ka hih vanglak leh ka hatlouhna lam thilte ahi ka suan ding.
Toupa Jesu Pathian leh Pa, tangtawn a hampha in, zuau ka gen louh dan a thei hi.
Damaska khua ah kumpipa Areta nuai a gamukpa’n hon man ding in Damaskate khopi a veng sak a;
Huan kulhbang tohlet ah bawm in hon khaikhia ua, huchi in a khut a kipan ka suakta hi.
Ka kiuangsak lai ding hi. Ka phattuampih ding a omkei na a, himahleh Toupa kiang a kipan kilakna leh theihsakna thu ka genzom ding hi.
Khrist a mi khat ka thei; huai mi tuh kum sawmlehli ahita a, pumpi in hia a om ka theikei, pumpi lou in hia a om ka thei sam kei: Pathian in a thei, van thumna hial ah laktouh in a om hi.
Huai mi mahmah, sapum in hia a om, sapum lou in hia ka theikei; Pathian in a thei hi;
Paradise a laktouh a a omdan, thugen vuallouh, mihing gensiang loute a za chih ka thei hi.
Mi huchibang ahihleh ka suang ding; himahleh ka hatlouhna louzaw keimah ka kisuang kei ding hi.
Suan ut mah leng mihai ka hi kei ding, thu taktak ka gendek ngal a; himahleh ka kidek ding, huchilou in zaw kuapeuh in honmuh bang uleh ka lak a thu a zak sang un hon ngai thupizaw kha ding uhi.
Huan theihsakna a thupi mahmah ziak a ka kingaihlet luat louhna ding in ka sa ah ling honpia ahi, Setan sawltak, khutthak nuhna dia hon zang ding ngei; huchilou in zaw ka kingailian kha ding hi.
Huai thil tungtang thu ah hon awngsut theihna ding in Toupa thumvei ka ngen hi.

Huan aman ka kiang ah, “Ka hehpihna nang di’n a hun hi, ka thilhihtheihna hatlouhna ah ahi hihkim a a om” a chi hi. Huchi in Khrist thilhihtheihna ka tung a a omtheihna ding in kipaktak in ka hatlouhnate ka suang zaw ding hi.
Huaiziak in Khrist ziak a hatlouhna ah, liamna ah, taksapna ah, sawina ah, lungngaihna ah ka kipak zel hi; ka hatlouh peuhpeuh chiang in ahi ka hat zawk.
Hai ka na hita: nou hailou theilou in n’on bawl ua ahi: kei pen noumau hon pahtawi ding keive, bangmah hi kei mah leng, banglam peuh ah leng sawltaklian thuneipente ka phalou kei hi.
Ka sawltaklian hih chiamtehnate kuhkalna chiteng toh chiamtehnate, thillamdangte, thilhihtheihnate in na lak ua hih ahi taktak hi.
Bang lam ah ahia, saptuam pawl dangte sang a niam zaw a bawl a na omna uh? Keimah ngeingei in k’on hihbuai louhna lam thu ah a hih kei ngal leh. Huai diklouhna ah hon ngaidam un.

Ngai un, hiai na kiang ua hong ding a ka sawm a thumveina ahi; noute k’on hihbuai kei ding, na thilneihte uh hilou in noumau hondeih ka hi zaw hi; tate’n nu leh pate ding in a kholkhawm sak ding uh ahi kei a, nu leh pate’n tate ding in a kholkhawm sak zaw ding uh ahi.
Huan ken zaw na kha ua ding a kipaktak in ka kizangbei ding a, ka kizangbei vek lai ding hi. A kan a val a nou k’on it ziak in ken noute itna tawm zaw muhna in ka nei ahi maw?
Himahleh kei mahmah in k’on hihbuai louhna ah kei lepchiah pil leh zekhemna a noute hon man na sa ua hiam.
Na kiang ua ka misawl kuahiamte zang in nou k’on hamphat pih ngei ahia?
Noute kiang a hongpai ding in Titas ka ngen a, amah toh unaupa k’on sawl hi. Titas in nou a hon hamphatpih himhim hia? Kha kibang a gamta khawm ka hi kei ua hia? Khap kibang a pai ka hi kei ua hia?
Noumau kiang a kou leh kou kiphalam n’on sa ua hia? Khrist ah Pathian mitmuh in ahi thu ka gen uh. Himahleh deihtakte aw, bangkim noumau bawl hoihna ding ahi.

Ka hongpai chiang in bangchi hiam a ka lamet bang a k’on muh kei leh kei deih bang in n’on mu kei kha ding uh chih leh, bangchi hiam in kitainate, kihazatnate, hehnate, kilangkhennate, kigennate, kihuaukhumnate, kingaihlet luatnate, buainate a om in k’on mukha ding chih ka lau hi.

Na kiang ua ka hong chiang in ka Pathian in na lak uah honhih zahlak nawn in thil hihkhialte leh thilsianglou hihte, kingaite, huk ching a kisik tuanlou in mi tampite ka kahkhum kha ding chih ka lau hi.
Hiai pen na kiang a ka hong a a thumveina ding ahi. “Theihpih nih hiam, thum hiam kam ah thu chiteng hihkip in a om ding hi.”

Ka genkholta a, a nihveina a na kiang ua ka omlai a ka gen bang in, tun ah na kiang ua omlou in, tuma lam a thil hihkhialte kiang ah leh midang tengteng kiang ah ka genkhol nawn dek hi, ka hong nawn leh ka hawi kei ding, chih;
Khrist keimah a thugen zelpa pen ze-etna na zon ziak un, amah zaw noumau lam ah a hatlou kei a, na lak uah thilhihtheitak ahizaw hi.

Amah hatlouhna ziak a kilhlup himahleh Pathian thilhihtheihna ziak in a hing gige hi. Kou leng amah ah ka hat kei uhi, himahleh, noumau lam a Pathian thilhihtheihna ziak in a kiang ah ka hingsam ding uhi.
Ginna ah na omna uhiam chih noumau ngeingei ki enchian zel un. Ahihkeileh noumau ah Jesu Khrist a om chih noumau ngeingei in na thei chian kei ua hia? Deihlouh na hih kei ngal uleh.
Kou deihlouh in ka omkei uh chih na thei lai ding un ka gingta hi.

Huan thil himhim na hihkhelh louhna ding un Pathian kiang ah ka ngen zel uh; koute deihhuai a ka lat theihna ding uh ahi kei a, koute deihlouh in om mahle ung noute’n a kilawm peuhmah na hih theihna ding uh ahizaw hi.
Thutak gum ding lou in zaw, thutak dou ding in bangmah ka hih theikei uhi.
Koute ka hatlouh lai un leng noute na hat un ka kipak uhi; noumau hoihlam a na kibawlphat uh thumna a ka nget uh ahi.

Huaiziak in hihse ding hilou a bawlhoih ding zaw a, Toupa’n thuneihna honpiak bangzel in, na kiang ua ka om chiang a nakpitak a k’on taihilh louhna ding in, na kiang ua ka omlouh lai in hiai thu ka gelh ahi.

A tawppen in, unaute aw, kipaktak in om un, na omdan uh bawlhoih unla; k’on ngetna limsak unla, khamuangtak in om unla; lungsim munkhat pu unla, kituaktakin om unla; huchi in itna leh lemna Pathian na kiang ua om ding ahi.
Tawp siangthou in chibai kibuk un.
Mi Siangthou tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi.
Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna, Pathian itna, Kha Siangthou kithuahpihna na vek ua kiang ah om hen, Amen.
Paul, Jesu Khrist leh misi lak a kipan a kaithoupa, Pa Pathian ziak a sawltak, mihing sawlkhiak hilou, mihing vanga leng hi sam lou,
leh ka kiang a unau om tengtengte’n, Galatia gam a saptuamte kiang ah:
Pa Pathian leh i Toupa Jesu Khrist apan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen;
Aman i Pathian leh a Pa deihdan in, tulai khovel gilou tak lak a a hon suahtaksak theihna ding in i khelhnate ading in amah mah a hong kipeta hi;
Pathian kiang ah thupina tangtawn in om hen, Amen.
Khrist hehpihna ziak a nou honsampa huchi guih a Tanchinhoih tuam lam a na kisuan san uh lamdang ka sa hi;
Tanchinhoih dang om ahi kei a; noumau hon hihbuai in Khrist Tanchinhoih hih lamdan ut kuate hiam a om uh ahizaw hi.
Himahleh koumau hiam, van a kipan a hongsuk angel nangawn in leng, Tanchinhoih na kiang ua ka gensa pen loungal uh Tanchinhoih dang himhim hon na hilhta a om uleh hamsiat in om uhen.
Tuma a ka gen bang un, tua gennawn ding ka hi. Tanchinhoih na muh pen loungal uh, Tanchinhoih dang kuapeuh in nou a honhilh leh hamsiat in om uhen.
Ahihleh tuin mihing maipha hia ka zon Pathian a? Ahihkeileh mihing ahi maw lungtaisak ka tup? Mihing nana lungtaisak lel hitaleng, Khrist sikha ka hi kei ding hi.
Huchi in unaute aw, ka Tanchinhoih genpen mihing lamthu ahi kei chih k’on theisak hi.
Mihing kiang a kipan a ka muh leng ahi kei, mi honhilh leng ka hi sam kei, Jesu Khrist kilakna ziak a mu ka hi zaw hi.
Judate sabiakdan a nidanglai ka omdan na thei khinta ngal ua, huchi a Pathian saptuamte nakpitak a sawi in ka hihbuai gige hi:
Huan ka pipute thugousiah tung a phatuam ka ngaih tuankhol ziak in Judate sabiakdan lam ah ka chipihte lak a ka khanvual tampite ka na khengta hi.
Ka nu gilsung a kipan a hon hihtuampa leh a hehpihna ziak a honsampa Pathian in,
Jentelte lak a a Tanchinhoih ka hilh theihna ding a a Tapa lungkimtak a keimah a a kilaksak lai in, sa leh sisan toh kidong lou in,
Sawltak ka hih ma a sawltak nana hisate kiang a Jerusalem khua a hohtou tuanlou in, Arabia gam ah ka paimang paha; huan Damaska khua ah ka kik nawnta hi.
Kum thum a beinung in Kifa veh ding in Jerusalem khua ah ka vahoh tou a, a kiang ah ni sawmlehnga ka tam hi.
Sawltak dangte, Toupa unau Jakob kia loungal kuamah ka mu kei hi.
Na kiang ua ka thugelhte ngai dih ua, Pathian mitmuh ah ka zuau kei hi.
Huai nung in Suria leh Silisia gamte ah ka hongpai hi.
Judia gam a saptuam, Khrist a omte meltheih ka hi naikei lai hi,
“Tuma lam a hon sawipan tuma a khatvei ginna thu a hihbuai tuh tuin a gen zawta” chih mi gen kia a za uhi.
Huan keimah ziak in Pathian a pahtawita uhi.
Kum sawmlehli a beinung in Titas mah leng pi in, Barnaba toh Jerusalem khua ah ka va hohtou nawn hi.

Kilakna ziak in ka va hohtou a, Jentelte kiang a Tanchinhoih ka tangkoupih amau ka vahilh a; himahleh milian deuhte a tuam in ka hilh a; huchilou in zaw a thawn in ka taikha hiam ahihkeileh taithawnta ka hi kha ding hi.
Himahleh ka kiang a om Titas, hial leng Grik mi himahleh zeksum sak teitei in a omkei hi.
Huai unau taklou, a guk a pilut a omte, sal a honlak theihna ding ua Khrist Jesu a noplenna i neih uh enkhe ding a honglutte ziak in ahi.
Himahleh Tanchinhoih thutak nou ading a bittak a kep a hihtheihna ding in amau kiang ah mitphiatkal lel leng ka kipe himhim kei uhi.
Hihna deuh min nei mahmahte bangchibang hihna nei mahle uh kei ading in a lamdan na a omkei hi. Pathian in kuamah a khentuam kei hi; huai min nei mahmahte thugen in bangmah hon behlap kei hi.
Huchih naksang in zeksumte kiang a Tanchinhoih Peter kiang a kepsak a a om bang in zeksumlouhte kiang a Tanchinhoih kei kiang ah kepsakin a om chih a theizaw uhi.
Zeksumte sawltak hi ding a Peter a sempa mah in Jentelte sawltak hi ding in kei ah a sem hi.

Huan hehpihna kei kiang a piak a om a muh un, Jakob, Kifa, Johan, khuam muanhuai leh min neite’n amau bel zeksumte kiang a hoh ding leh kou Jentelte kiang a hoh di’n kei leh Barnaba kithuahna khut taklam honpe zawta uhi.
Gentheite ka theih gige lel uh a deih ua, huai mah hih ka tum chiltel hi.
Huan Peter tuh Antiok khua a a hongpai lai in demhuai mahmah a a om ziak in a maitang ngei ah ka kalh hi.
Mi kuate hiam Jakob kiang a kipan a a hongpai ma un aman Jentelte kiang ah an a ne zel hi; himahleh a hong tuntak un zeksumte a kihtak ziak in pang nawnlou in a ki koihtuamta hi.
Juda dangte leng a lepchiah chiat sam ua, huchi in Barnaba hilhial leng a lepchiahna ua pimang in a om zou hial hi.

Tanchinhoih thutak bang in a omkei uh chih ka theih in avek ua ma ah Peter kiang ah, “Nang Judami na hi ngal a, Judate om bang a omlou in Jentelte om bang a na om zawk leh bangchidan ahia Jentelte Judate om bang a na omsak teitei nak?“ ka chi hi.
Ei zaw Jentel mikhialte hilou in, Judami him a piang i hi uhi.

Himahleh dan thilhihte ziak in mi siamtang in a omkei hi, Jesu Khrist gin ziak kia in siamtang in omzaw uh chih i thei uhi; enleng dan thilhih ziak hilou in, Khrist ginna ziak a siamtang a i om theihna ding in, Khrist Jesu i gingta hi; dan thilhihte ziak in mihing himhim siamtang a omlou ding uh ahi.
Ahihleh Khrist a siamtang a om tum kawmpi a eite mikhialte i na hih nak leh Khrist khelhna omsakpa hita ve maw le! Hilou hial.
Ka thil hihsiatte ka lamnawn zel in zaw, talekpa ka hi chih ka kitheisak phet ahi ding hi.
Pathian lam adia ka hong hin theihna ding in, kei zaw dan ziak in dan lam ah ka si khinta hi.

Khrist toh kilhden in ka omta; himahleh ka hing ahi; keimah pen ka hita kei a, Khrist keimah ah a hing ahizaw; tua sa a ka hin bel ginna a hing ka hi; Pathian Tapa, hon it a ka sik a kipepa pen ginna ah.
Pathian hehpihna bangmahlou in ka bawl kei, dan ziak a diktatna a om in zaw Khrist a thawn a si ahi ding hi.
Nou Galatia mihaite aw, kuan hon bumhai a maizen a? Na mitmuh ngei ua Jesu Khrist kilhden a kichiantak a latsak a hihhih toh.
Hiai leltak k’on dong ding: Dan thilhihte ziak in hia Kha na muh uh, na ngaihkhiak ua na gintak ziak un?
Hichitelin na hai umaw? Kha a pankhin ngal in, sa in na zou ding ua hia?
Thil huchizah zah a thawn a thuak na hi umaw? A thawn hi taktak hita leh.
Na kiang ua Kha hon pepa leh na lak ua thillamdang hihpan dan thilhihte ziak in hia a hih, na ngaihkhiak ua na gintak ziak un?
“Abraham in Pathian a gingta a, huai ginna diktatna a simsak a hihtak mah bang in.”
Huchi in thei un, ginna a omte Abram tate ahi uhi.

Huan Laisiangthou in, “Pathian in ginna ziak in Jentelte siamtang sak ding in a kisa chih theikhol in, nangmah ah namte vualzawlsak in a om ding uh” chi in, Abraham kiang ah Tanchinhoih a na genkholta hi.
Huchi in ginna a omte a ginompa Abraham toh vualzawl sak in a omsam nak uhi.
Dan thilhih a kinga peuhmahte hamse nuai ah a om uhi; “Dan laibu a thugelh tengteng bang a hih gige lou peuhmah hamsiat in om hen,” chi a, gelh ahi.
Tuin Pathian mitmuh in kuamah dan a siamtang a omkei, “Mi diktat tuh ginna in a hing ding” chih a hih ziak in chih a lang kilkel hi.
Himahleh dan ginna a kinga ahi kei; huchibang a hihpa huaite in a hing ding chih ahizaw hi.
Khrist ei sik a hamsiat in a hongom a, dan hamsia a kipan in a hontan kheta hi; “Sing a khailup peuhmah hamsiat hi hen” chih gelh a hih bang in.
Huchi a Abraham tung a vualzawlnate Khrist Jesu ziak a Jentelte tung a hongtun theih a, Kha chiam ginna ziak a i muh theihna ding in.
Unaute aw, mihing hihdan gen leng: mihing thukhun lel leng, hihkipsa nung a phelkei ua, behlap leng a behlap ngeikei uhi.

Abraham kiang ah leh a chisuan kiang ah thuchiamte piak a na hi. Mi tampi tungthu gen bang in, “Chisuante kiang ah” a chi kei a; mi khat tungthu gen bang in, “Nang chisuan kiang ah,” a chi zaw a, huai tuh Khrist ahi.
Huchi in hiai ka chi ahi: huai thuchiam bangmahlou suaksak a hihmang ding in, thukhun Pathian in a na hihkipsa, a nung kum za li leh sawmthum khita hongom dan in a hihmang theikei hi.
Gouluah ding thu dan ziak ahihleh thuchiam ziak ahita kei ding a; himahleh Pathian in Abraham kiang ah thuchiam ziak in ahi a na piak.
Ahihkeileh bangchi thu a dan om ahia leh? Chisuan, thuchiamna a hongom masiah tatleknate ziak in behlap in a om a, angelte zang a palai khut a hihkip ahi.
Huan palai himhim mi khat lak ah palai ahi ngeikei hi; Pathian bel khat ahi.
Ahihkeileh dan in Pathian thuchiam te a kalh hia? Kalh lou hial, dan mi hihhing thei himhim piak a omkhin hitaleh, diktatna dan ziak in a om ngei ding hi.
Himahleh Jesu Khrist gin ziak a thilchiam a gingtate kiang a piak a hihtheihna ding in Laisiangthou in khelhna nuai ah bangkim a khakkhum vekta hi.
Himahleh ginna a hong tunma in ginna hong kilangding ah khakkhum in dan nuai a ven i na hi uhi.
Huchi in ginna ziak a siam i tan theihna ding in dan Khrist kiang a honchilpa ahi.
Himahleh ginna a hongtun in, honchilpa nuai ah i omta kei uhi.
Khrist Jesu gin ziak in Pathian tate na hi vek uhi.
Noute Khrist a baptist lut a omsate Khrist in na kithuamta uhi.
Huai ah Judami a omkei a, Grik mi leng a omkei; huai ah sikha a omkei a, noplen leng a omkei; huai ah pasal leh numei leng a omkei hi. Khrist Jesu ah na vek un pumkhat na hi uhi.
Huan Khrist a na hih uleh Abraham suan, thuchiam bang a gouluah dingte na hi uhi.
Himahleh huchi in ka chi: Gouluah dingpa bangkim tung ah toupa himahleh naupang a hih laiteng sikha toh bangmah in a ki lamdang kei hi;
A pa hunseh a hongtun masiah a donpa leh a kempa nuai ah a om hi.
Huchibang in ei leng naupang i hihlai in, khovel thubulte nuai ah sikha in i om uhi;
Himahleh a hunbi a hong kim in, Pathian in a Tapa, numei suan in, dan nuai a hongsuak in a hon sawlkhia hi,
Ta hihna i muh theihna ding leh dan nuai a omte tankhe ding in.
Huan tate na hih ziak un Pathian in a Tapa Kha, “Abba, Pa,” chi a kikou in, i lungtang uah a honsawl hi.
Huchi in sikha na hita kei ua, ta na hi zawta uhi; huan ta na hihleh Pathian vanga gouluah ding na hi hi.
Himahleh Pathian na theihlouh lai un, a piandan mawng ua Pathian hilou hialte sikha na hi uhi.
Tua Pathian n’on theihnung un bel, ahihkeileh Pathian theihmi na hong hihnung un chih ding ahizaw; thubul zawngkhal leh namanloute nuai a bangchidan a bawi a om nawn na ut na hi ua?
Nite, khate, hunte, kumte na tang zel ua.
Na tung uah tha ka sengthawn kha ding chih ka lau hi.
Unaute aw, k’on ngen ahi, keimah bang in om un, keileng noumau bang in ka om a, ka bangmah na hihse kei uhi.
Tanchinhoih na kiang ua ka gen masakna pen ka sa hatlouh ziak ahi chih na thei uhi.
Huan ka sa a nou dia khemna om tuh na simmawh kei ua, na kih sam kei uh; Pathian angel bang leh Khrist Jesu bang hial in n’on pakta zaw uhi.
Vangpha na kisakna uh koi a omta ahia le? Hihtheih liai hileh na mit uh khelkhia in n’on pekhin ding uh chih k’on theihpih ahi.
Thutak k’on hilh ziak in na melma uh ka hong hita ahia?
Amau noute phatuamngaitak in, a hoihlam deih hilou napi in a honzawl uhi; ahi, amau adia na phattuamngaih theihna ding ua kou a kipan pawsiah a hon omsak a ut uhi.
A tup a hoih leh a hoih lam ah chiklai peuh in phatuamngaih gige a hoih hi, na kiang ua ka omlai kia hilou in.
Ka unaute aw, Khrist noumau a siam piching a a om masiah nauvei in ka honvei hi.
Ahi, tulaiin na kiang ua om a, ka aw hihlamdan ka ut theihdan; na tungthu uah ka mang a bang ahi.
Dan nuai a om utte aw, honhilh un, dan in a gen na theikei ua hia?
Hichibang a gelh ahi: Abraham in tapa nih a nei a, khat sikhanu toh khat noplennu toh ahi.
Himahleh sikhanu lak a pen sa dan in a pianga, noplennu lak a pen bel thuchiam ziak a piang ahi.
Huai thilte etsakna ahi; huai numeite thukhun nih ahi uhi; khat Sinai tang a sikha hi ding a ta neinu, Hagar ahi.
Huan Hagar bel Arabia gam a Sinai tang ahi a, Jerusalem tulai a om toh kibang ahi, a tate toh sikha in a om uhi.
Tunglam Jerusalem bel noplen ahi; huai ngeingei eite nu ahi.
“Nang ching, ta nei ngeilou,
nuam in, nang,
nauvei ngeilou,
kikou khia in; pasal neinu sang in lungzuangnu
tate a tamzaw ngal a” chih gelh ahi.
Huchi in unaute aw, eite Isak bang in thuchiam tate i hi uhi.
Himahleh huailai bang in tuin leng ahi; sa dan a piang in Kha dan a piang a sawi ahi.
Himahleh Laisiangthou in bangchi’n a gen a? Bawinu a tapa toh hawlkhia un; bawinu tapa in noplennu tapa gou a luahpih louhding ziak in, a chi hi.
Huchi in unaute aw, bawinu tate i hi kei ua, noplennu tate i hi zaw uhi.
Noplen ding in Khrist in a hon suakta sakta, huaiziak in ding kip unla, sikha hakkol ah zaw lutnawn kei un.
Ngai un kei Paul in na kiang ua ka gen, zek na sum uleh Khrist nou ading in bangmah phattuamna hilou ding ahi.
Ahi a, danthu tengteng zui ding a bate a na hi uh chih zeksumte tengteng kiang ah ka theisak nawn ahi.
Nou dan a siamtan tumte aw, Khrist toh kikhenta na hi uh, hehpihna na puksanta uhi.
Kou bel Kha ziak in ginna in diktanna lametna ka ngak uhi.
Khrist Jesu ah zeksum bangmah a phatuam kei a, zeksumlouh leng bangmah a phatuam sam kei; ginna itna a sem bel a phatuam hi.
Hoihtak in na tailai un thutak zuihlou ding a kuan a hondal a ahia?
Hiai zekhemna zaw nou honsampa kiang a kipan ahi kei hi.
Silngou tawmchik in tanghou beupi a zelsuak hi.
Kei ngaihtuahna banglou in na ngaihtuah lamdang tuankei ding uh chih Toupa ah k’on muang hi; himahleh nou hon hihbuaite, a kua a kua hitale uh vaihawmna a tung ua kia pen a thuak ding uh ahi.
Unaute aw, ken zeksum thu gen lailai ka hih in, bangziaka sawi a om ka hia? Huchibang a hihngal leh Kros kisuihna tuh hihmang ahita ding hi.
Nou hon hihbuaite satkhiakin om vanglak le uh ka deih ahi.
Nou unaute aw, sikha hilou ding in sap na hi ua; himahleh na sikha hihlouhna uh sa ading a lemtanna’n zangkei unla, itna in akua akua ading a kisepsakte hizaw un.
Nangmah na ki-it bang in na vengte na it ding ahi, chih thu kam khat ah danthu tengteng kimsakin a om hi.
Himahleh na kikeih ua, na kinektuah uleh na kinekgaih louhna ding un pilvang un.
Huchi in hiai ka chi ahi, Kha ah om un, huchi in sa utna na hih tangtung kei ding uhi.
Sa in Kha a dou nak a, Kha in leng sa a dou hi; thilhih na tupte uh na hih theihlouhna ding un huaite a kikalh uh ahi.
Himahleh Kha pi a na om uleh dan nuai ah na omkei uhi.
Huan sa thilhihte a kilang chian hi, huaite hiaite ahi uh: angkawmna, kingaihna, thanghuaina, hukna,
Milim biakna, bumna, huatna, kinakna, hazatna, hehna, kilanna, omtuamna, gintuamna
Deihgohna, tualthahna, zumun nopna, zukhamna, huchibang thilhih chingte’n Pathian gam a tangkei ding uh chi a tuma a k’on hilhkholh mah bang in, k’on hilhkhol ahi.
Kha gah ahihleh, itna, kipahna, lemna, thuaktheihna, migitna, hoihna, muanhuaina,
Nunnemna, kidektheihnate a hizaw uhi; huchibang kalh lam in danthupiak himhim a omkei hi.
Khrist Jesu a hitate’n sa a lunggulhna leh a duhgawlna toh a kilhdenta uhi.
Kha a hing i hihleh kha mah ah i om ding uhi.
Kitoutuah chiat a, kihaza chiat in, i ki koihlian kei ding uhi.
Unaute aw, mi takhial bangpeuh a hihlai phawka na om leh nou kha mite aw, khemna ka tuaksam kha ding e, chi a kiveng hoih kawm in, huai bang mi nunnemna lungsim toh tungding thak nawn un.
Na puakgikte uh kidawn chiat un, huchi in Khrist danthu na zui uh ahi ding.
Mi bangmah hiloupi in mi liankuama a kibawl leh amah kikhem tawm lel ahi.
Michih in amah thilhih enchian hen; huchi a midang toh kiteha, kiuangsak lou a, amah mah a suanhuai thil a hih theihna ding in.
Michih in amah puak paw ding ahi ngal a.
Thuhilh a om in thil hoih tengteng a hilhpa kiang ah pe sam hen.
Zekhem in omkei un; Pathian zaw zekhem a mawkbawl vual ahi kei; min a tuh peuh uh huai mah at nawn ngei ding a hih ziak un.
Amah salam a tuh in sa a om siatna a at ding a, khalam a tuh in bel kha a kipan tangtawn hinna a at ding hi.
Huchi in thil hoih hih chimtak keini; i lungkiak kei leh a huntak ah i at ngei ding uhi.
Huchi in lemtang hun i neihdan bangzel in mi tengteng tung ah thil hoih hih ni, ginna inkuanpihte lak a omte tung ah hi kholdiak hen.
Keimah khut mahmah a na kiang ua laimal golpi pi a ka gelh en un.
Sa a mel kilawmsak utte peuhmah in zeksum a om ding in nou a honsawl teitei nak uhi; bangmah dang ziak ahi kei a, Khrist Kros ziak a sawi a thuak louhna ding lel uh ahi.
Zeksumte nangawn in leng danthu a zui tuansam kei ua, na sa uah, suan ding a neih theihna ding un na zek uh kisum leh chih a ut lel uh ahi.
Ken zaw i Toupa Jesu Khrist Kros loungal ka suan louh ding dan, huai Kros ziak in khovel kei ading in kilhden in a om a, keileng khovel a ding in kilhden in ka om hi.
Siamthak nawnna louzaw zeksum bangmah ahi kei a, zeksumlouh leng bangmah ahi sam kei hi.
Huai dan bang a om peuhmahte tung ah lemna leh hehpihna, Israelte Pathian tung ngei ah om hen.
Tuban siah kuamah in hon hihbuai nawn kei hen; ka pumpi ah Jesu chiamtehnate ka pu ngal a.
Unaute aw, Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kha uah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihlama Khrist Jesu sawltak in, misiangthou Ephesa khua a om Khrist Jesu a mi ginomte kiang ah:
Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Khrist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist Pa leh Pathian phat in om hen. Aman vanmunte ah khalam vualzawlna chiteng in eite Khrist ah a hon vualzawlta hi.
Amah mai a siangthou leh dembei a om ding a leitung pian ma a eite hon teltak bang ngei in:
Aman a deih leh a tup bangbang in, eite Jesu Khrist vanga a tate hi ding in, itna ziak in hon sepkhol khinta hi.
Huchi a it a a honpiak hehpihna thupi mahmah pahtawina i hihtheihna ding ahi.
A sisan ziak in Amah ah tatkhiakna, a hehpihna hauhdan bang a i tatleknate ngaihdamna ngei i tangta hi.
Tua hehpihna chillou hial in aman eite a honpeta hi;
A thiltup Khrist a a gelkhiak bangbang in a deihlam thuguk pilna leh theihsiamna ngen in eite hon theisakta hi:
Huai a deihlam thilgel bel; hunbi hong kim chiang a, thil tengteng, van a omte leh leitung a omte Khrist a gawmkhawm a a suktuah vek ding ahi.
Amah deihlama lunggel bang a thilbangkim semkhepa tup bang ngei in, amah mah ah sehkholh a om in i gouluah ding i muta uhi.
Koute, Khrist a a na lamen masate, a thupina pahtawina ding a hing ding in sehkholh in ka na omkhinta uhi.
Huan noute’n thutak thu, na hotdamna Tanchinhoih uh ngaikhia a na gintak nung un amah ah chiamsa Kha Siangthou a chiamteh in na omta uhi.
Huai Kha Siangthou bel, i gouluah ding tatna kim i luah mateng a, Pathian thupina ding a khamna ahi.
Huaiziak in ken leng Toupa Jesu a ginna na lak ua om leh misiangthoute tengteng tung a na itna uh ka zak in,
Ka thumnate ah na min uh lou in nou ziak a kipahthu gen ka tawp kei hi.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist Pathian, thupina Pa’n, Amah theihna lamthu a pilna leh kilakna kha nou a honpiak theihna ding in.
Huchi a na lungsim mitte uh hihvak a hongom a, Aman nou a honsapna lametna bang leh misiangthoute a gouluah hauhsaknate na theihna ding un.
Huan a gingta eite a thilhihtheihna thupina tehvuallouh, huai a hatna thilhihtheihna toh a sep bangzel in,
Tua thilhihtheihna bel Khrist misi lak a kipan a a kaihthoh a, vanmun a, a taklam a a tutsak hun a,
Lalnate, thuneihnate, thilhihtheihnate, vaihawmna tengteng tung leh tu khovel kia hilou a khovel hongtung ding nangawn a minsak chiteng tunglam pek ah a koihlai a a zatmah ahi.
Aman bangkim a khenuai ah a koih a, amah bangkim tung a Saptuam lutang in a bawl hi,
Huai saptuam a sapum ahi a, amah bangkim a bangkim hihdimpa tangchinna ahi.
Nou leng na tatlekna uleh na khelhnate uh ziak a si na hihlai un a hon hihhing hi.
Huaite ah tuma lam in hiai khovel dan bang in, huihkhua a thuneipa, tua thumanglou tate sung a semlelpa kha deihdanin na khosa uhi.
Huai thumanglou tate lak ah eite leng tuma lam in sa duhgawlna hih in, i sa utnate bang in i omvek ua, midangte mah bang in thangpaihna ta a piang i hi uhi.
Himahleh hehpihna hau Pathian in, itna thupitak a hon it ziak in,
Tatleknate ziak a si i hihlai in Khrist toh a hon hihhinga, hehpihna a hotdam na hita uhi.
Khrist Jesu ah amah toh a hon kaithou a, vanmunte ah amah kiang ah a hon tusak hi.
Huchi a hun hongtung dingte a, Khrist Jesu a i tung a migitna nei a, a hehpihna hauhdan a etsak theihna ding in.
Hehpihna ziak a ginna tawn a hotdam na hi uhi; huai leng noumau a suak ahi kei a, Pathian thilthawnpiak ahi.
Thilhih ziak a hi kei, huchi kei leh min a suang kha ding hi.
Thil hoih hihding a Khrist Jesu ah siam a om in, amah khutsuak i hi uhi; huai thil hoih hih i khosakna dan ding in Pathian in a bawlkhol ahi.
Huaiziak in tuma lam a nou sa a Jentelte, sa khut a zeksum, a chihte un zeksumlouh hon chihte uh na hi uhi.
Huailai in, Khrist lou in Israelte khua leh tui toh ki midang in khovel ah lametna neilou leh Pathian lou a om in, thuchiam thukhun lak ah mikhual in na om uh chih theigige un.
Tun bel, Khrist Jesu ah nou nidanglai a gamlapi a omte, Khrist sisan a hihnai in na hong omta uhi.
Amah i kilemna ahi; aman ei nihte khat a siam in i kikal a kimelmakna banglai a hihchimta hi,
Thusehte leh danthupiakte a sa a hihmang in; huchi a nihte Amah a mihing thak khat a siam a kilemna a bawl theihna ding in;
Huan Kros ziak a nihte pumpi khat a Pathian toh hon kilemsakna ding in kimelmakna a hihbeita hi.
Huan a hongpai in, nou gamlapi a omte kiang ah leh naichik a omte kiang ah leng lemna Tanchinhoih a hilh sam hi.
Amah ziak in kha khat a Pa kiang luttheihna i nei tuaktuak uhi.
Huchi in tu’n zaw, zin leh leng na hi nawnta kei ua, misiangthoute toh tualsung khat leh Pathian inkuanpihte na hita uhi.
Khrist Jesu ngei a ning a suang kiphamoh pen hi in, sawltakte leh zawlneite suangphum tung a lam na hi uhi;
Amah ah suanglep tuam chiat kituaktaka suktuah in, Toupa ah tempul siangthou a suak hi;
Amah ngei ah nou leng, Kha a Pathian tenna ding a lepkhawm na hi uhi.
Hiaiziakin kei Paul, nou Jentelte ziak a Khrist Jesu hentapa in,
Nou ading a Pathian hehpihna nasepna piak a ka omdan na za thamta ding uhi.
Huchi a kilakna tungtawn a Khrist thuguk ka kiang a theihsaka a omdan, tuma a tomchika ka gelh bang in.
Huai na sim un Khrist thuguk ka theihdan na thei ding uhi.
Tu hun a a sawltak siangthoute leh a zawlnei siangthoute kiang ah Kha theihsaka a om bang in, tuma lam in mihing tate kiang ah theihsakin a om ngeikei hi;
Huai thuguk hiai ahi, Tanchinhoih ziak in Khrist Jesu ah, Jentelte gouluahpihte, pumpi hiangte, leh thuchiam tanpihte ahi uhi.
A thilhihtheihna nasepdan bang a, a thawnpiak Pathian hehpihna bangzel in huai Tanchinhoih nasemtu ding a bawl ka hi.
Kei, misiangthou tengteng a neupen sang a neuzaw kiang ah hiai hehpihna piak ahi: Khrist hauhsakna suikhiak vuallouh Jentelte kiang a gen ding in;
Huan Pathian thil bangkim siampa a tangtawn a sel a na om, thuguk kisel bang ahia chih mi tengteng musak ding in;
Pathian pilna chiteng van munte a kumpi vaihawmte leh thuneihnate kiang a saptuamte zang a, tu hun a theihsak a hihna ding in;
Hiai a tangtawn thiltup dungzui a Toupa Khrist Jesu a a tup leh sepdan ahi.
Khrist Jesu i gin ziak in amah mah ah maingalna leh hangsantaka luttheihna i nei hi.
Huchi in noute ziak a ka gimthuak ziak in lungkelou ding in ka hon ngen hi, huaite na thupina uh ahi.
Huaiziak in i Toupa Jesu Khrist Pa ma ah ka khukdin hi;
Lei leh van a inkuan chiteng min phuahkhiakna pa,
A thupina hauhdan bangzel a, a Kha ziak a mihing sunglam a thilhihtheihna a hihhat a a hon omsak theihna ding in,
Huan na lungtang ua Khrist ginna a a ten theihna ding in, nou a itna a zungkai leh kingakna nei a na om theihna ding un,
Misiangthou tengteng toh a zatdan, a saudan, a sandan, leh a thukdan theihchian theihna leh,
Khrist itna theih phaklouh, Pathian tangchinna chiteng bang a hihdim a na om theihna ding un.
Huan eimah a semzel thilhihtheihna bang in, i nget leh i ngaihtuah tengteng sang a thupi zawtham hihtheipa kiang ngei ah,
Tangtawn in suan tengteng tan in, saptuamte leh Khrist Jesu ah thupina om hen, Amen.
Huaiziak in noute sap a na omna utoh kikhawm a khosa ding in kei Toupa a hentapa in k’on ngen hi.
Kingaihniamna leh migitna tengteng, thuaktheihna toh, itna a kithuakzou chiat in,
Lemna Kha a kipumkhatna vom chinten ding in.
A honsapna pen lametna mun khat a sap na hih mah bang un sapum khat leh Kha khat kia a om hi;
Toupa khat, ginna khat, baptisma khat,
Bangkim Pathian leh Pa khat kia a om a; amah bangkim tung ah a om a, bangkim a mu suak a, bangkim sung ah a om hi.
Himahleh Khrist thilpiak tehna bangzel in hehpihna i kiang chiat uah piak in a om hi.
“Huaiziak in ahi, tunglam a a kahtouh lai in matte tampi a pi a,
mihingte kiang ah leng thilpiakte a pia,” a chihna.
Huchi in “A kahtou” chih lei mun nuainung pente bang a a hongsuk masak phot kei leh bangchi ahita dia le?
Hongsuk pen thil tengteng a hihdim theihna ding in, van tengteng tung pek a kahtoupa mah ahi.
Huan khenkhatte Sawltak hi ding in, khenkhatte zawlnei hi ding in, khenkhatte Tanchinhoih gen ding in, khenkhatte Pastor hi ding in, khenkhatte Sinsaktu ding in a pia hi.
Hiai misiangthoute thopna ding, nasepna sepna ding, Khrist pumpi lamtouhna ding in.
Huai tuh ginna leh Pathian Ta theihna lam a thukituak a, piching a, Khrist tangchinna bang a i vek ua i om masiah ading ahi.
Huchi a mihingte diklouhna zekhemna bang a lepchiah pil a khem tawmtawm a om a thuhilhna huih chiteng a a langlang a sep leh mut lengleng naupang i hih nawnlouhna ding un.
Itna a thutak gen a, bangkim a Amah lupen, Khrist ngei a i khanlet zawkna ding uh ahi.
Amah a kipan pumpi tengteng kizopna chiteng sep ziak a lemtak a suktuah leh kizomkhawm a, hiang chih in sep ding dan bang a sep chiang in pumpi a khang a itna ah amah leh amah a kilam tou hi.
Tuin hiai Toupa ah k’on theisak hi, Jentelte a lungsim ginatlouhna uh pu a a om bang un, na om nawn mahmah ding uh ahi kei hi;
Amau a lungtang uh khauh ziak a theihtheihna neilou in Pathian hinna theihtheihna apan pawsiah in a om uhi; a theihtheihna uh hihmial in a om uhi:
A khenggawpta ua, sianglou chiteng hihna lam a huaiham in zautatna ah a kipumpiak uhi.
Nou zaw huchibang in Khrist thu na zil kei uhi!
A thu za a amah a thuhilh a omkhin na hih peuhmah uleh, Jesu a thutak a om bang in.
Na pianken lui uh, na nidanglai hindan uh segawpsa suahkhia unla,
Na lungsim Kha uah a thakin hongom unla,
Pianken thak, diktatna leh sianthouna a Pathian batpih a siampen silh un.
Huchi in zuaugen tawpsan in, noumau inveng chiat kiang ah thudik gen chiat un; kihiang tuah chiat na hi ngal uhi.
Heh unla, khelh zaw khial kei un; na hehna uh ni in tumpih kei hen.
Diabol leng mun awnsam kei un.
Guta in gu nawn kei hen; tasam kiang a piakding a neih theihna ding in, a khut a thil hoih sem in gimzaw hen.
Thu sia peuhmah na kam ua kipan in pawt kei hen; a khawkdan bangzel a bawlhoih ding in thu hoih peuhmah pawt zaw hen, a ngaikhete ading a hehpihna a hong hihtheihna ding in.
Huan Pathian Kha Siangthou hih lungkham kei un, tatna ni ading in amah ah chiamteh na hi uhi.
Khatna, thangpaihna, hehna, hanna, gensiatnate leh gitlouhna tengteng tawpsan in om hen.
Huan kihehpih chiat a lainatna nei in om unla, Pathian in Khrista nou a hon ngaihdam bang in, noumau leng kingaidam tuahchiat un.
Huchi in a ta deihtakte bang in Pathian omdan zuite hi un;
Huan Khrist in hon it a, namtui ding a Pathian kiang a thilpiak ding leh kithoihna ding a i sik a a kipiak bang in itna ah om un.
Misiangthou hita na hihman un kingaihna leh sianglou tengteng huaihamna toh, na lak uah lohkhak in omkei hen.
Zahmohte, thuginalou gente, chiamnuih thu nangawn huaite a kilawmlou ahi; huaite gen sang in kipahthu genzaw un.
Kingaihhat leh mi thanghuai leh mi huaiham in, mi huaiham zaw milim bemi ahi, Khrist leh Pathian gam ah tanding a neikei uh chih na thei mahmah uhi.
Kuamah in thuginalou peuh in hon zekhem kei uhen; huai thilte ziak in Pathian thangpaihna thumanglou tate tung ah a tungnak hi.
Huaiziak in amau kikoppih kei un.
Tuma in mial na hi ua, tun zaw Toupa ah vak na hong hita uhi; vak tate bang in om un;
Vak gah tuh hoihna, diktatna leh thutak tengteng ahi;
Toupa kipahna lamtak bang ahi hiam zong un.
Huan mial thilhih gah nei ngeiloute ah leng panna neikei unla, pan naksang in a diklouh dan uh theisak zaw un.
A guk a a thilhih nakte uh a gen leng a zumhuai hi.
Himahleh thil bangkim a diklouh dan muhtheiha om tuh vak hihlat ahi nak hi; muhtheih a om peuhmah vak ahi ngal a.
Huaiziak in,
“Nang ihmu! hak inla,
misi lak a kipan thou in.
Huchi in, Khrist in vak honpe ding” chih ahi.
Huan mihaite bang a omlou in, mipilte bang a omzaw in, na omdan uah pilvang un;
Nite a hoihlouh ziak in hun na neih sung un a tam theipen sem un.
Huaiziak in hai nuam kei unla, Toupa deihlam bang ahia chih theizaw un.
Uain kham in omkei un, huai ah kideklouhna a om hi; Kha a dim in omzaw un,
Phatna late, Pathian late, khalam late a kihoupih chiat a Toupa kiang a na lungtang tengteng ua ging kilawm bawl leh lasa in,
I Toupa Jesu Khrist min a, Pathian, Pa ngei kiang a bangkim tung a kipahthu gen gige in.
Khrist laudansiamin kiniamkhiak chiat un.
Zite aw, Toupa kiang a na kiniamkhiak bang un, noumau pasalte kiang ah kiniamkhiak un.
Khrist amah ngei pumpi hondampa hi a, saptuamte lutang a hih mah bang in pasal zi lutang ahi.
Huchi in saptuamte Khrist kiang a a kiniamkhiak bang un zite bangkim ah a pasalte uh kiang ah kiniamkhiak uhen.
Pasalte aw, na zite uh it un, Khrist in saptuamte a it a, a sikua a kipiak bang in,
Huchi a amau tui a sil a thu a a hih siangthou theihna ding in;
Huchi a saptuamte nin banglou, vuailou leh huchibang thil mawngmawng puloua, siangthou leh gensiatbeia omzawa, saptuamte amah leh amah thupitak a a kipiak theihna ding in.
Huchibang in pasalte’n leng amau pumpi mah bang in amau zite a it ding uh ahi. Amah zi itpa amah ki-it ahi.
Kuamah in amah sa mah a haw ngeikei a, a vak in a deihthoh zaw hi, Khrist in saptuamte a vak a a deihthoh bang in.
Amah sa leh guh apan om, a pumpi hiangte i hi uhi.
Huaiziak in pasal in a nu leh a pa paisan in a zi a len chinten ding a, a nih un sa pumkhat a hong hita ding uhi.
Hiai thuguk thupi ahi, himahleh ken zaw Khrist leh saptuamte thu ahi ka gen.
Abang abang hileh nou lak a kuapeuh in amah a ki-it bang in a zi it hen; zi mah in leng a pasal zahtak ding in pilvang hen.
Naupangte aw, hiai thildik a hih ziak in Toupa ah na nu leh pate uh thumang un.
“Na nu leh pa zahtak in” hiai thupiak chiam nei masapen ahi.
“Huchi in nang ading in a hoih dia, lei ah leng na damsawt ding hi.”
Huan nou pate aw, na tate uh hih thangpai kei unla, Toupa thuzohna leh hilhna ah kem zaw un.
Sikhate aw, Khrist thumang bang in laudansiam leh lingkawm in lungtang khat in sa dan a na pute uh thumang un:
Mihing hih kipakte maimah bang a mitmei kia venglou in, Khrist sikha bang a lungtang a Pathian deihlam hihzaw in.
Mihing nasem phet hilou in, Toupa nasem bang zaw a chitaktak kawm a nasem in
Michih sikha hi in noplen himahleh thil hoih a hih bangmah Toupa kiang a kipan in a ngeimah a mu nawn ding uh chih thei in.
Nou heutute aw, huchibang in amau leh noumau heutupa van ah a om chih leh aman mi deihsak tuam a neikei chih thei in vau lou in a tung uah hih sam un.
A tawppen in, Toupa leh a hatna thagui ah thilhihtheihna nei in hongom un.
Diabol zekhemnate na dou zoh theihna ding un Pathian galvan kim in kivan un.
I doute zaw sa leh sisan ahi kei ua, lalnate leh, thuneihnate leh tu a omlel mial tung a khovel vaihawmte leh vanmunte a kha gilou hon omte ahizaw uhi.
Huaiziak in ni hoihlou a na dou zohna ding un leh na hihzoh vek nung ua leng na din theihna ding un, Pathian galvan kim la un.
Na kawng uh thutak a gak in, diktatna awmphaw zang in,
Lemna Tanchinhoih vanzat na khe ua bun in ding un:
Huaite ban ah ginna lum la unla, huai in migilou thal kuangthei tengteng na hihmit thei ding uhi.
Huan hotdamna lukhu leh Kha namsau, Pathian thu la unla:
Thumna leh ngetna chiteng in bangchiklai peuh in leng Kha ah thum un. Huai lam ah misiangthou tengteng ading in phatuamngai leh ngen bilbel in limsak un.
Tanchinhoih thuguk hangsantak a theisak ding a, ka kam ka kata thu gensaka ka om theihna ding in kei ding in leng hon ngetsak un.
Ka gen ding bang hangsantaka ka gen theihna ding in. Huai Tanchinhoih palai khainiang bun ka hi.
Himahleh nou leng bangchibang in ka om hiam ka tanchin na theihtheihna ding un, Taikika, Toupa a unau deihtak leh nasempa muanhuai in bangkim a honthei sak ding hi.
Huaiziak in amah na kiang uah k’on sawl ahi, ka tanchin uh na theihna ding uleh aman na lungtang uh a khamuan theihna ding in.
Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Khrist kiang a kipan lemna leh ginna tel itna unaute kiang ah om hen.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist tullou a itte tengteng kiang ah hehpihna om hen, Amen.
Paul leh Timothi, Khrist Jesu sikhate’n, Philippi khua a om misiangthou tengteng leh heutute leh Upate kiang ah:
Hehpihna leh lemna i Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Khrist a kipan noute tung ah om hen.
Noute k’on phawk tengin ka Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen hi.
Na vek ua ding a kipaktak a thum a k’on ngetsakna teng ah.
Ni masapen apan tuni tanpha a Tanchinhoih a na kithuahkhawmna ziak ua kipak in.
Hiai thil mahmah gingta ing: amah nou a nasep hoih panpan Jesu ni tanpha in a zoukim vek ding.
Na vek ua tungtang thu a, ken hichibang lungsim ka neih a dik ahi, ka lungtang a k’on neih ziak in; ka kolbutna leh Tanchinhoih gupna leh hihkipna thu a hehpihna ka tanpihte na hi vek uhi.
Khrist Jesu hehpihna nou ngiingei ah nou k’on ngai mahmah chih Pathian in a hon theihpih hi.
Noute theihna leh theihkakna toh kithuah itna a na khan semsemna ding un ka thum hi;
Huchi a thil hoihpen na deih ua, Khrist ni a siangthou leh dembei a na om theihna ding uh ahi,
Pathian thupina leh pahtawina ding a, Jesu Khrist ziak a hongom dikna gahte a dim a na om theihna ding un.
Unaute aw, tuin ka tung a thil hongtungte, Tanchinhoih a khanna dia hongtung ahi uh chih na theih uh ka deih hi.
Huchi in Inpi vengpawl tengteng leh a dang tengteng kiang ah Khrist a ka kolbuhna ziak a kichianta hi.
Ka kolbuhna a kipan a Toupa muanna nei in unaute lak a tampite lau lou a Pathian thu gen ding in nakpitak in a hong hangsan deuhdeuhta uhi.
Khenkhatte’n hazatna ziak leh thangpaihna ziak in Khrist a tangkoupih ua; khenkhatte’n hoih a sak ziak un a gen uhi:
Pawl khatte’n itna ziak in, Tanchinhoih dik dan gen dia om ka hihdan thei in a gen uhi;
Himahleh pawl dang in kikhenna ding in Khrist a tangkoupih ua, a taktak hilou in ka kolbuhna a ka thuakna behlap tum in.
Bang a poi a? Kong bangkim a Khrist a kigenkhiak phot leh, a khem hi in a taktak hileh huai ah ka kipak hi. Ahi, ka kipak zel ding hi.
Na thumnate uh leh Jesu Khrist Kha panpihna ziak in hiai ka suahtakna hongsuak ding chih ka thei hi.

Ka gintak taktakna leh ka lametna bang in bangmah ah hihzum in ka omkei hial dia, himahleh ahi gige sa mah bang in tuin leng Khrist ka hinna hiam ka sihna hiam in ka sapum ah hangsanna kim toh hihletin a om ngeingei ding hi.
Kei ding in zaw hin Khrist ahi a, sih leng punna ahi.
Himahleh sa a hin ka tan ding hitaleh kei din sepgim gah tampi suahna ding ahi. Himahleh ka telding ka theikei hi.
Nih kaltehin hamhaihin ka om hi. Paimanga Khrist kiang a om utna ka nei a; nakpitak in huai a hoih zaw hi.
Himahleh noute ziak in sa a omphot a kiphamoh zaw hi.
Huchi in hiai ginna ka neih ziak in, ka omphot ding chih ka thei hi; ginna a na khanletna ding uh leh na kipahna ding un, na vek ua lak ah ka omphot ding hi;
Huchi a na kiang ua k’ong pai nawn ding ziak a Khrist Jesu na suanna ding uh tam semsem kei a na neihna ding un.

Na omdan uh Khrist tanchinhoih toh kituak sak photphot un; hong a, nou hong mu a, ahihkeileh ka omlouh a leng kha khat a na din kipdan uh leh lungsim khat nei a Tanchinhoih thugin a na pandan uh, na tanchin uh ka zak theihna ding in.
Huan bangmah ah na melmate uh hihlau in omkei un. Huai amau ading in manna ding kichetna teltak ahi a, himahleh nou ading in hotdamna ding kichetna ahi, huai Pathian a kipan ahi.
Hiai tuh nou adia phal ahita: Khrist gingtate kia hilou a, amah ziak a na thuaksam ding uh;
Keimah a na muh uleh na zak uh huai kidouna mah na dou ding uh ahi.
Huaiziak in Khrist a thu kihilh ding a om a, itna a kinep theihna ding a om a, kha toh kithuahna, kilainatna leh kihehpihna a om leh,
huai lungsim mah pu in, hichibang itna mah nei unla, tup kibang leh lungsim khat nei in ka kipahna hon hihkim sakun.
Kikhenna ding leh kithupisakna ziak in bangmah hih kei un; lungsim niamlak in michih in amah sang in midang hoihsa zaw hen.
Na lak ua kuapeuh in amah ading kia enlou in, midang a leng en sam hen.
Khrist Jesu a om hiai lungsim nei le uchin:
Amah Pathian bang a om hinapi in,
Pathian toh kikim a om thil khiaklah ding in a sepkei hi,
Himahleh amah a hong ki awngsak a,
sikha bang in a hongom a,
mihing bang a bawl in a hongom hi;
Huchi in mihing mel a honpu a,
hong kihihneu in si ding in thu a hon mang a, ahi,
Kros a sihna a hong thuak hi.
Huaiziak in Pathian in amah nakpitak in a hihlianta a,
min laklak a min tungnungpen a peta hi;
Jesu min a mi tengteng a khukdin a, vantung,
leitung leh leinuai a thil om tengteng leh,
lei tengteng in Jesu Khrist
Pa Pathian thupina ding a Toupa ahi a chih theihna ding un.
Huchi a hih ziak in, ka itte aw, ka omlai kia hilou a, ka omlouh lai a leng thu na man theihtak mah bang un, lau leh ling kawm in na hotdamna chiat uh semkhia un;
Amah lungtuak dia noumau a hon utsak leh hon semsakpa Pathian ahi.
Dawngdawng lou leh phunphun lou in thil bangkim hih un:
Khangthak gilou leh khial, a lak ua khovel vak bang a na tennate lak uah Pathian ta gensiatbei leh siangthou,
Hinna thu taklang na hih theihna ding un; huai a kipan a ken Khrist ni a hongtun chiang a, a thawn in ka semgim kei a, a thawnin ka taigim kei ka chih ngamna ding in.
Ahi, na ginna thillat tung ua Pathian adia buakkhiak a om ding na hi leng ka dah kei a, na vek un k’on kipahpih hi.
Huaiziak mah in, nou leng kipak unla; keileng hon kipahpih un.
Abang abang hileh na omdan uh ka theih a lungmuanga ka om theihna ding in Timothi na kiang ua honsawl pah Toupa Jesu ah ka lamen hi.
Hichibang lungsim pu a, na hoihna ding uh awlmoh midang kuamah ka neikei hi.
Jesu Khrist thilte zong lou in, avek un amau tuam chiat a zong uhi.
Himahleh aman tuh ta in a pa nna a sep bang in Tanchinhoih genzakna ah kei a hon seppih chih theihchetna amah ah na nei uhi.
Huaiziak in bangchi’n ka om dia chih k’on theihchet peuhpeuh chiang in amah hon sawlkhiak pah ka kilamen hi;
Himahleh keimah mah leng ka hongpah ding chih Toupa ah ka kilamen hi.
Himahleh ka sanggam leh seppih leh sepaih pih leh na taksapna ua gamtang leh sawltak Epafrodita na kiang ua honsawl kiphamoh ka sa hi;
Na vek un a hon ngai mahmah hi, a damlouh thu na zak un, a lungkham mahmah hi.
Si dektak in a china ngei a; himahleh Pathian in a tung ah hehpihna a nei a; amah tung kia leng hilou in kei tung ah leng ahi sam a, huchi a lungkhamna ka neih sawnsawn louhna ding in.
Huaiziak in amah k’on sawlteitei hi, amah na muh chiang un na kipahpih un, huchi a keileng ka dah luat louhna ding in.
Huaiziak in kipaktak in Toupa ah amah na kipahpih unla; amah na ngaisang un;
Khrist nasepna ah amah tuh a hong sideka, kei ding a na hihkim louhte uh hon hihsak a tupna lam ah a hinna a khuai dektak hi.
Atawppen in unaute aw, Toupa ah kipak un. A ngeimah gelh kei ading in a chimtakhuai kei a, nou ading in a hoihzaw hi.
Uite lak ah kiveng un, na gilou semte apan kiveng un, sa atgawp mite apan kiveng un.
Pathian kha a bia, Khrist Jesu suang, zeksum diktak i hi uhi, huan sapum ah suanding i neikei uhi.
Sapum ah suang ding chile hang kei mahmah in suanding ka neisem ding hi. Mi himhim in sapum a suanding nei a a kitheih leh ken ka neisem hi:
A ni giatni a zeksum, Israel chi, Benjamin nam, Hebru mi kholdiak, dan lam a Pharisai;
Phatuamngaihna lam chi lehang saptuamte sawi; dan a diktatna lam chi lehang gensiatbei ka hi.
A hihi hitaleh, thil kei adia punna peuhmah Khrist ziak in manna in ka simta hi.
Hitaktak hi, ka Toupa theihna manpha ziak in thil tengteng ka tanta hi. Khrist ka tan theihna ding in thil tengteng ninneng bang phet in ka sim hi.
Amah a ka om theihna ding in leh dan a kinga keimah diktatna hilou a, Khrist ginna ziak a om pen, ginna a kinga Pathian apan suak diktatna nei zaw in.
Huchi a Amah leh a thohnawnna thilhihtheihna ka theih a, a thuaknate tanpiha, a sihna a Amah batna ka neih theihna ding in.
Bang chi hiam a misi lak a kipan thohnawnna ka ngah theih khak leh chi in.
Hiai tangkhin ka hi kei a, bukim khinta ka hi kei; himahleh huai mah kei a hihsak tum in ka delh teitei hi, Khrist Jesu’n kei amah a hon hihsaktak ziak in.
Unaute aw, tangkhinta in ka kingai kei a: himahleh thil khat ka hih; nunglama omte mangngilh in malama ompen ka delh hi;
Khrist Jesu a Pathian sapna sang kipahman mu ding in phak chiamna ka delh hi.
Huaiziak in i lak ua a piching deuhdeuh bek in huchibang lungsim i nei ding uh: huchi a thil peuhpeuh a lungsim dang na neih uleh Pathian in nou a hon theisak ngei ding hi.
I hongtunna i ngahna chiang uah muanhuai in kip peuhmah ni uh.
Unaute aw, kei hon enton vek unla huchibanga omte zuih ding a n’on neihte uh chiamteh un.
Mi tampi a om ua, a tanchin uh k’on hilhta hi, amau Khrist Kros melmate a hihdan uh tuin leng kapkawm in k’on hilh hi,
Leilam thil ngaihtuahte zaw a tawpna uh siatna ahi a, a pathian uh a gilpi uh ahi a, a thupina uh leng a daina uh ahi.
I khoveng hihna uh van ah ahizaw a; huai a kipan mah in Toupa Jesu Khrist hondampa i ngak uhi.
I pumpi thulimlou amah thupina pumpi toh kibang ding in, a hon bawlthak sak ding a, thil bangkim amah thuthu a a omsak theihna thilhihtheihna in.
Huaiziak in ka unau it leh ngaih, ka kipahna leh ka manglukhute aw, Toupa ah kiptak in ding un, ka itte aw.
Iodia ka thuhilh a, Sintikhe ka thuhilh a, Toupa a lungsim kibang pu ding in.
Ahi, nou leng k’on ngen hi, hakkol puakpih muanhuaite, Tanchinhoih a ka na seppih hiai numeite, Klimen leh ka naseppih dangte hinna bu a min tuangte leng na panpih un.
Toupa ah kipak gige un; ka chi nawn ding hi kipak un.
Na migitna uh mi tengteng kiang ah kithei hen, Toupa a nai hi.
Bangmahlou ah mangbang kei un; himahleh thil bangkim ah, thumna ngetna, kipahthugenna toh na ngetnate uh Pathian kiang ah theihsak in om hen.
Huchi in Pathian muanna, lungsim himhim a theihzoh vuallouh in Khrist Jesu ah na lungtang leh na ngaihtuahnate uh a hon kepsak ngeingei ding hi.

Huaikhit chiang in unaute aw, thil dik peuhmah, thil phathuai peuhmah, thil kilawm peuhmah, thil siangthou peuhmah, thil hoih peuhmah, thil minhoih peuhmah, hoihna himhim a om a, phatna ding a om leh huai thilte ngaihtuah un.
Keimah a na thil theihte, tante, zakte leh muhte uh, huai thilte hih un. Huchi in muanna Pathian na kiang uah om ding hi.
Himahleh nakpitak in Toupa ah ka kipak hi, huchi a tua kei n’on awlmohna uh a thak nawn ziak in: n’on limsak mahmah ua, himahleh hun kizen na neikei ua ahi.
Taksap ziak a hiai thu gen ka hi kei a; bangchi bang in om mah leng huai a lungkima omdan ka theikheta hi.
Zawn dan ka siam a, hauhdan leng ka siam, thilchih leh thil tengteng a gilvah leh gilkiala om theihna leh niang leh tasama om theihna thuguk ka thei kheta hi.
A hon hihhatpa Khrist ah thil tengteng ka hihthei hi.
Huchi a ka mangbatna a n’on panpih ziak un na hihhoih mahmah uhi.
Nou mahmah, nou Philippite ngei in leng Tanchinhoih omtunga kipat, Masidonia gam a kipan a ka painung nou chihlouh saptuam dang kuamah in piak leh muh lam ah, honpe kei uh chih na thei uhi.
Thessalonika khua ah ka taksap awng n’on huksakta uhi.
Thilpiak ka zon ziak ahi kei a, nou ading a gahpung ka zong ahizaw hi.
A himhim in thil bangkim ka nei a, ka hau a; hihdim in ka om a noumau apat bangbanghiam, gimnamtui, kithoihna hoih, Pathian kipaksak, Epafrodita a kipan in ka na mu hi.
Huai chiang in ka Pathian in Khrist Jesu thupina a hauhna bang in na taksap tengteng uh a honpe ngeingei ding hi.
Tuin Pathian leh i Pa uh kiang ah tangtawn, tangtawn in thupina om hen, Amen.
Khrist Jesu a misiangthou tengteng chibai hon buksak un. Ka kiang a unau omte’n leng chibai honbuk uhi.
Misiangthou tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi, Kaisar inkuanpihte ahi deuh tuam uhi.
Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna in hon ompih hen, Amen.
Paul, Pathian deihdana Khrist Jesu sawltak leh i unaupa Timothi in,
Kolossa khua a Khrist a misiangthoute leh unau muanhuaite kiang ah: Pathian i Pa kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Nou ading a thum gige in Pathian i Toupa Jesu Khrist Pa kiang ah kipahthu ka gen uhi.
Khrist Jesu na gindan uh leh misiangthou tengteng tung a itna na neihdan uh ka zaktak ziak un.
Huai bel nou ading a lametna van a koihkholha a om ziak ahi. Huai lametna tanchin mah tuma in, Tanchinhoih thutak na zata uhi.
Huai Tanchinhoih tuh khovel tengteng ah gaha a khan zel mah bang in na kiang uh hongtung hi, Pathian hehpihna na ngaihkhiak ua na zak ni ua kipan in, noumau ah leng gah in a khangzel hi.
Huchibang in Epaphra i sikha hihpih ngaihtak lak a na zil bang un, amah kou sik in Khrist nasempa muanhuai ahi.
Aman Kha a na itna uh a honhilh hi.
