Huaiziak in ka zak ni ua kipan kou leng nou adia thum leh nget ka tawpkei uhi; huchi a khalam pilna leh theihna tengteng a a deihlam theihna a hihdim a na hongom theihna ding un.
Huan nasep hoih chiteng a gaha, Pathian theihna a khang a, Amah kipahlam a Toupa adia kilawm a na hin theihna ding un.
Kipahna toh kithuah thuakhatna leh kuhkalna nei ding in, a hatna thupi bangzel a hihhat in hongom un.
Vak a misiangthoute gouluahpih dia hon chingsak Pa kiang a kipahthu gen in.
Aman mial thuneihna lak a kipan hon suaktasak in, A Tapa ittak gam ah hon kaisakta hi.
Amah ah i tatkhiakna leh khelhnate ngaihdamna i mu uhi.
Amah muhtheihlouh Pathian batpih, thilsiam tengteng a piang masapen ahi.
Amah ah bangkim siam ahi a, van a omte, lei a omte toh, muhtheihte, muhtheihlouhte toh, mangtutphahte, thuneihnate; bangkim amah siam ahi, amah ading maha siam ahi.
Huan amah zaw bangteng omma in leng a om hi, amah ah bangtenga dingkhawm chiat uhi.
Amah tuh pumpi, saptuam lutang ahi a; bangkim a tungnungpen a hong hihtheihna ding in a bulpi, misi lak a kipan a piang masapen ahi.
Amah ah Pathian tangchinna tengteng a om Pa deihlam tak ahi.
A Kros sisan a lemna na bawl in amah ah bangkim amah toh a kilemsak hi; amah ngei ah lei a thil omte leh van a thil omte leng amah toh a kilemsakta hi.
Huan nou tuma lam in na lungsim uah a melma na hi ua, na thilhih gilou ua amah a kipan a khen a om na hi uhi, himahleh tuin aman amah toh hon kilemsakta hi:
A sihna in a pumpi ah amah toh noute a hon kilemsakta hi, a ma a siangthou, gensiatbei leh mawhsaktheihlouh a a hon dinsak theihna ding in,

Kingakna nei a kiptak a om a, Tanchinhoih na zak ua lametna a kipan a suanmang a omlou a, ginna a na om gige peuhmah uleh; huai Tanchinhoih van nuai a thilsiam tengteng lak a tangkoupih ahi a; kei Paul leng huai nasem dia bawl ka hi.
Nou ziak a tu a ka gimthuaknate ah ka kipak hi; huan a pumpi ziak a Khrist in a gimthuaknate ban zomzel ka hi: a pumpi tuh Saptuam ahi.
Nou ading a Pathian nasepna kei kiang a piak a om bangzel in huai saptuam nasempa ka hong hita a, Pathian thu bukimtak a theisak ding in.
Huai Pathian thu tuh tangtawn leh akhang akhanga kipan a thuguk kisel ahi; tun bel misiangthoute kiang ah latsak in a omta hi.
Amau kiang ah, Jentelte lak a huai thuguk thupina hauhsakna tamdan Pathian in theihsak a ut him ahi; huai thuguk tuh Khrist noumau a om, thupina lametna pen ahi:
Michih Khrist a hoihkim a ka piak theihna ding un michih hilh in, pilna chiteng a zilsakin, a tanchin ka gen zel uhi.
Huchibang ding in nakpitak a keimah a a sepsak thahatna tengteng zang in theihtawp in ka semzel hi.
Noumau leh Laodisia khua a omte leh sa a ka mel mulou peuhmahte ading in bangchibanga thupi in ahia nou adia ka kisuk na theih uh ka ut hi.
Pathian thuguk a theihtheih ua, theihsiamna theihchetna kim hauhna tengteng lam a, phankhawma a om ua, a lungtangte uh lungmuanga a om theihna ding in;
Pilna leh theihna gou chiteng amah Khrist ah selguk in a om hi.
Kuamah in paukamsiama a hon khemzoh louhna ding un, huaite ka gen ahi.
Sa in na kiang uah om keimah leng, kipaktak a om in na kizen dan uleh Khrist ginna a na kipdan uh thei in, kha in na kiang uah ka om hi.
Huaiziak in Khrist Jesu, Toupa na kipahpih bang un, amah ah om un.
Amah a zungkai leh lamtouha om in, a hon zilsak bang un na ginna ua kiptak a om in, kipahthugenna hau in amah ah om un.
Pilvang un, huchilou in zaw kuapeuh in Khrist thu hilou, mihing thugousiah leh khovel thubulte bang in a thupil uh leh khemna peuh in gallak in a honla kha ding uhi.
Amah ah Pathian tangchinna chiteng tuh sapum nei in a om gige hi.
Amah ah hinna tangchinna na neita ngal ua; amah vaihawmna leh thuneihna tengteng lutang ahi.
Amah ah zeksum, mihing khut a sum hilou, Khrist in a bawl zeksumna ah na pianken khelhna uh suahkhia in zeksum na hita uhi.
Baptisma a amah toh vui na hita ua, huai mah ah misi lak a kipan a Pathian nasep gintak ziak in amah toh kaihthoh na hi uhi.
Huan noute na tatleknate uleh na sa uh zeksum louhna a si na hi ua, noumau ngei amah toh a hon hingsak in na talekna tengteng uh a ngaidamta hi.
I tatlekna tengteng hon ngaidama, batna lai thupiaka gelh i tung ua om eimah hondou gige a nulmangta hi. Huai ngei Kros a kilhlum in a lamangta hi.
Vaihawmna leh thuneihnate suankhia in, huaite Kros a zou in a langtang in theihsakna in a zangta hi.
Huchi in nek leh dawn thu ah hiam, Ankuanglui leh kha thak thu ah leh khawlni tan thu ah kuamah in hondem kei hen;
Huaite thil hongtung ding lim ahi a, a tak Khrist ahi.
Kuamah in amau deihthu lel a thunuailutna leh angel biakna zang in, a thilmuhte uh pansan in, a salam lungsim ziak ua kisathei mawkmawk in, na kipahman uh hon suhsak kei hen.
Lutang len chinten lou in a om uhi. Amah a kipan in sapum a pum in a guhtuah leh thaguite a vak leh zopkhawm a om in, Pathian khansak bangzel in a khang hi.
Khovel thubulte Khrist kiang a na sihsan uleh, bang achia khovel a khosa bang a thupiakte lak a na ki pelut na hi ua?
Lawng ken, Chiam ken, Khoih ken, chihte,
Mihingte thuchiam leh zilsakna huchibang thil tengteng zatkawma mangthang ding hilou uhiam?
Hiai thilte bawltawm biakna leh thunuailutna taklou leh, pumpi engbawlna ah zaw hihtuak hileh a kilawm na a, himahleh sa deihlam zuih khamna ah bangmah a phatuam kei hi.
Huchi in Khrist toh kaihthoh khawma na omtak man un, tunglam a Pathian taklam a tu Khrist omna a thil omte zong un.
Tunglam a thil omte ah na lungsim uh nga un, lei a thil omte a ngalou in.
Na sita ua, tuin na hinna uh Pathian ah Khrist toh selin a om hi.
Khrist i hinna uh a hong kilak chiang in nou leng amah kiang ah thupi in na kilak sam ding uhi.
Huchi in noumau a leilam thildeihna omte that un, kingaihna, nitna, hukna, utna gilou, huaihamna; huaihamna milim biakna ahi.
Huai thilte ziak in Pathian thangpaihna thumanglou tate tung ah a tung nak ahi:
Nou leng tuma lam a huai thilte a na nuntak lai un, huaite ah na khosa uhi.
Tuin zaw nou leng hiai tengteng, hehna, thangpaihna, huatna, gensiatna, na kam ua pau zahmohte koihmang un.
Zuau kihilh tuah kei un, mihing lui a thilhih toh na suahkheta uhi.
Mihing thak in na kivanta ngal ua; huai mihing thak a siampa batpih bang a theihna a siamthak in a om lellel hi.
Huai ah Grik mi leh Judami, zeksum leh sumlouh, melmak mite, Skithia mite, sikhate, noplente leng a omkei a; Khrist bangkim hizaw in, bangkim ah a om behlap lai hi.
Huaiziak in Pathian mitel, misiangthou leh deihtakte bang in lainatna lungtang, migitna, kingaihniamna, thunuailutna, thuakzohna in kivan un.
Kuapeuh in kua tung ah leng thubuai nei hile u chin, kithuakzou chiat in, kingaidam tuah unla, Toupa’n a hon ngaihdam tak bang in kingaidam tuah chiat un.
Huan huai tengteng tung ah itna silhthuah un; huai in thil bangkim kituaktakin a gakkhawm hi.
Huan Khrist khamuanna in na lungtang uah vaihawm hen, huai ding in pumpi khat a sap na hi ua, kipahna dan leng thei un.
Khrist thu a hauhna teng toh noumau ah dimsak kiihkeih un, pilna chiteng a kisinsak leh kihilh tuaha om a, kipahna lungtang toh Pathian kiang a phatna late, Pathian late, khalam late sa in om un.
Huan na hih peuhmah uh thugen ah leh thilhih ah amah ziak a Pa Pathian kiang a kipahthugen kawm in Toupa Jesu min in hihvek un.
Zite aw, Toupa ah a kilawm hun bangzel in na pasalte uh kiang ah kingainiam un.
Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, a lak uah hanhat kei un.
Naupangte aw, bangkim ah na nu uleh na pate uh thumang un, huai tuh Toupa pahtak lam ahi.
Pate aw, na tate uh hihnuak kei un, huchilou in zaw a lunglel kha ding uhi.
Sikhate aw, sa a na heutute uh thu bangkim ah mang un, mihing hihkipak lelte bang a mitmei nasem hilou in, lungtang sa khat a Toupa kihta kawm in,
Na hih peuhmah uh, mihing ading bang hihlou in, Toupa ading zaw in kilawp tak in hih un;
Toupa a kipan in a itna gouluah ding na mu ding uh chih thei in: Toupa Khrist nasem na hi uhi.
Thil diklou hihpan a thil diklou hihman a mu nawn ding hi; mi khentuamna a om ngal kei hi.
Heutute aw, nou leng van ah heutupa na neih uh thei in, na sikhate uh tung ah adik atang leh a kilawm hih un.
Thum gige unla, kipahthu genkawm in kiveng gige un.
Khrist thuguk gen ding a Pathian in thu adia kong a hon honsak theihna ding in kou leng hon thumsak un, huai thu ziak a hen a om ka hi.
Ka gen ding bangtak a ka genkhiak theihna ding in.
Hun na neih sung un a tam theipen semzel unla, pawlam mite lak ah piltak in om un.
Michih bangchibang a dawn ding hiam chih na theihna ding un na paukamsuak uh chisoh, hehpihna hi gige hen.
Toupa a unau ngaihtak, nasempa muanhuai, sikha hihpih Tukika in ka tanchin tengteng nou a hon theisak ding hi.
Hiaiziakin, ka tanchin uh na theihna ding uleh, na lungtang uh a hon khamuan theihna ding in amah na kiang uah k’on sawl hi;
Onesima, unau muanhuai leh gaihtak noumau lak a mi mah toh a hongding uhi. Amau hiai lam a thil omdan tengteng a hon theisak ding uhi.
Aristarkhas, ka hentakpih pa’n nou chibai a honbuk hi. Mark, Barnaba tupa in leng, chibai a honbuk hi, amah tungtang thu ah thupiakte na mu uh; na kiang ua a hongpai leh, na kipahpih un;
Jesu, Justa a chih un chibai nou a honbuk hi. Huaite zeksum mi ahi ua, huaite kia Pathian gam thu lam ah ka seppih leh a hon khamuante ahi uhi.
Epaphra noumau lak a mi mah, Khrist Jesu sikha in chibai nou a honbuk hi, aman Pathian deihlam phot pichin leh gingta bikbeka na din theihna ding un, a thumna ah nou ading in a kisuk gige hi.
Noumau ading, Laodisia khua a omte ading leh Hierapoli khua a omte ading in phatuam a ngai mahmah chih ka theihpih hi.
Luke, Daktor ngaihtak leh Dema in chibai a honbuk uhi.
Laodisia khuaa unau omte leh Nympha leh a inn a saptuamte chibai honbuk sakun.
Huan hiai laikhak na lak ua na sim nung un, Laodisia saptuamte lak ah leng simsakun; nou leng Laodisia khua a pen nana sim sam ding uhi.
Huan Arkippa kiang ah “Nasepna Toupa a i muhpen tangtun ding in pilvang in,” na chi un.
Kei Paul in keimah khut ngeia hiai chibaibukna k’on gelh ahi. Ka kolbulhte theigige un.
Hehpihna na kiang uah om hen, Amen.
Paul, Silvana leh Timothi in, Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Khrist a Thessalonika khua a om saptuamte kiang ah, Hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Ka thumna uah na min uh lou in, nou tengteng ziak in Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen gige uhi.
I Pathian leh Pa ma ah gin ziak a na thilhih dan uh, it ziak a na sepgimte uh, Toupa Jesu Khrist lametna ziak a na kuhkalna uh mangngilh lou a, theigige in.
Unau Pathian ngaihtakte aw, nou a hon teldan ka thei uhi.

Ka Tanchinhoih uh thu kia a na kiang uh hong tunglou in thilhihtheihna leh Kha Siangthou leh nakpi a theihchetna toh a hongtung zaw hi. Noumau makhua ngaihtuah in na tung uah bangchibang mi ka hita ua chih na thei uhi.
Huan thu haksa thuak kawm in, Kha Siangthou a kipakin na pom ua, koumau leh Toupa zuite na hita uhi.
Huchi in Masidonia leh Akhaia gam a gingta mi tengteng ading in zuihding na hi uhi.
Toupa thu noumau a kipan in Masidonia leh Akhaia gam kia hilou in, munchih ah Pathian lam a na ginna uh a thangkheta hi, kou bangmah ka gen uh a kiphamoh nawn kei hi.
Amau mahmah in bangchibang vualzawlna toh na kiang ua ka hong lutdan uh a hon theisak uhi. Nou milimte a kipan a Pathian lam n’ong ngattak dan uleh Pathian hing leh dik nasem ding leh,
van a kipan A Tapa na ngak ding in, tua Tapa bel misi lak a kipan a a kaihthoh, thangpaihna hongtung ding lak a hon suaktasakpa Jesu ahi.
Unaute aw, na lak ua ka honglutna uh a thawnkei chih noumau mah in na thei uhi;

A thawn hih naksang in huai malam in na theihsa bang un, Philippi khua ah gimthuak leh zumhuaitaka bawl a ka om nung un, dalna thupitak lak ah leng Pathian Tanchinhoih na kiang ua gen ding in ka Pathian uah hangsanna ka nei zaw uhi.
Ka thugen uh zekhemna a pawt ahi kei a, sianlouhna a suak leng ahi kei a, zekhemna in leng ahi sam kei hi;
Tanchinhoih kepsaka om ding a Pathian hoihsak mi ka hih bang ngei un, mihing hih kipak ding hilou a, ka lungtang uh ze-etpa Pathian hih kipak zaw in thu ka genzel uh a hizaw hi.
Chiklaipeuh in kimaitang phatna thu leh huaiham khuhmangna ding thu ka zong ngeikei uh chih na thei ua; Pathian leng hon theihpihpa ahi.
Khrist sawltak ka hihziak un mi ading in chimtakhuaipi hithei mahle ung, mihing lak ah nou lak ah leh midangte lak ah leng pahtawina ka zong ngei sam kei uhi.
Nu naupom, amah tate deihthoh tak a kem bang in, na lak uah nunnem tak in ka omzaw uhi.
Huchi in ittaka nou k’on lunggulh tuntun ziak un, Pathian Tanchinhoih kia hilou in, koumau hinna leng honpiak hial ka ut mahmah uhi.
Unaute aw, ka sep tawldan uleh ka sepgim dan uh na theigige uhi; na lak uah kuamah ka suk tuailuai louhna ding un, sun leh zana nasem in Pathian Tanchinhoih nou k’on hilh uhi.
Nou gingtate tung a siangthou tak, diktak leh dembei a ka omdan uh a hon theihpihte Pathian leh noute na hi uhi.
Na theih mah bang un, Pa’n amah tate tung a ahihbanga hanthawn leh khamuan in nou k’on theisak uhi,
Amah gam leh thupina a nou hon samlutpa Pathian mi hidia kilawm him a na hin theihna ding un.

Hiai ziak in tawplou in Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen uhi, Pathian thu koumau a kipan a na muh uh, na sanlai un leng, mihing thu bang in na sangkei ua; Pathian thu a hihna bang a na sanzawk ziak un; huai Pathian a ahi hima, gingtami noumau sung a semzel mah ahi.
Nou unaute aw, Judia gam a Pathian saptuam pawl Khrist Jesu a omte zuite na hi ua, amau Judate lak a thuak bang un, nou leng noumau gam mite lak ah na thuak sam uhi.
Huai Judate’n Toupa Jesu leh zawlneite leng a that ua, kou leng a hon delhkhia ua, Pathian a sulungkim kei ua, mi tengteng a kalh nak uhi.
Jentelte hotdam a hihtheihna ding ua a kiang ua thugen a kham ua, a khelhna uh hihdim gige ding in; himahleh thangpaihna a khawk theihtawpin a tung uah a hongtungta hi.
Himahleh unaute aw, sawtlou kal a dia noumau toh lungtang lam a kikhenlou a, sapum lam kia a kikhen a i omtakdih ziak in, kilawptaka na mel uh mu ding in ka pang sansan uhi.
Na kiang ua hongpai ka tum chiltel ngal ua; kei, Paul ngei in leng hongpai ka tum tuma, himahleh Setan in a hondal nak hi.
Ka lametna uleh, ka kipahna uhiam, ka lallukhu suan uhiam bang ahia leh? A hongpai chiang in i Toupa Jesu ma ah noumau mah na hi kei ding ua hia?
Noumau mah ka suan uleh ka kipahna uh na hi uhi.
Huchi in ka thuakzoh taklouh phet un Athen khua ah koumau kia nutsiah in om le ung hoih ka sa uhi,
I unaupa uh Timothi bel Khrist Tanchinhoih lam a Pathian nasempa, nou hon hihkip ding leh na ginna lam ua nou hon khamuan ding in k’on sawlta uhi.
Hiai gimthuaknate ziak a kuamah a linlouhna ding un. Hiaite bang thuak ding a seh ka hi uh chih noumau ngei in na thei uhi.
Na kiang ua ka omlai un gimthuak ding ka hi uh chih k’on hilhkholh bang ngei in a tungta hi, huai na thei uhi.
Hiaiziakin ka thuakzoh taklouh nung in, khempa’n nou a hon khempuk kha dia, ka sepgimna uh a thawn kha ding chi in, na gindan uh ka na theihna ding in mi k’on sawl ahi.

Himahleh Timothi noumau a kipan a tua ka kiang uh a hongtun in, honmuh ka ut mahmah bang un nou leng honmuh ut mahmah in hehpih in n’on theigige uh chih leh, na ginna uh leh na itna tanchin uh kipahhuai takmai a hon puak hi.
Huchi a hih ziak in unaute aw, ka mangbatna uleh gimthuakna tengteng uah na ginna ziak un na tungthu uah lungmuan in ka omta uhi;
Toupa a na dinkip phot uleh tun tuh ka hingta uhi.
I Pathian ma ah na tung ua ka kipahna tengteng ziak un noumau lamthu ah Pathian kiang ah bangchibang in kipahthu ka gen thei zawzen ding uam aw?
Na mel uh ka muh theihna ding uleh na ginna lam ua na taksap awng uh k’on huksak theihna ding un sun leh zan in nakpitak in ka thum uhi.
Huchi in Pathian, i Pa leh Toupa Jesu’n leng, koute na kiang uah honpi tung hen.
Huan noumau lam a itna ka hauh bang un, noumau khat leh khat na ki-ittuah chiatna uleh mi tengteng na itna uh hon khangsak zelpa Toupa’n hon hausak semsem hen;
Huchi a i Toupa Jesu a misiangthou tengteng toh a hongpai chiang a, i Pathian leh a Pa ma a na lungtangte uh siangthouna lam ah gensiatbeia om ding a nou a hon hihkip theihna ding in.

Huchi in unaute aw, a tawppenin na omdan ding uleh Pathian na hih kipahdan ding uh tua na omdan bang uh, koumau a kipan a na lak bang un na hauhsemna ding un Toupa Jesu ah k’on ngen un k’on hanthawn uhi.
Toupa Jesu ziak in bangthute ahia k’on piak uh na thei uhi.
Pathian deihlama na siangthouna ding uh hiai ahi: kingaih tawpsan unla;
Siangthou leh zahtakhuai in noumau zi chiat kem un
Pathian theilou Jentelte bang a huk lamsang a utlou in.
Huai lam thu ah zaw kuamah takhial in a unau tung ah thil hoihlou hihkei hen; Toupa huchibang thilhihte tengteng phulapa a hih ziak in k’on hilhkhol un k’on theisak khinta uhi.
Pathian in sianglou ding in a honsam kei a, siangthou ding in a honsam zaw hi.
Huaiziak in a nial in mihing nial ahi kei a, Pathian nou a Kha Siangthou hon pepa nial ahizaw hi.
A hihangin unaute itdan lamthu gelhsak na kiphamoh kei ua, ki-ittuah chiat ding in noumau ngei Pathian hilh in na omta uhi.
Masidonia gam a unau om tengteng tung ah huai na hihngei uhi. Himahleh unaute aw, na hauhsemna ding un k’on hanthawn uhi;
Kamsim deuh a om leh noumau nna chiat limsak leh, thu ka honpiak bang ua na khut ngei ua sep na tupna ding un;
Huchi in pawlam mite tung ah kilawmtakin na om thei ding ua, bangmah na tasam kei ding uhi.
Himahleh unaute aw, midang lametna himhim neiloute bang a na lungkham louhna ding un, ihmute tungtang na theihlouh uh ka deihkei uhi.
Jesu a si a, a thou nawnta chih i gingta ua, huchibang in Jesu a ihmu khinsate Pathian in amah toh a hon tonpih ding ahi.
Hiai Toupa thu in na kiang uah ka gen uhi; eite Toupa hongpai pha a hingdam a na omlaite’n, ihmu khinsate i makhelh kei hial ding hi, chih.
Toupa mahmah kikou aw toh, angel tungnungpen aw toh, Pathian pengkul ging toh, van a kipan a hong paisuk ding ahi ngal a, huan Khrist a sisate a thou masa phot ding uhi;
Huaikhit chiang in eite hingdama na omlaite, huihkhua ah Toupa tuak ding in amau toh mei lak ah laktouh in i om ding ua; huchi in tangtawn in Toupa kiang ah i om ding uhi.
Huaiziak in hiai thute in kikhamuan tuahchiat un.
Himahleh naute aw, a hun leh a ni lam thute himhim gelhsak na kiphamoh kei uhi.
Toupa ni tuh zana guta bang in a hongtung ding chih noumau ngei in chiantak in na thei uhi.
Muanna leh bitna chi a a gen laitak un numei nauvei bang in thakhat in manthatna a tung uah a tung ding a, a suakta kei hial ding uhi.
Himahleh unaute aw, nou zaw huai ni’n guta bang a a hon bingphawn ding in mial ah na omkei uhi;
Vak tate leh sun tate na hivek ngal ua; zan a mi i hi kei ua, mial a mi leng i hi sam kei uhi.
Huaiziak in midangte bang in i ihmu kei ding uh, hak ni in limsak zaw ni.
Ihmute zan in ahi a ihmut uh; zukhamte leng zan in ahi a kham uh.
Himahleh eibel sun a mi i hih ziak in, ginna leh itna lum tawi in, hotdam lametna lukhu a zang in limsak zaw ni.
Pathian in thangpaihna thuak ding hilou in, Toupa Jesu Khrist ziak a hotdamna mu ding zaw in a honchi hi.
I hah in leng i ihmut in leng, amah toh i hinkhawm theihna ding in i sih sik in amah a sita hi.
Huaiziak in ki hanthawn chiat in, na hihnak mah bang un kitungding tuah chiat un.
Himahleh unaute aw, na lak ua semgim leh Toupa a na heutu ua na om leh nou hon thuhilhte thei ding in k’on ngen hi.
A nasep ziak un it in ngaithupi mahmah un. Noumau kituak in om un.
Tuin unaute aw, k’on hanthawn uhi, danlou a omte hilh unla, lungkete hanthawn unla, hatloute panpih unla, mi tengteng lak ah thuakzou tak in om un.
Kuamah in kua gitlouh leng gitlouh a thuklou ding in pilvang un; thil na kihihsak tuahna lam uah leh mi tengteng tung a na hihsakna lam uah leng a hoih lamlam zui un.
Nuam gige un;
Tawplou in thum un;
Bangkim ah kipahthu gen gige un; huai tuh noumau lam a Khrist Jesu ah Pathian deihlam ahi.
Kha tuh phelh kei un;
Thugente simmawh kei un;
Bangkim enchian zaw unla, a hoihlam peuhmah len chinten un;
Gilou lam peuhmah ah kihemkhia un.
Huchi in lemna Pathian ngei in nou honhih siangthou sipsip hen; na kha uh leh na lungsim uh leh na pumpi uh i Toupa Jesu Khrist hongpai chiang in gensiatbei in humbit in omsuak sipsip hen.
Nou honsampa a muanhuai a, hih leng a hih ding hi.
Unaute aw, hon thumsak un.
Unaute tengteng tawp siangthou in chibai hon na buksak un.
Hiai laithon unau tengteng kiang ah sim ding in Toupa min in k’on ngen hi.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kiang uah om hen, Amen.
Paul, Silvana leh Timothi in, Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Khrist a Thessalonika khua a saptuamte kiang ah:
Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Khrist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Unaute aw, na ginna uh nakpitak a khanglian in, navek ua na ki-ittuah chiatna uh a khan semsem ziak in noumau tungthu ah Pathian kiang a kipahthu gengen ding him ka hi uh: huai ka hihtuak him uh ahi.
Huchi in min a honsawina tengteng uleh gim na thuaknate ua na kuhkal dan uleh na ginna ziak un Pathian saptuam pawlte lak ah kou k’on suang uhi.
Huai Pathian vaihawmna a diktat chih chiamtehna ahi a, Pathian kumpi gam ziak a na thuak uh leng tu a kumpi gammi a sehtak na hi uh chih kilatna semsem ahi.
Pathian in nou hon hihgimte gimthuakna a thuk diktathuai in a septa hi.
Toupa Jesu van a kipan a angel hatte toh meikuanga hong kilak chiang a, nou hihgima omte kou toh khawlna a honpe ding hi.
Pathian theilou mi leh i Toupa Jesu Tanchinhoih taksangloute tung a phu a la ding hi.
Amau tangtawn manthatna a gawtna leh Toupa omna leh a thilhihtheihna thupina a kipan a pawsiahna a thuak ding uhi,
Amah a hongpai chiang in misiangthoute hihthupi in a om ding ua, gingtute tengteng lamdangsak a om ding uhi, k’on thu theihsak uh na gintak ziak un nou leng amaute lak ah na telsam ding uhi.

Huchi a hihthupi leh lamdang sak a hih theihna ding a i Pathian in nou a honsapna a saptuak him a honsak theihna ding in leh, hoih utna chiteng leh ginna nasep chiteng a thilhihtheihna a hon lohchinsak theihna ding in nou adin k’on thumsak gige uhi;
Huchi a i Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna bangzel a i Toupa Jesu min noumau a hihthupi a om a, noumau leng amah a hihthupi a na om theihna ding un.
Himahleh unaute aw, i Toupa Jesu Khrist hongpaina leh amah tuakdinga i vakikhopna ding thu ah:
Toupa ni a tungkhinta chihna kha in hiam aw, thu ziak in hiam aw, kou a kipan a laikhak ziak in hiam aw, na lungsim uh a linpah louhna ding in leh na buailouhna ding un k’on ngen uhi.
Kuamah in bangmah in honkhem kei uhen; puksannatak a hongtun masak phot a, khelhna mipa, mangthang tapa ngei a hong kilat kei leh huai ni tunglou ding ahi.
Amah Pathian a hihsak peuhmah uleh, sabiak tengteng dou in, a tung ua om tum in a kihihthupi ding: huchi in Pathian tempula tuin Pathian bang hial in a kitung khe ding hi.
Na lak ua ka omlai in leng huaibang thu k’on hilh zel chih na theigige kei ua hia?
Amah hun tuam a a hong kilat theihna ding in bang in kham hiam chih na thei uhi.
Danlou a omna thuguk in tuin leng a sem lellel ngal a, himahleh lakmang a a om masiah tua a khampa’n huchibang in a kham ding hi.
Huai lakmang chiang in dan a talekpa a hong kilangta dia, Toupa Jesu’n a kam hatna in a that dia, a hongpaina leh kilakna in a hihmang ding hi.
Huai dan a talekpa a hongpaina Setan sepdan bangzel in, thilhihtheihna chiteng, chiamtehna chiteng, zuau thillamdang chiteng toh,
Mangthang lelte ding in khemna gilou chiteng toh ahi ding; hotdam a a om theihna ding ua thutak itna a pomlouh ziak un.
Huaiziak in zuauthu a gintakna ding un, Pathian in diklouhna nasep a kiang uah a honsawl ding hi.
Thutak gingtalou a diktatlouhna a kipak zawte’n siamlouh a tanvek theihna ding un.

Unau Toupa ngaihtakte aw, Kha hihsiangthou leh thutak gingta a hotdam a om ding in a tung a kipan Pathian in nou a hontel ziak in na tungthu uah zaw Pathian kiang ah kipahthu genzel ding him ka hi uhi.
Huchibang ding in aman i Toupa Jesu Khrist thupina tang ding in ka Tangchinhoih un nou a honsam hi.
Huchi in unaute aw, ding kip unla, kam a ka thugen uleh laikhakte a nou k’on sinsakte uh lenkip un.
Huchi in i Toupa Jesu Khrist mahmah leh Pathian i Pa, eite honitpa leh hehpihna ziak a tangtawn a khamuanna leh lametna hoih hon pepan,
Na lungtangte uh hih khamuangin, thil hoih hih leh thugen chiteng ah hon hihkip hen.
A tawppen in unaute aw, Toupa thu noumau lak a a om bang in, khang a hihthupia a om theihna ding leh,
Migenhakte leh migiloute lak a ka bit theihna ding un, hon thumsak un; mi tengteng in lah ginna a neivek kei uhi.
Himahleh Toupa a muanhuai a, aman noute hon phutkip in gilou apan a honveng ding hi.
K’on thupiak peuhmah uh na hihzou ua, na hih zelzel u leng Toupa ah k’on gingta uhi.
Toupa’n na lungtangte uh Pathian itna ah leh Khrist kuhkalna ah pilut hen.
Huan unaute aw, koute a kipan a thuhilhna a muh bang ua omlou nasep thadah, danlou bang a om unau tengteng apan kihemkhe ding in i Toupa Jesu Khrist min in thu ka honpia uhi.
Na kiang ua ka omlai un, danlou bang in ka gamta ngeikei uh chih leh noumau mahmah in n’on zuihdan ding uh na thei uhi.
Kuamah khut a kipan a thawn in na tanghou uh leng ka ne ngeikei uhi; noute k’on tuailuai saklouhna ding un sun leh zana gim leh tawltaka semkawm in ka ne zel uhi.
Huai thuneihna ka neihlouh ziak uh hilou in, ka omdan uh na zuih ding ua etton ding honpia ka hi zaw hi.
Na kiang ua ka omlai un: kuapeuh in nna a sepnop kei leh a nek leng ne kei hen, chi in thu ka honpia uhi.
Na lak ua khenkhat danlou a omte tungtang ka za uhi, huaite’n na himhim a semkei ua, midangte nasep ah a kichinglah zaw uhi.
Huchi a hih chiang in, huai mite nasem hiathiat ding leh amau tanghou ne ding in Toupa Jesu Khrist ah thupia in ka hanthawn uhi.
Unaute aw, nou zaw thil hoih hih chimtak kei un.
Huan kuapeuh in hiai ka laikhak ua ka thu uh a zuih kei uleh, na kithuahpih hetlouhna ding un chiamteh un, a zum theihna ding in.
Ahi, melma bang in enkei unla, unau bang in hilhzaw un.
Huan muanna Toupa’n tangtawn in banglam peuh ah nou hon khamuan hen. Toupa na vek ua lak ah om hen.
Kei, Paul in, keimah khut a hiai chibaibukna ka gelh ahi; hiai ka laikhak teng ah chiamtehna ahi; hichibang ka gelh dan ahi.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na vek ua kiang ah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian thupiak bang a i hondampa leh i lamet Toupa Jesu Khrist sawltak in:
Ginna a ka ta taktak Timothi kiang ah: Pathian, i Pa leh, Khrist Jesu, i Toupa kiang a kipan hehpihna, zahngaihna, khamuanna na tung ah om hen.
Masidonia gam a ka hohdek lai a k’on nget bang in Ephesa khua ah om gige in, huchi a mi khenkhat gindan tuam sinsaklou ding a na hilh theihna ding in.
Huan Pathian lam a phattuamna, ginna a o pen hilou, kiselna leh gintakthu gen omsak lel tangthu leh khangthu suizohlouh peuh buaipihlou ding a na hilh theihna ding in:
Eite’n thuhilh ding i kep pen bel lungtang siangthou leh sialehpha theihna siang leh ginna taktak a kipan a pawt itna ahizaw hi.
Mi khenkhatte’n hiaite pialsan in thuginalou genna lam ah a vakmang uhi.
A thugen uh leh thil ahi a a gente u leng bang ahia chih theiloupi in dan sinsakmite hih a ut uhi.
Min a zat hoih leh Dan a hoih chih i thei uhi.

Ahi a, dan zaw mi diktatte ading a bawl ahi kei a, dan kalhte leh danlou a omte ading, Pathian limsakloute leh mikhialte, mi siangthouloute leh Pathian zahloute, pate thatte, nute thatte, mihing thatte;
kingaihhatte, tawkawhukte, mihing gute, zuautheite, kichiam khemkhemte ading leh thil dang thugin toh kituaklou himhim te ading leh,
Ka kiang a kepsak a om Pathian Tanchinhoih thupi hilhna dik kalhte ading ahi.
A hon hihhatpa Khrist Jesu i Toupa kiang ah kipahthu ka gen hi, muanhuai a honsaka, a nasempa dia a honchih tak ziak in.
Tuma lam in Pathian gensepa leh sawipa leh hihsepa na hita mah leng; gingtaloupi leh theilou a hih ka hih ziak in ahi zahngaihna ka na muh tak.
Huan i Toupa hehpihna ginna leh Khrist Jesu a itna in nakpitak in a dimletta hi.
Khrist Jesu khialte hondam ding in khovel ah a hongpai chih a taksanhuai in a laktuak mahmah hi. A lak ua khialpen ka hi;

Himahleh hiaiziakin ahi zahngaihna ka na muh: Jesu Khrist in a dohzohna kim a khialpen keimah a a latsak theihna ding ahi, tuban siah tangtawn hinna muhna ding a Amah hon gingta dingte adia etsakna hi ding in.
Kumpipa tangtawn a om, sitheilou, muhtheihlouh, Pathian tak kia, tangtawn a zahtak leh thupi in om hen, Amen.
Ka tapa Timothi aw, na tungtang genkholhnate toh kituakin hiai mohpuakna leh thuhilhna konpia hi, huchi a huai thute hilh a, kidouna hoih na dou theihna ding in,
Ginna leh sialehpha theihna siangtak len chinten in, Mi khenkhatte’n huai sialehpha theihna paikhia in ginna lam ah long sia bang in a kekseta uhi;
Huaite lak ah Himenaia leh Alexander a pang uhi; Pathian a gensiat louhna ding un amaute Setan ka peta hi.
Huchi in a masapen in thilnget thumnate, thumna himhimte, thumsaknate, kipahthu gennate, mi tengteng ading a bawlsak ding in k’on hanthawn hi.
Kumpipate leh thuneite tengteng ading in leng; Pathian limsak leh zahtakhuaitaka kituaka khamuanga i om theihna ding in.
Huai tuh i Hondampa Pathian theih in a hoih in, a kipahhuai hi.
Aman mi tengteng hotdam a om ding leh thutak thei ding in a deih hi.
“Pathian khat kia a om,
Pathian leh mihing kikal ah
Palai khat kia a om nawn,
Amah mihing ahi,
Khrist Jesu, mi tengteng tatna dia kipepa pen.”
Huai theihpihna a huntak a piak ahi
Hiai hihding a tangkoupihpa ding leh sawltak a seh ka hi, Khrist ah thu taktak ka gen, ka zuau kei; ginna leh thutak a Jentelte hilhpa a seh ka hi.
Pasalte’n munchih a khut siangthou zak in, thangpai lou leh ginglel lou in thum le uh ka deih hi.
Tua bangmah in numeite zumthei leh omdan siam in puansilh kilawm lel in kivan le uh; samphek, dangkaeng, tuikepsuang leh, puan mantam taktakte a kivanlou in:
Himahleh numei Pathian limsak kichite a kihun lel in thilhih hoih in kivan le uh ka deih hi.
Numei in thumang hiathiat in om dinden in zil hen.
Himahleh numei in thu a hilhzaw ka phalkei, pasal tung a thuneih leng ka phal sam kei, dai dinden in omzaw hen.
Adam siam masak ahi a, huai nung in Evi siam ahi.
Adam khem in a omkei a, numei khem in a om a, tatlekna ah a pukta hi.
Numei in omdan siamna toh ginna leh itna leh siangthouna a a om gige leh nau pianna ah hotdam in a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh saptuam heutu apan ut in nasep hoih a ut ahi, chih a dik ahi.
Huchi in saptuam heutu tuh gensiatbei, zi khat nei, kidek thei, navak tak, mi diktat, mi paktakdan siam, thuhilhsiam,
uain khamhatlou, mivuak hatlou mi nunnem a hi ding hi, selhatlou, sum deihta lou,
zahtakhuai tak a tate kemsiam, amah inn sung kizentak a vaihawm siam mi ahi ding hi.
Min amah inn sung vaihawm nangawn kizentak a a hihsiam kei leh bangchi’n ahia Pathian saptuam a kep theih ding?
Gingthakmi ahi ding ahi kei, huchilou in zaw a kisathei kha dia, Diabol siamlouh tansakna ah a pukkha ding hi.
Huaite lou leng pawlam a mite phat in a om nalai ding ahi, huchilou in zaw gensiat a a om in Diabol thang ah a awk kha ding hi.
Huchibang in saptuam Upa mi zahtakhuai ahi ding uh ahi; kamtamte, uain haite, lepna nin a huaiham mite ahi ding ahi kei;
sialehpha theihna siang a ginna a thuguk kemmi ahizaw ding uhi.
Huan huaite leng chet in om masa uhen, huai nung in gensiatbei a hong hih uleh saptuam Upa na sem uhen.
Huchibang in a numeite uh leng mi zahtakhuai ahi ding uhi, gensiat hatlou, kidekthei leh bangkim a muanhuai ahi ding uhi.
Saptuam Upa zi khat nei a tate uleh amau inn sung vaihawm navaktaka hihmi hi uhen.
Saptuam Upa na hoihtak a semte’n amau ading in phattak hihna a loh ua, huan Khrist Jesu a om ginna a muanna leh hangsanna thupitak a mu uhi.
Sawtlouchik chiang a na kiang a hongpai lamen in hiai thu na kiang ah ka gelh ahi;

Himahleh ka hongom sawt khak leh Pathian inkuanpihte lak a mi bangchibang in ahia a om ding uh chih na theihna ding in ka gelh ahi; Pathian inkuanpihte Pathian hing saptuamte, thutak khuam leh kingakna ahi uhi.
Pathian biakna thuguk nial vuallouh in a thupi hi:
“Pathian sa a muhtheih a latsak in a om a,
Kha a siamtansak,
Angelte muh,
namte lak a tangkoupih,
khovel a mite gintak,
thupina a pitouh ahi.”
Himahleh tunung chiang in mi khenkhatte’n; pimangna khate leh dawite thuhilhna limsak in, ginna a hon tawpsan ding uh chih Kha in kichiantak in a gen hi: huai tuh,
mi zuautheite lepchiahna ziak in ahi; huai mi zuautheite amau sialehpha theihna ngei a sikam a halkeu bang ahi uhi.
Kiten a kham ua, nekding ante, thutak thei a gingta te’n kipahthugena sandinga Pathian in a siamte, neklouh ding a chi uhi.
Pathian thilsiam chiteng a hoih ngal a, kipahthugen a san a hihkhit phot leh bangmah deihlouh ding ahi kei hi;
Pathian thu leh thumna a hih siangthou ahi khinta hi.
Huaite unaute na theihsak leh Khrist Jesu nasempa hoihtak, ginna leh thuhilhna hoih tutan a na zuih thu a vaklian na hi ding hi.
Himahleh Pathian zahlouhna leh tangthu bulbal neiloute deih ken. Pathian limsak ding in kithuzoh in;
Sapum kithuzohna a phatuam zeka; Pathian limsakna pen tangtawn in, tua omsa hinna leh hongom nawn ding piak chiamna a neih ziak in thil tengteng ah a phatuam hi.
Hiai thu a muanhuai in a laktuak mahmah hi.
Huchi in Pathian hing i muan ziak in i semgim ua, i pang teitei uhi; amah mi tengteng Hondampa ahi a, a gingtate Hondampa ahi tuanse hi.
Hiai thute pia inla, thuhilh in.
Na naupanna kuamah musit sak ken; thugen ah, tatdan ah, itna ah, kha ah, ginna leh siangthouna ah, gingtute zuih ding hizaw in.
Ka hongpai masiah laisim, hanthawn leh thugin, limsak in.
Nang maha om thilpiak thugenkholhna a piak, upate khut ngak a Pathian in nang a hon neihsak limsaklou ken.
Mi tengteng kiang a na phattuamna a lat theihna ding in huai thilte ah thanuam inla, kizang zou in.
Nangmah leh na thuhilh ah pilvang in; huai thilte hih in om gige in; huchibang hih in nangmah leh na thuzate na hondam ding hi.
Upa deuhte tai kenla, pa bang in thuhilh in; tangval deuhte unaupa bang in;
pitek deuhte nu bang in; nungak deuhte siangthoutakin sanggamnu bang in thuhilh in.
Meithai, meithai taktakte zahtak in.
Himahleh meithai kuapeuh in tate leh tute a neih uh leh, huaite’n amau inn sung ah Pathian limsakna mohpuakna thei masa uhenla, amau nu leh pate uh kem uhen; huai Pathian kipahlamtak ahi.
Meithai taktak amah kia a om in Pathian tung ah lametna a nei a, sun leh zana ngen in a thum gige hi.
Himahleh meithai amah nopna lel a kipia zaw, a damlai nangawn in a si ahi.
Gensiatbeia a omtheihna ding un huaite thupiak in pia in.
Himahleh kuapeuh in amah mite ading a ngaihtuah sakkei a, a ma inkuante kholhouh a ngaihtuahsak kei leh, ginna a zuausana, gingloumi sang in a gilou zaw hi.
Meithai kum sawmguk chiang nuailam hilou, mi khat zi hisa,

Thil hoih hihlama mi phatlohta a tate vaktei khina, mikhualte na zintun khina, misiangthoute khe na silta a, mangbangte na dawnzang khina, thil hoih peuhmah thanuamtak a na hihkhin ahihleh meithai a gelh theih ahi.
Himahleh meithai naupang simte zaw gelh ken; Khrist lam a a hong kiplouh un pasal neih a ut nak uhi.
A ginna masa uh a topsan ziak un siamlouh tang in a om uhi.
Huailou leng thadah in inn teng ah a banpawt nak uhi. Thadah kia leng hilou in, thu genlouh ding gen in, kamtam leh mite thilhih lai a vaihawmsak nak uhi.
Huchi in meithai naupang simte zaw pasal nei in, tate nei uhenla, inn sung khosak ngaihtuah le uh, melmapa gensiatna ding lemtang musak kei le uh ka deih hi.
Meithai khenkhat setan lam naih in a pialkheta uhi.
Gingtami numei hiam pasal hiam in methaite neita leh dawnzang hen; saptuamte hihbuai in omkei hen; meithai taktakte a dawnzang theihna ding un.
Saptuam Upa vaihawm hoihte, abikin Thugin leh Thu a semgimte a lehnih a hihthupi tuak a seh nawnsem hi uhen.
Laisiangthou in, “Bawngtal in buh a chil lai in a muk gak ken,” a chi hi. “Nasemmi loh mutak ahi” a chi nawn hi.
Saptuam Upa hekna zaw theihpih nih hiam thum hiam kam a louzaw sang ken.
Mikhialte mi tengteng ma ah taihilh in, midangte’n leng a lau theihna ding un.
Deihsaktuam leh khentuam nei a bangmah hihlou a hiai thute zui ding in Pathian leh Khrist Jesu leh angel teltuamte mitmuh in phatuamngaitak in k’on theisak hi.
Kuamah tung ah khutnga pah kenla, midang khelhna ah leng kikum ken; ki hihsiangthou gige in.
Tui kia dawn kenla, na gilpi ziak in leh na hatlouh nak ziak in uain neu khakha zang zel in.
Mi khenkhatte khelhna a lang gige a, vaihawmna a tun nak hi; mi khenkhat khelhnate bel a khonungin a hong kilang hi.
Huchi mah bang in mi khenkhatte thil hoih hih kilang pah a om a, a kilang loute leng seltheih ahi kei hi.
Pathian min leh a thuhilhna thu gensiat a a omlouhna ding in sikha hakkol bat peuhmah te’n amau pute bangkim ah zahtak tham in sim uhen.
Huan gingta mi pu a neite’n unau a hih ziak un ngaineu kei uhen, himahleh phattuamna mute leh deihtakte a hih ziak un a na uh sepsak semsem uhen. Huai thute hilh inla, hanthawn in.
Mi kuapeuh in thuhilhna dang a hilh a, thutak, I Toupa Jesu Khrist thu, leh Pathian limsak lam thuhilhna hoih a sakkei leh,
Amah kisathei ahi, bangmah theilou ahi, theih naksang in kisel leh thukalh lam ah a hai zawta a, huchibang a kipan in, enna, kilaina, gensiatna,
hoihlou lam a ginna, selhatna a suak nak hi; huchibang selhat mite lungsim sia nei leh thutak neilou mi, Pathian limsak pen punna khattou sa mi ahi uhi.
Lungkimna toh kithuah Pathian limsakna punna thupitak ahi.
Khovel ah bangmah i lutpih kei a, bangmah i pawtpih thei sam kei ding hi.
Himahleh nekding leh silhding nei in, huaite ah i lungkim ding uhi.
Himahleh, hauhsak tumte khemna, thang, haihuai leh hihsethei duhgawlna tampi ah a puklut nak uhi, huaite’n tuh siatna leh manthatna ah mite a hihtum nak uhi.
Dangka sum deihtak zaw gilou chiteng bul ahi; khenkhatte’n a eng ua, ginna a paimangsan ua, amau leh amau lungkhamna tampi in a ki sunlet tektok uhi.
Himahleh nang Pathian mipa aw, huai thilte taisan inla, diktatna, Pathian limsakna, ginna, itna, thuaktheihna, kingaihniamnate delh in.
Ginna kidouna hoih sual inla, tangtawn hinna len chinten in; huai tang ding a sap na hi hi; theihpih tamtakte mitmuh in gupna hoih na gumta hi.
Pathian thilbangkim hihhingpa leh Khrist Jesu, Pontia Pilat mai a gupna hoih gumpa mitmuh in thu ka honpia hi.
Toupa Jesu Khrist hong kilatnawn masiah huai thupiak siangthou leh gensiatbeia kem ding in.
Huai kilakna amah huntak ah phattuak thuneipa tak kia, kumpipate Kumpipa, toupate Toupa’n a lak ding ahi.

Amah kia in sihtheihlouhna a nei a, vak naihtheih vuallouh ah a om a, amah kuamah in a mu ngeikei ua, muh leng a mu thei sam kei uhi; amah kiang ah tangtawn in thupina leh thilhihtheihna om hen, Amen.
Hiai khovel a mihausate kisatheilou ding leh sum muanhuailou a muanna ngalou a, thil tengteng kipahna ding a tampi a hon pepa Pathian a nga zaw ding in hilh in.
Thil hoih a hih ding uh, thil hoih hih a a hauh ding uh, thilphala a siam ding uh ahi.
Huchi a amau ading a gou kikhola, tunung a ding a suangphum hoih phuma, tangtawn hinna taktak a letkip theihna ding un.
Timothi aw, na kiang a kepsaka om kem hoih in; Pathian zahlouh thugen mawkmawk leh kikalhna dikloupi a pilna kichite nungngatsan in:
Mi khenkhat in huai nei kichi in ginna ah a paikhial uhi.
Hehpihna na kiang ah om hen, Amen.
Paul, Khrist Jesu a hinna om chiamna thugenna dungzui a, Pathian deihdana Khrist Jesu sawltak in,
Ka tapa deihtak Timothi kiang ah: Pathian leh Khrist Jesu a i Toupa kiang a kipan hehpihna, zahngaihna, lemna om hen.
Sun leh zan khawllou a ka thumnate a nang hon theigige in, ka pi ka pu a kipan a sialehpha theihna siangtak nei a a na ka sep gige pa, Pathian kiang ah kipah thu ka hilh hi.
Kipak a ka dim theihna ding in honmuh ka ut mahmah hi, na khitui theigige in.
Ginna taktak nangmah a om ka theigige a, huai ginna a tung in napi Loisi ah a om a, na nu Iunisi ah leng a om a, huan nangmah ah leng a om chih diktak in ka thei hi.
Huaiziak in ka khut ngak ziak a Pathian thilthawnpiak nangmah a om pen mutkuang ding in k’on theisak ahi;
Pathian in launa kha a honpe kei a, thilhihtheihna leh itna leh kithuzohna tak neihna a honpe zaw hi.
Huchi in i Toupa thu theihsak zumpih kenla, kei a hentapa leng hon zumpih sam ken. Tanchinhoih ziak a gimthuak Pathian thilhihtheihna dungzuiin hon thuakpih zaw in.
Aman i thilhihte bang hilou in, amah seh leh a ma hehpihna bang zaw in hon hondama, sapna siangthou in a honsam hi; huai hehpihna leilung pianma a Khrist Jesu a honpiak ahita hi.
Himahleh i Hondampa Khrist Jesu kilakna ziak in tuin hihlat in a omta hi. Aman sihna hihmang in, Tanchinhoih in hinna leh manthat theihlouhna a hihlangta hi.
Huai Tanchinhoih theisak ding a tangkoupihpa, sawltak leh sinsaktu a seh ka hi.
Hiai ziak in ahi hiai thilte leng ka na thuak. Himahleh ka zum kei; ka ginpa ka thei a, a kiang a ka kepsak huaini ading in a kemhoih thei chih diktak in ka thei hi.
Khrist Jesu a om ginna leh itna nei in, thudikte ka kam a nazakte zui tinten in.
I sung a om Kha Siangthou hon kepsak thutak kem hoih in.
Asia gam a om tengteng te’n a hon nungngatsan uh chih na thei a; a lak ua Phigella leh Harmojini a pang uhi.
Toupa’n Onesifora inkuanpihte kiang ah zahngaihna pia hen aw, aman a hon hihhalh zelzel hi. Ka khainiang but leng a hon zumpih kei hi;
Rome khua a a omlai in hon limzon a, a hon mukhia hi.
Huai ni chiang in Toupa kiang a zahngaihna mu ding in Toupa’n amah sep hen. Ephesa khua a a nasep thupidan na thei hi.
Huchi in nang ka tapa, Khrist Jesu a hehpihna om ah thilhihtheihna nei in om in.
Theihpih tampite lak a ka kam a thu nazakte, mi muanhuai, midangte hilhsawn theidingte kiang ah kemsak in.
Khrist Jesu sepaih hoih bang in gimthuak hon thuakpih in.
Sepaih a om ding a a telpa kipahsak theihna ding in, sepaih kuamah kidou lai in hiai damsung khosaknate in a ki subuai ngeikei hi.
Huan kidemnate ah mite pang mahleh dan bang a ahihkeileh khuksak in a om ngeikei hi.
Louneipa semgim a gah tang masapa ahi ding hi.
Ka thugentak ngaihtuah in; Toupa’n thil tengteng ah theihsiamna a honpe ding hi.
Jesu Khrist, David suan, ka Tanchinhoih gen bang a misi lak a kipan a thounawnpa theigige in.
Huai Tanchinhoih ziak in thil hihkhialpa bang in hen hial in gimna ka thuakzel hi; himahleh Pathian thu hen in a omkei hi.
Huaiziak in Khrist Jesu a hotdamna tangtawn a thupina toh a muhsam theihna ding un, telte ziak in bangkim ka thuak gige hi.
Hiai thugen a dik hi:
“A sihna a i sih khit ngal leh,
a hinna ah i hing ding hi.
I thuak leh a vaihawmna ah vai i hawm sam ding hi;
Amah i kitheihmohbawl leh
Aman leng hon kitheihmohbawl ding.
Eite muanhuailou in om mah
lehang,
Amah zaw muanhuai in a om gige hi;
Amah leh amah a kitheihmohbawl thei ngalkei hi.”
Hiai theisak inla, thute leltak tung a a kisel louhna ding un Toupa muh in phatuamngaitak in theisak in; huai kiselna bangmah a phatuam kei a, a ngaikhete ading in siatna ahizaw hi.
Nasemtu, zumna ding neilou, thutak thu diktak a zang, Pathian pomtak hi ding a nangmah kipe ding in theihtawpsuah in kisin in.
Himahleh Pathian zahlouh thugen mawkmawkte nungngatsan in; huchibang mite Pathian limsaklouhna lam ah a pai gamla semsem ding ua,
a thu un meima sia nek bang in a nezel ding; a lak uah Himenaia leh Phileta a pang uhi.
Huai mite’n thohnawnna a omkhinta chi in, thutak lam a pialsan ua, mikhenkhatte ginna a hih mangsak uhi.
Himahleh Pathian suangphum kip a dinglai a, hiai chiamtehna a nei hi: “Toupa’n amah a te a thei” chih leh “Toupa min lou peuhmah in diktatlouhna paisan hen,” chih.

Himahleh inn thupi ah tuium-belsuan dangkaeng leh dangka a bawlte kia a omkei a, sing leh bellei a bawlte leng a om hi; khenkhatte manphataka zat a om a, khenkhatte manphalou deuh a zat leng a omsam hi.
Huaiziak in mi huai thilgiloute lak a a kihep leh, tuium-belsuan manphataka zat ding, siangthou, Toupa inn a zattak, nasep hoih chiteng dia mansa, ahi ding hi.
Himahleh valnou duhgawlnate taisan inla, lungtang siangthou a Toupa lou peuhmahte lak a diktatna, ginna, itna, leh lametna delh in.
Himahleh kidounate a suaksak nak chih thei in, kiselna haihuai leh pillou ah pang nuam ken.
Toupa sikha in a dou ding a hi kei a, mi tengteng tung a siamtum in, thuhilh siam in, gitlouh tung a thuakzou in,
Amah doute thunuailut tak in a thuhilh zaw ding hi. Huchi in Pathian in thutak a theihna ding un a kisiksak zenzen kha ding hi,
Huchi in khua a hon theithei ding ua, amaute suak leh sal a man a a utut a bawlpa Diabol thang a kipan a suakta thei ding uh.
Huan hiai thei in, ni nanung ah hun haksa pipi a hongom ding hi.
Mi amau ki-itte, dangka deihtate, kiuangsakte, kisatheite, Pathian gensete, nu leh pa thu mangloute, kipahna dan theiloute, siangthouloute,
itna pianpih neiloute, buaina bawlte, hekte, kidektheiloute, mi huhamte, hoih deih hetloute,
zuautatte, kingaisang, thunung khualloute, Pathian itsang a amau kipahna kia itzawte a hi ding uhi;
Pathian limsak batna a nei ding ua, himahleh a thilhihtheihna a taksang kei ding uhi; tuabangte nungngatsan in.
Huchibangte lak a mite inn peuh a lut a gitlouh gikpua numei haideuhte sal a manman te ahi uhi, huchibang numeite duhgawlna chichih a pimang in,
zilzil napi a, thutak theipha ngeiloute ahi uhi.
Janni leh Jambri in Mosi a dou bang un, huai mite’n leng thutak a dou gige uhi; lungsim sesa ginna lam a Pathian deihlouh mi ahi uhi.
Himahleh huai val a hih kei ding uhi, a haidan uh Janni leh Jambri haidan a hong kitheih mah bang in miteng teng kiang a hong kilang ding hi.
Himahleh nang zaw ka thugin, ka omdan, ka thiltup, ka ginna, ka thuakzohna, ka itna, ka kuhkalna na thei vek hi.
A hon sawina uh, hon gimbawlna uh na thei mahmah hi; Antiok khua, Ikoniam khua, Listra khua a ka tung a thiltung leh sawina ka thuakte; huai tengteng ah Toupa’n hon honkheta hi.
Ahi, kuapeuh Khrist Jesu Pathian limsaka om tum photphot in sawina a thuak sam ding uhi.
Migilou leh mi khemhatte mi khem leh khem a om in a gilou semsem ding uhi.
Himahleh nang zaw na zilsa leh kiptak a na gintaksa thutak ah om gige in, kua a kipan na zil hiam chih theigige in.
Huan Khrist Jesu ginna ziak a Hotdamna mu ding a nang hon hilhpilthei Laisiangthoute naupang nou a kipan theikhin na hi chih theigige in.
Laisiangthou peuhmah Pathian hatkhum a piak ahi a; huaiziak in thuhilhna ding, taihilhna ding, bawlhoihna ding, diktatna lam a kichilna ding in a phatuam hi.
Huchi a Pathian mi na hoih chiteng semding a kimtak a kivan a a kim theihna ding in.
Pathian muh leh mihing leh misite ngaihtuah dingpa Khrist Jesu muh in, a kilakna leh a lalgam lou in, phatuamngaitak in k’on theisak hi;
Thu gen in; a hun hi in a hunlou ah leng pangzel in; thuakzoutak a thuhilh kawm in a siamlouhdan uh theisak inla, taihilh inla, hanthawn in,
Thuhilhna dik a ngaihkhiak ngaplouh hun uh hongtung ding hi; a bilte uh a zau ziak in amau deihlam bang in heutute a kiang uah a khawm ding uhi:
A bilte uh thutak lam ah a ngongsak ding ua, tangthu lam naih in a pialta ding uhi.
Nang zaw bangkim ah pilvang in, gimthuak inla, Tanchinhoih genna lam nna sem in na nasepna pen hih tangtung in.
Kei zaw tuin leng luikhiak in ka om lellel a, ka pawt hun a tungta hi.
Douna hoih ka dou khinta a, ki taitehna ka tai khinta, ginna ka lenkip paisuakta hi.
Tun ah zaw diktatna lallukhu kei ading in koih in a omta, Toupa vaihawmpa diktat in huai ni chiang in kei a honpe ding, kei kiang kia hilou in a kilakna it peuhmahte kiang ah a pesam ding hi.
Kintak in ka kiang ah hongpai teitei in; Dema in tulai khovel a it ziak in hon paisan a ,
Thessalonika khua ah a paita hi; Kristen Galatia gam ah a paita hi, Titas Dalmatia gam ah a paita hi.
Luke kia ka kiang ah a om hi. Mark chial inla, honpi in, amah nasepna lam ah kei ading in a phatuam hi.
Taikika zaw Ephesa khua ah ka sawlta hi.
Na hongpai chiang in Troas khua a Karpa kiang a puanaktual ka nutsiat, laibute toh hontawi in, savun lai mahmah hontawi in.
Alexander, dalsun siampa, ka tung ah a gilou mahmah hi.
Toupa’n a thilhih bangzel in a thuk ding; amah lak ah nang leng pilvang in, i thu a dou mahmah hi.
Ka siamnathu ka gen masakpen in kuama’n a hon panpih kei ua, a hon zuausan vek uhi; a mawh pua in om tuankei uhen.
Tanchinhoih keimah ziak a hilhkim a a om theihna ding leh, Jentelte’n a zak theihna ding un, Toupa’n hon gum a a honhih hatzawta hi; Humpinelkai kam a kipan in suahtaksak in ka omta hi.
Toupa’n gitlouhna tengteng lak a kipan in a hon suaktasak dia, a van gam a bittak in a hontun ding; Amah kiang ah tangtawn a thupina om hen. Amen.
Priscilla leh Akuila, Onesifora inkuanpihte toh, chibai hon buksak in.
Erasta Korinth khua ah a om gige a, Trophimas bel Melita khua ah damlou in ka nusia hi.
Phalbi ma in hongpai teitei in, Iubalate, Pudente, Lina te, Khlodia te leh unau tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi.
Toupa Jesu Khrist na kha kiang ah om hen.
Hehpihna na kiang ah om hen. Amen.
Paul, Pathian sikha leh Jesu Khrist sawltak, Pathian mitelte, a ginna uh lamtou ding leh Pathian limsakna toh kithuah thutak theisak ding a sem in;
huai tangtawn hinna lametna a kinga, Pathian zuaugen theilou in khovel omma a a chiam ahi.
Himahleh amah huntak ah thugenna zang in a thu a hihlangta, huai thugenna Pathian i Hondampa thupiak bangzel a kepsak ka hi.
Titas, ginna kibang a keimah tapa kiang ah: Pathian leh Khrist Jesu i Hondampa kiang a kipan hehpihna, zahngaihna leh lemna om hen.
Hiaiziakin ahi huai Kret tuikulha nang k’on nutsiat, thilhih zohlouhte na hihzoh theihna ding leh thu k’on piak bang a, khua teng a upate na seh theihna ding in.
Upa ding gensiatbei, Zi khat nei, tate Pathian gingta, nawpsak bawlluatna lamsanga gensiat lawhlou, dan banglou a omlou, nei a hih peuhmah uleh,
Saptuam heutu Pathian sumkempa a hih ziak in gensiatbei a hih ding ahi; migenhak, lunggam, uain khamhat, mivuak hat, punna nina huaiham mi hi ding hilou ahi.
Mi kipahpih dan siam, hoihlam deih, lungsim diktak, midiktat, misiangthou, kidekthei mi hizaw ding ahi.
A sinsa thuhilhna dik midang sinsakthei leh selhatmite siamlouh tangsak thei ding a sinsaka om thugin muanhuai lenkip mi ahi ding hi.
Dan banglou a om, thu mawk gengen leh mikhem ching mi tampi, a bikin zeksumte lak a mi a om uhi.
Huai mite kam humsak ding ahi, punna nin deih ziak a thuhilhlouh ding hilh in, mite a inkuan kuan un a pisia uhi.
Amau lak a mi a zawlnei khat in houh,
“Kret tuikulh a mite zuautheite,
gamsa giloute, thadah,
anhaite ahi uh” a chi hi.
Hiai theihpihna a dik ahi. Huaiziak in ginna a a dik theihna ding un leh,
Judate tangthu phuahtawmte a kisubuailou ding leh thutak nungngatsan nakte thupiak a limsaklouhna ding un naktakin taihilh in.
Misiangthoute ading in bangkim a siangthou hi; himahleh mi nin leh gingloute ading in siangthou a omkei hi, a lungsim uh a sialehpha theihna uh leng a nin hi.
Pathian thei a kichi ua, himahleh a thilhih un a nawlkhin nak uhi, kihhuaite, thumangloute, thil hoih sepding peuhmah a Pathian deihlouhte ahi uhi.
Nang zaw thuhilhna hoih toh kituak thugen in.
Putekte kidekthei, zahtakhuai, lungsim hoihtak, ginna leh itna leh kuhkalna a diktak hi ding in hanthawn in.
Pitekte leng huchibang in, siangthouna toh kimeh, khohei a zahdan siam ding leh heh hatlou, uain hailou, thilhoihte zilsakte hizaw ding in hanthawn in.
Nungak deuhte tuh a pasalte uh leh a tate uh it ding leh lungsim hoihtak pu a om ding a a hilhtheihna ding un,
Pathian thu gensiat a a omlouhna ding in theisiamtak a kithununthei, beven lou, amau inn sung kem hiathiat, chingkam leh a pasalte thuthu a om ding a a thuhilh theihna ding in.
Huai bang in, tangvalte lungsim hoihtak pu ding in thuhilh in.
Thil bangkim a thil hoih hihlama etton ding in kibawl inla: na thugin sinsakna ah diktatna, chihtakna leh,
Gensiat vuallouh paukamte langsak lechin a leh lam a nang hondemte’n nang tungtang thu a thusia gen ding neilou a a zum theihna ding un.
Sikhate, a pute uh sellou a thuthu a om ding leh bangkim a a kipahna ding ua om ding in thuhilh in.
Pathian i hondampa thuhilhna thu bangkim a a kilawmsak theihna ding un, khut them neilou ding, muanhuai a na hoih tengteng hihlang zaw ding in sinsak in.
Mitengteng kiang ah hotdamna hontun in i Pathian hehpihna a hongtungta hi.
Pathian limsaklouhna leh khovel duhgawlna tawpsan in, tulai khovel ah kidek leh diktattak leh Pathian limsak in i om ding uh chih theisak in.
Lametna kipahhuai, i Pathian thupi leh Hondampa Jesu Khrist thupina kilakna ngak in.
Aman tatlekna tengteng lak a kipan in a hontat theihna ding in leh chitel tuam, thil hoih hih a phatuamngai, amah ading a a hih siangthou theihna ding in i sik in a kipeta hi.
Thuneitakin huai thute hilh inla, hanthawn inla, taihilh in. Kuamah in nang hon musit kei uhen.
Vaihawmte leh thuneite nuai a kitahluta thumang ding leh thil hoih chiteng sem ding a mansa a om ding in sinsak in.
Kuamah gensiat louh ding dan, vuallemtak a om ding dan, mitengteng lak a thunuailutna chiteng hihlang a, nunnem ding in amaute theikhe thaksak nawn in.
Ei leng nidanglai in mihai, thumanglou, khem a om, utna leh kipahna chiteng sem, gilou leh hazat hata om, kihhuai, leh kihawtuahte i hi uhi.
Himahleh Pathian, i hondampa migitdan leh mihing tung a a itdan a hong kilat lai in,
Diktatna a i thilhihte ziak hilou, a chitna ziak a pianthakna a sawp in leh Kha Siangthou a thaksakna in eite a hon hondamta hi.
Huai Kha Siangthou Jesu Khrist i Hondampa ziak in nakpitak in i tung ah a sungbawta hi,
Huchi a a hehpihna a siamtansaka om in, lametna a tangtawn hinna gouluahte i hihtheihna ding in.
Hiai thugen a dik ahi. Hiai thilte na phut chiltel k’on deih hi, huchi a Pathian gingta sate’n thil hoih hih ding a a pilvan theihna ding un; hiaite mihingte ading in a hoih in a phatuam uhi.
Himahleh dotna haihuai, khangthu suina, kiselna, danthu a kilaina nungngatsan in; huaite thil phatuamlou leh bangmahlou ahi.
Ginna tuam neimi zaw khatvei nihvei hilh nung in deih ken.
Huchibang mi a lampial in a gilou ahi chih na thei uh, amah mah siamlouh a kitangsak ahi.
Artema hiam, Taikika hiam, na kiang a k’on sawl chiang in, Nikopoli khua ah ka kiang ah hongpai teitei in; hiai mun a phalbi zat ka tum hi.
Dansiam, Zenas leh Apollos a zinna ua bangkim a taksap louhna ding un, phatuamngaitak in na panpih un.
I mite’n leng a taksap khawktakte uh a suktuah theihna ding un, leh gahlou a a omlouhna ding un thil hoih hih a kuhkal ding in zil uhen.
Ka kiang a om tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi. Ginna a kei hon itte chibai hon buksak in. Na vek ua kiang ah hehpihna om hen, Amen.
Paul, Khrist Jesu hentapa leh i unaupa Timothi in, ka deihtak leh ka sepgimpih uh Philemon kiang leh,
Ka sanggamnu uh Apphia kiang ah, ka sepaihpih uh Arkipas kiang leh na inn a saptuam kikhawmte kiang ah leng;
Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Khrist kiang a kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Ka thumnate ah na minlou gige in, ka Pathian kiang ah kipahthu ka gen hi;
Toupa Jesu lam leh misiangthou tengteng lam a itna leh ginna na neih za in.
Na ginna ki koppihna, noumau a om thil hoih chiteng theihkimna lam ah Khrist lam a a hong phattuam theihna ding in.
Unaupa aw, nangmah ziak a misiangthoute lungtang a hong halhtak ziak in na itna ah ka kipakin ka kha a muang mahmah hi.
Huaiziak in a kilawm hun hih ding in nang thu honpiak Khrist ah kingap mah leng,
Itna ziak in, Paul putek hial ka hi a, tun ah Khrist Jesu hentapa ka hita a, a nget in k’on ngenzaw hi:
Ka ta Onesima, kolbun kawm a ka neihkhiak, amah a ding in na kiang ah ka ngetsak hi.
Tuma lam in nang ading in a phatuam kei a, tun zaw kei leh nang ading in a phatuamta hi.
Amah, ka lungtang mahmah na kiang ah k’on sawlkik nawn hi.
Amah Tanchinhoih a ka kolbutna a nangmah sik a nna a hon sepsak theihna ding in ka kiang a omsak nilouh ka ut mahmah hi.
Himahleh na hehpihna hehpihsak teitei bang hilou in, na thu bang ahihtheih zawkna ding in, na thulou in bangmah hih ka ut kei hi.
Sawtloukal nang a honkhen tangtawn a amah na neih tawntungna ding ziak ahikha mai ding hi,
Himahleh sikha bang hi nawnlou a, sikha sang a hoih unau deihtak bang zaw in; kei ading in deihtak a hituama, nang ading ngial in sa leh Toupa ah nak hihna in chia!
Huchi in, lawma n’on sim leh keimah bang in amah na kipahpihin.
Huan na tung a banghiam a hihkhelh a, na thil banghiam a bat leh keimah bat in bawl in.
Kei Paul in keima khut ngei a ka gelh ahi. Keimah in ka ditsak ding hi; ka kiang a nangma’n leng bat na neihsam dan honhilh zaw ka hi kei hi.
Ahi, unaupa aw, nangmah ziak in Toupa ah ka kipahna hon neisak inla, Khrist ah leng ka lungtang hihhalh in.
Ka gen sang a thupizaw tham in na hih ding chih ka theih ziak in, n’on man gingta in na kiang ah ka gelh ahi.
Abang abang hileh, huai kia hihlou in, tunna ding hon na suktuah sak in; na thumnate uh ziak in na kiang ua piak ka hi ding chih ka kigingta hi.
Epaphras, Khrist Jesu a ka hentakpih pa’n chibai a honbuk hi:
Huchi mah bang in ka seppih Mark, Aristarkhas, Demas, leh Luke te’n leng chibai a honbuk uhi.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na kha uah om hen, Amen.
Pathian, nidanglai a pi leh pute kiang a seh tampi leh lam chiteng a zawlneite zang a thu na gen pa’n,
Tu hun nanung ah eite kiang ah a Tapa in thu a hon genta hi. Huai mi bangkim gouluahpa ding in a siam a, huai mi mah in khovel a siam hi.
Amah ah a thupina vak leh a tak batpih leh, amah thilhihtheihna a bangkim tungdingpa hi in, i khelhnate sianna a bawlkhit nung in tunglam a thupipen taklam ah a va tuta hi.
Angelte sang a min ngaihzaw a muh bang in amau sang a thupizaw a na hi him hi.
Angelte lak ah kua kiang ah hiai thute a gen ngei a?
“Nang zaw ka Tapa na hi a,
tuni in k’on neikhia” chih leh
“Amah ding in Pa ka hidia,
amah kei ding in Tapa ahi ding”
Huan a ta neihsun khovel a a pilut lai in,
“Pathian angelte tengteng in leng amah chibai buk uhen,” a chi hi.
Huan angelte tungtang thu ah,
Aman zaw a angelte huih in a suaksak a,
a nasemte leng meikuang in a suaksak chi in a gen hi.
Tapa tungthu ah bel:
“Pathian aw,
na mangtutphah tangtawn in a om ding hi;
dikna kumpi chiang leng na gam kumpi chiang ahi chi in a gen hi.
Diktatna na it a, tatlekna na hua a; huaiziak in Pathian,
na Pathian in na lawmte sang in nang kipahna thau a hon nak nilh hi.”
Huan nang,
“Toupa, a tung in leilung kingakna na phumkhin a,
Van leng na khutsuak ahi;
Huaite a hong mangthang ding
ua, nang bel om tawntung ding na hi;
huaite tengteng puansilh bang in a honglui ding ua,
Puan bang in na zial ding a,
puansilh banglel in a hong lamdang ta dia; nang bel a ngeingei na hiden a,
na kumte leng a mang kei ding hi,” chi in.
Himahleh Angelte tungthu ah hiai a a gen ngei hia?
“Na melmate na khepek ngakna a ka bawl masiah ka taklam ah tu in chih”
Angelte tengteng nasepna khate, hotdamna gouluah dingte adia nasem ding a sawlkhiak ahi kei ua hia?
Huaiziak in bil a i zakte phatuamngai tak in i khawksa nawn sem ding uhi, huchilou in zaw i tolhmangsak kha zenzen ding uhi.
Angelte zang a thugen nangawn a kip a, tatlekna leh thumanlouhna chiteng in thukna diktathuaitak a muhzel ngal un,
Huchitel a hotdamna thupi ngeingaih keileng bangchi’n ahia i suahtak theih mahmah ding? Huai hotdamna thu a tung a Toupa zang a genkhit ahi a, a zate’n hon na hih kipsak uhi.
Pathian in leng chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte leh thilhihtheihna chiteng toh, amah deih bangzel a Kha Siangthou thilhawmte toh, amaute a theihpih hi.
Khovel hongom ding a tanchin i gen uh, angelte nuai ah a koih kei hi.
Himahleh mi kuahiam in koilai hiam ah hiai thu gen in a theisak hi;
“Mihing bang a tel a, na theihgige?
Mihing tapa leng bang ahia, na vehnak?”
“Amah angelte sang a nuai in na bawl a;
thupina leh pahtawina na khusak a, na khutsuak tung ah heutu in na bawl hi;”
A khe nuai ah bangkim na koih a, chi in.
Huchi in bangkim a nuai a a koih ziak in a nuai a koihlouh bangmah a neikei hi. Himahleh tun ah zaw bangkim a nuai a om in i mu nai tadih kei uhi.
Himahleh Jesu angelte sang a niamzaw deuh a a bawl takdih tuh, sihna thuak in thupina leh pahtawina khuksak a om in i mu zaw ahi, Pathian hehpihna ziak in sihna michih a chiamsak ding ahi.
Amah a ding leh amah ziak a bangkim omsakpa’n tapa tampi thupina a pilut a, a thuakna ziak a amaute hotdamna makaipa bukim hih amah a dia kilawm him ahi.
Hihsiangthoupa leh hihsiangthoute avek un mi khat a pawt ahi uhi. Huaiziak in aman amaute unaute, chih a zum kei hi.
“Ka unaute kiang ah na min ka gen dia;
omkhawmte lak ah lasa in k’on phat ding” chi in.
Huan, “Amah ah ka ginna ka nga
dia, a chi nawn hi.
Huan en dih ua kei leh
Pathian honpiak tate” a chi nawn lai hi.
Huchi in naupangte sa leh sisan tangte a hihchiat ziak un, amah ngei in huai bangmah a tangsam hi; a sihna a sihna thuneipa, Diabol, a hih manthat theihna ding leh,
Sih kihtak ziak a damsung sikha a omte tengteng a suahtaksak theihna ding in.
A awlmoh a, a panpih zelte angelte ahi kei ua, Abraham suante ahizaw uhi.

Huchi in mite ading a khelhna thuphatawina bawlsak ding in, Pathian lam ah siampu lianpen, mi lainatthei leh muanhuaitak a hihtheihna ding in, bangkim a unaute bang a hongom amah adin a kiphamoh him ahi.
Amah ngei in khemna tuak a a na thuaktak ziak in khemna tuakte a panpih thei ahi.
Huchi in unau siangthou, van sapna tangsamte aw, i thugin toh kisai a Sawltak leh siampu Lian, Jesu ngaihtuah un.
Pathian inkuante tengteng lak ah Mosi a muanhuai mah bang in, amah a seppa lak ah a muanhuai hi.
Inn sung a papen a inkuante sang a a pahtawi zawk bang un, amah Mosi sang a thupi zawk semna mu dia kilawm a seh ahita hi.
Inkuan chih in papen kuahiam a neichiat ngal uhi; bangkim papen bel Pathian ahi.
Huan huai nung a thugenlai dingte theihsakna ding in, Mosi Pathian inkuante tengteng lak a nasempa in zaw a muanhuai ngei hi.
Khrist bel Pathian inkuante tung a Tapa in a muanhuai hi. A tawptan a i hangsanna leh i lametna suanna kiptak a i vomhoih phot leh a inkuante eite i hi uhi.
Huchi in Kha Siangthou gen bang in,
“Tuni a a aw na zak chiang un,
Gamdai a ze-etna ni a a hel bang un,
na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un;
Huailai ah na pi leh pute un hon ze-et in a honkhem ua,
kum sawmli sung a ka thilhihte a mu uhi;
Huchi in huai suante tung ah ka lung hita kei a,
‘a lungtang un a ngaihtuah khial gige ua,
ka lampite leng a theikei uhi,’ ka chi hi,
Ka thangpaihna a ka kichiam bang in ka khawlna ah a lut kei ding uh,” chi in.
Unaute aw pilvang un, huchilou in zaw Pathian hing tawpsan ding in na lak uah kuapeuh sung ah ginlouhna lungtang gilou a hongom kha ding hi.
“Tuni” a chih lai un niteng in ki hanthawn tuah zaw un, huchi a na lak ua mi kuamah khelhna khemhat ziak a hihkhauh a na omlouhna ding un,
I ginna kipatna pen a tawptan a kiptak a i vomhoih phot leh, Khrist a tanneite i hita uhi.
“Tuni in a aw na zak chiang un a hellai bang un,
na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un,” a ki chih lai teng.
Ahihleh kuate ahi ua theinapi a helte? Aigupta a kipan a Mosi pipawt tengteng hilou uhia?
Kuate tung ah ahia, kum sawmli sung a lunghihlouh? Hihkhialte a luang uh gamdai a pukmangte tung ah hilou hia?
Thumangloute kiang ah kia loungal kua kiang ah ahia a khawlna a lutlou ding a a kichiam?
Huchi in ginlahna ziak in a lut theita kei uh chih i thei uhi.
Huaiziak in i lau ding uh, huchilou in zaw a khawlna a lutna thuchiam omlai napi, na lak ua kuapeuh chinglou in na omkha zenzen ding uhi.
Amau kiang a gen a hihbang in Tanchinhoih i kiang ua gen ahi ngal a; himahleh a thuzak uh amaute’n a phattuampih kei uh, a zate toh ginna a a kizomlouh ziak un.
Ei gingta khinte huai khawlna ah i lut lellel uhi,
Ka thangpaihna a ka kichiam bang in ka khawlna ah a lutkei hial ding uh,
a chih bang in;
leilung pian tung a kipan nate tuh sepzoh a hikhinta hi.
Koilai mun hiam ah ni sagih ni thu hichibang in a gen hi: Huan “Ni sagih ni’n Pathian in a nasep tengteng a khawlsanta” chi in.
Huan hiai mun ah, “Ka khawlna ah a lut kei ding uh,” a chi nawn hi.
Huchi in ni dang a Tanchinhoih za masate thumanlouh ziak in lut kei mahle uh, khenkhatte huai khawlna a a lutna ding ua thuchiam a omlai ziak a lutlai ding a om uhi,
Hun sawttak nung in David ah a ma a kigensa bang in bang ni hiam a septuan nawn hi.
“Tuni a aw na zak chiang un na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un chi in.”
Joshua in amaute na khawlsakta hilehzaw, huai nung in ni tuam dang thu gen a ngai kei ding hi.
Huchi in Pathian mite ading in khawlni a khawlna a omlai hi.
Pathian in amah nasepte a khawlsan bang in, a khawlna a lut khinsa mi’n leng a nasepte a khawlsan samta hi.
Huchi in kuamah huai thumanlouhna bang a om a i puk louhna ding un huai khawlna a lut ding in phatuam i ngai ding uhi.

Pathian thu a hinga, thil ahihthei a, namsau hiam tuah bangchibang sang in a hiam a, hinna leh kha, guhlawi leh guhngek tuamkhen hel khop in a sunthei a, lungtang a ngaihtuah leh tupte a theipah thei hi.
huaiziak in thilsiam amah mitmuh a langlou himhim a omkei; I tanchin tutna dingpa mitmuh ah bangkim vuaktang leh kihongsa ahi.
Hichi in van mun a paisuak khinsa siampu lianpen thupitak, Jesu Pathian Tapa, i neih ziak in i thugin i pomkip ding uhi.
Siampu Lianpen i hatlouh kitheihnate hon theihpih phalou nei i hi kei ua; eimah bang a lam tuamtuama khemna tuaksa, khelh bel khiallou, nei i hi zaw uhi.
Huchi in zahngaihna i muh theihna ding leh huh i deih chiang a huhna hehpihna i ngah theihna ding in, hehpihna mangtutphah hangtak in i naih ding uhi.
Siampu Lianpen peuhmah mihingte sik leh tang a khelhnate ziak a thilpiak leh kithoihnate Pathian kiang a lankhawm ding a mihing lak a kipan telkhiak leh mihingte adia Pathian seh ahi uhi:
Huaite’n amau ngei leng hatlouhna a tuam a omsam a hih ziak un, bangmah theiloute leh lamhaihte tung ah zahngaihna a neithei uhi.
Huaiziak tak in mite ading a a latsak bang un, amau ading ngei leng khelhnate ziak in lanlou theilou ahi uhi.
Huan huai pahtawina Aron bang a Pathian sap a hih ngal kei uleh kuamah amau a kipe ngeikei uhi.
Huchibang in Khrist leng siampu Lianpen a bawl ding in amah a kihihthupi kei a,
“Nang zaw ka Tapa na hi a,
tuni’n, k’on neikhia hi” chi a a kiang a genpa’n a hih thupizawta hi;
Mun dang a a gen bang in:
“Nang zaw, Melkizedek omdan bang a Tangtawn siampu na hi” a chi hi.
Aman sa a put laini in, sihna lak a amah hondam theipa kiang ah nakpitak a kikou leh khitui kekawm in thumnate leh ngetnate a lan a, a kihtakdan a siamzel ziak in ngaihkhiak in a om hi.
Ta hilhial himahleh a thilthuakte ah thuman a zil hi.
Huchi in hih bukim a hongom in, a thumangte peuhmah ading in tangtawn a hotdamna bulpi a hong hita hi.
Melkizedek omdan bang a siampu lianpen in Pathian in a bawlta hi.
Huai mi tanchin ahihleh gen ding tampi i nei ua, genchet leng a haksa, na bil uh a ngontak ziak in.
A hun ngaihtuah in zaw heutu hikhinta hial le uchin kilawm hiven, Pathian thubulte hilh kiphamoh nawn neive ua, an gum hilou nawitui kiphamoh n’ong hita uhi.
Nawitui ne peuhmah in diktatna thu ah theihna a neikei ua, naungek a hih ziak un.
An gum piching ading ahi, huaite’n a zat gige ziak un sialehpha theichian ding in a theihtheihnate uh a sin zongsangta uhi.
Huchi in Khrist thubulte gen nawnlou in pichin lam i manoh ding uh; thilhih sisate kisikna, Pathian lam a ginna,
baptisma leh khutngak leh misi thohnawnna leh tangtawn vaihawmna lam thuhilhnate suangphum phum nawnlou in.
Pathian in pha a sakleh huai bang i hih ngei ding uhi.
Khatvei hihvak a omkhin a, van thilpiak chiamta, Kha Siangthou dawngkhin a,
Pathian thu hoihna leh hun hongom ding a thilhihtheihnate chiamkhin hinapi,
Ginna a kihei mangsan ua leh huchibang mite zaw a kisikna ding ua bawlthak theih ahi kei uhi; Pathian Tapa amau ading a kilhlum tuan nawn a selphou a hih ziak un.
Lou, a tung ua vuahtui ke gige na dawnkhin a, huai khohsak a ompa adia nektheih anteh louhing honsuah pen in Pathian vualzawlna a tang hi.
Himahleh loulingnei leh khaulingnei a suahnak inbel a phatuam kei a; hamsiat in a om ding a, a tawpna haltum ahi ding hi.
Himahleh deihtakte aw, huchibang thu gen mahleng nouzaw huai thil sang a hoihzaw hotdamna toh kizui thilte nei na hih uh ka um uhi.
A min ziak a itna a nna nasep uleh misiangthoute nna na sepsak uh na latsak uh leh tutan a leng nasep lai uh mangngilh ding in Pathian mitak lou ahi kei hi.
Himahleh a tawptan a lametna theihchetna kim mu ding in na thanop ngeingei bang un thanop suah gige chiat le uchin ka chi uhi.
Huchi in na ki thadahsak kei ding ua, ginna leh kuhkalna ziak a thuchiamte gouluah khin khawngte entonte na hi zaw ding uhi.
Pathian in Abraham kiang a thu a chiam lai in, amah sang a thupizaw lou a a kichiam theihlouh ziak in, amah leh amah kilou in a kichiam hi,
Taktak in k’on vualzawl ngeingei ding a, hih leng k’on hihpung ding chi in a kichiamta hi.
Huchi in kuhkaltak a a thuakkhiak nung in, thilchiam a muta hi.
Mihingte zaw a sang ua thupilou zaw in a kichiam ua; a kiselna chiteng uah leng hihkipna ding in kichiam tuh thutawp ahi.
Huchi in Pathian in a thiltup hihlamdan tuan theihlouh dan nakpi mahmah a theihsak ut in thuchiam gouluah dingte kiang ah kichiamna a palai sak hi;
Pathian thugen zuauthei vual a hihlouhna ah thil kikhek lamdang theilou nihte ziak in, i ma a lametna koih lenkip ding a bitna ding a amah delhte’n hanthawnna thupitak i neih theihna ding in ahi.
Huai lametna hinna sikkip in i nei ua, muanhuai leh kiptak ahi, huai lametna puanzak sung ah leng a lutta hi;
I ma a na paita Jesu, Mun Siangthou pen ah i makaipa a a luttak man in Melkizedek omdan bang a ei ding in tangtawn a siampu lianpen a na hita hi.
Hiai “Melkizedek, Salem kumpipa, Tungnungpen siampu, Abraham kumpipate that hongpai na dawn a vualzawlpa ahi.”
Abraham in “Bangkim ah Sawm a khat” a pia hi. A minkhiakna genchian in a masapen in “Diktatna Kumpipa,” a zom nawn in “Salem Kumpipa” a hinawn a; “Lemna Kumpipa” chihna ahi.
Amah pa neilou in, nu neilou in, khangthu bei, ompatni neilou hintawpni leng nei samlou in, Pathian Tapa bang a siam tangtawn a siampu hi gige ahizaw hi.
Huchi in suangtu, Abraham in a gallak hoih peuhmah lak a Sawm a khat a piakna pa, huai mipa thupi dan ngaihtuah un.
Levi suante lak a siampu nna tang peuhmah in dan bang in mite lak ah Sawm a khat lak ding thu a unaute uh lak ah a mu uhi, huaite Abraham khal a pawt hisam mahle u leng.
Himahleh a lak ua a suante suikhawmsak samlouh pa’n Abraham lak ah Sawm a khat a la a, thuchiamte kempa a vualzawlta hi.
Himahleh sel vuallouh in a neuzaw tuh a lianzaw vualzawl sak in a om hi.
Huan hiai ah mihing sizel te’n Sawm a khat a mu ua, huai ah bel, a hing gige pen chi a a thu a theisak in a mu hi.
Levi, Sawm a khat lazelpa nangawn in Abraham khut ah Sawm a khat a peta, chih theih ahi;
Melkizedek in a nadawn lai in a pa khal ah a omlai hi.

Huchi in Levi te’n siampu hihna ziak a bukimna muhtheih na hileh huai nuai ah mite’n danthu a na mu ngal ua, Aron omdan bang hilou a Melkizedek omdan bang a siampu dang hongom bang kiphamoh ding ahia?
Siampu hihna a hong kilamdan ziak in dan leng hihlamdan sam a hong kiphamoh hi.
Hiai a thugenpa nam tuammi ahi ngal a, huai nam lak a a kuamah maitam ah a gamtang ngeikei uhi.
I Toupa, Juda nam lak a hongsuak ahi chih a kichian hi: Huai nam thu ah Mosi in siampute lam thu bangmah a genkei hi.
Melkizedek bang a tangtawn siampu dang hongsuahna in nakpitak in i thugen a chiangsak nawnsem hi;
Amah khangthu dan leh Dan thupiak ziak a siampu hilou in, hin tawpneilou leh thil hihtheihna bang zaw in siampu a honghi.
“Nang zaw, Melkizedek omdan bang a tangtawn siampu na hi”
chih theihsak ahi.
A hatlouh leh a phattuamlouhna ziak in thupiak om masa paihkhiak ahi.
Dan in bangmah a hih bukimlouh ziak in Pathian in lametna hoihzaw hon lalut in huai pansan in amah i naih theita uhi.
Huan kichiamna tellou a amah siampu a bawl a hi kei hi:
Siampu dangte zaw kichiamlou a siampu a bawl ahi ua;
Jesu bel, nang zaw tangtawn siampu na hi chi in, Toupa
a kichiam hi, ka khelkik kei ding chi a a kiang a
genpa khut ah a kichiam hi:
Huchitak a thupi in Jesu thukhun hoihzaw hihkippa a hong hita hi.
Huan siampu tampi a na omtak ziak bel amaute a sizel ua, kuamah omden theilou a hih ziak uh ahi.
Hiai mi bel tangtawn a omden a hih ziak in, a siampu hihna khentheih vuallouh a nei zaw hi.
Huchi in amah tawn a Pathian kiang a hongpaite a tawpdong in a hondam thei hi, amaute thumsak a tangtawn a a hin gige ziak in ahi.
Huchibang siampu lianpen, misiangthou, zulhzau lou, ninbanglou, khialte lak a omtuam, vante sang a tungnung zaw a siam eite a a hong hita hi.

Aman siampu lianpen dangte lat bang in, niteng in amah khelh ziak a kithoihna lan masa phot a, huai nung a mite khelhna kithoihna a lat a kiphamoh kei hi; Amah a kilat laitak in setden ding in khatvei a na lankhinta hi.
Dan in mihing hatlouhna neite, siampu lianpen ding in a sep a; himahleh tua kichiam thu, dan nung a hongom in, Tapa mahmah tangtawn siampu ding a hihkim khitsa a sep zawta hi.
Huchi in i thugente lak a poimawh pen hiai ahi: Vanmun a Thupipen mangtutphah taklam a vatu Siampu lianpen neite i hi uhi.
Amah Mun Siangthou leh biakbuk taktak, mihing lam hilou, Toupa lam zaw a nasempa i nei uhi.
Siampu Lianpen peuhmahte thilpiak leh kithoihnate lan ding a seh ahi ua; huchi in hiai siampu lianpen in banghiam bek latding neih a kiphamoh hi.
Amah leitung a omlai hile zaw, dan bangzel a thilpiakte lan ding omkhinta a hih ziak un, siampu hilou ding ahi.
Amaute’n vanlam thilte etsakna’n a lim nna a sem uhi. Mosi biakbuk lam dia a kisaklai in Pathian hilh a om in, “Mualtung a etton ding k’on etsak bang a biakbuk lam ding in pilvang in” a chi hi.
Tun bel thuchiam hoihzaw tung a kinga thukhun hoihzaw adia nasem palai a hih bang in, nasepna hoihzaw a na tangta hi.
Thukhun masa dembei na hileh, a nihna hongom kullou ding ahi.
Amaute dem in hiai thute a gen hi, “Ngai in, nite a hongtung dek, Toupa’n a chi, huai ni chiang in Israel inkuante leh Judah inkuante kiang ah thukhun thak ka bawl ding:”
“A pi leh pute uh
Aigupta gam a kipan a pikhe ding a a khut ka let ni a
a kiang ua ka khun bang hilou in;
ka thukhun ah a om gige kei uhi,
huchi in amau ka limsakta kei,”
Toupa’n a chi hi.
“Huai ni zoh chiang in Israel
inkuante kiang a thu ka khun ding hiaite ahi,
Toupa’n a chi:
A lungsim uah ka thupiakte ka koih dia,
a lungtang uah ka gelh nalai dia,
huan amau ading in Pathian ka hidia, kei adin amaute ka mite ahi ding uhi;
Huan michih in Toupa thei in,
chi in amah inveng leh amah unau a thuhilhta kei ding uhi;
a neupen a kipan in a lianpen tan in avek un a hon theichiat ding uhi.
A tatleknate uah ka zahngai dia,
a khelhnate uleng ka theigige
nawnta kei ding hi” chi in.
Thukhun thak chi a a gen ziak in amasa zat nawnlouh ding in a luisakta hi. Huchi in a luita zattaklou mangpah thei ahita hi.
Huchi in thukhun masa in leng Pathian nasepna a zuihding thukhun leh lei a bawl Mun Siangthou leng a nei hi.
Biakbuk a lam ua, pindan tuah masak ah khawnvak koihna mung, dohkan leh tanghou koihna a om hi; huai tuh Mun Siangthou a chi uhi.
Puanzak nihna ban ah biakbuk, Mun Siangthou pen a chih uh a om hi.
Huai sung ah dangkaeng gimlim halna bawm leh thukhun bawm dangkaeng a kiluan a om hi, huai thukhun bawm sung ah Manna omna dangkaeng bel, Aron chiang selthei leh thukhun gelhna suangpek a om hi;
A tunglam ah zahngaihna tutphah liah in, thupina Cherubte a om ua; huaite tuin zaw a kim sipsip in i gen theikei ding uh.
Huai thilte huchibanga bawl a na hi ua, siampute’n Pathian nasem in, biakbuk tuah masak ah a lutzel uhi;
Pindan sungnungpen bel siampu lianpen kia in kumtenga khatvei sisan tawi in a lut hi; amah khelhna ading leh mite khelhna ading in a lanzel hi.
Kha Siangthou in hon theihsak nop bel, ‘biakbuk masa a din laiteng Mun Siangthoua luttheihna lampi a kilang nai tadih kei’ a chihna ahi;
Biakbuka thilpiak leh kithoihna kilan zelte’n a bemite sialehpha theihna a siangsak theikei chih tu hun a eite hon etsakna ahi.
Huaite nek leh dawn, kisilna dan tuamtuamte, a taktak bawlhoihna hongtun ma a kizang salam thilte ahi.
Himahleh Khrist bel thil hoih hongom dingte siampu lianpen ding a hongpai in, khut a lamlouh biakbuk thupizaw leh bukim zaw sung ah a lut hi, huai thilsiamte lak a ahi kei chihna ahi,
Aman ei ading a tangtawn tatkhiakna ngahkhin in, kel leh bawngpate sisan hilou, amah sisan mahmah tawi in khatvei a setden ding in Mun Siangthou pen sung ah a lutta hi.
Kel leh bawngpate sisan leh, bawngla vu, mi nin tung a theh in bawn sa siangkhopa a hih siangthou leh,
Khrist, tangtawn Kha ziak a gensiatbeia Pathian kiang a kilan sisan in, Pathian hing nasem ding in na sialehpha theihna uh thilhih sisa apan nak hihsiangthou natel inchia!

Hiaiziakin amah thukhun thak palai a honghi a, sapte’n tangtawn a gouluah ding thuchiam a tan theihna ding un thukhun masa nuai a tatleknate lak a kipan hon tankhe ding in amah hong sita hi chihna ahi.
Thusiah omna peuh ah a siahmi sihna leng a om teitei ding ahi.
Mi a sih nung un thusiah in thu a nei nak hi, a siahmi a damlai teng bel thu a neikei hi.
Huchi in thukhun masa leng sisan lou in a hihkip kei uhi.
Dan thupiak peuhmah Mosi in mipi tengteng kiang a a phuan nung in, bawngnoute leh kelte sisan tui, samulkhau sandup leh hussopin a la a, laibu leh mipi tengteng a theh hi,
Huai Pathian in na kiang ua a namkip thukhun sisan ahi, chi in.
Huailou leng biakbuk leh nasepna van tengteng huchi mah bang in sisanin a thehsamta hi.
Huan dan in sisan a bangkim hihsiangthou a ngiat bang in, sisan suaklou in ngaihdamna himhim a omkei hi.
Huai thilte van a om batpih laksawnte huaite a hihsiangthou a om ding him uh ahi; van thiltaktakte bel huai sang a kithoihna hoihzawte a hih siangthou a om ding ahi.
Khrist khut a lam Mun Siangthou, a tak batpih ah a lut ngalkei a; tun ah Pathian ma ah i sikua ding ding in van ah a lut zawta hi.
Himahleh siampu lianpen kumtenga amah sisan lou, sisan tawikawma Mun Siangthou a lutzel bang in, amah kilan ding a van a lut ahi kei hi;
Huchi hikeileh leilung piantung a kipan tam veipi a thuakta ding hi; himahleh tulai huntawp ah amah kithoihna pansan a khelhna hihmang ding in khatvei in setden din amah a honglangta hi.
Huan mihing ading in khatvei sih seh ahi, huai nung in vaihawmna a om ding hi:
Huchi mah bang in Khrist leng mitampi khelhnate paipih ding a khatvei latkhit a om in, hotdamna mu ding a amah ngakte kiang ah khelhna panglou in nihveina ah a honglang nawn ding hi.
Dan bel thil hoih hongom ding lim kia ahihziakin, a taktak lohkhiakna neilou in, kumtenga kithoihna ngeingei a latzelte un, a be ding a hongpaite bangchi mah in a bukimsak thei ngeikei hi.
Huchi kei leh lat tawp thamta lou ding uhia? A bemite khatveia hihsiangthou pah hileh khelhna kitheihna a nei nawn kei ding uhi.
Himahleh huai kithoihna ah kumteng in khelhnate theihnawnna a hongom nak hi.
Bawngpa leh kelte sisan in khelhnate lamang theivual ahi kei hi.
Huchi in khovel a a honglut lai in:
“Kithoihna leh thillat na deihkei a,
kei ding in pumpi n’on bawlsak zaw hi:”
“Halmanga pumpiaknate leh
khelhna ding a kithoihnate ah
kipahna himhim na neikei hi.
Huaitak in ken “Pathian aw,
Ngai in, Laibuziala ka tungthu gelh ahihbangin na deihlam hih di’n ka hongpai” ka chi hi,
A tung ah “Kithoihnate, thillatte, haltum pumpiaknate, khelhna ding a kithoihnate danbanga lat ahihziakin na deihkei a, amaute ah kipahna na neisam kei” a chi hi,
Huaitak in aman “Ngai in, Pathian aw, na deihlam hih ding in ka hongpai” a chita hi. A nihna a tunding theihna ding in a masapen a lamangta hi.
Huai deihlam in Jesu Khrist pumpi khatvei thu a latpah ziak in, hihsiangthou in i omta hi.
Huan siampu tengteng in kawla nisuak sim a nasem in, khelhnate bangchik maha hihmang theilou kithoihna ngeingei lan gige in ading uhi.
Amah bel tangtawn a ding a khelhnate adia kithoihna khat kia a lat nung in, “Pathian taklam ah a vatu zawta hi.”
Huai nungsiah “A melmate a khepek ngakna a siam a hih masiah uh a ngak nilouh hi.”
Huchi in khatvei thillat in hih siangthousate tangtawn a ding in hih bukimta hi.
Huan Kha Siangthou in eite a hon theihpih sam a, amasa in hiai bang in a gen hi:
“Huai nite khit chiang in a kiang ua ka thukhun ding hiaite ahi, Toupa’n a chi:
A lungtang uah ka thupiakte ka koih dia,
a lungsim uah ka gelh nalai ding chi a a gen khit in,
A khelhnate uh leh a tatleknate uh ka theigige nawn takei ding,” a chi hi.
Huchi in khelhna ngaihdam a hihnung in khelhna ading in thillat a om nawnta kei hi.
Huchi in unaute aw, Jesu sisan ziak a Mun Siangthou a lutngamna nei in,
Lam a hon bawlsak, lam thak leh hing tawn a puanzak sung a luttheihna amah pumpi tawnin i nei uhi.
Pathian inkuante tung a siampu thupitak i neih ziak in,
I lungtang a sialehpha theihna sianglou thehsiansaka om a, i pumpi leng tuichima sil a om in, ginna a theihchetna kim nei in lungtang takmah pu in amah i naih ding uhi.
I lamet thugin linglou in i pomkip ding uh, thuchiampa a muanhuai hi.
Huan itna leh thil hoih hih a kitokthou ding in i kingaihtuah ding uhi.
Khenkhatte hihdan bang a i kikhopnate uh tawpsanlou in, kihanthawn chiatni; ni hongnai hulhul a na theih un kihanthawn tuah sem un.
Thutak theihna kim i tan nung a thil i hihkhelh teitei in zaw, khelhnate adia kithoihna a om taklouh ziak in,
