Vaihawmna lauhuai mulkimhuaitak, doumite kangmang ding thangpaihna mei maban a nei in i om zawta ding hi.
Mosi danthu khawksalou mi “Theihpihtu mi nih hiam thum hiam nuai ah” lainat bei in a si zel uhi.
Pathian Tapa sikdena, thukhun sisan amah hih siangthouna pen thil namai a bawl a, hehpihna Kha hihvuimi, huai mi sang a bangchipheta gawtna thupizaw thuaktakin nasep uhiam?
“Phulakna himhim keimah lak ding ahi, keiman ka thuk ding chih leh Toupa’n a mite a vaihawmsak ding” chi nawnpa lah i thei ngal uhi.
Pathian hing khut a puk thil mulkimhuaitak ahi.
Himahleh tuma lam a hihvak a na om nung ua thuakna buaina thupitak na thuaklai nite uh thei nawn un;
Kongkhat ah zaw muhsit leh haksatna thuak in etnop a bawl in na om ua, kongkhat ah lah huchibanga bawl a omte thuakpihte na honghi uhi.
Kolbunte na lainat ua, gou hoihzaw leh omden ding noumau in na neih uh kithei in na van hon laksakte uh leng kipaktak in nana thuakzou behlap uhi.
Huchi in kipahman piak thupitak ngahna ding na ginna uh paimang kei un.
Pathian deihlam na hihnung un thilchiam na muhtheihna ding un kuhkalna na kiphamoh uhi.
Sawtlou nungchiang a hongpai dingpa, hongpai ding ahi,
sawt a halta kei ding hi.
“Tuin ka mi diktat tuh
ginna in a hing ding;
a nungtolh leh bel ka kha in amah ah kipahna a neikei ding”
chih ahi ngal a.
Himahleh eite zaw mangthang ding a nungtolh pawl a pang i hi kei ua; hinna humbit ding a ginna nei pawl a pang i hi zaw uhi.
Ginna tuh thil lamette omngei a theihtelna leh thil muhlouhte theihchetna ahi.
Huai ah nidanglai upate’n phat a loh uhi.
Ginna in khovelte Pathian thu a suktuah ahita chih i thei ua, huchi in thil muhtheihte leng thil langtheite a siam ahi kei hi.

Ginna in Abel in Kaina sang in kithoihna hoihzaw Pathian kiang ah a lan a, huaiziak in midik hihna a mu chih Pathian in a thilpiakte a pomna ah a theisak hi; huai ginna ziak mah in aman sih nung nangawn in thu a genlai hi.
Ginna in Enok leng sihna chiamlou ding a lakmang in a om a; Pathian in a lakmang ziak in muhtheih ahita kei a; lakmang a a omma in Pathian pahtak lammi ahi chih theihsakna a mukhinta hi.
Himahleh ginna lou in amah pahtak lammi hihvual ahi kei; Pathian kiang a hongpai in, amah a om chih leh a zongmite lohchingsakpa ahi chih gin ding ahi.

Ginna in Noah thil muh nailouhte lamthu ah Pathian hilh a om in, Pathian laudan siam in a inkuan hotdamna ding in long a bawl a; huai in khovel siamlouh a tangsakta hi, ginna ziak a diktatna gouluahpa ahita hi.
Ginna in Abraham sapa a omlai in a gouluah ding mun a lut ding in paikhiakna ding thu a muta hi; a paina ding lam theilou in a paikheta hi.
Ginna in gamchiam ah mi gam a tam bang in a na tam nilouh a, thuchiam kikhat gouluahpih ding Isak leh Jacobte toh puanin ah a om uhi.
Khopi suangphum nei, Pathian gel leh lam a ngak nilouh hi.
Ginna in Sarah ngei in leng a chiampa muanhuai a sak ziak in, a teknung in chi paitheihna a mu hi.
Huchi in pasal khat amah lah misi bang mai, a kipan “Van a aksite bang a tam, tuipiau a piaunel bang a sim zohlouh suangtu” a hongsuakta uhi.

Hiai mi tengtengte’n thilchiamte tangkhin hilou in, himahleh huaite gamlapi a galmuh a na kipahpih hizaw in, lei ah zaw khualzin leh mikhual lel ahi uh chih kithei gige in ginna nei in amaute a sita uhi.
Huchibang a thu na gente’n amau gam ding a zong uh chih a hihlang mahmah uhi.
A pawtsan gam uh lunggulh hile uh bel kiknawnna hunlem mu mahmah ding ahi uhi.
Himahleh tu’n bel gam hoihzaw huai van a ompen deih ahi ua; huchi in Pathian a Pathian uh chih a om a zumkei a; amau ding in khopi khat a bawlsak hi.
Ginna in Abraham tuh ze-et a om in, Isak a lan a; huan thuchiamte kipaktak a sangpan a tapa neihsun a lan hi,
Huai lah “Isak ah na suante a ki minloh ding” a chih pen ahi.
Pathian in misi lak a kipan nangawn kaithou thei in a sep a; huchi in gentehna dan a gen in amah misi lak a kipan mu nawn ahi ngei hi.
Ginna in Isak in thil hongtung dingte thu ah Jakob leh Esau a vualzawl hi.
Ginna in Jakob in, a sih ding kuan in Joseph tate a vualzawl tuaktuaka, “A chiangkhun dawna kingai in Pathian a bia hi.”
Ginna in Joseph in, a sih ding kuan in, Israel suante pawt ding thu a gen a; a guhte vui ding tungtang thu a pia hi.
Ginna in Mosi a pianlai in, naungek melhoih tak ahi a chih ziak un kha thum sung a nu leh a pa sel in a om a; kumpipa thupiak leng a lau kei uhi.
Ginna in Mosi in a hong pichin nung in Pharo tanu tapa a kiloh a utkei a;
Sawtlou kal a dia khelhna nopna kipahpih sang in Pathian mite toh sukgentheih thuak a tel zawta hi.
Khrist a muhsitna uh Aigupta gam goute sang a hauhsakna thupizaw in a ngai a; kipahman piakding a et zel ziak in.
Ginna in kumpipa thangpaihna laulou in Aigupta gam a paisan a , muhtheihlouhpa a muh ziak in a thuak teitei hi.
Ginna in Paikan Ankuangluina leh sisan thehna a bawl a, ta masa hihmangthangpa’n amaute a khoihlouhna ding in.
Ginna in gamhul a pai bang in Tuipi San a kan ua; Aiguptate’n tua bang a hih a tumsam ua, valhzawh in a omta uhi.
Ginna in Jeriko khaw kulh ni sagih a um nung un a chimta hi.
Ginna in Rahab kizuaknu gingloute lak ah a mangthang khawm kei, enkhete im neilou a a pahtak ziak in.
Huan bang ka gen nalai dia? Gideon thute, Barak thute, Samson, Jepthah, leh David thute, Samuel thute, zawlneite thute genni chile hang hun in hon daihlou ding ahi.
Huai mite’n ginna in gam a la ua, thudik a vaihawm a zong ua, thuchiamte a tang ua, humpinelkai kamte a chihsak uhi.
Mei thilhihtheihna a hihmit ua, namsau hiam nangawn a pel ua, hatlouhna a kipan hattaka bawl in a om ua, kidouna ah mihat minthang a na hi ua, namdang kidou pawlte a taikeksak uhi.
Numeite’n a misite uh thounawn a mu ua; khenkhatte gimthuak sak in a om ua, thohnawnna hoihzaw a tan theihna ding un khahkhiakna a deihkei uhi.
Midangte’n leng nuihza bawlna leh vuak a thuak ua, ahi, huailou leng, kolbut leh hentakna a tuak uhi;
Suang a den in a om ua, singatna a attan in a om ua, khemna a tuak ua, namsau a satlup in a om ua; belam vun leh kel vun silh in a vakvai ua; gentheitak a gimthuak a sawi in a om uhi,
Khovel amau tenna tak hilou mite, gamdai mun, mualtung, guam leh kolhawm ah a vialvak vak uhi.
Ahi a, hiaite tengteng in ginna ziak in phat na lawhkhin mahle uh thilchiam pen a tang kei uhi:
A ziakbel Pathian in ei a ding a thil hoihzaw muhkholh a neih ziak a, ei tellou a amaute hihbukim a a omlouhna ding ziak uh ahi.
Huaiziak in huchitel a theihpihte, meipi thupi umsuak a i om thei in, hon hihnok peuhmah leh khelhna eimah a belhte koihmang ni, huan i ma ua kitaitehna ding om ah kuhkaltak in tai ni.
Jesu, i ginna siampa leh hihkippa, a ma a kipahna om ziak a zahlaknate ngaineu a Kros a thuakpa, Pathian mangtutphah taklam a tupa, Amah lam en in.
Na khalam ua na bah ua, na lungkiak louhna ding un, mikhialte apan a huchibang a selkalhna thuakpa ngaihtuah un.
Khelhna dou in sisan suak hial in na pang naikei uhi; hanthawnna thu, tate taihilh bang a nou hon taihilhna na mangngilhta uhi.
“Ka ta, Toupa sawina ngaineu kenla,
a taihilh a na om in leng lungke sam ken;
Toupa’n a itte sawi nak a,
ta a kipahpih a vaw nak hi,” chi in.
Na thuak uzaw noumau ading ahi; tate tung a hihbang in Pathian in na tung uah a hih a; pa sawilouh ta kua a om ngei a?
Ta chihna teng lawh a sawina lawhlou a na om un bel, ta tak hilou in, sawn na hi ua kei dia.
Huailou leng eite honsawi ding, sa ah pate uh i nei uhi, huaite lah zahtak ngal hang a; huai sang a thupizaw in, i hinna ding in, khate Pa thuthu in i omkei ding ua hia?
Amau zaw ni sawtlou chik, hoih a sak bangzel un a honsawi ua, aman bel a siangthouna i tan theihna ding in, i hoihna ding in a honsawi zaw hi.
Sawina himhim thuaklai in kipahhuai in a langkei a, khasiathuai in a lang hi, thuaknung in huchi a sawizawt a omte ding in gah khamuanhuaitak leh diktatnatak a suahsak zel hi.
Huchi in khut kaikhete leh khut zawte liktou un;
Huan khebai kilawi saklou a, hihdam a a om zawkna ding in, na khete uh ding in lamtang bawl un.
Mitengteng toh kituahna leh siangthouna delh un, huai siangthouna lou in kuamah in Toupa a mu kei ding uhi:
Pilvangtak in en un, huchilou in zaw Pathian hehpihna ngah zoulou kuahiam a om ding a, khatna zung banghiam hongsel a nou hon hihbuai in, huai in mi tampi hihnit in a om ding uhi;
kingaihhat hiam, Esau bang a Pathian zahlou mi hiam a hongom kha ding hi. Aman a tamasa hihna an khatvei nek in khawngta hi.
Huai nung in vualzawlna gouluah a ut in, khitui kekawm in phatuamngaitak in zong mahleh, kisikna hun a muhlouh ziak in paih in a omta chih na thei uhi.
Nou zaw tang khoihtheih, mei a kangte, meivomte, mialte, huihpite,
pengkul ginnate, thugen ging omnate tung na hi kei ua; huai ging zate’n thudang a kiang ua gen nawnlou ding in a ngen uhi.
“Gamsa nangawn in huai tang a khoih aleh suang a denlup in a om ding” ahi chih thupiakpen a thuak theikei uhi.
A thil muh peuhmah uh a kihtakhuai mahmah ziak in Mosi in, “Ka lau a, ka nak lin mahmah” a chi hial hi.
Himahleh Zion tang, Pathian hing khua, vanlam Jerusalem, sim zohlouh angel hon khawmpite,
Tamasa van a min tuang saptuam hon kiang, Pathian, mitengteng ngaihtuah pa kiang bang, midiktat hih hoihkim kha kiang leh,
Jesu thukhun thak palai kiang, sisan theh, Abel sisan sang a thu hoihzaw genpa kiang tung na hi zaw uhi.
Thugenpa na deihkei kha ding uh, pilvang un. Lei amaute taihilh khawlpa a deihlouh ua bawn, gimthuakna a pelhlouh ngal un, eite, van a kipan a hon taihilhpa kiheisante’n i pelkei ding hi.
Huai hun in aw in lei a hihling a; “Himahleh tunzaw, khatvei lei kia hilou in, van leng ka hih ling nawn ding chi in a kichiam zawta hi.”
Khatvei ka hihling nawn ding chih in, thil lingloute a omden theihna ding in, thil lingtheite thilsiamte bang phet in, suanmang in a om ding chih theisakna ahi.
Huchi in hihlin vuallouh gam i tan ziak in, hehpihna i nei ding ua, huaiziak in zah leh laudansiam kawm in, Pathian pahtaklam na i sem thei ding uhi.
Pathian zaw mi katmang hat mei ahi.
Unau ki-itna om zel hen.
Mikhualte tung ah itna suah ding mangngilh kei un; huchibang hih in khenkhat in theiloupi’n angelte a zintun uhi.
Hen a omte hen hisam bang in theigige unla; gimthuakte sa a om samna hihziak un theigige un.
Mi tengteng lak ah kitenna pahtawi in om henla, lupna leng hihbuah louh in om hen; kingaite leh angkawmte tung a Pathian in vaihawm ding ahi.
Na lungsim putdan uh dangka deihtakna panglou hi hen; na thil neihsun tung uah lungkim un; amahmah in, “Bangchik mah in k’on donlou kei ding a, paileng k’on paisan kei ding” a chi hi.
Huchi in hangsantak in,
“Toupa hon panpihpa ahi,
ka lau kei ding; mihing in bang a honchih thei dia?” i chi uhi.
Nou hon heu, Pathian thu honhilhte, theigige unla, a omdan ua thilsuakte ngaihtuah in a omdan uh ching un.
Jesu Khrist tuh zan, tuni, leh tangtawn in a ngeingei in a om gige hi.

Kisinsakna tuamtuam leh thugin lamdangte mutleng in omkei un; lungtang hehpihna a hihkip a om a hoih ngal a, nekdingte bang a hihkip a omlou in; huchibang lam lungkhamte’n huaite ah phattuamna a mu tuankei uhi.
Eite’n maitam khat, biakbuk nasemte’n a nek theihlouhna mun i nei hi.
Gan sisan, siampu lianpen in Mun Siangthou a khelhna adia lan a a lutpih zel luangte dainawl ah a hal uhi.
Huchi in Jesu in leng amah sisan mahmah a mite a hih siangthouna ding in kulh kongkhak pawlam ah a na thuakta hi.
Huchi in amah a muhsitna uh pu in dainawl ah a kiang lam ah i paikhe ding uhi.
Hiailai ah zaw khomun kip i nei ngalkei ua, kho hongom ding i zong uh ahizaw hi.
Huchi in amah vang in phatna kithoihna Pathian kiang ah i lan gige ding uh, a min gupna mukte gah a hih ziak in.
Himahleh thil hihhoih leh thilphal mangngilh kei un; huaibang kithoihna tung ah Pathian a lungkim mahmah hi.

Nou hon heutute thu mang unla, a thuthu un om un, a nasepte uh tanchin gennawn ding a, na khate uh ching a honveng ahi uhi, lungkham kawm hilou in, kipaktak in semsak un; huchilou in zaw nou ading a khawk ahizaw ding hi.
Hon thumsak un; bangkim a diktattak a om a, sialehpha theihna siangtak nei ka hi uh chih diktak in ka kithei uhi.
Huan kintak a na kiang ua sawlnawn a ka om theihna ding in, huai ding in k’on ngen nawn sem hi.
Tuin, lemna Pathian, tangtawn thukhun sisan ziak a misi lak a kipan a, i Toupa Jesu, Belamchingpa thupitak, kaithou nawn pa’n,
A mitmuh a a kipahlam peuhmah Jesu Khrist ziak in eimah a sem in, a deihlam hih ding in thil hoih chiteng lam ah nou hon hihkim hen: Jesu Khrist kiang ah thupina tangtawn in om hen. Amen.
Himahleh unaute aw, k’on ngen hi, hanthawn thuhilhna ngaithei teitei un; na kiang uah thu tomchik ka gelh uhi.
I unaupa Timothi a pawtsakta uh chih na thei un; a hong paima deuh in, amah toh nou k’on mu ding hi.
Nou hon heute tengteng leh misiangthoute tengteng chibai hon buksak un. Italy gam a mite’n chibai a honbuk uhi.
Na vek ua kiang ah hehpihna om hen, Amen.
Jakob, Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Khrist sikha in, nam sawmlehnih dalhte chibai a buk hi.
Ka unaute aw, na ginna uh ze-etna in kuhkalna a siam chih thei in, khemna chiteng na tuah chiang un kipahna ngen in sim un.
Na ginna ze-etna un kuhkalna a siam chih thei in.
Bangmah tasam lou a na kim ua, na vek ua na bit theihna ding un, kuhkalna in semkim hen.
Na lak ua kuapeuh in pilna a taksap leh mi tengteng kiang a itlou leh tailou a pepa Pathian kiang ah ngen hen, huchi in a kiang ah piak a hi ding hi.
Himahleh ginglel hetlou in ginna nei in ngen hen, ginglelmi tuipi kihot huih mutleng leh sep bang ahi.
Huchibang mi’n Toupa kiang ah bangmah muh kiging kei hen.
Lungsim det neiloumi a thilhih tengteng ah a kip kei hi.
Unau daikilkal a om dopsang a a om ziak in kipak hen;
Mihau hihneu a a om ziak in kipak zaw hen; loupa pak bang a a man ding ziak in.
Ni hongsuak a huihlum a hongnun in loupa a vuai a; a pak pulh a; a kilawmna a mangthang hi; huchi mah bang in mihau a paina ah a vuai ding hi.
Khemna thuak teitei mi a hampha hi; ze-et a om nung in hinna lallukhu, Toupa’n amah itte kiang a a chiam a muh ding ziak in.
Kuamah in khemna a tuahlai in Pathian khem ka hi, chi kei hen. Pathian gitlouh a khemvual ahi kei, aman leng kuamah a khem kei hi.
Michih amau utna a hip leh pimang a a om chiang un khemna a tuak uh ahizaw hi.
Huan utna in nou a pai a, gilou a hong pichin in sihna a suak hi.
Ka nau deihtakte aw, khem in omkei un.
Thilpiak hoih leh thilpiak buching tunglam a kipan a vakte Pa kiang a kipan a hongsuk ahi a, amah ah lamdanna leh kikhekna lim a omkei hi.
A thilsiamte lak a gahmasa i hong hihtheihna ding in, amah deihlam in thutak lak a pan in a hon suangkhia hi.
Unau deihtakte aw, huaite na thei uhi, himahleh michih ngaihkhiak kilawp henla, thugen kituhpih kei henla, heh hak hen.
Mihing thangpaihna in Pathian diktatna a bawl kei hi.
Huaiziak in nin tengteng leh gilou dimval koihmang unla, thu na kha uh hondam thei, thunuailut tak in pom un.
Himahleh noumau kikhem in ngaikhete leltak hilou in thuzuite hizaw un.
Kuapeuh thu ngaikhia a zui tuanlou zaw limlang a a pianpih maitang hoihtak a ki en bang ahi.
Hoihtak in a ki en a, a paimang zoh in mi bangchi ahia a hih a ki mangngilh nawnpah hi.
Himahleh kuapeuh dan bukim, noplenna dan vel a, huchibang a om gige a, ngaikhia a, mangngilh nawn maimah nak bang hiloute zui a nasem gige mi a thilhih ah vualzawl in a om ding hi.
Kuapeuh sabiak limsak hi a kigingta a, a lei veng hoihlou a, amah lungtang kikhem zaw mi sabiak dan bangmah ahi kei hi.
I Pathian leh Pa mitmuh a sabiak siangthou leh gilou panglou zaw, tagah leh meithaite a gimthuak lai ua veh leh khovel buahna banglou a kibawl zel ahi,.
Ka unaute aw, i Toupa Jesu Khrist, thupina Toupa gingta kawm in, mi khentuam kei un.
Na kikhopnain uah mi dangkaeng zungbuh bun, puan hoihtak silh honglut henla, huan mi genthei puansetak silh honglut sam leh;
Puan hoihtak silhmi na limsak ua a kiang ah, “Nang hiai mun hoih ah tu in” na chi ua, mi genthei kiang ah bel, “Nang huai ah na ding inla, ahihkeileh, ka khe ngakna nuai ah tu in” na chih uleh,
na lungsim uah khentuam nei leh ngaihtuahna giloupu, gense mite na honghi kei ding ua hia?
Ka unau deihtakte aw, Pathian in hiai khovel a gentheite ginna a hau ding leh amah itte kiang a a chiam gam luah ding in a chi kei a hia?
Nou bel migentheite na zahlaksak zaw uhi. Mihaute hilou uhia nou hon nuaisiah? Mihaute hilou uhia vaihawmna a nou hon kailut?
Amaute hilou uhia min hoih na put uh gensete?
Himahleh Laisiangthou in, “Nangmah na ki-it bang in na vengte na it ding ahi” chih kumpi dan na zop uleh na hih hoih uhi.
Himahleh mi khentuam na neih uleh, na hihkhial uhi, dan in talekte na hih uh a hon theisak zawta hi.
Kuapeuh in dan zuikim mahleh munkhat a a hihkhelh leh, avek ah siamlouh tang in a omkhin hi.
“Angkawm ken” chipan “Tualthat ken” a chilai hi. Huchi in angkawm keimah lechin tual na thah in, dan a talekpa na hita hi.
Huaiziak in noplenna dan a vai hawmsak dingte bang in thugen unla, thilhih behlap un.
Mi tung a chitna neilou chitna panglou in vai a hawmsak nak uhi. Vaihawmna tung a vualzou zahngaihna ahi.
Ka unaute aw, min ginna ka nei chi mahleh thilhih a neihkei leh bang a phatuam dia? Huchibang ginna in amah a hondam thei dia hia?
Unaupa hiam, unau nu hiam, vuaktang a om in a niteng annek tasam le uh,
Na lak ua kuahiam in a kiang ah, “Khamuangtak in pai inla, lumtak leh vahtak in om in” chi in a sa ading a thil kiphamoh pe tuankei leh bang a phatuam dia?
Huchi mah bang in ginna leng thilhih neilou a amah kia a a om leh si ahi.
Ahi, mi kuahiam in “Nang ginna na nei a, ken thilhih ka nei hi;” na ginna na thilhih panglou in hon ensak inla ken thilhih in ka ginna k’on ensak ding a chithei hi.
Pathian khat kia ahi chih na gingta maw? Na hihhoih e: dawite’n leng a gingta ua, a ling zel uhi, a chi ding hi.
Mi thulimlou aw, thilhih panglou a ginna lel bangmah ahi kei chih na thei nuam hia?
I pu uh Abraham in a tapa Isak maitam tung a a latlai in thilhih ziak a siamtang ahi kei a hia?
Ginna in thilhih toh a semkhawm a, thilhih ziak in ginna a bukimta chih i thei uhi.
“Abraham in Pathian a gingta a, huai ginna a diktatna a sim ahi” chih Laisiangthou hihkim in a om hi; huchi in amah Pathian lawm chih in a om hi.
Ginna ziak kia hilou in, thilhih ziak zaw in min siam a tangzel uh chih na theita uhi.
Huchibang in, Rahab kizuaknu’n leng sawltakte a na kipahpih a lamtuam a a paisak lai in, thilhih ziak in siamtang ahi kei maw?
Kha panglou in pumpi a si hi, huchibang in thilhih panglou in ginna leng si ahi.
Ka unaute aw, na lak uah mi tampi heutu in hong omkei un, heutu in vaihawmna thupi sem a tuak ding chih i thei uhi.
Thil tampi ah i vek un i gilou nak uhi. Kuapeuh thugen lam a a gitlouh kei leh mi piching ahi a, a pumpi vengthei mi ahi.
Ngai un, Sakolte’n i thu a man theihna ding un a kam uah kamkaihna sikkual i bat leh a pumpi uh i kaihei hi.
Longte leng ngaihtuah sam un, a lian mahmah ua, huih hat mutleng in a om nak uhi, himahleh a longhekpa’n a paisak utna lam peuh ah a hekna neuchik petmah in a kiheisak hi.
Hichibang in lei pumpi hiang neuchik ahi a, nakpitak in a kiuangsak nak hi. Ngai un, mei neuchik phet in sing nak katsak natel e!
Huan lei tuh mei ahi, pumpi hiangte lak a gitlouhna lumpi, pumpi avek a ninsak a, mihing kisuansawn dan pianphungpi kangsak ahi; huai lei mah in gawtmun mei toh a peh hi.
Sa chichih, vasa chichih, ganhing chichih tuipi ate khoizual theih ahi ua, mite khoizual in a om uhi.
Himahleh lei zaw kuamah in a khoizual theikei uhi; sihna gu a dim gilou om kinken theilou ahi.
Huai lei in Pa Pathian i phat ua; huai mah in Pathian bang a bawl mihingte i hamsiat uhi.
Kam khat a kipan in phatna leh hamsia a pawtnak hi. Ka unaute aw, huchibang ding hilou ahi.
Tuikhuk khat in nak khat mah a kipan in tui lim leh limlou a suaksak zel a hia?
Ka unaute aw, theipi kung ah Olive thei a gahthei ahia? Ahihkeileh grepgui ah theipi a gah thei ahia? Huchibang in chikhuk in tui allou a suaksak thei sam kei hi.
Na lak uah kua a pil in, thu a theithei a? Thunuailut leh piltak in a thilhihte omdan hoih in ensak hen.
Himahleh na lungtang uah hazatna thupitak leh kidemna na neih uleh thudik zuausan kei un.
Huai bang pilna zaw tunglam a kipan a hong paisuk ahikei a, khovel leh pumpi utna dawi a kipan ahizaw hi.
Hazatna leh kidemna omna ah buaina leh thil hihkhelhna chiteng a om hi.
Tunglam a kipan pilna bel, a tung in a siangthou phot a, huaikhit in kituah a ut a, a nunnem a, a chihnuam a, hehpihna leh gah hoih in a dim a, khentuam a neikei a, a lepchiah kei hi.
Diktatna gah kilemna bawlte’n a tuh uh lemna gah ahi.
Na lak ua kidouna leh kinaknate koi a kipan a hongsuak ahi ua? Na sapum hiangte ua kidouna bawlnak, na duhgawlna ua kipante a pawt ahi kei ua hia?
Na lunggulh ua, na nei tuankei ua; na that ua, na eng ua, na kidou ua, gal na bawl ua, na nei tuankei uh, na ngetlouh ziak un.
Na ngen ua, na nget diklouh ziak un na mu kei uh, na nopsak bawlna ding ua zat na tup ziak un.
Nou angkawm hatte aw, khovel lawm hihna Pathian melma hihna ahi chih na theikei ua hia? Huchi in kuapeuh khovel lawm hih ut Pathian melma in a kibawl nak hi.
Ahihkeileh eimah a teng Kha in “Haza khop hial in a hondeih chih Laisiangthou in a gen bangmahlou in na ngaihtuah ua hia?”
Himahleh hehpihna tamsem a penak hi. Huaiziak in Laisiangthou in, “Pathian in mi kisatheite a dou a, kingaineute hehpihna a penak” a chi hi.
Huchi in Pathian thuthu in om un; himahleh Diabol dou un, a hon taimangsan ding hi.
Pathian naih unla, aman a honnaih ding. Khialte aw, na khut uh silsiang un: lungsim bulbal neiloute aw, na lungtang uh hihsiangthou un.
Haksa sa unla, lungkham unla, kapkhia un; na nuih uh kahna suak henla, na kipah uh lungkhamna suak hen.
Toupa mitmuh in kingaineu un, huchi in a hon hihlian ding hi.
Unaute aw, ki gensetuah kei un. Kuapeuh in a unau a gensiat hiam a vaihawm khum leh dan a gensia a vaihawm khum ahi; dan na gensiat leh dan zuimi na hi kei a, vaihawmpa na hizaw hi.
Dan pepa leh vaihawmpa, amah hondam theipa leh hihmang theipa khatlel a om hi; Nang na vengte vaihawm khum kua kisa na hia?
Tun ah noute’n ngai un, “Tuni hiam zingchiang hiam in, huai khopi ah i hawh ding ua, huai ah kum khat i va tam ding ua, i sumsin ding ua, punna i mu ding,” chite aw.
Zingchiang a bang hongom ding ahia chih nathei kei uhi. Na hinna uh bang ahia? Mei sawtlou kal a hongdawk a, mangnawn lel bang na hi uhi.
Huchi in “Toupa’n pha a sakleh i dam dia, hiai hiam, huai hiam i hih ding” na chih ding uh ahi.
Himahleh na ki-otsaknate uh na suangzaw ua, huai bang suanna tengteng gilou ahi.
Huchi in kuapeuh thil hoih ding thei a hih tuanlou zaw amah ading in khelhna ahi.
Mihausate aw, Ngai un! Na tung ua gimthuakna hongtung ding ziak in kap unla, mau tuaituai un.
Na goute uh a seta hi, na puante uh leikha in nekhinta hi.
Na dangkaeng uleh na dangkate uh a tuiek khinta hi; a tuiek nou hon mawhpaihtu leh meikang bang a na sa uh kangse zou ahi ding hi.
Ngai un, na lou ua buh at a kilohte loh amau khem a na piaklouh uh a kikou ua, buh atte mangbang kikou aw Mipite Toupa bil ah a lutta hi.
Khovel ah nuamsatak in na om ua, na kizangbei mawkmawk ua, na thahni un na lungtang uh na taisak uhi.
Midiktat, nou a hondou loute siamlouh tangsak in na that uhi.
Huchi in unaute aw, Toupa hong paima teng kuhkaltak in om un. Ngai un, louneimi in vuahtui ke masa leh nanung a muh mateng leigah hoihtak a ngak zel hi.
Nou leng kuhkaltak in om un; na lungtang uh hihkip un; Toupa hongpaina ding a naita hi.
Unaute aw, siamlouhtang a na omlouhna ding un, ki phunkhum kei un; ngai un, vaihawmpa kongkhak bul ah ading hi.
Unaute aw, Toupa min a thugenmi zawlneite thuakdan leh kuhkal dan uh zuih ding in nei un.
Ngai un, a thuak mite tuh nuamsa i chi uhi; Job kuhkal dan na zata ua, Toupa’n a tawp a ahihdan leh Toupa hehpihna a dim dan leh zah a ngaih theih dan leng na mu uhi.

Himahleh ka unaute aw, bangteng tung ah, kichiam kei un; van lou in hiam, lei lou in hiam, thil dang himhim lou in hiam kichiam kei un. “Hi” na chih uh 'hi' henla; “Hilou” na chih uh 'hilou' hi hen; huchilou in zaw siamlouh tang in na om ding uhi.
Na lak uah thil hoihlou thuak a om uhia? Thum uhen. Kipak a om uhia? Phatna lasa uhen.
Na lak uah damlou a om uhia? Saptuam Upa samsak uhenla, aman Toupa min a sathau nilh in a tung ah thum hen;
Huan ginna a thumna in damlou a dam ding a, Toupa’n amah a kaithou ding; thil a hihkhelh takleh ngaihdam ahi ding hi.
Huchi in hihdam a na omtheihna ding un, na khelhnate uh thupha kitawituah unla, ki thumsak tuah un.

Midiktat thumna in thil thupitak a hihzel hi. Elijah leng eimah piandan bang pu mihing ahi a, ama’n vuah zuklouhna ding in phatuamngaitak in a thum a, kum thum leh kha guk sungteng leitung ah vuah a zukei hi.
A thum nawn a, van in vuah a zusak a, lei in a gahte a honsuah hi.
Ka unaute aw, na lak ua mi kuapeuh thutak a kipan in pialmang henla kuahiam in pikik nawn leh,
Mikhial a lamhaihna a kipan a kiheisak pa’n sihna a kipan a kha a hondam ding a, khelhna tampi a khuhsak lai ding chih kithei hen.
Peter, Jesu Khrist sawltak in, Pontus gam, Galatia gam, Kappadosia gam, Asia gam Bithinia leh gam tuamtuam a mikhual dalhzakte kiang ah;
Pathian, i Pa theihkholh bang a Jesu Khrist thumanna leh sisan theh tang ding a Kha hihtuamna tungtawn a tel a omte kiang ah: Na tung uah hehpihna leh lemna hihkhan in om hen.
I Toupa Jesu Khrist leh Pa Pathian phat in om hen! Aman a hehpihna thupitak bangzel in, misi lak a kipan Jesu Khrist thohnawnna ziak in lametna hing mu ding in a honsuang nawn hi,
Goutan setheilou, ninbanglou, tultheilou, van a nou a ding a sit muhna ding in.
Hotdamna, hun nanung a lang ding a zohsa mu ding in, ginna ziak in Pathian thilhihtheihna a ven na hi uhi.
Tuin khemna chiteng ziak in hun sawtlou lungkham tadih mahle uchin, huai ah nakpitak in na kipak uhi.
Na ginna uh ze-etna, dangkaeng mei a ze-et nung nangawn a mangthang zel sang a manpha zaw, Jesu Khrist kilak chiang in phatna leh pahtawina leh thupina ding a hong hihtheihna ding in.
Mu ngeilou napi’n amah na it ua, tuin mu tadih kei mahle uchin, amah na gingta ua, kipahna gentheihlouh leh thupina a dim in na kipak mahmah uhi.
Na ginna un a tuppen na kha uh hotdamna na mu uhi.
Huai hotdamna thu zawlneite hehpihna na kiang ua hongtung ding thugenkholte’n, a kankan ua, siamneltak in a zongkhia uhi.
Khrist kha amau a om in Khrist thuakna ding leh thupina honzui dingte a theihkholhsak lai in, bang hun a bangchi a hongtung ding hiam chih zonkhiak a tum uhi.

Huai thu in amau nasep kiseplou in, noumau nasep a semzaw uh chih a kiang uah theihsak ahita, huai thute van a kipan a sawlkhiak Kha Siangthou panpih in Tanchinhoih nou hon hilhte’n tuin a honhilh ua, huai thilte angelte’n leng vel a ut uhi.
Huaiziak in na lungsim puan uh teng in pilvang unla, Jesu Khrist kilak chiang in hehpihna nou a honpuak ding lungke lou in lamen un;
Ta thumangte bang in, na theihlouh lai ua na nidanglai duhgawlna uh bang a omlou in;
Nou honsampa a siangthou bang in nou leng na tatdan tengteng uah hong siangthou un;
Noute na siangthou ding uh ahi, kei ka siangthou ngal a, chih gelh ahi.
Huan khentuam neilou a michih nasep bang chiat a ngaihtuahpa Pa bang a na loh uleh, hiai lai a na tam laiteng un laudansiam in om un.
Na pipute uh piaksawn, na omdan uh bangmah hilou a kipan, thil sethei, dangka leh dangkaeng a tat na hi kei ua,
Belamnou gensiatbei leh ninbanglou sisan bang a, Khrist sisan pha a tat na hizaw uh chih na thei uhi.
Amah leilung pianma in sehkholh in a om ngei tak a, himahleh hun nanung ah noumau ziak in kilak in a om hi.
Amah ziak in misilak a kipan kaithoupa leh a thupina pepa Pathian gingtate na hi uhi, na ginna uh leh na lametna uh Pathian a a om theihna ding in.
Unaute it taktak ding a thutak zui a na kha uh na hihsiangthou tak ziak un lungtang a phatuamngaitak in ki-ittuah chiat un.
Chi sethei lak ah hilou in, Pathian thuhing gige leh om gige chi setheilou lak a piang thak na hi zaw uhi.
“Mi tengteng loupa bang
ahi ua, a thupina uh leng
loupa pak bang ahi.
Loupa a vuaia,
a pak a pulh hi.
Toupa bel tangtawn in
a om gige hi”
chih ahi ngal a. Huai ahi Tanchinhoih nou a honhilh pen uh.
Huchi in gitlouhna tengteng, zekhemna tengteng, lepchiahna tengteng, hazatna tengteng, gensiatna tengteng tawpsan unla,
naungek suak thakte bang in khalam nawitui bangmah hellouh lunggulh un, huai a na khan theihna ding un.
Toupa mi hehpihtheitak ahi chih na chiam khinta uhi.
Amah suang hing, mihingte deihlouh, Pathian theih a bel tel leh manpha ahi.
Amah kiang a hongpai in, noute leng suang hingte bang in Jesu Khrist ziak a Pathian kipahlam kithoihna lan ding in siampu siangthou hi ding in khalam inn a leptouh in na om uhi.
Huaiziak in Laisiangthou ah:
“Ngai un, Zion ah a ning a suang kiphamoh pen tel leh manpha tak ka lem hi;
amah gingtate a zahlak kei ding uh” chih a tuang hi.
Nou a gingtate ading in huai manphapi ahi,
a gingtaloute ding in bel:
“Inlamte suang deihlouh pen,
huai mah a ning a suang phatuam pen a hong hita hi.”
Huan, “Pukna suang leh
dalna suangpi ahi.
Thu kigente a zuihlouh ziak un a kisui puk ua;
huchibang ding a sehsa ahi him uhi.”
Himahleh mial a kipan pawt a, vak lamdangtak a lut ding a nou honsampa hoihna na muhsak theihna ding un, nou zaw chi tel, kumpi siampute, nam siangthou, Pathian mite na hi uhi:
Nidanglai in nam himhim na hi kei ua; tun zaw
Pathian namte na hita uhi;
nidanglai in zahngaihna na mu kei ua, tun zaw zahngaihna na muta uhi.
Deihtakte aw, mikhual leh khualzin na hih ziak un kha dou nakpa sautnate tawpsan ding in nou k’on ngen hi;
Jentelte lak a na tatdan uh kilawmtak hi hen, huchi in thilhihkhial a, a hon gensiat chiang un leng na thil hoih hih a muhte uh ziak in veha a om chiang un Pathian a pahtawi thei ding uhi.
Toupa ziak in mihing dan bawl peuhmah ah lutun; tungnung a om kumpipa kiang ah hiam,
thil hihkhialte tung a thuk ding leh thil hoih hihte phat ding a kumpipa’n a seh gam ukpate thunuai ah lut un.
Hiai Pathian deihlam ahi, mihaite haina thil hoih hih in na hihdai thei ding uhi;
Nuamlen na hi ua, himahleh na noplenna uh khelhna khuhna ding a zanglou in Pathian sikha a omna ding in zang zaw un.
Mi tengteng zahtak un. Unaute it un; Pathian laudan siam un. Kumpipa pahtawi un.
Sikhate aw, mi hoih leh mi nunnemte lak kia hilou in migiloute lak ah leng laudansiam in nou hon heute thuthu in om un.
Min Pathian theihna ziak in thuaklouh ding thuak in lungkhamna a thuak teitei leh huai pen Pathian pahtak lam ahi.

Nou na thilhihkhelh ziak ua vuak na thuak un, kuhkaltak in thuak mahle uchin phatna bang na loh ua? Himahleh na thil hoih hih ziak ua na thuak ua kuhkaltak a na thuak ua leh huai pen Pathian kipah lam ahi.
Khrist in leng nou a hon thuaksak ziak in, huaibang hihding a sap na hi uhi; a khap a na zuihna ding un zuih ding a hon nutsiat ahi.
“Aman thil a hihkhial kei a, a kam ah zekhemna leng a omsam kei;”
Mi’n a kou lai in, a kouthuk kei a, a thuaklai in a vau kei hi; diktattak a ngaihtuahpa kiang ah a kipe zaw hi.
Khelhna lam a sikhin a diktatna lam a i hintheihna ding in amahmah in tua sing ah a sa in i khelhnate a pua hi; amah vuakna golhte ah hihdam in na omta uhi.
Belam mang bang in na mang ua, tun zaw nou hon chingpa leh heutupa kiang ah na kik nawnta uhi.
Huchibang in, nou zite aw, noumau pasalte thuthu in om un, huchi in a lak ua khenkhat in Pathian thu umkei mahle uh na tatdan uh zoh in a om ding uhi.
Laudansiam kawm a na tatdan siangthou uh en in.
Na kivatna uh pawlam kivatna samphek leh dangkaeng khi awh hiam, puansilh kivatte hilou in,
Lungtang a mihing thuguk lungsim thunuailut leh nunnem puansilh setheilou a kivat Pathian mitmuh in a manpha mahmah hi.
Huchibang in tuma lam a numei siangthou Pathian gingtate’n leng amau pasalte thuthu a om in a kivan uhi.
Sarah in Abraham toupa chi a a thuthu a a om bang in; thil hoih hih a, khemlauna himhim laulou a na om uleh Sarah tate na hi ding uhi.

Nou pasalte aw, huchi mah bang in, numei zaw bel kitambaih zaw a hih ziak un leh hehpihna hinna tanpihte a hih ziak un, pahtawi kawm in theihna bangzel in na zite uh kiang ah om un, na thumna uh dala a om louhna ding in.
Atawppen in, navek un lungsim munkhat in om unla, ki lainat tuah unla, thunuailut in om un.
Khelhna, khelhna in thukkei unla, salhna, salhna in thuk sam kei unla, vualzawl zaw un. Hiai vualzawlna tang ding in sap na hi uhi.
“Hinna it ut leh nihoihte muh ut in khelhna lak ah a lei veng hoih leh,
a muk leng zekhemna thu genlou ding in veng hoih hen.
“Gilou nungngat san in thil hoih hih hen;
kituahna zong in delhzel hen.
“Toupa mit in midiktatte tung ah a tu a,
a bil leng a thumna lam uah a dohzel hi,
himahleh Toupa mel in thil hihkhialte a dou nak” chih gelh ahi.
Thil hoih lam a phatuam na ngaih uleh na pawikhoih ding uh kua a om dia?
Himahleh diktatna ziak a na thuakta bang na hih uleh, na hampha ding uhi. A kihtakhuaina uh kihta kei un;
Himahleh na lungtang uah Khrist Toupa in bawl un; noumau a om, na lamet pen uh hon dong peuhmah dawng ding in mansa gige in thunuailuttak leh laudansiam kawm in om un:
Sialehpha theihna siangtak nei un, huchi in nou a hon gensiatna lam uah, Khrist a na omdan hoih uh gen thanghuaite hih zahlak in a om ding uhi.
Thil gilou hih ziak a thuak sang in Pathian hoihsak lam ahihleh thil hoih hih ziak a thuak a hoihzaw hi.
Pathian kiang a honpi theihna ding in Khrist in khelhnate ziak in khatvei a thuakta hi, midiktat in midiktatloute sik in a thuak a; sa ah hih sih in a om a, kha ah hihhin in a omta hi.
Huai kha in suangkulh a kha omte kiang a thu a va tangkoupih hi.
Huai mite’n nidanglai a Noah damlai a long bawl sungteng a, Pathian thuakzohna in a ngaklai in thu a mangkei ua; huai long ah mi tawmchik, mi giat tui apan humbit in a om uhi.
Huan huai tui in Jesu Khrist thohnawnna ziak a hotdamna baptisma lim hon ensak a, huai bel sapum nitna siansakna dan hilou in, sialehpha theihna siansakna ziak a Pathian kiang naihna ahizaw hi.
Amah van a pai in Pathian taklam ah a om a; angelte, thuneihnate, thilhihtheihnate amah thuthu a omsak in a omta hi.
Huchi in Khrist in taksa a a thuak ziak in nou leng huchibang lungsim in kivan un; sa a thuak khinsa in gilou a tawpsanta hi.
Huchi in tunung sa a a omlai teng mihing duhgawlna lam bang a omlou in, Pathian deihlam in a omta hi.
Jentelte utlam hihna, huknate, sa utnate, uain hainate, zu khamnate, milim biakna kihhuaitakte tuma lam a hihsa teng hunta hen aw;
Huai a amau nuambawl luatna bang a noute’n tu a na bawlsam louh uh lamdang a sa ua, nou a hon gense nak uhi.
Amau mihing leh misite ngaihtuah ding a mansa kiang ah a tanchin uh a gen ding uhi.
Hiai ziak in ahi, misite kiang a leng Tanchinhoih gen a hih, sa a om mihingte bang a ngaihtuah in om mahle uh, kha a bel Pathian bang a a hin theihna ding un.
Himahleh thil tengteng tawpna a naita, huaiziak in na thum theihna ding un lungsim diktak pu in pilvang un.
Bang dangteng sang in phatuamngai tak in ki-ittuah chiat unla; itna in gilou tampi a khuhzel hi.
Phunlou in kizintun tuah unla;
Michih in thilpiak na muh bangzel un, Pathian hehpihna chiteng kem hoihte bang in huaite in nna kisepsak tuah chiat un.

Mi kuapeuh in thu a gen leh Pathian thute bang in gen hen; mi kuapeuh in na a sep leh Pathian in hatna a piak bang in sem hen; huchi in Jesu Khrist ziak in Pathian thil bangkim ah pahtawi in a om thei ding, thupina leh vaihawmna tangtawn in amah a ahi, Amen.
Deihtakte aw, na lak ua ze-etna thupitak hongom, noumau ze-etna ding a na tung ua hongtung, thillamdang na tung ua tung bang in lamdangsa kei un.
Khrist thuaknate thuakpihte na hihdan bangzel un kipak zaw un; huchi in a thupina a a hong kilak chiang in noumau leng nuamtak in na kipak thei ding uhi.
Khrist min ziak a tai na hih uleh, na hampha uhi; thupina kha leh Pathian kha na tung uah a om gige hi.
Himahleh na lak uah kuamah in tualthatmi a hih ziak hiam, midangte thilhih gensakmi a hih ziak hiam in thuak keihen.
Himahleh, Khristian a hih ziak in thuakta leh zumkei hen; huai minpu a hih ziak in Pathian pahtawi zaw hen.
Vaihawmna Pathian inkuanpihte ah pat a hunta hi; huan eite ngei a apat masak leh, Pathian Tanchinhoih thumang loute tawpna bangchi phet ahi diam aw?
Huan,
“Midiktat nangawn hotdam liailiai a hih in,
Pathian limsaklou leh migiloute koi ah bang a suak ding ua?”
Huaiziak in Pathian hoihsak bang a thuakte’n thil hoih hih in a khate uh Siampa muanhuaitak kiang ah kemsak hen.
Huchi in na lak ua saptuam upate kei na upat pih uh, Khrist thuaknate theipa leh thupina honglang ding tangsam ding in hiai bang in k’on hanthawn hi;
Na lak ua Pathian pawl omte kem un; hihding a hih ziak hilou in, Pathian thu bang a utzaw in, punna thanghuai deih ziak hilou in, lungsim a deihtaktak zaw in.
Na tante uh tung ah kiliansak tuanlou in pawlte zuih ding a kibawlzaw in, kem un.
Huchi in Belamchingpa lianpen a honglat chiang in, thupina lallukhu tultheilou na mu ding uhi.
Huchi mah bang in, nou valnoute aw, upate nuai ah lut un. Ahi, na vek ua na kisepsak tuah chiat ding in thunuailutna in kithuam un;
“Pathian in kisatheite a dou a,
kingaineute hehpihna a penak hi.”
Huaiziak in a huntak a nou a hon pahtawi theihna ding in, Pathian khut hattak nuai ah kihihniam un:
Aman a hon limsak gige ziak in na mangbatna tengteng uh amah ah nga vek un.
Pilvang unla, limsak un; na melma uh Diabol, humpinelkai humham bang in a nek theih ding zong in a vialvak hi.
Na unau uh khovel a omte tung ah huchibang thuaknate a tungsam chih thei in ging kiptak a om in, amah dou un.
Huan hehpihna tengteng Pathian, a tangtawn thupina tang ding a Khrist a nou honsampa ngei in, sawtloukal na thuak nung un a hoih bukim a honbawl in, hon hihkip in, a hon hihhat ding hi.
Amah kiang ah vaihawmna tangtawn in om hen, Amen.
Ka unaupa muanhuaitak Silvana khut in, noumau hanthawn leh huai Pathian hehpihna taktak ahi chih thei in, tomchik in na kiang uah ka gelh ahi; huaite ah ding kip un.
Babulon khua a om noumau bang a telnu’n chibai a honbuk hi; huchibang in ka tapa Mark in leng chibai a honbuk ahi.
Itna kitawpna a tawp in chibai kibuk un, Na lak ua Khrist a om peuhmahte kiang ah lemna om hen, Amen.
Simon Peter, Jesu Khrist sikha leh sawltak in, Jesu Khrist, i Pathian leh Hondampa diktatna ziak a ginna mantamtak i tan bang tangsamte kiang ah:
‍Pathian leh i Toupa Jesu Khrist theihna tungtawn in hehpihna leh lemna noute sung ah hihkhan in om hen.
Amah thupina leh hoihna ziak a honsampa, a tanchin theih ziak in a Pathian thilhihtheihna in hinna leh Pathian limsakna lamthu ah thil tengteng a hon peta hi.

‍Huaite ziak in a thuchiam manphatak leh thupi mahmahte a honpia hi; huchi in utna ziak a khovel a siatna hongom taikhiak san in; huai thuchiam manphatak leh thupi mahmahte ziak in Pathian omdan na kikoppih thei sam ding uhi.
Ahi, huaiziak tak in, thanop himhim suah in, na ginna uah hoihna hel unla, na hoihna uah theihna hel unla,
‍Na theihna uah kidekna hel unla, na kidekna uah kuhkalna hel unla, na kukhalna uah Pathian limsakna hel unla,
‍Na Pathian limsakna uah unaute itna hel unla, na unaute itna ah itna hel un.
‍Huaite nou a a hih a, a khanzel leh, i Toupa Jesu Khrist theihna lam ah thadahlou leh gahlou lou in nou a honbawl ding hi.
‍Kuapeuh huai thilte neilou mittaw, naichikte kia muthei, a nidanglai khelhnate siansakna mangngilhte ahi uhi.
‍Huaiziak in unaute aw, nou a honsapna leh a hontelna hihkip ding in thanop suah semsem un; huaite na hih uleh chiklai mah in na puk kei ding uhi.
‍Huchi in Jesu Khrist i Toupa leh Hondampa’n tangtawn gam a lutna a hon musak law mahmah ding hi.
‍Huaiziak in huai thilte nei in na kiang ua om thutak a phuhkip hitamah le uchin, huai thutak mah k’on theisak nawn ding hi.
‍Huan hiai sapum a ka omlai teng noumau hon theihpih in hon tohhalh gige hoih ka sa hi.
‍I Toupa Jesu Khrist in hon theihsak bang in ka sapum puanin koihkhiak hun ding hongtung pah ding chih ka thei hi.
Ahi ka paikhiak nung in huai thilte na theihgigena ding un ka kisuk ding hi.
‍I Toupa Jesu Khrist thilhihtheihna leh a hong paina thu k’on theihsak lai un, tangthu piltak a ngaihtuah khiakphet zui ka hi kei ua, a thupina mute ka hi zaw uhi.
Aman Pa Pathian kiang a kipan in pahtawina leh thupina a mu a, huchihlai in thupina thupitak a kipan in hichibang aw a kiang a hongtung hi, “Hiai ka Tapa deihtak, ka kipahna mahmah ahi” chi in.
‍Huan tang siangthou a a kiang a ka om ziak un huai aw van a kipan a hongsuak koumau ngei in ka za uhi.
‍Huchi in genkholhna thu kipnawn sem i nei uhi. Khua a hongvak a, zingsol aksi na lungtang ua a hongsuah masiah hiai thu khawnvak mun mial a vak a limsak bang ua, na limsak uleh na hih hoih ding uhi.
‍Laisiangthou a thugenkholh himhim eimah kihilhchian ding ahi kei chih thei masa un.
‍Thugenkholh himhim mihing thu a pawt ahi ngeikei a, mite’n Kha Siangthou sawl in, Pathian a kipan a genzaw uhi.

Himahleh mite lak ah zawlnei takloute leng a hongpawt ua, huchi mah bang in na lak uah heute takloute a hongom ding uhi, amaute leipa Toupa hilhial tawpsan in mi hihsethei ginna tuam a guk in a hon lutpih ding ua, amau tung ah thakhat in manthatna a tungsak ding uhi.
‍Mi tampi in a zautatna lam thil uh a honching ding ua, amau ziak in lampi dik gensiat ahi ding hi.
‍Sum deihna ziak in zuauthu in sumsinna ding in nou a honzang ding uh; himahleh nidanglai a omsa a mohtanna ding uh a khawl kei a, a manthatna uh leng a ihmu kei hi.
Angelte’n thil a hihkhelh un Pathian in a hawikei a, gawtmun ah a pai a, vaihawm ding in guam khukthuk mial ah a khum hi.
Amah limsakloute omna khovel ah tuichim tungsak in, nidanglai khovel a hawikei a, himahleh Noah diktatna thugenpa midang sagih toh a hondamta hi.
‍Sodom leh Gomorrah khuate amah limsaklou hongom dingte etsakna ding in a zang a, vut suaksak in hih mangthang in siamlouh a tangsakta hi;
‍Huan Lot midiktat, migiloute omdan huktak ziak a lungkham mahmahpa a hondamta hi.
‍Huai mi diktatpa a lak ua a om in, a mit in a mu a, a bil in a za a, danlou bang a a thilhihte un a lungsim diktat niteng in a hihna mahmah hi.
‍Toupa’n amah limsakmite khemna apat hotkhiak dan leh diktatloute vaihawm ni ading a gawt kawm a hawidan a thei hi.
‍Utna thanghuai lam a sa bang a om leh, vaihawm sakna musitmite ngialhouh vaihawmni ading a gawt kawm a hawidan a theisem hi. Haihan leh chihhak ahi ua a mi thupite a gensiat un leng a ling kei uhi.
Angel hatna leh thilhihtheihna neite’n amaute dem in Toupa ma ah a gense ngeikei uhi.
‍Himahleh hiaite’n bel ganhing ngaihtuahna neilou, mat a hihman dingte bang in, thil a theihlouhte uh a gensia uhi.

Amau diktatlouhna gahlou in a segawp ding ua, sun tanglai a zu leh sa kham a buai nuamsa mi ahi uh. Na kiang ua Ankuang a lui un, amau kikhemna Ankuanglui a hih ziak un, thanghuaina gensiatna ahi uhi;
‍Mit angkawm a dim, khelhna tawpsan theiloute a nei ua; mi kiploute a khempuk ua; en hat lungsim a pu ua; hamsethuak tate ahi uhi.
‍Boer tapa Balaam, thilhih khelhna, loh deihpa lampi a tot ziak un lam dik paisan in a vakmang uhi;
‍Himahleh amah a tatlekna ziak in taihilh in a omta a; sabiltung pau theilou mihing pau in a hongpau a, zawlnei haina a kham hi.
‍Hiaite tuikhuk tui omlou leh tuimei huihpi mut leng ahi ua; amaute ading in nuailam mial sah meuhmouh sit ahita hi.
‍Thuginalou chiakzen a gen in gitlouhna lak a kipan a taikhete sa utna ah hukna in a khempuk nak uhi.
Amau siatna sikha hikawm pi in mite sikha suahtakna thu a chiam nak uhi; mite’n zohsa a chihte mah in amau sikha in a bawl nak hi.
Toupa leh Hondampa Jesu Khrist a theih ziak ua khovel thanghuainate a taikhiaksan nung ua, huai mah a a tannawn ua, zoh a a om nawn ua leh zaw, a omdan nanung uh amasa sang in a hong hoihkei zaw hi.
‍Diktatna lampi pen theihnung a, thupiak siangthou a kiang ua kepsak nungngatsan sang in, diktatna lampi theilou hile uh amau ading in a hoihzaw ding hi.
“Ui amah luak ah a kiknawn a,
vawkpi kisil siangsa leng buannawi ah kisil ding in a kiknawn chih paunak diktak amau tung ah a tungta hi.”
Deihtakte aw, tua na kiang ua ka gelh laikhak nihna ahi. Hiai tegel ah theihthaknawnna in na lungsim siang uh ka tokthou hi.
‍Zawlnei siangthoute thugen kholh leh na sawltakte uh kam a Toupa leh Hondampa thupiak na theihgigena ding un.
‍Hiai thei masa un, ni nanungte ah, mi simmohhatte amau utna bang a om in, simmawh kawm in a hongpai ding uhi;
‍“A hongpai nawnna thuchiam koi ah? Siam tung a kipan bangkim a om ngeingei bang in pi leh pute ihmut ni a kipan in a om zel a! a honchi ding uhi.
‍Pathian thu in nidanglai in vante a hongom a chih a kitheihmohbawl uhi.
‍Leitung tui a kipan leh tui zang a bawl ahi a, huai tui mah in a tum a, a mangthangta hi;
‍Himahleh tua vante leh lei omte huai thu mah in Pathian limsaklou mite vaihawm leh manthat ni ading a sit in mei hihsiat ding a kholkhawm ahita hi.
‍Himahleh deihtakte aw, hiai thu kamkhat pen mangngilh kei un, Toupa ngaih in ni khat tuh kum sang khat bang ahi a, huan kum sang khat leng ni khat bang ahi, chih.
‍Mi khenkhat in zekai a sak bang un Toupa zaw a thuchiam ah a zekai kei hi; kuamah manthat deihlou a, mi tengteng hong kisik deih in noumau lam ah a dohzou zaw ahi.
‍Himahleh Toupa ni zaw guta bang in a hongtung ding; huai ni chiang in van nakpitak a ging in a mangthang ding, thilbulte mei a haitui in a om ding a, lei leh a sung a nasep omte, a kangtum ding hi.
‍Huai thilte huchibang a mangthang vek ding uh ahi chih na theih un, omdan siangthou leh Pathian limsakna lam ah mi bangchibang hi ding na hi ua.
‍Pathian ni hongtung ding lamen leh phatuamngai tak in nawh un; huai ni a tun ziak in van hongkang in a mangthang dia, thilbulte leng mei a haltui in a omta ding hi.
‍Himahleh a thuchiam bang in van thak leh lei thak, a sung a diktatna omte i lamen hi.
‍Huaiziak in deihtakte aw, huai bang thilte na lamet ziak un nin banglou leh gensiatbei in, khamuangtak a na om uh a hon muhtheihna ding in thanop suah un.
‍Huan i unaupa deihtak Paul in leng a kiang a pilna piak bangzel a na kiang ua a gelh bang in Toupa dohzawhna hotdamna in sim un.

A laikhak tengteng ah huai thute gen in, huai mah bang in a gelh hi. Huai ah thu theihhak thu thukte a om a, huaite mi pillou leh mi kiploute’n Laisiangthou dang a ngaikoi bang un a ngaikoi ua, amau leh amau siatna ding in a zang uhi.
‍Huchi in deihtakte aw, noute’n tua thute na theihkholh ziak un pilvang un, huchilou in zaw migiloute diklouhna a pimang a om in, na kipna ua kipan na pukkha ding uhi.
‍Himahleh i Toupa leh Hondampa Jesu Khrist hehpihna leh theihna ah hong khang un. Tu leh tangtawn in amah kiang ah thupina om hen, Amen.
Hinna thu, a tung a kipan a omkhinsa, koute’n ka zak uh, ka mit ua ka muh uh, ka et kilkel ua, ka khut ua ka khoih uh ahi.
‍Huai hinna latsak in a hong omta a, koute’n ka mu uhi, huai tangtawn hinna, Pa kiang a om leh koute kiang ah latsak a om noute kiang ah k’on phuang uhi;

‍Koute’n ka muh sa uh leh ka zaksa uh mah noute kiang ah k’on phuang uhi, huchi a noute’n leng koute toh kithuahna na neih theihna ding un; koute kithuahna bel Pa toh Tapa Jesu Khrist toh kithuahna ahi.
‍Noute na kipahna uh a bukimna ding in hiai k’on gelh uhi.
‍Huan thukhah a kiang a kipan a ka zak uh na kiang ua k’on hilhsawn uh hiai ahi; Pathian zaw vak ahi a, amah ah mial a omkei hi.
‍Mial a om napi in Amah ka kithuahpih chi lehang zuau i gen a, thutak i zuikei uhi.
‍Himahleh amah vak a a om bang a ei leng vak a i omleh i kithuah chiat ua, huan a Tapa Jesu sisan in i khelhna tengteng a hon silsiangsak zel hi.
‍Khelhna ka neikei chi lehang eimah leh eimah i kikhem a, thutak eimah ah a omkei hi.
‍I khelhnate thupha i tawi leh, i khelhnate ngaidam ding leh i diktatlouhna tengteng silsiang ding in amah a muanhuai in a diktat hi.
‍Thil ka hihkhial kei i chih leh amah zuauthei in i bawl ua, a thu leng eimau ah a omkei hi.
Ka naute aw thil na hihkhelh louhna ding un hiai thute na kiang uah ka gelh ahi. Kuapeuh in thil a hihkhelh leh Pa kiang a hon gensakpa, Jesu Khrist, mi diktat i nei hi;
Amah i khelhnate thuphatawina ahi; eimah khelhna kia hilou in, khovel tengteng khelhna thuphatawina leng ahi.
‍Huan a thupiakte i zuih leh huai ah amah i thei chih i kithei hi.
A thupiakte zuilou a “Amah ka thei” chi mi mi zuauthei ahi, thutak amah ah a omkei hi.
‍Kuapeuh a thuzui peuhmah amah ah Pathian a itna a kim petmah hi. Amah ah i om chih hiai ah i kithei ahi.
Amah ah ka om gige chi mi amah om bang in a omsam ding ahi.
‍Deihtakte aw, thupiak thak na kiang uah ka gelh kei a: thupiak lui a tung a kipan a na neih uh ka gelhzaw ahi. Huai thupiak lui na thu theihsa pen uh ahi.
‍Himahleh thupiak thak gelh hisam na veng, huai amah ah leh noumau ah a lang hi, mial a man lellel ziak in leh vak taktak tua a hongvak tak ziak in.
A unau haw napi a, vak ah ka om chi mi tutan in leng mial ah a om gige hi.
A unau itmi vak ah a om gige a, amah ah kipalpaihna ding san a omkei hi.
A unau hawmi bel mial ah a om a, mial ah a khosa a, mial in a mit a tawtsak ziak in a paina leng a theikei hi.
‍Naute aw, amah min ziak a na khelhnate uh ngaihdam a hihtak ziak in na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.

‍Pate aw, amah a tung a kipan a om gige na theih ziak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi. Tangvalte aw, Pathian thu noumau ah a om gige a, giloupa na zohtak ziak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi. Naute aw, Pa na theih ziak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
‍Pate aw, amah a tung a kipan a om gige na theih ziak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi. Tangvalte aw, na hat ua Pathian thu noumau ah a om gige a, migilou na zohtak ziak un na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.
‍Khovel it kei unla, khovel a thil omte leng it sam kei un. Mi kuapeuh in khovel a it leh Pa itna amah ah a omkei hi.
‍Khovel a thil om tengteng, sa utnate, mit utnate, damsung thupina limte Pa a kipan ahi kei a, khovel a kipan ahizaw hi.
‍Khovel, a utnate toh, a mangthang lellel ahi. Pathian deihlam hihmi bel tangtawn in a om gige ding hi.
‍Naute aw, hun nanungpen hita e, Khrist doupa a hongpai ding chih na zak bang un tuin leng Khrist doumi tampitak a hong pawtta uhi; huaiziak in hun nanungpen ahita chih i thei uhi.

Amaute i lak ua kipan in a pawt ua, himahleh eimah mi tak ahi kei uh; eimah mi tak hile uh i kiang uah a omsam ding uhi; himahleh avek un eimah mitak ahi kei uh chih a latchetna ding in a hon pawtsanta uhi.
‍Mi Siangthou kiang a kipan thaunilhna na tang ua, bangkim na thei uhi.
‍Thutak na theihlouh ziak ua ka gelh ahi kei a, na theih ziak uh leh thutak a zuau bangmah a pawt ngeilouh ziak in ka gelh ahizaw hi.
‍Jesu, Khrist ahi chih gingtalou mi sang a zuauthei kua a om a? Khrist doumi tuh Pa leh Tapa gingtalou mi ahi.
‍Kuapeuh Tapa gingtalou in Pa leng a sang tuankei; Tapa gingta in bel Pa leng a sang hi.
‍Nou zaw a tung a kipan a na zak uh noumau ah omsak gige un. Huai a tung a kipan a na zak uh noumau a a om gige leh nou leng Tapa leh Pa ah na om gige ding uhi.
‍Hiai ahi amah ngei in a honchiam pen; tangtawn hinna.
‍Noumau hon pimang tumte tungtang na kiang uah ka gelh ahi.

‍Nou zaw amah kiang a kipan a thaunilhna na tan uh noumau ah a om gige a, kuamah hilh na kiphamoh kei uhi; amah thaunilhna in thil tengteng a hon hilhzawk ziak in leh thudik ahi a, zuau leng a hihlouh ziak in huai in nou a honhilh bang in amah ah om gige un.
‍Huchi in naute aw, amah ah om gige un; amah a hong kilak chiang in ama ah zumlou in hangsantak in i om thei ding hi.
Amah mi diktat ahi chih na theih uleh mi kuapeuh diktatna hihmi amah a suak ahi chih na thei uhi.
Ngai un, Pa hon itna thupi hina tel e! Pathian tate chih a i om; huai mah i hihna uh ahi hi. Hiai khong ziak in khovel in a hon theikei hi, amah a theihlouh ziak in.

‍Deihtakte aw, tun ah Pathian tate i hi ua, bangchi’n ahia i om ding chih bel a kithei tadih kei hi; amah a hong kilak chiang in, amah bang in i om ding chih i thei hi, amah a om ngeingei bangtak in i mu ding ahi ngal a.
Amah tung a lametna nei peuhmah amah a siangthou bang in a kihihsiangthou hi.
‍Kuapeuh thil hihkhial dan ah a talek hi; dan a tatlekna khelhna ahi ngal a.
Amah khelhnate lamang ding in a honglangta chih na thei uhi; Amah ah khelhna bangmah a omkei hi.
‍Kuapeuh amah a om gige in thil a hihkhial kei hi; kuapeuh thil hihkhial in amah a mu kei a, amah leng a theikei hi.
‍Tate aw, kuamah khem in omkei un. Diktatna hihmi amah a diktat mah bang in a diktat hi.
‍Thil hihkhialmi Diabol a pawt ahi; Diabol in a tung a kipan thil a hihkhial hi. Pathian Tapa honglat napen Diabol nasepte a hih manthat theihna ding in ahi.
‍Kuapeuh Pathian a suak in Pathian chi amah a a om gige ziak in thil a hihkhial kei, Pathian a suak a hih ziak in, thil a hihkhial theikei hi.
‍Hiai ah Pathian tate leh Diabol tate a theihtheih hi; kuapeuh diktatna hihlou Pathian a suak ahi kei a, a unau itlou leng Pathian a suak ahi kei hi.
A tung a kipan thukhah na zak uh i ki-ittuah chiat ding uh chih ahi.
‍Kaina, giloupa a kipan amah unau thatpa bang in omkei ni. Bangziak in ahia a thah tak? Amah thilhihte a gilou a, a unau thilhihte a dik ziak in ahi.
‍Naute aw, khovel in nou a honhuat leh lamdang sa kei un.
‍Unaute i it ziak in sihna a kipan in i pawt ua, hinna ah i lutta chih i thei uhi. Kuapeuh itna neilou sihna ah a omlai hi.
‍Kuapeuh a unau hua tualthat ahi; tualthatmi tangtawn hinna nei a omkei uh chih na thei uhi.
‍Hiai ah itna bang ahia chih i thei hi, aman tuh ei ading in a hinna a piaktak ziak in; en leng unaute ading in i hinna i piaksam ding ahi.
‍Himahleh kuapeuh in khovel sum nei in, a unau tasam in mu taleh, amah lainat tuankei leh Pathian itna amah a bangchi’n a om ding?
‍Naute aw, thu kia in itkei ni, lei kia in leng itsam keini, thilhih leh chihtaktak in hi zaw hen.
‍Hiai in thutak a suak i hi chih hon theisak a, amah ma ah i lungtang i muangsak thak ding hi.
‍I lungtang in siamlouh a hon tansak dek chiang in chihna ahi; Pathian zaw i lungtangte sang in a lianzaw a thil bangkim a thei hi.
‍Deihtakte aw, i lungtang in siamlouh a hontan kei leh Pathian lam ah i hangsan hi:
A thupiakte i zuih ua, a mitmuh a thil kipahhuai i hih zel ziak in i nget peuhmah amah a kipan in i muzel uhi.
‍Huan a thupiak hiai ahi, a Tapa Jesu Khrist min gingta lehang, aman thu a honpiak bang in ki-ittuah chiat lai lehang.
A thupiakte zuimi amah ah a om gige a, Amah mah leng amah ah a om gige hi. Huan Kha a honpiak ah amah eimau ah a om gige chih i thei uhi.
Deihtakte aw, kha napeuh gingta kei un, himahleh khate Pathian a kipan ahi uhiam hilou chih chian un; zawlnei taklou tampi khovel a a na pawttak ziak un.
‍Hiai ah Pathian Kha na thei ding uh, bang kha peuh Jesu Khrist sa in a hongpai chih gum Pathian a kipan ahi.
‍Bang kha peuh Jesu gumlou Pathian a kipan ahi kei; huai tuh Khrist doumi kha, hongpai ding na zak uh ahi; tuin khovel ah a om khinta hi.
‍Naute aw, Pathian a kipan na hi ua, tuate na zouta uhi; noumau a om khovel a om sang a a thupizawk ziak in.
Amau khovel a ahi ua; huaiziak in khovel a bang in a pau ua, khovel in a thu uh a ngaikhia hi.
‍Eite Pathian a kipan i hi ua, Pathian thei mite’n i thu a ngaikhe zel uhi; Pathian a kipanlou mite’n i thu a ngaikhe kei uhi. Hiai ah thutak Kha leh thutaklou kha i thei uhi.
‍Deihtakte aw, i ki-ittuah chiat ding uh; itna Pathian a suak ahi ngal a, michih itna nei peuhmah Pathian a suak ahi khin ua, Pathian a theilai uhi.
‍Itna neilou in Pathian a theikei; Pathian itna ahi.
‍Hiai ah Pathian itna i tung uah a honglangta hi, amah ziak a i hin theihna din Pathian in a Tapa neihsun khovel a a honsawlna ah;
‍Hiai ah itna a om, eite’n Pathian i it uh ka chi ahi kei, aman a hon it a, i khelhnate thuphatawina ding in, a Tapa a honsawl ka chi zaw hi.
‍Deihtakte aw, Pathian in huchitel a a hon it leh, eite leng i ki-ittuah chiat ding uh ahi.
‍Kuamah in chiklai mah in Pathian a mu ngeikei hi. I ki-ittuah chiat uleh Pathian eimau ah a om gige dia, a itna leng eimau ah a kimlai ding hi.
Amah ah i om gige chih leh amah eimau ah a om gige chih Kha a honpiak tak ziak in hiai ah i thei hi.
‍Huan Pa in Tapa khovel Hondampa hihna nei in a honsawl chih i muta ua, i theisak uhi.
‍Kuapeuh Jesu Pathian Tapa ahi chi a gum amah ah Pathian a om gige a, amah leng Pathian ah a om gige hi.
‍Pathian in eimau adia itna a nei chih i thei ua, i gingta lai uhi. Pathian itna ahi; itna a om gige mi Pathian ah a om gige a, Pathian leng amah ah a om gige hi.
‍Hiai ah i tung uah itna a kimta, vaihawm ni ading a laulou a i om theihna ah; amah om bang a khovel a i om ziak in.
‍Itna ah launa a omkei, itna kim in lauhna a delhkhe zawzel hi, lauhna in gawtna a hon ngaihtuahsak; a laumi itna ah a bukim kei hi.
Aman a hon it masak ziak in i it uhi.
‍Min, “Pathian ka it” chi in a unau haw leh amah zuauthei ahi; a unau a muhsa bawn a it ken, Pathian a muh ngeilouhpi bangchi’n a it thei dia?
Amah kiang a kipan in hiai thupiak i nei uhi, kuapeuh in Pathian a it leh a unau leng a it sam ding chihna ahi.
Kuapeuh Jesu, Khrist ahi chih gingta Pathian suahsak ahi; kuapeuh a suaksakpa it in a suahsak leng a it nak hi.
‍Hiai ah Pathian tate i itna ah Pathian i it a, a thupiakte i zui chih i thei uhi.
‍Pathian i itna hiai ahi, a thupiakte i zuihna; a thupiakte a haksa ngal kei hi.
‍Pathian suahsak peuh in khovel a zouzel hi; hiai ahi khovel tung a vualzohna, i ginna uh.
‍Jesu Pathian Tapa ahi chih gingmi kia ngallou, kuan khovel a zouzel a?
‍Hiai ahi tui leh sisan a hong paipa, Jesu Khrist; tui kia ah hilou in, tui ah leh sisan ah ahizaw. Theisakpa tuh Kha ahi, Kha thutak a hih ziak in.
‍Van tung ah theihpih thum a om a, Pa, Thu leh Kha Siangthou ahi ua, amaute khat ahi uhi.
‍Leitung ah theihpihtu thum a om uhi, Kha leh tui leh sisan; huai thumte a kithutuak uhi.
‍Mihing theihsakna bawn i san leh Pathian theihsakna a thupizaw hi. Pathian theihsakna tuh Ka Tapa tanchin ka theisakta chih ahi.
‍Pathian Tapa gingta min amah ah theihna a nei a, Pathian gingtalou min amah zuauthei in a bawl hi; Pathian in a Tapa tanchin a theihsak a gintak louh ziak in.
‍Theihsakna hiai ahi, Pathian in tangtawn hinna a honpia a, huai hinna a Tapa ah a om hi.
‍Tapa nei in hinna a nei hi; Pathian Tapa neilou in hinna a neikei hi.
‍Tangtawn hinna na nei uh chih na theihna ding un, nou Pathian Tapa min gingtate kiang ah hiai thu ka gelh ahi.
‍Hiai pen amah tung a i hangsanna ahi, bangpeuh amah deihlam bang a i nget leh aman a hon ngaihkhiak sak hi.
‍Huchi in bangpeuh i nget a hon ngaihkhiak sak chih i thei leh a kiang a i thilnget i muta chih i thei hi.

‍Kuapeuh in a unau sihna khop hilou khelhna hih in mu leh a ngetsak ding, huchi in Pathian in a ngenmi kiang ah sihna khop hilou khelhna hihte ading in hinna a pe ding hi. Sihna khop khelhna a om a; huchibang lam ah a ngetsak ding ka chi ahi kei hi.
‍Diktatlouhna tengteng khelhna ahi; sihna khop hilou khelhna leng a omsam hi.
‍Kuapeuh Pathian suahsak in thil a hihkhial kei chih i thei hi; Pathian Tapa neihsun in amah a kem gige a, gilou pa’n khoih leng a khoih theikei hi.
‍Huan eite Pathian a kipan i hi chih i thei ua, khovel pumpi bel giloupa thuthu in a om chih i thei hi.

‍Huan Pathian Tapa a hongpai a, mi diktatpa i theihna ding in theihtheihna a honpia chih i thei behlap uhi; eite a Tapa Jesu Khrist a i om in mi diktatpa ah i om uhi. Amah Pathian diktak leh tangtawn hinna ahi.
‍Naute aw, milim lak ah kihemkhia un, Amen.
‍Upa in, thutak a ka it mahmah numei hoih, tel a omnu leh a tate kiang ah; kei kia hilou in, thutak thei peuhmahte’n a hon it uhi;
‍Thutak eimah a om gige, tangtawn a i kiang ua om gige ding a hih ziak in:
‍Pa Pathian leh Toupa Jesu Khrist, Pa Tapa kiang a kipan hehpihna, zahngaihna, lemna thutak leh itna in noute hon ompih hen.
‍Pa kiang a kipan a thupiak i muh bang in na ta kuate hiam thutak a om a ka muh ziak in ka kipak mahmah hi.
‍Numei hoih, na kiang a thupiak thak gelh hilou in, a tung a kipan a i neihpen gelhzaw in, i ki-ittuah theihna ding in nget petmah in k’on ngen hi.
‍Huan hiai itna ahi, a thupiak bangzel a i omna uh. Hiai ahi thupiak a tung a kipat a na zak uh, huai ah na om ding uh ahi.
‍Khemmi tampi Jesu Khrist sa in a hongpai chih gumlou khovel ah a hong pawtta uhi. Tua mite ahi, khemmi leh Khrist doumi.
‍I sepkhiaksate mangsaklou a, a kipahman bukim a i muh theihna ding un, nangmah kiveng hoih in.
‍Kuapeuh huai thu kihilhna thu a om gige lou a talek in Pathian a neikei; huai thu kihilhna thu a a om gige in Pa leh Tapa a neikhawm hi.
‍Kuapeuh huai thu kihilhna thu hon pawlou a, na kiang ua a hongpai leh na inn uah tungsak kei unla, paukam hoih in kha kei un.
‍Paukam hoih a khami a thil hihkhelh ah a pangsam hi.
‍Na kiang ua thu tampi gen ding ka neih ziak in lai leh laitui a gelh ka ut kei a; na kipahna uh a kim theihna ding in na kiang ua hong a, kimaituah a kihou ka lamen zaw hi.
‍Na sanggamnu tel tate un chibai a honbuk uhi, Amen.
‍Upa in, deihtak Gaias thutak a ka it kiang ah:
‍Deihtak, na kha in vualzawlna a muh bang in, bangkim a vualzawlna na muh leh na dam theihna ding in ka thum zel hi.
‍Unaute a hongpai un, thutak a na hindan leh na muanhuai dan a hon theihsak ziak un ka kipak mahmah hi.
‍Ka tate thutak ah a om uh chih ka zak kan a kipahna thupizaw ka neikei hi.
‍Deihtak unaute mikhual himahle uh, a tung ua na hih peuh ah muanhuaitak in na hih zel hi:
‍Huaite’n saptuamte ma ah na itna a theisakta uhi; amau tuh a zinna ua Pathian mi hihtuak him a na makaih leh na hih hoih ding hi.
Amau Khrist min a a zinna uah Jentelte kiang a kipan bangmah lalou in a pawt zel uhi.
‍Huchi in thutak a seppihte i hihtheihna ding in huchibang mite eite’n i kipahpih ding ahi.
‍Saptuamte kiang ah thu neukha zaw ka gelhta; himahleh Diotrephes, a lak ua tungnun utnakpa’n a kipahpih kei hi.

‍Huaiziak in ka hongpai leh a thilhihte ka pholhkhe ding a, i tung ua thu dikloupi a gen a a kamtam dan ka thei khesak ding hi. Huai leng hun a sa kei a, amah ngei in unaute a kipahpih kei a, a kipahpih nuamte leng khou in saptuamte lak a kipan a delhkhia hi.
‍Deihtak, gilou mi omdan ching ken, a hoih chingzaw in. Thil hoih hihmi tuh Pathian apan ahi; thil gilou hihmi’n Pathian a mu ngeikei hi.
‍Demetrias in mi tengteng phat a loh a, thutak a phat nangawn a loh behlap hi; eite’n leng i phat ua, hiai phatna a dik ahi chih na thei hi.
‍Na kiang ah thu tampi gelh ding ka nei hi, himahleh laitui leh laipuan in gelh ka ut kei hi.
‍Sawtlou nungchiang in honmuh ka lamen hi, huchi in kimaituah in i kihou ding.
‍Khamuanna na tung ah om hen. I lawmte’n chibai a honbuk uhi. A min uh louchiat in lawmte chibai hon buksak in.
‍Juda, Jesu Khrist sikha leh Jakob unau in, Pa Pathian sehtuam siangthoute leh Jesu Khrist a kep leh sap a omte kiang ah:
‍Hehpihna, lemna leh itna na tung uah hihkhan in om hen.

‍Deihtakte aw, i kikop hotdamna thu na kiang ua gelh teitei ka tuplai in, misiangthoute kiang a ginna khatvei kepsak a om thu a, phatuamngai tak a humbit a pang ding a hon hanthawn ding in, na kiang ua laigelh a kiphamoh chih ka na thei hi.
‍Mi kuate hiam a guk a honglut a om ua, nidanglai apan hiai siamlouhtanna dia sehte; huaite’n Pathian hehpihna kaikawi in, i Heutupa leh i Toupa neihsun, Jesu Khrist a kitheihmohbawl behlap uhi.
‍Huan bangkim khatvei in thei vek mahle u chin, Toupa’n Aigupta gam a kipan a mite a suahtaksak a, huai nung a gingtaloute tuh a hih manthat dan nou hon theihsak nawn ka ut hi.
‍Huan angelte, amau sawltak hihna zuilou a, a omna ngei uh paisante ni thupi vaihawmna ading a mialnuai a tangtawn gawtna a henkawm in a sit hi.

‍Sodom leh Gomorrah leh a kiang kim ua khuate kingaihna a kipumpiak a, gitlouhna lek lua, amau mihinpih loute nangawn enlah a a delhtak ziak un, tangtawn mei a gawt a om dingte etsakna ding a suankhiak in a om uhi.
‍Himahleh huai te’n leng huchi bangmah in, a deihthusam bang un sa a hih thanghuai ua, vaihawmsakna a musit ua, thupinate a gense nak uhi.
‍Himahleh Mikael angel tungnungpen in bawn, Diabol toh a kisel ua, Mosi luang thu a a kinak lai un a tungthu gensak in amah a gense ngam kei hi, “Toupa’n hontai zaw hen” a chi zawta hi.
‍Huai mite’n bel thil a theihlouh peuh uh a gensia ua; ngaihtuahna neilou ganhingte bang a theihsiamna pianpih a neihte un, huai lampang ah amau a kihihsia uhi.
A tung uh a gik hi! Kaina lampi a zui ua, punna delh in Balaam mawhna ah a tai ua, Kora thukalhna ah a mangthangta uhi.

‍Hiaite ahi uh na itna Ankuangluina ua hih melhemtu leh lauhuai kiselte, amau mah kikhem, angsung ngaihtuah a, maingaltak a tathangte; mei tuipai lou, huih mut lengte ahi ua; phavang a sing gahlou, nihvei sisa, a zung toh bawhkhiakte ahi uhi;
‍Tuipi kihot vonvon, amau zahlakna thankhia ahi ua; aksi vialvak, amau dia tangtawn a mial bing bikbek sitsakte ahi uhi.
‍Huan Enok, Adam a kipan khang sagihna in hiai mite tungtang ah, “Ngai un, Toupa a misiangthou sang sawmte toh a hongpai hi, chi in a na genkhol hi.

‍Mi tengteng tung a vaihawm ding leh Pathian limsakloute tengteng Pathian limsaklouhna leh Pathian limsakloute tung a a sep tengteng uah leh, Pathian limsaklou mikhialte’n a tung a thukhauh tak a gen tengteng ua siamlouh tangsak ding in” a chi hi.
‍Huaite phunhatte leh ngohhatte ahi ua, amau utna bangzel in a om ua, a kamte un leng kiotsakna thu a gen gawpgawp ua, punna deihman in mite maitangphat a deih uhi.
‍Himahleh deihtakte aw, nouzaw i Toupa Jesu Khrist sawltakte’n thu a genkholhte uh theigige un.
‍“Hun nanung ah Pathian limsaklouhna lam a amau utna bangzel a om, nuihsanhatte a hongom ding uh” chih na kiang ua a gendante uh.
‍Huai mite sami, kha neilou, pawltuam bawlte ahi uhi.
‍Himahleh deihtakte, nou zaw na ginna siangthou tung a noumau leh noumau kilemtou in, Kha Siangthou a thum in.
‍Tangtawn hinna neihsakna khop i Toupa Jesu Khrist hehpihna ngak in, Pathian itna ah kikem hoih un.
‍Khenkhatte, ginglah a omte hehpih unla;
‍Khenkhatte, mei a kipan in lakhe zok unla, hondam un; khenkhatte, a sa thanghuai banna uh puansilh lam leng kih in, laukawm in hehpih un.
‍Tuin, na puklouhna ding ua hon vengthei leh a thupina ma a nakpitak a nuamsa leh nin banglou a nou hon koih theipa,
‍Hondampa, Pathian tak kia kiang ah, i Toupa Jesu Khrist ziak in, hun himhim omma leh tu leh tangtawn dong in, pahtawina, thupina, vaihawmna, thuneihna, om hen, Amen.
Jesu Khrist kilakna, Pathian in a sikhate kiang a lahkhiak ding a amah a piak, thil hong ompah mahmah dingte: Huan aman a sikha Johan kiang ah a angel sawl in chiamtehna in a theisak hi.
‍Johan in Pathian thu leh Jesu Khrist tungtang a a thilmuhte tengteng a theisakta hi.
‍Hiai genkholhna thute sim a, a thute za a, huai a thil kigelhte zuite a hampha uhi: a hun a naitak ziak in .
‍Johan in Asia gam a om saptuam sagihte kiang ah: Amah omlel, omsa leh hongpai ngei dingpa a kipan leh, a mangtutphah ma a om, Kha sagihte a kipan in hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen:
‍Jesu Khrist, theihpihpa ginom, misite lak a piang masapen leh leitung a kumpipate vaihawmpa ahi. Eite hon it a i khelhna a kipan a a sisan a honsawppa amah kiang ngei ah;
‍leh lalgam hi ding a honbawl, Pathian leh a Pa kiang a siampute hi ding a honbawl, amah kiang ah thupina leh vaihawmna, tangtawn, tangtawn in om hen, Amen.
Ngai in, meipi toh a hongpai hi;
mit teng in amah a mu ding ua,
amah sunte’n leng;
leitung a nam tengteng in amah a kah ding uh, huai bang hi hen, Amen.
‍“Kei Alpha leh Omega, a bul leh a tawp” Toupa Pathian, omsa, omlel leh hongpai ding Bangkim hihthei in a chi hi.
‍Kei, Johan, Jesu a om haksa thuakna leh lalgam leh kuhkalna a, na unau uleh na tanpihpa uh, Pathian leh Jesu theihpihna ziak in tuikulh gam Patmos kichi ah ka om hi.
Toupa ni in Kha in ka om hi, ka nunglam ah aw ngaihtak in pengkul ging bang ka za hi.

Aw in, “Kei Alpha leh Omega, abul leh atawp ka hi, Na thilmuhte laibu ah gelh inla, Asia gam a saptuam sagih, Ephesa saptuam, Smarna saptuam, Pergamos saptuam, Thaitira saptuam, Sardis saptuam, Philadelphia saptuam leh Laodisia saptuamte kiang ah khak in” a chih ka zata hi.
‍Huan kei hon houpih huai aw muh tum in ka kihei hi. Huchi a ka kihei leh dangkaeng tuikuang koihna sagih ka muta hi.
‍Huai tuikuang koihna lai ah kuahiam Mihing Tapa toh kibang, a khepek tuampha puansilh, a awm kimvel dangkaeng gakna a kigak ka muta hi.
A lu leh a sam samul ngou leh vuk bang in a ngou a; a mitte meikuang bang ahi.
A khepekte sumsan nawttet meipi a halsiangsa a bang a, huan a aw tui tampi ging bang ahi.
‍Huan a khut taklam in aksi sagih a tawi a; a kam a kipan in namsau hiamtuah a suakkhia a; huan a mel ni a sat sanlai bang ahi.
‍Huchi a amah ka muhtak in, misi bang in a khebul ah ka pukta hi. Huan aman a khut taklam ka tung a koih in, “Lau ken, a masapen leh a nanungpen ka hi.
‍Mihing ka hi; ka hongsi a, ngai in tangtawn in ka hing hi, sihna leh misi khaw tahbi ka nei hi.
‍Huaiziak in na thil muhsate, thil omlelte leh tunung a thil hongom dingte gelh in.
‍Ka khut taklam a aksi sagih na muhte leh dangkaeng tuikuang koihna sagihte thuguk hiai ahi: Aksi sagihte saptuam sagihte angelte ahi ua; tuikuang koihna sagihte saptuam sagihte ahi uh” a chi hi.
“Ephesa khua saptuamte angel kiang ah hichibang in gelh in: A khut taklam a aksi sagih tawi dangkaeng tuikuang koihna sagih lai a vialvakpa’n hiai thilte a gen hi:
‍“Na thilhihte, na sepgim dan leh na kuhkal dan, migiloute na ngaihmoh dan leh hiloupi a amau sawltak kichite na ze-et a, amaute zuauthei ahi uh chih na muhkhiak dan ka thei hi.
‍Huan thuakzohna na nei a, ka min ziak in na thuak teitei a, huchi in leng na bah kei hi.
‍Himahleh n’on itna masapen na tawpsan thu ah k’on dem hi.

‍Huaiziak in na pukna laitak theigige inla, kisik in, na thilhih masapente hih nawn in; huchilou in zaw na kiang ah ka hongpai dia, na kisik kei leh a omna kipan in na tuikuang koihna ka suan ding hi.
‍Himahleh hiai thu ah na hoih, Nikol pawlte thilhihte na hua a, ken leng huaite ka hua hi.
‍Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za uhen. A vualzoupa kiang ah Pathian Paradise a om, hinna sing a nek ding in ka pe ding a chi, chi in.
‍“Huan Smarna khua a saptuamte angel kiang ah hichibang in gelh in: A masapen leh a nanungpen, huai si a hing nawnta in hiai thilte a gen hi:
‍“Na thilhihte, na gimthuak dan leh na zawn dan, himahleh na hau hi, Judate hiloupi, ahi a kigen Setan kikhopna innte Pathian gensiatna ka thei hi.

‍Na thuak pah ding thilte kihta ken; ngai in, ze-et a na om theihna ding un Diabol in na lak ua a khente suangkulh ah honkhum pah ding; ni sawm sung gimthuakna na nei ding uhi. Sihpha in ginom in om in, huchi in hinna lallukhu k’on pe ding hi.
‍Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen bilnei peuh in za uhen. A vualzoupa sih nihna hihnat in a omkei ding a chi, chi in.
‍“Huan Pergamom khua a saptuamte angel kiang ah hichibang in gelh in: Namsau hiam tak hiamtuah nei in hiai thilte a gen hi:
‍Na tenna leh Setan mangtutphah omna leng ka thei hi; ka min kiptak in na lenden a, Setan tenna mun a ka palai ginom, Antipas thah a a omlai in leng na ginna na tawpsan tuankei hi.

‍Himahleh demna zek k’on nei, huailai a mi khenkhat Balaam sinsakna zuite na ompih ziak in, Israel tate ma a kipukna koih ding leh milimte kiang a kithoihna thilte ne ding leh kingaihna khelhna hih ding in aman tuh Balak a thuhilh hi.
‍Huchi bangmah in Nikol pawlte sinsakna zui, mi khenkhat mah na ompih hi;
‍Huaiziak in kisik in; huchilou in zaw na kiang ah ka hongpai pah dia, amau ka kam a namsau in ka dou ding hi.

‍Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za uhen. A vualzoupa kiang ah manna selguk ka pe ding, huan suangpek ka pedia, huai suang tung ah min thak, a neipa chih louh ngal theihlouh a kigelh a chi, chi in.
‍“Huan Thaitira khua a saptuamte angel kiang ah hichibang in gelh in: Pathian Tapa, meikuang bang mit nei a sumsan nawttet bang khe neipa’n, hiai thilte a gen hi:
‍Na thilhihte leh na itna leh na ginna leh na nasepna leh na thuakzohna ka thei hi, a masapen sang in na thilhih nanungte a tam zaw hi.

‍Himahleh hiai thu ah demna k’on nei hi, huai numei Jezebel, zawlnei kichinu khawk na saklouh ziak in; aman ka sikhate kingaihna khelhna hih ding leh milimte kiang a kithoihna thilte ne ding a khem in a hilh hi.
‍Huchi in amah a kisikna ding in hun ka pia hi; huan a mingaihna khelhna ah a kisik tuankei hi.
‍Ngai in, amah damlou lupna ah ka pai ding a, a thilhihte a kisik tuankei leh amah angkawm teng leng gimthuakna thupi ah ka pai ding hi.
‍Huan hi in a tate ka that dia; saptuamte tengteng in lungsim kiheinate leh lungtang theipa kei ka hi chih a thei ding uhi; na thilhihte bangbang un na lak ua mi tengteng ka pe ding hi.
‍Himahleh, nou, Thaitira a om midangte hiai thuhilh neilou a, ‘Setan thil thukte’ theilou tengteng kiang ah tunggikna dang na tung uah k’on behlap kei ding, ka chi hi.
‍Himahleh ka hong mateng na neihpen uh lenkip un.
‍Huan a vualzoupa leh a tawppha a ka nnate kempa kiang ah, namte tung a thuneihna ka pe ding hi;
Aman sik chiang in amau tung ah vai a hawm ding a, leibel bang in amau a khentam ding hi, hiai thuneihna ka Pa apan ka muh ahi.
‍Huan amah zingsol aksi ka pe ding hi.
‍Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za uhen a chi hi.
“Huan Sardis khua a saptuamte angel kiang ah hichibang in gelh in: Pathian Kha sagih leh aksi sagih neipa’n hiai thilte a gen hi:
“Na thilhihte ka thei, sinapi in hingmin na pua hi.
‍Kiveng in, thil omsunte, sidia kisate, tungding nawn in; ka Pathian ma ah na thilhih zohsa settheih ka mu kei hi.
‍Huaiziak in na muhdan leh na zakdan theigige in; kem inla, kisik in. Huchi a na kiven kei leh guta bang in ka hongpai dia, bangchik hun in ahia nang k’on phawn ding chih na theikei hi.
‍Himahleh Sardis khua ah min tawmchik a puante uh hihnin lou na nei hi; amaute puanngou silh a kei toh tonkhawm ding a kilawm him ahi uhi.
A vualzoupa huchibang in puanngou in a kizem dia, bangchi mah in hinna laibu a kipat a min ka hihmang kei ding hi, ka Pa ma leh angelte ma ah a min ka gum ding hi.
‍Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za uhen a chi, chi in.

‍“Philadelphia khua a saptuamte angel kiang ah hichibang in gelh in; Huai siangthoupa, dikpa leh David tahbi neipa, amah hon kuamah in a khak theihlouh leh amah khak kuamah in a hon theihlouh pa’n hiai thilte a gen:
‍“Na thilhihte ka thei, ngai in, na ma ah kuamah khak theihlouh kong honsa ka koih hi; thilhihtheihna neuchik na nei a, ka thu na kem a, ka min na paikei hi.
‍Ngai in, zuaulel gen a hilou napi Judate hi a kigen Setan omkhawmnate k’on pia hi; ngai in, amau k’on paisak dia, na khebul ah ka kunsak ding a, nang k’on it dan a theihna ding un.
‍Ka dohzohna thu na kep ziak in, ze-et a na om chiang in ken leng k’on kem ding, huai hun khovel pumpi tung a hongtung ding ahi, leitung a om tengteng leng ze-et ding in.
‍Ka hongpai pah dia: kuamah in na lallukhu a laklouhna ding in, na neihpen kem kinken in.

A vualzoupa ka Pathian biakin ah khuam in ka pangsak dia, huai a kipan in a paikhe nawn kei ding, amah tung ah ka Pathian min leh ka Pathian khopi Jerusalem thak, ka Pathian a kipan van a hongpai khesuk min leh keimah min thak ka gelh ding hi.
‍Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za uhen a chi, chi in.
‍“Huan Laodisia khua a saptuamte angel kiang ah hichibang in gelh in: Theihpihpa ginom leh dik, Pathian thilsiam bul Amen in hiai thilte a gen:
‍“Na thilhihte ka thei, lum lah lumlou, vot lah votlou in na om a: na lum leh lum inla na vot leh vot vanglak in!
‍Lum lah lumlou, vot lah votlou a, na om pelhpulh ziak in, ka kam a kipan in k’on sekhe ding hi.
‍Mi genthei nuamsa lou, zawng, mitdel leh vuaktang na hihlam kithei lou a, ‘ka hausa, hauhsaknate ka neita, bangmah ka kitasam kei’ na chih ziak in:

‍Kei a kipan in dangkaeng mei a hih siangthousa lei ding in k’on thuhilh ahi, na hong hauhsak theihna ding in; puanngoute na honsilh a, na vuaktang zumhuaina a dawklouhna ding in; huan na muh theihna ding in na mit a nuh ding mitlou lei in.
‍Ka itte ka thuhilh in ka sawi a; huaiziak in phatuamngai inla, kisik in.
‍Ngai in kongkhak a ding in ka kiu hi: min ka aw a zak a kong a honleh a kiang ah ka lut dia amah toh nitakan ka ne dia, aman leng kei toh a ne ding hi.
A vualzoupa ka mangtutphah tung ah ka kiang ah ka tusak ding, keileng ka vualzou a, mangtutphah tung a ka Pa toh ka tut bang in.
‍Saptuamte kiang a Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za uhen a chi” chi in, a chi.

Hiai thilte nung in, ka et leh ngai in, van ah kongkhak a kihong hi: ka aw zak masapen pengkul aw ging bang in kei a hon houpih hi: “Hiai ah hongtou in, huchi in tunung chiang a thil hongom dingte k’on musak ding” a chi hi.
‍Huai phet in Kha in ka om hi; Ngai in, van ah mangtutphah a hong kitungta a, mangtutphah tung ah mi khat a tu hi.
‍Huai mi jasper leh karnelia suang bang in a kimu a; huai mangtutphah kimvel ah sakhituihup, emerald suang bang mai a kimu in a zam hi.
‍Huan huai mangtutphah kimvel ah mangtutphah dang sawmnih leh li a om a; tua mangtutphahte tung ah Upa sawmnih leh li puanngou a kizema tu ka muta a, amau dangkaeng lallukhu a khu chiat uhi.
‍Huai mangtutphah a kipan in khophiate, awte, leh vanpi gingte a hong suakkhia hi. Huan mei khawnvak sagih, mangtutphah ma ah a kuang a, huaite Pathian Kha sagihte ahi uhi;
‍Huai mangtutphah ma ah Kristal bang a siang limlang tuipi a om hi. Huai mangtutphah kimvel ah ganhing nunglam leh malam mit a dim a om uhi.
A ganhing khatna humpinelkai bang ahi a, ganhing nihna bawngnou bang ahi a, ganhing thumna in mihing mai bang a nei hi, ganhing lina muvanlai lenglai bang ahi.
‍Huai ganhing lite’n kha guk a neichiat ua, tua khate kimvel leh a sunglam a mit a dim ahi: amau sun leh zan khawllou in,
“Siangthou, Siangthou, Siangthou,
Toupa Pathian,
Bangkim hihthei,
omsa omlel leh hongom ding,” a chi uhi.
‍Huan huai amah mangtutphah tung a tupa leh huai amah tangtawn tangtawn a hingpa kiang a ganhingte’n, thupina leh zah-omna leh kipahna thu a piak chiang un,
Amah mangtutphah tung a tupa ma ah Upa sawmnih leh lite a khupboh uhi, huai mangtutphah ma a a manglukhute uh koih in, amah tangtawn tangtawn a hingpa a bia uhi.
“Nang ka Toupa leh ka
Pathian uh,
thupina, zahhuaina,
thilhihtheihna mutak na hi;
thil tengteng nang na bawl a,
nang thu ziak a om leh siam ahi uhi” a chi uhi.
Huai mangtutphah tung a tupa khut taklam ah laibu a sunglam leh a pawlam kigelh chiamtehna sagih a chiamteh ka muta hi.
Angel hat khat in aw ngaihtak in, “Kua ahia laibu hong a, huai a chiamtehnate phel tham?” chi a phuangkhia ka mu hi.
‍Huan vantung hi in, leitung hiam, ahihkeileh lei nuai ah leng huai laibu hongthei hiam, ahihkeileh a tung enthei kuamah a omkei hi.
‍Huchi in huai laibu hong a simtak hiam, ahihkeileh a tung entak kuamah a omlouh ziak in ka kapkap hi:
‍Huan upate lak a khat in ka kiang ah, “Kap kenla ngai in, humpinelkai, Juda nam a, David Zung in, laibu hongthei ding leh huai a chiamtehna sagihte phelthei ding in a vualzouta” a chi hi.

‍Huan huai mangtutphah leh huai ganhing lite leh huai upate lai ah thahsa hileh kilawm, Belamnou, ki sagih leh mit sagih nei ding ka mu a, huai mit sagihte Pathian kha sagih leitung tengteng a sawlkhiakte ahi uhi.
Amah a hongpai a, mangtutphah tung a tupa khut taklam a kipan laibu a lata hi.

‍Huai laibu a laktak in, ganhing lite leh Upa sawmnih leh lite, gawsem khat chiat leh dangkaeng belhbute gimnamtui a dimchiat tawi in, Belamnou ma ah a khupboh ua, huai gimnamtui misiangthoute thumna ahi.
‍Huan la thak khat a sa uhi:
“Laibu la a, huai a chiamtehnate phel tham na hi:
thah in na omta a,
chichih leh pauchih leh michih leh namchih a mite
Pathian ading a na sisan a na leitak ziak in.
Ka Pathian kiang uah amau
Lalgam leh siampute hi ding in na bawl a;
Amau leitung ah vai a hawm ding uh” chi in.
‍Huan ka etleh, mangtutphah leh ganhingte leh upate kimvel ah, angel tampi aw ka zata hi. A tam dan uh sangsawm mun sangsawm leh a sang a sang tampi ahi uhi;
Amau aw ngaihtak in:
“Thah a om,
Belamnouin hatnate,
hauhsaknate, thilhihtheihnate, zahtakhuainate, thupinate,
vualzawlnate mu tham na hi”
chi in a kikou uhi.
‍Huan thilsiam khempeuh van a omte, leitung a omte, leinuai a omte, tuipi tung a omte leh amau a thil omte tengteng in:
“Mangtutphah tung a tupa leh
Belamnou kiang ah:
Vualzawlnate, zahtakhuainate,
thupinate leh vaihawmnate,
tangtawn tangtawn in om hen”
a chih uh ka za hi.
‍Huan ganhing lite’n, “Amen!” a chi uhi. Upate a khupboh ua, a beta uhi.
Belamnou in chiamtehna sagihte lak a khat a phellai ka mu a, ganhing lite lak a khat aw in, vanpiging bang mai in, “Hongpai in,” a chih ka zata hi.
‍Ka et leh ngai in, sakol kang leh a tung a tupa thalpeu tawi ka muta a; amah kiang ah lallukhu piak in a om a; amah vualzou a vualzou zouzel ding in a hong paikheta hi.
‍Huan chiamtehna nihna a phellai in, ganhing nihna, in “Hongpai in” a chih ka za hi.
‍Sakol dang khat a san, hong paikhia hi: huai tung a tupa kiang ah leitung a kipan lemna lakhe ding a thupiak ahi a, huchi a amau a kithah tuahna ding un: amah kiang a namsau thupi piak ahita hi.
‍Huan chiamtehna thumna a phellai in ganhing thumna in, “Hongpai in,” a chih ka zata hi. Ka etleh ngai in, sakol vawm ka muta hi; a tung a tupa’n a khut in bukna a tawi hi.
