‍Huan ganhing lite lai ah aw hileh kilawm in, “Huitbuh tehna dan khat shilling khat, huan barli buh tehna danthum in shilling khat, huan thau leh uain zaw hihse ken” a chih ka za hi.
‍Chiamtehna lina a phellai in, ganhing lina aw in, “Hongpai in,” a chih ka za hi.

‍Ka et leh ngai in, sakol daang ka muta hi: a tung a tupa min Sihna ahi a, Misikhua toh a kizui uhi. Namsau, kial leh sihna leh leitung a gam sahangte thah ding in amau kiang ah leitung seh li suah seh khat tung a thuneihna piak ahita hi.
‍Chiamtehna ngana a phellai in, Pathian thu ziak leh a zuih uh theihsakna ziak a amau thah a omte maitam nuai ah ka muta hi:
Amaute aw ngaihtak a kikou in, “Toupa Tungnungpen aw, siangthou leh dik bangtan ka sisan man uh amau leitung a tengte tung a thuklou leh vaihawmlou ding na hia?” a chi uhi.
Amaute kiang ah puanngou thupi piak in a om chiat ua: amau a sikha hihpihte uleh a unaute uh amau bang a thah a om dingte akim mateng uh na khawl tadih un chi a hilh in a om uhi.
‍Chiamtehna gukna a phellai ka mu a, zinling thupitak a om hi: Ni samul saiip puan bang in a vawmta a, kha leng a pum in sisan bang in a santa hi.
‍Van aksite theipi kung huihpi in a mut ling a, a hutte a pulh bang in leitung ah a pulhta uhi.
‍Van laibuzial bang a kizial zou in suanmang in a omta: tangsangte leh tuikulh gam teng a mun ua pat suanmang in a omta uhi.
‍Huchi in leitung kumpipate, miliante, heutute leh ahat leh ahaute, salte leh sallou teng leng tangsangte leh suangpi heng leh kawkhukte ah a kiselta uhi.
‍Tangsangte kiang leh suangpite kiang ah, “Hon delhlum unla, amah mangtutphah tung a tupa leh Belamnou thangpaihna mai a kipan honsel un:
A thangpaihna ni thupi hongtung hi; kua ading zou dia?” a chi uhi.
Hiai thilte zoh in angel li, lei kil li a dingte’n leitung a huih lite leitung a nunglou ding leh tuipitung hiam, ahihkeileh singtung hiam a nunglou ding in a khawlsak uhi.
‍Huan amau chiamtehna apat angel dang kuantou ka muta hi, Pathian hing chiamtehna a nei ua; aman huai angel lite leitung leh tuipi hihse dia piak a omte kiang ah aw ngaihtak a kikou in:
‍Pathian sikhate a tal ua i chiamteh zohma in leitung leh tuipi leh singte hihse kei un, a chi hi.
‍Huai chiamteh a omte lak a tampi, nuai khat leh sing li leh sang li, Israel suan chiteng a kipan chiamteh zah ka zata hi;
‍Juda chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih chiamteh in a om ua,
Reuben chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih;
Gad chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih:
Asher chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih;
Naphtali chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih;
Manasseh chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih;
‍Simeon chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih;
Levi chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih;
Issakar chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih;
‍Zebulun chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih,
Joseph chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih,
Benjamin chi a kipan sing khat leh sang nih.

‍Hiai thilteng zoh in ka et leh ngai in, mipi tampi kuamah simsenglouh, namchih leh chichih leh mi tengteng leh pau tengteng a kipan mangtutphah leh Belamnou ma a ding a, puanngou thupi a kizem a tumnah tawi ka muta hi:
‍Huan amau aw ngaihtak in,
“Mangtutphah a tu i Pathian leh
Belamnou kiang ah hotdamna”
chi in a kikou uhi.
Angel tengteng mangtutphah leh upate leh ganhing lite kimvel in a ding ua; mangtutphah ma a khupboh in, Pathian a bia uhi,
“Amen, Vualzawlnate,
thupinate, pilnate,
zahtakhuainate,
thilhihtheihnate, hatnate,
tangtawn tangtawn in i Pathian
kiang ah om hen” a chi uhi.
‍Huan upate lak a khat in ka kiang ah, “Hiai puanngou thupi a kizemte kuate ahi ua, koi a kipan a hong ahi ua? chi in a hon houpih hi:
‍Ken a kiang ah, “Ka Toupa, nang na thei hi” ka chi hi. Huan aman ka kiang ah, “Hiai mite gimthuakna thupi a kipan hongpai ahi ua, a puanthupi uh sawp in, Belamnou sisan in a hihngou uhi.
‍Huaiziak in
Pathian mangtutphah ma ah a om ua, sun leh zan in a
Pathian biakin uah amah a sep sak uhi;
Amah mangtutphah tung a tupa’n amau tung ah
a puan in a zak ding hi.
A gil uh kial nawn ken chin,
a dang uh tak nawn himhim ken teh,
amau ni in kang ken chin, satna in leng a hihgim kei ding hi.
Belamnou huai mangtutphah
lak a om A belamchingpa uh a hih ding ziak in,
amau hinna tuikhuk ah a piding a;
Pathian in a mit ua kipan khitui a nulhul ding” a chi hi.
Chiamtehna sagihna a phellai in dakkal kimkhat sung van a dai sipsip hi.
‍Huchi in Pathian ma a angel sagih dingte ka mu a, amau kiang ah pengkul sagih piak in a omta uhi.

‍Huan angel dang khat a hongpai a, gimnamtui halna dangkaeng bel tawi in, maitam kiang ah a dingta hi, a kiang ah gimnamtui tampi mangtutphah ma a om dangkaeng maitam teng a misiangthou tengteng thumna toh hel ding in, piak in a om hi.
‍Huai gimnamtui khu leh misiangthoute thumna angel khut a kipan Pathian ma ah a zamtouta hi.
Angel in gimnamtui halna dangkaeng bel a la a; huai maitam a mei in a hihdim a, leitung ah a paikheta hi: huan vangingte leh khophiate leh zinlingte a hong omta hi.
‍Huan angel sagih pengkul sagih tawite mut ding in a kisata uhi.

A masapen in a mutta a, gial leh mei sisan toh kihel a hong omta hi, huaite leitung a paihkhiak in a omta a; leitung mun thum a khen mun khat a kang bei hi, huan sing mun thum a khen mun khat a kang beita a; loupa hing tengteng a kang beita hi.
‍Huan angel nihna in a mutta a, mual lianpi mei a kang bang a kang hileh kilawm tuipi ah paihkhiak in a omta hi; tuipi mun thum a khen mun khat sisan a suakta hi.
‍Huai tuipi a ganhingte hinna neite mun thum a khen mun khat a sita ua; long mun thum a khen mun khat hihsiat in a omta hi.
‍Huan angel thumna in a mutta a, van a kipan in aksi lianpi, meisel bang a kuang a keta hi, lui mun thum a khen mun khat leh tui tuikhukte tung a deng hi.
‍Huai aksi min Khaatna ahi; tui mun thum a khen mun khat khaatna a suak hi; tuite hihkhat a a om ziak un mi tampi a si uhi.

‍Huan angel lina in a mutta a, huan ni mun thum a khen mun khat leh kha mun thum a khen mun khat leh aksi mun thum a khen mun khat hihsiat ahita hi; huchi in a vaknate uh mun thum a khen mun khat hihmial in a omta hi; sun hun seh thum suah seh khat leh zan hun seh thum suah seh khat beisak in a om hi.

‍Huan ka etleh, angel khat van laizawl a leng in aw ngaihtak in, “Tunggik, tunggik, tunggik, Angel thum pengkul mutlai dingte leh huai ging hong omlai dingte ziak in leitung a omte tung a gik” a chih ka zata hi.
Angel ngana in a mutta a, van a kipan aksi leitung a kia ka muta hi; amah kiang ah guamkhuk tawbei honna tahbi piak in a om hi.
Aman guamkhuk tawbei a hongta a; huai guam a kipan in meikhu, meipi khu bang mai a pawttou a, huai guam a meikhu ziak in ni leh huihkhua hihmial in a om hi.
‍Huan meikhu a kipan in khaupe leitung ah a hongsuak a; aikamte’n thilhihtheihna a neih bang in amau thilhihtheihna piak in a omta uhi.
Amau leitung a loupate, thilhing himhimte, leh sing peuhmahte, hihselou a, mi kuapeuh a tal ua Pathian chiamtehna neiloute kia hihse dia hilh in a om uhi.
Amau that lou ding a, kha nga amau hih genthei zaw ding a hilh in a om uhi; huai a hihgentheihna aikam in mi a teh a gentheihna bang ahi.
‍Huai ni chiang in min sihna a zong ding ua, bangchi mah in a mu kei ding uh; sih a ut ding ua, himahleh sihna in amau a taimangsan ding hi.
‍Huan khaupete mel sakol kidouna a pang dia bawl bang ahi ua; a lutung uah lallukhu hileh kilawm dangkaeng hileh kilawm a om a, a mai uh mihingte mai a bang hi.
‍Numei sam bang sam a nei ua, a ha uh humpinelkai ha bang ahi.
A awm uah sik awmphawte a nei ua; a khazap ging uh kidouna lam a sakol tampi tai dupdup, kidouna kangtalai tampi ging bang ahi.
‍Huan aikam bang in meigu nei a nei ua, mihingte kha nga hihnatna ding in a mei uah a thilhihtheihna a nei uhi.
Amaute’n guamkhuk tawbei neitu angel a tung ua kumpipa in a nei uhi: amah min bel Hebru pau in Abaddon ahi a, Grik pau in Appolion ahi.
‍Tunggikna masapen a beita a ngai in, tunggikna nih tunung chiang in a hong tunglai ding hi.
‍Huan angel gukna in a mut a, Pathian ma a om dangkaeng maitam ki a kipan in aw ka zata hi:
‍Huai aw in angel gukna pengkul nei kiang ah, “Luipi Euphrates lui a angel li hen a omte phel in” a chi hi.
‍Huan angel lite phel in a omta ua, amau mi mun thum a khen mun khat a thah theihna ding un, dak khat leh ni khat leh kha khat leh kum khat kisa in a na omta uhi.
‍Huan sakol tungtuang sepaih a tamdan uh sing ngen mun sing nih ahi chi a a tamdan uh kigen ka za hi.

‍Huchibang in kilakna in sakolte leh a tung ua tuangte, mei bang a san, engdup leh kat bang a eng, awmphaw neite ka muta hi: sakolte lu humpinelkai lu bang ahi ua; a kam ua kipan in mei leh meikhu leh kat a suakkhia hi.
‍Huan a kamsung ua kipan in hii thum, mei, meikhu leh kat hong pawtkhia in mihing munthum a khen mun khat thah in a omta uhi.
‍Huai sakolte thilhihtheihna a kam uh leh a mei ua om ahi a; a mei uh gulpi mei toh a kibang ua, lu leng a nei ua, huaite in mi a hihna uhi.

‍Huan midang huai gawtna a siloute a khut ua sepkhiakte ah a kisik tuankei uhi; dawite, dangkaengte, milimte, dangka milimte, suang milimte, leh sing milimte; mutheiloute, zatheilou leh tangtheiloute be nawnlou ding in kisik tuankei uhi.
‍Huan a tualthahna uh, a mibumna uh leh a kingaihna khelhna uh leh a guktakna uh a kisik tuankei uhi.
Huan meipi puansilh a kizem angel hat dang van a kipan hongpai khesuk ka muta hi: sakhituihup a lu tung ah a om a, a mai ni a bang a, a khete mei khuamte bang mai ahi.
A khut a laibu neuchik honsa a tawi a; a khe taklam a tuipi tung sik in a khe veilam leitung ah a nga hi.
‍Humpinelkai humham bang in aw ngaihtak in a kikou a: a kikou khit in vanpiging sagihte’n a aw uh a suah uhi.
‍Huan vanpiging sagihte’n a aw uh a suahtak un gelh ding in ka kisa hi; Van a kipan aw in, Vanpiging sagihte thugen im bikbek inla gelhkhe ken” a chih ka za hi.
‍Huan tuipi tung leh leitung a angel ding ka muh in Vanlam ah a khut taklam a liktouta hi;
‍Huchi in huai tangtawn a hing van leh lei leh asung a om tengteng leh tupi leh asung a om tengteng siampa minlou in a zekai nawnlouhna ding chi in a kichiamta hi.
‍Himahleh angel sagihna in a mut ding pengkulpi a gin chiang in, huai hun chiang in “Pathian thuguk, a sikha zawlneite kiang a a genkhiaktak hihkim in a omta ding” chi in.
‍Van a kipan a ka aw zak in kei hon houpih in, “Kuan inla, tuipi tung leh leitung a angel ding khut a laibu neuchik honsa vala in,” a chih ka za nawn hi.

‍Kei, angel kiang ah ka vahohta a, laibu neu honpe ding in a kiang ah ka vagen hi. Aman ka kiang ah, “La inla, nezou vek in; huai in na gil hihkha inchin himahleh na kam ah khuaizu bang in a khum ding” a chi hi.
‍Huan angel khut a kipan in laibu neuchik ka lata a, ka nezou vek a; ka kam ah khuaizu bang in a khum a; huan ka nekzohtak in ka gil hihkhat in a omta hi.
‍Huan ka kiang ah, “Mi tampite leh namte leh paute leh kumpipate kiang ah Pathian thusuak na genkholh nawn ngeingei ding ahi” a honchi hi.
Huan tehna chiang hileh kilawm sialluang chiang khat piak in ka om a: angel in, “Thou inla, Pathian biakin leh maitam leh huai a bete teh in:
‍biakin huangsung nusia inla, tehken; Jentelte kiang a piaksa a hihtak ziak in; huan khaw siangthou a khenuai un kha sawmli leh kha nih a sikden ding uhi.
‍Huan ka palai nihte kiang ah thilhihtheihna ka pedia, amau saiip puan silh in ni sang khat leh ni za nih leh ni sawmguk thu a genkhol ding uh a chi hi.
‍Hiaite olive sing nihte leh khawnvak koihna nihte, leitung a Toupa ma a dingte ahi uhi.
‍Mi kuapeuh in amau suknat a tup ualeh, a kam ua kipan a mei hong suakkhia in, a melmate a kangtum vek dia; kuapeuh in amau hihnat a tup ualeh huchibang a thah in a om ding uhi.

‍Hiai mite’n a thu genkholh sung ua vuah zuklouhna ding in, van khak theihna a nei ua; huan a ut hunhun ua sisan suaksak ding in tuite tung ah thu a nei ua, leitung leng gawtna chiteng a gawt ding in thu a nei uhi.
‍Huan a theihpihna nasep uh a zoh chiang un, huai gamsa kawkhuk tawbei a kipan a hong pawtkhia in amau a kidou pih ding a, amau a zou dia, a that ding hi.
A siluang uh khopi thupi kongzing ah a kisial a, huai khalam thu ah Sodom leh Aigupta kichi Toupa Kros a kilhlup a a omna mah ahi.
‍Mite leh chite leh paute leh namte lak a kipan mite a luang uh ni thum leh a kim a en ua, a luang uh han a vui a phal kei uhi.
‍Huchi in leitung a tengte amaute tung a kisial in a kipak ua, kipahna a bawl ua; thilpiakte a kikhak tuah ua; hiai zawlnei nihte’n amau leitung a tengte a thuakgimsak khittak ziak un.
‍Huan ni thum leh a kim nung in, Pathian a kipan in hinna hatna amau ah a honglutta a, amau khe un a dingta uhi; amau mu tengteng tung ah nakpi a launa a hong omta hi.
‍Van a kipan in aw thupitak a zata ua, “Hiai ah hong paitou un,” chi in. Huan amau meilak ah van ah a paitou uhi; a melmate un amau a mu chiat uhi.
‍Huai dak in zinling thupitak a omta a, khopi mun sawm a khen mun khat a chimta hi; huai zinling in mi sang sagih thah in a omta ua; a dangte a lauta uhi, van a Pathian kiang ah thupina a pia uhi.
‍Tunggikna nihna tuh a beita a: ngai in, tunggikna thumna a hong tungpah ding hi.
‍Huan angel sagihna in a pengkul a mutta hi; van ah aw thupitak in a zuita a, “Leitung lalgam i Toupa leh a Khrist a a hong hita hi; aman tangtawn in vai a hawm ding” a chi uhi.
‍Upa sawmnih leh li, mangtutphah tung a Pathian ma a tute’n a mai ua leisi in, Pathian a bia uhi.
“Na tung ah ka kipak uhi,
Toupa Pathian
Bangkim hihthei, omlel leh omsa leh hongom ding;
na thilhihtheihna thupi na laktak ziak in leh
vai na hawmtak ziak in,
Namte a heh ua,
tuin nang thangpaihna ni a hongtungta hi,
misite vai na hawmsak hun leh na sikha zawlneite leh misiangthoute kiang leh
na min kihtate milian leh mineute kiang a kipahman
na piakna hun leh leitung hihsete hihsiat a a omsam
hun uh a hongtungta hi,” a chi uhi.
‍Huan van a om Pathian biakin hon in a omta a; biakin sung a thukhun bawm a hong kimuta hi; huchi in khophiate, awte, vangingte, zinlingte leh gial thupitak in a zuita hi.
Van ah chiamtehna thupi leh lamdangtak: numei khat ni a kizem, a khenuai a khapi sikden leh a lu tung a lallukhu aksi sawmlehnih khu a hong kimu hi.
Aman nau a pai a, nauvei leh suakkhe ding natna in a kapkhia hi.
‍Huan van ah thillamdang thupi khat a hong kilang a; ngai in, dragon san lianpi, lu sagih leh ki sawm nei, a lu tung a lallukhu sagih khu a hong kilang hi.
A mei in van a aksite mun thum a khen mun khat a kaikhia a, leitung ah a paikheta hi; dragon in huai numei naunei dia kisa, a neih chiang a a nau nekzoh tum in a ma ah a ding hi.
‍Ta pasal naupang, sik chiang a nam tengteng tung a vaihawm ding a neita hi; tua tapa Pathian leh a mangtutphah ah laktouh in a omta hi.
‍Numei pen gamdai ah, Pathian in amah adia a mun bawlsak ah, huai ah ni sang khat leh ni za nih leh ni sawmguk khoi a om ding in a taita hi.
‍Huan van ah kidouna a om a: Mikael leh angelte dragon toh kidou ding in a kuan khia ua; dragon leh a angelte’n leng a dou uhi.
‍Huan a zoukei ua, van ah a mun himhim uh muh in a omta kei hi.
‍Dragon lian, gulpi tek, Diabol leh Setan chih a ompa, khovel pumpi khempa leh amah nasem angelte toh van apan paih khiaksuk in a omta uhi.

‍Huan van ah aw ngaihtak mai ka za hi, “Tun ah i Pathian hotdamna a hongtungta, thilhihtheihna, leh Khrist thuneihna; i unaute hekpa, i Pathian ma a sun leh zan a amau hekpa, paihkhiaksuk a a om ziak in.
‍Belamnou sisan ziak leh a theihpih uh thu ziak in amah tung ah a vualzouta ua; sih tanpha’n leng a hinna uh a it kei uhi.

‍Huaiziak in kipak un, aw van leh nou asung a tengte, Lei leh tuipi ading in a tung uh a gik; Diabol in hun tomchik phet a nei chih a kitheih ziak in, a heh mahmah a na kiang uah a hong paisukta hi” chi in.
‍Dragon leitung a paihkhiak ahita chih a kitheihtak in, huai numei nau pasal neinu a gawtta hi.
‍Huai numei kiang ah muvanlai thupitak kha nih piak in a omta a, gulpi mai a kipan gamdai mun a a lenlut theihna ding in, huai ah hun khat sung leh hunte leh hun kimkhat sung vak in a om hi.
‍Gulpi in a kam a kipan in tuipi bang tuiluang a numei a taihmangsak theihna ding in numei nung ah a sekheta hi,
‍Lei in numei a panpihta a, lei in a kam a ka ta a, dragon in a kam a kipan a a tui siatkhiak a na valhzohsak vekta hi.
‍Dragon numei tung ah a heh mahmah a, a suan omsun, Pathian thupiak zuite leh Jesu thu theihpihte kidoupih ding in a kuankheta hi.
‍Huan Dragon tuipiau ah ading hi.
Tuipi piau a ka din leh tuipi a kipan gamsa khat, ki sawm leh lu sagih nei, a kite tung a lallukhu sawm om chiat, a lu tungte a Pathian gensiatna om, hong paikhetou ka muta hi.
‍Ka gamsa muh gialbem a bang a, a khe vompi khe a bang a, a kam humpinelkai kam a bang hi: dragon in a thuneihna thupi leh a mangtutphah leh a thilhihtheihnate amah a peta hi.
A lute lak a khat sihpih khop hial dia liam hileh kilawm in ka mu hi; sihpih khop hial dia liam pen hihdam in a omta a; huchi in leitung pumpi in huai gamsa lamdangsa in a zuita uhi.
‍Dragon, gamsa kiang a a thuneihna petu a bia uhi; huchi in hiai gamsa a biak kawm in, “Hiai gamsa bang kua om a, amah kidoupih thei kua om hiam?” a chi uhi.
‍Huan gamsa kiang ah thil thupite leh Pathian gensiatnate genna ding kam piak in a omta a; huan a kiang ah thuneihna piak in a om hi, kha sawmli leh nih thilhihtheihna piak ahi.
‍Pathian gensiatna ding, a min gense ding leh a omna, van a tengte ngei gensia in a kamkata hi.
‍Huan Dragon in gamsa kiang ah misiangthoute kidoupih ding leh amau zou ding in phalna a pia a: chichih, pauchih leh namchih tung a thuneihna leng a peta hi.
‍Huan khovel om tung a kipat a belamnou thahsa hinna laibu a a min tuangloute tengteng leh leitung a teng tengteng in amah a be ding uhi.
‍“Kuapeuh zakna ding bil nei in zata hen!”
‍“Kuapeuh sal a pi dingte sal a pi in a om ding; kuapeuh namsau a thah dingte namsau a thah in a om ding. Hiai ah misiangthoute kuhkal na leh ginna neiding a chial ahi uh.
‍Huan gamsa dang khat leitung a kipat a hongpawt khetou ka muta a; belamnou bang in ki nih a nei a, dragon bang in thu a gen hi.
‍Gamsa masapen thuneihna tengteng a mitmuh in a zang hi. Leitung leh asung a teng tengteng gamsa masapen, sikhop hial a liam a hihdam a om, be ding in a sawl hi.
‍Huan mite mitmuh in van a kipan in leitung a mei kesuk thei khop in thillamdang pipi a hih hi.
‍Huan gamsa sik leh a mitmuh a thillamdang hihtheihna piak a a omna in aman leitung a tengte a khemta a; huai gamsa namsau a satliam leh damnawn lim bawl ding in lei a tengte thu a pia hi.
‍Gamsa masa lim a nakna peding leh tua gamsa a pautheihna ding in Dragon in amah kiang ah thilhihtheihna a pia a, tua bel gamsa lim be nuamlou tengteng leng a thahsak theihna ding ahi.
‍Mi tengteng, a lian a neu, a zawng a hau, sikha leh sikha lou, a khut taklam uh hiam, a tal uah hiam a chiamtehna piak in a om chiat uhi.
‍Huai bel kuamah in huai chiamtehna hiam, gamsa min hiam, ahihkeileh a min nambat neiloute’n lei theilou, zuak theilou a a omna ding ahi.
‍Hiai ah pilna a om hi. Kuapeuh theihsiamna nei in, gamsa nambat sutkhia hen; mihing nambat ahi a; nambat tuh za guk sawmguk leh guk ahi.
Huai nung in ka et leh, ngai in, Zion tang tung a Belamnou ding ka muta a, a kiang ah mipi nuaikhat singli leh sangli, a Pa min a tal ua kigelh chiatte toh a ding khawm uhi.
‍Tui tampi leh vanpiging bang a ging van a kipan in aw ka zata hi; ka aw zak gosem tumte’n a gosem uh a tumging uh a bang hi:
‍Mangtutphah leh ganhing lite ma leh upate ma ah la thak hileh kilawm khat a sa ua: leitung a kipat a huai leikhiaksate, nuaikhat singli leh sanglite loungal kuamah in huai la a thei theikei uhi.

‍Hiaite numei lak a kihihnin loute ahi ua; nungak siangthou bang ahi uhi. Hiaite a paina lamlam ua Belamnou zuite ahi uhi. Pathian ading leh Belamnou ading a gah masapen hi ding a mite lak a kipan a leisa ahi uhi,
‍Huan a kam uah zuau a omkei a; Pathian mangtutphah ma ah gensiat bei ahi uhi.
‍Huan angel dang vanlai zawl a leng ka mu a, aman tangtawn Tanchinhoih, leitung a tengte kiang leh namchih leh chichih leh pauchih leh michihte kiang a genkhiak ding a nei hi.
Aw ngaihtak in, “Pathian kihta unla, amah thupina pia un; a vaihawmna hun a hongtungta ngal a; van leh lei leh tuipi leh tuikhukte siampa amah bia un” a chi hi.
‍Huan angel nihna in a honzui a, “Pukta, pukta Babulon khaw thupi, nam tengteng a mi ngaihhatna, hehna uain dawnsaknu, a chi hi.
Angel thumna in amau a honzuita a aw ngaihtak in, “Kuapeuh gamsa leh a lim bia, a tal hiam a khut hiam a chiamtehna a neite’n
‍Pathian thangpaihna uain a dawn ding ua, huai uain thangpaihna nou, bangmah toh hellouh hial a bawl ahi; angel siangthoute leh Belamnou muh in amah mei leh kat in hihnat in om in teh:
‍Huan a hihnatna meikhu uh tangtawn tangtawn in a zamtou dia; huai gamsa leh a limbete, leh kuapeuh a min chiamtehna neiphot in sun leh zan in tawlngakna a neikei ding uhi” a chi hi.
‍Hiai ah misiangthou, Pathian thupiakte leh Jesu ginna zuite kuhkalna nei ding a chialna a om hi.

‍Huan van a kipan in aw in hichibang in, “Gelh in, tua kipan in misite, Toupa a site a hampha uhi”; Kha in, “Ahi, a sepgimna uh a khawlsanta ding ua, a thilhihte un honzui ding a hih ziak in” a chih uh ka zata hi.
‍Huan ka et leh ngai in, meipi ngou ka muta a; huai mei tung ah mi khat Mihing Tapa toh kibang, a lu a dangkaeng lallukhu khu, a khut a kawite hiam tawi ka muta hi.
Angel dang Pathian biakin apan hong paikhia a, meipi tung a tupa kiang ah ngaihtak in, “Na kawite lik inla, at in: at hun a tungta hi; lei buh a min gawpta” chi’n a kikou hi.
‍Huai mei tung a tupa’n leitung ah a kawite a lik a; leitung at in a omta hi.
‍Huan van a om Pathian biakin a kipan in angel dang a hong paikhia a, aman leng kawite hiam a tawi hi.

‍Huan mei tung a thilhihtheihna nei, angel dang maitam ma a kipan in a hong paikhia a; aman aw ngaihtak in, huai kawite tawipa sam in, “Na kawite hiamtak lik inla, leitung a grep gahbomte khawm in; grepte a min mahmah ta hi” a chi hi.
‍Huai angel in leitung ah a kawite a lik a, leitung a grep gahte a khawmta hi, Pathian thangpaihna, uain sukna thupi, uain sukna ah a pailutta hi.
‍Khaw pawlam ah uain sukna chil in a omta a, uain sukna a kipan sisan sakol kamkaihna tanpha louching sang khat leh za guk pha in a luangkhia hi.
Huan chiamtehna thupi leh lamdang, angel sagih, hi nanung sagih, a nanung pente, Pathian hehna toh kidim tawi, van ah ka muta hi.
‍Huan limlang tuipi hileh kilawm, mei toh kihel leh gamsa leh a lim leh a min nambat tung a vualzoute, a khut ua Pathian gosem tawi a, limlang tuipi kiang a ding ka muta hi,
‍Pathian sikha, Mosi la leh Belamnou la a sa uhi:
“Na thilhihte thupi in a lamdang hi.
Aw Toupa Pathian,
Bangkim hihthei!
Na lampite a dik in a tang uhi,
Misiangthoute Kumpipa, chi in.
Toupa aw, kuan ahia na min hih thupi a laulou ding?
Nang kia siangthou na hi a.
Nam tengteng hongpai in na ma ah hong be ding uh,
Na thilhih diktatte hihlat in omta ngal ua” a chi uhi.
‍Hiai thilte ka muh nung in, van a theihsakna biakbuk dantan sungnung hon in a omta hi:
‍Huan hiai dantan sungnung a kipan in angel sagih, gawtna sagih nei, puanmalngat siangthou leh vak a kizema, dangkaeng kawnggaka a awm ua kigakte a hong paikhia uhi.
‍Ganhing lite lak a khat in angel sagihte kiang ah tangtawn tangtawn a hing Pathian hehna a dim dangkaeng belhbu sagihte a peta hi.
‍Huchi in Tempul Pathian thupina a thilhihtheihna a kipan meikhu in hihdim in a omta hi; angel sagihte gawtna sagihte a tunkim masiah asung ah kuamah a lut theita kei uhi.
Huan Tempul dantan sungnung a kipan hongsuak aw thupi in, angel sagihte kiang ah, “Kuan unla, leitung ah Pathian thangpaihna belhbu sagihte sungkhia un” a chih ka zata hi.
A masapen a kuan a, leitung ah a belhbu a sungkheta hi, huai gamsa chiamtehna nei, a lim bemite tung ah meima sia leh nai in a hong suakta hi.
A nihna in a belhbu tuipi tung ah a sungkhia a; misite si bang in sisan a hongsuak hi; tuipi sung a thil omte tanpha in hinna nei peuhmah a sita uhi.
A thumna pen in a belhbu luite leh tuinakte tung ah a sungkhia hi; sisan a hongsuakta uhi.
‍Tuite angel in, “Nang omsa leh omlel, nang Misiangthou, hichibang a vai na hawmtak ziak in na diktat hi:
Amau misiangthoute leh zawlneite sisan a suah ua, nang a dawn ding un sisan na piak hichih tuak ahi him uhi” a chih ka za hi.
‍Huan maitam in, “Ahi, Toupa Pathian aw, Bangkim hihthei, na vaihawmte a dik in a diktathuai hi!” a chih ka zata hi.
A lina pen in a belhbu ni a sunkhumta a; amah kiang ah mite mei a hainat theihna piak in a omta hi.
A sat a sa a mite hainatin a omta ua; hichibang natnate tung a thilhihtheihna nei, Pathian min a genseta ua; Pathian kiang a thupina pe ding in a kisik tuankei uhi.
A ngana in a belhbu gamsa tutphah tung ah a sungkheta a; huan a lalgam hihmial in a omta a; amau na sa in a lei uh a keita uhi,
A natna uh leh a meimate uh ziak in amau tuh van a Pathian a gensia ua; a thilhihte uah a kisik tuankei uhi.
A gukna in a belhbu luipi, Euphrates luitung ah a sungkheta a; huai tui a kangvekta hi, huchi in suahlama kipan kumpipa hong dingte adia lampi bawlsa a a om theihna ding in.
‍Dragon kam a kipan leh gamsa kam a kipan leh, zawlnei taklou kam a kipan in kha nin thum, ukeng bang mai hong paikhia ka muta hi:
Amaute dawite kha, thillamdang hihte; khovel pumpi leh lei kumpipate kiang a hong a, Pathian Bangkim hihtheipa ni thupi a kidouna adia amaute pikhawmte ahi uhi.
‍“Ngai in, guta bang in ka hongpai hi. Kiveng leh puan tengsa a om a hampha hi, huchilou in zaw vuaktang in a om dia; a zumhuaina a mu kha ding uhi.”
‍Huchi in amaute mun khat Hebru pau a ‘Armageddon’ kichi ah a pikhawmta uhi.
A sagihna in a belhbu huihkhua tung ah a sungkheta hi; mangtutphah a kipan in dantan sungnung ah aw ngaihtak a hong suakkhia a, “Zoh ahita!” a chi hi.
‍Huchi in khophiate, awte, vangingte a hong omta a; zinling thupi, huchibang a thupi leh hat leitung a mihing om nungsiah om ngeilou a omta hi.
‍Khopi thupi mun thum in a kikhenta a, namte khopite a chimta uhi; Babulon khopi thupi Pathian mitmuh in theihgige in a om a, a hehna kihtakhuai uain nou a dawn ding in piak in a omta hi.
‍Tuikulh gam chiteng a taimangta ua, tangsangte muhphak in a omta kei hi.
‍Huan van a kipan in gial lianpipi, talent khat a gik mite tung ah a hong kesukta hi; mite’n huai gial a gawtna ziak in Pathian a gensia ua; huai gawtna a thupi mahmah hi.
Huai thilnung in angel sagih belhbu sagih tawite lak a khat hongpai in kei a hon houpih hi, “Hongpai in, tui tampite tung a tu kizuaknu thupi tung a vaihawmna k’on ensak ding.
‍Leitung kumpipate amah toh a kingai ua, huan a mingaihna uain in leitung a tengte khamsak in a om” a chi hi.
Aman Kha in gamdai ah hon pawmangta a: huan gamsa san-au, Pathian gensiatna min a pumdim, lu sagih leh kisawm nei tung a numei khat tu ka muta hi.
‍Huai numei in puan sandup leh puan sandang a silh a, dangkaeng leh suangmantam leh tuikepsuang in a kizem hi; a khut in dangkaeng nou, thil kihhuaite leh a mi ngaihna thilninte a dim a tawi hi.
‍Huan a taltang ah min thuguk, “Babulon thupi, kizuakte leh leitung a kihhuaite nu,” chih a kigelh hi.
‍Huan huai numei misiangthoute sisan leh Jesu martarte sisan dawnkham in ka mu hi.
Huainu ka muhtak in lamdang ka sa mahmah hi.
‍Huan angel in ka kiang ah, “Bangding a lamdang sa na hia? Huai numei leh amah pua gamsa, lu sagih leh kisawm nei, thuguk k’on hilh ding a chi hi.

‍Huai na gamsa muh a omkhin a, huan a omkei a; kawkhuk tawbei a kipan a hong paikhe ding ahi, manthatna a pai ding ahi. Huan leitung a tengte, khovel siam tung a kipan a hinna laibu a min gelhlouhte’n tua gamsa omkhin a, omlou leh hongom ding a hihdan a muh chiang un lamdang a sa ding uhi.
‍“Hiai ah pilna lungsim a kul. Lu sagihte numei tutna tangsang sagihte ahi uhi.
‍Huan kumpipa sagihte ahi ua; nga a pukkhin ua, khat a omlel a, khat a hongtung naikei hi. A hongtun chiang in, hun tomchik sung a om ding hi.
‍Huai gamsa omkhin a, tua omlou pen kumpi giatna ahi. Amah sagihte lak a tel ahi; huan manthatna ah a pai ding hi.
‍“Huan ki sawm na muhte, lalgam nei nailou, kumpipa sawmte ahi ua; himahleh dakkal khat lel, huai gamsa toh amau kumpipate bang in thuneihna a nei ding uhi.
‍Hiaite’n lungsim khat nei in, gamsa kiang ah a thilhihtheihna leh a thuneihna uh a pia uhi.
‍Hiaite’n Belamnou a kidou pih ding ua, Belamnou in amau a zou ding, amah toupate Toupa leh kumpipate KUMPIPA a hih ziak in; amah toh omkhawmte bel sapte, telte leh muanhuaite ahi uhi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Kizuaknu tutna tui na muhte mite leh mipite leh namte leh paute ahi uhi.
‍Ki sawm na muhte leh na gamsa muhte’n kizuaknu a mudah ding ua, suanbei leh vuaktang a suaksak ding uhi, a sa a ne ding ua, amah mei in a haltum vek ding uhi.
‍Pathian thu hihkim a a om mateng, amah deihlam a hihna ding uleh, lungsim khat a neihna ding uleh, a lalgam uh gamsa kiang a a piakna ding un, Pathian in amau ah ngaihtuahna a koihta hi.
‍Huan na numei muh khopi thupi, leitung kumpipate tung a vaihawmnu ahi” a chilai hi.
Hiai thilnung in van a kipan angel dang, thuneihna liantak nei, van a kipan hong paikhesuk ka muta hi; a thupina in leitung tuh a vaksak ta hi.
Aw ngaihtak in a kikouta a, “Chimta, chimta Babulon khopi thupi, dawite omna leh kha nin tengteng kulh leh vasa nin leh huathuai teng kulh a hong hita hi.
‍Nam tengteng in a mi ngaihna hehna uain a nam tengteng dawn khamsak a om ua, leitung Kumpipate’n amah a kingaihpih ua, leitung sumsinte nuamtat luatna a hong hauhtak ziak un” a chi hi.
‍Huan van a kipan in aw dang in hichibang in a gen hi:
“Ka mite a khelhna a na pan khaklouhna ding un leh ahi na kailouhna ding un,
amah a kipan in hong paikhia un,
a chih ka za hi.
A khelhna van a tungta a,
Pathian in a khelhnate a theigige hi.
Aman honpiak bangmah a kiang ah pia unla,
amah gamtatna a leh nih in thukkik un:
a helna nou ah amah ading in a leh nih in helsak un,
A ki thupisakna zahzah leh a noptalna zah in amah bawlgim un,
hih lungkham un: aman a lungsim in,
‘Kumpinu in ka tu a, meithai ka hi kei, bangchi mah in
lungkham ngeikei ding,’ a chih ziak in.
Huaiziak in ni khat sung in
hipi a gawtna, sihna, lungkhamna leh kialna a hongtung ding hi;
huan amah mei in haltum vek in om inteh;
amah tung a vaihawm Toupa
Pathian a hat ziak in.”
‍Huan leitung a kumpipate amah kingaihpih leh nuamtat a omte’n, amah haltumna meikhu a muh chiang un, amah kah in mau ding uhi.
A thuakna a hihnat a om ding lau in gamlapi ading in,
“Maizen! Maizen!
khopi thupi Babulon!
Dak kal khat sung a na tung a vaihawmna a hongtun tak ziak in” a chi ding uhi.
‍Huan leitung a sumsinte’n, a sumsinna van uh kuamah in a leilouh ziak un, kap in a sun ding uhi.

‍Huan a sumsinna vante uh bel: Dangkaeng leh dangka a sumsinna van, suangmantam, tuikepsuang, puanmalngat hoih, puansan, maimom puan, puan eng, singnamtui, saiha a bawl van, sing mantam pen chi a van bawl tengteng, sumsan leh sik leh marbul sung a belsuan bawl tengteng;
‍leh singguithak, namtui, namtui haichi, thau namtui, chim, uain, thau, buhnel, buh, belam, huan sakol kangtalai leh sal, mite hinna ahi.
‍“Huan na lungsim a na deih, gahte’n nang hon taimangsan ua, thil limchi leh hoih teng in nang a hon manthat san ua, muhnawn ahi ngeikei ding” a chi uhi.
‍Hiai thilte a sumsinte, amah ziak a hau a bawlte’n, amah hihnat a a omna lau in gamlapi ading in, kap in a sun ding uhi.
‍“Maizen! Maizen! khopi thupi, puanmalngat hoih leh a san leh a eng a kizem a, dangkaeng leh suangmantam leh tuikepsuang a kivannu!

‍Dakkal khat in hichitel a hauhna thupi bangmahlou a bawl a om ziak in” a chi ding uhi. Huan longpute leh koilam lam a long a hongtungte leh longmite leh tuipi a nekzong tengteng gamlapi ah ading uhi.
Amau khopi kang leh halna meikhu a muh chiang un “Hiai bang khaw thupi om ngei hiam” chi in a kikou uhi.

‍Huan amau lutung ah leivui a kibuak ua a kikou ua, kap leh sun in, “Maizen! Maizen! khaw thupi huai a tuipi a mi longnei tengteng amah hauhsakna ziak a hauhsak in a om uhi! Dakkal khat sung in amah bangmahlou hita mai” a chi ding uhi.
Aw nang van, amah tung ah kipak unla, Aw nou misiangthoute, leh nou sawltakte leh nou zawlneite; na tung ua a vaihawmna Pathian in amah tung ah vai a hawmtak ziak in kipak un a chi uhi.

‍Huan angel hat khat in buhgawina suang lianpi hileh kilawm suang khat a domta a, tupi ah a pailut a, “Hichibang in khopi thupi, Babulon nakpi a hihchip in om in chin, muhkhiak nawnlouh hial in a om ding.

‍Gosem tumte leh lasiamte leh tamngai tumte leh pengkul tumte, na sung ah kiza nawn kei hial ding hi. Khutsiam siamna nei himhim, na sung ah muhkhiak in omnawn kei hial un chin; khawl ging na sung ah kiza nawn kei ding hi.
‍Na sung ah meivak a vaknawn kei ding hi; mouneipa aw leh mou aw na sung ah a kiza nawn kei ding hi: na sumsinte leitung kumpipate ahi ngal ua; na bumsiamna in nam tengteng khem in a omta uhi!”
Amah sung ah zawlneite sisan, leh misiangthoute sisan leh leitung a thah a omte tengteng sisan a ki mukhia hi,” a chi hi.
Hiai thilnung in van ah mipi aw hileh kilawm in, “Hallelujah! Hotdamna leh thupina leh thilhihtheihna i Pathian a ahi;
A vaihawmna a dik in a kizen hi; kizuaknu thupi leitung a, a mingaihna a hihsenu tung a vai a hawmtak ziak in, Aman a sikhate sisan amah tung ah a thukta,” a chih ka zata hi.
‍“Hallelujah! Huai khopi halna meikhu tangtawn tangtawn in a zamtou hi,” chi in a kikou nawn uhi.
‍Upa sawmnih leh lite leh ganhing lite a khupboh ua, Pathian mangtutphah a tupa a beta uhi, “Amen, Hallelujah!” a chi uhi.
‍Huan mangtutphah a kipan in aw a hong pawtkhia a, “Nou a sikhate aw, na vek un, a neu a lian, nou amah laute, Pathian phatna pia un” chi in.
‍Mipi tampi aw hileh kilawm tui tampi ging bang leh vanpiging bang aw in, “Hallelujah! Toupa i Pathian Bangkim hihthei in vai a hawm ziak in,
‍Nuamni, nakpitak in kipakni, Amah kiang ah thupina pia in: Belamnou zineih hun a hongtungta hi. A zi leng a kisakkhit tak ziak in;
Amah puanmalngat hoih leh siangthou a kizepna ding in piak in a omta hi, a chih ka za hi, tua puanmalngat hoih misiangthoute nasep diktatte ahi.”
‍Huan angel in ka kiang ah, “Gelh in, Belamnou zineihna nitak Ankuang um ding a chial a omte a hampha uhi” a chi hi.

‍Huan amah be ding in a khebul ah ka pukta hi. Huan ka kiang ah, “Hon be kei hial in: Jesu thu theihpihna kem nangmah unau leh sikha hihpih ka hi; Pathian be zaw in, Jesu thu theihpihna genkholhna kha a hih ziak in” a chi hi.
‍Huan van kihong ka muta hi; Ngai in, sakol kang leh a tung a tuang Ginom leh Dik kichi leng ka mu hi; Aman dikna a vaihawm in kidouna a bawl hi.
A mit meikuang bang ahi a, a lutung ah lallukhu tampi a om a, min khat amah loungal kuamah theihlouh kigelh a nei hi.
Amah puan sisan a diah in a kizem a; a min, “Pathian Thu” chih ahi.
Amah van a om sepaih hon puanmalngat hoih, ngou leh siangthou silh a sakol kang tung ah tuang in a honzui uhi.
A kam a kipan in namte a satna ding, namsau hiam khat a hong suakkhia hi: amau tung ah sikchiang in vai a hawm dia: Pathian Bangkim hihthei hehna lauhuaina uain sukna a chil hi.
A puan tung leh a phei tung ah min, “KUMPIPATE KUMPIPA, LEH TOUPATE TOUPA” chih a kigelh hi.
‍Huan angel khat ni ading ka mu a; amah aw ngaihtak a kikou in, van laizawl a vasa leng tengteng kiang ah, “Hong unla, Pathian nitakan thupi ah hong kikhawm vek un;
‍Kumpipate sa, sepaih heutute sa, mi hatte sa, sakolte sa, a tung a tute sa, mi tengteng sa, sikha leh sikha loute sa, leh milian leh mineu sa na nek theihna ding un” a chi hi.
‍Huai gamsa leh leitung a kumpipate leh a sepaihte uh, huai sakol tung a tuangpa leh a sepaihte kidoupih ding in a hong kikhawmta uhi.

‍Gamsa mat in a omta a, zawlnei taklou, a ma a chiamtehna hih a gamsa chiamtehna neite leh amah limbete a khempa toh a man khawm a: a nih tuak un a hing in meidil, kat a kang sung ah paihlut in a omta uhi.
‍Huan a dangte huai sakol tung a tupa kam a kipan a hongsuak namsau a thah in a omta uhi; amau sa in vasa tengteng gilvah in a omta uhi.
Huan angel khat van a kipan a hong paikhesuk, a khut a kawkhuk tawbei honna tahbi leh khainiang lianpi tawi ka mu hi.
Aman dragon, gulpi tek, Diabol leh Setan a manta a, kum sang khat sung ding in amah a henta hi.
‍Kum sang khat a chin ma a namte a khem nawnlouhna ding in amah kawkhuk tawbei ah paihlut in a om a, a khakkhum a, amah a kilhkhumta hi: tu nung in sawtloukal amah khahnawn a om ding ahi.

‍Huan mangtutphahte leh a tung a tute ka muta hi, amaute kiang ah vaihawmna piak in a omta hi: Jesu thu theihsakna ziak leh Pathian thu ziak a a ngawng uh sattan a omte kha ka mu a, huaite gamsa leh a lim beloute, a tal ua leh a khut ua a chiamtehna neiloute ahi ua; amau a hong hingta ua, Khrist toh kum sang khat vai a hawmta uhi.
‍Hiai pen thohnawnna masapen ahi. Misi dangte bel kum sang khat a bei mateng a hingkik kei uhi.

‍Thohnawnna masapen a pangte a hampha uhi, a siangthou uhi: Amaute tung a sih nihna in hihtheih a neih louh ziak in; himahleh amau Pathian leh Khrist siampute a honghi ding ua, kum sang khat sung amah toh vai a hawm ding uhi.
‍Huan kum sang khat a bei chiang in, Setan a tanna in a kipan in khahkhiak in a om dia,
‍Leitung kil li a om namte, Gog leh Magog khem a amau kidouna mun a pikhawm ding in amah hong paikhe pah dia; a tamdan uh tuipi piaunel bang ahi uhi.
‍Huan amau leitung vailam khaksuak in a paitou ua, misiangthoute giahphual leh khopi it, a kimvel in a umta uhi. Huan van a kipan in mei a hong kesukta a, amaute a kangtum vek hi.
‍Huan amaute khempa Diabol gamsa leh zawlnei taklou omna, mei leh kat dil ah paihlut in a omta uhi; tangtawn tangtawn in sun leh zan in hihnat in a omta ding uhi.
‍Huan mangtutphah ngou thupi leh a tung a tu ka muta a; a mai a kipan lei leh van a taimangta hi, amau ading in mun himhim a omkei hi.

‍Misite, a neu a lian, huai mangtutphah ma a dingte ka muta hi; laibute a kihong a; laibu dang, hinna laibu leng a kihong a; misite huai laibute a thilkigelhte a kipan in a thilhih bang ua vai hawmsak in a omta uhi.
‍Tuipi in a sung a om misite a hon pawtsakta a; sihna leh misi khua in a sung ua misi omte a hon pawtsak ua: mi chiteng a thilhih bangbang ua vai hawmsak in a omta uhi.
‍Sihna leh misi khua meidil a paihlut in a omta uhi. Hiai mei dilpen sih nihna ahi.
‍Kuapeuh hinna laibu a kigelh a muhlouh uh, meidil a paihlut in a omta uhi.
Huan van thak leh lei thak ka muta a: van masapen leh lei masapen a beitak ziak un; tuipi leng a om nawnta kei hi.
‍Khopi siangthou, Jerusalem thak, mou a pasal a ding a kizem bang a bawlzohsa a om, Pathian a kipan van a hong paikhesuk ka muta hi.

‍Huan mangtutphah a kipan aw thupitak ka zak in, “Ngai in, Pathian biakbuk mihingte lak ah a omta hi, amau lak ah a teng dia amau a mite ahi ding ua, Pathian mahmah in amau a ompih dia a Pathian uh ahi ding hi.
‍Huan a mit ua kipan in khitui tengteng a nulhul dia; sihna a om nawn kei dia; lusun leh kah leh natna himhim leng a om nawn kei ding hi” a chi hi.
‍Huan mangtutphah tung a tupa’n, “Ngai in, thil tengteng ka siam thakta,” a chi hi. “Gelh in: hiai thute a ginom in a dik uhi” a chi hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Sepzoh ahita hi. Kei Alpha leh Omega, a bul leh a tawp ka hi. Dangtakte kiang ah manbei in hinna tuikhuk a tui amau ka pe ding hi.
‍Kuapeuh a vualzoupa’n hiai thilte a luah dia; a Pathian ka hidia, amah ka tapa ahi ding hi.
‍Himahleh dawilokte leh gingtaloute leh, kihhuaite leh tualthatte leh, mingaihhatte leh bumhatte leh, milimbete leh zuautheite tengteng tan tuh dil, mei leh kat a kang, sih nihna ahi” a chi hi.
‍Huan angel sagih belhbu sagih leh gawtna sagih nanungpen tawite lak a khat a hongpai a; kei a hon houpih a, "hiai ah hongpai in, mou, Belamnou zi k’on ensak ding” a chi hi.
Aman Kha in tang lian leh sangpi ah a hon pawmangta hi, huchi in khopi siangthou Jerusalem, Pathian a kipan a van a hong paikhesuk a hon ensak hi,
‍Pathian thupina a nei a: a vakna suang mantam pen, Jasper suang, Kristal bang in a siang hi:
‍Kulhbang thupi leh sangpi a nei a; kong sawmlehnih a nei a, huai kongte ah angel sawmlehnih a om ua; huai kongtungte ah Israel suan nam sawmlehnihte min a kigelh hi:
A suahlam ah kongpi thum a om a; a mallam ah kongpi thum, a simlam ah kongpi thum; a tumlam ah kongpi thum a om hi.
‍Huan khopi kulhbang in nuaiphah sawmlehnih a nei a, huaite tung ah Belamnou Sawltak Sawmlehnihte minte a tuang hi.
‍Huan kei hon houpihpa’n khopi leh kongpite leh kulhbangte tehna ding in tehna dangkaeng sialluang a tawi hi.
‍Huai khua in ning li a nei a, a dunglam a vailam chia chia in a lian a; a sialluang in khopi a teh a, lou ching sang sawmlehnih ahi a, dunglam leh vailam leh a sanlam a kikim uhi.
‍Huan angel in huai kulhbang mihing tehna dan in a teh a, tong za leh sawmli leh li a sah ahi.
‍Huan a khopi kulhbang jasper suang a kibawl ahi a; huan a khopi dangkaeng siang, limlang siang bang ahi.
‍Huai khopi kulhbang suangphum suang mantam chiteng a zep ahi. A suangphum khatna jasper suang ahi a; a nihna sapphir suang, a thumna kalsedoni suang; a lina emerald suang;

A ngana sardonik suang; a gukna sardi suang; a sagihna kristolait suang; a giatna beril suang; a kuan a topaz suang; a sawmna kristoprai suang; a sawmlehkhatna zasinth suang; a sawmlehnihna amethis suang ahi uhi.
‍Huan kongpi Sawmlehnihte tuikep suang Sawmlehnihte ahi ua; a kongpite tuikep suang khat chiat a bawl ahi a: Khopi kholak dangkaeng siang ahi a, limlang muhpaisuak theih bang ahi.
‍Huai ah biakin ka mu kei a; Toupa Pathian Bangkim hihthei leh Belamnou biakin a hih ziak in.
‍Huan a tung a tanvak ding in huai khopi in ni hiam, kha hiam leng a poimawh kei a, Pathian thupina in a tanvak a, Belamnou a meivak uh ahi.
‍Huai vak ah hotdam namte a khosa ding ua; leitung kumpipate a thupina uh toh a honglut ding uhi.
‍Bangchi mah in huai kongpite sun a khak in a omkei ding a, huailai a zan a omlouh ding ziak in:
‍Huai mun ah namte thupina leh zahtakhuaina laklut ahi ding hi:
‍Bangchi mah in huai ah thilnin hiam, ahihkeileh kihhuai leh zuaubawl himhim leng a lut kei ding hi. Himahleh Belamnou hinna laibu a min gelhte kia a lut ding uhi.
Huan hinna tuisiang luanna lui a hon ensak hi. Huai lui bel Kristal bang a siang, Pathian leh Belamnou mangtutphah apan hong luangkhia ahi.
‍Huai a kongzing lai, a lui lang tuaktuak ah hinna singgah chi sawm lehnih nei, kha teng a gah a om a: huai singnahte namte hihdamna ding ahi.
‍Huan hamsia himhim a omnawn kei ding a; huai ah Pathian leh Belamnou mangtutphah a omta ding hi: a sikhate’n a na a sem ding uhi.
Amaute’n a mel a mu ding ua; amah min a tal uah a om ding hi.
‍Huan zan himhim a omnawn kei dia; khawnvak vak leh ni vak hiam leng a deih nawn kei ding uhi; Toupa Pathian in amau vakna a piak ding ziak in: amau tangtawn tangtawn in vai a hawm ding uhi.
‍Huan aman ka kiang ah, hiai thute a muanhuai un a dik uhi: Toupa zawlnei siangthoute Pathian in thil hong ompah mahmah dingte a sikhate kiang ah musak ding in a angel a sawlta hi.
‍“Ngai in, Ka hong paipah ding.” “Hiai laibu a genkholhna thute zui peuhmah a hampha hi” a chi hi.
‍Huan kei Johan, hiai thilte zapa leh mupa ka hi. Huchi a ka zak leh ka muhtak in, hiai thilte hon musakpa angel khebul ah be ding in ka pukta hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Hon be kei hial in, hiai laibu thute kem, na unau zawlneite leh nang sikha hihpih ka hi: Pathian be zaw in” a chi hi.
Aman ka kiang ah, “Hiai laibu a genkholhnate bilhkhum ken, a hun a naitak ziak in.
‍Kuapeuh midiklou in diklouhna hih nalai henla, kuapeuh mi nin, nin nalai hen: kuapeuh midiktat, diktat nalai henla; kuapeuh Mi Siangthou, siangthou nalai hen” a chi hi.
‍“Ngai in, ka hong paipah ding hi; michih a thilhih bangzel ua piak ding in ka kiang ah ka kipahman a om hi.
Alpha leh Omega, a masapen leh a nanungpen, abul leh atawp ka hi.”
‍Hinna sing a honzot theihna ding uleh, kongpi tawn a khopi sung a a lut theihna ding ua a puan uh sawpsiangte a hampha uhi.
A pawlam ah uite, bumhatte, mingaihhatte, tualthatte, milimbete leh kuapeuh zuauthu deih a, zuauthu bawlte a om uhi.
‍“Kei, Jesu’n saptuamte a ding a hiai thilte na kiang ua hon theisak ding in ka angel k’on sawlta hi. David zung leh a suan, zingsol aksi vak ka hi” a chi hi.
‍Kha leh Mou in, “Hongpai in” a chi uhi. A za peuh in, “Hongpai in” chi hen. Kuapeuh a ut in hinna tui a manbei in dawn hen.
‍Hiai laibu a genkholhna thute za peuh kiang ah ka theisak hi: Mi kuapeuh in hiai thute a behlap leh, Pathian in amau tung ah hiai laibu a kigelh gawtnate a behlap ding hi:
‍Huan kuapeuh in hiai genkholhna laibu a thute lakmang a neih leh, Pathian in a tan ding hiai laibu a kigelh, hinna sing leh khopi siangthou a kipan a lamang ding hi.
‍Hiai thilte theisakpa’n, “ Ahi, hong paipah ding ka hi” a chi. Amen! Hongpai in, Toupa Jesu.
Toupa Jesu hehpihna noute tengteng tung ah om hen, Amen.
